Piny oyido ongoye gi cal aka oyido nitie nono. Mudho oyido oumo wakawaka madongo, aka Cuny pa Were oyido waya wi pi.
Kenyo Were owodho or ni, “Weyi kenyo wobedi lero.” Aka lero omenyere.
Aka Were oneno ni lero ber, ameno opoko lero kwoŋ mudho.
Were olwoŋo lero ni odieceŋ, aka mudho ni wor. Piny oyutho to piny yawere; meno obedo ndelo marapena.
Ameno Were ocweyo thwolo m'opoko pi ma pendi lowo gi pi ma wiye.
Were olwoŋo thwolo no ni pondeponde. Piny oyutho to piny yawere; meno obedo ndelo mar'ario.
Kenyo Were owaco ni, “Weyi pi ma pendi polo wocokere kanyacel i kabedo acel, aka lowo m'othwo wonen.” Aka obedo ameno.
Were olwoŋo lowo m'othwo ni piny, aka pi m'ocokere kanyacel ni nam. Were oneno ni oyido ber.
Were owaco ni, “Weyi piny wonywol dudi, ma nyak nyinge gi ma nyak olemo.” Aka obedo ameno.
Piny onywolo dudi nger gi nger, aka Were oneno ni oyido ber.
Piny oyutho to piny yawere, meno obedo ndelo mar'adek.
Were owaco ni, “Weyi talin wobedi i pondeponde ma poko odieceŋ gi wor; aka weyi jowobedi ma nyutho ndir, ndelo gi oro.
Weyi jowoliel i pondeponde ma miyo piny lero.” Aka obedo ameno.
Ameno Were ocweyo talin ario madongo. Madwoŋ mere dhumo odieceŋ, aka mathin mere dhumo wor; go ocweyo micalin bende.
Aka Were oketho jo i pondeponde miyo piny lero,
dhumo odieceŋ gi wor, gi poko lero kwoŋ mudho. Aka Were oneno ni oyido ber.
Piny oyutho to piny yawere, meno obedo ndelo mar'aŋwen.
Were owaco ni, “Weyi pi wonywol cwec ma nigi kwo, aka weyi koyo wopoŋ gi winyin.”
Ameno Were ocweyo rec madongo i nam kodi kisi cwec makwo ma bedo i pi, kodi kisi nger winyo. Aka Were oneno nike oyido ber.
Were omiyo jo silwany aka owaco ri kisi cwec ma bedo i pi nike wonywol wopoŋ i nam; to waco ri winyin nike jowomedere i welo.
Piny oyutho to piny yawere, meno obedo ndelo mar'abic.
Were owaco ni, “Weyi piny wonywol kisi nger ogwaŋ manitie gi kwo: Ma bedo peco, madudi, madongo kodi mathindho.” Aka obedo ameno.
Were ocweyo joje, aka oneno nike oyido ber.
Ameno Were ocweyo ji i cal pere; ocweyo jo ma cwo kodi ma mon.
Aka Were omiyo jo silwany to waco ni, “Nywol win nyithindho kweth, ŋey nyikway win jowobedi i piny gibe to jodhumo. Dhum win rec ma nam, winyin ma malo kodi kisi cwec makwo ma wotho i piny.
Amiyo win dudi manywolo nyinge kodi manywolo olemo paka cemo.
To ri ogwaŋe kodi winyin, amiyo lum kodi boke dudi paka cemo.” Aka obedo ameno.
Were oneno kisi gima go oyido ocweyo, aka neni, oyido ber swa. Piny oyutho to piny yawere. Meno obedo ndelo mar'aucel.
Ameno polo gi piny gi kisi cwec je orumo.
Aka i ndelo mar'abirio Were oyido otieko tic pere ma go otimo to ywomere.
Ameno Were omiyo ndelo mar'abirio silwany to ketho ndelo no gicen paka ndelo manyakare; rupiri i ndelo no Were oywomere kwoŋ tic ma go oyido timo i cweyo piny.
Aka ameno apaka polo gi piny ocwey.
Munyo Rwoth Were ocweyo polo gi piny,
dudi gi kodhi oyido fodi ongoye, rupiri Were oyido fodi k'odhiro koth; aka oyido ongoye ŋat'ofur lowo.
To pi oyido nyule wok i pendi lowo to dhieko piny.
Aka Were opidho ndelo i Eden, yuwok ceŋ; aka kenyo go oketho nyatoro ma go oyido ocweyo.
Aka omiyo kisi nger yath twi maber anena aka ma cemo; yath ma kwo bende i dier ndelo kodi yath ma ŋeyo gimaber gi gimarac.
Malawa oyido mol i Eden aka dhieko ndelo aka otiakere ka diŋwen.
Marapena oyido ilwoŋo ni Pison; mol thoko piny Havila.
(Zahabu mangil nwaŋere kenyo kodi mo manitie gi kur kodi telin ma pilin.)
Mar'ario ilwoŋo ni, Gihon; aka mol thoko piny Ethopiya.
Mar'adek ilwoŋo ni Tigris; mol yuwok ceŋ ma Asiria, aka mar'aŋwen ilwoŋo ni Yufrete.
Rwoth Were otero jacwo to ketho go i ndelo ma Eden furo gi kuro.
Aka Were omiyo jacwo cik ni, “Inyalo camo yath moro je i ndelo,
t'ikir'icam yath ma ŋeyo gimaber gi gimarac, rupiri i ndelo m'inocam'iye ilatho.”
Kenyo Were owaco ni, “Kiber ni jacwo wobedi kende; abino cweyo rigo jakony ma ripo gi go.”
Ameno okwanyo lowo wok piny to cweyo ogwaŋe je gi winyin je, aka okelo ri jacwo neno gima go nyalo timo gi jo; aka kisi gima jacwo ocwoko kisi cwec manitie gi kwo, meno obedo nyinge.
Ameno jacwo ocwoko nyingi ogwaŋe gi winyin je; to ngoye kwoŋ jo m'oyido ripo gi konyo go.
Ameno Were omiyo jacwo nindo mapek, aka munyo go nindo, okwanyo kediŋete acel to umo kenyo gi riŋo.
Aka ocweyo dhako wok kwoŋ kedi ŋeti jacwo to kelo rigo.
Kenyo jacwo owaco ni,
“Tingili me onyo coko ma cokin paran
aka del paran won;
ilalwoŋo go ni dhako
rupiri okwany go wok kwoŋ jacwo.”
Jacwo gi dhako je oyido jonitie kinyoro, to oyido jongoye gi wickwot.
Aka dhako odwoko ni, “Wanyalo camo olemo ma yath moro je i ndelo,
kwanyo woko yath manitie i dier ndelo. Were owaco ni wakiri wacam olemo ma yath no kosa kada geyo; ka wanotim, wabino tho.”
To thwol waco ri dhako ni, “Wi k'otho.
Kole Were oŋeyo ni ka winocam waŋ win bino yawere, aka wibino cale Were, ma wiŋeyo bero gi raco.”
Ameno dhako oneno nger ma yath no oyido ber'iye, kodi nger mar'olemo mere oyido ber acama; aka oparo nger ma ber'iye lokirok mariek. Kenyo go okwanyo olemo to camo, aka omiyo cwore bende ni wocam.
Tekin jotieko camo ama, waŋ gin oyawere aka joniaŋ ni oyido jonitie kinyoro; aka jokwoyo boke makuyu kanyacel to joumere gine.
Othieno no jowinjo mayindo pa Rwoth Were wotho i ndelo, aka jopondo kwoŋ yen.
To Rwoth Were lwoŋo jacwo, “Initie kune?”
Go odwoko ni, “Awinjo mayindo perin i ndelo, aka lworo omakan rupiri anitie kinyoro t'apondo.”
Were openjo go ni, “Ŋa m'owaco rin nike initie kinyoro? Icamo yath m'amiyin cik ni ikir'icam?”
Jacwo odwoko ni, “Dhako m'imiyan me am'omiyan t'acamo.”
Dhako odwoko ni, “Thwol am'owondan t'acamo.”
Kenyo Rwoth Were owaco ri thwol ni,
“Rupiri itimo gime,
Akwoŋin kwoŋ ogwaŋe je;
aka kwoŋ ogwaŋe madudi je
wok pama ibino mol gi iyin,
aka ilacamo fukefuke
i kwo perin je.
aka i dier nyithindhin gi nyithindho pere.
Nyithindho pa dhako jobino ŋinyo wiyin,
aka ibino toŋo fundi jo.”
Aka ri dhako owaco ni,
“Abino medo litho perin i ŋedi,
aka i litho ibino nywolo nyithindho.
Aka kucel ibino bedo g'awanya ri cworin,
aka go bino dhumin.”
“Rupiri iwinjo dwondi dhako perin,
t'icamo olemo ma yath
m'amiyin cik
ni ikir'icam kwoŋe,
akwoŋo lowo ro in.
I kwok perin ibino cemo i kwo perin je.
Lowo bino nywolo kudhin gi doy,
aka ibino camo ranyak madudi.
I kwok perin
ibino camo mugat cuka inogiki i lowo; rupiri ocweyin wok i lowo, aka doko ibino lokere lowo.”
Adam ocwoko nyingi dhako pere ni Eva rupiri go obedo yok ji je.
Aka Rwoth Were okwoyo ri Adam gi cege nangin wok kwoŋ pien ogwaŋ to ruko jo.
Riameno Rwoth Were oriemo go wok i ndelo Eden to miyo go furo lowo m'ocwey gine go.

Were oriemo woko jacwo, aka yuwok ceŋ ma ndelo oketho cwec ma jobwombi gin m'ilwoŋo ni kerubim, kodi abor maliel mac m'oŋiyo kisi thenge. Me ma geŋo nyatoro moro je kwoŋ corok cegin gi yath ma miyo kwo.
Onyo Adam obedo gi cege Eva aka ogamo iye to nywolo Kayin ka waco ama: “Gi kony pa Rwoth alimo wodan.”
Eva doko onywolo wode man, Abel. Abel oyido obedo jakwath rombo, aka Kayin obedo jafur.
Rumacen ma hongo moro Kayin okelo olemo pere paka mic ri Rwoth,
aka Abel okelo nyathi rombo makayo, acel kwoŋ rombo pere to thumo, aka omiyo adec mabeyo paka mic. Rwoth ojolo mic pa Abel,
aka okwero mic pa Kayin. Ameno Kayin nge omako swa, to coko nyime.
Rwoth owaco ri Kayin ni, “Raŋo nge omakin? Raŋo icoko nyimin?
Kabedi oyido itimo gim'otire, dinyo ibwonjo. To rupiri itimo gimarac, reco gwaro thigo perin mito dhumin; t'iripo dhumo.”
Kenyo Rwoth openjo Kayin ni, “Nikune Abel omin in?”
Kayin odwoko ni, “An akuya; abedo jakur p'omin an?”
Aka onyo akwoŋo rin lowo m'oyawo dhoke to madho remo p'omin in wok i cingin.
K'inotem furo cemo, lowo kilanyak gimoro je; aka ilangoye gi peco aka ilabedo jawoth kicar.”
Kayin owaco ri Rwoth ni, “Gir'acula paran pek swa ran ciro.
Neni, konon me irieman woko i lowo kodi wok ruwaŋin. Abino bedo jawoth kicar i piny aka kisi nyatoro m'orom kodan je bino nekan.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “K'ameno! Ka nyatoro moro je onekin, abino culo kwoŋe kwor dibirio.” Aka Rwoth oketho ranyuth kwoŋ Kayin ma gwoko kisi ŋat'oromo gi go wokiri woneki go.
Aka Kayin oeye woko ruwaŋ Rwoth to bedo i lowo m'ilwoŋo ni Nod yuwok ceŋ ma Eden.
Kayin obedo gi cege, aka ogamo iye to nywolo wode to cwoko nyinge ni Enoka; aka Kayin ogeto tindi madwoŋ to cwoko gi nyingi wode Enoka.
Enoka olimo wode m'ilwoŋo ni Irad; m'oyido ba Mehuyael. Mehuyael obedo ba Methusael, aka Methusael oyido ba Lamek.
Lamek oyido nitie gi mon ario, Ada kodi Zila.
Ada onywolo Yabal m'obedo kwari ji ma jokwayo dhok aka jobedo i wema.
Nyingi omin Yabal oyido Yabul m'obedo kwari jower ma jogoyo tongol gi madundo.
Zila onywolo Tubal Kayin m'ocwogo gigipiny wok kwoŋ cumin. Nyamin Tubal Kayin oyido ilwoŋo ni Nama.
Lamek owaco ri mon pere ni
“Ada gi Zila, winjan win: Atieko neko jayac rupiri ogoyan.
K'inen kwo abirio ama culo kwor ri nyatoro m'oneki Kayin,
Kwo piero abirio g'abirio ama bino culo kwor ka nyatoro onekan.”
Adam obedo gi cege kendo, to Eva nywolo wode to waco ni, “Were omiyan wodan ma culo waŋ Abel ma Kayin oneko.” Ameno ocwoko nyinge ni Seth.
Seth bende olimo wode to cwoko nyinge ni Enos. I hongo no ama ji jocako lwoŋo nyingi Rwoth maleŋ i lamo.
Ocweyo jo ma cwo gi mon aka ocwoko jo ni ji).
Munyo Adam jaoro 130 onywol rigo wode ma cale go, aka ocwoko nyinge ni Seth.
Rumacen Adam okwo doko ma oro 800. Olimo nyithindho man
aka otho munyo jaoro 930.
Munyo Seth jaoro 105 onywol rigo wode Enos.
Seth okwo doko ma oro 807. Olimo nyithindho man
aka otho munyo jaoro 912.
Munyo Enos jaoro piero abuŋwen, onywol rigo wode Kenan.
Enos okwo doko ma oro 815. Olimo nyithindho man
aka otho munyo jaoro 905.
Munyo Enos jaoro piero abirio, onywol rigo wode Mahalalel.
Kenan okwo doko ma oro 840. Olimo nyithindho man,
aka otho munyo jaoro 910.
Munyo Mahalalel jaoro piero aucel g'abic, onywol rigo wode Yared.
Mahalalel doko okwo ma oro 830. Olimo nyithindho man
aka otho munyo jaoro 895.
Munyo Yared jaoro 162 onywol rigo wode Enoka.
Yared doko okwo ma oro 800. Olimo nyithindho man
aka otho munyo jaoro 962.
Munyo Enoka jaoro piero aucel g'abic, onywol rigo wode Methusela.
Enoka obedo iy'acel gi Were ma oro 300 aka olimo nyithindho man
Go otundo oro 365
aka owotho gi Were to rwenyo, rupiri Were otero go.
Munyo Methusela jaoro 187 onywol rigo wode Lamek.
Methusela okwo doko ma oro 782. Olimo nyithindho man
aka otho munyo jaoro 969.
Munyo Lamek jaoro 182 onywol rigo wode
aka owaco ni, “Wok i lowo ma Rwoth okwoŋo, nyathi me bino kelo riwan gonyirok wok kwoŋ tic mawan matek.” Ameno ocwoko nyinge ni Nowa.
Lamek okwo doko ma oro 595. Olimo nyithindho man
aka otho munyo jaoro 777.
Rumacen munyo Nowa jaoro 500 onywol rigo wote adek, Semu, Ham kodi Yafeth.
aka cwec moro ma polo joneno ni nyir pa ji oyido joŋon, ameno jonywomo paka joyero.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ni, “Akibino yeyo ji kwo cil gi cil, rupiri jobedo del, to wok pama jokilakwo ma kalo oro miya acel gi piero ario.”
I ndir no, kodi kiri rumacen, oyido nitie ji m'ogaŋere i piny m'oyido jobedo nyithindho ma cwec ma i polo jonywolo gi nyir pa ji. Oyido jomeni, aka joŋeyere.
Aka Rwoth owinjo gi rem ni oyido ocweyo ji to ketho jo i piny, aka oramo cunye.
Ameno Rwoth owaco ni, “Abino reyo woko ji m'acweyo wok i piny, kodi ogwaŋe gi winyin, rupiri arem ni acweyo jo.”
To Rwoth oyido winjo maber gi Nowa.
Go oyido nitie gi wote adek; Semu, Ham kodi Yafeth.
To ji m'odoŋ je oyido joreco ruwaŋ Were, aka akaka oyido nitie kisi kamoro.
Were oneno piny, aka neni, oyido opoŋ reco rupiri ji je oyido jonigi kwo mareco.
Aka Were owaco ri Nowa ni, “Atieko miyere reyo woko gima kwo je. Abino reyo woko jo kicutho rupiri piny opoŋ tim pajo mar'akaka.
Geti ye perin wok kwoŋ mbawo maber; keth'iye kisikin to ifuy'iye gi woko gi odok.
Boro mere wobedi mita 133 laco mere mita piero ario g'ario, aka ŋawirok mere wobedi mita apar g'adek.
Geti wi ye aka iwey hongo ma romo adec mita i dier wi ye gi kisi thenge; aka geti dier ot adek t'iketho dhiot i iye gi thenge.
Akidho dhiro mikula ma pi i piny to reyo woko kisi gima kwo. Kisi gimoro i piny bino tho,
t'abino timo cikirok kodin. Donji i ye gi dhako perin, wotin kodi mon pajo.
Rwaki kisi gima kwo jario i ye ŋey jowokwo; jowobedi ma jacwo gi madhako.
Kisi nger winyo, kisi nger ogwaŋe, kisi nger gima mol i lowo, jario jodonji kodin ŋey ikuri jo makwo.
Bende ter kisi nger cemo riwin kodi jo.”
Nowa otimo paka Were omiyo go or.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Nowa ni, “Donji i ye gi peco perin je. Atieko nwaŋo ni in kende am'otire i luse me.
Kwany kisi nger ogwaŋe m'olony ma cwo abirio gi ma mon abirio, to makoc, nyaka jario; ma jacwo gi madhako.
Kwany kisi nger winyo ma cwo abirio gi ma mon abirio. Tim ameno ŋey kisi nger ogwaŋ gi winyo wobedi makwo to doko jonywol i piny.
Rupiri i ndelo abirio wok pama akidho dhiro koth ma lacwe ma odieceŋ piero aŋwen gi wor; ŋey worey woko kisi gima kwo m'acweyo.”
Aka Nowa otimo kisi gima Rwoth omiyo go or ni wotim.
Nowa oyido jaoro 600 munyo pi mikula obino i piny.
Aka go gi cege, gi wote kodi mon pajo jodonjo i ye both pi mikula.
Kisi nger ogwaŋe m'olony gi makoc, ma jacwo gi madhako
odonjo i ye gi Nowa paka Were oyido omiyo Nowa or.
Aka rumacen ma ndelo abirio pi mikula obino i piny.
Munyo Nowa jaoro 600 k'apar g'abirio i dwe mar'ario, i ndelo no waŋ pi je ma piny omwomere, aka waŋ pi ma pondeponde je oyaw.
Koth ocwe i piny ma odieceŋ piero aŋwen gi wor.
I ndelo no won Nowa gi cege kodi wote adek, Semu, Ham, kodi Yafeth gi mon pajo jodonjo i ye.
Gi jo okadho kisi nger ogwaŋe ma peco gi madudi, mathindho gi madongo, kodi kisi nger winyo.
Ma jacwo gi madhako ma kisi nger gima kwo i ye gi Nowa
paka Were oyido omiyo go or. Kenyo Rwoth ocego thigo yuŋey Nowa.
Mikula pi omedere i piny ma ndelo piero aŋwen, aka pi olokere maluth ma romo ye mol.
Pi olokere maluth aka ye omol i wiye.
Olokere maluth swa to umo kiri gote maboyo loyo;
omedere ay cuka otundo mita abirio kalo wi gote.
Kisi gima nitie gi kwo i piny otho; kisi winyo, kisi ogwaŋe, gi kisi nyatoro.
Kisi gima ywe i piny otho
Rwoth oreyo woko kisi gima kwo i piny; ji, ogwaŋe, kodi winyin. Nyaka ma jodoŋ obedo Nowa kodi jom'oyido nitie gi go i ye.
Aka pi obedo i piny ma ndelo 150.
To Were poyo Nowa kodi ogwaŋe m'oyido nitie gi go i ye. Aka Were omiyo koyo to kudho i piny to pi cwiyo
Waŋ pi ma piny gi pondeponde ocegi, aka koth ocoki
to pi cwiyo moth ma ndelo 150.
I ndelo mar'abirio ma dwe mar'abirio ye ocungo wi got Ararat.
Pi omedere cwiyo tundo i dwe mar'apar. I ndelo marapena ma dwe mar'apar kisul gote oneno.
Rumacen ma ndelo piero aŋwen Nowa oyawo dirisa
aka odhiro agak woko. Agak k'ogiki, to omedere kiwaya thoko cuka pi othwo wok i piny.
Kenyo Nowa odhiro akuru neno ka pi ocwiyo,
to paka akuru k'onwaŋo kapie, ogik bonge i ye rupiri oyido fodi pi k'ocwiyo. Ameno Nowa otelo cinge to rwako go i ye.
Nowa okuro ma ndelo abirio to kendo dhiro akuru.
Akuru ogik bonge othieno gi boke yath manumu ma yath m'ilwoŋo ni oliv. Ameno Nowa oŋeyo ni pi oyido ocwiyo piny.
Kenyo Nowa doko okuro ndelo abirio to doko dhiro akuru; akuru rume k'odwoko.
Munyo Nowa jaoro 601 i ndelo marapena ma dwe marapena pi oyido othwo woko. Nowa ohalo woko gim'oumo ye to ŋiyo, aka neni wi lowo oyido othwo.
Ka ndelo piero ario g'abirio ma dwe mar'ario piny oyido othwo.
Kenyo Were owaco ri Nowa ni,
“Wok woko i ye gi dhako perin, wotin kodi mon pajo.
Wok gi winyin kodi ogwaŋe ŋey jowonywol joywore i piny.”
Ameno Nowa owok i ye gi cege kodi wote kodi mon pajo.
Ogwaŋe je kodi winyin jowok i ye i kitipin ma nger pajo.
Kenyo Nowa ogeto ri Rwoth migam aka okwanyo acel kwoŋ kisi ogwaŋ gi winyo m'olony to waŋo je paka cowirok i wi migam.
Kur ma cowirok osangala Rwoth to waco i cunye ni, “Doko akibino kwoŋo piny kwoŋbedo ji, rupiri wok i thino pajo paro pajo reco. Doko akibino reyo kisi cwec makwo paka atimo.
Paka piny nitie, bino bedo ndir ma cwoyo gi ndir ma keco, ndir ma ŋico gi lietho, ndir ma ceŋ gi koth, odieceŋ gi wor.”
Ogwaŋe je gi winyin kodi rec jowobedi gi lworo riwin. Aketho joje i cingi win.
Kisi gima wotho makwo bino bedo cemo riwin, kodi yen manyaboke pendi. Amiyo win joje paka cemo.
Kwanyowoko, gimoro acel ma wikiripi timo, acamo riŋo manitie remo; akwero rupiri kwo nitie i remo.
Ka nyatoro okwanyo kwo, ibino miyo go gir'acula. Abino miyo gir'acula ma tho ri ogwaŋ ma kwanyo kwo pa nyatoro.
Ji ocwey jo i cal pa Were, riameno ŋata neko acel kwoŋ jo bende ŋatiman bino neko go.”
Kenyo Were owaco ri Nowa kodi wote ni,
“Neni, atimo cikirok gi win kodi nyikway win,
kodi kisi gima kwo; winyin je kodi ogwaŋe, kodi kisi gim'owoki i ye gi win.
Atimo cikirok paran gi win ni doko akibino reyo gigipiny makwo gi mikula, aka doko mikula kilareyo piny.
Paka ranyuth ma cikirok ma cil gi cil ma timo gi win me, kodi gima kwo je;
Aketho lifudo i pondeponde. Meno bino bedo ranyuth ma cikirok paran gi piny gibe.
Kisi k'akelo pondeponde i wi piny to lifudo neno i pondeponde,
Abino poyo cikirok paran manitie i dier an gi win kodi kisi gima kwo je nike mikula doko kilareyo woko kisi gima nitie gi kwo.
Ka lifudo oneno i pondeponde, Abino ŋiyo t'apoyo cikirok paran ma cil gi cil i dier an gi kisi gima kwo je i piny.
Me ranyuth ma cikirok m'atimo i dier an kodi gima kwo je manitie i piny.”
Wot Nowa ma jowok i ye jobedo Semu, Ham, kodi Yafeth. (Ham oyido obedo ba Kanan).
Wot Nowa me ama jobedo kwari ji je ma piny.
Nowa am'obedo jafur marapena. Go opidho ndelo vini
aka omadho vini to mer, aka oriere i wema pere kinyoro.
Munyo Ham ba Kanan oneno kinyoro pa bamere, okidho to waco ri wutmin go ario.
Kenyo Semu kodi Yafeth jokidho jokwanyo nanga, joketho i goki jo aka jowotho aŋey to joumo kinyoro pa bajo. Oyido jowiro waŋ gin aka jok'oneno kinyoro pa bajo.
Munyo Nowa ocew ma milengela to ŋeyo gima wode mathin otimo rigo,
owaco ni,
“Akwoŋo Kanan!
Go bino bedo ŋeca pa wutmin go.
Abino miyo Semu silwany gi Rwoth, Were paran!
Kanan bino bedo ŋeca pa Semu.
Weyi Were womiy Yafeth nyay!
Weyi nyikwaye jowobedi gi ji pa Semu!
Aka Kanan bino bedo ŋeca pa Yafeth.”
Rumacen ma mikula, Nowa okwo ma oro 350
aka otho munyo jaoro 950.
Me nyikway wot Nowa. Jadek jolimo wot jo rumacen ma pi mikula.
Wot Yafeth oyido; Goma, Magog, Maday, Yavan, Tubal, Mesek, kodi Tiras.
Wot Goma oyido; Asikenaz, Rifath kodi Togarma.
Wot Yavan oyido; Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim, kodi Dodanim.
Jo jobedo kwari ji ma jobedo i thengi pi kodi i kigoda. Me nyikway Yafeth, jobedo ji ma nono pajo opokere gi piny pajo, aka joluwo dhodhok m'opokere.
Wot Ham oyido; Ethopiya, Misir, Libia, kodi Kanan.
Wot Ethopiya oyido; Seba, Havila, Sabita, Rama, kodi Sabiteka. Wot Rama oyido; Seba kodi Dedan.
Ethopiya oyido ba Nimrod m'obedo jadwar matek marapena i piny.
Gi kony pa Rwoth go oyido obedo jadwar madwoŋ, aka am'omiyo ji jowaco ni, “Weyi Rwoth wolokin jadwar madwoŋ paka Nimrod!”
Cakirok ma ker pere oyido obedo Babel, Erek, kodi Akad, joje i lowo ma Sinar (Babilon).
Wok i lowo no okidho Asiria aka ogeto tindi madongo Ninivi, Rehoboth Ir, Kala,
kodi Resen manitie i dier Ninivi kodi tindi madwoŋ swa Kala.
Misir obedo ba Ludim, Anamim, Lehab, Nafituhim,
Pathirusim, Kasluhim ma Jofilistia jowok, kodi Kafitorim.
Wot Kanan oyido; Sidon okayo pere kodi Heth,
Joyebus, Joamor, jo Girigac,
Johivi, Joarikit, Josinit,
Joarivad, Jozerama, kodi Johamath. Rumacen nonin ma Kanan m'opokere joywere woko
cuka adec pajo otundo wok Sidon yupiny Gerar cegin gi Gaza, kodi yuwok ceŋ kidho Sodom, Gomora, Adama, kodi Zeboyim cegin gi Lasa.
Me wot Ham gi pecin pajo, dhodhok pajo, lowo pajo, kodi piny pajo.
Semu omin Yafeth makayo ma bende ba nyithindho pa Eber, onywol rigo nyithindho man.
Wot Semu oyido; Elam, Asur, Aripakisadi, Lud, kodi Aram.
Wot Aram oyido; Uz, Hul, Gether, kodi Masi.
Aripakisadi obedo ba Sela, aka Sela obedo ba Eber.
Eber olimo wote ario; Peleg
Jokitan obedo ba Almodad, Selef, Hazarimaveth, Jera,
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikila,
Obal, Abimel, Seba,
Ofir, Havila, kodi Yobab. Joje oyido wot Yoktan.
Adec ma jobed'iye ocako Mesa yo Sefari kiri i piny matendere yuwok ceŋ.
Me wot Semu gi pecin pajo, dhodhok pajo, lowo pajo, kodi piny pajo.
Me je pecin pa wot Nowa, cungo kwoŋ bacere pajo, i piny pajo; aka wok kwoŋ jo nonin oywore i piny rumacen ma mikula.
Onyo ji ma piny gibe oyido jonitie gi dhodhok acel gi wac manok.
Aka paka jotuk wok yuwok ceŋ, jonwaŋo kama k'obedo tendere i lowo ma Sinar aka jobedo kenyo.
Aka jowaco wegi ni, “Biye win wagoy matafal, aka wawaŋ jo matek.” Ameno jobedo gi matafal ma geto gi odok ma riwo kanyacel.
Aka jowaco wegi ni, “Weyi wageti tindi madwoŋ gi ot acurcur ma tundo i pondeponde, ŋey wayiki nyingi wan aka wakiri waywore i piny gibe.”
Aka Rwoth oloro piny to neno tindi madwoŋ kodi ot acurcur ma wot ji oyido jogeto.
Aka Rwoth owaco ni, “Neni, jobedo ji acel aka joluwo dhodhok acel kende; me nyaka cakirok ma gima jokidho timo. Jolacegin cako timo gima jomito je!
Weyi wakidhi piny aka wanywow dhodhok pajo ŋey jokiri jowoniaŋere.”
Ameno Rwoth okedho jo i piny gibe aka joweyo geto tindi madwoŋ.
Riameno olwoŋi tindi madwoŋ no ni Babel rupiri kenyo Rwoth onywowo dhodhok ma piny gibe; aka kenyo Rwoth okedho ji i piny gibe.
Me nyikway Semu. Munyo Semu jaoro 100 onywol rigo wode Aripakisadi oro ario rumacen ma pi mikula;
rumacen go okwo ma oro 500 aka olimo nyithindho man.
Munyo Aripakisadi jaoro piero adek g'abic, onywol rigo wode Sela
rumacen go okwo ma oro 403 aka olimo nyithindho man.
Munyo Sela jaoro piero adek, onywol rigo wode Eber;
rumacen go okwo ma oro 403 aka olimo nyithindho man.
Munyo Eber jaoro piero adek g'aŋwen onywol rigo wode Peleg;
rumacen go okwo ma oro 430 aka olimo nyithindho man.
Munyo Peleg jaoro piero adek onywol rigo wode Reu;
rumacen go okwo ma oro 209 aka olimo nyithindho man.
Munyo Reu jaoro piero adek g'ario, onywol rigo wode Serug;
rumacen go okwo ma oro 207 aka olimo nyithindho man.
Munyo Serug jaoro piero adek, onywol rigo wode Nahor;
rumacen go okwo ma oro 200 aka olimo nyithindho man.
Munyo Nahor jaoro piero ario g'abuŋwen onywol rigo wode Tera;
rumacen go okwo ma oro 119 aka olimo nyithindho man.
Munyo Tera jaoro piero abirio, onywol rigo Abram, Nahor, kodi Haran.
Onyo me nyikway Tera. Tera oyido ba Abram, Nahor, Haran; aka Haran oyido ba Loti.
Haran open tho ri bamere Tera i piny pere ma nywolirok, i Ur pa Jokaldin.
Aka Abram onywomo Saray, aka Nahor onywomo Mika, nyar Haran, m'oyido bende obedo ba Isaka.
Saray oyido kinywol; aka oyido ongoye gi nyithindho.
Tera okwanyo wode Abram, kodi nyakware Loti wod pa Haran, gi Saray ciwode to kanyacel joweyo Ur pa Jokaldin aka jokidho i piny Kanan to jobedo kenyo.
Tera otho munyo jaoro 205.
Abino miyin nyikwayin kweth, aka jobino lokirok piny madwoŋ. Abino miyin silwany t'aloko nyingin madwoŋ, ŋey ibedi jasilwany.
Abino miyo silwany jono ma jomiyin silwany; t'abino kwoŋo jono ma jokwoŋin. Aka wok kwoŋin piny je bino limo silwany.”
Ameno Abram okadho paka Rwoth owaco rigo; aka okadho gi Loti. Abram oyido jaoro piero abirio g'abic munyo oeye Haran.
Abram okadho gi cege Saray, Loti wod p'omin, lim pere je m'oyido jotieko coko kodi ŋecin pere; aka joay kadho i piny Kanan.
Munyo jotundo i Kanan,
Abram owotho i lowo no aka otundo i Kabedo Maleŋ i Sekem i tiendi yath maleŋ m'ilwoŋo ni More. I hongo no Jokanan oyido fodi jobedo i lowo no.
Rwoth omenyere ri Abram aka owaco ni, “Ri nyikwayin, Abino miyo lowo me.” Ameno Abram ogeto kenyo ri Rwoth m'omenyere rigo migam.
Rumacen okidho yupiny ma piny matendere yuwok ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ Bethel aka ogero wema pere i dier Bethel yupodho ceŋ kodi Ay yuwok ceŋ. Kenyo go ogeto migam to lamo Rwoth.
Aka Abram omedere ka kidho yupiny ma Kanan.
Onyo kec oyido nitie i Kanan; aka oyido kec swa ma Abram oloro piny i Misir bedo kenyo ma hongo moro.
Munyo go cegin donjo Misir, owaco ri cege Saray ni, “Aŋeyo paka ibedo dhako maŋon swa anena;
aka ka Jomisir jonenin jobino waco ni, ‘Me cege.’ Kenyo jobino nekan, to joweyin makwo.
Waci nike ibedo nyamin an; kenyo ro in jokibino nekan aka to joteran maber.”
Munyo joŋado kew to jodonjo i Misir, Jomisir joneno ni Saray oyido ŋon swa.
Aka munyo jodhum pa Farawo joneno go, jopako go ri Farawo. Ameno oter go i cel pa kere pere.
Aka ro Saray, Farawo otero Abram maber to miyo go rombo, diegi, dhok, punde, ŋecin, kodi ŋamia.
To rupiri Farawo oyido otero Saray, Rwoth odhiro thoyamo madwoŋ kwoŋ Farawo kodi ji pere i cel pa kere.
Kenyo Farawo olwoŋo Abram aka openjo go ni, “Me aŋo m'itimo ran? Raŋo ikiwaco ran nike go oyido obedo cegin?
Raŋo iwaco nike go nyamin in t'atero go paka dhako paran? Onyo ee dhako perin, ter go aka kadhi!”
Aka Farawo omiyo cwo pere cik aka jotero Abram to joketho go woko ma Misir, kanyacel gi cege kodi kisi gim'oyido nitie gine.
Ameno Abram okadho yumalo wok Misir kodi cege gi kisi gimoro m'oyido nitie gine, to Loti kadho gine yupiny.
Abram oyido oŋaŋ swa; nitie gi rombo, diegi, dhok, kiri gi feza gi zahabu.
Kenyo go oeye kenyo aka okadho yo Bethel, i kabedo ma go oyido oger'iye wema pere i cakirok i dier Bethel gi Aya;
kenyo go oyido oget'iye migam, aka olamo Rwoth kenyo.
Loti bende oyido nitie gi rombo, diegi, dhok, gi peco pere won kodi ŋecin.
Ameno lowo oyido kirom jario bedo kanyacel rupiri oyido jonitie g'ogwaŋe madit.
Aka dhaw ocakere i dier jokwath dhok pa Abram kodi jokwath dhok pa Loti. I hongo no Jokanan kodi Joperiz oyido fodi jobedo i lowo no.
Kenyo Abram owaco ri Loti ni, “Wabedo wade, aka kiripi ni cwo paran g'aperin jowodhaw.
Riameno weyi wapokere. Yer adec ma lowo m'imito; aka an abino kadho racuc, to in ikadho racam.”
Loti otiŋo waŋe malo to neno milelo Yordan nger m'oyido nitie gi pi kweth paka ndelo pa Rwoth, paka lowo ma Misir yo Zowar. Me oyido mafodi Rwoth k'oreyo Sodom gi Gomora.
Ameno Loti oyero milelo Yordan je rigo won, aka Loti okidho yuwok ceŋ; aka ameno apaka jario jopokere.
Abram obedo i lowo ma Kanan, aka Loti i tindi madongo ma milelo aka ocoro wema pere kiri cegin gi Sodom.
Onyo cwo ma Sodom oyido jokidakana, aka jotimo reco madongo kwoŋ Rwoth.
Rumacen munyo Loti otieko pokirok gi go, Rwoth owaco ri Abram ni, “Tiŋi waŋin malo, aka iŋiy maber gi kam'initie iye i kisi thenge.
Kole lowo m'ineno no je abino miyin gi nyikwayin
Abino miyin nyikwayin madit pa fukefuke ma lowo; ŋey ka nyatoro nyalo kwano fukefuke ma lowo, nyikwayin bende nyalo kwanere.
Ay, iwothi i lowo gipi, rupiri akidho miyin gikululu.”
Ameno Abram okodo wema pere, aka obino to bedo cegin gi olwa pa Mamire i Hebron; aka kenyo ogeto ri Rwoth migam.
Kerin aŋwen, Amirafel ma Babilon, Ariok kere ma Elasar, Kedorilaomer ma Elam, kodi Tidal ma Goyim
jokidho lweny gi kerin abic man; Bera ma Sodom, Birisa ma Gomora, Sinab ma Adima, Semeberi ma Zeboyim, kodi kere ma Bela (meno Zowar).
Kerin abic me oyido joriwere i milelo ma Sidim (nam ma cumbi).
Jo oyido jonitie i dhum pa Kedorilaomer ma oro apar g'ario, to i oro mar'apar g'adek jokwero dhum pere gi mbaka.
I oro mar'apar g'aŋwen Kedorilaomer obino gi kerin m'oyido nitie gine aka jokengila Refayim ma Asiteroth Karnayim, Zuzim ma Ham, Joemim ma Save Kiriathayim,
kodi Johori i gote ma Edom, aka joriemo jo tundo kiri Elparan.
Kenyo jowire aka jobino Kades to jomako piny pa Joamalek kodi apa Joamor m'oyido jobedo i Hazazon Tamar.
Kenyo kerin ma Sodom, Gomora, Adima, Zeboyim, kodi Bela jowok aka joriwere ri lweny i milelo ma Sidim aka jolwenyo
gi kerin ma Elam, Goyim, Babilon, kodi Elasar; kerin abic gi kerin aŋwen.
Milelo oyido opoŋ buce, aka munyo kerin ma Sodom gi Gomora jotemo ringo wok i lweny, jopodh'iye; to kerin adek ma jodoŋ joringo wi gote.
Kerin aŋwen jokwanyo kisi gimoro i Sodom gi Gomora, kiri gi cemo to jokadho yo pajo.
Loti wod p'omin Abram m'oyido bedo Sodom bende okadhi gine kiri gi lim pere.
To jacwo m'oyido okwale okidho to waco ri Abram Jayuda m'oyido bedo cegin gi yen pa Mamire Jamoor. Mare gi wutmin go Esikol gi Aner oyido joriwere gi Abram.
Munyo Abram owinjo ni omaki wod p'omin paka jajiera lweny, olwoŋo kanyacel cwo ma jolweny i kambi pere, joje 318 aka joriemo kerin aŋwen kiri Dan.
Kenyo go opoko cwo pere i kitipin, aka omonjo jakwor wor to kengila jo. Oriemo jo kiri Hoba, yumalo ma Damasiko
aka odwoko gi gigipiny je m'oyido onyaga. Go bende odwoko gi wod p'omin gi lim pere, kanyacel gi mon kodi ji man.
Munyo Abram odwoko wok kikengila Kedorilaomer kodi kerin m'oyido nitie gi go, kere ma Sodom owok romo gi go i milelo ma Save (ma bende ilwoŋo ni milelo pa kere).
Aka Melikizedek, m'oyido kere ma Salem aka bende jacway ri Were Madwoŋ Maloyo okelo mugat gi vini ri Abram,
omiyo go silwany, aka owaco ni, “Weyi Were Madwoŋ Maloyo, m'ocweyo polo gi piny womiy Abram silwany
Weyi Were Madwoŋ Maloyo m'omiyin loyo kwoŋ jokwor perin wopak!” Aka Abram omiyo Melikizedek acel wiy apar ma kisi gima jonyaga.
Kere ma Sodom owaco ri Abram ni, “Doŋ gi gigipiny, to miyan ji paran je.”
Abram odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere ruwaŋ Were Madwoŋ Maloyo, Jacwec ma polo gi piny,
nike akibino kwanyo uzi kosa thol ngato kosa gimoro perin je nyaka iwaci ni, ‘Aŋat'amiyo Abram bedo m'oŋaŋ’
Akibino kwanyo gimoro je, kwanyo woko gima cwo paran jocamo. To weyi Aner, Esikol, kodi Mamire jowokwany pok pajo.”
Rumacen ma gigipiny me, wac pa Rwoth obino ri Abram i menyirok ni, “Ikir'ilwor Abram, abedo kwot perin, kemba perin bino bedo madwoŋ.”
To Abram odwoko ni, “Awi Rwoth Were, aŋo m'inomiyan m'angoye gi nyathi, aka Elieza ma Damasiko ama lalunjo peco paran?
Neni, ikimiyan nyithindho, aka ŋeca m'onywol i ot paran ama lalunjan.”
Aka neni, wac pa Rwoth obino rigo ni, “Ŋeca me Elieza ama kilalunjin; wodin won ama lalunjin.”
Rwoth otero go woko aka owaco ni, “Ŋiy pondeponde, aka kwan micalin, k'inyalo kwano jo; ameno apaka nyikwayin jolabedo.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “An abedo Rwoth m'otelin wok Ur i Babilon, bino miyin lowo me paka aperin.”
To Abram openjo ni, “Awi Rwoth Were, anoŋey nedi ni bino bedo aparan?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Keli ran rwath dhiaŋ ma jaoro adek, diel, gi rombo, joje ma jo oro adek, kodi akuru gi njiwa.”
Aka Abram okelo ogwaŋe mere to ŋado i diere, aka oketho kisi adec to ŋiyo nyawote; to winyin mere go k'oŋado.
Acut jobino kwoŋ delkwoŋ jo, to Abram oriemo woko jo.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Ŋey adieri nike nyikwayin jobino bedo i lowo pa jopath i lowo ma k'obedo apajo, aka jobino bedo ŋecin t'itero jo gi gwayo ma oro 400.
T'abino thumo banja ri piny ma jolatic rigo, aka rumacen jobino wok gi lim madwoŋ.
To ri in mere, ibino tho i oro m'otegino, i siem t'iyikin.
Aka jobino dwoko ka i luse mar'aŋwen; rupiri Joamor fodi jok'otimo kidakana ma joripo limo gir'acula.”
Munyo waŋceŋ otieko podho, aka piny oyido col, neni, dak manitie mac ma yiro wok'iye kodi cuk mac oluwo i dier mumin mar'ogwaŋe.
I ndelo no Rwoth otimo cikirok gi Abram ka waco ama: Ri nyikwayin abino miyo lowo me, wok i malawa ma Misir tundo i malawa madwoŋ, Yufrete,
lowo pa Jokena, Jokeniz, Jokadimon,
Johiti, Joperiz, Jorefayim,
Joamor, Jokanan, Jogirigas, kodi Joyebus.
Onyo Saray, cipa Abram oyido k'onywol nyithindho. To oyido nitie gi ŋeca ma Jamisir m'ilwoŋo ni Hagar.
Aka Saray owaco ri Abram ni, “Neni pama, Rwoth ocieran nywol. Raŋo ikibedi gi ŋeca paran? Nyalo bedo ni anyalo limo nyithindho luwo i go.” Aka Abram oyere gi gima Saray owaco.
Ameno rumacen ma Abram bedo i Kanan ma oro apar, Saray, cipa Abram okwanyo Hagar Jamisir ŋeca pere, aka omiyo Abram paka cege.
Abram onindo gi Hagar, aka ogamo iye. Munyo Hagar oniaŋ nike yac, ocako noro to cayo Saray.
Aka Saray owaco ri Abram ni, “Obedo komo perin ka Hagar cayan. An won aŋat'amiyin ŋeca paran; aka cuka go niaŋ ni ogamo iye, oŋiyan gi cay. Weyi Rwoth wothum banja i dier an kodin!”
To Abram owaco ri Saray ni, “Neni, ŋeca perin nitie i meni perin, tim gi go gim'imito.” Kenyo Saray otero Hagar gi gero to Hagar ringo.
Malaika pa Rwoth onwaŋo Hagar cegin gi waŋ pi ma mol i thim i yo ma kidho Sur.
Aka owaco ni, “Hagar ŋeca pa Saray, iwok yukune aka ikidho kune?”
Hagar odwoko ni, “Aringo kwoŋ dhakodwoŋ paran.”
Malaika pa Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Gik bongi dhakodwoŋ perin, aka ibedi ŋeca pere.
Abino miyin nyikwayin kweth m'ongoye ŋata bino nyalo kwano jo.
Neni, ikidho nywolo wodin, aka ilacwoko nyinge ni Isimayil;
To wodin bino bedo paka punda madudi. Go bino gwenyirok gi kisi nyatoro, aka kisi nyatoro bino gwenyirok gi go. Go bino bedo bor gi wade pere.”
Ameno Hagar olwoŋo Rwoth m'oluwo gi go ni, “Were ma Neno.” Ato go owaco ni, “Adieri aneno Were aka fodi doko akwo rumacen ma neno go!”
Riameno waŋ pi no olwoŋi ni Berlahayroi
Hagar onywolo ri Abram wode, aka Abram ocwoko nyinge ni Isimayil.
Abram oyido jaoro piero aboro g'aucel i hongo no.
Munyo Abram jaoro piero abuŋwen g'abuŋwen, Rwoth omenyere rigo aka owaco rigo ni, “An Were Majameni je; winjan, aka noknok tim gi tiro.
Abino timo cikirok paran i dier an kodin, t'amiyin nyikwayin kweth.”
Kenyo Abram okule piny gi nyime; aka Were owaco rigo ni,
“Neni, atimo cikirok me kodin: Acikin n'ibino bedo kwari nonin kweth.
Doko nyingin k'olwoŋ ni Abram, to ni Abraham
Abino miyin nyikwayin kweth, aka megi jobino bedo kerin. Ibino bedo gi nyikwayin kweth aka jobino timo nonin.”
Abino miyin gi nyikwayin lowo ma kama pama ibed'iye japath. Lowo je ma Kanan bino bedo apa nyikwayin cil gi cil; aka abino bedo Were pajo.”
“Paka ri in, ilakuro cikirok paran kodin, in kiri gi nyikwayin i luse ma yuwaŋe.
Me a cikirok paran ma in gi nyikwayin wiripo kuro; kisi jacwo ripo thumirok.
Wok pama kadho yuwaŋe wiripo thumo kisi nyathi majayac ka ja ndelo aboro, kiri gi ŋecin m'onywol pecin mewin, kodi ŋecin m'onyew wok bongi jopath. Me bino bedo ranyuth ma cikirok i dier win kodan.
Kisi nyatoro ripo thumirok, aka me bino bedo ranyuth ma neno ni cikirok paran kodin obedo ma cil gi cil.
Jacwo moro je ma k'othumere k'okwanere paka acel kwoŋ ji paran, rupiri go k'okuro cikirok kodan.”
Aka Were owaco ri Abraham ni, “Paka ri Saray cegin, wok pama nyingi go obedo Sara.
Abino miyo go silwany, aka abino miyin wodin luwo i go. Abino miyo go silwany aka go bino bedo yok piny kweth; kerin jobino wok kwoŋ go.”
Kenyo Abraham okule piny gi nyime aka onyero to waco ni, “Jacwo bende nyalo limo nyathi munyo jaoro 100? Sara nyalo nywolo nyathi i oro piero abuŋwen?”
Aka Abraham owaco ri Were ni, “Raŋo ikiwey Isimayil wolunjan?”
To Were owaco ni, “Be, cegin Sara bino nywolo rin wodin, aka ibino cwoko nyinge ni Isaka. Abino timo cikirok paran gi go paka cikirok ma cil gi cil ri nyikwaye.
Paka ri Isimayil, atieko winjo kwac perin; neni, abino miyo go silwany t'amiyo go nyithindho kweth gi nyikwaye kweth. Go bino bedo ba wot kere apar g'ario, aka alatimo piny madwoŋ wok i go.
T'abino timo cikirok paran gi Isaka, ma Sara lanywolo rin i hongo me i oro ma bino.”
Munyo Were otieko luwo gi Abraham, okadho.
Kenyo Abraham okwanyo wode Isimayil, ŋecin ma cwo m'onywol i ot pere gi m'onyew gi pesa kodi cwo je ma ot pere aka othumo jo.
Abraham oyido jaoro piero abuŋwen g'abuŋwen munyo othum go,
aka Isimayil oyido jaoro apar g'adek.
Joje jothumere i ndelo acel,
kanyacel gi ŋecin ma ot pa Abraham.
Rwoth omenyere ri Abraham kama go oyido obed'iye i tiendi olwa pa Mamire. Abraham oyido obedo i dhiot ma wema pere i lietho ma ndelo.
Otiŋo waŋe malo aka oneno cwo adek jocungo i nyime. Tekin go neno jo, oringo wok i dhiot ma wema kidho jolo jo, aka obwonere to kule piny
to waco ni, “Rwoth paran, k'inen anwaŋo wor ruwaŋin, ikir'ikali ŋeca perin.
Weyi wokel nyaka pi mathi ilwoki tiendin, aka iywomere i tiendi yath me,
k'aomo ye cemo moro, ŋey wodwoki rin meni aka nyaka imedere gi woth perin paka itieko bino bongi ŋeca perin.”
Jodwoko ni, “Tim paka iwaco.”
Abraham oredo i wema aka owaco ri Sara ni, “Kwany piyo kutiya ma moko perin maber, aka itedi mugat.”
Aka Abraham doko oyombere i kigo dhok pere, okwanyo rwath macwe, aka omiyo ŋeca pere m'oredo yiko.
Kenyo go okwanyo mo dhiaŋ, cak, gi rwath m'oyido oyiki, aka oketho ruwaŋ jo; aka go ocungo cegin gi jo munyo jocemo.
Kenyo jopenjo go ni, “Nikune dhako perin Sara?”
Abraham odwoko ni, “Go nitie i wema.”
Sara oyido winjo i dhiot wema yuŋey go
Onyo Abraham gi Sara oyido jotieko ti, aka Sara oyido otieko weyo neno dwe.
Ameno Sara onyero ka waco ama: Pama atieko ti, aka cworan bende oti, fodi bende anyalo winjo cwe ma bedo gi cworan!
Kenyo Rwoth openjo Abraham ni, “Raŋo Sara onyero to waco ni, ‘Bende anonywol nyathi majayac!’
Nitie gimatek ri Rwoth? I hongo m'oyerere abino dwoko bongin i oro ma bino, aka Sara bino bedo gi nyathi majayac.”
To rupiri Sara oyido lworo omako, okwedere ka waco ni, “Akinyero.”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Be, inyero.”
Kenyo cwo no joay, aka joŋiyo yu Sodom, to Abraham bende kadho gi jo kwaŋo jo i yo pajo.
To Rwoth waco ni, “Akibino kano kwoŋ Abraham gim'acegin timo,
rupiri aneno ni go bino lokirok nono madwoŋ aka manitie meni, aka nonin je ma piny jobino limo silwany luwo i go.
Atieko yero go ni wogwok nyithindho pere gi nyikwaye luwo yo pa Rwoth ka jotimo tiro, ŋey Rwoth wokel rigo gim'otieko ciko.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Abraham ni, “Rupiri iasa ywak gi Sodom kodi Gomora, aka reco pajo dwoŋ,
abino loro neno k'inen jotimo paka iywaki gi jo; aka ka be, abino ŋeyo.”
Kenyo cwo ario jowire wok kenyo, aka jokidho yu Sodom; to Abraham medere cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth
Kenyo Abraham ocore cegin to penjo Rwoth ni, “Inorey adieri jom'otire kanyacel gi jokidakana?
To k'obedi ji piero abic ma jotire i tindi madwoŋ, inorey tindi madwoŋ gibe? Ik'owey tindi madwoŋ ro ji piero abic ma jotire ma jonitie i iye?
Wobedi bor kodin timo nger gino, neko jom'otire kanyacel gi jokidakana, aka jom'otire jolimi gir'acula kanyacel gi jokidakana! Gino wobedi bor kodin! Jathum banja ma piny gibe k'otimi gim'otire!”
To Rwoth waco ni, “K'anonwaŋ ji piero abic ma jotire i Sodom, akibino reyo woko tindi madwoŋ gibe ro jo.”
Abraham odwoko ni, “Mondo cwaki ran ro miseni paran medo luwo kodin Rwoth, an ma bedo fukefuke gi buru.
To poyo kwoŋ ji piero abic ma jotire no, orem ji abic, inorey woko tindi madwoŋ gibe ro ji abic ma jongoye no?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Akibino reyo woko k'anonwaŋ ji piero aŋwen g'abic ma jotire.”
Doko Abraham oluwo gi Rwoth to waco ni, “To k'inonwaŋ ji piero aŋwen ma jotire kenyo?”
To Rwoth dwoko ni, “Ro ji piero aŋwen no, akibino timo.”
Kenyo Abraham owaco ni, “Weyi Rwoth wokiri womaki kodan nge, t'alaluwo. To k'inonwaŋ ji piero adek ma jotire kenyo?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Akibino timo k'anonwaŋ ji piero adek.”
Abraham owaco ni, “Mondo cwaki ran ro miseni paran ma medo luwo kodin Rwoth. To k'inonwaŋ ji piero ario kenyo?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Ro ji piero ario no, akibino reyo woko Sodom.”
Kenyo Abraham owaco ni, “Weyi Rwoth wokiri womaki nge, t'alaluwo doko macowe. To k'inonwaŋ ji apar kenyo?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Ro ji apar no akibino reyo woko.”
Munyo Rwoth otieko luwo gi Abraham, to kadho rigo, to Abraham dok peco pere.
Jomalaika ario jobino Sodom othieno, aka Loti oyido obedo i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ. Munyo Loti oneno jo, oay to kidho romo gi jo, aka okulo wiye piny
to waco ni, “Jodongo paran, mondo akwayo winindi i ot pa ŋeca mewin wor me; ŋey wilwok tiendi win, aka wiay con to wikadho yo mewin.”
Jodwoko ni, “Be, wabino nindo i yo.”
To Loti medere ywak rijo swa, aka jowire bonge to jodonjo i ot pere. Loti otimo rijo kalima, aka otedo rijo mugat ma buthow to jocamo.
To munyo fodi jok'odonjo nindo, cwo je ma tindi madwoŋ, cwo ma Sodom, mathindho gi m'otegino je jobino to jothoko ot
to jolwoŋo Loti ni, “Nikune cwo ma jobino bongin othieno me? Wodhi riwan jo, ŋey wanindi gi jo.”
Loti okidho woko bongi jo, aka ocego thigo yuŋeye
to waco rijo ni, “Akwayo win wutmera, wikiri witim gikidakana no!
Neni, anitie gi nyir paran ario mafodi jokuya cwo; weyi awodhi riwin jo, aka witim gi jo gima cuny wimito. To wikiri witim gimoro ri cwo me, rupiri jobino i ot paran.”
To jowaco ni, “Ngoye woko ruwaŋ wan, in japath bende inowaci riwan gir'atima! Ere onyo wabino tiyo kodin ayin marac loyo jo.” Kenyo jodhiro Loti cen, aka jocore cegin turo thigo.
To cwo no jotelo cingi gin, aka joywayo Loti i ot bongi jo to jocego thigo.
Kenyo colo omako waŋ cwo m'oyido jonitie woko ma jok'onyalo neno dhiot.
Kenyo cwo ario no jowaco ri Loti ni, “K'initie gi ocin, wotin, nyir, kosa ŋatiman i tindi madwoŋ, wodhi jo woko
rupiri wacegin reyo woko ka, rupiri kigeŋisa kwoŋ ji mere olokere madwoŋ ruwaŋ Rwoth; aka Rwoth ooro wan reyo woko.”
Kenyo Loti kidho bongi cwo m'oyido jolanywomo nyir pere to waco rijo ni, “Redi win wingoye woko ka, rupiri Rwoth kidho reyo woko tindi madwoŋ.” To cale rijo paŋini Loti oyido loko wac.
Munyo piny keko, jomalaika ario joywak ri Loti munyo jowaco ni, “Ay ikwany dhako perin gi nyikin ario ma jonitie ka, ŋey wikiri wirere i gir'acula ma tindi madwoŋ.”
To Loti tangatanga. Ameno cwo ario no jomako Loti, cege, kodi nyir pere, rupiri omako gine wor, to wodho jo woko ma tindi madwoŋ.
Kenyo Malaika acel okoko ni, “Ŋwec win ri kwo mewin, wikiri wiŋiy cen, kosa wicungi milelo; ŋwec win i wi tendere, ŋey wikiri witho.”
To Loti dwoko ni, “Be, mondo jadwoŋ ikir'imiy wan timo gino.
Neni, i atieko nwaŋo wor ruwaŋin, aka inyuthan wor madwoŋ swa ibotho kwo paran. T'akinyali ŋwec kiri wi tendere, teko bino ŋolan t'atho mafodi akitundo kenyo.
Ineno tindi mathin macegin no? Weyi waŋwec wakidhi kenyo, aka go thin, aka kwo paran bino both.”
To malaika dwoko go ni, “Neni, ayere kodin bende ni ak'orey tindi no.
Kwakere, ikwale kenyo, rupiri akinyali timo gimoro je cuka itundo kenyo.”
Meno am'omiyo ilwoŋo tindi no ni Zowar.
Waŋceŋ oyido gulo munyo Loti otundo Zowar.
Kenyo Rwoth omiyo lietho gi mac m'ogeŋo ŋeti jo wok i polo cwe kwoŋ Sodom gi Gomora
aka oreyo woko tindin madongo gi milelo, kodi ji je gi gimoro je m'oyido odongo i lowo.
To cipa Loti oŋiyo cen, aka olokere siro cumbi.
Abraham okidho odikin maŋic, i kabedo m'oyido go ocung'iye ruwaŋ Rwoth,
aka oneno yupiny yu Sodom gi Gomora, kodi milelo je, to neno yiro duny malo pa yiro ma wok kwoŋ mac m'odheth.
To munyo Were reyo woko tindin madongo gi milelo, opoyo Abraham, to wodho woko Loti munyo go oreyo woko tindin m'oyido Loti bed'iye.
Rupiri Loti oyido lworo bedo Zowar, go okidho gi nyir pere ario i wi tendere to jobedo i ŋungu tele.
Kenyo nyare makayo owaco ri mathin ni, “Bawan oti, aka cwo ongoye i piny gibe ma jonyalo bino to jonywomo wan ŋey wabedi gi nyithindho.
Biye wamiy bawan vini womadhi ŋey wanindi gine to wanywolo nyithindho gi go.”
Wor no jomiyo bajo to madho vini, aka nyare makayo onindo gi bamere. To Loti oyido kuya rupiri oyido omer swa.
Yawere mere nyar Loti madwoŋ owaco ri mathin ni, “Neni wor ma nyoro anindo gi go, weyi doko wamiy go vini womadhi, ŋey in bende inindi gi go; aka wajoje wanywol nyithindho gi bawan.”
Ameno wor no jomiyo ba gin madho vini kendo, aka mathin mere okidho to nindo gi bamere. Aka Loti doko k'oŋeyo rupiri oyido omer swa.
Ameno nyir pa Loti jonywolo nyithindho gi ba gin.
Nyare makayo onywolo wode to cwoko nyinge ni Mowab; aka go obedo ba Jomowab ma pama.
Nyare mathin bende onywolo wode, aka ocwoko nyinge ni Benami;
Wok kenyo Abraham okidho yupiny ma Kanan to bedo kenyo, i dier Kades gi Sur. Rumacen munyo bedo i Gerar,
owaco ni Sara cege oyido obedo nyamin. Ameno kere Abimelek ma Gerar owaco ni wokel Sara wobedi cege.
Wor acel Were onenere ri Abimelek i lek, aka owaco rigo ni, “Neni itieko tho rupiri dhako m'ibedo gine otieko nywomere.”
To Abimelek oyido fodi k'ocore cegin gi Sara, aka owaco ni, “Rwoth, inoneki ji ma bubanja?
Abraham won ama owaco ni go nyamin an, to Sara bende waco ni go omin an. I lonyo mar'adundo paran kodi ngoye g'apuse i cingan atimo gime.”
Kenyo Were odwoko ni, “Ey, aŋeyo ni itimo gime i lonyo mar'adundo perin, aka aŋat'ageŋin timo reco kwoŋan; riameno akiyeyin geyo go.
Pama onyo, dwoki dhako no ri cwore, rupiri go obedo jatuci wac Were, aka bino kwayo rin, ŋey ikir'itho. To k'ikidwoko go, ŋey nike ibino tho gi kisi gimoro perin je.”
Ameno Abimelek oay odikin maŋic swa, aka olwoŋo jodhum pere to waco rijo gim'oyido otimere je; aka jobwok swa.
Kenyo Abimelek olwoŋo Abraham, aka owaco rigo ni, “Aŋo m'itimo riwan me? Raco aŋo m'atimo rin m'omiyo ikelo kwoŋan gi ker paran teko me? Itimo ran gim'oyido kiber ni itimi ran.”
To Abimelek waco ri Abraham ni, “Oyido iparo kwoŋ aŋo m'omiyin itimo gime?”
Abraham odwoko ni, “Atimo rupiri oyido aparo ni ji ma ka jokilwor Were kada mathin, aka jobino nekan ro dhako paran.
Go obedo adieri nyamin an, nyar baba, to ki nyar mama, aka go olokere dhako paran.
To munyo Were omiyan woth weyo ot pa baba, awaco rigo ni, ‘Me a wor m'amito ni itim ran; kisi kama watund'iye, wac ni abedo omin in.’ ”
Kenyo Abimelek odwoko ri Abraham Sara, aka bende okwanyo rombo gi dhok, kodi ŋecin to miyo Abraham.
Aka Abimelek owaco ri Abraham ni, “Neni, lowo paran gipi ee, bedi kam'imito je.”
To Abimelek doko waco ri Sara ni, “Neni, amiyo omin in nusu ma feza gana acel paka ranyuth ni ingoye gi banja, aka kisi nyatoro je bino ŋeyo ni ikitimo gimarac.”
Kenyo Abraham okwayo Were, aka Were obotho Abimelek, cege, kodi ŋecin pere ma mon ŋey jowonywol nyithindho
rupiri Rwoth oyido ocego iy mon je ma ot pa Abimelek ro Sara cipa Abraham.
Rwoth owendo ri Sara paka oyido otieko waco, aka otimo ri Sara gima go oyido ociko.
Sara ogamo iye, aka onywolo ri Abraham wode i tiyo pere i hongo ma Were oyido otieko waco rigo.
Aka Abraham ocwoko rigo nyinge ni Isaka.
Munyo Isaka otieko ndelo aboro, Abraham othumo go paka Were oyido omiyo go or.
Abraham oyido jaoro miya acel munyo onywol Isaka.
Sara owaco ni, “Were otimo ran gi kisangala gi nyero. Kisi ŋat'owinji kwoŋe bino nyeran.”
To Sara doko medo waco ni, “Ŋa m'oyido d'onyal waco ri Abraham ni Sara nyalo pidho nyithindho? Kucel onyo anywolo rigo wode i tiyo pere.”
Aka munyo Isaka oweyo dhoth, Abraham otimo kalima madwoŋ swa.
Ndelo acel, Sara oneno wod pa Hagar Jamisir tuko gi wode Isaka.
Ameno Sara waco ri Abraham ni, “Riemi woko ŋeca me gi wode, rupiri wod pa dhako me kiripi lunjo adec ma lim perin ma wodan ripo lunjo.”
Gime oramo cuny Abraham rupiri Isimayil bende oyido obedo wode.
To Were waco ri Abraham ni, “Ikir'irembi ri Isimayil kodi ŋeca perin Hagar, to tim gimoro je ma Sara waco rin; rupiri obedo luwo bongi Isaka, m'ibino limo nyikwayin m'atieko ciko.
Aka abino bende miyo wod pa Hagar nyithindho, ŋey bende jowolokere nono rupiri go bende obedo wodin.”
Abraham oay malo yawere odikin maŋic to miyo Hagar cemo gi pien m'opoŋ'iye pi, to riemo go woko. Hagar okadho to lera i thim ma Berseba.
Munyo pi orumo, oweyo wode i tiendi dudi moro
aka okidho to bedo piny kama romo mita miya acel bor gi wode. To waco ni, “Akinyali neno ka nyathi paran tho.” Munyo go fodi obedo kenyo, nyathi ocako ywak.
Were owinjo dwondi nyathi, aka malaika pa Were olwoŋo Hagar wok i polo to penjo go ni, “Aŋo ma ramo cunyin Hagar? Ikir'ibedi gi lworo, rupiri Were otieko winjo dwondi nyathi kama go ywak'iye.
Ay malo, itiŋ nyathi i cingin; rupiri abino loko go nono madwoŋ.”
Kenyo Were oyawo waŋe aka oneno waŋ pi; okidho to poŋo pi i pien, aka omiyo nyathi to madho.
Were oyido nitie gi nyathi no munyo dongo, aka obedo i thim ma Paran to bedo jadwar swa.
Yokimere onwaŋo rigo dhako ma Jamisir.
Riameno kwoŋere ka ruwaŋ Were nike ikibino wondan, nyithindho paran, kosa nyikwayan. To paka atiyo kodin gi genirok, apaka bende ibino tiyo kodan gi piny m'ibed'iye.”
Abraham odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere.”
Munyo Abraham ogeŋisa ri Abimelek kwoŋ waŋ pi ma ŋecin pa Abimelek oyido jomayo go,
Abimelek owaco ni, “Akuya ŋat'otimo gime. Oyido fodi ikiwaco ran, aka fodi oyido akiwinjo kwoŋe tundo konon.”
Kenyo Abraham okwanyo rombo gi megikwe to miyo Abimelek, aka jario jotimo cikirok.
Abraham okwanyo rombo abirio ma mon kwoŋ rombo pere to ketho gicen.
Abimelek openjo go ni, “Rombo abirio ma mon me jonyutho aŋo?”
Abraham odwoko ni, “Jol rombo abirio ma mon me wok i cingan, k'iyeyo ni aŋat'akunyo waŋ pi me.”
Aka kabedo no olwoŋi ni Berseba,
Munyo jotieko timo cikirok, Abimelek gi Fikol jamituka jolweny pere jodok i piny Filistia.
Abraham opidho yath m'ilwoŋo ni tamarisk i Berseba, aka olamo Rwoth Were ma cil gi cil kenyo.
Abraham obedo i piny Filistia ma hongo malac.
Ameno Abraham oay malo yawere odikin maŋic aka otoŋo yen ma mic, oketho bieto i wi punda pere, aka okwanyo Isaka gi ŋecin pere ario, to jocako woth kadho kama Were oyido owaco rigo.
I ndelo mar'adek Abraham otiŋo waŋe malo aka oneno kanyago gi bor.
Kenyo owaco ri ŋecin pere ni, “Doŋ win ka gi punda, aka an gi Isaka walakadho kaca lamo Were to wadwoko bongi win.”
Abraham omiyo Isaka tiŋo yen ma waŋo mic, to go won tiŋo cuk mac gi pala i cinge. Ameno jario jonywako yo.
Isaka owaco ni, “Baba!”
Abraham odwoko ni, “An e wodan!”
To Isaka penjo ni, “Aneno cuk mac gi yen, to nikune nyathi rombo ma mic awaŋa?”
Abraham odwoko ni, “Were won bino miyo wan wodan.” Ameno jario jonywako yo kanyacel.
Kenyo Abraham okwanyo apala ni woneki wode.
To malaika pa Rwoth lwoŋo go wok i polo ni, “Abraham, Abraham!”
To go dwoko ni, “An ee.”
Malaika owaco ni, “Ikir'ikethi cingin kwoŋ jayac, kosa ikir'itim rigo gimoro je. Pama onyo aŋeyo ni ilworo Were, rupiri ikithwono go nyaka wodin acel.”
Abraham otiŋo waŋe malo, aka oneno wod rombo m'omoko i dudi m'oyukino gi tunge yuŋey go. Aka Abraham okidho to kwanyo wod rombo to miyo paka mic awaŋa kapa wode.
Ameno Abraham olwoŋo kenyo ni Rwoth bino miyo; aka kiri konon ji jowaco ni, “I wi got Rwoth bino miyo.”
Malaika pa Rwoth kendo olwoŋo Abraham madirio wok i polo
aka owaco rigo ni, “An won akwoŋere, aka Rwoth waco ni, rupiri itimo gime aka ikithwonan wodin acel g'acel,
Abino miyin silwany adieri, aka nyikwayin jobino bedo madit paka micalin ma polo kodi kwoyo ma thengi nam. Nyikwayin jobino kikengila jokwor pajo.
Piny je jobino kwayan amiy jo silwany paka atieko miyo nyikwayin, rupiri itieko winjo dwondan.”
Abraham ogik bongi ŋecin pere, aka joay to jokidho Berseba kanyacel aka Abraham obedo kenyo.
Rumacen ma gigipiny me, owaci ri Abraham ni Milika oyido onywolo nyithindho aboro ri omin go Nahor.
Uzi m'oyido obedo okayo, omin go Buzi, Kemuel ba Aram,
Kesedi, Hazo, Pilidas, Yidilafi, kodi Bethuel,
ba Rebeka. Milika onywolo cwo aboro me ri Nahor omin Abraham.
Reuma, malaya pa Nahor bende onywolo Teba, Gaham, Tahas, kodi Maka.
Sara obedo ma oro 127.
Go otho i Hebron, i piny Kanan, aka Abraham okidho to ywako go.
Abraham oay kama delkwoŋ cege oyido nitie iye, aka okidho bongi Johiti to waco rijo ni,
“An ajapath ma bedo i dier win, tana win an lowo moro, ŋey anyal yiko dhako paran.”
Johiti jodwoko Abraham ni,
“Winji wan jadwoŋ, waŋeyo nike ibedo jatel madwoŋ yik dhako perin i kaliel maŋon loyo ma wanitie gine. Ongoye kwoŋ wan ŋata nyalo cerin kaliel, kosa yiko jatho perin.”
Kenyo Abraham oay to kule piny ruwaŋ jo
aka owaco ni, “K'inen wiyeyan yiko dhako paran ka, mondo kway ran win Efron wod pa Zohar
wotana an ŋungu ma Makipela, manitie cegin gi kew ndelo pere. Weyi go wotana an i welo ma gikululu, ka ruwaŋ win, ŋey wobedi aparan paka kayik.”
Onyo Efron won oyido obedo i dier Johiti i karomo, aka odwoko Abraham munyo ji jowinjo ni,
“Winji jadwoŋ, amiyin ndelo kiri gi ŋungu ma nitie iye; ruwaŋ ji paran won amiyin ŋey inyal yiko dhako perin.”
Kenyo Abraham okule piny ruwaŋ Johiti
aka owaco ri Efron munyo kisi nyatoro je winjo ni, “Akwayin, mondo winjan ye; alanyewo ndelo gipi. Riameno jol cul paran, aka ayiki dhako paran kenyo.”
Efron odwoko Abraham ni,
“Jadwoŋ, adec lowo ma romo nyaka feza miya aŋwen bende ginaŋo i dier an kodin! Yik dhako perin i iye.”
Abraham oyere gi Efron, aka opima ri Efron feza m'oyido go otieko waco munyo kisi nyatoro je winjo kodi rapim ma jomitan oyido jo oro.
Ameno apaka ndelo pa Efron m'oyido nitie i Makipela, yuwok ceŋ ma Mamire, kodi ŋungu m'oyido nitie iye, kiri gi yen olokere
lim pa Abraham ruwaŋ Johiti, kodi ruwaŋ ji ma jokidho i waŋkac ma tindi je
Rumacen ma gime Abraham oyiko cege i ŋungu ma ndelo ma Makipela yuwok ceŋ ma Mamire i piny Kanan.
Ameno ndelo m'oyido obedo apa Johiti, gi ŋungu m'oyido nitie iye olokere lim pa Abraham paka kayik.
Abraham oyido onyo oti, aka Rwoth oyido omiyo go silwany i kisi gima go otimo.
To waco ri ŋeca pere ma jatel pa wadi, m'oyido dhumo kisi gima go nitie gine ni, “Kethi cingin i ŋangan
aka amitin ikwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth, Were ma i polo gi piny ni ikibino nwaŋo ri wodan dhako wok kwoŋ nyir pa Jokanan ka,
to nike ibino kidho i piny paran, bongi wade paran, t'inwaŋo ri Isaka dhako.”
To ŋeca no penjo ni, “To ka nyako okwer dwoko kodan ka, anoteri wodin i piny ma cango iwok'iye?”
Abraham odwoko ni, “Neni ni ikidwoko wodan kenyo.
Rwoth, Were ma i polo, okwanyan wok peco pa baba, i piny m'anywol'iye, aka oluwo to cikan ni go bino miyo nyikwayan lowo me. Go bino dhiro malaika pere yuwiyin, ŋey inwaŋ ri wodan dhako koro.
To k'inen nyako okwer dwoko kodin, ilagonyere kwoŋ kwoŋirok paran; to kende ikir'idwoki wodan koro.”
Ameno ŋeca no oketho cinge i ŋangi Abraham jadwoŋ pere to kwoŋere timo gima Abraham oyido okwayo.
Kenyo ŋeca no okwanyo ŋamin pa jadwoŋ pere apar, aka otiŋo mic nger gi nger wok bongi jadwoŋ pere to ay kadho Mesopotamia i tindi madwoŋ m'oyido Nahor bed'iye.
Munyo go otundo, omiyo ŋamin guro congi gin piny dho waŋ pi woko ma tindi madwoŋ. Oyido obedo i hongo m'othieno, hongo ma mon jobin'iye kulo.
Kenyo go okwayo ni, “Rwoth, Were pa jadwoŋ paran Abraham, miyan loyo konon aka ikuri cikirok perin rigo.
Neni, anitie ka i waŋ pi kama nyir ma tindi madwoŋ jolabino kul'iye.

Weyi nyako m'anowaci rigo ni, ‘Mondo lwogi ye agwata perin ŋey amadhi pi.’ Aka ka go owaci ni: Madhi, aka alamiyo ŋamin perin bende jowomadhi, go ama wobedi nyako m'iyero ri ŋeca perin Isaka. I nger me abino ŋeyo ni ikuro cikirok perin ri jadwoŋ paran.”
Mafodi go k'ocowo kwayo, Rebeka m'oyido nyar Bethuel wod pa Milika m'onywolo ri Nahor omin Abraham obino i waŋ pi g'agwata i goke.
Rebeka oyido obedo nyako ma dhiaŋ onaŋo waŋe, aka go oyido nyako mambula. Oloro i waŋ pi, to twomo pi iy'agwata pere to wok.
Kenyo ŋeca no oyombere kidho romo gi go, aka owaco ni, “Mondo miye pi amadhi wok iy'agwata perin.”
Rebeka odwoko ni, “Madhi jadwoŋ.” Aka oluŋo piny agwata pere wok i goke to mako ri ŋeca no kareno go madho.
Munyo ŋeca no otieko madho pi, Rebeka owaco ni, “Alatwomo ri ŋamin perin bende jowomadhi cuka orom jo.”
Ameno go okonjo pi piyo i wer to doko ŋweco i waŋ pi twomo pi man, aka oyweko pi cuka oromo ŋamin je.
Jalo oneno go liŋ, munyo mito neno k'adieri Rwoth oyido omiyo go loyo.
Munyo ŋamin jotieko madho pi, jalo okwanyo peta ma welo kweth ma zahabu to ketho i um Rebeka, to doko kwanyo pogo ario ma zahabu to ruko i cingi go.
Aka openjo go ni, “Mondo wac ran, ibedo nyar ŋa? Kisika nitie i ot pa benin riwan ma nindo wor me?”
Rebeka odwoko ni, “Abedo nyar Bethuel wod pa Milika m'onywolo ri Nahor.
Wanitie gi cemo pa ŋamia ma romo kodi kanindo.”
Kenyo jalo oguro conge to lamo Rwoth.
Owaco ni, “Rwoth, Were pa jadwoŋ paran Abraham wopak m'okuro cikirok pere iy'adieri ri jadwoŋ paran. Rwoth otelan tirtir i ot pa wade pa jadwoŋ paran.”
Rebeka oŋweco kiri i ot pa min, aka owaco rigo gigipiny me.
Rebeka oyido nitie gi omin go m'ilwoŋo ni Laban; aka Laban oŋweco kiri i waŋ pi romo gi jalo.
Laban oyido otieko neno peta, gi pogo i cingi nyamin, to winjo wac ma jalo owaco ri Rebeka. Ameno Laban okidho bongi jalo, aka oneno go munyo ocungo cegin gi ŋamin i waŋ pi
Laban owaco rigo ni, “Biye wakadhi peco, ŋata Were omiyo silwany. Raŋo icungo ka? Kole atieko yiko rin kisika i ot paran kodi kabedo ri ŋamin.”
Ameno jalo odonjo i ot, aka Laban ogonyo ŋamin to miyo jo cemo kodi kanindo; aka omiyo ŋeca pa Abraham pi ma lwoko tiende kodi tiendi cwo m'oyido jonitie gi go.
Kenyo okeli cemo, aka ŋeca pa Abraham owaco ni, “Ak'ocem cuka anowaci gim'okelan.”
Laban odwoko ni, “Medere iluw.”
Jalo owaco ni, “Abedo ŋeca pa Abraham.
Rwoth otieko miyo jadwoŋ paran silwany m'oasere, aka olokere nyatoro madwoŋ; omiyo go rombo gi dhok, feza gi zahabu, ŋecin ma mon gi ma cwo, kodi ŋamin gi punde.
Sara, cipa jadwoŋ paran onywolo rigo nyathi majayac i tiyo pere, aka jadwoŋ paran omiyo go lim pere je.
Jadwoŋ paran omiyan kwoŋirok munyo waco ni, ‘Ikir'inwaŋ ri wodan dhako kwoŋ nyir ma piny Kanan ka.
T'ikidhi i ot pa baba, bongi wade paran, t'inwaŋo ri wodan dhako.’
T'apenjo go ni, to ka nyako okwer dwoko kodan?
Go odwoko ni, ‘Rwoth Were ma winjo noknok bino dhiro malaika pere yuwiyin to miyin loyo. Ibino nwaŋo ri wodan dhako wok bongi wade paran, i ot pa baba.
Nitie nyaka nger acel m'ibino gonyirok'iye kwoŋ kwoŋirok me; meno ka wade pere jokwero go dwoko kodin.’
Konon munyo atundo i waŋ pi, akwayo Rwoth, Were pa jadwoŋ paran ni, ‘Mondo konyan i gim'atimo.
Neni, acungo ka i waŋ pi; weyi nyako m'obin kulo, alawaco rigo ni womiye pi amadhi wok iy'agwata pere.
Ka go owaci ni madhi, to doko yweko ri ŋamin paran bende, weyi go wobedi dhako ma Rwoth oyero ri wod pa jadwoŋ paran.’
Mafodi akicowo kwayo paran i cunyan, neni to Rebeka bino g'agwata pere i goke to loro i waŋ pi twomo pi. Awaco rigo ni, ‘Mondo miye pi amadhi.’
To go luŋo agwata pere wok i goke to waco ni, ‘Madhi, aka alamiyo ŋamin perin bende.’ Ameno amadho, aka to miyo ŋamin bende.
Kenyo apenjo go ni, ‘Ibedo nyar ŋa?’ To go dwokan ni, ‘Abedo nyar Bethuel, wod pa Nahor ma Milika onywolo rigo.’ Ameno aketho peta i ume, gi pogo i cinge.
Kenyo aguro congan t'alamo Rwoth. Apako Rwoth, Were pa jadwoŋ paran Abraham, m'otelan tirtir nwaŋo nyar wat pa jadwoŋ paran ri wode.
Onyo pama, ka wilanyutho wor g'adieri ri jadwoŋ paran, wac win ran; ka k'obedo ameno, bende wac win ran anen gir'atima.”
Laban gi Bethuel jodwoko ni, “Gime owok bongi Rwoth; wakinyali luwo kodin marac kosa maber.
Rebeka ee, kadhi gi go; aka weyi go wobedi cipa wod pa jadwoŋ perin, paka Rwoth otieko waco.”
Munyo ŋeca pa Abraham owinjo wac pajo, okule piny to lamo Rwoth.
Kenyo go owodho thiwino ma feza gi zahabu kodi nangin to miyo Rebeka. Go bende omiyo omin Rebeka gi min mic ma welo.
Kenyo ŋeca pa Abraham gi cwo pere jocemo to jomedho, aka jonindo kenyo. Munyo jocewi, go owaco ni, “Weyi win adoki bongi jadwoŋ paran.”
To omin Rebeka gi min jowaco ni, “Weyi nyako kutho wodoŋ gi wan ma hongo moro ma romo ndelo apar, to nyaka go kadho.”
To go waco rijo ni, “Wikiri wigalan, k'inen Rwoth otieko miyan loyo i woth paran; weyi win adoki bongi jadwoŋ paran.”
Jodwoko ni, “Weyi walwoŋ nyako wapenji go.”
Aka jolwoŋo Rebeka to jopenjo ni, “Ilakadho gi jame?”
Rebeka odwoko ni, “Alakadho.”
Ameno josewila Rebeka gi ŋeca pere, to jokadho gi ŋeca pa Abraham kodi cwo pere.
Aka jomiyo Rebeka silwany i wac me, “Nyamin wan, bedi min ji ganin ma gana apar, aka weyi nyikwayin jowomaki tindin madongo pa jokwor pajo!”
Kenyo Rebeka gi ŋecin manyir pere joyikere, aka joidho ŋamin ŋey jowokadhi gi ŋeca pa Abraham aka jocako woth.
I hongo no Isaka oyido owok Berlahayroi (jwom pa ŋata kwo ma nenan) aka oyido bedo yupiny.
Isaka okidho kiwaya i ndelo othieno, aka otiŋo waŋe malo to neno ŋamin jobino.
Aka Rebeka otiŋo waŋe malo, aka munyo oneno Isaka, oloro i wi ŋamia
aka openjo ŋeca pa Abraham ni, “Meno jal mene no ma wotho i ndelo bino romo gi wan?”
Ŋeca no odwoko ni, “Meno jadwoŋ paran.” Ameno Rebeka okwanyo kitambala pere to umo gine waŋe.
Ŋeca no owaco ri Isaka gima go oyido otimo je.
Kenyo Isaka otero Rebeka bedo cege i wema m'oyido Sara min bed'iye. Isaka oyido omaro Rebeka, aka rembo ma tho pa min go ogik cen.
Abraham onywomo dhako man ma nyinge oyido Ketura.
Ketura onywolo rigo Zimiran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Isibak, kodi Suwa.
Yoksan oyido obedo ba Seba kodi Dedan. Wot Dedan oyido jobedo Asurim Letusim, kodi Leumim.
Wot Midian oyido jobedo Efa, Efer, Hanok, Abida, kodi Elida. Me je oyido jobedo wot Ketura.
Abraham omiyo Isaka gigipiny pere je m'oyido go nitie gine.
To mafodi Abraham k'otho, omiyo wot go ma mon pere man jonywolo rigo mic, to riemo jo woko bongi wode Isaka kidho yuwok ceŋ ma piny Kanan.
Abraham ocowo oro 175.
Go oywe macowe to tho i tiyo, aka oriwere gi ji pere.
Wot go Isaka gi Isimayil joyiko go i ŋungu ma Makipela, i ndelo m'oyido obedo apa Efron wod pa Zohar Jahiti, yuwok ceŋ ma Mamire.
Me oyido obedo ndelo ma Abraham onyewo wok bongi Johiti. Kenyo oyiki Abraham gi cege Sara.
Munyo Abraham otieko tho, Were omiyo wode Isaka silwany. Isaka oyido bedo Berlahayroi.
Me nyikway Isimayil, wod Abraham ma Hagar ŋeca pa Sara ma Jamisir onywolo.
Me nyingi wot Isimayil i nywolirok pajo; Nebayoth, Kedar, Adibel, Mibisam,
Misima, Duma, Masa,
Hadad, Tema, Yetur, Nafis, kodi Kedema.
Me a kwari nonin apar g'ario, aka nyingi gin ocwoki ri loka gi kambi pajo.
Isimayil oyido jaoro 137 munyo go tho
Nyikway Isimayil oyido jobedo iy'adec ma dier Havila kodi Sur, yuwok ceŋ ma Misir yuthenge ma Asiria. Jo oyido jobedo bor gi nyikway Abraham man.
Me a nyikway Isaka, wod pa Abraham.
Isaka oyido jaoro piero aŋwen munyo nywomo Rebeka nyar Bethuel Jaramean ma wok Mesopotamia. Rebeka oyido obedo nyamin Laban
Rupiri Rebeka oyido kinywol, Isaka okwayo rigo Rwoth. Rwoth owinjo kwayo pa Isaka, aka Rebeka ogamo iye.
Nyithindho oyido jolwenyo i iy go, aka go owaco ni, “Raŋo gima cale ama timere ran?” Ameno go okidho penjo Rwoth.
Aka Rwoth odwoko go ni, “Nonin ario nitie i iyin, aka j'ario m'ilanywolo jolatiakere. Acel labedo matek loyo nyawote, aka m'open wok bino bedo ŋeca pa mathin.”
Hongo pere otundo ma nywol, neni go onywolo rut.
M'open wok oyido obokere, aka delkwoŋe gipi oyido cale kanzu ma yer, aka ocwoki nyinge ni Esau.
Rumacen omin bende owok, aka cinge oyido omako fundi Esau; ameno ocwoki nyinge ni Yakobo. Isaka oyido jaoro piero aucel munyo inywolo jo.
Munyo yac me jodongo, Esau oyido nitie gi ndijo ma dwar, jacwo ma sa, aka Yakobo oyido obedo jacwo ma liŋ, aka bedo i wema.
Isaka oyido omaro Esau rupiri oyido camo riŋo ma dwar pere, aka Rebeka oyido maro Yakobo.
Ndelo acel, Yakobo oyido tedo bijanjalo, aka Esau owok dwar kec oyido neko.
Esau owaco ri Yakobo ni, “Weyi acami ye kado m'obokere no, rupiri kec asa nekan.” (Meno am'omiyo ilwoŋo go ni Edom; dwoŋ mere ni obokere).
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Kutho tana an dwoŋ perin ma nywolirok.”
Esau owaco ni, “Acegin tho; onyo dwoŋ nywolirok paran kony mere aŋo?”
Ameno Esau okwoŋere to tana dwoŋ ma nywolirok pere ri Yakobo.
Kenyo Yakobo omiyo Esau mugat gi kado moro. Go ocemo to medho, to ay kadho yo pere. Ameno won apaka Esau ocayo dwoŋ ma nywolirok pere.
Onyo kec man kendo obino i piny weyi rin m'otimere i ndir pa Abraham. Isaka to kidho bongi Abimelek, kere pa Jofilistia i Gerar.
Rwoth omenyere ri Isaka to waco ni, “Ikir'ilor i piny Misir, bedi i piny m'anowaci rin.
Bedi ka, aka alabedo kodin t'amiyin silwany; ri in gi nyikwayin, alamiyo lowo me, aka abino ketho i kare cikirok m'atimo ri benin Abraham.
Alamiyin nyikwayin kweth pa micalin ma polo, aka alamiyo nyikwayin lowo me. Nonin je jobino kwayan miyo jo silwany paka amiyo nyikwayin.
Rupiri Abraham owinjo dwondan, to luwo cik gi or paran, abino miyin silwany.”
Ameno Isaka obedo Gerar.
Munyo cwo ma kenyo jopenjo go kwoŋ Rebeka, owaco ni, “Go nyamin an.” Go olworo waco ni Rebeka oyido obedo cege rupiri oparo ni inyalo neko go kwoŋbedo Rebeka rupiri go oyido ŋon swa.
Munyo Isaka otieko bedo kenyo ma hongo moro, Abimelek kere pa Jofilistia odiko waŋe gi dirisa to neno Isaka munyo omako cege Rebeka i kore.
Ameno Abimelek olwoŋo Isaka, aka owaco rigo ni, “Kere go obedo dhako perin! Raŋo iwaco riwan ni go nyamin in?”
Isaka odwoko ni, “Rupiri oyido aparo ni inyalo nekan kwoŋbedo go.”
Abimelek owaco ni, “Me aŋo m'itimo riwan? To bedi ŋatimoro nindi gi cegin, dinyo iyimo kwoŋ wan reco.”
Ameno Abimelek owaco ri ji je teltel ni, “Ŋatimoro m'ogey jame kosa cege ibino neko.”
Isaka ocwoyo i lowo no, aka i oro no won okeco dimiya acel rupiri Rwoth omiyo go silwany
aka oŋaŋ to medere limo cuka olokere jathoŋino
Go oyido nitie gi lim ma rombo, dhok, kodi ŋecin kweth, aka Jofilistia jomako gi go nyeko.
Onyo Jofilistia oyido joculo gi lowo waŋ pi ma ŋecin pa bamere jokunyo i hongo pa Abraham.
Aka Abimelek owaco ri Isaka ni, “Ngoye woko bongi wan rupiri onyo pama itek loyo wan.”
Ameno Isaka ongoye woko kenyo, aka okidho to ketho kambi i milelo ma Gerar to bedo kenyo.
Isaka okunyo kendo waŋ pi m'oyido okuny i ndir pa bamere Abraham m'oyido Jofilistia joculo munyo Abraham otieko tho; aka olwoŋo jo gi nyingi gin ma bamere oyido lwoŋo gine jo.
To munyo ŋecin pa Isaka jokunyo waŋ pi i milelo Gerar to jotuco pi,
jokwath ma Gerar jocako dhaw gi jokwath pa Isaka ka jowaco ni, “Waŋ pi me mawan.” Ameno Isaka olwoŋo waŋ pi no ni Esek.
Ŋecin pa Isaka jokunyo waŋ pi man kendo, aka doko okelo dhaw to Isaka lwoŋo ni Sitina.
Isaka oeye woko kenyo to kunyo waŋ pi man, aka k'okelo dhaw to go lwoŋo ni Rehoboth,
Isaka owok kenyo to kadho Berseba.
Wor no Rwoth omenyere rigo aka owaco ni, “Abedo Were pa benin Abraham, ikir'ilwor, rupiri anikodin aka abino miyin silwany t'amedo nyikwayin ro ŋeca paran Abraham.”
Ameno Isaka ogeto migam kenyo to lamo Were. Aka oketho kambi pere kenyo, to ŋecin pere jokunyo waŋ pi man.
Kenyo Abimelek okidho bongi Isaka wok Gerar gi Ahuzath jamic rieko pere, kodi Fikol jamituka jolweny pere.
Isaka openjo go ni, “Raŋo ibino bongan ma kucel widakan aka wirieman woko i piny mewin?”
Jodwoko ni, “Waneno kamaler ni Rwoth nikodin, aka wawaco ni weyi kwoŋirok wobedi i dier wan kodin, aka weyi watim cikirok kodin,
ni ikibino kelo riwan litho; paka wakigeyin to wakitimo rin gimoro marac to bero to wariemin i siem. Pama onyo nitie kamaler ni Rwoth omiyin silwany.”
Isaka otimo rijo kalima, aka jocemo to jomedho.
Joay odikin con aka jotimo kwoŋirok. Kenyo Isaka osewila jo, aka joeye bongi go i, i siem.
Ndelo no won ŋecin pa Isaka jobino, aka jowaco rigo kwoŋ waŋ pi ma jokunyo, aka jowaco rigo ni, “Watuco pi.”
Isaka olwoŋo waŋ pi no ni Siba (kwoŋirok) aka meno a kama nyingi tindi madwoŋ Berseba wok'iye kiri konon.
Munyo Esau jaoro piero aŋwen, onywomo dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Yudita nyar Ber Jahiti, kodi Basemath nyar Elon Jahiti.
Mon ario me joloko kwo matek ri Isaka gi Rebeka.
Munyo Isaka oyido oti aka waŋe oyido neno ma riprip, olwoŋo wode makayo Esau ni, “Esau!”
Esau odwoko ni, “An e!”
Isaka owaco rigo ni, “Neni, ati, aka akuya ndelo paran ma tho.
Onyo pama kwany gi dwar perin, kwot g'aserin perin, aka ikadhi i sa, i neki ran ogwaŋ
aka itedi ran cemo mamit m'amaro, t'ikelo ran. K'atieko camo, abino miyin silwany paran macowe mafodi akitho.”
Rebeka oyido winjo munyo Isaka luwo gi Esau. Ameno munyo Esau okadho dwar,
owaco ri Yakobo ni, “Awinjo benin waco ri omin in Esau ni,
‘Keli ran ogwaŋ itedi ran acami, aka amiyin silwany ruwaŋ Rwoth mafodi akitho.’
Onyo riameno wodan, winji wac paran k'amiyin cik.
Kadhi bongi mwendi, aka idimi nyithindhi diegi ario ma mbute, ŋey atedi jo aka atim cemo moro ma benin omaro swa.
Aka ilatero ri benin to camo, ŋey womiyin silwany mafodi go k'otho.”
To Yakobo waco ri Rebeka min ni, “Neni, omin an Esau kwoŋe nitie yer, aka an kwoŋan foth.
Miti baba lageyan to niaŋ ni awondo go, to kelo kwoŋan lam makiweno silwany.”
Yokimere odwoko ni, “Weyi lam perin wopodhi kwoŋan wodan; nyaka winji wac paran aka kadhi ikeli ran diegi.”
Ameno Yakobo okidho to kelo ri min diegi; aka min otedo nger cemo ma bamere omaro.
Kenyo Rebeka okwanyo nangin maber loyo mapa Esau wode makayo m'oyido nitie i ot pere, aka oruko ri Yakobo ocoko pere.
Oruko ri Yakobo pien pa nyithindhi diegi i cinge, kodi i ŋute kamafoth
aka omiyo wode Yakobo cemo gi mugat m'oyido go otedo.
Ameno Yakobo okidho bongi bamere aka owaco ni, “Baba!”
Bamere odwoko ni, “Ey, ŋa kwoŋ wotan ma lwoŋan?”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Abedo Esau okayo perin. Atieko timo paka iwaco ran. Onyo bedi m'otire aka icami riŋo moro m'akelo rin, ŋey imiyan silwany.”
Isaka owaco ri wode ni, “Inwaŋo nedi piyo wodan?”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Rupiri Rwoth Were perin okonyan nwaŋo.”
Kenyo Isaka owaco ri Yakobo ni, “Core cegin, ŋey amulin wodan aŋey k'adieri ibedo wodan Esau kosa be.”
Ameno Yakobo ocore cegin gi Isaka bamere m'ogeyo go aka owaco ni, “Dwonde obedo dwondi Yakobo, to cinge, obedo cingi Esau.”
Aka Isaka k'oniaŋ kwoŋ Yakobo rupiri cinge oyido nitie yer paka cingi omin go Esau; ameno omiyo go silwany.
Isaka openjo Yakobo ni, “Adieri ibedo wodan Esau?”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Me an.”
Kenyo Isaka owaco ri Yakobo ni, “Keli ran riŋo moro, ŋey acami riŋo pa wodan, t'amiyin silwany.” Ameno Yakobo okelo bonge, aka ocamo, to kelo rigo vini bende to madho.
Kenyo bamere owaco rigo ni, “Core cegin wodan icwiy lemban.”
Ameno ocore cegin to cwiyo lembi bamere, aka Isaka oŋweyo nangin pere, aka omiyo go silwany ka waco ama:
Neni ŋwece wodan
cale paka ŋwece ndelo ma Rwoth otieko miyo silwany!
Weyi Rwoth womiyin thoyo ma polo,
kodi poŋo ma piny,
kodi ŋano kweth gi vini.
aka nonin jowokule rin piny.
Bedi rwoth pa wutmin in,
aka weyi wot yokin jowokule rin piny.
Lam ri kisi ŋata lamin,
aka silwany ri kisi ŋata miyin silwany!
Tekin Isaka tieko miyo Yakobo silwany, munyo nyaka Yakobo oeye ruwaŋ bamere Isaka, Esau omin go odwoko wok i dwar pere.
Go bende otedo cemo moro mamit to tero ri bamere. Aka owaco ri bamere ni, “Weyi baba woay, aka wocam riŋo pa wode, ŋey womiyan silwany.”
Bamere Isaka openjo ni, “In iŋa?”
Esau odwoko ni, “An okayo perin Esau.”
Isaka ocako kirin gi derino, aka owaco ni, “Ŋa to, m'oneko ogwaŋ to kelo ran, acamo je mafodi ikibino aka atieko miyo go silwany? Ey, aka go labedo gi silwany.”
Munyo Esau owinjo wac ba bamere, oywaki, ywak madwoŋ swa gi gwayo, aka owaco ri bamere ni, “Miyan silwany, kiri an bende, a baba!”
To Isaka owaco rigo ni, “Omin in obino to wondan, aka otero woko silwany perin.”
Isaka odwoko ni, “Neni, atieko ketho go rwoth perin, kodi wutmin go je paka ŋecin pere. Amiyo go ŋano gi vini je. Onyo ongoye gim'anyalo timo rin wodan!”
“Neni, ongoye thoyo ma polo rin,
aka ongoye lowo maber rin.
aka ilabedo ŋeca p'omin in.
To k'inotur t'igonyere
ilaturo bieto pere wok i ŋutin.”
To Esau dak omin go Yakobo rupiri bamere oyido omiyo Yakobo silwany. Obedo gi paro ni, “Hongo ma ywak tho pa baba cegin, kenyo alaneko Yakobo.”
To owaci ri Rebeka wac pa Esau, ameno odhiro t'ilwoŋo Yakobo aka owaco rigo ni, “Neni, omin in Esau cano nekin.
Onyo riameno, wodan winji dwondan, itimi gim'awaco. Ay iringi bongi Laban omin an i Haran,
aka bedi gi go ma hongo moro cuka nge p'omin in okwe;
cuka wiye owil gi gim'itimo rigo. Kenyo abino dhiro rin nyatoro dwokin. Raŋo akeŋ wotan je i ndelo acel?”
Kenyo Rebeka owaco ri Isaka ni, “Atwo aka aol gi mon pa Esau ma jopath. Ka Yakobo bende onywom mon Johiti me, anyalo bende tho.”
Kenyo Isaka olwoŋo Yakobo to miyo go silwany, aka ociko go teltel ni, “Ikir'inywom dhako Jakanan.
Ay ikadhi Mesopotamia, i ot pa Bethuel ba yokin, aka inywom acel kwoŋ nyir pa nerin Laban omin yokin.
Were Majameni je womiyin silwany aka womiyin nyithindho kweth, ŋey ibedi ba piny kweth.
Weyi go womiyin gi nyikwayin silwany paka omiyo Abraham, ŋey widoŋ gi lowo m'ibed'iye ma Were omiyo Abraham!”
Ameno to Isaka oro Yakobo kadho. Aka Yakobo okidho Mesopotamia bongi Laban wod pa Bethuel Jaramean, omin Rebeka yok Yakobo gi Esau.
Onyo Esau oneno ni Isaka oyido otieko miyo Yakobo silwany to dhiro go Mesopotamia rango dhako kenyo, aka ni munyo miyo go silwany ociko go teltel ni, “Ikir'inywom acel kwoŋ mon ma Kanan.”
Yakobo oyido owinjo bamere gi min to kidho Mesopotamia.
Ameno munyo Esau oneno ni mon ma Kanan jokisangala Isaka bamere,
okidho bongi Isimayil wod pa Abraham to nywomo nyare m'ilwoŋo ni Mahalath, m'oyido obedo nyamin Nebayoth.
Yakobo oeye Berseba, to kidho yu Haran.
Aka otundo i kabedo moro to bedo kenyo wor no rupiri waŋceŋ oyido otieko podho. Okwanyo tele acel kanyago to theno gine wiye to nindo.
Aka oleko kenyo nike oyido nitie madala m'ocom wok piny, to wiye tundo kiri i polo; aka oneno jomalaika pa Were ka joidho aka doko jolor'iye.
Go oneno Rwoth ocungo i wiye to waco ni, “An Rwoth, Were pa Abraham benin, aka Were pa Isaka; alamiyin gi nyikwayin lowo m'inind'iye me.
Nyikwayin jobino cale fukefuke ma piny. Jobino nyay i thenge gi thenge aka luwo kwoŋ jo abino miyo piny je silwany.
Neni, anitie kodin, aka abino kurin kisi kam'inokidh'iye, t'adwokin i lowo me; rupiri akibino weyin cuka anotiek timo gim'atieko waco rin.”
Kenyo Yakobo ocew wok i nindo pere aka owaco ni, “Adieri Rwoth nitie ka, aka oyido akuya.”
Lworo omako go to waco ni, “Kole ka miyo jo lworo! Me k'obedo giman kwanyo woko Ot pa Were, aka me waŋkac ma polo.”
Ameno Yakobo oay con odikin, aka okwanyo tele m'oyido go otheno gine wiye, to jengo paka siro aka okonjo mo i wiye.
Go olwoŋo kenyo ni Bethel.
Kenyo Yakobo otimo cikirok ka waco ni, “Ka Rwoth obedi kodan, to kuran i yo paran m'akidh'iye, to miyan cemo gi nanga aruka,
ŋey doko adwoki i ot pa baba i siem, nyaka Rwoth bino bedo Were paran
aka tele me, m'aketho paka siro me, bino bedo Ot pa Were; aka kwoŋ kisi gim'inomiyan je, abino miyin acel wiy apar.”
Yakobo omedere i yo pere, aka otundo i piny pa ji ma yuwok ceŋ.
Munyo go oŋiyo, oneno waŋ pi i sa, kodi sidwol rombo adek jonindo i thenge; rupiri kenyo ama rombo oyido jomadh'iye pi. Tele ma dhok waŋ pi oyido pando.
Kisi ka sidwol rombo jocokere, jokwath rombo joŋilo woko tele wok i dhok waŋ pi to jomiyo rombo pi, to doko jodwoko tele.
Yakobo openjo jokwath rombo ni, “Wutmera, wiwok yukune?”
Jodwoko ni, “Wawok Haran.”
Openjo jo ni, “Wiŋeyo Laban, wod pa Nahor?”
Jodwoko ni, “Ey, waŋeyo go.”
Openjo jo ni, “Go ber?”
Jodwoko go ni, “Go ber. Neni, nyare Laker bino gi rombo!”
Yakobo owaco rijo ni, “Neni win, piny fodi, aka sawa fodi ma dwoko rombo; raŋo wikimiy jo pi to wikadho kwayo jo.”
To jodwoko go ni, “Wakinyali cuka sidwol je ocoki kanyacel, ka tele oŋil woko wok i dhok waŋ pi; nyaka to wamiyo rombo pi.”
Munyo Yakobo fodi luwo gi jo, Laker obino gi rombo pa bamere, rupiri go am'oyido kwayo jo.
Onyo munyo Yakobo oneno Laker nyar Laban ner mere, okidho to ŋilo tele wok i dhok waŋ pi, aka omiyo sidwol rombo pa Laban omin min pi.
Kenyo Yakobo cwiyo lembi Laker to cwero pi waŋe ma Kisangala.
Aka Yakobo owaco ri Laker ni go obedo wat pa bamere, aka ni go obedo wod pa Rebeka. Kenyo Laker oŋweco to waco ri bamere.
Munyo Laban owinjo kwoŋ wac ma mako kwoŋ okewo pere Yakobo, oŋweco romo gi go, aka opodho i kore to cwiyo lembe, aka otero go i ot pere. Yakobo owaco ri Laban gim'oyido otimere je,
aka Laban owaco ni, “Adieri ibedo coko gi del paran!” Yakobo obedo kenyo ma dwe acel.
Kenyo Laban owaco ri Yakobo ni, “Rupiri ibedo wat paran, inotiy ran manono? Waci ran, cul perin labedo aŋo?”
Laban oyido nitie gi nyir ario; madwoŋ oyido ilwoŋo ni Leya, aka mathin ilwoŋo ni Laker.
Waŋ Leya oyido lwor, aka Laker oyido ŋon aka ja waŋtek.
Yakobo oyido omaro Laker aka owaco ni, “Alatic rin ro nyarin Laker ma oro abirio.”
Laban odwoko ni, “Ber amiyin go loyo miyo jacwo man; bedi kodan ka.”
Yakobo otiyo ma oro abirio ro Laker, aka ocale rigo pa ndelo manok rupiri oyido omaro Laker.
Kenyo Yakobo waco ri Laban ni, “Miyan dhako paran anywom go, kole hongo paran orumo.”
Ameno Laban ocoko kanyacel cwo ma kabedo no, aka otimo kalima.
To othieno, Laban okwanyo nyare Leya to kelo ri Yakobo, aka Yakobo onindo gine.
(Laban omiyo Leya ŋeca pere m'ilwoŋo ni Zilipa paka jatic pere.)
Aka odikin nyaka to Yakobo niaŋ ni oyido obedo Leya. Yakobo openjo Laban ni, “Itimo ran aŋo me? Akitiyo rin ro Laker? Raŋo onyo iwondan?”
Laban odwoko ni, “Kitimere i piny mawan miyo nyako mathin mafodi makayo.
Cow sabiti acel me, aka nyaka walamiyin Laker bende k'inotiy ran ma oro abirio doko.”
Yakobo otimo ameno, aka munyo sabiti acel orumo, Laban omiyo go nyare Laker bedo dhako pere.
Laban omiyo nyare Laker ŋeca pere m'ilwoŋo ni Biliha tiyo rigo.
Yakobo onindo gi Laker bende, aka oyido omaro Laker loyo Leya; aka otiyo ri Laban kendo ma oro abirio.
Munyo Rwoth oneno ni Yakobo omaro Laker loyo Leya, oyawo iy Leya, to cego apa Laker.
Leya ogamo iye, to nywolo wode, aka ocwoko nyinge ni Ruben rupiri owaco ni, “Rupiri Rwoth oneno candirok paran; adieri cworan nyaka lamaran.”
Doko go ogamo iye to nywolo wode to waco ni, “Rupiri Rwoth otieko winjo ni odakan, omiyan wodan me bende.” Go ocwoko nyinge ni Simeo.
Odoko Leya ogamo iye, aka onywolo wode man, aka owaco ni, “Pama rume cworan bino riwirok kodan; rupiri atieko nywolo rigo cwo adek.” Ameno ocwoko nyinge ni Levi.
Kenyo doko go gamo iye to onywolo wode man, aka owaco ni, “Rume abino pako Rwoth.” Riameno ocwoko nyinge ni Yuda, kenyo to go cungo nywol.
To munyo Laker oneno ni k'onywolo ri Yakobo nyithindho, nyeko omako gi nyamin to waco ri Yakobo ni, “Miyan nyithindho, kosa alatho.”
Yakobo omako nge gi Laker, aka owaco ni, “Lokere anitie i kabedo pa Were, m'opano kwoŋin olemo ma ici!”
Kenyo Laker owaco ni, “Ŋeca paran Biliha ee nindi gi go ŋey wonywol ran nyathi; ŋey anyal bedo gi nyithindho luwo i go.”
Ameno Laker omiyo Yakobo ŋeca pere Biliha paka cege to Yakobo nindo gine.
Biliha ogamo iye aka onywolo ri Yakobo wode.
Kenyo Laker waco ni, “Were otieko thumo ran banja, aka go bende otieko winjo dwondan to miyan wodan.” Riameno ocwoko nyinge ni Dan.
Biliha ŋeca pa Laker doko ogamo iye to nywolo ri Yakobo wode mar'ario.
Kenyo Laker waco ni, “Gi mawi ma meni, atieko lwenyo gi nyamin an, aka aloyo.” Ameno ocwoko nyinge ni Nafital.
Munyo Leya oneno ni ocungo nywol, okwanyo ŋeca pere Zilipa to miyo Yakobo paka cege.
Kenyo Zilipa onywolo ri Yakobo wode.
Aka Leya owaco ni, “Nga ajasilwany maber!” To cwoko nyinge ni Gad.
Zilipa onywolo ri Yakobo wode mar'ario,
aka Leya owaco ni, “Ajakisangala! Rupiri mon jolalwoŋan ni jakisangala” Ameno ocwoko nyinge ni Aser.
I hongo ma keco ŋano Ruben okidho i ndelo to nwaŋo yath ma nywol gi yath ger, aka okelo ri min Leya. Laker owaco ri Leya ni, “Mondo miyan ye bende yath nywol gi yath ger ma wodin omiyin.”
Leya odwoko ni, “Iparo ni obedo gimathin ni imayan cworan? Onyo imito mayan yath nywol gi yath ger ma wodan omiyan bende?”
Laker owaco ni, “K'imiyan yath nywol gi yath ger ma wodin omiyin, Yakobo nyalo nindo kodin wor me.”

Munyo Yakobo odwoko wok i ndelo othieno, Leya owok romo gi go, aka owaco ni, “Iripo nindo kodan wor me, rupiri atieko culo ro in kodi yath nywol gi yath ger ma wodan omiyan.” Ameno Yakobo onindo gi go wor no.
Were owinjo kwayo pa Leya, aka ogamo iye to nywolo ri Yakobo wode mar'abic.
Leya owaco ni, “Were otieko culan, rupiri amiyo cworan ŋeca paran.” To cwoko nyinge ni Isakar.
Leya ogamo iye kendo to nywolo ri Yakobo wode mar'aucel.
Kenyo Leya owaco ni, “Were otieko miyan mic maber, aka cworan bino miyan dwoŋ; rupiri atieko nywolo rigo yac aucel.” Ameno ocwoko nyinge ni, Zebulun.
Rumacen Leya onywolo nyare aka ocwoko nyinge ni Dina.
Kenyo Were opoyo Laker; aka Were owinjo kwayo pere to yawo iye.
Ogamo iye to nywolo wode, aka owaco ni, “Were okwanyo woko wickwot paran,
weyi doko womiyan wodan man.” To cwoko nyinge ni Yozefu.
Munyo Laker otieko nywolo Yozefu, Yakobo owaco ri Laban ni, “Sewila an, ŋey adoki peco paran won aka i piny paran.
Miyan mon paran gi nyithindho paran m'atieko tiyo rijo, akadhi kwoŋbedo iŋeyo tic m'atieko timo rin.”
Laban odwoko ni, “Yeyan awaci gime, atieko ŋeyo i menyirok ni Rwoth otieko miyan silwany kwoŋbedo in.
Waci cul perin, aka abino miyin.”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “In won iŋeyo paka atieko tiyo rin, kodi nger m'ogwaŋe perin jonyay'iye munyo akwayo jo.
Ma nok m'oyido initie gine munyo fodi akibino onyo pama jomedere gibe; aka Rwoth otieko miyin silwany i kamoro je m'atund'iye. To onyo pama hongo otundo ma bende aripo thielo ot paran.”
Laban openjo Yakobo ni, “Aculin aŋo?”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Akimiti cul moro je, to k'inotim ran gime, abino doko pidho gi kuro ogwaŋe perin.
Yeyan awothi i dier mwendi perin konon, akwany rombo m'akol gi m'akor, gi kisi rombo macol, kodi diegi m'akol gi m'akor; aka meno ama bino bedo cul paran.
Yuwaŋe inyalo ŋeyo mayot k'oyido ajar'adieri. K'inobin kikaŋasa cul paran, k'anitie gi diel kosa rombo ma k'obedo akol kosa mar'akor kosa macol; ilaŋeyo ni akwalin.”
Laban odwoko ni, “Ayere. Watim paka iwaco.”
To ndelo no Laban okwanyo woko wot diegi gi diegi ma mon akor gi akol kodi matar, kodi nyithindhi rombo macol je to ketho jo i cingi wot go.
Aka ongoye woko bongi Yakobo gi mwendi pere boro ma romo woth ma ndelo adek. Yakobo okwayo mwendi pa Laban m'odoŋ.
Yakobo okwanyo jangi yen nger adek manyaboke pendi to cilo apoka ŋey jangi yen jowobedi makicin matar.
Okidho to ketho jangi yen no ruwaŋ mwendi i wer ma jomadh'iye pi. Oketho jo kenyo rupiri kenyo am'ogwaŋe oyido joring'iye ka jobino madho pi.
Ameno munyo mwendi joringo ruwaŋ jangi yen no, jonywolo nyithindhi gin makicin, akol kosa akor.
Aka Yakobo opoko nyithindhi rombo, aka omiyo jo ŋiyo mwendi pa Laban makicin matar gi macol, aka opoko jo kwoŋ apa Laban.
Kisi ka mwendi matek joringo, Yakobo oyido ketho jangi yen makicin matar i wer pi ŋey joworingi i dier jangi yen no.
To go k'oketho jangi yen ruwaŋ mwendi ma moso. Ameno Laban obedo gi mwendi ma moso, aka Yakobo obedo gi ma cwe.
I nger me Yakobo olokere jalim kweth. Go oyido nitie gi mwendi kweth, ŋecin, ŋamin, punde.
