Onyo Yakobo owinjo ni wot Laban oyido jowaco ni, “Yakobo otieko kwanyo lim pa bawan je; aka wok kwoŋ gim'oyido obedo apa bawan, olimo lim pere me je.”
Yakobo bende oneno ni Laban oyido kiter go gi wor paka con mere.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Yakobo ni, “Dok i piny pa bacere perin aka bongi wade perin. Abino bedo kodin.”
Ameno Yakobo odhiro wac ri Laker gi Leya ni joworom gine i sa kama mwendi pere oyido nitie iye.
Yakobo owaco rijo ni, “Atieko neno ni bawin kiteran gi wor paka oyido timo con mere. To Were pa baba oyido nikodan.
Wiŋeyo nike atieko tiyo ri bawin gi meni paran je,
kucel bawin otieko kwalan to wiro cul paran dipar. To Were k'oyeyo go miyan litho.

Kisi ka Laban owaco ni, ‘Diegi m'akol je bino bedo cul perin.’ Mwendi je jonywolo nyithindhi jo m'akol. Aka ka go owaco ni, ‘Diegi m'akor je bino bedo cul perin.’ Mwendi je jonywolo nyithindhi jo m'akor.
Were okwanyo woko mwendi kwoŋ bawin, aka omiyan jo.
I hongo ma mwendi joring'iye, atiŋo malo waŋan, aka aneno i lek nike ni wot diegi m'oyido joidho ma mon oyido jobedo makicin, akol kodi akor.
Malaika olwoŋan i lek ni, ‘Yakobo’ Adwoko ni, ‘An e!’
Aka go owaco ran ni, ‘Tiŋi waŋin malo akinen, wot diegi je ma joidho ma mon jobedo makicin, akol, kodi akor; rupiri atieko neno gima Laban timo rin je.
Abedo Were m'omenyere rin Bethel, kam'iwir'iye tele gi mo t'ikwoŋere ran. Ay malo, weyi piny me idok i piny m'inywol'iye.’ ”
Laker gi Leya jodwoko Yakobo ni, “Lokere nitie adec ma gir'alunja m'owey riwan i ot pa bawan?
Go tero wan pa jopath. Rupiri go otana wan, aka oyido oro pesa m'ocul riwan.
Lim me je ma Were okwanyo kwoŋ bawan jobedo amawan gi nyithindho mawan. Onyo pama tim gima Were owaco rin.”
Ameno Yakobo oay, aka oketho wote gi mon pere i wi ŋamin,
aka ocwayo dhok pere, kodi ogwaŋe pere je m'oyido go olimo i Padanaram kadho i piny Kanan bongi bamere Isaka.
Laban oyido okadho lielo rombo pere, aka Laker okwalo werin ma ot pa bamere.
Yakobo owondo Laban Jaramean ma k'omiyo go ŋeyo nike go oyido yiko ringo.
Yakobo oringo gi kisi gimoro je ma go oyido nitie gine, aka oay to ŋado malawa Yufrete to como yupiny matendere ma Giliad.
Munyo ndelo adek okadho, owaci ri Laban ni Yakobo okwale.
Laban okwanyo cwo pere aka oluwo Yakobo ma ndelo abirio; aka oluwo go to rikere gine i piny matendere Giliad.
To Were bino ri Laban Jaramean i lek wor, aka owaco rigo ni, “Gwokere m'ikiwaco ri Yakobo wac moro, maber kosa marac.”
Laban oyombo Yakobo kama Yakobo oyido oketh'iye kambi pere wi got, aka Laban gi cwo pere joketho kambi pajo i piny matendere tendere Giliad.
Laban openjo Yakobo ni, “Aŋo m'itimo, m'idiyan, aka itiŋo woko nyir paran pa mon m'omak i lweny.
Raŋo iringo nyaliŋliŋ, t'idiyan, aka ikiwaco ran ŋey asewila in gi siemirok gi wer, kodi sasi gi tongol?
Aka raŋo ikiyeyan cwiyo lembi nyikwayan gi nyir paran t'asewila jo. Onyo itieko timo gimiŋo.
Anigi dwoŋ ma miyin litho; to Were pa benin oluwo kodan nyoro wor ka waco ni, ‘Gwokere m'ikiwaco ri Yakobo gimaber, kosa gimarac.’
Aka onyo pama aŋeyo ni itieko kadho rupiri oyido iyenyo swa ot pa benin; to raŋo m'ikwalo werin paran?”
Yakobo odwoko Laban ni, “Rupiri lworo oyido omakan, rupiri oyido aparo ni inyalo mayan nyikin gi mbaka.
Ŋatimoro je m'inonwaŋ gi werin perin, kilakwo. Ruwaŋ cwo perin, cim gim'anitie gine m'obedo aperin aka ikwany.”
Onyo Yakobo oyido okuya ni Laker oyido okwalo werin pa Laban.
Laban odonjo i wema pa Yakobo, i wema pa Leya, kodi i wema pa ŋecin ario ma mon, to k'onwaŋo werin pere. Kenyo Laban owok i wema pa Leya, to kidho i wema pa Laker.
Onyo Laker oyido okwanyo werin ma ot to ketho jo i mugowa ma kom pa ŋamia to bedo i wi jo. Laban orango i wema je to k'onwaŋo werin pere.
Laker owaco ri bamere ni, “Weyi jadwoŋ paran wokiri womaki kodan nge nike akicungo ruwaŋin, rupiri royo pa mon nitie kwoŋan.” Ameno Laban orango, to k'onwaŋo werin pere ma ot.
Kenyo Yakobo omako nge, aka osegeya Laban. Yakobo owaco ri Laban ni, “Banja paran aŋo? Reco paran aŋo, m'idwaran.
Makada nende itieko rango i gigipiny paran, aŋo m'inwaŋo m'obedo aperin? Kethi ka ruwaŋ cwo paran kodi cwo perin, ŋey jowoyere i dier waj'ario.
Ma oro piero ario oyido anitie kodin; megi rombo gi megi diegi perin iy gin k'opodho, aka akicamo wot rombo perin
Kiri m'ogwaŋe madudi joyeco je akikelo rin, t'atero keŋ mere an won. Ibanja an m'okwal odieceŋ kosa wor.
Meno apaka oyido anitie. Lietho owaŋan odieceŋ, to koyo nekan wor, aka akinyalo nindo.
Oro piero ario me je abedo i ot perin. Atiyo rin ma oro apar g'aŋwen ri nyikin ario, kodi oro aucel ri mwendi perin, to iwiro cul paran dipar.
Kabedi Were pa baba, Were pa Abraham aka Were pa Isaka k'obedo i thenge paran, adieri dinyo pama irieman thangalala. To Were oneno litho paran gi tic ma cingan, am'omiyo obwokin nyoro wor.”
Kenyo Laban odwoko ni, “Mon me jobedo nyir paran, nyithindho pajo jobedo aparan, mwendi me aparan, aka kisi gim'ineno je aparan. T'anotim aŋo ri nyir paran gi nyithindho pajo ma jonywolo?
Ere pama biye, weyi watim cikirok, an kodin, aka weyi wobedi jakony i dier an kodin.”
Ameno Yakobo okwanyo tele, aka oketho paka siro.
Owaco ri cwo pere ni, “Coki win telin.” Kenyo jotero to jodhuro kanyacel, to jocemo i ŋete.
Laban olwoŋo kenyo ni Yegar Sahadutha
Laban owaco ri Yakobo ni, “Kidhur telin me bino bedo gima poyo wan ndelo me.” Riameno olwoŋi kabedo no ni Galed.
Laban doko owaco ni, “Weyi Rwoth wokethi waŋe kwoŋ wan ka wangoye kanyacel.” Ameno kabedo no olwoŋi ni Mizipa.
Laban omedere waco ni, “K'inocandi nyir paran, kosa k'inonywom mon man, makada nende ongoye ŋata nitie gi wan poyi nike Were neno wan.
Neni kidhur telin ee kodi siro, m'atieko ketho i dier an kodin.
Kidhur telin gi siro me jobedo gir'apoya. Akibino kalo ka monjin, aka ikiripi kalo ka monjan.
Were pa Abraham, Were pa Nahor, Were pa bajo wothum riwan banja.” Kenyo Yakobo okwoŋere i nyingi Were pa Isaka bamere.
Yakobo omiyo cowirok wi got aka olwoŋo wade pere cemo, aka jocemo to jonindo wi got.
Yawere odikin, Laban ocwiyo lembi nyikwaye gi nyir pere, omiyo jo silwany, to go dok peco.
Munyo Yakobo nitie i yo, jomalaika pa Were joromo gi go,
aka munyo Yakobo oneno jo, owaco ni, “Me jolweny pa Were!” Ameno olwoŋo kabedo no ni Mahanayim.
Yakobo ooro jomikwenda yuwiye bongi omin go Esau iy'adec ma Seyir, i piny Edom.
Owaco rijo ni, “Waci win ri jadwoŋ paran Esau ni ŋeca perin Yakobo waco ni, ‘Oyido ti abedo gi Laban kiri gunyo ni,
aka anitie gi dhok, punde, rombo, diegi, gi ŋecin. Adhiro rin wac jadwoŋ paran ŋey anyal nwaŋo wor ruwaŋin.’ ”
Jomikwenda jodwoko bongi Yakobo ka jowaco ni, “Wakidho bongi omin in Esau, aka go bino romo kodin gi cwo miya aŋwen.”
Kenyo Yakobo obwok aka orembo; to tiako ji m'oyido go nitie gine i kitipin ario, mwendi, dhok, gi ŋamin
ka paro ni, “Ka Esau obin i kitipa acel to reyo woko, m'odoŋ bino ringo.”
Aka Yakobo okwayo ni, “A Were pa kwara Abraham gi Yakobo kodi Were pa baba Isaka, a Rwoth m'owaco ran ni, ‘Dok i piny perin bongi wade perin, aka abino timo rin bero.’
Akiripi gi wor kodi genirok m'itieko nyuthan, ŋeca perin. Rupiri gi nyaka luth paran akalo malawa Yordan, aka onyo pama alokere kitipin ario.
Bothan, akwayin wok i cingi omin an, wok i cingi Esau, rupiri alworo go, rupiri go nyalo bino to neko wajoje, kiri mon gi nyithindho.
T'iwaco ni, ‘Abino timo rin bero t'aloko nyikwayin mathoth paka kwoyo ma nam, ma kikwanere.’ ”
Diegi ma mon 200 wot diegi piero ario, rombo ma mon 200 gi wot rombo piero ario
ŋamin m'inyedho piero adek gi nyithindho jo, nyikuse dhok piero aŋwen gi thwondhe apar, punde ma mon piero ario, gi ma wote apar.
Gigipiny me go oketho i cingi ŋecin pere leko kisi nyatoro kende; aka owaco ri ŋecin pere ni, “Tel win yuwiyan, aka wi weyi thwolo i dier kisi dhok.”
Aka owaco ri ŋeca m'otelo ni, “K'omin an Esau oromo kodin to penjin ni, ‘Ibedo apa ŋa? Ikidho kune? Aka ogwaŋe me apa ŋa?’
Kenyo i wac ni, ‘Jobedo apa ŋeca perin Yakobo; mic ma go odhiro ri jadwoŋ pere Esau; aka kiri Yakobo won luwo wan cen.’ ”
I nger owaco ri ŋeca mar'ario, mar'adek kodi ji ma joluwo dhok je ni, “Wiwaci gimoro acel ri Esau ka wiromo gi go,
aka wiwaci ni, ‘Kiri Yakobo je nitie cen mawan.’ ” Rupiri Yakobo oparo ni, “Nyalo bedo ni alakisangala go gi mic m'otelo yuwiyan, aka rumacen alaneno waŋe; kono go bino yeyan.”
Ameno Yakobo odhiro mic yuwiye, aka go won odoŋ to nindo i kambi wor no.
Wor no won Yakobo oay to kwanyo mon pere ario, ŋecin pere ma mon ario, kodi nyithindho pere apar g'acel, aka jokalo malawa Yabok.
Munyo jotieko kalo, go ocewo gigipiny je m'oyido go nitie gine.
To Yakobo won odoŋ cen kende; aka jal moro obino to tweyo rabok gi go kiri munyo piny yawere.
Munyo jalo oneno ni kinyal redho go piny, ogeyo bambe, aka bat Yakobo omukere wok i kowino munyo go tweyo rabok gine.
Kenyo jalo owaco ni, “Weyan akadhi; rupiri piny oyawere.”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Ak'oweyin ikadhi, kwanyo woko k'imiyan silwany.”
Jalo openjo go ni, “Nyingin ŋa?”
Go odwoko ni, “Ilwoŋan ni Yakobo.”
Kenyo jalo owaco ni, “Nyingin doko k'olwoŋ ni Yakobo, to Isiraili.
To go dwoko ni, “Raŋo ipenjo nyingan?” Aka kenyo omiyo Yakobo silwany.
Ameno Yakobo owaco ni, “Atieko neno waŋ Were, to fodi akwo.” Go olwoŋo kenyo ni Peniel.
Ceŋ owok munyo Yakobo oyido kadho, aka go oyido komo ro bat mere.
Riameno Joisiraili kiri konon jokicam fuc ma kowino ma bat, rupiri kenyo ama jalo omuko.
Yakobo otiŋo waŋe malo to neno, aka neni, Esau oyido bino gi cwo pere 400. Ameno Yakobo opoko nyithindho ri Leya, Laker, kodi ŋecin pere ma mon ario.
Aka oketho ŋecin pere ma mon gi nyithindho pajo yuwiye, kenyo Leya gi nyithindho pere, kodi Laker gi Yozefu yucen.
Go won otelo yuwiy jo, aka okule piny dibirio, cuka otundo bongi omin.
To Esau ringo, oromo gi go, aka opodho i kore, to podho i ŋute aka ocwiyo lembe, to joywak.
Aka munyo Esau otiŋo waŋe malo to neno mon gi nyithindho, openjo ni, “Me jokune ma jonikodin?”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Me nyithindho ma Were omiyo ŋeca perin ro wor pere.”
Kenyo ŋecin ma mon jocore cegin, jo gi nyithindho pajo, aka jokule piny.
Ameno Leya kodi nyithindho pere bende jocore cegin to jokule piny; aka macowe, Yozefu kodi Laker bende jocore cegin, aka jokule piny.
Esau openjo ni, “Aŋo m'inyutho gi kitipa ma romo gine me?”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Ma nwaŋo wor wok bongi jadwoŋ paran.”
To Esau waco ni, “Anigi ma romo omin an kani gim'initie gine.”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Be, mondo akwayin, k'anwaŋo wor i waŋ jadwoŋ paran, ere yey mic wok i cingan; rupiri adieri neno waŋin cale neno waŋ Were, gi nger wor m'ijolan gine.
Mondo yey mic m'okel rin, rupiri Were otiyo kodan gi wor, aka rupiri anitie gi ma romo.” Yakobo oywaki gi Esau cuka ojolo mic.
Esau owaco ni, “Weyi wakadhi i yo mawan, aka abino telo wiyin.”
To Yakobo dwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ paran iŋeyo nike nyithindho joŋic, aka aripo paro kwoŋ mwendi gi dhok ma jonitie gi nyithindhi gin. K'oredi gi jo ma ndelo acel, joje jobino tho.
Weyi jadwoŋ paran wotel yuwiy ŋeca pere, aka abino luwo moth, cungo kwoŋ woth pa dhok gi nyithindho ma jonitie yuwiyan, cuka atundo bongi jadwoŋ paran i Seyir.”
Esau owaco ni, “Weyi awey rin cwo paran man ma jonitie kodan.”
To Yakobo dwoko ni, “Meno gima kiyenyere. Amito ran nyaka nwaŋo kisa ruwaŋin.”
Ameno Esau omako yo dok Seyir ndelo no.
To Yakobo okadho Sukoth, aka ogeto ot pere, gi kigo dhok ri ogwaŋe pere. Riameno kabedo no olwoŋi ni Sukoth.
Yakobo otundo maber wok i piny Mesopotamia i tindi madwoŋ Sekem, manitie i piny Kanan to ketho kambi pere kenyo.
Onyewo adec lowo no wok bongi wot Hamor ba Sekem gi feza miya kama go oyido oget'iye wema pere.
Kenyo Yakobo oget'iye migam to lwoŋo ni El Elohe Isiraili.
Ndelo acel, Dina nyar Leya m'onywolo ri Yakobo okidho wendo ri mon mar'adec.
Munyo Sekem wod pa Hamor Jahivi m'oyido obedo rwoth mar'adec oneno go, otero go to riyo go nindo gine.
Aka cuny Sekem oywayo go bongi Dina nyar Yakobo; omito go aka oweco gine.
Ameno Sekem oluwo gi bamere Hamor ka waco ni, “Nywom ran nyako me wobedi dhako paran.”
Yakobo owinjo ni Sekem oriyo nyare Dina nindo gine; to wote oyido jonitie i sa gi dhok pere, ameno go obedo moth cuka jodwoko.
Ba Sekem Hamor okidho bongi Yakobo luwo gine.
Wot Yakobo jodwoko wok i sa munyo jowinjo kwoŋe; aka jobwok to nge mako jo swa, rupiri Sekem oyido okelo amien i Isiraili munyo go onindo gi nyar Yakobo. Kole nger gino oyido kiripi timirok.
Hamor ba Sekem owaco ri Yakobo gi wote ni, “Cuny wodan Sekem oywayo go bongi nyarin; mondo yey jowonywomere.
Nywomere win gi wan; miy wan win nyir mewin, aka witer nyir mawan.
Wilabedo gi wan; aka wilabedo kama wimito je, wilatimo mitan, to wibedo gi lim iye.”
Sekem owaco ri ba Dina gi wutmin go ni, “Weyi anwaŋ wor ruwaŋin, aka gim'inowaci je ran abino miyo.
Waci ran mic m'imito, aka ikethi nywom malo paka imito; alamiyin gimoro je ma inokway, nyaka miyan nyako wobedi dhako paran.”
Rupiri Sekem oyido okelo wickwot ri nyamin jo Dina, wot Yakobo jodwoko go gi bamere Hamor gi banirok.
Jowaco rigo ni, “Wakinyali weyo nyamin wan to nywomere gi ŋata k'othumere, rupiri meno bino bedo giwickwot riwan.
Nyaka i gimoro acel ama wanyalo yerok kodin, nike wilalokere paka wan aka kisi jacwo je wothumere.
Nyaka wabino miyo win nyir mawan, aka wan bende to watero nyir mewin, to wabedo gi win, to walokere ji acel.
To ka wik'owinji wan to withumere, onyo walakwanyo nyar wan to wakadho.”
Wac pajo osiemo Hamor gi wode Sekem.
Aka jayac k'ogalo gi timo gino, rupiri oyido omito nyar Yakobo. Onyo go am'oyido nitie gi dwoŋ swa i peco pajo gipi.
Ameno Hamor gi wode Sekem jokidho i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ pajo, aka joluwo gi ji ka jowaco ni,
“Cwo me jobedo merin mawan; weyi win jowobedi i lowo me gi wan, aka jowotimi mitan i iye; rupiri panen, lowo lac ma romo jo. Weyi wanywom nyir pajo, aka bende wamiy jo nyir mawan.
To nyaka i gime kende ama cwo me jolayere bedo gi wan, to walokere ji acel; nike kisi jacwo i dier wan wothumere paka jo.
Kere dhok pajo, lim pajo g'ogwaŋe pajo k'obedi mawan! Nyaka weyi wayere gi jo, to jobedo kanyacel gi wan.”
Aka ji je m'oyido jokidho i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ jowinjo Hamor gi wode Sekem aka kisi jacwo othumere.
I ndelo mar'adek, munyo cwo fodi jonitie gi adhola, ario kwoŋ cwo pa Yakobo, Simeo gi Levi, wutmin Dina jokwanyo abor aka jobino i tindi madwoŋ ma k'oŋeyere to joneko cwo je.
Joneko Hamor gi wode Sekem aka jokwanyo nyamin jo Dina wok i ot pa Sekem to jokadho gine.
Kenyo wot Yakobo jobino kwoŋ cwo m'oneki, aka jonyaga tindi madwoŋ ma culo kwor ma wickwot pa nyamin jo.
Jotero mwendi pajo, dhok, gi punde pajo, kodi kisi gimoro m'oyido nitie i tindi madwoŋ kodi i ndelin
lim pajo, nyithindho pajo je kodi mon pajo, kisi gim'oyido nitie i udi jomako.
Kenyo Yakobo owaco ri Simeo gi Levi ni, “Wikelo teko kwoŋan gi miyo ji ma piny me jowodakan; Jokanan gi Joperiz. Anigi cwo manok, aka ka jocokere to jomonjan, jolareyan gi peco paran.”
To jodwoko go ni, “Go nyalo tero nyamin wan paka malaya?”
Were owaco ri Yakobo ni, “Ay malo ikadhi malo i Bethel, aka igeti kenyo migam ri Were m'omenyere rin munyo ikwale kwoŋ omin in Esau.”
Ameno Yakobo owaco ri jopeco pere kodi jono je m'oyido nitie gi go ni, “Kethi win gicen werin pa jopath ma jonitie i dier win, aka wilokere maleŋ to wiwiro ruk mewin.
Walaay ka to wakidho malo i Bethel, ŋey ageti kenyo migam ri Were m'odwokan i ndelo ma kidamba paran aka otieko bedo kodan kisi kam'atieko kidh'iye.”
Ameno jomiyo Yakobo werin pa jopath je, kodi milom m'oyido ni ithi jo; aka Yakobo okano jo i tiendi olwa m'oyido nitie cegin gi Sekem.
Aka munyo jowotho, lworo madwoŋ wok bongi Were opodho kwoŋ tindin madongo m'oyido cegin kenyo, ma jok'onyalo riemo wot Yakobo.
Yakobo gi ji m'oyido go nitie gine jotundo i Luz (Bethel), manitie i piny Kanan,
aka ogeto kenyo migam to lwoŋo kabedo no ni El Bethel,
Aka Debora ŋeca pa Rebeka otho kenyo t'iyiko go i tiendi olwa i Bethel; ameno olwoŋi kenyo ni Alon Bakuth.
Were omenyere ri Yakobo kendo munyo go owok Padanaram, aka omiyo go silwany.
Aka Were owaco rigo ni, “Nyingin Yakobo; doko nyingin k'olwoŋ ni Yakobo, to Isiraili bino bedo nyingin.” Ameno nyinge ilwoŋo ni Isiraili.
Aka Were owaco rigo ni, “Abedo Were Majameni je. Nywol inyay; nonin lawok kwoŋin, aka ilabedo kwari kerin.
Lowo m'amiyo Abraham gi Isaka alamiyin, aka abino miyo nyikwayin ma joluwin.”
Kenyo Were okadho malo wok bongi Yakobo i kabedo ma Were oluw'iye gine.
Aka Yakobo ogeto kenyo kama Were oluw'iye gine siro ma tele; aka okonjo i wiye vini gi mo.
Ameno Yakobo olwoŋo kabedo ma Were oluw'iye gine ni Bethel.
Kenyo jowotho wok Bethel, aka munyo fodi jonitie bor ye gi Efrath, ŋedi ocakere gi Laker to nywol bedo rigo matek.
Munyo litho pere ma nywol omedere, dhako ma colo mon owaco rigo ni, “Ikir'ilwor, rupiri onyo ilabedo gi wodin.”
Aka munyo cunye cot (rupiri go otho) ocwoko nyinge ni Benon
Ameno Laker otho, aka oyiki go i yo ma kidho Efrath (meno Bethelehem)
Yakobo ogeto siro i wi kaliel pere; obedo siro ma kayik pa Laker, aka nitie kiri konon.
Yakobo owotho, aka ogero wema pere kalo acurcur ma Eder.
Onyo wot Yakobo oyido jonitie apar g'ario.
Wot Leya; Ruben (kayo pa Yakobo), Simeo, Levi, Yuda, Isakar, kodi Zebulun.
Wot Laker; Yozefu kodi Benyamin.
Wot Biliha, ŋeca pa Laker; Dan gi Nafital.
Wot Zilipa, ŋeca pa Leya; Gad gi Aser. Me wot Yakobo m'onywol rigo gi Padanaram.
Onyo Isaka oyido jaoro 180
aka oywe macowe to tho munyo oti swa; to wote, Esau gi Yakobo joyiko go.
Me a nyikway Esau, ma bende ilwoŋo ni Edom.
Esau onywomo mon pere wok bongi Jokanan; Ada nyar Elon Jahiti, Oholibama nyar Ana wod pa Zibeon Jahivi,
kodi Basemath, nyar Isimayil nyamin Nebayoth.
Ada onywolo Elifaz, aka Basemath onywolo Reuel.
Oholibama onywolo Yeus, Yalam, kodi Kora. Me a wot Esau m'onywol rigo i piny Kanan.
Kenyo Esau okwanyo mon pere, wote, nyir pere, kodi jopeco pere je, dhok pere, ogwaŋe pere je, kodi lim pere je m'oyido olimo i piny Kanan, aka okidho i piny mabor gi omin go Yakobo.
Rupiri lim pajo oyido dit swa rijo bedo kanyacel. Lowo m'oyido jobed'iye k'onyalo thielo jo ro dhok pajo mathoth.
Ameno Esau obedo i piny matendere tendere ma Edom.
Me nyikway Esau ba Joedom i piny matendere tendere ma Edom.
Me a nyingi wot Esau; Elifaz wod pa Ada cipa Esau, Reuel wod pa Basemath cipa Esau.
Wot Elifaz obedo; Teman, Omar, Zefo, Gatam, kodi Kenaz.
(Timina oyido obedo malaya pa Elifaz wod pa Esau, aka go onywolo ri Elifaz wode Amalek.) Me a wot Ada, cipa Esau.
Me a wot Reuel; Nahath, Zera, Sama, Miza. Me wot Basemath cipa Esau.
Me a wot Oholibama nyar Ana wod pa Zibeon m'onywolo ri Esau; Yeus, Yalam, kodi Kora.
Me a nonin pa wot Esau. Wod Esau makayo Elifaz obedo kwari nonin ma Teman, Omar, Zefo, Kenaz,
Kora, Gatam, kodi Amalek. Me obedo nonin pa Elifaz i piny Edom; aka jobedo wot Ada.
Wod Esau Reuel obedo kwari nonin ma Nahath, Zera, Sama, kodi Miza. Me nonin pa Reuel i piny Edom; jobedo wot Basemath cipa Esau.
Me a nonin m'owok kwoŋ Esau kwoŋ cege Oholibama, nyar Ana; Yeus, Yalam, kodi Kora
Nonin me je jowok kwoŋ Esau.
Ji won m'otire ma piny Edom oyido jopokere i nonin ma kwarere pajo obedo nyikway Edom, janono pa Hor: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana, Dison, Ezer, kodi Disan.
Lotan oyido obedo kwari nonin ma Hor kodi Heman. (Lotan oyido nitie gi nyamin m'ilwoŋo ni Timina.)
Sobal oyido obedo kwari nonin ma Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Sefo, kodi Onam.
Zibeon oyido nitie gi wote ario, Aya kodi Ana. Me Ana m'onwaŋo waŋ pi malieth i thim munyo kwayo punde pa bamere.
Ana oyido obedo ba Dison, m'oyido obedo kwari nonin ma Hemdan, Esiban, Ithiran, kodi Keran. Ana oyido nitie gi nyare m'ilwoŋo ni Oholibama.
Ezer oyido obedo kwari nonin ma Bilihan, Zavan, kodi Akan.
Disan oyido obedo kwari nonin ma Uzi kodi Aran.
Me a nonin ma piny Edom; Lotan Sobal Zibeon, Ana, Dison, Ezer, kodi Disan.
Me a kerin ma jodhumo i piny Edom, mafodi kere moro je jok'odhumo Joisiraili.
Bela wod pa Bewor ma tindi madwoŋ Dinhaba.
Bela otho, aka Yobab wod pa Zera ma Bozra olunjo waŋe.
Yobab otho, aka Husam ma piny Teminan olunjo waŋe.
Husam otho, aka Hadad wod pa Bedadi ma tindi madwoŋ Avith, m'okengila Midian i piny Mowab olunjo waŋe.
Hadad otho, aka Samila ma Masireka olunjo waŋe.
Samila otho, aka Saulo ma Rehoboth i malawa Yufrete olunjo waŋe.
Saulo otho, aka Bal Hanan wod pa Akor olunjo go.
Bal Hanan otho, aka Hadar ma tindi madwoŋ Pau olunjo waŋe. Nyingi cege oyido ilwoŋo ni Mehetabel, nyar Matiredi ma Mezahab.
Me a nyingi nonin ma Esau obedo kwari jo, i pecin pajo kodi kabedo pajo, i nyingi jo: Jobedo Timina, Alvan, Yetheth,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibizar
Magidiel, kodi Iram. Me nonin ma Edom (Esau ba Edom). Kisi kama nonin me jobed'iye olwoŋi gi nyingi jo.
Yakobo obedo i lowo ma bamere oyido obed'iye, i piny Kanan.
Me kigana ma mako kwoŋ peco pa Yakobo.
Yozefu, jayac ma jaoro apar g'abirio, oyido kwayo mwendi gi wutmin go; wot Biliha kodi Zilipa mon pa bamere. Yozefu oyido osa ri bamere gimarac ma wutmin go oyido jotimo.
Yakobo oyido omaro Yozefu loyo nyithindho pere man, rupiri oyido obedo wode ma tiyo; aka okwoyo ri Yozefu kanzu ma cinge bor.
To munyo wutmin go joneno ni bajo omaro Yozefu loyo joje, jok'omaro go, aka oyido jokiluwi gine gi siem.
Onyo to Yozefu leko, aka munyo owaco ri wutmin go, nyaka jok'omaro go kiri loyo.
Owaco rijo ni, “Winji win lek me, m'aleko.
Neni, oyido watweyo withi ŋano i ndelo, aka neni withe paran ocungo malo m'otire; aka neni within mewin jocokere thoko to jokule ri aparan.”
Wutmin jopenjo go ni, “Adieri iladhumo wan? Kosa adieri ilabedo gi meni kwoŋ wan?” Ameno jodak go doko kiri loyo ro lek pere gi ro wac pere.
Kenyo Yozefu doko oleko lek man, aka owaco ri wutmin go; aka owaco, “Neni, doko aleko lek man, aka neni, waŋceŋ, dwe, gi micalin apar g'acel oyido jokule piny ran.”
To munyo go owaco lek me ri bamere gi wutmin go, bamere obwoko go aka owaco ni, “Lek aŋo m'ileko me? Iparo ni an gi yokin, kodi wutmin in adieri walabino to wakule piny ruwaŋin?”
Wutmin Yozefu jomako nyeko gi go, to bamere okano wac me i paro pere.
Ndelo acel wutmin Yozefu jokidho kwayo mwendi pa bamere cegin gi Sekem.
Aka Yakobo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Kere wutmin in jokikway mwendi i Sekem? Biye alaorin bongi jo.”
Yozefu odwoko ni, “Ayikere.”
Ameno Yakobo owaco rigo ni, “Kadhi pama, ineni ka wutmin in jober, kanyacel gi mwendi; aka idwok'iwaci ran doko.” Ameno Yakobo ooro go wok milelo Hebron, to go bino Sekem.
Jal moro onwaŋo go tangatanga i sa aka openjo go ni, “Irango aŋo?”
Yozefu odwoko ni, “Arango wutmin an. Mondo waci ran kama jokway'iye mwendi.”
Jalo owaco rigo ni, “Jotieko kadho woko. Kole awinjo ka jowaco ni, ‘Weyi wakadhi i Dothan.’ ” Ameno Yozefu oluwo wutmin to nwaŋo jo i Dothan.
Wutmin joneno go gi bor, aka mafodi k'otundo cegin gi jo joyere neko go.
Jowaco wegi gi wegi ni, “Jalek ee bino.
Biye win, weyi waneki go aka wabol i bur acel; to wawaco ni ogwaŋ madudi ocamo go, aka nyaka walaneno gima lek pere olokere.”
To munyo Ruben owinjo, obotho go wok i cingi jo, ka waco ni, “Wakiri waneki win go.
Wikiri wioy remo; bol win go i bur ka, i thim, to wikiri wikethi cingi win kwoŋe.” Ruben owaco gime ŋey wobothi go, aka wodwoki go bongi bamere.
Ameno munyo Yozefu otundo bongi jo, jolunyo kwoŋe kanzu pere, kanzu mabor ma jacinge mabor
aka jotero go to jobolo i bur. Bur oyido othwo, pi oyido ongoy'iye.
Kenyo jobedo piny cemo, aka munyo jotiŋo waŋ gin malo joneno kitipa pa Joisimayili jowotho wok Giliad jokidho Misir. Ŋamia pajo oyido otiŋo gigipiny maŋwe kur, kodi vini m'othwo.
Kenyo Yuda owaco ri wutmin ni, “Cwe aŋo ma walalimo ka waneko omin wan to waumo tho pere?
Weyi watana win go ri Joisimayili me, aka cingi wan wokiri wobedi kwoŋe rupiri go omin wan, aka delkwoŋ wan.” Aka wutmin go joyere.
Aka munyo Jomidian moro ma jomitan joluwo kenyo, jofudho Yozefu wok i bur, aka jotana go gi jono ma feza piero ario aka jono jotero go Misir.
Munyo Ruben ogik i bur to nwaŋo ni Yozefu oyido ongoye i bur, oyeco woko nangin pere
aka ogik bongi wutmin go to waco ni, “Jayac ongoye kaca! Aŋo m'akidho timo?”
Kenyo jokwanyo kanzu pa Yozefu, aka jothumo diel, to jorwako kanzu i remo.
Jotero kanzu manitie gi cinge mabor bongi bajo aka jowaco ni, “Wanwaŋo gime; neni k'obedo kanzu pa wodin kosa be.”
Aka oniaŋ kwoŋe to waco ni, “Obedo kanzu pa wodan; ogwaŋ madudi ocamo go; Yozefu m'ongoye kiganagana oyec woko i muma.”
Yakobo oyeco woko nangin pere i rem to ruko kutiya to ywako wode ma ndelo kweth.
Wote gi nyir pere je jobino kweyo cunye, to go okwero ni wokwey cunye aka owaco ni, “Be, alakidho i piny pa jom'otho kafodi aywako wodan.” Ameno omedere ywako wode Yozefu.
Korin Jomidian oyido jotana go i Misir ri Potifa, m'oyido obedo jatel pa jokur cel pa kere.
Otimere nike i hongo no Yuda oeye bongi wutmin go, to kidho bedo gi jal m'ilwoŋo ni Hira m'oyido wok i tindi Adulam.
Kenyo Yuda onen'iye nyar Jakanan m'ilwoŋo ni Suwa; onywomo go to nindo gine.
Suwa ogamo iye to nywolo wode, aka ocwoko nyinge ni Eri.
Ogamo iye kendo to nywolo wode aka ocwoko nyinge ni Onan.
Kendo go ogamo iye to nywolo wode, aka ocwoko nyinge ni Sela. Go oyido nitie i Kezib munyo nywolo Sela.
Aka Yuda onywomo ri Eri wode makayo cege m'ilwoŋo ni Tamar.
To Eri, wod pa Yuda makayo oyido jakidakana ruwaŋ Rwoth, to Rwoth neko go.
Kenyo Yuda owaco ri wode Onan ni, “Kadhi inindi gi ciliendi omin in, aka itimi tic pa jacwo rigo, t'inywolo nyithindho r'omin in.”
To Onan niaŋ ni nyithindho oyido jok'obedi apere, ameno munyo go okidho to nindo gi ciliendi omin, ojayo piny, ŋey wokiri wonywol r'omin.
Aka gima go otimo k'osangala Rwoth to Rwoth neko go bende.
Kenyo Yuda owaco ri Tamar ni, “Dok idoŋ citho i ot pa benin cuka wodan Sela odongi.” Owaco gime rupiri olworo ni Sela bende nyalo tho paka wutmin go. Ameno Tamar odok to bedo i ot pa bamere.
I hongo moro cipa Yuda nyar Suwa otho. Munyo hongo ma ywak orumo, Yuda gi mere pere Hira ma Adulam jokidho Timina, kam'oyido oliel'iye rombo pere.
Aka munyo owaci ri Tamar ni ba cwore oyido kidho Timina lielo rombo pere,
olunyo nanga pere ma citho to umo waŋe gi kitambala to bedo i waŋkac ma donjo Enayim i yo ma kidho Timina; rupiri go oneno ni Sela oyido otieko odongo aka fodi k'omiy go i nywomirok.
Munyo Yuda oneno go, oparo ni manago malaya, rupiri go oyido oumo waŋe.
Okidho bonge i thengi royo to waco ni, “Biye anindi kodin.” Rupiri go oyido okuya ni manago ciwode.
Tamar openjo go ni, “Aŋo m'ilamiyan ŋey inindi kodan?”
Yuda odwoko ni, “Aladhiro rin nyathi diel wok kwoŋ mwendi paran.”
Tamar odwoko ni, “Singa ran gimoro cuka inodhir ran diel.”
Yuda openjo ni, “Ginaŋo m'anosinga rin?”
Tamar odwoko ni, “Peta perin manitie iye nyingin gi thol mere kodi luth manitie i cingin.” Yuda omiyo go to nindo gine aka ogamo iye.
Tamar oay to kadho, aka ogonyo woko kitambala pere to ruko nanga pere ma citho.
Yuda ooro mere pere Hira Jadulam gi nyathi diel, ŋey wojol gim'osinga wok i cingi dhako, to Hira k'onwaŋo go.
Hira openjo cwo ma kabedo no ni, “Nikune malaya m'oyido nitie i Enayim i thengi royo?”
Cwo no jodwoko ni, “Fodi ongoye malaya m'obedo ka.”
Ameno Hira ogik bongi Yuda aka owaco rigo ni, “Akinwaŋo go, aka kiri cwo ma Enayim jowaco ni fodi ongoye malaya m'obedo kenyo.”
Yuda odwoko ni, “Weyi go wokur gigipiny no, paka apere, ji jokiri jowonyer wan. Adhiro rigo diel me, t'ikinwaŋo go.”
Munyo dwe ma romo adek okadho, owaci ri Yuda ni, “Ciwodin Tamar otimere pa malaya, aka onyo ogamo iye.”
Yuda owaco ni, “Wodhi win go wowaŋ.”
Munyo oyido iwodho go, Tamar odhiro wac ri ba cwore ni, “Won gigipiny me am'agamo gine iyan. Kaŋasa jo akinen ni apa ŋa, peta gi nyinge manitie i iye, thol kodi luth me.”
Yuda oniaŋ kwoŋ jo aka owaco ni, “Go otire loyan, paka akimiyo go wodan Sela.” Aka Yuda doko k'onindo gine.
Munyo hongo otundo rigo ma nywol, onwaŋere ni go oyido nitie gi ici ma rut.
Aka munyo ŋedi ocakere gine, acel owodho cinge woko, aka jacol mon otweyo iye uzi m'obokere ka waco ni, “Me am'otelo wok.”
To munyo odwoko cinge, neni omin go owok; aka jacol mon owaco ni, “Ameno apaka oturo yo pere woko!” Riameno ocwoki go ni Perez.
Rumacen omin owok gi uzi m'obokere i cinge, aka ocwoki ni Zera.
Onyo Joisimayili oyido jotero Yozefu i piny Misir, aka Potifa, acel kwoŋ jodhum pa Farawo m'oyido obedo jatel pa jokur ma cel pa kere am'onyewo go.
Rwoth oyido nitie gi Yozefu, aka obedo jacwo ma kisi gimoro okidho gi go maber. Go obedo i ot pa jadwoŋ pere ma Jamisir.
Aka jadwoŋ pere oneno nike Rwoth oyido nitie gine, aka ni Rwoth omiyo kisi gima go otimo kidho maber.
Ameno Yozefu onwaŋo wor i waŋ Potifa, aka oketho go janeno ma ot pere to ketho go kuro kisi gim'oyido apere.

Wok i hongo ma Potifa oketho Yozefu janeno i ot pere kodi kwoŋ gim'oyido go nitie gine je, Rwoth omiyo ot pa Jamisir silwany ro Yozefu; silwany pa Rwoth oyido nikwoŋ kisi gima go oyido nitie gine, i ot kodi i ndelin.
Ameno Potifa oweyo kisi gima go oyido nitie gine i cingi Yozefu aka k'odewo kwoŋ gimoro je kwanyo woko cemo ma go ocamo.
Onyo Yozefu oyido ocweyere maber, aka ŋon.
Aka munyo hongo moro okadho, cipa jadwoŋ pere obolo waŋe kwoŋ Yozefu, aka owaco ni, “Nindi kodan.”
To Yozefu okwero to waco ni, “Neni, jadwoŋ paran kidew kwoŋ gimoro je i ot rupiri anitie ka. Go oketho kisi gim'anitie gine i cingan.
Anigi dwoŋ madit i ot me paka go nitie gine, aka go k'okano gimoro je kwoŋan kwanyowoko in, rupiri ibedo cege. T'onyo d'anotim kidakana madwoŋ me t'atimo reco kwoŋ Were?”
Aka makada nende go oluwo gi Yozefu ndelo gi ndelo, k'owinjo go nindo gine, kosa bedo gine.
To ndelo acel, munyo Yozefu odonjo i ot timo tic pere, aka ongoye kwoŋ ŋecin ma ot m'oyido nicegin,
omako go gi kanzu pere aka owaco ni, “Nindi kodan.” To Yozefu obudhere to weyo kanzu pere i cinge aka oŋweco to wok i ot.
Munyo go oneno ni go oweyo kanzu pere i cinge, aka oŋweco to wok i ot,
go olwoŋo ŋecin ma ot pere aka owaco ni, “Neni, Jayuda ma cworan okelo ka me onyo timo roro kwoŋ wan. Obino i kisika paran nindo kodan t'akoko malo.
Aka munyo go owinjo ni atiŋo dwondan aywak, oweyo kanzu pere i cingan to ringo wok i ot.”
Kenyo go okano kanzu pere gi go, cuka jadwoŋ pa Yozefu odwoko peco.
Kenyo go owaco rigo wac acel ni, “Ŋeca ma Jayuda m'ikelo i dier wan, obino i kisika paran to timo roro kwoŋan.
To tekin atiŋo dwondan t'aywak, go oweyo kanzu pere kabutan to ŋweco wok i ot.”
Munyo jadwoŋ pere owinjo wac ma cege oluwo rigo, “Me apaka ŋeca perin oteran,” Nge pere oliel.
Jadwoŋ pa Yozefu otero go to ketho i jiera, kam'oyido ikan'iye jojiera pa kere; aka go obedo kenyo.
To Rwoth oyido nitie gi Yozefu aka onyutho go mar makiwire, aka omiyo go wor i waŋ jakur jiera.
Aka jakur jiera omiyo Yozefu kuro jojiera man je, aka kisi gim'otimi kenyo go am'oyido jatim.
Jakur jiera doko k'okuro gimoro je ma Yozefu oyido kuro rupiri Rwoth oyido nitie gi go, aka kisi gima go otimo, Rwoth omiyo kidho maber.
Hongo moro rumacen ma gime, jadwoŋ pa jotimi vini ri kere kodi jadwoŋ pa jotedi ri kere mugat jotimo raco kwoŋ jadwoŋ pajo kere.
Aka Farawo omako nge kodi jodhum pere ario,
aka oketho jo i twec i ot pa jakur i jiera m'oyido okan'iye Yozefu.
Jakur ma jiera omiyo Yozefu kuro jo, aka jobedo ma hongo malac i jiera.
Wor acel, joje joleko aka lek pa kisi nyatoro oyido nitie gi dwoŋ pere.
Munyo Yozefu obino bongi jo odikin to neno jo, oyido paro pajo onywowere.
Ameno go openjo ni, “Raŋo wicalo joma rembo konon?”
Jodwoko go ni, “Wajoje waleko, aka ongoye ŋat'otiti riwan dwoŋ pajo.”
Yozefu owaco ni, “Obedo Were ama miyo nyalo ma tito lek. Akwayo wiwaci ran lek mewin.”
Ameno jatel pa jotimi vini owaco ri Yozefu lek pere ni, “I lek paran oyido nitie yath vini ruwaŋan,
aka oyido nitie gi jange adek. Tekin boke mere lothi, othiwo, to nyinge cek.
Kikopo pa Farawo oyido nitie i cingan, aka akwanyo nyingi vini t'abiy'iye, aka amiyo go i cinge.”
Yozefu owaco ni, “Me dwoŋ mere. Jangi vini adek jobedo ndelo adek.
I ndelo adek Farawo bino gonyin to dwokin i kabedo perin; aka doko ilaketho kikopo pa Farawo i cinge paka con mere munyo oyido ijatel pa jotimi rigo vini.
To poyan, ka ber kodin aka itimi ran wor akwayin tucan ri Farawo t'ikonyan wok i ot me.
Rupiri okwalan adieri wok i piny pa Joebulaniya, aka kiri ka, ongoye gim'atimo ma ripo wokethan i jiera.”
Munyo jatel pa jotedi mugat oneno ni dwoŋ ma lek pa jatel pa jotimi vini ber ye, owaco ri Yozefu ni, “An bende aleko ni, oyido atiŋo aditin adek ma mugat i wiyan,
aka iy'adita ma wiye mere oyido nitie nger cemo je m'otedi ri Farawo, to winyin oyido jocamo wok iy'adita gi wiyan.”
Yozefu odwoko ni, “Me dwoŋ mere. Aditin adek meno ndelo adek.
I ndelo adek Farawo bino ŋado wiyin to ŋawin wi yath aka winyin jobino camo delkwoŋin.”
I ndelo mar'adek, m'oyido obedo ndelo ma poyo nywolirok pa Farawo, otimo kalima ri ŋecin pere je, aka ogonyo jatel pa jotimi vini kodi jatel pa jotedi mugat.
Odwoko jatel pa jotimi vini i kabedo pere, aka oketho kikopo i cingi Farawo,
to ŋawo jatel pa jotedi mugat paka Yozefu oyido otito rijo.
To jatel pa jotimi vini k'opoyo Yozefu, wiye owil gi go.
Rumacen ma oro ario gipi, Farawo oleko nike go oyido ocungo cegin gi malawa Nayil
aka neni, dhok abirio ma ragaŋ ma joleny jowok i malawa Nayil camo lum midole.
Aka panen, dhok abirio man ma moso aka jomok, jowok wok i malawa Nayil, aka jocungo cegin gi dhok meca mere.
Aka dhok ma moso aka jomok jocamo dhok ma ragaŋ ma joleny. Aka Farawo ocew.
Doko nindo okwalo go aka doko oleko. Aka panen, withi ŋano abirio, ma jopoŋ aka jocek oyido jodongo i kanja acel.
Aka neni, withi ŋano abirio man jowok, mathindho aka jothwo gi koyo mar'abar.
Aka withi ŋano mathindho jomwonyo woko withi ŋano ma jopoŋ. Farawo ocew, aka neni oyido obedo lek.
Ameno odikin go oyido rembo, aka ooro wolwoŋi rigo jothieth ma Misir gi jorieko je. Farawo owaco rijo lek pere, to ngoye ŋat'onyalo tito.
Kenyo jatel pa jotimi vini owaco ri Farawo ni, “Apoyo komo paran konon.
Munyo imako nge gi ŋecin perin, t'iketho an gi jatel pa jotedi mugat i jiera i ot pa jotel pa jokur,
waleko wor acel, aka kisi lek oyido nitie gi dwoŋ mere.
Jayuda majayac oyido nitie kenyo gi wan, ŋeca pa jatel pa jokur. Aka munyo wawaco rigo, otito lek mawan, to tito ri kisi nyatoro lek pere.
Aka paka go otito riwan, ameno apaka obedo. Idwokan i kabedo paran, t'iŋawo jatel pa jotedi mugat.”
Farawo ooro to lwoŋo Yozefu, aka okeli go piyo wok i jiera. Munyo go otieko lielirok to wiro nangin pere, obino ruwaŋ kere.
Aka Farawo owaco rigo ni, “Aleko, aka ongoye ŋata nyalo tito, t'awinjo iwaco ni k'iwinjo lek inyalo tito.”
Yozefu odwoko Farawo ni, “K'obedo an; Were bino miyo tito maber.”
Kenyo Farawo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Neni, i lek paran oyido acungo cegin gi thengi malawa Nayil
aka dhok abirio ma ragaŋ ma joleny jowok i Nayil camo lum midole.
Aka dhok abirio man ma moso aka jomok. Jobedo dhok mareco swa kwoŋ dhok m'atieko neno kamoro je i Misir.
Dhok ma moso jocamo dhok ma ragaŋ.
To ngoye ŋat'oyido oŋey rupiri oyido fodi joreco paka i cakirok. Kenyo acew.
An bende aneno i lek paran withi ŋano abirio jodongo i kanja acel m'oyido jopoŋ aka jocek,
kodi withi ŋano abirio ma jothwo aka thindho aka koyo mar'abar owaŋo jo
aka ithe abirio mathindho jomwonyo woko ithe abirio ma jopoŋ. Aka awaco ri jothieth paran, to ngoye ŋat'oyido nyalo tito ran.”
Yozefu owaco ri Farawo ni, “Lek ario jonyutho gimoro acel. Were omenyo rin gima go cegin timo.
Dhok abirio ma ragaŋ meno oro abirio, aka withi ŋano abirio ma jopoŋ meno oro abirio. Jonyutho dwoŋ acel.
Dhok abirio ma moso ma jowok rumacen kodi withi ŋano mathindho ma koyo mar'abar owaŋo jobedo oro abirio ma kec.
Obedo paka awaco ri Farawo, Were onyutho Farawo gima go cegin timo.
Bino bedo oro abirio ma dito i lowo ma Misir gipi
aka rumacen, bino bedo oro abirio ma kec, ma k'opoy oro ma dito je i lowo ma Misir. Kec bino kisika woko lowo
aka dito k'oŋeyere ro kec ma bino luwo rupiri bino bedo makec.
Kiluda ma lek perin nyutho ni gime Were am'oketho, aka Were bino ketho i kare macegin.”
“Onyo riameno weyi Farawo woyeri jacwo mariek aka ma neno yuwaŋe to ketho go kuro Misir gipi.
Weyi Farawo bende woyeri jodhum man kwanyo acel wiy abic ma cemo ma lowo ma Misir i ndir ma oro abirio ma dito.
Weyi jowocoki cemo je ma oro abirio maber ma bino, aka miy jo meni ma kano ŋano i tindin madongo to jokuro.
Cemo no bino bedo dero ri piny i oro abirio ma kec ma kidho bino i Misir ŋey ji jokiri joriy kec.”
Rieko me oneno maber ri Farawo gi jodhum pere
Aka Farawo owaco ri jodhum pere ni, “Wakibino nwaŋo jacwo maber loyo Yozefu, jacwo ma cuny pa Were nitie i go.”
Ameno Farawo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Paka Were otieko nyuthin gime je, ongoye ŋati ma neno yuwaŋe aka riek paka in.
Alakethin dhumo piny paran, aka ji je jolawinjo cik perin. Dwoŋ perin bino bedo mar'ario nyaka ri an.”
Aka Farawo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Neni, atieko kethin dhumo lowo ma Misir je.”
Kenyo Farawo okwanyo peta pere ma oro ma ketho gine cinge i ndiko wok i lwet cinge, aka oketho i lwet cingi Yozefu. Oruko rigo nangin mafoth, aka oruko rigo thiwino ma zahabu i ŋute.
Omiyo go gweyo cawila pere mar'ario aka jokur pere jokadho yuwiy go ka joywak ni, “Tim yo! Tim yo!” Aka ameno okethi Yozefu gavana ma Misir.
Aka kiri Farawo owaco rigo ni, “Abedo Farawo, aka m'ongoye yerok perin ongoye ŋata bino tiŋo cinge kosa tiende i lowo ma Misir.”
Aka Farawo ocwoko nyingi Yozefu ni Zafenath Paneya to miyo go dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Asenath
Yozefu oyido jaoro piero adek munyo ocako tic ri Farawo kere ma Misir.
I ndir ma oro abirio ma dito lowo onywolo cemo gibe.
Aka Yozefu ocoko cemo je to kano i kisi tindin madongo. I kisi tindi go okano cemo ma ndelin m'othoko go.
Oyido nitie ŋano madit ma cale kwoyo ma nam, aka Yozefu oweyo kiri kipima rupiri oyido kipimere.
Mafodi oro ma kec k'otundo, Yozefu onwaŋo wote ario, ma Asenath nyar Potifera onywolo rigo.
Yozefu olwoŋo wode makayo ni Manase rupiri owaco ni, “Were omiyo wiyan wil gi kidamba paran gi ot pa baba.”
Aka nyingi mar'ario olwoŋo ni Efrayim to waco ni, “Were omiyan nyithindho i lowo ma candirok paran.”
Oro abirio ma dito m'obedo i lowo ma Misir otundo i gike,
aka oro abirio ma kec ocako bino paka Yozefu oyido owaco. Kec oyido nitie i kisi piny, to cemo oyido nitie i Misir.
Munyo Jomisir jocako winjo kec, joywak ri Farawo ri cemo aka Farawo owaco rijo ni, “Kidhi win bongi Yozefu aka gima go owaci, tim win.”
Ameno munyo kec olak i piny gibe, Yozefu oyawo dere aka otana gi Jomisir rupiri kec oyido olak i piny Misir paka rom.
Aka kiri, piny gibe jobino Misir bongi Yozefu nyewo ŋano rupiri kec oyido gway kisi kamoro.
Munyo Yakobo oniaŋ ni ŋano oyido nitie Misir, owaco ri wote ni, “Raŋo wiŋiyere kisi nyatoro?
Neni, awinjo ni ŋano nitie Misir; lori win wikidhi winyew riwan cemo moro wakiri wiriy kec.”
Ameno wutmin Yozefu apar joloro nyewo ŋano i Misir.
To Yakobo k'ooro Benyamin omin Yozefu gi wutmin rupiri olworo ni lifol nyalo podho kwoŋe.
Wot Yakobo gi joman jobino nyewo ŋano rupiri kec oyido nitie i piny Kanan.
Onyo Yozefu am'oyido gavana ma lowo ma Misir. Go am'oyido tana ŋano ri ji wok i piny je. Ameno wutmin Yozefu jobino to jokule ruwaŋ go gi nyim gin piny i lowo.
Yozefu oneno wutmin, aka oniaŋ kwoŋ jo, to go otero jo pa jokicar to luwo gi jo gi gero. Openjo jo ni, “Wiwok kune?”
Jodwoko ni, “Wawok i piny Kanan bino nyewo cemo.”
Ameno Yozefu oniaŋ kwoŋ wutmin, to jok'oniaŋ kwoŋe.
Aka Yozefu opoyo lek ma go oleko kwoŋ jo aka owaco rijo ni, “Wibedo jopendo wibino neno nyapo ma piny mawan.”
Jodwoko ni, “Be, jadwoŋ, ŋecin perin jobino nyewo cemo.
Wabedo wot jacwo acel. Wabedo jor'adieri aka wakibedo jopendo.”
Yozefu owaco rijo ni, “Be, obedo nyapo ma piny mawan ama wibino niaŋ kwoŋe.”
Jowaco ni, “Wan ŋecin perin oyido wabedo wutmere apar g'ario, wot jacwo acel i lowo ma Kanan. Aka panen, ocoko pama nitie gi bawan, aka acel otho.”
To Yozefu owaco rijo ni, “Obedo paka awaco riwin ni wibedo jopendo.
Me apaka ibino temo win: Akwoŋere gi nyingi Farawo ni wikilaeye ka kwanyowoko ka wikelo ocoko mewin ka.
Or win acel kwoŋ win aka weyi go wokel omin win, ka widoŋ i jiera ŋey wac mewin wotem, k'adieri nitie i win. Kakameno, adieri paka Farawo kwo, wibedo jopendo.”
Aka oketho joje kanyacel i jiera ma ndelo adek.
I ndelo mar'adek Yozefu owaco rijo ni, “An alworo Were, tim win gime aka wilakwo.
Ka wibedo cwo ma jor'adieri weyi omin win acel wodoŋ i jiera, aka weyi wi ji ma widoŋ witer ŋano ri pecin mewin ma joriyo kec, ŋano ma winyewo.
Aka wikel ocoko mewin ŋey wac mewin wotweny aka wikilatho.”
Joyere i gime.
Kenyo jowaco wegi ni, “Ey, onyo pama wacandere ro gima watimo ri omin wan; waneno teko madwoŋ ma go oyido nitie iye munyo okwayo wan kony, to wakinyalo winjo. Meno am'omiyo wanitie i teko pama.”
Ruben odwoko jo ni, “Awaco riwin ni wakiri wamiy jayac litho, to wikinyalo winjo. Ameno pama iculo wan ro tho pere.”
Jok'oŋeyo ni Yozefu oyido niaŋ gima jowaco rupiri oyido nitie ŋata loko wac i dier jo.
Yozefu oeye bongi jo to cako ywak. Munyo geregere ogik, odwoko bongi jo, aka okwanyo Simeo to tweyo go ruwaŋ jo won.
Yozefu owodho or ni wopoŋ kutiyin pajo gi ŋano aka wodwoki pesa pa kisi nyatoro i kutiya pere to miyo jo cemo ma woth to jokadho.
Kenyo jopanga ŋano i wi punde pajo to jokadho.
Aka munyo acel kwoŋ jo oyawo kutiya pere ni womiy punde pere cemo kama jonind'iye, onwaŋo pesa pere i dhok kutiya pere.
Owaco ri wutmin ni, “Pesa paran odwoki ran, neni ee i dhok kutiya paran.” Cuny gin opodho aka jocako kirin ka jopenjo ni, “Aŋo ma Were otimo riwan me?”
Munyo jotundo bongi Yakobo bajo i piny Kanan, jowaco rigo kisi gim'oyido otimere rijo:
“Gavana ma Misir oluwo gi wan gi gero aka ocwoko dhok wan ni wabedo jopendo i piny pere.
To wawaco rigo ni, ‘Wabedo cwo ma jor'adieri, wakibedo jopendo;
oyido wabedo wutmere apar g'ario, wot jacwo acel. Omin wan acel otho, aka ocoko fodi nitie i Kanan gi bawan.’
Kenyo jalo odwoko ni, ‘Me apaka abino ŋeyo ni wibedo cwo ma jor'adieri. Weyi win omin win acel kodan, aka win ma widoŋ ter win ŋano ri pecin mewin ma joriyo kec.
Keli win omin win mathin bongan, kenyo nyaka abino ŋeyo ni wikibedo jopendo, to wibedo cwo ma jor'adieri, aka abino dwoko riwin omin win t'ayeyo win bedo ka, kareno witimo mitan.’ ”
Paka jokonjo ŋano wok i kutiya pajo, neni, kisi jacwo onwaŋo thac pesa pere i kutiya pere. Aka munyo joneno pesa, jo kodi bajo je jobwok.
Yakobo owaco rijo ni, “Wimitan akeŋ nyithindho paran je? Yozefu okadho, Simeo okadho, aka onyo pama wimito tero Benyamin bende. An aŋat'acandere!”
Ruben owaco ri bamere ni, “K'inen akidwoko gi Benyamin, inyalo neko wotan ario. Kethi go i cingan, aka abino dwoko go.”
To Yakobo waco ni, “Wodan k'olor gi win, rupiri omin go otho aka go kende am'odoŋ. Gimoro nyalo timere rigo i yo. Abedo jal m'oti, aka litho ma winokel kwoŋan nyalo nekan.”
Onyo kec oyido gway i piny.
Aka munyo peco pa Yakobo jotieko camo ŋano je m'oyido jonyewo wok Misir, Yakobo owaco ri wote ni, “Gik win winyew riwan cemo manok.”
To Yuda odwoko ni, “Jal ca ociko wan teltel ni, kilayeyo wan neno go kwanyo woko ka wakidho kodi omin wan.
K'ilaoro wan g'omin wan, wabino loro to wanyewo cemo;
to k'ikilaoro wan gi go, wakibino loro, rupiri jal ca owaco riwan ni kilayeyo wan neno go kwanyo woko ka wakidho kodi omin wan.”
Yakobo owaco ni, “Raŋo wikelo ran teko madit to wiwaco ri jalo ni winitie kodi omin win man?”

Jodwoko ni, “Jalo obedo kanyo penjo kwoŋ wan gi peco mawan, ‘Bawin fodi kwo? Winitie kodi omin win man?’ Gima wawaco rigo obedo radwok ma penji pere. Oyido wanonyal nedi ŋeyo ni go oyido lawaco riwan ni wakel omin wan?”
Aka Yuda owaco ri bamere ni, “Or jayac kodan, aka wabino kadho dicel. Kenyo ongoye kwoŋ wan ŋata bino riyo kec.
Aciko kwo paran won, aka i penjan go. K'akidwoko go bongin maber, aŋat'abino tero apuse kicutho.
Kabedi oyido wakikuro hongo malac, dinyo watieko kidho to wadwoko dirio.”

Kenyo Yakobo bajo owaco rijo ni, “K'inen ripo bedo ameno, ere kethi win ranyak moro mabeyo ma lowo me i kutiyin mewin, aka witer ri gavana, vini m'othwo, gigipiny maŋwe kur, mo kic, segonya kodi yath alimond.
Ter win bende pesa mirundi ario, rupiri ripo widwoki pesa m'odwok riwin i dhok kutiyin mewin. Kono oyido obedo kibenga.
Ter win omin win bende aka ay win wigik bongi jacwo no.
Weyi Were Majameni je womiy win wor ruwaŋ go, ŋey wodwoki riwin Benyamin kodi Simeo. Ka ripo akeŋ nyithindho paran, ripo akeŋ jo.”
Ameno wutmere jokwanyo mic kodi pesa mirundi ario, aka joay to joloro Misir kodi Benyamin. Kenyo, jocungo ruwaŋ Yozefu.
Munyo Yozefu oneno Benyamin gi jo, owaco ri ŋeca ma ot pere ni, “Ter win cwo me i ot paran, aka ithumi ogwaŋ t'itedo, rupiri cwo me jolacemo kodan sawa aucel.”
Ŋeca no otimo paka Yozefu owaco, aka otero cwo no i ot pa Yozefu.
Munyo oyido itero jo i ot pa Yozefu, jobwok aka jowaco ni, “Okel wan ka ro pesa m'odwok i kutiyin mawan ndir marapena. Jolamonjo wan abwap to jokwanyo punde mawan, to joloko wan ŋecin.”
Ameno joluwo gi ŋeca ma ot pa Yozefu i dhiot,
aka jowaco ni, “Jadwoŋ, waloro piny ka nyewo ŋano i weso marapena
aka munyo watundo i kabedo ma wanind'iye to wayawo kutiyin mawan, pesa pa kisi nyatoro je oyido nitie i dhok kutiya pere; pesa gikululu. Ameno wadwoko gine.
Doko bende wabino gi pesa man nyewo cemo. Wakuya ni ŋa m'oketho pesa mawan i kutiyin mawan.”
Ŋeca no odwoko ni, “Aridho riwin, wikiri wibwok; Were mewin aka Were pa bawin ama ripo bedo ni oketho riwin pesa i kutiyin mewin.” Kenyo go okelo Simeo bongi jo.
Ŋeca no otero jo i ot aka omiyo jo pi ŋey jowolwoki tiendi gin to pidho punde pajo.
Joyiko mic pajo m'amiyo Yozefu k'otundi sawa aucel, rupiri oyido otiek waco rijo ni jolacemo kanyacel gi go.
Munyo Yozefu obino peco, jokelo rigo mic m'oyido jonigine i ot, aka jokule rigo piny.
Yozefu openjo jo kwoŋ kwo pajo aka owaco ni, “Bawin ber, jal m'oti ma wiluwo kwoŋe? Go fodi kwo?”
Jodwoko ni, “Ŋeca perin bawan fodi kwo.” Aka joguro congi gin jo jokule piny ruwaŋ go.
Yozefu otiŋo waŋe malo aka oneno omin go Benyamin wod pa min aka owaco ni, “Me a omin win mathin ma wiluwo kwoŋe? Were womiyin silwany wodan.”
Kenyo Yozefu oeye abwap rupiri cunye oyido opoŋ mar ri omin. Go oyido cegin tur, aka odonjo i kisika pere to ywak.
Munyo otieko lwoko waŋe, owok, aka odhumere to miyo cik ni wotok cemo.
Otok ri Yozefu cemo kakende, aka jo bende kakendi gin. Jomisir m'oyido jocemo kenyo otok rijo cemo kakendi gin rupiri oyido jotero cemo gi Joebulaniya paka amien.
Oyido okethi jo bedo i meza i nywolirok pajo to joŋiyo Yozefu; cako kwoŋ okayo tundo kwoŋ ocoko. Munyo Joneno nger m'oketh'iye jo bedo, joŋiyere i dhier.
Otok rijo cemo wok i meza pa Yozefu aka otok ri Benyamin cemo maloyo apa wadi dibic. Ameno jocemo to jomedho gi Yozefu cuka jomer.
Yozefu omiyo ŋeca ma ot pere cik ni, “Poŋi kutiyin pa cwo no gi cemo madit ma jonyalo tiŋo, aka ikethi pesa pa kisi jacwo i wi kutiya pere
Kethi kikopo paran ma feza i dhok kutiya pa jacwo mathin kodi pesa pere ma ŋano.” Aka ŋeca no otimo paka Yozefu owaco.
Tekin odikin bedo maler, Yozefu osewila jo gi punde pajo.
Munyo fodi jok'otundo bor, Yozefu owaco ri ŋeca pere ni, “Ay, iluwi cwo no aka k'inomaki jo, penji jo ni, ‘Raŋo wiculo bero gi raco? Raŋo wikwalo kikopo paran ma feza?
Raŋo wikwalo kikopo pa jadwoŋ paran ma feza? Meno a kikopo ma go medh'iye, aka oro ma ŋeyo gima ji jotemo muŋo. Witimo banja madwoŋ ma.’ ”
Munyo omako jo, oluda wac me rijo.
Jodwoko go ni, “Aŋo m'inyutho jadwoŋ k'iluwo ama? Wakwoŋere ni wakitimo nger gino.
Neni, pesa ma wanwaŋo i dhok kutiyin mawan, wadwoko rin wok i piny Kanan; t'onyo wakwal nedi feza kosa zahabu wok i ot pa jadwoŋ perin?
Jadwoŋ, k'acel kwoŋ wan onwaŋere nike nitie gine, ibino neko go, aka wan ma wadoŋ walalokere ŋecin perin.”
Ŋeca no odwoko ni, “Weyi wobedi paka iwaco ŋat'onwaŋ gine bino bedo ŋeca paran, aka win ma widoŋ wilangoye g'apuse.”
Kenyo kisi jacwo olunyo kutiya pere piny, aka kisi jacwo oyawo kutiya pere.
Ŋeca pa Yozefu orango, cako kodi kutiya pa ŋatadwoŋ to cowo kodi ŋatathin; aka kikopo onwaŋere i kutiya pa Benyamin.
Kenyo joyeco nangin pajo i rem, aka joyeyo ŋano i wi punde pajo to jogik i tindi madwoŋ.
Munyo Yuda gi wutmin jotundo i ot pa Yozefu, go oyido fodi nikenyo, aka jokule piny ruwaŋ go.
Yozefu owaco rijo ni, “Tim aŋo me ma witimo? Oyido wikuya ni nyatoro paka an nyalo ŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ gi gigipiny ma ji jotemo muŋo?”
Aka Yuda odwoko ni, “Aŋo ma wanowaci rin jadwoŋ? Aŋo ma wanoluw? Wanokwedere nedi? Were otieko kedho ŋecin perin; neni, wajoje makiweno ŋat'onwaŋ kikopo i kutiya pere, onyo pama wabedo ŋecin perin.”
Yozefu owaco ni, “Thodenge, wobedi bor kodan ni alatimo ameno! Nyaka jacwo m'onwaŋ kikopo i cinge ama labedo ŋeca paran; to riwin dok win bongi bawin i siem.”
Yuda okidho malo bongi Yozefu aka owaco ni, “A jadwoŋ paran, mondo weyi ŋeca perin woluwi ye wac i ithin, aka nge perin wokiri woliel kwoŋ ŋeca perin rupiri icale Farawo won.
Jadwoŋ paran ipenjo ŋecin perin ni, ‘Winitie gi bawin kosa omin win man?’
Aka wadwokin ni, ‘Wanitie gi bawan, jacwo m'oti, kodi omin wan mathin, nyathi ma tiyo pere, aka omin go otho, to go kende am'odoŋ kwoŋ nyithindho pa min aka bamere omaro go swa.’
Kenyo iwaco ri ŋecin perin ni, ‘Keli win go piny bongan ŋey anen go gi waŋan.’
Wawaco rin ni jayac no kinyal eye bongi bamere, rupiri k'inotim, bamere nyalo tho.
Kenyo iwaco ri ŋecin perin ni, ‘Kwanyowoko k'omin win mathin obino piny gi win, wikilanenan doko.’ ”
“Munyo wadok bongi baba, wawaco rigo gim'iwaco.
Aka munyo bawan owaco ni, ‘Gik win doko winyew cemo manok.’
Wadwoko ni, ‘Wakinyali kidho piny. K'omin wan mathin okadhi gi wan, kenyo walakidho; rupiri kilayeyo wan neno jacwo no kwanyo woko k'omin wan mathin nitie gi wan.’
Kenyo baba owaco riwan ni, ‘Wiŋeyo paka dhako paran Laker onywolo ran wotan ario kende.
Acel otieko weyan. Ripo bedo ni ogwaŋe madudi joyeco go i muma, rupiri fodi akineno go wok cuka go kadhi.
Ka winoter me bende kwoŋan to teko mako go, rem ma winokel ran dinyal nekan paka ati.’ ”
“Riameno k'anogiki bongi baba m'ongoye jayac me, kenyo paka kwo pere otwere kwoŋ kwo pa jayac me,
ka go onen ni jayac ongoye bongi wan, gi tiyo pere rem ma wanokeli rigo dinyal neko go.
Maloyo mere aciko kwo paran ri baba ro jayac me k'awaco ni, ‘K'akidwoko gi go bongin, kenyo alatero apuse ruwaŋ baba i kwo paran je.’
Onyo riameno akwayin, weyi adoŋ i kabedo pa jayac me paka ŋeca perin jadwoŋ; aka weyi jayac wodoki gi wutmin.
Rupiri anyalo nedi dok bongi baba majayac me ongoye bongan? Alworo neno teko ma dinyal podho kwoŋ baba.”
Kenyo Yozefu doko k'onyalo dhumirok ruwaŋ jom'oyido jocungo cegin gi go, aka oywak, “Miy kisi nyatoro wowoki bongan.” Ameno ongoye ŋat'obedo gi go munyo Yozefu nyuthere ri wutmin.
Aka oywaki malo ma Jomisir jowinjo, aka wac otundo i cel pa kere pa Farawo.
Yozefu owaco ri wutmin ni, “An Yozefu; baba fodi kwo?” To wutmin jok'onyalo dwoko go, rupiri lworo omako jo swa ro bedo pere kenyo.
Ameno Yozefu owaco ri wutmin ni, “Mondo core win cegin bongan.” Jocore aka go owaco ni, “Abedo omin win Yozefu ma witana i Misir.
Aka onyo pama wikiri rembi kosa wopusere rupiri witana an ka, rupiri Were ooran yuwiy win botho kwo pa ji.
Me nyaka oro mar'ario ma kec i piny; bino bedo oro abic doko ma kilabedo fur kosa keco.
Aka Were ooran yuwiy win botho win i nger ma dhier me gi neno ni win gi nyikway win wikwo.
Ameno oyido k'obedo win ama wioran ka, to Were. Go okethan jadhum pa Farawo ma malo, aka aŋat'akuro piny pere gipi; abedo jadhum ma Misir gipi.”
“Redi win wikadhi malo bongi baba aka wiwaci rigo ni me gima wode Yozefu waco, ‘Were okethan jadhum ma Misir gipi; biye bongan m'ongoye galo.
Ilabedo iy'adec ma Gosen, kama cegin kodan in gi nyithindho perin, nyikwayin, mwendi, dhok, kodi kisi gim'initie gine.
Aka kenyo anyalo konyin, rupiri fodi nitie oro abic ma kec ma bino aka akimiti in gi peco perin g'ogwaŋe wiriy kec.’ ”
Yozefu omedere, “Onyo wijoje, kiri gi in Benyamin, winyalo neno ni me an won Yozefu.
Wiripo waco ri baba nger ma adwoŋ iye ka i Misir kodi gigipiny je ma witieko neno. Aka redi win wikel go ka.”
Kenyo opodho i ŋuti omin go Benyamin to ywak, aka Benyamin bende oywaki i ŋute.
Aka gi pigi waŋe ocwiyo lembi wutmin je. Rumacen ma gime wutmin jocako luwo gine.
Munyo wac otundo i ot pa Farawo ni wutmin Yozefu jobino, Farawo gi jodhum pere jowinjo maber.
Aka Farawo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Waci ri wutmin in jowoyey punde pajo gi ŋano, jodok i piny Kanan.
Weyi jowokwany bajo gi pecin pajo aka jowodwoki ka. Abino miyo jo lowo maber loyo i Misir, aka jobino bedo gi ma romo maloyo ma kwo i iye.
Waci rijo bende jowoteri cawila madongo wok Misir ri mon gi nyithindho pajo maŋic jowogwey, aka jowobin gi bajo.
Jokiri jowodew kwoŋ lim pajo ma jolaweyo cen rupiri gigipiny mabeyo i lowo ma Misir je bino bedo apajo.”
Wot Yakobo jotimo ameno; aka Yozefu omiyo jo cawila madongo, cungo kwoŋ cik pa Farawo to miyo jo cemo ma woth.
Ri kisi nyatoro aka ri joje omiyo nangin awira. To ri Benyamin omiyo feza 300 kodi nangin awira abic.
Odhiro ri bamere punde apar ma jotiŋo gigipiny mabeyo wok Misir, kodi punde ma mon ma jotiŋo ŋano, mugat, kodi cemo ma woth.
Osewila wutmin aka jodok peco bongi bajo Yakobo i Kanan; aka owaco rijo ni, “Wikiri widhaw i yo.”
Ameno jokadho malo wok Misir aka jobino i piny Kanan bongi bajo Yakobo.
Aka jowaco rigo ni, “Yozefu fodi kwo, aka go am'obedo jadhum ma lowo ma Misir gipi.” Cuny Yakobo opodho, rupiri k'onyalo yeyo.
To munyo jowaco rigo wac pa Yozefu je, aka go oneno cawila madongo ma Yozefu oyido odhiro ma tiŋo go, cunye ogik;
aka Yakobo owaco ni, “Wodan Yakobo fodi kwo! Me kende a gima d'anokway! Aripo kidho anen go kafodi akitho.”
Ameno opanga kisi gim'oyido nitie gine to kidho Berseba kama go omiy'iye Were pa bamere Isaka cowirok.
Were oluwo gi go i menyirok wor, aka owaco ni, “Yakobo, Yakobo!”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Ey, an e.”
Kenyo Were owaco ni, “An Were, Were pa benin. Ikir'ilwor kidho piny i Misir rupiri abino miyo nyikwayin bedo piny madwoŋ kenyo.
Abino kidho piny kodin, aka abino doko kelin malo. Yozefu bino bedo kodin k'itho.”
Kenyo Yakobo oay wok Berseba. Wot Yakobo joketho go, nyithindho maŋic kodi mon pajo i cawila madongo ma Farawo oyido odhiro tiŋo go.
Jotero ogwaŋe pajo kodi lim pajo m'oyido jolimo i Kanan to jokadho i Misir. Yakobo okadho gi nyikwaye je,
wote, nyikwaye ma cwo, nyiki go kodi nyikwaye manyir.
Onyo me a nyikway Yakobo ma jobino gi go i Misir kodi wote. Ruben okayo pere,
kodi wot Ruben; Hanok, Palu, Heziron, kodi Karim.
Simeo gi wote; Yemuel, Yamin, Ohad, Yakin, Zohar, kodi Saulo, wot dhako Jakanan.
Levi gi wote; Gerison, Kohath, kodi Merari.
Yuda gi wote; Eri, Onan, Sela, Perez, Zera, (to Eri kodi Onan jotho i piny Kanan.) Aka wot Perez oyido Heziron kodi Hamul.
Isakar gi wote; Tola, Puwa, Yob, kodi Simiron.
Zebulun gi wote; Sered, Elon, kodi Yalal.
Me oyido wot Leya m'onywolo ri Yakobo i Mesopotamia kanyacel gi nyare Dina. Kanyacel nyikway Yakobo m'olimo gi Leya oyido tundo piero adek g'adek.
Gad gi wote; Zefon, Hagi, Suni, Ezibon, Eri, Arodi, kodi Areli.
Aser gi wote; Imina, Isiva, Isivi, Beria, kodi nyamin jo Sera. Wot Beria oyido Heber kodi Malikiel.
Joje, apar g'aucel me jobedo nyikway Yakobo ma kwoŋ Zilipa; dhako ma Laban omiyo nyare Leya paka ŋeca.
Laker cipa Yakobo onywolo rigo wote ario, Yozefu kodi Benyamin.
I Misir Yozefu olimo wote ario, Manase kodi Efrayim ma Asenath nyar Potifera jacway ri Were i wi migam onywolo rigo.
Wot Benyamin oyido jobedo, Bela, Beker, Asibel, Gera, Naman, Ehi, Ros, Mupim, Hupim, kodi Arid.
Joje apar g'aŋwen me jobedo nyikway Yakobo ma kwoŋ Laker.
Dan gi wode Husim.
Nafital gi wote; Yazel, Guni, Yezer, kodi Silam.
J'abirio me jobedo nyikway Yakobo ma kwoŋ Biliha, ŋeca ma Laban omiyo nyare Laker.
Ji je ma jobedo apa Yakobo tirtir ma jobino Misir k'iweyo woko mon pere oyido jonitie piero aucel g'aucel.
Yozefu olimo wote ario i Misir to medo welo ji ma peco pa Yakobo tundo piero abirio ma jobino Misir.
Yakobo ooro Yuda yuwiye kwayo Yozefu wobin worom gi jo i Gosen. Aka munyo jobino,
Yozefu odonjo i cawila pere to kidho Gosen romo gi bamere. Munyo joromo, Yozefu opodho i ŋuti bamere to ywak ma hongo mabor.
Yakobo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Nyo weyi atho, paka atieko nenin aka aŋeyo ni fodi ikwo.”
Kenyo Yozefu owaco ri wutmin gi jopeco pa bamere m'odoŋ ni, “Aripo kidho awaci ri Farawo ni wutmera gi jopeco pa baba je m'oyido jobedo i Kanan jobino bongan.
Abino waco rigo ni wibedo jokwath aka wikuro ogwaŋe aka ni wikelo mwendi gi dhok kodi gigipiny je m'obedo mewin.
Ka Farawo olwoŋi win to penjo win ni witimo tic aŋo,
wiwaci ni wikuro ogwaŋe i kwo mewin je paka kwarere mewin jotimo. I nger me go laweyo win bedo iy'adec Gosen.” Yozefu owaco gime rupiri Jomisir jongoye gi gir'atima gi jokwath.
Ameno Yakobo okwanyo wutmin abic to kidho bongi Farawo. Owaco ni, “Baba gi wutmera jobino wok Kanan gi mwendi pajo, dhok, kodi lim pajo je. Onyo pama jonitie iy'adec ma Gosen.”
Kenyo go onyutho Farawo wutmin abic.
Farawo openjo jo ni, “Witimo tic aŋo?”
Jodwoko ni, “Wabedo jokwath jadwoŋ paka kwarere mawan.
Wabino bedo i piny me rupiri i piny Kanan kec gway m'ongoye lum ri mwendi. Mondo yey ŋecin perin jowobedi iy'adec ma Gosen.”
Kenyo Farawo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Benin gi wutmin in jobino bongin
aka lowo ma Misir nitie ruwaŋin; weyi jowobedi iy'adec ma Gosen, adec ma lowo maber loyo. Aka k'iŋeyo cwo ma jonitie gi nyalo kwoŋ jo, kethi jowokuri ogwaŋe paran.”
Kenyo Yozefu okelo Yakobo bamere to nyutho Farawo aka Yakobo omiyo Farawo silwany.
Aka Farawo openjo Yakobo ni, “Ija oro adi?”
Yakobo odwoko ni, “Kwo paran ma woth otieko oro 130. Oro no jobedo manok to ma teko, makiweno paka oro mabor ma woth pa kwarere paran.”
Yakobo omiyo Farawo silwany, osewila go to kadho.
Kenyo Yozefu omiyo bamere gi wutmin kabedo i Misir; aka omiyo jo lim i lowo maber loyo i tindi madwoŋ Rameses paka Farawo oyido owodho or.
Yozefu omiyo bamere gi wutmin kodi jopeco pa bamere je cemo kiri gi nyithindho.
Onyo kec oyido gway ma cemo oyido ongoye kisi kamoro; ma ji ma Misir gi Kanan jolocere ro kec.
Paka jonyewo ŋano, Yozefu ocoko pesa je to tero i cel pa kere
Munyo pesa ma Misir gi Kanan orumo, Jomisir jobino bongi Yozefu to jowaco ni, “Miy wan cemo! Ikir'iwey watho. Tim gimoro! Pesa mawan orumo.”
Yozefu odwoko ni, “Keli win ogwaŋe mewin; abino miyo win cemo t'awilo gine ka pesa mewin orumo.”
Ameno jokelo ogwaŋe pajo bongi Yozefu, aka omiyo jo cemo to wilo gi kayina, rombo, diegi, dhok kodi punde. I oro no omiyo jo cemo to wilo g'ogwaŋe.

Aka munyo oro no orumo, jobino bonge i oro ma luwo to jowaco ni, “Wakilamuŋin jadwoŋ ni pesa mawan orumo, aka dhok mawan jobedo aperin; ongoye gima wadoŋ gine ma wanomiyin kwanyowoko delkwoŋ wan gi lowo mawan.

Ikir'iwey watho. Tim gimoro! Ikir'iwey lowo mawan wojwangere. Nyew wan kiri gi lowo mawan i wil gi cemo. Walabedo ŋecin pa Farawo aka go ladoŋ gi lowo mawan. Miy wan ŋano ŋey wakwo wakiri watho kodi kodhi ma cwoyo i ndelin mawan.”
Ameno Yozefu onyewo lowo ma Misir gipi ri Farawo. Kisi Jamisir oromere kitana lowo pere, rupiri kec oyido gway. Lowo olokere apa Farawo;
aka Yozefu oloko ji ŋecin wok i gike ma Misir acel tundo i meca.
Nyaka lowo pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ama go k'onyewo; rupiri oyido Farawo miyo jo gi kwo, aka am'omiyo jok'otana lowo pajo.
Kenyo Yozefu owaco ri ji ni, “Neni, konon me anyewo win gi lowo mewin ri Farawo. Onyo kodhi ee riwin ma cwoyo i ndelin mewin
I hongo ma kec, wilamiyo acel wiy abic ri Farawo, aka m'odoŋ amewin ma kodhi kodi cemo riwin kodi pecin mewin.”
Jodwoko ni, “Itieko botho kwo mawan; inyutho wan bero jadwoŋ, aka wabino bedo ŋecin pa Farawo.”
Ameno Yozefu oketho paka cik i lowo ma Misir ni acel wiy abic ma nyak ripo bedo apa Farawo. Cik me fodi cungo kiri konon; kwanyowoko lowo pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ama k'olokere lowo pa Farawo.
Joisiraili jobedo i Misir iy'adec ma Gosen kama joŋaŋ'iye to jonywolo nyithindho kweth.
Yakobo obedo i piny Misir ma oro apar g'abirio, cuka otundo oro 147.
Munyo hongo odhire cegin rigo ma tho, olwoŋo wode Yozefu aka owaco rigo ni, “K'inen pama atieko nwaŋo wor ruwaŋin, kethi cingin i ŋangan aka ikwoŋere ran nike ikilayikan i Misir,
t'ilayikan kama bacere paran jonitie iye; tiŋan wok i Misir aka iyikan kam'oyik'iye jo.”
Yozefu odwoko ni, “Abino timo paka iwaco.”
Yakobo owaco ni, “Kwoŋere ran n'ibino timo.” Yozefu otimo ameno, aka Yakobo omiyo foyo kenyo i wi kanindo pere.
Rumacen ma gime owaci ri Yozefu ni, “Neni, benin two swa.” Ameno okwanyo wote ario, Manase kodi Efrayim to kidho neno bamere.
Aka munyo owaci ri Yakobo ni wode Yozefu oyido obino, olimo meni to ay bedo i wi kanindo.
Yakobo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Were Majameni je onenere ran i Luz i piny Kanan to miyan silwany.
Aka owaco ran ni, ‘Neni, abino miyin nyithindho kweth, ŋey nyikwayin jowolokere piny madongo. Abino miyo nyikwayin lowo me paka lim pajo kicutho.’ ”
Yakobo omedere waco ni, “Wotin ario m'onywol rin i Misir mafodi akibino ka, jobedo aparan; Efrayim gi Manase jobedo wotin paka Ruben gi Simeo.
K'inolim wotin man, jokilakwanere paka aparan. Jobino limo gir'alunja pajo kwoŋ Efrayim gi Manase.

Atimo gime ro yokin Laker. I rem paran madwoŋ go otho i lowo ma Kanan, kama kibor gi Efratha munyo nyaka adwoko wok Mesopotamia. Ayiko go kenyo i thengi yo ma kidho Efratha.” (Efrath pama oŋeyere paka Bethelehem.)
Munyo Yakobo oneno wot Yozefu, openjo ni, “Me yac mene?”
Yozefu odwoko ni, “Me wotan ma Were omiyan jo ka i Misir.”
Yakobo owaco ni, “Keli jo bongan ŋey amiy jo silwany.”
Onyo waŋ Yakobo oyido riprip ro oro pere aka oyido kinen maber. Ameno Yozefu okelo jo cegin gi go, aka ocwiyo lembi jo to podho i kor jo.
Aka Yakobo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Oyido akipar ni anonenin kendo, to neni, Were oyeyan neno kiri nyithindho perin bende.”
Kenyo Yozefu okwanyo jo wok i tiendi Yakobo to kule ruwaŋ Yakobo gi nyime piny.
Aka Yozefu okwanyo joje to ketho Efrayim yuracam pa Yakobo aka Manase yuracuc pa Yakobo.
To Yakobo olwowo cingi to ketho cinge maracuc i wi Efrayim makada nende go am'oyido thin; to ketho cinge maracam i wi Manase m'oyido dwoŋ.
Kenyo Yakobo omiyo Yozefu silwany ka waco ni,
“Weyi Were ma kwarere paran Abraham gi Isaka jotiyo rigo womiy yac me silwany,
Were m'otelan i kwo paran je tundo gunyo ni.
Weyi malaika m'obothan wok i raco je womiy jo silwany!
Weyi nyingan kodi nyingi bacere paran Abraham, kodi Isaka womedere luwo i jo!
Weyi jowobedi gi nyithindho kweth, kodi nyikway jo kweth!”
Munyo Yozefu oneno ni bamere oketho cinge maracuc i wi Efrayim, owinjo marac aka okwanyo cingi bamere ni wokwany woko wok i wi Efrayim wokethi i wi Manase.
Aka Yozefu owaco ri bamere ni, “K'ameno baba; me aya okayo, kethi cingin maracuc i wiye.”
To bamere okwero to waco ni, “Aŋeyo wodan, aŋeyo. Nyikway Manase bende jobino lokere ji madongo. To omin go mathin bino bedo madwoŋ loyo go, aka nyikwaye jobino lokere nonin madongo.”

Ameno Yakobo omiyo jo silwany ndelo no ka waco ama: “Joisiraili jobino oro nyingi win ka jomiyo silwany. Jobino waco ni, ‘Weyi Were wolokin paka Efrayim gi Manase.’ ” I nger me Yakobo oketho Efrayim telo Manase.
Kenyo Yakobo owaco ri Yozefu ni, “Neni, acegin tho, to Were bino bedo kodin, aka bino dwokin i lowo pa bacere perin.
Obedo rin aka ki ri wutmin in m'amiyo Sekem, adec maber ma mayo Joamor g'abor paran kodi asere.”
Kenyo Yakobo olwoŋo wote aka owaco ni, “Cokere win kanyacel ŋey awaci riwin gima lapodho kwoŋ win i hongo ma yuwiye.”
“Cokere win kanyacel, awi wot Yakobo
aka winji win bawin Yakobo.”
“Ruben, ibedo okayo paran
meni paran, aka nyathi paran marapena ma jacwo paran,
ma nor loyo aka tek loyo wotan je.
Icale mikula ma mol
t'ikila bedo ŋata dicwe loyo,
rupiri inindo gi malaya paran
t'icayo kanindo paran.”
“Simeo gi Levi jobedo wutmere.
Jooro gilweny pajo ma timo akaka.
Akibino riwirok i luwo pajo manyaliŋliŋ,
kosa akibino bedo i pido pajo,
rupiri joneko cwo i nge,
aka joŋolo thwondhe ma nono.
Lam wobedi i nge pajo rupiri obedo mager swa,
kodi kwoŋ keme pajo rupiri ger swa.
Abino tiako jo i lowo gipi ma Isiraili,
t'akedho jo i dier ji mere.”
“Yuda, wutmin in jolapakin.
Cingin bino bedo i ŋuti jokwor perin.
Wot benin jobino kulok rin piny ruwaŋin.
Yuda cale simbwor,
neko jokwor pere aka gik i ode
riere to nindo piny.
Ongoye ŋata temo cando go.
Yuda bino mako luth pa kere,
aka nyikwaye wangi jobedo jodhum.
Piny jobino kelo ri mic
to jokule ruwaŋ go i wor.
Go tweyo nyathi punde pere i tiendi yath vini,
i vini ma ner loyo.
Go lwoko nangin pere i vini m'obokere pa remo.
Waŋe labokere ro madho vini,
aka lake matar ro madho cak.”
“Zebulun bino bedo i thengi nam.
Thengi nam pere bino bedo kacungo pa mel.
Adec pere bino tundo kiri i tindi Sidon.”
“Isakar obedo punde matek,
ma riere piny i dier mugugu pere.
To neno ni kaywomirok ber,
aka ni lowo ber.
Ameno go luŋo dieŋeye ni wotiŋ mugugu
to romere tic paka ŋeca.”
“Dan bino thumo banja ri ji pere
paka acel kwoŋ nonin ma Isiraili.
Dan bino bedo thwol i thengi yo,
malasaŋ i yo,
ma kayo fundi kayina
ŋey bolo jagwey yuŋeye.”
“Akuro both perin Rwoth.”
“Jokinyaga jobino monjo Gad,
to go bino wire to riemo jo.”
“Lowo pa Aser bino nyak cemo m'owega.
Go bino miyo cemo ma ripo gi kere.”
“Nafital obedo kol ma ŋweco nono
aka nywolo nyithindhe m'omore.”
“Yozefu cale punde madudi i thengi waŋ pi
nyathi punde madudi i thengi tendere.
Jokwor pere jomonjo go gi gero
aka joriemo gi kwot kodi aserin.
To kwot pere kiyengere
aka cingi go oloki matek,
gi meni pa Were Majameni pa Yakobo.
Kodi jakwath, tele pa Isiraili.
Obedo Were pa benin ama konyin,
Were ma Jameni je ma miyin silwany
gi silwany ma koth wok malo
kodi ma pi maluth wok piny i lowo,
silwany ma dhok kweth kodi nyithindho kweth.
Silwany ma ŋano gi mawuwa,
silwany ma gote macon
gigipiny maber wok i wi tendere makicutho.
Weyi silwany me je wobedi i wi Yozefu,
i biendi waŋ ŋat'okethi gicen kwoŋ wutmin.”
“Benyamin cale arara mager.
Odikin g'othieno neko gimoro to camo.”
Me je a nonin apar g'ario ma Isiraili; aka me a gima bajo owaco munyo miyo jo silwany, kanyo miyo kisi nyatoro silwany ma ripo gine.
Kenyo Yakobo omiyo wote cik ni, “Onyo paka akidho riwirok gi ji paran i tho, yikan win gi bacere paran i ŋungu manitie i ndelo pa Efron Jahiti,
i Makipela, yuwok ceŋ ma Mamire i piny Kanan. Abraham onyewo ŋungu me wok bongi Efron paka kayik.
Kenyo oyik'iye Abraham gi cege Sara, Isaka gi mon pere Rebeka kodi Leya.
Ndelo kodi ŋungu manitie iye no onyew wok bongi Johiti. Yikan win kenyo.”
Munyo Yakobo otieko ciko wote teltel, onindo piny kendo, to go tho.
Kenyo Yozefu opodho kwoŋ bamere to ywako go, aka ocwiyo lembe.
Aka Yozefu owodho or ri ŋecin pere ma jotweyo delkwoŋ jom'otho ma yik ni jowowir delkwoŋ bamere ŋey wokiri wotopi. Aka jotimo ameno.
Otero jo ndelo piero aŋwen ma ripo gi timo ameno. Aka Jomisir joywako go ma ndelo piero abirio.
Munyo ndelo ma ywak orumo, Yozefu oluwo gi jodhum pa Farawo ni, “Mondo ter win mikwenda me ri Farawo:
Munyo baba cegin tho, omiyan kwoŋirok ni abino yiko go i kaliel ma go oyiko i piny Kanan. Onyo riameno mondo weyi akidhi malo, ayiki baba t'adwoko.”
Aka Farawo odwoko ni, “Kadhi malo i yik benin paka ikwoŋere rigo.”
Ameno Yozefu okidho yiko bamere. Jodhum pa kere je, jodongo ma ot pere, kodi jodongo ma piny Misir je jokadho gi Yozefu.
Jopeco pa Yozefu, wutmin, kodi jopeco pa bamere je jokadho gi go. Nyaka nyithindho kodi mwendi kodi dhok pajo ama jodoŋ iy'adec ma Gosen.
Cwo i cawila kodi kayina bende jokadho gi go. Oyido obedo kitipa madwoŋ.
Munyo jotundo i kisia ma Atadi yuwok ceŋ ma Yordan, joywak ma hongo mabor, aka Yozefu otimo kalima ma ywak ma ndelo abirio.
Munyo ji ma Kanan joneno jono joywak i Atadi, jowaco ni, “Nga me ywak ma kwoŋirok ma Jomisir jotimo!” Meno am'omiyo olwoŋi kabedo no ni Abel Mizirayim.
Ameno wot Yakobo jotimo paka go omiyo jo or.
Jotiŋo delkwoŋe jotero Kanan to joyiko i ŋungu i Makipela yuwok ceŋ ma Mamire, i ndelo ma Abraham oyido onyewo wok bongi Efron Jahiti ma yik.
Rumacen ma yiko bamere, Yozefu ogik i Misir gi wutmin kodi jono je m'oyido jokadho gi go malo yiko bamere.
Rumacen ma tho pa bajo, wutmin Yozefu jowaco ni, “To k'obedi ni Yozefu fodi odak wan to cano culo wan ro raco je ma watimo rigo?”
Ameno jodhiro mikwenda ri Yozefu ni, “Mafodi bawan k'otho,
owaco nike wakwayin, ‘Mondo cwaki reco pa wutmin in munyo jotimo rin marac.’ Aka onyo wakwayin cwaki riwan gimarac ma wan, ŋecin pa Were pa benin jotimo.” Yozefu oywaki munyo owaci rigo.
Kenyo wutmin Yozefu wegi jobino to jokule piny ruwaŋ go, aka jowaco ni, “Neni, wabedo ŋecin perin.”
To Yozefu owaco rijo ni, “Wikiri wibedi gi lworo, rupiri akinyali kethirok i kabedo pa Were.
Wicano ran gimarac, to Were owiro i bero, gwoko kwo pa ji kweth ma konon jokwo ro gim'otimere.
Ameno wikiri wibedi gi lworo; abino miyo win gi nyithindho mewin cemo.” Ameno go omedo ridho rijo to diyo adundo pajo.
Yozefu omedere bedo i piny Misir gi peco pa bamere, aka otieko oro 110.
Aka Yozefu oneno nyithindho pa Efrayim kodi nyikwaye je. Go bende oneno nyithindho pa Makir wod pa Manase paka nyithindho pere.
Aka Yozefu owaco ri wutmin ni, “Acegin tho, to Were bino wendo riwin to wotho win wok i piny me kelo win i piny ma go ociko Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo.”
Kenyo go okwayo ji pere kwoŋirok ni, “Ka Were owodhi win wok i piny me, wibino tiŋo cokin paran wok ka.”
Ameno Yozefu otho munyo jaoro 110 aka owir delkwoŋe wokiri wotopi t'iketho i sanduku ma yik.
Me nyingi wot Yakobo ma jokadho i Misir kodi Yakobo, joje gi pecin pajo.
Ruben, Simeo, Levi, kodi Yuda.
Isakar, Zebulun, kodi Benyamin,
Dan kodi Nafital, Gad kodi Aser.
Welo pa nyikway Yakobo je oyido piero abirio, aka Yakobo oyido nitie i Misir.
Kenyo Yozefu gi wutmin kodi luse pere je jotho woko.
To nyikway Yakobo jolimo nyithindho kweth ma jomedere i welo aka jolokere matek to jomore i Misir.
Kenyo kere manyen m'oyido fodi k'oŋeyo Yozefu, olimo dwoŋ i Misir.
Aka owaco ri ji pere ni, “Neni, Joisiraili jokweth swa aka jotek loyo wan.
Biye win watiy gi jo gi gwayo, ka k'obedo ameno jobino more, aka ka lweny ocakere, jobino riwirok gi jokwor mawan to jolwenyo gi wan to jokwale wok i piny mawan.”
Ameno joketho joromi jo timo tic matek dhumo jo gi miyo jo litho gi tic aka Joisiraili jogeto ri Farawo tindin ario madongo, Pithom gi Rameses paka kakan.
To paka jomedo diyo Joisiraili, apaka bende Joisiraili jomedere i welo. Aka Jomisir oyido jolworo Joisiraili.
Ameno Jomisir joromo jo tic gi gwayo,
aka joloko kwo pajo magway gi tic matek, geto kodi timo tic nger je i ndelin pajo. I tic pajo je jomiyo jo timo m'ongoye mako gi jo wor.
Kenyo kere ma Misir owaco ri mon ma jocolo mon ma nyingi jo Sifira kodi Puwa ni,
“Ka wicolo mon Joebulaniya i kacolo mon, ka jonywolo nyathi majayac neki win, to k'obedo manyako weyi win wokwo.”
To mon ma jocolo mon oyido jolworo Were, aka jok'otimo paka kere ma Misir omiyo jo or, aka joweyo nyithindho mayac kwo.
Ameno Farawo olwoŋo mon ma jocolo mon aka openjo jo ni, “Raŋo witimo gime, wiweyo nyithindho mayac kwo?”
Jodwoko go ni, “Rupiri mon Joebulaniya jokicale gi mon Jomisir; kole jo jonywol i yoto, aka nyithindho pajo jonywolo mafodi acel kwoŋ wan k'otundo bongi jo.”
Rupiri mon ma jocolo mon oyido jolworo Were, Were onyutho jo bero to miyo jo pecin pajo wegi. Aka Joisiraili jomedere to jolokere matek.
Kenyo Farawo omiyo ji pere cik ni, “Kisi nyathi majayac ma Joebulaniya jonywolo bol win i malawa Nayil, to manyir mere weyi win jowokwo.”
I hongo me jacwo moro ma janono pa Benyamin onywomo dhako ma bende janono pere
aka dhako no ogamo iye to nywolo rigo wode. Munyo dheno oneno nger ma wode ŋon iye, okano go ma dwe adek.

To munyo go k'onyalo kano wode loyo kenyo, ocweyo adita gi midole aka ofuyo iye gi gima geŋo pi donjo iye to ketho wode iy'adita no. Dheno otero nyathi no to ketho i lum midole maboyo dho thengi malawa.
Aka nyamin nyathi ocungo gi bor neno gim'otimere rigo.
Nyar Farawo obino piny lwoki i malawa, aka jotic pere oyido jowotho i thengi malawa. Nyar Farawo oneno adita i lum midole, aka ooro jatic pere kwanyo.
Oyawo aka oneno nyathi, aka neni nyathi oyido ywak. Omako wor gi nyathi to waco ni, “Me acel kwoŋ nyithindho pa Joebulaniya.”
Kenyo nyamin nyathi owaco ri nyar Farawo ni, “Akadhi alwoŋ acel kwoŋ mon Joebulaniya wopidi rin nyathi?”
Nyar Farawo odwoko ni, “Kadhi” Ameno nyako no okidho to lwoŋo yok nyathi won.
Aka nyar Farawo owaco ri dheno ni, “Ter nyathi me ipidi ran, abino culin misara.” Ameno dheno otero nyathi no to pido.
Rumacen munyo nyathi odongo, dheno otero go bongi nyar Farawo, m'otero go paka wode. Aka nyar Farawo ocwoko nyinge ni Musa
Munyo Musa otieko dongo, okidho wendo ri ji pere Joebulaniya aka oneno nger m'oyido iromo iye jo timo tic matek. Go oneno kiri munyo Jamisir neko Jayuda acel kwoŋ ji pa Musa won.
Musa oŋiyo thenge gi thenge, aka oneno nike oyido ongoye ŋata neno go, aka oneko Jamisir to yiko delkwoŋe i kwoyo.
Yawere Musa ogik to neno cwo ario ma Joebulaniya jogore. Aka owaco ri ŋat'oyido okom mere ni, “Raŋo igoyo Jayuda nyawotin?”
Jalo odwoko go ni, “Ŋa m'okethin bedo jadhum kodi jathum banja? Imito nekan paka ineko Jamisir” Aka Musa obedo gi lworo to waco ni, “Adieri gime oŋeyere.”
Munyo Farawo owinjo gime, odwaro neko Musa. To Musa oringo aka oeye woko i waŋ Farawo to kidho i piny Midian kam'obedo piny cegin gi waŋ pi.
Onyo jacway ri Were i wi migam ma Midian oyido nitie gi nyike abirio, aka jobino jotwomo pi to jopoŋo i wer ri mwendi pa bajo.
To jokwath rombo moro jobino to joriemo jo. Kenyo Musa oay aka okonyo jo to miyo mwendi pajo pi.
Munyo jodok bongi bajo Yethiro, openjo jo ni, “Raŋo konon widwoko con?”
Jodwoko ni, “Jamisir moro obotho wan wok i cingi jokwath rombo aka bende otwomo riwan pi ma romo to miyo mwendi.”
Go openjo nyike pere ni, “Go nikune? Raŋo wiweyo jalo woko kenyo? Lwoŋ win go wocam mugat.”
Ameno Musa oyeyo bedo kenyo, aka Yethiro omiyo go nyare m'ilwoŋo ni Zipora i nywomirok.
Zipora onywolo ri Musa wode to cwoko nyinge ni Gerison kole owaco ni, “Abedo jawoth i piny pa jopath.”
Munyo oro moro okadho, kere ma Misir otho aka Joisiraili oyido fodi joywak i twec pajo, aka joywak ri kony. Ywak pajo otundo malo bongi Were
m'owinjo ywak pajo aka opoyo cikirok pere gi Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo.
Aka Were oŋiyo candirok pa nyithindho pa Isiraili to dewo kwoŋ jo.
Onyo Musa oyido kwayo mwendi pa Yethiro ba cege, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam ma Midian. Otelo mwendi pere kadho yupodho ceŋ ma thim aka obino i got Horeb (Sinai) got pa Were.
Kenyo malaika pa Rwoth omenyere rigo i mac maliel wok i kasugu dudi. Musa oŋiyo, aka neni, dudi oyido kiwaŋ.
Aka Musa owaco ni, “Me gidhier, raŋo kasugu dudi kiwaŋ? Abino core cegin anen.”
Munyo Rwoth oneno nike Musa core cegin, Were olwoŋo go wok i kasugu dudi, “Musa, Musa!”
Musa odwoko ni, “An e.”
Kenyo Were owaco ni, “Ikir'icore cegin, luny war perin wok i tiendin, kole kabedo m'icung'iye leŋ.
Abedo Were pa benin, Were pa Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo.” Aka Musa okano waŋe, kole go oyido lworo neno Were.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ni, “Atieko neno litho pa ji paran ma jonitie i Misir, aka atieko winjo ywak pajo ro ji ma jodiyo jo; aŋeyo kidamba pajo,

aka ameno aloro piny gonyo jo wok i cingi Jomisir, kodi kelo jo malo wok i lowo no kadho i lowo maber aka lac, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, kama Jokanan, Johiti, Joamor, Joperiz, Johivi, kodi Joyebus pama jobed'iye.
Aka onyo pama, neni, ywak pa Joisiraili obino bongan, aka atieko neno nger ma Jomisir jodiyo iye jo.
Biye, abino orin bongi Farawo ŋey inyal wodho ji paran, wot Isiraili wok i Misir.”
To Musa owaco ri Were ni, “An a ŋa ma ripo akadhi bongi Farawo, to awodho Joisiraili wok i Misir?”
Were odwoko ni, “Abino bedo kodin, aka me bino bedo ranyuth rin, nike atieko orin. K'itieko wodho jo wok i Misir, wibino laman wi got me.”
Kenyo Musa owaco ri Were ni, “K'anokidhi bongi Joisiraili t'awaco rijo ni, ‘Were pa kwarere mewin ooran bongi win.’ Jobino penjan ni, ‘Nyinge ŋa?’ Adwoki jo nedi?”
Were owaco ri Musa ni, “Abedo ŋata Abedo” Aka Were owaco ni “Waci gime ri Joisiraili, ‘Abedo ooran bongi win.’ ”
Were owaco ri Musa kendo ni, “Waci gime ri Joisiraili ni, ‘Rwoth pa kwarere mewin, Were pa Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo ooran bongi win.’ Me nyingan cil gi cil, me apaka luse ma yuwaŋe je jolalwoŋan.

Kadhi icoki jotel ma Isiraili je aka iwaci rijo ni, ‘Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin, Were pa Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo omenyere ran.’ Waci rijo ni abino bongi jo aka atieko neno gima Jomisir jotimo rijo.
Atieko yere wodho jo wok i Misir, kama jonitie iye i litho kelo jo i lowo pa Jokanan, Johiti, Joamor, Joperiz, kodi Joyebus, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic.”

“Jobino winjo dwondin, aka in gi jotel pa Joisiraili wiripo kidho bongi kere ma Misir to wiwaco rigo ni, ‘Rwoth, Were pa Joebulaniya, omenyere riwan. Onyo yey wan wawothi ma ndelo adek kadho i thim, ŋey wamiy Rwoth Were mawan cowirok.’
Aŋeyo nike kere ma Misir kilayeyo win kadho kwanyo woko k'orom go gi cingi jo ma meni.
T'abino telo cingan to agoyo Misir gi gir'aura m'abino timo iye, rumacen ma gino go bino yeyo win kadho.
Aka abino miyo Jomisir woro win, aka ka wikadho, wikibino kadho gi cingi win nono.

To kisi dhako Jaisiraili bino kidho bongi jager pere kodi bongi dhako Jamisir ma bedo i ot pere aka bino kwayo nangin kodi thiwino ma zahabu gi feza. Joisiraili jobino ketho gigipiny me kwoŋ nyithindho pajo to jokadho gi lim pa Jomisir.”
Kenyo Musa odwoko ni, “To panen, jokibino yeyo gim'anowaci kosa winjo dwondan, kole jobino waco ni, ‘Rwoth k'omenyere rin.’ ”
Ameno Rwoth openjo Musa ni, “Meno aŋo manitie i cingin?”
Musa odwoko ni, “Luth.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ni, “Bol piny.” Ameno Musa obolo luth piny to lokere thwol aka Musa oringo kwoŋe.
To Rwoth waco ri Musa ni, “Guŋ idimi gi yiwe.” Ameno Musa oguŋo aka omako thwol to lokere luth kendo.
Rwoth owaco ni, “Tim gime ma ridho ri Joisiraili ni Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo, Were pa Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo omenyere rin.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa kendo ni, “Rwaki cingin i kanzu perin.” Musa oketho cinge, aka munyo owodho, neni cinge oyido nitie dhowo matar pa pe kweth.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ni, “Dwoki cingin i kanzu perin.” Ameno Musa odwoko cinge aka munyo owodho, neni, oyido ogik paka kaman je ma delkwoŋe.
Were owaco ni, “Ka jok'oyey gim'inowaci kosa gir'aura marapena, jobino yeyo ma rumacen.
Ka jok'oyey kiri gir'aura ario me kosa winjo dwondin, itwom pi moro wok i malawa Nayil t'ikonjo piny kam'othwo; aka pi m'inotwom wok i Nayil bino lokere remo.”
To Musa owaco ri Rwoth ni, “Awi Rwoth paran, akinyali luwo maber, aka kiri wok cuka nende iluwo kodan, to fodi aywayo luwo aka lewan pek.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Ŋa m'ocweyo dhok nyatoro? Ŋa m'amiyo go bedo obadha, kosa ithe tho? Ŋa ma miyo go neno kosa waŋe tho? K'obedo an Rwoth?
Onyo riameno kadhi, abino konyin luwo aka abino waco rin gim'inowaci.”
To Musa owaco ni, “Awi Rwoth paran, mondo or ŋatiman.”
Kenyo Rwoth omako nge gi Musa aka owaco ni, “To aka omin in Aron Jalevi? Aŋeyo nike go nyalo luwo maber, aka neni, go bino romo kodin, aka k'onenin go bino kisangala.
Inyalo luwo gi go t'iwaco rigo gima woluwi, aka abino waco riwin gir'atima.
Go bino bedo jaluwo perin to luwo rin gi ji. Kenyo ibino bedo pa Were, k'iwaco rigo gima woluwi.
Kadhi gi luth me, kole ibino oro ma timo gir'aura.”
Kenyo Musa ogik bongi Yethiro ba cege aka owaco rigo ni, “Akwayin, weyan adoki bongi wade paran i Misir aka anen kafodi jokwo.” Aka Yethiro owaco ri Musa ni, “Kadhi i siem.”
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa i Midian ni, “Dok i Misir, kole cwo m'oyido jomito nekin jotho.”
Ameno Musa okwanyo cege kodi wote to ketho jo i wi punde to jodok i piny Misir; aka Musa otiŋo luth ma Were owaco rigo nike wokadhi gine.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa kendo ni, “K'idok i Misir, neni nike itimo ruwaŋ Farawo gir'aura je m'atieko ketho i meni perin. T'abino loko cunye matek ŋey wokiri woyey ji kadho.
Aka iripo waco ri Farawo ni, ‘Rwoth waco, Isiraili obedo okayo paran,
aka awaco ni weyi wodan wokadhi, ŋey wolaman. K'ikwero, panen, abino neko okayo perin.’ ”
Rwoth oromo gi Musa to temo neko go, kama jonindo iye i yo munyo jokadho i Misir.
Kenyo Zipora cipa Musa okwanyo tele mabith to thumo wic kalac pa wode, aka ogeyo gine kinyoro pa Musa to waco ni, “Adieri ibedo cworan ma remo ran.”
Ameno Rwoth okoyo kwo pa Musa aka am'omiyo Zipora owaco ri Musa ro thumirok ni, “Ibedo cworan ma remo.”
Rwoth owaco ri Aron ni, “Kadhi i thim irom gi Musa.” Ameno Aron okidho to romo gi Musa i got pa Were aka ocwiyo lembe.
Kenyo Musa owaco ri Aron kisi gima Rwoth owaco rigo munyo owaco rigo ni wodoki i Misir, kodi gir'aura je ma Rwoth owaco rigo ni wotim.
Kenyo Musa gi Aron jokidho to jocoko jotel pa Joisiraili kanyacel.
Aron oluwo wac je ma Rwoth oyido owaco ri Musa, aka Musa otimo gir'aura je ruwaŋ ji.
Ji joyeyo, aka munyo Joisiraili jowinjo nike Rwoth oyido owendo rijo aka nike oyido otieko neno kidamba pajo, jokule piny to jolamo Rwoth.
Rumacen Musa gi Aron jokidho bongi Farawo aka jowaco ni, “Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco ni, ‘Weyi ji paran jowokadhi, ŋey jowotimi ran kalima i thim.’ ”
