To Farawo penjo ni, “Rwoth a ŋa ma ripo winjo dwonde t'aweyo Isiraili kadho? Akuya Rwoth, aka kiri akibino weyo Joisiraili jowokadhi.”

Musa gi Aron jodwoko ni, “Were pa Joebulaniya oromo gi wan, weyi wakadhi, wakwayin, wawothi ma ndelo adek kadho i thim miyo cowirok ri Rwoth, Were mawan. Ka wakikadho, go bino neko wan gi two nundu kosa lweny.”
To kere ma Misir owaco rijo ni, “Musa gi Aron, raŋo wikwanyo ji wok i tic pajo? Dwoki win ŋecin no i tic.
Win wilokere madit loyo Jomisir. Aka onyo pama wimito weyo tic.”
Ndelo no won Farawo owaco ri jorom jo timo tic matek kodi jotel pajo ma Joisiraili ni,
“Weyi win miyo ji gigoyo matafal. Miy win jo wegi jokadhi jowocoki.
To fodi wiripo miyo jo goyo welo matafal paka con mere, wikiri widwoki cen; kole jongoye gi tic ma romo, aka am'omiyo jokwayan ni awey jokadhi jowomiy cowirok ri Were pajo.
Miy win jome tic matek loyo aka wikiri wiyey jo ywomirok, ŋey kiri jowowinji wac twodo.”
Ameno jorom jo timo tic matek kodi jotel pa Joisiraili jokadho woko to jowaco ri Joisiraili ni, “Farawo owaco nike wakiri wamiy win gigoyo matafal.
Win wegi kadhi wirangi kama winyalo nwaŋ'iye, to fodi wiripo goyo welo matafal paka con.”
Ameno ji joywore i Misir gipi rango gigoyo matafal.
Jorom jo timo tic matek jobedo kanyo joromo jo goyo welo matafal acel kisi ndelo paka munyo oyido imiyo jo gigoyo.
Jomisir ma jorom jo timo tic matek jogoyo Joisiraili ma jotel pa wadi jo. Jopenjo jo ni, “Raŋo wikigoy welo matafal paka oyido con?”
Kenyo jotel ma Joisiraili jokidho bongi Farawo kigeŋisa, “Raŋo itimo gime riwan jadwoŋ?
Kimiy wan gigoyo matafal, to fodi wimiyo wan or goyo matafal! Aka onyo igoyo wan. Ji perin ama jokom.”
To Farawo dwoko ni, “Winyap aka wikimiti tic aka am'omiyo wikwayan weyo win wikadhi wimiy Rwoth cowirok.
Onyo gik win tic, rupiri kilamiyo win gigoyo matafal, to fodi wiripo goyo welo macon.”
Jotel ma Joisiraili joneno ni oyido jonitie i teko munyo owaci rijo nike joripo goyo welo matafal macon kisi ndelo.
Joromo gi Musa kodi Aron m'oyido jokuro jo, paka jowok bongi Farawo
aka jowaco rijo ni, “Rwoth oneno gima witimo aka bino miyo win gir'acula ro miyo Farawo dak wan. Wimiyo jo bedo gi atoŋa ma neko wan.”
Kenyo Musa owire bongi Rwoth kendo to waco ni, “A Rwoth, raŋo itimo raco ri ji me? Raŋo ioran ka?
Kole wok cuka abin bongi Farawo luwo i nyingin, otero jo gi gero, aka ongoye gim'itieko timo ma konyo jo.”
To Rwoth waco ri Musa ni, “Onyo ikidho neno gim'abino timo ri Farawo. Abino romo go weyo ji paran jowokadhi. Adieri abino romo go riemo jo wok i lowo me.”
Amenyere ri Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo paka Were Majameni je, to akinyuthere rijo gi nyingan maleŋ, Rwoth.
Abende atimo gi jo cikirok miyo jo lowo ma Kanan, lowo ma jobed'iye paka jopath.
Onyo atieko winjo ywak pa Joisiraili ma Jomisir jomako i twec aka apoyo cikirok paran.
Riameno wac ri Joisiraili ni, ‘An abedo Rwoth, abino botho win t'agonyo win wok i twec pa Jomisir. Abino tiŋo cingan ma dimeni kelo gir'acula madongo kwoŋ jo.
Abino loko win ji paran, aka abino bedo Were mewin. Wibino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth Were mewin k'anogony win wok i twec i Misir.
Abino kelo win i lowo m'akwoŋere miyo Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo, aka abino miyo win paka lim mewin. An abedo Rwoth.’ ”
Musa owaco gime ri Joisiraili, to jok'owinjo go kwoŋbedo cuny gin oyido otur gi twec mager.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“Kadhi aka iwaci ri Farawo kere ma Misir, wowey Joisiraili jowowoki i lowo pere.”
To Musa odwoko Rwoth ni, “Neni, Joisiraili jok'owinjan; to Farawo owinjan nedi. Akibedo jaluwo maber.”
To Rwoth omiyo Musa gi Aron cik ni, “Waci win ri Joisiraili gi Farawo kere ma Misir nike amiyo win or telo Joisiraili wok i Misir.”
Ruben, wod pa Yakobo marapena oyido nitie gi wote aŋwen; Hanok, Palu, Heziron, kodi Karim, jobedo kwarere mewin nonin ma jolwoŋere gi nyingi jo.
Simeo oyido nitie gi wote aucel; Jemwel, Yamin, Ohad, Ohar, kodi Saulo, wot dhako Jakanan; jobedo kwarere mewin nonin ma jolwoŋere gi nyingi jo.
Levi oyido nitie gi wote adek; Gerisom, Kohath, kodi Merari; jobedo kwarere mewin nonin ma jolwoŋere gi nyingi jo. Levi okwo ma oro 137.
Gerisom oyido nitie gi wote ario; Libini, kodi Simey aka jolimo nyikway jo kweth.
Kohath oyido nitie gi wote aŋwen; Amram, Izar, Hebron, kodi Uziel. Kohath okwo ma oro 133.
Merari oyido nitie gi wote ario; Mali kodi Musi. Me nonin pa Jolevi gi nyikway jo.
Amram onywomo nyamin bamere, m'onywolo rigo Aron gi Musa. Amram okwo ma oro 137.
Izar oyido nitie gi wote adek; Kora, Nefeg, kodi Zikiri.
Uziel oyido nitie gi wote adek; Misael, Elizafan, kodi Sitiri.
Aron onywomo Eliseba, nyar Aminadab nyamin Nason, aka onywolo rigo Nadab, Abihu, Eliazar, kodi Ithamar.
Kora oyido nitie gi wote adek; Asir, Elikana, kodi Abiasaf. Jobedo pecin mapa jonono pa Kora.
Eliazar, wod pa Aron, onywomo acel kwoŋ nyir pa Putiel m'onywolo rigo Finehas. Jo am'oyido wic pecin kodi nonin pa Jolevi.
Aron kodi Musa ama Rwoth owaco rijo ni, “Tel win nonin pa Isiraili wok i Misir.”
Jobedo cwo ma jowaco ri Farawo gonyo Joisiraili wok i Misir.
I ndelo ma Rwoth oluwo gi Musa i lowo ma Misir,
owaco ni, “An abedo Rwoth. Waci ri Farawo kere ma Misir kisi gim'awaco rin.”
To Musa odwoko ni, “Iŋeyo paka akibedo jaluwo maber, Farawo owinjan nedi?”
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Neni, akidho lokin Were ri Farawo, aka Aron omin in bino luwo rin paka jatuci wac Were perin.
Waci ri Aron kisi gim'awodho or rin kwoŋe, aka go wowaci ri Farawo wowey Joisiraili jowowoki i piny pere.
T'abino miyo Farawo bedo gi wictek aka go k'owinjin makada nende anotim gir'anyutha gi gir'aura kweth i Misir. Kenyo abino kelo gir'acula matek i Misir to atelo nonin pa ji paran wok i lowo me.
Nyaka Jomisir jobino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, k'anotiŋ cingan kwoŋ jo to awodho Joisiraili wok i piny pajo.”
Aka Musa gi Aron jotimo paka Rwoth omiyo jo or.
I hongo ma joluwo iye gi Farawo, Musa oyido jaoro piero aboro, aka Aron piero aboro g'adek.
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa gi Aron ni,
“Ka Farawo owaci riwin ni wiridhi wac mewin gi gir'aura, kenyo wac ri Aron wobol luth pere piny ruwaŋ Farawo aka bino lokere thwol.”
Ameno Musa gi Aron jokidho bongi Farawo aka jotimo paka Rwoth omiyo jo or. Aron obolo piny luth pere ruwaŋ Farawo gi jodhum pere, to lokere thwol.
Kenyo Farawo olwoŋo cwo pere mariek gi jothieth pere, aka bende jotimo ameno.
Jobolo piny ludhe pajo to jolokere thwole. To luth pa Aron omwonyo woko apajo.
To Farawo obedo gi wictek paka Rwoth oyido owaco, aka k'onyalo winjo Musa gi Aron.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Farawo nitie gi wictek swa, okwero weyo ji jowokadhi.
Ameno kadhi irom gi go odikin ka go kidho i malawa Nayil. Kadhi gi luth m'olokere thwol, aka ikuri go i thengi malawa.
Aka iwaci rigo ni, ‘Rwoth, Were pa Joebulaniya ooran waco rin iwey ji pere jowokadhi, ŋey jowonyal lamo go i thim. To kiri pama fodi ikiwinjo.
Onyo Rwoth waco ni, ibino ŋeyo ŋata go obedo gi gima go kidho timo. Neni, akidho goyo wi malawa gi luth me, aka pi gibe bino lokirok remo.
Aka rec ma pi jobino tho to malawa ŋwe swa ma Jomisir jok'onyal madho pi mere.’ ”

Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Waci ri Aron wokwany luth pere woriey i wi malawa, waŋ pi, kodi kidiwin je i Misir. Pi bino lokirok remo, aka remo bino bedo i lowo gipi, kiri iy'agwatin ma mbawo gi ma telin.”
Musa gi Aron jotimo paka Rwoth omiyo jo or. Aka Aron orieyo luth pere to goyo gine wi pi i malawa ruwaŋ Farawo gi jodhum pere, aka pi olokere remo.
Rec m'oyido nitie i malawa jotho aka malawa oŋwe marac swa ma Jomisir jok'onyalo madho pi mere. Remo oyido nitie kisi kamoro i Misir.
Kenyo jothieth pa Farawo bende jotimo gimoro acel, aka Farawo obedo gi wictek paka con, to kwero winjo Musa gi Aron paka Rwoth oyido owaco.
Kwanyowoko owire to gik i ot pere ma k'odewo kwoŋ gime je.
Jomisir je jokunyo thoko thengi malawa ri pi amadha, kole jok'onyalo madho pi wok i malawa.
Ndelo abirio orumo munyo Rwoth otieko goyo malawa Nayil.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Kidhi bongi Farawo aka iwaci rigo nike Rwoth waco ni, ‘Weyi ji paran jowokadhi ŋey jonyal laman.
Aka k'ikwero, neni, abino miyo piny perin gir'acula to aumo gi ogwale.
Malawa Nayil bino poŋ g'ogwale ma jobino por i cel perin, kisika perin, kanindo perin, udi pa jodhum perin kodi ji perin, aka kiri i kendo gi sapikere.
Jobino por kwoŋin, ji perin, kodi kwoŋ jodhum perin.’ ”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Waci ri Aron woriey luth pere i wi malawin, waŋ pi, kodi kidiwin, aka womiy ogwale jowobin i lowo ma Misir gibe.”
Ameno Aron orieyo luth pere wi pi je aka ogwale jopor to joumo lowo ma Misir.
To jothieth pa Farawo bende jotimo ameno to jomiyo ogwale por i lowo ma Misir.
Kenyo Farawo olwoŋo Musa gi Aron to waco ni, “Kway win Rwoth wokwany woko ogwale me, aka abino weyo ji mewin jokadhi ŋey jowonyal miyo Rwoth cowirok.”
Musa odwoko Farawo ni, “Waci ran, keraŋo m'akway rin, jodhum perin, kodi ji perin. Kenyo ogwale jobino tho i udi mewin, to jodoŋ nyaka i Nayil.”
Aka Farawo odwoko ni, “Kway ran dikin.”
Musa owaco ni, “Abino timo paka iwaco, aka kenyo ibino ŋeyo nike ongoye were man ma cale Rwoth Were mawan.
Ogwale jobino eye kwoŋin, jodhum perin, kodi ji perin kwanyowoko i Nayil.”
Kenyo Musa gi Aron joeye woko bongi Farawo. Musa oywaki ri Rwoth kwoŋbedo ogwale ma Rwoth oyido okelo kwoŋ Farawo.
Rwoth otimo paka Musa okwayo aka ogwale ma udi, diedipo, kodi ndelin jotho.
Aka Jomisir jocoko kanyacel i kidhur to lowo ŋwe.
To munyo Farawo oneno nike ogwale jotho, obedo gi wictek kendo, aka paka Rwoth oyido owaco, go k'owinjo Musa gi Aron.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Waci ri Aron woriey luth pere wogoy gine fukefuke ma piny, aka i lowo ma Misir gipi fukefuke bino lokirok kikun.”
Ameno Aron ogoyo piny gi luth pere, aka fukefuke je i Misir olokere kikun, m'oumo ji kiri g'ogwaŋe.
Jothieth jotemo timo ameno bende, to jodhiere. Kikun obedo kisi kamoro
aka jothieth jowaco ri Farawo ni, “Me cingi Rwoth.” To Farawo oyido nitie gi wictek, aka k'onyalo winjo jo paka Rwoth oyido owaco.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Ay dikin odikin maŋic aka ikuri Farawo ka kidho i malawa, aka iwaci rigo nike Rwoth waco ni, ‘Weyi ji paran jowokadhi, ŋey jowolaman.
Kakameno, k'ikwero ji paran kadho, neni, abino dhiro tome lwaŋin kwoŋin, jodhum perin, kodi ji perin. Udi pa Jomisir bino poŋ gi lwaŋin, aka lwaŋin jobino umo piny.
T'abino koyo adec ma Gosen, kama ji paran jobed'iye, ŋey wongoye tome lwaŋin kenyo. Abino timo gime ŋey inyal ŋeyo nike An, Rwoth, anitie i tic i lowo me.
Abino ketho pokirok kwoŋ ji paran gi ji perin. Gir'aura me bino timere dikin.’ ”
Rwoth odhiro tome lwaŋin i cel pa kere pa Farawo kodi i udi pa jodhum pere. Lowo ma Misir je osika gi lwaŋin.
Kenyo Farawo olwoŋo Musa gi Aron aka owaco rijo ni, “Kadhi wimiy Rwoth cowirok i lowo me.”

To Musa odwoko ni, “Kiber oyido timo gino, kwoŋbedo Jomisir jobino winjo marac gi cowirok mar'ogwaŋe ma wabino miyo Rwoth Were mawan. Ka wanomiy cowirok ma Jomisir jokimiti neno kama joneno iye wan, jobino neko wan gi goco telin.
Waripo woth ma ndelo adek kidho i thim to wamiyo Rwoth Were mawan cowirok paka go omiyo wan or.”
Ameno Farawo owaco ni, “Abino weyo win kadho miyo Rwoth Were mewin cowirok i thim, ka wikilakadho bor. Kway ran.”

Kenyo Musa odwoko ni, “Neni, tekin aeye wok bongin, abino kwayo Rwoth ŋey tome lwaŋin jowoeye kwoŋin, jodhum perin, kodi ji perin dikin. T'ikir'iwondi wan kendo to ikwero ji kadho miyo Rwoth cowirok.”
Ameno Musa oeye wok bongi Farawo aka okwayo Rwoth.
Rwoth otimo paka Musa okwayo, aka okwanyo woko lwaŋin kwoŋ Farawo, jodhum pere, kodi ji pere m'ongoye m'odoŋ.
To kiri rume Farawo obedo gi wictek, aka k'oweyo ji kadho.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Kidhi bongi Farawo iwaci rigo ni, Rwoth, Were pa Joebulaniya waco ni, ‘Weyi ji paran jokadhi, ŋey jowolaman.
Kole k'inokwer weyo jo kadho kendo,
neni, abino miyin gir'acula gi dhiro two kwoŋ ogwaŋe mewin je; kayina mewin, ŋamia, dhok, rombo, kodi diegi.
To Rwoth bino ketho pokirok i dier ogwaŋe pa Joisiraili kodi apa Jomisir, ŋey wongoye kad'acel kwoŋ ogwaŋe pa Joisiraili ma wotho.
An, Rwoth, aketho dikin paka ndelo m'abino timo iye gime.’ ”
I ndelo ma yawere Rwoth otimo paka owaco, aka ogwaŋe pa Jomisir je jotho, to ngoye ogwaŋ kad'acel pa Joisiraili ma otho.
Aka Farawo openjo gim'otimere t'iwaco rigo nike ongoye ogwaŋ kad'acel pa Joisiraili ma otho. To go fodi obedo gi wictek aka k'oweyo ji kadho.
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa gi Aron ni, “Jow win buru adhoŋ cingi win wok i mac malieth, aka weyi Musa woywoy i koyo ruwaŋ Farawo.
Buru no bino ywore pa rudino m'onuŋere i lowo ma Misir gibe, aka kisi kamoro jolanywolo bur ma lokere adhola kwoŋ ji g'ogwaŋe.”
Ameno jokwanyo buru moro to jocungo ruwaŋ Farawo; aka Musa oywoyo i koyo; to buru no nywolo bur m'olokere adhola kwoŋ ji g'ogwaŋe.
Jothieth jok'onyalo neno ruwaŋ Musa kwoŋbedo kwoŋ jo bende oyido oumere gi bur paka Jomisir man.
To Rwoth omiyo Farawo bedo gi wictek paka Rwoth oyido owaco, aka Farawo k'owinjo Musa gi Aron.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Cew dikin odikin maŋic, icungi ruwaŋ Farawo aka iwaci rigo ni, Rwoth, Were pa Joebulaniya waco ni, ‘Weyi ji paran jokadhi, ŋey jowolaman.
Kole rume, aladhiro thoyamo paran kwoŋin, jodhum perin kodi ji perin, ŋey inyal ŋeyo nike ongoye ŋata cale an i piny gibe.
Kabedi nende atiŋ cingan t'agoyin gi ji perin gi two nundu, dinyo wijoje wirere kicutho.
T'aweyo wikwo r'atoŋa me, nyutho meni paran, ŋey nyingan wotuci i piny gibe.
Kucel fodi itiŋere malo kwoŋ ji paran aka ikwero jowokadhi.
Neni, dikin kapa sawa me, abino miyo pe mapek swa cwe, nger m'oyido fodi k'ocwe i Misir wok con.
Onyo riameno wodhi or, ŋey ogwaŋe mewin gi kisi gima nitie kam'othangere wokethi i ot. Pe bino cwe kwoŋ ji kodi ogwaŋe ma jodoŋ woko, aka jobino tho.’ ”
Megi kwoŋ jodhum pa Farawo lworo omako jo ro gima Rwoth oyido owaco, aka jokelo ŋecin pajo g'ogwaŋe pajo i udi.
To megi ma jok'odewo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth joweyo ŋecin pajo g'ogwaŋe kam'othangere.
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Riey cingin yupolo, ŋey pe wocwe i lowo ma Misir gipi, kwoŋ ji, ogwaŋe, kodi cemo ma ndelin je.”
Kenyo Musa orieyo luth pere yupolo, aka Rwoth odhiro mwoc koth, pe, aka lithkoth ogoyo piny. Rwoth odhiro
pe mapek gi lithkoth ma kicoki. Manago obedo pe m'oyido fodi k'ocwe i Misir wok con.
I Misir gipi pe ogoyo kisi gimoro m'oyido nitie kam'othangere, kiri gi ji kodi ogwaŋe. Pe ogoyo piny cemo i ndelin to turo woko yen je.
Nyaka iy'adec ma Gosen, kama Joisiraili oyido jobed'iye ama pe oyido ongoye.
Kenyo Farawo ooro wolwoŋi Musa gi Aron, aka owaco rijo ni, “Rume atimo reco; Rwoth otire aka an gi ji paran wakom.
Kway win Rwoth! Mwoc koth gi pe me onyo joasere, abino weyo win kadho, wikiripi bedo ka kendo.”
Musa owaco rigo ni, “Tekin aweyo tindi madwoŋ, abino rieyo cingan ri Rwoth; mwoc koth bino coki, aka pe bino ngoye, ŋey inyal ŋeyo nike piny obedo apa Rwoth.
T'aŋeyo nike in gi jodhum perin wikibino lworo Rwoth Were.”
Yath ma timo nanga mafoth m'ilwoŋo ni flakis m'oyido thiwo kodi bale m'oyido jocek jonyekere.
To ongoye ŋano m'onyekere kwoŋbedo jogalo gi cek.
Ameno Musa oeye bongi Farawo wok i tindi madwoŋ, aka orieyo cinge ri Rwoth, aka mwoc koth, pe, kodi koth ocoki.
To munyo Farawo oneno ni koth, pe, kodi mwoc koth ocoki, otimo reco kendo. Go kodi jodhum pere jodoŋ gi wictek paka con
aka, paka Rwoth oyido owaco luwo i Musa, Farawo k'onyalo weyo Joisiraili kadho.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Kadhi irom gi Farawo. Atieko miyo go gi jodhum pere bedo gi wictek, ŋey anyal nyutho gir'aura paran i dier jo,
aka ŋey winyal waco ri nyithindho mewin gi nyikway win nger m'amiŋ'iye Jomisir munyo atimo gir'aura paran. Wijoje wibino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.”
Ameno Musa gi Aron jokidho bongi Farawo, aka jowaco rigo ni, “Rwoth, Were pa Joebulaniya waco ni, ‘Inomedere kwero kiri keraŋo mwolok ruwaŋan? Weyi ji paran jokadhi ŋey jowonyal laman.
K'inokwer, neni, abino kelo bonyo i piny perin dikin.
Jobino bedo kweth ma jolaumo piny kicutho. Jobino camo kisi gima pe k'onyeko, kiri gi yen m'odoŋ.
Jobino poŋ i udi perin kodi apa jodhum perin. Jobino bedo marac loyo gimoro je ma kwarere pajo oneno.’ ” Kenyo Musa owire to eye woko bongi Farawo.
Jodhum pa Farawo jowaco rigo ni, “Jal me okeli kwoŋ wan teko kiri keraŋo? Weyi cwo Joisiraili jokadhi, ŋey jowolami Rwoth Were pajo. Ikiniaŋ nike Misir orere?”
Ameno okeli Musa gi Aron ruwaŋ Farawo, aka owaco rijo, “Winyalo kadho ŋey wilam Rwoth Were mewin. To jokune ma jokadho?”
Musa odwoko ni, “Wabino kadho gi nyithindho mawan, jom'oti, rombo, diegi, kodi dhok mawan, kole waripo timo kalima ma miyo Rwoth dwoŋ.”
Aka Farawo owaco ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth nike akibino weyo win kadho gi mon kodi nyithindho mewin. Neni, winitie g'atoŋa marac i paro.
Be! Cwo kende ama jokadhi jowolami Rwoth, kole meno a gim'iyenyo.” Aka oriemo Musa kodi Aron ngoye woko i waŋe.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Riey cingin i lowo ma Misir ikeli bonyo. Jobino camo kisi gima dongo, kodi kisi gima pe k'onyeko.”
Ameno Musa orieyo luth pere, aka Rwoth omiyo koyo ma yuwok ceŋ kudho ndelo no gipi gi wor no gipi; aka kani piny yawere, koyo oyido okelo bonyo.
Jobino i tome to jopoto i piny gibe. Obedo tome bonyo m'oyido fodi k'oneni, kosa kilaneno kendo.
Joumo piny cuka lowo olokere macol gi jo. Jocamo kisi gima pe oyido oweyo kiri gi olemo ma yen. Ongoye gima nyaboke pendi m'odoŋ kwoŋ cemo ma ndelo kosa yath i lowo ma Misir gipi.
Kenyo Farawo olwoŋo Musa gi Aron piyo to waco ni, “Atimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth Were mewin kodi win.
Onyo riameno, cwaki ran win rume kende, aka wikway Rwoth Were mewin wokwany woko gir'acula ma tho me kwoŋan.”
Ameno Musa oeye woko bongi Farawo to kwayo Rwoth.
Aka Rwoth owiro koyo ma yuwok ceŋ i koyo matek yupodho ceŋ, m'otiŋo bonyo to wito jo i nam m'obokere; aka ongoye bonyo kad'acel m'odoŋ i Misir gipi.
To Rwoth omiyo Farawo bedo gi wictek, aka k'oweyo Joisiraili kadho.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Riey cingin yupolo ŋey mudho wobin i lowo ma Misir, mudho mapek swa.”
Ameno Musa orieyo cinge yupolo aka mudho mapek obedo i lowo ma Misir ma ndelo adek.
Jomisir jok'onyalo neno wegi, aka ongoye ŋat'owok i ot i hongo no. To Joisiraili oyido jonitie gi lero kama jobed'iye.
Kenyo Farawo olwoŋo Musa aka owaco ni, “Kadhi wilam Rwoth, kiri gi nyithindho mewin kodi mon mewin jowokadhi. To weyi win rombo, diegi, kodi dhok mewin jowodoŋ ka.”
To Musa odwoko ni, “Meno ibino miyo wan ogwaŋe ma miyo cowirok, kodi cowirok awaŋa ri Rwoth Were mawan.
Be, waripo kadho g'ogwaŋe mawan m'ongoye m'odoŋ cen. Wan wegi waripo yero ogwaŋe ma lamo gine Rwoth Were mawan. Aka cuka watundo kenyo, wakibino ŋeyo ogwaŋe mene ma miyo go.”
Rwoth omiyo Farawo bedo gi wictek, aka k'onyalo weyo jo kadho.
Farawo owaco ri Musa ni, “Eye woko ruwaŋan! Ikir'imiyan anenin kendo! I ndelo ma inonenan iye, ibino tho.”
Musa odwoko ni, “Itire, ikibino nenan kendo.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Abino dhiro nyaka gir'acula acel kendo kwoŋ Farawo gi ji pere. Rumacen ma meno go bino weyo win kadho. Adieri go bino riemo wijoje wok ka.
Onyo wac ri Joisiraili jowokway joger pajo thiwino ma zahabu gi feza.”
Rwoth omiyo Jomisir lworo Joisiraili. Adieri, jodhum gi ji je jotero Musa paka jacwo madwoŋ.
Musa owaco ri Farawo ni, “Rwoth waco ni, ‘Kapa sawa aucel ma wor, abino wotho i Misir,
aka kisi okayo i Misir bino tho, wok kwoŋ okayo pa Farawo ma ripo lunjo ker, tundo kwoŋ okayo pa ŋeca madhako ma rego ŋano. Aka kiri nyithindhi dhok makayo je jobino tho.
Bino bedo ywak madwoŋ swa i lowo ma Misir gipi, nger m'oyido fodi k'obedo, kosa k'obedi kendo.
To ongoye kada gwok ma bino gwe gi Joisiraili kosa ogwaŋe pajo. Kenyo wibino ŋeyo nike An, Rwoth, aketho pokirok i dier Jomisir kodi Joisiraili.’ ”
Macowe Musa owaco ni, “Jodhum perin je jolabino bongan to jokule piny ruwaŋan, aka jobino kwayan kwanyo ji paran wakadhi. Rumacen ma gino, abino kadho.” Kenyo Musa oeye woko bongi Farawo i nge madit.
Rwoth oyido owaco ri Musa ni, “Farawo k'owinjin ŋey atim gir'aura paran man i Misir.”
Musa gi Aron jotimo gir'aura me je ruwaŋ Farawo, to Rwoth omiyo go bedo gi wictek, aka k'oweyo Joisiraili weyo piny pere.
“Dwe me bino bedo riwin, dwe marapena ma oro.
Miy Joisiraili je cik me; k'apar ma dwe me, kisi jacwo ripo yero nyathi rombo kosa nyathi diel wok i ot pere.
Ka peco pere thin ri nyathi rombo acel, jowopoki gi jager pere cungo kwoŋ welo ma ji kodi adec ma kisi nyatoro nyalo camo.
Winyalo yero nyathi rombo kosa diel, to joripo bedo ma jokitwo, ma k'oŋol kosa waŋe k'otho.
Aka othieno ma ndelo k'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe me, Joisiraili je jowothum ogwaŋe pajo.
Jowokwany remo moro to joreyo i miango thigo kodi ruwaŋ dhiot ma udi m'ilacam'iye ogwaŋe no.
Wor no riŋo wobul, t'icamo gi yen makec kodi mugat ma buthow.
Wikiri wicam manumu, kosa m'otedi, to cami win je m'obul, kiri gi wic, tiende, kodi gigipiny ma iye.
Wikiripi weyo kada mathin tundo odikin, ka man odoŋ, wiripo waŋo.
Wicam piyo munyo witieko rukirok ma woth, gi ware mewin i tiendi win kodi ludhe mewin i cingi win. Obedo kalima ma kadho ma miyan Rwoth, dwoŋ.”
“Wor no abino wotho i lowo ma Misir, neko kisi okayo, ji g'ogwaŋe, kodi miyo werin ma Misir gir'acula. An abedo Rwoth.
Remo bino bedo ranyuth ma nyutho udi mewin ma wibedo iye. K'aneno remo, abino kalo win m'akimiyo win litho k'amiyo Jomisir gir'acula.
Wiripo poyo ndelo me, aka wikuri paka kalima pa Rwoth. Wiripo timo i luse mewin je paka cik i hongo je ma bino.”

Rwoth owaco ni, “Ma ndelo abirio wiripo camo mugat ma buthow. I ndelo marapena wongoye thow ma wonwaŋere i udi mewin, kole ka nyatoro ocam mugat m'otimi gi thow i ndelo abirio no, k'okwanere paka acel kwoŋ ji paran kendo.
I ndelo marapena kodi i ndelo mar'abirio wiripo romo lamo Rwoth. Wikiripi timo tic i ndelo abirio no, to winyalo tedo cemo.
Poyi win kalima me, kwoŋbedo i ndelo me am'awodh'iye nonin mewin wok i Misir. I luse mewin je wiripo timo kalima me.
Othieno ma k'apar g'aŋwen kiri othieno ma ka ndelo piero ario g'acel ma dwe marapena, wiripo camo mugat ma buthow.
Ma ndelo abirio wongoye thow ma wonwaŋere i udi mewin, kole ka nyatoro, anywola mewin kosa japath, ocam mugat m'otimi gi thow, k'okwanere paka acel kwoŋ ji paran kendo.”
Kenyo Musa olwoŋo jotel ma Isiraili aka owaco rijo ni, “Kisi nyatoro kwoŋ win woyeri nyathi rombo kosa nyathi diel ma cwo, aka withum ŋey pecin mewin jowocami kalima ma kadho.
Kwany win cangwe, aka wirwaki i remo to wiwiro i miango ma thigo kodi ruwaŋ dhiot. Wongoye ŋata wowoki cuka piny oyawere.
Kole Rwoth bino wotho i Misir neko Jomisir, aka ka go onen remo i miango thigo kodi ruwaŋ dhiot, go k'owey Malaika ma Tho donjo i udi mewin.
Win kodi nyithindho mewin wiripo luwo cik me cil gi cil.
Aka ka witundo i lowo ma Rwoth omiy win paka ociko, wiripo timo kwer me.
Ka nyithindho mewin jopenji win ni, ‘Kwer me nyutho aŋo.’
Dwoki win jo ni, ‘Me cowirok ma Kalima ma Kadho ma miyo Rwoth dwoŋ, kwoŋbedo go okalo udi pa Joisiraili i Misir. Go oneko Jomisir to weyo wan.’ ”
Joisiraili jokule piny to jolamo Rwoth.
Kenyo jokidho to jotimo ameno, paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa gi Aron cik.
Sawa aucel ma wor, Rwoth oneko okayin i lowo ma Misir, wok kwoŋ okayo pa Farawo m'oyido obedo ma ripo lunjo ker, tundo kwoŋ okayo pa jajiera. Nyithindhi ogwaŋe makayo ma cwo je oneki.
Wor no Farawo, jodhum pere, kodi Jomisir je jocewi, aka obedo ywak madwoŋ i Misir rupiri oyido ongoye peco ma wod pajo k'otho.
Aka wor no Farawo olwoŋo Musa gi Aron to waco ni, “Ay win wieye i piny paran, kiri gi Joisiraili; kadhi wilam Rwoth paka wiwaco.
Kwany win rombo mewin, diegi, kodi dhok mewin wikadhi. Kway ran win bende silwany.”
Jomisir joywak gi Joisiraili jowoeye woko i piny pajo. Jowaco ni, “Ka wikikadho, wajoje wabino tho.”
Ameno ji jotiŋo atewe pajo, ŋano ma buthow, aka jotweyo i nangin pajo to jotiŋo i badi gin.
Joisiraili bende oyido jotimo paka Musa owaco rijo, kole jokwayo Jomisir thiwino m'otimi gi Zahabu gi feza kodi nangin.
Rwoth omiyo Jomisir lworo Joisiraili to jomiyo jo gima jokwayo. I nger me Joisiraili jotiŋo lim pa Jomisir.
Aka Joisiraili jowotho wok i Rameses kidho Sukoth. Oyido joromo cwo 600,000 m'ikikwano mon gi nyithindho.
Aka ji kweth man, rombo kweth, diegi, kodi dhok bende jokadho gi jo.
Jotedo ŋano pajo ma buthow m'oyido jowok gine wok i Misir, kwoŋbedo oriem jo wok i Misir abwap ma jok'onyalo bedo gi hongo ma tedo cemo pajo kosa tedo mugat ma thwo.
I ndelo macowe ma oro 430 mere, nonin pa ji pa Rwoth je joeye i Misir.
Obedo wor ma Rwoth okuro jo munyo wodho jo wok i Misir; wor acel me Joisiraili jomiyo ri Rwoth i luse pajo je aka joripo poyo.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa gi Aron ni, “Me cik ma mako kwoŋ kalima ma kadho; wongoye japath ma wocam cemo mere,
to ŋeca ma winyewo nyalo camo nyaka ka withumo go kende.
Wongoye jawoth, kosa jatic m'opangisa ma wocam cemo mere.
Cemo je iripo camo i ot m'oted'iye, kiripi wodho woko. Aka wikiri wimwodi cokin mere.
Joisiraili je joripo timo kalima me,

to wongoye jacwo ma k'othumere ma wocam. Ka japath moro bedo i dier win aka mito timo kalima ma miyo Rwoth dwoŋ, kutho wiripo thumo cwo je ma ot pere. Nyaka go bino kwanirok paka acel kwoŋ anywola ma Isiraili to bende riwere i kalima me.
Cik acel bende ri anywola ma Isiraili kodi jopath ma jobedi i dier win.”
Joisiraili jowinjo aka jotimo paka Rwoth omiyo Musa gi Aron cik.
Aka i ndelo no won Rwoth owodho nonin ma Isiraili wok i Misir.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“Kethi ran gicen nyithindho makayo, kole kisi okayo pa Joisiraili kodi apa ogwaŋe jobedo aparan.”
Aka Musa owaco ri ji ni, “Poyi win ndelo ma wiwok'iye i Misir kam'oyido wibedo ŋecin. Me ndelo ma Rwoth owodho win gi meni pere madwoŋ. Wikiripi camo mugat m'otimi gi thow.
Wiwok i Misir i ndelo me, i dwe mar'acel, dwe ma Abib.

Aka ka Rwoth okeli win i lowo pa Jokanan, Johiti, Joamor, Johivi, kodi Joyebus, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, ma go ociko kwarere mewin nike bino miyo win, wiripo timo kalima me i dwe mar'acel kisi oro.
Ma ndelo abirio wiripo camo mugat ma buthow, aka i ndelo mar'abirio wobedi kalima ma miyo Rwoth dwoŋ.
Ma ndelo abirio wikiripi camo mugat m'otimi gi thow, aka wongoye thow kosa mugat m'otimi gi thow ma wonwaŋere iy'adec mewin.
Aka wititi ri wot win i ndelo no nike witimo gime kwoŋbedo gima Rwoth otimo riwin munyo wiwok i Misir.
Kalima me bino bedo rapoy, paka gim'otwey i cingi win kosa ruwaŋ win, bino poyo win medo waco cik pa Rwoth, kwoŋbedo Rwoth owodho win wok i Misir gi meni pere madwoŋ.
Riameno wiripo timo kalima me i hongo mere kisi oro.”
“Aka ka Rwoth okeli win i lowo pa Jokanan, paka okwoŋere ri kwarere mewin to miyo win,
wiripo miyo go okayin mewin kodi apa ogwaŋe. Kisi okayo mewin kodi apa ogwaŋe jobedo apa Rwoth.
To wiripo wilo okayin pa punde mewin gi nyithindhi rombo ma cwo wok bongi Rwoth. Ka wikimiti wilo, tur win ŋuti gin. Wiripo bende nyewo okayin mewin.
Comoro ka wot win jopenji win gima gime nyutho, dwoki win nike, gi meni madwoŋ Rwoth owodho wan wok i Misir kam'oyido wabedo ŋecin.
Munyo Farawo okwero weyo wan kadho, Rwoth oneko kisi okayo i Misir, apa ji kiri g'ogwaŋe. Am'omiyo wamiyo Rwoth okayin mawan kiri gi apa ogwaŋe. To okayin mawan wanyewo jo.
Gime bino bedo rapoy, paka gim'otwey i cingi wan kosa ruwaŋ wan, bino poyo wan nike Rwoth owodho wan wok i Misir gi meni pere madwoŋ.”

Aka munyo Farawo oweyo Joisiraili kadho, Were k'otelo jo luwo gi yo ma kidho kiri i thengi Filistia makada nende oyido cek. Kole Were owaco ni, “Ji jonyalo wiro paro pajo gik i Misir ka joneni nike jokidho bedo gi lweny.”
To Were otelo jo luwo gi thim ma Nam M'obokere. Aka Joisiraili oyido joyikere lwenyo.
Joisiraili joeye Sukoth to joketho kambi i Etham i thengi thim.
Aka Rwoth otelo jo gi siro ma pondeponde odieceŋ nyutho jo yo, kodi siro ma mac wor miyo jo lero, ŋey jowonyal woth wor gi odieceŋ.
Siro ma pondeponde oyido bedo yuwiy gin odieceŋ, aka siro ma mac bedo wor.
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“Waci ri Joisiraili jogik jowokethi kambi yuwaŋ Pihahiroth, i dier Migdol kodi Nam M'obokere cegin gi Balzefon.
Kole Farawo bino paro nike Joisiraili fodi jotangatanga i lowo me aka thim ogeŋo jo kadho.
Abino miyo go bedo gi wictek aka go bino luwo win. Abino limo dwoŋ paran kwoŋ Farawo gi jolweny pere je ŋey Jomisir jowonyal ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.” Aka Joisiraili jotimo ameno.
Munyo owaci ri Farawo nike Joisiraili joringo, go gi jodhum pere jowiro paro pajo aka jowaco ni, “Aŋo ma watimo! Waweyo Joisiraili kadho m'oyido jobedo ŋecin mawan!”
Ameno Farawo okwanyo cawila pere ma lweny gi jolweny pere.
Go okwanyo cawilin pere je kiri gi jolweny 600 ma jober loyo, gi jomituka pajo.
Aka Rwoth omiyo Farawo bedo gi wictek to luwo Joisiraili m'oyido jokadho gi miseni.
Jolweny pa Jomisir, kayinin pajo, cawilin pajo kodi jogwey joriemo jo aka jomako jo kam'oyido joketh'iye kambi dho Nam M'obokere cegin gi Pihahiroth kodi Balzefon.
Munyo Farawo ocore cegin, Joisiraili jotiŋo waŋ gin malo, aka neni, Jomisir oyido joŋanjo joluwo jo. Jobwok swa aka joywak ri Rwoth wokonyi jo.
Jowaco ri Musa ni, “Kaliele oyido ongoye i Misir m'ikelo wan tho i thim ka? Neni gim'itimo gi wodho wan wok i Misir!
Wakiwaco rin mafodi wakiay nike gime bino timirok? Wawaco rin nike iwey wan wabedi ŋecin pa Jomisir. Ber oyido wabedi ŋecin ma wakitho ka i thim.”
Musa odwoko ji ni, “Wikiri wilwor, cungi win matek, aka Rwoth bino botho win konon. Jomisir ma wineno me wikibino neno jo kendo.
Rwoth bino lwenyo riwin aka ongoye kony win timo gimoro.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Raŋo wiywak ran? Waci ri Joisiraili jowomedere yuwaŋe.
Tiŋi luth perin malo aka iriey cingin i wi nam wotiakere i diere, ŋey Joisiraili jowoŋadi nam kam'othwo.
Aka abino miyo Jomisir wictek to joluwo jo i nam, ŋey anwaŋ dwoŋ paran kwoŋ Farawo, jolweny pere, cawilin pere, kodi jogwey kayinin pere.
K'akengila jo, Jomisir jobino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.”
Malaika pa Were m'oyido telo yuwiy jolweny pa Isiraili ogik yuŋey jo, aka siro ma pondeponde bende ogik yuŋey jo,
i dier Jomisir kodi Joisiraili. Pondeponde oloko piny macol ri Jomisir, to miyo Joisiraili lero. Aka jok'onyalo bedo cegin wor gipi.
Kenyo Musa orieyo cinge i wi nam, aka Rwoth obaro nam gi koyo matek ma yuwok ceŋ wor gipi to timo lowo m'othwo iye. Pi otiakere,
aka Joisiraili joluwo i dier nam i lowo m'othwo gi pi i kisi thenge.
Jomisir joluwo jo aka jodonjo i nam gi kayinin pajo, cawilin kodi jogwey.
Mafodi ŋamba k'oriedo, Rwoth oŋiyo piny kwoŋ Jomisir wok i siro ma mac gi pondeponde aka omiyo jo kirin.
Rwoth omiyo tiendi cawilin pajo moko, ŋey woth wobedi rijo matek. Jomisir jowaco ni, “Rwoth lwenyo gi wan ri Joisiraili. Weyi wawok win ka!”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Riey cingin i wi nam, ŋey pi wogiki kwoŋ Jomisir, cawilin pajo, kodi jogwey kayinin pajo.”
Ameno Musa orieyo cinge i wi nam, aka munyo piny oyawere pi ogik i kare. Jomisir jotemo ringo, to Rwoth obolo jo i nam.
Pi ogik to umo cawilin, jogwey, kodi jolweny pa Jomisir je m'oyido joluwo Joisiraili i nam, m'ongoye ŋat'obothi.
To Joisiraili jowotho i lowo m'othwo gi pi i kisi thenge.
I ndelo no Rwoth obotho Joisiraili wok i cingi Jomisir, aka Joisiraili joneno Jomisir joriere i thengi nam ma jotho.
Munyo Joisiraili joneno meni madwoŋ ma Rwoth okengila gine Jomisir, jolworo Rwoth to joyeyo go kiri gi ŋeca pere Musa.
Kenyo Musa gi Joisiraili jowero ri Rwoth wer me.
“Abino wero ri Rwoth kwoŋbedo olimo loyo madwoŋ,
obolo kayinin gi jogwey i nam.
Rwoth a meni paran aka wer paran,
go ama obothan
Me Were paran, aka abino pako go,
go Were pa baba, aka abino wero dwoŋ pere.
Rwoth obedo jalweny,
Rwoth meno nyingi go.”
“Obolo cawilin gi jolweny pa Farawo i nam,
aka jomituka pere ma jober loyo jomunyere i nam.
Lutho ma nam oumo jo,
jomunyere i lutho pa tele.”
“Rwoth, cingin maracuc, dwoŋ i meni,
turo jokwor mathindho thindho.
I meni perin madwoŋ ikengila jokwor perin;
nge perin liel to waŋo jo pa kanja.
Ikudho nam to pi cokere malo,
ocungo tirtir pa kor ot,
lutho ma nam olokere matek.
Jakwor owaco ni, ‘Abino riemo jo t'amako jo,
abino poko lim pajo t'atero m'ayenyo je;
Abino celo abor paran, aka cingan bino reyo jo.’
To gi kudho ma koyo, nam oumo jo,
jomunyere pa got i pi ma tula.”
“Rwoth, ŋa ma calin, kwoŋ werin je?
Ŋa ma calin, itek loyo joje?
Ŋa manyalo timo gir'aura gi tim madongo paka aperin?
Irieyo cingin maracuc,
aka piny omwonyo jokwor mawan.
Gi mar perin makiwire, itelo ji ma ibotho,
gi meni perin inyutho jo yo ma kidho i lowo perin maleŋ.
Nonin jowinjo, aka jokirin gi lworo,
Jofilistia jopoŋ gi lworo.
Jotel ma Edom jobwok swa,
cwo matek i Mowab jokirin,
ji ma Kanan jongoye gi miseni.
Jopoŋ gi lworo aka jokirin.
Joneno meni perin, a Rwoth,
aka jocungo m'ongoye kony gi lworo
cuka ji perin joŋanjo jokadho,
ji ma ibotho bedo ŋecin.
Ikelo jo to ipidho jo i got perin,
kabedo ma in, Rwoth, itieko yero bedo peco perin,
ot ma lamo ma in won igeto.
Rwoth bino dhumo cil gi cil.”
Joisiraili joluwo i nam i lowo m'othwo. To munyo cawilin pa Farawo, jogwey kayinin kodi kayinin jodonjo i nam, Rwoth odwoko pi to umo jo.
Kenyo Miriam, jatuci wac Were madhako, okwanyo seke pere, aka mon man bende joluwo go ka jogoyo seke aka jomielo.
Miriam owero rijo,
“Wer ri Rwoth, kwoŋbedo olimo loyo madwoŋ,
obolo kayinin gi jogwey i nam.”
Kenyo Musa otelo Joisiraili wok i Nam M'obokere kidho i thim ma Sur. Ma ndelo adek jowotho i thim, to jok'onwaŋo pi.
Munyo jotundo Mara, jok'onyalo madho pi ma kenyo kwoŋbedo oyido kec, aka am'omiyo ocwoki ni Mara.
Ji jogeŋisa ri Musa aka jopenjo ni, “Aŋo ma wakidho madho?”
Musa oywaki ri Rwoth, aka Rwoth onyutho go yath m'obolo i pi to pi lokere mamit.
Kenyo Rwoth omiyo jo or ma nger ma kwo, aka bende otemo jo
ka waco ni, “Ka winowinjan kicutho gi timo gim'atero ni otire kodi luwo or paran, akibino miyo win gir'acula ma two m'akelo kwoŋ Jomisir. An abedo Rwoth ma botho two mewin.”
Kenyo jotundo i Elim kam'oyido nitie iye waŋ pi apar g'ario, kodi yen thith piero abirio, aka joketho kenyo kambi cegin gi pi.
Joisiraili joeye woko i Elim, aka k'apar g'abic ma dwe mar'ario munyo jotieko eye i Misir jotundo i thim ma Sin, manitie i dier Elim gi got Sinai.
I thim kenyo joje jogeŋisa ri Musa gi Aron
aka jowaco rijo ni, “Kabedi oyido Rwoth neki woko wan gi i piny Misir, kenyo oyido wanyalo bedo dho ayigin riŋo to wacamo gi mugat ma romo wan. To wiwodho wan i thim ka riyo wan gi kec watho.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Neni, Abino cwe piny cemo wok i polo ri wijoje, aka ji joripo wok kisi ndelo coko ma romo jo ma ndelo no kende. I nger me anyalo temo jo niaŋ ka jonyalo luwo cik paran.
I ndelo mar'aucel joripo tedo cemo ma riwo ma kisi ndelo dirio.”
Ameno Musa gi Aron jowaco ri Joisiraili othieno ni, “Othieno me wibino ŋeyo nike Rwoth ama owodho win wok i Misir,
aka odikin wibino neno dwoŋ pere, kwoŋbedo go owinjo kigeŋisa mewin kwoŋe. Kole wabedo aŋo ma wigeŋisa gi wan?”

Kenyo Musa owaco ni, “Obedo Rwoth ma bino miyo win riŋo wicam othieno kodi mugat madit paka wiyenyo odikin, kwoŋbedo go owinjo kigeŋisa mewin kwoŋe. Adieri ka wigeŋisa gi wan, meno wigeŋisa kwoŋ Rwoth.”
Aka Musa owaco ri Aron ni, “Waci ri lwak ji je jobin jowocungi ruwaŋ Rwoth, kwoŋbedo Rwoth owinjo kigeŋisa pajo.”
Aka paka Aron oluwo gi lwak ji, joŋiyo yuthim, aka neni, dwoŋ pa Rwoth omenyere i pondeponde.
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“Atieko winjo kigeŋisa pa Joisiraili. Waci rijo nike kisi othieno jolabedo gi riŋo acama, aka kisi odikin jolabedo gi mugat je ma joyenyo. Kenyo jobino ŋeyo nike An, Rwoth, abedo Were pajo.”
Othieno alurere jopie to joumo kambi, aka odikin thoyo bedo piny thoko kambi.
Ka thoyo oleny, oyido gigipiny m'onuŋere ma jocale tor m'omakere bedo i thim.
Munyo Joisiraili joneno, oyido jokuya nike obedo aŋo aka jopenjere wegi ni, “Me ginaŋo?”
Musa owaco rijo ni, “Me cemo ma Rwoth omiyo win wicam.
Rwoth owodho or ni kisi nyatoro kwoŋ win wocoki madit ma go mito, lita ario ri kisi nyatoro i wema pere.”
Aka Joisiraili jotimo ameno; jomegi jocoko madit aka jomegi manok.
To munyo jopima, ji ma jocoko madit jok'obedo gi madit loyo, aka ji ma jocoko manok jok'obedo gi manok loyo. Kisi nyatoro ocoko ma romo go camo.
Musa owaco rijo ni, “Wongoye ŋata wokan tundo dikin.”
To jomegi jok'owinjo Musa to jokano man. Yawere odikin oyido otoŋo kudin aka oyido ŋwe m'otop. Musa omako nge gi jo.
Kisi odikin kisi nyatoro ocoko ma romo go, aka ka ceŋ oliel, m'odoŋ i lowo leny woko.
I ndelo mar'aucel jocoko ma riwo ma kisi ndelo dirio, lita aŋwen kisi nyatoro. Jotel pa Joisiraili je jobino aka jowaco ri Musa kwoŋe,
aka Musa owaco rijo ni, “Rwoth owodho or nike dikin obedo ndelo maleŋ ma ywomirok, ndelo pere. Tedi win ma wimito tedo konon, aka wibok ma wimito boko. M'odoŋ, wiripo kano ma dikin.”
Paka Musa oyido omiyo jo or, jokano m'odoŋ kiri i ndelo ma yawere, aka k'okwok kosa k'otoŋo kudin.
Musa owaco ni, “Cami win konon rupiri konon obedo Sabato, ndelo ma ywomirok, aka ndelo pa Rwoth. Konon wikilanwaŋo moro woko ma kambi.
Wiripo coko cemo ma ndelo aucel, to i ndelo mar'abirio, ndelo ma ywomirok langoye.”
I ndelo mar'abirio jomegi jowok coko cemo, to jok'onwaŋo.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Winokwer winjo cik paran kiri keraŋo?
Neni, amiyo win ndelo ma ywomirok, riameno i ndelo mar'aucel amiyo win cemo ma romo ndelo ario. Kisi nyatoro wobedi kama go nitie iye i ndelo mar'abirio aka wokiri woeye peco.”
Ameno ji jok'otiyo i ndelo mar'abirio.
Joisiraili jolwoŋo cemo no ni mana.
Musa owaco ni, “Rwoth omiyo wan or kano mana moro ri nyikway wan, ŋey jowoneni cemo ma Rwoth omiyo wan camo munyo owodho wan wok i Misir.”
Musa owaco ri Aron ni, “Kwany agwata, ikethi lita ario ma mana iye aka ikethi ruwaŋ Rwoth, wokan ri nyikway wan.”
Paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or, ameno Aron oketho ruwaŋ Sanduku ma Cikirok, ŋey wokan.
Joisiraili jocamo mana ma oro piero aŋwen, cuka jotundo i lowo ma Kanan, kama jobed'iye.
(Rapim m'othwo m'oyido ioro rom gi lita piero ario).
Jogeŋisa ri Musa to jowaco ni, “Miy wan pi amadha.”
Musa odwoko ni, “Raŋo wigeŋisa? Raŋo witemo Rwoth?”
To riyo pi oyido neko ji swa, aka jomedere kigeŋisa ri Musa. Jowaco ni, “Raŋo iwodho wan wok i Misir? Bino neko wan, nyithindho mawan g'ogwaŋe mawan gi riyo pi.”
Musa oywaki ri Rwoth, “Aŋo ma tim gi ji me? Jocegin lilan gi tele.”
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Kwany jotel pa Joisiraili moro, aka iluw ruwaŋ ji. Kadhi gi luth ma i oro ma goyo wi malawa Nayil.
Neni, abino cungo ruwaŋin kenyo i tele i got Sinai. Goy tele gi luth, aka pi lawok iye ri ji jowomadhi.” Musa otimo ameno, ruwaŋ jotel pa Joisiraili.
Aka kabedo no ocwoki ni Masa kodi Meriba,
Kenyo Joamalek jobino lweny gi Joisiraili i Refidim.
Musa owaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Yer riwan cwo moro jokidhi jowolweny gi Joamalek dikin. Abino cungo i wi tendere gi luth pa Were i cingan.”
Ameno Yosuwa otimo paka Musa owaco rigo, aka jolwenyo gi Joamalek, kareno Musa, Aron, kodi Hur joidho malo i wi tendere.
Kisi ka Musa otiŋo cinge malo, Joisiraili joloyo, to k'odwoko piny, Joamalek jocako loyo.
Munyo cingi Musa jojony, Aron gi Hur jokelo rigo tele ma bedo, to jocungo i thenge mako cingi go malo, ma kiyengere cuka waŋceŋ opodho.
I nger me Yosuwa okengila Joamalek kicutho.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Waci ri Yosuwa wondiki gime i kitawo ŋey wopoy. Waci ri Yosuwa nike abino reyo Joamalek kicutho.”
Musa ogeto migam aka ocwoko ni Rwoth obedo bendera paran,
ka waco ni, “Tiŋi malo bendera pa Rwoth. Rwoth lamedere lweny gi Joamalek i luse je.”
Yethiro or Musa, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam ma Midian owinjo kwoŋ gima Were oyido otimo ri Musa kodi Joisiraili munyo otelo jo wok i Misir.
Onyo Yethiro obino, aka okelo cipa Musa m'oyido owey cen,
kodi wot Musa ario, Gerison ma nyinge nyutho ni oyido abedo jawoth i piny pa jopath,
aka man oyido ilwoŋo ni Elieza kole owaco ni, “Were pa baba okonyan to bothan, kwoŋ abor pa Farawo.”
Yethiro obino gi cipa Musa gi wote ario i thim kama Musa oyido oketh'iye kambi i got maleŋ.
Yethiro oyido odhiro rigo wac nike jobino,
ameno Musa owok romo gi go, okule piny, aka ocwiyo lembe. Jopenjere kwoŋ kwo pajo to jodonjo i wema pa Musa.
Musa owaco ri Yethiro kisi gima Rwoth otimo ri Farawo gi Jomisir ŋey wobothi Joisiraili. Go bende owaco ri Yethiro kwoŋ dinyo ma ji joneno i yo kodi nger ma Rwoth obotho iye jo.
Munyo Yethiro owinjo gime je, osangala
aka owaco ni, “Rwoth wopak m'obotho win wok i cingi Farawo gi Jomisir. Rwoth wopak m'obotho ji pere bedo ŋecin!
Onyo pama aŋeyo nike Rwoth dwoŋ loyo werin je, kwoŋbedo obotho ji pere wok i cingi Jomisir munyo oyido jotero jo gi cay.”
Kenyo Yethiro omiyo mic awaŋa gi cowirok man ri Were, aka Aron obino gi jotel pa Joisiraili je to jocamo mugat kanyacel gi or Musa ruwaŋ Were.
Yawere Musa oyido winjo banjin i dier ji, aka obedo gi tic wok odikin kiri wor.
Munyo Yethiro oneno kisi gima Musa oyido timo ri ji, openjo ni, “Me je ginaŋo m'itimo ri ji? Raŋo itimo gime je kendin, gi ji cungo ka wok odikin tundo othieno?”
Musa odwoko ni, “Kwoŋbedo ji jobino bongan ŋeyo mito pa Were.
Ka j'ario jonitie gi dhaw, jobino bongan t'awaco ŋat'otire, aka bende awaco rijo or gi cik pa Were.”
Kenyo Yethiro owaco ri Musa ni, “Gim'itimo kiber.
In kiri gi ji je wibino ol. Gime dit rin timo kendin.
Onyo winjan, abino miyin rieko aka Were bino bedo kodin. Otire rin pido ri ji ruwaŋ Were t'ikelo dhaw pajo rigo.
Iripo fonjo jo or pa Were kodi tito rijo nger ma joripo woth'iye, kodi gima joripo timo.
To medo i wi meno, iripo yero cwo ma jonitie gi nyalo, ma jolworo Were, ma jogenere, aka jokijol nyew. Ikethi jo telo ji i kitipa ma ganin, miya, piero abic, kodi apar.
Weyi jowothum banja kisi hongo. Banjin matek mere jowokeli rin, aka mathindho mere jowothum. Meno bino loko rin tic mayot, ka bende jotiŋo bieto me kodin.
K'itimo gime, paka Were wodho or, in won ikibino ol, aka ji me je jonyalo dok munyo dhaw pajo okwey.”
Musa otero rieko pa Yethiro
aka oyero cwo ma jonitie gi nyalo wok kwoŋ Joisiraili. Oketho jo telo kitipin ma ganin, miya, piero abic, kodi apar.
Jothumo ri ji banja kisi hongo; matek mere jotero ri Musa, aka mayot mere jo wegi jothumo.
Kenyo Yethiro osewila Musa, to Yethiro dok peco.
Joisiraili joeye Refidim, aka i ndelo marapena ma dwe mar'adek rumacen ma wok i Misir jotundo i thim ma Sinai. Kenyo joketho kambi i tiendi got Sinai.
Aka Musa oidho wi got Sinai romo gi Were.
Rwoth olwoŋo go gi wi got aka owaco rigo ni, “Waci ri Joisiraili, nyikway Yakobo ni,
Wineno gima An Rwoth atimo ri Jomisir kodi nger m'atiŋo win'iye paka aŋo tiŋo nyithindhe i bwombe to akelo win ka.
Onyo riameno, ka winowinji dwondan to wikuro cikirok paran, wilabedo ji paran won. Piny gibe aparan, to wibino bedo ji paran m'ayero,
aka wilabedo ran ker pa jocway ri Were i wi migam aka piny maleŋ.”
Ameno Musa obino to lwoŋo jotel pa ji je, aka owaco rijo wac ma Rwoth oyido omiyo go or ni wowaci.
Kenyo ji jodwoko akwora ni, “Kisi gima Rwoth owaco wabino timo.” Aka Musa odwoko wac pa ji ri Rwoth.
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Neni, abino bongin i pondeponde m'opoto, ŋey ji jowoyeyin wok pama kidho yuwaŋe.”
Musa owaco ri Rwoth gima ji jodwoko.
Aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Kadhi bongi ji aka iwaci rijo jowolokere macil konon gi dikin ma lamo. Joripo lwoko nangin pajo
aka jowoyikere i ndelo mar'adek. I ndelo no abino loro piny wi got Sinai, kama ji je jonyalo nenan iye.
Cer kew thoko got ma ji jokiripi kalo, aka wac rijo jokiri jowoidhi wi got kosa jowocore cegin gine. Ka nyatoro okethi tiende, iripo neko go.
Wolili go gi tele, kosa g'asere m'ongoye ŋat'ogeyo go. Kosa obedi nyatoro kosa ogwaŋ, iripo neko. To k'okudhi gwara, kenyo ji jowoidhi malo wi got.”
Kenyo Musa oloro wok wi got aka owaco ri ji nike jowoyikere ri lamo. Ameno jolwoko nangin pajo.
Aka Musa owaco ri ji ni, “Yikere win i ndelo mar'adek, aka wongoye ŋata wonindi gi cege kutho.”
Kenyo Musa otelo ji wok i kambi romo gi Were, aka jocungo i tiendi got.
Yiro oyido otweyo got gibe, kwoŋbedo Rwoth oloro iye i mac. Yiro oduny malo pa yiro ma wok i mac madwoŋ, aka ji je jokirin swa.
Dwondi gwara omedere malo. Musa oluwo aka Rwoth odwoko go gi mwoc koth.
Rwoth oloro piny wi got Sinai aka olwoŋo Musa malo wi got. Musa oidho malo
aka Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Lori piny igwoki ji jokiri jowokal kew bino nenan rupiri madit kwoŋ jo jobino tho.
Kiri jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jobino bongan je joripo lokirok macil, kosa abino miyo jo gir'acula.”
Musa owaco ri Rwoth ni, “Ji jokinyal bino malo, kwoŋbedo in won imiyo wan or nike water got paka maleŋ aka wacer kew thoko.”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Lori piny ikeli Aron kodin. To jocway ri Were i wi migam gi ji jokiripi kalo kew bino bongan, kosa abino miyo jo gir'acula.”
Ameno Musa oloro piny to waco ri ji gima Rwoth owaco.
Were oluwo gi Musa wac me je,
“An abedo Rwoth Were mewin, m'owodho win wok i lowo ma Misir kam'oyido wibed'iye ŋecin.”
“Wikiri wibedi gi werin man je kwanyowoko an.”
Wikiri wikule piny rijo, kosa wilam jo, kwoŋbedo An, Rwoth Were mewin, ajanyeko. Akelo gir'acula kwoŋ jono ma jodakan kodi kwoŋ nyikway jo, kiri i luse pajo mar'adek gi mar'aŋwen.
T'anyutho mar paran makiwire ri luse ganin pa ji ma jomaran aka joluwo or paran.”
Winitie gi ndelin aucel ma timo tic mewin je,
to ndelo mar'abirio obedo ndelo pa Rwoth Were mewin. I ndelo no wongoye ŋata wotim tic; win, nyithindho, ŋecin, ogwaŋe mewin, kosa japath ma bedo i piny mewin.
I ndelo aucel An, Rwoth, acweyo polo gi piny, nam gi gima nitie iye je, to aywomere i ndelo mar'abirio. Riameno Rwoth omiyo ndelo ma Sabato silwany to loko maleŋ.”
Jowaco ri Musa ni, “Luw gi wan aka wawinji, to k'iweyo Were luwo gi wan wabino tho.”
Musa odwoko ni, “Wikiri wilwor; kole Were obino temo win kodi miyo win winjo go, ŋey wikiri witim reco.”
To ji jomedere cungo gi bor, aka Musa kende ama ocore cegin gi pondeponde m'opoto bongi Were.
Rwoth omiyo Musa or waco ri Joisiraili ni, “Witieko neno nger ma An, Rwoth, aluwo iye gi win wok i polo.
Wikiri witim werin mewin ma feza kosa zahabu to wilamo medo i wi an.
Geti ran win migam ma lowo to wimiyan iye cowirok mewin awaŋa kodi ma siem, ma rombo mewin, kodi megikwe. Kisi kamoro je m'anokethi riwin ma laman, alabino t'amiyo win silwany.
To ka wigeto ran migam ma telin, wikiri wigeti gi telin m'opay, kwoŋbedo ka wioro ringa i iye wimiyo kiripi kodan.
Wikiri wigeti ran migam manitie madala ma idho, ka witimo, wibino thangere ka w'idho madala.”
“Miy Joisiraili cik me.
Ka winyewo ŋeca ma jacwo ma Jayuda, wotiy ma oro aucel, aka i oro mar'abirio wogonyi go m'ongoye cul.
K'inen munyo go lokere ŋeca oyido fodi k'onywomo, wokiri wokadhi gi dhako. To k'inen oyido nitie gi dhako, wokadhi gine.
Ka jadwoŋ pere omiyo go dhako to nywolo rigo yac kosa nyir, nyithindho no gi dhako jodoŋ apa jadwoŋ pere to jalo wokadhi kende.
To ka ŋeca no owaci kamaler ni, ‘Amaro jadwoŋ paran, dhako paran gi nyithindho paran. Akimiti wogonyan.’
Kenyo jadwoŋ pere wokel go ruwaŋ Were. Womiy go cungo i dhiot kosa i miango ma dhiot ma ot ma lamo to tuco ithe aka ŋeca no bino tiyo rigo i kwo pere je.”
“Ka nyatoro otana nyare paka ŋeca, kilagonyo go paka ŋeca ma jacwo.
K'inen otana go gi jacwo ma mito loko go cege, to kucel jacwo no k'omaro go, wotana go gi bamere. Jadwoŋ pere kiripi kitana go gi jopath rupiri k'otero go g'adieri.
Ka nyatoro onyewo ŋeca madhako ri wode, ripo tero go paka nyare.
Ka nyatoro onywomo dhako man, go ripo medirok gi miyo dhako pere marapena cemo gi nangin gi gima go ripo nwaŋo je i nywomirok paka dhako marapena.
Aka ka go k'otimo gigipiny adek me rigo, wogonyi go m'ongoye cul ma pesa.”
To k'oyido k'ogendera neko go, abino yero riwin kabedo ma go bino ringo iye.
To ka nyatoro won omonjo nyawote to neko akor, woneki go makada nende bedi nike oringo i wi migam paran both.”
“Ŋat'ogoy bamere kosa min, iripo neko.”
“Ka ji jogore, to ŋat'acel goyo nyawote gi tele kosa nyweny aka ŋato k'otho t'imiyo go kitanda,
kenyo ka go obothi to doko cako kicera cera gi luth, ŋat'ogoyo go no ripo culo go ri hola pere m'onyeko, to miyo go kony cuka both.”
“Ka nyatoro ogoy ŋeca pere, madhako kosa jacwo gi luth to ŋeca no tho i cinge, iripo miyo go gir'acula.
To ka ŋeca no otho rumacen ma ndelo kosa ario, wokiri womiy go gir'acula rupiri ŋeca no obedo lim pere won.”
“Ka ji jogore to jomiyo dhako ma yac litho to iye podho woko to ngoye litho man, ŋat'omiyo go litho iripo kitanza go gima cwor dhako no okethi kwoŋe cungo kwoŋ yerok pa jothum banja.
To ka dhako won am'omiyo go litho, kenyo gir'acula wobedi kwo ri kwo,
waŋ ri waŋ, lak ri lak, cingi ri cingi, tiendi ri tiendi,
waŋ ri waŋ, adhola ri adhola, aka gwarok ri gwarok.”
“Ka nyatoro ogoyo waŋ ŋeca pere madhako kosa jacwo to waŋe fudhere, wogonyi go paka cul ma waŋe.
K'ofudho lake, wogonyi go paka cul ma lake.”
“Ka thwon oguro jacwo kosa dhako to neko, wogoy gi tele aka wokiri wocam riŋo mere. To won mere wokiri womiy gir'acula.
To k'oyido oŋeyere nike thwon no jagur jo, aka otiek kiri gwoko won mere to weyo ma k'otweyo, to thwon no guro nyatoro, iripo goyo gi tele, aka kiri won mere je woneki.
To k'oyey kitanza won mere ma botho kwo pere, go ripo culo gima mitere je.
Ka thwon ogur jayac kosa nyako, wotiy gine gi cik acel me.
Ka thwon oneki ŋeca ma jacwo kosa madhako, won mere woculi won ŋeca no, feza piero adek, aka thwon no wogoy gi tele to tho.”
“Ka nyatoro owey bur m'oyawere kosa okuny bur to weyo ma k'oculo to lapodho iye,
won bur ripo miyo cul ri le no. Go ripo culo won le pesa, to doŋ gine.
Ka thwon pa nyatoro oneki apa nyatoro man, kenyo jario joripo kitana thwon makwo, to jopoko pesa mere, aka jowopoki riŋo ma thwon m'otho bende.
To k'oyido oŋeyere nike thwon no jagur jo aka won mere k'otweyo, kenyo go ripo keŋ gi culo thwon makwo, to go doŋ gi m'otho.”
“Ka nyatoro okwalo dhiaŋ kosa rombo to neko kosa tana, go ripo culo dhok abic ri dhiaŋ acel, gi rombo aŋwen ri rombo acel. Go ripo culo, aka ka kinyal wotana go paka ŋeca.
K'onwaŋ gine go munyo fodi kwo, kosa obedi dhiaŋ, kosa punda, kosa rombo, go woculi ario i kawaŋ acel.”
“K'onwaŋ jakwo turo ot wor t'ineko, ŋat'oneko go no kibedi janek.
To k'otimere odieceŋ, ŋat'oneko go bedo jabanja ma neki.”
“Ka nyatoro oloko ndelo kosa ndelo vini kakwath, kosa ogony ogwaŋe pere to jo cemo i ndelo pa ŋatiman, go ripo culo wok kwoŋ gimaber ma ndelo pere gi ndelo vini pere.”
“Ka nyatoro ocwiny mac i ndelo pere to mako kudhin ŋey wolaki i ndelo pa ŋatiman to waŋo ŋano madongo kosa m'okec otwey, ŋat'ocwinyo mac ripo culo gima mac owaŋo.”
“Ka nyatoro omiyo jager pere kano rigo pesa kosa lim moro je, t'ikwalo wok i ot pere, jakwo no k'omaki ripo culo dirio.
To ka k'omaki jakwo, iripo kelo ŋat'oyido kuro gigipiny i kalamo wokwoŋere nike go k'okwalo gigipiny pa nyawote.”
“K'obedi piem moro je ma mako kwoŋ lim, obedi dhiaŋ, punde, rombo, nangin kosa gimoro je m'orwenyo, wokel ji ma joosere i kalamo. Ŋata Were othum rigo banja bino culo nyawote dirio.”
“Ka nyatoro oyere kuro ri jager pere punda, dhiaŋ, rombo, kosa le moro je, to le no tho kosa wumiya, kosa onyaga, aka oyido ongoye ŋata neno,
kwoŋirok ruwaŋ Rwoth bino nyutho k'inen go k'okwalo le. Won le ripo yeyo kwoŋirok, aka ŋat'oyido kuro kiripi culo.
To k'okwal le wok bongi go, go ripo culo won mere.
K'inen ogwaŋe madudi joneko, weyi go wokel m'odoŋ paka jakony, aka cul wokiri wobedi ri gim'ogwaŋe madudi joneko.”
“Ka nyatoro okwayo le pa jager pere, to miyo litho kosa tho ma won mere ongoye, go ripo culo.
To k'inen won mere oyido nitie, go kiripi culo. K'oyido opangisa, cul ma kipangisa romo.”
“Ka jacwo oweco gi nyako mambula aka oyido fodi ongoye gi ombego to nindo gine, go ripo culo nywom to nywomo go.
To ka ba nyako okwero go nywomo nyako, go ripo culo ba nyako nywom ma ripo gi nyako mambula.”
“Neki win jacwo ma nindo g'ogwaŋ.”
“Wikiri witer japath marac, kosa widiy go, kole win bende oyido wibedo jopath i piny Misir.
Wikiri wicandi citho kosa nyithindho kic.
Ka winocandi jo to joywak ran, adieri abino winjo ywak pajo,
aka keme paran bino liel t'aneko win i lweny. Mon mewin jobino doŋ citho aka nyithindho mewin kic.”
“Ka wikopa pesa ri ji paran ma jocandi, wikiri wicalo jokikopa t'imiyo go culo gi magowa.
Ka nyatoro osinga rin nanga to ciko nike laculin, iripo dwoko rigo nanga mafodi waŋceŋ k'opodho
kwoŋbedo meno obedo gium pere ma go nitie gine kende. Aŋo man ma go onindi iye? Ka go oywaki ran ri kony, Abino winjo rupiri Abedo jakisa.”
“Ikir'iluw marac kwoŋ Were kosa ilami jatel pa ji perin.”
“Miyan win cowirok mewin ma ŋano, vini, kodi mo mewin ka jocek.”
“Miyan win okayin mewin.
Miyan win okayin pa dhok gi rombo mewin. Weyi win jowobedi gi yok gin ma ndelo abirio, aka i ndelo mar'aboro wimiyan jo.”
“Wibedo ji paran, riameno wikiri wicam le m'ogwaŋ madudi oneko, kwanyo woko bol win ri gwokere.”
Ikir'iluw lwak ji i timo reco, kosa ka jomiyo jakony wiro tiro.
Ikir'itim nyakucel ri jacandi i kapido.”
K'inen punda pere opodho gi gim'otiŋo, kony go wotiŋ malo punda; ikir'ikali go.”
Ikir'isegeya ma nono, aka Ikir'ineki ŋata k'otimo banja gi jom'otire, rupiri abino thumo banja ri jokidakana.
Ikir'ijol nyew, rupiri nyew coro waŋ jo ri gim'otire aka dwanyo banja pa jom'otire.”

to i oro mar'abirio, wiwey woywomere, aka wikiri wikec gimoro je ma odongi iye, ŋey jocandi jowocami gim'odongi kenyo, aka ogwaŋe madudi jowocami gim'odoŋ'iye. Wilatimo gimoro acel i ndelo vini mewin gi yen vini mewin.
“Winji win kisi gim'atieko waco riwin. Wikiri wikway werin man, wikiri wituci kada nyingi gin.”
“Tim ran win kalima adek i kisi oro.

I dwe ma Abib, dwe ma wieye iye wok Misir, tim win kalima ma mugat ma buthow paka amiyo win or. Wikiri wicam mugat moro je gi thow i hongo ma ndelo abirio ma kalima me. Wongoye ŋata wobin laman m'ongoye mic.”
“Tim win kalima ma kayindi ka oro rumo, ka wicoko ranyak mewin wok i ndelin mewin.
Kisi oro ka witimo kalima adek me, cwo mewin je joripo bino lamo Rwoth Were mewin.”
“Wikiri wimiyan mugat m'otimi gi thow ka wimiyan cowirok ma le, kosa wiwey bor ma le wobedi kiri yawere odikin.”
“Wikiri witedi nyathi diel i cak pa min.”
Neni, aoro malaika yuwiy win, gwoko win ka wiwotho, kodi kelo win i kabedo m'atieko yiko.
Cik win ithi win aka wiwinji go. Wikiri wigwenyere kwoŋe, rupiri aoro go aka k'ocwaki reco mewin.
To ka winowinji go to witimo kisi gim'amiyo win cik timo, abino lwenyo gi jokwor mewin je.
Malaika paran bino telo win to kelo win i lowo pa Joamor, Johiti, Joperiz, Jokanan, Johivi, kodi Joyebus, aka abino reyo jo.
Wikiri wikule piny ri werin pajo to wilamo jo, aka wikiri wicaki timo tim manyadini pajo. Nyek win werin pajo to wituro sirin pajo ma telin.
Ka wilaman, Rwoth Were mewin, abino miyo win silwany ma cemo gi pi, t'abotho two mewin je.
I lowo mewin ongoye dhako ma iye bino podho woko, kosa ma bino bedo kinywol. Abino miyo win kwo mabor.
“Abino miyo ji ma jogwoŋa gi win lworan. Abino kelo nyawin i dier ji ma wilwenyo gi jo, aka abino miyo jokwor mewin wirok to joringo kwoŋ win.
Abino miyo jokwor mewin kirin. Abino riemo Johivi, Jokanan, kodi Johiti kwoŋ win.
Ak'oriem jo woko i oro acel, kosa piny mewin nyalo doŋ m'othangere to ogwaŋe madudi jobedo madit riwin.
Kwanyowoko, abino riemo jo mothmoth, cuka winomedi nyay to wiloko amewin.
Abino ketho kew mewin wok i Nam M'obokere kiri i nam pa Jofilistia, kodi wok i thim tundo i malawa Yufrete. Abino miyo win meni kwoŋ ji je aka wibino riemo jo woko kwoŋ win.
Wikiri witim cikirok gi jo kosa gi werin pajo.
Wikiri wiyey jowobedi i piny mewin. Ka winoyey jo, jonyalo miyo win timo reco kwoŋan. Ka wilamo werin pajo bino bedo bwo riwin ma tho.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Biye bongan wi got malo, in kodi Aron, Nadab, Abihu, kodi jodongo piero abirio ma Isiraili, aka ma fodi wikitundo, kule win wilaman.
In kendin iŋat'ibin cegin gi Rwoth, to ji man jokiri jowocore cegin, aka ji jokiri jowobin malo gi jo.”
Musa obino to waco ri ji je Or pa Rwoth gi cik je, aka ji je jodwoko akwora ni, “Walatimo gima Rwoth owaco je.”
Musa ondiko piny Or pa Rwoth je. Yawere odikin maŋic ogeto migam ri Rwoth i tiendi got aka oketho telin apar g'ario, acel ri kisi nonin apar g'ario ma Isiraili.
Kenyo ooro yac, aka jomiyo Rwoth cowirok awaŋa to jomiyo megikwe paka cowirok ma siem.
Musa okwanyo adec ma remo mar'ogwaŋe aka oketho i kalaya aka man okiro i wi migam.
Kenyo okwanyo kitawo ma cikirok m'oyido ondiki iye Or pa Rwoth to soma ri ji, aka jodwoko ni, “Wabino timo kisi gima Rwoth owaco aka wabino winjo.”
Musa, Aron, Nadab, Abihu, kodi jodongo piero abirio ma Isiraili joidho malo wi got
aka joneno Were pa Isiraili. I par tiende oyido nitie gima cale tele ma welo manyabululu pa polo m'ilwoŋo ni Safire.
Were k'omiyo go litho jodongo ma Isiraili, joneno Were, aka jocemo to jomedho kanyacel.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Biye malo bongan wi got, aka ikuri kenyo. Alamiyin telin mapando ario manitie iye cik gi Or m'atieko ndiko ma fonjo jo.”
Ameno Musa oay gi jakony pere Yosuwa, aka Musa oidho wi got pa Were.
Aka owaco ri jodongo ni, “Kur win ka, cuka wanodwoki bongi win kendo, aka neni, Aron gi Hur jonitie gi win ŋata nitie gi teko wokidhi bongi jo.”
Musa oidho wi got aka pondeponde oumo.
Dwoŋ pa Rwoth obino wi got Sinai to pondeponde umo got ma ndelo aucel. I ndelo mar'abirio Rwoth olwoŋo Musa wok i pondeponde.
Onyo cal madwoŋ pa Rwoth oyido cale mac maliel wi got i waŋ Joisiraili.
Aka Musa odonjo i pondeponde to idho wi got. Musa obedo wi got ma ndelo piero aŋwen, wor gi odieceŋ.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa
“Waci ri Joisiraili jowomiyan mic. Jol mic moro je ma nyatoro mito miyo.
Mic no wobedi, zahabu, feza, ywel,
nangin mafoth, manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi pien rombo m'obokere, nanga m'otimi gi yer diel,
piendere wot rombo m'owir m'obokere, piendere diegi, mbawo kasia,
mo talin, gigipiny manitie gi kur mamit ma ruwo gi mo ma wir kodi ri buban manitie gi kur mamit,
Telin ma welo m'obokere obokere, kodi telin ma tweyo ri law pa jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi ri mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were.
Ji joripo geto ran wema maleŋ, ŋey anyal bedo i dier jo.
Tim win kodi gigipiny ma iye i nger can m'akidho nyuthin.”
“Jowotimi ran Kakan ma Cikirok wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia, boro mere wobedi inci piero aŋwen g'abic, laco inci piero ario g'abirio, kodi ŋawirok inci piero ario g'abirio.
Woum iye gi dieŋeye kodi zahabu macil thoko, aka wokethi miango ma loko maŋon thoko.
Wotim rigo petin aŋwen ma zahabu t'iriwo gi tiende aŋwen, petin ario i kisi thenge.
Wotim gute ma kasia aka woum gi zahabu
t'irwako jo i petin ma kisi thengi Kakan ma Cikirok.
Gute no joripo doŋ i petin aka kiripi fudho woko jo.
Kenyo oketh'iye telin mapando ario m'ondik'iye Or.”
“Jowotimi giumo gi zahabu macil, boro mere inci piero aŋwen g'abic, aka laco inci piero ario g'abirio.
Wotim cwec ma jobwombi gin ario gi zahabu m'ocadhi,
acel ri kisi gike ma giumo. Wotim ŋey joworom giumo.
Cwec ma jonigi bwombi gin jowoŋiyere karo giumo, aka bwombi gin woumi.
Wokethi telin mapando ario i Kakan ma Cikirok, t'iketho giumo i wiye.
Abino romo kodin kenyo, aka i wi giumo i dier cwec ma jobwombi gin, abino miyin cik je ri Joisiraili.”
“Wotim meza wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia, boro mere inci piero adek g'aucel, laco inci apar g'aboro, aka ŋawirok inci piero ario g'abirio.
Woum gi zahabu macil aka wothok gine.
Wotim miango mere ma inci adek i laco, aka wothok gi zahabu.
Wotim petin aŋwen gi zahabu t'iketho i sonda aŋwen, kama tiende jonitie iye.
Petin ma thielo gute ma tiŋo meza wokethi cegin gi miango.
Wotim gute ma mbawo kasia, t'iumo gi zahabu.
Wotim sendere, kikopere, agwatin, kodi atewe m'ilaoro i mic ma vini. Joje wotim gi zahabu.
Meza no wokethi ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok, aka i meza no noknok wobedi mugat maleŋ m'imiyan.”
“Wotim raŋaw tala gi zahabu macil. Pende gi kore wotim gi zahabu m'ocadhi. Raŋaw tala gikululu kodi mawuwin mere iripo timo wok kwoŋ zahabu m'ocadhi
gi jange aucel, adek i kisi thenge.
Kisi jange wobedi gi mawuwin adek ma cale gi thiw yath alimond gi jange kodi thiwe.
Kor raŋaw tala ripo bedo gi mawuwin aŋwen ma cale gi thiw yath alimond gi jange kodi thiwe.
Ripo wobedi mawuwa kama kisi jange wok kwoŋ kore.
Mawuwin, jange kodi raŋaw tala iripo timo gi zahabu macil m'ocadhi.
Wotim talin abirio ri raŋaw tala, aka wokethi jowoliel ŋiyo yuwiye.
Wotim lew jo gi siniyin pajo gi zahabu macil.
Woor kilo piero adek g'abic ma zahabu macil ma timo raŋaw tala gi gigipiny mere je.
Wonen nike otim jo i can m'anyuthin wi got.”
Wotim ran Wema maleŋ, Wema m'alabed'iye, g'adece apar ma nangin mafoth m'okwoy gi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere. Wokwoy jo gi cal pa cwec ma jobwombi gin.
Wotim kisi adec mita apar g'ario mabor, aka mita ario malac.
Wokwoy abic kanyacel, kodi abic man kanyacel.
Wokwoy kondin ma nanga manyabululu i dhok adec ma woko i kisi adec abic.
Wokwoy kondin piero abic iy'adec acel, kodi kondin piero abic iy'adec man.
Wotim siragetere piero abic gi zahabu ma riwo adec m'okwoy kadirio kanyacel.
“Wotim giumo Wema maleŋ wok kwoŋ adec nangin apar g'acel m'otimi gi yer diel.
Wotim jo marom, mita apar g'adek i boro, kodi mita ario i laco.
Wokwoy abic kanyacel, aka abic man bende. Adec acel m'odoŋ wodol ruwaŋ Wema maleŋ.
Wokwoy kondin piero abic i tok adec acel m'okwoy kanyacel, kodi iy'adec man bende.
Wotim siraget ma ywel piero abic t'iketho i ithi adec ario m'okwoy kanyacel woriw jo.
Woŋaw adec acel m'odoŋ yucen ma Wema maleŋ.
Adec yadi m'odoŋ mabor i kisi thenge woŋaw i thengi Wema maleŋ woum.”
“Wotim giumo man kendo, acel ma pien wod rombo m'owir gi rangi m'obokere, kodi man ma yer diel, ma geŋo woko.”
“Wotim miango wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia ri kor Wema maleŋ.
Kisi miango wobedi mita aŋwen i boro, aka laco wobedi inci piero ario g'abirio,
kodi akare ario manyalo yeyo jo riwirok. Kisi miango wobedi gi akare.
Wotim miangin piero ario ri thenge ma yupiny,
gi pende piero aŋwen ma feza, pende ario i ŋangi kisi miango ma mako akare mere ario.
Wotim miangin piero ario ri thenge ma yumalo,
gi pende piero aŋwen ma feza, ario i ŋangi kisi miango.
Ri yucen ma Wema yupodho ceŋ, wotim miangin aucel,
kodi miangin ario ri kisi sonda.
Miangin ma kisi sonda iripo riwo jo wok malo kiri piny. Miangin ario ma jotimo sondin iripo timo jo ama.
Ameno joje jowobedi miangin aboro gi pende apar g'aucel, ario i ŋangi kisi miango.”
“Wotim yen ariwa apar g'abic wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia, abic ri miango ma thenge acel ma Wema maleŋ
abic ri miango ma thenge man, aka abic ri miango ma thenge ma yupodho ceŋ, yucen.
Ma diere, i kor miango woluwi wok i gike tundo i gike ma Wema.
Woum miangin gi zahabu aka worwaki gi petin ma zahabu womaki yen ariwa, ma bende woum gi zahabu.
Wotim Wema i can m'anyuthin wi got.”
“Wotim nanga ma liero gi nangin mafoth, kodi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere. Loki maŋon i cal pa cwec ma jonitie gi bwombe gin.
Woŋaw iy'asur aŋwen ma mbawo kasia m'oum gi zahabu, gi siragetere ma zahabu, kwoŋ pende aŋwen ma feza.
Wolier nanga m'iliero i ŋangi bol ma siragetere ma wi kisul Wema, aka wokethi Kakan ma Cikirok m'otiŋo telin mapando ario yuŋeye. Nanga m'olier bino poko Kabedo Maleŋ kwoŋ Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo.
Wokethi giumo i wi Kakan ma Cikirok.
Woko ma Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, wokethi meza yumalo ma Wema kodi raŋaw tala yupiny.”
“Ri dhiot ma Wema wotim nanga ma liero gi nanga mafoth, gi yeri rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere aka woloki maŋon gi kwoyo gi piso.
Ri nanga ma liero me wotim asu abic wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia to iumo gi zahabu aka worwaki gi siragetere ma zahabu. Wotim rijo pende abic ma ywel.”
“Wotim migam wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia. Wobedi mita 2.2 mabor, mita 2.2 malac, ŋawirok mere wobedi mita 1.3.
Wotim tunge aŋwen i kisi sonda mere. Jowobedi tim acel gi migam, aka woum thoko gi ywel.
Wotim degi ma jolo buru mere, mwiko, atewe, siragetere, kodi sapikere. Gigipiny me je wotim gi ywel.
Wotim kicungwo ma ywel gi petin aŋwen ma ywel ma tiŋo i kisi sonda mere.
Kethi kicungwo i ŋangi akor migam, ŋey wotundi adec malo ma migam.
Wotim gute wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia, aka woum gi ywel.
To iketho i petin ma kisi thengi migam k'otiŋ.
Wotim migam gi mbawo aka wobedi m'oŋamere i can m'anyuthin wi got.”
“Wotim diedipo ri Wema Maleŋ. Yupiny wobedi nanga ma liero ma boro mere mita piero aŋwen g'aŋwen,
asu mere wobedi piero ario, kodi pende piero ario ma ywel, to siragetere kodi ludhe mere jowobedi ma feza.
Wotim gimoro acel ri nanga ma liero yuthenge ma yumalo ma diedipo.
Yuthenge ma yupodho ceŋ wobedi nanga ma umo ma mita piero ario g'ario, gi asu apar, kodi pende apar.
Yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ, kama nitie iye dhiot, wobedi nanga ma liero ma mita piero ario g'ario.
I kisi thenge ma dhiot wobedi nanga ma liero ma mita 6.6 kodi asu adek gi pende adek.

Ri waŋkac ma diedipo wobedi nanga ma liero m'otimi gi nanga mafoth, kodi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere ma boro mere mita abuŋwen, aka wokwoy maŋon. Wothiel kodi asu aŋwen i pende aŋwen.
Asu je ma jothoko diedipo woriw gi ludhe ma feza, siragetere pajo jowobedi ma feza, aka pendi gin jowobedi ma ywel.
Diedipo wobedi mita piero aŋwen g'aŋwen i boro, mita piero ario g'ario i laco, kodi mita 2.2 i ŋawirok. Nangin ma liero wotim gi nangin mafoth kodi pende ma ywel.
Gigipiny je m'oor i Wema kodi loce ma Wema wotim gi ywel.”
“Miy Joisiraili cik ŋey jowokeli rin mo nanzi ri tala, ŋey wocwiny kisi othieno.

Aron gi wote ama jowocwinyo tala i Wema Maleŋ woko ma nanga ma geŋo manitie ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok. Kenyo ruwaŋan woliel wok othieno tundo odikin. Cik me Joisiraili gi nyikway jo jowokuri cil gi cil.”
“Lwoŋ omin in Aron gi wote, Nadab, Abihu, Eliazar, kodi Ithamar. Pok jo i dier Joisiraili ŋey jowotiy ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Kwoy ri Aron ruk pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, ri dwoŋ kodi ŋono.
Lwoŋ jotic je ma jondijo m'amiyo jo nyalo, aka iwaci rijo jowokwoy nangin pa Aron, ŋey womiyan go paka jacway ri Were i wi migam i tic paran.

Waci rijo jowokwoy mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were, law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, kanzu, sati m'olok maŋon, junga, kodi thol ma pier jo. Jowokwoy ruk me ri Aron gi wote ŋey jowotiy ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Jotic ma jondijo jowoor yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere, uzi ma rangi ma zahabu, kodi nanga mafoth.”
“Jowokwoy law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam gi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere, uzi ma rangi ma zahabu, kodi nanga mafoth, aka wokwoy maŋon.
Wobedi gi thondhe ario i goke m'omakere gi thenge m'inyalo tudo kanyacel.
Wokwoy'iye thol gi gigipiny acel, ŋey jowobedi ma tim acel gi law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Kwany telin ario ma welo m'obokere obokere aka indik'iye nyingi wot Yakobo apar g'ario,
cungo kwoŋ nywolirok pajo, aucel i tele acel, kodi aucel i tele man.
Nwaŋ jandijo ma pac wondiki nyingi wot Yakobo aka ikethi i miango ma zahabu.
Kethi jo i thol ma goki law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam jowocungi ri nonin apar g'ario ma Isiraili. I nger me Aron bino tiŋo nyingi jo i goke, ŋey An, Rwoth abino poyo ji paran noknok.
Tim miango ma zahabu ario
kodi lijegere ario wok kwoŋ zahabu macil m'otudi p'adasa, aka iriw jo i miango.”
“Tim ri jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were. Wobedi ma tim acel kodi law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam aka gi kwoco acel.
Wobedi gi thenge je ma jorom aka wodol dirio, boro mere wobedi inci abuŋwen, aka laco bende inci abuŋwen.
Ican bol aŋwen ma telin ma welo. I bol marapena can tele m'obokere, tele manyarangi oliv, kodi tele manyarangi aremo.
I bol mar'ario can tele manyaboke pendi, tele manyabululu, kodi diamondi.
I bol mar'adek cani telin m'obokere nyamicungwa, tele m'oruwo rangi matar g'akwaro kodi tele manyarangi ariŋo.
I bol mar'aŋwen can tele manyatongweno, tele m'obokere obokere, kodi tele manyaboke pendi. Can joje i miango ma zahabu.
Kwoŋ kisi telin apar g'ario me wondik'iye nyingi acel kwoŋ wot Yakobo, wocungi ri nonin ma Isiraili.
Ri mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were tim lijegerin wok kwoŋ zahabu macil, m'otudi p'adasa.
Aka itimi petin ario gi zahabu t'itweyo jo i kisi sonda ma malo ma mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were,
aka itwey adasin ario ma zahabu i petin ario.
Tweyi gike ario ca mar'adasin i miangin ario, aka i nger me tweyi jo yunyime i thol ma goki law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Kenyo tim petin ario ma zahabu aka itwey i kisi sonda ma piny ma mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were i gike ma iye cegin gi law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Tim petin ario kendo ma zahabu aka itwey jo piny ma yunyim thol ario ma goki law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam cegin gi kama riwer'iye gine malo ma thol m'otudi.
Tweyi petin ma mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were i petin ma law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam g'adasa manyabululu, ŋey mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were wobedi i wi thol aka wokiri wolwogere.”
“Ameno ka Aron odonjo i Kabedo Maleŋ, go bino ruko mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were m'ondik'iye nyingi nonin ma Isiraili, ŋey An Rwoth, abino poyo ji paran noknok.
Kethi Urim gi Thumim
“Kanzu ma ruko piny ma law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ripo wotim gi yer rombo manyabululu.
Wobedi gi hoŋ i wiye, aka hoŋ no woridhi kodi gitweyo m'okwoy ŋey wokiri woyec.
Thoko rinda mere gipi wokwoy cal ma pomo gi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere, m'oluwere g'olaŋere ma zahabu.
Aron bino ruko kanzu me ka tiyo paka jacway ri Were i wi migam, ka bino ruwaŋan i Kabedo Maleŋ kosa ka eye, ywak p'olaŋ lawinjere, aka kilaneko go.”
“Aka itimi sen gi zahabu macil aka indik'iye ni, ‘Leŋo ri Rwoth.’
Tweyi ruwaŋ junga gi thol manyabululu.
Aron woruki i nyime, ŋey An Rwoth, abino jolo mic je ma Joisiraili jomiyan, makada nende ji jotimi raco ka jomiyan.”
“Kwoy sati pa Aron kodi junga gi nanga mafoth, kodi thol bende m'okwoy maŋon.”
“Kwoy ri wot Aron satere, thondhe, kodi jungin, ma miyo dwoŋ kodi ŋono.
Ikethi nangin me kwoŋ omin in Aron gi wote. Kenyo ilami jo aka ikethi ran jo gicen t'iwiro jo gi mo ŋey jowotiy ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Tim rijo palere gi nanga mafoth ma wok i pier jo tundo i bat jo, ŋey jokiri jowothangere.

Aron gi wote joripo ruko noknok ka jodonjo i Wema Maleŋ kosa ka jocore i migam tiyo paka jocway ri Were i wi migam i Kabedo Maleŋ, ŋey wokiri woneki jo ro thangirok. Me cik ri Aron gi nyikwaye cil gi cil.”
“Onyo me a gim'ila timo ri Aron kodi wote k'ikwoŋo jo tic ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam. Kwany rwath dhiaŋ kodi wot rombo ario ma jok'oŋol.
Or moko ŋano maber loyo, to ma buthow, aka itimi mugat gi mo, man m'ongoy'iye mo, kodi man ma cale bisikwit m'owir gi mo.
Kethi jo iy'adita aka imiyan k'imiyo cowirok ma rwath dhiaŋ kodi wot rombo ario.”
“Ikeli Aron gi wote i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, aka ilwoki jo gi pi.
Kenyo ruk go gi ruk pa jocway ri Were i wi migam; sati, kanzu ma pendi law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were, kodi del.
Kethi junga i wiye, aka ikethi sangaria maleŋ i wi junga.
Kenyo kwany mo, ikonji i wiy go, aka iwir go.”
“Keli wote aka ikethi satere kwoŋ jo,
tweyi thondhe i pier jo, aka itwey jungin i wi gin. Ameno apaka ibino kwoŋo Aron gi wote. Jo gi nyikway jo jobino tiyo ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam kicutho.”
“Keli rwath ruwaŋ Wema Maleŋ aka iwaci ri Aron gi wote jowokethi cingi gin i wic mere.
Thum kenyo ruwaŋ Rwoth, i dhiot ma Wema Maleŋ
Kwany remo moro gi lwet cingin aka ikethi i tungi migam. Kenyo ikonji m'odoŋ i pendi migam.
Ma luwo, kwany bor ma umo gigipiny ma iye, kodi adec ma cuny maber loyo, kodi roge ario gi bor ma kwoŋ jo aka iwaŋ i wi migam paka mic ran.
To waŋ riŋo mere, pien, kodi gigipiny ma iye woko ma kambi. Me mic ma kwanyo woko reco pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.”
“Kwany acel kwoŋ wot rombo aka iwaci ri Aron gi wote jowokethi cingi gin i wic mere.
Thum, aka ikwany remo mere ikiri thoko migam, thenge aŋwen je.
Iyaŋ mathindho thindho, lwoki gigipiny ma iye kodi bate, aka ikethi i wi wic mere kodi adec man.
Waŋ gipi i wi migam paka mic ma cemo manyinge. Kur ma mic me sangala an.”
“Kwany wod rombo man ca, aka Aron gi wote jowokethi cingi gin i wic mere.
Thum, aka ikwany remo moro ikethi i ithi Aron gi wote maracuc. Lwet cingi gin ma thwon maracuc, gi lwet tiendi gin ma thwon maracuc. Kiri remo m'odoŋ thoko migam.
Kenyo ikwany remo moro wok kwoŋ ma migam, kodi mo, aka ikir'ikwoŋ Aron gi wote, kodi nangin pajo. Go, wote, gi nangin pajo bino miyirok ran.”
“Iŋadi bor ma wod rombo, yiwe ma dibor, bor ma umo gigipiny ma iye, adec maber loyo ma cuny, roge ario, kodi bat mere maracuc.
Wok kwoŋ mugat m'omiyan, kwany mugat acel m'otimi gi mo, acel ma k'otimi gi mo, kodi bisikwit acel.
Kethi cemo no i cingi Aron gi wote aka iwaci rijo jowomiyan paka mic ma welo.
Kenyo ikwany wok i cingi jo aka iwaŋ i wi cowirok awaŋa paka cowirok ma cemo ran. Kur ma mic me sangala an.”
“Kwany aŋakin ma wod rombo aka imiyan paka mic ma welo. Adec me bino bedo aperin.”
“K'ikwoŋo jacway ri Were i wi migam, aŋakin kodi bat wod rombo m'ioro ma kwoŋo womiyan paka mic ma welo aka wokethi gicen ri jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Adece no labedo ri Aron gi wote paka gima Joisiraili joripo timo, kole obedo adec pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ma Joisiraili jomiyo wok kwoŋ cowirok pajo ma siem, obedo mic pajo ri Rwoth.”
“Ruk pa Aron womiy wote joworuki ka go otho, joworuki k'ikwoŋo jo.
Wod Aron m'olunji go paka jacway ri Were i wi migam aka ma donjo i Wema Maleŋ tiyo ran i Kabedo Maleŋ woruki ruk me ma ndelo abirio.”
“Kwany riŋo ma wod rombo m'oor ma kwoŋo Aron gi wote aka itedi i Kabedo Maleŋ.
Jowocami i dhiot ma Wema Maleŋ gi mugat m'odoŋ iy'adita.
Jowocami gi m'oor i kwer ma cwako i kwoŋo jo. Jocway ri Were i wi migam kende ama jowocami cemo me rupiri leŋ.
Ka riŋo moro kosa mugat moro k'ocami tundo odikin, wowaŋ kiripi camo rupiri leŋ.”
“Tim kwer ma kwoŋirok me ri Aron gi wote ma ndelo abirio paka amiyin or.
Kisi ndelo iripo miyo thwon paka cowirok, ŋey reco wocwaki. Me bino lonyo migam. Kenyo iwir gi mo woloki maleŋ.
Tim gime kisi ndelo ma ndelo abirio. Kenyo migam bino bedo maleŋ kicutho, aka nyatoro kosa gimoro je m'ogey bino limo litho gi meni ma leŋo mere.”
“Kisi ndelo i hongo je, miy cowirok ma nyithindhi rombo ario ma wote ma jo oro acel i wi migam.
Miy cowirok ma nyathi rombo ma wode acel odikin, aka acel othieno.
Gi nyathi rombo ma wode marapena miy bende kilo acel ma moko ŋano m'oruw gi lita acel mangil. Konji lita acel ma vini paka mic.
Miy cowirok ma nyathi rombo ma wode mar'ario gi gigipiny no bende paka odikin. Me mic ma cemo manyinge ran, Rwoth aka kur mere sangala an.
I hongo je ma bino, mic awaŋa me iripo miyo ruwaŋan i dhiot ma Wema Maleŋ. Kenyo a kam'abino rom'iye gi ji paran t'aluwo gi jo.
Kenyo abino romo gi Joisiraili, aka abino loko jo maleŋ gi dwoŋ paran.
Abino loko Wema Maleŋ gi migam maleŋ, aka abino ketho gicen Aron gi wote tiyo ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Abino bedo i dier ji paran Joisiraili, aka abino bedo Were pajo.
Jobino ŋeyo ni Abedo Rwoth Were m'owodho jo wok i Misir ŋey abedi i dier jo. An abedo Rwoth Were pajo.”
“Tim migam ma waŋo buban.
Wobedi inci apar g'aboro i boro, inci apar g'aboro i laco, kodi inci piero aŋwen g'abic i ŋawirok; tunge mere i kisi sonda aŋwen jowobedi marom gine.
Ium wiye, thenge aŋwen je, kodi tunge gi zahabu macil, aka ikethi miango ma zahabu thoko.
Tim petin ario ma zahabu ma tiŋo aka iriw jo piny ma miango i thenge ario jowomaki asu ma tiŋo gine.
Tim asu me wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia aka ium gi zahabu.
Kethi migam me woko ma nanga ma liero ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok. Kenyo a kabedo m'abino rom'iye kodin.
Kisi odikin ka Aron bino cwinyo tala wowaŋ buban maŋwe kur mamit i iye.
Go ripo timo ameno ka cwinyo talin othieno. Mic ma buban womedere ma k'owir i hongo je ma bino.
Ikir'imiy i migam me buban ma kileŋ, cowirok awaŋa, kosa mic ma ŋano, aka ikir'ikonji vini moro je i iye.

Dicel kisi oro Aron wotim'iye kwer ma lonyo migam to ketho i tunge mere remo mar'ogwaŋ ma cowirok. Gime iripo timo kisi oro i hongo ma bino je. Migam me ripo bedo maleŋ kicutho, m'omiyere ran, Rwoth.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“K'ikwano welo Joisiraili, wac ri kisi nyatoro woculi welo ma kwo pere, ŋey thoyamo wokiri wobin kwoŋe k'ikwano jo.
Kisi nyatoro m'okwan ripo culo pesa ma mitere aka wopima gi rapim m'ioro. Kisi nyatoro ripo culo paka mic ran.
Kisi nyatoro m'okwan i kwanirok, meno kisi jacwo ma jaoro piero ario kosa kalo ripo culo mic pa Rwoth.
Jaŋaŋo wokiri woculi maloyo, aka jacandi wokiri woculi manok, ka joculo mic pa Rwoth ri kwo pajo.
Coki pesa me wok bongi Joisiraili aka ior ma kuro Wema Maleŋ. Pesa labedo cul ri kwo, aka abino poyo kikwonga jo.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“Tim kalaya gi pende ma ywel. Kethi i dier Wema Maleŋ gi migam aka ikonj'iye pi.
Aron gi wote jolalwoko tiendi gin gi cingi gin
kafodi jok'odonjo i wema kosa corok i migam miyo mic ma cemo manyinge. Ameno kilaneko jo.
Joripo lwoko tiendi gin gi cingi gin ŋey jokiri jowotho. Me cik ma jo gi nyikway jo je joripo luwo cil gi cil.”

“Kwany gigipiny manitie gi kur loyo kilo aucel ma sandi manitie gi kur mamit ma yath m'ilwoŋo ni mira, kilo adek ma gim'onuŋere manitie gi kur mamit m'ilwoŋo ni cinamon, kilo adek ma midole manitie gi kur mamit,
kilo aucel ma kasia (joje pima gi rapim m'ioro). Imedi lita aŋwen ma mo
aka itimi mo ma wir maleŋ, m'oruw pa mo manitie gi kur.
Or ma wiro Wema Maleŋ, Kakan ma Cikirok,
meza gi gigipiny mere je, raŋaw tala gi gigipiny mere je, migam ma waŋo buban,
migam ma waŋo mic, kanyacel gi gigipiny mere je, kodi kalaya gi pende.
Imiyan gigipiny me i nger me, aka jobino bedo maleŋ kicutho, aka nyatoro kosa gimoro m'ogey jo bino miyo litho gi meni ma leŋo pajo.
Kenyo wir Aron gi wote, aka ikwoŋ jo paka jocway ri Were i wi migam jowotiy ran.
Waci ri Joisiraili ni, ‘Mo maleŋ woor i tic paran i hongo ma bino je.
Kiripi konjo kwoŋ ji ma kisi ndelo, aka ikir'ior nger acel ma ruwo mo man ma cale gine. Leŋ, aka iripo tero paka gimaleŋ.
Ŋat'otim mo ma cale gine kosa oor kwoŋ ŋata k'obedo jacway ri Were i wi migam k'okwanere paka acel kwoŋ ji paran kendo.’ ”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Kwany adec marom ma kisi gigipiny ma jonitie gi ŋwece kur me: Sitakite, onyca, galibanum, kodi buban macil
Or ma timo buban, m'oruw paka mo manitie gi kur. Medi cumbi woloki macil kendo maleŋ.
Odi adec mere wonuŋere, ter i Wema Maleŋ, aka ikiri ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok. Ter buban me maleŋ kicutho.
Ikir'ior nger acel ma timo buban man ma cale gine riwin wegi. Ter win paka gimaleŋ m'omiyan.
Ka nyatoro otim buban ma cale gine ma oro paka mo manitie gi kur, go k'okwanere paka acel kwoŋ ji paran kendo.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“Atieko yero Bezalel, wod pa Uri aka nyakwar Hur wok i nono pa Yuda,
atieko poŋo go gi Cuny pa Were, atieko miyo go niaŋ, ndijo kodi nyalo ma kisi nger tic pac.
Ndijo ma kidonya kodi timo jo gi zahabu, feza kodi ywel;
ma ŋado telin ma ketho, ma payo mbawin kodi tic man je ma pac.
Atieko bende yero Oholiab wod pa Ahisamak, wok i nono pa Dan, tiyo gi go. Atieko bende miyo nyalo madwoŋ ri jondijo man, ŋey jowonyal timo kisi gim'atieko wodho or ni wotim.
Wema Maleŋ, Kakan ma Cikirok giumo, kodi gigipiny ma Wema je.
Meza gi gigipiny mere je, raŋaw tala ma zahabu macil kodi gigipiny mere je, migam ma waŋo buban.
Migam ma cowirok awaŋa gi gigipiny mere je, kalaya ma lwok gi pende,
ruk maŋon ri Aron gi wote ma oro ka jotiyo ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Mo ma wir kodi buban ma nigi kur mamit ri Kabedo maleŋ. I timo gigipiny me je, jowotimi paka atieko wodho or.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa
waco ri Joisiraili ni, “Kur win ndelo ma Sabato, ndelo ma ywomirok, rupiri obedo ranyuth i dier An kodi win ri kisi hongo ma bino, nyutho nike An, Rwoth atieko loko win ji paran.
Wiripo kuro ndelo ma ywomirok, rupiri obedo ndelo maleŋ.”
“Ŋata kikur je, to tiyo i ndelo no woneki.
Winitie gi ndelo aucel ma timo tic mewin, to ndelo mar'abirio obedo ndelo ma cikirok ma ywomirok ri Rwoth. Ŋata timo tic moro je i ndelo no wonek.
Joisiraili joripo kuro ndelo me paka cikirok.
Obedo ranyuth makicutho i dier Joisiraili kodan, rupiri An Rwoth, acweyo polo gi piny i ndelo aucel, aka i ndelo mar'abirio atieko tic t'aywomere.”
Munyo Rwoth otieko luwo gi Musa wi got Sinai, omiyo go telin mapando ario ma Were won ondik'iye or.
Aron owaco rijo ni, “Luny win ywel ma zahabu ma mon mewin, wot win gi nyir mewin joruko aka wikel bongan.”
Ameno ji je jolunyo milom ma zahabu aka jokelo bongi Aron.
Aron ojolo zahabu wok i cingi jo aka olenyo to cweyo cal pa rwath.
Ji jowaco ni, “Isiraili, me were mawan m'owodho wan wok Misir!”
Munyo Aron oneno gime, ogeto migam ruwaŋ cal pa rwath aka owaco ni, “Dikin wabino camo kalima ri Rwoth.”
Yawere odikin maŋic, jomiyo cowirok awaŋa, kodi cowirok ma siem aka jobedo piny cemo gi medho, to joay malo cako tuko.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Lori piny, kole ji perin, m'iwodho jo wok i lowo ma Misir jotimo reco aka jokweran.
Jotieko weyo yo m'amiyo jo or ni jowoluwi, jocweyo rwath wok kwoŋ zahabu ma jolenyo aka jolamo to jomiyo cowirok. Jowaco ni me were pajo m'owodho jo wok i Misir.
Aŋeyo nger ma jonitie gi wictek.
