Onyo riameno, weyan, ŋey keme paran oliel kwoŋ jo aka arey woko jo; t'abino lokin piny madwoŋ.”
Raŋo Jomisir jowowaci nike iwodho ji perin wok Misir gi atoŋa ma neko jo i gote kodi reyo jo kicutho? Wire kwoŋ keme perin aka Ikir'ikeli teko me kwoŋ ji perin.
Poyi ŋecin perin Abraham, Isaka kodi Yakobo, m'ikwoŋere miyo jo nyikway jo kweth paka micalin ma polo kodi miyo nyikway jo lowo m'iciko nike bino bedo lim pajo cil gi cil.”
Ameno Rwoth owiro paro pere, aka k'okelo kwoŋ ji pere teko m'oyido opiro.
Musa ogik piny ma got kareno otiŋo telin mapando ario m'ondiki i thenge je or.
Were won am'oyido otimo to ndik'iye or.
Munyo Yosia owinjo koko pa ji, owaco ri Musa ni, “Awinjo derino ma lweny i kambi.”
To Musa odwoko ni, “Meno ki koko ma loyo, kosa ma kikengila, obedo ma wer.”
Aka tekin Musa core cegin gi kambi to neno cal ma rwath kodi miel, nge pere oliel, aka obolo piny telin mapando wok i cinge to jotur i tiendi got.
Aka okwanyo cal ma rwath m'oyido jocweyo, olenyo gi mac to rego m'onuŋere, aka oruwo gi pi to miyo ji madho.
Aka Musa openjo Aron, “Aŋo ma ji me jotimo rin, ŋey imiyo jo timo reco ma kiwacere me?”
Aron odwoko ni, “Ikir'imaki nge, iŋeyo nike ji me jomiyere timo reco.
Kole jowaco ran ni, ‘Wakuya gim'otimere ri jal me Musa, m'owodho wan wok i Misir, ameno tim riwan were ma wotel wan.’
Aka awaco rijo, ‘Weyi ŋata nitie gi zahabu woluny.’ Ameno jomiyan, aka abolo i mac, to wok'iye rwath me.”
Musa oneno ni Aron oweyo ji to jomiŋere wegi ruwaŋ jokwor pajo.
Ameno Musa ocungo i waŋkac ma kambi to koko, “Kisi nyatoro manitie i thenge pa Rwoth biye ka!” Ameno Jolevi jocokere thoko go,
aka Musa owaco rijo ni, “Rwoth Were pa Isiraili miyo kisi nyatoro or tweyo abor pere aka woluwi i kambi wok i waŋkac me tundo i meca gi neko wutmin, merin gi joger pere.”
Wot Levi jotimo gima Musa owaco, aka joneko ji 3,000 i ndelo no.
Musa owaco ri Jolevi ni, “Konon wimiyo kwo mewin ri Rwoth paka jocway ri Were i wi migam gi neko wot win, kodi wutmin win, riameno Rwoth omiyo win silwany.”
Yawere Musa owaco ri ji ni, “Witimo reco ma kiwacere. T'abino kidho malo bongi Rwoth kendo akway go wocwaki reco mewin.”
Kenyo Musa ogik bongi Rwoth aka owaco ni, “Ji me jotimo reco ma kiwacere. Jocweyo were wok kwoŋ zahabu to jolamo.
Mondo cwaki reco pajo; to k'ik'ocwaki, onyo reyi woko nyingan i kitawo m'indik'iye.”
To Rwoth odwoko Musa ni, “Joma jotimo reco am'alareyo woko nyingi jo wok i kitawo paran.
Onyo kadhi itel ji i kabedo m'atieko waco rin. Poyi nike malaika paran bino telin, to hongo bino m'alamiyo ji me gir'acula ro reco pajo.”
Ameno Rwoth odhiro two kwoŋ ji, rupiri oyido jomiyo Aron cweyo ri jo rwath ma zahabu.
Aka abino oro malaika telo win, aka abino riemo woko Jokanan, Joamor, Johiti, Joperiz, Johivi, kodi Joyebus.
Kadhi win malo i lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, to ak'okadhi gi win awon, rupiri wibedo ji ma wiy gin tek, aka anyalo neko win i yo.”
Munyo ji jowinjo gime, jocako ywak aka ongoye ŋat'oruko thiwino kendo.
Kole Rwoth oyido owaco ri Musa waco rijo ni, “Wibedo ji ma wiy gin tek. K'oyido akadho gi win kad'adec, oyido anyalo reyo win kicutho. Onyo luny win thiwino mewin, aka alaneno gir'atima gi win.”
Ameno rumacen ma eye i got Sinai, Joisiraili jok'oruko thiwino kendo.
Kisi ka Joisiraili oyido joketho kambi, Musa oyido tero Wema Maleŋ to ketho bor ye gi kambi. Oyido ilwoŋo ni Wema ma Rwoth bed'iye, aka kisi nyatoro ma mito luwo gi Rwoth oyido donj'iye.
Kisi hongo ka Musa oyido kidho i Wema, ji je oyido jocungo i dhiot ma wema pajo aka joŋiyo Musa cuka donjo i Wema Maleŋ.
Rumacen ma Musa donjo, siro pondeponde oyido loro to cungo i dhiot ma Wema, aka Rwoth oyido luwo gi Musa wok i pondeponde.
Tekin ji joneno siro pondeponde i dhiot ma Wema, oyido jokule piny.
Rwoth oyido luwo gi Musa awaŋ g'awaŋ, pa ŋata luwo gi mere pere. Kenyo Musa oyido gik i kambi, to ŋeca pere Yosuwa wod pa Nun oyido doŋ i Wema.
Musa owaco ri Rwoth ni, “Neni, iwaco ran ni atel ji i lowo no, to fodi ikiwaco ran ŋat'ioran gine. Iwaco ni iŋeyan gi nyingan aka iwinjo kodan maber.
Onyo riameno, akwayin, k'iwinjo kodan maber, wac ran can perin, ŋey amedere tiyo rin ŋey amedi kisangala in. Poyi bende nike itieko yero piny me paka ji perin.”
Rwoth odwoko Musa ni, “Abino kadho kodin, aka abino miyin loyo.”
Aka Musa owaco ni, “K'ikikadhi gi wan, ikir'imiy waeye wok i kabedo me.
Rupiri oŋeyere nedi nike iwinjo maber gi ji perin kodi an k'ikikadho gi wan? Bedo perin gi wan bino poko wan kwoŋ ji man i piny.”
Aka Rwoth odwoko Musa ni, “Abino timo paka ikwayo, rupiri inwaŋo wor ruwaŋan aka aŋeyin gi nyingin.”
Kenyo Musa okwayo ni, “Akwayin, nyuthan dwoŋ perin.”
T'ikinyal neno waŋan, rupiri ongoye ŋata nenan to doŋ makwo,
neni, nitie kabedo kabutan m'inyalo cung'iye wi got.
Aka ka dwoŋ paran luwo, abino kethin kam'oyawere i got t'aumin gi cingan cuka aluwo.
Kenyo abino kwanyo cingan woko, aka ilaneno ŋeyan makiweno waŋan.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Ŋadi telin mapando ario paka marapena, aka abino ndik'iye wac m'oyido nitie i marapena, m'ituro.
Yikere dikin odikin, aka ibin malo wi got Sinai romo kodan i wiye.
Wongoye ŋata wobin malo kodin, aka wongoye ŋata wonen iy'adec moro je ma got, aka wongoye rombo kosa dhok ma wokway i tiendi got.”
Ameno Musa oŋado telin mapando ario paka marapena, aka yawere odikin maŋic otiŋo to tero malo wi got Sinai paka Rwoth oyido owodho or.
Rwoth oloro piny i pondeponde, ocungo kenyo gi Musa, aka otuco nyinge maleŋ, Rwoth, Rwoth.
Kenyo Rwoth oluwo ruwaŋ Musa aka olwoŋo, “An Rwoth, Abedo Were m'opoŋ gi wor kodi kisa, ma kimaki nge piyo aka nyutho mar makiwire kodi adieri.
Akuro cikirok paran ri luse ganin t'acwako raco gi reco, t'akibino weyo m'akimiyo gir'acula nyithindho gi nyikwaye tundo i luse mar'adek gi mar'aŋwen ro reco pa jonywol pajo.”
Musa okule piny i lowo piyo aka olamo Rwoth.
Musa owaco ni, “Rwoth, k'adieri iwinjo kodan maber, akwayin ikadhi gi wan. Ji me wiy gin tek, to cwaki raco gi reco mawan, aka iyey wan paka ji perin.”

Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Onyo atimo cikirok gi Joisiraili. I waŋ jo abino timo gigipiny madongo nger mafodi akitimo kamoro je i piny i dier nonin je. Ji je jobino neno gigipiny madongo ma An Rwoth, anyalo timo, rupiri akidho timo gima kiwacere riwin.
Luw win or m'amiyo win konon me. Neni, abino riemo woko Joamor, Jokanan, Johiti, Joperiz, Johivi, kodi Joyebus ruwaŋ win.
Wikiri witim cikirok gi ji ma piny ma wicegin kidh'iye, rupiri me nyalo bedo riwan bwo ma tho.
Kwanyowoko, tur win migam pajo, nyek win sirin pajo, aka witoŋ piny cal ma were madhako pajo Asera.”
“Wikiri wilam were man, rupiri An Rwoth, ajanyeko.
Wikiri witim cikirok gi ji ma piny no, rupiri ka jolamo werin pajo manyakafir, jobino lwoŋo win riwirok gi jo, aka karatem nyalo mako win camo cemo ma jomiyo werin pajo.
Wot win jonyalo nywomo nyir jopath, ma jonyalo miyo jo ngoye g'adieri ran to jolamo werin pa jopath.”
“Wikiri witim to wilamo werin ma nyweny.”
To wiripo nyewo okayin pa punde gi mic ma nyathi rombo ma wode. Ka wikinyewo, tur win ŋute. Nyew win okayin mewin.”
“Wongoye ŋata wobin ruwaŋan m'ongoye mic.”
“Didek kisi oro cwo mewin je joripo laman, Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili.
K'atieko riemo woko nonin no ruwaŋ win t'ayawo kew mewin, ongoye ŋata latemo mako piny mewin i ndir ma kalima adek no.”
“Wikiri witedi nyathi rombo kosa nyathi diel i cak pa min.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Ndiki wac me piny, rupiri obedo i wiwaci me m'atimo cikirok kodin kodi Isiraili.”
Musa obedo kenyo gi Rwoth ma ndelo piero aŋwen wor g'odieceŋ, ma kicem kosa madhi gimoro. Ondiko i telin wac ma cikirok; Or Apar.
Aron gi ji je munyo joŋiyo Musa aka joneno waŋ go menyin, jolworo kidho cegin gi go.
To Musa olwoŋo jo, aka Aron gi jotel pa ji jokidho bonge to Musa luwo gi jo.
Aka rumacen Joisiraili je jobino cegin to Musa miyo jo cik je ma Rwoth oyido omiyo go wi got Sinai.
Munyo Musa otieko luwo gi jo, oumo waŋe gi kitambala.
Kisi ka Musa okidho i Wema ma Rwoth bed'iye luwo gi Rwoth, kwanyo woko kitambala. Ka go owok, oyido waco ri Joisiraili kisi gima Rwoth omiyo go or ni wowaci,
aka oyido joneno nike waŋ Musa menyin. Kenyo go oyido dwoko kitambala cuka hongo ma go okidhi luwo gi Rwoth.
Musa olwoŋo kweth pa Joisiraili je aka owaco rijo ni, “Me a gima Rwoth omiyo win cik timo.
Winitie gi ndelo aucel ma timo tic, to ndelo mar'abirio leŋ, ndelo ma cikirok ma ywomirok m'omiyan Rwoth. Nyatoro m'otimi tic moro je i ndelo no woneki.
Wikiri wicwiny kada mac i pecin mewin i ndelo ma sabato.”
Musa owaco ri Joisiraili ni, “Me a gima Rwoth owodho or ni witim.
Keli win ri Rwoth mic. Kisi ŋata nitie gi cunye m'amiyo, weyi wokel mic ri Rwoth ma zahabu, feza, kosa ywel,
nanga mafoth, yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere, nanga m'otimi gi yer diel.
Yer wod rombo m'owir gi rangi m'obokere, pien diegi kodi mbawo kasia,
mo ma talin, gigipiny ma jonitie gi kur ri mo ma wir kodi ri buban maŋwe mamit.
Telin m'obokere obokere kodi telin ma ketho law pa jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi i mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were.”
“Aka weyi cwo ma jondijo je kwoŋ win jowobin jowotimi kisi gima Rwoth owodho or ni wotim.
Wema, giumo mere kodi giumo ma woko, siragetere mere gi miangin mere, yen ariwa, asu mere kodi pende je.
Kakan ma Cikirok, gute mere, giumo mere kodi nanga ma geŋo.
Meza, gi gute mere, gigipiny mere je kodi mugat m'imiyo Were.
Raŋaw tala ri lero kodi gigipiny mere, talin kodi mo pajo.
Migam ma waŋo buban gi gute mere mo ma wiro, buban maŋwe kur mamit, kodi nanga ma geŋo dhiot ma Wema.
Migam ma waŋo mic, kodi kicungwo mere, gute mere, gigipiny mere, kalaya ma lwok kodi pende je.
Nangin ma liero ri diedipo, gute kodi pende mere, nanga ma liero ri waŋkac ma diedipo,
loci ma Wema kodi ma diedipo gi thondhe mere.
Ruk m'okwoy maŋon ma jocway ri Were i wi migam joripo ruko ka jotiyo i Kabedo Maleŋ, ruk maleŋ ri Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi ri wote.”
Kenyo Joisiraili joeye bongi Musa.
Kisi nyatoro ma cunye ogudo okelo ri Rwoth mic ma timo Wema Maleŋ. Jokelo kisi gim'oyido mitere aora i lamo kodi ma kwoyo ruk pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Ameno jobino cwo gi mon je, aka jokelo gigipiny ma cale kikweso, milomin, petin, thiwino, pogin kodi gigipiny m'otimi gi zahabu kweth aka jomiyo ri Rwoth.
Kisi nyatoro m'oyido nitie gi nanga mafoth, yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere, nanga m'otimi gi yer diel, pien wod rombo m'owir gi rangi m'obokere, kosa pien diel okelo.
Kisi nyatoro m'oyido nyalo okelo mic ma feza kosa ywel ri Rwoth, aka jono m'oyido jonitie gi mbawo kasia aora moro je jokelo.
Mon je ma jondijo ma kwoco acingi, jokelo uzi nangin mafoth kodi uzi manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi yer rombo m'obokere, ma jokwoyo.
Bende jotimo uzi ma yer diel.
Jotel jokelo telin m'obokere obokere, kodi telin ma ketho i law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi i mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were,
gigipiny maŋwe kur gi mo ri talin, mo ma wiro, kodi buban maŋwe kur.
Joisiraili je ma cuny gin oywayo jo jokelo gimoro je ri tic ma Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or timo.
Musa owaco ri Joisiraili ni, “Neni, Rwoth oyero Bezalel wod pa Uri, aka nyakwar Nun wok i nono pa Benyamin.
Were opoŋo go gi Cuny pa Were aka omiyo go ndijo, nyalo kodi niaŋ ri kisi tic ma pac,
ma kidonya kodi timo jo gi zahabu, feza, kodi ywel,
ma ŋado telin ma ketho, ma payo mbawin kodi tic man je ma pac.
Rwoth bende omiyo go Oholiab wod pa Ahisamak wok i nono pa Dan, nyalo ma fonjo ji man bende ndijo pajo.

Rwoth omiyo jo ndijo ma kisi nger tic ma timere gi jopac, jokwoco, kodi ji ma jokedo nangin mafoth, manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi yer rombo m'obokere, kodi nangin man. Jonigi nyalo ma timo kisi nger tic aka jondijo ma kidonya.”
“Bezalel, Oholiab, kodi jotic man ma Rwoth omiyo jo ndijo kodi niaŋ, ma joŋeyo nger ma timo kisi gima mitere ma geto Wema Maleŋ, jowotimi paka Rwoth owodho or.”
Musa olwoŋo Bezalel, Oholiab, kodi cwo man je ma Rwoth oyido omiyo jo nyalo aka m'oyido cuny gin ogudo jo, aka owaco rijo cako tic.
Jojolo wok bongi Musa mic je ma Joisiraili oyido jokelo ma geto Wema Maleŋ. To Joisiraili jomedere kelo ri Musa mic kisi odikin.
Kenyo cwo ma jondijo m'oyido jotimo tic jokidho
aka jowaco ri Musa ni, “Ji jokelo gigipiny kweth maloyo ma mitere ma timo tic ma Rwoth owodho or ni wotim.”
Ameno Musa owodho or i kambi gipi nike wongoye ŋata wokel gimoro man ri Wema Maleŋ, aka ji jok'okelo kendo.
Kole gim'oyido otiek kelo oyido romo cowo tic kiri gidoŋ.

Cwo ma jondijo loyo kwoŋ cwo ma jotimo tic ama jogeto Wema Maleŋ. Jotimo wok kwoŋ adec apar ma nangin mafoth m'okwoy gi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi m'obokere kodi cwec ma jobwombi gin.
Kisi adec oyido rom, mita apar g'ario i boro kodi mita ario i laco.
Jokwoyo abic kanyacel to jotimo ameno ri abic man bende.
Joketho kondin ma nanga manyabululu i tok adec ma woko i kisi adec ario m'okwoy kanyacel.
Joketho kondin piero abic i kisi adec m'okwoy kanyacel.
Jotimo siragetere ma zahabu piero abic, ma riwo adec ario m'okwoy kanyacel.
Jotimo giumo Wema wok kwoŋ adec apar g'acel ma nanga m'otimi gi yer diel.
Jotimo ma jorom, mita apar g'adek i boro kodi mita ario i laco.
Jokwoyo abic kanyacel kodi aucel man bende kanyacel.
Joketho kondin piero abic i tok adec ma woko ma kisi adec m'okwoy kanyacel.
Jotimo siragetere piero abic ma ywel ma riwo adec ario m'okwoy kanyacel ŋey jowobedi acel.
Jotimo giumo ario man wok kwoŋ pien wod rombo gi pien diel.
Jotimo miangin m'otire wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia ri Wema.
Kisi miango oyido romo mita aŋwen i boro kodi inci piero ario g'abirio i laco,
kodi akare ario, ŋey miangin wonyali riwo kanyacel. Miangin je oyido jonitie gi akare me.
Jotimo miangin piero ario yuthenge ma yupiny
kodi pende piero aŋwen ma feza m'orwaki i ŋangi jo, pende ario i ŋangi kisi miango ma mako akare ario.
Jotimo miangin piero ario ri thenge ma yumalo ma Wema
kodi pende piero aŋwen, ario i ŋangi kisi miango.
Ri yucen ma Wema, yuwok ceŋ, jotimo miangin aucel
kodi miangin ario ri kisi sonda.
Miangin ma kisi sonda me oriw wok piny kiri i wiye. Miangin ma jotimo kisi sonda ario otim jo i nger me.
Ameno oyido jonitie miangin aboro kodi pende apar g'aucel ma feza, ario i ŋangi kisi miango.
Jotimo yen ariwa apar g'abic wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia, abic ri miangin ma thenge acel ma Wema,
abic ri thenge man, kodi abic ri thenge ma yuwok ceŋ yucen.
Yath ariwa ma diere mere, m'oketh adec miango, oyare wok i gike acel tundo i gike man.
Joumo miangin gi zahabu aka jotweyo gi petin ma zahabu mako yen ariwa, ma bende oyido oum gi zahabu.
Jotimo nanga ma liero gi nanga mafoth, m'okwoy manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi yer rombo m'obokere aka jokwoyo gi cwec ma jobwombi gin.
Jotimo gute aŋwen wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia ma mako nanga ma liero, joumo gi zahabu, aka jotweyo gi siragetere ma zahabu. Kenyo jotimo pende aŋwen ma feza mako gute.
Ri dhiot ma Wema jotimo nanga ma liero gi nanga mafoth m'okwoy gi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo kodi m'obokere aka jokwoyo maŋon gi piso.
Ri nanga ma liero jotimo gute abic m'otwey gi siragetere, joumo wi gin kodi ludhe mere gi zahabu, aka jotimo pende abic ma ywel ri gute.
Bezalel otimo Kakan ma Cikirok wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia, boro inci piero aŋwen g'abic, laco inci piero ario g'abirio, kodi ŋawirok inci piero ario g'abirio.
Oumo iye gi woko kodi zahabu macil aka ofuyo thoko gi zahabu.
Bezalel otimo petin ma tiŋo ma zahabu aka orwako jo i tiende aŋwen gi petin ario i kisi thenge.
Bezalel otimo gute ma tiŋo wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia, aka oumo gi zahabu,
to rwako jo i petin i kisi thengi Kakan ma Cikirok.
Bezalel otimo giumo gi zahabu macil, inci piero aŋwen g'abic i boro kodi inci piero ario g'abirio i laco.
Bezalel otimo cwec ma jobwombi gin ario gi zahabu m'ocadhi,
acel ri kisi gike ma giumo. Bezalel otimo jo ŋey jowotimi adec acel giumo.
Cwec ma jobwombi gin joŋiyere karo giumo, aka bwombi gin oyare umo.
Bezalel otimo meza wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia, boro inci piero adek g'aucel, laco inci apar g'aboro, kodi ŋawirok inci piero ario g'abirio.
Oumo gi zahabu macil aka ofuyo thoko gi zahabu.
Bezalel otimo miango ma inci adek i laco thoko meza aka ofuyo miango gi zahabu thoko.
Bezalel otimo petin aŋwen gi zahabu ma tiŋo aka oketho jo i kisi sonda aŋwen, i tiendi meza.
Petin aŋwen ma mako gute ma tiŋo meza oketho cegin gi miango.
Bezalel otimo gute gi mbawo kasia aka oumo gi zahabu.
Otimo gigipiny ma zahabu macil ri meza, sendere, kikopere, agwatin kodi atewe ma oro k'ikonjo vini.
Bezalel otimo raŋaw tala gi zahabu macil. Otimo pende kodi kore mere gi zahabu m'ocadhi, kiri gi mawuwin mere.
Jange aucel jokare i thenge, adek i kisi thenge.
Kisi acel kwoŋ jange aucel oyido nitie gi mawuwin adek ma cale mawuwa ma yath m'ilwoŋo ni alimond,
Kor raŋaw tala oyido nitie mawuwin aŋwen macale mawuwa ma yath alimond gi jange kodi thiwe.
Oyido nitie mawuwa acel kama kisi mawuwin adek jowok'iye i kore.
Mawuwin, jange, kodi raŋaw tala je otim gi zahabu m'ocadhi.
Bezalel otimo talin abirio ri raŋaw tala, aka otimo lew gin gi siniyin gi zahabu macil.
Bezalel ooro kilo piero adek g'abic ma zahabu timo raŋaw tala kodi gigipiny mere je.

Bezalel otimo meza wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia ma waŋo buban. Oyido obedo inci apar g'aboro i boro, inci apar g'aboro i laco kodi inci piero aŋwen g'abic i ŋawirok. Tunge aŋwen i kisi sonda oyido obedo tim acel gine.
Oumo wiye, thenge aŋwen je, kodi tunge je gi zahabu macil to fuyo gi zahabu thoko.
Bezalel otimo petin ario ma zahabu ma tiŋo aka oriwo i gike ario mako gute ma tiŋo gine.
Bezalel otimo gute gi mbawo kasia aka oumo jo gi zahabu.
Bezalel otimo migam ma waŋo mic wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia. Oyido obedo mita 2.2 i boro, mita 2.2 i laco kodi mita 1.3 i ŋawirok.
Otimo tunge i kisi sonda aŋwen, ŋey jowobedi tim acel gi migam. Aka oumo gi ywel thoko.
Bezalel otimo gigipiny ma migam; degi, mwiko, atewe, siragetere kodi sapikere gi ywel.
Bezalel otimo kicungwo ma ywel aka oketho i ŋangi miango ma migam, ŋey wotundi i kore migam.
Otimo petin aŋwen aka oketho i kisi sonda aŋwen.
Bezalel otimo gute wok kwoŋ mbawo kasia ma tiŋo aka oumo gi ywel,
aka orwako jo i petin i kisi thenge migam. Migam otim gi yen, aka oyido oŋamere.
Bezalel otimo kalaya ma ywel gi pende ma ywel wok kwoŋ ndewirin pa mon m'oyido jotiyo i dhiot Wema Maleŋ.
Bezalel otimo diedipo ri Wema Maleŋ wok kwoŋ nangin ma liero m'otimi gi nangin mafoth. Yuthenge ma yupiny nangin ma liero oyido obedo mita piero aŋwen g'aŋwen i boro,
to thielo gi gute piero ario ma ywel i pende piero ario ma ywel, siragetere kodi ludhe m'otimi gi feza.
Diedipo oyido tim acel yuthenge ma yumalo.
Yupodho ceŋ oyido nitie nangin ma liero ma mita piero ario g'ario i boro, kodi asu apar, pende apar, siragetere kodi ludhe ma feza.
Yuthenge ma wok ceŋ, kama dhiot nitie iye, diedipo oyido obedo mita piero ario g'ario i laco.
I kisi thengi dhiot oyido nitie nanga ma liero ma mita 6.6 asu adek kodi pende adek.
Nangin ma liero je thoko diedipo otim gi nanga mafoth.
Pende je ri asu je otim gi ywel, aka siragetere, ludhe kodi giumo wi asu je otim gi feza. Asu je thoko diedipo oyido oriw gi ludhe ma feza.

Nangin ma liero i waŋkac ma diedipo otim gi nangin m'okwoy manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, kodi yer rombo m'obokere aka okwoy gi piso. Oyido obedo mita abuŋwen i boro kodi mita ario i ŋawirok paka nangin ma liero ma diedipo.
Oyido othiel gi asu aŋwen i pende aŋwen ma ywel. Siragetere mere, giumo wiye kodi ludhe oyido otim gi feza.
Loce ma Wema gi diedipo je otim gi ywel.

Me gigipiny je m'oor i Wema Maleŋ, kam'okan'iye telin mapando ario m'ondik'iye Or Apar. Musa am'okwano aka Jolevi ama jotimo tic munyo Ithamar wod pa Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam waco rijo gir'atima.
Bezalel, wod pa Uri aka nyakwar Hur, janono pa Yuda am'otimo kisi gima Rwoth owodho or ni wotim.
Oholiab wod pa Ahisamak, janono pa Dan, am'oyido jakidonya, japac kodi jacwey nangin mafoth gi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo kodi m'obokere.
Zahabu je m'omiy Rwoth ri Wema Maleŋ oromo kilo gana acel m'opima gi rapim m'ioro.
Feza m'ocoki wok kwoŋ ji m'okwan oromo kilo 3,430 cungo kwoŋ latir m'otire.
Kisi ŋat'okwan oculo welo ma mitere, aka oyido nitie cwo 603,550 ma jo oro piero kosa kalo.
Kwoŋ feza, kilo 3,400 oor ma timo pende miya acel ri Wema Maleŋ kodi ri nangin ma liero, kilo piero adek g'aŋwen ri kisi pende.
Bezalel otimo ludhe, siragetere, asu, kodi giumo wiye gi kilo piero adek ma feza m'odoŋ.
Ywel m'omiy Rwoth oromo kilo 2,425.
Bezalel otimo gine pendi dhiot ma Wema Maleŋ, migam ma ywel gi kicungwo mere, gigipiny ma migam je,
pendi diedipo kodi ri waŋkac ma diedipo, kodi loce ma Wema gi diedipo m'othoko.
Jokwoyo ruk pa jocway ri Were i wi migam gi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo kodi m'obokere ma ruko ka jotiyo i Kabedo Maleŋ. Jokwoyo ri Aron paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or.
Jokwoyo law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam gi nanga mafoth; yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, m'obokere kodi uzi ma rangi ma zahabu.
Jocadho boke ma zahabu aka joŋado i uzi tic gine i yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo kodi m'obokere.
Jotimo thondhe ario ma goki jo ri law pa jocway ri Were aka jokwoyo i bute ŋey wonyali tweyo.
Thol m'okwoy maŋon gi gimoro acel oriw i law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ŋey jowobedi acel gine, paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or.
Joyiko telin m'ilwoŋo ni onys aka jojengo i zahabu m'ocan; oyido ogor'iye nyingi wot Yakobo apar g'ario.
Okethi jo i thol ma goki law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam cungo ri nonin apar g'ario ma Isiraili, paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or.
Jotimo mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were gi ndijo paka ma law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam gi yer rombo manyabululu, ariŋo, m'obokere kodi nanga mafoth m'okwoy.
Oyido thenge je rom aka odol kadirio, boro mere inci abuŋwen aka laco mere inci abuŋwen.
Jocano bol aŋwen ma telin ma welo i iye. I bol marapena jocano tele m'obokere, tele manyatongweno, kodi tele manyarangi aremo.
I bol mar'ario jocano tele manyarangi nam, tele manyabululu kodi diamondi.
I bol mar'adek jocano tele m'obokere ma nyamicungwa, tele m'oruwo rangi matar g'akwaro, kodi tele manyarangi ariŋo.
Aka i bol mar'aŋwen jocano telin manyarangi nam, tele m'obokere, kodi tele manyaboke pendi. Ocan jo i miango ma zahabu.
Kisi tele kwoŋ telin apar g'ario me oyido ogor'iye nyingi wot Yakobo acel paka jonywole ŋey jowocungi ri nonin apar g'ario ma Isiraili.
Ri mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were jotimo lijegere gi zahabu macil m'otudi p'adasa.
Jotimo miangin ario gi petin ario aka joriwo petin ario i kisi sonda ario ma malo ma mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were.
Jotweyo adasin ario ma zahabu m'otudi i petin ario,
aka jotweyo gike ario man mar'adasin i miangin ario aka i nger me joriwo yuwaŋe i thondhe ma goki law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Jotimo petin ario gi zahabu aka joriwo i kisi sonda ario ma piny ma mugowa m'iketh'iye giŋeyo mito pa Were, i gike ma iye cegin gi law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Jotimo petin ario man gi zahabu to joriwo piny yuwaŋ thondhe ario ma law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, cegin gi bwombe kodi i wi del m'okwoy.

Jotweyo petin ma mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were i petin ma law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam g'adasa manyabululu, ŋey mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were wobedi malo aka del wokiri wolwogere paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or.
Kanzu m'iruko piny ma law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam otim gi yer rombo manyabululu kende.
Hoŋ m'irwak'iye wi jo oridhi gi waya m'otudi ma cero go yec.
Thoko rinda ma kanzu jokwoyo cal ma pomo gi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo, m'obokere, kodi nanga mafoth.
Jotimo bende olaŋere gi zahabu mangil aka joketho i dier cal ma pomo thoko.
Kisi olaŋ oluwere gi cal ma pomo thoko rinda ma kanzu ma tic paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or.
Jotimo satere ri Aron gi wote,
jungin, palere ma nanga mafoth,
thol ma pier jo ma nanga mafoth kodi yer rombo manyabululu, manyarangi ariŋo kodi m'obokere m'okwoy paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or.
Aka jotimo sen ma sangaria maleŋ gi zahabu ngil, aka jondik'iye ni, “Leŋo ri Rwoth.”
Jotweyo i junga g'adasa manyabululu paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Ameno tic je ma Wema Maleŋ orumo. Joisiraili jotimo kisi gimoro paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or.
Jokelo bongi Musa Wema gi gigipiny mere, siragetere mere, miangin mere, yen ariwa mere, asu mere gi pende je.
Giumo ma yer rombo m'owir m'obokere, giumo ma yer diel kodi nangin ma liero.
Kakan ma Cikirok m'oketh'iye telin mapando ario, gute mere kodi giumo.
Meza gi gigipiny mere kodi mugat maleŋ m'imiyo Were.
Raŋaw tala ma zahabu mangil, talin mere gi gigipiny mere je, kodi mo ma talin.
Migam ma zahabu, mo ma wiro, buban maŋwe kur kodi nangin ma liero i dhiot ma Wema.
Migam ma ywel gi kicungwo mere ma ywel, gute gi gigipiny mere je kodi kalaya ma lwok gi pende je.
Nangin ma liero ma diedipo, gute mere kodi pende je, nanga ma liero i waŋkac ma diedipo gi thondhe mere, loce ma Wema kodi gigipiny ma oro i Wema je.
Ruk m'otimi mafoth ma jocway ri Were i wi migam joruko i Kabedo Maleŋ nangin maleŋ ri Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam gi wote.
Joisiraili oyido jotimo tic je paka Rwoth owodho or ri Musa.
Musa okaŋasa kisi gimoro aka oneno ni oyido jotimo je paka Rwoth oyido owodho or. Ameno omiyo jo silwany.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“K'acel i dwe mar'acel kethi Wema Maleŋ wocungi.
Kethi Kakan ma Cikirok m'otiŋo Or Apar i iye aka ikethi nanga ma liero i nyime.
Keli meza aka ikethi gigipiny mere i iye. Bende keli raŋaw tala aka ikethi talin mere i iye.
Kethi migam ma zahabu ma waŋo buban ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok aka ilieri nanga ma liero i dhiot ma Wema.
Kethi migam ma waŋo mic ruwaŋ Wema.
Kethi kalaya ma lwoki i dier Wema kodi migam aka ipoŋ'iye pi.
Kethi diedipo ma thoko aka ilieri nanga ma liero i waŋkac mere.”
“Kenyo kethi gicen Wema gi gigipiny mere gi wiro gi mo, aka labedo maleŋ.
Ma luwo, kethi gicen migam gi gigipiny mere je gi wiro gi mo, aka labedo maleŋ kicutho.
Bende kethi gicen kalaya ma lwok gi pende je i nger acel.”
“Keli Aron gi wote i dhiot ma Wema, aka iwaci rijo jowolwokere gi pi.
Ruk Aron i ruk pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, wir go gi mo, aka i nger acel ikethi go gicen, ŋey wonyali tiyo ran paka jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Keli wote bende aka iruki rijo satere.
Kenyo wir jo gi mo, paka iwiro bajo, ŋey jowotiy ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam. Wiro jo me bino loko jo jocway ri Were i wi migam ma hongo je ma bino.”
Ameno Musa otimo kisi gimoro je paka Rwoth omiyo go or.
Aka k'acel i dwe mar'acel ma oro mar'ario rumacen ma jotieko eye i Misir, okethi Wema Maleŋ to cungo.
Musa oketho pende je piny, oketho miangin mere cungo, oriwo yen ariwa mere to ketho asu mere.
Oyaro giumo i wi Wema to ketho giumo ma woko, paka Rwoth oyido owodho or.
Kenyo okwanyo telin mapando ario aka oketho i Kakan ma Cikirok. Oketho gute i petin ma Kakan ma Cikirok aka oketho giumo i wiye.
Kenyo Musa oketho Kakan ma Cikirok i Wema to liero nanga ma liero malo. I nger me ogeŋo Kakan ma Cikirok paka Rwoth oyido owodho or.
Musa oketho meza i Wema, yuthenge ma yumalo woko ma nanga ma liero,
aka oketh'iye mugat m'imiyo Rwoth, paka Rwoth oyido owodho or.
Oketho raŋaw tala i Wema, yuthenge ma yupiny tirtir gi meza,
aka kenyo ruwaŋ Rwoth ocwinyo talin paka Rwoth oyido owodho or.
Musa oketho migam ma zahabu i Wema ruwaŋ nanga ma liero,
aka owaŋ'iye buban maŋwe kur paka Rwoth oyido owodho or.
Oketho nanga ma liero i dhiot ma Wema,
aka kenyo ruwaŋ nanga ma liero oketho migam ma waŋo mic. Musa omiyo cowirok awaŋa paka Rwoth oyido owodho or.
Musa oketho kalaya ma lwok i dier Wema gi migam aka opoŋo gi pi.
Musa, Aron gi wot Aron jolwoko cingi gin gi tiendi gin kenyo
kisi ka jodonjo i Wema kosa i migam paka Rwoth oyido owodho or.
Musa oketho diedipo thoko Wema kodi migam aka oliero nanga ma liero i waŋkac ma diedipo. Ameno ocowo tic je.
Ro gime Musa k'onyalo donjo i Wema.
I woth pajo je Joisiraili oyido jokodere i kabedo man nyaka ka pondeponde oay wok kwoŋ Wema.
To kafodi pondeponde koay, jok'okodo kambi pajo.
Kole i woth pajo je oyido joneno pondeponde pa Rwoth i wi Wema odieceŋ aka wor mac maliel i wiye.
Rwoth olwoŋo Musa, aka oluwo gi go i wema maleŋ, ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili, aka iwaci rijo ni: Ka nyatoro kelo mic mar'ogwaŋ ri Rwoth, ripo bedo mic ma dhiaŋ, kosa rombo kosa diel.
Ka mic pere obedo mic awaŋa ma dhiaŋ, ripo bedo rwath m'ongoye gi ŋolo. Go won wokel i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, ŋey wojol rigo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Go laketho cinge i wic mic awaŋa, t'ijolo rigo ma cwako reco pere.
Go lathumo rwath ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka jocway ri Were i wi migam, wot Aron, jolakelo remo, to jokiro thoko migam manitie i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Go bino daŋo pien mere, to yaŋo i muma mathindho thindho.
Wot Aron jolacwinyo mac i wi migam, to jocano i wiye yen.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam, wot Aron jolacano mumin, wic, kodi bor i wi yen, i mac i wi migam.
To gigipiny ma iye kodi olengin mere iripo lwoko gi pi. Kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo gipi i wi migam, paka cowirok awaŋa, mic m'owaŋ gi mac, maŋwe kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Ka mic pere obedo rombo kosa diel, ripo bedo ma wode m'ongoye gi ŋolo.
Aka go lathumo i thengi migam yumalo ruwaŋ Rwoth. Jocway ri Were i wi migam, wot Aron jolakiro remo mere thoko migam.
Go layaŋo i muma mathindho thindho, jacway ri Were i wi migam laketho gi wic mere kodi bor mere i wi yen manitie i mac i wi migam.
To gigipiny ma iye kodi olenge mere go lalwoko gi pi. Jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo gipi i wi migam paka cowirok awaŋa, mic m'owaŋ gi mac, maŋwe kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Ka mic pere ri Rwoth obedi winyo, go layero akuro kosa njiwa.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakelo i wi migam, to turo ŋute, to waŋo i wi migam. Remo mere ilakiro i thengi migam.
Go lafudho kasekero mere to budho yer mere, aka labolo i thengi migam yuwok ceŋ, kama buru oy'iye.
Go labaro diere gi bwombe, to kiripi coto diere wopokere, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo i wi migam i wi yen i mac, paka cowirok awaŋa, mic m'owaŋ gi mac, maŋwe kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Ka nyatoro miyo Rwoth mic ma cemo manyinge, mic no ripo bedo moko m'oregi m'onuŋere, go ripo nywowo gi mo oliv kodi buban.

Go lakelo bongi jocway ri Were i wi migam, wot Aron. Jacway ri Were i wi migam lajowo moko masi cinge acel, gi mo oliv kodi buban mere je, to waŋo paka mic i mac i wi migam, mic m'owaŋ gi mac maŋwe kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Aka mic ma cemo manyinge m'odoŋ labedo apa Aron kodi wote, obedo adec maleŋ loyo ma mic m'owaŋ gi mac ri Rwoth.
Ka nyatoro mito miyo mic ma mugat m'otedi i kendo m'ocwey gi lowo, ripo bedo ma moko m'onuŋere. Ripo bedo mugat mayom ma buthow m'onywow gi mo oliv, kosa mugat manwaŋ ma buthow m'owir'iye mo.
Ka mic perin obedo mugat m'otedi i sapik i kendo, ripo bedo ma moko m'onuŋere m'onywow gi mo oliv, ma buthow.
Iripo ŋinyo mathindho thindho, konj'iye mo, meno obedo mic ma cemo manyinge.
Ka mic perin obedo mugat m'otedi i sapik, ripo bedo m'otimi gi moko m'onuŋere m'onywow gi mo oliv.
Ilakelo ri Rwoth mic ma cemo manyinge m'otimi i nger moro je kwoŋ meno, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam latero i wi migam.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakwanyo adec to waŋo i wi migam, paka mic m'owaŋ gi mac maŋwe kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Adec ma mic ma cemo manyinge m'odoŋ labedo apa Aron kodi wote, obedo adec maleŋ loyo ma mic m'owaŋ ri Rwoth.
Ongoye kelo ri Rwoth mic ma cemo manyinge m'onywow gi thow, kole wikiripi waŋo thow kosa mo kic gi mac paka mic ri Rwoth.
Winyalo kelo jo paka mic ma ranyak marapena ri Rwoth, to wikiripi miyo i wi migam ri kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Wikiripi weyo ma wikiketho i mic mewin ma cemo manyinge, cumbi ma cikirok gi Were mewin. Wiripo ketho i mic mewin je.
K'ikelo mic perin ma cemo ma ranyak marapena ri Rwoth, iripo kelo ŋano m'obul gi mac, m'oodi m'onuŋere.
Iripo nywowo gi mo kodi buban; meno obedo mic ma cemo manyinge.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo adec ma ŋano m'oodi m'onuŋere kodi mo gi buban mere je; obedo mic m'owaŋ gi mac ri Rwoth.
Ka nyatoro miyo mic ma siem, k'obedo dhiaŋ, thwon kosa merikwa, ripo bedo m'ongoye gi ŋolo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Ilaketho cingin i wic mic t'ithumo i dhiot ma Wema ma romo. Jocway ri Were i wi migam, wot Aron jolakiro remo thoko migam.
Aka ilamiyo wok i cowirok ma mic ma siem, paka mic ma siem ri Rwoth, bor je ma umo gigipiny ma iye,
roge ario je kodi bor mere, kodi adec maber loyo ma cuny.
Wot Aron jolawaŋo i wi migam, gi mic awaŋa manitie i wi yen i mac, paka mic m'owaŋ gi mac maŋwe kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Ka mic perin obedo rombo kosa diel paka cowirok ma mic ma siem ri Rwoth, siwen kosa wode, ripo bedo m'ongoye gi ŋolo.
K'ikelo wod rombo paka mic perin, iripo kelo ruwaŋ Rwoth,
t'iketho cingin i wic mere. Ilathumo ruwaŋ Wema ma romo, aka wot Aron jolakiro remo mere thoko migam.
Ilamiyo bor ma cowirok ma mic ma siem, paka mic m'owaŋ ri Rwoth; yiwe maleny gibe, m'ilathumo gi ligongolo, kodi bor ma umo gigipiny ma iye.
Roge ario je kodi bor ma umo i kowino, kodi adec mabor m'omakere ma wi cuny kodi i wi roge, go lakwanyo woko.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo i wi migam paka mic ma cemo manyinge m'owaŋ gi mac ri Rwoth.
Ka mic perin obedo wod diel, ilakelo ruwaŋ Rwoth,
t'iketho cingin i wic mere. Ilathumo ruwaŋ Wema ma romo, aka wot Aron jolakiro remo mere thoko migam.
Ilamiyo paka mic perin wok kwoŋe, paka mic ri Rwoth, bor ma umo gigipiny ma iye je,
roge ario gi bor ma umo kowino, kodi adec maber loyo ma cuny.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo i wi migam paka mic ma cemo manyinge m'owaŋ gi mac maŋwe kur mamit ri Rwoth. Bor je obedo apa Rwoth.
Me obedo cik ma cil gi cil i luse mewin je, kama winobed'iye je; wikiripi camo bor je kodi remo je.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili iwaci rijo ni: Ka moro otimo reco ma k'oŋeyo to turo or pa Rwoth moro je, gi timo acel kwoŋ gigipiny ma kiripi timo.
Ka jacway ri Were i wi migam m'owir gi mo am'otimo reco, to kelo banja kwoŋ ji, go lamiyo rwath m'ongoye gi ŋolo paka mic ma cwako reco ri Rwoth.
Go lakelo thwon i dhiot ma wema maleŋ ruwaŋ Rwoth, laketho cinge i wic thwon; aka ilathumo thwon ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam m'owir gi mo lakwanyo remo moro to kelo i Wema ma romo.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lalutho lwet cinge i remo to kiro remo moro dibirio ruwaŋ Rwoth yuwaŋ nanga m'oliero i Kabedo Maleŋ.

Jacway ri Were i wi migam laketho remo moro i tunge migam ma buban maŋwe kur manitie ruwaŋ Rwoth i Wema ma romo. Aka remo m'odoŋ go lakonjo i tiendi migam ma mic awaŋa, manitie i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Go lawaro woko bor je ma thwon ma mic ma cwako reco; bor je ma umo gigipiny ma iye,
roge ario je kodi bor mere, kodi adec maber loyo ma cuny,
paka ikwanyo wok i thwon ma cowirok ma siem. Jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo i wi migam ma mic awaŋa.
To pien thwon kodi riŋo mere, wic mere, olenge, gigipiny ma iye, kodi woyo mere,
thwon gibe m'odoŋ, go latiŋo woko kam'olony woko ma kambi, kam'idhur'iye buru, aka ilawaŋo gi yen kam'ikonj'iye buru.
Ka lwak Joisiraili gibe jotimo reco ma jok'ogendera to panere i waŋ jo, to jotimo gimoro acel kwoŋ gigipiny ma or pa Rwoth kwero timo aka jobedi gi banja;
ka joniaŋ rumacen reco ma jotimo, kenyo lwak lakelo rwath ri mic ma cwako reco ruwaŋ Wema ma romo.
Jodongo pa lwak jolaketho cingi jo i wic thwon ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka ilathumo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakelo remo thwon moro i Wema ma romo.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lalutho lwet cinge i remo to kiro dibirio ruwaŋ Rwoth kodi yuwaŋ nanga m'oliero.
Go laketho remo moro i tunge migam manitie ruwaŋ Rwoth i Wema ma romo. Aka remo m'odoŋ go lakonjo i tiendi migam ma mic awaŋa manitie i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Go lawaro woko bor mere je to waŋo i wi migam.
Go latimo gi thwon me paka otimo gi thwon ma mic ma cwako reco. Jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo mic ma cwako reco pajo, aka ilacwako rijo.
Go latiŋo thwon me gibe to tero woko ma kambi, aka lawaŋo paka thwon marapena; obedo mic ma cwako reco pa lwak.
Ka jadhum otimo reco, ma go k'oŋeyo, to timo acel kwoŋ gigipiny ma or pa Rwoth Were pere kwero to bedo jabanja,
tekin go niaŋ kwoŋe, go lakelo paka mic pere wod diel m'ongoye gi ŋolo.
Go laketho cinge i wic diel, aka ilathumo kam'ithum'iye mic awaŋa ruwaŋ Rwoth, paka mic ma cwako reco.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakwanyo remo moro gi lwet cinge to ketho i tunge migam ma mic awaŋa, aka remo m'odoŋ go lakonjo i tiendi migam ma mic awaŋa.
Bor mere je go lawaŋo i wi migam, paka bor ma cowirok ma siem. Ameno jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo mic ma cwako reco pere, aka ilacwako rigo.
tekin go niaŋ kwoŋe, go lakelo min diel m'ongoye gi ŋolo paka mic, ri reco ma go otimo.
Go laketho cinge i wic mic ma cwako reco, aka ilathumo i kabedo ma mic awaŋa.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakwanyo remo moro gi lwet cinge to ketho i tunge migam ma mic awaŋa. Aka remo m'odoŋ go lakonjo i tiendi migam.

Go lawaro woko bor mere je, paka waro ma mic ma siem, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo i wi migam ri ŋwece kur mamit ri Rwoth. Ameno jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo mic ma cwako reco rigo, aka ilacwako rigo.
Ka mic m'ikelo paka mic ma cwako reco obedo rombo, ripo bedo min rombo m'ongoye gi ŋolo.
Ilaketho cingin i wic mic no, aka ilathumo paka mic ma cwako reco kam'ithum'iye mic awaŋa.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakwanyo remo ma mic ma cwako reco moro gi lwet cinge to ketho i tunge migam ma mic awaŋa. Aka remo m'odoŋ go lakonjo i tiendi migam.

Go lawaro woko bor je, paka bor ma wod rombo ma cowirok ma mic ma siem. Jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo i wi migam, paka mic m'iwaŋo ri Rwoth. Ameno jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo mic ma cwako reco perin ri reco m'itimo, aka ilacwako rin.
Ka nyatoro otimo reco gi kwero winjo lwoŋo bedo jakony ma luwo adieri, makada nende go oyido oneno kosa oŋeyo, to kwero luwo, iripo miyin gir'acula.
Kosa ka nyatoro ogeyo gimoro je makoc, obedi ogwaŋ makoc m'otho, kosa gigipiny ma joay gi bwombi jo makoc m'otho, ma k'oŋeyo, meno loko go makoc, aka bedo jabanja.
Kosa k'igeyo koco pa dhano, gimoro je ma loko dhano makoc, aka ikiŋeyo, tekin iŋeyo, ilabedo gi banja.
Ka nyatoro okwakere kwoŋirok ri atoŋa marac kosa maber, obedi dhano moro je, ma go k'oŋeyo, tekin go ŋeyo, ilabedo gi banja.
K'iŋeyo banja perin kwoŋ gigipiny me, ilatuco reco perin m'itimo.
Ilakelo ri Rwoth, paka cul ma reco m'itimo, min rombo kosa min diel, paka mic ma cwako reco. Jacway ri Were i wi migam latimo rin cowirok ma cwako reco perin.
To ka ikinyalo nwaŋo rombo, ilakelo ri Rwoth, paka cul mareco m'itimo, akuro ario kosa njiwin ario, acel ri mic ma cwako reco aka man ri mic awaŋa.
Ilakelo bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam, ma lamiyo acel paka mic ma cwako reco, to turo ŋute, ma k'ocoto woko.
Go lakiro remo moro ma mic ma cwako reco i thengi migam, aka remo m'odoŋ lacwer i tiendi migam. Me obedo mic ma cwako reco.
Aka mar'ario go lamiyo paka mic awaŋa cungo kwoŋ kwer mere. Ameno apaka jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo mic ma cwako reco perin m'itimo, aka ilacwako rin.
To ka ikinyal kelo akuro ario kosa njiwa ario, ilakelo moko m'onuŋere swa kilo acel, paka mic ma cwako reco; Ikir'inywow gi mo kosa buban, kwoŋbedo obedo mic ma cwako reco.
Ilakelo bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam, aka go lajowo masi acel paka adec mere, to waŋo i wi migam, paka mic m'owaŋ gi mac ri Rwoth. Me obedo mic ma cwako reco.
Ameno jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo mic ma cwako reco perin m'itimo, aka ilacwako rin. Paka mic ma cemo manyinge, m'odoŋ labedo apa jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ni:

Ka nyatoro otimo reco ma go k'oŋeyo, i gigipiny maleŋ ri Rwoth, ilakelo, paka mic ma culo banja ri Rwoth, wod rombo m'ongoye gi ŋolo wok i mwendi perin, ma welo mere ripo rom gi welo feza m'ioro i Kabedo Maleŋ. Meno obedo mic ma banja.

Iladwoko gimaleŋ m'oyido ikiculo, aka ilamedo adec kilo i wi m'imiyo jacway ri Were i wi migam. Jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo mic ma cwako reco perin gi wod rombo ma mic ma culo banja, aka ilacwako rin.
Ka nyatoro otimo reco ma go k'oŋeyo, to timo gigipiny ma or pa Rwoth kwero, meno itimo banja, aka iripo miyin gir'acula.

Ilakelo bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam wod rombo m'ongoye gi ŋolo wok i mwendi perin, kosa gima rom gine, paka mic ma cwako reco, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam latimo cowirok ma cwako reco m'itimo m'ikiŋeyo, aka ilacwako rin.
Meno obedo mic ma banja, itimo banja ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Ka nyatoro otimo reco kosa obenga kwoŋ Rwoth gi wondo jager pere i gim'omiy go kano kosa ociko, kosa okwalo, kosa otwodo,
kosa onwaŋo gim'orwenyo to twodo kwoŋe, k'okwoŋere nono iy'acel kwoŋ gigipiny me ma dhano timo, meno otimo reco.
Tekin go ŋeyo reco pere, to mito dwoko gima go okwalo kosa otwodo kwoŋe, kosa ociko, kosa gim'orwenyo ma go onwaŋo,
kosa giman je m'ikwoŋere kwoŋe nono, iripo culo ma ripo kodi adec man i wiye. Iripo culo won mere tekin iŋeyo banja perin.
Aka ilakelo bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam, paka mic ma banja ri Rwoth, wod rombo m'ongoye gi ŋolo wok i mwendi perin, kosa gima rom gine, ri mic ma banja.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam latimo cowirok ma cwako reco perin ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka ilacwako rin ri gim'inotimi je to miyin bedo jabanja.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Miy Aron kodi wote cik k'iwaco rijo ama: Me kwer ma mic awaŋa. Mic awaŋa ripo doŋ i wi migam tundo odikin, aka mac ma migam ripo bedo ka liel.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam laruko law pere, i wi pale macek, aka lakwanyo buru ma mic awaŋa ma mac owaŋo, to ketho i thengi migam.
Go lalunyo woko law pere to ruko nanga man, aka latiŋo buru to tero woko ma kambi, i kabedo m'olony.
Mac ma wi migam ripo bedo ka liel, aka kiripi tho. Kisi odikin jacway ri Were i wi migam lamedo yen i wiye, laketho mic awaŋa i wiye, to waŋo bor ma mic ma siem.
Mac ripo liel i wi migam noknok, aka kiripi tho.
Me kwer ma mic ma cemo manyinge. Wot Aron jolamiyo mic ruwaŋ Rwoth, yuwaŋ migam.
Jolajowo moko masi cingi jo kodi mo ma mic ma cemo manyinge, kanyacel gi buban manitie i mac, aka jolawaŋo i wi migam ri ŋwece kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Adec ma mic m'odoŋ, Aron kodi wote jolacamo paka jocamo mugat ma buthow i Kabedo Maleŋ, i diedipo ma Wema ma romo.
Kiripi tedo gi thow. Atieko miyo paka adec pajo ma mic paran m'iwaŋo gi mac. Obedo adec maleŋ swa, paka mic ma cwako reco kodi mic ma banja.
Nyikway Aron ma cwo je joripo camo, paka adec pajo ma cil gi cil i luse pajo je, wok i mic pa Rwoth m'iwaŋo gi mac; kisi gim'ogey jo je labedo maleŋ.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
Me mic ma Aron kodi wote jolamiyo Rwoth i ndelo m'owir go gi mo. Kilo acel ma moko paka mic ma kisi ndelo, adec odikin, aka adec othieno.
Iripo timo gi mo i sapik i kendo, ilakelo m'obil maber gi pi, m'oŋiny mathindho thindho, aka ilamiyo ri ŋwece kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam, m'owir gi mo, kwoŋ wot Aron, lamiyo. Me obedo adec pa Rwoth m'iripo waŋo cil gi cil.
Mic ma cemo pa jacway ri Were i wi migam je iripo waŋo, kiripi camo.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Aron kodi wote, iwaci rijo ni: Me kwer ma mic ma cwako reco. Mic ma cwako reco ilathumo ruwaŋ Rwoth kama ithum'iye mic awaŋa; obedo maleŋ swa.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam ma lamiyo paka mic ma cwako reco, lacamo i Kabedo Maleŋ, i diedipo ma Wema ma romo.
Kisi gim'ogey riŋo mere labedo maleŋ, aka ka remo mere okire i nanga, iripo lwoko woko remo no i Kabedo Maleŋ.
K'otedi i dak ma lowo iripo turo woko; to k'otedi i dak ma ywel, iripo rudo t'ilawo gi pi.
Cwo je i dier jocway ri Were i wi migam joripo camo, obedo gimaleŋ swa.
To ongoye mic ma cwako reco ma wocam ma remo mere ikelo i Wema ma romo ma cwako reco i Kabedo Maleŋ; iripo waŋo gi mac.
Me kwer ma mic ma banja. Obedo maleŋ swa;
i kabedo m'ithum'iye mic awaŋa, jobino thumo mic ma banja, aka remo mere wokiri i kisi thenge je ma migam.
Aka bor mere je iripo miyo, yiwe maleny, kodi bor ma umo gigipiny ma iye,
roge ario je kodi bor mere, kodi adec maber loyo ma cuny.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo je i wi migam paka mic m'owaŋ ri Rwoth. Meno obedo mic ma banja.
Cwo je i dier jocway ri Were i wi migam joripo camo i Kabedo Maleŋ. Obedo maleŋ loyo.
Mic ma cwako reco kodi mic ma banja jonitie gi kwer acel, jacway ri Were i wi migam ma timo kwer mere latero.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam ma timo kwer ma mic awaŋa pa dhano moro je, ladoŋ gi pien ma mic ma go omiyo.
Mic ma cemo je m'otedi i kendo m'ogeti gi lowo, kodi m'otedi i kendo i sapik, labedo apa jacway ri Were i wi migam ma timo kwer mere.
To mic ma cemo manyinge man je, m'onywow gi mo oliv kosa m'othwo, labedo apa wot Aron marom.
Me kwer ma cowirok ma mic ma siem, ma dhano nyalo miyo Rwoth.
K'imiyo mic ma foyo, ilamiyo gi cowirok ma foyo, mugat ma buthow m'onywow gi mo oliv, mugat manwaŋ ma buthow m'owir'iye mo, kodi mugat m'otimi gi moko m'onuŋere m'obil maber i mo.
Gi cowirok perin ma foyo ma mic ma siem, ilakelo mugat m'otimi gi thow.
Ilamiyo mugat acel wok i kisi mic, paka mic pa Rwoth, aka labedo apa jacway ri Were i wi migam ma lakiro remo ma mic ma siem.
Aka riŋo ma cowirok ma mic ma siem ma foyo, iripo camo i ndelo no won, kiripi weyo moro wodoŋ tundo odikin.
To ka cowirok m'imiyo obedo mic m'iciko kosa ma in won imiyo, ilacamo i ndelo m'itimo cowirok perin, aka m'odoŋ wocam i ndelo ma luwo.
To riŋo ma cowirok m'odoŋ kiri i ndelo mar'adek iripo waŋo woko gi mac.
Ka riŋo moro je ma cowirok ocam adieri i ndelo mar'adek, kilajolo mic, kosa kilabedo mic pa ŋat'omiyo, labedo amien, aka ŋat'ocam latimo reco.
Joma jolony ama jonyalo camo riŋo. Riŋo m'ogey gimakoc je kiripi camo, iripo waŋo woko gi mac.
To ŋat'ocam riŋo wok i cowirok ma mic ma siem ri Rwoth munyo jokoc, lapokere kwoŋ ji pere.
Aka ŋat'ogey koco pa dhano kosa ogwaŋ makoc, kosa gimakoc moro je ma kelo amien, to camo riŋo wok i cowirok ma mic ma siem ri Rwoth, lapokere kwoŋ ji pere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili iwaci rijo ni, jokiripi camo bor dhiaŋ, rombo, kosa diel.
Bor ogwaŋ ma won otho, kosa m'ogwaŋ madudi oneko, inyalo oro ma giman je, to wikiripi camo adieri.
Ŋat'ocam bor mar'ogwaŋ m'omiyo paka mic m'iwaŋo gi mac ri Rwoth, lapokere kwoŋ ji pere.
Wikiripi camo remo moro je, mar'ogwaŋ kosa ma winyo, kama winobed'iye je.
Ŋat'ocam remo moro je, lapokere kwoŋ ji pere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili iwaci rijo ni, ŋata timo cowirok ma mic ma siem ri Rwoth, won ripo kelo mic pere wok i cowirok ma mic ma siem.
Go won lakelo gi cinge mic pa Rwoth m'iwaŋo gi mac, bor kodi ŋakin (thundho) aka ŋey wotiŋ thundho malo paka mic ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lawaŋo bor i wi migam, aka thundho mere obedo apa Aron kodi wote.
Aka eme maracuc ma cowirok ma mic ma siem wilamiyo jacway ri Were i wi migam paka mic.
Kwoŋ wot Aron, ŋata miyo remo kodi bor ma mic ma siem, ama latero eme maracuc.

Kole atieko kwanyo thundho ma mic m'itiŋo malo kodi eme maracuc, wok kwoŋ cowirok ma mic ma siem, ma Joisiraili jomiyo, aka atieko miyo Aron kodi wote, paka mic ma joripo limo wok bongi Joisiraili cil gi cil.
Me adec pa Aron kodi wote, wok kwoŋ mic m'iwaŋo ri Rwoth gi mac, wok i ndelo ma go oketho jo tic paka jocway ri Were i wi migam pa Rwoth.
Me gigipiny ma Rwoth omiyo or nike iripo miyo jo, wok i ndelo ma go owiro jo gi mo, paka gima Joisiraili joripo miyo jo cil gi cil i luse pajo je.
Me kwer ma mic awaŋa, mic ma cemo manyinge, mic ma cwako reco, mic ma banja, mic ma wiro jocway ri Were i wi migam gi mo kodi cowirok ma mic ma siem,
ma Rwoth omiyo Musa or wi got Sinai, i ndelo ma go omiyo Joisiraili cik kelo mic pajo ri Rwoth i thim ma Sinai.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
Kwany Aron kodi wote, gi ruk pajo, mo, rwath ma mic ma cwako reco, wot rombo ario, kodi adita ma mugat ma buthow.
Coki lwak ji i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Musa otimo paka Rwoth omiyo go or, aka ocoko lwak ji i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Musa owaco ri lwak ji ni, “Me a gima Rwoth omiyan or ni wotim.”
Musa olwoŋo Aron kodi wote yuwiye, aka olwoko jo gi pi.
Musa oruko ri Aron sati, kodi kanzu, to tweyo piere gi del, to ketho law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kwoŋe, to tweyo.
Musa oketho mugowa ma ketho giŋeyo mito pa Were kwoŋ go, to keth'iye Urim kodi Thumim.
Musa oruko rigo junga i wiye, to ketho thiwino ma zahabu, sangaria maleŋ ruwaŋ junga, paka Rwoth omiyo go or.
Musa okwanyo mo, aka owiro Kabedo Maleŋ kodi gigipiny mere je, to loko jo maleŋ.
Go okiro mo i wi migam dibirio, owiro migam kodi gigipiny mere je gi mo, kalaya kodi pende, loko jo maleŋ.
Musa okonjo mo i wi Aron aka owiro go, loko go maleŋ.
Musa olwoŋo wot Aron, oruko rijo satere, to tweyo rijo del, aka oruko jungin i wi jo paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Musa okelo rwath ma mic ma cwako reco, aka Aron kodi wote joketho cingi jo i wic mere ri mic ma cwako reco.
Musa othumo, aka okwanyo remo, to ketho i tungi migam thoko gi lwet cinge, loko maleŋ, okonjo remo i tiendi migam, oloko maleŋ, miy'iye cowirok ma cwako reco.
Musa okwanyo bor je ma gigipiny ma iye, adec maber loyo ma cuny, roge ario gi bor mere, aka owaŋo i wi migam.
To rwath won, pien mere, riŋo mere, kodi woyo mere, go owaŋo woko ma kambi, paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Musa okelo wod rombo ma mic awaŋa, aka Aron kodi wote joketho cingi jo i wic mere.
Musa othumo, aka okiro remo mere i wi migam thoko.
Musa oyaŋo mathindho thindho, aka owaŋo wic mere, mumin mere kodi bor.
Go olwoko gigipiny ma iye kodi olenge gi pi, aka Musa owaŋo wod rombo gipi i wi migam. Me oyido obedo mic awaŋa ri ŋwece kur mamit, mic m'owaŋ gi mac ri Rwoth, paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Musa okelo wod rombo mar'ario, ma kwoŋo Aron kodi wote, aka joketho cingi jo i wic mere.
Musa othumo, aka okwanyo remo to wiro i ithi Aron maracuc, lwet cinge ma thwon maracuc, kodi lwet tiende ma thwon maracuc.
Musa okelo wot Aron, aka owiro remo i ithi jo maracuc, lwet cingi jo ma thwon maracuc, kodi lwet tiendi jo ma thwon maracuc. Remo m'odoŋ Musa okiro i tiendi migam.
Musa okwanyo bor, yiwe maleny, bor je ma umo gigipiny ma iye, adec maber loyo ma cuny, roge ario gi bor mere kodi eme maracuc.
Wok iy'adita m'oyido nitie ruwaŋ Rwoth, Musa okwanyo mugat acel ma buthow, mugat acel m'owir'iye mo, kodi mugat manwaŋ, aka oketho i wi bor kodi eme maracuc.
Musa oketho i par cingi Aron kodi wote, aka otiŋo malo paka mic m'otiŋ malo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Musa okwanyo wok i par cingi jo, aka owaŋo i wi migam gi mic awaŋa. Me obedo mic ma kwoŋo jo, m'owaŋ gi mac ri ŋwece kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Musa okwanyo thundho aka otiŋo malo paka mic m'itiŋo malo ruwaŋ Rwoth. Me obedo adec pa Musa wok i wod rombo ma kwoŋo jo, paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Musa okwanyo mo, kodi remo m'oyido nitie i wi migam, aka okiro kwoŋ Aron gi ruk pere, wote gi ruk pajo, aka ameno oloko Aron kodi wote gi ruk pajo maleŋ.
Musa owaco ri Aron kodi wote ni, “Tedi win riŋo i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, aka wicam kenyo gi mugat manitie iy'adita ma mic ma kwoŋo jo, paka Rwoth omiyan or ni, ‘Aron kodi wote jowocami.’”
Riŋo kodi mugat m'odoŋ, waŋ win gi mac.
Wikiripi eye i dhiot ma Wema ma romo ma ndelo abirio, cuka ndelo mewin ma loko win maleŋ rumo. Kole ma ndelo abirio go lapoŋo cingi win.
Paka go otimo i ndelo me, Rwoth omiyo or ni wotim, timo cowirok ma cwako reco mewin.
Wilabedo i dhiot ma Wema ma romo odieceŋ gi wor ma ndelo abirio, kuro cik pa Rwoth, ŋey wikiri witho, kole omiyan or.
Aron kodi wote jotimo kisi gimoro je paka Rwoth oyido owodho or luwo bongi Musa.
I ndelo mar'aboro ma kwoŋo jo, Musa olwoŋo Aron kodi wote, kodi jodongo ma Isiraili.
To waco ri Aron ni, “Kwany rwath ma mic ma cwako reco kodi wod rombo ma mic awaŋa, ma jongoye gi ŋolo, aka imiy ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Aka ri Joisiraili, luw gi jo iwaci ni, ‘Kwany win wod diel ma mic ma cwako reco, rwath kodi nyathi rombo, ma jo oro acel ma jongoye gi ŋolo, ma mic awaŋa.
Megikwe kodi wod rombo ma mic ma siem, ma cowirok ruwaŋ Rwoth; kodi moko m'onywow gi mo oliv, kole konon Rwoth laneno riwin.’”
Jokelo gima Musa omiyo or yuwaŋ Wema ma romo, aka lwak gibe ocore cegin to jocungo liŋ ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Musa owaco ni, “Me wac ma Rwoth omiyo or ni witim, aka dwoŋ pa Rwoth laneno riwin.”

Musa owaco ri Aron ni, “Core cegin gi migam aka itimi cowirok perin ma mic ma cwako reco kodi mic awaŋa perin, aka itimi cowirok ma cwako reco perin kodi apa ji. Tim cowirok ma mic pa ji, aka itimi cowirok ma cwako reco pajo, paka Rwoth owaco.”
Aron ocore cegin gi migam, aka othumo rwath ma mic ma cwako reco, m'oyido obedo apere.
Wot Aron jomiyo go remo, aka oluth'iye lwet cinge to wiro i tunge migam. Remo m'odoŋ go okonjo woko i tiendi migam.
To bor, roge ario, kodi adec maber loyo ma cuny, go owaŋo i wi migam, paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Riŋo kodi pien mere go owaŋo gi mac woko ma kambi.
Aron othumo mic awaŋa, aka wote jokelo rigo remo, to go kiro thoko migam.
Jokelo rigo mic awaŋa kodi adec je, kodi wic, aka go owaŋo i wi migam.
Aron olwoko gigipiny ma iye kodi olenge, aka owaŋo, kanyacel gi mic awaŋa, i wi migam.
Aron okelo mic pa ji, okwanyo diel ma mic ma cwako reco pa ji, othumo, aka omiyo ma cwako reco, paka marapena.
Go okelo mic awaŋa, aka otimo cowirok mere cungo kwoŋ kwer mere.
Go okelo mic ma cemo manyinge, ojowo masi cinge, aka owaŋo i wi migam, medo i wi mic awaŋa m'odikin.
Go othumo megikwe kodi wod rombo ma cowirok ma mic ma siem, m'oyido obedo apa ji, aka wot Aron jokelo rigo remo mere, to kiro thoko migam.
Aka bor ma megikwe kodi wod rombo, yiw rombo maleny, bor ma umo gigipiny ma iye kodi roge je, adec maber loyo ma cuny,
joketho i wi thundho, aka go owaŋo bor i wi migam.
Aka thundho kodi eme maracuc Aron otiŋo malo ri mic m'otiŋ malo ruwaŋ Rwoth, paka Musa omiyo or.
Musa kodi Aron jodonjo i Wema ma romo, aka jowok to jomiyo ji silwany aka dwoŋ pa Rwoth oneno ri ji je.
Mac owok ruwaŋ Rwoth aka oumo migam ma mic awaŋa kodi bor; aka ji je joneno, jokoko, to jopodho piny gi nyim jo.
Wot Aron, Nadab kodi Abihu, kisi dhano okwanyo wer to cwiny'iye mac, jomed'iye buban, to jomiyo mac ma kileŋ ruwaŋ Rwoth, m'oyido k'omiy jo or timo.
Mac owok ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka owaŋo woko jo, to jotho ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Musa owaco ri Aron ni, “Me a gima Rwoth owaco:
‘Luwo kwoŋ jono ma jocore bongan,
alanyutho leŋo paran,
aka ruwaŋ ji je,
alalimo dwoŋ.’ ”
Aka Aron oliŋaliŋa.
Musa olwoŋo Misael kodi Elizafan, wot Uziel, ner Aron, aka owaco rijo ni, “Core win cegin, witiŋ wade mewin wok i Kabedo Maleŋ witer jo woko ma kambi.”
Jocore cegin, aka jotiŋo jo gi satere pajo to jotero jo woko ma kambi paka Musa omiyo or.

Musa owaco ri Aron kodi wote, Eliazar kodi Ithamar ni, “Wikiri wiyaw wiy win, kosa wiyec nangin mewin, kosa wilatho, aka keme labino kwoŋ ji. To weyi wade mewin, ot gibe ma Isiraili, jowoywak waŋ ma Rwoth ocwinyo.
Wikiri wieye i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, kosa wilatho. Kole mo pa Rwoth nitie kwoŋ win.” Jotimo paka Musa owaco.
Rwoth oluwo gi Aron ka waco ni:
Ikiripi madho medho makec, in kosa wotin, ka widonjo i Wema ma romo, kosa wilatho. Me labedo cik riwin cil gi cil i luse mewin je;
ŋey wikethi pokirok i dier leŋo kodi gima kisi ndelo, i dier koco kodi lonyo.
Iripo fonjo Joisiraili cik je ma Rwoth oluwo gi cingi Musa.
Wilacamo i Kabedo Maleŋ, kwoŋbedo obedo adec perin kodi wotin, wok i mic m'owaŋ ri Rwoth; kole omiyan or.
Aka thundho kodi eme maracuc wilacamo i kabedo m'olony, in, kodi wotin kodi nyikin, kole obedo adec mewin m'omiy win wok i cowirok ma mic ma siem wok bongi Joisiraili.
Eme maracuc kodi thundho jolakelo gi mic ma bor, ri mic m'itiŋo malo ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka labedo aperin, kodi nyithindho perin, jobedo adec ma wiripo limo cil gi cil, paka Rwoth otieko miyo or.”
Musa odwaro diel ma mic ma cwako reco gi kinen, aka neni, oyido owaŋ. Musa omako nge gi Eliazar kodi Ithamar, wot Aron m'oyido fodi jokwo, aka owaco ni:
Raŋo wikicamo mic ma cwako reco i Kabedo Maleŋ, kole obedo maleŋ swa, aka omiy win tiŋo reco pa lwak ji, timo cowirok ma cwako reco rijo ruwaŋ Rwoth?
Neni, remo mere k'okeli i Kabedo Maleŋ, wiripo camo adieri i Kabedo Maleŋ, paka amiyo or.
Aron owaco ri Musa ni, “Neni, konon me jomiyo mic pajo ma cwako reco kodi mic awaŋa pajo ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka nger gime opodho kwoŋan; to k'anocami mic ma cwako reco konon me, obedi gimaber ruwaŋ Rwoth?”
Aka munyo Musa owinjo gime, oneno maber ruwaŋe.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa kodi Aron aka owaco rijo ni:
Luw win gi Joisiraili wiwaci rijo ni: Me ogwaŋe ma jonyalo camo kwoŋ cwec je manitie i piny.
Ogwaŋ moro je ma tiende opokere, manitie gi par tiende, aka nyamo cemo dirio, nger no winyalo camo.
To kwoŋ ogwaŋe ma jonyamo cemo dirio kodi ma tiendi jo opokere, wikiripi camo me: Ŋamia, kwoŋbedo nyamo cemo dirio, to tiende k'opokere dirio, koc riwin.
Oyeyo ma tele, makada nende nyamo cemo dirio, to tiende k'opokere dirio; koc riwin.
Oculu, makada nende nyamo cemo dirio, tiende k'opokere dirio, koc riwin.
Mbiji, makada nende tiende opokere dirio aka nitie gi par tiende, to kinyam cemo dirio; koc riwin.
Wikiripi camo riŋo pajo kosa mako ma jotho, jokoc riwin.
Me winyalo camo kwoŋ gima kwo i pi. Gima nitie gi thwoke kodi magambala, i nam kosa i malawa, winyalo camo.
Gim'ongoye gi thwoke kodi magambala i nam kosa i malawa, kwoŋ gima wotho i pi kodi makwo i pi, jobedo amien riwin.
Jobedo amien riwin, wikiripi camo riŋo pajo, aka ma jotho wiripo tero paka amien.
Kisi gim'ongoye gi thwoke kosa magambala ma kwo i pi obedo amien riwin.
Aka me winyin ma jobedo amien riwin, wikiripi camo, jokoc riwin. Ango, acut, naminaka,
otengo m'obokere kodi otengo macol gi nger je,
nger agak je,
bwoŋ maya, nger tula je, winyin ma nam,
tula mathindho kodi madongo, magwi,
gweno ma pi, tula ma thim, acut ma camo jo
mbuluku, nger acik je, kilapembe, kodi kilafundo.
Cwec ma jobwombi gin je ma jowotho gi tiendi jo aŋwen jokoc riwin.
Kucel kwoŋ cwec ma jobwombi gin aka jowotho gi tiendi jo aŋwen, winyalo camo ma tiendi jo olwowere, aka joay malo.
Me kwoŋ jo, winyalo camo, nger bonyo je, nger senene je, nger nyenje je, nger otwoŋo je.
To ma jobwombi gin man je aka jonitie gi tiendi jo aŋwen, jokoc riwin.
Me gima loko win makoc, ŋat'ogey m'otho labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ŋat'ogey m'otho je ripo lwoko nangin pere, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ogwaŋe je ma tiende k'opokere dirio, aka ongoye gi par tiende, kosa kinyam cemo dirio, koc riwin, ŋat'ogey m'otho je labedo makoc.
Ogwaŋe je ma jowotho gi lwet tiendi jo, kwoŋ ogwaŋe ma jotiendi gin aŋwen, jokoc riwin, ŋat'ogey m'otho labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ŋat'ogey m'otho ripo lwoko nangin pere, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Kwoŋ cwec ma jolak piny i lowo, me jokoc riwin; fuko, oyeyin, nger ragwe je,
kambelimbeli, ŋec, kikome, othiololo, kodi ŋokino.
Me jokoc riwin, kwoŋ ogwaŋe ma jolak piny; ŋat'ogey m'otho labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Gima jopodh'iye je ka jotho labedo makoc, obedi atewe ma mbawo, nanga, pien, kutiya, gimoro je m'itiyo gine, iripo lwoko, aka nyaka wotiy gine. Labedo makoc tundo othieno to bedo m'olony.
K'opodho iy'atewe ma lowo, labedo makoc, aka iripo baro woko.
Cemo moro je ma pi ooy'iye wok iy'atewe no labedo makoc, kosa gir'amadha moro je m'oyido nitie i nger atewe no labedo makoc.
Kisi gima delkwoŋ jo opodh'iye labedo makoc, obedi kendo kosa sigiri, kosa degi, iripo turo woko, jokoc riwin.
Waŋ pi kosa kacoko pi labedo m'olony, to gim'ogey delkwoŋ jo iye labedo makoc.
Ka delkwoŋ jo opodho i kodhi m'iripo cwoyo, labedo m'olony.
To k'oyido okethi pi i kodhi, to delkwoŋ jo podh'iye, labedo makoc.
Ka ogwaŋ ma wicamo otho, ŋat'ogey delkwoŋe je labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Joma jocam riŋo mere joripo lwoko nangin pajo aka jolabedo makoc tundo othieno; jono ma jotiŋ delkwoŋe joripo lwoko nangin pajo aka jolabedo makoc tundo othieno.
Cwec je ma jolak piny jobedo amien, wikiripi camo.
Cwec ma jowotho gi iy jo, ma jowotho gi tiendi jo aŋwen, kosa jonitie gi tiendi jo kweth, cwec je ma jolak piny, wikiripi camo, kole jobedo amien riwin.
Wikiripi kelo amien kwoŋ win gi cwec ma jolak; wikiripi kocirok gi jo, aka wibedi makoc.
Kole an, abedo Rwoth Were mewin, lokere win maleŋ, aka wibedi maleŋ, kole Aleŋ. Wikiripi kocirok gi cwec ma lak piny.
Kole An abedo Rwoth, m'awodho win wok i lowo ma Misir, bedo Were mewin, riameno bedi win maleŋ, kole Aleŋ.
Me cik ma mako kwoŋ ogwaŋe, winyin, kodi kisi cwec ma wotho i pi, kodi cwec je ma jolak piny,
ma ketho pokirok i dier gimakoc kodi gim'olony, i dier cwec makwo m'icamo kodi ma kicam.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili iwaci rijo ni, “Ka dhako ogamo iye to nywolo nyathi majayac, go labedo makoc manyakwer ma ndelo abirio, paka ka go ruko dwe bedo makoc.
I ndelo mar'aboro iripo thumo pien ma yiw nyathi.
Ndelo pere ma lonyirok kwoŋ remo labedo piero adek g'adek, go kiripi mako gimaleŋ, kosa donjo i Kabedo Maleŋ, cuka ndelo pere ma lonyirok rumo.
Ka go onywolo nyathi manyako, go labedo makoc ma ndelo apar g'aŋwen, paka ka go ruko dwe. Ndelo pere ma lonyirok kwoŋ remo labedo ndelo piero aucel g'aucel.”

“Ka ndelo pere ma lonyirok orumo, obedi nike go onywolo jayac kosa nyako, go lakelo nyathi rombo ma jaoro acel ri mic awaŋa, kodi njiwa kosa akuru bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam ri mic ma cwako reco i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo ruwaŋ Rwoth to timo cowirok ma cwako reco rigo. Go labedo m'olony kwoŋ cwer remo. Me kwer ri ŋat'onywol nyathi manyako kosa majayac.

K'inen go kinyal kelo rombo, go lakelo akuru ario kosa njiwin ario, acel ma mic awaŋa kodi man ma mic ma cwako reco. Jacway ri Were i wi migam latimo cowirok ma cwako reco rigo, aka go labedo m'olony.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa kodi Aron ama:

Ka dhano nitie kodi gim'okwot, bur kosa gim'othon i delkwoŋe to lokere two dhowo i delkwoŋe, nyaka inyalo kelo go bongi Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam kosa bongi acel kwoŋ wote ma jobedo jocway ri Were i wi migam.

Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa two manitie i delkwoŋe, aka ka yer mar'adec ma two omako olokere matar, to two neno maluth loyo pien ma delkwoŋe, obedo two dhowo; ka jacway ri Were i wi migam otieko kikaŋasa go, latuco ni go olony.
To k'adec ma pien ma delkwoŋe tar, aka kicale pa thuth loyo pien, aka yer ma kwoŋe fodi k'olokere matar, jacway ri Were i wi migam lakano jatwo ma ndelo abirio.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa i ndelo mar'abirio, aka k'oneno ni otiek kikaŋasa two aka fodi k'onyay i pien, to jacway ri Were i wi migam medo kano go ma ndelo abirio man.

Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakikaŋasa go kendo i ndelo mar'abirio, aka ka two oleny aka fodi k'olak i pien, jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go olony; obedo nyaka gim'otula; go lalwoko nangin pere, to bedo m'olony.
To ka kam'otawa onyay i pien ka go otieko nyuthere ri jacway ri Were i wi migam ri lonyo pere, go lanyuthere kendo ri jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa go kendo, aka ka kam'otawa no otiek lak i pien, jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go k'olony; obedo two dhowo.
Ka two dhowo omako dhano, ilakelo go bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam;
jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa go, aka ka nitie gim'okwot matar i pien m'oloko yer matar, aka nitie ringo manumu madongo piyo kam'okwot,
obedo dhowo makicangi i pien ma delkwoŋe, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go koc; go k'ocegi go, rupiri go koc.
To ka dhowo obino abwap i pien, m'onyalo umo pien pa jadhowo gipi wok i wiye kiri i tiende, ma jacway ri Were nyalo neno,
nyaka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa, aka ka dhowo oumo kwoŋe gipi, go latuco ni go olony paka gino otieko lokere je matar, go olony.
To ka ringo manumu omenyere kwoŋe, go labedo makoc.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa ringo manumu, to tuco ni go koc; ringo manumu koc, kole obedo dhowo.
To ka ringo manumu olokere kendo matar, go labino bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam;
jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa go, aka ka two olokere matar, jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni jatwo olony. Go olony.
Aka ka nitie i pien ma delkwoŋ nyatoro bur m'ocango,
aka i kabedo pa bur to menyere gima kwot matar kosa kamoro m'obokere matar, iripo nyutho jacway ri Were i wi migam.
To jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa, aka ka neno pa luth loyo pien, aka yer mere otieko lokere matar, nyaka to jacway ri Were i migam latuco ni go koc; obedo two ma dhowo, m'ocakere i bur.
To ka jacway ri Were i wi migam okaŋasa aka yer ma wiye kitar, kosa kiluth loyo pien, to bedo ma nimnim, jacway ri Were i wi migam lacego go ma ndelo abirio.
K'onyay i pien, jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go koc; two omako.
To k'adec no odoŋ i kabedo acel aka kinyay, obedo alama ma bur; jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go olony.
Kosa, ka del nitie g'awaŋa i pien to ringo manumu mar'awaŋa lokere kam'otawa, m'obokere matar kosa matar,

jacway ri Were i wi migam lakikaŋasa. Ka yer ma kam'otawa otieko lokere matar aka neno thuth loyo pien, meno dhowo; otieko cakere i waŋ, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go koc. Obedo two dhowo.
To ka jacway ri Were okaŋasa to yer ma kam'otawa k'obedo matar, aka kithuth loyo pien to nimnim, jacway ri Were i wi migam lacego go ma ndelo abirio.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa go i ndelo mar'abirio; ka nyay i pien, jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go koc. Obedo two dhowo.
To ka poyo no odoŋ i kabedo acel to bedo ma k'onyay i pien to bedo ma nimnim, meno adhola m'owok i waŋ, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam, latuco ni go koc; kole meno poyo ma waŋ.
Ka jacwo kosa dhako nitie gi two i wiye kosa i ye tike,

jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa two no. Ka nenere ni thuth loyo pien aka yer ma iye obedo manyatongweno aka olwiriri, jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go koc; obedo gima yilo jo, dhowo ma wic kosa ma ye tik jo.
Aka ka jacway ri Were i wi migam okaŋasa two ma yilo jo no to nenere ni kithuth loyo pien aka ongoye yer macol iye, jacway ri Were i wi migam bino cego ŋata nitie gi two ma yilo jo ma ndelo abirio.
I ndelo mar'abirio, jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa ŋwenyirok; aka ka ŋwenyirok fodi k'onyay, aka ongoye yer manyatongweno iye, aka ŋwenyirok kicale pa thuth loyo pien,
go lalielo wiye kwanyowoko adec macegin g'adhola. Jacway ri Were i wi migam kenyo lapano go ma ndelo abirio man.

I ndelo mar'abirio, jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa adhola pere kendo, aka kafodi k'onyay aka kicale pa thuth loyo pien m'othoko, go latuco ni go olony. Ŋato lalwoko nangin pere, to lokere m'olony.
To ka ŋwenyirok onyay k'otiek tuco ni go olony,
jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa go. Ka ŋwenyirok otieko nyay i pien, jacway ri Were i wi migam kiripi dwaro yer manyatongweno, ŋato, olony.
To k'otemi neno ŋwenyirok i waŋe, aka yer macol odoŋ'iye, ŋwenyirok ocango, ŋato olony; aka jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go olony.
Ka jacwo kosa dhako nitie gi kam'otawa i pien ma del, kam'otawa matar,
jacway ri Were i wi migam lakikaŋasa, aka ka kam'otawa ma pien ma del obedo matar ma nimnim, obedo gim'okonjere m'ocakere i pien; go olony.
Ka nyatoro moro je orweny yer wok i wiye, go japata to go olony.
K'orwenyo yer ma nyime kodi yutoke, go nitie gi pata ma nyime to go olony.
To ka nitie i pata kosa i pata ma nyim jo kam'otawa manitie iye two m'obokere matar, meno obedo dhowo m'ocakere i pata pere kosa i pata ma nyime.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa go; ka kama two m'okwot obedo m'obokere matar i pata pere kosa i pata pere ma nyime, ma cale dhowo paka menyirok pa dhowo i pien ma del,
go obedo jadhowo, go koc. Jacway ri Were i wi migam latuco ni go koc; two pere nitie i wiye.
Jadhowo manitie gi two bino ruko kutu to weyo wiye jaŋ, to umo dhoke ma malo to koko ni, “Ma koc, makoc.”
Go bino doŋ makoc ka go fodi two; go koc. Go bino bedo kakende; kabedo pere labedo woko ma kambi.
Ma mako nangin: Ka nitie two dhowo i nanga, obedi mafoth pa pien rombo kosa law,
i wiy nyawote, kosa ma law kosa nanga ma yer rombo kosa i pien kosa i kisi gimoro je m'otimi gi pien,
ka two onyuthere manyaboke pendi kosa m'obokere i nanga, kam'odole, kosa ma pien, kosa i pien, kosa i gimoro je m'otimi gi pien, obedo two dhowo aka iripo nyutho jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa two, to cego kama nitie two no ma ndelo abirio.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa two i ndelo mar'abirio. Ka two otieko nyay i nanga, kam'odole, kosa i pien, kad'obedi ni pien ioro ma ginaŋo, obedo two dhowo ma nyay, koc.
Go bino waŋo nanga, obedi ni two nitie kam'odole, gima nyayer rombo kosa law, kosa i gimoro je m'otimi gi pien, obedo dhowo ma nyay, iripo waŋo i mac.
Ka jacway ri Were i wi migam okaŋasa, to two fodi k'onyay i nanga, kam'odole, kosa i gimoro je ma pien,
jacway ri Were i wi migam bino oro jo lwoko gima two niye, to ketho gicen ma ndelo abirio man.

Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kikaŋasa gino k'otiek lwoko. K'adec ma two niye no fodi k'owiro cal, kada two fodi k'onyay, obedo gimakoc; iripo waŋo i mac, kad'obedi ni kama di dhowo nitie yucen kosa yuwiye.
Ka jacway ri Were i wi migam okaŋasa, to two lokere ma nimnim munyo otiek lwoko, go ripo yeco adec kwoŋ nanga, i kam'odole kosa kwoŋ pien.
K'onenere kendo i nanga, i kam'odole, kosa i gimoro je ma pien, meno nyay; iripo waŋo gi mac gino kama two nener'iye.
To nanga, kam'odole, kosa gimoro je m'otimi gi pien ma two nener'iye k'itieko lwoko, nyaka ibino lwoko madirio, aka bino bedo m'olony.
Me obedo cik ma two dhowo i nanga ma pien rombo kosa i law, obedi kam'odole, kosa i gimoro je m'otimi gi pien, ma ridho ni olony kosa koc.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“Me bino bedo cik ri jadhowo i ndelo ma lonyo pere.”
“Ibino kelo go bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam;
jacway ri Were i wi migam bino wok woko ma kambi, to kaŋasa. Gikenyo k'ocangi two dhowo,
jacway ri Were i wi migam bino oro jo tero ri ŋat'ilonyo winyin ario m'olony makwo kodi yen sida, adasa m'obokere kodi gikiro remo.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam laoro jo neko acel kwoŋ winyin no iy'atawo wi pi ma mol.
Go bino kwanyo winyo makwo kodi yen sida g'adasa m'obokere kodi gikiro remo, to lutho jo gi winyo makwo i remo pa winyo m'oneki wi pi ma mol.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kiro remo kwoŋ ŋat'ilonyo ma dhowo dibirio; kenyo to tuco ni go olony, to weyo winyo makwo kadho i koyo.
Aka ŋat'ilonyo bino lwoko nangin pere, to lielo wiye, to lwokere i pi, to lony; aka ka meno orumo to bino i kambi, to bedo woko ma wema pere ma ndelo abirio.
I ndelo mar'abirio go lalielo yer pere je; ma wiye, ye tike, biendi waŋe; go bino lielo yer pere je. Kenyo to lwoko nangin pere, to lwoko delkwoŋe i pi, to lony.”
“Aka i ndelo mar'aboro go bino kwanyo wot rombo ario ma bu ŋolo, gi rombo acel madhako ma jaoro acel ma bu ŋolo, mic ma moko kilo adek m'oruw gi mo kodi lita acel ma mo oliv.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam ma loko go m'olony bino jengo jal m'ilalonyo kodi gigipiny me ruwaŋ Rwoth, i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Jacway ri Were i migam bino kwanyo acel kwoŋ rombo ma cwo, to miyo paka mic ma banja, kanyacel gi lita mo acel wiy adek ma go lamiyo paka mic ma banja ruwaŋ Rwoth;
to neko rombo i kabedo kama jolanek'iye mic mareco kodi cowirok awaŋa, kamaleŋ; ri mic ma banja, paka mic mareco, obedo apa jacway ri Were i wi migam; Leŋ swa maloyo.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo remo moro ma mic ma banja to ketho kam'owidhere ma ithi ŋat'ilonyo maracuc, kodi i lwet cinge ma thwon maracuc, kodi i lwet tiende ma thwon maracuc.
Kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo mo moro ma oliv to konjo i par cinge won maracam,
to lutho lwet cinge acel ma cinge maracuc i mo manitie i cinge maracam to kiro mo moro gi lwet cinge dibirio ruwaŋ Rwoth.

Mo moro m'odoŋ i cinge jacway ri Were i wi migam bino ketho kam'owidhere ma ithi ŋat'ilonyo maracuc, kodi i lwet cinge ma thwon ma cinge maracuc, kodi i lwet tiende ma thwon ma tiende maracuc, medo kwoŋ remo ma mic ma banja.
Aka mo m'odoŋ manitie i cingi go bino ketho i wiy ŋat'ilonyo. Kenyo to jacway ri Were i wi migam to timo tim ma cul mareco pere ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino miyo mic mareco, ma timo tim ma cul mareco ri ŋat'ilonyo kwoŋ koco pere. Rumacen go bino neko mic awaŋa;
to jacway ri Were i wi migam bino miyo mic awaŋa kodi mic ma kodhi i wi migam. Ameno apaka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino timo rigo tim ma cul mareco, aka go bino lony.”

“To ka go jacandi aka kinyal nyalo mathoth, kenyo go lakwanyo wod rombo acel ri mic ma banja t'iweyo kadho, ma timo tim ma cul mareco rigo. Go lakelo kilo acel ma moko m'oruw gi mo oliv ri mic ma kodhi kodi acel wiy adek ma lita mo oliv.
Bende gi akurin ario kosa njiwin ario, paka go nyalo, acel ri mic mareco kodi man mere ma mic awaŋa.
Aka i ndelo mar'aboro go bino kelo jo bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam ma lonyirok pere, i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, ruwaŋ Rwoth,
aka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo rombo ma mic ma banja, kodi mo oliv to miyo jo paka mic manyakare ri Rwoth.

Go bino neko rombo ma mic ma banja; to jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo remo moro ma mic awaŋa to ketho i kam'owidhere ma ithi ŋat'ilonyo, kodi i cinge ma thwon ma cinge maracuc, kodi i lwet tiende ma thwon ma tiende maracuc.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino konjo mo moro i par cinge won maracam;
to kiro gi lwet cinge maracuc mo moro manitie i cinge maracam dibirio ruwaŋ Rwoth;

aka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino ketho mo moro manitie i cinge i kam'owidhere ma ithi ŋat'ilonyo maracuc, kodi i cinge ma thwon ma cinge maracuc, kodi i lwet tiende ma thwon ma tiende maracuc, i kabedo kama remo ma mic ma banja oyido oketh'iye;
aka mo man manitie i cingi jacway ri Were i wi migam ibino ketho i wiy ŋat'ilonyo, ma timo rigo tim ma cul mareco ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Aka go lamiyo, kwoŋ akurin kosa njiwin ma nyaka ay paka go nyalo,
acel ri mic mareco kodi acel man ri mic awaŋa, kanyacel gi mic ma kodhi; aka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino timo tim ma cul mareco ruwaŋ Rwoth ri ŋat'ilonyo.
Me obedo cik ri ŋato ma two dhowo nitie kwoŋe, ŋati ma kinyal nwaŋo mic ma lonyo pere.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa kodi Aron ni,
“Ka witundo i piny ma Kanan ma miyo win paka gimewin, t'aketho two dhowo i ot i piny m'obedo mewin,
onyo ŋata dhumo ot no labino to waco ri jacway ri Were i wi migam ni, ‘Nitie gima cale ran two moro i ot paran.’

Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino wodho or ni jowowodhi woko kisi gimoro ma ot mafodi k'odonjo kikaŋasa two, ka k'obedo ameno kisi gimoro je manitie i ot lalokere makoc; aka rumacen jacway ri Were i migam ladonjo kikaŋasa ot.
Go bino kikaŋasa two; ka two nitie i kor gi kam'otawa othon manyaboke pendi kosa m'obokere, aka ka neno pa thuth loyo wiye,
kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam bino wok woko kiri i thigo ma ot to cego ot ma ndelo abirio.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino dwoko kendo i ndelo mar'abirio to kikaŋasa; ka two otiek nyay i kor ot,
kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam bino wodho or ni telin ma two nener'iye wowodhi woko t'ibolo kama koc woko ma tindi madwoŋ.
Go bino neno ni iy ot ocidi maber swa, aka kam'ofuy m'ocidi woko bino konjo kama koc woko ma tindi madwoŋ.
Jobino kwanyo telin man to joketho jo i kabedo pa telin no, to jokwanyo gifuyo man to jofuyo gine ot.”
“Ka two otur kendo i ot, ka go otieko wodho woko telin to gweno ot to fuyo,
nyaka to jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kidho to neno; aka ka two onyay i ot, meno obedo dhowo makicangi i ot, obedo gimakoc.
Go bino turo piny ot, telin mere kodi mbawin mere kodi fuy ma ot je, go bino tiŋo jo to wodho jo woko ma tindi madwoŋ to tero kama koc.
Medo kwoŋ meno, ŋatimoro je m'odonji i ot munyo ocegi bino bedo makoc tundo othieno;
aka jono je ma jonindi kosa jocem i ot jolalwoko nangin pajo.”
“To ka jacway ri Were i wi migam obino kikaŋasa, to two fodi k'onyay i ot munyo otiek fuyo ot, jacway ri Were i wi migam bino tuco ni ot olony; ocangi two.
Aka ri lonyo ot go bino tero winyin ario mathindho, gi yen sida, adasa m'obokere kodi gikiro remo,
to neko acel kwoŋ winyin iy'atawo wi pi ma mol,
aka bino kwanyo yen sida, gikiro remo kodi adasa m'obokere, kanyacel gi winyo makwo, to lutho jo i remo pa winyo m'oneki kodi wi pi ma mol, to kiro remo i ot dibirio.
Ameno apaka lalonyo ot gi remo pa winyo, pi ma mol, winyo makwo, yen sida, gikiro remo kodi adasa m'obokere;
go bino weyo winyo makwo to kadho woko ma tindi madwoŋ kam'othangere; onyo go bino timo tim ma ŋuto reco ri ot, to lokere m'olony.”
“Me obedo cik kwoŋ two dhowo moro je;
ri dhowo ma nanga, kosa i ot,
kodi ri gima kwot kosa kam'otawa,
ma nyutho ka koc kodi ka olony. Me obedo cik ri dhowo.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa kodi Aron, ka waco ni:
Luw win gi Joisiraili aka wiwaci rijo ni, “Ka nyatoro moro je nitie gi tuti macwer wok kwoŋe, tuti loko go makoc.
Koco macwer tuti pere obedo me: Obedi ni kwoŋe cwer tuti, kosa kwoŋe ocungo cwer tuti, obedo koco rigo.
Kisi kitanda moro je ma ŋata cwero tuti onind'iye labedo makoc; aka kisi gimoro je ma go obed'iye labedo makoc.
Nyatoro moro je m'ogey kitanda pere ripo lwoko nangin pere, to lwokere gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ŋat'obedi i wi gimoro je ma ŋata cwero tuti obed'iye ripo lwoko nangin pere, to lwokere gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ŋat'ogey delkwoŋ ŋata cwero tuti ripo lwoko nangin pere, to jolwokere gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ka ŋata cwer tuti oŋuli law kwoŋ ŋat'olony, kenyo go ripo lwoko nangin pere, to lwokere, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Kwot gal moro je ma ŋata cwero tuti obed'iye labedo makoc.
Dhano moro je m'ogey gimoro je manitie i ŋange labedo makoc tundo othieno, aka dhano moro je m'otiŋ nger gino ripo lwoko nangin pere, to jolwokere gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ŋatimoro je ma ŋata cwero tuti ogey ma k'ologo cinge, ripo lwoko nangin pere, to lwokere gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Atawo ma lowo moro je ma ŋata cwero tuti ogey iripo baro woko; aka kisi atawo ma yath iripo lwoko gi pi.”
“Ka ŋata cwer tuti olony kwoŋ tuti pere, go ripo kwano ndelo abirio ma lonyirok pere; aka ma ridho lonyo pere, go lalwoko nangin pere to lwokere i waŋ pi ma mol, aka labedo lony.
I ndelo mar'aboro go latero akurin ario kosa njiwin ario, aka labino ruwaŋ Rwoth i dhiot ma Wema ma romo to miyo jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo jo, acel ri mic ma cwako reco kodi acel ri mic awaŋa; to jacway ri Were i wi migam miyo cowirok ma lonyo rigo ruwaŋ Rwoth kwoŋ tuti pere.”
“Ka dhano ojayo, go ripo lwok, delkwoŋe gibe gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Nanga moro je kosa pien ma go ojayo iye iripo lwoko gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ka jacwo onindo gi dhako to jayo, joje joripo lwoki gi pi, aka jolabedo makoc tundo othieno.”
“Ka dhako ruko dwe, go labedo i koco pere ma ndelo abirio, aka ŋat'ogey go labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Kisi gima go onindi iye je i hongo ma go ruko dwe, labedo makoc; aka kisi gima go obed'iye je bende labedo makoc.
Dhano moro je m'ogey kitanda pere ripo lwoko nangin pere, to lwokere gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ŋat'ogey gimoro je ma dheno obed'iye ripo lwoko nangin pere, to lwokere gi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Obedi kitanda kosa kisi gima go obed'iye, ŋat'ogey labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ka jacwo moro onindo gi go, to remo dwe geyo go, go labedo makoc ma ndelo abirio; aka kitanda je ma jalo onind'iye, labedo makoc.”

“Ka dhako ocwero remo ma ndelo kweth, ma kalo hongo ma ruko dwe pere, kosa ka remo ocwer kwoŋe loyo hongo ma ruko dwe pere, ndelin no je ma go lamedo cwer remo go lamedere bedo makoc; paka i ndelin ma ruko dwe pere.
Kisi kitanda ma go onind'iye i ndelin no je ma remo cwer kwoŋe, ilatero paka kitanda makoc; aka kisi gimoro je ma go obed'iye labedo makoc, paka koco ma ruko dwe.
Ŋat'ogey gigipiny me labedo makoc, aka lalwoko nangin pere, to lwokere gi pi, aka labedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ka go olony i ruko dwe pere, go lakwano ndelo abirio, aka rumacen go labedo m'olony.
I ndelo mar'aboro go latero akurin ario kosa njiwin ario to miyo jacway ri Were i wi migam i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo acel ri mic ma cwako reco kodi man ca ri cowirok awaŋa; aka jacway ri Were i wi migam lamiyo cowirok ma lonyo rigo ruwaŋ Rwoth kwoŋ koco pere.”
“Ameno apaka wilapoko Joisiraili kwoŋ koco pajo, ŋey jokiri jowotho i koco pajo, ka jokoco kabedo paran manitie i dier jo.”
“Me obedo cik ri ŋata tuti cwer kwoŋe, ŋat'ojayo, to bedo makoc,
ri dhako ma two dwe, ri nyatoro, jacwo kosa dhako ma tuti cwer kwoŋe, kodi ri jacwo m'onindi gi dhako makoc.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa munyo wot Aron ario jotieko tho, munyo jocore cegin ruwaŋ Rwoth to jotho;

Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Luw gi omin in Aron, nike okir obino hongo je i Kabedo Maleŋ i nanga m'oliero, ruwaŋ giumo Kakan ma Cikirok, ka go otim ameno, nyalo tho; rupiri alamenyere i pondeponde i wi giumo.
Aron labino i Kabedo Maleŋ gi rwath paka mic ma cwako reco gi wod rombo ri mic awaŋa.”

Go ripo ruko law maleŋ matar mafoth, woruki piny mere kwoŋe nanga matar mafoth, wotwey piere gi del matar mafoth, woruki junga matar mafoth; me jobedo ruk ma leŋo. Go kutho ripo lwoki nyaka to ruko jo.
Go ripo kwanyo kwoŋ cokirok pa Joisiraili wot diegi ario paka mic ma cwako reco, gi wod rombo acel ma mic awaŋa.
Aka Aron lamiyo thwon paka mic ma cwako reco pere, timo cowirok ma cwako reco pere kodi ot pere.
