Go lakwanyo diegi ario no, to joketho jo ruwaŋ Rwoth i dhiot ma Wema ma romo;
Aka Aron lagoyo kwir ri diegi ario no, acel ri Rwoth gi man ri Azazel.
Aka Aron lakelo diel ma kwir opodho kwoŋe paka apa Rwoth, to miyo paka mic ma cwako reco.
To diel ma kwir opodho kwoŋe ri Azazel ilamiyo makwo ruwaŋ Rwoth ma timo cowirok ma cwako reco i wiye; ŋey wonyali dhiro woko i thim ri Azazel.
Aron lamiyo thwon paka mic ma cwako reco pere, to timo cowirok ma cwako reco pere kodi ot pere; go laneko thwon paka mic ma cwako reco rigo won.
Go lakwanyo wer m'opoŋ gi cuk mac wok i wi migam ruwaŋ Rwoth, buban m'onyadhi maŋwe kur masi cinge, to kelo i Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo.
Go laketho buban i mac ruwaŋ Rwoth, to yiro ma buban laumo giumo manitie i wi Kakan ma Cikirok, ka k'obedo ameno go nyalo tho.
Go lakwanyo remo moro pa thwon, to kiro gi lwet cinge i wi giumo, aka go lakiro remo gi lwet cinge dibirio.
Ameno go latimo cowirok ma cwako reco ri Kabedo Maleŋ, ro koco pa Joisiraili kodi ro turo cik pajo, reco pajo je; aka ameno apaka go latimo ri Wema ma romo, manitie i dier koco pajo.

Ongoye ŋata wobedi i Wema ma romo ka go donjo timo cowirok ma cwako reco i Kabedo Maleŋ cuka owok woko kareno otieko cowo timo cowirok ma cwako reco rigo won kodi ri ot pere kodi ri cokirok je ma Isiraili.
Aka go lawok woko to kidho i migam manitie ruwaŋ Rwoth to timo cowirok ma lonyo migam, to kwanyo remo moro ma thwon gi remo diel to ketho i tunge migam thoko.
Go lakiro remo kwoŋ migam gi lwet cinge dibirio, ma lonyo, kodi loko macil kwoŋ koco pa Joisiraili.
Ka go otieko timo cowirok ma lonyo Kabedo Maleŋ gi Wema ma romo kodi migam, go lamiyo diel makwo.
Aron laketho cinge ario je i wic diel makwo, to tuco raco pa Joisiraili je, komo pajo, kodi reco pajo je, ka ketho je i wic diel, to dhiro diel no wokadhi gi cingi jacwo manyalo i thim.
Diel no latiŋo reco pajo je i piny ma kakende; to weyo diel kadho i thim.
Go lalwoko delkwoŋe gi pi i Kabedo Maleŋ, to ruko nangin pere to wok woko, aka go lamiyo mic pere awaŋa kodi mic awaŋa pa ji, to timo cowirok ma cwako reco rigo won kodi ri ji.
Aka bor ma mic ma cwako reco, go lawaŋo i wi migam.
Aka ŋata weyo diel kadho ri Azazel lalwoko nangin pere to lwoko delkwoŋe gi pi, aka rumacen go nyalo dwoko i kambi.

Aka thwon ma mic ma cwako reco kodi diel ma mic ma cwako reco, ma remo pajo okeli ma timo cowirok ma cwako reco i Kabedo Maleŋ, ilatiŋo t'iwodho woko ma kambi; pien pajo gi riŋo pajo kodi woyo pajo ilawaŋo gi mac.
Ŋat'owaŋ jo ripo lwoko nangin pere to lwoko delkwoŋe gi pi aka rumacen go nyalo bino i kambi.
Rupiri i ndelo no am'ila timo cowirok ma cwako reco riwin, ma cwako reco mewin je, aka ŋey winyal lony ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Me obedo sabato ma ywomirok adieri riwin, wilamiyo delkwoŋ win litho, obedo cik ma cil gi cil.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam m'owir gi mo t'iloko maleŋ paka jacway ri Were i wi migam m'olunjo waŋ bamere latimo cowirok ma cwako reco, aka laruko law matar mafoth, law ma leŋo.
Go latimo cowirok ma cwako reco ri Kabedo Maleŋ, Wema ma romo kodi ri migam, ri jocway ri were i wi migam kodi ri lwak ji je.
Aka me labedo cik cil gi cil riwin, timo cowirok ma cwako reco ri Joisiraili dicel i oro. Aka go otimo paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Aron kodi wote kodi Joisiraili je aka wac rijo ni: Me a gima Rwoth omiyo or ka waco ama:
Ka nyatoro moro ma ot pa Isiraili othum merikwa kosa wod rombo kosa diel i kambi, kosa woko ma kambi,
to weyo ma k'okelo i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, miyo paka mic ri Rwoth ruwaŋ kabedo pa Rwoth, labedo gi banja ma oyo remo; aka go lapokere woko kwoŋ ji pere.
Ŋey Joisiraili jowokeli cowirok pajo m'oyido jomiyo i sa kam'othangere, to jomiyo Rwoth, bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, to jomiyo paka mic ma siem ri Rwoth.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakiro remo kwoŋ migam pa Rwoth manitie i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, to jowaŋo bor ri ŋwece kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Aka ŋey jokiri jowomiy cowirok pajo ri jwogi diegi, ma jokocere gine. Me wobedi cik rijo cil gi cil i luse pajo je.
Aka wac rijo kendo ni: Nyatoro moro je ma ot pa Isiraili kosa jokicar ma jobedo i dier jo m'omiy mic awaŋa kosa cowirok,
to weyo ma k'okelo i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, miyo paka cowirok ri Rwoth, lapokere woko kwoŋ ji pere.
Ka nyatoro moro je ma ot pa Isiraili kosa jokicar ma jobedo i dier jo ocamo remo moro je, alacomo waŋan kwoŋ ŋato m'ocami remo, t'apoko go woko kwoŋ ji pere.
Rupiri kwo ma del nitie i remo; aka atieko miyo go riwin ma timo cowirok ma cwako reco ri kwo mewin i wi migam; kole paka kwo, obedo remo ama timo cowirok ma cwako reco.
Riameno atieko waco ri Joisiraili: Ongoye dhano kwoŋ win ma wocam remo, kosa jakicar moro je ma bedo i dier win ma wocam remo.
Aka nyatoro moro je kwoŋ Joisiraili, kosa jokicar ma jobedo i dier jo, ma jadwar m'oneki ogwaŋ kosa winyo m'icamo, lakonjo woko remo mere to umo gi lowo.
Rupiri kwo pa cwec moro je, nitie i remo mere; riameno atieko waco ri Joisiraili ni: Jokiripi camo remo cwec moro je, rupiri kwo pa kisi cwec obedo remo mere; ŋat'ocami lapokere woko kwoŋ ji pere.
Dhano moro je, jopiny kosa jokicar, m'ocami gima won otho kende kosa gim'ogwaŋe mager joneko, ripo lwoko nangin pere, to lwokere gi pi, aka go labedo makoc tundo othieno; nyaka to lony.
To ka go k'olwoko jo, kosa k'olwokere, go latiŋo reco pere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Wikiri witim paka ji ma piny Misir kama cango wibed'iye jotimo, aka wikiri witim paka ji ma Kanan jotimo, kam'ater'iye win. Wikiri wiluw cik pajo.
Kur win or paran kodi luwo cik paran, wiwoth i jo: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Wikuri cik paran kodi or paran; ka witimo ameno, wilakwo: An abedo Rwoth.
Wongoye moro kwoŋ win ma wocore bongi wat pere yawo kinyoro pere. An abedo Rwoth.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa benin, kosa kinyoro pa yokin; go obedo yokin, ikir'inindi gi go.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa cipa benin; meno obedo kinyoro pa benin.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa nyamin in, nyar benin kosa nyar yokin, obedi ni onywol peco kosa wiloka.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa nyakwarin mapa wodin kosa mapa nyarin, rupiri kinyoro pajo obedo kinyoro perin won.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa nyar benin, meno obedo nyamin in, ma benin am'onywolo.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa wayin, go obedo wat pa benin macegin.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa nyamin yokin, rupiri go obedo wat pa yokin macegin.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro p'omin benin, ikir'icore bongi cege, go obedo wayin.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa ciwodin, go obedo cipa wodin; ikir'inindi gi go.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa cipa omin in; meno bedo kinyoro p'omin in.
Ikir'iyaw kinyoro pa dhako gi nyare je; aka ikir'inywom nyakware mapa wode kosa nyakware mapa nyare; jobedo wat pere macegin; meno bedo kidakana.
Ikir'inywom nyamin dhako perin, bedo nyek nyamin, yawo kinyoro pere kafodi nyamin go kwo.
Ikir'inindi gi cipa wat perin, t'iloko kwo perin makoc gi go.
Ikir'imiy nyathi perin kad'acel paka cowirok ri were Molek, aka wikiri wikoci nyingi Were mewin: An abedo Rwoth.
Ikir'inindi gi jacwo nyawotin paka gi dhako; obedo mienirok.
Ikir'inindi g'ogwaŋ moro je t'iloko kwo perin makoc gine, aka dhako moro bende wokiri womiy kwo pere ri ogwaŋ nindo gine; obedo nywowirok.
Wikiri wilokere makoc i gimoro je kwoŋ me, rupiri i tim me je nonin m'acegin riemo woko ruwaŋ win jotieko kocere gine.
Ameno lowo olokere makoc; t'amiyo go gir'acula ro reco mere, aka piny oŋoko woko ji ma jobed'iye.
Riameno wiripo kuro cik kodi or paran aka wikiri witim gigipiny ma mienirok me kad'acel, obedi japiny kosa jakicar ma bedo i dier win
(kole ji ma jotelo bedo riwin i lowo no jotimo gimienirok me je, to joloko lowo makoc)
ka k'obedo ameno, piny laŋoko win woko ro koco go, paka oŋoko woko nonin ma jopen bed'iye riwin.
Rupiri ŋat'otim kad'acel kwoŋ gimienirok me, lapokere woko kwoŋ ji pere.
Riameno kur win cik ma wikitimo kad'acel kwoŋ kula ma mienirok me m'otimi mafodi win, aka wikiri wikocere gi jo: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi lwak pa Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni: Bedi win maleŋ rupiri An Rwoth Were mewin aleŋ.
Kisi dhano wolwor min kodi bamere, aka wikuri sabato: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Wikiri wiwire lamo werin ma bukony, aka wikiri witim cal ma nyweny m'oleny: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
K'itimo cowirok ma mic ma siem ri Rwoth, iripo timo i nger ma miyo go nyalo jolo.
Iripo camo i ndelo no won ma imiy'iye kosa yawere mere; aka m'odoŋ je tundo i ndelo mar'adek wowaŋ gi mac.
Ka ocam adieri i ndelo mar'adek, obedo mienirok, aka k'ojol.
Aka joma jocam je, jolatiŋo reco kwoŋ jo, kwoŋbedo jotieko koco gimaleŋ ri Rwoth, aka nger ŋato iripo poko woko kwoŋ ji pere.
Ikir'ifoni olemo ma ndelo vini perin je, kosa icoki olemo m'ooy i ndelo vini perin; weyi ri jocandi kodi jopath: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Ikir'ikwoŋere nono gi nyingan, koco nyingi Were mewin: An abedo Rwoth.
Ikir'ilam ŋata ithe otho kosa ikethi gimoro yuwaŋ ŋata waŋ'otho; Iripo lworo Were mewin: An abedo Rwoth.
Ikir'iwothi ariwa luwo pokopoko i dier ji perin, aka Ikir'ilim kwoŋ remo pa nyawoti win: An abedo Rwoth.
Ikir'iculi kwor kosa imaki ŋonge kwoŋ nyithindho pa joger perin, to mar nyawotin paka in won imare. An abedo Rwoth.
Ka jacwo moro onindo gi dhako ma ŋeca, m'oyido oyikere poro gi ŋatiman, to fodi k'omiy cul rigo kosa ogony go, worangi tiende. Wokiri woneki jo, rupiri oyido fodi k'ogony go.
Jacwo no ripo kelo mic ma cul ri Rwoth, i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, wod rombo paka mic ma cul.
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam latimo cowirok ma cwako reco rigo gi wod rombo ma mic ma cul ruwaŋ Rwoth ri reco pere m'otimo; aka ilacwako rigo.
Ka winotundi i piny ma Kanan to wifuro yen ma cemo m'opokere, witer olemo pajo paka gima kicam. Ma oro adek, labedo gima kicam riwin, kiripi camo.
I oro mar'aŋwen ranyak pajo je wokethi gicen ma forok i Rwoth.
To i oro mar'abic, winyalo camo olemo pajo, ŋey ranyak pa womedere ri rin: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Wikiri wiliel yer ma thengi wiwin kosa withum ye tik win.
Wikiri wigwer delkwoŋ win ka wiywako jom'otho kosa wikethi cal moro je kwoŋ win: An abedo Rwoth.
Wikuri sabato paran to wiworo Kabedo Maleŋ: An abedo Rwoth.
Iripo cungo ruwaŋ ŋat'otwi lwar, iripo woro ŋat'otegino. Iripo lworo Were perin: An abedo Rwoth.
Jakicar ma bedo gi win wobedi rin pa japiny i dier win; wimar jakicar paka wiwegi wimare, rupiri oyido wibende wibedo jokicar i piny ma Misir; An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Wiripo bedo gi kilo m'otire, latir m'otire, gi rapim m'otire: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin m'owodho win wok i piny ma Misir.
Wikuri cik paran kodi or paran je, aka witim jo: An abedo Rwoth.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Waci ri Joisiraili je ni dhano moro je kwoŋ Joisiraili, kosa kwoŋ jokicar ma jobedo i Isiraili m'omiy acel kwoŋ nyithindho pere ri were Molek iripo neko adieri. Jopiny jowocadhi go gi telin.
An won gipi alacomo waŋan kwoŋ ŋato, t'apoko go woko kwoŋ ji pere, kwoŋbedo go omiyo acel kwoŋ nyithindho pere ri were Molek, koco kabedo paran kodi nyingan maleŋ.
Aka ka jopiny joumo waŋ gin kwoŋ ŋato adieri, ma go omiyo acel kwoŋ nyithindho pere ri Molek, to jobedo ma jok'oneko go,
nyaka t'acomo waŋan kwoŋ ŋato gi kwoŋ peco pere t'akedho jo woko kwoŋ dier ji pajo, go kodi jono je ma joluw go i tim pere ma kidakana ma jolamo gine Molek.
Aka ŋat'okidhi rango rieko wok bongi jwogi pa jom'otho, kodi joma jonitie gi ndijo ma ŋeyo gim'opanere, alacomo waŋan kwoŋ ŋato t'apoko go kwoŋ ji pere.
Riameno lokere win maleŋ, aka wibedi maleŋ; rupiri An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Kur win cik paran aka witim jo: An abedo Rwoth, m'oketho win gicen.
Ka dhano moro je olamo bamere kosa min iripo neko go adieri, go otieko lamo bamere kosa min, aka won okelo tho pere.
Jacwo m'onindi gi cipa bamere, meno oyawo kinyoro pa bamere, joje iripo neko jo adieri, remo pajo doŋ i wi jo.
Ka jacwo moro onindo gi ciwode, iripo neko joje adieri; jokelo luswa aka remo pajo doŋ i wi jo.
Ka jacwo onindo gi jacwo nyawote paka nindo gi dhako, meno jotieko timo gimienirok madwoŋ, joje iripo neko jo adieri, aka remo pajo ladoŋ i wi jo.
Ka jacwo moro onywomo dhako kodi nyare je, meno obedo kidakana, wowaŋ jo gi mac, jalo kodi mon ario no je ŋey wongoye kidakana moro je i dier win.
Ka jacwo moro onindo gi ogwaŋ, iripo neko go adieri, to wineko ogwaŋ no bende.
Ka dhako moro ocore bongi ogwaŋ nindo gine, iripo neko adieri dhako no, kodi ogwaŋ; aka remo pajo doŋ i wi jo.
Ka jacwo moro onindo gi dhako ma ruko dwe, to yawo kinyoro pere, go otieko thango cwer remo pere aka dheno bende otieko thango cwer remo pere; joje wopok jo woko kwoŋ ji pajo.
Ikir'inindi gi nyamin yokin kosa wayin, rupiri meno rom gi thango wat perin won; iripo miyin gir'acula.
Ka jacwo moro onindo gi cipa ner mere, meno go otieko neno kinyoro pa ner mere; iripo miyo jo gir'acula; jolatho ma jok'onywol.
Ka jacwo moro onywomo cip'omin, meno bedo gikoco, go otieko neno kinyoro p'omin; jok'onywol.
Kur win cik kodi or paran je, aka witim jo, ŋey lowo m'ater'iye win bed'iye wokiri woŋoki win woko.
Wikiri wiluw kula pa nono m'ariemo woko ruwaŋ win; kole jotimo gigipiny me je, t'adak jo.
Aka awaco riwin ni: Wilalunjo lowo pajo, alamiyo win wobedi mewin, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic. An abedo Rwoth Were mewin; atieko ketho win gicen kwoŋ nonin man.

Onyo riameno wiripo poko i dier ogwaŋ m'olony kodi makoc, kodi i dier winyo makoc kodi m'olony; wikiri wikel mienirok kwoŋ win g'ogwaŋ kosa winyo kosa cwec moro ma lak piny, m'atieko ketho gicen riwin paka koc.
Wiripo bedo maleŋ ran; rupiri an Rwoth aleŋ, aka atieko ketho win gicen kwoŋ ji man bedo aparan.
Jacwo kosa dhako moro m'oluw gi jwogi pa jom'otho kosa obedi gi ndijo ma ŋeyo gim'opanere iripo neko adieri; wocadhi jo gi telin, aka remo pajo ladoŋ i wi jo.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa: “Luw gi jocway ri Were i wi migam, wot Aron aka iwaci rijo ni wongoye moro kwoŋ jo ma wokocere ri jom'otho i dier wade pere.
To kende ri wat pere macegin, paka min, bamere, wode, nyare, omin,
kosa ri nyamin mambula macegin gine kwoŋbedo go fodi k'onywomere; ro go jacway ri Were i wi migam nyalo kocere.
To go wokiri wokocere, paka go obedo jatel i dier wade pere, ma koco go.
Jokiripi cido wi jo, kosa lielo thengi ye tik jo, kosa gwerok i delkwoŋ jo.
Joripo bedo maleŋ ri Were pajo, aka jokiri jowokoci nyingi Were pajo; rupiri jomiyo mic pa Rwoth, m'iwaŋo gi mac, kodi mugat pa Were pajo; riameno joripo bedo maleŋ.
Jokiripi nywomo malaya, kosa dhako m'otiek nindo gine; kosa dhako m'oeye kwoŋ cwore; kole go leŋ ri Were pere.
Aka witer go paka ŋataleŋ, rupiri go miyo cemo pa Were mewin; go wobedi maleŋ riwin; rupiri An Rwoth, ŋata loko win maleŋ, aleŋ.
Aka nyar jacway ri Were i wi migam, ka go okocere gi kidakana, meno koco bamere bende, wowaŋ go gi mac.”
“Jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kwoŋ wutmin go, m'okonji i wiye mo ma wir, aka ruko law pa jacway ri Were i wi migam kiripi weyo ma k'oboyo wiye, kosa yeco nangin pere.
Wokiri wodonji kama nitie iye delkwoŋ ŋat'otho, kosa wokocere, ri bamere, kosa min,
go kiripi wok i Kabedo Maleŋ, kosa koco Kabedo Maleŋ pa Were pere; rupiri leŋo ma mo ma wir pa Were pere nitie kwoŋe. An abedo Rwoth.
Go ripo nywomo nyako mambula.
Citho, kosa dhako m'oeye, kosa dhako m'otiek nindo gine, kosa malaya, jome go kiripi nywomo; to go ripo nywomo dhako mambula wok i nono pere won,
ŋey wokiri wokoc nyithindho pere i dier ji pere; rupiri An abedo Rwoth ma loko go maleŋ.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
“Luw gi Aron aka i wac rigo ni: Wongoye jacwo kwoŋ nyikwayin i luse pajo gibe manitie gi ŋolo ma wocore cegin miyo cemo pa Were pere.
Kole ongoye ŋat'oŋol ma ripo core cegin, jacwo ma waŋ'otho kosa m'oŋol, kosa ŋata ume oban kosa ma tiende orwombere,
kosa jacwo ma tiende kosa cinge otur,
kosa ŋata kore oŋol, kosa ŋat'otwil, kosa ŋata nitie g'ongula i waŋe kosa ŋata two gwenyo kosa kasengo kosa ŋata lur;
wongoye jacwo m'oŋol kwoŋ nyikway Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam ma wocore cegin miyo mic pa Rwoth m'iwaŋo gi mac; go nitie gi ŋolo, aka kiripi core cegin miyo cemo pa Were pere.
Go nyalo camo cemo pa Were pere, maleŋ loyo, wok i gigipiny maleŋ.
To go wokiri wocore cegin gi nanga m'oliero kosa wocore cegin gi migam, kwoŋbedo go nitie gi ŋolo, ŋey go wokiri wokoc Kabedo Maleŋ paran; kole An abedo Rwoth ma loko jo maleŋ.”
Musa owaco ri Aron kodi wote kanyacel gi Joisiraili je.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
Waci ri Aron kodi wote jowogwokere kwoŋ gigipiny maleŋ pa Joisiraili, ma jomiyan, ŋey jokiri jowokoci nyingan maleŋ. An abedo Rwoth.
Waci rijo ni, “I luse pajo je jacwo m'ocore cegin gi gigipiny maleŋ, ma Joisiraili jomiyo Rwoth, kareno go koc, ŋato ilakwanyo woko ruwaŋan: An abedo Rwoth.”
“Wongoye jacwo m'obedo nyakwar Aron ma two dhowo kosa ma cwero tuti ma wocam gigipiny maleŋ cuka go lony. Ŋat'ogey gimoro je makoc m'otho kosa jacwo m'ojayo kwoŋe;
kosa ŋat'ogey gima lak manyalo koco go kosa dhano manyalo miyo go bedo makoc, koco moro je ma go obedi gine,
dhano m'ogey nger gino labedo makoc tundo othieno aka k'ocami gigipiny maleŋ kwanyowoko k'otieko lwoko delkwoŋe gi pi.
Ka waŋceŋ otieko podho labedo m'olony; rumacen mere go nyaka nyalo camo gigipiny maleŋ, kwoŋbedo meno obedo cemo pere.
Gima won otho kosa m'ogwaŋe am'oneko, go kiripi camo, koco kwo pere gine: An abedo Rwoth.”
“Onyo riameno joripo kuro cik paran, kosa jolabedo gi reco, to jotho, ka jokoc. An abedo Rwoth, aketho jo gicen paka jomaleŋ.”
“Jakicar kiripi camo gimaleŋ. Japath ma bedo gi jacway ri Were i wi migam kosa ŋeca ma go opangisa jokiripi camo gimaleŋ.
To ka jacway ri Were i wi migam onyewo ŋeca paka lim pere gi pesa, ŋeca no nyalo camo; kodi jono je ma jonywole i ot pere bende jonyalo camo cemo pere.
Ka nyar jacway ri Were i wi migam onywomere gi jakicar go kiripi camo mic ma gigipiny maleŋ.
To nyar jacway ri Were i wi migam m'obedo citho kosa oeye pa cwore, kosa ma k'onywol, to gik i ot pa bamere, paka munyo fodi soye, go nyalo camo cemo pa bamere, kucel wongoye jakicar moro ma wocam.
Aka ka jacwo moro ocam gimaleŋ ma k'ogendera, go ripo culo acel wiy abic mere kwoŋe, to miyo jacway ri Were i wi migam gimaleŋ.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam jokiripi koco gigipiny maleŋ pa Joisiraili, ma jomiyo Rwoth,
lamiyo jo jowotimi banja ma mito mic ma culo banja, ka jocam gigipiny pajo maleŋ; kole An abedo Rwoth, aketho jo gicen paka jomaleŋ.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:

“Luw gi Aron gi wote kodi ji je ma Isiraili; k'acel kwoŋ Joisiraili kosa jokicar ma jobedo i dier Joisiraili okeli mic pere, obedi mic ma go ociko kosa mic ma go won oyere kelo m'imiyo Rwoth paka mic awaŋa,
go won ripo miyo, ma jacwo m'ongoye gi ŋolo, ma dhiaŋ kosa rombo kosa diel.
Wikiri wimiy gimoro je manitie gi ŋolo, rupiri kilajolo rin.
Aka ka ŋatimoro otimo cowirok ma siem ri Rwoth, ma culo cikirok pere kosa mic ma go won omiyo, wok kwoŋ dhok kosa mwendi, ripo bedo m'otire, ŋey wojol, m'ongoye gi ŋolo kwoŋe.
Gimoro ma waŋ'otho, kosa m'omiy litho, kosa m'okol, kosa ma tuti cwer kwoŋe kosa ma two gwenyo kosa kasengo, wikiri wimiy Rwoth kosa wikethi wiwaŋ i wi migam paka mic awaŋa ri Rwoth.
Merikwa kosa wod rombo ma tiende orwombere, winyalo miyo ri mic ma in won iyeyo miyo; to kilajolo ri mic m'iciko.
Ogwaŋ moro je m'oŋidhi nyangil mande kosa m'oŋiny kosa oyec kosa otoŋ, wikiri wimiy Rwoth; wikiri witim nger gino i piny mewin.
Ikir'ijol nger ogwaŋe no wok i cingi jokicar ma miyo paka cemo ri Were perin; kwoŋbedo okol jo, aka jonitie gi ŋolo kwoŋ jo, kilajolo jo riwin.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
“K'onywol nyathi rwath kosa wod rombo kosa nyathi diel, wobedi ma ndelo abirio gi min, aka wok i ndelo mar'aboro kadho malo, ilajolo paka mic awaŋa ri Rwoth.
Aka k'obedi min dhiaŋ kosa min rombo, wikiripi thumo kanyacel gi nyathi mere i ndelo acel.
Ka witimo cowirok ma foyo Rwoth, wiripo miyo i nger ma lamiyo wojol riwin.
Wocam gi ndelo no won; wikiri wiwey moro je wodoŋ tundo odikin: An abedo Rwoth.”
“Wiripo kuro or paran to witimo jo. An abedo Rwoth.
Wikiri wikoci nyingan maleŋ, aka alanyutho leŋo paran i dier Joisiraili: An abedo Rwoth, aketho win gicen paka jomaleŋ,
An, m'awodho win wok i piny ma Misir, bedo Were mewin: An abedo Rwoth.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili iwaci rijo ni: Kwoŋ kalimin pa Rwoth ma wiripo tuco paka cokirok maleŋ, me ama jobedo kalimin paran.
Me kalimin pa Rwoth, cokirok maleŋ, ma wiripo timo i hongo mere m'oyik.
I dwe marapena, k'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe, othieno, obedo kalima ma kadho ri Rwoth.
K'apar g'abic ma dwe acel no won obedo kalima ma mugat ma buthow ri Rwoth; ma ndelo abirio wilacamo mugat ma buthow.
I ndelo marapena wibedi gi cokirok maleŋ; wikiri witim tic mewin ma kisi ndelo.
Ma ndelo abirio wikel cowirok awaŋa pa Rwoth. I ndelo mar'abirio cokirok maleŋ wobedi; wikiri witim tic mewin ma kisi ndelo.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni: Ka widonjo i piny m'acegin miyo win to wikeco olemo mere, wiripo kelo withi olemo marapena ma keco mewin ri jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Go latiŋo malo withi olemo no ruwaŋ Rwoth, ŋey wonyali jolo rin; i ndelo ma luwo sabato jacway ri Were i wi migam wotiŋ malo.
I ndelo ma witiŋ'iye withi olemo, wimiy wod rombo ma jaoro acel, m'ongoye gi ŋolo, paka mic awaŋa ri Rwoth.
Aka mic ma cemo manyinge wobedi kilo ario ma moko m'onuŋere m'onywow gi mo oliv, mic awaŋa ma ŋwece kur mamit ri Rwoth, aka mic ma vini m'ilamiyo gine wobedi lita acel ma vini.
Wikiripi camo mugat kosa ŋano m'obul kosa ranyak ma nyaka okec cuka ndelo no won, cuka winotiek kelo mic pa Were mewin. Obedo cik ma cil gi cil i luse mewin je, kama winobed'iye je.
Wikwan cuka tundo i ndelo ma luwo sabato mar'abirio, ndelo piero abic; nyaka to wikelo mic ma cemo manyinge manyen ri Rwoth.
Wikel wok kama wibed'iye muma mugat ario paka mic atiŋa malo, kisi muma acel wobedi ario ma wi apar ma kilo; jowobedi ma moko m'oyer, m'obak gi thow, paka olemo marapena ri Rwoth.

Wikel gi mugat no wot rombo abirio ma jo oro acel ma jongoye gi ŋolo, rwath acel, gi wot rombo ario; jolabedo mic awaŋa ri Rwoth, kanyacel gi mic pajo ma cemo kodi mic pajo amadha, mic awaŋa ma ŋwece kur mamit ri Rwoth.
Wimiy bende wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco, gi wot rombo ario ma jo oro acel paka cowirok ma mic ma siem.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam latiŋo jo malo gi mugat mar'olemo marapena paka mic atiŋa malo ruwaŋ Rwoth, kanyacel gi nyithindhi rombo ma wote ario; jolabedo maleŋ ri Rwoth ri jacway ri Were i wi migam.
I ndelo acel no won wiripo tuco; wiripo bedo gi cokirok maleŋ aka wikiripi timo tic mewin ma kisi ndelo. Me obedo cik ma cil gi cil kamoro je ma winobed'iye i luse mewin je.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili, k'iwaco ama: I dwe mar'abirio, i ndelo marapena ma dwe, wobedi ndelo ma sabato, ma wopoy cokirok maleŋ gi kudho gwarin.
Wikiri witim tic moro je ma kisi ndelo; to wikel mic awaŋa ri Rwoth.
Pama, k'apar i dwe mar'abirio me obedo ndelo ma cwako reco; wobedi cokirok maleŋ riwin; wilamiyo adundo mewin litho; aka wikel mic awaŋa ri Rwoth.
Wikiri witim tic moro je i ndelo no gipi; rupiri obedo ndelo ma cwako reco, ma timo cowirok ma cwako reco mewin ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin.
Ŋata won k'ofonjere thwono kwo pere gimoro i hongo ma ndelo no gipi wopok go kwoŋ ji pere.
Aka ŋatimoro je m'otimi tic moro je i ndelo no gipi, nger ŋato alareyo go woko i dier ji paran.
Wikiri witim tic moro je: Me obedo cik ma cil gi cil i luse mewin je kamoro je ma winobed'iye.
Wobedi riwin sabato ma ywomirok kicutho, wimiy adundo mewin litho; aka k'abuŋwen ma dwe no othieno, wok othieno tundo othieno wikuri sabato.
Luw gi Joisiraili, k'iwaco ama: K'apar g'abic ma dwe mar'abirio, labedo kalima ma kayindi, ma ndelo abirio ri Rwoth.
I ndelo marapena labedo cokirok maleŋ; wikiri witim tic mewin ma kisi ndelo.
Ma ndelo abirio wikel ri Rwoth mic awaŋa; i ndelo mar'aboro wikuri cokirok maleŋ aka wikel mic awaŋa ri Rwoth; obedo cokirok maleŋ; wikiri witim tic mewin ma kisi ndelo.
Me jobedo kalimin pa Rwoth, ma wiripo timo paka hongo ma cokirok maleŋ, ka wimiyo Rwoth mic m'owaŋ gi mac, mic awaŋa, mic ma cemo manyinge, cowirok kodi mic ma vini, kisi moro i ndelo pere ma ripo;
medo i wi sabato pa Rwoth, kanyacel gi mic mewin, gi mic mewin ma wiciko miyo, gi mic mewin je ma wiwegi wiyeyo miyo, ma wimiyo Rwoth.
Onyo, k'apar g'abic ma dwe mar'abirio, ka witieko coko olemo ma lowo, wikuri kalima pa Rwoth, ma lacowo ndelo abirio; i ndelo marapena labedo sabato, kodi i ndelo mar'aboro.
I ndelo no wikwany olemo maber loyo ma yen, jangi yen thith, jangi yen ma joboke kweth, kodi ma twi i thengi pi, aka wifore ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin ma ndelo abirio.
Wikuri paka kalima ri Rwoth ma ndelo abirio kisi oro; wikuri go i dwe mar'abirio paka cik cil gi cil i luse mewin je; wiripo timo i dwe mar'abirio.
Wilabedo i kayindi ma ndelo abirio; Joisiraili je joripo bedo i kayindi;
aka ŋey luse mewin jowonyal ŋeyo nike amiyo Joisiraili bedo i kayindi munyo awodho jo wok i piny Misir: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Aka Musa owaco ri Joisiraili kalimin pa Rwoth m'oyikere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
Miy Joisiraili or ŋey jowokeli rin mo mangil ma yath oliv ri talin, ma lielo talin ma jokitho.
Aron wokethi malo i wi Wema ma romo, woko ma nanga m'oliero ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok, woliel wok othieno tundo odikin ruwaŋ Rwoth makitho; aka wobedi cik ma cil gi cil i luse mewin je.
Go laketho talin i wi raŋaw talin ma zahabu macil ruwaŋ Rwoth makitho.
Ikethi jo i bol ario, aucel i kisi bol, i wi meza ma zahabu macil ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Ikethi buban macil i kisi bol acel, wobedi paka mic i kawaŋ mugat, paka mic awaŋa ri Rwoth.
Kisi ndelo ma sabato Aron lacano jo ruwaŋ Rwoth hongo je paka miyirok pa Joisiraili, paka cikirok ma cil gi cil.
Jolabedo ri Aron kodi nyikwaye, ma jolacamo jo i Kabedo Maleŋ, rupiri jobedo adec maleŋ loyo rigo wok mic awaŋa ri Rwoth, ma cil gi cil.
Jal moro ma min oyido obedo Jaisiraili aka bamere oyido obedo Jamisir ofudhere i dier Joisiraili; to cako gorok gi Jaisiraili moro i kambi.
Okewo pa Joisiraili oluwere kicar kwoŋ Were kalamo Were. To jokelo go bongi Musa, aka nyingi min oyido Selomith, nyar Dibiri, janono pa Dan.
Okethi go i twec, cuka Rwoth oyawo rijo paro pere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Woth woko jaluwirok kicar kwoŋ Were no woko ma kambi; aka weyi jono je ma jowinjo munyo lamere jowokethi cingi gin i wiye, aka weyi cokirok gibe jowocadhi go gi telin.
Aka luw gi Joisiraili, i wac rijo ni: Nyatoro moro je m'olam Were latiŋo reco pere.
Ŋat'oluwere kicar kwoŋ nyingi Rwoth, latho adieri, cokirok gibe lacadho go gi telin adieri. Jokicar kanyacel gi jopiny, ka joluwere kicar i nyingi Rwoth, ibino neko go.
Nyatoro moro je m'oneki dhano, ilaneko go adieri.
Nyatoro moro je m'oneki ogwaŋ ripo culo, kwo ri kwo.
Nyatoro moro je m'omiy nyawote ŋolo, paka go otimo bende wotim rigo nger no.
K'oturo coko, wotur coko pere bende, k'ofudho waŋ dhano, wofudhi waŋe bende, k'omuko lak dhano, womuki lake bende, nger ŋolo ma go omiyo nyawote, ama bende womiy go.
Nyatoro moro m'oneki ogwaŋ ripo culo; to nyatoro m'oneki dhano, iripo neko.
Wibedi gi cik acel ri jakicar kodi ri japiny: Kole An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Musa oluwo ameno ri Joisiraili; to jowodho woko jaluwirok kicar kwoŋ nyingi Were woko ma kambi, to jocadho go gi telin cuka otho. Ji ma Isiraili jotimo paka Rwoth oyido owodho or ri Musa.
Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni: Ka widonjo i lowo m'amiyo win, lowo no ripo kuro sabato pa Rwoth.
Ma oro aucel wicwoy, aka ma oro aucel wilwer yen vini mewin, to wicoko olemo;
to i oro mar'abirio labedo sabato ma ywomirok adieri ri lowo, sabato ri Rwoth: Wikiri wicwoy kosa wilwer yen vini mewin.
Wikiri wikec gim'onyak rumacen ma keco mewin kosa wicoki olemo ma yath vini ma wikilwero; labedo oro ma ywomirok adieri ri lowo.
Winyalo camo gim'onyak i lowo i hongo ma sabato mere; win, ŋecin mewin ma cwo kodi ma mon, jotic mewin ma wipangisa kodi jokicar ma jobedo gi win,
ri ogwaŋe mewin bende, kodi ogwaŋe madudi i lowo mewin, gima lowo onyak je labedo cemo.
Wilakwano sabiti abirio gicen ma oro, abirio dibirio, ŋey hongo ma sabato abirio ma oro no je wobedi riwin oro piero aŋwen g'abuŋwen.
Aka wilakudho gwara malo; i ndelo mar'apar ma dwe mar'abirio, i ndelo ma cwako reco; wilakudho gwara i lowo mewin je paka rom.
Aka wilaketho gicen paka gimaleŋ oro ma piero abic aka wobedi thwolo i lowo paka rom ri ji ma jobed'iye je. Labedo oro ma piero abic riwin: Aka kisi dhano kwoŋ win, lagik i lim pere kodi thugin.
Meno obedo oro ma piero abic riwin: Wikiri wicwoy, kosa wikec cemo m'onyak rumacen, kosa wifon vini ma wikilwero.
Kole obedo oro piero abic; labedo maleŋ riwin: Wilacamo ranyak ma won otwi i ndelo.
I oro ma piero abic me, wiladok, kisi dhano kwoŋ win, i lim pere won.
K'itana gimoro gi nyawotin, kosa inyewo bonge, wikiri widiyere.
K'inyewo gimoro wok bongi nyawotin, iculi kende ma oro wok i cakirok ma oro piero abic; ŋata tana womiti cul bongin ma oro ma cemo m'odoŋ kende.
Ka oro thoth, imedi welo, aka ka oro nok, idwoki welo cen, rupiri itana in cungo kwoŋ oro ma cemo ocowo.
Aka ongoye ŋata wodiy nyawote, to wiripo lworo Were mewin; kole An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Wiripo timo cik paran to wikuro or paran, kodi timo, ŋey winyal bedo i lowo no maber.
Aka lowo lanyak olemo mere, to wicemo to wiyeŋ, to wibed'iye maber.
To wilapenjo ni, wanocam aŋo i oro mar'abirio ka wakiripi cwoyo kosa coko cemo mawan?
Alamiyo or ri silwany paran riwin i oro mar'aucel, ŋey cemo onyali nyak riwin ma oro adek.
Ka winocwoy i oro mar'aboro, lanwaŋo wipidhere gi cemo macon; cuka tundo oro mar'abuŋwen, munyo ranyak mere tundo, wilacamo macon.
Wokiri wotana lowo ma swa, kole lowo obedo aparan; aka win wibedo jokicar aka jowoth kodan.
Lowo je ma wilalimo, wiripo culo gimoro ma botho lowo.
K'omin in candi omako, to tana adec ma lim pere, wat ma luwo go ripo bino to botho gim'omin go otana.
Ka dhano ongoye gi ŋata nyalo botho lim pere, to ka go won nitie gi nyalo ma botho,
go lakwano oro m'otieko kadho wok cuka go tana, to dwoko ri ŋat'oyido onyewo cul mere, to go gik i lim pere.
To ka go ongoye gi nyalo ma dwoko lowo no, wodoŋ ri ŋat'onyewo cuka tundo oro ma piero abic; i oro ma piero abic wogonyi, t'idwoko rigo.
Ka nyatoro otana ot m'ibed'iye i tindi madwoŋ m'othok gi cel, wobothi rumacen ma oro acel wok cuka go tana; go nyalo botho rumacen ma oro acel.
To ka go k'obotho ka oro acel orumo, ot no ladoŋ ri ŋat'onyewo cil gi cil, i luse je; k'onyal gonyo i oro ma piero abic.
To udi ma calin ma cel k'othoko jo jowobedi paka piny m'othangere; inyalo botho jo, t'igonyo jo i oro ma piero abic.
Kwanyowoko ri tindin madongo pa Jolevi, Jolevi jolabedo gi meni ma botho udi ma tindin madongo m'obedo apajo i hongo moro je.
Aka ka Jalevi k'onyalo botho ot pere, i tindin madongo m'obedo apajo, i oro ma piero abic iripo gonyo; kwoŋbedo udi ma tindin madongo pa Jolevi obedo lim pajo i dier Joisiraili.
To lowo m'othangere m'othoko tindin madongo wokiri wotana; kwoŋbedo meno obedo lim pajo ma cil gi cil.
Ikir'ikwany nusu wi nusu kosa itim magowa kwoŋ go, to lwor Were perin; ŋey omin in onyali bedo bongin.
Wikiri wikopa jo pesa ka wimito nusu i wi nusu, kosa winwaŋ magowa i cemo ma wimiyo jo.
An abedo Rwoth Were mewin, m'ofudho win wok i piny Misir, ni amiy win piny ma Kanan, aka ni abedi Were mewin.
To jowodoŋ bongi win paka jogoy fut kosa jotic ma kisi ndelo. Jowotiy riwin cuka tundo i oro ma piero abic.
Nyaka gi nyithindho pajo jodok peco pajo, i lim pa kwarere pajo.
Rupiri jobedo ŋecin paran, m'afudho jo wok i piny Misir; kinyal kitana jo paka itana ŋecin.
Wikiri widhum jo gi gwayo, to lwor Were mewin.
Paka ri ŋecin ma cwo kodi ma mon ma winyalo bedo gine, wobedi i nonin m'othoko win ama winwaŋ'iye ŋecin ma cwo kodi ma mon.
Winyalo bende nyewo wok kwoŋ jokicar ma jobedo gi win, kodi wok i pecin pajo manitie gi win, ma jonywole i piny mewin; aka jonyalo bedo lim mewin.
Winyalo kuro jo paka gimewin ri nyithindho mewin ma jolunji win, jowolunji jo paka lim. Jolabedo ŋecin mewin kicutho, to paka ri Joisiraili wade mewin, ongoye ŋata wodhum nyawote gi gwayo.
To ka japath kosa jakicar ma jobedo i dier win olokere jaŋaŋo, aka omin candi omako to tanere rijo, kosa ri japeco pa jakicar,
rumacen inyalo botho go, acel kwoŋ wutmin go nyalo botho go,
kosa omin bamere kosa wod omin bamere nyalo botho go, kosa wat moro je ma peco ma k'osunga nyalo botho go; kosa ka go oŋaŋ, nyalo botho kwo pere.
Jolagoyo welo gi ŋata nyewo go wok i oro ma go otaner'iye tundo i oro ma piero abic; welo ma gonyo go lakwanere luwo oro; hongo ma go obed'iye gi ŋat'onyewo go woter paka hongo pa jagoy fut.
Ka oro kweth odoŋ cen, go laculo pesa ma both pere wok i pesa m'onyew gine go;
to ka oro manok odoŋ cuka tundo oro ma piero abic, jolatimo kwan ama: Jolakwanere cungo kwoŋ oro ma go ocowo i tic to doko idwoko rigo pesa ma botho go.
Paka jagoy fut m'opangisa ma kisi oro acel, go labedo iy'adhum pa jakicar, ma bende kiladhumo go gi gwayo kareno wineno anena.
Aka ka k'obothi go i nger me je, go kodi nyithindho pere ilagonyo jo i oro ma piero abic.
Kole ri an Joisiraili jobedo ŋecin paran; jobedo ŋecin m'awodho jo wok i piny Misir: An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Wikuri sabato paran aka wiwor kamaleŋ paran: An abedo Rwoth.”
alamiyo win koth mewin i hongo ma ripo, to piny nyak cemo mere, to yen ma ndelin nyak olemo mere.
Piedhirok mewin laloyo vini ma winofon, aka vini ma winofon, laloyo gima winokec; wilacemo to wiyeŋ, to wibedo gi siem i piny mewin.
Aka alamiyo piny siem, wilanindo, aka ongoye ŋat'obwoki win; alakwanyo woko ogwaŋe ma kelo teko i piny, aka lweny moro k'obedi i piny mewin.
Wilariemo jokwor mewin, aka jolagore piny ruwaŋ win ka wineko jo.
Abic kwoŋ win jolariemo miya cel, aka ji miya cel kwoŋ win jolariemo jokwor gana apar; jokwor mewin jolagore piny ruwaŋ win ka wineko jo.
Alaneno win gi wor t'amiyo winywol to wibedo m'omore; t'akuro cikirok paran kodi win.
Wilacamo cemo ma cango okan con, wicam wicow woko macon to wiyawo hola ri manyen.
Alaketho kabedo paran i dier win, aka ak'ojwangi win.
Alawoth i dier win, alabedo Were mewin, aka wilabedo ji paran.
An abedo Rwoth Were mewin m'ofudho win woko i piny ma Misir, ni wikiri wibedi ŋecin pajo kendo; atieko turo woko meni m'oyido diyo win piny aka onyo alamiyo wiwoth gi delok.”
ka wikwero mako cik paran, to wijwango or paran, ŋey wikwer mako or paran je, to wituro cikirok paran,
An yuthenge paran alatimo gime riwin: Alakelo kidamba kwoŋ win two makicangi gi musuja ma neko waŋ jo t'anyeko kwo. Wilanyeko hongo cwoyo, rupiri jokwor mewin ama jolacamo.
Alacomo waŋan kwoŋ win, to jokwor mewin jolareyo win; jokwor mewin joladhumo win, aka wilaŋwec m'ongoye kada ŋata riemo win.
Aka ma makada nende gime otimere, wik'olworan, alamedere miyo win gir'acula dibirio ro reco mewin.
Alaturo woko dwoŋ mewin ma delok, koth langoye, to piny thwo matek pa nyweny.
Wilaoro meni mewin nono: Piny mewin k'onyak cemo mere, aka yen ma lowo k'onyak olemo mere.”
“Ka wimedere gwenyirok kwoŋan, to wibedo ma wikilworan, alamedo neko win gi thoyamo dibirio paka reco mewin.
Alagonyo ogwaŋe mager kwoŋ win, jolaneko nyithindho mewin t'areyo woko mwendi mewin; jolaloko win manok, aka royin mewin lajwangere.”
“K'inen i gir'acula me je m'amiyo win fodi wikidwoko bongan, to fodi wimedo gwenyere kwoŋan,
kenyo an bende alajwango win: An won alacwado win dibirio ro reco.
Alaneko win, culo kwor ro cikirok; aka ka wicokere i tindin mewin madongo, aladhiro two nundu i dier win, t'aketho win i cingi jokwor.
K'aturo woko alikino ma mugat, mon apar jolatedo mugat i katedo mugat acel, aka joladwanyo mugat mewin gi peko; aka kada winocem, wik'oyeŋ.”
“To ka gigipiny me je otieko timere, to wimedo cayan to wikwero lworan,
alamedere kwero win i nge; kucel an won alamiyo win gir'acula dibirio ri reco mewin.
Wilacamo delkwoŋ nyithindho mewin.
Alareyo woko kabedo mewin manyakafir t'aturo piny migam mewin ma buban; aladhuro cokin mewin i wi cokin pa cal mewin. Aladak win.
Alathango tindin mewin madongo, alaloko kamaleŋ mewin kam'ojwangere, aka ak'oŋwey kur ma cowirok mewin.
Alareyo woko piny, ŋey jokwor mewin ma jobino bed'iye jolabwok.
Aka alakedho win i dier nonin, t'ayuyo abor paran kwoŋ win; piny mewin lajwangere, to tindin mewin madongo bedo gunda.”
“Nyaka to piny winjo siem gi sabato ma ywomirok makicutho hongo je ma piny othangere, kareno winitie i piny pa jokwor mewin.
Hongo je ma piny obedi m'ojwangere, labedo gi ywomirok m'oyido fodi k'obedo gine i sabato mewin munyo wibed'iye.

To paka ri jono ma joboth, aladhiro apodha cuny iy'adundin pajo i piny pa jokwor pajo; derino ma boke yath m'igweyo lamiyo jo lworo, aka jolaŋwec paka ŋata ŋweco kwoŋ abor, aka jolapodho m'ongoye ŋata riemo jo.
Jolakitangatanga i wi jowot gin, paŋini jokwale kwoŋ abor, kad'ongoye ŋata riemo jo; aka wilangoye gi meni ma ciro jokwor mewin.
Wilatho i dier nonin, aka piny pa jokwor mewin lamwonyo win.
Aka jono kwoŋ win ma joboth jolacandere ma hongo malac i piny pa jokwor pajo ro reco pajo; aka bende jolacandere ma hongo malac ro reco pa kwarere pajo.”
“To ka joŋuto reco pajo gi reco pa kwarere pajo, gi tim no jogwenyere kwoŋan aka kucel, to jomedo kweran,
ŋey an rumacen, amedi kwero jo t'akelo jo i piny pa jokwor pajo; ka onyo adundo pajo matek pa tele omwole to joweyo timo reco,
nyaka anopoy cikirok paran gi Yakobo; alapoyo cikirok paran bende gi Isaka kodi cikirok paran bende gi Abraham, aka alapoyo cikirok paran ma miyo ji paran lowo.
Kole lowo ladoŋ m'othangere ma bu ji, ŋey wonyali winjo more ma ywomirok mere makicutho k'ojwangere ma bu jo, kareno joweyo timo reco, kwoŋbedo jobedo gi miseni ma turo or paran gi kwero cik paran.
Kucel ro gino je, k'onyo jonitie i piny pa jokwor pajo, ak'ojwangi jo kicutho kosa anokwer jo ŋey arey jo kicutho t'aturo cikirok paran gi jo; rupiri An abedo Rwoth Were pajo;
to alapoyo ro bero pajo cikirok m'atimo gi kwarere pajo m'awodho wok i piny Misir munyo nonin je joneno, ni abedi Were pajo: An abedo Rwoth.”
Me a cik kodi or ma Rwoth ocweyo i dier go kodi Joisiraili wi got Sinai ka luwo gi Musa.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni: Ka nyatoro otimo cikirok m'oŋeyere ri Rwoth, me rapim m'inyalo kipima gi dhano,
rapim pa ŋat'obedo jacwo labedo; wok i oro piero ario tundo piero aucel labedo siringi piero abic ma feza pesa ma kamaleŋ.
Ka ŋato obedo dhako, rapim labedo siringi piero adek.
Ka oro obedo wok abic tundo piero ario, rapim mere labedo siringi ario ri jacwo kodi siringi apar ri dhako.
Ka oro obedo dwe acel tundo oro abic, rapim pa jacwo labedo siringi abic ma feza, aka ri dhako rapim labedo siringi adek ma feza.
Aka ka dhano obedo jaoro piero aucel kadho malo, nyaka to rapim pa jacwo labedo siringi apar g'abic, aka apa dhako siringi apar.
Ka nyatoro obedi ma k'onyalo culo rapim, wokel jo ruwaŋ jacway ri Were i wi migam ma lamenyo jo paka gima kisi ŋat'acel acele ma timo cikirok nyalo culo.
Ka mako ogwaŋ m'inyalo kelo paka mic ri Rwoth, nger gino m'inyalo miyo Rwoth bino bedo maleŋ.
Wongoye man ma wowile gine kosa wolunji waŋe, obedi maber m'iwilo gi marac; kosa marac kodi maber; aka k'ogwaŋ acel owil gi man, ogwaŋ no kodi m'owil gine je labedo maleŋ.
K'omako ogwaŋ moro je makoc ma kinyal nyewo paka mic ri Rwoth, ogwaŋ no wokel ruwaŋ jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Jacway ri were i wi migam lamenyo go; obedi ni ber kosa rac, paka menyo pa jacway ri Were i migam obedi, apaka bey mere labedo.
To ka ŋat'acel no omiti nyewo kendo, go ripo medo acel wiy abic kwoŋ pesa macon.
Ka nyatoro oloko ot maleŋ ri Rwoth, jacway ri Were i wi migam bino menyo bey mere: Obedi maber kosa marac, paka jacway ri Were i wi migam omeny bey, ladoŋ ameno.
To ka ŋata loko ot maleŋ mito nyewo kendo, go lamedo acel wiy abic kwoŋ bey m'oridhi, to gik ri won mere macon kendo.
Ka nyatoro oloko maleŋ lowo moro m'oluwo ri Rwoth, bey mere m'omeny bino bedo marom gi kodhi m'inyalo cwoy'iye: Siringi piero abic ma feza marom kodi kilo miya acel ma bale.
Ka nyatoro oloko maleŋ ndelo paka oro ma piero abic, bey gipi bino cungo.
To ka oloki ndelo maleŋ ka oro piero abic orumo, jacway ri Were i wi migam bino timo kwan ma bey mere paka oro m'odoŋ cuka tundo oro piero abic, t'imoja bey.
To ka ŋat'oloko ndelo maleŋ mito nyewo kendo, nyaka lamedo acel wiy abic i wi pesa macon, to gik ri won mere macon.
To ka k'onyew ndelo kendo, kosa k'otana gi ŋatiman, k'onyal nyewirok kendo.
To ka ogony ndelo i oro ma piero abic, bino bedo maleŋ ri Rwoth paka ndelo m'omiyere; to lokere gipa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Ka nyatoro oloko maleŋ ri Rwoth ndelo m'otiek nyewo, ma k'obedo lowo alunja,
jacway ri Were i wi migam latimo kwan ka menyo bey ma ripo gine tundo oro piero abic, aka bey m'omeny iripo culo ndelo no won, mic maleŋ ri Rwoth.
I oro ma piero abic ndelo lagik ri ŋat'oyido onyew gine, m'obedo won ndelo macon.
Menyo bey je bino bedo paka pesa ma kamaleŋ nitie.
Nywol marapena p'ogwaŋe, paka obedo makayo, obedo apa Rwoth, ŋatimoro je kiripi loko maleŋ rigo; obedi merikwa kosa rombo.
K'obedo ogwaŋ makoc, ogwaŋ m'obedo kayo inyalo nyewo t'idwoko kendo i bey m'omeny, gi medo i wiye acel wiy abic; ka k'onyew t'idwoko, inyalo kitana gi ŋatiman i bey ma ripo.
Ongoye ji m'otiek yiko neko jo m'inyalo botho; iripo neko jo.
Ka ji jomito nyewo acel wiy apar moro kendo, joripo medo acel wiy abic kwoŋ jo.
Acel wiy apar ma dhok kosa mwendi, kisi acel wiy apar ma luwo cingi jakwath rombo, bino bedo maleŋ ri Rwoth.
Wongoye ŋata wopenji obedi ni ber kosa rac, kosa wokethi gimoro ma lunjo waŋe; ka dhano okethi gilunjo waŋe, nyaka gigipiny no je kodi gima lunjo waŋe bino bedo maleŋ aka kinyal nyewo t'idwoko.
Me a or ma Rwoth omiyo Musa wi Got Sinai ri Joisiraili.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa i thim ma Sinai, i Wema ma romo, i ndelo marapena ma dwe mar'ario, i oro mar'ario munyo jotieko wok i piny Misir. Go owaco ni:
“In kodi Aron kwan win ji ma Isiraili, nonin pajo gi pecin, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo. Indiki nyingi kisi jacwo;
cako i oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi dhano i Isiraili manyalo kidho i lweny. In kodi Aron wilandiko jo muma gi muma.
Jacwo acel i kisi nono ripo bedo gi win, kisi jacwo ma telo udi pa kwarere pere.”
Me a nyingi cwo ma jolakonyo win: Wok kwoŋ Ruben, Elizur wod pa Sedur
Wok kwoŋ Simeo, Selumiel wod pa Zurisaday.
Wok kwoŋ Yuda, Nason wod pa Aminadab.
Wok kwoŋ Isakar, Nethanel wod pa Zuar.
Wok kwoŋ Zebulun, Eliab wod pa Helon.
Wok kwoŋ wot Yozefu: Wok kwoŋ Efrayim, Elisama wod pa Amihud; Wok kwoŋ Manase, Gamaliel wod pa Pedazur.
Wok kwoŋ Benyamin, Abidan wod pa Gideon.
Wok kwoŋ Dan, Ahiyeza, wod pa Amisaday.
Wok kwoŋ Aser, Pagiel wod pa Ociran.
Wok kwoŋ Gad, Eliasaf wod pa Duwel.
Wok kwoŋ Nafital, Ahira wod pa Enan.
Me a jom'oyer i kitipa, jotel ma nono pa kwarere pajo, jotel ma nonin ma Isiraili.
Musa kodi Aron jokwanyo cwo me m'oyido otiek yero jo gi nyingi jo.
I ndelo marapena ma dwe mar'ario, jocoko kitipa ma lwak ji me je kanyacel, m'ondiki jo gi pecin ma udi pa kwarere pajo, gi kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo. Kisi dhano okwan,
paka Rwoth onwaŋo otieko wodho or ri Musa. Ameno to go kwano jo i thim ma Sinai.

Nyikway Ruben, anywola marapena pa Isiraili, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo. Kisi dhano, kisi jacwo cako oro piero ario kadho malo. Kisi dhano manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jom'ondiki jo i nono pa Ruben obedo ji 46,500.

Nyikway Simeo, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, kwoŋ jo m'okwan, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, kisi dhano, kisi jacwo wok i oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi dhano manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki jo i nono pa Simeo onwaŋo nitie ji 59,300.
Nyikway Gad, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ nyingi jo, wok oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi dhano manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki jo ma nono pa Gad onwaŋo nitie ji 45,650.
Nyikway Yuda, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo; kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nono pa Yuda onwaŋo nitie ji 74,600.
Kwoŋ nyikway Isakar, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nono pa Isakar onwaŋo nitie ji 54,400.
Kwoŋ nyikway Zebulun, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nonin pa Zebulun onwaŋo nitie ji 57,400.
Kwoŋ nyikway Yozefu, meno nyikway Efrayim, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nono pa Efrayim onwaŋo nitie ji 40,500.
Kwoŋ nyikway Manase, bol ma nywolirok pajo, nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nono pa Manase onwaŋo nitie ji 32,200.
Kwoŋ nyikway Benyamin, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nono pa Benyamin onwaŋo nitie ji 35,400.
Kwoŋ nyikway Dan, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nono pa Dan, onwaŋo nitie ji 62,700.
Kwoŋ nyikway Aser, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nono pa Aser onwaŋo nitie ji 41,500.
Nyikway Nafital, bol ma nywolirok pajo, i nonin pajo, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cungo kwoŋ kwan ma nyingi jo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny.
Jono m'ondiki nyingi jo ma nono pa Nafital onwaŋo nitie ji 53,400.
Me a ji m'onwaŋo ondiki nyingi jo, ma Musa kodi Aron jondiko nyingi jo gi kony pa jotel ma Isiraili, cwo apar g'ario, kisi ŋat'acel ocungo ri ot pa kwari mere.
Ameno Joisiraili gipi, gi udi pa kwarere pajo, cako oro piero ario kadho malo, kisi jacwo manyalo kidho i lweny i Isiraili
kwan pajo je onwaŋo obedo ji 603,550.
To Jolevi k'okwan jo gi nono pa kwarere pajo paka wadi.
Rwoth oyido otieko luwo gi Musa ni:
Nono pa Levi kende ama ikir'indiki nyingi jo aka ikir'ikwan jo gi Joisiraili man.
To kethi Jolevi bedo jokur ma tabenakulo ma cikirok, gi gigipiny ma mako kwoŋe je; joripo tiŋo tabenakulo gi gigipiny mere je, jobino kuro to jothoko tabenakulo.
K'owodhi tabenakulo, Jolevi jobino kwanyo to joketho piny, aka k'ikidho jengo tabenakulo, Jolevi jolaŋawo malo. Japath moro je m'ocore cegin gine iripo neko.
Ji ma Isiraili jobino cokere i kitipin pajo, kisi jacwo i kambi pere gi dwoŋ pere.
To Jolevi jobino cokere thoko tabenakulo ma cikirok, ŋey keme paran okir obin kwoŋ cokirok pa ji ma Isiraili; aka Jolevi jobino bedo jokur ma tabenakulo ma cikirok.
Joisiraili jotimo ameno; paka Rwoth oyido otieko wodho or ri Musa.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa kodi Aron ka waco ni:
Joisiraili jobino ketho kambi pajo, kisi acel i kweth pajo, gi ranyuth ma udi pa kwarere pajo; jolacokere ka joŋiyo Wema ma Romo yu kisi thenge.
Jono ma jolacokere yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ yu kama waŋceŋ wok'iye labedo jokambi ma kitipin pa Yuda. Jatel pa ji ma Yuda bino bedo Nason wod pa Aminadab,
kanyacel gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 74,600.
Jono ma jolabedo cegin gine labedo nono pa Isakar. Jatel pa jonono pa Isakar labedo Nethanel wod pa Zuar,
kanyacel gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 54,400.
Jatel pa jonono pa Zebulun labedo Eliab wod pa Helon,
kanyacel gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 57,400.
Welo pa ji m'okwan je i kambi pa Yuda, i kitipin pajo, obedo ji 186,400. Jo ama jolacako woth.
Yuthenge ma yupiny bino bedo kweth ma kacokirok pa Ruben gi kitipin pajo ma lweny. Jatel pa nyikway Ruben labedo Elizur wod pa Sedur,
gi kitipa ma ji m'okwan 46,500.
Jono ma jolaketho kambi pajo cegin gine labedo jonono pa Simeo. Jatel pa nyikway Simeo labedo Selumiel wod pa Zurisaday,
gi kitipa ma ji m'okwan 59,300.
Ma luwo labedo nono pa Gad aka jatel pajo labedo Eliasaf wod pa Reuel,
gi kitipa ma ji m'okwan 45,650.
Welo pa ji m'okwan je ma kambi pa Ruben, gi kitipin, obedo 151,450.
Wema ma romo, gi kambi pa Jolevi, laay i dier kambin; jolaay tekin jocokere, kisi acel i kabedo pere, gi kweth pajo.
Yuthenge ma yupodho ceŋ labedo kweth ma kacokirok pa Efrayim gi kitipin. Jatel pa nyikway Efrayim labedo Elisama wod pa Amihud,
gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 40,500.
Cegin gine bino bedo nono pa Manase. Jatel ma nono pa Manase labedo Gamaliel wod pa Pedazur,
gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 32,200.
Jatel ma nono pa Benyamin bino bedo Abidan wod pa Gideon,
gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 35,400.
Welo pa ji je m'ondiki i kambi pa Efrayim, gi kitipin, obedo 108,100. Jolabedo mar'adek ay woth.
Yuthenge ma yumalo bino bedo kweth ma kacokirok pa Dan gi kitipin. Jatel pa nyikway Dan bino bedo Ahiyeza wod pa Amisaday
gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 62,700.
Jono ma jolabedo cegin gine labedo jonono pa Aser. Jatel pa nyikway Aser bino bedo Pagiel wod pa Ociran,
gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 41,500.
Jatel pa nyikway Nafital bino bedo Ahira wod pa Enan,
gi kitipa pa ji m'okwan 53,400.
Welo pa ji m'ondiki ma kambi pa Dan obedo 157,600. Jo ama jolaay woth macowe, i kitipin.
Me akwan pa ji ma Isiraili gi udi pa kwarere pajo; welo m'ondiki je i kambi gi kitipin pajo obedo 603,550.
Paka Rwoth oyido otieko miyo Musa or, Jolevi k'ondiki jo i dier Joisiraili man.
Joisiraili jotimo paka Rwoth oyido otieko miyo Musa or. Ameno jobedo i kacokirok, to joay i ndelo no won, kisi dhano gi nono pere, cungo kwoŋ udi pa kwarere jo.
Me a nyikway Aron kodi Musa i hongo ma Rwoth oluw'iye gi Musa wi Got Sinai.
Me a nyingi wot Aron: Nadab obedo okayo, Abihu, Eliazar, kodi Ithamar.
Me a nyingi wot Aron, jocway ri Were i wi migam m'owir jo gi mo, timo tic paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.

To Nadab kodi Abihu jotho ruwaŋ Rwoth munyo jocowere gi mac ma k'oyey ruwaŋ Rwoth i thim ma Sinai, aka onwaŋo jongoye gi nyithindho. Eliazar kodi Ithamar jotiyo paka jocway ri Were i wi migam i hongo pa bajo Aron.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
Keli nono pa Jolevi cegin, aka ikethi jo ruwaŋ Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam, ŋey jowonyal konyo go.
Jolatimo rigo tic kodi ri kweth ro nyim Wema ma romo, ka jotiyo i tabenakulo.
Jolabedo jokur gigipiny je ma makere gi Wema ma romo, to jotimo tic je ri Joisiraili ka jotiyo i tabenakulo.
Ibino miyo Jolevi ri Aron kodi nyikwaye; omiyo jo kicutho rigo wok i dier Joisiraili.
Ibino ketho Aron kodi wote ma timo tic pa jocway ri Were i wi migam; nyatoro man je ma bende otemi timo ameno iripo neko.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
E ajolo Jolevi wok i dier Joisiraili i kabedo pa nyithindho makayo ma joyawo ici i dier Joisiraili. Jolevi jolabedo aparan,
kole nyithindho makayo je jobedo aparan; munyo aneko nyithindho makayo je i piny ma Misir, aketho gicen okayin je i Isiraili ri an won, ji kodi ogwaŋe parom; jolabedo aparan. An abedo Rwoth.
Kenyo to Rwoth luwo gi Musa i thim ma Sinai, ka waco ni:
Kwan Jolevi gi udi pa kwarere pajo kodi nonin. Ibino kwano kisi jacwo cako i dwe acel kadho malo.
Ameno to Musa kwano jo cungo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth, paka omiyo go or.
Me a nyingi wot Levi, gi nyingi jo: Gerison, Kohath kodi Merari.
Me a nyingi wot Gerison gi nonin pajo: Libini kodi Simey.
Wot Kohath gi nonin pajo: Amran, Izar Hebron, kodi Uziel.
Wot Merari gi nonin pajo: Mali kodi Musi. Me a nonin pa Jolevi, gi udi pa kwarere pajo.
Wok kwoŋ Gerison obedo nono pa Libini kodi nono pa Simey; me am'oyido jonono pa Gerison.
Kwan pajo, k'okwan cwo je cako i dwe acel kadho malo, onwaŋo obedo gana abirio gi miya abic.
Nonin pa Gerisom oyido joripo jocokirok yucen ma tabenakulo yuwok ceŋ,
gi Eliasaf wod pa Layel paka jatel ma ot pa kwarere ma udi pa Gerison.
Tic pa wot Gerison i Wema ma romo onwaŋo obedo kuro tabenakulo, wema kodi giumo mere, nanga ma geŋo kadonjo ma Wema ma romo,
gima umo kapido, nanga umo kadonjo ma kapido m'othoko tabenakulo kodi migam, gi thondhe kodi tic je ma mako kwoŋ gime.
Wok kwoŋ Kohath owok nono pa Amran, nono pa Izar nono pa Hebron, kodi nono pa Uziel; me a jonono pa Kohath.
Cwo je m'okwan, cako dwe acel kadho malo, onwaŋo nitie gana aboro gi miya aucel, m'oyido jotimo tic ma Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo.
Jonono pa nyikway Kohath jolacokere yuthenge ma yupiny ma tabenakulo,
kodi Elizafan wod pa Uziel paka jatel ma nono pa Kohath.

Tic pajo oyido obedo ma kuro Kakan ma Cikirok, meza, raŋaw tala, migame, atewe ma jocway ri Were i wi migam oyido jooro i Kabedo Maleŋ, kodi nanga ma geŋo dhiot ma Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo kodi tic je ma makere gine.
Eliazar wod pa Aron jacway ri Were i migam oyido obedo jadwoŋ kwoŋ jotel pa Jolevi aka jatel pa jokur waŋkac.
Wok kwoŋ Merari obedo jonono pa Mali kodi nono pa Musi: Me a nonin pa Merari.
Joje kanyacel k'okwan cwo wok dwe acel kadho malo, oyido obedo gana aucel gi miya ario.
Jatel ma nono pa Merari onwaŋo obedo Zuriel wod pa Abihayili; oyido joripo ketho kambi pajo yumalo ma tabenakulo.
Aka tic pa wot Merari oyido obedo kuro gi tiŋo tabenakulo, nywenye, sirin, pende, kodi gigipiny je ma makere gine, kodi tic man je ma mako gime;
bende gi sirin ma diedipo thoko, gi pendi jo, loce, kodi thondhe mere.

Jono m'oyido joripo ketho kambi pajo yuwaŋ tabenakulo yuwok ceŋ, ruwaŋ Wema ma romo yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ oyido obedo Musa kodi Aron gi wote, ka jotimo tic ma Kabedo Maleŋ, kisi gimoro je m'oyido iripo timo ri Joisiraili; aka japath moro je m'ocore cegin iripo neko.
Jolevi je ma Musa kodi Aron jokwano luwo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth, cungo kwoŋ nonin pajo, cwo je wok i dwe acel kadho malo, onwaŋo obedo 22,000.
Kenyo to Rwoth waco ri Musa ni, “Kwan nyithindho ma cwo makayo je ma Isiraili, wok dwe acel kadho malo, aka ikwani jo gi nyingi jo.
Iripo kwanyo ran Jolevi, Abedo Rwoth; i kabedo p'okayin je i dier Joisiraili, aka gi le pa Jolevi i kabedo p'okayin je i dier le pa Joisiraili.”
Ameno bende Musa okwano okayin je i dier Joisiraili, paka Rwoth omiyo go or.
Nyithindho makayo je kanyacel m'okwan wok i dwe acel kadho malo, kwano nyingi jo, onwaŋo obedo 22,273.
Kenyo Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ni:
Kwany Jolevi i kabedo p'okayin je i dier Joisiraili, kodi le pa Jolevi i kabedo pa le pajo; aka Jolevi jolabedo aparan. Abedo Rwoth.
Ma botho okayin ma Isiraili 273 maloyo kosa kalo apa Jolevi iripo nyewo,
Ilakwanyo nusu siringi abic, k'ipima kodi siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ, siringi piero ario m'opima paka mitere.
Pesa me ibino miyo Aron gi wote m'obothi gine welo pajo m'okale.
Ameno Musa okwanyo pesa ma both kwoŋ jono m'oyido jokalo jono ma Jolevi jobotho;
okwanyo pesa kwoŋ okayin pa Joisiraili, 1,365 m'opima kodi pesa ma Kabedo Maleŋ.
To Musa miyo Aron gi wote pesa ma both cungo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth, paka Rwoth oyido otieko miyo Musa or.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa kodi Aron, ka waco ni:
Kwan nyikway Kohath wok i dier nyikway Levi gi nonin pajo gi udi pa kwarere pajo,
cako oro piero adek tundo i oro piero abic. Jono je ma jonyalo timo tic ma makere kodi Wema ma romo.
Tic pa nyikway Kohath me i Wema ma romo mako kwoŋ gigipiny maleŋ loyo.
Ka kambi oay, Aron gi wote jobino donjo to jolunyo nanga ma umo, to joumo Kakan ma Cikirok gine.
Nyaka jobino jengo i wiye pien mafoth ma umo, to joyaro i wiye nanga manyabululu iye je, aka jobino ketho gute mere i kare.
I wiy meza ma mugat maleŋ m'imiyo Rwoth jolayaro nanga manyabululu, t'ijengo i wiye sendere mere, bakulere ri buban, siniya, kodi jagi ma mic ma math; mugat ma kisi ndelo bende labedo i wiye.
Kenyo jolayaro i wiy jo nanga m'obokere, to joumo gi pien mafoth, to joketho gute i kare.
Jobino kwanyo nanga manyabululu, to joumo gine raŋaw tala ri lero, gi talin mere, kitambi mere, kabangala mere, kodi atewe ma mo mere ma jolaoro ma poko.
Jobino ketho gi gigipiny mere je i giumo ma pien mafoth, to joketho i miango ma tiŋo.
I wiy migam ma zahabu jolayaro nanga manyabululu, to joumo gi pien mafoth, aka jobino ketho gute mere i kare.
Jobino kwanyo gigipiny ma tic je m'ioro i Kabedo Maleŋ, to joketho i nanga manyabululu, to joumo gi pien mafoth, to joketho jo i wiy miango ma tiŋ.
Jobino jowo woko buru wok i migam, to joyaro nanga ma rangi ariŋo i wiye.

Jobino ketho i wiye gigipiny ma migam je, m'ioro ma timo tic kenyo, kabangala, uma, kitiyin, kodi kalayere, gigipiny je ma migam; aka jolayaro i wiye giumo ma pien mafoth, to joketho gute mere i kare.

Ka Aron kodi wote jotieko umo Kabedo Maleŋ kodi kombere mere, kareno kambi ay, rumacen nyikway Kohath jolabino to jotiŋo, to jokiripi geyo gigipiny maleŋ, kosa jonyalo tho. Me gigipiny ma Wema ma romo ma nyikway Kohath joripo tiŋo.

Eliazar wod pa Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam labedo jakur ma mo ma lero, buban maŋwe kur, mic ma kodhi ma kisi hongo, gi mo ma wir, kuro tabenakulo parom gi gimoro je manitie i iye, i Wema kodi gigipiny mere.
Kenyo to Rwoth luwo gi Musa kodi Aron, ka waco ni:
Wikiri wiŋadi woko nono madwoŋ ma nono pa Kohath wok i dier Jolevi.
Me apaka wiripo tic gi jo ŋey jowokwo ma jok'otho ka jocore cegin gi gigipiny maleŋ loyo: Aron gi wote jobino donjo to jomiyo kisi ŋat'acel tic kosa bieto.
To Jolevi ma nono pa Kohath jokiripi donjo i iye ma mito neno gigipiny maleŋ kada nyak'adec; kosa jolatho.
Kenyo Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ama:
Kwan nyikway Gerison bende, gi udi pa kwarere pajo kodi nonin pajo.
Cako i oro piero adek tundo oro piero abic ilakwano jo, joje ma jonyalo timo tic i Wema ma romo.
Me a tic pa Jolevi ma Gerison, i timo tic kodi tiŋo gigipiny me.
Jolatiŋo nanga ma umo tabenakulo, kodi Wema ma romo gi giumo mere, gi giumo ma woko ma pien mafoth manitie i wiye, kodi ndewiro ri dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Aka nanga ma umo kapido kodi ndewiro ma dhiot ma waŋkac ma kapido m'othoko tabenakulo kodi migam, gi thondhe kodi gigipiny ma tic pajo; aka jolatimo gimoro je ma ripo atima ma mako jo.
Tic je mapa nyikway Gerison bino bedo paka Aron gi wote jowaci rijo, i kisi gimoro je ma jotiŋ, kodi i kisi gimoro je ma jotim; aka ibino miyo jo gimoro je ma jotiŋ.
Me a tic pa nyikway Gerison ma mako kwoŋ Wema ma romo, aka Ithamar wod pa Aron ama laneno ni jotimo tic pajo.
Paka ri nyikway Merari, ikwani jo gi nonin pajo kodi udi pa kwarere pajo.
Cako i oro piero adek tundo i oro piero abic, joje ma jonyalo timo tic ma Wema ma romo.
Me a tic pajo paka jotic i Wema ma romo: Joripo tiŋo miango ma tabenakulo, gi nywenye mere, sirin, kodi pende,
sirin ma kapido thoko iye je gi pendi jo, loce, thondhe, kodi gigipiny mere je gi tic ma makere gi jo je. Iripo cwoko nyingi kisi gimoro ma joripo tiŋo.
Me a tic pa nyikway Merari ma makere gi Wema ma romo, tic pajo je ma makere gi Wema ma romo, ma jadwoŋ mere obedo Ithamar wod pa Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Ameno Musa kodi Aron kodi jotel ma kacokirok jokwano nyikway Kohath, gi nonin pajo gi udi pa kwarere pajo.
Cako i oro piero adek tundo oro piero abic, joje m'oyido jonyalo timo tic ma makere kodi Wema ma romo;
aka welo pajo cungo kwoŋ nonin obedo 2,750.
Me welo pa nyikway Kohath, jono je ma jotiyo i Wema ma romo, ma Musa kodi Aron jokwano luwo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth ri Musa.
Me welo pa nyikway Gerison, gi nonin pajo kodi udi pa kwarere pajo,
cako i oro piero adek tundo oro piero abic, joje ma jonyalo timo tic ma makere kodi Wema ma romo;
welo pajo gi nonin pajo gi udi pa kwarere pajo oyido obedo 2,630.
Me welo pa nyikway Gerison, joje ma jotiyo i Wema ma romo, ma Musa kodi Aron jokwano luwo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth.
Me welo ji ma nonin pa nyikway Merari, gi nonin kodi udi pa kwarere pajo,
cako i oro piero adek tundo oro piero abic, joje ma jonyalo timo tic ma Wema ma romo.
Welo pajo gi nonin pajo oyido obedo 3,200.
Me welo pa nyikway Merari, ma Musa kodi Aron jokwano luwo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth.
Jono je m'okwan jo kwoŋ Jolevi, ma Musa kodi Aron gi jotel ma Isiraili jokwano, gi nonin pajo gi udi pa kwarere pajo,
cako i oro piero adek tundo oro piero abic, joje ma jonyalo timo tic kodi tic ma bielo bieto ma makere kodi Wema ma romo,
welo pajo je obedo 8,580.
Luwo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth m'omiyo Musa omiyo jo timo tic kweth ma timo gigipiny kosa tiŋo. Ameno apaka go okwano jo, paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ni:
Wodhi or ri Joisiraili wodho woko ma kambi kisi dhano ma jadhowo, kosa ma cwero kwoŋe, kodi kisi dhano makoc m'ogeyo delkwoŋ ŋat'otho.
Ibino wodho woko jacwo gi dhako, iriem jo woko ma kambi; jokiripi koco kambi pajo, kam'abed'iye i dier jo.
Joisiraili jotimo ameno, joriemo jo woko ma kambi; paka Rwoth oyido otieko luwo gi Musa, ameno apaka Joisiraili jotimo.
Luw gi Joisiraili, ka jal moro kosa dhako moro otimo ri nyawote marac, turo yeyo gi Rwoth, ŋato bedo jabanja
aka go ripo tuco reco ma go otimo. Ŋato bino timo cul m'opoŋ ri gimarac, ka medo acel wiy abic kwoŋe, to miyo ŋata go otimo rigo marac.

Ka ŋat'otim rigo marac k'obedo wat m'inyalo timo rigo cul ri gimarac, cul ri gimarac no bino kidho ri Rwoth ri jacway ri Were i wi migam, medo kwoŋ wod rombo m'itimo gine kwer ma cwako reco ri ŋat'otim rigo marac.
Kwoŋ kisi mic moro je maleŋ mapa Joisiraili, kisi mic ma jokelo ri jacway ri Were i wi migam bino bedo apere.
Mic maleŋ moro je labedo apajo, kisi gimoro ma nyatoro omiy jacway ri Were i wi migam labedo apere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ni:
Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni: Ka cipa jal moro otangatanga to bedo ma k'ogeno go;
ka jal moro onindi gine to cwore bedo ma k'oŋeyo, t'ibedo ma k'oŋey kada go otieko loko kwo pere makoc, aka ongoye jakony kwoŋe rupiri k'omaki go ka timo.
Kosa cuny ma nyeko obino kwoŋe, to nyeko mako go gi cege m'otieko lokere makoc. Kosa ka cuny ma nyeko obin kwoŋe, aka nyeko omako go gi cege kada go k'olokere makoc.

Kenyo jalo bino kelo cege bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam. Go bino kelo mic ma mitere rigo, acel wiy apar ma kilo moko ŋano. Go kiripi konjo i wiye mo moro kosa ketho i wiye buban moro, rupiri obedo mic ma kodhi ma nyeko, mic ma thango reco kamaler.
Kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kelo go cegin, to miyo go cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo pi maleŋ iy'atawo, to kwanyo fukefuke moro manitie i dhiot ma tabenakulo to ketho i pi.
Jacway ri Were i migam bino miyo dhako no cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth to gonyo wiy dheno, to ketho i cingi dheno. I cinge won jacway ri Were i wi migam lamako pi ma gigipiny makec ma kelo kwoŋ.

Kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam bino miyo go kwoŋirok ka waco ni, “Ka jal moro otieko nindo kodin, kafodi ikiwire gi thenge ri koco munyo initie iy'adhum pa cworin, pi ma gigipiny makec me ma kelo kwoŋ wokiri wotim kwoŋin gimoro.
To k'itieko tado waŋin munyo fodi initie iy'adhum pa cworin, k'itieko kocere aka jal moro ma k'obedo cworin otieko nindo kodin.”
Jacway ri Were i migam lamiyo dhako no tero kwoŋirok ma lam to waco ri dheno ni, “Rwoth wolokin lam i dier ji perin, nyaseye perin wopodhi, iyin wopodhi woko.
Onyo weyi pi me ma kelo kwoŋ wodonji i nyagir iyin to miyo iyin podho woko, nyaseye perin wopodhi!” To dhako no dwoko ni, “Ameno, Ameno.”
Kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam bino ketho kwoŋ me i ndiko, to lwoko jo woko i pi ma gigipiny makec.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino miyo dhako no madho pi ma gigipiny makec ma kelo kwoŋ aka pi ma kelo kwoŋ bino donjo kwoŋ dheno to kelo litho ma kiwacere.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo mic ma kodhi ma nyeko wok i cingi dheno, to tiŋo malo mic ma kodhi no ruwaŋ Rwoth to kelo i migam.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo masi acel ma mic ma kodhi, paka adec ma rapoy, to loko yiro i wi migam, aka rumacen to miyo dhako no madho pi.

K'otieko miyo dhako no madho pi, kenyo nyaka ka otieko loko kwoŋe makoc to bedo jakidakana, pi ma kelo kwoŋ bino donjo kwoŋe to kelo litho ma kiwacere, to iye kwot, kwoŋ pere lapodho, aka dhako no lalokere kwoŋ i dier ji pere.
To ka dhako no fodi k'okoco kwoŋe to go olony, kenyo ongoye gima latimo go, to go lanyalo gamo iye to nywolo nyithindho.
Me a cik ka dhawirok obedi, ka dhako opor gicen kafodi nitie iy'adhum pa cwore to kocere,
kosa ka cuny ma nyeko obino kwoŋ jalo to mako nyeko gi cege; kenyo go bino miyo dhako no cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth, to jacway ri Were i wi migam bino oro cik me je rigo.
Ibino gonyo jalo kwoŋ reco, to dhako bino tiŋo reco pere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni: Ka jacwo kosa dhako otim gimatek ma kwoŋirok, kwoŋirok pa Janazir, ma miyirok ri Rwoth.
Jobino weyo madho vini kodi medho matek; jokibino madho vini makec kosa gimakec man, aka jokibino madho muwisi mar'olemo moro je kosa camo olemo, obedi m'ocek, manumu kosa m'othwo.
Hongo pajo je paka Jonazir, jokibino camo gimoro m'otimi g'olemo, kada nyinge kosa pien mere.
Tekin jotieko timo kwoŋirok ma bedo Jonazir, ongoye kamweso ma bino geyo wiy jo; cuka hongo otundi ma jomiyer'iye ri Rwoth, jobino bedo ji maleŋ; jobino weyo ye wi gin dongo mabor.
Hongo je ma jobedo Jonazir, jokiripi core cegin gi del pa jatho.
Kad'obedi ni bajo kosa min jo, omin jo kosa nyimin jo otho, jokiripi kocere; rupiri lokirok pajo maleŋ ri Were nitie i wi jo.
Hongo pajo je paka Jonazir jobino bedo maleŋ ri Rwoth.
Ka dhano otho abwap i ger, to koco wiye maleŋ, kenyo jobino lielo ye wi gin i ndelo pajo ma lokirok macil.
I ndelo mar'aboro jobino kelo akurin ario kosa nyithindhi njiwin ario ri jacway ri Were i wi migam i dhiot ma Wema ma romo,

aka jacway ri Were i wi migam bino miyo acel paka mic ma cwako reco aka man mere paka mic awaŋa, to timo kwer ma cwako reco rijo, rupiri jotimo reco r'atoŋa ma neno del pa jatho. Jobino loko wi jo maleŋ ndelo acel no won.
Jobino bedo Jonazir ri Rwoth ma hongo pajo je, to jokelo wod rombo ma nyaka ay ma jaoro acel paka mic ma culo banja. Hongo macon ongoye kony, rupiri ye wiyin maleŋ okoc.
Jobino miyo mic ri Rwoth, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel ma k'oŋol paka mic awaŋa, rombo madhako ma jaoro acel ma k'oŋol paka mic ma cwako reco, wod rombo acel ma k'oŋol paka mic ma siem.
Adita acel ma mugat ma buthow, mugat ma moko manyakare m'oruw gi mo kodi mugat ma buthow m'oduw gi mo, gi mic ma kodhi kodi mic ma math.
Jacway ri Were bino ketho jo ruwaŋ Rwoth to jomiyo mic pajo ma cwako reco kodi mic awaŋa,
aka bino miyo wod rombo paka cowirok ma siem ri Rwoth, kodi adita ma mugat ma buthow. Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino yiko mic ma kodhi kodi mic ma math.
Kenyo janazir bino lielo wiye maleŋ i dhiot ma Wema ma romo, aka bino kwanyo yer wok i wiye maleŋ to ketho i wi mac i pendi mic ma siem.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo wibac ma wod rombo m'otedi kodi mugat acel wok iy'adita, kodi mugat ma buthow acel, aka bino ketho jo i par cingi janazir, k'otieko lielo ye wiye maleŋ.

Kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam bino tiŋo jo malo paka mic atiŋa malo ruwaŋ Rwoth; jobedo adec maleŋ ri jacway ri Were i wi migam, kanyacel gi aŋakin m'itiŋo malo kodi bat m'imiyo. Rumacen janazir nyalo madho vini.

Me obedo cik ri janazir ma kwoŋere. Mic pajo ri Rwoth ripo makere kodi kwoŋirok pa janazir, kwanyo woko giman ma go nyalo nwaŋo. Cungo kwoŋ kwoŋirok moro je m'otimo, go bino timo, cungo kwoŋ cik ma leŋo pere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ni:
Waci ri Aron kodi wote, aka iwaci ni: Me apaka wiripo miyo Joisiraili silwany: Wibino waco rijo ni,
Rwoth womiy win silwany aka wokur win;
Rwoth womenyi win gi lero pere aka womiy win nema pere;
Rwoth wotiŋ riwin waŋe aka wokel riwin siem.
Ameno apaka jobino ketho nyingan kwoŋ Joisiraili, aka abino miyo jo silwany.
I ndelo ma Musa oyido otieko timo tabenakulo, aka oyido otieko wiro gi mo to loko maleŋ gi gigipiny mere je, kareno otieko wiro gi mo gi loko maleŋ migam gi gigipiny mere je.
Kenyo Jotel ma Isiraili, jotel ma udi pa kwarere pajo, jotel ma nonin, ma jocungo ri jom'okwan, jowodho mic.
Jokelo mic pajo ruwaŋ Rwoth, magal aucel m'oboy gi megikwe apar g'ario, magal acel ri kisi jotel ario, kodi merikwa acel ri kisi acel, jokelo jo ruwaŋ tabenakulo.
Kenyo to Rwoth waco ri Musa ni:
“Jol gigipiny kwoŋ jo wonyali oro ma timo tic ma Wema ma romo, aka kethi i cingi Jolevi, ri kisi acel cungo kwoŋ tic pere.”
Ameno Musa okwanyo magalere kodi megikwe to miyo Jolevi.
Magalere ario kodi merikwa aŋwen go omiyo nyikway Gerisom, cungo kwoŋ tic pajo.
Magalere aŋwen kodi megikwe aboro go omiyo nyikway Merari, cungo kwoŋ tic pajo, japok tic oyido obedo Ithamar wod pa Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam.
To go k'omiyo nyikway Kohath gimoro, rupiri oyido omiyo jo tic ma kikwonga gigipiny maleŋ m'oyido jotiŋo i goki jo.
Jotel bende i ndelo m'owir'iye migam gi mo, jokelo mic ri leŋo mere; jotel joketho mic pajo ruwaŋ migam.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni: “Jobino kelo mic pajo, jatel acel ri ndelo acel, ma loko migam maleŋ.”
Ŋat'okelo mic pere i ndelo marapena obedo Nason wod pa Aminadab, janono pa Yuda.

Mic pere obedo sen ma feza ma peko mere oyido timo siringi miya acel gi piero adek. Kalaya acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ pesa ma Kabedo Maleŋ, joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ gi buban.
Rwath acel, wod rombo acel, nyathi rombo acel ma jaoro acel, ma mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco;
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Nason wod pa Aminadab.
I ndelo mar'ario Nethanel wod pa Zuar, jatel pa Isakar, okelo mic.

Go okelo mic pere ma sen ma feza acel ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek, kalaya acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje oyido jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ gi buban;
thwon acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel, paka mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel paka mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, merikwa ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, gi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Nethanel wod pa Zuar.
I ndelo mar'adek Eliab wod pa Helon, jatel pa nyikway Zebulun.

Mic pere obedo sen acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek. Kalaya acel ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ gi buban;
rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel ma mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, merikwa ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Eliab wod pa Helon.
I ndelo mar'aŋwen Elizur wod pa Sedur, jatel pa nyikway Ruben:

Mic pere oyido obedo sen ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek, kalaya acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ, joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ gi buban;
thwon acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel, ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, merikwa ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Elizur wod pa Sedur.
I ndelo mar'abic Selumiel wod pa Zurisaday, jatel pa nyikway Simeo:
Mic pere obedo sen acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ'iye buban.
Rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo ma jaoro acel, ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Selumiel wod pa Zurisaday.
I ndelo mar'aucel Eliasaf wod pa Duwel, jatel pa nyikway Gad:

Mic pere obedo sen acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek. Kalaya acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ gi buban.
Rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ma mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ma cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Eliasaf wod pa Duwel.
I ndelo mar'abirio Elisama wod pa Amihud, jatel pa nyikway Efrayim:

Mic pere obedo sen acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek, kalaya acel ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ gi buban;
rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel, ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Elisama wod pa Amihud.
I ndelo mar'aboro Gamaliel wod pa Pedazur, jatel pa nyikway Manase:

Mic pere obedo sen acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek, kalaya acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ gi buban,
rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco;
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Gamaliel wod pa Pedazur.
I ndelo mar'aŋwen Abidan wod pa Gideon, jatel pa nyikway Benyamin:

Mic pere obedo sen acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek, kalaya acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ gi buban,
rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Abidan wod pa Gideon.
I ndelo mar'apar Ahiyeza wod pa Amisaday jatel pa nyikway Dan:

Mic pere obedo sen ma feza acel ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek, kalaya acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ'iye buban,
rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel, ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Ahiyeza wod pa Amisaday.
I ndelo mar'apar g'acel Pagiel wod pa Ociran, jatel pa nyikway Aser:

Mic pere obedo sen acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek. Kalaya acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ'iye buban.
Rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel, ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Pagiel wod pa Ociran.
I ndelo mar'apar g'ario Ahira wod pa Enan, jatel pa nyikway Nafital:

Mic pere obedo sen acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek. Kalaya acel ma feza ma peko mere obedo siringi piero abirio, cungo kwoŋ siringi ma kamaleŋ. Joje jopoŋ gi moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo ri mic ma kodhi.
Sen acel ma zahabu ma peko mere obedo siringi apar, m'opoŋ'iye buban.
Rwath acel, wod rombo acel, wod rombo acel ma jaoro acel, ri mic awaŋa.
Wod diel acel ma mic ma cwako reco,
kodi ri cowirok ma siem, megikwe ario, wot rombo abic, wot diegi abic, kodi wot rombo abic ma jo oro acel. Me obedo mic pa Ahira wod pa Enan.
Me obedo mic ma miyirok ri migam, i hongo m'owir'iye gi mo, wok bongi jotel ma Isiraili: Sendere ma feza apar g'ario, kalayere apar g'ario ma feza, sendere apar g'ario ma zahabu,

kisi sen acel ma feza peko mere oyido obedo siringi miya acel gi piero adek aka kisi kalaya peko mere siringi piero abirio, atewe je ma feza jobedo siringi gana ario gi miya aŋwen cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ.
Sendere apar g'ario ma zahabu, m'opoŋ'iye buban, ma peko mere obedo siringi apar kisi acel cungo kwoŋ siringi ma Kabedo Maleŋ, zahabu je ma sendere obedo siringi miya acel gi piero ario.
Dhok je ri mic awaŋa jobedo rwathe apar g'ario, wot rombo apar g'ario, wot rombo apar g'ario ma jo oro acel, gi mic pajo ma kodhi; kodi wot diegi apar g'ario ri mic ma cwako reco.

Dhok je ri cowirok ma siem ma jobedo rwathe piero ario g'aŋwen, wot rombo piero aucel, wot diegi piero aucel, wot rombo ma jo oro acel piero aucel. Me obedo mic ma miyirok ri migam, munyo otiek wiro gi mo.
Munyo Musa odonjo i Wema ma romo luwo gi Rwoth, oyido maro winjo dwondi ma luwo gine wok malo ma giumo ka ŋuto m'oyido nitie i wi Kakan ma Cikirok wok i dier cwec ma jobwombi gin; to luwo gine.
“Luw gi Aron aka iwaci rigo ni, ka ketho talin abirio bino miyo lero joripo ŋiyo yunyim raŋaw tala.”
Aron otimo ameno; oketho talin miyo lero ruwaŋ raŋaw tala, paka Rwoth oyido otieko miyo Musa or.

Ama apaka otim raŋaw tala, wok kwoŋ zahabu m'oodi gi nyundu. Wok i pende tundo i mawuwin mere, obedo tic m'oodi gi nyundu; cungo kwoŋ nger ma Rwoth oyido otieko nyutho Musa, ameno go otimo raŋaw tala.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ama:
Kwany Jolevi wok i dier Joisiraili aka ilony jo.
Ama apaka ibino timo rijo, ma lonyo jo: Ikiri pi maleŋ kwoŋ jo, imiy jo lielo delkwoŋ jo gi kamweso to jolwoko nangin pajo, ameno jolalony.
Jobino kwanyo rwath kodi mic ma kodhi mere ma moko m'onuŋere m'oruw gi mo, aka wibino kwanyo rwath man ri mic mareco.
Ibino kelo Jolevi ruwaŋ Wema ma romo, t'icoko kweth gibe ma Isiraili.
K'ikelo Jolevi ruwaŋ Rwoth, Joisiraili je jobino ketho cingi jo kwoŋ Jolevi,
aka Aron bino ketho Joisiraili ruwaŋ Rwoth paka mic m'itiŋo malo wok bongi Joisiraili, ŋey jowonyal timo tic pa Rwoth.
Jolevi jobino ketho cingi jo i wi thwondhe, aka ibino miyo acel ri mic ma cwako reco aka man ri mic awaŋa ri Rwoth, ma timo ŋuto ri Jolevi.
Kenyo ibino miyo Jolevi cungo ruwaŋ Aron kodi wote, aka ibino miyo jo paka mic m'itiŋo malo ri Rwoth.
Ibino poko Jolevi kwoŋ Joisiraili man, aka Jolevi jobino bedo aparan.
Rumacen mere Jolevi jonyalo donjo to jotimo tic i Wema ma romo, kareno itieko lonyo jo t'iketho jo paka mic atiŋa malo.
Jobedo aparan wok i dier Joisiraili; atieko kwanyo jo ri an won, i kabedo pa kisi nyathi makayo ma kisi ici, nyithindho makayo pa Joisiraili.
Kole nyithindho makayo ma Isiraili je jobedo aparan, ji kodi ogwaŋe. I ndelo m'anek'iye nyithindho makayo je i piny ma Misir aloko jo maleŋ ri an won.
T'atieko kwanyo Jolevi i kabedo pa nyithindho makayo je i dier Joisiraili.

Medo kwoŋ meno, atieko miyo Jolevi paka mic ri Aron kodi wote wok i dier Joisiraili, ma timo tic ri Joisiraili i Wema ma romo, kodi ma timo ŋuto ri Joisiraili, ŋey thoyamo wokiri wobedi i dier Joisiraili ro corok cegin gi Kabedo Maleŋ.
Musa kodi Aron gi kweth je mapa Joisiraili jotimo ameno gi Jolevi; Joisiraili jotimo gi Jolevi paka Rwoth oyido otieko miyo Musa or ma mako kwoŋ jo.
Jolevi jolonyo kwo pajo kwoŋ reco to jolwoko nangin pajo; kenyo to Aron miyo jo paka mic atiŋa malo ruwaŋ Rwoth, to Aron timo kwer ma cwako reco pajo.
Rumacen mere Jolevi jodonjo timo tic pajo i Wema ma romo ma kuro Aron kodi wote. Paka Rwoth oyido otieko miyo Musa or ma mako Jolevi, apaka jotimo gi jo.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Me a gima mako kwoŋ Jolevi: Cako oro piero ario g'abic kadho malo jobino cako timo tic ma Wema ma romo;
aka cako i oro piero abic, jobino ywomere i tic to jobedo ma jok'otiyo kendo.
Jonyalo konyo wutmin jo i Wema ma romo i timo tic pajo, to wegi jokiripi tic. Ameno apaka itimi kodi Jolevi i tic pajo.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa i thim ma Sinai, i dwe marapena ma oro mar'ario munyo jotieko wok i lowo ma Misir, ka waco ni,
“Weyi Joisiraili jowokuri Kalima ma Kadho i hongo ma ripo.
I ndelo mar'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe me, othieno, wibino kuro i hongo ma ripo, paka cik gi or mere je waco.”
Ameno to Musa waco ri ji ma Isiraili ni joripo kuro Kalima ma Kadho.
