Jokuro Kalima ma Kadho i dwe marapena, i ndelo mar'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe, othieno, i thim ma Sinai paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or, ameno to Joisiraili jotimo.
Oyido nitie ji moro m'oyido jokoc ro geyo del pa jom'otho, riameno jok'onyalo kuro Kalima ma Kadho i ndelo no. Jobino ruwaŋ Musa kodi Aron i ndelo no,
to jopenjo go ni, “Kada wakilony ro geyo del ŋat'otho, raŋo wakinyali kelo mic pa Rwoth i hongo mere ma ripo i dier Joisiraili?”
Musa odwoko jo ni, “Kur win, cuka anowinji gima Rwoth owaci ma mako kwoŋ win.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa, ka waco ni:
Luw gi Joisiraili, k'iwaco ni: Nyatoro moro je kwoŋ win kosa nyikway win makoc ro geyo del pa ŋat'otho, kosa go nitie i woth, bino kuro Kalima ma Kadho pa Rwoth.
I dwe mar'ario i ndelo mar'apar g'aŋwen, othieno, jobino kuro, jobino camo gi mugat ma buthow gi fufa makec.
Jokibino weyo kad'acel cuka piny oyawere, doko jok'otur coko mere cungo kwoŋ cik ma Kalima ma Kadho, jobino kuro.
To nyatoro m'olony aka ongoye i woth, aka weyo kuro Kalima ma Kadho, ibino kwedo go kwoŋ ji rupiri k'okelo mic pa Rwoth i hongo mere ma ripo; nger ŋato labielo banja ma reco.
Japath moro je m'obedi i dier win m'omiti kuro Kalima pa Rwoth, latimo ameno cungo kwoŋ or ma Kalima ma Kadho gi cungo kwoŋ cik mere; wilabedo gi or acel ri japath ma bedo i dier win kodi jopiny.
I ndelo m'ojeng'iye tabenakulo, pondeponde oumo tabenakulo, ma wema ma cikirok; wok othieno tundo odikin, aka oyido nitie i wi tabenakulo, kareno nitie gi menyirok ma mac.
Noknok obedo ameno: Pondeponde oumo odieceŋ gi menyirok pa mac wor.
Kisi ka pondeponde oter malo wok i wi wema, kenyo nyaka to Joisiraili joay malo; aka i kabedo ma pondeponde ocung'iye, kenyo Joisiraili je oyido jocoker'iye.
Gi or pa Rwoth, Joisiraili oyido joay malo, aka i or pa Rwoth, oyido jocokere. Paka pondeponde oumo wi Wema pa Rwoth, Joisiraili oyido jodoŋ i kambi.
Kada munyo pondeponde omedere bedo i wi tabenakulo ma ndelo kweth, Joisiraili oyido joworo Rwoth, aka jok'oay malo.
I hongo man, pondeponde oyido nyalo doŋ ma ndelo manok i wi tabenakulo, aka cungo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth, oyido jodoŋ i kambi; nyaka cungo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth, oyido jonyalo ay malo.
I hongo man pondeponde oyido doŋ wok othieno tundo odikin, aka ka pondeponde otiŋ malo odikin, oyido joay malo. Kosa ka omedere odieceŋ gi wor, ka pondeponde otiŋere malo, oyido joay malo.

Obedi ni obedo ma ndelo ario kosa dwe acel, kosa ma hongo malac, ni pondeponde omedere bedo i wi tabenakulo, ka oumo wiye, Joisiraili oyido jodoŋ i kambi ma jok'oay malo, aka ka otiŋere malo, oyido joay malo.
I or pa Rwoth oyido jocokere, kendo i or pa Rwoth, oyido joay malo. Joworo Rwoth, i or pa Rwoth ri Musa.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
“Tim gwarin ario ma feza; itimi jo matek pa nyundu; aka ibino oro jo ma lwoŋo cokirok, kodi ma cego kambi.
K'okudhi jo je, cokirok gibe jobino cokere ruwaŋin i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
To k'okudhi acel kende, nyaka to jotel, jodongo ma nonin ma Isiraili, ama jobino cokere ruwaŋin.
Ka wikudho gwara, kambin je ma yuthenge ma yupiny jobino ay;
ka okudhi gwara mar'ario, kambin je ma yuthenge ma yupiny jobino ay. Wiripo kudho gwara hongo je ka joay.
To ka inomiti kweth jowocokere, ikudhi to kiri goy ndur.
Wot Aron, jocway ri Were i wi migam, jobino kudho gwarin; me bino bedo cik ma cil gi cil ri luse je.
Ka winokidhi i lweny i piny mewin kwoŋ jokwor ma jodiyo win, wibino goyo ndur gi gwarin, ŋey wonyali poyo win ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin to wiboth kwoŋ jokwor mewin.”

“I ndelo mewin bende ma forok, i kalimin mewin ma Dwe Manyen gi kalimin megi manyadini, wiripo kudho gwarin ka wikelo mic mewin awaŋa kodi cowirok mewin ma mic ma siem; jobino bedo paka rapoy i nyingi win ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin. An abedo Rwoth Were mewin.”
I oro mar'ario, i dwe mar'ario, ka ndelo piero ario ma dwe, pondeponde otiŋere malo to umo tabenakulo ma cikirok.
Kenyo to Joisiraili joay cako woth pajo wok i thim ma Sinai, to pondeponde cungo i thim ma Paran.
Joay marapena i or pa Rwoth ri Musa.
Kitipa ma kambi pa nyikway Yuda ama jopen ay, i kitipin pajo ma lweny aka jadwoŋ ma kitipa oyido obedo Nason wod pa Aminadab.
Jadwoŋ pa jolweny ma nono pa nyikway Isakar onwaŋo obedo Nethanel wod pa Zuar;
aka jadwoŋ ma kitipa pa jolweny ma nono pa nyikway Zebulun onwaŋo obedo Eliab wod pa Helon.
Kenyo t'idolo tabenakulo, to nyikway Gerisom gi nyikway Merari, ma jotiŋo Wema pa Rwoth joay.
M'oluwere gi kitipa ma kambi ma jolweny pa Ruben joay, aka jadwoŋ pajo oyido obedo Elizur wod pa Sedur.
Jadwoŋ ma kitipa pa jolweny ma nono pa nyikway Simeo oyido obedo Selumiel wod pa Zurisaday.
To jadwoŋ ma kitipa pa jolweny ma nono pa nyikway Gad oyido obedo Eliasaf wod pa Duwel.
Kenyo to nyikway Kohath ma jotiŋo gigipiny maleŋ joay, t'ijengo tabenakulo mafodi jok'otundo.
M'oluwere gi kitipa ma kambi nyikway Efrayim joay i kitipin pajo ma lweny aka jatel ma kitipa pa jolweny oyido obedo Elisama wod pa Amihud.
Jadwoŋ ma kitipa pa jolweny pa nyikway Manase oyido obedo Gamaliel wod pa Pedazur.
Jadwoŋ ma kitipa pa jolweny ma nono pa nyikway Benyamin oyido obedo Abidan wod pa Gideon.
Kenyo kitipa ma kambi pa nyikway Dan oay kareno obedo paka jakur ma yucen ma kambin je, ri kitipin pa jolweny, aka jadwoŋ ma kitipa pa jolweny oyido obedo Ahiyeza wod pa Amisaday
Jadwoŋ ma kitipa pa jolweny ma nono pa nyikway Aser oyido obedo Pagiel wod pa Ociran.
Jadwoŋ ma kitipa pa jolweny ma nono pa nyikway Nafital oyido obedo Ahira wod pa Enan.
Me oyido a can ma woth mapa Joisiraili i kitipin pa jolweny pajo, munyo joay.
Musa owaco ri Hobab wod pa Reuel Jamidian, ba cipa Musa ni, “Wakidho i kabedo ma Rwoth owaco ni, ‘Alamiyo win.’ Biye gi wan, aka walakurin maber, kole Rwoth otieko ciko bero ri Isiraili.”
To Hobab dwoko go ni, “Akilakadho, to aladok i piny paran won gi bongi wade paran.”
To Musa waco rigo ni, “Mondo ikir'iwey wan, kole iŋeyo kama wanyalo keth'iye kambi i thim aka ibino bedo riwan paka waŋ wan.
Kucel, k'ikadho gi wan, bero je ma Rwoth otim riwan, gimoro acel no walatimo rin.”
Ameno to joay wok i got pa Rwoth woth ma ndelo adek gi Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth kareno otelo jo i woth ma ndelo adek no, ma rango rijo kama joywomer'iye.
Pondeponde pa Rwoth oyido telo jo odieceŋ ka jowok i kambi.
“Ay malo, Awi Rwoth, weyi jokwor perin jowokedhere,
aka jokwor perin jowoŋweci ruwaŋin.”
Aka hongo je k'ocungo, Musa oyido waco ni,
“Dwoki, Awi Rwoth ro pecin gana gi gana ma Isiraili.”
Ji jocako kiŋunyaŋunya ka Rwoth winjo mako kwoŋ teko pajo, Rwoth owinjo to nge pere gaga. Kenyo to mac pa Rwoth liel kwoŋ jo, to waŋo woko adec ma woko ma kambi.
To ji joywak ri Musa; Musa okwayo Rwoth, to mac tho.
Ameno to ŋatimoro cwoko nyingi kenyo ni Tabera,
Jopath ma jonitie i dier jo oyido jonitie g'awanya; Joisiraili jogik to joywak kendo, to jowaco ni, “Ŋa m'omiy wan riŋo acama?
Wapoyo rec ma wacamo i Misir manono, tula, gima cale nyarieŋa m'opoŋ pi ma limlim m'icamo, katungulu kodi kamilali;
t'onyo pama meni mawan orumo, aka ongoye gimoro kad'acel kwanyo woko mana ma waneno.”
Mana oyido cale kodhi mathindho matar, aka rangi mere oyido cale yath m'ioro ma timo mo manyatongweno maŋwe kur.
Ji jowotho to jocoko, jorego i cuma kosa joodo i pany, jotedo i degi to jotimo mugat wok'iye; aka k'ibilo oyido cale mugat m'oyik gi mo.
Ka thoyo ooy i wi kambi wor, mana oyido oy gine.
Musa owinjo munyo ji joywak i pecin pajo parom, joje i dhiot ma kayindere pajo. Kenyo Rwoth olokere mager tektek, aka Musa k'osangala.
Ameno Musa openjo Rwoth ni, “Raŋo itimo ŋeca perin marac ameno? Raŋo akinwaŋo wor ruwaŋin, m'iyimo kwoŋan teko pa ji me je?
Aŋat'agamo ji me je i iyan? Aŋat'anywolo joje, ma miyo iwaci ran ni, ‘Tiŋi jo i iyin, paka musawo tiŋo nyathi ma dhoth kiri i piny m'iciko kwarere pajo gi kwoŋirok?’
Anonwaŋ riŋo kune ma miyo ji me je? Joywak ran ka jowaco ni, ‘Miy wan riŋo ŋey wanyal camo.’
Akinyali tiŋo ji me je kendan, jome jopek ran swa.
Ka me apaka ikidho timo ran, mondo nekan i yoto, k'anwaŋo bero ruwaŋin, aka ikir'iyeyan anen kumo paran.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Coki ran cwo piero abirio ma jotegino ma Isiraili, m'iŋeyo ni jobedo jom'otegino kodi jotel pa ji, ikeli jo i Wema ma romo, aka imiy jo kabedo kenyo kodin.
Alaloro piny t'aluwo kodin kenyo; aka alakwanyo cuny moro manitie kwoŋin t'aketho kwoŋ jo; aka jobino bielo peko pa ji kanyacel kodin ŋey ikir'ibiel je kendin.

Ibino waco ri ji ni: Lokere win maleŋ ri dikin, aka wibino camo riŋo; rupiri witieko ywak ka Rwoth winjo, ka wiwaco ni, ‘Ŋa m'omiy wan riŋo acama? Adieri oyido bero nitie riwan i Misir.’ Riameno Rwoth lamiyo win riŋo, aka wilacamo.
Wikilacamo nyaka ma ndelo acel kende, kosa ndelo ario, kosa ndelo abic, kosa ndelo apar, kosa ndelo piero ario.
To wilacamo ma dwe acel gipi cuka owok gi yor um win to lokere riwin marac, kwoŋbedo wikwero Rwoth manitie i dier win, aka witieko ywak ruwaŋe, ka wipenjere ni, ‘Raŋo ma waweyo Misir?’ ”
To Musa waco ni, “Ji manitie gi jo romo gana miya aucel ma jowotho atiendi; aka iwaco ni, ‘Alamiyo jo riŋo, jowonyal camo ma dwe acel gipi!’
Nitie mwendi kosa sidwol ma romo ayaŋa rijo? Nitie rec ma romo i nam amaka rijo?”
Rwoth openjo Musa ni, “Meni pa Rwoth nok? Onyo ilaneno k'inen obedi adieri kosa be.”
Ameno Musa okidho to waco ri ji wac pa Rwoth; to go coko cwo ma jotegino piero abirio kwoŋ ji, to ketho joje thoko kayindi.

Kenyo Rwoth oloro piny i pondeponde to luwo gine, to kwanyo cuny moro m'oyido nitie kwoŋe to ketho kwoŋ cwo ma jotegino piero abirio; aka munyo cuny no oloro kwoŋ jono, to jotuco wac pa Were; to jok'omedo kendo.

Cwo ario jodoŋ i kambi, acel nyinge Elidad, aka man mere nyinge Medad, to cuny loro kwoŋ jo; oyido jobedo jom'onwaŋo otiek ndiko jo, to oyido fodi jok'okadho i kayindi, to jotuco wac pa Were gi i kambi.
To jayac moro ringo to waco ri Musa ni, “Elidad kodi Medad ica jotuco wac pa Were i kambi.”
To Yosuwa wod pa Nun, jakony pa Musa, acel kwoŋ cwo pere m'oyer, waco ni, “Jadwoŋ paran Musa, ceri jo!”
To Musa waco rigo ni, “Nyeko makin ro an? Kabedi ji pa Rwoth je jonyalo bedo jotuci wac Were, aka bedi Rwoth oyido nyalo ketho cuny pere i jo!”
To Musa kodi jom'otegino ma Isiraili jogik i kambi.

Kenyo to koyo ay wok bongi Rwoth, to kelo alurere wok i nam to miyo jo podho i thengi kambi, woth ma romo ndelo acel yuthenge me kodi woth ma romo ndelo acel yuthenge man, thoko kambi je parom, cegin fut adek wok i lowo.
Ameno to ji joay ndelo no gipi gi wor no gipi kodi ndelo ma luwo gipi to jocoko alurere; ŋat'ocoko manok ocoko kilo piero abic kadho malo; to joyaro jo rijo wegi thoko kambi parom.
To munyo riŋo oyido fodi nitie i dier laki jo, mafodi jok'onyamo to nge pa Rwoth gaga kwoŋ ji, to Rwoth rwadho ji gi thoyamo madwoŋ swa.
Ameno t'ilwoŋo kenyo ni Kibroth Hatava
Wok Kibroth Hatava ji jowotho kidho Hazeroth.
Munyo fodi jonitie i Hazeroth, Miriam kodi Aron joluwo marac kwoŋ Musa ro dhako Jaethopiya m'oyido go onywomo (kole oyido go adieri onywomo dhako Jaethopiya).
Jowaco ni, “Rwoth otieko luwo gi Musa kende? Go fodi k'oluwo gi wan bende?” To Rwoth winjo.
Musa oyido obedo jal mamwol swa, loyo dhano moro je ma piny ka.
To Rwoth waco abwap ri Musa, Aron kodi Miriam ni, “Wok win woko, wi jadek, i Wema ma romo.” Ameno to jadek no jowok woko.
Kenyo to Rwoth loro piny i siro ma pondeponde, to cungo i dhiot ma kayindi, to lwoŋo Aron kodi Miriam; to joje jobino yuwiye.
To waco rijo ni,
“Mondo winji win wac paran:
Ka nitie jatuci wac Were i dier win,
An a Rwoth, amiyo ŋeyirok paran rijo i menyirok;
aluwo gi jo i lek.
go ama amiyo go kuro ji paran je Isiraili.
Aluwo gi go awaŋ g'awaŋ i lero, makiweno i sikoiyiko;
to go neno paka Rwoth cale.
Raŋo ma wikilworo luwo marac kwoŋ ŋeca paran Musa?”
To nge pa Rwoth gaga kwoŋ jo, to go kadho.
Munyo pondeponde oleny woko i wi kayindi, Miriam oyido otieko lokere jadhowo, matar pa pe. Aron owire bongi Miriam to neno ni go oyido obedo jadhowo.
Kenyo to Aron waco ri Musa ni, “Awi jadwoŋ paran, ikir'imiy wan gir'acula ri reco ma watimo amiŋa.
Mondo ikir'iwey go wocale gi ŋat'otho, ma del pere adec ocamere woko gi iy min.”
To Musa ywak ri Rwoth ni, “Awi Were bothi go.”
To Rwoth waco ri Musa ni, “Bedi bamere ŋul law i waŋe, di go k'onyalo bielo wickwot pere ma ndelo abirio? Weyi wocegi go woko ma kambi ma ndelo abirio, aka k'orumo inyalo kelo go i iye kendo.
Ameno t'icego Miriam woko ma kambi ma ndelo abirio; aka ji jok'onyalo ay woth cuka orwaki Miriam i iye kendo.
Rumacen to ji joay wok Hazeroth, to joketho kambi i thim ma Paran.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni,
“Dhiri cwo bedo jopendo i piny ma Kanan, m'akidho miyo Joisiraili; wok kwoŋ kisi nono pajo, ibino dhiro jacwo, kisi jatel i dier jo.”
Ameno Musa to dhiro jo wok i thim ma Paran, cungo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth, joje cwo ma jotel i dier Joisiraili.
Me a nyingi jo: Wok i nono pa Ruben, Samuwa wod pa Zakur.
Wok i nono pa Simeo, Safat wod pa Hor.
Wok i nono pa Yuda, Kaleb wod pa Yefune.
Wok i nono pa Isakar, Igal wod pa Yozefu.
Wok i nono pa Efrayim, Hoseya wod pa Nun.
Wok i nono pa Benyamin, Palti wod pa Rafu.
Wok i nono pa Zebulun, Gadel wod pa Sodi.
Wok i nono pa Yozefu meno nono pa Manase, Gad wod pa Sus.
Wok i nono pa Dan, Amiel wod pa Gemal.
Wok i nono pa Aser, Sethur wod pa Mikaili.
Wok i nono pa Nafital, Nabi wod pa Vofisi.
Wok i nono pa Gad, Guwel wod pa Maki.
Me a nyingi cwo ma Musa ooro bedo jopendo ma lowo. Musa to wiro nyingi Hoseya wod pa Nun ni Yosuwa.
Munyo Musa ooro jo bedo jopendo i piny ma Kanan, owaco rijo ni, “Kadhi win koro yupiny, aka wikidhi i piny matendere tendere,
winen paka lowo cale, kodi kinen ji ma jobed'iye jotek kosa jonyap, k'inen jonok kosa jomore.
Neni win ka lowo ma jobed'iye ber kosa rac, kodi kinen tindin ma jobed'iye k'ogoy cel iye kosa ogoy cel,
kodi k'inen lowo ago oŋaŋ kosa ma candi, kodi kinen yen niye kosa ongoye. Bedi win jomiseni, aka wikel olemo moro ma lowo.” Onyo oyido obedo hongo marapena mar'olemo m'ocek.
Ameno jokidho malo timo nyaliŋliŋ i lowo wok i thim ma Zin tundo Rehob, cegin gi Lebohamath.
Jokadho yupiny, to jotundo Hebron; aka Ahiman, Sesay, kodi Talmay, Joanakim, oyido jonitie kenyo. (Ogeti Hebron oro abirio mafodi k'ogeti Zowan i Misir.)
Jotundo i malawa ma Esikol, to jotoŋo wok kenyo jangi yath manitie gi kayego acel mar'olemo, to jotiŋo i gute i dier jo jario. Jodwoko bende gi pomo kodi nyandere moro.
Olwoŋi kenyo ni Malawa Esikol
Munyo ndelo piero aŋwen otieko rumo, jopendo jodok.
Jobino bongi Musa kodi Aron kodi kweth je pa Joisiraili i thim ma Paran, i Kades; jodwoko rijo wac kodi kweth je, to jonyutho jo olemo ma lowo.
To jowaco rigo ni, “Watundo i lowo m'idhir'iye wan; cak gi mo kic mol'iye, aka me olemo mere.
To kad'ameno ji ma jobedo i lowo jotek, aka tindin ogoy'iye cel aka jolac swa; medo kwoŋ meno, waneno nyikway Anak kanyago.
Joamalek jobedo i lowo ma yupiny; Johiti, Joyebus, kodi Joamor jobedo yupiny matendere; aka Jokanan jobedo yuthengi nam, kodi yuthengi Yordan.”
To Kaleb omiyo ji liŋ ruwaŋ Musa, to waco ni, “Weyi wakadhi win dicel wabed'iye, kole wanyalo mako.”
Kenyo to cwo m'oyido jokadho gine jowaco ni, “Wakinyali kidho malo lweny gi ji me, kole jotek loyo wan.”

Ameno to jokelo ri Joisiraili mikwenda ma ŋedho cuny jo ma lowo m'oyido jotieko timo nyaliŋliŋ mere, ka jowaco ni, “Lowo ma watieko woth'iye paka jopendo obedo lowo ma cuto woko joma bed'iye; aka ji je ma wanen'iye jobedo ji ma siragama.
Waneno kenyo nyikway Anak aka wawegi oyido wacale otwoŋin, aka ameno apaka wacale rijo.”
Kweth je jobaro dwondi gin gi ywak, to ji je jobiyo pigi waŋ gin wor no.
Joisiraili je jogeŋisa gi Musa kodi Aron; kweth gibe jowaco rijo ni, “Bedi ndir no watho i piny ma Misir! Kosa bedi timere ni watho i thim me!
Raŋo Rwoth okelo wan i piny me ma podho g'abor? Mon mawan gi nyithindho mawan jolalokere gikinyaga; di k'ober loyo riwan gik Misir?”
To wegi jowaco ni, “Weyi wayer jatel, to wagiki Misir.”
Kenyo to Musa kodi Aron jogore piny gi nyim jo ruwaŋ cokirok ma kweth pa Joisiraili.
Yosuwa wod pa Nun kodi Kaleb wod pa Yefune, ario kwoŋ cwo m'oyido jobedo jopendo joyeco nangin pajo i rem,
to jowaco ri kweth pa Joisiraili ni, “Lowo ma wawoth'iye thoko paka jopendo obedo lowo maber ma kiwacere.
Ka Rwoth sangala gi wan, go lakelo wan i lowo me to miyo wan, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic.
Kende ni, wikiri wigwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth; aka wikiri wilwor ji ma lowo, kole jokithoth loyo mugat riwan; ongoye ŋat'okwonga jo, aka Rwoth nitie gi wan; wikiri wilwor jo.”
To kweth gibe jotisa goyo jo gi telin.
Kenyo to dwoŋ pa Rwoth menyere i Wema ma romo ri Joisiraili je.
To Rwoth penjo Musa ni, “Ji me jolacayan kiri keraŋo? Aka jok'oyeyan kiri keraŋo, kada bedi ni atieko timo ranyuth je i dier jo?
Alagoyo jo gi two nundu aka ak'olunji jo, aka alalokin nono madwoŋ aka matek loyo jo.”

aka jolawaco ri joma bedo i lowo me. Jotieko winjo ni in, awi Rwoth, initie i dier ji me; kole in, Awi Rwoth, ineno awaŋ g'awaŋ, aka pondeponde perin cungo i wi jo t'itelo jo, i siro ma pondeponde odieceŋ kodi siro ma mac wor.
Onyo k'inoneki ji me je dicel, kenyo nonin ma jotieko winjo kwoŋin jolawaco ni,
“Kwoŋbedo Rwoth k'onyalo kelo ji me i lowo ma go okwoŋere miyo jo am'omiyo oneko jo i thim.”
Aka onyo, riameno, weyi meni pa Rwoth wobedi madwoŋ i nger ma cango iciko munyo iluwo, k'iwaco ni,
aka opoŋ gi mar makiwire,
cwako reco kodi kibenga,
aka i nger moro je cwako reco,
aka go k'owey ma k'omiyo nyithindho gi nyikway jo,
gir'acula kiri i luse mar'adek kodi mar'aŋwen ri reco pa jonywol pajo.”
“Cwaki reco pa ji me cungo kwoŋ dwoŋ ma mar perin makiwire, paka itieko cwako ji me, wok Misir tundo kiri pama.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Acwako, paka itieko kwayo;
to kad'ameno paka akwo, kendo paka piny gipi bino poŋ kodi dwoŋ pa Rwoth,
ongoye ji ma jotieko neno dwoŋ paran kodi ranyuth m'atieko timo i Misir kodi i thim, aka kucel jotieko teman mirundi apar me aka fodi jok'oworan,
ma laneno piny m'akwoŋere miyo kwarere pajo; ongoye kad'acel kwoŋ joma jocayin m'onen.
To ŋeca paran Kaleb, kwoŋbedo go nitie kodi cuny m'opokere aka otieko timo gim'ayenyo, alakelo i lowo ma go oyido otieko kidh'iye, aka nyikwaye jobino loko apajo.
Onyo, paka Joamalek kodi Jokanan jobedo i milelo, wire win wikidhi i thim gi royo ma Nam M'obokere.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa kodi Aron ka waco ni:
“Kweth pa jokidakana me jolakigeŋisa kodan kiri keraŋo? Atieko winjo kiŋunyaŋunya pa Joisiraili, ma jogeŋisa iye kwoŋan.
Waci rijo ni, ‘Paka akwo, Rwoth waco, alatimo riwin gimoro acel won m'awinjo wiwaco:
Delkwoŋ win m'otho bino podho i thim acel me won; aka kwoŋ wijoje, manitie i welo ma ji m'okwan, cako i oro piero ario kadho malo, ma jotieko kiŋunyaŋunya kodan,
ongoye kad'acel kwoŋ win m'odonji i piny m'akwoŋere keth'iye win, kwanyowoko Kaleb wod pa Yefune, kodi Yosuwa wod pa Nun.
To jomathindho mewin, ma wiwaco ni oyido jolalokere gikinyaga, alarwako jo i iye, aka jolaŋeyo piny ma witieko cayo.
To paka riwin, delkwoŋ win m'otho bino podho i thim me.
Nyithindho mewin jolabedo jokwath i thim ma oro piero aŋwen, aka jolacandere rupiri wikiwinjan, cuka delkwoŋ win m'otho macowe oŋare i thim.
Cungo kwoŋ hongo ma wicowo ma timo nyaliŋliŋ ma piny, oro piero aŋwen, ri kisi ndelo i oro, wibino bielo reco mewin, oro piero aŋwen, aka wilaŋeyo gut paran.’
An Rwoth atieko luwo; adieri abino timo ameno ri kweth m'odakana me je ma jocokere kanyacel lweny kodan i thim me, gike pajo latundo, aka jolatho.”
Cwo ma Musa odhiro timo nyaliŋliŋ ma lowo ma jogik to jomiyo kweth je kigeŋisa gine gi kelo radwok marac ma mako lowo.
Cwo ma jokelo radwok ma ŋedho cuny ma mako lowo thoyamo oneko jo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
To Yosuwa wod pa Nun kodi Kaleb wod pa Yefune kende ama jodoŋ ma jokwo, kwoŋ cwo ma jokidho bedo jopendo ma lowo.
Munyo Musa otieko waco wac me ri Joisiraili je, ji joywak tektek.
Joay odikin maŋic to jokidho i wi acurcur ma piny matendere, ka jowaco ni, “Ee wan. Walakidho malo i kabedo ma Rwoth otieko ciko, rupiri watieko timo reco.”
To Musa penjo ni, “Raŋo wimedere timo kibenga kwoŋ or pa Rwoth? Wikilanyalo.
Wikiri wikidhi malo, rupiri Rwoth kinitie gi win; wikiri wimiy worwadhi win piny ruwaŋ jokwor mewin.
Kole Joamalek kodi Jokanan jonitie ruwaŋ win aka wilatho; rupiri witieko kwero luwo Rwoth, Rwoth k'obedi gi win.”
To jokethere idho iy'acurcur ma piny matendere, kad'oyido Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth, kodi Musa onwaŋo fodi jok'oweyo kambi.
Kenyo Joamalek kodi Jokanan m'oyido jobedo i piny matendere joloro piny to jokengila jo, to joriemo jo tundo Horima.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
“Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni, Ka witundo i piny ma wilabed'iye, m'amiyo win,

t'imiyo mic awaŋa ri Rwoth wok i sidwol kosa i mwendi obedi mic awaŋa kosa cowirok, ma ketho i gike cikirok kosa paka mic ma iwon iyeyo kosa i kalima mewin ma wiyiko ma timo ŋwece kur ma sangala Rwoth.
Nyaka ŋat'okeli nger mic no ri Rwoth bino bende kelo mic ma kodhi, acel wiy apar ma moko m'onuŋere, m'oruw kodi acel wiy aŋwen ma mo oliv.
Medo kwoŋ meno, ibino miyo acel wiy aŋwen ma vini paka mic ma vini kodi mic awaŋa kosa cowirok, ri kisi wod rombo.
Ri wod rombo, ibino miyo mic ma kodhi, acel wiy apar ma moko m'onuŋere m'oruw kodi acel wiy adek ma mo oliv.
Paka mic ma math ibino miyo acel wiy adek ma vini, maŋwe kur ri Rwoth.
K'imiyo rwath paka mic awaŋa kosa cowirok, ma ketho i gike cikirok kosa paka mic ma siem ri Rwoth,
nyaka ibino kelo gi rwath mic ma kodhi, kilo adek ma moko m'onuŋere, m'oruw gi lita ario ma mo oliv.
Ibino kelo paka mic ma math lita ario ma vini, paka mic awaŋa, ma ŋwece mere sangala Rwoth.”
“Meno a gim'ibino timo gi kisi thwon kosa wod rombo, kosa gi kisi rombo kosa i dier nyithindhi diegi.
Cungo kwoŋ welo mar'ogwaŋe m'imiyo, ameno apaka ibino timo gi kisi acel kodi je.
Kisi Jaisiraili bino timo gigipiny me ka kelo mic awaŋa, ma ŋwece kur mere sangala Rwoth.
Jakicar ma bedo i dier win, kosa m'onwaŋ kabedo makicutho i dier win, to paro miyo mic awaŋa, ma ŋwece kur mere sangala Rwoth, bende ripo luwo cik me.
Paka ri kacokirok, bino bedo cik acel ri Jaisiraili kodi jakicar, cik ma cil gi cil ri luse mewin je. Jaisiraili kodi jakicar jobino bedo marom ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Jaisiraili kodi jakicar ma bedo i dier win jobino bedo gi cik acel kodi thumo banja acel.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni, ka witieko tundo i lowo m'akel'iye win,
hongo je ma wicam'iye cemo moro ma lowo, wibino miyo mic ri Rwoth.
Wok kwoŋ mugat marapena ma widwanyo, wibino miyo mugat acel gipi paka mic; wibino miyo paka wimiyo mic ma wok i gigipiny ma wipiedho.
I luse mewin je, wibino miyo Rwoth mic wok i mugat mewin marapena ma widwanyo.
To ka witimo gimikanyo to wibedo ma wikikuro or me je ma Rwoth otieko luwo gi Musa,
kisi gimoro ma Rwoth otieko oro win ka luwo bongi Musa, wok i ndelo ma Rwoth omiyo or kadho yuwaŋe, i luse mewin je.

Onyo ka winotim ma kweth k'oŋeyo, kweth gibe bino miyo rwath acel ri mic awaŋa, ma kur mere sangala Rwoth, kanyacel gi mic mere ma kodhi kodi mic mere ma math, cungo kwoŋ cik mere, wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco.

Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino timo kwer ma ŋuto ri kweth pa Isiraili je, aka ibino cwako jo; jotimo ma jok'oŋeyo, aka onyo jokelo mic pajo, mic awaŋa ri Rwoth, kodi ma ŋuto reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, ro komo pajo.
Kweth pa Joisiraili gibe ibino cwako, kanyacel gi jopath je ma jobedo i dier jo, kwoŋbedo ji je jotimo gi komo.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino timo kwer ma ŋuto ruwaŋ Rwoth i migam ma lonyo ŋat'otim kibenga, aka ibino cwako rigo.
Ri janono i dier Joisiraili kodi ri japath ma bedo i dier jo, wibino bedo gi cik acel ri kisi dhano m'otimi gikibenga.
To ka dhano otim gimikanyo, obedi Jaisiraili kosa japath, meno obwono Rwoth, ibino riemo go woko i dier ji.
Rupiri go ocayo wac pa Rwoth to turo or pere, nger ŋato ibino riemo go kicutho to bielo banja.
Munyo Joisiraili oyido jonitie i thim, jonwaŋo jal moro ma dimo yen i ndelo ma Sabato.
Jono ma jonwaŋo go dimo yen jokelo go bongi Musa, Aron, gi bongi kweth je.
Jobolo go i iye, rupiri oyido jokuya gir'atima gine.
Kenyo to Rwoth waco ri Musa ni, “Jalo iripo neko; kweth gibe joripo neko go woko ma kambi.”
Kweth gibe jowodho go woko ma kambi to jogoyo go gi telin cuka otho, paka Rwoth oyido otieko miyo Musa or.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni:
“Luw gi Joisiraili, aka iwaci rijo timo lwodo i sonda ma nangin pajo i luse pajo je kendo gi ketho thol manyabululu i mugowa i kisi sonda.
Winitie kodi lwodo ŋey kis ka wineno, wibino poyo or pa Rwoth je gi timo jo, to wibedo ma wikitimo gima cunyin win wanya gi ma waŋ win oneno.
Onyo wibino poyo kodi kuro or paran je, aka wibino bedo maleŋ ri Were mewin.
Abedo Rwoth Were mewin, m'owodho win woko ma piny ma Misir, ma bedo Were mewin: Abedo Rwoth Were mewin.”
cwo ma Joisiraili miya ario gi piero abic, jotel ma kweth m'oyer wok i cokirok, cwo ma joŋeyere swa, to jokidho bongi Musa.
Jocokere ruwaŋ Musa kodi Aron to jowaco rijo ni, “Wikadho bor swa! Kweth je joleŋ, kisi dhano kwoŋ jo, aka Rwoth nitie i dier jo. Onyo raŋo winor loyo cokirok pa Rwoth?”
Munyo Musa owinjo gino to podho gi nyime.
Kenyo to waco ri Kora kodi wadi je ni, “Odikin Rwoth lanyutho ŋat'obedo apere, kodi ŋataleŋ, kodi ŋat'ilayeyo corok bonge; ŋata go oyer, go layeyo wocore bonge.
Tim win gime: Kwany win buban, Kora gi wadin je,
aka dikin wimoki mac i jo, aka wiyar buban i wi jo ruwaŋ Rwoth; aka ŋata Rwoth oyer bino bedo ŋataleŋ. Win Jolevi wikadho bor swa.!”
Kenyo to Musa waco ri Kora ni, “Winji win pama me, win Jolevi!
Obedo gimathin riwin swa ni Were pa Isiraili opoko win kwoŋ kweth ma Isiraili, ma yeyo win corok bonge ŋey witim tic ma tabenakulo pa Rwoth, kodi cungo ruwaŋ kweth to witiyo rijo?
Go otieko yeyo win corok bonge, kanyacel gi wutmin win ma Jolevi ma jonitie gi win; kucel wirango bende bedo jocway ri Were i wi migam!
Riameno in kodi wadin je witieko cokere kanyacel gwenyirok kwoŋ Rwoth. Aron bende obedo ŋa ma wiŋunyaŋunya gine?”
Kenyo to Musa dhiro ni wolwoŋi Dathan kodi Abiram wot Eliab; to jowaco ni, “Wakilabino!
Iparo ni obedo gimathin swa m'omiyo iwodho wan woko i lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic ma neko wan i thim, m'omiyo bende idhum wan?
K'obedo adieri ni ikikelo wan i piny ma cak gi mo kic mol'iye, kosa imiyo wan gir'alunja ma ndelin kodi ndelo vini. Oyido d'ineko woko waŋ cwo me? Wakilabino be!”
Nge omako Musa swa to waco ri Rwoth ni, “Ikir'ijol mic pajo moro je. Fodi akikwanyo kada punda acel kwoŋ jo, aka fodi akitimo ri kad'acel kwoŋ jo marac.”
Musa to waco ri Kora ni, “Paka ri in kodi wadin, dikin wibin bongi Rwoth, in, wadin kodi Aron;

aka kisi dhano kwoŋ win wokwany gitiŋo buban pere, wokethi i iye buban, aka kisi dhano wokel gitiŋo buban no ruwaŋ Rwoth, gitiŋo buban miya ario gi piero abic; in bende, kodi Aron, kisi dhano gitiŋo buban pere.”
Ameno to kisi dhano kwanyo gitiŋo buban pere, to jomok'iye mac to jokonj'iye buban to jocungo i dhiot ma Wema ma romo gi Musa kodi Aron.
Kenyo to Kora coko kweth je gwenyirok kwoŋ Musa kodi Aron i dhiot ma Wema ma romo. Abwap to dwoŋ pa Rwoth menyere ri kweth gibe.
Kenyo to Rwoth luwo gi Musa kodi Aron ka waco ni:
Pokere win kwoŋ kweth me ŋey anyal neko jo i hongo macek.
Jopodho gi nyim jo, to jokwayo ni, “Awi Were, Were pa ji je, ŋat'acel otim reco to nge makin gi kweth gibe?”
To Rwoth dwoko Musa ka waco ama:
Waci ri kweth ji ni jowoeye woko kama Kora, Dathan kodi Abiram jobed'iye.
Ameno to Musa ay to kidho bongi Dathan kodi Abiram; to jotel ma Isiraili joluwo go.
Kenyo Musa oluwo gi kweth ji ka waco ni, “Eye win woko i kayindi pa cwo ma jodakana me, aka wikiri wigeyi gimoro pajo moro je, kosa ilayweyo win woko gi reco pajo je.”
Ameno to joeye woko kama Kora, Dathan, kodi Abiram jobed'iye; to Dathan kodi Abiram jowok woko to jocungo i dhiot ma kayindere pajo kanyacel gi mon pajo, kodi nyithindho pajo.
To Musa waco ni, “Me apaka wilaŋeyo ni Rwoth ooran timo tic me je; k'obedo gima an won ayero:
Ka ji me jotho m'ongoye giman m'oneko jo kwanyo woko ka Were won am'oomo jo, kosa k'agima Were won am'oyiko obin kwoŋ jo, meno Rwoth k'ooran.
To ka Rwoth otim gimoro manyen, to piny ŋamo dhoke to mwonyo jo woko, gi gigipiny pajo je, to jokadho ma jokwo i piny pa jom'otho, nyaka wilaŋeyo ni ji me jocayo Rwoth.”
Tekin otieko waco wac me je, to piny ma jonyono bare.
Piny oŋamo dhoke to mwonyo woko jo, kanyacel gi gigipiny pajo ma ot; kisi ŋat'oyido luwo Kora gi lim pajo je.
Ameno jo kodi gigipiny pajo je jodonjo piny ma jokwo i piny pa jom'otho; piny oumo jo, to jotho wok i dier cokirok.
Joisiraili je ma jothoko jo joringo munyo jowinjo joywak, ka jowaco ni, “Piny bende lamwonyo wan!”
To mac bino wok bongi Rwoth to neko woko cwo miya ario gi piero abic m'oyido jomiyo buban.
Kenyo Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Waci ri Eliazar wod pa Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam woneki woko mac i gitiŋo buban; to kedho woko mac bor.

Kole gitiŋo buban pa joreco me olokere maleŋ i cul ma kwo pajo. Cadhi jo i sendere mathindho thindho ma umo migam, rupiri jokelo jo ruwaŋ Rwoth to jolokere maleŋ. Ameno apaka jolabedo ranyuth ri Joisiraili.
Ameno to Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kwanyo gitiŋo buban ma nyweny ma jono onwaŋo jokelo; t'icadho paka giumo migam.

Me obedo rapoy ri Joisiraili ni ongoye japath, ma k'obedo nyakwar Aron, ma wocore miyo buban ruwaŋ Rwoth, ŋey wokiri wolokere paka Kora kodi wadi paka Rwoth oyido otieko waco ri Eliazar luwo kwoŋ Musa.
Yawere mere, kweth gibe pa Joisiraili joŋunyaŋunya gi Musa kodi Aron ka jowaco ni: “Witieko neko woko ji pa Rwoth.”
Aka munyo kweth otieko cokere ma gwenyirok kwoŋ jo, Musa kodi Aron to jowire yu Wema ma romo, pondeponde oyido oumo to dwoŋ pa Rwoth menyere.
Kenyo to Musa kodi Aron jobino ruwaŋ Wema ma romo,
to Rwoth luwo gi Musa ka waco ni,
“Eye woko kwoŋ kweth me, ŋey aneki woko jo i hongo macek.” To jopodho gi nyim jo.

To Musa waco ri Aron ni, “Kwany gitiŋo buban perin, mok'iye mac wok i migam, aka ikonj'iye buban, itiŋ piyo piyo iter i dier ji, aka itimi kwer ma ŋuto rijo; rupiri keme otieko wok bongi Rwoth; thoyamo otieko cako.”
Ameno to Aron timo paka Musa oyido otieko waco, to ŋweco i dier cokirok kama thoyamo oyido otieko cak'iye i dier ji. Oketho buban, to timo kwer ma ŋuto kwoŋ ji.
Ocungo i dier jom'otho kodi jomakwo; to thoyamo jukere.
Jono ma thoyamo oneko jo obedo 14,700 ma k'okwan jono ma jotho i gwenyirok pa Kora.
Munyo otiek juko thoyamo, Aron ogik bongi Musa i dhiot ma Wema ma romo.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
Luw gi Joisiraili aka ikwany ludhe apar g'ario kwoŋ jo, acel ri kisi jatel ma nono, kwoŋ jotel je ma udi pa kwarere pajo. Ndiki nyingi kisi jacwo i luth pere,
aka indiki nyingi Aron i luth pa Jolevi. Bino bedo luth acel ri kisi jatel ma nono.
Ikethi jo i Wema ma romo ruwaŋ sanduku ma cikirok kam'arom'iye kodi win kenyo.
Luth pa ŋat'anoyer bino kitula; ameno abino ketho i gike kigeŋisa pa Joisiraili ma kisi hongo joketho kwoŋin.
Musa oluwo gi Joisiraili; to jotel pajo je jomiyo go ludhe, acel ri kisi jatel, cungo kwoŋ udi pa kwarere pajo, ludhe apar g'ario; aka luth pa Aron oyido nitie i dier jo.
Ameno to Musa ketho ludhe no i kayindi ruwaŋ Sanduku ma Cikirok pa Rwoth.
Yawere mere, munyo Musa okidho i Wema, luth pa Aron ri nono pa Jolevi oyido otula. Oketho boke, olikalika, to nyak nyandere m'ocek.
Kenyo Musa owodho woko ludhe je ruwaŋ Rwoth ri Joisiraili je; joneno, to kisi jatel kwanyo luth pere.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Kethi luth pa Aron ruwaŋ Sanduku ma Cikirok, wokan paka ranyuth ri Joisiraili ma jogwenyirok, ni jowowey kiŋunyaŋunya kodan, ka k'obedo ameno jolatho.”
Musa otimo ameno; otimo paka Rwoth oyido otieko miyo go or.
Joisiraili jowaco ri Musa ni, “Watho woko ka warumo, warwenyo, wajoje warwenyo!
Kisi dhano m'ocore cegin gi tabenakulo pa Rwoth latho. Wajoje walarere woko!”

Rwoth owaco ri Aron ni: “In kodi wotin kodi ot pa kwarere perin wibino bielo reco ma makere gi Kabedo Maleŋ, kareno in kodi wotin kende ama jobino bielo reco ma makere kodi ma jocway ri Were i wigam jotimo.
Keli bende kodin wutmin in ma jonono pa Jolevi, nono pa kwarere perin, ŋey jowonyal riwirok kodin, jowotiy rin kareno in kodi wotin ma jonitie kodin winitie ruwaŋ Wema ma cikirok.
Jolatimo tic riwin kodi ri Wema gibe. To jokiripi corok cegin gi gigipiny ma Kabedo Maleŋ kosa gi migam; ka jotimi ameno jo kodi win wilatho.
Joripo bedo bongin ma timo tic ma Wema ma romo, ri tic moro je ma Wema; ongoye jakicar ma wocore bongi win.
Wiwegi wiripo timo tic ma Kabedo Maleŋ kodi tic ma migam, ŋey keme wokiri wobin kendo kwoŋ Joisiraili.
Obedo an ma pama akwanyo wutmin win ma Jolevi wok kwoŋ Joisiraili; jok'obedo mewin paka mic, m'imiyo Rwoth, ma timo tic ma Wema ma romo.

To in kodi wotin ma jonitie kodin wibino timo tic mewin paka jocway ri Were i wi migam gi kinen i gino je ma mako migam kodi adec ma yucen ma nanga ma umo. Amiyo win bedo jocway ri Were i wi migam paka mic; jakicar moro je m'ocore cegin gi gigipiny maleŋ iripo neko.”
Rwoth owaco ri Aron ni, “Ee atieko kethin jadwoŋ ma mic m'imiyan, mic je maleŋ pa Joisiraili. Atieko miyin jo kodi wotin paka adec pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ma cil gi cil.

Me bino bedo mewin wok kwoŋ gigipiny maleŋ loyo, m'owey ma k'owaŋ: Kisi mic pajo je ma jomiyan paka gimaleŋ loyo, obedi mic ma kodhi, mic ma ŋuto reco, kosa mic ma banja, bino bedo aperin kodi wotin.”
“Wicam paka gimaleŋ loyo; kisi jacwo nyalo camo; bino bedo rin gimaleŋ.

Me bende obedo aperin. Atieko miyin, kanyacel gi nyithindho perin, paka mic ma cil gi cil, kisi gimoro m'oketh gicen wok kwoŋ gigipiny ma mic je apa Joisiraili m'itiŋo; kisi nyatoro je m'olony i ot perin nyalo camo jo.
Mo mabeyo je kodi vini maber je kodi ma kodhi, olemo manyakare ma jomiyo Rwoth, atieko miyin.
Ranyak marapena je manitie i lowo pajo, ma jokelo ri Rwoth bino bedo aperin; kisi nyatoro m'olony i ot perin nyalo camo.
Kisi gimoro je m'imiyan i Isiraili labedo aperin.”
“Nyathi makayo kosa ogwaŋ m'imiyo Rwoth labedo aperin; to nyathi makayo ibino dwoko wok bongan, aka okayo mar'ogwaŋe ma jokoc ibino dwoko wok bongan.
Bey ma botho jo, k'okwan wok i dwe acel pajo ma nywolirok, wilaridho siringi abic ma feza, cungo kwoŋ pesa m'ioro.
To kayo pa dhiaŋ, kosa ma rombo, kosa ma diel ikir'inyew widwoki; joleŋ. Ikiri remo pajo i wi migam, aka iwaŋ bor pajo paka mic awaŋa maŋwe kur ri Rwoth;
to riŋo pajo labedo aperin, paka aŋakin m'itiŋo malo kodi paka bat maracuc jobedo aperin.
Mic maleŋ je ma Joisiraili jokelo ri Rwoth, atieko miyin, kanyacel gi nyithindho perin, paka mic ma cil gi cil; obedo cikirok ma cumbi cil gi cil ruwaŋ Rwoth rin kodi nyikwayin bende.”
Kenyo to Rwoth waco ri Aron ni: “Ikir'ijol pok moro i lowo pajo, bende ikir'ijol lim moro je i dier jo; aŋat'abedo gim'iripo limo kodi gir'alunja perin i dier Joisiraili.”
Joisiraili man jokiripi corok cegin gi Wema ma romo aka i nger me jonyalo kelo kwoŋ jo raco ma tho.
Jolevi kende ama joripo timo tic ma Wema ma romo, aka jolabielo reco ma tim pajo; bino bedo cik ma cil gi cil ri luse mewin je. To i dier Joisiraili jok'olunji gimoro,
rupiri atieko miyo Jolevi paka adec pajo acel wiy apar pa Joisiraili, ma joketho gicen paka mic ri Rwoth. Riameno atieko luwo kwoŋ jo ni jokiripi lunjo gimoro i dier Joisiraili.
Kenyo to Rwoth waco ri Musa ni:
“Waci ri Jolevi ni: Ka jojolo kwoŋ ji acel wiy apar m'atieko miyo jo wok kwoŋ adec mewin, wilaketho gicen mic moro ri Rwoth paka mic manyakare.
Gima wicoko ibino tero paka gima rom kodi kodhi ma kapiedhirok kodi vini m'opoŋ kodi gibiyo vini.
Ameno in bende ibino ketho gicen mic ri Rwoth wok kwoŋ acel wiy apar je ma wijolo wok kwoŋ Joisiraili; aka wok kwoŋ jo wilamiyo mic pa Rwoth ri Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Wok kwoŋ mic mewin je, wibino ketho gicen kisi mic m'obedo apa Rwoth, maber kwoŋ joje am'obedo adec maleŋ.
Ibino bende waco rijo ni: Ka witieko ketho gicen adec maber mere loyo, nyaka to m'odoŋ ibino tero ri Jolevi paka olemo ma kapiedhirok, ranyak ma kabiyo vini.
Winyalo camo i kabedo moro je, win kodi jopeco mewin; rupiri obedo cul ri tic ma witimo i Wema ma romo.
Wik'obedi joreco ro gime, ka witieko miyo adec maber loyo. To wikiri wikoci mic maleŋ pa Joisiraili, winyalo tho.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa kodi Aron ka waco ni:
Me a cik ma or ma Rwoth owodho: Waci win ri Joisiraili jowokeli riwin roya dhiaŋ ma bu ŋolo, mafodi k'okethi kwoŋe majogi.
Jobino miyo Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam. Ibino wodho woko ma kambi t'iyaŋo ka go neno.
Kenyo Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo remo mere adec gi lwet cinge to kiro dibirio yuthenge ma ruwaŋ Wema ma romo.
Kenyo ibino waŋo roya dhiaŋ ruwaŋ Eliazar; pien mere, riŋo mere, remo mere, gi woyo mere.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam bino kwanyo yen ma yath sida, cangwe, lwodo m'obokere, to bolo jo i mac ma roya dhiaŋ waŋ'iye.
Kenyo jacway ri Were i wi migam bino lwoko nangin pere to lwoko delkwoŋe gi pi, aka rumacen go nyalo bino i kambi; to jacway ri Were i wi migam bino doŋ makoc tundo othieno.
Nyatoro ma waŋo roya dhiaŋ bende bino lwoko nangin pere gi pi to lwoko delkwoŋe gi pi; go bino doŋ makoc tundo othieno.
Kenyo nyatoro m'olony bino coko buru ma roya, to konjo woko ma kambi kam'olony; aka ibino kano jo ri kweth pa Joisiraili paka pi ma lonyirok. Obedo mic ma cwako reco.
Nyatoro ma coko buru ma roya dhiaŋ bino lwoko nangin pere to bedo makoc tundo othieno.
Ŋat'ogey delkwoŋ ŋat'otho moro je bino bedo makoc ma ndelo abirio.
Go lalwokere i ndelo mar'adek kodi i ndelo mar'abirio to bedo m'olony; to ka k'olwokere i ndelo mar'adek kodi mar'abirio, go kilalony.

Nyatoro m'ogey delkwoŋ jatho, delkwoŋ dhano moro je m'otho, to bedo ma k'olwokere, go loko tabenakulo pa Rwoth makoc; aka nger ŋato ibino poko go kwoŋ ji ma Isiraili. Paka pi ma cwako reco k'okir kwoŋ jo, jodoŋ ma jokoc; koco pajo fodi nitie kwoŋ jo.
Me a or ka dhano otho i Wema: Kisi dhano m'obin i Wema, kodi kisi dhano manitie i Wema, bino bedo makoc ma ndelo abirio.
Aka kisi atewe je m'ongoye giculo dhoke koc.
Nyatoro manitie i ndelo m'ogey ŋat'oneki, kosa coko pa dhano, kosa kaliel, bino bedo makoc ma ndelo abirio.
Ri gigipiny makoc, ibino kwanyo buru moro adec ma mic ma cwako reco, t'ikonjo gi pi mamol iy'atawo.
Kenyo ŋat'olony bino kwanyo cangwe, to lutho i pi, to kiro i wi Wema kwoŋ gigipiny ma ot, kwoŋ ji m'oyido jonitie kenyo, kodi kwoŋ ŋatimoro je m'ogeyo coko, ŋat'oneko, delkwoŋ ŋat'otho, kosa kaliel.

Ŋat'olony bino kiro pi kwoŋ jomakoc i ndelo mar'adek kodi i ndelo mar'abirio, ameno go cwako reco pajo i ndelo mar'abirio. Kenyo jo bende jobino lwoko nangin pajo to jolwokere, aka othieno jobino bedo m'olony.
Ŋatimoro makoc to kwero lokirok m'olony, nger jono ibino poko jo woko kwoŋ cokirok, rupiri jotieko koco Kabedo Maleŋ pa Rwoth. Paka pi ma cwako reco fodi k'okir kwoŋ jo, jokoc.
Bino bedo cik ma cil gi cil rijo. Nyatoro ma kiro pi ma cwako reco bino lwoko nangin pere, aka ŋatimoro m'ogey pi ma cwako reco bino bedo makoc tundo othieno.
Kisi gimoro ma ŋata koc ogey bino bedo makoc, aka ŋat'ogey gino bino bedo makoc tundo othieno.
Joisiraili, kweth gibe, jotundo i thim ma Zin i dwe marapena, to ji jodoŋ i Kades. Miriam otho kenyo, t'iyiko kenyo.
Ji jodhaw gi Musa to jowaco ni, “Bedi cango watho ndelo ma wade mawan jotho ruwaŋ Rwoth!
Raŋo ikelo kweth pa Rwoth i thim me ma miyo wan kodi mwendi mawan tho ka?
Raŋo iwodho wan woko ma Misir, t'ikelo wan kama rac me? Obedo kama nyingi kodhi, olemo, vini, kosa pomo jongoy'iye; kiri pi amadha je ongoye.”
Kenyo Musa kodi Aron jocore gicen kwoŋ kweth i dhiot ma Wema ma romo; jopodho gi nyim jo, to dwoŋ pa Rwoth menyere rijo.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Kwany luth, aka icoki kweth, in kodi omin in Aron, aka wiluw gi tele ka joneno wonyul pi mere. Ameno apaka ilakelo pi wok i tele rijo; ameno apaka wilamiyo gir'amadha ri kweth ji kodi ri mwendi pajo.
Ameno Musa okwanyo luth wok ruwaŋ Rwoth, paka oyido Rwoth otieko miyo go or.
Musa kodi Aron jocoko cokirok kanyacel ruwaŋ tele, to waco rijo ni, “Winji win, jogwenyirok me, wakel riwin pi wok i tele?”
Kenyo to Musa tiŋo cinge malo to goyo tele dirio gi luth pere; to pi wok kweth, to kweth gi mwendi pajo jomadho.
To Rwoth waco ri Musa kodi Aron ni, “Rupiri wikiketho geno mewin kwoŋan, ma nyutho leŋo paran ruwaŋ ji ma Isiraili, riameno ik'okeli cokirok me i piny m'atieko miyo jo.”
Oyido obedo pi ma Meriba, kama ji ma Isiraili jodhaw'iye gi Rwoth, kodi kama go bende onyutho gine leŋo pere i dier jo.
Musa odhiro jomikwenda wok Kades bongi kere ma Edom. Jowaco ni, “Omin in Isiraili waco ama: Iŋeyo litho je ma watieko romo gine.
Paka kwarere mawan jokidho yupiny Misir, to wabedo Misir ma hongo malac; to Jomisir jodiyo wan gi kwarere mawan;
aka munyo waywak ri Rwoth, go owinjo dwondi wan, to dhiro malaika to fudho wan woko ma Misir; aka onyo ee wanitie ka i Kades, tindi madwoŋ ma thengi adec perin.

Onyo mondo yey wan waluw i piny perin. Wak'oluw i ndelo kosa i ndelo vini, kosa wak'omadhi pi ma jwom moro je, walakadho gi royo pa kere madwoŋ, ma wakiwire yuracuc kosa yuracam cuka wanocow ŋado adec perin.”
To Joedom jowaco rigo ni, “Ik'oluwi, kosa walabino g'abor to wamonjin.”
To Joisiraili jowaco rigo ni, “Walabedo i ngudo madwoŋ; aka ka wanomadhi pi perin, wan kodi mwendi mawan, walaculo gimoro. Obedo nyaka gimathin; yey wan nyaka waŋadi atiendi.”
To go dwoko ni, “Wik'oluw.” To Joedom joay kwoŋ jo gi jolweny madwoŋ, gi gilweny kidhur.
Ameno apaka Joedom jokwero miyo Joisiraili kaluwo iy'adec pajo; onyo to Joisiraili joluwo gi kaman.
Kweth gibe ma Isiraili joweyo Kades to jotundo i Got Hor,
i kew kodi Edom. Kenyo to Rwoth waco ri Aron kodi Musa ni,
Aron kikidhi donjo i piny ma cango aciko miyo Isiraili; go kidho tho, rupiri wigwenyere kwoŋ or paran i Meriba.
Ter Aron kodi wode Eliazar wi got Hor,
aka kenyo iluny woko law pa Aron ma tic paka jacway ri Were i wi migam aka ikethi kwoŋ Eliazar. Aron kidho tho kenyo.
Musa otimo gima Rwoth owaco rigo. Jokadho wi Got Hor munyo kweth gibe neno.
Musa olunyo woko law pa Aron ma tic paka jacway ri Were i wi migam to ketho kwoŋ Eliazar. Kenyo wi Got Aron otho, to Musa kodi Eliazar joloro piny.
Kweth gibe to joŋeyo ni Aron otho, to joywako go ma ndelo piero adek.
Munyo Jakanan, kere ma Aradi, ma bedo yupiny ma Kanan, owinjo nike Joisiraili oyido jobino gi i royo ma Atharim, go olwenyo gi jo to tero megi paka jotwec.
Joisiraili jokwoŋere ri Rwoth ka jowaco ni, “K'adieri inomiy ji me i cingi wan, walareyo woko jo kicutho kanyacel gi tindin pajo madongo.”
Rwoth owinjo dwondi Joisiraili, to miyo Jokanan i cingi Joisiraili ma joreyo woko jo kicutho kanyacel gi tindin pajo madongo. Ameno olwoŋi kabedo no ni Horima.
Joisiraili joluwere marac kwoŋ Were kodi Musa ka jopenjo ni, “Raŋo wiwodho wan wok i Misir, kelo wan tho ka i thim kama cemo kodi pi ongoy'iye, aka wadak cemo masisiri me.”
Rwoth odhiro thwole ma jokwir i dier Joisiraili ma jokayo ji, ŋey Joisiraili kweth jotho.
Joisiraili jobino bongi Musa to jowaco rigo ni, “Watieko timo reco gi luwirok kwoŋ Rwoth kodin. Onyo kway Rwoth wokwany woko thwole kwoŋ wan.” Ameno Musa okwayo ri ji.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Tim thwol ma nyweny manitie gi kwir, t'iŋawo wi yath, aka kisi ŋata thwol okay to ŋiyo bino kwo.”
Ameno Musa otimo thwol ma ywel, to ketho wi yath, aka kisi ka thwol okayo dhano, ŋato ŋiyo thwol ma ywel to kwo.
Joisiraili joay kenyo, to joketho kambi i Oboth.
Jowok Obothi aka joketho kambi i Lye Abarim i thim mager gi Mowab yuwok ceŋ.
Wok kenyo jokadho to joketho kambi i milelo ma Zered.
Wok kenyo jokadho to joketho kambi i thenge ca ma Arinon manitie i thim ma wok i kew pa Joamor, kole Arinon obedo kew pa Mowab, i dier Jomowab kodi Joamor.
Riameno ondikere i Kitawo ma Lweny pa Rwoth ni,
“Tindi Waheb i Sufa kodi milelin,
Malawa Arinon,
kodi kamaloro ma milelin,
ma core kiri i tindi Ar,
tundo yu kew ma Mowab.”
Wok kenyo jomedere kiri i Ber, i jwom ma Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Coki ji kanyacel ŋey anyal miyo jo pi.”
Kenyo Joisiraili jowero wer me:
Waŋ pi nywol pi,
aka walawero wer.
Waŋ pi ma jotel ama jokunyo,
waŋ pi ma jodhum pa ji ama jokunyo,
gi ludhe ma dhum, kodi ludhe pajo.
Jokowere wok i thim kidho Matana.
Wok i Matana jokadho i Nahaliel, aka wok i Nahaliel jokadho i Bamoth.
Wok i Bamoth jokadho kiri i milelo manitie iy'adec ma Mowab wi got Pisiga ma ŋiyo abar.
Kenyo Joisiraili jooro jomikwenda bongi Kere Sihon pa Joamor, ka jowaco ni
“Weyi waluw i piny perin, wakilarwayo i ndelin kosa i ndelin ma vini. Wakilamadho pi ma waŋ pi moro je, walaluwo i royo pa kere cuka wanotiek kalo adec perin.”
To Sihon k'onyalo yeyo Joisiraili luwo iy'adec pere. Sihon ocoko ji pere je kanyacel to kadho romo gi Joisiraili i thim. Sihon obino i Yahaz lweny gi Joisiraili.
Joisiraili joneko jo, aka jomayo Sihon lowo pere wok i Arinon tundo i Yabok, bor kiri Amon, kole kew pa Joamon oyido ikuro matek.
Joisiraili jotero tindin me je, aka jobedo i tindin pa Joamor, i Hesibon kodi i calin mere je.
Ato Hesibon oyido obedo tindi madwoŋ pa Kere Sihon pa Joamor, macon mere olwenyo gi kere ma Mowab to mako lowo pere je tundo kiri Arinon.
Riameno jonyangeda jowero ni,
“Biye i Hesibon, tindi madwoŋ pa Sihon,
weyi wogeti kendo,
wok i tindi madwoŋ pa Sihon.
Oreyo woko Ar kodi Mowab,
aka omwonyo woko ji ma jobedo kam'oŋawere pa Arinon.
Kidamba rin, Awi Mowab!
Witieko rere woko, Awi ji ma Kemos!
Go otieko loko wote jowiloka,
kodi nyir pere jotwec
ri Sihon, kere pa Joamor.
Watieko celo jo g'aserin, to jorere woko
wok i Hesibon tundo kiri i Dibon,
wok i Nofa tundo kiri i Medeba.”
Ameno Joisiraili jobedo i lowo pa Joamor.
Musa ooro cwo neno nger maber ma monjo tindi madwoŋ Yazer. Joisiraili jomako calin mere, to joriemo woko Joamor m'oyido jobedo kenyo.
Joisiraili jowire to jokadho yu royo ma kadho Basan, aka Kere Og ma Basan kodi ji pere je jowok lweny gi Joisiraili i Edirey.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Ikir'ilwor go; kole atieko miyo go i cingin kanyacel gi ji pere je. Tim rigo paka itimo Kere Sihon pa Joamor, m'oyido dhumo i Hesibon.”
Ameno Joisiraili joneko Kere Og, wote kanyacel gi ji pere je, cuka ongoye ŋat'oboth, aka jotero lowo pere.
Joisiraili joay, aka joketho kambi i thim ma Mowab i thenge ma yuwok ceŋ ma Yordan ma ŋiyere gi Yeriko.
Onyo Balak wod pa Zipor oneno kisi gimoro ma Joisiraili jotimo ri Joamor.
Mowab obwok swa ri Joisiraili, aka oyido opoŋ gi lworo madwoŋ swa ri Joisiraili.
Jomowab jowaco ri jodongo ma Midian ni, “Jome jolanaŋo woko kisi gim'othoko wan, paka dhiaŋ naŋo woko lum i samba.” Onyo Balak wod pa Zipor am'oyido obedo kere ma Mowab i hongo no.
Balak ooro wolwoŋi Balam wod pa Bewor i Pethor, manitie i Yufrete, i lowo pa Amaw ka waco ni, “Nono moro obino wok i Misir, aka ji mere joywore kisi kamoro i lowo, aka jobedo cegin kodan.
Riameno, mondo biye lam ran ji me, paka jotek loyan, poyi alanyalo kikengila jo t'ariemo woko jo i lowo. Kole an aŋeyo nike ŋat'imiyo silwany bedo jasilwany, aka ŋat'ikwoŋo bedo ŋat'olam.”
Ameno jodongo ma Mowab kodi jodongo ma Midian joay gi pesa ma thieth i cingi jo, aka jobino bongi Balam to jowaco rigo mikwenda pa Balak.
Balam odwoko jo ni, “Nindi win ka wor me, aka dikin, alamiyo win radwok paka Rwoth owaci ran.” Ameno jodongo ma Mowab jodoŋ bongi Balam.
Were obino bongi Balam, aka openjo go ni, “Me cwo mene ma jonitie bongin?”
Balam odwoko Were ni, “Balak wod pa Zipor kere ma Mowab ooro jo bongan ka waco ni,
‘Nitie ka ji ma jobino wok i Misir, aka joywore kisi kamoro i lowo. Onyo biye ikwoŋ ran jo, poyi alanyalo lweny gi jo t'ariemo woko jo.’ ”
Were owaco ri Balam ni, “Ikiripi kadho gi jo, aka ikir'ikwoŋ jono, kole jobedo josilwany.”
Ameno Balam ocew odikin aka owaco ri jodongo ma Mowab ni, “Gik win i piny mewin, kole Rwoth k'oyeyan kadho gi win.”
Ameno jodongo ma Mowab joay to jogik bongi Balak to jowaco rigo ni, “Balam okwero dwoko gi wan.”
Balak ooro kendo jodongo kweth aka m'iworo loyo.
Jobino bongi Balam to jowaco rigo ni, “Me apaka Balak wod pa Zipor waco, ‘Mondo ikir'iyey gimoro wogeŋin bino bongan,
adieri alamiyin kemba madwoŋ, aka alatimo gim'inowaci ran je. Biye kwoŋ ran ji me.’ ”

Balam odwoko ka waco ri ŋecin pa Balak ni, “Makada nende oyido Balak miyan ot pere m'opoŋ gi feza gi zahabu, oyido akinyali timo gima kalo ma dhok Rwoth Were paran otieko waco, timo gimathin kosa madwoŋ.
Onyo mondo doŋ win ka wor me, paka jonica jotimo, ŋey anyal ŋeyo giman ma Rwoth nyalo waco ran.”
Wor no Were obino bongi Balam to waco rigo ni, “K'inen cwo me jobino lwoŋin, ay ikadhi gi jo, to nyaka wac m'anowaci rin, meno am'inotim.”
Ameno Balam oay odikin, otweyo punde pere, to kadho gi jodongo ma Mowab.
Nge pa Were oliel kwoŋbedo Balam oyido kadho, aka malaika pa Rwoth ocungo i royo paka jakwor pa Balam. Onyo Balam oyido gweyo punda gi ŋecin pere ario.
Munyo punda oneno malaika ocungo i royo, g'abor i cinge, punda orwayo wok i royo to rwayo i dudi. Balam ogoyo punda wodwoki i royo.
Kenyo malaika pa Rwoth ocungo i royo madiny i dier ndelin vini, gi kor ot i kisi thenge.
Munyo punda oneno malaika pa Rwoth, oroc kwoŋ kor ot, to diyo tiendi Balam kwoŋ kor ot; aka Balam ogoyo punda kendo.
Malaika pa Rwoth okadho yuwiye, to cungo kamadiny, m'ongoye kaluwo i kisi thenge racuc kodi racam.
Munyo punda oneno malaika pa Rwoth, onindo piny i ŋangi Balam. Balam omako nge, to goyo punda gi luth pere.
Kenyo Rwoth oyawo dhok punda to penjo Balam ni, “Aŋo m'atimo rin, m'igoyan didek me je?”
Balam odwoko punda ni, “Kwoŋbedo itieko miŋan! Aka ka bedi oyido anitie g'abor i cingan, dinyo anekin pama me!”
Punda owaco ri Balam ni, “Akibedo punda perin, m'itieko gweyo i kwo perin je tundo konon? Amaro terin ama?”
Balam odwoko ni, “Be.”
Kenyo Rwoth oyawo waŋ Balam to neno malaika pa Rwoth ocungo i royo, g'abor i cinge, aka Balam okule piny, to podho gi nyime.
Malaika openjo Balam ni, “Raŋo igoyo punda perin didek me je? Atieko bino paka jakwor, kwoŋbedo yo perin okom ruwaŋan.
Punda onenan, aka owire kwoŋan didek. Kabedi k'owire kwoŋan, adieri pama dinyo anekin t'aweyo punda wokwo.”
Kenyo Balam owaco ri malaika pa Rwoth ni, “Atieko timo reco, kole oyido akiŋeyo nike oyido icungo i royo geŋan. Onyo riameno, k'inen k'osangala in, aladok peco.”
Malaika pa Rwoth odwoko Balam ni, “Kadhi gi cwo no, to luw nyaka gim'anowaci rin.” Ameno Balam omedere gi jodhum pa Balak.
Munyo Balak owinjo nike Balam obino, owok romo gi go i Ar, tindi madwoŋ i malawa Arinon i kew gi Mowab.
Balak openjo Balam ni, “Raŋo ikibino munyo alwoŋin marapena? Oyido iparo nike akinyal miyin kemba?”
Balam odwoko Balak ni, “Atieko bino bongin pama, to anitie kune gi meni ma waco kada gimoro? Wac ma Rwoth okethi i dhokan, meno ama alawaco.”
Ameno Balam okadho gi Balak, to jotundo i Kiriath Huzoth,
kama Balak othum'iye dhiaŋ kodi rombo to miyo riŋo ri Balam kodi jodongo m'oyido jonitie gi go.
Yawere mere odikin Balak otero Balam to kelo go malo i Bamoth Bal, kama Balam oyido nyalo neno adec moro pa Joisiraili.
Balam owaco ri Balak ni, “Geti ran ka, migame abirio, aka iyiki thwondhe abirio kodi wot rombo abirio.”
Balak otimo paka Balam owaco; aka Balak kodi Balam jomiyo thwon kodi wod rombo i wi kisi migam.
Balam owaco ri Balak ni, “Cungi cegin gi mic perin awaŋa, kareno akadho poyi Rwoth laromo kodan. To wac moro je ma Rwoth onyuthan, meno ama alawaco rin.” Ameno Balam okadho kamabor ye.
Were oromo gi Balam, aka Balam owaco rigo ni, “Atieko geto migame abirio, t'amiyo i wi kisi migam thwon kodi wod rombo.”
Rwoth oketho wac i dhok Balam, aka owaco rigo ni, “Gik bongi Balak, aka me a gim'iripo waco.”
Ameno Balam ogik bongi Balak, m'oyido ocungo cegin gi mic pere awaŋa kanyacel gi jodhum je ma Mowab.
Balam otuco wac Were ka waco ni,
Wok i Aram, Balak otelan,
kere ma Mowab wok i got ma yuwok ceŋ.
Biye, kwoŋ ran Yakobo,
biye kwedi ran Isiraili!
T'anokwoŋ nedi ŋata Were fodi k'okwoŋo?
Anokwedi nedi, ŋata Rwoth fodi k'okwedo?
Aneno go gi wi telin,
aka aŋiyo go gi wi tendere.
Nono ma jobedo kakendi jo,
aka jokikwanere i dier nonin man!
Ŋa m'otieko kwano fukefuke pa Yakobo,
aka ŋa m'oŋeyo welo pa Isiraili?
Weyi atho, tho pa ji ma jotire,
aka weyi gike paran wobedi paka apere!
Balak owaco ri Balam ni, “Aŋo m'itimo ran? Akelin ka lamo jokwor paran, t'onyo itieko miyo jo silwany adieri.”
Balam odwoko ni, “Gima Rwoth okethi i dhokan, kende ama aladewo waco.”
Balak owaco ri Balam ni, “Biye kodan i kabedo man, kam'inyalo neno nyaka adec pajo, kam'ikilaneno joje, aka ikwoŋ ran jo gi kenyo.”
Balak otero Balam i ndelo ma Zofim wi got Pisiga. Kenyo bende go ogeto migame abirio, to miyo mic i wi kisi migam ma thwon kodi wod rombo.
Balam owaco ri Balak ni, “Cungi cegin gi mic perin awaŋa, kareno aromo gi Rwoth kaca.”
Rwoth oromo gi Balam, to ketho wac i dhoke to waco rigo ni, “Gik bongi Balak, aka me a gim'iwaci.”
Balam ogik bongi Balak, kama go oyido ocung'iye cegin gi mic pere awaŋa kanyacel gi jodhum je ma Mowab. Balak openjo Balam ni, “Aŋo ma Rwoth owaco?”
Kenyo Balam otuco wac Were me:
Ay, Awi Balak, aka winji,
ciki ithin ran Awi wod pa Zipor.
Were k'obedo dhano, ma go nyalo twodo,
kosa wod dhano, ma go owir paro pere.
Ka go otieko waco, kilatimo?
Ka go otieko luwo, kilaketho i kare?
Neni, atieko limo or ma miyo silwany,
go otieko miyo silwany, aka akinyali wiro.
Go fodi k'oneno silwany marac kwoŋ Yakobo,
kosa teko i Isiraili.
Rwoth Were pajo nitie gi jo,
Jotuco nike Rwoth obedo Kere pajo.
Were, m'owodho jo wok i Misir,
cale tungi merikwa mager rijo.
Adieri ongoye yido ma mako Yakobo,
ongoye thieth kwoŋ Isiraili.
Onyo pama ji jolawaco kwoŋ Yakobo kodi Isiraili,
neni, gima Were otieko timo!
Neni, nono ma ay paka simbwor madhako,
tiŋere malo paka simbwor!
Kinindi piny cuka otieko camo gim'omako,
to madho remo mere.
Balak owaco ri Balam ni, “Ikir'ikwoŋ jo kosa imiy jo silwany.”
To Balam odwoko to waco ri Balak ni, “Akiwaco rin nike gima Rwoth owaci je, abino timo.”
Balak owaco ri Balam ni, “Mondo biye, weyi aterin i kabedo man, poyi lakisangala Were t'ikwoŋo ran jo gi kenyo.”
Ameno Balak otero Balam wi got Pewor ma ŋiyo thim.
Balam owaco ri Balak ni, “Geti ran migame abirio ka aka ikeli ran thwondhe abirio kodi wot rombo abirio.”
Balak otimo paka Balam owaco rigo, aka omiyo mic ma thwon kodi wod rombo i wi kisi migam.
Balam oŋico nike oyido ber ruwaŋ Rwoth miyo Isiraili silwany. Riameno rume go k'okidho romo gi Rwoth, to owiro waŋe to ŋiyo yuthim.
Balam oŋiyo malo to neno Isiraili joketho kambi pajo, nono gi nono. Kenyo cuny pa Were obino kwoŋ Balam,
aka otuco wac Were me:
Me wac pa Balam wod pa Bewor,
wac Were pa jacwo ma waŋe neno maber swa.
Me wac pa ŋata winjo wac pa Were,
ŋata neno menyirok pa Jameni je,
ma podho piny, to kareno waŋe oyawere.
Wemin pa Isiraili ber ba,
kabedo mewin, Awi Isiraili!
Joyare paka jangi thith,
paka ndelin i thengi malawa,
paka alovera ma Rwoth opidho,
kosa yen sida i thengi pi.
Pi lamol wok iy'agwatin pere,
kere pere labedo madwoŋ loyo Agag,
aka ker pere latiŋere malo.
Were m'owodho go wok i Misir,
cale tungi merikwa mager rigo;
go lareyo woko nonin ma jobedo jokwor pajo
aka go laturo woko cokin pajo.
Go lacelo jo g'aserin pere.
kosa paka simbwor madhako, ŋa manyalo cewo go?
Silwany ri jono ma jomiyin silwany,
aka kwoŋ ri jono ma jokwoŋin.
Kenyo nge pa Balak oliel kwoŋ Balam aka omino adol cinge. Balak owaco ri Balam ni, “Alwoŋin ka lamo jokwor paran, t'itieko miyo jo silwany adieri didek me je.
Riameno kadhi, dok peco! Oyido awaco miyin kemba madwoŋ, to Rwoth ogeŋin limo.”
Balam odwoko Balak ni, “Akiwaco ri jomikwenda perin m'ioro bongan ni,
‘Makada nende Balak omiyan ot pere m'opoŋ feza gi zahabu, oyido akinyali foco dhok Rwoth, timo bero kosa raco i mito paran won. Gima Rwoth owaci, meno am'alawaco.
Onyo pama an adoki bongi ji paran. To weyi kutho amiyin rieko gima ji me jolatimo ri ji perin i hongo ma bino.’ ”
Balam otuco wac Were me:
Me mikwenda pa Balam wod pa Bewor,
menyirok pa jacwo ma waŋe neno maber swa.
Me menyirok pa ŋata winjo wac pa Were,
aka oŋeyo rieko pa Jamalo Swa.
Ŋata neno menyirok pa Jameni je,
aka podho piny gi waŋe m'oyawere.
Aneno go, to ki pama,
aŋiyo go, to kinitie cegin,
micala lawok kwoŋ Yakobo,
kere lawok i Isiraili,
go lareyo woko sondin ma Mowab,
kodi adec pajo Seth.
Edom lalokere lim pajo,
Edom lalokere lim pa jokwor pere,
kareno Isiraili medere lokirok matek.
Nyatoro wok kwoŋ Yakobo ladhumo,
aka lareyo woko ji m'oyido joboth i tindi madwoŋ.
Balam oŋiyo Joamalek, aka otuco wac Were ka waco ni:
Amalek oyido obedo marapena kwoŋ nonin,
to gike pere obedo rerok.
Go oŋiyo Joken, aka otuco wac Were ka waco ni:
Kabedo perin okwe,
aka odin nitie i tele.
Kucel ilareyo woko Joken,
ka Asiria oter jo paka jotwec.
Balam otuco wac Were me kendo ka waco ni:
Kidamba, ŋa ma lakwo ka Were otim gime?
Jomonji jolacewere wok i Sipro,
jolamako Asiria kodi Eber,
to jo bende, jolarere kicutho.
Kenyo Balam oyikere to dok peco, aka Balak bende okadho i yo pere.
Joisiraili joketho kambi i Sitim, aka cwo jocako timo cot gi mon ma Mowab.
Mon me jolwoŋo jo i kalima ma cowirok pajo, aka Joisiraili jocamo to jolamo werin ma Mowab.
Ameno Joisiraili joriwere gi Bal ma Pewor, aka nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ jo.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Ter jotel pa Joisiraili je, aka ineki jo odieceŋ par, ŋey nge pa Rwoth wowire woko kwoŋ Isiraili.”
Musa owaco ri jodhum ma Isiraili ni, “Kisi dhano kwoŋ win ripo neko ji mewin je ma jotieko lamo Bal ma Pewor.”
Gikenyo won, Jaisiraili moro otero dhako Jamidian i wema pere munyo Musa kodi lwak pa Isiraili je joneno, kareno joywak ruwaŋ Wema ma Romo.
Munyo Finehas wod pa Eliazar, nyakwar Aron, jacway ri Were i wi migam oneno, oay malo to weyo lwak, g'abor i cinge.
Finehas oluwo Jaisiraili me kiri i wema pere, to ocwowo Jaisiraili kanyacel gi dhako Jamidian. I nger me thoyamo m'oyido reyo woko Joisiraili orumo.
To makada nende, ji m'oyido jotieko tho oyido joromo 24,000.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni,
“Finehas wod pa Eliazar, nyakwar Aron, otieko wiro woko keme paran kwoŋ Joisiraili gi nyutho nger miyirok no i dier jo i ka waŋan ŋey akireyo woko Joisiraili je i nyeko paran.
Riameno wac ni, ‘Atimo gi go cikirok ma siem.
Go kodi nyikway go je jolatic paka jocway ri Were i wi migam cil gi cil; kwoŋbedo go onyutho miyirok ri Were pere, to kelo cwak ri reco pa Isiraili.’ ”
Nyingi Jaisiraili m'oneki kanyacel gi dhako Jamidian, oyido ilwoŋo Zimiri wod pa Salu, jatel nono i nono pa Simeo.
Nyingi dhako Jamidian m'oneki oyido ilwoŋo ni Kozibi, nyar Zur, m'oyido obedo jatel nono i Midian.
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ama:
Ter Jomidian paka jokwor, aka ikengila jo.
Kole jotieko tero win paka jokwor gi twodo pajo ma jowondo gine win i gima mako kwoŋ Pewor kodi Kozibi, nyar jatel ma Midian, nyamin jo; m'oneki i ndelo ma thoyamo m'owok i Pewor.
“Kwan win lwak pa Isiraili je, cwo cako i oro piero ario kadho malo, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, kisi jacwo i Isiraili manyalo kadho i lweny.”
Musa kodi Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam joluwo gi jo kam'othangere ma Mowab i thengi Yordan tirtir gi Yeriko, ka jowaco ni,
“Kwan win cwo, wok i oro piero ario kadho malo paka Rwoth owodho or ri Musa.”
Me Joisiraili ma jowok i lowo ma Misir.
Wok i nono pa Ruben, okayo pa Yakobo, wok i peco pa Hanok, peco pa Palu,
peco pa Heziron kodi peco pa Karim;
cwo m'okwan je joromo 43,730.
Palu obedo ba Eliab.
Eliab obedo ba Nemuel, Dathan kodi Abiram. Dathan kodi Abiram jobedo ji acel ca ma ji joyero, ma jogwenyere kwoŋ Musa kodi Aron kanyacel gi Kora, munyo jogwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth.
I hongo no ama piny oyawere to mwonyo woko jo kanyacel gi Kora, munyo jotho, munyo mac oreyo woko cwo 250 paka gir'anena ri Joisiraili.
To wot Kora jok'otho.
Wok i nono pa Simeo, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Nemuel, peco pa Yamin, peco pa Yakin,
peco pa Zera, peco pa Saulo,
cwo m'okwan joromo 22,200.
Wok i nono pa Gad, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo; peco pa Zefon, peco pa Hagi, peco pa Suni,
peco pa Ozini, peco pa Eri,
peco pa Arodi kodi peco pa Areli,
cwo m'okwan joromo 40,500.
Wot Yuda jobedo Eri kodi Onan ma jotho i piny ma Kanan.
Nyikway Yuda cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo jobedo, peco pa Sela, peco pa Perez kodi peco pa Zera.
Me nyikway Perez, peco pa Heziron kodi peco pa Hamul.
Cwo m'okwan wok i nono pa Yuda joromo 76,500.
Wok i nono pa Isakar cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Tola, peco pa Puwa,
peco pa Yasub kodi peco pa Simiron.
Cwo m'okwan wok i nono pa Isakar joromo 64,300.
Wok i nono pa Zebulun cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Sered, peco pa Elon kodi peco pa Yalal.
Wok i nono pa Zebulun, cwo m'okwan joromo 60,500.
Wok i nono pa Yozefu, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Manase kodi peco pa Efrayim.
Wok kwoŋ nyikway Manase, peco pa Makir ba Giliad kodi peco pa Giliad.
Wok kwoŋ nyikway Giliad, peco pa Lezer, peco pa Helek,
peco pa Asiriel, peco pa Sekem,
peco pa Semida kodi peco pa Hefer.
Onyo Zelofehad wod pa Hefer oyido ongoye gi wote, go oyido nitie gi nyithindho manyir. Jobedo Mala, Nowa, Hogla, Milika kodi Tiriza.
Wok i nono pa Manase, cwo m'okwan joromo 52,700.
Wok i nono pa Efrayim cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Suthela, peco pa Beker kodi peco pa Tahan.
Nyikway Suthela jobedo peco pa Eran.
Wok i nono pa Efrayim cwo m'okwan joromo 32,500. Me jobedo nyikway Yozefu.
Wok i nono pa Benyamin cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Bela, peco pa Asibel, peco pa Ahiram,
peco pa Sefufam, kodi peco pa Hufam.
Nyikway Bela jobedo peco pa Arid kodi peco pa Naman.
Wok i nono pa Benyamin cwo m'okwan joromo 45,600.
Wok i nono pa Dan cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Suham.
Wok i nono pa Dan cwo m'okwan joromo 64,400.
Wok i nono pa Aser cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Imina, peco pa Isivi kodi peco pa Beria.
Nyikway Beria jobedo peco pa Heber kodi peco pa Malikiel.
Nyingi nyar Aser oyido ilwoŋo ni Sera.
Wok i nono pa Aser cwo m'okwan joromo 53,400.
Wok i nono pa Nafital cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, peco pa Yazel, peco pa Guni,
peco pa Yezer kodi peco pa Silam.
Wok i nono pa Nafital cwo m'okwan joromo 45,400.
Me welo pa cwo Isiraili m'okwan je, aka joromo 601,730.
“Pok lowo ri nonin cungo kwoŋ welo pajo.
Miy adec madwoŋ ri nono madwoŋ, aka imiy adec mathin ri nono mathin. Kisi nono ripo limo adec ma ripo gi welo mere.
T'iripo poko lowo gi bolo kwir, cungo kwoŋ nyingi nono.
Ilapoko lowo gi bolo kwir i dier nono madwoŋ kodi mathin.”
Nono pa Jolevi jobedo pecin pa Gerisom, Kohath kodi Merari.
Nyikway jo jobedo pecin pa Libini, Hebron, Mali, Musi kodi Kora. Kohath obedo ba Amram.
Cipa Amram oyido Yokebed nyar Levi, m'onywol i Misir. Yokebed onywolo ri Amram Aron, Musa kodi nyamin jo Miriam.
Wot Aron jobedo Nadab, Abihu, Eliazar kodi Ithamar.
Nadab kodi Abihu jotho munyo jomiyo cowirok ma kiripi ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Nyithindho ma cwo wok i dwe acel kadho malo ma k'okwan jo kanyacel gi Joisiraili oyido joromo 23,000 aka k'opoki jo lim i Isiraili.
Me nonin ma Musa kodi Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam jokwano munyo jokwano Joisiraili kam'othangere ma Mowab i thengi Yordan tirtir gi Yeriko
Ongoye jacwo ma k'okwan kwoŋ cwo ma Musa kodi Aron oyido jotieko kwano marapena i thim ma Sinai.
Rwoth oyido otieko waco kwoŋ jo ni, “Joripo tho i thim ma Sinai.” Ongoye kwoŋ jo m'oboth kwanyo woko Kaleb wod pa Yefune kodi Yosuwa wod pa Nun.
Nyir pa Zelofehad, Mala, Nowa, Hogla, Milika kodi Tiriza jonyuthere. Zelofehad oyido obedo wod pa Hefer, wod pa Giliad, wod pa Makir, wod pa Manase, wod pa Yozefu, janono pa Manase.
Jocungo ruwaŋ Musa, Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam, jotel, kodi Lwak je ruwaŋ Wema ma romo, aka jowaco ni,
“Bawan otho i thim, go oyido k'obedo acel kwoŋ jono ma jocokere kanyacel kwoŋ Rwoth, gi Kora. To go otho ro reco pere won, aka oyido ongoye gi wote.
Raŋo nyingi bawan worere woko i nono pere kwoŋbedo go oyido ongoye gi wote? Miy wan win lim i dier wutmin bawan.”
Musa okelo wac me ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Nyir pa Zelofehad jotire i gima jowaco. Iripo adieri miyo jo lim i dier wutmin bajo aka imiy jo lim pa bajo.
Iripo bende waco ri Joisiraili ni, “Ka jacwo otho, aka ongoye gi wote, iripo miyo lim pere ri nyir pere.
Ka go ongoye gi nyithindho manyir, iripo miyo lim pere ri wutmin go.
Ka go ongoye gi wutmin, iripo miyo lim pere ri wutmin ba go.
Ka ba go oyido ongoye gi wutmin, iripo miyo lim pere ri wat macegin i nono wolunji paka lim pere.” Me labedo ri Joisiraili paka cik kodi or, paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
K'itieko neno ilatho, paka omin in Aron,
kwoŋbedo wigwenyere kwoŋ wac paran i thim ma Zin munyo lwak jodhaw kodan. Ikinyutho leŋo paran ruwaŋ jo i pi.” (Me pi manitie i Meriba Kades i thim ma Zin.)
Musa okwayo Rwoth ka waco ni,
“Weyi Rwoth, Were ma won kwo, woyeri dhano telo ji.
Dhano ma latelo yuwaŋ jo, ma lawodho jo woko, ŋey ji pa Rwoth jokiri jowocale rombo ma bu jakwath.”
Miy go cungo ruwaŋ Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi lwak je, aka imiy go or lunjin ruwaŋ jo.
Miy go dwoŋ perin moro, ŋey lwak pa Isiraili je jowowinji go.
Go lagoŋere kwoŋ Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam, ma lamiyo go ŋeyo mito paran gi Urim ruwaŋ Rwoth. I nger me Eliazar latelo Yosuwa kodi lwak pa Isiraili i kisi gimoro.”
Musa otimo paka Rwoth omiyo go or. Go otero Yosuwa to miyo go cungo ruwaŋ Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi lwak pa ji je.
Musa oketho cinge i wi Yosuwa to miyo go or lunjo go paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni,
“Wodhi or ri Joisiraili, aka iwaci rijo ni joripo miyan mic paran ma cemo m'owaŋ gi mac, ma ŋwece kur mere mit i hongo ma ripo.”
Waci rijo ni me mic ma cemo m'owaŋ gi mac ma joripo miyo Rwoth. Wot rombo ario ma jo oro acel ma jongoye gi ŋolo paka mic ma kisi ndelo.
Wod rombo acel wilamiyo odikin, aka man mere wilamiyo othieno.
Wiripo bende miyo kilo acel ma moko, m'onywow gi lita acel ma mo oliv.
Me mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo, m'iwaŋo gikululu, m'ocaki miyo gi got Sinai paka mic ma cemo, ma ŋwece kur mere sangala Rwoth.
Mic ma vini m'iripo miyo gi wod rombo marapena ripo bedo lita acel, m'iripo konjo i Kabedo Maleŋ ri Rwoth.
Wod rombo man iripo miyo othieno gi mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini paka m'odikin. Wiripo miyo paka mic awaŋa, ma ŋwece kur mere sangala Rwoth.
I ndelo ma sabato wiripo miyo wot rombo ario ma jo oro acel ma jongoye gi ŋolo, kilo ario ma moko m'onywow gi mo oliv paka mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini.
Me mic awaŋa ri kisi ndelo ma sabato, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kanyacel gi mic ma vini mere.
Kisi ka dwe manyen cako, wiripo miyo Rwoth mic awaŋa ma rwath ario, wod rombo acel, kodi wot rombo abirio ma jo oro acel ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Wiripo bende miyo paka mic ma cemo moko m'onywow gi mo oliv ri kisi rwath, kilo adek ma moko, ri wod rombo kilo ario ma moko,
aka ri kisi nyathi rombo ma jaoro acel, kilo acel ma moko. Mic awaŋa me obedo mic ma cemo, ma ŋwece kur mere sangala Rwoth.
Mic ma vini labedo lita ario ri kisi rwath, lita acel g'adec ri wod rombo, kodi lita acel ri kisi wod rombo ma jaoro acel. Me cik ri mic awaŋa ri kisi ndelo marapena ma dwe ma oro gipi.
Wiripo bende miyo wod diel ri Rwoth paka mic ma cwako reco medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma vini mere.
K'apar g'abic ma dwe ripo bedo kalima ma tero ndelo abirio ma wiripo camo mugat ma buthow.
I ndelo marapena ma kalima wiripo cokere kanyacel lamo, aka wikiripi timo tic.
Wiripo miyo mic awaŋa paka mic ma cemo ri Rwoth. Rwath ario, wod rombo kodi wot rombo abirio ma jo oro acel. Neni win nike jongoye gi ŋolo.
Mic ma cemo labedo moko m'onywow gi mo oliv. Kilo adek ri kisi rwath, kilo ario ri wod rombo,
kodi kilo acel ri kisi wod rombo ma jaoro acel.
Wiripo bende miyo wod diel acel paka mic ma cwako reco, ma cwako reco pa ji.
Wiripo miyo gigipiny me medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo odikin
I nger acel wiripo miyo Rwoth mic ma cemo kisi ndelo, ma ndelo abirio, ma ŋwece kur mere sangala go. Wimiy gime medo kwoŋ mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma vini.
I ndelo mar'abirio, wiripo cokere kanyacel lamo, aka wikiripi timo tic.
Wiripo miyo Rwoth mic awaŋa, ma ŋwece kur mere sangala go. Rwath ario, wod rombo kodi wot rombo abirio ma jo oro acel.
Mic ma cemo mere ripo bedo moko m'onywow gi mo oliv, kilo adek ri kisi rwath, kilo ario ri wod rombo,
kodi kilo acel ri kisi wod rombo ma jaoro acel.
Wiripo bende miyo wod diel paka mic ma cwako reco, ma cwako reco pa ji.
Wiripo miyo gigipiny me kodi mic ma vini medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo. Joripo bedo ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
K'acel ma dwe mar'abirio wiripo bedo gi cokirok lamo. Wikiripi timo tic mewin; obedo ndelo ma kudho gwarin.
Wiripo miyo cowirok ma mic awaŋa, maŋwe kur ri Rwoth. Rwath acel, wod rombo acel, kodi wot rombo abirio ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Mic ma cemo ripo bedo moko m'onywow gi mo oliv. Kilo adek ma moko ri rwath, kilo ario ma moko ri wod rombo,
kodi kilo acel ma moko ri kisi wot rombo abirio.
Wiripo miyo bende wod diel ri mic ma cwako reco ma cwako reco mewin.

Miy win mic me medo i wi mic awaŋa ma dwe manyen kodi mic ma cemo mere, kanyacel gi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini, cungo kwoŋ kwer pajo. Jobedo mic awaŋa gi mac ma ŋwece kur mere sangala Rwoth.
Wiripo miyo Rwoth mic awaŋa ma ŋwece kur mere sangala go. Rwath acel, wod rombo acel, kodi wot rombo abirio ma jo oro acel ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Wiripo miyo gi mic ma cemo ma moko m'onuŋere m'onywow gi mo oliv. Moko kilo adek ri rwath, moko kilo ario ri wod rombo,
kodi moko kilo acel ri kisi wot rombo.
Wiripo bende miyo wod diel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi diel m'imiyo i kwer ma cwako reco pa ji, kanyacel gi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
Wiripo miyo mic awaŋa gi mac maŋwe kur ri Rwoth. Rwath apar g'adek, wot rombo ario, wot rombo ma jo oro acel apar g'aŋwen ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Wiripo miyo gi mic ma cemo ma moko m'onuŋere m'onywow gi mo oliv. Moko kilo adek ri kisi rwath, kilo ario ri kisi wod rombo,
kodi moko kilo acel ri kisi wot rombo.
Wiripo bende miyo wod diel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo, kanyacel gi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
I ndelo mar'ario miy win rwath apar g'ario, wot rombo ario kodi wot rombo apar g'aŋwen ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Miy win mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini ri rwath apar g'ario, wot rombo kodi nyithindhi rombo cungo kwoŋ welo pajo.
Miy win bende wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
I ndelo mar'adek miy win rwath apar g'acel, wot rombo ario kodi nyithindhi rombo apar g'aŋwen ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Miy win mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini ri rwath apar g'acel, wot rombo kodi nyithindhi rombo cungo kwoŋ welo pajo.
Miy win bende wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
I ndelo mar'aŋwen miy win rwath apar, wot rombo ario kodi nyithindhi rombo apar g'aŋwen ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Miy win mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini ri rwath apar, wot rombo kodi nyithindhi rombo cungo kwoŋ welo pajo.
Miy win bende wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
I ndelo mar'abic miy win rwath abuŋwen, wot rombo ario kodi nyithindhi rombo apar g'aŋwen ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Miy win mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini ri rwath abuŋwen, wot rombo kodi nyithindhi rombo cungo kwoŋ welo pajo.
Miy win bende wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
I ndelo mar'aucel miy win rwath aboro, wot rombo ario kodi nyithindhi rombo apar g'aŋwen ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Miy win mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini ri rwath aboro, wot rombo kodi nyithindhi rombo cungo kwoŋ welo pajo.
Miy win bende wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
I ndelo mar'abirio miy win rwath abirio, wot rombo ario kodi nyithindhi rombo apar g'aŋwen ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Miy win mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini ri rwath abirio, wot rombo kodi nyithindhi rombo cungo kwoŋ welo pajo.
Miy win bende wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
I ndelo mar'aboro wiripo bedo gi cokirok lamo aka wikiripi timo tic.
Wiripo miyo mic awaŋa gi mac ma ŋwece kur ma sangala Rwoth. Rwath acel, wod rombo kodi nyithindhi rombo abirio ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Miy win mic ma cemo kodi mic ma vini ri rwath, wod rombo kodi nyithindhi rombo cungo kwoŋ welo pajo.
Miy win bende wod diel acel ri mic ma cwako reco, medo i wi mic awaŋa ma kisi ndelo kodi mic ma cemo mere kodi mic ma vini.
Wiripo miyo Rwoth mic me i kalimin mewin, medo i wi mic mewin ma wiciko kodi ma win wegi wimiyo, paka mic awaŋa mewin, mic ma cemo mewin, mic ma vini mewin kodi mic ma siem mewin.
Musa owaco ri Joisiraili kisi gimoro paka Rwoth omiyo go or.
Musa owaco ri jotel nonin ma Isiraili ni: Me apaka Rwoth owodho or.
Ka jacwo otimo cikirok ri Rwoth, kosa okwoŋere gi ciko gimoro, go kiripi turo wac pere. Go ripo timo gima go ociko gi dhoke je.
ka bamere owinjo cikirok pere kosa kwoŋirok pere, to ngoye gima bamere owaco rigo, meno cikirok kodi kwoŋirok pere je cungo.
To ka bamere okwero i hongo ma go owinj'iye, ongoye cikirok pere kosa kwoŋirok pere ma lacungo, aka Rwoth lacwako rigo kwoŋbedo bamere okwero rigo.
To ka dhako onywomere munyo go otieko timo cikirok ma go oŋeyo kosa oluwere kicar gi dhoke,
ka cwore owinji to ngoye gima go owaco i hongo ma go owinj'iye, meno cikirok kodi kwoŋirok no cungo.
To ka cwore owinji to kwero rigo i hongo ma cwore owinj'iye, meno cikirok ma dhako no otimo kodi wac ma go oluwo kicar no kicungi, aka Rwoth lacwako rigo.
To cikirok moro je ma citho kosa dhako m'oeye otimo lacungo.
Ka go otimo cikirok no kosa okwoŋere i ot pa cwore,
aka cwore owinjo to ngoye gima go owaco rigo meno cikirok pere kodi kwoŋirok pere cungo.
To ka cwore oyido okwero rigo i hongo ma go owinj'iye, meno kisi gima go owaco gi dhoke i cikirok kodi i kwoŋirok pere kicungi. Cwore otieko kwero rigo, aka Rwoth lacwako rigo.
Cikirok moro je kosa kwoŋirok moro je ma dhako timo, cwore nyalo yeyo kosa nyalo kwero.
To k'ongoye gima cwore owaco rigo i hongo ma go owinj'iye, meno dhako no ripo timo cikirok je kodi kwoŋirok je ma go otimo. Cwore otieko ridho cikirok no munyo go k'okwero.
To ka cwore okwer rumacen ma hongo moro, meno cwore ama labedo gi banja ka dhako no owey ma k'otimo gima go ociko.
Me cik ma Rwoth owodho or kwoŋe ri Musa ma mako kwoŋ jacwo kodi dhako pere, kodi nyako kodi bamere ka go fodi thin aka nitie i ot pa bamere.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
Cul kwor ri Joisiraili kwoŋ Jomidian, aka rumacen icoki ji kanyacel.
Musa owaco ri ji ni, “Yer win cwo ma jolweny, ŋey jowomonji Jomidian nyalo culo kwor pa Rwoth kwoŋ Midian.
Wilayero cwo gana acel wok i kisi nono ma Isiraili kadho lweny.
Ameno joyero cwo gana acel wok i kis nono, aka kanyacel cwo gana apar g'ario joyikere lweny.
Musa ooro jo lweny kanyacel gi Finehas wod pa Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam, g'atewe ma Ot pa Were kodi gwarin ma kudho i cinge.
Jolwenyo gi Midian, paka Rwoth oyido owodho or ri Musa, aka joneko kisi jacwo.
Joneko kerin ma Midian abic, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur kodi Reba medo i wi joman ma joneko; to joneko bende Balam wod pa Bewor g'abor.
Joisiraili jomako mon ma Midian kodi nyithindho pajo paka jotwec, jonyaga dhok pajo je, mwendi pajo, kodi gigipiny pajo je.
Jowaŋo woko tindin pajo je m'oyido jobed'iye kodi kambi je.
To jotero gigipiny pajo ma jomako kanyacel gi jotwec kodi ogwaŋe je.
Kenyo jokelo jotwec je kodi gigipiny ma jonyaga ri Musa, Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi lwak pa Isiraili i kambi i kam'obipere ma Mowab i thengi Yordan i Yeriko.”
Musa, Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotel pa lwak jowok romo gi jolweny woko ma kambi.
Musa omako nge gi jotel pa jolweny, jomituka ma ganin kodi jomituka ma miyin m'oyido jodwoko wok i lweny.
Musa openjo jo ni, “Wiweyo mon je doŋ ma jokwo?
Mon me, ma Balam omiyo jo rieko, jomiyo Joisiraili timo maker kwoŋ Rwoth i wac ma mako kwoŋ Pewor, ŋey thoyamo opodho kwoŋ ji pa Rwoth.
Onyo riameno, neki win nyithindho mayac je i dier jo kodi mon je ma jotieko nindo gi jacwo.
To nyir mambula wey win jo makwo riwin.
Bedi win woko ma kambi ma ndelo abirio, kisi ŋat'oneko dhano moro je kosa omako delkwoŋ gim'otho, jowolonyere kodi jotwec mewin i ndelo mar'adek kodi i ndelo mar'abirio.
Wiripo lonyo law je, kisi gim'otim gi pien je, kisi gim'otim gi yer diel, kodi kisi gim'otim gi mbawo.”
Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam owaco ri ji m'oyido jowok i lweny ni, “Me fonji ma cik ma Rwoth owodho or ri Musa kwoŋe.
Zahabu, feza, ywel, cuma, nyweny kodi waya,
kisi gima kinyal waŋ i mac, iripo rewo i mac aka labedo m'olony. T'iripo bende lwoko gi pi, aka kisi gima nyalo waŋ i mac, ilalwoko gi pi.
Wiripo lwoko nangin mewin i ndelo mar'abirio, aka wilabedo m'olony, rumacen to widwoko i kambi.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni,
In kodi Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotel ma nonin wiripo kwano gigipiny m'onyaga, ji kodi ogwaŋe je.
Pok win gigipiny kadirio, i dier ji ma jowok lweny kodi lwak je.
Wok kwoŋ migew pa jolweny ma jowok lweny, kethi gicen misolo ri Rwoth, acel wok kwoŋ kisi gigipiny miya abic, obedi dhano, dhok, punde, rombo kosa diegi.
Kwany kwoŋ adec pajo aka imiy Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam paka mic ri Rwoth.
Kwany wok kwoŋ adec pa Joisiraili acel kwoŋ kisi piero abic, obedi ji, dhok, punde, rombo kosa diegi; wok kwoŋ ogwaŋe je aka imiy Jolevi ma jokuro Wema pa Rwoth.
Kenyo Musa kodi Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam jotimo paka Rwoth owodho or ri Musa.
Gigipiny m'odoŋ wok kwoŋ gigipiny ma jolweny jonyaga oyido romo rombo 675,000
dhok 72,000
punde 61,000
kodi nyir ma fodi jokuya cwo 32,000.
Migew pa jolweny m'oyido jowok i lweny obedo, rombo kodi diegi 337,500
aka misolo pa Rwoth oyido obedo rombo kodi diegi 675.
Dhok oyido obedo 36,000 aka misolo pa Rwoth oyido obedo dhok piero abirio g'ario.
Punde oyido obedo 30,500 aka misolo pa Rwoth oyido obedo punde piero aucel g'acel.
Ji oyido obedo 16,000 aka misolo pa Rwoth oyido obedo piero adek g'acel.
Ameno omiyo Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam misolo paka mic ri Rwoth cungo kwoŋ or ma Rwoth owodho ri Musa.
Migew pa ji ma Musa opoko kwoŋ migew pa jolweny oyido obedo,
rombo kodi diegi 337,500
dhok 36,000
punde 30,500
kodi ji 16,000.
Wok kwoŋ migew pa Joisiraili Musa okwanyo acel kwoŋ kisi piero abic, ma ji kodi ogwaŋe, aka omiyo Jolevi m'oyido jokuro Wema pa Rwoth, cungo kwoŋ or ma Rwoth owodho ri Musa.
Kenyo jotel jolweny m'oyido jotelo jolweny, jomituka ma ganin kodi jomituka ma miyin, jobino bongi Musa,
aka jowaco rigo ni, “Watieko kwano jolweny je m'oyido watelo, aka ongoye kada ŋat'acel kwoŋ wan m'ongoye.
Watieko kelo mic pa Rwoth ma kisi dhano kwoŋ wan onwaŋo, gigipiny ma zahabu, pogo kodi atege, petin, milomin kodi tikin, paka mic ma cul mawan ruwaŋ Rwoth.”
Musa kodi Eliazar jojolo zahabu wok bongi jo, je i cal ma gigipiny m'ocwey.
Zahabu je ma jomiyo paka mic ri Rwoth, wok bongi jomituka ma ganin kodi jomituka ma miyin oyido romo kilo 200.
Jolweny wegi oyido jotieko kwanyo gigipiny ma jonyaga.
Musa kodi Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam jojolo zahabu wok bongi jomituka ma ganin kodi jomituka ma miyin, aka jokelo i Wema ma Romo paka rapoy ri Joisiraili ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Nonin pa Ruben kodi Gad oyido jonitie gi dhok kweth. Munyo joneno nike lowo ma Yazer kodi lowo ma Giliad oyido obedo kabedo maber ri dhok,
joluwo gi Musa kodi Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotel pa ji ka jowaco ni:
“Ataroth, Dibon, Yazer, Nimra, Hesibon, Eliale, Sebam, Nebo kodi Beyon,
lowo ma Rwoth omako ruwaŋ lwak pa Isiraili obedo lowo ma kwath ri dhok aka ŋecin perin jonitie gi dhok.
K'inen watieko nwaŋo wor ruwaŋin, weyi womiy lowo me ri ŋecin perin ri lim; ikir'iwey waŋadi Yordan.”
Musa odwoko jonono pa Ruben kodi Gad ni, “Wutmin win jolakadho lweny kareno win wibedo ka?
Raŋo wiladwoyo cuny Joisiraili kwoŋ kadho i lowo ma Rwoth otieko miyo jo?
Bacere mewin jotimo gime munyo aoro jo wok i Kades Barineya kidho neno lowo.
Munyo jokadho malo i milelo ma Esikol to joneno lowo, jodwoyo cuny Joisiraili kadho i lowo ma Rwoth oyido omiyo jo.
Nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ jo i ndelo no aka Rwoth okwoŋere ka waco ni,
‘Adieri ongoye jacwo ma jaoro piero kadho malo m'owok i Misir ma laneno lowo m'akwoŋere miyo ri Abraham, ri Isaka kodi ri Yakobo, kwoŋbedo jok'oluwan ma jocowere.
Ongoye kwoŋ jo, kende nyaka Kaleb wod pa Yefune janono pa Ken kodi Yosuwa wod pa Nun, kwoŋbedo jotieko luwo Rwoth ma jocowere.’
Nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ Isiraili, aka omiyo jo kilera i thim ma oro piero aŋwen, cuka luse je m'oyido jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth jorumo.
Onyo win pama, luse pa joreco, witieko ay i kabedo pa bacere mewin, medo nge pa Rwoth malieth kwoŋ Isiraili!
Ka wiwire kwoŋ luwo go, go kendo lajwango jo i thim, aka lareyo woko ji me je.”
Jobino bongi Musa aka jowaco ni, “Walageto kigo ri mwendi mawan kodi tindin ri nyithindho mawan.
To walatiŋo gilweny to watelo yuwaŋ Joisiraili, cuka wakelo jo kama jolabed'iye. To weyi nyithindho mawan jowodoŋ i tindin m'otinda me jowobedi ma bu teko kwoŋ ji ma lowo me.
Wakiladok pecin mawan cuka Joisiraili jotiek limo lim pajo.
