Wakilalunjo gi jo lim i thengi Yordan ma koca kodi kalo Yordan, kwoŋbedo watieko limo lim mawan yuwok ceŋ ma Yordan.”
Musa odwoko jo ni, “Ka witimo gime adieri, ka witiŋo gilweny telo lweny ruwaŋ Rwoth,
aka winoŋadi Yordan gi lweny ruwaŋ Rwoth, cuka go otiek riemo woko jokwor pere ruwaŋe,
aka omaki lowo ruwaŋ Rwoth, kenyo winyalo dwoko kwoŋbedo meno witieko timo tic mewin ri Rwoth kodi Joisiraili, aka lowo me labedo lim mewin ruwaŋ Rwoth.
To ka wikitimo gime, meno witieko timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth, aka ŋey win nike reco mewin laromo gi win.
Geti win tindin ri nyithindho mewin, kodi kigo ri mwendi mewin, to, tim win gima witieko ciko.”
Kenyo jonono pa Ruben kodi Gad jowaco ri Musa ni, “Ŋecin perin jolatimo paka rwoth mawan wodho or.
Nyithindho mawan, mon mawan, mwendi mawan kodi ogwaŋe mawan je joladoŋ kenyo i tindin ma Giliad,
to ŋecin perin jolaŋado, kisi dhano gi gilweny kadho lweny ri Rwoth, paka rwoth mawan wodho or.”

Musa owaco rijo ni, “Ka jonono pa Ruben kodi Gad, kisi dhano otiŋ gilweny kadho lweny ruwaŋ Rwoth, to joŋado Yordan kanyacel gi win, to wimako lowo ma ruwaŋ win, kenyo wilamiyo jo lowo ma Giliad paka lim pajo.
To ka jokilatiŋo gilweny ŋado gi win, jolalunjo gi win lowo ma Kanan.”
Nyikway Gad kodi Ruben jodwoko ni, “Paka Rwoth otieko luwo ri ŋecin perin, ameno apaka walatimo.
Walaŋado gi gilweny ruwaŋ Rwoth i lowo ma Kanan, to lim mawan ma walalunjo labedo gi wan i thenge me ma Yordan.”
Musa omiyo jonono pa Gad kodi nono pa Ruben kodi adec nono pa Manase wod pa Yozefu, ker pa Sihon kere ma Amor kodi ker pa Og kere ma Basan, lowo kodi tindin mere, g'adec ma tindin m'othoko.
Jonono pa Gad jogeto kendo tindin ma Dibon, Ataroth Arower,
Atiroth Sofan, Yazer, Yogibeha,
Beth Nimra, Beth Haran,, tindin madongo m'otinda kodi kigo ri mwendi.
Jonono pa Ruben jogeto kendo Hesibon, Eliale, Kiriathayim,
Nebo kodi Bal Meyon (nyingi jo me jowiro) kodi Sibima. Jomiyo tindin me nyingi jo man.
Nyikway wod pa Manase jokadho i Giliad, jomako aka joriemo woko Joamor m'oyido jobedo kenyo.
Musa omiyo Giliad ri Makir wod pa Manase aka go ogeto kenyo.
Yayir nyakwar Manase okadho to mako calin mere aka omiyo jo nyingi jo man ni Hawoth Yayir.
Noba okadho to mako Kenath kodi calin mere, aka olwoŋo gi nyingi go ni Noba.
Me apaka Joisiraili jowok i piny ma Misir i can ma lweny i tel pa Musa kodi Aron.
Musa ondiko kama joay iye gine, i woth theketheke pajo, paka Rwoth owodho or ri Musa, aka me apaka jowotho.
Joay gi Rameses k'apar g'abic ma dwe marapena. I ndelo m'oluwo kalima ma Kadho Joisiraili joay gi miseni ruwaŋ Jomisir,
kareno Jomisir joyiko okayin pajo je, ma Rwoth oyido oneko i dier jo. Rwoth othumo banja kiri ri werin pajo.
Joisiraili joay Rameses aka joketho kambi i Sukoth.
Jowok Sukoth, aka joketho kambi i Etham, manitie i gike ma thim.
Jowok Etham, to jowire gik i Pihahiroth, m'otitere gi Balzefon, aka joketho kambi i Migdol.
Jowok i Pihahiroth, joluwo gi Nam M'obokere kiri i thim. Jowotho ma ndelo adek i thim ma Etham, aka joketho kambi i Mara.
Wok i Mara jobino i Elim, aka i Elim oyido nitie waŋ pi apar g'ario kodi yen thith piero abirio, aka joketho kambi kenyo.
Jowok i Elim to joketho kambi i thengi Nam M'obokere.
Jowok i Nam M'obokere aka joketho kambi i thim ma Sin.
Jowok i thim ma Sin aka joketho kambi i Dofika.
Jowok i Dofika aka joketho kambi i Alus.
Jowok i Alus to joketho kambi i Refidim, kam'oyido ongoye pi amadha ri ji.
Jowok i Refidim to joketho kambi i thim ma Sinai.
Jowok i thim ma Sinai to joketho kambi i Kibroth Hatava.
Jowok i Kibroth Hatava to joketho kambi i Hazeroth.
Jowok i Hazeroth to joketho kambi i Rithma.
Jowok i Rithma to joketho kambi i Rimon Perez.
Jowok i Rimon Perez to joketho kambi i Libina.
Jowok i Libina to joketho kambi i Risa.
Jowok i Risa to joketho kambi i Kehelatha.
Jowok i Kehelatha to joketho kambi i Got Sefer.
Jowok i Got Sefer to joketho kambi i Harada.
Jowok i Harada to joketho kambi i Makeloth.
Jowok i Makeloth to joketho kambi i Tahath.
Jowok i Tahath to joketho kambi i Tera.
Jowok i Tera to joketho kambi i Mithka.
Jowok i Mithka to joketho kambi i Hasmona.
Jowok i Hasmona to joketho kambi i Moseroth.
Jowok i Moseroth to joketho kambi i Bene Yakan.
Jowok i Bene Yakan to joketho kambi i Hor Hagidad.
Jowok i Hor Hagidad to joketho kambi i Yotbatha.
Jowok i Yotbatha to joketho kambi i Abirona.
Jowok i Abirona to joketho kambi i Eziongeber.
Jowok i Eziongeber to joketho kambi i thim ma Zin meno Kades.
Jowok i Kades aka joketho kambi i Edom.
Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam oidho wi Got Hor i or pa Rwoth to otho kenyo rumacen ma oro piero aŋwen wok cuka Joisiraili jowok i lowo ma Misir, k'acel ma dwe mar'abic.
Aron oyido jaoro 123 munyo tho wi Got Hor.
Kere ma Aradi Jakanan, m'oyido bedo yupiny ma lowo ma Kanan owinjo nike Joisiraili oyido jobino.
Joisiraili jowok i Got Hor to joketho kambi i Zalmona.
Jowok i Zalmona to joketho kambi i Punon.
Jowok i Punon to joketho kambi i Oboth.
Jowok i Oboth to joketho kambi i Iye Abarim, iy'adec ma Mowab.
Jowok i Iye Abarim to joketho kambi i Dibongad.
Jowok i Dibongad to joketho kambi i Almon Diblathayim.
Jowok i Almon Diblathayim to joketho kambi i gote ma Abarim, cegin gi Nebo.
Jowok i gote ma Abarim to joketho kambi i kam'obipere ma Mowab cegin gi Yordan i Yeriko
Joketho kambi cegin gi Yordan wok i Bethyesimoth tundo kiri Abel Sitim i kam'obipere ma Mowab.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa i kam'obipere ma Mowab i thengi Yordan i Yeriko ka waco ni:
“Luw gi Joisiraili, iwaci rijo ni, ka wiŋado Yordan donjo i lowo ma Kanan,
wiripo riemo woko ji je ma jobedo i lowo no ruwaŋ win, reyo woko cal pajo je ma telin kodi ma nyweny kodi kalamo pajo je manyakafir.
Wiripo mako lowo no to wibed'iye, kwoŋbedo atieko miyo win lunjo.

Wiripo poko lowo gigoyo kwir cungo kwoŋ nonin mewin. Nonin madongo jolalimo lim madwoŋ, aka nonin mathindho jolalimo lim mathin. Lim labedo apa nono ma kwir opodhi kwoŋe, cungo kwoŋ nonin pa kwarere mewin.
To ka wikiriemo woko ji ma jobedo i lowo no ruwaŋ win, jono ma winowey jo jolalokere riwin cowirok i waŋ win kodi kudhin i ŋeti win. Jolabedo riwin teko i lowo ma wikidho bed'iye.
Kenyo alatimo riwin paka aparo timo rijo.”
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ama:
Wodhi or ri Joisiraili, iwaci rijo nike ka widonjo i lowo ma Kanan, lowo ma labedo alunja mewin, me labedo kew mere.
Kew ma yupiny lawok i thim ma Zin i thengi Edom. Kew ma yupiny lacako i gike ma Nam M'otho, yuwok ceŋ.
Wok kenyo lawire yupiny ma milelo ma Akarabim, luwo i Zin, tundo kiri Kades Barineya. Kenyo lamedere yupiny ma yupodho ceŋ kiri Hazar Adar tundo kiri Azimon.
Kew lawire wok i Azimon tundo kiri i milelo ma Misir, aka lagik i Nam Madwoŋ.
Kew ma yupodho ceŋ labedo Nam Madwoŋ kodi thenge mere.
Kew ma yumalo lawok i Nam Madwoŋ, wilacero bol kiri i Got Hor.
Wok i Got Hor bol lamedere kiri Lebohamath to medere kiri i Zedad.
Kew lamedere kiri Zifron, aka gike mere labedo Hazar Enan.
Kew mewin ma yuwok ceŋ lawok Hazar Enan tundo kiri Sefam.
Kew lamedere piny wok i Sefam tundo kiri Ribila i thenge ma yuwok ceŋ ma Ayin, aka kew laloro piny, to tundo i thenge ma yumalo ma nam ma Kinereth.
Kew laloro piny kiri i Yordan aka gike mere labedo Nam M'otho. Me labedo kew ma lowo mewin thoko.
Musa owodho or ri Joisiraili ka waco ni: Me lowo ma wilalunjo gi bolo kwir, ma Rwoth otieko wodho or miyo ri nonin abuŋwen kodi nono adec.
Nono pa Ruben gi pecin pajo kodi nono pa Gad gi pecin pajo jotieko tero lim pajo kodi adec nono pa Manase.
Nonin ario no kodi adec nono no jotieko tero lim pajo kalo Yordan i Yeriko yuwok ceŋ.
Rwoth oluwo gi Musa ka waco ni:
Me a nyingi cwo ma jolapoko win lowo alunja; Eliazar kodi Yosuwa wod pa Nun.
Ilakwanyo jatel acel wok i kisi nono poko lowo m'ilalunjo.
Wok i nono pa Yuda, Kaleb wod pa Yefune.
Wok i nono pa Simeo, Semuel wod pa Amihud.
Wok i nono pa Benyamin, Elidad wod pa Kislon.
Wok i nono pa Dan, Buki wod pa Jogili.
Wok i nono pa nyikway Yozefu, nono pa Manase, Haniel wod pa Efod.
Wok i nono pa Efrayim, Kemuel wod pa Sifitan.
Wok i nono pa Zebulun, Elizafan wod pa Parnak.
Wok i nono pa Isakar Paltiel wod pa Azan.
Wok i nono pa Aser, Amihud wod pa Selmon.
Wok i nono pa Nafital, Pedahel wod pa Amihud.
Jome ama Rwoth owodho or poko lim ri Joisiraili i lowo ma Kanan.
Wodhi or ri Joisiraili miyo Jolevi tindin ma jolabed'iye wok i lim pajo. Iripo bende miyo jo lowo ma kwath m'othoko tindin.
Tindin labedo apa joma jolabed'iye, aka lowo ma kwath labedo ri dhok pajo, ri mwendi pajo kodi ri ogwaŋe pajo.
Lowo ma kwath, m'ilamiyo ri Jolevi, lawok yuwoko wok i kor tindi madwoŋ mita 450 i kisi thenge.
Ilakipima woko ma tindi madwoŋ mita 900 i kisi thenge, gi tindi madwoŋ i diere. Me labedo kakwath ri tindi pajo.
Ilamiyo Jolevi tindin aucel ma pondo kama dhano nyalo ring'iye ka oneko nyawote ma k'ogendera. Medo i wiye ilamiyo Jolevi tindin piero aŋwen g'ario.
Tindin m'ilamiyo Jolevi je ripo bedo piero aŋwen g'aboro, kiri gi lowo ma kwath pajo je.
K'imiyo Jolevi tindin wok i lim pa Joisiraili, wok i nonin madongo ilakwanyo mathoth, aka wok i nonin mathindho ilakwanyo manok, cungo kwoŋ dwoŋo ma adec mere rom.
Luw gi Joisiraili aka iwaci rijo ni, “Ka wiŋado malawa Yordan kadho i lowo ma Kanan,
wiripo yero tindin madongo paka kapondo mewin, ŋey ŋat'oneki nyawote ma k'oŋeyo nyalo ringo kenyo.
Tindin madongo no labedo riwin kapondo kwoŋ ŋata mito culo kwor, ŋey nyatoro m'oneko dhano wokiri wotho cuka iwinjo banja ruwaŋ Lwak.
Tindin madongo ma wilayero labedo aucel.
Wilayero tindin madongo adek kalo Yordan, kodi tindin madongo adek i lowo ma Kanan paka tindin madongo ma pondo.
Tindin madongo aucel me jolabedo paka kapondo ri Joisiraili kodi jopath je i dier win, ŋey nyatoro ma oneki dhano ma k'oŋeyo woringi kenyo.”
“To nyatoro m'ogoy nyawote gi cuma, to wok'iye tho, obedo janek aka iripo neko go.
Nyatoro m'ogoy nyawote gi tele i cinge manyalo kelo tho, aka owok'iye tho, obedo janek, aka iripo neko go.
Nyatoro m'ogoy nyawote gi mbawo manyalo kelo tho, aka owok'iye tho, obedo janek, aka iripo neko go.
Ŋata culo kwor ama ripo neko janek; ka joromo, to jaculi kwor neko janek.”
“I nger acel ka nyatoro odhiro nyawote ro dakirok, kosa okur nyawote to bolo kwoŋe gimoro. To wok'iye tho,
kosa ro kwor nyatoro ogoy nyawote g'adol cinge, to wok'iye tho, ŋat'owito adol obedo janek. Jaculi kwor ripo neko go ka joromo.”
“To ka nyatoro odhiro nyawote abwap m'ongoye kwor, kosa obol gimoro kwoŋe ma k'okuro go,
kosa ka oyido omako tele manyalo neko dhano, to bolo kwoŋ nyawote to wok'iye tho, makada nende oyido jok'obedo jokwor, aka atoŋa moro je oyido ongoye,
kenyo lwak ripo thumo banja i dier jaculi kwor kodi janek, cungo kwoŋ cik me.
Lwak ripo botho janek wok i cingi jaculi kwor to dhiro janek gik i tindin madongo ma pondo. Janek ripo bedo kenyo cuka jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam m'owir gi mo maleŋ otho.
To ka janek i hongo moro je owok woko ma kew ma tindi madwoŋ ma pondo,
aka jaculi kwor orom gi go to neko go, jaculi kwor kilabedo gi banja ma nek.
Janek ripo doŋ i tindi madwoŋ ma pondo cuka jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam otho. Rumacen ma tho pa jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, janek nyalo dok peco.
Me labedo cik riwin kodi nyikway win je i luse je kisi kama winobed'iye.”
Wikiripi jolo cul ri kwo pa janek m'iripo neko, janek iripo neko.
Wikiripi jolo cul ri ŋat'oringo i tindi madwoŋ ma pondo, yeyo janek dok peco mafodi jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam k'otho.
Wikiripi koco lowo ma wibed'iye, kole remo koco lowo, aka ongoye cul m'inyalo miyo ri lowo ri remo m'ooy'iye, kwanyowoko gi remo pa ŋat'oy'iye.
Wikiripi koco lowo ma wibed'iye, ma an bende abed'iye, kole an Rwoth abedo i dier Joisiraili.”
Jotel ma pecin ma nonin pa nyikway Giliad wod pa Makir aka nyakwar Manase, janono pa Yozefu, jowok to joluwo ruwaŋ Musa kodi jotel ma pecin ma Isiraili.
Jowaco ni, “Rwoth owodho or ri jadwoŋ mawan miyo Joisiraili lunjo lowo gi bolo kwir, aka Rwoth owodho or ri jadwoŋ mawan miyo gir'alunja p'omin wan Zelofehad ri nyiki go.
To ka jonywomere i nono ma Isiraili man, kenyo gir'alunja pajo ilakwanyo woko wok i gir'alunja pa kwarere pajo t'imedo i gir'alunja ma nono ma jonywomer'iye, aka alunja mawan lamojere.
Ka oro ma piero abic otundi, kenyo ilamedo gir'alunja pajo i nono ma jonywomer'iye, aka ilapoko woko kwoŋ gir'alunja ma nono pa kwarere mawan.”
Kenyo Musa owodho or ri Joisiraili cungo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth ka waco ni, “Nyikway Yozefu jotire i gima jowaco.
Me apaka Rwoth owodho or kwoŋ nyir pa Zelofehad, ‘Weyi jowonywomere gi ŋata joparo nike ber; kende joripo nywomirok i nono pa bajo.
I nger no wongoye gir'alunja pa Joisiraili m'ilakodo wok i nono man kadho i nono man. Kole Joisiraili je joripo doŋ gi gir'alunja ma nono pa kwarere pajo.
Kisi nyathi manyako m'olunji lim i nono moro je ma Isiraili ripo nywomere gi janono pa bamere, ŋey Joisiraili jowomedere lunjo lim ma nono pa kwarere pajo.
Ongoye lim m'ilakodo wok i nono man kadho i nono man. Kole kisi nono ma Isiraili ladoŋ gi lim pere won.’ ”
Nyir pa Zelofehad jotimo paka Rwoth owodho or ri Musa.
Mala, Tiriza, Hogla, Milika kodi Nowa, nyithindho pa Zelofehad jonywomere gi wot wutmin bajo.
Jonywomere i nonin pa nyikway Manase wod pa Yozefu, aka lim pajo odoŋ i nono pa bajo.
Me or kodi cik ma Rwoth owodho or luwo bongi Musa ri Joisiraili i kam'obipere ma Mowab i thengi malawa Yordan i Yeriko.
Me wac ma Musa oluwo ri Joisiraili je kalo Yordan i thim, kam'obipere m'oŋiyere gi Suf, i dier Paran kodi Tofel, Laban, Hazeroth, kodi Dizahab.
(Wok i Horeb tundo i Kades Barineya obedo woth ma ndelo apar g'acel, luwo gi royo ma Got Edom).
K'acel ma dwe mar'apar g'acel i oro ma piero aŋwen, Musa oluwo gi Joisiraili cungo kwoŋ or ma Rwoth omiyo go rijo.
Gime obedo rumacen munyo go otieko kikengila Kere Sihon pa Joamor, m'oyido dhumo i Hesibon, kodi Kere Og ma Basan m'oyido dhumo i Asiteroth kodi Edirey.
Kalo Yordan i lowo ma Mowab, Musa ocako fonjo cik me ka waco ama:
Rwoth Were mawan oluwo gi wan i Got Horeb ka waco ni, “Witieko bedo i got me ma hongo malac.

Wire win wimedere gi woth mewin, aka wikadhi i piny matendere pa Joamor kodi iy'adec mager i Araba, piny matendere, Sefela, yupiny, kodi i thengi nam. Lowo pa Jokanan, kodi i Lebanon, tundo kiri i malawa madwoŋ, Yufrete.
Neni atieko miyo win lowo ma ruwaŋ win, donji win aka wilunji lowo no, ma an Rwoth, aciko kwarere mewin: Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo, miyo jo kodi nyikway jo.”
Awaco riwin i hongo ca ni, neni, withoth, aka akinyali bielo wijoje.
Rwoth Were mewin otieko loko win mathoth, aka neni konon withoth paka micalin ma i polo.
Weyi Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin womedi welo mewin digana aka womiy win silwany paka ociko win.
T'anonyal nedi ciro peko ma teko ma banjin mewin kendan?
Yer win cwo ma joriek, ma jonitie gi niaŋ, aka joŋeyere i nonin mewin ŋey akethi jo bedo jotel mewin.
Widwokan ka wiwaco ni, “Wac perin m'iwaco riwan ber riwan.”
Ameno akwanyo cwo mariek, ma jonitie giŋeyo aka aketho jo bedo jotel mewin, paka jomituka ma ganin, miyin, piero abic, kodi apar i nonin mewin je.
Aka amiyo cik ri jothum banja mewin i hongo ca ni, “Winji win to withumo banjin gi tiro i dier dhano gi nyawote, obedi nike ji mewin kosa jopath ma jobedo i dier win.

Wikiripi bedo nyakucel i thumo banja; winji win jomathindho kodi jodongo i nger acel; aka wongoye ŋata wobwoki win, kole thumo banja obedo apa Were. Banja je matek riwin, keli win bongan, aka alawinjo.”
Amiyo win or i hongo ca gi gigipiny je ma wiripo timo.
Waay wok i Horeb to wakadho luwo gi royo ma thim madwoŋ aka ma kelo lworo ma wineno, i royo ma kadho i piny matendere pa Joamor paka Rwoth Were mawan omiyo wan or, cuka watundo i Kades Barineya.
Awaco riwin ni, “Witieko tundo i piny matendere pa Joamor ma Rwoth Were mawan miyo wan.
Neni, Rwoth Were mewin otieko ketho lowo me ruwaŋ win, kadhi win malo wilunji, paka Rwoth Were pa kwarere mewin ociko win, wikiri wilwor kosa wibwoki.”
Kenyo wijoje wicore cegin bongan aka wiwaco ni, “Weyi waori cwo yuwiy wan menyo lowo riwan aka jowokeli riwan radwok kwoŋ royo mene ma wiripo luwo kodi tindin madongo ma walakidh'iye.”
Luwo mewin ober ran, aka ayero cwo apar g'ario, acel wok i kisi nono.
Jowotho kadho malo i piny matendere, aka jotundo i milelo Esikol to jorango tiendi gigipiny nyaliŋliŋ.
Jofono olemo moro ma lowo, ma jokelo piny riwan. Jo bende jokelo riwan radwok ka jowaco ni, “Lowo ma Rwoth Were mawan miyo wan ber.”
Wiŋunyaŋunya i wemin mewin aka wiwaco ni, “Kwoŋbedo Rwoth odak wan, okelo wan wok i lowo ma Misir, miyo wan i cingi Joamor reyo woko wan.
Wanodonji kune? Wutmin wan jobwoko cuny wan gi waco nike ji ca jotek aka joboyo loyo wan, tindin madongo pajo otinda kiri malo i polo! Waneno nyikway Anakim kenyo.”
Awaco riwin ni, “Wikiri wibwok kosa wibedi gi lworo rijo.
Rwoth Were mewin, ma telo yuwiy win, ama lalwenyo riwin, paka otimo riwin i Misir ma wineno gi waŋ win,
kodi i thim, kama wineno paka Rwoth Were mewin otiŋo win paka dhano tiŋo nyathi pere, i royo je ma wiluw'iye cuka witundo i kabedo me.
To kucel, i gime je, wikinyalo bedo gi yeyo i Rwoth Were mewin,
go ma wotho yuwiy win, rango riwin kaketho kambi, i mac wor, kodi i pondeponde odieceŋ, nyutho win royo ma wiripo luwo.”
“Ongoye kwoŋ cwo me, luse pa ji mareco me ma laneno lowo maber m'aciko miyo kwarere mewin,
kwanyowoko, Kaleb wod pa Yefune. Go laneno, aka rigo kodi nyikwaye alamiyo lowo ma go otieko nyono gi tiende, kwoŋbedo owinjo Rwoth gi cunye je.”
Kwoŋbedo win, Rwoth omako kodan nge to waco ni, “Kiri gi in je, ikilatundo koro.
Yosuwa wod pa Nun, jakony perin, latundo koro. Miy go meni, kole go ama latelo Isiraili lunjo lowo no.
Paka ri nyithindho mewin, m'oyido wiparo nike ilakinyaga jo, jo ma konon jokuya gim'otire kodi gim'okom, ama joladonjo koro; alamiyo jo lowo no, aka jolalunjo.
To paka riwin, woth win wigik i thim, i royo ma Nam M'obokere.”

Widwokan ka wiwaco ran ni, “Watieko timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth! Walakadho malo lweny paka Rwoth Were mawan omiyo wan or.” Ameno wijoje witwere ma lweny, ka wiparo nike labedo mayot kadho malo monjo piny matendere.
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Waci rijo jokiri jowokadhi malo lweny, kole angoye i dier win; ka k'obedo ameno jokwor mewin jolakikengila win.”
Awaco riwin, to wikinyalo winjo. Wigwenyere kwoŋ or pa Rwoth aka wikadho malo i piny matendere gi mbaka mewin.
Joamor m'oyido jobedo i piny matendere jowok monjo win aka joriemo win paka kic timo. Jogoyo win kiri piny i Edom tundo kiri i Horima.
Munyo wigik to wiywak ruwaŋ Rwoth, Rwoth k'owinjo dwondi win kosa k'odewo be.
Widoŋ i Kades ma ndelo kweth paka witimo.
Kenyo Rwoth oluwo kodan ka waco ni:
“Witieko thoko piny matendere me m'oromo, wire win wikadhi yumalo,
aka miy ji or iwaci rijo ni, wicegin luwo iy'adec pa wade mewin, nyikway Esau, ma jobedo i Edom. Jolabedo gi bwok riwin, ameno wiripo gwokere swa,
cako lweny gi jo, kole akilamiyo win lowo pajo kada ma romo tiendi jo acel. Atieko miyo Esau Got Edom.
Wiripo nyewo cemo wok bongi jo gi feza, ŋey wicam, aka wiripo nyewo pi gi feza ŋey winyal madho.
Kole Rwoth Were mewin otieko miyo win silwany i kisi gima witimo je. Go oŋeyo woth mewin i thim madwoŋ me; aka oro piero aŋwen me Rwoth Were mewin obedo gi win m'ongoye gima wicando.”
Ameno wakalo wutmin wan, nyikway Esau ma jobedo i Edom, waweyo cen royo ma kadho i Araba, Elath kodi Eziongeber, aka wagiki yumalo luwo gi royo ma kadho i thim ma Mowab.
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Wikiri wikwiny Jomowab kosa wilweny gi jo, kole akilamiyo win lim pajo, ato atieko miyo Ar ri nyithindho pa Loti paka lim pajo.”
(Joemim, ji ma jothoth aka ma joboyo paka Joanakim oyido cango jobedo kenyo.
Paka Joanakim, jo bende oyido oŋey jo paka Jorefayim, Jomowab oyido jolwoŋo jo ni Joemim.
Kucel Johori am'oyido cango jobedo i Edom, to nyikway Esau joriemo woko jo, joreyo woko jo, to jobedo i lowo pajo, paka Joisiraili jotimo i lowo ma Rwoth omiyo jo lunjo.)
Onyo medere win wakal pi ma mol Zered. Ameno wamedere to wakalo pi ma mol Zered.
Hongo ma wacowo woth wok i Kades Barineya cuka wakalo pi ma mol Zered obedo oro piero adek g'aboro, cuka luse pa jolweny je orere woko wok i kambi paka Rwoth oyido okwoŋere ma mako jo.
Adieri, cingi Rwoth won oay kwoŋ jo, fudho woko jo wok i kambi, cuka joje jorere woko.
Tekin joje jotieko tho wok i dier ji,
Rwoth oluwo kodan ka waco ni:
“Konon wilaŋado kew pa Jomowab gi Ar.
Ka wicegin tundo i kew gi Joamon, wikiri wikwiny jo kosa wilweny gi jo, kole akilamiyo win lowo pajo paka lim mewin, kwoŋbedo atieko miyo ri nyikway Loti.”
(Meno bende itero paka lowo pa Jorefayim. Jorefayim cango oyido jobedo kenyo, makada nende Joamon jolwoŋo jo ni Zamzumim,
ji ma jotek aka jothoth, ma joboyo paka Joanakim. To Rwoth oreyo woko jo ruwaŋ Joamon ŋey jowonyal bedo i lowo pajo.
Rwoth otimo gimoro acel ri nyikway Esau, ma jobedo i Edom gi reyo woko Johori ruwaŋ jo ŋey jowonyal bedo i lowo pajo kiri konon.
Paka ri Joavim, m'oyido jobedo i calin tundo kiri Gaza, joma wok i Kirete joreyo woko jo to jobedo i lowo pajo.)
“Ay win wimedere gi woth wiŋadi milelo ma malawa Arinon. Neni, atieko ketho i cingi win Kere Sihon pa Joamor ma Hesibon kodi lowo pere. Cak win mako lowo pere gi lweny gi go.
Konon me acako ketho bwok kodi lworo kwoŋ nonin je ma jonitie i pendi polo ro win. Ka jowinji wac ma mako kwoŋ win, jolakirin to jobwok ro win.”
Aoro jomikwenda wok i thim ma Kedemoth bongi Kere Sihon ma Hesibon gi wac ma siem k'awaco ni:
“K'iyeyan luwo i lowo perin, alaluwo nyaka royo kende, m'akirwayo racuc kosa racam.
Ilakitana an cemo ma pesa, ŋey anyal cemo, kodi pi, ŋey anyal madho. Nyaka Yeyan aluw atiendi,
paka nyikway Esau ma jobedo i Edom kodi Jomowab ma jobedo i Ar jotimo ran cuka anoŋadi Yordan donjo i lowo ma Rwoth Were mawan miyo wan.”
To Kere Sihon ma Hesibon k'oyeyo wan luwo, kole Rwoth Were mewin otweyo adundo pere kodi cunye matek ŋey womiy go i cingi win, paka otieko timo pama.
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Neni, atieko cako miyo Sihon kodi lowo pere riwin. Cak win pama mako lowo pere.”
Ameno munyo Sihon owok kwoŋ wan, go kodi ji pere je lweny i Yahaz,
Rwoth Were mawan omiyo go i cingi wan, aka wafodo go piny, kiri gi nyikwaye kodi ji pere je.
I hongo no wamako tindin pere je, aka i kisi tindi wasika woko cwo, mon, kodi nyithindho. Ongoye ŋata waweyo m'obothi.
Nyaka ogwaŋe ama waweyo paka mawan, kiri gi gima wanyaga i tindin ma wamako.
Cako i Arower i gike ma milelo ma malawa Arinon (kiri gi tindi m'oyido nitie i wadi won) tundo kiri Giliad, ongoye tindi m'oyido nitie gi cel mabor riwan. Rwoth Were mawan omiyo wan gigipiny je.
To wikidonjo i lowo pa Joamon, kodi adec ma thengi malawa Yabok kiri gi tindin madongo i piny matendere, kodi kisi kama Rwoth Were mawan omiyo or ma geŋo wan donjo.
Wagiki to waluwo royo ma kadho i Basan, Kere Og ma Basan kodi ji pere jowok kwoŋ wan, lweny gi wan i Edirey.
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Ikir'ilwor go, kole atieko ketho go i cingin, kiri gi ji pere kodi lowo pere. Tim rigo paka itimo ri Kere Sihon pa Joamor, m'oyido dhumo i Hesibon.”
Ameno Rwoth Were mawan omiyo Kere Og ma Basan kodi ji pere je i cingi wan. Wafodo go piny cuka ongoye ŋat'obothi.
I hongo no wamako tindin madongo pere je, ongoye tindi madwoŋ ma wakimayo jo, je piero aucel, adec je ma Arigob, ker pa Og ma Basan.
Me je oyido tindin m'otinda gi cel m'oŋawere, waŋkace ario m'omakere, kodi cumin, medo i wi calin madongo.
Wareyo woko jo kicutho, paka watimo ri Kere Sihon ma Hesibon, i kisi tindi wareyo kicutho cwo, mon kodi nyithindho.
To ogwaŋe kodi gima wanyaga i tindin wakano paka mawan wegi.
Ameno i hongo no wamayo kerin ario pa Joamor lowo kalo Yordan, wok i milelo ma malawa Arinon kiri i Got Hamon.
(Ji ma Sidon jolwoŋo Hamon ni Sirion, aka Joamor jolwoŋo ni Senir.)
Tindin je ma kam'obipere, Giliad gibe, kodi Basan gibe, tundo kiri Salaka, kodi Edirey tindin ma ker pa Og i Basan.

(Onyo nyaka Kere Og ma Basan am'obothi kwoŋ Jorefayim. Adieri kitanda pere oyido obedo ma nyweny, aka fodi inyalo neno i Raba tindi madwoŋ pa Joamon. Boro mere obedo fut abuŋwen, aka laco mere obedo fut aŋwen.)
Lowo me, ma wamako i hongo no, amiyo jo ri nono pa Ruben kodi Gad adec ma yumalo ma Arower, manitie i gike ma milelo ma malawa Arinon, kiri g'adec ma piny matendere ma Giliad kodi tindin mere.
Amiyo adec nono pa Manase adec Giliad m'odoŋ kodi Basan gibe, ker pa Og. (Adec gibe ma Argob: Adec ma Basan no gibe oyido ilwoŋo ni lowo pa Jorefayim.
Yayir nyakwar Manase omako adec ma Argob gibe tundo kiri i kew ma Gesur kodi Makath, aka olwoŋo gi nyinge, meno Basan ni Havoth Yayir paka nitie kiri konon.)
Amiyo Giliad ri Makir.
Aka nono pa Ruben kodi Gad amiyo jo adec wok i Giliad tundo kiri i milelo ma malawa Arinon, gi dier milelo paka kew, kodi tundo kiri i malawa Yabok, gi milelo paka kew gi Joamon.
Amiyo jo bende Araba, Yordan kodi thenge mere, wok i Kinereth loro piny i nam ma Araba, Nam Cumbi gi tiendi Got Pisiga yuwok ceŋ.
Nyaka mon mewin, nyithindho, kodi ogwaŋe mewin, paka aŋeyo nike withoth g'ogwaŋe, ama jowodoŋ i tindin m'atieko miyo win;
Tundo kama Rwoth otiek miyo wade mewin kaywomirok paka win, to jo bende jomako lowo ma Rwoth Were miyo jo kalo Yordan, kenyo kisi dhano nyalo gik i lim pere m'atieko miyo win.”
Amiyo Yosuwa bende or i hongo no k'awaco ni, Waŋin otieko neno kisi gima Rwoth Were mewin otieko timo ri kerin ario me, ameno bende Rwoth latimo ri kerin je ma wicegin ŋado.
Ikir'ilwor jo, kole Rwoth Were mewin, lalwenyo riwin.
“Awi Rwoth Were, nyaka icako nyutho ŋeca perin dwoŋ perin kodi meni perin; were mene i polo kosa i piny m'anyalo timo tim ma meni paka aperin!
Weyi aŋadi anen lowo maber kalo Yordan, piny matendere maber no kodi Lebanon.”
To Rwoth oyido omako nge kodan kwoŋbedo win aka k'onyalo winjan. Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Ajok kodin! Ikir'iwaci ran wac me kendo!”
Idhi malo wilwindi Pisiga aka iŋiy yupodho ceŋ, yumalo, yupiny, kodi yuwok ceŋ. Ŋiy maber, kole ikilakalo Yordan me.
To miy Yosuwa or, miy go meni, aka iloki go matek, kwoŋbedo go ama latelo yuwiy ji me miyo jo lunjo lowo m'ilaneno.
Ameno wadoŋ i milelo m'oŋiyere gi Beth Pewor.
Onyo win, Isiraili, winji win, fonji kodi cik m'afonjo win me, kethi win i tim, ŋey winyal kwo, to widonjo lunjo lowo ma Rwoth Were pa kwarere mewin miyo win.
Wikiripi medo kosa kwanyo woko wac kwoŋ or m'amiyo win, to kur win or pa Rwoth Were mewin m'amiyo win.
Witieko neno gi waŋ win gima Rwoth otimo ro wac pa Bal Pewor, kole cwo je ma joluwo Bal Pewor, Rwoth Were mewin oreyo woko jo i dier win.
Aka win ma wicwire kwoŋ Rwoth Were mewin fodi wikwo konon me.
Neni, atieko fonjo win or kodi cik paka Rwoth Were paran omiyan or; ŋey winyal kuro i lowo ma wicegin donjo bed'iye.
Wiripo kuro kodi timo, kole obedo rieko mewin kodi niaŋ mewin ruwaŋ nonin ma jowinji kwoŋe, aka jolawaco ni, “Adieri nono madwoŋ me obedo ji ma joriek aka joniaŋ.”
To nono madwoŋ mene kendo manitie gi were manitie cegin gi jo paka Rwoth Were mawan kisi ka walwoŋo go?
Aka nono madwoŋ mene manitie gi or kodi cik paka cik me je m'aketho ruwaŋ win konon?
To kure win aka wigwokere, ŋey wicwil okir omaki win gi gigipiny ma witieko neno, kosa wiwey joworweny i paro mewin i kwo mewin je. Miy win nyithindho mewin kodi nyikway win ŋeyo,
ndelo ma wicung'iye ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin i Horeb, ma Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Coki ran ji, aka alamiyo jo winjo wac paran, ŋey jowofonjere lworan i kwo pajo je i piny, aka ŋey jowofonji nyikway jo.”
Rwoth oluwo gi win wok i mac. Wiwinjo derino ma wac pere to wikineno cal pere, nyaka obedo dwondi go.
Go owaco riwin cikirok pere, m'omiyo win or kuro, meno Or Apar, aka ondiko i telin mapando ario.
Aka Rwoth omiyan or i hongo no fonjo win or kodi cik, ŋey winyal kuro i lowo ma wicegin donj'iye lunjo.
Riameno gwokere win, kole wikineno cal pere munyo Rwoth oluwo gi win i Horeb i dier mac;
ŋey wikiri witim gir'amien gi timo cal, i nger moro je, ma jacwo kosa madhako.
Cal mar'ogwaŋ moro je i piny, kosa ma winyo maay i koyo,
cal ma gimoro je ma yware gi kore i lowo, cal ma rec ma pi i pendi piny.

Kosa ka witiŋo waŋ win malo i polo to wineno waŋceŋ, dwe, kodi micalin, kodi lwak ma i polo, wikiri wirweny to wikule piny rijo kodi tiyo rijo, gigipiny ma Rwoth Were mewin omiyo nonin je manitie i pendi polo.
To Rwoth okwanyo win to wodho win wok i mac m'okur, wok i Misir, bedo ji pere won, paka wibedo pama.
Rwoth omako nge kodan kwoŋbedo win, aka okwoŋere nike akiripi ŋado Yordan kodi donjo i lowo maber ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win paka gir'alunja.
Kole aripo tho i lowo me, akiripi ŋado Yordan, to wilaŋado loka, lunjo lowo maber no.
Riameno gwokere win, wicwil okir omaki win gi cikirok ma Rwoth Were mewin otimo gi win, aka wikiri witim cal ma gimoro je ma Rwoth Were mewin otieko kwero riwin.
Kole Rwoth Were mewin obedo mac ma reyo woko jo, Were ma janyeko.
Ka wilimo nyithindho kodi nyikway win, to wiyindira i lowo no, ka amien omaki win to witimo cal ma gimoro je, aka winotim reco ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin, kwinyo nge pere,
alwoŋo polo kodi piny bedo jokony kwoŋ win konon nike wilarere woko mayot wok i lowo ma wiŋado Yordan lunjo. Wikilabed'iye ma hongo mabor, to wilarere woko kicutho.
Rwoth lakedho win i dier nonin, aka manok kwoŋ win ama jolaboth i dier nonin kama Rwoth oter win'iye.
Koro wilatic ri werin man, tic ma cingi ji, m'otimi gi mbawin kodi telin, ma jokinyal neno, winjo, cemo, kosa ŋweyo.
Gi koro wilarango Rwoth Were mewin, aka wilanwaŋo go ka winorangi go gi cuny win je kodi adundo mewin je.
I litho mewin, ka gime je otieko timere riwin i hongo ma bino, wilagik bongi Rwoth Were mewin to wiwinjo go.
Kwoŋbedo Rwoth Were mewin obedo Were ma jakisa, go kilajwango win kosa reyo woko win, wiye k'owil gi cikirok m'otimo gi kwarere mewin m'okwoŋere rijo.

Kole pama penji win oro ma cen, munyo fodi wingoye, wok i ndelo ma Were cwey ji i piny; penji win wok i gike acel ma polo tundo i man: Nitie gimadwoŋ paka me m'otieko timirok kosa ma cale gine m'otieko winjirok?
Nitie ji ma jotieko winjo dwondi were moro luwo i mac, paka witieko winjo, to jomedo kwo?

Kosa nitie were m'otieko temo kadho kwanyo nono wok i piny man rigo won, gi tem, gi ranyuth kodi gir'aura, gi lweny, gi cinge ma meni, gi thoyamo, paka Rwoth Were mewin otimo i Misir ka wineno gi waŋ win.
To riwin, onyuthi win, ŋey wiyey nike Rwoth obedo Were, aka ongoye man kendo.
Wok i polo, omiyo win winjo dwonde ma tiro win. I piny, onyutho win mac pere madwoŋ, kareno wiwinjo wac pere wok i mac.
Aka kwoŋbedo go omaro kwarere mewin, oyero nyikway jo. Go owodho win wok i Misir gi bedo pere, gi meni pere madwoŋ,
oriemo woko nonin madongo kendo jomeni loyo win ruwaŋ win, kelo win, miyo win lowo paka gir'alunja, paka obedo konon.
Riameno yey win konon aka kethi win i cuny win, nike Rwoth obedo Were i polo malo kodi i piny ka, ongoye man kendo.
Kur win cik kodi or pere, m'amiyo win or kwoŋe konon me, ri bero mewin kodi nyikway win; ŋey winyal bedo ma hongo mabor i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win ma cil gi cil.
ŋey ŋat'oneko nyawote ma k'ogendera nyalo ring'iye both neki, k'oyido jok'obedo jokwor.
Bezer i thim i lowo m'obipere ri nono pa Ruben, Ramoth i Giliad ri nono pa Gad, kodi Golan i Basan ri nono pa Manase.
Me cik ma Musa oketho ruwaŋ Joisiraili.
Me cik, or kodi fonji ma Musa owaco ri Joisiraili munyo jowok i Misir,
kalo Yordan i milelo m'oŋiyere gi Beth Pewor, i piny pa Kere Sihon pa Joamor, m'odhumo i Hesibon, ma Musa kodi Joisiraili jokengila munyo jowok i Misir.
Jomako lowo pere kodi lowo pa Kere Og ma Basan, kerin ario pa Joamor m'oyido jobedo yuwok ceŋ ma Yordan:
Wok i Arower, manitie i gike ma milelo ma malawa Arinon, tundo kiri i Got Sirion (meno Hamon)
kanyacel gi Araba gibe yuwok ceŋ ma Yordan tundo kiri i Nam ma Araba, i tiendi Got Pisiga.
Musa ocoko Joisiraili je, to waco rijo ni, Winji win, Awi Isiraili, fonji kodi cik, m'awaco riwin konon, wiripo fonjere, kuro kodi timo jo.
Rwoth Were mawan otimo gi win cikirok i Horeb.
K'obedo gi kwarere mawan ma Rwoth timo gi jo cikirok me, to gi wan, ma wanitie ka konon, wan mafodi wakwo.
Rwoth oluwo gi win awaŋ g'awaŋ wok i mac wi got.
I hongo no oyido acungo i dier Rwoth kodi win tuco riwin wac pa Rwoth; kole oyido winitie gi lworo ro mac aka wikidho malo wi got. Aka go owaco ni,
An abedo Rwoth Were mewin, m'owodho win i lowo ma Misir, wok i ot ma twec.
Wikiripi bedo gi werin man ruwaŋan.
Wikiripi kulok piny rijo kosa lamo jo; kole An Rwoth Were mewin, abedo Were ma janyeko, amiyo nyithindho gir'acula ri reco pa jonywol pajo, kiri i luse mar'adek kodi mar'aŋwen pa jono ma jokweran.
To anyutho mar makiwire ri luse ganin pa jono ma jomaran aka jokuro or paran.
Ndelo aucel wiripo riwin kodi timo tic mewin je.

To ndelo mar'abirio obedo sabato ri Rwoth Were mewin; wikiripi timo tic moro je; win, kosa nyithindho mewin, kosa ŋecin mewin, kosa dhok kosa punde, kosa mwendi mewin, kosa japath ma bedo i tindin mewin, ŋey ŋecin mewin bende jowonyal ywomirok paka win.
Poyi win nike oyido wibedo ŋecin i lowo ma Misir, aka Rwoth Were mewin owodho win wok koro gi cinge ma meni kodi cinge m'oyare. Riameno Rwoth Were mewin omiyo win or kuro ndelo ma sabato.
Munyo wiwinjo dwonde wok i mudho, kareno got liel mac, wibino bongan, jotel ma nonin je kodi jodongo mewin,
aka wiwaco ni, “Neni, Rwoth Were mawan otieko nyutho wan dwoŋ kodi meni pere, aka watieko winjo dwondi go wok i mac. Konon watieko neno nike Were nyalo luwo gi dhano to ŋato fodi medo bedo makwo.
Onyo pama raŋo watho? Kole mac madwoŋ me lareyo woko wan; ka wamedo winjo dwondi Rwoth Were mawan kendo, walatho.
Kole ŋa manitie i del m'otieko winjo dwondi Were makwo luwo wok i mac, paka watieko winjo, aka omedo kwo?
Core cegin, in won, aka winji gima Rwoth Were mawan waco je. Kenyo wac riwan gima Rwoth Were mawan waco rin je, aka walawinjo to watimo.”
Rwoth owinjo wac mewin munyo wiluwo kodan, aka Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Atieko winjo wac pa ji me, ma jowaco rin, jotire i gima jowaco je.
Kabedi oyido jonitie gi paro paka me, lworan kodi kuro or paran noknok, ŋey jowonwaŋ bero kodi nyikway jo cil gi cil,
kadhi iwaci rijo ni, ‘Gik win i wemin mewin.’
To in, cungi ka bongan, alawaco rin or je, fonji kodi cik, m'iripo fonjo jo, ŋey jowotimi i lowo m'amiyo jo bedo apajo.”
“Riameno wiripo kurok timo paka Rwoth Were mewin omiyo win or; wikiripi rwayo racuc kosa racam.
Wiripo luwo royo ma Rwoth Were mewin omiyo win or luwo, ŋey winyal kwo, winwaŋ bero, aka ŋey winyal bedo gi kwo mabor i lowo ma wikadho lunjo.”
Me or, fonji kodi cik ma Rwoth Were mewin omiyan or fonjo win kuro i lowo ma wicegin donjo gi bed'iye.
Ŋey win kodi nyithindho mewin kodi nyikway win winyal lworo Rwoth Were, kuro cik kodi or m'afonjo win, i kwo mewin je ŋey ndelo ma kwo mewin wobedi mabor.
Winji Awi Isiraili, aka kur win gi kinen, ŋey winwaŋ bero, aka ŋey wimedi nyay swa i lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, paka Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin ociko win.
Iripo maro Rwoth Were perin g'adundo perin je, gi cunyin je, gi meni perin je.
Kur win wac me, m'amiyo win or kwoŋe konon i cuny win.
Fonji win nyithindho mewin gi kinen aka luw win kwoŋe ka winitie peco kodi ka wiwotho i royo, ka winindo piny kodi ka wicew.
Tweyi win i cingi win kodi i nyim win paka ranyuth,
ndiki win ruwaŋ dhiot ma udi mewin kodi i waŋkace mewin.
udi m'opoŋ gi nger gigipiny kweth ma wikipoŋo, kacoko pi ma wikikunyo, ndelin vini kodi oliv ma wikipidho, ka witieko camo ma romo,
gwokere win wicwil okir omaki win gi Rwoth, m'owodho win wok i lowo ma Misir, wok i ot ma twec.
Wiripo lworo Rwoth Were mewin, go ama wiripo tiyo rigo, aka wiripo kwoŋere i nyingi go kende.
Wikiri wiluw werin man, werin pa nonin ma jothoko win,
kwoŋbedo Rwoth Were mewin, manitie gi win, obedo Were ma janyeko. Nge pa Rwoth Were mewin nyalo liel kwoŋ win aka nyalo reyo woko win wok i piny.
Wiripo kuro or pa Rwoth Were mewin, fonji pere, kodi cik pere m'omiyo win.
Tim win gim'otire kodi gimaber ruwaŋ Rwoth, ŋey winwaŋ bero, aka ŋey widonji wilunji lowo maber ma Rwoth ociko kwarere mewin miyo win,
kanyo riemo woko jokwor mewin je ruwaŋ win paka Rwoth otieko ciko.
Ka nyithindho mewin jopenji win i hongo ma bino ni, “Or, cik kodi fonji ma Rwoth Were mawan miyo win, dwoŋ mere aŋo?”
Waci win ri nyithindho mewin ni, “Oyido wabedo ŋecin i Misir, to Rwoth owodho wan wok i Misir gi cinge ma meni.
Rwoth onyutho ranyuth kodi gir'aura madongo ma kelo lworo kwoŋ Misir, kwoŋ Farawo kodi peco pere je ma waneno.
Go owodho wan wok koro ŋey wokel wan miyo wan lowo ma go ociko gi kwoŋirok ri kwarere wan.
Rwoth omiyo wan or kuro cik me je, lworo Rwoth Were mawan, ri bero mawan makirum, ŋey wokur wan makwo, paka obedo kiri pama.
Ka wakuro or gibe gi kinen ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mawan, paka omiyo wan or, walatimo gim'otire.”
ka Rwoth Were mewin otieko miyo win jo to wikengila jo, wiripo reyo woko jo kicutho. Wikiri witim cikirok gi jo kosa winyuthi jo wor.
Wikiri winywomere gi jo, miyo jo nyir mewin kosa nywomo nyir pajo.
Kole jolawiro woko nyithindho mewin kwoŋ luwan, tiyo ri werin man. Kenyo nge pa Rwoth laliel kwoŋ win aka nyalo reyo woko win piyo.
To me apaka wiripo tiyo gi jo: Turo piny migame pajo, ŋinyo woko sirin, turo piny Asera pajo kodi waŋo cal pajo gi mac.
Kole wibedo ji maleŋ ri Rwoth Were mewin. Rwoth Were mewin otieko yero win kwoŋ nonin je i piny bedo ji pere, lim pere ma welo.
K'obedo nike oyido withoth loyo ji man am'omiyo Rwoth oketho cunye kwoŋ win to yero win; kole oyido winok loyo.
Obedo kwoŋbedo Rwoth omaro win aka okuro cikirok m'otimo ri kwarere mewin, am'omiyo Rwoth owodho win gi cinge ma meni, aka obotho win wok i ot ma twec, wok i cingi Farawo kere ma Misir.
Ŋey win riameno nike Rwoth Were mewin obedo Were, Were ma timo adieri ma kuro cikirok kiri i luse ganin pa jono ma jomaro go aka jokuro or pere,
aka go culo kwor kwoŋ jono ma jodak go. Go kibedi moth gi jo.
Riameno kur win gi kinen, or, cik kodi fonji, m'amiyo win konon.

Go lamaro win, lamiyo win silwany, lanyayo win, go lamiyo nywol mewin kodi nywol ma lowo mewin silwany, ŋano mewin kodi vini kodi mo mewin, nywol ma dhok mewin kodi mwendi mewin, i lowo ma go ociko kwarere mewin ni lamiyo win.
Wilabedo ji ma josilwany kwoŋ nonin je, m'ongoye ŋata kinywol i dier win kosa ogwaŋe mewin.
Rwoth lakwanyo woko arama i dier win. Two marac je ma wineno i Misir, go kilakelo kwoŋ win, to lakelo kwoŋ jono ma jodak win.
Wiripo reyo woko nonin je ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win i cingi win, ongoye nyutho jo wor, kosa lamo werin pajo, kole meno labedo riwin bwo.
Wilawaco i cuny win ni, nonin me jothoth loyo wan, wanoriemi jo nedi?
Wikiri wibedi gi bwok rijo. Nyaka poyi win gima Rwoth Were mewin otimo ri Farawo kodi Misir gibe.

Poy win thoyamo madongo ma wineno gi waŋ win, ranyuth kodi gir'aura, cinge ma meni kodi cinge m'oyare ma Rwoth Were mewin owodho gine win. Rwoth Were mewin latimo gimoro acel no ri nonin ma wibedo rijo gi bwok.
Aka kiri Rwoth Were mewin ladhiro thoyamo kwoŋ jo, cuka kiri joma joboth kodi joma joringi je jorere woko.
Wikiri wibedi gi bwok rijo, kole Rwoth Were mewin, manitie gi win, obedo Were madwoŋ aka kelo lworo.
Rwoth Were mewin lariemo woko nonin no ruwaŋ win, adec adec, wikilareyo woko jo dicel, ka k'obedo ameno ogwaŋe madudi jolamedere riwin.
To Rwoth Were mewin lajwango jo i cingi win, to bolo jo i kirin madwoŋ, cuka ireyo woko jo.
Go lamiyo kerin pajo i cingi win aka wilareyo woko nyingi jo i pendi polo, ongoye ŋata lanyalo ciro win, cuka winotiek reyo woko jo.
Cal ma werin pajo wiwaŋ woko gi mac. Wikiri wiwanya feza kosa zahabu manitie kwoŋ jo ma doŋ gine, kwoŋbedo labedo riwin bwo, kole obedo amien ri Rwoth Were mewin.
Wikiri wikel gir'amien i pecin mewin, kosa win bende ilareyo woko win paka jo. Wiripo dak, to wikwero, kwoŋbedo okethi gicen ma reyo woko.
Or me je m'amiyo win konon wiripo kuro gi kinen, ŋey winyal kwo aka wimedi nyay, to wikadho donjo to wibedo i lowo ma Rwoth ociko i kwoŋirok ri kwarere mewin.
Poyi win royo je ma Rwoth Were mewin otieko telo win oro piero aŋwen me i thim, mwolo win, temo win, ŋeyo gima nitie i cuny win, k'inen oyido winyalo kuro or pere kosa be.
Go omwolo win gi miyo kec neko win, to pidho win gi mana, ma win kosa kwarere mewin oyido kuya, ma miyo win ŋeyo nike dhano kikwo gi cemo kende, to gi wac je ma wok i dhok Rwoth.
Nangin mewin k'oti aka tiendi win k'obomere ma oro piero aŋwen me.
Ŋey win i cuny win nike paka janywol tiro nyathi, apaka Rwoth Were mewin tiro win.
Riameno kur win or pa Rwoth Were mewin, gi wotho i royo pere kodi lworo go.
Kole Rwoth Were mewin kelo win i lowo maber, lowo manitie gi waŋ pi, jwombe, kodi pi ma wok piny wok i milelo kodi i wi tendere,
lowo ma nyak ŋano kodi bale, nyingi vini kodi nyandere, pomo, yen oliv kodi mo kic.
Lowo ma wilacam'iye cemo ma romo, kama wikilacando gimoro, lowo ma telin mere obedo nyweny aka wilakunyo lowo ma thedho nyweny.
Wilacemo to wiyeŋ aka wilapako Rwoth Were mewin ri lowo maber ma go miyo win.
Ka witieko cemo to wiyeŋ to wigeto udi mabeyo to wibed'iye,
ka dhok kodi mwendi mewin jotieko medirok, to feza gi zahabu mewin medere, kodi gima winitie gine je,
wikiri wipakere, to wicwil mako win gi Rwoth Were mewin, m'owodho win wok i lowo ma Misir, wok i ot ma twec.
Go m'otelo win luwo i thim madwoŋ ma kelo lworo, lowo m'othwo manitie iye thwole ma jonitie gi kwir kodi thwol gwokere. Go omiyo pi wok riwin i tele ma lwanda.
Go m'opidho win i thim gi mana ma kwarere mewin oyido jokuya, mwolo win kodi temo win, aka i cowe timo riwin bero.
Gwokere win waco ni, “Meni paran kodi teko ma cingan won am'okelo ran lim me.”
To poyi win Rwoth Were mewin, kole go ama miyo win meni ma nwaŋo lim, ŋey woridhi cikirok pere m'okwoŋere ri kwarere mewin, paka go timo konon.
Ka wicwil omaki win gi Rwoth Were mewin to wiluwo werin man, tiyo kodi lamo jo, apiro win konon nike wilarere adieri.
Paka nonin ma Rwoth reyo woko ruwaŋ win, ameno wilarere, kwoŋbedo wikinyalo winjo dwondi Rwoth Were mewin.
Winji, Awi Isiraili! Wicegin ŋado Yordan konon, kadho donjo riemo nonin ma jolac aka jotek loyo win, tindin madongo malac, m'otinda tundo i polo,
ji ma jotek aka jolile, nyikway Anakim, ma wiŋeyo jo. Witieko winjo k'iluwo kwoŋ jo ni, “Ŋa manyalo ciro nyikway Anakim?”
Ŋey win konon me nike Rwoth Were mewin ama ŋado telo yuwiy win paka mac ma reyo woko, go lakikengila jo cowo woko jo ruwaŋ win, ŋey wiriem jo kodi reyo woko jo piyo, paka Rwoth otieko ciko win.

Ka Rwoth Were mewin otieko riemo woko jo ruwaŋ win, wikiri wiwaci ni, “Obedo ro bedo gi tiro mawan am'omiyo Rwoth okelo wan mako lowo me.” To obedo ro kidakana pa nonin me am'omiyo Rwoth riemo woko jo ruwaŋ win.

K'obedo kwoŋbedo witimo gim'otire kosa cuny win cil am'omiyo wikadho donjo lunjo lowo pajo, to ro kidakana pa nonin me, Rwoth Were mewin riemo woko jo ruwaŋ win, ŋey wokethi i kare gim'ociko i kwoŋirok ri kwarere mewin Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo.
Ŋey win nike Rwoth Were mewin kimiy win lowo maber me lunjo kwoŋbedo winitie gi tiro; kole wibedo ji ma jowictek.
Poyi win aka wicwil okir omaki win gi nger ma wikwiny'iye keme pa Rwoth Were mewin i thim; witieko gwenyirok kwoŋ Rwoth wok i ndelo ma wiwok i lowo ma Misir cuka witundo i kabedo me.
Kiri i Horeb wikwinyo keme pa Rwoth, aka Rwoth omako nge swa gi win m'oyido oyikere reyo woko win.
Munyo aidho malo wi got jolo telin mapando ario, telin ma cikirok ma Rwoth otimo gi win, adoŋ wi got ma odieceŋ piero aŋwen kodi wor piero aŋwen; akicamo cemo kosa madho pi.
Aka Rwoth omiyan telin mapando ario m'ondik'iye gi lwet cingi Were; ondik'iye wac je ma Rwoth oyido oluwo riwin i got wok i mac i ndelo ma cokirok.
Rumacen ma odieceŋ piero aŋwen kodi wor piero aŋwen, Rwoth omiyan telin mapando ario, telin ma cikirok.
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Ay malo, redi piny piyo wok ka, kole ji m'ikelo wok i Misir jotimo gikidakana. Jokwako swa wirok kwoŋ yo m'amiyo jo or luwo, jotimo cal m'onyel.”
Rwoth omedere waco ran ni, “Atieko neno nike ji me adieri jobedo jowictek.
Weyere kodan ŋey arey woko jo aka arey woko nyingi jo wok i pendi polo; aka alalokin nono matek aka mathoth loyo jo.”
Awire gik piny wok wi got, kareno got liel mac, aka oyido atiŋo telin mapando ario ma cikirok i cingan.
Gikenyo aneno nike adieri oyido witimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth Were mewin, gi timo cal ma rwath m'onyel, oyido wiwire piyo kwoŋ yo ma Rwoth omiyo win or luwo.
Amako telin ario aka abolo jo wok i cingan ario, to ŋinyere ruwaŋ win.
Aka ariere ruwaŋ Rwoth kendo, ma odieceŋ piero aŋwen kodi wor piero aŋwen; akicamo cemo kosa amadho pi, ro reco je m'oyido witimo, miyo Rwoth nge gi timo gimarac ruwaŋe.
Kole oyido abedo gi bwok nike nge ma Rwoth oyido ogut gine gi win oyido ger manyalo reyo woko win. To Rwoth owinjan i hongo no bende.
Rwoth omako nge swa gi Aron m'oyido oyikere reyo woko go, t'akwayo ri Aron i hongo acel no bende.
Akwanyo gireco mewin ma witimo, cal ma rwath, aka awaŋo gi mac t'aŋinyo woko, t'arego swa, cuka olokere fukefuke; aka akonjo i pi ma mol loro piny ma got.
Aka munyo Rwoth ooro win wok i Kades Barineya, k'awaco ni, “Kadhi win malo wimaki lowo m'atieko miyo win.” Wigwenyere kwoŋ or pa Rwoth Were mewin, wikigeno go, kosa winjo dwonde.
Witieko bedo jogwenyirok kwoŋ Rwoth wok i ndelo m'aŋey'iye win.
Ariere piny ruwaŋ Rwoth ma odieceŋ piero aŋwen kodi wor piero aŋwen kwoŋbedo Rwoth oyido otieko miyere reyo woko win,
akwayo Rwoth k'awaco ni, “Rwoth Were, ikir'irey woko ji ma jobedo lim perin won, ji m'ibotho gi meni perin, ji m'iwodho wok i Misir gi cingin ma meni.
Poyi ŋecin perin Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo, ikir'ipar kwoŋ wictek pa ji me, kidakana pajo kodi reco pajo,
kosa piny m'iwodho wan wok'iye lawaco ni, ‘Kwoŋbedo Rwoth k'onyalo kelo jo i lowo m'ociko jo, aka kwoŋbedo odak jo, owodho jo to weyo jo tho i thim.’
Jobedo ji perin, alunja perin won, m'iwodho gi meni perin madwoŋ kodi cingin m'oyare.”
I hongo no Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Pay telin mapando ario paka marapena, ibin bongan malo wi got, aka tim sanduku ma mbawo.
Alandiko i telin wac m'oyido nitie i marapena, m'iŋinyo, aka ilaketho jo i sanduku.”
Ameno atimo sanduku gi mbawo ma gasia, apayo telin mapando ario paka marapena, aka aidho malo wi got, gi telin mapando ario i cingan.
Aka Rwoth ondiko i telin wac acel paka i marapena, or apar ma Rwoth oluwo gi win wi got wok i mac i ndelo ma cokirok. Rwoth omiyan,
aka aloro piny wok wi got, t'aketho i sanduku m'oyido atimo, aka eno jo, paka Rwoth omiyan or.
Wok kenyo jowotho kiri i Gudgoda, aka wok i Gudgoda kiri i Yotbatha, lowo ma mol gi waŋ pi kweth.
I hongo no Rwoth oketho gicen nono pa Jolevi tiŋo sanduku pa Rwoth, cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth tiyo rigo, kodi miyo silwany i nyingi go, kiri konon.
Riameno nono pa Jolevi ongoye gi kibaba kosa alunja, Rwoth obedo alunja pajo, paka Rwoth Were mewin ociko go.)
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Ay malo, kadhi itel ji, ŋey jowokadhi jowolunji lowo m'akwoŋere ri kwarere pajo ni alamiyo jo.”
Onyo pama, Awi Isiraili, aŋo ma Rwoth Were mewin rango kwoŋ win? Nyaka lworo Rwoth Were perin, wotho i yo pere je, maro go, tiyo ri Rwoth Were perin gi cunyin je kodi adundo perin je,
kuro or pa Rwoth Were perin kodi cik pere m'amiyin konon, ri bero perin.
Makada nende polo malo obedo apa Rwoth Were mewin, piny kodi gima nitie iye je,
kucel Rwoth oketho cunye i maro kendo to yero kwarere mewin, nyikway jo, kwoŋ ji je, paka nitie konon.
Riameno dhum win cuny win, aka wikiri wibedi gi wictek kendo.
Kole Rwoth Were mewin obedo Were pa werin, Rwoth pa rwodhe, Were madwoŋ, jameni aka kelo lworo, go kitim nyakucel aka kijol nyew.
Go timo tiro ri nyithindho kic kodi citho, omaro jopath, miyo jo cemo kodi gir'aruka.
Wiripo maro japath, kole oyido wibedo jopath i lowo ma Misir.
Wiripo lworo Rwoth Were mewin, go kende ama wiripo lamo, wiripo ketho go marapena, to wikwoŋere i nyinge.
Go ama wiripo pako, go obedo Were mewin, m'otieko timo riwin gigipiny madongo me aka ma kelo lworo ma witieko neno gi waŋ win.
Kwarere mewin jokadho piny i Misir, ji piero abirio, aka pama Rwoth Were mewin otieko loko win mathoth paka micalin ma i polo.
Riameno wiripo maro Rwoth Were mewin, to wikuro cik pere, fonji pere kodi or pere noknok.
Ŋey win konon nike k'obedo nyithindho mewin ma fodi jokuya kosa jok'oneno ragwok pa Rwoth Were mewin, dwoŋ pere, cinge ma meni kodi bade m'oyare,
ranyuth pere kodi tim pere m'otimo i Misir ri Farawo, kere ma Misir, kodi lowo pere je.
Gima go otimo ri jolweny ma Misir, kayinin pajo, cawilin, kodi nger m'omiyo pi ma Nam M'obokere mol kwoŋ jo munyo joriemo win, to Rwoth reyo woko jo kiri gunyo ni;
Gima go otimo riwin i thim, cuka witundo i kabedo me,
kodi gima go otimo ri Dathan kodi Abiram, wot Eliab wod pa Ruben, nger ma i dier Joisiraili je piny oyawo dhoke to mwonyo woko jo, gi pecin pajo, wemin, kodi lim pajo je.
Kole witieko neno gi waŋ win tim madongo je ma Rwoth otimo.
Kur win or me je m'amiyo win konon, ŋey winyal bedo gi meni ma kadho donjo mako lowo ma wiŋado kidho bed'iye.
Aka ŋey winyal bedo gi kwo mabor i lowo ma Rwoth okwoŋere ri kwarere mewin miyo jo kodi nyikway jo, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic.
Kole lowo ma wicegin donjo mako kicale lowo ma Misir, ma wiwok'iye, kama wicwoyo kodhi to wikonj'iye pi atiendi, paka ndelo fufa.
To lowo ma wiŋado kadho lunjo obedo lowo matendere kodi milelo, ma koth cwe iye wok i polo,
lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin kuro. Waŋ Rwoth Were mewin noknok nitie kwoŋe, wok i cakirok ma oro tundo i cowe.
kenyo go lamiyo win koth ri lowo mewin i hongo mere, koth ma cwir kodi ma oro, ŋey winyal coko ŋano, vini, kodi mo mewin.
Go lamiyo win lum i sa mewin ri mwendi mewin, aka wilacemo to wiyeŋ.
Gwokere win, cuny win wokiri owondi win wirok, tiyo ri werin man kodi lamo jo.
Nge pa Rwoth laliel kwoŋ win to cego polo, ŋey koth wongoye to ngoye ranyak i lowo; wilarere woko piyo wok i lowo maber ma Rwoth miyo win.
Fonji win nyithindho mewin, luw win kwoŋe ka winitie peco kodi ka wiwotho, ka winindo piny kodi ka wicew.
Ndiki win ruwaŋ dhiot ma udi mewin kodi i waŋkace mewin,
ŋey ndelin ma kwo mewin kodi apa nyithindho mewin womedere i lowo ma Rwoth okwoŋere ri kwarere mewin miyo jo, paka polo nitie malo ma piny.
Ka winokur or me je m'amiyo win konon gi kinen, maro Rwoth Were mewin, wotho i yo pere je, kodi ketho go marapena,
kenyo Rwoth lariemo woko nonin me je ruwaŋ win, aka wilalunjo nonin malac aka ma jotek loyo win.
I kisi kabedo je ma winonyon gi tiendi win labedo mewin; adec mewin layare wok i thim tundo i Lebanon kodi wok i malawa Yufrete, kiri i Nam ma yupodho ceŋ.
Ongoye ŋata lanyalo ciro win, Rwoth Were mewin lakelo lworo kodi bwok ro win i lowo je ma winonyon, paka go ociko win.
Neni, aketho ruwaŋ win konon silwany kodi lam.
Silwany, ka winowinji or pa Rwoth Were mewin m'amiyo win konon.
Aka lam, ka wikwero winjo or pa Rwoth Were mewin, to wiwire kwoŋ yo m'amiyo win or konon, to wiluwo werin ma fodi wikuya.
Paka wiŋeyo, jonitie kalo Yordan, yupodho ceŋ, i lowo pa Jokanan ma jobedo i Araba, ma ŋiyere gi Gilgal, i thengi olwa ma More.
Ka wiŋado Yordan kadho lunjo lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win, ka witieko bed'iye,
wiripo kuro gi kinen, cik je kodi or je m'aketho ruwaŋ win konon.
Me fonji kodi cik ma wiripo kuro gi kinen i lowo ma Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin, omiyo win lunjo ma ndelo je ma winobedi makwo i piny.
Wiripo reyo kicutho kabedo je m'oyido nonin ma wikadho lunjo jolam'iye werin pajo, wi gote, i wi tendere, kodi i tiendi yen.
Tur win piny migame pajo, ŋiny win sirin pajo, waŋ win Asera pajo gi mac, aka witur piny cal ma jotimo ri werin pajo, to wirwenyo woko nyingi jo i kabedo pajo.
Wikiri wilam Rwoth Were mewin i nger no.
To wilalamo go i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin oyer wok kwoŋ nonin mewin paka kabedo ri nyingi go koro. Wiripo kadho kenyo,
tero mic mewin awaŋa kodi cowirok, acel wiy apar, kodi mic mewin, mic mewin ma wiciko, mic ma dhano won miyo kodi okayin ma dhok mewin kodi mwendi mewin.
Aka wiripo camo koro ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin, win kanyacel gi pecin mewin, ka wifore i tic mewin je ma Rwoth Were mewin omiyo win silwany.
Wikiripi timo paka watimo ka konon, kisi dhano gim'otire ruwaŋe,
kole fodi wikitundo i ywomirok kodi i lim ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win.
Ka wiŋado Yordan, to wibedo i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win, aka ka go otieko miyo win ywomirok kwoŋ jokwor mewin je, thoko, ŋey wibedi i siem,
wiripo kelo i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin oyer paka kabedo ri nyinge gigipiny je m'amiyo win or kwoŋe: Mic awaŋa kodi cowirok mewin, acel wiy apar, kodi mic mewin je ma wiciko Rwoth.
Aka wiripo forok ruwaŋ Rwoth, win, nyithindho mewin, ŋecin mewin, kodi Jolevi ma jobedo i tindin mewin paka jo jongoye g'adec kosa gir'alunja kodi win.
Kure win ŋey wikiri wimiy mic mewin awaŋa i kabedo moro je ma wineno.
To kende i kabedo ma Rwoth layero wok iy'acel kwoŋ nonin mewin; kenyo ama wilamiy'iye mic mewin awaŋa kodi timo kisi gimoro m'amiyo win or kwoŋe je.
Kucel ka cuny win ogomba, winyalo thumo ogwaŋe mewin to wicamo i tindin mewin, cungo kwoŋ silwany ma Rwoth Were mewin omiyo win. Ŋat'olony kodi ma k'olony je nyalo camo paka jocamo kol kodi apol.
To wikiripi camo remo mere, wiripo konjo woko i lowo paka pi.
Wikiripi camo gi tindin mewin, acel wiy apar ma ŋano mewin, vini mewin, mo mewin, okayin ma dhok mewin kodi mwendi mewin, mic je ma wiciko, mic ma dhano won miyo, kodi mic mewin.

Kole wiripo camo ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin layero, win kanyacel gi nyithindho mewin, ŋecin mewin, kodi Jolevi ma jobedo i tindin mewin, ka wifore ruwaŋ Rwoth i kisi gimoro je ma witimo.
Kure win, ŋey wikiri wijwangi Jolevi paka wibedo i lowo mewin.
Ka Rwoth Were mewin oloki malac kew mewin, paka ociko win, to wiwaco nike wimito camo riŋo, winyalo camo riŋo kisi ka wiyenyo.
Ka kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin oyer ketho nyinge bor swa gi win, winyalo thumo dhok mewin kosa mwendi mewin ma Rwoth omiyo win, cungo kwoŋ or m'amiyo to wicamo i tindin mewin kisi ka wiyenyo.
I nger m'icam'iye apol kosa amudhe, ameno winyalo camo, ŋat'olony kodi ma k'olony je.
Kende neni win nike wikicamo remo; kole remo obedo kwo, aka wikiripi camo kwo gi riŋo.
Wikiri wicam, wiripo konjo piny i lowo paka pi.
Wikiri wicam, ŋey winwaŋ bero kodi nyithindho mewin ma joluw win, kwoŋbedo witimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth.
To kende gigipiny mewin maleŋ, kodi mic ma wiciko, wiripo kelo i kabedo ma Rwoth layero.
Wiripo kelo mic mewin awaŋa, riŋo kiri gi remo, i wi migam pa Rwoth Were mewin; remo ma cowirok mewin man ilakonjo i thengi migam pa Rwoth Were mewin, to riŋo mere winyalo camo.
Kure win winjo wac me je, m'amiyo win or kwoŋe konon, ŋey winwaŋ bero kodi nyithindho mewin ma joluw win cil gi cil, kwoŋbedo wilatimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin.
Ka Rwoth Were mewin otiek riemo woko ruwaŋ win nonin ma wicegin lunjo jo, ka witieko bedo i lowo pajo,
kure win ŋey wikiri wimok i bwo timo paka jo, ka otiek reyo woko jo ruwaŋ win. Wikiri wipenji kwoŋ werin pajo ka wiwaco ni, “Nonin me oyido jolamo werin pajo nedi? An bende amito timo amanago.”
Wikiripi timo ameno ri Rwoth Were mewin, kwoŋbedo kisi amien je ma Rwoth odak, jotieko timo ri werin pajo. Jowaŋo kiri nyithindho pajo mayac gi manyir i mac ri werin pajo.
Wac me je m'amiyo win or kwoŋe, kur win gi kinen; wikiri wimedi kosa wikwany woko gimoro kwoŋe.
k'otimere, to jowaco riwin ni, “Weyi walam win werin man ma fodi wikiŋeyo, aka weyi watiy rijo.”
Wikiri wiwinji wac pa jotuci wac were kodi jothieth no; kole ameno Rwoth Were mewin temo win ŋeyo, k'adieri wimaro Rwoth Were mewin gi cuny win je kodi adundo mewin je.
Wiripo luwo Rwoth Were mewin, lworo go kende, kuro or pere, winjo dwonde, tiyo rigo, kodi ketho go marapena.

To jotuci wac were kodi jothieth no, wiripo neko jo kwoŋbedo joluwo marac kwoŋ Rwoth Were mewin m'owodho win wok i lowo ma Misir to botho win wok i ot ma twec wiro win wok i royo ma Rwoth Were mewin omiyo win or ni wiluw. Ameno wiripo kwanyo woko raco no i dier win.
K'omin in, wodin, nyarin, dhako perin, kosa mere perin odwoŋin manyaliŋliŋ, ka waco ni: “Weyi walam werin man.” Werin ma win kosa kwarere mewin fodi wikiŋeyo,
werin pa ji ma jothoko win, kosa cegin kosa bor gi win, wok i gike piny acel tundo i meca,
ikir'iyere kosa iwinji nger ŋato. Ikir'inyuthi jo wor kosa kisa aka ikir'ikwonga jo.
To iripo neko jo; cingin won ama ripo telo neko jo, aka rumacen cingi ji je.
Cadhi jo gi telin cuka jotho kwoŋbedo jotemo kwanyin woko kwoŋ Rwoth Were perin, m'owodhin wok i lowo ma Misir, wok i ot ma twec.
Kenyo Joisiraili je jolawinjo to jobedo gi bwok, aka ongoye ŋata latimo nger kidakana no kendo i dier win.
Ka wiwinjo iwaco iy'acel kwoŋ tindin ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win bed'iye,
nike ji ma bukony jowok i dier win to jokadho wiro ji ma tindi ka jowaco ni, “Weyi wakadhi walam werin man.” Werin ma fodi wikiŋeyo,
wiripo penjo maber to widwaro tiende wac no. K'onwaŋere nike nger mienirok no otimere i dier win,
wiripo neko ji ma tindi no g'abor, kicutho to wireyo woko kisi gimoro iye, kiri g'ogwaŋe mere.
Wiripo coko gigipiny je to widhuro i kacokirok, to wiwaŋo tindi kodi gigipiny mere je gi mac, paka mic awaŋa ma gikululu ri Rwoth Were mewin. Kole ladoŋ gunda ma kilageto kendo.
Wikiri wiwey kisi gimoro m'otiek yere reyo woko womok i cingin, ŋey Rwoth wowire kwoŋ mako nge pere aka wonyuthi wor, to nyayo win, paka ociko kwarere mewin.
Kole winji win dwondi Rwoth Were mewin, kuro or pere m'amiyo win konon, timo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin.
Kole wibedo ji maleŋ ri Rwoth Were mewin, obedo win ama Rwoth otieko yero kwoŋ nonin je i piny bedo ji pere, aka lim pere ma welo.
Wikiripi camo gima kelo amien moro je.
Me ogwaŋe ma winyalo camo: Dhiaŋ, rombo, diel,
apol, rudina, rombo madudi, diegi madudi, kosa amudhe.
Ogwaŋ moro je ma par tiendi jo opokere dirio, kodi ma jonyamo cemo dirio, winyalo camo.

Kucel kwoŋ ogwaŋe ma jonyamo cemo dirio aka par tiendi jo opokere dirio, wikiripi camo me, ŋamia, oculu, kodi oyeyo ma telin, kwoŋbedo jonyamo cemo dirio, to par tiendi jo k'opokere dirio. Riameno jokoc riwin.
Mbiji bende, kwoŋbedo tiende opokere dirio to kinyam cemo dirio, koc riwin. Wikiripi camo riŋo pajo kosa geyo ma jotho.
Kwoŋ ogwaŋe je ma jobedo i pi winyalo camo me: Ma nitie gi thwoke kodi magambala.
Aka m'ongoye gi thwoke kodi magambala wikiripi camo, meno jokoc riwin.
Winyalo camo winyin ma jolony je.
To me ama wikiripi camo: Ango, acut, ari piny,
obuko yath, nger otengo je,
nger agak je,
maya, koka ma wor, acik, nger koka moro je;
tula mathindho gi madongo, gweno ma pi,
tula ma thim, winyin ma jwombe, acut kodi acwodho,
obusi (karoli) naminakin, wakalanya kodi kilafundo.
Winyin ma jobwombi gin je jokoc riwin; kiripi camo.
Winyalo camo cwec ma jobwombi gin ma jolony.
Wikiri witedo nyathi diel i cak pa min.

Wiripo camo ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin, i kabedo ma go layero paka kabedo ri nyinge, ŋano mewin, vini mewin, mo mewin, kodi okayin ma dhok kodi mwendi mewin, ŋey winyal fonjirok lworo Rwoth Were mewin noknok.
To ka Rwoth Were mewin otieko miyo win silwany, to woth bedo riwin mabor, ma wikinyal tiŋo kodirok gi gigipiny, kwoŋbedo kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin oyero paka kabedo ri nyinge bor gi win,
nyaka winyalo wilo loko pesa, to witiŋo pesa no i cingi win kadho i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin oyer.
Wilaoro pesa no ma nyewo gima cuny win omiti je, dhok, rombo, vini, medho makec, kosa gima cuny win omiti. Aka wilacamo koro ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin, win kodi pecin mewin ka wisangala kanyacel.
Aka Jolevi ma jonitie i dier win, wikiri wijwangi jo, kwoŋbedo jongoye gi lim pajo kosa alunja gi win.
I kisi oro mar'adek wiripo kelo acel wiy apar ma cemo mewin je to wikano i tindi mewin.

Aka Jolevi, kwoŋbedo jongoye gi lim kosa alunja gi win, kiri gi jopath ma jobedo gi win, nyithindho kic, kodi citho je ma tindin mewin, jonyalo bino camo ma romo jo, ŋey Rwoth Were mewin womiy win silwany i tic mewin je ma witimo.
Kisi oro mar'abirio wiripo reyo woko banja pa jono ma jonitie gi pesa mewin.
Aka me apaka wiripo timo: Kisi dhano ripo reyo woko banja pa jager pere, ma k'obanja kendo, kwoŋbedo Rwoth won ama reyo woko banja.
Inyalo kibanja japath, to ikiripi kibanja jager perin.
Ongoye ŋata lacando gimoro i dier win, kole Rwoth lamiyo win silwany adieri i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win paka gir'alunja ma bed'iye,
nyaka ka wiwinjo dwondi Rwoth Were perin gi kinen, kuro or pere je m'amiyin konon.
Ka Rwoth Were perin otieko miyin silwany, paka go ociko, ilakikopa nonin kweth, to ongoye ma lakikopa in, iladhumo nonin kweth, to jokiladhumin.
to yaw cingin, kikopa go gima mito je.

Gwokere bedo gi paro ma bukony i cunyin, t'iparo ni, “Oro mar'abirio, oro ma reyo woko banja nicegin.” T'itero jager perin gi gwayo, t'ibedo m'ikimiyo go gimoro. Jager perin nyalo ywak ri Rwoth to bedo reco rin.
Miy m'ongoye arom kendo m'ongoye kiŋunyaŋunya, aka ro gime Rwoth Were perin lamiyin silwany i tic perin je kodi i gimoro je m'itimo.
Kole jocandi jokilarumo i piny, riameno amiyin cik, yawo cingin ri jacandi kodi jager manitie i dinyo i lowo mewin.
Aka k'igonyo ŋeca ma jacwo, ikir'iwey go wokadhi gi cinge nono.
Miy go m'ongoye arom wok i mwendi perin, ŋano perin, kodi vini perin, k'imiyo go wok kwoŋ silwany ma Rwoth Were perin otieko miyin.
Poyi nike oyido ibedo ŋeca i lowo ma Misir, to Rwoth Were perin bothin; R'atoŋa me amiyin or me konon.
To ka go owaci nike k'omaro kadho, kwoŋbedo omaro peco perin, paka go winjo maber kodin,
kenyo ilatero go i dhiot perin, t'ituco ithe gi nyweny, aka go labedo ŋeca i kwo pere je.
Ilatimo gimoro acel ri ŋeca madhako bende.
Ikir'iter paka gimatek k'igonyo jo kadho, kwoŋbedo ma oro aucel jotiyo rin ma romo cul paka ŋata tiyo ma cul, aka Rwoth Were perin lamiyin silwany i gimoro je m'itimo.
Iripo camo, in kodi peco perin, ruwaŋ Rwoth Were perin kisi oro i kabedo ma Rwoth layero.
To, ka onwaŋere nike nitie gi raco moro, paka ŋolo, kosa waŋ'otho, ikiripi miyo Rwoth Were perin.
Winyalo camo gi tindin mewin, ŋata koc kodi ŋat'olony je, paka wicamo rudina kosa amudhe.
To kad'ameno, wikiripi camo remo mere, wiripo konjo piny paka pi.
Wiripo miyo cowirok ma Kalima ma kadho ri Rwoth Were mewin, wok kwoŋ mwendi mewin kodi dhok mewin, i kabedo ma Rwoth layero paka kabedo ri nyinge.

Wikiripi camo gi mugat m'otimi gi thow. Ma ndelo abirio wilacamo mugat ma buthow, mugat ma litho, kwoŋbedo wiwok i Misir i kwakirok madwoŋ; ŋey i kwo mewin gipi winyal poyo ndelo ma wiwok i lowo ma Misir.
Wikiripi bedo gi mugat m'otimi gi thow iy'adec mewin ma ndelo abirio, aka wongoye riŋo mar'ogwaŋ ma withumo othieno ma ndelo marapena ma wonindi yawo piny.
Wikiripi miyo cowirok ma Kalima ma kadho i tindin mewin ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win,
to i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin layero paka kabedo ri nyinge, kenyo kende ama wiripo miyo cowirok ma kadho, othieno ka waŋceŋ podho, sawa ma ndelo ma wiay wok i Misir.
Wiripo tedo to wicamo i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin layero; yawere mere odikin winyalo dok i wemin mewin.
Ma ndelo aucel wilamedere camo mugat ma buthow, aka i ndelo mar'abirio wilacokere lamo Rwoth Were mewin, aka wikiripi tiyo i ndelo no.
Wiripo kuro Kalima ma Keco ri Rwoth Were mewin, ka wimiyo go mic ma dhano won miyo cungo kwoŋ silwany ma wilimo wok bongi Rwoth Were mewin.

Wiripo kisangala ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin, win, nyithindho mewin, ŋecin mewin, Jolevi ma jobedo i tindin mewin, jopath, nyithindho kic kodi citho ma jobedo i dier win, i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin oyer paka kabedo ri nyinge.
Poyi win nike oyido wibedo ŋecin i Misir, kur win cik me gi kinen.
Sangala win i hongo ma kalima mewin, win, nyithindho mewin, ŋecin mewin, Jolevi, jopath, nyithindho kic, kodi citho ma jobedo i tindin mewin.
Ma ndelo abirio wiripo timo kalima ri Rwoth Were mewin i kabedo ma Rwoth layero. Kole Rwoth Were mewin lamiyo win silwany i fur mewin je kodi i tic je ma cingi win.
Didek kisi oro cwo mewin je joripo bino ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin i kabedo ma go layero: I Kalima ma Mugat ma buthow, Kalima ma Keco, kodi Kalima ma Kayindi. Jokiripi bino ruwaŋ Rwoth gi cingi jo nono;
joje joripo miyo paka jonyalo, cungo kwoŋ silwany ma Rwoth Were otieko miyo win.
Wiripo yero jothum banja, kodi jodhum i nonin mewin je, i tindin mewin je ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win, aka joripo thumo banja ri ji gi tiro.
Wikiripi wiro tiro, kosa timo nyakucel, aka wikiripi jolo nyew, kole nyew thowaŋ jomariek aka cego tiro ri joma timo gim'otire.
Tiro, adieri tiro kende, ama wiripo luwo, ŋey winyal kwo to wilunjo lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win.
kosa wikethi siro ma tele; gigipiny ma Rwoth Were mewin odak.
Wikiripi miyo Rwoth Were mewin cowirok ma merikwa, kosa rombo, m'oŋol, kole meno obedo amien ri Rwoth Were mewin.
K'onwaŋere i dier win, iy'acel kwoŋ tindin mewin ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win, jacwo kosa dhako, m'otur cikirok pere,
gi tiyo ri werin man kodi lamo jo, kosa obedi waŋceŋ kosa dwe, kosa micalin, m'atieko kwero,
aka k'owaci riwin kosa wiwinjo kwoŋe, to widwaro maber, aka onwaŋere nike obedo adieri nger amien no otimere i Isiraili,
kenyo wodhi win jacwo kosa dhako no m'otimo gino i waŋkace mewin aka wigoy go gi telin cuka tho.
Ka wac owok i dhok j'ario kosa ji adek paka jokony, ŋato iripo neko; to dhano kiripi neko cungo i wiwaci pa dhano acel paka jakony ma luwo adieri.
Cingi ji ma jomiyo jakony ma luwo adieri ama ripo telo i neko ŋato, aka rumacen cingi ji je. Ameno apaka wilakwanyo woko raco no i dier win.
K'obedi banja matek riwin thumo i dier oyo remo kodi neki, turo cik, kodi gorok, nger banjin no moro je i tindin mewin, kenyo wilakadho malo piyo i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin oyer.
Wilapenjo jocway ri Were i wi migam ma Jolevi kodi jothum banja ma jonitie i tic i hongo no, jolathumo riwin banja no.
Wiripo timo gima jowaci riwin wok i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin oyer, aka wiripo neno ni witimo kisi gima jofonji win.
Wiripo luwo fonji ma jomiy win je kosa thumo banja ma jomiy, wikiri wiwire kwoŋ gima jotieko yere timo ma jolanga riwin obedi racuc kosa racam.
Paka ri ŋat'otim paka paro mito kwero winjo jacway ri Were i wi migam m'oyer kenyo tiyo ri Rwoth Were mewin, kosa jathum banja, ŋato latho. Ameno wilakwanyo woko raco no i Isiraili.
Ji je jolawinjo aka jolabwok, to joweyo luwo paro pajo kendo.
Winyalo adieri yero kere ma Rwoth Were mewin layero. Dhano m'obedo acel kwoŋ win, to wikiripi yero japath ma kiwoki i dier win, dhumo win.
To kere kiripi bedo gi kayinin kweth, kosa dwoko ji i Misir ŋey wolimi kayinin man, paka Rwoth otieko waco riwin, wikiripi gik koro kendo.
Kere no kiripi nywomo mon kweth, ka k'obedo ameno cunye nyalo cile woko kwoŋ Rwoth, kosa coko feza kodi zahabu kweth.
Aka ka otiek ketho go i kom ma dhum paka kere, go ripo bedo gi kitawo ma cik me m'okopila wok i kitawo ma cik ma jocway ri Were i wi migam, nyikway Jolevi jonigine.
Go ripo doŋ gine to bedo ka soma i ndelo ma kwo pere je, ŋey wofonjere lworo Rwoth Were pere, kuro gi kinen wac je m'ondiki i cik me kodi fonji me je,
ŋey go wokiri womiyere dwoŋ loyo joman kosa wowire woko kwoŋ or, racuc kosa racam; ŋey go kodi nyikwaye jowodhum ker pere i Isiraili hongo malac.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam ma Jolevi, meno, jonono pa Jolevi je, jolangoye g'adec kosa gir'alunja gi Joisiraili; jolacamo mic m'iwaŋo ri Rwoth, m'obedo adec pa Rwoth.
Riameno jongoye g'alunja i dier wutmin jo; Rwoth am'obedo gir'alunja pajo, paka go ociko jo.

Aka me ama labedo lim pa jocway ri Were i wi migam wok bongi ji, wok bongi jono ma jomiyo cowirok, obedi merikwa kosa rombo, joripo miyo jocway ri Were i wi migam wibac, lembe mere ario, kodi ic mere.
Ranyak marapena mar'olemo ma vini gi mo mewin kodi pien rombo, wiripo miyo go.
Kwoŋbedo Rwoth Were mewin otieko yero go kwoŋ nonin mewin je, cungo kodi tiyo i nyingi Rwoth, go kodi wote cil gi cil.
Ka Jalevi oeye wok i tindi mewin moro je, wok kama go oyido bed'iye i Isiraili je, to bino i kabedo ma Rwoth oyer, (aka go nyalo bino kisi ka cunye mito)
kenyo go nyalo tic i nyingi Rwoth Were pere, paka Jolevi wadi ma jocungo tic kenyo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Jolabedo gi migew marom acama, makada nende jonitie gi lim ma jolimo wok i mitan ma lim pajo ma peco.
Ka witundo i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win, wikiri wifonjere luwo tim ma mienirok pa nonin no.
Wokiri wonwaŋere i dier win nyatoro moro m'owaŋ wode kosa nyare paka mic, kosa ŋata temo bedo gi jamiliel kosa jar'ajwoka, kosa jathieth, kosa jajwok,
ŋata jalam, kosa ŋata luwo gi jwogere kosa tipo, kosa ŋata luwo gi jom'otho ma ŋeyo gima latimere yuwaŋe.
Rupiri ŋata timo gigipiny me labedo amien ri Rwoth; aka ro tim ma mienirok me, am'omiyo Rwoth Were mewin riemo woko jo ruwaŋ win.
Wiripo bedo g'adieri kicutho ri Rwoth Were mewin.
Makada nende nonin me ma wicegin mayo jo lowo pajo kodi gigipiny pajo, jowinjo jar'ajwoka kodi jamiliel, paka riwin, Rwoth Were mewin k'oyeyo win timo ameno.
Rwoth Were mewin lamiyo win jatuci wac Were ma cale kodan wok i dier win, wok kwoŋ wutmin win, aka ama wiripo winjo go.
Me a gima wikwayo Rwoth Were mewin wi Got Horeb i ndelo ma cokirok, munyo wiwaco ni, “Ka wawinjo dwondi Rwoth Were mawan, kosa waneno mac madwoŋ me kendo, walatho.”
Rwoth odwokan ni, “Jotire i gima jotieko waco.
Alayero rijo jatuci wac Were ma cale kodin wok i dier jo; aka alaketho wac paran i dhok jatuci wac Were, ma lawaco rijo gimoro je m'amiyo or kwoŋe.
Aka ŋata k'owinji wac paran ma jatuci wac Were laluwo i nyingan, an won alapenjo go.
To jatuci wac Were ma won okethere ma luwo wac moro i nyingan m'akioro go ni woluwi, kosa ŋata luwo i nyingi werin man, jatuci wac Were no latho.”
Aka inyalo penjere i cunyin ni, “Wanyalo nedi ŋeyo wac ma Rwoth k'oluwo?”
Ka jatuci wac Were luwo i nyingi Rwoth, ka wac no k'otundo i kare, kosa k'obedo adieri, meno wac ma Rwoth ama k'oluwo; jatuci wac Were oluwo gima go won oparo, okir womiy win bwok.
wilaketho gicen tindin madongo adek i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win lunjo.
Wiripo baro royo ma kadho i jo, to wipoko lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win lunjo iy'adec adek, ŋey ŋat'oneki nyatoro ma k'ogendera nyalo kwalok to pondo iy'acel kwoŋ jo.
Onyo me banja pa janek, m'oringi koro botho kwo pere, meno, ŋat'oneko nyawote ma k'ogendera m'oyido jok'obedo jokwor con.

K'obedi ni dhano okadho i lul gi nyawote ŋolo yen, to cinge wito le ma toŋo yath, to wic le budhere i loki mere to goyo nyawote to tho, go nyalo ringo iy'acel kwoŋ tindin madongo me to pond'iye botho kwo pere;
to ka woth obedi mabor, jaculi kwor i nge malieth nyalo riemo janek to neko janek, makada nende jalo oyido kiripi tho, rupiri oyido k'obedo jakwor pa nyawote i hongo macon.
Riameno amiyo win or ketho gicen tindin madongo adek.
Ka Rwoth Were mewin oloki malac adec mewin, paka otieko kwoŋere ri kwarere mewin to miyo win lowo je ma go ociko kwarere mewin miyo win;
tekin ni wikuro or me je maber, m'amiyo win konon, kanyo wimaro Rwoth Were mewin kodi wotho i yo pere noknok, nyaka wilamedo tindin madongo adek man kwoŋ adek me,
ŋey remo pa ŋata bubanja okir wooy i lowo mewin ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win paka gir'alunja, to banja ma oyo remo yimere kwoŋ win.
To ka nyatoro ro kwor gi nyawote onindi rigo apondi, to monjo go, neko go, to ringo iy'acel kwoŋ tindin me,
gikenyo jodongo ma tindi madwoŋ pa janek jolaoro woomi go wok kenyo, t'iketho go i cingi jaculi kwor woneki go.
Wikiri wimaki gi go wor, to wiripo kwanyo woko banja ma oyo remo ma bubanja i Isiraili, ŋey winwaŋ bero.
Ka jakony ma luwo adieri ma mito kelo teko ri nyawote oay to segeya nyawote ma timo gimarac,
kenyo j'ario me joripo bino ruwaŋ Rwoth, ruwaŋ jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jothum banja ma jotimo tic i hongo no;
jothum banja joripo menyo gino gi rieko, aka ka jakony ma luwo adieri obedo dhano m'okom to segeya nyawote i gima k'obedo adieri,
kenyo winyalo timo rigo paka oyido mito ni wotim ri nyawote; ameno wilakwanyo woko raco wok i dier win.
Aka jom'odoŋ jolawinjo to jolokere malwor, aka jok'otimi reco ma cale ameno kendo i dier win.
Wikiri wimaki wor gi go, labedo kwo ri kwo, waŋ ri waŋ, lak ri lak, cingi jo ri cingi jo, tiendi jo ri tiendi jo.
Ka wikidho lweny gi jokwor mewin, to wineno punde kodi cawilin, jolweny madwoŋ loyo mewin wikiri wibwok ro jo; kole Rwoth Were mewin nitie gi win, go m'owodho win wok i piny Misir.
Mafodi wikicako lweny, jacway ri Were i wi migam ripo bino malo to luwo gi jolweny,
ka waco rijo ni: “Winji, Awi Isiraili! Konon wicore cegin lweny kodi jokwor mewin. Cuny win wokiri wopodhi, kosa wikiri wibwok, kosa wikirin, kosa wibedi gi lworo rijo;
kole obedo Rwoth Were mewin ma kadho gi win, lwenyo riwin gi jokwor mewin, miyo win loyo.”

Kenyo jotel pa jolweny jolaluwo gi jolweny, ka jowaco ni, “Poyi nitie jacwo m'otieko geto ot aka fodi k'oketho i cingi Were? Go ripo gik i ot pere, kosa nyalo tho i lweny to jacwo man ama ketho i cingi Were.
Poyi nitie jacwo m'otieko pidho ndelo vini, to fodi k'obilo olemo mere? Go ripo gik i ot pere, kosa go nyalo tho i lweny to jacwo man ama telo bilo olemo mere.
Poyi nitie jacwo m'otieko penjere gi dhako, to fodi k'onywomo go? Go ripo gik i ot pere, kosa go nyalo tho i lweny to jacwo man nywomo go.”
Jotel pa jolweny jolamedere luwo gi jolweny, ka jowaco ni, “Poyi nitie jacwo manitie gi bwok kosa cunye podho? Go ripo dok peco pere, kosa go bende nyalo miyo cuny wadi podho paka apere.”
Ka jotel pa jolweny jotieko luwo gi jolweny, kenyo jomituka jolatelo jo.
Ka wicore cegin lweny gi tindi, kutho miy win jo silwany ma timo siem.
Ka joyere timo siem to jotiŋo cingi jo malo riwin, kenyo ji je ma iye jolatimo riwin tic arom.
To ka jok'omiyere riwin i siem, to jolwenyo gi win, kenyo wiripo thoko mako.
Aka ka Rwoth Were mewin okethi tindi no i cingi win, wiripo neko cwo mere je.
Winyalo, kad'ameno, kwanyo paka gima winyaga, mon mere, nyithindho, dhok kodi gigipiny man ma tindi, gimoro je ma dicwe. Wiwinji cwe ma gigipiny pa jokwor mewin, ma Rwoth Were mewin omiyo win.
Ameno bende apaka witim ri tindin je mabor gi win swa ma jok'obedo tindin ma nonin ma ka.
To paka ri tindin pa ji me ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win paka gir'alunja, wikiri wiwey gimoro je ma ywe wodoŋ makwo.
Wiripo reyo woko jo: Johiti, kodi Joamor, Jokanan kodi Joperiz, Johivi kodi Joyebus paka Rwoth Were mewin omiyo win or,
ŋey jokiri jowofonji win timo gigipiny mareco ma jotimo ri werin pajo, ameno to witimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth Were mewin.

Ka withoko mako tindi ma hongo malac, lweny gine ŋey wimaki, wikiri wirey yen mere gi toŋo gi le. Makada nende winyalo kwanyo cemo kwoŋ jo, wikiripi toŋo jo piny. To manago yen ma ndelin bende jobedo ji ma wiripo thoko mako?
Winyalo reyo woko yen ma wiŋeyo nike kinyak cemo kende; winyalo toŋo jo piny ma timo tic ma geto cel kwoŋ tindi ma lwenyo gi win, cuka podho.
K'onwaŋere i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win bedo mewin, del pa dhano m'oneki oriere kam'othangere, aka ŋat'oneko go k'oŋeyere,
jodongo mewin kodi jothum banja mewin jolakadho kipima boro ma tindin macegin gi kama del onwaŋere i iye.
Jodongo ma tindi macegin gi del jolakwanyo roya dhiaŋ ma fodi k'otiy gine kosa k'otiŋo bieto.
Jodongo ma tindi no jolakelo roya dhiaŋ no piny i milelo ma kicwiy, kama kifur kosa fodi k'ocwoy'iye, aka jolaturo ŋute kenyo.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam, nyikway Jolevi, jolabino yumalo winjo banjin mar'akaka. Kole Rwoth Were mewin otieko yero jo tic rigo kodi miyo silwany i nyingi Rwoth.
Jodongo je ma tindi macegin gi del pa ŋat'oneki jolalwoko cingi jo kwoŋ roya dhiaŋ m'otur ŋute i milelo ma kicwiy.
Aka jolawaco ni, “Cingi wan k'ooyo remo me, aka waŋ wan k'oneno.
Cwaki ji perin Isiraili, Awi Rwoth, ji perin m'ibotho; ikir'iwey banja ma remo ma bubanja wodoŋ i dier ji perin Isiraili.” Ameno ilacwako jo i banja ma oyo remo.
Ameno apaka wilacido woko banja ma remo ma bubanja i dier win, kwoŋbedo wiripo timo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Ka wikadho lweny gi jokwor mewin, aka Rwoth omiyo jo i cingi win to wimako jo paka jojiera,
k'ineno kwoŋ jojiera dhako maŋon m'igomba nywomo,
ilatero go peco i ot perin, aka go ripo lielo ye wiye, to ŋado lwet cinge.
Go lalunyo woko nanga pere ma jiera, to doŋ i ot perin ka ywako bamere kodi min ma dwe acel; aka rumacen, inyalo donjo bonge paka cwore, aka go labedo dhako perin.
To k'inen, go k'osangala in, inyalo weyo go kadho. Ikiripi kitana go ri pesa kosa tero go paka mukop, paka itieko riyo go nindo kodin.
Ka jacwo nitie gi mon ario, omaro acel, aka k'omaro acel; ka joje jonywolo rigo wote, to okayo bedo wod pa dhako ma go k'omaro,
kenyo i ndelo ma go poko wote lim ma go nitie gine ri wote, go kiripi tero wod pa dhako ma go omaro paka okayo to weyo wod pa dhako ma go k'omaro, m'obedo okayo.
Go ripo yeyo wod pa dhako ma go k'omaro paka okayo, to miyo go adec ma lim pere mirundi ario, manyacik go ripo nwaŋo kwoŋbedo go obedo remo marapena ma meni pere.
Ka dhano nitie gi wode ma jawictek aka jagwenyirok ma kiwinji dwondi bamere kosa min, makada nende jomiy go gir'acula,
bamere kodi min jolamako go to jotero go bongi jodongo ma tindi pere i waŋkac ma kabedo no.
Jolawaco ri jodongo ma tindi me ni, “Wod wan me wiye tek aka jagwenyirok. Go kiwinji dwondi wan, jaworo aka jamero.”
Cwo je ma tindi jolacadho go gi telin cuka tho. Aka Isiraili je lawinjo, to jobedo gi bwok.
Ka dhano otimo banja ma gir'acula ma tho, t'iŋawo go wi yath,
del pere kiripi weyo wonindi wi yath; wiripo yiko go i ndelo no won, kwoŋbedo ŋat'oŋaw wi yath nitie i lam pa Were. Wikiripi koco lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win wobedi mewin.
To k'inen won mere nitie bor kodin, kosa ikuya won mere, iripo tero peco perin, aka ripo doŋ bongin cuka won mere obin rango t'idwoko rigo.
Ameno apaka iripo timo gi punde pa jager perin, nanga pere, kosa gimoro je pa jager perin m'orweny t'inwaŋo ikir'ikan paka aperin.
Ikir'inen punde pa jager perin kosa dhiaŋ opodho i royo t'iweyo, iripo konyo woay malo.
Dhako kiripi rukirok paka jacwo, aka jacwo kiripi rukirok paka dhako, kwoŋbedo ŋata timo nger gino obedo amien ri Rwoth Were mewin.
K'inwaŋo od winyo, i yath moro je kosa i lowo, gi nyithindhe kosa i tonge, gi min munyo buto i wi nyithindhe kosa tonge, ikiripi kwanyo nyithindhe kodi min.
Adieri iripo weyo min wokadhi, t'ikwanyo nyithindhe mere, ŋey inwaŋ bero aka ibedi gi kwo mabor.
K'igeto ot, iripo timo acurcur ri wiy ot perin, ŋey ka dhano opodho wok i wi ot to tho, ikibedi gi banja ma oyo remo.
Ikiripi fur gi megikwe kodi punde munyo otwey jo kanyacel.
Ikiripi ruko nangin m'otimi kodi yer rombo gi nanga mafoth kanyacel.
Ka jacwo onywomo dhako, aka rumacen ma nindo gi go, to bedo ma k'omaro go,
to osa go, kanyo waco ni, “Anywomo dhako me; to munyo anindo gine, akinwaŋo gima nyutho nike go oyido obedo nyako mambula.”
Ba dheno kodi min joripo kelo gima ridho nike dheno oyido obedo nyako mambula bongi jodongo ma tindi madwoŋ i waŋkac.
Ba dhako no lawaco ri jodongo ni, “Amiyo nyaran i nywomirok ri jacwo me, onyo go k'omaro dhako.
Onyo pama go osa nyaran gi wac ni, ‘Akinwaŋo nyarin munyo nyako mambula.’ To ee gima ridho nike nyaran oyido nyako mambula.” Aka ilayaro suka ruwaŋ jodongo ma tindi.
Jodongo ma tindi no jolamako jacwo no to jomiyo go gir'acula.
Go ripo culo feza kilo 1.2 (m'iripo miyo ba dhako) kwoŋbedo go onyeko nyingi nyako Jaisiraili mambula. Dhako no ladoŋ paka cege, aka kilayeyo go riemo woko dhako no ka go fodi kwo.
To ka onwaŋere nike obedo adieri, dhako no oyido k'obedo dhako mambula,

ilakelo dhako no i dhiot ma ot pa bamere aka yac ma tindi pere jolacadho go gi telin cuka tho, kwoŋbedo go otimo giwickwot i Isiraili gi timo malaya i ot pa bamere. Ameno wilakwanyo woko reco me i dier win.
K'omaki jacwo nindo gi cipa nyawote, joje joripo tho, jacwo m'onindo gi dhako no kiri gi dhako no. Ameno wilakwanyo woko reco no i Isiraili.
Ka nitie nyako, mambula, aka obedo ombego pa jacwo moro, to jacwo man romo gi go i tindi to nindo gi go,
joje iripo kelo jo i waŋkac ma tindi t'icadho jo gi tele cuka jotho, kwoŋbedo nyako k'oywaki ri kony i tindi aka jacwo no onindo gi cipa jager pere. Ameno wilakwanyo woko reco no i dier win.
To ka jacwo oromo gi nyako m'obedo ombego pa jacwo man to podho kwoŋe gi mbaka kam'othangere to nindo gine, jacwo kende m'onindo gine am'iripo neko.
Wongoye gima witim ri nyako, go k'otimo banja ma cul mere bedo tho, kwoŋbedo banja no cale gi banja pa ŋata monjo jager pere to neko.
Paka jacwo no onwaŋo go kam'othangere, nyalo bedo nike go oywaki ri kony, to ngoye ŋat'okony go.
jacwo no ripo miyo kilo 0.6 ma feza ri ba nyako, aka labedo dhako pere. Kwoŋbedo jacwo no okwoto wi nyako no aka kilayeyo go riemo woko go ka go fodi kwo.
Jacwo kiripi nywomo cipa bamere, kosa neno kinyoro pa bamere.
Ŋat'onywol woko ma nywomirok kiripi yeyo i kacokirok pa Rwoth, kiri i luse mar'apar wongoye nyikway jo ma jowobedi i kacokirok pa Rwoth.
Wongoye Jaamon kosa Jamowab ma wiyey i kacokirok pa Rwoth, kiri i luse mar'apar, wongoye nyikway jo ma jowobedi i kacokirok pa Rwoth.
Kwoŋbedo jokwero miyo win cemo kodi pi i woth mewin wok i Misir, aka kwoŋbedo jonyewo Balam wod pa Bewor, ma wok i Pethor i Mesopotamia kwoŋo win.
