Kucel Rwoth Were mewin okwero winjo Balam. Rwoth Were mewin owiro lam no i silwany, kwoŋbedo Rwoth Were mewin omaro win.
Wikiri wirangi siem pajo kosa bero pajo tekin kafodi wikwo.
Wikiri widak Jaedom, kole jobedo wade mewin, wikiri widak Jamisir, kole oyido wibedo jopath i lowo pajo.
Nyithindho pajo ma jonywol kiri i luse mar'adek winyalo yeyo jo i kacokirok pa Rwoth.
Ka wiketho kambi kadho lweny gi jokwor mewin, wiripo kurok kwoŋ kidakana moro je.
Ka jacwo moro okocere gi leko nike oyido nindo gi dhako to biyo pi ma wor, go ripo wok woko ma kambi; go kiripi bino i kambi.
Ka othieno otundo, go wolwokere gi pi, aka ka waŋceŋ otieko podho, go nyalo dwoko i kambi.
Wiripo bedo g'adec woko ma kambi, kama winyalo kadh'iye konyirok.
Wiripo bedo gi kitiyo, ma ka witieko konyirok woko ma kambi, wiripo kunyo bur to wiyiko gima wipielo.
Kole Rwoth Were mewin wotho i kambi mewin, botho win kodi jwango jokwor mewin, riameno kambi mewin ripo bedo maleŋ, ŋey go wokiri wonen gimakoc to eye woko kwoŋ win.
Ŋecin ma jokwale bino bongi win wok bongi rwodhe pajo, wikiripi dwoko jo ri rwodhe pajo.
Jolabedo gi win, i dier win, i kabedo moro je ma joyer i tindi mewin acel, kama jomiti je, wikiripi diyo jo.
Wongoye nyako Jaisiraili moro je ma wobedi malaya i ot pa were.
Wikiripi kelo pesa m'ocul malaya i Ot pa Rwoth Were mewin i cul ma cikirok, kole je obedo amien ri Rwoth Were mewin.
Wikiripi kikopa pesa gi magowa ri Jaisiraili, kosa gir'aora, kosa gimoro je m'ikopa.
Ri japath inyalo kikopa gi magowa, to ikir'ikopa omin in gi magowa, ŋey Rwoth Were mewin womiy win silwany i tic mewin je i lowo ma wicegin donjo lunjo.
To k'iweyo m'ikiciko, kilabedo rin reco.
Gima dhokin otuco iripo timo gi kinen, paka in won iciko Rwoth Were perin gi dhokin.
K'idonjo i ndelo vini pa jager perin, inyalo camo ma romin paka imito, to ikiripi tiŋo iy'atawo.
K'idonjo i ndelo duma pa jager perin, inyalo turo ye ithe gi cingin, to ikiripi keco ŋano pere gi ringa.
Ka dheno owok i ot pere, go nyalo nywomere gi jacwo man.
To ka jacwo ma go onywomere gine k'omaro go, to ndiko rigo balwa ma pokirok, aka omiyo go i cinge, kosa ka jacwo no otho,

kenyo cwor go marapena, m'otelo riemo go, kiripi gik tero go paka dhako pere kendo, paka go otieko waco nike go koc. Kole meno labedo amien ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka wilakelo banja i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win paka gir'alunja.
Ka jacwo nyaka onywomo dhako, go kiripi kadho gi jolweny kosa timo tic ma makere gi lweny. Go ripo bedo peco ma oro acel, kisangala gi cege ma go onywomo.
Wongoye dhano ma wosinga kidi kosa cuma ma rego, kole meno bedo paka kisinga kwo.
Poyi win gima Rwoth Were mewin otimo ri Miriam i woth mewin wok i Misir.
Iripo kuro gi woko, kareno ŋat'ibanja kelo rin gima go osinga.
Ka ŋato obedo jacandi, ikiripi nindo gi gima go osinga.
Iripo dwoko rigo gim'osinga ka waŋceŋ podho, ŋey jager perin wonyali nindo i nanga pere, aka labedo rin gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth Were perin.
Iripo culo jo cul pajo kisi ndelo mafodi waŋceŋ k'opodho, kwoŋbedo jobedo jocandi aka meno apaka jokwo, ka k'obedo ameno jonyalo ywak ri Rwoth kwoŋin, aka labedo rin reco.
Poyi win nike oyido wibedo ŋecin i Misir aka Rwoth Were mewin obotho win wok koro, riameno amiyo win or timo gime.
K'ifono yen oliv perin, ikir'iyengi m'odoŋ, labedo apa japath, nyithindho kic, kodi citho.
K'ifono nyingi vini i ndelo vini perin, ikir'iluw fono m'odoŋ, labedo apa japath, nyithindho kic, kodi citho.
Poyi win nike oyido wibedo ŋecin i lowo ma Misir, riameno amiyo win or timo gime.
Ka dhaw obedo i dier j'ario, aka jobino bongi jothum banja theko jo, jolanwaŋo ŋat'otire kodi ŋat'okom.
K'inen ŋata jabanja iripo cwado, jathum banja lamiyo go nindo piny, aka wocwadi go ruwaŋe, gi goco marom gi komo pere.
Inyalo cwado go kiboko piero aŋwen, to ka okalo kenyo, nyalo miyo go bedo m'ongoye gi wor i dier ji.
Nyathi makayo ma dhako no onywol ilacwoko nyingi jatho, ŋey nyingi go wokiri worere i Isiraili.
To ka jacwo no k'omaro nywomo ciliendi omin, kenyo citho lakidho bongi jodongo i waŋkac to waco ni, “Omin cworan odak tiŋo malo nyingi omin i Isiraili, go kilatimo ran paka yworan.”
Kenyo jodongo ma tindi pere jolalwoŋo go luwo gi go. To ka go ocwire waco ni, “Angoye gi mito ma nywomo go.”
Kenyo ciliendi omin lakadho ruwaŋ jodongo, to fudho war i tiendi ywore, woŋul law i waŋe, to waco ni, “Me a gim'itimo ri jacwo ma kigeti peco p'omin go.”
Ilalwoŋo nyinge i Isiraili je nike peco pa ŋat'oluny war pere.
Ka cwo ario jogore, aka cipa ŋat'acel odonj'iye botho cwore kwoŋ goco pa nyawote gi ywayo mandi go,
iripo toŋo woko cingi dhako no m'ongoye wor.
Ikir'ibedi gi rapim masew kodi mapek i udi mewin.
Iripo bedo gi latir kodi rapim m'otire, ŋey ndelo perin wobedi mabor i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win.
Kole jono je ma jotimo nger gino, jono je ma jokitim adieri, jobedo amien ri Rwoth Were mewin.
Jomonjo win i royo, munyo wiol aka wiloc, to joneko jono m'oyido jodoŋ cen; jok'olworo Were.

Riameno ka Rwoth Were mewin otieko miyo win ywomirok kwoŋ jokwor mewin je i thenge je, i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win paka gir'alunja, wiripo reyo woko Joamalek wok i pendi polo, wicwil okir womaki win.
Ka witieko tundo i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win paka gir'alunja mewin, to wilunjo, to wibed'iye,
wiripo kwanyo olemo marapena ma kisi ranyak ma wikeco wok i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win, wikethi iy'adita to wikadho i kabedo ma Rwoth Were mewin layero ri nyinge koro.
Wilakidho bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam manitie i tic i hongo no, aka wilawaco rigo ni, “Konon me awaco ri Rwoth Were perin nike atieko tundo i lowo ma Rwoth okwoŋere ri kwarere mewin miyo wan.”
Aka jacway ri Were i wi migam lakwanyo adita wok i cingin to ketho piny ruwaŋ migam pa Rwoth Were perin,
iladwoko k'iwaco ruwaŋ Rwoth Were perin ama: “Kwara cango obedo jawoth Arameyan, okadho piny i Misir aka obedo koro paka japath, manok i welo, aka kenyo olokere nono madwoŋ, jameni, aka oŋeyere.
To munyo Jomisir jotero wan gi gwayo to jomiyo wan litho, gi miyo wan tic matek,
waywak ri Rwoth Were pa kwarere mawan, Rwoth owinjo dwondi wan aka oneno litho mawan, kwok mawan, kodi adica mawan.
Rwoth owodho wan wok i Misir gi cinge ma meni, cinge m'oyare, gi meni ma kelo lworo, gi ranyuth kodi gir'aura.
Go okelo wan i kabedo me to miyo wan lowo me, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic.
Onyo neni pama akelo olemo marapena ma lowo ma in, Awi Rwoth Were paran, imiyan.” Ilaketho piny ruwaŋ Rwoth Were perin, t'ikule piny ruwaŋ Rwoth Were perin.
Ilakisangala gi bero je ma Rwoth Were perin omiyin, kodi ot perin, kanyacel gi Jolevi, kodi jopath ma jobedo i dier win.

Aka ilawaco ruwaŋ Rwoth Were perin ni, “Atieko kwanyo woko migew maleŋ wok i ot paran, aka atieko miyo Jolevi, jopath ma jobedo gi wan, nyithindho kic, kodi citho, cungo kwoŋ or perin je m'imiyan. Akituro, kosa wiyan k'owil gi or perin.
Akicamo munyo aywak, akikwanyo munyo akoc, aka akimiyo jom'otho. Atieko winjo dwondi Rwoth Were paran, timo paka imiyan or.
Ŋiy piny wok i kabedo perin maleŋ, wok i polo, aka imiy ji perin Isiraili silwany kodi lowo m'itieko miyo wan, paka iciko kwarere mawan, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic.”
Konon me Rwoth Were mewin miyo win or kuro fonji me kodi cik me; timo gi kinen gi cuny win je kodi adundo mewin je.
Paka witieko yeyo konon me, nike Rwoth obedo Were mewin, aka win wilawotho i yo pere, luwo fonji pere, or pere kodi cik pere, kodi winjo dwonde.
Konon me Rwoth otieko waco nike wibedo ji pere m'omaro, paka go oluwo gi win, kuro or pere;
kodi tiŋo win malo swa loyo nonin je ma go ocweyo, i pak, i limo nyingi win, kodi dwoŋ, kodi riwin bedo ji maleŋ ri Rwoth Were mewin paka go otieko waco.
Kenyo Musa kodi jodongo ma Isiraili jomiyo ji or ka waco ni: “Kur win or je m'amiyo win konon.
I ndelo ma wilaŋado Yordan donjo i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win, wiripo dhuro telin mapando to wifuyo.
Wiripo ndiko i jo wac je ma cik me ka witieko ŋado, donjo i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, paka Rwoth Were pa kwarere mewin ociko win.
Ameno ka witieko ŋado Yordan, wilajengo telin paka amiyo win or konon, i Got Ebal, wiripo fuyo jo.
Wiripo geto ri Rwoth Were mewin migam, migam ma telin ma fodi wikior'iye cuma moro je.
Telin ma k'opay ama wiripo oro ma geto migam ri Rwoth Were mewin. Kenyo wilamiyo Rwoth Were mewin mic awaŋa i wiye.
Miy win mic ma siem, to wicamo kenyo, ka wisangala ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin.
Wiripo ndiko i telin no wac je ma cik me ma neno maber.”
Musa kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam ma Jolevi joluwo gi Joisiraili je ka jowaco ni, Liŋ win aka wiwinji, Awi Isiraili! Konon me wilokere ji pa Rwoth Were mewin.
Riameno winji win dwondi Rwoth Were mewin, kuro or pere kodi cik pere paka amiyo win or konon.
I ndelo acel no Musa omiyo ji or ka waco ama:
Ka witieko ŋado Yordan, nonin me jolacungo wi got Gerizim miyo ji silwany: Simeo, Levi, Yuda, Isakar, Yozefu, kodi Benyamin.
Aka nonin me jolacungo wi Got Ebal lamo ji: Ruben, Gad, Aser, Zebulun, Dan, kodi Nafital.
Aka Jolevi jolawaco ri Joisiraili je gi dwondi jo ma malo ama:
Kwoŋ ri ŋata timo cal m'opay kosa cal m'onyel je m'obedo amien ri Rwoth, tic ma cingi jandijo ma cwec to lamo manyaliŋliŋ. Ji je joladwoko ni, “Obedi Ameno!”
Kwoŋ ri ŋata neko jager pere manyaliŋliŋ. Ji je joladwoko ni, “Obedi Ameno!”
Kwoŋ ri ŋata jolo nyew ma oyo remo ma bubanja. Ji je joladwoko ni, “Obedi Ameno!”
Silwany me je labedo mewin, ka winowinji dwondi Rwoth Were mewin.
Wilabedo josilwany i tindi madwoŋ, kodi i ndelin mewin.
Silwany labedo gi nywol mewin, ranyak ma ndelin mewin, nywol p'ogwaŋe mewin, dhok kodi mwendi mewin lamedere.
Adita mewin kodi gitedo mewin lapoŋ silwany.
Silwany labedo gi win ka wikadho woth, kodi ka widwoko.
Rwoth lamiyo win kikengila jokwor mewin ma jomonji win ruwaŋ win. Jolamonjo win gi thenge acel, to jolaringo i thenge abirio.
Rwoth lamiyo or ri silwany kwoŋ cemo mewin, kodi tic je ma cingi win. Go lamiyo win silwany i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win.
Rwoth laloko win ji pere maleŋ, paka otieko ciko win, ka winokur or pa Rwoth Were mewin kodi wotho i yo pere.
Nonin je ma i piny jolaneno nike ilwoŋo win gi nyingi Rwoth, aka jolabedo gi bwok riwin.
Rwoth lamiyo lim mewin wonyay, nywol mewin, nywol p'ogwaŋe mewin, kodi ranyak ma lowo ma Rwoth okwoŋere ri kwarere mewin miyo win.
Rwoth layawo kakan ma ŋaŋo pere, polo, miyo win koth i lowo mewin i hongo ma ripo to miyo tic je ma cingi win silwany. Wilakikopa nonin kweth, to wikilabedo gi banjin pajo.
Rwoth lamiyo win bedo marapena, makiweno macowe; wilabedo wic, makiweno yiwe, ka winowinji or pa Rwoth Were mewin, paka amiyo win or konon, gi kuro je gi kinen.
Ka wikiwire kwoŋ wac je m'amiyo win or kwoŋe konon, obedi racuc kosa racam, luwo werin man gi tiyo rijo.
To ka winokwer winjo Rwoth Were mewin gi kinen, kuro or pere je kodi cik, paka amiyo win or konon, lam me je laluwo win.
Lam laluwo tindi mewin madwoŋ, kodi ndelin mewin.
Lam labedo iy'adita mewin kodi i wer ma dwanyo ŋano mewin.
Lam laluwo nywol mewin, nywol p'ogwaŋe mewin, dhok mewin kodi mwendi mewin.
Lam laluwo win ka wikadho woth kodi ka widwoko.
Rwoth ladhiro kwoŋ win kwoŋ, nywowirok, kodi dhierok i gima winotem timo je, cuka wirere piyo, ro tim mewin marac, rupiri wijwangan.
Rwoth lamiyo two nundu wocwire kwoŋ win cuka wirere woko kicutho i lowo ma widonj'iye lunjo.
Rwoth lamiyo win litho gi two ma nyeko del, senyiga, lietho ma waŋo jo, g'abor, gi milengela, kodi koyo malieth kodi two ma topo woko cemo gi ndelin cuka wirere woko.
Polo manitie i wiwin labedo ywel, aka piny manitie i tiendi win labedo nyweny.
Rwoth laloko koth ma lowo mewin moko, aka fukefuke ama lacwe piny kwoŋ win wok i polo cuka wirere woko.
Rwoth lamiyo wokengila win ruwaŋ jokwor mewin, wilamonjo jo gi thenge acel, to wilaringo woko kwoŋ jo i thenge abirio. Wilabedo gibwok ri kerin je ma i piny.
Delkwoŋ win labedo cemo ri winyin ma koyo kodi ogwaŋe ma i piny, aka ongoye ŋata lariemo woko jo.
Rwoth lamiyo win litho gi bur ma Misir, akwota kwoŋ, gwenyo, kasengo, kodi ayilayila ma jokicangi.
Rwoth lamiyo win litho gi neko, waŋtho, kodi paro m'onywowere.
Aka wilakimudamuda odieceŋ paka ŋata waŋ'otho i mudho, aka wikilaneno royo. Iladiyo win kodi kinyaga win noknok, aka ongoye ŋata lakonyo win.
Ilayiko nywomirok gi dhako, to jacwo man ama lanindo gi go. Ilageto ot, t'ikila nind'iye. Ilapidho ndelo vini, t'ikila camo olemo mere.
Ilathumo thwon perin ruwaŋin, aka ikilacamo. Ilakwalo punde perin k'ineno ama, aka k'odwoki rin. Rombo perin ilamiyo jokwor perin, aka ongoye ŋata lakonyin.
Nyithindho perin ilapoko ji man, kareno ineno gi waŋin, iladwaro jo gi waŋin ndelo gipi, t'ilangoye gi meni i cingin timo gimoro je.
Ji ma fodi wikuya ama jolacamo olemo ma lowo mewin kodi kwok mewin, aka ilamedo diyo win kodi ŋinyo win.
Neko lamako win gi gima waŋ win laneno.
Rwoth lagoyo congi win kodi tiendi win gi bur malith makicangi, wok i par tiendi win tundo i katap wiwin.
Rwoth latero win, kodi kere mewin ma wilayero dhumo win, i piny ma fodi win kosa kwarere mewin jokuya, koro wilatic ri werin man, ma mbawo kodi tele.
Wilalokere gibwok, ageca, kodi gir'awaca i dier nonin kama Rwoth later'iye win.
Wilacwoyo kodhi kweth i ndelin, to wilakeco manok, kole bonyo lacamo woko.
Wilapidho ndelo vini kodi kikolesa, to wikilamadho vini kosa fono nyinge, kole kudin lacamo woko.
Wilabedo gi yen oliv iy'adece mewin je, to wik'owir mo mere, kole oliv mere laoy woko.
Wilanywolo nyithindho, to jokilabedo mewin, kole ilatero jo i twec.
Bonyo lareyo woko yen je kodi olemo ma lowo mewin.
Jopath ma jobedo i dier win jolamedere dongo kadho malo, to wilamedere giki cen.
Jolakikopa win, to wikilakikopa jo, jolabedo wic aka wilabedo yiwe.
Lam me je labino kwoŋ win, laluwo win to laco win, cuka wirere woko, kwoŋbedo wikiwinjo dwondi Rwoth Were mewin, gi kuro or pere kodi cik pere paka omiyo win or.
Me labedo ranyuth kodi gir'aura kwoŋ win kodi nyikway win cil gi cil.
Kwoŋbedo wikwero tiyo ri Rwoth Were mewin gi kisangala kodi forok i cuny win ri thotho ma gigipiny je,
riameno wilatic ri jokwor mewin ma Rwoth ladhiro monjo win, i kec kodi riyo pi, kinyoro kodi awanya. Go laketho bieto ma nyweny i ŋuti win cuka reyo woko win.
Rwoth lakelo nono wok bor swa, wok i gike ma piny, ma dwir paka ango, nono ma wikiniaŋ dhodhok pajo.
Nono ma jongoye gi wor i waŋ jo, ma kiwor jodongo kosa nyuthi nyithindho wor.
Jolacamo nyithindhi ogwaŋe mewin, kodi olemo ma lowo mewin cuka wirere woko, to joweyo win m'ongoye ŋano, vini, mo, kosa nyithindhi dhok kodi nyithindhi mwendi.
Jolathoko tindin mewin je cuka kor ot mewin m'oŋawere m'otinda m'oyido wigeno opodhi piny je. Jolathoko tindin mewin je i lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win.
Wilacamo nywol mewin won, riŋo nyithindho mewin won ma Rwoth Were mewin otieko miyo win, i litho ma jokwor mewin jolamiyo win, ka jothoko win.
Kiri kwoŋ cwo m'imiyo dwoŋ i dier win lathwono omin go won, kosa dhako pere m'omaro, kosa nyithindho pere ma joboth cemo.
Kilamiyo kad'acel kwoŋ jo riŋo pa nyithindho pere ma camo kwoŋbedo meno a gima go odoŋ gine kende, i litho ma jokwor mewin jolaketh'iye win i tindin mewin je.
Kiri dhako m'imiyo dwoŋ swa i dier win, ma kinyal kada temo nyono piny gi par tiende, lathwono cwore m'omaro kodi nyithindho pere cemo.
Lathwono jo kiri biero nyathi kodi nyathi m'onywolo, kwoŋbedo go camo aponda ro ngoye gi giman je, i litho ma jokwor mewin jolamiyo win ka jothoko win.
Ka wikikuro gi kinen wac je ma cik me, m'ondiki i kitawo me, lworo nyingi go ma didwoŋ aka ma kelo lworo, Rwoth Were mewin,
ladhiro kwoŋ win kodi nyikway win litho marac swa, ma kelo lworo, ma yindira kodi two malith swa makicangi.
Go lakelo kwoŋ win two ca je ma Misir, ma bin wilworo, aka lacwire kwoŋ win.
Rwoth lamiyo win litho gi two man je makicangi, ma k'ondiki i kitawo ma cik me, cuka winorere woko.
Wiladoŋ manok, makada nende oyido withoth paka micalin ma i polo, kwoŋbedo wikiwinjo dwondi Rwoth Were mewin.
Paka Rwoth osangala miyo win lim kodi loko win mathoth, apaka go bende lakisangala kisika kodi reyo woko win. Go lafudho woko win wok i lowo ma wikidho lunjo.
Rwoth lakedho win i dier nonin je, wok i gike ma piny acel tundo i meca, aka koro ama wilatic ri werin man, ma mbawin kodi telin, ma win kosa kwarere mewin fodi wikuya.
Aka i dier nonin no, kilabedo riwin mayot, kosa wik'onwaŋ karwako tiendi win. Rwoth lamiyo cuny win wokirin, waŋ win lacor aka cuny win larembo.
Kwo mewin laliero i kiganagana, wor g'odieceŋ wilapoŋ gi lworo, aka wilangoye gi geno i kwo mewin.
Odikin wilawaco ni, “Kabedi oyido piny yuthi!” Aka othieno wilawaco ni, “Kabedi oyido piny yawere!” Kwoŋbedo cuny win labwok kodi gima waŋ win laneno.
Rwoth ladwoko win i mel kiri Misir, gi royo m'aciko win nike wikilaneno kendo; aka koro wilatanere ri jokwor mewin paka ŋecin ma mon kodi cwo, to langoye janyew.
Me wac ma cikirok ma Rwoth omiyo Musa or nike wotim gi Joisiraili i lowo ma Mowab, medo i wi cikirok m'oyido otieko timo gi jo i got Horeb ma bende obedo got Sinai.
Musa olwoŋo Joisiraili je kanyacel aka owaco rijo ni, “Witieko neno gi waŋ win gima Rwoth otimo i lowo ma Misir, ri Farawo kodi ŋecin pere kodi lowo pere je.
Thoyamo madongo ma wineno gi waŋ win, ranyuth kodi gir'aura madongo no.
To Rwoth fodi k'omiyo win paro ma niaŋ, kosa waŋ win ma neno, kosa ithi win ma winjo, kiri konon.
Atieko telo win oro piero aŋwen i thim, to nangin mewin fodi k'oyec, aka war mewin ma tiendi win fodi k'oti.
Kole fodi wikicamo mugat, kosa madho vini kosa medho makec, ŋey wiŋey ni An Abedo Rwoth Were mewin.
Munyo wibino i kabedo me, Kere Sihon ma Hesibon kodi Kere Og ma Basan jobino lweny gi wan, to wakengila jo.
Wamayo jo lowo pajo aka wamiyo ri nono pa Ruben, Gad kodi adec nono pa Manase paka lim pajo.
Riameno kur win wac je ma cikirok me, aka witim gi kinen, ŋey winwaŋ bero i gima witimo.”
“Wicungo wicokere konon, wijoje, ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin, jotel ma nonin mewin, jodongo, jodhum, cwo je ma Isiraili.
Nyithindho mewin, mon mewin, jopath ma jobedo i kambi mewin, jokiranda mbawin mewin kodi jokulo pi riwin.
Konon widonjo i cikirok pa Rwoth Were mewin, i kwoŋirok, ma Rwoth Were mewin timo gi win konon;
ŋey go wokethi win konon paka ji pere, aka go wobedi Were mewin, paka ociko win kodi paka okwoŋere ri Abraham, ri Isaka kodi ri Yakobo.
Akitim cikirok me, i kwoŋirok gi win kende ma wicungo ka konon ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mawan,
to gi kisi ŋata nitie ka gi wan m'ocungo konon ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mawan, kodi jono ma jongoye ka gi wan konon.
Kole wiŋeyo nger ma wakwo i lowo ma Misir, kodi nger ma wabino ka luwo i dier nonin ma wiluw'iye.
Witieko neno gir'amien ma jotimo, cal ma mbawo kodi telin, ma feza gi zahabu, m'oyido nitie i dier jo.

Wokiri wobedi i dier win jacwo kosa dhako, kosa peco kosa nono, ma cunye owire woko kwoŋ Rwoth Were mawan tiyo ri werin man mapa nonin no. Meno nyalo cale paka fuc ma nyak olemo manitie gi kwir kodi makec.
Ŋata winjo wac ma lam me to miyere silwany, gi paro i cunye ni, ‘Siem ran alaluwo cay ma cunyan.’ (Meno nyalo kelo teko kwoŋ ji marac kodi maber je).
Rwoth kilayeyo cwako ri nger ŋato, kole nge pa Rwoth kodi nyeko pere laliel kwoŋe. Lam je m'ondiki i kitawo me laluwo go, aka Rwoth lareyo woko nyingi go wok i pendi polo.
Rwoth ladimo go wok i nonin je ma Isiraili ri teko, cungo kwoŋ kwoŋirok ma cikirok m'ondiki i kitawo me ma cik.”

Lowo mere je owaŋ woko gi mac kodi cumbi, m'ongoye gim'inyalo pidh'iye, ongoye gima twi i iye, ongoye gima nyal dong'iye, paka i rerok pa Sodom, Gomora, Adima kodi Zeboyim ma Rwoth oreyo woko i nge pere kodi i keme pere.
Nonin je jolaluwo kwoŋ gima Rwoth otimo ri lowo me ka jopenjere ni, ‘Aŋo m'okelo nyutho nge m'oliel me?’
Wegi joladwoko ni, ‘Kwoŋbedo joweyo cikirok ma Rwoth Were pa kwarere pajo otimo gi jo munyo owodho jo wok i lowo ma Misir.
Joluwo to jotiyo ri werin man, jolamo werin ma fodi jokuya, ma Rwoth oyido k'omiyo jo.
Nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ lowo me to kelo kwoŋe lam je m'ondiki i kitawo me.
Rwoth ofudho jo wok i lowo pajo i nge, gero kodi keme madwoŋ, to bolo jo i lowo man paka nitie konon.’ ”
“Gigipiny m'opanere obedo apa Rwoth Were mawan, aka gigipiny m'omenyere obedo mawan kodi nyikway wan cil gi cil, timo wac je ma cik me.”
Gigipiny me je labino kwoŋ win, silwany je kodi lam je, m'aketho ruwaŋ win, aka wilapoyo i cuny win, i dier nonin je kama Rwoth lajwang'iye win.
Aka wiladwoko bongi Rwoth Were mewin, to wiwinjo dwondi go, paka amiyo win or konon, win kodi nyithindho mewin, gi cuny win je kodi kwo mewin je.
Aka Rwoth Were mewin ladwoko win wok i twec mewin, to mako gi win wor, aka go lawire to coko win wok i dier nonin kama Rwoth Were mewin okedh'iye win koro.
Makada nende bedi nike go oyido ojwango win i gike ma polo, Rwoth Were mewin lacoko win, aka go ladwoko win wok koro.
Rwoth Were mewin lakelo win i lowo ma kwarere mewin jolunjo, wilalunjo, aka lakadho maber gi win, aka go laloko win mathoth loyo.
Rwoth layomo cuny win kodi cuny nyikway win, ŋey wimar Rwoth Were mewin gi cuny win je kodi kwo mewin je, ŋey wibedi makwo.
Rwoth laketho lam me je kwoŋ jokwor mewin kodi jono ma jodak win, ma jomiyo win litho.
Aka wilagik winjo dwondi Rwoth kodi timo or pere je paka amiyo win or konon.

Rwoth Were mewin lamiyo win ŋaŋo mathoth i tic ma cingi win je, nywol mewin, nywol p'ogwaŋe mewin kodi ranyak ma lowo mewin. Kole lakisangala Rwoth miyo win bero paka osangala go miyo kwarere mewin bero.
Ka winowinji dwondi Rwoth Were mewin, kuro or pere kodi fonji pere m'ondiki i kitawo ma cik me, ka winowire bongi Rwoth Were mewin gi cuny win je kodi kwo mewin je.
Kole or m'amiyo win or kwoŋe konon me kitek riwin, kosa kibor gi win.
Kinitie i polo, ma winowaci ni, ŋa ma laidho riwan i polo ŋey wonyali omo riwan, aka ŋey wanyal winjo to watimo.
Kosa kinitie i thengi nam ca, ma winowaci ni, ŋa m'ocewere kadho i thengi nam yukoca, ŋey wonyali omo riwan, aka ŋey wanyal winjo to watimo.
Kole wac nitie cegin swa gi win, i dhok win kodi i cuny win ŋey winyal timo.
Neni ee, aketho ruwaŋ win konon me, kwo kodi bero, tho kodi teko,

paka amiyo win or konon me, maro Rwoth Were mewin, wotho i yo pere, kuro or pere, fonji pere, cik pere, wilakwo to wimedo nyay, aka Rwoth Were mewin lamiyo win silwany i lowo ma wicegin kadh'iye koro lunjo.
To ka cuny win owire woko, to wikwero winjo, aka winorweny to wicako lamo werin man kodi tiyo rijo,
awaco riwin nike wilatho adieri. Ndelo mewin k'obedi mabor i lowo ma wicegin ŋado Yordan kadho yukoro lunjo.
Alwoŋo polo kodi piny bedo paka jokony kwoŋ win konon me, nike atieko ketho ruwaŋ win kwo kodi tho, silwany kodi lam. Yer win kwo ŋey winyal kwo, win kodi nyikway win,

maro Rwoth Were mewin, winjo dwondi go, kodi ketho go marapena. Kole go ama miyo win kwo kodi ndelo mabor, ŋey wibedi i lowo ma Rwoth okwoŋere ri kwarere mewin ri Abraham ri Isaka kodi ri Yakobo miyo jo.
Musa omedere luwo wac me ri Joisiraili je.
Aka owaco rijo ni, “Ajaoro miya acel gi piero ario konon me. Akinyali kendo medirok, aka Rwoth otieko waco ran ni, ‘Ak'okali Yordan me.’
Rwoth Were mewin won ama laŋado yuwiy win. Go lareyo woko nonin me ruwaŋ win. Yosuwa bende latelo win paka Rwoth owaco.
Rwoth latimo rijo paka otimo ri Sihon kodi Og kerin pa Joamor kodi lowo pajo ma go oreyo woko.
Rwoth lajwango jo ruwaŋ win, aka wilatimo rijo paka amiyo win or.
Bedi win matek, bedi win jomiseni; wikiri wibedi gi bwok kosa wikirin ro jo, kole Rwoth Were mewin ama kadho gi win. Go k'owey win, kosa jwango win.”
Musa olwoŋo Yosuwa aka owaco rigo ruwaŋ Joisiraili je ni, “Bedi matek, bedi jamisen, kole iŋat'ilakadho gi ji me i lowo ma Rwoth ociko kwarere pajo miyo jo, aka ilamiyo jo lunjo.
Rwoth won ama telo yuwiy win. Go labedo kodin; go kilaweyin kosa jwangin. Ikir'ibedi gi bwok kosa inyapere.”
Musa ondiko cik me piny, to miyo jocway ri Were i wi migam, wot Jolevi, ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth kodi jodongo je ma Isiraili.
Musa omiyo jo or ka waco ama: “Kisi ka oro mar'abirio rumo, i hongo ma reyo woko banjin, i Kalima ma Kayindi,
ka Joisiraili je jobino ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mewin i kabedo ma go layero, soma win cik me malo ruwaŋ Joisiraili je ka jowinjo.
Coki win ji, cwo, mon, nyithindho kiri gi jopath ma jobedo i waŋkac mewin, ŋey jowowinji, to jofonjere lworo Rwoth Were mewin, aka ŋey jowogwokere timo wac je ma cik me.
Nyithindho pajo ma fodi jokuya jowowinji aka jowofonjere lworo Rwoth Were mewin, tekin fodi wimedo kwo i lowo ma wiŋado Yordan kadho lunjo.”
Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Ee, ndelo perin ma tho cegin tundo, lwoŋ Yosuwa aka wibin gi go i Wema ma romo, ŋey anyal oro go.” Aka Musa kodi Yosuwa jokadho i Wema ma romo.
Rwoth omenyere i wema i siro ma pondeponde; aka siro ma pondeponde ocungo i dhiot ma wema.

Rwoth owaco ri Musa ni, “Icegin nindo kanyacel gi kwarere perin ka. To ji me jolaay timirok paka malaya, luwo werin pa jopath i dier lowo ma jocegin kadh'iye koro, aka jolaweyan, to joturo cikirok m'atimo gi jo.

Nge paran laliel kwoŋ jo i ndelo no, alajwango jo t'apano waŋan kwoŋ jo. Joladoŋ ri rerok aka gimarac kweth kodi teko labino kwoŋ jo. I ndelo no jolapenjo ni, ‘Teko me k'obino kwoŋ wan, kwoŋbedo Were mawan ongoye i dier wan?’
I ndelo no alapano waŋan adieri, ro reco ma jotimo gi wirok bongi werin man.”
“Onyo riameno ndiki wer me, aka ifonji Joisiraili, kethi i dhok jo, ŋey wer me wobedi ran jakony ma luwo adieri kwoŋ Joisiraili.
Kole k'atieko kelo jo i lowo m'aciko kwarere pajo, ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, ka jotieko cemo gi yeŋo, jolawire bongi werin man tiyo rijo, cayan kodi turo cikirok paran.

Aka ka raco kodi teko kweth otieko podho kwoŋ jo, wer me labedo jakony ma luwo adieri, kwoŋbedo kilarwenyo i dhok nyikway jo. Kole atieko ŋeyo gima joyikere timo konon mafodi akikelo jo i lowo m'aciko jo.”
Musa ondiko wer no i ndelo no won to fonjo Joisiraili.
Rwoth ooro Yosuwa wod pa Nun ka waco ni, “Bedi matek, bedi jamiseni, kole ilakelo Joisiraili i lowo m'aciko jo. Alabedo kodin.”
Aka paka Musa otieko ndiko wac ma cik me je i kitawo kiri i cowe,
Musa owodho or ri Jolevi ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth ka waco ama:
“Ter win kitawo ma cik me, aka wikethi kabuti Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth Were mewin, weyi wodoŋ kenyo paka jakony ma luwo adieri kwoŋ win.
Kole aŋeyo maber paka wi jogwenyirok kodi wictek. Ee fodi akwo gi win konon to wigwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth, t'obedi nedi k'atieko tho!
Coki ran jodongo je ma nonin mewin kodi jodhum, ŋey anyal luwo gi jo wac me ka jowinjo, aka ŋey anyal lwoŋo polo kodi piny bedo jokony kwoŋ jo.

Kole aŋeyo nike rumacen ma tho paran, wilatimo gikidakana adieri, aka wilawire woko kwoŋ yo m'amiyo win or luwo, i ndelo no teko lapodho kwoŋ win, kwoŋbedo witimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, kwinyo nge pere gi tic ma cingi win.”
Musa oluwo i ithi Joisiraili je m'oyido jocokere wac je ma wer me kiri i cowe.
Cik ithin, awi polo aka alaluwo,
winji awi piny, wac ma wok i dhokan.
Fonji paran lathon paka koth,
luwo paran laŋicere paka thoyo,
paka koth ma lilo i lum,
paka nyidho i cemo madongo.
Kole alapako nyingi Rwoth,
alamiyo dwoŋ ri Were mawan.
Go tele, tic pere nitie i kare,
yo pere je otire.
Were ma timo adieri, m'ongoye gi banirok,
go jatiro aka timo gim'otire.
Kucel nyithindho pere jobanere rigo,
jobedo luse ma jorwenyo, ma jomienere.
Ama apaka wilaculo Rwoth?
Awi ji ma jomiŋ, ma jongoye gi rieko!
Kosa go k'obedo bawin, go m'ocweyo win,
m'otimo win, to bedo cakirok mewin?
Poyi ndelo ma cen,
par kwoŋ luse macon,
penji benin aka lakowo rin,
jom'otegino jolawaco rin.
Munyo Jamalo Swa opoko nonin lim,
munyo otiako ji,
ocomo kew ri ji,
cungo kwoŋ welo pa Joisiraili.
Adec pa Rwoth obedo ji pere,
Yakobo obedo alunja pere.
Go onwaŋo go i lowo abar,
i thim ma nyekere m'othangere,
okwonga go, aka odewo kwoŋe,
ogwoko go paka nyangil waŋe.
Paka ango kedho woko thac mere,
aka waya i wi nyithindhe,
paka yaro bwombe aka tiŋo jo malo,
aka liero jo i bwombe,
apaka Rwoth kende am'otelo jo,
aka ongoye were makicar m'oyido nitie gi jo.
Go otiŋo jo i kabedo ma malo i piny,
aka opidho jo gi ranyak ma ndelin,
omiyo jo naŋo mo kic ma wok i tele, kodi mo wok i tele lwanda ma cot mac.
Mo dhiaŋ kodi cak mwendi,
gi bor nyithindhi rombo kodi wot rombo.
Dhok ma Basan kodi diegi,
kanyacel gi ŋano m'oyer ayera
kodi vini ndoto ma wimadho.
Yesurun meno nyingi Yakobo man, opoŋ aka ogwenyere,
okelo del aka cwe,
ojwango Were m'ocweyo go,
aka oŋalo Tele ma both pere.
Jomiyo go nyeko gi werin makicar,
aka jokwinyo nge pere g'amien.
Jocowere ri jwogi, ma ki Were,
werin ma fodi jokuya,
ma nyaka joay manyen,
ma kwarere pajo jok'olworo.
Wikiparo kwoŋ Tele m'onywolo win,
wiy win owil gi Were m'onywolo win.
Rwoth oneno aka omako nge,
okwedo jo paka nyithindho pere,
kwoŋbedo jomiyo go nge.
Go owaco ni: Alapano waŋan kwoŋ jo,
Alaneno gima gike pajo obedi;
kole jobedo luse m'orwenyo,
nyithindho m'adieri kinwaŋere i jo.
jokwinyo nge paran gi cal pajo.
Ameno alamiyo jo nyeko gi gima k'obedo ji,
alakwinyo nge pajo gi nono mamiŋ.
Kole nge paran oliel paka mac,
aka owaŋ kiri i piny pa jom'otho,
reyo woko piny kodi ranyak mere,
aka ocwinyo kindi gote.
Aladhuro teko kwoŋ jo,
alaoro aserin paran kwoŋ jo.
Kec ama lanyapo jo,
two nundu oreyo woko jo.
Aladhiro kwoŋ jo lak ogwaŋe,
gi kwir gigipiny ma jomol i fukefuke.
Abor laloko win ma bu nyithindho,
woko kodi i iye,
lareyo woko jayac kodi nyako mambula
nyathi ma dhoth kodi jalwar.
Awaco ni, alatoŋo jo mathindho thindho,
aka alareyo woko jo i paro pa ji.
T'alworo oro nge pa jakwor,
kole jokwor pajo jonyalo niaŋ kicar,
to jowaco nike otiŋ cingi wan malo,
me k'obedo Rwoth am'otimo gime.
Kole jobedo nono ma jongoye gi rieko,
aka jongoye gi niaŋ.
Kabedi oyido joriek, dinyo joniaŋ gime,
di joparo kwoŋ nger ma gike pajo labedo.
Ŋat'acel oyido d'oriem nedi gana,
aka jario jomiy nedi gana apar ŋwec,
kwanyowoko ka Tele pajo am'otana jo,
Rwoth oyido ojala jo?
Adieri tele pajo kicale Tele mawan,
aka jokwor mawan wegi joŋeyo.
Kole yen vini pajo obedo ma wok i Sodom,
wok i ndelo vini ma Gomora,
nyingi vini pajo nitie iye kwir,
kayegin mere kec.
Vini pajo obedo kwir thwole,
kwir mager pa malasaŋ.
Gime k'okan kodan,
k'omwon i udi paran ma kan?
kole i sawa ma tiendi jo ocer;
meno ndelo ma teko orikere cegin,
aka rerok pajo bino piyo.
aka labedo gi wor kwoŋ ŋecin pere,
k'oneni nike jorumo gi meni,
m'ongoye ŋat'otwey kosa m'ogony ma jodoŋ.
Aka go lapenjo ni: “Nikune werin pajo,
tele pajo ma jopond'iye;
ma jocamo bor ma cowirok pajo,
to jomadho vini ma mic ma medho pajo?
Weyi jowoay malo aka jowokony win,
weyi jowokwonga win!
Neni win pama ni An, Abedo go,
ongoye were man kwanyowoko an,
Aneko, aka amiyo kwo,
amiyo litho, aka acango,
aka ongoye ŋata nyalo botho dhano wok i cingan.
Kole atiŋo malo cingan i polo,
aka akwoŋere, paka akwo cil gi cil.
K'apako abor paran maliel,
to cingan mako thumo banja,
alaculo kwor kwoŋ jokwor paran,
aka alaculo kwor kwoŋ jono ma jodakan.
Alamiyo aserin paran jowomer gi remo,
aka abor paran lacamo riŋo,
gi remo pa jom'onek kodi jom'otwey,
wok i ye wi jakwor maboyo.
kole go laculo kwor ri remo pa ŋecin pere,
go laculo kwor kwoŋ jokwor pere,
aka lanyutho wor ri lowo pere kodi ji pere.”
Musa obino aka oluwo wac je ma wer me i ithi ji, kanyacel gi Yosuwa wod pa Nun.
Munyo Musa otieko luwo wac me je ri Joisiraili je,
Musa owaco rijo ni, “Kethi win cuny win i wac je m'afonjo win konon me, ma wilamiyo nyithindho mewin or kwoŋe kuro kodi timo, wac je ma cik me.
Kole wac me k'obedo manono riwin, t'obedo wac ma kwo, aka luw'iye winyal kiyindira i lowo ma wicegin kalo Yordan bed'iye.”
“Idhi malo wi got pa Joabarim, Got Nebo, manitie i lowo ma Mowab, got Nebo m'oŋiyere gi Yeriko aka inen lowo ma Kanan m'amiyo Joisiraili paka gipajo.
Ilatho kenyo wi got m'idho aka ilariwere gi wade perin, paka omin in Aron otho wi Got Hor, to riwere gi wade pere.
Kwoŋbedo wijario je wituro yeyo kodan i dier Joisiraili i pi ma Meriba, cegin gi Kades i thim ma Zin, rupiri wikiteran paka aleŋ i dier Joisiraili.
Kucel ilaneno lowo gi bor, t'ikilatundo koro i lowo m'amiyo Joisiraili.”
Me silwany ma Musa, dhano pa Were omiyo Joisiraili mafodi go k'otho.
Rwoth oluwo wok i Sinai,
aka oloro kwoŋ jo wok i Edom,
aka omenyo ji pere wok i Got Paran.
Jomalaika gana apar oyido jonitie gi go,
gi mac maliel i cingi go maracuc.
Adieri, go omaro ji pere,
jomaleŋ perin je jobedo i cingin,
joŋanjo ka tiendin,
itelo jo gi wac perin.
Musa omiyo wan or,
paka lim ri nyikway Yakobo.
Go obedo kere i Yesurun,
munyo jodhum kodi nonin pa Isiraili,
jocokere kanyacel.
Weyi Ruben wokwo, aka wokiri wotho,
aka weyi jokiri jowobedi manok i welo.
Ri Yuda go owaco ama:
Winji dwondi Yuda, Awi Rwoth,
aka keli go bongi ji pere,
loki cingi go matek,
gi cingi go opiemo
aka bedi kony pere kwoŋ jokwor pere.
Thumim perin kodi Urim perin,
obedo gi jacwo ma winjin,
m'itemo i Masa,
m'ipiemo gine i pi ma Meriba.
M'owaco kwoŋ min kodi bamere ni,
“Fodi akineno go.”
Kosa k'oyeyo wutmin kosa ŋeyo nyithindho pere,
kole joluwo wac perin,
aka jokuro cikirok perin.
Jolafonjo Yakobo
kodi Isiraili cik perin.
Jolaketho buban ruwaŋin,
kodi mic awaŋa gikululu i wi migam perin.
Rwoth, miy gipere silwany,
ijoli tic ma cingi go,
ŋiny pier jokwor pere,
jono ma jodak go, ŋey jokiri jowoay kendo.
Kwoŋ Benyamin go owaco ni:
“Jamitirok pa Rwoth ywomere i siem,
kwonga go ndelo gipi,
aka ywomere i dier goke.”
Ri Yozefu go owaco ni:
“Rwoth womiy lowo pere silwany,
gi mic ma welo wok i polo malo,
wok i thoyo kodi pi ma wok piny.
G'olemo mabeyo macek gi ceŋ,
gi ranyak mabeyo ma kisi dwe.
Gi ranyak mabeyo ma wi gote macene,
kodi dito ma tendere ma cil gi cil.
Gi mic ma welo ma piny gibe,
gi wor pa ŋat'obedo i dudi
weyi me wobin i sangaria ma wi Yozefu,
i wi ŋat'okethi gicen kwoŋ wutmin go.
Dwoŋ pere cale paka apa rwath makayo,
tunge cale paka tungi merikwa madudi,
guro gine nonin,
dhiro ji kanyacel kiri i gike ma piny,
Joefrayim gana apar,
Jomanase ganin.”
Ri Zebulun go owaco ni:
Fore, Awi Zebulun, i wok woko perin,
aka Isakar, i wema perin.
Jolalwoŋo nonin wi got pajo,
koro jolamiyo cowirok m'otire,
kole jolacwiyo cwe ma nam,
kodi lim m'opanere i kwoyo.
Ri Gad go owaco ni,
Silwany ri ŋata bupo Gad!
Gad kwo paka simbwor,
aka go yeco cingi jo gi sangaria ma wic.
Go oyero maber loyo paka apere,
kole kenyo okoy adec pa jamituka,
aka go obino gi jotel pa ji,
go otimo tiro pa Rwoth,
kodi thumo banja pere ri Isiraili.
Ri Dan go owaco ni:
“Dan cale paka nyathi simbwor,
ma por wok i Basan.”
Ri Nafital go owaco ni:
“Awi Nafital, opoŋ gi wor,
opoŋ gi silwany pa Rwoth,
aka lunjo yupodho ceŋ kodi yupiny.”
Ri Aser go owaco ama:
Wot Aser josilwany loyo,
weyi go wonwaŋi wor bongi wutmin,
aka woluthi tiende i mo.
Petin perin labedo nyweny kodi ywel,
aka paka ndelo perin bedo, apaka meni perin bende.
Ongoye ŋata cale Were, Awi Yesurun,
ma gweco i polo ri kony perin,
i dwoŋ pere i pondeponde.
Were ma cil gi cil obedo kabwok perin,
cinge ma cil gi cil nitie i pendi piny,
go lariemo woko jakwor perin ruwaŋin,
aka owaco ni, “Reyi woko.”
Ameno Isiraili labedo kakende i siem,
i waŋ pi pa Yakobo,
i lowo ma ŋano kodi vini manyen,
kama polo pere thono thoyo piny.
Sangala, Awi Isiraili! Ŋa ma cale win,
ji ma Rwoth obotho,
kwot ma kony mewin,
aka abor maloyo mewin!
Jokwor mewin jolabino gi twodo bongi win,
aka wilanyono ŋey jo.
Musa oidho malo wok i kam'obipere ma Mowab kiri i Got Nebo, wi Pisiga yuwaŋ Yeriko, aka Rwoth onyutho go lowo je, wok i Giliad tundo kiri Dan.
Nafital je, lowo ma Efrayim je kodi Manase, lowo ma Yuda je tundo kiri i nam ma yuwok ceŋ.
Yupiny, kigoda ma milelo ma Yeriko, tindi madwoŋ ma yen thith, tundo kiri i Zowar.
Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Me a lowo m'akwoŋere ri Abraham, Isaka kodi Yakobo, k'awaco ni, ‘Alamiyo nyikway win.’ Atieko miyin ineno gi waŋin, t'ikilatundo koro.”
Musa, ŋeca pa Rwoth otho kenyo, i lowo ma Mowab, paka Rwoth owaco.
Oyiki go i milelo i lowo ma Mowab, kam'otitere gi Beth Pewor, t'ongoye ŋat'oŋeyo kam'oyik'iye go kiri konon me.
Musa otho munyo jaoro miya acel gi piero ario. Waŋe oyido fodi neno, aka go oyido fodi tek.
Joisiraili joywako Musa ma ndelo piero adek i milelo ma Mowab, kenyo hongo ma ywako Musa otundo i gike.
Yosuwa wod pa Nun oyido opoŋ gi cuny ma rieko; rupiri Musa oyido otieko ketho cinge kwoŋe. Aka Joisiraili jowinjo go, timo paka Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa or.
Ongoye kendo jatuci wac Were m'obedo i Isiraili m'ocalo Musa, ma Rwoth oyido oŋeyo awaŋ, g'awaŋ.
I ranyuth je, kodi gir'aura ma Rwoth ooro go timo i lowo ma Misir, ri Farawo, ŋecin pere kodi lowo pere.
I cingi go ma meni, kodi gigipiny madongo ma kelo lworo, ma Musa otimo ruwaŋ Isiraili je.
Munyo Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth otieko tho, Rwoth oluwo gi Yosuwa wod pa Nun, jakony pa Musa, ka waco ni,
“Ŋeca paran Musa otieko tho. Pama kidhi iŋadi Malawa Yordan, in kodi ji me je, i piny ma miyo nyithindho pa Isiraili.
Kisi kamoro ma par tiendin ogey atieko miyin, paka atieko ciko Musa.
Wok i thim kodi Lebanon tundo kiri i malawa madwoŋ; malawa Yufrete, lowo pa Johiti, tundo i Nam Madwoŋ yupodho ceŋ bino bedo adec mewin.
Ongoye dhano ma lakikengila in hongo je ma kwo perin. Paka oyido anitie gi Musa apaka bende alabedo kodin; ak'oredhin kosa ak'ojwangin.
Bedi m'icwiny kendo jamisen; kole ilatelo ji me mako lowo m'akwoŋere ri kwarere pajo ni alamiyo jo.
Bedi nyaka m'icwiny aka jamisen swa, k'igwokere tic gi cik je paka ŋeca paran Musa oorin; ikir'iwire kwoŋe yuracuc kosa racam, ŋey wonyali kadho rin maber kisi kamoro je m'inokidh'iye.
Kitawo ma cik me wokiri woeye i dhokin; ifonjere kwoŋe odieceŋ gi wor, ŋey inyal gwokirok timo paka ondiki kisi gimoro je manitie i iye. Nyaka kenyo ilaloko yo perin maber, aka lakadho kodin maber.
Pama onyo amiyin or: Bedi m'icwiny kendo jamisen; ikir'ikirini kosa ibwoki, kole Rwoth Were perin nitie kodin kisi kamoro je m'ikidh'iye.”
Kenyo Yosuwa ooro jotel pa ji,
luwo gi lwak ka jowaco rijo ni: “Yik win gima winitie gine; kole i ndelo adek wilaŋado Yordan, donjo kidho mako lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo win ni wobedi mewin.”
“Poyi win wac ma Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth ooro win ka waco ni, ‘Rwoth Were mewin miyo win kabedo ma ywomirok, aka lamiyo win lowo me.’
Mon mewin, nyithindho mewin, kodi mwendi mewin bino doŋ i lowo ma Musa omiyo win yombo Yordan. To jolweny je ma jonitie i dier win jolaŋado ma jotiŋo gilweny pajo konyo wade mewin,

cuka Rwoth omiy ywomirok ri wade mewin kanyacel gi win, to bende joloko lowo ma Rwoth Were mewin miyo jo apajo. Nyaka to wigik i lowo mewin won to wilunjo, lowo ma Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth omiyo win yombo Yordan yuwok ceŋ.”
Jodwoko Yosuwa ni: “Gimoro je m'itieko oro wan walatimo, aka kisi kam'ior'iye wan walakidho.
Paka waworo Musa i gimoro je, apaka bende walaworin. Kwanyo woko kende weyi Rwoth Were perin wobedi kodin, paka cango obedo gi Musa!
Ŋat'ogwenyere kwoŋ cik perin to cayo wac perin, or moro je m'inowodhi, ibino neko. Bedi kende m'icwiny kendo jamisen.”

Yosuwa wod pa Nun odhiro cwo ario nyaliŋliŋ wok Sitim paka jopendo, ka waco ni, “Kidhi winen lowo, tektek mere Yeriko.” Ameno to jokadho. Jodonjo i ot pa malaya m'oyido ilwoŋo ni Rahab, to jonindo kenyo.
Owaci ri kere ma Yeriko ni, “Joisiraili moro jobino ka wor me ŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ ma lowo me.”
Kenyo to kere ma Yeriko dhiro mikwenda ri Rahab ka waco ni, “Wodhi woko cwo ma jobino bongin, ma jodonjo i ot perin, kole jobino nyaka ŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ ma piny gibe.”
To dheno kwanyo cwo ario no to kano jo. Kenyo to dheno waco ni, “Adieri, cwo no jobino bongan, t'akiŋeyo kama jowok'iye.
Aka munyo hongo ma cego waŋkac orikere munyo piny oliŋ, to cwo no jowok woko. Kama cwo no jokadh'iye akuya. Riemi win jo piyo, kole winyalo mako jo.”
To dheno oyido otero jo wi kisul ot to kano jo gi kedi mawuwa moro m'oyido oyaro wi kisul ot.
Ameno to cwo no joriemo jo i royo ma ŋado Yordan. Tekin jom'oyido riemo jo no jowok woko, t'icego waŋkac.
Mafodi jok'okadho nindo, dheno obino bongi jo wi kisul
to waco ri cwo no ni: “Aŋeyo ni Rwoth otieko miyo win lowo, aka ni lworo mewin otieko podho kwoŋ wan, aka ni jono je ma jobedo i lowo jotieko leny woko ruwaŋ win.

Kole watieko winjo paka Rwoth otieko cwiyo woko pi ma Malawa M'obokere ruwaŋ win munyo wiwok Misir, kodi gima witimo ri kerin ario mapa Joamor m'oyido jonitie yombo Yordan, ri Sihon kodi Og, ma wireyo jo kicutho.
Tekin wawinjo, cuny wan opodho, aka ongoye miseni m'odoŋ kada kwoŋ ŋat'acel kwoŋ wan kwoŋbedo win. Rwoth Were mewin adieri obedo Were ma i polo malo kodi piny ka.
Onyo pama, paka atieko tic gi win gi wor, kwoŋere ran win gi Rwoth, ni win bende wilatic gi peco paran gi wor. Miyan ranyuth ma yeyo maber
ni wik'onek baba gi mama, wutmera gi nyimera, kodi ji pajo je, to wibotho kwo mawan kwoŋ tho.”
Cwo no jowaco rigo ni, “Kwo mawan ri aperin! K'ikiluwere kwoŋ tic mawan, nyaka walatic gi wor kodi genirok kodin ka Rwoth omiy wan lowo me.”
Kenyo to konyo jo loro piny gi thol gi dirisa, kole ot pere oyido nitie yuwoko ma kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ.
Dhako no owaco rijo ni, “Kadhi win yupiny matendere, ŋey joma riemo win jokiri jowopodhi kwoŋ win. Pondi win kenyo ma ndelo adek, cuka joma riemo win jodok; nyaka rumacen to wikadho royo mewin.”
Cwo no jowaco rigo ni, “Walagonyere kwoŋ cikirok me m'itieko miyo wakwoŋere rin.
Neni, ka watundo i lowo, itwey adasa m'obokere me i dirisa m'imiyo waloro gine piny, icoki benin gi yokin i ot perin, wutmin in, gi peco mewin je.

Ka ŋatimoro owok woko ma thigo ma ot perin to kidho i ngudo, jobino wegi romo gi tho pajo, to wan wangoye gi banja; to ka cingi dhano ojengi kwoŋ dhano moro je ma jonitie gi win i ot, walabielo banja ma tho pajo.
To k'iluwere kwoŋ tic mawan me, nyaka to wagonyere kwoŋ cikirok me m'imiyo wakwoŋere rin.”
Dheno to waco ni, “Cungo kwoŋ wac mewin won, weyi wobedi ameno.” Dheno osewila jo to jokadho. Kenyo to tweyo adasa m'obokere no i kor ot.
Joay to jokadho i piny matendere to jobedo kenyo ma ndelo adek, cuka joma riemo jo jodok. Joriem jo no oyido jodwaro jo malo to jok'onwaŋo gimoro.
Kenyo cwo ario no joloro piny kendo wok i piny matendere. Joŋado to jobino bongi Yosuwa wod pa Nun, aka jowaco rigo gimoro je m'otimere rijo.
Jowaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Adieri Rwoth otieko ketho lowo je i cingi wan; medo kwoŋ meno ji ma jobedo i piny no je cuny jo podho kwoŋbedo wan.”
Odikin maŋic Yosuwa oay to cako woth wok Sitim kodi Joisiraili je to jotundo Yordan. Joketho kambi pajo kenyo mafodi jok'oŋado Yordan.
Munyo ndelo adek orumo jotel jowotho thoko kambi
to jowodho or ri ji ni, “Ka wineno jocway ri Were pa Levi jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth Were mewin, nyaka to wiwok i kabedo mewin. Luw win,
ŋey nyaka winyal ŋeyo royo ma wiripo luwo, kole fodi wikiluwo royo me con mere. Kucel thwolo bino bedo i dier win kodi Kakan ma Cikirok, boro ma romo kilomita acel, wikiri wicore cegin gine.”
Nyaka to Yosuwa waco ri ji ni, “Loki win kwo mewin maleŋ; kole Rwoth dikin latimo gir'aura i dier win.”
Yosuwa owaco ri jocway ri Were i wi migam ni, “Kwany win Kakan ma Cikirok, aka wikadhi ruwaŋ ji.” Ameno to jokwanyo Kakan ma Cikirok to jokadho ruwaŋ ji.
Rwoth owaco ri Yosuwa ama: Ndelo me abino cako lokin ŋatadwoŋ i waŋ Isiraili gipi, ŋey jowonyal ŋeyo ni alabedo kodin paka cango abedo gi Musa.
Ere in, wodhi or ri jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok, “Ka witundo dho dhok pi ma Yordan, iripo cungo liŋ i Yordan.”
Kenyo Yosuwa owaco ri Joisiraili ni, “Core win cegin aka wiwinji wac pa Rwoth Were mewin.”
Yosuwa owaco ni, “Gi gime wibino ŋeyo ni Were makwo nitie i dier win, aka go k'obedi ma k'ogweyo woko ruwaŋ win Jokanan, Johiti, Johivi, Joperiz, Jogagas, Joamor kodi Joyebus.
Neni win, Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth ma piny gipi kidho luwo ruwaŋ win donjo i Yordan.
Onyo pama yer win cwo apar g'ario wok kwoŋ nonin ma Isiraili, acel kwoŋ kisi nono.
Ka par tiendi jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiŋo Kakan pa Rwoth, Rwoth ma piny gipi, ogey pi ma Yordan, pi ma mol wok yumalo bino ŋadere woko, to jocungo i kidhur acel.”
Munyo ji joay i wemin pajo ma kidho ŋado Yordan, jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok oyido jonitie ruwaŋ ji.
Onyo Yordan opoŋ de oy kiri malo i coŋino mere hongo je ma keco. Ameno munyo joma jotiŋo Kakan jotundo Yordan, aka par tiendi jocway ri Were i migam ma jotiŋo Kakan oluthere i thengi pi,

pi ma mol wok malo ocungo liŋ, ka ay malo i wic acel bor swa i Adam, tindi madwoŋ macegin gi Zarethan, kareno meno ma jomol kadho i nam ma Araba, nam ma Cumbi, oyido oŋadi jo kicutho. Kenyo to ji joŋado kama ŋiyere gi Yeriko.
Munyo Joisiraili oyido joŋado kam'othwo, Jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth jocungo kam'othwo i dier Yordan, cuka nono parom jotieko ŋado Yordan.
Munyo nonin je jotieko ŋado Yordan, Rwoth owaco ri Yosuwa ni,
“Kwany cwo apar g'ario wok kwoŋ ji, acel wok kwoŋ kisi nono,
aka ior jo kwanyo telin apar g'ario wok i cuny Yordan, wok kwoŋ kabedo meno ma par tiendi jocway ri Were i wi migam onyono, aka witiŋ jo, to wijengo jo kama wilanind'iye wor me.”
Kenyo to Yosuwa lwoŋo cwo apar g'ario kwoŋ Joisiraili, ma go oyido otieko yero, acel wok kwoŋ kisi nono.
Yosuwa owaco rijo ni, “Tel win yuwiy Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth Were mewin i dier Yordan, aka acel acele wotiŋ tele i goke, acel wocungi ri kisi nono ma Isiraili,
ŋey me wobedi ranyuth i dier win. Ka nyithindho mewin jopenji win i hongo ma labino ni, ‘Dwoŋ telin no nyutho aŋo riwin?’
Nyaka wiwaci rijo ni pi ma Yordan oyido oŋadere woko ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth; munyo oluwo i wi Yordan, pi ma Yordan oŋadere woko. Ameno telin me bino bedo ri Joisiraili rapoy ma cil gi cil.”

Nyithindho pa Isiraili jotimo paka Yosuwa owodho or, to jokwanyo telin apar g'ario wok i dier Yordan, paka kwan ma nonin ma Isiraili nitie, paka Rwoth owaco ri Yosuwa, jotiŋo to jokadho gine kama joketh'iye kambi, to jojengo jo piny kenyo.
To Yosuwa jengo telin apar g'ario i dier Yordan, i kabedo ma par tiendi jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok oyido ocung'iye; aka fodi jonitie kenyo tundo gunyo ni.

Jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok jodoŋ ma jocungo i dier Yordan, cuka kisi gimoro ma Rwoth ooro Yosuwa ni wowaci ri ji orumo, paka i gimoro je ma Musa ooro Yosuwa. Ji joŋado gi kwakirok.
Munyo ji je jotieko ŋado, Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam joluwo ruwaŋ ji.
Wot Ruben, wot Gad kodi adec ma nono pa Manase joluwo munyo jotiŋo gilweny ruwaŋ Joisiraili, paka Musa oyido owodho or rijo.
Cegin gana piero aŋwen ma jotiŋo gilweny joŋado ruwaŋ Rwoth kidho kam'obipere ma Yeriko lweny.
I ndelo no Rwoth omiyo Yosuwa dwoŋ i waŋ ji je ma Isiraili; to jocungo i dhier kwoŋe, paka oyido jotieko cungo i dhier ri Musa, hongo je ma kwo pere.
Rwoth owaco ri Yosuwa ni,
“Wodhi or ri jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok, jowobin malo woko ma Yordan.”
Riameno Yosuwa to wodho or ri jocway ri Were i wi migam ni, “Biye win malo woko ma Yordan.”

Aka munyo jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth jobino malo wok i dier Yordan, aka par tiendi jo oyido otiŋere malo kam'othwo, pi ma Yordan ogik i kabedo mere to mol i coŋino mere je paka con.
Ji jowok woko ma Yordan k'apar ma dwe marapena, to joketho kambi i Gilgal yuwok ceŋ ma kew gi Yeriko.
Telin apar g'ario no, m'oyido jokwanyo wok i Yordan, Yosuwa ojengo i Gilgal,
ka waco ri Joisiraili ni, “Ka nyithindho mewin jopenji jonywol pajo i hongo ma rumacen ni, ‘Telin me jonyutho aŋo?’
Nyaka wimiy nyithindho mewin ŋeyo ni, ‘Isiraili oŋado Yordan ka i lowo m'othwo.’
Kole Rwoth Were mewin othwo woko pi ma Yordan riwin cuka wipor loka, paka Rwoth Were mewin otimo ri Nam m'obokere, ma go othwo woko riwan cuka wapor loka,
ŋey ji je ma piny gipi jowonyal ŋeyo ni cingi Rwoth nigi meni, ŋey jowonyal lworo Rwoth Were mewin cil gi cil.”

Munyo kerin je mapa Joamor yombo Yordan yupodho ceŋ, kodi kerin je mapa Jokanan yuthenge ma nam, jowinjo ni Rwoth othwo woko pi ma Yordan ri Joisiraili cuka jotieko por loka, cuny jo opodho, aka miseni moro kendo k'obedo i jo, kwoŋbedo Joisiraili.
I hongo no Rwoth owaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Tim apalin m'othedhi gi mac aka i thum Joisiraili madirio.”
Ameno Yosuwa otimo apalin m'othedhi gi mac, to thumo Joisiraili i Gibeyath Haraloth.
Aka me am'obedo atoŋa m'omiyo Yosuwa othumo jo: Jono je ma jobedo cwo ma jowok Misir, jolweny je oyido jotho i ndir ma woth i thim munyo jotieko wok woko ma Misir.
Kada ji je ma jowok oyido otiek thumo, kucel ji je ma jonywole i royo i thim munyo jotieko wok Misir oyido fodi k'othumi jo.

Kole wot Isiraili jowotho ma oro piero aŋwen i thim, cuka nono je, jolweny ma jowok Misir, josika woko, ma jok'owinjo dwondi Rwoth. Were okwoŋere rijo ni jok'oneni lowo m'oyido okwoŋere ri kwarere pajo ni lamiyo wan, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic.
Ameno obedo nyithindho pajo, ma go odongo jo i kabedo pajo, ma Yosuwa othumo jo; kole jothumere, rupiri oyido fodi jok'othumere i royo.
Munyo thumirok ma nono je orumo, jodoŋ i kabedo pajo i kambi cuka jocango.
Rwoth owaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Konon atieko ŋilo woko kwoŋin wickwot ma Misir.” Aka riameno nyingi kabedo no ilwoŋo ni Gilgal
Munyo Joisiraili joketho kambi i Gilgal, jokuro kalima ma kadho othieno ma k'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe i kam'obipere ma Yeriko.
I ndelo ma luwo kalima ma kadho, i ndelo no won, jocamo ranyak ma lowo, mugat ma buthow kodi nyingi cemo m'obul.
Aka mana k'obedo kendo i ndelo ma jocam'iye ranyak ma lowo, Joisiraili jok'obedo gi mana kendo; jocamo cemo ma lowo ma Kanan i oro no.

Ndelo acel munyo Yosuwa oyido nitie cegin gi Yeriko, oŋiyo malo to neno dhano m'ocungo yunyime g'abor m'oyuy i cinge. Yosuwa okidho bonge to penjo go ni, “Ibedo acel kwoŋ wan, kosa acel kwoŋ jokwor mawan?”
Ŋato odwoko ni, “Akibedo; to paka jamituka pa jolweny pa Rwoth, onyo atieko bino pama.” To Yosuwa podho gi nyime piny to lamo go, to waco rigo ni, “Ioro ŋeca perin timo aŋo, rwoth paran?”
Jamituka pa jolweny pa Rwoth owaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Luny woko war ma par tiendin, kole kabedo m'icung'iye leŋ.” To Yosuwa timo ameno.
Onyo oyido ocegi waŋkace ma Yeriko gi woko kwoŋbedo Joisiraili; ongoye ŋat'owok kendo ongoye ŋat'odonjo.
To Rwoth waco ri Yosuwa ni, “Neni, atieko ketho Yeriko i cingin, gi kere kodi cwo mere matek ma jomeni.
Ibino ŋanjo thoko tindi madwoŋ, cwo je ma jolweny wikidhi withok tindi madwoŋ dicel. Wilatimo ameno ma ndelo aucel.

Aka jocway ri Were i wi migam abirio jolatiŋo gwarin abirio ma tungi wot rombo ruwaŋ kakan; aka i ndelo mar'abirio wibino ŋanjo thoko tindi madwoŋ dibirio, kareno jocway ri Were i wi migam jokudho gwarin.

Aka ka jotimo derino madwoŋ gi tungi wot rombo, tekin wiwinjo derino ma gwarin, nyaka to ji je jokoko gi woy madwoŋ; aka kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ lagore piny kicutho, aka ji jolakidho kisi dhano tirtir gine.”

Ameno Yosuwa wod pa Nun olwoŋo jocway ri Were i wi migam to waco rijo ni, “Kwany win Kakan ma Cikirok, aka weyi jocway ri Were i wi migam abirio jowotiŋ gwarin abirio ma tungi wot rombo ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth.”
To Yosuwa waco ri ji ni, “Tel win; ŋanji win withoki tindi madwoŋ, aka wiwey cwo ma jotiŋo gilweny jowoluwi ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth.”

Aka paka oyido Yosuwa otieko oro ji, jocway ri Were i wi migam abirio ma jotiŋo gwarin abirio ma tungi wot rombo ruwaŋ Rwoth to jokidho yumalo, kareno jokudho gwarin, gi Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth m'oyido luwo jo.
To cwo ma jotiŋo gilweny jotelo jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jokudho gwarin, aka jokur ma yucen joluwo Kakan ma Cikirok, kareno gwarin ywak m'ongoye liŋ.
To Yosuwa wodho or ri ji ni, “Wikiri wikoki kosa wimiy dwondi win wowinjere, aka wac moro je wokiri wowoki i dhok win, cuka ndelo m'anoor win koko; nyaka to wikoko.”
Ameno go omiyo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth woth thoko tindi madwoŋ, woth thoko dicel, to jotundo i kambi, to jonindo i kambi.
Kenyo Yosuwa ocew odikin maŋic, to jocway ri Were i wi migam jokwanyo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth.

Jocway ri Were i wi migam abirio ma jotiŋo gwarin abirio ma tungi wod rombo ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth jokadho, kareno jokudho gwarin m'ongoye liŋ; aka cwo ma jotiŋo gilweny jotelo jo, to jokur ma yucen joluwo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth, kareno ikudho gwarin m'ongoye liŋ.
Aka i ndelo mar'ario joŋanjo thoko tindi madwoŋ dicel, to jogik i kambi. Ameno apaka jotimo ma ndelo aucel.
I ndelo mar'abirio munyo jocewi odikin maŋic ma nyaka ŋamba cot, to joŋanjo thoko tindi madwoŋ i nger acel won dibirio. Oyido obedo i ndelo no won kende ma joŋanj'iye thoko tindi madwoŋ dibirio.
Aka ma dibirio, munyo jocway ri Were i wi migam jotieko kudho gwarin, Yosuwa owaco ri ji ni, “Koki win, rupiri Rwoth otieko miyo win tindi madwoŋ.
Aka tindi madwoŋ kodi gimoro je manitie i iye ilamiyo Rwoth mar'areya; kende Rahab m'obedo malaya kodi ji manitie gi go i ot ama wowey jo, rupiri go okano jopendo ma waoro.
To win, gwokere win kwoŋ gigipiny m'omiy mar'areya, kosa ka witieko miyo jo wikwanyo gimoro je kwoŋ gigipiny m'omiy to witimo kambi ma Isiraili gimoro mar'areya, to wikelo teko kwoŋe.
To feza je gi zahabu, kodi gigipiny ma ywel kodi nyweny, jobedo maleŋ ri Rwoth; jolakidho i od pesa pa Rwoth.”

Ameno ji jokoko, t'ikudho gwarin. Tekin ji jowinjo derino ma gwarin to ji jokoko malo swa, to kor ot gore piny kicutho, ameno ji jodonjo i tindi madwoŋ, kisi dhano tirtir ruwaŋ go to jomako tindi madwoŋ.
Kenyo joreyo woko kicutho kisi gimoro je ma tindi madwoŋ cwo gi mon, jomathindho kodi jom'oti, megikwe, rombo, gi punde, gi lew abor.
Yosuwa to waco ri cwo ario m'oyido jokadho dwaro nyaliŋliŋ ma piny ni, “Kidhi win i ot pa malaya, aka wiwodhi go, kodi jono je ma jobedo apere, paka wikwoŋere rigo.”
Ameno to cwo m'oyido jobedo jopendo jodonjo, to jowodho Rahab gi bamere gi min gi wutmin kodi jono je ma jobedo apere; to jokelo wade pere je, to jojengo jo woko ma kambi ma Isiraili.
To jowaŋo tindi madwoŋ gi mac, kodi gimoro je manitie i iye; kwanyowoko feza gi zahabu, gi gigipiny ma ywel kodi nyweny, joketho i od pesa ma Ot pa Rwoth.

To Rahab m'obedo malaya, kodi ji ma ot pa bamere, kodi jono je ma jobedo apere, Yosuwa obotho jo makwo; aka go obedo i Isiraili kiri gunyo ni, rupiri go okano jopendo ma Yosuwa ooro timo nyaliŋliŋ i Yeriko.
“Lakeŋ kayo pere nyaka to jengo sigingi mere, aka lakeŋ ocoko pere nyaka to ketho waŋkace mere.”
Ameno to Rwoth bedo gi Yosuwa; aka oŋeyere i piny no parom.
To Joisiraili joturo yeyo i gima mako gigipiny m'omiy, rupiri Acan wod pa Karim, nyakwar Zabidi, wod pa Zera, ma nono pa Yuda, okwanyo gigipiny moro m'omiy; to nge pa Rwoth liel kwoŋ Joisiraili.
Yosuwa odhiro cwo ma jowok Yeriko i Ay, macegin gi Bethaven, yuwok ceŋ ma Bethel, to waco rijo ni, “Kidhi win malo witim nyaliŋliŋ ma piny.” To cwo no jokadho malo to jotimo nyaliŋliŋ i Ay.
To jogik bongi Yosuwa, to jowaco rigo ni, “Weyi jolweny jokiri jowokidhi malo, to weyi cegin cwo gana ario kosa gana adek, jokidhi malo to jomonjo Ay. Ikir'imiy ji je jowomonji kenyo, rupiri jonok.”
Ameno cegin ji gana adek jokidho malo koro wok bongi ji; to joringo ruwaŋ cwo ma Ay,
to cwo ma Ay joneko cegin cwo piero adek g'aucel kwoŋ jo, to joriemo jo dho waŋkac tundo kiri Sebarim, to joneko jo i kamaloro. To cuny Joisiraili podho to lworo mako jo.
Kenyo Yosuwa oyeco nangin pere, to podho piny gi nyime ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth tundo othieno, go kodi jodongo ma Isiraili to joywoyo fukefuke i wi jo.
Yosuwa owaco ni, “Awi Rwoth Were, raŋo iyeyo ji me ŋado Yordan, t'ijwango wan i cingi Joamor joworey woko wan? Kabedi cango wayere bedo bor gi Yordan!
Awi Rwoth, anowaci aŋo ma Joisiraili jowiro ŋey gin ruwaŋ jokwor pajo!
Kole Jokanan kodi jopiny je, jolawinjo kwoŋe, to jothoko wan, to joŋado woko nyingi wan i piny; aka inotimi aŋo ri nyingin madwoŋ?”
Rwoth owaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Ay malo, raŋo onyo ipodho gi nyimin?
Isiraili otieko timo reco; jotieko kibenga kwoŋ cikirok paran m'aoro jo; jotieko kwanyo gigipiny moro m'oyido joripo reyo woko, jotieko kwalo gi twodo, to joketho jo i dier gigipiny pajo.
Riameno Joisiraili jokinyal cungo ruwaŋ jokwor pajo; joringo kwoŋ jokwor pajo, rupiri jotieko lokere gir'areya woko. Ak'obedi gi win kendo, kwanyowoko ka wireyo woko gigipiny no manitie i dier win.

Ay malo, loki ji maleŋ, aka iwaci ni, ‘Lokere win maleŋ ri dikin; kole Rwoth ama luwo, Were pa Isiraili, “Nitie gigipiny m'omiy i dier win, awi Isiraili; wikinyal cungo ruwaŋ jokwor mewin, cuka wikwanyo gigipiny m'oyido iripo reyo i dier win.”
Riameno odikin ilakelo win cegin gi nonin mewin; aka nono ma Rwoth lakwanyo lawok i pecin macegin; aka peco ma Rwoth okwany lawok cegin gi udi; aka ot ma Rwoth okwany lacore cegin gi cwo.
Aka ŋat'okwany gi gigipiny m'oyido iripo reyo ilawaŋo gi mac, go kodi gimoro je manitie gine, rupiri go otieko timo kibenga kwoŋ cikirok pa Rwoth, kodi rupiri go otieko timo giwickwot i Isiraili.’ ”
Ameno to Yosuwa cew odikin maŋic, to kelo Isiraili cegin nono acel acele, t'ikwanyo nono pa Yuda.
Go to kelo cegin nono pa Yuda, t'ikwanyo peco pa Zera, to go kelo cegin peco pa Zera kisi jacwo acel acele, t'ikwanyo Zabidi.
To go kelo cegin peco pa Zabidi dhano acel acele, t'ikwanyo Acan wod pa Karim nyakwar Zabidi wod pa Zera, ma nono pa Yuda.
Kenyo to Yosuwa waco ri Acan ni, “Wodan, miy dwoŋ ri Were pa Isiraili aka iŋuti reco perin. Onyo pama wac ran gim'itieko timo; ikir'ipan kwoŋan.”
Acan to dwoko Yosuwa ni, “Adieri atieko timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth Were pa Isiraili, aka me a gim'atimo.

Munyo aneno i dier gim'onyaga law maŋon mapa Jobabilon, kodi feza ma romo cegin kilo ario; kodi nyweny ma zahabu m'oyido romo adec kilo, kenyo t'agomba jo; t'akwanyo jo. Pama onyo jopanere i lowo i wema paran, gi feza i pende.”
Ameno to Yosuwa dhiro jomikwenda, to joyombere i wema; aka neni, oyido opan i wema pere gi feza i pende.
To jofudho woko jo i wema to jokelo jo ri Yosuwa kodi Joisiraili je; to jothango jo ruwaŋ Rwoth.

Kenyo Yosuwa kodi Joisiraili je m'oyido jonitie gine jokwanyo Acan wod pa Zera, gi feza, law, kodi nyweny ma zahabu, gi wote kodi nyir pere, gi megikwe pere, punde, rombo, wema pere kodi kisi gimoro je m'oyido go nitie gine; t'itero jo i milelo ma Akor.
Yosuwa to penjo go ni, “Raŋo ikelo teko kwoŋ wan? Rwoth kelo teko kwoŋin konon.” To Joisiraili je jocadho go gi telin cuka otho; jowaŋo jo gi mac to joyaro telin i wi jo.
Aka jojengo i wiye kidhur telin madwoŋ ma fodi nitie gunyo ni; to Rwoth dwoko nge pere m'oliel cen. Riameno kiri gunyo ni nyingi kabedo no ilwoŋo ni Milelo ma Akor.

Kenyo to Rwoth waco ri Yosuwa ni, “Ikir'ilwor kosa ikir'ibwoki; kadhi gi ji ma jolwenyo je, aka ay malo, kidhi kiri Ay, par ni atieko ketho i cingin kere ma Ay, kodi ji pere, tindi pere madwoŋ kodi piny pere.
Ibino timo ri Ay kodi kerin mere paka cango itimo ri Yeriko kodi kere mere; kwanyowoko mugugu gi dhok mere wikiri wikwany paka gim'onyaga ri wiwegi; wikethi apondi yuŋey tindi kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ.”
Ameno Yosuwa oay, kodi ji je ma jolweny, kidho malo i Ay. Yosuwa oyero cwo 30,000 ma jomeni aka jocwiny, to dhiro jo woko wor.
Ooro jo ni, “Ciki ithi win, wibino nindo apondi kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ, yucen mere; wikiri wikidhi bor swa gi tindi madwoŋ, to wijoje bedi win ma wiyikere.
An kodi ji je ma jonitie kodan walacore cegin gi tindi madwoŋ. Aka ka jowok woko romo gi wan, paka con mere, waladwire ruwaŋ jo;
to jowok woko ka watieko ngoye, cuka watieko ywayo jo woko bor gi tindi madwoŋ; kole jolawaco ni, ‘Jodwire kwoŋ wan, paka con.’ Ameno waladwire woko kwoŋ jo; nyaka to wiay malo wok i dudi.
Wiay malo wok i dudi, to wimako tindi madwoŋ; rupiri Rwoth Were mewin laketho jo i cingi win.
Aka ka witieko mako tindi madwoŋ; wibino cwinyo tindi madwoŋ no gi mac, kareno witimo paka Rwoth otieko waco; ciki ithi win, witim paka atieko oro win.”
Ameno to Yosuwa dhiro jo woko; to jokidho kam'otim'iye apondi, to jobedo i dier Bethel kodi Ay, yupodho ceŋ ma Ay; to Yosuwa nindo wor no i dier ji.
Yosuwa ocew odikin maŋic to lwoŋo ji kanyacel, to kidho malo, gi jodongo ma Isiraili, ruwaŋ ji i Ay.
Ji je ma jolweny m'oyido jonitie gi go jokidho malo, to jocore cegin gi tindi madwoŋ, to joketho kambi pajo yuthenge ma yumalo ma Ay, gi milelo i dier jo kodi Ay.
Yosuwa okwanyo cwo cegin 5,000 to ketho jo iy'apondi i dier Bethel kodi Ay, yupodho ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ.
Ameno joketho jolweny, kodi kitipa je m'oyido nitie yumalo ma tindi madwoŋ kodi jokur mere ma yucen yupodho ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ. To Yosuwa nindo i milelo wor no.

Aka munyo kere ma Ay oneno gime go kodi ji pere je, cwo ma tindi madwoŋ, jowok woko odikin maŋic ma comirok gi Isiraili kama lweny ogunj'iye kamaloro ma kidho i Araba, ma jok'oŋeyo ni oyido apondi nitie yucen ma tindi madwoŋ.
Yosuwa kodi Joisiraili je jorendere p'igoyo jo ruwaŋ jo, to joŋweco yuthim.
Ameno t'icoko ji je m'oyido jonitie i tindi madwoŋ olwoŋo jo kanyacel ma riemo jo, aka munyo joriemo Yosuwa, oyway jo woko wok i tindi madwoŋ.
Ongoye kada jacwo acel m'odoŋ i Ay kosa Bethel, ma k'owoki riemo Isiraili; joweyo tindi madwoŋ m'oyawere, to joriemo Isiraili.
Kenyo to Rwoth waco ri Yosuwa ni, “Tel toŋ manitie i cingin woŋiy Ay; kole akidho ketho i cingin.” To Yosuwa telo toŋ m'oyido nitie i cinge to ŋiyo tindi madwoŋ.
Tekin go telo cinge, to jolweny ma jonitie iy'apondi joay piyo piyo wok i kabedo pajo to jodonjo i tindi madwoŋ to jomako; jokwakere i tindi madwoŋ to jowaŋo.

Aka munyo cwo ma Ay jowire to joŋiyo yucen, oyido nitie yiro ma tindi madwoŋ m'okidho malo i polo; to jongoye gi meni ma ŋwec kome kosa koca, rupiri ji ma joringo i thim jowire aŋey kwoŋ joma riemo jo.
Munyo Yosuwa kodi Joisiraili je joneno ni apondi oyido oloyo kor tindi madwoŋ; aka yiro ma tindi madwoŋ okidho malo, kenyo to jowire to joneko cwo ma Ay.
To cwo megi jobino wok i tindi madwoŋ romo gi jo; ameno Joisiraili jothoko jo, moro yuthenge acel, kodi megi yuthenge man; to Joisiraili neko jo, cuka ongoye kad'acel m'odoŋ makwo kosa m'okwale.
To omaki kere ma Ay makwo, t'itero ri Yosuwa.

Munyo Isiraili otieko cowo neko jopiny je ma Ay i kam'othangere ma thim kama joriem'iye jo, aka munyo joje tundo kiri i macowe jotieko tho g'abor mabith, Joisiraili je jogik i Ay to jomonjo g'abor mabith.
Aka joma jotho ndelo no cwo gi mon je, oyido obedo 12,000 ji je ma Ay.
Rupiri Yosuwa k'odwoko cinge m'otelo gine toŋ cen, cuka otieko reyo woko jopiny ma Ay kicutho.
Kende dhok kodi gim'onyaga ma tindi madwoŋ no ma Isiraili omako paka gipajo ma jonyaga, cungo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth m'ooro Yosuwa.
Ameno to Yosuwa waŋo Ay, to loko kidhur gunda ma cil gi cil, paka fodi nitie gunyo ni.

To liero malo kere ma Ay wi yath tundo kiri othieno; aka munyo waŋceŋ podho, Yosuwa owodho or, t'igonyo delkwoŋe wok kwoŋ yath, to jojengo i dhiot ma waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ, to jodhuro kwoŋe telin, ma fodi cungo kenyo gunyo ni.
paka Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth oyido ooro Joisiraili, paka ondiki i kitawo ma cik pa Musa, migam ma telin ma dhano fodi k'oketho cuma moro kwoŋe; to jomiy'iye mic awaŋa ri Rwoth, to jomiyo cowirok ma siem.
Aka kenyo i nyim Joisiraili, ondiko i wi telin nyawoti cik pa Musa, m'oyido otieko ndiko.

Aka Joisiraili je, jokicar kodi jopiny, jodongo kodi jotel gi jothum banja pajo, jocungo yuthenge m'oŋiyere gi kakan ruwaŋ jocway ri Were i wi migam ma Jolevi ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth, adec kwoŋ jo ruwaŋ Got Gerizim aka adec man kwoŋ jo ruwaŋ Got Ebal, paka Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth oyido kutho owodho or, ni joripo miyo Joisiraili silwany.
Aka rumacen mere to soma wac je ma cik, silwany kodi kwoŋ, paka nitie i gimoro je m'ondiki i kitawo ma cik.
Ongoye wac kwoŋ gima Musa owodho or ma Yosuwa k'osoma ruwaŋ cokirok je ma Isiraili, kanyacel gi mon, nyithindho kodi jokicar ma jobedo i dier jo.
Munyo kerin je m'oyido jonitie yombo Yordan i piny matendere kodi i piny m'opiele joje yuthengi Nam madwoŋ kadho Lebanon, Johiti, Joamor, Jokanan, Joperiz, Johivi kodi Joyebus, jowinjo gime,
jocokere kanyacel gi cuny jo acel lweny gi Yosuwa kodi Isiraili.
To munyo jopiny ma Gibeon jowinjo gima Yosuwa oyido otieko timo ri Yeriko kodi Ay,
to joridho wondo go. Jokidho to joyiko mic rijo wegi, to jociwo punde pajo gi kutiyin m'ojwer ojwer, piendere ma vini, m'ojwer aka m'oyec to jokwoyo,
gi ware m'ojwer aka ogoy'iye kiremo i tiendi jo, gi nangin m'ojwer; aka mic pajo je oyido othwo aka lengalenga.
To jokidho bongi Yosuwa i kambi i Gilgal, to jowaco rigo kodi Joisiraili ni, “Wawok i piny mabor; riameno tim gi wan cikirok.”
To cwo ma Isiraili jowaco ri Johivi ni, “Kono miti wibedo i dier wan; onyo wanotim gi win cikirok nedi?”
Jowaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Wabedo ŋecin perin.” To Yosuwa penjo jo ni, “wijokune? Aka wiwok yukune?”
Jodwoko go ni, “Ŋecin perin jowok i piny mabor swa, kwoŋbedo nyingi Rwoth Were perin; kole watieko winjo radwok ma mako kwoŋe, kwoŋ kisi gimoro je ma go otimo i Misir,
kodi kwoŋ kisi gimoro je ma go otimo ri kerin ario apa Joamor m'oyido jonitie yombo Yordan, kere Sihon ma Hesibon, kodi kere Og ma Basan m'obedo i Asiteroth.
Aka jotel mawan kodi jopiny je ma piny mawan jowaco riwan ni, ‘Kwany win cemo i cingi win ma woth; wikidhi wirom gi jo, aka wiwaci rijo ni, “Wabedo ŋecin perin; biye pama me, tim gi wan cikirok.” ’
Me mugat mawan; oyido fodi lieth munyo wakwanyo i udi mawan paka cemo mawan ma woth, i ndelo ma wacak'iye woth bino bongin, t'onyo pama, neni, othwo aka ŋinyere;
piendere ma vini me oyido jonyen munyo wapoŋo jo, t'onyo neni, jobare aka nangin me gi ware mawan onyo joti wok kwoŋ woth mabor.”
Ameno to cwo no jokwanyo pok pajo, to jobedo ma jok'openjo Rwoth gir'atima.
Aka Yosuwa otimo siem gi jo, to timo cikirok gi jo, ma miyo jowokwo; to jotel ma kacokirok jokwoŋere rijo.
I gike ma ndelo adek munyo jotieko timo cikirok gi jo, jowinjo ni oyido jobedo joger pajo, aka oyido jobedo i dier jo.
To Joisiraili joay malo to jotundo i tindin pajo madongo i ndelo mar'adek. Tindin pajo madongo no oyido jobedo Gibeon, Kepira, Beroth kodi Kiriath Yerim.
To Joisiraili jok'oneko jo, rupiri jotel ma kacokirok oyido jotieko kwoŋirok rijo gi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili. Gikenyo to kacokirok je joŋunyaŋunya kwoŋ jotel.
To jotel je jowaco ri kacokirok je ni, “Watieko kwoŋere rijo gi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, aka pama onyo wakinyali geyo jo.
Walatimo rijo gime, to waweyo jokwo, ka k'obedo ameno to keme bedo kwoŋ wan, kwoŋbedo cikirok ma wakwoŋere rijo.”
Jotel to jowaco rijo ni, “Weyi jowokwo.” Ameno to jolokere jobar yen kodi jokulo ri kacokirok je, paka jotel oyido jotieko waco rijo.
Yosuwa to lwoŋo joje, to waco rijo ni, “Raŋo wiwondo wan ka wiwaco ni, ‘Wabor swa gi win, munyo wibedo i dier wan?’
Onyo pama okwoŋ win, aka jomegi kwoŋ win noknok jolabedo ŋecin, jobar yen gi jokulo ri Ot pa Were paran.”

To jodwoko Yosuwa ni, “Rupiri oyido otiek waco ri ŋecin perin iy'adieri ni Rwoth Were perin oyido ooro ŋeca pere Musa miyo lowo je, kodi ma reyo woko joma bedo i piny no je ruwaŋ win; riameno lworo madwoŋ oyido omako ri kwo mawan kwoŋbedo win, to watimo gime.
Aka onyo pama, wan ee i cingin: Tim gimaber aka otire rin atima riwan.”
Ameno otimo rijo, to gonyo jo wok i cingi Joisiraili aka jok'oneko jo kendo.
Yosuwa oloko jo i ndelo no jobar yen kodi jokulo ri cokirok kodi ri migam pa Rwoth, m'omedere tundo i ndelo me, i kabedo me ma go oyer.

Tekin Adonizedek kere ma Yerusalem owinjo paka Yosuwa oyido otieko mako Ay, aka oyido otieko reyo kicutho, ka timo ri Ay kodi kere mere paka oyido otieko timo ri Yeriko kodi kere mere, kodi paka jopiny ma Gibeon oyido jotieko timo siem gi Isiraili aka oyido jonitie i dier jo,
lworo omako jo tektek, rupiri Gibeon oyido obedo tindi madwoŋ swa, paka acel kwoŋ tindin pa kere, aka kwoŋbedo oyido dwoŋ loyo Ay, aka cwo mere je oyido jomeni.
Ameno to Adonizedek kere ma Yerusalem dhiro ri Hoham kere ma Hebron, ri Piram kere ma Yarmuth, ri Yafia kere ma Lakis, kodi ri Debir kere ma Egilon, ka waco ni,
“Biye win malo bongan wikonyan, aka wamonji Gibeon; rupiri otieko timo siem gi Yosuwa kodi Joisiraili.”

Kenyo to kerin abic apa Joamor, kere ma Yerusalem, kere ma Hebron, kere ma Yarmuth, kere ma Lakis, kodi kere ma Egilon, jocoko jolweny pajo, to jokidho malo gi jolweny pajo je to joketho kambi pajo kwoŋ Gibeon, to jotimo lweny kwoŋe.

Aka cwo ma Gibeon jodhiro ri Yosuwa wac i kambi i Gilgal, ka jowaco ni, “Ikir'ilwogi cingin kwoŋ ŋecin perin, biye bongi wan piyo, aka ibothi wan, aka ikony wan; kole kerin je mapa Joamor ma jobedo i piny matendere jocokere kwoŋ wan.”
Ameno to Yosuwa idho malo wok Gilgal, go kodi ji je ma lweny gi go, kodi cwo ma jomeni je ma jocwiny.
To Rwoth waco ri Yosuwa ni, “Ikir'ilwor jo, rupiri atieko ketho jo i cingin; ongoye kada ŋat'acel ma lacungo i waŋin.”
Ameno to Yosuwa podho kwoŋ jo abwap, kareno otieko ŋanjo kidho malo wor je wok Gilgal.
To Rwoth bolo jo i kirin ruwaŋ Isiraili, to neko jo gi yaŋ madwoŋ i Gibeon, to riemo jo i royo ma loro ma Bethhoron, to rwadho jo piny tundo kiri Azeka kodi Makeda.

Aka munyo oyido joringo ruwaŋ Isiraili, munyo oyido joloro piny i kamaloro ma Bethhoron, to Rwoth dwiro piny telin madongo wok i polo kwoŋ jo tundo kiri Azeka, to jotho; nitie megi m'oromo ma jotho ro pe loyo ji meno ma Isiraili m'oneki jo g'abor.
Kenyo to Yosuwa luwo gi Rwoth i ndelo ma Rwoth omiy'iye Joamor ri cwo ma Isiraili; to waco ruwaŋ Isiraili ni,
“Waŋceŋ, cungi m'ikikithin i Gibeon,
aka in Dwe i milelo Ayijalon.”

To waŋceŋ cungo ma k'okithin, dwe bende to cungo ma k'okithin, cuka nono no oculo kwor kwoŋ jokwor pajo. Gime k'ondiki i kitawo pa Jasar ni waŋceŋ ladoŋ i dier polo, aka k'okwakere podho cegin ma ndelo gipi.
Oyido fodi nger ndelo no k'obedo con mere kosa kada rumacen, ma Rwoth owinj'iye dwondi dhano; kwoŋbedo Rwoth olwenyo ri Isiraili.
Kenyo to Yosuwa gik, kodi Isiraili je gi go, i kambi ma Gilgal.
Kerin abic me to joringo, to jopondo i ŋungu i Makeda.
T'iwaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Onwaŋ kerin abic, jopondo i ŋungu i Makeda.”
Yosuwa to waco ni, “Ŋili win woko telin madongo i dhok ŋungu, aka wikethi cwo cegin gine ma kuro jo;
to wikiri wibedi kenyo wiwegi ka witieko riemo jokwor mewin, wimonji jo gi yucen pajo, aka wikiri wiyey jowodonji i tindin madongo pajo; rupiri Rwoth Were mewin otieko ketho jo i cingi win.”
Munyo Yosuwa kodi Joisiraili jotieko cowo neko jo gi yaŋ madwoŋ, cuka orey jo woko, aka munyo ji ma joboth kwoŋ jo jodonjo i tindin madongo m'otinda,
ji je jogik i siem bongi Yosuwa i kambi i Makeda; aka ongoye dhano kad'acel m'obidho lewe kwoŋ dhano moro je kwoŋ Joisiraili.
To Yosuwa waco ni, “Yaw win dhok ŋungu, aka wikel woko kerin abic no bongan wok i ŋungu.”
To jotimo ameno, jowodho woko to jotero kerin abic no bongi Yosuwa wok i ŋungu, kere ma Yerusalem, kere ma Hebron, kere ma Yarmuth, kere ma Lakis kodi kere ma Egilon.

Aka munyo jowodho woko kerin no bongi Yosuwa, Yosuwa to lwoŋo cwo je ma Isiraili, to waco ri jomituka pa cwo ma lweny m'oyido jokadho gine ni, “Core win cegin, kethi win tiendi win i ŋuti kerin me.” To jocore cegin, to joketho tiendi gin i ŋuti jo.
Yosuwa to waco rijo ni, “Wikiri wibedi malwor kosa wibwoki; bedi win matek kodi jomiseni; kole Rwoth latimo ameno ri jokwor mewin je ma wigore gi jo.”
Aka rumacen to Yosuwa rwadho jo piny, to neko jo, to liero jo i win abic. To joliero i wi yen tundo othieno;
to munyo waŋceŋ podho, Yosuwa owodho or, to jokwanyo jo piny wok i yen, to jobolo jo i ŋungu kam'oyido jopond'iye, to jojengo telin madongo i dhok ŋungu, ma fodi nitie kenyo kiri pama.

Yosuwa to mako Makeda i ndelo no, to rwadho piny gi kere mere gi lew abor mabith; oreyo woko kicutho kisi dhano manitie iye, k'oweyo ŋatimoro; to timo ri kere ma Makeda paka oyido otieko timo ri kere ma Yeriko.
Kenyo to Yosuwa medere wok Makeda gi Joisiraili je, i Libina to lwenyo kodi Libina;

to Rwoth bende ketho Libina kodi kere mere i cingi Isiraili; to bende rwadho piny gi lew abor, gi kisi dhano ma iye; ongoye ŋata go oweyo iye; to timo ri kere mere paka oyido otieko timo ri kere ma Yeriko.
To medere wok Libina, kanyacel gi Joisiraili je, i Lakis, to thoko woko, to cako lweny gine.
Rwoth to miyo Lakis i cingi Isiraili, to mako i ndelo mar'ario, to rwadho piny gi lew abor, gi kisi dhano je ma iye, paka oyido otieko timo ri Libina.
Kenyo to kere Horam ma Gezer ay malo konyo Lakis; to Yosuwa rwadho go piny gi ji pere cuka go k'oweyo dhano m'odoŋ.
Wok Lakis Yosuwa to medere kodi Joisiraili je i Egilon; jothoko to jocako lweny gine;
aka jomako i ndelo no, to jorwadho piny gi lew abor; aka kisi dhano ma iye t'ireyo kicutho i ndelo no, paka oyido otieko timo ri Lakis.
Kenyo to Yosuwa kidho malo kodi Isiraili je wok Egilon kiri Hebron;

to jomako, to jorwadho piny gi lew abor, aka kere mere kodi tindin mere, gi kisi dhano je ma iye; ongoye ŋata go oweyo, paka oyido otieko timo ri Egilon, to reyo woko Hebron kicutho gi kisi dhano je ma iye.
Yosuwa kodi Isiraili je, jowiro ŋey jo ri Debir to jocako lweny gine,

to mako Debir gi kere mere kodi tindin mere madongo; to rwadho jo piny gi lew abor, to reyo kicutho dhano je ma iye; ongoye ŋat'oweyo; paka oyido otieko timo ri Hebron kodi ri Libina gi kere mere, ameno bende apaka otimo ri Debir kodi ri kere mere.
Ameno Yosuwa okengila piny je, piny matendere kodi yupiny kodi piny m'opiele gi ma kamaloro, gi kerin pajo je; m'ongoye m'oweyo, to reyo woko gimoro je ma ywe, paka Rwoth Were pa Isiraili owodho or.
To Yosuwa rwadho jo piny wok Kades Barineya kiri Gaza, kodi piny ma Gosen je, tundo kiri Gibeon.
Yosuwa to kwanyo kerin me je gi lowo pajo i hongo moro, rupiri Rwoth Were pa Isiraili olwenyo rijo.
Rumacen Yosuwa gi Isiraili je jodok i kambi i Gilgal.
Munyo Yabin kere ma Hazor owinjo gime, odhiro ri Yobab kere ma Madon, kodi ri kere ma Simiron, kodi ri kere ma Akisaf,
gi ri kerin m'oyido jonitie yupiny matendere ma yumalo, kodi i Araba, yupiny ma Kineroth, kodi i piny m'opiele, gi kam'oŋawere ma Dor yuthenge ma yupodho ceŋ,
ri Jokanan wok yuwok ceŋ gi yupodho ceŋ, Joamor, Johiti, Joperiz, kodi Joyebus i piny matendere, gi Johivi i tiendi got Hamon i piny ma Mizipa.
To jowok woko gi jolweny pajo je, lwak madwoŋ, i welo ma cale kwoyo manitie i wi coŋino ma nam, gi punde kweth kodi cawilin.
Aka kerin me je joriwere gi jolweny, to jobino to joketho kambi kanyacel i pi ma Merom, ma lweny kodi Isiraili.
To Rwoth waco ri Yosuwa ni, “Ikir'ibedi gi lworo rijo, rupiri dikin alamiyo joje, neki, ri Isiraili; wimiy ŋolo ri punde pajo, to wiwaŋo cawilin pajo gi mac.”
Ameno to Yosuwa bino kwoŋ jo abwap gi ji pere ma lweny, i thengi pi ma Merom, to podho kwoŋ jo.
To Rwoth miyo jo i cingi Isiraili, m'orwadho jo piny to joriemo jo tundo kiri Sidon Madwoŋ kodi Liel pa pi, kodi yuwok ceŋ tundo kiri i milelo ma Mizipa; to jorwadho jo piny, cuka jok'oweyo ŋata kwo.
To Yosuwa timo rijo paka Rwoth oyido otieko waco rigo; omiyo ŋolo ri punde pajo, to waŋo cawilin pajo gi mac.
Yosuwa to wire aŋey i hongo no, to mako Hazor, to rwadho piny kere mere g'abor; rupiri con mere Hazor am'oyido obedo wic kerin no je.
To joneko kisi dhano m'oyido nitie i iye g'abor, ma joreyo jo kicutho; ongoye ŋat'owey ma ywe, to waŋo Hazor gi mac.
Aka tindin madongo je apa kerin no, gi kerin pajo je, Yosuwa okwanyo, to rwadho jo piny gi lew abor, oreyo jo kicutho, paka Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth oyido owodho or.
To ongoye tindin madongo kad'acel m'oyido ocungo i wi kam'oŋawere ma Isiraili owaŋo, kwanyo woko Hazor kende; ma Yosuwa owaŋo.
Aka gim'onyaga me je ma tindin madongo kodi dhok, Joisiraili jonyaga; to jorwadho piny kisi dhano gi lew abor, cuka oyido jotieko reyo ma jok'oweyo gimoro je ma ywe.
Paka Rwoth oyido otieko wodho or ri ŋeca pere Musa, ameno apaka Musa ooro Yosuwa, to Yosuwa timo ameno; ongoye gima go oweyo ma k'otimo kwoŋ gima Rwoth oyido otieko wodho or ri Musa.
Ameno to Yosuwa tero piny je, piny matendere kodi yupiny je, lowo ma Gosen je, piny m'opiele kodi Araba gi piny matendere ma Isiraili gi piny mere m'opiele
wok i Got Halak, ma idho yu Edom, tundo kiri i Balgad milelo ma Lebanon i tiendi Got Hamon. To mako kerin pajo je, orwadho jo piny, to neko jo.
Ma hongo malac Yosuwa olwenyo gi kerin no je.
Ongoye tindi madwoŋ moro m'otimo siem gi Joisiraili, kwanyowoko Johivi, jopiny ma Gibeon, jotero joje i lweny.

Kole oyido obedo tim pa Rwoth ma ridho adundin pajo ni jowonyal bino kwoŋ Isiraili i lweny, ŋey wonyali reyo jo kicutho, aka jokiri jowonwaŋ wor to worey woko jo kicutho, paka Rwoth oyido otieko wodho or ri Musa.

To Yosuwa bino i hongo no, to ŋado woko Joanakim wok i piny matendere, wok i Hebron, wok Debir, wok Anab, kodi wok i piny matendere je ma Yuda, gi piny matendere je ma Isiraili; Yosuwa oreyo jo kicutho gi tindin madongo pajo.
Ongoye ŋata moro kwoŋ Joanakim m'owey i piny pa Joisiraili; kende i Gaza, i Gath kodi i Asdod, ama moro odoŋ'iye.
Ameno to Yosuwa kwanyo piny je cungo kwoŋ gimoro je ma Rwoth oyido otieko luwo gi Musa; to Yosuwa miyo paka gir'alunja ri Isiraili cungo kwoŋ mic manyanono. To piny kwe m'ongoye lweny.
Me a kerin ma piny ma Joisiraili jokengila, to jokwanyo lowo pajo yombo Yordan yuwok ceŋ, wok i milelo ma Arinon tundo i Got Hamon, gi Araba parom yuwok ceŋ:
Sihon kere pa Joamor m'obedo i Hesibon, aka odhumo wok Arower, manitie i thengi milelo ma Arinon, aka wok i dier milelo tundo kiri i malawa Yabok, kew pa Joamon, ma nyutho ni, adec ma Giliad,
kodi Araba kidho i Nam ma Kineroth yuwok ceŋ, kodi i yo ma kidho Bethyesimoth, gi i nam ma Araba, nam ma cumbi, yupiny ma tiendi got Pisiga;
aka Og kere ma iy'adec ma Basan, acel kwoŋ joma joboth ma Refayim, m'obedo i Asiteroth kodi i Edirey
aka m'odhumo wi Got Hamon kodi Salaka kodi Basan parom tundo i kew pa Jogesur kodi apa Jomakath kodi i wi adec ma Giliad tundo i kew pa Sihon kere ma Hesibon.
Musa, ŋeca pa Rwoth, kodi Joisiraili jokengila jo; to Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth, miyo jonono pa Ruben lowo pajo gi jonono pa Gad kodi adec ma nono pa Manase, ni wobedi gipajo.

Me a kerin ma piny ma Yosuwa kodi Joisiraili jokengila yuthenge ma yupodho ceŋ ma Yordan, wok i Balgad i milelo ma Lebanon tundo i Got Halak, ma kadho yu Edom to Yosuwa miyo lowo pajo ri nonin ma Isiraili paka gipajo cungo kwoŋ pok pajo,
i piny matendere, i lowo m'opiele, i Araba, i kamaloro, i thim, kodi yupiny, lowo pa Johiti, Joamor, Jokanan, Joperiz, Johivi, kodi Joyebus:
Kere ma Yeriko, acel; kere ma Ay, m'oluwere gi Bethel, acel;
kere ma Yerusalem, acel;
kere ma Hebron, acel; kere ma Yarmuth, acel; kere ma Lakis, acel;
kere ma Egilon, acel; kere ma Gezer, acel;
kere ma Debir, acel; kere ma Geder, acel;
kere ma Horima, acel; kere ma Aradi, acel;
kere ma Libina, acel; kere ma Adulam, acel;
kere ma Makeda, acel; kere ma Bethel, acel;
kere ma Tapuwa, acel; kere ma Hefer, acel;
kere ma Afek, acel; kere ma Lasaron, acel;
kere ma Madon, acel; kere ma Hazor, acel;
kere ma Simiron Meron, acel; kere ma Akisaf, acel;
kere ma Tanak, acel; kere ma Megido, acel;
kere ma Kedes, acel; kere ma Yokineam Kamel, acel;
kere ma Dor i kam'oŋawere ma Dor, acel; kere ma Goyim tundo i Galili, acel;
kere ma Tiriza, acel: Je oyido nitie kerin piero adek g'acel.
Onyo Yosuwa oyido oti aka oyido ojware i oro; to Rwoth waco rigo ni, “Iti aka ijware i oro, aka fodi lowo nitie kweth ma mitere akwanya to bedo mewin.
Me a lowo ma fodi odoŋ: Adec je apa Jofilistia, kodi meno je apa Jogesur

(wok i Sihor, manitie yuwok ceŋ ma misir, yumalo ma kewere kodi Ekiron, itero ni obedo apa Jokanan; nitie jodhum abic apa Jofilistia, jono ma Gaza, Asdod, Asikelon, Gath, kodi Ekiron) kodi jono ma Avim,
yupiny, lowo pa Jokanan je, kodi ŋungu m'obedo apa Josidon, tundo Afek, kidho i kew pa Joamor,
kodi i piny pa Jogebal, gi Lebanon je, yuwok ceŋ, wok i Balgad i tiendi Got Hamon tundo Lebohamath,
kodi jopiny ma piny matendere wok Lebanon tundo i kam'oŋawere ma pi, kiri gi Josidon je. An won alariemo woko jo ruwaŋ Joisiraili; nyaka poki ri Joisiraili paka gir'alunja paka atieko miyin or.
Riameno pok lowo me paka alunja ri nonin abuŋwen kodi adec ma nono pa Manase.”
Adec man ca ma nono pa Manase, nono pa Ruben kodi nono pa Gad jonwaŋo gir'alunja pajo ma Musa oyido otieko miyo jo, yombo Yordan yuwok ceŋ, paka Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth omiyo jo:
Wok Arower, manitie i thengi milelo ma Arinon, kodi tindi madwoŋ manitie i dier milelo, kodi kam'opiele je ma Medeba tundo kiri Dibon,
kodi tindin pa Sihon madongo je kere pa Joamor, m'odhumo i Hesibon, tundo kiri i kew pa Joamon;
kodi Giliad g'adec pa Jogesur kodi apa Jomakath, gi Got Hamon je, gi Basan je tundo i Salaka;
kerin pa Og je i Basan, m'odhumo i Asiteroth kodi i Edirey (go kende am'owey kwoŋ jom'oboth ma Refayim) me Musa oyido okengila to gweyo woko.
Kucel Joisiraili jok'ogweyo woko Jogesur kosa Jomakath; to Gesur kodi Makath jotieko bedo i dier Joisiraili tundo gunyo ni.
To nono pa Jolevi kende ama Musa k'omiyo gir'alunja; mic m'otimi gi mac ri Rwoth Were pa Isiraili am'obedo gir'alunja pajo, paka owaco rigo.
Musa omiyo gir'alunja ri nono pa nyikway Ruben paka nonin pajo nitie.
Adec m'oyido obedo apajo oyido cako wok Arower, m'oyido nitie i thengi milelo ma Arinon, kodi tindi manitie i dier milelo, gi lowo m'opiele je macegin kodi Medeba;
