gi Hesibon, kodi tindin mere madongo je ma jonitie kam'opiele; Dibon, kodi Bamoth Bal, kodi Beth Bal Meyon,
gi Yahaz kodi Kedemoth, gi Mefath,
gi Kiriath Yerim kodi Sibima, gi Zereth Sahar i wi tendere ma milelo,
gi Beth Pewor, kodi kamaloro ma Pisiga, gi Bethyesimoth,

nyaka ni tindin madongo je ma kam'opiele, kodi ker pa Sihon je kere pa Joamor, m'odhumo i Hesibon, ma Musa okengila gi jotel ma Midian, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur kodi Reba paka wot kerin pa Sihon, ma jobedo i piny.
Balam, wod pa Bewor, jathieth, Joisiraili joneko g'abor i dier ji pajo man m'oneki.
Kam'oyido poko nyikway Ruben oyido obedo Yordan paka kew. Me oyido obedo gir'alunja pa nyikway Ruben, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo gi tindin madongo pajo kodi calin.
Musa bende omiyo gir'alunja ri nono pa Gad, ri nyikway Gad cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Adec pajo oyido obedo Yaza kodi tindin madongo je ma Giliad, kodi adec ma lowo pa Joamon, tundo Arower, manitie yuwok ceŋ ma Raba,
aka wok Hesibon tundo Ramath Mizipa kodi Betonim, aka wok Mahanayim tundo iy'adec ma Lodebar,
aka i milelo Beth Haram, Beth Nimra, Sukoth kodi Zafon, ker m'odoŋ je apa kere Sihon kere ma Hesibon, Yordan kodi kew mere, yu gike ma yupiny ma Nam Kinereth, yuwok ceŋ yombo Yordan.
Me a gir'alunja pa nyikway Gad cungo kwoŋ nonin pajo, gi tindin pajo madongo gi calin pajo.
Musa omiyo alunja ri adec nono pa Manase; omiy adec nyikway Manase, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Adec pajo otele wok Manahayim, thoko Basan je, ker pa kere Og ma Basan parom, kodi calin je ma Yayir ma jonitie i Basan, tindin madongo piero aucel,
g'adec Giliad, kodi Asiteroth, gi Edirey, tindin madongo ma ker pa Og i Basan; me omiy nyikway Makir wod pa Manase cungo kwoŋ nonin pajo ri adec pa Makir.
Me gir'alunja ma Musa opoko i kam'opiele ma Mowab, yombo Yordan yuwok ceŋ ma Yeriko.
To ri nono pa Jolevi, Musa k'omiyo gir'alunja moro; Rwoth Were pa Isiraili am'obedo gir'alunja pajo, paka go oyido otieko luwo gi jo.
Me a gir'alunja ma Joisiraili jonwaŋo i piny ma Kanan, ma Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam, gi Yosuwa wod pa Nun, to jotel ma udi pa bacere ma nonin pa Joisiraili jopoko jo.
Alunja pajo obedo adec m'omiy paka Rwoth oyido otieko wodho or ri Musa ri nonin abuŋwen g'adec.
Rupiri Musa oyido omiyo gir'alunja ri nonin ario g'adec wok i thenge ca ma Yordan; to ri Jolevi go k'omiyo gir'alunja moro i dier jo.
Rupiri nyikway Yozefu oyido obedo nonin ario, Manase kodi Isiraili, aka ongoye adec m'omiy Jolevi i piny, to kende tindin madongo mar'abed'iye, gi lowo pajo ma kwath ri dhok pajo gi gigipiny pajo.
Ji ma Isiraili jotimo paka Rwoth owodho cik ri Musa; to jopoko lowo.
Oyido ajaoro piero aŋwen munyo Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth odhiran wok i Kades Barineya ma timo nyaliŋliŋ i piny; t'adwoko rigo wac mar'adieri.
To wutmera ma jokidho malo kodan jomiyo cuny ji kirin; kucel aluwo Rwoth Were paran gi cunyan je.”
To Musa kwoŋere i ndelo no, ka waco ni, “Adieri lowo ma tiendin otieko nyono bino bedo gir'alunja rin kodi nyithindho perin cil gi cil, rupiri itieko luwo Rwoth Were paran gi cunyin je.

To pama, pak'ineno, Rwoth otieko kuran, paka owaco, oro piero aŋwen me gipi wok i hongo ma Rwoth oluwo wac me ri Musa, kareno Joisiraili oyido fodi jowotho i thim; aka onyo an e konon, ajaoro piero aboro g'abic.
Fodi atek pa nyundu konon paka oyido abedo i ndelo no ma Musa odhiran; meni paran rom kodi ma ndino ca, ma lweny, ma kadho kodi ma dwoko.

Onyo riameno miyan piny matendere me ma Rwoth oluwo kwoŋe ndelo no; kole iwinjo i ndelo no paka Joanakim oyido jonitie kenyo, gi tindin madongo m'otinda: Nyalo bedo ni Rwoth labedo kodan, aka alariemo jo woko paka Rwoth owaco.”
Kenyo to Yosuwa miyo go silwany, to miyo Kaleb Hebron wod pa Yefune mar'alunja.
Riameno Hebron olokere gir'alunja pa Kaleb wod pa Yefune Jakeniz tundo konon, rupiri go oluwo Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili gi cunye je.
Onyo nyingi Hebron macon oyido obedo Kiriath Arba.
Mic pa nono pa nyikway Yuda cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo otundo yuthenge ma yupiny tundo i kew ma Edom, tundo i thim ma Zin i kamabor mere loyo yupiny.
Aka kew pajo ma yupiny oringo wok i gike ma Nam ma Cumbi, wok i coŋino ma ŋiyo yupiny;
kadho yupiny to idho malo ma Akirabim, luwo gi Zin, to medere malo ma Kades Barineya, aka luwo gi Heziron, to medere kiri Adar, to goyo kona kidho Karka,
yu Azimon, to wok kodi i pi ma mol ma Misir, aka tundo i gike mere i nam. Me labedo kew mewin ma yupiny.
Aka kew ma yuwok ceŋ obedo Nam ma Cumbi, tundo i gike ma Yordan. Aka kew ma thenge ma yumalo ringo wok i coŋino ma nam wok i gike ma Yordan;
aka kew no medere kiri Beth Hogla, to luwo gi yumalo ma Beth Araba; to kew medere kiri i tele pa Bohan, wod pa Ruben;

to kew medere kiri Debir wok i milelo ma Akor, aka ameno yuthenge ma yumalo, goyo kona yu Gilgal, m'obedo kama ŋiyere gi kama idho Adumim, manitie yuthenge ma yupiny ma milelo; aka kew luwo gi pi ma Ensemes, to gik i Enrogel;
kenyo to kew medere i milelo pa wod pa Hinom i kamaloro pa Joyebus (meno Yerusalem) aka kew no medere kiri wi got ma ŋare kwoŋ milelo pa Hinom, yupodho ceŋ, i gike ma yumalo ma milelo pa Refayim;
kenyo to kew tele tundo i waŋ pi ma Nefitowa, aka wok kenyo kiri i tindin madongo ma Got Efron; onyo to kew goyo kona kidho Bala (meno Kiriath Yerim)
to kew goyo kona yupodho ceŋ ma Bala tundo Got Edom, luwo gi kamaloro ma yumalo ma Got Yerim (meno Kesalon) to loro piny tundo Bethsemes to luwo gi Timina;
kew kadho woko ma kamaloro matendere ma yumalo ma Ekiron, onyo to kew gondere kidho Sikeron, to luwo kadho i Got Bala, to wok kodi Yabinel; onyo to kew tundo i gike i nam.
Aka kew ma yupodho ceŋ oyido obedo Nam madwoŋ gi thenge mere. Me a kew m'othoko nyikway Yuda cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
To Kaleb gweyo woko wok kenyo wot Anak adek: Sesay, Ahiman kodi Talmay, nyikway Anak.
Wok kenyo go okidho malo kwoŋ jopiny ma Debir; aka nyingi Debir macon oyido obedo Kiriath Sefer.
To Kaleb waco ni, “Ŋat'omonji Kiriath Sefer to mako, alamiyo go nyaran Akisa paka cege.”
To Othiniel wod pa Kenaz, omin Kaleb, mako, to Kaleb miyo go nyare Akisa paka cege.
Munyo Akisa obino bongi Othiniel, odwoŋo go ni wokway bamere ndelo. Munyo Akisa loro i wi punda pere, Kaleb openjo go ni, “Imito aŋo?”
To Akisa dwoko Kaleb ni, “Miyan silwany; paka onyo itieko jengan i lowo ma yupiny, miyan jwombe bende.” Ameno to Kaleb miyo go jwombe ma yumalo kodi ma yupiny.
Me a gir'alunja pa nono pa nyikway Yuda cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Tindin madongo m'obedo apa nono pa nyikway Yuda i witum ma yupiny, yuthenge ma kew kodi Edom, oyido jobedo Kabzil, Eder, Yagur,
Kina, Dimona, Adada,
Kedes, Hazor, Ithinan,
Zif, Telem, Beyaloth,
Hazor Hadata, Kerioth Heziron (meno, Hazor),
Amam, Sema, Molada,
Hazar Gada, Hesimon, Bethpelet,
Hazarsual, Berseba, Biziothia,
Bala, Iyim, Ezem,
Elitolad, Kesil, Horima,
Ziglag, Madimana, Sansana,
Lebayoth, Silihim, Ayin, kodi Rimon: Joje, tindin madongo piero ario g'abuŋwen, gi calin pajo.
Aka yu tiendi got ma yupodho ceŋ, Esitayol, Zora, Asina,
Zanowa, Enganim, Tapuwa, Enam,
Yarmuth, Adulam, Soko, Azeka,
Sarayim, Adithayim, Gedera, Gederothayim: Tindin madongo apar g'ario gi calin pajo.
Zenan, Hadasa, Migdalgad,
Dilan, Mizipa, Yokthil,
Lakis, Bozkath, Egilon,
Kabon, Lamam, Kitlis,
Gederoth, Beth Dagon, Nama, kodi Makeda: Tindin madongo apar g'aucel gi calin pajo.
Libina, Etha, Asan,
Ifita, Asina, Nezib,
Keyila, Akizib, kodi Maresa: Tindin madongo abuŋwen gi calin pajo.
Ekiron, gi nyir pere kodi calin pere;
wok Ekiron tundo i nam, kodi meno je m'oyido jonitie yuthenge ma Asdod, gi calin pajo.
Asdod, tindin mere kodi calin mere; Gaza, tindin mere kodi calin; kidho i malawa ma Misir, kodi Nam Madwoŋ gi thenge mere.
Aka i piny matendere, Samir, Yatir, Soko,
Dana, Kiriathsana (meno, Debir),
Anab, Esitemowa, Anim,
Gosen, Holon, kodi Gilo: Tindin apar g'acel gi calin pajo.
Arab, Duma, Esan,
Yanim, Bethtapuwa, Afeka,
Humita Kiriath Arba (meno Hebron) kodi Ziyor: Tindin abuŋwen gi calin pajo.
Mayon, Kamel, Zif, Yuta,
Yezirel, Yokdim, Zanowa,
Kayin, Gibeya kodi Timina: Tindin madongo apar gi calin pajo.
Halhul, Bethzur, Gedor,
Marath, Beth Anoth kodi Elitekon: Tindin madongo aucel gi calin pajo.
Kiriathbal (meno Kiriath Yerim) kodi Raba: Tindin madongo ario gi calin pajo.
I thim, Beth Araba, Midin, Sekaka,
Nibsan, Tindi madwoŋ ma Cumbi, kodi Engedi: Tindin aucel gi calin pajo.
Mic pa nyikway Yozefu okadho wok Yordan gi Yeriko, yuwok ceŋ ma pi ma Yeriko, donjo i thim, kidho malo wok Yeriko donjo i piny matendere tundo Bethel;
kenyo kadho wok Bethel tundo Luz, medere ka luwo gi Ataroth, adec pa Joarka;
onyo to kadho piny yupodho ceŋ tundo iy'adec pa Joyafilet, tundo i kew g'adec ma piny ma Bethhoron, wok kenyo to kadho Gezer, to gik i nam.
Nyikway Yozefu, Manase kodi Efrayim jolimo gir'alunja pajo.
Adec pa nyikway Efrayim cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo oyido obedo ama: Kew ma gir'alunja pajo yuwok ceŋ obedo Ataroth Adar tundo i kew ma yumalo ma Bethhoron,
aka kew medere wok kenyo tundo i nam; yumalo obedo Mikmethath; onyo yuwok ceŋ kew goyo kona yuthenge ma Tanath Silo, to luwo yombo go yuwok ceŋ tundo Yanowa,
onyo to kadho piny wok Yanowa tundo Ataroth kodi Nara, to geyo Yeriko, to gik i Yordan.
Wok Tapuwa kew kadho yupodho ceŋ i pi ma mol ma Kana, to gik i nam. Meno a nger gir'alunja pa nono pa nyikway Isiraili cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo,
kanyacel gi tindin madongo m'oyido okethi gicen ri nyikway Efrayim i dier gir'alunja pa nyikway Manase, tindin madongo no je gi calin pajo.
To kad'ameno, jok'ogweyo woko Jokanan ma jobedo i Gezer: Ameno Jokanan jotieko bedo i dier Joefrayim kiri gunyo ni to otiek miyo jo timo tic arom.

Kenyo t'itimo mic ri nono pa Manase, rupiri go oyido obedo nyathi makayo pa Yakobo. To Makir nyathi pa Manase makayo, ba Giliad, t'imiyo go Giliad kodi Basan, rupiri go oyido obedo jalweny ma siragama.
T'imiyo pok ri nyikway Manase m'odoŋ, gi pecin pajo, Abieza, Helek, Asiriel, Sekem, Hefer kodi Semida; me oyido obedo nyikway Manase wod pa Yozefu ma cwo, gi pecin pajo.
Onyo Zelofehad wod pa Hefer nyakwar Giliad, Giliad wod pa Makir, Makir wod pa Manase oyido ongoye gi wote, to nyithindho manyir kende: Me a nyingi nyir pere: Mahila, Nowa, Hogla, Milika kodi Tiriza.

Jobino ruwaŋ Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi Yosuwa wod pa Nun kodi jotel, to jowaco ni, “Rwoth owodho or ri Musa ma miyo wan gir'alunja kanyacel gi wade mawan ma cwo.” Riameno cungo kwoŋ or pa Rwoth go omiyo jo gir'alunja i dier wade pa bajo ma cwo.
Ama apaka adec apar opodho ri Manase, ketho gicen piny pa Giliad kodi Basan, manitie yuthenge man ca ma Yordan,
rupiri nyithindho pa Manase manyir jojolo gir'alunja kanyacel gi wote. Piny ma Giliad oyido omiy nyikway Manase m'odoŋ.
Adec pa Manase otundo wok Aser tundo Mikmethath, manitie yuwok ceŋ ma Sekem; onyo to kew medere yuthenge ma piny bongi jopiny ma Entapuwa.
Lowo ma Tapuwa obedo apa Manase, to tindi ma Tapuwa i kew pa Manase obedo apa nyikway Isiraili.

Onyo to kew loro piny yu pi ma mol Kana. Tindin madongo me, yupiny ma pi ma mol, i dier tindin madongo pa Manase, obedo apa Isiraili. Kenyo to kew pa Manase medere yuthenge ma yumalo ma pi ma mol to gik i nam.
Lowo ma yupiny obedo apa Isiraili aka meno ma yumalo obedo apa Manase, aka nam ama timo kew mere; yumalo itundo Aser, aka yuwok ceŋ Isakar.

Iy'adec pa Isakar kodi Aser, Manase oloko Bethsin gi calin mere, Ibilim gi calin mere, jopiny ma Dor gi calin mere, jopiny ma Endor gi calin mere, jopiny ma Tanak gi calin mere, jopiny ma Megido gi calin mere; mar'adek obedo Nafeth.
Kucel nyikway Manase jok'onyalo gweyo woko ji m'oyido jobedo i tindin madongo no, to Jokanan jomedo bedo i lowo no.
To munyo Joisiraili jolokere matek, joketho Jokanan i tic arom, to jok'ogweyo jo woko kicutho.
Nyikway Yozefu joluwo gi Yosuwa, ka jowaco ni, “Raŋo imiyo wan adec acel kende ma lowo paka gir'alunja, paka wabedo ji mathoth, ma Rwoth otieko miyo silwany?”
Yosuwa to waco rijo ni, “Ka wibedo ji mathoth, kadhi win i lul, wicwadi lowo ma kenyo ri wiwegi i piny pa Joperiz kodi Jorefayim, paka onyo piny matendere ma Efrayim diny riwin swa.”
Nyikway Yozefu to jodwoko ni, “Piny matendere diny riwan; kucel Jokanan je ma jobedo i lowo ma milelo jonitie gi cawilin ma nyweny, meno je ma Bethsin gi calin mere kodi meno ma milelo ma Yezirel.”
Kenyo to Yosuwa waco ri ot pa Yozefu, ri Joefrayim kodi Manase ni, “Adieri wibedo ji mathoth, aka winitie gi mwamba madwoŋ; wik'obedi kodi adec acel kende,
to piny matendere labedo mewin, rupiri kad'obedo lul, wilacwado to wilunjo tundo i kewere mere mabor; rupiri wilagweyo woko Jokanan, kada jonitie gi cawilin ma nyweny, kendo kada jotek.”
Onyo to Lwak pa Joisiraili jocokere i Silo, to jojengo Wema ma romo. Jomako lowo m'obedo ruwaŋ jo.
Oyido fodi odoŋ nonin abirio i dier Joisiraili ma gir'alunja pajo oyido fodi k'opoki.
Riameno Yosuwa owaco ri Joisiraili ni, “Kiri keraŋo ma winojala loko lowo ma Rwoth Were pa Kwarere mewin omiyo win?
Yer ri wiwegi cwo adek wok i kisi nono, aka alaoro jo jowonyal ay malo to jokidho to jowotho i piny paka rom. Jobino tito paka piny nitie i ndiko g'atoŋa ma gir'alunja pajo, nyaka to widwoko bongan.
Jobino poko i dier jo adec dibirio, Yuda ladoŋ kodi adec pere yupiny, aka ot pa Yozefu joladoŋ kodi adec pajo yumalo.
Aka wilatito gima mako lowo i pokirok ka dibirio, aka wikel gima winwaŋo bongan ka; aka alabolo kwir riwin ka ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mawan.

Jolevi jongoye g'adec i dier win, rupiri rapok pajo obedo ma cwayo ri Were i wi migam; aka Gad, Ruben, kodi adec pa Manase jotieko nwaŋo gir'alunja pajo yombo Yordan yuwok ceŋ, ma Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth omiyo jo.”

Ameno to cwo no joay malo cako woth pajo; Yosuwa to wodho cik ri jono ma jokidho tito lowo i ndiko, ka waco ni, “Kidhi wiwoth i lowo paka rom, aka windiki piny gima makere gi lowo, aka widwoki bongan kendo, aka alabolo kwir riwin ka ruwaŋ Rwoth i Silo.”
Onyo to cwo no jokidho jowotho i piny; to joketho i ndiko gima makere gi tindin madongo i pokirok ka dibirio; to jobino bongi Yosuwa i kambi i Silo,
Yosuwa to bolo rijo kwir i Silo ruwaŋ Rwoth; to Yosuwa poko Joisiraili lowo kenyo, paka kisi dhano ripo limo.
Kwir pa nono pa nyikway Benyamin paka pecin pajo nitie to bino malo, aka adec m'omiy go podho i dier nono pa Yuda kodi nono pa Yozefu.
Yuthenge ma yumalo kew pajo ocako i Yordan; onyo to kew medere yu kamaloro ma yumalo ma Yeriko, to idho malo i piny matendere yuthenge ma yupodho ceŋ; to gik yuthim ma Bethaven.
Wok kenyo to kew luwo gi yupiny yu kam'ocomere gi Luz, yu kamaloro ma Luz (Bethel) kenyo to kew medere piny i Ataroth Adar, wi got ma ŋare yupiny ma tiendi Bethaven.

Kenyo to kew goyo kona to kadho yuthenge man, yuthenge ma yupodho ceŋ ma yupiny wok i got ma ŋare yupiny, ma ŋiyere gi Bethhoron, to gik i Kiriathbal (Kiriath Yerim) tindi madwoŋ m'obedo apa nyikway Yuda. Me nitie yuthenge ma yupodho ceŋ.
Yuthenge ma yupiny cako wok i thengi Kiriath Yerim; to kew medere yupodho ceŋ wok kenyo kiri i waŋ pi ma Nefitowa.

Onyo to kew kadho piny kama got gik'iye ma ŋiyere gi milelo pa wod Hinom, manitie yumalo ma gik milelo pa Refayim; to loro piny ma milelo pa Hinom, yupiny ma kamaloro pa Joyebus, kodi yupiny kamaloro kiri Enrogel;
onyo to gondere yuthenge ma yumalo kadho yu Ensemes, to kadho yu Geliloth, ma ŋiyere kodi kama idho Adumim; kenyo to loro piny i tele pa Bohan wod pa Ruben;
aka luwo yumalo ma kamaloro ma ŋiyere kodi Beth Araba to kadho yupiny i Araba;
kenyo to kew medere yumalo ma kamaloro ma Beth Hogla; to gik i gike ma Nam ma Cumbi, ma yupiny ma gik Yordan.
Yordan timo kew mere yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ. Me obedo gir'alunja pa nyikway Benyamin, cungo kwoŋ pecin mere, kew gi kew thoko.
Onyo tindin madongo pa Benyamin cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo oyido obedo Yeriko, Beth Hogla, Emek Keziz,
Beth Araba, Zemarayim kodi Bethel,
Avim, Para kodi Ofira,
Kefar Amon, Ofin, kodi Geba: Tindin madongo apar g'ario gi calin pajo:
Gibeon, Rama kodi Beroth,
Mizipa, Kefira kodi Moza,
Rekem, Iripil kodi Tarala
Zela, Helef, Yebus (meno, Yerusalem), Gibeya, kodi Kiriath Yerim: Tindin madongo apar g'aŋwen gi calin pajo. Me obedo gir'alunja pa nyikway Benyamin cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Kwir mar'ario obol ri Simeo, nono pa nyikway Simeo cungo kwoŋ pecin; aka gir'alunja mere oyido nitie i dier gir'alunja pa nyikway Yuda.
Hazarsual, Bala Ezem,
Elitolad, Bethul, Horima,
Ziglag, Beth Marikaboth, Hazar Susa,
Beth Lebayoth kodi Saruhen: Tindin madongo apar g'adek gi calin pajo;
Ayin, Rimon, Etha kodi Asan: Tindin madongo aŋwen gi calin mere,
kanyacel gi calin je m'othoko tindin madongo me: Balath Ber kodi Rama yupiny. Me oyido obedo gir'alunja pa nono pa Simeo, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Gir'alunja pa nyikway Simeo otimo kithar kwoŋ adec ma nono pa nyikway Yuda; kwoŋbedo adec pa nyikway Yuda oyido thoth swa rijo, nyikway Simeo; jonwaŋo gir'alunja i dier gir'alunja pajo.
Kwir mar'adek obino ri nyikway Zebulun, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo. Aka kew ma gir'alunja pajo otundo kiri Saridi;
onyo to kew pajo medere yupodho ceŋ, kodi Mareal, to geyo Dabeseth kodi pi ma mol yuwok ceŋ ma Yokineam.
Goyo kona yucen wok Saridi kidho yu kew ma Kisloth Tabor, ka medere yu Daberath to kadho kiri malo Yafia.
Wok kenyo to ŋondo yuwok ceŋ yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ kadho Gath Hefer, kadho i Takazin, to wok kodi Rimon, to gondere thoko kidho Neya.
Onyo yuthenge ma yumalo kew goyo kona kidho Hanathon, aka gike mere obedo milelo ma Yiftael,
Kata, Nahalal, Simiron, Idala kodi Bethelehem: Kanyacel tindin apar g'ario gi calin pajo.
Tindin madongo me kodi calin pajo jobedo gir'alunja pa nyikway Zebulun cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Kwir mar'aŋwen ofudhere ri Isakar, ri nyikway Isakar, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Adec mere oyido nitie iye Yezirel, Kesuloth, Sunem,
Hafarayim, Sion, Anaharath,
Rabith, Kision, Ebez,
Remeth, Enganim, Enhada, kodi Beth Pazez.
Kew bende ogeyo Tabor, Sahazuma, kodi Bethsemes aka gike mar'adec mere oyido obedo Yordan: Tindin madongo apar g'aucel gi calin pajo.
Me am'oyido obedo gir'alunja pa nono pa nyikway Isakar, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, tindin madongo kodi calin pajo.
Kwir mar'abic ofudhere ri nono pa nyikway Aser, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Kew mere obed'iye Helkath, Hali, Beten, Akisaf,
Alamelek, Amadi kodi Misal; ogeyo Kamel yupodho ceŋ kodi jwom ma Libinath.
Onyo to wire aŋey yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ kadho Beth Dagon, ogeyo Zebulun kodi milelo ma Yiftael yumalo i Bethemek kodi Neyel, to tundo Kabul yuthenge ma yumalo mere,
Ebron, Rehob, Hamon, kodi Kana tundo kiri Sidon Madwoŋ.
To kew wire aŋey i Rama, to kadho kiri tundo i tindi madwoŋ m'otinda ma Tire, to gik kendo i Hosa, aka kew mere yupodho ceŋ oyido obedo Mehalbe, Akizib,
Uma, Afek kodi Rehok: Kanyacel tindin madongo piero ario g'ario gi calin pajo.
Me am'oyido obedo gir'alunja pa nono pa nyikway Aser, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, tindin madongo me gi calin pajo.
Kwir mar'aucel ofudhere ri nyikway Nafital, ri nyikway Nafital, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Kew mere ocako wok Helef, wok iy'olwa i Zananim kodi Adaminekeb, kodi Yabinel, tundo kiri Lakum; to gik i Yordan.
Kenyo to kew wire aŋey yupodho ceŋ kidho Azinoth Tabor aka wok kenyo to medere kiri Hukok, aka geyo Zebulun yupiny, kodi Aser yupodho ceŋ, kodi Yuda yuwok ceŋ i Yordan.
Tindin madongo m'otinda gi cel jobedo Zidim, Zer, Hamath, Rakath, Kinereth,
Adama, Rama, Hazor,
Kedes, Edirey, Enhazor,
Yiron, Migdalal, Horem, Beth Anath, kodi Bethsemes: Tindin madongo apar g'abuŋwen gi calin mere.
Me a gir'alunja pa nono pa nyikway Nafital cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo tindin madongo gi calin pajo.
Kwir mar'abirio to ofudhere ri nono pa nyikway Dan, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo.
Aka adec ma gir'alunja pajo oyido obedo Zora, Esitayol, Irisemes,
Salabin, Ayijalon, Yithla,
Elon, Timina, Ekiron,
Eliteke, Gibethon, Balath,
Yehud, Benberak kodi Gath Rimon;
Mejarkon kodi Rakon g'adec ma ŋiyere kodi Yopa.

To munyo adec pa nyikway Dan orwenyo rijo, nyikway Dan jokidho malo to jolwenyo kodi Lesem, aka munyo jotieko mako to joneko ji mere, joloko apajo to jobed'iye, to jolwoŋo Lesem ni Dan, m'obedo nyingi Dan, kwari jo.
Me a gir'alunja pa nono pa nyikway Dan, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo tindin madongo me kodi calin pajo.
Munyo jotieko cowo poko adec m'opokere ma piny paka gigipiny alunja, Joisiraili to jomiyo gir'alunja ma dier jo ri Yosuwa wod pa Nun.
Wok kwoŋ or pa Rwoth jomiyo go tindi madwoŋ ma go okwayo, Timinath Sera i piny matendere ma Isiraili; to go geto tindi madwoŋ kendo; to bed'iye.

Me a gigipiny alunja ma Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam gi Yosuwa wod pa Nun kodi jotel ma pecin pa bacere ma nonin pa Joisiraili m'opok gi bolo kwir i Silo ruwaŋ Rwoth, i dhiot ma Wema ma romo. Onyo to jocowo poko lowo.
waci ri Joisiraili ni, “Wiripo yero tindin madongo ma pondo, m'atieko waco riwin luwo bongi Musa,
ma janek m'oneki dhano moro je ma k'ogendera kosa ma k'oŋeyo wonyali bedo kenyo, jolabedo riwin kapondo ri jaculi kwor ma remo.

Go bino dwire i acel kwoŋ tindin madongo me to cungo i dhiot ma waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ, to tito banja pere ri jodongo ma tindi madwoŋ no; nyaka to jorwako go i tindi madwoŋ, to jomiyo go kabedo, to go bedo gi jo.
Aka ka jaculi kwor ma remo oriem go, jokibino ketho janek i cinge, rupiri go oneko nyawote ma k'ogendera, m'oyido ongoye gi kwor gine con mere.

Janek bino doŋ i tindi madwoŋ no cuka otiek cungo ruwaŋ cokirok ri thumo banja, cuka tho pa jacway ri Were i wi migam madwoŋ ma hongo no; nyaka to janek dok i tindi pere madwoŋ won aka i ot pere won, i tindi madwoŋ m'oyido cango odwire wok'iye kenyo.”
Ameno to joketho gicen Kedes i Galili i piny matendere pa Nafital, kodi Sekem i piny matendere ma Isiraili, kodi Kiriath Arba (meno Hebron) i piny matendere ma Yuda.
Aka wok yuthenge ca ma Yordan yuwok ceŋ ma Yeriko, joketho Beza i thim i piny m'opiele, wok i nono pa Ruben, kodi Ramoth i Giliad, wok i nono pa Gad, kodi Golan i Basan, wok i nono pa Manase.

Me a tindin madongo m'oketh gicen ri ji je ma Isiraili, kodi ri jokicar ma jobengabenga i dier jo, ma ka ŋatimoro je m'oneki dhano ma k'ogendera wonyali dwire kenyo, ŋey wokiri wotho gi cingi jaculi kwor ma remo, cuka otiek cungo ruwaŋ kacokirok.
Jotel pa bacere ma pecin pa Jolevi jocore cegin gi Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi Yosuwa wod pa Nun kodi jotel ma pecin ma nonin pa Joisiraili;
joluwo gi jo i Silo i piny ma Kanan ni, “Rwoth owodho or ka luwo gi bongi Musa ni iripo miyo wan tindin madongo abed'iye, kanyacel gi kakwath pajo ri dhok mawan.”
Ameno gi or pa Rwoth, Joisiraili jomiyo Jolevi tindin madongo me gi kakwath wok kwoŋ gir'alunja pajo.
Kwir ofudhere ri nono pa Kohath. Ameno Jolevi no m'oyido jobedo nyikway Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam jonwaŋo gi kwir wok kwoŋ nono pa Yuda, Simeo kodi Benyamin, tindin madongo apar g'adek.
Aka nyikway Kohath ma jodoŋ jonwaŋo kodi kwir wok bongi nono pa Isiraili, wok bongi nono pa Dan kodi adec ma nono pa Manase, tindin madongo apar.
Nyikway Gason jonwaŋo gi kwir wok i nono pa Isakar, wok i nono pa Aser, wok i nono pa Nafital kodi iy'adec ma nono pa Manase i Basan, tindin madongo apar g'adek.
Nyikway Merari cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo jonwaŋo wok bongi nono pa Ruben, nono pa Gad kodi nono pa Zebulun, tindin madongo apar g'ario.
Tindin madongo me gi kakwath pajo Joisiraili jomiyo gi kwir ri Jolevi, paka Rwoth oyido otieko wodho or ka luwo gi bongi Musa.
Wok kwoŋ nono pa Yuda kodi nono pa Simeo, jomiyo tindin madongo me m'otuci gi nyingi jo,
m'okidho ri nyikway Aron, acel kwoŋ nonin pa nyikway Kohath ma jobedo apa Jolevi; paka kwir opodho rijo marapena.
Jomiyo jo Kiriath Arba (Arba m'obedo ba Anak) meno Hebron, i piny matendere ma Yuda, kanyacel gi kakwath m'othoko.
To kisawere ma tindi madwoŋ kodi calin mere oyido otiek miyo Kaleb wod pa Yefune paka gipere.
To nyikway Aron jacway ri Were i wi migam, jomiyo Hebron, tindin madongo ma kapondo pa janek, gi kakwath mere, Libina gi kakwath mere,
Yatir, gi kakwath mere, Esitemowa gi kakwath mere,
Holon gi kakwath mere, Debir gi kakwath mere,
Ayin gi kakwath mere, Yuda gi kakwath mere, Bethsemes gi kakwath mere, tindin madongo abuŋwen wok kwoŋ nonin ario me.
Wok kwoŋ nono pa Benyamin, Gibeon gi kakwath mere, Geba gi kakwath mere,
Anathoth gi kakwath mere, Almon gi kakwath mere, tindin madongo aŋwen.
Tindin madongo apa nyikway Aron, jocway ri Were i wi migam, oyido nitie je tindin madongo apar g'adek gi kakwath pajo.
Paka ri nonin pa nyikway Kohath m'odoŋ ma jobedo jopeco pa Kohath mapa Jolevi, tindin madongo m'omiy jo owok kwoŋ nono mapa Isiraili.
Omiyo Josekem, tindi madwoŋ ma kapondo ri janek, gi kakwath mere i piny matendere ma Isiraili, Gezer gi kakwath mere,
Kibzayim kodi Bethhoron gi kakwath pajo, tindin madongo aŋwen.
Aka wok kwoŋ nono pa Dan, jomiyo jo Eliteke kodi Gibethon gi kakwath pajo,
Ayijalon kodi Gath Rimon, gi kakwath pajo tindin madongo aŋwen;
wok kwoŋ adec ma nono pa Manase, Tanak kodi Gath Rimon, gi kakwath pajo tindin madongo ario.
Tindin madongo m'odoŋ apa nonin pa nyikway Kohath oyido je nitie apar gi kakwath pajo.

Ri nyikway Gason, acel kwoŋ nonin pa Jolevi, omiy jo wok kwoŋ adec ma nono pa Manase, Golan i Basan gi kakwath mere, tindi madwoŋ ma kapondo ri janek, kodi Bes Tera gi kakwath mere, tindin ario madongo;
Aka wok kwoŋ nono pa Isakar, Kison kodi Daberath gi kakwath pajo,
Yarmuth kodi Enganim gi kakwath pajo tindin madongo aŋwen;
aka wok kwoŋ nono pa Aser, Misal kodi Abidon gi kakwath pajo,
Helkath kodi Rehob gi kakwath pajo tindin madongo aŋwen;
aka wok kwoŋ nono pa Nafital, Kedes i Galili gi kakwath mere, tindi madwoŋ ma kapondo pa janek, Hamothdor kodi Kartan gi kakwath pajo, tindin madongo adek.
Tindin madongo je apa nonin pa Jogason oyido je nitie tindin madongo apar g'adek gi kakwath pajo.
Aka ri Jolevi man m'odoŋ, nyikway Merari, omiy jo wok kwoŋ nono pa Zebulun, Yokineam kodi Karta gi kakwath pajo,
Dimna kodi Nahalal kodi kakwath pajo, tindin madongo aŋwen;
aka wok kwoŋ nono pa Ruben, Beza kodi Yahaz gi kakwath pajo;
Kedemoth kodi Mefath kodi kakwath pajo, tindin madongo aŋwen;
wok kwoŋ nono pa Gad, Ramoth i Giliad gi kakwath mere, tindi madwoŋ ma kapondo ri janek, Mehanayim gi kakwath mere,
Hesibon kodi Yaza gi kakwath pajo, tindin aŋwen madongo je kanyacel.
Paka ri tindin madongo je apa nyikway Merari, meno, apa nono pa Jolevi ma jodoŋ, meno m'omiy jo je kanyacel oyido obedo tindin madongo apar g'ario.
Tindin madongo je apa Jolevi i dier gim'obedo apa Joisiraili oyido jonitie je kanyacel tindin madongo piero aŋwen g'aboro gi kakwath pajo.
Tindin madongo me kisi acel oyido nitie gi kakwath mere m'othoko; ameno apaka obedo gi tindin madongo me je.
Ama apaka Rwoth omiyo Isiraili lowo je ma go okwoŋere ni lamiyo kwarere; aka munyo jotieko loko apajo, to jobedo kenyo.
To Rwoth miyo jo ywomirok i kisi thenge paka go oyido otieko kwoŋere ri kwarere pajo; ongoye kad'acel kwoŋ jokwor pajo m'onyalo cungo kwoŋ jo rupiri Rwoth oyido otieko miyo jokwor pajo je i cingi jo.
Ongoye kad'acel kwoŋ cikirok maber ma Rwoth oyido timo gi ot pa Isiraili ma k'otimere; joje jotimere.
Gikenyo Yosuwa to lwoŋo jo Ruben, jo Gad, kodi adec ma nono pa Manase,
to waco rijo ni, “Witieko kuro gimoro je ma Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth ooro win, aka witieko woran i gimoro je m'aoro win;
fodi wikijwango wutmin win hongo kweth me je, tundo gunyo ni, to witieko bedo ma wigwokere ma timo gima Rwoth Were mewin mito.

Aka onyo pama Rwoth Were mewin otieko miyo ywomirok ri wutmin win, paka ociko jo; riameno wire win wikadhi i wemin mewin i lowo ma gim'obedo mewin ŋar'iye, ma Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth omiyo win yuthenge ca ma Yordan.
Gwokere win maber kuro or kodi cik ma Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth ooro, ma mito Rwoth Were mewin, ma timo gima go yenyo, ma kuro or pere, ma geno go, gi tiyo rigo g'adundin mewin je kodi cuny win je.”
Ameno Yosuwa to miyo jo silwany to sewila jo, to jokadho i wemin pajo.

Onyo ri adec ma nono pa Manase, Musa oyido omiyo jo Basan ni wobedi apajo; to ri adec man ca, Yosuwa oyido omiyo jo adec macegin Joisiraili wadi gin ni wobedi apajo i lowo ma yupodho ceŋ ma Yordan. Aka munyo osewila jo i wemin pajo to miyo jo silwany,
owaco rijo ni, “Gik win i wemin mewin gi ŋaŋo kweth, gi dhok kweth, gi feza, zahabu, ywel, nyweny, gi nangin kidhur; wipok gima winyaga pa jokwor mewin gi wutmin win.”

Ameno jo Ruben kodi jo Gad gi adec ma nono pa Manase jogik peco, ka jopokere kwoŋ Joisiraili i Silo, manitie i piny ma Kanan, ma kidho i piny ma Giliad, piny pajo won m'oyido joloko apajo i or pa Rwoth luwo bongi Musa.
Munyo jobino iy'adec macegin gi Yordan, ma ŋare i lowo ma Yordan, jo Ruben, jo Gad kodi adec ma nono pa Manase jogeto kenyo migam i thengi Yordan, migam madwoŋ ma kiwacere.
Joisiraili jowinjo to jowaco ni, “Neni, jo Ruben, jo Gad kodi adec ma nono pa Manase jogeto migam i nyim piny ma Kanan, iy'adec macegin kodi Yordan, yuthenge m'obedo apa Joisiraili.”
Aka munyo Joisiraili jowinjo gino, kweth ma cokirok pa Joisiraili je jocokere i Silo, ma timo lweny kwoŋ jo.
Kenyo to Joisiraili jodhiro rijo Ruben, jo Gad kodi adec ma nono pa Manase, i piny ma Giliad, Finehas wod pa Eliazar m'obedo jacway ri Were i wi migam,
gi rwodhe apar ma jokwaŋo go, acel wok kwoŋ kisi nono ma pecin ma Isiraili, kisi ŋat'acel kwoŋ jo wic peco i dier nonin ma Isiraili.
Jotundo bongi jo Ruben, jo Gad kodi adec ma nono pa Manase, i piny ma Giliad, to jowaco rijo ni,
“Cokirok pa Rwoth gipi penjo ama, ‘Me tim manyaliŋliŋ marac aŋo ma witieko timo kwoŋ Were ma Isiraili ma konon wiwire woko kwoŋ luwo Rwoth, ka wigeto migam ri wiwegi konon ka wigwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth?
Fodi reco ma Pewor k'oromo wan ma fodi kiri wakilonyo kwo mawan kwoŋe, m'omiyo thoyamo obino kwoŋ cokirok pa Rwoth,
ma wiripo wire iye konon ma wikiluwo Rwoth? Aka ka wigwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth konon, nge lamako go gi cokirok pa Isiraili gipi dikin.

To pama, ka lowo mewin koc, luw win i lowo pa Rwoth kama tabenakulo pa Rwoth cung'iye, aka witer ri wiwegi mic i dier wan; kende wikiri wigwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth, kosa wiloki wan jogwenyirok ka wigeto ri wiwegi migam makiweno migam pa Rwoth Were mawan.
Acan wod pa Zera k'oturo yeyo i gigipiny m'oketh gicen ma lamo, to keme podho kwoŋ cokirok pa Isiraili gipi? Aka go k'otho kende ro reco pere.’ ”
Gikenyo to jo Ruben, jo Gad kodi adec ma nono pa Manase jowaco i radwok ri jotel ma pecin ma Isiraili,
“Ŋata Jameni je, Were, Rwoth! Ŋata Jameni je, Were, Rwoth! Go oŋeyo; aka weyi Isiraili won woŋey! K'inen obedo i gwenyirok kosa i turo yeyo yuthenge pa Rwoth, ikir'ikoy wan konon
ma geto ri wawegi migam ma wirok kwoŋ luwo Rwoth, kosa ka watimo ameno ma miyo mic awaŋa kosa mic ma kodhi kosa mic ma siem kwoŋe, weyi Rwoth won gipi woculi kwor.
Aka ka k'obedo ameno, watieko timo gime wok kwoŋ lworo ni hongo ma yuwaŋe nyikway win jolapenjo nyikway wan ni, ‘Rwoth Were pa Isiraili nitie riwin gi kony aŋo?
Kole Rwoth otieko loko Yordan kew ma poko wan kodi win, win nono pa Ruben kodi nono pa Gad; wingoye g'adec i Rwoth.’ Ameno nyikway win jonyalo miyo nyikway wan weyo lworo Rwoth.
Riameno wawaco ni, ‘Mondo weyi win pama wageti migam, makiweno ma mic awaŋa, kosa ma cowirok,

to ma bedo jakony i dier wan kodi win, kodi i dier luse m'obedi ka watieko ngoye, ni watim tic pa Rwoth i waŋ go gi mic mawan awaŋa, cowirok gi mic mawan ma siem; ka k'obedo ameno nyikway win jolawaco ri nyikway wan i hongo ma yuwaŋe ni,

“Wingoye g'adec i Rwoth.” ’ Aka waparo ni, ka inyalo waco riwan gime, kosa ri nyikway wan i hongo ma yuwaŋe, waripo waco ni, ‘Neni, nyawoti migam pa Rwoth, ma kwarere mawan jotimo, makiweno ri mic awaŋa, kosa cowirok, to ma bedo jakony i dier wan kodi win.’

Wobedi bor gi wan ni waripo gwenyirok kwoŋ Rwoth, to wawire i ndelo ma konon kwoŋ luwo Rwoth gi geto migam ri mic awaŋa, mic ma kodhi, kosa cowirok, ma k'obedo migam pa Rwoth Were mawan ma cungo ruwaŋ tabenakulo pere!”
Munyo jacway ri Were i wi migam Finehas kodi jotel ma kacokirok, wic pecin ma Isiraili m'oyido jonitie gi go, jowinjo wac ma nyikway Ruben, nyikway Gad kodi nyikway Manase joluwo, osiemo jo swa.

Aka Finehas wod pa Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam owaco ri nyikway Ruben, nyikway Gad kodi nyikway Manase ni, “Konon waŋeyo ni Rwoth nitie i dier wan, rupiri fodi wikitimo tim ma buyeyo me kwoŋ Rwoth; pama onyo itieko botho Joisiraili wok i cingi Rwoth.”
Kenyo to Finehas wod pa Eliazar jacway ri Were i wi migam, kodi jotel, jogik bongi nyikway Ruben, kodi nyikway Gad i piny ma Giliad kidho i piny ma Kanan, bongi Joisiraili to jodwoko rijo wac.
Aka radwok no osiemo Joisiraili; to Joisiraili jofoyo Were to jobedo ma jok'oluwo kendo ma timo lweny kwoŋ jo, ma reyo piny kama nyikway Ruben kodi nyikway Gad oyido jobed'iye.
Nyikway Ruben kodi nyikway Gad jolwoŋo migam ni Jakony; kole jowaco ni, “Obedo jakony i dier wan ni Rwoth obedo Were.”
Rumacen ma hongo malac, munyo Rwoth otieko miyo ywomirok ri Joisiraili kwoŋ jokwor je m'othoko jo, aka Yosuwa oyido oti aka oro pere ojware,
Yosuwa ocoko Joisiraili je kanyacel, jotel kodi jodongo pajo, jothum banja kodi jotel, to waco rijo ni, “Pama onyo ati aka oro paran ojware;
aka witieko neno gimoro je ma Rwoth Were mewin otieko timo ri nonin me je kwoŋbedo win, kole obedo Rwoth Were mewin m'otieko lweny riwin.
Atieko miyo win paka gir'alunja mewin ri nonin mewin, nonin no ma jodoŋ, kanyacel gi nonin je m'atieko ŋado woko, wok Yordan tundo i Nam Madwoŋ yupodho ceŋ.
Rwoth Were mewin bino dwoko jo cen ruwaŋ win, to gweyo jo woko i waŋ win; to wiloko lowo pajo mewin, paka Rwoth Were mewin ociko win.
Riameno bedi win ma wiridhere swa ma kuro kodi timo gimoro je m'ondiki i kitawo ma cik pa Musa, ma wikiwire kwoŋe yuracuc kosa racam,
ŋey wikiri wiruwere gi nonin me ma jodoŋ ka i dier win, kosa wituci nyingi werin pajo, kosa wikwoŋere gi jo, kosa witiy rijo, kosa wikule piny rijo,
to cwire win kwoŋ Rwoth Were mewin matek, paka witieko timo tundo konon.
Kole Rwoth otieko gweyo woko ruwaŋ win nonin madongo kodi matek; paka riwin, ongoye dhano m'onyalo ciro cungo i nyim win tundo konon.
Ŋat'acel kwoŋ win kethere lweny gi ji gana, rupiri obedo Rwoth Were mewin ma lwenyo riwin, paka ociko win.
Riameno, gwokere win swa, ma mito Rwoth Were mewin.
Kole ka winowire aŋey, to wiriwere gi jom'oboth pa nonin me ma jodoŋ ka i dier win, to winywomere gi jo, ŋey winywom mon pajo to jonywomere gi win,

ŋey win adieri ni Rwoth Were mewin k'omedere gweyo nonin me ruwaŋ win; to jolabedo bwo kodi mitego riwin, dende i thenge mewin, kodi kudhin i waŋ win, cuka winosika gi lowo maber me ma Rwoth Were mewin otieko miyo win.”

“Onyo pama acegin kidho i royo ma piny gipi, aka wiŋeyo iy'adundin mewin gi cuny win, wijoje, ni ongoye gima k'otimere kwoŋ gigipiny mabeyo je ma Rwoth Were mewin ociko ma mako win; gimoro je otieko timere riwin, ongoye kad'acel ma k'otimere.

To paka gigipiny je mabeyo ma Rwoth Were mewin ociko ma mako win otieko tundo i kare riwin, onyo Rwoth lakelo kwoŋ win gigipiny mareco je, cuka otiek reyo win woko i lowo maber me ma Rwoth Were mewin otieko miyo win.

Ka winobenga to wituro cikirok pa Rwoth Were mewin, ma go ooro win, to wikadho to witiyo ri werin man to wikule piny rijo, nyaka nge pa Rwoth laliel kwoŋ win, to wisika piyo piyo i lowo maber ma go otieko miyo win.”
Gikenyo Yosuwa ocoko nonin pa Isiraili je kanyacel i Sekem, to lwoŋo jodongo, jotel, jothum banja, kodi jotel pa Joisiraili; to jobino ruwaŋ Were.
Yosuwa owaco ri ji no je ni, Rwoth Were pa Isiraili waco ama: “Cango con kwarere mewin Tera kodi wote Abraham kodi Tahor jobedo kalo Yufrete to jotiyo ri werin man.
Kenyo akwanyo bawin Abraham wok kalo malawa aka atelo go i lowo ma Kanan parom, t'aloko nyikwaye mathoth. Amiyo go Isaka;
t'amiyo Isaka Yakobo kodi Esau. Amiyo Esau piny matendere ma Edom wobedi apere, to Yakobo gi nyithindho pere to jokadho yupiny Misir.
Rumacen adhiro Musa kodi Aron aka afuta Misir gi gir'aura m'atimo i dier jo, aka rumacen t'awodho win woko.
Kenyo awodho woko kwarere mewin wok Misir, to wibino i nam; to Jomisir joriemo kwarere mewin gi cawilin kodi cwo ma jogweyo punde i Malawa M'obokere.
Munyo joywak ri Rwoth, to go ketho mudho i dier win kodi Jomisir, omiyo nam oriewere kwoŋ jo to umo jo; aka waŋ win oneno gim'atimo ri Misir, aka wibedo i thim ma hongo malac.
Nyaka t'akelo win i lowo pa Joamor, m'oyido jobedo yuthenge ca ma Yordan; jolwenyo gi win, t'aketho jo cingi win, to wiloko lowo pajo mewin, t'areyo jo woko ruwaŋ win.
Kenyo Balak wod pa Zipor kere ma Mowab, ay kidho lweny kodi Joisiraili. Balak odhiro mikwenda to lwoŋo Balam wod pa Bewor ni wolam win,
t'akinyalo winjo Balam; riameno go omiyo win silwany, ameno abotho win i cingi go.
Munyo wipor loka Yordan to witundo Yeriko, to cwo ma Yeriko jolwenyo gi win, kodi Joamor bende, Joperiz, Jokanan, Johiti, Jogagas, Johivi kodi Joyebus; aketho jo i cingi win.
Adhiro amurie ruwaŋ win m'oriemo jo woko ruwaŋ win, kerin ario apa Joamor; k'obedo g'abor kosa g'asere.
Amiyo win lowo ma wikicwer'iye kwok, kodi tindin ma wikigeto, aka wibedo kenyo i iye, wicamo olemo ma ndelo vini kodi ndelo oliv ma wikipidho.”
“Onyo riameno wor win Rwoth, aka witiy rigo iy'adieri kodi genirok; wikethi gicen werin ma kwarere mewin jotiyo rijo yombo Malawa kodi i Misir, aka witiy ri Rwoth.

Onyo ka wikiyere tic ri Rwoth, yer win konon ŋata wilatiyo rigo, kosa werin ma kwarere mewin jotiyo rijo yur'adec ma yombo Malawa kosa werin pa Joamor, ma wibedo i lowo pajo; to paka ri peco paran kodi an, walatiyo ri Rwoth.”
Kenyo to ji jodwoko ni, “Wobedi bor gi wan ni waripo jwango Rwoth to watiyo ri werin man;

kole obedo Rwoth Were mawan m'owodho wan kodi kwarere mawan woko i piny ma Misir, i ot ma twec, kodi go m'otimo ranyuth madongo no i waŋ wan. Go okwonga wan malo i royo je ma waluwo, kodi i dier ji je ma waluwo i dier jo;
to Rwoth gweyo woko ruwaŋ wan ji je, Joamor m'oyido jobedo i lowo. Riameno wabende walatic ri Rwoth, kole go obedo Were mawan.”
To Yosuwa waco ri ji ni, “Wikinyal tiyo ri Rwoth, rupiri go obedo Were maleŋ. Go obedo Were ma janyeko; go k'ocwaki kibenga mewin kosa reco mewin.
Ka winojwangi Rwoth to witiyo ri werin makicar, kenyo go lawire to miyo win litho, to neko woko win munyo otieko timo riwin bero.”
Aka ji jowaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Be, walatic ri Rwoth!”
Kenyo to Yosuwa waco ri ji ni, “Wiwegi wibedo jokony kwoŋ wiwegi ni witieko yero Rwoth, tiyo rigo.” To jodwoko ni, “Wabedo jokony.”
Yosuwa to waco rijo ni, “Onyo kethi win gicen werin makicar ma jonitie i dier win, aka miy win adundin mewin ri Rwoth Were pa Isiraili.”
Ji jowaco ri Yosuwa ni, “Walatic ri Rwoth Were mawan, aka walawinjo dwondi go.”
Ameno to Yosuwa timo cikirok gi jono ndelo no, oketho cik to wodho or rijo i Sekem.
Yosuwa ondiko wac me je i kitawo ma cik pa Were, to kwanyo tele madwoŋ swa, to jengo kenyo i tiendi olwa i kamaleŋ pa Rwoth.
To Yosuwa waco ri ji je ni, “Neni win, tele me labedo jakony kwoŋ wan, kole otieko winjo wac pa Rwoth je ma go oluwo gi wan, riameno go bino bedo jakony kwoŋ win, ka winotim gikomo ri Were mewin.”
Gikenyo Yosuwa oay malo to sewila ji, aka kisi ŋat'acel odok iy'alunja pere.
Munyo gigipiny me otieko timere, Yosuwa wod pa Nun ŋeca pa Rwoth, otho, munyo jaoro miya acel g'apar.
Joyiko go iy'alunja pere won i Timinath Sera, manitie i piny matendere ma Efrayim, yumalo ma Got Gas.
Isiraili otiyo ri Rwoth i hongo pa Yosuwa je, kodi i hongo je pa jotel ma jopen bedo ri Yosuwa m'oyido jotieko ŋeyo tic je ma Rwoth otimo ri Isiraili.

Cokin pa Yozefu, m'oyido Joisiraili jokelo wok Misir, oyiki i Sekem, i kigoda lowo ma Yakobo oyido onyewo gi nyithindho pa Hamor, ba Sekem, a welo ma siringi miya acel; olokere gir'alunja pa nyikway Yozefu.
Eliazar wod pa Aron otho; t'iyiko go i Gibeya, tindi pa wode Finehas, m'oyido omiy go i piny matendere ma Efrayim.
Rumacen ma tho pa Yosuwa, Joisiraili jopenjo Rwoth ni, “Ŋa ma latelo kadho lweny riwan gi Jokanan?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Yuda ama latelo kadho. Neni atieko miyo lowo i cingi go.”
Yuda owaco ri omin go Simeo ni, “Kadhi malo kodan iy'adec paran, aka weyi walweny gi Jokanan; an bende alakadho kodin iy'adec perin.” Ameno Simeo okadho gi Yuda.
Yuda okadho malo aka Rwoth omiyo Jokanan kodi Joperiz i cingi jo; to joneko ji 10,000 kwoŋ jo i Bezek.
Jonwaŋo Adonibezek i Bezek, jolwenyo gi go, aka jokengila Jokanan kodi Joperiz.
Adonibezek oringo, to joriemo go aka jomako go to jothumo lwet cinge ma thwon kodi lwet tiende ma thwon.

Adonibezek owaco ni, “Kerin piero abirio gi lwet cingi jo ma thwon kodi lwet tiendi jo ma thwon m'othumi woko oyido jodimo ŋinjeŋinje i tiendi meza paran. Paka atieko timo, ameno Were otieko culan.” Jokelo go i Yerusalem to tho kenyo.
Ji ma Yuda jolwenyo gi Yerusalem aka jomako. Joneko ji mere g'abor to jocwinyo gi mac.
Rumacen ji ma Yuda jokadho piny lweny gi Jokanan m'oyido jobedo i piny matendere, i yupiny, kodi i milelo.
Yuda omonjo Jokanan m'oyido jobedo i Hebron (nyingi Hebron con mere oyido obedo Kiriath Arba) aka jokengila Sesay, Ahiman kodi Talmay.
Yuda owok kenyo to monjo ji m'oyido jobedo i Debir, nyingi Debir con mere oyido ilwoŋo ni Kiriath Sefer.
Kaleb owaco ni, “Ŋat'omonji Kiriath Sefer to mako, alamiyo Akisa, nyaran paka dhako pere.”
Othiniel wod pa Kenaz, aka omin Kaleb mathin, omako Debir Sefer, to Kaleb miyo Othiniel nyare Akisa paka dhako.
Munyo Akisa obino bongi Othiniel, okwayo ni go wokway bamere lowo. Munyo Akisa loro wok i wi punde, Kaleb openjo go ni, “Kwac perin aŋo?”
Akisa odwoko ni, “Miyan silwany; kole itieko miyan lowo ma yupiny, miyan bende waŋ pi. Kaleb omiyo go waŋ pi ma malo kodi ma piny.”
Nyikway Kena, or Musa, jokadho malo wok i tindi madwoŋ ma yen thith kanyacel gi nyikway Yuda i thim ma Yuda, manitie i yupiny cegin gi Aradi, aka jobedo i dier jono.
Yuda okadho gi omin go Simeo, aka kanyacel jokengila Jokanan m'oyido jobedo i Zefath, joreyo woko kicutho to jolwoŋo ni Horima.
Yuda omako Gaza gi adec mere je, Asikelon gi adec mere je, Ekiron gi adec mere je.
Rwoth oyido nitie gi Yuda, go omako piny matendere, to k'onyalo riemo woko ji m'oyido jobedo i milelo kwoŋbedo oyido jonitie gi cawilin ma nyweny.
Omiy Kaleb Hebron paka Musa oyido owaco, aka Kaleb oriemo woko kenyo wot Aneki adek.
Nyikway Benyamin jok'oriemo woko Joyebus m'oyido jobedo i Yerusalem; to Joyebus jobedo kanyacel gi nyikway Benyamin i Yerusalem tundo konon me.
Nyikway Yozefu bende jomonjo Bethel; aka Rwoth oyido nitie gi jo.
Jooro jopendo i Bethel. (Nyingi Bethel con mere oyido obedo Luz)
Munyo joneno jacwo moro wok i tindi madwoŋ, jowaco rigo ni, “Mondo nyuthi wan kadonjo i tindi madwoŋ, aka walanyuthin wor.”
Jacwo no onyutho jo kadonjo i tindi madwoŋ, joreyo woko tindi madwoŋ g'abor, to joweyo jacwo no kodi peco pere kadho.
Jacwo no okadho i lowo pa Johiti, ogeto tindi madwoŋ kenyo to cwoko nyinge ni Luza, paka fodi ilwoŋo kiri konon.
Manase k'oriemo woko ji m'oyido jobedo i Bethsan gi calin mere, Tanak gi calin mere, Dor gi calin mere, Ibilim gi calin mere, Megido gi calin mere, to Jokanan jomedo bedo i lowo no.
To munyo Joisiraili jolokere matek, jomiyo jo timo tic arom, ma jok'oriemo jo woko kicutho.
Efrayim bende k'oriemo woko Jokanan m'oyido jobedo i Gezer, to Jokanan jomedere bedo i dier jo i Gezer.
Zebulun k'oriemo woko ji m'oyido jobedo i Kitron, kosa ji m'oyido jobedo i Nahalal, to Jokanan jobedo i dier jo, aka jotimo tic arom.
Aser k'oriemo woko ji m'oyido jobedo i Ako, Sidon, Alab, Akizib, Helba, Afik, kodi Rehob.
To jo Asera jobedo i dier Jokanan, ji m'oyido jobedo i lowo no, kole jok'oriemo woko jo.
Nafital k'oriemo woko ji m'oyido jobedo i Bethsemes kodi i Beth Anath, to jobedo i dier Jokanan m'oyido jobedo i lowo no. Kwanyo woko ji ma Bethsemes kodi ji ma Beth Anath jotimo rijo tic arom.
Joamor jomiyo nyikway Dan diyirok wi got; kole jok'oyeyo jo loro piny i milelo.
Joamor jomedere bedo wi got Heres, i Ayijalon, kodi i Salibim. Kucel nyikway Yozefu joloyo jo gi meni aka jomiyo jo tic arom.
Kew pa Joamor wok kama Akirabim idho malo, wok i Sela kadho malo.
Malaika pa Rwoth owok malo i Gilgal to kadho i Bokim, aka owaco ni, “Awodho win wok i Misir, aka atieko kelo win i lowo m'aciko kwarkwar win; k'awaco ni, ‘Akibino turo cikirok paran gi win.
Wikiripi timo cikirok gi ji ma jobedo i lowo me, tur win piny migame pajo.’ To wikiwinji dwondan. Me witimo aŋo?
Ameno awaco ni, akilariemo woko jo ruwaŋ win; to jolabedo riwin jokwor, aka werin pajo labedo bwo riwin.”
Munyo malaika pa Rwoth otieko luwo wac me ri Joisiraili, ji jotiŋo dwondi gin malo to joywak.
Riameno kabedo no olwoŋi ni Bokim,
Munyo Yosuwa otieko kisewila ji, Joisiraili je jokadho bedo i lim pajo wegi, lunjo lowo.
Ji jotiyo ri Rwoth i hongo pa Yosuwa je, kodi i hongo pa jodongo je ma jolunjo Yosuwa, m'oyido joneno tic madongo je ma Rwoth otimo ri Isiraili.
Yosuwa wod pa Nun, ŋeca pa Rwoth, otho munyo jaoro 110.
Oyiki Yosuwa i lim pere i Timinath Heres i piny matendere Efrayim yumalo ma Got Gas.
Luse ji no je jotho, to luse man luwo jo, m'oyido jokuya Rwoth, kosa tic madongo ma Rwoth otimo ri Isiraili.
Joisiraili jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth to jolamo Bal.
Jojwango Rwoth Were pa kwarkwar jo m'owodho jo wok i lowo ma Misir, to joluwo werin man, werin pa nonin m'othoko jo, jolamo jo, aka jokwinyo nge pa Rwoth.
Jojwango Rwoth, aka jolamo Bal kodi Asitate.
Ameno nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ Isiraili to miyo jo i cingi jokinyaga ma jonyaga jo, aka otana jo i cingi jokwor pajo thoko jo, ŋey jok'onyalo cungo ruwaŋ jokwor pajo.
Kisi ka jokadho i lweny, cingi Rwoth okelo rijo raco, paka Rwoth opiro jo, kodi paka Rwoth ociko jo; aka jobedo i litho madwoŋ swa.
Rwoth otiŋo malo jothum banja ma jogonyo jo wok i cingi jokinyaga jo.
Kucel jok'owinjo jothum banja pajo; kole jowanya werin man to jokule piny rijo. Jowiro piyo wok i yo ma kwarkwar jo jowoth'iye, ka jokuro or pa Rwoth; to jok'oluwo yo pajo.

Kisi ka Rwoth otiŋo malo jothum banja ri Joisiraili, Rwoth obedo gi jathum banja, aka obotho jo wok i cingi jokwor pajo i hongo pa jathum banja je. Kole Rwoth omako wor gi ywak pajo ro jono ma jocando jo kodi jono ma jodiyo jo.
To kisi ka jathum banja otho, jowire gik i tim pajo macon loyo kiri kwarere pajo, luwo werin man, tiyo rijo kodi kulok piny rijo. Jok'oweyo tim kodi yo pajo ma wictek.
Keme pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ Isiraili aka go owaco ni, “Kwoŋbedo nono me joturo cikirok paran m'amiyo kwarere pajo or kwoŋe, aka jok'owinjo dwondan;
an bende akibino riemo woko ruwaŋ jo nonin ma Yosuwa oweyo munyo go otho.
Ŋey cungo kwoŋ jo anyal ŋeyo ka Isiraili lakuro yo pa Rwoth kodi woth'iye, paka kwarere pajo jotimo, kosa be.”
Ameno Rwoth oweyo nonin no, ma k'oriemo jo piyo, kosa k'oketho jo i cingi Yosuwa.
Onyo me nonin ma Rwoth oweyo ma temo jono je i Isiraili m'oyido fodi jok'oluwo i lweny moro je i Kanan.
Rwoth otimo gime ŋey wofonji luse i Isiraili m'oyido fodi jokuya lweny ŋeyo.
Jodhum abic pa Jofilistia, Jokanan je, Josidon, Johivi m'oyido jobedo i got Lebanon, wok i got Bal Hamon tundo kiri i Lebohamath.
Nonin me oyido owey jo ma temo Isiraili, ŋeyo k'oyido jowinji or pa Rwoth, paka go omiyo kwarere pajo or luwo bongi Musa.
Joisiraili jobedo i dier Jokanan, Johiti, Joamor, Joperiz, Johivi, kodi Joyebus.
Jonywomo nyir pajo pak mon, to jomiyo nyir pajo ri wot jo i nywomirok, aka jolamo werin pajo.
Joisiraili jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, wiy jo owil gi Rwoth Were pajo, to jotiyo ri werin bal kodi Asera.
Nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ Joisiraili, aka otana jo i cingi Kere Kusan Risathayim ma Mesopotamia, to Joisiraili jotiyo rigo ma oro aboro.
To munyo Joisiraili joywak ri Rwoth, Rwoth otiŋo malo jagony ri Isiraili, m'ogonyo jo, Othiniel wod pa Kenaz, aka omin Kaleb mathin.
Cuny pa Rwoth obino kwoŋ Othiniel, aka obedo jathum banja ri Joisiraili. Go otelo jo i lweny, aka Rwoth omiyo Kusan Risathayim kere ma Mesopotamia i cingi go, to Othiniel kengila go.
Piny okwe ma oro piero aŋwen, aka Othiniel wod pa Kenaz otho.
Joisiraili jotimo reco kendo ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka Rwoth omiyo Egilon kere ma Mowab meni monjo Joisiraili, kwoŋbedo oyido jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Egilon oriwere gi Joamon kodi Joamalek, aka jokengila Joisiraili, to jomako tindi madwoŋ ma yen thith.
Joisiraili jotiyo ri Egilon kere ma Mowab ma oro apar g'aboro.
Joisiraili joywak ri Rwoth, aka Rwoth otiŋo malo rijo jagony, Ehud wod pa Gera, janono pa Benyamin, ma jaracam. Joisiraili jooro go tero ri Egilon mic.
Ehud otimo abor ma ja lewe ario ma boro mere romo tiendi jo acel g'adec, to tweyo i eme maracam i pendi law pere.
Ehud okelo mic ri Egilon kere a Mowab. Egilon oyido obedo jacwo ma cwe swa.
Munyo Ehud otieko miyo Egilon mic, go osewila ji ma jotiŋo mic no.
To Ehud won owire gi cal ma telin cegin gi Gilgal, aka owaco ni, “Anitie gi mikwenda manyaliŋliŋ rin kere.” Kere owaco ri ŋecin pere ni, “Liŋ win!” Joje jowok ruwaŋe.
Ehud ocore bongi Egilon m'oyido obedo kakende i kisika m'okwe malo, aka owaco ni, “Anitie gi mikwenda wok bongi Were rin.” Egilon oay malo wok i kom pere ma dhum.
Ehud otelo cinge maracam to kwanyo abor wok i eme maracam, to cwowo gine iy Egilon,
abor odonjo gikululu, to bor umo lewe, Ehud k'ofudho woko abor wok i iye; aka iye onyule woko.
Ehud owok i kisika to cego thigin yuŋeye.
Rumacen munyo Ehud otieko kadho, ŋecin pa Egilon jobino to jonwaŋo thigin ocegi aka joparo nike go oyido konyere.
Jokuro cuka jolimo wickwot. Munyo joneno nike go kiyaw thigo ma kisika, jokwanyo rayaw to joyawo, aka neni rwoth pajo oyido oriere piny i lowo m'otho.
Ehud okwale munyo jogalo, aka oluwo gi cal ma telin to kadho i Seyira.
Munyo Ehud otundo, okudho tundi wod rombo i piny matendere ma Efrayim; Joisiraili joluwo go piny wok i got munyo go telo jo.
Ehud owaco rijo ni, “Luwan win, kole Rwoth omiyo jokwor mewin Jomowab i cingi win.” Ameno joluwo go piny, jomako ger ma Yordan ma Jomowab joŋado gine, to jok'oyeyo dhano ŋado.
I hongo no joneko cegin Jomowab 10,000 ma jotek, ma jorwadhere, m'ongoye m'okwale.
I ndelo Mowab ogik i cingi Joisiraili, aka piny okwe ma oro piero aboro.
Rumacen ma Ehud, obino Samigar wod pa Anath, m'oneko Jofilistia gi kwer megikwe; to go bende botho Joisiraili.
Joisiraili kendo jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth munyo Ehud otieko tho.
Rwoth otana jo i cingi Yakin kere ma Kanan, m'oyido dhumo i Hazor, aka jamituka jolweny pere oyido obedo Sisera m'oyido bedo i Haroseth Hagoyim.
Joisiraili joywak ri Rwoth, kole Yakin oyido nitie gi cawilin ma nyweny 900 aka odiyo Joisiraili ma oro piero ario.
I hongo no Debora, cipa Lapidoth, aka jatuci wac Were madhako oyido jathum banja pa Joisiraili.
Debora oyido bedo i tiendi yath thith, i dier Rama kodi Bethel i piny matendere ma Efrayim; aka Joisiraili oyido jokadho malo bongi go thumo rijo banja.
Debora ooro wolwoŋi Barak wod pa Abinowam wok i Kedes Nafital, aka owaco rigo ni, “Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili miyin or, kadhi yu Got Tabor, gi cwo 10,000 wok i nono pa Nafital kodi nono pa Zebulun.
Alacoro bongin, i milelo ma Kison, Sisera jamituka pa jolweny pa Yabin, gi cawilin pere kodi jolweny pere, aka alamiyo go i cingin.”
Barak odwoko Debora ni, “K'ilakadho kodan, alakadho, to k'ikilakadho kodan, akilakadho.”
Debora owaco ri Barak ni, “Alakadho kodin adieri, kareno royo m'ikadh'iye kilakelo rin dwoŋ, kole Rwoth lakitana Sisera i cingi dhako.” Kenyo Debora oay to jokadho gi Barak i Kedes.
Barak olwoŋo nono pa Nafital kodi nono pa Zebulun, to cwo 10,000 joluwo go. Debora okadho malo gi go.
Onyo Heber Jakena oyido opok go kwoŋ nyikway Hobab or Musa, aka go oyido okecere bor gi Jokena to geto wema pere i yath madwoŋ i Zananim, manitie cegin gi Kedes.
Onyo owaci ri Sisera nike Barak wod pa Abinowam oyido okadho i Got Tabor.
Sisera ocoko cawilin pere ma nyweny 900 kodi ji je m'oyido jonitie gi go i Haroseth Hagoyim to jokadho i malawa Kison.
Debora owaco ri Barak ni, “Ay, konon me Rwoth miyo Sisera i cingin. Rwoth adieri telo yuwiyin.” Ameno Barak oloro piny wok wi Got Tabor, gi cwo 10,000 ma joluwo go.
Rwoth obolo Sisera gi cawilin pere je kodi jolweny pere i nywowirok ruwaŋ Barak; aka Sisera oloro wok i cawila pere to ringo atiendi.
Barak oriemo cawilin kodi jolweny tundo kiri Haroseth Hagoyim. Jolweny je pa Sisera oneki jo g'abor m'ongoye jacwo m'obothi.
Sisera oringo atiendi kiri i wema pa Yael cipa Heber Jakena; kole siem oyido nitie i dier Kere Yabin ma Hazor kodi Heber Jakena.
Yael owok romo gi Sisera, aka owaco ri Sisera ni, “Wire githenge, wire githenge bongan, rwoth paran, Ikir'ilwor.” Sisera owire to donjo i wema, aka oumo go gi kutu.
Sisera owaco ri Yael ni, “Mondo miye pi nyaka mathin amadhi, riyo nekan.” Yael oyawo cupa cak to miyo go madho, to umo go.
Sisera kendo owaco ri Yael ni, “Cungi i dhiot ma wema, aka ka jacwo moro obino to penjin ni, ‘Nitie dhano kenyo?’ Idwoki ni, ‘Ongoye.’”
To Yael cipa Heber okwanyo luth ma wema kodi nyundu i cinge, aka oliwere to goyo i wic Sisera matek i lowo. Kole Sisera oyido ool swa ma nindo okwalo piyo. Ameno to go tho.

Barak obino munyo riemo Sisera, aka Yael owok romo gi go, to waco ni, “Biye, alanyuthin jacwo m'irango.” Munyo Barak obino bonge, neni Sisera oyido oriere piny i lowo m'otho gi luth ma wema i wic mere.
I ndelo no Rwoth okengila Yabin kere ma Kanan ruwaŋ Joisiraili.
Cingi Joisiraili olokere matek swa kwoŋ kere Yabin ma Kanan cuka joreyo woko go.
Debora kodi Barak jowero i ndelo no ka jowaco:
K'ogony jotel i Isiraili,
ji wegi jomiyere
pako Rwoth.
Winji win, awi kerin, ciki ithi win, awi jodhum,
An, alawero ri Rwoth,
alawero pak ri Rwoth Were pa Isiraili.
Awi Rwoth, munyo iwok i Edom,
munyo iŋanjo wok i thim ma Edom,
piny oyengere,
polo kodi pondeponde jocwero pi.
got Sinai me wok ruwaŋ Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili.
I ndir pa Samigar, wod pa Anath,
i ndir pa Yael, royin jocegere,
aka jowoth jotho i royo m'oban.
Ji ma calin jorumo i Isiraili,
jorumo, cuka an, Debora,
ay paka min jo i Isiraili.
Munyo oyer werin manyen,
to lweny obedo i waŋkace,
onen kwot kodi abor,
i dier gana piero aŋwen i Isiraili?
Anitie gi cunyan ri jomituka ma Isiraili,
ma jomiyere i dier ji,
pako Rwoth.
Luw win kwoŋe, win ma wigweyo punde madhako ma lando,
win ma wibedo i law aka wiwotho i royo.
Wok i lokoro pa joma jopoko gim'onyaga i ka twomo pi,
kenyo joluwo kwoŋ tim pa Rwoth m'otire,
tim m'otire pa ji pere ma jobedo i calin i Isiraili.
Kenyo ji pa Rwoth jokadho piny i waŋkace.
Ay, ay Debora,
ay, ay, ituci wer,
Ay, ay, Barak,
itel jojiera perin, awi wod pa Abinowam.
Kenyo go omiyo go m'odoŋ thumo jotel pa ji
Rwoth omiyan dhumo jomeni.
Wok i Efrayim, fuc pajo i Amalek,
rumacen perin, Benyamin, i dier ji perin,
wok i Makir jomituka joŋanjo piny,
wok i Zebulun jono ma jotiŋo luth ma dhum.
Jodhum ma Isakar jobino gi Debora,
kiri Isakar, kodi Barak,
oriy go kadho i milelo atiendi.
I dier tiakirok ma nono pa Benyamin,
oyido nitie paro kweth m'opokere.
Raŋo ibedo i dier sidwol,
winjo mwoŋo pa mwendi?
I dier nonin pa Ruben
oyido nitie paro kweth m'opokere.
Giliad obedo i thenge ca ma Yordan,
kodi Dan, raŋo go odoŋ i mele?
Aser obedo i thengi nam,
jobedo i kapie pere.
Zebulun jobedo ji ma jojala kwo pajo ri tho,
Nafital bende kam'oŋawere ma sa.
Kerin jobino, jolwenyo,
kenyo kerin ma Kanan jolwenyo,
i Tanak i thengi pi ma Megido,
to jok'otero feza.
Micalin jolwenyo wok i polo,
wok i yo pajo jolwenyo gi Sisera.
Malawa Kison oyweyo woko jo,
malawa macene no, malawa Kison.
Woth i meni awi adundo paran.
Kenyo kayinin jogoyo mayindo,
jonyono piny gi tiendi gin.
Kwoŋ Meroz, malaika pa Rwoth waco,
kwoŋ ji ma jobedo i go,
kwoŋbedo jok'okonyo Rwoth,
konyo Rwoth kwoŋ jomeni.
Yael cipa Heber Jakena,
labedo jasilwany loyo mondongo,
labedo jasilwany loyo mondongo ma jonitie i wema.
Sisera okwayo pi, to go miyo cak,
go okelo rigo mo iy'acero ma welo.
Go okwanyo luth wema gi cinge,
aka cinge maracuc okwanyo nyundu pa jatic,
ogoyo gine Sisera to baro wiye,
ocwowo to ŋinyo wiye.
Sisera okule i ŋangi go,
opodho piny i tiendi go,
aka kama go okule iye no,
oriere piny m'otho.
Min Sisera oleŋo waŋe gi dirisa,
aka oywaki yuŋeye ka penjo;
Raŋo cawila pere kibin?
Raŋo mayindo ma tiendi cawila pere ogalo?
Mondongo pere ma joriek jodwoko go,
adieri, go won dwoko penji pere.
Kere jokinwaŋ kodi poko gim'onyaga?
Nyako kosa nyir ario ri kisi jasirikale,
nangin m'owir gi rangi ri Sisera,
nangin m'okwoy m'owir gi rangi ma ŋuti jo.
Ameno weyi jokwor perin je joworere, awi Rwoth,
to weyi jono ma jomaro go jowocale paka waŋceŋ ka wok i meni mere.
Aka piny opie ma oro piero aŋwen.
Joisiraili jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, to Rwoth miyo jo i cingi Jomidian ma oro abirio.
Cingi Jomidian obedo matek kwoŋ Joisiraili, aka kwoŋbedo Jomidian, Joisiraili jotimo buce i gote, ŋungin, kodi kapondo.
Ameno bin ka Isiraili jocwoyo kodhi, Jomidian kodi Joamalek, kodi nyithindho ma yuwok ceŋ, jobino malo monjo jo.
Jogeto kambi to joreyo woko ranyak ma lowo, tundo kiri Gaza, aka ongoye gima jowey makwo ri Joisiraili, kada rombo, dhok kosa punde.
Jo kiri g'ogwaŋe pajo oyido jobino malo, aka oyido jokelo wemin pajo, m'opoto paka bonyo, ma jo kosa ŋamin pajo oyido kikwanere; ameno jobino to josika woko lowo.
Ameno Joisiraili candi omako jo kwoŋbedo Jomidian, to joywak ri Rwoth.
Munyo Joisiraili joywak ri Rwoth ro Jomidian,
Rwoth ooro jatuci wac Were bongi Joisiraili waco rijo ni, “Rwoth Were pa Isiraili waco, awodho win wok i piny Misir, wok i ot ma twec.
Abotho win wok cingi Jomisir kodi wok i cingi jono je ma jodiyo win, ariemo woko jo ruwaŋ win, aka amiyo win lowo pajo.
Awaco riwin ni An abedo Rwoth Were mewin; wikiri wilwor werin pa Joamor, ma wibedo i lowo pajo. To wikwero winjan.”
Onyo malaika pa Rwoth obino to bedo i tiendi olwa i Ofira m'oyido obedo apa Yowas, janono pa Abieza, kareno Gideon wode oyido goyo ŋano i kisia, jowokan kwoŋ Jomidian.
Malaika pa Rwoth onenere ri Gideon to waco rigo ni, “Rwoth obedi kodin, in jacwo matek aka jamisen.”

Gideon odwoko go ni, “Awi Rwoth paran, k'inen Rwoth nitie gi wan, raŋo gime je opodho kwoŋ wan? Nikune tim pere ma gir'aura je ma kwarere mawan jowaco riwan, ka joluwo nike Rwoth owodho jo wok i Misir? T'onyo pama Rwoth ojwango wan, aka omiyo wan i cingi Jomidian.”
Rwoth owire to waco rigo ni, “Kadhi i meni perin me aka ibothi Joisiraili wok i cingi Jomidian. Aorin.”
Gideon odwoko ni, “Awi Rwoth paran, anobothi nedi Joisiraili? Neni, peco pa baba jacandi i nono pa Manase, aka an, asisiri i ot pa baba.”
Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Alabedo kodin, aka ilaredho piny Jomidian paka jacwo acel.”
Gideon odwoko ni, “K'inen atieko nwaŋo wor ruwaŋin, miyan ranyuth ma ridho nike iluwo kodan.
Ikir'ingoye i kabedo me cuka akelo rin mic paran t'aketho ruwaŋin.”
Go odwoko ni, “Aladoŋ ka cuka inodwoki.”
Ameno Gideon okadho to tedo nyathi diel, kodi mugat ma buthow wok i kutiya moko. Go oketho riŋo iy'adita, okonjo kado mere i dak, to kelo ri malaika pa Rwoth i tiendi olwa to miyo go.
Malaika pa Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Kwany riŋo kodi mugat ma buthow ikethi i tele me, aka ikonji kado woko mere.” Aka go otimo ameno.
Malaika pa Rwoth ogeyo riŋo kodi mugat ma buthow gi luth m'oyido nitie i cinge, aka mac owok i tele to waŋo woko riŋo kodi mugat. Kenyo malaika pa Rwoth orwenyo woko ruwaŋ Gideon.
Gideon oniaŋ nike oyido obedo malaika pa Rwoth to waco ni, “Awi Rwoth Were! Kole atieko neno malaika pa Rwoth awaŋ g'awaŋ.”
Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Siem wobedi kodin. Ikir'ibwoki, ikilatho.”
Gideon ogeto migam ri Rwoth, aka olwoŋo ni, Rwoth obedo siem. Tundo kiri konon fodi ocungo i Ofira pa jonono pa Abieza.
Wor no Rwoth owaco ri Gideon ni, “Kwany rwath pa benin, kodi rwath mar'ario ma jaoro abirio, aka iyway piny migam ma benin ogeto ri Bal t'itoŋo piny siro pa were madhako Asera manitie kabute.
Igeti migam ri Rwoth Were perin i wi tele me, i nger m'otire; ikwany rwath mar'ario t'imiyo cowirok awaŋa gi yen ma siro pa were madhako Asera m'ilatoŋo woko.”
Gideon okwanyo ŋecin pere apar, to timo paka Rwoth owaco rigo. Aka paka go oyido lworo peco pa bamere kodi cwo ma tindi madwoŋ, go otimo wor makiweno odieceŋ.
Munyo ji ma tindi madwoŋ jocewi odikin, neni, migam pa Bal oyido otur piny, aka siro pa were madhako Asera m'oyido nitie kabute otoŋ piny, aka rwath mar'ario oyido iwaŋo i wi migam m'ogeti.
Jopenjere i dier jo ni, “Ŋa m'otimo gime?” Munyo jotieko penjo gi rango tiende jonwaŋo nike oyido obedo Gideon wod pa Yowas.
Cwo ma tindi madwoŋ jowaco ri Yowas ni, “Wodhi wodin, ŋey wotho. Go otieko turo piny migam pa Bal to toŋo piny siro pa were madhako Asera m'oyido nitie kabute.”
To Yowas owaco ri ji je m'oyido jogaŋere kwoŋe ni, “Wilakiosa ri Bal? Kosa wilacwako go? Ŋata piemo rigo je ilaneko g'odikin. Ka go obedo were, weyi go won woosa banja pere kwoŋbedo otur migam pere.”
I ndelo no Yowas olwoŋo Gideon ni Yerubal, ka waco ni, “Weyi Bal won woosa kwoŋbedo otur piny migam pere.”
Jomidian je, Joamalek kodi ji ma yuwok ceŋ jocokere kanyacel, joŋado malawa Yordan to joketho kambi i milelo ma Yezirel.
Cuny pa Rwoth opie kwoŋ Gideon, aka go okudho gwara, to nono pa Abieza je joluwo go.
Go ooro jomikwenda i Manase gibe, ma bende joriwere luwo go, to go oro jomikwenda tundo kiri Aser, Zebulun, kodi Nafital, to jobino malo romo jo.
Gideon owaco ri Were ni, “K'inen ilabotho Isiraili luwo i cingan paka iwaco,
panen, ee aketho yer rombo piny i kisia. Ka thoyo obedi yer rombo kende, aka piny je othwo, kenyo alaŋeyo nike ilabotho Isiraili luwo i cingan, paka itieko waco.”
Aka obedo ameno. Kole munyo Gideon ocew yawere, obiyo thoyo wok i yer rombo to poŋo pi iy'acero.
Gideon owaco ri Were ni, “Ikir'imaki nge kodan, aka alaluwo dicel me kende; mondo weyi akidhi rume kende gi yer rombo. Rume weyi wobedi m'othwo, aka weyi thoyo wobedi piny.”
Were otimo ameno wor no, kole yer rombo oyido othwo, aka thoyo obedo piny.
Yerubal (meno Gideon) kodi ji m'oyido jonitie gi go joay con to joketho kambi i thengi waŋ pi ma Harod. Kambi pa Jomidian oyido nitie yumalo pajo, gi tendere ma More, i milelo.
Rwoth owaco ri Gideon ni, “Ji ma jonitie kodin jothoth swa ran miyo Jomidian i cingi jo. Joisiraili jonyalo pakirok ka jowaco nike cingi jo am'obotho jo.
Onyo riameno tuci i ithi ji k'iwaco ni, ‘Ŋata nitie gi bwok aka jalworo, weyi go wodoki, aka wokadhi con wok i got Giliad.’ ” Aka ji 22,000 jodok, to doŋ ji 10,000.

Rwoth owaco ri Gideon kendo ni, “Ji fodi jothoth swa. Keli jo piny i pi aka alapoko jo rin kenyo. Ŋat'anowaci rin nike lakadho kodin ama lakadho kodin, to ŋat'anowaci rin nike kilakadho kodin, wokiri wokadhi.”
Ameno Gideon okelo ji piny i pi. Rwoth owaco ri Gideon ni, “Ŋat'omadhi pi gi lewe paka gwok, ikethi go gicen kwoŋ ŋat'ogur conge piny madho pi.”
Jono ma jotwomo pi i cingi jo to jomadho gi lew jo paka gwok obedo cwo 300; to joman je joguro congi jo piny madho pi.
Rwoth owaco ri Gideon ni, “Gi cwo 300 ma jomadho pi paka gwok alabotho win; alamiyo Jomidian i cingin. Weyi joman je jodok i kabedo pajo.”
Ameno Gideon okwanyo agwatin kodi gwarin pajo i cingi jo, to oro Joisiraili ma jodoŋ je i wemin pajo, to go doŋ gi cwo 300. Kambi pa Jomidian oyido nitie piny pere i milelo.
Wor no won Rwoth owaco ri Gideon ni, “Ay malo, kadhi piny i kambi pa Jomidian; kole atieko miyo i cingin.
To k'inen ilworo kadho piny i kambi, kadhi gi ŋeca perin Pura.
Iwinji gima jowaco, aka rumacen cingin labedo matek kadho piny monjo kambi.” Kenyo Gideon okadho piny gi ŋeca pere Pura i thengi cwo ma jotiŋo gilweny i kambi.
Jomidian kodi Joamalek kodi ji ma yuwok ceŋ jobedo i milelo m'opoto paka bonyo. Ŋamin pajo oyido kikwanere paka kwoyo ma thengi nam.
Munyo Gideon jobino i kambi, panen, oyido nitie jacwo ma waco ri nyawote lek. Jacwo no owaco ni, “Aleko ni mugat ma bale oloro i kambi pa Jomidian, obino i wema to turo piny, aka wema oriewere piny.”
Nyawote odwoko ni, “Me k'obedo giman kwanyowoko abor pa Gideon wod pa Yowas, jacwo pa Isiraili. Were otieko miyo Jomidian kodi jolweny je i cinge.”
Munyo Gideon owinjo lek wacere kodi dwoŋ mere, go olamo Rwoth. Gideon ogik i kambi pa Joisiraili to waco rijo ni, “Ay win, kole Rwoth otieko miyo jolweny pa Jomidian i cingi win.”
Gideon opoko cwo 300 no i kitipin adek, aka oketho i cingi joje agwatin ma ninono manitie tala iye.
Gideon owaco rijo ni, “Ŋiyan win, aka witim paka atimo. Neni, k'abino i thengi kambi, tim win gim'anotim.
Ka akudho gwara, an kodi jono je ma jonitie bongan, kudhi win bende gwarin i thenge je ma kambi, aka wikoki ni, ‘Ri Rwoth kodi ri Gideon.’ ”
Ameno Gideon kodi cwo m'oyido jonitie bonge jobino i thengi kambi i cakirok ma kur ma dier wor, munyo nyaka jokur jocako kuro; jokudho gwarin to joturo agwatin m'oyido jotiŋo i cingi jo.

Ameno kitipin adek je jokudho gwarin, to joturo agwatin m'oyido jotiŋo i cingi jo. Jotiŋo tala i cingi jo maracam, aka i cingi jo maracuc gwarin ma jokudho; to joywak ni, “Abor ri Rwoth kodi ri Gideon.”
Kisi jacwo ocungo i kabedo pere thoko kambi pa Jomidian, aka jolweny pa Jomidian je joringo; joywak to joringo woko.
Munyo jokudho gwarin 300 je, Ruth omiyo kisi jalweny pa Jomidian monjo nyawote g'abor pere; aka joringo bor kiri Bethsita yu Zerera, bor kiri i kew gi Abelmehola yu Tabath.
Olwoŋi cwo ma Isiraili wok i nono pa Nafital kodi wok i nono pa Aser kodi Manase je, to joriemo Jomidian.

Gideon ooro jomikwenda i piny matendere je ma Efrayim ka waco ni, “Lori win wilweny gi Jomidian, wimaki kwoŋ jo pi tundo kiri Bethbara, kodi Yordan bende.” Ameno olwoŋi cwo je ma Efrayim to jomako pi bor kiri Bethbara kodi Yordan bende.
Jomako jotel pa jolweny ma Midian ario, Oreb kodi Zebi. Joneko Oreb i tele Oreb, to joneko Zebi i kadhiŋo vini ma Zebi, munyo joriemo Jomidian. Jokelo wic Oreb kodi wic Zebi ri Gideon kalo Yordan.
Cwo ma Efrayim jowaco ri Gideon ni, “Me aŋo m'itimo riwan, ma ikilwoŋo wan munyo ikadho lweny gi Jomidian?” Jodhaw gi go gi gero.
Gideon odwoko jo ni, “Onyo aŋo m'atieko timo paka win? Fono nyingi vini ma Efrayim kiber loyo ma Abieza?
Were otieko miyo i cingi win jotel jolweny ario ma Midian, Oreb kodi Zebi; onyo aŋo manyalo timo ma pimere gi win?” Kenyo nge pajo kwoŋ go ojukere munyo go owaco gime.
Gideon obino Yordan to ŋado, aka go kodi cwo 300 m'oyido jonitie bonge oyido jool kareno joriemo Jomidian.
Go owaco ri ji ma Sukoth ni, “Mondo miy win ji ma joluwan mugat; kole jool aka ariemo Zeba kodi Zalmuna kerin pa Jomidian.”
To jodhum ma Sukoth jodwoko ni, “Itieko mako Zeba kodi Zalmuna i cingin ma nyo ripo wamiy jolweny perin mugat?”
Gideon owaco ni, “Meno ber, ka Rwoth otieko miyo Zeba kodi Zalmuna i cingan, alanyono delkwoŋ win i kudhin kodi okure ma thim.”
Wok kenyo Gideon okadho malo i Penuel to miyo jo kwac acel no. To cwo ma Penuel jodwoko go i nger acel paka cwo ma Sukoth.
Gideon owaco ri cwo ma Penuel ni, “K'anodwoki i siem, alaturo piny acurcur me.”
Onyo Zeba kodi Zalmuna oyido jonitie i Karkor gi jolweny pajo, ma romo cwo 15,000 m'oyido jodoŋ joje jolweny pa ji ma yuwok ceŋ. Kole cwo 120,000 ma jolweny oyido jotho.
Gideon okadho malo gi royo ma thengi thim yuwok ceŋ ma Noba kodi Jogbeha, aka omonjo jolweny abwap.
Zeba kodi Zalmuna joringo, to Gideon oriemo jo aka omako jo to miyo jolweny pa Jomidian kirin.
Gideon odwoko wok i lweny gi royo ma Heres.
Go omako jayac, acel kwoŋ ji ma Sukoth to penjo penji, aka jayac no ondiki rigo nyingi jodhum kodi jotel ma Sukoth, cwo piero abirio g'abirio.
Gideon obino bongi cwo ma Sukoth to waco rijo ni, “Panen, ee Zeba kodi Zalmuna, ma wiŋalan gi jo ka wiwaco ni, ‘Itieko mako Zeba kodi Zalmuna i cingin, ma wanomiy jolweny perin ma jool mugat?’ ”
Gideon okwanyo jodongo ma tindi madwoŋ to kwanyo kudhin ma thim kodi okure to nyono gine ji ma Sukoth.
Go bende oturo piny acurcur ma Penuel, to neko cwo ma tindi madwoŋ.
Gideon openjo Zeba kodi Zalmuna ni, “Nger cwo aŋo ma wineko i Tabor?”
Jodwoko ni, “Cwo ma jocalin, joje oyido jocale wot kere.”
Gideon owaco rijo ni, “Jo oyido jobedo wutmin an, wot mama; paka Rwoth kwo, kabedi oyido wiwey jowokwo, dinyo akineko win.”
Gideon owaco ri okayo pere ni, “Ay ineki jo.” To jayac no obwok, kwoŋbedo go oyido fodi soye.
Kenyo Zeba kodi Zalmuna jowaco ni, “In won ay ineki wan; kole paka jacwo nitie, apaka meni pere bende.” Ameno Gideon oay to neko Zeba kodi Zalmuna, to kwanyo thiwino m'oyido nitie i ŋuti ŋamin pajo.
Joisiraili jowaco ri Gideon ni, “Dhum wan, in, wodin, kodi wod wodin bende; kole itieko botho wan wok i cingi Jomidian.”
Gideon odwoko jo ni, “An akiladhumo win, aka wodan kiladhumo win; Rwoth ama ladhumo win.”
Gideon omedo waco rijo ni, “Weyi atim kwac paran riwin, kisi dhano womiyan milom pere m'okwanyo.” Kole oyido jonitie gi milomin ma zahabu, kwoŋbedo oyido jobedo jonono pa Isimayil.
Ji jodwoko ni, “Walamiyin adieri.” Ameno jopedho law, aka kisi dhano obol'iye milom pere m'okwanyo.
Peko ma milomin ma zahabu ma Gideon okwanyo oromo kilo piero ario medo wi thiwino ma zahabu kodi law manyarangi ariŋo m'oyido kerin ma Midian joruko kodi thiwino m'oyido nitie i ŋuti ŋamin pajo.
Gideon otimo cal gi zahabu no aka oketho i tindi pere, i Ofira; aka Joisiraili je jotimere paka malayin gine, to lokere ri Gideon kodi peco pere bwo.
Ameno Joisiraili jokengila Jomidian, aka jok'otiŋo wiy gin malo kendo. Lowo obedo m'okwe ma oro piero aŋwen i hongo pa Gideon.
Gideon wod pa Yowas okadho to bedo i peco pere won.
Gideon oyido nitie gi wote piero abirio ma remo pere won, kwoŋbedo go oyido nitie gi mon kweth.
Dhako ma thenge pere m'oyido nitie i Sekem onywolo rigo wode, aka ocwoki nyinge ni Abimelek.
Gideon wod pa Yowas otho i oro maber ma tegino, aka oyiki go i kaliel pa Yowas, bamere, i Ofira pa jonono pa Abieza.
Munyo Gideon otieko tho, Joisiraili jogik kendo cako lamo Bal, to joketho Bal Berith were pajo.
Joisiraili jok'opoyo nike Rwoth Were pajo, m'oyido obotho jo wok i cingi jokwor pajo thoko jo.
Jok'onyutho kiri dwoŋ ri peco pa Gideon paka foc ri bero je ma go otimo ri Isiraili.
Abimelek wod pa Gideon okidho i Sekem pa ney go to waco rijo kodi jonono pa min je ni,
“Luw win i ithi ji ma Sekem je ni, ‘Aŋo maber riwin, nike wot Gideon piero abirio je jowodhum win, kosa nike acel ama wodhum win?’ Poyi win nike abedo coko mewin aka del mewin.”
Ameno jopa ney go joluwo wac me je i ithi cwo je ma Sekem; aka cuny jo omiyere luwo Abimelek. Kole jowaco ni, “Go obedo omin wan.”
Jomiyo Gideon nusu ma feza ma both romo kilo wok i ot pa Bal Berith, aka Gideon ooro ma kipangisa cwo ma bukony ma joworo luwo go.
Abimelek okadho peco pa bamere i Ofira, to neko wutmin go, wot pa Gideon piero abirio, i wi tele acel. To Yotham ocoko pa Gideon obothi, ato go opondo.
Kenyo jodhum je ma Sekem kodi ma Bethmilo je, jokadho to joketho Abimelek bedo kere, i thengi yath madwoŋ ma siro i Sekem.
Munyo owaci ri Yotham, go okidho to cungo wi got Gerizim. Aka oywaki malo to waco rijo ni, “Winjan win, win jodhum ma Sekem, ŋey Were wonyali winjo win.”
“Cango yen jowok wiro kere dhumo jo. Jowaco ri yath oliv ni, ‘Dhum wan.’
To yath oliv dwoko jo ni, ‘Anowey nywolo mo paran ma miyo werin kodi ji jolimo dwoŋ, t'akadho dhumo yen?’
Kenyo jowaco ri yath makuyu ni, ‘Biye idhumi wan.’
To makuyu dwoko jo ni, ‘Anowey nyak mito paran kodi olemo paran mamit, t'akadho dhumo yen?’
Kenyo yen jowaco ri yath vini ni, ‘Biye idhumi wan.’
To yath vini dwoko jo ni, ‘Anowey nywolo vini paran ma miyo werin kodi ji yodirok, t'akadho dhumo yen.’
Kenyo yen jowaco ri kudho ni, ‘Biye idhumi wan.’
To kudho dwoko jo ni, ‘K'inen wiwiran bedo kere adieri, biye wibwok i tipo paran, to k'inen be, weyi mac owok iy'okudho aka worey woko yen sida je ma Lebanon.’ ”
“Onyo riameno, k'inen witimo adieri kodi dwoŋ munyo wiketho Abimelek bedo kere, aka k'inen witiyo maber gi Gideon kodi peco pere, aka witimo rigo gima tim pere ripo gine,
kwoŋbedo baba olwenyo riwin, aka ojwango kwo pere to botho win wok i cingi Jomidian.
To wiay kwoŋ peco pa baba ndelo me, aka witieko neko wote, cwo piero abirio i wi tele acel, onyo wiketho Abimelek, wod ŋeca pere madhako, kere pa jodhum ma Sekem, kwoŋbedo go obedo okewo mewin.
K'inen onyo witimo g'atoŋa maber kodi dwoŋ ri Gideon kodi peco pere ndelo me, ere fore win i Abimelek, aka weyi go wofore i win.
To ka be, weyi mac owok kwoŋ Abimelek, aka orey woko jodhum ma Sekem kodi Bethmilo; aka weyi mac owok kwoŋ win, orey woko Abimelek.”
Kenyo Yotham oringo woko, to kadho i Ber, kama go obed'iye bor ruwaŋ Abimelek.
Abimelek odhumo Isiraili ma oro adek.
Rwoth odhiro cuny marac i dier Abimelek kodi jodhum ma Sekem; aka jodhum ma Sekem jotiyo akor gi Abimelek.
Gime otimere ŋey gwayo m'otimo ri wot Gideon piero abirio ocul kwor mere aka remo pajo wobedi i wi omin jo Abimelek, m'oneko jo, kodi jodhum ma Sekem, ma jomiyo cingi meni go neko wutmin go.
Jodhum ma Sekem jotega go wi gote. Jonyaga jono je ma joluwo i royo no; aka oosa ri Abimelek.
Gal wod pa Ebed obino i Sekem gi wutmin, aka jodhum ma Sekem jogeno go.
Jokadho i ndelin pajo, aka jofono nyingi vini i ndelo vini pajo, jodhiŋo to jocamo kalima. Kenyo jodonjo i ot were pajo, jocemo, jomedho, to jokwoŋo Abimelek

Gal wod pa Ebed openjo ni, “Abimelek obedo ŋa, aka wan Josekem wabedo jokune ma waripo tiyo rigo? Kere cango wod pa Gideon kodi Zebul jatel jolweny pere k'otiyo ri cwo ma Hamor ba Sekem? Raŋo nyo waripo tiyo rigo?
Kabedi oyido ji me jonitie i cingan, dinyo akwanyo woko Abimelek; dinyo awaco rigo ni, ‘Medi jolweny perin, aka wok woko.’ ”
Munyo Zebul owinjo jadhum ma tindi madwoŋ owinjo wac pa Gal wod pa Ebed, nge pere oliel.
Go odhiro jomikwenda bongi Abimelek i Aruma ka waco ni, “Neni, Gal wod pa Ebed kodi wutmin jobino i Sekem, aka jogeŋin kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ.
Onyo riameno, kadhi wor, in kodi ji ma jonitie bongin, aka ikuri i sa.
Kenyo odikin, tekin waŋceŋ gulo, ay iredi i tindi madwoŋ; aka ka go kodi cwo ma jonitie gi go joay kwoŋin, inyalo timo rijo paka cingin mito.”
Abimelek kodi ji m'oyido jonitie bonge joay wor aka jobino to jokure Sekem i kitipin aŋwen.
Munyo Gal wod pa Ebed owok to cungo i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ, Abimelek kodi jolweny m'oyido jonitie bonge joay wok i dudi.
Munyo Gal oneno jo, owaco ri Zebul ni, “Neni, ji joloro bino piny wok wi got!”
Zebul odwoko ni, “Ineno tipo ma wi got paka ji.”
Gal oluwo kendo to waco ni, “Neni, ji joloro piny wok cegin gi dier piny, aka kitipa man bino wok i royo mar'ajwoka pa jamiliel.”
Zebul owaco rigo ni, “Nikune dhokin pama, in m'ipenjo ni, ‘Abimelek obedo ŋa, ma waripo tiyo rigo?’ Me ki jolweny m'icayo? Wok pama aka ilweny gi jo.”
Gal owok to telo jodhum ma Sekem, aka jolwenyo gi Abimelek.
Abimelek oriemo Gal m'oringo, aka kweth jopodho piny ma jolimo litho kiri ruwaŋ waŋkac.
Ameno Abimelek obedo i Aruma, aka Zebul oriemo woko Gal kodi wutmin; ŋey jokiri jowobedi i Sekem.
Ndelo ma yawere ji jowok kadho i ndelin pajo. Munyo owaci ri Abimelek,
go otero jolweny pere to poko jo i kitipin adek, aka jokuro i ndelin. Munyo Abimelek oŋiyo to neno ji jowok i tindi madwoŋ, go oay kwoŋ jo to neko jo.
Abimelek kodi kitipa m'oyido nitie bonge joredo to jocungo ruwaŋ waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ, aka kitipin ario joredo to joneko woko ji je m'oyido jonitie i ndelin.
Abimelek olwenyo kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ ndelo gipi, omako tindi madwoŋ, oneko ji m'oyido jobed'iye; aka oturo piny to cwoyo gi cumbi.
Jodhum mar'acurcur ma Sekem jowinjo, aka jodonjo i kapondo ma ot were ma Elberith.
Kenyo owaci ri Abimelek nike jodhum mar'acurcur ma Sekem oyido jocokere kanyacel.

Abimelek okadho malo wi got Zalmon, go kodi ji je m'oyido jonitie bonge. Abimelek okwanyo le i cinge, aka otoŋo jangi yen to liero i goke. Kenyo go owaco ri ji m'oyido jonitie bonge ni, “Gima wineno atimo, kwaki win timo paka an.”

Ameno kisi dhano m'oyido nitie bonge otoŋo jangi yath to liero i goke to joluwo Abimelek. Joketho i kapondo to jocwinyo mac kwoŋe, ŋey ji je m'oyido jopondo iy'acurcur ma Sekem jotho bende. Ji ma romo mondongo kodi cwo gana.
Abimelek okadho Thebez, othoko, aka omako.
To oyido nitie acurcur matek i tindi madwoŋ, aka ji je ma tindi madwoŋ joring'iye, cwo kodi mondongo kodi jodhum ma tindi madwoŋ joring'iye to jocegere; aka joidho malo i wiye.
Abimelek obino iy'acurcur aka olwenyo kwoŋe, ocore cegin gi thigo mar'acurcur waŋo gi mac.
To dhako moro obolo tele wok malo i wic Abimelek, aka oŋinyo woko pado wiye.
Abimelek olwoŋo piyo jayac ma tiŋo gilweny pere, aka owaco rigo ni, “Cel abor perin inekan, ŋey okir owaci nike dhako am'onekan.” Ameno jayac no ocwowo go to tho.
Munyo Joisiraili joneno nike Abimelek otieko tho, jodok pecin pajo.
Ameno Were oculo Abimelek ri kidakana pere m'otimo ri bamere gi oneko wutmin go piero abirio.
Were bende omiyo kidakana pa cwo ma Sekem podho i wi gin, kodi kwoŋ ma Yotham wod pa Gideon olwoŋo kwoŋ jo.
Rumacen pa Abimelek, Tola wod pa Puwa, aka nyakwar Dodo, janono pa Isakar oay thielo Isiraili. Go oyido bedo i Samir i piny matendere Efrayim.
Go obedo jathum banja i Isiraili ma oro piero ario g'adek. Kenyo go otho aka oyiki go i Samir.
Rumacen pa Tola, Yayir ma wok i Giliad obedo jathum banja i Isiraili ma oro piero ario g'ario.
Yayir oyido nitie gi wote piero adek m'oyido jogweyo punde ma mon, wote oyido jonitie gi tindin madongo piero adek, m'ilwoŋo ni Havoth Yayir kiri konon, aka jonitie i lowo ma Giliad.
Yayir otho, aka oyiki go i Kamon.

Joisiraili kendo jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka jolamo Bal kodi Asitate were madhako, werin pa Josiria, werin pa Josidon, werin pa Jomowab, werin pa Joamon, kodi werin pa Jofilistia. Jojwango Rwoth, aka jok'olamo go.
Nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ Joisiraili, aka ojwango jo i cingi Jofilistia kodi Joamon.
I oro no joŋidho to jodiyo Joisiraili. Ma oro apar g'aboro jodiyo Joisiraili je m'oyido jonitie kalo malawa Yordan i lowo pa Joamor, manitie i Giliad.
Joamon joŋado Yordan lweny gi nono pa Yuda, nono pa Benyamin kodi nono pa Efrayim; ma Joisiraili jobedo i litho madwoŋ swa.
Joisiraili joywak ri Rwoth ka jowaco ni, “Watieko timo reco kwoŋin, kwoŋbedo wajwango Were mawan to walamo Bal.”
Rwoth owaco ri Joisiraili ni, “Akibotho win kwoŋ Jomisir, Joamor, Joamon, kodi Jofilistia?
Josidon bende jok'odiyo win, to wiywak ran, aka abotho win wok i cingi jo.
Kucel witieko jwangan aka wilamo werin man; riameno akilamedo botho win.
Kadhi wiywak win ri werin ma witieko yero; weyi jowobothi win wok i litho mewin.”
Joisiraili jowaco ri Rwoth ni, “Watieko timo reco; tim riwan gimaber rin je, to mondo both wan ndelo me!”
Ameno jokwanyo woko werin makicar je m'oyido nitie i dier jo, aka jolamo Rwoth. Kenyo Rwoth k'onyalo ciro neno Isiraili ka candere.
Kenyo olwoŋi Joamon lweny, aka joketho kambi i Giliad, aka Joisiraili jocokere kanyacel to joketho kambi i Mizipa.
Jomituka pa ji ma Giliad jopenjo ni, “Ŋa ma lacako lweny kwoŋ Joamon? Ŋat'otim bino bedo jatel pa ji je ma jobedo i Giliad.”
Onyo Yefitha Jagiliad oyido obedo wod malaya, aka jalweny ma jameni. Giliad oyido obedo bamere.
Cipa Giliad onywolo rigo wote ario, aka munyo wote no jodongo, joriemo woko Yefitha, ka jowaco rigo ni, “Ikilalunjo gimoro je i ot pa bawan, kole ibedo wod dhako man.”
Yefitha oringo kwoŋ wutmin aka obedo i lowo ma Tob; aka koro cwo ma bukony jocokere thoko Yefitha to jowotho gi go.
Rumacen ma hongo moro Joamon jotugila lweny kwoŋ Joisiraili.
Munyo Joamon jocako lweny gi Joisiraili, jodongo ma Giliad jokadho omo Yefitha wok i Tob.
Jowaco ri Yefitha ni, “Biye bedi jamituka mawan, ŋey walweny gi Joamon.”
Yefitha odwoko jodongo ma Giliad ni, “Cango wikidakan to wirieman wok i ot pa baba? Raŋo onyo wibino bongan pama munyo winitie i teko?”
Jodongo ma Giliad jowaco ri Yefitha ni, “Riameno wawire bongin, ŋey inyal kadho gi wan lweny gi Joamon. Ilabedo jatel mawan kwoŋ ji je ma jobedo i Giliad.”
Yefitha owaco ri jodongo ma Giliad ni, “Ka wikelan peco lweny gi Joamon, aka Rwoth omiy jo i cingan, alabedo jatel mewin.”
Jodongo ma Giliad jodwoko Yefitha ni, “Rwoth labedo jakony i dier wan, walatimo adieri paka iwaco.”
Kenyo Yefitha okadho gi jodongo ma Giliad, aka ji joketho go bedo jatel pajo kodi jamituka pajo. Yefitha oluwo wac pere je ruwaŋ Rwoth i Mizipa.
Yefitha ooro jomikwenda bongi kere pa Joamon penjo ka waco ni, “Aŋo manitie i dier an kodin, m'ibino bongan lweny i lowo paran?”
Kere pa Joamon odwoko jomikwenda pa Yefitha ni, “Kwoŋbedo Joisiraili jomayan lowo paran, munyo wok i piny Misir, cako i Arinon tundo i Yabok kiri Yordan; onyo riameno, dwoki i siem.”
Yefitha kendo ooro jomikwenda bongi kere pa Joamon.
Go owaco ni, “Yefitha waco, Joisiraili jok'okwanyo lowo pa Jomowab kosa lowo pa Joamon.
To munyo Joisiraili jowok i Misir joluwo i thim tundo kiri i Nam M'obokere, aka jobino i Kades.

Joisiraili jooro jomikwenda bongi kere ma Edom ka jowaco ni, ‘Weyi waluw i lowo perin.’ To kere ma Edom k'onyalo winjo. Jooro bende bongi kere ma Mowab, to go bende kwero yeyo. Ameno Joisiraili jodoŋ i Kades.
Joluwo i thim, aka jothoko lowo ma Edom kodi lowo ma Mowab, jotundo yuwok ceŋ ma Mowab, aka joketho kambi i thenge ca ma Arinon; to jok'obino i kew gi Mowab, kole Arinon am'oyido obedo kew gi Mowab.
Joisiraili jooro jomikwenda bongi Sihon kere pa Joamor, kere ma Hesibon ni, ‘Weyi waluw i lowo perin tundo i kabedo mawan.’
