To Sihon k'onyalo geno Isiraili luwo iy'adec pere; ameno Sihon ocoko ji pere kanyacel to joketho kambi i Yahaz lweny gi Isiraili.
Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili omiyo Sihon kodi ji pere je i cingi Isiraili, aka jokengila jo. Ameno Isiraili olunjo lowo je pa Joamor, m'oyido jobedo i piny no.
Jolunjo adec je pa Joamor, wok i Arinon tundo i Yabok kodi wok i thim tundo i Yordan.
Aka onyo, Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, otieko kikengila Joamor ruwaŋ ji pere Isiraili, in onyo ilariemo woko jo?
Wikilalunjo gima were mewin Kemos miyo win lunjo? Kisi ŋata Rwoth, Were mawan oriem ruwaŋ wan, meno walalunjo.
Onyo in iber loyo Balak wod pa Zipor ma Mowab? Go otemo ye kwinyo Isiraili kosa lweny gi jo?
K'inen Isiraili obedo i Hesibon kodi calin mere, Arower kodi calin mere, kodi i tindin madongo je m'oyido nitie thengi malawa Arinon ma oro 300; raŋo wikiomo i hongo no?
An aŋat'akitimo reco kwoŋin, to in iŋat'itimo ran raco gi lwenyo kwoŋan. Weyi Rwoth, jathum banja, wothum banja ndelo me i dier Joisiraili kodi Joamon.”
To kere pa Joamon k'owinjo mikwenda pa Yefitha m'odhiro rigo.
Kenyo cuny pa Rwoth opie kwoŋ Yefitha, aka go oluwo i Giliad kodi Manase, omedere kiri Mizipa i Giliad, aka wok i Mizipa okadho kiri bongi Joamon.
Yefitha otimo cikirok ri Rwoth, ka waco ni, “K'adieri inomiy Joamon i cingan,
ŋat'owok i dhiot ma ot paran romo kodan, k'adwoko wok i lweny gi Joamon, alamiyo go paka cowirok awaŋa rin.”
Yefitha oŋado lweny gi Joamon, aka Rwoth omiyo Joamon i cingi go.
Yefitha oneko jo wok i Arower kiri i ger gi Minith, tindin madongo piero ario, bor kiri Abel Keramim. Ameno okengila Joamon ruwaŋ Joisiraili.
Yefitha odwoko peco i Mizipa wok i lweny, aka panen, nyare owok romo gi go gi sasi gi miel. Go oyido obedo nyathi pere kende. Yefitha oyido ongoye gi wode kosa nyare man.
Munyo Yefitha oneno nyare, Yefitha oyeco woko nangin pere to waco ni, “Awi, nyaran! Idwokan piny adieri; itieko lokirok ran teko madwoŋ. Kole atieko yawo dhokan ri Rwoth, aka akinyali umo kendo.”
Nyare odwoko go ni, “Baba, itieko yawo dhokin ri Rwoth, tim ran paka dhokin owaco, paka nyo Rwoth otieko miyin loyo kwoŋ jokwor perin, Joamon.”
Go owaco ri bamere ni, “Weyi otim ran gime. Weyi akadhi ma dwe ario abedi i kumo ri bedo nyako paran mambula wi gote, an kodi merin paran.”
Yefitha odwoko ni, “Kadhi.” Kenyo Yefitha oweyo go kadho ma dwe ario, go kodi merin pere, aka oywaki kwoŋbedo nyako pere mambula wi gote.
I gike ma dwe ario, go odwoko bongi bamere, m'otimo gi go paka go ociko. Go oyido fodi k'onindo gi jacwo. Ameno thenethene otwi i Isiraili nike
ma ndelo aŋwen kisi oro nyir ma Isiraili jokadho to joywak ma poyo nyar Yefitha ma Giliad.
Cwo ma Efrayim jocokere kanyacel to joŋado kadho yumalo, aka jopenjo Yefitha ni, “Raŋo iŋado kadho i lweny gi Joamon, aka ikilwoŋo wan kadho kodin? Walawaŋo ot perin gi mac i wiyin.”
Yefitha odwoko jo ni, “An kodi ji paran wabedo gi dhaw madwoŋ gi Joamon; aka alwoŋo win, to wikibino bothan wok i cingi jo.
Munyo aneno nike wikinyalo bothan, aketho kwo paran i cingan, aka aŋado lweny gi Joamon; to Rwoth miyo jo i cingan. Raŋo nyo wibino ndelo me lweny kodan?”
Yefitha ocoko cwo je ma Giliad aka jolweny gi Joefrayim. Cwo ma Giliad joneko Joefrayim, kwoŋbedo jowaco ni, “Win Jogiliad, wibedo jom'orwenyo ma Efrayim kodi Manase.”
Jogiliad jomako ger ma Yordan kwoŋ Joefrayim. Kisi ka Jaefrayim kwale to waco ni, “Weyi akadhi koca.” Cwo ma Giliad jopenjo go ni, “Ibedo Jaefrayim?” Aka go odwoko ni be.
Jowaco rigo tuco wac Siboleth, aka go oyido tuco ni Siboleth, kwoŋbedo go oyido kinyal tuco m'otire. Kenyo oyido jomako go to joneko go i ger ma Yordan. Joefrayim 42,000 jotho i hongo no.
Yefitha obedo jathum banja i Isiraili ma oro aucel. Go otho aka oyiki go i tindin madongo ma Giliad.
Rumacen pa Yefitha, Ibizan ma wok i Bethelehem obedo jathum banja i Isiraili.

Go oyido nitie gi wote piero adek kodi nyithindho manyir piero adek m'opoko i nywomirok woko ma nono pere; to bende kelo nyir piero adek woko ma nono pere ri wote. Ibizan othumo banja i Isiraili ma oro abirio.
Go otho aka oyiki i Bethelehem.
Rumacen pa Ibizan, Elon janono pa Zebulun obedo jathum banja i Isiraili ma oro apar.
Elon otho, aka oyiki go i Ayijalon i lowo ma Zebulun.
Rumacen pa Elon, Abidon wod pa Hilal ja Pirathon obedo jathum banja i Isiraili.
Go oyido nitie gi wote piero aŋwen, kodi nyikwaye piero adek, m'oyido jogweyo punde piero abirio. Go othumo banja i Isiraili ma oro aboro.
Abidon otho, aka oyiki go i Pirathon i lowo pa Efrayim, i piny matendere pa Joamalek.
Joisiraili jotimo reco kendo ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka Rwoth omiyo jo i cingi Jofilistia ma oro piero aŋwen.
Oyido nitie jacwo acel ma wok i Zora, janono pa Dan, nyinge obedo Manowa; aka cege oyido kinywol ongoye gi nyithindho.
Malaika pa Rwoth omenyere ri dhako no to waco rigo ni, “Neni, ikinywol aka ingoye gi nyithindho, t'ilagamo iyin t'inywolo wodin.
Onyo mondo gwokere, ikir'imadhi vini kosa medho makec, kosa icami gimakoc.
Kole ilagamo iyin t'inywol wodin. To ongoye kamweso geyo wiye, kole jayac labedo Janazir ri Were wok i nywolirok. Go ama lacako botho Isiraili wok i cingi Jofilistia.”
Dhako no obino to waco ri cwore ni, “Jacwo pa Were obino bongan, aka cal pere oyido bwoko jo paka malaika pa Were. Akipenjo go nike owok kune, aka go k'owaco ran nyinge.
To go owaco ran ni, ‘Panen, ilagamo iyin t'inywolo wodin, onyo ikir'imadhi vini kosa medho makec, kosa icami gimakoc, kole jayac labedo Janazir ri Were wok i nywolirok pere tundo tho pere.’ ”
Manowa okwayo Rwoth ka waco ni, “Cwakan Rwoth, to weyi jacwo pa Were m'ioro wobin bongi wan kendo fonjo wan gima waripo timo ri jayac ma lanywole.”
Were owinjo dwondi Manowa, aka malaika pa Were obino kendo bongi dhako munyo go obedo i ndelo; to Manowa oyido ongoye bonge.
Dhako oŋweco piyo aka owaco ri cwore ni, “Panen, jacwo m'obino bongan ceŋino oneno ran kendo.”
Manowa oay malo aka oluwo cege, to bino bongi jacwo no aka openjo go ni, “Iŋat'ibedo jacwo m'oluwo gi dhako paran?”
Go odwoko ni, “Ey abedo.”
Manowa openjo ni, “Ka wac perin otundi i kare, kwo pa jayac ripo bedo nedi, aka go latimo aŋo?”
Malaika pa Rwoth odwoko Manowa ni, “Kwoŋ gim'atieko waco ri dhako je, go ripo kuro.
Go kiripi camo gimoro je ma wok i yath vini, kosa madho vini, kosa medho makec, kosa camo gimakoc moro je. Go ripo kuro or m'amiyo go je.”
Manowa owaco ri malaika pa Rwoth ni, “Mondo weyi idoŋ gi wan, ŋey watedi rin nyathi diel.”
Malaika pa Rwoth odwoko Manowa ni, “K'anodoŋ gi win, akilacamo cemo mewin, to ka wimito timo mic awaŋa, miy win ri Rwoth.” Kole Manowa oyido okuya nike go obedo malaika pa Rwoth.
Manowa openjo malaika pa Rwoth ni, “Nyingin ŋa, ŋey ka wac perin otundo i kare wanyal miyin dwoŋ?”
Malaika pa Rwoth openjo Manowa ni, “Raŋo ipenjo nyingan, ma kiniaŋere?”
Ameno Manowa okwanyo nyathi diel kodi mic ma cemo, aka omiyo i wi tele ri Rwoth, gir'aura ma timere; aka Manowa kodi cege joŋiyo.
Munyo mac liel kadho malo i polo wok i wi migam, malaika pa Rwoth okadho malo i mac ma migam kareno Manowa kodi cege joŋiyo; aka jopodho piny gi nyim jo.
Malaika pa Rwoth k'oneno kendo ri Manowa kodi cege. Kenyo Manowa oniaŋ nike oyido obedo malaika pa Rwoth.
Manowa owaco ri cege ni, “Walatho adieri, kole watieko neno Were.”
Cege odwoko go ni, “Kabedi Rwoth oyido mito neko wan, dinyo k'ojolo mic awaŋa kodi mic ma cemo wok i cingi wan, kosa dinyo k'onyutho wan gime je, kosa pama miyo wan winjo nger gime.”
Dhako onywolo wode, aka ocwoko nyinge ni Samson. Jayac odongo, aka Rwoth omiyo go silwany.
Cuny pa Rwoth ocako miyo go meni i Mahane Dan, i dier Zora kodi Esitayol.
Dicel Samson oloro piny i Timina, aka i Timina kenyo go oneno dhako ma nya Jafilistia.
Kenyo go okadho malo, to waco ri bamere kodi min ni, “Atieko neno dhako i Timina m'obedo nya Jafilistia; onyo omi ran win go paka dhako paran.”
To bamere kodi min jopenjo go ni, “Ongoye dhako i dier wade perin, kosa i dier ji paran je, m'iripo kidho kwanyo dhako wok kwoŋ Jofilistia ma jok'othumere?”
Samson odwoko bamere ni, “Miyan go, rupiri go osangala waŋan.”
Bamere kodi min oyido jokuya nike gime owok bongi Rwoth; kole go oyido rango silwany ma timo gimoro kwoŋ Jofilistia. I hongo no Jofilistia am'oyido jodhumo i Isiraili.
Kenyo Samson oloro piny gi bamere kodi min i Timina. Aka munyo jobino i ndelo vini pa Timina, panen, to nyathi simbwor uja kwoŋ go.
Cuny pa Rwoth okwakere kwoŋe, to go yeco simbwor kadirio gi cinge nono paka nyatoro nyalo yeco nyathi diel. To go
Kenyo Samson oloro piny to luwo gi dhako no, aka dheno osangala waŋe.
Munyo hongo moro okadho, Samson ogik nywomo go, to wire neno kama dicokin simbwor, aka panen, oyido nitie tome kic i cokin pa simbwor, kodi mo kic.
Go ocodho gi cinge, to medere, kareno camo malo. Munyo otundo bongi bamere gi min, omiyo jo moro, to jocamo; to go k'owaco rijo ni oyido okwanyo mo kic wok i cokin pa simbwor.
Bamere oloro piny bongi dheno, to Samson timo kalima kenyo paka yac di jotimi.
Munyo ji joneno go, jokelo rigo ji piero adek ma jobedo gi go.
Samson owaco rijo ni, “Mondo weyi agoy riwin sikoiyiko. Ka winonyali tito dwoŋ mere i ndelo abirio ma kalima, nyaka alamiyo win nangin mafoth piero adek kodi nangin ma kalima piero adek.”
“To ka wik'onyal tito dwoŋ mere, kenyo wilamiyan nangin mafoth piero adek kodi nangin ma kalima piero adek.” To jowaco rigo ni, “Penji sikoiyiko perin; weyi wawinji.”
To waco rijo ni,
“Wok kwoŋ jacami owok gir'acama,
aka wok kwoŋ jameni owok gima mit.”
To ma ndelo adek jok'onyalo tito dwoŋ ma sikoiyiko.
Aka i ndelo mar'abirio jowaco ri cipa Samson ni, “Dwoŋ riwan cworin wonyali tito riwan sikoiyiko, kosa walawaŋin kodi ot pa benin gi mac. Ilwoŋo wan ka ma loko wan jocandi, k'ameno?”
Cipa Samson oywaki rigo, ka waco ni, “Idakan; ikimaran adieri. Ikwayo ji paran sikoiyiko, to fodi ikitito ran.” To Samson dwoko go ni, “Neni, fodi ikiwaco ri baba kosa mama. Raŋo awaci rin?”
To go oywaki ri Samson ma ndelo abirio ma kalima pajo ocowo; aka rupiri omena go, i ndelo mar'abirio Samson owaco rigo. Kenyo to dheno tito sikoiyiko ri ji pere.
Cwo ma tindi madwoŋ jowaco rigo i ndelo mar'abirio mafodi waŋceŋ k'opodho ni,
“Aŋo mamit pa mo kic?
Aŋo matek loyo simbwor?”
To Samson dwoko jo ni,
“Bedi fodi wikifuro gi roya paran,
di wikinwaŋo dwoŋ ma sikoiyiko paran.”

Kenyo cuny pa Rwoth okwakere kwoŋe, to loro yu Asikelon. Oneko kwoŋ jo cwo piero adek, to kwanyo gima jonyaga, to miyo nangin ma kalima ri jono ma jotito sikoiyiko. I nge malieth go ogik i ot pa bamere.
Kenyo opok cipa Samson ri jawodhe, m'oyido ocungo rigo i kalima ma nywomirok.
Munyo hongo moro okadho, i hongo ma keco ŋano, Samson okidho limo cege, gi nyathi diel. Go owaco ni, “Weyi adonji i kisika pa dhako paran.” To ba nyako k'onyalo yeyo go donjo.
Ba nyako owaco rigo ni, “Oyido aparo adieri, nike idaki go; ameno apoko go ri mere perin. Nyamin go mathin kiŋon loyo go? Raŋo ikiter go ayin?”
Samson odwoko jo ni, “Rume alangoye g'apuse k'anotim gimarac ri Jofilistia.”
Ameno Samson okadho to mako kibwe 300 to kwanyo mac; go otweyo yiw ario kanyacel, to ketho mac i dier yiw jo.
Aka munyo go otieko cwinyo mac, odhiro kibwe donjo i ŋano pa Jofilistia m'oyido ocungo, to waŋo woko wic kodhi m'oyido ocungo, kanyacel gi ndelo vini kodi yen oliv.
Kenyo Jofilistia jopenjo ni, “Ŋa m'otimo gime?” To jodwoko ni, “Samson, or Jotimina, rupiri go opoko cege ri nyawote.” Ameno Jofilistia joay, to jowaŋo dheno kodi bamere gi mac.
Samson owaco rijo ni, “K'inen me a nger gima witimo, akwoŋere ak'owey cuka atieko culo kwor kwoŋin.”
Samson orwadho jo piny pier gi emi jo gi kikengila madwoŋ aka go oloro piny to bedo i ŋungu tele ma Etam.
Jofilistia jokadho malo to joketho kambi pajo i Yuda, to joywore i Lehi.
Cwo ma Yuda jopenjo jo ni, “Raŋo wikwinyo wan?” Jodwoko ni, “Wabino malo ka tweyo Samson, timo rigo paka otimo riwan.”
Kenyo cwo gana adek ma Yuda joloro piny i ŋungu tele ma Etam, to jopenjo Samson ni, “Ikuya nike Jofilistia jodhumo wan? Onyo aŋo m'itimo riwan?”
Go odwoko ni, “Paka jotimo ran, ameno apaka atimo rijo.”
Jowaco rigo ni, “Waloro piny tweyin, ŋey wanyal kethin i cingi Jofilistia.” Samson owaco rijo ni, “Kwoŋere ran win ni wiwegi wik'omonjan.”
Jowaco rigo ni, “Be, walatweyin nyaka kende to wakethin i cingi jo; wak'onekin.” Ameno jotweyo go gi thondhe ario manyen, to jokelo go malo wok i tele.

Munyo Samson obino i Lehi, Jofilistia jobino gi woy ma romo gine; to cuny pa Rwoth kwakere kwoŋe, aka thondhe m'oyido nitie i bade jolokere paka yath macwer mo m'omako mac, to gim'otwey gine leny woko i cinge.
Samson onwaŋo coko manumu ma lak punda ma pom, otelo cinge to kwanyo, to oro ma neko gine cwo gana acel.
Samson owaco ni,
“Gi lak punda ma pom,
punda pa punde,
gi lak punda ma pom,
atieko neko cwo gana acel.”
Tekin go otieko luwo, obolo woko lak punda wok i cinge; to go lwoŋo kenyo ni Ramath Lehi.
I hongo no riyo oyido neko go swa, to lwoŋo Rwoth, ka waco ni, “Iŋat'imiyo kikengila madwoŋ me gi cingi ŋeca perin. Onyo pama atho riyo, t'apodho i cingi ji ma jok'othumere?”
Ameno Were obaro milelo m'oŋamere manitie i Lehi, to pi wok'iye. Munyo omadho, cunye odwoko, to both. Riameno olwoŋi nyinge ni, Enhakore
Samson obedo jathum banja i Isiraili i hongo pa Jofilistia ma oro piero ario.
Ndelo moro Samson okidho i Gaza, kama go onen'iye malaya to nindo gine.
Owaci ri ji ma Gaza ni, “Samson obino ka.” Ameno jothoko tindi madwoŋ to jokuro go wor gipi i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ. Joliŋ wor gipi, ka joparo ni, “Weyi wakur piny woyawere; nyaka to waneko go.”

To Samson onindo kiri sawa aucel ma wor. Kenyo i dier wor go ocew, omidho waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ gi thigin ario kodi miangin mere, to fudho woko nyweny kodi gimoro je, to ketho i goke, aka otero jo wi kisul matendere manitie yuwaŋ Hebron.
Rumacen ma gime go omitere gi dhako i milelo ma Sorek, ma nyinge ilwoŋo Delila.

Jodhum ma Filistia jokidho bongi dhako no to jowaco rigo ni, “Dwoŋ go, aka irangi tiendi gima miyo meni pere bedo madwoŋ, kodi nger ma wanyalo kikengil'iye go, to wanyalo go; aka walamiyin nusu feza ma romo kilo piero aucel g'abic.”
Delila owaco ri Samson ni, “Mondo wac ran gima miyo meni perin bedo madwoŋ, kodi nger m'inyalo tweyin'iye, ma kikengila in.”
Samson owaco rigo ni, “Ka jotweyan gi dende abirio manumu mafodi k'othwo, nyaka alanyapere, t'abedo paka kisi dhano je.”
Kenyo jodhum ma Filistia jokelo rigo dende abirio manumu mafodi k'othwo, to Delila tweyo gine go.

Kareno jor'apondi oyido jobedo rigo i kisika, Delila owaco rigo ni, “Jofilistia jonitie kwoŋin, Samson!” To Samson yeco dende no, paka uzi ma yath macwer mo ka oŋweyo mac. Ameno nyaliŋliŋ ma meni pere k'oŋeyere.
Kenyo Delila owaco ri Samson ni, “Neni, itieko wondan t'iluwo ran twodo; mondo wac ran nger m'oyido inyalo tweyin'iye.”
Samson owaco rigo ni, “Ka jotweyan gi thondhe manyen ma fodi k'oor, nyaka alanyapere, t'acalo paka dhano man je.”
Ameno Delila okwanyo thondhe manyen to tweyo gine go, to waco rigo ni, “Jofilistia jonitie kwoŋin, Samson!” Jor'apondi oyido jobedo i kisika. To Samson yeco woko thondhe no wok i cinge paka uzi.
Kenyo Delila owaco ri Samson ni, “Kiri pama itieko wondan t'iwaco ran twodo; wac ran nger m'oyido inyalo tweyin'iye.”
Samson owaco rigo ni, “K'inokedi lwodo abirio ma wiyan, t'iridho matek gi kikweso, nyaka to meni loyan, t'abedo paka kisi dhano moro je.”

Ameno munyo Samson nindo, Delila okwanyo lwodo abirio no ma ye wiye to kedo jo maber, to ridho jo matek gi kikweso. Kenyo to waco rigo ni, “Jofilistia jonitie kwoŋin, Samson!” To cew inindo pere, to gonyo woko kikweso, kodi ye wiye m'okedi.
Kenyo Delila owaco rigo ni, “Inyalo waco nedi ni amarin, munyo cunyin ongoye kodan? Itieko wondan didek pama aka fodi ikiwaco ran gima miyo meni perin bedo madwoŋ.”
Macowe, munyo Delila otieko kimena go gi wac pere kisi ndelo, to romo go, hongo pere olokere macek ma tho.

Ameno owaco rigo adundo pere je, to waco rigo ni, “fodi kamweso k'ogeyo wiyan; rupiri abedo Ŋataleŋ ri Were munyo fodi anitie i iy mama. Bedi liel wiyan, nyaka dimeni paran oweyan; dinyo alokere manyap, t'abedo paka kisi dhano moro je.”

Munyo Delila oneno ni go otieko waco rigo adundo pere je, odhiro t'ilwoŋo jodhum pa Jofilistia, ka waco ni, “Waŋin me biye win, go otieko miyan aŋeyo adundo pere je.” Kenyo jodhum pa Jofilistia jobino bonge, to jokelo feza i cingi jo.
Delila omiyo Samson nindo i tiende, to lwoŋo jal moro, aka omiyo go lielo lwodo abirio ma ye wiy Samson. Samson ocako nyapirok to meni pere weyo go.
Kenyo Delila owaco rigo ni, “Jofilistia jonitie kwoŋin, Samson!” Munyo go ocew inindo pere, oparo ni, “Alawok woko paka amaro, t'ateŋere.” To go k'oŋeyo nike Rwoth oyido otieko weyo go.
Filistia jopodho kwoŋe to jogolo woko waŋe. Jotero go i Gaza to jotweyo go gi pingo ma ywel; to bedo jarego i cuma ma jiera.
Ye wiye ocako dongo kendo munyo otiek lielo.
Jodhum pa Jofilistia jocokere ma miyo cowirok madwoŋ ri were pajo Dagon, kodi kisangala; kole jowaco ni, “Were mawan omiyo Samson jakwor mawan i cingi wan.”
Munyo ji joneno go, jofoyo were pajo; rupiri jowaco ni, “Were mawan otieko ketho jakwor mawan i cingi wan, go m'othango piny mawan, go m'oneko ji mawan kweth.”
Aka munyo josiemere, jowaco ni, “Lwoŋ win Samson, aka weyi go wotim riwan tuko.” Ameno olwoŋi Samson wok i jiera, to timo tuko rijo. Jomiyo go cungo i dier sirin;
to Samson waco ri jayac m'omako cinge ni, “Yeyan amuli sirin ma thielo ot, ŋey anyal thenere kwoŋ jo.”
Ot oyido opoŋ'iye cwo gi mondongo; jodhum pa Jofilistia oyido jonitie kenyo, aka i wi ot oyido nitie cegin cwo kodi mondongo gana adek, m'oyido joneno paka Samson timo tuko.
Kenyo Samson olwoŋo Rwoth to waco ni, “Awi Rwoth Were, mondo poyan, aka mondo miyan meni dicel me kende, Awi Were, ŋey gi tim acel me ma culo kwor anyal culo kwoŋ Jofilistia ri waŋan ario.”
To Samson midho sirin ario ma diere m'oyido thielo ot, to thenere kwoŋe, cinge maracuc kwoŋ acel kodi cinge maracam kwoŋ man.

Kenyo Samson owaco ni, “Weyi atho gi Jofilistia.” Oyare gi meni pere je; to ot podho kwoŋ jodhum kodi ji je m'oyido jonitie iye. Ameno ji ma go oneko i hongo pere ma tho oyido jothoth loyo ma go oneko munyo go fodi kwo.

Wutmin go kodi jopeco pere je joloro piny to jokwanyo delkwoŋe to jokelo malo, aka joyiko go i dier Zora kodi Esitayol i kaliel pa bamere Manowa. Samson obedo jathum banja i Isiraili ma oro piero ario.
Obedo jal moro i piny matendere ma Efrayim m'oyido ilwoŋo ni Mika.
Go owaco ri min ni, “Nusu feza ma romo kilo apar g'adek m'okwal kwoŋin, t'ilamo, aka iluwo kiri m'awinjo, feza no aŋat'akwanyo; nitie bongan.” To min waco ni, “Weyi Rwoth womiy wodan silwany!”
Kenyo go odwoko nusu feza ma romo kilo apar g'adek ri min; to min waco ni, “Adieri aloko maleŋ feza me ri Rwoth wok i cingan ri wodan, ma timo cal m'ogor kodi cal ma nyweny aka onyo pama adwoko rin.”
Onyo munyo odwoko feza ri min, min okwanyo nusu feza ma romo kilo ario, to miyo jathedhi nyweny, m'otimo gine cal ma nyweny m'ogor; aka obedo i ot pa Mika.
Mika me oyido nitie gi ot pa werin pere, to timo law pa jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi were i cal pa dhano m'ilwoŋo ni terafim, to ketho acel kwoŋ wote, bedo jacway ri were i wi migam.
I hongo no oyido ongoye kere i Isiraili; kisi dhano oyido timo gim'otire i waŋe.
Oyido nitie jayac moro ma wok Bethelehem i Yuda, janono pa Yuda. Go oyido obedo Jalevi aka bedo kenyo.
Go oay i tindi madwoŋ Bethelehem i Yuda, kadho bedo kama go onwaŋ. Go obino i ot pa Mika i piny matendere ma Efrayim, i woth pere.
Mika openjo go ni, “Iwok yukune?” Go odwoko ni, “Abedo Jalevi ma Bethelehem i Yuda, aka awotho rango kamoro je ma bed'iye.”
Kenyo Mika owaco rigo ni, “Bedi kodan, aka lokere ran baba kodi jacway ri were i wi migam, aka alamiyin nusu feza apar kisi oro, kodi nangin kodi gima kwo gine.” To Jalevi no kadho.
Jalevi no oyeyo bedo gi Mika; to jayac no lokere rigo paka acel kwoŋ wote.
Ameno Mika omiyo Jalevi no dwoŋ, to jayac no bedo jacway ri were i wi migam pere, aka obedo i ot pa Mika.
Mika owaco ni, “Pama onyo aŋeyo ni Rwoth latic kodan maber, kole Jalevi otieko bedo jacway ri were i wi migam paran.”
I hongo no oyido kere ongoye i Isiraili. Aka i hongo no, nono pa Dan oyido jorango adec ma jobed'iye; kwoŋbedo cuka i hongo no ongoye adec i dier nonin ma Isiraili m'oyido otiek miyo jo.

Ameno jonono pa Dan jodhiro wok i peco pajo cwo abic i dier jo ma jomeni, ma jowok Zora kodi Esitayol, timo nyaliŋliŋ i piny kodi ŋeyo paka nitie, to jowaco rijo ni, “Kidhi win, wiŋey paka piny nitie.” Munyo jotundo i piny matendere Efrayim, i ot pa Mika, to jonindo kenyo.
Munyo jonitie i ot pa Mika, joniaŋ dwondi jayac ma Jalevi; ameno jowire gi thenge to jopenjo go ni, “Ŋa m'okelin ka? Aka itimo aŋo ka? Aka aŋo m'obedo aperin ka?”
Jayac no odwoko jo ni, “Mika otimo ran gime gi gime, to pangisa an aka atieko lokirok rigo jacway ri Were i wi migam.”
Kenyo jowaco rigo ni, “Mondo penji riwan Were ŋey wanyal ŋeyo ka tic ma wakidho timo lakadho riwan maber.”
Jacway ri Were i wi migam owaco rijo ni, “Kadhi win i siem. Rwoth otelo win i yo ma wikidho luwo.”

Cwo abic no jokadho, aka munyo jotundo Layis, joneno piny okwe ri ji ma jobed'iye, cungo kwoŋ kula pa Josidon ma bedo moth gi bedo m'ongoye ŋico m'ongoye gima jocandi i piny kodi bedo gi lim. Medo kwoŋ meno, oyido jobor gi Josidon aka oyido jongoye gi gir'atima gi joman.
Munyo jodwoko bongi wutmin jo i Zora kodi i Esitayol, jopenjo jo ni, “Wimiyo radwok aŋo?”
Jowaco ni, “Ay win, weyi win wakadhi malo kwoŋ jo, rupiri watieko neno piny, aka ber swa. Ik'otimi gimoro? Ikir'ibedi gi lithirok kidho, to donji iloki piny aperin.
Tekin idonjo ilatundo bongi ji ma jongoye gi ŋico, i piny malac; Were adieri otieko ketho i cingin kabedo m'ongoye gim'ila cando i piny.”
Cwo gana aucel ma nono pa Dan, ma jotiŋo gilweny, joay wok Zora kodi Esitayol,
Jokidho malo to joketho kambi pajo i Kiriath Yerim i Yuda. Riameno olwoŋi kenyo ni Mahane Dan
Wok kenyo joluwo kiri i piny matendere ma Efrayim, aka jobino i ot pa Mika.

Kenyo cwo abic m'oyido jokidho timo nyaliŋliŋ i piny ma Layis jowaco ri wutmin jo ni, “Wiŋeyo ni nitie law maleŋ pa jacway ri Were i migam, cal m'ilamo kodi cal ma nyweny i ot me? Onyo pama par win kwoŋ gima wilatimo.”
Ameno jowire gicen kenyo to jotundo bongi jayac m'obedo Jalevi, i peco pa Mika, to jom'otho go.
Cwo 600 pa jonono pa Dan, ma jotiŋo gilweny, jocungo i dhiot ma waŋkac,

cwo abic m'oyido jokidho dwaro nyaliŋliŋ i lowo jobino kenyo to jokwanyo cal ma nyweny, law maleŋ pa jacway ri Were i migam kodi cal m'ilamo. Jacway ri were i wi migam oyido ocungo kenyo i dhiot ma waŋkac gi cwo 600 ma jotiŋo gilweny.
Munyo cwo me jotundo i ot pa Mika to jokwanyo cal ma nyweny, law maleŋ pa jacway ri were i wi migam kodi cal m'ilamo, jacway ri were i migam openjo jo ni, “Witimo aŋo?”

Jowaco rigo ni, “Liŋ! Kethi cingin i dhokin, aka ikadhi gi wan, aka ibedi riwan bawan kodi jacway ri Were i wi migam. Ber rin k'ibedo jacway ri Were i wi migam i ot pa ŋat'acel, kosa bedo jacway ri Were i wi migam ri nono kosa peco i Isiraili?”
Gime osangala cuny jacway ri were i migam. Okwanyo law maleŋ pa jacway ri Were i wi migam, cal m'ilamo kodi cal ma nyweny, to kadho gi ji.
Jowire kadho, aka joketho nyithindho, mwendi kodi gigipiny pajo yuwiy jo.
Munyo jotieko kadho bor ye gi ot pa Mika, cwo m'oyido jonitie i udi cegin gi ot pa Mika jocokere to joyombo jonono pa Dan.
Jokoko ri jonono pa Dan, ma jowire to jopenjo Mika ni, “Aŋo marac m'ibino gi lwak ji me?”
Mika odwoko ni, “Wikwanyo werin paran m'atimo, kodi jacway ri Were i wi migam, to wikadho, aka onyo adoŋ g'aŋo? Onyo doko winyalo penjan nedi ni, ‘Aŋo marac?’ ”
To jonono pa Dan jowaco rigo ni, “Diber k'ibedo ma dwondin k'owinjere i dier wan, ka k'obedo ameno jogero jolamonjin, t'ikeŋ kwo perin gi kwo ma peco perin je.”
Kenyo jonono pa Dan jokadho i yo pajo. Munyo Mika oneno ni jotek loyo go, owire to dok peco pere.

Jonono pa Dan, jokwanyo gima Mika oyido otieko timo, aka jacway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido obedo apere, obino Layis, bongi ji ma josiem, ma jongoye gi teko, joneko jo, to jowaŋo tindi pajo madwoŋ gi mac.
Oyido ongoye ŋat'obothi jo, kwoŋbedo oyido bor wok Sidon aka oyido ongoye gi gir'atima gi joman. Oyido nitie i milelo m'obedo apa Bethrehob. Jogeto tindi madwoŋ, to jobed'iye.
Jolwoŋo nyingi tindi madwoŋ no ni Dan, gi nyingi Dan kwari jo, m'onywol ri Isiraili; to nyingi tindi madwoŋ no oyido con mere obedo Layis.
Kenyo jonono pa Dan jojengo cal rijo wegi. Yonathan wod pa Gerisom, nyakwar Manase kodi wote oyido jobedo jocway ri were i wi migam ri jonono pa Dan cuka tundo hongo ma piny no okadho i twec.
Jojengo i kabedo rijo wegi cal pa Mika m'oyido otieko timo, i hongo je ma Ot pa Were obedo i Silo.
Obedo i hongo no, munyo kere oyido ongoye i Isiraili, aka obedo jal moro ma Jalevi, m'oyido lera iy'adec ma kakende ma piny matendere Efrayim, onywomo malaya ma wok i Bethelehem i Yuda.
To malaya pere omako gine, to weyo go kadho i ot pa bamere i Bethelehem i Yuda, to bedo kenyo ma dwe aŋwen.

Kenyo cwore oay malo to kidho cako rango go, ma luwo gi cunye ma dwoko go. Oyido go nitie gi ŋeca pere kodi punde kweth. Dheno okelo go i ot pa bamere, bamere oneno go to bino gi kisangala romo gi go.
Ore, ba cege, odiyo go, to miyo go bedo gine ma ndelo adek; ameno jocemo to jomedho, jok'obilo nindo.
I ndelo mar'aŋwen joay odikin maŋic, to joyikere ma kadho; to ba nyako waco ri ore ni, “Yom cuny gi cemo nyaka mathi, aka k'itieko nyaka t'ikadho.”
Ameno cwo ario no jobedo piny, jocemo to jomedho kanyacel; to ba nyako waco ri jalo ni, “Mondo raŋo ikinindi to cunyin yodere?”
Munyo jalo oay ma kadho, to ba cege medo ywakere rigo cuka onindo kenyo kendo.
I ndelo mar'abic go ocew odikin maŋic kadho, to ba nyaka waco ni, “Mondo siem cunyin.” Ameno to jokuro cuka piny oyutho, to joje jocemo.

Munyo jalo gi malaya pere kodi ŋeca pere joay kadho, ore, ba nyako, owaco rigo ni, “Mondo neni, piny oyutho ma lokirok othieno. Mondo nindi. Neni, piny oyutho. Nindi ka aka weyi cunyin wosangala. Dikin inyalo cew odikin maŋic t'imako yo perin, t'ikadho peco perin.”
To jalo k'omito nindo kenyo kendo; oay to kadho, to tundo kam'oŋiyere gi Yebus (meno, Yerusalem.) Go oyido nitie gi punde ario m'igweyo, aka malaya pere oyido nitie gi go.
Munyo oyido jocegin tundo Yebus, sawa oyido okadho, to ŋeca waco ri jadwoŋ pere ni, “Mondo biye, weyi wawire yuthengi tindi madwoŋ pa Joyebus me, to wanind'iye.”
To jadwoŋ pere waco rigo ni, “Wak'owire yuthengi tindi madwoŋ pa jokicar, ma jok'obedo Joisiraili; to walamedere kiri Gibeya.”
Kenyo go owaco ri ŋeca pere ni, “Biye, weyi watem tundo iy'acel kwoŋ kabedo me, to wanindo i Gibeya kosa i Rama.”
Ameno jomedere to jokadho i yo pajo; to waŋceŋ podho rijo cegin i Gibeya, m'obedo apa Benyamin.
Jowire gi thenge kenyo, ma donjo kodi nindo i Gibeya. Go odonjo to bedo i kam'othangere ma tindi madwoŋ, to ongoye ŋat'otero jo nindo.
Gikenyo won othieno obedo jal moro m'oti m'oyido dwoko wok i tic pere i ndelo. Jalo oyido wok i piny matendere ma Efrayim, aka go oyido bedo i Gibeya. (Cwo ma kenyo oyido jobedo wot Benyamin.)
Munyo jalo otiŋo waŋe malo to neno ŋata wotho i kam'othangere ma tindi madwoŋ, jal m'oti no openjo go ni, “Ikidho kune aka iwok kune?”
Jalevi odwoko go ni, “Waluwo wok i Yerusalem i Yuda iy'adec mabor loyo ma piny matendere ma Yuda, kam'awok'iye. Awok i Bethelehem i Yuda; aka onyo akadho i Ot pa Rwoth. Ongoye jal m'ojolan i ot pere.
Wan ŋecin perin wanitie gi kanja gi lum m'othwo ri punde mawan, gi cemo kodi vini ri an kodi ri ŋeca perin madhako kodi ri jayac manitie gi wan. Wakimiti gimoro kendo.”
Jal m'oti no owaco ni, “Siem wobedi kodin. Alamiyin gimoro je m'imito; nyaka ikir'inindi kam'othangere.”
Ameno go okelo jo i ot pere, to pidho punde; jolwoko tiendi jo, aka jocemo to jomedho.

Munyo oyido fodi josiemere, cwo ma tindi madwoŋ, wot ji ma bukony, jothoko ot, to jocako goyo thigo gi derino. Jowaco ri jalo, jadwoŋ ma ot ni, “Wodhi woko jal m'obino i ot perin, ŋey wanyal nindo gi go.”
To jalo, jadwoŋ ma ot, wok woko bongi jo to waco rijo ni, “Be, wutmera, mondo wikiri witim gikidakana. Paka jame obedo wendo paran, wikiri witim giwickwot ma miŋo me.
E nyaran mambula gi malaya pere; mondo weyi awodhi jo woko. Nindi win gi jo to witimo gi jo gima wimito; to ri jal me wikiri witim giwickwot me.”
To cwo no jok'onyalo winjo go. Ameno jalo opodho kwoŋ malaya pere, to wodho go woko rijo. Jonindo gine m'ongoye wor gipi cuka otundo odikin. Aka munyo ŋamba oriedo, to joweyo go kadho.
Munyo piny oyawere, dheno obino podho i dhiot ma ot kama jadwoŋ pere oyido nitie iye, cuka piny olokere maler.
Odikin jadwoŋ pere ay to yawo thigin ma ot, aka munyo owok kadho i yo pere, malaya pere oyido nitie onindo i dhiot ma ot, gi cinge kwoŋ thigo.
Owaco rigo ni, “Ay malo wakadhi.” To radwok ngoye. Kenyo jalo oketho go i wi punda; to jalo ay kadho peco pere.
Munyo go otundo peco pere, okwanyo apala to podho kwoŋ malaya pere to ŋundo go mathindho thindho muma apar g'ario, tundo i coko, to dhiro go woko iy'adec je ma Isiraili.

Kisi dhano je m'oneno go onyalo waco ni, “Oyido fodi nger gime k'otimere, oyido nger gime fodi k'onenere wok i ndelo ma Joisiraili jowey'iye Misir cuka tundo ndelo me! Waripo timo gimoro kwoŋe. Warangi rieko, to wawodho.”
Kenyo Joisiraili je jowok woko, wok Dan tundo Berseba, kiri gi piny ma Giliad, aka kweth no jocokere iy'acel ruwaŋ Rwoth i Mizipa.
Rwodhe pa ji je, apa nonin ma Isiraili je, jonyuthere i kacokirok pa ji pa Were, jolweny 400,000 ma jowotho atiendi ma jotiŋo gilweny.
(Onyo jo Benyamin jowinjo ni Joisiraili oyido jokadho malo kiri i Mizipa.) To Joisiraili jowaco ni, “Waci win riwan, tim ma kidakana me obino nedi?”
Jalevi, cwor dhako m'oneki, odwoko ni, “Abino i Gibeya m'obedo apa Benyamin, an gi malaya paran, nindo.
Jodhum ma Gibeya joay kwoŋan, to jothoko ot wor. Oyido jomito nekan, to jomako malaya paran to jonindo gine cuka otho.
Kenyo t'apodho kwoŋ malaya paran t'athumo mathindho thindho, t'adhiro go iy'adec ma Isiraili je paka rom; kwoŋbedo jotieko timo gikidakana ma wickwot i Isiraili.
Onyo pama, wi Joisiraili, wijoje, miyere win rieko kodi nwaŋo gir'atima.”
Ji je joay malo iy'acel, ka jowaco ni, “Kada ŋat'acel kwoŋ wan k'okidhi i wema, aka kada ŋatimoro kwoŋ wan k'okidhi i ot pere.
To onyo pama, me a gima walatimo ri Gibeya: Walabolo kwir kwoŋ Gibeya.

Walakwanyo cwo kwoŋ 100 kwoŋ nonin je ma Isiraili, aka 100 kwoŋ gana, aka gana kwoŋ gana apar, ma nwaŋo gimoro ri ji ma jolatimo ri bino pajo i Gibeya ma Benyamin ri giwickwot ma miŋo cungo kwoŋ gimoro je ma go otieko timo i Isiraili.”
To cwo ma Isiraili je jocokere kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ, munyo jomakere iy'acel.
Nonin ma Isiraili jodhiro cwo i nono pa Benyamin paka rom, ka jowaco, “Me gimarac aŋo m'otiek timo i dier win?
Onyo pama, kethi win cwo ma jongoye kony no i Gibeya, ŋey wanyal neko jo, ŋey wacidi woko reco no i Isiraili.” To jo Benyamin jok'owinjo dwondi wutmin jo, Joisiraili.
Jo Benyamin jocokere kanyacel wok i tindin madongo ma kidho i Gibeya, kadho lweny gi Joisiraili.
I ndelo no jo Benyamin jocoko cwo 26,000 wok i tindin pajo madongo ma jotiŋo gilweny, ketho meno gicen, jopiny ma Gibeya oyido joromo welo ma cwo 700 m'oyer.
Kwoŋ cwo 700 m'oyer me, oyido jor'acam, kisi dhano oyido dwiro asumulu ma tele i koyo, aka k'ibedi ma k'ogoyo gimoro.
Joisiraili, ka ikwanyo woko jo Benyamin, oyido joromo cwo 400,000 joje oyido jobedo jolweny.
Joisiraili joay malo to jokidho i Bethel to jopenjo Were, aka jowaco ni, “Ŋa kwoŋ Joisiraili wotel kidho riwan malo lweny gi ji pa Benyamin?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Yuda ama wotel kidho malo.”
Kenyo Joisiraili joay malo odikin, to joketho kambi pajo gi thengi Gibeya.
Joisiraili jowok woko lweny gi jonono pa Benyamin; to jocero bol ma lweny kwoŋ jo i Gibeya.
Jonono pa Benyamin jowok woko ma Gibeya, to joreyo woko i ndelo no Joisiraili 22,000.
Ji jomiyere miseni to cwo ma Isiraili jotimo kendo can ma lweny i kabedo ma jocan'iye kenyo i ndelo marapena.
Joisiraili jokadho malo to joywak ruwaŋ Rwoth cuka tundo othieno ka jopenjo Rwoth ni, “Wanocore cegin kendo ri lweny gi jo Benyamin wutmin wan?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Kadhi malo ilweny.”
Joisiraili jocore cegin gi jonono pa Benyamin i ndelo mar'ario.
Benyamin owok woko romo gi jo wok i Gibeya i ndelo mar'ario, to reyo woko i dier Joisiraili kendo cwo 18,000 jome je oyido jotiŋo gilweny.
Kenyo Joisiraili je, gi ji je jokidho i Bethel to joywak, jobedo piny ruwaŋ Rwoth, joriyo kec ndelo no cuka tundo othieno. Kenyo to jomiyo mic awaŋa kodi cowirok ma siem ruwaŋ Rwoth.
To Joisiraili jopenjo Rwoth rupiri Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were oyido nitie kenyo i hongo no,
aka Finehas wod pa Eliazar, wod pa Aron, oyido cungo ruwaŋe i hongo no ka penjo ni, “Wanokidhi kendo lweny gi jonono pa Benyamin wutmin wan, kosa wanowey?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Kadhi malo, rupiri dikin alaketho jo i cingi win.”
Joisiraili joketho jor'apondi thoko Gibeya.
Kenyo Joisiraili jokidho malo ri jonono pa Benyamin i ndelo mar'adek, joketho jolweny pajo ŋiyo Gibeya, paka con mere.

Munyo jonono pa Benyamin jowok woko romo gi jolweny, oyway jo wok i tindi madwoŋ. To jocako rwadho ji megi piny gi litho ma kiwacere, i royin madongo, ma acel kwoŋ jo kidho i Bethel gi man ma kidho i Gibeya, kiri kam'othangere, aka joneko cegin cwo ma Isiraili piero adek.
Jonono pa Benyamin jowaco ni, “Wafodo jo piny, paka con mere.”
To Joisiraili jowaco ni, “Weyi waringi to waywayo jo gicen wok i tindi madwoŋ kadho yu royin.”
To cwo ma Joisiraili je joay wok i kabedo pajo to jocokere kendo i Bal Tamar, kareno Joisiraili m'oyido jotimo apondi jorure wok i kabedo pajo wok i kam'othangere m'obipere ma Geba.
To jobino ruwaŋ Gibeya cwo 10,000 m'oyer wok kwoŋ Isiraili je, to lweny bedo mapek. Jonono pa Benyamin jok'oŋeyo nike litho oyido bino rijo.
Rwoth orwadho piny Benyamin ruwaŋ Isiraili; aka Joisiraili joreyo woko cwo 25,100 apa Benyamin i ndelo no, joje oyido jotiŋo gilweny.
Kenyo jonono pa Benyamin joneno ni otiek cwado jo.
Joisiraili jomiyo jonono pa Benyamin kabedo, kwoŋbedo joketho geno i jolweny ma jor'apondi ma joketho i Gibeya.
Jor'apondi jorure piyo i Gibeya. Jor'apondi joywore i tindi madwoŋ to joneko ji je g'abor.
Oyido nitie ranyuth m'oyik ri cwo ma Isiraili gi jor'apondi ni ka yiro madwoŋ oduny malo wok i tindi madwoŋ

cwo ma Isiraili joripo gik i lweny. To Benyamin oyido ocako cwado ji gi litho madwoŋ i dier Joisiraili, oneko cegin cwo ma romo piero adek; ameno to jowaco ni, “Adieri okengila jo ruwaŋ wan, paka i lweny marapena.”
To munyo pondeponde, siro ma yiro, ocako duny wok i tindi madwoŋ, jo Benyamin joŋiyo yuŋey jo aka oyido nitie tindi madwoŋ gibe kadho malo yupolo.
Kenyo cwo ma Isiraili jowire, to cwo pa Benyamin jobwok, kwoŋbedo joneno gimarac cegin gi jo.
Riameno jowire woko ruwaŋ Joisiraili yu royo ma thim; to lweny yombo jo, aka jono ma jowok i tindi madwoŋ oyido joreyo woko jo i diere.
Jothoko jo Benyamin, to joriemo jo wok kaywomirok to jotega jo piny bor kiri yuwok ceŋ ma Gibeya.
Jo Benyamin 18,000 jopodho, aka jome je oyido jobedo jolweny ma jomeni.
Munyo jowire to jodwire i thim i tele ma Rimon, 5,000 kwoŋ jo othum jo piny i royin madongo, t'iriemo bor kiri Gidom, aka oneki cwo 2,000 kwoŋ jo.
Ameno jono je ma jopodho i ndelo no ma jowok kwoŋ Benyamin obedo cwo 5,000 ma jotiŋo gilweny, aka jome je oyido jobedo cwo ma jomeni.
To cwo 600 jowire to jodwire i thim i tele ma Rimon, to jodoŋ i tele ma Rimon ma dwe aŋwen.
To cwo ma Isiraili jowire rijo Benyamin to joneko jo gi lew abor wok i tindi madwoŋ, ogwaŋe, ji je m'onwaŋ kodi gimoro je m'odoŋ. Tindin madongo je ma jodoŋ m'onwaŋ, owaŋ gi mac.
Cwo ma Isiraili oyido jotieko kwoŋere i Mizipa ni, “Ongoye jacwo kwoŋ wan ma lamiyo nyare ri jonono pa Benyamin paka dhako.”
Aka ji jobino i Bethel, to jobedo kenyo tundo othieno ruwaŋ Were, to jotiŋo dwondi gin malo to joywak tektek.
Jowaco ni, “Awi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, Raŋo gime otimere i Isiraili ni luth acel ma nyweny ma dhum worem i ndelo ma konon wok kwoŋ Isiraili?”
I ndelo ma luwo, ji jocewi con, to jogeto kenyo migam, to jomiyo mic awaŋa gi mic ma siem.

Kenyo Joisiraili jopenjo ni, “Mene kwoŋ nonin je ma Isiraili ma k'obino malo i kacokirok bongi Rwoth?” Kole kwoŋirok madwoŋ oyido otiek timo ma mako kwoŋ ŋatimoro je ma k'obino malo bongi Rwoth i Mizipa, ka waco ni, “Ŋato iripo neko.”
To Joisiraili jomako wor gi Benyamin omin jo, to jowaco ni, “Omor woko nono acel kwoŋ Isiraili i ndelo me.
Wanotim aŋo ri mon pa jono ma jodoŋ, paka watieko kwoŋere gi Rwoth ni wak'omiy jo kad'acel kwoŋ nyir mawan paka mon?”
Kenyo jopenjo ni, “Nitie nyatoro ma wok i nonin ma Isiraili ma k'obino malo bongi Rwoth i Mizipa?” Kenyo to nwaŋere ni ongoye ŋatimoro ma wok i Yabes Giliad m'obino i kambi, i kacokirok.
Kole munyo okwan ji onwaŋere ni jopiny ma Yabes Giliad oyido jongoye kenyo.
Ameno cokirok no odhiro cwo ma jomeni 12,000 kenyo to jomiyo jo or ni, “Kadhi win, wineki jopiny ma Yabes Giliad, mondongo kodi nyithindho.”
“Me a gima wilatimo; kisi jacwo kodi kisi dhako m'otieko nindo gi jacwo wiripo reyo woko kicutho.”
To jonwaŋo i dier jopiny ma Yabes Giliad nyir mambula 400 to jokelo jo i kambi i Silo, manitie i piny ma Kanan.
Kenyo cokirok gibe joluwo kodi jonono pa Benyamin m'oyido jonitie i tele ma Rimon, to jotito rijo siem.
Benyamin odwoko i hongo no; to jomiyo jo mondongo ma jok'oneko kwoŋ mondongo ma Yabes Giliad; to nwaŋere ni jok'obedo m'oromo rijo.
Ji jomako wor gi jonono pa Benyamin kwoŋbedo Rwoth oyido oturo woko riwirok pa nonin ma Isiraili.
Ameno jotel ma cokirok jowaco ni, “Wanotim aŋo ri mon pa jono ma jodoŋ, kwoŋbedo ongoye mondongo ma jodoŋ wok kwoŋ Benyamin?”
To jowaco ni, “Musikin joripo bedo ri ji pa Benyamin ma joboth, ŋey wongoye nono ma worere woko wok kwoŋ Isiraili.
Kucel wakinyali miyo jo nyar wan moro je paka dhako.” Kole Joisiraili oyido jotieko kwoŋere ni, “Lam ri ŋatimoro je m'omiy dhako ri janono pa Benyamin.”
Ameno jowaco ni, “Neni, kalima pa Rwoth ma kisi oro timere i Silo, manitie yumalo ma Bethel, yuwok ceŋ ma royo ma kadho malo wok i Bethel kidho i Sekem, kodi yupiny ma Lebona.”
Jowodho or ri jonono pa Benyamin ni, “Kadhi win wipodhi piny wikuri i ndelin vini,
aka wibedi waŋwin; ka nyir ma Silo jowok woko miel i miele, nyaka to wifudhere wok i ndelin ma vini to kisi dhano kwoŋ win yudho dhako rigo won wok kwoŋ nyir ma Silo, to wikadho i lowo pa Benyamin.

Kenyo ka bacere pajo kosa wutmin jo jobino to jogeŋisa riwan, walawaco rijo ni, ‘Bedi win gi wor aka wiyey wan bedo gi jo; rupiri wak'imako dhako i lweny ri kisi jacwo. To wikibedo jobanja ro miyo nyir mewin rijo.’ ”
Jo Benyamin jotimo ameno; joyudho mondongo ri kisi dhano kwoŋ jo wok kwoŋ jomiel ma jopodho kwoŋ jo. Kenyo jogik iy'adec pajo, to jogeto tindin madongo kendo, to jobed'iye.
Ameno Joisiraili joweyo kenyo i hongo no cungo kwoŋ nono gi pecin, to jowok kenyo kadho iy'adec pajo wegi.
I hongo ma Joisiraili oyido fodi jongoye gi kere, kec oyido nitie i piny. Jacwo moro ma wok i Bethelehem i Yuda okadho i piny Mowab, go gi cege kodi wote ario.
Jacwo no nyinge Elimelek;
Munyo jonitie i piny no, Elimelek cwor Naume otho, to weyo cege kodi wote ario.
Yac me jonywomo mon ma jowok i Mowab; acel oyido ilwoŋo ni Oripa aka man ni Ruth.
Munyo jotieko bedo kenyo ma romo oro apar, to Mahilon gi Kilion bende jotho; to Naume doŋ kende ma bu cwore kiri gi nyithindho.
Munyo hongo moro okadho, Naume owinjo ni Rwoth omiyo ji pere silwany aka omiyo jo cemo. To go gi mondiwote joyikere ay i piny Mowab dok i piny Yuda.
Ameno dheno gi mondiwote joay to joweyo kam'oyido jobed'iye to jomako yo ma dok Yuda.
To munyo jowotho, Naume owaco ri mondiwote ni, “Kadhi win, kisi dhano wodoki i ot ma thugin. Weyi Were wotim gi win wor paka oyido wiworo jom'otho
Rwoth womiy win cwogi win man aka wibedi gi pecin.” Munyo Naume otieko waco ama opodho i kor jo to sewila jo, aka Ruth gi Oripa jogoyo ndur to joywak.
Jowaco ri Naume ni, “Be, waladok kodin bongi ji perin”.
To Naume waco rijo ni, “Gik win mondiwotan. Raŋo wimito dok kodan! Lokere fodi anitie gi yac moro i iyan ma jolokere cwogi win.
Dok win mondiwotan, maki win yo mewin, kole an onyo ati swa ma bedo gi jacwo.

Aka makada nende abedi gi geno t'anwaŋo jacwo wor me won t'anywolo yac, winokur jo cuka jodongi! Winobedi ma wikinywomere ka wikuro jo! Be mondiwotan, cunyan raman swa ro win; kwoŋbedo Rwoth otieko miyan candirok”.
Wac me omiyo doko jogoyo ndur aka joywak; aka Oripa opodho i kor adhamere to sewila go, to Ruth ocwire kwoŋe.
Naume owaco ri Ruth ni, “Neni, nyekin dok bongi jothugin, bongi werin pajo; ibende dok gi go”.
Ruth odwoko ni, “Ikir'iroman weyin kosa weyo luwin, kole kam'inokidh'iye alakidho, kam'inobed'iye alabedo; ji perin jolabedo ji paran, aka were perin labedo were paran
kam'inoth'iye abende abino tho iye, t'iyikan kenyo. Weyi Rwoth wotim gime ran aka kiri maloyo makada nende tho opok wan”.
Naume munyo otieko neno paka Ruth oridho dok gi go oliŋ ma k'owaco gimoro.
Ameno jocako nywako yo kanyacel cuka jotundo i Bethelehem. Aka munyo jotundo i Bethelehem, tindi gibe obwok to mon waco ni, “Me Naume!”
Go owaco rijo ni, “Wikiri wilwoŋan ni Naume, lwoŋan win ni Mara,
Akadho munyo abup, Rwoth onyo odwokan thangalala. Raŋo wilwoŋan ni Naume, ma Rwoth otieko kelo ran candirok gi kidamba!”
Ameno Naume odok gi ciwode Ruth ma wok i piny Mowab. Jotundo i Bethelehem munyo nyaka ocaki keco ŋano.
Naume oyido nigi wat pa cwore Elimelek ma nono, jal m'oyido oŋaŋ aka jambaka. Nyinge oyido Bowaz.
Ruth Jamowab owaco ri Naume ni, “Weyi akidhi i ndelo adim withi ŋano m'okec odoŋ i masembo pa ŋat'omaki kodan wor.” Naume to dwoko go ni, “Kadhi nyaran.”
Ameno to go ay malo cako dimo withi ŋano ma jokeco jobudho. Gikenyo to nwaŋere ni otundo iy'adec ma ndelo pa Bowaz janono pa Elimelek.
I hongo no Bowaz oyido nyaka odwoko wok Bethelehem, to waco ri jokeco ni, “Rwoth wobedi kodi win.” To jodwoko ni, “Rwoth womiyin silwany.”
Bowaz to penjo jatel pa jokeco ni,
“Nyako mafoth me apa ŋa?” To jatel pa jokeco no dwoko go ni, “Nyako mafoth me wok Mowab aka obino ka gi Naume wok i piny Mowab.
Obino ka to waco ni, ‘Akwayo, yeyan win adim withi ŋano ma jokeco jobudho’ Go otieko timo tic ma bu ywomirok wok odikin tundo gunyo ni.”
Bowaz owaco ri Ruth ni, “Winji pama nyaran, ikiri doko ikidhi dimo withi ŋano kaman kosa iwey me, to bedi cegin gi jotic paran ma mon me.
Com waŋin kwoŋ jo ka jokeco aka iluwi jo. Atieko waco ri jotic paran ni ongoye ma wocandin. Aka ka riyo nekin, inotwom pi i nywero kama jotic jocok'iye.”
Ameno to Ruth podho piny, okulo wiye, aka owaco ri Bowaz ni, “Raŋo anwaŋo wor i waŋin munyo ikaŋasa an kad'abedo ran japath?”
Bowaz odwoko go ni, “Atieko winjo gimoro je m'itimo ri adhenin cuka cworin tho, bende paka iweyo benin gi yokin gi piny m'inywol'iye t'ibino i dier ji m'oyido fodi ikiŋeyo.
Rwoth womiyin kemba ro gim'itimo, aka kemba pere wobedi m'opoŋ; Rwoth Were pa Joisiraili m'ibino nwaŋo kapondo i bwombe”.
Nyano owaco ni, “Jadwoŋ ipoŋ ran gi nema, kole itieko kweyo cunyan, aka iluwo gi ŋeca perin me gi wor kad'akibedo ran acel kwoŋ ŋecin perin.”
I hongo ma cemo, Bowaz owaco rigo ni, “Biye ka, cami mugat moro, i pili mugat me i vini.” Ruth obedo bongi jokeco to Bowaz yiko rigo withi ŋano abula, ocamo to yeŋ to ŋinjeŋinje doŋ.
Munyo go oay malo dimo withi ŋano m'obudhere, Bowaz oluwo gi jotic pere ka waco ama, “Weyi go wodim kiri kwoŋ withe m'otiek tweyo ma fodi jothwo i ndelo, wikiri wibwok go ni timo marac.
Wifudhi rigo withe wok i boc m'otwey wiwey rigo wodim ma wikicero go.”
Munyo ogoyo ŋano m'odimo wok odikin tundo othieno, onwaŋo ma nyinge ma romo agono acel.
Otiŋo ŋano no kiri i tindi to nyutho adhamere. Ruth bende omiyo adhamere cemo m'oyido ocamo to doŋ.
Naume openjo Ruth ni, “Icoko kune ŋano me je konon? Iwok tic i ndelo pa ŋa? Rwoth womiy ŋati m'otimo kodin wor me silwany.”
Ameno Ruth owaco ri Naume ŋata go otiyo gine; owaco ni, “Ŋat'atiyo gine konon ilwoŋo ni Bowaz.”
Naume owaco ni, “Rwoth womiy Bowaz silwany ma noknok kuro cikirok pere ri jomakwo gi jom'otho.” Omedere to waco ni, “Jalo obedo wat mawan ma ot, acel kwoŋ joma kwonga wan.”
Ruth owaco ni “Kiri go oyido kwayan ni abedi cegin gi jotic pere cuka keco orum.”
Naume ogamo ni, “Meno ber nyaran k'ibedo bongi jotic pere, loyo kadho kaman m'inyalo rom'iye gi gwayo.”
Go omedere dimo withi ŋano paka oyido Bowaz otieko waco ri jotic pere ni wotim cuka keco ŋano orumo. To i hongo man je k'otieko tic, Ruth oyido bedo bongi adhamere.
Munyo hongo moro okadho, Naume owaco ri Ruth ni, “Ripo anwaŋ rin jacwo ŋey inyal bedo gi peco perin won.
Poyi ni Bowaz, jal m'oyido ibedo gi mon pere kama jotiy'iye obedo wat mawan. Winji, konon me othieno, go labino piedho bale.
Ameno onyo iripo lwoki, wire gi mo aka irukere maber tektek. K'itieko, ikidhi i kisia; ikir'iyey go woŋey ni initie kenyo cuka go otiek cemo gi medho.
Ineni odoco kama go orier'iye, aka ka nindo okwalo go, ikidhi aka itiŋ gium aka iriere kabute; go bino waco rin gir'atima”.
Ruth odwoko ni, “Alatimo gimoro je m'iwaco”.
Ruth okadho yupiny i kisia aka otimo gim'adhamere owaco rigo.
Munyo Bowaz otieko cemo gi medho, aka cunye oyido yodere, okadho to riere cegin gi kam'odhur'iye nyingi bale. Ruth obino mothmoth, aka oyawo gium pa Bowaz to nindo bonge.
Cegin dier wor, Bowaz to bwok, owire to dhier nwaŋo dhako nindo bonge.
Go openjo ni, “In ŋa?”.
Ruth odwoko ni, “An Ruth ŋeca perin”. Bol ye adec ma law perin kwoŋan, kole iripo kikwonga an.
Bowaz owaco rigo ni, “Rwoth womiyin silwany. Inyuthan wor madwoŋ loyo kiri m'imiyo adhenin. Fodi ikirango jayac m'oŋaŋ kosa ma jacandi.”
Bowaz omedo waco rigo ni, “Mondo ikir'ibedi gi lworo, alatimo rin gimoro je m'imito, kole jotindi me je joŋeyo ni idhako ma jawor.
Obedo adieri ni aripo kikwonga in, akurin to nitie ŋatimoro ma wat perin loyan.
Nindi ka wor me, aka dikin abino penjo ka go nyalo kurin. K'oyeyo bino bero, k'okwero, akwoŋere i nyingi Were makwo, abino kurin. Onyo nindi ka tundo dikin.”
Ameno Ruth onindo bonge tundo odikin, oay ma piny fodi riprip ma ŋeyo dhano tek, kwoŋbedo Bowaz oyido k'omito nyatoro woŋey ni go oyido onindo bonge.
To mafodi, Bowaz owaco ri Ruth ni, gony nanga perin ipedhi ka. Go otimo ameno to Bowaz konjo rigo bale
Munyo Ruth otundo, adhamere openjo go ni, “Aŋo m'otimere nyaran?” Go otito gimoro je ma Bowaz otimo rigo ka waco ama,
“Omiyan kilo piero ario ma bale, ka waco ama: Ikinyal dok bongi adhenin gi cingin nono.”
Naume owaco rigo ni, “Bedi moth nyaran, kur ineni gim'otimere, Bowaz k'oywe cuka go okwey wac me konon.”
Bowaz okidho i waŋkac to bedo piny kenyo; to wat pere m'oyido go otieko luwo kwoŋe bende bino. Bowaz olwoŋo go ka waco ama: “Biye bedi kome jawodhan”.
Gikenyo to Bowaz kwanyo cwo apar kwoŋ jotel ma tindi to waco rijo bende bedo piny.
To Bowaz waco ri wat pere no ni, “Naume otieko weyo piny Mowab odwoko ka; go pama tana adec ma lowo m'oyido obedo apa wat mawan Elimelek.

An won aparo ni ber awaci rin gime, k'inyalo, nyew ruwaŋ ji me kanyacel gi jotel pa ji paran ma jobedo me. To k'ikimiti, wac ran i hongo me won, kwoŋbedo an bende anyalo tero paka cik ma lunjirok waco”. Jalo odwoko ni, “Abino nyewo”.
Bowaz owaco rigo ni, “Tekin inyewo lowo ma bongi Naume, ŋey nike bende ilunjo Ruth citho ma wok Mowab, ŋey lowo wodoŋ i nyingi peco pa jatho”.
Jalo odwoko ni, “Akinyali nyewo kwoŋbedo meno nyutho ni nyithindho paran jok'olunji. Nyew, to an be”.
Aka i piny pa Joisiraili, ma ridho wil kosa mitan, ŋata tana onwaŋo kwanyo war pere to miyo ŋata nyewo. Me nyutho winjirok.
Jalo to waco ri Bowaz ni, “Nyew.” Aka ogonyo war pere to miyo Bowaz.
Bowaz owaco ri jodongo kodi ji je ni, “Wibedo jokony ni konon anyewo lim me m'oyido obedo apa Elimelek kodi apa yac pere Kilion gi Mahilon.
Medo kwoŋ meno, Ruth nyar Jamowab ciliendi Mahilon lokere dhako paran. Gime bino miyo lim pa Mahilon wodoŋ i nyingi go; aka nyinge kilarere i dier ji gi piny pere. Wibedo jokony ma gime konon”.

To ji je m'oyido jonitie i waŋkac kanyacel gi jodongo jodwoko ni, “Wabedo jokony. Wakwayo ni Rwoth wokonyi dhako me m'ikidho nywomo wobedi paka Laker gi Leya, ma jonywolo nyithindho kweth ri Yakobo. Mondo ibedi ŋat'oŋaŋ i nono ma Efratha kodi ŋat'oŋeyere i Bethelehem.
Rwoth wokonyin inwaŋ nyithindho gi dhako me, aka peco perin wobedi paka apa Perez ma Tama onywolo ri Yuda”.
Piyo piyo to Bowaz tero Ruth bedo cege, obedo gine, aka Rwoth okonyo go ogamo iye to nywolo wode.
Gikenyo mon ma tindi ma Bethelehem jowaco ri Naume ni, “Rwoth wopak ma k'othwonin nyakwarin ndelo me, weyi go woŋeyere i piny Isiraili.
Go wokurin to bedo kwot perin ka iti. Kole ciwodin manitie rin gi cwe loyo yac abirio am'onywolo go”.
Naume otiŋo nyathi i kore to cako kikwonga go.
Mon mager jowaco ni, “Naume onywolo wode”. To jomiyo go nyinge ni Obed. Obed onywolo Yese, Yese onywolo Daudi.
Me a nyikway Perez.
Perez obedo ba Heziron, Heziron ba Ram, Ram ba Aminadab,
Aminadab ba Nason, Nason ba Salimon,
Salimon ba Bowaz, Bowaz ba Obed,
Obed ba Yese. To Yese nywolo Daudi.
Oyido nitie jal moro m'ilwoŋo ni Elikana m'oyido bedo Rama i piny matendere tendere Efrayim. Go oyido obedo wod pa Yeroham aka nyakwar Elihu ma jowok i peco pa Tohu i nono pa Zuf Jaefrayim.
Elikana onwaŋo nitie gi mon ario nyingi jo Hana kodi Penina. Penina onwaŋo nitie gi nyithindho aka Hana ongoye gine.
Kisi oro Elikana gi peco pere oyido jokidho Silo lamo Rwoth Were gi miyo go cowirok kam'oyido wot Eli, Hofin gi Finehas oyido jotiyo paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Kisi hongo k'oyido Elikana cowere, oyido miyo nyithindho pere gi cege Penina adec ma cowirok.
Go bende oyido miyo Hana adec ma cowirok manyakare kwoŋbedo onwaŋo omaro go swa makada nende Rwoth oyido k'omiyo go nyithindho.
To Penina nyek Hana oyido omo iye aka miyo go nge kwoŋbedo go oyido ongoye gi nyithindho.
Kisi oro k'onwaŋo jokidho kwayo i Ot pa Rwoth, Penina oyido yetayeta Hana. Gime omiyo go ywak aka k'onyalo kiri cemo.
Ameno to Elikana cwore penjo go ni, “Raŋo ikicem? Raŋo cunyin ramin? Initie kodan; akiloy rin yac apar?”
Ndelo acel munyo jotieko cemo gi medho i Ot pa Rwoth Silo, Hana oay malo. Eli jacway ri Were i wi migam oyido omako kabedo pere i dhiot pa Rwoth.
Rembo opoŋ i cuny Hana, to cako kwayo Rwoth.

Go otimo cikirok me, “Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny, nenan, ŋeca perin! Neni teko paran aka ipoyan! Wiyin wokiri wowil kodan! K'inomiyan nyathi majayac, aciko miyin go kicutho aka akibino lielo ye wiye.”
Hana omedere kwayo Rwoth hongo malac, to Eli neno dhok go.
Go okwayo gi cunye kada dhoke bende oyido yawere ongoye gim'oyido winjere. Gime omiyo Eli paro ni go onwaŋo omer.
To Eli wac rigo ni, “Ilamero kiri keraŋo? Kwany woko mero perin ka.”
Go odwoko ni, “Be! Jadwoŋ, akimer! Ongoye gim'atieko madho! Anitie i litho aka awok konjo ri Rwoth.
Mondo ikir'ipar ni ajakidakana, awok kwayo i nger no kwoŋbedo arembo odoko cunyan raman.”
Eli owaco rigo ni, “Kadhi i siem, weyi Rwoth Were pa Joisiraili omiyin gim'ikwayo go.”
Go odwoko ni, “Noknok ipoyan.” Odok to cako cemo aka nge doko k'omako go.
Yawere odikin joay, jolamo Rwoth aka munyo jocowo jodok Rama. Elikana oŋeyo cege Hana, to Rwoth winjo kwayo pere
I hongo no won Hana ogamo iye to nywolo wode, aka ocwoko rigo nyinge ni Samwiri; dwoŋ mere ni, “Akwayo Rwoth go.”
Hongo doko otundo ma Elikana gi peco pere gibe jokidho Silo miyo Rwoth cowirok ma kisi oro kodi miyo go cowirok manyakare m'oyido go ociko.
To rume Hana k'okidho gi jo, kole go owaco ri cwore ni, “Kur tekin go owey dhoth abino tero go i Ot pa Rwoth.”
Elikana odwoko ni, “Ongoye wac, tim gim'iparo ni ber; bedi peco tundo cuka go owey dhoth. Weyi Rwoth wokel cikirok perin i kare.” Ameno to Hana doŋ peco aka okuro wode cuka oweyo dhoth.
Munyo go otieko weyo dhoth, jokidho Silo, aka jotero rwath ma jaoro adek, agono acel ma moko, gi pien dhiaŋ m'opoŋ'iye vini, aka jotero Samwiri ma fodi go ŋic i Ot pa Rwoth Silo.
Munyo jotieko thumo rwath no, jotero ri Eli.
Hana owaco rigo ni, “Mondo jadwoŋ ipoyan? Aŋat'abedo dhako ma ndelo no ocungo ka, munyo kwayo Rwoth.
Oyido akwayo ni Rwoth womiyan nyathi aka go otieko winjo kwayo paran.
Riameno amiyo Rwoth go; ka go fodi kwo i piny ka, go bino bedo apa Rwoth.” To jolamo Rwoth kenyo.
“Cunyan yodere i Rwoth;
Neni paka asangala ro gima go otimo ran!
Anyero jokwor paran;
kwoŋbedo afore i both perin!
Ongoye ŋataleŋ paka Rwoth;
ongoye ŋatiman ma cale in,
ongoye tele lwanda ma pimere gi Were mawan.
Bol win kwoto gi delok mewin gicen;
wikiri wiluw gi gero.
Kole Rwoth obedo Were ma jaŋeyo,
aka go thumo banja ri kisi nyatoro wok i tim.
Kwot pa jomeni otur woko,
aka ji manyap onyo jolokere jomeni.
Jom'oyido joyeŋ
am'onyo kec neko jo,
aka jom'oyido kec neko jo am'onyo joyeŋ
Dhako m'oyido kinywol onyo nitie gi nyithindho abirio,
aka dhako m'oyido omore gi nyithindho onyo ongoye kada g'acel.
Rwoth ama kwanyo kwo to doko dwoko;
go ama tero ji i piny pa jom'otho,
to doko cerino jo.
Rwoth ama loko jomegi jocandi, aka jomegi joŋaŋo;
go dwoko piny jomegi aka tiŋo malo jomegi.
Go tiŋo malo jocandi wok i fukefuke
aka tiŋo jocandi wok i kumo pajo.
Go ketho jo bedo kanyacel gi wot kere
aka ketho jo i kabedo madwoŋ.
Kindi piny obedo apa Rwoth;
aka go ogeto piny gibe i wiye.
Go kwonga kwo pa ji pere ma genere,
to jokidakana jobino rere i colo
kole nyatoro won kikwo ro meni pere.
Rwoth bino reyo jokwor pere;
go bino mwoc kwoŋ jo wok i polo.
Rwoth bino thumo banja ri piny gibe;
go bino miyo kere pere meni,
go bino miyo kere pere ma go won oyero loyo.”
Ameno to Elikana dok peco pere Rama to Samwiri doŋ Silo tiyo ri Rwoth, kanyacel gi Eli jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Wot Eli oyido jobedo jokidakana, aka oyido jokilwor Rwoth.

Cik bende m'oyido mako kwoŋ gima jocway ri Were i wi migam joripo nwaŋo wok bongi ji, onwaŋo jokiluwi. Cik me oyido waco ni, ka nyatoro moro onwaŋo cowere, ŋeca pa jacway ri Were i wi migam oyido ripo bino gi uma ma ja lewe adek ka riŋo fodi twak,
to rwako i ayiga, aka riŋo ma uma no owok gine je bedo apa jacway ri Were i wi migam. Joisiraili je m'oyido jokidho Silo cowirok jotimo ameno.

Medo kwoŋ meno, kafodi k'owar bor t'iwaŋo, ŋeca pa jacway ri Were i wi migam oyido bino bongi ŋata cowere gi wac me, “Miy jacway ri Were i wi migam riŋo abula, kole go kilayeyo riŋo m'otedi kwanyo woko manumu.”
To ka ŋato odwoko ni, “Weyi kutho wabul bor to nyaka ikwanyo paka iyenyo.” Ŋeca pa jacway ri Were i wi migam dwoko ni, “Be! Miyan pama won me, k'ikwero, alakwanyo gi mbaka.”
Reco pa wot Eli oyido oasere ruwaŋ Rwoth, kwoŋbedo oyido jokiwor cowirok pa Rwoth.
I hongo no Samwiri oyido tiyo ri Rwoth, aka ruko law maleŋ ma cale apa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Kisi oro min oyido kwoyo rigo law moro to tero rigo ka kwaŋo cwore miyo cowirok ma kisi oro.
Kafodi jok'odok peco pajo, Eli oyido maro miyo Elikana gi cege Hana silwany ka waco ama, “Weyi Rwoth womiyin nyithindho man gi dhako me jowonyal lunjo waŋ me m'imiyo Rwoth.”
To Rwoth miyo Hana yac adek gi nyir ario. To Samwiri dongo k'onyo tiyo ri Rwoth.
I hongo no Eli oyido oti. Oyido iwaco rigo wac kwoŋ gigipiny ma yac pere oyido jotimo ri Joisiraili paka oyido jobedo gi mon ma tiyo i waŋkac ma Wema pa Rwoth.
To go waco rijo ni, “Raŋo witimo gima cale ameno? Kisi nyatoro waco ran reco ma witimo.
Be! Nyithindho paran gim'awinjo kwoŋ win ma ji pa Rwoth jowaco kiber.
Ka nyatoro otimo reco ruwaŋ nyawote, Were nyalo theko go, to ka nyatoro otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, ŋa m'othek go!” To jok'onyalo winjo bajo, kole Rwoth oyido otieko yiko neko jo.
Jatuci wac Were moro obino bongi Eli gi wac me wok bongi Rwoth, “Anyuthere ri kwarin Aron gi peco pere munyo oyido jobedo ŋecin pa kere ma piny Misir.

Kwoŋ nonin je ayero Aron gi peco pere bedo jocway ri Were i wi migam, tundo i wi migam paran, waŋo buban, ruko law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, aka amiyo go mic paran awaŋa je ma wok bongi Joisiraili.
To onyo raŋo wiŋiyo gi woro mic gi cowirok ma amito wok bongi ji paran! Raŋo in Eli imiyo yac perin wor loyan aka iyeyo jo kiri poŋo gi adec mabeyo ma cowirok awaŋa ma ji paran miyan!

An Rwoth Were pa Joisiraili oyido atieko cikin kanyacel gi nono perin ni wibino tiyo ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam hongo je; t'onyo pama Rwoth waco kamaler ni gime doko kinyalere. Abino woro jono ma joworan aka jono ma joteran paka ŋatasisiri, abino tero jo paka gima bukony.
Neni! Hongo bino tundo m'abino neko luse yac mathindho peco perin gi i nono perin, ŋey wongoye nyatoro moro ma wok peco perin ma bino tundo i oro ma tiyo.
Wibino bedo i teko to wineno gi waŋ win marac silwany m'abino miyo Joisiraili man, to ongoye kada nyatoro acel wok peco perin ma bino kiyindira cil gi cil.
T'abino koyo nyakwarin acel, aka go bino tiyo ran paka jacway ri Were i wi migam. To waŋe bino tho to ngoye gi geno; aka nyikwayin man je jobino tho malith.
Ka wotin ario, Hofin gi Finehas jotho i ndelo acel, meno bino ridho rin nike gim'atieko waco bino timere.
Abino yero jacway ri Were i wi migam paran m'ogenere, go bino timo gimoro je paka amito. Abino miyo go nyikwaye ma jobino bedo jocway ri Were i wi migam ri kerin paran je m'owir gi mo ma cil gi cil.

Nyikwayin moro je ma joboth jobino kidho bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam no, to jokwayo go pesa gi cemo, aka bende jobino kwayo go woyey jo konyo jocway ri Were i wi migam, ŋey jowonwaŋ gir'acama moro.”
I hongo no munyo jayac Samwiri tiyo ri Rwoth kareno Eli ama nyutho go gir'atima, wac ma wok bongi Rwoth oyido nok, aka kiri menyirok pa Rwoth bende oyido k'obedo gima kisi ndelo.
Wor acel, Eli m'oyido waŋe onyo kinen m'otire nindo i kisika pere,
Samwiri bende oyido nindo i Kabedo Maleŋ kam'oyido Kakan Maleŋ ma Cikirok pa Rwoth nitie iye. Mafodi ŋamba k'oriedo, munyo tala pa Rwoth fodi k'otho,
Rwoth olwoŋo Samwiri, “Samwiri! Samwiri!” To Samwiri dwoko ni, “An e!”
To go ay aka oringo bongi Eli to waco ni, “An e! Kole ilwoŋan” To Eli dwoko go ni, “Akilwoŋin gik inindi.” Ameno to Samwiri gik nindo.
Rwoth doko olwoŋo Samwiri madirio, aka go oay to kidho bongi Eli to waco ni, “An e kole ilwoŋan.” Eli odwoko ni, “Akilwoŋin, wodan, kidhi inindi.”
Samwiri onwaŋo fodi okuya ni oyido obedo Rwoth, rupiri Rwoth oyido fodi k'oluwo ye gi go.
Rwoth doko olwoŋo Samwiri ma didek, aka go oay to kidho bongi Eli to waco ni, “An e, kole ilwoŋan.” Kenyo Eli oniaŋ ni Rwoth ama lwoŋo jayac no.
Ameno Eli owaco rigo ni, “Kidhi inindi, aka ka go doko olwoŋin, wac ni, ‘Luw Rwoth kole ŋeca perin winjo.’ ” Ameno Samwiri ogik nindo.
To Rwoth bino aka ocungo kenyo to lwoŋo go paka con mere ni, “Samwiri! Samwiri” To Samwiri dwoko ni, “Luw Rwoth, kole ŋeca perin winjo.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Samwiri ni, “Neni, acegin timo gimarac swa ri Joisiraili ma nyatoro m'owinji je bino bwok.
I ndelo no abino kelo ri ot pa Eli gir'acula m'atieko luwo kwoŋe, wok i cakirok tundo i gike.
Atieko waco rigo ni alamiyo peco pere gir'acula makicutho ro reco ma go oŋeyo; rupiri wot go joluwo kwoŋan kicar.
Riameno akwoŋo Eli gi peco pere ni ongoye mic kosa cowirok ma bino lwoko woko reco me cil gi cil.”
Samwiri onindo kiri odikin to ay to yawo thigin ma Ot pa Rwoth. Lworo omako go tito ri Eli kwoŋ menyirok me.
Eli to lwoŋo go to waco rigo ni, “Samwiri, wodan!” To go dwoko ni, “Ey jadwoŋ.”
Eli to penjo go ni, “Rwoth owaco rin aŋo? Ikir'ikan gimoro je kwoŋan. Were bino miyin gir'acula matek k'ikiwaco ran gimoro je ma go owaco rin.”
Ameno Samwiri owaco rigo gimoro je m'ongoye gima go okano. To Eli waco ni, “Go obedo Rwoth weyi go wotim gimaber rigo.”
Munyo Samwiri dongo, Rwoth oyido nigi go aka omiyo gimoro je ma go owaco tundo i kare.
Ameno ji je ma piny Isiraili, wok i witum ma piny tundo i man, joŋeyo ni Samwiri oyido obedo jatuci wac Were.
Rwoth omedere nyuthirok i Silo kama go omenyere to luwo iye gi Samwiri. Aka kisi ka Samwiri oluwo, Joisiraili je jowinjo go.
I hongo no, Jofilistia jocokere to jokidho lweny kodi Joisiraili. Joisiraili joay aka jokidho romo gi jo. Joisiraili jocokere kam'ilwoŋo ni Ebeneza aka Jofilistia jocokere kam'ilwoŋo ni Afek.
To Jofilistia jocanere i bol aka jomonjo Joisiraili; lweny olieth swa to Jofilistia jonyalo Joisiraili aka joneko cwo ma romo 4,000 kama lweny obed'iye.

Munyo lweny okwe, to Joisiraili ma joboth jodok Ebeneza, jotel pajo jopenjere ni, “Raŋo Rwoth konon oyeyo Jofilistia nyalo wan! Weyi wakidhi waomi Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth wok Silo, wotel wan aka wobothi wan i cingi jokwor mawan.”

To jomoro jokidho Silo omo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny m'oguro kom pere kama nitie iye cwec ma jobwombi gin. Wot Eli ario, Hofin gi Finehas am'oyido jokur ma Kakan ma Cikirok to bende jobino gine.
Munyo Joisiraili joneno Kakan ma Cikirok otundo, josangala to koko pajo yengo piny.
Munyo Jofilistia jowinjo koko pa Joisiraili, jopenjo ni, “Koko ma malo me i kambi pa Joebulaniya nyutho aŋo?” To munyo joniaŋ nike Kakan ma Cikirok oyido otundo i kambi pajo,
lworo omako Jofilistia aka jowaco ni, “Werin jobino i kambi pajo. Kidamba riwan! Nger gima cale g'ama fodi oyido k'otimere riwan.
Kidamba riwan. Ŋa m'obothi wan wok i cingi werin ma jomeni me! Me werin ma jothumo Jomisir i thim.
Bedi win jomiseni, lweny win paka cwo, Jofilistia! Kakameno, wilalokere ŋecin pa Joebulaniya, paka oyido jobedo ŋecin mawan. Lweny win paka cwo.”
To Jofilistia jolwenyo matek to jonyalo Joisiraili, ma megi joŋweco dok pecin pajo. Joneko Joisiraili mathoth; 30,000.
Jomako Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth; aka wot Eli Hofin gi Finehas oneki jo.
Jal moro ma janono pa Benyamin oringo wok kama lweny oyido timer'iye to tundo Silo i ndelo no won. Ma nyutho rem pere, oyeco woko law pere to konjo fukefuke i wiye.
Eli onwaŋo obedo i kom pere i thengi royo ŋiyo, aka cunye oyido rembo ri Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were. Aka munyo jalo oywoyo wac me i tindi gipi paka rom, kisi nyatoro oywaki i lworo.
Munyo Eli owinjo woy me, openjo ni, “Woy me je ma ginaŋo?” To jalo redo bongi Eli to waco rigo gim'otimere
Eli oyido jaoro piero abuŋwen g'aboro aka waŋe oyido cegin tho
Jalo owaco ri Eli ni, “Akwale wok kama lweny obed'iye t'aringo tundo ka konon me.”
Eli openjo go ni, “Aŋo m'otimere wodan?”
Jalo odwoko Eli ni, “Joisiraili joringo Jofilistia, aka Jofilistia jothumo Joisiraili kweth, wotin Hofin gi Finehas bende oneki jo; aka Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were omaki.”

Tekin jalo tuco Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were, Eli ogore piny gi yu dieŋeye wok i kom kam'oyido obed'iye i thengi royo to ŋute tur to go tho; oyido go oti aka nitie gi del mapek. Go oyido obedo jatel i piny Isiraili ma oro piero aŋwen.
Ciwod Eli, cipa Finehas oyido nitie gi iye, aka oyido cegin nywol. To munyo owinjo ni omaki Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were, aka ni ba cwore kiri gi cwore je jotho, to ŋedi cakere gine to nywol.
Munyo go cegin tho, ji ma jocolo go jowaco rigo ni, “Bedi gi miseni, inywolo nyathi majayac.” To go liŋaliŋa ma k'odwoko gimoro.
Ocwoko ri nyathi nyinge ni Ikabod dwoŋ mere ni, “Dwoŋ pa Were oweyo Joisiraili” Rupiri Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were omaki, aka ba cwore gi cwore je to jotho.
To go waco ni, “Dwoŋ pa Were oweyo Joisiraili rupiri Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were omaki.”
Munyo Jofilistia jomako Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were, jotiŋo wok Ebeneza to jotero i tindi Asidod.
Jotero i ot ma lamo were pajo m'ilwoŋo ni Dagon to joketho cegin gi cal pa were no.
Yawere odikin munyo ji ma Asidod jokidho i ot ma lamo Dagon, jonwaŋo ni Dagon oyido opodho piny gi nyime, ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth. Jotiŋo malo Dagon to jodwoko i kabedo pere.

To munyo jocewi yawere odikin doko jonwaŋo Dagon opodho gi nyime piny ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth. Rume cinge ario je gi wiye oyido jotur to joywore kiri i dhiot; aka nyaka kore kende am'oyido odoŋ.
Meno am'omiyo jocway ri Dagon i wi migam pere kodi jono je ma jolamo go i ot ma lamo go Asidod jokal'akala kenyo ma jokinyon kiri gi konon.
Rwoth omiyo ji ma Asidod gir'acula matek ma bende obwoko jo. Okelo rijo kodi joger pajo akwota kwoŋ.
Munyo ji ma Asidod joneno gim'oyido timere, jowaco ni, “Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth pa Joisiraili kiripi doŋ gi wan; rupiri cingi go pek swa kwoŋ wan kodi Dagon were mawan.”
Ameno jodhiro jomoro bongi rwodhe pa Jofilistia abic to jolwoŋo jo kanyacel to jopenjo jo ni, “Watim aŋo gi Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were pa Joisiraili?”
To rwodhe no jodwoko ni, “Weyi Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were pa Joisiraili woter Gath.” Ameno to jokodo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were pa Joisiraili kenyo.
To munyo Kakan ma Cikirok otundo kenyo, Rwoth omiyo tindi no gir'acula to kelo kirin swa. Omiyo ji ma tindi no gir'acula ma two akwota kwoŋ, nyithindho gi jodongo parom.

Ameno doko jodhiro Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were i tindi pa Jofilistia m'ilwoŋo ni Ekiron; to munyo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were otundo Ekiron, ji ma Ekiron joywak ni, “Jokelo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth pa Joisiraili ka neko wan kiri gi ji mawan.”

Doko to jolwoŋo rwodhe pa Jofilistia kanyacel to jowaco rijo ni, “Dwoki win Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were pa Joisiraili kama ripo ni wobed'iye, wokiri woneki wan gi ji mawan.” Kirin obedo i tindi gipi rupiri Were oyido miyo jo gir'acula mapek.
Kiri ji ma k'otho je two akwota kwoŋ omako jo; to ji ma tindi je joywak ri werin pajo ni jowokony jo.
Jofilistia jokano Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth ma dwe abirio i piny pajo.
Kenyo Jofilistia jolwoŋo jocway ri werin pajo i wi migam kodi jothieth to jopenjo jo ni, “Watim aŋo gi Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth? Waci riwan win ginaŋo ma wadwoki gine i kabedo pere i Isiraili.”

Jono jodwoko ni, “Ka widwoko Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were pa Joisiraili, wikiri widwoki gi cingi win nono, to paka nyalere je, dwoki win gi mic ma kwanyo woko reco mewin. Nyaka wilaboth aka bende wilaŋeyo raŋo go oyido medere miyo win gir'acula.”
Ji jopenjo ni, “Wadhir rigo mic aŋo ma kwanyo woko reco.”

Jodwoko ni, “Cal ma two akwota kwoŋ jo abic m'otimi gi zahabu, kodi cal ma fuko abic m'otimi gi zahabu, kisi acel wocungi ri kisi kere pa Jofilistia abic. Gir'acula me odhir riwin gi kerin mewin abic.
Ameno wiripo yiko cal ma two akwota kwoŋ, kodi cal ma fuko ma kunyo piny mewin, aka wimiy Were pa Joisiraili dwoŋ, poyo nyaka miti go owey miyo win, gi werin mewin, gi piny mewin gir'acula.
Raŋo wimito bedo gi wictek paka Jomisir gi kere pajo Farawo? Munyo Were otieko mieno jo, jok'oweyo Joisiraili to jodok?
Onyo pama yik win magal kodi nyikuse dhok ario m'inyedho ma fodi k'otwey i ŋuti jo majogi to witweyo majogi i ŋuti jo; aka wikwany woko roci mere to widwoko jo i kigo dhok.

Wikwany Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth to wiketho i magal; aka wikethi sanduku m'otiŋo mic ma cal m'otimi gi zahabu ma widhiro rigo ma kwanyo woko reco mewin i thengi Kakan ma Cikirok. Widhir magal, to wiweyo won wokadhi yo pere.

Aka wiriek waŋ win to wineno ka kadho. K'okidhi i piny pere won ma Bethsemes meno nyutho ni Were pa Joisiraili am'okelo kwoŋ wan teko me. To ka k'okadho yukorago, ameno wabino ŋeyo ni go ama k'okelo teko me; t'obedo gim'opodho apodha.”
Jotimo gim'owaci rijo; jokwanyo nyikuse dhok ario m'inyedho no, jotweyo i ŋuti jo majogi, jotweyo jo kwoŋ magal, aka jodwoko roci mere i kigo dhok.
Joketho Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth i magal kanyacel gi sanduku m'otiŋo cal ma two akwota kwoŋ gi cal ma fuko m'otimi gi zahabu.
To nyikuse dhok no jotire gi yo ma kadho Bethsemes aka jokadho tirtir gine ma jok'oweyo royo munyo joywak malomalo. Rwodhe abic pa Jofilistia joluwo jo tundo kiri i kew gi Bethsemes.
I hongo no ji ma Bethsemes oyido jokeco ŋano pajo milelo; to munyo jotiŋo waŋ gin malo to joneno Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth, josangala swa neno go.

Magal no obino to cungo i ndelo pa jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Yosuwa m'oyido bedo Bethsemes cegin gi got madwoŋ. Ji jobaro yen m'oyido oor ma timo magal no, to jothumo nyikuse dhok no to jomiyo Rwoth paka mic awaŋa.
Jolevi joketho piny Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth kodi sanduku m'oyido otiŋo cal m'otimi gi zahabu, aka joketho wi got madwoŋ no. To ji ma Bethsemes jomiyo Rwoth mic awaŋa kodi mic manman.
Rwodhe abic pa Jofilistia joneno jotimo gime, to jomako yo ma dok Ekiron gi ndelo no won.

Me a cal abic ma two akwota kwoŋ m'otimi gi zahabu ma Jofilistia jodhiro ri Rwoth paka mic ma kwanyo woko reco, kisi acel ocungo ri kisi tindi, acel ri Asidod, acel ri Gaza, acel ri Asikelon, acel ri Gath, aka acel ri Ekiron.

Cal ma fuko abic m'otimi gi zahabu ma bende jodhiro, kisi acel ocungo ri kisi rwodhe abic pa Jofilistia ma tindi je m'othok gi cel kodi ma k'othoki gi cel je. Got madwoŋ m'oketh'iye Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth i ndelo pa Yosuwa i Bethsemes fodi nitie ocungo kiri konon me paka jakony ma gim'otimere.
Rwoth oneko cwo piero abirio Bethsemes rupiri joleŋo waŋ gin i Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth. To ji joywak swa rupiri Rwoth oneko ji kweth i dier jo.
Ameno to ji ma Bethsemes jopenjo ni, “Ŋa manyalo cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth, Were maleŋ me? Kune ma wanyalo dhir'iye go ma kwanyo woko go bongi wan?”
To jodhiro jomikwenda bongi ji ma Kiriath Yerim waco rijo ni, “Jofilistia jodwoko Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth. Lori win wibin wiomi widok gine.”
To ji ma Kiriath Yerim jobino omo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth aka jokelo i ot pa Abinadab m'oyido bedo i wi tendere; to joketho gicen wode m'ilwoŋo ni Eliazar bedo jakur ma Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth.
Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth ocowo Kiriath Yerim hongo malac, oro piero ario gipi. I hongo me Joisiraili je joywak ri Rwoth wokonyi jo.

Ameno Samwiri owaco ri Joisiraili je ni, “Ka wigik bongi Rwoth g'adundo mewin je, wiripo ketho gicen werin pa jopath kodi cal pa Asitate were mewin madhako. Miyere win kicutho ri Rwoth aka wilam go kende, aka go labotho win kwoŋ meni pa Jofilistia.”
Ameno Joisiraili joketho gicen cal pa Bal gi Asitate, to jolamo Rwoth kende.
Kenyo to Samwiri lwoŋo Joisiraili je romo gi go Mizipa, ka waco ama: “Alakwayo Rwoth riwin kenyo.”
Jocokere Mizipa aka jotwomo pi moro to jokonjo ri Rwoth paka cowirok, aka joriyo ndelo no gipi. Jowaco ni, “Wanyeko ruwaŋ Rwoth.” Aka Samwiri oyido winjo banjin pa Joisiraili gi Mizipa.
Munyo Jofilistia jowinjo ni Joisiraili jocokere Mizipa, rwodhe abic pa Jofilistia jokidho gi jolweny pajo monjo Joisiraili. Aka munyo Joisiraili jowinjo, lworo omako jo.
To jowaco ri Samwiri ni, “Ywak m'ikikeŋ ri Rwoth Were mawan riwan, wonyali botho wan wok i cingi Jofilistia.”
To Samwiri kwanyo nyathi rombo ma fodi dhoth to miyo Rwoth paka cowirok awaŋa; aka Samwiri oywaki ri Rwoth wokonyi Joisiraili to Rwoth dwoko go.
To munyo nyaka Samwiri miyo cowirok awaŋa no, Jofilistia jocore cegin monjo Joisiraili; to Rwoth mor gi dwonde ma meni wok i polo kwoŋ jo to jonywowere; aka Were omiyo Jofilistia ringo.
To Joisiraili joriemo Jofilistia wok Mizipa tundo kiri Bethkar, k'onyo joneko jo i yo malomalo.
Samwiri okwanyo tele to ketho i dier Mizipa kodi Yesana to lwoŋo ni Ebeneza
Joisiraili jokengila Jofilistia, aka Rwoth doko k'oyeyo jo monjo Joisiraili i lowo pajo i hongo je ma Samwiri otelo Joisiraili.
Tindin je ma Jofilistia oyido jomako i dier Ekiron gi Gath, Rwoth odwoko ri Joisiraili. Aka siem obedo i dier Joisiraili kodi Jokanan.
Samwiri otelo Joisiraili i hongo je m'oyido go fodi kwo.
Kisi oro go oyido wotho thoko Bethel, Gilgal, kodi Mizipa ka winjo banjin pa Joisiraili.
Ka ocowo, go oyido dok Rama kole peco pere oyido nikenyo aka bende oyido go winjo banjin pa ji kenyo. I Rama, go ogeto ri Rwoth migam.
Munyo Samwiri oti, oketho wote paka jothum banja i piny Isiraili.
Wode makayo oyido obedo Yowel, aka mathin oyido ilwoŋo ni Abija; oyido jothumo banja Berseba.
To yac me jok'oluwo royo pa bajo, oyido joworo pesa; ameno joyeyo ji nyewo jo to jothumo banjin m'ongoye tiro.
Kenyo jotel je jocokere kanyacel to jobino bongi Samwiri Rama,
To jowaco rigo ni, “Neni, pama iti, aka yac perin jokiluwi royo perin onyo pama yer riwan kere ma wodhum wan paka piny man.”
Samwiri owinjo marac swa munyo jome jokwayo kere; ameno to go kwayo Rwoth womiy go rieko.
Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Winji gimoro je ma jowaco rin. K'obedo in ama jokwero; to jokwero an bedo kere pajo.
Wok i hongo m'awodho jo wok i piny Misir kiri gi konon jowiro ran dieŋey jo aka jolamo werin man; jotimo rin gima kisi hongo jotimo ran.
Riameno, winji jo, to gwok jo aka ititi rijo nger ma kere pajo bino dhum'iye jo.”
Ameno to Samwiri waco ri jom'oyido mito kere wac je ma Rwoth owaco rigo.
Owaco ni, “Me apaka kere mewin bino dhumo win, go bino loko yac mewin jolweny, megi jolatic i cawila pere ma lweny, megi jolagweyo kayina pere, aka megi jolabedo jokur ma joŋweco yuwiy kayina pere.
Go laloko jomegi jomituka pa jolweny pere i kitipin ma ganin kodi ma piero abic. Jomegi jobino furo i ndelin pere to jokeco ranyak, aka jomegi jobino timo rigo gilweny kodi cumin ma cawila pere.
Go bende bino kwanyo nyir mewin to loko jo joyiki rigo mo maŋwe kur, kodi bedo jotedo pere gi timo rigo mugat.
Go bende bino mayo win ndelin mewin mabeyo ma vini kodi ma nanzi to miyo ŋecin pere.
Go lakwanyo acel wiy apar ma duma kodi nyingi vini mewin to miyo jodhum pere gi ŋecin pere man.
Go lakwanyo ŋecin mewin ma cwo gi mon, gi dhok mewin mabeyo, kodi punde mewin to ketho jo tic rigo.
Go lamito acel wiy apar ma mwendi mewin aka wibino bedo ŋecin pere.
Aka ka hongo no otundi wilakiŋunyaŋunya gi gwayo kwoŋbedo kere mewin ma wiwegi wiyero; to Rwoth kiladwoko win.”
To kad'ameno ji jokwero winjo wac pa Samwiri, to jowaco ni, “Be, wamito kere
ŋey bende wabedi paka piny man, ka kere mawan won bende dhumo wan aka telo wan kidho i lweny mawan.”
Samwiri owinjo gimoro je ma jowaco to kidho waco ri Rwoth.
To Rwoth waco rigo ni, “Winji gimoro je ma jowaco, aka imiy jo kere.” Kenyo Samwiri owaco ri Joisiraili je dok peco.
Obedo jal moro m'oŋaŋ aka jamaker ma wok i nono pa Benyamin, nyinge oyido Kisi. Go oyido wod pa Abiel aka nyakwar Zeror; aka nywole i ot pa Bekorath, adec ma nono pa Afiya.
Kisi oyido nigi wode m'ilwoŋo ni Saulo, m'oyido jayac maŋon swa. Ŋono pere oyido kipimere gi nyatoro moro je ma Isiraili aka oyido bende go loyo ji je ma Isiraili i boro.
Ndelo acel, punde pa Kisi jorwenyo. Kisi owaco ri wode Saulo ni, “Kwany acel kwoŋ ŋecin wikidhi wirangi punde.”
Joluwo gi piny matendere tendere Efrayim iy'adec ma Salisa to jok'onwaŋo punde. Ameno joluwo iy'adec ma Salim to punde oyido jongoye kenyo. To joluwo iy'adec ma Benyamin, to je jok'onwaŋo punde.
Munyo jotundo iy'adec m'ilwoŋo ni Zuf, Saulo owaco ri ŋeca pere ni, “Weyi wadok peco, ka k'obedo ameno baba nyalo weyo rembo ri punde to cako rembo riwan.”

Ŋeca no odwoko Saulo ni, “Neni, nitie nyatoro pa Were i tindi me, aka iworo go swa rupiri gima go waco je bedo adieri. Weyi wakidhi bonge, aka kono go nyalo waco riwan kama wanyalo nwaŋo iye punde no.”
Saulo openjo ŋeca pere ni, “To ka wakidho bonge, aŋo ma walatero rigo? Mugat mawan m'oyido watiŋo orumo, aka wangoye gi mic ma wanyalo tero rigo. Aŋo ma wanitie gine?”
Ŋeca no odwoko Saulo ni, “Anitie gi nyaka penzi moro ka; alamiyo go to waco riwan kama wanyalo nwaŋ'iye punde.”

Con mere i piny Isiraili, ka nyatoro okidho penjo kwoŋ Were, oyido waco ni, “Biye, weyi wakadhi bongi jawaci gima bino yuwaŋe.” Kole ŋata pama ilwoŋo ni jatuci wac Were con mere oyido ilwoŋo ni jawaci gima bino timere yuwaŋe.
To Saulo waco ri ŋeca pere ni, “Meno paro maber! Biye wakadhi.” Ameno to jokadho i tindi kama nyatoro pa Were oyido nitie iye.
Munyo fodi joidho tendere ma kidho i tindi no, joromo gi nyir mogo mafoth munyo jokidho kulo. To jopenjo jo ni, “Janeno nitie i tindi?”

Nyir no jodwoko ni, “Ey go nitie. Go otelo yu wiwin. Ka wiredo wilamako go. Tekin widonjo i tindi won ama wilanwaŋo go. Go nyaka obino i tindi pama won me, rupiri ji konon jokidho miyo cowirok i kacowirok. Ji m'olwoŋ jok'ocak cemo cuka go tundo rupiri go ripo kutho kwayo Were womiy cowirok silwany. Ka wikidho pama, wilaneno go mafodi go k'okidho cemo i kacowirok.”
Ameno Saulo gi ŋeca pere jokidho i tindi; aka munyo nyaka jodonjo i tindi, joneno Samwiri munyo bino yubongi jo munyo go oyido wotho kidho i kacowirok.
Oyido paka nyoro mere mafodi Saulo k'obino, Rwoth oyido otieko waco ri Samwiri ni

“Dikin kapa sawa me aladhiro rin nyatoro ma wok i nono pa Benyamin, iwir go gi mo bedo kere pa ji paran Isiraili. Go bino botho ji paran wok i cingi Jofilistia. Atieko neno candirok pa ji paran aka atieko winjo ywak pajo ri kony.”
Munyo Samwiri oneno Saulo, Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Me a jal ma nyoro aluwo rin kwoŋe! Go ama bino dhumo ji paran.”
Kenyo to Saulo kidho bongi Samwiri m'oyido nitie cegin gi waŋkac, to penjo ni, “Waci ran nikune ot pa jawaci gima bino yuwaŋe?”

To Samwiri dwoko go ni, “Aŋat'abedo jawaci gima bino yuwaŋe; kadhi win yuwiyan i kacowirok. Wijario je konon wilacemo kanyacel kodan; aka dikin odikin alawaco riwin gima nitie i paro mewin t'aweyo wikadho.
To wikiri wirembi ri punde mewin ma jorwenyo ndelo adek yucen; rupiri jocowo nwaŋirok. Aka ŋa ma Joisiraili joyenyo swa? Ka k'obedo in kodi ot pa benin?”
Saulo odwoko ni, “An ajanono pa Benyamin, nono mathin loyo kwoŋ nonin je i Isiraili, aka peco mawan ama sisiri swa i nono pa Benyamin; to raŋo iluwo kodan i nger me?”
Kenyo to Samwiri kwanyo Saulo kodi ŋeca pere to tero jo i kisika madwoŋ to miyo jo kabedo yuwiy ji piero adek m'oyido olwoŋi.
To Samwiri waco ri jatedo ni, “Keli adec ma riŋo ma nende amiyin t'awaco rin ni ikethi gicen.”

Ameno to jatedo kwanyo bat dhiaŋ kodi adec ma luwo bat to ketho ruwaŋ Samwiri. To Samwiri waco ri Saulo ni, “Neni, gim'oyido okethi gicen okethi ruwaŋin. Cami; rupiri oyido okan rin tundo i hongo m'oyerere, ŋey inyal cemo gi wendo.”
I ndelo no to Saulo cemo kanyacel gi Samwiri.
Munyo joloro wok i kacowirok, to jogik i tindi, opedhi ri Saulo kanindo i wi ot to go nindo.
Munyo piny oyawere, Samwiri olwoŋo Saulo wok i wi ot ni, “Ay malo, aka aweyin ikadhi yo perin.” To Saulo ay, aka go gi Samwiri joluwo royo acel.
Munyo jotundo i kew ma tindi, Samwiri owaco ri Saulo ni, “Waci ri ŋeca perin otel yuwiy wan, aka ka go ocowo kadhi, icungi ma hongo moro, ŋey awaci rin gima Were owaco.”

Kenyo to Samwiri kwanyo mo aka okonjo i wi Saulo, ocwiyo lembe aka owaco rigo ni, “Rwoth otieko wirin gi mo paka jadhum pa Joisiraili. Ibino dhumo ji pa Rwoth aka ilabotho jo wok i cingi jokwor pajo je. Aka me a ranyuth ma bino ridho rin ni Rwoth otieko wirin gi mo dhumo ji pere Isiraili.

K'itieko pokirok kwoŋan konon, ilaromo gi cwo ario cegin gi kaliel pa Laker i tindi Zela iy'adec pa Benyamin, aka jolawaco rin ni punde m'oyido ikidho rango otiek nwaŋo, aka benin onyo oweyo rembo kwoŋ punde onyo rembo rin ayin. Go penjo ni, ‘Anotim aŋo nyaka anwaŋ wodan?’

Wok kenyo k'imedere woth t'itundo i tiendi yath maleŋ i Tabor, ilaromo gi cwo adek ma jokidho lamo Were i Bethel. Acel otiŋo nyithindhi diegi, acel otiŋo mugat adek, aka acel otiŋo pien dhiaŋ m'opoŋ'iye vini.
Cwo no jolamothin to jomiyin mugat ario, m'iripo jolo wok i cingi jo.

Wok kenyo ilatundo i Kabedo Maleŋ ma lamo Were i Gibeya kama jolweny pa Jofilistia jocoker'iye. Aka ka nyaka idonjo i tindi, ilaromo gi kitipa pa jotuci wac Were ma joloro wok i kacowirok; aka jonitie gi tongol, bunde, madundo, kodi kongo jokoko malo, aka jomielo.
Piyo piyo cuny pa Rwoth bino loro kwoŋin i meni, aka in bende ibino cako koko malo ka i mielo kanyacel gi jo. Cuny pa Rwoth bino wirin to wiro kwo perin.
Ka gigipiny me je otieko timere, tim gimoro je ma ripo ni itimi rupiri Rwoth nitie kodin.
Aka ibino loro itel yuwiyan ikadhi Gilgal t'ikuran ma ndelo abirio cuka anobin rupiri abino romo kodin miyo cowirok awaŋa kodi cowirok ma siem.”
Munyo Saulo owire pokirok gi Samwiri, Were owiro adundo pere; aka gigipiny ma Samwiri owaco rigo je otundo i kare ndelo no won.
Munyo Saulo kodi ŋeca pere jotundo Gibeya, joromo gi kitipa pa jotuci wac Were. Kenyo won cuny pa Rwoth oloro kwoŋ go i meni to go bende cako koko malo ka mielo gi jo.
Munyo jom'oyido joŋeyo Saulo con mere joneno paka go oyido mielo aka koko malo gi jotuci wac Were, jopenjere ni, “Aŋo m'omonjo wod pa Kisi! Saulo bende onyo ti olokere jatuci wac Were!”
Jal moro ma wok iy'adec no openjo ni, “Aka jotuci wac Were me, wiŋeyo bacere pajo!” Me apaka ocaki waco ni, “Kiri Saulo je olokere jatuci wac Were!”
Munyo Saulo otieko koko malo gi miel, okidho i kacowirok.
Ner Saulo openjo Saulo gi ŋeca pere kenyo ni, “Wiwok kune?”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Wawok rango punde; aka munyo wakinwaŋo jo, wakidho bongi Samwiri.”
Ner Saulo openjo go ni, “Aka Samwiri owaco rin aŋo?”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Go owaco riwan ni punde otiek nwaŋo.” Saulo k'owaco ri ner mere gima Samwiri owaco rigo ma mako kwoŋ go lokirok kere.
Rumacen Samwiri olwoŋo ji je romo gi Rwoth Mizipa.
To go waco ri Joisiraili ni, “Me a gima Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco, ‘Akwanyo win wok Misir t'abotho win wok i cingi Jomisir kodi ji man je m'oyido jodiyo win.’
To konon me wikwero Were mewin ma botho win wok i teko gi dinyo je; to wiwaco ni, ‘Be! Miy wan kere.’ Pama onyo wijoje cokere win ruwaŋ Rwoth luwo i nono kodi ude.”
To Samwiri kelo nonin je to Were yero nono pa Benyamin.
