Kenyo to doko Samwiri kelo kisi ot je ma nono pa Benyamin to Were yero ot pa Matri. To doko Samwiri kelo cwo je ma ot pa Matri, to Were yero Saulo. To munyo jorango Saulo jok'onwaŋo go.
To jopenjo Rwoth ni, “Nitie doko jacwo man?”
To Rwoth dwoko ni, “Saulo dicade opondo kabuti kakano gilweny.”
Ameno joŋweco to jokelo go; aka munyo go ocungo i dier ji, go oyido bor loyo ji je wok i bade kadho malo.
Samwiri to waco ri ji je ni, “Me a jacwo ma Rwoth oyero. Ongoye ŋatiman ma cale go kwoŋ wan.”
To ji je jokoko malo ni, “Yindira kere.”
Samwiri otito ri ji je gima ripo bedo apa kere kodi tic pa kere; to ndiko je i kitawo aka oketho ruwaŋ Rwoth. To Samwiri sewila ji to waco rijo dok pecin pajo.
Saulo bende odok peco pere i Gibeya. Cwo moro ma jomeni ma Were oyido otieko geyo adundo pajo bende to jodok gi go.
To cwo moro ma bukony jopenjo ni, “Jame bende nyalo nedi botho wan?” Jocayo go, aka jokwero kelo rigo mic; to Saulo liŋaliŋa.
Munyo dwe ma romo acel okadho, Nahas Jaamon okidho to mako tindi Yabes Giliad. To ji ma Yabes jowaco rigo ni, “Tim kodi wan cikirok, aka wabino bedo ŋecin perin.”
Nahas odwoko ni, “Alatimo gi win cikirok ka wiyere ni, afudhi waŋ kisi nyatoro moro je maracuc ŋey akel wickwot ri Isiraili gipi.”
To jotel ma Yabes jowaco rigo ni, “Miy wan ndelo abirio wadhir jomikwenda Isiraili paka rom; k'ongoye ŋata nyalo botho wan, to wamiyere rin.”
Munyo jomikwenda jotundo Gibeya, kama Saulo oyido bed'iye, jowaco ri ji gime; aka ji je jogoyo ndur to joywak.
Saulo oyido nyaka owok i ndelo fur dwoko gi megikwe pere, to penjo ni, “Aŋo marac? Raŋo ji joywak?” T'iwaco rigo gima jomikwenda ma jowok Yabes jowaco.
Munyo Saulo owinjo gime, cuny pa Rwoth opie kwoŋe, aka omako keme.

Saulo omako megikwe pere ario, othumo jo i muma to oro jomikwenda wotho gi jo i piny Isiraili paka rom ka jowaco ni, “Me a gima latimere ri megikwe pa ŋatimoro je m'okwer luwo Saulo gi Samwiri kidho i lweny.”
To Rwoth miyo Joisiraili je lworo, aka joje jomakere kanyacel.
Saulo ocoko jo i tindi Bezek, aka oyido joromo ji 300,000 wok Isiraili kodi 30,000 wok Yuda.
To jowaco ri jomikwenda ma jowok Yabes ni, “Waci win ri ji mewin ni dikin mafodi k'otundo sawa aucel m'odieceŋ, ibino botho win.” Munyo ji ma Yabes jowinjo mikwenda me, josangala swa.
Ameno to ji ma Yabes jowaco ri Nahas ni, “Dikin walamiyere rin, aka itim gi wan gima cunyin mito.”

Wor no Saulo opoko jolweny pere i kitipin adek, aka munyo piny yawere jokidho to jomonjo Joamon kam'oyido jocokere iye. Joneko Joamon kweth tundo sawa aucel, aka ma joboth jokedhere kicar, kisi nyatoro to ŋweco.
Joisiraili jopenjo ni, “Nikune cwo ma jowaco ni Saulo kinyal bedo kere mawan? Keli win jo ŋey waneki jo.”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Ongoye ŋati m'ilaneko konon me, rupiri konon obedo ndelo ma Rwoth obotho iye Isiraili.”
To Samwiri waco ni, “Biye win, wakadhi Gilgal, aka kenyo waridhi Saulo paka kere mawan.”
Ameno joje jokadho Gilgal, aka kenyo jokwoŋo Saulo paka kere ruwaŋ Rwoth. Kenyo to jomiyo cowirok ma siem ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka Saulo gi ji je ma Isiraili jofore swa.
To Samwiri waco ri Joisiraili ni, “Neni, atieko timo riwin gim'oyido wimito, aka amiyo win kere dhumo win.
Neni, onyo kere ama pama telo win; an onyo ati anitie gi lwar, aka yac paran jonitie gi win. Atieko telo win wok i soye paran tundo gunyo ni.

To onyo pama an e segeya win an ruwaŋ Rwoth, kodi ruwaŋ kere ma go oyero: Akwalo ye dhiaŋ, kosa punda pa nyatoro moro? Nitie ŋat'atieko kwalo kosa diyo? Nitie nyatoro m'ocowo nyewan ye ma umo waŋan? Ka nitie kwoŋ gigipiny me m'atieko timo, abino dwoko gimoro je m'akwanyo.”
Ji jodwoko ni, “Be, fodi ikikwalo, kosa idiyo wan, kosa ikwanyo gimoro kwoŋ kada ŋat'acel.”
Samwiri odwoko ni, “Rwoth kodi kere ma go oyero jobedo jokony paran konon ni ongoye gimarac m'atimo.”
To Joisiraili jodwoko ni, “Rwoth obedo jakony mawan.”
Samwiri omedere waco ri Joisiraili ni, “Rwoth obedo jakony, rupiri go oyero Musa kodi Aron to jowodho kwarere mewin wok i piny Misir.
To onyo pama cungi win liŋ, ŋey asegeya win ruwaŋ Rwoth k'apoyo win gir'aura ma Rwoth otimo ma botho win gi kwarere mewin.
Munyo Yakobo gi peco pere jokidho Misir to Jomisir jodiyo jo, kwarere pajo joywak ri Rwoth aka Rwoth ooro Musa kodi Aron wodho jo wok piny Misir, aka omiyo jo lowo me.
To wiy gin wil gi Rwoth Were pajo, to Rwoth jwango jo i cingi Sisera, jamituka pa jolweny pa Yabin kere ma tindi Hazor, kodi i cingi Jofilistia, kodi i cingi kere pa Jomowab; to jolwenyo gi jo
To joywak ri Rwoth, aka jowaco ni, ‘Watimo reco, rupiri wakwero Rwoth, to walamo Bal gi Asitate; t'onyo pama both wan i cingi jokwor mawan ŋey walamin.’
To Rwoth oro Yerubal m'ilwoŋo ni Gideon, Barak, Yefitha, kodi an Samwiri, to botho win wok i cingi jokwor mewin wok i kisi thenge; to wibedo i siem.
To munyo wineno Nahas kere ma Amon cegin monjo win, wiwaco ran ni, ‘Be, wamito kere ma wodhum wan.’ Kole Rwoth, Were mewin oyido obedo kere mewin.
Onyo ee kere mewin ma wiyero, ma ro go wikwayo. Neni, Rwoth otieko miyo win kere wodhum win.
Ka winolwor Rwoth, to wilamo go, to wiwinjo dwonde, to wiluwo or pere, aka ka win gi kere ma dhumo win winoluw Rwoth Were mewin, kisi gimoro je labedo maber gi win.
To ka wik'owinji dwondi Rwoth, to wikwero luwo or pere, cingi go labedo kwoŋ win gi kere mewin.
Riameno, cungi win liŋ winen gigipiny madongo ma Rwoth kidho timo i waŋ win.
Me k'obedo hongo ma keco ŋano? Alakwayo Rwoth, ni wodhiri derino ma koth gi koth; aka nyaka wibino ŋeyo ni kidakana mewin dwoŋ, ma witimo ruwaŋ Rwoth, munyo wikwayo go miyo win kere.”
Ameno to Samwiri kwayo Rwoth, aka Rwoth odhiro derino ma koth gi koth ndelo no won; to ji je jolworo Rwoth kodi Samwiri.
To Joisiraili jowaco ri Samwiri ni, “Kway riwan Rwoth Were perin, ŋey wakiri watho; rupiri wamedo i wi reco mawan raco me, munyo wakwayo kere.”
Samwiri odwoko ni, “Wikiri wilwor; kada witieko timo reco me je, wikiri wiwey lworo Rwoth, to tiyi win rigo g'adundo mewin je.
Wikiri wirangi cal m'ongoye kony wilam rupiri jokinyal botho aka jobedo gigipiny m'ongoye.
Rwoth kilabolo ji pere woko, ma miyo nyingi go dwoŋ, rupiri osangala Rwoth loko win ji pere.
To ri an, Rwoth ogeŋan timo reco, t'aweyo kwayo riwin; kwanyo woko alafonjo win royo maber m'otire.
Nyaka lwor win Rwoth, to witiyo rigo gi genirok g'adundo mewin je; poyi win gigipiny madongo ma go otieko timo riwin.
To ka wimedere i kidakana mewin, win kiri gi kere mewin je, ibino reyo win woko.”
Munyo iloko Saulo kere, oro pere oyido k'oŋeyere, aka go odhumo Isiraili ma hongo macek.

Saulo oyero cwo 3,000 aka odhiro ma jodoŋ dok peco; aka cwo 2,000 kwoŋ jono jodoŋ gi go Mikmas kodi i piny matendere tendere Bethel, to oro cwo 1,000 gi Wode Yonathan kidho Gibeya, iy'adec pa Benyamin.
Yonathan okengila jomituka jolweny pa Jofilistia m'oyido jonitie i Geba; to Jofilistia je jowinjo gime. Saulo ooro jomikwenda kudho gwara i piny Isiraili paka rom lwoŋo Joebulaniya kidho i lweny.
Munyo Joisiraili jowinjo ni Saulo okengila jamituka mapa jolweny pa Jofilistia, aka ni Joisiraili oyido jolokere marac ruwaŋ Jofilistia, joyeyo lwoŋo kidho riwirok gi Saulo i Gilgal.
To Jofilistia jocokere lweny gi Joisiraili; oyido jonitie gi cawila ma lweny 30,000 cwo ma jogweyo kayina 1,000 kodi jolweny kweth. Jokidho to jocokere Mikmas, yuthenge ma wok ceŋ ma Bethaven.
Jofilistia jomonjo Joisiraili matek, to jomiyo jo lworo. Joisiraili man jopondo i ŋungin, i kerin, i tiendi gote, i buce, kodi i jwombe;
Aka jomegi joŋado malawa Yordan to jopor iy'adec ma Gad kodi Giliad.
Saulo oyido fodi nitie i Gilgal, aka ji m'oyido jonitie gi go jokirin gi lworo.
Saulo okuro Samwiri i Gilgal ma ndelo abirio paka Samwiri oyido owaco rigo, to Samwiri oyido fodi k'obino. To ji jocako kedhirok weyo Saulo.
To Saulo waco ni, “Keli ran win cowirok awaŋa, kodi cowirok ma siem.” To go miyo cowirok awaŋa.
To munyo nyaka go cegin cowo miyo cowirok awaŋa, Samwiri otundo. Saulo okidho to jolo Samwiri.
Samwiri openjo go ni, “Aŋo m'itimo?”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Munyo aneno ji jokedhere kwoŋan, aka oyido fodi ikibino i ndelo m'oyido iciko; aka kiri Jofilistia oyido jocokere Mikmas,
t'awaco ni, ‘Jofilistia jokidho monjan i Gilgal ka aka fodi akikwayo silwany wok bongi Rwoth.’ Ameno aromere miyo cowirok an won.”
Samwiri odwoko Saulo ni, “Itimo gimiŋo; ikiluwo or pa Rwoth Were perin, ma go omiyin; bedi nende iluw or pa Rwoth, dinyo go oweyo nyikwayin to jodhumo Isiraili cil gi cil.
To paka ikiluwo or pere, dhum perin k'omedere. Rwoth otieko rango jacwo ma kacunye; aka oyero go dhumo ji pere.”
Samwiri oay i Gilgal to kidho Gibeya iy'adec pa Benyamin.
To Saulo kwano jolweny pere m'oyido jonitie bonge to nwaŋo ni joromo cwo 600.
Saulo, gi wode Yonathan, kodi cwo m'oyido jonitie gi jo jocokere Geba iy'adec pa Benyamin; to Jofilistia jocokere Mikmas.
Jolweny pa Jofilistia joay kam'oyido jocokere iye to jokidho monjo Joisiraili i kitipin adek; kitipa acel jokidho yo Ofira iy'adec ma Suwal,
kitipa man jokidho yo Bethhoron, to man jokidho yo got m'oŋiyere kodi milelo ma Zeboyim yuthim.
I hongo no oyido jothedhi gigipiny jongoye i piny Isiraili gipi rupiri Jofilistia oyido jokimiti Joebulaniya oro ndijo no ma cwogo abor gi toŋ.
To oyido ka Joisiraili jomito pako kwe dhok, kosa kwe acingi, kosa le, kosa ringin pajo, oyido joloro to jokidho bongi Jofilistia.
Pako kwe dhok gi kwe acingi oyido penzi acel mathin, aka pako le gi yiko pingo oyido penzi ario.
Ameno i ndelo ma lweny, jolweny pa Joisiraili oyido ongoye manitie kodi toŋ kosa toŋ kwanyo woko Saulo kodi wode Yonathan.
Jofilistia jooro kitipa pa jolweny pajo kuro ger ma Mikmas.
Ndelo acel, Yonathan owaco ri jago pere ni, “Biye, wapor wakadhi i kambi pa Jofilistia.” To go k'owaco ri Saulo.
Saulo oyido nitie gi cwo 600 i tipo ma tiendi pomo cegin gi Gibeya i tindi Migron.

Jacway ri Were i wi migam m'ilwoŋo ni Ahija, wod pa Ahitub omin Ikabod, m'oyido wod pa Finehas, aka nyakwar Eli, m'oyido jacway ri Were i wi migam Silo, am'oyido otiŋo gim'ioro ma ŋeyo mito pa Were. To jolweny jok'oŋeyo ni Yonathan oyido okadho.
I ger ma Yonathan oyido ripo luwo aka ŋey wotundi i kambi pa Jofilistia, oyido nitie gote ario mabith kisi acel i thenge acel. Acel oyido ilwoŋo ni Bozez aka man ni Sene.
Acel oyido nitie yumalo mager m'oŋiyere gi Makimas aka man yupiny oŋiyere gi Geba.
Yonathan owaco ri jago m'otiŋo gilweny pere ni, “Biye wakidhi i kambi pa Jofilistia ma jok'othumere me. Nyalo bedo ni Rwoth lakonyo wan; rupiri ongoye gima dhiero Rwoth botho wan kada waj'ario.”
Jago pa Yonathan odwoko ni, “Tim gima cunyin mito je; neni, anitie kodin kanyacel. Paka paro perin nitie apaka aparan bende nitie.”
Yonathan odwoko ni, “Neni, walapor to wakidho wacungo kama Jofilistia joneno iye wan.
Ka jowaci riwan ni, ‘Kur wan wabin bongi win.’ Walacungo liŋ, aka wakilakidho malo bongi jo.
To ka jowaco riwan ni, ‘Biye win malo bongi wan.’ Nyaka wabino kidho malo; rupiri Rwoth omiyo jo i cingi wan. Aka me bino bedo ranyuth mawan.”
To jario jonyuthere ri Jofilistia; aka Jofilistia jowaco ni, “Neni! Joebulaniya moro jowok i bur kam'oyido jopond'iye!”
To jolwoŋo Yonathan gi jago pere ni, “Biye win malo ka bongi wan, aka walanyutho win gimoro.”
Yonathan owaco ri jago pere ni, “Luwan; Rwoth omiyo jo i cingi Isiraili.”
To Yonathan gi jago pere jokidho malo wok i ger gi cingi jo kodi tiendi jo. Yonathan omonjo Jofilistia redho joje piny to jago pere neko jo.
I neki marapena no Yonathan gi jago pere joneko cwo piero ario iy'adec ma romo adec eka.
Kirin obedo i kambi pa Jofilistia, piny gipi, gi i dier Jofilistia je, jolweny gi jokinyaga m'oyido jocokere jokirin gi lworo; piny oyengere, to kirin bedo madwoŋ.
Munyo cwo pa Saulo joŋiyo to joneno Gibeya iy'adec pa Benyamin, joneno Jofilistia joringo i nyawin.
To Saulo waco ri jolweny pere m'oyido jonitie bonge ni, “Kwan win jolweny winwaŋ ŋat'ongoye ka.” Jotimo ameno to jonwaŋo nike Yonathan kodi jago pere oyido jongoye.
To Saulo waco ri Ahija ni, “Keli Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were.” I ndelo no Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were oyido nitie bongi Joisiraili.
Munyo nyaka Saulo fodi luwo gi jacway ri Were i wi migam, nyawin omedere i kambi pa Jofilistia; aka Saulo owaco ri jacway ri Were i wi migam ni, “Hongo ongoye ma penjo mito pa Were.”
To Saulo gi cwo pere joŋanjo kidho lweny gi Jofilistia, m'oyido wegi jonekere i nyawin.
Aka kiri Joebulaniya m'oyido joriwere gi Jofilistia i thenge pajo je jogik to joriwere gi Saulo kodi Yonathan.
I nger acel Joisiraili m'oyido jopondo i tendere ma Efrayim munyo jowinjo ni Jofilistia oyido joringo, bende joriwere i lweny.
Ameno to Rwoth botho Joisiraili ndelo no; aka lweny okalo kiri Bethaven.

Joisiraili oyido meni oloyo jo ro kec ndelo no rupiri Saulo oyido okwoŋo ji, munyo waco ni, “Were wolam nyatoro moro je m'ocem mafodi piny k'oyutho, mafodi akiculo jokwor paran.” To ngoye ŋat'ocemo ndelo no gipi.
Jotundo i lule; aka jonwaŋo mo kic kisi kamoro.
Munyo jodonjo i lule, joneno mo kic munyo oy aoya, aka ongoye ŋat'oketho cinge i dhoke rupiri oyido jolworo kwoŋirok pa Saulo.
Yonathan oyido k'owinjo munyo bamere tisa ji gi kwoŋirok no; ameno go ocwayo luth pere m'oyido otiŋo i cinge aka olutho i od kic, to camo mo kic. Kenyo meni odwoko kwoŋe.
To acel kwoŋ jolweny waco ri Yonathan ni, “Wajoje meni oloyo wan aka kec neko wan, rupiri benin otisa wan ni, ‘Were olam ŋatimoro je m'ocem konon me.’ ”
Yonathan odwoko ni, “Baba otimo gimarac swa ri ji mawan! Neni paka an onyo meni odwoko ran munyo atieko camo mo kic.
To bedi nende jolweny mawan jocam cemo ma jokwanyo munyo jokengila Jofilistia, par kwoŋ Jofilistia ma dinyo waneko!”
I ndelo no Joisiraili jokengila Jofilistia, makada nende kec oyido neko jo. Aka lweny ocako Mikmas tundo Ayijalon.
Joisiraili joredo i gigipiny ma jomayo Jofilistia, jokwanyo rombo gi megikwe gi nyithindhi dhok to joneko kenyo won aka jocamo manumu.
Nyatoro moro owaco ri Saulo ni, “Neni ji perin jonyeko ruwaŋ Rwoth rupiri jocamo riŋo manumu.”
Saulo ogoyo ndur ni, “Wijocami sereko, ŋili win tele madwoŋ bongan ka.”

To Saulo doko miyo cik ni, “Kidhi win bongi ji wiwaci rijo jowokeli ka rombo gi dhok pajo. Kisi nyatoro wokel ka rombo gi dhiaŋ pere wothum to camo gi ka. Jokiri jowonyeki ruwaŋ Rwoth gi camo riŋo manumu” Ameno to kisi nyatoro kelo dhiaŋ pere to thumo kenyo wor no.
To Saulo geto ri Rwoth migam, aka meno obedo marapena Saulo geto ri Rwoth migam.
Saulo owaco ri jolweny pere ni, “Weyi walor win wakadhi wamonji Jofilistia wor me, wareyi jo je kiri odikin.”
To jodwoko ni, “Tim gim'iparo ni ber rin.”
To jacway ri Were i wi migam waco ni, “Weyi kutho wapenji mito pa Were.”
To Saulo penjo Were ni, “Ka wamonjo Jofilistia, inomiy wakengila jo?” To Were k'odwoko ndelo no.
To Saulo waco ri jotel pa ji ni, “Biye win ka wirangi reco ma watimo konon.
Akwoŋere ruwaŋ Rwoth makwo, ma botho Joisiraili, ni ŋat'otimo reco no bino tho, makada nende bedi ni go, wodan Yonathan.” To ngoye nyatoro m'odwoko go.
To Saulo waco rijo ni, “Cungi win kenyo, aka an gi Yonathan wacungi ka.”
To jodwoko ni, “Tim gim'iparo ni ber rin.”
To Saulo waco ni, “Yer i dier an gi wodan Yonathan ŋatarac.” To Yonathan ama wok paka ŋatarac.
To Saulo penjo Yonathan ni, “Waci ran gim'itimo.”
To Yonathan waco rigo ni, “Alutho luth paran m'oyido atiŋo i cingan i od kic t'acamo mo kic. An e ayikere tho.”
Saulo owaco ri Yonathan ni, “Were wonekan k'inen k'onekin.”

To jolweny jowaco ri Saulo ni, “Adieri ilaneko Yonathan m'oturo lweny madwoŋ me ri Joisiraili? Be! Wakwoŋere ruwaŋ Rwoth makwo ni go k'orweny kada ye wiye acel. Gima go otimo konon me obedo ro kony pa Were.” Ameno ji jobotho Yonathan tho.
Kenyo to Saulo weyo riemo Jofilistia, aka Jofilistia jodok iy'adec pajo.
Munyo Saulo olokere kere pa Joisiraili, olwenyo gi jokwor pere je i kisi thenge: Ji ma Mowab, ma Amon, kodi ma Edom, kerin ma Zoba, kodi Filistia. Kisi kama go olweny'iye je, okengila jo.
Go olwenyo gi miseni, aka okengila kiri jolweny pa Joamalek. Go obotho Joisiraili kwoŋ jono je ma jotemo monjo jo aka jonyaga gigipiny pajo.
Wot Saulo jobedo, Yonathan, Isivi, gi Malikisua. Nyare madwoŋ oyido ilwoŋo ni Merab, aka mathin ni Mikal.
Cege oyido ilwoŋo ni Ahinowam, nyar jal m'ilwoŋo ni Ahimaz; aka jamituka pa jolweny pere oyido ilwoŋo ni Abuner, wod pa Ner m'oyido obedo ner Saulo.
Ba Saulo Kisi kodi ba Abuner Ner, oyido jobedo wot jal m'ilwoŋo ni Abiel.
I hongo je ma Saulo odhumo Joisiraili, olwenyo gi Jofilistia noknok. Aka kisi ka Saulo oneno jacwo ma jamisen aka jameni, orwako go bedo jalweny pere.
Go kidho miyo Joamalek gir'acula rupiri kwarere pajo jok'oyere gi Joisiraili ndir munyo jowok i piny Misir.
Kidhi imonji Joamalek, aka isika woko gigipiny pajo je ma jonitie gine. Ikir'iwey kada gimoro acel; neki cwo, mon, nyithindho, kodi ma fodi jodhoth, dhok, rombo, kayina, gi punde.”
Saulo olwoŋo jolweny pere je to kwano jo i tindi Telem; oyido jonitie jolweny 200,000 ma Joisiraili, kodi 10,000 ma jo wok Yuda.
To Saulo kodi jolweny pere jokidho i tindi pa Joamalek, aka jopondo milelo.
Saulo owaco ri Jokena ni, “Eye win wingoye bongi Joamalek, akir'aneki win kanyacel gi jo; kwoŋbedo cango wimako gi Joisiraili wor munyo jowok i piny Misir.” To Jokena jongoye bongi Joamalek.
To Saulo kengila Joamalek, wok iy'adec ma Havila tundo Sur, yuwok ceŋ ma Misir.
Go omako kere pa Joamalek makwo, aka osika ji je gi lew toŋ.
To Saulo gi jolweny pere joweyo Agag makwo, aka jok'oneko rombo, dhok, nyithindhi dhok, kodi nyithindhi rombo mabeyo, kodi gimoro je m'oyido ber. To josika woko gigipiny je ma bukony kodi ma bu cwe.
Rwoth oluwo wac pere won ri Samwiri ni,
“Arem raŋo aloko Saulo kere; rupiri go otieko ngoye woko bongan oweyo luwan, aka k'oluwo or paran.” To Samwiri mako nge, aka wor gipi oywaki ri Rwoth.

Yawere odikin Samwiri okidho bongi Saulo. Nyatoro moro owaco rigo ni Saulo oyido okadho i tindi Kamel, kama go oyido oget'iye gi telin gim'ibino poyo gine go ma kikengila Joamalek; aka wok kenyo go oyido omedere kadhi Gilgal.
Samwiri obino kiri bongi Saulo, to Saulo m'otho go, ka waco ama: “Rwoth womiyin silwany, Samwiri! Atieko timo gima Rwoth oyido mito.”
Samwiri openjo Saulo ni, “To raŋo doko awinjo dhok gi rombo joywak?”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Jolweny paran jonyaga wok bongi Joamalek. Joweyo dhok gi rombo mabeyo ma miyo Rwoth Were perin cowirok, aka m'odoŋ je wasika woko.”
To Samwiri waco ri Saulo ni, “Alawaco rin gima Rwoth owaco ran nyoro wor.”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Waci ran.”
Samwiri owaco ri Saulo ni, “Makada nende itere pa ŋatasisiri, to ibedo jatel pa nonin je ma Isiraili. Rwoth ama owirin gi mo bedo kere pa Joisiraili.
To Rwoth owodho rin or ni ikidhi isika woko Joamalek ma joreco no. Go owaco rin ni i lweny gi jo cuka ineko jo je.
To onyo raŋo ikiwinjo dwondi Rwoth? Raŋo ikwakere kiwada gima winyaga, t'itimo gima k'osangala Rwoth?”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Awinjo dwondi Rwoth, akidho paka go ooran, t'adwoko gi Agag kere pa Joamalek, aka asika woko Joamalek je.
To jolweny paran jok'oneko rombo gi dhok ma jonyaga; kwanyo woko, jokelo ka i Gilgal, ma miyo Rwoth Were perin cowirok.”
Samwiri openjo Saulo ni,
“Ginaŋo ma sangala Rwoth?
Winjo dwondi Rwoth, kosa mic gi cowirok awaŋa,
winjo Rwoth ber loyo cowirok,
aka winjo go loyo bor rombo.
Gwenyirok gi Were rom kodi thieth,
aka wictek rom gi lamo cal.
Paka ikwero winjo wac pa Rwoth,
Go bende onyo okwerin paka kere.”
Saulo odwoko Samwiri ni, “Ey, atimo reco; akiwinjo or pa Rwoth kodi wac perin. To oyido alworo jolweny paran, t'atimo gim'oyido jomito.
T'onyo pama akwayin, cwaki ran reco paran aka adoki kodin ŋey anyal lamo Rwoth.”
Samwiri odwoko Saulo ni, “Ak'odoki kodin rupiri ikwero winjo or pa Rwoth, aka go okwerin paka kere pa Joisiraili.”
Samwiri owaco ri Saulo ni, “Rwoth otieko yeco woko ker ma Isiraili kwoŋin konon to miyo jager perin maber loyin.
Aka Were pa Isiraili madwoŋ kitwodi kosa kiwir paro pere; rupiri go k'obedo nyatoro manyalo wiro paro pere.”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Atimo reco! To kad'ameno nyuthan wor ruwaŋ jotel pa ji paran kodi Isiraili je. Dok kodan ŋey anyal lamo Rwoth Were perin.”
Ameno Samwiri odok gi go, to Saulo lamo Rwoth.
Samwiri owaco ni, “Keli ran win Agag kere pa Joamalek ka.” Agag obino bonge munyo kirin gi lworo to waco ni, “Obedo gima lithi swa tho.”

Samwiri owaco ri Agag ni, “Paka toŋ perin omiyo mon mathoth doŋ paka mon ma bu nyithindho, apaka konon me bende yokin ladoŋ paka dhako ma kinywol.” To Samwiri toŋo Agag mathindho thindho ruwaŋ Rwoth i Gilgal.
Samwiri odok Rama to Saulo dok peco pere i Gibeya.
Samwiri doko k'oneno kere Saulo tundo tho, to owinjo gi rem swa ri Saulo. Rwoth orem ni oyido oloko Saulo bedo kere pa Joisiraili.

Ndelo acel Rwoth owaco ri Samwiri ni, “Ilarembo ri Saulo kiri keraŋo? Atieko kwero go paka kere ma Isiraili. To onyo pama poŋi mo i tungi ogwaŋ, aka ikidhi; alaorin bongi Yese Jabethelehem, rupiri atieko yero kere wok kwoŋ wot go.”
Samwiri openjo ni, “Anyalo nedi timo gino? Ka Saulo owinji, go bino nekan.”
To Rwoth dwoko ni, “Kwany rwath ikidhi gine, aka i wac ni, ‘Abino miyo Rwoth cowirok.’
To ilwoŋo Yese gi wote je i cowirok, aka abino waco rin gir'atima. Ibino wiro gi mo ŋat'anowaci rin paka kere.”
To Samwiri timo gima Rwoth owaco rigo ni wotim to kadho Bethelehem. Jotel ma tindi jobino romo gi go munyo jokirin, aka jopenjo ni, “Me wendo ma siem, jatuci wac Were?”
Samwiri odwoko ni, “Abino i siem miyo Rwoth cowirok; lokere win maleŋ aka wibin kodan i cowirok.” To go waco ri Yese gi yac pere bende lokirok maleŋ to lwoŋo jo i cowirok.
Munyo Yese gi yac pere jotundo, Samwiri oneno wod pa Yese m'ilwoŋo ni Eliab, to go waco i cunye ni, “Adieri jal m'ocungo ruwaŋ Rwoth me ama go oyero.”
To Rwoth waco rigo ni, “Ikir'inen ŋono kosa boro pere, kole atieko kwero go; rupiri An akinen paka dhano neno. Ji joneno ŋono to an aneno adundo.”
To Yese waco ri wode m'ilwoŋo ni Abinadab luwo ruwaŋ Samwiri. To Samwiri waco ni, “Be, Rwoth k'oyero go je.”
Yese doko to kelo Sama. To Samwiri doko waco ni, “Be, Rwoth k'oyero go je.”
I nger acel Yese to miyo yac pere abirio je luwo ruwaŋ Samwiri. To Samwiri waco ni, “Be, Rwoth k'oyero ŋatimoro je kwoŋ jome.”
To Samwiri penjo Yese ni, “Initie kendo gi wotin man?”
Yese odwoko ni, “Nitie ocoko ama fodi odoŋ, to go nitie i thim kwayo rombo.”
Samwiri owaco ni, “Waci rigo wobin ka, wakilamiyo cowirok cuka go bino.”
Ameno Yese owaco ni wolwoŋi go. Go oyido obedo jayac maŋon, ma mbute, aka ma waŋe liw. Rwoth owaco ri Samwiri ni, “Me won ago, ay malo iwir go gi mo.”
Kenyo Samwiri okwanyo mo to wiro Daudi ruwaŋ wutmin go. Piyo piyo no to cuny pa Rwoth loro kwoŋ Daudi i meni wok i ndelo no kadho yuwaŋe. Kenyo to Samwiri ay to dok Rama.
Cuny pa Rwoth onyo to weyo Saulo, aka cuny m'ocido m'owok bongi Rwoth to pilo go.
Ŋecin pere jowaco rigo ni, “Waŋeyo paka cuny m'ocido ma Rwoth odhiro pilin.
Riameno, jadwoŋ, miy cik, aka wadwar nyatoro manyalo goyo tongol. Aka ka cuny m'ocido obin kwoŋin, ŋato lagoyo tongol, t'ibedo maber.”
To Saulo miyo ŋecin pere cik ni, “Dwar win nyatoro manyalo goyo tongol maber wi keli go bongan.”
Acel kwoŋ ŋecin pere owaco rigo ni, “Neni, aŋeyo wod pa Yese ma wok Bethelehem manitie gi ndijo ma goyo tongol. Go bende obedo jamiseni, ŋon, go jalweny, aka riek i luwo; aka Rwoth nigi go.”
To Saulo oro jomikwenda waco ri Yese ni, “Dhiri ran wodin m'ilwoŋo ni Daudi ma jakwath rombo.”
To Yese dhiro Daudi bongi Saulo gi nyathi diel, punde m'otiŋo mugat, kodi pien m'opoŋ'iye vini.
Munyo Daudi otundo bongi Saulo, ocako tiyo rigo. Saulo omaro Daudi tektek, to yero go bedo ŋeca pere.
Kenyo Saulo odhiro wac ri Yese ni, “Amaro Daudi. Weyi go wodoŋ ka wotiy ran.”
Wok kenyo, kisi ka Rwoth odhiro ri Saulo cuny m'ocido Daudi oyido mako tongol pere to goyo. Cuny m'ocido oyido weyo go to doko Saulo winjo maber.
Jofilistia jocokere lweny i tindi Soko, piny Yuda to joketho kambi kam'ilwoŋo ni Efes Damim, i dier Soko kodi Azeka.
Saulo kodi jolweny pa Joisiraili bende jocokere i milelo ma Ela kama bende joketh'iye kambi lweny gi Jofilistia.
Jofilistia to cungo i thenge acel, to Joisiraili bende jocungo i thenge man munyo milelo opoko jo i diere.
Jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Goliath, ma wok i tindi Gath, owok i dier Jofilistia to cako cayo Joisiraili. Go oyido obedo jacwo m'oŋawere gi malo aka boro pere oyido romo fut aucel g'adec.
Go oyido ruko junga ma nyweny ma geŋo wiye to tweyo i cinge atego ma timo kilo 57.
Go oyido geŋo tiende gi gim'otim gi nyweny, to tweyo toŋ ma nyweny i bade.
Nywol ma toŋ pere oyido cale kodi nywol ma cuma ma kwoyirok, aka lew toŋ pere oyido tundo kilo abirio. Jalweny acel ma tiŋo kwot pere oyido wotho yuwiye.

Goliath ocungo to cayo Joisiraili ka koko ri jolweny pa Joisiraili ni, “Witimo aŋo kenyo, ma wicungo lweny? An akibedo Jafilistia, aka win ŋecin pa Saulo! Yer win jacwo acel kwoŋ win wobin wolwenyi kodan.
Ka go oloy to nekan, wabino bedo ŋecin mewin; to k'anoloy t'aneko go, wibino bedo ŋecin mawan.
Gi ka aka pama won me, acayo jolweny pa Joisiraili. Miyan win jacwo ma wolwenyi kodan.”
Munyo Saulo gi jolweny pere jowinjo gime, jobwok swa.
To bedo jayac m'ilwoŋo ni Daudi wod pa Yese janono pa Efratha ma wok i tindi Bethelehem i piny Yuda. Yese oyido nitie gi wote aboro, aka i hongo ma dhum pa Saulo go oyido otieko ti.
Wot Yese adek madongo oyido jokidho i lweny kodi Saulo. Eliab m'oyido dwoŋ, to Abinadab luwo go, aka Sama luwo Abinadab.
Wot Yese adek me oyido jobedo bongi Saulo, aka Daudi am'oyido ocoko pajo.
Daudi oyido riwin kisi hongo dok Bethelehem, kwayo rombo pa bamere.
Kisi ndelo odikin g'othieno, Goliath oyido wok aka cungo to cayo jolweny pa Joisiraili ma ndelo piero aŋwen.
Ndelo acel, Yese owaco ri wode Daudi ni, “Ter ri wutmin in kilo apar ma ŋano m'ocel, kodi mugat muma apar i kambi.”
To doko Yese miyo Daudi mo dhiaŋ apar ni woter ri jamituka pa jolweny pa Joisiraili. To waco rigo ni, “Neni nger ma wutmin in jonitie iye, aka idwoki gi gimoro ma nyutho ni inwaŋo jober.”
Kere Saulo kodi jolweny pa Joisiraili oyido jocokere i milelo ma Ela jolwenyo gi Jofilistia.

Yawere odikin Daudi oay malo to timo paka Yese owaco rigo. Go oweyo rombo ri nyatoro moro, to tero ŋano gi mugat i kambi. Munyo go otundo i kambi, onwaŋo munyo nyaka Joisiraili joŋanjo kidho i bol ma lweny aka oyido jowero wer ma lweny.
Joisiraili kodi Jofilistia jorieko bol ma lweny aka jocungo ma joŋiyere.
Daudi oweyo gigipiny no ri jakur gigipiny ma lweny to ŋweco kidho bongi jolweny pa Joisiraili to m'otho wutmin.
Munyo Daudi fodi luwo gi wutmin go, Goliath Jafilistia owok cayo Joisiraili paka kisi ndelo. Daudi to winjo.
Munyo jolweny pa Joisiraili joneno Goliath, jobwok to joringo.

Jolweny pa Joisiraili to jowaco ni, “Neni go! Winji cay pere! Kere mawan owaco ni nyatoro m'oneki go, kere Saulo bino culo go ŋaŋo kweth; aka ŋato bino nywomo nyar kere acel aka jopeco pere jokibino culo misolo.”

Daudi openjo jolweny m'oyido jocungo dho bonge ni, “Aŋo m'ibino timo ri jacwo m'oneki Jafilistia me to kwanyo woko wickwot me kwoŋ Joisiraili? Rupiri Jafilistia ma k'othumere me paro ni go ŋa manyalo cayo jolweny pa Were makwo!”
To jolweny no jowaco rigo gim'ibino timo ri jacwo m'oneki Goliath.

Eliab, omin Daudi madwoŋ owinjo munyo Daudi luwo gi jolweny to nge mako. To penjo Daudi ni, “Raŋo ibino ka? Aka iweyo ri ŋa nyaka rombo manok no i thim? Aŋeyo kwoto perin, kodi colo ma cunyin. Ibino ka nyaka ŋiyo lweny.”
Daudi openjo ni, “Aŋo marac m'atimo? Apenjo nyaka penji”
Daudi oeye bongi Eliab to penjo Jaisiraili man penji acel. To kisi ŋati ma go openjo, omiyo go radwok acel no won.
Jolweny pa Joisiraili moro jowinjo gima Daudi owaco to jokidho jowaco ri Saulo. Saulo to oro nyatoro lwoŋo Daudi.
Daudi owaco ri Saulo ni, “Jadwoŋ, ongoye nyatoro ma cunye wopodhi ro Jafilistia me! Alakidho t'alwenyo gi go.”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Be, inyalo nedi lwenyo gi go? In nyaka jayac, aka go otieko bedo i lweny kwo pere je.”
Daudi owaco ni, “Jadwoŋ, an, akwayo rombo pa baba. To kisi ka simbwor kosa arara omako nyathi rombo,
aluwo simbwor kosa arara no, t'amonjo go botho nyathi rombo. Aka ka simbwor kosa arara no owire ran, amako gi yer ma dwonde aka afodo piny to aneko.
Atieko neko simbwore gi arare, aka Jafilistia ma k'othumere me bende bino tho paka ogwaŋe no; rupiri go ocayo jolweny pa Were makwo.
Rwoth otieko bothan wok i laki simbwore gi arare, go bino bothan wok i cingi Jafilistia me.”
Saulo odwoko Daudi ni, “Kadhi ilweny gi go, aka Rwoth obedi kodin.”
Saulo owodho or aka oruki ri Daudi nangin pere ma lweny, junga pere ma geŋo wiy jo, aka otwey i cingi Daudi gimoro m'okedi gi nyweny.

Daudi otweyo toŋ pa Saulo i goke to temo woth aka k'onyalo rupiri go oyido k'oŋiyo gi gigipiny me. Kenyo to Daudi waco ri Saulo ni, “Akinyali lweny gi gigipiny me rupiri akiŋiyo gi jo.” Ameno to Daudi lunyo woko jo.
Go omako luth pere ma kwath, odimo telin abic mafoth wok i thengi jwom to ketho i mugowa pere m'omaro liero ka kidho kwayo rombo. Go okwanyo asumulu pere to dhire romo gi Goliath.
Jafilistia ocako woth k'onyo core cegin gi Daudi aka jatiŋ kwot pere oyido wotho yuwiye.
Munyo Goliath oŋiyo to neno Daudi maber, ocayo Daudi rupiri Daudi oyido obedo nyaka jayac maŋon aka ocweyere maber.
Goliath openjo Daudi ni, “Abedo gwok m'ibino bongan gi luth?” Kenyo to Goliath lamo Daudi i nyingi were pa Jofilistia.
Goliath ocayo Daudi ka waco rigo ni, “Biye, alamiyo delkwoŋin ri winyin g'ogwaŋe madudi jowocami.”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Ibino lweny kodan g'abor, toŋ, gi toŋ, t'abino lweny kodin i nyingi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa jolweny pa Joisiraili ma icayo.
Konon won me Rwoth bino kethin i cingan. Alanekin to aŋado ŋutin, aka alamiyo delkwoŋ jolweny pa Jofilistia ri winyin g'ogwaŋe madudi. To nyaka piny gipi ŋeyo nike Isiraili nigi Were.
Aka kisi ŋata nitie ka laŋeyo ni Rwoth kimiti gilweny paka abor kosa toŋ ma botho ji pere. Rwoth kisi ndelo loyo lweny pere, aka go laketho wijoje i cingi wan.”
Munyo Goliath ocako corok cegin gi Daudi, Daudi oŋweco piyo i bol ma lweny pa Jafilistia lweny gi go.
Daudi orwako cinge i mugowa pere to fudho tele acel m'oliero iy'asumulo; owito to goyo gine nyim Goliath. Tele no odonjo i nyim Goliath to Goliath podho piny gi nyime.
Ameno apaka Daudi okengila Goliath, gi tele kodi asumulu; go ofodo piny Goliath to neko go m'ongoye toŋ i cinge.
Daudi oŋweco to cungo i wi Goliath, ofudho abor pa Goliath i ode to ŋado ŋuti Goliath, aka oneko go.
Munyo Jofilistia joneno ni ŋati m'oyido jokanya otho, joringo.

Jolweny ma Yuda kodi Isiraili joay gi koko aka joriemo Jofilistia kiri Gath tundo kiri i waŋkac ma tindi Ekiron. Jofilistia ma jolimo litho jopodho i royo wok i tindi madwoŋ Sarayim tundo Gath gi Ekiron.
Munyo Joisiraili jodwoko wok riemo Jofilistia, jonyaga woko gigipiny pa Jofilistia wok i kambi pajo.
Daudi odimo ŋuti Goliath to dok gine Yerusalem, to kano gilweny pa Goliath i wema pere.
Con mere munyo Daudi wotho kidho lweny gi Goliath, Saulo openjo Abuner jamituka pa jolweny pere ni, “Jayac no wok kune?”
Abuner odwoko ni, “Akuya jadwoŋ.”
Kere Saulo owaco ri Abuner niaŋ ŋata Daudi obedo.
Ameno munyo Daudi odwoko i kambi munyo otieko neko Goliath, Abuner otero go bongi Saulo, aka i sawa no Daudi oyido fodi otiŋo wic Goliath i cinge.
Saulo openjo go ni, “Jayac, ibedo wod pa ŋa?”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Abedo wod pa ŋeca perin Yese ma wok Bethelehem.”
Munyo Daudi otieko luwo gi Saulo, wod pa Saulo, Yonathan omako mere gi Daudi, aka omaro Daudi paka go won omaro kwo pere.
To Saulo k'oyeyo Daudi dok bongi bamere wok ndelo no.
Yonathan omaro Daudi swa to miyo jo kwoŋirok bedo mere cil gi cil.
Yonathan olunyo woko law m'oyido oruko to miyo Daudi, gi lweny pere, kiri toŋ, kwot, gi thol ma piere to miyo Daudi.
Kisi tic ma Saulo ooro go je, Daudi otimo maber aka Saulo oyero go bedo jasirikale madwoŋ. Gime osangala ji je kodi jolweny man madongo.
Munyo Daudi dwoko, munyo otieko neko Goliath, mon jowok i kisi tindi pa Joisiraili bino romo gi kere Saulo; aka oyido jowero gi kisangala, jomielo, jogoyo tongol, aka joyengo seke.
Mon jofore ka jowero ni, “Saulo oneko ganin, to Daudi neko gana dipar.”
Saulo owinjo marac to mako nge, aka k'owinjo maber. Go owaco ni, “Ri Daudi jokwano gana dipar, aka ran jokwano ganin kende. Go ama jolaketho kere ma luwo?”
Ameno won wok ndelo no Saulo ocako neno Daudi gi waŋe marac.
I ndelo ma luwo mere, Were odhiro cuny m'ocido to monjo Saulo; to Saulo ero luwo pa ŋata neko omako. Daudi oyido nitie goyo tongol pere paka kisi ndelo, aka Saulo oyido omako toŋ pere.
Saulo owaco i cunye ni, “Alabolo toŋ me to cwowo go i kor ot.” Saulo to bolo toŋ dirio ni woneki Daudi to Daudi leŋo go.
Saulo obedo gi lworo ri Daudi rupiri Rwoth oyido nigi Daudi aka ojwango go.
Ameno Saulo odhiro Daudi gicen to oro go telo jolweny 1,000; aka Daudi bende otelo jo i lweny.
Daudi oyido timo maber i kisi gimoro rupiri Rwoth oyido nigi go.
Munyo Saulo oneno ni Daudi oyido timo kisi gimoro maber, lworo pere ri Daudi omedere.
To kisi nyatoro i Yuda gi Isiraili omaro Daudi rupiri go am'oyido telo jo kidho i lweny.

Ndelo acel, Saulo owaco ri Daudi ni, “K'inobedi jalweny ma jamisen, aka jar'adieri, nyaran Merab ee; abino miyin go bedo cegin.” Saulo oyido paro ni i nger me go won oyido k'oneki Daudi; kwanyo woko Jofilistia ama jonek go.
Daudi odwoko Saulo ni, “An aŋa gi peco pa baba; ma ripo abedi or kere gipi!”
To munyo hongo otundo ma Daudi oyido ripo ni wonywom Merab, Saulo omiyo Adiriel ma wok Mehola Merab, i kabedo pa Daudi.
I hongo acel no, nyar Saulo m'ilwoŋo ni Mikal oyido jomitere gi Daudi. Saulo owinjo maber munyo nyatoro moro owaco rigo.
Saulo oyeyo Daudi nywomo nyare Mikal nyaka woor Mikal ma ciko Daudi to Jofilistia joneko go. Ameno to Saulo doko waco ri Daudi ni, “Ibino bedo oran.”
Saulo omiyo ŋecin pere cik ni, “Weci win gi Daudi manyaliŋliŋ wiwaci rigo ni, ‘Neni, kere winjo maber kodin, aka kiri wan je wamarin; onyo pama bedi or kere.’ ”
Ŋecin pa kere jowaco ri Daudi, to go dwoko jo ni, “Wiparo ni obedo gimathin bedo or kere, ma bende wineno paka ajacandi, aka asisiri?”
Ŋecin pa Saulo jokowo rigo gima Daudi owaco.

Saulo ooro ŋecin pere waco ri Daudi ni, “Kere kimiti wok bongin gigipiny ma nywom, kwanyo woko go mito wok bongin gima nyutho ni Jofilistia miya acel jotho; paka culo kwor kwoŋ jokwor pere.” Me apaka Saulo oyido paro ni Jofilistia jolaneko Daudi.
Ŋecin pa Saulo jowaco ri Daudi gima Saulo owaco aka Daudi owinjo maber bedo or kere. Ameno mafodi ndelo k'orumo,
Daudi gi cwo pere jokidho aka joneko Jofilistia miya acel. Daudi okwano ri Saulo gima nyutho ni Jofilistia jotho, ŋey go wobedi or kere. Ameno Saulo omiyo Daudi nyare Mikal bedo cege.
To munyo Saulo oneno, oŋeyo ni Rwoth oyido nitie gi Daudi, aka kiri Joisiraili gi nyar Saulo Mikal je oyido jomaro go.
Gime omiyo Saulo lworo Daudi, aka Daudi omedere bedo jakwor pere.
Jomituka jolweny pa Jofilistia oyido jobino lweny gi Joisiraili, aka i kisi lweny Daudi oyido timo maber loyo jolweny pa Saulo madongo je. I cowe mere omiyo nyingi go dwoŋ.
Saulo owaco ri wode Yonathan gi ŋecin pere can pere ma neko Daudi. To Yonathan oyido omaro Daudi gi cunye je.
Ameno Yonathan owaco ri Daudi ni, “Baba rango nekin, riameno kure; dikin odikin ikidhi kamoro aka ipondo kenyo
alabino to acungo gi baba i sa kam'ipond'iye, aka alaluwo gi go kwoŋin. K'anuŋici gimoro je, abino miyin ŋeyo.”
Yawere odikin Yonathan oluwo gi bamere kwoŋ bero pa Daudi. Owaco rigo ni, “Jadwoŋ, ikir'itim gimarac ri ŋeca perin Daudi, rupiri ongoye raco ma go otieko timo rin. Go otieko konyin luwo i tim pere.

Go ojala kwo pere i ndelo m'oneko iye Goliath, aka Rwoth oloyo lweny madwoŋ swa ri Joisiraili. Munyo in bende ineno, iwinjo maber. T'onyo rango imito timo gimarac ri ŋati m'ongoye raco m'otimo rin; raŋo imito neko Daudi m'ongoye atoŋa ma miyin neko go.”
Saulo owinjo dwondi Yonathan aka okwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth ni go kilaneko Daudi.
Rumacen Yonathan olwoŋo Daudi to liesa rigo kisi gimoro je; aka otero go bongi Saulo to doko Daudi tiyo rigo.
Lweny man doko otur i dier Jofilistia gi Joisiraili. Daudi gi cwo pere jomonjo Jofilistia aka joneko jolweny kweth, aka man joringo.
Ndelo acel, Rwoth odhiro cuny m'ocido to monjo Saulo, aka go oyido obedo i ot pere otiŋo toŋ pere i cinge. Daudi bende onwaŋo goyo tongol pere.
Saulo otemo cwowo Daudi i kor ot g'abor pere to Daudi leŋo aka toŋ omoko i kor ot aka Daudi oringo to kwale.
Gi wor no won Saulo ooro jopendo pere i ot pa Daudi, ŋey jowoneki go yawere odikin. Mikal, cipa Daudi, owaco rigo ni, “K'ikikwale wor me, dikin odikin ibino nekin.”
To Mikal wodho go g'idirisa aka Daudi oringo to kwale.
Mikal okwanyo cal m'oyido nitie i ot aka opielo i wi kitanda, to theno wiye gi gima oyiki gi yer diel, aka oumo kwoŋe gipi.
Munyo Saulo ooro jopendo pere kidho mako Daudi, Mikal owaco rijo ni go two.
To Saulo owaco rijo ni jowogiki wegi joneni. Omiyo cik ni jowokidhi jowotiŋ Daudi gi kitanda aka jowoteri bonge go won woneki Daudi.
Munyo jopendo jodonjo i ot, jonwaŋo cal m'oyido nitie i ot opiel i kitanda, aka othen wiye gi gim'otim gi yer diel.
Saulo openjo Mikal ni, “Raŋo iwondan t'iweyo jakwor paran kwale?”
Mikal odwoko ni, “Go owaco ran ni k'akikonyo go to kwale go lanekan.”
Daudi okwale to kidho bongi Samwiri i tindi Rama aka owaco ri Samwiri gima Saulo otimo rigo je. Samwiri gi Daudi joay to jokidho Nayoth.
Nyatoro moro owaco ri Saulo ni Daudi nitie i tindi Rama.

Kenyo Saulo ooro jopendo pere kidho mako Daudi. Munyo joneno kitipa pa jotuci wac Were jomielo aka jokoko; aka Samwiri am'oyido telo jo, cuny pa Rwoth oloro kwoŋ jo aka bende jocako miel k'onyo jokoko.
Munyo Saulo owinjo gime, ooro jopendo man. Jono bende munyo jotundo jocako miel k'onyo jokoko. Saulo doko to oro jopendo ma didek, aka gimoro acel otimere rijo.
I cowe mere Saulo won oay to mako yo ma kidho Rama. Munyo go otundo i jwom madwoŋ Seku, openjo kama Samwiri gi Daudi oyido jonitie; aka owaci rigo ni jonitie Nayoth.
Munyo Saulo nitie i yo ma kidho Nayoth, i tindi Rama, cuny pa Rwoth oloro kwoŋe; aka go bende ocako miel konyo koko i yo malomalo konyo kadhi Nayoth i Rama.
Saulo olunyo nangin pere, aka omielo konyo koko ruwaŋ Samwiri. Go obedo kinyoro ndelo no gi wor gipi. Me am'omiyo iwaco ni, “Kiri Saulo je olokere jatuci wac Were!”
Daudi oringo wok Nayoth i tindi Rama, to kidho bongi Yonathan, aka openjo go ni, “Atimo aŋo? Raco aŋo m'atimo ri benin ma go mito nekan?”
Yonathan odwoko ni, “Meno gima kimitere n'ilatho! Baba waco ran kisi gima go kidho timo kada bedi mathin nedi; aka go di k'onyalo kano kwoŋan gime. K'obedo adieri!”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Benin oŋeyo maber swa ni imaran swa, aka go okwero waco rin gima go ocano timo ran, rupiri bino ramo cunyin. To akwoŋere rin i nyingi Rwoth makwo ni anitie cegin gi tho!”
Yonathan odwoko ni, “Alatimo gimoro je ma imito ni atim rin.”
To ka benin opar kwoŋan to penjo kam'anitie iye, wac rigo ni akwayin ywomirok ŋey anyal dok peco i Bethelehem; rupiri obedo hongo ma cowirok peco mawan gipi.
Ka go owaci ni, ‘Meno ber.’ Meno nyutho ni ongoye wac. To ka go omaki nge, ilaŋeyo ni go omiyere nekan.
Mondo tim kodan wor, i kur cikirok ma watimo ruwaŋ Rwoth. To k'inen anitie gi raco moro, in won nekan! Raŋo iteran bongi benin am'onekan?”
Yonathan odwoko ni, “Ikir'ipar kada kwoŋ nger gino! Bedi oyido aŋeyo adieri ni baba omiyere timo rin gimarac, dinyo akiwaco rin?”
Kenyo to Daudi penjo Yonathan ni go oŋey nedi ka Saulo odwoki gi nge.
Yonathan owaco ri Daudi ni, “Biye wakidhi i sa.” Ameno to jario jokadho i sa.
To Yonathan waco ri Daudi ni, “Weyi Rwoth Were pa Isiraili obedi mujulisi mawan. Dikin kodi yawere i waŋceŋ paka ama alapenjo baba. K'inen go winjo maber kodin, abino waco rin.
To k'inen baba mito timo rin gimarac; Rwoth wotim ran gimarac k'aweyo m'akiwaco rin, t'aweyin ikadho i siem.
Kafodi akwo, kur cikirok ma watimo ruwaŋ Rwoth; to k'anotho,
imaki wor gi jothuwan cil gi cil. Rwoth bino reyo woko jokwor perin je
aka cikirok mawan kodin wokiri wotur. K'otur, Rwoth bino miyin gir'acula.”
Yonathan doko to miyo Daudi kwoŋirok maro go, rupiri Yonathan oyido omaro Daudi gi cunye je.
Kenyo to Yonathan waco ri Daudi ni, “Dikin obedo ndelo ma kalima ma dwe manyen, aka ji jolakeŋ in ka kom perin odoŋ nono i dhower cemo.
Yawere dikin ji doko jolakeŋ in loyo; riameno kadhi ipondi kama ceŋino ipond'iye i ŋeti kidhur telin kenyo.
Alabolo aserin adek i thenge mere paŋini oyido nitie gimoro m'amito cwowo.

Alaoro ŋeca paran bino rango aserin no. To k'anowaci rigo ni, ‘Neni! Jonitie i thenge perin me kwany jo.’ Meno nyutho ni ongoye wac aka inyalo wok kam'ipond'iye. Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth ni ongoye ŋata bino timo rin gimarac.
To k'anowaci rigo ni ‘Neni! Jonitie yuwiyin.’ Kenyo onyo ikadhi rupiri meno Rwoth oorin ikadhi.
To ri kwoŋirok ma watimo kodin, panen, Rwoth wokonyi wan wakur cil gi cil.”
Ameno to Daudi pondo i sa. Munyo kalima ma dwe manyen otundo, kere Saulo obino to bedo i dhower cemo.
Kere obedo i kabedo pere ma kisi ndelo kam'othenere gi kor ot; Yonathan obedo tirtir gi Saulo, to Abuner bedo kabuti kere, aka kom pa Daudi odoŋ nono.
Saulo k'owaco gimoro je ndelo no; rupiri oparo ni kono gimoro otimere ri Daudi aka onyo go k'olony ma bino i kalima.
Yawere munyo kalima ma dwe manyen orumo, kom pa Daudi oyido fodi odoŋ nono, to Saulo penjo Yonathan ni, “Raŋo Daudi k'obino i dhower cemo nyoro kiri gi konon?”
Yonathan odwoko ni, “Go okwayan ywomirok wonyali kidho Bethelehem.

Go owaco ran ni, ‘Mondo weyi akadhi rupiri jopeco mawan jomiyo cowirok i tindi madwoŋ aka omin an owaco ni aripo bedo. Ameno onyo k'inen ibedo mere paran, weyi akadhi alimi wade paran.’ Meno ay'atoŋa m'omiyo kom pere odoŋ nono i dhower cemo.”
Saulo omako nge gi Yonathan to waco rigo ni, “In ija wictek gi banirok paka yokin. Aŋeyo paka iriwere gi Daudi kelo wickwot rin gi yokin.
Ikiŋey ni kafodi Daudi kwo i piny ikinyal bedo kere i piny me! Riameno dhiri nyatoro wokel go ka, rupiri go ripo tho.”
Yonathan openjo ni, “Raŋo ripo woneki go? Aŋo ma go otimo?”
Kenyo ama Saulo obolo toŋ pere ni wocwow Yonathan, aka kenyo ama Yonathan oŋeyo iye ni bamere oyido omiyere neko Daudi.
Yonathan oay i dhower gi ŋonge aka k'ocemo ndelo no gipi. Owinjo gi rem swa ri Daudi rupiri bamere oyido okwoto wi go.
Yawere odikin Yonathan okidho i sa romo gi Daudi paka oyido joyere; aka okidho gi ŋeca pere majayac.
Yonathan owaco ri ŋeca pere ni, “Ŋwec ikidhi irangi aserin m'akidho bolo.” Nyiyac no oŋweco, aka Yonathan obolo aserin to kalo go.
Munyo jayac no otundo kama aserin jopodh'iye, Yonathan okoko rigo ni, “Aserin jokinitie yuwiyin,
ikir'icungi kenyo redi!” Jayac no odimo aserin to gik bongi jadwoŋ pere,
ma go k'oŋeyo ni nyutho aŋo; Daudi gi Yonathan kende am'oyido joŋeyo.
Yonathan omiyo jayac no gilweny pere to waco rigo ni wodwoki jo i tindi.
Tekin jayac no kadho, Daudi oay i ŋeti kidhur telin kam'oyido opond'iye, oguro conge to kule piny didek. Jario je jocwiyere lembi gin to joywak; aka rem pa Daudi oyido thoth loyo apa Yonathan.
Yonathan owaco ri Daudi ni, “Were wobedi kodin. Rwoth laneno ni an kodin, kodi wade mawan, wakuro kwoŋirok ma watimo.” Kenyo to Daudi kadho, aka Yonathan odok i tindi.
Daudi okidho Nob bongi Ahimelek jacway ri Were i wi migam. Ahimelek okidho bonge munyo kirin to penjo go ni, “Raŋo ibino ka kendin?”
Ameno onyo aŋo m'initie gine i cingin? Miyan mugat abic kosa gimoro je m'initie gine.”
Ahimelek odwoko ni, “Angoye gi mugat ma kisi ndelo, kwanyo woko anitie gi mugat maleŋ; anyalo miyin k'inen cwo perin jocowo hongo moro ma jok'obedo gi mon pajo.”
Daudi odwoko jacway ri Were i wi migam ni, “Adieri wakibedi gi mon mawan kisi ka wakidho woko timo tic moro; t'onyo wanyalo nedi bedo gi mon mawan ma wabino timo tic pa kere.”
Ameno to Abimelek miyo Daudi mugat maleŋ, rupiri meno kende a mugat ma go oyido nitie gine m'oyido okwany wok i wi meza maleŋ t'iketho mugat maleŋ man.
Daudi openjo Abimelek ni, “Initie gi toŋ kosa abor moro? Rupiri akitiŋo toŋ kosa gilweny moro je rupiri kere ooran ma kwakirok.”

Ahimelek odwoko ni, “Abor pa Goliath Jafilistia ma ndelo no ineko i milelo ma Ela ama nitie ka. Nitie yuŋey law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam otwey i law. K'imito kadhi gine rupiri a gilweny kende manitie ka.”
Daudi owaco ni, “Miyan, doko ongoye abor kaman je maber loyo meno.”
To ŋecin pa Akis jowaco rigo ni, “Me ki Daudi kere ma piny pere? Me a jal ma mon jowero munyo jomielo ni,
‘Saulo oneko ganin
aka Daudi oneko ganin dipar?’ ”
Ameno Daudi owiro tim pere ruwaŋ jo, to ero rendirok ni go janeko; aka ondiko i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ to cwero law i ye tike.
To Akis waco ri ŋecin pere ni, “Neni! Jal me janeko! Raŋo wikelo go bongan?
Angoye gi joneko, ma wikelo ran jal me tuko ran neko pere ruwaŋan? Jal me obin i ot paran?”

Aka ŋatimoro je m'oyido nitie i kidamba, kisi ŋati m'oyido nitie i teko, kisi ŋati m'oyido nitie gi banja, aka kisi ŋati m'oyido nitie gi gwayo i cunye je jocokere bongi go; aka go olokere jatel pajo.
Daudi omedere wok kenyo to kidho i tindi Mizipa iy'adec ma Mowab aka owaco ri kere ma Mowab ni, “Mondo akwayin, weyi baba gi mama jowobin jobedi ka tundo kam'anoŋey gima Were kidho timo ran.”
Ameno Daudi oweyo jonywol pere Mowab, aka jobedo kenyo i hongo je ma Daudi oyido pondo i ŋungu tele.
Kenyo to jatuci wac Were Gad bino to waco ri Daudi ni, “Ikir'idoŋ i ŋungu tele ka; ngoye ka, aka kadhi i lowo ma Yuda.” Ameno to Daudi ngoye, aka okadho i lul ma Hereth.

Ndelo acel, Saulo oyido obedo i tipo i tiendi yath m'ilwoŋo ni tarmarisk i wi riete, aka oyido otiŋo toŋ pere i cinge; aka jolweny pere oyido jocungo jothoko go. T'iwaco rigo ni onwaŋ kama Daudi nitie iye.

Saulo owaco ri jolweny pere m'oyido jocungo thoko go ni, “Winji win, cwo ma nono pa Benyamin! Wiparo ni Daudi janono pa Yuda me bende omiy win ndelin gi ndelo vini, to miyo win bedo jomituka jolweny pere?

Meno ay'atoŋa m'omiyo wicamo ran sereko? Ongoye kada ŋat'acel kwoŋ win m'owaco ran ni wodan ma an won anywolo oriwere gi wod pa Yese. Ongoye kwoŋ win ŋati m'odewo waco ran ni Daudi, acel kwoŋ cwo paran won rango nger ma nekan, aka ni kiri wodan omiyo go meni ma nekan.”
Ahimelek openjo ri Daudi Rwoth gima Daudi otim to miyo go cemo moro g'abor pa Goliath Jafilistia.”
Ameno kere Saulo ooro nyatoro lwoŋo Ahimelek gi wade pere je m'oyido jobedo jocway ri Were i wi migam, aka jobino bongi Saulo.
Saulo owaco ri Ahimelek ni, “Winji Ahimelek.”
Ahimelek odwoko ni, “An e jadwoŋ.”
Saulo openjo Ahimelek ni, “Raŋo in gi Daudi wicamo ran sereko? Raŋo imiyo go cemo g'abor, aka ipenjo Were gima go otim? Onyo pama go owire ran aka rango nger ma nekan!”
To Ahimelek dwoko ni, “Ŋa kwoŋ ŋecin perin je ma jar'adieri paka Daudi, go m'onywomo kiri nyarin, aka jatel pa jolweny perin, aka ji ma ot perin je joworo go!

Adieri apenjo rigo Were gir'atima, to meno k'obedo ma dicel an penjo rigo Were gir'atima. To ri camo rin sereko, jadwoŋ ikir'icwoki dhokan kosa ŋatimoro je ma peco paran. Ongoye gim'aŋeyo ma mako kwoŋ gime!”
Kere owaco ri Ahimelek ni, “Ahimelek in gi wade perin je wiripo tho.”

To Saulo waco ri jolweny pere m'oyido jocungo cegin bonge ni, “Neki win jocway i wi migam pa Rwoth! Joriwere gi Daudi aka jok'owaco ran ni go oringo, kiri munyo oyido joŋeyo con.” To jolweny pere jokwero tiŋo cingi jo malo neko jocway i wi migam pa Rwoth.
Ameno Saulo owaco ri Doweg ni, “Neki jo.” To Doweg neko joje. I ndelo no Doweg oneko jocway ri Were i wi migam piero aboro g'abic m'oyido joruko law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Saulo doko to wodho or t'ineko ji je ma tindi Nob; tindi pa jocway ri Were i wi migam: Cwo, mon, nyithindho, nyithindho maŋic, dhok, punde, kodi rombo je oneki.
To Abiatha, acel kwoŋ wot Ahimelek okwale aka okidho to riwere gi Daudi.
Abiatha owaco ri Daudi nger ma Saulo othumo iye jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Daudi owaco rigo ni, “Munyo aneno Doweg ndelo no Nob, aŋeyo ni go oyido lawaco ri Saulo.
Bedi kodan ka Ikir'ilwor. Saulo mito nekan kodi in je, to ongoye gima latimere rin k'ibedo bongan.”
Ndelo acel, wac otundo ri Daudi ni Jofilistia oyido jomonjo tindi Keila aka oyido jokwalo ŋano m'oyido nyaka okec.
Ameno Daudi openjo Rwoth ni, “Akidhi amonji Jofilistia?”
To Rwoth dwoko ni, “Ey monji jo ibothi tindi Keila.”
To cwo pa Daudi jowaco rigo ni, “K'inen wanitie iy'adec ma Yuda to fodi wanitie gi lworo, t'obedi nedi ka wanokidhi to wamonjo jolweny pa Jofilistia!”
Ameno Daudi doko openjo Rwoth. To Rwoth doko waco rigo ni, “Ay, lori ikidhi Keila; rupiri alamiyin Jofilistia i cingin.”
Ameno Daudi gi cwo pere jokidho Keila aka jomonjo Jofilistia; joneko Jofilistia kweth to jonyaga ogwaŋe pajo. Aka ameno apaka Daudi obotho tindi Keila.
I hongo ma Abiatha okwale to kidho bongi Daudi Keila, okidho gi law pere ma jocway ri Were i wi migam joruko.
Owaci ri Saulo ni Daudi okidho Keila, to go waco ni, “Were omiyan go i cingan. Daudi won ocikere to kidho i tindi m'othok gi cel.”
Ameno to Saulo lwoŋo cwo pere je kidho i lweny, jowokadhi yupiny Keila, jowothoki Daudi gi cwo pere.
Munyo Daudi owinjo ni Saulo oyido cano gimarac rigo, owaco ri Abiatha jacway ri Were i wi migam ni, “Keli law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ka.”
To Daudi kwayo Rwoth ama, “Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, awinjo ni Saulo cano bino reyo woko Keila ro an.
Jotel ma Keila jomiyan i cingi go? Adieri Saulo labino paka ŋeca perin owinjo? Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili akwayin idwokan!”
Rwoth odwoko Daudi ni, “Saulo labino.”
To Daudi doko openjo ni, “Jotel ma Keila jomiyan gi cwo paran i cingi go?”
To Rwoth dwoko ni, “Jolajwango win.”
Ameno Daudi gi cwo pere ma romo 600 joay dicel to jongoye Keila aka jokadho kaman. Munyo Saulo owinjo ni Daudi okwale wok Keila, oweyere gi can pere.
Daudi obedo konyo pondo i piny matendere tendere i thim cegin gi tindi Zif.
Munyo Daudi nitie Hores, i thim cegin gi Zif, go obedo gi lworo rupiri oneno ni Saulo oyido dwaro kwo pere.
Yonathan wod pa Saulo oay to kidho bongi Daudi i Hores to yomo cuny Daudi, aka owaco rigo ni Were bino gwoko go.
Yonathan owaco ri Daudi ni, “Ikir'ibedi gi lworo; baba kilaketho cinge kwoŋin rupiri go won bende oŋeyo paka iŋat'ibino bedo kere pa Joisiraili ma laluwo aka aŋat'abino luwin.”
Yonathan gi Daudi to doko jokwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth bedo mere.
Jono jowaco ri Saulo ni, “Jadwoŋ, waŋeyo paka imito mako go; riameno biye iy'adec mawan, aka walaneno ni imako go.”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Rwoth womiy win silwany rupiri wiworan!
Kidhi win doko wiridhi; neni win to wiŋeyo kama go pond'iye, kodi ŋat'ocowo neno go kanyago; rupiri owaci ran ni niaŋ paro pere kiyot.
Rangi win kama go pond'iye je, aka widwoki ran gi wac ma ridho. Nyaka abino kidho gi win, aka k'inen go fodi nitie iy'adec, alarango go i piny Yuda gipi.”
Ameno jono joay to jodok Zif yuwiy Saulo.
Daudi gi cwo pere oyido jonitie i thim Mawon, milelo kam'othwo yupiny ma thim Yesimon.
Saulo gi cwo pere jokidho to jocako dwaro Daudi. To munyo nyatoro moro owaco ri Daudi, jokidho i thim Mayon to jodoŋ kenyo. Munyo Saulo owinjo ni Daudi nitie kenyo, ocako riemo go.

Saulo gi cwo pere oyido jonitie i thengi got acel, aka Daudi gi cwo pere bende oyido jonitie i thenge man. Daudi gi cwo pere oyido joringo ngoye woko bongi Saulo gi cwo pere. To munyo Saulo oyido jocegin mako jo,
jamikwenda moro obino to waco ri Saulo ni, “Redi idwoki; rupiri Jofilistia jomonjo piny Isiraili.”
Ameno Saulo oweyo riemo Daudi to gik lweny gi Jofilistia. Meno am'omiyo ilwoŋo kenyo ni got ma thek.
Daudi oay kenyo to kidho i tendere ma Engedi to pondo kenyo.
Munyo Saulo odwoko wok i lweny gi Jofilistia, owaci rigo ni Daudi oyido nitie i thim Engedi.
Saulo oyero cwo 3,000 kwoŋ cwo pere, to jokidho rango Daudi gi cwo pere yuthenge ma got diegi dudi.
Daudi gi cwo pere oyido jonitie i ŋungu tele cegin gi sidwol rombo dho royo. Kenyo bende ama Saulo obino to donjo iye konyirok.

To cwo pa Daudi jowaco rigo ni, “Me ndelo ma Rwoth owaco rin ni, ‘Neni, abino ketho jokwor perin i cingin t'itimo gi jo gima cunyin mito.’ ” To Daudi rweta to ŋado tiendi law pa Saulo ma Saulo k'oŋeyo.
Rumacen cuny Daudi ocako podho, rupiri go oŋado tiendi law pa Saulo.
To Daudi waco ri cwo pere ni, “Rwoth wogeŋan timo gimarac ri jadwoŋ paran; ŋati ma go oyero paka kere! Akiripi timo gimarac rigo kada mathin, rupiri Rwoth am'oyero go.”
Ameno Daudi odwoŋo cwo pere gi wac me, aka k'oyeyo jo monjo Saulo.
Saulo oay malo to wok i ŋungu tele to kadho.
Daudi owok aka olwoŋo Saulo, “Jadwoŋ paran kere!” Aka munyo Saulo owire to ŋiyo yuŋeye, Daudi obwonere rigo to kulo wiye piny.
Daudi owaco ri Saulo ni, “Raŋo iwinjo wac pa ji ma jowaco rin ni amito nekin?

In won bende neni gi waŋin ni konon me Rwoth oyido omiyan in i cingan i ŋungu tele. Cwo paran man jowaco ran ni anekin t'akwero. Awaco ni, ‘Akibino ketho cingan kwoŋ jadwoŋ paran; rupiri in iŋati Rwoth owiro gi mo bedo kere.’
Neni, baba, neni oselo law manitie i cingan me; dinyo anekin, to aŋado tiendi law perin. Me ma nyuthin ni, angoye gi gimarac aka akiwire rin. Ongoye gimarac m'atieko timo rin kada nende irango nekan.
Weyi Rwoth wothum ran kodin banja. Rwoth womiyin gir'acula ro gim'itimo ran; to an akibino timo rin gimarac kada mathin.
Iŋeyo ageca ma waco ni, ‘Tim marac wok bongi jomarac.’ Riameno akibino timo rin gimarac.
Neni gima kere ma Isiraili mito neko! Neni gima go riemo! Gwok m'otho, lwaŋino me.
Weyi Rwoth wothum ran kodin banja, aka wowaci ŋatarac. Weyi go wonen wac me, wogwokan, aka wobothan wok i cingin.”
Munyo Daudi otieko luwo, Saulo openjo Daudi ni, “Meno dwondin won, wodan Daudi?” Aka Saulo otiŋo dwonde malo to goyo ndur.
Saulo owaco ri Daudi ni, “Itire loyan; rupiri inyuthan bero t'atimo rin gimarac.
Konon inyuthan bero perin ran, rupiri ikinekan, makada nende Rwoth omiyin an i cingin.
Didi ma nyatoro mako jakwor pere to weyo go kadho ma k'otimo rigo gimarac? Rwoth womiyin silwany ro gim'itimo ran konon.
Onyo pama, panen, anitie gi ridho ni ilabedo kere ma Isiraili, aka ker ma Isiraili bino doŋ i cingin.
To kwoŋere ran i nyingi Rwoth ni k'anotho ikibino neko nyikwayan, aka ikibino reyo woko nyingan i ot pa baba.”
Daudi okwoŋere ri Saulo. Saulo odok peco to Daudi gi yac pere jogik kam'oyido jopond'iye.
Samwiri otho, aka Joisiraili jocokere kanyacel to joywako go. Joyiko go peco pere i Rama.
Rumacen Daudi oay to kidho i thim iy'adec ma Paran.

To bedo jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Nabal janono Kaleb, m'oyido wok i tindi Mayon, aka nitie gi lowo cegin gi tindi Kamel. Go oyido obedo jal m'oŋaŋ swa; aka nitie gi rombo 3,000 kodi diegi 1,000. Cege oyido ilwoŋo ni Abigayili, aka oyido obedo dhako mariek. To Nabal oyido obedo jagwondo, aka kikur nge pere.
Nabal oyido thumo rombo pere Kamel.
Ndelo acel, Daudi owinjo gi i thim kama go oyido nitie iye ni Nabal thumo rombo.
To Daudi oro yac apar, aka owaco rijo ni jowokidhi Kamel bongi Nabal to jomotho go.
To Daudi waco rijo waco ri Nabal ni, “Daudi dhiro rin moth, in mere pere. Siem obedi kodin, peco perin, gi kisi gimoro perin je.
Go owinjo ni cwo perin jothumo rombo perin, aka go mitin iŋey ni ti munyo jokwath rombo perin oyido jonitie gi wan, ongoye gipajo ma wakwalo i hongo je ma jobedo gi wan Kamel
In won bende penji jo, jobino waco rin. Riameno weyi cwo paran jowonwaŋ wor ruwaŋin; rupiri wabino i ndelo maber ma kalima. Go kwayo ni imiy wan ŋecin perin gim'inyalo miyo wan gi mere perin Daudi.”
Cwo pa Daudi jowaco ri Nabal wac ma Daudi ooro jo gine; aka jokuro radwok wok bongi go.
Rumacen Nabal odwoko jo ni, “Daudi me ŋa? Wod pa Yese me ŋa? Nitie ŋecin kweth ma ti me joŋweco woko kwoŋ jodongo pajo.
Akikidhi kwanyo mugat paran gi pi paran gi riŋo paran m'athumo ri ŋecin paran t'amiyo ji m'akuya kama jowok'iye!”
Cwo pa Daudi jodok, aka jowaco rigo gima Nabal owaco je.
To Daudi waco ri cwo pere ni, “Kisi nyatoro wotwey abor pere!” Kisi nyatoro otweyo abor pere aka Daudi bende otweyo apere. Cwo 400 jokadho gi Daudi, aka cwo 200 jodoŋ kuro gilweny.
Acel kwoŋ ŋecin pa Nabal okidho to waco ri Abigayili cipa Nabal ni, “Neni, Daudi ooro jomikwenda wok i thim motho jadwoŋ mawan; to go koko rijo.
Kucel ndir m'oyido wanitie i thim gi jo jonyutho wan bero; jok'ocando wan, aka jok'okwalo gigipiny mawan.
Jogwoko kwo mawan kiri g'ogwaŋe mawan je i hongo ma wabedo gi jo i thim.
Mondo par kwoŋ gime akinen gir'atima. Gime nyalo kelo teko ri jadwoŋ mawan kiri gi peco pere. Go obedo nyatoro ma kula pere rac swa, aka kiwinji gim'iwaco rigo.”
Abigayili oredo to kwanyo mugat 200 pien ario ma vini, rombo abic m'othumi to ibulo, kutiya abic ma ŋano, nyingi vini m'othwo kayego 100 gi adhoŋ cinge 200 ma nyandere, to tweyo jo i punde.
To go waco ri ŋecin pere ni jokadhi yuwiye go laluwo go; aka k'owaco ri cwore.
Munyo go gweyo punde kam'oumere gi got, oromo gi Daudi gi cwo pere munyo joloro jokidho yu bongi go.
Daudi con mere oyido owaco ni, “Adieri aŋat'agwoko ri jame lim pere i thim manono, to ngoye gipere kad'acel m'orwenyo; aka me apaka go oculan raco ri bero.
Were onekan k'inen tundo dikin odikin akineko joje.”
Munyo Abigayili oneno Daudi, oloro i wi punde, oredo to bwonere ri Daudi.
Opodho i tiendi Daudi, aka owaco rigo ni, “Mondo jadwoŋ, akwayin iwinjan! Weyi ater apuse je.
Mondo ikir'ipar kwoŋ jal ma kula pere rac no. Go miŋamiŋa paka nyinge nyutho. Oyido angoye munyo cwo perin jobino.
Rwoth ama ogeŋin culo kwor t'ineko jokwor perin; t'onyo weyi jokwor perin je jowocale Nabal.
Mondo akwayin jadwoŋ, yey ijoli mic ma ŋeca perin okelo rin me omiy cwo perin.
Mondo akwayin icwaki ran jadwoŋ ri gimarac m'atimo. Rwoth bino miyin ker makirum, rupiri ilwenyo lweny pa Rwoth; aka ongoye ŋati ma bino timo rin gimarac kafodi ikwo.
Ka nyatoro moro omonjin to temo nekin, Rwoth Were perin bino gwoko kwo perin paka ŋata gwoko lim pere ma welo. To jokwor perin Rwoth bino lilo woko kwo pajo pa ŋata lilo tele gi asumulu.
Aka ka Rwoth otieko timo rin bero je ma go ocikin to kethin kere ma Isiraili,
kenyo nyaka ikilarembo, kosa ikilaŋuto ni raŋo i oyo remo m'ongoye atoŋa, kosa ma culo kwor. Aka ka Rwoth otieko miyin silwany, jadwoŋ, wiyin wokiri wowil kodan.”
Daudi odwoko Abigayili ni, “Rwoth Were pa Isiraili wopak m'oorin konon romo kodan!
Were wofoy ro rieko m'inyutho; aka ri gim'itimo to igeŋan timo reco ma neki gi culo kwor paran an won.
Rwoth wogeŋan timo riwin gimarac. To akwoŋere rin i nyingi Were pa Isiraili makwo ni bedi nende ikiredo romo kodan, dinyo tundo odikin onwaŋere ni cwo pa Nabal je jotho.”
Kenyo to Daudi jolo gigipiny ma Abigayili okelo rigo; aka owaco rigo ni, “Dok peco aka ikir'irembi. Alatimo gim'imito.”
Abigayili odok peco to nwaŋo munyo Nabal otimo kalima madwoŋ paŋini apa kere. Nabal oyido omer aka yodere; riameno Abigayili k'owaco rigo gimoro je tundo odikin.
Yawere odikin munyo Nabal fodi milengela, Abigayili owaco rigo gim'otimere je. Cuny Nabal otho to kwoŋe ŋinyere.
Munyo ndelo apar okadho to Rwoth tero kwo pere.
Munyo Daudi owinjo ni Nabal otho owaco ni, “Rwoth wopak m'oculo Nabal kwor ro gimarac m'otimo ran to geŋan timo gimarac.”
Kenyo Daudi ooro ŋecin pere weco gi Abigayili bedo cege.
Cwo pa Daudi jokidho bongi Abigayili Kamel to jowaco rigo ni, “Daudi ooro wan bino terin ibedi dhako pere.”
Abigayili oay to bwonere to waco ni, “Abedo ŋeca pa Daudi aka ayikere lwoko tiendi ŋecin pere.”
Abigayili oay to redo, aka oidho punde pere. Kanyacel gi nyir pere abic m'oyido jobedo jotic pere jokadho gi cwo pa Daudi to bedo cipa Daudi.
Daudi oyido onywomo dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Ahinowam ma wok loka Yezirel, aka onyo Abigayili bende to bedo cege.
Korin Saulo opoko nyare Mikal m'oyido cipa Daudi ri jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Palti wod pa Layis, ma wok i tindi Galim.
Saulo oay gi cwo 3,000 m'oyero wok kwoŋ Joisiraili to joloro i thim ma Zif rango Daudi.
Jokidho to jocokere dho yo wi got Hakila. Daudi oyido fodi nitie i thim, aka munyo owinjo ni Saulo obino rango go i thim,
ooro jopendo niaŋ ka Saulo obino adieri.
Daudi oay to kidho kama Saulo gi cwo pere oyido jocokere iye; to Daudi neno kama Saulo gi wod pa Ner Abuner jamituka jolweny pere oyido jonindo iye. Saulo oyido nindo i kambi aka cwo pere jothoko go.
To Daudi penjo Ahimelek Jahiti, gi Abisay omin Yowab (me wot dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Zeruya) ni, “Ŋa ma lakidho kodan i kambi pa Saulo?”
Abisay odwoko ni, “Alaloro kodin.”
Ameno Daudi gi Abisay jodonjo i kambi pa Saulo wor, aka Saulo oyido nindo i dier kambi, aka toŋ pere ocom piny cegin gi wiye. Abuner gi jolweny oyido jonindo thoko Saulo.
Abisay owaco ri Daudi ni, “Rwoth omiyin jakwor perin i cingin wor me. Riameno weyi acwow go dicel kende gi toŋ pere won; ak'ocwow go dirio.”
Daudi odwoko Abisay ni, “Ikir'ineki go; rupiri Rwoth bino miyo gir'acula ri ŋatimoro je m'oketh cinge kwoŋ kere ma go won owiro gi mo.”
Daudi omedere waco ni, “Paka Rwoth kwo, Rwoth won bino neko go, ka k'obedo ameno go bino tho ka okidho i lweny.
To Rwoth ogeŋan ketho cingan kwoŋ ŋati ma go won owiro gi mo bedo kere. Weyi wakwanyi toŋ pere g'agwata pere ma pi wakadhi.”
Ameno Daudi okwanyo toŋ gi agwata pi m'oyido nitie yuwiy Saulo, to jokadho. Ongoye ŋati m'oneno jo kosa oŋeyo gim'otimere kosa ocew, joje oyido jonindo, rupiri Rwoth odhiro rijo nindo mapek.
Daudi oŋado to kidho loka man ma milelo wi got bor gi Saulo gin
aka okoko to lwoŋo cwo pa Saulo gi Abuner ka waco ama: “Abuner, iwinjan?”
Abuner openjo ni, “Meno ŋa ma lwoŋo kere?”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Ŋa ma cale in Abuner kwoŋ Joisiraili je! To raŋo ikigwoko kwo pa jadwoŋ perin kere? Pama won me nyatoro moro owok bino neko jadwoŋ perin.

Gim'itimo me kiber Abuner! Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo ni win joje ber ni witho rupiri wikigwoko jadwoŋ mewin kere ma Rwoth owiro gi mo. Neni! Nikune toŋ pa kere g'agwata pi pere m'oyido nitie yuwiye?”
Saulo ocew to niaŋ ni manago obedo dwondi Daudi to penjo ni, “Meno dwondin Daudi? Meno in wodan?”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Meno dwondan, jadwoŋ paran, kere.”
Daudi omedere waco ni, “Raŋo fodi idwaro ŋeca perin jadwoŋ? Aŋo m'atimo? Aŋo marac m'atimo?

Jadwoŋ winji wac paran. K'inen Rwoth am'omiyin mon kodan, miyo go cowirok lamiyo go wiro paro pere; to k'inen obedo ji, lam pa Rwoth opodhi kwoŋ jo. Rupiri jomiyan wok piny Isiraili t'abino i piny m'alamo iye werin pa jopath.
Riameno ikir'imiy remo paran ooy i piny pa jopath, bor gi Rwoth. Raŋo kere ma Isiraili obino neko an lwaŋino me? Raŋo go dwaran paŋini winyo madudi?”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Atimo gimarac. Dwoki Daudi wodan! Doko akibino temo timo rin gimarac rupiri wor me inwaŋo silwany ma nekan to ikitimo ameno. Neni, atimo gimiŋo aka atimo gimarac swa.”
Daudi owaco ni, “Abor perin ee ka jadwoŋ. Weyi acel kwoŋ cwo perin obin woomi.
Rwoth miyo kemba ri jono ma jotire gi ji ma jotimo adieri. Konon go omiyan in i cingan to akitimo rin gimarac rupiri Rwoth owirin gi mo bedo kere.
Neni, paka akoyo kwo perin konon me, Rwoth otim ran amanago bende to bothan i teko je!”
Saulo owaco ri Daudi ni, “Were womiyin silwany, wodan! Aka ibedi gi loyo i kisi gim'inotimi je.”
Daudi okadho i yo pere to Saulo dok peco.
Daudi obedo gi paro ni ndelo acel Saulo bino neko go. Ameno go owaco ni gimaber atima a kwalok kidho piny pa Jofilistia; nyaka Saulo laweyo rangan aka alabedo kam'opanere.
Ameno Daudi oay gi cwo pere 600 to jokadho bongi kere ma Gath Akis wod pa Mayok.
Daudi gi cwo pere jogeto Gath gi pecin pajo bongi Akis. Daudi oyido nitie gi mon pere ario, Ahinowam ma wok Yezirel, gi Abigayili ciliendi Nabal ma wok Kamel.
Munyo Saulo owinjo ni Daudi oringo Gath, oweyo rango go.
Daudi owaco ri Akis ni, “K'inen anwaŋo wor wok bongin, weyi abedi i tindi mathin rupiri kiber an bedo kodin i tindi madwoŋ.”
Ameno Akis omiyo go tindi Ziklag, aka me ay'atoŋa m'omiyo Ziklag obedo lim pa kerin je ma jodhumo Yuda.
Daudi obedo piny Filistia ma dwe apar g'aucel.
I hongo ma Daudi gi cwo pere jobedo i piny Filistia, oyido jonyaga gigipiny pa ji ma piny Gesur, Girzi, gi Joamalek m'oyido jobedo iy'adec no wok con. Oyido jokidho kiri Sur tundo piny Misir.
Daudi oyido reyo woko cwo gi mon aka dok gi rombo, dhok, punde, kayina, kiri gi law to dok gi jo bongi Akis.
Akis oyido penjo go ni, “Konon ikidho kinyaga kune?” Daudi oyido dwoko go ni jokidho yupiny ma Yuda kosa iy'adec pa jonono pa Yeramel, kosa iy'adec pa Jokena.
Daudi oyido neko ji je, cwo gi mon, ŋey ongoye ŋati manyalo gik Gath to waco gima go gi cwo pere jotimo. Me a gima Daudi otimo i hongo je ma go obedo Gath.
Kisi ogeno Daudi to waco ni, “Ji pere Joisiraili jodak go swa, ma go ladoŋ ka tiyo ran kwo pere je.”
Munyo hongo moro okadho, Jofilistia jocokere lweny gi Joisiraili. Akis owaco ri Daudi ni, “Niaŋ ni in gi cwo perin wilalwenyo i thenge paran.”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Meno ber, ilaŋeyo gima ŋeca perin nyalo timo.” Akis owaco ri Daudi ni, “Meno ber alakethin bedo jakur paran.”
I hongo me Samwiri oyido otieko tho, Joisiraili joywako go, aka joyiko go i tindi pere Rama. Aka Saulo oyido oriemo woko jojwok gi ji ma joluwo gi tipo pa jom'otho i piny Isiraili.
Jolweny pa Jofilistia jobino to jocokere cegin gi tindi Sunem; aka Saulo gi cwo pere jocokere i got Gilbowa.
Munyo Saulo oneno jolweny pa Jofilistia, cunye ocako kirin gi lworo.
To Saulo penjo Rwoth gir'atima, to Rwoth k'odwoko go i lek, kosa gi gima jocway ri Were i wi migam jo oro ma ŋeyo mito pa Were, kosa luwo i jotuci wac Were.
Kenyo Saulo owaco ri cwo pere rango rigo dhako ma luwo gi tipo pa jom'otho ŋey okidhi bonge openji go. Cwo pere jowaco rigo ni nitie dhako ma luwo gi tipo pa jom'otho i tindi Endor.
Ameno Saulo orukere i nger matek niaŋ kwoŋe. Aka munyo piny olokere macol, go gi cwo pere ario jobino bongi dhako no. Saulo owaco ri dhako no ni, “Lwoŋ ran tipo pa ŋati m'akidho waco rin nyinge.”
Dhako no odwoko ni, “Adieri iŋeyo paka Saulo oriemo woko jojwogi gi ji ma luwo gi tipo pa jom'otho i piny Isiraili. To onyo raŋo imito ciko an ŋey onekan?”
Saulo okwoŋere ri dhako no i nyingi Rwoth to waco rigo ni ongoye gir'acula m'ibino miyo go.
Dhako no openjo Saulo ni, “Alwoŋ rin tipo pa ŋa?”
Saulo odwoko ni tipo pa Samwiri.
Munyo dhako no oneno tipo pa Samwiri, okoko malo, aka owaco ni, “Raŋo iwondan? In kere Saulo!”
Saulo owaco rigo ni, “Ikir'ilwor. Aŋo m'ineno?”
Dhako no odwoko ni, “Aneno were wok piny.”
Saulo openjo go ni, “cale nedi?”
Dhako no odwoko go ni, “Manago jal m'oti ama wok piny aka oruko kanzu.”
Saulo oniaŋ ni manago Samwiri, okulo wiye piny i wor to bwonere.
Samwiri openjo Saulo ni, “Raŋo icandan gi kelan malo?”
Saulo odwoko ni, “Anitie i teko! Jofilistia jobino lweny kodan, aka Were ojwangan doko kidwokan. Go kidwokan kada i lek kosa luwo i jotuci wac Were. Riameno alwoŋin iwaci ran gir'atima.”
Samwiri owaco ri Saulo ni, “Raŋo i penjan k'inen Rwoth ojwangin, aka olokere jakwor perin?
Rwoth otimo rin gima go ndelo no owaco rin luwo i an; Rwoth oyeco woko ker wok i cingin to miyo jager perin Daudi.
Rupiri ikiwinjo dwondi Rwoth to ikwero reyo woko Joamalek gi gigipiny pajo je, riameno Rwoth otimo rin gime konon.
Aka kiri Rwoth bino miyo in gi Joisiraili i cingi Jofilistia; aka dikin in gi wotin wilabino kam'anitie iye. Rwoth lamiyo jolweny pa Joisiraili i cingi Jofilistia.”
Gima Samwiri owaco obwoko Saulo, aka opodho piny to riere rupiri oyido k'ocemo ndelo no gi wor gipi, aka meni oyido ongoye kwoŋe.
Dhako no okidho bonge to neno nger m'oyido lworo omako go, aka owaco rigo ni, “Mondo jadwoŋ, ajwango kwo paran t'atimo gim'ikwayan.
Riameno in bende winji ŋeca perin; weyi atedi rin cemo moro icami ŋey ilimi meni ma woth.”
Saulo okwero, aka owaco ni kilacamo gimoro je. To cwo pere ario ma go owotho gi jo jonaŋo go; go oyeyo, aka oay malo to bedo gi madeko.
Dhako no oredo to thumo nyathi dhiaŋ ma go oyido kwayo. Okwanyo moko ŋano aka otedo mugat ma k'oketh'iye gima miyo mugat yenyo.
Dhako no otoko ri Saulo gi cwo pere cemo to jocemo. Joay to jokadho wor no.
Jolweny pa Jofilistia jocokere i tindi Afek, aka jolweny pa Joisiraili jocokere milelo i tindi Yezirel.
Kerin abic pa Jofilistia joŋanjo gi jolweny pajo i kitipin ma miya gi ganin; aka Daudi gi cwo pere joŋaŋo yu dieŋey jo gi kere Akis.
Jomituka jolweny pa Jofilistia joneno Daudi gi cwo pere to jopenjo ni, “Joebulaniya me jotimo aŋo ka?”

Kere Akis odwoko jomituka jolweny pa Jofilistia ni, “Me Daudi ŋeca pa Saulo, kere pa Joisiraili. Go otieko bedo kodan ma hongo malac tundo gunyo ni; aka fodi akinwaŋo kwoŋe raco moro je cuka go bin bongan.”

Jomituka jolweny pa Jofilistia jomako nge gi Akis to waco rigo dhiro Daudi ogik i tindi ma Akis omiyo go; aka jokwero Daudi kidho i lweny gi jo rupiri joparo ni go bino lokirok jakwor pajo to neko jo ma mito dwoŋo Saulo.
Jomedo waco ni, “Me ki Daudi ma mon jowero kwoŋe to jomielo ni,
‘Saulo oneko ganin pere,
aka Daudi piero ganin pere?’ ”

Akis olwoŋo Daudi bonge to waco rigo ni, “Akwoŋere rin i nyingi Rwoth makwo ni, oyido ibedo ran jar'adieri, aka oyido awinjo maber yeyin kidho kodan i lweny. Ongoye komo m'atieko nwaŋo kwoŋin wok cuka ibin bongan. To kerin man jokiwinji maber kodin.
Riameno dok i siem, aka Ikir'itim gima bino miyo jo winjo marac.”
Daudi openjo Akis ni, “Aŋo marac m'atimo jadwoŋ? K'inen iwaco ni fodi ikinwaŋo komo i an wok cuka acak tiyo rin, t'onyo raŋo akir'akadhi kodin jadwoŋ paran kere, lweny gi jokwor perin?”
Akis odwoko Daudi ni, “Ri an won aŋeyo paka ingoye g'apuse ruwaŋan pa malaika pa Were; to kad'ameno jomituka jolweny pa Jofilistia man jowaco ni, ‘Ikilakidho gi wan i lweny.’
Riameno dikin odikin in gi cwo perin ma wiringo wok bongi Saulo to wibino bongan; wiripo ay odikin swa to wikadho mafodi waŋceŋ k'owoki.”
Ameno Daudi gi cwo pere joay yawere odikin to jogik Filistia, aka Jofilistia jomedere kadho i Yezirel.
Munyo Daudi jotundo Ziklag i ndelo mar'adek, Joamalek oyido jomonjo yupiny ma piny Yuda gi Ziklag aka jowaŋo gi mac.
Jok'oneko nyatoro kad'acel, aka jomako ji je to jokadho gi jo.
Munyo Daudi gi cwo pere jotundo, jonwaŋo ni tindi pajo owaŋ aka mon pajo, gi nyithindho pajo je okadhi gi jo.
Daudi gi cwo pere jotiŋo dwondi gin malo to jogoyo ndur, aka joywak cuka meni oloyo jo ma ywak.
Mon pa Daudi ario, Ahinowam ma wok Yezirel, gi Abigayili ciliendi Nabal ma wok Kamel je okadhi gi jo.
Daudi oyido nitie i teko rupiri cwo pere oyido jonitie gi gwayo i cuny jo aka oyido joluwo kwoŋ goyo Daudi gi telin ro nyithindho pajo. To Rwoth Were pere miyo go miseni.
Daudi owaco ri wod pa Ahimelek, Abiatha jacway ri Were i wi migam kelo rigo law ma jocway ri Were i wi migam joruko.
Daudi openjo Rwoth ni, “K'anoluw Joamalek me anomaki jo?”
Rwoth odwoko go ni, “Luw jo ilamako jo to ibotho ji ma jomako je.”
Ameno to Daudi gi cwo pere 600 jokadho to jotundo milelo, aka jomegi jodoŋ kenyo.
Daudi gi cwo pere 400 jomedere; aka cwo 200 oyido meni oloyo jo ma jok'onyalo kalo milelo to jodoŋ kenyo.
Cwo pa Daudi jonwaŋo jacwo moro ma Jamisir i thim to jokelo go bongi Daudi; aka jomiyo go mugat gi pi.
Jomiyo go bende nyandere m'othwo, gi kayego ario ma nyingi vini m'othwo. Munyo jacwo no otieko camo, meni odwoko kwoŋe; rupiri go oyido ocowo ndelo adek ma k'ocemo kosa madho gimoro.
Daudi openjo Jamisir no ni, “Ŋa ma jadwoŋ perin, aka iwok kune?”
Go odwoko ni, “An abedo Jamisir, aka abedo ŋeca pa Jaamalek. Jadwoŋ paran oweyan cen rupiri two omakan ndelo adek cen.
Oyido wakwalo iy'adec pa Jokereth yupiny ma piny Yuda, gi iy'adec pa jonono pa Kaleb, aka wawaŋo Ziklag.”
Daudi openjo go ni, “Ilateran bongi Joamalek no?”
Jamisir odwoko Daudi ni, “K'ikwoŋere ran i nyingi Were ni ikilanekan, aka ikilamiyan i cingi jadwoŋ paran, alaterin bongi jo.”
Kenyo go otero Daudi bongi jo.
Joamalek oyido joywore kisi kamoro, jocemo, jomedho, aka jofore ro gigipiny kweth m'oyido jonyaga wok bongi Jofilistia gi piny Yuda.

Yawere odikin munyo nyaka piny cot, Daudi gi cwo pere jomonjo Joamalek, aka jolwenyo tundo othieno. Ongoye kada Jaamalek acel m'onyalo kwalok wok i cingi Daudi gi cwo pere, kwanyo woko yac 400 ama joidho kayina to jokwale.
Daudi obotho kisi ŋatimoro je m'oyido Joamalek jomako, kiri gi mon pere ario.
Ongoye kada gimoro acel m'orwenyo. Daudi obotho nyithindho pa cwo pere je, kiri gi gigipiny ma Joamalek oyido jonyaga.
Daudi bende omako ogwaŋe; aka cwo pere jocwayo dhok no yuwiy jo to jowaco ni, “Me je gigipiny pa Daudi.”
Kenyo Daudi ogik bongi cwo pere 200 m'oyido meni oloyo jo ma kadho gi Daudi to jodoŋ milelo Besor. Jobino to jojolo Daudi gi cwo pere 400 aka Daudi ocore cegin bongi jo to m'otho jo.

To cwo pa Daudi man ma jogwondo aka bukony m'oyido jokadho gi go jowaco rigo ni, “Jono nende jok'okadho gi wan, riameno jok'olim gigipiny ma wadwoko gine. Jowokadhi gi mon kodi nyithindho pajo kende.”
To Daudi dwoko ni, “Wutmera, wikinyal timo ameno gi gima Rwoth omiyo wan; Rwoth ama ogwoko kwo mawan to miyo wan Joamalek i cingi wan
Wiparo ni nitie ŋati manyalo yerok gi win i gime! Kisi nyatoro je, ŋati ma nende okidho i lweny gi ma nende odoŋ je; lalimo rapok marom.”
Wok ndelo no Daudi oloko gime cik, aka Joisiraili fodi joluwo kiri konon.
Munyo Daudi odwoko Ziklag, odhiro ri merin pere, jotel ma Yuda mic kwoŋ gigipiny ma jodwoko gine gi mikwenda ni, “Me mic perin wok kwoŋ gigipiny ma wanyaga kwoŋ jokwor pa Rwoth.”
Odhiro ri ji ma Bethel, ji ma Rama yupiny ma piny Yuda, gi ji ma tindi Yatir.
Ri ji ma Arower, ji ma Sifimoth, ji ma Esitemowa,
ji ma Rakal, ri jonono pa Yeramel, ri Jokena
gi ri ji ma tindi Horima, Borasan, Athac,
gi ri ji ma Hebron. Odhiro i kabedo je ma go kodi cwo pere oyido jotieko tund'iye.
Jofilistia jolwenyo gi Joisiraili i got Gilbowa. Jofilistia joneko Joisiraili kweth, aka Joisiraili megi joringo kiri gi Saulo kodi wote bende joringo.
To Jofilistia joriemo jo, aka jomako jo to joneko wot Saulo adek; Yonathan, Abinadab, kodi Malikisua.
Lweny obedo malieth swa thoko Saulo, aka go won aserin pa jakwor ocwowo go to weyo kwoŋe adholin.

Saulo owaco ri jago pere ni, “Bol abor perin wonekan ŋey Jofilistia ma jok'othumere me jokiri jowonyeran to jonekan.” To jago pere k'otimo ameno, kole obedo gi lworo. Saulo won okwanyo abor pere, ocwowere gine to tho.
Munyo jago pere oneno nike go otho, go bende omako abor pere, ocwowere gine to tho kanyacel gi Saulo.
Ameno apaka Saulo, wote adek, kodi jago pere, kiri gi cwo pere jotho i ndelo no.

Munyo Joisiraili m'oyido jonitie i thenge man, milelo Yezirel kodi m'oyido jonitie yuwok ceŋ ma malawa Yordan jowinjo nike jolweny pa Joisiraili joringo, aka Saulo kodi wote je oneki, joweyo tindi pajo to joringo. Aka Jofilistia jobino to jobed'iye.
Yawere odikin munyo Jofilistia jogik kwanyo gigipiny kwoŋ delkwoŋ Joisiraili ma jotho, jonwaŋo delkwoŋ Saulo kodi wote joriere wi got Gilbowa.
Joŋado ŋuti Saulo, jokwanyo gilweny pere, aka jooro jomikwenda gi jo wotho i piny Filistia paka rom tero wac maber ri werin pajo kodi ji pajo.
Joketho gilweny pere i ot pa were pajo m'ilwoŋo ni Asitate, aka joguro delkwoŋ Saulo i kor cel ma tindi Bethsan.
Munyo ji ma Yabes i Gibeya jowinjo gima Jofilistia jotimo ri Saulo,
cwo ma jomiseni joay to jocako woth wor gipi, aka jokwanyo delkwoŋ Saulo kodi wote wok i kor cel ma tindi Bethsan, jodwoko gi jo Yabes, aka jowaŋo kenyo.
Jotero cokin pajo, aka joyiko i tiendi yath m'ilwoŋo ni tamarisk i tindi Yabes, to joriyo ma ndelo abirio.
Munyo Saulo otieko tho, Daudi odwoko wok i lweny gi Joamalek, aka obedo Ziklag ma ndelo ario.
I ndelo mar'adek odikin, jayac moro obino wok i kambi pa Saulo. Ma nyutho rem pere, oyeco nanga pere to konjo fukefuke i wiye. Okidho bongi Daudi aka obwonere to kule piny i wor.
Daudi openjo go ni, “Iwok kune?”
Go odwoko ni, “Akwale wok i kambi pa Joisiraili.”
Daudi owaco rigo ni, “Waci ran gim'otimere.”
Jayac no odwoko ni, “Jolweny mawan joringo wok i lweny, aka cwo mawan madit oneki. Saulo gi wode Yonathan bende oneki jo.”
Daudi openjo go ni, “Iŋeyo nedi ni Saulo gi Yonathan bende jotho?”
To go wire, onenan, aka olwoŋan; t'adwoko ni, ‘Jadwoŋ’
Saulo openjan ŋat'abedo, t'awaco rigo ni oyido abedo Jaamalek.
Kenyo go owaco ran ni, ‘Biye nekan! Rupiri aditi g'adhola kwoŋan, aka acegin tho.’
Ameno akidho bongi go, aka aneko go, rupiri oyido aŋeyo ni go k'okwo k'opodhi piny. Aka akwanyo sangaria pere gi atego pere wok i cinge, aka akelo rin jo jadwoŋ.”
Daudi oyeco woko law pere i rem, aka cwo pere bende jotimo ameno
jobedo gi geregere aka joywak to joriyo tundo othieno ri Saulo gi wode Yonathan kodi ri ji pa Rwoth rupiri kweth m'oyido oneki i lweny.
Daudi openjo jayac m'okelo rigo wac ni, “Iwok kune?”
Jayac no odwoko ni, “Abedo japath, Jaamalek, t'abedo i piny perin.”
Daudi openjo go ni, “Raŋo lworo k'omakin neko ŋata Rwoth owiro gi mo bedo kere?”
Kenyo Daudi olwoŋo acel kwoŋ cwo pere, aka owaco rigo ni, “Neki go!” Aka jalo ocwowo Jaamalek to wumiya go.
Daudi owaco ri Jaamalek ni, “In won ikelo gime kwoŋin; rupiri dhokin won ama osegeya in munyo iwaco ni, ‘Aneko ŋata Rwoth owiro gi mo bedo kere.’ ”
Daudi owero ywak ajore ri Saulo gi Yonathan.
Aka owodho or ni wofonji ji ma Yuda; aka ondikere i kitawo ma Jasar.
Wer no kadho ama:
I wi tendere ma Isiraili, jotel mawan jotho!
Jolweny mawan ma jomiseni jopodho!
Ikir'ilanga wac me i Gath
kosa i yo ma Asikelon.
Ikir'imiy mon ma Filistia jowosangala,
ikir'imiy nyir pa joma bu Were jowosiemere.
Weyi koth kosa thoyo okir ooy wi got Gilbowa;
ndelin mere wobedi abar!
Kwot pa jomiseni onindo i wickwot;
kwot pa Saulo doko kigoy gi mo.
Kwot pa Yonathan oyido otiŋo tho
abor pa Saulo oyido ongoye gi wor,
turo jomaker, aka neko jokwor.
Saulo gi Yonathan merin aka jomare
kanyacel i kwo kiri gi i tho;
Jodwir loyo otengo, aka jomeni loyo simbwor.
Mon ma Isiraili goy win ndur ri Saulo
Go oruko win gi nangin mafoth m'obokere
aka gi thiwino ma zahabu.
Jolweny ma jomiseni jopodho,
oneki jo i lweny
Yonathan onindo m'otho i wi tendere.
Arem rin, omin an Yonathan;
oyido ibedo mere paran ma kacunyan!
Mar perin ran oyido oasere,
oyido oasere loyo kiri mar pa mon.
Jolweny ma jomiseni jopodho,
aka gilweny pajo ojwangere aka bukony.
Munyo gigipiny no otieko timirok, Daudi openjo Rwoth ni, “Akidhi adhum acel kwoŋ tindin ma Yuda?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Ey kadhi.”
Daudi doko to penjo ni, “Mene?”
To Rwoth dwoko ni, “Hebron.”
Ameno Daudi okidho Hebron, kanyacel gi mon pere ario; Ahinowam ma wok Yezirel, kodi Abigayili, ciliendi Nabal ma wok Kamel.
Okadho bende gi cwo pere kodi pecin pajo to jogeto pecin i tindi Hebron.
Kenyo cwo ma Yuda jobino Hebron, aka jowiro Daudi gi mo bedo kere ma Yuda.
Munyo Daudi owinjo ni ji ma Yabes i tindi Giliad joyiko delkwoŋ Saulo,
odhiro rijo cwo pere moro gi mikwenda ni, “Weyi Rwoth womiy win silwany ma nyutho wor ri kere mewin to wiyiko go.
Aka onyo weyi Rwoth bende wonyuthi win mar makirum g'adieri pere. An bende abino tero win maber ro gima witimo.
Bedi win jomeni aka jomiseni! Saulo kere mewin otho, aka ji ma Yuda jotieko wiran gi mo bedo kere pajo.”
Jamituka jolweny pa Saulo, Abuner wod pa Ner oyido oringo gi wod pa Saulo Isiboseth, aka otero go Mahanayim.
Kenyo Abuner oketho Isiboseth kere mar'adec ma Giliad, Aser, Yezirel, Efrayim, kodi Benyamin, gi Isiraili gipi.
Isiboseth oyido jaoro 40 munyo okethi go bedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo ma oro ario.
To Joyuda oyido joworo Daudi
aka Daudi odhumo Hebron paka kere ma Yuda ma oro abirio g'adec.
Ndelo acel, Abuner gi jolweny pa Isiboseth jokadho wok Mahanayim kiri i tindi madwoŋ Gibeon.
Yowab, wod pa Zeruya, gi cwo pa Daudi man jonwaŋo jo jobedo i kidiwa, kama jobedo piny, kitipa acel i thenge acel, aka kitipa man i thenge ca.
Abuner owaco ri Yowab ni, “Weyi cwo mawan moro wok i kisi thenge jowoay malo jopiem lweny ruwaŋ wan.”
Yowab odwoko ni, “Weyi jowoay.”
Ameno cwo apar g'ario wok i thenge pa Isiboseth wod pa Saulo, aka jonono pa Benyamin joay malo lweny gi cwo pa Daudi apar g'ario.
Kisi jacwo omako jakwor pere gi ŋute, aka orwako toŋ i ŋuti jakwor pere; aka joje piero ario g'aŋwen jopodho piny to jotho kanyacel. Aka kabedo no i Gibeon ilwoŋo ni, “Kisawe mar'abor.”
Ameno won lweny otur, aka cwo pa Daudi jokengila Abuner gi Joisiraili.
Wot dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Zeruya adek, Yowab, Abisay, gi Asahel m'oyido jodwir pa amudhe,
jocako riemo Abuner kanyo joringo tirtir gi go.
Abuner oŋiyo cen aka openjo ni, “Meno in Asahel?”
Asahel odwoko ni, “Obedo an.”
Abuner owaco ri Asahel ni, “Weyi rieman! Riemi acel kwoŋ cwo paran imaki aka inyaga gima nitie gine.” To Asahel omedere riemo go.
Abuner doko owaco ri Asahel ni, “Weyi rieman, raŋo imito anekin?”
To Asahel k'oweyo riemo go. Ameno Abuner ocwowo iy Asahel gi loki toŋ pere to wok gi yuŋey go aka Asahel opodho piny kenyo to tho. Aka kisi ŋat'obino kama Asahel opodho iye to tho ocungo liŋ.
To Yowab gi Abisay joriemo Abuner, aka munyo waŋceŋ podho jotundo i tendere ma Ama, manitie yuthenge ma wok ceŋ ma Giya i yo ma kidho i thim ma Gibeon.
Cwo ma nono pa Benyamin jocokere thoko Abuner aka joyere kanyacel i wi tendere.
Abuner okoko ri Yowab ka penjo ni, “Wanomedere nekirok gi toŋ cil gi cil? Ikineni ni cowe mere labedo gwayo? Oterin hongo aŋo ŋey inocer cwo perin riemo wan?”
Yowab odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere rin i nyingi Were makwo ni ka bedi ikiluwo, adieri cwo paran di joriemo win tundo dikin odikin.”
