Ameno Yowab okudho gwara ma nyutho cwo pere ni jowey riemo Joisiraili; aka kenyo nyaka to lweny jukere.
Abuner gi cwo pere jokadho wor no aka joluwo gi Araba, joŋado malawa Yordan, aka munyo jotieko woth yawere odikin gipi, jotundo Mahanayim.
Munyo Yowab oweyere gi riemo Abuner gi cwo pere, ocoko cwo pere je aka onwaŋo ni apar g'abuŋwen oyido jongoye, kiri gi Asahel.
Cwo pa Daudi oyido joneko cwo pa Abuner jonono pa Benyamin 360.
Yowab gi cwo pere jotero delkwoŋ Asahel aka joyiko i kaliel pa bamere i Bethelehem. Kenyo Yowab gi cwo pere jowotho wor gipi aka piny ocot rijo munyo jotundo Hebron.
Lweny i dier ot pa Saulo gi ot pa Daudi omedere ma hongo malac; aka Daudi olokere matek kendo matek, to jokwor pere jolokere manyap kendo manyap.
Me wot Daudi m'onywol rigo i Hebron i nywolirok pajo. Okayo pere oyido Amon ma min oyido obedo Ahinowam ma wok Yezirel,
mar'ario obedo Kiliab wod pa Abigayili ma wok Kamel, m'oyido ciliendi Abigayili, mar'adek obedo Absalom wod pa Maka nyar Talmay kere ma Gerihur.
Mar'aŋwen obedo Adoniya wod pa Hagith, mar'abic obedo Sefatiya wod pa Abital,
aka mar'aucel obedo Ithirim wod pa Egila.
Munyo lweny medere i dier ot pa Saulo gi ot pa Daudi, Abuner omedere lokirok ŋatadwoŋ i ot pa Saulo.
Ndelo acel, Isiboseth osegeya Abuner nindo gi Rizipa nyar Aya m'oyido cipa Saulo ma gi thenge.

Wac me omiyo Abuner lokirok mager aka owaco ni, “Iparo ni anyalo camo ri Saulo sereko? Iparo ni abedo ŋeca pa Yuda? Wok i ndelo marapena aworo benin Saulo, wutmin go, gi merin pere, aka atieko bothin kwoŋ Daudi kikengila in; kucel onyo konon inwaŋo kwoŋan raco ro dhako.
Were wonekan k'inen akicowo ri Daudi gima Rwoth ociko go;
kwanyo woko ker wok i ot pa Saulo, aka ketho dhum pa Daudi kwoŋ Isiraili gi Yuda gipi, wok Dan tundo Berseba.”
Aka Isiboseth k'odwoko wac kendo rupiri oyido lworo Abuner.
Abuner ooro jomikwenda moro bongi Daudi m'oyido nitie Hebron waco rigo ni, “Ŋa ma kidho dhumo piny me? Tim kodan cikirok, aka abino thielin loko Isiraili paka rom aperin.”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Meno ber. Alatimo kodin cikirok k'itimo gimoro acel. Iripo kelo Mikal nyar Saulo bongan k'ibino nenan.”
Aka Daudi odhiro ri Isiboseth wac ni, “Dwoki ran dhako paran Mikal rupiri anywomo go gi kwo pa Jofilistia miya acel.”
Ameno Isiboseth ooro cwo pere kwanyo Mikal kwoŋ cwore Paltiel wod pa Layis.
To cwore luwo go kiri i tindi Bahurim kanyo ywako go. To munyo Abuner owaco ri Paltiel ni wodoki peco pere, otimo ameno.
Abuner okidho bongi jotel ma Isiraili aka owaco rijo ni, “Wok con oyido wimito ni Daudi wobedi kere mewin.
Pama silwany mewin ee. Poyi win ni Rwoth otieko waco ni, ‘Alaoro ŋeca paran Daudi botho ji paran Isiraili wok i cingi Jofilistia kodi kwoŋ jokwor pajo man je.’ ”
Abuner oluwo bende gi jonono pa Benyamin aka okidho Hebron to waco ri Daudi gima jonono pa Benyamin gi Joisiraili joyere ni ber timo.
Munyo Abuner obino bongi Daudi Hebron gi cwo piero ario, Daudi otimo rijo kalima.

Abuner owaco ri Daudi ni, “Weyi alaay t'akidho aka alaywayo Joisiraili je i thenge perin jadwoŋ paran kere; ŋey jowotimi cikirok kodin, aka idhumi kisi gima cunyin yenyo.” Ameno Daudi oyere gi Abuner aka osewila go to kadho i siem.

Rumacen Yowab gi cwo pa Daudi man jowok kam'oyido jonyag'iye aka jodwoko gi gigipiny mathoth ma jonyaga. To Abuner oyido otieko eye kenyo bongi Daudi rupiri Daudi oyido otieko kisewila go, aka go oyido otieko kadho i siem.
Munyo Yowab gi cwo pere jotundo, nyatoro moro owaco ri Yowab ni, “Abuner wod pa Ner nende obino ka bongi kere Daudi aka kere oweyo go to kadho i siem.”
Ameno Yowab okidho bongi kere aka owaco rigo ni, “Itimo aŋo? Neni, Abuner obino bongin t'iweyo go kadhi i siem?
Iŋeyo paka Abuner wod pa Ner obino nyaka wondin gi niaŋ kisi gim'itimo gi kam'initie iye.”
Munyo Yowab oeye bongi Daudi, ooro jomikwenda bongi Abuner aka jonwaŋo go i waŋ pi ma Sira to jodwoko gi go. Daudi oyido k'oŋeyo kwoŋe.
Munyo otundi gi Abuner Hebron, Yowab oywayo go gi thenge i waŋkac paŋini oyido mito luwo gine manyaliŋliŋ; aka kenyo ocwowo iye. Aka ameno Yowab oneko Abuner rupiri go oneko Asahel omin Yowab.
Munyo Daudi owinjo wac me, owaco ni, “Rwoth oŋeyo paka an gi ji paran wangoye gi banja ro tho pa Abuner.

Weyi gir'acula mere wopodhi kwoŋ Yowab gi peco pere. I kisi luse ji ma peco pere bino bedo jacwo moro manitie gi nyac kosa dhowo; kosa ma latimo tic pa mon, kosa m'ilaneko i lweny, kosa langoye gi cemo.”
Ameno Yowab gi omin go Abisay joculo kwor kwoŋ Abuner ro neko omin jo Asahel i lweny i Gibeon.
Daudi omiyo Yowab gi cwo pere cik yeco woko nangin pajo, aka joruko kutiya to joywako Abuner; aka i liel, kere Daudi won am'owotho yuŋey del pa jatho.
Oyiki Abuner i Hebron; aka kere otiŋo dwonde malo to goyo ndur i kaliel pa Abuner aka ji je bende joywak.
Daudi owero ajore me ri Abuner,
“Raŋo Abuner itho pa jamiŋo?
Cingin oyido k'otwey,
aka tiendin oyido k'otwey
itho paka ŋata jonek joneko.”
Aka ji joywako Abuner kendo.
I ndelo no gipi ji jotemo naŋo Daudi ni wocemi, to go kwero; aka okwoŋere ni, “Weyi Were wonekan k'acemo mafodi piny k'oyutho.”
Ji jomako gime i cuny gin aka osiemo jo; adieri kisi gima kere Daudi otimo osiemo jo.
Ji pa Daudi je kiri gi Joisiraili je joniaŋ ni Daudi oyido bubanja ro tho pa Abuner.
Kere Daudi openjo cwo pere ni, “Wikipar ni konon jatel madwoŋ otho Isiraili?
Makada nende abedo kere ma Were am'oyero, awinjo manyap konon. Wot dhakodwoŋ Zeruya me joasa bedo ran gi maker. Weyi Rwoth womiy jo gir'acula ma ripo gi kidakana pajo.”
Munyo Isiboseth wod pa Saulo owinjo ni oneki Abuner i Hebron, obedo gi lworo, aka Joisiraili je meni oloyo jo.
Isiboseth oyido nitie gi jotel pa jokinyaga ario; nyingi jo Bana gi Rekab wot jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Rimon janono Benyamin ma wok i tindi Beroth. (Beroth obedo adec ma Benyamin.
Ji m'oyido jobedo kenyo con joringo i tindi Gitayim, kama jobed'iye jopath kiri konon.)
Ndelo acel, Rekab gi Bana jokidho peco pa Isiboseth cegin sawa aucel, aka jonwaŋo go ywomere m'odieceŋ.
Dhako m'oyido jakur ma dhiot oyido ool swa ro piedho ŋano, aka oyido nindo. Ameno Rekab gi Bana jokwale to jodonjo i ot.
Munyo jodonjo i ot, jokidho i kisika pa Isiboseth kama nindo oyido okwal'iye go aka joneko go. Joŋado ŋuti Isiboseth aka jokadho gine. Joluwo i milelo ma Yordan.

Munyo jotundo Hebron, jomiyo Daudi wic Isiboseth aka jowaco rigo ni, “Wic Isiboseth wod pa jakwor perin Saulo m'otemo nekin ee. Konon me Rwoth oyeyin jadwoŋ kere culo kwor kwoŋ Saulo gi nyithindho pere.”
Daudi odwoko jo ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo, m'obothan i teko je!
Jamikwenda m'obino bongan Ziklag to waco ran kwoŋ tho pa Saulo oyido oparo ni okelo ran wac maber. To amako go aka aneko go. Meno a kemba m'amiyo go ri wac pere maber.
Onyo anomiy kemba madwoŋ nedi ri cwo ma jokidakana ma joneko ŋata bubanja m'oyido nindo i kitanda pere! Onyo pama alaculo kwoŋ win kwor ma neko go aka alareyo woko kwo mewin wok i piny.”
Daudi omiyo cwo pere cik aka cwo pere joneko Rekab gi Bana to joŋado cingi gin gi tiendi gin aka joŋawo cegin gi kidiwa i Hebron. Jotero ŋuti Isiboseth to joyiko i kaliel pa Abuner i Hebron.
Kenyo nonin je ma Isiraili jobino bongi Daudi i Hebron aka jowaco rigo ni, “Neni, wabedo ji acel aka remo acel.
Cango munyo Saulo oyido fodi kere mawan, oyido itelo Joisiraili i lweny aka Rwoth ocikin nike ibino telo ji pere to ibedo jadhum pajo.”
Ameno jotel ma Isiraili je jobino bongi Daudi i Hebron; aka kere Daudi otimo gi jo cikirok ruwaŋ Rwoth aka jowiro Daudi gi mo bedo kere ma Isiraili.
Daudi oyido jaoro piero adek munyo go ocako dhum; aka odhumo ma oro piero aŋwen.
Gi Hebron, Daudi odhumo ma oro abirio g'adec, aka i Yerusalem go odhumo Isiraili gi Yuda ma oro piero adek g'adek.

Hongo otundo ma Daudi kodi cwo pere jokidho monjo Joyebus m'oyido jobedo i Yerusalem m'oyido joparo nike Daudi kinyal mako tindi madwoŋ me. Jowaco ri Daudi ni, “Ikinyal donjo ka. Joma waŋ gin otho kodi jor'aŋolo jonyalo cerin.”
(To makad'ameno, Daudi omako tindi madwoŋ pajo; aka ocaki lwoŋo nike tindi pa Daudi).

I ndelo no Daudi openjo cwo pere ni, “Nitie ka ŋat'odak Joyebus paka an? Ere weyi go woidhi fereji ma pi womonji jor'aŋolo ma waŋ gin otho no.” Meno am'omiyo iwaco ni, “Jor'aŋolo gi ji ma waŋ gin otho jokinyal donjo i Ot pa Rwoth.”
Rumacen munyo Daudi otieko mako Yerusalem, obed'iye, aka olwoŋo ni tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi. Daudi ogeto tindi madwoŋ me thoko, cako kama lowo oyido opoŋ'iye tundo yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ matendere.
Daudi omedo lokirok matek, kole Rwoth oyido nitie gi go.
Hiram kere ma Tire ooro jomikwenda bongi Daudi gi kasike ma yath vini gi jobol ot, gi jogeto ot gi tele geto ri Daudi peco pa kere.
Aka Daudi oniaŋ nike Rwoth oyido oyero go bedo kere ma Isiraili aka oyido tiŋo malo ker pere ro Joisiraili.
Munyo Daudi tuk wok Hebron kadho Yerusalem, okadho gi mon man kodi malayin; aka jonywolo rigo nyithindho man.
Onywol ri Daudi nyithindho me gi Yerusalem; Samuwa, Sobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibihar, Elisuwa, Nefeg, Yafia,
Elisama, Eliada, gi Elifelet.
Munyo Jofilistia jowinjo nike owir Daudi paka kere ma Isiraili, jolweny pajo jokidho dwaro go; to Daudi owinjo aka oloro to kadho kam'otimba.
Jofilistia jotundo i milelo Refayim to jocokere kenyo.
Daudi openjo Rwoth ni, “Amonji Jofilistia? Inomiyan jo i cingan?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Ey monji jo aka alamiyo jo i cingin.”
Ameno Daudi obino Bal Perizim aka kenyo okengila Jofilistia. Daudi owaco ni, “Rwoth otieko baro i dier jokwor paran pa mikula pi.” Aka olwoŋi kenyo ni Bal Perazim.
Munyo Jofilistia joringo, joweyo cal pajo cen, aka Daudi gi cwo pere jotiŋo to jokadho gine.
Jofilistia kendo jogik i milelo Refayim aka jocokere kenyo.
Daudi openjo Rwoth kendo, aka Rwoth odwoko go ni, “Ikir'imonji jo gi ka, to thoki jo aka iyikere monjo jo gi yuthenge ca, cegin gi yen m'ilwoŋo ni Balisam.
K'iwinjo mayindo ma ŋanjo i wi yen, kenyo monji rupiri meno labedo ranyuth nike aŋanjo yuwiyin kikengila jolweny pa Jofilistia.”
Daudi otimo paka Rwoth omiyo go or nike wotim, aka oneko Jofilistia wok i Geba tundo kiri Gezer.
Daudi doko oyero cwo pere maber loyo ma romo 30,000
aka otelo jo kadho Bala i Yuda, ŋey jowokeli wok kenyo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were, m'ilwoŋo gi nyingi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny m'obedo i ker pere malo pa cwec ma jobwombi gin m'ilwoŋo ni Kerubim
Jotiŋo wok peco pa Abinadab wok i kacowirok, aka joketho i magal manyen. Uza kodi Ahiyo wot Abinadab am'oyido jogweyo magal manyen me
m'oyido otiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were aka Ahiyo am'oyido otelo wotho yuwiy magal.
Daudi kodi Joisiraili oyido jomielo aka jowero gi meni pajo je. Aka oyido jogoyo tongol, adungu, bunde, nyweny m'irudo kodi seke.
Munyo jotundo i kisia Nacon, thwondhe jocer, aka Uza otelo cinge to geyo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were.
Nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ Uza aka Were oneko go rupiri otelo cinge to geyo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were. Uza otho i ŋeti Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were.
Daudi omako nge rupiri Rwoth omiyo Uza gir'acula i nge; aka kabedo no olwoŋi ni Perez Uza.
Daudi olworo Rwoth ndelo no aka openjere ni, “Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth obin nedi bongan!”
Ameno go owiro paro pere ma tero Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi; aka otero i ot pa Obed Edom, ma wok i tindi Gath.
Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were obedo i ot pa Obed Edom ma dwe adek, aka Rwoth omiyo Obed Edom kodi peco pere je silwany.

Kere Daudi owinjo nike Rwoth oyido omiyo Obed Edom gi peco pere silwany ro Kakan ma Cikirok. Ameno Daudi okadho aka oomo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were wok peco pa Obed Edom to tero i Yerusalem gi siemirok.
Munyo cwo ma jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth jokalo tiendi jo aucel, Daudi ojuko jo; aka omiyo Rwoth cowirok ma thwon kodi rwath dhiaŋ.
Daudi oyido mielo malomalo gi meni pere je ruwaŋ Rwoth; aka oyido otweyo law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam i piere
Ameno Daudi kodi Joisiraili je jotero Kakan ma Cikirok kiri Yerusalem gi koko ma kisangala aka oyido jokudho gwara.
Munyo jotero Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were i tindi madwoŋ, Mikal, nyar Saulo oleŋo waŋe gi dirisa aka oneno kere Daudi mielo ka por malo ruwaŋ Rwoth to cayo go i cunye.
Aka jokelo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth to joketho i wema ma Daudi oyido ogero rigo; aka Daudi omiyo Rwoth cowirok awaŋa kodi ma siem.
Aka munyo Daudi otieko miyo cowirok, omiyo ji silwany i nyingi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Daudi opoko ji je, Joisiraili gipi, mon gi cwo, kisi nyatoro, mugat gi muma riŋo abula, gi nyingi vini m'othwo. Kenyo jokedhere aka kisi nyatoro odok peco pere.
Rumacen munyo Daudi odok peco motho jopeco pere, Mikal owok to bino romo gine aka oŋalo go ni, “Kere ma Isiraili konon olimo dwoŋ. Onyuthere pa jamiŋo ruwaŋ ŋecin pere ma jobedo mon pa jotel pere.”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Oyido amielo ma miyo Rwoth dwoŋ, go m'oyeran makiweno benin gi peco pere; aka okethan jatel pa ji pere Isiraili. Aka alamedere miel ma miyo Rwoth dwoŋ,
aka alokere ŋatamiŋ kiri loyo. Inyalo paro nike asisiri, to mon m'iluwo kwoŋ jo no jobino miyan wor.”
Aka Mikal nyar Saulo k'onywolo nyithindho ro gime.
Kere Daudi oripo peco pere, aka Rwoth ogwoko go kwoŋ jokwor pere je.
Kenyo to kere waco ri Nathan jatuci wac Were ni, “Neni pama, an abedo i ot m'ogeti gi mbawo matek ma yath sida, to Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were bedo i wema.”
Nathan odwoko go ni, “Tim gima nitie i paro perin je; kole Rwoth nitie kodin.”
To wor no won Rwoth to waco ri Nathan ni,
“Kadhi iwaci ri ŋeca paran Daudi ni, ‘Rwoth waco nike iŋat'ikila geto ran ot ma bed'iye.
Wok i hongo m'aboth'iye ji paran Joisiraili wok i piny Misir tundo gunyo ni, fodi akibedo i ot; to oyido awotho gi jo munyo abedo i wema.
I kabedo moro je m'atieko woth'iye gi ji paran Joisiraili, fodi akiluwo gi jotel pajo m'ayero dhumo jo t'awaco nike raŋo jo kigeti ran ot ma mbawo matek ma yath sida.’
Riameno wac ri ŋeca paran Daudi nike An, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, waco rigo ni, ‘Akwanyin i kwath rombo i sa t'alokin jadhum pa ji paran Isiraili.
Atieko bedo kodin kamoro je m'itieko kadh'iye, aka atieko kikengila jokwor perin je ruwaŋin. Abino miyo nyingin bedo madwoŋ paka jodhum madongo i piny.
Aka abino yero kabedo ri ji paran Isiraili, aka alapidho tiendi jo kenyo kapa jo wegi m'ongoye ŋata bino cando jo kendo; aka cwo ma jomaker jokibino miyo jo litho paka cango;
wok cuka ayero jotel ri ji paran Isiraili. Jokwor perin kendo jokilacandin. Aciko gwokin kwoŋ jokwor perin je aka alamiyin nyikwayin.
K'inotho, t'iyikin gi kwarere mewin in, abino loko wodin acel kere aka abino loko ker pere matek.
Go ama bino geto ran ot, aka alaneno nike dhum pere medere cil gi cil.
Alabedo bamere, aka go bino bedo wodan. Ka go otim reco, abino miyo go gir'acula paka ba nyathi miyo wode gir'acula.
T'akibino kwanyo woko mar paran kwoŋ go paka atimo ri Saulo; m'akwanyo woko bedo kere to akethin.
Aka noknok ibino bedo gi nyikwayin, aka abino miyo ker perin kiyindira cil gi cil. Dhum perin kilabedo gi gike.’ ”
Nathan owaco ri Daudi kisi gima Were owaco rigo.
Kenyo Daudi okadho to donjo i wema ruwaŋ Rwoth, obedo piny aka okwayo ama, “Abedo ŋa, Rwoth Were, aka peco paran a ginaŋo ma ikelan tundo ka?
Aka kiri me oyido obedo gimathin i waŋin Rwoth Were; iluwo kwoŋ nyikwayan i hongo ma bino yuwiye, aka inyuthan luse ma yuwiye Rwoth Were.
Aka onyo Daudi owaci rin aŋo kendo; rupiri iŋeyan, awi Rwoth Were!
Kole obedo mito perin kodi atoŋa perin timo gime; itimo gigipiny madongo me je ma fonjan.
Riameno idwoŋ Rwoth Were; rupiri ongoye ŋata pimere kodin, aka ongoye Were man ma cale in, ro gima watieko winjo je gi ithi wan.

Ongoye nono man i piny ma cale gi Isiraili, m'ibotho wok i twec bedo ji perin. Gigipiny madongo kodi gir'aura m'itimo rijo omiyo nyingin dwoŋ i piny gibe. Ibotho ji perin wok i Misir aka iriemo woko nonin man munyo ji perin jowotho.
Itieko loko Isiraili ji perin cil gi cil, aka in Rwoth, ibedo Were pajo.”
“Aka onyo pama Rwoth Were, ridhi cil gi cil wac m'iluwo kwoŋ ŋeca perin kodi nyikwaye aka tim gim'iwaco.
Ji jobino tiŋo nyingin malo cil gi cil ka jowaco ni, ‘Rwoth pa lwak jolweny obedo Were i Isiraili.’ Aka ibino kuro dhum paran i hongo je.
Kole in, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili inyuthan, ŋeca perin gime aka itieko waco ran nike ibino loko nyikwayan kerin.
Aka onyo pama Rwoth Were, in ibedo Were; aka noknok ikuro cikirok perin, aka itieko timo cikirok ma gir'aura me ran.
Onyo riameno akwayin imiy nyikwayan silwany, ŋey jowomedere siemirok i wor perin. Kole in, Rwoth Were itieko ciko gime, aka gi silwany perin nyikwayan jobino bedo josilwany cil gi cil.”
Rumacen ma hongo moro, kere Daudi omonjo Jofilistia kendo, aka okengila jo to kelo dhum pajo i gike i lowo no.
Daudi bende okengila Jomowab; omako jo aka omiyo jo nindo piny i lowo aka oneko j'ario kwoŋ kisi ji adek. Jomowab jolokere ŋecin pere aka joculo go misolo.
Daudi bende okengila kere ma piny Siria, Hadadeza wod pa Rehob munyo Hadadeza oyido kidho iy'adec ma malawa Yufrete dwoko dhum pere kenyo.
Daudi omako cwo pa Hadadeza 1,700 ma jogwey kayina kodi cwo 20,000 ma jowotho atiendi. Daudi okoyo kayina ma romo cawila 100 aka otoŋo woko tiendi m'odoŋ.
Munyo Josiria m'oyido jonitie Damasiko jodhiro jolweny konyo kere Hadadeza, Daudi omonjo jo aka oneko cwo 22,000.
Aka Daudi oketho kambi ma lweny iy'adec pajo to jolokere ŋecin pere aka joculo go misolo. Rwoth omiyo Daudi loyo lweny kisi kama Daudi okadh'iye.
Daudi omako kwote ma zahabu ma ŋecin pa Hadadeza oyido jotiŋo, aka otero jo i Yerusalem.
Daudi bende okwanyo ywel madit wok Beta gi Berothay, tindin madongo ma Hadadeza oyido dhumo.
Munyo Toi, kere ma Hamath owinjo nike Daudi okengila jolweny pa Hadadeza,
odhiro wode Yoram motho Daudi kodi foyo go gi kikengila Hadadeza; m'oyido Toi olwenyo gine dikweth. Yoram otero ri Daudi mic kweth ma feza, zahabu, kodi ywel.
Kere Daudi omiyo gigipiny me ma lamo Rwoth kanyacel gi feza, kodi zahabu ma go okwanyo wok i piny je ma go oyido dhumo,
Edom, Mowab, Amon, Filistia, kodi Amalek, kodi adec ma gigipiny ma go onyaga wok bongi Hadadeza.
Daudi omedo ŋeyirok munyo odwoko wok i lweny m'oneko iye Joedom 18,000 milelo ma cumbi nwaŋere iye.
Aka oketho kambi ma lweny i piny Edom gipi, aka ji ma kenyo jolokere ŋecin pere. Rwoth omiyo Daudi loyo lweny kisi kama Daudi okidh'iye.
Daudi odhumo Isiraili paka rom; aka otero ji pere maber aka gi tiro.
Yowab wod pa Zeruya am'oyido obedo jamituka jolweny pa Daudi; aka Yehosafat wod pa Ahilud am'oyido obedo jandiko kodi kano kisi gima timere.
Zadok wod pa Ahitub, kodi Abimelek wod pa Abiatha am'oyido obedo jocway ri Were i wi migam; aka Seraya oyido obedo jandiko ma kapido.
Benaya wod pa Yehoyada oyido obedo jatel pa jokur pa Daudi; aka wot Daudi oyido jobedo jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Ndelo acel, Daudi openjo ni, “Nitie nyatoro ma fodi odoŋ wok i ot pa Saulo? K'inen nitie, amito nyutho go wor ro Yonathan.”
To nwaŋere ni oyido nitie ŋeca ma peco pa Saulo m'ilwoŋo ni Ziba; aka owaci rigo kidho bongi Daudi. Kere openjo go ni, “In i Ziba?”
Ziba odwoko ni, “An Ziba ŋeca perin jadwoŋ.”
To kere penjo go ni, “Nitie nyatoro ma fodi odoŋ i peco pa Saulo m'anyalo nyutho wor gi kisa paka ndir no akwoŋere i nyingi Were ni alatimo?”
Ziba odwoko ni, “Nitie acel kwoŋ wot Yonathan ma fodi kwo; to go oŋol.”
Kere openjo ni, “Go nitie kune?”
Ziba odwoko ni, “Go nitie peco pa Makir wod pa Amiel i tindi Lodebar.”
Ameno kere odhiro nyatoro oomo go.
Munyo Mefiboseth wod pa Yonathan aka nyakwar Saulo otundo bongi Daudi, obwonere ruwaŋ Daudi i wor. Daudi owaco rigo ni, “Mefiboseth.” Aka Mefiboseth odwoko ni, “An ŋeca perin jadwoŋ.”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Ikir'ibwoki. Alatimo kodin wor ro benin Yonathan. Abino dwoko rin lowo je m'oyido obedo apa kwarin Saulo; aka wangi ibino cemo kanyacel kodan i meza paran.”
Mefiboseth doko obwonere, aka owaco ri kere ni, “Akiber loyo kada gwok m'otho jadwoŋ! Raŋo itimo ran bero ama?”
Kenyo kere olwoŋo Ziba ŋeca pa Saulo, aka owaco rigo ni, “Amiyo Mefiboseth nyakwar jadwoŋ perin, kisi gim'oyido apa Saulo gi peco pere.

In gi wotin, gi ŋecin perin, wibino furo i lowo ma peco pa jadwoŋ perin, to wikelo rijo cemo; to Mefiboseth wangi cemo kanyacel kodan i meza paran.” Ziba oyido nitie gi nyithindho apar g'abic gi ŋecin piero ario.
Ziba odwoko kere ni, “Alatimo kisi gim'inowaci jadwoŋ.”
Ameno Mefiboseth obedo kanyo cemo kanyacel gi kere pa acel kwoŋ wot kere.
Mefiboseth oyido nitie gi wode m'ilwoŋo ni Mika. Ji je ma peco pa Ziba oyido jobedo ŋecin pa Mefiboseth.
Ameno Mefiboseth, m'oyido tiende ario je oŋol, obedo Yerusalem, kanyo cemo kanyacel gi kere.
Rumacen ma hongo moro, Nahas kere ma Amon otho, aka wode m'ilwoŋo ni Hanun ama olunjo go.
To kere Daudi waco ni, “Ripo anyuthi wor ri Hanun paka bamere Nahas ndir no otimo ran.” Ameno Daudi ooro jomikwenda bongi Hanun kisekera go ro tho pa bamere.
Munyo jomikwenda no jotundo Amon,
jomic rieko pa Hanun jowaco rigo ni, “Iparo adieri ni Daudi ooro jomikwenda me kisekera in ma woro benin? Daudi ooro jomikwenda pere me bino ŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ ma tindi madwoŋ me ŋey wonyali mako!”
Hanun omako jomikwenda pa Daudi aka olielo adec ye tik gin, oyeco nangin pajo, to riemo jo woko.
Wickwot omako jomikwenda me dok peco. Aka munyo Daudi owinjo gim'otimere rijo, odhiro rijo wac ni jowobedi Yeriko cuka ye tik gin twi.
Munyo Joamon joneno ni joloko Daudi jakwor pajo, jokidho to jonyewo jolweny 20,000 ma Siria wok i tindin madongo Bethrehob gi Zoba, cwo 12,000 wok Tob, kodi kere ma Maka gi cwo pere 1,000.
Munyo Daudi owinjo, ooro Yowab gi jolweny pere gibe lweny gi jo.
Joamon joŋanjo, aka jocanere i dhiot ma waŋkac. Josiria ma Zoba gi ma Rehob, kodi cwo ma Tob, kodi Maka, oyido jonitie kakendi gin kam'othangere.
Munyo Yowab oneno ni jolweny oyido jonyalo monjo go gi yuwiye kiri gi yucen, oyero jolweny mabeyo kwoŋ jolweny pa Isiraili, aka oketho jo kam'oŋiyere gi Josiria.
Jolweny m'odoŋ Yowab oketho jo i cingi Abisay omin go; aka oketho jo kam'oŋiyere gi Joamon.
Yowab owaco ri Abisay ni, “K'ineno ni Josiria jokengila an, ibin ikonyan; to ka aneno ni Joamon jokengila in alabino konyin.
Bedi jamiseni! Weyi walweny matek ri ji mawan aka ri tindin madongo pa Were mawan. Aka weyi mito pa Rwoth wotimere!”
Yowab gi cwo pere jodhire cegin monjo Josiria, to Josiria joringo woko.
Munyo Joamon joneno Josiria joringo woko, jo bende joringo woko kwoŋ Abisay aka jogik i tindi madwoŋ. Kenyo Yowab oweyo lweny gi Joamon, aka odok Yerusalem.
To munyo Josiria joneno ni Joisiraili jokengila jo, jocokere kanyacel.
Kere Hadadeza ooro ji moro, aka okeli Josiria je m'oyido jonitie yuwok ceŋ ma malawa Yufrete; aka jobino Halam munyo jamituka jolweny pa Hadadeza m'ilwoŋo ni Soba ama telo jo.
Munyo Daudi owinjo, ocoko jolweny ma Isiraili je kanyacel, aka joŋado malawa Yordan to jobino Helam kama Josiria jocaner'iye to joŋiyere gi jo. Lweny ocakere,
aka Joisiraili joriemo woko Josiria. Daudi gi cwo pere joneko cwo ma Siria 700 ma jogweyo cawila, kodi cwo 40,000 ma jogweyo kayina, aka jowumiya Sobak jamituka jolweny pa Hadadeza, to tho kenyo.
Munyo kerin m'oyido jobedo ŋecin pa Hadadeza joneno ni Joisiraili jokengila jo, jotimo siem gi Joisiraili, aka jolokere ŋecin pajo. Aka Josiria lworo omako jo doko konyo Joamon.
Ndelo acel, i hongo m'othieno, Daudi oay i kanindo pere aka oidho malo ma ot pere. Munyo go wotho idho malo, oneno dhako moro lwokere. Dhako no oyido ŋon swa.
Daudi to oro jamikwenda moro niaŋ kwoŋ ŋata dhako no obedo; aka onwaŋere ni manago oyido Bathseba nyar Eliam, aka cipa Uriya Jahiti.
Daudi ooro jomikwenda omo Bathseba, jokelo go bonge to Daudi nindo gine (Bathseba oyido nyaka otieko ruko dwe.) Kenyo go odok peco.
Rumacen mere, Bathseba oniaŋ ni ogamo iye, aka odhiro wac ri Daudi miyo go ŋeyo.
Daudi odhiro wac ri Yowab ni, “Dhiri ran Uriya Jahiti.” Ameno Yowab bende odhiro Uriya bongi Daudi.
Munyo Uriya otundo bongi Daudi, Daudi openjo go k'inen Yowab gi jolweny oyido jober, kodi nger ma lweny oyido medere iye.
Kenyo Daudi owaco ri Uriya ni, “Dok peco iywomere ma hongo moro.” Uriya oeye bongi Daudi, aka Daudi odhiro ri peco pere mic.
To Uriya k'odok peco; okidho to nindo i waŋkac ma peco pa kere gi jokur pa Daudi.
Munyo Daudi owinjo ni Uriya k'onindo peco pere, openjo Uriya ni, “Nyaka idwoko m'oyido ikibedi gi cegin; to raŋo ikidoki peco?”

Uriya odwoko ni, “Cwo ma Isiraili gi Yuda jonitie i lweny, aka Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were nitie bongi jo; aka jadwoŋ paran Yowab jamituka jolweny kodi jotel pa jolweny jotimo kambi i sa kam'othangere. Anonyal nedi dok peco cemo gi medho, t'anindo gi dhako paran? Paka ikwo aka doko paka cunyin kwo, akibino timo gigipiny me.”
Ameno Daudi owaco rigo ni, “Doŋ ka konon, aka dikin abino dhirin igiki i lweny.” Ameno Uriya obedo Yerusalem ndelo no gi yawere.
Aka Daudi olwoŋo go cemo othieno, ocemo to medho aka omer. To doko wor no Uriya k'odok peco pere; kwanyo woko onindo i par pere bongi jokur pa Daudi.
Yawere odikin, Daudi ondiko balwa ri Yowab, aka omiyo Uriya ni woter rigo.
I balwa no Daudi ondiko ni, “Kethi Uriya yuwiye kama lweny lieth'iye swa, k'itieko timo ameno, ringi t'iweyo woneki go.”
Riameno munyo Yowab oyido mako tindi madwoŋ, odhiro Uriya kama jokwor oyido jolweny'iye matek.
Jokwor pa Joisiraili jowok i tindi madwoŋ, aka jolwenyo gi cwo pa Yowab; jotel pa jolweny pa Daudi megi jotho, aka kiri Uriya je oneki.
Kenyo Yowab ooro jamikwenda bongi Daudi waco rigo gima mako kwoŋ lweny,
aka ociko go ni, “K'itieko waco ri kere wac ma mako kwoŋ lweny,
go nyalo mako nge to penjin ni, ‘Raŋo wicore cegin gi tindi madwoŋ lweny gi jo? Oyido wikiŋey ni jonyalo bolo aserin gi kor ot?

Wikipoy nger ma Abimelek wod pa Gideon onek'iye? Obedo i Thebez ma dhako moro obolo tele piny gi kor ot to neko go. Raŋo to wicore cegin gi kor ot?’ Ka kere openjin ameno, wac rigo ni, ‘Jatel pa jolweny perin Uriya bende otho.’ ”
Jamikwenda no obino bongi Daudi, aka owaco rigo gima Yowab ooro go gine ni wowaci.
Jamikwenda no owaco ri Daudi ni, “Jokwor mawan oyido jotek loyo wan, jowok i tindi madwoŋ to jobino lweny gi wan kam'othangere, to wariemo jo kiri i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ.
Aka jobolo aserin gi kor ot, to megi kwoŋ jotel pa jolweny perin jotho; kiri Uriya je oneki.”
Daudi owaco ri jamikwenda no ni, “Waci ri Yowab ni wokiri worembi, rupiri k'ikidho i lweny ikinyal ŋeyo ni ŋa ma latho. Waci rigo womonji tindi madwoŋ aka womaki.”
Munyo Bathseba owinjo ni oneki cwore, oywako go.
Munyo hongo ma ywak orumo, Daudi olwoŋo Bathseba i peco pere, aka olokere cege to nywolo rigo nyathi. To gima Daudi otimo k'osangala Rwoth.
Jaŋaŋo oyido nitie gi rombo kodi dhok kweth

aka jacandi oyido nitie gi nyaka siwen rombo pere m'onyewo; aka odongo peco pere kanyacel gi nyithindho pere. Rombo me oyido cemo i sen pere, aka medho iy'agwata pere won, aka oyido go tiŋo rombo me i tiende pa nyare.

Ndelo acel, wendo obino peco pa jaŋaŋo, aka go oyido k'omito kwanyo acel kwoŋ rombo kosa dhok pere wothum ri wendo no; kwanyo woko go okwanyo siwen rombo pa jacandi ama go othumo to rweyo gine wendo pere.”
Kenyo nge omako Daudi gi jaŋaŋo aka owaco ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo ni jacwo m'otimo gime ripo wotho;
aka go ripo woculi rombo no diŋwen, rupiri otimo gi gero.”
Nathan owaco ri Daudi ni, “Ibedo jacwo no. Aka me a gima Rwoth Were pa Isiraili waco, ‘Ayerin bedo kere ma Isiraili, aka abothin wok i cingi Saulo.
Amiyin ker gi mon pa Saulo to alokin kere ma Isiraili gi Yuda. Aka k'inen me oyido kiromin, dinyo amedin i dito.
To onyo raŋo m'ikwero luwo or paran? Raŋo itimo gimarac ruwaŋ Rwoth? Imiyo oneki Uriya i lweny; aka iweyo Joamon joneko go, aka onyo imayo go cege.
Onyo riameno, i kisi luse ji, kwoŋ nyikwayin bino bedo m'ilaneko jo gi toŋ rupiri ikwero winjan, aka ikwanyo cipa Uriya.’
Rwoth waco ni, ‘Neni, abino kelo rin teko wok i ot perin won; aka abino kwanyo mon perin t'amiyo jager perin ma bino nindo gi jo odieceŋ par
Itimo gime manyaliŋliŋ, t'abino timo gime odieceŋ par, ŋey Joisiraili je joneni.’ ”
Daudi owaco ri Nathan ni, “Atimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth.”
Nathan odwoko go ni, “Rwoth otieko cwako rin; ikilatho.
To rupiri icayo Rwoth munyo itimo gime, nyathi perin bino tho.”
Ameno Nathan odok peco.
Aka Rwoth ogoyo nyathi ma ciliendi Uriya onywolo ri Daudi gi two.
Daudi okwayo Were ŋey nyathi wobedi maber. Orio, aka kisi ka wor otundo odonjo i kisika pere to nindo piny i dier ot.
Jotel ma peco pere jokidho bonge aka jotemo tiŋo go malo, to go kwero aka k'ocemo gi jo kanyacel.

Munyo ndelo abirio okadho, nyathi otho. Jotel pere jolworo waco rigo. Aka jowaco ni, “Neni, munyo nyathi fodi kwo, waluwo gine to k'onyalo winjo wan; t'onyo ka wanowaci rigo ni nyathi otho go nyalo miyo kwo pere litho.”
Munyo Daudi oneno jomwoŋo, go oniaŋ ni nyathi otho aka openjo jo ni, “Nyathi otho?”
Jodwoko ni, “Ey, go otho.”
Kenyo Daudi oay malo wok piny, okidho to lwokere, owire gi mo, owiro nangin pere, aka okidho to lamo i Ot pa Rwoth. Munyo go ogik i ot pere, okwayo cemo, aka okeli rigo to camo piyo.
Jotel pere jodhier to jopenjo go ni, “Me ginaŋo m'itimo? Mafodi nyathi kwo, iywak aka iriyo rigo; to tekin nyathi tho, iay malo t'icemo!”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Ey, ariyo t'aywak mafodi go kwo, rupiri oyido aparo ni Rwoth nyalo mako kodan wor to botho go.
T'onyo pama go otieko tho; raŋo ariy? Anyalo dwoko kwo pere kendo? Alakidho bonge to go kiladwoko bongan.”
Daudi oyomo cuny cege Bathseba, aka onindo gine to Bathseba nywolo wode ma Daudi ocwoko ni Solomon. Aka Rwoth omaro Solomon
aka omiyo jatuci wac Were Nathan miyo go nyinge ni Yedidia rupiri Rwoth oyido omaro go.
Munyo gigipiny me timere, Yowab omedere lweny gi Joamon, aka omako tindi pajo madwoŋ Raba.
Yowab ooro jomikwenda bongi Daudi gi wac ni, “Amonjo Raba, aka atieko mako thenge mere ma pi wok gine.
Onyo pama, coki jolweny perin m'odoŋ kanyacel, imonji tindi in won; rupiri anyalo mako tindi to ilwoŋo gi nyingan.”
Ameno Daudi ocoko jolweny pere kanyacel, aka jokidho Raba to jomonjo aka jomako.

Daudi okwanyo sangaria pa Molek were pa Joamon, m'oyido nitie gi zahabu ma romo kilo piero adek g'abic aka oyido nitie gi telin ma welo to ketho i sangaria pere. Daudi bende okelo gigipiny mathoth ma jonyaga wok i tindi madwoŋ.
Go okelo ji ma Raba aka omiyo jo tic gi musimeno, kwe ma nyweny, le ma nyweny, aka omiyo jo goyo matafal. Otimo gime ri ji ma tindin pa Joamon man. Kenyo Daudi gi cwo pere jogik Yerusalem.
Wod Daudi m'ilwoŋo ni Absalom oyido nitie gi nyamin maŋon swa ma ici acel m'ilwoŋo ni Tamar. Wod Daudi man maki ma ici acel gi Absalom m'ilwoŋo ni Amnon ocako mitirok gi Tamar.
Amnon omito Tamar swa to miyo go kiri two; rupiri Tamar oyido nyako mambula, aka oyido tek swa ri Amnon timo rigo gimoro.
To Amnon oyido nitie gi mere pere m'ilwoŋo ni Yonadab, wod p'omin Daudi m'ilwoŋo ni Sama. Yonadab oyido obedo jarieko kweth swa.
Yonadab owaco ri Amnon ni, “Ibedo wod pa kere, to raŋo kisi ndelo aneno k'ingoye gi siem? Aŋo marac?”
Amnon odwoko ni, “Amitere gi Tamar, nyamin omera Absalom.”

Yonadab owaco rigo ni, “Rendere nike itwo swa, aka ikidhi inindi i kanindo perin. Ka benin obin nenin, wac rigo ni, ‘Mondo weyi nyamin an Tamar wobin womiye mugat acami, aka amito go wotedi cemo no ka; kam'anyalo nen'iye go, aka go won wotok ran.’ ”

Ameno Amnon bende orendere nike two swa, aka okidho to nindo i kitanda pere. Aka munyo kere obino neno go, Amnon owaco ri kere ni, “Mondo weyi nyamin an Tamar wobin wotedi mugat moro ka; kam'aneno iye go, aka go won wotok ran.”
Ameno Daudi odhiro wac ri Tamar peco ni, “Kadhi i ot p'omin in Amnon aka itedi rigo cemo.”
Ameno Tamar okidho i ot p'omin kam'onwaŋ'iye go i kanindo. Go okwanyo moko ŋano, onywowo, aka otimo mugat to tedo i waŋ Amnon.
Tamar okwanyo sapik aka otoko mugat ri Amnon to go kwero camo. Amnon owaco rigo ni, “Riemi woko kisi nyatoro je woeye woko bongan.” Ameno kisi nyatoro je okadho.
Kenyo Amnon owaco rigo ni, “Keli mugat ka i kisika aka in won imiyan i dhokan.” Tamar okwanyo mugat m'oyido otedo, aka otero i kisika bongi omin.
Munyo Tamar ocoro cegin miyo omin mugat, Amnon opodho kwoŋe aka owaco rigo ni, “Biye nindi kodan nyamin an.”
Tamar odwoko ni, “Be, omin an, ikir'iroman; rupiri nger gime kimitere i Isiraili; Ikir'itim gimienirok me.
Paka ri an, anoteri wickwot me kune? Aka ri in ilabedo paka acel kwoŋ jomienirok i Isiraili. Onyo riameno, mondo luw gi kere; rupiri aŋeyo ni go bino miyin an.”
To Amnon okwero winjo Tamar; aka paka go oyido loyo Tamar gi meni, oromo go to nindo gine.
Kenyo won Amnon opoŋ gi dakirok ri Tamar tektek; odak go swa loyo kiri nger m'oyido omito iye go. Aka Amnon owaco rigo ni, “Ay malo iwok woko.”
Tamar odwoko ni, “Be, omin an; rieman am'obedo banja madwoŋ loyo kiri gim'iwok timo ran.”
To Amnon k'onyalo winjo go.
Amnon olwoŋo jatic pere aka owaco rigo ni, “Riemi dhako me woeye woko ruwaŋan aka icegi thigo yuŋey go.”
Jatic no oriemo go woko, aka ocego thigo yuŋey Tamar.
Tamar oyido oruko law mabor ma cinge bor; rupiri i hongo no me am'oyido obedo law manyir pa kere ma fodi jok'onywomere joruko.
Aka okonjo i wiye buru, oyeco law pere aka oumo waŋe gi cinge to kadho ka ywak.

Munyo omin go Absalom oneno go, openjo go ni, “Amnon omin in obedo kodin? Mondo nyamin an, ikir'imaki gime i cunyin; go obedo omin in; aka ikir'iwaci ri nyatoro.” Ameno Tamar obedo dhako ma kakende i ot p'omin go Absalom.
Munyo kere Daudi owinjo gime, nge omako go swa.
To Absalom dak Amnon swa, m'oyido kiluw kiri gine rupiri omako nyamin go Tamar gi mbaka to nindo gine.
Munyo oro ario okadho, oyido idaŋo rombo pa Absalom i tindi Bal Hazor, cegin gi tindi Efrayim, aka olwoŋo wot kere je bedo kenyo.
Absalom okidho bongi kere, aka owaco ni, “Neni, idaŋo rombo paran; aka akwayin kere gi jotel perin wibin bende wibedi kenyo.”
To kere waco ri Absalom ni, “Be, wodan, weyi wajoje wakiri wabin rupiri walabedo rin bieto.” Absalom omedo romo kere, to kere k'oyeyo; to miyo go silwany pere ayin.
Kenyo Absalom owaco ri kere ni, “Kakameno, mondo weyi omin an Amnon wobin gi wan.”
Kere openjo ni, “Raŋo go wobin gi win?”
To Absalom mena kere cuka oyeyo Amnon gi wote je kadho gi Absalom.
Absalom otimo kalima paŋini apa kere,
aka owaco ri ŋecin pere ni, “Neni win ka Amnon otieko mero, aka k'amiyo win or ni, ‘Neki win Amnon.’ Neki win go. Wikiri wilwor rupiri aŋat'amiyo win or. Bedi win jomiseni aka wikiri wigal.”
Ameno ŋecin pa Absalom jotimo ri Amnon paka Absalom omiyo jo or. Kenyo wot kere je m'odoŋ joidho punde pajo to joringo.
Munyo jonitie i yo jodok, owaci ri Daudi ni, “Absalom oneko wotin je, aka ongoye kad'acel m'odoŋ.”
Kere oay malo, oyeco woko nanga pere i rem, aka ogore piny. Ŋecin pa kere m'oyido jonitie bonge bende joyeco woko nangin pajo.

To Yonadab, wod p'omin Daudi m'ilwoŋo ni Sama, waco ri kere ni, “Jadwoŋ Absalom k'oneko wotin je. Amnon kende am'otho. Inyalo yido neno gime kwoŋ Absalom ni go oyido omiyere timo gime wok i hongo ma Amnon omak'iye nyamin go Tamar.
Riameno ikir'iyey wac ni wotin je oneki; Amnon kende am'onek.”
Absalom won oyido oringo.
Aka munyo jayac m'oyido jakur otiŋo waŋe malo, oneno lwak ji jobino wok i yo ma wok yo tindi madwoŋ Horonayim i thengi got.
Yonadab owaco ri Daudi ni, “Neni, meno wotin ama jobino no paka nende awaco.”
Tekin Yonadab tieko luwo, wot Daudi jotundo, aka jotiŋo dwondi gin malo to jogoyo ndur; aka kere kiri gi ŋecin pere bende joywak gi gwayo.
Absalom obedo Gesur ma oro adek.
To munyo Daudi oweyo paro kwoŋ Amnon, ocako paro kwoŋ Absalom.
Onyo Yowab wod pa Zeruya oyido oŋeyo maber nike kere oyido paro kwoŋ Absalom swa

aka ooro nyatoro moro lwoŋo rigo dhako mariek swa wok i tindi Tekowa. Munyo dhako no otundo, Yowab owaco rigo ni, “Rendere pa ŋata ywak, iruki nangin perin ma ywak, aka ikir'iwire gi mo. Timere pa dhako m'otieko hongo malac swa munyo ywak.
Aka ikidhi bongi kere t'iwaco rigo gim'anowaci rin.” Kenyo Yowab owaco rigo gima wowaci.
Dheno okidho bongi kere, aka oriere piny i wor to waco ni, “Konyan jadwoŋ!”
Kere openjo go ni, “Teko perin aŋo?”
Dheno odwoko ni, “Abedo citho; cworan otho.
Jadwoŋ oyido anitie gi wotan ario, to ndelo acel joero dhaw i sa, aka oyido ongoye ŋata nyalo theko jo; ameno acel oneko omin.

Aka onyo pama jadwoŋ, wade paran je jowire ran, jomito ni amiy jo wodan m'oneko omin ŋey bende woneki go. Ka jotimi gime, aladoŋ m'ongoye nyathi; jolareyo geno paran, aka to joweyo cworan ma bu wode m'ocwok nyinge.”
Kenyo kere odwoko ni, “Dok peco, aka abino kweyo teko perin me.”
Dheno omedere waco ni, “Jadwoŋ, gim'inotim je apuse k'obedi aperin gi peco perin to ri an gi peco paran.”
Kere odwoko ni, “Ka ŋatimoro je obwokin, keli go bongan aka doko k'ogeyin kendo.”
Dheno owaco ni, “Jadwoŋ, mondo kway Rwoth Were perin ŋey wat paran ma mito culo kwor kwoŋ wodan m'oneko omin wokiri wotim banja madwoŋ loyo to neko wodan man.”
Kere odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo ni ongoye gimarac ma bino timere ri wodin.”
To dheno kendo waco ni, “Mondo jadwoŋ, weyi awaci rin gimoro acel kendo.”
Kere odwoko go ni, “Luw.”
Dheno owaco ni, “Raŋo itimo gimarac ameno ri ji pa Were? Ikwero wodin won dwoko peco; aka onyo pama in won itieko thumo banja perin gi gima nyaka iwok waco.
Wajoje walatho; wacale pi m'okir piny ma doko kinyal coko. Kiri Were kidwoki kwo pa jom'otho, to kere nyalo rango nger ma dwoko ŋat'orwenyo.
Onyo riameno jadwoŋ, atoŋa m'omiyo abino pido kodin rupiri ji jobwokan; t'onyo aparo ni kono k'anoluwi kodin, ibino konyan.
Aparo ni kere bino winjan to bothan wok i cingi jacwo ma mito reyan gi wodan wok i lowo ma Were omiyo ji pere.
Aka aparo ni cikirok perin ran bino gwokan; rupiri kere cale malaika pa Were m'oŋeyo bero gi raco.”
Kere odwoko dheno ni, “Akidho penjin gimoro, aka iripo waco ran adieri je.”
Dheno odwoko ni, “Penjan jadwoŋ.”
Kere openjo go ni, “Itiyere gi Yowab i gigipiny me je?”
Dheno odwoko ni, “Paka ikwo, jadwoŋ kere, obedo adieri jadhum perin Yowab am'owaco ran gim'awaci je.
To go otimo ameno ma tiro wac me je. Jadwoŋ iriek paka malaika pa Were, aka iŋeyo kisi gima timere.”
Rumacen kere owaco ri Yowab ni, “Ayere timo gim'imito. Kadhi idwoki gi Absalom peco.”
Yowab oriere piny ruwaŋ kere to bwonere, aka owaco ni, “Were womiyin silwany jadwoŋ! Pama onyo aŋeyo nike iwinjo kodan maber, rupiri imiyan kwac paran.”
Ameno Yowab oay, aka okidho Gesur to dwoko gi Absalom i Yerusalem.
Aka kere k'oyeyo Absalom bedo peco pere. Kere owaco ni, “Akimiti neno Absalom gi waŋan.” Ameno Absalom obedo i ot pere kakende, aka k'oneno ruwaŋ kere.
I hongo no, oyido ongoye ŋati m'oŋeyere ro ŋono pere paka Absalom; Kwoŋ Absalom oyido ongoye kam'ojony wok i tiende kiri i wiye.
Ye wiye oyido pek swa aka go oyido lielo dicel kende i oro; ka odongo bedo mapek. Ye wiye oyido kalo kilo ario, k'oor rapim ma cel pa kere.
Absalom oyido nitie gi wote adek, gi nyare acel m'ilwoŋo ni Tamar, aka oyido obedo nyako maŋon swa.
Absalom obedo Yerusalem oro adek ma kinen kere.
Kenyo Absalom odhiro nyatoro lwoŋo Yowab woor go wokidhi woluwi rigo gi kere. To Yowab kwero bino
Ameno Absalom owaco ri ŋecin pere ni, “Neni, ndelo pa Yowab nitie cegin gi ndelo paran, aka bale
Yowab okidho bongi Absalom peco pere aka openjo go ni, “Raŋo ŋecin perin jocwinyo ndelo paran?”

Absalom odwoko go ni, “Rupiri ikwero bino munyo aoro nyatoro lwoŋin. Oyido amitin ikidhi bongi kere ipenji go ran ni, ‘Raŋo awok Gesur t'abino ka? Diber k'oyido adoŋ koro.’ Riameno woyeyan akidhi anen go, aka ka onwaŋ kwoŋan banja, wonekan.”
Kenyo Yowab okidho bongi kere aka owaco rigo. Kere ooro nyatoro lwoŋo Absalom, aka munyo Absalom obino, oriere piny ruwaŋ kere; aka kere ojolo go to cwiyo lembe.
Rumacen ma gigipiny me, Absalom onyewo cawila gi kayinin, gi cwo piero abic ma jokur.
Absalom oyido cew con to kidho cungo i yo ma waŋkac; aka ka nyatoro moro obino gi banja ri kere wothum, Absalom oyido lwoŋo ŋato aka penjo go kama wok'iye. Aka ka ŋato otieko waco rigo nono pere,
Absalom oyido waco rigo ni, “Neni, kwac perin jober aka jotire, to ongoye jakony pa kere manyalo winjo banja perin.
Kabedi oyido abedo jathum banja i piny Isiraili, di ji je ma jonitie gi teko kosa banja jobino t'atimo rijo tiro.”
Aka kisi ka nyatoro obino cegin to bwonere rigo, Absalom oyido yaro cinge aka twodo go, to cwiyo lembe.
Absalom otimo gime ri kisi Jaisiraili m'obino bongi kere kelo banja; aka i cowe mere oywayo cuny jo.
Rumacen ma oro aŋwen, Absalom owaco ri kere ni, “Mondo akwayin iyeyan akidhi Hebron atim cikirok ma timo gi Rwoth.
Munyo oyido anitie Gesur, i piny Siria, aciko Rwoth ni ka odwokan i Yerusalem, abino lamo go i tindi Hebron.”
Kere owaco rigo ni, “Kadhi i siem.” Ameno Absalom oay to kadho Hebron.
To Absalom dhiro jomikwenda manyaliŋliŋ bongi nonin je ma Isiraili waco rijo ni, “Tekin wiwinjo dwondi gwara, koki win ni, ‘Absalom olokere kere ma Hebron.’ ”
Oyido nitie cwo 200 m'oyido Absalom olwoŋo jo kadho gi go wok Yerusalem m'ongoye gima joŋeyo.

Aka munyo Absalom miyo cowirok, odhiro nyatoro lwoŋo Ahithofel m'oyido obedo acel kwoŋ jomic rieko pa Daudi wok i tindi madwoŋ Gilo. Aka camo sereko ri Daudi olimo meni, aka ji man jomedere riwirok gi Absalom.
Jamikwenda moro obino aka owaco ri Daudi ni, “Cuny cwo ma Isiraili oringo bongi Absalom.”

Ameno Daudi owaco ri ŋecin pere m'oyido jonitie bonge i Yerusalem ni, “Ay win waringi woko kwoŋ Absalom! Redi win! Kakameno go cegin tundo ka, aka lakikengila wan to neko kisi nyatoro i tindi madwoŋ.”
Ŋecin pa kere jodwoko go ni, “Neni, ŋecin perin joyikere timo gimoro je m'iwaco.”
Ameno kere gi ji ma peco pere je gi jodhum pere joringo; kwanyo woko mon pere ma gi thenge apar ama kere oweyo kuro cel pa kere.
Paka kere gi cwo pere oyido joringo, jocungo i ot macowe.
Jodhum pa kere je jocungo cegin gi go munyo jokur pa kere joluwo ruwaŋ go. Jolweny 600 m'oyido joluwo go wok i tindi Gath bende joluwo,
aka kere owaco ri jatel pajo Itay Jagiti ni, “Raŋo ikadho gi wan? Gik ibedi gi kere manyen. Ibedo japath, aka iringo wok i piny perin.
Itieko bedo ka nyaka ma hongo macek, t'onyo raŋo aweyin ilera kodan? Akuya kiri kam'akadh'iye. Gik gi wade perin, aka weyi Rwoth wonyuthi win wor g'adieri.”
Itay odwoko kere ni, “Jadwoŋ, akwoŋere rin i nyingi Rwoth ni abino kadho kodin kamoro je m'inokadh'iye, makada nende bedi tho.”
Daudi owaco ri Itay ni, “Meno ber medere woth.” Ameno Itay omedere woth gi cwo pere je kodi jomathindho m'oyido jonitie gi go.
Ji jotiŋo dwondi gin malo aka jogoyo ndur munyo Daudi kadho gi ji ma joluwo go. Kere oŋado gi milelo Kidiron, aka cwo pere bende joluwo go to joje jokidho yo thim.
Abiatha, Zadok, gi Jolevi bende oyido jokadho gi kere, aka oyido jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were; aka jojengo piny cuka ji je jowok i tindi madwoŋ.
Kenyo kere owaco ri Zadok ni, “Tiŋi Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were idwoki i tindi madwoŋ. Comoro ka Rwoth owinji kodan maber, go bino dwokan t'aneno, gi kam'anitie iye.
To k'inen go k'owinji kodan, maber meno ber, aka weyi go wotim ran gima go mito.
Neni, kadhi gi wodin Ahimaz, kodi wod pa Abiatha Yonathan, aka wigik i tindi madwoŋ i siem.
Kucel an abino kuro kama ji joŋado gine kidho i thim cuka anolimi wac wok bongin.”
Ameno Zadok gi Abiatha jodwoko Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were i Yerusalem, aka jodoŋ koro.
Daudi oidho wi got Oliv munyo ywak, gi par tiende, aka oyido oumo wiye ma nyutho rem. Ji je m'oyido joluwo go bende joumo wiy gin aka bende joywak.
Munyo owaci ri Daudi ni Ahithofel bende oyido nitie kanyacel gi ji ma jocamo rigo sereko gi Absalom, go owaco ni, “Mondo Rwoth, akwayin wir rieko pa Ahithofel i miŋo.”
Munyo Daudi otundo i wilwindi ma got, kam'oyido ilamo iye Were, mere pere m'ogenere Husay Jarakit obino bonge munyo law pere oyec aka okonjo i wiye lowo.
Daudi owaco rigo ni, “K'imedere kodan, ilangoye ran kony.
To inyalo konyan ka igiki i tindi madwoŋ, aka iwaci ri Absalom ni, ‘Jadwoŋ, paka oyido abedo ŋeca pa benin, pama bende alabedo ŋeca perin.’ Aka ikwer rieko moro je ma Ahithofel omiy.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam Zadok gi Abiatha jonitie koro; wac rijo gimoro je m'inowinji i cel pa kere pa kere.
Jonitie gi wot jo Ahimaz gi Yonathan, aka inyalo oro ran jo gi wac je m'inowinji.”
Ameno Husay, mere pa Daudi, ogik i tindi madwoŋ munyo nyaka Absalom donjo i Yerusalem.
Aka kere openjo Ziba ni, “Ikidho timo aŋo gi gime je?”
Ziba odwoko ni, “Punde no jobedo aperin gi peco perin ma gweyo, aka mugat gi ranyak obedo apa cwo perin acama, aka vini mere obedo amadha ka jool i thim.”
Kere openjo Ziba ni, “Nikune Mefiboseth, nyakwar Saulo jadwoŋ perin?”
Ziba odwoko ni, “Panen, go odoŋ Yerusalem, rupiri go paro ni Joisiraili joladwoko rigo ker pa Saulo kwari mere.”
Kere owaco ri Ziba ni, “Panen, kisi lim m'oyido obedo apa Mefiboseth je pama aperin.”
Ziba odwoko ni, “Abedo ŋeca perin, aka weyi asangala in noknok jadwoŋ!”
Munyo kere otundo i tindi Bahurim, acel kwoŋ wade pa Saulo m'ilwoŋo ni Simey wod pa Gera, owok romo gi Daudi; aka paka go obino, okwoŋo Daudi.
Simey ocako dwiro Daudi gi jodhum pere gi telin makada nende cwo pa Daudi gi jokur pere oyido jothoko go.
Simey okwoŋo go kanyo waco ni, “Kadhi! Kadhi! Ijanek! Aka ibu kony!
Imayo Saulo ker pere, aka onyo pama Rwoth miyin gir'acula ma neko ji kweth wok i peco pa Saulo. Rwoth womiy wodin Absalom ker, aka in irere, rupiri ijanek.”
Abisay, wod pa Zeruya owaco ri kere ni, “Jadwoŋ, raŋo iyeyo gwok m'otho me kwoŋin? Yeyan akidhi aka aŋadi woko ŋute!”
To kere waco ri Abisay gi omin go Yowab ni, “Meno gima kimaki kwoŋ win. K'inen go kwoŋan rupiri Rwoth owaco rigo, ŋa manitie gi dwoŋ ma penjo go atoŋa mere?”

Daudi omedere waco ri Abisay gi cwo pere ni, “Neni, wodan won rango kwo paran; t'onyo raŋo wibwok ka janono pa Benyamin me bende timo amanago! Rwoth owaco rigo ni wokwoŋan, riameno weyi win go wokwoŋan.
Kono Rwoth bino neno litho paran, aka Rwoth oculan bero i waŋ lam me.”
Ameno Daudi gi cwo pere jomedere i yo pajo. Simey omedere luwo jo kanyo wotho i wi tendere tirtir gi jo, ka kwoŋo Daudi, aka odwiro go gi tele to dunyo kwoŋe fukefuke.
Kere gi cwo pere oyido jool munyo jotundo i malawa Yordan, aka joywomere kenyo.
Absalom gi Joisiraili m'oyido nitie gi go jobino i Yerusalem, aka Ahithofel oyido nitie gi jo.
Munyo Husay, mere pa Daudi m'ogenere oromo gi Absalom, okoko ni, “Yindira kere! Yindira kere!”
Absalom openjo go ni, “Aŋo m'otimere gi wor perin ri mere perin? Raŋo ikikadho gi go?”
Husay odwoko ni, “Be; ri ŋata Rwoth, gi ji, gi cwo ma Isiraili joyero, ama alabedo apere, aka aladoŋ apere.
Rupiri ŋa man m'abedi ŋeca pere, ka k'obedo wod pa jadwoŋ paran! Paka oyido abedo ŋeca pa benin, apaka bende abino bedo ŋeca perin.”
Kenyo Absalom owire bongi Ahithofel aka openjo go ni, “Miy rieko perin; watim aŋo?”

Ahithofel odwoko ni, “Kadhi inindi gi mon pa benin ma gi thenge ma go oweyo kuro cel pa kere. Kenyo nyaka kisi nyatoro i Isiraili bino ŋeyo ni benin terin paka jakwor pere, aka ji ma joluwin jobino limo meni.”
Ameno oger ri Absalom wema i wi cel pa kere, aka Absalom okidho to nindo gi mon pa bamere ma gi thenge odieceŋ par ma kisi nyatoro je neno.
Rieko moro je ma Ahithofel oyido miyo i ndir no oyido iyere gine paŋini oyido obedo wac pa Were won; aka Daudi kiri gi Absalom je oyido joluwo.
I hongo won macek, Ahithofel owaco ri Absalom ni, “Weyi ayer cwo 12,000 aka wor me abino kidho dwaro Daudi.
Abino monjo go ka go fodi ool aka ongoye gi meni. Go labwok, aka cwo pere je jobino ringo. Abino neko kere kende,
aka abino dwoko gi cwo pere paka mweha dwoko bongi cwore. Imito neko nyaka jacwo acel; aka ji m'odoŋ je jobino bedo i siem.”
Rieko me osangala Absalom gi jotel ma Isiraili je.
Absalom owaco ni, “Lwoŋ win Husay Jarakit bende wawinji gima go waco.”
Munyo Husay otundo, Absalom openjo go ni, “Me rieko pa Ahithofel ma go otieko miyo wan; watim paka go miyo wan rieko? Ka be, wac riwan gima watim.”
Husay odwoko ni, “Waŋin me rieko ma Ahithofel omiyo kiber.
Iŋeyo paka benin Daudi gi cwo pere jobedo jolweny matek, aka joger pa arara m'okwal nyithindhe. Benin otieko bedo jalweny ma hongo malac, aka kibedi gi cwo pere wor.
Miti kiri pama me go opondo i ŋungu kosa kaman. Tekin Daudi omonji cwo perin, kisi ŋat'owinji bino waco ni go okengila cwo perin.
Nyaka kiri cwo ma jomaker, ma cuny gin cale cuny simbwor jolabwok; rupiri kisi nyatoro i Isiraili oŋeyo paka benin obedo jalweny madwoŋ, aka jolweny pere jomaker.
To rieko paran rin a me, coki Joisiraili je kanyacel wok Dan tundo Berseba, mathoth paka nyingi kwoyo ma thengi nam, aka in won itel jo i lweny.
Walanwaŋo Daudi kama go nitie iye je, to wamonjo go mafodi go k'oŋeyo ni aŋo ma timere. Go kiri gi jolweny pere je jok'oboth.
Ka go oringi to donjo i tindi madwoŋ, ji mawan jobino kelo thondhe to joywayo kore piny milelo. Ongoye tele kad'acel ma bino doŋ kenyo.”
Absalom kodi cwo ma Isiraili je jowaco ni, “Rieko pa Husay loyo apa Ahithofel.” Rwoth oyido otieko yiko ni rieko pa Ahithofel wokiri woluwi, ŋey teko wopodhi ri Absalom.
Kenyo Husay owaco ri jocway ri Were i wi migam, Zadok gi Abiatha rieko ma go omiyo Absalom gi Joisiraili, kodi rieko ma Ahithofel omiyo.

Husay omedo waco ni, “Piyo dhiri win mikwenda ri Daudi pama won me, aka wokiri wonindi i thengi malawa Yordan, to wopor loka kama ji joŋado gine kidho i thim; ŋey okir omaki Daudi gi cwo pere t'ineko jo.”

Yonathan gi Ahimaz oyido jokuro i waŋ pi ma Enrogel, woko ma Yerusalem, rupiri oyido jokimiti onen ka jodonjo i tindi madwoŋ. Oyido nitie ŋeca madhako ma omaro kidho aka waco rijo gima timere; aka jo bende jokidho to jowaco ri kere Daudi.
To ndelo acel, jayac moro oneno jo aka oosa ri Absalom. Ameno joredo aka jopondo i ot pa jacwo moro i tindi Bahurim. Jalo oyido nitie gi jwom cegin gi peco pere, aka joloro i iye.
Cipa jalo okwanyo gimoro to umo gine dhok jwom, aka oyaro i wiye ŋano ŋey nyatoro wokiri woŋey gimoro.
Jodhum pa Absalom jobino i ot aka jopenjo dhako no ni, “Nikune Ahimaz gi Yonathan?”
Go odwoko ni, “Jokalo jwom.”
Cwo no jorango jo, aka jok'onwaŋo jo to jogik Yerusalem.
Rumacen munyo jotieko gik, Ahimaz gi Yonathan jowok i jwom aka jokidho to joosa ri Daudi. Jowaco rigo gima Ahithofel ocano rigo, aka jowaco rigo ringo woŋadi malawa.
Ameno Daudi gi cwo pere jocako ŋado malawa Yordan, aka munyo piny cot onwaŋo jotieko ŋado.
Munyo Ahithofel oneno ni rieko pere obol gicen, opor i wi punda pere to dok i tindi pere. Munyo go otieko yiko wac ma peco pere, odere to tho, aka oyiki go i kaliel pa bamere.
Kenyo Daudi otundo i tindi Mahanayim, i hongo m'oyido Absalom gi cwo pere jotieko ŋado malawa Yordan.

Absalom oyido oketho Amasa paka jamituka jolweny, lunjo Yowab. Amasa oyido obedo wod pa jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Ithira, janono Isimayil; aka min oyido ilwoŋo ni Abigayili, nyar Nahas, aka nyamin Zeruya m'oyido obedo yok Yowab.
Absalom gi cwo pere joketho kambi pajo i lowo ma Giliad.

Munyo Daudi otundo i tindi Mahanayim, oromo gi Sobi wod pa Nahas, ma wok i tindi madwoŋ Raba i piny Amon, Makir wod pa Amiel, ma wok i tindi madwoŋ Lodebar, kodi Barzilay Jagiliad ma wok i tindi Rogelim.
Cwo me oyido jokelo gi nindo, atewe, degi, ŋano, bale, moko ŋano, ŋano m'obul, bijanjalo, ŋor,
mo kic, mo dhiaŋ gi mo rombo, kodi rombo moro. Jo oyido joŋeyo ni Daudi gi cwo pere kec oyido neko jo, jowinjo riyo, aka oyido jool i sa.
Kere Daudi ocoko cwo pere kanyacel, aka opoko jo i kitipin ma ganin, gi miya; aka omiyo kisi kitipa jamituka telo jo.
Kenyo odhiro jo i kitipin adek. Yowab, Abisay omin Yowab, kodi Itay ma wok Gath am'oyido jotelo kitipin me. Aka kere owaco ri cwo pere ni, “An won bende, abino kadho gi win.”

To cwo pere jodwoko ni, “Ikiripi kadho gi wan. Rupiri ka waringo, jokiladewo kwoŋ wan. K'adec kwoŋ wan jotho, jokiladewo kwoŋ wan. To in irom kodi wan 10,000. Bino bero k'idoŋ ka i tindi madwoŋ, t'idhiro riwan kony.”
Kere odwoko jo ni, “Alatimo gima wiparo ni ber.” Kenyo kere ocungo i thengi waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ, aka oneno cwo pere munyo joŋanjo jokadho i kitipin ma miya gi ganin.
Aka kere omiyo Yowab, Abisay, gi Itay cik ni ro go jokiri jowoneki Absalom. Aka jolweny je jowinjo munyo Daudi miyo jomituka jolweny pere cik me.
Jolweny pa Daudi jokidho i sa, aka jolwenyo gi Joisiraili i thim ma Efrayim.
Cwo pa Daudi jokengila Joisiraili; obedo kikengila madwoŋ, aka cwo 20,000 jotho i ndelo no.
Lweny olak i piny gibe, aka cwo madit jotho i lul loyo m'oneki jo i kalweny.

Kenyo Absalom oromo gi cwo pa Daudi abwap. Absalom oyido gweyo nyathi punda, aka munyo nyathi punda no oroc i jangi olwa m'opoto, ŋuti Absalom omoko, aka munyo nyathi punda no omedere ringo, go odoŋ munyo oliero kenyo i koyo.
Acel kwoŋ cwo pa Daudi oneno go, aka okidho to kowo ri Yowab ni, “Jadwoŋ, aneno Absalom oliero i wi olwa!”
Yowab odwoko go ni, “K'ineno go raŋo ikineko go gi kanyago won? An won dinyo asangala miyin nusu feza apar gi del.”

To jacwo no dwoko ni, “Makada nende oyido imiyan nusu feza gana acel, d'akiketho cingan kwoŋ wod pa kere. Wajoje wawinjo munyo kere miyo in, Abisay, gi Itay cik ni, ‘Ro an wikiri wimiy jayac Absalom litho.’
To bedi oyido akweri luwo wac pa kere to aneko Absalom, dinyo kere owinjo rupiri go winjo kisi gimoro; aka dinyo ikinyalo thielan.”
Yowab owaco ni, “Akikidhi nyeko hongo moro je kodin doko.” Ameno Yowab okwanyo toŋ adek, aka ocwowo gine dak kor Absalom munyo fodi Absalom oyido kwo i wi olwa.
Aka cwo apar ma jobedo jago pa Yowab jothoko Absalom, aka jocwowo go to joneko.
Yowab owodho or ni wogoy gwara ma cungo lweny, aka jolweny joweyo riemo Joisiraili to jodwoko; rupiri Yowab ociero jo.
Jokwanyo delkwoŋ Absalom, aka jobolo i bur maluth swa i thim; jobolo kwoŋe kidhur telin, aka Joisiraili je joringo kisi nyatoro peco pere.

Munyo Absalom fodi kwo, go oyido ogeto gimoro gi telin ma poyo go gine milelo pa kere; rupiri go oyido ongoye gi wode m'oyido ocwoki nyinge. Ameno to go miyo gino nyinge, aka kiri konon fodi gino oŋeyere ni tele pa Absalom.
Kenyo Ahimaz wod pa Zadok owaco ri Yowab ni, “Weyi aŋwec bongi kere gi wac maber ni Rwoth obotho go kwoŋ jokwor pere.”
Yowab odwoko ni, “Be, konon ikilatero wac maber. Inoter ndelo man to kikonon, rupiri wod pa kere otho.”
To Yowab waco ri ŋeca pere ma wok Ethopiya ni, “Kidhi iwaci ri kere gim'ineno.” Ŋeca no obwonere ruwaŋ Yowab aka oŋweco to kadhi.
Ahimaz doko owaco ri Yowab ni, “Akipar kwoŋ gim'obedi; mondo yeyan bende ater wac maber.”
Yowab openjo go ni, “Raŋo imito timo wodan? Ongoye kemba m'ibino limo.”
Ahimaz doko owaco ni, “Gim'obedi wobedi, amito kadho.”
Kenyo Absalom owaco rigo ni, “Kadhi.” Ameno Ahimaz oŋweco aka oloro i yo ma luwo gi milelo Yordan, aka oyombo ŋeca pa Yowab i yo.
Daudi oyido obedo i dier waŋkac ario. Jakur oidho i kor ot aka ocungo i wi ot aka otiŋo waŋe malo to neno jacwo ma ŋweco kende.
Aka go olwoŋo kere to waco rigo. Aka kere odwoko ni, “Ka go nikende, go kelo wac maber.” Ŋata ŋweco no ocore cegin.
Kenyo jakur no doko oneno jacwo man ŋweco kende, aka olwoŋo jakur ma waŋkac piny to waco rigo ni, “Neni, nitie jacwo man ma ŋweco kende!”
Kere odwoko ni, “Go bende kelo wac maber.”
Jakur owaco ni, “Aparo ni ŋwec pa jacwo marapena cale apa Ahimaz wod pa Zadok.”
Kere odwoko ni, “Go ŋataber, aka kelo wac maber.”
Kenyo Ahimaz okoko ri kere ni, “Kisi gimoro ber.” Aka oriere ruwaŋ kere gi nyime piny i lowo aka owaco ni, “Rwoth Were perin wopak, ma omiyin loyo kwoŋ cwo ma jowire rin jadwoŋ!”
Kere openjo go ni, “Jayac Absalom kwo?”
Ahimaz odwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ, munyo Yowab ooro ŋeca perin, aneno nyawin madwoŋ, aka akinyalo ŋeyo nike oyido obedo aŋo.”
Aka kere owaco rigo ni, “Cungi gi thenge ka.” Ameno go owire gi thenge to cungo liŋ.
Kenyo jacwo ma wok Ethopiya otundo, aka owaco ri kere ni, “Anitie gi wac maber rin jadwoŋ! Konon me Rwoth omiyin loyo kwoŋ jono je m'oyido jowire rin.”
Kere openjo ni, “Absalom kwo?”
Ŋeca no odwoko ni, “Weyi jokwor perin je jadwoŋ kere, aka jono je ma jowire rin ma gimarac, jowobedi paka jayac no.”

Geregere omako kere; aka okidho malo i kisika manitie i wi waŋkac to ywak. Munyo go kadho, oywaki ni, “Awi wodan! Wodan Absalom! Absalom, wodan! Kabedi oyido aŋat'atho makiweno in. Wodan! Absalom Wodan!”
Owaci ri Yowab ni Daudi oyido biyo pi waŋe aka ywak ri Absalom.
Ameno loyo lweny to lokere ywak ri ji je; rupiri jowinjo ni kere oyido ywako wode.
Aka jolweny jogik i tindi madwoŋ liŋ pa jolweny ma wickwot opoŋ kwoŋ jo rupiri joringo wok i lweny.
Kere oumo waŋe aka ogoyo ndur to ywak ni, “Awi wodan! Wodan Absalom! Absalom wodan!”
Yowab okidho i ot pa kere aka owaco rigo ni, “Konon me ikwoto wi cwo perin; cwo ma jobotho kwo perin gi kwo pa wotin, nyikin, kiri gi mon perin kodi mon perin ma gi thenge.

Ikiyere kodi ji ma jomarin, t'ithielo jono ma jodakin. Rupiri inyutho kamaler konon me ni jomituka jolweny perin gi ŋecin perin je bukony rin; rupiri gime nyuthan ni kabedi Absalom kwo, aka wajoje watho konon me, d'osangala in.

Onyo riameno, ay malo ikadhi ifoy jolweny perin. Rupiri akwoŋere rin i nyingi Rwoth ni k'ikikidho, tundo dikin odikin ongoye kad'acel kwoŋ jo ma ladoŋ kodin. Aka meno bino bedo rin kidamba loyo candirok perin je i kwo perin.”
Kenyo kere oay malo, aka okidho to bedo i kom pere i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ. Cwo pere jowinjo ni go oyido obedo kenyo, aka jobino to jocokere thoko go.
Kareno Joisiraili je oyido joringo to jodok pecin pajo.
Aka jocako kiŋunyaŋunya i dier jo wegi ka jowaco ni, “Kere Daudi obotho wan wok i cingi jokwor mawan, aka obotho wan wok i cingi Jofilistia; aka onyo pama go oringo oweyo piny kwoŋbedo Absalom.
To Absalom m'oyido wayero paka kere otieko tho. Onyo riameno raŋo wakidwoki Daudi wobedi kere mawan?”
Wac m'oyido Joisiraili joluwo otundo ri Daudi. Ameno go ooro jocway ri Were i wi migam, Zadok gi Abiatha kidho penjo jotel ma Yuda ni, “Raŋo wiŋati wibedi macowe konyo kere dwoko i cel pa kere pere?
Wibedo wade paran, delkwoŋan aka remo paran; raŋo wiŋati wibedi macowe dwokan?”
Daudi bende ooro jo waco ri jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Amasa ni, “Ibedo wat paran. Wok pama me kadho yuwaŋe, akethin bedo jamituka jolweny paran lunjo waŋ Yowab. Weyi Were wonekan k'akitimo ameno!”
Aka wac pa Daudi oywayo cuny cwo je ma Yuda, aka jodhiro rigo wac ni wodwoki gi jodhum pere je.
Munyo go nitie i yo dok, oromo gi cwo ma Yuda m'oyido jobino Gilgal kwaŋo go woŋadi malawa Yordan.
I hongo acel no won, Simey janono pa Benyamin aka wod pa Gera ma wok i tindi Bahurim, bende oredo loro gi cwo ma Yuda romo gi kere Daudi.
Simey oyido nitie gi cwo gana acel ma jonono pa Benyamin. Aka Ziba, ŋeca ma peco pa Saulo bende obino gi wote apar g'abic kodi ŋecin pere piero ario, aka jotundo i malawa Yordan ruwaŋ kere.
Aka joŋado malawa kwaŋo kere gi jopeco pere, aka jotimo gima go owaco je.
Munyo kere oyido yikere ŋado malawa, Simey oriewere ruwaŋ kere
aka owaco ni, “Jadwoŋ, mondo wiyin wowil gi raco ma ndelo no atimo munyo iringo weyo Yerusalem. Ikir'imaki i cunyin, aka doko ikir'ipar kada kwoŋe.
Aŋeyo jadwoŋ, ni atimo reco; aka am'omiyo an a marapena kwoŋ Joisiraili je bino romo kodin jadwoŋ.”
Abisay wod pa Zeruya oluwo malo ni, “Simey ripo woneki rupiri okwoŋo ŋata Rwoth oyero bedo kere.”
To Daudi waco ri Abisay gi omin go Yowab ni, “Ŋa m'openjo paro mewin? Wimito kelo ran teko? Aŋat'abedo kere ma Isiraili pama, aka ongoye Jaisiraili m'ibino neko konon.”
Aka kere owaco ri Simey ni, “Amiyin wac paran nike kilanekin.”
Kenyo Mefiboseth nyakwar Saulo oloro bino romo gi kere. Wok cuka kere ngoye Yerusalem tundo kama kere odwok'iye i siem, Mefiboseth oyido kilwoki tiende, kiliel ye tike, aka kilwoki nangin pere.
Munyo Mefiboseth otundo wok Yerusalem romo gi kere, kere openjo go ni, “Raŋo ndelo no ikikadho kodan?”
Mefiboseth odwoko ni, “Paka iŋeyo, jadwoŋ paran, aŋol. Awaco ri ŋeca paran ni wogwey punda paran ŋey akadhi kodin, to go wondan.
Go otieko nyeko nyingan bongin jadwoŋ paran, to in icale malaika pa Were, riameno tim gim'otire rin.
Kole oyido iripo neko jopeco pa baba je jadwoŋ, to iyeyan cemo kodin kanyacel. Aŋo man doko m'anokwayin jadwoŋ!”
Kere odwoko ni, “Kiripi doko iwaci giman je. Atieko yere ni in gi Ziba wibino poko lim pa Saulo.”
Mefiboseth odwoko ni, “Weyi Ziba wodoŋ gine je. Dwoko perin peco i siem won roman.”
Barzilay ma wok i Giliad, bende oyido oloro wok Rogelim kwaŋo kere woŋadi malawa Yordan.
Barzilay oyido oti swa, aka jaoro piero aboro. Go oyido oŋaŋ swa, aka oyido bin miyo kere cemo munyo kere oyido bedo Mahanayim.
Kere owaco rigo ni, “Biye wakadhi i Yerusalem, aka abino kurin.”
To Barzilay dwoko kere ni, “Kwo paran cek; raŋo akadhi kodin i Yerusalem jadwoŋ?
Pama ajaoro piero aboro, aka ongoye gima miyan siem doko. Akiwinji mito ma gim'acamo kosa amadho, aka akinyali winjo kiri dwondi ji ma wero. Alabedo rin bieto jadwoŋ.
Akiripi kodi kemba madwoŋ paka ameno. Riameno alakwaŋin nyaka kalo malawa Yordan.
Akwayin iyeyan adoki peco atho cegin gi liendi jonywol paran. Wodan Kimham ee, kadhi gi go aka bino bedo ŋeca perin jadwoŋ, aka tim rigo gim'iparo ni ber.”
Kere odwoko ni, “Alakadho gi go, aka alatimo rigo gimoro je m'inomiti.”
Kenyo Daudi gi cwo pere joŋado malawa Yordan. Daudi ocwiyo lembi Barzilay, aka omiyo go silwany, aka Barzilay odok peco.
Munyo kere otieko ŋado, kareno ji je ma Yuda kodi adec Joisiraili jokwaŋo go, okidho Gilgal, aka Kimham okidho gi go.
Kenyo Joisiraili jokidho bongi kere aka jopenjo go ni, “Jadwoŋ, raŋo wutmin wan, cwo ma Yuda, joparo ni joripo kadho kodin aka jowokwaŋin, jopeco perin, gi cwo perin yuthenge ma Yordan?”
Cwo ma Yuda jodwoko ni, “Watimo ameno rupiri kere obedo acel kwoŋ wan. Riameno raŋo gime womiy win nge? Go fodi k'onyewo riwan cemo, kosa miyo wan gimoro.”
Joisiraili jodwoko ni, “Wanitie gi atoŋa dipar loyo mewin kwoŋ kere, makada nende go obedo acel kwoŋ win. Raŋo wicayo wan? Wiy win wokiri wowil ni waŋati wabedo marapena luwo kwoŋ dwoko kere!”
To wac pa cwo ma Yuda oyido gway loyo apa cwo ma Isiraili.
Oyido nitie jacwo ma bukony, m'oyido ilwoŋo ni Seba wod pa Bikri, janono pa Benyamin. Go ogoyo gwara to koko ni,
“Wangoye gi adec i Daudi,
aka wangoye gi gir'alunja i wod pa Yese;
Kisi jacwo wodoki i wema pere, a Isiraili!”
Ameno Joisiraili je jojwango Daudi aka jokadho gi Seba. To cwo ma Yuda jodoŋ ka joworo Daudi aka joluwo Daudi wok Yordan kiri Yerusalem.

Munyo Daudi otundo i cel pa kere pere i Yerusalem, otero mon pere apar ma gi thenge m'oyido oweyo kuro cel pa kere, aka oketho jo i cingi jokur. Omiyo jo gima jomito, to doko k'obedo gi jo. Ociero jo woth kamoro je doko i kwo pajo gipi, aka jobedo paka ji ma cwogi jo otho.
Kenyo kere owaco ri Amasa ni, “Lwoŋ cwo ma Yuda je kanyacel, aka idwoki gi jo ka bongan i ndelo adek.”
Ameno Amasa okadho lwoŋo jo; aka k'onyalo dwoko i sawa ma kere ocik'iye go ni wodwoki.
Ameno kere owaco ri Abisay ni, “Pama Seba bino miyo wan teko loyo Absalom. Kwany cwo paran, aka wiluw go; ka k'obedo ameno go bino mako tindin m'othok gi cel to kwale riwan.”
Onyo cwo pa Yowab, jokur pa kere, gi jolweny man joweyo Yerusalem, to jokadho rango Seba.
Munyo jotundo i got madwoŋ iy'adec ma Gibeon, Amasa oromo gi jo. Yowab oyido orukere ri lweny, gi toŋ pere iy'atum bor otweyo gi del. Munyo Yowab ocore yunyime, toŋ opodho wok iy'atum bor.
Yowab owaco ri Amasa ni, “Initie nedi mere paran?” Aka omako ye tike gi cinge ŋey wocwiy lembe.
To Amasa oyido k'oneno toŋ man m'oyido nitie i cingi Yowab; ameno Yowab ocwowo iye aka gir iye onyule woko piny. Kenyo won Amasa otho, aka Yowab k'ocwowo go kendo.
Kenyo Yowab gi omin go Abisay jomedere rango Seba.
Acel kwoŋ cwo pa Yowab ocungo cegin gi delkwoŋ Amasa, aka owaco ni, “Kisi ŋata nitie i thenge pa Yowab gi Daudi woluwi Yowab.”
Delkwoŋ Amasa oyido oriere kenyo oumere gi remo i dier yo. Jalweny pa Yowab no oneno ni kisi nyatoro oyido cungo neno, ameno go oywayo delkwoŋ Amasa wok i yo to tero i sa, aka oumo gi bilangit.
Munyo otiek kwanyo woko delkwoŋ Amasa wok i yo, kisi nyatoro oluwo Yowab rango Seba.
Seba oluwo gi adec ma nonin je i Isiraili, aka otundo i tindi madwoŋ Abel Beth Maka, aka jonono pa Bikri je jocokere, aka joluwo go i tindi madwoŋ.
Cwo pa Yowab jowinjo ni Seba oyido nikenyo, aka jobino to jomako tindi madwoŋ no. Jogero kor ot ma lowo to thenere kwoŋ kor ot ma woko, aka jocako kunyo piny ma kor ot ŋey wopodhi piny.
Oyido nitie dhako mariek swa i tindi madwoŋ m'okoko gi kor ot ni, “Winji! Winji! Waci win ri Yowab wobin ka, amito luwo gine.”
Yowab okidho cegin gi go; aka dhako no openjo ni, “Ibedo Yowab?”
Yowab odwoko ni, “Ey a an.”
Dheno owaco ri Yowab ni, “Winjan jadwoŋ.”
Yowab odwoko ni, “Awinjo.”
Onyo dheno owaco ri Yowab ni, “Cango oyido iwaco ni, ‘Kidhi i tindi madwoŋ Abel inwaŋ radwok.’ Meno a gima jotimo.
Tindi mawan dwoŋ, acel kwoŋ tindin ma disiem aka jowinjo i Isiraili. Raŋo itemo reyo woko? Raŋo imito reyo woko gim'obedo apa Rwoth?”
Yowab odwoko ni, “Be, akibino reyo kosa nyeko tindi mewin madwoŋ.
Meno k'obedo can mawan. Jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Seba wod pa Bikri, ma wok i piny matendere tendere Efrayim, otiŋo cinge malo kwoŋ kere Daudi. Miyan win go i cingan, aka abino eye woko i tindi madwoŋ.”
Dheno odwoko ni, “Walabolo rin wic go gi kor ot.”

Kenyo dheno okidho bongi ji ma tindi madwoŋ gi rieko pere. Aka joŋado ŋuti Seba to jobolo gi kor ot ri Yowab. Yowab ogoyo gwara ma nyutho cwo pere ni jowoeye woko i tindi madwoŋ; aka jodok peco. Yowab odok i Yerusalem bongi kere.
Yowab oyido obedo jamituka jolweny pa Joisiraili; aka Benaya wod pa Yehoyada oyido obedo jatel pa jokur pa Daudi.
Adoram oyido obedo jatel pa jorom ji tic; aka Yehosafat wod pa Ahilud oyido obedo jandiko gi jakan gima timere je.
Seva oyido obedo jandiko; aka Zadok gi Abiatha oyido jobedo jocway ri Were i wi migam i ker pa Daudi.
Ira m'owok i tindi ma Yayir bende oyido obedo jacway ri Were i wi migam pa Daudi.

I ndir ma dhum pa Daudi, obedo kec makec swa m'otieko oro adek gipi. Ameno Daudi openjo Rwoth gima mako kwoŋ kec no, aka Rwoth odwoko go ni, “Saulo gi peco pere ama jonek; rupiri Saulo oneko Jogibeon.”

Ameno kere olwoŋo Jogibeon m'oyido jok'obedo Joisiraili. Jome oyido jobedo kitipa mathin pa Joamor ma Joisiraili oyido jociko kikwonga jo, to Saulo oyido otemo reyo woko jo ro miyirok pere ri Joisiraili gi Yuda.
Ameno Daudi olwoŋo Jogibeon aka owaco rijo ni, “Aŋo m'anyalo timo riwin? Amito culo kwor ma raco m'otimi riwin, ŋey wibino kelo silwany ri ji pa Rwoth.”
Jodwoko ni, “Dhaw mawan gi peco pa Saulo kinyal cowo gi feza kosa zahabu; aka wakimiti neko Joisiraili moro je.”
Daudi openjo jo ni, “Aŋo to ma wiparo ni atim riwin?”
Jodwoko ni, “Saulo oyido omito ni wosika wajoje aka wongoye kwoŋ wan ma wodoŋ makwo i Isiraili.
Riameno miy nyikway go ma cwo abirio i cingi wan, aka wabino ŋawo jo ruwaŋ Rwoth i Gibeya tindi pa Saulo kere ma Rwoth oyero.”
Kere odwoko ni, “Abino miyo jo i cingi win.”
Kere okwanyo Armoni kodi Mefiboseth ma Rizifa nyar Aya onywolo gi Saulo; to bende kwanyo wot Merab nyar Saulo, jabic ma Merab onywolo gi Adiriel wod pa Barzilay m'oyido wok Mehola.
Daudi omiyo jo i cingi Jogibeon, aka joŋawo jo wi got ruwaŋ Rwoth aka jabirio je jotho kenyo. Gime otimere i ndir ma nyaka keco cakere, munyo nyaka icako keco ŋano.

Kenyo dhako pa Saulo ma gi thenge Rizipa okwanyo kutiya ma timo rigo tipo wi got kama delkwoŋ nyikway Saulo oyido nitie iye. Go obedo kenyo wok i hongo m'ocak'iye kec tundo i ndir ma koth. I hongo m'odieceŋ go oyido riemo woko winyin, aka wor go riemo woko ogwaŋe madudi jokiri jowocami delkwoŋ jo.
Munyo Daudi owinjo gima Rizipa oyido timo,
go okidho to kwanyo cokin ma kwoŋ Saulo gi wode Yonathan wok bongi ji ma Yabes iy'adec ma Giliad. Jome oyido jokwalo wok kam'oyido Jofilistia joŋawo iye ndelo m'oneki iye Saulo i got Gilbowa.
Daudi okwanyo cokin ma delkwoŋ Saulo gi Yonathan, aka ocoko cokin ma delkwoŋ cwo abirio m'oyido oneki.
Aka oyiki cokin pa Saulo gi Yonathan i kaliel pa Kisi ba Saulo i Zela, iy'adec pa Benyamin, aka otim kisi gima kere owaco. Munyo gime otieko timirok, to nyaka Were dwoko kwayo pajo ri piny pajo.
Lweny man otur kendo i dier Jofilistia kodi Joisiraili, aka Daudi gi cwo pere jokidho aka jolwenyo gi Jofilistia; to Daudi ol.
Jafilistia m'ogaŋere m'ilwoŋo ni Isibibenob m'oyido otiŋo toŋ ma nyweny m'oyido timo kilo adek g'adec m'otweyo abor manyen oparo nike oyido nyalo neko Daudi.

To Abisay wod pa Zeruya okidho to konyo Daudi, omonjo Jafilistia m'ogaŋere no to neko. Kenyo cwo pa Daudi jomiyo go kwoŋirok ni go doko k'okadhi gi jo i lweny. Cwo pa Daudi jowaco rigo ni, “Ibedo geno pa Isiraili, aka wakimiti keŋ in.”
Rumacen ma gime, lweny obedo kendo gi Jofilistia i Gob; kenyo ama Sibekay ma wok Husa oneko iye Jafilistia m'ogaŋere m'ilwoŋo ni Safi.
Lweny man obedo kendo gi Jofilistia i Gob, aka Elihanan wod pa Yayir ma wok i Bethelehem oneko Goliath ma wok i Gath, m'oyido nitie gi toŋ manitie gi nywol paka nyweny ma cuma ma kwoyirok.
Lweny man obedo kendo i Gath, kam'oyido nitie Jafilistia m'ogaŋere m'oyido omito lweny swa. Go oyido nitie gi lwet cinge aucel i kisi cinge, kodi lwet tiende aucel i kisi tiende.
Go ocayo Joisiraili, aka Yonathan wod pa Sama omin Daudi oneko go.
Jofilistia aŋwen ma jogaŋere me oyido jowok Gath, aka Daudi gi cwo pere joneko jo.
Munyo Rwoth otieko botho Daudi wok i cingi Saulo gi jokwor pere man, Daudi owero wer me ri Rwoth.
Rwoth a tele paran,
kapondo paran, aka jaboth paran.
Were paran obedo tele paran,
i go a kapondo paran.
Kwot paran, aka meni paran ma bothi,
kapondo paran,
jaboth paran; ma bothan wok iy'akaka.
Alwoŋo Rwoth,
aka bothan kwoŋ jokwor paran.
Rwoth wopak!
Asur ma tho oswana an,
asur ma rerok othokan,
adasa ma piny ma tho othokan,
aka bwo ma tho ocomere kodan.
I kidamba paran alwoŋo Rwoth,
alwoŋo Were paran wokonyan.
I ot pere owinjo dwondan,
aka ywak paran owinjere i ithe.
Kenyo piny okirin aka oyengere,
kindi polo oyengere aka okirin
rupiri Were oyido omako nge.
Yiro oduny wok i ywor ume,
mac ma reyo owok i dhoke
cuk mac m'odheth owok bonge.
Oyeco polo to loro piny,
gi pondeponde m'opoto i par tiende.
Ogweyo cwec manitie gi bwombe m'ilwoŋo ni kerubim,
aka oay gi bwombe pa koyo.
Oumere gi mudho thoko,
aka pondeponde m'opoto, m'opoŋ'iye pi othoko go
wok kwoŋ lero ruwaŋe cuk mac m'odheth owok.
Kenyo Rwoth omor wok i polo
aka dwondi Were Madwoŋ Maloyo owinjere.
Ocelo aserin aka okedho woko jokwor pere;
gi menyin ma lithkoth omiyo jo ringo.
Pendi nam odoŋ kamaler,
aka kindi piny oyawere
munyo Rwoth obwoko jokwor pere
aka ohola rijo i nge.
Rwoth otundo piny wok malo aka omakan,
to ywayan wok i pi maluth kweth.
Rwoth obothan kwoŋ jokwor paran ma jotek
kodi kwoŋ jono ma jodakan;
kwoŋbedo oyido jotek swa loyan.
Jomonjan munyo oyido anitie i teko,
to Rwoth ogwokan.
Okonyan wok i raco
obothan rupiri owinjo kodan maber.
Rwoth miyan kemba cungo kwoŋ tiro paran,
go miyan silwany kwoŋbedo angoye gi banja.
Atieko kuro yo pa Rwoth,
aka akiwire kwoŋ Were paran timo kidakana.
Atieko luwo cik pere je,
atieko luwo or pere je.
Oyido angoye g'apuse ruwaŋ go,
aka angoye gi komo.
Riameno Rwoth omiyan kemba cungo kwoŋ tiro paran,
kole oŋeyo nike alony ruwaŋe.
A Rwoth, itimo adieri ri joma timo rin adieri,
aka ikipusa ji ma jongoye g'apuse.
Inyutho cilo ri ji ma cuny gin cil,
t'igeri ri jokidakana.
Ibotho ji mamwol,
aka imwolo jonoro.
In Rwoth, ibedo tala paran,
aka iloko mudho paran lero.
Imiyan meni ma monjo jokwor paran
gi dwoŋ maloyo kwot pajo.
Were me, tim pere otire,
cikirok pa Rwoth tundo i kare,
Go cale kwot,
ri ji je ma jopondo i go.
Rwoth kende a Were
Were kende a tele mawan.
Were me obedo kapondo paran matek
aka kwonga yo paran.
aka kethan gi geno wi gote.
Go thedho cingan ri lweny,
ŋey anyal oro kwot asere m'otimi gi ywel.
A Rwoth, ikwonga an aka ibothan,
kony perin omiyan bedo ŋatadwoŋ.
Igwokan wokiri womakan,
aka tiendan k'ocer.
Ariemo jokwor paran aka aneko jo;
akiwire gik cuka asika woko jo.
Aredho jo piny, aka jokinyal ay malo;
akengila jo aka joriere ruwaŋan.
Imiyan meni ma lweny
kodi loyo kwoŋ jokwor paran.
Imiyo jokwor paran ŋwec kwoŋan
aka asika woko ji ma jodakan.
Joywak ri kony, to ngoye ŋat'okony jo,
jolwoŋo Rwoth, to Rwoth kidwoki jo.
Aŋinyo jo pa fukefuke ma lowo;
anyono jo pa cwodho i yo.
Ibothan gwenyirok gi ji
aka ikuro dhum paran i piny je;
ji m'oyido akuya am'onyo adhumo.
Jopath jobino bwonirok ruwaŋan
aka tekin jowinjo kwoŋan to joluwo cik paran.
Miseni pajo rumo,
aka jobino gi kirin wok i kapondo pajo.
Rwoth kwo! Kwot paran wopak!
Tuci dwoŋ pa Were matek ma bothan!
Go miyan loyo kwoŋ jokwor paran;
ketho nonin i dhum paran
aka bothan kwoŋ cwo ma jomaker.
A Rwoth, imiyan loyo kwoŋ jokwor paran
aka ikwonga an kwoŋ cwo ma jomaker.
Am'omiyo apakin, awi Rwoth, i dier nonin je,
awero wer ma pakin.
Were miyo kikengila madongo ri kere pere;
go nyutho mar makiwire ri ŋata go oyero,
ri Daudi gi nyikwaye cil gi cil.
Me wac pa Daudi macowe:
“Wac pa Daudi wod pa Yese
wac pa jacwo m'otiŋ malo,
ŋata Were pa Yakobo owiro gi mo
jacwogi wer maŋon ri Isiraili.
Cuny pa Rwoth luwo i an,
aka wac pere ni lewan.
Were pa Isiraili otieko luwo,
tele pa Isiraili otieko waco ran;
ka nyatoro dhumo ji gi tiro,
dhumo munyo lworo Were,
keko kwoŋ jo pa lero m'odikin,
pa ceŋ maliel odikin ma pondeponde ongoye,
pa koth ma miyo lum twi wok i lowo.
Aka ameno apaka Were bino miyo nyikwayan silwany,
rupiri go otimo kodan cikirok ma cil gi cil,
cikirok ma kilatur,
cikirok ma kilawire.
Meno a gim'amito,
meno bino bedo loyo paran,
aka Were bino ketho i kare.
To ji ma bu Were jocale kudhin m'obol woko
ongoye ŋata nyalo mako jo gi cinge nono.
To jacwo ma mako jo
ruko nyweny kodi lew toŋ,
to mac rego jo woko.”
Me a nyingi jolweny pa Daudi ma jotek. Marapena obedo Yoseb Basebeth ma wok Tacemon m'otelo ji adek lweny gi cwo 800 aka joneko joje i lweny acel.
Ŋata luwo go kwoŋ cwo adek ma jotek me oyido obedo Eliazar wod pa Dodo janono pa Aho. Ndelo acel go kodi Daudi jocayo Jofilistia m'oyido jocokere kenyo lweny, aka cwo ma Isiraili joringo.

To Eliazar ay malo aka oredho piny Jofilistia cuka cinge ool to cinge moko i abor; ndelo no Rwoth oloyo lweny madwoŋ swa. Munyo lweny orumo, Joisiraili jodwoko kama Eliazar oyido nitie iye, aka jogonyo gilweny kwoŋ jom'otho.
Ŋati mar'adek kwoŋ cwo adek ma joŋeyere obedo Sama wod pa Age ma Harar. Jofilistia oyido jocokere Lehi, kam'oyido nitie ndelo ŋor. Joisiraili joringo Jofilistia,
aka Sama ocungo gi tiende ario i ndelo, ogwoko, aka oneko Jofilistia; aka Rwoth oloyo lweny madwoŋ i ndelo no.
Munyo ndir ma keco cegin tundo, adek kwoŋ cwo piero adek ma jotek joloro piny i ŋungu ma Abidulam, kama Daudi oyido nitie iye, kucel kitipa pa Jofilistia oyido joketho kambi i milelo Refayim.
I waŋceŋ no Daudi oyido nitie kam'okanere, aka Jofilistia oyido jonitie i Bethelehem.
To Daudi owinjo nike mito dok peco aka owaco ni, “Bedi nyatoro moro oyido nyalo miyan pi amadha wok i waŋ pi manitie i waŋkac ma Bethelehem!”
Kenyo cwo adek ma joŋeyere jorire gi i kambi pa Jofilistia, jotwomo pi wok i waŋ pi ma waŋkac ma Bethelehem, aka jokelo ri Daudi. To Daudi k'onyalo madho; to konjo woko paka mic ri Rwoth,
aka owaco ni, “Rwoth, akinyalo madho pi me! Dinyo ocale paŋini amadho remo pa cwo me ma jojala kwo pajo!” Ameno go okwero madho.
Meno a tim ma miseni pa cwo adek ma joŋeyere.
Abisay omin Yowab, aka wod pa Zeruya am'oyido obedo jatel pa cwo piero adek ma jotek. Go olwenyo g'abor pere kodi cwo 300 to neko jo, aka oŋeyere swa kwoŋ cwo adek.
Go oyido oŋeyere swa kwoŋ cwo piero adek, aka obedo jamituka pajo; to go oyido k'oŋeyere swa paka cwo adek ca.

Benaya wod pa Yehoyada ma wok Kabizel bende oyido obedo jacwo ma jamaker; otimo gigipiny madongo kweth, to neko kiri jolweny madongo ario ma Jomowab. Ndelo moro go odonjo i bur munyo tor cwe to neko simbwor.
Go bende oneko jacwo m'ogaŋere ma Jamisir m'oyido nitie gi toŋ. Benaya omonjo go g'abiro, aka omayo Jamisir toŋ wok i cinge to neko go gine.
Me a tim ma miseni ma Benaya wod pa Yehoyada otimo, aka omiyo go nyinge kwoŋ cwo adek ca.
Go oyido oŋeyere kwoŋ cwo piero adek, to oyido k'oŋeyere swa paka cwo adek ca. Aka Daudi oketho go paka jatel pa jokur pere.
Asahel omin Yowab oyido obedo acel kwoŋ cwo piero adek; Elihanan wod pa Dodo ma wok Bethelehem,
Sama ma wok Harod, Elika ma wok Harod,
Helez ma wok Pelet, Ira wod pa Ikes ma wok Tekowa,
Abieza ma wok Anathoth, Mebunay ma wok Husa,
Zalmon ma wok Aho, Mari ma wok Netofa,
Heleb wod pa Bana ma wok Netofa, Itay wod pa Ribay ma wok Gibeya i Benyamin,
Benaya ma wok Pirathon, Hidai ma wok milelo cegin gi Gas,
Abialbon ma wok Araba, Azimaveth ma wok Baurim,
Eliaba ma wok Salibon, wot Yasen, Yonathan,
Sama ma wok Harar, Ahiyam wod pa Sarar ma wok Harar
Elifelet wod pa Ahasibay ma wok Maka, Eliam wod pa Ahithofel ma wok Gilo,
Heziro ma wok Kamel, Paray ma wok Arab,
Igal wod pa Nathan ma wok Zoba, Bani ma wok Gad,
Zelek ma wok Amon, Naray ma wok Beroth, jago pa Yowab wod pa Zeruya,
Ira ma wok Ithira, Gareb ma wok Ithira,
Uriya ma wok Hiti; joje piero adek g'abirio.
Rwoth doko omako nge gi Isiraili, aka omiyo Daudi kelo kwoŋ jo teko. Rwoth owaco ri Daudi ni, “Kadhi i kwan Joisiraili gi Yuda.”
Ameno Daudi omiyo Yowab jamituka jolweny pere cik ni, “Kadhi gi jatel perin i nonin ma Isiraili je wok Dan kiri Berseba, aka wikwan ji. Amito ŋeyo welo pajo.”
To Yowab dwoko kere ni, “Jadwoŋ, weyi Rwoth Were perin womedi welo pa Joisiraili dipiero apar dicel ma jothoth loyo pama, aka weyi i kwo neno go kanyo go timo ameno. To raŋo imito timo gime jadwoŋ.”
To kere miyo Yowab kodi jomituka jolweny pere luwo cik pere. Ameno Yowab gi jomituka jolweny jokidho aka jokwano Joisiraili.
Joŋado malawa Yordan aka joketho kambi i tindi madwoŋ Arower manitie i dier milelo iy'adec ma Gad; aka wok kenyo jokidho yumalo i tindi Yazer.
Kenyo jobino iy'adec ma Giliad, kodi i tindi madwoŋ Kades i lowo pa Johiti. Jobino i tindi Dan, aka wok kenyo jokidho i tindi madwoŋ Sidon.
Kenyo jotundo i tindi madwoŋ m'othok gi cel Tire, kodi i tindin pa Johivi, Jokanan, kiri Berseba, yupiny ma Yuda.
Ameno rumacen ma dwe abuŋwen gi ndelo piero ario jogik i Yerusalem, munyo jotieko woth thoko piny gibe.
Jowaco ri kere welo ji. I Isiraili oyido nitie cwo 800,000 ma jomaker, aka i Yuda oyido nitie cwo 500,000 ma jomaker.
To rumacen cuny Daudi ocako ramo munyo go otieko waco ni wokwan ji, aka owaco ri Rwoth ni, “Atieko timo reco madwoŋ swa munyo atimo gime! Mondo cwaki ran; rupiri atimo gimiŋo.”
Aka munyo Daudi ocew odikin, wac pa Rwoth obino ri jatuci wac Were Gad, jawaci gima bino yuwaŋe pa Daudi ni
“Kadhi i wac ri Daudi ni, ‘Rwoth waco ni, gigipiny adek amiyin; yer acel kwoŋ jo anyal timo rin.’ ”

Ameno Gad obino bongi Daudi aka owaco rigo gima Rwoth oyido owaco, aka openjo go ni, “Kwoŋ gigipiny adek me iyero mene? Oro adek ma kec bino i lowo perin, dwe adek kanyo i ŋweco kwoŋ jokwor perin, kosa ndelo adek ma two nundu i lowo perin? Par kwoŋe aka imiyan radwok m'anoteri ri Rwoth.”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Anitie i kidamba madwoŋ swa; weyi wapodhi i cingi Rwoth rupiri ŋono pere dwoŋ, ma wakipodho i cingi nyatoro.”
Ameno Rwoth odhiro two nundu kwoŋ Isiraili wok odikin no, tundo sawa ma go oyido oyero; aka ji 70,000 jotho wok Dan tundo kiri Berseba.

Munyo malaika pa Rwoth oyido cegin kisika woko Yerusalem, Rwoth owiro paro pere ma miyo ji pere gir'acula aka owaco ri malaika m'oyido neko jo ni, “Oromo, lwogi cingin.” Aka malaika pa Rwoth oyido nitie i kisia pa Arauna, janono pa Yebu.
Kenyo Daudi oluwo gi Rwoth munyo oneno malaika m'oyido neko ji, aka owaco ni, “Neni, atimo reco, aka atimo kidakana; to rombo me, aŋo ma jotimo? Weyi cingin, akwayin, wobedi kwoŋan gi ot pa baba.”
Ndelo no won Gad okidho bongi Daudi aka owaco rigo ni, “Kadhi malo i kisia pa Arauna, aka igeti ri Rwoth migam.”
Daudi oluwo or pa Rwoth aka okidho paka Gad oyido owaco rigo.
Aka munyo Arauna oŋiyo piny to neno kere gi ŋecin pere jobino yubonge, okidho aka obwonere ri kere munyo kulo wiye piny
aka openjo ni, “Jadwoŋ, raŋo ibino bongi ŋeca perin?” Daudi odwoko ni, “Abino nyewo kisia perin ŋey ageti iye ri Rwoth migam ŋey ji jowobothi thoyamo me.”
Kenyo Arauna owaco ri Daudi ni, “Jadwoŋ paran kere, miy Rwoth gimoro je m'imito. Megikwe ee ma waŋo paka cowirok i wi migam; adhere kodi majogi pajo ee ma yen.
Me je amiyin kere, aka weyi Rwoth wojol cowirok perin.”
To kere waco ri Arauna ni, “Be, abino culo kisia gi megikwe. Akibino miyo Rwoth Were paran gim'akicul'iye gimoro.” Ameno Daudi onyewo kisia gi megikwe gi feza piero abic.
Kenyo Daudi ogeto ri Rwoth migam aka omiyo cowirok awaŋa kodi cowirok ma siem. Ameno Rwoth owinjo kwayo pere, aka thoyamo ojukere i Isiraili.
Onyo kere Daudi oyido oti swa, aka makada nende ŋecin pere oyido joumo go gi bilangitere, go k'onyalo winjo lietho.
Riameno ŋecin pere jowaco rigo ni, “Jadwoŋ, weyi warangi rin nyako ma wobedi kodin wokurin. Go bino nindo cegin kodin to miyin lietho.”
Ameno jorango nyako maŋon iy'adec ma Isiraili je, aka jonwaŋo Abisagi ma wok i tindi Sunem to jokelo go bongi kere.
Nyako me oyido ŋon swa, aka okuro kere, to kere k'obedo gine.
Onyo Adoniya wod pa cipa Daudi m'ilwoŋo ni Hagith oroda dwoŋ ka waco ama: “Alabedo kere.” Aka oyiko cawilin gi cwo ma jogweyo kayina, kodi cwo piero abic ŋwec yuwiye.
Bamere Daudi oyido fodi k'opusa go kwoŋ gimoro je. Go oyido ŋon swa aka onywole yuŋey Absalom.
