Adoniya oluwo gi Yowab wod pa dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Zeruya, kodi Abiatha jacway ri Were i wi migam, aka joluwo Adoniya to jokonyo go.
To Zadok jacway ri Were i wi migam, Benaya wod pa Yehoyada, Nathan jatuci wac Were, Simey, Rei, kodi cwo pa Daudi ma jomeni jok'obedo i thenge pa Adoniya.
Adoniya omiyo cowirok ma rombo, megikwe, kodi rwath ma jopoŋ i got thwol, cegin gi waŋ pi Enrogel, aka olwoŋo wutmin je, wot kere, kodi jodhum je ma Yuda,
to k'olwoŋo Nathan jatuci wac Were kosa Benaya kosa cwo ma jomeni kosa omin go Solomon.
Kenyo Nathan owaco ri Bathseba, “Fodi ikiwinjo nike Adoniya wod pa Hagith olokere kere aka jadwoŋ mawan Daudi okuya?
Onyo riameno biye, weyi amiyin rieko, ŋey inyal botho kwo perin, kodi kwo pa Solomon.
Kadhi dicel bongi kere Daudi, aka ipenji go ni, ‘Jadwoŋ, ikikwoŋere ran nike wodan Solomon bino lunjin paka kere? To onyo raŋo Adoniya obedo kere?’
Aka kafodi iluwo gi kere, an bende alabino yuŋeyin t'aridho wac perin.”
Ameno Bathseba okidho bongi kere i kisika pere. Kere oyido oti swa aka Abisagi dhako ma wok i tindi Sunem oyido kuro go.
Bathseba okule piny ruwaŋ kere, aka kere openjo, “Aŋo m'imito?”
Bathseba odwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ paran, ikwoŋere ran i nyingi Rwoth Were perin nike wodan Solomon bino lunjin paka kere.
Aka onyo, neni, Adoniya otieko bedo kere, aka ikuya gima mako kwoŋe.
Go omiyo cowirok ma megikwe kweth, rombo, kodi rwath ma cwe, aka olwoŋo wotin je, Abiatha jacway ri Were i wi migam, kodi Yowab jamituka jolweny perin, to go k'olwoŋo Solomon.
Jadwoŋ paran kere, waŋ Joisiraili je nitie kwoŋin, ma waco rijo ŋata bino lunjin paka kere.
Kakameno, tekin inotho, ibino tero wodan Solomon kodan paka jocam sereko.”
Munyo Bathseba fodi luwo gi kere, Nathan jatuci wac Were odonjo.
Aka owaci ri kere ni, “Nathan jatuci wac Were ee.” Aka munyo Nathan odonjo ruwaŋ kere, okule piny ruwaŋ kere, gi nyime piny i lowo.
Aka Nathan owaco ni, “Jadwoŋ paran kere, ilanga ni Adoniya bino lunjin paka kere?

Kole go konon me won okidho to miyo cowirok ma megikwe kweth, rombo, kodi rwath ma cwe, aka olwoŋo wot kere je, Yowab jamituka jolweny perin, Abiatha jacway ri Were i wi migam; aka neni, jocemo to jomedho ruwaŋ go ka jowaco ni, ‘Yindira kere Adoniya!’
To an, ŋeca perin, Zadok jacway ri Were i wi migam, Benaya wod pa Yehoyada, kodi Solomon go k'olwoŋo wan.
Jadwoŋ iwaco rijo timo gime ma ikiwaco ye kada ri jodhum perin ŋata bino lunjin paka kere?”
Kenyo kere Daudi odwoko ni, “Lwoŋ Bathseba bongan.” Ameno Bathseba odonjo ruwaŋ kere, aka ocungo ruwaŋ kere.
Aka kere okwoŋere ka waco ama: “Paka Rwoth kwo, m'obothan wok i teko je,
paka akwoŋere rin i nyingi Rwoth Were pa Isiraili, wodin Solomon bino lunjan paka kere.”
Bathseba okule gi nyime piny aka owaco ni, “Weyi jadwoŋ paran kere wokwo cil gi cil!”
Kenyo kere Daudi olwoŋo Zadok, Nathan, kodi Benaya. Ameno jobino ruwaŋ kere,
aka kere owaco rijo ni, “Kadhi win gi ŋecin paran, aka weyi wodan Solomon wogwey punda paran won, aka wikwaŋ go loro i waŋ pi ma Gihon,
kama Zadok gi Nathan jobino wiro go paka kere ma Isiraili. Kenyo kudhi win gwara to wikoko, ‘Yindira kere Solomon!’
Luw win go ka dwoko ka bedo i kom paran ma dhum. Go bino lunjan paka kere rupiri go am'atieko yero bedo jadhum ma Isiraili gi Yuda.”
Aka Benaya wod pa Yehoyada odwoko kere, “Wobedi ameno! Weyi Rwoth, Were pa jadwoŋ paran kere, wowaci ameno.
Paka Rwoth oyido nitie gi jadwoŋ paran kere, bende ameno wobedi gi Solomon, aka woloki dhum pere madwoŋ loyo aperin.”
Ameno Zadok, Nathan, Benaya, kodi Jokereth gi Jopeleth joloro aka jomiyo Solomon gweyo punda pa Daudi, aka jokwaŋo go i waŋ pi ma Gihon.
Kenyo Zadok okwanyo tungi dhiaŋ manitie iye mo wok i Wema Maleŋ, aka owiro Solomon. Jokudho gwara, aka ji je jokoko, “Yindira kere Solomon!”
Kenyo joluwo go gik, ka jokoko ri kisangala aka jokudho milowe, ma koko pajo oyengo piny.
Adoniya gi wendo pere je jowinjo munyo jotieko kalima. Aka munyo Yowab owinjo derino ma gwara, openjo ni, “Koko me nyutho aŋo?”
Mafodi Yowab luwo, neni, Yonathan wod pa Abiatha jacway ri Were i wi migam obino. Adoniya owaco rigo ni, “Donji, kole in ibedo jacwo maber aka ikelo wac maber.”
Yonathan odwoko Adoniya ni, “Be, kole jadwoŋ mawan kere Daudi oketho Solomon bedo kere.
Kere ooro Zadok, Nathan, Benaya, kodi Jokereth gi Jopeleth, aka jomiyo Solomon gweyo punda pa kere.
Zadok gi Nathan jowiro go paka kere i waŋ pi ma Gihon. Kenyo jokidho i tindi madwoŋ gi koko ri kisangala, aka ji onyo pama jonitie i woy. Meno a koko ma wiwok winjo.
Solomon pama kere.

Maloyo mere, ŋecin pa kere jobino nyutho wor ri jadwoŋ mawan kere Daudi, aka jowaco ni, ‘Weyi Were perin woloki Solomon woŋeyere loyin, aka dhum pa Solomon wobedi madwoŋ loyo aperin.’ Kenyo kere Daudi okule i kanindo
aka okwayo ni, ‘Weyi wapaki Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, ma konon oloko acel kwoŋ nyithindho paran lunjan paka kere, aka omiyan kwo neno!’ ”
Kenyo wendo pa Adoniya jokirin, aka joay, to kisi nyatoro kadho i yo pere.
Aka Adoniya olworo Solomon, oay, to kadho, aka omako kisi sonda ma migam.
Owaci ri kere Solomon nike Adoniya oyido lworo go aka oyido omako kisi sonda ma migam ka waco ama: “Weyi kere Solomon kutho wokwoŋere ri ŋeca pere nike kilaneko go g'abor.”
Solomon odwoko ni, “Ka go obedi jacwo maber, kada yer ma wiye acel k'opodhi piny, to ka kidakana onwaŋere i go, bino tho.”
Ameno kere Solomon olwoŋo Adoniya aka okeli go wok i wi migam. Adoniya okidho bongi kere aka okule piny ruwaŋe, aka kere owaco rigo, “Inyalo kadho peco.”
Munyo ndelo pa Daudi ma tho ocore cegin, olwoŋo wode Solomon to miyo go fonji pere macowe, ka waco ama:
“Acegin tho. Bedi matek aka m'imiyere,
aka tim gima Rwoth Were perin miyin cik timo. Kur cik pere gi Or pere je paka ondikere i cik pa Musa, ŋey kisi kam'inokidh'iye kisi gim'inotimi wokidhi maber rin,
ŋey Rwoth wokur cikirok pere m'owaco kwoŋan ni, ‘Ka wotin jokur yo pajo, wotho ruwaŋan g'adieri gi cuny gin je kodi adundo pajo je, jobino dhumo Isiraili.’ ”
Iŋeyo gir'atima, ikiripi weyo go wotho i siem i tiyo pere.”
To ikir'iwey go wokadhi m'ongoye gir'acula. Iŋeyo gir'atima, aka iripo neno nike oneki go.”
Daudi otho aka oyiki go i tindi madwoŋ.
Daudi obedo kere ma Isiraili ma oro piero aŋwen. Odhumo ma oro abirio i Hebron kodi oro piero adek g'adek i Yerusalem.
Solomon olunjo bamere Daudi paka kere, aka ker pere ocungo matek.
Kenyo Adoniya wod pa Hagith obino bongi Bathseba yok Solomon. Aka Bathseba openjo ni, “Me wendo ma siem?”
Adoniya odwoko ni, “Ey.”
Aka Adoniya owaco kendo ni, “Anitie gi gim'amito waco rin.”
Bathseba odwoko ni, “Waci.”
Adoniya owaco ni, “Iŋeyo paka aŋat'oyido aripo bedo kere aka kisi nyatoro i Isiraili oyido geno an dhumo. To k'otimere amanago, aka omin an am'obedo kere ro mito pa Rwoth.
Aka onyo anitie gi kwac acel; mondo ikir'iceran.”
Bathseba odwoko ni, “Waci.”
Bathseba odwoko ni, “Ber swa, abino luwo rin gi kere.”

Ameno Bathseba okidho luwo ri Adoniya gi kere Solomon. Kere ocungo malo motho min aka okule piny rigo. Kenyo obedo i kom pere ma dhum aka owaco wokel ri min kom man aka min obedo piny yu cinge maracuc.
Kenyo Bathseba owaco ni, “Anitie gi kwac mathin wok bongin; mondo ikir'iceran.”
Solomon owaco rigo ni, “Waci kwac perin mama akilakwero rin.”
Bathseba odwoko ni, “Weyi omin in Adoniya wobedi gi Abisagi dhako Jasunem paka cege.”
Kere Solomon openjo min ni, “Raŋo ikwayo Abisagi ri Adoniya? Inyalo miti kwayan miyo go kiri ker je; kole go omin an madwoŋ aka Abiatha jacway ri Were i wi migam gi Yowab jonitie i thenge pere!”
Kenyo Solomon okwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth, ka waco ni, “Weyi Were wonekan k'akimiyo Adoniya culo gi kwo pere ro kwayo gime!
Rwoth otieko kethan matek i kom pa baba Daudi dhumo; Rwoth okuro cikirok pere to miyan gi nyikwayan ker. Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo nike Adoniya ripo tho konon me!”
Ameno kere Solomon ooro Benaya wod pa Yehoyada, m'okidho to neko Adoniya.
Kenyo Solomon oriemo Abiatha bedo jacway ri Were i wi migam, aka omiyo gima Rwoth oyido otieko waco ri Eli jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi nyikwaye tundo i kare.
Yowab owinjo gim'otimere. (Kole Yowab oyido othielo Adoniya, to k'othielo Absalom.) Ameno oringo i Wema pa Rwoth aka oliero i kisi sonda ma migam.
Munyo owaci ri kere Solomon nike Yowab oringo i Wema aka oliero i migam, Solomon ooro Benaya ka waco ama: “Kadhi igoy go piny.”
Ameno Benaya obino i Wema pa Rwoth, aka owaco ri Yowab ni, “Kere miyin cik wok woko.”
Yowab odwoko ni, “Be, alatho ka.”
Benaya ogik bongi kere aka owaco rigo gima Yowab owaco.
Kere odwoko ni, “Tim gima Yowab waco. Neki go aka iyiki go, ŋey wongoye kwoŋ an kodi nyikway Daudi man je ma wobedi g'apuse ro gima Yowab otimo munyo oneko cwo ma jongoye gi banja.

Rwoth bino miyo Yowab gir'acula ro neki m'otimo ma baba Daudi k'oŋeyo. Yowab oneko cwo ario ma jongoye gi banja m'oyido jober loyo go: Abuner jamituka jolweny pa Joisiraili, kodi Amasa jamituka jolweny pa Joyuda.
Gir'acula ma neki pajo lapodho kwoŋ Yowab gi nyikwaye cil gi cil. To Rwoth bino miyo nyikway Daudi ma jodhum siem cil gi cil.”
Kenyo Benaya wod pa Yehoyada okidho i Wema pa Rwoth to neko Yowab, aka oyiki go peco pere kam'othangere.
Kere oketho Benaya bedo jamituka jolweny i kabedo pa Yowab aka oketho Zadok jacway ri Were i wi migam i kabedo pa Abiatha.
Kenyo kere ooro wokel Simey aka owaco rigo ni, “Geti ot perin ka i Yerusalem. Bed'iye aka ikir'ingoye i tindi madwoŋ.
Rupiri i ndelo ma inokadhi kalo milelo Kidiron, ŋey adieri nike ibino tho, aka apuse labedo kwoŋin.”
Simey odwoko ni, “Gim'iwaco ber. Paka jadwoŋ paran kere owaco, ameno apaka ŋeca perin latimo.” Ameno Simey obedo i Yerusalem ma hongo malac.
Rumacen ma oro adek, ario kwoŋ ŋecin pa Simey joringo bongi kere ma Gath, Akis wod pa Maka. Munyo Simey owinjo nike oyido jonitie i Gath,
otweyo punda pere aka okidho bongi Akis kere ma Gath rango ŋecin pere. Simey onwaŋo jo to dwoko gi jo peco.
Munyo kere Solomon owinjo gima Simey oyido otimo,
ooro wokel go aka owaco ni, “Amiyin kwoŋirok i nyingi Rwoth nike ikilaeye Yerusalem. Aka agwokin nike k'inoeye, adieri ibino tho. Ikiyere gine t'iwaco nike ibino winjan?
Raŋo to, ituro cikirok perin to ikwero winjo cik paran?
Iŋeyo maber komo m'itimo ri baba Daudi. Rwoth bino miyin gir'acula ro gino.
To Rwoth bino miyan silwany aka bino miyo ker pa Daudi bedo cil gi cil.”
Kenyo kere omiyo Benaya cik m'okidho to neko Simey. Ameno ker ocungo matek i cingi Solomon.

Solomon otimo cikirok gi Farawo ma Misir to nywomo nyar Farawo. Aka Solomon okelo nyar Farawo bedo i tindi pa Daudi madwoŋ, cuka go otieko geto cel pa kere pere, Ot pa Were, kodi kor ot thoko Yerusalem.
Ji oyido jomiyo cowirok pajo i wi migam m'opokere kwoŋbedo oyido ongoye ot m'ogeti i nyingi Rwoth.
Solomon oyido omaro Rwoth aka oluwo fonji pa bamere Daudi, to bende miyo cowirok to waŋo buban i wi migame.
Aka kere okidho i Gibeon miyo cowirok kenyo, rupiri kenyo a kama migam m'oŋeyere oyido nitie iye. Solomon oyido omaro miyo cowirok awaŋa ganin i wi migam no.
Kenyo Rwoth omenyere rigo wor i lek; aka Were openjo go ni, “Kway gim'amiyin.”

Solomon odwoko ni, “Noknok inyutho mar madwoŋ ri baba Daudi, ŋeca perin, rupiri owotho ruwaŋin iy'adieri, i tiro, kodi cunye macil rin. Aka fodi imedere nyutho go mar perin madwoŋ makiwire gi miyo wode ma konon dhumo i kabedo pere.
Aka onyo pama, A Rwoth Were paran, iweyan lunjo baba paka kere, makada nende fodi athin aka akuya nger ma dhum.
An e i dier ji m'iyero bedo ji perin, ji ma jodit ma jokikwanere.
Riameno miyan rieko ma dhumo ji perin, ŋey anyal poko i dier bero kodi raco, rupiri ŋa manyalo dhumo ji perin madwoŋ me?”
Rwoth osangala nike Solomon oyido okwayo gime.
Aka Were owaco ri Solomon ni, “Rupiri ikwayo gime, aka ikikwayo kwo mabor kosa ŋaŋo kosa kwo pa jokwor perin,
neni, alatimo gim'iwaco. Abino miyin rieko kodi ŋeyo madit m'ongoye ŋat'otieko bedo gine, aka ongoye ŋata bino bedo gine kendo.
Amiyin bende gim'ikikwayo, ŋaŋo kodi dwoŋ, aka ongoye kere ma bino pimere kodin i kwo perin je.
Aka k'inowinjan t'ikuro cik gi Or paran paka benin Daudi otimo, abino miyin kwo mabor.”

Solomon ocew aka oniaŋ nike Were oluwo gi go i lek. Kenyo obino i Yerusalem, aka ocungo ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth aka omiyo cowirok awaŋa gi cowirok ma siem. Rumacen otimo kalima ri jodhum pere je.
Ndelo acel malayin ario jobino bongi kere, aka jocungo ruwaŋe.
Acel kwoŋ jo owaco ni, “Jadwoŋ, dhako me kodi an wabedo i ot acel, aka anywolo nyathi majayac peco munyo go nitie.
Rumacen ma ndelo ario munyo atieko nywol, go bende onywolo nyathi majayac. Waj'ario kende am'oyido wanitie i ot, aka oyido ongoye ŋatiman.
Aka wod pa dhako me otho wor, rupiri onindo kwoŋe.
Aka dhako me ocew i dier wor aka okwanyo wodan wok kabutan munyo anindo, to pielo i kanindo pere, to pielo nyathi m'otho i kanindo paran.
Munyo acew odikin to amito miyo nyathi paran dhoth, aneno nike otho. Aŋiyo gi cegin odikin aneno nike k'obedo nyathi paran.”
To dhako man mere owaco ni, “Be! Nyathi makwo aparan, aka m'otho aperin!”
Dhako marapena odwoko ni, “Be! Nyathi m'otho aperin, aka makwo aparan!”
Ameno jopiemo ruwaŋ kere.
Kenyo kere owaco, “Kisi moro kwoŋ win waco nike nyathi makwo apere aka nyathi m'otho apa nyawote.”
Kere ooro wokel abor, aka munyo okeli,
owaco ni, “Bar nyathi makwo i diere kadirio aka imiy kisi adec ri kisi dhako.”
Kenyo yok nyathi m'otire owaco ri kere gi mar m'opoŋ i cunye ri nyathi pere ni, “Mondo jadwoŋ, Ikir'ineki nyathi! Miy go!”
To dhako ca mere waco ni, “Ikir'imiy wajoje; wobar i diere kadirio.”
Kenyo kere Solomon odwoko to waco, “Ikir'ineki nyathi! Miy dhako marapena; go a yok nyathi m'otire.”
Munyo Joisiraili jowinjo nger ma kere othumo iye banja, jopoŋ rigo gi wor, rupiri joniaŋ nike Were oyido omiyo go rieko timo tiro.
Solomon obedo kere ma Isiraili gipi,
aka me a jodhum pere ma malo: Azaria wod pa Zadok oyido jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Elihoref kodi Ahija wot Sisa oyido jondiko ma kapido, Yehosafat wod pa Ahilud oyido kano ndiko je.
Benaya wod pa Yehoyada oyido jamituka jolweny, Zadok gi Abiatha oyido jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Azaria wod pa Nathan oyido telo jodhum mar'adec, Zabud wod pa Nathan oyido jacway ri Were i wi migam aka jamic rieko pa kere.
Ahisar oyido kaŋasa tic pa ŋecin ma cel pa kere, aka Adoniram wod pa Abida oyido neno tic mar'arom.
Solomon oyido nitie gi jodhum apar g'ario ma jodhumo i Isiraili gipi. Oyido jomiyo kere gi peco pere cemo wok iy'adec pajo, aka kisi jacwo oyido miyo cemo ma dwe acel.
Me a nyingi jo: Behur ma piny matendere ma Efrayim,
Ben Deka ma tindin madongo ma Bethsemes Elon, kodi Beth Hanan.
Ben Hesed ma Aruboth (Ri go oyido nitie Soko kodi adec je ma Hefer)
Benabinadab m'oyido onywomo nyar Solomon m'ilwoŋo ni Tafath, adec ma Dor je.
Bana wod pa Ahilud, tindin madongo ma Tanak, Megido, kodi adec macegin gi Bethsan, cegin gi tindi Zarethan, yupiny ma tindi Yezirel, tundo kiri i tindi madwoŋ Abelmehola kodi tindi madwoŋ Yokimeam.

Bengeba, tindi madwoŋ Ramoth i Giliad, loka je ma Giliad m'obedo apa jonono Yayir nyakwar Manase, kodi adec ma Argob i Basan, joje tindin madongo piero aucel, g'acel m'othok gi kor ot kodi nywenye ma ywel i waŋkace.
Ahinadab wod pa Ido, adec ma Mahanayim.
Ahimaz m'oyido onywomo Basemath acel kwoŋ nyir pa Solomon, adec ma Nafital.
Bana wod pa Husay, adec ma Aser kodi tindi ma Bealoth.
Yehosafat wod pa Parua, adec ma Isakar.
Simey wod pa Ela, adec ma Benyamin.
Geba wod pa Uri, adec ma Giliad, m'oyido kere Sihon pa Joamor kodi kere Og ma Basan jodhumo.
Aka oyido nitie jadhum acel ma dhumo lowo gipi ma Yuda.
Ji ma Yuda gi Isiraili oyido jomore pa kwoyo ma thengi nam; jocemo to jomedo aka oyido josangala.
Solomon odhumo kerin wok i Yufrete tundo i lowo pa Jofilistia kiri i kew ma Misir. Joculo Solomon misolo aka jotiyo rigo i kwo pere je.
Gigipiny ma Solomon oyido mito kisi ndelo obedo, lita 5,000 ma moko m'onuŋere kodi lita 10,000 ma moko m'oŋakere,
megikwe apar ma cwe, dhok piero ario m'opidhi gi lum, rombo miya acel, medo i wi kol, jow, kodi winyin.
Kole Solomon odhumo adec je ma yupodho ceŋ ma Yufrete wok Tifsa tundo Gaza, kiri gi kerin pajo, aka obedo i siem gi piny je m'oyido othoko go.
I ndir pa Solomon ji ma Yuda gi Isiraili jobedo i siem, kisi peco obedo gi yen vini pajo kodi makuyu.
Solomon oyido nitie gi kigo 40,000 ri kayina gi cawilin pere, kodi cwo 12,000 ma jogweyo kayina.
Jodhum pa Solomon apar g'ario oyido jomiyo go gigipiny ma go mito kodi jono je ma jocemo kanyacel gi go, kisi jadhum ma dwe acel. Noknok oyido jomiyo go kisi gima go mito,
kiri gi bale
Were omiyo Solomon rieko kodi ŋeyo ma giraura kodi paro kipimere paka kwoyo ma nam.
Ameno Solomon oyido riek loyo cwo je ma yuwok ceŋ kodi cwo ma Misir.
Kole Solomon oyido riek loyo cwo man je, oyido riek loyo Ethan Jazera, Heman, Kalkol, kodi Darda wot Mahol, aka ŋeyirok pere olak i piny mager je.
Solomon ocwoko agecin 3,000 kodi wer ma kalo gana acel.
Oluwo kwoŋ yen gi dudi, wok i yath matek m'ilwoŋo ni Sida i Lebanon tundo kwoŋ cangwe ma lak i kor ot, ogwaŋe, winyin, ogwaŋe ma jomol gi kor jo, kodi rec.
Kerin ma piny gibe jowinjo kwoŋ rieko pere aka jooro ji winjo go.
Solomon odhiro ri Hiram mikwenda ni,
“Iŋeyo paka baba Daudi k'onyalo geto ot ma lamo Rwoth Were pere ro lweny kodi jokwor pere m'oyido jothoko go, cuka Rwoth omiyo go loyo kwoŋ jokwor pere.
To pama Rwoth Were paran omiyan siem i kew paran je. Angoye gi jokwor, aka ongoye teko ma monjan.
Rwoth ociko baba Daudi ni, ‘Wodin, m'alaloko kere lunjin bino geto ran Ot pa Were.’ Aka onyo amiyere geto Ot pa Were ma lamo Rwoth Were paran.

Onyo riameno miy cwo perin cik jowotoŋ ran yen matek m'ilwoŋo ni sida. Cwo paran jolatic gi jo, aka abino culo cwo perin gim'inowaci je. Paka iŋeyo maber, cwo paran jokuya toŋo yen maber paka cwo perin.”
Munyo Hiram owinjo wac pa Solomon osangala swa aka owaco ni, “Rwoth wopak konon m'omiyo Daudi wode mariek no lunjo go paka kere ma piny madwoŋ no!”
Kenyo Hiram odhiro ri Solomon mikwenda ni, “Awinjo mikwenda m'idhiro ran; ayikere timo gim'iyenyo je ma mako kwoŋ yen matek sida kodi yen madongo maboyo ma jaboke kweth.

Cwo paran jobino kelo kasike piny wok i Lebanon i nam, aka jobino tweyo kanyacel i wic wocew i thengi nam kiri i kabedo m'iyero. Kenyo cwo paran jolagonyo, aka cwo perin jobino jolo. I thenge perin, amitin imiyan cemo ri cwo paran.”
Ameno Hiram omiyo Solomon yen sida je kodi kasike yen madongo maboyo ma go omito,
aka Solomon omiyo Hiram tan 2,000 ma ŋano kodi lita 400,000 ma mo nanzi mangil kisi oro ri cwo pere.
Kere Solomon oromo cwo 30,000 wok i Isiraili gipi ma jotimo tic mar'arom
aka oketho jo i cingi Adoniram. Opoko jo i kitipin adek ma 10,000 aka kisi kitipa oyido bedo ma dwe i Lebanon kodi dwe ario peco.
Solomon bende oyido nitie gi cwo 80,000 i piny matendere ma jogolo telin, kodi cwo 70,000 m'oyido jotiŋo,
aka oketho jo i cingi cwo 3,300 kikaŋasa tic pajo.
Luwo kwoŋ cik pa kere Solomon, jogolo telin mafoth mapando ri kindi Ot pa Were.
Ameno jogeto pa Solomon gi jogeto pa Hiram kodi cwo ma jowok i Gebal joyiko telin gi mbawin ma geto Ot pa Were.
Rumacen ma oro 480 munyo Joisiraili jotieko eye wok i Misir, i oro mar'aŋwen ma dhum pa Solomon i Isiraili, i dwe mar'ario, dwe m'ilwoŋo ni Ziv, Solomon ocako geto Ot pa Were.
Iye mere oyido mita piero ario g'abirio i boro, mita abuŋwen i laco, kodi mita apar g'adek g'adec i ŋawirok.
Kisika ma dhiot oyido mita aŋwen g'adec i lutho, mita abuŋwen i laco, malac paka kisika ma iye won.
Kor ot ma Ot pa Were oyido nitie gi dirisin woko, m'odire loyo ma iye.
Kwoŋ kor ot ma woko, i thenge kodi yuŋey Ot pa Were, ogeti udi acurcur adek, kisi acurcur oyido mita 2.2 i boro.

Acurcur ma pende loyo oyido mita 2.2 i laco, ma diere mita 2.7 i laco, aka ma wiye mita 3.1 i laco. Kor Ot pa Were i kisi dier ot oyido thin loyo dier ot ma pende ŋey kisikin wonyali bedo i wiy kor ot ma doko k'ogeti marabin.
Telin m'ogeti gine Ot pa Were oyido oyiki kam'ogol'iye jo, ŋey wongoye koko gi nyundu, le kosa cumin man ma nyweny paka oyido igeto Ot pa Were.
Waŋkac mar'acurcur ma pende oyido nitie yupiny ma Ot pa Were, gi madalin ma kidho i mar'ario gi mar'adek.
Ameno kere Solomon otieko geto Ot pa Were. Oketh'iye miango gi mbawin ma yath matek m'ilwoŋo ni sida.
Acurcur adek, kisi acurcur mita 2.2 i boro, oyido ogeti kwoŋ kor ot ma woko ma Ot pa Were, aka oyido oriw gi mbawin ma yath sida.
Onyo Rwoth owaco ri Solomon ni,
“K'inoluwi cik kodi or paran je, Abino timo rin gim'aciko benin Daudi.
Abino bedo i dier ji paran Isiraili i Ot pa Were me m'igeto, aka akibino jwango jo.”
Ameno Solomon otieko geto Ot pa Were.
Kor ot ma iye oyido oum gi mbawin ma sida wok piny kiri malo, aka dier ot mere oum gi mbawo yath madongo mabor.
Kisika ma iye, m'ilwoŋo ni Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo ogeti yucen ma Ot pa Were aka oyido mita abuŋwen i boro. Opok kwoŋ Ot pa Were gi mbawin ma yath sida wok piny tundo malo.
Kisika ma nyim Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo oyido mita apar g'aboro i boro.
Mbawin ma yath sida oyido oloki maŋon gi cal mar'asanda gi mawuwin, ŋey telin ma kor ot wokiri wonen.
Ogeti kisika ma iye yucen ma Ot pa Were kam'oketh'iye Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth.
Kisika ma iye me oyido mita abuŋwen i boro, mita abuŋwen i laco, kodi mita abuŋwen i ŋawirok, aka oum kwoŋe je gi zahabu. Migam oyido oum gi mbawo ma yath sida.
Iy Ot pa Were oyido oum gi zahabu, aka okethi lijegere m'otimi gi zahabu ariwa i dhiot ma kisika ma iye, m'oyido oum gi zahabu.
Iy Ot pa Were gipi oum gi zahabu, kiri gi migam ma Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo.
Joje oyido jorom i dwoŋo gi cal. Joje oyido jobwombi gin ario, aka kisi bwombi gin oyido mita 2.2 i boro, ŋey wok i bwombi jo acel tundo i man obedo mita 4.4.
Okethi jo i kisi thenge i Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo ŋey bwombi gin ario m'oyare jowomakere i dier kisika, aka bwombi gin ario man jowogey kor ot.
Cwec ario ma jonitie gi bwombi gin oum gi zahabu.
Kor ot ma kisika madwoŋ gi kisika ma iye oloki maŋon gi cal ma cwec ma jobwombi gin, cal ma yath thith, kodi cal ma mawuwin.
Kiri dier ot je oum gi zahabu.
Otimi thigo m'olwowere gi mbawo yath nanzi m'oketh i dhiot ma Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, aka wiye mere oyido oyedhere.
Thigin oyido oloki maŋon gi cal ma cwec ma jobwombi gin, cal ma yath thith, kodi cal ma mawuwin. Thigin, cwec ma jobwombi gin, kodi cal ma thith oyido oum gi zahabu.
Ri dhiot ma kisika madwoŋ otim thigo ma kisi thenge ario rom gi mbawo ma yath nanzi.
Oyido nitie thigin ario adola m'otimi gi yath madongo mabor
aka oloki maŋon gi cal ma cwec ma jobwombi gin, cal ma yath thith, kodi cal ma mawuwin, m'oyido oum gi zahabu kwoŋe je.
Ogeti diedipo ma iye ruwaŋ Ot pa Were, m'othok gi kor ot m'oyido nitie gi mbawo acel ma yath sida kwoŋ kisi telin m'okonji didek.
Kindi ma Ot pa Were ocaki i dwe mar'ario, i dwe ma Ziv, i oro mar'aŋwen ma dhum pa Solomon.
I dwe mar'aboro, dwe ma Buli, i oro mar'apar g'acel ma dhum pa Solomon, Ot pa Were oyido otiek geto paka oyido ocan. Otero Solomon oro abirio geto.
Solomon bende ogeto cel pa kere pere, aka otero go oro apar g'adek cowo.

Ogeto ot ma Lul ma Lebanon, boro mere oyido mita piero aŋwen g'aŋwen, laco mere mita piero ario g'ario, aka ŋawirok mere mita apar g'adek g'adec. Oyido nitie gi siro bol adek ma yen sida, apar g'abic i kisi bol, gi mbawin ma sida i wi jo. Miango mere oyido obedo ma yen sida, m'ocore kiri i kisikin ma kanirok m'oyido othiel gi sirin.
I kisi thenge ario ma kor ot oyido nitie bol adek ma dirisin.
Dhiote gi dirisin oyido jonitie gi miangin ma kisi thenge jo ario rom, aka bol adek ma dirisin i kisi kor ot oŋiyere gi bol m'otire gine.
Kisika ma sirin oyido mita piero ario g'ario i boro kodi mita apar g'adek g'adec i laco. Oyido nitie gi diedipo m'oum to ithielo gi sirin.
Kisika ma dhum kama Solomon oyido thumo iye banjin, oyido nitie gi mbawin ma sida wok i dier ot tundo i kore.
Ot pa Solomon won m'oyido go bed'iye, i diedipo man yuŋey kisika ma thumo banja, bende oyido ogeti paka geto man. Go bende ogeto nger ot acel ri cege, nyar kere ma Misir.
Wok i kindi ot tundo i wiye, udi me gi diedipo oyido ogeti gi telin mafoth. Telin me oyiki kam'igol'iye telin aka oŋadi jo m'opima, t'ifotho jo i kisi thenge gi gikiranda.
Kindi jo oyido ogeti gi telin mapando m'oyik kam'igol'iye telin, megi mita adek g'adec i boro, aka megi mita aŋwen i boro.
I wi jo oyido nitie telin man m'ilwoŋo ni hewin, m'oŋad m'opima, kodi mbawin ma yath sida.
Diedipo ma cel pa kere, diedipo ma iy Ot pa Were, kodi kisika ma donjo i Ot pa Were oyido jonitie gi kor ot manitie gi yen sida i wi telin m'oŋad m'okonji didek.
Aka kere Solomon ooro wokel jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Hiram wok i Tire.

Hiram oyido wod pa citho ma janono pa Nafital, aka bamere oyido wok Tire aka oyido nitie gi ndijo ma ywel. Hiram oyido opoŋ gi rieko, niaŋ, kodi ndijo ma timo tic gi ywel. Hiram obino bongi kere Solomon, aka otimo tic pere je.
Hiram otimo sirin ario gi ywel. Kisi acel oyido mita aboro i boro kodi mita 5.3 thoko to ketho jo i dhiot ma Ot pa Were.
Hiram bende otimo raŋaw talin i wi sirin ario, kisi acel mita 2.2 i boro.
Go bende otimo kicungwo m'okedi to ketho wi kisi siro,
kodi bol ario ma cal ma pomo.
Raŋaw ma wi sirin oyido jocale thiw dudi. Boro pajo oyido mita 1.8
aka okethi jo i wi cal ma lijegere thoko. Oyido nitie cal ma pomo 200 i bol ario thoko kisi raŋaw i wi sirin.
Hiram oketho sirin ario me ruwaŋ dhiot ma Ot pa Were. Acel i thenge ma yupiny olwoŋi ni Yakin,
Raŋaw i wi sirin ma jocale thiw dudi oyido jonitie i wi sirin.
Aka Hiram otieko timo sirin.
Hiram bende otimo pipa ma nyaraunda gi ywel. Lutho mere oyido mita 2.2 laco mere oyido mita 4.4 aka dwoŋo mere oyido mita 13.2
Oyido nitie bol ario mar'asande m'otimi gi ywel thoko miango ma pipa woko m'otimi i nger acel.
Pipa oyido obedo i wi cal ma thwondhe apar g'ario ma joŋiyo woko, adek i kisi thenge.
Nywol ma thengi pipa oyido inci adek, miango mere oyido cale miango ma kikopo m'oyare woko paka mawuwa ma thiw dudi aka oyido tiŋo lita 40,000.
Hiram bende otimo magal apar gi ywel. Kisi magal oyido mita 1.8 i boro, mita 1.8 i laco, kodi mita 1.3 i ŋawirok.
Otimi jo gi yen m'opay ma jothengi gin aŋwen marom i miangin.
Okethi kwoŋ yen m'opay cal ma simbwore, thwondhe gi cwec ma jobwombi gin, aka i wi miangin gi i pendi gin okethi cal ma simbwore, thwondhe kodi cal ma gim'owiy.
Kisi magal oyido nitie gi tiende gi fuliwero m'otimi gi ywel. I kisi sonda aŋwen oyido nitie githielo wer. Githielo wer me oyido okicini gi cal ma gim'owiy.
Oyido nitie miango ma nyaraunda ri wer. Woki i wi magal kadho malo oyido mita 0.5 aka loro piny mere oyido mita 0.7 aka oyido nitie gi yen m'opay thoko.
Tiendan magal oyido jonitie i ŋangi yen m'opay aka boro pajo m'oyido inci piero ario g'abirio. Fuliwero oyido otim i nger acel gi magal.
Tiendan magal oyido cale tiendi cawila, fuliwero, miangin, pagere, kodi girwako pagi pajo je oyido otim gi ywel.
Oyido nitie githielo i sondin aŋwen ma magal ma tim acel gine.
Oyido nitie thol ma mita 0.2 i wi magal thoko. Githielo mere kodi yen m'opay mere oyido tim acel gi magal.
Githielo gi yen m'opay oyido okicini gi cal ma cwec ma jobwombi gin, simbwore, yen thith, aka kisi kama hongo odoŋ'iye, gi cal ma gim'owiy thoko.
Ama apaka Hiram otimo magal, oyido jocale aka jorom.
Oketho magal abic i thenge ma yupiny ma Ot pa Were, kodi abic man i thenge ma yumalo. Pipa mere oketho i dier thenge ma yupiny kodi yuwok ceŋ.
Hiram bende otimo degi, mwiko, kodi atewe. Ameno go otieko tic je ma Solomon omiyo go ri Ot pa Were.
Me a gigipiny ma Hiram otimo.
Sirin ario, raŋaw i wi sirin, kodi cal ma lijegere m'okedi i wiye.
Cal ma pomo m'otimi gi ywel 400 i bol ario ma miya thoko cal ma lijegere m'okedi.
Magal apar, kodi wer apar i wi magal.
Pipa acel, kodi thwondhe apar g'ario i ŋange thielo.
Degi, mwiko, kodi atewe.
Gigipiny me je Hiram otimo ri Solomon gi ywel m'oleny.
Kere omiyo wotim gigipiny me je i dier Sukoth gi Zarethan i milelo Yordan.
Solomon oweyo gigipiny me je ma k'opima kwoŋbedo oyido jodit aka ywel ma oor timo jo k'oŋeyere.
raŋaw talin apar m'oyido ocungo ruwaŋ Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, abic i thenge ma yupiny kodi abic i thenge ma yumalo, mawuwin, talin, lew gin,
kikopere, girwako uzi talin, wer, atewe ma buban, sapikere ma tiŋo cuk mac, kodi petin ma thigin ma Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo gi thigin ma woko ma Ot pa Were.
Aka cwo je jocokere bongi kere Solomon i kalima i dwe ma Ethanim, dwe mar'abirio.
Munyo jotel je jotieko cokirok, jocway ri Were i wi migam jotiŋo malo Kakan ma Cikirok
aka jotero i Ot pa Were. Jolevi kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam bende jotero Wema Maleŋ gi gigipiny mere je i Ot pa Were.
Kere Solomon kodi ji je jocokere ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok aka jomiyo cowirok ma rombo kodi dhok kweth ma kikwanere.
Kenyo jocway ri Were i wi migam jokelo Kakan ma Cikirok i Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, i ŋangi cwec ma jobwombi gin.
Bwombi gin m'oyare oumo Kakan ma Cikirok kodi gute m'otiŋ gine.
Gike ma gute oyido nyalo nenere ka nyatoro ocungo tirtir ruwaŋ Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, makiweno gi kaman je. (Gutin no fodi jonitie kenyo kiri konon.)
Oyido ongoye gima nitie i Kakan ma Cikirok kwanyo woko telin mapando ario ma Musa oyido oketh'iye i got Sinai, munyo Rwoth otimo cikirok gi Joisiraili munyo jowok i Misir.
ŋey jocway ri Were i wi migam jok'onyalo gik timo tic pajo, rupiri dwoŋ pa Rwoth opoŋ i Ot pa Rwoth.
Kenyo Solomon okwayo ni,
“In, Rwoth, iketho waŋceŋ i polo,
kucel iyero bedo i pondeponde kodi mudho.
Onyo atieko geto rin ot maŋon,
kam'ilabed'iye cil gi cil.”
Paka ji oyido jocungo kenyo, kere Solomon owire to ŋiyo jo, aka okwayo Were miyo jo silwany.
Solomon owaco ni, “Rwoth Were pa Isiraili wopak! Okuro cikirok pere m'otimo ri baba Daudi, munyo owaco ni,
‘Wok i hongo m'awodho ji paran wok i Misir, fodi akiyero tindi madwoŋ i lowo ma Isiraili ma Ot pa Were ripo woget'iye kam'inyalo laman'iye. T'ayerin, Daudi, dhumo ji paran.’
Baba Daudi oyido ocano geto Ot pa Were ma lamo Rwoth Were pa Isiraili,
to Rwoth owaco rigo ni, ‘Oyido itire mito geto ran Ot pa Were,
to ikibino geto. Obedo wodin, wodin won, ama bino geto ran Ot pa Were.’ ”
“Aka onyo Rwoth okuro cikirok pere. Alunjo baba paka kere ma Isiraili, aka atieko geto Ot pa Were ma lamo Rwoth Were pa Isiraili.
Atieko bende ketho kabedo ri Kakan ma Cikirok manitie iye telin mapando ma cikirok ma Rwoth otimo gi kwarere mawan munyo owodho jo wok i Misir.”
Kenyo Solomon ocungo ruwaŋ migam i waŋ cokirok pa Joisiraili, aka orieyo cinge yupolo,
to kwayo ni, “Awi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, ongoye Were ma cale in, i polo malo kosa i piny! Ikuro cikirok perin gi ji perin aka inyutho mar makiwire ka jowotho ruwaŋin gi cuny jo je.
Itieko kuro cikirok m'itimo gi baba Daudi, konon kisi wac otundo i kare.
Onyo riameno, Awi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili kur bende cikirok man m'itimo gi baba munyo iwaco rigo nike noknok acel kwoŋ nyikwaye bino dhumo paka kere ma Isiraili, k'inen jowinjin paka go.
Ameno onyo, Awi Were pa Isiraili, weyi kisi gim'iciko baba Daudi, ŋeca perin wotundi i kare.”
Rwoth Were paran, abedo ŋeca perin. Winji kwayo paran, aka imiyan gim'akwayin konon.
Kur Ot pa Were me odieceŋ kodi wor, kabedo m'itieko yero ni wolamin'iye. Winjan k'aŋiyo Ot pa Were me t'akwayo.
Winji kwayo paran gi kwayo pa ji perin ka joŋiyo kabedo me to jokwayo. I nyingin i polo winji wan aka icwaki reco mawan.”
“K'osegeya nyatoro timo gimarac ri nyawote t'ikelo go ruwaŋ migam perin i Ot pa Were kwoŋirok nike go ongoye gi banja,
Awi Rwoth, winji gi polo aka ithumi banja ri ŋecin perin. Miy gir'acula ri ŋatarac aka iwey ŋat'ongoye gi banja wokadhi.”
“Ka ji perin Isiraili, jokwor pajo jokengila jo kwoŋbedo jotimo reco kwoŋin, to jowire bongin kendo to jobino i Ot pa Were me, pusirok gi mwolo,
winji jo gi polo. Cwaki reco pajo, aka idwoki jo i lowo m'imiyo kwarere pajo.”
“K'itweyo koth kwoŋbedo ji perin jotimo reco kwoŋin, ka jopusere to joŋiyo Ot pa Were me kwayin gi mwolo,
winji jo gi polo. Cwaki reco pa kere kodi reco pa Joisiraili. Fonji jo timo gim'otire. Kenyo, Awi Rwoth, dhiri koth i lowo perin me, m'imiyo ji perin paka lim pajo alunja.”
“Ka kec kosa two nundu obedi i lowo, kosa koyo malieth kosa tome bonyo, onyeki cemo, kosa jokwor pa ji perin jomonji jo iy'acel kwoŋ tindin pajo madongo, kosa two moro je obedi i dier jo,
winji kwayo pajo. Ka Joisiraili perin moro, wok i ŋuto ma cuny gin, jotiŋ cingi gin malo i Ot pa Were me,
winji kwayo pajo. Winji jo gi peco perin i polo, cwaki jo, aka kony jo. In kende iŋat'iŋeyo paro ma cuny nyatoro. Tiyi gi kisi nyatoro paka yenyere,
ŋey jowolworin i kwo pajo je i lowo m'imiyo kwarere mawan.”
“I nger acel ka japath, ma k'obedo acel kwoŋ ji perin owinji kwoŋ dwoŋ perin kodi gigipiny madongo m'itieko timo ri ji perin, to bino lamin kodi kwayin i Ot pa Were me,

winji kwayo pere. I polo, kam'ibed'iye, winji go aka tim gima go kwayin timo, ŋey nonin je i piny gibe jowoŋeyin aka jowowinjin, paka ji perin Isiraili jotimo. Kenyo jobino ŋeyo nike Ot pa Were m'ageto me kabedo m'iripo lamin'iye.”
“K'imiyo ji perin cik kadho i lweny gi jokwor pajo to jokwayin, kama jobed'iye je, ka joŋiyo tindi madwoŋ me m'iyero kodi Ot pa Were m'ageto rin me,
winji kwayo pajo. Winji jo i polo aka miy jo loyo.”
“Ka ji perin jotimi reco kwoŋin, kole ongoye ŋata kitim reco, to i nge perin iweyo jokwor pajo kikengila jo, t'itero jo paka jojiera i lowo man, makada nende lowo no obedi bor swa,
kucel ka joŋuti reco pajo i lowo m'oter'iye jo paka jojiera, to jopusere, to joywak rin i lowo no, ka jowaco ni, ‘Watimo reco, watimo gi komo; aka watimo gikidakana,’
Ka jopusere gi cuny jo je kodi adundo pajo je i lowo pa jokwor pajo, ka joŋiyo lowo me, m'imiyo kwarere pajo, tindi madwoŋ me m'iyero, kodi Ot pa Were m'ageto rin me,
kenyo winji kwayo pajo. Gi peco perin i polo winji jo aka maki wor gi jo.
Cwaki reco pajo je kodi gwenyirok pajo kwoŋin, aka miy jokwor pajo jowoteri jo gi wor.
Kole jobedo ji perin won m'iwodho wok i Misir mac m'odheth no.”
“Mondo ŋiy ji perin Isiraili kodi kere pajo gi ŋono, aka winji kwayo pajo noknok ka jolwoŋin ri kony.
Kole itieko ketho jo gicen kwoŋ nonin je ma piny, bedo ji perin won, paka iciko luwo bongi ŋeca perin Musa munyo iwodho kwarere mawan wok i Misir.”
Rumacen munyo Solomon otieko kwayo Rwoth, oay malo ruwaŋ migam, kama go oyido ogur'iye conge gi cinge malo.
Gi dwonde ma malo okwayo Were womiy ji je m'oyido jocokere kenyo silwany. Solomon owaco ni,
“Rwoth wopak m'omiyo ji pere siem paka ociko nike latimo. Okuro cikirok pere ma gir'aura m'omiyo luwo bongi ŋeca pere Musa.
Rwoth Were mawan wobedi gi wan paka obedo gi kwarere mawan; weyi go wokiri wowey wan kosa wojwangi wan,
weyi womiy wan winjo go, ŋey wawothi i yo pere, aka wakur cik kodi Or pere je m'omiyo kwarere mawan.
Weyi Rwoth Were mawan wopoy i hongo je kwayo paran me, aka weyi wobedo gi wor ri ji pere kodi kere pajo, paka kisi ndelo go mito.
Aka ŋey nonin je ma piny jowoŋey nike Rwoth kende obedo Were; ongoye man.
Weyi win, ji pere, wibedi gi adieri noknok ri Rwoth Were mawan, kuro cik kodi Or pere je paka witimo konon.”
Kenyo kere Solomon kodi ji je jomiyo Rwoth cowirok.
Solomon omiyo Rwoth cowirok ma siem ma dhok 22,000 kodi rombo 120,000. Aka ameno kere kodi ji je joketho i cingi Rwoth Ot pa Were.

I ndelo no won Solomon oloko dier diedipo maleŋ, yuwaŋ Ot pa Were, aka omiyo kenyo mic awaŋa gikululu, mic ma cemo manyinge, kodi mic mabor ogwaŋe paka cowirok ma siem. Otimo gime kwoŋbedo migam ma ywel oyido thin ri cowirok me je.
Ameno Solomon kodi Joisiraili je jotimo kalima ma ndelo abirio. Oyido nitie lwak ji wok i ger ma Hamath tundo yumalo kodi kew gi Misir yupiny.
I ndelo mar'abirio Solomon osewila ji dok peco. Jopako go aka jodok peco munyo josangala ro silwany kweth ma Rwoth oyido omiyo ŋeca pere Daudi kodi ji pere Isiraili.
Munyo Solomon otieko geto Ot pa Rwoth, ot pa kere, kodi kisi gima go omito geto,
Rwoth omenyere rigo madirio, paka oyido omenyere rigo i Gibeon.
Aka Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Atieko winjo kwayo perin. Alonyo Ot pa Were me m'igeto paka kabedo m'ilalaman'iye cil gi cil. Abino kuro t'agwoko i hongo je,
k'inowothi ruwaŋan paka benin Daudi owotho, gi cunye macil kodi tiro, timo kisi gim'amiyin cik timo, kodi kuro cik kodi Or paran je,
Abino kuro cikirok m'atimo gi benin Daudi munyo awaco rigo nike nyikwaye ama jobino dhumo Isiraili noknok.
To ka in kodi nyikwayin wiweyo luwan, ka wikikuro cik kodi Or paran m'amiyo win to wilamo werin man,
kenyo alafudho woko ji paran Isiraili wok i lowo m'atieko miyo jo, aka alajwango Ot pa Were m'atieko loko maleŋ paka kam'iripo laman'iye. Isiraili lalokere gir'ageca aka ji jolatero gi cay.
Ot pa Were me bino lokere kidhur gunda aka kisi ŋat'oluwi ka labwok to dhier; aka jobino penjo ni, ‘Raŋo Rwoth otimo gime ri lowo me kodi Ot pa Were me?’
Ji joladwoko ni, ‘Kwoŋbedo jojwango Rwoth Were m'owodho woko kwarere pajo wok i piny Misir. Joworo werin man, to jolamo jo; riameno go okelo teko me kwoŋ jo.’ ”
Solomon ocowo oro piero ario geto Ot pa Were kodi cel pa kere.
Kere Hiram oyido omiyo go yen sida je kodi yen madongo maboyo kodi zahabu je ma Solomon omito ma timo tic pere. Rumacen kere Solomon omiyo Hiram tindin piero ario iy'adec ma Galili.
Kere Hiram obino wok i Tire neno tindin, aka k'ofoyo jo.
Ameno Hiram owaco ri Solomon ni, “Me nger tindin aŋo m'imiyan, omin an?” R'atoŋa me kabedo no ilwoŋo ni Kabul kiri konon.
Hiram oyido odhiro ri Solomon zahabu ma romo kilo 4,000.
Kere Solomon ooro tic mar'arom geto Ot pa Were, cel pa kere, yiko lowo ma yuwok ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ, geto kor tindi madwoŋ kodi geto kendo tindin madongo Hazor, Megido, kodi Gezer.
(Con mere Farawo ma Misir oyido omonjo to omako Gezer, oneko ji mere, to waŋo woko. Kenyo omiyo nyare paka mic munyo onywomere gi Solomon,
aka Solomon ogeto kendo) kodi Bethhoron piny,
Balath, Tamar, i thim ma Yuda,
tindin madongo m'oyido ikano iye gigipiny pere, tindin madongo ma kayina kodi cawilin pere, kodi kisi gimoro ma Solomon omito geto i Yerusalem, i Lebanon, kodi kamoro je i ker pere.

Ri tic pere arom, Solomon ooro nyikway ji ma Kanan ma Joisiraili oyido jok'oneko munyo jotero lowo pajo. Me obedo Joamor, Johiti, Joperiz, Johivi, kodi Joyebus, ma nyikway jo jomedere bedo ŋecin kiri konon.
To Solomon k'oloko Joisiraili ŋecin; jo jotiyo paka jolweny pere, jodhum, jomituka jolweny, jogwey cawilin, jotel pa jokur pere, kodi jogwey kayinin pere.
Solomon oyido nitie gi jodhum 550 ma jotelo tic mar'arom i geto pere m'opokere opokere.
Nyar Farawo oeye wok i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi to kadho i ot pere won ma Solomon ogeto rigo, aka Solomon ogeto mayilo i lowo ma yuwok ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ.
Kere Solomon bende ogeto bogi mel i Eziongeba, macegin gi Eloth i thengi Nam M'obokere i lowo ma Edom.
Kere Hiram ooro cwo pere moro ma jotieko niaŋ tic ma Nam tiyo gi cwo pa Solomon.
Jocewere kidho i lowo ma Ofir, aka jokelo ri Solomon zahabu ma kalo kilo 14,000.
Go obino gi kitipa madwoŋ ma jotic pere, gi ŋamin ma jotiŋo gigipiny maŋwe kur, thiwino, kodi zahabu madit. Munyo go gi Solomon joromo, openjo Solomon penji je m'oparo kwoŋe.
Solomon odwoko penji je, aka ongoye gim'otek rigo tito.
Nyamicala ma Seba owinjo rieko pa Solomon aka oneno peco pere m'ogeto,
cemo m'itoko i meza pere, pecin pa jodhum pere, kitipin pa jotic kodi ŋecin pere kodi nangin pajo ma cale ma joruko, jotic pere, kodi cowirok ma Solomon miyo i Ot pa Were aka cunye okwe.
Nyamicala ma Seba owaco ri Solomon ni, “Gim'awinjo i piny paran ma mako kwoŋ tim perin kodi rieko perin obedo adieri!
To akinyalo yeyo cuka an won abino t'aneno. Aka neni adec mere oyido k'owaci ran. Iriek kalo kama ji jowaco.
Josilwany a ji perin! Josilwany a ŋecin perin me, ma noknok jonitie ruwaŋin aka jonitie gi silwany ma winjo rieko perin.
Rwoth Were perin wopak m'onyutho nger m'osangal'iye kodin to kethin kere, dhumo i nyinge. Kwoŋbedo mar pere ri Isiraili kiwire, okethin bedo kere pajo ŋey inyal kuro cik kodi tiro.”
Nyamicala omiyo Solomon mic m'okelo; zahabu ma kalo kilo 4,000 kodi gigipiny maŋwe kur kodi thiwino madit. Ongoye kendo dito ma gigipiny maŋwe kur ma Solomon olimo paka ma nyamicala omiyo go.
(Aka ŋecin pa kere Hiram kodi kere Solomon ma jokelo zahabu wok Ofir bende jokelo mbawin ma yen m'ilwoŋo ni algum kodi telin ma welo.
Solomon ooro mbawin me ma geto madala ma Ot pa Were kodi ma peco pere, kodi timo adungin kodi tongol ri jower. Nger mbawo ma yen algum no fodi k'oneno kendo tundo kiri konon i piny Yuda.)
Kere Solomon omiyo nyamicala ma Seba kisi gima go okwayo, medo i wi mic man manyakwer m'oyido omiyo go. Kenyo nyamicala odok i Seba gi jotic pere.
Kisi oro kere Solomon oyido limo zahabu ma romo kilo 23,000
medo i wi misolo wok bongi jomitan, kerin pa Jowarabu kodi jogavana mar'adec ma Isiraili.
Solomon otimo kwote malac 200 gi zahabu. Kisi kwot acel otim gi zahabu kilo ma romo abirio.
Solomon bende otimo kwote mathindho 300. Kisi kwot acel otim gi zahabu ma romo kilo ario. Kwote me je okethi i Kisika ma lul ma Lebanon.
Solomon bende otimo kom ma dhum malac gi tungi liec, aka oum gi zahabu macil.

Kom ma dhum oyido nitie gi madalin aucel kiri malo, kodi cal ma simbwor i gike ma kisi madala, joje cal ma simbwor apar g'ario. Yuŋey kom ma dhum oyido nitie cal ma wic thwon, aka kabuti kisi cinge ario oyido nitie cal ma simbwor. Nger kom ma dhum me oyido fodi k'obedo i ker moro je.
Atewe je ma medho oyido otim gi zahabu, kiri g'atewe ma Kisika ma Lul ma Lebanon je otim gi zahabu macil, rupiri i ndir pa Solomon feza oyido ongoye gi cwe.
Solomon oyido nitie gi bogi ma mel ma jocewere gi bogi pa Hiram. Dicel i kisi oro adek bogi pere oyido dwoko m'otiŋo zahabu, feza, tungi liec, oŋer ambu, kodi oŋere.
Kere Solomon oyido oŋaŋ aka riek loyo kere man je,
aka piny gibe oyido mito winjo rieko ma Were oyido omiyo go.
Kisi ŋat'obino neno go kelo rigo mic ma gigipiny m'otimi gi feza, zahabu, nangin, gilweny, gigipiny maŋwe kur, kayina kodi punde. Gime omedere kisi oro.
I ndir ma dhum pa Solomon feza oyido nitie kisi kamoro pa telin, aka yen sida oyido omore pa musikamol ma tiendi tendere i Yuda.
Aka kayina ma donjo i piny pa Solomon oyido jowok i Misir kodi Kuwe, aka jomitan pere oyido jojolo gi Kuwe i welo moro.
Oyido ikelo cawilin wok i Misir i welo ma feza 600 kodi kayina i welo ma feza 150 aka jomitan pa Solomon oyido jotero kitana ri kerin pa Johiti kodi kerin ma Siria.
Onywomo jo makada nende Rwoth oyido omiyo Joisiraili cik nike jokiri jowonywom kosa jowonywomere gi jo, rupiri oyido jonyalo miyo Joisiraili lamo werin man.
Solomon onywomo mon 700 aka oyido nitie gi mon man woko 300. Jomiyo go wire woko kwoŋ Were.
Kole munyo Solomon oti mon pere oyido jomiyo go lamo werin man. Solomon oyido ongoye gi adieri ri Rwoth Were pere paka bamere Daudi oyido nitie.
Olamo were madhako Asitate ma Sidon, kodi were Molek kidakana ma Amon.
Ameno Solomon otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth aka k'obedo gi adieri paka bamere Daudi otimo.
Kenyo Solomon ogeto wi got yuwok ceŋ ma Yerusalem kalamo were Kemos, kidakana ma Mowab, kodi ri Molek kidakana ma Amon.
Go bende ogeto kalamo kisi kama mon jopath pere oyido jowaŋo iye buban to jomiyo cowirok ri werin pajo.
Aka Rwoth omako nge gi Solomon rupiri cunye oyido ocile kwoŋ Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, m'omenyere rigo dirio,
to miyo go or kwoŋ gime, nike wokiri woluwi werin man; to k'okuro gima Rwoth omiyo go or ni wotimo.
Riameno Rwoth owaco ri Solomon ni, “Paka me oyido obedo paro perin aka ikikuro cikirok paran kodi cik paran m'amiyin, adieri abino yeco woko ker perin wok bongin aka abino miyo ŋeca perin.
To kucel ro Daudi benin, Akibino timo i hongo perin, t'abino yeco wok i cingi wodin.
To kad'ameno, akibino yeco woko ker gibe; t'abino miyo nono acel ri wodin, ro Daudi ŋeca paran kodi ro Yerusalem m'atieko yero.”
Ameno Rwoth omiyo Hadad, wok i ot ma ker Edom gwenyirok gi Solomon.
Kole munyo Daudi omako Edom, Yowab jamituka jolweny pere oyido okidho kenyo yiko jom'otho, Daudi kodi cwo pere jodoŋ i Edom ma dwe aucel, aka i hongo no joneko kisi jacwo i Edom,
to Hadad oringo i Misir, kanyacel gi Joedom moro m'oyido ŋecin pa bamere, Hadad oyido fodi thin.
Joeye Midian to jokidho i Paran, kama cwo moro man joriwere gi jo. Kenyo jokidho i Misir bongi Farawo, m'omiyo Hadad lowo kodi ot aka omiyo go cemo.
Hadad onwaŋo wor ruwaŋ Farawo, aka Farawo omiyo go ywore nyamin Tafenes cipa Farawo i nywomirok.
Nyamin Tafenes onywolo ri Hadad wode, aka Tafenes ama opido gi peco pa kere paka acel kwoŋ wot kere.
To munyo Hadad owinjo gi Misir nike Daudi otho aka kiri Yowab jamituka jolweny bende otho, Hadad owaco ri Farawo ni, “Weyi adoki i piny paran won.”
Farawo openjo go ni, “Aŋo m'ingoye gine bongan ma idwaro dok i piny perin won?”
Hadad odwoko ni, “Weyan nyaka akadhi.” Aka go odok i piny pere.
Paka kere ma Edom, Hadad oyido obedo jakwor pa Isiraili marac makec.
Were bende omiyo Rezon wod pa Eliada gwenyirok gi Solomon. Rezon oyido oringo kwoŋ jadwoŋ pere, kere Hadadeza ma Zoba,

to lokere jatel pa ji ma bukony. (Gime otimere rumacen ma Daudi kikengila Hadadeza aka oyido othumo jokony pa Siria.) Rezon gi cwo pere jokidho to jobedo i Damasiko, kama cwo pere joloko go kere ma Siria.
Rezon oyido obedo jakwor pa Isiraili i hongo pa Solomon.
Jacwo man m'owire ri Solomon obedo acel kwoŋ jodhum pere, Yerobowam wod pa Nebat, ma wok Zereda i Efrayim. Yokimere oyido obedo citho Zeruya.
Me apaka otimere.
Solomon oyido poŋo lowo ma yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ ma Yerusalem aka yiko kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ.
Yerobowam oyido obedo jayac manitie gi nyalo, aka munyo Solomon oneno nger ma otiyo matek, oketho go telo jotic mar'arom iy'adec pa nonin pa Manase kodi Efrayim.
Ndelo acel, munyo Yerobowam oyido wotho wok i Yerusalem, jatuci wac Were Ahija ma wok Silo, oromo gine kende i yo kam'othangere.
Kenyo Ahija olunyo kanzu manyen ma go oyido oruko, oyeco to wok oselin apar g'ario,
aka owaco ri Yerobowam ni, “Kwany oselin apar rin, rupiri Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco rin ni, ‘Akidho kwanyo woko ker kwoŋ Solomon, aka abino miyin nonin apar.
Solomon bino kuro nono acel ro ŋeca paran Daudi aka ro Yerusalem, tindi madwoŋ m'atieko yero bedo aparan won wok i lowo ma Isiraili gipi.

Akidho timo gime rupiri Solomon okweran aka olamo werin pa jopath, Asitate, were madhako ma Sidon, Kemos, were ma Mowab, kodi Molek were ma Amon. Solomon k'owinjan, otimo komo, aka k'okuro cik paran kodi Or paran paka bamere Daudi otimo.
T'akibino kwanyo ker je kwoŋ Solomon, aka abino kuro go i dwoŋ kafodi go kwo. Gime abino timo ro ŋeca paran Daudi, ma yero aka m'oluwo cik paran kodi Or paran.
Abino kwanyo woko ker kwoŋ wod pa Solomon aka abino miyin nonin apar,
t'abino weyo wod pa Solomon kuro nono acel, ŋey noknok abedi gi nyakwar Daudi ma dhumo i Yerusalem, tindi madwoŋ m'ayero wolaman'iye.
Yerobowam, abino lokin kere ma Isiraili, aka ibino dhumo adec je m'inomiti.

K'inowinji gim'anomiyin or timo je, wotho i yo paran, t'itimo gim'otire ruwaŋan kodi kuro cik paran gi Or paran, paka Daudi ŋeca paran otimo, Abino bedo kodin noknok. Abino lokin kere ma Isiraili aka abino neno nike nyikwayin jodhumo rumacen ma in, paka atimo ri Daudi.
Ro reco pa Solomon Abino miyo nyikway Daudi gir'acula, to ki ma hongo je.’ ”
Aka Solomon otemo neko Yerobowam, to Yerobowam okwale to kidho bongi Sisak kere ma Misir aka obedo kenyo cuka Solomon otho.
Tim pa Solomon je gi gima go otimo je, kodi rieko pere je ondiki i kitawo ma tim pa Solomon.
Solomon odhumo Isiraili gipi gi Yerusalem ma oro piero aŋwen.
Otho aka oyiki go i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi, aka wode Rehobowam olunjo go paka kere.
Rehobowam okadho i Sekem, kole Joisiraili je oyido jobino kenyo ketho go kere.
Munyo Yerobowam wod Nebat owinjo (oyido go fodi nitie i Misir, kama go oyido oring'iye kwoŋ kere Solomon) odwoko wok i Misir.
Ji ma nonin ma yumalo jooro wolwoŋi Yerobowam, aka jokidho gi go bongi Rehobowam to jowaco rigo ni,
“Benin Solomon ojengo bieto mapek kwoŋ wan. K'inoloki bieto me masew t'iloko kwo mayot riwan, walatic rin.”
Rehobowam odwoko jo ni, “Dwoki win ka ndelo adek orumo, alamiyo win radwok.” Ameno to jokadho.
Kenyo Kere Rehobowam openjo jodongo m'oyido jotiyo paka jomic rieko pa Solomon ni, “Wimiyan rieko aŋo ma dwoko ji me?”
Aka jodwoko go ni, “K'ibedo gi wor ri jome t'isangala jo, luw gi jo wac maber, aka jolatic rin noknok gi wor.”
To Rehobowam kwero rieko pa jodongo ma jomiyo go, to kadho bongi yac ma jobedo muworo pere, aka m'oyido onyo jobedo jomic rieko pere.
Openjo jo ni, “Wimiyan rieko timo aŋo? Aŋo m'adwoki ji ma jokwayan loko bieto pajo masew?”
Jodwoko go ni, “Me a gim'iripo waco rijo ni, ‘Cingan manyako dinywol loyo pier baba!
Baba oketho bieto mapek kwoŋ win, to alaloko mapek loyo. Go ocwado win g'adasa to alacwado win gi luth kayina!’”
Ameno Yerobowam gi ji je jobino bongi Rehobowam i ndelo mar'adek, paka kere Rehobowam oyido owaco rijo.
Kere oweyo rieko ma jodongo jomiyo go aka oluwo gi jo gi gero
paka yac jomiyo go rieko. Go owaco ni, “Baba oketho bieto mapek kwoŋ win, to alaloko jo mapek loyo. Baba ocwado win g'adasa, to alacwado win gi luth kayina!”
Ameno kere k'owinjo ji; kole oyido obedo mito pa Rwoth kelo gima go oyido owaco wotundi i kare ri Yerobowam wod pa Nebat luwo bongi jatuci wac Were Ahija ma wok Silo. Meno am'omiyo kere k'owinjo ji.
Ameno ji jodok i wema pajo,
aka joweyo Rehobowam paka kere pa ji m'oyido jobedo iy'adec ma Yuda kende.
Kenyo kere Rehobowam ooro Adoram, m'oyido telo jotic gi mbaka, kadho bongi Joisiraili, to jogoyo go gi telin to tho. Aka kere Rehobowam oidho cawila pere to ringo i Yerusalem.
Wok i hongo no kiri konon me, ker ma yumalo ma Isiraili jobedo kanyo jolwenyo gi ker pa Daudi.
Munyo Joisiraili jowinjo nike Yerobowam odwoko wok i Misir, jolwoŋo go i romo pa ji aka joketho go kere ma Isiraili. Nyaka jonono pa Yuda ama jodoŋ munyo joworo nyikway Daudi.
Munyo Rehobowam otundo i Yerusalem, olwoŋo kanyacel jolweny ma jober loyo wok i nono pa Yuda gi Benyamin ma romo 180,000. Go oyido mito lweny ŋey wodwoki dhum pere kwoŋ nonin ma yumalo ma Isiraili.
To Rwoth waco ri Semaya jatuci wac Were ni,
“Waci ri Rehobowam, wod pa Solomon, gi jonono pa Yuda kodi jonono pa Benyamin, kodi ji je ni,
‘Wikiri wimonji wutmin win won, Isiraili. Dok win peco wijoje. Gim'otimere obedo mito paran.’ ” Joje jowinjo cik pa Rwoth aka jok'olwenyo gi Yerobowam.
Kere Yerobowam ma Isiraili ogeto tindi Sekem i piny matendere tendere ma Efrayim aka obedo kenyo ma hongo moro. Kenyo oeye to kidho geto tindi Penuel.
Aka Yerobowam owaco i cunye ni, “Nger ma gigipiny nitie i iye pama me, ka ji jokidhi Yerusalem miyo Rwoth cowirok i Ot pa Were kenyo, jobino cako woro kere Rehobowam ma Yuda to jonekan.”
Munyo otieko paro kwoŋe, otimo roci ario gi zahabu aka owaco ri ji pere ni, “Noknok oyido wikidho i Yerusalem kamabor lamo. Joisiraili, werin mewin ee ka ma jowodho win wok i Misir.”
Oketho roci m'otimi gi zahabu acel i Bethel kodi acel i Dan.
Aka gime olokere reco, kole ji oyido jokidho lamo i Bethel kodi i Dan.
Yerobowam bende ogeto kalamo i wi riete, aka oyero jocway ri Were i wi migam wok i nonin ma jok'obedo Jolevi.

Yerobowam bende oketho kalima manyadini k'apar g'abic i dwe mar'aboro paka kalima m'oyido nitie i Yuda. I wi migam ma Bethel omiyo cowirok ri roci m'otimi gi zahabu, aka oketho kenyo jocway ri Were i wi migam tiyo i kalamo ma go oyido ogeto.
Aka k'apar g'abic i dwe mar'aboro, ndelo ma go won oketho, okidho i Bethel to miyo cowirok i wi migam ma timo kalima ma go oyido oketho ri ji.
Panen, jacwo pa Were obino wok i Yuda luwo i cik pa Rwoth to kidho i Bethel. Yerobowam oyido ocungo cegin gi migam miyo cowirok.

Luwo kwoŋ cik pa Rwoth jatuci wac Were okwedo migam ka waco ama: “A migam, migam, me a gima Rwoth waco; nyathi ma nyinge ibino lwoŋo ni Yosia ibino nywolo i peco pa Daudi. Go bino thumo kwoŋin jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiyo i migam manyakafir ma jomiyo cowirok i wiyin, aka go bino waŋo cokin ji i wiyin.
Migam me bino tur piny, aka buru ma wiye ibino ywoyo. Kenyo ibino ŋeyo nike Rwoth oluwo luwo i an.”
Munyo kere Yerobowam owinjo gime, ocimo go aka owodho or ni, “Maki win jalo!” Aka nyaŋinya omako cingi Yerobowam dicel ŋey k'onyalo dolok.
Migam bende otur piny, aka buru oywore piny paka jatuci wac Were oyido owaco i nyingi Rwoth.
Kere Yerobowam owaco ri jatuci wac Were ni, “Mondo kway ran Rwoth, Were perin, aka ikway go wobothi cingan!”
Jatuci wac Were okwayo aka cingi kere obothi.
Kenyo kere owaco ri jatuci wac Were ni, “Biye kodan peco aka inwaŋ gir'acama. Abino miyin kemba ro gim'itimo.”
Jatuci wac Were odwoko kere ni, “Makada nende inomiyan adec ma lim perin, akibino kadho kodin aka akibino cemo kanyacel kodin.
Kole ameno apaka Rwoth omiyan or munyo waco ni, ‘Ikir'icam mugat kosa imadhi pi, kosa idok peco luwo i royo m'ibino gine.’ ”
Ameno go k'oluwo i yo ma go obino gine, aka oluwo i yo man.
Onyo oyido nitie jatuci wac Were m'oti i Bethel. Aka wote jobino to jowaco rigo gimoro je ma jatuci wac Were ma wok Yuda otimo i Bethel ndelo no kodi gim'owaco ri kere Yerobowam.
Aka bajo openjo ni, “Go oluwo i yo mene?” Aka wote jonyutho go yo
aka owaco rijo tweyo rigo punda pere. Jotimo ameno, aka ogweyo
to luwo jatuci wac Were ma wok Yuda aka onwaŋo go obedo i tiendi olwa. Go openjo ni, “Iŋat'ibedo jatuci Were m'owok Yuda?”
Jalo odwoko ni, “Abedo go.”
Kenyo owaco rigo ni, “Biye kodan peco aka icami mugat.”
To jatuci wac Were ma wok Yuda dwoko ni, “Akinyali dok peco kodin, kosa yeyin ijolan, kosa camo mugat, kosa madho gimoro je kodin ka,
rupiri Rwoth omiyan or nike akir'acem kosa amadhi gimoro, aka akir'adoki peco luwo i yo ma bino gine.”

Kenyo jatuci wac Were m'oti ma wok i Bethel owaco rigo ni, “An bende, abedo jatuci wac Were paka in, aka luwo i cik pa Rwoth malaika owaco ran nike aterin peco kodan aka ajolin.” To jatuci wac Were m'oti oyido twodo.
Ameno jatuci wac Were ma wok Yuda odok peco gi jatuci wac Were m'oti aka ocemo kanyacel gi go.
Aka munyo jobedo i meza, wac pa Rwoth obino ri jatuci wac Were m'oti,
aka oywaki ri jatuci wac Were ma wok i Yuda ni, “Rwoth waco nike ikiwinjo go aka ikitimo gima go omiyin cik timo.
Kwanyo woko, igiki t'icemo i kabedo m'amiyin cik nike ikir'icem'iye. Ro gime ibino nekin, aka delkwoŋin k'oyik i kaliel ma thuwin.”
Rumacen munyo jotieko cemo, jatuci wac Were m'oti otweyo punda ri jatuci wac Were ma wok i Yuda,
aka go okadho. I yo, simbwor oromo gine to neko go. Delkwoŋe oriere i yo, aka punda gi simbwor jocungo i thenge.
Cwo moro oyido joluwo aka joneno del i yo, gi simbwor ocungo cegin. Jomedere i Bethel aka jowaco gima joneno.
Aka munyo jatuci wac Were m'oti owinjo, owaco ni, “Meno jatuci wac Were ma k'owinjo cik pa Rwoth! Aka Rwoth odhiro simbwor monjo gi neko go, paka Rwoth owaco nike latimo.”
Kenyo owaco ri wote ni, “Tweyi ran win punda paran.” Aka jotimo ameno,
aka go okidho to nwaŋo delkwoŋ jatuci wac Were oriere i yo, gi punda kodi simbwor fodi jocungo kenyo. Simbwor oyido k'ocamo del kosa omonjo punda.
Jatuci wac Were m'oti odimo del, oketho i wi punda, aka odwoko gine i Bethel ywako gi yiko.
Aka oyiko i kaliel ma peco pere won, aka go gi wote joywako, ka jowaco ni, “A omin an, omin an!”
Rumacen ma yikirok, jatuci wac Were owaco ri wote ni, “K'atho, yikan win i kaliel me aka wipiel delkwoŋan cegin g'apere.
Wac ma go owaco luwo i cik pa Rwoth kwoŋ migam ma Bethel gi kalamo je i tindin ma Samaria adieri bino tundo i kare.”
Rumacen ma gime Yerobowam k'owire kwoŋ reco pere, to omedere yero jocway ri Were i wi migam wok kwoŋ pecin je tiyo i migam ma go oyido ogeto. Oruko kisi ŋat'oyido mito bedo jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Reco me i thenge pere okelo kisika gi reyo ker pere.
I hongo no Abija wod pa Yerobowam otwo swa.
Aka Yerobowam owaco ri cege ni, “Ay, aka irukere i nger matek niaŋ kwoŋin, aka ikadhi i Silo, kama jatuci wac Were Ahija bed'iye, go m'owaco nike abino bedo kere ma Isiraili.
Ter rigo mugat muma apar, mugat moro m'owir'iye mo, kodi agwata ma mo kic. Go bino waco rin gima latimo nyathi.”
Ameno cipa Yerobowam otimo ameno. Oay aka okidho i Silo, peco pa Ahija. Onyo waŋ Ahija oyido kinen ro tiyo.
Aka Rwoth oyido owaco ri Ahija nike cipa Yerobowam oyido bino penjo go kwoŋ wode m'oyido two. Aka Rwoth owaco ri Ahija gima wowaci.
Munyo cipa Yerobowam otundo, orendere pa ŋatiman.
To munyo Ahija owinjo mayindo tiende munyo go donjo, owaco ni, “Donji, cipa Yerobowam, raŋo irendere pa ŋatiman? Kole anitie rin gi mikwenda marac.
Kadhi iwaci ri Yerobowam nike me a gima Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco rigo ni, ‘Ayerin kwoŋ Joisiraili to alokin jadhum pa ji paran Isiraili.
Amayo ot pa Daudi ker t'amiyin. Aka kucel ikibedo paka ŋeca paran Daudi m'okuro or paran je, oluwan gi cunye je, munyo timo gim'otire kende i waŋan.
Itimo reco ma kalo apa jono je ma jopen dhumo rin. Ikweran, aka i ikwinyo nge paran gi timo werin man, kodi cal ma cumin ma lamo.
Riameno panen, abino kelo teko i ker perin aka abino neko nyikwayin je ma cwo, mathindho gi m'oti. Abino reyo woko peco perin pa woyo.
Ŋatimoro je ma peco perin m'otho i tindi madwoŋ gwokere jobino camo delkwoŋe, aka ma jotho kam'othangere acut jobino camo delkwoŋ jo. An, Rwoth, atieko waco.’ ”
Aka Ahija omedere waco ri cipa Yerobowam ni, “Onyo ay idok peco. Tekin inodonji i tindi madwoŋ ni, wodin bino tho.
Ji ma Isiraili je jobino ywak to joyiko go. Go kende kwoŋ ji ma peco pa Yerobowam am'ibino yiko maber kwoŋbedo i go kende ama Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili onwaŋo iye gima sangala go.
Aka kiri Rwoth bino ketho kere dhumo Isiraili, ma bino ketho ker pa Yerobowam i gike.

Rwoth bino miyo Joisiraili gir'acula, ma jobino yengere pa midole ma yengere i pi. Rwoth bino fudho Joisiraili wok i lowo maber me m'omiyo kwarere pajo, aka bino kedho jo kalo jwom Yufrete, rupiri jokwinyo nge pere gi timo cal ma were madhako Asera.
Rwoth bino jwango Joisiraili rupiri Yerobowam otimo reco, to miyo Joisiraili bende timo reco.”
Kenyo cipa Yerobowam oay, aka odok i Tiriza. Tekin donjo i peco pere ama, to nyathi tho.
Aka Joisiraili je joywak to joyiko nyathi, paka Rwoth oyido owaco luwo i ŋeca pere jatuci wac Were Ahija.
Kisi gima kere Yerobowam otimo, lweny m'olwenyo kodi nger m'odhumo, je ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Isiraili.
Yerobowam odhumo paka kere ma oro piero ario g'ario. Otho aka oyiki go, to wode m'ilwoŋo ni Nadab lunjo go paka kere.

Onyo Rehobowam, wod Solomon oyido jaoro piero aŋwen g'acel munyo ocako dhum paka kere i Yuda, aka odhumo ma oro apar g'abirio i Yerusalem, tindi madwoŋ ma Rwoth oyero kwoŋ adec je i Isiraili paka kabedo ma lamo go. Yok Rehobowam oyido Nama ma wok i piny Amon.
Ji ma Yuda jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka jotimo madit to jokwinyo nge pa Rwoth kwoŋ jo, loyo kiri reco ma kwarere pajo jotimo.
Kole jo bende jogero kalamo werin ma k'otire, jogeto sirin ma tele, kodi cal ma were madhako Asera ma lamo i wi tenderin kodi i tiendi yen ma jotimo tipo.
Marac loyo, oyido nitie cwo gi mon ma jobedo malayin i kalamo werin no. Joyuda jotimo giwickwot je ma ji ma Rwoth oyido oriemo wok i lowo no jotimo i ndir ma Joisiraili oyido jodonjo iye.
aka okwanyo lim je ma Ot pa Were gi ma cel pa kere pa kere, kiri gi kwote ma Solomon oyido otimo gi zahabu.
Kere Rehobowam otimo kwote man gi ywel culo waŋ m'oyido otim gi zahabu aka omiyo jotel pa jokur ma waŋkac ma peco pere kuro.
Aka oyido kisi ka kere odonjo i Ot pa Rwoth, jokur oyido jotiŋo kwote, aka jodwoko i kisika m'ikuro iye.
Giman je ma Rehobowam otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Yuda.
I hongo me je oyido nitie lweny makirum i dier Rehobowam kodi Yerobowam.
Rehobowam otho aka oyiki go kam'oyik'iye bacere pere i tindi pa Daudi madwoŋ, aka wode m'ilwoŋo ni Abija olunjo go paka kere.
I oro mar'apar g'aboro ma dhum pa Yerobowam, Abija obedo kere ma Yuda,
aka odhumo ma oro adek. Yokimere oyido ilwoŋo ni Maka nyar Absalom.
Abija bende otimo reco acel paka bamere to ngoye g'adieri moro je ri Rwoth Were pere, paka cuny kwari mere Daudi oyido nitie.
To makad'ameno ro Daudi, Rwoth Were pere omiyo Abija wode lunjo go dhumo Yerusalem kodi geto Yerusalem.
Rwoth otimo gime kwoŋbedo Daudi otimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka oluwo or pere je, kwanyo woko gima mako kwoŋ cipa Uriya Jahiti kende.
Lweny m'oyido ocako i dier Rehobowam kodi Yerobowam omedere i hongo pa Abija je.
Tim pa Abija man je ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Yuda.
Abija otho aka oyiki go i tindi pa Daudi madwoŋ, to wode m'ilwoŋo ni Asa lunjo go paka kere.
I oro ma piero ario ma dhum pa Yerobowam kere ma Isiraili, Asa obedo kere i Yuda,
aka odhumo ma oro piero aŋwen g'acel i Yerusalem. Adhamere oyido obedo Maka nyar Absalom.
Asa otimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth paka kwari mere Daudi oyido otimo.
Asa oriemo woko malayin ma cwo gi mon je wok i Yerusalem aka okwanyo woko cal je m'oyido kerin ma jopen dhumo rigo jotimo.
Asa okwanyo woko adhamere bedo yok kere, kwoŋbedo adhamere oyido otimo cal ma mienirok ri were madhako Asera. Asa otoŋo piny cal no to waŋo i milelo Kidiron.
To makada nende Asa k'onyeko woko kalamo werin ma k'otire je, odoŋ iy'adieri ri Rwoth i kwo pere je.
Asa oketho gigipiny je ma bamere oyido omiyo Were, kodi zahabu gi feza ma go won bende oyido omiyo Were i Ot pa Were.
Lweny makirum oyido nitie i dier kere Asa ma Yuda kodi kere Basa ma Isiraili i hongo ma dhum pajo je.
Basa omonjo Yuda to cako geto tindi Rama ŋey wocegi ji donjo kodi wok i Yuda.

Kenyo kere Asa okwanyo feza gi zahabu m'oyido odoŋ i Ot pa Were kodi i cel pa kere, aka ooro gine jodhum pere moro i Damasiko, bongi kere Benhadad ma Siria, wod pa Tabirimon aka nyakwar Hezion gi mikwenda me:
“Weyi wariwere paka bacere mawan oyido joriwere. Neni, adhiro rin feza kodi zahabu me paka mic rin. Onyo tur riwirok perin gi Basa kere ma Isiraili, ŋey wowodhi jolweny pere wok i piny paran.”
Kere Benhadad oyeyo mikwenda pa Asa aka ooro jomituka jolweny pere monjo tindin madongo ma Isiraili. Jomako Ijon, Dan, Abel Beth Maka, adec macegin gi jwom Galili kodi adec ma Nafital.
Munyo kere Basa owinjo gim'otimere, oweyo geto Rama aka okadho Tiriza.

Kenyo kere Asa owodho cik i Yuda gipi ma mito kisi nyatoro, m'ongoye ŋata wokeŋ, tiŋo telin kodi mbawin ma Basa oyido oro ma geto Rama. Aka Asa ooro jo ma geto Mizipa kodi Geba, tindi madwoŋ iy'adec pa Benyamin.
Giman je ma kere Asa otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Yuda. To i oro pere ma tiyo ŋolo omako go ro two tiendi jo.
Asa otho aka oyiki go gi bacere pere i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi, aka wode Yehosafat olunjo go.
I oro mar'ario ma dhum pa kere Asa ma Yuda, Nadab wod pa kere Yerobowam obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo ma oro ario.
Nadab otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth paka bamere, to miyo Joisiraili timo reco.
Basa wod pa Abija, janono pa Isakar, ociko Nadab to neko go munyo Nadab kodi jolweny pere oyido jomako tindi madwoŋ Gibethon i Filistia.
Gime otimere i oro mar'adek ma dhum pa Asa kere ma Yuda. Ameno Basa olunjo Nadab paka kere ma Isiraili.
Tekin Basa bedo kere, ocako neko ji ma peco pa Yerobowam je. Luwo kwoŋ mikwenda pa Rwoth ma ŋeca pere Ahija jatuci wac Were ma wok i Silo owaco, ji ma peco pa Yerobowam je oneko m'ongoye ŋat'obothi.
Gime otimere kwoŋbedo Yerobowam okwinyo nge pa Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, gi reco ma go otimo kodi m'omiyo Joisiraili timo reco.
Giman je ma kere Nadab otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Isiraili.
Lweny makirum obedo i dier kere Asa ma Yuda kodi kere Basa ma Isiraili i hongo ma dhum pa joje.
I oro mar'adek ma dhum pa kere Asa ma Yuda, Basa obedo kere ma Isiraili gipi gi Tirisa, aka odhumo ma oro piero ario g'aŋwen.
Basa otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth to miyo Joisiraili timo reco paka Yerobowam m'open dhumo rigo.
Rwoth oluwo gi jatuci wac Were Yehu wod pa Hanan aka omiyo go mikwenda me ri Basa:
“Oyido isisiri, t'akethin kere pa ji paran Isiraili, t'onyo pama itieko timo reco paka Yerobowam aka imiyo ji paran timo reco. Reco pajo okwinyo nge paran,
aka ameno abino reyin gi peco perin je, paka atimo ri Yerobowam.
Nyatoro moro je ma peco perin m'otho i tindi madwoŋ gwokere jobino camo delkwoŋe, aka ma jotho kam'othangere acut jobino camo delkwoŋe.”
Giman je ma Basa otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Isiraili.
Basa otho aka oyiki go i Tirisa, aka wode m'ilwoŋo ni Ela olunjo go paka kere.

Mikwenda pa Rwoth ma Rwoth omiyo jatuci wac Were Yehu kwoŋ Basa gi peco bedo rupiri Basa otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth. Basa okwinyo nge pa Rwoth ki kwoŋbedo ni oyido otimo reco paka kere Yerobowam bende otimo, to bende kwoŋbedo oneko ji ma peco pa Yerobowam je.
I oro ma piero ario g'aucel ma dhum pa kere Asa ma Yuda, Ela wod pa Basa obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo ma oro ario.
Zimiri, acel kwoŋ jodhum pa Ela m'oyido telo adec ma cawilin ocamo rigo sereko. Ndelo acel, munyo Ela oyido medho i peco pa Arisa, m'oyido jatel ma cel pa kere i Tirisa,
Zimiri odonjo i ot, oneko Ela, to lunjo go paka kere. Gime otimere i oro ma piero ario g'abirio ma dhum pa kere Asa ma Yuda.
Tekin Zimiri bedo kere, oneko ji ma peco pa Basa je. Kisi wat ma jacwo kosa merin oneki.
Ameno Zimiri oneko ji ma peco pa Basa je paka Rwoth oyido owaco luwo i jatuci wac Were Yehu.
Basa kodi wode Ela jokwinyo nge pa Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili kwoŋbedo jolamo cal to jomiyo Joisiraili timo reco.
Giman je ma Ela otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
I oro ma piero ario g'abirio ma dhum pa Asa kere ma Yuda, Zimiri odhumo Isiraili gi Tirisa ma oro abirio. Onyo jolweny pa Isiraili oyido jomako tindi madwoŋ Gibethon i Filistia,
aka munyo jowinjo nike Zimiri oyido ocamo sereko ri kere Ela to neko, kenyo joketho jamituka jolweny pajo Omiri kere ma Isiraili.
Omiri gi jolweny pere joeye i Gibethon aka jokidho to jomako Tirisa.
Munyo Zimiri oneno nike omaki tindi madwoŋ, okidho kama tek ma cel pa kere to cwinyo mac aka otho i mac.
Gime otimere kwoŋbedo otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth. Paka Yerobowam go bende omiyo Joisiraili timo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Giman je ma Zimiri otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Kenyo Joisiraili oyido jotiakere dirio. Ji man oyido jomito Tibini wod pa Ginathi wobedi kere, aka ji man oyido jomito Omiri.
I cowe mere ji m'oyido jomito Omiri joloyo. Tibini otho, aka Omiri obedo kere.
Ameno i oro ma piero adek g'acel ma dhum pa Asa kere ma Yuda, Omiri obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo ma oro apar g'ario. I cakirok Omiri odhumo gi Tirisa ma oro aucel.
Omiri onyewo tendere ma Samaria gi feza 6,000 wok bongi jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Sema. Omiri ogeto tendere no, ogeto tindi kenyo aka ocwoko i nyingi Sema m'oyido won mere ni Samaria.
Omiri otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth loyo kerin je ma jopen dhumo rigo.
Paka Yerobowam, go okwinyo nge pa Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili gi reco m'otimo kodi miyo Joisiraili bende timo reco kodi lamo cal.
Giman je ma Omiri otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Isiraili.
Kere Omiri otho aka oyiki go i Samaria, to wode m'ilwoŋo ni Ahab lunjo go paka kere.
I oro ma piero adek g'aboro ma dhum pa Asa kere ma Yuda, Ahab wod pa Omiri obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo ma oro piero ario g'ario i Samaria.
Ahab otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth loyo kerin je ma jopen dhumo rigo.
K'oromo go timo reco paka Yerobowam, to Ahab bende omedere to nywomo Yezebel nyar kere Ethibal ma Sidon to lamo Bal.
Ahab ogeto ri Bal ot kodi migam i Samaria.
Ahab bende ogeto cal pa were madhako Asera. Otimo gigipiny madit m'okwinyo nge pa Rwoth loyo kerin je ma jopen dhumo rigo i Isiraili.

I hongo ma dhum pere Hiyel ma wok i Bethel ogeto Yeriko kende. Paka Rwoth oyido owaco luwo i Yosuwa wod pa Nun, wod pa Hiyel makayo Abiram otho munyo ogero kindi Yeriko, aka wode mathin Segub otho munyo ogeto waŋkac.
Rwoth owaco ri Elia ni,
“Eye ka ikadhi yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ aka ipondi milelo ma Kerith yuwok ceŋ ma Yordan.
Ibino madho pi ma wok milelo, aka atieko miyo agakere cik jobino kelo rin cemo kenyo.”
Ameno Elia otimo paka Rwoth omiyo go or aka okidho to bedo cegin gi milelo ma Kerith.
Elia oyido madho pi wok i milelo aka agakere oyido jokelo rigo mugat gi riŋo odikin g'othieno.
Rumacen ma hongo moro pi ocwiyo i milelo kwoŋbedo koth oyido kicwe.
Rwoth owaco ri Elia ni,
“Ay, ikadhi i tindi Zarefath, cegin gi Sidon ibedi kenyo. Atieko miyo citho ma bedo kenyo cik pidhin.”
Ameno Elia oay aka okidho i Zarefath. Munyo otundo i waŋkac ma tindi, oneno citho moro dimo yen. Elia owaco ri citho no ni, “Mondo keli ran ye pi nyaka mathin iy'agwata ŋey amadhi.”
Aka munyo citho kidho omo pi, Elia olwoŋo go to waco ni, “Mondo keli ran ye mugat moro bende.”

Citho odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere rin i nyingi Rwoth Were perin makwo nike angoye gi mugat m'otedi. Anitie nyaka g'adhoŋ cingan ma moko iy'acero, kodi donge mo iy'agwata. Adimo yen ŋey adoki atedi acami gi wodan. Meno bino bedo cemo mawan macowe, wariy kec to watho.”
Elia owaco rigo ni, “Ikir'ilwor kadhi itedi cemo mewin. To marapena kudho tedi ran mugat mathin wok kwoŋ gimathin m'initie gine no, aka rumacen itedi aperin gi wodin.
Kole me a gima Rwoth waco ni, ‘Moko k'orumi i acero, aka mo k'orumi iy'agwata cuka ndelo ma An, Rwoth, anodhiri koth i piny.’ ”
Citho okidho to timo paka Elia owaco aka joje jobedo gi cemo ma romo ma ndelo kweth.
Paka Rwoth ociko luwo i Elia, moko k'orumo i acero aka mo k'orumo iy'agwata.
Rumacen ma hongo moro wod pa citho two matek omako to medere aka otho.
Citho openjo Elia ni, “Raŋo itimo ran gime? Ibino ka poyo Were reco paran ŋey imiy wodan wotho?”
Elia owaco ni, “Miyan jayac ka.” Elia otiŋo jayac to tero malo i kisika kama go oyido bed'iye aka orieyo i wi kitanda.
Kenyo okwayo malo ni, “Awi Rwoth Were paran, raŋo itimo gimarac ama ri citho me. Citho me obedo ran gi wor to kuran, onyo ineko wode!”
Kenyo Elia oriere kwoŋ jayac didek to kwayo ni, “A Rwoth Were paran, dwoki kwo pa nyathi me kendo!”
Rwoth odwoko kwayo pa Elia, nyathi ocako ywe to limo kwo kendo.
Elia odwoko jayac piny bongi min aka owaco ri citho ni, “Neni, wodin kwo!”
Citho owaco ri Elia ni, “Onyo aŋeyo nike ibedo dhano pa Were, aka nike Rwoth adieri luwo, i in.”
Rumacen ma hongo moro, i oro mar'adek ma kec, Rwoth owaco ri Elia ni, “kadhi inyuthere ruwaŋ Ahab, aka abino dhiro koth.”
Ameno Elia okadho nyuthirok ruwaŋ Ahab. Kec oyido kec swa i Samaria.
Ameno Ahab olwoŋo Obadia m'oyido jatel ma cel pa kere. (Onyo Obadia oyido lworo Rwoth swa,
aka ndir ma Yezebel oyido neko jotuci wac Were, Obadia otero jotuci wac Were miya acel aka okano jo i ŋungu i kitipin ario ma piero abic to miyo jo cemo kodi pi.)
Ahab owaco ri Obadia ni, “Weyi wakadhi wanen waŋ pi kodi milelo je ma lowo me, poyo wanyalo nwaŋo lum to wabotho kwo pa kayina kodi punde, aka wakiri wakeŋ ogwaŋe mawan.”
Ameno jopoko thenge ma lowo ma kisi nyatoro woluwi, aka jonywako yo m'opokere.
Aka munyo Obadia oyido wotho, oromo gi Elia. Obadia oniaŋ kwoŋ Elia aka okule piny to penjo ni, “Adieri meno in jadwoŋ!”
Elia odwoko ni, “Ey me an. Kadhi iwaci ri jadwoŋ perin nike anitie ka.”
Obadia odwoko ni, “Raco aŋo m'atimo ma imito kethan i teko ma tho?
Akwoŋere rin i nyingi Rwoth, Were perin makwo nike Ahab otieko dwarin i piny je kosa ker. Kisi ka jadhum ma piny moro owaco nike ingoye i piny pere, Ahab oyido miyo go kwoŋirok nike jok'onwaŋin.
Aka iwaco nike akidhi awaci rigo nike initie ka!
Anyalo waco ri Ahab nike initie ka, to tekin akadho cuny pa Rwoth to tiŋin terin i kabedo ma k'oŋeyere to Ahab nekan. Poyi nike wok i soye paran tundo gunyo ni, alworo Rwoth.
Fodi ikiwinjo ye nike ndir munyo Yezebel oyido neko jotuci wac Were pa Rwoth akano miya acel kwoŋ jo i ŋungu i kitipin ario ma piero abic, t'amiyo jo cemo kodi pi?
Ameno anowaci nedi ri Ahab nike initie ka? Go bino nekan.”
Elia odwoko ni, “Acikin i nyingi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny makwo m'atiyo rigo nike abino nyuthere ruwaŋ kere konon me.”
Ameno Obadia okidho bongi Ahab aka owaco rigo. Ahab okidho romo gi Elia.
Munyo Ahab oneno Elia, owaco ri Elia ni, “Meno in jakeli teko i Isiraili!”
Elia odwoko ni, “Aŋat'akikelo teko i Isiraili, to in kodi peco pa benin. Wikwero luwo or pa Rwoth aka wilamo cal pa Bal.
Onyo miy or wocoki Joisiraili je joworom kodan i Got Kamel, jotuci wac were pa Bal 450 kodi jotuci wac were 400 pa were madhako Asera ma Yezebel thielo jo.”
Ameno Ahab ocoko Joisiraili je kodi jotuci wac were pa Bal i Got Kamel.
Elia ocore cegin gi ji je aka openjo jo ni, “Wilamedere bedo gi paro ario kiri keraŋo? K'inen Rwoth obedo Were, lam win go, to ka Bal obedo Were lam win go?” To jok'odwoko wac.
Kenyo Elia owaco ni, “An kendan a jatuci wac Were pa Rwoth m'odoŋ, to nitie jotuci wac were pa Bal 450.
Keli win thwondhe ario. Jotuci wac were pa Bal jowoteri acel jowothum, jowoyaŋ mathindho to joketho i wi yen. To jokiri jowocwiny mac. An bende alatimo gimoro acel gi thwon man mere.
Weyi jotuci wac were pa Bal jowokway were pajo, aka abino kwayo Rwoth, aka Were m'odwok ka dhiro mac, meno a Were.”
Ji je jodwoko ni, “Iluwo maber.”
Kenyo Elia owaco ri jotuci wac were pa Bal ni, “Paka win withoth, yer win thwon acel aka wipen thumo.
Jotuci wac were pa Bal jokwanyo thwon m'okel rijo, jothumo, to jokwayo Bal wok odikin tundo sawa aucel. Jokoko ni, “Dwoki wan Bal!” Jomielo thoko migam m'oyido jogeto, to ngoye ŋat'odwoki jo.
Tundo sawa aucel Elia ocako timo gi nyero gi jo ka waco ama: “Kway win malo, go were! Kono okadho woth, kosa go nindo aka wiripo cewo go.”
Ameno jokwayo malo to jothumere g'apalin kodi abor manyakwer pajo cuka remo ocwer.
Jomedere kiri othieno, to ngoye ŋat'odwoki jo, mayindo k'owinjere.
Kenyo Elia owaco ri ji je ni, “Core win cegin bongan.” Ji je jocore cegin bonge. Elia oyiko migam pa Rwoth m'oyido otur piny,
aka okwanyo telin apar g'ario ma jocungo ri nonin pa wot Yakobo, jacwo ma Rwoth omiyo nyinge ni Isiraili.
Gi telin me Elia ogeto migam ma lamo Rwoth. Elia okunyo fereji manyalo madho pi lita apar g'aŋwen thoko migam.
Aka ocano yen i wi migam, oyaŋo thwon mathindho, to ketho i wi yen. Kenyo go owaco ni, “Poŋi win pi i agwatin aŋwen me aka wikonji i wi yen gi mic awaŋa.”
Elia owaco kendo ni jowokonji madirio gi ma didek, aka jotimo ameno.
Pi omol thoko migam, aka opoŋ i fereji.

I hongo ma miyo cowirok m'othieno jatuci wac Were Elia ocore cegin gi migam to kwayo ni, “A Rwoth, Were pa Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo, weyi woŋey konon me nike ibedo Were pa Isiraili, nike abedo ŋeca perin, aka nike atimo gime luwo i cik perin.
Dwokan, awi Rwoth, dwokan, ŋey ji me jowoŋey nike in Rwoth, Ibedo Were, aka nike idwoko jo bongin.”
Kenyo mac pa Rwoth opodho aka owaŋo woko mic awaŋa, yen, telin, rudino, to naŋo woko pi m'oyido nitie i fereji.
Munyo ji je joneno, jogore piny aka jokoko ni, “Rwoth obedo Were, Rwoth obedo Were!”
Elia omiyo or womaki jotuci wac were pa Bal je m'ongoye ŋata wokwale. Ji jomako joje, aka Elia otero jo piny i malawa Kison to neko jo.
Kenyo Elia owaco ri Ahab ni, “Onyo inyalo kadho icemi. Awinjo mor pa koth bino.”
Kucel munyo Ahab okadho cemo, Elia oidho wi Got Kamel, okule piny, to ketho wiye i dier conge.
Elia owaco ri ŋeca pere ni, “Kadhi iŋiy yu nam.”
Ŋeca pere okidho to ŋiyo, aka odwoko to waco ni, “Ongoye gim'aneno.” Elia ooro ŋeca pere dibirio.
Ma dibirio mere ŋeca pere odwoko to waco ni, “Aneno pondeponde mathin ma kidwoŋ kada loyo cingi dhano wok i nam.”
Elia omiyo ŋeca pere cik waco ri kere Ahab nike woidhi cawila pere wokadhi mafodi koth k'oŋolo go.
I hongo macek won pondeponde macol oumo polo gi koyo m'okudho to koth madwoŋ cwe. Ahab ogweyo cawila pere to dok i Yezirel.
Meni obino kwoŋ Elia, otweyo nangin pere i piere aka oŋweco yuwiy Ahab kiri i waŋkac ma Yezirel.
Ahab owaco ri Yezebel gima Elia otimo je, kodi nger ma oneko iye jotuci wac were pa Bal.
Kenyo Yezebel ooro jamikwenda bongi Elia gi mikwenda ni, “Weyi werin jowonekan k'inen tundo sawa me dikin an bende akitimo rin gimoro acel m'itimo ri jotuci wac were pa Bal.”
Elia obedo gi lworo, aka oringo ri kwo pere. Elia okadho i Berseba i piny Yuda aka oweyo ŋeca pere kenyo.
Elia onindo piny i tiendi yath aka nindo okwalo go. Malaika obino to mulo go aka owaco rigo ni, “Cew icemi.”
Elia oŋiyo to neno yuwiye mugat kodi pi iy'agwata, aka ocemo to madho pi to doko nindo.
Malaika pa Rwoth odwoko to cewo go kendo aka owaco ni, “Ay icem, kosa woth bino bedo rin mabor.”
Elia oay to cemo to madho pi, aka olimo meni m'oromo go woth ma ndelo piero aŋwen kidho i got maleŋ Sinai.
Kenyo odonjo i ŋungu nindo wor.
Rwoth openjo go ni, “Elia itimo aŋo ka?”

Rwoth owaco ri Elia ni, “Wok woko icungi ruwaŋan wi got.” Kenyo Rwoth oluwo to dhiro koyo ma nigi derino m'obaro gote to kedho woko, to Rwoth oyido ongoye i koyo. Koyo okwe to musisi yengo piny, to Rwoth oyido ongoye i musisi.
Rumacen ma musisi mac oliel, to Rwoth oyido ongoye i mac. Aka rumacen ma mac dwondi jo m'ofoth owinjere.
Munyo Elia owinjo, oumo waŋe gi kanzu pere to wok woko cungo i dhiot ma ŋungu. Kenyo dwondi nyatoro openjo Elia ni, “Itimo aŋo ka?”
Elia odwoko ni, “Rwoth Were Majameni je, noknok atiyo rin, to Joisiraili joturo cikirok pajo kodin, joturo piny migam, to neko jotuci wac Were perin je. An kendan aŋat'adoŋ, aka jorango nekan bende.”
wiri Yehu wod pa Nimisi wobedi kere ma Isiraili, aka i wiri Elisa wod pa Safat ma wok Abelmehola wolunjin paka jatuci wac Were.
Ŋat'obothi abor pa Hazael, Yehu bino neko, aka ŋat'obothi abor pa Yehu Elisa bino neko.
Kucel abino koyo ji 7,000 makwo i Isiraili. Jono je ma fodi jok'oguro congi gin ri Bal kosa jok'ocwiyo lembi cal pa Bal.”
Ameno Elia owok kenyo aka onwaŋo Elisa wod pa Safat furo gi megikwe i kitipin apar g'ario yuwiye, aka go oyido furo gi ma cen. Elia olunyo kanzu pere to bolo kwoŋ Elisa.
Elisa oweyo megikwe pere to luwo Elia gi ŋwec aka owaco rigo ni, “Weyi kudho asewila baba kodi mama aka ŋey aluwin.”
Elia odwoko ni, “Gik kendo manago aŋo m'atimo rin?”
Kenyo Elisa okadho to thumo megikwe pere, otedo riŋo gi yen majogi, aka opoko ji to jocamo. Kenyo Elisa oay to luwo Elia.
Kere Benhadad ma Siria ocoko jolweny pere je kanyacel, kerin piero adek g'aŋwen m'oyido jothielo go, kodi kayina kodi cawilin to monjo Samaria.
Benhadad ooro jomikwenda i tindi madwoŋ waco ri Ahab ma Isiraili ni, “Kere Benhadad omiyo or nike
imiy go feza perin, zahabu perin, mon perin, kodi nyithindho perin ma jotek.”
Kere Ahab odwoko ni, “Waci win ri jadwoŋ paran kere Benhadad nike nyalo teran gi kisi gim'anitie gine je.”
Jomikwenda jodwoko bongi Ahab gi cik man wok bongi Benhadad ni, “Adhiro rin mikwenda nike imiyan feza perin, zahabu perin, mon perin, kodi nyithindho perin.
To onyo abino oro ŋecin paran dwaro i ot perin kodi i ot pa jodhum perin aka jowokwany kisi gima joneni nike nitie gi cwe je. Jolabino koro dikin kapa sawa me.”

Kenyo kere Ahab olwoŋo jotel je ma piny Isiraili aka owaco rijo ni, “Neni win jal me mito kisika wan. Kole odhiro ran mikwenda nike amiy go mon paran, zahabu paran, feza paran, kodi zahabu paran t'ayeyo.”
Jotel kodi ji je jodwoko ni, “Ikir'iwinji gima go waco, aka ikir'iyey.”
Ameno Ahab odwoko jomikwenda pa Benhadad ni, “Waci win ri jadwoŋ paran kere nike ayeyo mikwenda marapena, to akinyalo yeyo mar'ario mere.”
Jomikwenda jokadho aka jodwoko gi mikwenda man
wok bongi Benhadad ni, “Weyi werin jowonekan k'inen akikelo cwo ma romo reyo tindi madwoŋ perin me to jotiŋo rudino mere i cingi jo.”
Kere Ahab odwoko ni, “Waci win ri kere Benhadad nike jalweny matek kibedi gi kwoto kafodi k'olwenyo, to rumacen ma lweny.”
Benhadad olimo mikwenda me munyo go, kerin ma jothielo go, kodi jodhum man oyido jomedho i wema pajo. Kenyo Benhadad omiyo cwo pere cik jowomonji tindi madwoŋ, aka jomako kabedo pajo.
Aka panen, jatuci wac Were moro obino bongi kere Ahab to waco rigo ni, “Rwoth waco ni, ‘Ikir'ibwoki ro jolweny madit. Abino miyin loyo kwoŋ jo konon me aka ibino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.’ ”
Ahab openjo ni, “Ŋa ma latelo monjo?”
Jatuci wac Were odwoko ni, “Jolweny mathindho ma jogavana mar'adec jotelo ama jowotel monjo.”
Ahab openjo ni, “Ŋa ma lacako lweny?”
Jatuci wac Were odwoko ni, “In.”
Ameno Ahab olwoŋo jolweny mathindho ma jogavana mar'adec oyido jotelo, joje 232. Aka Ahab olwoŋo jolweny pa Isiraili bende, joje cwo 7,000.
Jocako monjo sawa aucel, munyo Benhadad gi kerin piero adek g'ario m'oyido jothielo go jomer i wemin pajo.
Jolweny mathindho ama jotelo. Jombega ma Benhadad oyido ooro woko jowaco rigo nike kitipa pa jolweny jowok i Samaria.
Ahab omiyo or ni, “Maki win jo makwo, makada nende bedi nike jobino lweny, kosa kwayo siem.”
Jolweny mathindho jotelo monjo, to jolweny pa Joisiraili joluwo.
Kisi nyatoro oneko jacwo m'olwenyo gine. Josiria joringo aka Joisiraili joriemo jo. To Benhadad okwale i kayina gi cwo pere ma jogweyo kayina.
Kere Ahab okidho to mako kayina kodi cawilin to ketho kwoŋ Josiria kikengila madwoŋ.
Kenyo jatuci wac Were okidho bongi kere Ahab to waco rigo ni, “Dok iyikere, aka itimi can m'igwokere swa, kwoŋbedo kere ma Siria bino monjin kendo i ndir ma koth.”
