Jodhum pa kere Benhadad jowaco rigo ni, “Werin pa Joisiraili jobedo werin ma got, aka am'omiyo jokengila wan. To wabino kikengila jo ka walwenyo gi jo kam'othangere.
Onyo kwany woko kerin piero adek g'ario i kabedo pajo aka ikethi jomituka i kabedo pajo.
Lwoŋ jolweny madit paka jolweny ma jojwagin, gi welo acel ma kayina kodi cawilin. Adieri walabedo matek loyo Joisiraili.”
Kere Benhadad oyeyo rieko pajo to timo ameno.
I ndir ma koth Benhadad olwoŋo cwo pere to ŋanjo gi jo kidho i tindi madwoŋ Afek monjo Joisiraili.

Olwoŋi Joisiraili t'imiyo jo gilweny, aka joŋanjo to joketho kambi i kitipin ario tirtir gi Josiria. K'oyido ipima jo gi Josiria m'oyido joywore kam'othangere, Joisiraili oyido jocale dwol diegi ario mathindho.

Jatuci wac Were okidho bongi kere Ahab to waco rigo ni, “Rwoth waco ni, ‘Kwoŋbedo Josiria jowaco nike abedo were matendere, to ki ma kam'othangere, abino miyin loyo kwoŋ jolweny pajo madit, aka in kodi ji perin wibino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.’ ”
Joisiraili kodi Josiria jobedo i kambi pajo tirtir ma ndelo abirio. I ndelo mar'abirio jocako lweny, aka Joisiraili joneko Josiria gana miya.
Josiria ma joboth joringo i tindi madwoŋ Afek, kama cel ma tindi madwoŋ opodho kwoŋ to neko 27,000.
Benhadad bende okwale to donjo i tindi madwoŋ aka opondo i kisika ma yu buti ot moro.

Jodhum pa Benhadad jokidho bonge aka jowaco rigo ni, “Wawinjo nike kerin ma Isiraili jo wor, yey wan wakidhi bongi kere ma Isiraili gi kutiyin i pier wan, kodi thondhe i ŋuti wan, poyo go nyalo weyo ma k'onekin.”
Ameno jomino kutiyin i pier gin to jotweyo thondhe i ŋuti gin aka jokidho bongi kere Ahab to jowaco ni, “Ŋeca perin Benhadad ywak rin nike ikir'ineki go.”
Ahab openjo ni, “Go fodi kwo? Go cale omin an!”
Jodhum pa Benhadad oyido joneno ranyuth maber aka munyo Ahab owaco ni omin an, bende jodwoko ni, “Ey omin in Benhadad.”
Ahab omiyo or nike wokel Benhadad bonge. Aka munyo Benhadad otundo, Ahab owaco rigo donjo i cawila bonge.
Benhadad owaco ri Ahab ni, “Abino dwoko rin tindin je ma baba omayo benin, ŋey igeti ka timo mitan perin i Damasiko paka baba otimo i Samaria.”
Ahab odwoko ni, “Luwo kwoŋ pido me, abino weyin ikadhi.” Ahab otimo gi Benhadad cikirok to weyo go kadho.
Rwoth omiyo jatuci wac Were moro cik aka owaco ri jatuci wac Were man nike wogoyi go. To jatuci wac Were no okwero.
Ameno owaco rigo ni, “Kwoŋbedo ikwero luwo cik pa Rwoth, tekin ieye bongan, simbwor bino nekin.” Aka tekin jatuci wac Were no kadho to simbwor neko go.
Kenyo jatuci wac no okidho bongi jacwo man to waco rigo ni, “Goyan.” Jalo otimo ameno, ogoyo go matek to wumiya go.
Jatuci wac Were no otweyo nyime gi nanga to rendere nike k'obedo go, aka okidho to cungo i thengi yo kuro kere ma Isiraili woluwi.

Munyo kere luwo, jatuci wac Were no olwoŋo go ni, “Jadwoŋ kere, oyido alwenyo, aka neni jalweny acel okelo jakwor m'omak ran nike akuri, aka nike ka okwale abino culo gi kwo paran won, kosa ilakitanza an feza 3,000.
To oyido anitie gi riwin kweth to jalo kwale.”
Kere odwoko ni, “In won itieko thumo banja perin, aka ilaculo.”
Jatuci wac Were oyeco woko nanga wok ruwaŋe, aka gi piyo no won kere oniaŋ kwoŋe nike oyido acel kwoŋ jotuci wac Were.

Kenyo jatuci wac Were owaco ri Ahab ni, “Rwoth waco ni, ‘Kwoŋbedo iyeyo jacwo m'oyido amiyin cik neko okwale, onyo in won ibino culo gi kwo perin, aka ibino reyo woko jolweny perin rupiri joweyo jolweny pere jokwale.’ ”
Kere ma Isiraili odok peco i Samaria munyo rembo aka m'ongoye gi kisangala.
Onyo cegin gi cel pa kere Ahab i Yezirel oyido nitie ndelo vini aka won mere oyido obedo jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Naboth.
Ndelo acel, Ahab owaco ri Naboth ni, “Miyan ndelo vini perin me wobedi ndelo fufa paran. Abino miyin ndelo vini man maber loyo, kosa abino culin pesa ma ripo gine.”
To Naboth odwoko ni, “Alunjo ndelo vini me wok bongi kwarere paran, aka Rwoth wokiri woyeyan miyin.”
Ahab odok peco munyo kisangala aka omako nge ro gima Naboth owaco rigo. Oriere i kanindo pere aka k'onyalo cemo.
Yezebel cipa Ahab obino bonge aka openjo go ni, “Raŋo ikisangala? Raŋo ikicem?”
Ahab odwoko ni, “Kwoŋbedo awaco ri Naboth nike woyeyan anyew ndelo vini pere, kosa amiy go ndelo vini man to kwero.”
Yezebel openjo Ahab ni, “Iŋat'ibedo kere ma Isiraili kosa be? Ay i kanindo, ibedi gi kisangala aka icem. Abino limo rin ndelo pa Naboth!”
Ameno Yezebel ondiko balwin i nyingi Ahab to mwono aka odhiro ri jodhum kodi jodongo ma Yezirel.
I balwa no Yezebel ondiko ni, “Langa win ndelo ma riyo, wilwoŋ ji je kanyacel aka wikethi Naboth i kabedo ma wor.
Nwaŋ win ji ma bukony ario jowosegeya go ruwaŋe nike okwoŋo Were kodi kere. Kenyo ter win go woko ma tindi madwoŋ aka wigoy go gi telin wotho.”
Jodhum kodi jodongo ma Yezirel jotimo gima Yezebel omiyo jo or timo.
Jolanga ndelo ma riyo to jolwoŋo ji kanyacel, aka jomiyo Naboth kabedo ma wor.
Ji ma bukony ario jobino to josegeya go ruwaŋ ji nike okwoŋo Were kodi kere, aka oter go woko ma tindi madwoŋ to igoyo go gi telin cuka otho.
Odhir ri Yezebel mikwenda nike oneki Naboth.
Tekin Yezebel limo mikwenda no, owaco ri Ahab ni, “Ay, ikadhi ilunji ndelo vini pa Naboth m'okwero kitana kodin, kole Naboth otho.”
Aka tekin Ahab winjo nike Naboth otho, okadho lunjo ndelo vini.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Elia jatuci wac Were ma wok Tisibe ni,
“Ay ikidhi bongi kere Ahab ma Isiraili. Ibino nwaŋo go i ndelo vini pa Naboth mito lunjo.

Waci rigo nike Rwoth waco ni, ‘Rumacen ma neko jacwo me, onyo imito lunjo lim pere bende?’ Waci rigo nike me a gima Rwoth waco, ‘I kabedo ma gwokere jonaŋ'iye remo pa Naboth, ama bende gwokere jobino naŋ'iye remo perin!’ ”
Munyo Ahab oneno Elia, openjo go ni, “Inwaŋan, jakwor paran?”
Elia odwoko ni, “Ey anwaŋin! Imiyere kicutho timo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Ameno Rwoth waco rin ni, ‘Abino kelo teko kwoŋin, aka abino neko kisi jacwo ma peco perin je; mathindho gi m'oti.
Peco perin bino cale gi pecin pa Yerobowam wod pa Nebat kodi Basa wod pa Ahija, kwoŋbedo ikwinyo nge paran gi miyo Isiraili timo reco.’
Aka ri Yezebel, Rwoth waco nike gwokere jobino camo delkwoŋe i tindi madwoŋ Yezirel.
Wade perin ma jotho i tindi madwoŋ gwokere jobino camo, aka ma jotho kam'othangere acut jobino camo.”
(Ongoye ŋat'oyido omiyere kicutho timo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth paka Ahab rupiri cege Yezebel oyido dwoŋo go.
Ahab otimo reco ma wickwot loyo to lamo cal pa Bal paka Joamor ma Rwoth oriemo wok i lowo no ndir ma Joisiraili jodonj'iye.)
Munyo Elia otieko luwo, Ahab oyeco woko nangin pere aka oruko kutiya. Okwero cemo, aka onindo i kutiya, to kadho kun.
Rwoth owaco ri Elia jatuci wac Were ni,
“Ineno nger ma Ahab omwole iye ruwaŋan? Kwoŋbedo omwole, akibino kelo teko i hongo pere, t'abino kelo teko peco pere i hongo pa wode.”
Ma oro ario Siria kodi Isiraili jobedo ma jokilweny.
To i oro mar'adek, Yehosafat kere ma Yuda okidho neno kere ma Isiraili.
Ahab openjo jodhum pere ni, “Raŋo fodi wakitimo gimoro mayo kere ma Siria Ramoth i Giliad. Wikiŋey nike obedo mawan?”
Ahab openjo Yehosafat ni, “Inokadhi kodan monjo Ramoth?”
Yehosafat odwoko ni, “Ayikere ka iyikere, jolweny paran, kodi kayina paran.
To weyi kutho wapenji Rwoth.”
Ameno Ahab olwoŋo jotuci wac Were je 400 aka openjo jo ni, “Akadhi amonji Ramoth, kosa be?”
Joje jodwoko ni, “Kadhi imonji, Rwoth bino miyin loyo.”
To Yehosafat openjo ni, “Ongoye jatuci wac Were man ma wanyalo penjo?”
Ahab odwoko ni, “Nitie acel man, Mikaya wod pa Imila. T'adak go kwoŋbedo go kiwaci gimaber kwoŋan, to gimarac kende.”
Yehosafat odwoko ni, “Weyi kere wokiri wowaci nger gino.”
Kenyo Ahab olwoŋo jalweny to waco rigo omo Mikaya piyo.
Onyo Ahab kodi Yehosafat oyido joruko nangin pajo ma ker to jobedo i kombere pajo ma ker woko ma waŋkac ma Samaria i kisia. Jotuci wac Were je oyido joluwo ruwaŋ jo.
Acel kwoŋ jo m'ilwoŋo ni Zedekia wod pa Kenana, oyiko tungi ogwaŋ gi nyweny aka owaco ri Ahab ni, “Me a gima Rwoth waco, ‘Gi gime ibino dhiro gine Josiria cuka ireyo woko jo.’ ”
Jotuci wac Were man je jowaco gimoro acel ni, “Monji Ramoth aka Rwoth bino miyin loyo.”
Kucel jatel pa jalweny m'oyido okidho omo Mikaya owaco rigo ni, “Panen, jotuci wac Were man je jowaco gima kere mito winjo, aka in bende wac gimoro acel.”
To Mikaya odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo nike gima Rwoth owaci, meno alaluwo.”
Munyo Mikaya otundo ruwaŋ Ahab, kere openjo go ni, “Mikaya wamonji Ramoth kosa be?”
Mikaya odwoko ni, “Monji win! Rwoth bino miyo win loyo.”
To Ahab owaco ri Mikaya ni, “Awaci rin didi nike k'iluwo kodan i nyingi Rwoth wac ran adieri?”
Mikaya odwoko ni, “Aneno Joisiraili joywore wi gote paka rombo ma jongoye gi jakwath rombo. Aka Rwoth owaco ni, ‘cwo me jongoye gi jatel weyi jowodoki peco i siem.’ ”
Ahab owaco ri Yehosafat ni, “Nende akiwaco rin nike go kiwaci gimaber kwoŋan, to gimarac kende?”
Rwoth openjo ni, ŋa ma bino wondo Ahab ŋey wokidhi woneki go i Ramoth? Jomalaika man jowaco gimoro acel, aka man jowaco giman.
Kenyo cuny pa Rwoth obino to cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth to waco ni, ‘Abino wondo go.’
Rwoth openjo ni, ‘Ibino wondo go nedi?’ Cuny pa Rwoth odwoko ni, ‘Abino kidho t'amiyo jotuci wac Were pa Ahab je waco twodo.’ Kenyo Rwoth owaco ni, ‘Kadhi iwondi go, ibino nyalo.’ ”
Mikaya owaco macowe ni, “Neni, me a gim'otimere. Rwoth otieko miyo jotuci wac Were perin me wondin, aka go won otieko waco nike ibino romo gi teko.”
Kenyo jatuci wac Were Zedekia okidho bongi Mikaya to payo pinde adhoŋ aka owaco ni, “Woki keraŋo ma cuny pa Rwoth oweyan to luwo kodin?”
Mikaya odwoko ni, “Ibino ŋeyo ndelo no ka inodonji i kisika ma yucen moro pondo.”
Kenyo kere Ahab owaco ri jatel pa jolweny pere ni, “Maki Mikaya iter go bongi Amon gavana ma tindi madwoŋ kodi Yowas wod pa kere.
Waci rijo jowoboli go i jiera aka jowomiy go mugat gi pi cuka anodwoki i siem.”
Mikaya owaco ni, “Winjan win ji je, ka inodwoki i siem, meno Rwoth k'oluwo i an.”
Ameno kere Ahab kodi Yehosafat jokidho monjo tindi madwoŋ Ramoth i Giliad.
Ahab owaco ri Yehosafat ni, “Ka wakadho lweny, in ruki nangin perin ma ker, aka an abino rukere i nger matek niaŋ kwoŋan.” Ameno kere ma Isiraili k'orukere paka kere munyo kidho i lweny.
Onyo kere ma Siria oyido omiyo jomituka piero adek g'ario ma cawilin cik nike jowomonji kere ma Isiraili kende.
Aka munyo jomituka ma cawilin joneno Yehosafat, joparo nike oyido obedo Ahab aka jowire monjo go. To Yehosafat oywaki malo
to joniaŋ nike oyido k'obedo Ahab to joweyo monjo go.
To jacwo moro obayo asere to cwowo Ahab i dier kogino cinge. Ahab okoko ri jagwey cawila pere ni, “Awinjo litho, wire iywayan woko i lweny.”
Munyo lweny medere, kere Ahab odoŋ m'oliero i wi cawila pere ŋiyo Josiria. Remo ocwer wok iy'adhola pere to umo pendi cawila, aka tundo othieno otho.
Aka munyo waŋceŋ cegin podho, jolweny jomiyo or nike kisi jacwo wodoki i piny pere kodi i tindi madwoŋ pere.
Ameno kere Ahab otho, aka oter delkwoŋe yiko i Samaria.
Cawila pere olwok i kidiwa ma Samaria kama malayin jolwoker'iye, aka gwokere jonaŋo kenyo remo pere paka Rwoth oyido owaco.
Kisi gima Ahab otimo je, cel pa kere pere m'okicin gi lak liec, kodi tindin madongo m'ogeto je ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Rumacen ma tho pa Ahab, wode m'ilwoŋo ni Ahazia olunjo go paka kere.
I oro mar'aŋwen ma dhum pa Ahab kere ma Isiraili, Yehosafat wod pa Asa obedo kere ma Yuda.
Yehosafat oyido jaoro piero adek g'abic aka odhumo ma oro piero ario g'abic i Yerusalem. Yokimere oyido ilwoŋo ni Azuba nyar Silihi.
Paka bamere Asa m'open dhumo rigo, Yehosafat otimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth, kwanyo woko k'onyeko kabedo ma lamo werin man aka ji jomedere miyo cowirok gi waŋo buban kenyo.
Yehosafat bende otimo siem gi kere ma Isiraili.
Giman je ma Yehosafat otimo, miseni pere, kodi lweny m'olwenyo je ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Yuda.
Yehosafat bende oriemo woko malayin je m'oyido jodoŋ i migame pa werin man i ndir pa bamere Asa.
Piny Edom oyido ongoye gi kere, aka oyido dhumere kodi ŋata luwo i dhum ma kere ma Yuda ama yero.
Yehosafat ogeto mel ma Tarsis ma omo zahabu wok Ofir to jok'onyalo omo rupiri mel jotur i Eziongeba.
Kenyo kere Ahazia ma Isiraili oyido omito nike cwo pere jocewere gi cwo pa Yehosafat, to Yehosafat k'oyere.
Yehosafat otho aka oyiki go kam'oyik'iye bacere pere i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi to wode m'ilwoŋo ni Yehoram lunjo go.
I oro mar'apar g'abirio ma dhum pa kere Yehosafat ma Yuda, Ahazia wod pa Ahab obedo kere ma Isiraili aka odhumo ma oro ario i Samaria.
Ahazia otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth paka bamere Ahab kodi min Yezebel, kodi kere Yerobowam ma jomiyo Isiraili timo reco.
Ahazia olamo to tiyo ri Bal, aka i nger acel paka bamere okwinyo nge pa Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili.
Munyo Ahab otieko tho, Mowab ogwenyere kwoŋ Isiraili.
Onyo kere Ahazia ma Isiraili opodho wok i wi kisul ma cel pa kere pere i Samaria, aka olimo litho swa. Ameno ooro jomikwenda penjo Balzebub, were ma Ekiron tindi madwoŋ ma Filistia niaŋ ka go obothi.

To malaika pa Rwoth owaco ri Elia jatuci wac Were ma wok Tisibe wokidhi worom gi jomikwenda pa kere ma Samaria aka wopenji jo ni, “Raŋo wikidho penjo were ma Ekiron? Rupiri wiparo nike Were ongoye i Isiraili?
Onyo riameno Rwoth waco ri kere ni, ‘Ikibino ay i kanindo, adieri ibino tho.’ ”
Ameno to Elia kadho.
Jomikwenda jogik bongi kere aka openjo jo ni, “Raŋo widwoko?”

Jodwoko go ni, “Jacwo moro obino romo gi wan, aka owaco riwan ni, ‘Gik win bongi kere m'ooro win aka wiwaci rigo nike Rwoth waco ama, raŋo ioro jomikwenda penjo Balzebub kere ma Ekiron? Rupiri iparo nike Were ongoye i Isiraili? Riameno ikibino ay wok i kanindo, adieri ibino tho.’ ”
Kere openjo jo ni, “Jacwo no cale nedi?”
Kere odwoko ni, “Meno Elia!”
Kenyo kere ooro jatel pa jolweny kodi jolweny piero abic bongi Elia. Jonwaŋo go obedo i wi tendere aka jatel pa jolweny owaco rigo ni, “Jacwo pa Were, kere miyin cik loro piny.”
Kere ooro jatel pa jolweny man kendo, kodi jolweny piero abic. Jatel pa jolweny oidho malo to waco ri Elia ni, “Jacwo pa Were, kere miyin cik loro piny piyo!”
Elia odwoko jo ni, “K'inen abedo jacwo pa Were, weyi mac wobin wok i polo aka wonekin kodi cwo perin!” Kenyo mac pa Were obino wok i polo to neko jatel pa jolweny kodi cwo pere.

Kere kendo ooro jatel pa jolweny kodi cwo piero abic. Jatel pa jolweny no oidho malo to guro conge ruwaŋ Elia aka oywakere ri Elia ni, “A jacwo pa Were, mondo akwayin maki wor kodan kodi cwo paran. Both kwo mawan!
Neni mac m'owok i polo oneko woko jotel pa jolweny ario ca kodi cwo pajo; to mondo Ikir'ineki wan!”
Kenyo malaika pa Rwoth owaco ri Elia ni, “Lori piny gi go Ikir'ilwor.” Ameno Elia oloro piny gi jatel pa jolweny bongi kere
aka owaco ri kere ni, “Rwoth waco ni, ‘Kwoŋbedo ioro jomikwenda penjo Balzebub were ma Ekiron, gi paro nike Were ongoye i Isiraili m'inyalo penjo, ikibino ay i kanindo, adieri ibino tho.’ ”
Ahazia otho paka Rwoth oyido owaco luwo kwoŋ Elia. Ahazia oyido ongoye gi wote aka omin go Yoram ama olunjo go paka kere i oro mar'ario ma dhum pa Yehoram wod pa Yehosafat, paka kere ma Yuda.
Gigipiny man je ma kere Ahazia otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin je ma Isiraili.
Onyo munyo Rwoth cegin tero Elia malo i polo g'asur, Elia kodi Elisa oyido jonitie i yo jowok i Gilgal.
Aka Elia owaco ri Elisa ni, “Onyo mondo bedi ka, kole Rwoth ooran denge Bethel.”
To Elisa odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo kodi rin nike akibino weyin.” Ameno jokadho i Bethel.
Kitipa pa jotuci wac Were jobino bongi Elisa aka jopenjo ni, “Iŋeyo paka konon me Rwoth kidho tero jadwoŋ perin woko?”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Ey, aŋeyo, to weyi wakiri waluw kwoŋe.”
Kenyo Elia owaco ri Elisa ni, “Bedi ka, kole Rwoth ooran i Yeriko.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo kodi rin nike akibino weyin.” Ameno jokadho i Yeriko.
Kitipa pa jotuci wac Were ma jobedo kenyo jopenjo Elisa ni, “Iŋeyo paka konon me Rwoth kidho tero woko jadwoŋ perin?”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Ey, aŋeyo, to weyi wakiri waluw kwoŋe.”
Kenyo Elia owaco ri Elisa ni, “Bedi ka Rwoth ooran i Malawa Yordan.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo kodi rin nike akibino weyin.” Ameno jomedere woth.
Jotuci wac Were piero abic joluwo jo to jocungo bor ye gi jo, aka Elia kodi Elisa jocungo i thengi Malawa Yordan.
Kenyo Elia olunyo kanzu pere to dolo aka ogoyo gine wi pi; pi otiakere aka Elia kodi Elisa joŋado i thenge ca i lowo m'othwo.
Gikenyo Elia openjo Elisa ni, “Kway gim'imito atim rin mafodi k'okwanyan woko bongin.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Weyi alimi kwoŋ meni perin ma bino miyan lunjo waŋin.”
Elia odwoko ni, “Meno kwac matek miyo, to ibino limo k'inenan paka ikwanyan woko bongin. K'ikinenan, ikibino limo.”
Aka munyo jomedere luwo ka jowotho, neni, cawila ma mac kodi kayina ma mac opoko jo i diere aka Elia okadho malo i polo gi asur.
Elisa oneno aka ogoyo ndur ni, “Baba, baba! Jameni ma thielo Isiraili! Ikadho!” Aka k'oneno Elia kendo.
Kenyo oyeco woko kanzu pere iy'adec ario i rem.
Odimo kanzu pa Elia m'oyido opodho wok kwoŋ Elia, to gik cungo i thengi Yordan.
Ogoyo wi pi gi kanzu pa Elia ka waco ama: “Nikune Rwoth Were pa Elia?” Kenyo ogoyo pi kendo aka otiakere to ŋado i thenge ca.
Jotuci wac Were piero abic joneno go aka jowaco ni, “Meni pa Elia nitie kwoŋ Elisa!” Jokidho romo gi go, jokule piny ruwaŋ go,
aka jowaco rigo ni, “Wanitie ka cwo piero abic matek, weyi wakadhi warangi jadwoŋ perin. Kono Cuny pa Rwoth otiŋo go to weyo go wi got moro kosa i milelo moro.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Be, wikiripi kadho.”
To jomena go cuka Elisa oyeyo jo kadho. Cwo piero abic no jokadho to jorango Elia ma ndelo adek to jok'onwaŋo go.
Kenyo jogik bongi Elisa m'oyido kuro jo i Yeriko aka owaco rijo ni, “Akiwaco riwin nike wikiri wikadhi?”
Onyo cwo mogo ma jowok i Yeriko jobino bongi Elisa to jowaco rigo ni, “Paka iŋeyo, jadwoŋ, tindi madwoŋ me ber, to pi mere rac aka kelo ici apodho.”
Elisa owaco ni, “Keli ran win acero manyen, aka kethi win'iye cumbi.” Jokelo rigo,
aka Elisa okidho i waŋ pi to konjo cumbi i pi to waco ni, “Me a gima Rwoth waco ni, ‘Aloko pi me macil aka kilakelo tho kosa podho ici kendo.’ ”
Aka pi no obedo macil wok i hongo ma Elisa owaco nike labedo.
Elisa oeye Yeriko kadho Bethel, aka i yo yac mogo jobino wok i tindi to jojwiyo go ka jokoko ni, “Ngoye ka, japata!”
Elisa owire, oŋiyo jo, to kwoŋo jo i nyingi Rwoth. Kenyo arara ario ma mon jowok i lul to joyeco woko yac piero aŋwen g'ario no mathindho thindho.
Elisa owok kenyo to kidho i Got Kamel, aka rumacen ogik i Samaria.
I oro mar'apar g'aboro ma dhum pa kere Yehosafat ma Yuda, Yehoram wod pa Ahab obedo kere ma Isiraili i Samaria, aka odhumo ma oro apar g'ario.
Otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, makada nende k'obedo marac paka bamere kodi min Yezebel; oturo woko cal pa Bal ma bamere oyido lamo.
Kucel paka kere Yerobowam wod pa Nebat m'otelo dhum rigo, omiyo Isiraili timo reco ma k'onyalo weyo.
Onyo kere Mesa ma Mowab oyido kuro rombo aka kisi oro oyido miyo kere ma Isiraili wot rombo 100,000 kodi pien rombo 100,000.
To munyo kere Ahab ma Isiraili otho, Mesa ogwenyere kwoŋ kere ma Isiraili.
Ameno kere Yehoram oeye Samaria i hongo no to coko jolweny ma Isiraili je kanyacel.
Odhiro wac ri Yehosafat kere ma Yuda ni, “Kere ma Mowab otieko gwenyirok kwoŋan, inoriwere kodan lweny gi go?”
Yehosafat odwoko ni, “Ey, ayere aka kiri cwo paran kodi kayinin paran.
Royo mene ma wabino luwo?”
Yehoram odwoko ni, “Gi yuthim ma Edom.”
Ameno kere ma Isiraili okadho gi kere ma Yuda kodi kere ma Edom. Aka munyo jotieko ŋanjo ma ndelo abirio, pi orumo rijo amadha ri cwo pajo kodi ogwaŋe pajo.
Kenyo kere ma Isiraili owaco ni, “Kidamba! Rwoth olwoŋo kerin adek me miyo jo i cingi Jomowab!”
Yehosafat openjo ni, “Jatuci wac Were ongoye ka ma wanyalo penjo Rwoth luwo i go?”
Jatel pa jolweny pa Yehoram acel odwoko ni, “Elisa wod pa Safat m'okonjo pi i cingi Elia nitie ka.”
Kere Yehosafat owaco ni, “Go obedo jatuci wac Were m'otire.” Ameno kerin adek joloro bongi Elisa.
Elisa openjo kere ma Isiraili ni, “Raŋo akonyin? Kadhi bongi jotuci wac Were ma benin kodi yokin jopenjo.”
Yehoram odwoko ni, “Be, obedo Rwoth ama olwoŋo kerin adek me miyo jo i cingi Jomowab.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Paka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny m'atiyo rigo kwo, ka bedi oyido akiwor kere Yehosafat ma Yuda, dinyo angoye gi gir'atima kodin.
Onyo keli ran jawer.”
Aka munyo jawer tuko tongol pere, meni pa Rwoth obino kwoŋ Elisa,
aka owaco ni, “Rwoth waco ni, ‘Abino miyo jwombe me poŋ gi pi.’
Kole Rwoth waco ni, ‘Wikibino neno koyo kosa koth, to pi bino poŋ i jwombe ŋey win, dhok mewin, kodi ogwaŋe mewin wimadhi.’
Me gima sisiri ruwaŋ Rwoth, go bende bino miyo Jomowab i cingi win,
aka wibino mako kisi tindi madwoŋ m'otinda, wiredhi kisi yen maber, wicegi waŋ pi je to wiloko gunda kisi adec lowo maber ka wiumo gi telin.”
Yawere odikin, i hongo ma miyo cowirok noknok, pi owok yuthenge ma Edom to umo piny.
Munyo Jomowab jowinjo nike kerin adek jobino monjo jo, olwoŋi cwo je ma jonyalo lwenyo wok kwoŋ madongo tundo kwoŋ mathindho t'iketho jo i kew.
Munyo jocewi yawere odikin, waŋceŋ oyido liel wi pi, to miyo cale pa remo.
Jomowab jowaco ni, “Manago remo! Kerin adek jolwenyo wegi to jonekere. Onyo weyi wakadhi wanyaga kambi pajo.”
To munyo jotundo i kambi pa Joisiraili, Joisiraili joay aka jomonjo Jomowab, cuka joringo kwoŋ jo. Joisiraili jomedere riemo Jomowab ka joneko jo

kodi reyo tindi pajo madongo. Aka i kisi adec lowo maber kisi Jaisiraili obolo iye tele cuka oumere. Joculo woko waŋ pi to jotoŋo yen maber. Nyaka tindi madwoŋ Kiri Heres ama odoŋ aka josumulo jothoko to jomonjo.
Munyo kere ma Mowab oneno nike k'oloy lweny, okwanyo cwo pere 700 ma jonitie g'abor to temo rirok i dier jokwor ringo bongi kere ma Siria to k'onyalo.
Ameno okwanyo okayo pere m'oyido ripo lunjo jo paka kere, to miyo paka cowirok ri were ma Mowab i wi kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ. Joisiraili jobwok aka jogik wok i tindi madwoŋ to jodok i piny pajo.

Onyo citho ma kitipa pa jotuci wac Were okidho bongi Elisa to waco rigo ni, “Jadwoŋ, cworan otho! Paka iŋeyo, go oyido woro Were, t'onyo pama ŋat'oyido banja go pesa obino tero wotan paka cul ri banja pa cworan.”
Elisa openjo citho no ni, “Atim rin aŋo? Waci ran aŋo m'initie gine peco?”
Aka citho odwoko ni, “Ongoye gimoro kwanyo woko agwata mo.”
Kenyo Elisa owaco rigo ni, “Wok woko, kway joger perin agwatin ma ninono.
Kenyo in kodi wotin donji win i ot, cegi thigo, aka icaki konjo mo iy'agwatin. Kethi kisi m'opoŋ gicen.”
Ameno dhako no odonjo i ot pere gi wote, ocego thigo, okwanyo agwata mathin ma mo nitie iye, aka okonjo mo i agwatin ka wote jokelo rigo.
Munyo agwatin je jopoŋ, openjo ka agwata man oyido nitie. Acel kwoŋ wode odwoko ni, “Ongoye man.” Aka mo ocok cwer.
Dhako no ogik bongi Elisa jatuci wac Were m'owaco rigo ni, “Tana mo aka iculi banjin perin, aka in kodi wotin wikwo gi m'odoŋ.”
Ndelo acel, Elisa okidho Sunem, aka dhako m'oŋaŋ ma bedo kenyo olwoŋo go cemo i ot pere. Ameno noknok ka Elisa okidho Sunem oyido cemo i ot pa dhako no.
Aka dhako no owaco ri cwore ni, “Neni onyo, aniaŋ nike jacwo ma noknok bino ka, obedo ŋataleŋ.
Weyi wageti rigo kisika mathin i wi ot, waketh'iye meza, kom, kodi tala, ŋey go wobedo kenyo kisi ka owendo riwan.”
Ndelo acel Elisa odwoko i Sunem to idho ywomirok i kisika no.
Owaco ri Gehazi ŋeca pere wokidhi wolwoŋi dhako no. Munyo dhako no obino,
Elisa owaco ri Gehazi ni, “Penji go gim'anyalo timo rigo ro mindin je ma go obedo gine riwan. Poyi go mitan akidhi bongi kere kosa jamituka jolweny akethi rigo wac maber.”
Dhako no odwoko ni, “Anitie gi gim'amito je i dier ji paran won.”
Elisa openjo Gehazi ni, “Aŋo m'atimi rigo?”
Gehazi odwoko ni, “Adieri go ongoye gi wode aka cwore oti.”
Elisa owaco ri Gehazi ni, “Lwoŋ go wobin ka.” Dhako no obino to cungo i dhiot,
aka Elisa owaco rigo ni, “I hongo me oro ma bino, ibino bedo gi wodin.”
Dheno odwoko ni, “Be jadwoŋ, in ibedo jacwo pa Were, ikir'iwondan!”
To paka Elisa oyido owaco, cegin i hongo no oro ma luwo dheno onywolo wode.
Munyo nyathi otieko dongo, oluwo bamere ndelo acel i dier jokeco.
Aka owaco ri bamere dicel ni, “Wiyan fudhan! Wiyan fudhan!”
Bamere owaco ri ŋeca pere ni, “Ter jayac bongi min.”
Aka munyo otiek tero nyathi bongi min, min otiŋo go i tiende tundo sawa aucel to tho.
Yokimere okidho to rieyo go i wi kitanda pa Elisa to cego thigo.
Kenyo dheno olwoŋo cwore aka owaco rigo ni, “Or ran ŋeca gi punda. Amito kidho bongi jatuci wac Were Elisa. Abino dwoko piyo.”
Cwore openjo go ni, “Raŋo ikidhi bonge konon? K'obedo ndelo ma dwe manyen kosa Sabato.”
Dheno odwoko ni, “Ikir'irembi.”
Kenyo go oidho punda, aka omiyo ŋeca pere cik ni, “Miy punda ringo piyo swa, aka ikir'ikadhi moth kono k'awaco rin.”
Ameno dheno okadho, aka jotundo i got Kamel kama Elisa oyido nitie iye.
Elisa oneno go bino munyo go fodi nitie bor, aka owaco ri Gehazi ŋeca pere ni, “Neni, dhako ma wok Sunem eno bino!
Redi bonge ipenji ka kisi gimoro ber gi go, cwore, kodi wode.”
Go owaco ri Gehazi nike kisi gimoro ber.

To munyo otundo wi got bongi Elisa, okule piny ruwaŋe Elisa to mako tiende. Gehazi oyido cegin ywayo go woko, to Elisa owaco rigo ni, “Weyi go, ikineni nike go nitie i litho makec, aka Rwoth okano kwoŋan, k'owaco ran.”
Dheno openjo Elisa ni, “Jadwoŋ, cango akwayin ye nyathi? Ndelo no akiwaco rin nike ikir'iwondan?”
Elisa owaco ri Gehazi ni, “Redi! Kwany luth paran i cingin aka ikadhi. Ikir'icungi motho ŋat'iromo gine je, aka ikir'idwoki ŋat'omothin je. Kadhi tirtir iriey luth paran i wi nyathi.”
Kenyo yok nyathi owaco ri Elisa ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo kodi rin nike akibino weyin!” Ameno jario jocako woth dok.
Gehazi okadho yuwiye to rieyo luth i wi nyathi to ngoye derino kosa ranyuth ma kwo. Ameno ogik romo gi Elisa aka owaco ni, “Jayac k'ocew.”
Munyo Elisa odonjo i ot, oneno nyathi oriere m'otho i wi kitanda pere.
Ameno odonjo to cego thigo to kwayo Rwoth.
Kenyo oriere kwoŋ nyathi, ka ketho dhoke i dhok nyathi, waŋe i waŋ nyathi, kodi cinge i cingi nyathi aka kwoŋ nyathi ocako bedo malieth.
Elisa oay to wotho i dier ot aka ogik to riere kendo kwoŋ nyathi. Nyathi ogiro dibirio to yawo waŋe.
Elisa olwoŋo Gehazi aka owaco rigo lwoŋo yok nyathi. Munyo dheno obino, owaco rigo ni, “Wodin ee.”
Dheno obino to podho i tiendi Elisa to kule piny, okwanyo nyathi pere to kadho.
Elisa ogik Gilgal kendo munyo kec nitie i piny. Munyo go fonjo jotuci wac Were, owaco ri ŋeca pere nike wokethi dak i mac wotedi rijo kado moro.
Acel kwoŋ jo okidho i ndelo omo yen moro. Onwaŋo olemo madudi to fono akendin mere kweth m'onyalo tiŋo. Odwoko to ŋado jo to konjo i dak ma go k'oŋeyo nike obedo aŋo.
Munyo otok rijo camo, tekin jobilo, jokoko ri Elisa ni, “Oyiri aka kicamere!”
Elisa okwayo cemo moro, obolo i dak aka owaco ni, “Tok rijo cemo moro kendo.” Aka ongoye gim'orac gine.

I hongo man jacwo obino wok Bal Salisa kelo ri Elisa mugat piero ario m'otimi gi bale m'okec marapena i oro no kodi withi ŋano ma nyaka okec. Elisa owaco ri ŋeca pere nike wopidhi gine kitipa pa jotuci wac Were.
To ŋeca pere odwoko ni, “Iparo nike gime romo cwo miya acel.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Miy jo jowocami, kole Rwoth waco nike jobino camo to man doŋ.”
Ameno ŋeca pere oketho cemo ruwaŋ jo, aka paka Rwoth oyido owaco, joje jocamo to man doŋ.
I kinyaga pajo acel kwoŋ Joisiraili, Josiria oyido jotiŋo nyako Jaisiraili ma nyaka ay m'olokere ŋeca pa cipa Naman.
Ndelo acel, nyako no owaco ri dhakodwoŋ pere ni, “Kabedi jadwoŋ paran nyalo kidho bongi jatuci wac Were ma bedo Samaria, oyido nyalo both dhowo pere.”
Munyo Naman owinjo gime, okidho bongi kere to waco rigo gima nyako owaco.
Kere ma Siria owaco ni, “Kidhi bongi kere ma Isiraili aka ter rigo balwa me.”
Ameno Naman okadho aka otero feza 30,000 zahabu 6,000 kodi nangin mafoth apar awira.
Balwa ma Naman otero oyido somere ni, “Balwa me nyutho jatel pa jolweny paran Naman. Amitin ibothi go kwoŋ dhowo pere.”

Munyo kere ma Isiraili osoma balwa, oyeco woko law pere to waco ni, “Kere ma Siria paro nike anyalo botho jame nedi? Go paro nike abedo Were manitie gi meni ma kwo kodi tho? Me nyuthere kamaler nike go temo kwinyan!”
Munyo jatuci wac Were Elisa owinjo gim'otimere, odhiro wac ri kere ma Isiraili ni, “Raŋo irembo? Weyi go wobin bongan, ŋey woŋey nike jotuci wac Were jonitie i Isiraili.”
Ameno Naman obino to cungo i dhiot pa Elisa gi punde pere kodi cawilin.
Elisa ooro ŋeca woko waco ri Naman wokidhi wolwokere i malawa Yordan dibirio ŋey wobothi two pere.
To Naman okadho i nge ka waco ama: “Oyido aparo nike go lawok woko kwayo Rwoth Were pere, to tiŋo cinge i wi two me to bothan!
Kucel malawin Amana kodi Farifari jonitie i Damasiko ma joloyo malawin moro je i Isiraili. Oyido anyalo lwok'iye t'aboth!”
To ŋeca pere jocore bonge aka jowaco rigo ni, “Jadwoŋ, ka bedi jatuci wac Were oyido oorin timo gima matek, dinyo itimo. Onyo raŋo ikilwokere paka go owaco aka ibothi?”
Ameno Naman oloro piny i Yordan to munyere dibirio paka Elisa oyido owaco, aka obothi kicutho. Delkwoŋe olokere m'ocwiny aka m'olony.
Ogik bongi Elisa gi cwo pere aka owaco ni, “Neni, onyo aŋeyo nike were man ongoye i piny gibe, kwanyo woko Were pa Isiraili; riameno mondo joli mic wok bongi ŋeca perin.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo, m'atiyo rigo nike akibino jolo mic moro je.”
Naman omena go nike wojol to Elisa kwero.

Kenyo Naman owaco ni, “K'ikwero jolo mic, yeyan akadhi gi lowo ma nyithindhi kayinin ario jonyalo tiŋo tero peco kodan, kwoŋbedo wok pama akibino miyo cowirok kosa mic awaŋa ri were moro je kwanyo woko Rwoth.
Ameno aparo nike Rwoth bino cwako ran ka akwaŋo kere paran i ot pa Rimon were ma Siria lamo go. Adieri Rwoth bino cwako ran!”
Elisa owaco ni, “Kadhi i siem.” Aka Naman okadho.
To munyo Naman oyido fodi k'okadho bor,
ŋeca pa Elisa Gehazi owaco ni, “Neni, jadwoŋ paran oweyo Naman kadho ma k'oculo gimoro! Dinyo go ojolo gima Jasiria me omiyo go. Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo nike abino luwo go akwany gimoro kwoŋe.”
Ameno Gehazi oluwo Naman. Munyo Naman oneno jacwo moro ŋweco luwo go, oloro piny wok i cawila pere romo gine, aka openjo ni, “Nitie gimarac?”

Gehazi odwoko ni, “Be. To jadwoŋ paran ooran awaci rin nike cwo ario ma jowok i kitipa pa jotuci wac Were ma jowok i piny matendere Efrayim nyaka jotundo, aka go kwayin imiy go feza 3,000 kodi nangin mafoth ario awira.”
Naman odwoko ni, “Mondo jol feza 6,000 me.” Naman omena go aka otweyo rigo feza 6,000 i mugowa ario kodi nangin mafoth ario awira to miyo ŋecin ario kadho gine yuwiy Gehazi.
Munyo jotundo i tendere ma Elisa bed'iye, Gehazi okwanyo mugowa ario to rwako i ot aka osewila ŋecin pa Naman.
Gehazi ogik i ot aka Elisa openjo go ni, “Iwok kune?”
Gehazi odwoko ni, “Ongoye.”
To Elisa owaco rigo ni, “Oyido angoye kenyo i cuny munyo jalo oloro wok i cawila pere romo kodin? Me k'obedo hongo ma jolo pesa kodi nangin, ndelo nanzi kodi ndelo vini, rombo kodi dhok, kosa ŋecin!
Riameno dhowo pa Naman bino yimere kwoŋin kodi nyikwayin cil gi cil.”
Ameno Gehazi oeye ruwaŋ Elisa gi dhowo matar pa pe.
Ndelo acel kitipa pa jotuci wac Were ma Elisa oyido telo jogeŋisa rigo ni, “Neni, kabedo ma wabed'iye i tel perin thin swa!
Miy wan wakidhi i Yordan watoŋ yen mogo, ŋey wanyal geto kabedo.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Meno ber.”
Kenyo acel kwoŋ jo okwayo go wokadhi gi jo, aka oyeyo.
Aka jokadho kanyacel. Munyo jotundo i Yordan, jocako tic.
To munyo acel kwoŋ jo toŋo yath, wic le pere opodho i pi, aka oywaki ri Elisa ni, “Anotim aŋo jadwoŋ? Obedo le akwaya.”
Elisa openjo ni, “Opodho kune?”
Munyo jalo onyutho go kama le opodh'iye, otoŋo luth to bolo i pi aka le omol wi pi.
Elisa owaco ni, “Kwany.” Ameno jalo oguŋo piny to kwanyo.
Ndelo acel kere ma Siria oyido lwenyo gi Joisiraili. Oluwo gi jotel pa jolweny pere to yero kaketho kambi pere.
To Elisa odhiro wac ri kere ma Isiraili gwoko go wokiri wokidhi kanyago kwoŋbedo Josiria oyido jociko jo kenyo.
Ameno kere ma Isiraili ogwoko ji m'oyido jobedo i kabedo no, aka jokure. Gime otimere dikweth.
Cuny kere ma Siria orembo swa kwoŋ gime, olwoŋo jotel pa jolweny pere aka openjo jo ni, “Ŋa kwoŋ win manitie i thenge pa kere pa Isiraili?”
Acel kwoŋ jo odwoko ni, “Ongoye kwoŋ wan jadwoŋ paran. Jatuci wac Were Elisa waco ri kere ma Isiraili kisi gim'iwaco makada nende iwaci manyaliŋliŋ i kisika perin.”
Kere owaco ni, “Dwar win kama go nitie iye aka abino mako go.”
Munyo owaci rigo nike Elisa oyido nitie i Dothan,
ooro jolweny madwoŋ kodi punde kodi cawilin. Jotundo i tindi wor aka jothoko.
Yawere odikin maŋic ŋeca pa Elisa oay malo to wok woko, aka neni jolweny gi kayinin kodi cawilin oyido jothoko tindi. Ogik bongi Elisa aka owaco rigo ni, “Jadwoŋ wanitie i kidamba, wanotim aŋo?”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Ikir'ibwoki, kole wadit gi ji ma jonitie i thenge mawan loyo ji ma jonitie i thenge pajo.”
Kenyo Elisa okwayo ni, “Rwoth, yaw waŋe aka wonen!” Ameno Rwoth oyawo waŋ ŋeca pa Elisa, oŋiyo malo to neno got opoŋ gi kayinin kodi cawilin ma mac thoko Elisa.
Aka munyo Josiria jomonjo, Elisa okwayo ni, “A Rwoth goy cwo me gi waŋtho!” Rwoth owinjo kwayo pere aka ogoyo jo gi waŋtho.
Kenyo Elisa okidho bongi jo aka owaco ni, “Me ka royo aka me ka tindi ma wirango; luwan win, aka abino tero win bongi jacwo ma wirango.” Aka otero jo i Samaria.
Tekin jodonjo i Samaria, Elisa okwayo ni, “A Rwoth yaw waŋ ji me jowonyal neno.” Ameno Rwoth odwoko kwayo pere to yawo waŋ jo to joneno nike oyido jonitie i Samaria.
Munyo kere ma Isiraili oneno jolweny ma Siria, openjo Elisa ni, “Baba, aneki jo? Aneki jo?”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Be, ikir'ineki jo. Oyido inyalo neko jolweny m'imako g'abor perin kodi kwot perin? Miy jo cemo kodi gir'amadha, aka iwey jowodoki bongi kere pajo.”
Ameno kere ma Isiraili otimo kalima madwoŋ rijo, aka rumacen odhiro jo dok bongi kere ma Siria. Wok kenyo Josiria joweyo kinyaga i piny ma Isiraili.
Rumacen ma hongo, Benhadad kere ma Siria otelo jolweny pere je kwoŋ Isiraili to mako tindi madwoŋ Samaria.
Aka ro gime kec madwoŋ obedo Samaria tundo kama wic punda oyido nyewo feza piero aboro, aka gram 200 ma woyo akuro oyido feza abic.
Onyo kere ma Isiraili oyido luwo dho kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ, to dhako moro koko ni, “Konyan, jadwoŋ kere!”
Kere odwoko ni, “K'inen Rwoth kinyal konyin, anokonyin nedi? Anitie gi ŋano kosa vini?
Teko perin aŋo?”
Dhako no odwoko ni, “Ndelo ca dhako me owaco ran nike akel wodan wacam aka wacam apere yawere.
Ameno watedo wodan to wacamo go. Aka yawere munyo awaco rigo nike wacam wode bende, to kere go oyido okano wode.”
Munyo kere owinjo wac pa dhako no, oyeco woko nangin pere, aka ji m'oyido jonitie cegin gi kor ot joneno nike kere oyido oruko kutiya i wi nangin pere.
Kere owaco ni, “Weyi Were wonekan k'inen wic Elisa k'oŋadi mafodi piny k'oyutho!”
Aka ooro jamikwenda mako Elisa.

Kome Elisa oyido nitie peco gi jodongo mogo m'oyido jowendo rigo. Mafodi jamikwenda pa kere k'otundo, Elisa owaco ri jodongo no ni, “Janek no eno ooro dhano nekan! Onyo ka otundo ka cegi win thigo aka wikiri wiyey go donjo. Kere won gipi luwo go cen.”
Aka ma fodi Elisa luwo, kere obino bonge aka owaco ni, “Rwoth am'okelo teko me kwoŋ wan! Raŋo akuri go wotim gimoro?”
To Elisa dwoko ni, “Winji gima Rwoth waco: Rwoth waco ama, ‘Kapa sawa me dikin ibino nyalo nyewo kilo adek ma ŋano maber loyo kosa kilo aucel ma bale gi feza acel i Samaria.’ ”
Kenyo jakur pa kere ma kere oyido othenere i cinge owaco ri Elisa ni, “Gino kinyal timere; makada nende Rwoth won oyido dhiri ŋano dicel!”
Elisa odwoko ni, “In won ibino neno gi waŋin, to ikibino camo cemo moro je.”
Onyo oyido nitie cwo aŋwen mogo ma jodhowo i dhiot ma waŋkac ma Samaria, aka jowaco ni, “Raŋo wabedi ka cuka watho?

Ongoye kony wan donjo i tindi madwoŋ kwoŋbedo wabino riyo kec kenyo; to ka wabedo ka bende, wabino tho. Ameno weyi wakidhi win i kambi pa Josiria, ka jowey ma jok'oneko wan wabino kwo, to ka jonek wan to watho.”
Ameno munyo piny yutho, jokidho i kambi pa Josiria, aka munyo jotundo, panen, oyido dhano ongoye kenyo.
Kole Rwoth oyido omiyo Josiria winjo dwondi gima mor pa jolweny madwoŋ, gi kayinin kodi cawilin to joparo nike kere ma Isiraili onyewo kerin ma Misir kodi jolweny pajo monjo jo.
Ameno joringo woko ri kwo pajo munyo piny yutho to joweyo wema pajo, kayinin, kodi punde, aka joweyo kambi paka oyido nitie.
Munyo cwo ma jotwo dhowo me jotundo, jodonjo i wema, jocemo, jomedho, aka jokadho gi feza, zahabu, kodi nangin ma jonwaŋo to jokano. Jogik, jodonjo i wema man aka jotimo gimoro acel.
Kenyo jowaco wegi ni, “Wakitim gimo'tire. Konon obedo ndelo ma wac maber. Ka wanoliŋ tundo odikin adieri ibino miyo wan gir'acula. Onyo riameno weyi wakidhi wawaci ri jodhum pa kere!”

Ameno jobino to jolwoŋo jokur ma waŋkac aka jowaco rijo ni, “Wakidho i kambi pa Josiria, aka neni, ongoye ŋata waneno kosa wawinjo luwo. Kwanyowoko punde kodi kayinin m'otwey aka wemin oyido jonitie nono.”
Kenyo jokur waŋkac jokidho aka jonyayo wac i cel pa kere

Piny oyido fodi col, aka kere oay i kanindo pere to waco ri jodhum pere ni, “Weyi awaci riwin gima Josiria jocano timo riwan. Joŋeyo nike kec nitie ka, ameno joweyo kambi pajo kadho pondo kam'othangere. Joparo nike wabino weyo tindi madwoŋ rango cemo ŋey jowomaki wan makwo to jomako tindi madwoŋ.”
Acel kwoŋ jodhum pa kere owaco ni, “Ji ma tindi madwoŋ me je jonitie i kidamba paka ma jotieko tho. Ameno weyi waori cwo mogo gi kayinin abic ma jodoŋ ŋey waniaŋ gim'otimere.”
Ameno joyero cwo mogo, aka kere ooro jo gi cawilin ario to ciko jo kidho niaŋ gim'otimere ri jolweny pa Josiria.
Cwo no jokadho tundo kiri Yordan, aka i yo malomalo joneno nangin kodi gigipiny ma Josiria jobolo munyo joringo. Kenyo jogik to jokowo ri kere.
Kenyo ji ma Samaria joredo aka jonyaga kambi pa Josiria. Aka paka Rwoth oyido owaco, kilo adek ma ŋano maber loyo kosa kilo aucel ma bale oyido itana feza acel.
Onwaŋere nike kere ma Isiraili oyido oketho jakur pere m'othenere i cinge kuro waŋkac. Ji jonyono go to tho paka Elisa oyido owaco munyo kere okidho bongi Elisa.
Elisa oyido owaco ri kere nike kapa sawa no ndelo ma yawere kilo adek ma ŋano kosa kilo aucel ma bale ibino nyewo gi feza acel,
ma jakur pere opiemo to dwoko ni, “Gino kinyal timere makada nende Rwoth won gipi oyido dhiri ŋano!” Aka Elisa odwoko go ni, “In won ibino neno gi waŋin, to ikibino camo cemo moro je.”
Aka meno a gim'otimere rigo, kole ji jonyono go to tho i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ.
Ameno dheno otimo gima Elisa owaco rigo to kadho bedo i piny Filistia ma oro abirio no.
Aka munyo oro abirio ma kec orumo, dheno ogik i Isiraili to kidho bongi kere kwayo wodwoki rigo ot pere kodi lowo pere.
Onyo kere oyido luwo gi Gehazi ŋeca pa Elisa gi atoŋa ma mito ŋeyo kwoŋ gir'aura pa Elisa.
Kome munyo Gehazi waco ri kere nike Elisa ocerino ŋat'otho, dheno ogoyo koko pere ri kere. Gehazi owaco ri kere ni, “Jadwoŋ me dhako, aka me wode ma Elisa ocerino.”
Aka munyo kere openjo dheno, oridho wac pa Gehazi. Ameno kere olwoŋo jadhum pere aka owaco rigo dwoko ri dheno gigipiny pere je, kodi magowa ma cemo kodi ndelin pere ma oro abirio ma go oyido ongoye.
Elisa okidho Damasiko i hongo ma kere Benhadad oyido two iye. Munyo owaci ri kere nike Elisa oyido nitie kenyo,
owaco ri Hazael, acel kwoŋ jodhum pere ni, “Ter mic ri jatuci wac Were, aka ikway go wopenji Rwoth k'inen anyalo both kosa be.”

Ameno Hazael otweyo nger mic je ma Damasiko i ŋamia piero aŋwen, to kidho bongi Elisa. Munyo Hazael oromo gi Elisa, owaco rigo ni, “Ŋeca perin kere Benhadad ma Siria ooran penjin ka go bino both kwoŋ two pere kosa be.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Rwoth otieko waco ran nike go bino tho; to kadhi bonge aka iwaci rigo nike go bino both.”
Kenyo Elisa ocomo waŋe kwoŋ Hazael cuka wickwot omako. Aka Elisa oywaki.
Hazael openjo go ni, “Jadwoŋ, raŋo iywaki?”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Kwoŋbedo aŋeyo raco m'ibino timo ri Joisiraili. Ibino waŋo cel pajo, ibino yaŋo cwo pajo ma nyaka joay, ibino thumo nyithindho pajo mathindho thindho, t'ibaro iy mon pajo ma joyac.”
Elisa odwoko ni, “Rwoth otieko nyuthan nike ibino bedo kere ma Siria.”
Hazael ogik bongi Benhadad m'openjo go ni, “Elisa owaco aŋo?”
Hazael odwoko ni, “Elisa owaco ran nike ibino bedo maber.”
To ndelo m'oyawere Hazael okwanyo bilangit, obilo gi pi aka ogeŋo gine ŋeti Benhadad cuka otho.
Aka Hazael olunjo Benhadad paka kere ma Siria.
I oro mar'abic ma dhum pa Yoram kere Isiraili, Yehoram wod pa Yehosafat obedo kere ma Yuda
munyo jaoro piero adek g'ario, aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro aboro.
Cege oyido obedo nyar Ahab, aka paka peco pa Ahab go bende oluwo yo mareco pa kerin ma Isiraili. Otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth,
to kucel Rwoth oyido kinyal reyo woko Yuda, ro cikirok pere ri ŋeca pere Daudi nike nyikway go jobino dhumo noknok.
Ameno Yehoram oay gi cawilin pere je kidho i Zayir kama Joedom jothoko jo. Wor Yehoram kodi jomituka cawilin pere jonyalo tur to jokwale, aka jolweny pere jokedhere kadho pecin pajo.
Wok i hongo no tundo gunyo ni, Edom ongoye i dhum pa Yuda. I hongo acel no, tindi madwoŋ Libina bende ogwenyere kwoŋ Yuda.
Gigipiny man je ma Yehoram otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Yehoram otho, aka oyiki go i limbo pa kerin i tindi pa Daudi madwoŋ, aka wode Ahazia olunjo go paka kere.
I oro mar'apar g'abic ma dhum pa Yoram wod pa Ahab paka kere ma Isiraili, Ahazia wod pa Yehoram obedo kere ma Yuda
munyo jaoro piero ario g'ario aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro acel. Yokimere oyido obedo Athalia nyar kere Ahab, aka nyakwar kere Omiri ma Isiraili.
Paka Ahazia oyido timo wat gi Ahab i nywomirok, otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth paka peco pa Ahab.
Kere Ahazia oriwere kodi Yoram kere ma Isiraili kwoŋ Hazael kere ma Siria. Jolweny pajo joromo i Ramoth Giliad, aka Yoram olimo litho i lweny.
Yoram odok i tindi madwoŋ Yezirel both adholin pere, aka Ahazia okidho kenyo wendo rigo.
Kenyo Elisa jatuci wac Were olwoŋo acel kwoŋ jotuci wac Were ma nyaka ay aka owaco rigo ni, “Yikere aka ikidhi i tindi Ramoth i Giliad. Ter agwata mo me kodin,
aka ka itundo, rangi Yehu wod pa Yehosafat aka nyakwar Nimisi. Kwany go kwoŋ wadi iter go i kisika kakende.
Kenyo kwany agwata mo, aka ikonji i wiye t'iwaco ni, ‘Rwoth waco nike owirin bedo kere ma Isiraili.’ Aka eye kenyo piyo.”
Ameno jatuci wac Were no okadho i Ramoth,
kam'onwaŋo jotel pa jolweny i romo aka owaco ni, “Jadwoŋ anitie gi mikwenda perin.”
Yehu openjo ni, “Ŋa kwoŋ wan m'iluwo gine?”
Go odwoko ni, “In jadwoŋ.”
Kenyo jario jokadho i ot, aka jatuci wac Were ma nyaka ay okonjo i wi Yehu mo to waco ni, “Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco ni, ‘Awirin bedo kere pa ji paran Isiraili.
Iripo neko jadwoŋ perin kere, wod pa Ahab no, ŋey amiy Yezebel gir'acula ma neko jotuci wac Were paran kodi ŋecin paran man.
Peco pa Ahab je kodi nyikwaye joripo tho; abino reyo woko cwo ma peco pere je mathindho kodi m'oti.
Abino timo ri peco pere paka peco pa Yerobowam wod pa Nebat kodi kere Basa wod pa Ahija.
Delkwoŋ Yezebel k'oyik iy'adec ma Yezirel, gwokere jobino camo.’ ” Kenyo jatuci wac Were oyawo thigo to ringo.
Munyo Yehu ogik bongi jotel pa jolweny wadi, jopenjo go ni, “Gigipiny je ber? Aŋo ma janeko no omito kwoŋin?”
Yehu odwoko ni, “Wiŋeyo go kodi luwo pere.”
Jodwoko ni, “Be wakuya! Waci riwan gima go owaco!”
Aka Yehu owaco ni, “Owaco ran nike Rwoth waco ni, ‘Awirin bedo kere ma Isiraili.’ ”
Kenyo jotel pa jolweny wadi joyaro nangin pajo i wi madala ri Yehu wocungi iye, jokudho gwara, aka jokoko ni, “Yehu obedo kere!”

Kenyo Yehu ocamo sereko ri Yoram m'oyido nitie i Yezirel kam'oyido okadh'iye cango adhola m'onwaŋo munyo lwenyo gi kere Hazael ma Siria i Ramoth. Ameno Yehu owaco ri jotel pa jolweny wadi ni, “Ka winitie kodan, neni win nike ongoye ŋat'okwale wok Ramoth kidho gwoko ji ma Yezirel.”
Kenyo Yehu oidho cawila pere to kadho i Ramoth. Yoram oyido k'obothi aka kere Ahazia ma Yuda oyido nitie kenyo owendo rigo.
Yoram odwoko ni, “Or jacwo gi kayina worom gi jo woŋey ka jobedo merin kosa jokwor.”
Ameno jamikwenda ogweco kiri bongi Yehu aka owaco ni, “Kere mito ŋeyo ka wibino i siem.”
Yehu odwoko ni, “Gir'atima aŋo m'initie gine gi siem? Wire igweci yu dieŋeyan.”
Jakur m'oyido nitie i wi acurcur owaco ni, “Jamikwenda otundo bongi jo, to kidwoki.”
Kenyo oor jamikwenda man m'openjo Yehu penji acel. Yehu kendo odwoko ni, “Gir'atima aŋo m'initie gine gi siem? Wire igweci yu dieŋeyan.”
Jakur owaco kendo ni, “Jamikwenda otundo bongi jo, to kidwoki. Aka gweco mere cale apa Yehu; kole go gweco pa janeko!”
Yoram owodho or nike woyik cawila pere aka otim ameno. Kenyo Yoram kodi Ahazia jogweyo kisi dhano cawila pere kidho romo gi Yehu. Joromo gi go i ndelo m'oyido obedo apa Naboth.
Yoram openjo ni, “Ibino i siem?”
Yehu odwoko ni, “Siem obedi nedi kafodi wanitie gi yido kodi lamo cal ma yokin Yezebel ocako?”
Yoram okoko ni, “Obedo camo sereko, Ahazia!” Aka Yoram owiro cawila pere to ringo.
Yehu ocelo asere pere gi meni pere je aka ocelo dieŋey Yoram to cwowo cunye. Yoram opodho to tho i cawila pere,
aka Yehu owaco ri jakur pere Bidikar ni, “Kwany delkwoŋe ibol i ndelo m'oyido obedo apa Naboth. Poyi nike an kodin oyido wagweco kanyacel yu dieŋey Ahab ba kere Yoram, Rwoth owaco gime kwoŋ Ahab:
‘Aneno neki pa Naboth kodi wote nyoro. Aka aciko nike abino miyin gir'acula i ndelo acel me.’ Ameno ter delkwoŋ Yoram ibol i ndelo m'oyido obedo apa Naboth, ŋey cikirok pa Rwoth wotundi i kare.”

Munyo Ahazia kere ma Yuda oneno gime, oringo yu tindi Beth Hagan. Yehu oriemo go aka omiyo cwo pere cik nike woneki go bende. Jowumiya go i cawila pere i yo ma kidho kiri Gur, cegin gi Ibilim. Aka Ahazia oringo kiri Megido to tho kenyo.
Jodhum pere jodwoko delkwoŋe i Yerusalem i cawila aka joyiko i kaliel pa kerin i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi.
Ahazia oyido obedo kere i oro mar'apar g'acel ma Yoram wod pa Ahab oyido kere ma Isiraili.
Munyo Yehu obino i Yezirel, Yezebel oyido otieko winjo gim'otimere. Ameno owiro biendi waŋe to goyo ye wiye, aka ocungo i dirisa to ŋiyo piny i yo i cel pa kere.
Munyo Yehu donjo i waŋkac, Yezebel owaco ni, “Obedo siem, in Zimiri, janek pa jadwoŋ perin?”
Yehu otiŋo waŋe malo i dirisa, aka okoko ni, “Ŋa manitie i thenge paran? Ŋa?” Ario kosa adek kwoŋ jodhum ma cel pa kere joŋiyo go piny gi dirisa,
aka Yehu owaco rijo ni, “Bol win go piny!” Jobolo Yezebel piny, aka remo pere okire i kor ot kodi kayinin. Yehu ogweyo kayinin kodi cawila pere kwoŋe,
odonjo i cel pa kere to cemo. Kenyo nyaka owaco ni, “Ter win delkwoŋ dhako m'okwoŋ no wiyiki, kole go obedo nyar kere.”
To munyo okidhi yiko go, onwaŋ nyaka pado wiye kodi cokin ma cinge kodi tiende.
Munyo owaci ri Yehu, owaco ni, “Me gima Rwoth owaco nike bino timere, munyo owaco luwo bongi ŋeca pere Elia ni, ‘Gwokere jobino camo delkwoŋ Yezebel iy'adec ma Yezirel.
Aka gigipiny m'odoŋ bino kedhirok kenyo pa woyo, ŋey wongoye ŋat'onyali waco ni, me Yezebel.’ ”
Onyo Ahab oyido nitie gi nyikwaye piero abirio ma jobedo i Samaria. Yehu ondiko balwin ri jodhum ma tindin madongo, jodongo, kodi ri jokur pa nyikway Ahab. Balwa no oyido waco ni,
“Nyikway kere jonitie i cingin aka winitie gi cawilin, kayinin, gilweny, kodi tindin madongo m'othok gi cel. Ameno tekin wilimo balwa me,
yer win nyakwar jadwoŋ mewin manitie gi nyalo, kethi win go kere, aka wilweny rigo.”
Jodhum ma Samaria jobwok aka jowaco ni, “Neni, kerin ario jok'onyalo cungo ruwaŋe, wan wanonyal nedi?”

Ameno jatel pa jolweny ma cel pa kere kodi jadhum ma tindi madwoŋ, kanyacel gi jodongo kodi jokur jodhiro ri Yehu mikwenda me ni, “Wabedo ŋecin perin aka wayikere timo gim'iwaco je. To wakibino ketho nyatoro kere; tim gimaber i waŋin.”
Yehu ondiko rijo balwa man ni, “Ka winitie i thenge paran aka wiyikere luwo cik paran, keli ran win wic nyikway Ahab i sawa me dikin.”
Onyo jodongo ma Samaria ama oyido jokuro nyikway Ahab.
Munyo balwa pa Yehu otundo, jotel ma Samaria joneko nyikway Ahab piero abirio je, joketho wic gin i aditin, aka jodhiro ri Yehu i Yezirel.
Munyo owaci ri Yehu nike okeli wic nyikway Ahab, owodho or nike wodhur jo i kidhur ario i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ aka wowey kenyo tundo yawere odikin.
Odikin, Yehu owok i waŋkac aka owaco ri ji ma kenyo ni, “An aŋat'acamo sereko ri kere Yoram t'aneko go; win wingoye gi banja. To ŋa m'oneko me gin?
Me ridho nike gima Rwoth owaco je kwoŋ nyikway Ahab bino tundo i kare. Rwoth otimo gim'ociko luwo bongi jatuci wac Were pere Elia.”
Kenyo Yehu oneko wade pa Ahab m'odoŋ je m'oyido jobedo i Yezirel, jotel pa jolweny pere, merin, kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam, cuka ongoye ŋat'odoŋ.
Yehu oeye Yezirel kadho i Samaria. I yo i kabedo m'ilwoŋo ni “Kambi pa jokwath rombo.”
Oromo gi wade pa Ahazia kere ma Yuda mogo, aka openjo jo ni, “Wibedo jokune?”
Jodwoko ni, “Wabedo wade pa Ahazia. Wakadho wendo ri nyithindho pa Yezebel yok kere kodi jopeco pa kere man.”
Yehu omiyo cwo pere cik ni, “Maki win jo makwo.” Jomako jo aka Yehu oneko jo cegin gi bur kenyo. Joje oyido piero aŋwen g'ario aka ongoye kwoŋ jo m'owey makwo.
Yehu oeye kenyo aka oromo gi Yehonadab wod pa Rekab. Yehu omotho go aka owaco rigo ni, “In, kodi an wanitie gi paro acel. Inothielan?”
Yehonadab odwoko ni, “Ey.”
Yehu odwoko ni, “Miyan cingin to.” Jogwaro cingi gin, aka Yehu okonyo Yehonadab idho i cawila,
ka waco ama: “Biye kodan ineni nger m'amiyere ri Rwoth.” Aka ogweyo Yehonadab i cawila pere.
Aka munyo Yehu otundo i Samaria, oneko wade pa Ahab m'oyido jodoŋ je ma k'oweyo kad'acel. Me a gima Rwoth oyido owaco ri Elia nike bino timere.
Kenyo Yehu ocoko ji je kanyacel, aka owaco rijo ni, “Ahab oyido lamo Bal roman, to an abino tiyo rigo kicutho.

Onyo riameno lwoŋ ran win jotuci wac were pa Bal je, ji ma jolamo go kodi jocway ri were i wi migam pere je; wongoye ŋata wokeŋ, rupiri anitie gi cowirok madwoŋ ma mito miyo Bal. Ŋata k'obino je bino tho.” (To me obedo rieko pa Yehu ŋey woneki ji m'oyido jolamo Bal je.)
Kenyo Yehu owodho or ni, “Kethi win ndelo ma lamo ma miyo Bal dwoŋ!” Ameno joketho ndelo.
Yehu odhiro wac i lowo ma Isiraili gipi. Ji je m'oyido jolamo Bal jobino m'ongoye ŋata k'obino. Joje jodonjo i ot pa Bal, aka ot opoŋ wok i gike tundo i gike.
Kenyo Yehu omiyo jocway ri were i wi migam m'oyido jokuro kabada wodho kanzin jowomiy ji m'oyido jolamo Bal.
Rumacen Yehu won odonjo i ot pa Bal gi Yehonadab wod pa Rekab aka owaco ri ji ni, “Neni win nike nyaka ji ma jolamo Bal kende ama jodonjo ka aka ongoye ŋata lamo Rwoth m'odonjo.”

Kenyo Yehu kodi Yehonadab jodonjo miyo cowirok kodi mic awaŋa ri Bal. Yehu oyido otieko ketho cwo piero aboro woko thoko ot pa Bal aka owaco rijo ni, “Wiripo neko ji me je; Ŋat'owey acel kwoŋ jo kwalok bino culo gi kwo pere!”

Ameno tekin Yehu ketho mic, owaco ri jokur kodi jotel pa jolweny ni, “Donji win wineki joje, wikiri wiwey kada ŋat'acel kwalok.” Jodonjo aka joneko joje g'abor, to jowotho delkwoŋ gin woko. Kenyo jodonjo i kisika ma iy ot pa Bal,
jowodho siro m'oyido nitie kenyo to jowaŋo woko.
Ameno jonyeko siro kodi ot pa Bal, aka joloko ot pa Bal coron ma fodi nitie kiri konon.
Ameno apaka Yehu ocungo lamo Bal i Isiraili.
To Yehu oluwo reco pa kere Yerobowam m'omiyo Isiraili timo reco ma lamo rwath dhok ma zahabu m'oketho i Bethel kodi i Dan.
Rwoth owaco ri Yehu ni, “Itieko timo ri nyikway Ahab gigipiny je m'oyido amito ni itimi. Ameno acikin ni nyikwayin, kiri i luse mar'aŋwen, jobino bedo kere i Isiraili.”
To Yehu k'oluwo cik pa Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili gi cunye je, kwanyo woko oluwo kite pa Yerobowam, m'omiyo Isiraili timo reco.
I hongo no Rwoth ocako ŋado woko adec pa Isiraili. Kere Hazael ma Siria omako adec je ma Isiraili
yuwok ceŋ ma Yordan, kiri yupiny kiri i tindi Arower i malawa Arnon. Me obedo adec ma Giliad kodi Basan, kama nonin pa Gad, Ruben, kodi yuwok ceŋ pa Manase oyido jobed'iye.
Gigipiny man je ma Yehu otimo kodi tim pere ma miseni ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Yehu otho aka oyiki go i Samaria, aka wode Yehoahaz olunjo go paka kere.
Yehu oyido odhumo i Samaria paka kere ma Isiraili ma oro piero ario g'aboro.
Onyo munyo Athalia yok Ahazia owinjo nike oneki wode, owodho or nike woneki ji ma peco pa kere je.
To Yehoseba, nyar kere Yoram, aka nyamin Ahazia, okwanyo Yowas wod pa kere Ahazia to kwalo go kwoŋ wote m'oyido icegin neko to ketho go kodi japidi pere i kisika i Ot pa Rwoth ŋey wokiri woneki go.
Yehoseba okano jayac i Ot pa Rwoth ma oro aucel munyo Athalia dhumo pa nyamicala.

To i oro mar'abirio Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam olwoŋo jatel pa jokur ma keri kodi jokur ma cel pa kere aka owaco rijo bino i Ot pa Rwoth, kam'omiyo jo yeyo i kwoŋirok gima go oyido ocano timo. Onyutho jo Yowas wod pa kere Ahazia
aka omiyo jo or me ni, “Me a gima wiripo timo ka wibino tic i ndelo ma Sabato, acel wiy adek kwoŋ win jowokuri cel pa kere,
acel wiy adek man jowokuri waŋkac ma Sur aka acel wiy adek man jowokuri waŋkac ma yuŋey jokur man.
Kitipin ario ma jokitiy i ndelo ma Sabato jowokuri kere i Ot pa Rwoth.
Wiripo kuro kere Yowas g'abor mewin i cingi win, aka ŋat'ocore cegin gi win woneki.”
Jotel pa jolweny joluwo gima Yehoyada owaco rijo aka jokelo cwo pajo bonge; meno ma jokitiy i ndelo ma Sabato, kodi meno ma jotiyo i ndelo ma Sabato.
Yehoyada omiyo jotel pa jolweny abore kodi kwote m'oyido obedo apa kere Daudi aka oyido okan i Ot pa Rwoth.
Oketho jokur, kisi jacwo g'abor i cinge thoko Ot pa Rwoth kuro kere.
Kenyo Yehoyada otelo Yowas woko, oketho sangaria i wiye, to wodho or ma dhumo paka kere. Kenyo owir Yowas aka onyuthi go paka kere. Ji jogoyo adhoŋ aka jokoko ni, “Yindira kere!”
Athalia nyamicala owinjo woy pa jokur kodi ji, aka oredo i Ot pa Rwoth, kama ji oyido jocokere iye.

Kenyo munyo go oŋiyo, kere oyido ocungo cegin gi siro i dhiot ma Ot pa Rwoth cungo kwoŋ kwer. Jotel pa jolweny, jokudhi gwara, kodi ji je oyido jokoko gi kisangala ka jokudho gwara. Athalia oyeco nangin pere i rem to koko ni, “Sereko, Sereko!”
Yehoyada oyido k'omito nike woneki Athalia cegin gi Ot pa Rwoth, ameno omiyo jotel pa jolweny cik ni, “Ter win go i dier bol pa jokur, aka neki win ŋat'otemi botho go je.”
Jomako go to jotero go i cel pa kere, aka joneko go kenyo i waŋkac pa Kayina.
Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam omiyo kere kodi ji timo cikirok gi Rwoth nike jobino bedo ji pa Rwoth, aka go bende otimo cikirok i dier kere kodi ji.
Kenyo ji je jokidho i ot pa Bal to jokedho piny; joŋinyo migame kodi cal je, to joneko Matan jacway ri were i wi migam pa Bal ruwaŋ migame.
Yehoyada oketho jokur tic i Ot pa Rwoth,

aka go, jotel pa jolweny, jokur pa kere, kodi jokur ma cel pa kere jokwaŋo kere wok i Ot pa Rwoth kiri i cel pa kere, kareno ji je joluwo jo. Yowas odonjo gi waŋkac pa jokur aka otero kabedo pere i kom pa kere.
Ji je oyido jopoŋ gi kisangala, aka tindi madwoŋ oyido okwe, paka Athalia oyido oneki i cel pa kere.
Yowas obedo kere ma Yuda munyo jaoro abirio.
I oro mar'abirio ma dhum pa Yehu kere ma Isiraili, Yowas obedo kere ma Yuda aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro piero aŋwen. Yokimere oyido obedo Zibia ma wok i tindi madwoŋ Berseba.
I kwo pere je Yowas otimo gim'osangala Rwoth kwoŋbedo Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam oyido waco rigo gir'atima.
To kad'ameno kalamo manyakafir k'onyek, aka ji jomedere miyo cowirok kodi waŋo buban kenyo.
Yowas olwoŋo jocway ri Were i wi migam aka omiyo jo or kano pesa m'iculo ma makere gi cowirok i Ot pa Rwoth, pesa m'iculo ma cowirok ma noknok kodi pesa ma ji jomiyo paka mic ma wegi joyeyo.
Kisi jacway ri Were i wi migam oyido ripo coko pesa wok bongi ji ma go tiyo rijo, aka pesa oyido iripo oro ma yiko gine Ot pa Rwoth.
To i oro ma piero ario g'adek ma dhum pa Yowas, jocway ri Were i wi migam oyido fodi jok'oyiko Ot pa Rwoth.
Ameno Yowas olwoŋo Yehoyada kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam man aka openjo ni, “Raŋo wikiyiki Ot pa Rwoth? Onyo riameno wok pama me wikiripi kano pesa ma wicoko; to miy win woor ma yiko Ot pa Rwoth.”
Jocway ri Were i wi migam joyeyo gime aka bende joyeyo yiko Ot pa Rwoth.

Kenyo Yehoyada okwanyo sanduku ma mbawo, oŋado hoŋ i wiye to ketho cegin gi migam yuracuc ka nyaka idonjo i Ot pa Rwoth. Jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jonitie i tic joketho pesa je ma ji ma jobino lamo jomiyo i sanduku.
Kisi ka joneno nike pesa oromo i sanduku, jandiko pa kere kodi jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam oyido jokwano to jotweyo i mugowa pesa m'olimere i Ot pa Rwoth.
Ka jotieko ndiko welo pesa m'otire, oyido joketho i cingi cwo ma joneno paka iyiko Ot pa Rwoth, aka jome oyido joculo jopac, jogeto
jogeto kor ot kodi joŋadi telin, jonyewo mbawo kodi telin m'ioro, to joculo pesa ma tic man je.
To pesa me k'oor ma timo kikopere ma feza, acero, gwarin, kosa gigipiny ma tala kosa gigipiny man je ma feza kosa zahabu.
Oor je ma culo jotic kodi nyewo gigipiny m'oor ma yiko Ot pa Rwoth.
Cwo m'oyido joneno paka iyiko Ot pa Rwoth oyido jotimo adieri, ameno k'openji jo tito nger ma jo oro iye pesa.
Pesa ma mic ma cul kodi pesa ma mic mareco k'okethi i sanduku; oyido obedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam.

Kere Yowas ma Yuda okwanyo mic je ma Yehosafat, Yehoram, kodi Ahazia oyido jomiyo Rwoth, omedo kwoŋ mic pere kodi zahabu je m'oyido nitie i kakan ma Ot pa Rwoth kodi i cel pa kere, aka odhiro ri Hazael to Hazael eye Yerusalem.
Gigipiny man je ma kere Yowas otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Jodhum pere jocamo rigo sereko to joneko go i ot m'oyido ogeti i lowo m'opoŋ yuwok ceŋ ma Yerusalem, i yo ma kidho piny i Sila.
Obedo jodhum pere Yozakar wod pa Simith kodi Yehozabad wod pa Soma ama joneko go. Oyiki go i kaliel pa kerin i tindin madongo pa Daudi, aka wode Amaziya olunjo go paka kere.
I oro ma piero ario g'adek ma dhum pa Yowas paka kere ma Yuda, Yehoahaz obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo i Samaria ma oro apar g'abirio.
Oluwo tim pa Yerobowam, aka otimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth to miyo Isiraili timo reco, go k'oŋuto weyo tim pere marac.
Ameno nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ Isiraili, aka oweyo kere Hazael ma Siria kodi wode Benhadad kikengila Isiraili kisi hongo.
Kenyo kere Yehoahaz okwayo Rwoth, aka munyo Rwoth oneno nger ma kere ma Siria oyido diyo Joisiraili, odwoko kwayo pere.
Riameno Rwoth omiyo Joisiraili jatel m'obotho jo wok i cingi Josiria, aka Joisiraili jobedo gi siem paka con.
To Joisiraili jok'oŋuto reco ma kere Yerobowam omiyo jo timo, to jomedere timo, aka cal pa were madhako Asera odoŋ i Samaria.
Yehoahaz oyido odoŋ nyaka gi cwo piero abic ma jogwey kayina, cawila apar, kodi cwo 10,000 ma jowotho, kwoŋbedo kere ma Siria oyido oreyo ma jodoŋ to nyono jo paka fukefuke.
Gigipiny man je ma kere Yehoahaz otimo kodi tim pere ma miseni ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Go otho aka oyiki go i Samaria to wode Yehowas lunjo go paka kere.
I oro ma piero adek g'abirio ma dhum pa kere Yowas ma Yuda, Yehowas obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo i Samaria ma oro apar g'aucel.
Go bende otimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth aka oluwo kite pa kere Yerobowam, m'omiyo Isiraili timo reco.
Gigipiny man je ma Yehowas otimo kodi tim ma miseni i lweny kwoŋ kere Amaziya ma Yuda ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Yehowas otho aka oyiki go i kaliel pa kerin i Samaria, to wode Yerobowam mar'ario lunjo go paka kere.
Aka Elisa owaco rigo ni, “Kwany atum abor kodi aserin.” Aka go okwanyo.
Kenyo Elisa owaco rigo ni, “Yikere celo.” Kere otimo ameno aka Elisa oketho cinge kwoŋ cingi kere.

Kenyo kere oluwo wac pa Elisa to yawo dirisa ma ŋiyo Siria. Elisa omiyo go or ni, “Cel asere.” Aka tekin kere celo, Elisa owaco ni, “Ibedo asere pa Rwoth ma bino loyo gine Josiria. Ibino lweny gi Josiria i Afek cuka inokengila jo.”
Kenyo Elisa owaco ri kere nike wokwany aserin m'odoŋ wocel gine piny i lowo. Kere ocelo piny didek kende to weyo.
Elisa omako nge gi kere aka owaco ni, “Oyido iripo celo piny dibic kosa diucel, ŋey ikengila Josiria kicutho; to ibino kikengila jo didek kende.”
Elisa otho aka oyiki go.
Onyo kisi oro kitipa pa Jomowab oyido jomonjo lowo ma Isiraili.

Ndelo acel, onen acel kwoŋ kitipin no i kaliel pa jacwo moro, aka ji m'oyido jotiŋo del jobolo i kaliel pa Elisa to joringo woko. Tekin del no geyo cokin pa Elisa, jacwo no kwo pere odwoko to ay malo.
Kere Hazael ma Siria odiyo Joisiraili i hongo ma dhum pa Yehoahaz je.
To Rwoth omako gi jo wor kodi wor aka k'oweyo orey jo woko, to okonyo jo ro cikirok pere gi Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo; aka go wiye k'owil gi ji pere.
Munyo kere Hazael ma Siria otho, wode Benhadad obedo kere.
Kenyo kere Yehowas ma Isiraili okengila Benhadad didek aka omako tindin madongo m'oyido Benhadad omako i hongo ma dhum pa Yehoahaz, ba Yehowas.
I oro mar'ario ma dhum pa Yehowas wod pa Yehoahaz paka kere ma Isiraili, Amaziya wod pa Yowas obedo kere ma Yuda
munyo jaoro piero ario g'abic, aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro piero ario g'abuŋwen. Yokimere oyido obedo Yehoadin ma wok i Yerusalem.
Go otimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth, to k'otimo paka kwari mere Daudi, kwanyo woko paka bamere Yowas.
Go k'onyeko kalamo manyakafir, aka ji jomedere miyo cowirok kodi waŋo buban kenyo.
Tekin Amaziya cwiny i dhum, oneko jodhum ma joneko bamere, kere.

To go k'oneko nyithindho pajo, oluwo cik ma Rwoth omiyo Musa ni, “Jonywol kiripi neko jo ro reco pa nyithindho pajo, aka nyithindho kiripi neko ro reco pa jonywol pajo; to kisi nyatoro iripo neko ro reco pere won.”
Amaziya oneko jolweny ma Edom 10,000 i milelo ma cumbi to mako tindi madwoŋ Sela aka olwoŋo ni Yokithel, nyinge ma fodi nitie gine kiri konon.
Kenyo Amaziya ooro jomikwenda bongi kere Yehowas ma Isiraili, munyo mito jowolweny.
To kere Yehowas dwoko ni, “Ndelo acel kasugu kudho i gote ma Lebanon odhiro mikwenda ri yath sida ni, ‘Miyan nyarin wonywomere gi wodan.’ Ogwaŋ madudi oluwo to nyono kasugu no piny.
Onyo Amaziya, ikengila Joedom, aka ipoŋ gi noro. Yeŋ gi dwoŋ perin aka ibedi peco. Raŋo irango teko ŋey ipodhi, in kodi Yuda kanyacel?”
To Amaziya okwero winjo. Ameno Yehowas kere ma Isiraili oŋanjo gi cwo pere aka olwenyo gi Amaziya i Bethsemes i Yuda.
Isiraili okengila Yuda, aka jolweny joringo pecin pajo.
Yehowas otero Amaziya paka jatwec, aka obino Yerusalem to turo woko kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ wok i Waŋkac ma Efrayim tundo i Waŋkac ma Sonda, boro ma romo mita miya ario.
Okwanyo feza je kodi zahabu je ma go onwaŋo, gigipiny je ma Ot pa Rwoth kodi lim je ma cel pa kere to tero i Samaria. Go bende omako ji.
Gigipiny man je ma Yehowas otimo kiri gi tim pere ma miseni i lweny kwoŋ kere Amaziya ma Yuda ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Yehowas otho aka oyiki go i kaliel pa kerin i Samaria, aka wode Yerobowam mar'ario olunjo go paka kere.
Kere Amaziya okwo ma oro apar g'abic rumacen ma tho pa kere Yehowas ma Isiraili.
Gigipiny man je ma Amaziya otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Oyido ocan neko Amaziya, ameno go oringo i tindi madwoŋ Lakis. To jokwor pere joluwo go kenyo to joneko go.
Otiŋ delkwoŋe i kayina to itero i Yerusalem aka oyiki go i kaliel pa kerin i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi.
Kenyo ji ma Yuda joketho Uziya wode ma jaoro apar g'aucel paka kere.
Uziya omako Elath aka ogeto kendo to dwoko ri Yuda rumacen ma tho pa bamere.
I oro mar'apar g'abic ma dhum pa kere Amaziya wod pa Yowas paka kere ma Yuda, Yerobowam wod pa Yehowas obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo i Samaria ma oro piero aŋwen g'acel.
Otimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth, ka luwo kite pa Yerobowam wod pa Nebat, m'omiyo Isiraili timo reco.
Omako adec je m'oyido obedo apa Isiraili wok i ger ma Hamath tundo i Nam ma Araba, cungo kwoŋ wac ma Rwoth oluwo luwo bongi ŋeca pere jatuci wac Were Yona wod pa Amitay ma wok i Gath Hefer.
Kole Rwoth oneno nike litho pa Joisiraili oyido kec; oyido ongoye ŋat'okony jo.
To oyido k'obedo atoŋa pa Rwoth nike worey woko Joisiraili kicutho aka cil gi cil, ameno obotho jo luwo kwoŋ kere Yerobowam mar'ario.
Gigipiny man je ma kere Yerobowam mar'ario otimo, tim pere ma miseni, kodi nger m'odwok'iye Damasiko kodi Hamath ri Isiraili ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Yerobowam otho aka oyiki go i kaliel pa kerin, aka wode Zekaria olunjo go paka kere.
I oro mar'apar g'abirio ma dhum pa Yerobowam mar'ario kere ma Isiraili, Uziya obedo kere ma Yuda
munyo jaoro apar g'aucel aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro piero abic g'ario. Yokimere oyido obedo Yekolia ma wok i Yerusalem.
Go oluwo kite pa bamere, aka otimo gim'osangala Rwoth.
To kalamo manyakafir k'orey, aka ji jomedere miyo cowirok kodi waŋo buban kenyo.
Rwoth ogoyo Uziya gi two dhowo m'oramo go i kwo pere m'odoŋ je. Uziya obedo i ot pere munyo kidhum, aka wode Yotham am'oyido dhumo piny Yuda.
Gigipiny man je ma Uziya otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Kere Uziya otho aka oyiki go i kaliel pa kerin i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi, aka wode Yotham olunjo go paka kere.
I oro ma piero adek g'aboro ma dhum pa Uziya kere ma Yuda, Zekaria wod pa Yerobowam mar'ario obedo kere ma Isiraili aka odhumo i Samaria ma dwe aucel.
Paka kerin ma jotelo dhumo rigo, otimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth to luwo kite pa kere Yerobowam wod pa Nebat m'omiyo Joisiraili timo reco.
Salum wod pa Yabes ocamo sereko ri kere Zekaria to neko go i Ibilim aka olunjo go paka kere.
Gigipiny man je ma Zekaria otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
I oro ma piero adek g'abuŋwen ma dhum pa kere Uziya ma Yuda, Salum wod pa Yabes obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo i Samaria ma dwe acel.
Menahem wod pa Gad owok Tiriza to kidho Samaria, oneko Salum, to lunjo go paka kere.
Gigipiny man je ma Menahem otimo kiri gi nger m'ocamo iye sereko ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Munyo Menahem owok i Tiriza, oreyo woko tindi madwoŋ Tapuwa kicutho, ji mere, kodi adec m'othoko, kwoŋbedo jokwero tiŋo cingi gin malo rigo. Go obaro kiri iy mon je m'oyido joyac.
I oro ma piero adek g'abuŋwen ma dhum pa kere Uziya ma Yuda, Menahem wod pa Gad obedo kere Isiraili, aka odhumo i Samaria ma oro apar.
Go otimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth, cuka ndelo ma tho pere oluwo kite pa kere Yerobowam wod pa Nebat m'omiyo Isiraili timo reco tundo ndelo ma tho pere.
Tiglath Pilesa, kere ma Asiria omonjo Isiraili, aka Menahem omiyo go kilo 34,000 ma feza ma dwoŋo go ŋey woridhi dhum pere i Isiraili.
Menahem okwanyo pesa wok bongi joŋaŋo ma Isiraili gi romo kisi acel kwoŋ jo culo feza piero abic. Ameno Tiglath Pilesa ogik i piny pere.
Gigipiny man je ma Menahem otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
Menahem otho aka oyiki go, to wode Pekahia lunjo go paka kere.
I oro ma piero abic ma dhum pa Uziya paka kere ma Yuda, Pekahia wod pa Menahem obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo i Samaria ma oro ario.
Otimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth, ka luwo kite pa kere Yerobowam wod pa Nebat m'omiyo Isiraili timo reco.
Jatel pa jolweny pa Pekahia m'ilwoŋo ni Peka wod pa Remalia ocamo rigo sereko gi cwo piero abic ma jowok Giliad, oneko Pekahia kama tek loyo i cel pa kere i Samaria to lunjo go paka kere.
Gigipiny man je ma Pekahia otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
I oro ma piero abic g'ario ma dhum pa kere Uziya ma Yuda, Peka wod pa Remalia obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo i Samaria ma oro piero ario.
Go otimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth, ka luwo kite pa Yerobowam wod pa Nebat m'omiyo Isiraili timo reco.

Obedo munyo Peka kere ma Isiraili ma Tiglath Pilesa kere ma Asiria omako tindi madongo ma Ijon, Abel Beth Maka, Yanowa, Kedes, Hazor, kodi adec ma Giliad, Galili, Nafital, to tero ji mere paka jotwec i Asiria.
I oro ma piero ario ma dhum pa Yotham wod pa Uziya kere ma Yuda, Hosea wod pa Ela ocamo ri kere Peka sereko, oneko go, to lunjo go paka kere.
Gigipiny man je ma Peka otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.
I oro mar'ario ma dhum pa Peka wod pa Remalia paka kere ma Isiraili, Yotham wod pa Uziya obedo kere ma Yuda
munyo jaoro piero ario g'abic, aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro apar g'aucel. Yokimere oyido obedo Yerusa, nyar Zadok.
Oluwo kite pa bamere Uziya to timo gim'osangala Rwoth.
To kalamo manyakafir k'orey, aka ji jomedere miyo cowirok kodi waŋo buban kenyo. Yotham ama ogeto Waŋkac ma Yumalo ma Ot pa Rwoth.
Gigipiny man je ma Yotham otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Obedo i hongo ma dhum pere ama Rwoth ocako dhiro kere Rezin ma Siria kodi kere Peka wod pa Remalia monjo Yuda.
Yotham otho aka oyiki go i kaliel pa kerin i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi, aka wode Ahaz olunjo go paka kere.
I oro ma dhum pa Peka wod pa Remalia, paka kere ma Isiraili, Ahaz wod pa Yotham obedo kere ma Yuda
munyo jaoro piero ario aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro apar g'aucel. Go k'oluwo kite maber paka kwari mere Daudi; kwanyo woko otimo gima k'osangala Rwoth Were pere.
To oluwo kite marac paka kerin ma Isiraili. Go omiyo kiri wode paka cowirok awaŋa ri cal, kanyo luwo gimienirok ma ji ma Rwoth oyido oriemo woko i piny no oyido jotimo munyo Joisiraili jobino kenyo.
Ahaz omiyo cowirok to waŋo buban i kalamo cal je, i wi tendere, kodi i tiendi yen m'oyukino.
I hongo acel no kere ma Edom omako tindi madwoŋ Elath kendo, aka oriemo woko Joyuda m'oyido jobedo kenyo. Joedom jobedo kenyo kiri konon.
Ahaz ooro cwo bongi Tiglath Pilesa, kere ma Asiria gi mikwenda ni, “Abedo ŋeca perin m'omiyere. Biye bothan kwoŋ kerin ma Siria kodi Isiraili ma jomonjan.”
Ahaz okwanyo feza gi zahabu wok i Ot pa Rwoth kodi wok i kakan pa kere aka odhiro paka mic ri kere ma Asiria.
Kere ma Asiria owinjo go, aka oŋanjo gi jolweny pere kwoŋ Damasiko omako to neko kere Rezin aka okadho gi ji i Kir paka jotwec ma lweny.
Munyo kere Ahaz okidho Damasiko romo gi kere Tiglath Pilesa, oneno migam kenyo aka odhiro ri Uriya jacway ri Were i wi migam cal mere kodi gigipiny mathindho thindho je.
Ameno Uriya ogeto migam ma cale gine aka ocowo mafodi Ahaz k'odwoko.
Munyo kere Ahaz odwoko wok i Damasiko oneno nike migam oyido orumo,
aka omiyo iye cowirok awaŋa mar'ogwaŋe kodi ŋano, aka okonjo cowirok ma vini i wi migam kodi remo paka mic ma siem.
Migam ma ywel m'oyido omiy Rwoth oyido nitie i dier migam manyen kodi Ot pa Rwoth, to Ahaz ocoro i thenge ma yumalo ma migam manyen.

Kenyo kere Ahaz omiyo Uriya cik ni, “Or migam paran madwoŋ me ri cowirok awaŋa m'odikin kodi cowirok ma ŋano pa kere kodi ji, kodi mic pa ji ma vini. Konji iye remo mar'ogwaŋe m'omiy, to weyi migam ma ywel ran ma thieth.”
Uriya otimo paka kere owodho or.
Aka ma kisangala kere ma Asiria, Ahaz bende okwanyo woko wema m'oyido ioro ma lamo i ndelo ma Sabato, to cego woko kama kere oyido donjo gine Ot pa Rwoth.
Gigipiny man je ma kere Ahaz otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Ahaz otho aka oyiki go i limbo pa kerin i tindi pa Daudi madwoŋ, aka wode Hezekia olunjo go paka kere.
I oro mar'apar g'ario ma dhum pa Ahaz kere ma Yuda, Hoseya wod pa Ela obedo kere ma Isiraili, aka odhumo i Samaria ma oro abuŋwen.
Otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, to ki paka kerin ma Isiraili ma jopen dhum rigo.
Kere Salimanesa ma Asiria ocako lweny gi Hoseya, Hoseya otiŋo cinge malo rigo, to cako culo go misolo kisi oro.
To oro acel, Hoseya ooro jomikwenda bongi kere So ma Misir, aka oweyo culo misolo ri Siria. Munyo Salimanesa oŋeyo gime omako Hoseya to ketho go i katwec.
Kenyo Salimanesa omonjo Isiraili aka othoko Samaria ma oro adek.

I oro mar'abuŋwen ma dhum pa Hoseya, kere ma Asiria omako Samaria, aka otero Joisiraili i Asiria paka jotwec lweny. Oketho jo bedo i tindi madwoŋ Hala, megi cegin gi malawa Habor iy'adec ma Gozan, aka megi i tindin madongo ma Madiya.
Samaria opodho kwoŋbedo Joisiraili oyido jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth Were pajo, m'obotho jo wok i cingi Farawo kere ma Misir to wodho jo wok i Misir kam'oyido jolamo iye werin man.
Oyido joluwo kwer pa ji man ma Rwoth oyido oriemo jo woko ruwaŋ Joisiraili, kodi kwer ma kerin ma Isiraili oyido jocako.
Joisiraili jotimo gigipiny ma Rwoth Were pajo okwero rijo. Jogeto kalamo werin man i kisi tindi pajo, wok kwoŋ calin mathindho tundo kwoŋ tindin madongo loyo.
Joketho sirin ma tele kodi cal pa were madhako Asera i wi tendere je kodi i tiendi yen madongo.
Jowaŋo buban i wi migam manyakafir je, ka joluwo tim pa ji ma Rwoth oriemo woko i lowo no. Jokwinyo nge pa Rwoth gi tim pajo ma kidakana,
aka jok'oluwo Or pa Rwoth ma waco nike ikir'ilam cal.

Kucel Rwoth oyido ooro jomikwenda pere kodi jotuci wac Were gwoko Joisiraili kodi Joyuda ni, “Wire win kwoŋ tim mewin mareco aka wikuri Or paran kodi cik paran, cungo kwoŋ cik je m'amiyo kwarere mewin, kodi m'amiyo win luwo kwoŋ jotuci wac Were.”
To jok'onyalo winjo, kwanyo woko jobedo gi wictek paka kwarere pajo, ma jok'oyeyo i Rwoth Were pajo.

Jocayo cik pa Rwoth, kodi cikirok m'otimo gi kwarere pajo aka jokwero winjo fonji pere. Jolamo cal ma bukony aka wegi bende jolokere ji ma bukony, to joluwo kwer pa nonin m'othoko jo, ma Rwoth oyido owodho or nike jokiri jowotimi paka jo.
Joturo cik pa Rwoth Were pajo aka jotimo cal ma rwath ario gi nyweny to jolamo, jo bende jotimo cal pa were madhako Asera, jolamo micalin, to jotiyo ri were m'ilwoŋo ni Bal.
Jomiyo nyithindho pajo paka mic awaŋa ri werin manyakafir, jothiedho, aka jomiyere kicutho timo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, to jokwinyo nge pere.
Riameno Rwoth omako nge gi Isiraili to kwanyo jo woko ruwaŋe aka oweyo keri ma Yuda kende.
To ji ma Yuda bende jok'okuro Or pa Rwoth Were pajo, joluwo kwer ma Joisiraili jocako.
Rwoth ojwango Joisiraili je, omiyo jo gir'acula, to miyo jo i cingi jokwor mager cuka okwanyo jo woko ruwaŋe.
Munyo Rwoth otieko tiako woko Isiraili kwoŋ Yuda, oketho Yerobowam wod pa Nebat bedo kere pajo. Yerobowam omiyo jo kwero Rwoth, to miyo jo timo reco madwoŋ.
Joisiraili jotimo reco ma Yerobowam oyido timo,
cuka Rwoth okwanyo jo woko ruwaŋe, paka oyido owaco luwo kwoŋ ŋecin pere jotuci wac Were. Ameno oter Joisiraili bedo jowiloka i Asiria kama fodi jobed'iye.
Kere ma Asiria okelo ji wok i tindin madongo, Babilon, Kuth, Iva, Hamath, kodi Sefavayim to joloko tindin madongo i Samaria apajo makiweno Joisiraili.
Munyo nyaka jocako bedo kenyo, jok'olamo Rwoth, aka Rwoth odhiro simbwore m'oneko megi kwoŋ jo.
Ameno t'iwaco ri kere ma Asiria nike ji m'oketho i tindin madongo i Samaria jokuya cik pa were ma lowo no, aka riameno were odhiro simbwore m'oyido neko jo.
Kere ma Asiria owodho or nike wodwoki acel kwoŋ jocway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido jotero paka jatwec wobedi kenyo ka fonjo ji cik pa were ma lowo no.
Ameno acel kwoŋ jacway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido jotero obino to bedo i Bethel, aka ofonjo nger ma lworo Rwoth.
To ji m'oyido jobedo i Samaria jomedere timo cal, aka joketho i sawin ma Joisiraili oyido jogeto. Kisi kitipa jotimo cal i tindin madongo m'oyido jobed'iye.
Ji ma Babilon jotimo cal pa were Sukoth Benoth, ji ma Kuth jotimo cal pa Nagal, ji ma Hamath jotimo cal pa Asima,
ji ma Iva jotimo cal pa Nibihaz kodi Tartak, aka ji ma Sefavayim jomiyo nyithindho pajo paka cowirok ma mic awaŋa ri werin pajo Adramelek kodi Anamelek.
Jome oyido jolamo Rwoth, aka joyero ji m'opokere bedo jocway ri Were i wi migam i kalamo pajo manyakafir kodi miyo cowirok rijo kenyo.
Ameno jolamo Rwoth, to bende jolamo werin pajo cungo kwoŋ kwer pajo ma piny ma jowok'iye.
Rwoth oyido otimo gi jo cikirok aka omiyo jo or ni, “Wikiri wilam werin man, wikiri wikule piny rijo kosa wotiy rijo kosa wimiy jo cowirok.
Wiripo winjan, Rwoth, m'owodho win wok i Misir gi dwoŋ kodi meni; wiripo kule ran piny to wimiyan cowirok.
Wiripo luwo cik kodi Or m'andiko riwin. Wikiri wilwor werin man,
aka wiwin wokiri wowil gi cikirok m'atimo gi win.
Wiripo winjan, Rwoth Were mewin, aka abino botho win kwoŋ jokwor mewin.”
To jono jok'onyalo winjo, aka jomedere luwo kwer pajo macon.
Ameno jono jolamo Rwoth, to bende jolamo cal pajo, aka kiri konon nyikway jo jomedere timo gimoro acel.
I oro mar'adek ma dhum pa wod pa Ela, Hoseya kere ma Isiraili, Hezekia wod pa Ahaz obedo kere ma Yuda,
munyo jaoro piero ario g'abic aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro piero ario g'abuŋwen. Yokimere oyido ilwoŋo ni Abija, nyar Zekaria.
Oluwo kite pa kwari mere Daudi, aka otimo gim'osangala Rwoth.

Onyeko woko kalamo manyakafir, oturo woko sirin ma telin, to toŋo woko cal pa were madhako Asera. Go bende oturo woko thwol ma ywel ma Musa oyido otimo m'ilwoŋo ni Nehusitan, kole cuka ndelo no Joisiraili oyido fodi jowaŋo rigo buban ma miyo go dwoŋ.
Hezekia oketho geno pere kwoŋ Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili; Yuda k'obedo gi kere man kendo paka go, kwoŋ ma jopen dhumo rigo kosa ma jodhumo rumacen.
Go obedo g'adieri ri Rwoth aka k'okwero winjo Rwoth, to, oneno nike okuro Or je ma Rwoth oyido omiyo Musa.
Ameno Rwoth obedo gi go, aka kisi gima go otimo okidho maber. Ogwenyere kwoŋ kere ma Asiria aka okwero tiyo rigo.
Hezekia okengila Jofilistia, aka onyaga pecin pajo wok kwoŋ cale mathin loyo tundo kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ loyo, kiri gi Gaza kodi adec m'othoko.
I oro mar'aŋwen ma dhum pa Hezekia, m'oyido obedo oro mar'abirio ma dhum pa kere Hoseya wod pa Ela, kere Salimanesa ma Asiria omonjo Isiraili to cego Samaria.
I oro mar'adek ma cego, Samaria opodho. Me oyido oro mar'aucel ma dhum pa Hezekia, aka oro mar'abuŋwen ma dhum pa Hoseya.
Kere ma Asiria otero Joisiraili i Asiria paka jotwec aka oketho i tindi madwoŋ Hala, megi cegin gi malawa Habor iy'adec ma Gozan, aka megi i tindin madongo ma Mediya.
Samaria opodho kwoŋbedo Joisiraili jok'owinjo Rwoth Were pajo, to joturo cikirok ma Rwoth otimo gi jo aka jok'oluwo cik ma ŋeca pa Rwoth, Musa oyido omiyo jo. Jok'onyalo winjo kosa luwo.
I oro mar'apar g'aŋwen ma dhum pa kere Hezekia, Senakerib kere ma Asiria omonjo tindin madongo m'otinda ma Yuda to mako.

Hezekia ooro jamikwenda bongi Senakerib m'oyido nitie i Lakis ni, “Atimo gi komo, mondo weyi monjan, aka abino culin gim'inomiti je.” Senakerib odwoko nike Hezekia wodhiri rigo kilo 10,000 ma feza kodi kilo gana acel ma zahabu.
Hezekia odhiro ri Senakerib feza je ma Ot pa Rwoth kodi ma kakan ma ot pa kere.
Hezekia bende ohalo woko zahabu ma thigin ma Ot pa Rwoth kodi zahabu ma go won oyido oumo gine miangin ma thigin, to dhiro ri Senakerib.

Senakerib ooro jolweny madwoŋ wok i Lakis monjo Hezekia i Yerusalem; aka oyido telere gi jodhum pere adek ma malo. Munyo jotundo, jocungo i yo ma jokwoc nangin jotiyo iye, yu fereji ma kelo pi i kidiwa ma malo.
Kenyo jolwoŋo Hezekia, aka jodhum pere adek jokidho romo gi jo; Eliakim wod pa Hilikia m'oyido jatel ma peco pa kere, Sebina jandiko ma kapido, kodi Yowa wod pa Asaf m'oyido jandiki gima timere je.
Acel kwoŋ jodhum ma Asiria owaco rijo ni, “Kere ma Asiria mito ŋeyo gima miyo Hezekia bedo gi miseni ameno.
Iparo nike wac kende nyalo tero kabedo pa gilweny kodi meni? Ŋa m'iparo nike bino konyin gwenyirok kwoŋ Asiria?
Neni, igeno nike kere ma Misir bino konyin, to meno kedi luth m'otur, ma bino cwowo cingi ŋata thenere kwoŋe. Ameno apaka Farawo kere ma Misir nitie ri jono ma jogeno go.”
“Kosa winowaci ran nike wigeno Rwoth Were mewin. Obedo sawin pa Rwoth kodi migame pere ma Hezekia onyeko, munyo owaco ri ji ma Yuda gi Yerusalem lamo i migam ma Yerusalem kende.
Onyo biye win, wabedi gi piem i nyingi kere ma Asiria. Abino miyo win kayinin gana ario ka winonwaŋ cwo ma romo ma jonyalo gweyo jo!
Wikinyal kiri lweny gi jadhum mathin loyo i Asiria, aka kucel wiparo nike Misir bino dhiro riwin cawilin kodi cwo ma jogweyo kayinin!
Kole Rwoth won ama okonyan monjo piny mewin. Rwoth won ama owaco ran nike amonji aka irey woko.”
Kenyo Eliakim, Sebina, kodi Yowa jowaco rigo ni, “Jadwoŋ, luw gi wan dhoaramayik. Ikir'iluw gi wan dhohiburu, kwoŋbedo ji ma kor ot je jowinjo.”
Go odwoko ni, “Wiparo nike kere ooran waco riwin kodi kere kende gime? Be aluwo bende gi ji ma jobedo i kor ot, ma bende jobino camo ceth pajo to jomadho lac pajo, paka win bende.”
Kenyo go oay malo aka okoko i dhohiburu ni, “Winji win gima kere madwoŋ, kere ma Asiria waco riwin!
Go gwoko win nike wikiri wiyey Hezekia wowondi win. Go kinyal botho win wok i cingan.
Aka wikiri wiyey go wodwoŋi win geno Rwoth. Wikiri wipar nike Rwoth bino konyo win, kosa nike go bino juko jolweny mawan ma Asiria mako tindi madwoŋ me.
Wikiri wiwinji Hezekia; kole kere ma Asiria waco ni, ‘Tim win siem kodan aka wiwok bongan, kenyo kisi nyatoro bino camo vini pere, kodi nyandere pere, aka kisi nyatoro bino madho pi ma waŋ pere won;

cuka anobin t'atero win i lowo ma cale lowo mewin, lowo ma ŋano kodi vini, lowo ma mugat kodi ndelo vini, lowo ma yen oliv kodi mo kic, ŋey wikiri witho to wikwo. Wikiri wiyey Hezekia womiŋi win paro nike Rwoth bino botho win.
Nitie were pa piny moro je m'otieko botho lowo pere wok i cingi kere ma Asiria?
Werin ma Hamath kodi Aripad jonitie kune? Werin ma Sefarivayim, Hena, kodi Iva jonitie kune? Jobotho Samaria wok i cingan?
Keraŋo ma werin ma piny me je jobotho piny pajo wok i cingan, ma Rwoth ripo botho Yerusalem wok i cingan?’ ”
To ji oyido joliŋ aka jok'odwoko go. Kole kere oyido owodho or ni, “Wikiri widwoki go.”
Kenyo Eliakim, Sebina, kodi Yowa joyeco nangin pajo i rem, aka jokidho to jokowo ri kere gima jadhum ma Asiria oyido owaco.
Munyo kere Hezekia owinjo radwok pajo, oyeco nangin pere i rem to ruko kutiya, aka okidho i Ot pa Rwoth.
