Ooro Eliakim m'oyido obedo jadwoŋ ma cel pa kere, Sebina jandiko ma kapido, kodi jatuci wac Were m'otegino bongi Isaya wod pa Amoz. Jo bende oyido joruko kutiya.
Me a mikwenda m'omiyo jo waco ri Isaya ni, “Konon obedo ndelo ma kidamba, imiyo wan gir'acula aka wanitie i wickwot. Wacale dhako m'oyikere nywol, to meni loyo ma colo nyathi.
Kere ma Asiria ooro jadhum pere madwoŋ yeto Were makwo. Weyi Rwoth Were perin wowinji yet me, aka womiy joma joluwo gir'acula. Riameno kway ri ji mawan ma jodoŋ.”
Munyo Isaya owinjo mikwenda pa kere Hezekia,
odhiro rigo radwok me, “Ikir'ibwoki r'atise ma ŋecin pa kere jowaco rin nike Rwoth kinyal bothin.
Rwoth bino miyo kere ma Asiria winjo pokopoko ma bino miyo go gik i piny pere, aka Rwoth bino miyo woneki go kenyo.”
Jadhum ma Asiria odok, aka onwaŋo nike kere ma Asiria oyido lwenyo gi tindi madwoŋ Libina, ameno okidho kenyo penjo kere.
Aka munyo kere ma Asiria owinjo nike kere Tirihaka ma Ethopiya oyido bino monjo jo, odhiro balwa ri kere Hezekia ma Yuda ni,
“Were m'igeno owaco nike ikibino podho i cingan, to ikir'iyey gino wowondin.
Itieko winjo gima kere ma Asiria timo ri piny moro ma go mito reyo. Iparo nike ibino kwale?
Kwarere paran joreyo woko tindin madongo Gozan, Haran, kodi Rezef to joneko ji ma Betheden m'oyido jobedo i Telasar, ongoye werin pajo m'onyalo botho jo.
Kerin ma tindin madongo Hamath, Aripad, Sefarivayim, Hena, kodi Iva jonitie kune?”
Kere Hezekia ojolo balwa wok i cingi jomikwenda to soma. Kenyo okidho i Ot pa Rwoth to ketho balwa no ruwaŋ Rwoth,
aka okwayo ni, “Awi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili m'obedo i wi cwec ma jobwombi gin, in kende a Were, ma dhumo keri je ma i piny. Icweyo piny kodi polo.
Onyo Rwoth, neni gima timere riwan. Ciki ithin iwinji gima Senakerib waco je ma yetin, Were makwo.
Adieri Rwoth, kerin ma Asiria jotieko reyo piny kweth, to josika woko lowo pajo,
jowaŋo woko werin pajo m'oyido jok'obedo werin kada to cal ma yen kodi telin ma ji ama joyiko gi cingi gin.
Riameno Rwoth Were mawan, akwayin, both wan kwoŋ Joasiria, ŋey nonin je ma piny jowoŋey nike in kende, awi Rwoth, iŋat'ibedo Were.”
Kenyo Isaya odhiro mikwenda ri kere Hezekia ni, “Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco ni, otieko winjo kwayo perin rigo ma mako kwoŋ Senakerib kere ma Asiria.”
“Me a gima Rwoth waco ri Senakerib:
Ji ma Yerusalem,
jocayin aka jotimo ginyero kwoŋin.
Jonyero,
yu dieŋeyin.
Senakerib, ikwoŋan,
ikoko ran, t'ipeko waŋin kwoŋan,
Were pa Isiraili madwoŋ loyo.
Iweyo jodhum perin
joyetan, Rwoth.
Aka me a gim'iwaco,
Atelo cawilin paran kweth,
tundo i ŋawirok ma gote ma Lebanon.
Aluthere i lul mere,
aka aŋolo piny yen sida maber loyo,
kodi yen madongo maboyo ma jaboke kweth.
Athwo jwombe je
i lowo ma Misir,
aka amadho pi,
wok i jwombe ma an won akunyo.
Senakerib, onyo winji,
gima an Rwoth awaco.
Acano gime cango con.
Aka ikiniaŋ kiri,
nike an won,
aŋat'amiyin timo gigipiny me.
Amiyin kisika woko,
tindin madongo m'otinda.
Kucel ji pajo jolocere,
jobedo gi nyawin madwoŋ.
Jocale mawuwa madudi,
kosa lum ma nyaka twi,
dongo i wi ot m'oriewere,
to jothwo mafodi jok'otegino.
T'aŋeyo gima mako kwoŋin je,
kiri gi nger m'imako nge swa
kodan.
Atieko neno noro perin,
kodi dakirok madit,
m'initie gine ran.
Onyo abino ketho siraget i umin,
kodi kac paran i dhokin,
to nyaka adwokin,
kam'iwok'iye.”

Kenyo Isaya owaco ri kere Hezekia ni, “Me ranyuth ma gima kidho timere. Oro me kodi oro ma luwo ibino bedo gi ŋano madudi acama, to i oro mar'adek ibino nyalo cwoyo ŋano t'ikeco, aka ibino pidho yen vini t'icamo olemo mere.
Aka ji ma joboth i Yuda jobino pidhirok pa yen ma jorwako fuc piny i lowo aka jonyak olemo.
Kole bino bedo ji ma jobino both i Yerusalem kodi got Zayon kwoŋbedo Rwoth omiyere miyo gime timirok.”

“Riameno me a gima Rwoth owaco kwoŋ kere ma Asiria ni, ‘Go kiladonjo i tindi madwoŋ me kosa celo asere kad'acel kwoŋe. Ongoye jolweny ma jonitie gi kwote ma jobino core cegin gi tindi madwoŋ, aka jok'othoki mako.
Go bino gik gi yo acel m'obino gine, ma k'odonjo i tindi madwoŋ. An Rwoth, atieko waco.
Kole abino kikwonga tindi madwoŋ me botho, ro an won kodi cikirok m'atimo ri ŋeca paran Daudi.’ ”
Aka wor no won malaika pa Rwoth okidho i kambi pa Joasiria to neko jolweny 185,000 aka munyo ji jocewi odikin jonwaŋo joriere ma jotho.
Kenyo Senakerib kere ma Asiria owire to gik Ninivi.
Ndelo acel munyo go lamo i ot pa were pere Nisrok, wote ario, Adramelek kodi Sareza joneko go g'abor pajo to joringo i piny Ararat. Aka wode man Esarhadon olunjo go paka kere.

I hongo no kere Hezekia two omako aka obothi tho. Aka Isaya jatuci wac Were wod pa Amoz obino bongi Hezekia to waco rigo ni, “Rwoth waco ni, ‘Kethi gigipiny je i kare, kole ikibino bothi, ibino tho.’ ”
Kenyo Hezekia owire to ŋiyo kor ot aka okwayo ni,
“A Rwoth, mondo akwayin, poyi paka awotho ruwaŋin i adieri aka gi cunyan je. Aka atimo kisi gim'iwaco nike otire.” Rumacen Hezekia oywaki gi geregere.
Aka mafodi Isaya k'otundo i dier diedipo ma cel pa kere, Rwoth owaco rigo ni,
“Giki bongi Hezekia jadhum pa ji paran iwaci nike Rwoth, Were pa kwarin Daudi waco nike owinjo kwayo perin to neno pigi waŋin. Go bino bothin, aka i ndelo adek ibino nyalo kidho i Ot pa Rwoth.
Go bino medin oro apar g'abic i kwo perin, aka labotho tindi madwoŋ Yerusalem kwoŋ kere ma Asiria; aka lakikwonga tindi madwoŋ me ro go won kodi cikirok m'otimo ri ŋeca pere Daudi.”
Kenyo Isaya owaco ri ŋecin pa Hezekia nike jowokethi nyandere m'onyadhi i bur pa Hezekia ŋey wobothi.
Kere Hezekia openjo Isaya ni, “Aŋo ma nyutho nike Rwoth bino bothan, aka nike i ndelo adek abino nyalo kidho i Ot pa Rwoth?”
Isaya odwoko ni, “Me ranyuth rin wok bongi Rwoth, nike Rwoth bino timo gima go ociko. Onyo imito nike tipo wokadhi yumalo madala apar, kosa wogiki cen madala apar?”
Hezekia odwoko ni, “Obedo gima yot miyo tipo kadho yuwiye. Miy wogiki cen.”
Isaya okwayo Rwoth, aka Rwoth omiyo tipo gik cen madala apar i wi gi kwano sawa ma kere Ahaz oyido ogeto.
I hongo no kere ma Babilon Merodak Baladan wod pa Baladan owinjo nike kere Hezekia oyido two, aka ooro jomikwenda gi balwa kodi mic.
Hezekia ojolo jo aka onyutho jo lim pere, feza pere kodi zahabu, gigipiny maŋwe kur, kodi gilweny pere. Hezekia onyutho jo lim ma keri pere je.
Kenyo jatuci wac Were Isaya obino bongi Hezekia to penjo ni, “Cwo me jowok kune aka jowaco ri aŋo?”
Hezekia odwoko ni, “Jowok i piny mabor swa Babilon.”
Isaya openjo Hezekia ni, “Aŋo ma joneno i cel pa kere?”
Hezekia odwoko ni, “Joneno gigipiny je. Anyutho jo gigipiny je.”
Kenyo Isaya owaco ri kere ni, “Rwoth Majameni Je waco ni,
‘Neni, ndelo bino ma gigipiny je ma cel pa kere perin, gigipiny je ma kwarere mewin in jokano tundo konon, ibino tiŋo woter i Babilon. Ongoye gima bino doŋ.
Aka megi kwoŋ wotin won, m'inywolo ibino tero jo bedo cwo ma lur i cel pa kere pa kere ma Babilon.’ ”
Kere Hezekia oniaŋ nike mikwenda me nyutho nike siem kodi kwe piny bino bedo i hongo pere ma dhum, ameno odwoko ni, “Mikwenda m'imiyan wok bongi Rwoth ber.”
Gigipiny man je ma Hezekia otimo, tim pere ma miseni, kodi nger m'okuny'iye gikano pi to kelo pi i tindi madwoŋ ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Hezekia otho, aka wode Manase olunjo go paka kere.
Manase obedo kere ma Yuda munyo jaoro apar g'ario, aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro piero abic g'abic. Yokimere oyido obedo Hefiziba.
Manase otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth paka tim ma mijokere pa nonin ma Rwoth oriemo wok i piny no munyo ji pere jodonjo iye.
Kole go ogeto kalamo manyakafir ma bamere oyido oturo, ogeto migam ma lamo Bal to timo cal pa were madhako Asera paka kere Ahab ma Isiraili oyido otimo. Manase bende olamo micalin.
Ogeto migame manyakafir i Ot pa Rwoth, kama Rwoth oyido owaco nike iripo lam'iye go.
I diedipo ario ma Ot pa Rwoth ogeto migame ario ma lamo micalin.
Omiyo wode paka cowirok ma mic awaŋa. Oyido to timo jwok aka othiedho. Otimo reco swa ruwaŋ Rwoth to kwinyo nge pa Rwoth.

Oketho cal pa were madhako Asera i Ot pa Rwoth, kama Rwoth oyido owaco ri Daudi kodi wode Solomon ni, “I Yerusalem ka, i Ot pa Rwoth me, a kabedo m'atieko yero kwoŋ adec ma nonin apar g'ario ma Isiraili paka kabedo m'iripo laman'iye.
Aka ka Joisiraili joluw Or paran to jokuro cik je ma ŋeca paran Musa omiyo jo, akibino weyo woriem jo wok i lowo m'amiyo kwarere pajo.”
To ji ma Yuda jok'owinjo Rwoth, aka Manase omiyo jo timo reco madwoŋ loyo kiri ma nonin ma Rwoth oyido oriemo wok i lowo no jotimo munyo ji pere jodonjo iye.
Aka Rwoth owaco ri ŋecin pere jotuci wac Were ni,
“Kere Manase otimo gimienirok me, aka otimo gikidakana loyo kiri ma Jokanan jotimo, aka gi cal pere omiyo ji ma Yuda timo reco.
Riameno An, Rwoth Were pa Isiraili, abino kelo i Yerusalem kodi Yuda teko ma kisi ŋat'owinji kwoŋe bino bwok.
Abino miyo Yerusalem gir'acula paka atimo ri Samaria, paka atimo ri kere Ahab ma Isiraili kodi nyikwaye. Abino lindo ji ma Yerusalem, m'olony paka sen m'olindi t'iriewo piny.
Abino jwango ji ma joboth, aka abino miyo jo i cingi jokwor pajo ma jobino mako jo to jonyaga piny pajo.
Abino timo gime ri ji paran kwoŋbedo jotimo reco kwoŋan aka jokwinyo nge paran wok i hongo ma kwarere pajo jowok i Misir tundo gunyo ni.”
Manase oneko ji ma bubanja cuka royin ma Yerusalem omol gi remo; otimo gime medo kwoŋ miyo ji ma Yuda lamo cal, to miyo jo timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth.
Gigipiny man je ma Manase otimo kiri gi reco m'otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Manase otho aka oyiki go i ndelo ma cel pa kere, ndelo ma Uza, aka wode Amon olunjo go paka kere.
Amon obedo kere ma Yuda munyo jaoro piero ario g'ario aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro ario. Yokimere oyido obedo Mesulemeth nyar Haruz ma wok i Yotiba.
Amon otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth paka bamere
aka oluwo tim pa bamere to lamo cal ma bamere oyido lamo.
Okwero Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin mere, to kwero luwo Or pa Rwoth.
Jodhum pere jocamo rigo sereko to joneko go i cel pa kere.
Ji ma Yuda joneko jono ma jocano neko Amon, aka joketho wode Yosia bedo kere.
Gigipiny man je ma Amon otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Oyiki Amon i kaliel i ndelo ma Uza, aka wode Yosia olunjo go paka kere.
Yosia otimo gim'osangala Rwoth, oluwo kite pa kwari mere Daudi, ma k'otangatanga racuc kosa racam.
I oro mar'apar g'aboro ma dhum pa Yosia, ooro Safan jandiko wod pa Azaliya aka nyakwar Mesulam i Ot pa Were gi cik ni,
“Kidhi bongi Hilikia jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam womiyin welo ma pesa ma jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiyo i waŋkac jocoko wok bongi ji.
Waci rigo womiy cwo ma joneno nger m'iyiko Ot pa Rwoth jowoculi
jopac, jogeto, kodi jondijo ma geto, aka jowonyew mbawo kodi telin m'ioro ma yiko Ot pa Rwoth.
To wikiri wipenji kwan ma pesa ma wimiyo, kole jo jogenere.”
Safan omiyo Hilikia cik pa kere, aka Hilikia owaco rigo nike onwaŋo kitawo ma Cik i Ot pa Rwoth. Hilikia omiyo Safan kitawo to soma.
Kenyo Safan ogik bongi kere aka okowo rigo ni, “Ŋecin perin jotieko tero pesa m'oyido nitie i Ot pa Rwoth aka jomiyo cwo ma joneno nger m'iyiko iye Ot pa Rwoth.”
Kenyo Safan kendo owaco ri kere ni, “Anitie ka gi kitawo ma Hilikia omiyan.” Safan osoma malo ri kere.
Aka munyo kere owinjo wac ma kitawo ma Cik, oyeco woko nangin pere.
Kenyo kere ooro Hilikia, Ahikam wod pa Safan, Akibor wod pa Mikaya, Safan jandiko, kodi Asaya ŋeca pa kere ni,
“Kidhi win wipenji ran kodi ji ma Yuda Rwoth fonji ma kitawo me. Rwoth omako nge gi wan kwoŋbedo kwarere mawan jok'otimo gima kitawo me waco nike iripo timo.”

Hilikia, Ahikam, Akibor, Safan, kodi Asaya jokidho penjo dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Hulida, jatuci wac Were m'oyido bedo i kama nyen loyo i Yerusalem. (Cwore Salum, wod pa Tikiva aka nyakwar Harhas oyido kuro kanzin ma Ot pa Rwoth.) Jotito rigo gim'otimere,
aka Hulida ooro jo gik bongi kere jowowaci rigo
mikwenda me m'owok bongi Rwoth, “Neni, abino miyo Yerusalem kodi ji mere je gir'acula, paka ondiki i kitawo ma kere osoma.
Jokweran aka jomiyo cowirok ri werin man to jokwinyo nge paran gi gima jotimo. Nge paran oliel kwoŋ Yerusalem, aka kilakwe.
To ri kere ma Yuda, m'ooro win penjo Rwoth, wac win rigo ama, Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco nike iwinjo wac m'ondiki i kitawo,

aka ipusere t'imwole ruwaŋan, iyeco nangin perin t'iywaki munyo iwinjo nger m'atisa miyo Yerusalem kodi ji mere gir'acula. Abino miyo wobedi kabedo ma bwoko jo, kabedo ma ji jobino oro nyinge ma kwoŋo. To atieko winjo kwayo perin,
aka akibino kelo gir'acula i Yerusalem kafodi ikwo, Abino weyin itho i siem.”
Cwo no jogik bongi kere Yosia gi mikwenda me.
Kenyo Kere Yosia olwoŋo jotel je ma Yuda gi Yerusalem,
aka okidho gi jo i Ot pa Were kanyacel kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam, jotuci wac Were kodi ji je, jocandi kodi joŋaŋo. Kere osoma kitawo ma cikirok m'onwaŋere i Ot pa Rwoth.

Kere ocungo cegin gi siro acel aka otimo cikirok gi Rwoth winjo go, kuro cik kodi Or pere gi cunye je kodi adundo pere je kodi ketho i tim gima cikirok mito paka ondiki i kitawo. Aka ji je bende jociko kuro cikirok.

Oriemo woko i tic jocway ri Were i wi migam ma kerin ma Yuda oyido joketho miyo cowirok i wi migam manyakafir i tindin madongo ma Yuda kodi i kabedo macegin gi Yerusalem. Kiri jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jowaŋo buban ri Bal, waŋceŋ, dwe, pondeponde, kodi micalin.
Owodho woko cal pa Asera i Ot pa Rwoth, otero woko ma tindi madwoŋ i milelo Kidiron, owaŋo to odo buru mere i fukefuke, aka oywoyo i limbo pa ji je.
Kere bende oturo woko udi pa cwo kodi mon m'oyido jobedo malayin i Ot pa Rwoth. (Kenyo a kama mon oyido jokwoyo iye kanzin ma lamo Asera.)

Okelo i Yerusalem jocway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido jonitie i tindin madongo ma Yuda, to loko makoc migame m'oyido jomiyo iye cowirok. Go bende oturo piny migame m'oyido omiy ri jwogi diegi cegin gi waŋkac ma Yosuwa gavana ma tindi madwoŋ ogeto, yuracam ma waŋkac madwoŋ ka idonjo i tindi madwoŋ.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam me oyido kiyey jo tic i Ot pa Rwoth, to oyido jonyalo camo mugat ma buthow m'imiyo jocway ri Were i wi migam wadi jo.

Go bende okwanyo woko kayinin ma kerin ma Yuda oyido joketho gicen ma lamo waŋceŋ, to waŋo cawilin m'oyido ioro i lamo me. Oyido ikano jo i diedipo ma Ot pa Rwoth, cegin gi waŋkac aka oyido kibor gi kama jadhum madwoŋ Nathan Melek oyido bed'iye.

Kere Yosia oturo piny migame m'oyido kerin ma Yuda jogeto i wi cel pa kere malo ma kisika ma kere Ahaz oyido ogeto, kanyacel gi migame ma kere Manase ogeto i diedipo ario ma Ot pa Rwoth; oŋinyo migame mathindho thindho to bolo i milelo Kidiron.

Kere Yosia bende oloko makoc migame ma kere Solomon oyido ogeto yupodho ceŋ ma Yerusalem, yupiny ma got Oliv, ma lamo cal ma mienirok kodi ri Asitate were madhako ma Sidon, Kemos were ma Mowab, kodi Molek were ma Amon.
Kere Yosia oturo sirin ma tele mathindho thindho, otoŋo piny were madhako Asera, to umo piny kam'oyido jocungo iye gi cokin pa ji.

Kenyo kere Yosia oŋiyo korin gi korin to neno kaliele mogo kenyo i wi tendere. Owaco wogol woko cokin mere wowaŋ i wi migam ŋey wokiri woor kendo. Gime otimere paka jatuci wac Were moro owaco munyo kere Yerobowam oyido ocungo i wi migam no i kalima moro. Kere Yosia oŋiyo korin gi korin aka oneno kaliel pa jatuci wac Were m'owaco ni gigipiny me bino timere,
aka openjo ni, “Meno kaliel pa ŋa?”
Ji ma Bethel jodwoko ni, “Meno kaliel pa jatuci wac Were m'owok i Yuda to waco gigipiny m'itimo ri migam me.”
Yosia owodho or ni, “Weyi win paka nitie wikiri wigol cokin pere.”
Ameno cokin pere kodi apa jotuci wac Were ma jowok i Samaria k'ogol.
I kisi tindi madwoŋ i Isiraili kere Yosia oturo piny kalamo manyakafir ma kerin ma Isiraili oyido jogeto to jokwinyo nge pa Rwoth. Otimo ri migame no je gima go oyido otimo i Bethel.
Oneko woko jocway ri Were i wi migam ma joma bu Were i wi migame ma jotiyo iye, to waŋo cokin pa ji i wi kisi migam. Kenyo ogik i Yerusalem.
Kere Yosia omiyo ji or camo kalima ma Kadho ma miyo Rwoth Were pajo dwoŋ, paka ondikere i kitawo ma cikirok.
Kole oyido ongoye kere ma Isiraili kosa Yuda m'ocamo kalima ma Kadho paka me wok i hongo ma jothum banja jodhumo iye.
To i oro mar'apar g'aboro ma dhum pa Yosia, kalima ma Kadho ocam i Yerusalem.

Ma ridho cik m'ondiki i kitawo ma Hilikia jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam onwaŋo i Ot pa Rwoth, kere Yosia oriemo wok i Yerusalem kodi Yuda gipi jothieth, jojwok, werin ma udi, cal kodi gigipiny ma lamo manyakafir je.
Oyido fodi ongoye kere m'ocalo go, m'otiyo ri Rwoth gi cunye je, g'adundo pere je gi meni pere je to luwo cik pa Musa je; aka ongoye kere man kendo m'ocalo go rumacen ma dhum pere.
To keme pa Rwoth oyido fodi oliel kwoŋ Yuda gi gima kere Manase oyido otimo, aka kiri gunyo ni k'okwe.

Rwoth owaco ni, “Abino timo ri Yuda gim'atieko timo ri Isiraili. Abino kwanyo jo woko ruwaŋan, aka abino jwango Yerusalem, tindi madwoŋ m'ayero, kodi Ot pa Rwoth kabedo m'oyido awaco ni iripo laman'iye.”
Onyo gigipiny man ma Yosia otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
I hongo ma dhum pere Farawo Neko kere ma Misir otelo jolweny pere i malawa Yufrete konyo kere ma Asiria. Kere Yosia otemo geŋo jo, aka oneki go i lweny i Megido.
Jodhum pere joketho delkwoŋe i cawila aka jodwoko i Yerusalem to joyiko i limbo pa kerin.
Ji ma Yuda joyero wod pa Yosia won Yehoahaz to joketho go kere lunjo bamere.
Yehoahaz obedo kere ma Yuda munyo jaoro piero ario g'adek aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma dwe adek. Yokimere oyido obedo Hamutal nyar Yeremia ma wok i tindi madwoŋ Libina.
Go oluwo kite pa kwarere pere, to timo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Dhum pere orumo munyo Farawo Neko ma Misir otero go paka jatwec i Ribila i piny Hamath, to miyo Yuda culo kilo 3,400 ma feza kodi kilo 34 ma zahabu paka misolo.
Farawo Neko oketho wod pa Yosia m'ilwoŋo ni Eliakim kere ma Yuda lunjo Yosia aka owiro nyinge ni Yekoyakim. Neko otero Yehoahaz i Misir to tho kenyo.
Yekoyakim ocoko misolo wok bongi ji marom gi lim pajo, manyalo culo misolo ma kere ma Misir oyido mito.
Yekoyakim oluwo kite pa kwarere mewin pere, to timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth.
Rwoth ooro jolweny ma Babilon, Siria, Mowab, kodi Amon monjo Yehoyakim joworey woko Yuda paka Rwoth oyido owaco luwo kwoŋ ŋecin pere jotuci wac Were.
Adieri gime opodho kwoŋ Yuda luwo i cik pa Rwoth, ŋey wokwany woko ji ma Yuda ruwaŋe, ro reco ma kere Manase oyido otimo,
kodi tektek mere kwoŋbedo oneko ji ma bubanja. Rwoth k'onyalo cwako Manase ro gino.
Gigipiny man je ma Yehoyakim otimo ondiki i kitawo ma kigana mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda.
Yehoyakim otho, aka wode Yehoyakin olunjo go paka kere.
Kere ma Misir kodi jolweny pere jok'owok Misir kendo kwoŋbedo kere ma Babilon oyido otieko mako adec je m'oyido obedo apa kere ma Misir, wok i malawa Yufrete tundo i kew gi Misir.
Yehoyakin obedo kere ma Yuda munyo jaoro apar g'aboro, aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma dwe adek. Yokimere oyido obedo Nehusita nyar Elinathan ma Yerusalem.
Yehoyakin oluwo kite pa bamere, to timo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth.
I hongo ma dhum pere ama Nebukadineza otelo jolweny ma Babilon kwoŋ Yerusalem to jothoko.
I hongo ma thoko tindi Yerusalem, Nebukadineza won gipi obino i Yerusalem,
aka kere Yehoyakin, min, wote, jodhum pere, kodi jodhum ma cel pa kere jotiŋo cingi gin ri Jobabilon. I oro mar'aboro ma dhum pa Nebukadineza otero Yehoyakin paka jatwec.
Nebukadineza otiŋo lim je ma Ot pa Rwoth kodi ma cel pa kere, oturo gigipiny ma zahabu ma kere Solomon oyido otimo aora i Ot pa Rwoth, paka Rwoth oyido otieko waco.
Nebukadineza otero ji ma Yerusalem paka jotwec, jodhum ma Yerusalem, cwo ma jotel je, kanyacel 10,000. Okadho gi cwo ma jondijo je, kiri gi jokidonya cumin, to weyo nyaka jocandi loyo i Yuda.
Nebukadineza otero cwo ma jonitie gi cwe je i Babilon, joje 7,000 kodi jondijo 1,000 kiri gi jokidonya cumin. Me je oyido cwo ma jobad gin aka jocwiny ma lweny.
Kere Zedekia otimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth paka kere Yehoyakin oyido otimo.
Rwoth omako nge gi ji ma Yerusalem kodi Yuda aka okwanyo woko jo ruwaŋe.
Aka Zedekia ogwenyere kwoŋ kere ma Babilon.
aka jothoko cuka oro mar'apar g'acel ma dhum pa Zedekia.
Ka ndelo abuŋwen ma dwe mar'aŋwen i oro no won, kec oyido kec i piny ma ji jongoye gi cemo,

aka otur kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ. Makada nende jolweny pa Jobabilon oyido jothoko tindi madwoŋ, kere Zedekia kodi jolweny pere jokwale wor gi yo ma ndelo pa kere to joluwo gi waŋkac ma riwo kor udi ario, aka joringo yuthenge ma milelo Yordan.
To jolweny pa Jobabilon joriemo kere, jomako go kam'obipere cegin gi Yeriko, aka jolweny pere jokedhere kwoŋe.
Kenyo jomako Zedekia to jotero go bongi kere Nebukadineza m'oyido nitie i tindi madwoŋ Ribina, aka Nebukadineza othumo rigo banja.
Joneko wot Zedekia munyo go neno gi waŋe; kenyo Nebukadineza omiyo ogol waŋ Zedekia t'itweyo go gi lijegere, aka oter go i Babilon.
Ka ndelo abirio ma dwe mar'abic i oro mar'apar g'abuŋwen ma dhum pa kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, Nebuzaradan, jamic rieko pa kere kodi jamituka pa jolweny pere jodonjo i Yerusalem.
Nebuzaradan owaŋo woko Ot pa Rwoth, cel pa kere, kodi udi pa ji madongo je i Yerusalem,
aka jolweny pere joturo piny kor tindi madwoŋ.
Kenyo Nebuzaradan otero i Babilon ji m'oyido jodoŋ i tindi madwoŋ, jondijo ma jodoŋ kodi jono m'oyido jotiŋo cingi gin ri Jobabilon.
To weyo jocandi loyo mogo, m'oyido jongoye gi lim moro tiyo i ndelin vini kodi ndelin.
Jo bende jokadho gi mwiko kodi siniya m'aketho buru ma migam, gigipiny ma talin, acero ma jolo remo ma cowirok, acero ma waŋo buban, kodi gigipiny ma ywel je m'oyido ioro i Ot pa Rwoth.
Jokadho gi gigipiny je m'otimi ma zahabu kosa feza, kiri g'acero mathindho kodi sapikere ma tiŋo cuk mac.
Gigipiny ma ywel ma kere Solomon otimo ri Ot pa Rwoth, sirin ario, magal, kodi pipa malac oyido jokipimere.
Sirin ario oyido jocale; kisi acel mita aboro i ŋawirok, gi raŋaw i wiye, mita 1.3 i ŋawirok kodi cal ma lijegere m'okedi m'okicin gi cal ma pomo m'otimi gi ywel.
Nebuzaradan bende omako Seraya jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, Zefania jocway ri Were i wi migam ma luwo i dwoŋ, kodi jodhum ma Ot pa Rwoth adek.
I tindi madwoŋ omako jamituka pa jolweny acel, jomic rieko pa kere abic m'oyido fodi jodoŋ kenyo, ŋata luwo jamituka pa jolweny i dwoŋ m'oyido jandiko ma lweny, kodi cwo piero aucel man ma jodongo.
Nebuzaradan otero jo bongi kere Nebukadineza i tindi madwoŋ Ribila
iy'adec ma Hamath. Kenyo kere omiyo ocwadi t'ineko jo.
Ameno otiŋ ji ma Yuda wok i piny pajo.

Munyo Joyuda ma jotel pa jolweny kodi jolweny m'oyido jok'otiŋo cingi gin ri Jobabilon jowinjo gime, joriwere gi Gedalia i Mizipa. Jotel pa jolweny me oyido jobedo Isimayil wod pa Nathania, Yohana wod pa Kareya, Seraya wod pa Tanhumeth ma wok i tindi Netopa, kodi Yezania ma wok Maka.
Gedalia owaco rijo ni, “Amiyo win wac paran ni wikiri wilwor jodhum pa Jobabilon. Bedi win i lowo me, tiyi win ri kere ma Babilon, aka kisi gimoro bino bedo maber gi win.”
Kenyo Joisiraili je ma joŋaŋ kodi ma jocandi kanyacel gi jotel pa jolweny joringo i Misir kwoŋbedo oyido jolworo Jobabilon.

I oro ma Evilmerodak obedo kere ma Babilon, onyutho kere Yehoyakin ma Yuda wor to gonyo go wok i katwec. Gime ka piero ario g'abirio i dwe mar'apar g'ario i oro ma piero adek g'abirio wok cuka tweyi Yehoyakin.
Evilmerodak otero gine wor, aka omiyo go kabedo ma wor loyo kerin man je m'oyido jonitie i twec i Babilon.
Ameno oyey Yehoyakin wiro nangin pere ma katwec kodi bedo kanyo cemo kanyacel gi kere i meza pa kere i kwo pere je.
Kisi ndelo i kwo pere omiy go pesa ma noknok ri gima go mito.
Adam obedo ba Seth, Seth obedo ba Enos.
Enos obedo ba Kenan, Kenan obedo ba Mahalalel, Mahalalel obedo ba Yared.
Yared obedo ba Enoka, Enoka obedo ba Methusela, Methusela obedo ba Lamek.
Lamek obedo ba Nowa, Nowa obedo ba Semu, Ham kodi Yafeth.
Nyikway Yafeth obedo, Goma, Magog, Maday, Yavan, Tubal, Mesek kodi Tiras.
Nyikway Goma obedo Asikenaz, Difath kodi Togarma.
Nyikway Yavan obedo Elisa, Tarsis, Kitim, kodi Rodanim.
Nyikway Ham obedo Kus, Misir, Libia kodi Kanan.
Nyikway Kus obedo Seba, Havila, Sabita, Rama, kodi Sabiteka. Nyikway Rama obedo Seba kodi Dedan.
(Kus oyido nitie gi wode m'ilwoŋo ni Nimirod, m'open bedo jameni i piny.
Misir obedo ba Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Nafituhim,
Pathirusim, Kasluhim, kodi Kafitorim m'obedo kwari Jofilistia.
Kanan obedo ba Sidon okayo pere, kodi Heth.
Joyebus, Joamor, Jogirigas
Johivi, Joarikit, Josinit,
Joarivad, Jozemara, kodi Johamath.
Nyikway Semu jobedo Elam, Asur, Aripakisadi, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, kodi Mesek.
Aripakisadi obedo ba Sela, Sela obedo ba Eber.
Eber oyido nitie gi wote ario; Peleg (kole i ndir pere piny oyido otiakere) kodi Yoktan.
Nyikway Yoktan obedo Almodad, Selef, Hazarimaveth, Yera,
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikila,
Ebal, Abimael, Seba,
Ofir, Havila, kodi Yobab.
Semu, Aripakisadi, Sela,
Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor, Tera,
kodi Abram (ma bende oŋeyere paka Abraham.)
Wot Abraham obedo Isaka kodi Isimayil.
Isimayil obedo kwari nonin apar g'ario: Nebayoth, okayo pere, Kedar, Adibel, Mibsam,
Misima, Duma, Masa, Hadad, Tema,
Yetur, Nafis, kodi Kedema.
Abraham oyido nitie gi dhako ma thenge Ketura m'onywolo rigo wote aucel; Zimiran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Isibak, kodi Suwa. Nyikway Yoksan obedo Seba kodi Dedan.
Nyikway Midian obedo Efa, Efer, Hanok, Abida, kodi Elida.
Wod Abraham Isaka, oyido nitie gi wote ario, Esau kodi Yakobo.
Nyikway Esau obedo Elifaz, Reuel, Yeus, Jalam, kodi Kora.
Nyikway Elifaz obedo Teman, Omar, Zefo, Gatam, Kenaz, Timina, kodi Amalek.
Nyikway Reuel obedo Nahath, Zera, Sama, kodi Miza.
Nyikway Edom obedo Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana, Dison, Ezer, kodi Disan.
Nyikway Lotan obedo Hor kodi Homam. Lotan oyido nitie gi nyamin m'ilwoŋo ni Timina.
Nyikway Sobal obedo Aliyan, Manahath, Ebal, Sefi, kodi Onam. Nyikway Zibeon obedo Aya kodi Ana.
Wod Ana obedo Dison, aka wot Dison obedo Hamran, Esban, Ithiran, kodi Keran.
Nyikway Ezer obedo Bilhan, Zavan, kodi Yakan. Nyikway Disan obedo Uz kodi Aran.
Me kerin ma jodhumo i lowo ma Edom mafodi kere moro je k'odhumo Joisiraili. Bela wod pa Bewor ma wok i tindi madwoŋ Dinhaba.
Munyo Bela otho, Yobab wod pa Zera ma wok i Bozra olunjo go.
Munyo Yobab otho, Husam ma wok i lowo pa Joteman olunjo go.
Munyo Husam otho, Hadad wod pa Hedad, m'okengila Midian i piny Mowab, olunjo go; nyingi piny pere ilwoŋo ni Avith.
Munyo Hadad otho, Samila ma wok i Masireka olunjo go.
Munyo Samila otho, Saulo ma wok i Rehoboth i malawa Yufrete olunjo go.
Munyo Saulo otho, Bal Hanan wod pa Akibor olunjo go.
Munyo Bal Hanan otho, Hadad ma wok i Pay olunjo go. Cipa Hadad oyido ilwoŋo ni Mehetabel, nyar Matiredi aka nyakwar Mezahab.
Aka Hadad otho.
Me nonin ma Edom: Timina, Aliva, Yetheth,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibizar,
Magidiel, kodi Iram.
Isiraili oyido nitie gi wote apar g'ario; Ruben, Simeo, Levi, Yuda, Isakar, Zebulun,
Dan, Yozefu, Benyamin, Nafital, Gad kodi Aser.
Yuda oyido nitie gi wote adek ma Bathsuwa dhako Jakanan onywolo rigo; Eri, Onan, kodi Sela. Onyo Eri okayo pere oyido jakidakana aka Rwoth oneko go.
Ciwode Tamar bende onywolo rigo wote ario man; Perez kodi Zera.
Nyikway Perez obedo Heziron kodi Hamul.
Nyikway Zera obedo Zimiri, Ethan, Heman, Kalkol, kodi Dara. Kanyacel jabic.
Acan wod pa Karim, acel kwoŋ nyikway Zera okelo teko kwoŋ Joisiraili munyo okano gigipiny m'oyido omiy Were.
Ethan oyido nitie gi wode acel, Azaria.
Nyikway Heziron obedo, Yeramel, Ram, kodi Kelubay.
Ram obedo ba Aminadab, Aminadab obedo ba Nason, jacwo m'oŋeyere i nono pa Yuda,
Nason obedo ba Salima, Salima obedo ba Bowaz,
Bowaz obedo ba Obed, Obed obedo ba Yese.
Yese obedo ba Eliab okayo pere, Abinadab mar'ario, Simeya mar'adek,
Nethanel mar'aŋwen, Raday mar'abic,
Ozem mar'aucel, Daudi mar'abirio,
kodi ruwaŋin jo Zeruya kodi Abigayili. Wot Zeruya obedo Abisay, Yowab, kodi Asahel, jadek.
Wod Abigayili obedo, Amasa, aka ba Amasa oyido obedo Yether nyakwar Isimayil.
Kaleb wod pa Heziron onywomo Azuba m'onywolo rigo nyare Yerioth. Oyido nitie gi wote adek; Yeseri, Sobab, kodi Aridon.
Rumacen ma tho pa Azuba, Kaleb onywomo Efrath m'onywolo rigo wode Hur.
Hur obedo ba Uri, aka Uri obedo ba Bezalel.
Munyo Heziron jaoro piero aucel, onywomo nyar Makir, nyamin Giliad. Jonywolo wod jo Segub,
aka Segub obedo ba Yayir. Yayir odhumo tindin madongo piero ario g'adek iy'adec ma Giliad.
To kerin ma Gesur kodi Aram jomako tindin piero aucel kenyo, kiri gi calin ma Yayir kodi Kenath, kodi tindin macegin kenyo. Ji je m'oyido jobedo kenyo oyido nyikway Makir, ba Giliad.
Rumacen ma tho pa Heziron, Kaleb onywomo Efrath, ciliendi bamere. Jonywolo wod jo Asur, m'ocako tindi Tekowa.
Nyikway Yeramel okayo pa Heziron obedo; Ram okayo pere, Buna, Oren, Ozem kodi Ahija.
Yeramel bende oyido nitie gi dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Atara m'onywolo rigo wode Onam.
Wot Ram obedo; Maz, Yamin kodi Eker.
Wot Onam obedo; Samay, kodi Yada. Nyikway Samay obedo; Nadab kodi Abisur.
Cipa Abisur oyido ilwoŋo ni Abihayili, aka onywolo rigo Aban kodi Molid.
Wot Nadab obedo; Seled kodi Apayim. Seled otho m'ongoye gi nyathi.
Apayim obedo ba Isi, Isi obedo ba Sesan, aka Sesan obedo ba Alay.
Wot Yada omin Samay, obedo; Yether kodi Yonathan, to Yether otho m'ongoye gi nyathi.
Wot Yonathan obedo; Peleth kodi Zaza. Me oyido obedo nyikway Yeramel.
Onyo Sesan oyido ongoye gi wote, nyir kende; to oyido nitie gi ŋeca ma Jamisir m'ilwoŋo ni Yariha,
m'omiyo wonywom acel kwoŋ nyir pere aka jonywolo wod jo Atay.
Atay obedo ba Nathan, aka Nathan obedo ba Zabad.
Zabad obedo ba Elifal, aka Elifal obedo ba Obed.
Obed obedo ba Yehu, aka Yehu obedo ba Azaria.
Azaria obedo ba Helez, aka Helez obedo ba Eliasa.
Eliasa obedo ba Sisimay, aka Sisimay obedo ba Salum.
Salum obedo ba Yekamia, aka Yekamia obedo ba Elisama.
Nyikway Kaleb omin Yeramel obedo; Mesa okayo pere, m'obedo ba Zif, Zif obedo ba Meresa, aka Meresa obedo ba Hebron.
Nyikway Hebron obedo; Kora, Tapuwa, Rekem, kodi Sema.
Sema obedo ba Raham, aka Raham obedo ba Yorikim. Rekem omin Sema obedo ba Samay,
m'obedo ba Mayon, aka Mayon obedo ba Bethzur.
Kaleb oyido nitie gi dhako ma thenge m'ilwoŋo ni Efiha, aka onywolo gine wote adek; Haran, Moza, kodi Gazez. Haran obedo ba Gazez.
Nyikway Yaday obedo; Regem, Yotham, Gesan, Pelet, Efiha kodi Safi.
Kaleb oyido nitie gi dhako ma thenge man m'ilwoŋo ni Maka m'onywolo rigo Seberi kodi Tirihana.
Rumacen onywolo wote ario; Safi m'ocako tindi Madimana, kodi Seva m'ocako tindin ma Makibena kodi Gibeya.
Kaleb bende oyido nitie gi nyare m'ilwoŋo ni Akisa.
Me bende obedo nyikway Kaleb man.
Hur oyido obedo okayo pa Kaleb gi cege Efrath. Wod Hur Sobal ocako tindi Kiriath Yerim,
wode mar'ario Salima ocako tindi Bethelehem, aka wode mar'adek Haref ocako tindi Bethgaderi.
Sobal, m'ocako Kiriath Yerim obedo kwari ji ma Harowe, adec ji ma Menuhoth,
kodi nonin m'oyido jobedo i Kiriath Yerim: Joithra, Joputha, Josumatha kodi Jomisira. Ji ma tindi madwoŋ Zora kodi Esitayol oyido jobedo ji ma nonin me.
Salima m'ocako tindi Bethelehem obedo kwari ji ma Netofath, ji ma Atiroth Beth Yowab kodi ji ma Zora, m'oyido jobedo nonin ario i Manahath.
Pecin bende pa jondiko m'oyido jobedo i Yabez; ji ma Tiratha, ji ma Simitha kodi ji ma Sukatha. Me obedo Jokena ma jowok Hamath, kwari peco pa Rekab.
Me wot Daudi m'onywol rigo i Hebron cungo kwoŋ nywolirok pajo; Amon okayo ma min obedo Ahinowam ma wok i Yezirel, mar'ario Daniel ma min obedo Abigayili ma wok i Kamel.
Mar'adek Absalom ma min obedo Maka nyar Talimay kere ma Gesur, mar'aŋwen Adoniya ma min obedo Hagith.
Mar'abic obedo Sefatiya ma min obedo Abital, mar'aucel obedo Ithirim ma min obedo Egila.
Joje wote aucel i oro abirio g'adec ma Daudi odhumo i Hebron.
I Yerusalem odhumo ma oro piero adek g'adek,
aka onywol rigo wote kweth kenyo.
Cege Bathseba, nyar Amiel onywolo rigo wote aŋwen: Simeya, Sobab, Nathan kodi Solomon.
Daudi oyido nitie gi wote abuŋwen man: Ibihar, Elisama, Elifelet,
Noga, Nefeg, Yafiya,
Elisama, Eliada kodi Elifelet.
Medo kwoŋ wote me, Daudi oyido nitie gi wote man m'onywolo gi mon pere ma thenge. Go bende oyido nitie gi nyare, Tamar.
Me nyikway Kere Solomon wok kwoŋe: Solomon, Rehobowam, Abija, Asa, Yehosafat,
Yehoram, Ahazia, Yowas,
Amaziya, Uziya, Yotham,
Ahaz, Hezekia, Manase,
Amon kodi Yosia.
Yosia oyido nitie gi wote aŋwen: Yowanan, Yehoyakim, Zedekia kodi Yehoahaz.
Yehoyakim oyido nitie gi wote ario: Yehoyakin kodi Zedekia.
Me nyikway Kere Yehoyakin, m'oter paka jatwec i Babilon. Go oyido nitie gi wote abirio: Siltiel,
Malikiram, Pedaya, Senazar, Yekamia, Hosama kodi Nedabia.
Pedaya oyido nitie gi wote ario, Zerubabel kodi Simey. Zerubabel obedo ba wote ario; Mesulam kodi Hanania, kodi nyare acel Selomith.
Go oyido nitie gi wote abic man: Hasuba, Ohel, Berekia, Hasadia kodi Yasub Hesed.
Hanania obedo ba Pelatia kodi Yesaya. Yesaya obedo ba Refaya, Refaya obedo ba Arinan, Arinan obedo ba Obadia, aka Obadia obedo ba Sekaniya.
Sekaniya obedo ba Semaya. Nyikway Semaya obedo abic: Hatus, Igal, Baria, Neria kodi Safat.
Nyikway Neria obedo adek: Eliowenay, Hizikia kodi Azirikam.
Nyikway Eliowenay obedo: Hodavia, Eliasib, Pelaya, Akub, Yowanan, Delaya, kodi Anan, cwo abirio.
Nyikway Yuda obedo Perez, Heziron, Karim, Hur kodi Sobal.
Sobal obedo ba Reya, Reya obedo ba Yahath, aka Yahath obedo ba Ahumay kodi Lahad kwarere mewin ji m'oyido jobedo i Zora.
Me obedo wot Etam: Yezirel, Isima, kodi Idibas; aka nyamin jo obedo Hazeleliponi.
Penuel obedo ba Gedor, aka Ezer obedo ba Husa. Etam, Penuel kodi Ezer jobedo wot Hur, okayo pa Efratha cipa Kaleb.
Asur m'ocako tindi Tekowa oyido nitie gi mon ario, Hela kodi Nara.
Nara onywolo rigo wote aŋwen: Ahuzam, Hefer, Temeni kodi Hahasitar.
Hela onywolo rigo wote adek: Zereth, Izihar kodi Ethinan.
Koz obedo ba Anub kodi Zobeba, kodi kwari nonin ma jowok kwoŋ Aharihel wod pa Harum.
Oyido nitie jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Yabez m'oyido iworo swa loyo i peco pajo. Yokimere ocwoko rigo nyinge ni Yabez kwoŋbedo onywolo go i litho.
To Yabez okwayo Were pa Isiraili ni, “Miyan silwany, Were, aka yaw kew paran. Bedi kodan aka kuran kwoŋ gima nyalo kelo ran litho.” Aka Were omiyo go gim'okwayo.
Kaleb, omin Suha oyido nitie gi wode, Mehir. Mehir obedo ba Esiton.
Esiton obedo ba Bethrafa, Paseya kodi Tehina, aka Tehina obedo ba Irinahas. Nyikway cwo me oyido jobedo i Reka.
Nyikway Kenaz obedo: Othiniel kodi Seraya. Othiniel obedo ba Hathath kodi Mewonothay.
Mewonothay obedo ba Ofira. Seraya obedo ba Yowab m'ocako milelo pa jocwec, kama jondijo je jobed'iye.
Kaleb wod pa Yefune oyido nitie gi wote adek: Iru, Ela kodi Nam. Aka Ela obedo ba Kenaz.
Nyikway Yehalelel obedo: Zif, Zifa, Tira kodi Asahel.
Nyikway Ezira obedo: Yether, Mered, Efer kodi Yalon. Mered onywomo Bithia nyar kere ma Misir aka jonywolo nyar jo acel Miriam, kodi wot jo ario: Samay kodi Isiba m'ocako tindi Esitemowa.
Mered bende onywomo dhako ma wok Yuda aka jonywolo wot jo adek: Yered, m'ocako tindi Gedor, Heber, m'ocako tindi Soko kodi Yekuthiel, m'ocako tindi Zanowa.
Hodia onywomo nyamin Naham. Nyikway jo jocako nono Garimi, m'oyido jobedo i tindi Keila, kodi Maka, m'oyido jobedo i tindi Esitemowa.
Nyikway Simon obedo: Aminon, Rina, Benhanan kodi Tilon.
Nyikway Isi obedo: Zoheth kodi Benzoheth.
Nyikway Sela wod pa Yuda obedo: Eri, m'ocako tindi Leka, Lada m'ocako tindi Maresa; nono pa jokwoc nangin mafoth, m'oyido jobedo i tindi Beth Asibeya;
Yokim kodi ji m'oyido jobedo i tindi Kozeba, Yowas kodi Saraf, m'onywomo mon ma jowok i Mowab to geto i Bethelehem.
Jo oyido jobedo ŋecin pa kere aka oyido jobedo i tindi Netayim kodi Gedera.
Nyikway Simeo obedo: Nemuel, Yamin, Yarib, Zera kodi Saulo.
Saulo obedo ba Salum, nyakware obedo Mibisam, aka nyakwar wode obedo Misima.
Nyikway Misima obedo: Hamuel, Zakur kodi Simey.
Simey oyido nitie gi wote apar g'aucel kodi nyir aucel, to wade pere oyido jonitie gi nyithindho manok, aka nono pa Simeo k'olak paka nono pa Yuda.
Biliha, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel, Horima, Ziklag,
Bethmarkaboth, Hazarisusim, Bethbiri, kodi Sarim. Me oyido tindin pajo tundo i hongo ma Daudi obedo kere.
Jo bende jobedo i kabedo abic man: Etam, Ayin, Rimon, Token, Asan,
kodi calin m'oyido othoko tindin me tundo kiri i tindi Balath. Me randik ma jokuro ma mako kwoŋ pecin pajo kodi kam'oyido jobed'iye.
Mesobab, Yamilek, Yosa wod pa Amaziya,
Yowel, Yehu wod pa Yosibia, wod pa Seraya, wod pa Asiel,
Eliowenay, Yakoba, Yesohaya, Asaya, Adiel, Yesimiel, Benaya,
Ziza wod pa Sifi, wod pa Alon, wod pa Yedaya, wod pa Simiri, wod pa Semaya.
Me oyido jobedo jotel pecin pajo, aka nonin pajo omedere swa.
Joywore kiri yupodho ceŋ cegin gi Gedor aka jokwayo rombo pajo yuwok ceŋ ma milelo,
kama jonwaŋo lum m'oloth maber i lowo malac, m'opie aka ma siem nitie iye. Kole ji m'oyido jobedo kenyo obedo jonono pa Ham.

I hongo pa kere Hezekia ma Yuda, cwo ma malo jokadho Gedor aka jonyeko wema kodi udi lum pa ji m'oyido jobedo kenyo. Joriemo woko jo aka jogeto kenyo kicutho kwoŋbedo kenyo oyido nitie lum kweth ri rombo pajo.
Ji miya abic man ma nono pa Simeo jokadho yuwok ceŋ ma Edom. Nyikway Isi: Pelatia, Neria, Refaya kodi Uziel ama jotelo jo.
Kenyo joneko Joamalek m'oyido jodoŋ aka fodi jobedo kenyo kiri konon.
Nono pa Yuda am'olokere matek to jotel ma nonin je wok kwoŋ go.)
Nyikway Ruben okayo pa Yakobo obedo: Hanok, Palu, Heziron kodi Karim.
Nyikway Yowel obedo Semaya, Gog, Simey,
Mika, Reya, Bal,
kodi Bera ma Tiglath Pilesa kere ma Asiria omako to tero Asiria. Bera oyido obedo jatel ma nono.
Ndiko ma peco kwano jotel nonin pa Ruben me: Jeyel, Zekaria,
kodi Bela wod pa Azaz, ka nyakwar Sema janono pa Yowel. Nono me oyido bedo i Arower iy'adec wok kenyo yumalo ma Nebo kodi Bal Mewon.
Oyido jonitie gi dhok kweth i lowo ma Giliad, aka ameno jogeto i lowo tundo yuwok ceŋ mar'opalipat kiri i malawa Yufrete.
I hongo ma dhum pa Saulo, nono pa Ruben jomonjo jo Hagra, joneko jo, aka jogeto i lowo pajo yuwok ceŋ ma Giliad.
Nono pa Gad oyido jobedo yumalo pa jonono pa Ruben i lowo ma Basan tundo kiri Saleka.
Yowel ama ocako nono ma telo, aka Safan ocako mar'ario. Janay kodi Safat jocako nonin man i Basan.
Aka wade pajo man oyido jo nonin abirio me: Mikaili, Mesulam, Seba, Yoray, Yakan, Zia kodi Eber.
Jobedo nyikway Abihayili wod pa Hur, ma kwarere mewin pere cako kwoŋ jome: Abihayili, Hur, Yarowa, Giliad, Mikaili, Yesisay, Yahido, Buzi.
Ahi, wod pa Abidiel aka nyakwar Guni, oyido obedo jatel ma nonin me.
Oyido jobedo iy'adec ma Basan i Giliad, i tindin ma kenyo kodi kakwath je ma Saron.
(Ndiko me ocan i hongo ma dhum pa Kere Yotham ma Yuda kodi Kere Yerobowam mar'ario ma Isiraili.)
I nono pa Ruben, Gad, kodi yuwok ceŋ ma Manase oyido nitie jolweny 44,760 m'otiek jo i nger ma oro kwote, abor, kodi aserin.
Jolwenyo gi nonin pa Hagra, Yetur, Nafis kodi Nodab.
Joketho geno pajo i Were aka jokwayo go kony, to Were dwoko kwayo pajo aka omiyo jo loyo kwoŋ jo Hagra kodi jokony pajo.
Jomako kwoŋ jakwor ŋamia 50,000 rombo 250,000 punde 2,000 kodi jotwec 100,000.
Joneko jokwor kweth, kwoŋbedo lweny oyido obedo mito pa Were. Aka jomedere bedo kenyo tundo hongo m'oter jo i piny pa jopath.
Ji ma yuwok ceŋ ma Manase jogeto iy'adec ma Basan tundo kiri Bal Hamon, Senir kodi got Hamon, aka welo pajo omedere swa.
Me obedo jotel ma nonin pajo: Efer, Isi, Eliel, Aziriel, Yeremia, Hodavia kodi Yahidiel. Joje oyido jobedo jolweny matek, cwo ma joŋeyere, jotel ma nonin pajo.
To ji oyido jongoye gi adieri ri Were pa kwarere mewin jo aka joweyo go cako lamo werin pa ji ma Were oyido oriemo woko i lowo no.
Ameno Were omiyo Kere Tiglath Pilesa ma Asiria monjo piny pajo, aka okadho gi nonin pa Ruben, Gad, kodi yuwok ceŋ ma Manase to miyo jo geto ma swa i Hala, Habor, Hara, kodi cegin gi malawa Gozan.
Nyikway Kohath obedo: Amiram, Izihar, Hebron kodi Uziel.
Nyikway Amiram obedo: Aron, Musa kodi nyare acel, Miriam.
Nyikway Aron obedo: Nadab, Abihu, Eliazar kodi Ithamar.
Eliazar obedo ba Finehas, Finehas obedo ba Abisuwa,
Abisuwa obedo ba Buki, Buki obedo ba Uzi,
Uzi obedo ba Zerahia, Zerahia obedo ba Merayoth,
Merayoth obedo ba Amaria, Amaria obedo ba Ahitub,
Ahitub obedo ba Zadok, Zadok obedo ba Ahimaz,
Ahimaz obedo ba Azaria, Azaria obedo ba Yowanan,
aka Yowanan obedo ba Azaria aka go ama otiyo paka jacway ri Were i wi migam i ot ma Solomon ogeto i Yerusalem.)
Azaria obedo ba Amaria, Amaria obedo ba Ahitub,
Ahitub obedo ba Zadok, Zadok obedo Salum,
Salum obedo ba Hilikia, Hilikia obedo ba Azaria,
Azaria obedo ba Seraya, Seraya obedo ba Yehozadak,
aka Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon otero Yehozadak paka jatwec kanyacel gi ji ma Yuda kodi Yerusalem munyo Rwoth oweyo oriem jo woko i lowo pajo kadho bedo jopath.
Levi oyido nitie gi wote adek: Gerisom, Kohath kodi Merari.
Kisi wode oyido nitie gi wote: Nyikway Gerisom obedo Libini kodi Simey.
Nyikway Kohath obedo Amiram, Izihar, Hebron kodi Uziel.
Nyikway Merari obedo Mahili kodi Musi.
Me nyikway Gerisom wok i luse tundo i luse: Libini, Yahath, Zima,
Yowa, Ido, Zera kodi Yetheray.
Me nyikway Kohath wok i luse tundo i luse: Aminadab, Kora, Asir,
Elikana, Ebiasaf, Asir,
Tahath, Uriel, Uziya, Saulo.
Elikana oyido nitie gi wote ario: Amasay kodi Ahimoth.
Me nyikway Ahimoth wok i luse tundo i luse: Elikana, Zofay, Nahath,
Eliab, Yeroham, Elikana.
Samwiri oyido nitie gi wote ario: Yowel okayo kodi Abija ocoko.
Me nyikway Merari wok i luse tundo i luse: Mahili, Libini, Simey, Uza,
Simeya, Hagia kodi Asaya.
Me cwo ma Kere Daudi oketho telo wer i kalamo i Yerusalem munyo otiek tero Kakan ma Cikirok kenyo.
Oyido jotiyo i weso i Wema pa Rwoth i hongo mafodi Kere Solomon k'ogeto Ot pa Were.
Me cwo ma jotiyo kodi wot jo.
Nono pa Kohath: Heman jatel pa jower marapena, wod pa Yowel. Kwarere pere cako kwoŋ Yakobo ama: Heman, Yowel, Samwiri,
Elikana, Yeroham, Eliel, Towa,
Zuf, Elikana, Mahath, Amasay,
Elikana, Yowel, Azaria, Zefania,
Tahath, Asir, Ebiasaf, Kora,
Izihar, Kohath, Levi, Yakobo.
Asaf oyido obedo jatel pa jower mar'ario. Kwarere pere cako kwoŋ Levi ama: Asaf, Berekia, Simeya,
Mikaili, Baseya, Malikija,
Ethini, Zera, Adaya,
Ethan, Zima, Simey,
Yahath, Gerisom, Levi.
Ethan janono pa Merari oyido obedo jatel pa jower mar'adek. Kwarere pere cako kwoŋ Levi: Ethan, Kisi, Abidi, Maluk,
Hasabia, Amaziya, Hilikia,
Amizi, Bani, Semer,
Mahili, Musi, Merari, Levi.
Jolevi man omiyo jo tic m'odoŋ je i kalamo.

To Aron kodi wote oyido jomiyo mic awaŋa kodi ma buban i wi migam. Oyido jotimo tic je i Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo kodi miyo cowirok ma cwako reco pa Joisiraili. Oyido jotimo gime je cungo kwoŋ cik ma Musa ŋeca pa Were omiyo.
Me wot Aron: Eliazar, Finehas, Abisuwa,
Buki, Uzi, Zerahia,
Merayoth, Amaria, Ahitub,
Zadok, kodi Ahimaz.
Me adec m'oyido omiy nyikway Aron janono pa Kohath. Jolimo pok marapena ma lowo m'omiy Jolevi.
Omiy jo Hebron, iy'adec ma Yuda kodi kakwath m'othoko je.
Ndelin kodi calin mere, to ma tindi madwoŋ omiy Kaleb wod pa Yefune.
Omiy nyikway Aron tindin madongo ma pondo: Hebron, Libina, Jatir. Esitemowa,
Hilen, Debir,
Asan, Bethsemes kodi kakwath pajo je.
Wok kwoŋ nono pa Benyamin omiy jo, Geba, Alemeth, Anathoth, kodi kakwath pajo je. Tindin pajo je i pecin pajo obedo apar g'adek.
Tindin apar iy'adec ma yupodho ceŋ ma Manase omiy nono m'odoŋ Kohath, peco gi peco.
Nono pa Gerisom, peco gi peco, omiy jo tindin apar g'adek iy'adec ma Isakar, Aser, Nafital kodi yuwok ceŋ ma Manase i Basan.
I nger acel nono pa Merari, peco gi peco, omiy jo tindin apar g'ario iy'adec pa Ruben, Gad kodi Zebulun.
Ameno Joisiraili jomiyo Jolevi tindin kodi kakwath pajo.
(Tindin iy'adec pa Yuda, Simeo kodi Benyamin, m'otuci malo, bende opok gi bolo kwir.)
Pecin megi ma nono pa Kohath omiy jo tindin kodi kakwath iy'adec pa Efrayim:
Sekem, tindi madwoŋ ma pondo i tendere ma Efrayim, Gezer,
Yokimeam, Bethhoron,
Ayijalon, kodi Gath Rimon.
Iy'adec ma yupodho ceŋ pa Manase omiy jo tindi Aner kodi Bileam kodi kakwath m'othoko jo.
Pecin ma nono pa Gerisom omiy jo tindin me, kodi kakwath pajo.
Iy'adec ma yuwok ceŋ pa Manase: Golan i Basan kodi Asiteroth.
Iy'adec pa Isakar: Kedes, Daberath,
Ramoth kodi Anem.
Iy'adec pa Aser: Masal, Abidon,
Hukok kodi Rehob.
Iy'adec pa Nafital: Kedes i Galili, Hamon kodi Kiriathayim.
Pecin m'odoŋ ma nono pa Merari omiy jo tindin me gi kakwath m'othoko jo.
Iy'adec pa Zebulun: Rimono kodi Tabor.
Iy'adec pa Ruben, yuwok ceŋ ma malawa Yordan kalo Yeriko: Beza i lowo m'obipere, Yahiza,
Kedemoth kodi Mefath.
Iy'adec pa Gad: Ramoth Giliad, Mahanayim,
Hesibon kodi Yazer.
Nyikway Isakar obedo: Tola, Puwa, Yasub kodi Simiron.
Nyikway Tola obedo: Uzi, Refaya, Yeriel, Yahimay, Ibisam kodi Semuel. Jo oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin ma nono pa Tola aka jolweny matek i luse pajo. I hongo pa Kere Daudi nyikway jo oyido romo 22,600.
Wod Uzi obedo Izirahia. Nyikway Izirahia obedo: Mikaili, Obadia, Yowel kodi Isia, aka oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin pajo.
Oyido jonitie gi mon kweth kodi nyikway jo kweth aka jonyalo bedo gi cwo 36,000 ma jolweny.
Randik ma mako kwoŋ jowaco nike i pecin pajo je oyido jonitie gi cwo 87,000 i nono pa Benyamin ma jonyalo lweny.
Nyikway Benyamin obedo: Bela, Beker kodi Yediael, jadek.
Nyikway Bela obedo: Ezibon, Uzi, Uziel Yerimoth, kodi Ir, jabic. Oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin pajo i nono aka jolweny matek. Kwoŋ nyikway jo oyido nitie cwo 22,034 ma jonyalo lweny.
Nyikway Beker obedo: Zemira, Yowas, Elieza, Eliowenay, Omiri, Yeremoth, Abija, Anathoth kodi Alemeth.
Randik ma mako kwoŋ jowaco nike peco gi peco oyido nitie cwo 20,200 ma jonyalo lweny.
Wod Yediael obedo Bilihan. Nyikway Bilihan obedo: Yeus, Benyamin, Ehud, Kenana, Zethan, Tarsis kodi Ahisahar.
Oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin ma nono aka jolweny matek. Kwoŋ nyikway jo oyido nitie cwo 17,200 ma jonyalo lweny.
Sufim kodi Hupim jobedo wot Ir, aka Husim obedo wod pa Aher.
Nyikway Nafital obedo: Jahiziel, Guni, Jezer kodi Salum. (Jobedo nyikway Biliha malaya pa Yakobo m'onywolo Dan kodi Nafital.)
Nyikway Manase obedo: Asiriel kodi Makir dhako pere ma thenge ma wok Arameyan onywolo. Makir obedo ba Giliad.
Makir onywomo ri Hufim dhako, to nywomo ri Sufim bende dhako. Nyamin go oyido ilwoŋ ni Maka. Wod Makir mar'ario obedo Zelofehad, aka onywolo nyir kende.
Maka, cipa Makir onywolo rigo wote; Peres kodi Seres. Peres obedo ba Ulam kodi Rakem.
Ulam obedo ba Bedan. Me je obedo nyikway Giliad, wod pa Makir aka nyakwar Manase.
Nyamin Giliad, Hamoleketh onywolo wote: Isihod, Abieza kodi Mahila.
Nyikway Semida obedo Ahiyan, Sekem, Likihi kodi Aniam.
Me nyikway Efrayim wok i luse tundo i luse: Suthela, Bered, Tahath, Eliada, Tahath,
Zabad, Suthela. Efrayim oyido nitie gi wote ario man: Ezer kodi Elad m'oneki jo munyo jotemo kwalo dhok pa ji ma Gath.
Ba Joefrayim oywako jo ma ndelo kweth, aka wade pere jobino yomo cunye.
Efrayim onindo gi cege kendo aka cege ogamo iye to nywolo wode. Jocwoko nyinge ni Beria kwoŋbedo teko oyido opodho peco pajo.
Efrayim oyido nitie gi nyare m'ilwoŋo ni Sera. Ogeto tindin Bethhoron ma yumalo kodi yupiny kodi Uzen Sera.
Efrayim oyido nitie gi wode man, Refa ma nyikwaye jobedo: Resef, Tela, Tahan,
Ladan, Amihud, Elisama,
Nun kodi Yosuwa.
Adece ma jotero to jogeto iye obedo: Bethel kodi tindin mere, yuwok ceŋ ma Naran, yuwok ceŋ ma Gezer kodi tindin mere, Sekem kodi tindin mere tundo kiri Aya kodi tindin mere.
Nyikway Manase oyido jodhumo tindin madongo Bethsan kodi tindin mere, Tanak kodi tindin mere, Megido kodi tindin mere kodi Dor kodi Aya kodi tindin mere.
Me je kabedo ma nyikway Yozefu wod pa Yakobo oyido jobed'iye.
Nyikway Aser obedo: Imina, Isiva, Isivi, Beria kodi nyamin jo Sera.
Nyikway Beria obedo: Heber, Melikiel m'obedo ba Birizayith.
Nyikway Heber obedo: Yafilet, Soma, Hotham kodi nyamin jo Suwa.
Nyikway Yafilet obedo: Pasak, Bimihal kodi Asivath.
Nyikway Soma obedo: Ahi, Roga, Huba kodi Aram.
Nyikway Hotham obedo: Zofa, Imina, Seles kodi Amal.
Nyikway Zofa obedo: Suwa, Harinefer, Suwal, Ber, Imira
Beza, Hod, Sama, Silisa, Ithiran kodi Bera.
Nyikway Yether obedo: Yefune, Pisipa kodi Ara.
Nyikway Ula obedo: Ara, Haniel kodi Rizia.
Me je obedo nyikway Aser Jobedo jotel ma pecin pajo, aka jolweny matek. Kwoŋ nyikway Aser oyido nitie cwo 26,000 ma jonyalo lweny.
Benyamin oyido nitie gi wote abic. Bela okayo, Asibel mar'ario, Ahara mar'adek,
Noha mar'aŋwen kodi Rafa mar'abic.
Nyikway Bela obedo: Adar, Gera, Abihud,
Abisuwa, Naman, Ahowa,
Gera, Sefufan kodi Hiram.
Me wot Ehud (jo am'oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin pajo m'oyido jobedo i Geba, to m'oter jo bedo jopath i Manahath.)
Naman, Ahija kodi Gera, m'obedo ba Uza kodi Amihud.
Saharayim olimo wote i piny Mowab rumacen ma riemo mon pere ario; Husim kodi Bara.
Saharayim onywomo Hodes m'onywolo rigo wote abirio; Yobab, Zibia, Mesa, Malikam,
Yeus, Sakia kodi Miriam. Nyikwaye je jobedo jotel ma pecin pajo.
Saharayim bende onywolo wote gi Husim: Abitub kodi Elipal.
Nyikway Elipal obedo: Eber, Misam kodi Semed m'ogeto tindi madongo Ono kodi Lod kodi calin m'othoko jo.
Beria kodi Sema oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin ma jogeto i tindi madwoŋ Ayijalon aka joriemo ji m'oyido jobedo i tindi madwoŋ Gath.
Aka Ahiyo, Sasak, Yeremoth,
Zebadia, Aradi, Eder,
Mikaili, Isipa kodi Joha jobedo wot Beria.
Zebadia, Mesulam, Hiziki, Heber,
Isimeray, Izilia kodi Yobab jobedo wot Elifal.
Yakim, Zikiri, Zabidi,
Elianay, Zilethay, Eliel,
Adaya, Beraya kodi Simirath jobedo wot Simey.
Isipan, Eber, Eliel,
Abidon, Zikiri, Hanan,
Hanania, Elam, Anithothija,
Ifideya kodi Penuel jobedo wot Sasak.
Samiseray, Seharia, Athalia,
Yaresia, Elia kodi Zikiri jobedo wot Yeroham.
Me oyido jotel ma nonin pa kwarere pajo aka jo kodi nyikway jo oyido jobedo i Yerusalem.
Jeyel ocako tindi madwoŋ Gibeon aka ogeto kenyo. Cege oyido ilwoŋo ni Maka,
aka okayo pere obedo Abidon. Nyikwaye ma jobedo: Zur, Kisi, Bal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahiyo, Zeker
kodi Mikiloth, m'obedo ba Simeya. Nyikway jo oyido jobedo i Yerusalem cegin gi pecin man ma nono pajo.
Ner obedo ba Kisi, Kisi obedo ba Kere Saulo. Saulo obedo ba Yonathan, Malikisua, Abinadab kodi Esibal.
Yonathan obedo ba Meribal ma nyinge man obedo Mefiboseth, aka Meribal obedo ba Mika.
Mika obedo ba Pithon, Melek, Tareya kodi Ahaz.
Ahaz obedo ba Yehoyada, aka Yehoyada obedo ba Alemeth, Azimaveth kodi Zimiri. Zimiri obedo ba Moza.
Moza obedo ba Bineya, Bineya obedo ba Rafa, Rafa obedo ba Eliazar, aka Eliazar obedo ba Azel.
Azel oyido nitie gi wote aucel: Azirikam, Bokeru, Isimayil, Seria, Obadia kodi Hanan.
Esek, omin Azel oyido nitie gi wote adek: Ulam, Yes kodi Elifelet.
Nyikway Ulam oyido jobedo jolweny matek aka joŋeyo swa oro kwote kodi aserin. Go oyido nitie gi wote kodi nyikwaye 150 aka joje jobedo jonono pa Benyamin.
Joisiraili je ondiki jo cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, aka wac me ondiki i Kitawo pa Kerin ma Isiraili.
Joyuda oyido oter jo bedo i Babilon paka gir'acula ma reco pajo.
Ji marapena dwoko i lim pajo i tindin madongo obedo Joisiraili, jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi kodi jotic i Ot pa Were.
Ji ma nono pa Yuda, Benyamin, Efrayim kodi Manase jokadho bedo i Yerusalem.
Acel kwoŋ pecin ma jodwoko obedo apa Uthay wod pa Amihud, wod pa Omiri, wod pa Imiri, wod pa Bani, aka nyakwar Perez wod pa Yuda.
Jomegi jowok i nono pa Silon, kiri gi Asaya (jadwoŋ loyo) kodi wote.
Wok i nono pa Zera, Yeuel kodi wade pere jodwoko.
I je pecin 690 wok i nono pa Yuda jodwoko.
Wok i nono pa Benyamin odwoko Salu wod pa Mesulam, wod pa Hodavia, wod pa Hasenuwa.
Ibineya wod pa Yeroham, Ela wod pa Uzi, wod pa Mikir, kodi Mesulam wod pa Sefatiya, wod pa Reuel, wod pa Ibiniya.
Oyido nitie pecin 956 ma nono me ma jobedo kenyo. Cwo je m'otuci malo oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin pajo.
Kwoŋ jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jodwoko obedo: Yedaya, Yehoyarib, Yakin
kodi Azaria wod pa Hilikia ma kwarere pajo obedo: Mesulam, Zadok, Merayoth kodi Ahitub. Azaria am'oyido jatel ma Ot pa Were.
Adaya wod pa Yeroham, ma kwarere pere obedo: Pasur kodi Malikija kodi Masay wod pa Adiel, ma kwarere pere obedo Yahizera, Mesulam kodi Ima.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin oyido joromo 1,760. Oyido joŋeyo swa tic ma Ot pa Were.
Jolevi ma jodwoko obedo: Semaya wod pa Hasub, ma kwarere mewin pere obedo; Azirikam, Hasabia, Merari,
Bakibakar, Heres, Galal, Matanaya, Mika, Zikiri kodi Asaf.
Obadia wod pa Semaya, ma kwarere mewin pere obedo: Galal, Yeduthun, Berekia wod pa Asa aka nyakwar Elikana m'oyido bedo iy'adec ma tindi Netofa.
Jokur waŋkac obedo: Salum, Akub, Talmon kodi Ahiman, aka Salum am'oyido obedo jatel pajo.
Con mere oyido jokuro waŋkac pa kere ma yuwok ceŋ. Me oyido jokur ma waŋkac ma kambi pa Jolevi.
Salum wod pa Kore, aka nyakwar Ebiasaf janono pa Kora am'oyido jokuro dhiot ma Wema pa Rwoth, paka kwarere pajo cango jokuro kambi pa Rwoth.
Finehas wod pa Eliazar oyido obedo jatel pajo i hongo moro; Rwoth oyido nitie gi go.
Zekaria wod pa Meselemia bende oyido obedo jakur i dhiot ma Wema pa Rwoth.
I je oyer cwo 212 kuro dhiote kodi waŋkace. Ondiki jo cungo kwoŋ adec m'oyido jobed'iye. Kere Daudi kodi jatuci wac Were Samwiri ama joketho jo timo tic no.
Jo kodi nyikway jo jomedo kuro waŋkace ma Ot pa Were.
Jokur oyido jobedo i thenge aŋwen, yuwok ceŋ, yupodho ceŋ, yumalo kodi yupiny.
Jokur me oyido jokonyere gi wade pajo m'oyido jobedo iy'adec pajo aka oyido jokuro i weso ma ndelo abirio.
Jotel pa jokur j'aŋwen ma Jolevi am'oyido jokuro kiri kisikin ma Ot pa Were kodi gigipiny m'ikano kenyo.
Oyido jobedo cegin gi Ot pa Were, kwoŋbedo oyido obedo tic pajo kuro kodi yawo waŋkace kisi odikin.
Jolevi megi oyido jokuro gigipiny m'ioro i lamo i Ot pa Were, kole oyido joripo kwano k'irwako kodi k'iwodho.
Megi oyido jokuro gigipiny maleŋ, kodi moko, vini, mo, buban kodi gigipiny maŋwe kur.
To tic ma ruwo gigipiny maŋwe kur oyido obedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Matithia, okayo pa Salum aka janono pa Kora am'oyido Jalevi ma yiko mugat m'opayere.
Jonono pa Kohath am'oyido joyiko mugat maleŋ m'ioro i Ot pa Were kisi Sabato.
Jolevi megi oyido jobedo jower i Ot pa Were. Jotel ma pecin oyido jobedo i udi ma Ot pa Were man aka oyido jokitim tic man je, kwoŋbedo oyido jotiyo wor kodi odieceŋ.
Cwo m'otuci malo no am'oyido jotel ma pecin pajo i nonin pajo aka oyido jobedo i Yerusalem.
Yeyel ocako tindi madwoŋ Gibeon aka ogeto kenyo. Cege oyido ilwoŋo ni Maka,
aka okayo pere obedo Abidon. Nyikwaye ma jobedo: Zur, Kisi, Bal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahiyo, Zekaria kodi Mikiloth
ba Simeya. Nyikway jo oyido jobedo i Yerusalem cegin gi pecin man ma nono pajo.
Ner obedo ba Kisi, Kisi obedo ba Kere Saulo, aka Saulo obedo ba Yonathan, Malikisua, Abinadab kodi Esibal.
Yonathan obedo ba Meribal ma nyinge man obedo Mefiboseth, aka Meribal obedo ba Mika.
Mika obedo ba Pithon, Melek, Tareya kodi Ahaz.
Ahaz obedo ba Yehoyada, aka Yehoyada obedo ba Alemeth, Azimaveth kodi Zimiri. Zimiri obedo ba Moza.
Moza obedo ba Bineya, Bineya obedo ba Rafa, Rafa obedo ba Eliazar, aka Eliazar obedo ba Azel.
Azel oyido nitie gi wote aucel: Azirikam, Bokeru, Isimayil, Seria, Obadia kodi Hanan.
Jofilistia jolwenyo gi Joisiraili wi got Gilbowa. Jofilistia joneko Joisiraili kweth, aka Joisiraili megi joringo kiri gi Saulo kodi wote bende.
To Jofilistia joriemo jo, aka jomako jo to joneko wot Saulo adek; Yonathan, Abinadab, kodi Malikisua.
Lweny obedo malieth swa thoko Saulo, aka aserin pa jakwor ocwowo go to weyo kwoŋe adholin.

Saulo owaco ri jago pere ni, “Bol abor perin wonekan ŋey Jofilistia ma jok'othumere me jokiri jowonyeran to jonekan.” To jago pere k'otimo ameno, kole obedo gi lworo. Saulo won okwanyo abor pere, ocwowere gine to tho.
Munyo jago pere oneno nike go otho, go bende omako abor pere, ocwowere gine to tho kanyacel gi Saulo.
Ameno apaka Saulo, wote adek, kodi jago pere, kiri gi cwo pere jotho i ndelo no.

Munyo Joisiraili m'oyido jonitie i thenge man, i milelo Yezirel kodi m'oyido jonitie yuwok ceŋ ma malawa Yordan jowinjo nike jolweny pa Joisiraili joringo, aka Saulo kodi wote je oneki, joweyo tindi pajo to joringo. Aka Jofilistia jobino to jobed'iye.
Yawere odikin munyo Jofilistia jogik kwanyo gigipiny kwoŋ delkwoŋ Joisiraili ma jotho, jonwaŋo delkwoŋ Saulo kodi wote joriere wi got Gilbowa.
Joŋado ŋuti Saulo, jokwanyo gilweny pere, aka jooro jomikwenda woth gi jo i piny Filistia paka rom tero wac maber ri werin pajo kodi ji pajo.
Joketho gilweny pere i ot pa were pajo m'ilwoŋo ni Dagon, aka joguro delkwoŋ Saulo i kor cel ma tindi Bethsan.
Munyo ji ma Yabes i Gibeya jowinjo gima Jofilistia jotimo ri Saulo,
cwo ma jomiseni joay to jocako woth wor gipi, aka jokwanyo delkwoŋ Saulo kodi wote wok i kor cel ma tindi Bethsan, jodwoko gi jo i Yabes, jowaŋo kenyo to joriyo ma ndelo abirio.
aka k'orango kony wok bongi Rwoth. Riameno Rwoth oneko go to miyo ker pere ri Daudi wod pa Yese.
Kenyo nonin je ma Isiraili jobino bongi Daudi i Hebron aka jowaco rigo ni, “Neni, wabedo ji acel aka remo acel.
Cango munyo Saulo oyido fodi kere mawan, oyido itelo Joisiraili i lweny aka Rwoth ocikin nike ibino telo ji pere to ibedo jadhum pajo.”
Ameno jotel ma Isiraili je jobino bongi Daudi i Hebron; aka kere Daudi otimo gi jo cikirok ruwaŋ Rwoth aka jowiro Daudi gi mo bedo kere ma Isiraili cungo kwoŋ wac ma Rwoth owaco ri Samwiri.
Joyebus jowaco ri Daudi ni, “Ikiladonjo ka.” To makada nende, Daudi omako kapondo Zayon, ma pama ilwoŋo ni tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi.
Daudi oyido owaco ni, “Ŋat'otel monjo Joyebus labedo jamituka jolweny!” Aka Yowab wod pa Zeruya am'otelo monjo to bedo jamituka.
Daudi okadho bedo i kapondo Zayon, aka ocaki lwoŋo nike tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi.
Daudi ogeto tindi madwoŋ me thoko, cako i kam'oyido othor iye piny tundo yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ matendere, aka Yowab oyiko thenge m'odoŋ je.
Daudi omedo lokirok matek, kole Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny oyido nitie gi go.
Me a nyingi jolweny pa Daudi ma jotek. Kanyacel kodi Joisiraili, jokonyo go bedo kere, paka Rwoth oyido ociko; aka jokuro ker pere matek.
Marapena obedo Yasebim janono pa Hakmon m'otelo ji adek lweny gi cwo 300 aka joneko joje i lweny acel.
Ŋata luwo go kwoŋ cwo adek ma jotek me oyido obedo Eliazar wod pa Dodo janono pa Aho.
Go oyido nitie gi Daudi munyo Jofilistia jocokere kenyo lweny i Pas Damim, aka cwo ma Isiraili joringo.
To go kodi Daudi jocungo i dier ndelo aka jolwenyo gi Jofilistia. Rwoth imiyo go loyo madwoŋ.
Ndelo acel, cwo adek kwoŋ cwo piero adek ma jotek joloro piny i ŋungu ma Abidulam, kama Daudi oyido nitie iye, kucel kitipa pa Jofilistia oyido joketho kambi i milelo Refayim.
I waŋceŋ no Daudi oyido nitie kam'okanere, aka Jofilistia oyido jonitie i Bethelehem.
Daudi owinjo nike mito dok peco aka owaco ni, “Bedi nyatoro moro oyido nyalo miyan pi amadha wok i waŋ pi manitie i waŋkac ma Bethelehem!”
Kenyo cwo adek ma joŋeyere jorire gi i kambi pa Jofilistia, jotwomo pi wok i waŋ pi ma waŋkac ma Bethelehem, aka jokelo ri Daudi. To Daudi k'onyalo madho; to konjo woko paka mic ri Rwoth,
aka owaco ni, “Rwoth, akinyali madho pi me! Dinyo ocale p'amadho remo pa cwo me ma jojala kwo pajo!” Ameno go okwero madho.
Abisay omin Yowab, aka wod pa Zeruya am'oyido obedo jatel pa cwo piero adek ma jotek. Go olwenyo g'abor pere kodi cwo 300 to neko jo, aka oŋeyere swa kwoŋ cwo adek.
Go oyido oŋeyere swa kwoŋ cwo piero adek, aka obedo jamituka pajo; to go oyido k'oŋeyere swa paka cwo adek ca.

Benaya wod pa Yehoyada ma wok Kabizel bende oyido obedo jacwo ma jamaker; otimo gigipiny madongo kweth, to neko kiri jolweny madongo ario ma Jomowab. Ndelo moro go odonjo i bur munyo pe cwe to neko simbwor.
Go bende oneko jacwo m'ogaŋere ma Jamisir m'oyido nitie gi toŋ. Benaya omonjo go g'abiro, aka omayo Jamisir toŋ wok i cinge to neko go gine.
Me a tim ma miseni ma Benaya wod pa Yehoyada otimo, aka omiyo go nyinge kwoŋ cwo adek ca.
Go oyido oŋeyere kwoŋ cwo piero adek, to oyido k'oŋeyere swa paka cwo adek ca. Aka Daudi oketho go paka jatel pa jokur pere.
Me a cwo pa Daudi ma jomaker; Asahel omin Yowab oyido obedo acel kwoŋ cwo piero adek; Elihanan wod pa Dodo ma wok Bethelehem,
Samoth ma wok i Harod, Helez ma wok i Pelet,
Ira wod pa Ikes ma wok Tekowa, Abieza ma wok Anathoth,
Sibekay ma wok Husa, Ilay ma wok Aho,
Maharay ma wok Netofa, Heled wod pa Bana ma wok Netofa,
Ithay wod pa Ribay ma wok Gibeya i Benyamin, Benaya ma wok Pirathon,
Huray ma wok milelo cegin gi Gas, Abiel ma wok Ariba,
Azimaveth ma wok Baharum, Eliaba ma wok Salibon,
Hasem ma wok Gizon, Yonathan wod pa Sage ma wok Harar,
Ahiyam wod pa Sakar ma wok Harar, Elifal wod pa Ur,
Hefer ma wok Mekera, Ahija ma wok Pelon,
Heziro ma wok Kamel, Naray wod pa Ezibay,
Yowel omin Nathan, Mibihar wod pa Hagar,
Zelek ma wok Amon, Nahor ma wok Beroth, aka jago pa Yowab wod pa Zeruya,
Ira kodi Gareb ma jowok Jatir,
Uriya Jahiti, Zabad wod pa Alay,
Adina wod pa Siza (jatel i nono pa Ruben, kodi kitipa pere won ma jolweny piero adek)
Hanan wod pa Maka, Yosafat ma wok Mithan,
Uziya ma wok Asitera, Sama kodi Yehiel wot Hotham ma wok Arower,
Yediael wod pa Simiri, kodi omin Yoha ma jowok Tiza,
Eliel ma wok Mahava, Yeribay kodi Yosavia wot Elinam, Ithima ma wok Mowab,
Eliel, Obed, kodi Yasiel ma jowok Zoba.
Me a ji ma jobino bongi Daudi i Ziklag, munyo oyido go kinyal woth paka mito kwoŋbedo Saulo wod pa Kisi. Jobedo acele cele kwoŋ jolweny matek ma jokonyo go i lweny.
Oyido jonyalo celo aserin kosa dwiro telin gi cingi gin maracuc kosa maracam, aka oyido jobedo jonono pa Benyamin, wade pa Saulo.
Jatel oyido obedo Ahiyeza, Yowas, joje wot Sema ma wok Gibeya. Yehiel kodi Pelet wot Azimaveth, Beraka, Yehu ma wok Anathoth,
Isimaya ma wok Gibeon, jalweny matek kwoŋ cwo piero adek aka jatel pajo; Yeremia, Yahaziel, Yowanan, kodi Yozabad ma wok Gedera.
Eluzay, Yerimoth, Belia, Semaria, kodi Sefatiya ma wok Harif.
Elikana, Isia, Azarel, Yoezer, kodi Yasobeyam ma jo wok Kora.
Yowela kodi Zebadia, wot Yeroham ma wok Gedor.
Me a nyingi jolweny matek wok i nono pa Gad ma joriwere gi jolweny pa Daudi munyo go nitie i thim. Oyido joŋeyo swa oro kwote kodi abor, joger paka simbwore, aka jodwir paka amudhe ma got.
Jatel obedo Ezer, Obadia obedo mar'ario, Eliab mar'adek,
Misimana mar'aŋwen, Yeremia mar'abic,
Atay mar'aucel, Eliel mar'abirio,
Yowanan mar'aboro, Elizabad mar'abuŋwen,
Yeremia mar'apar kodi Makibanay.
Cwo megi wok i nono pa Benyamin oyido jobedo jotel ma cwo gana, kodi cwo miya.
Me a cwo ma joŋado malawa Yordan munyo pi mol i thenge mere i dwe marapena, to jokedho ji m'oyido jobedo i milelo yuwok ceŋ kodi yupodho ceŋ ma malawa.
Jonono pa Benyamin megi kodi jonono pa Yuda jobino bongi Daudi kama go oyido opond'iye.

Daudi okadho romo gi jo aka owaco rijo ni, “Ka wibino paka merin konyan, afoyo gi neno win. Riwere win gi wan! To ka wimito camo ran sereko ri jokwor paran, makada nende akitemo timo riwin raco, Were pa kwarere mawan laŋeyo to miyo win gir'acula.”
Kenyo cuny pa Were obino kwoŋ Amasay, jatel pa cwo piero adek, aka owaco ni,
“Wabedo aperin, awi Daudi;
aka kodin, awi wod pa Yese!
Siem rin,
aka siem ri jono ma jokonyin!
Kole Were perin ama konyin.”
Kenyo Daudi ojolo jo, aka oketho jo jotel jolweny pere.

Jolweny megi wok i nono pa Manase joriwere gi Daudi munyo obino gi Jofilistia lweny gi Saulo. Kucel go k'okonyo Jofilistia, kole kerin pajo jolworo nike Daudi oyido nyalo camo rijo sereko ri jadwoŋ pere Saulo, ameno jodhiro dok i Ziklag.
Me a jolweny ma nono pa Manase ma joriwere gi Daudi munyo odwoko: Adina, Yozabad, Yediael, Mikaili, Yozabad, Elihu kodi Zilethay. Jomituka ma kitipin ma cwo gana.
Jotiyo ri Daudi paka jomituka pa jolweny pere kwoŋbedo oyido jobedo jolweny matek. Rumacen jobedo jomituka pa jolweny pa Joisiraili.
Kole kisi ndelo cwo manyen joriwere gi jolweny pa Daudi, cuka jolweny pere jolokere madwoŋ, paka jolweny pa Were.
Me a welo ma kitipin pa jolweny ma jobino bongi Daudi i Hebron wiro ker pa Saulo wobedi apa Daudi, cungo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth.
Wok i nono pa Yuda, cwo m'otiek jo aka ma jonitie gi kwote kodi abor obedo 6,800.
Wok i nono pa Simeo obedo cwo 7,100 m'otiek jo.
Wok i nono pa Levi obedo cwo 4,600.
Yehoyada, nyakwar Aron, kodi cwo 3,700.
Zadok, jayac ma jalweny, kodi jomituka piero ario g'ario ma jobedo wade pere.
Wok i nono pa Benyamin, nono pa Saulo obedo cwo 3,000. Jonono pa Benyamin madit mere jomedo woro Saulo.
Wok i nono pa Efrayim obedo cwo 20,800 jolweny matek aka ma joŋeyere i pecin pajo.
Wok i nono ma yupodho ceŋ ma Manase obedo cwo 18,000 m'oyer kadho ketho Daudi kere.
Wok i nono pa Isakar, obedo jotel 200 kanyacel gi cwo m'oyido jotelo. Cwo me oyido joŋeyo gima Isiraili ripo timo kodi sawa maber wotim'iye.
Wok i nono pa Zebulun obedo cwo 50,000 ma joŋeyo oro kisi gilweny aka joyikere konyo Daudi gi atoŋa acel.
Wok i nono pa Nafital obedo jotel 1,000 kanyacel gi cwo 37,000 ma jonitie gi kwote kodi abor.
Wok i nono pa Dan cwo 28,600 m'otiek.
Wok i nono pa Asiha cwo 40,000 ma joyikere lweny.
Nonin ma yuwok ceŋ ma Yordan; nono pa Ruben, Gad kodi yuwok ceŋ ma Manase obedo cwo 120,000 ma joŋeyo oro kisi gilweny.
Jolweny me je, ma joyikere lweny, jokadho i Hebron, gi kinen ma ketho Daudi kere ma Isiraili. Joisiraili ma jodoŋ je oyido joriwere gi atoŋa acel.
Jobedo kenyo gi Daudi ma ndelo adek, munyo jocemo aka jomedho, kole Joisiraili megi oyido jotedo rijo.

Aka joger pajo bende, wok bor cako i nono pa Isakar, Zebulun kodi Nafital, ji jokelo punde, ŋamia, dhok kodi rombo ma jotiŋo cemo, moko, nyandere m'othwo, vini kodi mo. Me je oyido nyutho siemirok m'oyido nitie i Isiraili gipi.
Daudi openjo jomituka pa jolweny ma kitipin ma gana kodi miya.

Daudi owaco ri Joisiraili je ni, “Ka wiyere, aka k'obedo mito pa Rwoth Were mawan, weyi waori jomikwenda bongi ji mawan m'odoŋ kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi i tindin pajo, jowowaci rijo cokirok gi wan ka.
Kenyo walakadho wakel Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were, ma Saulo k'odewo kwoŋe munyo go oyido obedo kere.”
Ji jowinjo maber gi wac me aka joyere.
Daudi kodi Joisiraili je jokadho kiri Bala, meno Kiriath Yerim, iy'adec ma Yuda, kelo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth, m'obedo malo ma cwec ma jobwombe m'ilwoŋo ni Kerubim.
Jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok wok i ot pa Abinadab, aka joketho i magal manyen. Uza kodi Ahiyo wot Abinadab am'oyido jogweyo magal manyen me,
Kucel Daudi kodi Joisiraili oyido jomielo ruwaŋ Were, gi wer kodi meni pajo je. Aka oyido jogoyo tongol, adungu, bunde, nyweny m'irudo, seke kodi gwara.
Munyo jotundo i kisia ma Kidon, thwondhe jocer, aka Uza otelo cinge to geyo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were.
Nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ Uza aka Were oneko go rupiri otelo cinge to geyo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were. Uza otho i ŋeti Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were.
Daudi omako nge rupiri Rwoth omiyo Uza gir'acula i nge; aka kabedo no olwoŋi ni Perez Uza.
Daudi olworo Rwoth ndelo no aka openjere ni, “Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth obin nedi bongan!”
Ameno Daudi k'okadho gi Kakan ma Cikirok i Yerusalem; aka otero i ot pa Obed Edom, ma wok i tindi Gath.
Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were obedo i ot pa Obed Edom ma dwe adek, aka Rwoth omiyo Obed Edom kodi peco pere je silwany.
Hiram kere ma Tire ooro jomikwenda bongi Daudi gi kasike ma yath vini gi jobol ot, gi jogeto ot gi tele geto ri Daudi peco pa kere.
Aka Daudi oniaŋ nike Rwoth oyido oyero go bedo kere ma Isiraili aka oyido tiŋo malo ker pere ro Joisiraili.
I Yerusalem Daudi onywomo mon man, aka onywol rigo nyithindho man.
Me a nyingi nyithindho m'onywol rigo i Yerusalem: Samuwa, Sobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibihar, Elisuwa, Elifelet
Noga, Nefeg, Yafiya
Elisama, Beliada kodi Elifelet.
Munyo Jofilistia jowinjo nike owir Daudi gi mo paka kere ma Isiraili, jolweny pajo jokidho dwaro go; to Daudi owinjo aka oŋanjo romo gi jo.
Jofilistia jotundo i milelo Refayim to jocokere kenyo.
Daudi openjo Rwoth ni, “Amonji Jofilistia? Inomiyan jo i cingan?”
Rwoth odwoko ni, “Ey monji jo aka alamiyo jo i cingin.”
Ameno Daudi obino i Bal Perizim aka kenyo okengila Jofilistia. Daudi owaco ni, “Rwoth otieko baro i dier jokwor paran paka mikula pi.” Aka olwoŋi kenyo ni Bal Perazim.
Munyo Jofilistia joringo, joweyo cal pajo cen, aka Daudi gi cwo pere jotiŋo to jokadho gine.
Jofilistia kendo jogik milelo Refayim aka jocokere kenyo.
Daudi openjo Rwoth kendo, aka Rwoth odwoko go ni, “Ikir'imonji jo gi ka, to thoki jo aka iyikere monjo jo gi yuthenge ca, cegin gi yen m'ilwoŋo ni Balisam.
K'iwinjo mayindo ma ŋanjo i wi yen, kenyo monji rupiri meno labedo ranyuth nike aŋanjo yuwiyin kikengila jolweny pa Jofilistia.”
Daudi otimo paka Rwoth omiyo go or nike wotim, aka oneko Jofilistia wok i Geba tundo kiri Gezer.
Dwoŋ pa Daudi otundo i kisi piny, aka Rwoth omiyo kisi piny lworo go.
Daudi ogeto ot pere won i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi, aka oyiko kabedo ri Kakan ma Cikirok to geto wema mere.
Kenyo Daudi owodho or nike Jolevi kende ama jowotiŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were, kole jo ama Rwoth oyido oyero tiŋo kodi tiyo rigo cil gi cil.
Ameno Daudi ocoko Joisiraili je i Yerusalem kelo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth i kabedo pere, ma go oyido oyiko.
Kenyo ocoko kanyacel nyikway Aron kodi Jolevi.
Wok i nono pa Kohath obino; Uriel, m'otelo wade pere 120.
Wok i nono pa Merari obino Asaya, m'otelo wade pere 220.
Wok i nono pa Gerisom obino Yowel, m'otelo wade pere 130.
Wok i nono pa Elizafan obino Semaya, m'otelo wade pere 200.
Wok i nono pa Hebron obino Eliel, m'otelo wade pere piero aboro.
Wok i nono pa Uziel obino Aminadab, m'otelo wade pere 112.
Daudi olwoŋo jocway ri Were i wi migam; Zadok, Abiatha kodi Jolevi aucel, Uriel, Asaya, Yowel, Semaya, Eliel kodi Aminadab.
Daudi owaco ri Jolevi ni, “Wiŋati wibedo jotel ma nonin pa Jolevi. Lokere win macil kodi Jolevi je, ŋey winyal kelo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth Were pa Isiraili i kabedo m'atieko yiko.
Kwoŋbedo oyido wingoye ma tiŋo marapena, Rwoth Were omiyo wan gir'acula ro lamo go i nger ma kiripi.”
Ameno jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi jolokere macil ŋey jowokeli Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth Were pa Isiraili.
Jolevi jotiŋo i gute i goki jo, paka Rwoth omiyo Musa or.
Daudi bende omiyo jotel pa Jolevi cik yero Jolevi m'opokere wer kodi tuko wer i tongol kodi ndara.
Ameno Jolevi joyero Heman wod pa Yowel, wat pere Asaf wod pa Berekia kodi Ethan wod pa Kusaya wok i nono pa Merari.
Bende joyero jome konyo jo: Zekaria, Jaziel, Semiramoth, Yehiel, Uni, Eliab, Benaya, Maseya, Matithia, Elifelehu kodi Mikineya. Jokur waŋkac Obed Edom kodi Jeyel.
Jower, Heman, Asaf kodi Ethan oyido jotuko ndara ma ywel.
Zekaria, Aziel, Semiramoth, Yehiel, Uni, Eliab, Maseya kodi Benaya oyido jotuko tongol ma dwondi jo ma malo.
Matithia, Elifelehu, Mikineya, Obed Edom, Jeyel kodi Azazia oyido jotelo gi tongol ma dwondi jo ma piny.
Kenania oyido obedo jatel pa Jolevi ma jower paka go oyido oŋeyo wer.
Berekia kodi Elikana oyido jobedo jokur ma Kakan ma Cikirok.

Sebania, Yosafat, Nethanel, Amasay, Zekaria, Benaya kodi Elieza, jocway ri Were i wi migam oyido jokudho gwara ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok, aka Obed Edom kodi Jehia bende oyido jobedo jokur ma Kakan ma Cikirok.
Ameno kere Daudi, jotel pa Joisiraili, kodi jomituka jolweny jokadho i ot pa Ebed Edom omo Kakan ma Cikirok, aka jotimo kalima madwoŋ.
Aka kwoŋbedo Rwoth okonyo Jolevi m'oyido jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth, jomiyo cowirok ma thwondhe abirio kodi wot rombo abirio.
Daudi oyido oruko kanzu ma nanga mafoth, paka Jolevi m'oyido jotiŋo Kakan ma Cikirok, kodi Kenania jatel pa jower bende. Daudi bende oyido oruko law pa jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Ameno Joisiraili jokelo malo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth gi koko ma siemirok, derino ma gwara, milowe, ndara kodi wer ma tongol.
Paka oyido itero Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were i tindi madwoŋ, Mikal, nyar Saulo oleŋo waŋe gi dirisa aka oneno kere Daudi mielo ka por malo ruwaŋ Rwoth to cayo go i cunye.
Jokelo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were to joketho i wema mere ma Daudi oyido ogero; aka jomiyo Rwoth cowirok awaŋa kodi ma siem.
Aka munyo Daudi otieko miyo cowirok, omiyo ji silwany i nyingi Rwoth pa lwak Jolweny.
Daudi opoko ji je, Joisiraili je, mon gi cwo, kisi nyatoro mugat gi muma riŋo abula, gi nyingi vini m'othwo.
Daudi oyero Jolevi mogo telo lamo Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok, ka jowero aka jopako go.
Asaf oyido obedo jatel, aka Zekaria oyido konyo go. Jeyel, Semiramoth, Yehiel, Matithia, Eliab, Benaya, Obed Edom kodi Jeyel oyido jotuko tongol. Asaf oyido goyo ndara.
Aka jocway ri Were i wi migam ario, Benaya kodi Yahaziel oyido jokudho gwara kisi ndelo ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were.
I ndelo no Daudi omiyo Asaf kodi Jolevi man silwany marapena wero pak ri Rwoth.
Miy foyo ri Rwoth,
tuci dwoŋ pere,
wac ri nonin gima go otieko timo.
Wer rigo wer ma pak
wac gir'aura ma go otieko timo.
Sangala win nike wabedo ji pere,
weyi jono ma jolamo go jowofore.
Rangi Rwoth kodi meni pere
aka lam go noknok.
Poyi tim ma gir'aura ma go otieko timo,
tim pere madongo, kodi thumo banja ma go omiyo.
Win nyikway Isiraili, ŋeca pere,
wot Yakobo, ma go oyero!
Go obedo Rwoth, Were mawan;
or pere obedo ri piny gibe.
Go poyo cikirok pere cil gi cil,
cikirok pere ri luse gana,
kodi gima go ociko Isaka,
ri Isiraili paka cikirok ma cil gi cil,
ka waco ama: “Alamiyin lowo ma Kanan
paka adec perin alunja.”
Munyo oyido jonok i welo,
nyaka andha, aka jowiloka i lowo ma Kanan,
jolweda wok i piny kadho i piny,
wok i ker acel kadho i ker,
ogwoko jo, aka bwoko kerin ro jo,
ka waco ama: “Wikiri wigeyi ji paran m'awiro gi mo,
jotuci wac Were paran, wikiri witim rijo raco!”
Wer ri Rwoth, pak nyingi go!
Tuci wac maber kisi ndelo nike go botho.
Tuci dwoŋ pere ri nonin,
tim pere ma meni ri ji je.
Kole Rwoth dwoŋ, aka iripo pako go swa,
iripo bwonirok rigo loyo werin je.
Kole werin pa nonin je jobedo nyaka cal
to Rwoth ocweyo polo.
Dwoŋ kodi dhum thoko go,
meni kodi ŋono opoŋ i Ot pere.
Pak win Rwoth ji je ma i piny,
pak win dwoŋ pere kodi meni pere.
Miy win Rwoth dwoŋ ma ripo gi nyingi go,
keli win mic aka wibin i Ot pere.
Kule win piny ruwaŋ Were Madwoŋ Loyo ka go onenere,
kirin win ruwaŋ go piny gibe.
Piny okethi m'ocwiny ma kinyal yengirok,
Weyi polo wosangala, aka weyi piny wofore,
Waci ri nonin je nike Rwoth obedo Kere!
Weyi nam kodi cwec mere je jowohola,
weyi ndelin kodi dudi mere jowosangala
Kenyo yen ma lule jobino koko ri kisangala ruwaŋ Rwoth,
Kole go bino thumo ri piny banja.
aka mar pere kiwire cil gi cil.
Waci rigo ni, “Both wan, awi Were jaboth mawan,
aka dwoki wan wok i dier nonin
ŋey wafoyin
aka wapaki nyingin maleŋ.”
Pak Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili
pak go pama kodi cil gi cil!
Weyi kisi dhano wowaci ni, “Obedi ameno!”
Pak Rwoth!
Kenyo kere Daudi oketho Asaf kodi Jolevi wadi telo lamo ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok ma swa. Oyido joripo timo tic pajo kisi ndelo.
Obed Edom wod pa Yeduthun kodi jonono pere; cwo piero aucel g'aboro oyido jokonyo jo. Hosa kodi Obed Edom oyido jokuro waŋkac.
Zadok jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi wadi, oyido jotelo lamo Rwoth i kalamo i Gibeon.
Kisi odikin kodi othieno oyido joripo waŋo cowirok gikululu i wi migam paka ondikere i Cik ma Rwoth omiyo Joisiraili.
Heman, Yeduthun kodi ji man oyido oyer jo wero wer ma pak ri Rwoth ro mar pere makirum.
Heman kodi Yeduthun oyido jokudho gwara to jotuko ndara ka iwero wer ma pak. Jonono pa Yeduthun oyido jokuro waŋkac.
Onyo munyo Daudi otieko ripo peco pere, owaco ri Nathan jatuci wac Were ni, “Neni pama, an abedo i ot m'ogeti gi mbawo matek ma yath sida, to Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were bedo i wema.”
Nathan odwoko go ni, “Tim gima nitie i paro perin je; kole Rwoth nitie kodin.”
To wor no Were owaco ri Nathan ni,
“Kadhi iwaci ri ŋeca paran Daudi ni, ‘Rwoth waco nike in iŋat'ikila geto ran ot ma bed'iye.
Wok i hongo m'aboth'iye ji paran Joisiraili wok i piny Misir tundo gunyo ni, fodi akibedo i ot; to oyido awotho gi jo munyo abedo i wema.
I kabedo moro je m'atieko woth'iye gi ji paran Joisiraili, fodi akiluwo gi jotel pajo m'ayero dhumo jo t'awaco nike raŋo jo kigeti ran ot ma mbawo matek ma yath sida.’
Riameno wac ri ŋeca paran Daudi nike An, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, waco rigo ni, ‘Akwanyin i kwath rombo i sa t'alokin jadhum pa ji paran Isiraili.
Atieko bedo kodin kamoro je m'itieko kadh'iye, aka atieko kikengila jokwor perin je ruwaŋin. Abino miyo nyingin bedo madwoŋ paka jodhum madongo i piny.
Aka abino yero kabedo ri ji paran Isiraili, aka alapidho tiendi jo kenyo i kabedo pajo wegi m'ongoye ŋata bino cando jo kendo; aka cwo ma jomaker jokibino miyo jo litho paka cango,
wok cuka ayer jotel ri ji paran Isiraili. Alakikengila jokwor perin je. Aciko gwokin kwoŋ jokwor perin je aka alamiyin nyikwayin.
K'inotho, t'iyikin gi kwarere mewin, abino loko acel kwoŋ wotin kere; aka abino loko ker pere matek.
Go ama bino geto ran ot, aka alaneno nike dhum pere medere cil gi cil.
Alabedo bamere, aka go bino bedo wodan. T'akibino kwanyo woko mar paran makiwire kwoŋ go paka atimo ri Saulo; m'akwanyo woko bedo kere to akethin.
Alaketho go telo ji paran kodi ker paran cil gi cil. Dhum pere kilarumo.’ ”
Nathan owaco ri Daudi kisi gima Were owaco.
Kenyo Daudi okadho to donjo i wema ruwaŋ Rwoth, obedo piny aka okwayo ama, “Abedo ŋa, awi Rwoth Were, aka peco paran a ginaŋo ma ikelan tundo ka?
Aka kiri me oyido obedo gimathin i waŋin Rwoth Were; iluwo kwoŋ nyikwayan i hongo ma bino yuwiye, aka inyuthan luse ma yuwiye Rwoth Were.
Aka onyo Daudi owaci rin aŋo kendo; rupiri iŋeyan, awi Rwoth Were!
Kole obedo mito perin kodi atoŋa perin timo gime; itimo gigipiny madongo me je ma fonjan.
Riameno idwoŋ Rwoth Were; rupiri ongoye ŋata pimere kodin, aka ongoye Were man ma cale in, ro gima watieko winjo je gi ithi wan.

Ongoye nono man i piny ma cale gi Isiraili, m'ibotho wok i twec bedo ji perin. Gigipiny madongo kodi gir'aura m'itimo rijo omiyo nyingin dwoŋ i piny gibe. Ibotho ji perin wok i Misir aka iriemo woko nonin man munyo ji perin jowotho.
Itieko loko Isiraili ji perin cil gi cil, aka in Rwoth, ibedo Were pajo.”
“Aka onyo pama Rwoth Were, ridhi cil gi cil wac m'iluwo kwoŋ ŋeca perin kodi nyikwaye aka tim gim'iwaco.
Ji jobino tiŋo nyingin malo cil gi cil ka jowaco ni, ‘Rwoth pa lwak jolweny obedo Were i Isiraili.’ Aka ibino kuro dhum paran i hongo je.
Kole in, Rwoth pa lwak Jolweny, Were pa Isiraili inyuthan, ŋeca perin gime aka itieko waco ran nike ibino loko nyikwayan kerin.
Aka onyo pama Rwoth Were, in ibedo Were; aka noknok ikuro cikirok perin, aka itieko timo cikirok ma gir'aura me ran.
Onyo riameno akwayin imiy nyikwayan silwany, ŋey jowomedere forok i wor perin. Kole in, Rwoth Were itieko ciko gime, aka gi silwany perin nyikwayan jobino bedo josilwany cil gi cil.”
Rumacen ma hongo moro, kere Daudi omonjo Jofilistia kendo, aka okengila jo, omako Gath kodi calin mere.
Daudi bende okengila Jomowab; aka jolokere ŋecin pere to joculo go misolo.
Daudi bende okengila kere ma piny Siria, Hadadeza wod pa Rehob munyo Hadadeza oyido kidho iy'adec ma malawa Yufrete dwoko dhum pere kenyo.
Daudi omako cwo pa Hadadeza, cawilin 1,000 cwo 7,000 ma jogwey kayina kodi cwo 20,000 ma jowotho atiendi. Daudi okoyo kayina ma romo cawila 100 aka otoŋo woko tiendi m'odoŋ.
Munyo Josiria m'oyido jonitie Damasiko jodhiro jolweny konyo kere Hadadeza, Daudi omonjo jo aka oneko cwo 22,000.
Aka Daudi oketho kambi ma lweny iy'adec pajo to jolokere ŋecin pere aka joculo go misolo. Rwoth omiyo Daudi loyo lweny kisi kama Daudi okadh'iye.
Daudi omako kwote ma zahabu ma ŋecin pa Hadadeza oyido jotiŋo, aka otero jo i Yerusalem.
Daudi bende okwanyo ywel madit wok i Tibath kodi Kun, tindin madongo ma Hadadeza oyido dhumo m'ooro ma timo nam, sirin kodi atewe.
Munyo Tou kere ma Hamath owinjo nike Daudi okengila jolweny pa Hadadeza,
odhiro wode Hadoram m'otho Daudi kodi foyo go gi kikengila Hadadeza; m'oyido Tou olwenyo gine dikweth. Hadoram otero ri Daudi mic kweth ma feza, zahabu, kodi ywel.
Kere Daudi omiyo gigipiny me ma lamo Rwoth kanyacel gi feza, kodi zahabu ma go okwanyo wok i piny je ma go oyido dhumo, Edom, Mowab, Amon, Filistia, kodi Amalek.
Oketho kambi ma lweny i Edom gipi, aka ji ma Edom jolokere ŋecin pa Daudi. Rwoth omiyo Daudi loyo kisi kam'okadh'iye.
Daudi odhumo Isiraili paka rom; aka otero ji pere maber gi tiro.
Yowab wod pa Zeruya oyido obedo jamituka jolweny pa Daudi; aka Yehosafat wod pa Ahilud am'oyido obedo jandiko kodi kano kisi gima timere.
Zadok wod pa Ahitub, kodi Abimelek wod pa Abiatha oyido obedo jocway ri Were i wi migam; aka Seraya oyido obedo jandiko ma kapido.
Benaya wod pa Yehoyada oyido obedo jatel pa jokur pa Daudi; aka wot Daudi oyido jobedo toŋ waŋ kere.
Rumacen ma hongo moro, Nahas kere ma Amon otho, aka wode m'ilwoŋo ni Hanun ama olunjo go.
To kere Daudi waco ni, “Ripo anyuthi mere ri Hanun paka bamere Nahas ndir no otimo ran.” Ameno Daudi ooro jomikwenda bongi Hanun kisekera go ro tho pa bamere.
Munyo jomikwenda no jotundo Amon,
jomic rieko pa Hanun jowaco rigo ni, “Iparo adieri ni Daudi ooro jomikwenda me kisekera in ma woro benin? Daudi ooro jomikwenda pere me bino ŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ ma tindi madwoŋ me ŋey wonyali mako!”
Hanun omako jomikwenda pa Daudi aka olielo adec ye tik gin, oyeco nangin pajo, to riemo jo woko.
