Wickwot omako jomikwenda me dok peco. Aka munyo Daudi owinjo gim'otimere rijo, odhiro rijo wac nike jowobedi Yeriko cuka ye tik gin twi.
Munyo Joamon joneno nike joloko Daudi jakwor pajo, joculo kilo 34,000 ma feza kipangisa cawilin kodi jogwey wok i Mesopotamia ma malo kodi wok iy'adec ma Maka kodi Zoba i Siria.
Cawilin 32,000 ma jopangisa kodi jolweny pa kere ma Maka jobino aka joketho kambi cegin gi Medeba. Joamon bende jobino wok i tindin pajo madongo to joyikere lweny.
Munyo Daudi owinjo, ooro Yowab kodi jolweny pere gibe lweny gi jo.
Joamon joŋanjo, aka jocanere i dhiot ma waŋkac ma Raba, aka kerin m'oyido jobino konyo jo oyido jonitie kakendi gin kam'othangere.
Munyo Yowab oneno nike jolweny oyido jonyalo monjo go gi yuwiye kiri gi yucen, oyero jolweny mabeyo kwoŋ jolweny pa Isiraili, aka oketho jo kam'oŋiyere gi Josiria.
Jolweny m'odoŋ Yowab oketho jo i cingi Abisay omin go; aka oketho jo kam'oŋiyere gi Joamon.
Yowab owaco ri Abisay ni, “K'ineno ni Josiria jokengila an, ibin ikonyan; to k'aneno ni Joamon jokengila in alabino konyin.
Bedi jamiseni! Weyi walweny matek ri ji mawan aka ri tindin madongo pa Were mawan. Aka weyi mito pa Rwoth wotimere!”
Yowab gi cwo pere jodhire cegin monjo Josiria, to Josiria joringo woko.
Munyo Joamon joneno Josiria joringo woko, jo bende joringo woko kwoŋ Abisay aka jogik i tindi madwoŋ. Kenyo Yowab oweyo lweny gi Joamon, aka odok Yerusalem.

To munyo Josiria joneno nike Joisiraili jokengila jo, jokelo jolweny ma jowok iy'adec ma Siria kodi yuwok ceŋ ma malawa Yufrete, aka joketho jo i cingi Sobak, jamituka jolweny pa kere Hadadeza ma Zoba.
Munyo Daudi owinjo, ocoko jolweny ma Isiraili je kanyacel, aka joŋado malawa Yordan to jobino Helam kama Josiria oyido jocanere iye to joŋiyere gi jo. Lweny ocakere,
aka Joisiraili joriemo woko Josiria. Daudi kodi cwo pere joneko cwo ma Siria 7,000 ma jogweyo cawila, kodi cwo 40,000 ma jor'atiendi, aka jowumiya Sobak jamituka jolweny pa Hadadeza, to tho kenyo.
Munyo kerin m'oyido jobedo ŋecin pa Hadadeza joneno nike Joisiraili jokengila jo, jotimo siem gi Joisiraili, aka jolokere ŋecin pajo. Aka Josiria lworo omako jo konyo Joamon kendo.

Daudi okwanyo sangaria pa Milkom were pa Joamon, m'oyido nitie gi zahabu ma romo kilo piero adek g'abic aka oyido nitie gi telin ma welo to ketho i sangaria pere. Daudi bende okelo gigipiny mathoth ma jonyaga wok i tindi madwoŋ.
Go okelo ji ma Raba aka omiyo jo tic gi musimeno, kwe ma nyweny, le ma nyweny, aka omiyo jo goyo matafal. Otimo gime ri ji ma tindin pa Joamon man. Kenyo Daudi gi cwo pere jogik i Yerusalem.
Rumacen ma gime, lweny obedo kendo gi Jofilistia i Gezer; kenyo ama Sibekay ma wok Husa oneko iye Jafilistia m'ogaŋere m'ilwoŋo ni Sipay.

Lweny man obedo kendo i Gath, kam'oyido nitie Jafilistia m'ogaŋere. Go oyido nitie gi lwet cinge aucel i kisi cinge, kodi lwet tiende aucel i kisi tiende i je piero g'aŋwen. Go oyido obedo nyakwar Refayim.
Go ocayo Joisiraili, aka Yonathan wod pa Sama omin Daudi oneko go.
Jofilistia aŋwen ma jogaŋere me oyido jowok Gath, aka Daudi gi cwo pere joneko jo.
Sitan oyido omito kelo kwoŋ Joisiraili teko, ameno omiyo Daudi kwano Joisiraili.
Ameno Daudi omiyo Yowab jamituka jolweny pere, kodi jotel pa jolweny cik ni, “Kadhi gi jatel perin i nonin ma Isiraili je wok Dan tundo kiri i Berseba, aka wikwan ji. Amito ŋeyo welo pajo.”

To Yowab dwoko kere ni, “Jadwoŋ, weyi Rwoth Were perin womedi welo ma Joisiraili dipiero apar dicel ma jothoth loyo pama, kole jobedo ŋecin perin, aka weyi i kwo neno ka go timo ameno. To raŋo imito timo gime jadwoŋ? Raŋo imito kelo banja kwoŋ Isiraili?”
To kere omiyo Yowab kodi jomituka jolweny pere luwo cik pere. Ameno Yowab kodi jomituka jolweny jokidho aka jowotho i piny Isiraili gipi, to jodok i Yerusalem.
Yowab owaco ri kere welo ji. I Isiraili oyido nitie cwo 1,100,000 ma jomaker ma jonyalo lweny, aka i Yuda oyido nitie cwo 470,000 ma jomaker.
To Yowab k'okwano jonono pa Levi kodi jonono pa Benyamin. Go k'oluwo wac pa Were.
To Were k'owinjo maber gi gime, aka omiyo Isiraili gir'acula.
Daudi owaco ri Rwoth ni, “Atieko timo reco madwoŋ swa munyo atimo gime! Mondo cwaki ran; rupiri atimo gimiŋo.”
Rwoth owaco ri Gad jatuci wac Were, pa Daudi ni,
“Kadhi i wac ri Daudi ni, ‘Rwoth waco nike, amiyin gigipiny adek; yer acel kwoŋ jo anyal timo rin.’ ”
Ameno Gad obino bongi Daudi aka owaco rigo gima Rwoth oyido owaco, aka openjo go ni, “Iyero aŋo?

Oro adek ma kec bino i lowo perin, dwe adek kanyo i ŋweco kwoŋ jokwor perin, kosa ndelo adek ma two nundu i lowo perin, kodi malaika pa Rwoth reyo woko adec ma Isiraili je. Par kwoŋe aka imiyan radwok m'anoteri ri Rwoth.”
Daudi odwoko ni, “Anitie i kidamba madwoŋ swa; weyi wapodhi i cingi Rwoth rupiri ŋono pere dwoŋ, ma akipodho i cingi nyatoro.”
Ameno Rwoth odhiro two nundu kwoŋ Isiraili aka ji 70,000 jotho.

Aka Were ooro malaika kisika woko Yerusalem. To munyo malaika pa Rwoth oyido cegin kisika woko Yerusalem, Rwoth owiro paro pere ma miyo ji pere gir'acula aka owaco ri malaika m'oyido neko jo ni, “Oromo, lwogi cingin.” Aka malaika pa Rwoth oyido nitie i kisia pa Arauna, Jayebus.
Daudi oneno malaika ocungo i hongo, omako abor pere i cinge, oyikere reyo Yerusalem. Kenyo Daudi kodi jotel pa ji m'oyido joruka kutiya jokule piny gi nyim gin i lowo.
Kenyo Daudi owaco ri Were ni, “Neni, atimo reco, aka atimo kidakana; to rombo me, aŋo ma jotimo? Weyi cingin, awi Rwoth Were paran, wopodhi kwoŋan gi ot pa baba.”
Kenyo malaika owaco ri Gad miyo Daudi cik wokadhi i kisia pa Arauna, aka wogeti ri Rwoth migam.
Daudi oluwo or pa Rwoth aka okidho paka Gad oyido owaco rigo.
Kenyo i kisia Arauna kodi wote oyido jorego ŋano, aka munyo joneno malaika, wote jopondo.
Aka tekin Arauna oneno kere bino, oeye i kisia, aka okule piny gi nyime i lowo.
Daudi owaco ni, “Abino nyewo kisia perin ŋey ageti ri Rwoth migam ŋey ji jowobothi two nundu me. Alamiyin cul mere je.”
Kenyo Arauna owaco ri Daudi ni, “Jadwoŋ paran kere, miy Rwoth gimoro je m'imito. Megikwe ee ma waŋo paka cowirok i wi migam; adhere kodi majogi pajo ee ma yen, kodi ŋano ma mic. Me je amiyin kere.”
To kere waco ri Arauna ni, “Be, alaculo kisia kodi megikwe. Akilamiyo Rwoth paka mic gim'obedo aperin, gim'ongoye cul.”
Ameno Daudi onyewo kisia kodi megikwe gi zahabu piero abic.
Kenyo Daudi ogeto ri Rwoth migam aka omiyo cowirok awaŋa kodi cowirok ma siem. Daudi okwayo Rwoth, aka owinjo kwayo pere to dhiro mac wok i polo waŋo cowirok pere.
Rwoth owaco ri malaika wokwany woko abor pere, aka malaika owinjo.
Daudi oneno nike Rwoth odwoko kwayo pere, ameno omiyo cowirok i migam i kisia pa Arauna.
Wema pa Rwoth ma Musa oyido ogeto kodi migam m'oyido iwaŋo iye cowirok oyido fodi jonitie i kalamo i Gibeon i hongo no;
to Daudi k'onyalo kadho lamo kenyo kwoŋbedo oyido lworo abor pa malaika pa Rwoth.
Ameno Daudi owaco ni, “Ot pa Rwoth Were labedo ka. Me migam ma Joisiraili joripo miyo iye cowirok awaŋa.”
Kere Daudi owodho or ri jopath je m'oyido jobedo i lowo pa Joisiraili cokirok, aka omiyo jo tic. Megi joŋado telin ma geto Ot pa Were.
Daudi bende omiyo nywenye kweth ma yiko musumalere kodi gigipiny ma riwo waŋkac ma mbawo, kodi ywel kweth m'ongoye ŋata nyalo kipima.
Oyiko ri ji ma Tire kodi Sidon kelo rigo mbawo ma yath sida kweth.

Kole Daudi owaco ni, “Wodan fodi thin aka fodi ongoye gi nyalo, to ot ma go lageto ri Rwoth ripo bedo maŋon aka m'oŋeyere i piny. Riameno alatimo can mere.” Ameno Daudi onwaŋo gigipiny ma mitere ma geto je kweth mafodi go k'otho.
Kenyo olwoŋo wode, Solomon aka omiyo go or geto ot ri Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili.
Daudi owaco rigo ni, “Wodan, oyido acano geto ot ri nyingi Rwoth Were paran.
To wac pa Rwoth obino ran, ka waco ama: ‘Itieko oyo remo kweth aka ilwenyo lweny kweth; ikilageto ran ot ri nyingan, kwoŋbedo itieko oyo remo kweth ruwaŋan i piny.
Neni, ilabedo gi wodin, go labedo jacwo ma siem. Alamiyo go siem i thenge pa jokwor pere, kole ilalwoŋo go nike Solomon kwoŋbedo i hongo pere ma dhum alamiyo Isiraili siem t'akwonga jo.
Go lageto ran ot. Go labedo wodan, aka alabedo bamere. Dhum pere labedo i Isiraili cil gi cil.’ ”
“Onyo wodan, weyi Rwoth wobedi kodin, aka weyi go wokur cikirok pere inyal geto ot rigo.
Aka weyi Rwoth womiyin niaŋ kodi rieko ŋey inyal dhumo Isiraili cungo kwoŋ cik pere.
K'inoluwi cik je ma Rwoth omiyo Musa ri Isiraili, ilakiyindira. Miyere aka ŋey gim'itimo, ikir'iwey gimoro je wobwokin.

Paka ri Ot pa Were, gi mindin paran atieko coko zahabu ma kalo tan 3,400 kodi feza ma kalo tan 34,000 ma geto. Medo i wi meno ywel kodi nyweny nitie kweth. Bende anitie gi mbawo kodi telin, t'iripo medo.
Initie gi jotic kweth. Nitie cwo ma jolatic i kam'igol'iye telin, aka nitie jobol ot kodi jopac, kiri gi jondijo m'opokere ma jonyalo tic
gi zahabu, feza, ywel kodi nyweny. Onyo cak tic, aka Rwoth wobedi kodin.”
Daudi omiyo jotel pa Joisiraili je cik konyo Solomon.
Go owaco ni, “Rwoth Were mewin nitie gi win aka omiyo win siem i kisi thenge. Go omiyan mako ji je m'oyido jobedo i lowo me, aka nyo pama jonitie i cingi win kodi Rwoth.
Onyo kethi win paro mewin kodi cuny win rango Rwoth Were mewin. Kadhi wigeti ot ri Rwoth Were ŋey wikethi iye Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth kodi gigipiny maleŋ je m'ioro i lamo.”
Daudi ocoko jotel je ma Isiraili, jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi.
Jolevi ma joromo oro piero adek kadho malo okwan jo aka oyido joromo cwo 38,000.
Kere oketho 24,000 timo tic ma Ot pa Were, 6,000 kano gim'otimere kodi thumo banjin,
4,000 jokur ma waŋkac kodi 4,000 wero pak ri Rwoth, gi gigipiny ma wer ma kere oketho ri atoŋa me.
Daudi opoko Jolevi i kitipin adek, cungo kwoŋ nonin pajo: Gerisom, Kohath kodi Merari.
Nyikway Gerisom obedo: Ladan kodi Simey.
Nyikway Ladan obedo: Yehiel, Zetham kodi Yowel,
m'oyido jobedo jotel ma nonin m'owok kwoŋ Ladan.
Simey oyido nitie gi wote aŋwen: Yahath, Zina, Yeus kodi Beria cungo kwoŋ nywolirok pajo. Yeus kodi Beria jok'obedo gi nyikway jo kweth, ameno k'okwan jo paka nonin.
Nyikway Kohath obedo: Amiram, Izihar, Hebron kodi Uziel, j'aŋwen.
Nyikway Amiram obedo: Aron kodi Musa. Aron kodi nyikwaye okethi jo gicen kuro gigipiny maleŋ, waŋo buban i lamo Rwoth, tiyo rigo, kodi miyo ji silwany i nyingi Rwoth cil gi cil.
To paka ri wot Musa, jacwo pa Were, okwan jo kwoŋ Jolevi.
Nyikway Musa obedo: Gerisom kodi Elieza.
Wod Gerisom obedo: Sebuwel m'oyido obedo jatel.
Wod Elieza obedo: Rehabia, aka Rehabia obedo gi nyikwaye kweth.
Wod Izihar obedo: Selomith jatel ma nono.
Nyikway Hebron obedo: Yeria, Amaria, Yahaziel kodi Yekamim.
Nyikway Uziel obedo: Mika kodi Isia.
Nyikway Merari obedo: Mahili kodi Musi. Mahili obedo ba Eliazar kodi Kisi,
to Eliazar otho m'ongoye gi wote, nyir kende. Nyir pere jonywomere gi wot Kis omin bajo.
Nyikway Musi obedo: Mahili, Eder kodi Yeremoth.
Me nyikway Levi, gi nono kodi pecin pajo, kisi dhano ondiki nyinge. Joje, ma jaoro piero ario kadho malo, omiy go tic i Ot pa Rwoth.
Kole Daudi owaco ni, “Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili omiyo ji pere siem, aka go won labedo i Yerusalem.
Ameno Jolevi jok'otiŋ Kakan ma Cikirok kodi gigipiny m'ioro i lamo kendo.”
Cungo i wiwaci pa Daudi macowe, Jolevi je ondiki nyingi jo tic ka jotundo oro piero ario,
aka omiy jo tic me konyo jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jowok kwoŋ Aron gi lamo ma Ot pa Were, yweyo diedipo mere kodi kisikin mere, kodi kuro gigipiny je maleŋ,
timo mugat, moko m'ioro i mic, mugat ma buthow, moko m'oruw gi mo, kipima mic ma Ot pa Were.
Jolapako kodi miyo Rwoth dwoŋ kisi odikin kodi othieno;
kodi kisi k'imiyo Rwoth cowirok awaŋa i ndelo ma sabato, dwe manyen, kodi kalima m'oyer, cungo kwoŋ welo pajo ma ripo noknok ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Omiy jo tic ma kuro Wema pa Rwoth kodi Ot pa Were, kodi konyo wade pajo, jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jowok kwoŋ Aron, i lamo.
Kitipin pa nyikway Aron obedo me. Nyikway Aron obedo: Nadab, Abihu, Eliazar kodi Ithamar.
To Nadab kodi Abihu jotho mafodi bajo k'otho, aka jok'oweyo nyikway jo; aka Eliazar kodi Ithamar to jobedo jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Kere Daudi gi kony pa Zadok nyakwar Eliazar, kodi Ahimelek nyakwar Ithamar jocano nyikway Aron i kitipin cungo kwoŋ tic pajo.
Nyikway Eliazar okethi jo i kitipin apar g'aucel, aka nyikway Ithamar i kitipin aboro; otim ama kwoŋbedo cwo oyido jothoth kwoŋ nyikway Eliazar.
Paka oyido nitie jotel ma Ot pa Were kodi jotic pa Were kwoŋ nyikway Eliazar kodi nyikway Ithamar, opok jo tic gigoyo kwir.

Nyikway Eliazar kodi Ithamar jobolo kwir i weso, aka Semaya wod pa Nethanel jandiko pa Jolevi oyido ndiko nyingi jo. Kere, jodhum pere, jacway ri Were i wi migam Zadok, Ahimelek wod pa Abiatha, kodi jotel ma nonin pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi jobedo jokony.
Me apaka pecin piero ario g'aŋwen opok jo tic pajo: Marapena obedo Yehoyarib, mar'ario obedo Yedaya,
mar'adek obedo, mar'aŋwen obedo Seworim.
Mar'abic obedo Malikija, mar'aucel obedo Mijamin,
mar'abirio obedo Hakoz, mar'aboro obedo Abija.
Mar'abuŋwen obedo Yosuwa, mar'apar obedo Sekaniya,
mar'apar g'acel obedo Eliasib, mar'apar g'ario obedo Yakim.
Mar'apar g'adek obedo Hupa, mar'apar g'aŋwen obedo Yesebib,
mar'apar g'abic obedo Biliga, mar'apar g'aucel obedo Imer.
Mar'apar g'abirio obedo Hezir, mar'apar g'aboro obedo Hapizez,
mar'apar g'abuŋwen obedo Pethahia, ma piero ario obedo Yehezikel.
Ma piero ario g'acel obedo Jakin, ma piero ario g'ario obedo Gamul,
ma piero ario g'adek obedo Delaya, ma piero ario g'aŋwen obedo Mazia.
Cwo me ondiki nyingi jo cungo kwoŋ tic pajo ma donjo i Ot pa Were timo gima Aron kwari jo ocako paka Rwoth Were pa Isiraili omiyo go or.
Me wot Levi m'odoŋ man: Yedeya, nyakwar Amiram wok kwoŋ Sebuwel.
Isia, nyakwar Rehabia.
Yahath, nyakwar Izihar wok kwoŋ Selomith.
Yeria, Amaria, Yehaziel kodi Yekamim wot Hebron luwo i nywolirok pajo.
Samir, nyakwar Uziel wok kwoŋ Mika.
Zekaria, nyakwar Uziel luwo kwoŋ Isia, omin Mika.
Mahili, Musi kodi Yazia, nyikway Merari.
Yazia oyido nitie gi wote adek, Soham, Zakur kodi Ibiri.
Mahili oyido nitie gi wote ario, Eliazar kodi Kisi. Eliazar oyido ongoye gi wote, to Kisi oyido nigi wode acel, Yeramel.
Musi oyido nitie gi wote adek: Mahili, Eder kodi Yermoth.
Me pecin ma nono pa Jolevi

Jatel ma kisi peco kodi acel kwoŋ omin go mathin jobolo kwir ma tic pajo, paka wade pajo, jocway ri Were i wi migam nyikway Aron oyido jotimo. Kere Daudi, Zadok, Ahimelek, kodi ma nonin pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi apa Jolevi jobedo jokony.

Kere Daudi kodi jotel pajo Jolevi joyero nonin pa Jolevi telo lamo: Asaf, Heman kodi Yeduthun. Oyido jotuco wac pa Were, ka ituko tongol kodi ndara. Nyingi ji m'oyer telo lamo, kodi tic ma kisi kitipa otimo.
Nyikway Asaf aŋwen: Zakur, Yozefu, Nethania kodi Asarela. Asaf am'oyido telo jo, aka oyido jotuco wac pa Were kisi ka kere owodho or.
Nyikway Yeduthun aucel: Gedalia, Zeri, Yesaya, Simey, Hasabia kodi Matithia. Bajo am'oyido telo jo, aka oyido jotuco wac pa Were gi wer ma tongol, ka jowero pak kodi foyo ri Rwoth.
Nyikway Heman apar g'aŋwen: Bukia, Matanaya, Uziel, Sebuwel, Yerimoth, Hanania, Eliatha, Gidaliti, Romamiti Ezer, Yosibekasa, Malothi, Hothir kodi Mahaziyoth.
Were omiyo Heman, jatuci wac Were pa kere, wote apar g'aŋwen me kodi nyir adek, paka oyido ociko, ma miyo go meni.
Nyikwaye je oyido jotuko ndara kodi tongol cungo kwoŋ fonji pa bajo, ka ilamo i Ot pa Were. Asaf, Yeduthun kodi Heman oyido jonitie i tel pa kere.
Cwo piero ario g'aŋwen me je oyido jondijo; aka Jolevi wadi jo oyido jobedo jower m'otiek. Joje oyido jonitie cwo 288.
Kisi dhano obolo kwir ma limo tic; kosa mathin kosa madwoŋ, jafonji kosa ŋata fonjere.
Kwir marapena opodho kwoŋ Yozefu wok i nono pa Asaf, mar'ario ri Gedalia gi wutmin kodi wote ja apar g'ario.
Mar'adek ri Zakur gi wutmin kodi wote ja apar g'ario.
Mar'aŋwen ri Ziri gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'abic ri Nethania gi wutmin kodi wote j'apar g'ario.
Mar'aucel ri Bukia gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'abirio ri Jesarela gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'aboro ri Yesaya gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'abuŋwen ri Matanaya gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar ri Simey gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar g'acel ri Azarel gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar g'ario ri Hasabia gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar g'adek ri Subail gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar g'aŋwen ri Matithia gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar g'abic ri Yeremoth gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar g'aucel ri Hanania gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar g'abirio ri Yosibekasa gi wote kodi wutmin.
Mar'apar g'aboro ri Hanani gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Mar'apar g'abuŋwen ri Malothi gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Ma piero ario ri Eliatha gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Ma piero ario g'acel ri Hothir gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Ma piero ario g'ario ri Gidaliti gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar g'ario.
Ma piero ario g'adek ri Mahaziyoth gi wote kodi Wutmin ja apar ario.
Ma piero ario g'aŋwen ri Romamiti Ezer gi wote kodi wutmin ja apar ario.
Paka ri kitipin pa jokur waŋkac wok i nono pa Kohath obedo: Meselemia wod pa Kore, wok peco pa Asaf.
Meselemia oyido nitie gi wote abirio, cungo kwoŋ nywolirok: Zekaria, Yediael, Zebadia, Jathiniel,
Elam. Yehohanan kodi Eliehoenay.
Amiel, Isakar kodi Peulethay.

Semaya, okayo pa Obed Edom oyido nitie gi wote aucel: Othini, Rafaili, Obed, Elizabad, Elihu kodi Semakia. Oyido jobedo jodongo i nonin pajo ro nyalo pajo madwoŋ aka ario macowe oyido jonitie gi talenta.
Nyikway Obed Edom kodi nyikwaye oyido joromo cwo piero aucel g'ario ma ŋeyo tic me.
Meselemia oyido nitie gi cwo apar g'aboro ma jonitie gi nyalo.
Wok i nono pa Merari oyido nitie Hosa; aka wote jobedo: Simiri (bamere oketho go jatel, makada nende go oyido k'obedo okayo),
Hilikia, Tebalia kodi Zekaria. Kanyacel oyido nitie cwo apar g'adek jobedo jokur ma Ot pa Were wok peco pa Hosa.
Jokur me opok jo i kitipin, cungo kwoŋ pecin pajo, aka omiy jo tic i Ot pa Were, paka Jolevi man.
Kisi peco, mathin kosa madwoŋ obolo kwir ma ŋeyo waŋkac mene ma jolakuro.
Selemia otero waŋkac ma yuwok ceŋ, aka wode Zekaria, jacwo m'oyido timo tic maber, otero waŋkac ma yumalo.
Obed Edom otero waŋkac ma yupiny, aka wote omiy jo kuro kisikin ma kan.
Sufim kodi Hosa jotero waŋkac ma yupodho ceŋ kodi waŋkac m'ilwoŋo ni Saleketh i royo ma malo. Oyido jokuro i weso.
I waŋkac ma yuwok ceŋ, oyido bedo jokur aucel kisi ndelo, yumalo, aŋwen, yupiny, aŋwen, aka jokur aŋwen oyido jokuro kakan; ario i kisi acel.
Jokur aŋwen oyido jokuro royo ma kadho yu diedipo, aka ario oyido jokuro diedipo won.
Me apaka tic ma kur opok ri nono pa Kora kodi Merari.
Kwoŋ Jolevi Ahija am'oyido telo kakan pesa kodi kakan mic m'omiy Were.
Ladan, acel kwoŋ wot Gerisom oyido obedo kwari kitipin ma pecin m'oromo, kiri gi peco pa wode Yehiel.
Nyikway Ladan ario man, Zetham kodi Yowel, oyido jokuro kakan pesa ma Ot pa Were kodi kisikin ma kan.
Nyikway Amiram, Izihar, Hebron kodi Uziel bende opok jo tic.
Sebuwel, janono pa Gerisom, wod pa Musa, oyido neno pesa ma Ot pa Were.
Luwo kwoŋ omin Elieza, omin Gerisom, go oyido timo wat gi Selomith. Elieza obedo ba Rehabia, m'obedo ba Jesia, ba Yoram, ba Zikiri, ba Selomith.
Selomith me kodi wutmin oyido jokuro mic ma Kere Daudi omiyo Were, oyido jobedo jotel ma pecin, ma nonin, kodi jotel pa jolweny.
Jokwanyo gigipiny mogo m'oyido jomako i lweny aka jomiyo ma oro i Ot pa Were.
Selomith kodi peco pere oyido jokuro kisi gim'omiy ma oro i Ot pa Were, kiri gi mic ma Samwiri jatuci wac Were, Kere Saulo, Abuner wod pa Ner kodi Yowab wod pa Zeruya jokelo.
Kwoŋ nyikway Izihar, Kenaya kodi wote, oyido omiy jo tic ma dhum, ndiko gim'otimere gi kano kodi thumo banjin ri Joisiraili.
Kwoŋ nyikway Hebron, Hasabia kodi wade pere 1,700 joje cwo ma jonitie gi nyalo oyido jobedo jodhum ma dini kodi ji i Isiraili yupodho ceŋ ma malawa Yordan.

Yeria oyido obedo jatel pa nyikway Hebron. I oro ma piero aŋwen ma dhum pa Kere Daudi, omeny peco pa Hebron kodi nyikwaye, aka onwaŋ nike cwo ma jonitie gi nyalo ma peco me oyido jobedo Yazer iy'adec ma Giliad.
Kere Daudi oyero jotel ma pecin 2,700 wok kwoŋ wade pa Yeria aka oketho jo jodhum ma dini kodi ji i Isiraili yuwok ceŋ ma malawa Yordan, adec pa Ruben, Gad kodi yuwok ceŋ ma Manase.
Me jotel ma pecin pa Joisiraili, jotel ma nono kodi jodhum pajo ma jotimo tic ma ker. Kisi dwe ma oro kitipa m'opokere ma cwo 24,000 oyido jotiyo aka jamituka ma dwe no am'oyido telo jo.
I dwe marapena, Yasobim wod pa Zabidiel
nyakwar Perez.
I dwe mar'ario, Doday nyakwar Ahohi (Mikiloth oyido luwo go i tel).
I dwe mar'adek, Benaya wod pa Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam,
m'oyido telo cwo piero adek aka wode Amizabad olunjo go paka jamituka ma kitipa me.
I dwe mar'aŋwen, Asahel, omin Yowab aka wode Zebadia olunjo go.
I dwe mar'abic, Samihuth, nyakwar Izihar.
I dwe mar'aucel, Ira wod pa Ikes ma wok Tekowa.
I dwe mar'abirio, Helez, janono pa Efrayim ma wok i Pelon.
I dwe mar'aboro, Sibekay ma wok Husa janono pa Zera.
I dwe mar'abuŋwen, Abieza ma wok Anathoth iy'adec pa Benyamin.
I dwe mar'apar, Maharay ma wok Netofa janono pa Zera.
I dwe mar'apar g'acel, Benaya ma wok Pirathon iy'adec ma nono pa Efrayim.
I dwe mar'apar g'ario: Heldai ma wok Netofa m'obedo nyakwar Othiniel.
I nono pa Ruben jadhum mere obedo Elieza wod pa Zikiri, i nono pa Simeo jadhum mere obedo Sefatiya wod pa Maka.
I nono pa Levi obedo Hasabia wod pa Kemuel, i nonin pa Aron obedo Zadok.
I nono pa Yuda obedo Elihu, acel kwoŋ wutmin Daudi, i nono pa Isakar obedo Omiri wod pa Mikaili.
I nono pa Zebulun obedo Isimaya wod pa Obadia, i nono pa Nafital obedo Yeremoth wod pa Aziriel.
I nono pa Efrayim obedo Hoseya wod pa Azazia, iy'adec nono pa Manase obedo Yowel wod pa Pedaya.
Iy'adec nono pa Manase i Giliad obedo Ido wod pa Zekaria, i nono pa Benyamin obedo Jasiel wod pa Abuner.
I nono pa Dan obedo Azarel wod pa Yeroham. Me oyido obedo jodhum ma nonin ma Isiraili.
Yowab wod pa Zeruya, ocako kwano, to k'ocowo. Were omiyo Isiraili ro gime, ameno welo ji k'ondiki i ndiko pa Kere Daudi.
Azimaveth wod pa Adiel oyido telo kisikin pa kere ma kan, aka Yonathan wod pa Uziya oyido telo kisikin ma kan m'oyido nitie i tindin, i calin, kodi acurcur ma Isiraili.
Eziri wod pa Kelub oyido telo jotic ma jofuro i lowo pa kere.
Simey ma wok Rama oyido telo ndelin vini, aka Zabidi ma wok Sefam oyido obedo jakan vini.
Bal Hanan ma wok Geda oyido kuro yen oliv kodi musikamol, aka Yowas oyido jakan ma mo oliv.
Satay ma wok Saron oyido kuro dhok kam'othangere i Saron, aka Hafat wod pa Adilay oyido kuro dhok ma milelo.
Obili janono pa Isimayil oyido kuro ŋamia, Yedeya ma wok Meronoth oyido gweyo punde, aka Jaziz ma wok Hagar oyido kuro rombo kodi diegi.
Meno a cwo m'oyido jotelo lim pa kere Daudi.
Yonathan, ner Daudi, oyido obedo jamic rieko manitie gi niaŋ aka jandiko. Yehiel wod pa Hakmon oyido fonjo wot kere.
Ahithofel oyido obedo jamic rieko pa kere, aka Husay Jarakit oyido obedo mere pa kere kodi jamic rieko.
Rumacen munyo Ahithofel otho, Abiatha kodi Yehoyada wod pa Benaya jobedo jomic rieko. Yowab oyido obedo jamituka pa jolweny pa kere.

Daudi ocoko i Yerusalem jodhum ma Isiraili je, jodhum ma nonin, jodhum ma jotimo tic ma ker, jotel ma pecin, jokikewera lim kodi ogwaŋe pa kere kodi wote, jodhum pa kere je, jotel pa jolweny, kodi jodongo.
to go okweran geto, kwoŋbedo abedo jalweny aka atieko oyo remo kweth.

Kucel Rwoth Were pa Isiraili oyeran kodi nyikwayan dhumo Isiraili cil gi cil. Oyero nono pa Yuda bedo jotel, aka wok kwoŋ Yuda oyero peco pa baba. Wok peco gipi owinjo gi kisangala teran kodi kethan kere ma Isiraili gipi.
Kole Rwoth omiyan wotan kweth, aka wok kwoŋ jo oyero Solomon dhumo Isiraili, ker pa Rwoth.”
“Rwoth owaco ran ni, ‘Wodin Solomon ama lageto ran Ot pa Were. Atieko yero go bedo wodan, aka alabedo bamere.
Alamiyo ker pere wobedi cil gi cil ka go omedere luwo cik kodi or paran paka go timo pama.’ ”

“Onyo riameno i waŋ Joisiraili je, cokirok pa Rwoth, aka paka Rwoth winjo, kur aka rangi or pa Rwoth Were perin, ŋey imedere bedo i lowo maber me, aka iwey paka gir'alunja ri nyithindho mewin cil gi cil.”

“Aka in, wodan Solomon, yey Were pa benin aka tiyi rigo gi cunyin acel kodi paro perin je; kole Rwoth dwaro kisi nyaŋith, aka niaŋ kisi can kodi paro. K'inorangi go, ilanwaŋo go; to k'inojwangi go, go laweyin kicutho.
Gwokere pama, kole Rwoth otieko yerin geto Ot pa Were paka kalamo. Onyo tim, aka tim gi miyirok je.”
Ameno Daudi omiyo Solomon can ma geto Ot pa Were, kisikin ma kan kodi kisikin man, kodi Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, kabedo ma cwako reco.
Daudi bende omiyo Solomon can m'oyido nitie gine ri diedipo kodi kisikin ma thoko, kodi kisikin ma kano gigipiny ma Ot pa Were kodi gigipiny m'imiyo Rwoth.
Daudi bende omiyo Solomon can ma kitipin pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi, timo tic ma Ot pa Were, kodi kuro gigipiny ma tedo mere.
Daudi onyutho feza gi zahabu marom nedi ma woor ma yiko gigipiny ma tedo,
ri kisi tala kodi raŋaw tala,
ri meza ma feza kodi ma zahabu m'oyido iketho iye mugat maleŋ.
Go bende onyutho zahabu macil marom nedi, ma woor ma yiko uma, acero, agwatin, feza gi zahabu marom nedi ma yiko bakulere,
zahabu macil ma yiko migam ma waŋo buban kodi ma timo cawila ri cwec ma jobwombi gi ma joyaro bwombi gin i wi Kakan ma Cikirok.
Kere Daudi owaco ni, “Gime je nitie i can m'andiko cungo kwoŋ wac ma Rwoth won omiyan timo.”

Kere Daudi owaco ri wode Solomon ni, “Bedi matek aka jamisen. Cak tic aka wongoye gima wogeŋin, kole Rwoth Were, Were paran nitie kodin. Go kilaweyan, to labedo kodin cuka inocow tic je ma Ot pa Were.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi omiy jo tic atima i Ot pa Were. Jotic ma ndijo nger gi nger joyikere konyin, aka ji je kodi jotel pajo jonitie i cingin.”
Ameno gi mindin paran atieko yiko gigipiny ma geto Ot pa Were; zahabu, feza, ywel, nyweny, mbawo kodi telin ma mitere.
Aka kiri, medo i wi meno, atieko miyo feza gi zahabu wok i lim paran ro mar paran ri Ot pa Were.
Atieko miyo tan ma kalo 100 ma zahabu macil kodi feza manyalo romo tan 240 makicin kor Ot pa Were
kodi yiko gigipiny ma jondijo jolayiko. Onyo ŋa man ma lamiyo gi mito pere mic ri Rwoth?”
Kenyo jotel nonin, jodhum ma nonin, jomituka jolweny, kodi jodhum ma gigipiny pa kere jomiyere miyo
gigipiny me ri tic ma Ot pa Were: Zahabu ma kalo tan 170 feza ma kalo tan 340 ywel manyalo romo tan 620 kodi nyweny ma kalo tan 3,400.
Jono m'oyido jonitie gi telin ma welo jomiyo i kakan pesa ma Ot pa Were, m'oyido dhumere gi Yehiel Jalevi ma wok Gerisom.
Kenyo ji jofore kwoŋbedo oyido jomiyo Rwoth gigipiny kweth gi miyirok aka gi cuny gin acel. Kere Daudi bende osiemere swa.
Kenyo won ruwaŋ cokirok pa ji Kere Daudi opako Rwoth. Owaco ni, “Rwoth Were pa kwari wan Yakobo wopak cil gi cil.
Aperin, awi Rwoth, obedo dwoŋo, meni, dwoŋ, loyo kodi dhum; kole gigipiny ma i polo kodi ma i piny obedo aperin; ibedo Kere, awi Rwoth, aka jadhum madwoŋ loyo kwoŋ gigipiny je.
Ŋaŋo je kodi lim wok bongin, aka idhumo je. Meni kodi teko nitie i cingin; aka inyalo loko dhano mogo je madwoŋ aka matek.
Onyo, Were mawan, wafoyin, aka wapako nyingin ma didwoŋ.”
“Kucel an kodi ji paran wakinyalo miyin gimoro, kwoŋbedo gigipiny je jobedo mic ma wok bongin, aka wadwoko rin nyaka gim'obedo aperin.
Iŋeyo Rwoth, nike waluwo i kwo paka jopath kodi jokicar, paka kwarere mawan jotimo. Ndelo i piny cale tipo, aka wangoye gi geno.
Awi Rwoth Were mawan, gigipiny ma gibe me je ma wamiyo ma geto rin ot ri nyingin maleŋ wok i cingin aka obedo aperin won.

Aŋeyo, Were paran, nike idwaro cuny dhano, aka iwinjo maber gi ji ma jotimo gim'otire. I tirok ma cunyan amiyo gigipiny me gi miyirok, aka onyo aneno ji perin, ma jonitie ka jomiyin mic gi miyirok kodi kisangala.
Awi Rwoth, Were pa Abraham, Isaka kodi Yakobo, kwarere mawan, kur cil gi cil nger atoŋa kodi paro no i cuny ji perin, aka weyi jowobedi jor'adieri rin.
Miy wodan Solomon wokur cik perin je gi cunye acel aka wogeti Ot pa Were m'atieko yiko gigipiny mere.”
Kenyo Daudi omiyo ji je cik ni, “Pak win Rwoth Were mewin!” Aka cokirok pa ji je jopako Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo, aka jokule piny bwonirok ri Rwoth kodi kere pajo.

Ndelo ma yawere jomiyo cowirok mar'ogwaŋe to jowaŋo mic ri Rwoth, aka jomiyo ji camo. Jothumo thwondhe 1,000 wot rombo 1,000 kodi nyithindhi rombo 1,000 ma jowaŋo paka cowirok ma gikululu i wi migam. Jokelo mic ma vini bende.
Ameno ndelo no josangala swa paka jocemo to jomedho ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Owir Solomon gi mo madirio paka kere. I nyingi Rwoth owir go paka jadhum pajo kodi Zadok paka jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Ameno Solomon olunjo bamere Daudi i kom ma dhum ma Rwoth oyido oketho. Go oyindira aka piny Isiraili gipi owinjo go.
Jodhum je kodi jolweny, kiri gi wot Daudi man je jociko woro Solomon paka kere.
Rwoth omiyo piny Isiraili gipi lworo Solomon, aka omiyo go dwoŋ ma kere man fodi k'obedo gine i Isiraili.
Daudi wod pa Yese odhumo Isiraili
ma oro piero aŋwen. Odhumo i Hebron ma oro abirio aka i Yerusalem ma oro piero adek g'adek.
Otho i oro ma tiyo, aka oyido oŋaŋ m'iworo; aka wode Solomon olunjo go paka kere.
Onyo tim pa Kere Daudi wok i cako kiri i gike ondiki i ndiko ma mako kwoŋ jotuci wac Were adek; Samwiri, Nathan kodi Gad.
Ndiko me waco nger ma go odhum'iye, meni pere, kodi gigipiny je m'otimere rigo, ri Isiraili kodi ker m'othoko.
Solomon wod pa Daudi oridho ker pere matek, aka Rwoth Were pere oyido nitie gi go aka omiyo go silwany to loko go jameni.
Solomon olwoŋo Joisiraili je, jomituka ma ganin kodi miya acel, jothum banja, jotel pa Joisiraili je kodi jotel ma pecin.
Aka Solomon, kodi cokirok ma ji no je jokidho i kabedo ma malo m'oyido nitie i Gibeon, kole Wema ma romo pa Were, ma Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth oyido otimo i thim, oyido nitie kenyo.
To Daudi oyido otieko kelo Kakan ma Cikirok pa Were wok i Kiriath Yerim i kabedo mere m'oyido Daudi otieko yiko, kole go oyido otieko jengo wema mere i Yerusalem.
Aka kiri migam ma nyweny ma Bezalel wod pa Uri, nyakwar Hur, oyido otimo, oyido nitie kenyo ruwaŋ Wema Maleŋ.
Solomon oidho malo kenyo i wi migam ma nyweny ruwaŋ Rwoth, m'oyido nitie i Wema ma romo, to miyo cowirok mar'ogwaŋe gana acel.
Wor no won Were omenyere ri Solomon, to waco rigo ni: “Kway gim'imito ni amiyin.”
Solomon owaco ri Were ni, “Itieko nyutho mar madwoŋ makiwire ri baba Daudi, aka ilokan kere m'olunjo go.
Awi Rwoth Were, weyi cikirok m'itimo gi baba Daudi wotundi i gike pama, kole iŋat'ilokan kere pa ji mathoth paka fukefuke ma piny.
Pama onyo miyan rieko kodi ŋeyo ma dhumo ji me, kole in won inyalo dhumo ji perin me, ma jothoth ama!”

Were odwoko Solomon ni: “Paka gime oyido nitie i cunyin, aka ikikwayo lim kosa dwoŋ, kosa kwo pa jokwor perin, aka ikikwayo kiri kwo mabor, to itieko kwayo rieko kodi ŋeyo ri kwo perin ŋey inyal dhumo ji paran m'atieko lokin kere rijo,
rieko kodi ŋeyo amiyin. Amiyin bende ŋaŋo, lim perin, kodi dwoŋ, ma kerin je ma jopen bedo rin, aka ongoye man m'obedi gine paka in kendo.”
Ameno Solomon obino wok i kabedo ma malo i Gibeon, wok i Wema ma romo, i Yerusalem. Aka odhumo Isiraili paka rom.
I ndir ma dhum pa Solomon feza oyido nitie kisi kamoro paka telin i Yerusalem, aka yen sida oyido omore paka musikamol.
Aka kayinin ma jodonjo i piny pa Solomon oyido jowok i Misir kodi Kuwe, aka jomitan pere oyido jojolo jo wok Kuwe i welo m'oŋeyere.
Oyido jo kelo cawila wok i Misir i welo ma feza 600 kodi kayinin i welo ma feza 150 aka jomitan pa Solomon oyido jotero kitana ri kerin pa Johiti kodi kerin ma Siria.
Kere Solomon oyere geto Ot pa Were i nyingi Rwoth, kodi peco pere.
Aka Solomon oyimo ri cwo 70,000 bieto kodi cwo 80,000 ma ŋinyo telin i piny matendere, kodi 3,600 ma neno paka jotiyo.
Solomon odhiro ri Hiram, kere ma Tire mikwenda ni, “Paka itimo gi baba Daudi t'idhiro rigo sida ma geto ot pere, ameno bende tim ran.

Neni, acegin geto ot ma miyo nyingi Rwoth Were paran dwoŋ t'amiyo go, ma waŋo buban maŋwe kur ruwaŋe, kodi ma miyo cowirok ma mugat, kodi ma miyo cowirok m'odikin kodi m'othieno, i Sabato gi i dwe manyen kodi kalimin pa Rwoth Were mawan ma ripo, paka Rwoth owodho or nike wotim cil gi cil ri Isiraili.
Ot pa Were m'abino geto labedo madwoŋ, rupiri Were mawan dwoŋ loyo werin man je.
To ŋa manyalo geto rigo ot, k'inen polo, kiri polo m'oŋawere, kinyal tiŋo go? An aŋa maber ageti rigo ot, kwanyo woko paka kabedo ma waŋo buban ruwaŋ go?

Riameno dhiri ran jandijo ma latic gi zahabu, feza, ywel kodi nyweny, kodi ma jonyalo timo nangin manyarangi ariŋo, m'obokere kodi manyabululu. Jandijo no ripo ŋeyo goro gigipiny to riwere kodi jondijo man ma jonitie kodan i Yuda kodi i Yerusalem ma baba Daudi oyero.
Dhiri ran bende yath m'ilwoŋo ni sida, yath ma lwiyo kodi mbawo yath aligum ma wok Lebanon, kole aŋeyo nike ŋecin perin joŋeyo yaŋo mbawin i Lebanon. Ŋecin paran jolariwere gi ŋecin perin,
to joyiko ran mbawin i thotho, kole ot m'amito geto labedo madwoŋ swa.
Alamiyo ŋecin perin ma joyaŋo mbawo tan 2,000 ma ŋano, tan 2,000 ma bale, lita 400,000 ma vini, kodi lita 400,000 ma mo oliv.”
Kenyo Huram kere ma Tire omiyo radwok i balwa m'odhiro ri Solomon ni, “Rwoth okethin bedo kere rupiri omaro ji pere.”
Hiram bende owaco ni, “Rwoth Were pa Isiraili m'ocweyo polo gi piny wopak, m'omiyo kere Daudi wode mariek m'opoŋ gi ndijo kodi niaŋ, go ama lageto ot ri Rwoth, kodi peco pere.”
“Onyo atieko dhiro jal ma jandijo m'opoŋ gi niaŋ, Hiram

ma min obedo janono pa Dan, aka bamere oyido wok Tire. Go ofonjere timo gigipiny gi zahabu, feza, ywel, nyweny, tele kodi mbawo, go nyalo tiyo gi nangin manyarangi ariŋo, manyabululu m'obokere kodi law mafoth. Go bende nyalo timo tic ma goro gigipiny m'opokere kodi wodho cal m'omiy go je, gi cwo ma jondijo perin, cwo m'oyido jotiyo ri benin, Kere Daudi.
Onyo, paka ri ŋano kodi bale, mo kodi vini, ma rwoth paran otieko luwo kwoŋe, weyi go wodhiri ri ŋecin pere.
Wa latoŋo mbawo m'imito wok Lebanon, to wakelo rin m'otwey i wic ka luwo gi nam kiri Yopa, ŋey inyal tero kiri i Yerusalem.”
Kenyo Solomon okwano jopath je m'oyido jonitie i Isiraili, munyo Daudi bamere otieko kwano jo, onwaŋ jopath 153,600.
Solomon omiyo 70,000 tic ma bielo bieto, 80,000 baro telin i piny matendere, aka 3,600 oketho jo paka nyapalin.
Solomon ocako geto k'ario i dwe mar'ario i oro mar'aŋwen ma dhum pere.
Me a rapim pa Solomon ma geto Ot pa Were: Mita 27 i boro, mita abuŋwen i laco.
Kisika ma dhiot oyido rom gi laco ma Ot pa Were gibe, mita abuŋwen, kodi ŋawirok mita piero abic g'aŋwen. Iy kisika oyido oum gi zahabu macil.
Kisika madwoŋ oyido otim gi sida t'iumo gi zahabu macil, to jotim'iye cal ma thith kodi lijegere ma loko maŋon.
Kere oyiko Ot pa Were maŋon gi telin ma welo kodi zahabu m'oom wok i Parvayim
Ameno kere oumo ot gi zahabu, kore, wiye, kodi thigo to goro cal ma cwec ma jobwombi gin i kore ot.
Oor zahabu gram 570 ma timo musumal, aka kor ot ma kisikin ma malo bende oum gi zahabu.
Jocungo ma joŋiyere kareno joŋiyo kadonjo. Kisi moro onwaŋo nitie gi bwombe ario,
kisi bwombi acel oyido boro mere mita 2.2 aka laco mere oyido mita abuŋwen; oyido bwombi jo acel oyare i dier kisika to joromo;
aka bwombi jo ario man oyido jogeyo kor ot i thenge, aka oyido mita abuŋwen i laco.
Kitambala ma Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo oyido otim gi nangin kodi rangi manyabululu, ma ariŋo, kodi m'obokere gi cal cwec ma jobwombi gin iye.
Kere otimo sirin ario, kisi acel oyido mita 15.5 i ŋawirok to ketho ruwaŋ Ot pa Were. Kisi acel oyido nitie gi kisul ma mita 2.2 i ŋawirok.
Otimo lijegere m'okedi, to ketho jo i wi sirin, to timo pomo 100 to jengo i wi lijegere.
Solomon ojengo sirin ruwaŋ Ot pa Were, acel racuc kodi man racam; maracuc mere olwoŋo ni Jakin, aka maracam mere olwoŋo ni Bowaz.
Go bende otimo pipa ma nyaraunda gi ywel, lutho mere oyido mita 2.2 i laco mere oyido mita 4.4 aka dwoŋo mere oyido mita 13.2.
Oyido nitie bol ario mar'asande m'otimi gi ywel thoko miango ma pipa woko m'otimi i nger acel.
Pipa oyido obedo i wi cal ma thwondhe apar g'ario ma joŋiyo woko, adek i kisi thenge.
Nywol pipa oyido timo milimita piero abirio g'abic. Dhoke oyido cale dhok kikopo, m'oyare woko paka thiw mawuwa. Pipa no oyido tiŋo lita 60,000.

Solomon bende otimo galaya apar ma lawo woko remo mar'ogwaŋe m'imiyo paka cowirok awaŋa, to ketho abic yuthenge ma yupiny, kodi abic yuthenge ma yumalo. Pi m'oyido nitie i pipa madwoŋ oyido obedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam ma lwoki.
Go bende otimo mezin apar, to ketho jo i Ot pa Were, abic racuc kodi abic racam. Solomon otimo galayere 100 ma zahabu.
Go otimo diedipo ma iye ri jocway ri Were i wi migam, kodi diedipo ma woko kodi thigin mere to umo thigin no gi ywel;
oketho pipa yuthenge ma yupiny ma yuwok ceŋ ma Ot pa Were.
Hiram otimo degi, kijiko ma fufa kodi galayere. Ameno Hiram ocowo tic m'otimo ri kere Solomon i Ot pa Were.
Sirin ario, atewe, kisul ario i wi sirin i cal mar'atewe kodi lijegere m'okedi i wi kisul sirin;
kodi pomo 400 i bol ario thoko lijegere m'okedi m'oyido i wi kisul sirin.
Hiram bende otimo raŋaw talin, kodi galaya i pendi jo,
pipa acel, kodi cal ma thwondhe apar g'ario i pende.
Degi, kijikin ma fufa, wumin, kodi gigipiny man je ma Hiram otimo gi ywel m'oleny ri kere Solomon ri Ot pa Rwoth.
Kere omiyo wotim je i dier Sukoth kodi Zereda i milelo Yordan.
Ameno otim gigipiny kweth m'ongoye ŋat'onyalo ŋeyo peko ma ywel m'ooro.
Ameno Solomon otimo gigipiny je m'oyido nitie i Ot pa Were: Migam ma zahabu, mezin ma ketho mugat maleŋ m'imiyo Were,
raŋaw kodi talin pajo ma zahabu macil maliel ruwaŋ Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, paka ocan,
mawuwin, talin, lew jo je ma zahabu macil;
gi jolo buru ma tala, galayere, atewe ma tiŋo buban, kodi sapikere ma cuk mac, je ma zahabu macil. Thigin ma donjo i Ot pa Were, thigin ma donjo i Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo oum gi zahabu.
Aka cwo je jocokere bongi kere Solomon i kalima i dwe mar'abirio.
Munyo jotel je jotieko cokirok, Jolevi jotiŋo malo Kakan ma Cikirok
aka jotero i Ot pa Were. Jolevi kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam bende jotero Wema Maleŋ kodi gigipiny mere je i Ot pa Were.
Kere Solomon kodi ji je jocokere ruwaŋ Kakan ma Cikirok aka jomiyo cowirok ma rombo kodi dhok kweth ma kikwanere.
Kenyo jocway ri Were i wi migam jokelo Kakan ma Cikirok i Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, i ŋangi cwec ma jobwombi gin.
Bwombi gin m'oyare oumo Kakan ma Cikirok kodi gute m'otiŋ gine.
Gike ma gute oyido nyalo nenere gi ŋat'ocungo tirtir ruwaŋ Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo, makiweno gi kaman je. (Gutin no fodi jonitie kenyo kiri konon.)
Oyido ongoye gima nitie i Kakan ma Cikirok kwanyo woko telin mapando ario ma Musa oyido oketh'iye i got Sinai, munyo Rwoth otimo cikirok gi Joisiraili munyo jowok i Misir.

Aka Jolevi ma jower je, Asaf, Heman, Yeduthun, kodi wot jo kodi wade pajo joruko law mafoth gi pado m'irudo, tongol kodi adungu. Jocungo yuwok ceŋ ruwaŋ migam gi jocway ri Were i wi migam 120 m'oyido jokudho gwarin;
aka jokudhi gwarin kodi jower jowero gi lokoro acel kanyacel ma pako kodi foyo Rwoth. Kanyacel gi jokudhi gwarin, pado aruda kodi gi wer man, jotiŋo dwondi jo malo aka jopako Rwoth gi wac me ni:
“Pak Rwoth, kole go ber,
aka mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,”
I sawa no pondeponde opoŋ i Ot pa Rwoth.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam jok'onyalo timo tic pajo ro pondeponde; kole dwoŋ pa Rwoth opoŋo Ot pa Were.
Kenyo Solomon okwayo ni,
“Rwoth, itieko yero bedo i pondeponde kodi mudho.
Onyo atieko geto rin ot maŋon,
kam'ilabed'iye cil gi cil.”
Joisiraili je oyido jocungo kenyo, aka kere Solomon owire to ŋiyo jo, aka okwayo Were womiy jo silwany.
Solomon owaco ni, “Rwoth Were pa Isiraili wopak! Okuro cikirok pere m'otimo ri baba Daudi, munyo owaco ni,
‘Wok i hongo m'awodho ji paran wok i Misir, fodi akiyero tindi madwoŋ i lowo ma Isiraili ma Ot pa Were ripo woget'iye kam'inyalo laman'iye aka akiyero dhano telo ji paran Isiraili.
To onyo atieko yero Yerusalem paka kabedo m'ilalaman'iye, aka in, Daudi, dhumo ji paran.’ ”
“Baba Daudi oyido ocano geto Ot pa Were ma lamo Rwoth Were pa Isiraili,
to Rwoth owaco rigo ni, ‘Oyido itire mito geto ran Ot pa Were,
t'ikila geto. Obedo wodin, wodin won, ama lageto ran Ot pa Were.’ ”
“Aka onyo Rwoth okuro cikirok pere. Alunjo baba paka kere ma Isiraili, aka atieko geto Ot pa Were ma lamo Rwoth Were pa Isiraili.
Atieko bende ketho kabedo ri Kakan ma Cikirok manitie iye cikirok ma Rwoth otimo Joisiraili.”
Kenyo Solomon ocungo ruwaŋ migam i waŋ cokirok pa Joisiraili, aka orieyo cinge malo,

(Solomon oyido otimo madala ma nyweny to ketho i dier diedipo. Oyido obedo mita 2.2 kisi thenge aŋwen, kodi mita 1.3 i ŋawirok. Oidho madala me, to guro conge piny kama kisi dhano onyalo nen'iye go, to rieyo cinge yupolo)
to kwayo ni, “Awi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, ongoye Were ma cale in, i polo malo kosa i piny! Ikuro cikirok perin gi ji perin aka inyutho mar makiwire ka jowotho ruwaŋin gi cuny jo je.
Itieko kuro cikirok m'itimo gi baba Daudi, konon kisi wac otundo i kare.
Onyo riameno, Awi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili kur bende cikirok man m'itimo gi baba munyo iwaco rigo nike noknok acel kwoŋ nyikwaye bino dhumo paka kere ma Isiraili, k'inen jowinjin paka go.
Ameno onyo, Awi Were pa Isiraili, weyi kisi gim'iciko baba Daudi, ŋeca perin wotundi i kare.”
Rwoth Were paran, abedo ŋeca perin. Winji kwayo paran, aka imiyan gim'akwayin konon.
Kur Ot pa Were me odieceŋ kodi wor, kabedo m'itieko yero nike wolamin'iye. Winjan k'aŋiyo Ot pa Were me t'akwayo.
Winji kwayo paran gi kwayo pa ji perin ka joŋiyo kabedo me to jokwayo. I nyingin i polo winji wan aka icwaki reco mawan.”
“K'osegeya nyatoro timo gimarac ri nyawote t'ikelo go ruwaŋ migam perin i Ot pa Were kwoŋirok nike go bubanja,
Awi Rwoth, winji gi polo aka ithumi banja ri ŋecin perin. Miy gir'acula ri ŋatarac aka iwey ŋata bubanja wokadhi.”
“Ka ji perin Isiraili jokwor pajo jokengila jo kwoŋbedo jotimo reco kwoŋin, to jowire bongin kendo to jobino i Ot pa Were me, pusirok gi mwolo,
winji jo gi polo. Cwaki reco pajo, aka idwoki jo i lowo m'imiyo kwarere pajo.”
“K'itweyo koth kwoŋbedo ji perin jotimo reco kwoŋin, ka jopusere to joŋiyo Ot pa Were me kwayin gi mwolo,
winji jo gi polo. Cwaki reco pa ŋecin perin Joisiraili. Fonji jo timo gimo'tire. Kenyo, Awi Rwoth, dhiri koth i lowo perin me, m'imiyo ji perin paka lim pajo alunja.”
“Ka kec kosa two nundu obedi i lowo, kosa koyo malieth kosa tome bonyo, onyeki cemo, kosa jokwor pa ji perin jomonji jo iy'acel kwoŋ tindin pajo madongo, kosa two obedi i dier jo,
Ka Joisiraili perin mogo, wok i ŋuto ma cuny jo, jotiŋ cingi jo malo i Ot pa Were me,
winji kwayo pajo. Winji jo gi peco perin i polo, cwaki jo, aka kony jo. In kende iŋat'iŋeyo paro ma cuny nyatoro. Tiyi gi kisi nyatoro paka yenyere,
ŋey jowolworin i kwo pajo je i lowo m'imiyo kwarere mawan.”
“I nger acel ka japath, ma k'obedo acel kwoŋ ji perin owinji kwoŋ dwoŋ perin kodi gigipiny madongo m'itieko timo ri ji perin, to bino lamin kodi kwayin i Ot pa Were me,

winji kwayo pere. I polo, kam'ibed'iye, winji go aka tim gima go kwayin timo, ŋey nonin je i piny gibe jowoŋeyin aka jowowinjin, paka ji perin Isiraili jotimo. Kenyo jobino ŋeyo nike Ot pa Were m'ageto me kabedo m'iripo lamin'iye.”
“K'imiyo ji perin cik kadho i lweny gi jokwor pajo to jokwayin, kama jobed'iye je, ka joŋiyo tindi madwoŋ me m'iyero kodi Ot pa Were m'ageto rin me,
winji kwayo pajo. Winji jo gi polo aka miy jo loyo.”
“Ka ji perin jotimi reco kwoŋin, kole ongoye ŋata kitim reco, to i nge perin iweyo jokwor pajo kikengila jo, t'itero jo paka jotwec i lowo man, bor kosa cegin,
kucel ka joŋuti reco pajo i lowo m'oter'iye jo paka jotwec, to jopusere, to joywak rin i lowo no, ka jowaco ni, ‘Watimo reco, watimo gi komo; aka watimo gikidakana,’
Ka jopusere gi cuny jo je kodi adundo pajo je i lowo pa jokwor pajo, ka joŋiyo lowo me, m'imiyo kwarere pajo, tindi madwoŋ me m'iyero, kodi Ot pa Were m'ageto rin me,
kenyo winji kwayo pajo kodi ywak pajo gi polo kam'ibed'iye, maki wor gi jo aka icwaki reco pajo je.”
“Onyo pama, Awi Were paran, weyi waŋin woyawere kwoŋ wan, aka ciki ithin iwinji kwayo i kabedo me.”
in kodi Sanduku ma Cikirok, ranyuth madwoŋ perin.
Weyi jocway ri Were i wi migam perin, Awi Rwoth Were, jowolimi both,
aka weyi jor'adieri perin jowofore i bero perin.
Awi Rwoth Were, ikir'ikwer kere m'itieko yero!
Poyi mar perin makiwire ri ŋeca perin Daudi.”
Jocway ri Were i wi migam jok'onyalo kiri donjo i Ot pa Rwoth Were rupiri dwoŋ pa Rwoth oyido oumo.
Munyo Joisiraili je joneno mac loro piny wok i polo kodi dwoŋ pa Rwoth ka umo Ot pa Were, jokule piny ruwaŋ jo i lowo to jolamo aka jopako Rwoth, ka jowaco ni,
“Go ber swa!
Mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.”
Kenyo kere Solomon kodi ji je jomiyo Rwoth cowirok.
Solomon omiyo Rwoth cowirok ma siem ma dhok 22,000 kodi rombo 120,000. Aka ameno kere kodi ji je joketho i cingi Rwoth Ot pa Were.

Jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi jomako kabedo pajo gi giwer ma Kere Daudi oyido otimo ma pako Rwoth, kareno jowero ni: “Mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.” Paka Daudi oyido owodho or. Jocway ri Were i wi migam oyido jokudho gwara, kareno Joisiraili je jocungo.

I ndelo no won Solomon oloko dier diedipo maleŋ, yuwaŋ Ot pa Were, aka omiyo kenyo mic awaŋa gikululu, mic ma cemo manyinge, kodi mic mabor ogwaŋe paka cowirok ma siem. Otimo gime kwoŋbedo migam ma ywel oyido thin ri cowirok me je.
Solomon kodi Joisiraili je jotimo kalima ma ndelo abirio. Oyido nitie lwak ji wok i ger ma Hamath tundo yumalo kodi kew gi Misir yupiny.
I ndelo mar'aboro jotimo kalima ma cego cokirok, kole oyido jobedo gi ndelo abirio ma ketho i cingi Rwoth migam kodi ndelo abirio man ma kalima.
Ka ndelo piero ario g'adek ma dwe mar'abirio, Solomon osewila ji dok i pecin pajo. Ji oyido josangala ro silwany je ma Rwoth oyido otieko miyo Daudi, Solomon kodi ji pere Isiraili.
Ameno Solomon ocowo geto Ot pa Rwoth kodi ot pa kere; kisi gima Solomon oyido otieko cano timo i Ot pa Rwoth kodi i ot pere won go ocowo maber.
Kenyo Rwoth omenyere ri Solomon to waco rigo ni, “Atieko winjo kwayo perin, aka atieko yero Ot pa Were me paka kam'iripo miyan iye cowirok.
K'acego polo to koth ngoye, kosa amiyo bonyo cik camo cemo, kosa adhiro two nundu i dier ji paran,
ka ji paran ma jolwoŋere gi nyingan jomwole, jokway, jorangan, to joweyo yo pajo ma kidakana, kenyo alawinjo gi polo, alacwako reco pajo t'abotho piny pajo.
Pama onyo alayawo waŋan aka alaciko ithan winjo kwayo m'ilakwayo ka.
Kole pama atieko yero t'aloko ot me maleŋ ŋey nyingan wobedi kenyo cil gi cil, waŋan kodi adundo paran labedo kenyo i hongo je.
To ri in, k'inotiy ran paka benin Daudi, kareno iwinjo cik paran kodi gim'amiyin cik timo je,
kenyo alaridho dhum perin, paka atimo cikirok gi benin Daudi k'awaco ni, ‘Wangi ilabedo gi nyakwarin ma ladhumo Isiraili.’ ”
“To ka winokwer winjo cik kodi or paran m'atieko miyo win, to witiyo ri werin man, to wilamo jo,
kenyo alafudho win wok i lowo m'atieko miyo win, aka alajwango Ot pa Were me, m'atieko loko maleŋ paka kam'iripo laman'iye. Ji kisi kamoro jolaloko gir'ageca aka jolatero gi cay.”
“Aka Ot pa Were me, ma pama imiyo dwoŋ me, kisi ŋat'oluwi je ladhier to penjo ni, ‘Raŋo Rwoth otimo gime ri lowo me kodi Ot pa Were me?’
Ji joladwoko ni, ‘Kwoŋbedo jojwango Rwoth Were m'owodho kwarere pajo wok i piny Misir. Joworo werin man, to jolamo jo; riameno go okelo teko me kwoŋ jo.’ ”
Solomon ogeto Ot pa Were kodi peco pere ma oro piero ario.
Kere Solomon bende ogeto kendo tindin madongo ma Kere Hiram oyido omiyo go, to ketho Joisiraili bedo i jo.
Solomon omonjo adec ma Hamath Zoba to mako.
Solomon ogeto tindi madwoŋ Tadmor i thim kodi tindin man m'oyido obedo kakan i Hamath.
Go bende ogeto kendo Bethhoron ma Yumalo kodi ma Yupiny, tindin madongo m'otinda gi kor ot, waŋkace kodi nyweny,

tindi madwoŋ Balath, tindin madongo je ma go okano iye gigipiny, kodi ma kayinin pere kodi cawilin pere oyido jobed'iye. Otimo can pere je ma geto i Yerusalem, i Lebanon, kodi iy'adec je ma go oyido dhumo.

Ri tic pere arom, Solomon ooro nyikway ji ma Kanan ma Joisiraili oyido jok'oneko munyo jotero lowo pajo. Me obedo Joamor, Johiti, Joperiz, Johivi, kodi Joyebus, ma nyikway jo jomedere bedo ŋecin kiri konon.
To Solomon k'ooro Joisiraili i tic arom, jo jotiyo paka jolweny, jotel pa jolweny, jomituka ma cawilin kodi jogwey kayinin pere.
Solomon oyido nitie gi jodhum 250 m'oyido jonitie gi dwoŋ kwoŋ ji.

Solomon okelo dhako pere, nyar farawo wok i tindi pa Daudi bedo i ot m'oyido ogeto rigo, kole go owaco ni, “Dhako paran kiripi bedo i ot pa Kere Daudi ma Isiraili, kwoŋbedo kabedo je ma Sanduku ma Kakan ma Cikirok otieko bed'iye leŋ.”
Kenyo Solomon omiyo cowirok awaŋa ri Rwoth i wi migam m'oyido ogeto yuwaŋ Ot pa Were.
Go omiyo cowirok paka cik pa Musa waco ri kisi ndelo: Sabato, Kalima ma Dwe Manyen kodi Kalima adek ma oro. Kalima ma Mugat ma buthow, Kalima ma Keco kodi Kalima ma Kayindi.

Luwo kwoŋ cik ma Daudi bamere oketho, ocano tic ma kisi ndelo ri jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi m'oyido jokonyo jo i wer kodi timo tic pajo. Solomon bende oketho jokur ma Ot pa Were i kitipin pajo i kisi waŋkac, luwo kwoŋ cik ma Daudi jacwo pa Were omiyo.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi joluwo i kare cik je ma Daudi omiyo kwoŋ jo kodi udi ma kan.
Ameno tic pa Solomon je oyido orumo wok i ndelo m'ocak'iye misingi ma Ot pa Rwoth cuka Ot pa Rwoth ocow geto maber.
Onyo Solomon okadho i Eziongeba kodi Eloth i thengi nam, i piny Edom.
Kere Hiram odhiro rigo cwo pere mogo ma jotieko niaŋ tic ma nam tiyo gi ŋecin pa Solomon. Jocewere kidho i lowo ma Ofir, aka jodwoko ri Solomon gi zahabu ma kalo kilo 15,000.
Solomon odwoko penji je, aka ongoye gim'otek rigo tito.
Nyamicala ma Seba owinjo rieko pa Solomon aka oneno peco pere m'ogeto,
cemo m'itoko i meza pere, pecin pa jodhum pere, kitipin pa jotic kodi ŋecin pere kodi nangin pajo ma cale ma joruko, jotic pere, kodi cowirok ma Solomon miyo i Ot pa Were aka cunye okwe.
Nyamicala ma Seba owaco ri Solomon ni, “Gim'awinjo i piny paran ma mako kwoŋ tim perin kodi rieko perin obedo adieri!
To akinyalo yeyo cuka an won abino t'aneno. Aka neni adec mere oyido k'owaci ran. Iriek kalo kama ji jowaco.
Josilwany a ji perin! Josilwany a ŋecin perin me, ma noknok jonitie ruwaŋin aka jonitie gi silwany ma winjo rieko perin.
Rwoth Were perin wopak m'onyutho nger m'osangala iye kodin to kethin kere, dhumo i nyinge. Kwoŋbedo mar pere ri Isiraili kiwire, okethin bedo kere pajo ŋey inyal kuro cik kodi tiro.”
Nyamicala omiyo Solomon mic m'okelo; zahabu ma kalo kilo 4,000 kodi gigipiny maŋwe kur kodi thiwino madit. Ongoye kendo dito ma gigipiny maŋwe kur ma Solomon olimo paka ma nyamicala omiyo go.
(Aka ŋecin pa kere Hiram kodi kere Solomon ma jokelo zahabu wok Ofir bende jokelo mbawin ma yen m'ilwoŋo ni algum kodi telin ma welo.
Solomon ooro mbawin me ma geto madala ma Ot pa Were kodi ma peco pere, kodi timo adungin kodi tongol ri jower. Nger mbawo ma yen algum no fodi k'oneno kendo tundo kiri konon i piny Yuda.)
Kere Solomon omiyo nyamicala ma Seba kisi gima go okwayo, medo i wi mic m'oyido omiyo go loyo m'okelo rigo. Kenyo nyamicala odok i Seba gi jotic pere.
Kisi oro kere Solomon oyido limo zahabu ma romo kilo 23,000
medo i wi misolo ma wok bongi jomitan, kerin pa Jowarabu kodi jogavana mar'adec ma Isiraili.
Solomon otimo kwote malac 200 gi zahabu m'ocadh, kisi kwot acel otim gi zahabu ma romo kilo abirio.
Solomon bende otimo kwote mathindho 300 gi zahabu m'ocadh, kisi kwot acel otim gi zahabu ma romo kilo ario. Kwote me je kere oketho i Ot ma Lul ma Lebanon.
Solomon bende otimo kom ma dhum malac gi lak liec, aka oum gi zahabu ma mangil.
Kom ma dhum no oyido nitie gi madalin aucel kodi nyathukthuk ma zahabu m'omakere kwoŋe. Oyido nitie gi cinge i kisi thenge, kodi cal ma simbwor i kisi thenge.
Oyido nitie cal ma simbwor apar g'ario, acel i gike ma kisi madala. Nger kom ma dhum me oyido ongoye i ker mogo je.
Atewe pa Kere Solomon ma medho je otim gi zahabu, kiri g'atewe ma Ot ma Lul ma Lebanon je otim gi zahabu ma mangil, kwoŋbedo i ndir pa Solomon feza oyido ongoye gi cwe.
Solomon oyido nitie gi bogi ma mel ma jocewere gi bogi pa Kere Hiram. Dicel kisi oro adek bogi pere oyido dwoko m'otiŋo zahabu, feza, lak liec, oŋere ambu, kodi oŋere.
Kere Solomon oyido oŋaŋ aka riek loyo kere man je i piny.
Kerin je ma piny jorango Solomon winjo rieko pere ma Were omiyo go.
Kisi kere okelo rigo mic ma gigipiny m'otimi gi feza, zahabu, nangin, gilweny, gigipiny maŋwe kur, kayinin kodi punde. Gime omedere timirok kisi oro.
Go odhumo kerin je wok i malawa Yufrete tundo i lowo pa Jofilistia, kodi kew gi Misir.
I hongo ma dhum pa Kere Solomon feza oyido nitie kisi kamoro paka telin i Yerusalem, aka yen sida oyido thoth paka yen musikamol ma Yuda.
Oyido ikelo ri Solomon kayinin wok i piny Misir kodi wok i piny man je.

Tim pa Solomon man je wok i cako tundo i gike, ondiki i kitawo ma Kigana pa jatuci wac Were Nathan, kodi i Wac ma Were oluwo luwo i dhok Ahija ma wok Silo kodi i Menyirok pa Ido, ma bende luwo kwoŋ dhum pa Yerobowam wod pa Nebat
Solomon odhumo Isiraili gi Yerusalem ma oro piero aŋwen.
Solomon otho aka oyiki go i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi aka wode Rehobowam olunjo go.
Rehobowam okadho i Sekem, kole Joisiraili je oyido jobino kenyo ketho go kere.
Munyo Yerobowam wod pa Nebat owinjo (oyido go fodi nitie i Misir, kama go oyido oringo iye kwoŋ kere Solomon), odwoko wok i Misir.
Jo nonin ma yumalo jooro wolwoŋi Yerobowam, aka jokidho gi go bongi Rehobowam to jowaco rigo ni,
“Benin Solomon ojengo bieto mapek kwoŋ wan. K'inoloki bieto me masew t'iloko kwo mayot riwan, walatic rin.”
Rehobowam odwoko jo ni, “Dwoki win ka ndelo adek orumo, alamiyo win radwok.” Ameno to jokadho.
Kenyo Kere Rehobowam openjo jodongo m'oyido jotiyo paka jomic rieko pa Solomon ni, “Wimiyan rieko aŋo ma dwoko ji me?”
Aka jodwoko go ni, “K'ibedo gi wor ri jome t'isangala jo, luw gi jo wac maber, aka jolatic rin noknok gi wor.”
To Rehobowam okwero rieko pa jodongo ma jomiyo go, to kadho bongi yac ma jobedo muworo pere, aka m'oyido onyo jobedo jomic rieko pere.
Openjo jo ni, “Wimiyan rieko timo aŋo? Aŋo m'adwoki ji ma jokwayan loko bieto pajo masew?”
Jodwoko go ni, “Me a gim'iripo waco rijo ni, ‘Cingan manyako dinywol loyo pier baba!
Baba oketho bieto mapek kwoŋ win, to alaloko mapek loyo. Go ocwado win g'adasa to alacwado win gi luth kayina!’”
Ameno Yerobowam gi ji je jobino bongi Rehobowam i ndelo mar'adek, paka kere Rehobowam oyido owaco rijo.
Kere oweyo rieko ma jodongo jomiyo go aka oluwo gi jo gi gero
paka yac jomiyo go rieko. Go owaco ni, “Baba oketho bieto mapek kwoŋ win, to alaloko jo mapek loyo. Baba ocwado win g'adasa, to alacwado win gi luth kayina!”
Ameno kere k'owinjo ji; kole oyido obedo mito pa Rwoth kelo gima go oyido owaco wotundi i kare ri Yerobowam wod pa Nebat luwo bongi jatuci wac Were Ahija ma wok Silo. Meno am'omiyo kere k'owinjo ji.
Ameno ji jodok i wema pajo,
aka joweyo Rehobowam paka kere pa ji m'oyido jobedo iy'adec ma Yuda kende.
Kenyo kere Rehobowam ooro Adoniram, m'oyido telo jotic gi mbaka, kadho bongi Joisiraili, to jogoyo go gi telin to tho. Aka kere Rehobowam oidho cawila pere to ringo i Yerusalem.
Wok i hongo no kiri konon me, ji ma yumalo ma ker ma Isiraili jobedo kanyo jolwenyo gi ker pa Daudi.
Munyo Rehobowam otundo i Yerusalem, olwoŋo kanyacel jolweny ma jober loyo wok i nono pa Yuda gi Benyamin ma romo 180,000. Go oyido mito lweny ŋey wodwoki dhum pere kwoŋ nonin ma yumalo Isiraili.
To Rwoth waco ri Semaya jatuci wac Were ni,
“Waci ri Rehobowam, wod pa Solomon, gi jonono pa Yuda kodi jonono pa Benyamin, kodi ji je ni,
‘Wikiri wimonji wutmin win won, Isiraili. Dok win peco wijoje. Gim'otimere obedo mito paran.’” Joje jowinjo cik pa Rwoth aka jok'olwenyo gi Yerobowam.
Rehobowam odoŋ i Yerusalem aka ogeto cel i tindin madongo ma Yuda kodi Benyamin:
Ogeto Bethelehem, Etam, Tekowa,
Bethzur, Soko, Adulam,
Gath, Maresa, Zif,
Adorayim, Lakis, Azeka,
Zora, Ayijalon kodi Hebron.
Otimo cel matek, to ketho jomituka ri je, aka i kisi acel oketho kakano cemo, mo kodi vini.
Rehobowam bende oketho kwote kodi tonge malac i tindin je to loko jo matek swa. Ameno Yuda kodi Benyamin jobedo i dhum pere.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi m'oyido jonitie i ker ma yumalo ma Isiraili jomiyo Rehobowam kony pajo.
Jolevi joweyo lowo kodi lim pajo to jodok i Yuda gi Yerusalem, kwoŋbedo kere Yerobowam ma Isiraili kodi wote jok'oyeyo jo tic paka jocway ri Were i wi migam pa Rwoth.
Yerobowam oyero jocway ri were i wi migam pere won tiyo i kalamo manyakafir ma lamo jwogere kodi cal m'otimo i cal pa rwath dhok.
To, jono je m'oyido joketho cuny jo i lamo Rwoth Were pa Isiraili wok i nonin je ma Isiraili joluwo jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi kadho i Yerusalem miyo Rwoth Were pa kwarere pajo cowirok.
Gime oloko ker ma Yuda matek, aka ma oro adek jothielo Rehobowam wod pa Solomon, kole ma oro adek jobedo paka i hongo ma dhum pa Daudi kodi Solomon.
Rehobowam onywomo Mahalath, nyar Yerimoth wod pa Daudi, ma min oyido obedo Abihayili nyar Eliab nyakwar Yese.
Jonywolo wot jo adek: Yeus, Semaria kodi Zaham.
Rumacen go onywomo Maka, nyar Absalom, aka jonywolo nyithindho aŋwen: Abija, Atay, Ziza kodi Selomith.
Kanyacel, Rehobowam obedo gi mon 18 kodi mon ma thenge piero aucel, to nywolo wote piero ario g'aboro kodi nyir piero aucel. Rehobowam oyido omito Maka loyo,
ameno oyero Abija okayo pa Maka kwoŋ nyithindho pere je, lunjo go paka kere.
Rehobowam opoko wote tic gi rieko to ketho jo iy'adec je ma Yuda kodi Benyamin i tindin madongo m'otinda. Omiyo jo gima jomito je to nywomo rijo mon kweth.
Tekin Rehobowam loko dhum pere m'ocwiny paka kere, go kodi ji jojwango cik pa Rwoth.
I oro mar'abic ma dhum pa Rehobowam, kwoŋbedo oyido jokitim adieri ri Rwoth, Sisak kere ma Misir obino to monjo Yerusalem,
gi jolweny cawilin 1,200 kodi cwo 60,000 ma jogweyo kayinin. Jolweny ma kikwanere jobino gi Sisak wok i Misir, Libia, Sukim kodi Ethopiya.
Sisak omako tindin madongo m'otinda ma Yuda aka obino tundo kiri Yerusalem.

Kenyo Semaya jatuci wac were obino bongi Rehobowam kodi jodhum ma Yuda, m'oyido jocokere i Yerusalem kwalok kwoŋ Sisak, aka owaco rijo ni, “Me apaka Rwoth waco, ‘Wijwangan, ameno nyo atieko jwango win i cingi Sisak.’ ”
Kenyo jodhum ma Isiraili kodi kere jomwole to jowaco ni, “Rwoth otire.”
Munyo Rwoth oneno nike jomwole, wac pa Rwoth obino kendo ri Semaya ni, “Jotieko mwole; aka ak'orey woko jo, to alabotho mogo kwoŋ jo, aka akilakonjo keme paran kwoŋ Yerusalem gi cingi Sisak.
Kad'ameno jobino bedo ŋecin pere, ŋey jowonyal ŋeyo rapok i dier tiyo ran kodi tiyo ri jodhum ma piny.”
aka kere Rehobowam otimo kwote man gi ywel culo waŋ m'oyido otim gi zahabu aka omiyo jotel pa jokur ma waŋkac pa kere kuro.
Aka noknok ka kere okidho i Ot pa Rwoth, jakur oyido bino to tiŋo kwote, aka rumacen dwoko i kisika m'ikan'iye.
To kwoŋbedo Rehobowam omwole, Rwoth k'oreyo jo woko kicutho i keme pere; aka gigipiny okadho maber ri Yuda.

Ameno Rehobowam odhumo i Yerusalem to medo dwoŋ pere paka kere. Go oyido jaoro piero aŋwen g'acel munyo cako dhum, aka odhumo ma oro apar g'abirio i Yerusalem, tindi madwoŋ ma Rwoth oyido oyero kwoŋ nonin je ma Isiraili paka kabedo m'iripo lam'iye go. Yok Rehobowam oyido ilwoŋo ni Nama ma wok i Amon.
Rehobowam otimo gimarac, kole go k'oketho cunye i rango mito pa Rwoth.
Onyo tim pa Rehobowam, wok i cakirok tundo i gike ondiki i Kigana pa Semaya kodi Ido jotuci wac Were. Lweny obedo ma kicoki i dier Rehobowam kodi Yerobowam.
Rehobowam otho aka oyiki go kam'oyik'iye bacere pere i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi; aka wode m'ilwoŋo ni Abija olunjo go paka kere.
I oro mar'apar g'aboro ma dhum pa Yerobowam, Abija obedo kere i Yuda,
aka odhumo ma oro adek i Yerusalem. Yokimere oyido ilwoŋo ni Mikaya nyar Uriel ma wok i tindi madwoŋ Gibeya.
Onyo lweny otur i dier Abija kodi Yerobowam
Abija oyido nitie gi jolweny 400,000 aka Yerobowam oyido nitie gi jolweny 800,000.
Kenyo Abija ocungo malo wi got Zemarayim manitie i piny matendere Efrayim to waco ni, “Winjan win, awi Yerobowam kodi Joisiraili je!
Wikuya nike Rwoth Were pa Isiraili otimo cikirok makiwire gi Daudi, ka miyo go kodi nyikwaye dhumo Isiraili cil gi cil?
Kucel Yerobowam wod pa Nebat, ŋeca pa Solomon wod pa Daudi, oay to gwenyere kwoŋ kere pere,
kodi ji ma bukony jocokere bonge to jokwero Rehobowam wod pa Solomon, munyo Rehobowam fodi thin aka okuya gir'atima aka k'onyalo juko jo.”
“Aka onyo pama iparo nike inyalo juko ker ma Rwoth oketho cingi nyikway Daudi, kwoŋbedo widit swa aka winitie gi rwath dhok ma zahabu ma Yerobowam otimo riwin paka werin.

Wiriemo woko jocway ri Were i wi migam pa Rwoth, nyikway Aron, kodi Jolevi, to wiketho jocway ri Were i wi migam mewin paka ji ma piny man jotimo? Kisi nyatoro ma bino gi rwath kosa wot rombo abirio bedo jacway ri Were i wi migam ri werin moro no.”
“To paka riwan, Rwoth obedo Were mawan, aka fodi wakijwango go. Wanitie gi jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiyo ri Rwoth ma jobedo nyikway Aron, kodi Jolevi ma jokonyo jo.

Jomiyo Rwoth kisi odikin g'othieno cowirok awaŋa kodi buban maŋwe kur, joketho mic ma mugat i wi meza zahabu macil, aka kisi othieno jocwinyo talin i wi raŋaw ma zahabu. Kole watiyo ri Rwoth Were mawan, to win wijwango go.

Neni win, Were nitie gi wan paka jatel mawan, aka jocway ri Were i wi migam pere jotiŋo gwarin pajo, aka jotieko yikirok kudho ma lwoŋo wan lweny gi win. Awi Isiraili, wikiri wilweny gi Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin; kole wikinyal loyo.”
Yerobowam oyido otieko dhiro jolweny pere moro kwinyo jolweny ma Yuda iy'apondi k'onyo jowok gi yucen, kareno jom'odoŋ jonitie yuwaŋ jo.
Aka munyo jolweny ma Yuda joneno kor gi korin, neni, jolweny oyido jonitie yuwaŋ jo kodi yucen, aka joywak ri Rwoth, to jocway ri Were i wi migam jokudho gwarin.
Kenyo jolweny ma Yuda jotiŋo dwondi gin to johola koko ma lweny. Aka munyo cwo ma Yuda johola, Were okengila Yerobowam kodi Joisiraili je kareno Abija ama telo jolweny ma Yuda.
Joisiraili joŋweco kwoŋ Joyuda, aka Were omiyo Joyuda loyo jo gi meni.
Abija kodi ji pere joneko Joisiraili ma kiwacere; to jotho cwo ma romo 500,000 m'odim.
Ameno onyali woko Joisiraili i hongo no aka ji ma Yuda jokengila jo, rupiri jokanya Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo.
Abija oriemo Yerobowam, to mayo go tindin madongo, Bethel kodi calin mere, Yesana gi calin mere, kodi Efron gi calin mere.
Yerobowam k'olimo meni kendo i hongo ma dhum pa Abija, aka Rwoth rwadho go piny, to tho.
To Abija omedere lokirok matek. Obedo gi mon apar g'aŋwen to nywolo wote piero ario g'ario kodi nyir apar g'aucel.
Tim pa Abija man je, kula pere kodi gim'owaco je, ondiki i kigana pa jatuci wac Were Ido.
Kere Abija otho aka oyiki go i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi, to Asa lunjo go paka kere. I hongo ma dhum pa Asa piny okwe ma oro apar.
Asa otimo gimaber gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth Were pere.
Okwanyo woko migame pa jopath kodi kalamo manyakafir, oturo piny sirin to toŋo woko cal pa were madhako Asera.
Asa omiyo ji ma Yuda cik timo mito pa Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo, kodi kuro cik kodi or.
Go bende okwanyo woko i tindin madongo ma Yuda kalamo manyakafir kodi migame ma buban, aka ker obedo i siem munyo go dhumo.
Asa bende ogeto tindin madongo m'otinda i Yuda, rupiri piny oyido okwe. Go k'obedo gi lweny i oro no je, kole Rwoth omiyo siem.

To Asa waco ri ji ma Yuda ni, “Weyi win wageti tindin madongo me, to wathoko jo gi kor udi acurcur, waŋkace kodi nywenye, piny me fodi obedo amawan, rupiri watieko timo mito pa Rwoth Were mawan, aka go otieko miyo wan siem.” Ameno jogeto aka kisi gimoro je okadho maber.

Kere Asa obedo gi jolweny 300,000 wok i Yuda m'oyido jotiŋo kwote kodi tonge ma lweny, kodi cwo 280,000 ma jowok i nono pa Benyamin m'oyido jotiŋo kwote kodi aserin ma lweny. Joje oyido jobedo jomaker, aka cwo ma jofonjere lweny.
Jaethopiya m'ilwoŋo ni Zera okwinyo Yuda gi jolweny milion gi cawilin 300 to jomedere tundo kiri Maresa.
Asa okadho romo gi go, to jocero bol ma lweny i milelo ma Zefatha i Maresa.

Asa oywaki ri Rwoth Were pere ni, “Awi Rwoth, in ikipoki kwoŋ konyo jomeni kodi joma nyap. Kony wan, Awi Rwoth Were mawan, kole wagoŋere kwoŋin, aka i nyingin wabino lweny gi kweth jolweny me. Awi Rwoth, ibedo Were mawan; ongoye ŋata nyalo geno kikengila in.”
Ameno Rwoth okengila Joethopiya ruwaŋ Asa kodi Yuda, to Joethopiya jodwire gi ŋwec.
To Asa gi jolweny pere joriemo jo tundo kiri Gerar, to Joethopiya jotho m'ongoye m'obothi; kole Rwoth gi jolweny pere joloyo jo gi meni, aka jolweny jonyaga gigipiny kweth.
Kenyo jonyalo turo tindin madongo m'othoko Gerar, rupiri oyido jopoŋ gi lworo ri Rwoth. Jonyaga tindin madongo je aka jomako gigipiny.
Jomonjo kiri kambi pa jokwath rombo, aka jomako rombo, diegi kodi ŋamin kweth. Kenyo to jodok i Yerusalem.
Cuny pa Were oloro kwoŋ Azaria wod pa Oded,
aka okadho romo gi Asa to waco rigo ni, “Winjan, Asa, kodi ji je ma Yuda kodi Benyamin: Rwoth nitie gi win tekin winitie gi go. Ka wirango go, wilanwaŋo, to ka ijwango go, go lajwango win.
Ma hongo malac, Isiraili oyido ongoye gi Were mar'adieri, jacway ri Were i wi migam m'ofonji jo, kodi cik;
to i kidamba pajo, jowire bongi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili. Jodwaro go to jonwaŋo go.
I hongo no woth oyido tek, rupiri teko kodi mienirok oyido nitie ri ji je ma i piny.
Oyec jo mathindho thindho, piny olwenyo gi piny aka tindi madwoŋ odiyo tindi madwoŋ man, rupiri Were okelo rijo candirok kodi kidamba ma nger je.
To win cwo ma Yuda, bedi win jomiseni! Wikiri wiyey cingin win wolokere manyap, rupiri ilamiyo win kemba i tic mewin.”

Munyo Asa owinjo wac pa jatuci wac Were Azaria wod pa Oded, onwaŋo miseni, to kwanyo woko cal je i piny Yuda paka rom kodi i Benyamin kodi i tindin je m'oyido omako i piny matendere ma Efrayim. Oyiko migam pa Rwoth m'oyido nitie i diedipo ma Ot pa Rwoth.

Kenyo Asa ocoko ji je ma Yuda kodi Benyamin, kodi ji ma jowok Efrayim, Manase, kodi Simeo m'oyido jobedo paka jopath i dier jo, kole ji mathoth oyido jotuk i Yuda munyo joneno nike Rwoth Were pere oyido nitie gi go.
Ji jocokere kanyacel i Yerusalem i dwe mar'adek i oro mar'apar g'abic ma dhum pa Asa.
I ndelo no, jomiyo Rwoth cowirok wok kwoŋ gima jonyaga ma jodwoko gine, megikwe 700 kodi rombo 7,000.
Jotimo cikirok to joyere lamo Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo, g'adundo pajo je gi cuny jo je,
Kisi ŋata k'olamo Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, oyido iripo neko, obedi nyathi, kosa jadwoŋ, jacwo kosa dhako.
Jotimo cikirok gi Rwoth gi koko malo, to jokudho gwarin.
Ji ma Yuda je josangala gi cikirok me, kole oyido jotimo gi cuny jo je, aka jofore i lamo Rwoth, aka Rwoth ojolo jo to kelo siem i thenge gi thenge.

Kere Asa okwanyo woko kiri adhamere Maka wok i dwoŋ pere paka yok kere, kwoŋbedo Maka oyido otimo cal ma mienirok ri Asera were madhako. Asa otoŋo cal no piny, aka owaŋo mathindho thindho i milelo Kidiron.
Makada nende Asa k'onyeko woko kalamo manyakafir je i Isiraili, kucel obedo g'adieri ri Rwoth kwo pere je.
Asa okelo i Ot pa Were gigipiny ma bamere Abija omiyo Were, kanyacel gi feza, zahabu ma go won omiyo.
Lweny man k'obedo kendo cuka i oro ma piero adek g'abic ma dhum pa Asa.
I oro ma piero adek g'aucel ma dhum pa Asa, kere Basa ma Isiraili omonjo Yuda, to geto Rama, ma geŋo ji wok kosa donjo iy'adec pa kere Asa ma Yuda.
Ameno Asa okwanyo feza gi zahabu wok i kakan lim ma Ot pa Were kodi i ot pa kere, to dhiro jo ri kere Benhadad ma Siria, gi mikwenda me:

“Weyi wamakere kanyacel, paka bacere mawan jotimo. Feza kodi zahabu me jobedo mic perin. Pama onyo tur woko makirok perin gi kere Basa ma Isiraili ŋey wonyali wodho woko jolweny pere wok iy'adec paran.”
Benhadad oyere gi rieko ma kere Asa owodho, to dhiro jomituka pa jolweny pere monjo tindin madongo ma Isiraili. Jomako Ijon, Dan, Abel Beth Maka, kodi tindin madongo je i Nafital m'ikan'iye gigipiny.
Munyo kere Basa owinjo kwoŋe, oweyo geto Rama, to miyo tic pere tho.
Kenyo kere Asa ocoko cwo i Yuda paka rom to wodho or ma tiŋo woko telin kodi mbawin m'oyido Basa oro ma geto i Rama, to jooro ma geto tindin madongo ma Geba kodi Mizipa.
I hongo no jatuci wac Were Hanani okidho bongi kere Asa Kere ma Yuda to waco rigo ni, “Kwoŋbedo igoŋere kwoŋ kere ma Siria, makiweno Rwoth Were perin, jolweny pa kere ma Siria jotieko niaŋ kwoŋin.
Ikipoy gim'otimere ri Joethopiya kodi Jolibia, gi cawilin pajo kodi cwo ma jogweyo kayinin? I hongo no, igoŋere kwoŋ Rwoth, to Rwoth ketho jo i cingin.
Kole waŋ Rwoth neno ji ma piny gibe, ma ridho adundin pa jono ma jomiyere rigo. Paka itieko timo gimiŋo me, riameno wok pama kadho yuwaŋe, ilabedo gi lweny noknok.”
Gime omiyo Asa omako nge swa gi jatuci wac Were m'omiyo kiri otweyo go i katwec. Obedo i hongo acel me won ma Asa ocako ter'iye ji mogo gi gero.
Tim pa Asa wok i cako tundo kiri i gike, ondiki i kitawo ma kigana pa kerin ma Yuda kodi Isiraili.
I oro ma piero adek g'abuŋwen ma dhum pa kere Asa, two matek swa omako odondo tiende to ŋolo go; to kad'ameno k'ogiki bongi Rwoth ni wokonyi go to rango kony pa jomilerwa ayin.
Onyo rumacen ma oro ario, Asa otho, i oro ma piero aŋwen g'acel ma dhum pere.
Oyiki go i kaliel ma go won ogoro i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi. Okethi go i kitanda m'okudh'iye gigipiny gi mo maŋwe kur ma yiko delkwoŋe ma yik, to jomoko mac ma kasik m'ogaŋere ywako go.
Yehosafat olunjo bamere Asa paka kere to ridhere matek kwoŋ Isiraili.
Oketho jolweny i tindin madongo m'otinda je ma Yuda, kodi jolweny ma kuro piny Yuda, kodi i tindin madongo je i Efrayim ma bamere Asa oyido omako.
Rwoth oyido nitie gi Yehosafat, rupiri oluwo tim pa bamere macon, aka go k'olamo Bal,
to otiyo ri Were pa bamere, owinjo or pere, makiweno paka kerin ma Isiraili jotimo.
Riameno Rwoth oketho keri i cingi Yehosafat, aka ji ma Yuda je jokelo rigo mic to Yehosafat ŋaŋ t'imiyo go wor.
Yehosafat ofore i luwo yo pa Rwoth, aka medo kwoŋ meno okwanyo woko kalamo manyakafir kodi cal pa were madhako Asera i Yuda.
I oro mar'adek ma dhum pere, odhiro jodhum me: Benhayil, Obadia, Zekaria, Nethanel kodi Mikaya, fonjo Cik pa Rwoth i tindin madongo je ma Yuda.

Jolevi abuŋwen kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam ario jokwaŋo jo. Jolevi me obedo: Semaya, Nethanel Zebadia, Asahel, Semiramoth, Yehonathan, Adoniya, Tobia kodi Tobadoniya. Aka jocway ri Were i wi migam me obedo Elisama kodi Yehoram.
Jofonjo i Yuda; aka oyido jooro kitawo ma Cik pa Rwoth, jowotho i tindin madongo ma Yuda aka jofonjo i dier ji.
Rwoth omiyo kerin je m'othoko Yuda lworo lwenyo gi Yehosafat.
Jofilistia moro jokelo ri Yehosafat mic ma feza gi zahabu, aka ji ma jowok i piny pa Jowarabu bende jokelo rigo mic ma wot rombo 7,700 kodi wot diegi 7,700.
Ameno Yehosafat omedere ameda bedo ŋatadwoŋ. Go ogeto cel i Yuda paka rom, kodi tindin madongo je m'ikan'iye gigipiny.
Yehosafat otimo tic i tindi madongo i Yuda. Go oyido nitie gi jolweny matek, cwo ma jomiseni i Yerusalem.
Me kitipin pajo cungo kwoŋ nonin pajo: Adina oyido obedo jamituka ma nono pa Yuda, aka oyido telo jolweny 300,000
Ŋat'oluwo go i dwoŋ obedo Yehohanan gi jolweny 280,000
mar'adek i dwoŋ obedo Amasia wod pa Zikiri won oyido omiyere tiyo ri Rwoth, gi cwo ma jomiseni 200,000.
Jamituka ma lweny ma nono pa Benyamin obedo Eliada dhano ma jamisen gi cwo 200,000 m'oyido jonitie gi kwote kodi aserin ma lweny.
Ŋat'oluwo go i dwoŋ obedo Yehozabad gi jolweny 180,000 m'oyido jonitie gi gilweny.
Jolweny me oyido jotiyo ri kere Yehosafat i Yerusalem, medo i wi jolweny man ma go oketho i tindin m'otinda je i Yuda paka rom.
Munyo kere Yehosafat ma Yuda otieko ŋaŋo to ŋeyere; otimo mere ma nywomirok i dier japeco pere gi japeco pa Ahab kere ma Isiraili.
Munyo oro moro okadho, okidho wendo ri Ahab i Samaria. Aka Ahab oneko rigo kodi ji pere rombo kodi dhok kweth to dwoŋo go kidho monjo Ramoth Giliad.
Ahab kere ma Isiraili openjo Yehosafat kere ma Yuda ni, “Inokidhi kodan monjo Ramoth Giliad?” Yehosafat odwoko ni, “Ayikere k'iyikere, apaka kiri jolweny paran je. Walariwere kodin i lweny.”
Yehosafat omedo waco ri Kere Ahab ma Isiraili ni, “Weyi kutho wapenji Rwoth.”
Ameno Ahab olwoŋo jotuci wac were je 400 to penjo jo ni, “Akidhi amonji Ramoth Giliad, kosa be?” Jo je jodwoko ni, “Kadhi imonji, Rwoth bino miyin loyo.”
To Yehosafat penjo ni, “Ongoye jatuci wac Were pa Rwoth man ma wanyalo penjo?”
Ahab odwoko ni, “Nitie acel man, Mikaya wod pa Imila, t'adak go kwoŋbedo go kiwaci ran gimaber kwoŋan, to gimarac kende.”
Yehosafat odwoko ni, “Weyi kere wokiri wowaci nger gino.”
Kenyo Ahab olwoŋo jalweny to waco rigo omo Mikaya piyo.
Onyo Ahab gi Yehosafat oyido joruko nangin pajo ma ker to jobedo i kombere pajo ma ker woko ma waŋkac ma Samaria i kisia. Aka jotuci wac Were je oyido joluwo ruwaŋ jo.
Acel kwoŋ jo m'ilwoŋo ni Zedekia wod pa Kenana, oyiko tungi ogwaŋ gi nyweny aka owaco ri Ahab ni, “Me a gima Rwoth waco, ‘Gi gime ilalwenyo gi Josiria cuka ireyo woko jo.’ ”
Jotuci wac Were man je jowaco gimoro acel ni, “Kadhi malo i Ramoth Giliad aka imonji, Rwoth bino miyin loyo.”
Kucel jatel pa jolweny m'oyido okadho omo Mikaya owaco rigo ni, “Neni, jotuci wac Were man je jowaco gima kere mito winjo, aka in bende wac gimoro acel.”
To Mikaya dwoko ni, “Akwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth makwo ni, gima Rwoth owaci, meno ama alaluwo.”
Munyo Mikaya otundo ruwaŋ Ahab, kere openjo go ni, “Mikaya, wamonji Ramoth Giliad kosa be?” Mikaya odwoko ni, “Monji win! Rwoth bino miyo win loyo.”
To Ahab penjo Mikaya ni, “Awaci rin didi nike k'iluwo kodan i nyingi Rwoth wac ran adieri?”
Ahab owaco ri Yehosafat ni, “Nende akiwaco rin nike go kiwaci gimaber kwoŋan, to gimarac kende!”
Mikaya omedere waco ni, “Riameno winji gima Rwoth waco. Aneno Rwoth obedo i kom pere ma dhum aka lwak jolweny ma i polo jocungo yu cinge maracuc kodi maracam.
Rwoth openjo ni, ‘Ŋa ma lawondo Ahab ŋey wokidhi woneki go i Ramoth Giliad?’ Jomalaika man jowaco gimoro acel, aka megi jowaco giman.
Cuka cuny obino to cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth to waco ni, ‘Alawondo go.’ To Rwoth penjo ni, ‘Ilawondo go nedi?’
To cuny dwoko ni, ‘Alakidho t'amiyo jotuci wac were pa Ahab je waco twodo.’ Kenyo Rwoth owaco ni, ‘Kadhi iwondi go, ibino nyalo.’ ”
Mikaya owaco macowe ni, “Neni, me a gim'otimere. Rwoth Otieko miyo jotuci wac Were perin me wondin, aka go won otieko waco nike ibino romo gi teko.”
Kenyo jatuci wac Were Zedekia wod pa Kenana ocore cegin gi Mikaya to payo lembe adhoŋ to penjo go ni, “Wok keraŋo ma cuny pa Rwoth oweyan to luwo kodin?”
Mikaya odwoko go ni, “Ibino ŋeyo ndelo no ka inodonji i kisika ma yucen moro pondo.”
Kenyo kere Ahab owaco ri jatel pa jolweny pere ni, “Maki Mikaya iter go bongi Amon gavana ma tindi madwoŋ kodi Yowas wod pa kere.
Waci rijo jowoboli go i katwec aka jowomiy go mugat gi pi cuka anodwoki i siem.”
Mikaya owaco ni, “Winjan win ji je, ka inodwoki i siem, meno Rwoth k'oluwo i an.”
Ameno kere Ahab ma Isiraili kodi kere Yehosafat kere ma Yuda jokidho monjo tindi madwoŋ Ramoth Giliad.
Ahab owaco ri Yehosafat ni, “Ka wakadho lweny, iruki nangin perin ma ker, aka abino rukere i nger matek niaŋ kwoŋan.” Ameno kere ma Isiraili k'orukere paka kere munyo kidho lweny.
Onyo kere ma Siria oyido omiyo jomituka pere ma cawilin cik ni jokiri jowomonji dhano moro je kwanyo woko kere ma Isiraili.
Aka munyo jomituka ma cawilin joneno Yehosafat, joparo nike oyido obedo Ahab to jowire monjo go. To Yehosafat goyo ndur to Rwoth botho go. Were owiro jo woko kwoŋe.
Jomituka ma cawilin joniaŋ nike oyido k'obedo Ahab to joweyo monjo go.
To jacwo moro bayo asere to cwowo Ahab i dier kogino cinge. Ahab okoko ri jagwey cawila pere ni, “Awinjo litho, wire iywayan woko i lweny.”
Lweny olieth i ndelo no, to kere ma Isiraili thenere kwoŋ cawila pere munyo ŋiyo Josiria tundo othieno; munyo waŋceŋ podho, to tho.
Kere Yehosafat ma Yuda odok i peco pere maber i Yerusalem.
To Yehu wod pa Hanani jatuci wac Were romo gine to penjo Yehosafat ni, “Iparo ni obedo gim'otire konyo jakidakana t'imito jono ma jodak Rwoth? Gim'itieko timo okelo keme pa Rwoth kwoŋin.
To kad'ameno, nitie gimaber manitie kwoŋin, ireyo woko cal pa were madhako Asera i piny me, aka iketho adundo perin ma dwaro Were.”
Makada nende kere Yehosafat obedo i Yerusalem, owotho radhik i dier ji, wok Berseba yupiny tundo i piny matendere ma Efrayim yumalo, to dwoko jo bongi Rwoth, Were pa bacere jo.
Yehosafat oketho jothum banja i kisi tindi madwoŋ m'otinda ma Yuda,
to waco rijo ni, “Kaŋasa gima witimo, rupiri meni ma thumo banja kiwoki bongi ji, to wok bongi Rwoth, aka go labedo gi win ka withumo banja.
Onyo riameno, lworo Rwoth wobedi kwoŋ win, wigwokere win i gima witimo, rupiri Rwoth Were mawan kiyere gi gima k'otire, go tero dhano je marom kosa go kicam nyew.”
Kiri i Yerusalem bende Yehosafat oketho Jolevi moro kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi wic pecin ma Isiraili thumo banja ri joma turo cik pa Rwoth kosa banjin pa ji ma tindi madwoŋ.
Yehosafat omiyo jo or ni, “Witim gime gi cuny win je, ka wilworo Rwoth, i genirok ka wilworo go i kisi gimoro je ma witimo.

Ka japiny nyawoti win ma wok i tindi madwoŋ moro je okeli ruwaŋ win gi banja neki, kosa turo cik obedi cik pa Were kosa Or pere, wiripo miyo go fonji maber kwoŋ gima ripo timo, hongo ma kiosa, ŋey jokiri jowobedi jobanja ma timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth. Ka wikitimo ameno win kodi jopiny wadi win wilawinjo meni ma keme pa Rwoth. To ka witimo tic mewin, wik'obedi gi banja.

Amaria jacway ri Were madwoŋ i wi migam labedo gi meni macowe i banjin manyadini, Zebadia wod pa Isimayil, gavana ma Yuda, labedo gi meni macowe i banjin ma kisi ndelo. Jolevi joripo neno nike gim'oyere i kakiosa otimere. Bedi win jomiseni aka witim gim'aoro win, aka weyi Rwoth wobedi i thenge pa ŋat'otire.”
Rumacen ma hongo moro, jolweny ma Mowab kodi Amon kanyacel gi jom'omakere gi Jomeuna.
Cwo mogo jobino to jowaco ri Yehosafat ni, “Jolweny kweth jobino monjin wok i Edom, wok bor kalo nam, aka neni, jonitie i Hazazon Tamar (Engedi).”
Yehosafat obwok, aka okwayo Rwoth wonyuthi go gir'atima, to wodho or ma riyo kec i Yuda paka rom.
Ji ma Yuda jocokere kanyacel to jorango kony wok bongi Rwoth, ji jobino wok i kisi tindi madwoŋ ma Yuda.
To Yehosafat cungo ruwaŋ ji ma Yuda kodi Yerusalem, i Ot pa Rwoth, ruwaŋ diedipo manyen,
to kwayo ni, “Awi Rwoth Were pa kwarere mawan, ikibedo Were manitie i polo? Iŋat'ikidhum kerin je ma piny? Initie gi meni kodi nyalo, aka ongoye ŋata nyalo piem kodin.
Were mawan, ikiriemo woko jono m'oyido jobedo i piny me kwoŋ Joisiraili, t'imiyo nyikway Abraham mere perin cil gi cil?
Nyikwaye jotieko bed'iye, aka jotieko geto rin i iye ot ma lamin, ka jowaco ni,
‘Ka gimarac opodhi kwoŋ wan, obedi lweny, thumo banja, two nundu kosa kec, walacungo ruwaŋ ot me, rupiri nyingin nitie i ot me, to waywak rin i teko mawan, ilawinjo wan t'ibotho wan.’ ”
Onyo pama joculo wan ka jobino romo wan gi mbaka wok i lowo m'imiyo wan lunjo.
Ibedo Were mawan, ik'othum rijo banja? Kole wangoye gi meni ma ciro ji kweth me je ma jobino monjo wan. Wakuya gir'atima to waketho waŋ wan kwoŋin.”
I hongo no cwo je ma Yuda oyido jocungo ruwaŋ Rwoth gi nyithindho pajo ma dhoth, mon pajo kodi nyithindho pajo.
To cuny pa Rwoth loro kwoŋ Yahaziel wod pa Zekaria aka nyakwar Benaya, Jeyel, kodi Matanaya, Jalevi ma wok i nono pa Asaf, i dier kacokirok.

Yahaziel owaco ni, “Winji win, ji je ma Yuda kodi ji je ma jobedo i Yerusalem, kodi kere Yehosafat: Rwoth waco riwin ama: Wikiri wibwok kosa wikirin gi lwak ji me. Kole lweny me k'obedo mewin to apa Were.
Dikin kadhi win wilweny gi jo. Jolaluwo gi Ziz; wilanwaŋo jo i gike ma milelo, yuwok ceŋ ma thim ma Yeruel.
Wik'olweny, maki win kabedo mewin, cungi win matek, aka wilaneno ka Rwoth miyo win loyo. Ji ma Yuda gi Yerusalem, wikiri wiganagana kosa wibwoki. Kadhi wilweny aka Rwoth labedo gi win.”
Kenyo Yehosafat okulo wiye piny to nyime geyo lowo, to ji ma Yuda kodi ma Yerusalem je jopodho piny ruwaŋ Rwoth, lamo go.
Aka jokitipa ma nono pa Jolevi, apa nyikway Kohath kodi Kora, jocungo malo aka gi woy ma koko ma malo jopako Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili.

Jocewi odikin i ndelo ma luwo, joay to jokadho i thim ma Tekowa, aka paka jokadho, Yehosafat ocungo to waco ni, “Winjan win ji ma Yuda kodi Yerusalem! Yey win Rwoth Were; aka wilacungo matek; yey win jotuci wac Were pere aka wilanwaŋo gima wimito.”
Aka munyo otieko penjo ji gir'atima, to yero jono m'oyido joripo wer ri Rwoth to jopako go i bol maleŋ, ka joŋanjo ruwaŋ jolweny, kareno jowero ni, “Pak Rwoth! Mar pere makiwire yindira cil gi cil!”
Aka munyo jocako wer kodi pak, to Rwoth ketho apondi kwoŋ cwo ma Amon, Mowab kodi got Edom m'oyido jobino monjo Yuda. Okengila jo.
Cwo ma Amon kodi Mowab jomonjo joma bedo wi got Edom to joreyo jo kicutho, aka munyo jotieko reyo jo, to wegi jocako nekirok.
Munyo ji ma Yuda jokidho i wi kisul ma thim, to joneno lwak ji, aka neni, oyido nitie delkwoŋ jom'otho i lowo; m'ongoye kada ŋat'acel m'okwale.
