Munyo Yehosafat gi ji pere jobino kwanyo gim'onyaga, jonwaŋo dhok i thotho i dier jo, lim, nangin, kodi gigipiny ma diwelo, ma jokwanyo ma oro, cuka jok'onyalo tiŋo man kendo. Otero jo ndelo adek coko gim'onyaga, ro thotho mere.
I ndelo mar'aŋwen jocokere i milelo ma Beraka
Kenyo to cwo ma Yuda kodi Yerusalem jodok i Yerusalem. Josangala munyo Yehosafat otelo jo. Rwoth omiyo jo atoŋa ma forok ro gim'otimere ri jokwor pajo.
Munyo jotundo i Yerusalem, jonywar i Ot pa Rwoth munyo jogoyo tongol, kodi adungu kareno jokudho gwarin.
To lworo Were poŋ kwoŋ kerin ma piny munyo jowinjo nike Rwoth okengila jokwor pa Isiraili.
Ameno adec pa Yehosafat obed'iye siem, rupiri Were pere omiyo go gi siem i kisi thenge.
Yehosafat odhumo i Yuda. Go oyido jaoro piero adek g'abic munyo cako dhum, to dhumo ma oro piero ario g'abic i Yerusalem. Yokimere oyido ilwoŋo ni Azuba nyar Silihi.
Paka bamere Asa m'open dhumo rigo, Yehosafat otimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Kwanyowoko k'oreyo woko kalamo manyakafir je. Ji oyido jok'owire lamo Were pa kwarere pajo gi cuny jo je.
Giman je ma Yehosafat otimo wok i marapena tundo i macowe ondiki i kigana pa Yehu wod pa Hanani, m'ondiki i kitawo pa Kerin ma Isiraili.
Rumacen Kere Yehosafat ma Yuda omakere gi Ahazia kere ma Isiraili m'otimo gikidakana.
Yehosafat omakere gi go ma geto mele ma kidho i Tarsis. Jogeto mele i Eziongeba.

Kenyo Elieza wod pa Dodavahu ma wok i Maresa oluwo gimoro kwoŋ Yehosafat, ka waco ama: “Kwoŋbedo imakere gi Ahazia, Rwoth lareyo woko gim'itieko timo.” To mele jonyekere ma jok'onyalo cewirok kadho i Tarsis.
Yehosafat otho aka oyiki go kam'oyik'iye bacere pere i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi to wode m'ilwoŋo ni Yehoram lunjo go.
Yehoram wod pa Yehosafat ma Yuda obedo gi wutmin aucel: Azaria, Yehiel, Zekaria, Azaria, Mikaili kodi Sefatiya.
Bajo omiyo jo mic kweth: Feza, zahabu kodi gigipiny ma welo, kanyacel gi tindin madongo m'otinda ma Yuda; to miyo Yehoram ker rupiri go oyido obedo nyathi marapena.
Munyo Yehoram otieko bedo i kom ma dhum pa bamere to ridho kabedo pere, oneko wutmin je g'abor, kodi jodhum megi bende ma Isiraili.
Yehoram oyido jaoro piero adek g'ario munyo lokere kere, to dhumo i Yerusalem ma oro aboro.
Yehoram oluwo tim ma kidakana pa kerin ma Isiraili, paka ot pa Ahab oyido otieko timo; rupiri dhako pere oyido obedo nyar Ahab. Otimo gikidakana ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Kucel Rwoth oyido kinyal reyo ot pa Daudi, ro cikirok m'otimo gi Daudi, aka paka bende oyido otieko miyo go cikirok nike nyikwaye joladhumo cil gi cil.
Kenyo Yehoram okwanyo jomituka pere gi cawilin pere, to ay wor to neko Joedom m'oyido jothoko go kodi jomituka ma cawilin pere.
Ameno Edom ogwenyere kwoŋ dhum pa Yuda tundo gunyo ni. I hongo no Libina bende ogwenyere kwoŋ dhum pa Yehoram, rupiri go oyido ojwango Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pere.
Medo kwoŋ meno, Yehoram ogeto kalamo manyakafir i piny matendere ma Yuda, to neko woko yeyo pa ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem, aka omiyo Yuda timo reco.
Jatuci wac Were Elia odhiro rigo balwa m'osomere ni, “Rwoth, Were pa kwarere perin thumo rin banja rupiri ikiluwo ranen pa benin Yehosafat, kosa apa kwarin Asa kere ma Yuda,

t'itimo rin paka kerin ma Isiraili jotimo, t'ineko woko yeyo pa ji ma Yuda kodi ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem, paka ot pa Ahab oneko woko yeyo pa Joisiraili t'ineko woko kiri wutmin in ma ot pa benin, m'oyido jober loyin.
Neni, Rwoth lakelo thoyamo kwoŋ ji perin, nyithindho perin, mon perin kodi lim perin,
aka in won gipi ilabedo kodi two malith ma nyagir iyin, cuka nyagir iyin lawok, ro two no kisi ndelo.”
To Rwoth liel kwoŋ Yehoram nge pa Jofilistia kodi apa Jowarabu ma jonitie cegin gi Joethopiya.
Jomonjo Yuda, to jonyaga cel pa kere, to jotiŋo paka jotwec mon pa kere je kodi wote kwanyo woko Ahazia ocoko pere.
Aka munyo gigipiny me orumo, Rwoth okelo kwoŋ kere two ma kibothere ma nyagir iy jo.
Hongo omedere, munyo oro ario orumo, to nyagir iye wok ro two to tho i litho madwoŋ. Ji pere jok'omoko rigo mac ma miyo go dwoŋ, paka mac m'omok ri kwarere pere.

Yehoram oyido jaoro piero adek g'ario munyo olokere kere to dhumo i Yerusalem ma oro aboro; aka ongoye ŋat'obedo gi geregere munyo go otho. Oyiki go i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi makiweno i kaliele pa kerin.

Ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem joloko Ahazia ocoko pa Yehoram lunjo go paka kere, rupiri jolweny m'oyido jobino gi Jowarabu i kambi oyido jotieko neko wot Yehoram madongo je. Ameno Ahazia wod Yehoram odhumo paka kere i Yuda.
Ahazia oyido jaoro piero aŋwen g'ario munyo cako dhum, to dhumo ma oro acel i Yerusalem. Yokimere oyido obedo Athalia nyar Ahab, aka nyakwar kere Omiri ma Isiraili.
Ahazia oluwo tim ma ot pa Ahab, rupiri min am'oyido obedo jamic rieko pere to timo kidakana.
Otimo gimarac ruwaŋ Rwoth, paka ot pa Ahab oyido otimo, rupiri munyo bamere otieko tho, oyido jobedo jomic rieko pere ma mieno go.
Wok i rieko ma jomiyo go, kere Ahazia oriwere gi Yoram kere ma Isiraili kwoŋ Hazael kere ma Siria. Jolweny pajo joromo i Ramoth Giliad, aka Yoram owinjo litho i lweny.
Yoram odok i tindi madwoŋ ma Yezirel both adholin pere, aka Ahazia okidho kenyo limo go.
Were ooro kidho pa Ahazia limo Yoram ma kelo podho pere. Kole munyo go okidho kenyo okidho gi Yoram romo gi Yehu wod pa Nimisi, m'oyido Rwoth otieko wiro ma reyo ot pa Ahab.
Aka munyo Yehu oyido thumo banja ri ot pa Ahab, oromo gi jodhum ma Yuda gi yac pa wutmin Ahazia m'oyido jokwaŋo Ahazia, to Yehu neko joje.

Yehu orango Ahazia, aka omaki munyo oyido opondo i Samaria, t'ikelo go bongi Yehu t'ineko. Oyiki go rupiri jowaco ni, “Go obedo nyakwar Yehosafat, m'orango Rwoth gi cunye je.” To ngoye nyatoro i ot pa Ahazia m'onyalo dhumo ker.
Onyo munyo Athalia yok Ahazia owinjo nike oneki wode, owodho or nike woneki ji ma peco pa kere je.

To Yehosabith nyakwar kere Yoram aka nyamin Ahazia, okwanyo Yowas wod pa kere Ahazia to kwalo go kwoŋ wot kerin m'oyido icegin neko to ketho go bongi japidi pere i kisika. Ameno Yehosabith nyar Kere Yehoram aka cipa Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam; m'oyido obedo nyamin Ahazia obotho Yowas kwoŋ tho i cingi Athalia.
Ma oro aucel Yowas opondo i Ot pa Were, munyo Athalia dhumo piny ma Yuda paka nyamicala.

Aka i oro mar'abirio Yehoyada onwaŋo miseni, to timo cikirok kodi jomituka pa jolweny abic: Azaria wod pa Yeroham, Isimayil wod pa Yehohanan, Azaria wod pa Obed, Maseya wod pa Adaya kodi Elisafat wod pa Zikiri.
Jowotho i Yuda paka rom to jocoko Jolevi wok i tindin madongo je ma Yuda, kodi jotel ma udi pa bacere pa Joisiraili, to jobino i Yerusalem.
Joje jocokere i Ot pa Were, to jotimo cikirok gi Yowas, wod pa kere. Yehoyada owaco rijo ni, “Ee wod pa kere m'otho! Go onyo labedo kere, paka Rwoth ociko ni nyikway Daudi oyido jolabedo.
Me a gima wiripo timo: Ka jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi jobin i tic i ndelo ma sabato, acel wiy adek jolakuro waŋkac,
acel wiy adek jolabedo i ot pa kere kodi acel wiy adek i Waŋkac ma Kindi ot; aka ji je jolabedo i diedipo ma Ot pa Rwoth.
Ongoye ŋata ripo donjo i Ot pa Rwoth kwanyo woko jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi ma jonitie i tic, jonyalo donjo rupiri joleŋ, to ji m'odoŋ je joripo winjo fonji pa Rwoth to jodoŋ woko.
Jolevi jolathoko kere, kisi acel gi gilweny pere i cinge, aka ŋat'otemi donjo i Ot pa Were je iripo neko. Wibedi gi kere ka donjo kodi ka wok woko.”
Jolevi kodi ji je ma Yuda jotimo gimoro je paka Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam owodho or. Kisi acel kwoŋ jo okelo cwo pere, m'oyido joripo ywomere i sabato, kodi jono m'oyido joripo tic i sabato.
Aka Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam oketho i cingi jotel tonge kodi kwote mathindho kodi malac m'oyido obedo apa kere Daudi; m'oyido nitie i Ot pa Were;
to ketho ji je paka jokur pa kere, kisi dhano manitie kodi gilweny i cinge wok yuthenge ma yupiny ma Ot pa Rwoth tundo yuthenge ma yumalo, thoko migam kodi ot.

Kenyo Yehoyada owodho woko Yowas, to ketho sangaria i wiye, to miyo go kitawo manitie i iye cik ma mako kwoŋ dhum, t'iloko go kere, to Yehoyada kodi wote jowiro go gi mo, to jowaco ni, “Kere woyindira.”
Munyo Athalia owinjo woy pa ji ma joŋweco aka jopako kere, okidho i Ot pa Rwoth bongi ji;

aka munyo oneno, kere oyido nitie ocungo i ŋeti siro pere i dhiot, gi jotel kodi jokudhi gwarin i ŋeti kere, kareno ji je ma piny oyido jofore aka jokudho gwara, aka jower gi gigipiny pajo ma wer oyido jotelo i kalima. To Athalia yeco nangin pere, to ywak ni, “Banja ma temo neko kere! Banja ma temo neko kere!”

Kenyo Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam owodho woko jotel pa jolweny to waco rijo ni, “Wodhi win go woko gi dier bol pa jolweny aka ŋat'otemo luwo go woneki g'abor.” Kole jacway ri Were i wi migam owaco ni, “Wikiri wineki go i Ot pa Rwoth.”
To jomako go, aka odonjo i ot pa kere gi i Waŋkac ma Kayina t'ineko go kenyo.
Aka Yehoyada otimo cikirok i dier go kodi ji je kanyacel gi kere ni joripo bedo ji pa Rwoth.
Kenyo ji je jokidho i ot pa Bal to jokedho piny; joŋinyo woko migame kodi cal je, to joneko Matan jacway ri were i wi migam pa bal ruwaŋ migame.

Aka Yehoyada oketho jokur tic i Ot pa Rwoth kareno jocway ri Were i wi migam pa Jolevi ama waco rijo gir'atima kodi Jolevi m'oyido Daudi oyiko ma kuro Ot pa Rwoth, ma miyo cowirok awaŋa ri Rwoth, paka ondiki i cik pa Musa, gi forok kodi wer, paka Daudi owaco nike wotim.
Oketho jokur waŋkac i waŋkace je ma Ot pa Rwoth m'ongoye nyatoro m'onyalo donjo m'oyido koc.

Yehoyada okwanyo jotel pa jolweny, ji ma jobedo i ot pa kere, jogavana pa ji kodi jopiny kodi ji je, to jokelo kere piny wok i Ot pa Rwoth, ka joŋanjo i waŋkac ma yumalo kidho i ot pa kere. To joketho kere i kom ma dhum.
Ameno ji je ma piny josangala; tindi madwoŋ to liŋ, munyo otiek neko Athalia g'abor.
Yowas oyido jaoro abirio munyo cako dhum; odhumo ma oro piero aŋwen i Yerusalem; nyingi min oyido Zibia ma Berseba.
Yowas otimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth i hongo je apa jacway ri Were i wi migam Yehoyada.
Yehoyada oyero mon ario, to jonywolo rigo yac gi nyir.
Munyo go otieko bedo kere ma hongo moro, Yowas to ridho yiko Ot pa Rwoth.

Ocoko kanyacel jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi to waco rijo ni, “Kidhi win i tindin madongo ma Yuda wicoki pesa bongi Joisiraili je ma yiko Ot pa Were mewin, kisi ka oro orumo; aka neni win ni witimo gime piyo piyo.” To Jolevi jogalo gi timo.
Ameno to kere lwoŋo Yehoyada jatel, to penjo go ni, “Raŋo ikineno ni Jolevi jokelo wok i Yuda gi Yerusalem misolo ma Musa ŋeca pa Rwoth omito ji woculi ma thielo wema ma cikirok?”
Ri nyithindho pa Athalia, dhako ma jakidakana no, oyido joturo to jomwomere i Ot pa Were, to jooro kiri gigipiny je ma lamo ma Ot pa Rwoth ma lamo Bal.
Ameno kere owodho or ri Jolevi, to jotimo sanduku ma joketho woko ma waŋkac ma Ot pa Rwoth.
Jodhiro wac i Yerusalem paka rom kodi i Yuda ri kisi nyatoro ma kelo ri Rwoth misolo ma Musa, ŋeca pa Were oyimo kwoŋ Isiraili i thim.
Jotel kodi ji je josangala to jokelo misolo pajo to jobolo i sanduku cuka opoŋ.

Noknok oyido Jolevi jotero ri jotic pa kere sanduku, k'oyido joneno pesa mathoth iye, jandiko pa kere kodi jatic pa jacway ri Were i wi migam madwoŋ oyido jobino to jokwanyo gima iy sanduku to jodwoko i kabedo mere. Jotimo ameno kisi ndelo, to jocoko pesa kweth.
Kere kodi Yehoyada oyido jomiyo pesa no ri jono m'oyido okethi ma yiko Ot pa were to jopangisa jobaro telin, jogeto ma dwoko Ot pa Rwoth, kodi joma tiyo i nyweny ma yiko Ot pa Rwoth.
Joje jotiyo matek, to jodwoko Ot pa were paka oyido nitie con, m'ocwiny makicutho.

Aka munyo jotieko cowo, jokelo pesa man ruwaŋ kere aka Yehoyada, t'ioro ma timo acerin ma Ot pa Rwoth, ma timo tic ma mic awaŋa, kodi bakulere ma buban, kodi atewe ma zahabu gi feza. To jomiyo mic awaŋa i Ot pa Rwoth noknok i hongo pa Yehoyada je.
Yehoyada olokere m'oti munyo hongo pere oromo, to tho; go oyido jaoro 130 munyo tho.
Joyiko go i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi i dier kerin, rupiri oyido otimo bero i Isiraili; kodi ri Were kodi Ot pere.
Onyo munyo Yehoyada otieko tho, jotel ma Yuda jobino to jodwoŋo Yowas aka Yowas owinjo jo.
Ameno to ji joweyo lamo i Ot pa Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo, to jocako lamo Asera werin ma mon gi cal. Banja pajo mareco me okelo keme pa Rwoth kwoŋ Yuda gi Yerusalem.
Kucel Rwoth odhiro jotuci wac Were i dier jo ni jowodwoki jo bonge; jotito ri joreco pajo, to jokwero ŋuto.

Gikenyo to cuny pa Rwoth yimere kwoŋ Zekaria wod pa Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam, to cungo ruwaŋ ji, to waco rijo ni, “Were waco ama, ‘Raŋo wituro cik pa Rwoth to wikelo kidamba kwoŋ win? Rupiri wijwango Rwoth, go bende otieko jwango win.’ ”.
Ji jocamo tiendi Zekaria gi piny, aka munyo kere Yowas owodho or, t'icadho go gi telin i diedipo ma Ot pa Rwoth.
Gi tim no, wiy kere Yowas owil kodi ŋono ma Yehoyada ba Zekaria, onyutho go, to neko wode. Aka munyo Zekaria tho, owaco ni, “Weyi Rwoth wonen to culo kwor.”
Munyo oro cegin rumo, jolweny pa Josiria jobino lweny gi Yowas. Jobino i Yuda kodi i Yerusalem, to joneko jotel pa ji je ma dier ji, to jodhiro gima jonyaga je ri kere ma Damasiko.
Kada jolweny ma Siria oyido jonok, Rwoth oketho i cingi jo jolweny madwoŋ swa, rupiri oyido jojwango Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo. Ameno to jothumo banja ri Yowas.

Munyo jotieko pokere kwoŋe, m'owey munyo omiyo go litho ma kiwacere, ŋecin pere jocamo tiende gi piny ro remo pa wod Yehoyada jacway ri Were i wi migam, to joneko go i wi kitanda pere. Ameno to Yowas tho, to joyiko go i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi; makiweno i limbo pa kerin.
Jono ma jocamo tiendi go gi piny jobedo Zabad wod pa Simith Jaamon, kodi Yehozabad wod pa Simirith dhako ma Mowab.
Gima mako kwoŋ wote, kodi gigipiny m'owacere kwoŋ go, gi geto Ot pa Were kendo, ondiki i Kigana ma Kitawo pa kerin. Amaziya wode olunjo go paka kere.
Amaziya oyido jaoro piero ario g'abic munyo cako dhum, to dhumo ma oro piero ario g'abuŋwen i Yerusalem. Yokimere oyido obedo Yehoadin ma wok i Yerusalem.
Go otimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth, to k'otimo gi cunye ma bwonere.
Tekin Amaziya cwiny i dhum, oneko jodhum ma joneko bamere.

To go k'oneko nyithindho pajo, oluwo cik ma Rwoth omiyo Musa ni, “Jonywol kiripi neko jo ro reco pa nyithindho pajo, aka nyithindho kiripi neko ro reco pa jonywol pajo; to kisi nyatoro iripo neko ro reco pere won.”

Gikenyo to Amaziya coko cwo je ma Yuda to ketho jo i udi pa bacere pajo i cingi jomituka ganin gi miyin nonin pa Yuda kodi Benyamin je. Oyido nitie iye cwo ma jooro piero ario kadho malo, joje oyido obedo 300,000. Oyido jobedo jolweny m'odim ma joyikere lweny, m'oyido jonitie gi ndijo ma oro tonge gi kwote.
Medo kwoŋ meno, Amaziya opangisa jolweny 100,000 wok Isiraili ma kilo 3,400 ma feza.
To jatuci wac Were kidho bongi kere to waco rigo ni, “Ikir'ikadhi gi jolweny ma Isiraili me, kole Rwoth kinitie gi Joisiraili kodi Joefrayim me je.”
“To k'iparo ni i royo me ilabedo matek ri jolweny, Were lagoyin piny ruwaŋ jokwor, kole Rwoth nitie gi meni ma konyo kosa ma redho piny.”
To Amaziya penjo jatuci wac Were ni, “Wanotim aŋo gi kilo 3,400 ma feza m'awok miyo jolweny ma Isiraili?” To jatuci wac Were dwoko ni, “Rwoth nigi nyalo m'amiyin kweth maloyo me.”
Gikenyo to Amaziya riemo woko jolweny m'oyido jobino bonge wok i Efrayim, ni jowodoki peco kendo. To nge mako jo swa gi Yuda, to jodok peco gi nge ma kiwacere.
Amaziya ocoko miseni to wodho woko ji pere, to kidho i Milelo ma Cumbi, jolwenyo kenyo to joneko jolweny ma Edom 10,000.
Jolweny ma Yuda jomako jolweny 10,000 man makwo, to jotero jo i wi Sela, aka jobolo jo piny to joŋinyere ma mathindho thindho.
To jolweny ma Amaziya oriemo ma k'oyeyo jo kadho i lweny, jomonjo kwoŋ tindin madongo ma Yuda, wok i Samaria tundo Bethhoron, to joneko ji 3,000 kwoŋ jo, to jonyaga gigipiny kweth.
Munyo Amaziya odwoko wok neko Joedom, okelo werin ma Edom to ketho jo paka werin pere, to lamo jo, ka miyo jo cowirok.
Gime omiyo Rwoth omako nge gi Amaziya to dhiro rigo jatuci wac Were, m'owaco rigo ni, “Raŋo nyo ilamo werin pa ji ma jok'onyalo botho ji pajo wegi i cingin?”

To munyo go fodi luwo, kere openjo go ni, “Walokin jamic rieko? Liŋ kenyo! Raŋo imito tho?” Ameno jatuci wac Were k'omedere, to waco ni, “Aŋeyo nike Rwoth otieko ridho reyin rupiri itieko timo gime aka onyo ikwero winjo rieko m'amiyin.”
Gikenyo Amaziya kere ma Isiraili owinjo to dhiro Yowas wod pa Yehoahaz nyakwar Yehu, kere ma Isiraili ka waco ama: “Biye warom.”

To Yowas kere ma Isiraili dhiro wac ri Amaziya kere ma Yuda ni, “Ndelo acel kasugu kudho i gote ma Lebanon odhiro mikwenda ri yath sida ni, ‘Miyan nyarin wonywomere gi wodan.’ Ogwaŋ madudi ma Lebanon oluwo to nyono kasugu no piny.
Onyo Amaziya, ikengila Joedom, aka ipoŋ gi kwoto. Yeŋ gi dwoŋ perin akibedo peco. Raŋo irango teko ŋey ipodhi, in kodi Yuda kanyacel?”
To Amaziya kwero winjo. Oyido obedo mito pa Were ni wokengila Amaziya rupiri go oyido olamo werin pa Joedom.
Ameno to Yowas kere pa Joisiraili ay malo; aka go kodi Amaziya kere ma Yuda joromo i lweny i Bethsemes, i Yuda.
Isiraili okengila Yuda, to jolweny joringo dok i pecin pajo.

Yowas kere ma Isiraili omako Amaziya kere ma Yuda, wod pa Yowas, nyakwar Ahazia, i Bethsemes, ak'obino Yerusalem to turo kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ wok i waŋkac ma Efrayim tundo i waŋkac ma sonda, boro ma romo mita 200.
Okwanyo feza kodi zahabu je ma go onwaŋo, gigipiny je ma Ot pa Rwoth m'oyido Obed Edom kuro, kodi lim je ma cel pa kere to tero Samaria. Go bende omako ji.
Kere Amaziya ma Yuda oyido loyo kere Yowas ma Isiraili gi oro apar g'abic.
Gigipiny man je ma Amaziya otimo wok cako tundo gike ma dhum pere ondiki i Kitawo ma Kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Yuda kodi Isiraili.
Wok i hongo ma go owir'iye ri Rwoth, jotimo can ma mako go i Yerusalem, to go ringo i tindi madwoŋ ma Lakis. To jokwor pere joluwo go kenyo to joneko go.
Otiŋ delkwoŋe i kayina t'itero i Yerusalem aka oyiki go i kaliel pa kerin i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi.
Aka ji ma Yuda joketho Uziya m'oyido jaoro apar g'aucel paka kere ma lunjo bamere Amaziya.
Uziya omako Eloth aka ogeto kendo to dwoko ri Yuda rumacen ma tho pa bamere.
Uziya obedo kere ma Yuda munyo jaoro apar g'aucel aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro piero abic g'ario. Yokimere oyido obedo Yekoliya ma wok i Yerusalem.
Go oluwo kite pa bamere Amaziya aka otimo gim'osangala Rwoth.
Go oketho kwo pere ma rango Were i hongo pa Zekaria, m'ofonjo lworo Were, aka noknok ka Uziya orango Rwoth, gimoro okadho rigo maber.
Uziya okidho i lweny kodi Jofilistia, to turo kor ot ma Gath, ma Yabine kodi ma Asdod; to geto tindin madongo iy'adec ma Asdod kodi kaman i dier Jofilistia.
Were okonyo go to kengila Jofilistia kodi Jowarabu ma jobedo i Gurbal, kodi kwoŋ Jomeuna.
Joamon joculo pesa ma neno Uziya, to nyingi go nyay kiri i kew ma Misir, rupiri olokere matek swa.
Medo kwoŋ meno, Uziya ogeto acurcurere i Yerusalem i thengi waŋkac ma Sonda kodi i waŋkac ma Milelo kodi kama kor ot wir'iye.

Uziya bende ogeto acurcurere i thim, to goro kacoki pi kweth, rupiri oyido nitie gi mwendi kweth, i Sefela kodi kam'obipere, aka oyido nitie kodi jofur kodi jolwer olemo i tendere kodi i lowo ma diwa, rupiri go oyido omaro lowo.

Medo kwoŋ meno, Uziya oyido nitie kodi jolweny ma jonyalo lweny, m'opokere opokere paka i kwan pajo kanyacel m'oyikere kodi Jeyel jandiko kodi Maseya jadwoŋ, kareno Hanania, acel kwoŋ jomituka pa kere ama wodho or.
Jolweny oyido jonitie kodi jomituka 2,600.
Oyido jotelo jolweny 307,500 m'oyido jonyalo lweny gi maker to jobotho kere kwoŋ jokwor pere.
Uziya opoko jolweny kwote, tonge, jungin, kabutere, atum bor g'aserin, kodi telin ma asumulu.
I Yerusalem, Uziya otimo cumin, ma jondijo jokelo, ni wobedi iy'acurcurere kodi sondin, ma bayo aserin kodi telin madongo. Nyinge oŋeyere bor, kwoŋbedo kony m'onwaŋo bongi Were.
To munyo kere Uziya olokere matek, to wiye bedo matek, to gino miyo go podho. Okwero winjo Rwoth Were pere, odonjo i Ot pa Rwoth ma waŋo buban i wi migam ma buban.
To Azaria jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam pa Rwoth ma jomiseni piero aboro bende jodonjo ma cero go timo ameno.

Jowaco rigo ni, “Ingoye gi meni Uziya ma waŋo buban ri Rwoth. Jocway ri Were kende, nyikway Aron am'owir jo ma timo gime. Weyi Kabedo Maleŋ me. Itieko ŋedho cuny Rwoth Were, aka onyo ingoye gi silwany pere.”
Gikenyo to Uziya mako nge. Oyido otiŋo giwaŋo buban aka munyo nge omako kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam, dhowo cakere i nyime ruwaŋ jocway ri were i wi migam i Ot pa Rwoth dho migam ma buban.

Aka Azaria, jacway ri Were i wi migam madwoŋ, kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam je, joneno go aka neni, dhowo oyido nitie i nyime. To jobolo go woko piyo piyo, aka go won gipi okwakere wok, rupiri Rwoth oyido omiyo go gir'acula.

Aka kere Uziya obedo jadhowo cuka tundo ndelo pere ma tho, aka paka go oyido jadhowo, obedo i ot ma kakende, rupiri oyido oriem go i Ot pa Rwoth. To wode Yotham kuro gigipiny ma ot, kareno telo ji ma piny.
Onyo gigipiny man je ma Uziya otimo, wok i cakirok kiri i gike, Isaya jatuci wac Were wod pa Amoz ondiko.
Uziya otho ot, t'iyiko go kam'iyik'iye kerin to k'oyiki go i kaliele pa kerin ro dhowo. Wode Yotham to lunjo go paka kere.
Yotham oyido jaoro piero ario g'abic munyo cako dhum, to dhumo ma oro apar g'aucel i Yerusalem. Yokimere oyido obedo Yerusa nyar Zadok.
Go otimo gim'otire ruwaŋ Rwoth i nger paka gimoro je ma bamere Uziya oyido otimo, kwanyowoko go k'otimo reco ka waŋo buban i Ot pa Rwoth. To ji ama jomedere timo reco.
Yotham ogeto waŋkac ma yumalo ma Ot pa Rwoth, to timo geto kweth i kor ot ma Ofel.
Maloyo Yotham ogeto tindin madongo i piny matendere ma Yuda, gi cele kodi acurcurere i tendere ma yen.
Yotham olwenyo kodi kere pa Joamon to kengila jo. Joamon jomiyo i oro no kilo 3,400 ma feza, tan 10,000 ma ŋano, gi tan 10,000 ma bale. Joamon joculo go rapim acel no ioro mar'ario gi mar'adek.
Ameno Yotham olokere jameni rupiri oketho tim pere i Rwoth Were pere.
Onyo tim pa Yotham je, lweny pere, royo, neni, ondiki i kitawo pa kerin ma Isiraili kodi ma Yuda.
Yotham oyido jaoro piero ario g'abic munyo cako dhum to dhumo i Yerusalem ma oro apar g'aucel.
Yotham otho, t'iyiko go i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi; aka Ahaz wode olunjo go.
Ahaz oyido jaoro piero ario munyo cako dhum, to dhumo i Yerusalem ma oro apar g'acel. Go k'oluwo kite maber paka kwari mere Daudi,
to oluwo kite marac paka kerin ma Isiraili. Go otimo kiri cal m'oleny ri Bal;
to waŋo buban i milelo pa wod Hinom, to waŋo wote paka cowirok, cungo kwoŋ tim ma mienirok pa nonin ma Rwoth oriemo ruwaŋ Joisiraili.
Ahaz omiyo cowirok to waŋo buban i kalamo je, i wi tendere, kodi i tiendi yen m'oyukino.
Peka wod pa Remalia oneko ji 120,000 i Yuda i ndelo acel, joje cwo ma jomiseni, rupiri oyido jojwango Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo.
To Zikiri, jalweny ma jameni ma Efrayim neko Maseya wod pa kere Ahaz, Azirikam jamituka ma cel pa kere kodi Elikana ma luwo kere i dwoŋ.
Kada Joyuda oyido jobedo wade pajo ma k'osunga, jolweny ma Isiraili jomako mon gi nyithindho 200,000 paka jotwec to jodwoko jo Samaria, gi gim'onyaga kidhur.

To jatuci wac Were pa Rwoth oyido nikenyo, m'oyido ilwoŋo ni Oded; owok woko romo gi jolweny ma jobino i Samaria, to waco rijo ni, “Neni, rupiri Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin, oyido omako nge gi Yuda, oketho jo i cingi win, to witieko neko jo i keme m'otundo malo i polo.
Aka onyo pama winitie g'atoŋa ma loko cwo gi mon ma Yerusalem kodi Yuda ŋecin mewin. Wikuya ni wibende witieko timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth Were mewin?
Winjan win! Jotwec me jobedo wutmin win gi waŋin win. Weyi win jowokadhi, kosa Rwoth omiy win gir'acula, i keme pere.”
Cwo aŋwen ma jotel yu ker ma yumalo, Azaria wod pa Yehohanan, Berekia wod pa Mesilemoth, Yehizikiya wod pa Salum, kodi Amasa wod pa Hadilay, bende jokwero tim pa jolweny.
Jowaco ni, “Wikiri wikel jotwec no ka! Watieko timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth to wamiyo go nge m'oromo m'omiyo omiyo wan gir'acula. Onyo odoko imito giman ma lamedo banja mawan.”
Ameno to jolweny jomiyo jotwec gi gim'onyaga ri ji kodi jotel pajo,

t'iketho cwo aŋwen no ma poko jotwec nangin wok kwoŋ gim'onyaga. Jomiyo nangin kodi ware aruka, jomiyo jo gir'acama kodi gir'amadha ma romo, to joketho mo oliv iy'adholin pajo. Jom'oyido meni oloyo jo ma woth okethi jo bende i punde, aka jotwec je odwoki jo iy'adec ma Yuda i Yeriko, tindi ma yen thith. Onyo to Joisiraili jodok peco i Samaria.
I hongo no kere Ahaz okwayo kere ma Siria kony.
Rupiri Joedom oyido jomonjo to jokengila Yuda kendo to jomako ji.

I hongo me Jofilistia jomonjo abwap tindin matendere ma tiendi got ma yupodho ceŋ kodi yupiny ma Yuda. Jomako tindin madongo ma Bethsemes, Ayijalon kodi Gederoth, kodi tindin madongo ma Soko, Timina, gi Gimizo gi calin mere to jobedo kenyo kicutho.
Rupiri kere Ahaz ma Yuda oyido otiyo g'atoŋa m'ongoye tiende gi wiye to kwero winjo Rwoth, to Rwoth kelo teko kwoŋ Yuda.
Kere ma Asiria kapa konyo Ahaz, okwedere kwoŋe to kelo rigo teko.
Ameno to Ahaz kwanyo zahabu wok i Ot pa Rwoth, i cel pa kere kodi i pecin pa jotel pa ji, to jomiyo kere ma Asiria; to gime je k'okonyo go.
I hongo ma kidamba pere, Ahaz otimo reco kweth kwoŋ Rwoth maloyo m'oyido otimo con.

Omiyo cowirok ri werin pa Joasiria, m'oyido jokengila go. Owaco ni, “Werin pa Josiria jokonyo kerin ma Siria, riameno k'amiyo jo cowirok, bende jolakonyan.” To gime okelo kisika kwoŋ go kodi Isiraili je.
To Ahaz coko kanyacel atewe je ma Ot pa Were to ŋondo mathindho thindho to cego thigin ma Ot pa Rwoth, to yiko rigo won migam i kisi thenge m'ogondere ma Yerusalem.
I kisi tindi madwoŋ kodi i tindi ma Yuda, ogeto kabedo ma kalamo manyakafir, kam'oyido ripo wowaŋ'iye buban ri werin pa jopath. Gi tim me, okelo kwoŋe keme pa Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pere.
Onyo tim pere man gi royo pere je wok i cakirok kiri i gike ondiki i kitawo pa kerin ma Yuda gi Isiraili.
Ahaz otho t'iyiko go i tindi madwoŋ, Yerusalem; to k'okeli go i kaliele pa kerin ma Isiraili. Wode Hezekia olunjo go paka kere.
Hezekia obedo kere ma Yuda munyo jaoro piero ario g'abic, to dhumo i Yerusalem ma oro piero ario g'abuŋwen. Yokimere oyido ilwoŋo ni Abija, nyar Zekaria.
Go oluwo kite pa kwari mere Daudi, aka otimo gim'osangala Rwoth.
I dwe marapena i oro marapena munyo Hezekia obedo kere, go oyawo kendo waŋkace ma Ot pa Were to yiko jo.
Ocoko kanyacel kitipa pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi i diedipo ma yuwok ceŋ ma Ot pa Were,
to luwo gi jo kenyo. Go owaco ni, “Win Jolevi, wiripo lokirok maleŋ, to wiloko Ot pa Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin maleŋ. Kwany win woko kisi gimoro je ma koco go.
Kole kwarere mawan jok'ogenere to jotimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth Were mawan. Jokwero go aka jokano waŋ gin to jowiro ŋey jo ri kabedo pa Rwoth.
Jo bende jocego thigin ma Ot pa Were, joneko talin to jokwero waŋo buban kiri gi miyo cowirok awaŋa i wi migam i Ot pa Rwoth Were pa Isiraili.
Riameno keme pa Rwoth obino kwoŋ Yuda gi Yerusalem, aka gima go otieko timo rijo obwoko to kelo lworo ri kisi dhano. Wiŋeyo gime maber swa.
Kole, kwarere mawan oneki jo i lweny, mon gi nyithindho mawan jonitie i twec ro gime.”
“Onyo atieko yero timo cikirok gi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, ŋey nge pere ma kiwacere wokiri wotundi kwoŋ wan.
Nyithindho paran, wikiri wijala gimoro, rupiri Rwoth otieko yero win ni wicungi ruwaŋe ma tiyo rigo aka bende ni wibedi jotic pere to wiwaŋo rigo buban.”

Me Jolevi m'oyido jonitie kenyo: Wok i nono pa Kohath, Mahath wod pa Amasay kodi Yowel wod pa Azaria. Wok i nono pa Merari, Kisi wod pa Abidi kodi Azaria wod pa Yehalelel. Wok i nono pa Gerison, Yowa wod pa Zimina kodi Eden wod pa Yowa.
Wok i nono pa Elizafan, Simiri kodi Jewel. Wok i nono pa Asaf,
Zekaria kodi Matania. Wok i nono pa Heman, Yehuel kodi Simey, wok i nono pa Yeduthun, Semaya kodi Uziel.
Cwo me jocoko Jolevi wadi gin, to jolonyo kwo pajo. Gikenyo paka kere oyido owodho or ni jowotimi, to jocako lonyo Ot pa Were paka cik pa Rwoth owaco.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam jodonjo i Ot pa Rwoth ma loko macil, to jowodho woko ma diedipo ma Ot pa Were kisi gimoro makoc. Wok kenyo to Jolevi jowodho je i tindi madwoŋ tero i milelo ma Kidron.

Tic ocakere i ndelo marapena ma dwe mar'acel aka cegin k'aboro oyido jocowo je, kiri kisika ma donjo i Ot pa Were. Onyo doko to jotiyo i ndelo aboro m'oluwo, cuka k'apar g'aucel ma dwe no, yiko Ot pa Rwoth ma lamo.
Gikenyo to Jolevi jokidho bongi kere Hezekia to jowaco rigo ni, “Watieko cowo lonyo Ot pa Rwoth, migam ma cowirok awaŋa, meza ma mugat maleŋ, gi gigipiny mere je.
Bende watieko dwoko gigipiny je ma kere Ahaz oyido okwanyo i oro no m'oyido k'ogeno Were, aka watieko loko maleŋ. Jonitie je ruwaŋ migam pa Rwoth.”
Piyo piyo to kere Hezekia coko jotel ma tindi madwoŋ, to jodonjo i Ot pa Rwoth kanyacel.

Paka mic ma kwanyo woko reco peco pa kere gi ji ma Yuda, kodi loko m'olony Ot pa Rwoth, jotero thwondhe ario, wot rombo abirio, rombo abirio ma mon gi wot diegi abirio. Kere owaco ri jocway ri Were i wi migam, nyikway Aron ni, jowomiy ogwaŋe no paka cowirok i wi migam.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam kutho jopen neko thwondhe, to joluwo gi wot rombo gi rombo ma mon to jokiro remo ma kisi cowirok i wi migam.
Rumacen to jotero diegi ri kere kodi jolamo megi, aka jome joketho cingi gin kwoŋ jo.

Gikenyo to jocway ri Were i wi migam joneko diegi, to jokiro remo pajo i wi migam paka cowirok ma kwanyo woko reco pa ji je, rupiri kere oyido owodho or ma miyo cowirok awaŋa kodi ma kwanyo reco ni wotim ri ji je ma Isiraili.
Kere oluwo fonji ma Rwoth oyido omiyo kere Daudi ka luwo gi Gad, jatuci wac Were Nathan, go oketho Jolevi i Ot pa Rwoth gi tongol kodi teŋo agwatin,
nger meno ma Daudi oyido ooro con. Jocway ri Were i wi migam bende jocungo kenyo gi gwara.
Gikenyo to Hezekia wodho cik ni womiy cowirok i wi migam. Aka munyo cowirok awaŋa ocakere, wer ri Rwoth bende ocakere gi gwara kodi gi wer man je pa kere Daudi ma Isiraili.
Kisi dhano je m'oyido nitie kenyo joriwere kanyacel i lamo, aka wer kodi thum madwoŋ omedere cuka cowirok je owaŋ.
Munyo cowirok orumo, kere Hezekia kodi ji je m'oyido jonitie joguro congi gin piny to jolamo Were.

Kere Hezekia kodi jotel ma piny jowaco ri Jolevi jowower ri Rwoth wer ma pak ma Daudi kodi Asaf jatuci wac Were jondiko. Onyo to kisi dhano wero gi kisangala madwoŋ to joguro congi gin to jolamo Were.
Gikenyo to Hezekia waco ri ji ni, “Pama onyo wileŋ ri Rwoth; core win cegin, keli win cowirok kodi mic ma foyo ri Rwoth.” Joworo aka jomegi kwoŋ jo wegi jokelo ogwaŋe ma cowirok gine paka mic awaŋa.
Jokelo thwondhe piero ario, wot rombo miya acel, kodi rombo ma mon miya ario paka mic awaŋa ri Rwoth,.
Jokelo bende thwondhe miya aucel, rombo miya adek paka cowirok ri ji acama.
Paka jocway ri Were i wi migam oyido jonok ma neko ogwaŋe me je, Jolevi jokonyo jo cuka tic orumo. Kole Jolevi jocil i cuny gin loyo jocway ri Were i wi migam iloko kwo pajo maleŋ.
Medo kwoŋ miyo cowirok m'owaŋ gipi, jocway ri Were i wi migam am'oyido jowaŋo bor m'omiy wok kwoŋ cowirok ma ji jocamo, gi konjo vini m'omiy kodi cowirok awaŋa.
Aka gikenyo to lamo i Ot pa Rwoth cakere kendo.
Kere Hezekia kodi ji je josangala, ro gima Were oyido otimo ri ji; rupiri oyido obino abwap.
Rupiri kere gi jotel pere kodi ji je i Yerusalem oyido joyere timo Kalima ma Kadho i dwe mar'ario
jok'otimo i hongo ma ripo rupiri jocway ri Were i wi migam oyido jonok ma loko kwo pajo maleŋ, aka ji oyido bende fodi jok'ocokere i Yerusalem.
Aka can no oneno m'otire ri kere kodi ri ji je.
Ameno to jolwoŋo Joisiraili je, wok Dan yumalo tundo Berseba yupiny, ma bino kanyacel i Yerusalem ma timo Kalima ma Kadho paka cik waco, i thotho loyo con mere.

Jomikwenda jokidho paka kere owodho or gi jotel pere i Yuda kodi Isiraili paka rom gi lwoŋo me: “Ji ma Isiraili, witieko both i cingi kerin ma Asiria. Onyo pama gik win bongi Rwoth, Were pa Abraham, Isaka kodi Yakobo aka go lagik bongi win.
Wikiri wibedi paka kwarere mewin gi Joisiraili wadi win ma jok'ogeno Rwoth Were pajo. Paka winyalo neno, omiy jo gir'acula malith.
Wikiri wibedi jowictek paka jo, to lwor win Rwoth. Biye win i Ot pa Rwoth i Yerusalem, ma Rwoth Were mewin otieko loko maleŋ cil gi cil, wilam go ŋey wokiri womaki nge gi win.
Ka wigik bongi Rwoth, nyaka jono ma jomayo win wade mewin paka jotwec jomaki gi jo wor to joweyo jodwoko. Rwoth Were mewin jakisa doko jaŋono, aka ka wigik bongi go, go lajolo win.”
Jomikwenda jokidho i kisi tindi iy'adec pa nonin pa Efrayim kodi Manase, kiri yu kamabor ma yumalo ma nono pa Zebulun, to ji jonyero jo to jocayo jo.
Fodi oyido nitie manok wok i nono pa Asa, Manase kodi Zebulun m'oyido joyere kidho i Yerusalem.
Were oyido tiyo i Yuda to riwo ji kanyacel gi ridho ma timo gima go yenyo cungo kwoŋ or pa kere kodi jotel pere.
Ji mathoth jocokere i Yerusalem i dwe mar'ario ma timo Kalima ma Mugat ma buthow.
Jocako tic to jokwanyo migame je m'oyido nitie i Yerusalem, kodi migame je ma waŋo buban to jobolo i milelo ma Kidiron.

Aka k'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe mar'ario, to joneko wot rombo ma Kalima ma Kadho. Jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi m'oyido jokoc okwot wiy jo aka, nyaka jolokere maleŋ to jokelo cowirok awaŋa i Ot pa Rwoth.
Jomako kabedo pajo i Ot pa Rwoth paka Musa dhano pa Were ofonjo i cik. Jolevi jomiyo jocway ri Were i wi migam remo ma cowirok, to jokiro i wi migam.
Rupiri ji mathoth i kacokirok oyido jokileŋ, riameno Jolevi joneko wot rombo ma Kalima ma Kadho ri kisi dhano je m'oyido koc, ma loko go maleŋ ri Rwoth.

Kole ji kweth, mathoth kwoŋ jo wok i Efrayim, Manase, Isakar kodi Zebulun oyido jok'otimo tim ma cwako reco, aka kucel jocamo Kalima ma Kadho paka k'owaci ni jowocami. Kole Hezekia oyido otieko kwayo rijo ni,
“Rwoth wocwaki kisi dhano je m'oketho adundo pere rango Were, Rwoth Were pa kwarere pajo, kada jotur cik ma lonyo ma Kabedo Maleŋ.”
Rwoth owinjo Hezekia to cango ji.

Aka Joisiraili m'oyido jonitie i Yerusalem jotimo kalima ma Mugat ma buthow ma ndelo abirio gi kisangala madwoŋ, aka Jolevi kodi jocway ri Were i migam jopako Rwoth kisi ndelo, kareno jowero gi meni pajo je ri Rwoth.
To Hezekia luwo gi miseni ri Jolevi je ma jonyutho ndijo maber i tic pa Rwoth. Ameno to ji jocamo cemo ma kalima ma ndelo abirio, ka jomiyo cowirok ma siem gi foyo Rwoth Were pa kwarere pajo.
Gikenyo to cokirok gipi joyere kanyacel camo kalima kendo ma ndelo abirio, onyo to jotimo ma ndelo abirio man gi kisangala.
Hezekia, kere ma Yuda omiyo cokirok no thwondhe 1,000 gi rombo 7,000 jotel bende jomiyo thwondhe 1,000 gi rombo 10,000. Aka jocway ri Were i wi migam mathoth joloko kwo pajo maleŋ.
Cokirok, gi je ma ji ma Yuda, jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi, gi kweth m'owok woko ma Isiraili, gi jokicar ma k'onywol jo i Isiraili, gi jokicar ma jobedo Yuda to josangala.
Kisangala obedo madwoŋ i Yerusalem, rupiri wok i hongo pa Solomon wod pa kere Daudi ma Isiraili oyido fodi k'otimere i Yerusalem.
Gikenyo to jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi jocungo to jomiyo ji silwany, aka dwondi jo owinjere; kwayo pajo otundo i kabedo pa Were maleŋ i polo.

Munyo kalima orumo, ji je ma Isiraili jokidho i kisi tindi madwoŋ i Yuda to joturo sirin ma telin, jotoŋo piny cal pa were madhako Asera, to joreyo migame kodi kabedo ma lamo manyakafir. Jotimo gimoro acel no i Yuda paka rom, iy'adec pa Benyamin, Efrayim kodi Manase; nyaka to joje jodok peco.

Kere Hezekia ocako kendo oriwa pa jocway ri were i wi migam kodi Jolevi ma i iye, kisi dhano oyido nitie gi gir'atima. Tic ago oyido obedo miyo cowirok awaŋa kodi cowirok ma siem, bedo i lamo i Ot pa Rwoth, gi miyo pak gi foyo iy'adec m'opokere opokere ma Ot pa Rwoth.
Gima kere owodho wok kwoŋ gima go nitie gine obedo ma cowirok awaŋa m'odikin kodi m'othieno, kodi cowirok awaŋa ma sabato, ma dwe manyen, gi kalima m'oyik, paka ondiki i cik pa Rwoth.
To kere Hezekia waco ri ji m'oyido jobedo i Yerusalem ni jowomiy adec m'obedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi, ŋey jowomiy kwo pajo ri cik pa Rwoth.
Tekin wac ywore wiloka, Joisiraili jomiyo i thotho olemo marapena, vini, mo oliv, mo kic, kodi ranyak je ma ndelo, to jokelo i thotho acel wiy apar ma kisi gimoro.
Aka Joisiraili kodi Yuda m'oyido jobedo i tindin madongo ma Yuda, bende to jokelo acel wiy apar ma dhok kodi rombo gi gigipiny m'oyido oloki maleŋ ri Rwoth Were pajo to jocano jo wic wic.
I dwe mar'adek to jocako cano cemo m'odhure no, to jocowo i dwe mar'abirio.
Munyo kere Hezekia gi jotel pere jobino to joneno gim'omiy, jopako Rwoth, gi Joisiraili, jomiyo ji silwany.
To kere Hezekia penjo jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi kwoŋ mic no.

Azaria jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido wok i ot pa Zadok odwoko go ni: “Wok cuka jocaki kelo mic i Ot pa Rwoth watieko cemo aka watieko yeŋ aka nitie kidhur m'odoŋ, kole Rwoth otieko miyo ji pere silwany m'omiyo kidhur me odoŋ.”
Gikenyo to Hezekia oro jo ni jowoyiki kisikin ma kano gigipiny i Ot pa Rwoth; to joyiko.
To jokelo mic pajo m'ongoye piem, acel wiy apar gi gigipiny m'obedo apa Rwoth. Jatel madwoŋ ma gigipiny me oyido obedo Konaya Jalevi gi Simey omin go ma luwo go i dwoŋ,

kareno Yehiel, Azaria, Nahath, Asahel, Yerimoth, Yozabad, Eliel, Ismakaya, Mahath kodi Benaya oyido jomeny gigipiny me aka oyido jokonyo Konaya gi Simey omin, aka kere Hezekia kodi Azaria jatel ma Ot pa Were am'oyido joketho jo.
Aka Kore wod pa Imina Jalevi, jakur ma waŋkac ma yuwok ceŋ ma Ot pa Rwoth, am'oyido obedo jajoli mic pa Rwoth gi poko.

Eden, Miniamin, Yesuwa, Semaya, Amaria, kodi Sekaniya jokonyo go maber swa i tindin madongo pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, jopoko cemo marom ri Jolevi wadi gin mathindho gi madongo paka tic pajo oyido nitie,
makiweno manyanono. Kwanyo woko jono m'ondiki nywolirok pajo, ma yac cako i oro adek kadho malo, joje ma jodonjo i Ot pa Rwoth paka tic pa ŋat'acel acele oyido waco, wok i dwoŋ pajo, i pokirok pajo.
Ondiki jocway ri Were i wi migam wok kwoŋ udi pa bacere jo, ma ot pa Jolevi cako i oro piero ario kadho malo wok i tic pajo kodi pokirok.
Ondiki jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi nyithindho pajo je ma nyaka joay, mon pajo, wot jo, gi nyiki jo, lwak ji je, rupiri oyido jogenere i kuro kwo pajo bedo maleŋ.

Aka ri nyikway Aron, jocway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido jonitie i lowo pa kisi dhano ma tindi madwoŋ, oyido nitie cwo i tindin kweth m'oyido oŋey jo gi nyingi gin ma poko cemo ri kisi jacwo i dier jocway ri were i wi migam kodi ri kisi dhano i dier Jolevi m'ondiki nyinge.
Ameno i Yuda parom, kere Hezekia otimo gim'otire kendo m'osangala Rwoth Were pere.
Aka kisi tic m'otimo ri Ot pa Were kendo i kuro cik gi or, ma rango Were pere, otimo gi cunye je aka obedo maber.
Munyo gigipiny me otieko timirok, kere Senakerib ma Asiria obino to monjo Yuda, otinda tindin madongo m'ogoy'iye cel, kareno paro ni kidho kikengila jo woloki apere.
Aka munyo kere Hezekia oneno ni Senakerib oyido obino g'atoŋa ma lweny gi Yerusalem,
to cano kodi jotel gi cwo pere ma jomeni ma cego waŋ pi m'oyido nitie woko ma tindi madwoŋ to jokonyo go.
Ji kweth jocokere, to jocego waŋ pi je, gi pi ma mol i piny, ka jopenjere ni, “Raŋo kerin ma Asiria jonyalo bino to jonwaŋo pi kweth?”

Hezekia ocako tic gi derino to geto kendo kor udi m'oyido otur je, ojengo acurcur i wiye, ogeto kor ot man woko mere, to loko matek cel ma tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi. Go bende otimo gilweny gi kwote kidhur.
Hezekia oketho jomituka pa jolweny kuro ji, ocoko kanyacel bonge kam'othangere ma jasonda aŋwen marom i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ to luwo gi jo wac ma miseni ni,
“Bedi win matek gi miseni maber. Wikiri wibwok kosa wikirin ruwaŋ kere ma Asiria gi jolweny pere je m'otelo jo. Wanitie gi meni maloyo yuthenge mawan loyo ma go nitie gine yuthenge pere.
Senakerib nitie gi meni ma nyadhano, to wanitie gi Rwoth Were mawan ma konyo wan gi lwenyo riwan.” To ji jonwaŋo miseni gi wac pa Kere Hezekia me.
Rumacen mere, munyo Senakerib gi jolweny pere oyido fodi jonitie i Lakis, odhiro mikwenda me ri Hezekia kodi ri ji ma Yuda m'oyido jonigine i Yerusalem:
“An Senakerib kere ma Asiria, apenjo win ni: Aŋo m'amiyo win miseni doŋ i Yerusalem, tindi m'otinda?
Hezekia ama kimien win, lamiyo witho kec gi riyo, ka waco riwin ni, ‘Rwoth Were mawan labotho wan i cingi kere ma Asiria’?
K'obedo Hezekia acel me won m'okwanyo woko kalamo pere manyakafir gi migame pere to wodho or ri Yuda gi Yerusalem, ka waco ama: ‘Wilalamo i wi migam acel kende, to wimiyo mic mewin i wiye’?
Wikuya gima kwarere mewin gi an jotieko timo ri ji ma nonin man? Werin ma nono man jobotho ji pajo kwoŋ kere ma Asiria?
Keraŋo m'acel kwoŋ werin ma piny no je jobotho piny pajo kwoŋ wan? Onyo aŋo ma miyin paro ni Were perin nyalo bothin?

Onyo riameno, wikiri wiyey Hezekia wowondi win kosa womien win ameno. Wikiri wiyey. Ongoye were kad'acel ma piny kosa ma ker moro m'otieko nyalo botho ji pere wok i cingan kosa i cingi kwarere paran. Onyo Were perin obothin masisiri nedi i cingan!”
Ŋecin pere jomedo waco gigipiny kweth mareco ma mako Rwoth Were, gi ŋeca pere Hezekia.

Senakerib bende ondiko balwa ma bwono Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, gi luwirok kwoŋe wac mareco ka waco ama: “Paka werin ma piny man fodi jok'obotho ji pajo kwoŋ meni paran, apaka bende Were pa Hezekia k'obothi ji pere kwoŋan.”
Jokoko malo gi gime i dhodhok pa Yuda ri ji ma Yerusalem m'oyido jonitie i kor ot, ma loko jo malwor gi miyo jo kirin, ŋey jowonyal mako tindi madwoŋ.
Joluwo kwoŋ Were ma Yerusalem paŋini go oyido cale werin pa ji ma piny, ma jobedo tic ma cingi dhano.
Gikenyo to kere Hezekia kodi Isaya wod pa Amoz, jatuci wac Were, jokwayo Were ka joywak rigo ni wokonyi jo.

To Rwoth dhiro malaika m'oneko jolweny ma jomeni, jomituka gi jotel i kambi pa kere ma Asiria. Ameno to kere dok i piny pere giwickwot ruwaŋe. Aka munyo odonjo i ot pa were pere, to acel kwoŋ wote rwadho go piny kenyo g'abor.
Ameno to Rwoth botho Hezekia gi ji ma Yerusalem i cingi Senakerib kere ma Asiria kodi i cingi jokwor pere je, to miyo jo siem kisi thenge.
Ji kweth jokelo mic kweth ri Rwoth i Yerusalem gi gigipiny ma welo ri Hezekia kere ma Yuda, ŋey woŋawere malo ruwaŋ nonin man je wok i hongo no kadho yuwiye.
I hongo no, two omako Hezekia aka oyido cegin tho, to kwayo Rwoth, to Rwoth winjo go, to miyo go ranyuth.
To Hezekia k'ofoyo bero m'otimi rigo, rupiri go oyido obedo jakwoto. Riameno keme pa Rwoth opodho kwoŋe, kwoŋ Yuda gi Yerusalem
Gikenyo to Hezekia gi ji ma Yerusalem jomwole, ŋey keme pa Rwoth k'opodho kwoŋ jo kendo i hongo pa Hezekia.
Hezekia olokere ŋat'oŋaŋ swa to kisi dhano je miyo go dwoŋ. Obedo gi kakano gigipiny m'ogeto ri zahabu pere, feza, telin ma welo, gima ŋwe kur, kwote gi gigipiny man ma welo.
Medo kwoŋ meno, oyido nitie gi ot ma kakan m'ogeto ri ranyak pere, vini, mo oliv; cele dhok gi rombo nger gi nger.
I nger acel no won, obedo gi tindin madongo rigo won, dhok gi mwendi kidhur; rupiri Were oyido omiyo go ŋaŋo madwoŋ.
Hezekia acel won me, ocego waŋ pi ma yumalo Gihon to baro fereji rijo yuthenge ma yupiny ma yupodho ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi. Kisi gimoro m'otimo okadho rigo maber.
Ameno bende, i gima mako kwoŋ jomikwenda pa jotel ma Babilon, m'oyido odhir bonge penjo gima mako kwoŋ ranyuth m'otimere i piny, Were okoyo go rigo won, ma temo go gi ŋeyo gimoro je manitie i cuny.
Kisi gimoro je ma kere Hezekia otimo, gi tim pere mabeyo je, ondiki i menyirok pa Isaya wod pa Amoz jatuci wac Were kodi i Kigana pa Kerin ma Yuda kodi Isiraili.
Hezekia otho t'iyiko iy'adec ma malo ma kaliele pa nyikway Daudi; aka ji je ma yuda kodi Yerusalem jomiyo go dwoŋ i tho pere. Wode Manase olunjo go paka kere.
Manase oyido jaoro apar g'ario munyo lokere kere ma Yuda, aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro 55.
Otimo gimarac ruwaŋ Rwoth, paka tim ma mienirok pa nonin ma Rwoth oriemo woko ruwaŋ Joisiraili.
Manase ogeto kendo kabedo manyakafir ma bamere Hezekia oyido oturo piny. Ogeto migame ma lamo Bal, otimo cal pa were madhako Asera, to lamo waŋceŋ, dwe kodi micalin, to tiyo rijo.
Ogeto migame manyakafir i Ot pa Rwoth i Yerusalem, kabedo ma Rwoth oyido owaco nike iripo lam'iye go cil gi cil.
Go ogeto migame manyakafir ri lwak jolweny je ma i polo i kapido ario ma Ot pa Rwoth.
Owaŋo wote paka cowirok i milelo pa wod Hinom. Go oyido obedo jamiliel aka othiedho to yido. Manase otimo gimarac madwoŋ swa kwoŋ Rwoth to kwinyo nge pere.

Oketho cal i Ot pa Rwoth, kabedo ma Were oyido otieko waco ri Daudi gi wode Solomon ni: “I Yerusalem ka, i Ot pa Rwoth me, a kabedo m'atieko yero kwoŋ adec je ma nonin apar g'ario ma Isiraili paka kabedo m'iripo laman'iye.
Aka Joisiraili je jowowori or paran to jokuro cik gibe ma ŋeca paran Musa omiyo jo, nyaka ak'oyey woriem jo woko i piny ma miyo kwarere pajo.”
Manase omieno ji ma Yuda gi ma Yerusalem to miyo jo timo reco maloyo meno ma nonin ma Rwoth oreyo woko ruwaŋ Joisiraili.
Rwoth oluwo gi Manase kodi ji pere to jok'owinjo.
Riameno Rwoth okelo kwoŋ jo jomituka pa jolweny pa kere ma Asiria m'omako Manase gi siraget to tweyo go gi lijegere to jotero go Babilon.
Aka munyo nitie i litho madwoŋ, to kwayo kony pa Rwoth Were pere to mwole tektek ruwaŋ Were pa kwarere pere.
Okwayo Were to Were winjo kwac gi ywak pere to dwoko go kendo i Yerusalem i ker pere. Gikenyo nyaka to Manase ŋeyo ni Rwoth obedo Were.

Rumacen to geto kor ot ma woko ma tindi pa daudi yuwok ceŋ ma Gihon, i milelo, kodi ri kadonjo ma waŋkac ma rec, kodi iy'adec ma tindi madwoŋ m'ilwoŋo ni Ofel to tiŋo malo m'oŋawere swa. Manase bende oketho jomituka pa jolweny i tindin m'otinda je ma Yuda.
Go okwanyo woko werin makicar gi cal i Ot pa Rwoth, gi migame je m'oyido ogeto wi got ma Ot pa Rwoth kodi i Yerusalem, to wito jo woko ma tindi madwoŋ.
Go bende oyiko migam pa Rwoth to miyo i wiye cowirok ma mic ma siem kodi ma foyo; to wodho or ri ji je ma Yuda ni jowolami Rwoth Were pa Isiraili.
Kada ji jomedere miyo cowirok i kabedo ma lamirok megi, to miyo jo ri Rwoth Were pajo kende.
Gigipiny man je ma Manase otimo, kwac m'oketho ri Were pere, gi mikwenda ma jotuci wac Were joluwo rigo i nyingi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, ondiki i kitawo ma Kigana ma mako kwoŋ kerin ma Isiraili.

Kwac pere gi radwok pa Were, gi gima mako reco ma go otimo ma fodi k'oŋuto reco pere je gi ngoye gi genirok pere, kabedo manyakafir gi cal pa Asera were madhako m'otimo gi cal m'olamo, ondiki je i Kigana pa jotuci wac Were.
Manase otho, aka oyiki i ot pere, aka wode Amon olunjo go paka kere.
Amon obedo kere ma Yuda munyo jaoro piero ario g'ario aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro ario.
Amon otimo reco paka bamere Manase ruwaŋ Rwoth, to lamo cal ma bamere oyido lamo.
To kwanyowoko paka bamere Manase, go k'omwole ruwaŋ Rwoth; aka gi tim me, otimo reco loyo bamere.
Jotic pere jocamo tiende gi piny to joneko go i ot pere.
Ji ma Yuda joneko jono je ma joneko kere Amon to jopiny ketho wode Yosia kere ma lunjo go.
Yosia otimo gim'osangala Rwoth, oluwo kite pa kwari mere Daudi ma k'otangatanga racuc kosa racam.

I oro mar'aboro ma dhum pa Yosia, munyo go fodi thin, ocako lamo Were pa kwari mere Daudi. Rumacen munyo oro aŋwen okadho, to cako reyo woko kabedo ma lamo manyakafir i Yuda kodi cal pa were madhako Asere gi cal megi je.

I nyim go, ji joturo woko migame pa Bal to joŋinyo piny migame ma buban m'oyido jocungo i wi jo, to turo mathindho werin ma mon Aserin gi cal ma kaliel m'oleny to loko jo fukefuke to ywoyo i wi kaliele pa jono m'oyido jomiyo jo cowirok.
Otimo gimoro acel no won i tindin madongo pa Manase, Efrayim kodi Simeo, kiri yumalo tundo Nafital, i gundin m'othoko.
I tindin ma ker ma yumalo parom, oŋinyo migame gi cal pa Asera, orego cal to loko fukefuke, to turo mathindho thindho migame ma buban je. Gikenyo nyaka to dok Yerusalem.

I oro mar'apar g'aboro ma dhum pa Yosia, munyo otieko loko m'olony piny kodi Ot pa Rwoth munyo kelo i gike lamo manyakafir, kere Yosia odhiro cwo adek yiko Ot pa Were: Safan jandiko wod pa Azaliya, Maseya gavana ma Yerusalem, gi Yowa wod pa Yehoahaz, jatic madwoŋ.

Jotundo bongi Hilikia jacway ri Were madwoŋ i wi migam to miyo jo pesa m'oyido okeli i Ot pa Rwoth were, ma Jolevi jokur ŋaŋo oyido jocoko bongi Manase kodi Efrayim gi jom'odoŋ je ma Isiraili gi Yuda gi Benyamin kodi joma bedo i Yerusalem.
Pesa me omiy cwo adek ma joneno paka iyiko Ot pa Rwoth, to jomiyo
jopac, jogeto, ma jonyewo mbawo kodi telin m'ioro ma yiko udi ma kerin ma Yuda oweyo onyekere.
Aka cwo no jotimo tic gi genirok. Okethi Yahath kodi Obadia Jolevi wot Merari, Zekaria kodi Mesulam, wot Kohath ma neno paka tic kadho. Jolevi je oyido jondijo gi jower.
Jolevi megi oyido jobiel bieto, gi jopok tic ma nger je, jomegi oyido jondiko, gi jotel kodi jokur waŋkace.
Munyo iwodho pesa i kisika, Hilikia to nwaŋo kitawo ma Cik pa Rwoth, cik m'oyido Rwoth omiyo Musa.
Hilikia owaco ri Safan ni, “Atieko nwaŋo kitawo ma Cik ka i Ot pa Rwoth.” Hilikia to miyo Safan kitawo,
to Safan tero ri kere. Owaco ni, “Watieko timo gimoro je m'ioro wan.
Watieko kwanyo pesa m'oyido okan i Ot pa Rwoth to wamiyo jotic gi joma kaŋasa.”
Gikenyo to Safan jandiko waco ri kere ni, “Anitie gi kitawo ma Hilikia omiyan.” Gikenyo to Safan soma malo ri kere.
Munyo kere owinjo wac ma cik, to yeco nangin pere.
Gikenyo to kere wodho or ri Hilikia, Ahikam wod pa Safan, Abidon wod pa Mika, Safan jandiko kodi Asaya ŋeca pa kere ni:

“Kidhi wipenji ran Rwoth kodi ri jono ma jodoŋ i Isiraili gi Yuda, gima mako wac ma kitawo m'onwaŋ; kole keme pa Rwoth dwoŋ m'okonjere kwoŋ wan, rupiri kwarere mawan jok'okuro wac pa Rwoth, ma timo gimoro je m'ondiki i kitawo me.”
Ameno to Hilikia kodi jono ma kere oyido odhiro to jokidho bongi Hulda jatuci wac Were madhako cipa Salum wod pa Tokath, nyakwar Hara, jakur kabada ma nangin ma Ot pa rwoth. Jotito rigo gim'otimere,
to waco rijo gik bongi kere to jomiyo go mikwenda,
me wok bongi Rwoth: “Akidho miyo Yerusalem gi ji mere je gir'acula gi lam m'ondiki i kitawo m'osoma ri kere.
Jokweran aka jotieko miyo cowirok ri werin man, aka jotieko guro nge paran gi gima jotieko timo je. Keme paran oliel kwoŋ Yerusalem, aka k'otho.
To ri kere ma Yuda, m'odhiro win penjo paro pa rwoth, wilawaco rigo ama: Rwoth were pa Isiraili waco ama: Mako kwoŋ wac m'iwinjo,
rupiri iŋuto t'imwole ruwaŋ Were munyo iwinjo wac pere kwoŋ kabedo me gi ji mere, aka itieko mwole ruwaŋan, aka itieko yeco nangin perin t'iywakere ruwaŋan, abende atieko winjin, Rwoth waco.
Panen, alacoko win bongi kwarere mewin, t'icoko win kanyacel i kaliel ma siem, aka waŋ win k'oneni reco je m'abino kelo i kabedo me kodi ji ma iye.” To jodwoko wac ri kere.
Kenyo kere odhiro wac to coko kanyacel jotel je ma Yuda kodi Yerusalem,
aka okidho gi jo i Ot pa were kanyacel kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam, jotuci wac were kodi ji je, jocandi kodi joŋaŋo. Kere osoma kitawo ma cikirok m'onwaŋere i Ot pa Rwoth.
Kere ocungo cegin gi siro acel aka otimo cikirok gi Rwoth winjo go, kuro cik kodi or pere gi cunye je kodi adundo pere je kodi ketho i tim gima cikirok mito paka ondiki i kitawo.
Gikenyo omiyo ji je m'oyido jonitie i Yerusalem kodi i Benyamin bende kuro cikirok. Aka ji ma Yerusalem jotimo paka cik pa Were pa kwarere pajo waco.
Gikenyo to Yosia kwanyo woko mienirok je iy'adec m'oyido obedo apa Joisiraili, to miyo ji je ma Isiraili lamo Rwoth Were pajo. I ndelo pere je, jok'owire luwo Rwoth Were pa kwarere pajo.
Yosia otimo Kalima ma Kadho ri Rwoth i Yerusalem, to thumo nyathi rombo ma kalima ma kadho i ndelo mar'apar g'aŋwen i dwe marapena.
Go oyero jocway ri Were i wi migam timo tic pajo aka omiyo jo miseni ma timo tic i Ot pa Rwoth.

Yosia bende owaco ri Jolevi m'oyido jofonjo Joisiraili je aka m'oyido joleŋ ri Rwoth ni, “Kethi win Kakan ma Cikirok maleŋ i ot ma Solomon wod pa Daudi ogeto, wikiripi kendo tiŋo i badi win. Onyo pama tiyi win ri Rwoth Were mewin kodi ji pere Isiraili.
Yikere win cungo kwoŋ nonin pa kwarere mewin, pak Kere Daudi owodho or kodi cik ma wod go Solomon omiyo.
Canere win i Kabedo Maleŋ cungo kwoŋ nonin mewin aka weyi Jalevi wotel kisi kitipa.
Wiripo thumo nyathi rombo, lokere win maleŋ, aka tim win can i kawaŋ wade mewin, ka wiluwo or ma Rwoth owodho ri Musa.”
Yosia omiyo ri ji mic ma kalima ma Kadho, nyithindhi rombo kodi nyithindhi diegi wok i mwendi pere je 30,000 kodi dhok 3,000. Me oyido owok kwoŋ lim pa kere won.

Jodhum pere bende jowodhi mic ri ji, jocway ri Were i wi migam, kodi Jolevi. Hilikia, Zekaria, kodi Yehiel, jotel madongo ma Ot pa Were, jomiyo jocway ri Were i wi migam nyithindhi rombo kodi nyithindhi diegi 2,600 paka mic ma kalima ma Kadho.
Jotel pa Jolevi, Konania, kodi wutmin go Semaya, Hasabia, Jeyel, kodi Yozabad, jowodho ri Jolevi nyithindhi rombo kodi nyithindhi diegi 5,000 kodi thwondhe 500 paka mic ma kalima ma Kadho.
Munyo jotieko cano kisi gimoro je ma kalima, jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi jocungo i kabedo pajo cungo kwoŋ cik ma kere owodho.
Jothumo nyathi rombo ma kalima ma Kadho, aka jocway ri Were i wi migam jokiro remo, kareno Jolevi jodaŋo.
Joketho gicen adec ma mic awaŋa to jopoko kisi peco ŋey jowonyal miyo Rwoth paka ondiki i cik pa Musa. Jotimo gimoro acel gi thwondhe bende.
Jobulo nyathi rombo ma Kalima ma Kadho i wi mac, paka owodhi cik, aka jotedo mic maleŋ i degi, binika kodi sapikere, aka jopoko ji piyo piyo.
Rumacen Jolevi jopoko riŋo pajo kodi apa jocway ri Were i wi migam, kwoŋbedo jocway ri Were i wi migam, nyikway Aron oyido joriwin wor gipi miyo mic awaŋa kodi mic mabor mere.

Jower ma jonono pa Asaf oyido jomako kabedo pajo ma Kere Daudi omiyo jo; Asaf, Heman, kodi Yeduthun, jatuci Wac Were pa kere. Jokur waŋkace oyido jonitie i kisi waŋkac ma jok'oeye rupiri Jolevi, wade pajo, oyido jotimo ri ji can ma kalima.
Ameno paka Kere Yosia owodho cik, otim kisi gimoro i ndelo no, ma kuro kalima ma Kadho kodi miyo mic awaŋa i wi migam pa Rwoth.
Ji ma Isiraili m'oyido jonitie jotimo kalima i hongo, kodi kalima ma mugat ma buthow ma ndelo abirio.

Wok i hongo pa jatuci wac Were Samwiri, oyido ongoye kere ma Isiraili m'otimo kalima ma Kadho paka ma Yosia, jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi, kodi Joyuda je kodi Isiraili, gi ji m'oyido jobedo i Yerusalem jotimo.
Kalima me otim i oro mar'apar g'aboro ma dhum pa Kere Yosia.
Munyo Kere Yosia otieko timo gime je ri Ot pa Were, Kere Neko ma Misir okadho lweny i Karkemis i malawa Yufrete, aka Yosia otemo cero go.

To Neko odhiro rigo mikwenda ni, “Lweny me kimaki kwoŋin, Kere ma Yuda. Akibino lweny kodin, to gi jokwor paran, aka Were owaco ran redo. Weyi geŋo gima Were mito, kole go nitie kodan ŋey wokiri woreyin.”
To Yosia k'onyalo weyo go, kwanyo woko orukere nyaman ŋey wonyali lweny gi Neko. Go k'owinjo wac pa Neko m'owok i dhok Were, to oriwere i lweny kam'obipere i Megido.
Munyo jolwenyo, aserin pa Jomisir ocelo Kere Yosia; aka okoko ri ŋecin pere ni, “Kwanyan win woko, alimo litho swa.”
Ameno ŋecin pere jokwanyo go woko i cawila pere to joketho go i cawila man, to jotero go i Yerusalem. Kenyo go otho, aka oyiki go i kaliel pa kwarere pere. Yuda gipi kodi Yerusalem joywako Yosia.
Yeremia jatuci wac Were, kodi jower je jocwogo wer ajore ri kere Yosia. Gime olokere kwer ri jower i Isiraili, wero wer ajore me ka joywako go, aka ondiki i wer je mar'ajore.
Giman je ma kere Yosia otimo, miyirok pere ri Rwoth, kodi winjo cik pa Rwoth,
kodi kigana pere wok i cakirok tundo i gike, ondiki i kitawo ma Kigana pa Kerin ma Isiraili kodi Yuda.
Ji ma Yuda joyero Yehoahaz wod Yosia lunjo go paka kere.
Yehoahaz oyido jaoro piero ario g'adek munyo ocako dhum, aka odhumo i Yerusalem ma oro adek.
Kenyo Neko kere ma Misir otero go paka jatwec to miyo Yuda culo kilo 3,400 ma feza kodi kilo 34 ma zahabu paka misolo.
Neko oketho Eliakim omin Yehoahaz paka kere ma Yuda gi Yerusalem, aka owiro nyinge ni Yehoyakim. To Neko tero Yehoahaz i Misir.
Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon omonjo Yuda, to tweyo Yehoyakim gi lijegere to tero go i Babilon.
Nebukadineza bende okadho g'atewe ma Ot pa Rwoth i Babilon to ketho peco pere i Babilon.
Gigipiny man je ma kere Yehoyakim otimo, kiri gi tim pere mienirok, kodi raco m'otimo je, ondiki i Kitawo pa Kerin ma Isiraili. Wode Yehoyakin olunjo go paka kere.
Yehoyakin oyido jaoro aboro munyo cako dhum, aka odhumo ma dwe adek gi ndelo apar i Yerusalem. Go otimo gimarac ruwaŋ Rwoth.
I hongo ma cwir, Kere Nebukadineza ooro t'ikelo go i Babilon paka jatwec, kanyacel g'atewe ma welo wok i Ot pa Rwoth; aka oketho Zedekia omin Yehoyakin paka kere ma Yuda gi Yerusalem.
Go otimo gimarac ruwaŋ Rwoth Were pere. Go k'omwole ruwaŋ jatuci wac Were Yeremia, m'oluwo wac pa Rwoth.
Medo kwoŋ meno, jotel ma Yuda, jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi ji je joluwo mienirok pa nonin m'oyido jothoko jo, aka jokoco Ot pa Rwoth m'oyido oloko maleŋ i Yerusalem.
Rwoth, Were pa kwarere pajo oyido omedere dhiro jotuci wac Were piro jo, kwoŋbedo go oyido nitie gi wor ri ji pere kodi ot pere,
to jomedo ŋalo jomikwenda pa Were, cayo wac pa Were, kodi nyero jotuci wac Were pere, tundo kama keme pa Rwoth olokere madwoŋ kwoŋ jo to m'ongoye both.
Kere ma Babilon onyaga Ot pa Were, lim mere kodi lim pa kere kodi jodhum pere, aka otero je i Babilon.
Kere ma Babilon owaŋo woko Ot pa Were, tindi madwoŋ, gi peco pa kere kodi lim mere, aka oturo piny kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ.
Go otero jom'odoŋ i Babilon tic rigo kodi wote cuka ker ma Pasia otula.
Aka wac ma Rwoth oyido otieko waco gi dhok Yeremia otundo i kare ni, “Lowo ladoŋ nono ma oro piero ario, ma culo waŋ Sabato m'oyido kikur.”
I oro marapena ma dhum pa Kere Siras ma Pasia, wac ma Rwoth oyido otieko waco gi dhok Yeremia otundo i kare. Rwoth oguro cuny Kere Siras ma Pasia dhiro mikwenda i ker pere gipi aka owaco i ndiko ni,

“Me cik pa Siras kere ma Pasia. Rwoth, Were ma i polo, omiyin kerin je ma piny, aka otieko miyan meni ma geto Ot pa Were i Yerusalem, manitie i Yuda. Kwoŋ win ma wibedo ji pere, dok win koro, aka weyi Rwoth Were mewin wobedi gi win!”
Weyi Rwoth wobedi gi jono je ma jobedo ji pere. Onyo ayeyo win kadho i Yerusalem geto kendo Ot pa Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, go obedo Were manitie i Yerusalem.
Aka weyi ji pere ma joboth je, i kabedo ma jobed'iye je, ji ma diere pajo jowokony jo gi feza, zahabu, gigipiny ma woth kodi ogwaŋe kiri gi mic ri Ot pa Were i Yerusalem.
Kenyo jotel ma nonin ma Yuda gi Benyamin, jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi kodi kisi ŋata Were oguro cunye joyikere kadho geto kendo Ot pa Rwoth i Yerusalem.
Ji ma diere pajo je jokonyo jo g'atewe ma feza, zahabu, gigipiny ma woth, ogwaŋe, gi mic ma welo kodi mic man ma wegi jomiyo.
Kere Siras won owodho woko atewe ma Ot pa Rwoth ma Kere Nebukadineza oyido otiŋo wok i Yerusalem to ketho i ot pa werin pere.
Kere Siras owodho or ri Methireda, jakan ma Pasia kwano jo to ketho i cingi Sesibazar, jadhum ma Yuda.
Me a gigipiny m'onwaŋ; galaya ma zahabu piero adek, galaya ma feza 1,000 apalin piero ario g'abuŋwen,
acero ma zahabu piero adek, acero ma feza 410 kodi atewe man 1,000.
I je oyido nitie atewe 5,400 ma zahabu gi feza. Sesibazar okelo je i Yerusalem wok i Babilon.
Onyo me ji mar'adec ma jowok i twec, ma Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon oyido otero jo koro. Jodok i Yerusalem gi Yuda, joje i tindin pajo.
Jodwoko gi Zerubabel, Yesuwa, Nehemia, Seraya, Relaya, Modekay, Bilsan, Mispar, Bigvay, Rehum, kodi Bana.
Me welo pa Joisiraili ma jodwoko wok i kisi nono:
Nyikway Paros 2,172.
Nyikway Sefatiya 372.
Nyikway Ara 775.
Nyikway Pahath Mowab (nyikway Yesuwa kodi Yowab) 2,812.
Nyikway Elam 1,254.
Nyikway Zatu 945.
Nyikway Zakay 760.
Nyikway Bani 642.
Nyikway Bebay 623.
Nyikway Azigadi, 1,222.
Nyikway Adonikam 666.
Nyikway Bigvay 2,056.
Nyikway Adin 454.
Nyikway Ater (ma bende ilwoŋo ni Hezekia) 98.
Nyikway Bezay 323.
Nyikway Jora 112.
Nyikway Hasum 223.
Nyikway Gibar 95.
Wok i tindi Bethelehem ji 123.
Wok i tindi Netofa ji 56.
Wok i tindi Anathoth ji 128.
Wok i tindi Azimaveth ji 42.
Wok i tindi Kiriath Yerim, Kefira, gi Beroth ji 743.
Wok i tindi Rama gi Geba ji 621.
Wok i tindi Mikmas ji 122.
Wok i tindi Bethel gi Ay ji 223.
Wok i tindi Nebo ji 52.
Wok i tindi Magbis ji 152.
Wok i tindi Elam man ji 1,254.
Wok i tindi Harim ji 320.
Wok i tindin ma Lod, Hadid gi Ono ji 725.
Wok i tindi Yeriko ji 345.
Wok i tindi Sena ji 3,630.
Me a jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jodwoko: Nyikway Yedaya, ma ot pa Yesuwa 973.
Nyikway Imer 1,052.
Nyikway Pasur 1,247.
Nyikway Harim 1,017.
Me Jolevi ma jodwoko wok i twec: Nyikway Yesuwa, Kadmiel gi Hodavia ji 74.
Jower ma Ot pa Were, nyikway Asaf 128.
Jokur ma waŋkac ma Ot pa Were, nyikway Salum, Ater, Talmon, Akub, Hatita, gi Sobay 139.
Me jotic ma Ot pa Were ma jodwoko wok i twec: Nyikway Ziha, Hasufa, Tabayoth,
Keros, Sia, Padon,
Lebana, Hagaba, Akub,
Hagab, Samilay, Hanan,
Gidel, Gahar, Reaya,
Rezin, Nekoda, Gazam,
Uza, Paseya, Besay,
Asina, Meunim, Nefisim,
Bakbuk, Hakufa, Harhur,
Bazluth, Mehida, Harsa,
Barkos, Sisera, Tema,
Nezia, gi Hatifa.
Me nyikway ŋecin pa Solomon ma jodwoko wok i twec: Nyikway Sotai, Hasofereth, Peruda,
Jala, Darkon, Gidel,
Sefatiya, Hatil, Pocereth Hazebayim, gi Ami.
Welo pa jotic ma Ot pa Were gi nyikway ŋecin pa Solomon ma jodwoko wok i twec je oyido obedo 392.
Kitipa man m'oyido jowok i tindin ma Telmela, Telharsa, Kerub, Adan, gi Imer, jodwoko i Yerusalem, makada nende oyido jok'onyalo ŋeyo ni oyido jobedo nyikway Joisiraili.
Kitipa me oyido nitie nyikway Delaya, Tobia, gi Nekoda, joje ji 652.
Nyikway jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jowok i nonin me bende jodwoko i Yerusalem: Habaya, Hakoz, gi Barzilay ma wok Giliad, m'oyido otero nyingi jopa oce.
Jome jodwaro nyingi jo kam'ondik'iye nyingi ji aka jok'onwaŋo, riameno k'oyey jo tic paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Jadhum pa Joyuda owaco rijo ni jokiripi camo cemo pa jocway ri Were i wi migam cuka obedi jacway ri Were i wi migam m'openji Rwoth kwoŋ wac no gi Urim kodi Thumim.
Ameno ji je ma jodwoko i Yuda wok i twec oyido joromo 42,360
medo i wi ŋecin 7,337 jower 200 ma mon gi cwo.
Jodwoko gi kayinin 736 punde 245
ŋamin 435 gi punde 6,720.
Tekin jotundo i Ot pa Rwoth i Yerusalem, megi kwoŋ jotel ma nonin jomiyo mic ma geto kendo Ot pa Were.
Jomiyo madit ma romo m'oyido jonyalo miyo ri tic me, aka oromo kilo 500 ma zahabu, kilo 2,800 ma feza gi law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam 100.
Munyo dwe mar'abirio otundo, Joisiraili je oyido jonitie i tindin pajo, aka ji jocokere kanyacel i Yerusalem.

Kenyo Yesuwa wod Yehozadak, kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam wadi, kodi Zerubabel wod Siltiel kodi wade pere jogeto kendo migam pa Were pa Isiraili, miyo cowirok awaŋa i wiye, paka ondiki i cik pa Musa jacwo pa Were.
Jogeto migam i misingi mere, makada nende oyido jonitie gi lworo ri joger pajo, aka jomiyo Rwoth cowirok awaŋa i wiye odikin g'othieno.
Jotimo Kalima ma Kayindi cungo kwoŋ cik mere; aka jomiyo cowirok ma kisi ndelo paka mitere ri kisi ndelo.
Jo bende jomiyo cowirok awaŋa ma jokikeŋ, mic ma Kalima ma Dwe Manyen kodi i kalima je m'ilam'iye Rwoth, kiri gi mic ma dhano won miyo Rwoth.
Wok i ndelo marapena ma dwe mar'abirio jocako miyo Rwoth cowirok awaŋa, makada nende oyido fodi k'okuny misingi ma Ot pa Were.

Ameno ji joculo jogeto kodi jopac pesa, aka jowilo kasike yen sida gi cemo, vini kodi mo wok i tindin madongo Tire gi Sidon. Okeli kasike me piny wok wi gote ma Lebanon luwo gi nam kiri Yopa. Gime je otimere gi cik pa Siras, kere ma Pasia.

Ameno i dwe mar'ario ma oro mar'ario munyo jotieko dwoko i Yerusalem, jocako tic. Me obedo Zerubabel wod Siltiel Yesuwa wod Yehozadak, kanyacel gi ji pajo, jocway ri Were i wi migam gi Jolevi kodi jono je m'oyido jodwoko i Yerusalem wok i twec. Okethi Jolevi je m'oyido jo oro piero ario kadho malo telo geto kendo Ot pa Rwoth.
Yesuwa, wote kodi wade pere, Kadmiel kodi wote, Binuy kodi Jodavia kanyacel gi nyikway Henadad, ama jotelo geto kendo Ot pa Were.
Gi pak kodi foyo, jowero wer me ri Rwoth:
Rwoth ber,
mar pere makiwire ri Isiraili bedo cil gi cil.
Kisi dhano okoko gi meni pere, ka jopako Rwoth, kwoŋbedo oyido otiek cako misingi ma Ot pa Rwoth.
To jocway ri Were i wi migam ma joti, Jolevi, kodi jotel nonin m'oyido joneno Ot pa Were marapena, munyo joneno i geto misingi, joywak aka jogoyo ndur, makada nende joman jokoko ri kisangala.
Derino ma koko ma kisangala kodi ywak pa ji oyido kipokere kole ji jokoko malo swa ma owinjere gi bor.
Munyo jokwor pa Yuda kodi Benyamin jowinjo ni ji ma jodwoko wok i twec oyido jogeto kendo Ot pa Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili,

jokidho bongi Zerubabel kodi jotel ma nonin aka jowaco rijo ni, “Weyi wariwere gi win i geto Ot pa Were, kole walamo Were acel ma wilamo, aka oyido ti wamiyo go cowirok wok cuka Esarhadon, kere ma Asiria keli wan bedo ka.”
To Zerubabel, Yesuwa kodi jotel nonin jodwoko jo ni, “Wakimiti kony mewin geto ot ri Rwoth Were mawan. Wan wegi walageto, paka Siras, Kere ma Pasia owodho or riwan.”
Kenyo ji m'oyido jobedo i lowo no jocako bwoko kodi geŋo kodi kwanyo woko cuny Joyuda kwoŋ geto.
Jo bende jonyewo jodhum ma Pasia geŋo can pajo. Jomedo timo gime i hongo ma dhum pa Siras kiri i dhum pa Dario.
I dhum pa Aritakises, i oro pere m'ocak'iye dhum, jokwor pa ji m'oyido jobedo i Yuda gi Yerusalem jondiko misegey kwoŋ jo.
I oro ma dhum pa Aritakises, kere ma Pasia, Bislam, Mithredath, Tabel, kodi jotic wadi jo jondiko balwa ri kere i Dhoaramayik.
Rehum gavana, Simisay jandiko, bende jondiko balwa me ri Aritakises kwoŋ Yerusalem.
Wok bongi Rehum gavana, Simisay jandiko, jotic wadi jo, jothum banja, kodi jodhum man je, ma jobedo cwo ma jowok i Erek, Babilon, kodi Susa i lowo ma Elam,
kanyacel gi nonin je ma Asurbanipal ma jameni aka dwoŋ otero bedo i tindin madongo ma Samaria, kodi kaman je iy'adec ma yupodho ceŋ ma malawa Yufrete.
Me cal ma balwa ma jodhiro: Ri Kere Aritakises. Ŋecin perin, ji ma jobedo iy'adec kalo malawa Yufrete, jodhiro rin moth. Aka nyo
wamito miyin ŋeyo ni Joyuda ma jodwoko ka i Yerusalem wok i Babilon jogeto kendo tindi madwoŋ me m'opoŋ gwenyirok gi kidakana. Jotieko cako geto kendo kore aka jocegin cowo.
Mondo jadwoŋ, ka tindi madwoŋ me ogeti kendo t'icowo kore mere, ji jolaweyo culo misolo, aka lim perin ma ker lamojere.
Onyo, paka wan bende walimo bero ma muluwir aka kiber wan neno gime ka timere, riameno wadhiro rin wac me.

Oyido wawaco ni idwari i randik ma kwarere perin jokano. K'itimo, ilanwaŋo ni tindi madwoŋ me jagwenyirok noknok aka wok cene omiyo kerin gi jodhum mar'adec teko. Tek swa dhumo ji mere, aka am'omiyo orey woko.
Wamito kere woŋey ni, ka tindi madwoŋ me ogeti kendo t'icowo kore, ilangoye gi lim iy'adec ma yupodho ceŋ ma malawa Yufrete.
Kere odhiro radwok me: Ri Rehum gavana, Simisay jandiko, kodi jotic wadi jo ma jobedo i Samaria gi yupodho ceŋ ma malawa Yufrete, amotho win.
Balwa ma widhiro ran oloki t'isoma ran.
Awodho or wodwari tiende, aka adieri onwaŋere ni wok i hongo macene Yerusalem ogwenyere kwoŋ kerin, aka opoŋ jodudi gi jokitegenya.
Kerin madongo jodhumo Yerusalem aka jodhumo adec gipi ma yupodho ceŋ ma malawa Yufrete, ka jocoko misolo.
Riameno wodhi win or ni cwo no joripo juko geto kendo tindi madwoŋ cuka anowodhi or.
Wikiri wigal, kole wakiripi weyo gime wokal kor wan.
Tekin osoma balwa m'owok bongi kere Aritakises ri Rehum, Simisay, kodi jotic wadi jo, joredo kadho i Yerusalem aka joromo Joyuda juko geto kendo tindi madwoŋ.
Munyo Zerubabel wod Siltiel gi Yesuwa wod Yehozadak jowinjo mikwenda pajo, jocako geto kendo Ot pa Were i Yerusalem, aka jotuci wac Were ario no jokonyo jo.
I hongo acel no Tatenay gavana mar'adec ma yupodho ceŋ ma Yufrete, Sethar Bozenay, gi jodhum wadi jo jobino i Yerusalem aka jopenjo ni, “Ŋa m'owodho or riwin geto ot me kendo gi dwoko gigipiny mere?”
Jo bende jopenjo nyingi ji je m'oyido jomiyo kony ma geto Ot pa Were.
To, waŋ Were oyido nitie kwoŋ Joyuda, aka jodhum ma Pasia jok'onyalo juko jo geto cuka jodhiro mikwenda ri Dario to jonwaŋo radwok.
Me mikwenda ma jodhiro ri kere Dario:
“Ri Kere Dario, weyi idhumi i siem.
Mondo Jadwoŋ, ŋey ni wakidho iy'adec ma Yuda aka wanwaŋo ni igeto kendo Ot pa Were madwoŋ gi telin mapando gi mbawin i kore. Tic me itimo gi kinen aka kadho maber.
Kenyo waluwo gi jodongo no aka wapenjo jo ni, ‘Ŋa m'owodho or riwin geto kendo ot me gi dwoko gigipiny mere?’
Wapenjo jo bende nyingi jo, ŋey wanyal miyin ŋeyo, ŋey wandiki nyingi ji ma jotelo geto me.
Jodwoko wan ni, ‘Wabedo ŋecin pa Were ma polo gi piny, aka wageto kendo ot m'oyido ogeti oro kweth yucen, gi kere madwoŋ ma Isiraili.
To kwoŋbedo kwarere mawan jomiyo Were ma i Polo nge, ojwango jo i cingi Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, kere ma ker pa Jokaldin, ma joreyo woko ot me to jokadho gi ji i Babilon.
To Kere Siras ma Babilon, i oro marapena ma dhum pere, owodho or ni Ot pa Were iripo geto kendo.

Kiri, gigipiny ma zahabu gi feza, ma Kere Nebukadineza oyido okwanyo wok i Ot pa Were i Yerusalem, Kere Siras owodho woko wok i ot pa were ma Babilon, aka omiyo jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Sesibazar, ma go oketho paka gavana.
Siras owaco rigo ni woter jo wokethi i Ot pa Were i Yerusalem, aka wogeti kendo Ot pa Were i gunda mere.
Ameno Sesibazar obino to cako misingi mere, geto omedere wok i hongo no tundo gunyo ni, to Ot pa Were fodi k'orumo.’
Aka nyo, mondo jadwoŋ, k'inen sangala in, wodhi or worangi i ndiko k'inen adieri kosa be Siras owodho or wogeti kendo Ot pa Were me i Yerusalem, aka iwaci riwan mito perin kwoŋ wac me.”
Kenyo Kere Dario owodho or, aka odwar i ndiko ma ker m'oyido okan i Babilon.
T'inwaŋo i tindi madwoŋ Ekibatana iy'adec ma Mediya gi kitawo m'ondik'iye wac me:

“I oro marapena ma dhum pere, Kere Siras owodho or ni wogeti kendo Ot pa Were i Yerusalem paka kabedo ma miyo cowirok gi mic awaŋa. Ot pa Were ripo bedo mita piero ario g'ario i ŋawirok kodi piero ario g'ario i laco.
Iripo geto kore i bol mbawo acel i wi bol telin adek. Cul je lawok i mugowa ma kan pa kere.
Kiri gigipiny ma zahabu gi feza ma Kere Nebukadineza okelo i Babilon wok i Ot pa Were i Yerusalem iripo dwoko i kabedo pajo i Yerusalem i Ot pa Were.”
Kenyo Dario odhiro radwok me: “Ri Tatenay gavana ma yuwok ceŋ ma malawa Yufrete, Sethar Bozenay, kodi jodhum wadi win, yuwok ceŋ ma Yufrete. Weyere win gi tic ma Ot pa Were
aka wikiri wijuki geto mere. Weyi gavana ma Yuda gi jotel pa Joyuda jowogeti kendo Ot pa Were i gunda mere.
Awodho or riwin konyo jo geto kendo. Wiripo miyo jome cul je, m'opoŋ aka m'ongoye galo, gi pesa ma wok kwoŋ misolo m'iculo yuwok ceŋ ma Yufrete, ŋey tic no wokiri wocungi.

Kisi gima mitere, rwath dhok, wot rombo, kosa rombo ma mic awaŋa ri Were ma i polo, ŋano, cumbi, vini, kosa mo, paka jocway ri Were i wi migam i Yerusalem jomiti, wiripo miyo jo kisi ndelo ma wikikeŋ,
ŋey jowomiy cowirok ma sangala Were ma i polo, aka jowokway ri kwo pa kere gi nyithindho pere.
Amedo wodho or ni ka nyatoro owir or me, ilaywayo mbawo wok i ot pere, m'oyedhi withe acel, t'icwowo kwoŋe. Aka ot pere ilaloko kidhur yuk.
Weyi Were m'oyero Yerusalem paka kabedo m'iripo lam'iye go womaki ker pa kere kosa piny m'owir or me to temo reyo woko Ot pa Were kenyo. An, Dario, awodho or. Iripo luwo gi kinen je.”
Kenyo Tatenay gavana, Sethar Bozenay, kodi jodhum wadi jo joluwo or pa Kere Dario gi kinen.

Ameno jotel pa Joyuda jogeto aka jomedere maber kareno jotuci wac Were Hagay gi Zekaria jomedo jo meni. Jocowo geto Ot pa Were paka Were pa Isiraili oyido owodho or rijo, gi or pa Siras, Dario gi Aritakises kerin ma Pasia.
Ot me ocow geto k'adek ma dwe ma Adar i oro mar'aucel ma dhum pa Kere Dario.
Kenyo Joisiraili, jocway ri Were i wi migam gi Jolevi, gi ji m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec je, jotimo kalima ma miyo Were ot gi kisangala.
I kalima no jomiyo thwondhe 100 rombo 200 wot rombo 400 paka cowirok, gi diegi apar g'ario paka mic ma cwako reco, acel ri kisi nono pa Isiraili.
Kenyo joketho jocway ri Were i wi migam i kitipin pajo gi Jolevi bende tiyo i Ot pa Were cungo kwoŋ fonji manitie i kitawo pa Musa.

Jocway ri Were i wi migam je kodi Jolevi oyido jolokere maleŋ; aka joje oyido jolony. Ameno jothumo ogwaŋe ma cowirok ma kalima ma Kadho ri ji m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec, ri jocway ri Were i wi migam gi jo wegi.
Cemo ma kalima me ocamere gi Joisiraili je m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec gi jono je m'oyido jokwedere kwoŋ tim manyakafir pa nonin m'oyido jobedo i lowo no aka oyido jobino lamo Rwoth Were pa Isiraili.
Gi kisangala jotimo Kalima ma Mugat ma buthow ma ndelo abirio; kole Rwoth oyido omiyo jo kisangala gi wiro cuny kere ma Pasia bongi jo, ŋey wokonyi jo gi geto kendo Ot pa Were, Were pa Isiraili.
Rumacen ma oro kweth, munyo kere Aritakises oyido dhumo Pasia, oyido nitie jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Ezira. Me a kwarere pa Ezira: Ezira oyido obedo wod Seraya, wod Azaria, wod Hilikia,
wod Salum, wod Zadok, wod Ahitub,
wod Amaria, wod Azaria, wod Merayoth,
wod Zerahia, wod Uzi, wod Buki,
wod Abisuwa, wod Finehas, wod Eliazar, wod Aron jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Ezira me obino wok i Babilon. Go oyido obedo jandiko manitie gi niaŋ i thutho kwoŋ cik pa Musa ma Rwoth Were pa Isiraili oyido omiyo. Kere omiyo go gim'okwayo je, kole cingi Rwoth oyido nitie kwoŋe.
Joisiraili megi, gi jocway ri Were i wi migam gi Jolevi megi, jower, jokur ma waŋkac, gi jotic ma Ot pa Were bende jodok i Yerusalem, i oro mar'abirio ma dhum pa Kere Aritakises.
Joweyo Babilon k'acel i dwe mar'acel, aka gi kony pa Were jotundo i Yerusalem k'acel i dwe mar'abic.
Ezira oyido omiyere kisoma Cik pa Rwoth, gi timo gima cik waco, gi fonjo Joisiraili thenethene mere je.
Me cal ma balwa ma Kere Aritakises omiyo Ezira, jacway ri Were i wi migam, jandiko m'oyido nitie gi niaŋ i thutho kwoŋ Cik gi Or ma Rwoth oyido omiyo Isiraili:
“Wok bongi Aritakises, kere pa kerin, ri Ezira jacway ri Were i wi migam, aka jafonji Cik pa Were ma i Polo: Siem rin.
Amiyo or ni Jaisiraili mogo je kosa jocway ri Were i wi migam pajo kosa Jolevi i ker paran ma jomito dok i Yerusalem jowokadhi kodin.
An, kanyacel gi jomic rieko paran abirio, waorin dwaro gima mako kwoŋ Yuda gi Yerusalem, gi neno nger ma joluw'iye Cik pa Were perin, m'omiyin.
Iripo bende tero mic ma zahabu gi feza ma an gi jomic rieko paran wamito miyo Were pa Isiraili, ma Ot pere nitie i Yerusalem.
Iripo bende tero feza gi zahabu m'icoko iy'adec ma Babilon gipi gi mic je ma Joisiraili gi jocway ri Were i wi migam pajo jomiyo ri Ot pa Were i Yerusalem.
Gi pesa me, nyew thwondhe, wot rombo, megi rombo, ŋano, gi vini aka imiy Rwoth i wi migam i Ot pa Were i Yerusalem.
Winyalo oro feza gi zahabu m'odoŋ ri gigipiny ma in gi wadin wimito, cungo kwoŋ mito pa Were mewin.
Iripo miyo Were i Yerusalem gigipiny je m'omiyin ma tic i Ot pa Were.
Aka giman je m'imito ri Ot pa Were inyalo kwanyo wok i mugowa pa kere ma kan.
An, Kere Aritakises, awodho or ri jokan lim je mar'adec ma yuwok ceŋ ma Yufrete miyo Ezira jacway ri Were i wi migam aka jafonji Cik pa Were ma i Polo kisi gima go mito gi kinen.
Miy win go tundo kiri kilo 3,400 ma feza, kilo 10,000 ma ŋano, lita 2,000 ma vini, lita 2,000 ma mo gi cumbi ma mitere.
Neni win ni wimiyo kisi gima Were ma i polo miyo or ni mitere i ot pere, ŋey keme pere wokiri wobin kwoŋ kere gi jono ma jodhum rumacen paran.
Wikiripi coko misolo wok bongi jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi, jower, jokur, jotic ma Ot pa Were, kosa ŋatiman je ma timo tic m'omakere gi Ot pa Were.
In, Ezira, cungo kwoŋ rieko ma Were ocweyin gine, yer jodhum gi jothum banja ma joluwo Cik pa Were perin dhumo ji ma yuwok ceŋ ma Yufrete. Aka iripo fonjo Cik ŋat'okuya kwoŋe je.
Ŋat'okwer winjo cik pa Were perin je kosa cik ma ker, iripo miyo go gir'acula gi sawa no won; ma tho kosa tero go i piny man kosa mako gigipiny pere kosa tweyo go i katwec.”
Ezira owaco ni, “Rwoth wopak, Were pa kwarere paran! Go omiyo kere miyo Ot pa Rwoth i Yerusalem dwoŋ i nger me.
Gi wor pa Were, anwaŋo wor i waŋ kere, jomic rieko pere gi jodhum ma jomeni je; Rwoth Were omiyan miseni, aka anyalo dwoŋo jotel nonin ma Isiraili kweth dok kanyacel kodan.”
Me nyingi jotel nonin m'oyido jonitie i twec i Babilon aka ma jodwoko gi Ezira i Yerusalem munyo Aritakises oyido obedo kere.
Nyikway Finehas, Gerisom, wok i nono pa Ithamar, Daniel, wok i nono pa Daudi, Hatus wod Sekaniya.
Nyikway Paros, Zekaria, gi cwo 150 (ndiko ma mako kwoŋ kwarere pajo oyido nitie)
Nyikway Pahath Mowab, Eliehoenay wod Zerahia, gi cwo 200.
Nyikway Zatu, Sekaniya wod Yahaziel, gi cwo 300.
Nyikway Adin, Ebed wod Yonathan, gi cwo piero abic.
Nyikway Elam, Yesaya wod Athalia gi cwo piero ario.
Nyikway Sefatiya, Zebadia wod Mikaili, gi cwo piero aboro.
Nyikway Yowab, Obadia wod Yehiel, gi cwo 218.
Nyikway Bani, Selomith wod Josifia gi cwo 160.
Nyikway Bebay, Zekaria wod Bebay, gi cwo piero ario g'aboro.
Nyikway Azigadi, Johanan wod Hakatan gi cwo 110.
Nyikway Adonikam, ma jobino rumacen, Elifelet, Yeuel, Samaya, gi cwo piero aucel.
Nyikway Bigvay, Uthay, Zakur, gi cwo piero ario.
An, Ezira, acoko ji i thengi malawa ma mol tundo kiri Ahava, aka waketho kambi kenyo ma ndelo adek. Aka munyo akaŋasa ji gi jocway ri Were i wi migam, anwaŋo ni nyikway Jolevi oyido jongoye.
Kenyo aoro wolwoŋi Elieza, Ariel, Samaya, Elinathan, Yarib, Elinathan, Nathan, Zekaria, gi Mesulam, m'oyido jobedo jotel, Yoyarib gi Elinathan m'oyido joriek swa.
Aoro jo bongi Ido, jatel pa Jolevi i kabedo m'ilwoŋo ni Kasifa, kwayo go gi wade pere gi jotic ma Ot pa Were dhiro riwan jotic ma Ot pa Were mawan.
Ato paka cingi Were ma wor oyido nitie kwoŋ wan, jodhiro riwan Serebia, jacwo ma janyalo, jalevi, aka janono pa Mahili, gi wote gi wutmin go j'apar g'aboro.
Jodhiro bende Hasabia gi Yesaya jonono pa Merari, gi wade pere piero ario,
gi jotic ma Ot pa Were 200. Jotic ma Ot pa Were oyido jokonyo Jolevi, aka Kere Daudi gi jodhum pere ama joketho jo timo tic no. Joje ondiki nyingi jo.
Kenyo i thengi jangi malawa ma mol kadho Ahava, awodho or ri wajoje riyo gi mwolok ruwaŋ Were mawan gi kwayo go wotel wan i woth mawan gi kikwonga wan gi nyithindho mawan gi lim mawan je.
Kole wiyan okwot kwayo kere womiy wan jokur kwoŋ jokwor i woth mawan, paka oyido atieko waco ri kere ni Rwoth miyo silwany ŋata geno i go, to go kisangala gi ŋata kwedere kwoŋe aka miyo go gir'acula.
Ameno wariyo gi kwayo Were wokwonga wan, aka go odwoko kwayo mawan.
An, Ezira, ayero jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam apar g'ario, Serebia, Hasabia, gi wade pajo apar.
Kenyo apima feza, zahabu, gi gigipiny ma kere, jomic rieko pere gi jodhum pere, gi Joisiraili oyido jomiyo ma oro i Ot pa Were, aka amiyo jo.
Apima lim paka amiyo jo aka onwaŋo nitie marom ama: Tan piero ario g'ario ma feza, gigipiny 100 ma feza kilo piero ario, zahabu kilo 3,400
atewe ma zahabu kilo 8.4 g'acero ario ma ywel m'oyuy, ma cwe mere rom gi cwe mar'acero ma zahabu.
Awaco rijo ni, “Wibedo ji maleŋ ri Rwoth, aka gigipiny me leŋ, feza gi zahabu me obedo mic m'omiy Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin.
Kur win jo maber cuka witundo i Ot pa Were. Pima win kenyo i kisika pa jocway ri Were i wi migam aka wikethi i cingi jotel pajo gi apa Jolevi, gi jotel pa Joisiraili i Yerusalem.”
Ameno jocway ri Were i wi migam gi Jolevi joyeyo tic ma tero gigipiny me i Ot pa Were i Yerusalem.
Kenyo waeye i jangi malawa ma Ahava k'apar g'ario ma dwe marapena kadho i Yerusalem. Were mawan oyido nitie gi wan aka ogwoko wan kwoŋ kisinye pa jokwor mawan gi jokinyaga paka wawotho.
Munyo watundo i Yerusalem, waywomere ma ndelo adek.

I ndelo mar'aŋwen wakadho i Ot pa Were, wapima feza, zahabu, gi gigipiny je, aka wamiyo Meremoth jacway ri Were i wi migam, wod Uriya. Go oyido nitie gi Eliazar wod Finehas gi Jolevi, Yozabad wod Yesuwa gi Nowadia wod Binuy.
Gigipiny je okwan aka opima, aka ondiki piny kicutho gi sawa no won.

Kenyo ji je m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec jokelo mic awaŋa paka cowirok ri Were pa Isiraili. Jomiyo thwondhe apar g'ario ri Isiraili, wot rombo piero abuŋwen g'aucel, nyithindhi rombo piero ario g'ario, gi diegi apar g'ario paka mic ma cwako reco pajo.
Jo bende jotero balwa ma kere oyido omiyo jo aka jomiyo jogavana gi jodhum mar'adec ma yuwok ceŋ ma Yufrete, ma bende jomiyo kony pajo ri ji gi Ot pa Were.

Rumacen ma timo gigipiny me, jodhum jobino bongan aka jowaco ran ni, “Joisiraili, jocway ri Were i wi migam, gi Jolevi, jok'okure kwoŋ nonin ma jobedo i lowo me. Jomako kula ma mienirok pa Jokanan, Johiti, Joperiz, Joyebus, Joamon, Jomowab, Jomisir gi Joamor.
Kole cwo Joyuda jonywomo mon jopath, aka onyo kodhi maleŋ oruwere gi ji ma lowo me, aka jotel gi jodhum ama jotelo i tim me.”
Munyo awinjo gime, ayeco woko law paran, aka ajwaco ye wiyan gi ye tikan t'abedo piny i dhier gi rem.
Kenyo jono je ma jokirin ro wac ma Were oyido owaco kwoŋ ngoye g'adieri pa ji m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec jocokere thokan paka abedo piny m'adhier cuka tundo sawa ma miyo cowirok m'othieno.
I sawa ma miyo cowirok m'othieno aay malo wok kam'oyido aywak'iye gi law paran m'oyec, aguro congan piny t'arieyo cingan ri Rwoth Were paran.
Akwayo ni, “Awi Were, anitie gi wickwot madwoŋ swa tiŋo waŋan ruwaŋin. Kole reco mawan odhure bor kalo kiri wiwan, aka komo mawan otundo malo kiri i polo.
