Wok i hongo pa kwarere mawan tundo kiri konon wajoreco m'oasere, aka ro reco mawan wan, kerin mawan, gi jocway ri Were i wi migam mawan wapodho i cingi kerin pa jopath, othum wan, onyaga wan, aka otiŋ wan paka jotwec i wickwot paka kiri pama.
To onyo pama i hongo macek, Rwoth Were mawan, inyutho wan wor, t'iyeyo manok kwoŋ wan both bino bedo i Kabedo Maleŋ me i siem. Were mawan oyawo waŋ wan to miyo wan gonyirok kwoŋ twec.

Kole oyido wabedo ŋecin; kucel Were mawan k'ojwango wan i twec. To go omiyo kere ma Pasia tero wan gi wor aka oyeyo wan geto kendo Ot pa Were, m'oyido odoŋ gunda, gi nwaŋo siem ka i Yuda gi Yerusalem.”
“To onyo pama, Awi Were mawan, wanowaci rin aŋo ma gime je otieko timere? Kole wajwango or perin kendo,
m'imiyo wan luwo kwoŋ ŋecin perin jotuci wac Were. Jowaco riwan ni lowo m'oyido wadonjo bed'iye wok i gike tundo i gike obedo lowo makoc ro tim ma mienirok pa nonin m'oyido jobed'iye.
Jowaco riwan ni wakiri wanywom kosa wanywomere gi jo, kosa wakiri wakony jo i nger moro je ŋey wabedi matek to wacamo bero ma lowo me to waweyo ri nyithindho mawan jowolunji cil gi cil.
To makada nende gigipiny ma cale g'ameno otieko timere riwan i gir'acula ro reco mawan gi komo mawan, waŋeyo ni in, Were mawan, imiyo wan gir'acula mathin loyo m'oyido imiyo wan aka iweyo wan both.
To onyo, waturo or perin kendo aka wanywomo to wanywomere gi ji ma jotimo gim'ikimiti. Adieri ilamako nge t'ireyo wan kicutho m'ongoye ŋata ladoŋ.
Awi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, itimo tiro, iweyo wan both, paka wanitie konon. E watuco reco mawan ruwaŋin, wangoye gi dwoŋ bino ruwaŋin ro gime.”
Korin munyo Ezira oyido okule kwayo ruwaŋ Ot pa Were, kareno ywak aka tuco reco pa Joisiraili, lwak Joisiraili madwoŋ, cwo, mon gi nyithindho jocokere bonge, aka bende joywak gi litho.

Kenyo Sekaniya wod Yehiel, aka nyakwar Elam, owaco ri Ezira ni, “Watuco ni wakibedo g'adieri ri Were mawan, kole wanywomo mon jopath me ma lowo me. To makada nende obedo ameno, Isiraili fodi nitie gi geno.
Onyo weyi watim cikirok gi Were mawan riemo woko mon me je gi nyithindho pajo. Walaluwo rieko ma in gi jono ma jolworo or pa Were mawan winomiy. Walatimo gima cik pa Were waco.
Obedo tic perin timo gima mitere. Walathielin i gim'imito je, bedi gi meni.”
Ameno Ezira oay malo aka omiyo jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi, gi Isiraili je kwoŋirok ni jolatimo gima Sekaniya owaco, ameno jokwoŋere.
Kenyo Ezira oeye woko ruwaŋ Ot pa Were aka okadho peco pa Yehohanan to nindo kenyo. Obedo ma k'ocemo kosa k'omadho pi kwoŋbedo go oyido ywak ri ngoye g'adieri pa ji.
Odhir mikwenda i Yerusalem gi Yuda gipi ni jono je m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec joworomi i Yerusalem
gi cik pa jotel pa ji. Aka ni ŋata k'obino i ndelo adek, ilamako gigipiny pere je, aka kilabedo acel kwoŋ ji m'oyido jodwoko wok i Babilon.

I ndelo adek, ka piero ario ma dwe mar'abuŋwen, cwo je ma jobedo iy'adec ma Yuda gi Benyamin jobino i Yerusalem to jocokere i diedipo ma Ot pa Were. Koth ocwe swa, aka ro ŋico g'atoŋa ma romo kisi dhano oyido kirin.
Kenyo Ezira jacway ri Were i wi migam oay malo to waco rijo ni, “Wituro cik pa Were gi nywomo mon jopath, aka wikelo banja kwoŋ Isiraili.
Onyo, tuci win reco mewin ri Rwoth, Were pa kwarere mewin, aka witim gima sangala go. Pokere win kwoŋ jopath ma jobedo i lowo mawan aka riemi win woko mon mewin ma jobedo jopath.”
Kenyo ji je jodwoko gi dwondi jo malo ni, “Obedo ameno, waripo timo paka iwaco.
To ji jothoth, aka koth cwe, wakinyali cungo kam'othangere, aka me k'obedo tic m'inyalo timo i ndelo acel kosa ario, kwoŋbedo wathothi ma watimo reco me.

Weyi jodhum mawan jowobedi i Yerusalem aka jowotiy kwoŋ wac me. Kenyo kisi ŋata nitie gi dhako ma japath wobin i sawa m'oyik, kanyacel gi jotel gi jothum banja ma tindi madwoŋ me. I nger me Were lacwako to weyo mako gi wan nge ro gime.”
Ongoye ŋat'okwero can me kwanyo woko Yonathan wod Asahel gi Yazeya wod Tikiva, aka Mesulam gi Sabethay Jolevi jothielo jo.
Ameno ji m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec jotimo ameno. Ezira jacway ri Were i wi migam oyero cwo m'oyido jobedo jotel nonin aka ondiko nyingi jo piny. K'acel ma dwe mar'apar jocako kikaŋasa wac me,
aka i dwe adek m'oluwo jonyalo cowo banja pa cwo je m'oyido jonitie gi mon jopath.
Onwaŋ nyikway jocway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido jonywomo mon jopath; kwoŋ nyikway Yesuwa wod Yehozadak gi wutmin go: Maseya, Elieza, Yarib gi Gedalia.
Jociko riemo woko mon pajo, aka jomiyo wod rombo paka cowirok ma cwako reco pajo.
Nyikway Ima: Hanani gi Zabadia
Nyikway Harim: Maseya, Elia, Samaya, Yehiel gi Uziya.
Nyikway Pasur: Eliowenay, Maseya, Isimayil, Nethanel, Yozabad gi Elasa.
Kwoŋ Jolevi obedo: Yozabad, Simey, Kelaya (ma bende ilwoŋo ni Kelita) Pethahia, Yuda gi Elieza.
Kwoŋ jower obedo: Eliasib.
Kwoŋ jokur waŋkac obedo Salum, Telem, gi Uri.
Joman jobedo; wok i nono pa Paros: Ramia, Izia, Malikija, Miyamin, Eliazar, Malikija gi Benaya.
Nyikway Elam: Matania, Zekaria, Yehiel, Abidi, Yeremoth gi Elia
Nyikway Zatu: Eliowenay, Eliasib, Matania, Yeremoth, Zabad gi Aziza.
Nyikway Bebay: Yehohanan, Hanania, Zabay gi Athilay.
Nyikway Bani: Mesulam, Maluk, Adaya, Yasub, Seal gi Yeremoth.
Nyikway Pahath Mowab: Adina, Kelal, Benaya, Maseya, Matania, Bezalel, Binuy gi Manase.
Nyikway Harim: Elieza, Isiya, Malikija, Samaya, Simeo, Benyamin, Maluk gi Semaria.
Nyikway Hasum: Matenay Matata, Zabad, Elifelet, Yeremay, Manase gi Simey.
Nyikway Bani: Maday, Amram, Uwel,
Benaya, Bedeya, Keluhi,
Vania, Meremoth, Eliasib,
Matania, Matenay gi Yasu.
Nyikway Binuy: Simey,
Selemia, Nathan, Adaya,
Makinadebay, Sasay, Saray,
Azarel, Selemia, Semaria,
Salum, Amaria kodi Yozefu.
Nyikway Nebo: Yeyel, Matithia, Zabad, Zebina, Yaday, Yowel gi Benaya.
Cwo me je oyido jonywomo mon jopath, aka joriemo woko mon no gi nyithindho pajo.
Me wac pa Nehemia wod Hakalia. I dwe ma Kislev i oro ma piero ario munyo Aritakises obedo kere ma Pasia, an, Nehemia oyido anitie i tindi madwoŋ Susa
Hanani, acel kwoŋ wutmin an, obino bongan gi cwo mogo wok i Yuda, aka apenjo jo kwoŋ Joyuda m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec gi kwoŋ Yerusalem.
Jodwokan ni, “Ji ma jodwoko wok i twec jonitie gi teko kweth swa aka jonitie i wickwot. Kor ot ma Yerusalem otur aka owaŋ waŋkace mere gi mac.”
Munyo awinjo wac me je, abedo piny t'aywak.
Aywak aka ariyo kec ma ndelo m'oromo, kareno akwayo Were ma i polo.
Awaco ni, “Awi Rwoth Were ma i polo, idwoŋ aka walworin. Ikuro cikirok perin gi mar perin makiwire ri jono ma jomarin aka jokuro or perin;
ciki ithin, aka ŋiyan iwinji kwayo pa ŋeca perin m'akwayo wor g'odieceŋ ri Joisiraili me. Watuco reco mawan, wan Joisiraili. An gi peco pa baba watimo reco.
Watimo gikidakana kwoŋin aka wakitimo paka or perin waco. Wakikuro cik m'imiyo wan luwo kwoŋ Musa, ŋeca perin.
Poyi wac m'iwaco ri Musa ni, ‘Ka winongoye g'adieri ran, alakedho win i dier nonin man.
To ka winowire bongan timo paka or paran waco, aladwoko win i kabedo m'ayero ni wolaman'iye, makada nende obedi ni wikedhere kiri i gike piny.’ ”
“Rwoth, me obedo ŋecin perin, ji perin won. Ibotho jo gi meni perin madwoŋ gi cingin matek.
Awi Rwoth, ciki ithin iwinji kwayo pa ŋeca perin gi ŋecin perin je ma jofore i lworo nyingin. Miyan loyo konon me, ŋey kere wobedi ran gi wor.”
I hongo no oyido abedo jakonji ri kere vini.
I dwe ma Nisan i oro piero ario ma dhum pa Kere Aritakises, atero rigo vini. Kere oyido fodi k'oneno ka waŋan ongoye gi siem ruwaŋe.
Ameno kere openjan ni, “Raŋo waŋin ongoye siem, kucel k'obedo ni itwo? Ripo bedo ni ingoye gi kisangala.” Kenyo oyido apoŋ gi lworo swa
aka adwoko kere ni, “Weyi kere paran woyindira! Waŋan obedi nedi gi siem, munyo tindi madwoŋ, kam'oyik'iye kwarere paran odoŋ gunda aka waŋkace mere mac oreyo woko?”
Kenyo kere openjan ni, “Kwac perin aŋo?”
Ameno akwayo Were ma i polo,
aka awaco ri kere ni, “K'inen sangala kere, aka k'inen ŋeca perin onwaŋo wor ruwaŋin, akwayin ioran i Yuda, tindi madwoŋ kam'oyik'iye kwarere paran, ŋey anyal geto kendo.”
Kere openjan ni, “Ilacowo koro hongo aŋo aka iladwoko keraŋo?” I sawa no nyamicala oyido obedo i kabuti kere.
Kenyo awaco ri kere ni, “K'inen sangala kere, weyi womiyan balwin ri jogavana mar'adec ma yupodho ceŋ ma Yufrete, ma yeyan woth cuka atundo i Yuda;
kodi balwa man ri Asaf, jakur lul pa kere, ma miyo go or miyan mbawo ma geto waŋkace gi kor tindi madwoŋ, gi ot paran ma nindo.” Kere omiyan gigipiny m'akway je, kwoŋbedo Were oyido nitie kodan.
Kenyo abino bongi jogavana ma yupodho ceŋ ma Yufrete, aka amiyo jo balwin ma kere ondiko. Onyo kere oyido omiyan jotel jolweny gi jogwey kayinin kwaŋan.
To munyo Sanbalat ma wok i Bethhoron, gi Tobia, jadhum mar'adec ma Amon jowinjo gime, k'osangala jo swa neno ni nitie ŋat'oyido obino rango bero pa Joisiraili.
Ameno akadho i Yerusalem, aka ma ndelo adek
akiwaco ri dhano gima Were oyido oketho i cunyan timo ri Yerusalem. Ogwaŋ ma watero kende obedo punda m'oyido agweyo.
Kenyo aay malo wor gi Waŋkac ma Milelo kalo Waŋ pi pa Bulir kiri i Waŋkac ma Woyo. Akaŋasa kor tindi madwoŋ m'oyido otur gi waŋkace ma mac oyido owaŋo woko.
Kenyo amedere kiri i Waŋkac ma Kidiwa kiri i Kabuko pi pa kere, to yo oyido ongoye m'ogwaŋ m'oyido agweyo nyalo luwo.
Ameno aloro piny aka aluwo i milelo wor t'akaŋasa kor ot. Kenyo awire t'adonjo gi Waŋkac ma Milelo, t'adwoko.
Ongoye kwoŋ jodhum ma tindi madwoŋ m'oŋeyo kam'oyido akadh'iye kosa gim'oyido atimo; kole oyido fodi akiwaco ri Joyuda, jocway ri Were i wi migam, jotel, jodhum, gi joman m'oyido joripo timo tic.
Kenyo awaco rijo ni, “Wineno teko ma wanit'iye, nger ma Yerusalem odoŋ gunda aka waŋkace mere owaŋ! Biye win, weyi wageti kendo kor ot ma Yerusalem, ŋey wickwot me worum.”
Awaco rijo nger ma Were oyido nitie kodan aka okonyan, gi gima kere oyido owaco ran.
Jodwoko ni, “Weyi wacak geto kendo!” Ameno wegi jomiyere cako tic.
To munyo Sanbalat Jahoron, Tobia ŋeca, Joamon gi Jamwarabu m'ilwoŋo ni Gesem jowinjo gim'oyido wacano timo, jonyero wan aka jowaco ni, “Wiparo ni witimo aŋo? Wilagwenyere kwoŋ kere?”
Adwoko jo ni, “Were ma i polo ama lamiyo wan loyo. Wabedo ŋecin pere, aka wakidho cako geto; to win wingoye gi dwoŋ kwoŋ lim ma Yerusalem je, aka wingoye g'adec i thenethene mere.”

Kenyo Eliasib jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam jocako tic gi jocway ri Were i wi migam wadi aka jogeto kendo Waŋkac ma Rombo. Joloko maleŋ tundo kiri i Acurcur ma Miya tundo kiri i Acurcur ma Hananel.
Aka cwo ma jowok Yeriko jogeto adec ma luwo.
Zakur wod Imiri ogeto adec ma luwo.
Wot Hasena jogeto Waŋkac ma Rec. Joketho miango mere gi thigin i kabedo, aka joketho peta gi nywenye ma cego.
Meremoth, wod Uriya nyakwar Hakoz, ogeto adec ma luwo.
Mesulam, wod Berekia aka nyakwar Mesezabel ogeto adec ma luwo.
Zadok wod Bana ogeto adec ma luwo.
Cwo ma jowok Tekowa jogeto adec ma luwo, to jodongo ma tindi jokwero timo tic acingi ma rwodhe pajo jomiyo jo.
Yoyada wod Paseya gi Mesulam wod Besodeya jogeto kendo Waŋkac ma Yesana. Joketho miango mere, thigin, petin gi nywenye ma cego.
Melatia ma wok Gibeon, Yadon ma wok Meronoth, gi cwo ma jowok i Gibeon gi Mizipa jogeto adec ma luwo, tundo kiri peco pa gavana ma yupodho ceŋ ma Yufrete.
Uziel wod Harhaya, jacwogi gigipiny gi nywenye, ogeto adec ma luwo.
Hanania jayiki mo maŋwe kur ogeto adec ma luwo meno, aka otundo kiri i Kor ot ma woko mere.
Refaya wod Hur, m'oyido dhumo adec Yerusalem, ogeto adec ma luwo.
Yedaya wod Harumaf ogeto adec ma luwo, m'oyido cegin gi ot pere.
Hatus wod Hasabineya ogeto adec ma luwo.
Malikija wod Harim gi Hasub wod Pahath Mowab ogeto adec ma luwo gi Acurcur Oven.
Salum wod Halohes, m'oyido dhumo adec Yerusalem man ogeto adec ma luwo. (Nyir pere jokonyo go gi tic.)
Hanun gi ji ma jobedo i tindi madwoŋ Zanowa jogeto kendo Waŋkac ma Milelo. Joketho thigin mere i kabedo, petin gi nywenye ma cego waŋkac, aka joyiko kore mere mita 440 tundo kiri i Waŋkac ma Woyo.
Malikija wod Rekab, jadhum mar'adec ma Beth Hakerem, ogeto kendo Waŋkac ma Woyo. Oketho thigin mere i kabedo, petin gi nywenye ma cego waŋkac.

Salum wod Kolhoze, jadhum mar'adec ma Mizipa, ogeto kendo Waŋkac ma Kidiwa; oumo royo mere, oketho thigin i kabedo, petin gi nywenye. Go ogeto kor ot macegin gi ndelo pa kere i kidiwa ma Sela, tundo kiri i madala ma kadho piny wok i tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi.
Nehemia wod Azibuk, jadhum mar'adec ma Bethzur, ogeto adec ma luwo, tundo kiri i kaliel pa Daudi, kabuko pi gi ot pa jolweny.
Me Jolevi ma jogeto adec man ma kor ot.
Rehum wod Bani ogeto adec ma luwo.
Hasabia, jadhum mar'adec ma Keila ogeto adec ma luwo i nyingi ji mar'adec pere.
Bavay wod Henadad, jadhum mar'adec ma Keila ogeto adec ma luwo.
Eza wod Yesuwa, jadhum ma Mizipa, ogeto adec ma luwo ruwaŋ kakano gilweny, tundo kiri kama kor ot gonder'iye gine.
Baruk wod Zabay ogeto adec ma luwo, tundo kiri i dhiot ma ot pa Eliasib jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Meremoth wod Uriya aka nyakwar Hakoz, ogeto adec ma luwo, tundo kiri i gike ma ot pa Eliasib.
Me jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jogeto adec man ma kor ot.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jowok thoko Yerusalem jogeto adec ma luwo.
Benyamin gi Hasub jogeto adec ma luwo, m'oyido nitie ruwaŋ udi pajo.
Azaria, wod Maseya aka nyakwar Anania, ogeto adec ma luwo m'oyido nitie ruwaŋ ot pere.
Binuy wod Henadad ogeto adec ma luwo, wok i ot pa Azaria tundo i sonda ma kor ot.
Palal wod Uzay ogeto kendo adec ma luwo, m'ocako i sonda ma kor ot gi acurcur ma ot pa kere ma malo cegin gi kabedo pa jakur.
Pedaya wod Paros ogeto adec ma luwo,
tundo kiri kama jotic ma Ot pa Were jobed'iye m'oyido cegin gi tindi madwoŋ Ofel gi kam'obedo tirtir gi Waŋkac ma Waŋ pi yuwok ceŋ gi acurcur ma umo Ot pa Were.
Cwo ma jowok Tekowa jogeto adec ma luwo, aka oyido obedo adec pajo mar'ario, wok kam'obedo tirtir gi acurcur malac ma umo Ot pa Were tundo kiri i kor ot macegin gi Ofel.
Kitipa pa jocway ri Were i wi migam jogeto adec ma luwo, wok yumalo ma Waŋkac ma Kayina, kisi dhano ogeto ruwaŋ ot pere won.
Zadok wod Imer ogeto adec ma luwo, m'oyido nitie ruwaŋ ot pere.
Samaya wod Sekaniya, jakur ma Waŋkac ma yuwok ceŋ, ogeto adec ma luwo.
Hanania wod Selemia gi Hanun, wod Zalaf mar'aucel, jogeto adec ma luwo, m'obedo adec pajo mar'ario.
Mesulam wod Berekia ogeto adec ma luwo, m'oyido nitie ruwaŋ ot pere.
Malikija, jacwogi gigipiny gi cuma, ogeto adec ma luwo, tundo kiri i geto ma jotic ma Ot pa Were gi jomitan jooro, m'oyido cegin gi Waŋkac ma Mifkad, cegin gi kisika ma malo i sonda.
Jocwogi gigipiny gi nyweny gi jomitan jogeto adec macowe, wok i kisika manitie i sonda tundo kiri i Waŋkac pa Rombo.
Munyo Sanbalat owinjo ni Joyuda oyido jogeto kendo kor ot, omako nge swa aka ocako yeto jo.
Go owaco ruwaŋ wadi gi jolweny ma Samaria ni, “Aŋo ma Joyuda ma josisiri me joparo ni jotimo? Jogeti kendo tindi madwoŋ? Jomiy cowirok? Jocow gi ndelo acel? Jogol telin m'owaŋ m'odhure i yuk?”
Tobia ma wok Amon oyido ocungo kabuti Sanbalat aka owaco ni, “Kor ot ma tele ma jogeto no kada kibwe je k'oidho i wiye nyalo turo piny!”
To an Nehemia akwayo Were ni, “Awi Were mawan, winji, icayo wan, wir yet pajo kwoŋ jo wegi. Weyi wonyaga gigipiny ma jonigine je, aka weyi woter jo paka jotwec i lowo pa jopath.
Ikir'icwaki rijo raco ma jotimo aka wiyin wokiri wowil gi reco pajo; kole joyeto wan ma wageto.”
Ameno wageto kendo kor ot, aka wariwo adec mere je kanyacel tundo kiri i kore, kole ji oyido jonitie gi kinen ma tic.
Sanbalat, Tobia gi Jowarabu, Joamon, gi Joasdod jowinjo ni oyido wakadho malo gi yiko kor ot aka ni oyido waculo hoŋere mere, to jomako nge swa.
Ameno joje jotimo can bino monjo Yerusalem gi kelo nywowirok.
To wakwayo Were mawan aka waketho cwo kuro wor g'odieceŋ.
Korin ji ma Yuda oyido jowero ni,
“Walokere manyap gi tiŋo bieto,
Yuk odhure kweth ma kikwanyere.
Wakinyali geto kor ot.”
Jokwor mawan jowaco ni, “Jokilaŋeyo kosa neno gima timere cuka watundo bongi jo to waneko jo to wacungo tic pajo.”
To Joyuda m'oyido jobedo cegin gi jokwor mawan jobedo ka jobino gwoko wan noknok kwoŋ can pa jokwor mawan m'oyido jotimo kwoŋ wan.
Ameno amiyo ji gilweny, abore g'aserin, aka aketho jo cungo kwoŋ nonin yucen ma kor ot kisi kam'oyido fodi oŋamer'iye gine.

Rumacen munyo atieko ŋiyo gime, aay malo aka awaco ri jotel, jodhum gi ji je ni, “Wikiri wilwor jo. Poyi win ni Rwoth dwoŋ aka go kelo lworo. Riameno lweny win ri wade mewin, nyithindho, mon gi pecin mewin.”
Jokwor mawan jowinjo ni oyido watieko niaŋ kwoŋ can pajo, aka ni Were onyeko woko can pajo, wajoje wagiki, kisi dhano i tic pere ma geto kor ot.
Wok i ndelo no, adec ma jotic paran jobedo kareno jogeto, aka adec joruko gilweny, abore, kwote g'aserin paka jokur. Jotel mawan je jomiyo kony pajo je ri ji
m'oyido jogeto kendo kor ot. Kiri jono m'oyido jotiŋo gi geto jotiyo gi cingi jo acel aka cingi jo man otiŋo gilweny.
Kisi jageto okoda abor pere i piere. Jacwo ma kudho gwara oyido obedo kabutan.
Awaco ri ji gi jodhum pajo gi jotel ni, “Tic dwoŋ aka oyware, aka wanitie bor gi joman.
Ka wiwinjo gwara, cokere win thokan. Were mawan lalweny riwan.”
Ameno kisi ndelo, ka piny yawere tundo ka piny yutho, adec kwoŋ wan jobedo ka jotiyo kwoŋ kor ot, aka adec man oyido jokuro g'abore.
Akwayo cwo ma jokur gi jotic pajo bedo i Yerusalem ŋey jowokuri wor. Ameno jokuro tindi madwoŋ wor aka jotiyo odieceŋ.
Ameno ongoye kwoŋ wan ŋat'olunyo nangin pere; kisi dhano otiŋo gilweny pere i cinge maracuc.
Onyo ji jobedo gi ywak madwoŋ swa kwoŋ Joyuda m'oyido jobedo jotel.
Kole nitie jono ma jowaco ni, “Wanitie gi peco malac, waripo limo ŋano ma pidhirok.”
Oyido nitie jono bende ma jowaco ni, “Wasinga ndelin mawan gi ndelin vini gi udi mawan nyaka wanyal limo ŋano i hongo ma kec.”
Aka oyido nitie jono ma jowaco ni, “Wakopa pesa ma culo misolo pa kere i ndelin mawan gi ndelin vini mawan.

Wabedo Joyuda paka jo bende, aka nyithindho mawan bende jobedo ji paka nyithindho pajo; kucel joriyo nyithindho mawan bedo ŋecin. Nyir mawan megi otiek kitana woko jo paka ŋecin. Wangoye gi kony kwoŋbedo omay wan ndelin mawan gi ndelin vini mawan.”
Munyo an, Nehemia awinjo ywak pajo gi kiŋunyaŋunya pajo, amako nge swa.
Munyo atieko paro kwoŋ gime, akelo banja kwoŋ jotel gi jodhum, aka awaco rijo ni, “Winyalo nedi miyo ji mewin won culo magowa?”
Kenyo alwoŋo cokirok pa ji aka asegeya jo.
Awaco rijo ni, “Paka wanyalo, wanyewo woko ji mawan m'oyido otana i twec. To win ee, kendo witana megi kwoŋ jo aka wanyew!” Jodhum gi jotel jok'otuco wac, kwoŋbedo oyido joŋeyo ni obedo adieri.
Amedo waco ni, “Gima witimo me okom! Wiripo winjo Were to witimo gim'otire ŋey wikiri wimiy nonin ma jobedo jokwor mawan jowoyet wan.
Wade paran, merin paran gi an bende oyido wakopa ji pesa gi ŋano, to, wakiripi kendo kibanja cul.
Onyo dwoki win rijo, konon won me, ndelin pajo, ndelin vini pajo, ndelin oliv gi udi pajo, magowa ma pesa, ŋano, vini gi mo m'oyido wikwanyo wok bongi jo.”
Jotel jodwoko ni, “Waladwoko gigipiny je aka wakilakibanja kendo. Walatimo paka iwaco.”
Aka alwoŋo jocway ri Were i wi migam t'amiyo jotel kwoŋirok, timo paka jowaco.
Kenyo agonyo dende m'oyido atweyo i pieran t'ayengo aka awaco ni, “Ameno weyi Were woyengi woko ŋata k'okuro cikirok pere. Were lamayin udi gi lim perin je t'idoŋ nono.”
Ji m'oyido jonitie i cokirok je jodwoko ni, “Obedi ameno.” Jopako Rwoth aka jotel jokuro cikirok pajo.

Wok i hongo m'oyido abed'iye gavana ma Yuda, wok i oro piero ario ma dhum pa Kere Aritakises, tundo i oro piero adek g'ario ma dhum pere, ongoye kwoŋ an kosa wade paran ŋat'ocamo cemo m'oyido obedo apa gavana.

Jogavana ma jotelo dhumo ran oyido joketho bieto mapek kwoŋ ji, to jomiyo jo culo penzi feza piero aŋwen kisi ndelo ma cemo gi vini pajo. Kiri ŋecin pajo je oyido jodiyo ji. To, akitimo ameno, kwoŋbedo oyido alworo Were.
Adieri, amiyere ri tic ma geto kendo kor ot aka akilimo lim kad'acel. Kisi ŋat'oyido tiyo ran bende otimo ameno.
Noknok oyido apidho Joyuda 150 gi jotel pajo, medo i wi ji m'oyido jobino bongan wok i piny man m'othoko wan.
Kisi ndelo athumo thwon, rombo aucel mabeyo, gwendi kweth, aka kisi k'apar orumo apoko vini mandiko. To oyido aŋeyo bieto mapek ma ji oyido jotiŋo, ameno akikwayo cul ma gavana oyido ripo nwaŋo.
Awi Were paran, poyi gigipiny je m'atieko timo ri ji me, ri bero paran.
Onyo okow ri Sanbalat, Tobia gi Gesem gi jokwor mawan je ni oyido watieko geto kor ot aka waculo kisi kamoro, makada nende oyido fodi wakiketho thigin i waŋkace.
Sanbalat gi Gesem jodhiro ran mikwenda ni arom gi jo iy'acel kwoŋ loka ma milelo ma Ono. Me oyido obedo rieko pajo ma timo ran gimarac.
Ameno aoro jomikwenda waco rijo ni, “Atimo tic madwoŋ aka akinyali bino piny koro. Akinyali cungo tic, ro nyaka bino romo gi win.”
Jodhiro ran mikwenda acel diŋwen, aka amiyo jo radwok acel no won.
I nger acel Sanbalat odhiro ran ŋeca pere gi mikwenda mar'abic, gi balwa ma k'omwon.
Ondik'iye ni, “Nitie wac pokopoko ma winjere i dier nonin ni in gi Joyuda wimito gwenyirok, aka am'omiyo wigeto kendo kor ot, kwoŋbedo imito bedo kere. Aka Gesem bende waco ni obedo adieri.
Iketho kiri jotuci wac Were i Yerusalem, waco ni pama ibedo kere ma Yuda. Iŋeyo paka kere ma Pasia lawinjo kwoŋ gime, riameno ber warom ŋey waluw kwoŋ gime.”
Adhiro rigo radwok ni, “Ongoye kwoŋ gim'iwaco no m'obedo adieri. Meno gima in won icwogo i paro perin.”
Oyido jotemo bwoko wan ŋey tic wocungi. To akwayo Were womiyan meni.

Ndelo acel munyo akidho i ot pa Samaya wod Delaya aka nyakwar Mehetabel, m'oyido kinyal wok i ot pere. Go owaco ran ni, “Weyi wakadhi wapondi i Kabedo Maleŋ i Ot pa Were aka wacegi thigin, kole ibino nekin, adieri, wor me jobino nekin.”
To adwoko go ni, “Akibedo kite ŋata ŋweco to pondo. Iparo ni anyalo temo botho kwo paran gi pondo i Ot pa Were? Akibino timo gino.”
Kenyo aniaŋ aka aneno ni Were oyido k'ooro go, to Tobia gi Sanbalat am'oyido jonyewo go thumo ran rieko.
Jonyewo go ri atoŋa me, bwokan gi miyan timo reco, kwoŋbedo oyido jomito nyeko nyingan.
Kenyo akwayo Were ni, “Awi Were paran, poyi gima Sanbalat gi Tobia jotimo aka imiy jo gir'acula. Poyi dhako no Nowadia gi jotuci wac Were man je ma jotemo bwokan.”
Ameno geto kendo kor ot orumo ka piero ario g'abic i dwe ma Elul
Munyo jokwor mawan i piny m'othoko wan je jowinjo gime, jobedo gi lworo, kole joniaŋ ni tic me orumo gi kony pa Were mawan.
Aka kiri i hongo me je jotel ma Yuda jondiko balwin ri Tobia, aka Tobia bende ondiko rijo.
Kole ji madit i Yuda oyido jonitie i thenge pere, kwoŋbedo go oyido obedo or Sekaniya wod Ara; aka wode Yehohanan oyido onywomo nyar Mesulam wod Berekia.
Ji oyido jowaco ran tim pa Tobia maber, aka oyido jokowo rigo wac paran je. Ameno Tobia obedo ka dhiro ran balwin, ma temo bwokan.
Onyo geto kor ot kendo orumo, okethi waŋkace, aka jokur ma waŋkace, jower, gi Jolevi je omiy jo tic.
Amiyo omin an Hanani gi Hanania jamituka ma tindi madwoŋ kuro Yerusalem. Hanania oyido obedo jacwo ma genere aka lworo Were loyo ji kweth.

Awaco rijo ni jokiri jowoyaw waŋkace ma Yerusalem odikin cuka ceŋ liel aka jowocegi othieno kafodi jokur jok'oeye tic. Awaco rijo bende yero jokur i dier ji m'oyido jobedo i Yerusalem jowokethi jo i kabedo m'opokere opokere kuro gi man ma jowotho kikaŋasa udi pajo.
Yerusalem oyido obedo tindi madwoŋ malac aka oyare, to ji m'oyido jobed'iye oyido jonok aka oyido oget'iye udi manok.
Kenyo Were omiyan paro ma coko jodhum gi jotel gi ji je rango nonin pajo. Aka anwaŋo kitawo m'oyido ondik'iye nonin pa ji ma jopen dwoko, aka me a gim'ondik'iye.
Me ji ma jowok i twec i Babilon to jodok i Yerusalem gi Yuda, kisi dhano i tindi pere. Pecin pajo oyido jobedo i Babilon wok cuka Kere Nebukadineza kadhi gi jo paka jotwec.
Jotel pajo jobedo Zerubabel, Yesuwa, Nehemia, Seraya, Relaya, Modekay, Bilsan, Mispar, Bigvay, Rehum, kodi Bana.
Me a nyingi Joyuda ma jodwoko:
Nyikway Paros, 2,172.
Nyikway Sefatiya, 372.
Nyikway Ara, 652
Nyikway Pahath Mowab (nyikway Yesuwa gi Yowab) 2,818.
Nyikway Elam, 1,254.
Nyikway Zatu, 845.
Nyikway Zakay, 760.
Nyikway Binuy, 648.
Nyikway Bebay, 628.
Nyikway Azigadi, 2,322.
Nyikway Adonikam, 667.
Nyikway Bigvay, 2,067.
Nyikway Adin, 655.
Nyikway Ater (ma bende ilwoŋo ni Hezekia) 98.
Nyikway Hasum, 328.
Nyikway Bezay, 324.
Nyikway Harif, 112
Nyikway Gibar, 95.
Wok i tindi Bethelehem, ji 188.
Wok i tindi Anathoth, ji 128. Wok i tindi Netofa, ji 56.
Wok i tindi Azimaveth, 42.
Wok i tindi Kiriath Yerim, Kefira, gi Beroth, ji 743.
Wok i tindi Rama gi Geba, ji 621.
Wok i tindi Mikmas, ji 122.
Wok i tindi Bethel gi Ay, ji 123.
Wok i tindi Nebo man ji 52
Wok i tindi Elam man, ji 1,254.
Wok i tindi Harim, ji 320.
Wok i tindi Yeriko, ji 345.
Wok i tindin Lod, Hadid gi Ono, ji 721
Wok i tindi Sena, ji 3,930.
Me a jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jodwoko: Nyikway Yedaya, ma ot pa Yesuwa, 973.
Nyikway Imer, 1,052.
Nyikway Pasur, 1,247.
Nyikway Harim, 1,017.
Me Jolevi ma jodwoko wok i twec: Nyikway Yesuwa, Kadmiel gi Hodavia, 74.
Jower ma Ot pa Were (nyikway Asaf) 148.
Jokur ma Ot pa Were (Nyikway Salum, Ater, Talmon, Akub, Hatita, gi Sobay) 138.
Me nono pa jotic ma Ot pa Were ma jodwoko wok i twec: Ziha, Hasufa, Tabayoth,
Keros, Sia, Padon,
Lebana, Hagaba, Salimay,
Hanan, Gidel, Gahar,
Reaya, Rezin, Nekoda,
Gazam, Uza, Paseya,
Besay, Menui, Nefusesim,
Bakbuk, Hakufa, Harhur,
Bazlith, Mehida, Harsa,
Barkos, Sisera, Tema,
Nezia, gi Hatifa.
Me nono pa ŋecin pa Solomon ma nyikway jo, jodwoko wok i twec: Sotai, Sofereth, Perida,
Jala, Darkon, Gidel,
Sefatiya, Hatil, Pokereth Hazebayim, gi Ami.
Welo pa jotic ma Ot pa Were gi nyikway ŋecin pa Solomon ma jodwoko wok i twec je oyido obedo 392.
Kitipa man m'oyido jowok i tindin ma Telmela, Telharsa, Kerub, Adon, gi Imer, jodwoko i Yerusalem, makada nende oyido jok'onyalo ŋeyo ni oyido jobedo nyikway Joisiraili.
Kitipa me oyido jobedo nyikway Delaya, Tobia, gi Nekoda, jo je ji 642.
Me nonin pa Jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jodwoko i Yerusalem: Hobaya, Hakoz, gi Barzilay. (Barzilay me oyido onywomo nyakwar Barzilay ma wok i Giliad, aka otero nyingi cege ma peco pajo)
Jome jodwaro nyingi jo kam'ondik'iye nyingi ji aka jok'onwaŋo, riameno k'oyey jo tic paka jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Gavana ma Yuda owaco rijo ni jokiripi camo cemo pa jocway ri Were i wi migam cuka obedi jacway ri Were i wi migam m'openji Rwoth kwoŋ wac no gi Urim kodi Thumim.
Ameno ji je ma jodwoko i Yuda wok i twec oyido romo 42,360
medo i wi ŋecin 7,337 jower 245 mon gi cwo.
Jodwoko gi kayinin 736 punde 245
ŋamin 435 gi punde 6,720.
Onyo megi kwoŋ jotel ma nonin jomiyo mic ma geto kendo Ot pa Were. Gavana won omiyo kilo aboro ma zahabu, galaya piero abic, gi law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam 530.
Aka jotel megi kwoŋ jotel jomiyo kilo 168 ma zahabu gi kilo 1,250 ma feza.
Ji man je jomiyo kilo 168 ma zahabu, kilo 140 ma feza gi law pa jocway ri Were i wi migam piero aucel g'ario.
Ameno jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi, jokur ma Ot pa Were, jower, ji ma kisi ndelo, jotic ma Ot pa Were gi ji je jogeto i tindin gi tindin madongo i Yuda, i dwe mar'abirio pajo.

I dwe mar'abirio Joisiraili je jobedo i tindin pajo. K'acel ma dwe no joje jocokere kanyacel i Yerusalem i kapido ruwaŋ Waŋkac ma Waŋ pi. Jokwayo Ezira, jafonji ma Cik, aka jandiko kelo kitawo m'ondik'iye Cik pa Musa, ma Rwoth oyido omiyo Joisiraili.
Ameno Ezira okelo kama ji oyido jocoker'iye, cwo, mon gi nyithindho m'oyido jonitie gi niaŋ.
Ezira osoma Cik pa Musa wok odikin tundo sawa aucel, aka ji je oyido jociko ithi jo winjo.

Ezira oyido ocungo i wi kituti m'otimi gi mbawo ri atoŋa me. Me cwo m'oyido jocungo yuracuc pere: Matithia, Sema, Anaya, Uriya, Hilikia, gi Maseya. Aka yuracam pere oyido ocungo: Pedaya, Misael, Malikija, Hasum, Hasbadana, Zekaria, gi Mesulam.
Paka Ezira ocungo malo i wi kituti, ji je joriko waŋ jo kwoŋe. Tekin go yawo kitawo ni, ji je joay malo.
Ezira owaco ni, “Rwoth, Were madwoŋ wopak!”
Ji je jotiŋo cingi jo malo i koyo aka jodwoko ni, “Obedi ameno! Obedi ameno!” Jokule piny to jolamo gi nyim jo piny i lowo.
Rumacen ji joay malo to jocungo, aka Jolevi me jokonyo jo niaŋ Cik: Yesuwa, Bani, Serebia, Jamin, Akub, Sabethay, Hodia, Maseya, Kelita, Azaria, Yozabad, Hanan, gi Pelaya.
Josoma cik pa Were ka jowiro ri ji i dhodhok m'oyido jonyalo niaŋ maber.

Nehemia m'oyido obedo gavana, Ezira jacway ri Were i wi migam aka jafonji ma Cik gi Jolevi m'oyido jowiro ri ji cik jowaco ri ji ni, wikiri wiywak rupiri ndelo me obedo ndelo maleŋ ri Rwoth Were mewin. Ato ji oyido joywak munyo jowinjo gima Cik waco.

Nehemia owaco ri ji ni, “Kadhi win yo mewin, cami win cemo aka wimadhi vini to wipoko ji ma jongoye gine. Konon me obedo ndelo maleŋ ri Rwoth Were mawan, aka wikiri wikumi. Kole kisangala pa Rwoth obedo meni mewin.”
Jolevi jorendo ji ka jowaco ni, “Liŋ win ywak, kole konon obedo ndelo maleŋ, wikiri wikumi.”
Ameno ji jodok pecin pajo, jocemo to jomedho aka jopoko wadi jo m'oyido jongoye gine, kwoŋbedo oyido joniaŋ cik m'osoma rijo.
Yawere jotel nonin, kanyacel gi jocway ri Were i wi migam gi Jolevi, jokidho bongi Ezira fonjirok Cik.
Kenyo joniaŋ wok i Cik, ma Rwoth omiyo Musa ni, Rwoth omiyo Joisiraili cik bedo i kayindi i hongo ma kalima ma dwe mar'abirio ma oro.
Aka bende joripo waco i tindin pajo je gi Yerusalem ni, “Kadhi win i tendere wijaki jangi yen ma boke pajo nyabokependi ma gero kayindi paka ondiki i Cik.”
Ameno ji jojako jangi yen aka jogeto kayindi pajo, megi i wi udi pajo, i diedipo pajo gi i diedipo ma Ot pa Were, gi karomo ruwaŋ Waŋkac ma Waŋ pi gi Waŋkac pa Efrayim.
Ji je m'oyido jodwoko wok i twec jogero kayindi aka jobed'iye. Me oyido obedo ma dicel jo timo ameno wok i hongo pa Yesuwa wod Nun, aka kisi dhano ofore gi kisangala.
Wok i ndelo marapena ma kalima tundo i ndelo macowe jobedo ka josoma adec wok i Cik pa Were kisi ndelo. Jotimo kalima ma ndelo abirio, aka i ndelo mar'aboro jotimo kalima ma cego paka Cik waco.
Onyo ka piero ario g'aŋwen ma dwe mar'abirio ji oyido jocokere joriyo kec i kutiyin to jowiro i wi jo fukefuke ma nyutho rem.
Joisiraili jopokere kwoŋ jopath, aka jocungo to jotuco reco pajo gi reco pa kwarere pajo.
Ma sawa ma romo adek josoma Cik pa Rwoth Were pajo, aka ma sawa ma romo adek kendo jotuco reco pajo to jolamo Rwoth Were pajo.
Kenyo Yesuwa, Bani, Kadmiel, Sebania, Buni, Serebia, Bani gi Kenan jocungo i wi kituti pa Jolevi aka joywak gi dwondi gin malo ri Rwoth Were pajo.
Kenyo Jolevi, Yesuwa, Kadmiel, Bani, Hasabineya, Serebia, Hodia, Sebania, gi Pethahia jowaco ni,
“Ay win malo wipak Rwoth Were mewin,
pak win go cil gi cil.
Weyi kisi dhano wopak nyingi go madwoŋ,
makada nende go dwoŋ loyo pak pa dhano.”
Kenyo ji jokwayo ama:
“In kende, ibedo Rwoth,
icweyo polo gi micalin je.
Icweyo lowo gi nam gi cwec ma jokwo i joje,
imiyo joje kwo.
Waŋceŋ, dwe gi micalin je jolamin.
iwodho go wok i Ur i Babilon,
aka iwiro nyinge ni Abraham.
aka itimo gi go cikirok.
Iciko miyo go lowo ma Kanan,
lowo pa Johiti, Joamor,
Joperiz, Joyebus, gi Jogirigas,
bedo lowo pa nyikwaye.
Onyo ikuro cikirok me,
kwoŋbedo itimo adieri.”
iwinjo ywak pajo ri kony i Nam M'obokere.
jodhum pere gi ji ma lowo pere,
kwoŋbedo oyido iŋeyo nger ma jodiy'iye ji perin.
Aka ilimo dwoŋ tundo gunyo ni.
aka itelo jo i lowo m'othwo.
Jono m'oyido joriemo jo jomunyere i pi maluth,
paka tele luthere i nam.
aka wor imenyo rijo gi siro ma mac.
aka imiyo jo Or gi fonji maber.
Ifonjo jo kuro Sabato maleŋ,
aka imiyo jo Cik luwo kwoŋ ŋeca perin Musa.”
gi pi wok i tele munyo riyo oneko jo.
Iwaco rijo mako lowo,
m'oyido iciko jo.
aka jokwero winjo cik perin.
gi gir'aura m'oyido itieko timo.
I noro pajo joyero jatel
dwoko jo i twec i Misir.
To ibedo Were ma cwako;
inyutho wor, ipoŋ gi mar makiwire, aka ikimaki nge piyo.
Inyutho wor madwoŋ, aka ikijwango jo.
aka jolwoŋo ni were pajo m'owodho jo wok i Misir!
Awi Rwoth, neni nger ma jocayin'iye!
kole inyutho wor madwoŋ.
Imedo telo jo gi siro ma pondeponde odieceŋ,
aka wor gi siro ma mac.
I bero perin iwaco rijo gima joripo timo,
ipidho jo gi mana aka imiyo jo pi amadha.
Ma oro piero aŋwen i thim
imiyo jo gima jomito je;
nangin pajo k'oyec,
aka tiendi jo k'obomere.”
aka jotero lowo pajo.
Jomako kiri lowo ma Hesbon ma Kere Sihon oyido dhumo,
gi lowo ma Basan ma Kere Og oyido dhumo.
aka iweyo jo bedo i lowo,
m'oyido iciko kwarere pajo ni ilamiyo jo.
ikengila rijo ji m'oyido jobedo kenyo.
Imiyo ji perin meni timo paka jomito,
gi ji kodi kerin ma Kanan.
lowo maber, udi m'opoŋ lim,
buce m'okuny ma kano pi,
yen oliv, yen ma nyak nyandere, gi ndelin vini.
Jocamo gima jomito je aka jopoŋ;
aka jofore gi gigipiny mabeyo je m'imiyo jo.”
jowiro dieŋey jo ri Cik perin.
Joneko jotuci wac Were ma jogwoko jo,
ma jowaco rijo gik bongin.
Jocayin swa.
Ameno imiyo jo i cingi jokwor pajo,
ma jomiyo jo candirok.
Joywak rin i candirok pajo,
aka iwinjo jo gi polo.
Aka kwoŋbedo inyutho wor madwoŋ,
idhiro rijo joboth, botho jo wok i cingi jokwor pajo.
To munyo oyido jonitie i siem,
jotimo reco ruwaŋin kendo,
aka ijwango jo i cingi jokwor pajo, ŋey jodhumo jo.
Kucel munyo jopusere to jokwayin botho jo,
iwinjo gi polo,
aka ibotho jo dikweth, kwoŋbedo inyutho wor madwoŋ.
to i noro jokwero cik perin,
makada nende kuro Cik perin obedo yo ma kwo.
Jotimo gi cay gi wictek, jokwero winjo.
aka igwoko jo gi cuny perin luwo kwoŋ jotuci wac Were perin,
to jok'onyalo winjo.
Riameno iweyo nonin man kikengila jo.
To kwoŋbedo inyutho wor madwoŋ,
ikijwango jo, kosa ikireyo woko jo.
Inyutho wor aka inyutho wor Awi Were!”
Ikelo lworo, aka ijameni!
Ro mar perin makiwire, ikuro cikirok perin,
ikir'iter gi sewo dinyo je m'otieko podho kwoŋ wan,
kerin mawan, jodhum, jocway ri Were i wi migam, jotuci wac Were,
kwarere mawan, gi ji mawan je,
wok i hongo ma kerin ma Asiria jodiyo wan'iye tundo gunyo ni.
Itimo gim'otire miyo wan gir'acula,
kole itimo adieri,
to watimo gikidakana.
Kwarere mawan, kerin mawan, jotel, gi jocway ri Were i wi migam,
jok'okuro Cik perin.
Jok'owinjo or perin gi fonji perin.
Imiyo jo silwany gi keri,
gi lowo ma diwa, maber,
to jokwero tiyo rin,
aka jok'oweyo tim pajo ma kidakana.
Onyo neni, konon wabedo ŋecin i lowo m'imiyo wan,
lowo maber me ma miyo wan cemo.
Gima lowo nyak je itero ri kerin,
m'imiyo jo dhumo wan kwoŋbedo watimo reco.
Jotimo gima jomito gi delkwoŋ wan g'ogwaŋe mawan,
aka wanitie i litho madwoŋ!”
Ameno, Joisiraili jotimo cikirok m'ondiki piny ma joridho, aka jodhum pajo, Jolevi, gi jocway ri Were i wi migam joketh'iye cingi gin.
Nehemia wod Hakalia am'open ketho cinge paka gavana, kanyacel gi Zedekia gi jocway ri Were i wi migam me:
Seraya, Azaria, Yeremia,
Pasur, Amaria, Malikija,
Hatus, Sebania, Maluk,
Harim, Meremoth, Obadia,
Daniel, Ginethon, Baruk,
Mesulam, Abija, Miyamin,
Mazia, Bilgai, kodi Samaya.
Jolevi ma joketho cingi jo obedo: Yesuwa wod Azania, Binuy janono pa Henadad, Kadmiel,
Sebania, Hodia, Kelita, Pelaya, Hanan,
Mika, Rehob, Hasabia,
Zakur, Serebia, Sebania,
Hodia, Bani, gi Beninu.
Jotel pa ji ma joketho cingi jo obedo: Paros, Pahath Mowab, Elam, Zatu, Bani,
Buni, Azigadi, Bebay,
Adoniya, Bigvay, Adin,
Ater, Hezekia, Azur,
Hodia, Hasum, Bezay,
Harif, Anathoth, Nebay,
Magpias, Mesulam, Hezir,
Mesezabel, Zadok, Yaduwa,
Pelatia, Hanan, Anaya,
Hoseya, Hanania, Hasub,
Halohes, Piliha, Sobek,
Rehum, Hasabna, Maseya,
Ahija, Hanan, Anan,
Maluk, Harim, gi Bana.

Wan, Joisiraili, jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi, jokur ma Ot pa Were, jower, jotic ma Ot pa Were, gi jono je ma jopokere kwoŋ jopath ma jobedo i lowo mawan, luwo Cik pa Were, wan, kanyacel gi mon mawan, kodi nyithindho mawan ma joniaŋ gima watimo,

wariwere ka gi jotel mawan i kwoŋirok ni walatimo gima Cik pa Were m'omiyo ŋeca pere Musa waco, walawinjo cik pa Rwoth, aka walakuro cik pere je gi fonji mere je. Ka wakitimo ameno walwoŋo lam kwoŋ wan.
Wakilanywomo kosa nywomere gi jopath ma jobedo i lowo mawan.
Kisi oro mar'abirio wakilafuro i lowo mawan, aka walareyo woko banjin je.
Wan, Joisiraili, jocway ri Were i wi migam, gi Jolevi, walayero kisi oro nono ma ladimo yen ma waŋo cowirok m'imiyo Rwoth Were mawan, paka ondiki i Cik.
Kisi oro walatero i Ot pa Were ŋano ma watelo keco gi olemo je ma telo cek i wi yen mawan.
Walatero ri Jolevi ma jocoko acel wiy apar wok i ndelin mawan, cemo ma wafuro i lowo mawan.

Aka jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jobedo nyikway Aron joripo bedo kanyacel gi Jolevi k'icoko acel wiy apar, aka m'ilaoro i Ot pa Were Jolevi jolatero i kisikin ma kan ma Ot pa Were acel wiy apar mar'acel wiy apar ma jocoko.

Joisiraili kodi Jolevi joripo tero mic ma ŋano, vini, kodi mo i kisikin ma kan kama ikan'iye gigipiny ma Ot pa Were aka ma jocway ri Were i wi migam, jokur, kodi jower ma jonitie i weso ma tic jobed'iye.
Wa kilajwango Ot pa Were mawan.
Jotel jobedo i Yerusalem, aka ji jobolo kwir yero acel kwoŋ pecin apar ma ladoŋ bedo i tindi madwoŋ maleŋ Yerusalem, aka ji m'odoŋ jobedo i tindin madongo man kodi tindin.
Ji jopako jono je ma joyeyo wegi bedo i Yerusalem.
Joisiraili megi, jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi, jotic ma Ot pa Were, kodi nyikway ŋecin pa Solomon jodoŋ bedo i lim pajo i tindin ma Yuda.
Me nyingi ji mar'adec ma Yuda ma jodoŋ bedo i Yerusalem.
Nyikway Yuda: Athaya, wod Uziya aka nyakwar Zekaria. Kwarere pere man jobedo: Amaria, Sefatiya, Mahalalel, nyikway Yuda wod Perez.
Maseya wod Baruk aka nyakwar Kolhoze. Kwarere pere man jobedo: Hazaya, Adaya, Yoyarib, kodi Zekaria, nyikway Sela wod Yuda.
Nyikway Perez je ma jobedo i Yerusalem obedo cwo 468 ma jolweny matek.
Nyikway Benyamin obedo: Salu, wod Mesulam aka nyakwar Yoyed. Kwarere pere man obedo Pedaya, Kolaya, Maseya, Ithiel, kodi Yesaya.
Gabai kodi Salai wade pa Salu.
Kanyacel je oyido nitie jonono pa Benyamin 928 ma jobedo i Yerusalem.
Yowel wod Zikiri am'oyido obedo jatel pajo, aka Yuda wod Hasenuwa oyido obedo jatel mar'ario ma tindi madwoŋ.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam: Yedaya wod Yoyarib, kodi Yakin.
Seraya, wod Hilikia aka nyakwar Mesulam. Kwarere pere man jobedo Zadok, Merayoth, kodi Ahitub m'oyido obedo jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Kanyacel je oyido nitie ji 822 ma nono me ma jotiyo i Ot pa Were.
Adaya, wod Yeroham aka nyakwar Pelalia. Kwarere pere man jobedo Amizi, Zekaria, Pasur, kodi Malikija.
Kanyacel je oyido nitie jotel pecin 242.
Amasay, wod Azarel aka nyakwar Ahizay. Kwarere pere man jobedo Mesilemoth kodi Imer.
Kanyacel je oyido nitie jolweny matek 128 i nono me. Jatel pajo oyido obedo Zabidiel wod Hagedolim.
Jolevi: Samaya, wod Hasub aka nyakwar Azirikam. Kwarere pere man jobedo: Hasabia kodi Buni.
Sabethay kodi Yozabad, jotel pa Jolevi m'oyido jotelo tic ma woko ma Ot pa Were.
Matania, wod Mika aka nyakwar Zabidi wod Asaf. Go otelo jower ma Ot pa Were wer kwayo ma foyo. Bakbukia m'oyido obedo jakony pa Matania. Abida wod pa Samuwa aka nyakwar Galal kodi Jeduthun.
Kanyacel je oyido nitie Jolevi 284 ma jobedo i tindi madwoŋ maleŋ Yerusalem.
Jokur ma Ot pa Were: Akub, Talmon, kodi wade pajo, kanyacel je 172.
Joisiraili m'odoŋ, jocway ri Were i wi migam, kodi Jolevi jobedo i lim pajo wegi i tindin madongo man kodi tindin man i Yuda.
Jotic ma Ot pa Were jobedo iy'adec ma Yerusalem m'ilwoŋo ni Ofel aka Ziha kodi Gispa am'oyido jotelo jo.
Uzi wod Bani aka nyakwar Hasabia, am'oyido obedo jatel pa Jolevi i Yerusalem. Kwarere pere man jobedo: Matania, kodi Mika. Go oyido obedo janono pa Asaf, m'oyido jobedo jower aka jotic ma Ot pa Were.
Kere ma Pasia am'oyido miyo jo or ma weso ma wer i Ot pa Were kisi ndelo.
Pethahia, wod Mesezabel, aka janono pa Zera aka Jayuda, am'oyido pido ri Joisiraili i Pasia.
Ji ma Yuda megi oyido jobedo i tindin macegin gi ndelin pajo: Kiriath Arba, Dibon, Jekabzel,
Yesuwa, Molada, Bethpelet,
Hazarsual, Berseba,
Ziklag, Mekona,
Enrimon, Zora, Yarmuth,
Zanowa, Adulam Lakis, kodi Azeka. Ameno jobedo iy'adec manitie i dier Berseba yupiny kodi i milelo ma Hinom yumalo.
Jonono pa Benyamin oyido jobedo i Geba, Mikmas, Ay, Bethel kodi calin macegin kenyo.
Anathoth, Nob, Anania,
Hazor, Rama, Gitayim,
Hadid, Zeboyim, Nebalat,
Lod, kodi Ono, kodi i Milelo pa Jocwey gigipiny.
Kitipin pa Jolevi megi m'oyido jobedo iy'adec ma Yuda omiy jo bedo gi jonono pa Benyamin.
Me nyingi jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi ma jodwoko wok i twec gi Zerubabel wod Sealtiel kodi Yesuwa jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam: Seraya, Yeremia, Ezira,
Amaria, Malik, Hatus,
Sekaniya, Rehum, Meremoth,
Ido, Ginethoi, Abija,
Miyamin, Madia, Bigla,
Samaya, Yoyarib, Yedaya,
Salu, Amok, Hilikia, Yedaya.
Cwo me oyido jobedo jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam wadi jo je i hongo pa Yesuwa.
Jolevi: Yesuwa, Binuy, Kadmiel, Serebia, Yuda, kodi Matania. Cwo me am'oyido jotelo wer ma miyo foyo.
Cwo me: Bukbukia, Uno, kodi Jolevi wadi jo oyido jokworo wer.
Yesuwa obedo ba Joyakim, Joyakim obedo ba Eliasib, Eliasib obedo ba Yoyada,
Yoyada obedo ba Yonathan, aka Yonathan obedo ba Yaduwa.
Munyo Joyakim oyido obedo jadwoŋ pa Jocway ri Were i wi migam, me jocway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido jobedo jotel nonin pajo: Meraya jatel nono pa Seraya, Hanania jatel nono pa Yeremia,
Mesulam jatel nono pa Ezira, Yehohanan jatel nono pa Amaria,
Yonathan jatel nono pa Maluk, Yozefu jatel nono pa Sebania,
Adina jatel nono pa Harim, Helkai jatel nono pa Merayoth,
Zekaria jatel nono pa Ido, Mesulam jatel nono pa Ginethon,
Zikiri jatel nono pa Abija, Pilitai jatel nono pa Mowadia,
Samuwa jatel nono pa Bilga, Yonathan jatel nono pa Samaya,
Matenay jatel nono pa Yoyarib, Uzi jatel nono pa Yedaya,
Kalay jatel nono pa Salay, Eber jatel nono pa Amok,
Hasabia jatel nono pa Hilikia, aka Nathanel jatel nono pa Yedaya.

I hongo pa jodongo pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, Eliasib, Yoyada, Johanan, kodi Yaduwa, tundo kiri i hongo ma dhum pa Kere Dario ma Pasia, ondiki nyingi jotel ma pecin pa Jolevi kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam.
To ongoye gim'ondiki kwoŋ jotel ma pecin pa Jolevi munyo Yonathan, nyakwar Eliasib otieko tho.
Jotel pa Jolevi, Hasabia, Serebia, Yesuwa, Binuy, kodi Kadmiel kodi wadi jo, jopoko Jolevi i kitipin ario, miyo Were pak, paka Kere Daudi, jacwo pa Were oyido owodho or.
Matania, Bakbukia, Obadia, Mesulam, Talmon, kodi Akub am'oyido jokuro kisikin ma kan macegin gi waŋkace ma Ot pa Were.
Cwo me je jobedo i hongo pa Joyakim, wod Yesuwa aka nyakwar Yehozadak, kodi Nehemia gavana, kodi i hongo pa Ezira, jacway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido obedo jafonji Cik.
Munyo iketho kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ i cingi Were, olwoŋi Jolevi wok i kisi kabedo pajo bino i kalima gi miyo foyo gi wer kodi forok ka jotuko tongol, adungu kodi gi wer man.
Jolevi jocokere wok kam'oyido jobed'iye thoko Yerusalem kodi wok i tindin thoko Netofa,
kodi wok i Bethgilgal, Geba, kodi Azimaveth.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi jotimo kwer ma lonyo jo, ji, waŋkace, kodi kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ.
Kenyo an, Nehemia, akelo jotel ma Yuda i wi kor ot, aka amiyo jo telo kitipin ario ma joŋanjo thoko tindi madwoŋ i wi kor ot, ka jomiyo Were foyo.
Kitipa acel okadho yuracam tundo i Waŋkac ma Woyo,
aka Hosaya kodi adec ma jodhum joluwo jo cen.
Kenyo oluwo jocway ri Were i wi migam: Azaria, Ezira, Mesulam,
Yuda, Benyamin, Samaya, kodi Yeremia,
joje oyido jokudho gwarin. Ŋat'oluwo obedo Zekaria, wod Yonathan aka nyakwar Samaya aka janono pa Asaf. Kwarere pere man jobedo: Matania, Mikaya, kodi Zakur.
Kenyo oluwo jonono pa Asaf man: Samaya, Azarel Milalai, Gilalai, Mai, Nethanel, Yuda, kodi Hanani, joje oyido jotiŋo gi wer pa Kere Daudi, jacwo pa Were. Ezira jafonji Cik otelo kitipa me.
I Waŋkac ma Kidiwa, joidho madala malo kadho i Tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi, kalo peco pa Daudi, gik i kor ot i Waŋkac ma Waŋ pi, i thenge ma yuwok ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ.
Kitipa mar'ario pa ji ma jomiyo foyo joluwo yuracuc i wi kor ot, aka aluwo jo, kanyacel gi adec man pa jotel ma Yuda. Wakadho kalo Acurcur ma Oven, kiri i Kor ot ma Woko,
aka wok kenyo wakadho kalo Waŋkac pa Efrayim, Waŋkac pa Yesana, Waŋkac ma Rec, Acurcur ma Hananel, Acurcur ma Miya, kiri i Waŋkac ma Rombo. Wacungo cegin gi waŋkac ma Ot pa Were.
Ameno kitipin ario je m'oyido jomiyo Were foyo joromo ruwaŋ Ot pa Were.
I kitipa paran oyido nitie adec ma jodhum,
kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam me m'oyido jokudho gwara: Eliakim, Maseya, Miniamin, Mikaya, Eliowenay, Zekaria, kodi Hanania;
aka cwo me oyido joluwo jo: Maseya, Samaya, Eliazar, Uzi, Yehohanan, Malikija, Elam, kodi Ezer. Yezrahia am'oyido telo jower.
I ndelo no omiy cowirok madwoŋ aka ji oyido jofore kwoŋbedo Were omiyo jo kisangala. Mon kodi nyithindho bende jofore, aka kisangala pa Yerusalem owinjere bor swa.

I ndelo no oyer cwo bedo jotel ma kisikin ma kano mic ma Ot pa Were, kiri gi acel wiy apar, kodi ŋano marapena gi olemo macek kisi oro. Cwo me oyido joripo coko mic pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi wok i ndelin macegin gi tindin madongo paka Cik waco. Ji ma Yuda je oyido josangala gi jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi,
kwoŋbedo oyido jotimo kwer ma lonyo ji kodi tic man ri Were pajo. Jower kodi jokur ma Ot pa Were bende jotimo tic pajo paka Kere Daudi kodi wode Solomon joketho cik.
Wok i hongo pa Kere Daudi kodi jawer Asaf cango con, oyido nitie jatel pa jower kodi wer ma pak kodi ma miyo Were foyo.

I hongo pa Zerubabel kodi i hongo pa Yeremia, Joisiraili je jomiyo mic ma kisi ndelo ma thielo jower kodi jokur ma Ot pa Were. Ji jomiyo Jolevi mic pajo, aka Jolevi jomiyo jocway ri Were i wi migam mic pajo.
Me obedo kwoŋbedo Joamon gi Jomowab jok'omiyo Joisiraili cemo kosa pi munyo jowok i Misir. Kwanyowoko, joculo Balam pesa lamo Joisiraili, to Were mawan owiro lam no i silwany.
Munyo Joisiraili jowinjo osoma cik me, jopokere woko kwoŋ jopath je.
Onyo mafodi gime, Eliasib, jacway ri Were i wi migam, m'oyido obedo jatel ma kisikin ma kan i Ot pa Were, oyido tiyere gi Tobia hongo malac.

Go oyeyo Tobia oro kisika malac m'oyido iripo kan'iye mic ma ŋano kodi buban, gigipiny m'ioro i Ot pa Were, mic pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, acel wiy apar ma ŋano, vini, kodi mo m'imiyo Jolevi, jower kodi jokur ma Ot pa Were.

Munyo gime timere, oyido angoye i Yerusalem, kwoŋbedo i oro ma piero adek g'ario ma dhum pa Kere Aritakises ma Pasia, go oyido obedo kere ma Babilon aka oyido agik bonge. Rumacen ma hongo moro, go oyeyan
gik i Yerusalem. Kenyo aniaŋ kwoŋ komo ma Eliasib oyido otimo gi yeyo Tobia oro kisika i Ot pa Were.
Amako nge swa, aka abolo woko gigipiny pa Tobia ma ot je.
Kenyo awodho or ni wotim kwer ma lonyo kisika, aka wodwok'iye gigipiny ma Ot pa Were, mic ma ŋano, kodi buban.
Ameno apusa jodhum aka apenjo jo ni, “Raŋo wijwango Ot pa Were?” Kenyo acoko Jolevi kodi jower t'adwoko jo tic i Ot pa Were kendo.
Ji ma Yuda jocako kelo acel wiy apar ma ŋano, vini, kodi mo i kisikin ma kan.

Aketho cwo me kuro kisikin ma kan: Selemia, jacway ri Were i wi migam, Zadok jafonji cik, Pedaya, Jalevi, Hanan, wod Zakur aka nyakwar Matania oyido obedo jakony pajo. An oyido aŋeyo ni cwo me jogenere i poko wadi jo gigipiny.
Poyan, Awi Were paran, ro gigipiny je m'atieko timo ri Ot perin kodi lam'iye.
Ji mogo ma jowok i tindi madwoŋ Tire m'oyido jobedo i Yerusalem jokelo rec kodi nger gigipiny je i tindi madwoŋ kitana ri ji ma Yuda i ndelo ma Sabato.
Apusa jotel pa Joyuda aka apenjo jo ni, “Me raco aŋo ma witimo! Wiloko ndelo ma Sabato makoc!
Cango Were k'omiyo tindi madwoŋ me gir'acula kwoŋbedo kwarere mawan jotimo nger gime! Kucel ee kendo wilwoŋo keme pa Were kwoŋ Isiraili gi loko Sabato makoc!”

Ameno awodho or ni wocegi waŋkace ma tindi madwoŋ ka ndelo ma Sabato cakere, tekin piny cako yutho, aka okiri woyawi cuka Sabato rumo. Aketho cwo paran mogo kuro waŋkace neno ni ongoye gim'ikelo i tindi madwoŋ i ndelo ma Sabato.
Jomitan ma jotana nger gigipiny je jonindo woko ma tindi madwoŋ dicel kosa dirio.
To agwoko jo aka apenjo jo ni, “Raŋo winindo ruwaŋ kor ot? Ka winotim ameno kendo, alamako win.” Wok i ndelo no jok'odwoko i ndelo ma Sabato.
Amiyo Jolevi cik lokirok maleŋ aka jokadhi jowokuri waŋkace neno ni okur Sabato maleŋ.
Poyan, Awi Were paran, ri gime bende, aka ikuran ro dwoŋ ma mar perin makiwire.
Adec ma nyithindho pajo oyido joluwo dhodhok Asdod kosa dhodhok man aka oyido jokuya luwo dhodhok mawan won.
Apusa cwo no, alwoŋo lam kwoŋ jo, agoyo jo, aka ajwaco woko ye tik jo. Kenyo amiyo jo kwoŋirok i nyingi Were ni jo kosa nyithindho pajo, jokilanywomo kosa nywomirok gi jopath.
Awaco rijo ni, “Mon jopath ama jomiyo Kere Solomon timo reco. Go oyido obedo jacwo madwoŋ loyo kerin ma piny man je. Were omaro go aka oketho go kere pa Joisiraili, to, kucel go otimo reco me.
Onyo waluw gima witimo, aka watim gir'akor kwoŋ Were mawan gi nywomo mon jopath?”
Acel kwoŋ wot Yoyada, wod Eliasib, jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, onywomo nyar Sanbalat, ma wok i tindi Bethhoron, ameno amiyo Yoyada eye woko i Yerusalem.
Poyi jo, Awi Were paran, kwoŋbedo jokoco tic ma cwayo rin, cikirok ma cango itimo gi jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi.
Ameno alonyo woko ji kwoŋ gigipiny pa jopath je. Aketho cik ri jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jolevi ŋey kisi dhano wonyali ŋeyo tic pere.
Atimo can ri yen ma waŋo mic i sawa ma ripo, kodi ri ji kelo mic pajo ma ŋano, kodi olemo macek marapena.
Poyan, Awi Were paran, ro bero m'atieko timo.
I oro mar'adek ma dhum pere, kere otimo kalima madwoŋ swa ri jodhum kodi jotel pere. Jolweny ma Pasia kodi Mediya, jotel kodi rwodhe mar'adec je olwoŋi jo i kalima me.
I kalima me, kere onyutho ŋono ma ŋaŋo ma ker pere je ma dwe aucel.
Munyo kalima madwoŋ orumo, kere otimo ri ji je kalima man kendo gi diedipo pere i tindi madwoŋ Susa. Kalima me oriwo jocandi kodi joŋaŋo kanyacel; aka ocowo ndelo ario.

Diedipo oloki maŋon gi nangin ma famba manyabululu kodi matar m'otwey gi law manyarangi ariŋo gi peta ma feza i tele ma pilin maŋon. Okethi kacemo pa wendo m'otimi gi zahabu gi feza i diedipo m'oyido oum gi telin ma pilin maŋon.
Ŋecin pa kere jopoko medho iy'agwatin m'ocwey gi zahabu. Kisi agwata oyido opokere kwoŋ wadi. Kere oyeyo nyatoro je madho vini ma go won bende madho paka nyatoro won oyenyo.
Kere omiyo ŋecin pere cik ni, “Ongoye geŋo nyatoro moro je medho, to kisi ŋata mito vini womedi go paka go mito.”
I waŋceŋ acel no, Vasiti, nyamicala bende oyido otimo kalima ri mon je peco pa kere.

I ndelo mar'abirio ma kalima mar'ario, munyo kere ocowo madho vini to ero yodirok, go olwoŋo wasemeli abirio ma jolur m'oyido jobedo ŋecin pere; nyingi jo obedo; Mehuman, Bizitha, Habona, Bigitha, Abagitha, Zethar, kodi Kokas.
Kere ooro jo ni jowokidhi jowokwaŋ Vasiti nyamicala wobin bongi kere kareno Vasiti oruko sangaria pere.
Munyo ŋecin pa kere jowaco ri Vasiti nyamicala wac ma kere ooro gine jo, go okwero. Gime oduwo cuny kere swa to mako nge.
Paka oyido obedo tim pa kere, go openjo jomic rieko pere i thenge ma cik gi thenethene ma piny Pasia gir'atima.

Jomic rieko me jobedo; Karsena, Sethar, Adimatha, Tarsis, Meres, Marsena kodi Memucan ma jowok i piny Pasia kodi Mediya. Cwo abirio me am'oyido jocore cegin gi kere; aka oyido jonitie gi dwoŋ ma malo i ker pa kere Aritakises.
Kere openjo jo ni, “Aŋo ma cik waco ni ripo wotim ri Vasiti nyamicala, rupiri go okwero winjo cik paran munyo aoro ŋecin paran bonge?”
To Memucan ay malo aka odwoko kere gi jodhum pere je ama, “Vasiti nyamicala k'ocayo kere kende; to go ocayo jodhum pa kere kiri gi ji je ma jonitie i ker me.”

Memucan omedere waco ri kere ni, “Konon won me, mafodi piny k'oyutho, mon mawan ma piny Pasia gi Mediya jolawinjo ni Vasiti nyamicala ocayo kere, to jo bende jocako cayo cwogi jo. Mon je jolakwero bwonirok ri cwogi jo, aka cwo jobino mako nge gi mon pajo. Mon je ma ker perin ka jowinji gima Vasiti nyamicala otimo, jolacako cayo cwogi jo. Jobino waco ni, ‘Kole kere gipi olwoŋo Vasiti nyamicala, to Vasiti kwero.’

Riameno, k'inen obedo mito pa kere, weyi cik wowoki i kom perin ma dhum; cik no wondiki i kitawo ma cik ma Pasia kodi Mediya m'odoko kilawire. Cik no wobedi ma riemo woko Vasiti ma doko go kilaneno ruwaŋ kere Aritakises; aka kiri dwoŋ pere je wotiŋ t'imiyo dhako man maloyo go gi kula.
Ka cik me ondiki, t'isoma iy'adec je ma ker perin, cwo je, ma jacandi kosa jaŋaŋo, dhako pere bino miyo wor.”
Rieko me oyomo cuny kere gi jomic rieko pere, to kere timo paka Memucan owaco.
Kere ondiko balwin i dhodhok ma kisi nono ma waco ni, “Kisi jacwo moro je ripo bedo jadwoŋ ma peco pere, aka woluwi gi dwoŋ je.” Balwin me opok iy'adec je.
Munyo gigipiny no je otieko timere, to hongo moro kadho, cuny kere opie. Kere oparo kwoŋ gima Vasiti otimo rigo, gi cik ma go won ondiko kwoŋ Vasiti.
Ŋecin pa kere jowaco rigo ni, “Raŋo kere kior ŋecin pere rango nyir maŋon ma fodi jokuya cwo.

Weyi kere wowaci ri jodhum pere ma kisi adec jowokeli nyir no, t'iketho jo i ot pa mon i tindi madwoŋ Susa. Nyir no okethi jo i cingi Hegay ma lur, ŋeca pa kere yuthenge pa mon pa kere. Hegay womiy jo mo ma fothirok.
Nyaka kere won rumacen bino yero nyako ma cunye omito, to ketho go bedo nyamicala wolunji waŋ Vasiti.” Waci no oyomo cuny kere to go timo ameno.
I hongo no, oyido nitie Jayuda m'ilwoŋo ni Modekay wod pa Yayir. Modekay oyido obedo nyakwar Kic gi Semei jonono pa Benyamin.
Modekay oyido obedo acel kwoŋ Joyuda, ma Nebukadineza kere pa Jobabilon omako wok Yerusalem, kanyacel gi kere pajo Yekonia to kadho gi jo paka jotwec ma lweny.

Modekay oyido kuro nyar omin bamere m'ilwoŋo ni Esita. Esita oyido obedo nyako ma dhiaŋ onaŋo waŋe to cweyere maŋon. I hongo ma jonywol pere jotho, Modekay okwanyo go aka otero go peco pere, to kuro go paka nyathi pere.
Munyo cik pa kere owok, okeli nyir madit i tindi madwoŋ Susa. Esita bende obedo acel kwoŋ nyir no. Okethi jo i cingi Hegay, jadwoŋ ma ot pa mon pa kere.

Tekin Hegay neno Esita, cunye omaro Esita loyo nyir m'oyido oyer je. Hegay omiyo Esita tim manyakare ma loko go maŋon. Gi piyo no won go oyiko ri Esita cemo pere m'opokere g'apa nyir wadi, to miyo go mo ma fothirok. Go omiyo Esita nyir abirio tiyo rigo; aka otero jo i kabedo maŋon loyo i ot pa mon.
Modekay oyido ocuno Esita ni wokan nyaliŋliŋ ma mako kwoŋ wade gi ji pere, aka Esita bende k'owaco ri nyatoro.
Kisi ndelo Modekay oyido bino to langalanga i diedipo ma ot pa mon g'atoŋa ma mito ŋeyo nger m'oyido iter'iye Esita.

Nyir m'oyer ri kere jocowo hongo ma dwe apar g'ario munyo jolwokere. Ma dwe aucel jobedo munyo jowire gi mo ma welo kweth swa ma fothirok, aka doko jotero dwe aucel man kareno jokudho kwoŋ jo mo maŋwe kur.
Munyo weso pa kisi nyako otundo ma kidho i ot pa kere, go won oyero ruk m'osangala cunye.

Kisi nyako ma weso pere otundo, okidho i ot pa kere othieno, aka yawere odikin itero go i ot pa mon man kama mon pa kere ma githenge jobed'iye. Ka ocow tero go kenyo, go won doko kinyal kidho i ot pa kere kwanyowoko ka kere doko cunye owanya go to lwoŋo go gi nyinge. Sasgaz ma lur am'oyido obedo ŋeca pa kere ma dhumo ot pa mon me.
Munyo weso pa Esita nyar Abihayili m'oyido obedo ner Modekay otundo, go otimo gima Hegay ma lur owaco rigo; aka orukere i nger ma Hegay ma lur oyero. Kisi nyatoro je oneno Esita gi waŋe maber.
I hongo m'oter'iye Esita bongi kere Aritakises, obedo i dwe mar'apar, dwe ma Tabethi
Kere omito Esita loyo mon man je aka Esita olimo mar gi nema wok bonge. To piyo piyo kere ketho kwoŋ Esita dwoŋ ma bedo nyamicala lunjo waŋ Vasiti.

Kere otimo ri Esita kalima ma limo dwoŋ pere, aka olwoŋo jodhum pere gi jotel pere je i kalima no. Kere omiyo ndelo ma kalima no bedo ndelo madwoŋ. Kere opoko kisi nyatoro je m'obino i kalima no mic m'owok bongi go won.
I hongo ma weso pa kisi nyako ma kidho bongi kere orumo, to jocokere kanyacel i ot pa mon, kere omiyo Modekay dwoŋ ma dhum.
To kiri munyo Esita otieko limo dwoŋ ma bedo nyamicala, go k'owiro kula ma kwo pere. Go k'owaco ri nyatoro moro je ni go obedo Jayuda paka Modekay con mere ocuno go.
I hongo ma kere omiyo Modekay dwoŋ ma dhum i ker pere, Bigithana gi Teres m'oyido jobedo jokur ma dhiot ma kisika pa kere, jocano neko kere r'atoŋa ma miyo Modekay dwoŋ no.
Can me owinjere i ithi Modekay to go osa ri Esita nyamicala. Esita owaco gime ri kere i nyingi Modekay.
Munyo omeny tiendi wac me, onwaŋere ni obedo adieri, to jokur ario no iŋawo jo kanek.
Munyo hongo moro okadho, kere omedo jadhum pere m'ilwoŋo ni Haman dwoŋ ma malo loyo jodhum wadi go je. Haman oyido obedo wod pa Hamedatha, aka nyakwar Agag.
Kere omiyo jodhum ma ker pere je cik ni joripo woro Haman. Joripo guro rigo congi jo to jobwonere ruwaŋ go. To Modekay okwero miyo Haman dwoŋ no.
Wadi Modekay ma bende jobedo jodhum jopenjo go ni, “Raŋo ikwero luwo cik pa kere?”

Kisi ndelo jotemo naŋo go, to go kwero winjo wac pajo. Modekay odwoko jo ni, “An abedo Jayuda; aka akinyali bwonirok ri Haman.” Wadi Modekay joosa go ri Haman kareno jomito neno k'adieri go ridho wac pere.
Munyo Haman won bende oneno gi waŋe ni Modekay kiwor go aka kibwonere ruwaŋe, owinjo marac swa aka omako nge.
Rumacen Haman oniaŋ ni Modekay obedo Jayuda. Riameno go k'omito neko Modekay kende, to cano reyo woko Joyuda je m'oyido jonitie i ker pa Aritakises.
I oro mar'apar g'ario ma dhum pa kere Aritakises, i dwe marapena dwe m'ilwoŋo ni Nisan

Ameno Haman okidho bongi kere Aritakises, aka owaco rigo ni, “Nitie nono ji ma jonitie i kisi adec ma ker perin me aka jopokere kwoŋ nonin man aka kiri cik pajo je opokere. Jome jokiluwi cik pa kere m'oyido kiber weyo jo medo kwo.
K'inen obedo mito pa kere, ayere ketho kilo 340,000 ma feza i dero pesa pa kere. Miy cik ma waco ni jonono me je woneki jo.”
Kere olunyo peta ma go oro ma ketho cinge i kisi ndiko wok i lwet cinge, aka omiyo Haman wod pa Hamedatha ma bende nyakwar Agag jakwor pa Joyuda.
Aka kere owaco ri Haman ni, “Pesa no aperin, aka ri nono no, tim gi jo gima cunyin mito.”

Ameno k'apar g'adek, i dwe marapena, Haman olwoŋo jondiko pa kere je aka owaco rijo ndiko gima go waco rijo je i kisi dhodhok. Munyo jotieko ndiko, go oketho nyingi kere Aritakises gi peta pa kere aka opoko rwodhe, jotel, gi jodhum je ma kisi adec.

T'ioro jomikwenda mayil yil poko balwin no i kisi adec. Ndiko me oyido miyo nonin man je cik reyo woko Joyuda je, mathindho gi madongo, mon gi nyithindho i ndelo acel, k'apar g'adek i dwe ma Adar; aka jowodoŋ gi lim pajo.
Osoma ndiko me paka cik i kisi adec ŋey kisi nyatoro je woyikere ri ndelo no.
Kere owodho or aka osoma cik me i tindi madwoŋ Susa. Oor jomikwenda mayil yil poko ndiko me i kisi adec. Kere gi Haman jobedo piny aka jocako madho vini, kucel nyawin ocakere i tindi madwoŋ Susa.
Munyo Modekay oniaŋ kwoŋ can me, oyeco woko nangin pere aka oruko kutiya to wiro buru i wiye. Go owotho i tindi madwoŋ Susa gipi kareno ywak gi dwonde ma malo swa gi gwayo.
Go okidho aka ocungo i waŋkac ma peco pa kere. Go k'onyalo donjo rupiri oyido kiyey ŋat'orukere paka go donjo peco pa kere.
Munyo Joyuda ma kisi adec jowinjo cik pa kere ma mako kwoŋ jo, jobedo gi geregere swa aka jotiŋo dwondi gin to jogoyo ndur. Joje jocako riyo aka joruko kutiyin aka jowiro buru i wiy gin.
Nyir ma jotiyo ri Esita nyamicala jokidho bongi go aka jokowo rigo kwoŋ Modekay. Esita obedo gi geregere swa. Go odhiro ri Modekay nangin maber ŋey woluny woko kutiya aka Modekay k'oyeyo.
Esita olwoŋo Hathak ma lur, ŋeca pere ma kere won am'omiyo go; aka ooro go bongi Modekay penjo go ni raŋo go ywak gi dwonde ma malo aka oruko kutiya to wiro i wiye buru.
Hathak bende okidho bongi Modekay kam'othangere dho waŋkac pa kere.
Modekay owaco ri Hathak gim'otimere rigo je. Go owaco ri Hathak kwoŋ cikirok ma Haman otimo, gi welo pesa ma Haman ociko ketho i dero pesa pa kere k'inen Joyuda je oneki.

Modekay omiyo Hathak ndiko ma cik ma Susa ma luwo kwoŋ tho pa Joyuda oter ri Esita aka wonyami rigo tiende. Modekay doko omedo oro Hathak bongi Esita ni go ripo kidho bongi kere woywaki ri kere wonyali botho ji pere.
Hathak ogik bongi Esita aka okowo rigo gima Modekay owaco rigo je.
Esita omiyo Hathak mikwenda me tero ri Modekay

“Kisi nyatoro je oŋeyo cik ma Pasia ni nyatoro moro ma kidho bongi kere mafodi kere won k'olwoŋo go iripo neko. Ka k'obedo ameno, nitie nyaka yo acel kende ma both cik no; meno nyaka ka kere onyutho ŋato luth pere aka nyaka ŋato both. To wok cuka kere lwoŋan kidho bongi, otieko kadho hongo ma romo dwe acel.”
Hathak owaco ri Modekay gima Esita odwoko.
Modekay odwoko Esita ni, “Ikir'ipar i cunyin ni kwoŋ Joyuda je iŋat'ibino both nyaka rupiri ni initie peco pa kere.
K'inoliŋaliŋa i hongo ma teko ama, Were bino konyo Joyuda to botho jo. To in gi peco pa benin wibino rere; rupiri ŋa m'oŋeyo! Kono dwoŋ no ilimo manyalo konyo i hongo ma cal gama.”
Esita odwoko Modekay ni

“Kadhi icoki Joyuda je ma jonitie i tindi madwoŋ Susa. Riy win kareno wikwayo ran ma ndelo adek gi wor adek; ongoye nyatoro ma wocemi kosa womadhi pi. An gi ŋecin paran bende walariyo; aka makada nende cik kiyeyan kidho bongi kere, k'imito nekan ro timo ameno, wonekan.”
Modekay okadho aka otimo gima Esita owaco rigo.

I ndelo mar'adek ma riyo pere, Esita oruko nangin madwoŋ pere aka okidho to cungo i dhiot ma kisika ma iye m'otitere gi kom pa kere. I waŋceŋ acel no kere bende oyido obedo i kom pere ma dhum to ŋiyo dhiot.
Tekin kere neno Esita ocungo tirtir gi dhiot ma oti pere, Esita oywayo cunye. Kere orieyo ri Esita luth pa kere to Esita dhire cegin aka ogeyo gi cinge.
Kere openjo Esita nyamicala ni, “Aŋo Esita nyamicala? Aŋo m'ikwayo? Gim'imito je abino miyin; makada nende bedi ni imito adec ma ker paran.”
Esita odwoko ni, “K'inen kere winjo maber, weyi kere gi Haman jobin i kalima m'atimo rin.”
Kenyo kere owaco ni wolwoŋi Haman piyo jowotimi gima cuny Esita mito. Kere gi Haman jokidho i kalima pa Esita.
Munyo jomedho, kere doko openjo Esita ni, “Aŋo m'imito? Gim'imito je abino miyin. Aŋo m'ikwayo? Makada nende bedi ni imito adec ma ker paran je abino ketho i kare.”
Esita odwoko ni, “Me a gim'akwayo, aka me a gim'amito.
K'inen kere winjo kodan maber, aka adieri go oyikere miyan gim'akwayo aka amito, ere weyi kere gi Haman jowobin i kalima m'atimo rijo. I kalima no, am'abino waco ri kere gima cunyan mito.”
Haman oweyo kalima no munyo go sangala swa aka cunye opoŋ mo. To tekin Haman neno Modekay i waŋkac ma peco pa kere, oneno ni Modekay k'onyutho wor rigo munyo go luwo, aka omako Modekay i cunye.
To makada nende, Haman odhumo nge pere aka odok peco pere. Munyo go otundo peco, olwoŋo merin pere gi dhako pere Zeres.
Haman ocako kwano rijo ŋaŋo pere je kareno pakere. Okwano rijo nyithindho mayac pere to yuma rijo nger ma kere omedo go dwoŋ ma malo loyo jodhum wadi go je; ma nyutho ni kere woro go.
Haman omedere waco rijo ni, “Maloyo mere kiri Esita nyamicala k'oyeyo ŋatimoro je kidho i kalima pere kwanyowoko an gi kere. Aka Esita doko olwoŋan kidho gi kere i kalima man dikin.
To gigipiny me je fodi kinyal yeŋan kafodi amedere neno Modekay Jayuda no munyo fodi nitie i waŋkac ma peco pa kere.”
Kenyo dhako pere Zeres gi merin jowaco rigo ni, “Raŋo i kiwaci wogeti kanek ma fut piero abirio g'abic! Dikin odikin t'iwaco ri kere woŋaw Modekay iye aka nyaka ikadhi i kalima no munyo cunyin ber.”
Haman oparo ni rieko no ber am'omiyo oneno ni ogeti kanek ma fut piero abirio g'abic.
Gi wor no won, kere Aritakises k'onyalo nindo, aka owaco ni okeli rigo kitawo m'ondik'iye gim'otieko timere m'iripo poyo i ker pere aka osoma rigo.
I kitawo no, onwaŋere ni nitie gim'ondiki ma mako kwoŋ Modekay. Modekay ndelo moro onyalo botho kwo pa kere munyo jokur dhiot ma kisika pa kere ma jolur, Bigithana gi Teres jocano neko kere.
Kere openjo ŋecin pere ni, “Aŋo ma watieko timo ma foyo Modekay ri gime?”
Ŋecin pere jodwoko ni, “Fodi k'otimi gimoro ma foyo go.”
To kere penjo k'oyido nitie jodhum pere ma jonitie i diedipo pa kere.
I hongo ma kere luwo no, ama Haman bende odonjo i diedipo pa kere g'atoŋa ma waco ri kere can pere ma ŋawo Modekay i kanek m'oyido otieko geto rigo.
Ameno ŋecin pa kere jodwoko ni, “Haman ama nitie ka kuro nenin.”
Kere owaco ni, “Lwoŋ go wobin.”
Munyo Haman odonjo, kere owaco rigo ni, “Nitie jacwo m'amito swa ni afoy. Iparo ni ber atim rigo aŋo?” Haman obedo gi paro moro i cunye ni, “To ŋa won doko ma kere nyalo foyo ka k'obedo an!”
Haman odwoko kere ni, “Ri jacwo ma kere mito foyo! Ere weyi kere womiy cik woruki ri jacwo no nangin ma kere won ruko. Aka doko kere womiy cik wokel ŋamia pa kere kareno oruki i wiye sangaria.

Aka kere womiy acel kwoŋ jodhum pere cik, woruki ri jacwo no ruk pa kere aka wokethi go wobedi i wi kayina to telo go kareno jowotho thoko tindi madwoŋ Susa. Iwaci ri jadhum no wokoki ka jowotho ama, ‘Me apaka iripo timo ri jacwo ma kere mito foyo.’ ”

Kere owaco ri Haman ni, “Redi piyo eno, inwaŋ ruk no kiri gi ŋamia m'iwaco no ikidhi itim ri Modekay Jayuda m'obedo i waŋkac ma peco pa kere. Ikir'iwey m'ikiluwo wac kada nyaka mathin m'owok i dhokin.”

Ameno Haman okidho aka oruko ri Modekay law pa kere, to ketho go i wi kayina. Haman otelo Modekay kareno jowotho thoko tindi madwoŋ Susa gipi aka okoko ni, “Me a gim'iripo timo ri jacwo ma kere mito foyo.”
Rumacen Modekay ogik i waŋkac ma peco pa kere, aka Haman odok peco pere munyo winjo malith swa aka wiye okwot.

Munyo Haman owaco ri merin pere ma joriek gi Zeres dhako pere gim'otimere rigo, jodwoko go ni, “K'inen ni obedo Modekay nyakwar Joyuda ama ocako camo tiendin gi piny ma redho dwoŋ perin, ikibino nyalo go; aka adieri go bino lacin.”
Munyo Zeres cipa Haman gi merin pa Haman fodi joluwo gi go, ŋecin pa kere ma jolur jobino aka joredo gi Haman i kalima pa Esita.
Ameno kere gi Haman jokadho i kalima pa Esita.
Munyo jomadho vini i kalima mar'ario, kere doko openjo Esita ni, “Esita nyamicala, aŋo m'ikwayo? Abino miyin. Aŋo m'imito? Makada nende bedi ni adec ma ker paran, abino ketho i kare.”
Cipa kere Esita odwoko ni, “K'inen kere winjo kodan maber, aka anwaŋo wor wok bongi kere, kwo paran am'akwayo, aka kwo pa ji paran am'amito.

Otana an gi ji paran ŋey worey wan woko, woneki wan, aka wotoŋ wan. Kabedi nende oyido otana wan paka ŋecin nyaka, mon gi cwo, dinyo aliŋ m'ongoye wac m'owok i dhokan; to ongoye jakwor pa kere manyalo culo go i waŋ nyekirok me.”
Kere Aritakises openjo Esita nyamicala ni, “Meno obedo ŋa? Nikune ŋat'ocano timo gime?”
Esita odwoko ni, “Jakwor mawan, aka ŋat'odak wan obedo jacwo marac me Haman.” Haman obwok swa ruwaŋ kere gi nyamicala.
Aka kere oay malo gi nge, oweyo vini pere to wok i diedipo ma peco pere. Kome Haman odoŋ cen ywak ri Esita wonyali botho kwo pere rupiri go oyido otieko niaŋ paka kere nyalo reyo go woko.

I wickwot Haman oriere piny i tiendi Esita kama Esita oyido obedo cemo. Kenyo won ama kere bende odwoko wok i diedipo pere to donjo i ot kam'oyido jomedh'iye. Kere oywaki gi dwonde ma malo ni, “Imito cayo nyamicala gi peco paran ka, ruwaŋan won!”
Mafodi wac k'opodho i dhok kere, ŋecin pa kere jotweyo waŋ Haman ma nyutho gike pere.

Acel kwoŋ ŋecin pa kere ma lur m'ilwoŋo ni Harbona owaco ni, “Haman omedere kiri to geto kanek ma fut piero abirio g'abic i diedipo pere ma ŋawo Modekay, ŋat'obotho kwo pa kere ndir m'oyido imito neko kere.”
To kere waco ni, “Ŋaw win go i kanek no.”
Oŋaw Haman i kanek ma fut piero abirio g'abic to nyaka nge pa kere kwe.
I ndelo no kere omiyo Esita lim pa Haman jakwor pa Joyuda. Kere olwoŋo Modekay rupiri Esita oyido otieko waco ri kere wat pere gi Modekay.
Kere olunyo peta pere ma go ketho gine cinge i kisi ndiko wok i lwet cinge, aka omiyo Modekay. Peta me am'oyido kere omayo Haman. Kenyo Esita omiyo Modekay dhumo ŋaŋo pa Haman je.
Esita doko ogik to luwo gi kere. Go opodho i tiendi kere gi pigi waŋe; aka oywaki ri kere wonyali juko can ma neki ma Haman nyakwar Agag oyido otimo ma reyo Joyuda.
Kere onyutho Esita luth pa kere to mako.

Esita oay malo to cungo ruwaŋ kere aka owaco ni “K'inen kere winjo kodan maber, aka k'inen kere woran, aka obedo gimo'tire iwaŋ kere aka asangala go, weyi kere wondiki balwa ma wiro cik ma Haman wod pa Hamedatha aka nyakwar Agag oyido ondiko ma reyo woko Joyuda je ma jonitie i kisi adec ma ker pa kere.
Rupiri anonyal nedi neno teko me ka bino kwoŋ ji paran! Kosa anonyal nedi ciro neno k'ireyo wade paran!”
To kere Aritakises waco ri Esita nyamicala gi Modekay Jayuda ni, “Atieko miyo oŋaw Haman i kanek rupiri go oyido mito reyo woko Joyuda aka amiyo Esita lim pere je.

To onyo pama winyalo ndiko i nyingan gima cuny win mito ma mako kwoŋ Joyuda, aka wimwon gi peta pa kere; rupiri ndiko moro je m'ondiki i nyingi kere t'imwono gi peta pa kere kinyal wiro i nger moro je.”
Modekay olwoŋo jondiko pa kere ka piero ario g'abic ma dwe mar'aucel dwe m'ilwoŋo ni Sivan.
Modekay omiyo ondiki balwin i nyingi kere aka omwon gi peta pa kere to oro jomikwenda mayil yil tero. Jomikwenda me jogweyo kayina m'oyido ioro ma timo tic pa kere.

I balwin me, kere omiyo Joyuda meni ma riwirok kanyacel nyalo gwoko kwo pajo. Oyey jo i kisi adec neko, thumo, toŋo, gi reyo woko jokwor pajo je, mon, nyithindho, kiri gi cwo aka jokwany gigipiny pajo ka jomonji jo.
Cik me oyido ripo tic i kisi adec ma ker pa kere Aritakises i ndelo acel k'apar g'adek i dwe mar'apar g'ario dwe m'ilwoŋo ni Adar
Balwin me oyido ripo wosoma paka cik i kisi adec ri nonin je, aka Joyuda joyikere culo kwor kwoŋ jokwor pajo je.
Kere owodho or to jomikwenda mayil yil jogweyo kayina kareno jopoko balwin me i tindi madwoŋ Susa.
Kenyo Modekay oruko nanga manyabululu gi nanga matar paka kere gi sangaria ma pilin gi zahabu i wiye; to tweyo i bade nanga manyarangi ariŋo. Ji josangala swa gi cik manyen me.
Joyuda josangala aka jowinjo maber; aka jolimo wor i kisi adec.

I kisi adec gi tindi madwoŋ ma cik pa kere otund'iye, Joyuda jobedo gi kisangala aka jofore. Joketho ndelo ma camo kalima. Medo kwoŋ meno, ji ma nonin man jowire aka jolokere Joyuda rupiri jobedo gi lworo rijo.

K'apar g'adek ma dwe ma Adar otundo, ndelo m'oyido iripo ketho cik pa kere i tim; ndelo ma jokwor pa Joyuda joyikere reyo woko jo. To i kabedo ma jokwor pa Joyuda reyo woko jo, jo ama doko joreyo woko jokwor pajo.

I kisi tindi madwoŋ i kisi adec pa kere Aritakises, Joyuda jocokere kama jobed'iye kareno jokuro neko nyatoro moro je m'oyido otemi monjo jo. To ngoye nyatoro m'onyalo ciro jo rupiri lworo oyido otieko donjo i cuny jokwor pajo.
Adieri jodhum ma kisi adec, jotel, rwodhe, gi ji ma jowok peco pa kere je, jocungo yu dieŋey Joyuda rupiri lworo oyido otieko donjo i cuny jo ro Modekay.
Ato Modekay oyido obedo jacwo madwoŋ swa peco pa kere; aka bero pere olak i kisi adec paka go omedere idho malo i dwoŋ.
Ameno Joyuda jomedere yuwaŋe i ndelo no, aka joneko piny jokwor pajo je g'abor, jothumo, joreyo woko jo aka jotimo gi jo gima cuny gin omito.
I tindi madwoŋ Susa won, Joyuda joneko ji 500.
Joyuda joneko cwo m'ilwoŋo jo ni Parsandatha, Dalfon, Asipatha,
Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha,
Parmasta, Arisay, Ariday, kodi Vayzatha.
Jome oyido jobedo apar aka wot Haman wod pa Hamedatha, aka jakwor pa Joyuda. To ngoye gigipiny ma jonyaga.
Gi ndelo no won owaci ri kere welo ji ma Joyuda joneko i tindi madwoŋ Susa won kende.

To kere kidho bongi Esita aka owaco rigo ni, “Joyuda joneko ji 500 i tindi madwoŋ Susa won kende kiri gi wot Haman. To onyo kosa jotimo aŋo iy'adec pa kere man! T'onyo doko aŋo m'imito? Abino miyin. Aŋo man m'ikwayo? Abino ketho i kare.”
Esita odwoko ni, “K'inen sangala kere, yey Joyuda ma jobedo i Susa jowotimi gima jotimo konon luwo i cik ma ndelo me, aka yey jowoŋaw delkwoŋ wot Haman i wi kanek”
Kere oyeyo ni wotim paka Esita owaco; aka ondiko cik i tindi madwoŋ Susa. Ameno won to delkwoŋ wot Haman iŋawo kama kisi nyatoro je neno.
Doko to Joyuda ma tindi madwoŋ Susa jocokere k'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe ma Adar aka joneko ji 300; aka jok'onyaga gigipiny.
Medo i wi meno, Joyuda mar'adec pa kere man bende jocokere gwoko kwo pajo, aka jobotho kwo pajo kwoŋ jokwor pajo. Joneko ji 75,000 m'oyido jodak jo; aka jok'onyaga gigipiny.
Gime otimere k'apar g'adek ma dwe ma Adar. Ndelo ma luwo mere k'apar g'aŋwen i dwe meno won joywomere aka joketho ndelo no bedo ma siemirok gi cemo.
To Joyuda ma tindi madwoŋ Susa joloko k'apar g'abic ndelo ma ywomirok aka jobedo gi siemirok gi cemo; rupiri jothumo aka joneko jokwor pajo k'apar g'adek kodi k'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe ma Adar.

Meno am'omiyo Joyuda ma jobedo i lokaloka kodi ma jobedo i tindin ma k'othoki gi cel jopoyo k'apar g'aŋwen ma dwe ma Adar paka ndelo ma siemirok, cemo, gi ywomirok. I ndelo me jodhiro ri wadi jo mic ma cemo manyinge.
Modekay ondiko gigipiny me je i kitawo aka odhiro ri Joyuda ma jowok cegin gi bor balwin iy'adec je pa kere Aritakises.
Go owaco rijo kuro k'apar g'aŋwen gi k'apar g'abic ma dwe ma Adar kisi oro.

Ndelo ario me i dwe ma Adar poyo jo hongo ma jonyalo bothirok kwoŋ jokwor pajo. Me a hongo ma kumo pajo olokere siemirok, aka ywak pajo olokere nyero, aka joripo poyo ndelo no kodi siemirok gi cemo to jopoko mic ma cemo manyinge kareno jomiyo kiri jocandi bende.
Joyuda joyere medirok gi poyo ndelo ario no paka oyido jotieko cako kodi paka Modekay ondiko rijo.
Jotimo ama rupiri Haman wod pa Hamedatha ma jakwor pa Joyuda je oyido ocano reyo woko Joyuda wok kwoŋ kwir m'obol m'ilwoŋo ni Purim.
To munyo Esita okidho bongi kere, kere owodho or to can pa Haman marac je gik kwoŋ go won, aka Haman kiri gi yac pere je oŋaw jo i wi kanek.
Luwo kwoŋ balwa pa Modekay kodi gim'otimere ri Joyuda, ywomirok me pama ilwoŋo ni Purim.

Joyuda joyere aka joridho tim me i kwo pajo gi nyikway jo kodi jono je ma jowire to jolokere Joyuda. Jowaco paka jok'owey ma jok'opoyo ndelo ario me i hongo m'otire kisi oro paka Modekay ondiko i balwa pere.
Oyere ni i kisi peco pa Jayuda, ji ma jobin yuwaŋe i kisi adec kodi i kisi tindi joripo poyo to jokuro ndelo ario no ma dwe ma Adar ma jok'oweyo to gik gi luse pa nyikway jo.
To Esita nyamicala nyar Abihayili ndiko balwa ma bende yere gi balwa pa Modekay Jayuda ma mako kwoŋ ndelo madwoŋ no aka oridho gi dwoŋ pere.
Balwin me ondiki ri Joyuda je aka odhir i kisi adec je 127 ma ker pa kere Aritakises. Balwin no omito ri Joyuda siem kodi bedo ji ma jopie.

Balwa me omiyo Joyuda kodi nyikway jo je cik ma kuro ndelo ma Purim i hongo m'otire, paka jo wegi oyido con mere joyere to jotimo i ndir ma joywak to joriyo; aka doko rupiri Modekay kodi Esita bende jomiyo cik.
Cik pa Esita ma ridho tim ma Purim me ondiki piny ri ji apoya.
To kere ketho misolo ri ji je ma ker pere kodi ji je m'oyido jonitie i lowo pere kodi ma jonitie i kigoda ma nam.
Gigipiny je ma kere otimo gi meni kodi dwoŋ pere, kodi gima go otimo je, tiŋo Modekay i dwoŋ ma malo to kosa nitie ma k'ondiki i kitawo pa kerin je ma jodhumo Pasia gi Mediya!

Modekay Jayuda am'oyido luwo kere Aritakises i dwoŋ. Go am'oyido obedo jacwo manitie gi dwoŋ ma malo swa kwoŋ Joyuda. Joyuda joworo go swa rupiri go oyido tiyo ri bero pa ji pere aka doko go oyido luwo ri bero pa Joyuda je.
Cango obedo jacwo moro i lowo ma Uz m'ilwoŋo ni Yobu.
Go oyido nitie gi wote abirio gi nyike adek.
Go oyido nitie gi rombo 7,000 ŋamin 3,000 dhok 1,000 punde 500 kodi ŋecin kweth. Go am'oyido obedo jaŋaŋo loyo ji je ma yuwok ceŋ.
Wot Yobu oyido jotimo kalima i weso i ot pa kisi dhano, ma joman oyido jokidho i ot pa ŋata timo kalima, aka oyido jolwoŋo nyimin jo.

Kisi k'acel otimo kalima, Yobu oyido cew odikin to miyo cowirok awaŋa cungo kwoŋ welo pajo ma lonyo jo. Ato Yobu oyido waco ni, “Poyi nyithindho paran jotimo reco, to jokwoŋo Were i cuny jo.” Me gima Yobu otimo noknok.
Rwoth openjo Sitan ni, “Iwok yukune?”
Sitan odwoko ni, “Awok thembo ka gi kaca, kilera i piny.”
Rwoth openjo jakwor Sitan ni, “Iliewo ye ŋeca paran Yobu? Ongoye ŋata cale gi go i piny. Go ongoye g'apuse aka obedo jacwo m'otire ma lworo Were aka kitim reco.”
Kole itieko geto cel thoko go gi peco pere kodi kisi gima go nitie gine i kisi thenge. Itieko miyo tic ma cinge silwany, aka lim pere onyay i piny.
To tel nyaka cingin, aka igey gima go nitie gine je, Yobu lakwoŋin ruwaŋin.”
Rwoth owaco ri jakwor Sitan ni, “Meno ber, kisi gima go nitie gine je nitie i cingin, to nyaka ikir'itel cingin geyo go!” Ameno Sitan oeye woko ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Ndelo acel, munyo nyithindho pa Yobu jotimo kalima i ot p'omin jo madwoŋ, oyido jocemo aka jomedho.
Jamikwenda obino to waco ri Yobu ni, “Megikwe oyido jofuro aka punde bende jocemo gi thenge.
Kenyo Josabin jopodho kwoŋ jo to jokadho gi jo. Joneko ŋecin perin je g'abor, aka an kendan aŋat'akwale waco rin.”
Mafodi jamikwenda no luwo, ŋeca man obino to waco ri Yobu ni, “Mac pa Were opodho wok i polo to waŋo woko rombo gi ŋecin, aka oreyo woko joje. An kendan aŋat'akwale waco rin.”
Mafodi jamikwenda no luwo, ŋeca man obino to waco ri Yobu ni, “Jobabilon jobino i kitipin adek, aka jonyaga ŋamin to joneko ŋecin g'abor. An kendan aŋat'akwale waco rin.”
Mafodi jamikwenda no luwo, ŋeca man obino to waco ri Yobu ni, “Nyithindho perin oyido jocemo aka jomadho vini i ot p'okayo perin,
koyo madwoŋ okudho wok i thim abwap, to redho sondin aŋwen ma ot, aka opodho kwoŋ jo jotho. An kendan aŋat'akwale waco rin.”
Kenyo Yobu oay, oyeco woko kanzu pere, olielo ye wiye to fodere piny to lamo.
Go owaco ni, “Cango awok i iy mama ma bu gimoro, aka alatho ma bu gimoro. Rwoth omiyan aka kendo omayan; nyingi Rwoth wopak.”
Makada nende gime je otimere, Yobu k'otimo reco aka go k'opusa Were.
Ndelo acel jomalaika jobino ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka jakwor Sitan bende obino i dier jo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Rwoth openjo Sitan ni, “Iwok yukune?”
Sitan odwoko ni, “Awok thembo ka gi kaca, kilera i piny.”

Rwoth openjo jakwor Sitan ni, “Iliewo ye ŋeca paran Yobu? Ongoye ŋata cale gi go i piny, go ongoye g'apuse aka obedo jacwo m'otire ma lworo Were aka kitim reco. Go fodi ocwire i timo gim'otire makada nende itemo kwinyan kwoŋ go, reyo woko go m'ongoye atoŋa.”
Sitan odwoko Rwoth ni, “Del ri del! Dhano miyo kisi gima go nitie gine ŋey wonyali kwo.
To riey cingin igey cokin pere gi delkwoŋe, aka Yobu lakwoŋin ruwaŋin.”
Rwoth owaco ri Sitan ni, “Meno ber go nitie i cingin, t'ikir'igey kwo pere.”
Kenyo Sitan oeye woko ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka otula kwoŋ Yobu g'adholin wok i par tiende tundo i tipin wiye.
Yobu okadho to bedo i buru aka okwanyo thago to cako gwaro gine delkwoŋe.
Kenyo dhako pere openjo go ni, “Fodi icwire timo gim'otire? Kwoŋ Were, aka itho.”
To Yobu odwoko ni, “Iluwo paka mon mamiŋ joluwo. Walajolo nyaka bero kende wok i cingi Were m'ongoye raco?” I gime je Yobu k'otimo reco i luwo pere.

Merin pa Yobu adek jowinjo kwoŋ teko me je m'oyido opodho kwoŋ go, aka kisi dhano owok peco pere bino. Merin me jobedo Elifaz ma wok i tindi madwoŋ Teman, Bilidad ma wok i piny Suha, kodi Zofar ma wok i piny Namath. Joromo kanyacel kadho kweyo cuny gi yomo cuny Yobu.
Munyo joneno go gi bor, jok'onyalo niaŋ kwoŋe, aka jotiŋo dwondi gin malo to joywak, joyeco nangin pajo aka jobolo fukefuke i koyo i wi jo.
Jobedo piny i lowo gi go odieceŋ abirio gi wor abirio, aka ongoye ŋat'oluwo wac rigo, kwoŋbedo joneno ni candirok pere oyido dwoŋ swa.
Yobu owaco ni,
Weyi ndelo m'anywol'iye worere,
gi wor m'ogaman'iye i ici!
Weyi ndelo no wobedi mudho,
weyi Were ma malo okir wodew kwoŋe,
kosa lero okir woliel'iye.
Weyi ndelo no wobedi ndelo ma kumo gi mudho mapek,
weyi pondeponde woum,
aka colo wobwoki.
Weyi mudho mapek worey woko wor no,
okir okwan kwoŋ ndelo ma oro,
kosa kwoŋ ndelo ma dwe.
Ey weyi ndelo no worere,
aka wongoy'iye kisangala.
Weyi jono ma jokwoŋo Nam jowokwoŋ,
jono ma jondijo ma ico Leviathan.
Weyi micalin ma keko mere jokiri jowoliel,
aka okir obedi gi geno ma lero.
Kwoŋi wor no kwoŋbedo omiyan anywole,
to thangan ri teko gi rem.
Kabedi oyido atho ran i iy mama,
kosa bedi oyido atho tekin itieko colan.
Raŋo mama otiŋan i tiende,
kosa omiyan dhoth?
Dinyo pama ariere ran piny liŋ,
dinyo pama aywomere ran inindo;
kanyacel gi kerin kodi jodhum ma piny,
ma jogeto kendo gundin rijo wegi.
Kosa dinyo pama anindo kanyacel gi wot kerin,
ma jopoŋo udi pajo gi zahabu kodi feza.
Raŋo k'oyikan paka ici m'opodho woko,
paka nyathi ma k'oneno lero?
Koro jokidakana joweyo candirok,
aka jom'ol joywomere.
Kenyo jotwec jobedo i siem kanyacel,
jokiwinji dwondi jakur jiera.
Jomathindho gi jomadongo jonitie koro,
aka ŋecin jogonyere kwoŋ jodongo pajo.
Raŋo imiyo lero ri ŋata nitie i kumo?
Raŋo imiyo kwo ri ŋata nitie i rem?
aka jodwaro tho loyo lim m'opanere.
Josiemere swa,
aka josangala ka jotho.
Raŋo imiyo lero ri ŋata yo pere opanere,
ri dhano ma Were ocego yo pere?
Kole ahamo kareno auco ayin, ikabedo pa cemo,
aka ywak paran ma litho ule paka pi.
Adieri gim'oyido alworo bino kwoŋan,
aka gim'oyido miyan bwok otundo ran.
Adieri kiyot ran, aka angoye i siem,
angoye gi ywomirok, to teko bino.
Kenyo Elifaz ma wok i tindi madwoŋ Teman odwoko ka waco ni,
“Ka dhano otemo waco rin gimoro, inoter marac?
To ŋa manyalo liŋ ma k'owaco gimoro?
Neni, itieko fonjo ji kweth,
aka imiyo ji ma jonyapere meni.
Gi wac perin, ithielo ji m'oyido jotangatanga,
aka imiyo jo cungo.
To onyo pama teko otieko podho rin, aka ikinyal bedo moth,
ogeyin aka ingoye gi geno.
Kosa lworo Were perin k'obedo miseni perin,
gi wotho perin i yo m'otire geno perin?
Mondo poyi ye, ŋa ma bubanja m'otieko rerok?
