Kosa ŋa ma timo gim'otire m'otieko tho?
Paka atieko neno, jono ma jocwoyo reco gi teko,
bende jokeco gimoro acel no won.
Jorere woko gi luya pa Were,
aka jorumo woko gi mwoc ma nge pere.
Johola gi derino paka simbwor mager,
t'ituro woko lak jo.
Jocale simbwor ma rere woko kwoŋbedo ongoye gim'ocam,
jotho, aka nyithindhi jo jokedhere woko.
Wac obino ran nyaliŋliŋ,
aka awinjo mwoŋo mere i ithan.
ka nindo mapek okwalo ji,
lworo opoŋ kwoŋan, aka acako kirin,
to miyo cokin paran je yengirok.
Koyo okudho waŋan,
aka yer ma delkwoŋan oay.
Aneno gimoro ocungo ma kikithini t'akinyalo niaŋ kwoŋ cal mere,
cal ma gimoro oyido nitie ruwaŋan,
piny oliŋ nisi aka awinjo dwondi moro mwoŋo.
Dhano bende nyalo timo gim'otire ruwaŋ Were?
Dhano bende nyalo bedo macil ruwaŋ Jacwec pere?
Were kigen kiri ŋecin pere won,
aka go nwaŋo komo kiri kwoŋ jomalaika.
Ameno won bende kiri gi ji ma jobedo lowo,
ma misingi pajo obedo fukefuke,
m'inyalo ŋinyo paka thuth ŋinyo gimoro.
Ireyo woko jo i dier odikin g'othieno,
jorere kicutho ma kinyal paro kwoŋ jo.
K'ofudhi woko thol ma wema pajo,
jotho ma bu rieko.”
Lwoŋ pama, Yobu, neni ka dhano odwokin.
Nitie jomalaika m'ilawire bongi jo?
Adieri paro neko jomamiŋ,
aka nyeko neko joma nyap.
Atieko neno ŋatamiŋ lokere madwoŋ,
to akwoŋo peco pere abwap.
Nyithindho pere jokibedi i siem,
iŋinyo woko jo i waŋkac,
aka ongoye ŋata kwonga jo.
Jokec jocamo cemo pa jamiŋo,
kiri cemo m'odongo i kudhin,
aka joriyo jomako nyeko gi lim pere.
Rem kiwoki i piny,
aka teko kiwoki i lowo.
Kisi dhano nywole ri teko,
paka mac gaŋere malo.
Paka ri an, alarango Were,
aka alakiosa banja paran bongi go.
Go timo gigipiny madongo aka m'opanere,
gigipiny ma gir'aura ma kikwanere.
Go miyo koth i piny,
aka dhieko ndelin.
Go tiŋo malo jono ma jonitie piny,
aka miyo jono ma joywak kisangala.
ŋey gima jotimo kiyindira.
Go mako jorieko i can pajo wegi,
aka nyeko woko mito pajo piyo.
Joromo gi mudho odieceŋ par,
aka jomudamuda odieceŋ paŋini wor.
To go botho jacandi kwoŋ tho,
gi ji ma jongoye gi nyalo wok iy'adica.
Go miyo jocandi geno,
aka mwono dhok jokidakana.
riameno ikir'icay gir'acula ma Jameni miyo.
go miyo litho, to cingi go cango.
Go labothin kwoŋ teko aucel,
iy'abirio ongoye raco ma lageyin.
I kec, go labothin kwoŋ tho,
aka i lweny go labothin tho g'abor.
Were labothin kwoŋ misegey,
aka ikilabedo gi lworo ka rerok obin.
K'akaka gi kec obin, ilanyero,
aka ikilalworo ogwaŋe madudi ma piny.
Ilatimo cikirok gi telin madudi,
aka ilabedo i siem g'ogwaŋe madudi.
Ilabedo i siem i wema perin,
aka k'ikaŋasa mwendi perin, ikilanwaŋo ni nitie m'orwenyo.
Ilaŋeyo ni ilabedo gi nyikwayin kweth,
aka jolacale lum ma piny.
Ilatho kareno itieko ti,
paka withi ŋano tegino i hongo ma keco.
Neni, watieko kikaŋasa gime, obedo adieri,
winji kwoŋe, ŋey in won iŋey.
Kenyo Yobu odwoko ni,
Kabedi oyido inyalo kipima rem paran,
kanyacel gi teko paran!
Dinyo opek loyo kwoyo ma nam,
riameno wac paran okwakere.
Kole asere pa Jameni Je otieko celan,
aka amadho kwir mere,
Were odhiro bwok kwoŋan.
Punda bende geŋisa ka camo lum,
aka dhiaŋ bende cemo m'oliŋ?
Gima bothi bende icamo m'ongoye cumbi,
kosa gima pige both bende nitie gi mito?
Awanya paran ma cemo ongoye kwoŋ nger cemo no,
kwoŋbedo jocale ran cemo ma cunyan odak.
Kabedi oyido anyalo tiŋo malo ywak paran,
aka Were womiyan gim'ayenyo.
Kabedi Were wonekan,
ka bedi go wolwogi cinge to nekan.
Dinyo gime oyomo cunyan,
dinyo asangala makada nende litho paran dwoŋ.
Nikune meni ma fodi anyalo kure gine makwo?
Gike paran obedo aŋo, ma d'omiyan abedo moth?
Kosa atek paka tele,
kosa delkwoŋan ocwey gi ywel?
Ongoye nger m'anyal konyirok'iye,
aka arumo gi rieko.
Jono ma jokwero nyutho mere pajo wor,
jokilwor Jameni Je.
Merin paran jor'akor,
paka pi ma mol kadho wok i malawa.
Jomakere paka pe,
aka jonyidho paka pe.
I hongo ma lietho joleny woko,
aka jothwo woko.
Jowiyo royo pajo,
jokadho i laro to jorwenyo woko.
Jowoth ma Teman jorango,
aka jowoth ma Seba bende jorango jo swa.
Cuny jo oŋedhere kwoŋbedo oyido jogeno,
jotundo, aka jodoŋ dhier.
Ameno apaka witieko lokere ran,
wineno teko paran, aka wibwok.
Atieko ye kwayo win mic,
wok i lim mewin?
Atieko ye kwayo win bothan wok i cingi jakwor,
kosa wok i cingi jomaker?
Fonjan, aka alaliŋ,
aka titi ran kama akom'iye.
Waco gim'otire litho jo,
to gim'iwaco ongoye kony.
K'iparo ni aluwo koyo,
raŋo idwoko wac paran ma rem?

aka oŋinyan woko, to comere kodan.
Go bayo aserin wok i thenge je,
aserin ma kedho rogan aka miyo litho,
m'ongoye nyutho wor;
aka oyo woko kedhino paran piny i lowo.
Go miyan litho radhik,
aka rure kwoŋan paka jalweny.
Atieko kwoyo kutiya kwoŋan,
aka abedo piny i fukefuke m'aloc.
Waŋan obokere ro ywak,
aka onyo obore to cor.
Makada nende cingan kitim gir'akaka,
aka kwayo paran olony.
Awi piny, ikir'ium remo paran,
aka ywak paran womedere.
ŋata cungo ran to thielan.
Merin paran jonyeran,
t'aoyo pigi waŋan ri Were.
Kabedi dhano moro oyido nyalo ywak ran ye gi Were,
paka dhano timo ri mere pere.
Oro paran rumo,
alakadho kama akiladwoko kendo.
Cunyan obwok, aka ndelo paran orumo,
kole bur ma yik kuran.
Adieri joŋalok jothokan,
aka aneno jo gi waŋan ka jokwinyan.
Mondo yere gi gim'awaco, awi Were,
ongoye dhano man ma layere kodan.
Itieko cego paro pajo niaŋ,
riameno ikilayeyo jowoloyan.
Jono ma jokwedere kwoŋ merin pajo ro cul,
nyithindho pajo jolacandere ri gino.
Atieko lokere ri ji ageca awaca,
aka ji joŋulere ruwaŋan.
Waŋan otieko cor ro rem,
aka delkwoŋan mok paka tipo.
Ji ma jotimo gim'otire jodhier ro gime,
aka joje jowaco ni akuya Were.
Kucel ŋata timo gim'otire kiladhiere,
aka ŋata cinge olony lamedo bedo matek.
To win, dwoki win, wijoje,
aka akilanwaŋo i dier win ŋata nitie gi rieko.
Ndelo paran orumo, aka can paran onyekere woko,
kwoŋ mito ma cunyan.
Jolwoŋo wor ni odieceŋ,
aka jowaco ni lero both cal mudho.
K'anonen piny pa jom'otho paka ot paran,
k'anopedhi kanindo paran i mudho,
k'anolwoŋ bur ni, baba,
kodi kudin ni mama kosa nyamin an,
anobedi gi geno,
kosa nitie ŋat'omiyan geno?
Geno paran kiladonjo kodan i piny pa jom'otho?
Wakilakadho piny kanyacel i fukefuke?
Kenyo Bilidad ma wok i Suha odwoko ama,
Iladwaro gir'awaca kiri keraŋo Yobu?
Liŋ luwo, aka walaluwo.
Raŋo ikwano wan kwoŋ dhok,
aka itero wan paka ji mamiŋ?
In won imiyere litho ro nge perin.
Dhano wowey piny me ro in?
Kosa Were lakwanyo woko gote ro in?
aka mac pajo k'oliel.
Lero lokere mudho i wema pajo,
aka ineko woko tala i wi jo.
Inyapo woko tiendi jo matek,
aka jothuyere gi can pajo wegi.
Tiendi gin wegi tero jo i bwo,
aka jopodho i bur.
Mitego por iy'odondo pajo,
aka moko gi jo.
Iciko rijo thol t'iyiko i lowo,
iciko rijo thol i royo.
Teko bwoko jo i kisi thenge,
aka riemo jo ka tiendi jo.
Kec omayo jo meni,
aka teko kuro miyo jo podho.
Two halo woko pien delkwoŋ jo,
aka ŋundo woko lwet jo.
Iyeco woko jo i wema m'oyido jogeno,
aka iriyo jo romo gi Kere Tho.
Ongoye gima doŋ i wemin pajo,
aka ikir'iye kares ma kwanyo woko two.
Fuc pajo thwo woko piny i lowo,
aka jangi jo ner woko.
Ki poyi jo kendo i piny,
aka nyingi jo rere woko i royo.
Ibolo jo wok i lero kadho i mudho,
aka iriemo woko jo i piny.
Jongoye gi nyithindho kosa nyikway jo i dier ji pajo,
aka ongoye ŋat'obothi kama cango jobed'iye.
Ji ma yupodho ceŋ jodhier kwoŋ podho pajo,
aka ji ma yuwok ceŋ jobwok gi kirin.
Adieri meno a kabedo pa jokidakana,
meno a gike pa ji ma jokuya Were.
Kenyo Yobu odwoko ni,
Wilamiyan litho kiri keraŋo?
Aka wilaturan gi wac mewin?
Sawa je wiyetan,
aka wickwot kimaki win timo ran marac.
To makada nende oyido bedi ni adieri atimo reco,
meno mako kwoŋan won.
Adieri witieko kwoto ran,
aka wiloko teko paran gi piem mewin.
Onyo ŋey win ni Were am'otieko miyan akom,
aka otweyan i katimba pere.
Makada nende aywak ni, “Akaka.”
Ongoye ŋata dwokan,
aka ongoye ŋata winjo ywak paran ri tiro.
Were otieko geŋo royo paran, aka akinyali luwo,
go oketho mudho i yo paran.
Go okwanyo woko lim paran,
aka oreyo woko dwoŋ paran.
Go turan woko i kisi thenge, aka arumo,
go otieko fudho woko geno paran paka ifudho yath.
Keme pere oliel kwoŋan,
aka go teran paka jakwor pere.
Jolweny pere jobino kanyacel,
aka jokaran,
joketho kambi pajo thoko wema paran.
Were omiyo jothuwan won kwedirok kwoŋan,
aka onyo alokere japath ri ji ma joŋeyan.
Merin paran gi wade paran joredhan,
wendo ma jobino i ot paran wi jo owil kodan,
onyo alokere japath aka jakicar ruwaŋ ŋecin paran ma mon.
Alwoŋo ŋeca paran, aka go kiye ran,
an aŋat'aywakere rigo kendo.
Dhako paran kinyal ciro ŋwece paran,
wade paran jokinyal corok cegin bongan.
Nyithindho mathindho jocayan,
aka jonyeran ka jonenan.
Merin paran ma kacunyan jodakan,
aka jono m'amaro jowire kwoŋan.
Cokin paran omoko i pien gi delkwoŋan,
aka joŋenyere woko paka lakan.
Maki win kodan wor, maki ran win wor, awi merin paran,
kole cingi Were otieko geyan.
Raŋo wirieman paka Were rieman,
wikiyeŋ gi litho paran?
Kabedi dhano oyido nyalo ndiko wac paran,
aka t'ikano i kitawo!
Kosa ka bedi oyido inyalo goro gi kalam ma cuma i tele,
t'indiko ma kinyal rere kendo!
Kole aŋeyo ni Jaboth paran kwo,
aka ni rumacen go lacungo ran i piny.
Ka two otieko camo pien delkwoŋan,
kafodi anitie i del me, alaneno Were.
Go, ma an won alaneno,
alaneno go gi waŋan won, makiweno ŋatiman.
Adundo paran gore,
kwoŋbedo wiwaco ni, wanocandi go nedi,
wirango tiendi wac kwoŋan.
To onyo, bedi win gibwok ri abor,
abor ma kelo keme pa Were kwoŋ reco,
ŋey wiŋey ni nitie ŋata thumo banja.
Kenyo Zofar ma wok i piny Namath odwoko ama,
Paro paran diyan m'akinyal liŋ,
kwoŋbedo akinyali bedo moth.
Gim'iwaco obedo yet,
t'aŋeyo nger ma dwokin'iye.
Fodi ikuya gime wok cango,
wok cuka cwey dhano i piny,
ni ongoye jakidakana m'otieko kwo hongo malac,
aka ni kisangala pa ji ma bu Were bedo macek?
Makada nende jodongi madwoŋ, tundo i polo,
aka wic jo otele geyo pondeponde,
jolarere kicutho paka ceth pajo,
aka jono m'oyido joŋeyo jo jolapenjo ni, “Nikune jo?”
Jolarwenyo paka lek, aka k'onwaŋi jo,
aka ilariemo woko jo paka menyirok ma wor.
Ji m'oyido joneno jo, jokilaneno jo kendo,
aka jolarwenyo i kabedo m'oyido jokw'iye.
Nyithindho pajo joladwoko ri jocandi,
lim ma jokwalo gi cingi jo.
Delkwoŋ jo oyido foth aka tek,
to jolalokere fukefuke.
Makada nende kidakana mit i dhok jo,
aka jokudo i dandi jo,
makada nende jokinyal weyo,
aka jomedo kano i dhok jo,
cemo pajo lokere makec i iy gin,
makec paka kwir thwol i iy jo.
Joŋoko lim m'oyido jokwalo,
Were fudho woko wok i iy jo.
Jolamwonyo kwir malasaŋ,
aka laneko jo paka thwol toŋo jo.
Jokilakwo neno malawa,
waŋ pi ma mol gi mo kic kodi cak.
Jolapoko kisi gima jotieko tiyo rigo,
aka jokilawinjo cwe ma lim pajo.
Kole jotieko diyo to jojwango jocandi,
jotero udi ma jok'ogeto.
Iy jo kipoŋi gi ma romo,
aka woro kimiy jo rem gimoro.
Ka jocemo, ongoye gima doŋ,
riameno lim pajo rumo woko.
Ka jonitie gi ma romo, jobedo i litho,
aka peko ma rem je podho kwoŋ jo.
Ma poŋo iy gin,
Were ladhiro nge pere mager i iy jo,
aka lacwe kwoŋ jo paka cemo pajo.
Jolaringo kwoŋ gilweny ma nyweny,
aka asere ma ywel lacelo jo.
Aserin celo delkwoŋ jo aka yure woko,
lewe ma pilin wok ikedhino pajo,
aka jokirin.
Kisi gima jotieko kano larere woko,
mac ma dhano ama k'ocwinyo lawaŋo jo,
aka lareyo woko gim'odoŋ i wema pajo.
Polo lathango reco pajo,
aka piny lamonjo jo.
Ilareyo woko lim pajo je,
i mikula ma keme pa Were.
Me obedo gir'acula pa jokidakana,
me obedo gike pajo ma Were owodho or kwoŋe.
Kenyo Yobu odwoko ama,
Winji wac paran odoco,
aka me kende ayomo cuny m'akwayin.
Comere kodan, aka alaluwo,
aka k'atieko luwo, inyalo cayo.
Paka ri an, kigeŋisa paran k'obedo ri ji,
raŋo abedi moth?
Ŋiyan, aka iladhier,
aka ilaumo dhokin gi cingin.
K'aparo kwoŋ gim'otimere ran,
adoŋ dhier aka acako kirin.
Raŋo jokidakana jomedo kwo,
joti, aka jolokere matek?
Jonitie gi nyithindho kodi nyikway jo,
aka joneno jo jodongo ruwaŋ jo.
Lworo ongoye i udi pajo,
aka Were kikel teko kwoŋ jo.
Dhok pajo jocemo,
aka jonywol m'ongoye teko.
Nyithindho jowaya paka mwendi,
aka jomielo thoko jo.
Jowero gi sasi kodi tongol,
aka josiemere gi dwondi milowe.
Jobedo i kwo ma siem,
aka jotho moth m'ongoye candirok.
Jokidakana jowaco ni Were oweyere gi jo,
jokimiti ŋeyo yo pere.
Jopenjo ni, “Jameni Je a ŋa, ma waripo tiyo rigo?
Aka magowa aŋo ma walimo ka wakwayo go?”
Jowaco ni lim pajo owok i meni pajo,
to akiyere gi paro pa jokidakana.
Tala pa jakidakana oliel kiri keraŋo?
Teko podho kwoŋ jo didi?
Were miyo jokidakana bende gir'acula i nge?
Didi ma jocale kanja i koyo,
kosa paka cuŋ m'asur tiŋo?
Wiwaco ni Were miyo nyathi gir'acula ro kidakana pa bamere,
be, Were womiy gir'acula ri ŋat'otimo kidakana won, ŋey jowoŋey.
Weyi jo wegi jowotiŋ gir'acula pajo,
aka jowowinji keme pa Were Majameni Je.
Jodewo aŋo kwoŋ pecin pajo ka jotieko tho,
ka ndelo pajo orumo?
Nitie ŋata lafonjo Were rieko?
Go ma thumo banja kiri ri jodongo.
Jomegi jobedo ma jolama cuka jotho,
jobedo i siem m'ongoye gima jolwor.
Delkwoŋ go foth ro cemo maber,
aka cokin pere opoŋ more.
Joman jotho gi keco iy'adundo,
m'ongoye gima jocamo maber.
To joje jotho aka iyiko jo,
aka kudin camo joje.
Ha, aŋeyo paro mewin,
gi can mewin ma timo ran raco.
Wipenjo ni, “Nikune ot pa jadhum?
Nikune wema ma jokidakana oyido jokw'iye?”
Fodi wikipenjo ye ji ma jowoth?
Fodi wikiwinjo radwok pajo?
Jokidakana joboth i ndelo ma teko,
aka ibotho jo i ndelo ma keme.
Ongoye ŋat'osegeya jo,
aka ongoye ŋata culo kwor kwoŋ jo ri gima jotimo.
K'oteri jo kayik,
i kaliel pajo m'okur maber,
ji ganin jobino yiko jo,
aka kiri lowo je umo delkwoŋ jo moth.
Onyo ilayomo cunyan nedi gi wac nono?
Radwok perin obedo twodo kende.
Dhano bende nitie gi cwe ri Were?
Adieri ka dhano riek meno cwe pere won.
Timo gim'otire perin sangala Jameni Je?
Nitie gima Were limo ka yo perin ongoy'iye apuse?
Were bwokin aka temin,
kwoŋbedo ilworo go?
Be, obedo kwoŋbedo kidakana perin dwoŋ,
aka reco perin thoth.
Itieko mako gigipiny pa ji m'ongoye atoŋa,
aka imayo jo nangin to jodoŋ kinyoro.
Ikwero miyo joma riyo neko pi,
aka ithwono joma kec neko cemo.
I oro dwoŋ perin gi meni perin,
ma mayo ji lowo je.
Itieko riemo woko mon tho gi cingi jo nono,
aka itieko kinyaga t'icando nyithindho kic.
Riameno bwo othokin,
aka lworo poŋ kwoŋin abwap.
Mudho oumin m'ikinyal ŋiyo,
aka mikula umin.
Were bedo malo i polo,
aka go neno micalin malo, makada nende joŋawere.
Riameno ipenjo, aŋo ma Were oŋeyo?
Go nyalo thumo riwan banja ma pondeponde oumo go?
Pondeponde umo go, ma go kinyal neno,
aka go wotho thoko polo.
Ilamedere woth i yo macon,
ma jokidakana jowoth'iye?
Jotho mafodi hongo pajo k'otundo,
aka mikula oreyo woko jo.
Jowaco ri Were ni, “Weyere gi wan.
Aŋo ma Jameni Je nyalo timo riwan?”
Kucel Were opoŋo udi pajo gi gigipiny maber,
to akiniaŋ can pa jokidakana.
Ji ma jotimo gim'otire gi ji ma bubanja jonyero,
ka joneno imiyo jokidakana gir'acula.
Kole jowaco ni, “Adieri jokwor mawan jotho,
aka mac oreyo woko gima joweyo.”
Yere gi Were Yobu, aka ibedi i siem gi go.
I nger me ilalimo bero.
Yey fonji ma wok i dhok go,
aka kur wac pere i cunyin.
K'igik bongi Jameni Je,
t'itimo gim'otire peco perin,
go ladwokin.
K'itero zahabu paka fukefuke,
kodi zahabu ma Ofir paka telin mager,
t'itero Jameni Je paka zahabu perin,
i feza perin ma welo,
kenyo ilaketho geno i Were,
aka go labedo kisangala perin.
Ilakwayo Were, to go winjin,
aka ilakuro cikirok perin.
Ilatimo gimoro, aka lacowere rin maber,
aka yo perin labedo maler.
Were mwolo jonoro,
aka go tiŋo malo ji mamwol.
Go labothin k'ingoye gi banja,
ka gim'itimo otire.
Kenyo Yobu odwoko ama,
Konon bende kigeŋisa paran kec,
cingi go fodi pek kwoŋan, makada nende auco.
Kabedi oyido aŋeyo kam'anyalo nwaŋ'iye Were,
ŋey anyal kadho kama go bed'iye.
Dinyo aosa ruwaŋ go,
t'awodho piem paran.
Dinyo aŋeyo radwok pere,
t'aniaŋ gima go d'owaci.
Were oyido nyalo kiosa kodan i meni pere madwoŋ?
Be, to dinyo go winjan, k'aluwo.
Koro ŋata timo gim'otire dinyal pido gi Were,
aka dinyo go owaco ni an abu banja.
K'akadho malo, Were ongoye kenyo,
k'agiki acen, akinyali niaŋ go,
k'akidho racam go pondo, aka akinen go,
k'awire racuc, je akinen go.
To go oŋeyo woth paran je,
ka go oteman, lanwaŋo ni acil paka zahabu.
Tiendan kirway i yo pere,
atieko kuro yo pere aka akiwire i thenge.
Or pere kingoye i dhokan,
aka atieko tero wac ma wok i dhok go i cunyan.
To go won cowere, ongoye ŋata nyalo wiro paro pere.
Gima go mito ama timo.
Go ketho i kare gima go ocano ran,
aka nger gigipiny no thoth i paro pere.
Riameno abwok ruwaŋ go,
k'aparo kwoŋe, apoŋ gi lworo rigo.
Were otieko miyo cunyan podho,
Jameni Je otieko bwokan.
Kabedi oyido anyalo rwenyo i mudho,
dinyo mudho omiyo waŋan ocore.
Raŋo Were kikethi ndelo ma thumo banja?
Raŋo ji ma jotiyo rigo jokilim tiro?
Jokidakana jofudho kew ma lowo,
jokwalo mwendi aka joriwo jo kanyacel g'apajo.
Jotero punde pa nyathi kic,
aka jomako dhiaŋ pa citho cuka culo banja.
Jodhiro joma nyap i thengi royo,
aka joromo jocandi ringo jowopondi.
Jocale punde ma thim,
ma jokadho i timo tic pajo,
ma dwaro cemo i thim m'othwo,
ma pidho nyithindhi jo.
Jokeco cemo i ndelo ma k'obedo apajo,
aka jofono nyingi vini i ndelo vini pa jokidakana.
Jonindo wor gipi kinyoro, m'ongoye nanga,
aka jongoye gi gium i ŋico.
Jodhiek gi thoyo ma wi gote,
aka jomoko i tele ro mito bwok.
Ji joywayo nyathi kic wok i thundho,
aka jomako nyithindho pa jocandi ri banja.
To jocandi jobedo kinyoro, m'ongoye nanga,
aka joriyo kec kareno jokeco ŋano.
Jobiyo mo oliv i bol pajo,
aka jodhiŋo vini, gi riyo ma neko jo.
Joma nitie i litho gi ma jotho joywak i tindi madwoŋ ri kony,
kucel Were kidew kwoŋ kwayo pajo.
Nitie jono ma jokwero lero,
ma jokiniaŋ yo mere,
aka jokiluwi yo mere.
Janek ay othieno,
neko jacandi gi ŋata bu gimoro,
aka wor cal jakwo.
Waŋ jacot bende kuro colo,
ka jowaco ni ongoye ŋata laneno jo,
aka go rukere matek niaŋ kwoŋe.
Jokwo jokunyo udi wor,
aka odieceŋ jopondo, johepa lero.
Mudho mapek cal rijo odikin,
kole jobedo mere gi lworo ma mudho.
Jokidakana jomol ma dwir wi pi,
Were okwoŋo lowo pajo,
aka jokikidhi tic i ndelo vini pajo.
Paka milengela gi lietho cwiyo woko pi tor,
apaka tho reyo woko jono ma jotieko timo reco.
Kiri yok jo kipoy jo,
to jomiti ri kudin.
Ki poyi jo kende,
aka ameno apaka kidakana tur paka yath.
Jomiyo dhako ma bu nyathi litho,
aka jocando citho.
Kucel Were reyo woko jomwamba gi meni pere,
ka go onyutho tim pere, jokidakana jotho.
Go nyalo miyo jo bedo i siem, to thielo jo,
to waŋe kingoye kwoŋ jo hongo je.
Jakidakana yindira ma hongo macek, to rwenyo woko,
joner to jotare paka doy,
itoŋo jo paka wic ŋano.
Ka k'obedo ameno, ŋa ma laridho ni atwodo,
to nyutho ni gim'awaco k'obedo adieri.
Kenyo Bilidad ma wok i Suha odwoko ama,
Dhum gi lworo nitie gi Were,
go kuro ker pere ma i polo i siem.
Nitie ŋata nyalo kwano jolweny pere?
Nitie kama lero pa Were kimeny'iye?
Onyo dhano obedi nedi m'otire ruwaŋ Were,
aka dhano m'onywol gi dhako obedi nedi macil?
K'inen kiri dwe je kiler,
aka micalin kicil ruwaŋ go,
t'onyo kosa dhano, ma delkwoŋe nyalo top,
dhano m'obedo kudin.
Kenyo Yobu odwoko ama,
Neni paka ikonyo ŋat'ongoye gi meni,
ikonyo dhano manyap, ma jacandi.
Neni paka imiyo rieko ri ŋatamiŋ paka an,
aka imiyan niaŋ.
Ŋa m'okonyin ŋako nger wac no,
aka ŋa m'opoŋin gi luya ama?
Tipo pa ji m'otho jokirin i pendi piny,
pi gi cwec ma jobed'iye.
Piny pa jom'otho odoŋ nono ruwaŋ Were,
ongoye gima umo kwoŋ lero pere.
Were oyaro pondeponde ma yumalo,
aka liero piny i hongo.
Go tweyo pi i pondeponde mapek,
aka kiwey jowobare gi peko mere.
Go pano waŋ dwe,
aka yaro kwoŋe pondeponde pere.
Go ociero bol ma nyaraunda wi pi,
i kew ma dier lero gi mudho.
Sirin ma polo jokirin,
aka joyengere gi lworo ka go obwoko jo.
Go kweyo nam gi meni pere,
aka oredho Rahab ogwaŋ ma nam piny gi niaŋ pere.
Go oloko polo maler gi koyo pere,
aka ocwowo bulir m'oyido kwale gi cinge.
To me adieri obedo nger kende ma meni pere onener'iye,
aka me kende a gima watieko winjo.
To ŋa manyalo niaŋ derino ma meni pere?
Yobu kendo ocako luwo aka owaco ama,
Paka Were kwo, go m'othwonan tiro,
Jameni Je, ma miyo kwo paran litho,
tekin anitie gi kwo,
aka fodi aywe luya pa Were,
akibino luwo raco gi dhokan,
aka lewan kilatwodo.
Wobedi bor kodan waco ni itire i gim'iwaco,
akibino weyo timo adieri cuka anotho.
Akilaweyo waco ni atire,
cunyan tek ma kiyengere.
Weyi jokwor paran jowocal jokidakana,
aka weyi ji ma jokiyere kodan jowocal ji ma butiro.
Geno aŋo manitie ri ji ma bu Were ka Were oneko jo,
kosa ka Were omayo jo kwo?
Were owinji ywak pajo,
ka teko opodho kwoŋ jo?
Josangala gi Jameni Je,
aka jokway go i hongo je?
Alafonjin kwoŋ cingi Were,
akibino muŋo gima nitie bongi Jameni Je.
Wijoje witieko neno,
onyo raŋo wiriwere luwo koyo?
Me obedo adec pa jokidakana wok bongi Were,
gi gir'acula ma jomaker jolimo wok bongi Jameni Je.
Ka jonywol nyithindho kweth, ilaneko jo g'abor,
aka nyikway jo jongoye gi cemo ma romo.
Jono ma joboth jotho gi two nundu,
aka mon tho pajo jokiywak.
Makada nende jodhure gi feza paka fukefuke,
to jopanga nangin paka lowo,
to ŋataber ama laruko,
aka ŋata timo adieri ama latero feza pere.
Jogeto udi pajo paka od winyo,
paka kayindi ma ŋeca ogeto ma kuro ndelo vini.
Jodonjo i kanindo gi lim, to meno bedo macowe,
kani joyawo waŋ gin, ongoye lim ma jonwaŋi.
Teko karo jo paka mikula,
aka asur tiŋo jo wor.
Koyo ma yuwok ceŋ tiŋo jo aka jongoye,
yweyo woko jo wok i kabedo pajo.
Koyo wito jo m'ongoye wor,
aka jodwire kwoŋe.
Koyo pathere kwoŋ jo,
aka lwiyo kwoŋ jo wok i kabedo mere.
Adieri nitie kware ma feza,
gi ka thodho zahabu.
Cuma iwodho wok i fukefuke,
aka waya ilenyo wok i tele.
Joudo gike ma mudho,
aka jodwaro lutho ma piny,
jokunyo telin wok i mudho.
Joyawo dago i milelo kama ji jokibed'iye,
kosa kama ji jokiwoth'iye.
Jotweyo thondhe i pier gin aka joliero gine,
kama jotiy'iye kakendi jo.
Cemo wok i lowo,
kucel pendi piny no won,
ikedho woko paka mac.
I telin ma piny nwaŋere tele gu manyabululu,
aka i fukefuke mere nwaŋere zahabu.
Ongoye winyo ma camo riŋo m'oŋeyo royo ma kware,
aka acut fodi jok'oneno.
Ogwaŋe mager fodi jok'odonj'iye,
aka simbwor fodi k'otund'iye.
Jokunyo tele matek acingi,
aka joredho gote gi tiendi gin.
Jokunyo ger i telin,
aka jonwaŋo telin ma welo.
Jokunyo cuka jotundo i waŋ malawin,
aka jothango gim'opanere.
To rieko nwaŋere kune?
Walafonjere kune niaŋ?
Ji jokuya nger ma limo rieko,
aka kinwaŋere i lowo pa jomakwo.
Lutho waco ni, “Ongoye i an.”
Nam bende kwero ni, “Ongoye bongan.”
Rieko kinyew gi zahabu,
kosa feza kicul welo mere.
Zahabu ma Ofir kirom gi cwe mere,
aka thiwino ma welo kirom gine.
Zahabu kodi ndewiro kirom gine,
kosa kinyal wilo ri thiwino m'otimi gi zahabu macil.
Cwe ma rieko dwoŋ loyo,
telin m'oruwo rangi macol, matar kodi nyalando, telin ma pilin,
aka welo mere kalo telin ma rangi m'obokere kodi ma nyalando.
Tele manyatongweno ma Ethopiya,
kodi zahabu macil kirom gine.
Onyo to, rieko wok kune?
Wanyalo nwaŋo niaŋ kune?
Rieko opanere ruwaŋ kisi gima kwo,
aka omuŋere ri winyin ma koyo.
Kiri tho gi rerok je jowaco ni,
watieko winjo nyaka pokopoko.
Were kende ama oŋeyo yo mere,
aka go ama oŋeyo kabedo mere.
Kole go ŋiyo gike ma piny,
aka go neno kisi gima nitie i pendi polo.
Munyo Were omiyo koyo derino mere,
aka munyo Were opima dwoŋo ma nam,
munyo Were oyero kama koth ocw'iye,
kodi kama pondeponde ma mwoc koth oluw'iye,
kenyo ama Were oneno rieko, aka otemo bero mere,
to go yere gine.
“Adieri, lworo Were, meno obedo rieko,
aka weyo raco obedo niaŋ.”
Yobu ocako luwo kendo ka waco ni,
Kabedi kwo paran nyalo gik nyacon,
paka i hongo ma Were oyido gwok'iye kwo paran.
I hongo no Were oyido bedo kodan noknok,
aka gi lero pere awotho i mudho.
I hongo no oyido gigipiny kadho ran maber,
aka mere paran gi Were ogwoko peco paran.
Jameni Je oyido nitie kodan,
aka nyithindho paran je jothokan.
I hongo no oyido athothi gi cak,
aka mo kweth onyule ran wok i tele.
Kisi k'akidho i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ,
t'abedo kam'othangere,
yac oyido jonenan to jocore gicen,
aka jom'otegino joay to jocungo ran.
Jotel pa ji oyido joliŋ luwo,
aka joumo dhok gin gi cingi jo.
Jodhum joliŋ nisi,
aka lew gin moko i dandi jo.
Kisi ŋat'owinjan aluwo, olwoŋan ni jasilwany,
aka kisi ŋat'onenan, oluwo kwoŋan.
Me kwoŋbedo akonyo kisi jacandi, m'oywaki ri kony,
aka akonyo nyithindho kic m'oyido jongoye gi kony.
Ji m'oyido jocegin rere woko jokwayo ran silwany,
aka amiyo cuny citho wero ri kisangala.
Atimo gim'otire,
aka tiro oyido obedo kanzu paran gi junga paran.
An oyido abedo waŋ joma waŋ gin otho,
gi tiendi jor'aŋolo.
An oyido abedo ba jocandi,
aka akonyo jokicar i hongo ma teko.
Aturo woko dingi jomaker,
aka abotho ji ma jodiyo.
Kenyo t'abedo gi paro ni, “Alatho gi peco paran kama yom,
aka ndelo paran labedo mathoth paka kwoyo.
An oyido acalo yath ma pi kicwiy i fuc mere,
ma jange mere thoyo kithw'iye.
Dwoŋ paran k'oweyan,
aka meni k'orumo i cingan paka meni mar'asere.
Ji jokuro winjan, k'aluwo,
aka jobedo liŋ, k'amiyo rieko.
K'atieko luwo, doko jokiluwi rumacen,
aka wac paran okweyo jo paka thoyo.
Jokuran paka jokuro koth,
aka joŋamo dhok jo ran paka ri koth ma cwir.
Amiyo jo nyero ka jongoye gi yeyo,
aka waŋan ma dikisangala omedo jo meni.
Abedo jatel pajo, aka anyutho jo yo,
t'atelo jo paka kere telo jolweny pere,
ayomo cuny jo paka ŋata yomo cuny joywak.”
To onyo pama ji ma jothindho ran jonyeran,
ji ma bacere pajo oyido akinyali kiri
yeyo jo kuro rombo paran.
Magowa aŋo ma dinyo alimo wok kwoŋ meni pajo?
Meni pajo je oyido orumo.
Kwoŋbedo candi gi kec ma wor i thim,
jonyamo lowo m'othwo gi thombin.
Joŋweto ayuyu i dudi to jocamo,
kodi fuc raywe ma miyo jo lietho.
Iriemo woko jo i dier ji,
ji jokoko rijo paŋini jakwo.
Jobedo i milelo,
i buce m'okunyere i lowo, kodi i telin.
Johola i dier dudi,
aka jowura kanyacel i tiendi kudhin.
Lwak ji ma bukony, m'ongoye ŋat'oŋeyo jo,
oriem woko jo i lowo gi kiboko.
Onyo pama jonyoma an i wer,
abedo gir'awaca rijo.
Joŋisa an, aka jobedo bor kodan,
aka jokigal gi ŋulo law ruwaŋan.
Kwoŋbedo Were olokan manyap aka m'ongoye kony,
jowire kwoŋan gi nge pajo je.
Yu racuc paran, lwak jomonjan,
jomiyan ringo ka joyiko ran yo ma rerok.
Jocego ran royo ma ringo, aka jotemo reyan woko,
t'ongoye ŋat'ocieri jo.
Jonyule paka jolweny jonyule gi hoŋ madwoŋ,
aka joriewere kwoŋan.
Lworo opodho kwoŋan abwap,
aka dwoŋ paran ware woko paka koyo,
bero paran rere woko paka pondeponde.
Onyo pama kwo paran wisawisa,
aka ndelo ma teko orundan.
Cokin paran je mwodan,
aka litho ma raman kikwe.
Were makan gi kitogi paran,
aka deyan gi nangin paran.
Go witan i cwodho,
aka atieko lokere fukefuke gi buru.
Aywak ri kony, to ikidwokan,
atieko cungere, to ikidewo kwoŋan.
Iteran gi gwayo,
aka icandan gi cingin ma dimeni.
Iweyo koyo tiŋan woko,
aka iwitan iy'asur mager.
Aŋeyo ni iteran tho,
i kabedo ma kisi dhano ripo kadh'iye.
Adieri ongoye ŋata nyalo monjo dhano ma rere woko,
ka ywak i hongo ma teko.
Kole an aywak gi ji ma jonitie i teko,
aka awinjo litho ri jocandi.
To munyo arango bero, teko obino,
munyo akuro lero, to mudho bino.
Cunyan ule swa ma kikwe,
aka teko podho ran radhik.
Awotho i mudho, m'ongoye waŋceŋ,
atieko cungo i dier lwak ywak ri kony.
Atieko lokere omin ogwaŋe madudi,
kodi mere pa mayin.
Pien delkwoŋan ocido,
aka cokin paran waŋ gi lietho.
Tongol paran onyo wodho wer ma rem,
aka milowe paran wodho wer ma ywak.
Atieko timo cikirok gi waŋan,
onyo anowanya dhako nedi?
Aŋo ma Were Majameni Je timo riwan?
Go culo wan nedi ri tim mawan?
Go kelo teko aka sika woko,
jono ma jotimo gimarac.
Were oŋeyo yo paran,
aka go neno woth paran je.
K'inen atieko woth i kidakana,
aka tiendan obedo mayot twodo,
weyi Were wopima an i rapim m'otire,
aka go laneno ni abu banja.
K'inen aweyo yo m'otire,
aka cunyan odhiran timo gimarac,
kenyo weyi acwoy, aka dhano man wocam,
aka weyi gim'afuro wonyekere.
Ka cunyan otieko kiwanya dhako moro,
aka akuro kiyo i kabuti thigo pere,
kenyo weyi dhako paran wotedi ri jacwo man cemo,
aka weyi jacwo man wonindi gine.
Meno obedo kidakana madwoŋ,
aka kite reco no ripo gi gir'acula.
Meno cal mac ma reyo woko piny pa jom'otho,
manyalo reyo woko kisi gim'anitie gine.
K'atieko kwero atoŋa pa ŋecin paran ma mon kodi ma cwo,
munyo jogeŋisa kodan,
aŋo m'alatimo k'anocungi ruwaŋ Were?
Anodwoki aŋo ka go openjan?
Kole Were acel m'ocweyan i iy mama,
ama bende ocweyo ŋecin paran.
An fodi akikwero konyo jacandi,
kosa weyo citho candirok.
An akicem kendan nyagwondo,
kosa athwono nyathi kic cemo to riyo kec.
An akuro nyathi kic,
t'akwonga citho.
An akiweyo dhano m'ongoye gi ruk candirok,
kosa akiweyo jacandi bedo m'ongoye gi gium.
Ŋa ma fodi k'okwayo ran silwany,
kwoŋbedo amiyo go pien rombo paran to umere gine?
K'atieko kwalo nyathi kic,
kareno akanya ni ji jolathielan.
K'obedo ameno, weyi badan wofudhere wok i gokan,
aka weyi cingan womukere wok i kumbo mere.
Kole oyido alworo teko ma Were nyalo kelo,
aka d'akinyalo ciro meni pere.
Fodi akiketho geno paran i zahabu,
kosa tero zahabu macil paka miseni paran.
Fodi akisiemere ro thotho ma lim paran,
kosa ro gigipiny kweth m'alimo gi cingan.
Fodi akilamo waŋceŋ ka liel,
kosa dwe i ŋono mere.
Cunyan fodi k'owondan nyaliŋliŋ,
aka fodi akicwiyo lwetan ma woro jo.
Meno je reco ma ripo gi gir'acula,
aka meno bedo ngoye g'adieri ri Were manitie malo.
Fodi akisangala ka jokwor paran jocandere,
kosa ka joromo gi teko.
Fodi akitimo reco gi dhokan,
kwoŋo kwo pajo.
Jono je ma jotiyo ran joŋeyo maber,
ni noknok ajolo jokicar.
Ajolo jowoth peco paran,
aka akiweyo jo nindo i royo.
Fodi akikano reco paran,
paka jomegi jotemo timo.
Akilworo gima ji jonyalo waco,
akidoŋ peco kosa akiliŋ,
ni rupiri alworo yet pajo.
A, ka bedi oyido nitie ŋata nyalo winjan!
Aridho ni gim'awaco obedo adieri,
aka weyi Jameni Je wodwokan.
Kabedi misegey je ma jakwor kelo kwoŋan,
ondiki piny m'anyalo neno jo,
adieri dinyo atiŋo i badan,
dinyo atweyo kwoŋan paka sangaria.
Dinyo awaco ri Were kisi gim'atieko timo,
t'aŋanjo ruwaŋe paka jadhum.
K'inen atieko kwalo lowo m'afuro,
aka amayo wegi mere,
k'inen atieko camo cemo mere m'akinyewo,
t'amiyo wegi mere tho kec,
onyo weyi kudhin ama wotw'iye makiweno ŋano,
kosa dudi makiweno bale.
Me gike ma luwo pa Yobu.
Yobu owaco ni go ongoye gi banja i neno pere, riameno cwo adek no joweyo dwoko go.
To Elihu wod Barakel janono pa Buzi, ma wok peco pa Ram omako nge swa, kwoŋbedo Yobu owaco ni go otire, makiweno Were.
Elihu omako nge kiri gi merin pa Yobu adek kwoŋbedo jok'onyalo dwoko Yobu maber, makada nende oyido jotieko waco ni Yobu okom.
Elihu oyido kuro luwo gi Yobu, kwoŋbedo go oyido thin kwoŋ jo.
To munyo Elihu oneno ni oyido ongoye radwok maber i wac m'owok i dhok cwo adek no, go omako nge swa.
Elihu ocako luwo ka waco ama,
Athin ran kwoŋ win,
aka witegino loyan,
riameno oyido alworo waco riwin paro paran.
Awaco ni, weyi jom'otegino jowoluwi,
aka weyi jowofonji rieko.
To adieri obedo cuny pa Were Majameni Je,
ma bino bongi ji to miyo jo rieko.
K'obedo ni tegino ama miyo ji rieko,
kosa miyo jo niaŋ gim'otire.
Riameno awaco ni, winjan win,
aka an bende alawaco gim'aŋeyo.
Abedo moth swa kareno awinjo wac mewin,
apima niaŋ mewin kareno widwaro gir'awaca.
Aciko ithan swa riwin,
to ongoye kwoŋ win ŋat'opusa Yobu,
ongoye ŋat'odwoko wac pere.
Kucel wikiri wiwaci ni, witieko nwaŋo rieko,
Were ripo dwoko Yobu, kwoŋbedo win widhiere.
Yobu oyido kiluw kodan, to gi win,
to dinyo akidwoko go paka win.
Jongoye gi gima jowaci,
ongoye gima jonyalo dwoko.
Anomedere kuro, kareno jongoye gi gima jowaci?
Anocungi ka munyo jongoye gi radwok?
An bende alamiyo radwok paran,
alawaco gim'aŋeyo.
Athothi gi gim'anowaci,
aka akinyali bedo liŋ.
K'aweyo m'akiluwo,
dwondan nyalo bare paka pien vini manyen.
Weyi aluw aka nyaka aywe,
aripo ŋamo dhokan ŋey anyal dwoko.
Akilabedo nyakucel,
aka ak'owondere ri dhano.
Kole akuya wondirok,
kwoŋbedo Jacwec paran nyalo reyan woko.
To mondo Yobu, winji luwo paran,
aka winji wac paran je.
Mondo winji, ayawo dhokan,
aka ee, aluwo.
Waci paran obedo adieri ma wok i cunyan,
aka dhokan luwo gim'oŋeyo.
Cuny pa Rwoth ocweyan,
luya pa Jameni Je omiyan kwo.
Dwokan, k'inen inyalo,
can wac perin ruwaŋan, aka cungi.
Neni, ruwaŋ Were warom,
aka an bende ocweyan gi lowo.
Riameno ikir'ilworan,
akilaloyin gi meni.
Adieri itieko luwo k'awinjo,
ak'atieko winjo derino ma wac perin.
Iwaco ni, “Alony, aka angoye gikibenga,
abu banja aka angoye gi reco.
To Were nwaŋo atoŋa ma monjan,
aka go teran paka jakwor pere.
aka neno yo paran je.”
To winji Yobu, ikitire, aka aladwokin.
Were dwoŋ loyo dhano moro je.
Raŋo ipiemo gi Were,
gi waco ni go kidwoki kigeŋisa mawan?
Were luwo i nger acel,
kodi madirio, kada ngoye ŋata niaŋ.
ka nindo mapek okwalo ji,
kareno jonur i kanindo pajo,
go yawo ithi jo,
aka bwoko jo gi pir.
Were luwo ma miyo jo weyo tim pajo marac,
kodi geŋo jo kwoŋ noro.
Go botho adundo pajo ka jokidho tho,
kodi kwo pajo rerok g'abor.
Were tiro ji gi litho i kanindo pajo,
kodi mwodirok i cokin pajo.
Gime miyo cuny jo cile kwoŋ cemo,
kiri cemo ma jomaro swa.
Delkwoŋ jo lokere mamok ma kinen,
aka cokin pajo m'oyido cango kinen gule woko.
Adundo pajo core cegin gi tho,
aka kwo pajo core cegin gi jono ma jokelo tho.
Kabedi nwaŋere rijo acel kwoŋ jomalaika,
japido, acel kwoŋ jomalaika ganin,
ŋata tuco tiro pa dhano.
Malaika dinyo owaco i wor ni,
“Both win go kadho i piny pa jom'otho,
atieko nwaŋo cul ma botho go.
Delkwoŋe lalokere mafoth,
aka go labedo matek kendo.
Kenyo go lakwayo, to Were dwoko,
go lalamo Were gi kisangala,
aka Were laculo go ri tiro pere.”
Ŋato lawaco ri joman ni,
“Atimo reco, aka aweyo timo gim'otire,
t'akilimo gir'acula.
Were obotho adundo paran kwoŋ tho,
aka fodi aneno lero.”
Adieri Were timo gigipiny me je,
dirio kosa didek gi ji,
ma botho adundo pajo tho,
ŋey jowoneni lero ma kwo.
Awi Yobu, ciki ithin maber, aka winjan,
liŋ, aka alaluwo.
To k'inen initie gi g'irawaca dwokan,
luw, kwoŋbedo alayeyo ni itire.
To ka be, winjan,
liŋ, aka alafonjin rieko.
Kenyo Elihu omedo luwo ka waco ama,
Winji win wac paran, win cwo mariek,
aka ciki ithi win, win ma wiŋeyo mathoth.
Kole ithi jo temo wac,
paka lew jo bilo cemo.
Weyi wayer gim'otire,
aka weyi wayere i dier wan kwoŋ gimaber.
Yobu otieko waco ni go otire,
aka Were othwono go tiro.
Anotwodi ni akom?
Adhola paran kicangi, kucel angoye gi reco.
Nitie jacwo ma cal gi Yobu,
ma ciro yet paŋini madho pi.
Go bedo kanyacel gi jomarac,
aka wotho gi jokidakana.
Kole go otieko waco ni ongoye cwe,
ri dhano kisangala Were.
Riameno winjan win, win ma winitie gi niaŋ,
wobedi bor gi Were swa ni go timo kidakana,
kosa ni Jameni Je timo kidakana.
Kole go culo ji cungo kwoŋ tim pajo,
kodi cungo kwoŋ yo pajo.
Adieri Were kitim kidakana,
aka Jameni Je kiwir tiro.
Nitie ŋat'omiyo meni kwoŋ piny,
kosa nitie ŋat'omiyo go meni kwoŋ piny gibe?
Ka go okwanyo woko luya pere,
kosa ka go omayo kwo,
dinyo kisi cwec makwo je otho kanyacel,
aka dinyo dhano olokere fukefuke.
Ka winitie gi niaŋ, winji win gime,
winji win gim'awaco.
Ŋat'odak tiro bende nyalo dhumo?
Wilathumo banja ri ŋata jameni aka otire?
Ŋa ma waco ri kere ni bukony,
kodi ri jodhum ni jokidakana?
Ŋa ma kinyuthi nyakucel ri jodhum,
kosa kiyer jocandi ri joŋaŋo.
Kole joje jobedo tic ma cingi go.
Jokiru tho,
iyuko jo i dier wor to jotho,
aka tho pa jomeni kibedi gi cingi dhano.
Go ketho waŋe kwoŋ yo pa ji,
aka neno woth pajo je.
Ongoye mudho m'oasere swa,
ma jokidakana jonyalo pond'iye.
Kole Were kikethi sawa riwan,
ma kidho bongi go thumo riwan banja.
Go turo jomeni ma k'odwaro tiendi jo,
aka ketho joman i kabedo pajo.
Riameno go oŋeyo tim pajo,
aka mayo jo dhum gi wor to ŋinyo jo wor no won.
Go miyo jo gir'acula ro kidakana pajo,
kareno joman jonenanena.
Kwoŋbedo joweyo luwo go,
aka jokwero yo pere je.
Jomiyo jocandi ywak ri Were,
aka Were owinjo ywak pa joma nitie i litho.
Ka Were omito liŋ, ŋa manyalo kipusa go,
ka go opano waŋe, ŋa manyalo neno go,
obedi dhano kosa nono?
Dinyo ŋa m'ocero ji ma bu Were dhum,
kosa ji ma jodiyo joman.
Nitie ŋat'otieko waco ri Were ni,
“Atieko limo gir'acula, akilatimo reco kendo?
Fonjan gim'akuya,
aka k'atieko timo reco, akilamedere timo.”
Paka nyo ipiemo gi gima Were timo,
kwoŋbedo ipiemo gi go,
riameno yero obedo aperin makiweno aparan,
wac gim'iŋeyo.
Joma niaŋ jolawaco ran,
aka jorieko ma jowinjan jolawaco ni,
“Yobu luwo gim'okuya,
aka wac pere ongoye rieko.”
Kabedi inyalo temo Yobu kiri i cowe,
ilaneno ni go luwo paka jakidakana luwo.
Go medo gwenyirok kwoŋ reco pere,
go goyo adhoŋ i dier wan,
aka medo wac kweth kwoŋ Were.
Elihu omedere luwo ka waco ama,
Yobu, iparo ni itire,
waco ni itire ruwaŋ Were?
K'ipenjere ni, anitie gi kony aŋo,
kosa ni aberi nedi loyo ka nende atim reco?
Aladwokin gi wac,
kanyacel gi merin perin.
Ŋiy win polo aka winen,
kaŋasa win pondeponde, joŋawere swa loyo win.
K'itimo gim'okom dikweth, litho go?
K'itimo gim'otire, ikonyo Were?
Aŋo ma Were limo wok i cingin?
Kidakana perin miyo joman candirok paka in,
to k'itimo gim'otire, konyo jo.
Ka ji jonitie iy'adica mathoth, joywak ri kony,
jolwoŋo dhano wobothi jo wok i cingi jomeni.
To ongoye kwoŋ jo ma rangi Were, jacwec pajo,
ma miyo geno wor.
Go ma fonjo wan loyo ogwaŋe ma piny,
aka miyo wan bedo mariek loyo winyin ma koyo.
Kenyo joywak, to go kidwoki,
kwoŋbedo noro pa jokidakana.
Adieri Were kiwinji ywak ma rendirok,
aka Jameni Je kidew kwoŋe.
Adieri ilawaco ni Were kinen,
to kur moth, kiosa perin nitie ruwaŋ go.
Iparo ni Were i nge pere kimiy gir'acula,
aka kidew kwoŋ gimarac.
Yobu goyo dhoke nono,
go medo wac kweth m'okuya gima waco.
Elihu omedere luwo ka waco ama,
Kuran ye kutho mathin, aka alanyuthin gimoro,
kole anitie gi gim'alawaco i kawaŋ Were.
Alaoro ŋeyo paran mabor,
aka alanyutho ni Jacwec paran otire.
Adieri wac paran k'obedo twodo,
an m'ineno ruwaŋin me, ariek.
Were jameni, aka go kicay dhano moro je,
go tek i meni gi iniaŋ.
Go kiwey jokidakana jowokwo,
to miyo jocandi tiro.
Go kikwany woko waŋe kwoŋ ji m'otire,
to miyo jo dhum paka kerin,
aka miyo iworo jo cil gi cil.
To ka otwey ji gi pingo,
kareno jocandere ri gima jotimo,
go tuco rijo tim pajo,
kodi reco pajo, ni oyido jotimo ginoro.
Go yawo ithi jo winjo fonji pere,
aka wodho or rijo weyo reco.
Ka jowinjo go to jotiyo rigo,
jobedo gi kwo ma siem kodi bero.
To ka jokwero winjo go, jolatho g'abor,
aka jolarere woko m'ongoye gima joŋeyo.
Ji ma bu Were jobedo jo nge macek,
aka jokikway kony k'omiy jo gir'acula.
Jotho i soye pajo,
aka kwo pajo rumo i wickwot.
To Were fonjo ji gi candirok pajo,
aka dhiro litho ma yawo waŋ jo.
Were owodhin wok i teko,
aka omiyin bedo i siem,
to poŋo meza perin gi cemo mabeyo.
T'iasa paro kwoŋ gir'acula pa jokidakana,
onyo Were omiyin gir'acula m'otire.
Ikir'iyey cami nyew wowondin,
kosa ŋaŋo worwenyin.
Ywak perin lageŋin winjo litho,
kosa meni perin onyali konyin?
Ikir'idwar wor,
ma nonin jolarere woko.
Kure ikir'itim reco kendo,
kwoŋbedo meno am'omiyo icandere.
Neni, Were dwoŋ i meni,
ŋa m'obedo jafonji paka go?
Ŋa m'otieko nyutho go yo pere,
kosa ŋa manyalo waco ni go okom?
Poyi pako tic pere,
ma ji jotieko wero kwoŋe.
Ji je jotieko neno gima go otimo,
to waneno nyaka gi bor.
Adieri Were dwoŋ, to wakuya go kicutho,
oro pere kiŋeyere.
Kole Were ama twomo pi wok i piny,
aka loko koth ma cwe.
Go miyo koth cwe wok i pondeponde,
aka cwe kwoŋ ji gibe.
Ongoye ŋat'oŋeyo nger ma pondeponde yar'iye,
kodi nger ma koth mor'iye.
Neni, go kedho lithkoth thoko go,
aka go umo lutho ma nam.
Ama apaka go tiyo gi ji,
aka miyo cemo i thotho.
Go umo lithkoth gi par cinge,
aka wodho or ni wogoy kama go mito.
Pilin mere luwo kwoŋe,
aka ogwaŋe joŋeyo ni koth bino.
Adieri an bende mor pa koth miyan kirin,
aka dhokan ŋamere.
Winji, winji win mor ma dwondi go,
kodi derino ma wok i dhok go.
Go gonyo i pendi polo gibe,
aka miyo lithkoth pilin i kisi gike ma piny.
Rumacen dwondi go mor,
mor ma dwondi go ma dimeni,
aka lithkoth pilin ka dwondi go mor.
Dwondi Were mor ma gir'aura,
aka go timo gigipiny madongo ma wakinyali niaŋ.
Kole Were wodho or, aka pe cwe i piny,
aka koth cwe, koth mapek,
aka cero ji tic acingi,
ŋey kisi dhano ma go ocweyo woŋey tic pere.
Ogwaŋe jokidho i od gin,
aka jodoŋ'iye.
Asur wok i diŋ mere,
aka ŋico wok i koyo ma kudho.
Ywe pa Were ŋico pi,
aka miyo pi makere matek.
Go ŋico pondeponde mapek,
aka lithkoth pilin wok i pondeponde.
Jowire thoko kisi thenge,
timo kisi gima Were wodho or rijo kwoŋe,
kisi kamoro i piny.
Were dhiro koth dhieko piny,
go nyalo dhiro ma miyo wan gir'acula,
kosa ma nyutho wan wor pere.
Awinji gime Yobu,
kutho liŋ aka ipar kwoŋ gir'aura ma Were timo.
Iŋeyo nger ma Were wodho or kwoŋ jo,
aka miyo lithkoth ma pondeponde pere pilin?
Iŋeyo nger ma pondeponde mol'iye,
tic ma gir'aura pa ŋat'oŋeyo kisi gimoro.
Be, inyalo nyaka candirok i lietho,
ka koyo ma yupiny otudere i piny.
Inyalo yaro pondeponde kanyacel gi go,
to bedo matek paka ndewiro ma pilin?
Fonji wan gima walawaco ri Were,
akinyali kwoŋbedo wanitie i mudho.
Ripo ni wowaci rigo kutho ni amito luwo?
Nitie ŋata nyalo mito ni womwonyi go woko?
Onyo pama ji jokineni lero,
ka pilin i pondeponde,
ka koyo otieko loko maler.
Were bino wok yumalo ma pilin paka zahabu,
aka dwoŋ pere thoko wan gi lworo.
Meni pa Were dwoŋ ma wakinyali core cegin bonge,
go dwoŋ i meni gi tiro,
aka go otire noknok.
Riameno ji jolworo go,
aka go kiter gimoro paka ji ma joŋoyo ni joriek.
Kenyo Rwoth odwoko Yobu wok iy'asur.
Meno ŋa ma umo rieko,
gi wac nono m'okuya?
Ridhi pierin paka jacwo,
alapenjin, aka iladwokan.
In oyido initie kune munyo ageto kindi piny?
Waci ran k'initie gi niaŋ.
Ŋa m'omiyo rapim ma piny,
aka ŋa m'ocero bol mere,
iŋeyo radwok ma penji me je?
Iŋeyo kama pendi piny okuny'iye,
kosa iŋeyo ŋat'oketho telin ma sondin mere?
I hongo no micalin m'odikin jowero kanyacel,
aka cwec ma polo jokoko ro kisangala.
munyo omwoc wok i pendi piny?
Aŋat'aumo nam gi pondeponde,
t'aumo gi mudho m'opoto.
Aŋat'aketho kew ri nam,
t'acego gi petin kodi thigin.
Awaco ri nam ni, “Ilagik ka, aka ikilakalo ka,
aka asur perin lagik gi ka.”
Yobu, i kwo perin je,
itieko ye wodho or ni piny woyuthi to yawere,
Itieko wodho or ri odikin woumi piny,
aka jokidakana jowoyengere i kapondo pajo?
Odikin wire paka lowo m'omwon'iye cingi jo,
aka cungo m'oruwo rangi paka law.
Lero pa jokidakana ngoye woko,
aka cingi jo lokere manyap timo akaka.
Itieko ye donjo i waŋ pi ma nam,
kosa itieko wotho i dier wakawaka?
Itieko neno waŋkac ma tho,
kosa itieko neno waŋkace ma piny pa jom'otho?
Itieko ŋeyo laco ma piny gibe?
Dwokan, k'inen iŋeyo gime je.
Nitie kune royo ma kidho kama lero wok'iye,
kodi kama mudho caker'iye gine?
Inyalo tero jo i kabedo pajo,
kosa inyalo nyutho jo royo ma dok?
Adieri iŋeyo, kwoŋbedo itegino,
aka oro perin thoth.
Itieko ye donjo i kakan ma tor,
kosa itieko neno kakan ma pe?
Akano jo ri hongo ma teko,
ri ndelo ma lweny gi gorok.
Nitie kune royo ma kidho kama lero poker'iye gine,
kosa kama koyo ma yuwok ceŋ kedher'iye i piny?
Ŋa m'okunyo fereji ma koth cw'iye gine,
aka ŋa m'obaro royo ri mwoc koth?
Ŋa ma miyo koth cwe kama ji jokibed'iye,
i thim, kam'ojwangere?
Ŋa ma dhieko piny kam'othwo gi thim?
Koth nitie gi bamere,
kosa nitie ŋat'onywolo thoyo ma thon?
Pi m'omakere owok i iy ŋa,
aka ŋa m'onywolo tor ma wok i polo?
Pi lokere matek paka tele,
aka ŋico wi nam.
kosa gonyo thol ma mako kanyacel kitipa ma micalin m'ilwoŋo ni Orion?
Inyalo telo micalin to joneno i hongo pajo m'otire,
kosa inyalo telo arara gi nyithindhe?
Iŋeyo cik ma dhumo polo,
aka inyalo oro cik pajo i piny?
Inyalo koko gi dwondin malo ri pondeponde,
t'imiyo dhiekin gi pi kweth?
Inyalo wodho or ri lithkoth pilin,
to bino waco rin ni, “An e?”
Ŋa m'ocweyo rieko to ketho kam'opanere,
aka ŋa m'omiyo paro niaŋ?
Ŋa manitie gi rieko ma kwano pondeponde,
kosa ŋa manyalo kigela pien pi ma i polo,
koth ma coko fukefuke i kidhur,
aka cwodho makere kanyacel.
Inyalo dwaro cemo ri simbwor,
kosa yeŋo nyithindhi simbwor ma kec neko,
kareno jopondo i od jo,
kosa munyo joriere jokiyo gimoro i od simbwor.
Ŋa ma miyo agak cemo,
ka nyithindhe joywak ri Were,
aka jolera ro ngoye pa cemo?
Iŋeyo hongo ma diegi ma gote jonywol'iye?
Itieko neno ka amudhe nywol?
Iŋeyo hongo ma jobed'iye gi iy jo?
Iŋeyo hongo ma jonywol'iye?
Iŋeyo hongo ma jodol'iye piny,
to jocolo nyithindhi jo?
Nyithindhi jo jobedo matek, aka jodongo kam'othangere,
jokadho yo pajo, aka jokidwoki bongi jo.
Ŋa m'oweyo punde ma thim kadho kama mito?
Ŋa m'ogonyo jo to weyo jo kilera?
Amiyo jo thim bedo peco pajo,
t'amiyo jo kwo i lowo ma cumbi.
Jobedo bor gi koko ma tindi madwoŋ,
ongoye ŋata nyalo mwolo jo ma miyo jo tic.
Josala wi gote kama jocem'iye,
kama jorang'iye cemo ma jonyalo camo.
Jow nyalo tic rin?
Go nyalo kwo i wer perin?
Inyalo tweyo i majogi perin,
t'imiyo fur rin?
Inyalo geno meni mere madwoŋ?
Inyalo miyo go tic perin matek?
Inyalo geno ni ladwoko,
to kelo ŋano perin wok i kisia?
Bwombi maya kwadhere piyo,
to jokinyal ay malo paka mbuluku.
Maya weyo tonge i lowo,
aka lietho ma lowo ama lietho jo.
Go wiye wil ni inyalo nyono gi tiendi jo,
kosa ni ogwaŋ madudi nyalo nyono jo.
Go tero nyithindhe gi gero paŋini jok'obedo apere,
ma go kidew ni litho pere otho nono.
Were omiyo wiye owil gi rieko,
aka othwono go niaŋ.
Ka go oyaro bwombe ŋwec,
nyero punde gi jagwey mere.
Iŋat'imiyo kayina meni?
Iŋat'iruko i dwondi jo meni?
Iŋat'imiyo jopor paka bonyo,
to jobwoko jo gi jero mere?
Jokunyo piny i milelo gi siem,
aka joredo i lweny gi meni pajo je.
Jokibedi gi lworo kosa jobwoki,
aka abor kimiy jo gik acen.
Gilweny ma jogwey jo jotiŋo,
jorudere aka jopilin i ceŋ.
Gi gero kodi nge jokunyo piny,
aka jokicungi liŋ k'okudhi gwara.
Kisi k'okudhi gwara jowaco ni, “Aha.”
Joŋweyo lweny gi bor,
aka jowinjo jomituka jokoko wodho or.
Obuko yath fonjere ay gi bwombe gi rieko perin,
ka joyaro bwombi gin yupiny?
Iŋat'iwodho or ri ango ay malo,
to geto ode kam'oŋawere?
Ango geto peco pere i gote maboyo,
aka loko kisul mere kapondo.
Gikenyo go kiyo gim'ocam,
aka go neno gi bor.
aka nyithindhe jocwiyo remo.
Rwoth owaco ri Yobu ama,
Jakipusa lapiemo gi Were?
Ŋata tiro Were ripo wodwoki go.
Yobu odwoko Rwoth ama,
An asisiri, anodwokin nedi?
Aumo dhokan gi cingan.
Atieko luwo dicel, aka akiladwoko,
akilamedo luwo kendo.
Kenyo Rwoth odwoko Yobu wok iy'asur.
Cungi matek paka jacwo,
alapenjin, aka iladwokan.
Ilatemo kwero ni atire?
Ilawaco ni an akom aka in itire?
Cingin cal gi cingi Were,
aka dwondin bende nitie derino paka apere?
Nyuthi ni initie gi dwoŋ kodi wor,
nyuthi ni idwoŋ aka ji joworin.
Oy nge perin,
ŋiy jono je ma jonoro, aka imwol jo.
Ŋiy kisi janoro aka isew jo,
nyon jokidakana kama jocung'iye.
Pan joje i fukefuke,
tweyi waŋ jo kanyacel i piny pa jom'otho.
Kenyo alapakin,
ni cingin maracuc won, am'omiyin loyo.
Apa ŋiy ogwaŋ Behemoth ma cal raw,
m'acweyo paka in,
camo lum paka dhiaŋ.
Teko pere nitie i delkwoŋe,
aka meni pere nitie i fuc mere.
Go ridho yiwe matek paka yath sida,
aka fuc ma eme otudere kanyacel.
Cokin mere tek paka ywel,
aka tiende cal cumin ma nyweny.
Go obedo gimarapena ma tim madongo pa Were,
aka jacwec pere kende ama nyalo lweny gine g'abor.
Gote jowega rigo cemo,
kama ogwaŋe madudi jotuk'iye.
Go riere i tiendi kudhin,
aka pondo i dier midole ma samba.
Kudhin kodi osege ma thengi pi,
joumo go i tipo.
Go kibwoki ka malawa mor,
go kilwor ka malawa Yordan kire i waŋe.
Nitie ŋata nyalo mako go ka neno?
Kosa nitie ŋata nyalo cwowo ume i bwo?
Inyalo kitoga woko ogwaŋ Leviathan gi siraget ma mako rec?
Inyalo tweyo lewe piny g'adasa?
Inyalo tweyo thol i ume?
Inyalo cwowo dinge gi siraget?
Onyali ywak rin iwey wokadhi,
kosa luwo kodin gi wac mamit?
Onyali timo cikirok kodin,
ŋey iter go paka ŋeca cil gi cil?
Inonyal tuko gine paka ituko gi winyin,
kosa paka gituko ri nyikin?
Jokitoga rec jonyal goyo welo mere?
Jomitan jonyal poko i dier jo?
Inyalo poŋo i pien mere siŋenge,
kosa cwowo wic mere gi bithi.
Gey go dicel ama, aka ikilatemo geyo go kendo,
wiyin k'owil gi lweny nago.
Kisi ŋata neno Leviathan gi waŋe rumo gi geno,
meni loyo aka nyocere piny.
Ongoye ŋata ger manyalo kwinyo go,
ongoye ŋata nyalo temo cungo ruwaŋe.
Ŋa m'otieko monjo go, ŋey acul go,
ŋa i piny gibe?
Akilaliŋ waco kwoŋ lembe,
kosa meni pere madwoŋ, kosa ŋono m'ocwey'iye.
Ŋa manyalo yeco woko pien mere ma woko?
Ŋa manyalo cwowo to tundo i pien mere mar'ario?
Ŋa manyalo miyo go yawo lake ma poŋ?
Lake thoko i iye je kelo lworo.
Dieŋeye ocweyere gi bol ma kwote,
m'odhikere kanyacel matek paka tele.
Kisi moro orikere kwoŋ nyawote,
ma luya kinyal donjo i diere.
Joridhere matek kanyacel,
m'ongoye gim'anyalo poko jo.
Go giro mac maliel,
aka waŋe liel paka waŋceŋ ma gulo.
Mac wok i dhoke,
aka kur mac kire woko.
Yiro wok i ume,
paŋini dak m'ited'iye kosa mbirabira ma waŋ.
Ywe pere kudho mac to liel,
aka mac wok i dhoke.
Ŋute tek swa,
ma kisi ŋat'oromo gine bwok.
Delkwoŋe dole m'ocokere kanyacel,
aka tek m'oridhere ma kigonyere.
Cunye tek paka tele,
tek paka tele ma rego.
Ka go oay malo, jomeni je jobwok,
jopoŋ gi lworo to joringo.
Ongoye abor manyalo cwowo go,
kosa thir, kosa asere, kosa toŋ.
Cuma cal rigo kanja,
aka ywel cal rigo mbawo m'otop.
Asere kinyal miyo go ringo,
asumulu cale rigo cuŋ.
Abiro cale rigo cuŋ,
aka go nyero ka ocel kwoŋe toŋ.
Magambala ma iye cale thago dak,
aka golo piny i cwodho paka magal.
Go miyo lutho walo paka pi,
aka miyo twak paka dak mo.
Go weyo bathe maler cen,
ma dhano nyalo paro ni nam omako lwar.
Ongoye gima pimere gine i piny,
obedo cwec m'ongoye gi lworo.
Go ŋiyo kisi gima nitie malo,
go obedo kere pa jonoro je.
Yobu odwoko Rwoth ama,
Aŋeyo ni inyalo timo kisi gimoro je,
aka ongoye atoŋa perin ma kinyalere.
riameno atieko luwo gim'akiniaŋ.
Gir'aura ran, ma an akuya.
ilapenjan, aka aripo dwokin.
Oyido atieko winjo kwoŋin gi ithan,
to pama atieko nenin gi waŋan.
Riameno acayere,
aka aŋuto reco paran i fukefuke kodi i buru.
Rumacen munyo Rwoth otieko luwo wac me ri Yobu, Rwoth owaco ri Elifaz ma wok i Teman ni, “Keme paran liel kwoŋin gi merin perin ario. Wikiluwo kwoŋan m'otire paka ŋeca paran Yobu.

Onyo riameno ter win thwondhe abirio gi wot rombo abirio, wikidhi bongi ŋeca paran Yobu, to wimiyo mic awaŋa. Ŋeca paran Yobu lakwayo riwin, kwoŋbedo alayeyo kwayo pere ŋey akir'atiy gi win cungo kwoŋ miŋo mewin. Wikiluwo kwoŋan m'otire paka ŋeca paran Yobu.”
Ameno Elifaz, Bilidad kodi Zofar jokadho to jotimo paka Rwoth owaco rijo, aka Rwoth odwoko kwayo pa Yobu rijo.

Wutmin Yobu kodi nyimin go kodi jono je m'oyido joŋeyo go jobino, aka jocemo i ot pere. Jomako gi go wor, aka joyomo cuny go ri teko je ma Rwoth oyido okelo kwoŋ go. Kisi dhano omiyo go pesa gi peta ma zahabu.
Rwoth omiyo kwo pa Yobu ma rumacen silwany, loyo i cakirok. Yobu obedo gi rombo 14,000 ŋamin 6,000 dhok 2,000 kodi punde 1,000.
Yobu bende oyido nitie gi nyithindho manyir adek kodi mayac abirio.
Nyako madwoŋ ocwoko nyinge ni Jemima, mar'ario ni Kezia aka mathin ni Keren Hapuk.
I piny gibe oyido ongoye nyir ma joŋon paka nyir pa Yobu. Bajo opoko jo lim kanyacel gi wutmin jo.
Rumacen Yobu okwo ma oro 140 aka onyalo neno nyikwaye kodi nyikway nyithindho pere.
Yobu otho kareno go oti swa i oro.
Jasilwany a ŋata,
kwero rieko pa jokidakana,
kosa kiluw tim pa joreco,
kosa kiriwere gi ji ma bukony ri Were.
To nwaŋo kisangala i luwo cik pa Rwoth,
aka fonjere kwoŋe wor g'odieceŋ.
ma nyak i ndir pere,
aka boke mere kithwo.
Kisi gima go timo yindira.
To jokidakana jokical ameno
jocale yuk ma koyo kwadho woko.
Riameno Were bino thumo banja ri jokidakana,
aka k'oriw jo gi joma timo gim'otire.
Kole Rwoth kwonga, aka telo joma timo gim'otire,
to jokidakana joluwo yo ma rerok.
Raŋo ji jotimo can ma bukony?
Kerin jolwenyo,
jodhum jotimo can kanyacel lweny gi Rwoth,
gi kere pere m'oyero.
Jowaco ni, “Weyi wagonyere win kwoŋ dhum pajo,
aka wabol woko adhum pajo.”
Rwoth nyero gi kom pere ma dhum i polo,
aka pelo jo.
Kenyo Rwoth luwo gi jo i keme pere
aka bwoko jo gi nge pere.
Rwoth waco ni, “Atieko ketho kere paran
wi got maleŋ Zayon.”
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Ibedo wodan,
konon me atieko bedo benin.
Kwayan, aka abino miyin lunjo piny je,
kisi thengi piny bino bedo aperin.
ibino ŋinyo jo paka dak m'ocwey gi lowo.”
Onyo riameno kerin, bedi win mariek
gwokere win jodhum ma piny.
Tiyi win ri Rwoth gi lworo kodi kirin,
aka kule win piny gi bwonirok rigo.
Kakameno winyalo kwinyo nge pere piyo,
to witho abwap.
2 Kole nge pere gaga piyo.
Josilwany a jono ma jopondo i go.
ji kweth jowire kwoŋan!
Joluwo kwoŋan aka jowaco ni,
“Were kilakonyo go.”
To in Rwoth, ibedo kwot paran i teko,
imiyan dwoŋ,
aka iŋat'itiŋo wiyan malo.
Aywak malo ri Rwoth,
aka go dwokan gi wi got pere maleŋ.
Ariere piny t'anindo,
t'acew kendo, ato Rwoth kwonga an.
Akibwok ro jokwor ganin,
ma jothokan i kisi thenge.
Ay, Awi Rwoth!
Bothan, Awi Were paran.
Ipayo lembi jokwor paran je
ituro woko lak jokidakana.
Loyo wok bongi Rwoth,
weyi go womiy ji pere silwany!
Dwokan, k'akwayin,
Awi Were, kwot paran!
Ikonyan munyo oyido anitie i teko.
Onyo maki wor kodan idwoki kwayo paran.
Onyo win ji wilaŋalan kiri keraŋo?
Winomar gima bukony kiri keraŋo
to widwaro twodo?
To poyi win ni Rwoth otieko yero joma lworo Were paka apere won,
Rwoth winjan k'alwoŋo go.
Maki win nge to wokiri womiy win timo reco,
pari win kwoŋ wac me,
ka wiriere liŋ i kanindo mewin.
aka gen win i go.
Ji kweth jokwayo ni,
“Bedi oyido wanen ye bero moro!
Awi Rwoth, weyi lero ma waŋin woliel kwoŋ wan!”
To kisangala m'itieko miyan,
thoth loyo ma jobedi gine,
gi ŋano kodi vini pajo.
Ariere piny t'anindo i siem,
ato in won kende, Awi Rwoth, ama gwokan.
Awi Rwoth, ciki ithin ri gim'awaco,
aka winji uci paran.
Winji derino ma ywak paran,
kere paran, aka Were paran,
kole akwayin won.
Awi Rwoth, iwinjo dwondan odikin,
ka ceŋ wok amiyo mic paran ma kwayo,
t'akurin idwokan.
Kole ibedo Were ma kisangala gi kidakana,
ikiyey raco ruwaŋin.
Jonoro jokinyal cungo ruwaŋin,
idaki joreco je.
Ireyo woko jotwodo je,
aka idaki jonek gi jomisegey.
To kwoŋbedo mar perin makiwire,
aladonjo i ot perin,
abino lamin i Ot perin maleŋ
t'abwonere rin gi lworo.
Rwoth, telan, i tiro perin
kwoŋbedo athothi gi jokwor.
Yaw ran yo perin ŋey anyal luwo.
Kole lew jokwor paran opoŋ twodo,
joparo reyo ji iy'adundo pajo,
jopelo ji gi wac pajo,
m'opoŋ'iye misegey ma tho.
weyi wegi joworere gi can pajo ma nek.
Riemi woko jo ruwaŋin
kwoŋbedo jotimo reco kweth,
aka jogwenyere kwoŋin.
To weyi ji ma jopondo i in jowofore
weyi jowower ri kisangala.
Kwonga jono ma jomarin,
kwoŋbedo i in jonitie gi kisangala mar'adieri.
Kole imiyo joma timo gim'otire silwany, Awi Rwoth
ikwonga jo gi mari perin paka gi kwot.
Awi Rwoth, ikir'itiran i nge perin,
ikir'imiyan gir'acula i keme perin.
Miyan meni, aol kicutho,
aka adundo paran rembo.
To inokur kiri keraŋo konyan, Awi Rwoth?
Awi Rwoth, wire ibothan,
gonyan kwoŋ tho ro mar perin makiwire.
Kole ongoye ŋata poyin i tho,
aka ongoye ŋata nyalo pakin i piny pa jom'otho.
Rem olacan,
kisi wor kanindo paran dhiek gi pigi waŋan,
muto ma theno wiyan bile gi ywak paran.
Akinyali neno maber,
waŋan jobomere,
ro ywak ma jokwor paran jokelo ran.
Eye win bongan win joreco!
Kole Rwoth owinjo derino ma ywak paran.
aka go bino dwokan.
Jokwor paran je wiy gin bino kwot to jorembo,
ibino riemo jo woko i nyawin abwap.
Abino pondo i in Awi Rwoth, Were paran,
bothan aka igonyan kwoŋ jono ma jorieman,
kosa jobino tiŋan woko paka simbwor,
to joteran kam'ongoy'iye ŋat'obothan,
aka jobino yecan mathindho thindho.
Awi Rwoth Were paran, k'inen atimo gimarac ri nyatoro,
k'inen acamo sereko ri mere,
kosa atimo akaka ri jakwor paran m'akiŋeyo,
k'inen atimo gimoro kwoŋ gigipiny me,
weyi jokwor paran joworieman aka jowomakan,
weyi jowotoŋan aka jonekan,
to joweyan ma bu kwo i fukefuke!
Awi Rwoth, ay i nge perin,
Ay malo kwoŋ nge pa jokwor paran,
cew, Awi Were paran.
Tiro am'imito,
ameno coki ji je thokin,
aka idhumi jo gi kom perin.
Rwoth thumo banja ri ji je,
thum ran banja Rwoth, cungo kwoŋ bero paran,
iŋeyo ni abu banja.
aka ithumo banja cungo kwoŋ paro mawan gi awanya mawan.
Juki kidakana pa jomarac,
aka imiy jomaber kemba.
Were kwonga an,
go botho jono ma jowinjo go.
Were thumo banja gi tiro,
aka thumo banja ri jokidakana.
K'inen nyatoro k'owire kwoŋ kidakana pere,
Were otieko pako abor pere,
otieko luŋo to ciko asere pere,
otieko yiko gilweny pere ma neki,
aka ociko asere pere maliel.
Neni, jakidakana paro kwoŋ gimarac,
cano teko aka timo gi twodo.
Go ciko bwo ri joman,
aka won mok'iye kendo.
Gimarac pajo wegi kelo kwoŋ jo gir'acula,
aka akaka pajo miyo jo litho.
Abino foyo Rwoth ro tiro pere,
t'apako Rwoth, Were madwoŋ loyo werin je.
Awi Rwoth, Were mawan,
nyingin didwoŋ i piny gibe!
Ituco dwoŋ perin malo i polo,
Jokwor perin jokinyal monjin,
ijuko ŋata gwenyere kwoŋin.
K'aneno polo, m'icweyo,
dwe gi micalin m'iketho i kabedo pajo
idewo kwoŋ jo, makada nende jotho.
iruko jo gi dwoŋ kodi wor.
aka iketho cwec je i tiendi gin,
rombo, dhok, ogwaŋe madudi bende,
winyin kodi rec,
gi cwec je ma nam.
Awi Rwoth, Were mawan
nyingin didwoŋ i piny gibe.
Alafoyin Rwoth, gi cunyan je.
Alawaco gir'aura je m'itieko timo.
Alawero gi kisangala rin.
Alapako nyingin, Were ma jameni je.
K'ineno, jokwor paran jogik cen
jopodho piny to jotho.
Ithumo banja gi tiro m'ongoye banirok,
aka ithumo banja i thenge paran.
Ithumo banja ri piny je,
aka ireyo jokidakana,
ireyo woko nyingi jo kicutho.
Jokwor jorere woko to josika,
ireyo woko tindin pajo madongo,
aka kipoy jo kendo.
To Rwoth obedo kere cil gi cil,
go otieko oketho kom pere ma thumo banja.
go thumo banja ri ji marom.
Rwoth obedo kapondo ri ji m'idiyo,
kapondo maber i hongo ma teko.
Jono ma joŋeyin, Rwoth, joketho geno pajo i in,
kole ikijwangi ŋata bino bongin.
Wer win wer ma pak ri Rwoth, ma dhumo i Zayon!
Waci ri kisi piny gima go timo!
Were poyo jono ma jocandere,
wiye kiwil gi ywak pajo,
aka miyo gir'acula ri jono ma jotimo rijo raco.
Maki kodan wor, Awi Rwoth!
Neni candirok ma jokwor paran jokelo ran!
Bothan kwoŋ tho, Awi Rwoth,
ŋey acungi ruwaŋ ji ma Yerusalem,
aka awaci gigipiny je ma miyan, apakin.
Alafore kwoŋbedo ibothan.
Ji jokunyo bur aka jopodh'iye,
jomoko i bwo pajo wegi.
Rwoth omenyere thumo banja gi tiro,
aka jokidakana jomoko gi tim pajo wegi.
Jokidakana je joripo tho,
kiri gi nonin je ma jokwero Were.
Ibino poyo ji ma bu gimoro noknok,
geno pa jocandi kilarere cil gi cil.
Ay, Awi Rwoth! Ikir'iwey ji jowocayin!
Keli piny gibe ruwaŋin,
aka ithumi rijo banja.
Miy jo bedo gi lworo, Awi Rwoth,
weyi nonin jowoŋey ni jobedo nyaka ji!
Awi Rwoth, raŋo initie bor?
Raŋo ipondo riwan i hongo ma teko?
Jokidakana jonor aka jocando jocandi,
weyi jowomoki i bwo ma wegi jociko.
Jokidakana jokwot ro awanya pajo marac,
joworo jokwero to jokwoŋo Rwoth.
Jokidakana jokidew kwoŋ Rwoth,
joparo ni Were ongoye.
Gima jokidakana jotimo yindira i hongo je.
Jokiniaŋ nger ma Were thum'iye banja,
aka jopelo jokwor pajo je.
Joparo i cuny gin ni ongoye gima bwoko jo,
aka jokinyal podho i teko.
aka jokwako luwo wac dakirok gi gimarac.
Jotimo apondi i calin,
joneko joma bubanja nyaliŋliŋ.
Jokiyo jokwor pajo aliwa.
Jokuro kam'opondo paka simbwore.
Jokiyo jocandi,
jomako jo i bwo pajo to jokadho gi jo.
Ji ma bu gimoro joŋinyere, jomunyere piny,
aka jopodho gi meni pa jokidakana.
Jokidakana joparo i cuny gin ni Were wiye owil,
opano waŋe aka kilaneno jo.
Ay, Awi Rwoth, Were imiy jokidakana gir'acula!
Poyi jono ma jocandere.
Raŋo jokidakana jocayo Were,
aka jowaco i cuny gin ni, “Were kilamiyan gir'acula?”
T'ineno, aka iŋiyo teko gi candirok,
iyikere konyo ma noknok.
Ji ma bu gimoro jomiyere rin,
aka noknok ikonyo nyithindho kic.
Tur meni pa jokidakana gi joreco,
miy jo gir'acula ro komo ma jotimo,
cuka jowey timo kendo.
Rwoth obedo kere cil gi cil.
Ji ma jolamo werin man,
jobino rere wok i lowo pere.
Awi Rwoth, ibino winjo kwayo pa ji ma jomwol,
aka ibino miyo jo miseni.
Ibino winjo ywak pa ji m'idiyo jo gi nyithindho kic,
ibino thumo banja i thenge pajo,
ŋey dhano m'obedo fukefuke wokiri wokel teko kendo.
Apondo i Rwoth,
inyalo nedi waco ran ni,
ay paka winyo ikadhi wi gote,
kwoŋbedo jokidakana jociko asere pajo,
cwowo ji mabeyo i mudho.
Ka kisi gimoro rere,
jomaber jotimi aŋo.
Rwoth nitie i Ot pere maleŋ,
kom pere ma dhum nitie i polo.
Go neno ji i iye je,
aka ŋeyo gima jotimo.
Go kaŋasa jomabeyo gi jokidakana marom,
aka odak jomaker gi cunye je.
Go dhiro cuk mac maliel,
kodi mac manyatongweno maŋwe marac kwoŋ jokidakana,
miyo jo gir'acula gi koyo malieth.
Rwoth timo tiro aka omaro tim maber,
jono ma jotimo gim'otire jobino neno go.
Rwoth, kony, kole ongoye ŋata lworo Were.
Joma timo adieri je jokinwaŋere i dier wot ji.
Kisi nyatoro wondo jager pere,
jopelere aka joluwo gi cuny gin ario.
Rwoth thum woko lew gin ma jopelere gine,
tweyi dhok ji ma jopakere gine,
aka jowaco ni, “Wanwaŋo gima wamito gi lew wan,
wawaco gima wamito,
aka ongoye ŋata bino cero wan.”
To Rwoth waco ni, “Kwoŋbedo idiyo jocandi,
aka ji m'icando jodwanyere i litho, onyo abino ay,
t'akwonga jo.”
Cikirok pa Rwoth obedo cikirok macil,
paka feza mangil
m'oyuy i mac dibirio.
In Rwoth, ilakikwonga wan,
aka ilagwoko wan kwoŋ luse ji me kicutho.
Jokidakana joywore kisi kamoro,
kisi dhano pako gimarac.
Awi Rwoth, wiyin owil kodan kicutho kiri keraŋo?
Inopan ran waŋin kiri keraŋo?
Anociri litho iy'adundo paran kiri keraŋo?
Cunyan orembi kiri keraŋo wor g'odieceŋ?
Jokwor paran jokengila an kiri keraŋo?
Par kwoŋan aka idwokan, Awi Rwoth Were paran!
Dwoki meni paran, ikir'iweyan atho.
Ikir'iwey jokwor paran jowowaci ni, “Wakengila go.”
Ikir'iwey jowosangala kwoŋbedo apodho.
To atieko ketho geno paran i mar perin makiwire,
cunyan lafore i both perin.
Abino wero ri Rwoth,
kwoŋbedo itieko nyuthan bero.
“Were ongoye.”
Joje jodakana
aka jotimo gimienirok,
ongoye kwoŋ jo ŋata timo bero.
Rwoth ŋiyo ji gi polo,
neno ka nitie ji mogo ma jotimo gi rieko,
ma jodwaro Were.
To joje jorwenyo,
joje jodakana marom.
Ongoye ŋata timo bero
be, ongoye kad'acel.
Rwoth penjo ni, “Jokiŋey?
Ji ma jotimo reco me je jongoye gi rieko?
Jocamo ji paran paka jocamo mugat,
aka jokikway Rwoth.”
To kenyo jobino bwok,
kole Rwoth nitie gi luse ji ma jotimo tiro.
Winyalo redho woko can pa jocandi,
to Rwoth obedo kapondo pajo.
Kabedi both bin ri Isiraili
wok i Zayon!
Yakobo lasiemere, Isiraili lakisangala
ka Rwoth omiy jo kiyindira i gima jotimo kendo!
Awi Rwoth, ŋa m'odonji i wema perin?
Ŋa m'olam i Zayon got perin maleŋ?
Ŋata woth pere ongoye apuse,
aka timo gim'otire,
Ŋata luwo adieri wok i cunye,
aka kisegeya joman.
Ŋata kitim gimarac ri mere pere,
kosa kiywoy pokopoko kwoŋ jager pere.
Ŋata waŋe cayo jokidakana,
to woro jono ma jolworo Rwoth.
Ŋata ciko Were timo gimoro,
aka kiwir paro pere.
Ŋata kopa ji pesa m'ongoye magowa,
aka kinyew go waco twodo kwoŋ ŋata bubanja.
Ŋata timo gigipiny me bino bedo m'ocwiny.
Awi Were, kwonga an,
kole apondo i in.
Awaco ri Rwoth ni, “Ibedo Rwoth paran,
angoye gi bero kwanyo woko in.”
Paka ri ji pa Were ma jonitie i piny,
jo ama jonitie gi dwoŋ mar'adieri m'aworo.
Jono ma joyero were man,
jomedo rem pajo.
Akibino kidho i cowirok pajo,
kosa tuco nyingi jo gi dhokan.
Rwoth, in kende a gim'anitie gine,
aka miyan kisi gim'ayenyo,
kwo paran ma yuwiye nitie i cingin.
Nga mic perin ran ma gir'aura,
nga jober!
Apako Rwoth ma miyan rieko,
aka cunyan gwokan wor.
Noknok aŋeyo nike Rwoth nitie kodan,
go nitie cegin, aka ongoye gima yengan.
Riameno cunyan yodere,
aka adundo paran fore
awinjo ni anitie i siem,
kosa ikibino weyan neno bur.
kisangala opoŋ ruwaŋin,
aka cingin maracuc kelo kisangala ma cil gi cil.
Awi Rwoth, winji ywak paran ri tiro,
ciki ithin ri ywak paran ri kony,
ciki ithin ri kwayo paran mar'adieri.
Ibino thumo banja i thenge paran,
kwoŋbedo iŋeyo gim'otire.
Makada nende ikaŋasa cunyan,
makada nende ibin bongan wor,
makada nende ikaŋasa an kicutho,
ikibino nwaŋo kwoŋan kidakana,
dhokan kiluw reco.
Akiluw gimarac paka joman.
Atieko luwo or perin,
aka akiluwo yo pa jor'akaka.
Noknok awotho i yo perin,
aka tiendan fodi k'ocer.
Alwoŋin kwoŋbedo iladwokan, Awi Were,
miyan ithin, winji wac paran.
Nyuthi ji perin mar perin makiwire,
Awi jaboth pa jono ma jodwaro kapondo,
kwoŋ jokwor pajo i cingin maracuc.
Kwonga an paka nyangil waŋin,
kanan i tipo ma bwombin,
kwoŋ jokidakana ma jomonjan.
Jokwor ma jonek jothokan,
jongoye gi wor
aka joluwo gi noro.
Jothokan pama, kisi kam'awir'iye,
jorango hola ma redhan piny.
Jocale simbwor ma dwaro yeco gimoro,
jomito yecan mathindho thindho.
Ay, Awi Rwoth, imonji jokwor paran aka ikengila jo.
Bothan kwoŋ jokidakana g'abor perin,
bothan kwoŋ ji ma jonitie gi gima jomito je i kwo me.
Miy jo gir'acula gi candirok m'ikano rijo,
weyi wotundi kiri kwoŋ nyithindho pajo ma romo,
aka man wodoŋ ri nyikway jo!
To paka ri an, kwoŋbedo angoye gi komo, abino nenin,
aka k'acew, bedo perin bino miyan kisangala.
Amarin, Awi Rwoth!
Ibedo meni paran.
Rwoth obedo tele paran,
kapondo paran aka jaboth paran.
Were paran obedo tele paran,
i go a kapondo paran.
Kwot paran, aka meni paran ma both,
kapondo paran.
Alwoŋo Rwoth,
aka bothan kwoŋ jokwor paran
Pak win Rwoth!
Asur ma tho oswana an,
asur ma rerok othokan,
lworo ma piny ma tho othokan,
aka bwo ma tho ocomere kodan.
I kidamba paran alwoŋo Rwoth,
aywak ri Were paran wokonyan.
I Ot pa Were owinjo dwondan,
aka ywak paran owinjere i ithe.
Kenyo piny okirin to yengere,
kindi gote bende okirin,
to yengere, kwoŋbedo Were oyido omako nge.
Yiro owok i yore ume,
mac ma reyo jo owok i dhoke,
cuk mac m'odheth owok bonge.
Oyeco polo to loro piny,
gi pondeponde m'opoto i par tiende.
Ogweyo cwec manitie gi bwombe, m'ilwoŋo ni kerubim,
aka oay gi bwombe paka koyo.
Oloko mudho gium pere thoko go,
pondeponde m'opoto, m'opoŋ'iye pi othoko go.
Pe gi menyin ma mac,
owok kwoŋ lithkoth ruwaŋe,
aka okedho woko pondeponde macol.
Kenyo Rwoth omor wok i polo,
aka dwondi Were madwoŋ loyo owinjere.
Ocelo aserin pere, aka okedho woko jokwor pere;
omiyo jo ŋwec gi menyin ma lithkoth.
Kenyo pendi nam odoŋ maler,
aka kindi piny oyawere,
munyo Rwoth obwoko jokwor pere,
t'ohola rijo gi nge.
Rwoth otundo piny wok malo aka omakan,
to ywayan wok i pi maluth.
Obothan kwoŋ jokwor paran ma jotek,
kodi kwoŋ jono ma jodakan,
kole oyido jotek swa ran.
Jomonjan munyo oyido anitie i teko,
to Rwoth okwonga an.
Okonyan wok i teko
obothan kwoŋbedo owinjo kodan maber.
Rwoth miyan kemba cungo kwoŋ tiro paran,
go miyan silwany kwoŋbedo abu banja.
Kole atieko kuro yo pa Rwoth,
aka akiwire kwoŋ Were paran timo kidakana.
Atieko kuro cik pere je
aka akiweyo or pere.
Oyido angoye g'apuse ruwaŋe,
aka angoye gi komo.
Riameno Rwoth miyan kemba cungo kwoŋ tiro paran,
kole oŋeyo ni alony ruwaŋe.
Awi Rwoth, itimo adieri ri jono ma jotimo rin adieri,
aka ikipusa ji ma jongoye g'apuse.
Inyutho cilo ri jono ma cuny jo cil,
to igeri ri jokidakana.
Ibotho ji mamwol,
t'imwolo jonoro.
In Rwoth, ibedo tala paran
aka iloko mudho paran lero.
Imiyan meni ma monjo jokwor paran,
kodi dwoŋ maloyo kwot pajo.
Were me, tim pere otire,
cikirok pa Rwoth tundo i kare,
Go cal kwot,
ri ji je ma jopondo i go.
Rwoth kende a Were
Were kende a tele mawan.
Go Were ma lokan matek,
aka kwonga yo paran.
Otimo tiendan m'ocwiny paka tiendi amudhe,
aka kethan gi geno wi gote.
ŋey anyal oro kwot asere m'otimi gi ywel.
Awi Rwoth, ikwonga an t'ibothan,
ithielan gi cingin maracuc,
aka kony perin omiyan bedo ŋatadwoŋ.
Igwokan wokiri womakan,
aka tiendan k'ocer.
Ariemo jokwor paran aka aneko jo;
akiwire gik cuka asika woko jo.
Aredho jo piny, aka jokinyal ay malo;
akengila jo aka joriere ruwaŋan.
Imiyan meni ma lweny,
kodi loyo kwoŋ jokwor paran.
Imiyo jokwor paran ŋwec kwoŋan
aka asika woko ji ma jodakan.
Joywak ri kony, to ngoye ŋat'okony jo;
jolwoŋo Rwoth, to Rwoth kidwoki jo.
Aŋinyo jo to jolokere paka fukefuke
ma koyo kudho.
Anyono jo paka cwodho i royo.
Ibothan gwenyirok gi ji,
aka imiyan dhumo nonin kweth;
ji m'oyido akuya ama nyo adhumo.
Jopath jobino bwonirok ruwaŋan
aka tekin jowinjo kwoŋan, joluwo cik paran.
Miseni pajo rumo,
aka jobino gi kirin wok i kapondo pajo.
Rwoth kwo! Kwot paran wopak!
Tuci dwoŋ pa Were matek ma bothan!
Go miyan loyo kwoŋ jokwor paran;
aka ketho nonin i dhum paran,
to bothan kwoŋ cwo ma jomaker.
Awi Rwoth, imiyan loyo kwoŋ jokwor paran,
aka ikwonga an kwoŋ cwo ma jomaker.
Am'omiyo apakin, Awi Rwoth i dier nonin je,
awero wer ma pakin.
go nyutho mar makiwire ri ŋata go oyero,
ri Daudi gi nyikwaye cil gi cil.
Polo nyutho dwoŋ pa Were,
aka wodho kamaler tic ma cingi Were.
Kisi ndelo langa ri nyawote,
kisi wor luda ri nyawote.
Luwo kosa wac ongoye,
ongoye mayindo ma winjere,
kucel mikwenda pajo winjere ri piny gibe,
aka winjere kiri i gike piny.
Were otimo peco ri waŋceŋ i polo
paka jaŋwec m'omaro swa ŋwec.
Cako liel i gike acel ma polo
aka ŋado kadho i gike ca.
Ongoye gima nyalo pondo kwoŋ lietho pere.
Cik pa Rwoth ongoy'iye komo,
miyo meni manyen.
Gima Rwoth waco genere,
miyo rieko ri ji ma jongoye gine.
Cik pa Rwoth otire,
aka ji ma jokuro josangala.
Or pa Rwoth cil
miyo niaŋ ri nyaŋith.
Lworo Were ber,
bedo cil gi cil.
Thumo banja pa Rwoth otire,
bedo i kare noknok.
Ber loyo zahabu,
kiri zahabu macil,
mit loyo mo kic,
kiri mo kic mar'apedo.
Miyan, ŋeca perin rieko,
aka nitie kemba madwoŋ i kuro.
To ŋa manyalo neno komo pere?
Bothan, Awi Rwoth, kwoŋ komo m'opanere!
Gwokan bende kwoŋ timo reco m'aŋeyo,
ikir'iwey jowothuman.
Kenyo abino bedo m'ongoye apuse,
aka m'agonyere kwoŋ raco ma timo reco.
Weyi wac ma wok i dhokan gi paro ma cunyan,
wobedi ma yere ruwaŋin,
Awi Rwoth, tele paran aka jaboth paran!
Rwoth wodwokin i ndelo ma teko!
Nyingi Were pa Yakobo wokwonga in!
Rwoth wodhiri rin kony wok i Ot pa Were,
aka wothielin wok i got Zayon.
Rwoth wopoy mic perin je,
aka wosangala gi cowirok perin je.
Womiyin gima cunyin mito,
aka wokethi can perin je wotundi i kare.
Weyi wakok gi kisangala ri loyo perin
aka watiŋ bendera mawan i nyingi Were mawan.
Weyi Rwoth wodwoki kwac perin je.
Onyo aŋeyo ni Rwoth miyo loyo ri kere pere m'oyero,
dwoko go wok i polo maleŋ,
aka miyo go loyo madwoŋ gi meni pere.
Jomegi joketho noro i cawilin
aka jomegi i kayina,
to noro mawan nitie i nyingi Rwoth Were mawan.
Kiti ji no jobino cer to jopodho,
to wan wabino ay to wacungo m'ocwiny.
Miy kere loyo, Awi Rwoth,
dwoki wan ka walwoŋo.
Kere fore i meni perin, Awi Rwoth,
aka yodere kwoŋbedo imiyo go loyo.
Imiyo go gima cunye mito,
t'idwoko kwac pere.
Ibino bonge gi silwany madwoŋ,
t'ijengo sangaria ma zahabu i wiye.
Go okwayin kwo, t'imiyo go,
kwo mabor ma cil gi cil.
Ikonyo go bedo ŋatadwoŋ,
imiyo go ŋeyirok gi dwoŋ.
Silwany perin nitie gi go cil gi cil
aka bedo perin cegin gi go miyo go kisangala.
Kole kere ketho geno pere i Rwoth,
aka ro mar pa Rwoth makiwire,
go k'oyengere.
Kere bino mako jokwor pere je,
go bino mako ji je ma jodak go.
Go bino reyo woko jo paka mac maliel,
ka onenere.

Ongoye nyikway jo ma jolaboth,

Jotimo can pajo, aka jociko go,

Alwoŋin wor,

Atieko genin wok i ndelo m'anywol'iye,

Ikir'ibedi bor kodan,

Jokwor kweth jothokan paka thwondhe,

Joyawo dhok gin paka simbwore,

Meni paran orumo,
paka pi m'okire piny.
Cokin paran jowok i kogino,
cunyan cal odok m'oleny.
Lokoro paran othwo paka fukefuke,
aka lewan moko i dandan.
Itieko weyan ri tho i fukefuke.
Kitipa pa ji mareco jothokan,

Anyalo kwano cokin paran je,

Joparo nangin paran,
aka jopoko.
Biye piyo ibothan!
Bothi adundo paran kwoŋ abor,
bothi kwo paran kwoŋ gwokere me.
Bothan kwoŋ simbwore me,
angoye gi kony ruwaŋ thwondhe me.
Abino waco ri ji paran gim'itieko timo,
abino pakin i cokirok pa ji.
win nyikway Yakobo miy win Rwoth dwoŋ,

Go kikwer kosa cay jocandi,

Abino pakin i cokirok pa ji ro gim'itieko timo,

Jocandi jolacemo to joyeŋ,
jono ma jorango Rwoth jolapako go!
Weyi jowoyindira i kisi gima jotimo.
Nonin je jobino poyo Rwoth.
Woki i kisi thenge ma piny jobino wire bonge,
to jolamo go.
Kole Rwoth obedo kere
aka dhumo nonin je.
Jonoro je jobino kule piny rigo,

Luse ma yuwaŋe jobino tiyo rigo,
jobino waco ri luse ma yuwaŋe kwoŋ Rwoth.
Ibino waco ri ji ma fodi k'onywol ni,
“Rwoth obotho ji pere.”
Rwoth obedo jakwath paran,
anitie gi kisi gim'ayenyo.
go telan i thengi pi m'opie.
Go dwoko cunyan,
to telan i yo m'otire,
ro nyingi go.
Makada nende awothi i milelo, i tipo ma tho,
akilwor raco,
kole initie kodan.
Abiro gi luth perin ma kwath,
kwonga an.
Iyiko ran kalima,
ruwaŋ jokwor paran,
iwiro wiyan gi mo,
ipoŋo kikopo paran kiri malo.
Adieri wor gi bero bino luwan,

kwo paran je.
Piny gi ji ma jobedo i iye obedo apa Rwoth.
Kole Rwoth ogeto piny i wi nam,

Ŋa ma bino idho tendere pa Rwoth?
Ŋa ma bino cungo i ot pere maleŋ?
ŋata kilam cal,
kosa kitim cikirok ma twodo.
Ŋato bino nwaŋo silwany wok bongi Rwoth,

Meno a luse ji ma jorango go,
ma jobino ruwaŋ Were pa Yakobo.
Yaw waŋkace,

aka kere madwoŋ wodonji.
Kere madwoŋ me a ŋa?
Obedo Rwoth, go tek aka jameni,
Rwoth, maloyo lweny.
Yaw win waŋkace,
yaw win thigin macene,
ŋey kere madwoŋ wodonji.
Kere madwoŋ me a ŋa?
Obedo Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
go kere madwoŋ.
Atiŋo adundo paran rin, Rwoth.
Aketho geno paran i in Were paran,
ikir'iwey wiyan wokwoti,
ikir'iwey jokwor paran jowonyeran.
Ikir'iwey jono ma joketho geno pajo i in wi jo okwoti,
to weyi jono ma jogwenyere kwoŋin ama jowobedi gi wickwot.
Miyan aŋey yo perin, Awi Rwoth,
aka fonjan yo perin.
Telan iy'adieri perin, aka fonjan

Kole noknok aketho geno paran i in.
Awi Rwoth, poyi wor perin gi mar perin makiwire,
m'itieko nyutho wok cene.
Cwaki reco paran gi komo paran ma soye,
cungo kwoŋ mar perin makiwire poyan,
ro bero perin Rwoth!
Rwoth ber aka otire,
riameno go fonjo joreco yo ma joripo luwo.
Go telo ji ma jomwol timo gim'otire,
aka fonjo jo yo pere.
Yo pa Rwoth je obedo mar makiwire g'adieri,
ri jono ma jokuro cikirok pere gi fonji pere.
Ro nyingin, Awi Rwoth,
cwaki reco paran, kole jothoth.
Ŋa ma lworo Rwoth?
Ŋato ama Rwoth bino fonjo yo ma go ripo luwo.
Go won bino kiyindira i kisi gimoro,
aka nyithindho pere jobino lunjo lowo.
Rwoth mako mere gi jono ma jolworo go,
aka nyutho cikirok pere rijo.
Aketho waŋan kwoŋ Rwoth kisi hongo,
aka go fudho tiendan wok i bwo.
Wire bongan Rwoth, aka imaki kodan wor
kole anitie kakendan aka angoye gi meni.
Bothan kwoŋ paro mar'adundo paran,
aka iwodhan wok i kidamba paran.
Dew kwoŋ kidamba paran gi candirok paran
t'icwako reco paran.
Neni jokwor kweth m'anitie gine,
aka nen nger ma jodakan'iye gi maker.
Kwonga kwo paran, t'ibothan,
ikir'iwey wokwoti wiyan,
kole abino pondo bongin.
Ro bero g'adieri, kwonga an,
kole akurin won.
Both Isiraili, Awi Were,
wok i teko pere je.
Awi Rwoth, wac ni abu banja,
kole atimo gim'otire,
aka aketho geno paran kwoŋin kicutho.
Kaŋasa an aka iteman, Rwoth
tem cunyan gi paro paran.
Mar perin makiwire telan,
aka awotho iy'adieri perin.
Akiriwere gi ji ma bukony,
akinyek sawa gi jorendirok.
Adaki cokirok pa jomarac,
aka akiriwere gi jokidakana.
Rwoth, alwoko cingan ma nyutho ni abu banja,
aka aŋanjo kareno alamo thoko migam perin.
Awero malo wer ma foyin,
t'awaco kwoŋ tim perin ma gir'aura.
Awi Rwoth, amaro ot ma in ibed'iye,
kabedo madwoŋ perin nitie i iye.
Ikir'ireyan woko gi joreco kanyacel,
bothi kwo paran kwoŋ rerok pa jonek.
Ji ma jotimo raco kisi hongo
aka joyikere jolo nyew.
To paka ri an, atimo gim'otire,
maki kodan wor aka ibothan!
Acungo i yo m'otire,
i dier cokirok pa ji pere, alapako Rwoth.
Rwoth obedo lero paran aka bothi paran,
anolwor ŋa.
Rwoth obedo kapondo ma kwo paran,
ŋa m'obwokan.
Ka ji mareco jomonjan to jotemo nekan,
jocer aka jopodho.
Makada nende jolweny gibe jothokan,
akibino bwok,
makada nende jokwor jomonjan,
kucel abino cungo m'acwiny.
Gimoro acel m'atieko kwayo Rwoth,
aka gino abino dwaro,
ni anyal bedo i Ot pa Rwoth
i kwo paran je,
neno bero pere,
gi kwayo go wotelan.
Go bino kanan i kabwok pere
i hongo ma teko,
go bino panan i wema pere,
go kilathangan wi got mabor.
Ameno abino kikengila jokwor paran ma jothokan.
Abino miyo cowirok i wema pere gi koko ma siemirok,
abino wero, abino pako Rwoth.
Winji ywak paran rin, Awi Rwoth,
maki wor kodan aka idwokan.
Munyo iwaco ni, “Biye laman,”
Adwokin ni, “Alabino, Rwoth.”
Ikir'ipondi ran!
Ikir'imaki kodan nge,
ikir'iriem ŋeca perin,

ikir'iweyan, ikir'ijwangan,
Awi Were, jaboth paran.
Kole baba gi mama jonyalo jwangan,
to Rwoth bino kuran.
Fonjan yo perin Awi Rwoth,
aka itelan i yo m'otire,
kwoŋbedo athothi gi jokwor.
Ikir'ijwangan ri jokwor paran,
ma jomonjan gi twodo g'atise.
Ayeyo ni abino neno bero pa Rwoth

Kuri Rwoth,
bedi matek, aka weyi cunyin wobedi matek,
ey kuri Rwoth.
Awi Rwoth, alwoŋin,
tele paran ikir'icul ithin ran,

Winji ywak paran ri kony,
k'atiŋo cingan malo i ot perin maleŋ.
Ikir'ithum ran banja kanyacel gi jokidakana,

Miy jo gir'acula ro tim pajo je,

Pak win Rwoth!
Kole Rwoth otieko winjo ywak paran ri kony.
Rwoth obedo meni paran aka kwot paran,
aketho geno paran i go.
Rwoth miyan kony aka sieman,
apako go gi wer ma kisangala.
Rwoth obedo meni pa ji pere,

Bothi ji perin Rwoth,
aka miy jono ma jobedo aperin silwany.
Bedi jakwath pajo,
aka ikuri jo cil gi cil.
pak win dwoŋ gi meni pere.
Pak win nyingi Rwoth madwoŋ,

Dwondi Rwoth winjere i nam,

Ka Rwoth oluwo, nyutho meni pere,

kiri yen sida ma Lebanon.
Go miyo gote ma Lebanon por paka nyithindhi dhok,
aka miyo got Hamon por paka rwath.
Dwondi Rwoth miyo lithkoth menyere.
Dwondi Rwoth miyo thim yengere,

Dwondi Rwoth miyo yen olwa yengirok,

Rwoth dhumo pi je maluth,

Weyi Rwoth womiy ji pere meni!
Weyi Rwoth womiy ji pere silwany gi siem!
Abino pakin, Rwoth, kole ibothan,

Awi Rwoth Were paran, aywak rin ri kony,

Ibothan donjo i bur,

Wer win wer ma pak ri Rwoth,

Poyi win gima Ŋataleŋ otimo,

Nge pere cek,

Ywak yware wor gipi,

Oyido akidew aka awaco ni,
“Akibino yengirok.”
Oyido iber ran Rwoth,

T'ipondo ran,

Konyan, Rwoth!”

Rwoth, in Were paran,

Winjan, ibothan pama!
Bedi ran tele ma pondo,

In ibedo tele paran aka kapondo paran,

Gwokan kwoŋ bwo m'ociki ran,

Aketho kwo paran i cingin.
Ibino bothan Rwoth,
Ibedo Were ma timo adieri.
t'aketho geno paran i in.
Abino kisangala t'asiemere,

Ineno litho paran,

Ikijwangan i cingi jokwor paran,

Maki wor kodan, Awi Rwoth,

Kole kwo paran gipi nitie rem,
aka kwo paran olokere macek ro ywak.
Angoye gi meni ro teko paran,

Jokwor paran je, tektek mere joger paran,
joteran gi cay,

ka joromo kodan i royo joringo.
Kisi dhano wiye owil kodan,
acalo gim'otho.
Awinjo jokwor paran jomwoŋo,

To, aketho geno paran kwoŋin, Awi Rwoth,
ibedo Were paran.
Iŋat'idewo kwoŋan noknok,

Ŋiy ŋeca perin gi wor,

Alwoŋin, Rwoth,
ikir'iweyan asewere.
Weyi wickwot omaki jokidakana,
weyi jowotho manyaliŋliŋ.
Miy jotwodo liŋ,
jonoro je gi jodhaw

Gigipiny maber m'ikano ri jono ma joworin,
obedo ma gir'aura!
Kisi dhano oŋeyo bero perin,

Ibedo kabwok pajo,
kwoŋ can pa joman,
Ikwonga jo,
kwoŋ pokopoko marac.
Pak win Rwoth!
Onyuthan mar pere ma gir'aura

Oyido abwok aka aparo,
ni orieman woko ruwaŋe.
To munyo alwoŋo go ri kony,
owinjo ywak paran.
Mar win Rwoth, ji pere ma jotimo adieri.
Rwoth kwonga joma timo adieri,
to miyo jonoro gir'acula.
Bedi win matek, bedi win jomiseni,
jono je ma joketho geno pajo kwoŋ Rwoth.
gi komo pere.
Jasilwany a ŋata Rwoth kisegeya timo reco,
aka kitwodi i cunye.
Munyo fodi akituco reco paran,
oyido aol ro ywak ndelo gipi.
Imiyan gir'acula wor g'odieceŋ, Rwoth,
meni paran je orumo,
paka ŋico thwo gi lietho i ndir ma ceŋ.
Kenyo atuco reco paran rin,
akimuŋo komo paran.
Amiyere tuco jo rin,
aka icwako reco paran je.
Riameno weyi kisi ŋata winjin, wokwayin i hongo je ma kidamba,
ka mikula madwoŋ ma teko oredi donjo,
kilatundo bongi jo.
Ibedo kapondo paran,
ibino bothan kwoŋ teko.
Awero malo bothi perin,
kwoŋbedo ikwonga an.
Rwoth waco ni, “Abino nyuthin yo m'iripo luwo,
abino fonjin aka abino miyin rieko.”
Ikir'ibedi mamiŋ paka kayina kosa punda,
m'itweyo gimoro i dhok gin kosa thol ogwaŋ,
ma miyo jo mwolok.
Jokidakana jobino candirok,
to jono ma jogeno Rwoth,
mar pere makiwire kwonga jo.
Win ma witimo gim'otire, sangala win aka fore win,
ro gima Rwoth otieko timo.
Win ma cuny win ler, koki win ri kisangala.
Fore win i Rwoth, win ma witimo gim'otire,
pak ber ri jono ma jotimo gim'otire.
Pak win Rwoth gi tongol,
wer win rigo gi tongol ma waya apar.
Wer win rigo wer manyen,
goy win tongol gi ndijo, aka wikoki ri kisangala.
Wac pa Rwoth otire,
aka tic pere je itimo iy'adieri.
Rwoth omaro timo gim'otire gi tiro,
mar pere makiwire opoŋ i piny.
Rwoth ocweyo polo gi cik pere,
waŋceŋ, dwe, kodi micalin gi wac m'owok i dhoke.
Ocoko pi ma nam kanyacel,
ocego lutho ma wakawaka madongo i udi ma kakan.
Piny je wolam Rwoth!
Weyi nonin je ma piny jowobwonere rigo!
Go oluwo, to piny cweyere,
luwo i cik pere gigipiny je oneno.
Rwoth geŋo woko atoŋa pa nonin,
go geŋo jo timo can pajo.
To can pa Rwoth cungo cil gi cil,
atoŋa pere ongoye gi gike.
Josilwany a nono ma Were pajo obedo Rwoth,
ji ma go oyero paka ji pere won.
Rwoth ŋiyo piny wok i polo,
aka neno ji je.
Go ŋiyo piny gi kama dhum'iye,
ji je ma jokwo i piny.
Go m'ocweyo cuny joje,
