oŋeyo gima jotimo je.
Kere kibothi ro jolweny pere madwoŋ,
jalweny kiloy lweny ro meni pere.
Kayinin ma lweny jongoye kony ri loyo lweny,
meni pajo madwoŋ kinyal botho.
Adieri Rwoth como waŋe kwoŋ jono ma jolworo go,
jono ma jogeno mar pere makiwire.
Go botho adundo pajo kwoŋ tho,
aka kuro jo makwo i hongo ma kec.
Waketho geno mawan i Rwoth,
go kwonga wan aka konyo wan.
Wasangala ro go,
wageno nyingi go maleŋ.
Weyi mar perin makiwire wobedi gi wan, Awi Rwoth,
ka waketho geno mawan i in.
Abino foyo Rwoth noknok,
alapako go noknok.
Abino pako go ro gima go otieko timo,
weyi jono je m'idiyo jowinji aka jowosangala.
Langa kanyacel kodan dwoŋ pa Rwoth,
weyi wapaki nyinge kanyacel!
Akwayo Rwoth, aka odwokan,
ogonyan kwoŋ lworo paran je.
Ji m'idiyo joŋiyo Rwoth, aka josangala,
go kilaredho jo.
Jacandi me oywaki, aka Rwoth owinjo go,
to botho go kwoŋ teko pere je.
Malaika pa Rwoth thoko jono ma jolworo go,
to botho jo kwoŋ teko.
Apa tem neno nger ma Rwoth ber'iye.
Josilwany a jono ma jopondo bonge.
jono ma jowinjo go jonitie gi gima joyenyo je.
Kiri simbwore jobedo kec ro ongoye pa cemo,
to jono ma jowinjo Rwoth jobedo gi gimaber je.
Biye win, merin paran ma soye, aka wiwinjan,
abino fonjo win lworo Rwoth.
Imito winjo kwo maber?
Imito bedo gi kwo mabor gi kisangala?
gi luwo twodo.
Weyi timo raco, aka itimi bero,
dwar siem gi cunyin je.
Rwoth kwonga jono ma jotimo gim'otire,
aka winjo ywak pajo,
to go kwero jono ma jotimo raco,
ŋey ka jotho kipoy jo kendo.
Ka ji ma jotimo gim'otire joywak ri kony, Rwoth winjo,
aka gonyo jo wok i teko pajo je.
Rwoth bedo cegin gi jono ma cuny gin otur,
go botho jono ma jongoye gi geno.
Jomaber joluwo i litho kweth,
to Rwoth botho jo wok i je.
Rwoth deda jo kicutho,
m'ongoye coko pajo kad'acel ma tur.
ibino miyo gir'acula ri jono ma jodak joma timo gim'otire.
Rwoth botho kwo pa ŋecin pere,
kilathumo banja ri jono ma jopondo i go.
Gwenyere gi jono ma jogwenyere kwoŋan, Awi Rwoth,
aka lweny gi jono ma jolwenyo kodan!
Kwany kwot gi kwot madwoŋ perin,
aka ibin ikonyan.
Tiŋi malo abor gi le perin
kwoŋ jono ma jorieman.
Cikan n'ibino bothan.
Weyi jono ma jotemo nekan,
wokengila jo aka wickwot omaki jo!
Weyi jono ma jotimo can kwoŋan,
woriem jo aka jowobedi i nywowirok.
Weyi jowocal cuŋ ma koyo kudho,
ka malaika pa Rwoth riemo jo!
Weyi yo pajo wobedi mudho aka jowoceri,
ka malaika pa Rwoth riemo jo.
Jociko ran bwo m'ongoye kad'atoŋa,
aka jokunyo ran bur maluth ma makan.
To jobino rere woko mafodi jok'oŋeyo,
wegi jobino moko i bwo pajo,
jolapodh'iye to josika woko.
Kenyo cunyan bino fore i Rwoth,
abino kisangala kwoŋbedo obothan.
Abino waco ri Rwoth gi cunyan je,
“Ongoye ŋata cale in.
Ikwonga ji ma jongoye gi nyalo kwoŋ jomatek,
gi jocandi kwoŋ joma diyo jo.”
Jomisegey jomiyo mijulisi kwoŋan,
aka josegeya an timo gigipiny m'akuya.
Joculan raco ri bero,
aka adoŋ kakendan.
To an, munyo jotwo, aruko kutiya
ariyo kec,
akwayo gi wiyan piny,
paka akwayo ri mere kosa omin an.
Abedo pa ŋata ywako min,
akule piny iywak.
To munyo oyido anitie i teko, joje josangala,
aka joriwere kanyacel nyero an.
Jokicar jogoyan,
aka jobedo ka jocwadan.
Paka ji ma jonyero ŋat'oŋol,
joŋiyan gi dakirok.
Inoŋiya ŋiya nyaka kiri keraŋo Rwoth?
Bothan kwoŋ kisinye pajo,
bothan kwoŋ simbwore me.
Kenyo abino foyin i cokirok pa ji perin,
abino pakin ruwaŋ joje.
jono ma jotimo kodan kwor m'ongoye atoŋa.
Ikir'iwey jowodiem waŋ gin kwoŋan
jono ma jodakan nono.
Jokiluwi siem,
kwanyo woko jocwogo twodo nger je kwoŋ ji ma jomaro siem.
Josegeya an, ka jokoko ni,
“Waneno gim'itimo.”
To Rwoth, itieko neno gime.
Riameno ikir'iliŋ Rwoth,
ikir'ibedi bor.
Lweny Rwoth, ithielan,
ay iosa ran, Were paran, Were paran.
Ibedo Rwoth ma timo gim'otire, riameno wac ni an abu banja,
ikir'iwey jokwor paran jowonyeran.
Ikir'iwey jowowaci wegi ni,
“Walaco go!
Meno a gim'oyido wamito!”
Weyi jono ma jonyero candirok paran,
wokengila jo kicutho aka jowobedi i nyawin,
weyi jono ma jowaco ni jober loyan
jowobedi giwickwot aka jowongoye gi wor.
Weyi jono ma jomito neno ni, omiyan loyo,
jowokoki gi kisangala aka jowowaci kendo gi kendo ni,
“Rwoth dwoŋ!
Go winjo maber gi bero pa ŋeca pere.”
Kenyo abino waco ni itimo gim'otire,
aka abino pakin ndelo je.
i lutho ma cunye,
go kwedo Were aka kilwor go.
Kole joparo malo swa kwoŋ gin,
aka joparo ni Were kinyal ŋeyo reco pajo to thumo rijo banja.
Wac ma wok i dhok jo opoŋ kidakana gi twodo
jokitim gi rieko kosa bero kendo.
Jotimo can marac gi kanindo pajo,
ongoye gimaber ma jotimi,
aka jokikwer gimarac.
Awi Rwoth, mar perin makiwire tundo i polo,
adieri perin yware kiri i pondeponde.
Timo tiro perin cal gote,
timo adieri perin cal lutho ma nam.
Iŋat'idewo ri ji g'ogwaŋe.
Mar perin makiwire dicwe, Awi Were!
Nyithindhi ji jonwaŋo kabwok i bwombin.
Wacamo cemo kweth m'imiyo wan,
imiyo wan medho wok i malawa ma bero perin.
Kole in iŋat'imiyo kwo,
aka i lero perin waneno lero.
Medere maro jono ma joŋeyin,
gi timo bero ri jono ma jotimo gim'otire.
Ikir'iwey jomaker jowomonjan,
kosa jokidakana joworieman.
Neni kama jomarac jopodh'iye.
Joriere kenyo ma jokinyal ay.
Ikir'irembi ro jokidakana,
ikir'imaki nyeko gi joma timo raco.
Kole jocegin rwenyo paka lum ma thwo woko,
jobino thwo paka yen ma ner.
Kethi geno i Were, aka tim bero,
ŋey ikwo i piny m'ongoye teko.
Dwar kisangala perin wok bongi Rwoth,
aka go bino miyin gima cunyin yenyo.
Miy Rwoth yo perin,
kethi geno perin i go, aka go bino konyin,
go bino miyo timo gim'otire perin liel paka ceŋ m'odikin.
Bedi liŋ ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka ikuri go moth,
ikir'irembi kwoŋ jono ma joyindira
kosa jono ma jobedo gi loyo i can pajo marac.
Ikir'irembi, kosa imaki nge,
gino kelo teko ayin.
Jono ma joketho geno i Rwoth jobino lunjo lowo ma Rwoth ociko,
t'ibino riemo jokidakana woko.
Jokidakana jocegin rwenyo,
inyalo rango jo, t'ikibino nwaŋo jo.
jolawinjo cwe mere gi siem.
Jokidakana jotimo can ri jomaber,
aka joneno jo gi dakirok.
To Rwoth nyero jokidakana,
kole go oŋeyo ni jobino rwenyo piyo.
Jokidakana jocelo abor pajo aka jokomo woko aserin pajo,
neko woko jocandi ji ma bu gimoro,
thumo jono ma jotimo gim'otire.
To abor pajo bino donjo i cuny jo wegi,
aka ibino turo woko aserin pajo.
Gima nok ma ŋataber nitie gine,
dikony loyo madit ma jakidakana nitie gine,
kwoŋbedo Rwoth bino turo cingi jokidakana,
to kwonga jomaber.
Rwoth oŋeyo ndelo pa jono ma jongoye g'apuse,
aka gir'alunja pajo bedo cil gi cil.
Jokibino bedo giwickwot i hongo marac,
jobino bedo gi ma romo i ndir ma kec.
To jokidakana jolarere,
jokwor pa Rwoth jobino rwenyo paka mawuwa madudi,
jobino rwenyo paka yiro.
Jokidakana jokwayo gigipiny, aka jokinyal culo,
to jomaber jomiyo m'ongoye olo.
Kole jono ma Rwoth omiyo jo silwany jobino limo lowo,
aka jono ma go okwoŋo ibino riemo woko.
Rwoth nyutho ji yo ma jowoluwi,
aka kwonga jono ma josangala go,
makada nende jopodhi, jokibino doŋ piny,
kwoŋbedo Rwoth konyo jo ay malo.
Wok i soye paran, tundo gunyo ni ee ati,
fodi akineno ka Rwoth ojwango jomaber,
kosa ka nyithindho pajo jokwayo mugat.
Jopoko ma nono noknok, aka jokopa ji,
aka nyithindho pajo jobedo silwany.
Weyi raco, aka tim bero,
ŋey ikwo cil gi ci.,
Kole Rwoth omaro tiro,
aka go kilajwango ji pere ma jotimo adieri,
go kwonga joma timo gim'otire,
t'ilareyo woko nyikway jokidakana.
Ji ma jotimo gim'otire jobino limo lowo
to jokwo i iye cil gi cil.
Dhok jomaber luwo rieko,
aka lew gin luwo tiro.
Jokuro cik pa Were pajo i cuny jo,
aka jokiwey.
Jokidakana joŋiyo jomaber,
aka jotemo neko jo.
To Rwoth kilajwango jomaber i cingi jokwor pajo,
kosa weyo wothum rijo banja ka itemo jo.
Kethi geno perin bongi Rwoth aka luw Or pere,
go bino miyin dwoŋ to miyin lowo,
aka ibino neno k'iriemo jokidakana.
Atieko neno jakidakana mager,
diyo ji aka ay malo paka yath sida ma Lebanon,
to rumacen aluwo, aka go oyido ongoye kendo,
arango go, t'akinyalo nwaŋo go.
Kaŋasa ji ma jongoye g'apuse,
aka neni ji ma jotimo gim'otire,
kole ji ma jomaro siem jonitie gi nyikway gin,
to joreco jorere kicutho,
ilaneko woko nyikway jokidakana.
Rwoth botho ji ma jotimo gim'otire,
go obedo kapondo pajo i hongo ma teko.
Rwoth konyo jo aka botho jo,
go botho jo kwoŋ jokidakana,
kwoŋbedo jopondo i go.
Awi Rwoth, ikir'imiyan gir'acula i nge perin!
Imiyan adhola g'aserin perin,
iredhan piny.
Anitie i litho madwoŋ, kwoŋbedo nge perin,
delkwoŋan gipi two ro reco paran.
Amunyere i mikula mareco paran,
jobedo ran bieto ma ciro tek.
Adholin paran ŋwe aka top,
kwoŋbedo miŋo paran.
Akule piny, aŋinyere,
aywak ndelo gipi.
Awaŋ gi senyiga,
aka anitie cegin gi tho.
Aol, aka aŋinyere kicutho,
cunyan rembo, aka acur gi litho.
Awi Rwoth, iŋeyo gim'adwaro,
iwinjo cur paran je.
Cunyan gore, meni paran orumo,
aka waŋan ocore.
Merin paran gi joger paran jokicore cegin kodan,
kwoŋbedo adhola paran,
kiri wade paran je jocore gicen.
Jono ma jomito nekan jociko ran bwo,
jono ma jomito miyan litho jotisa an,
jokioli gi timo can kwoŋan.
To acalo ŋata ithe otho, akinyali winjo,
paka obadha ma kinyal luwo.
Acalo ŋata kinyal winjo,
gi ŋata kinyal dwoko wac.
T'aketho geno bongin, Rwoth,
aka in, Awi Rwoth Were paran, ibino dwokan.
Kole akwayo, ikir'iwey jokwor paran jowonyeran,
ikir'iwey jowosangala ka tiendan ocer!
Kole acegin podho,
aka anitie i litho ma kikwe.
Atuco reco paran,
awinjo gine gi rem.
Jokwor paran jokitwo aka jotek,
jomore ma jodakan m'ongoye atoŋa.
Jono ma joculo raco ri bero,
jogwenyere kodan kwoŋbedo atemo timo bero.
Ikir'ijwangan, Awi Rwoth,
ikir'ibedi bor, Were paran.
Kwakere konyan,
Awi Rwoth, jaboth paran!
Awaco ni, “Abino gwokere i gim'atimo,
ŋey akir'atim reco gi lewan.
Abino mwono dhokan,
ka jokidakana jonitie bongan.
Oyido acale obadha, aka akiluwo wac,
kada ma mako kwoŋ gimaber!
To candirok paran omedere loyo,
aka cunyan owaŋan.
Paka aparo, apaka amedere bedo i teko,
kenyo akinyalo weyo m'akikwayo ni,
Rwoth, weyi aŋey gike ma kwo paran.
Alatho keraŋo?
Waci ran ceko ma kwo paran.”
Neni, imiyo ndelo paran bedo manok,
kwo paran ongoye cwe ruwaŋin.
Adieri kisi dhano cal koyo,
adieri dhano cal tipo.
Gima jotimo je ongoye,
jocoko lim, to jokiŋey ŋata bino doŋ gine.
Aka onyo, aŋo m'anogen Awi Rwoth?
Geno paran nitie i in Rwoth.
Bothan kwoŋ reco paran je,
aka ikir'iwey jomamiŋ jowonyeran.
Abino cal obadha, akibino luwo wac,
kole iŋat'imiyan candirok ama.
Ikir'imedi miyan gir'acula,
acegin tho gi goco ma wok i cingin.
Imiyo wan gir'acula gi bwoko wan,
aka inyeko gima wamaro paka thuth.
Adieri kisi dhano cal koyo!
Winji kwayo paran, Awi Rwoth,
aka ciki ithin ri ywak paran;
biye konyan k'auja.
Kole abedo wendo manitie i woth,
jawoth, paka kwarere paran.
Weyere kodan ŋey anyal bedo gi kisangala moro,
mafodi akikadho t'arwenyo ma kinen kendo.
Akuro Rwoth moth;
owire to winjo ywak paran.
Oywayan wok i bur ma kakende,
wok i kwoyo ma tho ma kwakere,
to jengo tiendan i tele,
to miyan anyono piny ma bu teko.
Go oketho wer manyen i dhokan,
wer ma pak ri Were mawan.
Ji mathoth ma joneni jobino bedo gi lworo,
aka jolaketho geno pajo i Rwoth.
Jasilwany a ŋata geno Rwoth,
ma riwere gi jonoro,
kosa jono ma jolamo were ma k'adieri.
Itieko timo gigipiny madit riwan, Awi Rwoth Were mawan,
ongoye ŋata pimere kodin.
Itimo riwan can ma gir'aura kweth,
kabedi oyido atuci jo,
welo pajo thoth ma kikwanere!
ikikway mic awaŋa,
kosa mic ma cwako reco.
Kenyo awaco ni, “Neni, an e;
fonji perin ran ondiki i Kitawo ma Cik.
Amaro swa timo mito perin, Awi Were paran!
Cik perin nitie i cunyan.”
Awaco wac maber ni ibotho,
i cokirok madwoŋ;
neni, ak'owey waco,
paka iŋeyo, Awi Rwoth.
Akiliŋ gi wac ma both i cunyan,
noknok aluwo kwoŋbedo g'adieri perin gi both perin.
Akimuŋo mar perin makiwire gi timo adieri perin,
i cokirok madwoŋ.
Awi Rwoth, ikir'iwey timo ŋono ran,
weyi mar perin makiwire gi timo adieri perin wokuran noknok.
Teko kweth othokan,
thoth ma kikwanere,
reco paran olacan,
ma onyo akinyali neno,
jothoth jokalo ye wiyan,
cunyan podho.
Sangala bothan Rwoth!
Kwaki konyan!
Weyi jono ma jodwaro nekan,
jowobedi i nyawin aka wokengila jo kicutho.
Weyi jono ma josangala ro teko paran
woriem jo i wickwot.
Weyi jono ma jojwiyan,
jowobedi i wickwot ro kikengila pajo.
To weyi jono je ma jorangin,
jowofore to josangala.
Weyi jono je ma jomaro both perin,
jowowaci noknok ni, “Rwoth dwoŋ.”
Paka ri an, ajacandi aka abu gimoro,
to idewo kwoŋan Rwoth.
Ibedo jakony paran aka jaboth paran
ikir'igali, Awi Were paran!
Jasilwany a ŋata dewo kwoŋ jocandi,
Rwoth bino botho go i hongo ma teko.
Rwoth kwonga go aka kuro go makwo,
ilwoŋo go ni jasilwany i piny,
aka Rwoth kijwangi go i mito pa jokwor pere.
Rwoth bino konyo go ka go two,
aka bino cango two pere.
Paka ri an, awaco ni, “Awi Rwoth, tim kodan wor,
both two paran, kole atimo reco kwoŋin.”
Jokwor paran joluwo gimarac kwoŋan,
jomitan atho ŋey nyingan worere.
Aka ka moro obino nenan, luwo wac koyo,
cunye coko wac marac kwoŋan,
aka kadho waco kisi kamoro.
Jono ma jodakan je jomwoŋo kwoŋan,
jomito ran raco.
Jowaco ni, “Go two swa,
koay wok i kanindo pere kendo.”
m'oyido cemo kodan,
je owire ran.
Maki kodan wor, Rwoth, icangi two paran,
aka abino culo kwor kwoŋ jokwor paran.
Gi gime abino ŋeyo ni isangala kodan,
aka jokibino lacan.
Ibino konyan kwoŋbedo atimo gim'otire,
ibino kuran ruwaŋin cil gi cil.
Pak win Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili!
Pak go pama gi cil gi cil!
Ameno! Ameno!
Paka apol hamo ri jwom ma mol gi pi maŋic,
apaka adundo paran rangin, Awi Rwoth.
Adundo paran nitie gi riyo ri Were,
ri Were makwo.
Anobin keraŋo lamo ruwaŋin Rwoth?
Aywak wor g'odieceŋ,
aka pigi waŋan a cemo paran kende;
sawa je jokwor paran jopenjan ni,
“Nikune Were perin?”
Cunyan podho,
k'apoyo gigipiny me,
nger m'oyido atel'iye lwak ji kadho i Ot pa Were,
gi koko ma kisangala gi wer ma foyo,
kadho i kalima maleŋ.
Adundo paran, raŋo iŋedhere?
Raŋo irembo?
Kethi geno i Were;
kole alapako go kendo,
jakony paran,
aka Were paran.
Adundo paran oŋedhere,
riameno apoyin,
wok i piny Yordan gi Hamon,
wok i got Mizar.
Asur perin mager oyweyan,
paka wakawaka ma nge omako.
Rwoth nyuthan mar pere makiwire odieceŋ,
aka wor awero,
kwayo Were ma won kwo paran.
Awaco ri Were, tele paran ni,
“Raŋo wiyin owil kodan?
Raŋo amedi candirok
kwoŋbedo jokwor paran jodiyan?”
Aŋinyere gi yet pajo,
kareno jomedo penjan ni,
“Nikune Were perin?”
Adundo paran raŋo iŋedhere?
Raŋo irembo?
Kethi geno i Were;
kole alapako go kendo,
jakony paran aka Were paran.
Awi Were, wac ni an abu banja,
aka thielan kwoŋ ji ma bu Were,
kwoŋ jotwodo gi joreco!
Kole iŋat'ibedo Were ma kwonga an,
raŋo ijwangan?
Raŋo amedi candirok,
ro adica pa jokwor paran?
Dhiri lero perin g'adieri perin,
weyi jowotelan,
jowodwokan i Zayon, tendere perin maleŋ,
gi i ot perin, m'ibed'iye.
Kenyo alakidho i migam pa Were,
bongi Were m'obedo cakirok ma kisangala paran.
Abino goyo dingidi t'awero ma pakin,
Awi Were, Were paran.
Adundo paran raŋo iŋedhere?
Raŋo irembo?
Kethi geno i Were;
Kole alapako go kendo,
jakony paran aka Were paran.
Watieko winjo gi ithi wan, Awi Were,
kwarere mawan jotieko waco riwan,
kwoŋ gigipiny madongo m'itimo i hongo pajo,
i hongo macon.
Nger ma in won igweyo woko nonin gi cingin,
t'iketho ji perin i piny pajo,
nger m'imiyo nonin man gir'acula,
t'igonyo ji perin.
Kole k'obedo g'abor pajo wegi ma jomako gine piny no,
kosa meni pajo ama k'omiyo jo loyo.
To gi cingin maracuc, gi meni perin,
gi lero ma bedo perin gi jo
kwoŋbedo oyido isangala gi jo.
Ibedo kere paran aka Were paran,
imiyo ji perin loyo,
aka luwo kwoŋin waredho piny jokwor mawan;
luwo i nyingin wanyono piny jokwor mawan.
Kole akigen asere paran,
kosa abor paran kinyal konyan.
To in itieko botho wan kwoŋ jokwor mawan,
aka iketho jono ma jodak wan i nyawin.
Watieko kwoto i Were noknok,
aka wabino foyo nyingin cil gi cil.
To pama itieko jwango wan t'iweyo wokengila wan,
ikiŋanjo gi jolweny mawan kadho i lweny.
Imiyo wan ringo kwoŋ jokwor mawan,
aka jokwor mawan jonyaga wan.
Iloko wan paka rombo m'ikidho thumo,
aka ikedho wan i dier nonin.
Itana ji perin ri welo masisiri,
igoyo welo ma malo rijo.
Joger mawan joneno gim'itimo riwan,
aka joŋalo wan to jonyero wan.
Iloko wan gir'awaca i dier nonin,
ginyero i dier ji.
Ndelo je asewere,
aka wickwot omakan,
ro wac pa jor'aŋala gi joyet,
ruwaŋ jokwor paran gi joma jodakan.
Gime je otieko yimere kwoŋ wan,
makada nende wiy wan k'owil kodin,
kosa waturo cikirok perin gi wan.
Cuny wan fodi k'ocile kwoŋin,
kosa wakitangatanga i yo perin,
m'ituro wan i dier ogwaŋe madudi,
t'iumo wan gi mudho m'oasere.
Kabedi wiy wan wil gi nyingi Were mawan,
kosa wakway were makicar,
di Were k'oŋeyo gime?
Kole go oŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ ma cuny jo.
To obedo ro in, am'omiyo ineko wan i hongo je,
ikwano wan paka rombo m'ikidho thumo.
Ay malo! Ikir'ijwangi wan kicutho!
Raŋo ikano waŋin?
Raŋo wiyin wil gi litho g'adica mawan.
Kole wapodho piny ma waŋinyere,
wariere i fukefuke m'okengila wan.
Ay malo, biye kony wan!
Gony wan ro mar perin makiwire.
Wac maŋon opoŋ oy i cunyan,
k'acwogo wer me ri kere.
Paka kalam pa jandiko maber,
lewan oyikere gi wer me.
Iŋat'iŋon loyo kwoŋ cwo je,
okonji nema i dhokin,
Were miyin silwany noknok.
Koda abor perin i emin, kere ma jameni,
i dwoŋ perin gi dhum perin.
Gwec i meni perin i loyo,
ri gwoko adieri gi tiro!
Weyi cingin maracuc wofonjin tim ma kelo lworo.
Aserin perin jobith,
i cuny jokwor perin;
nonin jogore piny i tiendin.
Ker ma Were omiyin,
yindira cil gi cil,
luth perin ma dhum obedo luth ma tiro;
Riameno Were, Were perin otieko yerin,
aka omiyin kisangala maloyo,
m'omiyo kerin man.
Kanzin perin joŋwe kur ma gigipiny maŋwe kur.
Jower josangala in i muluwir m'okicin gi lak liec.
I dier mondongo perin, ama nyikin jonwaŋer'iye,
aka nyamicala ocungo i racuc ma kom ma dhum,
oruko thiwino m'otimi gi zahabu ma Ofir.
Winji, mweha pa kere, aka ciki ithin,
wiyin wowil gi ji perin gi peco pa benin,
aka kere bino mitin ro ŋono perin;
go obedo rwoth perin, winji go.
Ji ma Tire jolakelo rin mic,
joŋaŋo jolatemo rango wor perin.
Nyar kere nitie i muluwir pere gi law m'okwoy gi uzi ma zahabu,
Gi law pere m'oruwo rangi, ikwaŋo go bongi kere,
gi wadi go ma fodi jokuya cwo, jokwaŋ pere joluwo go.
Gi siemirok gi kisangala jobino,
aka jodonjo i muluwir pa kere.
In, kere paran, ilabedo gi wotin kweth
ma jolalunjo kwarere perin paka kerin,
aka ibino ketho jo jodhum ma piny gibe.
Wer paran lamiyo ŋeyirok perin wobedi cil gi cil,
aka kisi nyatoro bino pakin i luse je.
Were obedo kapondo mawan aka meni mawan,
kony mawan ma noknok i teko.
Riameno wakibino bedo gi lworo, makada nende piny owire,
makada nende gote joyengere i cuny nam;
makada nende nam ohola to mor,
to tendere jokirin gi koko mere.
Nitie malawa ma kelo siem i tindi madwoŋ pa Were,
i ot maleŋ pa Were madwoŋ loyo.
Were nitie i tindi madwoŋ no, aka k'oyengere;
Were bino konyo go i ŋamba.
Nonin jobwok, kerin joyengere;
Were mor, aka piny leny.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny nigi wan,
Were pa Yakobo obedo kapondo mawan.
Biye, neni win tic pa Rwoth,
neni gidhier ma go otimo i piny.
Go kweyo lweny i piny gibe,
turo asere, aka ŋinyo abor,
to waŋo cawilin gi mac
Go waco ni, “Liŋ, aka iŋey ni abedo Were,
adwoŋ i dier nonin,
adwoŋ i piny gibe.”
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny nigi wan,
Were pa Yakobo obedo kapondo mawan.
Goy win adhoŋ, nonin je,
Pak win Were gi wer ma winjere malo.
Kole Rwoth, Were madwoŋ loyo iripo lworo;
kere madwoŋ kwoŋ piny gibe.
Go oketho ji i tiendi wan,
to miyo wan dhumo nonin.
Go oyero riwan lowo ma wabed'iye,
noro pa Yakobo ma go omaro.
Were otieko kadho malo i kom pere ma dhum.
Nitie koko ma siem gi dwondi gwara,
kareno Rwoth kadho malo.
Wer pak ri Were, wer pak!
Wer pak ri kere mawan, wer pak!
Kole Were obedo kere ma piny gibe,
pak go gi wer.
Were dhumo nonin;
Were bedo i kom pere ma dhum maleŋ.
Jodhum ma nonin jocokere
paka ji pa Were pa Abraham.
Kole kwote ma piny obedo apa Were;
go obedo jadhum madwoŋ loyo.
Rwoth dwoŋ aka iripo pako go malo swa,
i tindi madwoŋ pa Were,
got pere maleŋ.
Zayon, oŋawere maŋon, obedo kisangala pa piny gibe,
tindi madwoŋ pa kere madwoŋ.
Were onyutho ni go obedo kapondo matek.
Kole neni, kerin jocokere,
jobino monjo got Zayon.
Tekin joneno, jodhier;
jobedo gi lworo to joringo.
Jokirin kenyo,
paka dhako macegin nywol,
paka mel ma witere i koyo mager.
Paka watieko winjo, bende watieko neno
i tindi madwoŋ pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
i tindi madwoŋ pa Were mawan,
ma Were kwonga cil gi cil.
Watieko paro kwoŋ mar perin makiwire, Awi Were,
i ot perin.
Paka nyingin nitie, Awi Were,
apaka ipakin tundo i gike piny.
In idhumo gi tiro.
Weyi ji ma Zayon jowosangala,
weyi ji ma Yuda jowosangala,
kwoŋbedo ithumo banja gi tiro.
Ji pa Were, woth withok Zayon,
wikwan acurcur mere.
Winen kor ot mere aka wikaŋasa kapondo mere,
ŋey wiwaci ri luse ma luwo,
ni me Were,
Were mawan cil gi cil
Go latelo wan cil gi cil.
Winji gime, kisi nyatoro!
Ciki ithi win, nonin kisi kamoro,
madongo gi mathindho je,
jocandi gi joŋaŋo kanyacel!
Dhokan laluwo rieko;
paro ma cunyan labedo niaŋ.
Alaciko ithan ri ageca,
alatito sikoiyiko me k'atuko tongol paran.
Raŋo abedi malwor i hongo ma teko,
ka jokwor paran jothokan,
ji ma jogeno lim pajo,
aka jonor gi ŋaŋo pajo madit.
Adieri ongoye ŋata nyalo nyewo kwo pere,
kosa culo Were welo ma kwo pere.
Kole welo ma kwo pere dwoŋ swa,
aka ongoye gima romo culo,
ŋey go wokwo cil gi cil,
aka wokiri wotho.
Ey, go laneno ni kiri ji mariek bende jotho,
jomamiŋ gi joniaŋ manok je jotho,
aka joweyo lim pajo ri joman.
Kaliel pajo bedo pecin pajo cil gi cil,
kabedo pajo i luse je,
makada nende oyido jonitie gi lowo pajo wegi.
Dwoŋ pa nyatoro kibothi go tho,
go fodi latho paka ogwaŋe.
Me gike pa ji ma wegi jogenere,
gike pa ji ma joyeŋ gi lim pajo.
Jolarere paka rombo,
Tho labedo jakwath pajo.
Ji ma jotimo gim'otire jobino loyo jo,
ka delkwoŋ gin top piyo,
piny pa jom'otho labedo pecin pajo.
To Were labotho adundo paran kwoŋ meni pa tho,
kole go lajolan.
Ikir'ibwoki ka nyatoro oŋaŋ,
ka lim pere olokere madwoŋ;
kole ka go otho,
ongoye gima go latiŋo,
kilakadho gi lim pere.
Makada nende, munyo go kwo, okwanere gi kisangala,
aka makada nende dhano limo pak ro lim pere,
go lakadho i luse pa kwarere pere
ma jok'oneni lero kendo.
Dwoŋ pa nyatoro kibothi go tho
go fodi latho paka ogwaŋe.
Were ma jameni je, Were obedo Rwoth,
luwo aka lwoŋo piny gibe,
wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ.
Wok i Zayon maŋon,
Were pilin.
Were mawan bino, go kiliŋ,
mac m'odheth nitie ruwaŋe,
asur mager othoko go.
Go lwoŋo polo,
gi piny, ŋey wothum ri ji banja.
Go waco ni, “Coki ran ji paran ma jotimo adieri,
ma jotimo kodan cikirok gi cowirok!”
Polo waco ni Were timo gi tiro,
kole Were won obedo jathum banja.
“Winji win, a ji paran, aka alaluwo
A Isiraili, abino miyo mijulisi kwoŋin,
An abedo Were, Were perin.”
Akipusa in ro cowirok perin,
mic awaŋa perin nitie ruwaŋan noknok.
Kucel akilajolo thwon wok i ot perin,
kosa wod diel wok i sidwol perin.
Kole kisi ogwaŋ ma lul obedo aparan,
gi dhok ma wi tendere ganin.
Aŋeyo winyin ma koyo je,
gi gigipiny makwo je i dudi.
“Kabedi kec oyido nekan, dinyo ikiwaco riwin,
kole piny gi gima nitie iye je obedo aparan.
Acamo riŋo thwondhe,
kosa amadho remo diegi?
Miy Were cowirok ma foyo,
aka cul Were madwoŋ loyo gim'iciko go je.
Lwoŋan i hongo ma teko;
alabothin,
aka ilapakan.”
To ri jakidakana Were waco ni,
“Dwoŋ aŋo m'initie gine ma tuco or paran,
kosa luwo kwoŋ cikirok paran?”
Kole ikweran tirin,
aka ibolo wac paran yuŋeyin.
K'ineno jakwo, imako gine mere,
aka imakere gi jocot.
“Ituco reco gi dhokin,
aka lewin yot cweyo twodo.”
Ibedo t'iwaco nyingi omin in,
icwoko dhok wod pa yokin won.
Gime itieko timo aka oyido aliŋaliŋa;
oyido iparo ni acalo kodin.
T'onyo pama apusa in,
aka athango rin banja perin.
“Maki gime, in ma wiyin wil gi Were,
kosa alareyin,
aka ongoye ŋata bino bongin.
Ŋata kelo foyo pere paka cowirok pere miyan dwoŋ;
ri ŋata wotho i yo m'otire,
alanyutho go both pa Were!”
Maki wor kodan, Awi Were,
cungo kwoŋ mar perin makiwire,
cungo kwoŋ wor perin m'oasere,
cidi woko reco paran.
aka lonyan kwoŋ reco paran!
Kole aŋeyo komo paran,
aka reco paran nitie ruwaŋan noknok.
Kwoŋin, in kende, ama atimo reco,
aka atimo gimarac ruwaŋin.
Ameno itire thumo ran banja,
aka ingoye g'apuse ma thumo ran banja.
Neni, abedo jareco wok i nywolirok paran,
jareco munyo mama ogaman i iye.
riameno fonjan rieko i pal cunyan.
Cidi woko reco paran, aka alalony;
lwokan, aka alabedo matar loyo pe.
Poŋan gi yodirok i kisangala,
aka makada nende itieko ŋinyan t'ituran,
alakisangala kendo.
Ikir'inen reco paran,
ywey woko raco paran.
Miyan adundo macil, Awi Were,
aka kethi cuny manyen, m'otire i an.
Ikir'irieman woko ruwaŋin,
ikir'imayan cuny maleŋ perin.
Dwoki ran kisangala ma both perin kendo,
aka miyan adundo ma tur.
Kenyo alafonjo joreco or perin,
aka jolagik bongin.
Koy kwo paran, Awi Were, aka bothan,
aka alawero malo both perin.
Yaw dhokan, Awi Rwoth,
ŋey awer pak rin.
Kole ikiyodere i cowirok,
kosa dinyo amiyin;
ikisangala gi mic awaŋa.
Cowirok ma sangala Rwoth, obedo cuny ma tur,
cuny m'otur aka mamwol, Awi Were, ikicay.
Awi Were, maki wor gi Zayon, aka kony go;
geti kendo kor ot ma Yerusalem.
Nyaka ilakisangala gi cowirok m'otire,
gi mic awaŋa gi mic ma gikululu,
kenyo ilamiyin rwath i wi migam perin.
Raŋo inor, a jal ma jameni, ri raco perin?
Adieri pa Were bedo cil gi cil.
lewin cal kamweso mabith.
Tic perin twodo.
Imaro raco loyo bero,
twodo loyo luwo adieri.
Imaro ramo cuny ji,
in jatwodo!
To Were lakisika in kicutho,
go lagwarin to yecin wok i wema perin,
go lafudhin wok i piny pa ji makwo.
Joma jotimo gim'otire jolaneno, to lworo mako jo,
aka jolanyerin, ka jowaco ni,
“Neni jal m'okwero Were bedo kapondo pere,
to geno ŋaŋo pere madwoŋ,
opondo i lim pere!”
To acalo yath oliv,
madongo i Ot pa Were,
ageno mar pere makiwire cil gi cil.
Abino foyin noknok, ro gim'itieko timo;
alapako nyingin kwoŋbedo ber,
ruwaŋ ji perin.
“Were ongoye.”
Jombaka aka jotimo gimienirok,
ongoye ŋata timo gimaber.
Were ŋiyo piny wok i polo,
kwoŋ wot cwo,
neno ka nitie moro ma joriek,
ma jorango Were.
Joje jotieko podho woko,
joje jorac parom;
ongoye kwoŋ jo ŋata timo gimaber,
be, ongoye kad'acel.
Joma jotimo raco jongoye gi niaŋ,
jocamo ji paran paŋini jocamo mugat,
aka jokikway Were.
Jonitie i teko madwoŋ,
ma fodi k'obino wok cene.
Were lakedho cokin pa ji ma bu Were,
wickwot lamako jo,
kole Were ojwango jo.
Aka bedi gonyirok pa Isiraili wok i Zayon!
Ka Were dwoko silwany pa ji pere,
Yakobo lasiemere aka Isiraili lakisangala.
Bothan, Awi Were, gi nyingin,
gonyan gi meni perin!
ciki ithin iwinji wac ma wok i dhokan.
Cwo ma jocay joay monjan,
cwo mager jorango kwo paran,
cwo ma jokidew kwoŋ Were.
Neni, Were obedo jakony paran.
Rwoth ama gwoko kwo paran.
Go lamiyo jo gir'acula gi raco pajo wegi,
Go lareyo woko jo kwoŋbedo go timo adieri.
Abino miyin cowirok gi kisangala, Awi Rwoth.
Abino foyo nyingin, Awi Rwoth,
kwoŋbedo obedo gimaber.
Kole ibothan kwoŋ teko je,
aka waŋan otieko neno kikengila pa jokwor paran.
Ciki ithin ri kwayo paran, Awi Were
ikir'iwir dieŋeyin ri ywak paran!
Dew kwoŋan aka dwokan;
teko paran olacan,
anitie i teko.
Abwok ri atise pa jokwor paran,
aŋinyere g'adica pa jokidakana.
Jokelo teko kwoŋan;
jomako nge kodan aka jotimo ran kwor.
Cunyan rembo,
aka lworo ma tho ŋinyan.
Lworo gi kirin opoŋ kwoŋan;
apoŋ gi bwok.
Kabedi oyido anitie gi bwomban paka akuro,
dinyo ay gi bwomban t'anwaŋo kaywomirok.
Adieri dinyo akadho kamabor swa,
t'ageto peco paran i thim.
Dinyo aredo nwaŋo kabwok paran
kwoŋ koyo mager g'asur pi.
Nywow luwo pa jokwor paran, Awi Rwoth!
Aneno akaka gi gorok i tindi madwoŋ,
thoko kore odieceŋ gi wor,
opoŋ'iye neki gi teko.
Rerok nitie kisi kamoro;
royo opoŋ adica gi banirok.
Kabedi nende jakwor ama ŋalan,
dinyo anyalo ciro;
kabedi nende ŋata piemo kodan ama dele ran,
dinyo apondo rigo.
To obedo in, jawodhan,
nyawotan aka mere paran m'aŋeyo.
Oyido wanitie gi luwo ma nyadhano gi dhano
aka walamo kanyacel i Ot pa Were.
Weyi jokwor paran jowotho mafodi ndelo pajo;
weyi jowokadhi piny i piny pa jom'otho ma fodi jokwo!
Reco opoŋ pecin pajo gi i cuny gin.
To alwoŋo Rwoth Were ri kony,
aka go labothan.
Odikin, odieceŋ gi wor
kigeŋisa gi ywak paran kadho malo bonge,
aka go lawinjo dwondan.
Go ladwokan maber,
wok i lweny m'alwenyo,
kwoŋ jokwor paran madit.
Were, m'odhumo wok cango,
lawinjan to kengila jo;
kole jokwero wirok,
aka jokilwor go.
Nyawotan omonjo merin pere,
oturo cikirok pere.
Luwo pere oyido foth loyo mo dhiaŋ,
to dakirok oyido opoŋ i cunye;
Wac pere oyido yom paka mo,
to adieri oyido yaŋo cuny jo paka abor mabith.
Weyi teko perin ri Were,
aka go lagwokin;
go kiwey wokengila joma jotimo gim'otire.
To in, Were, ilabolo jonek no gi jotwodo no i kaliel pajo,
mafodi adec kwo pajo k'orumo.
Paka ri an, alaketho geno paran i Rwoth.
Tim ran ŋono, Awi Were,
rupiri omonjan;
jokwor paran jolwenyo kodan hongo je.
Odieceŋ gipi jokwor paran jomonjan,
kole nitie ji mathoth ma jolwenyo kodan gi delok.
Ka abwok, Awi Rwoth ma jameni je,
aketho geno paran i in.
Ageno i Were, akibwok,
apako go ro gima go otieko ciko.
Dhano adhana bende nyalo timo ran aŋo?
Odieceŋ gipi jokwor paran jorango timo ran teko,
hongo je jotimo can ma miyan litho.
Jocokere kanyacel kam'opondo,
joneno kisi gim'atimo
ka jogeno nekan.
Miy jo gir'acula, Awi Were,
kengila jo gi keme perin.
Iŋeyo paka acandere;
itieko kano pigi waŋan,
k'ondikere i kitawo perin?
I ndelo m'anolwoŋin,
ilariemo woko jokwor paran,
gime aŋeyo, ni Were nitie i thenge paran.
I Were, m'apako wac pere,
i Rwoth, m'apako wac pere.
Ageno i go, aka lworo k'omakan.
Dhano adhana bende nyalo timo ran aŋo?
Awi Were, alatimo gim'atieko ciko,
Alamiyin mic paran ma foyo.
Kole itieko bothan kwoŋ tho,
ey, igwokan podho,
ŋey anyal wotho ruwaŋ Were,
i lero ma kwo.
kwoŋbedo i in cunyan nwaŋo kapondo;
alapondo i tipo ma bwombin,
cuka asur ma rerok orum.
Aywak ri Were ma jamalo swa,
ri Were ma ketho i kare atoŋa pere je ran.
Go ladwokan wok i polo to bothan;
go lakikengila ji ma diyan.
Were lanyuthan mar pere makiwire g'adieri pere.
Jokwor paran jothokan,
jocale simbwore ma kec neko jo ri riŋo dhano.
Lak jo cale tonge g'aserin;
lew jo cale abore mabith.
Nyuthi dwoŋ perin i pondeponde, Awi Were,
weyi dwoŋ perin wobedi i piny paka rom.
Jokwor paran joyaro bwo ma makan;
kidamba omayan meni.
Jokunyo bur i royo paran,
to wegi jopodh'iye.
adundo paran oridhere,
alawero t'apakin!
Alacew gi tongol gi milowe paran,
alacewo keko.
Alafoyin, Awi Rwoth i dier ji,
alapakin i dier nonin.
Mar perin makiwire dwoŋ kiri i polo;
adieri perin tundo i pondeponde.
Lim dwoŋ Awi Were i polo,
weyi dwoŋ perin wobedi i piny gibe.
Adieri win rwodhe, wiyere i gim'otire?
Withumo banja ri ji gi tiro?
Be, iy'adundin mewin wiparo kwoŋ reco ma winyalo timo,
to witimo tim mar'akaka i piny.
Jokidakana jomienere gi iy megi jo,
jotimo gi komo wok i nywolirok, joluwo twodo.
Jonitie gi kwir ma cal apa thwol,
paka malasaŋ ma culo ithe,
ma kinyal winjo dwondi ji ma jotega jo,
kosa wer pa ŋata timo gidhier.
Awi Were, tur lak jo i dhok jo,
tur woko lak simbwore no mathindho thindho, Awi Were!
Weyi jowoleny paka pi ma mol;
paka lum, weyi wonyon jo to joner.
Weyi jowocal gi othiololo maleny i ode;
weyi jowobedi pa nyathi m'onywol m'otho ma kinen waŋceŋ.
Mafodi jokuya, i ŋolo jo pa doy;
i keme pere, Were lakudho jo woko kafodi jokwo.
Joma timo gim'otire jolakisangala ka joneno imiyo joreco gir'acula;
jolalwoko tiendi jo i remo pa jokidakana.
Ji jolawaco ni, “Adieri nitie kemba pa joma timo gim'otire;
adieri nitie Were ma thumo banja ri piny”.
kwonga an kwoŋ jono ma jomonjan!
Gonyan kwoŋ jono ma jotimo reco,
aka ibothan kwoŋ jonek no!
Kole neni, jokuro nekan,
jogwayo jocokere kwoŋan,
ki kwoŋbedo ni atimo reco kosa komo paran m'atieko timo,
kosa ni atimo banja ma jokwakere i kabedo pajo.
Ay, biye konyan, aka inen!
In Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, ibedo Were pa Isiraili.
Cew t'imiyo nonin je gir'acula;
ikir'iwey kad'acel kwoŋ jobanirok ma jotimo can marac.
Kisi othieno jodwoko,
joŋur paka gwokere,
ka jowotho i tindi madwoŋ.
Winji yet g'atise pajo.
Lew jo cal abore i dhok jo,
kucel joparo ni ongoye ŋata winjo jo.
To inyero jo, Awi Rwoth,
iŋalo nonin je ma jokuya Were.
Ibedo meni paran, alapakin;
kole in, Awi Were, ibedo kapondo paran.
Were paran, laromo kodan i mar pere makiwire,
Were paran lamiyan anen kikengila pa jokwor paran.
Ikir'ineki jo, Awi Were, kosa ji paran wiy jo nyalo wil;
kedhi jo woko gi meni perin aka ikengila jo,
Awi Rwoth, kwot mawan!
Ro reco ma dhok jo, wac ma dhok jo,
weyi jowomoki i delok pajo.
Ro lamirok gi twodo ma joluwo,
reyi jo i keme perin,
reyi jo kicutho.
Nyaka ji jowoŋey ni Were dhumo Isiraili,
i kisi thenge ma piny.
Kisi othieno jokwor paran jodwoko,
joŋur pa gwokere,
ka jowotho i tindi madwoŋ.
Jolera ri cemo,
jogwe ka jok'oyeŋ.
To alawero ro meni perin,
kisi odikin alawero malo ri mar perin makiwire.
Kole iŋat'ibedo kapondo paran,
gi ka ŋwec paran i hongo ma kidamba paran.
Ibedo meni paran, alawero pak rin,
kole in, Awi Were, iŋat'ibedo kapondo paran,
Were ma nyuthan mar makiwire.
Awi Were, itieko kwero wan, t'ikengila wan;
itieko mako nge gi wan, to pama wire bongi wan.
onyo pama cangi adholin mere, rupiri jokedhere.
Itieko miyo ji perin candirok madwoŋ;
itieko miyo wan madho vini m'omiyo watangatanga paka jomero.
Itieko gwoko jono ma jolworin, ŋey jowobothi rerok.
Both wan gi meni perin, aka idwoki kwayo mawan,
ŋey ji m'imaro jowonyal both.
Were otieko luwo gi i Kabedo Maleŋ pere:
“Gi loyo alapoko Sekem t'apoko milelo ma Sukoth ri ji paran.
Giliad gi Manase jobedo aparan,
Efrayim obedo junga ma aumo gine wiyan;
Yuda obedo luth paran ma dhum.
Mowab obedo kalaya paran ma lwoki,
alabolo war paran kwoŋ Edom,
paka ranyuth ni aŋat'abedo won mere.
Kwoŋ Filistia, akoko i loyo lweny.”
Ŋa, Awi Were, m'oteran i tindi madwoŋ m'ogoy'iye cel?
Ŋa m'otelan tundo Edom?
Itieko kwero wan adieri, Awi Were?
Ikikidhi ŋanjo Awi Were, gi jolweny mawan?
Apa miy wan kony kwoŋ jokwor,
kole kony pa dhano sisiri.
Gi Were i thenge mawan walatimo gi maker;
go lakikengila jokwor mawan.
Winji ywak paran, Awi Were,
winji kwayo paran;
wok i gike ma piny alwoŋin,
kacunyan podho.
Telan i tele mabor loyan;
kole iŋat'ibedo kapondo paran,
kisul matek kwoŋ jokwor.
Weyi abedi i wema perin cil gi cil,
anwaŋ kabedo ma bu teko i bwombin!
Kole in, Awi Were, itieko winjo cikirok paran,
itieko miyan gir'alunja pa ji ma jolworo nyingin.
Weyi kere woyindira;
weyi oro pere wociri luse je!
Weyi go wodhum cil gi cil ruwaŋ Were;
kur go gi mar perin makiwire gi genirok perin.
Ameno alawero pak ri nyingin noknok,
paka aculo cikirok paran kisi ndelo.
Kole akuro Were moth wobothan;
both paran wok bonge.
Go kende a tele paran aka both paran,
kapondo paran, ak'oyengere.
Kiri keraŋo ma wilamonjo dhano,
ma yeco go, go ma kitek loyo cel m'otur piny?
Joparo nyaka rwadho go piny wok i kabedo pere madwoŋ.
Josiemere i twodo,
jomiyo silwany gi dhok gin,
to jolamere i cuny jo.
Kole Were kende ama cunyan kuro nyaliŋliŋ,
kole geno paran wok bonge.
Go kende a tele paran aka both paran,
kapondo paran, ak'oyengere.
Both gi dwoŋ paran cungo kwoŋ Were;
tele paran matek,
i Were a kapondo paran.
Geni Were hongo je, ji paran,
oy adundo perin ruwaŋe,
Were obedo k'apondo mawan.
Ji jocale luya ma ywe;
jomadongo gi jomathindho je jongoye kony.
Kethi jo i rapim, jok'oyway kilo;
josew loyo luya ma ywe.
Ikir'ikethi geno iy'akaka,
ikir'ikethi geno m'ongoye i kwo;
ka ŋaŋo omedere, ikir'ikethi cunyin kwoŋe.
Maloyo dicel atieko winjo Were waco ni,
meni obedo apere,
aka ni mar makiwire obedo apa Rwoth.
In won gipi, Awi Rwoth,
imiyo dhano kemba cungo kwoŋ tim pere.
Kwo paran gipi gomba in;
paka kam'othwo, m'olacere, m'ongoye pi,
riyo neko cunyan rin.
Ameno atieko rango nenin i Kabedo Maleŋ,
weyi anen meni gi dwoŋ perin.
Kole mar perin makiwire loyo kwo,
dhokan lapakin.
Alafoyin kafodi akwo;
alatiŋo cingan malo t'alwoŋo nyingin.
Adundo paran lacemo to yeŋ,
aka dhokan lapakin gi wer mamit.
K'ariere i kanindo paran, apoyin;
wor gipi aparo kwoŋin,
rupiri noknok itieko bedo jakony paran.
I tipo ma bwombin awero gi kisangala.
Acwire kwoŋin,
aka cingin maracuc thielan.
To ri jono ma jorango reyo kwo paran,
jobino kadho i piny pa jom'otho.
Ibino neko jo i lweny,
t'arara camo delkwoŋ jo.
To kere lafore i Were;
jono ma jotimo cikirok i nyingi Were jolapako go,
to dhok jotwodo lamiyere.
Winji dwondan, Awi Were, i kigeŋisa paran;
kur kwo paran i lworo m'omakan ro jokwor paran.
Panan kwoŋ nyaliŋliŋ m'aracama tiendi pa jokidakana,
kwoŋ can pa joreco.
Jopako lew gin paka abore,
to joyiko wac mager paka aserin,
jobayo wok i kapondo kwoŋ ji ma bu reco,
jobayo kwoŋ jo abwap kendo ma bu lworo.
Jonitie g'atoŋa ma timo reco;
joluwo ciko bwo nyaliŋliŋ,
ka joparo ni, “Ŋa manyalo neno wan?
Ŋa m'odwar tiendi banjin mawan?
Watieko paro kwoŋ acama tiendi ma rieko!
Kole paro g'adundo pa dhano kiniaŋere!”
To Were labayo asere pere kwoŋ jo;
ilamiyo jo litho abwap.
Ro lew jo, Were lareyo woko jo;
jono je ma joneni jolayengo wiy gin.
Nyaka to ji jobedo gi lworo;
jolaparo kwoŋ gima Were otieko timo,
to joluwo kwoŋ tim pere.
Weyi ji ma jotimo gim'otire jowofore i Rwoth,
to jonwaŋo kapondo i go;
weyi ji ma cuny gin olony jomiy go dwoŋ.
Awi Were, obedo gim'otire riwan pakin i Zayon
to wakuro cikirok mawan rin,
A in m'iwinjo kwayo!
Ji je jolabino bongin,
ro reco pajo.
Reco mawan okengila wan,
to icwako wan.
Josilwany a jono m'iyero,
ji m'ikelo bedo i kabedo perin maleŋ.
Wabino yeŋ gi gigipiny mabeyo ma ot perin,
silwany ma Ot pa Were maleŋ.
Gi tim ma kelo lworo idwoko wan, t'ibotho wan,
Awi Were jaboth mawan.
Ibedo geno pa gike je ma piny,
gi thoko nam ma jonitie bor loyo.
In ma gi meni perin icweyo gote,
ma nyutho meni perin madwoŋ.
Iŋat'ikweyo mor ma nam,
mor mar'asur pajo,
gi gwenyirok pa ji.
Ji jobedo i bwok,
ro gigipiny madongo m'itieko timo.
Tim perin miyo,
koko ma kisangala winjere wok thengi piny me tundo i meca.
Iwendo ri piny t'idhiro koth,
iloko go m'oŋaŋ, ma diwa;
malawa pa Were opoŋ gi pi,
iŋat'ipoko jo cemo,
me obedo yiko perin.
Idhiro koth mathoth i ndelin m'ofur
t'ibilo jo gi pi
iyomo lowo gi nyidho
aka imiyo gim'ofur twi.
Bero perin miyo keco m'owega;
kisi kama ikadh'iye nitie mathoth.
Kakwath opoŋ gi mwendi,
tendere jopoŋ gi kisangala.
Mwendi jopoŋ i sa,
ŋano opoŋ i milelin,
jokoko aka jowero kanyacel ri kisangala.
Pak win Rwoth gi koko ma kisangala, piny gibe;
Wer win dwoŋ ma nyinge;
miy win go pak madwoŋ.
Waci ri Were ni, “Nga tim perin obedo ma gir'aura!
Ro meni perin madwoŋ,
jokwor perin joriewere piny gi lworo ruwaŋin.
Piny gibe lamin;
jowero wer ma pak rin,
jopako nyingin gi wer.”
Biye aka inen gima Were otieko timo,
tim pere ma gir'aura i dier ji.
kwarere mawan joluwo i malawa atiendi.
Wafore gi go kenyo.
Go dhumo gi meni cil gi cil,
go ma waŋe neno nonin je,
weyi jopiem jokiri jowotiŋere malo.
Pak win Were mawan, nonin je;
weyi derino ma pak mewin wowinjere;
Go otieko kuro kwo mawan,
aka k'oyeyo wapodho.
Kole in, Awi Rwoth, itieko temo wan;
Itieko temo wan paka feza m'itemo gi mac.
Itieko ciko wan i bwo;
t'ijengo bieto i dieŋey wan.
Iweyo jokwor mawan jonyono wan;
waluwo i mac gi pi;
to kucel pama onyo itieko kelo wan i lowo malac.
Alabino i ot perin gi mic awaŋa;
alamiyin gim'atieko ciko.
Alamiyin gima dhokan otuco
to ciko munyo anitie i teko.
Alamiyin mic awaŋa ma nyithindhi rombo ma cwe,
gi yiro ma cowirok ma rombo;
alamiyo mic ma thwondhe gi diegi.
Wijoje ma wilworo Were, biye wiwinji,
aka alawaco gima go otieko timo ran.
Aywak rigo,
to siemere gi lewan.
Bedi oyido ater reco pa gimadwoŋ i cunyan,
di Rwoth k'onyalo winjan.
To adieri Were otieko winjan;
otieko winjo kwayo paran.
Pak wobedi ri Were,
rupiri go k'okwero kwayo paran,
kosa k'omonan mar pere makiwire.
Weyi Were wotim gi wan ŋono to miyo wan silwany;
to neno wan gi wor,
ŋey piny gibe wonyali ŋeyo gim'imito;
ŋey nonin je jowonyal ŋeyo both perin.
Weyi ji jowopakin, Awi Were;
Weyi ji je jowopakin!
Weyi nonin jowosangala to jowero ro kisangala,
kole in i thumo ri ji banja gi tiro
t'ileko nonin ma piny.
Weyi ji jowopakin, Awi Were;
Weyi ji je jowopakin!
Lowo otieko nyak cemo mere;
Were, Were mawan, otieko miyo wan silwany.
Were otieko miyo wan silwany;
weyi gike piny je jowolwor go.
Weyi Were woay malo, weyi jokwor pere jowokedhere;
weyi jono ma jodak go joworingi ruwaŋe.
Paka yiro duny woko, apaka bende gwey jo woko;
paka odok leny i mac
apaka jokidakana josika ruwaŋ Were.
To weyi joma timo gim'otire jowosangala, weyi jowoyodere ruwaŋ Were;
weyi jokoki gi kisangala!
Wer ri Were, wer pak ri nyinge;
yik royo ri ŋata gweco i pondeponde
nyingi go obedo Rwoth, yodere
ruwaŋe.
Were, ma bedo i ot pere maleŋ,
kwonga nyithindho kic aka kuro mon tho.
Were miyo joma gayagaya peco ma jobed'iye;
to wodho jom'otwey woko i thwolo i kisangala,
to jopiem jolabedo i piny m'ojwangi.
Awi Were, munyo itelo ji perin,
munyo iŋanjo i thim,
piny oyengere, to polo konjo piny koth ruwaŋ Were.
Sinai okirin ruwaŋ Were,
Were pa Joisiraili.
t'idwoko alunja perin m'oyido tangatanga;
Mwendi perin jonwaŋo kabedo kenyo;
i bero perin, Awi Were, ipidho jocandi.
Rwoth wodho or;
to mon kweth jotiŋo wac maber:
“Kerin gi jolweny pajo joringo!”
Mon ma jodoŋ peco jopoko gim'onyaga.
Kiri jono ma jodoŋ peco kuro rombo,
onyo pama joumere gi feza gi zahabu,
paka bwombi akurin ma jopilin.
Munyo jameni je okedho woko kerin kenyo,
pe ooy kwoŋ Zalmon.
A got ma jameni, got ma Basan;
a got ma jatunge kweth, got ma Basan!
Raŋo ineno gi nyeko, a got ma jatunge kweth,
got ma Were ogomba bed'iye,
kama Rwoth labed'iye, cil gi cil?
Gi cawila ma meni, ma gana apar dirio,
gana gi gana,
Rwoth obino wok Sinai i Kabedo Maleŋ.
Iyidho got mabor,
itelo jom'omak i gar perin,
t'ijolo mic kwoŋ ji,
kiri kwoŋ ji perin ŋey Rwoth Were wonyali bedo kenyo.
ma tiŋo wan malo kisi ndelo;
Were obedo both mawan.
Were mawan obedo Were ma both,
aka go obedo Were, Rwoth ma botho wan kwoŋ tho.
To Rwoth laŋidho wic jokwor pere,
sangaria ma yer pa jono ma jomena woth i yo mareco.
Rwoth owaco ni,
“Aladwoko jo wok Basan,
aladwoko jo wok i pendi nam,
ŋey winyal lwoko tiendi win i remo,
ŋey lew gwokere mewin jowonyal limo adec pajo wok kwoŋ jakwor”.
Awi Were, woth perin ma leŋo nenere gi je
woth perin, Kere paran k'idonjo i Kabedo Maleŋ.
Jower jowero ruwaŋe, jokudho gwara yucen,
i dier jo nyir ma nyaka joay jogoyo sasi.
“Pak Were i kacokirok madwoŋ!
Pak win Rwoth, win nyikway Yakobo.”
Eno Benyamin, mathin loyo joje, am'otelo,
jodhum pa Yuda i kweth pajo,
wot kerin pa Zebulun, jodhum pa Nafital.
Nyuthi meni perin, Awi Were;
nyuthi cwinyo perin, Awi Were,
paka oyido itieko timo riwan con.
Ro ot perin i Yerusalem
kerin jotiŋo rin mic.
Bwok Misir, ogwaŋ manitie i kede no,
bwok nonin, sidwol thwondhe no ma jonigi roci pajo,
cuka joje jokule piny to jomiyin feza.
Kedhi jono ma jomaro lweny!
Ge ma welo wokel wok i Misir,
weyi Ethopiya wokwakere yaro cinge ri Were.
Wer win ri Were, win kerin ma piny;
wer win pak ri Rwoth,
rigo ma gweco i polo,
polo macon,
winji win, go dhiro dwonde, dwonde manitie gi meni.
Tuci meni pa Were,
go ma meni pere ma dhum othoko Isiraili;
aka meni pere nitie i pondeponde.
Were kelo bwok i kabedo pere maleŋ,
Were pa Isiraili,
go miyo meni gi cwinyo ri ji pere.
Pak Were!
Bothan, Awi Were,
kole pi otundo kiri i ŋutan.
Amunyere i cwodho,
kam'ongoye lowo m'oridhere;
adonjo i pi maluth,
aka mikula ouman.
Alacere gi ywak paran;
aka dwondan raman.
Waŋan ocore,
gi kuro Were paran.
jothoth kalo ye wiyan,
jomathoth jomito reyan,
jomonjan gi misegey.
Onyo gima an akikwalo,
am'anoculi?
Awi Were, iŋeyo reco paran;
gimarac m'atieko timo k'opanere ruwaŋin.
Weyi jono ma joketho geno i in jokiri jowosewere ro an,
Awi Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny.
Weyi jono ma jorangin jokiri jowobedi i wickwot ro an,
Awi Were pa Isiraili.
Kole obedo ro in m'omiyo iyetan,
wickwot no oumo waŋan.
Alokere ri wutmera jakicar,
japath ri wot mama.
aka yet m'iyetin podho kwoŋan.
K'amwolo adundo paran gi riyo kec,
joyetan timo ameno.
K'aloko kutiya ruk paran,
alokere gir'awaca pajo.
Abedo gir'awaca pa jono ma jobedo i waŋkac,
aka jomero jocwogo wer kwoŋan.
To ri an, kwayo paran rin, Awi Rwoth,
i hongo ma ripo, Awi Were,
i mar perin makiwire m'oasere dwokan.
Gi kony perin ma genere
bothan akir'amunyere i cwodho;
gwokan kwoŋ jokwor paran,
gi pi maluth.
Weyi mikula wokiri wouman,
kosa akir'amunyere i pendi pi,
kosa bur wouman.
Dwokan, Awi Rwoth, kole mar perin makiwire ber;
gi ŋono perin madwoŋ, wire ran.
Ikir'ipan waŋin ri ŋeca perin;
kole anitie i kidamba, kwakere dwokan.
Core cegin kodan, bothan,
gonyan kwoŋ jokwor paran.
Iŋeyo yet paran,
wickwot paran gi paka ibwonan;
jokwor paran je iŋeyo.
Yet otieko turo adundo paran,
aka onyo angoye gi geno.
Adwaro wor, t'akinwaŋo;
kodi jom'odiy cunyan t'akinwaŋo moro.
Jomiyan kwir ma neki ni cemo,
aka ri riyo pi paran, jomiyan vini mawac amadha.
weyi kalima pajo ma cowirok wolokere gi ciko.
aka pier jo wokirin hongo je.
Konji woko keme perin kwoŋ jo,
aka nge perin maliel paka mac wolaci jo.
Weyi kambi pajo wobedi kam'ojwangere,
aka wongoye ŋata wobedi i wemin pajo.
aka ŋat'itieko miyo litho jomedo cando.
Medi rijo candirok i wi candirok;
ikir'iboth jo.
Weyi nyingi jo worey woko i kitawo pa ji makwo;
weyi wokiri wondiki nyingi jo kanyacel gi ji maber.
weyi both perin, Awi Were, wokwonga an.
Alapako nyingi Were gi wer;
alatuco dwoŋ pere gi foyo.
Me lakisangala Rwoth loyo cowirok ma mirikwa kosa thwon,
manitie gi tunge gi par tiende.
Weyi jom'odiy jowoneni to josangala;
win ma wirango Rwoth, weyi cuny win wodwoki.
Kole Rwoth winjo jocandi,
aka wiye kiwil gi ji pere ma jonitie i twec.
Weyi polo gi piny wopak go,
nam gi kisi gimoro ma jowothi'ye.
Kole Were labotho Zayon
to gero kendo tindin madongo ma Yuda,
to ŋecin pere jobedo kenyo to joloko apajo.
Nyithindho pa ŋecin pere jolalunjo,
aka jono ma jomaro nyingi go jolabed'iye.
Sangala bothan, Awi Were!
Awi Rwoth, kwakere konyan!
Weyi wokethi jono i wickwot gi nywowirok,
jono ma jorango kwo paran!
Weyi woriemo jo to jobedo i wickwot,
jono ma gomba miyan litho.
Weyi jowocandere ro wickwot pajo
ji ma jonyero ni, “Ha, ha!”.
Weyi ji ma jorangin
jowofore to josangala i in.
Weyi jono ma jomaro both perin
jowowaci cil gi cil ni “Were dwoŋ!”
To ajacandi aka abu gimoro;
kwakere bothan, Awi Were!
Iŋat'ibedo kony paran,
Awi Rwoth, ikir'igal.
I in, Awi Rwoth, anwaŋo kapondo;
ikir'iwey abedi i wickwot!
I tiro perin gonyan aka ibothan;
Bothan kwoŋbedo itimo gim'otire!
Bedi ran tele ma pondo,
cel matek, ma bothan, kole iŋat'ibedo tele paran,
aka kapondo paran.
Bothan Awi Were paran, wok i cingi jokidakana,
wok kwoŋ amidha pa ŋata butiro gi jagero.
Kole in, Awi Rwoth, iŋat'ibedo geno paran,
geno paran, Awi Rwoth, wok i thino paran.
Atieko goŋere kwoŋin wok i nywolirok paran;
iŋat'iwodhan wok i iy mama,
Alapakin noknok.
Atieko bedo gir'anena ri ji kweth,
to iŋat'ibedo kapondo paran matek.
Dhokan opoŋ pak perin,
gi dwoŋ perin odieceŋ gipi.
Ikir'ibolan woko i hongo ma tiyo,
ikir'ijwangan ka meni paran olacere.
Kole jokwor paran joluwo kwoŋan,
jono ma jorango kwo paran jotimo can kanyacel.
Jowaco ni, “Were otieko jwango go;
wariem wamaki,
kole ongoye ŋat'obothi go”.
Awi Were, ikir'ibedi bor kodan;
Awi Were paran, kwakere ma konyan.
Weyi jomisegey paran wokethi jo i wickwot to jorere;
giwickwot gi kigayagaya
weyi woum joma jorango miyan litho.
To alabedo gi geno noknok,
aka kucel alamedo pakin swa.
Dhokan latuco tim perin m'otire,
tim perin ma both ndelo je,
kole jomore loyo m'aŋeyo.
Alabino i tim ma meni pa Rwoth Were,
alapako tim perin m'otire, aperin kende.
Awi Were, itieko fonjan wok i thino paran,
aka fodi atuco tim perin ma gir'aura.
Ameno kiri i tegino gi twi lwar,
Awi Were, ikir'ijwangan,
cuka anotuci meni perin,
ri luse je m'obin yuwaŋe.
Meni perin
gi tim perin m'otire, Awi Were tundo i polo,
In m'itieko timo gigipiny madongo,
Awi Were, ŋa ma cale in?
Itieko miyan neno teko ma kiwacere gi candirok,
t'iladwoko meni paran kendo;
ilafudhan kendo wok i pendi piny.
Iŋat'ila medo dwoŋ paran;
t'iyomo cunyan kendo.
Alapakin gi tongol ro adieri perin, Awi Were paran;
alawero pak rin gi tongol,
a ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili.
Dhokan laloko gi kisangala,
munyo awero pak rin;
gi cunyan bende m'itieko botho.
Aka lewan latuco kony perin m'otire ndelo je,
kole ji m'oyido jorango miyan litho,
okedhi jo i wickwot gi kikengila.
Miy kere tiro perin, Awi Were,
gi timo gim'otire ri wod pa kere.
Weyi go wothum banja ri ji perin m'otire,
gi ri jocandi perin gi tiro.
Weyi gote wokel bero ri ji,
gi tendere i gim'otire.
Weyi kere wothum banja ri jocandi,
wobothi ji ma bukony,
to ŋinyo woko jadic.
Weyi kere wokwo ka waŋceŋ liel
gi ka dwe liel, i luse je!
Weyi kere wobedi paka koth i ndelin,
paka koth ma dhieko piny.
I hongo pere weyi wotim gim'otire,
to siem bedo, cuka dwe owey liel.
gi wok i malawa tundo i tum ma piny.
Weyi jokwor pere jowokule piny ruwaŋe,
aka jokwor pere jowonaŋ fukefuke.
Weyi kerin ma Tarsis gi ma kigodin,
jowomiy go mic,
weyi kerin ma Seba gi Seba
jowokeli mic.
Kerin je jolakule piny ruwaŋe,
nonin je jolatic rigo.
Kole kere botho jocandi ma jolwoŋo go,
jocandi gi ŋat'ongoye gi jakony.
Go mako wor gi ŋata nyap gi jacandi,
aka botho kwo pa ŋata bu gimoro.
Iy'adica g'akaka go botho kwo pajo,
aka remo pajo lithi rigo.
Kere woyindira,
womiy go Zahabu ma Seba.
Wokway rigo noknok,
silwany pa Were wobedi kwoŋe noknok!
Weyi cemo womore i ndelin,
weyi tendere wopoŋ gi cemo
weyi olemo mere wobedi paka Lebanon;
aka weyi ji jowopoŋ i tindin madongo
paka lum doy.
Weyi nyingi kere woyindira cil gi cil,
ŋeyirok pere womedere paka waŋceŋ!
Weyi ji jowonwaŋ silwany pa kere,
nonin je jowolwoŋ go ni jasilwany!
Silwany wobedi ri Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili,
go ma won kende timo gir'aura.
Silwany wobedi ri nyingi go madwoŋ cil gi cil;
weyi dwoŋ pere wopoŋ i piny gibe!
Ameno, Ameno!
Kwayo pa Daudi, wod Yese, ogik ka.
Adieri Were ber ri jomaber,
ri jono ma cuny gin cil,
To ri paka an, tiendan oyido obothi cer,
kam'anyono je oyido foth.
Ato oyido amako nyeko gi jogero,
munyo aneno jokidakana jotimo maber.
Kole jokiwinji litho;
delkwoŋ jo ocwiny kendo leny.
Jongoye gi teko paka ji man,
jongoye gi teko ma jomegi jonigine.
Riameno delok obedo thiwino pajo;
akaka umo jo paka ruk.
Waŋ gin opoŋ gi noro,
adundin pajo poŋ oy gimienirok.
Jonyero joman to joluwo gigipiny mareco;
jobedo to jotimo can ma diyo joman.
Joluwo gigipiny mareco kwoŋ Were ma i polo,
to jowodho cik ma gero ri kisi dhano ma i piny.
Riameno ji jowire to jopako jo;
to joyeyo piyo kisi gima jowaco.
To jopenjere ni, “Were nyalo ŋeyo nedi?
Ŋeyo bende nitie bongi Jamalo swa?”
Neni, me jokidakana;
noknok jobedo moth, to jomedere ŋaŋo
To ri an, je obedo gipilok ni atieko kuro cunyan m'olony,
t'alwoko cingan m'ongoye apuse.
Kole ndelo je Were otieko miyan candirok,
to miyan gir'acula kisi odikin.
Bedi oyido aluw paka jokidakana,
dinyo abedo ma kigenere ri luse pa ji pa Were.
To munyo aparo nger ma niaŋ gime,
to cal ran tic ma olo m'oyim ran,
cuka akidho i Ot pa Were;
nyaka t'aniaŋ gima latimere ri jokidakana.
To Were laketho jokidakana kamafoth,
lamiyo jo podho i rerok.
Paka ireyo jo piyo,
to jokadho i gike malith.
Jocale lek ka moro ocew,
k'icew, Awi Rwoth, to joleny.
Munyo cunyan timo nge,
munyo ocwow cunyan,
oyido amiŋ aka akuya gimoro,
oyido acalo ogwaŋ rin.
To kad'ameno amedere bedo kodin,
iŋat'imako cingan maracuc.
Iŋat'ithielan gi fonji perin,
aka rumacen ibino jolan gi dwoŋ.
Ŋa ma nitie gine i polo kwanyo woko in?
Aka ongoye gim'agomba i piny kwanyo woko in.
Delkwoŋan gi cunyan podho,
to Were a meni ma cunyan
gi gimoro je m'ayenyo cil gi cil.
Adieri, jono ma jobor kodin jolakisika;
ilareyo woko ji ma jongoye g'adieri rin.
To ri an ber bedo cegin gi Were;
atieko loko Rwoth Were kapondo paran,
ŋey anyal luwo kwoŋ tic perin je.
Awi Were, raŋo ijwango wan ama cil gi cil?
Raŋo nge perin oliel kwoŋ rombo m'ipidho?
Poyi ji perin, m'iyero ri in won wok con,
m'itieko botho ni jowobedi nono perin alunja!
Poyi got Zayon, kam'itieko bed'iye.
Woth i wi gundin makicutho me,
jokwor mawan jotieko reyo gimoro je i Ot pa Were!
Jokwor perin jotieko kihola i dier Ot perin;
jojengo bendera pajo kenyo pa ranyuth ma turo lweny.
Jocale gi jobar yen,
ma jotoŋo piny yen gi le pajo.
Aka nyaka yen mere m'oban je joŋinyo
piny gi le kodi nyundin pajo.
Jocwinyo Ot pa Were gi mac;
jokoco kam'ibed'iye.
Wegi jowaco ni, “Walaŋinyo jo mathindho thindho.”
Jowaŋo Kabedo Maleŋ pa Were je i piny.
Wakinen ranyuth ma leŋo kendo,
ongoye jatuci wac Were man kendo,
aka ongoye ŋat'oŋeyo ni gime otimere kiri keraŋo.
Kiri keraŋo, Awi Were, ma jokwor mawan jonyer,
to joyeto nyingin cil gi cil?
Raŋo ilwogo cingin,
Raŋo ipano cingin maracuc yuŋeyin?
Itieko bedo kere mawan wok i cako, Awi Were;
itieko botho wan dikweth.
ituro wic bulirere i pi.
imiyo delkwoŋe paka cemo ri cwec ma thim.
Iŋat'itimo waŋ pi ma mol gi jwombe,
t'imiyo malawin thwo.
Odieceŋ gi wor jobedo aperin;
iŋat'iketho dwe gi waŋceŋ i kabedo pajo.
Iŋat'iridho kew ma i piny;
Iŋat'itimo ndir ma lietho gi ndir ma cwir.
To poyi gime, Awi Rwoth, ni jokwor perin jonyerin,
aka ji ma bu Were jocayo nyingin.
Ikir'imiy cuny ji perin ma bu gimoro ri ogwaŋe mager;
wiyin wokiri wowil gi kwo pa jocandi perin cil gi cil.
Poyi cikirok perin m'itimo gi wan;
kole kama dimudho je i piny, jopoŋ'iye akaka.
Ikir'iyey jom'idiyo wokethi jo i wickwot;
weyi jocandi gi ji ma bu gimoro jowopaki nyingin.
Ay malo, Awi Were, aka ithiel tim perin;
poyi paka ji ma bu Were jonyerin kisi ndelo!
Wiyin wokiri wowil gi koko ma nge pa jokwor perin,
kihola pa jokwor perin ma medere amedere.
Wafoyin, Awi Were, wafoyin;
walwoŋo nyingin to watuco tim ma gir'aura perin.
Were waco ni, “I hongo ma ripo m'ayiko,
alathumo banja gi wor.
Ka piny oyengere,
to cwec mere bende jokirin,
an aŋat'amiyo sirin mere cungo matek.
Awaco ri jodelok ni, ‘Wikiri widele.’
Gi ri jokidakana ni, ‘Wikiri wipakere.’
Wikiri wipakere,
kosa wiluw gi kwoto.”
Kole k'obedo yuwok ceŋ kosa yupodho ceŋ,
kosa yupiny madwoŋ wok'iye,
to Were am'obedo jathum banja,
go ama dwoko piny ŋatimoro to tiŋo malo ŋatiman.
Kole i cingi Rwoth nitie kikopo,
gi vini ma walo ma nge pere, m'oruw maber;
go konjo woko,
aka jokidakana ma piny,
jolacwiyo to lokere thiŋ.
To alafore cil gi cil,
alawero wer ma pak ri Were pa Yakobo.
Go ladwoko piny jokidakana je,
to tiŋo malo jom'otire.
Were oŋeyere i Yuda,
nyingi go dwoŋ i Isiraili.
Go nigi peco pere i Yerusalem,
go bedo i got Zayon.
Kenyo go turo aserin ma nyweny,
kwot, abor, gi gilweny.
Idwoŋ, inigi meni,
loyo gote cil gi cil.
Jolweny pajo ma jomiseni,
omay jo kisi gimoro je m'oyido jonigine,
aka onyo pama jopodho m'otho;
meni pajo gi ndijo pajo oyido ongoye kony.
Munyo itisa jo, Awi Were pa Yakobo,
kayinin pajo gi joma gweyo jopodho to jotho.
To in, Rwoth, ji je jolworin,
ongoye ŋata nyalo cungo ruwaŋin ka nge omakin.
Ithumo banja wok i polo;
lworo omako piny to liŋ nisi,
munyo Were oay ma thumo banja,
ma botho jom'odiy piny je ma i piny.
Adieri, kiri keme pa dhano,
timo nyaka tic ma pakin.
Jono ma joboth wok i lweny,
jolatimo kalima perin.
Tim cikirok perin ri Rwoth Were perin,
t'itimo jo;
weyi nonin m'othoko go je,
jowokeli mic rigo ma ripo wolwor.
Go ama mwolo jodhum,
go ama kelo lworo kwoŋ kerin ma i piny.
Agoyo ndur ri Were, agoyo ndur,
ni go wonyali winjan.
I hongo ma teko paran arango Rwoth;
wor gipi cingan oyare ma k'ojony i kwayo;
cunyan okwero kwe.
Aparo kwoŋ Rwoth to aomo cunyan;
k'akwayo nyaliŋliŋ to cunyan podho.
Iŋat'imiyan bedo waŋan wor gipi;
acandere m'akinyal luwo.
Aparo kwoŋ hongo macon,
apoyo oro macene.
Abedo wor i paro maluth;
akwayo nyaliŋliŋ t'arango cunyan;
aka me a gim'apenjo cunyan:
“Rwoth okwer wan kicutho,
go k'osangala gi wan kendo?
Mar pere makiwire ma cil gi cil orumo?
Cikirok pere otundo i gike ma hongo je?
Were onyo wiye owil gi timo ŋono?
Onyo nge omiyo go cego woko wor ma cunye ri ji pere?”
To awaco ni, “Obedo rem paran ni cingi Jamalo swa maracuc owire.”
Alapoyo tim pa Rwoth;
ey, alapoyo gir'aura perin macon.
Alaparo kwoŋ tic perin je,
t'aparo kwoŋ tim perin ma meni.
Royo perin, Awi Were leŋ.
Were mene madwoŋ pa Were mawan?
Ibedo Were ma timo gir'aura,
m'otieko nyutho meni pere i dier ji.
Iŋat'ibotho ji perin gi cingin ma meni,
wot Yakobo gi Yozefu.
Munyo pi onenin, Awi Were,
munyo pi onenin, lworo omako,
ey, pendi nam okirin.
Pondeponde to oyo koth;
pondeponde omwoc;
to lithkoth ywore thenge je.
Mor ma mwoc koth perin,
oyido nitie iy'asur,
lithkoth perin olero piny;
piny okirin to yengere.
Royo perin oluwo i nam,
ger perin i pi madwoŋ;
kucel masembo perin k'onenere.
Iŋat'ileko ji perin paka mwendi
gi cingi Musa kodi Aron.
Cik ithi win a ji paran, ri fonji paran
ciki ithi win ri wac ma dhokan.
abino tuco gima luwere ma colo wok con,
gigipiny ma watieko winjo aka waŋeyo,
ma kwarere mawan jotieko waco riwan.
Wak'opan jo kwoŋ nyithindho mawan,
to wabino tuco ri luse m'obin yuwaŋe,
tim madwoŋ pa Rwoth, gi meni pere,
gi gir'aura m'otieko timo.
Go owodho or ri Joisiraili,
nyikway Yakobo.
Go owodho or ri kwarere mawan,
fonjo nyithindho pajo cik,
ŋey luse ma yuwaŋe jowonyal ŋeyo,
gi nyithindho ma fodi k'onywol,
aka jowodongi to jowaco ri nyithindho pajo,
ŋey jowonyal ketho geno pajo i Were,
aka wiy jo wokiri wowil gi tic pa Were,
to jowomaki or pere;
aka ŋey jokiri jowocal gi kwarere pajo,
ji ma wiy gin tek gi luse ma jogwenyirok,
luse ma adundo pajo oyido k'oridhere,
ma cuny gin oyido k'ogeno Were.
Joefrayim ma jotiŋo aserin g'atum abor,
jowire aŋey i ndelo ma lweny.
Jok'okuro cikirok pajo gi Were;
to jokwero woro cik pere.
Wiy jo owil gi gima go oyido otieko timo,
gi gir'aura m'oyido otieko nyutho jo.
i piny ma Misir, i ndelin ma Zowan.
to miyo pi cungo paka gim'odhure.
aka wor je gi lero ma mac.
Obaro telin m'oyawere i thim,
to miyo jo pi amadha m'oromo paŋini m'owok i lutho.
to miyo pi bayirok piny paka malawa.
Kucel jomedere timo reco kwoŋe,
gwenyirok kwoŋ Jamalo swa i thim.
ka jopenjo cemo ma jomito.
Joluwere kwoŋ Were, ka jopenjo ni,
“Were nyalo poko cemo i thim?
Makada nende ogoyo tele to pi bayere woko,
aka pi ma mol mwomere,
to go bende nyalo poko mugat,
kosa nyalo poko riŋo ri ji pere?”
Riameno, munyo Rwoth owinjo, opoŋ gi keme;
to mac gaŋere kwoŋ Yakobo,
nge pere ogaŋere kwoŋ Isiraili;
rupiri oyido jongoye gi yeyo i Were,
aka jok'ogeno kwoŋ meni pere ma both.
Kucel ooro pondeponde malo,
to yawo thigin ma i polo;
to miyo jo cemo wok i polo.
Dhano ocamo mugat pa jomalaika;
odhiro rijo cemo kidhur.
Go omiyo koyo ma yuwok ceŋ kudho i polo,
aka gi meni pere oguro woko koyo ma yupiny;
go ocwe riŋo kwoŋ jo paka fukefuke,
winyin ma jobwombi gin paka kwoyo ma name;
omiyo jo podho i dier kambi pajo,
thoko kabedo pajo je.
Jocemo to joyeŋ maber,
kole go omiyo jo gima joyenyo.
To mafodi jok'oyeŋ gi gima jomito,
mafodi cemo oyido nitie i dhok jo,
nge pa Were oliel kwoŋ jo,
to neko woko jomatek kwoŋ jo,
to rwadho piny cwo m'oyer i Isiraili.
Makada nende gino otimere fodi jotimo reco;
makada otimo gir'aura, jok'oyeyo.
Ameno go oloko kwo pajo macek paka ywe,
gi oro pajo teko.
Munyo oneko jomegi kwoŋ jo,
jom'odoŋ jorango go;
joŋuto reco to jorango Were gi cuny jo je.
Jopoyo ni Were oyido obedo tele pajo,
Were Madwoŋ Maloyo, jaboth pajo.
To jowondo go gi dhok jo;
jowondo go gi lew jo.
jok'okuro cikirok pere.
Kucel, cunye Were oramo ri ji pere,
ocwako reco pajo,
aka k'oreyo jo.
Go ojuko nge pere aka k'oywoyo kwoŋ ji pere.
Go opoyo ni oyido jobedo nyaka ji,
koyo ma kadho aka doko kidwoki kendo.
Didi ma jogwenyere kwoŋe i thim
aka joramo cunye i thim!
Jotemo go dikweth,
to jokwinyo Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili.
Jok'opoyo meni pere,
kosa ndelo ma go oboth'iye jo kwoŋ jakwor,
munyo okelo ranyuth pere i Misir,
gi gir'aura pere i ndelin ma Zowan.
ŋey jokiri jowonyal madho pi mere ma mol.
g'ogwale, m'oreyo jo.
gi olemo ma tic pajo ri bonyo
gi musikamol pajo gi ŋico.
Oneko dhok pajo gi pe,
gi mwendi pajo gi lithkoth.
Ogonyo kwoŋ jo nge pere ma gero,
keme, candirok, gi kidamba,
kitipa pa jomalaika m'oreyo jo.
Otimo ger ri nge pere;
k'ogwoko jo kwoŋ tho,
to omiyo kwo pajo ri two nundu, (yamo m'atieko jo.)
nywol pajo marapena ma meni pajo i wema pa Ham.
to leko jo i thim paka mwendi.
lworo wokiri womaki jo,
to nam oloyo kor jokwor pajo.
i got ma cinge maracuc oyido omako.
ofudo rijo lim pajo,
to ketho nonin pa Isiraili i wemin pajo.
kwoŋ Were ma Jamalo swa,
aka jok'okuro or pere.
Jowire woko kwoŋe
aka jotimo gibanirok paka kwarere pajo,
jominere paka asere m'ominere.
Jomiyo go nge gi kitipa pa jom'oyeyo pajo manyakafir,
jomiyo go bedo gi nyeko gi cal pajo.
Munyo Were owinjo, opoŋ gi keme,
to kwero Isiraili kicutho.
wema m'oyido go obed'iye i dier ji pere.
ranyuth ma meni pere gi dwoŋ.
Omiyo ji pere ri abor,
to olo keme pere kwoŋ alunja pere.
Mac omwonyo yac pajo,
to nyir pajo jongoye gi wer ma nywomirok.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam pajo jotho g'abor,
to mon pajo k'oyey jo ywak.
Nyaka to Rwoth cew pa oyido nindo
paka jamaker ma koko gi sangala ro vini.
Okedho jakwor pere i kikengila;
okedho jo i wickwot ma cil gi cil.
Rwoth okwero nyikway Yozefu;
go k'oyero nono pa Efrayim;
Go oyero nono pa Yuda ayin,
gi Zayon ma go omaro.
Kenyo go oger'iye kabedo pere, maleŋ ma cal peco pere i polo,
oloko go ma kiyengere paka piny ma go otieko nwaŋo cil gi cil.
to kwanyo go i kwath rombo;
Kam'oyido go kway'iye mwendi,
to loko go jakwath pa ji pere Yakobo,
pa Isiraili, alunja pere.
Daudi okwayo jo gi cunye maber,
to leko jo gi ndijo ma cinge.
jotieko koco ot perin maleŋ;
jotieko thango Yerusalem i gunda.
Jotieko miyo delkwoŋ ŋecin perin
ri winyin ma koyo acama,
riŋo pa jogenirok perin ri ogwaŋe ma piny.
Jotieko oyo remo pajo paka pi,
i Yerusalem parom,
to ngoye ŋat'oyiki jo.
Watieko lokirok gi nyero pa joger mawan,
jonyero wan to jotero wan pa gim'ongoye kony.
Awi Rwoth, inomaki nge gi wan cil gi cil?
Keme ma nge perin omedere liel paka mac?
Konji nge perin kwoŋ nonin ma jokuya in
gi kwoŋ kerin ma jokilamin.
Kole jotieko cuto woko Yakobo,
to jothango kabedo pere,
Ikir'imiy wan gir'acula ro reco pa kwarere mawan;
weyi wor perin wobin piyo romo gi wan,
kole odwoki wan piny tektek.
Kony wan, Awi Were ma jaboth mawan,
ro dwoŋ ma nyingin;
gony wan aka icwaki reco mawan,
ro dwoŋ ma nyingin.
Raŋo nonin jowopenji ni, “Nikune Were pajo?”
Weyi wanen k'imiyo gir'acula ri nonin ro oyo remo pa ŋecin perin.
Weyi ywak pa ji ma jonitie i twec wotundi bongin.
Gi meni perin madwoŋ gony jono,
m'otiek thumo rijo banja ma tho.
Awi Rwoth, cul nonin man ca dibirio
ro yet ma joyetin gine.
Nyaka wan ji perin,
mwendi m'ibedo jakwath pajo,
walafoyin cil gi cil;
to wapakin i luse je.
winji wan, jatel pa mwendi perin.
Ibedo i kom perin ma dhum i wi cwec ma jobwombi gin,
nyuthere ri nonin pa Efrayim, Benyamin, gi Manase.
Nyuthi wan meni perin,
biye bongi wan!
Dwoki wan, Awi Were!
Nyuthi wan wor perin, ŋey wanyal both!
Inomaki nge gi kwayo pa ji perin kiri keraŋo,
Awi Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny?
Imiyo rem olokere cemo mawan,
wamadho kikopo ma pigi waŋ wan.
Iloko wan ginyero ri ji,
aka jokwor mawan jonyero wan.
Dwoki wan, Were pa lwak jolweny!
Nyuthi wan wor perin, ŋey wanyal both!
Ikelo yath vini wok i Misir,
iriemo woko nonin megi t'ipidho go i lowo pajo.
Icwado rigo kabedo madongo,
fuc mere odonjo piny, to yare i lowo gipi.
Oumo gote gi tipo mere,
aka jange oumo woko yen sida ma jogaŋere.
Jange oyare kiri i nam,
tundo kiri i malawa Yufrete.
To raŋo onyo ituro woko cel mere,
ŋey ŋata luwo je nyalo kwalo nyingi vini mere?
Mbije madudi jonyono piny,
aka ogwaŋe madudi jocamo.
Wire bongi wan, Were ma jameni je!
Ŋiy piny wok i polo, akinen,
dew kwoŋ yath vini me!
Biye both yath vini ma in won ipidho me,
vini ma nyaka ay m'imiyo dongo matek!
Jokwor mawan jowaŋo gi mac aka jotoŋo piny,
ŋiy jo gi nge aka irey woko jo.
Kuri aka kwonga ji m'itieko yero,
nono m'iloko matek.
Wakibino wire kwoŋin kendo,
kur wan makwo, aka wabino pakin.
Dwoki wan, Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny!
Nyuthi wan wor perin, ŋey wanyal bothi!
Wer malo ri Were m'obedo meni mawan,
koki gi kisangala ri Were pa Yakobo.
Caki wer, aka goy sasi,
goy wer mamit gi dongo gi tongol.
i ndelo mawan ma kalima.
Kole me obedo cik i Isiraili,
cik m'owok bongi Were pa Yakobo.
Go omiyo Joisiraili,
munyo go omonjo lowo ma Misir.
Awinjo dwondi m'oyido fodi akuya waco ni,
“Akwanyo bieto mewin wok i dieŋey win,
aweyo win ketho piny mugugu ma matafal.”
adwoko win ka nyaliŋliŋ i mor koth.
Atemo win i waŋ pi ma Meriba.
Winji win, ji paran, agwoko win,
Isiraili, ka bedi nende oyido wiwinjan ye!
An abedo Rwoth, Were mewin,
m'owodho win wok i Misir.
Yaw win dhok win malac, aka abino pidho win.
“To ji paran jok'owinjan,
Isiraili k'oluwo cik paran.
Ameno aweyo jo luwo yo pajo ma wictek,
gi timo gima joyenyo.
Kabedi nende ji paran oyido jowinjan,
ka bedi nende oyido joluw cik paran!
Dinyo akengila jokwor pajo piyo,
t'amako jo.
Jono ma jodakan dinyo jokule ruwaŋan gi lworo,
dinyo gir'acula pajo obedo cil gi cil.
Dinyo apidho win gi ŋano m'onuŋere
to ayeŋo win gi mo kic ma tele.”
Were otieko mako kabedo pere i kapido ma polo,
aka thumo banja i dier werin ni,
“Wiripo weyo thumo banja m'ongoye tiro,
wiripo weyo timo nyakucel ri jokidakana!”
Miy win tiro ri jocandi gi nyithindho kic,
tim win adieri ri ji ma jonitie i litho gi ji ma bu gimoro.
Thiel win jocandi gi ji ma bu gimoro,
both win jo wok i cingi jokidakana.
Wingoye gi rieko kosa niaŋ,
wiwotho i mudho,
aka tiro otieko rwenyo i piny.
wijoje wibedo nyithindho pa Were madwoŋ loyo werin je.”
To wibino tho paka ji,
kwo mewin bino rumo paka apa jadhum man je.
Ay, Awi Were, idhumi piny;
kole nonin je jobedo aperin!
Awi Were, ikir'iliŋaliŋa,
ikir'imwole, kosa ikudere.
Kole neni, jokwor perin jogwenyere,
aka jono ma jodakin jotiŋo wiy gin malo.
Jotimo can manyaliŋliŋ kwoŋ ji perin,
aka jotesa ri ji m'ikwonga.
Jowaco ni, “Biye win warey woko piny pajo,
ŋey wokiri wopoy Isiraili kendo.”
Joyere i can pajo,
aka joriwere lweny kodin.
Joedom, gi Joisimayili,
Jomowab gi Johagrit,
Jogebal, Joamon, gi Joamalek,
Jofilistia gi Jotire.
Asiria bende oriwere gi jo
jobedo jolweny matek pa nyikway Loti.
paka itimo ri Sisera gi Yabin i malawa Kison.
Ikengila jo i Endor,
aka delkwoŋ gin otopo piny.
kengila jodhum pajo je paka itimo ri Zeba gi Zalmuna,
ma jowaco ni, “Walunji riwan wegi,
lowo m'obedo apa Were.”
Kedhi jo paka fukefuke, Awi Were,
paka cuŋ ma koyo kudho woko.
Paka mac waŋo lul,
paka cuk cwinyo gote,
riemi jo woko g'asur perin,
aka ibwoki jo gi koyo perin mager.
Awi Rwoth, umi waŋ gin giwickwot,
aka miy jowoyey meni perin.
Weyi wokengila jo aka wobwoki jo cil gi cil,
weyi jowotho i wickwot.
Weyi jowoŋey ni in kende Awi Rwoth,
ibedo jadhum madwoŋ loyo i piny gipi.
Amito swa bedo i Ot perin, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Amito swa bedo kenyo.
Ayenyo swa bedo i Ot pa Rwoth.
Cunyan gi delkwoŋan wero gi kisangala
ri Were makwo.
Kiri obico je jogeto od gin koro,
aka winyin jogeto peco pajo.
Jonywolo nyithindhi gin cegin gi migam perin,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
Kere paran aka Were paran.
Josilwany a jono ma jobedo i Ot perin,
aka jowero rin wer ma pak noknok.
Josilwany a jono ma jonwaŋo meni pajo wok bongin,
aka jomito swa kidho i got Zayon lamin.
Paka joluwo gi i milelo Baka,
lokere waŋ pi,
koth ma cwir poŋo kidiwin.
Jolokere matek ka jokadho,
jobino neno Were pa werin i got Zayon.
Awi Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny,
winji kwayo paran,
ciki ithin, Were pa Yakobo.
Miy kere mawan silwany, Awi Were,
kere m'itieko yero.
Ndelo acel i Ot perin,
ber loyo gana kaman je.
Them acungi i waŋkac ma Ot pa Were paran,
loyo bedo i peco pa jokidakana.
Rwoth Were obedo waŋceŋ kodi kwot,
miyo wan silwany, wor gi dwoŋ.
Go kithwon jono ma jotimo gim'otire,
gimaber.
Awi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
josilwany a jono ma jogeno i in!
Rwoth, oyido imako wor gi lowo perin,
imiyo Isiraili kiyindira.
Itieko cwako reco pa ji perin,
gi komo pajo.
Iweyo mako nge gi jo,
aka idhumo keme perin.
Dwoki wan kendo, Awi Were jaboth mawan,
aka weyi winjo marac gi wan!
Inomaki gi wan nge cil gi cil!
Nge perin k'orumi?
Loki wan matek kendo,
ŋey wan ji perin, wanyal pakin.
Nyuthi wan mar perin makiwire, Awi Rwoth,
aka miy wan both perin.
Weyi awinji gima Rwoth Were bino waco,
kole go ciko siem ri ji pere won,
ka jok'ogik i yo pajo ma miŋo.
Adieri go oyikere botho jono ma jobwonere rigo,
ŋey dwoŋ pere wobedi i lowo mawan.
Mar makiwire g'adieri jobino romo,
timo gim'otire gi siem jolapodho akor.
Adieri bino wok piny,
aka timo gim'otire bino ŋiyo piny wok i polo.
Rwoth bino miyo wan gimaber,
aka lowo mawan bino nyak ranyak m'owega.
Timo gim'otire bino wotho ruwaŋ Rwoth,
to yiko rigo royo.
Winjan Rwoth, aka dwokan,
kole ajacandi aka abu gimoro.
Bothan kwoŋ tho, kole aluwo cik perin,
bothan, kole abedo ŋeca perin aka ageno i in.
Maki kodan wor, Awi Rwoth,
kole akwayin ndelo gipi.
Rwoth, miy ŋeca perin kisangala,
kole atiŋo adundo paran malo rin.
Iber riwan aka icwako,
ipoŋ gi mar makiwire ri jono ma jokwayin.
Awi Rwoth, cik ithin ri kwayo paran,
winji ywak paran ri kony.
Alwoŋin i ndelo ma teko,
kwoŋbedo idwoko kwayo paran.
Rwoth, ongoye were ma cale in,
ongoye m'otieko timo gim'itieko timo.
jolabino to jokule piny ruwaŋin Awi Rwoth,
jobino miyo nyingin dwoŋ.
Kole idwoŋ aka itimo gir'aura,
in kende iŋat'ibedo Were.
Fonjan yo perin, Rwoth,
ŋey awothi iy'adieri perin,
fonjan lworo nyingin gi cunyan je.
Abino pakin gi cunyan je, Awi Rwoth Were paran,
abino miyo nyingin dwoŋ cil gi cil.
Kole mar perin makiwire dwoŋ,
ibothan kwoŋ tho.
Jonoro jobino monjan, Awi Were,
jogero jotemo nekan,
ji ma jokiwinjin.
To in Rwoth, ibedo Were ma jawor aka nitie gi mar,
ikimaki nge piyo, ipoŋ gi mar makiwire aka itimo adieri.
Wire bongan aka imaki kodan wor,
miy ŋeca perin meni,
aka both wod pa ŋeca perin madhako.
Nyuthan ranyuth ma ŋono perin,
ŋey jono ma jodakan jowoneni to jobedo giwickwot,
ka joneni ni Rwoth okweyo cunyan to konyan.
Rwoth ogeto tindi pere madwoŋ wi got maleŋ;
Rwoth omaro waŋkace ma Zayon,
loyo kabedo pa Yakobo je.
Iluwo kwoŋin gigipiny madongo,
Awi tindi madwoŋ pa Were.
Kwoŋ jono ma joŋeyan, atuco Rahab gi Babilon,
neni, abino kwano Filistia gi Tire, kodi Ethopiya,
kwoŋ ji ma Yerusalem.
Ibino luwo kwoŋ Zayon ni,
“Me gi meca onywol jo kenyo.”
Kole Jamalo swa ama lageto go.
Rwoth bino ndiko nyingi nonin,
to medo joje paka ji ma Yerusalem.
Jower gi jomiel je jowaco ni,
“Zayon obedo ka silwany mawan.”
Awi Rwoth, Were paran, alwoŋo ri kony ndelo gipi,
aka wor aywak ruwaŋin.
Winji kwayo paran,
cik ithin ri ywak paran ri kony.
Kole adundo paran opoŋ teko,
aka kwo paran cegin gi tho.
Acalo gi ji man ma jocegin tho,
abedo jacwo m'ongoye gi meni.
Ajwangere bongi jom'otho,
acalo jom'onek ma joriere i bur pajo,
jono ma wiyin owil gi jo kicutho,
kole ikinyal konyo jo.
Ibolan i lutho ma bur,
i bur macol loyo, aka luth loyo.
Nge perin pek kwoŋan,
aka aŋinyere iy'asur mere.
Imiyo merin paran jojwangan,
imiyan bedo mbeyo rijo.
Amoko m'akinyal kwalok.
Waŋan ocore ro rem,
Rwoth, alwoŋin kisi ndelo,
aka atiŋo cingan malo rin i kwayo.
Itimo gir'aura ri jom'otho?
Jom'otho bende joay to jopakin?
Mari perin makiwire bende iluwo kwoŋe i bur,
kosa adieri perin i kabedo ma rerok?
Gir'aura perin bende oŋeyere i mudho,
kosa bero perin i lowo ma wicwil?
To aywak rin ri kony Rwoth,
kisi odikin akwayin.
Rwoth, raŋo ikweran?
Raŋo iwire woko kwoŋan?
Wok i thino paran, atieko candirok t'abedo cegin gi tho,
acandere i gir'acula perin, angoye gi kony.
Keme perin oŋinyan,
goco perin oreyan.
Jothokan odieceŋ gipi paka mikula pi,
jouman i kisi thenge.
Imiyo kiri jamitirok aka mere paran jwangan,
mudho kende am'othokan.
abino tuco gi dhokan adieri perin ri luse je.
Kole mar perin bedo cil gi cil,
adieri perin ocwiny paka polo.
atieko kwoŋirok ri ŋeca paran Daudi.
Nyikwayin jobino bedo kere noknok,
abino geto keri perin ri luse je.”
Weyi polo wopak gir'aura perin Rwoth,
jomaleŋ jowower kwoŋ adieri perin i cokirok.
Ongoye ŋata cale kodin i polo,
ongoye cwec ma polo ma cal Rwoth.
Ilworin i cokirok pa jomaleŋ,
aka joje jocungo gi lworo rin.
Awi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
ŋa ma jameni paka in, Awi Rwoth,
itimo adieri i gimoro je.
Idhumo nam ma ucere,
ikweyo asur mere mager.
Iŋinyo woko thwol Rahab t'ineko,
ikengila jokwor perin gi cingin ma dimeni.
Polo gi piny je obedo aperin,
icweyo piny gibe gi gima nitie i iye je.
Icweyo yumalo gi yupiny,
got Tabor gi Hamon jowero rin ri kisangala.
Cingin dimeni,
meni perin dwoŋ!
Keri perin cungo i wi timo gim'otire gi tiro,
mar g'adieri nenere i gim'itimo je.
Josilwany a jono ma joŋeyo lamin gi wer,
ma jowotho i lero ma ruwaŋin, Rwoth.
Josiemere ndelo gipi kwoŋbedo in,
aka jopakin ro bero perin.
Kole ibedo dwoŋ gi meni pajo,
i mar perin imiyo wan loyo.
Kole kwot mawan obedo apa Rwoth,
in, Were maleŋ pa Isiraili imiyo wan kere mawan.
Cango con iwaco ri ŋecin perin ma jor'adieri ni,
“Aketho sangaria kwoŋ ŋata jameni,
amiyo keri ri ŋat'ayero wok kwoŋ ji.”
awiro go gi mo maleŋ.
Meni paran bino bedo gi go noknok,
cingan bino loko go matek.
Jokwor pere jokibino loyo go,
jokidakana jokibino kikengila go.
Abino ŋinyo jokwor pere,
t'aneko jono ma jodak go.
Adieri paran gi mar paran makiwire bino bedo gi go,
abino miyo go loyo noknok.
Abino yaro dhum pere i wi nam,
gi i wi malawin.
Go bino ywak ran ni, in ibedo baba,
Were paran, aka tele ma both paran.
Abino loko go okayo paran,
kere madwoŋ loyo kerin je.
aka cikirok paran gi go bino bedo cil gi cil.
Dhum pere bino bedo cil gi cil,
nyikwaye jobino bedo kere noknok.
“Ka nyithindho pere jojwangi cik paran,
to jokwero luwo Or paran,
ka jotur cik paran
to jokwero kuro Or paran,
kenyo abino miyo jo gir'acula ro reco pajo,
abino miyo jo candirok ro komo jo.”
T'akibino kwanyo mar paran kwoŋ Daudi,
kosa weyo m'akikuro kwoŋirok paran rigo.
Akibino turo cikirok paran gi go,
kosa kada wiro kwoŋirok m'atimo gi go.
“Akwoŋere ma dicel aka kicutho gi nyingan maleŋ,
ni akibino twodo ri Daudi.
Go bino bedo gi nyikwaye noknok,
aka abino kuro keri pere kafodi ceŋ liel.
mijulisi mar'adieri no i polo.”
To onyo pama imako nge gi kere perin m'iyero,
ijwango go aka ikwero go.
Ituro cikirok perin m'itimo gi ŋeca perin,
aka ibolo sangaria pere i fukefuke.
Ituro piny kor tindi pere madwoŋ,
aka isika woko kapondo pere.
Ŋata luwo je kwalo gigipiny pere,
aka joger pere je jonyero go.
Imiyo jokwor pere loyo,
imiyo jo siemirok.
Iloko gilweny pere m'ongoye kony,
aka iweyo okengila go i lweny.
Imayo go dwoŋ pere paka kere,
aka ikelo dhum pere i gike.
Imiyo go ti piyo,
t'ikelo rigo wickwot.
Rwoth, inopondi kiri keraŋo?
Inomaki nge kiri keraŋo?
Poyi ni kwo paran cek,
poyi ni icweyo ji je ma wanyalo tho!
Ŋa manyalo kwo makitho?
Ŋa manyalo botho adundo pere kwoŋ meni pa tho?
Rwoth, nikune mar perin makiwire macene?
Nikune cikirok perin m'itimo ri Daudi?
Poyi nger m'iyet'iye ŋeca perin,
nger m'acir'iye lam pa jokafir.
Jokwor perin joyeto kere perin m'iyero, Awi Rwoth!
Joyeto go kisi kama go kidh'iye.
Pak win Rwoth cil gi cil!
Ameno! Ameno!
Awi Rwoth, ibedo kabedo mawan
i luse je.
Mafodi ikicweyo gote
kosa icweyo piny gibe,
oyido ibedo Were makwo cil gi cil,
aka ibino bedo Were cil gi cil.
Iwaco riwan gik gim'oyido wabedo,
imiyo wan gik i fukefuke.
cal nyoro ka,
kosa sawa macek wor.
Iyweyo wan woko paka mikula pi,
wacal lek ma hongo macek.
Wacal dudi ma twi odikin,
madongo to thiwo,
aka thwo to tho othieno.
Warere gi nge perin,
wabwok gi keme perin.
Ithango reco mawan ruwaŋin,
reco mawan manyaliŋliŋ kam'inyalo neno jo.
Kwo mawan lokere macek gi nge perin,
rumo woko paka mwoŋo.
Wanitie gi oro piero abirio kende,
oro piero aboro ka watek;
kucel jokelo riwan teko gi rem,
kwo rumo, aka wakinen kendo.
Ŋa m'otieko winjo meni ma nge perin?
Ŋa m'oŋeyo lworo ma keme perin nyalo kelo?
Ameno fonji wan kwano ndelo mawan,
ŋey wanyal lokirok mariek.
Inomedere mako nge kiri keraŋo?
Tim ŋono, Awi Rwoth ri ŋecin perin!
Poŋi wan gi mar perin makiwire kisi odikin,
ŋey wanyal wer to wasangala i kwo mawan je.
Miy wan kisangala madit paka kumo m'imiyo wan,
i oro mawan je ma litho.
Weyi ŋecin perin jowoneni tim perin ma meni,
weyi nyikway wan jowoneni dwoŋ gi meni perin.
Weyi bero pa Rwoth, Were mawan,
wobedi gi wan i kisi gima watimo.
Ŋata bwok bongi Jamalo swa,
ŋata nindo i bwombi Jameni je,
nyalo waco ri Rwoth ni,
“Ibedo kapondo paran aka ikwonga an.
Ibedo Were paran, agenin.”
Go bino kikwonga in kwoŋ teko m'opondo
gi kwoŋ two ma neko jo je.
Go bino umin gi bwombe,
aka ibino nwaŋo bonge kapondo,
Were timo adieri go bino kikwonga in to gwokin.
Ikir'ilwor teko moro je wor,
kosa asere m'icelo odieceŋ,
kosa two nundu ma bino i mudho
kosa rerok odieceŋ maler.
Ji gana jonyalo podho ma jotho ka ŋetin,
gana apar thokin,
t'ikibino core ka bongin.
Ibino nyaka ŋiyo gi waŋin,
t'ineno nger m'imiy'iye jokidakana gir'acula.
Kwoŋbedo iloko Rwoth kapondo perin,
Jamalo swa kabwok perin,
ongoye raco ma bino podho rin,
ongoye lweny ma bino core cegin gi peco perin.
kikwonga i yo perin je.
tiendin wokiri wolimi litho kwoŋ telin.
simbwore mager gi thwole ma jokwir.
Were waco ni, “Abino botho jono ma jomaran,
t'akwonga jono ma joyeyan paka Rwoth.
Ka jolwoŋan, abino dwoko jo,
ka jobedi i teko, abino bedo gi jo.
Abino botho jo t'aworo jo.
Abino miyo jo kemba ma kwo mabor,
Abino botho jo.”
Obedo gimaber foyo Rwoth,
wero pak ri nyingin, Awi Jamalo Swa,
tuco mar perin makiwire odikin,
gi timo adieri perin wor,
gi wer ma milowe g'adungu,
gi wer ma tongol.
Kole tim perin ma meni miyan kisangala,
awero gi forok ro gim'itieko timo.
Tim perin nga dwoŋ, Awi Rwoth,
Paro perin nga luth!
Me gima nyaka dhano kinyal ŋeyo,
ŋatamiŋ kinyal niaŋ,
ni, makada nende jokidakana jodongi paka dudi,
aka joma timo komo joyindira,
kucel ibino reyo jo kicutho.
Me kwoŋbedo in, Awi Rwoth, idwoŋ loyo cil gi cil.
Kole jokwor perin je, Awi Rwoth, jobino tho,
aka ibino kikengila jokidakana je.
Imiyan bedo matek paka thwon mager,
imiyan silwany gi kisangala.
Waŋan otieko neno podho pa jokwor paran,
ithan owinjo ywak pa jokidakana.
Joma timo gim'otire jobino kiyindira paka yen thith,
jobino dongo paka yen sida ma Lebanon.
Jocale yen m'opidhi i Ot pa Rwoth,
ma joyindira i Ot pa Were,
ma jonyak olemo kiri i tiyo,
aka jobedo manyaboke pendi kendo matek.
Me nyutho ni Rwoth timo tiro,
ni ongoye komo kwoŋ tele paran.
Rwoth obedo Kere.
Go ruko dwoŋ gi meni.
Piny okethi m'ocwiny i kabedo mere,
aka kinyal coro.
Rwoth, kom perin ma dhum obedo m'ocwiny wok i cakirok,
aka ingoye gi cako.
Rwoth, lutho ma wakawaka madongo,
jotiŋo dwondi gin aka johola.
Rwoth obedo jadhum madwoŋ loyo i polo,
dwoŋ loyo mor pa wakawaka madongo,
nitie gi meni loyo asur ma nam.
Rwoth, cik perin obedo ma cil gi cil,
aka Ot perin leŋ adieri,
ma cil gi cil.
Rwoth, in ibedo Were ma culo kwor,
nyuthi nge perin.
Ibedo jathum banja ri piny,
ay aka imiy jonoro gima ripo gi jo!
Jokidakana josangala kiri keraŋo?
Kiri keraŋo, Awi Rwoth?
Jonek jonor kiri keraŋo
to jodele gi neki pajo?
Rwoth, joŋinyo ji perin,
aka jodiyo ji ma jobedo aperin.
Joneko citho gi jopath,
kodi nyithindho kic.
Jowaco ni, “Rwoth kinen wan,
Were pa Isiraili kiŋey.”
Kure win, ji ma jokiniaŋ,
winofonjere keraŋo?
Were m'ocweyo ithi ji, go kiwinji?
Go m'otimo waŋ ji, kinen?
Go ma tiro nonin, kilamiyo jo gir'acula?
Go ma fonjo ji rieko,
oŋeyo nger ma paro pajo ongoye rieko.
Rwoth, josilwany a jono m'ifonjo,
jono m'ifonjo cik perin!
Iywomo jo kwoŋ ndelo ma teko,
cuka ikunyo bur ma ciko jokidakana.
Kole Rwoth kilajwango ji pere,
go k'owey jono ma jobedo apere.
Tiro bino nwaŋere i kapido kendo,
aka jono ma cuny gin olony jobino thielo.
Ŋa m'omonji ran jokidakana?
Ŋa manitie i thenge paran kwoŋ joreco?
Kabedi Rwoth oyido k'okonyan,
dinyo adundo paran okidho i piny pa jom'otho.
Rwoth, munyo oyido aparo ni tiendan ocer,
mar perin makiwire omakan.
Kisi k'aparo aka arembo,
ikweyo cunyan aka imiyan kisangala.
Jodhum ma jokidakana jokinyal riwirok kodin,
kole joloko ngoye pa tiro cik,
jotimo can kwoŋ jomaber
aka jothumo banja ma tho ri joma bubanja.
To Rwoth olokere kapondo paran,
Were paran obedo tele paran.
Go bino miyo jo gir'acula ro kidakana pajo,
to reyo jo ro reco pajo,
Rwoth Were mawan bino reyo woko jo.
Biye, weyi wapaki win Rwoth;
weyi wawer gi kisangala ri tele ma both mawan!
Weyi wabin ruwaŋe gi foyo,
aka wapaki go gi wer ma kisangala!
Kole Rwoth obedo Were Madwoŋ,
aka Kere Madwoŋ loyo werin je.
Go dhumo lutho ma piny,
gi gote maboyo.
Nam obedo apere, rupiri go ocweyo,
kole otimo lowo m'othwo gi cinge.
Biye, wakule piny aka walam go,
weyi wagur congi wan ruwaŋ Rwoth, jacwec mawan.
wabedo ji pere ma go dewo rijo,
rombo ma go kwayo.
Kabedi konon oyido winyal winjo dwonde!
paka jobedo i ndelo no i thim i Masa.
Jokethan i karatem to joteman,
makada nende oyido jotieko neno gim'atimo rijo.
Ma oro piero aŋwen ajok gi jono.
Awaco ni, ‘Jobedo jocay!
Jokwero luwo Or paran.’
ni jokiripi donjo kam'oyido ayiko miyo jo ma ywomirok.”
Wer ri Rwoth wer manyen,
wer ri Rwoth piny gibe!
Wer ri Rwoth, pak nyingi go,
luw kwoŋ both kisi ndelo.
Tuci dwoŋ pere ri nonin,
