gi tim pere ma meni ri ji je.
Kole Rwoth dwoŋ, aka iripo pako go gi pak ma malo,
iripo bwonirok rigo loyo werin je.
Kole werin pa nonin je jobedo nyaka cal,
to Rwoth ocweyo polo.
Dwoŋ gi dhum othoko go,
meni gi ŋono opoŋ i Ot pere.
pak win dwoŋ gi meni pere.
Miy win Rwoth dwoŋ ma ripo gi nyingi go,
keli win mic aka wibin i Ot pere.
Kule win piny ruwaŋ Were Jamalo Swa ka go onenere,
kirin win ruwaŋ go piny gibe.
Waci ri nonin je ni, “Rwoth obedo Kere!
Piny okethi m'ocwiny ma kinyal yengirok,
go bino thumo ri ji banja gi tiro.”
Weyi polo wosangala, aka weyi piny wofore,
nam gi cwec mere je jowohola,
weyi ndelin gi cemo mere jowosangala.
Yen ma lule jobino koko ri kisangala,
ka Rwoth obin dhumo piny.
Go bino thumo banja ri piny je,
gi tiro kodi adieri pere.
Rwoth dhumo, weyi piny wofore,
sangala win kigoda lowo ma nam.
Pondeponde gi mudho thoko go,
go dhumo m'otire kodi tiro.
Mac liel ruwaŋ go,
aka waŋo woko jokwor ma jothoko go.
Lero pere menyo piny,
piny neno aka kirin.
Gote joleny paka odok ruwaŋ Rwoth,
ruwaŋ Rwoth ma piny gipi.
Polo tuco timo gitiro pere,
aka nonin je joneno dwoŋ pere.
ma jokwot gi cal ma bukony,
werin je jokule piny ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Ji ma Zayon josangala,
tindin madongo ma Yuda jofore,
ro thumo banja perin, Awi Rwoth.
Kole in Rwoth ma jameni je, idhumo piny,
idwoŋ loyo werin je.
Rwoth omaro jono ma jodak gimarac,
go kwonga kwo pa ji pere,
botho jo kwoŋ meni pa jokidakana.
Lero menyo ri ji ma jotimo gim'otire,
gi kisangala ri joma cuny gin olony.
Fore win i Rwoth, joma timo gim'otire,
aka foy win nyingi go maleŋ!
Wer ri Rwoth wer manyen,
kole otimo gir'aura!
Cinge maracuc gi cinge maleŋ,
omiyo go loyo.
Rwoth otito loyo pere,
aka onyutho meni pere ma both ri nonin.
Go opoyo mar pere makiwire,
g'adieri pere ri Joisiraili,
ji je kisi kamoro jotieko neno loyo pa Were mawan.
Wer gi kisangala ri Rwoth piny gibe,
pak win go gi wer gi koko ma kisangala!
Wer pak ri Rwoth!
Tuki wer gi tongol!
Kudhi gwara gi milowe,
aka koki gi kisangala ri Rwoth, Kere mawan.
Weyi nam gi cwec mere je jowohola,
piny gi gima kwo i iye je jowower.
Weyi malawin jowogoy adhoŋ,
aka gote jowower kanyacel ri kisangala,
kwoŋbedo Rwoth bino dhumo piny.
Go bino dhumo nonin ma piny,
gi tiro g'adieri.
weyi ji jowokirin.
Go obedo i wi cwec ma jobwombi gin,
aka piny yengere.
Rwoth dwoŋ i Zayon,
go dwoŋ loyo i dier nonin je.
Weyi jowopaki nyingi go madwoŋ ma kelo lworo.
Go Leŋ!
Kere Majameni, aka omaro tiro,
itieko kelo tiro i Isiraili,
ikelo timo gim'otire gi timo adieri.
Pak win Rwoth Were mawan,
lam ruwaŋ kom pere ma dhum!
Go Leŋ!
Musa gi Aron oyido jobedo jocway ri Were i wi migam pere,
Samwiri oyido obedo acel kwoŋ ji ma jolamo go,
joywak ri Were, aka odwoko jo,
jokuro cik gi Or m'omiyo jo.
Awi Rwoth Were mawan, idwoko ji perin,
inyutho ni ibedo Were ma cwako,
t'imiyo jo gir'acula ro reco pajo.
Pak win Rwoth Were mawan,
aka lam wi got pere maleŋ!
Kole Rwoth Were mawan leŋ.
Wer win ri Rwoth piny gibe!
Lam win Rwoth gi kisangala,
biye win ruwaŋ go gi wer!
Ŋey win ni Rwoth obedo Were!
Go ocweyo wan aka wabedo apere;
wabedo ji pere, aka rombo pere.
Donji i waŋkac pere gi foyo,
donji i diedipo pere gi pak.
Foy go aka pak go.
mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
aka timo adieri pere tundo i luse je.
Wer paran mako kwoŋ timo adieri gi tiro,
aka abino wero rin Rwoth.
Alaluwo yo ma bu apuse.
Inobin bongan keraŋo?
Alabedo gi cuny m'olony,
aka akibino ciro raco.
Adaki tim pa ji ma jowire kwoŋ Were,
akibino bedo gi gir'atima gi jo.
Abino bedo jar'adieri,
aka akibino bedo jatwodo.
Abino reyo ŋatimoro je,
ma luwo pokopoko kwoŋ ŋatiman.
Akibino ciro janoro kosa jadhaw.
Abino nyutho ŋono ri jono ma jotimo adieri ri Were,
aka abino weyo jo bedo kodan.
Jono ma jotimo adieri kicutho,
ama jobino tiyo ran.
Ongoye jatwodo ma labedo i ot paran,
ongoye jarendirok ma bino doŋ ruwaŋan.
Kisi odikin abino reyo woko,
jokidakana i piny mawan,
abino riemo jono je ma jotimo gimarac,
i tindi madwoŋ pa Rwoth.
Winji kwayo paran, Awi Rwoth,
weyi ywak paran wotundi bongin!
Ikir'ipan ran waŋin i hongo ma kidamba paran,
Cik ithin ran,
aka idwokan piyo k'alwoŋin!
Kole kwo paran rwenyo paka yiro,
cokin paran waŋ paka mac.
Cunyan podho aka thwo paka lum,
aka ocile kwoŋ cemo.
Kwoŋbedo auja malo,
adoŋ pien gi cokin.
Acalo acut madudi,
paka tula i gunda m'ojwangere.
Ariere ma nindo kimaki waŋan wor gipi,
acalo winyo manitie kakende i wi ot.
Ndelo gipi jokwor paran joyetan,
jono ma jonyeran jooro nyingan ma kwoŋo ji.
Kole acamo buru paŋini mugat,
aka aruwo pigi waŋan gi math paran.
Kwoŋbedo nge kodi keme perin,
kole idiman t'ibolan woko.
Kwo paran cal tipo m'othieno,
athwo paka lum.
To in, Awi Rwoth, ibedo kere cil gi cil,
luse je bino poyo nyingin.
Ibino ay t'imako wor gi Zayon,
hongo otundo ma nyutho go ŋono,
me a hongo m'otire.
Kole ŋecin perin jomaro go,
makada nende jotieko reyo woko go;
jomako gine wor,
makada nende odoŋ gunda.
Nonin jobino lworo nyingi Rwoth,
aka kerin ma piny jobino lworo meni perin.
Kole Rwoth bino geto Zayon kendo,
go bino nenere i dwoŋ pere.
Go bino winjo ji pere m'ojwangi,
aka k'ocay kwayo pajo.
Weyi gime wondiki ri luse ma bino,
ŋey ji ma fodi k'onywol jowopaki Rwoth.
Rwoth oŋiyo piny wok i kabedo pere maleŋ malo,
oŋiyo piny wok i polo.
Owinjo kiuja pa jotwec,
aka ogonyo jono m'oyido joripo tho;
ŋey ji jowotuci nyinge i Zayon,
aka wopak go i Yerusalem,
ka nonin jocokere kanyacel,
gi kerin lamo Rwoth.
Rwoth oturo meni paran ma fodi athin,
aka oloko kwo paran macek.
Awi Rwoth ikir'ikwany woko kwo paran pama,
mafodi akitegino.
Awi Rwoth in ikwo cil gi cil;
Cango con icweyo piny,
aka polo obedo tic ma cingin.
jobino ti paka nangin.
Iwiro jo paka nangin,
aka jobino rwenyo.
To in ikiwire,
aka oro perin ongoye gike.
Nyithindho pa ŋecin perin jobino bedo i siem,
aka ibino kikwonga nyikway jo.
Pak Rwoth, adundo paran!
Delkwoŋan gikululu, pak nyingi go maleŋ!
Adundo paran, pak Rwoth,
aka poyi wor pere noknok.
Go cwako reco paran je,
aka cango two paran je.
Go botho kwo paran wok i bur,
aka miyan silwany gi mar pere makiwire gi wor.
Go poŋo kwo paran gi gigipiny mabeyo,
ŋey akir'ati aka abedi matek paka ango.
Rwoth thumo banja i thenge pa jom'idiyo,
aka timo rijo tiro.
Go onyutho Musa can pere,
to miyo Joisiraili neno tim pere ma meni.
go kimaki nge piyo aka opoŋ gi mar makiwire.
Go kinen reco mawan hongo je,
go kimaki nge cil gi cil.
Go kimiy wan gir'acula paka ripo,
kosa kicul wan cungo kwoŋ reco mawan kosa komo mawan.
Kole paka polo bor wok i piny,
apaka mar pere dwoŋ ri jono ma joworo go.
Paka yuwok ceŋ bor wok yupodho ceŋ,
apaka go kwanyo woko reco mawan to tero bor.
Paka ba nyithindho timo wor ri nyithindho pere,
apaka Rwoth timo wor ri jono ma joworo go.
Kole go oŋeyo nger ma wacweyer'iye,
go poyo ni wabedo fukefuke.
Paka ri nyatoro, kwo pere cal paka lum,
wadongo to wayare paka mawuwa;
kenyo koyo kudho to thwo,
to ngoye ŋata onen kendo.
To mar pa Rwoth makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
kwoŋ jono ma jolworo go,
aka bero pere bedo i luse je,
ri jono ma jokuro cikirok pere,
aka jopoyo timo Or pere.
Rwoth oketho kom pere ma dhum i polo;
obedo kere kwoŋ gigipiny je.
Pak win Rwoth, win jomalaika pere,
win ma witek ma wiluwo Or pere,
aka wiwinjo wac pere.
Pak win Rwoth, win meni ma polo,
win ŋecin pere, ma witimo mito pere!
Pak win Rwoth, win cwec pere je
kama go dhum'iye je.
Pak Rwoth, adundo paran!
Pak Rwoth, adundo paran!
Rwoth, Were paran idwoŋ!
Iruko meni gi dwoŋ;
lero othokin.
Iyaro polo paka wema.
Igeto peco perin wi pi ma malo.
I oro pondeponde paka cawila perin,
aka igweco i bwombi koyo.
gi pilin ma lithkoth paka ŋecin perin.
Iketho kindi piny m'ocwiny,
aka k'oyengere.
Iketho nam i wiye paka nanga,
aka pi oumo gote.
Munyo ibwoko pi, joringo;
joredo kadho munyo jowinjo derino ma mor koth perin.
Jomol wi gote gi milelo,
i kabedo m'icweyo rijo.
Iketho kew ma jokiripi kalo,
igeŋo jo kwoŋ umo piny.
Imiyo waŋ pi mol i milelo,
aka malawin joringo i dier tenderin.
Jomiyo ogwaŋe madudi pi;
kenyo a kama punde madudi jokweyo riyo pajo.
I wi yen macegin gi jo,
winyin jogeto od jo aka jowero.
Idhiro koth i wi tenderin wok i pondeponde,
aka piny opoŋ gi silwany perin.
Imiyo lum twi ri dhok,
gi cemo ri ji,
ŋey jowofur cemo pajo,
wonyak vini ma yomo cuny jo,
mo ma fotho waŋ jo,
gi mugat ma miyo jo meni.
Yen sida ma Lebanon jolimo pi kweth,
yen pa Rwoth ma go won opidho.
Kenyo winyin jogeto od jo;
obicin jogeto od gin i wilwindi.
Diegi ceŋ jobedo wi gote,
aka ogwaŋe ma ŋungu jopondo i gote.
Icweyo dwe nyutho ndir,
aka waŋceŋ oŋeyo sawa pere ma podho.
Icweyo mudho, aka ka piny col,
ogwaŋe je madudi jowok.
Simbwore mathindho johola ka jodwaro,
jorango cemo wok bongi Were.
Ka ceŋ owok, jodok,
aka jonindo i od gin.
Ji jokadho i tic pajo,
aka jotiyo tundo othieno.
Rwoth, tic perin thoth!
Icweyo joje i rieko perin;
piny opoŋ gi cwec perin.
Nam bor, dwoŋ aka lac,
gigipiny ma lak jonitie kenyo,
gigipiny makwo mathindho gi madongo.
aka Leviathan m'icweyo tuko i iye.
Joje joŋiyo waŋin,
imiyo jo cemo pajo i hongo ma ripo.
Imiyo jo, aka jocamo,
ipoko jo cemo, aka joyeŋ.
K'ipano waŋin, jobwok;
k'ikwanyo woko luya pajo, jotho,
aka jogik i fukefuke ma jowok'iye.
To k'imiyo jo cuny perin, jocweyere,
imiyo piny kwo manyen.
Weyi dwoŋ pa Rwoth wobedi cil gi cil;
weyi Rwoth wosangala gi gima go, ocweyo!
Go ŋiyo piny, aka piny kirin;
go geyo gote, aka joŋulo yiro.
Alawero ri Rwoth i kwo paran je;
kafodi akwo, alawero ri Were paran pak.
Weyi go wosangala gi wer paran,
kole afore i Rwoth.
Weyi worey joreco wok i piny;
aka weyi jokidakana joworweny.
Pak Rwoth, adundo paran!
Pak Rwoth.
Foy Rwoth,
tuci dwoŋ pere,
wac ri nonin gima go otieko otimo.
Wer rigo wer ma pak,
wac gir'aura ma go otieko timo.
Sangala win ni wabedo ji pere,
weyi jono ma jolamo go jowofore.
Rangi Rwoth gi meni pere,
aka lam go noknok.
Poyi tim ma gir'aura ma go otieko timo,
tim pere madongo, gi thumo banja ma go omiyo,
win nyikway Abraham ŋeca pere,
wot Yakobo, ma go oyero!
Go obedo Rwoth, Were mawan;
go thumo banja ri piny gibe.
Go poyo cikirok pere cil gi cil,
cikirok pere ri luse gana,
gi cikirok pere ri Isaka,
ri Isiraili paka cikirok ma cil gi cil,
ka waco ama: “Alamiyin lowo ma Kanan
paka adec perin alunja.”
Munyo oyido jonok i welo,
oyido josisiri, aka jowiloka i lowo ma Kanan,
jolweda wok i piny kadho i piny,
wok i ker acel kadho i ker man,
ogwoko jo, aka obwoko kerin ro jo,
ka waco ama: “Wikiri wigeyi ji paran m'awiro gi mo,
jotuci wac Were paran, wikiri witim rijo raco!”
to kwanyo woko cemo pajo je.
Yozefu m'oyido jotana paka ŋeca.
aka ŋute otwey gi majogi ma nyweny,
cuka gima go owaco otundo i kare.
Wac pa Were onyutho ni go otire.
jadhum pa nonin ogonyo go,
aka jadhum ma lim pere je,
gi dwoŋ kwoŋ jodhum pere,
kodi fonjo jomic rieko pere.
Yakobo obedo i lowo ma Ham.
aka omiyo jo bedo matek loyo jokwor pajo.
Omiyo Jomisir dak ji pere,
kodi tiyo gi jo gi gwayo.
gi Aron m'oyero.
Jotimo tim pa Were ma meni
gi gir'aura i Misir.
to Jomisir jogwenyere kwoŋ wac pere.
to miyo rec pajo tho.
Lowo pajo opoŋ ogwale,
kiri i cel pa kere.
jowura i piny pajo.
gi lithkoth m'opilin i lowo pajo je.
Onyeko yen vini pajo gi yath ma nyak nyandere,
to turo piny yen je.
bonyo mathindho ma kikwanere,
jocamo dudi je ma lowo,
to jocamo cemo je ma lowo pa pajo.
ma pecin ma Misir.
aka joje oyido jonitie gi kwo maber aka oyido jotek.
Jomisir oyido jolworo jo,
aka josangala munyo jokadho.
gi mac m'omiyo joparo wor.
aka omiyo jo cemo ma romo wok i polo.
omol i thim paka malawa.
Kole go opoyo cikirok pere maleŋ,
gi ŋeca pere Abraham.
Ameno owodho ji pere m'oyerere,
aka jowero to jokoko ri kisangala.
gi lim pajo je,
ŋey jowoluwi cik pere,
aka jowokuri or pere je.
Rwoth wopak!
Foy Rwoth, kwoŋbedo go ber;
aka mar pere kiwire cil gi cil.
Ŋa manyalo tuco gigipiny madongo je ma Rwoth otieko timo?
Ŋa manyalo miyo go pak ma romo?
Jokisangala a jono ma jotimo tiro,
ma jotimo gim'otire noknok.
Poyan, Awi Rwoth, ka ikonyo ji perin;
konyan ka igonyo jo.
Weyi anen bero pa ji perin,
aka afore i kisangala pa piny perin,
gi dwoŋ pa ji perin.
Wan gi kwarere mawan je watimo reco;
wabedo jokidakana aka joreco.
jok'odewo kwoŋ tim perin ma gir'aura;
wiy gin owil gi mar perin makiwire mathoth,
aka jogwenyere kwoŋ Were Madwoŋ loyo i Nam M'obokere.
Kucel obotho jo ro nyinge,
ŋey wonyuthi meni pere madwoŋ.
aka othwo;
otelo ji pere ŋado i lowo m'othwo.
Obotho jo wok i cingi ji m'oyido jodak jo,
aka ogonyo jo wok i cingi jakwor.
Pi omwonyo jokwor pajo,
ongoye kad'acel kwoŋ jo m'odoŋ.
aka jowero rigo pak.
To wi gin owil piyo gi gim'otimo,
aka jotimo gigipiny ma jok'okuro mic rieko pere.
aka jotemo Were.
Ameno omiyo jo gima jokwayo,
to bende dhiro two marac i dier jo.
kodi Aron ŋataleŋ pa Rwoth.
Kenyo piny oyawere to mwonyo Dathan,
aka oyiko Abiram gi peco pere.
Mac bende oloro kwoŋ ji m'oyido joluwo jo,
aka owaŋo jokidakana no.
aka jolamo cal ma zahabu m'oleny no.
Jowilo dwoŋ pa Were,
ri cal p'ogwaŋ ma camo lum.
Wi gin owil gi Were, Jaboth pajo,
m'oyido otimo gigipiny madongo i Misir.
Otimo gir'aura kenyo!
Otimo gidhier i Nam M'obokere!
Riameno owaco ni lareyo ji pere,
ma bedi Musa, ŋeca pere m'oyero k'ocungo i dier Were gi ji pere
ma geŋo nge pa Were kwoŋ reyo jo.
kwoŋbedo jok'oyeyo cikirok pa Were.
Joŋunyaŋunya i kambi pajo
aka jok'owinjo Rwoth.
Riameno otiŋo cinge malo to kwoŋere rijo,
ni lamiyo jo wotho i thim,
weyo jowotho i piny pa jopath.
aka jocamo cowirok m'omiy jom'otho.
Jokwinyo nge pa Rwoth gi tim pajo,
aka two marac obino i dier jo.
To Finehas ocungo i waŋ jo
aka thoyamo ocok.
Ipoyo gima go otimo me i nyingi go ri bero pere,
wok i luse tundo i luse cil gi cil.
aka joketho Musa ayin i teko.
Jomiyo go nge,
to luwo ma ŋete kigeŋ.
paka Rwoth oyido omiyo jo or,
jonywomere gi jo,
to jofonjere tim pajo.
Jolamo cal pajo,
m'olokere bwo rijo.
paka cowirok ri jwogere ma Kanan.
aka lowo olokere makoc gi neki.
Jolokere makoc gi tim pajo,
aka jok'obedo g'adieri ri Were.
aka ojok gi jo.
Ojwango jo i cingi nonin,
aka jokwor pajo jodhumo jo.
Jokwor jodiyo jo,
aka joketho jo i dhum pajo kicutho.
Rwoth obotho ji pere dikweth,
to joyero gwenyirok kwoŋe,
jomedo rwenyo i reco.
Kucel Rwoth owinjo jo munyo joywak,
to neno kidamba pajo.
Ro jo, opoyo cikirok pere,
aka onyutho wor cungo kwoŋ mar pere makiwire mathoth.
Omiyo ji ma jodiyo jo,
mako gi jo wor.
aka dwoki wan wok i dier nonin
ŋey wafoyin,
to wapako nyingin maleŋ.
Pak Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili,
pak go pama gi cil gi cil!
Weyi kisi nyatoro wowaci ni, “Ameno!”
Rwoth wopak!
mar pere kiwire cil gi cil.
Weyi jom'oyeyo i Rwoth jowowaci ameno,
jono ma go obotho wok i teko,
aka ocoko wok i piny pa jopath,
wok yuwok ceŋ gi yupodho ceŋ,
wok yumalo gi yupiny.
Jomegi jolera i thim,
jok'onwaŋo royo ma kadho i tindi madwoŋ ma jobed'iye.
Kec gi riyo pi oneko jo,
aka jolacere.
Kenyo joywak ri Rwoth i teko pajo,
aka ogonyo jo kwoŋ kidamba pajo;
otelo jo i royo m'otire,
cuka jotundo i tindi madwoŋ ma jonyalo bed'iye.
Weyi jowofoy Rwoth ro mar pere makiwire,
ro tim pere ma gir'aura rijo.
Kole go yeŋo ji ma riyo neko jo,
aka miyo joma kec neko gigipiny maber.
Jomegi jobedo i mudho gi i twec,
jotwec ma jocandere i lijegere,
kole oyido jogwenyere kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth ma jameni je,
to jokwero fonji pere.
Jool gi tic matek,
jopodho piny to ngoye ŋat'okony jo.
Kenyo joywak ri Rwoth i teko pajo,
aka obotho jo wok i kidamba pajo,
owodho jo wok i mudho gi twec,
to turo lijegere pajo mathindho.
Weyi jowofoy Rwoth ro mar pere makiwire,
ro tim pere ma gir'aura rijo.
Kole go turo piny thigin ma ywel,
aka ŋinyo cumin ma nyweny.
Jomegi jotwo ro reco pajo,
aka jociro litho ro raco pajo,
waŋ gin oyido kinen cemo
aka jobedo cegin gi tho.
Kenyo joywak ri Rwoth i teko pajo,
aka obotho jo wok i kidamba pajo,
odhiro wac pere to botho two pajo,
aka ogonyo jo kwoŋ rerok.
Weyi jowofoy Rwoth ro mar pere makiwire,
ro tim pere ma gir'aura rijo.
Joripo foyo go gi cowirok
to jotuco tim pere gi wer ma kisangala.
Jomegi jocewere i Nam i mel,
rango nger ma kwo i nam.
Joneno tim pa Rwoth,
tic pere ma gir'aura i nam.
Kole owodho or to koyo ma dimeni cako kudho,
aka otiŋo asur i nam.
Mel otiŋere malo i koyo,
to munyere i lutho.
I teko nger no jocewirok meni oloyo jo;
jocer to jotangatanga pa jomero,
aka rieko pajo ongoye kony.
Kenyo joywak ri Rwoth i teko pajo
aka obotho jo wok i kidamba pajo;
omiyo asur kwe,
aka derino pi okwe.
Josangala kwoŋbedo nam okwe,
aka Rwoth okelo jo maber kiri kam'oyido jomito.
Weyi jowofoy Rwoth ro mar pere makiwire,
ro tim pere ma gir'aura rijo.
Joripo waco dwoŋ pere i cokirok pa ji,
to jopako go i cokirok pa jotel.
Rwoth omiyo malawa thwo kicutho,
aka ojuko waŋ pi mol.
Omiyo lowo maber olokere thim ma cumbi,
ro kidakana pa ji m'oyido jobedo kenyo.
Rwoth loko opalipat kidiwin ma pi,
aka loko lowo m'othwo waŋ pi ma mol.
Go miyo joma kec neko bedo kenyo,
aka joget'iye tindi ma bed'iye.
Jocwoyo ndelin aka jopidho yen vini
to jonwaŋo cemo kweth.
Omiyo jo silwany aka jonywolo nyithindho kweth;
aka kiwey dhok pajo womojere.
Ka okengila ji pa Were aka oloy jo
cungo kwoŋ adica, teko, gi rembo,
tero ji ma jodiyo jo gi cay,
aka miyo jo kilera i kwoyo ma thim.
To go botho ŋata bu gimoro wok i kidamba,
to miyo pecin pajo nyay paka mwendi.
Joma timo gim'otire joneno to josangala,
to jokidakana je imiyo jo liŋ.
Ŋatariek je wopar kwoŋ gigipiny me;
aka wodew kwoŋ mar pa Rwoth makiwire.
Cunyan ocwiny, Awi Were, cunyan ocwiny,
alawero, t'apakin.
Cew, adundo paran!
Alacew gi tongol kodi dingidi!
Alacew i ŋamba.
Alafoyin, Awi Rwoth, i dier nonin.
Alapakin i dier ji.
Kole mar perin makiwire bor loyo polo,
aka adieri perin tundo i pondeponde.
Nyuthi meni perin i pondeponde, Awi Were,
aka weyi dwoŋ perin wobedi i piny gibe.
Both wan gi meni perin, dwoki kwayo paran,
ŋey ji m'imaro jowobothi.
Were otieko ciko i ot pere ni,
“Alatiako Sekem i loyo,
t'apoko milelo ma Sukoth ri ji paran.
Giliad obedo aparan; Manase obedo aparan;
Efrayim obedo junga paran;
aka Yuda luth paran.
Mowab obedo galaya paran ma lwoki,
aka kwoŋ Edom abolo war paran,
kwoŋ Filistia akoko i loyo.”
Ŋa m'okelan i tindi madwoŋ m'otinda?
Ŋa m'otelan i Edom?
Adieri ijwango wan, Awi Were?
Ikilaŋanjo gi jolweny mawan?
Kony wan kwoŋ jakwor,
kole kony pa dhano bukony.
Gi Were yuthenge mawan walaloyo,
go lakikengila jokwor mawan.
Ikir'iliŋ, Awi Were m'apako.
Kole jokidakana gi jotwodo jomonjan.
Jowaco twodo kwoŋan,
aka joluwo raco kwoŋan,
jomonjan m'ongoye atoŋa.
Jokiyere kodan, makada nende anyutho jo mar,
kucel akwayo rijo.
Ameno joculan raco ri bero,
dakirok ri mar.
Jowaco ni woyeri jakidakana wothum rigo banja;
weyi jakwor pere won wosegeya go.
Ka oosa go weyi wonwaŋi kwoŋe banja,
aka kiri kwayo pere je okwan paka reco.
weyi ŋatiman woter tic pere.
Weyi nyithindho pere jowobedi kic
aka cege wobedi citho.
Weyi nyithindho pere jowolera aka jowokwayere,
weyi woriem jo wok i gunda ma jobed'iye.
Weyi ji ma jobanja go jowomaki gigipiny pere je,
aka weyi jokicar jowonyaga gim'otieko tiyo to limo je.
Wongoye ŋata wotim gi go wor,
kosa wodew kwoŋ nyithindho kic m'owey cen.
Weyi nyikwaye je jowotho,
aka weyi nyinge worweny i luse ma luwo.
Weyi Rwoth wopoy reco pa kwarere pere,
aka wokiri wocwaki reco pa min.
Weyi Rwoth wopoy reco pajo noknok,
aka jo wegi wokiri wopoy jo i piny.
Kole jalo k'oparo kwoŋ nyutho wor,
to ocando to neko,
jocandi, ji ma bu gimoro, kodi ji manyap.
Oyido omaro kwoŋirok, weyi lam wobin kwoŋe.
Oyido odak miyo silwany, weyi wobedi bor gine.
Oruko kwoŋe lam paka ruk pere,
weyi wobile kwoŋe paka pi,
paka mo i cokin pere.
Weyi wobedi paka nanga ma mino kwoŋe,
paka dende ma tweyo kisi ndelo.
Rwoth, miy jokwor paran gir'acula ameno,
jono ma joluwo raco kwoŋan.
To in, Awi Rwoth, Rwoth paran,
osa ran ro nyingin,
aka bothan ro bero ma mar perin makiwire.
Kole ajacandi, aka abu gimoro,
litho nitie i cunyan.
Arwenyo paka tipo othieno,
aduny paka bonyo.
Congan nyap ro ngoye pa cemo,
delkwoŋan odoŋ pien gi cokin.
ka jonenan, joyengo wi gin.
Konyan, Awi Rwoth Were paran!
Bothan cungo kwoŋ mar perin makiwire.
Weyi jowoŋey ni me cingin;
in Rwoth, iŋat'itieko timo.
Weyi jowokwoŋ, t'ilamiyo silwany.
Weyi jomisegey paran wi gin wokwoti, aka weyi ŋeca perin wosangala.
Weyi wi jokwor paran wokwoti,
weyi joworuki wickwot pajo paka kanzu.
Alamiyo Rwoth foyo madwoŋ maloyo gi dhokan.
Alapako go i dier cokirok madwoŋ pa ji.
Kole go gwoko jocandi,
aka botho jo kwoŋ ji ma jothumo rijo banja ma tho.
“Bedi i cingan maracuc,
cuka aketho jokwor perin i par tiendin.”
Rwoth dhiro wok i Zayon,
luth perin matek.
Dhumo i dier jokwor perin!
I ndelo ma meni perin onyuthere iye,
ji perin wegi jolamiyere rin.
Paka thoyo ma ŋamba,
cwo perin ma nyaka joay jolabino, bongin i wi tendere maleŋ.
aka kilawiro paro pere.
Ibedo kere ma cil gi cil
luwo kwoŋ Melikizedek.
Rwoth nitie i cingin maracuc,
go bino kikengila kerin i ndelo ma keme pere.
Go bino thumo banja ri nonin,
to poŋo kalweny gi delkwoŋ ji m'otho;
go bino kikengila kerin je ma piny.
Kere bino madho pi ma wok i waŋ pi ma thengi royo,
to cungo gi loyo.
Pak Rwoth!
Abino foyin Rwoth gi cunyan je,
i cokirok pa ji.
Tic pa Rwoth dwoŋ,
jono je ma josangala gine jomito niaŋ.
Tic pere opoŋ dwoŋ gi meni,
aka go timo gim'otire cil gi cil.
Rwoth omiyo wan poyo tic pere ma gir'aura;
go nitie gi wor kodi wor.
Go miyo jono ma jolamo go cemo;
go poyo cikirok pere.
Rwoth onyutho ji pere meni ma tic pere,
gi miyo jo lowo pa jopath.
Tic ma cingi go mar'adieri aka nigi tiro;
Or pere je genere,
jobedo i hongo je;
omiy jo iy'adieri gi i nger m'otire.
Rwoth ogonyo ji pere;
to timo cikirok ma cil gi cil gi jo.
Nyinge leŋ aka nigi meni!
jono ma joluwo Or pere jonigi niaŋ maber.
Wopak go cil gi cil.
Pak Rwoth!
Jasilwany a ŋata lworo Rwoth,
ŋata winjo maber luwo Or pere.
Nyikwaye jobino bedo jomeni i piny;
luse pa joma timo gim'otire jobino bedo gi silwany.
Peco pere bino bedo gi lim kodi ŋaŋo;
aka bino kiyindira cil gi cil.
Ŋataber cal lero i mudho;
jawor, jakisa, aka timo gim'otire.
Jasilwany a ŋata cunye yom aka kopa ji,
aka timo mitan pere iy'adieri.
Kole joma timo gim'otire jokibino yengere,
ibino poyo jo cil gi cil.
Go kibwoki winjo wac marac;
cunye ocwiny, aka ketho geno pere i Rwoth.

awaco ri Yerusalem ni, “Siem wobedi kodin!”
Ro Ot pa Rwoth Were mawan,
abino rango bero perin.
Atiŋo waŋan bongin,
i polo kama idhum'iye.
Paka waŋ ŋeca,
ŋiyo cingi jadwoŋ pere,
paka waŋ japidi,
ŋiyo cingi dhakodwoŋ pere,
ameno walamedo ŋiyin Awi Rwoth Were mawan,
cuka imako gi wan wor.
Maki wor gi wan, Awi Rwoth, maki wor;
oter wan gi cay m'oasere.
Joŋaŋo joasa ŋalo wan,
aka jodelok jodiyo wan gi cay.
Kabedi Rwoth oyido k'obedo i thenge mawan,
dwoki, awi Isiraili!
Kabedi Rwoth k'obedo i thenge mawan,
munyo jokwor mawan jomonjo wan,
dinyo jomwonyo wan makwo,
munyo nge pajo oliel kwoŋ wan;
dinyo mikula pi omol gi wan,
dinyo pi omwonyo wan,
t'asur pi munyo wan.
Pak win Rwoth,
ma k'oweyo jokwor mawan reyo wan.
Wabudhere paka winyo,
wok i bwo pa jaciko,
bwo otur,
aka wabudhere.
Kony mawan nitie i nyingi Rwoth,
m'ocweyo polo gi piny.
Joma joketho geno i Rwoth jocale got Zayon,
ma kiyengere, to ridhere cil gi cil.
Paka gote othoko Yerusalem,
apaka Rwoth thoko ji pere,
wok pama kadho yuwaŋe cil gi cil.
Jokidakana jokiladhumo piny pa joma timo gim'otire,
ŋey joma timo gim'otire jokiri jowotimi gimarac.
Tim bero, Awi Rwoth ri jono ma jotimo bero,
gi ri jono ma cuny gin olony.
To miy jokidakana gir'acula,
miy gir'acula ri ji ma jojwango yo perin.
Siem wobedi gi Isiraili!
Munyo Rwoth odwoko wan i Yerusalem,
ocale pa oyido waleko!
Dhok wan opoŋ nyero,
to lew wan poŋ koko ma kisangala.
Kenyo nonin man jowaco ni,
“Rwoth otimo gimadwoŋ rijo.”
Rwoth otimo gimadwoŋ riwan,
aka wasangala.
Rwoth, dwoki wan i lowo mawan kendo,
paka koth dwoko pi i lowo opalipat yupiny ma Kanan.
Weyi jono ma jocwoyo gi pigi waŋ jo,
jowokec gi koko ma kisangala.
Jono ma jokadho gi kodhi acwoya,
munyo joywak,
jobino dwoko pecin pajo gi koko ma kisangala,
munyo jotiŋo keco pajo.
Ka Rwoth k'ogeto ot,
tic pa jogeto ngoye kony,
ka Rwoth k'okwonga tindi madwoŋ,
jokur jongoye kony.
Ongoye kony mondo cew,
t'igalo donjo nindo,
camo mugat ma tic matek,
kole Rwoth miyo ji ma go omaro nindo.
Nyithindho jobedo mic ma wok bongi Rwoth,
jobedo silwany ma ici mar'adieri.
Wot jacwo ma soye,
jocale aserin i cingi jalweny.
Jasilwany a ŋata nitie g'aserin kweth no.
Kilakikengila go,
k'oromo gi jokwor pere i waŋkac.
Jasilwany a ŋata lworo Rwoth,
ma wotho i yo pere.
Tic perin lamiyin gim'imito,
ilakisangala, aka gigipiny lakadho rin maber.
Dhako perin labedo paka vini ma nyak i peco perin,
aka nyithindho perin jolacale yen oliv ma nyaka dongo thoko meza perin.
Ameno apaka ŋata lworo Rwoth,
bino limo silwany.
Rwoth womiyin silwany wok i Zayon.
Weyi ineni bero pa Yerusalem,
i kwo perin je.
Weyi ineni nyikwayin!
Siem wobedi gi Isiraili.
Noknok imonjan wok i soye paran,
weyi Isiraili wowaci pama ni,
noknok imonjan wok i soye paran,
kucel jokikengila an.
Jotoŋo adhola m'odheth i dieŋeyan,
to joloko ndelo m'ofur.
To Rwoth timo gim'otire;
ogonyan kwoŋ twec.
Weyi jono ma jodak Zayon,
wiy gin wokwoti aka woriem jo.
Weyi jowocal lum ma twi i wi ot,
aka thwo mafodi k'odongo,
ongoye ŋat'ocoki,
kosa otwey i wic.
Kucel ongoye ŋata luwo m'owaci ni,
“Silwany pa Rwoth wobedi kodin!
Wamiyin silwany i nyingi Rwoth!”
Wok i lutho ma pal cunyan, aywak rin, Awi Rwoth.
Winji dwondan, Awi Rwoth,
ciki ithin iwinji,
ywak paran ri kony!
Kabedi in, Rwoth, ipoy reco mawan,
ŋa m'oyido nyalo both thumo banja perin?
T'icwako reco,
aka am'omiyo wolworin.
Akuro Rwoth, adundo paran kuro Rwoth,
aka ageno wac pere.
Adundo paran kuro Rwoth,
loyo jokur ma jokiyo ŋamba,
loyo jokur ma jokiyo ŋamba.
Isiraili, kethi geno i Rwoth,
kwoŋbedo mar pere kiwire,
aka go nitie gi meni madwoŋ ma botho.
kwoŋ reco pere je.
Rwoth, aweyo delok paran,
aka awire kwoŋ gero paran.
Akidew kwoŋ gigipiny madongo,
kosa matek ran.
Kwanyowoko amwole aka anitie i siem.
Paka nyathi nindo m'oliŋ i cingi yok mere,
ameno apaka cunyan oliŋ.
Isiraili, kethi geno i Rwoth
pama kodi cil gi cil.
Awi Rwoth, poyi Daudi,
gi teko je m'ociro.
Poyi cikirok ma go otimo,
kwoŋirok m'otimo rin, Were Majameni pa Yakobo ni,
“Akibino donjo i ot paran,
kosa i kanindo paran,
akibino ywomirok kosa nindo,
cuka ageto ot ri Rwoth,
Were Majameni pa Yakobo.”
aka wanwaŋo i sa ma Yar.
Wawaco ni, “Weyi wakadhi i Ot pa Rwoth;
weyi walam ruwaŋ kom pere ma dhum.”
Ay, Rwoth, aka ikidhi i ot perin gi Kakan ma Cikirok,
ranyuth ma meni perin,
aka ibedi ka cil gi cil.
Weyi jocway ri Were i wi migam perin jowotimi gim'otire;
weyi ji perin jowokoki ri kisangala!
Itimo cikirok ri ŋeca perin Daudi;
ikir'ikwer kere perin m'iyero, Awi Rwoth.
cikirok m'ikibino wiro ni;
“Abino ketho acel kwoŋ wotin kere,
aka ladhumo yuŋeyin.
Ka wotin jokur cikirok paran,
gi cik m'amiyo jo,
wot jo bende jolalunjin paka kere i hongo je.”
Kole Rwoth otieko yero Zayon,
mito loko kabedo pere.
Me kaywomirok paran ma cil gi cil,
me kama alabed'iye paka amito.
Alamiyo Zayon ŋaŋo kweth gi gima go mito je;
alamiyo jocandi pere jowoyeŋ gi cemo.
Alamiyo jocway ri Were i wi migam pere silwany i gima jotimo je,
aka ji pere jolawero to jokoko ri kisangala.
alakuro dhum pa kere paran m'ayero.
Alaruko jokwor pere gi wickwot,
to go labedo kere m'opoŋ gi dwoŋ.
Nga obedo gimaber aka ŋon,
ka ji pa Were jobed'iy'acel!
Cal mo ma welo,
ma mol wok i wi Aron gi ye tike,
loro piny i tok kanzu pere.
Cal thoyo wi got Hamon,
ma podho i riete ma Zayon.
Kole kenyo ama Rwoth ociko silwany pere,
kwo m'ongoye gi gike.
Biye, pak win Rwoth,
win ŋecin pa Rwoth,
ma jotiyo i ot pere wor.
Tiŋi win cingi win i kwayo i Ot pa Were,
aka pak win Rwoth!
Weyi Rwoth, m'ocweyo polo gi piny,
womiy win silwany wok i Zayon.
Pak win Rwoth!
Pak win nyingi Rwoth,
win ŋecin pa Rwoth pak win go.
Win ma wicungo i Ot pa Rwoth,
i diedipo ma Ot pa Were mawan.
Pak win Rwoth, kwoŋbedo Rwoth ber,
wer win ri nyinge, kwoŋbedo go jakisa.
Kole Rwoth otieko yero Yakobo rigo won,
Isiraili paka lim pere won.
Kole aŋeyo ni Rwoth dwoŋ,
Rwoth mawan dwoŋ loyo werin je.
Go timo gimoro je m'amito,
i polo gi piny,
i name gi pendi piny.
Go ama miyo pondeponde gulo i witum ma piny,
go timo lithkoth ri koth,
to wodho koyo wok i udi pere ma kan.
Go am'oneko okayin i Misir,
ji g'ogwaŋe parom.
Go odhiro ranyuth gi gir'aura
i dier win, awi Misir,
kwoŋ Farawo gi ŋecin pere je.
Go oreyo woko nonin kweth,
to neko kerin ma jomeni,
Sihon kere pa Joamor,
Og kere ma Basan, gi kerin man ma Kanan,
to miyo lowo pajo paka gir'alunja,
gir'alunja ri ji pere Isiraili.
Nyingin, Awi Rwoth, yindira cil gi cil,
luse je lapoyin.
Kole Rwoth lathielo ji pere,
to bedo gi mar kwoŋ ŋecin pere.
tic ma cingi dhano.
Jonitie gi dhok gin, to jokiluwi,
jonitie gi waŋ gin, to jokinen,
jonitie gi ithi gin, to jokiwinji,
luya ongoye i dhok gin.
Joma timo jo,
gi joma geno i jo,
jolacale gi jo.
Awi ot pa Isiraili pak Rwoth,
Awi ot pa Aron pak Rwoth.
Awi ot pa Levi, pak Rwoth;
win ma wilworo Rwoth pak win go!
Rwoth wopak i Zayon,
go ma bedo i Yerusalem!
Rwoth wopak!
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Miy win foyo ri Were pa werin,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Miy win foyo ri Rwoth pa rwodhe,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Go won kende ma timo gir'aura madongo,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
waŋceŋ dhumo odieceŋ,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
dwe gi micalin dhumo wor,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
gi cinge matek kodi bade ma meni,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
omiyo Joisiraili luwo i diere,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
to kengila Farawo gi jolweny pere i Nam M'obokere,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Go m'otelo ji pere i thim,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Go m'oneko kerin madongo,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
to neko kerin m'oŋeyere,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
to miyo lowo pajo paka gir'alunja,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
gir'alunja ri Isiraili ŋeca pere,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Go am'opoyo wan ma wasisiri,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil,
to botho wan kwoŋ jokwor mawan,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Go m'amiyo cemo ri gima kwo je,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Awi, miy foyo ri Were ma i polo,
kole mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil.
Gi thengi malawin ma Babilon,
kenyo wabedo piny to waywak,
munyo wapoyo Zayon.
I jangi yen ma kanyago,
waŋawo tongol mawan.
Kole kenyo jom'omako wan,
jomito ni wawer rijo,
aka joma cando wan jowaco riwan ni,
“Wer win riwan acel kwoŋ wer ma Zayon!”
Wanower nedi wer pa Rwoth,
i piny pa jopath?
Ka wiyan owil kodin, awi Yerusalem,
weyi cingan maracuc wolimi nyaŋinya!
Weyi lewan womok i dandan,
ka wiyan owil kodin,
k'akiketho Yerusalem malo ma kisangala paran maloyo.
Poyi, Awi Rwoth, kwoŋ Joedom
ndelo ma podho pa Yerusalem,
paka jowaco ni, “Reyi woko, reyi woko!
Wopodhi kiri i kindi mere!”
Jasilwany a ŋata culo kwoŋin,
kwor ro gima witieko timo riwan!
Silwany bino bedo ri ŋata kwanyo, nyithindho perin to ŋidho jo kwoŋ tele.
Amiyin foyo, Awi Rwoth, gi cunyan je,
ruwaŋ werin awero pak perin.
Akule piny yu ot perin maleŋ,
t'amiyo foyo ri nyingin,
ro mar perin makiwire gi genirok perin.
Kole iŋat'itiŋo malo nyingin gi wac perin loyo kisi gimoro.
I ndelo m'alwoŋin, idwokan,
idwoko meni ma cunyan.
Kerin je ma i piny jolapakin, Awi Rwoth,
kole jotieko winjo wac ma wok i dhokin
Jolawero kwoŋ tim pa Rwoth,
Kole dwoŋ pa Rwoth nimalo.
Kole kada Rwoth oŋawere,
go paro kwoŋ ji masisiri,
to ŋeyo jodelok gi bor.
Makada nende awotho i dier teko,
iŋat'ikuro kwo paran,
iŋat'iyaro cingin kwoŋ keme pa jokwor paran;
aka cingin maracuc bothan.
Rwoth laketho i kare atoŋa pere ran,
mar perin makiwire, Awi Rwoth, bedo cil gi cil,
ikir'ijwangi tic ma cingin.
Awi Rwoth, itieko menyan t'iŋeyan!
Iŋeyo k'abedo piny gi k'acungo;
imenyo paro paran gi bor.
Imenyo woth paran gi k'anindo,
aka iŋeyo tim paran je.
Mafodi lewan k'otuco wac,
neni, Awi Rwoth, iŋeyo joje.
Ithokan i kisi thenge,
aka ipanan i cingin.
Nger niaŋ no obedo ma gir'aura swa ran,
oŋawere swa, yombo niaŋ paran.
Anopondi kune kwoŋ cunyin,
kosa anoringi kune ruwaŋin!
K'aidho i polo, initie kenyo,
k'anindo i piny pa jom'otho, initie kenyo.
K'adwire woko yombo yuwok ceŋ,
kosa abedi kamabor loyo yupodho ceŋ,
kiri kenyo je cingin latelan,
to cingin maracuc makan.
K'awaco ni, “Weyi mudho kende wouman,
to lero m'othokan bedo wor,
kiri mudho kicol rin,
wor ler paka odieceŋ,
kole mudho rom gi lero rin.”
Kole iŋat'icweyo kisi adec ma delkwoŋan,
iŋat'ikwoyan kanyacel i iy mama.
Apakin, kole iŋat'iripo alwora aka itimo gir'aura.
Tic perin obedo ma gir'aura,
iŋat'iŋeyan maber swa.
Munyo icweyo cokin paran,
m'oketh kanyacel maber i iy mama
munyo adongo kenyo nyaliŋliŋ,
iŋeyo ni oyido anitie kenyo.
Inenan mafodi k'onywolan.
Ndelo je m'imiyan
oyido otiek ndiko i kitawo perin,
mafodi jo k'ocakere.
Awi Were, nga tek ran niaŋ paro perin!
Je rom nedi!
Bedi akwan jo, di joloyo kwoyo,
k'acew, fodi anitie bongin.
Awi Were neni paka akwayo swa ni ineki ran jokidakana!
Nga akwayo ni jogwayo joweyere kendan!
Jono ma joluwo gikidakana kwoŋin,
joluwo reco kwoŋ nyingin.
Awi Rwoth nga dak jono ma jodakin!
Nga acayo jono ma jogwenyere kwoŋin!
Adaki jo kicutho,
atero jo paka jokwor paran.
Menyan, Awi Were, aka iŋey cunyan!
Teman aka iŋey paro paran!
Neni ka nitie tim moro ma kidakana kwoŋan,
aka itelan i yo ma cil gi cil.
Bothan, Awi Rwoth, kwoŋ ji mareco;
kuran maber kwoŋ jogwayo,
ma jocano reco i cuny jo,
to jotugila lweny noknok.
aka dhok jo nitie kwir ma cal apa malasaŋ.
Kwonga an, Awi Rwoth kwoŋ cingi jokidakana;
kwonga an kwoŋ ji magway,
ma jotieko timo can ma camo tiendan gi piny.
Jogero jotieko ciko an g'apor malo,
jotieko ciko bwo ma makan i thengi royo.
Awaco ri Rwoth ni, “Ibedo Were paran;
ciki ithin iwinji ywak paran, Awi Rwoth!”.
Awi Rwoth, Rwoth paran, jaboth paran ma jameni,
iŋat'iumo wiyan i hongo ma lweny.
Ikir'iwinji, Awi Rwoth, awanya pa jokidakana;
ikir'iyey jowomedere gi can pajo mareco.
Jono ma jothokan jotiŋo wiy gin malo,
weyi paro ma colo manitie i dhok jo wogiki rijo.
Weyi cuk mac m'odheth wopodhi kwoŋ jo,
weyi jowoyikere i bur, jokiri jowocerino kendo.
Weyi jar'awaca nyingi jokiri jowokwo i piny;
weyi reco wokengila jogwayo i yoto.
Aŋeyo ni Rwoth thielo ŋata nitie i litho,
aka thumo banja gi tiro ri jacandi.
Adieri jom'otire jolafoyo nyingin;
ji mabeyo jolabedo ruwaŋin.
Alwoŋin, Awi Rwoth, redi bongan,
winjan, k'alwoŋin.
gi tiŋo cingan malo paka cowirok m'othieno.
Gwok dhokan, Awi Rwoth,
mwon dhokan wokiri woyawere.
Ikir'iwir cunyan timo reco moro je,
gi oro kwo paran timo gikidakana,
i kitipa pa ji ma jotimo reco,
aka ikir'iyey acem i kalima pajo.
Weyi ŋataber wocwadan kosa woyetan i wor,
to ikir'iyey mo pa jakidakana wowir i wiyan;
kole kwayo paran noknok mako kwoŋ tim ma kidakana pajo.
K'okethi jo i cingi jono ma jobino thumo ri ji banja,
nyaka jolaŋeyo ni wac pa Rwoth obedo adieri.
Paka tele ma dhano tiŋo to baro piny,
apaka cokin pajo ilabaro i dhok piny pa jom'otho.
To waŋan ŋiyin, Awi Rwoth Were,
arango kapondo bongin,
ikir'iwey atho!
Bothan kwoŋ mitego ma jociko ran,
gi bwo pa joreco!
Weyi jokidakana jowopodhi kanyacel i bwo pajo wegi,
kareno akwale m'ongoye litho.
atiŋo dwondan ywakirok ri Rwoth.
Akonjo woko kigeŋisa paran rigo,
awaco rigo teko paran.
Ka cunyan podho,
iŋat'iŋeyo royo paran!
I royo m'awoth'iye
jociko mitego ran.
Awire yuracuc t'aneno,
to ongoye ŋata paro kwoŋan,
angoye gi kapondo,
ongoye dhano ma paro kwoŋan.
Aywak rin, Awi Rwoth,
awaco ni iŋat'ibedo kapondo paran,
adec paran i piny pa ji makwo.
Winji ywak paran,
kole olacan piny swa!
Bothan kwoŋ ji ma jomiyan litho,
kole jotek swa loyan!
Wodhan i twec,
ŋey anyal miyo foyo ri nyingin!
Ji mabeyo jolathokan,
kole ilateran gi bero.
Winji kwayo paran, Awi Rwoth;
ciki ithin ri ywak paran!
I genirok perin dwokan i tiro perin!
kole ongoye dhano ma kwo m'otire ruwaŋin.
Kole jakwor otieko rieman,
otieko ŋinyo kwo paran piny,
otieko miyan bedo i mudho,
pa ŋat'otho cango.
Riameno cunyan podho i iyan,
adundo paran oŋedhere i iyan.
Apoyo hongo macon,
aparo kwoŋ gim'itieko timo,
aparo kwoŋ gima cingin otieko timo.
Ayaro rin cingan je woko,
cunyan riyo neko rin paka piny m'opalipat.
Ikir'igal gi dwokan, Awi Rwoth!
Cunyan podho!
Ikir'ipan ran waŋin,
rupiri anyalo bedo paka jono ma jokadho piny i bur.
Weyi awinji kwoŋ mar perin makiwire odikin,
kole aketho geno paran i in.
Fonjan royo m'aripo luwo,
kole atiŋo adundo paran rin.
Bothan, Awi Rwoth, kwoŋ jokwor paran!
Atieko ringo bongin ni ipanan!
Fonjan timo gim'iyenyo,
kole iŋat'ibedo Were paran!
Weyi cunyin maber wotelan i royo ma bu teko.
Ro bero ma nyingin, Awi Rwoth, both kwo paran!
I tiro perin wodhan i teko!
Aka i mar perin makiwire neki jokwor paran,
reyi woko jokwor paran je,
kole abedo ŋeca perin.
Rwoth wopak, tele paran,
ma fonjo cingan ri lweny,
gi lwet cingan lwenyo.
Go obedo tele paran gi kapondo paran,
kapondo paran gi jaboth paran,
kwot paran, m'apondo bonge,
go ketho nonin i dhum pere.
kosa wod dhano m'iparo kwoŋe?
Dhano cal luya,
ndelo pere rere paka tipo.
Bar pondeponde perin, Awi Rwoth, ilor piny!
Gey gote jowonyal wodho yiro!
Dhiri pilin pa lithkoth t'ikedho jokwor perin,
dhiri aserin perin t'imiyo jo ŋwec!
Riey cingin wok i ŋawirok,
bothan, iwodhan wok i pi maluth,
bothan wok i cingi jopath.
Ji ma dhok gin luwo twodo,
ji ma jotiŋo malo cingi gin maracuc twodo.
Alawero wer manyen rin, Awi Were;
alatuko rin tongol ma thondhe apar.
Iŋat'imiyo loyo ri kerin,
iŋat'ibotho Daudi ŋeca perin.
Bothan kwoŋ abor mager,
bothan wok i cingi jopath,
ji ma dhok gin luwo twodo,
ji ma jotiŋo cingi gin maracuc twodo.
Weyi wot wan i soye pajo jowobedi paka cemo m'otieko dongo,
nyithindho mawan manyir jowobedi paka sirin ma sonda,
m'oranda ma geto peco pa kere.
Weyi dere mawan wopoŋ gi cemo nger gi nger;
weyi rombo mawan jowonywol gana gi gana,
jowonywol digana apar i ndelin mawan.
Weyi dhok mawan jowonywol nyithindhi jo kweth,
m'ongoye ma iye wopodho woko kosa ma k'onyalo colo nyathi;
weyi ywak ma kidamba wongoye i royin mawan!
Jokisangala a jono ma nger silwany no podho kwoŋ jo!
Jokisangala a jono ma Were pajo obedo Rwoth!
Alatuco dwoŋ perin, Were paran gi Kere paran,
t'apako nyingin cil gi cil
Kisi ndelo alafoyin,
t'apako nyingin cil gi cil.
Rwoth dwoŋ, aka iripo pako go gi pak ma malo,
aka dwoŋ pere kiniaŋere.
Luse acel lapako tic perin ri luse man,
aka latito tim perin ma meni.
Alaluwo kwoŋ dwoŋ gi meni perin,
t'aparo kwoŋ tic perin ma gir'aura.
Ji jolatuco meni ma tim perin ma kiwacere,
t'atito dwoŋ perin.
Jolaluwo kwoŋ bero perin je,
to jowero gi dwondi jo ma malo kwoŋ timo ŋono perin.
Rwoth obedo jamar aka timo ŋono,
kimaki nge piyo aka opoŋ gi mar makiwire.
Rwoth ber ri ji je,
aka nyutho mar ri gimoro je ma go ocweyo.
Tic perin je lafoyin, Awi Rwoth,
aka ji perin je lapakin!
Jolaluwo kwoŋ dwoŋ ma ker perin, to joluwo kwoŋ meni perin,
m'amiyo ji ŋeyo tim perin ma gir'aura,
gi dwoŋ ma ker perin.
Ker perin obedo ker ma cil gi cil,
aka dhum perin bedo i luse je.
Rwoth genere i wac pere je,
aka jawor i tim pere je.
Rwoth thielo ji ma jopodho je,
to tiŋo malo jom'ofodere piny.
Waŋ kisi gimoro ŋiyin,
aka iŋat'imiyo jo cemo pajo i hongo ma ripo.
Iyawo cingin,
t'iyeŋo mito pa kisi gima kwo je.
Rwoth otire i tim pere je,
aka jakisa i gimoro je ma go timo.
Rwoth bedo cegin gi ji je ma jolwoŋo go,
ri joje ma jolwoŋo go iy'adieri.
Go ketho i kare mito pa ji ma lworo go je,
go bende winjo ywak pajo, to botho jo.
Rwoth botho jom'omaro go je;
to jokidakana je go lareyo woko.
Dhokan laluwo kwoŋ pak pa Rwoth,
aka weyi cwec pere je jowopaki nyinge maleŋ cil gi cil.
Pak Rwoth!
Adundo paran, pak Rwoth!
Alapako Rwoth tekin fodi akwo;
alawero pak ri Were kafodi aywe.
Wikiri wikethi geno mewin i jodhum,
i wod dhano, ma kony ongoye bonge.
K'omay luya to dok i piny pere;
i ndelo no won, can pere je sika woko.
Jakisangala a ŋata kony pere obedo Were pa Yakobo,
ŋata geno pere nitie i Rwoth Were pere,
nam gi gimoro je manitie i jo;
ŋata kuro yeyo cil gi cil.
Go timo tiro ri jom'idiyo,
to miyo cemo ri joma kec neko,
Rwoth gonyo jom'otwey.
Rwoth yawo waŋ joma waŋ gin otho.
Rwoth tiŋo malo joma jopodho,
Rwoth omaro joma timo gim'otire.
Rwoth kuro jopath,
go konyo citho gi nyithindho kic;
to yo pa jakidakana go sika woko.
Rwoth ladhumo cil gi cil,
Were perin, awi Zayon, tundo i luse je.
Rwoth wopak!
Pak Rwoth!
Kole ber wer pak ri Were mawan,
kole go ber, aka otire wero pak rigo.
Rwoth geto Yerusalem,
go coko ji ma jonitie woko ma piny Isiraili.
Go botho ji ma cuny gin otur,
to tweyo adholin pajo.
Rwoth ama ridho welo ma micalin,
to miyo joje nyingi jo.
Rwoth mawan dwoŋ, aka thoth gi meni;
niaŋ pere kipimere.
Rwoth tiŋo malo jomamwol,
to ŋinyo jokidakana piny.
Wer ri Rwoth gi foyo,
wer ri Were gi tongol!
Go umo polo gi pondeponde,
go yiko koth ri piny,
go miyo lum twi i wi tendere.
Rwoth miyo ogwaŋe cemo pajo,
gi nyithindhi agakere ma joywak.
Kisangala pere ongoye i meni pa kayinin,
kosa i meni pa jolweny ma jomiseni,
to Rwoth siemere i jono ma jolworo go,
i jono ma jogeno i mar pere makiwire.
Pak Rwoth, awi Yerusalem!
Pak Were perin, awi Zayon!
Kole go ridho nywenye ma waŋkace perin,
go miyo wot win silwany i dier win.
Go timo siem i kewere mewin,
go yeŋo win gi ŋano m'onuŋere.
Go wodho or ri piny,
wac pere dwir.
Go yaro pe paka pien rombo,
go kedho fumbi paka buru.
Go dhiro pe paka tele gu,
ŋa manyalo cungo i ŋico pere?
Rwoth dhiro wac pere, to lenyo jo,
go miyo koyo pere kudho, to pi mol.
Go wodho wac pere kamaler ri Yakobo,
fonji gi cik pere ri Isiraili.
Go fodi k'otimo ameno ri nonin man,
jokuya cik pere.
Rwoth wopak!
Pak Rwoth!
Pak Rwoth wok i polo,
pak go i ŋawirok!
Pak win go jomalaika pere je,
pak win go wijolweny pere!
Pak win go waŋceŋ gi dwe;
pak win go, micalin maliel je!
Pak win go, win polo m'oŋawere tektek,
gi pi ma malo i polo!
Weyi jowopaki nyingi Rwoth!
Kole go owodho or to jocweyere.
Go oketho jo ma cil gi cil,
go oridho kew pajo ma kikalere.
Pak win Rwoth wok piny,
win ogwaŋe ma nam gi lutho je,
lithkoth gi telin, pe gi fumbi,
g'asur ma jowinjo or pere!
Gote gi tendere je,
yen ma nyak olemo gi lule!
Ogwaŋe madudi gi dhok je,
gigipiny ma mol gi kor jo gi winyin ma joay!
Kerin ma piny gi ji je,
jodhum gi jotel je ma piny!
Yac gi nyir kanyacel,
jom'oti gi nyithindho!
Weyi jowopaki nyingi Rwoth,
kole nyingi go kende ama otiŋ malo loyo;
dwoŋ pere yombo polo gi piny.
Go otieko loko nono pere matek,
ŋey ji pere jowonyal pako go
Joisiraili ma go lithi gine.
Rwoth wopak!
Pak Rwoth!
Wer ri Rwoth wer manyen,
pak Were i kacokirok pa jom'oyeyo!
Weyi Isiraili wosangala i jacwec pere,
weyi wot Zayon jowofore i kere pajo!
Weyi jowopaki nyinge gi miel;
jowower rigo gi sasi kodi tongol.
Kole Rwoth limo kisangala i ji pere,
go miyo dwoŋ ri jomamwol gi loyo.
Weyi jom'oyeyo jowoyodere i dwoŋ,
weyi jowower ro kisangala wor gipi.
Weyi jowokoki malo ka jopako,
g'abor mabith m'opak kor gi korin i cingi jo,
ma culo kwor kwoŋ nonin,
gi miyo gir'acula kwoŋ ji,
ma tweyo kerin pajo gi lijegere,
gi jotel pajo gi lijegere ma nyweny;
ma miyo jo gir'acula m'oyik con!
Me obedo dwoŋ pa ji pere ma joyeyo je.
Rwoth wopak!
Pak Rwoth!
Pak Rwoth i Ot pere;
pak meni pere i polo!
Pak go ro tim pere ma meni,
pak win go ro dwoŋ pere maloyo!
Pak go gi dwondi gwara,
pak go gi milowe kodi tongol!
Pak go gi sasi kodi miel;
pak go gi thondhe kodi madundo.
Pak go g'agwatin ma ywak;
pak go ka wiyengo agwatin gi dwonde ma malo!
Weyi kisi gima kwo je wopak Rwoth!
Rwoth wopak.
E agecin ma bino konyin ŋeyo rieko gi fonji,
niaŋ dwoŋ wac gi gima wac no nyutho i thutho.
Jofonjo nger ma bedo gi rieko,
nger ma bedo g'adieri, tiro gi bedo ŋataber.
Jonyalo miyo ŋata nitie gi ŋeyo bedo mariek,
to jofonjo soye bedo jondijo.
Weyi jomariek bende jowowinji to jolimo cwe i fonjirok,
aka joma yero bero jowolimi ndijo,
ŋey jowoniaŋ dwoŋ ageca gi gim'opanere,
wac pa jomariek gi sikoiyiko pajo.
to jomamiŋ jocayo rieko gi fonji.
A nyathi paran, winji fonji pa benin,
aka ikir'ikwer fonji pa yokin.
Me kwoŋbedo jobedo junga ri wiyin,
gi thiwino ri ŋutin.
Nyathi paran, ka joreco jodwoŋin,
ikir'iyey.
Ka jowaco ni, “Luw wan, weyi warangi dhano waneki;
weyi watim apondi ri ŋata bubanja,
paka piny pa jom'otho weyi wamwonyi jo makwo,
aka gipi, paka joma jokadho piny i bur.
Walanwaŋo ŋaŋo kweth,
to wapoŋo udi mawan gi gim'onyaga.
Bol win kwir mewin i dier wan;
wajoje walabedo gi mugowa acel.”
Nyathi paran, ikir'imakere gi jo,
bedi bor gi jo.
Kole tiendi jo kwakere timo gimarac,
aka joredo neki.
Obedo gipilok ciko bwo,
ka winyo m'imito mako neno,
to cwo me jotimo apondi ma neko jo wegi!
Jotimo apondi ri kwo pajo wegi.
Meno a nger gike pa jono je ma jolimo gimoro iy'akaka,
aka cowo kwo pajo wegi.
i kabedo m'oyawere go tiŋo dwonde.
Go lwoŋo gi dwonde ma malo,
i waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ go tuco wac pere.
“Kiri keraŋo, awi joniaŋ macek ma wilamito bedo mamiŋ?
Kiri keraŋo ma jonyero jolayodere i nyero pajo,
to jomamiŋ jokwero ŋeyo?
Winji win apuse paran,
alakonjo kwoŋ win paro paran,
t'amiyo win ŋeyo wac paran.
Kwoŋbedo atieko lwoŋo win to wikwero,
atieko yaro cingan to ngoye ŋat'owinjo.
Wikidewo kwoŋ rieko paran je m'amiyo win,
aka wikiyeyo ni atir win.
An bende alanyero win ka winopodhi i teko;
alanyero win ka lworo madwoŋ obin.
Ka kirin obin riwin paka koyo madwoŋ,
to teko mewin bino paka asur,
ka litho gi kumo obino kwoŋ win.
Nyaka wilalwoŋan, t'ak'oye;
wilarangan kisi kamoro, to wik'onwaŋan.
Kwoŋbedo widak bedo gi ŋeyo,
aka wikiyero lworo Rwoth.
Wikwero rieko paran je m'amiyo win,
to wiŋisa kisi gimoro m'atemo tiro gine win.
Riameno wilacamo olemo ma tim mewin,
aka tim mewin won lamiyo witwo.
Ji ma jongoye gi ŋeyo jotho kwoŋbedo jokwero rieko.
Jomamiŋ jotho kwoŋbedo jokidew.
To jono ma jowinjan jolabedo maber.
Teko k'omaki jo, m'ongoye lworo raco.”
Nyathi paran, k'inowinji wac paran,
t'itero or paran paka gima dicwe i in.
K'inociki ithin ri rieko,
t'iyawo adundo perin niaŋ,
k'inorangi bero,
t'ilwoŋo niaŋ,
k'inodwar go paka feza,
t'idwaro go paka gima dicwe m'opondo,
nyaka ibino niaŋ dwoŋ ma lworo Rwoth,
t'inwaŋo ŋeyo Were.
Kole Rwoth ama miyo rieko,
wok i dhok go ŋeyo gi niaŋ jobino.
Go kano rieko manyakare ri joma timo gim'otire,
go obedo kwot pa ji ma bubanja.
Go kuro jono ma jotimo bero ri wadi gin,
aka lithi gi jono ma jomaro go.
Ka winowinjan, nyaka wilaniaŋ timo gim'otire, tiro gi bero,
wilaŋeyo gima wiripo timo.
Wilabedo gi rieko iy'adundo mewin,
aka ŋeyo mewin lamiyo win kisangala.
Adieri mewin lakuro win,
to niaŋ kwonga win.
Bino botho win kwoŋ timo gimarac,
kwoŋ jono ma joluwo kicar.
Jono ma joweyo yo m'otire,
aka jowotho i yo ma mudho,
ma jofore i timo gimarac,
aka josiemere i gimiŋo marac,
jono ma yo pajo k'otire,
aka tim pajo rac.
Ibino nyalo ciro dhako ma jakidakana,
ma luwere kicar m'otemi dwoŋin gi wac pere mamit,
dhako ma wiye wil gi cwore ma soye,
wiye wil gi cikirok pa Were pere.
K'ikidho i ot pere,
meno iwotho i yo ma kidho i piny pa jom'otho.
Jono je ma jowendo rigo jokidwoki,
jokigiki i yo ma kwo.
Riameno woth i yo pa ji mabeyo,
aka idoŋ i yo pa jom'otire.
Rupiri ji mabeyo jolabedo i piny,
aka ji ma bubanja joladoŋ'iye.
To jokidakana ilaneko jo woko i piny,
t'ifudho woko joreco i iye paka doy.
Nyathi paran, wiyin wokiri wowil gi fonji paran,
to weyi adundo perin wokur or paran.
Rupiri fonji paran lamiyin,
ikwo oro kweth to medin siem.
Ikir'iyey mwolo g'adieri jowobudhin,
tweyi jo i ŋutin,
ndiki jo i pal cunyin.
ilanwaŋo ŋono gi pak,
ruwaŋ Were gi ruwaŋ ji.
Geni Rwoth gi cunyin je,
aka ikir'igoŋere kwoŋ gim'iparo nike iŋeyo.
I kisi gimoro je m'itimo, yey go,
aka go latiro yo perin.
lwor Rwoth, aka iwey timo gimarac.
K'inotim ameno,
labedo kwo ri delkwoŋin
gi yath ri cokin perin.
Miy Rwoth dwoŋ gi lim perin,
kodi olemo marapena ma ranyak perin je.
K'inotim ameno,
dere perin lapoŋ gi cemo,
aka nywero perin lapoŋ gi vini.
kosa ilocere ka go tirin.
paka bajo tiro nyathi ma go nor gine.
Jakisangala a ŋata nwaŋo rieko,
gi ŋata nwaŋo niaŋ!
Rupiri magowa pere loyo magowa ma feza,
aka gima go limo loyo zahabu.
Rieko obedo gima diwelo loyo nyweny,
aka ongoye giman m'igomba m'inyalo kipima gine.
Cingi rieko maracuc miyo kwo mabor,
aka cinge maracam bed'iye ŋaŋo gi dwoŋ.
Dhoyin pere obedo ma kisangala,
aka yo pere je obedo siem.
Rieko obedo yath ma kwo ri jono ma jogoŋere kwoŋe,
jono ma jomako matek jobedo gi kisangala.
Rwoth ocweyo piny gi rieko;
go ocako polo gi niaŋ.
Gi ŋeyo pere lutho obare to ŋamere,
aka pondeponde thono thoyo.
Nyathi paran, kuri rieko gi niaŋ,
ikir'iwey jowobudhi ŋeyo perin.
Jolabedo kwo ri cunyin,
gi thiwino ri ŋutin.
Nyaka ibino wotho i yo perin m'ongoye teko,
aka tiendin k'ocer.
K'inoriere piny, ik'obedi gi lworo,
k'inonindi piny, nindo perin labedo mamit.
Ikir'ibedi gi lworo ri dhier ma bino abwap,
kosa amien ma podho kwoŋ jokidakana.
Kwoŋbedo Rwoth labedo meni perin,
to geŋo tiendin cer.
Ikir'iwey m'ikitimo bero ri jono ma joyenyo,
k'inyalo timo ameno.
Ikir'iwaci ri nyawotin ni, kadhi, inodwoki kendo,
alamiyin dikin, kareno inigi gino.
Ikir'ican timo teko ri jager perin,
ma bedo cegin kodin munyo genin.
Ikir'idhaw gi dhano ma nono,
m'ongoye teko m'otimo rin.
Ikir'igomba jogwayo,
aka ikir'iyer tim pajo moro je.
Kwoŋbedo joreco jobedo amien ri Rwoth,
to go nor gi jom'otire.
Kwoŋ pa Rwoth nitie i ot pa jakidakana,
to go miyo kabedo pa ŋat'otire silwany.
to ri jomamwol, go nyutho wor.
Jomariek jolalunjo dwoŋ,
to jomamiŋ jolimo wickwot.
Winji win, awi nyithindho, fonji pa bawin,
aka ciki ithi win, ŋey winyal niaŋ.
Kole amiyo win fonji maber,
wikiri wijwangi fonji paran.
Munyo fodi abedo jayac gi baba,
ma nyaka ay, aka kendan ruwaŋ mama,
baba ofonjan. Go oyido waco ni,
“Poyi gim'afonjin, aka wiyin wokiri wowil gine.
Kur or paran aka ibino kwo.
Wiyin wokiri wowil, aka ikir'iwire,
kwoŋ gim'atieko waco.
Lim rieko, aka lim ŋeyo.
Ikir'ijwangi rieko, bino kurin,
mar go, bino kikwonga in.
Cakirok ma rieko obedo gime: Lim rieko,
aka kwoŋ giman je m'inolim, lim niaŋ.
Ter rieko paka gimadwoŋ, aka latiŋin malo.
Rieko lamiyin dwoŋ k'imako go matek.
Rieko laketho i wiyin ŋono,
aka lakelo rin sangaria maŋon.”
Winji, awi nyathi paran, aka iyey wac paran,
ŋey inyal kiyindira.
Atieko fonjin royo ma kwo;
atieko nyuthin yo ma tiro.
K'iwotho, ongoye gima lageŋin;
aka k'iŋweco, ik'otangatanga.
Maki fonji paran matek; ikir'iwey wokadhi;
kwonga go, rupiri obedo kwo perin.
Ikir'idonji i yo pa jokidakana,
aka ikir'iwothi i yo pa joreco.
Weyere gine, ikir'ikidh'iye,
wire yuthenge man t'ikadho.
Kole jokidakana jokinyal nindo cuka jotieko timo gimarac.
Nindo kikwal jo cuka jomiy dhano litho.
Kole jocamo kidakana pa mugat,
aka jomadho akaka pa vini.
To yo pa jom'otire obedo lero ma ŋamba,
maliel maber tundo odieceŋ.
Royo pa jokidakana cal gi mudho madwoŋ;
jokiŋey gima jocer i wiye.
Awi nyathi paran, ciki ithin iwinji wac paran,
winji gim'awaco.
Ikir'iwey jowongoye ruwaŋin,
kuri jo iy'adundo perin.
Rupiri jobedo kwo ri jono ma jonwaŋo,
aka cango delkwoŋ jo.
Gwok adundo perin,
kwoŋbedo obedo waŋ kwo.
Ikir'ibanere i luwo perin,
kethi gicen luwo marac.
Weyi waŋin woŋiy tirtir,
aka nyangil waŋin woŋiy maber.
aka kisi gimoro je m'icano, lakadho maber.
Ikir'iwire racuc kosa racam;
kwany woko tiendin kwoŋ gimarac.
Nyathi paran, winji odoco rieko paran,
ciki ithin ri fonji paran.
Kenyo nyaka ibino ŋeyo nger ma bedo gi kula maber,
aka wac perin lanyutho ni inigi ŋeyo.
Dhok dhako ma jaweco thon mo kic,
aka luwo pere foth loyo mo,
t'icowe mere, go kiwey rin gimoro,
kwanyowoko aŋedha cuny gi litho.
Tiende tero jo i tho,
royo ma go luwo tero jo i piny pa jom'otho.
Go kikur royo m'otire ma tero jo i kwo,
to lera kicar, aka go kiniaŋ gima timere.
Riameno, winjan win, awi nyithindho paran,
aka wiy win wokiri wowil gi gim'awaco.
Bedi bor swa gi nger dhako no,
aka ikir'icore cegin gi dhiot pere.
K'inotim ameno, iweyo dwoŋ perin ri joman,
aka ilatho i cingi jogero.
Ey, jokicar jolakwanyo ŋaŋo perin je,
aka gim'ilimo m'owok i kwok perin labedo apa japath.
Onyo i hongo ma gike ma kwo perin ilaywak gi litho,
ka riŋo perin gi delkwoŋin nyekere woko,
aka nyaka ibino waco ni, “Awi, raŋo akwero winjo fonji?
Adundo paran ocayo tiro m'oyido imiyan!
Akiwinjo dwondi jofonji paran,
aka ikiwinjo dwondi jomic rieko paran.
Onyo pama acegin rere woko
i dier cokirok pa lwak.”
Miti dhako perin won kende,
aka imiy mar perin rigo kende.
Nyithindho m'ilimo gi dhako man woko kelo litho.
Weyi nyithindho perin jowobedi aperin won kende,
makiweno oro jo bende gi jokicar.
Weyi dhako perin wolimi silwany,
aka fore gi dhako perin m'inywomo munyo fodi i soye,
maŋon paka apol, paka diel ma nema.
Weyi mitirok pere woyeŋin i hongo je;
i hongo je mer gi mar pere.
Raŋo doko irweny wodan, gi dhako man,
t'ipodho i kor dhako ma japath?
Rwoth neno kisi tim pa dhano,
aka menyo kisi kama go kadh'iye.
Reco pa jokidakana obedo bwo rijo,
aka imako jo i bwo mareco pajo.
Jotho kwoŋbedo jokwero fonji,
aka kwoŋbedo miŋo pajo dwoŋ, jorwenyo.
Nyathi paran, k'itieko cungo ri banja pa nyawotin,
k'itieko ciko konyo japath,
itieko podho i bwo gi luwo ma dhokin,
imoko gi wac m'owok i dhokin.
Ameno tim gime, nyathi paran, aka ibothi kwo perin.
Kole ameno itieko podho i cingi nyawotin,
kadhi imwole, aka iywakere rigo.
Nindo wokiri womaki waŋin,
aka ikir'inur.
Bothi kwo perin paka amudhe botho kwo pere wok i cingi jadwar,
paka winyo budhere wok i cingi jaciko.
Kidhi win i riete ŋwen, win jonyapo,
neni win paka okoko jotiyo, aka wilokere mariek.
Jongoye kada gi jatel,
jamituka kosa jadhum,
to joyiko cemo i ndir ma ceŋ,
ka joyikere ri ndir ma cwir.
Wilanindo kiri keraŋo, awi jomamiŋ?
Wilacew keraŋo wok i nindo mewin?
aladolo cingan ywomirok nyaka mathin.”
To ka go nindo, candi lamonjo go,
paka jakwo ma royo,
paka jacwo m'otiŋo gilweny.
Dhano ma bukony gi jakidakana
ŋweyo piny gi luwo twodo.
Go mbieto waŋe, ka como tiende i lowo,
ka cimere gi cinge.
Go cano raco gi cunye marac,
aka cwoyo tiakirok noknok.
Riameno, teko lapodho kwoŋe abwap,
aka go larere abwap to rwenyo.
Nitie gigipiny aucel ma Rwoth odak.
Abirio jobedo amien rigo.
Delok, lew jo ma twodo,
cingi jo ma neko joma bubanja,
adundo ma timo can ma kidakana,
par tiendi jo ma kwakere timo gimarac,
jakony ma luwo twodo,
kodi ŋata cwoyo tiakirok i dier wutmere.
Nyathi paran, kuri or pa benin,
aka ikir'ijwangi fonji pa yokin.
Tweyi jo iy'adundo perin noknok;
tweyi jo i ŋutin.
K'iwotho, jolatelin,
k'iriere piny, jolakurin,
aka k'icew, jolaluwo kodin.
Kole or obedo tala aka fonji obedo lero,
aka tiro kula obedo yo ma kwo.
Nyalo kurin kwoŋ dhako marac,
kwoŋ adwoŋa pa dhako ma jacot.
Ikir'igomba ŋono pere i cunyin,
aka ikir'iwey go wodwoŋin gi biendi waŋe.
Jacwo nyalo nyewo malaya gi nyaka mugat acel won,
to cot nyalo kadho gi kisi gimoro je ma go nitie gine.
Inyalo tiŋo mac i korin,
ma k'owaŋo nangin perin?
Kosa dhano nyalo woth i mac m'okur,
ma k'owaŋo tiende?
Ameno apaka ŋata nindo gi cipa nyawote nitie,
ongoye ŋat'ogey nger dheno ma kilamiyo gir'acula.
Ji jokicay jakwo k'okwalo cemo,
ka kec neko.
Kucel k'omaki, culo dibirio loyo,
lakeŋ kisi gimoro je ma ot pere.
To ŋata timo cot ongoye gi rieko,
ŋata timo gino reyo woko kwo pere.
Go lanwaŋo adhola giwickwot,
aka wickwot pere k'orumi.
Kole nyeko miyo jacwo bedo mager,
aka go kilanyutho wor ka culo kwor.
Go k'oyey cul moro je,
kosa yeyo nyew makada nende bedi madwoŋ nedi.
Nyathi paran, kuri wac paran,
aka ter or paran paka gimadwoŋ.
Kuri or paran aka ilakwo,
kuri fonji paran paka ikuro nyangil waŋin.
Tweyi i lwet cingin,
kethi i pal cunyin.
Wac ri rieko ni, “Ibedo nyamin an.”
Lwoŋ niaŋ ni mere perin ma kacunyin.
Jobino kurin kwoŋ mon ma joweco,
kwoŋ mon ma jodwoŋo jo gi wac.
Ndelo moro oyido aŋiyo g'idirisa ma ot paran,
aŋiyo g'ihoŋ miango,
t'aneno i dier jomamiŋ,
aneno i dier soye,
jayac moro mamiŋ.
Go oyido wotho i royo cegin gi royo ma rwayo,
kidho i ot pa dhako moro,
kareno waŋceŋ opodho, othieno,
wor aka i mudho.
Kenyo dhako moro obino romo gine,
orukere paka malaya, kareno oyikere dwoŋo jayac no.
Go obedo jamaker aka bu wickwot,
dhako ma jakilera.
Sawa je inwaŋo go i royo kosa kam'othangere,
aka bedo kareno ciko dhano i royo.
Dheno opodho kwoŋ jayac no to cwiyo dhoke,
oneno waŋe tirtir to waco rigo ni,
“Ajok amiyo cowirok ma siem,
aka konon atieko culo cikirok paran.
Riameno awok woko romo kodin,
adwarin awaŋ g'awaŋ, aka atieko nwaŋin!
Atieko pedho kitanda paran,
gi nanga makicin m'otimi i Misir.
Atieko kudho kanindo paran gi mo maŋwe kur,
mo ma yath maŋwe kur, gi sinamon.
Biye, weyi waweci tundo odikin;
weyi wayodere gi mar.
Kole cworan ongoye peco,
go okadho bor swa.
Okadho gi pesa kweth,
go k'odwoki peco tundo i dier dwe.
Gi luwo mar'adwoŋa dheno odwoŋo go,
gi luwo pere mafoth dheno oromo go.
Jayac no oluwo go abwap,
paka merikwa m'ikidho thumo,
paka ogwaŋ ma redo i bwo,
cuka asere cwowo gigipiny ma iye.
Go cal winyo ma rure i bwo,
kiŋey ni latho.
Riameno nyithindho paran, winjan win,
aka ciki ithi win ri wac ma wok i dhokan.
Cunyin wokiri woluwi yo pa nger dheno,
ikir'ilera rango go.
Go otieko neko cwo kweth,
cwo ma kikwanere.
Ot pere obedo royo ma kidho i piny pa jom'otho,
ma rwako jo i bur.”
Niaŋ tiŋo dwonde.
I wi tendere i thengi royo,
kodi i royo go cungo.
Ruwaŋ waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ,
i thengi waŋkac go goyo dwonde.
Ri wijoje, awi jome, alwoŋo,
aka ywak paran obedo ri dhano je makwo.
Win ma wingoye gi nyaŋith, wikifonjere ye niaŋ.
Win ma wimiŋ, lim win rieko.
Winji, kole alaluwo wac maber,
aka gima lawok i dhokan otire.
Kole dhokan lawaco gir'adieri,
kidakana obedo amien ri dhokan.
Wac je ma wok i dhokan obedo adieri,
ongoye gim'ogondere kosa m'owire nyaman i jo.
Joje jotire ri dhano ma niaŋ,
aka otire ri jono ma jonwaŋo ŋeyo.
Yeri fonji paran kapa feza,
gi ŋeyo kapa zahabu maber loyo.
Kole rieko ber loyo nyweny,
aka kisi gimoro je m'inyalo mito kipimere gine.
An abedo rieko, akipan wac,
anitie gi ŋeyo kodi thumo banja m'otire.
Lworo Rwoth obedo kwero gimarac.
Noro, gero, tim marac,
gi wac twodo adaki.
Abedo jamic rieko gi rieko ma kakare,
anigi niaŋ, aka anigi meni.
Kerin jodhumo ro an,
aka jodhum jocweyo cik maber.
Kisi jadhum dhumo gi kony paran,
jotel gi jogavana i nger acel.
Amaro jono ma jomaran,
aka jono je ma jodwaran gi cuny gin acel jonwaŋan.
Ŋaŋo gi dwoŋ jonitie kodan,
ŋaŋo ma yindira gi kisi gimoro maber.
Olemo paran ber loyo zahabu, kada zahabu ma pilin,
aka kwot paran ber loyo feza macil.
Awotho i royo m'otire,
aluwo yo ma tiro,
amiyo jom'omaran lunjo ŋaŋo,
jopoŋo udi pajo gi gigipiny ma dicwe.
tic pere marapena cango con.
Wok cango con, go okethan,
bedo marapena mafodi k'ocwey piny.
Onywolan mafodi wakawaka,
ma waŋ pi fodi ongoye.
Onywolan mafodi k'ojiengi gote
mafodi k'ocwey tendere,
mafodi Were k'ocweyo polo gi piny,
kosa adec lowo ma piny.
Munyo Were cako polo, oyido anitie,
munyo ogoyo nyaraunda i wi wakawaka,
munyo go timo pondeponde m'ocwiny malo,
munyo go oyawo waŋ pi ma wakawaka.
Go oyiko ri nam gike mere,
ŋey pi wokiri wotur or pere.
Oyido anitie munyo go jengo kindi piny.
Oyido anitie ruŋete,
paka jageto ma goyo cal ma ot,
aka oyido abedo kisangala pere kisi ndelo,
afore ruwaŋe noknok.
Afore i piny pere,
t'ayodere gi ji.
Riameno nyithindho, winjan win.
Josilwany a jono ma jotimo gim'awaco.
Winji win fonji aka witim girieko,
wikiri wijala.
Jasilwany a ŋata winjan,
jono ma jokuro dhiot paran kisi ndelo,
ka jokuro i waŋkace ma donjo peco paran.
Kole ŋata nwaŋan nwaŋo kwo
aka limo ŋono wok bongi Rwoth.
Jono ma jokinwaŋan jolimo litho,
aka jono je ma jodakan jomito tho.
Rieko otieko geto ot pere,
otieko gero sirin pere abirio.
Go otieko neko le pere, otieko ruwo vini pere,
go otieko yiko meza pere.
Go otieko dhiro ŋecin pere manyir, rieko lwoŋo,
wok i kam'oŋawere ma tindi ni,
“Ŋa mamiŋ, weyi go wowire yuthenge me!”
Go waco ri jomamiŋ ni,
“Biye win, cami win mugat paran,
to wimadho vini paran m'atieko ruwo.
Weyi win timo gimiŋo, aka wibino kwo,
tim win girieko.”
Ŋata tiro jarendirok nwaŋo yet,
ŋata tiro jakidakana limo litho.
Ikir'itir jarendirok, ladakin,
k'itiro jomariek jolamarin.
Miy jomariek fonji, aka jolamedo lokirok mariek,
fonji jom'otire aka niaŋ pajo lamedere.
aka ŋeyo Ŋataleŋ, nyutho bedo gi niaŋ.
Kole gi an, ilamedo kwo perin,
aka ilamedo oro m'oromo i kwo perin.
K'iriek, iŋat'ilimo magowa mere,
to k'ikwero, iŋat'ilakeŋ.
Dhako mamiŋ ama luwo malo,
go kiniaŋ aka ongoye gima go oŋeyo.
Go bedo i dhiot pere,
kosa i kabedo m'oŋawere ma tindi,
ka lwoŋo jono ma jokadho,
joma kadho rigin tirtir i yo pajo ni,
“Weyi ŋatamiŋ, wowire yuthenge me!”
Aka ri jomamiŋ, go waco ni,
“Pi m'okwal mit,
aka mugat m'icamo nyaliŋliŋ mit loyo.”
To jokuya ni tipo pa jom'otho nitie kenyo,
aka wendo pere jonitie i pendi piny pa jom'otho.
Me agecin pa Solomon:
Nyathi mariek miyo bamere kisangala,
to nyathi mamiŋ kelo ri yokimere ywak.
Ŋaŋo m'ilimo gi kidakana kikony,
to timo gim'otire botho kwo.
Rwoth kiyey kec woneki jom'otire,
to go kwero jokidakana limo gima jomito.
Cingi jo ma bol kelo candi,
to cingi jo mayil yil kelo ŋaŋo.
Ŋatariek keco cemo ka jocek,
to nyathi ma nindo i hongo ma keco,
obedo nyathi ma timo giwickwot.
Silwany nitie ri jomabeyo,
to dhok jokidakana pano gwayo.
Poyo jom'otire obedo silwany,
to nyingi jokidakana kipoy.
Jomariek jolawinjo or,
to jomamiŋ jolarere.
Ongoye teko ma lamako joma timo adieri,
t'ilaŋeyo tim pa jokidakana.
Ŋata diyo waŋe acel kelo teko,
to ŋata kwero gimarac gi miseni kelo siem.
Wac pa ŋataber obedo cakirok ma kwo,
to wac pa jakidakana pano gwayo.
to mari umo kibenga je.
Rieko nitie i dhok ŋata nigi niaŋ,
to luth obedo ri ŋey jamiŋo.
Jomariek jocoko ŋeyo,
to jomamiŋ ma jogoyo dhok jo jokelo rerok cegin.
Thoŋino pa joŋaŋo obedo cel pajo,
candi pa jocandi obedo kisika pajo.
Kemba pa jom'otire obedo kwo,
to magowa pa jakidakana obedo reco.
Nyatoro ma winjo fonji nitie i ger ma kwo,
to ŋata kwero tiro lokere jawoth kicar.
Dhok jo ma twodo pano dakirok,
aka jamisegey obedo jamiŋo.
Ka wac nitie kidhur, kibenga kingoye,
to ŋata gwoko dhoke nyutho rieko.
Wac pa ŋataber cale feza macil,
to paro pa jakidakana ongoye kony.
Wac pa jom'otire pidho ji kweth,
to jomamiŋ jotho ro miŋo.
Silwany pa Rwoth ama miyo ŋaŋo,
aka go kimed'iye kumo.
Timo gimarac cal gituko ri jamiŋo,
to tim ma rieko obedo kisangala ri ŋata niaŋ.
Gima jakidakana lworo layimere kwoŋe,
t'ibino miyo ŋat'otire gima gomba.
Ka koyo madwoŋ okudho, kwadho woko jokidakana,
to jom'otire igeto jo cil gi cil.
Paka gima wac bedo ri lak jo, gi yiro ri waŋ jo,
ameno apaka joma nyap joŋedho cuny jodongo pajo.
Lworo Rwoth kelo kiyindira,
to oro pa jokidakana labedo macek.
Geno pa jom'otire gike mere obedo kisangala,
to geno pa jokidakana kikel gimoro.
Yo pa Rwoth obedo kapondo ri joma timo adieri,
t'obedo rerok ri joma timo kidakana.
Jom'otire jok'oyengere cil gi cil,
to jokidakana k'oyey jo bedo i piny.
Dhok jom'otire luwo rieko,
to lew jobanirok ilathumo woko.
Dhok jom'otire ŋeyo gimaber awaca,
to dhok jokidakana waco banirok ayin.
Latir ma twodo obedo amien ri Rwoth,
to latir m'otire obedo yodirok pere.
Ka noro obino, kenyo wickwot bende bino gine,
to rieko nigi jomamwol.
Bero pa jom'otire thielo jo,
to jobanirok jorere gi banirok pajo.
Ŋaŋo kikony i hongo ma keme,
to timo gim'otire botho kwo.
Timo gitiro pa joma bubanja miyo jo bedo maber,
to jokidakana jopodho gi kidakana pajo won.
Timo gitiro pa joma timo adieri botho jo,
to jobanirok imako jo i woro pajo.
Ka jakidakana otho, geno pere rere,
aka geno pa ji ma bu Were bende rere.
Jom'otire ibotho jo i hongo ma teko,
aka jokidakana jopodh'iye ayino.
Ji ma bu Were jonyalo kisika woko wadi jo,
to jom'otire jogonyere ro bedo gi ŋeyo.
Ka gigipiny kadho maber ri jom'otire, tindi fore,
to ka jokidakana jorere, bedo woy ma kisangala.
Tindi lokere madwoŋ gi silwany pa joma timo adieri,
to sika woko gi dhok jokidakana.
Ŋata cayo nyawote meno ŋatamiŋ,
to dhano mariek liŋ.
Jawaci nyingi wadi kedho nyaliŋliŋ,
to ŋata genere i cuny kano nyaliŋliŋ.
K'ongoye ŋata waco ri ji gimaber atima, ji jopodho,
to loyo bedo i dier jomic rieko kweth.
Cungo ri jakicar ka kopa pesa kelo teko,
to ber k'ikwero timo ameno.
Dhako ma jawor limo dwoŋ,
to dhako ma dak kula maber jalifol.
Jomanyap jokibedi gi pesa,
to jokinen jolaŋanjo.
Joma jokisa jomiyere kemba,
to jogero jokelo ri kwo pajo teko.
Ongoye gima jakidakana limo,
to jono ma jocwoyo tiro jolimo kemba.
Nyatoro m'ocungi matek i tiro bino kwo,
to nyatoro m'omena timo gimarac bino tho.
Joma jonigi paro m'okom obedo amien ri Rwoth,
to jono ma jotimo gim'otire josangala go.
Aridho rin ni ilamiyo jokidakana gir'acula,
to jono ma jotire jolaboth.
Paka peta ma zahabu i um mbiji,
apaka dhako maŋon mamiŋ cal.
Yenyo pa ŋat'otire kelo bero kende,
aka awanya pa jakidakana kelo keme.
Jomegi jomiyo gi cuny jo maber, kucel jomedo ŋaŋo,
joman jodire gi gigipiny pajo, to jolokere jocandi.
Dhano ma jamiyo ilaloko go ma cwe,
aka ŋata miyo pi bende ilamiyo go pi.
Ji jokwoŋo joma jogwondo,
to silwany nitie ri joma jotana cemo.
Nyatoro ma rango bero rango ŋono,
to gimarac yimere kwoŋ ŋata rango.
Jono ma jogeno i ŋaŋo pajo jolagore piny,
to jom'otire jolakilikalika paka lum manyaboke pendi.
Jono ma jokelo teko ri jopeco pajo jolalunjo koyo,
aka ŋatamiŋ labedo ŋeca pa jarieko.
Olemo pa ŋat'otire miyo kwo,
t'akaka reyo woko kwo.
adieri ocul jokidakana gi joreco didi!
Nyatoro m'omaro fonji omaro ŋeyo,
to jono ma jokimiti ni wotir jo jomiŋ.
Joma beyo jonwaŋo ŋono wok bongi Rwoth,
to jono ma jotimo can marac Rwoth thumo rijo banja.
Ongoye ŋata cungo matek gi kidakana,
to cakirok ma tiro kilarere.
Dhako maber obedo delok gi kisangala pa cwore,
to dhako ma kelo wickwot ri cwore cal topo ma bedo i coko pere.
Can pa jom'otire ber,
rieko pa jokidakana obedo twodo.
Wac pa jokidakana obedo podho apondi ma tho,
to wac pa jom'otire botho jo.
Jokidakana ikengila jo to jorumo,
to nyithindho pa jom'otire joyindira.
Ifoyo dhano ro rieko pere,
to jawictek icayo.
Ber wocayin to kareno inigi ŋeca,
loyo k'iwon imiyere dwoŋ t'ingoye gi cemo.
Jom'otire joŋeyo gim'ogwaŋe pajo mito,
to jokidakana joger ri apajo.
Jono ma jofuro lowo pajo jolabedo gi cemo kweth,
to jono ma jonyeko hongo luwo gim'ongoye kony jomiŋ.
Jokidakana jogomba gima wok i tim ma kidakana,
to tim pa jom'otire nyak olemo.
Imako joreco gikibenga ma dhok jo,
to jom'otire jokwale kwoŋ teko.
Wok kwoŋ gimaber ma dhok jo, dhano poŋ gigipiny mabeyo,
aka tic ma kwok nigi kemba mere.
Jomamiŋ joparo ni tim pajo wegi otire,
to jomariek jowinjo fonji.
Jomamiŋ jokiru nyutho nge pajo,
to jomariek jokidew kwoŋ yet.
Nyatoro ma luwo adieri waco gim'otire,
to jakony ma twodo luwo gitwodo.
Wac ma dhano luwo ma kipar kwoŋ gim'awaco,
nyalo yaŋo dhano paka abor,
to lew jomariek kelo both.
Dhok jo ma genere yindira cil gi cil,
to dhok jo ma twodo bedo nyaka hongo macek.
Twodo nitie i paro pa jono ma jotimo can marac,
to jono ma jofonjo siem jonigi kisangala.
Ongoye teko ma mako jom'otire,
to jokidakana jopoŋ gi litho.
Lew jo ma twodo obedo amien ri Rwoth,
to jono ma jotimo gim'otire jobedo yodirok pere.
Dhano mariek kano ŋeyo,
to paro pa jamiŋo tuco miŋo.
Tic gi yilo lamiyin meni,
to joma nyap ilamiyo jo tic arom.
Rembo kimiy dhano kisangala,
to wac maber miyo go kisangala.
Dhano m'otire miyo nyawote rieko,
to royo pa jokidakana rwenyo jo.
Joma nyap jokinwaŋ gima jomito,
to jomayil yil jolanwaŋo ŋaŋo ma dicwe.
Yo m'otire kelo kwo,
to yo marac kelo tho.
Nyathi mariek ciko ithe ka bamere fonjo go,
to jawictek kiwinji fonji.
Ji mabeyo jolimo kemba ri gima jowaco,
t'awanya pa jotwodo obedo timo akaka.
Jono ma jogwoko dhok jo jokwonga kwo pajo;
to jono ma joluwere kicar jorere.
Awanya pa janyapo nitie kweth, to kilim gimoro,
to jatic matek limo kisi gimoro.
Jom'otire jodak twodo,
to jokidakana jotimo giwickwot gi lifol.
Tiro kwonga ŋata timo gimaber,
to reco kengila jakidakana.
Jomegi jotere ni joŋaŋ, kucel jongoye gi gimoro;
joman jotere ni jocandi, kucel jonigi lim kweth.
Ŋaŋo obedo gima botho kwo pa dhano,
to jacandi kilim atise.
Jom'oŋaŋ jocale lero maliel,
to jokidakana jocale tala ma tho.
Jodelok jokitim gimoro kwanyo teko,
to rieko nigi jono ma jowinjo fonji.
Ŋaŋo m'inwaŋo gi kwakirok lalokere mathin,
to jono ma jocoko adec adec jolabedo gi mathoth.
Ka geno owire cuny jo ŋedhere,
to ka gim'oyido iparo otundo i kare bedo yath ma kwo.
Jono ma jokwero fonji m'imiyo jo, jokelo rerok kwoŋ jo,
to jono ma jowinjo or ibino miyo jo kemba.
Fonji pa ŋatariek obedo cakirok ma kwo,
jobino bongin kwoŋ bwo ma tho.
Rieko miyin ilimo dwoŋ,
to tim pa jotwodo obedo rerok pajo.
Ŋatariek timo kisi gimoro gi ŋeyo,
to jamiŋo nyutho miŋo.
Jamikwenda marac kelo teko,
to jamikwenda ma genere kelo both.
Candi gi lifol jobedo apa ŋata kiwinji fonji,
to ŋata winjo fonji imiyo dwoŋ.
Gim'igomba t'inwaŋo kelo kisangala,
to weyo timo gimarac obedo amien ri jomamiŋ.
Ŋata wotho gi ŋatariek lokere mariek,
to jawodhi jomamiŋ nwaŋo litho.
Lifol luwo joreco,
to gigipiny mabeyo labedo kemba pa jom'otire.
Joma beyo joweyo gir'alunja ri nyikway jo,
to lim pa jareco ithango ri jom'otire.
Ndelo pa jacandi nyalo nyak cemo kweth,
t'iyweyo woko ro ngoye pa tiro.
Jono ma jokimiy nyithindho pajo gir'acula jok'omaro jo,
to jono ma jomaro nyithindho pajo jofonjo jo.
Jom'otire jonigi gigipiny kweth acama,
to kec neko jokidakana i jo hongo je.
Dhako mariek geto peco pere,
to dhako mamiŋ reyo woko gi cinge.
Jono ma jotimo gim'otire jolworo Rwoth,
to ŋata tim pere rac cayo go.
Luwo pa jomamiŋ obedo luth ri dieŋey jo,
to dhok ŋatariek kwonga go.
Kama mirikwa ongoy'iye, cemo ongoye;
cemo kweth bino gi meni pa mirikwa.
Jakony ma genere kitwodi,
to jakony ma jatwodo luwo twodo.
Jodelok jorango rieko to jokinwaŋ,
to ŋeyo yot ri ŋata niaŋ.
Ikir'ibedi bongi jamiŋo,
rupiri ongoye gima go nyalo fonjin.
Ŋatariek timo gima go oŋeyo,
to miŋo pa jamiŋo wondo go.
Jomamiŋ jokirembi ka jotimo gimarac,
to jomabeyo josangala gi ŋono pa Were.
Adundo won oŋeyo litho mere,
aka ongoye jakicar ma riwere i kisangala mere.
Ibino reyo woko peco pa jakidakana,
to wema pa ŋataber bino cungo matek.
to i gike mere nitie royo ma tho.
Kiri i nyero cuny jo ramo jo,
to gike ma kisangala bedo ywak.
Joreco jolimo olemo ma yo pajo,
aka jomabeyo bende jolimo olemo ma tim pajo.
Ŋatamiŋ yeyo kisi gimoro,
to dhano mariek kaŋasa woth pere.
Ŋatariek gwokere to wire woko kwoŋ gimarac,
to jamiŋo kidiy cunye to timo gimoro kicar.
Dhano ma kwako mako nge timo gimiŋo,
aka dhano ma tim pere rac ji dak go.
Ji mamiŋ jolunjo miŋo,
to jomariek iruko rijo sangaria ma ŋeyo.
Joreco jobino miyo jomabeyo dwoŋ,
aka jokidakana jolabedo i waŋkac pa jom'otire.
K'ibedo jacandi kiri joger perin jokimitin,
to joŋaŋo jonigi merin kweth.
Jono ma jocayo wadi jo jobedo joreco,
to josilwany a jono ma jomako wor gi jocandi.
Jono ma jotimo can marac meno kibedi gi komo?
Jono ma jotimo can maber jonwaŋo wor gi genirok.
I tic matek je ma dhano timo, kemba nitie i iye,
to luwo kende kelo candi.
Sangaria pa jomariek obedo ŋaŋo pajo,
to jomamiŋ bende iŋeyo jo ro miŋo pajo.
Jakony ma luwo adieri botho jomathoth,

I lworo Rwoth dhano cungo ma kiyengere,

Lworo Rwoth obedo cakirok ma kwo,

Ŋata kikwakere mako nge nigi niaŋ madwoŋ,

Cuny m'okwe miyo del bedo maber,

Jono ma jodiyo jocandi joyeto jacwec pajo,

Rieko bedo iy'adundo pa ŋata nigi niaŋ,

Tiro miyo nono dongo,

Ŋeca ma timo tic gi rieko sangala kere,

Lew jomariek miyo ŋeyo,

Waŋ Rwoth nitie kisi kamoro,

Jamiŋo cayo fonji pa janywol,

Peco pa ŋat'otire nitie ŋaŋo kweth,

Tim pa jokidakana obedo amien ri Rwoth,

Cuny ma sangala miyo waŋ jo kisangala,

Paro pa ŋata niaŋ dwaro ŋeyo,

Ber bedo gi lim manok kareno ilworo Rwoth,

Ber camo fufa kama mar nitie i iye,

Ŋata kwako mako nge sigila dhaw,

Royo pa ŋata nyap bedo m'oyukino gi kudhin,

Nyathi mariek sangala bamere,

Miŋo obedo kisangala pa ŋat'ongoye gi rieko,

Ka k'omiyin rieko, can nyekere,

Royo pa ŋatariek tero go i kwo,

Rwoth turo woko peco pa jodelok,

Can pa jokidakana obedo amien ri Rwoth,

Waŋ jo ma bwonjo sangala jo,

Jono ma jocayo fonji wegi jocayere,

Lworo Rwoth obedo fonji i rieko,

Ji jotimo can,
to Rwoth ama nigi wac macowe.

Weyi ri Rwoth tic perin m'itimo,
aka can perin lakadho maber.
Rwoth otieko timo kisi gimoro g'atoŋa mere,

Jono je ma jogwayo jobedo amien ri Rwoth,

Iculo reco gi cikirok ma mar gi genirok,

Ka tim pa ji sangala Rwoth,
go miyo kiri jokwor pajo bedo i siem gi jo.
Ber bedo gi gimoro nyaka mathin m'inwaŋo i yo m'otire,

Ji jonyalo timo can,
to Rwoth ama nyutho gir'atima.
Wac ma rieko nitie i dhok kere,

Rapim m'otire gi latir jobedo apa Rwoth,

Obedo amien ri kere timo gimarac,

Dhok jo ma luwo tiro obedo yodirok pa kere,

Keme pa Rwoth obedo jamikwenda ma tho,

Bwonjo pa kere kelo kwo,

Nga ber nwaŋo rieko loyo zahabu!

Yo pa jomabeyo cero jo timo gimarac,

Delok kelo rerok,
aka gwayo kelo podho.
Ber bedo mamwol i dier jocandi,
loyo poko gim'onyaga gi jodelok.

Ŋatariek i cuny ilwoŋo ni janiaŋ,

Paro pa ŋatariek miyo luwo pere bedo ma rieko,

Awanya pa jotic miyo jo tic matek,

Dhano ma jagwayo wondo wadi,

Lwar obedo sangaria madwoŋ,
inwaŋo i kwo m'otire.
Ŋata kikwakere mako nge ber loyo jomeni,
aka ŋata kweyo nge pere ber loyo ŋata mako tindi madwoŋ.
Ji jobolo kwir,
to Rwoth ama ridho gimoro je.
Ber camo ŋinje cemo gi siem,

Paka mac temo feza gi zahabu,

Jatim gimarac winjo jakidakana,

Luwo maber kiripi gi jamiŋo,

Cami nyew cale tele ma miliel ruwaŋ jono ma jomiyo,

Ŋata cwako gimarac kelo mar,

Apuse donjo ri ŋata niaŋ,
loyo goco dimiya ri jamiŋo.
Jomarac jorango nyaka gwenyirok,

Ber romo gi arara madhako m'okwal nyithindhe,

Raco kilangoye i ot,

Mere bedo gi mar hongo je,

Obedo gim'ongoye kony miyo cikirok,

Ŋata japaro marac kilim bero,

Wac ma wok i dhok jamiŋo kelo kisika pere,

Wac pa jamwoŋo cale cemo mamit m'icamo gi woro,

Ŋata liwere i tic,
rom gi dhano ma janyeki gigipiny.

Paro mariek mito ŋeyo,

Ŋata nwaŋo dhako nwaŋo gimaber,

Nyapo kelo nindo kende,

Ŋata nyap lutho cinge i bakul,

aka ji ma Rwoth odak jopodh'iye.
Miŋo poŋ i cuny jayac,
to fonjo go kula kwanyo woko.
Diyo jocandi ŋey dhano woŋaŋ,
gi nyewo joŋaŋo, kelo nyaka rem.
Me wac pa jarieko.
Ciki ithin iwinji wac paran,
aka kethi fonji paran i paro.
Kole labedo rin kisangala k'ipoyo kwoŋe,
k'iluwo kwoŋe.
Ameno ilaketho geno i Rwoth,
ato atieko miyin ŋeyo jo konon.
Kole atieko ndiko rin wac piero adek,
ma rieko gi ŋeyo.
Ma nyuthin gim'otire g'adieri,
ŋey inyal miyo radwok m'otire ri jono ma joorin.
Ikir'inyaga jocandi kwoŋbedo jobedo jocandi,
kosa iŋisa ji ma bu gimoro i kapido.
Kole Rwoth ama osa rijo,
aka go piro kwo pa ŋata piro jo.
Ikir'imaki mere gi ji ma jo nge macek,
aka ikir'imakere gi ji ma jokano ŋonge.
Inyalo fonjirok kula pajo,
t'imoko i bwo.
Ikir'ibedi acel kwoŋ jono,
ma jocungo ri banja pa ji.
K'ingoye gi gim'inyalo culo gine banja,
ilamayin kanindo perin.
Ikir'ikodi kew macon,
ma kwarere perin joketho.
Jono ma jotimo tic gi kinen,
jolatic ri kerin,
aka jokilatiyo ri ji ma kisi ndelo.
K'ibedo piny cemo gi jadhum,
kaŋasa maber gima nitie ruwaŋin.
K'initie gi woro mathoth,
diy dwondin.
Ikir'iwanya cemo pa jadhum,
nyalo bedo ni go temin.
Ikir'iol gi temo dwaro ŋaŋo,
bedi mariek kwero.
Ilabwok kareno orere woko,
ka won oay gi bwombe abwap,
paka ango yupolo.
Ikir'icam cemo pa jogwondo,
kosa iwanya cemo pajo.
Kole jocale yer i lokoro,
jowaco rin ni, “Cemi aka imedhi!”
To jokinyuthi gima jowaco.
Ilaŋoko gim'oyido itieko camo,
aka ilanyeko kisangala perin.
Ikir'iluw ka jamiŋo winjo,
go lacayo rieko ma wac perin.
Ikir'ikodi kew macon,
kosa iroc i lowo pa nyithindho kic.
Kole jaboth pajo tek,
go lakiosa rijo kwoŋin.
Kethi paro perin i gim'ifonjin,
aka ciki ithin ri wac ma rieko.
Ikir'igal gi miyo nyithindho perin gir'acula,
k'icwado jo gi luth, jokilatho,
K'icwado jo gi luth,
ilabotho kwo pajo kwoŋ piny pa jom'otho.
Nyathi paran, ka cunyin riek,
cunyan bende lakisangala.
Adundo paran lasiemere,
k'iluwo gim'otire.
Ikir'iyey cunyin womaki nyeko gi joreco,
to medere lworo Rwoth.
Adieri kwo ma yuwaŋe nitie,
aka geno perin kilarumo.
Winji, nyathi paran, aka ibedi mariek,
ŋey ipar kwoŋ yo perin.
Ikir'ibedi i dier jomedho,
kosa i dier joworo ma jocamo riŋo.
Kole jomero gi joworo joladoŋ jocandi,
aka nindo lamiyo jowocaki ruko okuto.
Winji benin m'onywolin,
aka ikir'icay yokin ka go oti.
Nyew adieri, t'ikir'itana,
nyew rieko, fonji kodi niaŋ.
Ba joma jotimo gim'otire jolakisangala swa,
ŋata nywolo wode mariek lakisangala gi go.
Weyi benin gi yokin jowosangala,
weyi ŋata nywolin wosiemere.
Nyathi paran, miyan cunyin,
aka luw yo paran.
Kole malaya obedo bur maluth,
aka dhako ma timo cot obedo jwom madiny.
Go kiyo ji paka jakwo,
aka medo miyo ji kweth ngoye g'adieri.
Ŋa, manitie gi kidamba kodi rem?
Ŋa manitie gi dhaw, aka ŋa ma geŋisa?
Ŋa m'olimo adhola nono,
aka ŋa ma waŋe obokere?
Jono ma jogalo i medho,
jono ma jomedo temo ruwo math m'opokere.
Ikir'inen vini k'obokere,
ka walo i kikopo,
aka pie mothmoth.
Rumacen kaco paka thwol,
aka ŋulo kwir paka malasaŋ.
Waŋin laneno gigipiny kicar,
aka ilaparo t'iluwo gima kiniaŋere.
Ilacale ŋata tadere i dier nam,
paka ŋat'onindo malo wi kisul mel.
Ilawaco ni, “Jogoyan, t'akilimo litho,
akiwinjo kada litho.
Alacew sawa adi?
Aripo medho kendo.”
Ikir'imaki nyeko gi jokidakana,
kosa iwanya bedo kanyacel gi jo.
Kole timo teko kende ama joparo kwoŋe,
aka dhok jo luwo can marac kende.
Peco getere gi rieko,
cakere gi niaŋ.
Kisikin mere poŋ ro bedo gi ŋeyo,
gigipiny ma welo kodi maŋon.
Ŋatariek tek loyo ŋatatek,
aka ŋata nigi ŋeyo tek loyo jameni.
Kole inyalo cako lweny gi can ma rieko,
aka mic rieko kweth kelo loyo.
Jomamiŋ jokiniaŋ rieko,
ongoye gima jonyalo yawo dhok jo luwo i kapido.
Ŋata cano timo raco,
ilalwoŋo go ni jamifuto.
Can ma miŋo obedo reco,
aka jaminyom obedo amien ri ji je.
K'ilocere i ndelo ma teko,
meno ingoye gi meni adieri.
Ikir'igal gi botho jono m'itero neko,
kareno jongoye gi banja.
Inyalo rin waco ni kimaki kwoŋin,
to Were ma kaŋasa cuny ji oŋeyo atoŋa perin.
Go ma kuro adundo perin oŋeyo,
aka laculin cungo kwoŋ tim perin.
Nyathi paran, cami mo kic, kwoŋbedo obedo gimaber rin,
aka mo kic ma thon wok i ode mere mit i lewin.
Ŋey odoco ni rieko ber ri adundo perin,
k'ilimo rieko, ilabedo gi kwo ma yuwaŋe,
aka geno perin kilarumo.
Ikir'ibedi paka jobanirok jotimo kwoŋ pecin pa joma timo gim'otire,
ikir'icani kwalo pecin pajo.
Makada nende jopodhi dibirio, jolaay kendo,
to teko reyo woko jokidakana.
Ikir'isangala ka jokwor perin joromo gi teko,
aka ikir'iwey cunyin wosiemere ka jocer.
Kole Rwoth laneno aka kilakisangala,
to kwanyo woko nge pere kwoŋ jo.
Ikir'irembi ro ji mareco,
aka ikir'imaki nyeko gi jokidakana.
Kole jokidakana jongoye gi kwo ma yuwaŋe,
aka tala pajo latho.
Nyathi paran, lwor Rwoth gi kere,
aka ikir'ikwer winjo acel kwoŋ jo.
Kwoŋbedo jonyalo kelo teko abwap,
aka ŋa m'oŋeyo teko ma joje jonyalo kelo?
Me bende wac pa jarieko.
Timo nyakucel i thumo banja kiber.
Ŋata waco ri jakidakana ni bubanja,
ji jolakwoŋo go, aka piny ladak go.
To jono ma jomiyo jokidakana gir'acula,
lakadho maber gi jo aka jolalimo silwany.
Ŋata miyo radwok m'otire,
meno nyutho mere m'otire.
Yik tic perin ma woko,
neni ni kisi gimoro nitie i kare i ndelo,
aka nyaka rumacen igeti ot perin.
Ikir'ibedi jakony ri dhano g'atoŋa marac,
aka ikir'iluw twodo gi dhokin.
Ikir'iwaci ni ilatimo ri ji paka bende jotimo rin,
alaculo jo gima jotieko timo.
Abino aluwo cegin gi ndelo pa ŋata nyap,
cegin gi ndelo vini pa jamiŋo,
aka neni, oyido oyukino gi kudhin,
aka piny mere oyido opoŋ okure,
aka kor cel ma telin otur woko.
Aneno gime t'aparo kwoŋe,
akaŋasa aka anwaŋo fonjirok.
kosa dolo cingin nyaka mathin ywomirok,
kelo candi abwap paka jakwo,
aka miyin ibedo ma bu gimoro paka jalweny m'oyikere lweny.
Me agecin pa Solomon man ma jodhum pa kere Hezekia ma Yuda jokopila.
Obedo dwoŋ pa Were pano gigipiny,
t'obedo dwoŋ ri kerin dwaro gigipiny.
Paka polo oŋawere, aka piny luth,
apaka paro pa kerin kiŋeyere.
Yuy woko nyal wok i feza,
aka jandijo lanwaŋo gitimo atawo.
Kwany woko jokidakana ruwaŋ kere,
aka ker pere labed'iye tiro.
kosa irendere ni ibedo ŋatadwoŋ.
Ber ka okodin bedo i kabedo ma malo,
loyo k'owaci rin ay i kabedo ri ŋata loyin gi dwoŋ.
Gima waŋin oneno,
ikir'ikwaki tero i kapido.
Kwoŋbedo ilatimo aŋo i cowe,
ka jager perin okwot wiyin.
Osa wac mewin gi jager manyaliŋliŋ,
aka ikir'iwodhi kamaler.
Kakameno ŋat'owinjin lasewo wiyin,
aka ikilanyalo ciro.
Wac ma luwere i kare,
cale kicin ma zahabu i gim'othedhi gi feza.
Apuse ma rieko ri ŋata ciko ithe,
cale peta ma zahabu kosa thiwino ma zahabu.
Jomikwenda ma jotimo adieri ri ŋat'ooro jo,
jocale tor m'omakere i hongo ma keco,
