jodwoko kwo ri jodongo pajo.
Ŋata pakere gi ciko mic ma kimiy,
cale pondeponde gi koyo ma kikel koth.
Bedo moth nyalo dwoŋo jadhum,
aka lew jo mafoth nyalo turo cuny matek.
K'inwaŋo mo kic, cami nyaka ma romin,
ka k'obedo ameno, k'icamo kweth inyalo ŋok.
Tiendin wokiri woasa terin i ot pa jager perin,
ka k'obedo ameno jager laol kodin to dakin.
Ŋata luwo gitwodo kwoŋ jager,
cale abiro ma lweny, abor g'asere mabith.
Geno ŋat'ongoye gi yeyo i hongo ma teko,
cal lak jo ma yengere kosa tiendi jo m'oŋol.
Ŋata wero wer ri cuny ma rembo,
cal ŋata mayo dhano nanga i ŋico,
kosa cumbi m'orey iy'adhola.
aka ka riyo neko jo, miy jo pi jowomadhi.
Kole ameno apaka iladhuro cuk mac i wi jo,
aka Rwoth lamiyin kemba.
Awaca nyingi kelo nge,
Paka koyo ma yumalo kelo koth.
Ber bedo i sonda ma wi kisul ot,
loyo bedo gi dhako ma jakigeŋisa i ot.
Paka pi maŋic ber ri adundo ma riyo neko,
bende apaka wac maber m'owok i piny mabor cal.
Ŋata timo gim'otire ma miyere ri ŋatarac,
cal waŋ pi m'opoŋ cwodho kosa jwom makoc.
K'obedo gimaber camo mo kic mathoth,
kosa rango dwoŋ i wi dwoŋ.
Ŋata kinyal kuro dwoŋ,
cale tindi madwoŋ m'othangere, m'ongoye gi kor ot.
K'obedo gimaber miyo jamiŋo dwoŋ,
paka pe kiber i hongo ma milengela kosa koth i hongo ma keco.
Kwoŋ m'ongoye atoŋa kinyal tundo kwoŋin,
paka obico ma ay to sala m'ongoye gi kapie.
Kayina mito kiboko,
paka punde mito tweyo dhok jo,
aka jamiŋo mito goco.
Ikir'idwok jamiŋo cungo kwoŋ miŋo pere,
kosa in bende ilacale jamiŋo.
Dwoki jamiŋo cungo kwoŋ miŋo pere,
aka go lacale ŋatariek ruwaŋe.
K'ioro jamiŋo tero mikwenda,
meno cal ŋado tiendi dhano gi madho kwir ma neko jo.
Jamiŋo nyalo wiro ageca gi dhoke,
paka tiendi jar'aŋolo nyalo wiyirok.
Miyo jamiŋo dwoŋ,
cal tweyo tele iy'asumulo.
Paka jamero futere golo kudho m'ocwowo cinge,
apaka jamiŋo futere g'ageca i dhoke.
Jadwoŋ ma miyo kisi dhano litho,
cal ŋata miyo jamiŋo kosa jamero ma joluwo rigin tic.
cal gwok ma wire to camo ŋok pere.
Dhano mariek ruwaŋe,
kiri jamiŋo nitie gi geno loyo go.
Ŋata nyap waco ni, “Simbwor nitie woko,
aka lanekan i royo.”
Ŋata nyap wire i kanindo,
paka thigo wire i miango mere.
Ŋata nyap lutho cinge i bakul,
aka bedo rigo olo swa rwako i dhoke.
Ŋata nyap paro ni go riek,
loyo ji abirio ma jomiyo radwok ri atoŋa maber.
Ŋata donjo i dhaw ma k'apere,
cal woth i royo t'iliero gwok m'inwaŋo gi ithe.
Paka janeko ma celo gilweny ma neki g'aserin cal,
apaka bende ŋata wondo jager to waco rumacen ni oyido loko wac cal.
Ka yen ongoye, mac tho,
aka kama mwoŋo ongoy'iye, dhaw rumo.
Paka maka wodho cuk m'okur aka yen moko mac,
apaka bende jadhaw cako piem.
Wac pa jamwoŋo cal cemo mamit m'icamo gi woro,
donjo i iy jo piyo.
Dhok jo ma luwo g'atoŋa marac i cuny jo,
cal minyin ma feza m'oum gine atawo ma lowo.
Jakwor rendere i luwo pere,
aka kano ŋonge.
Ka jakwor oluwo gi mwolo, ikir'iyey,
kwoŋbedo nitie amien abirio m'opanere i cunye.
Dhano nyalo umo dakirok gi twodo,
to kidakana pa jakwor lathangere i dier lwak.
Ŋata kunyo bur won lapodh'iye,
aka tele lagik to diyo ŋata won cako ŋilo.
Lew ŋata twodo dak ŋata mito timo rigo marac,
aka dhok jo ma twodo kelo rerok.
kole ikuya gima ndelo no nyalo kelo.
Weyi ŋatiman ama wopakin, makiweno dhokin won,
jakicar, makiweno in won.
Tele pek, aka kwoyo thoth,
to peko pajo kiloy nge pa jamiŋo.
Keme ger, aka nge reyo woko,
to ŋa manyalo ciro nyeko?
Ber tiro dhano kamaler,
loyo mar ma kinyuthi.
Litho ma mere miyo ber loyo,
ka jakwor ocwiyo lembin.
Ŋat'oyeŋ kwero kada mo kic,
to ka kec nekin, kiri cemo makec bedo mamit.
Ŋata bedo bor gi peco,
cal winyo ma bedo bor gi ode.
Mo akudha gi buban sangala cuny jo,
to teko turo cuny jo.
Ikir'ijwangi mere perin kosa mere pa janywol perin,
aka ikir'ikidhi i ot pa wat perin i ndelo ma teko kende.
Jager manitie cegin,
ber loyo wat manitie bor.
Bedi mariek nyathi paran, aka miy cunyan wosangala,
ŋey anyal dwoko ŋata pusa an.
Jomariek joneno teko bino to jopondo,
to joparo macek jomedo kidho yu kama teko nitie i iye, aka jocandere.
Maki nanga pa ŋata cungo ri banja pa jakicar,
gi ri banja pa japath.
Ŋata m'otho jager gi dwonde malo,
ka nyaka ocew odikin,
inyalo waco ni kwoŋo go.
Dhako ma jakigeŋisa,
cal koth ma nyidho makirum.
Temo miyo go liŋ,
cal kweyo koyo kosa mako mo i cingi jo.
Cuma pako cuma nyawote,
aka dhano acel yawo paro pa ŋatiman.
Ŋata kuro yath vini lacamo olemo mere,
aka ŋata kuro jadwoŋ lalimo dwoŋ.
Paka pi wotho cal pa dhano,
apaka bende paro dhano wotho go kamaler.
Paka piny pa jom'otho kiyeŋ,
apaka bende waŋ jo kiyeŋ.
Paka mac temo feza gi zahabu,
apaka bende itemo dhano gi pako go.
Inyalo odo jamiŋo gi ŋano i pany gi loki,
t'ikinyal wodho woko miŋo pere.
Ŋey nger ma mwendi perin joriyo i iye,
aka dew kwoŋ dhok perin.
Ŋaŋo kibedi cil gi cil,
aka sangaria kitundi i luse je.
Nyar lum to thwo, aka man wolothi,
nyar lum ma wi tendere.
Nyithindhi rombo jolamiyin yer rombo ma timo nanga,
aka diegi jolawodho pesa ma nyewo lowo.
Ilabedo gi cak diegi ma romo ma cemo perin,
ma romo peco perin gi ŋecin perin manyir.
Jokidakana joringo makada nende ongoye ŋata riemo jo,
to ŋat'otire jamisen paka simbwor.
Ka piny ogwenyere,
labedo gi jodhum kweth i hongo macek,
to jadhum mariek kelo kwe piny.
Jadhum ma diyo jocandi,
cal koth ma cwe to nyeko woko cemo.
Jono ma jodak cik jopako jokidakana,
to jono ma jokuro cik jolwenyo kwoŋ jo.
Jokidakana jokiniaŋ tiro,
to jono ma jodwaro Rwoth joniaŋ odoco.
Ber bedo jacandi t'iwotho iy'adieri,
loyo bedo jaŋaŋo ma luwo yo ma banirok.
Jono ma jokuro cik jobedo nyithindho ma joniaŋ,
to merin pa joworo jokwoto wi jonywol.
Ŋata coko lim gi magowa kweth,
coko ri ŋata nyutho wor ri jocandi.
Ka dhano kiwinji cik,
kiri kwayo pere obedo amien.
Jono ma jorwako ŋat'otire i yo marac,
jolapodho i bur ma wegi jokunyo,
to ŋat'ongoye g'apuse lalunjo gimaber.
Joŋaŋo joparo ni joriek,
to jacandi manitie gi niaŋ oŋeyo maloyo.
Ka ŋata timo gim'otire oloyo, bedo dwoŋ madwoŋ,
to ka jakidakana oloyo, ji jopondo.
Ongoye ŋata muŋo reco ma latimo maber,
to ŋata pusere aka weyo reco nwaŋo wor.
Kisangala bedo ri ŋata lworo jo,
to ŋata cunye tek lapodho i teko.
Jakidakana ma dhumo jocandi,
cal simbwor ma hola kosa arara ma jero.
Jadhum m'ongoye gi niaŋ obedo jadic mager,
to ŋata odak ngoye pa tiro ladhumo ma hongo malac.
Ka dhano otiŋo bieto ma oyo remo pa ŋatiman,
go won okunyo bur pere,
riameno wongoye ŋata wokonyi go.
Ŋata timo adieri labedo maber,
to ŋata luwo yo m'okom lapodho abwap.
Ŋata furo labedo gi cemo ma romo,
to ŋata nyeko sawa luwo gima bukony labedo jacandi.
Ŋata timo adieri lalimo silwany madwoŋ,
to ŋata kwakere ŋaŋo lalimo gir'acula.
Timo nyakucel kiber,
kucel muma mugat nyalo miyo dhano timo gim'okom.
Jogwondo jokwakere ŋaŋo,
to jokiŋey ni ndelo ma candi labino.
Ŋata pusa dhano lalimo wor rumacen,
loyo ŋata biewo gi lewe.
Ŋata kwalo bamere kosa yokimere,
to waco ni meno k'obedo banja,
obedo jakwo.
Jaworo kelo teko,
to ŋata geno Rwoth laŋaŋo.
Jono ma joluwo paro pajo wegi jomiŋ,
to jono ma jowotho i rieko jobedo maber.
Ŋata poko jocandi kilacando gimoro,
to ŋata kidew kwoŋ jolalimo kwoŋ kweth.
Ka jokidakana jodhumo, ji jopondo,
to ka jorere woko, ji m'otire jodhumo kendo.
Ŋat'ipusa, kucel medo wictek,
larere abwap ma kilaneno kendo.
Ka ŋata timo gim'otire dhumo, ji josangala,
to ka jakidakana dhumo, ji joywak.
Nyathi m'omaro rieko sangala janywol,
to timo mere gi malayin obedo nyeko lim.
Kere kelo siem i piny gi rieko,
to ŋata mito camo nyew larere woko.
Ŋata nyoma jager,
meno yaro bwo ri tiendi jager.
Jareco moko i reco pere won,
to ŋata timo gim'otire wero to sangala.
Ŋata timo gim'otire oŋeyo gima ripo gi jocandi,
to jokidakana jongoye gi nger niaŋ no.
Ji ma joŋalok jonyalo waŋo tindi madwoŋ gibe,
to ŋatariek waro woko nge.
Ka jarieko osere gi jamiŋo,
bed'iye nyero, koko gi yet.
Ji ma jonek jodak ŋat'ongoye g'apuse,
aka jodwaro kwo pa jom'otire.
Jamiŋo nyutho nge pere kamaler,
to ŋatariek dhumo nge.
Ka jadhum winjo wac twodo,
jotel pere je jolabedo jokidakana.
Jacandi gi jodic jorom ama,
Rwoth miyo waŋ joje lero.
Ka kere thumo banja ri jocandi ma kitim nyakucel,
ker pere labedo cil gi cil.
Gir'acula gi tiro nyathi kelo rieko,
to nyathi ma jalithirok kelo wickwot ri yokimere.
Ka jakidakana dhumo, reco medere,
to jom'otire jolabedo makwo neno podho pa nger jono.
Miy nyathi gir'acula, aka kilamiyin rembo,
lamiyo cunyin wosangala.
Kama menyirok ongoye i iye,
ji jorwenyo yo,
to josilwany a jono ma jokuro cik pa Were.
Wac kende kitir ŋecin,
makada nende joniaŋ, jokilawinjo.
Ŋata kwakere gi luwo,
kiri jamiŋo je nitie gi geno loyo go.
Ŋata miyo ŋeca pere kisi gimoro wok i thino,
i gike mere ŋeca no labedo rigo teko.
Ŋata mako nge jadhaw kicar,
aka timo reco kweth.
Noro pa dhano kelo podho pere,
to ŋata mwol lalimo dwoŋ.
Bedo mere gi jakwo obedo dak kwo perin won,
kwoŋbedo ikinyal luwo adieri ro kwoŋirok m'itimo.
Lworo dhano obedo ciko bwo,
to ŋata geno Rwoth bedo maber.
Ji kweth jodwaro wor wok bongi jadhum,
to Rwoth ama miyo tiro.
Jokidakana jobedo amien ri jom'otire,
aka jom'otire jobedo amien ri jokidakana.
Me wac pa Agur wod pa Jake.
Dhano waco ri Ithiel,
ri Ithiel gi Ukal.
Adieri amiŋ swa loyo ji je,
angoye gi niaŋ ma nyadhano.
An fodi akifonjere rieko,
kosa fodi akiŋeyo gimoro kwoŋ Ŋataleŋ.
Ŋa m'otieko idho polo to loro piny,
aka ŋa m'otieko coko koyo i cinge.
Ŋa m'otieko mino pi i nanga,
aka ŋa m'otieko nwaŋo gike ma piny?
Ŋata go ilwoŋo nedi aka nyathi pere ilwoŋo nedi?
Adieri iŋeyo.
Kisi wac pa Were tundo i kare,
go obedo kwot ri jono ma jopondo i go.
Ikir'imedi wac pere,
kosa go lakipusa in, aka ilaŋeyo ni ibedo jatwodo.
Gigipiny ario m'akwayin, Rwoth,
aka ikir'ithwonan kafodi akwo.
Kwany woko kwoŋan ngoye g'adieri gi twodo,
ikir'imiyan candi kosa ŋaŋo,
pidhan gi cemo m'amito.
Kwoŋbedo k'abedo gi mathoth, alakwedin,
t'awaco ni, “Rwoth obedo ŋa?”
K'abedo jacandi, alakwalo,
t'akelo wickwot ri nyingin.
Ikir'iluw pokopoko kwoŋ ŋeca ri jadwoŋ pere,
kosa ŋeca no lakwoŋin, aka ilabedo jabanja.
Nitie luse ji ma jokwoŋo bacere pajo,
aka jokimiy yokere pajo silwany.
Nitie luse ji ma joparo ni jotire ruwaŋ jo wegi,
kucel cilo pajo kilony.
Nitie luse ji ma jo waŋtek,
aka jonyoma joman.
Nitie luse ji ma lak jo obedo abor,
ma lak jo obedo apalin,
joreyo woko jocandi i piny,
gi ji ma bu gimoro i dier ji.
Kacwecwe nitie gi nyithindho manyir ario,
joje joywak ni, miy, miy.
Nitie gigipiny adek ma kiyeŋ jo,
g'aŋwen ma kirom jo.
Piny pa jom'otho, ici ma kinywol,
piny ma riyo pi neko noknok,
kodi mac maliel makitho.
Waŋ jo ma nyoma bajo,
aka cayo winjo min jo,
agak ma milelo jolafudho woko,
aka acut jolacuto woko.
Nitie gigipiny adek m'obedo gir'aura ran,
aŋwen m'akiniaŋ kwoŋe.
Yo pa ango ma ay malo i hongo,
yo pa thwol ma yware i tele.
Yo pa mel m'icewo i name wi pi,
kodi nger ma jacwo gi dhako jomitere i iye.
Me yo pa dhako ma jakidakana,
go cemo to yweyo woko dhoke,
aka waco ni ongoye gima go otimo.
Nitie gigipiny adek ma piny kirin rijo,
aka nitie aŋwen m'akinyal ciro.
Ŋeca ma lokere kere,
jamiŋo ma bedo gi kisi gima go mito camo,
Dhako ma jadakirok ma limo cwore,
kodi ŋeca manyako ma tero kabedo pa dhakodwoŋ pere.
Nitie gigipiny aŋwen ma josisiri i piny,
kucel joriek swa.
Kacuŋino jongoye gi meni,
kucel jobedo gi cemo i hongo ma ceŋ.
Tho jokitek,
kucel jogeto pecin pajo i telin.
Bonyo jongoye gi kere,
kucel joŋanjo i tome paka jolweny.
Ragwe m'inyalo mako i cingin,
kucel inyalo nwaŋo jopeco pa kere.
Nitie gigipiny adek ma jonyumo maŋon neno,
aka aŋwen ma jowotho gi noro.
Simbwor matek loyo i dier ogwaŋe madudi,
aka kiwire ŋwec ruwaŋ moro je.
Wod gweno ma koko, wod diel,
kodi kere ma nyumo ruwaŋ ji pere.
K'inen oyido ibedo jamiŋo ma won pakere,
kosa oyido itimo can marac,
um dhokin gi cingin.
Paka cak afwoya nywolo mo dhiaŋ,
apaka um jo cwer remo k'odiy,
aka kwinyo nge kelo gorok.
Me wac pa Kere Lemuel kwoŋ bieto ma yokimere ofonjo go.
Aŋo wodan, aŋo wodan m'anywolo!
Aŋo wodan ma cikirok paran!
Ikir'ikethi meni perin mito mon,
kosa yo pa mon ma reyo woko kerin.
Kiripi ri kerin, awi Lemuel,
kiripi ri kerin madho vini,
gi ri jodhum madho medho matek.
Ka jomedho, wicwil lamako jo gi cik m'oketh,
aka jokilathielo ji ma bu gimoro.
Miy dhano macegin tho medho matek,
gi vini ri ŋata nitie i litho ma rem,
weyi jowomadhi, aka wiy jo wowil gi candi pajo,
aka jokiri jowopoy teko pajo.
Yaw dhokin iluwi ri jono ma wegi jokinyal luwo,
gwok jono ma wegi jokinyal.
Luw, aka luw gim'otire,
osa ri jocandi gi ri ji ma bu gimoro.
Ŋa manyalo nwaŋo dhako ma janyalo?
Go diwelo loyo thiwino.
Cuny cwore geno go,
aka cwore kilabedo ma bu gimoro.
Go timo ri cwore bero makiweno raco,
i kwo pere je.
Go rango yer rombo gi nanga mafoth,
aka timo tic gi cinge gi mar.
Go cal paka mel pa jomitan,
go omo cemo pere wok bor.
Go ay malo worwor,
aka miyo peco pere cemo,
to poko ŋecin pere ma mon tic.
Go rango lowo to nyewo,
aka gi pesa ma go olimo pidho ndelo vini.
Go timo tic gi meni,
aka obedo dhako ma cinge tek.
Go niaŋ ni gima go timo nitie cwe,
aka tala pere kitho wor.
Go won wiyo uzi pere,
aka won kwoyo nanga pere.
Go poko gigipiny ri jocandi,
gi ri ji ma bu gimoro.
Go kirembi ri peco pere i ndir ma cwir,
kwoŋbedo joje joruko nanga mapek.
Go won kwoyo sukin pere,
aka nangin pere itimo gi nanga mafoth manyarangi ariŋo.
Cwore oŋeyere i dier ji ma tindi madwoŋ,
aka go bedo acel kwoŋ jodongo ma lowo.
Go kwoyo nangin mafoth aka tana jo,
aka go tana dende ri jomitan.
Go obedo dhako matek, aka iworo go,
go kibwoki ri kwo ma yuwaŋe.
Go luwo wac ma rieko,
aka fonjo wor.
Go kuro peco pere,
aka kicam cemo ma nyapo.
Nyithindho pere jolwoŋo go jasilwany,
kanyacel gi cwore ma pako go.
Cwore waco ni, “Mon kweth jotimo maber,
t'iloyo joje.”
Yath ger obedo twodo, aka ŋono rumo,
to dhako ma lworo Rwoth ripo wopak.
Foy go ri gima go timo,
aka weyi tic pere womiy go dwoŋ i tindi.
Me wac pa Jafonji, wod Daudi, kere i Yerusalem.
Pilok ma gik pilok apaka Jafonji owaco,
pilok ma gik pilok, kisi gimoro je obedo pilok.
Dhano olim magowa aŋo i tic pere je,
ma go oyo rigo kwok i ceŋ maliel?
Luse kadho, aka luse bino,
to piny doŋ cil gi cil.
Waŋceŋ wok to waŋceŋ podho,
aka kwakere i kabedo mere kama wok'iye gine.
Koyo kudho yupiny,
aka kadho thoko yumalo,
koyo minere kadho,
aka koyo gik kam'ocako minirok'iye gine.
Malawin je jomol i nam,
kucel nam kipoŋ,
i kabedo ma malawin mol'iye,
kenyo jomedo mol'iye.
Gigipiny je jolocere,
ma dhano kinyal waco,
waŋ jo kiyeŋ gi neno,
kosa ithi jo kipoŋ gi winjo wac.
Gimoro je m'otieko bedo ama labedo,
aka gimoro je m'otiek timo am'ila timo;
aka ongoye gimanyen i pendi waŋceŋ.
Nitie gimoro m'ilawaco ni,
“Neni, gime nyen?”
Oyido je nitie con, i hongo macene,
mafodi wan.
Gigipiny macon kipoy,
aka gigipiny ma labino bende k'opoy,
gi jono ma jobedi rumacen.
An, Jafonji, oyido abedo kere ma Isiraili paka rom i Yerusalem.
Amiyo cunyan dwaro gi rango gi rieko kisi gimoro je manitie i pendi polo, obedo tic matek ma Were otieko miyo ji ni jowooli gine.
Atieko neno tic je ma jotieko timo i pendi waŋceŋ, aka neni, kisi gimoro je obedo pilok gi riemo koyo.
Gim'okom kinyal twenyo,
aka gim'ongoye kinyal kwano.
Aka amiyo cunyan ŋeyo rieko gi ŋeyo neko gi miŋo. Aniaŋ ni me bende obedo riemo koyo.”
Kole i rieko mathoth nitie aŋedha cuny mathoth,
aka ŋatimoro je ma medo ŋeyo, medo kumo.
Awaco iy'adundo paran ni, “Biye pama, alatemo winjo kisangala, t'asiemere.” To neni, me bende obedo pilok.
Awaco kwoŋ nyero ni, “Obedo miŋo.” Aka kwoŋ kisangala ni, “Kony mere bende aŋo?”

Arango i cunyan nger ma miyo delkwoŋan kisangala gi vini; makada nende cunyan oyido fodi telan gi rieko, nger ma kiswana miŋo, cuka alaneno ginaŋo maber ma ji jolatimo i pendi polo i hongo ma ndelo macek ma kwo pajo.
Atimo tic madongo, ageto udi ri an won t'apidho ndelin vini ri an won.
Afuro ndelin ri an won, gi ndelin olemo, t'apidh'iye kisi yath ma nyak olemo.
Atimo ri an won kidiwin ma pi m'anyalo dhieko lul ma yen ma jodongo.
Anyewo ŋecin ma cwo gi ma mon, t'abedo gi ŋecin ma jonywole i ot paran. Abedo bende gi lim madwoŋ ma dhok, mwendi, rombo gi diegi, loyo jono je ma jopen bedo ran i Yerusalem.
Acoko ri an won feza, zahabu gi lim pa kerin kodi mar'adece. Anwaŋo jower ma cwo gi ma mon, kodi gima siemo ji, gi mon kweth ma githenge.
Kisi gimoro je ma waŋan ogomba akipano kwoŋ jo; akicero cunyan siemirok, kole cunyan onwaŋo siemirok i tic paran je, aka me obedo kemba paran wok kwoŋ tic paran je.
Kenyo t'aparo kwoŋ tic je ma cingan otieko timo gi kwok m'aoyo ma timo, aka neni, je obedo pilok gi riemo koyo, aka ongoye magowa i pendi waŋceŋ.
Ameno t'awire paro kwoŋ rieko, neko gi miŋo; aŋo ma jacwo m'obin rumacen pa kere otim? Nyaka gim'otieko timo.
Kenyo t'aniaŋ ni rieko ber loyo miŋo paka lero ber loyo mudho.
Jomariek joneno bor, jomamiŋ jowotho i mudho. Kucel aŋeyo bende ni teko acel podho kwoŋ joje.
Kenyo awaco i cunyan ni, “Gima timere ri jamiŋo bende latimere ran, onyo raŋo oyido abedo ŋatariek swa?” T'awaco ri adundo paran ni, me bende obedo pilok.
Rupiri ongoye rapoy pa jarieko kosa jamiŋo, neno ni i hongo ma bino lanwaŋere ni wiy jo otieko wil gi jo con. To gidhier ni, ŋatariek gi ŋatamiŋ je jolatho?
Riameno adaki kwo, kwoŋbedo gima timere i pendi waŋceŋ obedo teko ran; kole kisi gimoro je obedo pilok gi riemo koyo.
Adaki olo paran je m'atimo i pendi waŋceŋ, neno ni aripo weyo ri dhano m'obin k'atieko tho.
Ŋa m'oŋeyo ka go obedi ŋatariek kosa ŋatamiŋ? Kucel go labedo jadwoŋ ma kisi gimoro je m'atieko ol'iye t'aor'iye rieko paran i pendi waŋceŋ. Me bende obedo pilok.
Ameno awire t'amiyo cunyan ngoye gi geno kwoŋ tic paran je ma olo paran i pendi waŋceŋ,
Kole nitie dhano m'otiyo i rieko gi ŋeyo kodi ndijo, kucel dhano ma k'otiyo ri gino am'iweyo rigo. Me bende obedo pilok gi gimarac madwoŋ.
Dhano olim aŋo i olo pere je gi kinen je ma cunye, ma go ool'iye i pendi waŋceŋ?
Kole ndelo pere je opoŋ gi litho, aka tic pajo obedo aŋedha cuny; kiri wor paro pajo kiywomere. Me bende obedo pilok.
Kole ka k'obedo go, ŋa m'ocem, kendo ŋa m'ofore?
Kole ri nyatoro maber ruwaŋe, go otieko miyo rieko, ŋeyo gi kisangala; to ri ŋata timo reco, go miyo go tic ma coko gi dhuro, nyaka ma miyo ŋataber ruwaŋ Were. Me bende obedo pilok kodi riemo koyo.
Ri kisi gimoro nitie hongo m'oyik, hongo ma ripo ri kisi gima nitie i pendi polo.
Hongo ma nywolirok, gi hongo ma tho;
hongo ma pidho, gi hongo ma fudho.
Hongo ma neko, gi hongo ma cango,
hongo ma turo, gi hongo ma geto.
Hongo ma oyo pigi waŋ jo, gi hongo ma nyero,
hongo ma ywak, gi hongo ma miel.
Hongo ma ywoyo telin, gi hongo ma coko telin kanyacel,
hongo ma podho akor, gi hongo ma weyo podho akor.
Hongo ma rango, gi hongo ma rwenyo,
hongo ma kuro, gi hongo ma bolo woko.
Hongo ma yeco, gi hongo ma kwoyo,
hongo ma liŋ, gi hongo ma luwo.
Hongo ma mitirok, gi hongo ma dakirok,
hongo ma lweny, gi hongo ma siem.
Jatic olim magowa aŋo wok kwoŋ olo pere?
Atieko neno tic ma Were oyimo ri ji ni jowooli gine.
Go otieko timo kisi gimoro je maŋon i hongo pere ma ripo, medo kwoŋ meno go oketho iy'adundin pajo ŋeyo gima nitie yumalo, kucel ji jokinyal niaŋ tic ma Were otieko timo wok i cako kiri i gike.
Aŋeyo ni ongoye bero rijo, to ri dhano forok gi timo bero i kwo pere,
aka ni dhano je ripo cemo gi medho to neno bero i olo pere, obedo mic pa Were.
Aŋeyo ni kisi gimoro je ma Were timo yindira cil gi cil, ongoye gim'inyalo medo kwoŋe, aka ongoye gim'inyalo kwanyo kwoŋe, Were otieko timo, ŋey ji jowocungi i lworo ruwaŋe.
Kisi gima nitie, oyido otieko bedo con, kisi gima labedo, otieko bedo con, aka Were larango gim'otieko timere.
Kendo atieko neno i pendi waŋceŋ ni, i kabedo pa tiro, kidakana oyido nitie, aka i kabedo pa timo gim'otire, kidakana oyido bende nitie.
Awaco i cunyan ni, “Were lathumo banja ri joma timo gim'otire gi jokidakana, rupiri go otieko yiko hongo ma ripo ri kisi gimoro, gi kisi tim.”
Awaco i cunyan kwoŋ ji ni Were temo jo ma nyutho ni jocale rigin ogwaŋe.
Kole gima podho kwoŋ ji bende ama podho kwoŋ ogwaŋe; paka ji jotho, apaka bende ogwaŋe jotho. Joje jonitie gi luya acel, aka ji jongoye gi gima joloyo gine ogwaŋe; kole je obedo pilok.
Kisi gimoro je kadho i kabedo acel, kisi gimoro je owok i fukefuke, aka kisi gimoro je gik i fukefuke.
Ŋa m'oŋeyo ka cuny pa ji kadho malo aka cuny p'ogwaŋe loro kadho piny i lowo?
T'aniaŋ nyaka ni ongoye gimaber, loyo dhano kisangala i tic pere won, kole meno obedo adec pere. Ŋa m'okel go neno gim'obedi ka go otieko tho?
Kenyo awire t'aneno adica je m'itimo i pendi waŋceŋ. Aka neni, pigi waŋ jom'idiyo, m'ongoye ŋat'odiy cuny jo! Kareno joma diyo jo, jonitie gi meni, to ngoye ŋat'odiy cuny jo.
Kenyo aparo ni joma jotieko tho, jonitie kama ber loyo joma fodi kwo.
To maber loyo joje no, obedo dhano meno ma fodi k'obedo, meno ma fodi k'oneno tim mareco ma timere i pendi waŋceŋ.
Abino aneno ni kisi olo gi ndijo je ma tic, wok i dhano mako nyeko gi nyawote. Me bende obedo pilok gi riemo koyo.
Jamiŋo dolo cinge, to miyo delkwoŋe litho.
Ber cingi jo acel m'oliŋ, loyo cingi jo ario m'opoŋ gi olo, kodi riemo koyo.
Awire kendo, t'aneno pilok i pendi waŋceŋ.

Nitie ji ma jobedo kendi jo, ma jongoye gi wot jo kosa wutmin jo, kucel ongoye rijo gike ma olo pajo je, aka waŋ jo bende kiyeŋ gi ŋaŋo. Jopenjere ni, “Aol ri ŋa, ma an won akisiemere?” Me bende obedo pilok gi tic i teko.
J'ario joloyo ŋat'acel, kwoŋbedo jonitie gi kemba maber ri olo pajo.
Kole k'acel opodho piny, acel latiŋo nyawote, to kidamba ri ŋata nitie kende, ka go opodho ongoye nyawote m'otiŋ go malo.
Bende ka j'ario jonindo kanyacel, jobedo malieth, to ŋat'acel bende nyalo nedi bedo malieth kende?
Dhano nyalo loyo ŋata nitie kende gi meni, to j'ario jolaciro ŋato. Uzi m'omin didek kicoti piyo.
Soye ma jacandi mariek, ber loyo kere m'oti to miŋ, ma kilatero rieko m'imiyo go kendo.
Ŋatimoro adieri nyalo wok i katwec to bedo kere, makada nende onywole jacandi i ker?
Aneno jomakwo je ma jowotho i pendi waŋceŋ, t'aniaŋ ni nitie soye i dier jo ma lalunjo kere.
Ongoye gike ri ji je kiri ri jono ma jopen rijo. Kucel jono ma jobin rumacen jok'ofore i go. Adieri me bende obedo pilok gi riemo koyo.
Gwok tiendin k'ikidho i Ot pa Were. Corok cegin winjo ber loyo cowirok ma jomamiŋ jomiyo, jokipar kada ni jotimo gimarac.
Ikir'ikwakere gi dhokin, kosa ikir'ikwakere i cunyin tuco wac ruwaŋ Were, kole Were nitie i polo, aka in initie i piny; riameno weyi wac perin wobedi manok.
Ameno k'itimo cikirok ri Were, ikir'igali gi timo, kole go kiwinji maber gi jomamiŋ. Tim gim'iciko.
Bedo m'ikitimo cikirok ber loyo k'iciko t'iweyo m'ikitimo.
Ikir'iyey dhokin womiy delkwoŋin wotim reco, aka iwaci ruwaŋ jamikwenda ni oyido obedo gikomo; kosa Were lamako nge gi wac perin, to reyo woko tic ma cingin.
Kole ka lek thoth wac nono bedo mathoth, to lwor Were.
Ikir'ibedi gi dhier k'ineno idiyo jacandi, aka iwiro tiro gi gim'otire iy'adec. Kole kisi jatel nigi jatel malo pere ma dhumo go, aka nitie jatel madwoŋ loyo joje.
To i je bero pa kere bedo i lowo m'ofur ndelin mere.
Ŋat'omaro feza kilayeŋ gi feza, aka ŋat'omaro lim kilalimo ma romo. Me bende obedo pilok.
Ka ŋaŋo omedere, jono ma jocamo bende jomedere, aka wegi mere jolimo magowa aŋo kwanyowoko neno gi waŋ jo?
Nindo pa jogoy fut mit, obedi ni jocemo adec kosa i thotho, to thoŋino pa jaŋaŋo kiyey go nindo.
Nitie gimarac ma kiwacere acel m'atieko neno i pendi waŋceŋ. Jaŋaŋo okano lim pere ri litho pere,
to ŋaŋo no orwenyo i mitan marac, go onywolo wode, to nwaŋere ni ongoye gi gimoro i cinge.
Paka dhano wok i iy min kinyoro, ameno apaka go lagik paka go obino, go k'otiŋ kada gimoro ma olo pere, m'oter i cinge.
Me bende obedo gimarac ma kiwacere; paka go obino, ameno apaka go lakadho. Onyo magowa aŋo ma go nitie gine ma go ol ri koyo?
Medo kwoŋ meno, hongo pere je go lacemo i mudho, go lamako nge, i two gi mako ŋonge.
Me gim'atieko neno ni ber; Obedo gima ŋon aka ma ripo ni dhano wocemi to medho to siemere won ri tic pere i pendi waŋceŋ, i hongo ma kwo macek ma Were omiyo go; kole meno obedo adec pere.
Kisi dhano bende ma Were otieko miyo lim gi ŋaŋo, Were bende omiyo go meni ma cemo wok'iye, limo kemba pere, gi bedo gi kisangala i olo pere. Me obedo mic pa Were.
Kole go k'onyal paro kwoŋ ceko ma kwo pere, kwoŋbedo Were miyo go riwin gi kisangala ma cunye.
Nitie gimarac m'atieko neno i pendi waŋceŋ, aka timere swa kwoŋ ji.
Nyatoro je ma Were miyo go lim, ŋaŋo gi dwoŋ, ma kicandi gima kwo pere gomba, kucel Were kiyey go winjo cwe ma gigipiny me, to jakicar ama lawinjo cwe mere. Me bende obedo pilok, kodi litho marac.
Dhano nyalo nywolo nyithindho 100 to kwo ma hongo kweth; to kada oro pere obedi kweth nedi, ka go k'owinjo cwe ma gigipiny mabeyo ma kwo, kosa k'oyiki go, awaco ni, ici apodha woko ber loyo go.
Kole bino i pilok to kadho i mudho, aka i mudho nyinge umere.
Medo kwoŋ meno fodi k'oneno waŋceŋ kosa k'oŋeyo gimoro, kucel nwaŋo ywomirok loyo ŋati ca mere.
Makada nende go medi kwo oro gana ario, to k'oneno gigipiny mabeyo, joje jokikidhi i kabedo acel?
Olo pa dhano je obedo ri iye, kucel awanya kiyeŋ.
Ŋatariek loyo jamiŋo g'aŋo? Aka jacandi nitie g'aŋo, go m'oŋeyo nger ma kwo ruwaŋ jomakwo?
Ber swa gima waŋ neno loyo awanya ma waya; me bende obedo pilok gi riemo koyo.
Gim'otieko bedo, otiek cwoko nyinge, aka oŋeyere gima dhano obedo, aka ni go kinyal piem gi ŋata jameni loyo go.
Wac kweth, bedo pilok kweth, onyo ober ri dhano nedi?
Rupiri ŋa m'oŋeyo gimaber ri dhano i kwo i hongo pere ma kwo ma pilok, ma dhano luw'iye paka tipo? Kole ŋa manyalo waco ri dhano gim'obedi ka go otieko ngoye i pendi waŋceŋ?
aka ndelo ma tho ber loyo ndelo ma nywolirok.
Ber kidho i ot ma ywak
loyo kidho i ot ma kalima;
ato me gike pa kisi dhano
aka dhano makwo je laketho gime i cunye.
Rem loyo nyero,
kwoŋbedo i kumo ma waŋ jo,
cuny sangala.
Cuny jarieko nitie i ot ma ywak,
to cuny jamiŋo nitie i ot ma yodirok.
Ber winjo apuse pa jarieko,
loyo winjo wer pa jamiŋo.
Kole paka kudhin gwaro pendi ayiga,
ameno apaka nyero pa jamiŋo nitie;
me bende obedo pilok.
Adieri adica miŋo jarieko,
aka cami nyew fuyo cuny jo.
Gike ma gimoro ber loyo cakirok mere,
ŋata bedo moth i cuny, ber loyo janoro i cuny.
kole nge nindo i pal cuny jomamiŋ.
Ikir'iwaci ni, “Raŋo hongo macon ober loyo ma pama?”
Kole ikipenjo gime gi rieko.
Rieko ber paka gir'alunja,
aka obedo cwe ri jono ma joneno waŋceŋ.
Kikwonga rieko cal gi kikwonga pesa,
aka bero pa ŋeyo obedo ni rieko miyo kwo ri ŋata nitie gine.
Par kwoŋ tic pa Were,
ŋa manyalo loko m'otire gim'otieko timo m'oban?
I hongo ma gigipiny ber'iye bedi maber, aka i hongo ma gigipiny rac'iye par gime, Were otieko timo gigipiny ma cal, ŋey dhano okir wocaki rango kwoŋ gimoro je ma labino ka go otieko ngoye.
Atieko neno kisi gimoro i kwo paran ma pilok, nitie ŋata timo gim'otire ma tho i timo gim'otire, aka nitie jakidakana ma medo kwo i kidakana pere.
Ikir'iasa timo gim'otire, aka ikir'iasa bedo mariek, raŋo irey kwo perin?
Ikir'iasa bedo jakidakana, aka ikir'ibedi ŋatamiŋ, raŋo itho mafodi hongo perin k'otundo?
Ber k'imako gimoro acel, m'ikiweyo man wokadhin, kole ri ŋata lworo Were lakadho maber i je.
Rieko timo gimadwoŋ ri jarieko loyo gima jodhum apar jonyalo timo ri tindi madwoŋ.
Adieri, ongoye dhano i piny m'otire ma timo bero ma kitim reco.
Ikir'iwinji wac je ma ji joluwo, kosa inyalo winjo ka ŋeca perin lamin.
Iŋeyo i cunyin hongo m'oromo ma in won bende itieko lamo joman.
Gime je atieko temo gi rieko, awaco ni, “Alalokere mariek.” To oyido bor kodan.
Gim'otieko bedo, nitie bor swa, aka thuth adieri, ŋa manyalo rango tiende?
Awiro adundo paran ma ŋeyo, kikaŋasa, gi rango rieko, kodi tito paka gigipiny nitie, gi ŋeyo ni obedo miŋo bedo jakidakana aka ni obedo neko bedo jamiŋo.
Anwaŋo gimakec loyo tho; dhako m'obedo bwo, ma cunye obedo bwo gi twec. Ŋata siemo Were kwale kwoŋe, to mako ŋata timo reco.
Me a gim'atieko nwaŋo. Jafonji waco, medo gimoro acel i wi acel nwaŋo ni obedo aŋo,
m'adundo paran otieko rango, to fodi akinwaŋo. Anwaŋo jacwo acel kwoŋ gana acel, t'akinwaŋo dhako kwoŋ jome je.
Par kwoŋ gime kende, m'atieko nwaŋo, ni Were ocweyo ji ma jotire, to jotieko rango yo kweth.
Ŋa ma cal dhano mariek?
Aka ŋa m'oŋeyo tito dwoŋ ma gimoro?
Rieko miyo waŋ jo leny,
aka waŋtek pere wire.
Awaco ni, winji wac ma wok i dhok kere,
r'atoŋa ma cikirok pa Were.
Ikir'ikwakere eye ruwaŋe,
ikir'imena gimarac,
kole go latimo gimoro je ma go mito.
Kwoŋbedo wac pa kere nitie gi meni,
aka ŋa m'openji go ni, “Itimo aŋo?”
Ŋata winjo or, k'oŋey gimarac,
cuny ŋatariek oŋeyo sawa m'otire gi yo m'otire.
Kole kisi gimoro nitie gi hongo mere ma ripo gi yo,
kwoŋbedo teko pa ji dwoŋ kwoŋ jo.
Adieri, go kuya gima labedo,
kwoŋbedo ŋa m'owaci rigo paka labedo?
Ongoye dhano ma nigi meni kwoŋ koyo,
manyalo kweyo koyo,
ongoye ŋata nigi meni kwoŋ ndelo ma tho,
ongoye kisewila kama lweny ogunj'iye,
aka kidakana kinyal botho wegi mere.
Atieko neno gime je, aka atieko ketho cunyan i kisi tic je ma timere i pendi waŋceŋ, kareno ŋatimoro nigi meni kwoŋ jomegi ma timo rijo gimarac.
Aka i nger no, atieko neno k'iyiko jokidakana. Oyido jomaro donjo gi wok i Kabedo Maleŋ, aka wiy ji owil gi jo i tindi madwoŋ kama jotim'iye nger gino. Me bende obedo pilok.
Kwoŋbedo thumo banja kwoŋ tim marac kitim i kwakirok, riameno cuny ji oyikere timo gimarac.
Makada nende jareco otim reco dimiya acel to medo kwo. Kucel aŋeyo ni labedo maber gi jono ma jolworo Were, rupiri jocungo gi lworo ruwaŋ go,
to k'obedi maber gi jokidakana, kosa hongo pajo k'obedi malac paka tipo, rupiri jokicungi gi lworo ruwaŋ Were.

Nitie pilok ma timere i piny, ni nitie joma timo gim'otire ma gigipiny timere rijo paka tim pa jokidakana, aka nitie jokidakana ma gigipiny timere rijo paka tim pa joma timo gim'otire. Awaco ni me bende obedo pilok.
Onyo ayere gi kisangala, rupiri ongoye gimaber ri ji i pendi waŋceŋ loyo cemo, medho gi bedo gi kisangala, kole meno labedo gi dhano i olo pere hongo je ma kwo pere ma Were miyo go i pendi waŋceŋ.
Munyo amiyo cunyan ŋeyo rieko, gi neno gima timere i piny, anwaŋo ni wor g'odieceŋ waŋ dhano ngoye nindo.

Kenyo aparo kwoŋ tic pa Were je, ni ongoye ŋata nyalo nwaŋo gima timere i pendi waŋceŋ, kwoŋbedo makada nende dhano ool nedi rango, kucel go k'onwaŋ, aka makada nende ŋatariek opar ni oŋeyo, kucel go k'onyal nwaŋo.
Gime je atieko ketho i cunyan, kikaŋasa je, nger ma joma timo gim'otire gi jomariek kodi tim pajo je nitie i cingi Were, obedi mar kosa dakirok dhano kiŋey. Kisi gima nitie ruwaŋ jo obedo pilok.

Gimoro acel timere ri joma timo gim'otire gi ri jokidakana, ri jomabeyo, ri jom'olony gi jomakoc, ri joma miyo cowirok gi ri joma kimiy cowirok. Paka ŋataber nitie, ameno apaka ŋatarac nitie, ŋata kwoŋere cal ŋata lworo kwoŋirok.
Me obedo raco ma timere i pendi waŋceŋ, ni gimoro acel timere ri kisi dhano. Aka bende, cuny ji je opoŋ gi raco, aka neko nitie i cuny jo kafodi jokwo, aka rumacen jokadho bongi jom'otho.
To ri ŋat'oriwere gi jomakwo je nitie gi geno, kole gwoki makwo ber loyo simbwor m'otho.
Jomakwo joŋeyo ni jolatho, to ongoye gima jom'otho joŋeyo, jongoye gi kemba, aka wiy ji wil gi jo.
Mar pajo, dakirok pajo gi nyeko pajo je otieko rere woko cango con, kucel jok'obedi kendo gi migew cil gi cil i gimoro je ma timere i pendi waŋceŋ.
Kadhi, icami cemo perin gi kisangala, aka imadhi vini perin gi kisangala i cunyin; kole Were otieko yeyo gim'itimo cango con.
Weyi nangin perin jowobedi matar hongo je, ikir'iwey m'ikiwiro mo i wiyin.
Neni ni icamo kwo gi dhako m'imaro, hongo je ma kwo perin ma pilok m'otiek miyin i pendi waŋceŋ, rupiri meno obedo kemba perin i kwo gi tic perin m'iol gine i pendi waŋceŋ.
Gimoro je ma cingin nwaŋo atima, tim gi meni perin, kole ongoye tic kosa paro kosa ŋeyo kosa rieko i piny pa jom'otho, kam'ikadh'iye koro.
Awire t'aneno i pendi waŋceŋ ni, ŋwec kibedi ri joma dwir, kosa lweny kibedi ri jomatek, kosa cemo k'ibedi ri jomariek, kosa ŋaŋo ri joma niaŋ, kosa wor ri jondijo; to hongo gi silwany bedo ri joje.
Kole dhano okuya hongo ma teko. Paka rec m'imako i bwo, kosa paka winyo ma moko i kilara, apaka bende iciko dhano i bwo i hongo ma teko, ka podho kwoŋ jo abwap.
Atieko neno bende i pendi waŋceŋ, aka ocale ran gimadwoŋ swa.
Oyido nitie tindi madwoŋ madiny gi cwo manok'iye. Kere madwoŋ obino kwoŋe, to thoko mako, to geto gigeŋo madwoŋ thoko.
Onyo onwaŋere jacwo moro ma jacandi mariek, aka go gi rieko pere to botho tindi madwoŋ. Kucel ongoye ŋat'opoyo jacwo ma jacandi no.
Kenyo awaco ni, “Rieko ber loyo meni, kucel icayo rieko pa jacwo ma jacandi, aka kiwinji wac pere.”
Wac pa ŋatariek manyaliŋliŋ iwinjo,
loyo kihola pa jadhum i dier jomamiŋ.
Rieko ber loyo gilweny ma lweny,
to ŋatarac acel reyo woko bero kweth.
Lwaŋino ma jotho jomiyo mo akudha ŋwece marac,
miŋo nyaka mathin reyo woko tim ma rieko gi dwoŋ.
Cuny ŋatariek thenere i cinge maracuc,
to cuny jamiŋo, yu cinge maracam.
Kiri ka jamiŋo wotho i royo, ongoye gi rieko,
aka nyutho kisi dhano ni go miŋ.
Ka cuny pa jadhum oay kwoŋin, ikir'iwey kabedo perin,
kole bedo moth lakweyo banjin madongo.
Nitie gimarac m'atieko neno i pendi waŋceŋ,
paka komo ma wok bongi jadhum.
Iketho jomamiŋ i kabedo ma malo,
aka joŋaŋo jobedo i kabedo masisiri.
Atieko neno ŋecin wi kayinin,
aka jodhum jowotho atiendi paka ŋecin.
aka ŋat'otur kor ot, thwol latoŋo.
Ŋat'okuny telin, telin lamiyo go litho,
aka ŋat'obar mbawo, mbawo lakelo rigo litho.
Ka cuma fol, aka nyatoro kipaki lewe,
go ripo oro meni kweth,
to rieko konyo dhano nwaŋo bero.
Ka thwol okayin mafodi k'ofudhi lake,
meno jafudhi lake ongoye gi magowa.
Wac ma wok i dhok ŋatariek kelo wor,
to dhok jamiŋo reyo woko go.
Cakirok ma wac ma wok i dhoke obedo miŋo,
aka luwo pajo cowo i neko ma kelo kidakana.
Jamiŋo oyo wac kweth,
makada nende ongoye ŋat'oŋeyo gim'obedi,
aka ŋa m'owaci rigo gim'obedi ka go otieko ngoye?
Olo pa jamiŋo loco woko go,
rupiri go kuya kiri royo ma kidho i tindi madwoŋ.
Kidamba rin, awi piny, ma kere perin obedo soye,
aka jodhum mewin jocemo odikin!
Silwany rin, piny, ma kere perin obedo wod kere,
aka jodhum mewin jocemo i hongo ma ripo,
ma nwaŋo meni, makiweno mero!
Wok kwoŋ nyapo, wiy ot riewere,
aka wok kwoŋ nyapirok ma cingi jo, ot cwer.
Ji jotimo kalima ri nyero,
vini miyo kwo bedo gi kisangala,
aka pesa cowo teko je.
I paro perin bende, ikir'ilam kere,
kosa ilami jaŋaŋo, kada gi kanindo perin,
rupiri winyo ma polo nyalo tiŋo dwondin,
kosa cwec moro ma jabwombe nyalo luwo kwoŋe.
Cami cemo perin gi ji,
kole rumacen ma ndelo kweth ilanwaŋo.
Pok lim perin i migew ario, kosa kada di boro,
rupiri ikuya teko manyalo timere i piny.
Ka pondeponde jotieko poŋ,
to jocwe koth i piny,
obedi ni yath opodho yupiny kosa yumalo,
i kabedo ma yath no opodh'iye, kenyo ama larier'iye.
Ŋata kuro koyo kilacwoyo,
aka ŋata ŋiyo pondeponde, kilakeco.
Paka ikuya nger ma luya ma kwo bino i cokin perin i iy yokin,
ameno apaka ikuya tic pa Were, go ma timo kisi gimoro.
Cwoy kodhi perin odikin,
aka othieno ikir'iyey cingin wobedi ma k'otimo gimoro;
kole ikuya ma lakadho maber, me kosa meca,
kosa ka joje jobedi maber.
Paka lero mit,
apaka ber ri waŋ jo neno waŋceŋ.
Ka nyatoro okwo ma oro kweth,
go ripo kisangala i je;
kucel go ripo poyo ni hongo ma mudho labedo kweth.
Gima bino je obedo pilok.
Fore awi jayac, kafodi ibedo soye, aka weyi cunyin wosangala in i hongo perin ma soye. Wothi i yo ma cunyin gi gima waŋin neno ni ber, to ŋey ni ri gigipiny me je Were lathumo rin banja.
Kwany woko rembo i cunyin, aka kwany woko litho i delkwoŋin, kwoŋbedo thino gi soye jobedo pilok.
Poyi Jacwec perin i hongo ma soye perin, ka hongo ma teko fodi k'obino, kosa oro m'ilawac'iye ni, “Akiwinji cwe i jo.”
Kafodi lero ma waŋceŋ, dwe gi micalin k'olokere macol to pondeponde jodwoko gi koth.
I ndelo ma badin nyapere, m'ikinyal gwokirok, ma lakin ma nyamo cemo jowey tic rupiri jonok, to waŋin ma ŋiyo g'idirisa joneno ma nimnim.
Ithin latho ma winjo koko i royo, aka ikilawinjo derino ma rego, kosa dwondi winyo ma wero.
Ilalworo kabedo mabor, kosa wotho i royo; ye wiyin lalokere matar paka thiw yath nyasi, ikilanyalo ywarok paka otwoŋo. Kwoŋbedo dhano kadho i peco pere ma cil gi cil, aka joywak jolawirin i royo.
Adasa ma feza lacot, kosa acero ma zahabu ŋinyere, kosa t'iŋidho agwata pi i waŋ pi, kosa t'ituro woko tiendi cawila i jwom.
Kenyo fukefuke lagik i lowo paka con, to cuny gik bongi Were m'omiyo go.
Pilok, je pilok, Jafonji waco, gimoro je pilok.
Ibedo mariek, Jafonji bende ofonjo ji ŋeyo, opima, orango to cano maber agecin kweth.
Jafonji orango nwaŋo wac ma yere, aka gim'ondiki oyido otire, wac mar'adieri.
Wac pa dhano mariek cal asanda, gi paka musumalere ma jodongo m'orwaki ma kiyengere, obedo luwo m'ocoki ma wok bongi jakwath rombo acel.
Kwoŋ gimoro je loyo me, awi nyathi paran, gwokere. Ndiko kitawin kweth, ongoye gike mere, aka kisoma m'oasere loco delkwoŋ.
Me gike ma wac, kisi gimoro je otiek winjo. Lwor Were, aka ikuri or pere, kole me gima ji je joripo timo.
Kole Were lathumo banja ri kisi tim je, gi kisi gimoro je m'opanere, obedi maber kosa marac.
Cwiy lemban gi dhokin,
kwoŋbedo mar perin loyo ran vini.
Iŋwe kur,
aka nyingin poyan gino.
Ongoye dhako ma k'onyalo mitin.
Kadhi kodan, warweny woko,
bedi kere paran aka iteran i kisika perin.
Walakisangala to wasiemere,
weyi wasiemere i mar perin loyo vini,
kole am'omiyo mon je jomitin.
Acol ran, t'aŋon,
awi nyir ma Yerusalem.
Acol paka wemin ma Kedar,
t'aŋon paka nangin m'iliero m'igeŋere gine i cel pa Solomon.
Wikiri wiŋisa an kwoŋbedo acol,
kwoŋbedo waŋceŋ owaŋo delkwoŋan.
Wot mama oyido jomako nge kodan,
jomiyan bedo jakur ndelo vini,
t'akikuro ndelo vini paran won.
Waci ran, jamitirok paran,
kune m'ikway'iye mwendi perin,
joywomere kune kwoŋ ceŋ?
Raŋo aumere gi kitambala cako rangin,
i dier mwendi pa wadin?
K'inen ikuya, nyako maŋon,
luw masembo mwendi,
aka inwaŋ lum ri diegi perin,
cegin gi wemin pa jokwath rombo.
Apima in, jamitirok paran,
gi punda i dier punde pa Farawo.
Ye wiyin ŋon kiri i pindin,
aka podho i tokin paka thiwino.
To walatimo rin thiwino ma zahabu,
m'okedi gi feza.
Kere paran oyido nindo i kanindo pere,
aka mo paran opoŋo koyo gi kur mere.
Jamitirok paran nigi ŋwece ma mo akudha,
ka go ŋare wi thundho paran.
Jamitirok paran cal mawuwa madudi,
ma likalika i ndelo vini ma Engedi.
A, jamitirok paran, nga iŋon,
iŋon, aka waŋin pilin gi mar paka njiwin.
A, jamitirok paran, iŋon ba,
adieri iŋon!
Lum labedo kitanda mawan,
yen sida jolabedo wi ot mawan,
aka yen maboyo laumo wiye.
Acalo mawuwa ma Saron,
thiw mawuwa i milelin.
Paka thiw mawuwa i dier kudhin,
apaka jamar paran cal i dier mon.
Paka yath apo i dier yen ma mbawin,
apaka jamitirok paran obedo i dier cwo.
Amaro bedo i tipo pere,
aka olemo pere mit ran.
Go okelan i ot ma kalima,
aka atoŋa pere ran obedo mitirok.
Dwoki meni paran gi ŋano m'othwo,
cewan gi apo,
kwoŋbedo anyapere gi mitirok.
Cingi go maracam otheno wiyan,
aka cinge maracuc otwodan.
Cikan win, nyir ma Yerusalem,
kwoŋere ran win g'apol kodi rudina,
ni wik'oriwere i mitirok mawan.
Awinjo dwondi jamitirok paran,
neni, go bino,
por wi gote,
aka ŋweco kalo wi tendere bino bongan.
Jamitirok paran cal gi rudina,
kosa paka nyathi apol.
Neni, eno go ocungo i thengi kor ot mawan,
ŋiyo g'idirisa,
aka leŋo waŋe gi nanga.
Jamitirok paran luwo kodan.
Ay ibin bongan, jamitirok paran maŋon.
Kole ndir ma cwir orumo,
aka koth ocok cwe.
Mawuwa jothiwo i piny,
me hongo ma wer.
Dwondi akuru winjere i lowo mawan.
Yath makuyu nyak nyandere,
aka yen vini thiwo,
kur pajo kudho.
Ay ibin bongan, jamitirok paran maŋon.
Icale akuru ma pondo i ŋungu tele,
weyi anen waŋin mafoth,
aka awinji dwondin mamit.
Maki win kibwe, kibwe mathindho,
mafodi jok'onyeko ndelo vini mawan ma thiwo.
Jamitirok paran obedo aparan, aka abedo apere,
go kwayo mwendi pere i dier mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni lili.
Cuka thoyo thon,
to tipo rere,
dwoki, jamitirok paran, paka rudina,
paka nyathi apol ma gote ma Bether.
I kanindo paran wor,
adwaro ŋata cunyan mito,
adwaro go, t'akinwaŋo go.
Aay t'akidho i tindi madwoŋ,
i royo gi kam'othangere,
dwaro ŋata cunyan mito,
adwaro go, t'akinwaŋo.
Jokur jonwaŋan,
munyo jowaya i tindi madwoŋ,
aka apenjo jo ka joneno ran ye ŋata cunyan mito.
Tekin akalo jo,
t'anwaŋo ŋata cunyan mito.
Amako go, aka akiweyo go kadho,
cuka atero go i ot pa mama,
i kisika kam'anywol'iye.
Cikan win, awi nyir ma Yerusalem,
kwoŋere ran win g'apol kodi rudina,
ni wik'oriwere i mitirok mawan.
Aŋo no ma bino malo wok i thim,
paka tome yiro,
ŋwe buban gi mo akudha,
mo ma moko ma jomitan jotana.
Neni, manago obedo kitanda pa Solomon,
jolweny piero aucel matek jothoko,
cwo matek i Isiraili.
Joje jotiŋo abore,
aka jobedo jolweny matek.
Kisi dhano otweyo abor pere i eme,
ka jokuro monjo wor.
Kere Solomon oyiko kitanda pere,
gi mbawo ma Lebanon.
Go otimo miango mere gi feza,
dieŋeye mere ma zahabu, aka muto mere obedo ma rangi ariŋo.
Nyir ma Yerusalem, wok win winen,
kere Solomon oruko sangaria pere,
ma yokimere oruko rigo i wiye.
I ndelo ma go otim'iye kalima ma nywomirok maleŋ,
i ndelo ma kisangala ma cunye.
Iŋon ba, jamitirok paran, iŋon swa,
waŋin pilin paka waŋ akuru yuŋey katimba perin.
Ye wiyin cal lwodo diegi,
ma joloro piny wok wi tendere ma Giliad.
Lakin tar paka yer rombo,
ma nyaka owok lielo t'ilwoko.
Ongoye kad'acel m'orem,
kisi moro nigi nyawote.
Dhokin cal wuz m'obokere,
aka joŋon k'iluwo.
Pindin cal pomo m'obar dirio,
jopilin yuŋey katimba perin.
Ŋutin cal acurcur pa Daudi,
oŋinere aka foth,
gi thiwino ma cal kwote m'oliero thoko.
Thundho perin cal rudina ario,
apol ario ma jocemo i dier mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni lili.
Cuka piny oyawere,
to mudho rwenyo,
aladoŋ wi got ma buban,
gi wi tendere ma mo akudha.
Je fodi iŋon, jamitirok paran,
ongoye delkwoŋin kam'ojony.
Biye kodan mweha paran, wok wi gote ma Lebanon,
biye kodan wok i Lebanon.
Lori piny wok wilwindi ma got Amana,
wok wi got Senir gi got Hamon,
wok i od simbwore gi kwace.
Itieko ywayo cunyan, nyamin an, mweha paran,
iywayo cunyan gi ŋono perin,
kodi thiwino m'iruko.
Mar perin mit, nyamin an, mweha paran,
mar perin ber loyo vini,
aka kur mo perin loyo kur je.
Lewin mit pa mo kic, mweha paran,
mo kic gi cak nitie i lewin.
Kur perin cal kur ma Lebanon.
Mweha paran, nyamin an cal ndelo m'opanere,
ndelo m'ogoy cel kwoŋe, waŋ pi m'ogeti.
Ibedo ndelo pomo,
ma nyak olemo mabeyo,
gi binzar m'ilwoŋo ni hena, nad,
safiron, kalamus gi sinamon,
kodi yen ma mo akudha,
mo maŋwe kur gi alovera.
Ndelo ma pi mol'iye, pi ma kicwiy,
waŋ pi ma mol wok i Lebanon.
Ay, awi koyo ma yumalo,
biye, awi koyo ma yupiny.
Kudhi i ndelo paran,
ŋey kur mere woywore i koyo.
Weyi jamitirok paran wobin i ndelo,
aka wocam olemo mabeyo.
Atieko donjo i ndelo paran, nyamin an, mweha paran,
atieko coko mo maŋwe kur paran gi binzar,
atieko camo mo kic paran kiri g'apede mere,
atieko madho vini paran gi cak paran.
Cemi win, jomitirok, aka wimedhi,
cuka winomer gi mitirok.
Anindo, to cunyan k'oywomere.
Awinjo jamitirok paran goyo kodi.
Yaw ran, nyamin an, mweha paran,
akuru paran, jamitirok paran.
Wiyan odhiek gi thoyo,
aka ye wiyan ŋic gi tor.
An atieko lunyo woko nanga paran,
raŋo aruki kendo?
Atieko lawo tiendan,
raŋo akoc kendo?
Jamitirok paran otelo cinge to geyo thigo,
aka cunyan owanya go.
Aay malo yawo rigo,
aka cingan oyido thon gi mo maŋwe kur,
aka lwet cingan oyido thon gi mo ma liw i cingi thigo,
paka amidho cingi thigo.
Ayawo thigo ri jamitirok paran,
to go oyido otieko kadho.
Cunyan okadho rigo ma mito winjo dwonde,
arango go, t'akinwaŋo go,
alwoŋo go, to go k'odwokan.
Jokur m'oyido jowaya i tindi madwoŋ jonwaŋan,
jogoyan to jomiyan litho,
jokur ma kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ jomayan junga paran.
Cikan win, nyir ma Yerusalem,
ni ka winorom gi jamitirok paran,
wilawaco rigo ni atho gi mitirok.
Jamitirok perin no opokere kwoŋ jomitirok man,
awi dhako maŋon loyo?
Aŋo ma jamitirok perin loyo gine jomitirok man,
ma waripo miyin cikirok mawan?
Jamitirok paran ŋon aka go tek,
go kende i dier cwo gana apar.
Waŋe foth aka ŋon,
ye wiye ominere aka col paka agak.
Waŋe ŋon paka waŋ akurin ma thengi waŋ pi,
akurin ma jolwokere i cak aka jocungo i thengi pi ma mol.
Pinde ber paka ndelo,
m'opoŋ gi yen kodi binzar.
Dhoke cal mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni lili,
m'odhiek gi mo akudha.
Cingi go cal zahabu m'oŋinere,
m'oketh'iye thiwino thoko.
Delkwoŋe cal lak liec mafoth,
m'oketh'iye telin manyabululu ma welo.
Tiende cal siro ma telin ma welo manyabululu,
m'ocan i wi zahabu.
Cal pere cal gi gote ma Lebanon,
gi yen sida pajo maboyo.
Dhok go mit,
kisi gimoro ma kwoŋe ŋon ran.
Me a jamitirok paran, aka me mere paran,
awi nyir ma Yerusalem.
Jamitirok perin okadho kune,
awi nyako maŋon loyo mon je?
Jamitirok perin okadho i yo mene,
ŋey wanyal rango rin go?
Jamitirok paran okadho i ndelo pere,
kama yen maŋwe kur jodong'iye.
Go pidho mwendi pere i ndelo,
aka coko mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni lili.
Jamitirok paran obedo aparan, aka an abedo apere,
go pidho mwendi pere i dier mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni lili.
Jamitirok paran, iŋon paka tindi madwoŋ Tiriza,
iŋon paka Yerusalem,
aka ŋono perin turo cuny jo.
Kwany woko waŋin kwoŋan,
kole jobwokan!
Ye wiyin cal yer diegi,
ma joloro piny wok wi tendere Giliad.
Lakin tar paka sidwol rombo,
ma nyaka jowok lwoki.
Ongoye kwoŋ jo ma rem,
kisi moro nigi nyawote.
Pindin cal pomo m'obar diere,
yuŋey katimba perin.
Kere bedo gi nyamicalin piero aucel, kodi mon ma thenge piero aboro,
nyir ma kikwanere.
To an amito jamitirok paran kende,
go ŋon paka akuru.
Go obedo nyar yokimere kende,
nyar yokimere ma kacunye.
Mon je joŋiyo go to jopako go,
nyamicalin kodi mon ma thenge jowero ka jopako go.
Me ŋa maler paka ŋamba ma riedo?
Go ŋon paka dwe, aka ler paka ceŋ maliel,
aka ŋono pere turo cuny jo.
Atieko loro piny i ndelo segonya,
ŋiyo thiwo ma milelo,
neno ye ka vini lothi,
gi ka pomo likalika.
Mafodi akiŋeyo mito paran oywayan,
i cawila kabuti wod kere paran.
Dwoki, dwoki, awi nyako ma wok Sulam,
dwoki, dwoki, ŋey wanyal nenin.
Raŋo wimito nenan, an nyako ma wok Sulam,
k'amielo i dier lwak ji?
Nga tiendin ŋon i war,
awi nyar kere.
Emin m'oŋinere cal thiwino,
ma jandijo otimo.
Pendin cal acero ma nyaraunda,
ma vini kirum'iye.
Iyin cal kidhur ŋano,
ma mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni lili thoko.
Thundho perin cal apol ario,
paka rudina ario.
Ŋutin cal acurcur ma lak liec,
waŋin cal kidiwa i tindi madwoŋ Hesbon,
i thengi waŋkac ma Bathrabim.
Umin cal acurcur ma Lebanon,
ma ŋiyere gi Damasiko.
Wiyin otire paka got Kamel,
ye wiyin minyin paka nanga mafoth,
ŋono mere mako waŋ kere.
Nga iŋon, aka iber anena,
awi ŋat'omar, nyar kere m'ayodere gine.
Idongo paka thith,
aka thundho perin cal kayego mere.
Alaidho i wi thith,
t'afono amalagejo.
Weyi thundho perin wocale ran kayego nyingi vini,
aka luya perin paka ŋwece kur p'olemo m'ilwoŋo ni apo.
Dhokin mit paka vini mandiko.
Weyi vini womol ri jamitirok paran,
womol i dhoke gi lake.
Abedo apa jamitirok paran,
aka go gomba an.
Biye, jamitirok paran,
weyi wakidhi kam'othangere,
aka wanindi i calin.
Weyi wamondi kadho i ndelo vini,
aka wanen ka yen vini joloth.
Wanen ka joguro madut,
gi ka pomo likalika.
Yen ma mitirok joŋwe kur,
aka olemo mabeyo je jonitie i dhiot mawan,
manyen gi m'oti je m'atieko kano rin, awi jamitirok paran.
Kabedi oyido ibedo omin an,
ma yokan am'opido to dhotho.
Kabedi arom kodin woko,
d'acwiyo lembin to ngoye ŋat'odewo.
Dinyo atelin t'akelin,
i ot pa mama,
i kisika ma mama onywolan'iye.
Dinyo amiyin vini,
pigi pomo paran.
Cingin maracam otheno wiyan,
aka cingin maracuc otwodan.
Cikan win, nyir ma Yerusalem,
ni wik'oriwere i mitirok mawan.
Meno ŋa ma bino wok i thim,
m'othenere kwoŋ jamitirok pere?
Acewin i tiendi yath apo,
kama ŋedi oram'iye yokin to nywol kenyo.
Kethan kacunyin,
aka ikir'imaki ŋatiman i cingin kwanyo woko an.
Kole mitirok tek paka tho,
aka candirok ger paka bur ma yik.
Mitirok liel paka mac,
aka waŋ paka mac m'odheth.
Pi kweth kinyal kweyo mitirok,
kosa mikula kinyal munyere gine.
Ka moro otemo nyewo mitirok,
gi lim pere je ma ot,
dinyo olimo nyaka cay.
Wanigi nyamin wan mathin,
to thundho pere fodi k'ogulo.
Wanotim aŋo ri nyamin wan,
i ndelo ma jacwo obin weco gine.
Kabedi go obedo kor ot,
di wageto rigo acurcur ma feza.
To ka go obedo dhiot,
walatimo rigo thigo gi yen sida.
An abedo kor ot,
aka thundho paran jobedo acurcur mere,
kenyo aneno ruwaŋ go,
paka ŋata kelo siem.
Solomon oyido nigi ndelo vini i Bal Hamon,
aka oketho i cingi jokur,
aka kisi dhano oyido ripo culo nusu feza gana acel ma nyinge.
Ndelo vini paran, obedo aparan won, aka ri an won,
in, Solomon, inyalo tero feza gana no,
aka jokur olemo jowonwaŋ miya ario,
to an anigi ndelo vini paran won.
In m'ibedo i ndelin,
merin paran jowinjo dwondin,
weyi awinji k'iluwo.
Kwakere, jamitirok paran,
paka rudina kosa paka nyathi apol wi got kama yen maŋwe kur dong'iye.
Winji, awi polo, ciki ithin, awi piny,
kole Rwoth otieko luwo.
Nyithindho m'apidho t'adongo,
jogwenyere kwoŋan.
Merikwa oŋeyo won mere,
aka punda ma roya oŋeyo wer ma cemo pa jadwoŋ pere,
to Isiraili okuya an,
ji paran jokiniaŋ.
Awi, piny m'opoŋ gi reco,
ji mareco pajo pek rijo.
Kodhi ma jotimo gimarac,
nyithindho ma jodakana,
jotieko jwango Rwoth,
jotieko cayo Were maleŋ pa Isiraili,
jotieko rwenyo kicutho!
Raŋo wirango goco man?
Raŋo wimedere gwenyirok?
Wiy win gipi two,
aka cuny win gipi podho.
Wok i par tiendi win kiri i wiwin,
ongoye kama ber,
kwanyowoko alama gi dhethi,
g'adholin macwer,
ma k'obiy kosa k'otwey,
ma kimadi kosa kirway gi mo.
Piny mewin ojwangere,
tindin mewin madongo iwaŋo gi mac,
kareno wineno ama.
Jokicar josika lowo mewin,
ojwangere paka jopath jomako.
Ojwangi Yerusalem kakende,
paka kayindi i ndelo vini,
paka kaywomirok i ndelo biriŋanya nyamizungu m'ilwoŋo ni kakamba,
paka tindi madwoŋ m'okar mako.
k'oweyo riwan ji mogo,
oyido wacal Sodom,
oyido wacal Gomora.
Winji win wac pa Rwoth,
awi jotel ma Sodom!
Ciki ithi win ri fonji pa Were mawan
awi ji ma Gomora!
Rwoth waco.
Mic mewin awaŋa ma wot rombo,
gi bor ma dhok mewin oroman.
Akisangala gi remo thwondhe,
kosa rombo kosa wot diegi.
Ka wibino ruwaŋan,
Ŋa m'okwayo win gime wok i cingi win,
nyono diedipo paran?
Ongoye kelo mic ma bukony kendo,
buban obedo ran amien,
Kalima ma Dwe Manyen gi Sabato kodi cokirok manyadini mewin,
akinyali ciro cokirok m'opoŋ kidakana.
Kalima mewin ma Dwe Manyen gi ndelo mewin maleŋ je,
cunyan odak;
jolokere ran bieto,
aol gi ciro jo.
Ka witiŋo cingi win malo i kwayo,
alakano waŋan kwoŋ win;
makada nende winokway i thotho,
akilawinjo;
cingi win opoŋ oyo remo.
Lwokere win, lokere win m'olony,
kwany win woko raco i tim mewin
ruwaŋan,
weyi win timo gimarac,
fonjere win timo bero,
rangi win tiro,
both win ji m'idiyo,
thiel win nyithindho kic,
osa win ri citho.
Onyo biye win, weyi waluw kanyacel,
Rwoth waco.
Makada nende reco mewin obokere swa,
lalony matar paka pe,
paka yer rombo.
K'inen wiyere aka winowinjan,
wilacamo gimaber ma wok i lowo.
To ka wikwero to wigwenyere,
ilakisika win g'abor,
kole dhok Rwoth otieko luwo.
Tindi madwoŋ m'oyido timo adieri,
olokere nedi malaya!
Go m'oyido opoŋ gi tiro,
m'oyido itim'iye gim'otire,
onyo pama jonek!
Feza perin olokere gima bukony,
vini perin oruwere gi pi.
Jodhum perin jobedo jodudi,
aka merin pa jokwo.
Kisi dhano omaro cami nyew
aka joredo jolo mic.
Jokithiel nyithindho kic,
aka jokiwinji banja pa citho.
Riameno, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
Jameni je pa Isiraili waco ni,
“Ey, alakonjo keme paran kwoŋ jokwor paran,
alaculo kwor kwoŋ jokwor paran!
Alawiro cingan kwoŋ win,
alathodho win kwanyo woko koco mewin,
t'awaro woko cilo mewin je.
Aladwoko riwin jothum banja paka marapena,
jomic rieko paka i cakirok.
Rumacen ilalwoŋo win ni tindi madwoŋ ma timo tiro,
tindi madwoŋ ma timo adieri.”
Zayon laboth gi tiro,
aka jono ma jobed'iye ma joŋuti reco, gi timo gim'otire.
To jogwenyirok gi joreco,
ilareyo woko jo kanyacel,
aka jono ma jokwero Rwoth jolarere woko.
Kole wickwot lamako win kodi olwa mewin,
m'oyido wiyodere gine;
gi ndelin mewin ma wiyero.
Kole wilacale paka olwa,
ma boke mere thwo,
kendo paka ndelo m'ongoy'iye pi.
Jameni lalokere ŋat'iywayo,
aka tic pere cuk mac ma cot,
jolawaŋ kanyacel gi tic pajo,
m'ongoye ŋata nyalo neko.
Wac ma Isaya wod Amoz oneno ma mako kwoŋ Yuda gi Yerusalem.
Aka latundo i kare i ndelo ma rumacen,
got ma Ot pa Rwoth,
ilaketho wi gote,
ilatiŋo malo kalo tendere je.
Nonin je jolamol'iye.
Nonin kweth jolabino to jowaco ni,
“Biye, weyi wakadhi win malo wi got pa Rwoth,
i Ot pa Were pa Yakobo;
ŋey go wofonji wan royo pere
aka ŋey wawothi i yo pere.
Kole fonji pa Rwoth wok i Zayon
aka wac pa Rwoth wok i Yerusalem.”
aka lakiosa ri ji kweth.
Jolathedho abor pajo wolokere kwe dhok ma fur,
aka tonge pajo wolokere apala nyangoda.
Ongoye nono ma latiŋo abor kwoŋ nono man kendo,
kosa fonjere lweny kendo.
Awi ot pa Yakobo,
biye, weyi wawothi,
i lero pa Rwoth!
Kole iweyo yo pa ji perin,
ot pa Yakobo.
Adieri jopoŋ gi jothieth wok yuwok ceŋ,
gi jojwok paka i Filistia,
aka joriwo cingi jo gi nyithindho pa jopath.
Lowo pajo opoŋ gi feza gi zahabu,
aka lim pajo ongoye gike.
Lowo pajo opoŋ gi kayinin,
aka cawilin pajo ongoye gike.
Lowo pajo opoŋ gi cal,
jokule piny ri tic ma cingi jo,
ri gima lwet cingi jo won am'otimo.
Ameno dhano mwole,
aka kisi dhano dwokere piny,
ikir'icwaki rijo!
kosa pondi i fukefuke,
kwoŋ nge pa Rwoth,
kwoŋ dwoŋ ma dhum pere.
Waŋ ji ma pakirok iladwoko piny,
aka delok pa kisi dhano ilamwolo
aka Rwoth kende am'ila tiŋo malo
i ndelo no.
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny nigi ndelo,
kwoŋ jodelok je gi jopakirok,
gi kwoŋ kisi dhano ma janoro,
aka iladwoko go piny.
Kwoŋ yen sida je ma Lebanon,
maboyo aka otiŋere malo,
gi kwoŋ olwa je ma Basan;
kwoŋ gote je maboyo,
gi kwoŋ tendere je m'otiŋere malo,
kwoŋ acurcur je maboyo,
gi kwoŋ kor udi m'ogeŋ je,
kwoŋ mel je ma Tarsis,
gi kwoŋ gi ndijo je.
Pakirok pa ji ilamwolo,
aka delok pa kisi dhano iladwoko piny
aka Rwoth kende am'ila tiŋo malo
i ndelo no.
Cal je jolarwenyo kicutho.
Ji joladonjo i ŋungu telin,
gi i kero piny,
ri lworo pa Were,
ri dwoŋ ma dhum pere,
ka go oay miyo piny kirin.
I ndelo no ji jolabolo woko
cal pajo ma feza,
gi cal pajo ma zahabu,
ma jotimo rijo wegi lamo,
ri fuko gi kilafundo.
Ji joladonjo i ŋungu telin,
gi i wilwindi riete,
kwoŋ lworo pa Rwoth,
gi dwoŋ ma dhum pere,
ka go oay miyo piny kirin.
Wire woko kwoŋ dhano,
ma luya pere nitie i ume,
aŋo bende ma go nyalo?
Kole neni, Rwoth, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
kwanyo wok i Yerusalem gi Yuda,
kony gi luth ma kwath,
kony je ma cemo,
gi kony je ma pi.
Jacwo ma jameni gi jalweny,
jathum banja gi jatuci wac Were,
jathieth gi ŋat'otegino,
jatel ma piero abic,
gi ŋat'iworo,
jamic rieko gi jandijo ma timo gir'aura ma curcur,
kodi jandijo ma kingirok.
Alaketho yac bedo jotel pajo,
aka nyithindho joladhumo jo.
Ji jolabedo iy'adica,
kisi dhano ladiyo nyawote,
kisi dhano gi jager pere,
soye lacayo jadwoŋ,
aka ji ma bukony jokilaworo jodongo pajo.
Dhano lamako wat pere,
wok i ot pa bamere, ka waco ni,
“Inigi law,
bedi jatel mawan,
aka weyi kidhur gunda me wobedi i cingin.”
To ŋat'oyer laywak i ndelo no, ka waco ni
“Akilabedo jaboth,
kole i ot paran ongoye mugat kosa law,
ikir'ikethan jatel pa ji.
Kole Yerusalem ocer,
aka Yuda otieko opodho,
kwoŋbedo luwo pajo gi tim pajo gwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth,
geŋo neno madwoŋ pere.”
Ŋiyo ma nyim jo osa jo,
jotimo reco kamaler paka Sodom,
jokikan.
Kidamba rijo!
Kole jotieko kelo gimarac kwoŋ jo.
Waci ri ŋata timo gim'otire ni,
lakadho maber gi jo,
kole jolacamo ranyak ma tim pajo.
Kidamba ri jakidakana,
kole tim marac ma cinge am'ila timo rigo.
Ji paran, nyithindho ama jodiyo jo,
aka mon jodhumo jo.
Awi ji paran, jotel mewin jorwenyo win,
aka jomieno yo maber wiluw.
Rwoth mako kabedo pere kiosa banja pere,
go cungo malo thumo banja ri nonin.
Rwoth bino ri thumo banja,
gi jodongo kodi jodhum pa ji pere.
Win wiŋati winyaga ndelo vini,
udi mewin opoŋ gigipiny pa jocandi.
Winyutho aŋo ka wiŋinyo ji paran,
ka wirego nyim jocandi?
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Rwoth owaco,
kwoŋbedo nyir ma Zayon jodele,
aka jowotho ka jotelo ŋuti gin,
jombieto waŋ gin m'ongoye wickwot,
jothule gi woth,
aka jowiyo tiendi jo.
Riameno Rwoth laketho situka,
i wi mon ma Yerusalem,
to lero wi jo gi pata.
I ndelo no Rwoth lakwanyo woko gigipiny ma jonor gine, thiwino ma joruko iy'odondo tiendi jo, i wi jo, gi ŋuti jo.
Thiwino ma ithi jo, aminda, gi giboyo wi jo,
kodi jungin pajo. Atego ma jotweyo iy'odondo, kisiwiro, sanduku mo akudha gi tiko ma joruko.
Peta ma cingi gin gi ma um gin,
nangin pajo ma kadho i kalima, rinda pajo, law, mugowe ma cingi jo,
nanga pajo ma nyaparpar, nanga mafoth, jungin pajo gi kitambalin maboyo ma joruko i wi gin.
I kabedo ma kur maber, labedo ŋwece marac,
i kabedo ma kisiwiro, labedo thol,
i kabedo ma wi jo m'oyik, pata,
i kabedo ma nangin mafoth, kutiya;
i kabedo ma ŋono, waŋ.
Cwo mewin jolatho g'abor,
aka jomeni mewin jolatho i lweny.
Waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ lakumo to ywak,
ladoŋ nono, to jengere piny.
Mon abirio jolamako jacwo acel i ndelo no, ka jowaco ni,
“Walacamo cemo mawan won to waruko nangin mawan won,
nyaka weyi walwoŋere gi nyingin,
kwany woko wickwot mawan.”
I ndelo no jangi yath pa Rwoth labedo maŋon to limo dwoŋ, aka ranyak ma lowo labedo noro gi dwoŋ pa Joisiraili ma joboth.
Ŋat'owey i Zayon to doŋ i Yerusalem ilalwoŋo ni ŋataleŋ, kisi ŋat'ondiki ri kwo i Yerusalem,
ka Rwoth otieko lwoko woko cilo pa nyar Zayon to cido woko remo m'oduwo Yerusalem i diere mere gi cuny ma thumo banja kodi cuny maliel.
Nyaka Rwoth lacweyo i kabedo ma Got Zayon niye gi cokirok mere pondeponde odieceŋ gi yiro kodi mac maliel wor. Dwoŋ pa Were laumo to kwonga tindi madwoŋ gibe.
Labedo tipo ma bwok kwoŋ lietho m'odieceŋ, kapondo gi kabwok kwoŋ asur gi koth.
wer paran ma mar ma mako kwoŋ ndelo vini pere.
Agwera paran oyido nigi ndelo vini,
i wi tendere ma lowo ma diwa.
Ofuro to dimo woko telin,
to pidho yen vini maber loyo.
Ogeto acurcur ma kuro i dier ndelo,
aka okunyo bur ma biyo nyinge,
ogeno ni lanyak olemo,
to, onyak olemo makec ayino.
Aka onyo pama, Awi ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem,
kodi ji ma Yuda,
thum win banja i dier an,
gi ndelo vini paran.
Aŋo man ma mitere atima ri ndelo vini paran,
m'akitimo rigo?
Munyo oyido akuro wonyak olemo,
raŋo onyak olemo makec?
Aka onyo pama alawaco rin,
gim'alatimo ri ndelo vini paran.
Alakwanyo woko cel mere,
aka ilanyeko;
alaturo woko tielo mere,
aka ilanyono piny.
Alaweyo wodongi gi doy,
akilakikolesa kosa doyo,
alaweyo okure gi kudhin jowodong'iye,
alageŋo kiri pondeponde cwe koth i iye.
Kole ndelo vini pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
obedo ot pa Isiraili,
aka ji ma Yuda,
jobedo yen vini ma go pidho gi kisangala.
Go oyido mito tiro,
to oneno jooyo remo!
Go oyido mito jowotimi gim'otire,
to owinjo ywak pa ji!
Kidamba riwin, ma wiriwo ot gi ot,
wimedo ndelo i wi ndelo,
tundo kam'ongoye thwolo ri joman kwanyo woko win,
aka widoŋ bedo kendi win i lowo.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny otieko kwoŋere munyo awinjo.
Adieri udi kweth ladoŋ nono,
udi madongo maŋon ladoŋ m'ongoye i iye ji.
Ndelo eka apar ma vini lacwero vini lita aboro,
aka mugowa apar ma kodhi lanyak mugowa acel ma ŋano.
Kidamba riwin, ma wimondo cew odikin,
cako rango medho makec,
ma wigalo tundo othieno,
cuka vini mero jo!
Kalima mewin bedo tongol gi sasi,
milowe gi vini,
to wikidew kwoŋ tim pa Rwoth,
kosa neno tic ma cingi go!
Riameno ji paran jokadho bedo jopath ro ngoye gi niaŋ;
cwo pajo m'iworo jotho kec,
aka ji ma kisi ndelo jolatho ro riyo pi.
Riameno piny pa jom'otho kec neko rijo,
aka oyawo dhoke malac,
mwonyo jodhum ma Yerusalem,
kanyacel gi ji ma kisi ndelo,
lwak ji pere gi jono je ma yodere gine.
Ji jokule piny, kisi dhano idwoko piny,
aka ilamwolo jodelok.
To Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
nyutho dwoŋ pere gi timo gim'otire,
aka Were Maleŋ nyutho leŋo pere gi tiro.
Nyithindhi rombo jolacemo i kakwath pajo,
jopath jolacamo bor mere i gundin.
Kidamba ri jono, ma joywayo reco g'adasa ma twodo,
jono ma joywayo reco paka gi thondhe ma magal.
Jono ma jowaco ni,
“Weyi Rwoth wokwakere,
weyi woredi timo tic pere,
ŋey wanyal neno.
Weyi atoŋa pa Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili worikere,
weyi wobin, ŋey wanyal ŋeyo!”
Kidamba ri jono, ma jolwoŋo raco ni bero,
aka bero ni raco,
wiketho mudho ri lero,
aka lero ri mudho,
wiketho keco ri mito,
aka mito ri keco!
Kidamba riwin, ma wiriek ruwaŋ win wegi,
aka wijorieko kweth!
Kidamba ri waseni, ma joloyo i math,
jombaka i ruwo math!
Win ma wiweyo jokomo kadho ro cami nyew,
aka wimono ji ma bubanja tiro!
Riameno, paka lew mac reyo woko kanja,
aka paka lum m'othwo munyere piny i mac maliel,
ameno apaka fuc pajo latop,
aka thiw joladuny paka fukefuke.
Ato jokwero cik pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
aka jotieko cayo wac pa Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili.
Riameno nge pa Rwoth oliel kwoŋ ji pere,
aka orieyo cinge kwoŋ jo to rwadho jo,
gote joyengere,
delkwoŋ jom'otho odoŋ i royo paka yuk.
Kucel kiri gi gime je, Rwoth fodi nigi nge,
aka fodi orieyo cinge ma miyo gir'acula.
Rwoth lamiyo ranyuth ri nono mabor,
lamwoŋo ri ji i gike ma piny.
E jobino, mayil yil, ma piyo piyo!
Ongoye kwoŋ jo ŋat'olacere, ongoye ŋata ceri,
ongoye ŋata nur kosa nindo.
Ongoye kisiwiro m'olwogere,
kosa thol war m'ocot.
Aserin pajo bith,
atum bor pajo ogondere,
tiendi kayina pajo tek paka tele ma cot mac,
tiendi cawilin pajo wire paka asur.
Joŋur paka simbwor,
joŋur paka nyithindhi simbwor;
joŋur aka jomako cemo pajo,
jotiŋo woko, to ngoye ŋat'onyali botho.
Jolaŋur kwoŋ Isiraili i ndelo no,
paka nam ma ŋur.
Aka ka nyatoro oŋiy lowo,
neni, mudho gi litho kende,
aka lero umere gi colo ma pondeponde.
Thoko go oyido nitie cwec ma jobwombi gin m'ilwoŋo ni Serafim; kisi acel oyido nigi bwombe aucel. Kisi cwec oyido umo waŋe gi bwombe ario, umo kwoŋe gi bwombe ario, aka ay gi bwombe ario.
Acel oyido lwoŋo nyawote to waco ni,
“Maleŋ, Maleŋ, Maleŋ!
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny!
Dwoŋ pere opoŋ i piny gibe.”
Kenyo awaco ni, “Kidamba ran! Kole arwenyo, kole abedo jacwo ma dhoke koc, aka abedo i dier ji ma dhok gin koc, kucel waŋan otieko neno Kere, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny!”
Kenyo acel kwoŋ cwec ma jabwombe oay to pie kwoŋan, oyido otiŋo cuk mac i cinge m'okwanyo wok i migam gi lew tala ario.
Ogeyo dhokan gi cuk mac aka owaco ni, “Neni ee, paka gime ogeyo dhokin, okwanyo woko banja perin, aka reco perin ocwaki.”
Kenyo awinjo dwondi Rwoth ka penjo ni: “Ŋa m'alaoro? Ŋa ma labedo jamikwenda mawan?”
Adwoko ni, “An e! Oran!”
“Winji win noknok, to wikiri winiaŋ,
Neni win noknok, to wikiri wiŋey.”
“Loki paro pa ji mamiŋ,
cul ithi gin,
neki waŋ gin,
ŋey jokiri jowoneni gi waŋ gin,
jokiri jowowinji gi ithi gin,
aka jokiri jowoniaŋ gi paro pajo,
aka jowire wobothi jo.”
Kenyo apenjo ni, “Kiri keraŋo Awi Rwoth?”
Aka go odwoko ni,
“Cuka tindin madongo othangere,
m'ongoye ji ma jobed'iye,
aka udi ongoye ji,
to lowo doŋ nono kicutho.
Cuka Rwoth oriem woko ji bor swa,
to lowo gipi doŋ nono.
Makada nende acel kwoŋ ji apar odoŋ,
ilawaŋo go kendo,
paka olwa m'otoŋ,
to conge doŋ m'ocungo,
rijo, conge obedo kodhi maleŋ.”
Munyo okow ri ker ma Yuda ni Siria oyido jonitie i riwirok gi Isiraili, cuny go gi ji pere opodho aka jokirin paka yen ma yengere ro kudho pa koyo.

Kenyo Rwoth owaco ri Isaya ni, “Kadhi gi wodin Sear Yasub aka irom gi Kere Ahaz. Ilanwaŋo go i royo kama jokwoc nangin jotiy'iye, i gike ma fereji ma kelo pi wok i kidiwa ma malo kidho i kisawe pa jalwok nangin.
Waci rigo wogwokere, wobedi liŋ, aka wokiri wobwoki kosa cunye wopodhi ro kasik mac ario ma duny yiro me, i nge pa Kere Rezin gi Siria gi wod Remalia.
Kwoŋbedo Siria kanyacel gi wod pa Remalia jotimo can marac kwoŋin, ka jowaco ni:
‘Weyi wakidhi wakedhi Yuda, wabwok to wakengila wobedi amawan, aka ŋey wokethi wod pa Tabel bedo kere mere.’ ”
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama:
Kilacungo,
aka kilatundo i kare.
Kole wic Siria obedo Damasiko,
aka wic Damasiko obedo Rezin.
(I oro piero aucel g'abic Isiraili (Ker ma Yumalo) latur mathindho thindho ŋey wongoye gi ji.)
Wic Isiraili obedo Samaria,
aka wic Samaria obedo wod pa Remalia.
K'ikicungo matek i yeyo,
ik'ocungi kada mathin.
Rwoth oluda luwo gi Ahaz ka waco ni,
“Kway Rwoth Were perin womiyin ranyuth. Weyi wobedi maluth paka piny pa jom'otho kosa mabor paka polo.”
Ahaz odwoko ni, “Akilakwayo, aka akilatemo Rwoth.”
Kenyo Isaya owaco ni, “Onyo winji, Awi ker pa Daudi. Obedo gimathin swa riwin joko ji; ma wijoko Were paran bende?
Riameno Rwoth won gipi lamiyo win ranyuth. Neni, nyako mambula lagamo iye to nywolo wode aka ilacwoko nyinge ni Manwer.
Go lamadho cak to camo mo kic cuka tundo i hongo ma go oŋey'iye kwero raco kodi yero bero.
Kole kafodi jayac k'oŋeyo kwero raco gi yero bero, lowo no ma wilworo kerin pajo ario ilajwango woko.”
“Rwoth kidho kelo kwoŋ win, ji mewin, gi kwoŋ ot pa kwarere mewin ndelo mafodi k'otundo wok cuka ker ma Isiraili tiakere woko kwoŋ Yuda, go lakelo kere ma Asiria.”
“I ndelo no, Rwoth lalwiyo ri ji ma Misir ma jocale lwaŋino manitie i waŋ pi ma Misir, gi ri ji ma Asiria ma jocale kic.
Jolabino to jogeto i milelo gi ŋungu tele, i wi kudhin je, kodi i wi lum je.”
“I ndelo no, Rwoth lalielo gi kamweso m'opangisa yu kalo Malawa, kere ma Asiria, ye wi jo gi yer ma tiendi jo, aka bende lawaro woko ye tik jo.”
I ndelo no, nyatoro lakuro dhiaŋ ma roya gi rombo ario,
aka rupiri jolacwero cak i dito, go lamadho cak, kole jono ma jodoŋ i piny, jolamadho cak gi mo kic.
“I ndelo no, ndelo vini m'oyido nitie yen vini gana acel, ma welo mere feza gana acel, lalokere okure gi kudhin.
Dhano moro je lakidho kenyo dwar g'atum abor kodi aserin. Ey, lowo gipi lapoŋ, kudhin gi dudi.
Tendere je m'oyido ifur'iye cemo lakisika gi kudhin m'ongoye ŋata lanyalo kidho kenyo. Ladoŋ nyaka kakwath pa dhok gi kama rombo nyono.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Kwany tele mapando aka indik'iye gi nyikuta madongo ni, ‘Apa Maher Salal Hasbaz.’
Nwaŋ cwo ario, Uriya jacway ri Were i wi migam gi Zekaria wod pa Jeberekia, jowobedi paka jokony ma jogenere.”
Rumacen ma hongo moro dhako paran ogamo iye to nywolo nyathi majayac. Kenyo Rwoth owaco ran kendo ni, “Cwoki nyingi nyathi ni, Maher Salal Hasbaz.
Kole mafodi nyathi k'oŋeyo ywak ni baba kosa ni mama, ilatiŋo woko lim ma Damasiko gi ma Samaria je ruwaŋ kere ma Asiria.”
Rwoth oluda luwo kodan kendo ka waco ni,
“Kwoŋbedo ji me jokwero pi ma wok i milelo Silowa ma mol moth, aka jokirin gi lworo ruwaŋ Rezin gi wod Remalia;
Rwoth kelo kwoŋ jo pi ma Malawa, ma dimeni aka thoth, kere ma Asiria gi jolweny pere je, aka laay kwoŋ jange je gi thenge je.
Laluwo i wi Yuda paka mikula ma tundo kiri i dwondi win, Awi Manwer, gi bwombin m'oyare umi thutho ma piny perin.”
Riwere win kanyacel i lworo, nonin je,
ciki ithi win, piny mabor je.
Yikere win lweny, aka ilaŋinyo win mathindho thindho,
yikere win lweny, aka ilaŋinyo win mathindho thindho.
Tim win can kanyacel, to k'oyindira.
Luw win wac, to kilatundo i kare,
kole Were nigi wan.
Kole Rwoth oluwo kodan gi cinge ma dimeni kwoŋan, to gwokan ni akir'awothi i yo pa ji me ka waco ni,
“Ikir'iriwere i can pa ji aka Ikir'ilwor gima jolworo kosa ibwoki.
To Rwoth pa lwak jolweny kende ama iter paka ŋataleŋ, weyi go ama wobedi lworo gi bwok perin.
Go lalokere Kabedo Maleŋ, tele ma thumo banja, gi tele ma ceri ri kerin ario ma Isiraili, bwo gi mitego ri ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem.
Kweth jolacer, jolapodho to jotur. Jolamoko i bwo t'itero jo.”
Tweyi ranyuth, imwon fonji no i dier jofonjirok paran.
Alakuro Rwoth, go ma pano waŋe kwoŋ ot pa Yakobo, aka alaketho geno paran i go.
To ka jowaci riwin penjo mikwenda wok bongi jothieth gi jojwok ma jomwoŋo aka jocur. To kere ji jokiripi rango Were pajo? Kendo joluw gi jom'otho ri jomakwo?
Ri fonji gi mijulisi! Adieri ri wac ma joluwo me jokilaneno lero.
Ji jolawotho i piny i litho madwoŋ gi kec, aka kec lamiyo jo nge to jokwoŋo kere pajo gi werin pajo. Jolaŋiyo malo i polo,
to joŋiyo piny, to jolaneno nyaka litho gi mudho, mudho ma nge, aka ilabolo jo i mudho mapek.
Ji m'oyido jowotho i mudho,
jotieko neno lero madwoŋ,
oyido jobedo i piny ma mudho,
to lero omenyo jo.
Itieko medo piny me,
itieko medo kisangala mere,
jofore ruwaŋin,
paka josangala i ndir ma keco,
paka cwo ka jopoko lim ma jonyaga.
Kole okol ma bieto pere,
gi luth ma goke,
luth ma nyweny pa ŋata diyo go,
itieko turo paka i ndelo pa Midian.
Kole kisi war pa jalweny ŋanjo gi yengirok,
aka kisi law m'ocido gi remo,
ilawaŋo paka mo ri mac.
Omiy wan nyathi majayac!
Dhum nitie i goke,
aka ilalwoŋo go ni jadiy cuny ji ma Gir'aura, Were Majameni,
bawan ma cil gi cil, Kere ma siem.
Dhum pere k'orumi,
aka siem labedo cil gi cil,
i wi kom ma dhum pa Daudi gi ker pere,
cako gi mako matek,
gi tiro kodi timo gim'otire,
wok i hongo me kadho yuwaŋe aka cil gi cil.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny omiyere timo gime.
Rwoth odhiro wac kwoŋ Yakobo,
aka opodho kwoŋ Isiraili.
Ji je jolaŋeyo kwoŋe.
Efrayim gi ji ma jobedo i Samaria
ma i noro gi gero ma cuny gin jowaco ni,
“Matafal jopodho,
to walageto gi telin,
otoŋ piny yen musikamol,
to walakisoya gi yen sida i kabedo pajo.”
Ameno Rwoth sigila jokwor
jokwor pa Rezin monjo jo,
aka miyo jokwor pere nge.
Siria yuwok ceŋ, Filistia yupodho ceŋ,
aka jocamo Isiraili gi dhok gin m'oŋamere.
Kucel nge pa Rwoth fodi k'orumo,
aka fodi orieyo cinge miyo gir'acula.
Ji jok'ogik bongi go m'ogoyo jo,
kosa jok'orango Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Ameno Rwoth otoŋo woko kwoŋ Isiraili wic gi yiwe,
jangi thith gi kedi i ndelo acel.
Ato jodongo gi ji m'iworo jo ama jobedo wic,
aka jotuci wac Were ma jofonjo twodo jobedo yiwe.
Kole jono m'oyido jotelo jome jorwenyo jo,
aka jono m'oyido itelo jo owey jo i nywowirok.
Am'omiyo Rwoth kisangala gi nyithindho pajo,
kosa maki wor gi nyithindho kic gi mon tho.
Ato kisi dhano oyido bu Were aka jotimi gimarac,
aka kisi dhok dhano luwo miŋo.
Kucel nge pa Rwoth fodi k'orumo,
aka go fodi orieyo cinge miyo gir'acula.
Kole kidakana liel paka mac,
aka waŋo okure gi kudhin,
paka lul m'otwere maliel,
aka dunyo malo siro yiro.
Gi keme pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny piny waŋ,
ji jocale paka mo ri mac,
aka ongoye ŋata botho nyawote.
Dhano ocamo cinge maracuc,
to kec omedo neko,
ocamo cinge maracam, to k'oyeŋ,
kisi dhano ocamo riŋo ma cinge.
Manase omonjo Efrayim aka Efrayim omonjo Manase,
aka kanyacel jomonjo Yuda.
Kucel nge pa Rwoth fodi k'orumo;
aka go fodi orieyo cinge miyo gir'acula.
Kidamba ri jono, ma jotimo cik ma kidakana,
gi jondiko ma jondiko teko,
ma wiro thumo banja pa jocandi,
gi mayo jocandi tiro,
ŋey jowonyaga mon tho,
aka jowokwal nyithindho kic.
Winotim aŋo i ndelo ma gir'acula,
gi rerok ma labino wok bor?
Winoŋwec bongi ŋa rango kony?
Aka winowey lim mewin kune?
Ongoye gima doŋ, to guŋo i dier jotwec,
kosa podho i dier jom'onek.
Kole nge fodi omako Rwoth,
go fodi orieyo cinge miyo gir'acula.
abiro ma cingi jo obedo keme paran!
Aoro Asiria monjo piny ma bu Were,
amiyo go or kwoŋ ji ma jomiyan nge,
kinyaga gi kwalo,
gi nyono jo piny paka cwodho ma royo.
To me k'agima go ocano,
kosa k'agima go nitie gine i paro;
to go nigi paro ma nyeko,
gi reyo woko piny kweth.
Kole go waco ni:
“Jomituka paran je jok'obedo kerin?
Amako Kalino gi Karkemis,
Hamath kiri gi Aripad.
Samaria kiri gi Damasiko.
Paka cingan otundo i kerin pa cal,
ma cal pajo thoth loyo ma Yerusalem gi Samaria,
ak'otim ri Yerusalem gi cal pere je,
gim'atieko timo ri Samaria gi cal pere je?”
Ka Rwoth otieko timo tic pere je kwoŋ Got Zayon gi kwoŋ Yerusalem, go lamiyo gir'acula ri kere ma Asiria ri delok pere je gi noro pere je.
Kole go waco ni,
“Gi meni paran atieko timo,
aka gi rieko paran, kole anigi niaŋ,
atieko kwanyo woko kewin pa nonin,
t'akwalo woko lim pajo,
paka thwon, anyono piny ji m'oyido jodhumo.
Cingan onwaŋo lim pa ji,
paka od winyo,
aka paka cwo jocoko tongi winyo m'ojwangi,
ameno bende apaka acoko piny,
to ngoye m'oyaro bwombe,
kosa m'oŋamo dhoke ywak.”
Le bende owaci ni dwoŋ loyo ŋata toŋere gine,
kosa musimeno bende nigi cwe loyo ŋata randa gine?
Abiro bende tiŋo malo ŋat'omako,
kosa luth bende otiŋ ŋata k'obedo mbawo?
Riameno Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
ladhiro two kwoŋ jolweny pere ma jokor gin,
aka dwoŋ pere laliel paka liel pa mac.
Were, lero pa Isiraili labedo paka mac,
Were maleŋ pa Isiraili labedo paka mac,
ma laliel to reyo woko,
kudhin gi okure i ndelo acel.
Dwoŋ ma lul pa Asiria gi ndelo olemo pere,
ilareyo woko kicutho paka cuny gi del,
aka jolarere paka ŋata two.
Yen ma lul pere ladoŋ,
manok swa ma kiri nyathi je nyalo kwano.
I ndelo no Joisiraili gi Joyuda ma joboth kendo jokilagoŋere kwoŋ piny m'otemo reyo jo woko, to jolagoŋere kwoŋ Rwoth Maleŋ pa Isiraili, iy'adieri.
Jom'oboth joladwoko, jom'oboth pa Yakobo jolawire bongi Were pajo ma jameni.
Kole makada nende Joisiraili oyido jothoth paka kwoyo ma nam, nyaka ma joboth ama joladwoko. Rerok nitie ri ji, aka opoŋ de oy gi tiro.
Kole Rwoth, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny lakelo rerok paka go owaco ni latimo i dier piny gibe.
Riameno Rwoth, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, “Awi ji paran, ma wibedo i Zayon, wikiri wibwok ro Joasiria ka jocwado win g'abiro gi luth paka Jomisir jotimo.
Kole i hongo macek won, gir'acula paran riwin latundo i gike, aka nge paran lacomere gi jo.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny lacwado jo gi luth pere paka i hongo m'ocwad'iye ji ma Midian i got ma Oreb. Aka luth pere ma nyweny labedo i wi nam, aka latiŋo malo paka otimo i Misir.
Aka i ndelo no peko pere langoye woko i gokin, aka bieto pere ilareyo woko i ŋutin ro peko mere.”
Neni, jakwor omako tindi madwoŋ Ayath,
oluwo gi Migron,
okano gigipiny pere i Mikmas.
Joŋado g'iger,
jonindo i Geba wor,
ji ma Rama jokirin,
Gibeya pa Saulo oringo.
Ywak win malo, awi ji ma Galim!
Winji win, awi ji ma Layisa!
Dwoki win, awi ji ma Anathoth!
Madimena oringo,
ji ma jobedo i Gebim joringo pondo.
I ndelo me won, go lacungo i Nob,
go lawito adol pere,
wi got Zayon,
tendere ma Yerusalem.
To neni, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
latoŋo jange gi meni kweth,
ma joboyo malo ilatoŋo piny,
aka ma jolile iladwoko piny.
Rwoth latoŋo yukino ma lul gi le,
Lebanon gi yen mere matek.
aka jangi yath lakitula wok i fuc mere.
Cuny pa Rwoth lapie kwoŋ go,
cuny ma rieko gi niaŋ,
cuny ma mic rieko gi meni,
cuny ma ŋeyo gi lworo Rwoth.
Kisangala pere labedo i lworo Were,
Go kilathumo banja gi gima waŋ go neno,
kosa gi gima ithi go winjo;
to yero gir'atima marom ri jomamwol i piny.
Go lamiyo piny gir'acula gi luth ma nyweny ma dhoke,
aka laneko jokidakana gi luya ma dhoke.
aka genirok labedo del ma piere.
kwac lanindo piny kanyacel gi nyathi diel.
Nyathi dhiaŋ gi simbwor jolacemo kanyacel,
aka nyathi maŋic lakwayo jo.
Dhok g'arara jolacemo kanyacel,
nyithindhi jo jolanindo piny kanyacel,
aka simbwor lacamo lum paka dhiaŋ.
Nyathi ma dhoth latuko
i kero malasaŋ,
nyathi m'oweyo dhoth larwako cinge i od uu.
wi got maleŋ paran je.
Piny lapoŋ ŋeyo Rwoth
paka pi umo nam.
I ndelo no Rwoth lacoro cinge kendo madirio dwoko peco ji pere ma joboth, wok i Asiria gi Misir, wok i Pathiros, wok i Ethopiya, wok i Elam, wok i Babilon, wok i Hamath, gi wok i kigoda ma nam.
Go latiŋo ranyuth ri nonin
aka lacoko Joisiraili ma jodamba,
gi ji ma Yuda ma jokedhere,
wok i sonda aŋwen ma piny.
Nyeko pa Efrayim larumo,
aka jono ma jotero Yuda gi gwayo ilakwanyo woko,
Efrayim kilamako nyeko gi Yuda,
aka Yuda kilatero Efrayim gi gwayo.
To jolamonjo Filistia yupodho ceŋ,
jolakinyaga ji kanyacel yuwok ceŋ.
Joladhumo ji ma Edom gi Mowab
aka ji ma Amon jolawinjo jo.
go latiŋo cinge i wi malawa Yufrete,
gi koyo pere malieth,
to poko i jange abirio,
ŋey ji jowoŋadi atiendi.
Ameno royo layawere wok i Asiria,
ri ji pere ma joboth,
paka obedo ri Isiraili,
i ndelo ma jowok'iye i piny ma Misir.
Wilawero i ndelo no ni:
Alamiyin foyo, Awi Rwoth,
kole kad'oyido imako nge kodan,
nge perin owire woko,
aka iyomo cunyan.
alageno go, aka akilabwok;
kole Rwoth obedo meni paran gi wer paran,
go otieko bedo both paran.
Gi kisangala wilatwomo pi wok i waŋ pi ma both.
Wilawaco i ndelo no,
miy win Rwoth foyo,
lwoŋ win nyingi go,
miy win tim pere woŋeyere i dier nonin,
tuci win ni nyingi go dwoŋ.
Wer win pak ri Rwoth, kole go otieko timo gigipiny madongo,
weyi gime woŋeyere i piny gibe.
Koki win malo, aka wer win ri kisangala ji ma Zayon,
kole ŋatadwoŋ i dier win,
obedo Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili.
Tiŋi malo bendera ma lweny i wi tendere m'othangere,
ywak malo rijo,
tiŋi malo cingin rijo jowodonji,
i waŋkace pa jodhum.
An won gipi atieko wodho or ri ji paran maleŋ,
atieko lwoŋo jolweny paran, jowonyuthi nge paran,
ji paran m'anor gi jo.
Winji win koko wi gote,
paka koko pa lwak ji!
Winji win, derino pa kerin,
nonin ma jocokere kanyacel!
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny coko jolweny,
kadho i lweny.
Jobino wok i piny mabor,
wok i gike ma polo,
Rwoth gi gilweny ma nge pere,
ma reyo piny gibe.
labino paka rerok wok bongi Jameni je!
Riameno cingi joje lanyapere,
aka cuny dhano je laleny,
aka jolabwok.
Litho madwoŋ lamako jo,
jolacale paka dhako ma ŋedi ramo.
Jolaŋiyere m'ongoye kony,
nyim gin laliel mac.
Neni, ndelo pa Rwoth bino,
mager, gi keme kodi nge ma kelo lworo,
loko piny abar,
reyo woko joreco wok'iye.
jokilamiyo lero;
waŋceŋ lalokere macol ka wok,
aka dwe kilamenyo lero pere.
Alamiyo piny gir'acula ro reco pere,
gi jokidakana ro reco pajo;
alamwolo noro pa jogero,
t'adwoko piny kwoto pa jomaker.
Alamiyo ji bedo manok,
aka ji labedo manok loyo zahabu ma Ofir.
Riameno alamiyo polo kirin,
aka piny layengere wok i kabedo pere,
i keme pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
i ndelo ma nge pere oliel.
Paka amudhe m'idwaro,
kosa paka rombo ma jongoye gi ŋat'olek jo,
kisi dhano lagik bongi ji pere,
aka kisi dhano laringo i piny pere.
Ŋat'onwaŋ je ilacwowo,
aka m'omak je ilaneko g'abor.
Nyithindho pajo ilaŋinyo mathindho thindho
ruwaŋ jo wegi;
udi pajo ilakinyaga
t'inindo gi mon pajo.
Neni, amiyo ji ma Medes monjo Jobabilon,
ma jongoye gi kony gi feza,
aka jokifore i zahabu.
Atum bor pajo lathumo cwo,
jo kilamako wor gi nyithindho maŋic,
aka jolangoye gi wor ri nyithindho.
ŋono gi noro pa Jokaldin,
lacale gi Sodom kodi Gomora,
munyo Were oreyo woko jo.
Kilaget'iye kendo,
kosa bed'iye i luse je.
Jowarabu jokilagero wema pajo kenyo,
jokwath rombo jokilamiyo rombo pajo nindo kenyo.
udi mere lapoŋ gi cwec ma uja,
maya madhako gi diegi madudi jolamielo kenyo.
Ondiekere jolaywak iy'acurcur mere
kodi ogwaŋe madudi i cel pa kere mere mabeyo,
hongo mere ocore cegin,
aka ndelo mere kilagalo.
To Rwoth latimo wor gi Yakobo to yero Isiraili kendo, laketho jo i lowo pajo wegi; aka jopath jolabino bedo gi jo to joriwere gi ot pa Yakobo.
Nonin jolakelo jo i kabedo pajo, aka ot pa Isiraili latero jo i lowo pa Rwoth paka ŋecin ma cwo gi ma mon. Isiraili lamako jono ma cango jomako jo, aka ladhumo jono ma cango jodiyo jo.
Ka Rwoth otiek miyo Joisiraili ywomirok kwoŋ litho gi candirok, gi tic matek m'oyido iromo jo timo,
jolaoro ageca me ma ŋalo kere ma Babilon:
Jadic orumo nedi!
Mbaka oloyo jagero nedi!
Rwoth oturo luth pa jokidakana,
luth ma dhum pa jodhum,
ma jofodo piny ji i keme,
gi goco makirum,
m'odhumo piny i nge
gi candirok makirum.
Piny gibe oywomere aka oliŋ,
jomwoc gi wer.
Yen lwiyo jofore kwoŋin,
yen sida ma Lebanon, ka jowaco ni,
“Wok cuka oredhin piny,
ongoye jakiranda mbawo ma bino kwoŋ wan.”
Piny pa jom'otho oyikere jolin,
romo kodin k'ibino;
sigila tipo pa jom'otho rin,
cewo jono je m'oyido jobedo jotel ma piny;
wok i kombere pajo ma dhum.
Joje jolaluwo,
aka jolawaco rin ni,
“Itieko lokere manyap paka wan!
Itieko lokere paka wan!”
Dwoŋ perin odwoki i piny pa jom'otho,
gi dwondi wer ma tongol perin.
Kudin jolak kwoŋin,
aka njoka joumin.
Awi micala m'odieceŋ, wod ŋamba!
Otoŋin nedi kiri piny,
in m'oyido iredho piny nonin!
“Alaidho i polo,
alatiŋo malo kom paran ma dhum,
kalo micalin pa Were;
alabedo wi got ma romo,
bor swa yumalo.
Alaidho malo i wi pondeponde,
alacale Jamalo Loyo.”
To oredhin i piny pa jom'otho,
i lutho ma bur.
Jono ma jonenin jolakiŋisa in,
aka jolapenjere ni,
“Me won a jacwo m'omiyo piny kirin,
m'oyengo kerin,
m'oloko piny paka thim,
to reyo woko tindin madongo,
aka k'oyeyo jotwec pere dok peco?”
Kerin pa nonin je jonindo i dwoŋ,
kisi dhano i kaliel pere,
to obolin woko, bor gi kaliel perin,
paka jangi yath,
iumere gi delkwoŋ jolweny m'oneki i lweny,
ma jodonjo i telin ma bur,
paka delkwoŋ ŋat'otho m'onyon gi tiendi jo.
Ikilariwere gi jo i yikirok,
kwoŋbedo itieko reyo woko lowo perin,
ineko ji perin won.
Weyi nyikway joreco,
wokiri wocwoki nyingi jo kendo!
Yikere win thumo wot kere,
ro reco pa kwarere pajo,
ŋey jokiri jowoay, kosa dhumo piny,
to joumo piny gi tindin madongo.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ni, “Alaay kwoŋ jo, aka alakwanyo woko kwoŋ Babilon nyinge gi nyithindho je, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Alaloko kabedo pa kinapupu, gi kidiwin ma pi, aka alayweyo gi ywec ma rerok, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.”
“Paka atieko yiko,
apaka labedo,
aka paka atieko cano,
apaka latundo i kare.
Alaturo Joasiria i lowo paran,
aka alanyono go gi par tiendan wi gote paran,
ilakwanyo woko okol pere kwoŋ jo,
gi bieto pere i badi jo.
Me atoŋa m'atieko cano,
ma mako piny gibe,
aka me a cingan m'arieyo
kwoŋ nonin je.”
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny otieko cano,
aka ŋa ma lakwero?
