Cinge oriere woko,
ŋa ma ladolo?
ni abiro m'ocwado win otur,
kole wok i fuc thwol lawok uu,
aka olemo mere labedo thwol ma ay gi bwombe.
Okayo pa jacandi lafono,
aka ji ma bukony joriere piny i siem.
To alamiyo fuc mewin wotho gi kec,
aka ji mewin ma jodoŋ alaneko woko.
Goy ndur, awi waŋkac, ywak, awi tindi madwoŋ,
leny i lworo, awi Filistia, wijoje!
Kole yiro wok yumalo,
aka ongoye jalweny ma labedo kende i dwoŋ pere.
Aŋo ma dhano odwoki jomikwenda ma piny?
Rwoth otieko nwaŋo Zayon,
aka i go ji pere ma jodamba,
jolanwaŋo kapondo.
Osika woko Ar ma Mowab,
orey woko wor,
osika woko kiri Mowab,
orey woko.
Ji je ma Dibon jokadho malo,
i kitipa pa jom'oyeyo ywak,
ri Nebo gi Medeba.
Mowab ywak,
Wi kisi dhano odoŋ pata,
ye tik jo je oliel.
Joruko kutiya,
i wi udi gi i royo,
kisi dhano ywak gi geregere mathoth.
Wok i Hesbon tundo i Eliale,
dwondi jo winjere tundo bor kiri i Jahaz.
Riameno jolweny ma Mowab jokoko,
adundo pere kirin.
Cunyan ywak ri Mowab,
ji pere joringo i Zowar,
gi Egilath Selisiya.
Joywak malomalo i yo,
ka jokadho i tindi Luhith;
i royo ma kadho Horonayim,
jotiŋo malo ywak ma rerok.
Pi ma Nimrim,
othwo woko,
lum othwo, aka kilothi,
ongoye gima nyaboke pendi.
Riameno lim gibe m'oyido jonwaŋo je,
gi m'oyido jocoko,
itiŋo woko,
kalo milelo ma Wilo.
Kole ywak owinjere,
thoko adec ma Mowab.
Ywak winjere kiri i Egilayim,
tundo kiri i Berelim.
Kole pi ma Dibon opoŋ gi remo,
kucel alakelo kiri madwoŋ loyo kwoŋ Dibon,
simbwor ri jono ma jokwale wok i Mowab,
ri jom'oboth i piny.
Dhiri win nyithindhi rombo
bongi jadhum ma piny,
wok i Sela, tundo i thim,
tundo i got pa nyar Zayon.
Paka winyin m'oriem wok i od gin jolera,
ameno bende apaka nyir ma Mowab jolabedo,
i thengi malawa Arnon.
“Miy rieko,
miy tiro,
tim tipo perin paka wor
odieceŋ par,
pan ŋat'odamba,
ikir'icam sereko ri ŋat'oriem.
Weyi ji paran ma jodamba jowobedi kodin, Mowab
bedi kapondo rijo,
kwoŋ jono ma jomito reyo jo.”
Jadiy jo gi jarey jo orumo,
janyon ji gi tiende orumo i piny,
kenyo ilaketho kom ma jadhum i mar makiwire
wok i wema pa Daudi,
aka i wiye labedo iy'adieri,
jathum banja ma rango tiro,
aka yil ma timo gim'otire.
Watieko winjo noro pa Mowab,
nger ma go nor'iye!
Gero pere, noro pere gi pakirok pere;
delok pere je nono.
Riameno weyi Mowab wogoy lelo,
kole Mowab gibe lagoyo ndur.
Ywak win cuka wilacere kicutho,
ri cemo maber ma Kir Hareseth.
Kole ndelin ma Hesbon jothwo,
gi yen vini ma Sibima.
Jodhum ma piny,
jotieko rwadho piny nyingi vini maber loyo,
m'otundo kiri i Jaza,
jolera i thim,
withe mere oloth to yare
kalo wi nam.
Riameno aywak paka Jaza,
ri yen vini ma Sibima.
Aladhiekin gi pigi waŋan,
awi Hesbon gi Eliale,
kole koko mar'olemo perin gi keco perin,
otieko podho.
Ilakwanyo woko kisangala gi forok,
wok i ndelo olemo,
gi wok i ndelin vini.
Ongoye wer gi koko kendo,
kama idhiŋ'iye nyingi vini.
Atieko juko koko.
Riameno adundo paran gore paka dingidi ri Mowab,
gi cunyan ri Kir Heres.
Ka Mowab obin, to ol i kitipa pa jom'oyeyo, ka go obin i Kabedo Maleŋ kwayo, go k'onyal.
Me wac ma Rwoth oluwo kwoŋ Mowab cango.
To onyo Rwoth waco ni, “I oro adek, paka jatic m'opangisa, dwoŋ pa Mowab ilaloko cay, makada nende jothoth, aka ma joboth jolabedo manok kareno joloc.”
Neni, Damasiko kilabedo tindi madwoŋ kendo,
aka labedo kidhur gunda.
Ilajwango tindin pere kicutho,
jolabedo kabedo pa mwendi,
ma jolariere piny aka ongoye ŋata ladwoko jo.
Ka pondo langoye i Isiraili,
aka Damasiko langoye gi ker.
Josiria ma joboth,
jolacale dwoŋ pa Isiraili,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
I ndelo no,
dwoŋ pa Yakobo iladwoko piny,
aka bor ma delkwoŋe ilawaro woko.
Lacale paka jakeco,
ma coko withi ŋano m'ocungo,
gi paka ŋata dimo withi ŋano gi cinge,
i milelo ma Refayim.
Ilakeco abudha abudha,
paka k'igoyo yath oliv,
nyinge ario kosa adek,
aŋwen kosa abic,
i jange ma wilwindi,
kosa i jangi yath olemo.
Rwoth Were pa Isiraili waco.
I ndelo no, ji jolawire bongi Jacwec pajo,
aka waŋ jo laŋiyo bongi Were maleŋ pa Isiraili.
Jok'omiy dwoŋ ri migame,
m'obedo tic ma cingi jo,
aka jok'oŋiy gima cingi gin am'otimo,
obedi werin ma mon, Asera kosa migame ma waŋo buban.
I ndelo no tindin madongo ma pondo pere lacale paka kabedo m'ojwangi i lul, gi wilwindi yath, ma joweyo ro Joisiraili, aka lakisika woko.
Kole wiy win owil gi Were ma both mewin,
aka wikipoyo Tele ma pondo mewin;
riameno makada nende winofur ndelin,
ma lamo were makicar,
makada nende jotwi to jodongo gi ndelo m'opidh'iye,
kucel keco kilabedo,
kwanyowoko two gi litho makicangi.
Awi, mwoc pa nonin kweth,
jomwoc paka mor ma nam!
Awi kihola pa piny kweth
johola paka pi ma nigi derino madwoŋ!
Nonin johola paka pi kweth,
to Were ladwoko jo, to joringo bor,
ilariemo jo paka cuŋ ma koyo kwadho wi gote,
kodi rudino mar'asur ruwaŋ koth ma cwe gi koyo madwoŋ.
K'otundo othieno, neni, teko!
Mafodi piny k'oyawere, jongoye.
Me a gima timere ri jono ma jonyaga wan,
gi gigipiny pa jono ma jokwalo wan.
manitie bor kalo malawin ma Ethopiya;
ma jodhiro jomikwenda gi malawa Nayil,
iy'atewe ma toko wi pi!
Kadhi win, jomikwenda ma joyilyil,
i piny ma ji mere joboyo aka jofoth,
bongi ji m'ilworo cegin gi bor,
piny matek aka kengila piny megi,
piny ma malawin poko lowo mere.
Awi, ji je ma piny gibe,
win ma wibedo i piny,
k'otiŋ malo ranyuth wi gote, neni win!
K'okudhi gwara, winji!
Kole Rwoth owaco ran ni,
“Alaŋiyo liŋ gi kabedo paran,
paka ceŋ liel i lietho m'odieceŋ,
paka pondeponde ma thoyo i lietho ma keco.”
Kole mafodi keco, ka thiwo orumo,
aka mawuwa lokere nyingi vini m'ocek,
Were lanyaro woko withi jo gi musalauyo ma kikolesa,
to jako woko jange je.
Ilaweyo joje ri winyin ma gote,
g'ogwaŋe madudi.
Winyin jolacamo i milengela,
aka ogwaŋe madudi jolacamo i cwir.
I hongo no ilakelo mic ri Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
wok bongi ji maboyo aka jofoth,
wok bongi ji m'ilworo cegin gi bor,
piny matek aka kengila piny megi,
piny ma malawa poko lowo mere.
Jolabino i Got Zayon, kabedo m'ilam'iye nyingi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Neni, Rwoth gweco i pondeponde masew,
aka bino i Misir;
cal je ma Misir jolakirin ruwaŋ go,
aka cuny Jomisir lapodho i jo.
Alakisigila Jomisir kwoŋ jo wegi gi wegi,
aka jolalweny, acel gi nyawote,
jager gi jager,
tindi madwoŋ gi tindi madwoŋ, ker gi ker.
Jomisir jolangoye gi meni,
ka anonywow can pajo.
Jolatemo nwaŋo rieko,
wok bongi cal pajo je,
wok bongi tipo pa jom'otho,
gi wok bongi jothieth.
Alamiyo Jomisir
i cingi jadwoŋ matek,
kere mager ladhumo jo,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Pi ma Nayil lacwiyo woko,
aka malawa lacwiyo to thwo.
Waŋ pi mere laŋwe,
waŋ pi ma Misir lacwiyo,
aka midole gi lum maboyo,
jolathwo woko.
Midolin ma Nayil gi ma thengi Nayil,
kisi ndelin ma Nayil m'ocwoy'iye,
laduny woko, to ngoye man.
Jokitoga rec jolaywak,
jono je ma jobolo siragetere i Nayil jolakumo,
aka jono ma joyaro bwo wi pi mbaka laloyo jo.
Jokwoc nangin gi jotudi nangin mafoth,
jolabedo giwickwot.
Jono ma jobedo sirin ma piny ilaŋidho jo,
aka jono je ma jotimo tic ma cul m'ipangisa jo jolabedo i rem.
Jodhum ma Zowan jomiŋ swa,
jomic rieko pa Farawo ma joriek jomiyo rieko ma miŋo.
Winyalo nedi waco ri Farawo ni,
“Abedo wod jorieko,
wod kerin macene?”
Onyo nikune cwo perin ma joriek?
Weyi jowowaci rin aka jowomiy woŋey,
atoŋa pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny kwoŋ Misir.
Jodhum ma Zowan jotieko lokere jomamiŋ,
aka otiek wondo jodhum ma Memfis.
Jono ma jobedo telin ma sonda ma nonin pere,
jotieko rwenyo woko Misir.
Rwoth otieko konjo kwoŋ jo,
cuny ma nywowirok,
aka jomiyo Misir kimudamuda i gima timo je,
paka jamero tangatanga i ŋok pere.
Aka langoye gimoro ri Misir,
ma wic kosa yiwe, jangi thith, kosa kedi onyali timo.
I ndelo no Jomisir jolacale mon, to jokirin gi lworo ruwaŋ cingi jo ma Rwoth pa lwak jolweny yengo i wiy jo.
Lowo ma Yuda lalokere lworo madwoŋ ri ji ma Misir, kisi ŋat'otuc rigo nyingi Yuda labedo gi lworo r'atoŋa pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny kwoŋ Misir.
I ndelo no labedo tindin madongo abic i lowo ma Misir ma joluwo dhodhok ma Kanan aka jolakwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny. Acel kwoŋ jo ilalwoŋo ni Tindi madwoŋ ma Waŋceŋ.
I ndelo no migam labedo ri Rwoth i dier lowo ma Misir, gi siro ri Rwoth i kew ma Misir.
Aka labedo ranyuth gi mijulisi ri Rwoth pa lwak jolweny i piny ma Misir, ka joywak ri Rwoth ro jor'adica, go laoro rijo jaboth, ma lagwoko to gonyo jo.
Rwoth lanyuthere to ŋeyere ri Jomisir, aka Jomisir jolaŋeyo Rwoth i ndelo no. Jolalamo go gi cowirok gi mic awaŋa, aka jolatimo cikirok ri Rwoth to joculo.
Rwoth lamiyo Misir gir'acula, to rumacen cango jo. Jolagik bongi Rwoth, aka go lawinjo kwayo pajo to cango jo.
I ndelo no labedo royo madwoŋ wok i Misir tundo i Asiria, aka Joasiria jolabino i Misir, Jomisir bende jolakidho i Asiria, aka Jomisir jolalamo kanyacel gi Joasiria.
I ndelo no Isiraili labedo mar'adek gi Misir kodi Asiria, silwany i dier piny,
ma Rwoth pa lwak jolweny omiyo silwany ka waco ama: “Silwany wobedi ri ji paran ma Misir, Asiria tic ma cingan, kodi Isiraili alunja paran.”
I oro ma jamituka, ma Kere Sargon ma Asiria ooro, obino monjo Asdod tindi madwoŋ ma Filistia,
i hongo no Rwoth oluwo gi Isaya wod Amoz, ka waco ni, “Kadhi, aka iluny woko kutiya gi war perin wok i tiendin.” Isaya otimo ameno aka owotho kinyoro gi par tiende.
Rwoth owaco ni, “Paka ŋeca paran Isaya otieko woth kinyoro aka gi par tiende ma oro adek, me ranyuth ma gima latimere ri Misir gi Ethopiya.
Ameno apaka kere ma Asiria latero kinyoro jotwec ma go omaki wok i Misir gi Ethopiya, mathindho gi madongo, jolawoth kinyoro gi par tiendi gin, ma jok'oumo madeko gin, kelo wickwot kwoŋ Misir.
Jono ma joketho geno pajo i Ethopiya gi Misir paka ka yumirok pajo, jolanywowere to jongoye gi geno.
I ndelo no, ji ma jobedo i thengi nam ma Filistia jolawaco ni, ‘Neni, me a gim'otimere ri jono m'oyido wageno aka waparo ni jolabotho wan kwoŋ kere ma Asiria! To onyo wan, walaboth nedi?’”
Me mikwenda ma teko ma mako kwoŋ Babilon.
Paka asur ma yupiny ma Kanan yweyo piny,
teko bino wok i thim,
wok i piny ma kiwacere.
Onyuthan menyirok, ma gigipiny ma kiwacere,
jamisegey, segeya,
aka janyeki nyeko.
Kadhi malo, Awi Elam,
thoki ma mako, Awi Mediya,
Rwoth otieko ciko kelo i gike,
candirok pere.
Riameno, pieran opoŋ g'arama ma litho,
ŋedi omakan paka dhako ma ŋedi ramo.
Akule piny ŋey anyal bedo m'akiwinjo,
adhier m'akinyal neno.
Cunyan podho,
lworo miyan kirin;
othieno m'oyido akuro,
onyo olokere ran lworo.
Joyiko meza,
jopedho okute,
jocemo, jomedho.
Ay win malo, awi jodhum,
wir win kwot gi mo!
Kole Rwoth owaco ran ni,
“Kadhi, kethi jakur,
weyi go wowaci gima neno.
Go laneno, cwo ma jogweyo kayina j'ario ario,
jogwey punda, gi jogwey ŋamia,
go laciko ithe maber,
maber swa.”
Kenyo jakur olwoŋo ni,
“Awi Rwoth, acungo i wi kakur,
noknok odieceŋ,
aka apidhere ka tic paran,
wor gipi.
cwo ma jogweyo kayina j'ario ario!”
Kenyo jakur odwoko ni,
“Opodho, Babilon opodho;
aka cal ma werin pere je,
dhano oŋinyo piny.”
Awi ji paran, wicale gim'osusila t'ipiedho,
gim'atieko winjo wok bongi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
Were pa Isiraili, atuco riwin.
Me mikwenda ma teko ma mako kwoŋ Duma.
Dhano lwoŋan wok i Edom,
“Jakur, wor nedi?
Jakur, wor nedi?”
Jakur odwoko ni,
“Odikin bino, aka wor bende bino,
k'ilapenjo, penji,
t'idwoko kendo.”
Me mikwenda ma teko ma mako kwoŋ piny pa Jowarabu.
Wilanindo i lul ma piny pa Jowarabu,
awi jowoth pa Jodedan.
Keli win pi ri ji ma riyo neko,
miy win jopath cemo,
win ji ma jobedo i lowo ma Tema.
Kole joringo kwoŋ abor,
abor m'icelo,
kwoŋ atum bor m'okom,
gi kwoŋ teko ma lweny.
Kole Rwoth owaco ran ni, “I oro acel cungo kwoŋ oro pa jotic m'opangisa dwoŋ pa Kedar latundo i gike,
aka jolweny g'atum abor ma joboth, cwo matek ma Kedar lanoko; kole Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, otieko luwo.”
Me mikwenda ma teko ma mako kwoŋ milelo ma menyirok.
Winyutho aŋo ni wikadho malo,
wijoje, i wi udi mewin?
Awi tindi madwoŋ m'opoŋ woy,
Awi tindi madwoŋ m'opoŋ kisangala.
Ji mewin ma jotho k'oneki jo g'abor,
kosa jok'otho i lweny.
Jodhum mewin je joringo kanyacel,
omaki jo m'ongoye atum bor.
Ji mewin je m'onwaŋ omaki,
makada nende oyido joringo bor swa.
Riameno awaco ni,
Ŋiy bor kwoŋan,
weyi aywak pigi waŋan makec,
ikir'icandere kweyo cunyan
ro rerok pa ji paran.
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny nigi ndelo,
ma teko, nyono piny gi nywowirok,
i milelo ma menyirok,
guro piny kor udi,
gi koko ri wi gote.
Elam otiŋo malo kakano gilweny pere,
gi cawilin gi jogwey kayinin,
aka Kiri oyawo kwot.
Milelo mewin maŋon loyo,
opoŋ gi cawilin,
jogwey kayinin jocungo matek,
i waŋkace.
Owey Yuda m'othangere.
I ndelo no wiŋiyo gilweny ma Ot ma Lul,
aka wineno ni hoŋere ma tindi madwoŋ pa Daudi oyido thoth, aka wikulo pi wok i kidiwa ma piny.
Wikwano udi ma Yerusalem, aka wituro piny udi ri geto kor ot.
Wigeto gikano pi i dier kor ot ario ma pi ma kidiwa m'oti. To wikicomo waŋ win kwoŋ ŋat'ocano gime cango con to miyo wotimere.
I ndelo no Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny
olwoŋo ndur gi ywak,
cido ye wiwin gi ruko kutiya.
wicamo riŋo to wimadho vini.
Weyi wacem, wamedhi,
kole dikin wanyalo tho.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny oluwo m'awinjo gi ithan.
Adieri reco me k'ocwaki riwin,
cuka winotho,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny owaco ran ni, “Biye kadhi bongi jagwoki lim me, bongi Sebina, ma jakur ot aka ipenji go ni,
‘Imito timo aŋo ka, aka inigi ŋa ka, m'ipayo kayik perin, win ma wipayo kayik mewin kam'oŋawere, aka wigoro kabedo mewin i tele?
Neni, Rwoth cegin dimin to bolin woko gi meni, awi in jal ma jameni me. Go lamakin matek,
aka lawitin to bolin paka mupira i piny malac. Ilatho kenyo i thengi cawilin perin m'oyido inor gine. Ibedo wickwot ri ot pa jadwoŋ perin.’
Alakwanyin wok i ka tic perin t'adwokin piny.”
“I ndelo no alalwoŋo ŋeca paran Eliakim wod Hilikia,
aka alaruko rigo kanzu perin t'itweyo rigo del perin. Alamiyo go dwoŋ m'oyido inigine. Go labedo ba ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem gi i ot pa Yuda.
Alaketho i goke rayaw ma ot pa Daudi, ka go oyaw, ongoye ŋata lacego, ka go ocegi, ongoye ŋata layawo.
Alaloko go m'ocwiny paka kedi ma wema m'ocom matek, aka Eliakim labedo kom madwoŋ i ot pa bamere.”
“Dwoŋ ma ot pa bamere je laliero kwoŋ go, gi nyithindho je. Jolaliero kwoŋe paka degi g'acerin ma joliero wok i kedi.
I ndelo no, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, kedi m'oyido ocom m'ocwiny lalwogere, ilatoŋo to podho, aka bieto m'oyido nitie i wiye ilatoŋo woko.” Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny otieko luwo.
Ywak, Awi mel ma Tarsis,
kole orey woko Tire kicutho,
m'ongoye ot kosa kadonjo.
Jobino wok i lowo ma Saipras
munyo onyuthi jo.
Liŋ win, awi ji ma jobedo i thengi nam,
awi jomitan ma Sidon,
jomikwenda mewin joŋado nam,
aka oyido jonitie wi pi kweth,
dome mewin oyido obedo ŋano ma Sihor,
gi keco ma Nayil,
oyido wibedo jomitan pa nonin.
Wickwot omaki win, awi Sidon,
kapondo ma Nam waco.
Fodi ŋedi k'oraman, kosa anywol,
fodi akikuro yac,
kosa nyir ma fodi jokuya cwo.
K'okow ri Misir,
jolabwok to jodhier kwoŋ wac ma mako kwoŋ Tire.
Por win loka ma Tarsis,
wiywak win ji ma wibedo i thengi nam.
Me a tindi mewin madwoŋ ma dikisangala?
Tindi m'ocaki cango con,
ma par tiende otiŋo wok bor,
kadho woth.
Ŋa m'ocano gime,
kwoŋ Tire, japok sangaria,
ma jomitan pere jobedo jodhum,
aka iworo jo i piny gibe?
Obedo atoŋa pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
nyeko kwoto ma ŋono je,
kelo cay kwoŋ jom'iworo je i piny.
Mol i lowo perin paka Nayil,
awi nyar Tarsis;
ongoye rageŋ moro je kendo.
Rwoth orieyo cinge i wi nam
go otieko miyo kerin kirin.
Rwoth owodho or ma mako kwoŋ Kanan
reyo woko kapondo mere.
Rwoth owaco ama,
Ikilakisangala kendo,
Awi nyir ma fodi jokuya cwo, ma Sidon m'idiyo jo;
Ay, Saipras, ikali loka ca,
kiri koro wikilanwaŋo ywomirok.
Neni, lowo pa Jokaldin! Obedo ji me, makiweno Asiria. Joloko Tire kabedo p'ogwaŋe madudi. Jogeto acurcur ma thoko go mako, joreyo woko muluwir mere to josika woko go.
Ywak, awi mel ma Tarsis,
kole kapondo perin orey woko.
Wok i ndelo no, kilapoyo Tire kendo ma oro piero ario, paka ndelin pa kere acel. Ka oro no orum, latimere ri Tire paka nitie i wer pa malaya me.
Kwany tongol,
woth thoko tindi madwoŋ,
in malaya ma kipoy kendo!
Diy dwondin mamit,
wer wer kweth,
ŋey wonyali poyin.
I gike ma oro piero ario, Rwoth lawendo ri Tire, aka Tire lagik i mitan pere kendo, aka latimo malaya gi kerin je ma piny.
Magowa pere gi cul pere ilamiyo ri Rwoth, kilakano, t'ilaoro ma miyo cemo gi nangin ri ji ma jobedo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Onyo Rwoth cegin nyeko piny to weyo nono,
aka lawiyo cal mere to kedho woko ji ma jobed'iye.
Aka labedo, paka gi ji, ameno gi jocway ri Were i wi migam;
paka ri ŋeca, apaka ri jadwoŋ pere,
paka ri ŋeca madhako, apaka ri dhakodwoŋ pere,
paka ri jamitan, apaka ri janyew,
paka ri ŋata kopa, apaka ri ŋat'okopa go,
paka ri ŋata banja, apaka ri ŋat'ibanja.
Piny ladoŋ m'othangere aka gunda,
kole Rwoth otieko luwo wac me.
Piny othwo to ner,
piny gibe nyapere aka ner,
polo nyapere kanyacel gi piny.
Piny oduwere,
i cingi ji ma jobed'iye,
joturo cik,
jok'oluwo fonji,
joturo cikirok m'oyido ripo bedo cil gi cil.
Riameno lam oreyo woko piny,
aka ji mere jocandere ro reco pajo,
ji ma jobedo i piny jowaŋ,
aka odoŋ ji manok.
Vini manyen othwo woko,
vini nyekere,
kisi ŋat'oyido sangala onyo hamo.
Dwondi sasi ma kisangala oliŋ,
koko ma kisangala orumo,
dwondi tongol ma kisangala oliŋ.
Jokiwer ka jomadho vini pajo,
aka vini kec ri jomedho.
Tindi madwoŋ ma nywowirok otur piny,
aka udi ocegi m'ongoye ŋata nyalo donjo.
Ywak winjere i royo ro ngoye pa vini
kisangala ongoye kendo,
forok orwenyo woko i piny.
Osika woko tindi madwoŋ,
aka waŋkace mere otur piny.
Ameno apaka labedo i dier piny,
kodi i dier nonin,
paka ijwero yen oliv kosa ndelo vini,
to doŋ nono k'ifono nyingi vini.
Ji jotiŋo dwondi gin malo aka jowero ri kisangala,
jokoko malo ri dwoŋ pa Rwoth yupodho ceŋ.
Riameno ji ma yuwok ceŋ miy win Rwoth dwoŋ,
ji ma jobedo i thengi nam, pak win nyingi Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili.
Wok i gike ma piny wawinjo wer ma pak,
madwoŋ ri Ŋat'otire.
T'awaco ni, arumo woko,
arumo woko, kidamba ran!
Kole jor'akaka jotimo akaka,
jor'akaka jotimo akaka swa.
Teko, bur, gi bwo
kuro win, awi ji ma jobedo i piny!
Ŋat'oringi derino ma teko,
lapodho i bur,
aka ŋat'owok i bur,
lamoko i bwo.
Kole dirisin ma polo oyawere,
aka kindi piny kirin.
Piny otur kicutho adieri,
piny obare to pokere mathindho thindho adieri,
piny oyengere swa adieri.
Piny tangatanga paka jamero,
yengere paka simba,
reco mere pek kwoŋe,
aka podho ma koay malo kendo.
I ndelo no Rwoth lamiyo gir'acula,
lwak ma polo, i polo,
gi kerin ma piny, i piny.
Ilacoko jo kanyacel,
paka jotwec i bur,
ilacego jo i katwec,
aka rumacen ma ndelo kweth ilamiyo jo gir'acula.
Kenyo dwe lalokere macol,
aka ceŋ k'oliel kendo,
kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny ladhumo,
wi Got Zayon kodi i Yerusalem,
aka go lanyutho dwoŋ pere ruwaŋ jotel pa ji pere.
Awi Rwoth, ibedo Were paran,
alatiŋin malo, alapako nyingin;
kole itieko timo gigipiny ma gir'aura,
can m'itimo cene, mar'adieri aka m'otire.
Kole itieko loko tindi madwoŋ kidhur,
tindi madwoŋ m'otinda iloko gunda,
muluwir pa jopath k'obedi tindi madwoŋ kendo,
kilageto kendo.
Riameno ji matek jolamiyin dwoŋ;
tindin madongo pa piny mager jolalworin.
Kole itieko bedo kapondo ri jocandi,
kapondo ri ŋata bu gimoro i teko pere,
kabwok kwoŋ koth gi tipo kwoŋ lietho;
ka derino pa jomaker cal asur ma cwir.
Paka lietho kam'othwo.
Ikweyo koko pa jokwor mawan,
paka pondeponde kweyo ndelo malieth,
imiyo wer pa jomaker liŋ.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny latimo kalima ri nonin je wi got me, kalima ma cemo maleny, kalima ma vini ma loŋo, cemo maleny m'opoŋ'iye more, vini ma loŋo, m'okenera.
Rwoth lareyo woko wi got me,
gium m'obol i wi nonin,
kitambala m'oyar i wi nonin.
Ilawaco i ndelo no ni, “Neni, me Were mawan, watieko kuro go ŋey wobothi wan. Me Rwoth ma watieko kuro; weyi wasangala aka wafore i both pere.”
Makada nende go oyar cinge paka jobuk pi joyaro cingi gin buko pi; Rwoth lamwolo noro pere kanyacel gi rieko ma cinge.
Kor ot pere ilaguro piny, t'ibolo woko piny i fukefuke.
Ilawero wer me i ndelo no i lowo ma Yuda.
Wanigi tindi madwoŋ matek,
Were otieko kelo both,
paka kor ot ma iye gi kor ot ma woko.
Yaw waŋkace,
ŋey piny ma timo gim'otire,
aka kuro adieri wodonji.
Rwoth, ikuro go i siem ma gibe,
ri ŋata ketho paro i in,
kwoŋbedo oketho geno pere i in.
Kethi geno i Rwoth cil gi cil,
kole Rwoth Were,
obedo tele ma cil gi cil.
Kole Rwoth odwoko piny,
ji ma jobedo i kabedo ma malo,
tindi madwoŋ m'ogeti m'oŋawere,
cuka geyo fukefuke.
Onyo jocandi gi ji ma bu gimoro,
ama jonyono woko piny.
Royo pa joma timo gim'otire obipi,
iŋat'iloko royo pajo mafoth.
Watieko kuro yo ma thumo banja perin,
wakurin, Awi Rwoth,
poyo nyingin,
a mito ma cuny wan.
An won awanya in wor gipi,
cunyan i an koro dwarin adieri.
Kole ka thumo banja perin nitie i piny,
ji ma jobedo i piny jofonjere timo gim'otire.
K'onyuthi jokidakana wor,
jokilafonjere timo gim'otire.
I lowo pa joma timo gim'otire, go timo komo,
aka kinen meni pa Rwoth ma dhum.
to jokinen.
Weyi jowoneni miyirok perin ri ji perin, aka wickwot womaki jo.
Weyi mac pa jokwor perin worey woko jo.
Awi Rwoth, ilamiyo wan siem,
kole bende, itieko timo riwan tic mawan je.
Awi Rwoth Were mawan,
rwodhe man bende jotieko dhumo wan paka in,
to, nyingin kende ama walwoŋo.
Jotho, jokilakwo,
jobedo tipo, jokilacerino;
i gike mere itieko reyo woko jo,
iyweyo woko poyirok pajo.
To itieko miyo nono mawan omedere Awi Rwoth,
itieko medo nono, ilimo dwoŋ,
itieko loko malac kew je ma lowo.
Awi Rwoth, i teko ji jorangin,
jokwayo,
munyo imiyo jo gir'acula.
Paka dhako ma nigi iye,
core cegin i hongo pere ma nywol,
go ywak i litho ka ŋedi ramo,
ameno apaka oyido wanitie ro in, Awi Rwoth.
Wabedo gi iy wan,
to cale pa wanywolo koyo.
Wakicowo konyo piny,
aka ji ma jobedo i piny jok'opodho.
Ji perin ma jotho jolakwo,
delkwoŋ jolacerino.
Awi ji ma jonindo i fukefuke, cew win aka wiwer ro kisangala!
Kole thoyo mewin obedo thoyo ma lero,
aka piny laŋulo jom'otho.
Biye win, ji paran donji win i udi mewin,
aka wicegi thigo mewin yuŋey win;
pondi win ma hongo moro,
cuka keme pa Rwoth orum.
Kole Rwoth bino wok i kabedo pere,
miyo ji ma piny gir'acula ro reco pajo,
piny laŋulo remo m'ooy i iye,
aka kilaumo kendo jom'onek jo.
I ndelo no,
wer win kwoŋ ndelo vini ma kisangala!
An, Rwoth, abedo jakur mere,
akonjo rigo pi noknok.
Akuro go wor g'odieceŋ,
wongoye ŋata wonyeki.
Angoye gi keme,
To ka nitie kudhin gi okure,
ran lweny gine,
alawaŋo woko jo kanyacel.
Kosa jowocwire kwoŋan, akwonga jo,
weyi jowotimi siem kodan,
weyi jowotimi siem kodan.
I ndelo ma bino, nyikway Yakobo jolarwako fuc,
Isiraili lathiwo to ketho withe,
aka lapoŋo piny gibe g'olemo.
Go otieko rwadho jo piny paka orwadho piny jono ma jorwadho jo?
Kosa oneko jo paka oneki joma joneko jo?
Gi gweyo woko, gi riemo woko,
ilakiosa banja gine,
go ogweyo woko gi koyo malieth,
i ndelo ma koyo ma yuwok ceŋ.
Riameno, gi gime ilaumo reco pa Yakobo,
me labedo ranyak m'opoŋ ma kwanyo woko reco pere,
ka go oloko telin je ma migam,
paka coka m'oŋiny mathindho thindho,
m'ongoye migam pa were madhako Asera kosa ma buban m'odoŋ.
Tindi madwoŋ m'othok gi cel
odoŋ gunda, aka ojwangi paka thim;
nyathi dhiaŋ cemo kenyo,
nindo piny, aka jako jange mere.
Ka jangi yen jothwo, ituro,
mon jobino dimo aka jomoko gine mac.
Kole me ji ma jongoye gi niaŋ,
riameno jacwec pajo kilamako gi jo wor,
go m'ocweyo jo k'onyutho jo ŋono.
I ndelo no, Rwoth layeko win wok i Yufrete tundo i kew ma Misir, aka ilacoko win kanyacel acel acele, awi Joisiraili.
I ndelo no, ilakudho gwara madwoŋ, aka jono m'oyido jorwenyo i lowo ma Asiria kodi jono m'oyido oriem jo woko i lowo ma Misir jolabino lamo Rwoth wi got maleŋ i Yerusalem.
Kidamba ri sangaria ma noro,
pa jomero ma Efrayim,
ma ŋono madwoŋ pere cal mawuwa ma thwo;
manitie i wi milelo ma diwa pa joma jolacere gi vini!
Neni, Rwoth nigi jameni aka tek;
paka asur pe, ma reyo woko ŋawirok,
paka asur matek, paka pi ma poŋ de oy;
go laredho jo piny gi cinge.
Ilanyono piny gi tiendi jo,
sangaria ma noro pa jomero ma Efrayim.
Ŋono madwoŋ pere lacale paka mawuwa ma thwo,
manitie i wi milelo ma diwa,
labedo paka nyandere macek marapena mafodi milengela;
nyatoro je ma neno camo woko
tekin podho i cinge.
I ndelo no, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny labedo sangaria madwoŋ,
gi sangaria ma ŋono, ri ji pere ma joboth;
kodi cuny ma tiro, ri jathum banja,
gi meni ri jono ma joriemo lweny i waŋkac.
Jome bende jobenga gi vini,
jotangatanga gi math matek,
jocway ri Were i wi migam gi jotuci wac Were.
Jonywowere gi vini,
jotangatanga gi math matek,
aka jobenga i mikwenda pajo,
aka jokom i miyo rieko.
Kole mezin oumere gi ŋok,
m'ongoye kama kikoc.
Ŋa ma go ofonji ŋeyo,
kosa ŋa ma go otiti rigo mikwenda?
Kono nyithindho ma nyaka ocieri jo dhoth,
ma joweyo thundho.
Kole obedo nyikuta i wi nyikuta,
bol i wi bol,
wac i wiwaci.
kodi lew joman,
go laluwo gi ji me,
m'otieko waco rijo ni,
“Me kabedo ma ywomirok
miy ywomirok ri jom'olacere
me kabedo ma ywomirok,
kucel jok'onyalo winjo.
Riameno, wac pa Rwoth labedo rijo,
nyikuta i wi nyikuta,
bol i wi bol,
wac i wiwaci.”
Nyaka jowonyal kadho, to jopodho aŋey,
jowotur, ocik rijo bwo, aka woter jo.
Riameno, winji win wac pa Rwoth, win jogero,
ma widhumo ji me ma jonitie i Yerusalem.
Kwoŋbedo witieko waco ni, “Watieko timo cikirok gi tho,
watieko yerok gi piny pa jom'otho,
ka goco ma teko oluwi,
kilatundo bongi wan,
kole watieko loko gima k'adieri kapondo mawan,
gi twodo kabwok mawan.”
Neni, aketho misingi matek ri Zayon,
gi tele ma welo ma sonda, misingi matek.
Ŋat'oyey k'okwakere.
Alaketho tiro paka bol ma kipima,
timo gim'otire paka gi bipo,
pe layweyo woko kapondo ma twodo,
aka pi lapoŋ i kabwok.
Cikirok mewin ma witimo gi tho ilareyo woko,
yerok mewin ma witimo gi piny pa jom'otho k'ocungi,
ka goco ma teko oluwi,
ilacwado win gine piny.
Wok i dito ma luwo gine, latero win,
kole kisi odikin laluwo,
odieceŋ gi wor,
labedo nyaka kirin, niaŋ mikwenda mere.
Kitanda cek swa ma dhano kinyal rierok i iye,
aka bilangit thin ma dhano kinyal minirok i iye.
kodi i milelo Gibeon;
timo tim pere, tim pere ma dhier,
kodi timo tic pere, tic pere ma kiniaŋere.
Onyo riameno, wikiri winyer,
kosa gir'acula mewin labedo matek loyo,
kole atieko winjo Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny,
wodho or ma reyo woko piny gibe.
Ciki ithi win, aka winji win dwondan,
winji win, aka winji win luwo paran.
Ŋata furo gi kwer dhok, furo m'oluwere aluwa,
ka go lacwoyo, yawo to teŋo lowo pere.
Go kutho bipo lowo,
cwoyo kodhi,
pidho ŋano gi bale i bol,
to nyaka cwoyo kodhi man i kew.
Kole ofonji go woŋey,
Were pere fonjo go.
Nyim kiteŋ gi ngolo,
kosa tiendi magal kiŋili wi nyim,
to nyim iteŋo gi luth,
igoyo gi ngolo.
Dhano bende ŋinyo mugat ŋano?
Be, go kiŋiny kicutho,
ka go ogweyo tiendi magal pere i wiye,
kayina pere kiŋiny woko.
Gime bende wok bongi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny;
go jamic rieko ma gir'aura,
aka jarieko ma malo swa.
Kidamba ri Ariel, kidamba ri Ariel!
Tindi madwoŋ kama Daudi oketh'iye kambi,
oro gi oro timo kalima thoko.
Kucel alamiyin Ariel litho,
aka labedo ywak gi kiuja,
go labedo ran paka Ariel.
Alaketho kambi thokin,
alathokin makin,
alageto acurcur ma thokin.
Kenyo ilaluwo wok i lutho ma piny,
wok i milelo i fukefuke wac perin lawok;
dwondin lawinjere wok i piny paka dwondi jwogi,
aka luwo perin lalwiyo wok i fukefuke.
To lwak jokwor perin jolacale paka fukefuke mathindho thindho,
lwak jogero jolakadho,
abwap ma k'oniaŋere.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny lawendo rin,
gi mwoc koth kodi yengirok pa piny kodi woy madwoŋ,
g'asur kodi mac ma reyo woko.
Kenyo lwak piny je ma jolwenyo gi Ariel,
ma jolwenyo gi go kodi kapondo pere, aka jomiyo go litho,
jolarwenyo paka lek, kosa paro ma wor.
Paka ŋata kec neko leko ni cemo,
to cew munyo kec fodi neko,
kosa ŋata riyo neko leko ni madho gir'amadha,
to cew m'ongoye meni, ma fodi riyo neko,
ameno apaka lwak piny je,
ma jolwenyo gi got Zayon jolabedo.
Miŋere win aka bedi win mamiŋ,
rwenyi win aka weyi waŋ win wotho!
Mer win, to ki gi vini;
tangatanga win, to ki gi medho matek!
cuny ma nindo,
go oumo waŋ win, jotuci wac Were,
to umo wiy win, win ma wineno gima latimere yuwiye.
Menyirok mere je ocale riwin wac m'omwon i kitawo. K'omiy ŋat'oŋeyo ndiko t'iwaco ni “Mondo soma gime.” Go ladwoko ni, “Akinyali kisoma, kole omwon.”
To k'omiy ŋat'okuya ndiko t'iwaco ni, “Mondo soma gime.” Go lawaco ni, “Akinyali ndiko.”
“Kwoŋbedo ji me jocore cegin adhok,
joworan gi wac nono,
kucel cuny jo nibor kodan,
aka lworo pajo ran obedo or pa ji ma jopoyo.
gi dhier gi ji me,
gigipiny ma miyo jo bwok aka gidhier.
Rieko pa jorieko pajo larere,
aka niaŋ pa joma niaŋ lapanere.”
Kidamba riwin ma witemo pano can mewin kwoŋ Rwoth,
ma tim pajo nitie i mudho,
ma jowaco ni, “Ŋa ma neno wan? Ŋa m'oŋeyo wan?”
jacwec dak orom gi dak?
Cwec bende owaci ri jacwec mere ni,
iŋat'ikicweyan?
Kosa gim'oŋin bende waco ri ŋat'oŋino ni,
ongoye gi niaŋ?
K'odoŋ hongo macek ama,
to lul ma Lebanon lokere ndelo olemo,
aka ndelo olemo lalokere lul?
I ndelo no joma ithi jo otho jolawinjo,
wac ma kitawo,
aka joma waŋ jo otho m'oyido jobedo i mudho,
waŋ jo layawere to joneno.
Jomamwol jolanwaŋo kisangala i Rwoth,
aka jocandi jolafore i Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili.
Kole jogero gi jodhaw
jolarwenyo kicutho;
aka ilareyo woko jono je ma jokuro timo reco,
ma jothumo banja ri dhano gi wac,
jociko bwo ri jathum banja i waŋkac,
aka jowire githenge ŋata timo gim'otire m'ongoye atoŋa.
Riameno, Rwoth, m'obotho Abraham waco ama kwoŋ ot pa Yakobo:
Yakobo kilabedo i wickwot kendo,
waŋe kilataro kendo.
Kole ka go onen nyithindho pere,
tic ma cingan i dier go,
jolatero nyingan maleŋ;
jolamiyo Ŋataleŋ pa Yakobo dwoŋ,
aka jolalworo Were pa Isiraili.
Aka jono je ma jotimo gi komo i cuny jolaniaŋ,
jono je ma joŋunyaŋunya,
jolayeyo fonji.
Kidamba ri nyithindho ma jogwenyere, Rwoth waco,
ma jotimo can ma k'obedo aparan,
ma jotimo cikirok, to k'owoki bongi cuny paran,
medo reco i wi reco.
Jomiyere kadho piny i Misir,
m'ongoye penjo rieko paran,
jopondo i Misir ni Farawo wokwonga jo,
aka jorango kabwok i tipo pa Misir.
Riameno kikwonga pa Farawo labedo wickwot riwin,
aka kabwok i tipo ma Misir labedo teko riwin.
Makada nende jodhum pere jonitie i Zowan,
aka jomikwenda pere jotundo i Hanes,
kisi dhano je wiye kwot,
luwo i ji ma jongoye rijo cwe,
ma jokikel kony kosa cwe,
to wickwot kodi amien.
Me mikwenda ma mako kwoŋ ogwaŋe ma yupiny ma Kanan.
Luwo i lowo ma teko gi litho,
wok kwoŋ simbwor gi simbwor madhako,
malasaŋ kodi thwol ma ay gi bwombe,
jotiŋo lim i wi punde kodi ŋamia,
tero ri ji ma jongoye rijo gi cwe.
Kole kony pa Misir bukony aka nono.
Riameno atieko miyo nyinge ni,
“Rahab ma bedo liŋ.”
Rwoth owaco ran ni,
Kadhi pama, indiki ruwaŋ jo i tele mapando,
indiki i kitawo,
ŋey wobedi kiri i hongo ma bino
ma cil gi cil.
Kole jobedo ji ma jogwenyere,
nyithindho ma jotwodo,
nyithindho ma jokiwinji,
cik pa Rwoth;
ma jowaco ri joneno ni, “Wikiri winen.”
Gi ri jotuci wac Were ni, “Wikiri wiwaci riwan gim'otire.
Luw win gi wan gima foth,
tuci win twodo,
eye win i royo, leŋ win i yo,
wakimiti winjo kendo gima mako kwoŋ Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili.”
Riameno Were maleŋ pa Isiraili waco ama:
Kwoŋbedo witieko kwero wac me,
aka witieko ketho geno iy'akaka gi twodo,
aka wigoŋere kwoŋe.
Riameno reco me lacale riwin,
paka barok i kor ot mabor, m'oleŋere aka cegin podho,
ma barok mere bino abwap, ma piyo.
Tur mere cale paka dak m'ocwey gi lowo,
ma ŋinyere marac,
to ngoye thago ma nwaŋere,
kada ma toko cuk mac wok i kendo, kosa ma twomo pi wok i bur.
Kole Rwoth Were, Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili otieko waco ama:
I dwoko bongan wilalimo ywomirok gi both,
liŋ gi geno labedo meni mewin,
to wikiyeyo.
To wiwaco ni,
Be! Walakwale i wi kayina;
riameno wilakwale i wi kayina.
To jono ma joriemo win,
jolabedo kiri mayil loyo.
Ji gana kwoŋ win jolaringo k'acel obwok win,
wilaringo k'abic jobwok win,
cuka winodoŋ,
paka luth ma bendera wi got,
paka ranyuth i wi tendere.
Riameno Rwoth kuro nyutho win wor;
go laay malo nyutho win wor.
Kole Rwoth obedo Were ma timo tiro,
josilwany a jono je ma jokuro go.
Adieri, awi ji ma Zayon, ma jobedo i Yerusalem, wikilaywak kendo. Adieri Rwoth lanyutho win wor i derino ma ywak mewin, ka go owinji, go ladwoko win.
Makada nende Rwoth omiy win mugat ma litho gi pi makec, kucel kilakwanyo woko jofonjere mewin kendo, to waŋ win laneno jo.
Ka winowire racuc kosa racam, ithi win lawinjo wac yuŋey win ka waco ni, “Me a yo; woth win i iye.”
Kenyo wilakwanyo cal mewin m'oum gi feza kodi zahabu to wibolo woko paka oselo ma dhako oro ka ruko dwe, aka wilawaco ni, “Wikoci.”
Rwoth lamiyo koth ri kodhi ma wicwoyo i lowo, kodi ŋano, aka cemo lanyak m'owega. I ndelo no ogwaŋe mewin jolabedo gi lum kweth.
Megikwe gi punde ma jofuro ndelin mewin jolacamo cemo dhok ma di cumbi m'otiek piedho.
Malawin kodi waŋ pi jolakitula wok i wi kisi got kodi tendere, i ndelo ma thumirok madwoŋ ka acurcur opodhi.
Dwe laliel paka waŋceŋ, aka waŋceŋ laliel dibirio loyo paka liel, paka ceŋ ma ndelo ario i ndelo acel, i ndelo ma Rwoth otwey to cango adhola m'omiyo ji pere gi goco pere.
Neni, Rwoth bino wok bor swa,
gi nge pere maliel,
kodi tome yiro ma ay malo,
dhoke opoŋ lam,
aka lewe cal mac ma reyo woko jo.
Ywe pere cal mikula pi,
ma mwonyo jo kiri i ŋuti.
Go cunga nonin i kicungwo ma bukony,
aka tweyo dingi nonin rwenyo woko jo.
Wilawero paka witimo wor ma kalima maleŋ, aka cuny win lakisangala paka ŋata wotho gi milowe ka kadho wi got pa Rwoth, Tele pa Isiraili.
Rwoth lamiyo dwoŋ ma dwondi go wowinji, aka ilaneno cinge oloro ma goco, i nge mager kodi mac ma reyo woko jo, gi mwoc koth kodi cwe pe.
Joasiria jolabwok ka jowinji dwondi Rwoth to joneno go ka gore gi luth pere ma nyweny.
Kisi ka Rwoth sigila jo gi luth m'oyik, mor paka sasi gi tongol. Go lawito cinge lweny gi jo.
Kole otiek yiko kama mac m'odheth lawaŋo kere ma Asiria cango con. Kanyago luth aka lac, aka ocan i iye yen. Rwoth laywe tome mac ma lacwinyo.
Kidamba ri jono ma jokadho i Misir rango kony,
jogoŋere kwoŋ kayinin,
joketho geno i cawilin kwoŋbedo jokweth,
kodi jogwey kayinin kwoŋbedo jotek.
To jokiŋiy Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili
kosa rango Rwoth!
Kucel Rwoth bende riek aka kelo teko,
go kidwoki wac m'oluwo;
to, laay malo kwoŋ ot pa joreco,
gi jono ma jokonyo joma timo gimarac.
Jomisir jobedo ji, makiweno Were,
kayinin pajo jobedo del, makiweno cuny.
Ka Rwoth oriey cinge,
jakony lacer, aka ŋat'ikonyo lapodho,
aka jolarere kanyacel.
Kole Rwoth otieko waco ran ni,
paka simbwor kosa nyathi mere hola kwoŋ cemo pere,
aka makada nende jokwath rombo ma jotemo kikwonga rombo jokoki nedi,
kibwoki ro koko pajo,
kosa bwonere ro woy pajo;
ameno apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny laloro piny,
lweny wi Got Zayon gi i wi tendere mere.
Paka winyo ma ay,
ameno apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
lakikwonga Yerusalem,
go lakikwonga to gonyo go,
go lakoyo to botho go.
Wire win bongi ŋata wicamo rigo sereko, awi Joisiraili.
Kole i ndelo no wilabolo woko cal mewin je ma feza gi zahabu ma cingi win m'opoŋ reco am'otimo riwin.
Asiria lapodho g'abor, makiweno gi meni pa dhano;
abor ma dhano ama k'otimo, laneko go.
Asiria laringo kwoŋ abor,
aka yac pere ilamiyo jo timo tic arom.
Tele pere laringo i lworo,
jomituka jolalworo bendera mere,
Rwoth waco, go ma mac pere nitie i Zayon,
aka go ma mac pere m'odheth nitie i Yerusalem.
Neni, kere ma timo gim'otire ladhumo,
jodhum ma jotimo tiro joladhumo.
Kisi acel kwoŋ jolabedo paka kapondo kwoŋ koyo,
gi kabwok kwoŋ asur,
paka waŋ pi kam'othwo,
paka tipo tele madwoŋ i piny m'oloc.
Kenyo waŋ jono ma joneno kilatho,
aka ithi jono ma jowinjo lacikere.
Cuny joma kwako niaŋ laŋeyo,
aka lew joma dhombo wac lakwako luwo maber.
Jamiŋo kilamiyo wor kendo,
aka ŋata bukony kilamiyo wor.
Kole jamiŋo joluwo miŋo,
timo kidakana i cunye;
timo gima bu Were,
luwo twodo kwoŋ Rwoth,
weyo kec neko ji,
aka thwono joma riyo neko gir'amadha.
Gilweny pa ŋata bukony obedo ma kidakana,
go timo atoŋa pere marac,
reyo woko ji ma jonitie i litho,
makada nende ŋata bu gimoro luw gim'otire.
To dhano m'iworo cano tim ma wor,
aka cungo i gim'otire.
Ay win malo, win mon ma wibedo i kwo mayom, winji win dwondan,
win ma wiwegi wicowere, ciki ithi win ri luwo paran.
I ndelo ma kirom oro,
wilakirin, win mon ma wibedo i kwo mayot;
wikilakeco vini.
Kirin win, win mon ma wibedo i kwo mayot,
win ma wiwegi wicowere,
lunyere win kinyoro,
aka tweyi win kutiya i pier win.
Goy win thundho mewin,
ri ndelo mabeyo gi ndelin vini.
I lowo pa ji paran,
kudhin g'okure ladong'iye;
i wi udi ma kisangala je,
kodi i wi tindi madwoŋ m'opoŋ'iye kisangala.
Kole ilajwango muluwir,
tindi madwoŋ ladoŋ nono,
tendere kodi kakur lalokere od simbwor kicutho,
kisangala pa punde madudi, gi ka cemo pa mwendi.
Tunado kama okonji kwoŋ wan cuny wok malo,
to thim lokere ndelo olemo,
aka ndelo olemo lalokere lul.
Kenyo tiro labedo i thim,
aka timo gim'otire ladoŋ i ndelo olemo.
Timo gim'otire lakelo siem,
lawok kudirok gi kwe piny cil gi cil.
Ji paran jolabedo i pecin ma siem,
kam'okwe kodi i kabedo m'oliŋ.
Lul gi tindi madwoŋ,
jolapodho kicutho.
Josilwany a win ma wicwoyo i thengi pi,
ma wigonyo tiendi dhiaŋ gi punde mewin.
Kidamba rin ijarey jo,
in m'ongoye fodi ŋat'oreyin,
in ijar'akor,
m'ongoye fodi ŋat'otimo rin akor!
Tekin icowo reyo woko,
in bende ilareyin woko,
tekin icowo timo akor,
in bende ilatimo rin akor.
Awi Rwoth, maki gi wan wor, wakurin.
Bedi meni mawan kisi odikin,
both mawan i hongo ma teko.
Nonin joringo, ro derino ma koko,
kiay malo, nonin jokedhere woko.
Ocok gim'onyaga paka bonyo poto,
paka tome bonyo ma por, ilapor kwoŋe.
Rwoth oŋawere, go bedo malo;
go opoŋo Zayon gi tiro kodi timo gim'otire.
Go lakelo kwe piny i hongo perin,
both ma gibe, rieko gi ŋeyo;
aka lworo Rwoth obedo lim madwoŋ swa ri Zayon.
Winji win, jomiseni joywak i royo,
jomikwenda mawan ma siem joywak tektek.
Royo odoŋ nono,
jowoth joweyo royo.
Cikirok otur woko,
dhano ocayo tindin madongo,
aka ongoye ŋata woro dhano.
Lowo thwo woko aka lacere,
Lule ma Lebanon thwo woko,
Saron cal thim,
aka i Basan kodi Got Kamel boke oy woko.
Rwoth waco ni, “Onyo alaay malo,
aka alatiŋere malo,
onyo ilatiŋan malo.
Tim mewin cal kanja kosa cuŋ,
luya mewin obedo mac ma lareyo woko win.
Ji je jolacale pa jowaŋ to jolokere buru,
paka kudhin m'itoŋo t'iwaŋo gi mac.”
Winji, win ma winitie bor,
gim'atieko timo,
aka win ma winitie cegin, yey win meni paran.
Joreco i Zayon jobwok,
ji ma bu Were jokirin.
Jowaco ni,
“Ŋa i dier wan manyalo bedo kanyacel gi mac ma reyo jo?
Ŋa i dier wan manyalo bedo kanyacel gi mac makitho cil gi cil?”
Jono ma jotimo gim'otire, aka joluwo adieri,
jono ma jocayo cwe ma kwo,
jono ma joteŋo cingi jo jolo nyew,
jono ma jokimiti winjo can ma oyo remo,
aka jokimiti neno ni itimo gimarac.
Jolabedo i kabedo ma malo,
aka jolapondo i tele,
jolabedo gi cemo kodi pi ma romo.
Waŋ win laneno kere i ŋono pere,
wilaneno go dhumo lowo ma tundo bor swa.
Kenyo wilapenjere ni:
Nikune jodhum no,
ma jobwoko wan to joromo wan
culo misolo mapek.
Wikilaneno jocay kendo,
ji ma joluwo luwo ma wikinyal niaŋ,
jodhombo dhodhok wikinyal niaŋ.
Ŋiy Zayon, tindi madwoŋ ma timo kalima mawan m'oyik,
waŋin laneno Yerusalem,
kabedo m'oliŋ, wema ma kicore,
ma loce mere k'ofudhi woko,
aka thondhe mere kicoti.
To kenyo Rwoth labedo gi wan i dwoŋ pere,
kenyo labedo malawin maluth gi jwombe malac,
riato m'icewo gi mel madongo jok'ocewer'iye.
Kole Rwoth obedo jathum banja mawan, Rwoth obedo jadhum mawan;
Rwoth obedo kere mawan, go labotho wan.
Thondhe mewin olwogere,
kinyal mako tiendi mel matek,
kosa miyo mel wocewere.
Ilapoko cemo m'onyaga,
aka kiri jor'aŋolo je jolalimo.
Ongoye ŋata bedo i lowo mawan ma latwo kendo,
ji ma jobedo kenyo je ilacwako ri joreco pajo.
Core win cegin, awi nonin, wiwinji;
cik ithi win, awi ji!
Weyi piny gi cwec mere je jowowinji;
piny gibe, gi gima bed'iye je.
Rwoth omako nge gi piny je,
gi jolweny pajo je.
Othumo rijo banja ma rerok.
Ilabolo woko delkwoŋ jom'otho pajo,
joriere kenyo m'otop aka maŋwe;
gote lamol gi remo pajo.
aka pondeponde ladole paka kitawo.
Jolweny pajo jolathwo,
paka boke yath thwo wi yath vini,
kosa paka olemo thwo wi yath makuyu.
neni, laloro i Edom,
kwoŋ ji m'atieko thumo rijo banja ma rerok.
Rwoth nitie g'abor, oduwere gi remo,
omok'iye bor,
gi remo pa nyithindhi rombo gi diegi,
gi bor ma rogi wot rombo.
Kole Rwoth nigi cowirok i Bozra,
neki madwoŋ swa i piny ma Edom.
Mirikwa madudi jolapodho gi jo,
mirikwa pajo gi thwondhe pajo.
Lowo pajo laduwere gi remo pajo,
aka lowo pajo latop gi bor pajo.
Kole Rwoth nigi ndelo ri Zayon,
ma culo kwor kwoŋ jokwor pere.
Jwombe ma Edom lalokere kisawe mupira,
aka lowo pere lalokere telin ma wodho mac kibiriti,
aka piny gibe lalokere kisawe mupira maliel.
yiro mere laduny malo cil gi cil.
Wok i luse tundo i luse ladoŋ gunda,
aka ongoye ŋata laluw'iye kendo.
To kinapupu gi katateŋ ama jolaloko peco pajo,
tula g'agak jolabed'iye,
Were lakelo i iye nywowirok,
gi rerok kwoŋ jodhum mere.
Ilalwoŋo ni ker m'ongoye,
aka jodhum mere je jolangoye kony.
Kudhin latwi i muluwir gi tindin mere,
aka ogwaŋe madudi gi nyar maya jolabedo kenyo.
Pusere madudi jolaromo g'ondiekere,
jwogi diegi jolaywomere kenyo,
g'ogwaŋe je ma jowotho wor.
Tula jolageto od jo kenyo,
jolabuto to jotoŋo i tipo mere;
otengo bende jolakiwura kenyo ma jacwo gi madhako.
Rangi aka wisoma gima wok i kitawo pa Rwoth;
ongoye kwoŋ cwec me ma kilabedo,
je jolabedo ma jacwo gi madhako.
Kole dhok Rwoth otieko wodho or,
aka cuny pere otieko coko jo.
Rwoth otieko miyo joje adec lowo pajo,
go otieko baro rijo adec gi cinge,
jolabed'iye luse gi luse,
aka labedo apajo cil gi cil.
Thim gi lowo m'othwo jolakisangala,
thim lafore to jolikalika;
paka mawuwa.
Thim lawero to koko ri kisangala,
labedo maŋon paka gote ma Lebanon;
ma nyak cemo paka ndelin ma Kamel gi Saron.
Kisi dhano laneno dwoŋ pa Rwoth,
gi meni pa Were mawan.
aka loki m'ocwiny congi jo m'oregeya.
Waci ri jono ma cuny jo lwor ni,
“Bedi win jomeni, wikiri wilwor!
Were mewin ee,
go bino botho win,
go bino miyo jokwor mewin gir'acula.”
aka joma ithi jo otho jolawinjo.
Jor'aŋolo jolapor to jomielo
aka obadhin jolakoko ri kisangala.
Waŋ pi lamol i opalipat;
kwoyo malieth lalokere kidiwa,
aka lowo m'othwo lapoŋ gi pi.
Kama ogwaŋe madudi cango jobed'iye lalokere samba,
lum lalokere midole g'osege.
Royo labedo kenyo,
aka ilalwoŋo ni Royo Maleŋ.
Ongoye jareco ma laluw'iye,
jomamiŋ jok'orweny'iye dhano.
Simbwor kilabedo kenyo,
kosa ogwaŋ mager kilaluwo royo no
jok'onwaŋere kenyo,
to joma Rwoth otieko botho, ama jolawoth kenyo.
Aka jono ma Rwoth otieko botho joladok,
to jobino i Zayon gi wer,
kisangala ma cil gi cil labedo i wi jo;
jolanwaŋo siem gi kisangala,
kumo gi rem larumo woko.
I oro mar'apar g'aŋwen ma dhum pa kere Hezekia, Senakerib kere ma Asiria omonjo tindin madongo m'otinda ma Yuda to mako.
Senakerib ooro Rabisake wok Lakis bongi kere Hezekia i Yerusalem, gi jolweny madwoŋ. Go ocungo i yo ma jokwoc nangin jotiy'iye, yu fereji ma kidiwa ma malo i yo ma kadho i ndelo pa jalwok nangin.
Kenyo jolwoŋo Hezekia, aka jodhum pere adek jokidho romo gi jo. Eliakim wod Hilikia m'oyido jatel ma peco pa kere, Sebina jandiko ma kapido, gi Yowa wod Asaf m'oyido jandiki gima timere je.
Jatel pa jamituka ma Siria owaco rijo ni, “Waci win ri kere Hezekia ni, kere madwoŋ, kere ma Asiria mito ŋeyo gima miyo Hezekia bedo gi miseni ameno.
Iparo ni wac kende nyalo tero kabedo pa gilweny gi meni? Ŋa m'iparo ni bino konyin m'igwenyere kwoŋ Asiria?
Neni, igeno ni kere ma Misir bino konyin, kedi maluth m'otur no, ma bino cwowo cingi ŋata thenere kwoŋe. Ameno apaka Farawo kere ma Misir nitie ri jono ma jogeno go.”
“Kosa winowaci ran ni wigeno Rwoth Were mewin. Obedo sawin pa Rwoth gi migame pere ma Hezekia onyeko, munyo owaco ri ji ma Yuda gi Yerusalem lamo i migam ma Yerusalem kende.
Onyo biye win, wabedi gi piem i nyingi kere ma Asiria. Abino miyo win kayinin gana ario ka winonwaŋ cwo ma romo ma jonyalo gweyo jo!
Wikinyal kiri lweny gi jadhum mathin loyo i Asiria, aka kucel wiparo ni Misir bino dhiro riwin cawilin gi cwo ma jogweyo kayinin!
Kole Rwoth won am'okonyan monjo piny mewin. Rwoth won am'owaco ran ni amonji aka arey woko.”
Kenyo Eliakim, Sebina, gi Yowa jodwoko go ni, “Jadwoŋ, luw gi wan dhoaramayik. Ikir'iluw gi wan dhoebulaniya, kwoŋbedo ji ma kor ot je jowinjo.”
Go odwoko ni, “Wiparo ni kere ooran waco riwin gi kere kende gime? Be, aluwo bende gi ji ma jobedo i kor ot, ma bende jobino camo ceth pajo to jomadho lac pajo, paka win bende.”
Kenyo go oay malo aka okoko i dhoebulaniya ni, “Winji win gima kere madwoŋ, kere ma Asiria waco riwin!
Go gwoko win ni wikiri wiyey Hezekia wowondi win. Go kinyal botho win wok i cingan.
Aka wikiri wiyey go wodwoŋi win geno Rwoth. Wikiri wipar ni Rwoth bino konyo win, kosa ni go bino juko jolweny mawan ma Asiria mako tindi madwoŋ me.

Wikiri wiwinji Hezekia; kole kere ma Asiria waco ni, ‘Tim win siem kodan aka wiwok bongan, kenyo kisi nyatoro lacemo wok i vini pere won, gi nyandere pere, aka kisi nyatoro bino madho pi ma waŋ pi pere won;
cuka anobin t'atero win i lowo ma cal lowo mewin, lowo ma ŋano gi vini, lowo ma mugat gi ndelo vini, lowo ma yen oliv gi mo kic, ŋey wikiri witho, to wikwo.
Wikiri wiyey Hezekia womiŋi win gi paro ni Rwoth labotho win. Nitie were ma piny moro je m'otieko botho lowo pere wok i cingi kere ma Asiria?
Werin ma Hamath gi Aripad jonikune? Werin ma Sefarivayim, Hena, gi Iva jonikune? Jobotho Samaria wok i cingan?
Keraŋo ma werin ma piny me je jobotho piny pajo wok i cingan, ma Rwoth ripo botho Yerusalem wok i cingan?’”
To ji oyido joliŋ aka jok'odwoko go. Kole kere oyido owodho or ni, “Wikiri widwoki go.”
Kenyo Eliakim wod pa Hilikia m'oyido kuro muluwir, gi Sebina jandiko, gi Yowa wod pa Asaf, jandiki gima timere, jobino bongi Hezekia gi nangin pajo m'oyec, to jowaco rigo wac pa Rabisake.
Munyo kere Hezekia owinjo radwok pajo, oyeco nangin pere i rem to ruko kutiya, aka okidho i Ot pa Rwoth.
Ooro Eliakim m'oyido obedo jadwoŋ ma muluwir, Sebina jandiko ma kapido, gi jatuci wac Were m'otegino, to joruko kutiya, bongi Isaya wod pa Amoz.
Me a mikwenda m'omiyo jowaco ri Isaya ni, “Konon obedo ndelo ma kidamba, imiyo wan gir'acula aka wanitie i wickwot. Wacal dhako m'oyikere nywol, to meni loyo ma colo nyathi.
Kere ma Asiria ooro jadhum pere madwoŋ yeto Were makwo. Weyi Rwoth Were perin wowinji yet me, aka womiy joma joluwo gir'acula. Riameno kway ri ji mawan ma jodoŋ.”
Munyo ŋecin pa kere Hezekia jobino bongi Isaya, Isaya owaco rijo ni,
“Waci win ri jadwoŋ mewin ni, ‘Me apaka Rwoth waco. Ikir'ibwoki ro atise ma ŋecin pa kere jowaco rin ni Rwoth kinyal bothin.
Neni, alaketho cuny i go, ŋey go wowinji pokopoko ma bino miyo go gik i piny pere won; aka alamiyo go wotho g'abor i piny pere won.’”
Rabisake to dok, aka onwaŋo ni kere ma Asiria oyido lwenyo gi tindi madwoŋ Libina, rupiri oyido otieko winjo ni kere oyido otieko ay Lakis.
Aka munyo kere ma Asiria owinjo ni kere Tirihaka ma Ethopiya oyido bino monjo jo, odhiro balwa ri kere Hezekia ma Yuda ni,
“Me a gim'ila waco ri kere Hezekia ma Yuda. Ikir'iyey Were perin m'igeno wowondin ka cikin ni k'okethi Yerusalem i cingi kere ma Asiria.
Neni, itieko winjo gima kere ma Asiria otimo ri piny je m'oreyo jo kicutho. Iparo ni inokwale?
Nitie ye werin ma piny mogo m'otieko botho jo, piny ma kwarere paran joreyo woko, paka Gozan, Haran, Rezef, gi ji ma Eden m'oyido jonitie Telesar?
Kerin ma tindin madongo Hamath, Aripad, Sefarivayim, Hena, gi Iva jonikune?”
Kere Hezekia ojolo balwa wok i cingi jomikwenda to soma. Kenyo okidho i Ot pa Rwoth to ketho balwa no ruwaŋ Rwoth,
aka okwayo ni,
“Awi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili m'obedo i wi cwec ma jobwombi gin, in kende a Were, ma dhumo kerin je ma i piny. Icweyo polo gi piny.
Onyo Rwoth, winji wan aka neni gima timere riwan. Cik ithin iwinji gima Senakerib waco je ma yetin, Were makwo.
Adieri Rwoth, kerin ma Asiria jotieko reyo piny kweth, to josika woko lowo pajo,
jowaŋo woko werin pajo m'oyido jok'obedo werin kada to cal ma yen gi telin ma ji ama joyiko gi cingi jo, riameno orey woko jo.
Riameno Rwoth Were mawan, akwayin, both wan kwoŋ Joasiria, ŋey nonin je ma piny jowoŋey ni in kende a Rwoth.”
Kenyo Isaya wod pa Amoz odhiro mikwenda ri kere Hezekia ni, Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco. Rupiri itieko kwayo t'awinjo kwayo perin ma mako kwoŋ Senakerib kere ma Asiria.
Me wac ma Rwoth otieko luwo ma mako kwoŋ Senakerib.
Ji ma Yerusalem
jocayin aka jotimo ginyero kodin.
Jonyero
yu dieŋeyin,
nyar Yerusalem.
Senakerib, ikwoŋan,
ikoko ran, t'ipeko waŋin kwoŋan,
kwoŋ Were pa Isiraili madwoŋ loyo!
Iweyo jodhum perin
joyetan, Rwoth.
Aka me a gim'iwaco.
Atelo cawilin paran kweth,
tundo i ŋawirok ma gote ma Lebanon.
Aluthere i lul mere,
aka aŋolo piny yen sida mere maber loyo
gi yen madongo maboyo ma jo boke kweth.
Akunyo jwombe t'amadho pi,
t'acwiyo woko jwombe ma mol je ma Misir g'ofuny tiendan
wok i jwombe ma an won akunyo.
Fodi oyido ikiwinjo ni acano gime con?
Acano wok i hongo macene,
gim'onyo amiyo wotundi i kare,
ni winyal timo tindin madongo m'otinda,
woŋinyere i wic gundin,
kucel ji pajo jolacere,
jobedo gi nyawin madwoŋ.
Jocale mawuwa madudi,
kosa lum mayom,
paka lum madongo i wi ot,
to jothwo mafodi jok'otegino.
T'aŋeyo gima mako kwoŋin je,
kiri gi nger m'imako nge swa
kodan.
Kwoŋbedo inigi keme kodan,
aka nge perin madit otieko tundo i ithan,
onyo abino ketho siraget i umin,
gi nyweny paran ma lekin i dhokin,
to nyaka adwokin,
kam'iwok'iye.

Kenyo Isaya owaco ri kere Hezekia ni, “Me ranyuth ma gima kidho timere. Oro me gi oro ma luwo ibino bedo gi ŋano madudi acama, to i oro mar'adek ibino nyalo cwoyo ŋano t'ikeco, aka ibino pidho yen vini t'icamo olemo mere.
Aka ji ma joboth i Yuda jobino pidhirok pa yen ma jorwako fuc piny i lowo aka jonyak ranyak.
Kole bino bedo ji ma jobino both i Yerusalem gi Got Zayon kwoŋbedo Rwoth omiyere miyo gime timirok.”

Riameno me a gima Rwoth owaco kwoŋ kere ma Asiria. Go kiladonjo i tindi madwoŋ me kosa celo asere kad'acel kwoŋe. Ongoye jolweny ma jonigi kwote ma jobino core cegin gi tindi madwoŋ, aka jok'othoki mako.
Go bino gik gi royo acel m'obino gine, ma k'odonjo i tindi madwoŋ me. An Rwoth, atieko waco.
Kole abino kikwonga tindi madwoŋ me t'abotho, ro an won gi cikirok m'atimo ri ŋeca paran Daudi.
Aka wor no won malaika pa Rwoth okidho i kambi pa Joasiria to neko jolweny 185,000 aka munyo ji jocewi odikin joneno mulambin.
Kenyo Senakerib kere ma Asiria owire to gik Ninivi.
Ndelo acel munyo go oyido lamo i ot pa were pere Nisrok, wote ario, Adramelek kodi Sareza joneko go g'abor pajo to joringo i piny Ararat. Aka wode man Esarhadon olunjo go paka kere.
I hongo no kere Hezekia two omako aka obothi tho. Isaya jatuci wac Were wod Amoz obino bonge to waco rigo ni, “Me apaka Rwoth waco: ‘Kethi gigipiny je i kare, kole ikilaboth, ibino tho.’”
Kenyo Hezekia owire to ŋiyo kor ot aka okwayo ni,
“Awi Rwoth, mondo akwayin, poyi paka awotho ruwaŋin iy'adieri aka gi cunyan je. Atieko timo gim'otire ruwaŋin.” Kenyo Hezekia oywaki gi geregere.
Rwoth owaco ri Isaya ni,
“Giki bongi Hezekia jadhum pa ji paran iwaci rigo ni Rwoth, Were pa kwarin Daudi waco ni owinjo kwayo perin to neno pigi waŋin. Go lamedin oro apar g'abic man.
Go labotho tindi madwoŋ Yerusalem kwoŋ kere ma Asiria aka lamedo kikwonga tindi madwoŋ me.”
“Me ranyuth rin wok bongi Rwoth, ni Rwoth bino timo gima go ociko.
Neni, alamiyo tipo gik cen ma madala ma kere Ahaz ogeto dipar.” Ameno tipo owire gik cen ma madala dipar m'oyido.
Rumacen munyo Kere Hezekia otieko both kwoŋ two pere, ondiko wer ma pak me:
Oyido aparo ni i oro paran mabeyo,
alakadho i piny pa jom'otho,
ma kwo paran ongoye kendo.
Awaco ni, akilaneno Rwoth kendo,
i piny pa jomakwo.
Akilaneno ji kendo,
kwoŋ ji ma jokwo i piny.
Kwo paran oyido oŋadi aka oromo,
paka wema pa jakwath rombo,
paka nanga m'oŋad wok i nyweny ma cuma kwoyirok.
Oyido aparo ni Were okelo kwo paran i gike.
Wor gipi aywak i litho,
paŋini simbwor oyido turo cokin paran.
Oyido aparo ni Were okelo kwo paran i gike.
Dwondan oyido thin aka nyap,
aka aywak paka akuro.
Waŋan jool gi ŋiyo polo.
Awi Rwoth, odiyan, bedi jakur paran!
T'anowaci aŋo? Kole go otieko luwo kodan,
aka go won am'otimo gime.
Nindo paran je orwenyo,
ro keco mar'adundo paran.
Awi Rwoth, gi gigipiny me ji jokwo,
aka i gime je ama cunyan kwo i iye.
Awi, dwokan akwo maber aka miyan akwo!
Neni, obedo ro bero paran won,
ama abedo gi keco madwoŋ,
t'idwoko kwo paran wok i bur ma rerok,
rupiri ibolo reco paran je yuŋeyan.
Kole piny pa jom'otho kinyal foyin,
tho kinyal pakin,
kole jono ma jokadho piny i bur jokinyal geno adieri perin.
Jomakwo, jomakwo, jofoyin,
paka atimo ndelo me,
jonywol jomiyo nyithindho ŋeyo,
adieri perin.
Rwoth labothan,
aka walatuko tongol ka wawero pak,
ndelo ma kwo paran je,
i Ot pa Rwoth.
Isaya oyido owaco ni, wonyadhi nyandere wokethi i bur pa Hezekia, ŋey wocangi.
Kere Hezekia openjo Isaya ni, “Aŋo ma nyutho ni abino kidho i Ot pa Rwoth?”
I hongo no kere ma Babilon Merodak Baladan wod pa Baladan owinjo ni kere Hezekia oyido two, ameno ooro jomikwenda gi balwa gi mic.
Hezekia ojolo jo aka onyutho jo lim pere, feza pere gi zahabu, gigipiny maŋwe kur, gi gilweny pere. Hezekia onyutho jo lim ma ker pere je.
Kenyo jatuci wac Were Isaya obino bongi Hezekia to penjo go ni, “Cwo me jowok kune aka jowaco rin aŋo?”
Hezekia odwoko ni, “Jowok i piny mabor swa Babilon.”
Isaya openjo Hezekia ni, “Aŋo ma joneno i muluwir?”
Hezekia odwoko ni, “Joneno gigipiny je. Anyutho jo gigipiny je.”
Kenyo Isaya owaco ri Hezekia ni, “Winji wac pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny:
‘Neni, ndelo bino ma gigipiny je ma muluwir perin, gigipiny je ma kwarere perin jokano tundo konon, ibino tiŋo woter i Babilon. Ongoye gima bino doŋ.
Aka megi kwoŋ wotin won, m'inywolo ibino tero jo bedo cwo ma lur i muluwir pa kere ma Babilon.’”
Gikenyo to Hezekia waco ri Isaya ni, “Wac pa Rwoth m'itieko waco ber.” Kole go oyido oparo ni, “Siem gi kwe pa piny labedo i hongo pere.”
Yom, awi yom cuny ji paran,
Were perin waco.
Luw gi mwolo gi Yerusalem,
aka ywak rigo,
ni go otieko candere m'oromo
aka ocwaki reco pere,
ni go otieko jolo i cingi Rwoth gir'acula dirio gipi ro reco pere je.
“Yik win yo i thim ri Rwoth,
tir win royo madwoŋ i thim ri Were mawan.
Kama luŋ moro je wotiŋ malo,
kisi got moro je i tendere wobipi;
piny m'ogondere wotir,
aka kam'onyany onyany wopiel.
Kenyo dwoŋ pa Rwoth lanyuthere,
aka ji je jolaneno go kanyacel,
kole dhok Rwoth otieko luwo.”
T'awaco ni, “Anoywak aŋo”
Ji je jobedo lum,
aka ŋono pajo cal gi mawuwa ma ndelo.
Lum ner, mawuwa rwenyo cal mere,
ka luya pa Rwoth okudho,
adieri ji jobedo lum.
Lum ner, mawuwa rwenyo rangi mere;
to wac pa Were mawan lakiyindira cil gi cil.
Yerusalem, idhi wi got mabor,
jamikwenda ma wac maber ri Zayon
tiŋi dwondin malo gi meni.
Awi Yerusalem, jamikwenda ma wac maber,
tiŋi dwondin malo, ikir'ilwor;
wac ri tindin madongo ma Yuda ni,
“Were mewin ee!”
go bino dhumo gi meni;
kemba pere nigi go,
aka cul pere nitie ruwaŋe.
go lacoko nyithindhi rombo i bade,
to tiŋo jo i kore,
to leko megi rombo m'odeda.
Ŋa m'otieko kipima pi poŋ cinge,
aka opima polo thenge gi thenge,
m'ocego fukefuke ma piny i rapim,
to pima gote i latir
gi tendere i rapim?
kosa paka jamic rieko pere otieko fonjo go?
Openjo ŋa gir'atima,
aka ŋa m'ofonjo go royo ma tiro?
Ŋa m'ofonjo go ŋeyo,
to nyutho go royo ma niaŋ?
Neni, kiri nonin je jocale gim'othon i baketi,
aka ikwano jo paka fukefuke i wi rapim.
Neni, go tero kigodin ma pi paka fukefuke m'onuŋere.
Lebanon oyido kinyal wodho mo m'oromo,
kad'ogwaŋe mere kirom ma mic awaŋa.
Nonin je jocale gim'ongoye kony ruwaŋe;
go kwano jo paka gima sisiri loyo gim'ongoye gi gima ninono.
kosa cal mene?
Cal, jatic ama timo,
aka jathedhi nyweny ama umo gi zahabu,
to timo rigo lijegere ma feza.
Nyatoro yero mbawo ober,
mbawo ma kitopi paka mic,
nyaka to dwaro japac ma jandijo,
ma yiko cal makicar ma kinyal podho.
Fodi ikuya? Fodi ikiwinjo?
Fodi k'owaci rin wok i cako?
Fodi ikiniaŋ wok i misingi ma piny?
Obedo go ma bedo kalo malo ma thokirok ma piny,
aka ji mere jocale otwoŋo;
go ma yaro woko polo paka nanga m'iumo gine dhiot,
to yaro jo paka wema ma bed'iye.
Go ama loko jodhum gim'ongoye kony,
to timo jodhum ma piny paka gim'ongoye kony.
Ipidho jo m'okele okele, ocwoy jo m'okel okel,
ma tiendi jo fodi k'odonji i lowo maber,
ka go okudho jo woko, to joner,
aka asur sira gi jo malo paka kanja.
Onyo inopima an gi ŋa,
kosa ŋa marom kodan? Ŋataleŋ penjo.
Tiŋi waŋin malo akinen,
ŋa m'ocweyo gime?
Go ma wodho woko lwak pajo to kwano jo,
lwoŋo joje gi nyingi jo;
rupiri go obedo ŋatadwoŋ i meni,
meni pere oasere,
ongoye kad'acel ma rem.
Raŋo wiwaco, Awi Yakobo,
aka wiluwo, Awi Isiraili ni,
“Royo paran opanere kwoŋ Rwoth,
aka Were paran kidew kwoŋ gima ripo kodan.”
Fodi ikiŋeyo? Fodi ikiwinjo?
Rwoth obedo Were ma cil gi cil,
jacwec ma witum ma piny.
Go kiol kosa lacere,
niaŋ pere kiŋeyere.
Go miyo meni ri joma meni oloyo,
to miyo meni ri jom'olacere.
Kiri soye je meni laloyo jo to jolacere,
aka yac jolaol to jopodho piny.
To jono ma jokuro Rwoth,
meni pajo lalokere manyen,
jolaay gi bwombin gin paka aŋo,
jolaŋwec to jok'olacere,
jolawoth to jok'ool.
Cik ithi win wiwinjan, win piny ma yuthengi nam,
weyi ji jowoloki meni pajo manyen,
weyi jowocore cegin, nyaka jowoluwi,
weyi wajoje wacore cegin ri thumo banja.
Ŋa m'okelo jatur lweny wok yuwok ceŋ,
ma nwaŋo loyo i kisi madala,
to lwoŋo go i tic pere?
Go gonyo nonin je rigo,
to nyono kerin je gi par tiende;
go loko jo fukefuke g'abor pere,
asere pere kedho jo paka kanja ma duny gi weyo.
Go riemo jo to kadho ma bu teko,
ma dwir ma kigey piny gi tiende.
Ŋa m'otimo to miyo gime timirok,
lwoŋo lusin wok i cakirok?
An, Rwoth, abedo marapena,
aka alabedo macowe.
Piny ma yuthengi nam jotieko neno aka jobwok,
tum ma piny jokirin,
jocore cegin aka jobino.
Kisi acel konyo nyawote,
ka waco ri nyawote, “Bedi jamisen!”
Japac miyo jathedhi nyweny miseni,
aka ŋata fotho cal makicar gi nyundu miyo jagoy musumal miseni,
ka waco kwoŋ jamwon ni, “Ber.”
To joridho gi musumal ŋey wokiri wonyali dhirok.
Yakobo, m'atieko yero,
kodhi pa Abraham, mere paran,
in m'akwanyin wok witum ma piny,
t'alwoŋin wok i sonda mere mabor,
k'awaco rin ni, “Ibedo ŋeca paran,
atieko yerin, ak'obolin woko!”
Ikir'ilwor, kole anitie kodin,
ikir'ibwoki, kole abedo Were perin,
alamedin meni, alakonyin,
alamakin gi cingan maracuc ma turo lweny.
Ey, jono je ma jomako nge gi win,
wickwot lamako jo t'ikengila jo,
jono ma jolwenyo kodin,
jolacale pa gim'ongoye kony to jotho.
Wiladwaro jono ma jopiemo gi win,
to wik'onwaŋ jo;
jono ma jolweny gi win,
jolacale gim'ongoye kony kicutho.
Kole An, Rwoth Were mewin,
amako cingi win maracuc,
aŋat'awaco riwin ni, “Wikiri wilwor,
alakonyo win.”
Rwoth waco ni,
“Makada nende ithin aka inyap rin, Isiraili,
Ikir'ilwor, alakonyin.
An, a Were maleŋ pa Isiraili, aŋat'abothin.
Neni, alalokin ngolo ma muko cemo,
mabith, manyen, aka ma nigi lake,
wilamuko gote to wiŋinyo jo,
to wiloko gote paka cuŋ.
Wilapiedho jo to koyo kudho jo,
aka asur lakedho jo.
Nyaka to wifore i Rwoth,
wilalimo dwoŋ i Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili.
Ka jocandi gi joma bu gimoro jorango pi,
aka ongoye moro,
aka lew jo othwo gi riyo,
An Rwoth aladwoko jo,
An Were pa Isiraili ak'ojwangi jo.
Alayawo malawin womol i dier tendere ma lwanda,
gi waŋ pi i dier milelin,
alaloko thim kama pi opoŋ'iye,
gi piny m'othwo waŋ pi.
Alaketho yath sida i thim,
kasia, yath mawuwa maŋwe kur kodi oliv,
alaketho yath lwiyo i thim,
yath ma timo sanduku kodi yath ma mbawo mere yom kanyacel.
Kenyo ji je jolaneno to joŋeyo,
joje jowoteri paka gimadwoŋ to joniaŋ,
ni cingi Rwoth am'otimo gime,
Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili am'ocweyo go.”
Keli win banja mewin, Rwoth waco,
keli win piem mewin, Kere pa Yakobo waco.
Weyi jokel jo, to jowaco riwan
gima latimere.
Jowaci riwan gigipiny macon, gima jobedo,
ŋey wanyal paro kwoŋ jo,
aka bende waŋey gima jotimo,
kosa wotuci kamaler riwan gigipiny ma labino.
Jowotuci riwan gima labino yuwiye,
ŋey wanyal ŋeyo ni wibedo werin,
ma jonyalo timo bero, kosa timo teko,
ŋey wanyal bedo gi lworo to wakirin.
Neni win, adieri, wikibedo gimoro,
aka tic mewin ongoye gimoro swa,
ŋata yero win obedo amien.
Atieko kitugila ŋatimoro wok yumalo, aka otieko bino,
olwoŋi go wok yuwok ceŋ, go lalwoŋo nyingan.
Go lanyono kerin paŋini pany,
paka jacwey degi nyono lowo nyamasiga.
Ŋa m'owaco ginago kamaler wok i cakirok, ŋey wanyal ŋeyo,
aka mafodi, ŋey wanyal waco ni, “Go otire?”
Ongoye ŋatimoro m'owaco ginago kamaler, ongoye ŋat'otuco,
ongoye ŋat'owinjo wac perin.
Awaco kutho marapena ri Zayon,
aka amiyo Yerusalem jamikwenda ma siem.
To k'aneno, ongoye moro,
i dier jome, ongoye jamic rieko,
ma k'apenjo, miyo radwok.
Be, joje jobedo gima mieno jo,
tic pajo ongoye kony,
cal makicar pajo m'onyel obedo weyo nono.
dhano paran m'ayero, ma cunyan sangala gine,
atieko ketho cuny paran kwoŋe,
go lakelo tiro ri nonin.
Go k'oywaki kosa otiŋ dwonde malo,
kosa k'omiy wowinjere i yo.
Go k'otur kedi midole,
aka k'oneki mac maliel ma nimnim;
go lakelo tiro iy'adieri.
Go k'ojok kosa k'odwokere cen,
cuka okeli tiro i piny,
aka piny ma yuthengi nam kuro cik pere.
m'ocweyo polo to yaro jo woko,
m'oyaro piny gi gima wok'iye,
go ma miyo ji ma jobed'iye luya ma ywe,
gi cuny ri jono ma jowoth'iye.
atieko kwanyin gi cingan t'akurin,
atieko miyin paka cikirok ri ji,
gi lero ri nonin.
Ma yawo waŋ jo m'otho
ma fudho jotwec ma jonitie i mudho,
ma gonyo wok i katwec jono ma jonitie i colo.
An abedo Rwoth, meno nyingan;
dwoŋ paran akimiy ŋatiman,
kosa pak paran ri cal m'ogor.
Neni, gigipiny ma cango jotieko tundo i kare,
aka onyo pama awodho kamaler gigipiny manyen,
mafodi jok'otimere,
awaco riwin kwoŋ jo.
Wer ri Rwoth wer manyen,
pak pere wok i tum ma i piny!
Weyi nam womor,
kodi gima kwo i iye je,
piny ma yuthengi nam gi ji ma jobed'iye je.
Weyi thim gi tindin mere jowotiŋ dwondi jo malo,
calin je ma jonitie i Keda;
weyi ji ma jobedo Sela jowower gi kisangala,
weyi jowohola wok wi gote malo.
Weyi jowomiy Rwoth dwoŋ,
to jowodho kamaler pak pere i piny ma yuthengi nam.
Rwoth telo paka siragama,
paka dhano ma jalweny, go tugila nge pere,
go ywak, go koko malo,
go nyutho meni pere kwoŋ jokwor pere.
Ma hongo malac, atieko bedo liŋ,
atieko bedo liŋ t'atwenyere,
onyo pama alaywak paka dhako ma ŋedi ramo,
alacole to ŋetan geŋ.
Alareyo gote gi tendere,
t'athwo woko lum gi yen,
alawiro malawin jowolokere kigodin ma pi,
t'athwo woko kidiwin.
Alatelo ji ma waŋ jo otho,
gi royo ma jokuya,
g'iger ma fodi jokuya,
alatelo jo.
Alawiro mudho ma ruwaŋ jo wobedi lero,
kabedo m'onyany onyany wobedi lowo m'obipere.
Me a gigipiny m'alatimo,
aka ak'ojwangi jo.
Ilawiro jo aŋey t'iketho jo i wickwot kicutho,
jono ma jogeno cal makicar m'opay,
ma jowaco ri cal makicar m'oleny ni,
“Wibedo werin mawan.”
Winji win, win ma ithi win otho;
gi win ma waŋ win otho, ŋiy win malo aka winen!
Ŋa ma waŋ'otho kwanyo woko ŋeca paran,
kosa ma ithe otho paka jamikwenda paran m'adhiro?
Ŋa ma waŋ'otho paka ŋat'atimo gine cikirok,
kosa ma waŋ'otho paka ŋeca pa Rwoth?
Go neno gigipiny kweth, to kikaŋasa;
ithe oyawere, to kiwinji.
Rwoth osangala ro timo gim'otire,
ma tiŋo malo cik pere gi miyo dwoŋ.
To me a ji m'okwal jo t'inyaga jo,
joje jomoko i buce,
aka jopanere i katwec,
jolokere gim'omoko m'ongoye jagony jo,
gim'onyekere m'ongoye ŋat'owaci ni, “Dwoki i kare!”
Ŋa kwoŋ win m'ocik ithe ri gime,
ŋa m'okidhi rigo to winjo gime i hongo ma labino?
Ŋa m'omiyo Yakobo ri janyeki,
gi Isiraili ri jokwo?
K'obedo Rwoth, ma watieko timo reco kwoŋe,
k'obedo go ma jok'onyalo woth i royo pere,
ma bende jok'onyalo kuro or pere?
Ameno go okonjo kwoŋe lietho ma nge pere,
gi keme ma lweny,
omoko kwoŋe mac i thenge je, to go k'onyalo niaŋ,
owaŋo go, to k'ofonjere kada gimoro.
T'onyo pama Rwoth waco,
ŋat'ocweyin, Awi Yakobo,
ŋat'otimin, Awi Isiraili.
Ikir'ilwor, kole atieko bothin
atieko lwoŋin gi nyingin, ibedo aparan.
K'iluwo wi pi, alabedo kodin,
aka malawa, k'omwonyin;
k'iluwo i mac, ik'owaŋ,
aka mac m'ogaŋere k'onekin.
Kole abedo Were perin,
Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili, jaboth perin.
Amiyo Misir paka mic mareco perin,
awilo Ethopiya gi Seba kodin.
Rupiri ibedo gima diwelo ruwaŋan,
aka iworin, amarin,
amiyo dhano i kabedo perin,
t'awilo ji gi kwo perin.
Ikir'ilwor, kole anikodin,
alakelo nyithindhin wok yuwok ceŋ,
t'acoko win wok yupodho ceŋ.
Alawaco ri yumalo ni, “Weyere gi jo.”
Alawaco ri yupiny ni, “Ikir'igeŋ,
keli wotan wok bor,
gi nyithindho paran manyir wok i witum ma piny,
kisi dhano je m'ilwoŋo gi nyingan,
m'acweyo ri dwoŋ paran,
m'atimo t'acweyo.”
Wodhi woko jono ma waŋ gin otho, kucel jonigi waŋ gin,
joma ithi gin otho, kucel jonigi ithi gin!
Weyi nonin je jowocokere kanyacel,
aka weyi ji jowocokere.
Ŋa kwoŋ jo m'owodho gime kamaler,
to nyutho wan gigipiny m'otimere con?
Weyi jowokeli jokony pajo joworidhi ni jotire,
aka weyi jowowinji to jowaco ni, “Obedo adieri.”
Wibedo jokony paran, Rwoth waco,
gi ŋeca paran m'atieko yero,
ŋey winyal ŋeyo to wiyeyan
to winiaŋ ni Abedo go.
Ongoye were m'otelo bedo ran,
aka ongoye moro je ma labino yuŋeyan.
An, abedo Rwoth,
aka makiweno an, ongoye jaboth.
Awodho kamaler, abotho t'atuco,
munyo oyido ongoye were makicar i dier win,
aka wibedo jokony paran Rwoth waco.
Abedo Were, aka cil gi cil Abedo Go;
ongoye ŋata nyalo botho wok i cingan;
gim'atimo ongoye ŋata nyalo geŋo.
Me apaka Rwoth waco,
Jaboth perin, Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili,
Ro in aladhiro jolweny i Babilon,
t'aturo woko nywenye je,
aka koko pa Jokaldin lalokere kumo.
An abedo Rwoth, Ŋataleŋ perin,
Jacwec pa Isiraili, Kere perin.
Me apaka Rwoth waco,
go m'otimo royo i nam,
m'oyweyo ger i pi ma meni,
go ma fudho woko cawila gi punda,
jolweny gi janek apondi,
jopodho piny, jokinyal ay,
ineko jo, ikudho jo paka kitambi tala.
Ikir'ipoy gigipiny macon,
kosa ipar kwoŋ gigipiny macene.
Ere neni, atimo gimanyen;
pama onyo tula, ikineni?
Alatimo royo i thim,
gi malawin iy'opalipat.
Ogwaŋe madudi jolamiyan dwoŋ,
kibwe gin gi nyithindhi maya,
rupiri amiyo pi i thim,
malawin iy'opalipat,
ma miyo ji paran m'ayero gir'amadha.
Ji m'atimo ri an won,
ŋey jowotuci pak paran.
Kucel wikilwoŋan, awi Yakobo;
to wijok kodan, awi Isiraili!
Fodi wikikelo ran rombo mewin ma mic awaŋa,
kosa wimiyan dwoŋ gi cowirok mewin.
Fodi akijoko win gi kwayo mic,
kosa alaco win gi kwayo buban.
Fodi wikikelo ran niaŋ mewin mamit gi pesa,
kosa wiyeŋan gi bor ma cowirok mewin.
To wituran gi reco mewin,
wilacan gi reco mewin.
Kucel, Abedo Were
ma cwako reco mewin ro bero paran won,
aka Ak'opoy reco mewin.
Osa wi an, weyi wakidhi i kapido,
keli banja mewin, ŋey wonyali ridho ni witire.
Kwari win marapena otimo reco,
aka jopendo mewin jotimo reco kwoŋan.
Alakoco jotel ma Kabedo Maleŋ,
aka alamiyo Yakobo rerok makicutho,
t'aweyo iyeto Isiraili.
T'onyo pama winji, awi Yakobo ŋeca paran,
Isiraili m'atieko yero!
Rwoth m'ocweyin waco ama,
go m'otimin i ici aka lakonyin.
Ikir'ilwor, awi Yakobo ŋeca paran,
Yesurun m'atieko yero.
Kole alakonjo pi i piny m'othwo,
gi waŋ pi i lowo m'othwo,
alakonjo cuny paran kwoŋ nyikwayin,
gi silwany paran kwoŋ nyithindho perin.
Jolakitula paka lum i dier pi,
paka osege i thengi pi ma mol.
Me lawaco ni, “Abedo apa Rwoth.”
Man lalwoŋere gi nyingi Yakobo,
aka man landiko i cinge ni, “Apa Rwoth.”
Go lalwoŋere gi nyingi Isiraili.
Jaboth pere, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny ni
“Abedo marapena aka macowe,
aka ongoye were man kwanyowoko an.
Ŋa ma cal an? Weyi go wotuci,
weyi go wowodhi kamaler to jengo ruwaŋan.
Ŋa m'otieko tuco wok cene gigipiny ma labino?
Weyi go wowaci riwan gima fodi labino.
Wikiri wikirin, kosa wibwok,
fodi akiwaco riwin wok cene t'awodho kamaler?
Wibedo jokony paran!
Nitie were man je kwanyowoko an?
Ongoye tele man, ongoye m'aŋeyo.”
Jono ma jotimo cal makicar jongoye kony, aka gigipiny ma joyodere gine ongoye magowa; jokony pajo jokinen kendo jokuya, ni inyalo ketho jo i wickwot.
Ŋa won m'oyido nyalo timo were kosa timo cal ma dimagowa ma nono?
Neni, joma jomakere gine je ilaketho jo i wickwot, jopac ma jobedo ji a jiya. Weyi joje jowocokere, weyi jowoay malo. Jolakirin, ilaketho jo i wickwot kanyacel.
Jathedhi nyweny kwanyo nyweny to ketho i wi mac. Bade ma meni tiŋo nyundu ma ŋinyo nyweny. Ka go tiyo, kec gi riyo neko to meni loyo to lacere.
Japac cero bol, ketho ranyuth gi kalam, gori gi gigoro, ketho ranyuth gi lew cuma, timo i cal makicar pa dhano, gi ŋono pa dhano, to ketho i ot.
Go toŋo yath sida kosa yero yath lwiyo kosa olwa to weyo dongo matek i dier lul. Go pidho yath sida to koth dongo.
Kenyo inyalo oro paka yen ma tedo. Adec mere go kwanyo to oyo, go moko mac to tedo mugat. Bende go timo were to lamo, payo cal were m'ogor to riewere piny rigo.
Adec man go waŋo i mac, i wi adec me, go bul'iye riŋo, camo to yeŋ. Go bende oyo mac to waco ni, “A, atieko bedo malieth, atieko oyo mac!”
M'odoŋ mere to go timo gine were, cal makicar pere, riere piny rigo to lamo go, go kwayo ka waco ni, “Bothan, kole ibedo were paran!”
Jokuya, jokiniaŋ; kole waŋ jo ocule, ŋey jokiri jowoneni, gi paro pajo je, ŋey jokiri jowoniaŋ.

Ongoye ŋata par, ongoye ŋeyo je kosa poko bero kwoŋ raco, ma waco ni, “Adec mere awaŋo i mac; atedo bende mugat i cuk mere, abulo riŋo t'acamo. Onyo anoloki m'odoŋ mere gir'amien? Anoriere piny ruwaŋ kidhur yen?”
Go pidhere gi buru, cuny ma komo otieko rwayo go, aka kinyal botho kwo pere kosa waco ni, “Gima nitie i cingan maracuc me k'obedo gitwodo?”
Poyi gigipiny me, awi Yakobo,
gi Isiraili, kole ibedo ŋeca paran;
acweyin, ibedo ŋeca paran,
awi Isiraili, wiyan kinyal wil kodin.
Atieko ywero woko reco perin paka pondeponde,
gi reco mewin paka fumbi,
dwoki bongan, kole atieko bothin.
Wer, awi polo, kole Rwoth otieko timo,
koki awi thutho ma piny;
bar dwondin gi wer, awi gote,
awi lul, gi kisi yath ma iye!
Kole Rwoth otieko botho Yakobo,
aka go lalimo dwoŋ i Isiraili.
Rwoth, Jaboth perin waco ama,
go m'ocweyin i ici.
Abedo Rwoth, m'otimo gigipiny je,
go kende m'orieyo polo,
an m'awon ayaro piny,
gi ma miŋo jor'ajwoka;
go ma dwoko cen jomariek,
to loko ŋeyo pajo miŋo.
Go ma ridho wac pa ŋeca pere,
to ketho i kare gima ŋecin pere jowaco.
Go ma waco kwoŋ Yerusalem ni, “Ilabed'iye.”
Go waco kwoŋ tindin ma Yuda ni, “Ilageto jo kendo,
aka alacewo gundin pajo.”
Go ma waco ri pi maluth ni, “Thwo,
alathwo woko malawin mewin.”
aka lamiyo atoŋa paran je wotundi i kare.”
Go waco bende ri Yerusalem ni, “Ilageto go kendo.”
To waco ri Ot pa Were ni, “Ilajengo misingi perin.”
Me apaka Rwoth waco ri ŋat'owir pere, ri Siras,
go m'atieko mako cinge maracuc
wokengila piny kweth ruwaŋe,
mayo kerin dhum pajo.
Rwoth layawo rigo waŋkace ma tindi madongo.
Rwoth waco ri Siras ni,
“Alatelo yuwiyin,
alabipo gote.
Alaturo woko waŋkace ma ywel,
t'aŋinyo woko petin ma nywenye.
Alamiyin lim ma mudho,
ŋaŋo m'okan kam'opondo;
ŋey iŋey ni obedo an, Rwoth,
Were pa Isiraili, m'olwoŋin gi nyingin.
Obedo ro ŋeca paran Yakobo,
gi ro Isiraili m'ayero,
am'omiyo alwoŋin gi nyingin,
gi nyingin ma peco, makada nende ikuya an.
An abedo Rwoth, aka ongoye man,
ongoye were man kendo,
alokin matek, makada nende ikuya an.
Atimo gime ŋey kisi dhano je,
wok yuwok ceŋ gi yupodho ceŋ,
jowoŋey ni ongoye were man,
abedo Rwoth, aka ongoye man kendo.
Acweyo lero gi mudho,
akelo kisangala gi kidamba;
An, Rwoth, ma timo gigipiny me je.”
Awi polo, cwo gim'otire wok malo,
aka weyi piny woyawere ŋey both paran wonyali kitula,
weyi womiy gim'otire wotula bende,
an Rwoth, atieko cweyo.
dak bende piemo gi ŋata cweyo,
Lowo nyamasiga penjo jacwec degi ni, “Icweyo aŋo?”
Kosa ni, “Tic perin ongoye cinge?”
Kidamba ri ŋata waco ri bamere ni, “Inywolo aŋo?”
Kosa ri dhako ni, “Ŋedi ramin g'aŋo?”
Rwoth, Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili,
aka jacwec pere waco,
Wilapenjan kwoŋ nyithindho paran,
kosa wilamiyan or kwoŋ tic paran?
Acweyo piny,
t'acweyo dhano bed'iye,
obedo cingan ama ojaro polo,
aka acweyo cwec man i polo je gi or paran.
Atieko ico Siras timo gim'otire,
alatiro royo pere.
Go lageto Yerusalem tindi paran madwoŋ,
to gonyo ji paran ma wiloka,
m'ongoye cul kosa kemba.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Rwoth waco ri Isiraili ni
Lim ma Misir gi Ethopiya labedo mewin,
aka cwo maboyo ma Seba jolabedo ŋecin mewin,
jolaluwo win i lijegere,
to jokule riwin piny ka jotuco ni,
Were nigi win, aka ongoye man,
ongoye were man kendo.
Adieri, ibedo Were ma panere,
Awi Were pa Isiraili, Jaboth.
Jono ma jotimo cal makicar jolanywowere,
aka wi gin lakwot kanyacel.
To Rwoth botho Isiraili,
aka loyo pere bedo cil gi cil,
jokilanywowere, kosa bedo i wickwot hongo je.
Me apaka Rwoth waco,
go m'ocweyo polo,
(go obedo Were!)
Go ocweyo piny,
(ocweyo m'ocwiny aka ma cil gi cil.
Go k'ocweyo piny m'ojwangere,
to ocweyo ni ji jowobed'iye.)
An abedo Rwoth,
aka ongoye man.
Akiluwo nyaliŋliŋ,
i piny ma mudho,
kosa akipano atoŋa paran.
Akiwaco ri nyikway Yakobo,
ni joworangan kam'othangere.
An, Rwoth aluwo adieri,
Atuco gim'otire.
Cokere win aka wibin,
core win cegin kanyacel,
win ma wiboth i kisi piny!
Ongoye gima joŋeyo,
jono ma jotiŋo cal makicar pajo ma mbawo,
aka jokwayo were ma kinyal konyo jo.
Biye win wikel banja mewin i kapido,
weyi jowomiyere rieko kanyacel!
Ŋa m'owaco gime cango?
Ŋa m'otuco con?
K'obedo an, Rwoth?
Ongoye were man kendo,
Were ma timo gim'otire aka botho,
ongoye ŋatiman kendo.
Wire win bongan aka wibothi,
ji je ma piny gibe!
Kole an abedo Were, aka ongoye man kendo.
aka atuco gi dhokan gim'otire,
wac ma kilawire ni,
“Kisi nyatoro laguro ran conge,
to tuco gi lewe ni An abedo Rwoth.”
Jolawaco ni i Rwoth kende,
ama gim'otire gi meni wok'iye.
To jono je ma jodakan,
wickwot lamako jo.
I Rwoth, nyikway Isiraili je,
jolalimo loyo to josiemere.
Me gike pa werin ma Babilon!
Bel gi Nebo m'oyido cango ilamo,
gigipiny ma witiŋo me jopek,
paka bieto ri ogwaŋe.
Joluŋere, jokule kanyacel,
jokinyal botho bieto,
to jo wegi jokidho i twec.
Winjan win, awi ot pa Yakobo,
ji ma joboth je ma ot pa Isiraili,
win m'atieko tiŋo wok i nywolirok,
atiŋo win wok i ici.
Kiri ka witi, abedo Were mewin,
kiri ka witwi lwar, alatiŋo win.
Atieko cweyo win, aka alabielo win,
alatiŋo win t'abotho win.
Nitie ŋata wilakipima an gi go? Rwoth penjo.
Nitie ŋata rom kodan?
Ji joyawo mugowa pesa pajo aka jokonjo zahabu,
jopima feza i kilo.
Jopangisa jandijo timo rijo were,
aka jokule piny lamo.
Jotiŋo gino to jojengo i goki jo,
joketho i kabedo mere, aka cungo kenyo,
kinyal core wok kama nitie i iye.
Ka dhano okwayo, kinyal dwoko kwayo,
kosa kinyal botho ŋato wok i teko.
Poyi win gime, aka par win kwoŋe,
kethi win i paro, win joreco.
Poyi win gigipiny ma cango con,
kole abedo Were, aka ongoye man,
Abedo Were, aka ongoye ŋata cale kodan.
Atuco gike wok i cakirok,
aka wok cene atuco gima fodi k'otimere.
Awaco ni, atoŋa paran latundo i kare,
aka alatimo gim'amito.
Alwoŋo winyo ma camo wadi wok yuwok ceŋ,
jacwo ma wok bor timo atoŋa paran.
Atieko luwo, aka alamiyo wotimere,
obedo atoŋa paran, aka alatimo.
Winjan win, win jowictek,
win ma wibor gi both:
Akelo both paran cegin, ki nitie bor,
aka both paran kilagalo;
Alaketho both paran i Zayon,
aka i Isiraili dwoŋ paran.
Babilon lori piny wok i kom perin ma dhum,
ibedi piny i fukefuke i lowo.
Oyido icale nyako mambula, tindi madwoŋ ma kimaki,
to, kilabedo ameno kendo.
Kwany win tele ma rego, aka wicaki rego ŋano.
Luny win nangin ma waŋ win,
lunyere win, dol win nangin ma tiendi win,
wiluw i malawin.
Kinyoro mewin ibino yawo,
t'ineno wickwot mewin.
Alaculo kwor kwoŋ win, aka ongoye ŋat'alaweyo.
Jaboth mawan, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, meno nyingi go,
go obedo Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili.
Rwoth waco ri Babilon,
bedi liŋ aka kadhi i mudho,
Awi nyar Jokaldin,
kilalwoŋin ni nyamicala ma kerin kendo.
Oyido amako nge gi ji paran,
t'akoco alunja paran,
aketho jo i cingin,
aka ikinyutho jo ŋono,
kiri jom'oti je iketho kwoŋ jo okol mapek ma kiwacere.
Iwaco ni, “Alabedo nyamicala cil gi cil.”
Ikiketho gime i cunyin,
kosa ikiparo ni latundo i gike.
in m'ibedo kam'okwe,
m'iwaco i cunyin ni,
“An ago, ongoye ŋata cale kodan,
akilabedo paka citho,
kosa nyithindho paran jokilatho.”
i hongo macek, i ndelo acel,
nyithindho perin jolatho, aka ilabedo citho m'ongoye keŋ,
makada nende inoor meni ma thieth gi meni mathoth ma yido perin.
Iwinjo m'okwe i kidakana perin,
t'iwaco ni, ongoye ŋata nenan.
Rieko perin gi ŋeyo perin,
orweyin woko,
t'iwaco i cunyin ni,
obedo an won kende, aka ongoye ŋatiman kendo.
To gimarac lapodho kwoŋin,
m'ikonyal kwanyo woko.
Teko lapodho kwoŋin,
m'ikila nyalo ciro,
rerok lapodho kwoŋin abwap, m'ikiŋeyo.
Cungi m'ocwiny i yido perin,
gi jothieth perin kweth,
m'itieko oyo kwok wok i soye perin,
kono onyali konyin,
kono onyali bwoko jokwor perin.
Ingoye gi meni makada nende inigi jomic rieko;
weyi jobin aka jowobothin,
jono ma jopoko polo,
ma jokaŋasa micalin,
ma kisi ka dwe opor,
jowaco amien ma latimere rin.
Neni, jolacale kanja,
aka mac lareyo jo woko!
Jokinyal bothirok,
kwoŋ meni pa mac.
K'obedo cuk ma dhano nyalo oyo,
kosa mac m'inyalo bedo cegin gine.
Meno a nger jono m'itieko oyo kwok gi jo,
m'itimo gi jo mitan wok i soye perin.
Jolera kicar, kisi dhano i yo pere,
aka ongoye ŋat'obothi win.
Winji win gime, awi ot pa Yakobo,
win m'ilwoŋo win gi nyingi Isiraili,
kodi Yuda,
ma wikwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth,
aka wituco Were pa Isiraili,
to, wikitim iy'adieri kosa m'otire.
Wilwoŋere ni wibedo i tindi madwoŋ maleŋ,
aka wigoŋere kwoŋ Were pa Isiraili,
m'ilwoŋo ni Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Rwoth waco ri Isiraili ni,
Cango con atuco gima latimere,
awaco gi dhokan aka amiyo jowoŋeyere;
kenyo atimo jo abwap aka jotundo i kare.
Rupiri oyido aŋeyo ni wijowictek,
cuny win tek paka nyweny,
aka wikitoy paka ywel.
Ameno aluwo kwoŋ jo riwin cango con,
aka atito riwin mafodi jok'otundo i kare;
ŋey wikiri wiwaci ni cal makicar mewin am'otimo jo,
ni cal mewin m'opay gi cal mewin m'oleny ama jowodho or kwoŋ jo.
Witieko winjo, pama onyo neni win gime je;
aka wik'otuci kamaler?
Wok pama kadho yuwaŋe amiyo win winjo gigipiny manyen,
gigipiny m'opanere mafodi wikuya.
Jocweyere pama, makiweno cango con,
nyaka wiwinjo kwoŋe konon me,
ŋey wikiri wiwaci ni, oyido atieko kiri ŋeyo jo.
Fodi wikiwinjo, aka fodi wikiŋeyo,
wok cango ithi win oyido fodi k'oyawere.
Rupiri aŋeyo ni di wibedo jobanirok,
aka ni wok i nywolirok mewin,
oyido ilwoŋo win ni jogwenyirok.
Ro nyingan, adhumo nge paran,
ro pak paran adwoko cen ro win,
ŋey akir'awey win woko.
Neni, atieko temo lonyo win,
to makiweno paka ilonyo feza i mac,
atieko temo win i kabangala ma candirok.
Ro an won, kendo ro an won, atimo,
rupiri inyalo nedi koco nyingan?
Dwoŋ paran ak'omiy moro.
Winjan win, Awi nyikway Yakobo,
Isiraili, ji m'atieko lwoŋo jo!
An ago, abedo marapena,
aka abedo macowe.
Cingan am'ogeto misingi ma piny,
aka cingan maracuc am'orieyo woko polo;
k'alwoŋo piny gi polo,
jowoay kiromo.
Cokere win, wijoje, aka wiwinji!
Ŋa kwoŋ jo m'otieko tuco kamaler gigipiny me?
Rwoth omaro go,
go latimo atoŋa pere kwoŋ Babilon,
aka badi go bino bedo kwoŋ Jokaldin.
An, won, aŋat'aluwo aka alwoŋo go,
akelo go tundo ka,
aka labedo gi loyo i gima go timo.
Core win cegin kodan, winji win gime!
Wok i cakirok akiluwo aponda,
aka je timere ma an bende aneno.
Aka onyo pama Rwoth Were ooran gi Cuny pere.
Rwoth, Jaboth mewin, aka Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili waco,
Abedo Rwoth, Were mewin,
ma fonjo win ro bero mewin,
aka telo win i yo ma wiripo luwo.
Kabedi oyido wiwinji or paran!
Dinyo siem mewin omol ma kicwiy,
paka malawa!
Dinyo loyo obino riwin paka ulok ma nam
Nyithindho mewin dinyo jobedo kweth paka kwoyo,
to nyikway win jobedo mathoth paka nyingi cemo.
Dinyo nyingi jo k'orere woko,
kosa di k'orey woko jo ruwaŋan.
Koki win gi wac ma kisangala, tuci win,
dhiri win wac kiri witum ma piny,
wac win ni, “Rwoth otieko botho Yakobo ŋeca pere!”
Riyo k'oneko jo munyo jowotho i thim,
go omiyo pi mol rijo wok i tele,
go obaro woko tele to pi bayere woko.
“Siem ongoye ri jokidakana.”
win ji ma wiwok bor!
Rwoth olwoŋan mafodi k'onywolan,
mafodi anitie i iy mama go ocwoko nyingan.
opanan i tipo ma par cinge;
ocweyan paka asere m'owidhere,
i mikoro pere okanan.
Go owaco ran ni, “Ibedo ŋeca paran,
Isiraili, ma lakelo ran dwoŋ.”
To awaco ni, “Atieko tic ma nono,
atieko oro meni paran, m'ongoye gim'alimo gipilok,
kucel adieri, tim paran Rwoth oneno,
aka kemba paran nigi Were paran.”
Onyo pama, Rwoth waco,
go m'ocweyan i ici bedo ŋeca pere,
ma dwoko Yakobo bonge,
aka ni wonyali coko rigo Isiraili.
Kole anwaŋo dwoŋ ruwaŋ Rwoth,
aka Were paran otieko lokere meni paran.
“Obedo gima sew ni iripo bedo ŋeca paran,
tiŋo malo nonin pa Yakobo,
gi dwoko Joisiraili ma joboth.
Alamiyo in paka lero ri nonin,
ŋey both paran wotundi i tielo je ma piny.”
Rwoth waco,
Jaboth pa Isiraili aka Ŋataleŋ pere,
ri ŋat'icayo swa, aka nonin jodak,
ŋeca pa jodhum ni,
“Kerin jolaneno to joay,
jodhum jolakule piny,
kwoŋbedo Rwoth ma timo adieri,
Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili m'otieko yerin.”
“I hongo ma ŋono atieko dwokin,
itieko ndelo ma both akonyin,
