atieko kurin t'amiyin,
paka cikirok ri ji,
ma cako piny,
ma poko lim m'ojwangere.
Awaco ri jotwec ni, ‘Kadhi win.’
Awaco ri jono ma jonitie i mudho ni, ‘Wok win woko i lero.’
Jolacemo i yo malomalo,
jolacemo kiri i wi tendere maler.
weyo malieth kosa ceŋ k'orwadhi jo piny,
kole ŋata mako gi jo wor ama latelo jo,
aka latelo jo kadho i waŋ pi ma mol.”
“Alawiro gote paran je jowobedi royo,
aka ngudin paran madongo ilatiŋo malo.
Neni, ji paran jolawok bor swa,
aka neni, jolawok yumalo gi yupodho ceŋ,
gi wok i lowo ma Siyene yupiny.”
Wer, Awi polo! Koki ro kisangala, Awi piny!
Weyi gote jowomwoci gi wer,
kole Rwoth otieko yomo cuny ji pere,
aka lamako wor gi ji pere ma jocandere.
To, Zayon waco ni, “Rwoth otieko jwangan,
Rwoth paran wiye owil kodan.”
Dhako wiye nyalo wil gi nyathi pere ma dhoth,
kosa nyalo weyo ma k'omako wor gi nyathi ma iye?
To makada nende dhako wiye nyalo wil gi nyathi pere,
kucel wiyan k'owil kodin.
Neni, atieko ndiko nyingin i par cingan,
initie i paro paran noknok.
Joma getin jokengila joma joreyin,
aka jono ma jothangin jolakadho bor kwoŋin.
Tiŋi waŋin malo thoko akinen,
joje jocokere, jobino bongin.
Rwoth waco ni, kafodi go kwo,
ilaruko joje kwoŋin paka thiwino,
paka ilatweyo jo kwoŋin paka mweha.
Adieri piny perin m'oyido orere aka odoŋ gunda,
onyo pama labedo madiny,
ri jono ma jobedi kenyo.
Aka jono m'oyido jomwonyo win woko jolabedo bor koro.
Nyithindho m'onywol jo i hongo ma litho
jolawaco k'iwinjo ni,
kabedo me diny ran;
tim ran kabedo man ma bed'iye!
Kenyo ilapenjere i cunyin ni,
“Ŋa m'onywolo ran nyithindho me je?
Oyido aywak aka akinywol,
oyido ajawiloka aka obolan,
to ŋa won m'opidho nyithindho me je?
Oyido adoŋ kendan,
onyo nyithindho me jowok kune?”
Me apaka Rwoth Were waco ri ji pere.
Acegin tiŋo cingan ri nonin,
t'atiŋo ranyuth paran ri ji,
ŋey jowokeli wotin i kor jo,
aka nyiki win ilatiŋo i goki jo.
Kerin gi nyamicalin jolabedo jonywol rin,
jolakule piny rin miyin dwoŋ,
jolamwole nyutho wor pajo rin,
to jonaŋo fukefuke ma tiendin.
Kenyo ilaŋeyo ni Abedo Rwoth,
aka jono ma jokuro kony paran jok'obedi i wickwot.
Inyalo mayo jalweny gima go onyaga?
Inyalo botho jotwec wok i cingi ŋatatek aka ger?
To me apaka Rwoth waco ama:
Kiri jotwec pa siragama ilamako woko,
aka ilamayo ŋatatek aka kiri gima go onyaga.
Alalweny gi ŋata lwenyo kodin,
aka alabotho nyithindho perin.
Alamiyo jono ma jodiyin camo delkwoŋ jo,
aka jolamer gi remo pajo paka jomer gi vini.
Kenyo ji je jolaŋeyo ni,
Abedo Rwoth, Jaboth perin,
aka Jagony perin, Jameni pa Yakobo.
Me apaka Rwoth waco,
Wiparo ni ariemo woko ji paran,
paka jacwo ma riemo woko cege?
Nikune, ere papila ma turo nywomirok?
Wiparo ni atana win i twec,
paka jacwo tana nyithindho pere paka ŋecin?
Neni, wikadho bedo i twec ro reco mewin;
aka ro kibenga mewin oriem min win.
Raŋo munyo abino akinwaŋo dhano?
Raŋo munyo alwoŋo, ongoye ŋat'odwoko?
Cingan cek ma kinyal botho?
Kosa angoye gi meni ma botho?
Gi or paran athwo woko nam,
aloko malawin opalipat;
rec pajo joŋwe ro ngoye pa pi,
aka jotho ro riyo.
Anyalo loko polo macol,
t'aloko kutiya paka gium pajo.
Rwoth otieko miyan,
lew joma jofonjere,
ŋey anyal ŋeyo nger ma miyo meni,
ri ji ma jolacere.
Kisi odikin go cewan,
cewo ithan,
winjo paka ji ma jofonjere.
Rwoth otieko yawo ithan,
aka akigwenyere,
akigiki acen.
gi pindan ri jono ma jojwaco ye tikan,
akipano waŋan,
munyo joyetan to joŋulo kwoŋan law.
Rwoth Were konyan,
riameno wickwot k'omakan,
aketho waŋan paka cuk mac ma cot,
aka aŋeyo ni wickwot k'omakan.
aka lawaco ni abu banja.
Nitie ŋata nyalo temo kelo banja kwoŋan?
Weyi wakadhi i kapido kanyacel!
Ŋa m'obedo jakwor paran?
Weyi go wocore cegin kodan.
Ere neni, Rwoth Were ama konyan.
Neni, joje jolati paka nanga,
masirigi lacamo jo woko.
Ŋa kwoŋ win ma lworo Rwoth,
aka winjo dwondi ŋeca pere,
ma wotho i mudho,
aka ongoye gi lero,
kucel ketho geno i nyingi Rwoth,
aka goŋere kwoŋ Were?
Ere neni, wijoje ma wimoko mac,
to wiketho kasik mac.
Woth win i lero ma mac mewin,
gi kasik mac ma witieko moko!
Me a gima wilanwaŋo wok i cingan,
wilanindo piny i litho.
Winjan win, win ma widwaro both,
win ma wirango Rwoth.
Ŋiy win tele kama wiwok'iye,
kam'iŋiny'iye telin m'okuny'iye win.
Ŋiy win Abraham kwari win,
gi Sara m'onywolo win.
Kole Abraham oyido ongoye gi nyathi munyo alwoŋo go,
to, amiyo go silwany gi nyithindho,
aloko nyikway go kweth.
Kole Rwoth layomo cuny Zayon;
gi jono je ma jobedo i gundin mere.
Go laloko thim mere paka Eden,
aka opalipat mere paka ndelo pa Rwoth.
Forok gi kisangala lanwaŋere i go,
foyo kodi dwondi ma wer.
Winjan win, ji paran,
winji win gim'awaco, nono paran.
Amiyo piny fonji paran,
aka tiro paran kelo lero ri ji.
Alabino piyo botho jo,
both paran nitie cegin.
An won aladhumo ji.
Piny ma thengi nam jokuran,
jokuran adhum jo.
Tiŋi waŋ win malo i polo,
aka wiŋiy pendi piny.
Kole polo larere paka yiro,
piny lati paka nanga,
aka jono ma jobed'iye jolatho paka lwaŋino.
To both paran bedo cil gi cil
aka loyo paran langoye gi gike.
Winjan win, win ma wiŋeyo tiro,
win ma winigi fonji paran i cuny win,
wikiri wilwor yet pa ji man,
aka wikiri wilwor ka jowaco riwin gima ŋedho cuny win.
Kole masirigi lacamo jo paka nanga,
aka kudin lacamo jo paka famba;
to loyo paran labedo ma cil gi cil,
kodi both paran ri luse je.
Cew, cew, ruk meni,
Awi cingi Rwoth,
cew paka ndelo macene,
ri luse ji ma cango con!
Iŋati cango ikitoŋo Rahab mathindho thindho,
iŋat'ikicwowo bulir?
Iŋat'ikithwo woko nam,
pi maluth swa,
t'itimo royo ri ji perin i nam,
ŋey ji m'ibotho jowonyal ŋado?
Ameno ji ma Rwoth obotho joladwoko,
to jobino i Zayon gi wer,
forok ma bu gike bino bedo rijo.
Jobino nwaŋo forok gi kisangala,
aka kumo gi hamo bino ngoye woko.
An, Rwoth, aŋat'ayomo cuny win,
onyo in ŋa m'ilworo nyaka dhano ma tho,
wod dhano ma cal lum.
Wiwin owil gi Rwoth, jacwec mewin,
m'oyaro polo,
to geto misingi ma piny.
Wimedo bedo gi lworo ndelo gipi,
ro nge pa jono ma jodiyo win,
jono ma joyikere reyo win woko?
Nikune keme pa joma jodiyo win?
Jono m'idiyo ilagonyo jo piyo,
jokilatho to jokadho piny i bur,
kosa jok'ocandi cemo.
Kole Abedo Rwoth, Were mewin,
ma tugila nam to koyo mere hola,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny a nyinge.
Atieko ketho wac paran i dhok win,
t'akano win i tipo ma cingan,
arieyo polo,
t'ageto kindi piny,
k'awaco ri Zayon ni, “Wibedo ji paran.”
Ay malo, awi Yerusalem,
witieko madho i cingi Rwoth,
kikopo ma keme pere,
witieko madho to wiloko thiŋ,
acero m'omiyo win kitangatanga.
Ongoye ŋat'otel go,
i dier yac je ma go onywolo,
ongoye ŋat'omaki cinge,
kwoŋ yac je ma go opidho.
Teko ario opodho kwoŋin,
ŋa m'oywaki kodin?
Kisika gi rerok, kec gi lweny,
ŋa m'oyom cuny win?
Ji mewin jolocere,
joriere i sonda ma kisi royo,
paka amudhe m'omoko i bwo,
jopoŋ gi keme pa Rwoth,
bwok pa Were mewin.
Riameno winji win gime, win ma wilimo litho,
ma wimer, to makiweno gi vini.
Rwoth mewin waco ama, Rwoth,
Were mewin ma osa ri mito pa ji pere.
Neni, akwanyo woko kikopo ma kitangatanga i cingi win,
wik'omedhi kendo,
wok i bakul ma keme paran.
Aka alaketho i cingi joma pilo win,
jono ma jotieko waco riwin ni,
“Kule win piny, ŋey wanyal kadho.”
Witieko loko dieŋey win ka nyono,
paka royo rijo aluwa.
bedi matek kendo, Awi Zayon!
Ruk nangin perin maŋon,
awi Yerusalem, tindi madwoŋ maleŋ.
Kole ji ma jok'othumere gi jomakoc jok'obin bongin.
Teŋi woko fukefuke kwoŋin, aka ay malo,
awi Yerusalem manitie i twec,
gony woko lijegere i ŋuti win,
Awi ji ma Yerusalem ma jonitie i twec.
Kole me apaka Rwoth waco, “Otana win m'ongoye cul, aka ilabotho win m'ongoye pesa.
Me apaka Rwoth Were waco. Cango con, ji paran wegi joloro piny i Misir bedo paka jopath gi mito pajo, to Asiria otero jo gi mbaka m'ongoye cul.
Onyo riameno atimo aŋo ka, Rwoth waco, ŋiyo k'itero ji paran ma bu cul? Jotel mewin jocur gi litho, aka kisi ndelo jomedo cayo nyingan.
Riameno ji paran jolaŋeyo nyingan, i ndelo no jolaŋeyo ni an Were, aŋat'aluwo, An e.”
masembo pa jamikwenda ma tuco wac maber,
ma tuco siem, kelo wac maber ma bero,
tuco both,
aka waco ri Zayon ni, “Were perin dhumo.”
Winji win, jokur mewin jotiŋo dwondi gin malo,
jowero kanyacel ro kisangala;
kole joneno awaŋ g'awaŋ,
dwoko pa Rwoth i Zayon.
Mwoc dwondi win kanyacel gi wer,
win gundin ma Yerusalem!
Kole Rwoth otieko yomo cuny ji pere,
go otieko botho Yerusalem.
Rwoth otieko rieyo bade maleŋ,
ruwaŋ nonin je,
aka tielo je ma piny laneno,
both pa Were mawan.
wikiri wigeyi gimakoc,
eye win i dier jo, aka lokere win m'olony,
win ma witiŋo atewe pa Rwoth.
Waŋin me wikilawok i kwakirok;
wikilatemo kwalok.
Kole Rwoth Were mewin latelo win,
aka Were pa Isiraili lagwoko win gi yucen.
Neni, ŋeca paran labedo gi loyo i tic pere,
ilaworo go t'imiyo go dwoŋ,
aka labedo malo swa.
Paka ji kweth jodhier munyo joneno go,
cal pere oyido onyekere m'okalo cal pa dhano,
aka neno pere okalo apa wot cwo.
aka kerin jolamwono dhok gin ro go;
rupiri jolaneno gigipiny mafodi k'owaci rijo,
aka jolaniaŋ gigipiny m'oyido fodi jok'owinjo.
Aka ri ŋa ma cingi Rwoth otieko menyirok?
Ŋeca pa Rwoth odongo paka dudi ma nyaka rwako fuc i lowo m'othwo.
Go oyido ongoye gi dwoŋ kosa ŋono,
m'omiy waŋiy go,
kosa cal moro kwoŋe ma d'oyway cuny wan,
kosa ŋono ma d'omiy wawanya go.
Ji jocayo go, aka jokwedere kwoŋe,
dhano ma jarem,
gi candirok madit.
Ongoye ŋat'obolo kada waŋe ŋiyo go,
wacayo go, aka wakidewo kwoŋe paka ŋata dikony.
to tiŋo rem mawan;
kucel waparo ni ber ogoy go,
aka ni Were won am'ogoyo go to miyo go litho.
oyure ro raco mawan.
Gir'acula pere miyo wan kwo gibe,
aka luth m'ogoy go cango two mawan.
kisi moro ocomo yo pere,
to, Rwoth miyo gir'acula podho kwoŋ go,
gir'acula m'oyido waŋati waripo limo.
kucel go k'oyawo dhoke;
paka rombo m'itero yaŋo,
paka rombo m'icegin lielo,
ameno go k'oyawo dhoke.
G'adica kodi thumo banja, oter go neko;
paka ri luse pere, watero ni go oyido ripo gi tho,
wogoy go ro kibenga pa ji paran?
oyiki go paka joŋaŋo,
makada nende go oyido bubanja,
kosa k'oluwo twodo gi dhoke.
Kucel obedo mito pa Rwoth ni go wolimi litho;
to miyo go kumo,
munyo olokere cowirok ma cwako reco,
go laneno nyikwaye, go lamedo ndelo pere;
aka luwo i go atoŋa pa Rwoth latundo i kare.
Rumacen ma kwo ma candirok, go laneno kisangala;
go laŋeyo ni k'ocandere ma nono.
Ŋeca paran m'omiyere, aka ma sangala an,
latiŋo gir'acula pa ji kweth,
aka ro go alacwako rijo.
go lapoko lim m'onyaga gi jom'ocwiny;
rupiri okonjo woko kwo pere i tho,
t'ikwano go gi joreco;
kucel otiŋo reco pa ji kweth,
to kwayo ri joreco.
mwoc gi wer aka iywaki malo,
in ma ŋedi k'oramin!
Onyo pama ilabedo gi nyithindho kweth,
loyo dhako m'otieko nywomirok, Rwoth waco.
Loki wema perin malac,
aka weyi nanga ma geŋo kam'ibed'iye woyar woko;
ikir'ipan, loki mabor thondhe perin,
aka iridhi loce perin.
Ilayawo kew perin i thenge maracuc gi maracam,
ji perin joladwoko i lowo,
ma nonin man oyido jobed'iye.
Ji jolabedo i tindin ma pama obedo gundin.
Ikir'ibedi gi lworo, kole wickwot kilamakin;
Ikir'ilacere, wickwot kilamakin.
Wiyin lawil gi wickwot ma soye perin,
aka ikilawinjo wickwot ro bedo citho.
Kole jacwec perin obedo cworin,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny obedo nyinge;
Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili obedo Jaboth perin,
ilwoŋo go ni Were ma piny gibe.
Kole Rwoth otieko lwoŋin,
paka dhako m'ojwangi aka cunye ramo,
paka dhako ma fodi soye k'oriemi woko,
Were perin waco.
I hongo macek ajwangin,
to, gi wor madwoŋ alacokin.
I keme paran m'opoŋ de oy ma hongo macek,
apano rin waŋan,
to alamako kodin wor gi mar makiwire,
Rwoth, Jaboth perin waco.
m'akwoŋere ni pi ma hongo pa Nowa
wokiri woum piny,
ameno akwoŋere ni akilamako nge kodin kendo,
aka akilabwokin kendo.
Gote gi tendere jonyalo barok,
to mar paran makiwire rin k'oeye kwoŋin;
aka alakuro cikirok paran ma siem,
Rwoth ma mako wor kodin waco.
Awi Yerusalem, tindi madwoŋ ma candere aka ongoye ŋat'okony,
ongoye ŋat'oyom cunyin.
Alageto kindi ot perin kendo gi telin ma welo.
Alageto acurcur perin gi telin ma welo,
waŋkace perin gi telin maliel paka mac,
kodi cel perin je gi telin ma welo.
aka nyithindho perin jolabedo joŋaŋo madwoŋ.
Ilagetere m'ocwiny i tiro,
ilabedo bor g'adica, aka lworo k'omakin,
gi kwoŋ acanda, rupiri k'ocore cegin bongin.
Ka moro okwinyin,
meno k'owoki bongan,
aka moro otugila lweny kodin,
lapodho kwoŋbedo in.
Neni, aŋat'acweyo jandijo,
ma buko cuk mac,
to wodho gilweny ri atoŋa mere.
Atieko bende cweyo janek ma reyo woko.
Ongoye gilweny m'ilathedho ma lweny kodin ma lakiyindira,
aka ilawiro woko lew je m'oay kwoŋin i thumo banja.
Me alunja pa ŋecin pa Rwoth,
gi gwok pajo wok bongan.”
Rwoth waco.
Biye, ŋata riyo neko je,
biye i pi!
Biye, ŋat'ongoye gi pesa,
biye nyewere t'icemo!
Biye, nyew vini gi cak,
m'ongoye pesa kosa cul.
Raŋo wioro pesa ri gima k'obedo cemo,
gi meni mewin ri gima kiyeŋ win?
Winjan win maber, aka wicam gimaber,
to wiyodere gi cemo ma dicwe.
winji win, ŋey cuny win wonyali kwo.
Alatimo gi win cikirok ma cil gi cil,
mar paran makiwire, mar'adieri ri Daudi.
Neni, aketho go mijulisi ri ji,
jatel aka jamituka pa ji.
Neni, ilalwoŋo nonin ma fodi ikiŋeyo,
aka piny m'oyido k'oŋeyin laringo bino bongin,
kwoŋbedo An abedo Rwoth, Were Maleŋ pa Isiraili,
rupiri go otieko miyin dwoŋ.
Rangi Rwoth, ka go fodi nyalo nwaŋere,
lwoŋ Rwoth, ka go fodi nicegin.
Weyi jokidakana jowojwangi yo pajo,
jowowey paro pajo marac;
weyi jowogiki bongi Rwoth, ŋey wonyali timo gi jo ŋono
kodi bongi Were mawan, kole go lacwako i thotho.
Kole paro paran k'obedo paro mewin,
aka yo paran opokere kwoŋ mewin, Rwoth waco.
Kole paka polo bor yombo piny,
apaka yo paran nitie malo kalo mewin,
aka paro paran kalo paro mewin.
aka jokigiki malo cuka jotieko dhieko piny,
to jomiyo gim'opidhi twi gi dongo,
miyo jacwoyo kodhi gi cemo ma camo.
Ameno apaka wac ma wok i dhokan labedo,
k'ogiki bongan nono,
to lamiyo atoŋa mere wotundi i kare,
latimo kisi gim'adhiro ni wotim.
Kole wilaweyo Babilon gi kisangala,
aka ilatelo win ka widok i siem.
Gote gi tendere jolamwoc gi wer,
aka yen madudi jolagoyo adhoŋ.
Yen lwiyo latwi kama pama kudhin nitie i iye,
aka yen ma lile malo latwi kama pama kayongo nitie i iye.
Me labedo rapoy ri Rwoth,
ri ranyuth ma cil gi cil ma k'orumi.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
Kur win tiro, aka witim gim'otire,
kole both paran cegin bino,
aka gony paran lanyuthere.
Jasilwany a ŋata timo gime,
ŋata mako matek swa,
ŋata kuro sabato, ma kikoc,
aka cinge kitim reco moro je.
Jopath ma jolaman jokiri jowowaci ni,
“Rwoth kilayeyan lamo go kanyacel gi ji pere.”
Jacwo ma lur wokiri wowaci ni,
“Neni, abedo yath m'othwo.”
Kole me apaka Rwoth waco ama:
Ri cwo ma lur, ma jokuro Sabato paran,
ma joyero gigipiny ma sangala an,
aka jokuro cikirok paran,
alamiyo wopoy nyingi jo i ot paran, gi i dier ji paran,
loyo k'oyido jonitie gi nyithindho mayac gi manyir.
Alamiyo nyingi jo wopoy kicutho,
ma kilarere woko.
Jopath ma joriwere bongi Rwoth,
tic rigo, maro nyingi Rwoth,
gi bedo ŋecin pere,
moro je m'okur sabato, aka kikoc,
to kuro cikirok paran;
t'amiyo jo kisangala i ot paran ma kwayo.
Alajolo mic awaŋa pajo gi cowirok pajo i wi migam paran.
Kole ot paran ilalwoŋo ni ot ma kwayo ri ji je.
Me apaka Rwoth Were waco ama:
Go ma coko kanyacel Joisiraili ma jonitie woko.
Alamedo coko joman rijo,
medo kwoŋ jono m'atieko coko.
Kisi ogwaŋ madudi, biye winyul,
win kisi ogwaŋ ma lul!
Jokur pa Isiraili waŋin otho
joje jongoye gi ŋeyo;
joje jobedo gwokere m'obadha,
ma jokinyal gwe,
jomaro swa rierok piny gi lek,
jomaro swa nur.
Gwokere jothoth gi woro,
to jokinwaŋ gima romo jo.
Jokwath bende jokiniaŋ,
joje jowire i yo pajo wegi,
kisi acel i magowa pere won, acel aka joje.
Jowaco ni, “Biye, weyi wanwaŋ vini,
weyi wamadhi math matek ma romo wan,
dikin lacale konon,
madit ma kiwacere.”
Ji ma jotimo gim'otire jotho,
aka ongoye ŋata dewo;
ji ma jomiyere irwenyo gi jo,
kucel ongoye ŋata niaŋ kwoŋe.
Kole ibotho ŋat'otire i teko,
Go donjo i siem,
joywomere i siem,
rupiri jotimo gim'otire.
To win, core win ka,
win nyithindho pa jothieth,
nyithindho pajo jacot gi jakidakana.
Witimo gi nyero gi ŋa?
Wiŋamo dhok win malac kwoŋ ŋa?
Wijwiyo ŋa?
Wikibedo nyithindho mareco,
nyikway jotwodo.
Win ma wiwaŋ g'awanya i tiendi podo,
i kisi tiendi yen moro je.
Win ma withumo nyithindho mewin i milelin,
i kisi ŋungu telin?
I kisi telin mafoth ma milelo winwaŋ'iye werin mewin;
jobedo adec mewin.
Wikonjo rijo mic ma vini gi mic ma cemo.
Gino osangala an?
Wipedho kanindo mewin,
malo wi gote mabor,
aka kenyo ama wimiyo cowirok.
Yucen ma thigo gi dhiot mewin,
wiketho ranyuth mewin,
onyo ma weyan, witieko yawo kanindo mewin,
aka w'idho kanindo mewin malac gi jomitirok mewin ma winyewo nindo gi jo,
witieko maro kanindo pajo,
witieko neno kinyoro pajo.
Wikidho bongi were Molek,
kareno wiwiro mo mewin maŋwe kur nger gi nger,
widhiro jomikwenda mewin bor swa,
widhiro jo kiri i piny pa jom'otho.
I thotho ma woth mewin, oyido wilacere
to wikiwaco ni “Obedo gim'ongoye kony.”
Winwaŋo kwo manyen ri meni mewin,
aka ameno wikinyapere.
Ŋa m'oyido wikirin to wilworo,
m'omiyo witwodo,
wikipoyan kosa wikiparo kwoŋan?
Wikwero lworan,
kwoŋbedo aliŋ ma hongo mabor?
Alakedho kamaler tiro mewin gi tic mewin,
to jok'okony win.
Ka winogoy koko, weyi cal makicar mewin ma wicoko jowobothi win!
Koyo latiŋo woko,
luya won lakudho jo.
To ŋata pondo i an, lalimo lowo,
to lunjo got paran maleŋ.
Aka ilawaco ni,
“Geti win, geti win, yik win yo,
kwany win woko rageŋ mogo je i royo pa ji paran.”
Kole Jamalo swa, ŋataleŋ waco,
go makwo cil gi cil, ma nyinge Leŋ.
Abedo kam'oŋawere, kamaleŋ,
gi jono bende ma joŋuto aka jobwonere i cuny,
dwoko cuny jomamwol,
gi dwoko cuny joma ŋuto reco.
Kole akilamedo kisegeya ji paran,
kosa mako nge noknok.
Kole bongan ama cuny wok'iye,
aka atieko timo luya ma kwo.
Amako nge gi jo ro awanya gi reco pajo,
amiyo jo gir'acula, apondo rijo aka oyido amako nge;
to jomedo gik cen i yo ma cuny jo wegi.
Atieko neno yo pajo, to alacango jo;
alatelo jo,
aka alayomo cuny joma ywak
miyo ji pere ma ywak nyero.
siem, siem, ri joma nitie bor gi cegin,
aka alacango jo.
To jokidakana jocale nam ma dewadewa,
ato kinyal kwe,
pi mere ma dewadewa ulo koco gi cwodho.
“Siem ongoye ri jokidakana.”
Koki malo, ikir'iliŋ!
Tiŋi dwondin malo paka gwara,
tuci ri ji paran reco pajo,
ri ot pa Yakobo reco pajo.
Kucel jorangan kisi ndelo,
aka josangala mito ŋeyo yo paran,
paŋini piny ma timo gim'otire,
aka jok'ojwango cik pa Were pajo.
Jokwayan thumo banja gi tiro,
aka josangala bino cegin gi Were.
Ji jopenjere ni, “Raŋo wariyo kec aka ikineni?
Raŋo wamwole, to Rwoth kiŋey?”
Neni, i ndelo ma wiriy'iye,
wirango gigipiny mewin ma siemo win,
aka widiyo jotic mewin je.
Neni, wiriyo to wicako dhaw gi gorok,
gi gorok g'adonde ma kidakana.
Nger riyo kec paka mewin i ndelo me,
k'omiy dwondi win winjirok malo.
Me a nger riyo kec m'ayero,
ndelo ma dhano ber womwoli'ye?
Ni obedo kulo wiy win piny paka dudi m'oriewere,
to wiruko kutiya to wibedo i buru?
Winolwoŋ gime ni obedo riyo kec,
gi ndelo ma yere ri Rwoth?
Me ka riyo kec ma Rwoth mito:
Kwanyo woko ngoye pa tiro,
gonyo jotwec,
weyo jom'idiyo bedo gi thwolo,
gi kwanyo woko bieto pajo?
gi rwako jacandi ma bu peco i ot mewin;
ka wineno jokinyoro, wiruk jo,
aka wikiri wikwer konyo wade mewin won?
Ameno nyaka lero mewin laliel paka ŋamba,
aka adhola mewin lacango piyo.
Jaboth mewin latelo yuwiy win,
aka dwoŋ pa Rwoth lagwoko win yucen.
Kenyo ka wikwayo, Rwoth ladwoko win,
wilaywak ri kony, aka go ladwoko ni, An e.
Ka wikwanyo woko okol i dier win,
cimirok gi lwet win, gi luwo gimarac,
Ka winomiy joma kec neko cemo,
to widewo kwoŋ joma nitie i litho,
nyaka lero mewin lawok i mudho,
to kumo mewin bedo paka odieceŋ.
Rwoth latelo win noknok,
to yeŋo mito mewin gi gigipiny mabeyo,
to loko cokin mewin matek.
Wilacale ndelo m'ikonj'iye pi,
paka waŋ pi,
ma pi mere kicwiy.
Gundin mewin macene ilageto kendo,
wilageto kendo kindi udi ma luse ma cango.
Ilalwoŋo win joyiki gim'otur,
joyiki royin m'ibed'iye.
Weyi win cayo Sabato,
to wiwire kwoŋ timo gima wimito i ndelo paran maleŋ,
lwoŋo win sabato ni kisangala,
to wimiyo ndelo pa Rwoth dwoŋ,
miy win dwoŋ, ma wikitimo gimewin won,
ma sangala win,
kosa widwaro siemirok, kosa wiluwo gima bukony.
Kenyo nyaka wilakisangala i Rwoth,
aka alamiyo win dwoŋ i piny,
alamiyo win silwany gi lowo m'amiyo kwari win Yakobo,
kole dhok Rwoth otieko luwo.
Neni, cingi Rwoth kicek ma kinyal botho,
kosa ithe k'ocule ma kinyal winjo.
To, obedo reco mewin,
ama poko win gi Were mewin,
aka omiyo go pano waŋe kwoŋ win,
aka kiwinji kwayo mewin.
Cingi win oduwere gi remo,
lwet win opoŋ reco,
dhok win luwo twodo,
aka lew win tuco kidakana.
Ongoye ŋata donjo i kapido g'adieri,
aka wiluwo twodo i kapido;
wigoŋere kwoŋ ywakirok ma twodo, joluwo twodo,
witimo can mewin ma miyo joman litho.
Jotoŋo tongi malasaŋ,
jowiyo od bumbu;
ŋata camo tongi jo je tho,
aka tongi jo m'oŋidhi toŋo malasaŋ.
To, od bumbu kinyal bedo rijo paka nanga;
ji jok'onyal um kodi gima jotimo.
Tim pajo obedo tim mareco,
aka tim mar'akaka ama ni cingi jo.
aka joredo oyo remo pa ji ma bubanja;
paro pajo obedo paro mareco,
joreyo ji aka joweyo gundin i ngudin pajo madongo.
Jokuya yo ma siem,
aka tiro ongoye i yo pajo.
Royin pajo ma jotimo okom,
aka ongoye ŋata woth i jo m'oŋeyo siem.
Riameno, tiro nitie bor gi wan,
aka tiro kitundi riwan,
wakuro lero, to neni, mudho ama nitie.
Wakuro piny wocoti, to wawotho i mudho.
Wamudamuda pa joma waŋ jo otho,
wacer odieceŋ par,
paŋini i hongo ma nyaka waŋceŋ podho,
aka i dier jomwamba wacale jom'otho.
Waŋur paka arara,
warembo paka akurin.
Wakuro tiro, to ongoye;
wakuro both, to nitie bor gi wan.
Kole reco mawan thoth ruwaŋin,
aka josegeya wan ruwaŋin.
Wapoŋ gi reco,
aka waŋeyo reco mawan.
Wagwenyere to wakwedere kwoŋ Rwoth,
aka wakwero luwo Were mawan.
Waluwo wac mar'adica gi ma gwenyirok,
waere gi wac ma twodo aka watuco jo wok iy'adundin mawan.
Tiro odwoki yucen,
aka ongoye gim'otire m'itimo.
Kole adieri ongoye i kapido,
aka genirok ongoye.
Adieri ongoye,
aka ŋata temo weyo gimarac lokere jabanja.
Munyo Rwoth oneno ni tiro ongoye,
go k'osangala.
ameno cingi go ma meni,
okelo rigo loyo aka obotho jo.
gi both paka junga i wiye,
to ruko nangin ma culo kwor,
to boyere i nge paŋini del m'itwere gine.
Cungo kwoŋ tim pajo go laculo jo;
keme pere ri jokwor pere, culo kwor ri jokwor pere,
go laculo kwor ri piny ma yuthengi nam.
Ameno ji ma yupodho ceŋ jolalworo nyingi Rwoth,
aka ji ma yuwok ceŋ jolamiyo go dwoŋ,
kole go labino paka malawa ma ule,
ma koyo pa Rwoth ama gweyo.
kodi ri nyikway Yakobo,
ma joŋuto reco pajo, Rwoth waco.

Aka ri an, Rwoth waco, me cikirok paran gi jo. Cuny paran nitie kwoŋ win, aka wac paran m'atieko ketho i dhok win kilaeye i dhok win, kosa i dhok nyithindho mewin, kosa dhok nyikway win, wok pama kadho yuwaŋe gi cil gi cil.
Ay, liel; Yerusalem, kole lero perin otieko bino,
aka dwoŋ pa Rwoth otieko liel kwoŋin.
Kole mudho laumo piny,
aka mudho m'opoto laumo ji,
to Rwoth layweyo ŋamba kwoŋin,
aka dwoŋ pere laneno kwoŋin.
Nonin jolabino i lero perin,
aka kerin jolabino i lero ma ŋamba perin.
Tiŋi waŋin malo iŋiy korin gi korin,
jo je jocokere kanyacel, jobino bongin,
wotin jolabino wok bor,
ilakideda nyikin i cingin.
Kenyo ilaneno t'ipoŋ gi kisangala,
cunyin lapoŋ mo to fore,
rupiri lim ma nam je ladwoko bongin,
lim pa nonin je ladwoko bongin.
Ŋamin kweth ma kikwanere jolaumin,
ŋamin ma nyaka joay ma Midian gi Efa,
gi ma jowok i Seba je jolabino.
Jolakelo zahabu kodi buban,
aka jolatuco pak pa Rwoth.
Ilacoko rin mwendi je ma Kedar,
wot rombo ma Nebayoth je ilamiyin paka cowirok,
alajolo jo i wi migam paran,
aka Rwoth lamiyo ot pere wobedi gi dwoŋ loyo.
Me jokune, ma joay paka pondeponde,
paka akurin ma jodok i od gin?
Kole piny ma yuthengi nam jolakuran,
mele ma Tarsis marapena,
ma lakelo wotin wok bor,
jolabedo gi feza gi zahabu pajo,
ma miyo nyingi Rwoth Were perin dwoŋ,
ri Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili,
rupiri go otieko miyin dwoŋ.
Rwoth waco ri Yerusalem ni,
“Jopath jolageto cel perin kendo,
aka kerin pajo jolatic rin.
Amiyo win gir'acula i keme paran,
to i mar paran, atieko timo gi win ŋono.
kilacego odieceŋ gi wor,
ŋey piny jowokeli rin lim pajo,
ka kerin pajo jotelo jo i woth.
Kole piny gi ker,
ma k'otiy rin jolakisika,
ilareyo woko kicutho.”
Dwoŋ pa Lebanon labino rin,
mbawin ma yen mabeyo,
ma geto Yerusalem kendo,
loko Kabedo Maleŋ paran maŋon,
aka alamiyo kabedo ma keth'iye tiendan dwoŋ.
jolabino bwonirok ruwaŋin,
aka jono ma jocayin,
jolaguro rin congi gin.
Jolalwoŋin Tindi madwoŋ pa Rwoth,
Zayon, tindi madwoŋ pa Were ma Leŋ pa Isiraili.
Makada nende oyido ajwangin aka adakin,
m'oyido ongoye moro je ma luwo kenyo,
alalokin madwoŋ aka maŋon cil gi cil,
gi kisangala wok i luse tundo i luse.
Iladhotho cak pa nonin,
iladhotho thundho pa kerin,
aka ibino ŋeyo ni An, Rwoth abedo Jaboth perin,
aka Jagony perin, Jameni pa Yakobo.
Alakelo rin zahabu i kabedo pa ywel,
alakelo rin feza i kabedo pa nyweny,
ywel, i kabedo pa mbawo,
nyweny i kabedo pa telin.
Jodhum mewin jokiladiyo win kendo;
alamiyo jo dhumo gi tiro kodi siem.
Akaka k'obedi kendo i lowo perin,
rerok gi kisika gigipiny langoye.
Wilalwoŋo kor udi mewin ni both,
waŋkace mewin ni pak.
kosa dwe wor;
to Rwoth, ama labedo lero perin ma cil gi cil;
aka Were perin labedo dwoŋ perin.
Ceŋ perin kilapodho,
aka dwe perin kilapodho;
kole Rwoth labedo lero perin cil gi cil,
aka ndelo perin ma ywak latundo i gike.
Ji perin je jolabedo jom'otire,
aka jolabedo gi lowo cil gi cil.
Jobedo kolo m'apidho, tic ma cingan,
ŋey anyal limo dwoŋ.
Ma sisiri kwoŋ jo, lalokere nono,
aka mathin loyo lalokere madwoŋ paka piny matek,
An abedo Rwoth,
i hongo mere, alamiyo gime wotimere piyo.
kwoŋbedo Rwoth owiran gi mo,
ooran kelo wac manyen maber ri ji m'idiyo,
yomo cuny joma cuny jo otur,
tito gonyirok pa joma jonitie i twec,
gi gonyo joma jotudere.
gi ndelo ma culo kwor pa Were mawan,
kodi yomo cuny ji je ma joywak.
Miyo ji ma joywak i Zayon,
kisangala gi forok i kabedo pa rem,
mo ma wir i kabedo pa ywak,
bujwenge ma pak i kabedo ma cuny manyap.
Kenyo nyaka wonyali lwoŋo jo ni olwa ka jotimo gim'otire,
ma Rwoth won am'opidho, ŋey wonyali miyo go dwoŋ.
Jolageto tindin madongo macene kendo,
jolatiŋo malo kam'oyido osika con,
jolayiko tindin madongo m'obedo gundin,
ma jorere i luse kweth.
Jopath jolatic riwin,
to jokwayo mwendi mewin,
jowiloka jolafur gi dhok mewin to jolwero lisik vini mewin.
To win, ilalwoŋo win ni jocway ri Were i wi migam pa Rwoth,
ilalwoŋo win ni ŋecin pa Were mawan,
wilawinjo cwe ma lim pa nonin man,
aka wilakwoto i ŋaŋo pajo.
I kabedo pa wickwot mewin, wilalimo lim mirundi ario,
i kabedo pa bwon, wilasiemere i lowo mewin won,
riameno i lowo mewin won, wilalimo lim mirundi ario,
kisangala mewin labedo cil gi cil.
Kole an Rwoth, amaro tiro,
adaki kwo gi timo gi komo;
alamiyo ji paran kemba iy'adieri,
aka alatimo gi jo cikirok ma cil gi cil.
Kisi nono laŋeyo nyikway jo,
aka ji jolaŋeyo nyithindho pajo.
Ji je ma joneno jolaŋeyo,
ni jobedo ji ma Rwoth otieko miyo silwany.
adundo paran gipi layodere i Were paran;
kole go otieko rukan gi law ma both,
go otieko uman gi kanzu ma tiro,
paka jamweha koda wiye sangaria,
paka mweha kikere gi thiwino pere.
Kole paka lowo miyo kodhi twi to dongo,
paka ndelo miyo gim'ocwoy'iye twi,
ameno apaka Rwoth Were lamiyo tiro gi pak
kitula ruwaŋ nonin je.
Ro Zayon, akilaliŋ,
akilaywomere ro Yerusalem;
cuka tiro pere oliel paka ŋamba,
aka both pere paka tala m'ocwiny maliel.
Nonin jolaneno tiro perin,
aka Kerin je jolaneno dwoŋ perin.
Ilalwoŋin gi nyingin manyen,
ma Rwoth lacwoko gi dhoke.
Ilabedo sangaria ma ŋono i cingi Rwoth,
gi sangaria ma keri i cingi Were perin.
Kilalwoŋin kendo ni m'ojwangi,
kosa lowo perin ni Gunda.
To ilalwoŋin ni Kisangala paran ni go,
gi lowo perin ni m'onywomere.
Kole Rwoth sangala kodin,
aka lowo perin lanywomo.
Kole paka jayac nywomo dhako mambula,
ameno apaka yac perin lanywomin.
Aka paka jamweha fore gi mweha pere,
ameno apaka Were perin lafore kodin.
Awi Yerusalem, aketho jokur,
i kor udi perin,
odieceŋ gipi gi wor gipi;
jokilaliŋ.
Jono ma jopoyo Rwoth,
jokiywomere.
Jokilaywomere,
cuka go ogeti Yerusalem,
to loko pak i piny.
Rwoth otieko kwoŋere gi cinge maracuc,
gi bade ma meni ni,
“Ak'omiy kendo ŋano mewin,
wobedi cemo ri jokwor mewin,
aka jokicar jokilamadho vini mewin,
ma witieko oyo rigo kwok.
To jono ma jopidho to jokeco jolacamo,
to jopako Rwoth.
Jono ma jopidho to jofono vini jolamedho,
i diedipo ma ot paran.”
Donji win, donji win gi waŋkace,
yik win yo ri ji;
geti win, geti win ngudo madwoŋ,
kwany win woko telin manitie i iye,
tiŋi win ranyuth ri ji.
Waci win ri nyar Zayon ni,
“Neni, both perin bino,
kemba pere nitie gi go,
kodi cul pere ruwaŋe.”
Aka ilalwoŋo jo ni ji maleŋ mapa Were,
ji ma Rwoth obotho,
aka ilalwoŋin ni m'odwar,
tindi madwoŋ ma k'ojwangi.
wok i tindi madwoŋ Bozra gi nanga m'ocido m'obokere?
Ŋa me m'orukere swa,
ŋanjo gi meni ma teko pere?
Obedo an, ma langa loyo pere,
aka nigi meni ma botho.
Raŋo kanzu perin obokere,
aka nangin perin cal nanga pa jadhiŋ vini?
aka ongoye ŋat'obino konyan.
Apor kwoŋ jo i nge paran,
aka anyono jo i keme paran,
remo pajo okire i nangin paran,
aka ocido kanzin paran.
Kole ndelo ma culo kwor oyido nitie iy'adundo paran,
aka oro paran ma both otieko bino.
adhier, to ngoye moro m'othielan,
ameno cingan won am'okelo ran loyo,
aka keme paran othielan.
Anyono ji piny i nge paran,
amero jo i keme paran,
aka akonjo remo ma kwo pajo piny.
Alaluwo kwoŋ tim ma mar pa Rwoth makiwire,
pak pa Rwoth,
cungo kwoŋ gimoro je ma Rwoth otieko miyo wan,
gi bero pere madwoŋ ri ot pa Isiraili
m'otieko miyo jo ro ŋono pere,
cungo kwoŋ mar pere mathoth makiwire.
Kole go owaco ni, adieri jobedo ji paran,
nyithindho ma jokinyal wondan,
to go lokere jaboth pajo.
I litho pajo je, go olimo litho,
to malaika pere botho jo.
I mar pere gi wor pere, go obotho jo,
otiŋo jo malo to rendo joje i hongo macene.
To jogwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth,
aka jomiyo cuny maleŋ pere nge.
Riameno go olokere jakwor pajo,
aka go won gipi olwenyo gi jo.
Nyaka to poyo hongo macon,
hongo pa Musa ŋeca pere.
Aka jopenjo ni, nikune Rwoth m'owodho,
jokwath rombo pere woko i nam?
Nikune go m'oketho i dier jo
cuny maleŋ pere?
kidho i cingi Musa maracuc,
poko pi i diere ruwaŋ jo,
ma timo rigo nyinge ma cil gi cil?
Ŋa m'otelo jo i lutho?
Paka kayina iy'opalipat,
jok'ocer.
Cuny pa Rwoth omiyo jo ywomirok,
paka dhok ma jodonjo i milelo.
Ameno apaka itelo ji perin,
ma miyo nyingin dwoŋ.
Ŋiy piny wok i polo, ineni,
wok i kabedo perin maleŋ aka didwoŋ.
Nikune kinen perin gi meni perin?
Mito mar'adundo perin gi wor perin
opanere kwoŋan.
Kole in a Bawan,
makada nende Abraham okuya wan,
aka Isiraili kiyey wan,
in, Awi Rwoth, ibedo Bawan,
jaboth mawan wok cango obedo nyingin.”
Awi Rwoth, raŋo imiyo warwenyo gi yo perin,
aka iridho adundin mawan matek, ma wakinyali lworin?
Dwoki, ro ŋecin perin,
nonin ma jobedo alunja perin.
Ji perin maleŋ jobedo i Kabedo Maleŋ perin ma hongo macek,
jokwor mawan jotieko nyono piny.
Watieko lokere jono ma fodi ikidhumo,
paka jono ma jokilwoŋere gi nyingin.
Kabed'iyec polo t'iloro piny,
ŋey gote jowonyal yengirok ruwaŋin,
paka mac cwinyo dudi,
gi paka mac miyo pi walo,
ma miyo nyingin ŋeyirok ri jokwor perin,
gi nonin kirin ruwaŋin.
iloro piny, gote joyengere ruwaŋin.
Wok cene ongoye ŋat'otieko winjo,
kosa m'otieko niaŋ gi ithe,
ongoye waŋ m'otieko neno Were man kwanyowoko in,
ma timo nger tim no ri jono ma jokuro go.
Ikonyo jono ma jotimo gim'otire gi kisangala,
jono ma jopoyin i yo perin je.
Neni, nge oyido omakin, to watimo reco;
watieko timo reco ma hongo malac,
aka wanobothi?
Wajoje watieko lokere ŋata koc,
aka tim mawan maber je cal okuto.
Wathwo paka boke,
aka reco mawan kudho wan, paka koyo.
Ongoye ŋata lwoŋo nyingin,
kosa ma temo goŋirok kwoŋin;
kole ipano riwan waŋin,
aka iolo wan i cingi reco mawan.
Kucel, Awi Rwoth, ibedo Bawan,
wabedo lowo nyamasiga, aka ibedo jacwec degi,
wajoje wabedo tic ma cingin.
Awi Rwoth, ikir'imaki nge tektek,
aka ikir'ipoy reco cil gi cil.
Neni, dew ni wajoje wabedo ji perin.
Tindin perin madongo maleŋ jotieko lokere thim,
Zayon olokere thim,
Yerusalem olokere gunda.
Ot mawan maleŋ aka ŋon,
kama kwarere mawan jopakin'iye,
owaŋ gi mac,
aka kabedo mawan je ma josiemo wan jolokere gundin.
Awi Rwoth, ka gigipiny me je timere, ik'opar kwoŋe?
Inoliŋaliŋa, t'imiyo wan gir'acula malith?
Oyido ayikere dwoko kwayo pa ji paran, to jok'okwayan.
Oyido ayikere jowonwaŋan, to jok'orangan.
Awaco ni an e, an e,
ri piny ma k'olwoŋo kada nyingan.
ri ji ma jogwenyere,
ma jowotho i yo ma kiber,
joluwo rieko pajo wegi.
Ji ma jomiyan nge,
ruwaŋan radhik,
jomiyo cowirok manyakafir i ndelin,
aka jowaŋo buban i wi matafalere.
Jobedo i dier kaliele,
aka jotero wor gipi i kabedo m'opondo;
jocamo riŋo mbiji,
aka jomadho kado dek ma riŋo makoc iy'ayigin pajo.
Jowaco ri joman ni,
“Wikiri wicore cegin gi wan!
Kole waleŋ swa ma kiber oyido wimul wan.”
Nger jono jocale yiro i uman,
mac maliel ndelo gipi.
Neni, gir'acula pajo ondiki i ruwaŋan,
akilaliŋ to alaculo jo,
gima rom gi reco pajo.
Reco pajo gi reco pa kwarere pajo.
Rwoth waco.
Jowaŋo buban ri cal makicar wi gote,
joluwo marac kwoŋan,
ameno alamiyo jo,
gir'acula je ri tim pajo.
Me apaka Rwoth waco,
paka vini inwaŋo i kayego,
aka jowaco ni, “Ikir'irey woko,
kole nitie silwany i iye.”
Ameno apaka alatimo ro ŋecin paran,
ak'orey woko joje.
Alayero nyikway Yakobo,
aka nyikway Yuda jolalunjo gote paran.
Ji paran m'ayero jolalunjo, aka ŋecin paran jolabedo kenyo.
aka milelin ma Akor kaywomirok ri dhok,
ri ji paran ma jorangan.
To win, ma wijwango Rwoth,
ma wiy win wil gi got paran maleŋ,
aka wijengo meza ri Gad gi Meni,
werin ma silwany gi lifol,
to wipoŋo kikopere ma vini m'oruw.
Silwany maber mewin labedo,
tho malith g'abor,
kwoŋbedo munyo alwoŋo, wikidwoko,
munyo aluwo, wikiwinjo,
to witimo gimarac ruwaŋan,
wiyero gima kisangala an.
Riameno me apaka Rwoth Were waco,
ŋecin paran jolacemo,
to kec laneko win,
ŋecin paran jolabedo gi gir'amadha,
to riyo laneko win,
ŋecin paran jolafore,
to wilabedo giwickwot.
Ŋecin paran jolawero ri kisangala ma cuny jo,
to wilaywak ro arama cuny,
aka wilaywak gi cuny win m'otur.
Ŋecin paran jolaoro nyingi win ma kwoŋo,
aka an, Rwoth Were alaneko win,
t'amiyo ŋecin paran nyingi jo man.
Kenyo kisi ŋata kwayo silwany i lowo,
lakwayo gi Were ma timo adieri,
aka kisi ŋata timo cikirok i lowo,
latimo gi Were ma timo adieri,
kwoŋbedo teko macon larumo aka kilapoyo.
gi piny manyen,
k'opoy gigipiny macon,
kosa k'opar kwoŋe.
To sangala win aka fore win cil gi cil,
i gim'acweyo;
kole neni, acweyo Yerusalem lapoŋ forok,
aka ji mere jolabedo kisangala.
t'asangala i ji paran;
derino ma ywak k'owinjere kendo i iye,
kosa ywak ma litho.
Ongoye nyathi ma latho ma fodi ŋic,
kisi dhano lakwo kiri i tiyo.
Ŋat'otho munyo jaoro miya acel ilawaco ni oyido fodi soye,
aka ŋat'otho mafodi k'otundo oro miya acel ilawaco ni olam go.
Ji jolageto udi to wegi jobed'iye,
jolapidho ndelo vini to jocamo olemo mere.
Jokilageto udi to joman ama jonind'iye,
jokilapidho ndelo vini to joman ama jocamo.
Ji paran jolakwo to joti paka yen,
aka ayera paran jolawinjo cwe ma hongo malac ma tic ma cingi jo.
Jokilatiyo manono,
kosa nywol nyithindho to jolimo teko,
Rwoth lamiyo nyithindho pajo,
kodi nyikway jo silwany.
Kiri mafodi jok'olwoŋan, aladwoko jo,
mafodi jok'ocowo luwo alawinjo.
simbwor lacamo kanja paka dhok,
to cemo pa thwol labedo fukefuke!
Jok'omiy litho kosa reyo,
wi got paran maleŋ je,
Rwoth waco.
polo obedo kom ma dhum paran,
aka piny obedo kama aketh'iye tiendan.
Nger ot aŋo ma winyalo geto ran,
aka kune m'anyalo ywomirok'iye?
An, aŋat'acweyo gigipiny me gi cingan,
aka je jobedo aparan,
Rwoth waco.
To me a ŋat'aladwaro,
ŋata mwole aka bwonere i cuny
ma kirin i wac paran.
Ŋata thumo mirikwa cale gi ŋata neko dhano,
ŋata ma miyo cowirok ma rombo, cale gi ŋata turo ŋuti gwok,
ŋata miyo mic ma cemo manyinge, cale gi ŋata miyo cowirok ma remo mbiji;
ŋata timo mic ma rapoy ma buban, cale ŋata miyo cal makicar silwany.
Jome joyero yo pajo wegi, aka cuny gin siemere i mienirok pajo.
An bende ayero miyo jo litho,
gi kelo kwoŋ jo gima jolworo;
kwoŋbedo munyo alwoŋo, ongoye ŋat'odwoko,
munyo aluwo, ongoye ŋat'owinjo;
to jotimo gimarac ruwaŋan to joyero gima kisangala an.
Winji win wac pa Rwoth,
win ma wikirin i wac pere.
Wutmin win ma jodak win,
aka jobolo win woko ro nyingan,
jowaco ni, “Weyi Rwoth omiy dwoŋ,
ŋey wanyal neno kisangala perin”
To jo am'ila ketho jo i wickwot.
Winji, koko nitie i tindi madwoŋ,
derino wok i Ot pa Were!
Dwondi Rwoth,
miyo jokwor pere gir'acula!
to go nywol;
ma fodi litho ma nywol k'obino kwoŋe,
ocol go to nywolo wode.
Ŋa m'otieko winjo nger gino?
Ŋa m'otieko neno nger gino?
Piny bende nywole i ndelo acel?
Nono bende nywole i hongo manok?
Kole tekin ŋedi cako ramo Zayon, to nywolo wote.
Anyalo kelo ji paran dhu nywol,
t'akwero colo jowonywolere?
Rwoth waco;
an ma miyo jo nywol, anocegi ici?
Were waco.
Fore win gi Yerusalem, sangala win gi go,
wijoje ma wimaro go,
Fore win gi go pama,
wijoje m'oyido wiywak rigo.
Go lapido win to yomo cuny win,
paka yok win,
cuka wiyeŋ.
Wilakisangala gi dwoŋ pere.
Kole me apaka Rwoth waco,
Alacoro ri Yerusalem silwany paka malawa,
gi lim ma piny man paka jwom ma mol.
Zayon lapido win,
larendo win i tiende.
Paka yok nyathi yomo cuny nyathi pere,
ameno apaka alayomo cuny win i Yerusalem.
Wilaneno gime timere, aka cuny win lafore;
lamiyo win bedo matek gi kwo maber.
Aka wilaŋeyo ni Rwoth, konyo jono ma jowinjo go,
aka nyutho jokwor pere nge.
Kole Rwoth labino gi mac,
gi cawilin pere ma cal asur,
go lamiyo jokwor pere,
gir'acula gi mac.
Kole Rwoth lakelo tiro g'abor pere,
go laneko ji kweth ma jonwaŋere ni jobanja
aka ji kweth jolatho.
Rwoth waco, gike cegin ri jono ma jolonyo kwo pajo ri lamo cal makicar i ndelin, jocamo riŋo mbiji g'oyeyo kodi cemo man ma kicam.
Kole aŋeyo tim pajo gi paro pajo, aka abino coko ji ma joluwo dhodhok m'opokere opokere gi nonin nyutho jo dwoŋ paran.

Alaketho ranyuth i dier jo. Wok kwoŋ jo alaoro ji ma joboth i piny kweth, Tarsis, Libia, gi Lidia ma jo oro asere gi kwote, Tubal, Javan gi piny ma yuthengi nam, mafodi jok'owinjo ŋeyirok kosa neno dwoŋ paran; aka jolatuco kamaler dwoŋ paran i dier nonin.

Jolakelo wade perin je wok i piny man paka mic ri Rwoth, i wi kayinin gi cawilin, i ywel kodi i nyithindhi kayina, i wi ŋamia, to jotero wi got paran i Yerusalem, paka Joisiraili jokelo mic ma cemo manyinge iy'atawo m'olony i Ot pa Rwoth.
Megi kwoŋ jo alatero loko jocway ri Were i wi migam aka joman loko Jolevi, Rwoth waco.
Paka polo manyen, gi piny manyen,
m'abino timo,
joladoŋ ruwaŋan,
ameno apaka nyikway win gi nyingi win ladoŋ.
I kisi kalima ma dwe manyen,
gi kisi ndelo ma Sabato,
ji ma kisi piny, jolabino lamo ruwaŋan ka i Yerusalem,
Rwoth waco.
Kitawo me mako kwoŋ gima Yeremia wod pa Hilikia owaco, acel kwoŋ jocway ri Were i wi migam ma tindi ma Anathoth iy'adec pa Benyamin.
Rwoth oluwo gi Yeremia i oro mar'apar g'adek ma dhum pa Yosia wod pa Amon, kere ma Yuda.

Rwoth oluwo gine kendo munyo wod pa Yosia m'ilwoŋo ni Yehoyakim oyido obedo kere ma Yuda, tundo i gike ma oro mar'apar g'acel ma dhum pa Zedekia wod pa Yosia. I dwe mar'abic ma oro no ji ma Yerusalem oter jo i piny pa Jopath.
Rwoth owaco ran ni,
“Mafodi akicweyin i ici, aŋeyin, aka mafodi k'onywolin ayerin ni ibedi jatuci wac Were ri nonin.”
T'adwoko ni, “Awi Rwoth Were, kole akuya luwo fodi abedo soye.”
To Rwoth waco ran ni, “Ikir'iwaci ni fodi ibedo soye, to kadhi bongi ji m'aorin bongi jo, aka iwaci rijo kisi gimoro je m'aorin waco.
Ikir'ilwor jo, rupiri alabedo kodin ma kikwonga in,” Rwoth ama luwo.
Rwoth otelo cinge, ogeyo dhokan, to waco ran ni, “Eno atieko ketho wac paran i dhokin.
Konon amiyin meni kwoŋ nonin kodi kerin ma fudho gi turo piny, ma reyo gi kikengila, ma geto kodi pidho.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran to penjan ni, “Yeremia ineno aŋo?” Adwoko ni, “Jangi yath mapera.”
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Itire, aka onyo akuro neno ni wac paran otundo i kare.”
To Rwoth waco ran ni, “Rerok kidho walo wok yumalo kwoŋ ji je ma jobedo i lowo me,
rupiri alwoŋo nonin ma yumalo.” Apaka Rwoth waco. “Jolabino to jojengo adhumbe pajo i waŋkace ma Yerusalem kodi i kor udi mere thoko, kodi thoko tindin madongo ma Yuda je.
Alamiyo ji paran gir'acula rupiri jotieko timo reco; jotieko jwangan, aka jotieko miyo cowirok ri werin man, jotieko timo cal to jolamo tic ma cingi jo.
Tweyi pierin, Yeremia; kidhi iwaci rijo kisi gimoro je m'aorin waco. Ikir'ilwor jo, rupiri anyalo lokin malwor ruwaŋ jo.
An konon alokin paka tindi madwoŋ m'otinda, siro ma nyweny, gi kor ot ma ywel, i wi lowo je, ri kerin ma Yuda, jotel mere, jocway ri Were mere, kodi ji ma piny.
Jolalweny kodin; to jok'onyalin, rupiri anitie kodin, Rwoth ama luwo, go ma bothin.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni:
Kidhi ititi mikwenda me ri kisi dhano ma Yerusalem. Me apaka Rwoth waco:
“Apoyo cikirok perin ma mar munyo fodi i soye,
mar perin paka mweha,
nger m'iluwan iye i thim,
i lowo m'oyido fodi k'ocwoy'iye.
Isiraili oyido obedo gimaleŋ ri Rwoth,
ranyak marapena ma keco pere.
Jono je ma jocuto go jobedo gi banja;
aka teko oyimere kwoŋ jo.”
Winji win mikwenda pa Rwoth, win nyikway Yakobo, kodi pecin je ma ot pa Isiraili.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
“Gimarac aŋo ma kwarere pajo jonwaŋo kwoŋan,
ma jokadho bor kwoŋan,
to jokidho ri gigipiny ma pilok, to wegi jolokere gipilok?”
Jok'openjere ni, “Nikune Rwoth,
m'owodho wan wok i piny Misir,
go m'otelo i thim,
i piny m'obipere, m'opalipat kodi buce,
i piny m'othwo kodi mudho m'opoto,
i piny m'ongoye ŋata luw'iye,
kam'ongoye ŋata bed'iye?”
Akelo win i piny m'oŋaŋ
ni wicam ranyak mere kodi gigipiny mere mabeyo.
To munyo widonjo wikoco lowo paran,
to wiloko alunja paran gir'amien.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam jok'openjo ni, “Nikune Rwoth?”
Jono ma jokuro cik jok'oŋeyan;
jokwath jogwenyere kwoŋan;
jotuci wac Were joluwo kwoŋ Bal ayino,
to jodwaro gigipiny ma bu magowa.
Riameno asegeya win kendo,
Rwoth ama luwo,
aka asegeya nyikway win.
Ŋadi win i thengi nam ma Sipro aka winen.
Dhiri win ji i Kedar aka wikaŋasa maber swa;
neni win k'inen gima pameno oyido otieko bedo.
Nono moro otieko wilo werin pere,
kada nende bedi ni jok'obedo werin?
To ji paran jotieko wilo dwoŋ pajo
ri gimoro ma kikel magowa.
Dhier win, awi polo, kwoŋ gime,
bwoki, aka wijwangere makicutho,
Rwoth waco.
Kole ji paran jotieko timo reco ario:
Jojwangan,
waŋ pi ma pi ma kwo,
to jokunyo kacoko pi rijo wegi,
kacoko pi m'obare
ma kinyal tiŋo pi.
Isiraili obedo ŋeca?
Onyo raŋo olokere gim'onyaga?
Nyithindhi simbwore jotieko kiuja kwoŋe,
jotieko kiuja malo.
Jotieko loko lowo pere opalipat,
tindin mere madongo olokere gundin, m'ongoye joma bed'iye.
Medo kwoŋ meno, ji ma Mefis kodi Tapanihes
jotieko turo woko kahanga wiye.
Isiraili, iwon ikitieko kelo kwoŋin gime
ro jwango Rwoth Were perin,
hongo ma go otelin iye i yo?
Onyo riameno ilimo magowa aŋo gi kidho i Misir,
madho pi ma Nayil?
Kosa ilimo magowa aŋo gi kidho Asiria,
madho pi ma Yufrete?
Kidakana perin lamiyin gir'acula,
aka kwedirok perin kwoŋan lathumo rin banja.
Ilaŋeyo t'ineno ni obedo gimarac aka kec
ri in jwango Rwoth Were perin;
ikilworan,
Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny waco.
Rwoth Were waco ni,
“Isiraili, cango con ikwero meni paran
t'ikwero woran gi laman
t'iwaco ni, ‘Ak'otim, alatimo kibenga ayin’.
I wi kisi tendere m'oŋawere je,
kodi i tiendi yath manyaboke pendi je,
iwaya i iye t'inindo kodin paka malaya.
Kucel apidho in paka yath vini m'ayero
wok kwoŋ kodhi maber loyo.
To doko iwire nedi t'inyekere
t'ilokere yath vini makicar?
Kad'ilwokere gi soda
t'ioro sabun kweth,
cilo mareco perin fodi nitie ruwaŋan,”
Rwoth Were waco.
Inyalo waco nedi ni, “Fodi akikocere,
fodi akikidho ri Bal.”
Neni royo perin i milelo;
ŋey gim'itieko timo.
Icale pa nyathi ŋamia ma nyaka ay ma dwir
ma ŋweco malo gicen.
Icale punda madhako ma mito ringo gi ma wode yuthim,
i lietho pere ŋweyo koyo!
Ŋa manyalo geŋo awanya pere?
Ongoye jono ma jodwaro go ma joripo locirok;
jolanwaŋo go i dwe pere.
Isiraili ikir'imiy par tiendin woyure i kisia mewin
kodi dwondin winjo riyo.
T'iwaco ni, “Obedo gim'ongoye geno,
rupiri atieko mito werin makicar,
aka alaluwo jo.”
Paka jakwo wiye kwot k'omaki,
ameno apaka wiy Joisiraili bino kwot.
Jo, kerin pajo, jotel pajo,
jocway ri Were i wi migam pajo kodi jotuci wac Were pajo,
ma jowaco ri yath ni, “Ibedo bawan.”
Kodi ri tele ni, “Iŋat'inywolan.”
Kole jotieko wiro ran ŋey jo,
makiweno waŋ jo.
To i hongo ma teko pajo jowaco ni,
“Biye both wan!”
To nikune werin mewin
ma witimo ma konyo win?
Weyi jowobin, ka jonyalo botho win,
i hongo mewin ma teko;
kole winitie gi werin kweth
paka winitie gi tindin madongo, awi Yuda.
Raŋo wiŋunyaŋunya kodan?
Wijoje witieko gwenyere kwoŋan.
Atieko rwadho nyithindho mewin piny;
jokwero winjo fonji.
Abor mewin wegi ocamo woko jotuci wac were mewin
paka simbwor ma reyo woko jo.
Win, Joisiraili, par win kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth!
Oyido abedo thim ri Isiraili,
kosa piny ma mudho m'opoto?
Raŋo onyo ji paran jowaco ni, “Wanitie gi thwolo,
wak'odwoki bongin kendo?”
Wiy nyako nyalo wil gi pogo pere,
kosa wiy mweha wil gi ruk pere?
Kucel wiy ji paran owil kodan,
ma hongo malac.
Nga wiŋeyo timo can
ma dwaro jomitirok mewin!
Ameno kiri ri mon ma jodakana
witieko fonjo jo kula mewin.
Bende i wi rinda mewin nitie
remo ma kwo pa jocandi ma bukony,
kada wimako jo munyo joturo udi.
Kucel gi gigipiny me je
wiwaco ni, “Ongoye gima watimo marac,
adieri nge pere owire woko kwoŋan.”
Pama onyo akidho thumo riwin banja
ma waco ni, “Wakitimo gimarac.”
Raŋo witero gigipiny gi sewo?
Wiwiro kula mewin!
Wilakwotere wic gi Misir,
paka okwot wiy win gi Asiria.
Wok kenyo bende wilakadho,
i rem madwoŋ;
kole An Rwoth otieko kwero woko jono ma wigeno,
aka wik'olim gimoro luwo kwoŋ jo.
Ka jal moro oriemo cege
to dheno weyo go
to lokere cipa ŋatiman,
jalo nyalo gik bonge?
Nger lowo no kinyal kocirok kicutho?
Itieko nindo gi cwo kweth;
onyo iparo ni inyalo dwoko bongan?
Rwoth waco.
Tiŋi waŋin ineni tendere manitie nono!
Kune ma fodi k'onind'iye kodin?
Itieko bedo i thengi royin kuro jomitirok perin,
rijo itieko cal Jamwarabu i thim.
Itieko koco piny
gi malaya perin kodi kidakana perin.
Riameno ogeŋo koth k'ocwe,
aka koth ma cwir fodi k'obino.
Kucel icale malaya,
ingoye giwickwot.
Nyaka ikiwok lwoŋan pama won me,
“Awi baba paran, imaran wok i soye paran.
Go obedi gi nge cil gi cil,
cuny go oŋedhere kiri i gike?”
Me apaka itieko luwo,
to itieko timo gimarac moro je m'inyalo.
Aka aparo ni, Ka go oyido otieko timo gigipiny me je go lagik bongan; to go k'ogiki, aka nyamin go Yuda ma jabanirok oneno gino.
Yuda oneno ni ariemo woko Isiraili t'adhiro go bor rupiri go oyido oweyan aka go oyido olokere malaya. To Yuda nyamin go ma jabanirok k'olworo. Go bende olokere malaya
aka wiye k'okwoti kada mathi. Go okoco piny, to go timo cot gi lamo telin kodi yen.
Aka munyo gigipiny me je otieko rumo, Yuda, nyamin Isiraili ma jabanirok, nyaka to rendere ni gik bongan; oyido kitim gir'adieri.”
Rwoth waco.
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ran ama: Isiraili ma kigenere otieko nyutho ni go jabanja manok loyo Yuda ma jabanirok.
Kidhi ititi wac me yuthenge ma yumalo, aka iwaci ni:
“Gik, awi Isiraili ma kigenere.”
Rwoth waco.
Ak'onenin gi nge,
rupiri abedo jawor.
Rwoth waco.
Akilamako nge cil gi cil.
Yey banja perin kende,
ni igwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth Were perin,
t'ikedho silwany perin i dier jokicar i tiendi yath moro je manyaboke pendi,
t'ikwero winjo dwondan.
Rwoth waco.
Dwoki win, awi nyithindho ma jobanirok.
Rwoth waco.
Rupiri abedo jadwoŋ mewin.
Alakwanyo win, acel wok i tindi madwoŋ kodi ario wok i nono,
aka alakelo win i Zayon.
Alamiyo win jokwath ma kacunyan, ma jolapidho win gi ŋeyo kodi niaŋ.
Aka ka witieko nywol to winyay i piny, i hongo no, Rwoth waco, doko jok'owaci kendo ni, “Kakan ma Cikirok pa Rwoth.” K'obin i paro, k'opoy, k'okeŋ; kosa k'otimi man kendo.
I hongo no ilalwoŋo Yerusalem ni kom pa Rwoth, aka nonin je jolacokere iye, i nyingi Rwoth i Yerusalem, aka gi wictek pajo jok'otimi kendo gimarac ma wegi joyero.
I hongo no Joyuda jolariwere kodi Joisiraili, aka kanyacel jolabino wok i piny ma yumalo i lowo ma cango amiyo kwarere mewin mar'alunja.
Rwoth waco ni,
“Isiraili, oyido amito jolo win paka nyithindho paran,
t'amiyo win lowo ma sangala win,
gir'alunja maŋon loyo ma nonin je.
Aka oyido aparo ni winyalo lwoŋan ni baba,
to wikwero weyan.
Kucel, paka dhako ma jabanirok ma weyo cwore,
ameno apaka wibanere ran, awi Joisiraili.
Dwondi winjere i wi tendere ma ninono,
ywak kodi pido pa nyithindho ma Isiraili,
rupiri jotieko rwenyo royo pajo;
wiy jo owil gi Rwoth Were pajo.
Dwoki win, awi nyithindho ma jobanirok,
alacango banirok mewin.”
E wabino bongin;
kole ibedo Rwoth Were mawan.
Adieri tendere jobedo gima wondo jo,
yengirok wi gote.
Adieri i Rwoth Were,
ama nitie iye both pa Isiraili.
To wok i soye mawan giwickwot otieko reyo woko gimoro je ma kwarere mawan jocwer'iye kwok, mwendi pajo gi dhok pajo, wot jo gi nyiki jo.

Weyi waŋare piny i wickwot, aka weyi wickwot mawan woumi wan; rupiri watieko timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth Were mawan, wan kodi kwarere mawan, wok i soye mawan tundo gunyo ni, aka fodi wakiworo dwondi Rwoth Were mawan.
Ka winodwoki, awi Isiraili,
Rwoth waco.
Ka widwoko bongan,
ka winokwany woko amien mewin ruwaŋan,
to wibedo ma wikitangatanga,
to wikwoŋere ni, “Paka Rwoth kwo!”
Iy'adieri, i tiro, kodi i genirok,
nyaka nonin jobino limo silwany i go,
aka jobino noro i go.
“Fur win lowo mewin ma k'ofuri,
aka wikiri wicwoy i kudhin.
Kuri win cikirok mewin kodan, Rwoth mewin,
aka wimiyere ran,
win ji ma Yuda gi Yerusalem.
Kakameno, keme paran bino icere paka mac,
to liel m'ongoye ŋat'oneki,
kwoŋbedo tim mareco mewin.”
Langa i Yuda, aka ituci i Yerusalem, aka iwaci ni:
“Kudhi gwara i piny;
koki malo aka iwaci ni,
‘Cokere win kanyacel, aka weyi wakadhi win
i tindin madongo m'ogoy'iye cel!’”
Tiŋi win bendera i wi gute yu Zayon,
ŋwec win wipondi, wikiri wigal,
kole akidho kelo gimarac wok yumalo,
kodi rerok madwoŋ.
Simbwor otieko wok i kapondo pere,
jarey nonin otieko wok woko;
otieko wok woko wok i kabedo pere
ma reyo woko piny;
tindin mewin madongo ma Yuda joladoŋ gundin
m'ongoye ŋat'obed'iye.
Kwoŋbedo gime, ruki win kutiya,
ywak win aka wibiy pigi waŋ win,
kole nge pa Rwoth mager
fodi k'oweyo wan.
I ndelo no, Rwoth waco, miseni bino loyo kere kodi jotel; jocway ri Were i wi migam jolabwok to jotuci wac Were jodhier.
Kenyo t'awaco ni, “A, Rwoth Were, nga itieko wondo ji me kodi Yerusalem, k'iwaco ni, ‘Gigipiny lakadho maber gi win.’ Makada nende abor otieko tundo i dwondi jo!”
I hongo no ibino waco ri ji me kodi Yerusalem ni: “Koyo malieth wok i wi tendere i thim kidho yu bongi ji paran ma jocandi, ki ma yeko kosa cido woko,
Koyo manitie gi meni ri gino. Onyo obedo an ma luwo i thumo banja kwoŋ jo.”
Neni! Go eno bino paka pondeponde,
cawilin pere jocale asur;
punde pere jodwir loyo ango,
Kidamba riwan, kole warere woko!
Awi Yerusalem, lwoki adundo perin wolony kwoŋ kidakana,
ŋey inyal both.
Paro ma cunyin marac odoŋ kiri keraŋo?
Kole dwondi tito wok i Dan,
aka tuco teko wok i piny matendere tendere Efrayim.
Waci ri nonin, “E jonitie ka!”
Tuci kwoŋ Yerusalem,
Joma thokin jowok i piny mabor.
Jokoko kwoŋ tindin madongo ma Yuda.
Joriko go paka joma kuro ndelo,
kwoŋbedo go otieko gwenyirok kwoŋan,
Rwoth waco.
Kula perin gi tim perin,
am'okelo gime kwoŋin.
Me obedo rerok perin; kec marom nedi!
Otieko tundo iy'adundo perin.
Litho paran, litho paran! Adwanyere i litho!
Awi, gima umo adundo paran!
Cunyan gore swa;
akinyali liŋ;
rupiri awinjo derino ma gwara,
gwara ma lweny.
Rerok ma luwere aluwa,
piny gibe odoŋ gunda.
Kayindere paran jorere abwap,
nangin paran ma geŋirok joyec mathindho thindho.
Anonen gute m'otiŋo bendera kiri keraŋo,
t'awinjo derino ma gwara?
Kole ji paran jomiŋ,
jokuya an;
jobedo nyithindho mamiŋ,
jongoye gi niaŋ.
Jonitie gi ndijo ma timo reco ayin,
to jokuya nger ma timo bero.
Awiro waŋan t'aneno piny,
oyido obedo gunda,
aka oyido nitie nono;
t'aneno polo, aka oyido lero ongoye.
Awiro waŋan t'aneno gote, aka oyido joyengere,
aka tendere je jodhire amalo g'acen.
Awiro waŋan t'aneno,
oyido ongoye dhano kad'acel,
aka winyin je ma malo oyido joringo woko.
Awiro waŋan t'aneno, piny m'oyido nyak
olemo oyido otieko lokirok thim,
aka tindin mere madongo je oyido jotieko lokere gundin
ruwaŋ Rwoth, ruwaŋ nge pere mager.
Kole Rwoth Were waco ama:
Piny gibe ladoŋ m'ojwangere,
kucel ak'orey woko kicutho.
Kwoŋbedo gime, piny bino ywak,
aka polo malo lalokere macol;
kole atieko luwo, atieko timo atoŋa;
Ak'odoki keme paran cen kosa ak'owire.
Ka jagwey punda kodi jabay asere jogoy dwondi jo
kisi tindi laŋwec;
joladonj'iye; jolaidho malo i dier telin;
ojwangi tindin je,
aka ongoye dhano ma bedo i jo.
Aka in, awi ŋat'ojwangi,
onyo inyutho aŋo ni iruko nanga m'obokere,
ni ijaŋo kwoŋin thiwino ma zahabu,
ni ireyo waŋin gi rangi?
Ipile ni ilokere maŋon.
Jomitirok perin jobwonin;
jodwaro kwo perin.
Kole awinjo ywak,
ma cale gi ywak pa dhako ma ŋedi ramo,
pa litho pa dhako manywolo nyathi pere makayo.
Ywak pa Yerusalem ka dwanyere ri luya,
yaro cinge aka waco ni,
“Kidamba ran! Cunyan gore ruwaŋ jonek paran!”
Ji ma Yerusalem, ŋwec win malo gicen, ŋwec win i royin mewin,
aka mondo neni win kor gi korin aka wipar kwoŋe!
Woth win i katale mere je
winen ka inyalo nwaŋo dhano acel
ma timo gim'otire
aka dwaro tiro
ŋey anyal cwako Yerusalem.
Kada jowaco ni, “Paka Rwoth kwo.”
Kucel jokwoŋere ma twodo.
Awi Rwoth, waŋin kinen adieri?
Itieko rwadho piny jo,
to jok'owinjo litho;
itieko neko jo,
to jok'owinjo fonji.
Jotieko loko waŋ jo matek loyo tele;
jokwero ŋuto.
Kenyo t'awaco ni, “Me obedo nyaka jocandi,
jongoye gi niaŋ;
kole jokuya royo pa Rwoth,
cik pa Were pajo.
Weyi akidhi ri jomadongo
aka aluw gi jo;
adieri joŋeyo royo pa Rwoth,
cik pa Were pajo.”
To jo bende oyido jotieko turo majogi,
oyido jotieko yeco woko gima riwo wan.
Riameno simbwor ma wok i lul bino neko jo,
arara ma wok i thim bino reyo woko jo.
Kwac waya i tindin pajo madongo;
kisi ŋat'owok woko moro je ibino yeco mathindho thindho
rupiri kibenga pajo thoth,
aka jotieko jwango Were pajo dikweth.
Anyalo cwako win nedi?
Nyithindho mewin jotieko jwangan,
aka jotieko kwoŋere gi nyingi jono ma jok'obedo werin.
Munyo apidho jo to joyeŋ,
jotimo cot,
jokadho i udi pa malayin.
Oyido jocale gi kayinin m'opidhi maber ma jonyacwo,
kisi acel nyacwo mako ri cipa nyawote.
Ak'omiy jo gir'acula ri gigipiny me?
Rwoth penjo;
ak'ocul kwor kwoŋ nger nono me?
Woth i bibiro ma ndelo vini pere aka irey woko go,
t'ikir'irey woko kicutho;
jaki woko jange,
rupiri jok'obedo apa Rwoth.
Kole Joisiraili kodi Joyuda
jotieko banere ran swa,
Rwoth waco.
Jotieko luwo gima k'obedo adieri kwoŋ Rwoth,
aka jotieko waco ni, “Go k'otimi gimoro.”
Ongoye gimarac ma lapodho kwoŋ wan,
aka wakibino neno litho kosa kec.
Jotuci wac Were jok'obedo gimoro to koyo ayin,
rupiri wac ongoye i jo.
Ameno apaka ibino timo rijo!
Riameno Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
Rupiri jotieko luwo wac me,
onyo akidho loko wac ma dhokin wocale mac,
t'aloko ji me paka yen, aka mac lareyo woko jo.
Akidho kelo kwoŋ win,
nono ma wok bor, awi Joisiraili.
Obedo nono ma jociro,
obedo nono macene,
nono ma wikuya dhodhok pajo,
ma wikinyal niaŋ gima jowaco.
Mikoro pajo cale kaliel m'oŋamere,
joje jocale jolweny apondi ma jomeni.
Jobino camo ranyak mewin kodi cemo mewin;
jolacamo wot win gi nyiki win.
Jolacamo mwendi mewin gi dhok mewin;
jobino camo olemo mewin kodi nyandere mewin.
Jobino reyo g'abor
tindin mewin madongo m'ogoy'iye cel ma wigeno.
To kada i hongo no, Rwoth waco, “Ak'orey win kicutho.”

Ka ji mewin jopenji ni, “Raŋo Rwoth Were mawan otimo gigipiny me je riwan?” Wibino dwoko jo ni, “Paka witieko jwangan to witiyo ri werin makicar i piny mewin, ameno wilatic ri jopath i piny ma k'obedo mewin.”
Langa gime i ot pa Yakobo,
tuci i Yuda:
winitie gi waŋ win, to wikinen,
winitie gi ithi win, to wikiwinji wac.
Wikikirin ruwaŋan?
Aketho kwoyo paka kew ri nam,
rageŋ ma cil gi cil ma go kinyal luwo;
kad'asur ma nam tem yengo, kinyal loyo gi meni,
kada jomoor, jokinyal ŋado.
To ji me wiy gin tek; jonitie g'adundo ma gwenyirok;
jotieko wire githenge to jokadho.
Jokiwaci i cuny jo ni,
“Mondo weyi win walwor Rwoth Were mawan,
go m'amiyo koth i hongo mere ma ripo,
koth ma oro kodi ma cwir,
aka kuro riwan i hongo mere
ndelin m'oyik ma keco i hongo mere.”
Reco mewin dhiro gigipiny me gicen,
aka reco mewin thwono win gimaber.
Kole jokidakana jonitie i dier ji paran;
jomayo ji gigipiny pajo.
Jocale jociko ma jociko bwo;
to jomako ji.
Paka kilara m'opoŋ'iye winyin,
ameno apaka udi pajo opoŋ gi gigipiny m'onyaga.
Riameno onyo jolokere jomadongo gi joŋaŋo.
Jocwe aka jofoth.
Jodakana ma kiwacere;
jokithum banja gi tiro
yuthenge pa nyathi kic, wonyali kadho maber,
aka jokithiel tiro ma mako joma bukony.
“Ak'omiy jo gir'acula ri gigipiny me?”
Rwoth penjo.
“Ak'ocul kwor kwoŋ nono ma cale me?
Gimarac gi gima kiwacere
otieko timirok i piny:
Jotuci wac Were jotuco wac ma twodo,
aka jocway ri Were i wi migam joluwo gima jotuci wac Were jowaco rijo.
Ji paran jomito wobedi ameno,
to winotim nedi ka gike otundo?”
Ŋwec wipondi, awi ji pa Benyamin,
wok win i dier Yerusalem!
Kudhi win gwara i Tekowa,
aka witiŋ malo ranyuth i wi Beth Hakerem;
kole teko bino wok yumalo,
kodi rerok madwoŋ.
Atieko kipima Yerusalem
kodi lum maŋon tektek.
Jokwath jolakelo mwendi pajo iye.
Jolajengo kayindere pajo thoko go,
jolakwayo mwendi, kisi dhano iy'adec pere.
Jobino waco ni, “Yikere ma lweny gi Yerusalem,
ay win, weyi wamonji go sawa aucel m'odieceŋ!”
“Amien riwan, kole piny oyutho,
aka tipo m'othieno onyo lokere mabor!”
“Ay win, weyi wamonji win go wor,
to wareyo woko cel mere je m'ogoy!”
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
“Toŋ woko yen pere;
witinda bibiro kwoŋ Yerusalem.
Me obedo tindi madwoŋ ma ripo amiya gir'acula;
ongoye gimoro i iye kwanyowoko adica.
Paka jwom kuro pi mere ma k'onyekere,
ameno apaka Yerusalem kuro kidakana pere ma k'onyekere.
Gwayo kodi rerok jowinjere i iye;
two kodi adholin a gigipiny m'aneno.
Gwokere, awi Yerusalem,
rupiri anyalo wire kwoŋin i jok,
t'ajwangin
paka piny ma kibed'iye.”
Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
“Lweri m'ikibudho paka yath vini,
joma joboth ma jok'otho ma Isiraili,
paka jacoki nyingi yath, tel cingin kendo
i jange.
Anoluw gi ŋa t'amiyo gwokirok,
ŋey jowonyal winjo?
Neni, ithi jo ocule,
jokinyal winjo.
Wac pa Rwoth rijo obedo gima jocayo;
jokisangala gine.
To an ayeŋ kodi keme pa Rwoth;
aloc gi tiŋo.”
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Konji nge paran kwoŋ nyithindho i royo,
kodi kwoŋ coko nyithindho bende;
cwo gi mon je ilakadho gi jo,
jom'otegino kodi jom'oti.
Udi pajo ilamiyo joman,
kanyacel gi ndelin pajo kodi mon pajo;
kole alatelo cingan
kwoŋ joma bedo i piny.
Kole wok kwoŋ jomathindho tundo i jomadongo kwoŋ jo,
kisi dhano obedo jaworo ri magowa ma k'otire;
aka wok i jatuci wac Were tundo i jacway ri Were i migam,
kisi dhano je obedo jabanirok.
ka jowaco ni, ‘Siem, siem.’
To kucel siem ongoye.
kucel wiy jo k'okwoti,
jok'oŋeyo nger ma bedo giwickwot.
Riameno jolapodho i dier jono ma jopodho;
i hongo m'abino miy'iye jo gir'acula, alamayo jo dhum.”
Rwoth waco.
Rwoth waco ama:
“Cungi win i dhoyin, aka winen,
penji win yo macene,
kama royo maber nitie i iye; wiwoth'iye,
aka winwaŋ ywomirok ri cuny win.”
To jowaco ni, “Wak'owoth'iye.”
Aketho bende jokur riwin:
Winji win dwondi gwara!
To jowaco ni, “Wak'owinji.”
Riameno winji win, awi nonin,
aka wiŋey, awi cokirok, gima latimere rijo.
Winji, awi piny, akidho kelo kidamba kwoŋ ji me,
gima wok i can pajo,
rupiri jokwero winjo wac paran;
aka paka ri fonji paran, jotieko kwero woko.
Buban ma wok Seba konyan nedi,
kosa niaŋ mamit ma wok i piny mabor?
Mic mewin awaŋa kijol,
aka cowirok mewin bende kisangala an.
Riameno Rwoth waco ama:
Neni, aketho ruwaŋ ji me
amien ma jolakitangatanga i wiye;
jonywol kodi nyithindho kanyacel,
jager kodi mere jolakisika woko.
Rwoth waco ama:
“Neni, ji jobino wok i piny ma yumalo,
nono madwoŋ jotukere wok iy'adec mabor ma piny.
Jomidho asere kodi toŋ,
joger aka jongoye gi wor,
derino pajo cal kodi nam ma mor;
jogweyo kayinin.
Joyikere paka jolweny apondi ri kama lweny ogunj'iye;
lweny kodin, awi Yerusalem!”
“Watieko winjo wac manyen ma mako jo,
meni oloyo wan;
lworo omako wan,
nger litho pa dhako ma nywol.
Wikiri wikidhi i ndelo,
kosa wiwoth i royo;
rupiri jakwor nitie g'abor,
lworo nitie kisi thenge.”
Awi ji paran, ruk win kutiya,
aka wiŋindere i buru;
ywak win paka wiywako nyathi acel g'acel,
ywak win gi geregere swa;
kole jarey ji labino,
abwap kwoŋ wan.
Atieko lokin jatemo kodi cel i dier ji paran
ŋey inyal ŋeyo t'itemo kula pajo.
Joje jobedo joma wiy gin tek ma jogwenyirok,
jolera aka joluwere kicar;
wiy jo tek paka ywel kodi nyweny,
joje jotimo tim ma nyew.
Mac m'odheth liel m'ogaga,
nywenye ma jongoye kony mac camo jo;
bedo gipilok medo rudo jo,
kwoŋbedo jokidakana kikwany jo woko.
Ilwoŋo jo ni “Feza m'okwer.”
Kole Rwoth otieko kwero jo.
Me wac pa Rwoth m'obino ri Yeremia wok bongi Rwoth ka waco ni,
“Cungi i waŋkac ma Ot pa Rwoth, aka ititi kenyo wac me, aka iwaci ni, ‘Winji win wac pa Rwoth, win ji je ma Yuda, win ma widonjo gi waŋkac me lamo Rwoth.’ ”
Me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Wiri win kula mewin gi tim mewin, ŋey anyal bedo i dier win i kabedo me.
Wikiri wikethi geno i wac ma twodo me. Me obedo Ot pa Rwoth, Ot pa Rwoth, Ot pa Rwoth.
Adieri ka winowir kula mewin gi tim mewin, ka winotim gim'otire ri wadi win,
ka wikidiyo jakicar, nyathi kic, kodi citho, kosa oyo remo pa dhano ma bubanja i kabedo me, aka ka wik'olam werin man ma jolakelo teko riwin,
nyaka alabedo gi win i kabedo me, i piny m'amiyo cango con ri kwarere mewin cil gi cil.
E winitie ka, wiketho geno mewin i wac ma twodo ma kikony.
Winokwal, winoneki, winotim cot, winokwoŋere nono, winomiy mic ri Bal, to wilamo werin man ma fodi wikuya,
nyaka to wibino to wicungo ruwaŋan i ot me, m'ilwoŋo gi nyingan, to wiwaco ni, “Wangoye gi teko!” Kareno wimedere gi timo amien me je?
Ot me m'ilwoŋo gi nyingan, onyo olokere kapondo pa jokwo ma wineno? Wiŋeyo ni an bende aneno, Rwoth waco.
Onyo kidhi win pama i kabedo paran m'oyido nitie Silo, kam'amiyo nyingan obed'iye marapena, aka winen gim'atimo rigo ro kidakana pa ji paran Isiraili.
Aka onyo, kwoŋbedo witieko timo gigipiny me je, Rwoth waco, munyo aluwo gi win g'amen, wikwero winjo, aka munyo alwoŋo win, wikidwoko.
Riameno alatimo ri ot m'ilwoŋo gi nyingan, ma wiketho geno mewin iye, kodi kabedo m'amiyo win kodi kwarere mewin, nger gim'atimo ri Silo.
Aka alaywoyo win woko ruwaŋan, paka aywoyo woko wade mewin, nyikway Efrayim je.
Rwoth owaco ama: Yeremia, ikir'ikway ri ji me, ikir'iywak kwoŋbedo jo, aka ikir'iywak ran, rupiri ak'owinjin.
Ikineni gima jotimo i tindin madongo ma Yuda kodi i royin ma Yerusalem?
Nyithindho jocoko yen, jodongo jobuko mac, aka mon jodwanyo moko, ma yiko mugat ri were madhako ma jolwoŋo ni kere ma i polo. Jo bende jokonjo woko mic ma math ri werin man, ma miyan amaki nge.
Obedo an ma jokwinyo? Rwoth penjo. K'obedo jo wegi, ma wegi jomiyere litho?
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Nge paran kodi keme paran jobino konjere woko i kabedo me, kwoŋ ji kodi kwoŋ ogwaŋe, kwoŋ yen madudi kodi olemo ma lowo; laliel aka k'oneki.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Medi win mic mewin awaŋa i cowirok mewin, aka wicam riŋo.
Kole i ndelo m'awodh'iye kwarere mewin woko i piny ma Misir, akiluwo gi jo kendo akiwodho or rijo cungo kwoŋ mic awaŋa kodi cowirok.
To me a or m'amiyo jo, Winji win dwondan, aka nyaka alabedo Were mewin, aka wilabedo ji paran; jowotimi gim'ayenyo ma oro jo, ŋey gigipiny wobedi maber rijo.
Kucel jok'owinjo kosa jok'ociko ithi jo, to i wictek ma cuny jo marac, jotimo gima wegi jomito, to joŋiyo yucen makiweno yumalo.
Wok i ndelo ma kwarere pajo jowok woko i piny ma Misir tundo gunyo ni, atieko kimena dhiro ŋecin paran je, jotuci wac Were rijo, radhik radhik;
kucel jok'owinjan, kosa ciko ithi jo, to wiy jo medo lokirok matek. Jotimo gimarac loyo kwarere pajo.
Ameno ibino luwo wac me je rijo, to jok'owinjin. Ilalwoŋo jo to jok'odwokin.
Ilawaco rijo ni: Me nono ma jokwero winjo dwondi Rwoth Were pajo, aka jokwero winjo fonji; adieri ongoye kwoŋ jo; otiek kwanyo woko wok i dhok jo.
Ŋadi win ye wiy win to wibolo woko;
goy win ndur wi tendere,
kole Rwoth otieko kwero ak'ojwango
luse m'okwinyo keme pere.
Kole ji ma Yuda jotieko timo gimarac ruwaŋan, Rwoth waco; jotieko jengo amien pajo i ot m'ilwoŋo gi nyingan, jokoco.
I Milelo ma Hinom jotieko geto migam m'ilwoŋo Tofeth, manitie i milelo pa wod Hinom, ma waŋo wot jo gi nyithindho manyir pajo i mac m'akioro jo, kosa k'obino kada i paro paran.
Riameno, adieri ndelo bino, Rwoth waco, ma doko k'olwoŋ ni Tofeth, kosa milelo pa wod pa Hinom, to milelo ma Yaŋirok; kole jolayikere i Tofeth cuka kabedo langoye.
Delkwoŋ ji me labedo cemo pa winyin ma koyo, kodi ri ogwaŋe ma piny; aka ongoye ŋata lamiyo jo lworo.
Aka alaketho i gike derino ma siemirok kodi kisangala, dwondi mweha kodi jamweha i tindin madongo ma Yuda kodi i royin ma Yerusalem; rupiri piny lalokere gunda.
I hongo no, Rwoth waco, cokin pa kerin ma Yuda, cokin pa jotel, cokin pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, cokin pa jotuci wac Were, cokin pa ji ma bedo Yerusalem ibino golo woko i kaliele pajo.

Ibino yaro jo i waŋceŋ kodi dwe kodi lwak je ma polo, ma jotieko maro to jotiyo rijo, ma jotieko luwo, ma jotieko penjo jo gir'atima to jolamo. K'ocoki jo kosa k'oyiki jo; jolacale woyo dhiaŋ i wi lowo.
Ji je ma jodoŋ ma nono marac me jolayenyo tho loyo kwo i kabedo je m'atieko kedh'iye jo, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Ibino waco rijo ama, Rwoth waco ama:
Ka ji jopodho, jokiay malo kendo?
Ka jorwenyo, jokiwire?
Raŋo onyo ji me jowire woko
rwenyo cil gi cil.
Jotieko timo riyo kec ma twodo,
jotieko jokwero dwoko.
Atieko ciko ithan t'awinjo,
to jokiluwi g'adieri;
ongoye ŋata ŋuto kidakana pere,
ka penjere ni, Gimarac aŋo m'atimo?
Joje jowire itimo gima jomito,
paka kayina pa podho gi wiye kama lweny ogunj'iye.
Kiri obusi ma koyo
oŋeyo sawa ma dok;
aka akuru, obico, kodi owel
jokuro sawa ma dwoko pajo;
to ji paran jokuya
cik pa Rwoth.
Winyalo nedi waco ni wariek,
aka cik pa Rwoth nitie gi wan.
Munyo iy'adieri, gi ndiko ma twodo pa jondiko,
otieko loko gino twodo?
Ilakwoto wiy jomariek,
jolamienere t'imako jo;
paka onyo jotieko kwero wac pa Rwoth,
rieko aŋo manitie i jo?
Riameno alamiyo mon pajo ri joman
kodi ndelin pajo ri joma laloyo jo gi meni,
rupiri wok i jomathindho tundo i jomadongo
kisi dhano je jaworo ri magowa ma k'otire;
wok kwoŋ jatuci wac Were tundo kwoŋ jacway ri Were i wi migam
kisi dhano timo gikomo.
ka jowaco ni siem, siem,
kucel siem ongoye.
kucel wiy jo k'okwoti kada,
jok'oŋeyo nger ma bedo giwickwot.
Riameno jolapodho i dier jono ma jopodho.
I hongo m'abino miy'iye jo gir'acula, jolakitangatanga,
Rwoth waco.
Munyo oyido amito coko jo, Rwoth waco,
olemo ongoye i yath vini,
nyandere ongoye i wi makuyu;
kiri boke je joner,
aka atieko yeyo jokicar mayo jo lowo pajo.
Raŋo wabedo ma wakikithini?
Cokere win kanyacel, weyi wakidhi win i tindin madongo m'ogoy'iye cel
to wasika woko kenyo;
kole Rwoth Were mawan otieko thumo riwan banja ma tho,
aka go otieko miyo wan pi ma kwir amadha,
rupiri watieko timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth.
Warango siem, to wakinwaŋ bero,
hongo ma both, to nitie litho ayino.
Ywe pa kayinin pajo winjere wok Dan;
i derino ma ywe pa kayinin pajo
piny gibe yengere.
Jokwor mawan jobino reyo woko piny mawan kodi kisi gimoro je man'iye,
tindi mawan madwoŋ kodi ji ma jobed'iye.
Neni, acegin dhiro thwole i dier win,
uu ma kinyal yiro,
aka jolakayo win.
Rwoth waco.
Kisangala paran orumo, ywak opoŋ kwoŋan,
cunyan podho.
Eno, ywak pa jocandi
wok bor kodi kama lac i piny:
“Rwoth ki nitie i zayon?
Kere ma Zayon onyo ongoye kenyo?”
Raŋo wimiyan nge gi cal mewin,
gi lamo werin mewin makicar ma jongoye kony?
Ji joywak ni,
“Keco otieko rumo, milengela otieko tundo i gike,
aka fodi wakiboth.”
Ro litho pa ji paran ma jocandi, alimo litho,
aywak, aka atieko dhier.
Ongoye yath moro i Giliad?
Ongoye jamilerwa moro kenyo?
Raŋo onyo ji paran ma jocandi fodi jok'olimo both?
Awi ka bedi wiyan oyido obedo waŋ pi,
aka waŋan kama pigi waŋ jo wok'iye,
ŋey anyal ywak wor g'odieceŋ
ri ji paran ma jocandi m'oneki jo!
Awi ka bedi oyido anitie gi kabedo i thim
kam'anyalo weyo ji paran t'abed'iye!
Joje jobedo jobanirok
kweth pa jomisegey.
Jodolo lew gin paka asere;
jotieko dongo matek i piny ma twodo, makiweno adieri;
kole jomedere wok i gimarac tundo i gimarac,
aka jokuya an, Rwoth waco.
Kisi dhano ripo gwokirok kwoŋ nyawote,
aka ongoye ŋata nyalo geno omin;
kole kisi omin jo obedo jatwodo paka Yakobo,
aka kisi dhano waco nyingi nyawote.
Joje jowondo wadi gin,
aka ongoye ŋata waco adieri;
jotieko fonjo lew jo luwo twodo;
jotimo reco aka jolocere swa ma jokinyal ŋuto.
Adica wi adica, twodo wi twodo!
Jokwero ŋeyan, Rwoth waco.
Riameno Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
“Alarudo t'atemo jo,
onyo anotim aŋo kendo gi ji paran ma joreco?
Lew jo cale asere ma neko jo;
noknok jowaco twodo.
Kisi dhano waco wac maber ri nyawote,
to iy'adieri ciko bwo rigo”.
“Ak'omiy jo gir'acula ro gigipiny me?” Rwoth penjo;
Ak'ocul kwor
kwoŋ nono paka me?
An Rwoth, atieko luwo.
Awaco ni, “Alabiyo pigi waŋan ri gote,
kodi ywak ri lum ma thim,
rupiri jotieko thwo,
aka ongoye ŋata luwo i jo.
Ywak pa dhok kiwinjere kendo;
winyin kodi ogwaŋe madudi jotieko ringo to jokadho.”
Me apaka Rwoth waco, “Alaloko Yerusalem gundin m'opanga,
kabedo ma kibwe jobed'iye;
tindin madongo ma Yuda jolalokere thim,
kabedo m'ongoye ŋata bed'iye.”
T'apenjo ni “Ŋa mariek loyo manyalo niaŋ gime? Ŋa ma Rwoth otieko luwo gine manyalo tito? Raŋo piny odoŋ gunda ak'othangere paka thim m'ongoye ŋata luw'iye?”
To Rwoth dwoko ni: “Kwoŋbedo jotieko jwango cik paran m'atieko jengo ruwaŋ jo, aka jokwero winjo dwondan, kosa timo gim'awaco rijo.
To kucel gi wictek jotimo gima cuny jo yenyo aka jotieko lamo Bal paka kwarere pajo ofonjo jo.
Riameno Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama, Were pa Isiraili: Alapidho ji me gi yath makec kodi pi ma kwir amadha.
Alakedho jo i dier nonin ma jo kosa kwarere pajo fodi jokuya; aka aladhiro abor to luwo jo, cuka anorey jo kicutho.”
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
Par win kwoŋ gima timere, aka wilwoŋ mon ma joywak ajore jowobin;
wilwoŋ mon ma jondijo jowobin.
Ji jowaco ni,
“Weyi jowobin piyo piyo jowoywak ajore riwan,
cuka pigi waŋ wan wooy,
aka yer ma waŋ wan wodhieki gi ywak.”
Kole derino ma ywak winjere wok Zayon:
“Walokere gunda!
Wiy wan okwot kicutho,
rupiri waweyo lowo mawan,
kwoŋbedo okedhi woko pecin mawan.”
Winji win, awi mon, wac pa Rwoth,
aka weyi ithi win wojol wac ma dhoke;
fonji win nyiki win ywak ajore,
aka wifonji wadi win ywak.
“Tho otieko bino i dirisin mawan,
otieko donjo i cel mawan,
ma neko woko nyithindho wok i royin
kodi yac wok i kam'othangere.”
Luw! Apaka Rwoth waco ama:
Del pa ji m'otho lapodho
paka woyo i kisawe
paka withi kal yuŋey jakeco,
aka ongoye ŋata lacoko jo.
To weyi jono ma jodele jowodele i gime: Ni jowoniaŋ aka jowoŋeyan, nike Abedo Rwoth. Atiyo gi mar makiwire, tiro, kodi adieri i piny, afore i gigipiny me,” Rwoth waco.
Hongo bino, Rwoth waco, m'abino tiy'iye gi jono je ma jothumere to jok'okuro cikirok mere.
Misir, Yuda, Edom, Amon, Mowab, kodi jono je m'oliel wiy gin ma jobedo i thim. Ongoye kwoŋ ji me aka ongoye kwoŋ Joisiraili ma jokuro cikirok paran.
Ji ma Isiraili, winji win wac ma Rwoth waco riwin.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
“Wikiri wiluw tim pa nonin,
kosa ranyuth ma polo wokiri wocandi paro mewin;
kole gigipiny me cando paro pa nonin.
Kole kula pa ji me obedo gim'okom:
Yath ma lul itoŋo woko,
itiyo gine gi le gi cingi japac;
ji joloko maŋon gi feza gi zahabu;
joridho gi nyundu kodi musumalere
ŋey wokiri wodhire.
Cal pajo jocale gim'itimo ma miyo winyin lworo i ndelo pa gima nitie pige ma cal nyarieŋa,
aka jokinyal luwo;
itiŋatiŋa jo,
rupiri jokinyal woth.
Wikiri wilwor jo,
rupiri jokinyal timo teko,
aka jokinyal timo bero moro.”
Ongoye ŋata cale kodin, awi Rwoth;
Idwoŋ, aka nyingin dwoŋ i meni.
Kole iripo awora.
I dier jomariek je ma nonin
kodi i kerin pajo je
ongoye ŋata cale kodin.
Joje jongoye gi rieko aka jomiŋ;
fonji ma cal jomiyo
k'opokere kodi yath!
Feza m'onyadhi ikelo wok Tarsis,
kodi zahabu wok Ufaz.
Jobedo tic pa japac kodi tic ma cingi jathedhi zahabu;
ruk pajo obedo manyabululu kodi mar'ariŋo;
joje jobedo gima jondijo am'otimo.
To Rwoth obedo Were mar'adieri;
go obedo Were makwo kodi Kere ma cil gi cil.
I keme pere piny yengere,
aka nonin kinyal ciro nge pere.
Wibino waco rijo ama: Werin ma jok'ocweyo polo gi piny jolakisika wok i piny kodi wok i pendi polo.
Obedo Rwoth m'ocweyo piny gi meni pere,
go m'ocako piny gi rieko pere,
aka gi niaŋ pere to yaro polo.
Ka go ogoyo dwonde, pi mor i polo,
aka go miyo tor ay wok i tielo ma piny.
Go miyo lithkoth pilin i koth,
aka go wodho koyo wok i ot pere ma kan.
Ka ji joneno gime, jolokere mamiŋ ma jongoye gi ŋeyo;
jothedhi zahabu je iketho jo i wickwot gi cal pajo;
rupiri cal pajo jobedo gim'okom,
aka jongoye gi kwo.
Jongoye kony, tic ma twodo;
i hongo pajo ma gir'acula jolakisika.
Were pa Yakobo kicale jo;
go ama timo kisi gimoro,
aka go otieko yero nono ma Isiraili ni wobedi alunja pere;
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny am'obedo nyinge.
Ji ma Yerusalem, okar win! Coki win gigipiny mewin.
Kole Rwoth waco ama: Akidho dwiro woko ji ma piny i hongo me; alakelo kidamba kwoŋ jo ŋey jowonyal winjo.
Ji ma Yerusalem joywak ni,
nga walimo litho marac!
Adholin mawan k'ocangi.
T'awaco ni, “Me gir'acula paran,
aka aripo ciro.”
Kayindi paran orey woko,
aka dende paran je otur woko;
nyithindho paran jokadho joweyan,
aka jongoye kicutho;
ongoye nyatoro m'oyar kayindi paran kendo,
m'olier nangin mere ma geŋo.
Kole jotel mawan jomiŋ,
jokipenji Rwoth gir'atima;
riameno ongoye gima jotimo to kadho maber
aka ji pajo je jokedhere.
Winji, mikwenda eno bino
nywowirok madwoŋ wok i piny ma yumalo
ma loko tindin madongo ma Yuda kam'ojwangi
kam'ondiek jobed'iye.
Aŋeyo, awi Rwoth, ni ji wegi jokidhum kwo pajo,
ni ji ka jowotho wegi jokinyuthere ka luwo.
Tir wan, awi Rwoth, to i nger ma ripo;
kosa imiy wan gir'acula ka nge omakin,
kole inyalo reyo wan woko.
Konji keme perin kwoŋ nonin ma fodi jokuya in,
kodi kwoŋ ji ma jokilwoŋ nyingin;
rupiri jotieko neko ji perin;
jotieko reyo woko wan kicutho
to joweyo piny mawan nono.
Wac me obino ri Yeremia wok bongi Rwoth ka waco ni,
Winji wac ma cikirok me, aka iluwi kodi ji ma Yuda kodi joma bedo i Yerusalem.
Ibino waco rijo ni me apaka Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Kwoŋ ri ŋata k'owinji wac ma cikirok me.
Amiyo kwarere mewin or munyo owodho jo wok i piny Misir, wok i mac m'odheth, k'awaco ni, “Winji win dwondan, aka witim kisi gimoro je m'aoro win. Ameno nyaka to wibedo ji paran t'abedo Were mewin.
Nyaka t'akuro cikirok m'akwoŋere ri kwarere mewin, m'amiyo jo piny ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, paka i ndelo me. T'adwoko ni, ‘Weyi wobedi ameno Rwoth.’ ”
To Rwoth waco ran ama: Tuci wac me je i tindin madongo ma Yuda, kodi i royin ma Yerusalem. Iwaci ri ji jowowinji thenethene ma cikirok aka jowotimi paka mitere.
Kole agwoko kwarere mewin teltel munyo awodho jo woko ma piny ma Misir, agwoko jo g'amen, tundo gunyo ni, k'awaco ni, winji win dwondan.
Kucel jok'owinjo kosa ciko ithi jo, to kisi dhano wotho i wictek ma tim pere marac. Ameno t'ayimo kwoŋ jo wac je ma cikirok me, m'aoro jo timo, to jokwero.
To Rwoth waco ran ama: Ji ma Yuda kodi ji ma Yerusalem jocamo ran sereko.
Jogik i reco pa kwarere pajo macon, ma jokwero winjo wac paran; jokadho ri werin man to jolamo jo; Joisiraili kodi Joyuda jotieko turo woko cikirok m'atimo gi kwarere pajo.
Riameno, Rwoth waco ama: Adieri akidho kelo kidamba kwoŋ jo ma jok'onyal kwale; kada joywak ran, ak'owinji jo.
Kenyo tindin madongo ma Yuda kodi joma bedo i Yerusalem jokidhi to joywak ri werin ma jowodho mic rijo, to jok'oboth jo i hongo ma teko pajo.
Kole werin mewin onyo jonyay paka tindin mewin madongo, awi Yuda; paka royin ma Yerusalem nitie kweth, apaka migame ma witimo ma wickwot, migame ma miyo mic ri Bal.
Paka ri in Yeremia, ikir'ikway ri ji me, kosa ikir'iywakere ran rijo, rupiri ak'owinji ka jogoyo ran koko i hongo ma teko pajo.
Rwoth waco ama: Ji m'amaro jotimo gigipiny mareco. Meni aŋo, ma jonigine ma bedo i ot paran? Joparo ni jonyalo geŋo teko ka jotimo cikirok kodi miyo cowirok mar'ogwaŋe? Gino nyalo miyo jo kisangala?
Rwoth i hongo moro olwoŋo jo ni yath oliv manyaboke pendi, m'opoŋ g'olemo maŋon, t'onyo pama, gi mor ma cal mwoc pa koth, lamok'iye mac, aka boke mere lawaŋ.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, m'opidho win, otieko tuco gimarac kwoŋ win, kwoŋbedo gimarac ma Joisiraili kodi Joyuda jotieko timo, kwinyo nge paran gi miyo Bal mic.
Rwoth am'okedho ran gime, t'aŋeyo;
to nyuthan tim pajo mareco.
To oyido acalo rombo m'ogen
m'itero neko.
Akiŋeyo ni oyido mako kwoŋan
m'oyido jocamo tiende gi piny, ka jowaco ni,
“Weyi warey woko yath g'olemo mere,
weyi watoŋ woko go wok i piny pa jomakwo,
ŋey wokiri wopoy nyinge kendo!”
To in, Awi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, in m'ithumo banja gi tiro,
in m'itemo adundo kodi paro,
weyi anen culo kwor perin kwoŋ jo,
rupiri ri in atieko miyo banja paran ŋeyirok.
Riameno Rwoth waco ama mako kwoŋ ji ma Anathoth, ma jodwaro kwo perin, aka jowaco ni, “Ik'oluwi i nyingi Rwoth, k'inotimi walanekin.”
Riameno Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Akidho miyo jo gir'acula; yac jolatho g'abor; wot jo kodi nyiki jo jolatho kec;
ongoye moro m'odoŋ kwoŋ jo. Kole alakelo kidamba kwoŋ ji ma Anathoth, i oro ma gir'acula pajo.
Itimo gim'otire, awi Rwoth,
k'ageŋisa rin;
kucel d'aosa banja paran ruwaŋin.
Raŋo gima jokidakana jotimo kadho maber?
Raŋo jobanirok je jowinjo maber?
Ipidho jo, to jorwako fuc,
jodongo to jonyak olemo,
noknok joluwo maber kwoŋin,
kucel jokipar kwoŋin.
To in, awi Rwoth, iŋeyan;
inenan aka itemo paro paran ka nitie kwoŋin.
Yway jo woko paka rombo m'ikidho thumo,
aka ikethi jo gicen ri ndelo m'ilathum'iye jo.
Piny oywaki kiri keraŋo,
to lum ma kisi ndelo thwo woko?
Ro kidakana pa jono ma jobed'iye
ogwaŋe kodi winyin iyweyo woko jo,
aka kwoŋbedo ji jowaco ni, “Were kinen gima watimo.”
Rwoth owaco ama:
Yeremia, k'itieko ŋwec gi joman to joolin,
onyo inopiem nedi gi kayinin?
Aka k'inen ipodho piny i piny maber
inonyal nedi i lule ma Yordan?
Kole kiri wade perin, joma peco mewin won,
jotieko kisita in;
joywakin gi pigi waŋ jo;
ikir'iyey jo,
kada joluwo wac ma nyamere kodin.
Rwoth waco ama:
Atieko jwango Isiraili,
atieko kijala alunja paran.
Atieko miyo ji m'amaro,
i cingi jokwor pajo.
Alunja paran jotieko lokere ran,
paka simbwor i lule.
Otieko tiŋo dwonde kwoŋan,
riameno adaki go.
Ji paran m'oyer jocale winyo,
m'obuko yath jokwinyo wok i thenge je.
Lwoŋ ogwaŋe mager madudi,
jobin jowocami jo.
Jokwath kweth jotieko reyo woko ndelo vini paran,
jotieko nyono piny ndelo paran,
jotieko loko ndelo paran maŋon,
thim m'ojwangi.
Jotieko loko go thim,
kam'ojwangi, go ywak ran.
Piny gipi olokere thim,
aka ongoye ŋata dewo.
I wi tendere tendere ma thim je
ji jobino kinyaga;
kole abor pa Rwoth neko ji
wok i gike acel tundo i man;
ongoye ŋata laboth.
Jocwoyo ŋano to jokeco kudhin,
jotieko olo, to jok'olimo gimoro.
Wiy jo lakwot gi ranyak pajo
kwoŋbedo nge pa Rwoth maliel.
Me apaka Rwoth waco mako kwoŋ joger pa Joisiraili ma jogeyo gir'alunja ma go otieko miyo ji pere Isiraili lunjo: Acegin muko jo woko wok i lowo pajo, aka alamuko woko Joyuda wok i dier jo.
Aka k'atieko muko woko jo, alamako wor gi jo kendo, t'akelo jo kendo iy'alunja pajo kodi i piny pajo, kisi dhano kwoŋ jo.
Aka nyaka, ka jofonjere tim pa ji paran, kwoŋirok gi nyingan ni, “Paka Rwoth kwo.” Paka jofonjo ji paran kwoŋirok gi Bal, nyaka jobino getere i dier ji paran.
To ka nono moro jok'owinji, nyaka abino fudho woko kicutho t'areyo woko, Rwoth waco.
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Kidhi inyew pale ma law mafoth, aka iruki, aka ikir'ilwok i pi.”
Ameno t'anyewo pale cungo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth, t'aruko.
To wac pa Rwoth bino ran madirio, ka waco ni,
“Kwany pale m'inyewo m'iruko no, ikidhi i malawa Yufrete aka ikani kenyo i ŋungu tele.”
Ameno akidho t'akano i thengi Yufrete paka Rwoth ooran.
Aka munyo hongo okadho m'oromo, to Rwoth waco ran ni, “Ay malo ikidhi i thengi Yufrete, aka ikwany pale ma ndirino aorin kano kenyo.”
Kenyo t'akadho i thengi Yufrete, akunyo t'akwanyo pale wok kam'oyido akan'iye. To oyido otop m'ongoye kony.
Kenyo wac pa Rwoth obino ran kendo, ka waco ni:
Rwoth waco ama: “Ameno won apaka alareyo woko delok pa Yuda kodi delok madwoŋ pa Yerusalem.
Ji mareco me, ma jokwero winjo wac paran, ma gi wictek jotimo gima wegi jomito aka onyo jotieko kidho ri werin man tiyo rijo gi lamo jo, jolacale gi pale me m'ongoye kony.
