Kole paka pale moko i pier jo, ameno apaka amiyo Joisiraili gibe kodi Joyuda gibe cwirok kwoŋan, Rwoth waco, ŋey jowonyal bedo ran ji paran, jowomiy nyingan pak kodi dwoŋ. To jok'onyalo winjo.”

Rwoth oluwo kodan, owaco ni, Yeremia, wac rijo ni Rwoth waco ama, Were pa Isiraili: “Wopoŋ kisi jagi moro je gi vini. Aka jolapenjin ni, ‘Oyido iparo ni wakuya ni kisi jagi moro je iripo poŋo gi vini?’ ”

Kenyo ibino dwoko jo ni: Rwoth waco ama: “Acegin poŋo joma bedo i piny me je, kerin ma jobedo i kom ma dhum pa Daudi, jocway ri Were i wi migam, jotuci wac Were, kodi joma bedo i Yerusalem je gi mero.
Aka aladiyo jo acel kwoŋ nyawote, jonywol gi nyithindho kanyacel, Rwoth waco. Ak'omaki wor, ak'okoy kendo aka ak'obedi gi wor k'areyo jo.”
Ji ma Isiraili, winji win,
aka cik win ithi win,
wikiri wibedi jokwoto,
kole Rwoth otieko luwo.
Miy win Rwoth Were mewin dwoŋ,
ka go fodi k'okelo mudho,
kendo ka tiendi win fodi k'orwombere,
wi gote ka ŋamba riedo;
ka wirango lero,
go wiro gino i mudho madwoŋ
to timo gino mudho m'opoto.
To ka wik'owinji,
alaywak nyaliŋliŋ ro delok mewin;
alaywak gi geregere aka pigi waŋan laoy
kwoŋbedo okadhi gi ji pa Rwoth paka jotwec.
Rwoth owaco ran ni,
Waci ri kere gi nyamicala ama:
Bedi win i kom ma piny,
rupiri sangaria mewin maŋon,
otieko podho piny wok i wiwin.
Tindin madongo ma yupiny jocegere
m'ongoye ŋat'oyaw jo;
Yuda gibe oter jo i piny man,
oter joje i piny man.
Tiŋi waŋin malo akinen,
jokwor perin ma jobino wok yumalo.
Nikune ji perin m'oyido omiyin,
ji perin m'oyido i dele gi jo swa?
Inowaci nedi ka ji m'oyido iparo ni jobedo merin perin
jokengila in to jodhumin?
Litho k'omakin paka dhako ma nywol?
Aka k'ipenjere gi i cunyin ni,
“Raŋo gigipiny me jopodho kwoŋan?”
Obedo ro reco mewin ma kiwacere
m'omiyo otiŋ rinda mewin malo
t'inindo gi win gi mbaka.
Jaethopiya nyalo wiro rangi ma cal pere
kosa kwac nyalo wiro rangi mere m'othon othon?
Ka jonyalo, onyo win m'ongoye gima witimo
ma wiŋiyo timo reco,
winyalo fonjere timo gimaber.
Alakedho win paka cuŋ
ma koyo kudho wok i thim.
Me a gima latimere riwin,
me a adec m'atieko kipima riwin, Rwoth waco,
kwoŋbedo wiy win owil kodan
to wigeno twodo.
An won gipi alatiŋo rindin mewin i nyim win
t'ineno wickwot mewin.
Atieko neno amien mewin,
cot mewin kodi ywe mewin, kidakana mewin ma malaya mewin
i wi tendere i kisawe.
Kidamba rin, awi Yerusalem!
Latero hongo aŋo
mafodi k'olony win?
Me wac pa Rwoth m'obino ri Yeremia ma mako kwoŋ milengela:
Yuda ywak
aka tindin madongo pere jorere woko;
gi gut joŋare piny,
aka ywak pa Yerusalem kadho malo.
Joŋaŋo jodhiro ŋecin pajo twomo pi;
jotundo i waŋ pi,
to jokinwaŋ pi,
jodok gi degi pajo m'ongoye gimoro iye.
Wickwot gi lworo mako jo
aka joumo waŋ jo,
kwoŋbedo piny obare.
Kwoŋbedo koth fodi k'ocwe i piny
jofur jobwok;
joboyo wiy gin.
Kiri arara madhako ma ndelo
jwango nyathi mere ma nyaka onywolo
kwoŋbedo lum ongoye.
Punde mager madudi jocungo i wi tendere,
johamo ri luya paka kibwe;
waŋ jo kinen
kwoŋbedo jongoye gi cemo.
Makada nende reco mawan segeya wan,
tim gimoro, awi Rwoth, kwoŋbedo nyingin.
Watieko jwangin hongo m'oromo,
aka watieko timo reco kwoŋin.
Iŋat'ibedo geno pa Isiraili,
jaboth pere i hongo ma teko.
Raŋo ibedo paka jakicar i piny,
paka jawoth ma goyo ŋeti nyaka ma wor acel?
Raŋo ibedi paka ŋat'opodhi kwoŋe abwap,
paka jalweny apondi ma kinyal miyo kony?
Kucel in, awi Rwoth, initie i dier wan,
aka walwoŋere gi nyingin;
ikir'ijwangi wan!
Rwoth waco ama kwoŋ ji me:
“Adieri jomaro kilera,
jokiywom par tiendi jo;
riameno Rwoth kijol jo,
onyo go lapoyo reco pajo
to miyo jo gir'acula ro reco pajo.”
Rwoth owaco ran ni: “Ikir'ikwayan ni akony ji me.
Makada nende joriy kec, ak'owinji ywak pajo, aka makada nende jomiy mic awaŋa kodi mic ma cemo, ak'ojol jo; to alaneko jo g'abor, gi kec, kodi two nundu.”
Kenyo t'awaco ni: “A Rwoth Were! E jotuci wac Were ma jowaco rijo ni, ‘Wik'onen abor, wik'obedi gi kec, aka alamiyo win siem mar'adieri i kabedo me.’ ”
To Rwoth dwoko ni, “Jotuci wac Were joluwo twodo i nyingan; akioro jo, kendo akimiyo jo or kosa luwo gi jo. Jotuco menyirok ma twodo, miliel ma bukony, kodi twodo ma paro pajo.”
Riameno Rwoth waco ama mako kwoŋ jotuci wac Were ma joluwo i nyingan kad'akioro jo, aka jowaco ni, “Abor kodi kec k'obin i piny me”: Jotuci wac Were no jolatho g'abor kodi kec.
Aka ji ma joluwo rijo ilabolo jo i royin ma Yerusalem, joma kec kodi abor laneko jo. Ongoye ŋat'oyiki jo; jo wegi, mon pajo, wot jo, kodi nyiki jo. Kole alakonjo woko kidakana pajo kwoŋ jo.
Ibino waco rijo wac me:
Weyi pigi waŋan wooy wor kodi odieceŋ,
aka weyi jokiri jowocoki,
kwoŋbedo nyar ji paran mambula, ji paran,
orwadhi jo piny g'adol ma ŋinyo jo,
g'adhola ma kiwacere.
K'akidho woko i ndelo,
aneno ji m'oneki jo g'abor!
K'adonjo i tindi madwoŋ,
aneno ji ma jotho kec!
Kole jatuci wac Were kodi jacway ri Were i wi migam jotieko ŋweyo piny,
aka jongoye gi ŋeyo.
Rwoth, itieko kwero Yuda kicutho?
Cunyin odak Zayon?
Raŋo itieko rwadho wan piny
ŋey both wongoye riwan?
Warango siem, to wakinwaŋ bero;
hongo ma both, to nitie gwayo ayino.
Wayeyo kidakana mawan, awi Rwoth,
reco pa kwarere mawan,
kole watieko timo reco kwoŋin.
Ikir'iŋisa wan, kwoŋbedo nyingin;
ikir'ibwon kom perin madwoŋ ma dhum;
poyi aka ikir'itur cikirok perin gi wan.
Cal pa nonin moro je nyalo dhiro koth?
Kosa polo nyalo miyo koth ma cwe?
K'obedo in, awi Rwoth Were mawan?
Waketho geno mawan kwoŋin,
kole iŋat'itimo gime je.
Ka jopenjin ni, “Wakidhi kune?” Dwoki jo ni: Me apaka Rwoth waco:
Ŋata latho two nundu, latho two nundu,
aka jono m'oyik ni jolatho g'abor, jolatho g'abor;
jono m'oyik ni jolatho kec, jolatho kec,
aka jono m'oyik ni jolatho i twec, jolatho i twec.
Alaketho rijo nger gima reyo jo aŋwen, Rwoth waco. Abor ma laneko, gwokere ma laywayo woko, winyin ma koyo kodi ogwaŋe madudi mager ma lacuto to reyo.
Alaloko jo gilworo ri kerin je ma piny kwoŋbedo gima kere Manase wod Hezekia ma Yuda otimo i Yerusalem.
Rwoth penjo ni,
“Ŋa m'omak kodin wor, awi Yerusalem,
kosa ŋa m'oywakin?
Ŋa m'owire githenge
to penjo paka initie?
Witieko kweran, Rwoth waco,
wigik aŋey;
ameno atieko rieyo cingan kwoŋ win t'areyo woko win
aol gi dwoko nge paran cen.
Atieko piedho jo g'adher
i waŋkace ma piny;
atieko miyo jo ywak, atieko reyo ji paran;
to jok'oweyo tim pajo.
Mon citho jolalokere mathoth loyo
kwoyo ma nam.
Atieko kelo kwoŋ megi soye,
jarey sawa aucel m'odieceŋ.
Atieko miyo rembo madwoŋ kodi lworo ma kiwacere
wopodhi kwoŋ dheno abwap.
Dhako m'okeŋ nyithindho pere abirio mbaka oloyo,
ywe pa cunye cot
waŋceŋ pere opodho mafodi piny;
okwot wiye t'ibwono.
Jono ma jodoŋ kwoŋ jo,
jokwor pajo jolaneko jo g'abor”
Rwoth waco.
Adamba ama raŋo! Raŋo mama onywolan? Adhawere t'apiemo gi kisi dhano i piny. Fodi akimiyo dhano pesa ni woculan rumacen kosa akikopa dhano pesa, kucel dhano je kwoŋan.
Rwoth owaco ni, “Adieri atieko donjo i kwo perin ro bero, adieri atieko yimo kwoŋin jokwor i hongo ma teko kodi i hongo ma kidamba.
Nyweny kodi ywel bende jonyal turo nyweny ma wok yumalo?”
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Aladhiro jokwor jowonyaga ŋaŋo kodi lim pa ji paran, ma miyo jo gir'acula ri reco ma jotieko timo iy'adece je.
Alamiyo witiy ri jokwor mewin i piny ma wikuya, kole i nge paran mac omoko ma laliel cil gi cil.”
Awi Rwoth, iŋeyo;
poyan aka iwendi ran,
aka iculi ran kwor kwoŋ joma miyan litho.
Ibedo moth perin, ikir'ikwanyan woko;
ŋey ni obedo ro in am'omiyo iyetan.
Anwaŋo wac perin, t'acamo jo,
aka wac perin olokere ran kisangala
kodi noro ma cunyan.
Kole alwoŋere gi nyingin,
awi Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny.
Akibedo i kitipa pa joyodirok
aka akiyodere.
I wor perin, abedo kendan,
rupiri ipoŋan gi nge.
Raŋo litho paran kirum,
raŋo adhola paran kicangi,
raŋo kwero cango?
Adieri ibedo paka waŋ pi ma twodo,
paka pi ma kigenere?
Riameno Rwoth waco ama:
“K'inogiki, aladwokin cen,
aka ilacungo ruwaŋan.
K'inotuci gima dicwe, makiweno gima sisiri,
ilatimo tic paka dhokan.
Jo ama jolagik bongin,
to ikilagik bongi jo.
Alalokin ri ji me,
paka kor cel ma ywel.
Jolalweny kodin,
to jok'okengila in.
Kole anitie kodin,
ma bothin gi gonyin.
Alagonyin wok i cingi jokidakana,
Rwoth waco,
t'abothin wok i cingi jogwayo.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran:
“Ikir'inywom dhako, aka ikir'ibedi gi nyithindho i kabedo me.
Kole Rwoth waco ama mako kwoŋ nyithindho mayac gi nyir m'inywolo i kabedo me, kodi mako kwoŋ mon gi cwo ma jonywolo jo i piny me:

Jolatho two ma kiwacere. Ongoye ŋata laywako jo, aka ongoye ŋata layiko jo. Jolalokere paka woyo manitie i wi lowo. Jolatho g'abor kodi kec, aka delkwoŋ jolalokere cemo ri winyin ma koyo kodi ri ogwaŋe mager ma piny.”
Kole Rwoth waco ama: Ikir'idonji i ot ma ywak, kosa ikir'ikidhi iywaki, kosa ikir'iywor jo; rupiri atieko kwanyo woko siem paran kwoŋ ji me, Rwoth waco, mar paran makiwire kodi ŋono paran.
Jomadongo gi jomathindho jolatho i piny me; k'oyiki jo, aka ongoye ŋata laywako jo; ongoye ŋata lalielo kosa cido ye wiye rijo.
Ongoye ŋata laturo mugat ri jaywak, ma kweyo cuny jom'okeŋ ji pajo. Ongoye ŋata lamako wor gi dhano m'okeŋ bamere kosa min.
Ikir'idonji i ot ma kalima ma bedo piny gi jo, ma cemo gi jo.
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: “Akidho kwanyo woko wok i piny, i hongo perin kodi ruwaŋin, dwondi jo ma kisangala, dwondi jamweha kodi dwondi mweha.”
K'inowaci rijo wac me je, to jopenjin ni, “Raŋo Rwoth oluwo gimarac madwoŋ me je kwoŋ wan? Reco mawan obedo aŋo? Reco aŋo ma watieko timo kwoŋ Rwoth Were mawan?”
Nyaka ibino dwoko jo ni: Obedo kwoŋbedo kwarere pajo jojwangan Rwoth waco, aka onyo jokadho ri werin man aka jotiyo rijo to jolamo jo, jotieko jwangan aka jok'okuro cik paran.
To win witieko timo marac loyo kiri kwarere mewin. Kisi dhano kwoŋ win wiye tek aka jareco, wikwero winjan.
Riameno alabolo win woko wok i piny me yuthenge ma piny ma win kosa kwarere pajo kuya, aka korago, wilatic ri werin man wor g'odieceŋ, kole ak'onyuthi win ŋono.
Riameno, adieri hongo bino, Rwoth waco, ma ji doko jok'okwoŋere kodan paka Were makwo, go m'ofudho ji ma Isiraili woko ma piny ma Misir.
To jolakwoŋere kodan paka Were makwo m'ofudho ji ma Isiraili woko ma piny ma yumalo kodi woko ma piny je kam'oyido go okedh'iye jo. Kole aladwoko jo i piny pajo won, piny ma cango amiyo kwarere pajo.
Onyo pama adhiro jokitoga paran, Rwoth waco, aka jolamako jo. Rumacen aladhiro jodwar kweth, aka joladwaro jo wok i kisi gote kodi i kisi tendere, kodi i ŋungu telin.
Kole acomo waŋan i tim pajo je; jok'opanere kwoŋan, kosa reco pajo k'opanere kwoŋan.
Alamiyo jo gir'acula dirio ro reco kodi reco pajo kwoŋbedo jotieko koco piny paran gi cal kodi mulambin pajo, aka jotieko poŋo gir'alunja paran g'amien pajo.
Awi Rwoth, meni paran gi cel paran,
kapondo paran i hongo ma teko,
nonin je jolabino bongin
wok i tielo gi tielo ma piny to jowaco ni:
Kwarere mawan jok'olunjo gimoro kwanyowoko twodo,
gigipiny masisiri m'ongoye iye magowa.
Ji jonyalo timo werin rijo wegi?
Nger gi go jok'obedo werin!
“Riameno adieri akidho fonjo jo, hongo me akidho fonjo jo meni paran gi mwamba paran, aka jolaŋeyo ni nyingan obedo Rwoth.”
Me apaka Rwoth waco: Ji ma Yuda, reco mewin indiko gi bol pen ma nyweny; ogwor iy'adundin mewin gi tele ma cot mac t'idolo i kona ma migame mewin.
Ji mewin jolamo i migame kodi i cal m'ogeti ri were madhako Asera i kisi tiendi yath manyaboke pendi, kodi i wi tendere m'oŋawere,
wi gote i piny m'othangere. Ŋaŋo mewin gi cwe mewin alamiyo paka gim'onyaga; paka cul ri reco mewin iy'adec mewin je parom.
Gi tim mewin won wilakeŋ gir'alunja ma cango amiyo win, aka alamiyo witiy ri jokwor mewin i piny ma wikuya, kole i nge paran mac omoko ma laliel cil gi cil.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
Kwoŋ ri jono ma jogeno nyaka ji
to joloko ji meni pajo,
joma cuny jo bor gi Rwoth.
Jolacale paka dudi iy'opalipat,
aka jok'onen ka bero obin.
Jolabedo kam'othwo ma thim,
i lowo ma cumbi ma ji kibed'iye.
Jasilwany a ŋata geno Rwoth,
ma geno pere nitie i Rwoth.
Go cal
ma rwako tiende i pi ma mol.
Go kilwor lietho k'obino,
aka boke mere doŋ manyaboke pendi.
Go kirembi i hongo ma milengela,
aka kike nyak olemo.
Ŋa manyalo niaŋ cuny dhano?
Ongoye giman ma jatwodo,
go two swa ma kinyal botho.
t'atemo adundin pa ji.
Atiyo gi kisi dhano cungo kwoŋ tim pere,
cungo kwoŋ gima go timo.
Paka winyo ma buto to toŋo tonge ma k'onywolo,
apaka jono ma jodhuro ŋaŋo i yo m'okom;
gi diere kenyo ŋaŋo laweyo jo,
aka i gike ma kwo pajo nyaka to nyutho kamaler ni oyido jomiŋ.
Kom madwoŋ ma dhum, m'oŋawere malo wok i cakirok,
obedo Kabedo Maleŋ mawan!
Awi geno pa Isiraili! Awi Rwoth!
Jono je ma jojwangin ibino ketho jo i wickwot;
jono je ma joweyin ilandiko nyingi jo i pendi piny,
rupiri jotieko jwango cakirok ma pi ma kwo, in Rwoth.
Cangan, awi Rwoth, aka abino cango;
bothan, aka abino both;
kole ibedo pak paran.
Neni paka jopenjan ni,
“Nikune wac pa Rwoth?
Weyi wobin!”
To fodi akiringo t'aweyo bedo jakwath i tic perin,
kosa fodi akigomba teko rijo.
Iŋeyo gim'owok i dhokan;
iŋeyo gim'awaco.
Ikir'ilokere ran lworo madwoŋ;
ibedo kapondo paran i hongo ma teko.
Weyi wiy joma miyan litho wokwoti,
to ikir'imiy wiyan wokwoti;
weyi wiy jo wokwoti,
ikir'imiyan bwok;
keli kwoŋ jo ndelo ma teko;
aka irey jo kicutho.
Rwoth owaco ran ama: Yeremia kidhi icungi i waŋkace pa ji, kama kerin ma Yuda jodonjo gine kodi kama jowok gine, aka i waŋkace je ma Yerusalem,
aka iwaci rijo ni: Winji win wac pa Rwoth, win kerin ma Yuda, Yuda gibe, kodi ji je ma jobedo i Yerusalem, ma jodonjo gi waŋkace me.
Rwoth waco ama: Ro bero ma kwo mewin, gwokere win ni wikibielo bieto i ndelo ma sabato kosa wirwako gino gi waŋkace ma Yerusalem.
Aka wikiri witiŋ bieto wok i udi mewin i sabato kosa witim tic moro je, to kur win sabato paka gimaleŋ, paka aoro kwarere mewin.
Kucel jok'owinjo kosa ciko ithi jo; wiy jo olokere matek to jokwero winjo kosa jolo fonji.
To ka winowinjan, Rwoth waco, to wibedo ma wikikelo bieto moro gi waŋkace ma tindi madwoŋ me i ndelo ma sabato, to wikuro ndelo ma sabato paka gimaleŋ to wibedo ma wikitimo tic i ndelo no,

kenyo nyaka joladonjo i waŋkace ma tindi madwoŋ me, kerin ma jobedo i wi kom ma dhum pa Daudi, ma jogweyo cawilin kodi kayinin, jo kodi jotel pajo, ji ma Yuda kodi joma bedo i Yerusalem; aka ji jolabedo i tindi madwoŋ me cil gi cil.

Ji jolabino wok i tindin ma Yuda kodi kabedo ma jothoko Yerusalem, wok i piny pa Benyamin, wok i tiendi gote, wok i piny matendere, kodi wok yupiny, ka jokelo mic awaŋa kodi cowirok, mic ma kodhi kodi buban, gi kelo mic ma foyo i Ot pa Rwoth.

To ka wik'owinjan, ma kuro ndelo ma sabato paka gimaleŋ, gi tiŋo bieto gi waŋkace ma Yerusalem i ndelo ma sabato, nyaka alamoko mac i waŋkace mere; bino waŋo woko cel ma Yerusalem aka ongoye ŋat'onyal neko.
Wac m'obino ri Yeremia wok bongi Rwoth:
“Ay malo, i lori yupiny i ot pa jacwec degi, aka kenyo alayeyin winjo wac paran.”
Ameno t'aloro yupiny i ot pa jacwec degi, aka kenyo go oyido timo tic pere i wi telin ario ma dwanyo degi.
Atawo m'oyido go cweyo gi lowo nyamasiga onyekere, to ŋinyo meno woko to cako cweyo man, m'osangala go.
Kenyo to wac pa Rwoth bino ran ama:
Akinyali timo gi win, awi ot pa Isiraili, paka jacwec degi me otimo? Rwoth penjo. Paka lowo nyamasiga i cingi jacwec degi, ameno bende apaka winitie i cingan, awi ot pa Isiraili.
Ndelo moro alatuco kwoŋ gima mako nono kosa ker, ni alafudho woko, t'aŋinyo woko, kendo t'areyo woko,
to ka nono no, ma mako kwoŋ gim'atieko luwo kwoŋe, owey timo reco, abino wiro paro paran mako kwoŋ teko m'oyido apiro kelo kwoŋe.
Aka i hongo man alatuco mako kwoŋ nono kosa ker m'abino geto t'apidho.
To k'otimi gimarac m'aneno, k'okwer winjo dwondan, kenyo nyaka alawiro paro paran ma mako kwoŋ bero m'oyido amito timo rigo.

Onyo, riameno, waci ri ji ma Yuda kodi joma bedo i Yerusalem: Rwoth waco ama: Neni, an ajacwec degi apayo gimarac kwoŋ win aka atimo can kwoŋ win. Wire win pama, wijoje wok kwoŋ tim mewin marac, wiwir tim mewin gi kula mewin.
To jolawaco ni, “Mar'aŋo, wak'otim! Walaluwo can mawan wawegi, aka kisi dhano kwoŋ wan latimo gimoro cungo kwoŋ wictek ma gimarac ma cunye oro go.”
Riameno Rwoth waco ama:
Penji win i dier nonin:
Ŋa m'otieko winjo ye gima cale ama?
Ji ma Isiraili jotieko timo
gima kiwacere.
Pe ma Lebanon bende nyalo weyo
jondijo ma joidho got?
Pi ma got bende cwiyo
pi ma mol maŋic?
Kucel ji paran wiy jo owil kodan,
jowaŋo mic ri gima k'adieri;
Jotieko kitangatanga i royin pajo,
i royin pajo macene,
jotieko luwo i ger,
makiweno i ngudo madwoŋ.
Jotieko loko lowo pajo opalipat,
gim'ila cayo cil gi cil.
Joma joluw'iye je jobino bwok gi gima joneni;
to joyengo wiy gin idhier.
Paka koyo ma wok yuwok ceŋ,
alakedho jo ruwaŋ jokwor pajo.
Alanyutho jo dieŋeyan, makiweno nyiman,
i ndelo ma kidamba pajo.

Kenyo to ji jowaco ni, “Biye win watim gimoro ri Yeremia! Kole wak'ocandi jacway ri Were i wi migam ma fonjo wan, jomariek ma miyo wan rieko, kodi jotuci wac Were ma tuco mikwenda pa Were. Biye win, weyi wakel kwoŋe banja, aka weyi wakiri wawinji wac pere moro je.”
Ameno t'akwayo ni, “Winjan, awi Rwoth,
aka iwinji gima jokwor paran jowaco!
Gimarac bende i oro i kabedo pa bero?
Kucel jotieko kunyo ran bur.
Poyi paka cango acungo ruwaŋin
ma luwo bero rijo,
ma miyin ikir'imaki nge gi jo.
Riameno weyi kec woneki nyithindho pajo;
konji woko jo ri tho.
Weyi mon pajo jowongoye gi nyithindho aka jowolokere mon tho.
Weyi cwogi jo jowotho tho two nundu,
soye pajo woneki jo g'abor kama lweny ogunj'iye.
Weyi ywak ma kidamba wowinji wok i udi pajo,
ka inokel jokinyaga abwap kwoŋ jo!
Kole jotieko kunyo bur ni apodh'iye,
aka jotieko yaro bwo ma makan.
Kucel in, awi Rwoth, iŋeyo
can pajo je ma nekan.
Ikir'icwaki reco pajo,
ikir'icwaki reco pajo ruwaŋin.
Weyi wokengila jo ruwaŋin;
tiyi gi jo ka nge omakin.”
Rwoth owaco ran ama: Kidhi inyew jagi pa jacwec degi ma lowo nyamasiga. Kidhi gi jotel pa ji mogo kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotieko tic hongo m'oromo,
aka iwok gi milelo pa wod Hinom i kama donjo i waŋkac pa Potcad, aka ititi kenyo mikwenda m'abino waco rin.

Rwoth owaco ran ni awaci ama: Winji win wac pa Rwoth, win kerin ma Yuda kodi ji ma bedo i Yerusalem. Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Akidho kelo kidamba ma kiwacere kwoŋ kabedo me ma ithi kisi dhano m'owinji kwoŋe bino cwowo gi litho.

Akidho timo gime kwoŋbedo ji jojwangan, aka jotieko koco kabedo me gi miyo mic ri werin man i iye ma jo, kwarere pajo kosa kerin ma Yuda fodi jokuya; kodi kwoŋbedo jotieko poŋo kabedo me gi remo pa ji m'oneki jo m'ongoye gima jotimo marac,
aka jotieko geto migame ri Bal ma waŋo nyithindho pajo i mac paka mic awaŋa ri Bal, m'akiwaco rijo kendo akiyere gine, kosa k'obino kada i paro paran.
Riameno, adieri hongo bino, Rwoth waco, ma kabedo me doko k'olwoŋ ni Tofeth, kosa milelo pa wod Hinom, to milelo ma neki.

I kabedo me can pa Joyuda kodi ji ma Yerusalem moro je ma jotimi latho gaya. Alaweyo jokwor pajo wokengila jo to joneko jo kama lweny ogunj'iye, kodi i cingi jono ma jodwaro kwo pajo. Alamiyo mulambin pajo paka cemo ri winyin ma koyo kodi ri ogwaŋe mager ma piny.
Alakelo rerok ma kiwacere kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me ma kisi ŋat'okadhi je bino dhier to bwok.
Alamiyo jo camo delkwoŋ nyithindho pajo, aka joje jolacamo delkwoŋ wadi jo k'okar jo, kodi i litho ma jokwor pajo kodi jono ma jodwaro kwo pajo jomiyo jo.
Kenyo ibino ŋinyo jagi ka jono ma jokadho kodin joneno,

aka ibino waco rijo ni: Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny waco ama: “Ameno apaka bende alaturo ji me kodi tindi madwoŋ me, paka dhano ŋinyo gima jacwec degi ocweyo gi lowo nyamasiga, m'odoko kinyal mwono. I Tofeth, jolayikere to kabedo ma yikirok rumo.
Ameno apaka alatimo bende ri kabedo me, Rwoth waco, aka ri ji ma jobed'iye, k'aloko tindi madwoŋ me paka Tofeth.

Udi ma Yerusalem kodi udi pa kerin ma Yuda ibino koco paka kabedo ma Tofeth, kodi i dier udi je ma wi kisul pajo otiek waŋ'iye buban ri micalin kodi kam'otiek konj'iye woko vini paka mic ri werin man.”
Munyo Yeremia odwoko wok Tofeth, kam'oyido odhir'iye go tuco wac pere, ocungo i kapido ma Ot pa Rwoth to waco ri ji je ni:
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: “Pama onyo akelo kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me kodi kwoŋ tindin mere je kidamba m'atieko tuco kwoŋe, rupiri wiy jo tek, jokwero winjo wac paran.”
Munyo jacway ri Were i wi migam Pasur wod pa Imer, m'oyido obedo jadwoŋ ma Ot pa Rwoth, owinjo Yeremia tito gigipiny me,
owodho cik ni wogoyan t'ikethan i lijegere cegin kodi waŋkac pa Benyamin ma yumalo i Ot pa Rwoth.
Odikin ma luwo, munyo Pasur otieko gonyo Yeremia i lijegere, Yeremia owaco rigo nike Rwoth k'ocwoko nyingin ni Pasur to ni Lworo madwoŋ i thenge je.

Kole Rwoth waco ama: Alokin lworo madwoŋ ri in won kodi ri merin perin je; aka jolatho g'abor pa jokwor pajo k'ineno. Aka alamiyo Yuda gibe i cingi kere ma Babilon; jolatiŋo jo paka jotwec tero Jobabilon, aka jolaneko jo g'abor.
Alamiyo thoŋino je ma tindi madwoŋ me, magowa mere je, gima iye je ma bey, cwe pa kerin je ma Yuda i cingi jokwor pajo, ma jobino kinyaga jo, jolakwanyo jo to jotero i Babilon.
Aka in, Pasur, kodi jopeco perin je, ilamako win t'itero win i twec i Babilon. Wilatho t'iyiko win koro, win kodi merin mewin je, m'itieko tuco rijo wac Were ma twodo.
Awi Rwoth, itieko wondan,
aka owondan.
Itek loyan,
aka itieko kikengila an.
Kisi dhano jwiyan,
jonyeran hongo je.
Kisi k'aluwo, aripo ywak,
aripo koko ni, “Akaka gi rerok!”
Kwoŋbedo wac pa Rwoth otieko lokere ran
yet kodi nyero hongo je.
K'awaco ni, “Ak'opoy Rwoth,
kosa ak'oluw kendo i nyinge.”
Kenyo i an nitie gimoro ma cale, mac maliel
m'ocegi i cokin paran;
Alocere gi ciro,
aka ak'onyal.
Kole awinjo mwoŋo pa ji kweth:
Lworo madwoŋ thenge je thoko!
Kwedere kwoŋe! Weyi wakwedere kwoŋe!
Merin paran je m'ageno
jokuro neno podho paran.
Kono miti inyalo dwoŋo go,
to wakengila go,
to waculo kwor kwoŋe.
To in, Rwoth, initie kodan, paka jalweny ma jameni,
riameno jono ma jomiyan litho jolapodho piny,
jok'onyalan.
Awi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
itemo joma timo gim'otire
ineno adundo kodi paro;
weyi anen culo kwor perin kwoŋ jo,
kole atieko tito rin teko paran.
Wer ri Rwoth;
paki Rwoth!
Kole go otieko botho kwo pa joma bukony
wok i cingi joreco.
ma cango onywolan'iye!
Ndelo ma min an onywolan'iye,
wokiri wofoy!
Wokwoŋ jal
ma cango okelo mikwenda ri baba, ka waco ni,
“Onywol rin nyathi, majayac.”
To miyo go kisangala tektek.
Weyi jalo wocale gi tindin madongo,
ma Rwoth omako m'ongoye wor
weyi go wowinji ywak odikin
kodi ndur sawa aucel m'odieceŋ,
rupiri go k'onekan gi iy mama;
ameno mama d'olokere kaliel paran,
aka iye d'obedo madwoŋ cil gi cil.
Raŋo onywolan?
Obedo nyaka ma bedo gi teko kodi kumo,
ma cowo kwo paran i wickwot?
Me wac pa Rwoth m'obino ri Yeremia wok bongi Rwoth, munyo kere Zedekia odhiro rigo Pasur wod pa Malikia kodi jacway ri Were i wi migam Zefania wod pa Maseya, ka waco ni,
“Mondo penji Rwoth riwan, rupiri kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon cano lweny gi wan; kono miti Rwoth otim gir'aura riwan, paka noknok timo, to miyo go gonyere kwoŋ wan.”
Kenyo Yeremia owaco rijo ni: Wibino waco ri Zefania ama:
Rwoth waco ama, Were pa Isiraili: “Zedekia, akidho kikengila jolweny perin ma jolwenyo kodi kere ma Babilon kodi jolweny pere ma jothoko win woko ma cel. Alakelo jo kanyacel i dier tindi madwoŋ me.
An won gipi alalweny gi win gi cingan m'oyare gi badan ma meni, i nge, aŋedha cuny kodi i keme madwoŋ.
Alaneko woko joma bedo i tindi madwoŋ me, ji kodi ogwaŋe; jolatho i two nundu madwoŋ.

Rumacen mere, Rwoth waco, alamiyo kere Zedekia ma Yuda, gi ŋecin pere, kodi ji ma tindi madwoŋ me, jono ma joboth two nundu, abor kodi kec i cingi kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, i cingi jokwor pajo, i cingi joma dwaro kwo pajo. Go bino neko jo g'abor mabith; go k'omaki gi jo wor, kosa k'okoy jo, kosa k'omaki wor.”
Kenyo to Rwoth waco ran ni awaci ri ji ni, “E, aketho ruwaŋ win royo ma kwo kodi royo ma tho.
Jono ma jobedo i tindi madwoŋ me jolatho g'abor, kec kodi two nundu; to jono ma jotiŋ cingi jo malo ri Jobabilon ma jothoko win jolakwo aka jolabedo gi kwo pajo paka kemba ma lweny.
Kole atieko como waŋan kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me ro gimarac makiweno ro bero, Rwoth waco. Abino ketho i cingi kere ma Babilon, aka go bino waŋo woko gi mac.”
Ri ot pa kere ma Yuda wac ni: Winji win wac pa Rwoth,
awi nyikway Daudi! Rwoth waco ama:
Tim win tiro odikin,
aka wigony i cingi jadic
kisi nyatoro m'otiek kwalo gipere,
ka k'obedo ameno keme paran bino moko paka mac,
to liel, m'ongoye ŋat'oneki,
kwoŋbedo tim mewin marac.
Amon kodin, Yerusalem, ma bedo malo i wi milelo,
awi paka tele ma kam'obipere, Rwoth waco;
in m'ipenjo ni, “Ŋa m'olor piny kwoŋ wan,
kosa ŋa manyalo donjo i kabedo mawan ma wapond'iye?”
Alamiyo win gir'acula cungo kwoŋ tim mewin, Rwoth waco;
alamoko mac i lul mere,
aka alareyo woko gimoro je m'othoko go.
Me apaka Rwoth waco: Kidhi yupiny i ot pa kere ma Yuda, aka iluwi kenyo wac me,
waci ni, “Winji win wac pa Rwoth, awi kere ma Yuda ma bedo i wi kom ma dhum pa Daudi, win kodi ŋecin mewin, kodi ji mewin ma jodonjo i waŋkace me.

Me apaka Rwoth waco: Tim win gim'otire kodi gir'adieri, aka wigony wok i cingi jadic kisi nyatoro m'otiek kwalo. Wikiri witim gikomo kosa gwayo ri jakicar, nyathi kic, kodi citho, kosa wioy remo pa dhano ma nono i kabedo me.
Ka winowor wac me adieri, nyaka wiladonjo gi waŋkace ma ot me, bongi kerin ma jobedo i kom pa Daudi ma dhum, ma jogweyo cawilin kodi kayinin, jo kodi ŋecin pajo kanyacel gi ji pajo.
To ka wik'owinji wac me, awon akwoŋere, Rwoth waco, ni ot me bino lokere gunda.”
Kole Rwoth waco ama kwoŋ ot pa kere ma Yuda:
Wicale ran Giliad,
paka acurcur ma Lebanon,
t'akwoŋere ni alaloko win thim,
tindi madwoŋ ma kibed'iye.
Alayiko jorey ma jolalwenyo gi win,
joje gi gilweny pajo;
jolatoŋo woko yen sida mewin mabeyo
to joywoyo i mac.
Nonin kweth jolaluwo gi tindi madwoŋ me, aka joje jolapenjere ni, “Raŋo Rwoth otimo nger gime ri tindi madwoŋ me?”
Aka joladwoko ni, “Kwoŋbedo jojwango cikirok pa Rwoth Were pajo, to jolamo werin man kendo to jotiyo rijo.”
Wikiri wiywak dhano m'otho,
kosa wibiy pigi waŋ win rigo;
to biy win pigi waŋ win ri dhano m'oweyo win,
rupiri go k'odwoki
ma neno piny m'onywol'iye go.
Go latho i piny m'oter'iye go paka jatwec, go k'oneni piny me kendo.
Kidamba ri ŋata geto ot pere ma butiro,
kodi kisikin pere ma malo i komo.
Go m'amiyo ji timo rigo tic ma bu cul,
aka kicul jo misara pajo.
Kidamba ri ŋata waco ni,
“Alageto ot paran madwoŋ
gi kisikin malac malo mere.”
Go ketho dirisin iye,
to ketho miango ma thigin mere ma yath sida,
to goy'iye rangi m'obokere.
Lokin kere maber loyo
k'igeto ot ma yath sida,
maber loyo apa joman?
Benin k'ocemo to medho
to timo gitiro kodi gir'adieri?
Kenyo to gigipiny kadho rigo maber.
Othumo banja ri jocandi kodi joma bukony gi tiro;
to bedo rigo maber.
Meno a gima nyutho ŋeyo Rwoth.
To waŋin kodi adundo perin
nitie nyaka i magowa perin ma k'adieri,
ma oyo remo pa ji ma nono,
kodi ri tim ma diyo ji gi gwayo.
Ongoye ŋat'oywaki go k'otho, ka waco ni,
“Awi lelo, omin an!” Kosa “Awi lelo, nyamin an!”
Jok'oywak go ka jowaco ni,
Awi lelo, jadwoŋ paran! Awi lelo, kere paran!
Ilayiko go paka iyiko punda,
m'iywayo t'ibolo woko bor gi waŋkace ma Yerusalem.
Ji ma Yerusalem, kidhi win kiri Lebanon, aka wiywak,
aka wigoy ndur i Basan;
ywak win wok Abarim,
rupiri joma wimaro otiek ŋinyo jo woko.
Rwoth oluwo kodi win munyo wiŋaŋ,
to wikwero winjo.
Me a tim mewin wok i thino mewin,
kole fodi wikiwinjo dwondan.
Jotel mewin je koyo lakudho jo woko,
aka joma wimaro jo jolakadho i twec;
nyaka to wickwot kodi lworo mako win
kwoŋbedo kidakana mewin je.
Awi ji ma Lebanon,
wiywomere m'okwe i dier yen sida,
Winodwanyere nedi ka litho obin kwoŋ win,
litho ma cal kodi apa dhako ma mito nywol.
t'akethin i cingi jono ma jodwaro nekin, i cingi jono m'ilworo jo, kiri i cingi Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon kodi i cingi jolweny pere.
Alabolo win woko kodi dhako m'onywolo win i piny man, kama k'onywol'iye win, to witho kenyo.
Wilamito neno piny me kendo, to wik'ogiki.”
Apenjere ni, “Kere Yehoyakin olokere paka jagi m'obare m'ibolo woko m'ongoye ŋata miti? Meno am'omiyo go kodi nyithindho pere obol jo woko i twec i piny ma jokuya?”
Awi piny, piny, piny,
winji wac pa Rwoth!
Rwoth waco ama:
“Ndiki jame pa ŋat'ongoye gi nyathi,
jal ma i hongo pere ongoye gima lakadho rigo maber;
kole ongoye nyathi pere mogo m'onyal
bedo i wi kom ma dhum pa Daudi,
to dhumo i Yuda kendo.”
Kidamba ri jokwath ma joreyo aka jokedho rombo ma lum paran! Rwoth waco.

Riameno me apaka Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco, kwoŋ jokwath ma jokwayo ji paran: “Obedo win ma witieko kedho rombo paran, aka witieko riemo jo woko, aka wikidewo kwoŋ jo. Riameno alatic gi win ro tim mewin marac, Rwoth waco.
Kenyo an won gipi alacoko rombo paran m'odoŋ wok i piny m'atieko kedh'iye jo, t'adwoko jo i sidwol pajo, jolanywol to jonyay.
Alaketho jokwath ma kikwonga. Ji paran jok'obedi malwor kendo, kosa jok'obwok, kosa ongoye m'orweny, Rwoth waco.”
I hongo pere ilabotho Yuda kodi Isiraili aka ji ma Isiraili jolabedo i siem. Aka me a nyingi m'ibino lwoŋo gine go: “Rwoth a tiro mawan.”
Riameno, hongo bino adieri, Rwoth waco, ma k'owaci kendo ni, “Paka Were kwo go m'ofudho ji ma Isiraili woko ma piny Misir.
Kucel, jolakwoŋere kodan paka Were makwo m'ofudho ji ma Isiraili woko ma yumalo kodi wok i piny je m'oyido akedh'iye jo.” Kenyo jolabedo i piny pajo won.
Ma mako kwoŋ jotuci wac Were:
Adundo paran oŋidhere woko,
aka cokin paran yengere;
alokere paka jamero,
paka ŋat'omer gi vini,
kwoŋbedo Rwoth
kodi kwoŋbedo wac pere maleŋ.
Kole piny gi ji jokigenere ri Rwoth;
kwoŋbedo kwoŋ, piny ywak,
aka lum ma thim jothwo woko.
Tim pajo rac,
aka jokiori meni pajo maber.
Jotuci wac Were kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam je jokuya Were;
kiri i ot paran je atieko nwaŋo kidakana pajo, Rwoth waco.
Riameno ger pajo lalokere rijo
paka ger mafoth i mudho,
m'iladhir'iye jo to jopodho piny.
Kole alakelo kidamba kwoŋ jo
i oro ma gir'acula pajo, Rwoth waco.
In jotuci wac Were ma Samaria
aneno gimijokere:
Joluwo i nyingi Bal
to jorwenyo woko ji paran Isiraili.
aneno gima kiwacere loyo:
Jotimo cot to joluwo twodo;
jokonyo ji timo gimarac,
ŋey wongoye ŋata weyo timo kidakana.
Joje jolokere paka Sodom ri an,
aka ji ma iye paka Gomora.
Riameno Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny waco ama kwoŋ jotuci wac Were:
“Akidho miyo jo camo yath makec
t'amiyo jo madho pi ma kwir;
kwoŋbedo wok kwoŋ jotuci wac Were ma Yerusalem
tim ma bu Were otieko nyay i piny gipi.”
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama ri ji ma Yerusalem: Wikiri wiwinji wac ma jotuci wac Were no jowaco riwin; jowaco riwin gitwodo. Joluwo kwoŋ menyirok ma paro pajo wegi, ma k'owoki i dhok Rwoth.
Jowaco noknok ri jono ma jobwono wac pa Rwoth ni, “Gigipiny lakadho riwin maber kodi ri ji je ma wiy gin tek ma wegi jotimo gima jomito, ka jowaco ni, ‘Ongoye teko ma lapodho kwoŋ win.’”
Apenjo ni, “Ŋa m'otieko ye bedo i romo pa Rwoth
ŋey wonyali neno gi winjo wac pere?
Ŋa m'otieko ye ciko ithe ri wac pere ŋey wonyali tuco?
Neni, nge pere cal mor pa koth!
Keme pere otieko fudhere,
asur madwoŋ;
lakedhere woko i wiy jokidakana.
Nge pa Rwoth k'owire aŋey
cuka ocow to ketho i kare
atoŋa ma paro pere.
I hongo ma rumacen wilaniaŋ gino maber.”
Rwoth waco ni, “Go k'odhiro jotuci wac Were,
kucel joŋweco;
go k'oluwo gi jo,
kucel joluwo i nyingan.
To bedi jobedi i romo paran,
nyaka di jotuco wac paran ri ji paran,
aka di jowiro jo wok i yo pajo marac,
kodi i tim pajo marac.”
Abedo Were macegin, Rwoth penjo, makiweno mabor?
Jokune ma jonyalo pondo kam'opanere ŋey akir'anen jo? Rwoth penjo. Wikuya ni anitie kisi kamoro i polo kodi i piny? Rwoth penjo.
Atieko winjo gima jotuci wac Were jotieko waco ma jotuco wac ma twodo i nyingan, ka jowaco ni, “Aleko, aleko!”
Kiri keraŋo ma jotuci wac Were no jomien ji paran gi luwo twodo, gi joma joluwo twodo mar'adundin pajo wegi?
Jotimo can ma miyo wiy ji paran wil kodan gi lek pajo ma jokowo ri wadi gin, paka wiy kwarere pajo owil kodan kwoŋbedo Bal.
Weyi jotuci wac Were manitie gi lek wowaci, to weyi ŋata nitie gi wac paran woluwi wac paran ma k'onyeko. Bero aŋo ma kanja nitie gine k'opima gi ŋano? Rwoth penjo.
Wac paran kicale gi mac, Rwoth penjo, paka nyundu ma baro tele mathindho thindho?
Riameno, abedo jakwor pa jotuci wac Were ma jokwalo wac paran bongi wadi gin, Rwoth waco.
Abedo jakwor pa jotuci wac Were ma wegi joluwo wac pajo to jokethere ni owok bongan, Rwoth waco.

Winji win, abedo jakwor pa jono ma joluwo twodo, Rwoth waco, ma joluwo to jorwenyo ji paran gi twodo pajo gi timo gigipiny kicar, m'akioro jo kosa aketho jo; ameno ongoye gimoro kad'acel ma jokonyo gine ji me, Rwoth waco.

Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Yeremia, ka ŋat'acel kwoŋ ji me kosa jatuci wac Were kosa jacway ri Were i wi migam openjin ni, ‘Bieto pa Rwoth obedo aŋo?’ Iwaci rigo ni, ‘Iŋat'ibedo bieto ri Rwoth, aka go lajwangin, Rwoth waco.’ ”
Ka ŋatimoro kwoŋ ji paran, kosa jatuci wac Were kosa jacway ri Were i wi migam bende oor wac ni bieto pa Rwoth, alamiyo jo gir'acula kodi pecin pajo.
Kucel, joripo penjo wadi jo kodi wade pajo ni, Radwok aŋo ma Rwoth omiyo? Rwoth owaco nedi?
Ameno jokiripi kendo oro wac ni bieto pa Rwoth, rupiri ka ŋatimoro otim, alaloko mikwenda paran bieto mar'adieri rigo. Ji jotieko wiro woko wac pa Were makwo, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were mawan.
Yeremia, ipenji jotuci wac Were no ama: Radwok aŋo ma Rwoth omiyo win? Rwoth owaco nedi?
To ka jokwer winjo or paran to jooro wac ni bieto pa Rwoth, kenyo wac rijo ni,
riameno alakwanyo jo t'abolo jo woko bor kodan, win kodi tindi madwoŋ ma cango amiyo win kodi kwarere mewin.
Alayimo kwoŋ win lifol kodi wickwot ma cil gi cil, ma wiy ji k'owil gine.
Adita marapena otiŋo nyandere maber tektek, nger nyandere ma pen cek; to adita man mere oyido otiŋo nyandere marac tektek, ma k'onyalo camere.
To Rwoth penjan ni, “Yeremia, ineno aŋo?” Adwoko ni, “Nyanderin, nyanderin mabeyo, jobeyo tektek, nyanderin mareco, jorac tektek, ma kinyal camo.”
Kenyo wac pa Rwoth obino ran.
Me apaka Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Paka nyanderin ma jobeyo me, alatero paka gimaber jotwec ma jowok Yuda, m'atieko riemo jo woko wok i kabedo me kidho i piny ma Babilon.
Alacomo waŋan kwoŋ jo kicutho, aka aladwoko jo i piny me. Alageto jo, aka ak'orey woko jo; alapidho jo, aka k'ofudhi jo.
Alamiyo adundo ma miyo jo ŋeyo ni Abedo Rwoth; jolabedo ji paran t'abedo Were pajo, kwoŋbedo jolagik bongan g'adundin pajo je.

To Rwoth waco ama: “Paka nyanderin mareco tektek ma kinyal camo, ameno apaka alatic kodi Kere Zedekia ma Yuda, jotel pere, ji ma jodoŋ Yerusalem ma jodoŋ i piny me, kodi jono ma jobedo i piny ma Misir.
Alaloko jo ginyero, gimoro marac, ri kerin je ma piny, lifol, gir'awaca, aŋala, t'ioro nyingi jo paka kwoŋ kisi kamoro je m'akedh'iye jo.
Alakelo lweny, kec, two nundu kwoŋ jo, cuka jorere woko kicutho wok i piny m'amiyo jo kodi kwarere pajo.”
ma jatuci wac Were Yeremia oluw'iye gi ji je ma Yuda kodi ji je ma jobedo i Yerusalem:
Ma oro piero ario g'adek, wok i oro mar'apar g'adek apa Kere Yosia wod pa Amon ma Yuda, tundo gunyo ni, wac pa Rwoth obino ran, aka atieko luwo g'amen riwin, to wikwero winjo.
Kada nende Rwoth omena dhiro riwin ŋecin pere jotuci wac Were, fodi wikiwinjo kosa ciko ithi win ma winjo
ka jowaco ni, “Wire win, kisi dhano kwoŋ win, i royo mewin marac kodi tim ma kidakana, nyaka to widoŋ i piny ma Rwoth otieko miyo win kodi kwarere mewin macon kodi ma cil gi cil.
Jowaco riwin ni wikiri wikwoŋ to witiyo ri werin man gi bedo ma wikimiyo Rwoth nge gi lamo cal ma witimo. Bedi wiwinji Rwoth, di go k'omiyo win gir'acula.”
Kucel wikwero winjan, Rwoth waco, aka ameno onyo wikwinyo nge paran gi cal mewin ma witimo aka onyo wikelo litho kwoŋ win.
Riameno me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco: “Kwoŋbedo winjo wac paran,

akidho dhiro ri nonin je ma yumalo, Rwoth waco, kiri ri Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, ŋeca paran, alakelo jo kwoŋ piny me kodi ji ma iye, kodi kwoŋ nonin me thoko; alareyo jo kicutho, t'aloko jo ginyero kodi gidhier, gibwok ma cil gi cil.
Alareyo woko kwoŋ jo derino ma siemirok kodi ma kisangala, dwondi jamweha kodi dwondi mweha, derino pa cuma ma rego kodi lero pa tala.
Piny me gibe lalokere gunda gi kam'ojwangi, aka nonin me jolatic ri kere ma Babilon ma oro piero ario.
Kenyo ka oro piero ario otieko rumo, alamiyo gir'acula ri kere ma Babilon kodi nono no, piny ma Babilon, ro reco pajo, Rwoth waco, k'aloko piny no gunda ma cil gi cil.
Alakelo kwoŋ piny no wac je m'atieko luwo, kisi gimoro je m'ondiki i kitawo me, ma Yeremia otieko luwo kwoŋe kwoŋ nonin je.
Kole nonin kweth kodi kerin madongo jolaloko jo ŋecin; aka alaculo jo cungo kwoŋ tim pajo kodi tic ma cingi jo.”
Me apaka Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili, owaco ran: “Ee agwata ma vini ma keme paran, aka imiy nonin je m'adhirin bongi jo jowomadhi.
Jolamadho to jotangatanga to wiy jo nyekere kwoŋbedo abor m'adhiro i dier jo.”
Ameno akwanyo agwata i cingi Rwoth, t'amiyo nonin je ma Rwoth odhiran bongi jo madho.
Yerusalem kodi tindin madongo ma Yuda, kerin mere kodi jotel mere, ma loko jo gundin kodi kam'ojwangi, gima miyo dhano dhier kodi kwoŋ, paka jonitie kiri konon.
Ee nyingi joman ma jomadho gim'oyido nitie iy'agwata: Farawo kere ma Misir, ŋecin pere, jotel pere, kodi ji pere je;
ji je m'oruwere; kerin je ma piny ma Uz; kerin je ma piny pa Jofilistia paka tindin madongo ma Asikelon, Gaza, Ekiron, kodi jom'odoŋ ma Asdod;
Edom, Mowab, kodi Joamon;
kerin je ma Tire, kerin je ma Sidon, kodi kerin je ma kigodin m'othoko nam;
Dedan, Tema, Buzi, kodi ji je ma jolielo wiy jo;
kerin je mapa Jowarabu kodi kerin pa ji je m'oruwere ma jobedo i thim;
kerin je ma Zimiri, kerin je ma Elam, kodi kerin je ma Mediya;
kerin je ma yumalo, ma jowok bor gi cegin, ma joluwere, kodi kerin ma piny ma jonitie. Ka jocowo, kere ma Babilon bino madho.
Kenyo to Rwoth waco ran ama: Waci ri ji ni Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Medhi win, mer win to wiŋok. Podhi win piny to meni loyo win ma ay, kwoŋbedo abor m'adhiro i dier win.
To ka jokwer jolo agwata wok i cingin ma madho gima iye, kenyo ibino waco rijo ama: Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Wiripo madho!
Kole acako kelo rerok kwoŋ tindi paran madwoŋ, aka winonyali geŋo nedi gir'acula? Ak'owey m'akimiyo win gir'acula, kwoŋbedo alwoŋo abor kwoŋ ji je ma jobedo i piny, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
In Yeremia, iripo tuco rijo kisi gimoro je
m'atieko waco. Iripo waco rijo ama:
Rwoth lakiuja wok i polo,
kodi wok i kabedo pere maleŋ to jero;
go lakiuja gi meni kwoŋ ji pere,
to koko paka jono ma jodhiŋo olemo,
kwoŋ ji je ma jobedo i piny.
Derino lawinjere i tielo je ma piny,
rupiri Rwoth nitie gi banja kwoŋ nonin;
go donjo i thumo banja ri ji je,
aka joma jotimo banja, go laneko jo,
Rwoth waco.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
Eno teko bino wok i nono tundo i nono,
aka koyo madwoŋ cokere
wok i witum ma piny.
I ndelo no del pa jono ma Rwoth oneko laywore wok i tielo gi tielo ma piny. Ongoye ŋata laywako jo, k'ocoki jo, aka k'oyiki jo. Jolabedo i wi lowo paka woyo.
Ywak win, win jokwath pa ji, aka wigoy ndur;
ŋindere win i buru, win rwodhe pa mwendi.
Kole ndelo ma neko win otundo kodi kedhirok mewin,
aka wilagore piny paka atawo maŋon.
Gima jokwath joori ma kwalok ladhiero jo,
aka langoye nger ma kwalok ri rwodhe pa mwendi.
Winji ywak pa jokwath,
kodi ywak pa rwodhe pa mwendi!
Kole Rwoth reyo woko lum pajo,
aka mwendi ma jobedo i siem jokedhere
kwoŋbedo nge pa Rwoth maliel.
Paka simbwor ma weyo ŋungu pere, Rwoth ojwango ji pere,
kole piny olokere gunda,
kwoŋbedo abor pa Rwoth mager,
gi kwoŋbedo nge pere maliel.
Me apaka Rwoth waco: Cungi i kapido ma Ot pa Rwoth, aka iluwi kodi ji ma jowok i tindin madongo ma Yuda ma jobino lamo i Ot pa Rwoth; luw rijo wac je m'aorin; ikir'iwey gimoro kad'acel.
Kono miti jowinji, joje, to jowire wok i yo pajo marac, ŋey anyal wiro paro paran kwoŋ teko ma mito kelo kwoŋ jo kwoŋbedo tim pajo marac.
Ibino waco rijo ni, Rwoth waco ama: Ka winokwer winjan, ma woro cik paran m'amiyo win,
to wiwinjo wac pa ŋecin paran jotuci wac Were m'adhiro riwin i yoto kada wikwero winjo,
nyaka alaloko ot me paka Silo, aka alaloko tindi madwoŋ me kwoŋ ri nonin je ma i piny.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotuci wac Were kodi ji je jowinjo Yeremia luwo wac me i Ot pa Rwoth.
Munyo Yeremia otieko luwo gimoro je ma Rwoth ooro go ni wowaci ri ji je, kenyo to jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotuci wac Were kodi ji je jopodho kwoŋe, ka jowaco ni, “Ilatho!”
Raŋo iluwo i nyingi Rwoth, k'iwaco ni, Ot me lacale Silo, aka tindi madwoŋ lajwangere, m'ongoye ji? To ji jocokere thoko Yeremia i Ot pa Rwoth.
Munyo jotel ma Yuda jowinjo gime, jobino wok i ot pa kere to jokidho i Ot pa Rwoth to jobedo piny i Waŋkac Manyen pa Rwoth.

Kenyo to jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotuci wac Were jowaco ri jotel kodi ri ji je ni, “Jame mito thumo rigo banja ma tho rupiri go otieko luwo kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me, paka wiwegi witieko winjo gi ithi win.”
Kenyo to Yeremia oluwo kodi jotel je kodi ji je ka waco ni, “Obedo Rwoth am'ooran ni aluw kwoŋ Ot pa Rwoth me kodi tindi madwoŋ me wac je ma witieko winjo.
Onyo riameno wir win yo mewin kodi tim mewin, aka wiwinji dwondi Rwoth Were mewin, aka Rwoth bino wiro paro pere kwoŋ rerok ma go otieko luwo kwoŋ win.
To paka ri an, an ee i cingi win. Tim win kodan gima wiparo ni ber aka otire riwin.
Ŋey win nyaka gimoro acel adieri ni, ka winonekan, win kodi ji ma tindi madwoŋ me wilabedo gi banja ma neko dhano m'ongoye gi banja, rupiri obedo Rwoth am'ooran kelo wac me je riwin ni wiwinji.”
Kenyo to jotel kodi ji je jowaco ri jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotuci wac Were ni, “Jame kiripi kodi banja ma tho, rupiri go otieko luwo kodi wan i nyingi Rwoth Were mawan.”
Rumacen to jotel mogo ma piny joay malo to jowaco ri ji m'oyido jocokere ama:
Munyo Hezekia oyido obedo Kere ma Yuda, jatuci wac Were Mika m'owok Moras owaco ri ji je ma Yuda ni Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
Ilafuro Zayon paka ndelo;
Yerusalem lalokere kidhur gunda,
aka tendere ma Ot pa Rwoth lalokere lul.

Kere Hezekia kodi ji ma Yuda jok'oneko Mika. Kucel, Hezekia omiyo Rwoth dwoŋ aka otemo mito ni Rwoth wonyuthi go ŋono. Rwoth owiro paro pere kwoŋ rerok m'oyido go ociko kelo kwoŋ jo. Onyo wan ee wacegin kelo rerok madwoŋ kwoŋ wan.
Obedo jal moro man, Uriya wod pa Semaya m'owok Keriath Yirim, m'oluwo i nyingi Rwoth kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me kodi kwoŋ piny me i nger acel paka Yeremia otimo.
Munyo Kere Yehoyakim, gi jolweny pere kodi jotel pere jowinjo wac pa Uriya, kere otemo mito neko go. To munyo Uriya owinjo kwoŋ gino, lworo omako go to ringo pondo Misir.
Kenyo Kere Yehoyakim to dhiro Elinathan wod pa Akibor kodi cwo mogo mako Uriya.
Jokelo Uriya bongi Kere Yehoyakim wok Misir, m'oneko go g'abor to bolo delkwoŋe kam'iyik'iye ji ma kisi ndelo.
To cingi Ahikam wod pa Safan oyido nitie gi Yeremia m'omiyo k'onyal ketho go i cingi ji ma neko go.
Rwoth owaco ran ama: Tim majogi ma thondhe kodi ma nyweny rin, aka ikethi i ŋutin.
Idhiri mikwenda ri kere ma Edom, kere ma Mowab, kere pa Joamon, kere ma Tire, kodi kere ma Sidon k'iluwo gi bongi jomikwenda ma jobino i Yerusalem bongi kere Zedekia ma Yuda.
Miy jo or me ri jodongo pajo: Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Me a gima wilawaco ri jodongo mewin:
Obedo an ma gi meni paran madwoŋ gi badan m'arieyo m'acweyo gine piny, ji kodi ogwaŋe je manitie i piny, t'amiyo ŋat'asangala gine.
Pama atieko ketho piny me i cingi Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, ŋeca paran, aka atieko miyo go kiri ogwaŋe mager madudi tiyo rigo.
Nonin je jolatic rigo, ri wote kodi nyikwaye cuka hongo ma ker pere won opodh'iye, nyaka to nonin man kodi kerin madongo joloko go ŋeca pajo.

To ka nono moro kosa ker moro k'otiy ri kere me, Nebukadineza ma Babilon, to ketho ŋute i majogi pa kere ma Babilon, kenyo abino miyo nono no gir'acula g'abor, gi kec kodi two nundu, Rwoth waco, cuka anocow reyo woko gi cingan.

In, riameno, ikiripi winjo jotuci wac Were perin, kosa dhano moro je ma paro ni ongoye gima latimere yuwaŋe, jolek, joma luwo gi cuny jom'otho kodi jomiliel. Jobino waco rin ni, “Ikir'itiy ri kere ma Babilon.”
Kole joluwo riwin twodo, aka lamiyo wokwany win t'itero win i piny man mabor. Alariemo win woko, aka wilarere woko.
To nono moro je m'okel ŋute to rwako i majogi pa kere ma Babilon to tiyo rigo, kenyo abino weyo win wibedi i piny mewin, wifur to wibedo kenyo, Rwoth waco.
Aluwo gi kere Zedekia ma Yuda i nger acel ama: Keli ŋuti win i majogi pa kere ma Babilon, witiy rigo gi ji pere, aka wibino kwo.
Raŋo wiripo tho, win kodi ji mewin g'abor, gi kec kodi two nundu, paka Rwoth otieko luwo ma mako kwoŋ nono moro je ma k'otiy ri kere ma Babilon?
Wikiri wiwinji wac pa jotuci wac Were ma jowaco riwin kwero tic ri kere ma Babilon, kole joluwo twodo riwin.
Akidhiro jo, Rwoth waco, to joluwo twodo i nyingan, ma lamiyo woriem win woko to wirere, win kodi jotuci wac Were ma joluwo riwin.

Kenyo t'aluwo kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi ji me je, k'awaco ni: Rwoth waco ama: Wikiri wiwinji wac pa jotuci wac Were mewin ma joluwo riwin, jowaco ni, “Atewe ma Ot pa Rwoth, icegin dwoko wok Babilon.” Kole jotuco riwin twodo.
Wikiri wiwinji jo; tiyi win ri kere ma Babilon aka wilakwo. Raŋo tindi madwoŋ me wolokere gunda?

Adieri ka jobedo jotuci wac Were, aka ka wac pa Rwoth nitie gi jo, kenyo weyi jowopidi gi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, ni atewe m'owey i Ot pa Rwoth, i ot pa kere ma Yuda, kodi i Yerusalem wokiri woter i Babilon.
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama kwoŋ sirin, nam, madalin, kodi atewe man m'odoŋ i tindi madwoŋ me,
ma Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon k'okadho gine munyo otero i twec wok Yerusalem kidho Babilon, Kere Yekonia wod pa Yehoyakim ma Yuda, kodi jotel je ma Yuda gi Yerusalem.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili, waco ama kwoŋ atewe m'owey i Ot pa Rwoth, i ot pa kere ma Yuda, kodi i Yerusalem:
Ilatero Jobabilon, aka jolabedo kenyo cuka tundo ndelo m'anociki ithan rijo, Rwoth waco. Kenyo alakelo jo t'adwoko jo i kabedo me.
“Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Atieko turo woko meni pa kere ma Babilon.
I hongo ma oro ario aladwoko i kabedo me atewe je ma Ot pa Rwoth, ma Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon okwanyo wok i kabedo me to tero Babilon.
Aladwoko bende i kabedo me Kere Yekonia wod pa Yehoyakim ma Yuda, kodi jotwec je wok Yuda ma jokidho Babilon, Rwoth waco, rupiri alaturo woko meni pa kere ma Babilon.”
Kenyo to jatuci wac Were Yeremia luwo kodi jatuci wac Were Hanania munyo jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi ji je m'oyido jonitie jocungo i Ot pa Rwoth;
to jatuci wac Were Yeremia waco ni, “Ayeyo! Weyi Rwoth wotim ameno; weyi Rwoth wokethi i kare wac je m'itieko luwo, aka wodwoki i kabedo me wok Babilon atewe ma Ot pa Rwoth kodi jotwec je.
To winji win wac me m'aluwo ka wiwinjo kodi ka ji je jowinjo.
Jotuci wac Were ma jopen bedo riwin gi an wok i hongo macon joluwo kwoŋ lweny, kec kodi two nundu kwoŋ piny kweth kodi kerin madongo.
Paka ri jatuci wac Were m'oluwo kwoŋ siem, ka wac pa jatuci wac Were no obedi adieri, nyaka bino ŋeyere ni Rwoth adieri am'odhiro jatuci wac Were no.”
Kenyo jatuci wac Were Hanania to kwanyo majogi i ŋuti jatuci wac Were Yeremia to turo woko.

Hanania oluwo munyo ji je jowinjo, owaco ni, “Rwoth waco ama: Ama apaka alaturo woko meni pa Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon wok i ŋuti nonin je nyaka i oro ario kende.” Kenyo jatuci wac Were Yeremia to kadho yo pere.
Kare moro munyo jatuci wac Were Hanania otieko turo woko majogi wok i ŋuti jatuci wac Were Yeremia, wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia ama:
“Kidhi iwaci ri Hanania, Rwoth waco ama: Itieko turo woko majogi ma mbawo to alayiko man ma nyweny lunjo jo!

Kole me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco: Atieko ketho majogi ma nyweny i ŋuti nonin me je ŋey jowonyal tic ri Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, aka adieri jolatic rigo; atieko miyo kiri ogwaŋe mager madudi tiyo rigo.”
Jatuci wac Were Yeremia to waco ri jatuci wac Were Hanania ni, “Winji, Hanania, Rwoth k'odhirin, aka imiyo ji me joketho geno pajo i twodo.
Riameno Rwoth waco ama: Akidho kwanyin woko i piny. I oro me won ilatho, rupiri itieko luwo gwenyirok kwoŋ Rwoth.”
I oro no won, i dwe mar'abirio, to jatuci wac Were Hanania tho.
Gime otimere munyo Yekonia kodi nyamicala, jotel ma kapido, jotel ma Yuda gi Yerusalem, jopac, jothedhi nyweny oyido jotieko ay wok Yerusalem.
Balwa no odhir i cingi Elasa wod pa Safan kodi Gemaria wod pa Hilikia, ma Kere Zedekia ma Yuda odhiro i Babilon bongi Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon. Owaco ama:
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama, ri jotwec je m'adhiro jo i twec wok i Yerusalem kidho Babilon:
Geti win udi to wibed'iye. Pidhi win cemo to wicamo ranyak mere.
Nywom win to winywolo nyithindho. Nywom win ri wot win, aka wiyey nyiki win jowonywomere, ŋey jowonyal nywolo nyithindho; jowonyay kenyo ma jok'omojere.
To tiyi win ri bero pa tindi madwoŋ kam'adhiro win'iye i twec, aka wikway Rwoth i nyingi jo, rupiri i bero pajo wilalimo bero.

Kole me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Wikiri wiyey jotuci wac Were kodi joma joparo ni joŋeyo gima latimere yuwaŋe ma jonitie i dier win jowowondi win, aka wikiri wiwinji lek pajo ma joleko,
rupiri obedo twodo ama joluwo riwin kwoŋe i nyingan, akidhiro jo, Rwoth waco.
Adieri aŋeyo can m'anitie gine riwin, Rwoth waco, can ma bero mewin makiweno raco, ma miyo win hongo ma yuwaŋe gi geno.
Kenyo nyaka ka wilwoŋan to wibino to wikwayan, alawinjo win.
Ka wirangan, wilanwaŋan, ka widwaran gi cuny win je,
wilanwaŋan, Rwoth waco. Aladwoko silwany mewin t'acoko win wok i nonin je kodi kabedo je m'akedh'iye win, Rwoth waco. Aladwoko win i kabedo m'akwany'iye win t'atero win wiloka.”
Kwoŋbedo witieko waco ni, “Rwoth otieko miyo wan jotuci wac Were i Babilon.”
Rwoth waco ama kwoŋ kere ma bedo i kom ma dhum pa Daudi, kodi kwoŋ ji je ma jobedo i tindi madwoŋ me, wade mewin ma jok'okadho gi win i wiloka.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama, akidho gonyo kwoŋ jo abor, kec kodi two nundu, aka alaloko jo paka nyandere m'otop marac swa ma kinyal camo.
Alariemo jo g'abor, gi kec kodi two nundu, aka alaloko jo gibwok ri kerin je ma piny. Jolabedo paka kwoŋ, gibwok, gidhier, kodi ginyero i dier nonin je kam'atieko kedh'iye jo.
Gime latimere rijo kwoŋbedo jok'oworo mikwenda paran, munyo amena dhiro rijo ŋecin paran jotuci wac Were. Jokwero winjo, Rwoth waco.
To onyo pama, win ma winitie i wiloka je m'ariemo wok Yerusalem kidho Babilon, winji win wac pa Rwoth.

Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama, ma mako Ahab wod pa Kolaya kodi Zedekia wod pa Maseya, ma joluwo gitwodo i nyingan. Akidho ketho jo i cingi Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, aka go laneko jo ka wineno.
Ka ji m'oter jo paka jotwec wok Yerusalem kidho Babilon jomito kelo kwoŋ nyatoro, jobino waco ni, “Weyi Rwoth wotim riwin paka Zedekia kodi Ahab, ma kere ma Babilon obulo jo i mac.”
Kwoŋbedo jotimo gimiŋo i Isiraili to jotimo cot gi mon pa wadi gin, aka jotieko luwo wac ma twodo i nyingan m'akioro jo; aŋat'aŋeyo aka abedo jakony, Rwoth waco.
Waci ri Semaya ma Nehelam ni:

Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: I nyingin won idhiro balwa ri ji je ma jonitie i Yerusalem, kodi ri jacway ri Were i wi migam Zefania wod pa Maseya, kodi ri jocway ri Were i wi migam je, k'iwaco ama:

Rwoth won gipi am'olokin jacway ri Were i wi migam i kabedo pa jacway ri Were i wi migam Yehoyada, ŋey jotic jowonyal bedo i Ot pa Rwoth ma geŋo ŋatimoro ma kethere ni obedo jatuci wac Were, ma ketho go i lijegere ma ŋute oŋinere.
Onyo riameno raŋo ikibwoko Yeremia ja Anathoth m'okethere ni go obedo jatuci wac Were riwin?
Rupiri go obino bongi wan i Babilon, ka waco ni, “Labedo hongo malac; geti win udi wibed'iye, fur win cemo to wicamo ranyak mere.”
Jacway ri Were i wi migam Zefania osoma balwa me munyo jatuci wac Were Yeremia winjo.
Kenyo to wac pa Were bino ri Yeremia:
Dhiri ri joma nitie i wiloka je mikwenda me, k'iwaco ni, “Rwoth waco ama Semaya ja Nehelam: Kwoŋbedo Semaya otieko luwo gi win, kad'akidhiro go, aka otieko miyo win ketho geno mewin i twodo,

riameno Rwoth waco ama: Akidho miyo Semaya ja Nehelam kodi nyikwaye gir'acula. Go k'obedi kodi nyatoro moro je makwo kwoŋ ji me m'onen gimaber m'akidho timo ri ji paran, Rwoth waco, rupiri go otieko luwo gwenyirok kwoŋ Rwoth.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia wok bongi Rwoth ka waco ama:
Rwoth Were pa Isiraili, waco ama: Ndiki i kitawo wac je m'atieko waco rin.
Kole ndelo bino adieri, Rwoth waco, m'abino dwoko lim pa ji paran, Isiraili kodi Yuda. Rwoth waco, aladwoko jo i lowo m'amiyo kwarere pajo aka jolalunjo.
Me wac ma Rwoth oluwo ma mako kwoŋ Isiraili kodi Yuda:
Rwoth waco ama:
Watieko winjo ywak ma kirin,
ywak ma lworo kodi ngoye pa siem.
Mondo penjere pama, aka neni,
jacwo bende nyalo nywolo nyathi?
To raŋo aneno kisi jacwo omako iye paŋini dhako ma nywol?
Raŋo jolokere matar?
Kidamba! Ndelo no dwoŋ swa
ongoye ma pimere gine;
obedo hongo ma litho ri ji paran;
kucel ilabotho jo kwoŋe.
I ndelo no, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, alaturo majogi manitie i ŋuti jo t'akwanyo woko lijegere i ŋuti jo. Jopath jok'olok jo ŋecin kendo.
Kucel, jolatic ran, Rwoth Were pajo, kodi nyakwar Daudi kere pajo, m'abino ketho paka kere.
kosa wikiri wibwoki, awi Isiraili;
kole akidho botho win wok bor,
kodi nyikway win wok i lowo ma twec pajo.
Wiladwoko peco to wibedo i siem;
wilabedo m'ongoye teko, aka langoye ŋata bino miyo win lworo.
Kole anitie gi win, Rwoth waco, ma botho win;
alaketho i gike nonin je
m'akedho win i dier jo,
to akilareyo woko win.
Alamiyo win gir'acula paka ripo,
aka ak'owey m'akimiyo win gir'acula.
Kole Rwoth waco ama:
Adhola mewin kicangere,
kama lithi mewin oasere.
Ongoye ŋata nyalo kuro win,
wingoye gi yath ma mado adhola mewin,
ongoye geno ma botho riwin.
Jomitirok mewin je wiy jo owil gi win;
jokipar kada kwoŋ win.
Kole atieko monjo win paka jakwor,
gir'acula mewin obedo magway,
kwoŋbedo kidakana mewin madwoŋ.
Raŋo wiywak ri kama lithi mewin?
Litho mewin kicangere.
Amiyo win nger gir'acula me
kwoŋbedo reco mewin thoth
aka kidakana mewin dwoŋ.
Riameno jono je ma jorey win woko ilareyo woko jo,
aka jokwor mewin je, kisi dhano kwoŋ jo, ilatero jo i twec.
Jono je ma jonyaga win, ilakinyaga jo,
aka jono ma jodiy win, iladiyo jo bende.
Kole alamiyo wilama kendo;
aka alacango adholin mewin je, Rwoth waco.
Kwoŋbedo jotieko lwoŋin ni jawoko;
Zayon m'ongoye ŋata dewo kwoŋe,
Rwoth waco ama:
Akidho dwoko ji paran i lowo pajo,
t'anyutho ŋono ri kisi peco.
Ilageto Yerusalem kendo,
t'idwoko cel pa kere mere kendo.
Ji ma jobedo kenyo jolawero pak;
jolakoko ri kisangala.
Alaloko jo mathoth, aka jokilabedo manok,
alamiyo wowor jo, aka k'ocay jo.
Nyithindho pajo jolabedo paka cango,
kweth pajo lacungo matek ruwaŋan;
aka alamiyo gir'acula ri jono ma jodiy jo.
Jadhum pajo labedo acel kwoŋ jo wegi,
go bino wok i dier jo wegi.
Alakelo go cegin, aka go lacore bongan,
kwoŋbedo ŋa manyalo bedi gi miseni ma corok bongan? Rwoth penjo.
Wilabedo ji paran,
aka alabedo Were mewin.
Neni, asur pa Rwoth madwoŋ,
keme pere owok,
nge pere mager swa,
lamwoc i wiy jokidakana.
Nge pa Rwoth malieth kilagik
cuka go otiek timo to cowo
atoŋa ma paro pere.
I hongo ma yuwaŋe, wilaniaŋ gime.
I hongo no, Rwoth waco, alabedo Were pa pecin je i Isiraili, aka jolabedo ji paran.
Me apaka Rwoth waco,
Ji ma joboth abor,
jonwaŋo wor i thim,
munyo Isiraili orango ywomirok.
Rwoth onenere ran wok bor.
Atieko marin gi mar ma cil gi cil,
riameno amedo timo rin adieri.
Alageto in kendo, aka ilageto in,
Awi Isiraili!
Ilakwanyo seke perin kendo,
aka ilamielo miel pa josiemirok.
Ilapidho ndelo vini kendo,
wi got Samaria,
jopidho jolapidho,
aka jolacamo olemo mere.
Kole ee, hongo bino ma jokur jolalwoŋo,
i piny matendere Efrayim.
Ay win, weyi wakadhi malo i Zayon,
bongi Rwoth, Were mawan.
Kole Rwoth waco ama,
wer malo gi kisangala ri Yakobo,
aka koki gi kisangala ri Rwoth pa nonin,
tuci, miy pako, aka wac ni,
“Awi Rwoth, both ji perin,
ma joboth i Isiraili.”
Neni, akidho kelo jo wok i lowo ma yumalo,
t'acoko jo wok iy'adec mabor ma piny.
Jo waŋtho kodi jor'aŋolo jolabino gi jo,
mon ma minyur kodi ma ŋedi ramo jo, kanyacel,
lwak madwoŋ ladwoko ka.
Joladwoko kareno joywak,
aka alatelo jo dwoko k'adiyo cuny jo.
Alamiyo jo woth i thengi waŋ pi,
i royo m'otire ma jokinyal cer,
kwoŋbedo atieko bedo ba Isiraili,
Efrayim obedo okayo paran.
Winji win wac pa Rwoth, awi nonin,
aka tuci win bor i kigodin.
Waci win ni, “Ŋat'okedho Isiraili lacoko go,
aka lakuro go paka jakwath rombo kuro mwendi.”
Kole Rwoth otieko botho Yakobo,
obotho go wok i cingi ŋatatek loyo go.
Jolabino to jowero wi got Zayon,
aka jolakisangala ri gigipiny maber pa Rwoth,
ri ŋano kodi vini kodi mo,
kodi mwendi kodi dhok.
Kwo pajo labedo paka ndelo m'ikonjo iye pi,
aka jokilanyapere kendo.
Mon mathindho jolafore i miel,
aka yac kodi jodongo jolasiemere.
Alaloko ywak pajo kisangala,
alayomo cuny jo, t'amiyo jo kisangala i kabedo pa rem.
Alamiyo jocway ri Were i wi migam gima jomito,
aka ji paran jolayeŋo gi kweth gigipiny paran mabeyo.
Rwoth waco.
dwondi winjere i Rama,
ywak kodi geregere makec.
Laker ywako nyithindho pere,
go okwero wokwey cunye ri nyithindho pere,
kwoŋbedo jongoye.
Me apaka Rwoth waco,
Miy dwondin kwoŋ ywak,
aka weyi cwero pigi waŋin,
kole initie gi kemba ri tic perin.
Rwoth waco.
Initie gi geno ma yuwaŋe,
Rwoth waco.
Nyithindho perin joladwoko i piny perin won.
Adieri awinjo Efrayim ywakere ama:
Ifonjan, aka awinjo fonji,
oyido acalo nyathi dhiaŋ ma k'ofonji.
Dwokan, aka weyi adwoki,
kole in ibedo Rwoth Were paran.
Kole munyo atieko wire woko kwoŋin,
apusere.
Rumacen abino aniaŋ, apayo eman,
abedo giwickwot aka adhier,
kwoŋbedo oyido anitie giwickwot mareco paran ma soye paran.
Efrayim obedo wodan ma kacunyan?
Go obedo nyathi ma fore gine?
Paka aluwo kwoŋ go noknok,
fodi apoyo go.
Riameno cunyan rembo rigo,
alanyutho go ŋono adieri.
Rwoth waco.
Pidhi win kipande ma nyutho royo,
cer win ranyuth,
kethi win cuny win i royo,
ma cango wiluwo.
Dwoki, Awi Isiraili,
dwoki i tindin perin madongo me.
Ilawiro paro kiri keraŋo,
Awi ji paran ma jongoye g'adieri?
Kole Rwoth otieko cweyo gimanyen i piny,
go lagwoko go paka dhako gwoko jacwo.
Me apaka Rwoth waco pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Ibino oro kendo wac me i piny Yuda kodi i tindin mere ka adwoko lim pajo.
Rwoth womiyin silwany, Awi Kabedo Maleŋ
got maleŋ kama go bed'iye.
Ji jolabedo i Yuda kodi tindin mere kendo; jofur jolabedo kanyacel gi jokwath kodi mwendi pajo.
Alayeŋo jom'oloc, t'apidho joma kec neko.
Gikenyo acew t'aŋiyo, aka nindo paran ober ran swa.
Ndelo bino adieri, Rwoth waco, m'abino cwoyo ot pa Isiraili kodi ot pa Yuda gi kodhi ma ji kodi kodhi ogwaŋe.
Paka abedo g'atoŋa fudho jo kodi turo jo piny, bolo woko gi reyo kodi kelo raco, ameno apaka alakikwonga jo geto kodi pidho jo, Rwoth waco.
I hongo no ji jokilawaco kendo ni,
“Jonywol pajo jotieko camo olemo mawac,
aka lak nyithindho pajo olokere mafol.”
To kisi dhano won latho ri reco pere, kisi ŋat'ocam olemo mawac lake lalokere mafol.
Kilabedo paka cikirok ma cango atimo gi kwarere pajo munyo amako cingi jo t'awodho jo wok i piny Misir. Cikirok ma joturo, makada nende oyido abedo cwor jo, Rwoth waco.
To me a cikirok m'abino timo gi ot pa Isiraili rumacen ma ndelo no, Rwoth waco. Alandiko cik paran i jo, aka alandiko i cuny jo. Were pajo aka jolabedo ji paran.
Kendo jokilafonjere kosa waco wegi gi wegi ni, “Ŋey Rwoth.” Kole jolaŋeyan, wok i mathin tundo kwoŋ madwoŋ, Rwoth waco. Alacwako reco pajo, aka akilapoyo kendo.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
Go ma miyo ceŋ liel odieceŋ,
kodi dwe gi micalin liel wor.
Go ico nam to miyo mor,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny obedo nyingi go.
Kabedi can me oyido tundi i gike,
ruwaŋan, Rwoth waco,
dinyo Isiraili bende otundo i gike,
ma bedo nono ruwaŋan cil gi cil.
Rwoth waco ama,
K'inen inyalo kipima polo malo,
aka inyalo nwaŋo misingi ma piny,
meno alakwero ji ma Isiraili je,
kwoŋbedo gima jotieko timo je.
Rwoth waco.
Ndelo bino adieri, Rwoth waco, m'ilageto kendo tindi madwoŋ ri Rwoth wok iy'acurcur ma Hananel tundo i Waŋkac ma Sonda.
Bol ma kew lamedere wok kenyo yupodho ceŋ tundo i tendere ma Gareb to thoko kiri i Gowa.

Milelo gibe, kam'iyik'iye jom'otho aka ikonj'iye buru, ndelin je tundo kiri i milelo ma Kidron, kiri i sonda ma Waŋkac ma Kayina yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ labedo maleŋ ri Rwoth. Kilafudho kendo kosa turo piny tindi madwoŋ cil gi cil.
I hongo no jolweny pa kere ma Babilon oyido jothoko ma mako Yerusalem, aka oyido ocegi Yeremia i diedipo ma cel pa kere pa kere ma Yuda.
Kere Zedekia am'oyido ocego go kenyo. Ato Zedekia oyido penjo ni, “Raŋo ituco wac Were k'iwaco ni, Rwoth waco ama: Akidho miyo tindi madwoŋ me i cingi kere ma Babilon, aka go latero.
Kere Zedekia kilakwale wok i cingi Jobabilon, to adieri alamiyo go i cingi kere ma Babilon; aka laluwo gi go awaŋ g'awaŋ to neno go gi waŋe.
Kere ma Babilon latero Zedekia i Babilon, aka go ladoŋ koro cuka atiyo gi go. Makada nende inolweny gi Jobabilon, ikilaloyo?” Rwoth waco.
Yeremia owaco ni, wac pa Rwoth obino ran:
Hanamel wod pa nerin Salum labino bongin ka waco ni, “Nyew ndelo paran manitie i Anathoth, kole in iŋat'iripo nyewo.”

Kenyo Hanamel wod pa nera obino bongan i diedipo ma cel pa kere, cungo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth to waco ran ni, “Nyew ndelo paran manitie i Anathoth i lowo pa Benyamin, kole in iŋat'iripo nyewo, nyew paka aperin.” Kenyo aŋeyo nike me obedo wac pa Rwoth.
Anyewo ndelo i Anathoth wok bongi Hanamel wod pa nera, aka apima rigo pesa ma romo muma feza apar g'ario.
Aketho cingan i cikirok t'amwono, anwaŋo jokony, t'apima pesa i latir.
Akwanyo cikirok ma nyewirok m'omwon, manitie iye yerok, kodi man ma k'omwon.
Amiyo cikirok ma nyewirok ri Baruk wod pa Neria nyakwar Maseya, ruwaŋ Hanamel wod pa Neria, kodi ruwaŋ jokony ma joketho cingi jo i cikirok, kodi ruwaŋ Joyuda m'oyido jobedo i diedipo ma cel pa kere.
Awodho or ri Baruk ruwaŋ joje k'awaco ama:
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Ter cikirok me, m'omwon kodi ma k'omwon je, ikethi jo iy'agwata ma lowo, ŋey jowobedi ma hongo malac.
Kole me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Kendo ibino nyewo udi kodi ndelin kodi ndelin vini i lowo me.
Rumacen munyo atieko miyo Baruk wod pa Neria cikirok, akwayo Rwoth k'awaco ni,
Awi Rwoth Were, Obedi in iŋat'icweyo polo kodi piny gi meni perin madwoŋ kodi cingin m'oyare! Ongoye gimatek rin swa.
Inyutho luse ganin mar perin makiwire, t'imiyo gir'acula ri nyithindho ro reco pa jonywol pajo. Awi Were Madwoŋ, aka Jameni, nyingin obedo Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Rieko perin dwoŋ aka tim perin dimeni. Waŋin neno yo pa ji je, aka iculo joje cungo kwoŋ yo pajo kodi tim pajo.
Inyutho ranyuth kodi gir'aura i piny Misir, aka tundo kiri gunyo ni i Isiraili i dier ji je, aka itieko timo nyingin ma medere tundo kiri gunyo ni.
Iwodho ji perin Isiraili wok i piny Misir gi ranyuth kodi gir'aura, gi cingin matek kodi cingin m'oyare kodi lworo kweth,
aka imiyo jo lowo me, ma ikwoŋere ri kwarere pajo miyo jo. Lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic.
Jodonjo iye aka jolunjo, to jok'owinjo dwondin luwo cik perin, kwoŋ gim'iwodho or rijo timo je, ongoye ma jotimo. Riameno imiyo teko me je podho kwoŋ jo.

“Neni, Jobabilon jogeto cel kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ ma mako, tindi madwoŋ ocomere g'abor kodi kec kodi two nundu. Itieko miyo i cingi Jobabilon ma jolwenyo gine. Gima cango iluwo otieko timere, aka in won inyalo neno.
Kucel in, Awi Rwoth Were, itieko waco ran ni, ‘Nyew ndelo gi pesa aka kethi jokony.’ Makada nende itieko miyo tindi madwoŋ i cingi Jobabilon.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia ni:
Neni, An Abedo Rwoth, Were pa ji je, nitie gimatek swa ran?
Riameno, Rwoth waco ama: Akidho miyo tindi madwoŋ me i cingi Jobabilon, aka go latero.
Jobabilon ma jolwenyo gi tindi madwoŋ me jolabino, aka jolacwinyo iye mac, to jowaŋo, kanyacel gi udi ma imiy'iye mic ri Bal aka ikonj'iye cowirok ri werin man, ma kwinyo nge paran.
Kole ongoye gima ji ma Yuda kodi ji ma Isiraili jotieko timo kwanyowoko reco kende ruwaŋan wok i soye pajo. Ongoye gima jotimo, kwanyowoko kwinyo nge paran gi tic ma cingi jo, Rwoth waco.
Tindi madwoŋ otieko ico nge paran kodi keme paran, wok i ndelo m'ogeti iye tundo gunyo ni; ŋey akwany woko waŋan kwoŋe.

Me kwoŋbedo reco je pa ji ma Isiraili kodi ji ma Yuda ma jokwinyo nge paran. Jo kodi kerin pajo kodi jodhum pajo kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam pajo kodi jotuci wac Were pajo, ji ma jobedo i Yuda kodi joma jobedo i Yerusalem.
Jotieko wiro ran dieŋey jo, makiweno waŋ jo; makada nende atieko fonjo jo g'amen, jok'onyalo winjo kosa yeyo atir jo.
Joketho amien pajo i ot m'ilwoŋo gi nyingan, aka jokoco woko.

Jogeto migame ri Bal i milelo pa wod pa Hinom, ma miyo wot jo kodi nyithindho manyir pajo ri Molek, makada nende akiwodho rijo or timo, kosa k'obedo i paro paran nike joripo timo amien me, miyo Yuda timo reco.
Onyo riameno, me apaka Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco, kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me ma wiluwo kwoŋe ni, “Imiyo i cingi kere ma Babilon g'abor kodi kec kodi two nundu.”
Neni, alacoko jo wok i lowo je m'abino kedh'iye jo i nge paran kodi keme paran kodi gero madwoŋ. Aladwoko jo i kabedo me, aka alamiyo jo bedo ka i siem.
Alabedo Were pajo, aka jolabedo ji paran.
Alamiyo jo bedo gi cuny acel kodi yo acel, ŋey jowolworan i hongo je, ri bero pajo wegi kodi bero pa nyithindho pajo ma joluw jo
Alatimo gi jo cikirok ma cil gi cil, ma akilaweyo timo rijo bero kendo. Alaketho lworo Were i cuny jo, ŋey jokiri jowowire kwoŋan kendo.
Alafore i timo bero rijo, aka alapidho jo i lowo me iy'adieri, gi cunyan je kodi adundo paran je.
Kole Rwoth waco ama: Paka atieko kelo teko madwoŋ me kwoŋ ji me, ameno alakelo kwoŋ jo bero ma pama aciko jo.
Ilanyewo ndelin i lowo me, m'iwaco ni ojwangere, m'ongoye ji kosa ogwaŋe, m'otiek ketho i cingi Jobabilon.

Ilanyewo ndelin gi pesa, t'iketho cingi jo i cikirok t'imwono aka jokony jolabedo, i lowo pa Benyamin, i kabedo m'othoko Yerusalem, kodi i tindin ma Yuda, i tindin ma piny matendere, i Sefela kodi yupiny ma Yuda. Aladwoko rijo silwany, Rwoth waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia madirio, kareno fodi ocegi go i diedipo ma cel pa kere.
Me apaka Rwoth m'ocweyo piny waco. Rwoth m'otimo piny to ketho i kare, Rwoth obedo nyingi go.
Lwoŋan aka aladwokin, alawaco rin gigipiny madongo m'opanere ma fodi ikiŋeyo.
Kole me apaka Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco, kwoŋ udi ma tindi madwoŋ me kodi udi pa kerin ma Yuda m'otur woko t'igeto kwoŋe cel ma thoko mako kodi monjo g'abor.
Jobabilon jobino lweny kodi poŋo udi gi delkwoŋ jom'otho pa jono m'abino neko i nge paran kodi i keme paran. Kole atieko pano waŋan kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me kwoŋbedo kidakana pajo je.
To aladwoko jo t'acango jo. Alacango two ma tindi madwoŋ me, alanyutho jo siem, t'akweyo piny rijo.
Aladwoko lim ma Yuda kodi lim ma Isiraili, t'ageto jo kendo paka cango con.
Alacido woko reco pajo je aka alacwako reco pajo gi gwenyirok pajo je kwoŋan.

Tindi madwoŋ me labedo ran nyingi kisangala, pak kodi dwoŋ ruwaŋ nonin je ma i piny, ma jowinji kwoŋ bero je m'atimo rijo. Jolabedo gi lworo to jokirin kwoŋbedo bero je kodi lim m'abino miyo tindi madwoŋ me.

Me apaka Rwoth waco: I kabedo me ma wiluwo kwoŋe ni, “Othangere m'ongoye ji kodi ogwaŋe.” I tindin ma Yuda kodi i royin ma Yerusalem m'odoŋ nono, m'ongoye ji ma jobed'iye, ji kosa ogwaŋe, kendo bino winjere,
dwondi jo ma kisangala kodi forok. Lawinjere dwondi jamweha kodi mweha kodi dwondi ji ma jowero, ka jokelo foyo i Ot pa Rwoth ka jowaco ni,
“Miy win Rwoth pa lwak jolweny foyo,
kole Rwoth ber,
aka mar pere makiwire bedo cil gi cil!”
Kole aladwoko lim ma lowo paka marapena, Rwoth waco.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: I kabedo me m'othangere, m'ongoye ji kodi ogwaŋe, kodi i tindin je labedo kendo kakwath ri jokwath rombo ma kwayo mwendi pajo.
I tindin ma piny matendere, ma Sefela kodi i yupiny, i lowo pa Benyamin, i kabedo je thoko Yerusalem kodi i tindin ma Yuda, jokwath rombo kendo jolakwano mwendi pajo, Rwoth waco.
I ndir no kodi i hongo no, alayero kere m'otire ma nyakwar Daudi. Kere no latimo gir'adieri kodi gim'otire i piny.
I ndir no, ilabotho Yuda aka siem labedo i Yerusalem. Me a nyinge m'ilalwoŋo gine, “Rwoth, obedo tiro mawan.”
Jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jobedo Jolevi jokilangoye ruwaŋan gi jacwo ma miyo mic awaŋa, mic ma cemo, kodi timo cowirok ma hongo je.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia:
Me apaka Rwoth waco: Ka moro kwoŋ win oyido nyalo turo cikirok paran gi odieceŋ kodi cikirok paran gi wor, ŋey jokiri jowobin i hongo pajo,
meno nyaka cikirok paran m'atimo gi ŋeca paran Daudi nyalo tur, ŋey go wongoye gi wode manyalo lunjo kom pere ma dhum, kodi cikirok m'atimo gi Jolevi ŋecin paran.
Paka kinyal kwano micalin manitie i polo aka kinyal kipima kwoyo ma nam, ameno apaka alamedo nyikway ŋeca paran Daudi, kodi Jolevi ŋecin paran.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia:
Poyi fodi ikikaŋasa maber kite ma ji me jowaco ni, “Pecin ario ma Rwoth oyido oyero go otieko kwero woko.” Kite m'iter'iye ji paran gi cay ma kiter jo paka nono?
Rwoth waco ama: Kabedi oyido akitimo cikirok paran gi odieceŋ kodi wor kodi cik ma dhumo piny kodi polo,
dinyo akwero nyikway Yakobo kodi ŋeca paran Daudi m'akiyeyo moro kwoŋ nyikwaye paka jadhum kwoŋ nyikway Abraham, Isaka kodi Yakobo. Kole aladwoko lim pajo, aka alamako wor gi jo.
Rwoth waco ama, Were pa Isiraili: Kidhi iluwi gi Kere Zedekia ma Yuda aka iwaci rigo ni, Rwoth waco ama: Akidho ketho tindi madwoŋ me i cingi kere ma Babilon, aka go lawaŋo gi mac.
In won ikilakwale wok i cinge, t'ilamakin adieri t'ikethin i cingi go. Ilaneno kere ma Babilon gi waŋin, aka ilaluwo gi go awaŋ g'awaŋ, aka ilakidho i Babilon.
Kucel winji wac pa Rwoth, Awi Zedekia kere ma Yuda! Rwoth waco ama kwoŋin: Ikilatho g'abor.
Ilatho i siem, aka paka owaŋ ri kwarere perin buban, kerin ma jotelo dhum rin, apaka bende ilawaŋo rin t'iywakin k'iwaco ni, “Awi kere mawan!” Kole An atieko luwo, Rwoth waco.
Kenyo Yeremia jatuci wac Were oluwo wac no je ri Zedekia kere ma Yuda i Yerusalem,
munyo jolweny pa kere ma Babilon oyido jolwenyo gi Yerusalem kodi tindin madongo je ma Yuda m'oyido jodoŋ, Lakis kodi Azeka. Me kende a tindin madongo m'otinda m'oyido jodoŋ i Yuda.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia, rumacen munyo kere Zedekia otieko timo cikirok gi ji ma Yerusalem, tuco gonyo
ŋecin ma Joyuda ma cwo kodi ma mon, ŋey wongoye ŋata womaki Jaisiraili nyawote paka ŋeca.
Joje jowinjo, jodhum je kodi ji je m'oyido jotimo cikirok nike jowogony ŋecin pajo, cwo kodi mon, ŋey wongoye ŋata kendo laketho jo i twec, jogonyo jo.
To rumacen jowire aka jotero ŋecin ma cwo kodi ma mon m'oyido jotieko gonyo to doko jodwoko jo i twec.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia:
Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: An won atimo cikirok gi kwarere mewin munyo awodho jo wok i piny Misir, wok i piny ma twec, k'awaco ni,
“Kisi oro mar'abirio wiripo gonyo Jaebulaniya moro je m'otana riwin kareno jotieko tic ma oro aucel. Wiripo ywomo jo tic.” To kwarere pajo jok'owinjo kosa jok'ociko ithi gin ran.
Win bende manyen me, wipusere to witimo gim'otire ruwaŋan gi tuco gonyo wadi win, aka witimo cikirok i ot m'ilwoŋo gi nyingan.
To wiwire kendo to wikoco nyingan munyo kisi dhano odwoko ŋecin ma cwo kodi ma mon m'oyido witieko gonyo cungo kwoŋ mito pajo, aka kendo wiloko jo ŋecin mewin.
Riameno Rwoth waco ama: Wikiwinjan nyalo gonyo joger kodi merin mewin. Akidho gonyo win, Rwoth waco, ri abor, two nundu kodi kec. Alamiyo win bedo gi bwok ri kerin je ma i piny.
Jono ma joturo cikirok paran ma jok'okuro yerok ma cikirok ma jotimo ruwaŋan. Alaloko jome paka nyathi dhiaŋ m'otoŋ i diere dirio t'iluwo i diere.
Jotel ma Yuda, jotel ma Yerusalem, cwo ma jolur, jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi ji je ma piny ma joluwo i dier nyathi dhiaŋ m'oyaŋ diere dirio,
alaketho jo i cingi jokwor pajo kodi jono ma jodwaro kwo pajo. Delkwoŋ jolalokere cemo ri winyin ma koyo kodi ogwaŋe madudi ma piny.
Paka ri Zedekia kere ma Yuda kodi jotel pere, alaketho i cingi jokwor pajo kodi jono ma jodwaro kwo pajo, ri jolweny pa kere ma Babilon, ma joweyo monjo win.
Alawodho or, Rwoth waco, aka aladwoko jo i tindi madwoŋ me, jolalweny gine, jolamako to jowaŋo gi mac. Alaloko tindin ma Yuda m'ojwangere m'ongoye dhano ma bed'iye.
Kidhi i ot pa nyikway Rekab, aka iluwi gi jo, ikeli jo i Ot pa Rwoth, iy'acel kwoŋ kisikin, kenyo miy jo medho.
Ameno akwanyo Yasania wod pa Yeremia nyakwar Habazina kodi wutmin go kodi wote je kodi ot pa Rekab gibe.
Akelo jo i Ot pa Rwoth i kisika pa wod pa Hanan nyakwar Igidalia, jacwo pa Were, m'oyido nitie cegin gi kisika pa jodhum, i wi kisika pa Maseya wod pa Salum, jakur ma dhiot.
Kenyo ajengo ruwaŋ nyikway Rekab kikopere kodi agwatin m'opoŋ vini t'awaco rijo ni, “Medhi win.”
To jodwokan ni, “Wan wakimedhi. Kole kwari wan Yonadab wod pa Rekab cango owodho or riwan ni, ‘Wikiripi madho vini, win kosa nyithindho mewin cil gi cil,
kosa wikiri wigeti udi kosa wicwoy kodhi kosa wipidhi ndelo vini kosa wibedi gine, to wiripo bedo i wemin i kwo mewin je, ŋey winyal kwo ma hongo malac i lowo ma wibed'iye.’
Watieko kuro or pa kwari wan Yonadab wod pa Rekab i gima go owodho or riwan timo, bedo ma wakimedhi kwo mawan je, wan wegi, mon mawan, wot wan kodi nyithindho mawan manyir.
Aka wakigeti ot ma bed'iye. Wangoye gi ndelo vini kosa ndelo kosa kodhi.
To wabedo i wemin, aka watieko winjo kodi timo kisi gima kwari wan Yonadab owodho riwan or ni tim.

To munyo kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon obino lweny kwoŋ piny, wawaco ni, ‘Biye win, weyi wakadhi win i Yerusalem ro lworo ri jolweny ma Babilon kodi jolweny ma Siria.’ Meno am'omiyo wabedo i Yerusalem.”
Kenyo wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia:
Rwoth waco ama, Were pa Isiraili: Kidhi iwaci ri ji ma Yuda kodi ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem ni, “Wikinyal fonjirok kodi winjo wac paran?” Rwoth waco.
Yonadab owodho or ri nyikway Rekab nike jokiri jowomadhi vini, aka jokimedhi kiri konon me, kwoŋbedo jowinjo or pa kwari jo. To an won atieko luwo gi win mar'amen aka wikiwinjan.

Atieko oro riwin ŋecin paran jotuci wac Were mar'amen k'awaco ni, “Wire win kisi dhano kwoŋ yo pere marac, yik win tim mewin, aka wikiri wikwoŋ werin man ka witiyo rijo, ŋey wibedi i piny m'amiyo win kodi kwarere mewin.” To wikiciko ithi win winjan.
Nyikway Yonadab wod pa Rekab jotieko kuro or ma kwari jo owodho rijo, to nono me fodi k'owinjan.

Riameno, me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Alakelo ri Yuda kodi ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem je kisi teko m'alwoŋo kwoŋ jo, kwoŋbedo atieko luwo gi jo to jok'owinjan. Atieko lwoŋo jo, to jokiye ran.
To ri ot pa Rekab Yeremia owaco ama: Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ma: Kwoŋbedo witieko winjo or pa kwari win Yonadab, aka wikuro cik pere, to witimo or ma go owodho riwin je,
riameno me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Yonadab wod pa Rekab kilangoye gi nyakware majayac ma latic ran noknok.
Kwany kitawo indik'iye wac je m'atieko luwo kwoŋ Isiraili kodi Yuda kodi nonin je, wok i ndelo m'aluwo iye kodin, wok i hongo pa Yosia tundo konon.
Poyi ka ot pa Yuda jowinjo teko m'agendera kelo kwoŋ jo, joje jowire kwoŋ yo pajo marac, ŋey anyal cwako kidakana pajo kodi reco pajo.
Yeremia olwoŋo Baruk wod pa Neria, aka Baruk ondiko i kitawo kareno Yeremia duma rigo wac je ma Rwoth oyido owaco rigo.
Yeremia owodho or ri Baruk ka waco ni, “Ocieran donjo i Ot pa Rwoth,

riameno in won kidhi, aka i ndelo marapena ka ji jowinjo i Ot pa Rwoth, ilakisoma wac pa Rwoth wok i kitawo m'indik'iye wac m'atieko kiduma rin. Ilakisoma bende ka ji je ma Yuda ma jowok i tindin pajo jowinjo.
Poyi ywak pajo onyali tundo ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka joje jowire woko kwoŋ yo pajo marac, kole nge kodi keme pa Rwoth manitie kwoŋ ji me dwoŋ.”
Ameno Baruk wod pa Neria otimo kisi gima Yeremia owodho rigo or ni wotimo ma mako kwoŋ kisoma wac pa Rwoth wok i kitawo m'omin i Ot pa Rwoth.
I dwe mar'abuŋwen, i oro mar'abic ma dhum pa kere Yehoyakim wod pa Yosia ma Yuda, ji je ma Yerusalem kodi ji je m'oyido jobino wok i tindin ma Yuda i Yerusalem jocako riyo kec ruwaŋ Rwoth.

Kenyo munyo ji je jowinjo, Baruk osoma wac pa Yeremia wok i Papila m'omin, i Ot pa Rwoth, i kisika pa Gemaria wod pa Safan jandiko, m'oyido nitie i kapido ma malo, i kadonjo ma Waŋkac ma Ot pa Rwoth Manyen.
Munyo Mikaya wod pa Gemaria, aka nyakwar Safan owinjo wac pa Rwoth je wok i papila m'omin,

go oloro piny i ot pa kere, i kisika pa jandiko, aka jotel je oyido jobedo kenyo: Mikaya wod pa jandiko, Delaya wod pa Semaya, Elinathan wod pa Akibor, Gemaria wod pa Safan, Zedekia wod pa Hanania kodi jodhum je.
Mikaya owaco rijo wac je ma go owinjo, munyo Baruk soma papila m'omin kareno ji jowinjo.

Kenyo jotel je jooro Yehud wod pa Nethania wod pa Selemia aka nyakwar Kus waco ri Baruk ni, “Keli papila m'omin m'isoma kareno ji jowinjo, aka biye.” Baruk wod pa Neria otero papila i cinge aka obino bongi jo.
Jotel no jowaco rigo ni, “Bedi piny isoma riwan.” Baruk osoma rijo.
Tekin jowinjo wac je, jowire ŋiyirok i dhier, to jowaco ri Baruk ni, “Waripo adieri kowo wac me je ri kere.”
Jopenjo Baruk ni, “Waci riwan, indiko nedi wac me je? Yeremia am'oduma rin?”
Baruk odwoko jo ni, “Yeremia oduma ran wac me je, aka andiko gi vino i papila.”
Kenyo jodhum jowaco ri Baruk ni, “Kadhi wipondi, in kodi Yeremia, aka wongoye ŋata woŋey kama winitie iye.”
Jotel joweyo papila i kisika pa Elisama jandiko, to jokadho i kapido pa kere. Jokowo rigo wac je.
Kenyo kere ooro Yehud kwanyo papila, aka okwanyo wok i kisika pa Elisama jandiko. Yehud osoma papila ri kere kodi jodhum je m'oyido jocungo kabuti kere.
Onyo oyido obedo dwe mar'abuŋwen, hongo ma ŋico, aka kere oyido obedo i ot pere ma hongo ma ŋico, aka oyido nitie mac m'omok liel ruwaŋe.
Paka Yehud osoma sirin adek kosa aŋwen, kere oyido yeco g'athero aka bolo i mac maliel, cuka papila je owaŋ i mac.
Kucel kere, kosa kada ŋecin pere ma jowinjo wac me je jok'obedo gi dhier, aka jok'oyeco kada law pajo.
Kiri munyo Elinathan kodi Delaya kodi Gemaria jonaŋo kere weyo ma k'owaŋo papila, go k'owinjo jo.
Kere owodho or ri Yeramel wod pa kere kodi Seraya wod pa Aziriel kodi Selemia wod pa Abidel mako jandiko Baruk kodi Yeremia jatuci wac Were. To Rwoth okano jo.
Rumacen munyo kere otieko waŋo woko papila gi wac ma Baruk ondiko kareno Yeremia duma rigo, wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia.
Kwany papila man, indik'iye wac ca je m'oyido nitie i papila marapena, ma kere Yehoyakim owaŋo.
Iwaci ri kere Yehoyakim ma Yuda nike Rwoth waco ama: Ikethere waŋo papila me, k'iwaco ni, “Raŋo indiko nike kere ma Babilon labino adieri to reyo woko piny me, aka laneko woko ji kodi ogwaŋe mere?
Riameno Rwoth waco ama kwoŋ kere ma Yuda: Go langoye gi ŋata lalunjo kom ma dhum pa Daudi, aka ilabolo delkwoŋ woko ri lietho m'odieceŋ kodi ŋico ma wor.
Alamiyo go, nyithindho pere kanyacel gi ŋecin pere gir'acula ro reco pajo. Alakelo kwoŋ jo kodi kwoŋ ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem kodi kwoŋ ji ma Yuda, teko je m'atieko kitisa gine jo; to jokwero winjo.”
Kenyo Yeremia okwanyo kitawo man aka omiyo jandiko Baruk wod pa Neria, m'ondik'iye wac je m'oyido nitie i papila ma kere Yehoyakim owaŋo i mac, munyo Yeremia duma, kodi wac man bende ma cal gine.
To go kosa ŋecin pere kosa ji ma Yuda jokwero winjo wac pa Rwoth ma go oluwo luwo kwoŋ Yeremia jatuci wac Were.
Kere Zedekia ooro Yehukal wod pa Selemia kodi Zefania jacway ri Were i wi migam wod pa Maseya bongi Yeremia ka waco ni, “Mondo kway riwan Rwoth Were mawan.”
Onyo Yeremia oyido fodi wotho i dier ji, kole oyido fodi k'otwey go i katwec.
Kareno jolweny pa Farawo oyido jowok i Misir, aka tekin Jobabilon m'oyido jothoko Yerusalem ma mako jowinjo wac kwoŋ Jomisir, jowire woko ngoye i Yerusalem.
Kenyo wac pa Rwoth obino ri jatuci wac Were Yeremia ni:
Me apaka Rwoth Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Me a wac ma wijario wilawaco ri kere ma Yuda, m'odhiro win penjan. Jolweny pa Farawo, ma jobino konyo win joladok i piny pajo, i Misir.
Jobabilon joladwoko lweny kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me, jolamako to jowaŋo gi mac.
Me apaka Rwoth waco: Wikiri wiwondere ka wiwaco ni, “Jobabilon jokiladwoko bongi wan adieri.” Kole jokilakadho woko.
Makada nende oyido wikengila jolweny gibe ma Babilon ma jolwenyo gi win, to doŋ nyaka cwo ma jolimo litho i wema pajo, jonyalo ay malo kendo to jowaŋo tindi madwoŋ me gi mac.
Onyo munyo Jobabilon oyido jowire to jongoye i Yerusalem munyo jolweny pa Farawo jobino,
Yeremia owok i Yerusalem kadho i piny pa Benyamin jolo adec ma lim pere wok bongi ji ma kenyo.
Munyo go otundo i Waŋkac pa Benyamin, jatel pa jolweny m'oyido jokuro kenyo, jacwo m'ilwoŋo ni Iriya wod pa Selemia wod pa Hanania omako Yeremia ka waco ni, “Iringo kwoŋ Jobabilon.”
Yeremia odwoko ni, “Meno twodo. An akiringi kwoŋ Jobabilon.” To Iriya k'onyalo winjo go, omako go to kelo go bongi jodhum.
