Jodhum jomako nge swa gi Yeremia, aka jogoyo go to jotweyo go i katwec i ot pa jandiko Yonathan, kwoŋbedo oyido nitie gi katwec.
Ameno okethi Yeremia i waŋ pi i katwec ma piny, to doŋ kenyo ma ndelo kweth.
Kenyo to Kere Zedekia ooro wokel go, aka ojolo go. Kere openjo go nyaliŋliŋ gi i ot pere, aka owaco ni, “Nitie wac moro wok bongi Rwoth?”
Yeremia odwoko ni, “Ey, nitie! Ilakethin i cingi kere ma Babilon.”
Yeremia bende openjo kere ni, “Raco aŋo m'atieko timo rin kosa jodhum perin kosa ji me, ma witweyan i katwec?
Nikune jotuci wac Were perin ma jotuci wac Were ka jowaco ni, ‘Kere ma Babilon kilabino lweny kodin kodi piny me’?
Onyo, mondo winjan, Rwoth paran kere, tim maber winjo ywak paran, aka ikir'idwokan i ot pa jandiko Yonathan atho kenyo.”
Kere Zedekia owodho or, aka ocegi Yeremia i diedipo ma cel pa kere, aka go odoŋ kenyo, kareno imiyo go mugat wok i katedo mugat kisi ndelo, cuka mugat je orumo i tindi madwoŋ.
Sefatiya wod pa Matan, Gedalia wod pa Pasur, Yukal wod pa Selemia kodi Pasur wod pa Malikia jowinjo wac pa Yeremia m'oyido waco ri ji ni,
Me apaka Rwoth waco: Jono ma jodoŋ i tindi madwoŋ jolatho g'abor, kec kodi two nundu. To jono ma jokadhi yu Babilon jolakwo, kwo pajo labedo cul ma lweny aka jolakwo won.
Me apaka Rwoth waco: Tindi madwoŋ me adieri lamiyere i cingi jolweny pa kere ma Babilon aka ilamako.
Kenyo jodhum jowaco ri kere ni, “Jal me ber woneki, kwoŋbedo go cilo cuny jolweny ma jodoŋ i tindi madwoŋ me, kodi ji je gi waco kiti wac no rijo. Kole jal me kidwar bero pa ji me, to raco ayin.”
Kere Zedekia owaco ni, “Go ee, nitie i cingi win, kere ongoye gi dwoŋ kwoŋ win.”

Ameno jotero Yeremia to jobolo go i waŋ pi ma peco pa Malikia, wod pa kere m'oyido nitie i diedipo ma cel pa kere, ka joliero go piny gi thol. Onyo waŋ pi oyido ocwiyo, kwanyowoko cwodho kende am'oyido odoŋ, to Yeremia munyere i cwodho.
Ebed Melek Jaethopiya, jacwo m'okol i ot pa kere, owinjo nike oyido obol Yeremia i waŋ pi. Kere oyido obedo i Waŋkac pa Benyamin.
Ameno to Ebed Melek wok i ot pa kere to luwo gi kere ka waco ni,
“Rwoth paran kere, cwo me jotimo gikidakana i gima jotimo je ri Yeremia jatuci wac Were gi bolo go i waŋ pi wotho kenyo kec, kwoŋbedo mugat orumo i tindi madwoŋ.”
Kenyo Kere owodho or ri Ebed Melek Jaethopiya ka waco ni, “Kadhi gi cwo adek wok ka, aka wiyway Yeremia wifudhi go wok i waŋ pi mafodi k'otho.”
Ameno Ebed Melek okadho gi cwo adek i ot pa kere, i kabada ma nangin kam'ikan'iye gigipiny, to jokwanyo okute kodi nangin m'oti, to jorudho piny ri Yeremia i waŋ pi gi thol.
Kenyo Ebed Melek Jaethopiya owaco ri Yeremia ama: Kethi okute kodi nangin i ywothin kodi thol. Yeremia otimo ameno.
Kenyo joywayo Yeremia malo gi thondhe wok i waŋ pi. Rumacen to Yeremia doŋ i diedipo ma cel pa kere.
Kere Zedekia ooro wokel Yeremia jatuci wac Were aka ojolo go i dhiot mar'adek ma Ot pa Rwoth. Kere openjo Yeremia ni, “Anitie gi gim'amito penjin, ikir'imuŋan gimoro je.”
Yeremia owaco ri Zedekia ni, “K'anowaci rin, ilanekan, ik'onekan? K'anomiyin rieko, ikilawinjan.”
Ameno Zedekia okwoŋere ri Yeremia manyaliŋliŋ ka waco ni, “Paka Rwoth kwo, go m'omiyo wan kwo, akilanekin, aka akilakethin i cingi jono ma jodwaro kwo perin.”

Kenyo Yeremia owaco ri Zedekia ni, “Rwoth waco ama, Were pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili: K'inomiyere ri jodhum pa kere ma Babilon, jokilanekin, aka jokilawaŋo tindi madwoŋ me gi mac, aka in kodi peco perin wilakwo.
To k'ikimiyere ri jodhum pa kere ma Babilon, meno tindi madwoŋ me ilaketho i cingi Jobabilon t'iwaŋo gi mac, aka kiri in won gipi ik'obudhere i cingi jo.”
Kere Zedekia odwoko Yeremia ni, “Anitie gi bwok ri Joyuda ma joriwere gi Jobabilon, kole inyalo kethan i cingi jo to jomiyan litho.”
Yeremia owaco ama: Be, kilamiyin i cingi jo. Mondo winji dwondi Rwoth i gim'awaco rin, aka labedo maber kodin, kilanekin.
To k'ikwero tiŋo cingin, me a gima Rwoth otieko nyuthan i menyirok ni latimere;
i menyirok, aneno mon je ma jodoŋ i ot pa kere ma Yuda kareno jotel pa kere ma Babilon jotelo jo ka jowaco ni,
Merin perin m'oyido igeno swa jodwoŋin,
aka jotieko lacin woko.
Onyo pama paka tiendin omoko i cwodho,
jojwangin woko.
“Ilatero mon perin je kodi nyithindho kadho i Babilon, ma kiri in won gipi, ik'okwale wok i cingi jo. To kere ma Babilon lamakin, aka ilawaŋo tindi madwoŋ me gi mac.”
Kenyo Zedekia owaco ri Yeremia ni, “Ikir'iwey dhano man woŋey kwoŋ kiliesa me, kwoŋbedo inyalo nekin.
Ka jotel jowinji nike atieko luwo kodin, to jobino penjin ni, ‘Nyaka wac riwan gima kere owaco rin, ikir'imuŋ wan kwoŋbedo wanyalo nekin. Aŋo ma kere owaco rin?’
Kenyo dwoki jo ni, ‘An oyido awodho ywak paran ri kere wokiri wodwokan i ot pa Yonathan atho koro.’ ”
Jotel je jobino bongi Yeremia to jopenjo go; kenyo Yeremia dwoko jo wac ma kere oyido owodho rigo or waco. Ameno joweyere gi penjo go, kwoŋbedo ongoye ŋat'owinjo kiliesa pajo.
Yeremia odoŋ i diedipo ma cel pa kere tundo i ndelo m'omak'iye Yerusalem.
I dwe mar'apar, i oro mar'abuŋwen ma dhum pa kere Zedekia i Yuda, kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon kodi jolweny pere je jobino lweny gi Yerusalem aka jothoko.
K'abuŋwen i dwe mar'aŋwen i oro mar'apar g'acel otur kor cel ma tindi madwoŋ.

Munyo otiek mako Yerusalem, jotel ma Babilon je jobino to jobedo i Waŋkac Ma diere: Nerigal Sareza, Samigar Nebo, Sarisekim Jarabisar kodi Nerigal Sareza Jarabimag, kanyacel gi jotel man je mapa kere ma Babilon.
Munyo Zedekia kere ma Yuda kodi jolweny je joneno jo, joringo, jowok i tindi madwoŋ wor gi royo ma ndelo pa kere luwo i waŋkac manitie i dier kor cel ario, to jokadho yu Araba.
Jolweny pa Jobabilon joriemo jo, aka jomako Zedekia kam'othangere ma Yeriko, to jokelo go bongi kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon i Ribila i piny ma Hamath t'ithumo rigo banja.
Kere ma Babilon othumo wot Zedekia je i Ribila ruwaŋe, to thumo jotel je ma Yuda.
Go ogolo waŋ Zedekia, to tweyo go gi lijegere tero go i Babilon.
Jobabilon jowaŋo ot pa kere kodi udi pa ji pere, to joturo woko piny kor cel ma Yerusalem.
Kenyo Nebuzaradan jamituka pa jolweny otero i twec ji m'oyido jodoŋ i tindi madwoŋ kodi jono m'oyido joriwere i thenge pere.
Nebuzaradan oweyo i piny ma Yuda jocandi man m'oyido jongoye gi gimoro, to miyo jo ndelo vini kodi ndelin.
Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon owodho or kwoŋ Yeremia ri Nebuzaradan, jamituka pa jolweny ka waco ni,
“Ter go, kur go maber aka Ikir'itim rigo raco, to tim rigo paka go won omiti.”
Ameno Nebuzaradan jamituka pa jolweny, Nebusazban Jarabisar, Nerigal Sareza Jarabimag, kodi jotel pa jolweny je pa kere ma Babilon m'oor jo,
jokelo Yeremia wok i diedipo ma cel pa kere. Joketho go i cingi Gedalia wod pa Ahikam wod pa Safan woter go peco. Ameno to Yeremia obedo gi ji pere won.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia kareno fodi ocegi go i diedipo ma cel pa kere:

Kidhi iwaci ri Ebed Melek Jaethopiya ni: Me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: “Akidho ketho i kare wac paran m'awaco kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ me ri raco makiweno bero, aka latundo i kare kareno in ineno gi waŋin i ndelo no.
To alabothin i ndelo no, Rwoth waco, aka kilakethin i cingi jono m'ilworo.
Kole alabothin adieri, aka ikilatho g'abor. To kwo perin laboth paka cul ri lweny, kwoŋbedo itieko ketho geno perin i an.” Rwoth waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia rumacen munyo Nebuzaradan jamituka pa jolweny oweyo go dok i Rama, munyo otwey go i lijegere kanyacel gi jotwec man ma Yerusalem kodi Yuda m'oyido itero jo i Babilon.
Jamituka pa jolweny oywayo Yeremia gicen to waco rigo ni, “Rwoth Were perin opiro kabedo me gi teko,
aka onyo Rwoth otieko kelo, to timo paka go owaco, kwoŋbedo wijoje witimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth aka wikiwinjo dwonde. Riameno gime obino kwoŋ win.

Onyo neni, atieko gonyin konon me kwoŋ lijegere m'oyido nitie i cingin. K'imito inyalo kadho kodan i Babilon, aka alakurin maber. To ka idaki kadho kodan i Babilon, inyalo weyo. Neni, piny gibe nitie ruwaŋin, kadhi kam'iparo nike ber aka otire rin kadh'iye.

K'idoŋ ka, kadhi bongi Gedalia wod pa Ahikam wod pa Safan, ma kere ma Babilon oketho paka gavana ma tindin ma Yuda, aka ibedi bongi go i dier ji, kosa kadhi kam'iparo nike otire rin kadh'iye.” Ameno Jamituka pa jolweny omiyo go cemo m'oromo kodi mic to weyo go kadho.
Kenyo Yeremia okadho bongi Gedalia wod pa Ahikam i Mizipa, aka obedo i dier ji m'oyido jodoŋ i piny.
Isimayil wod pa Nethania, Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi Seraya wod pa Makathite jokidho bongi Gedalia i Mizipa kanyacel gi jolweny pajo.
Gedalia wod pa Ahikam wod pa Safan okwoŋere rijo kodi jolweny pajo ka waco ni, “Wikiri wibwok tiyo ri Jobabilon. Bedi win i piny me, aka witiy ri Jobabilon, aka labedo maber gi win.
Paka ri an, alabedo i Mizipa cungo ikawaŋ win ruwaŋ Jobabilon ma jobino bongi wan. To riwin, coki win vini kodi olemo ma cwir kodi mo, wikan iy'atewe mewin, to wibedo i tindin ma wimako.”

I nger acel munyo Joyuda je m'oyido jonitie i Mowab kodi i dier Joamon kodi Joedom kodi i piny man jowinjo nike kere ma Babilon oyido oweyo ji ma joboth i Yuda, aka oketho Gedalia wod pa Ahikam wod pa Safan bedo gavana pajo,
kenyo joje jodwoko wok i kabedo m'oyido jokedhere iye to jobino i Yuda, bongi Gedalia i Mizipa. Jocoko vini kodi olemo ma cwir i thotho.
Onyo Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi jotel je ma lweny i piny m'othangere jobino bongi Gedalia i Mizipa,
to jowaco rigo ni, “Iŋeyo paka Balis kere pa Joamon ooro Isimayil wod pa Nethania nekin?” To Gedalia wod pa Ahikam k'oyeyo wac pajo.

Kenyo Yohana wod pa Kareya oluwo gi Gedalia i Mizipa manyaliŋliŋ ka waco ni, “Mondo weyi akadhi aneki Isimayil wod pa Nethania, aka ongoye ŋata laŋeyo. Raŋo go mito nekin, ŋey Joyuda ma jocokere thokin jowokedhere, aka ji ma jodoŋ i Yuda joworere?”
To Gedalia wod pa Ahikam odwoko Yohana wod pa Kareya ni, “Ikir'itim nger gino, kwoŋbedo iluwo twodo kwoŋ Isimayil.”
Isimayil wod pa Nethania kodi cwo apar m'oyido jonitie gi go joay malo to joneko Gedalia wod pa Ahikam wod pa Safan g'abor, kwoŋbedo kere ma Babilon oyido oketho go bedo gavana ma piny.
Isimayil bende oneko Joyuda je m'oyido jonitie gi Gedalia i Mizipa, kodi jolweny ma Babilon m'oyido jonitie kenyo.
I ndelo ma yawo ndelo m'oneki iye Gedalia, mafodi ongoye ŋat'oŋeyo kwoŋe,
cwo piero aboro jotundo wok i Sekem kodi Silo kodi Samaria, gi ye tik jo m'oliel kodi nangin pajo m'oyec, gi delkwoŋ jo m'ogwer, bino kelo mic pajo ma cemo kodi buban i Ot pa Rwoth.
Isimayil wod pa Nethania owok i Mizipa romo gi jo, kareno ywak ka bino. Munyo oromo gi jo, owaco rijo ni, “Biye win bongi Gedalia wod pa Ahikam.”
Munyo jotundo i dier tindi madwoŋ, Isimayil wod pa Nethania kodi cwo m'oyido jonitie gi go jothumo jo to jobolo jo i waŋ pi.
To oyido nitie cwo apar kwoŋ jo ma jowaco ni, “ikir'ineki wan, kole wanitie gi dero ŋano, bale, mo kodi mo kic m'opanere i ndelin.” Ameno go k'oneko jo kanyacel gi wadi jo.

Onyo waŋ pi ma Isimayil obolo iye delkwoŋ cwo ma go oneko am'obedo madwoŋ loyo ma cango kere Asa ogeto ma kwoŋirok kwoŋ kere Basa ma Isiraili. Isimayil wod pa Nethania opoŋo waŋ pi no gi ji ma go oneko.

Kenyo Isimayil otero ji m'odoŋ m'oyido jonitie i Mizipa paka jotwec. Go otero nyir pa kere kodi ji je m'oyido jodoŋ i Mizipa, ma Nebuzaradan, jamituka pa jolweny oyido oketho i cingi Gedalia wod pa Ahikam. Isimayil wod pa Nethania otero jo paka jotwec aka oyikere ŋado kadho bongi Joamon.
To munyo Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi jotel jolweny je jowinjo kwoŋ neki ma Isimayil wod pa Nethania otimo,
jotero cwo pajo je to jokidho lweny kwoŋ Isimayil wod pa Nethania. Joriko go i kidiwa madwoŋ manitie i Gibeon.
Munyo ji je m'oyido jonitie bongi Isimayil joneno Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi jotel pa jolweny je, josangala.
Ameno ji je m'oyido Isimayil otero paka jotwec wok i Mizipa jowire to jogik bongi Yohana wod pa Kareya.
To Isimayil wod pa Nethania okwale woko kwoŋ Yohana kanyacel gi cwo aboro to jokadho bongi Joamon.

Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi jotel pa jolweny je jotero ji je ma jodoŋ m'oyido Isimayil wod pa Nethania oyido okadho gi jo paka jotwec wok i Mizipa munyo go otieko neko Gedalia wod pa Ahikam. Jolweny, mon, nyithindho kodi cwo m'okol ma Yohana odwoko jo wok i Gibeon.
Jowotho, aka jocungo i Geruth Kimham cegin gi Bethelehem, kareno jogendera kadho i Misir,
kwoŋbedo oyido jolworo Jobabilon. Kole oyido jonitie gi bwok ri Jobabilon, kwoŋbedo Isimayil wod pa Nethania oyido oneko Gedalia wod pa Ahikam, ma kere ma Babilon oyido oketho paka gavana ma lowo.
Kenyo jotel pa jolweny je kanyacel gi Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi Azaria wod pa Hosaya, kodi ji je wok kwoŋ mathindho tundo kwoŋ madongo jobino

bongi Yeremia jatuci wac Were aka jowaco rigo ni, “Bedi ŋataber iwinji ywak mawan, ikway Rwoth Were mawan ri ji ma jodoŋ je. Kole wadoŋ nyaka manok kwoŋ kweth m'oyido wanitie, paka in bende ineno gi waŋin.
Weyi Rwoth Were perin wonyuthi wan kama waripo kidh'iye kodi gima waripo timo.”
Yeremia jatuci wac Were odwoko jo ni, “Ber swa: Akidho kwayo Rwoth Were mewin paka wikwayan, aka gima Rwoth odwokan je alawaco riwin. Ongoye gim'alapano kwoŋ win.”
Kenyo jowaco ri Yeremia ama: Weyi Rwoth wobedi jakony mawan m'otire, mar'adieri kwoŋ wan ka wakitimo cungo kwoŋ kisi gima Rwoth Were perin ooro wan timo luwo kwoŋin.
Obedi ni ber kosa rac, walawinjo dwondi Rwoth Were mawan ma wakidho orin bonge, ŋey wobedi maber gi wan ka wawinjo dwondi Rwoth Were mawan.
Rumacen ma ndelo apar wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia.
Yeremia olwoŋo Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi jotel pa jolweny je m'oyido jonitie gi go, kodi ji je wok kwoŋ mathindho tundo kwoŋ madongo.
Go owaco rijo ni, Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili ma wioran bonge ywak ruwaŋe waco ama:
Tekin widoŋ i lowo me won kende, alageto win aka akiladwoko win piny. Alapidho win aka akilafudho win woko, kole arem ri raco m'atieko kelo kwoŋ win.
Wikiri wibwok ri kere ma Babilon, paka witimo, wikiri wibwok rigo, Rwoth waco. Kole anitie gi win, botho kodi gonyo win woki cingi go.
Alanyutho win wor, aka alamiyo go mako wor gi win to dwoko win i piny mewin.
To ka wimedere waco ni, wakilabedo i piny me, to wikwero winjo dwondi Rwoth Were mewin
gi waco ni, be, walakadho i piny Misir, kama wakilaneno i iye lweny, kosa winjo dwondi gwara kosa riyo kec, aka walabedo koro,
winji win wac ma Rwoth waco, Awi ji pa Isiraili m'odoŋ. Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Ka wimiyere donjo i Misir kadho bedo koro,
abor ma wilworo laromo gi win koro, i piny Misir, aka kec ma bwok kwoŋe lariko win i Misir to witho.
Ji je ma jomiyere kadho i Misir bedo koro jolatho g'abor, kec kodi two nundu. Ongoye kwoŋ jo ma laboth teko m'akidho kelo kwoŋ jo.

Kole me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Paka akonjo nge paran kodi keme paran kwoŋ ji ma Yerusalem, ameno apaka bende alakonjo kwoŋ win ka wikidho i Misir. Wilalokere gi mibiew, lworo, kwoŋ kodi gi cay. Wik'onen kabedo me kendo.
Rwoth otieko waco riwin, Awi ji pa Yuda m'odoŋ, wikiri wikidhi i Misir. Ŋey win nike atieko piro win konon
nike witimo gikomo madwoŋ. Wiwegi wioran bongi Rwoth Were mewin, ka wiwaco ni, kway riwan Rwoth Were mawan; aka gima Rwoth Were mawan owaci je, waci riwan walatimo.
Riameno atieko waco riwin konon, to wikiwinjo dwondi Rwoth Were mewin i gimoro je ma go ooran waco riwin.
Ŋey win maber, nike wilatho g'abor, kec kodi two nundu i kabedo ma wiyenyo kidho bed'iye.
Munyo Yeremia otieko luwo ri ji je wac me je ma Rwoth Were pajo ooro Yeremia waco rijo,
Azaria wod pa Hosaya kodi Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi cwo je ma jocay jowaco ri Yeremia ni, “Iwaco twodo. Rwoth Were mawan k'oorin waco nike wakiri wakidhi i Misir bedo koro.
Baruk wod pa Neria ama segeya wan bongin, ketho wan i cingi Jobabilon, ŋey jowoneki wan kosa jowoteri wan i twec.”
Ameno Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi jotel pa jolweny je kodi ji je jok'owinjo dwondi Rwoth, ma doŋ i piny ma Yuda.
To Yohana wod pa Kareya kodi jotel pa jolweny je jotero ji ma jodoŋ i Yuda je m'oyido jodwoko bedo i Yuda wok piny man je m'oyido joring'iye,
cwo, mon, nyithindho kodi nyir pa kere, kodi kisi dhano ma Nebuzaradan jamituka pa jolweny oyido oweyo i cingi Gedalia wod pa Ahikam wod pa Safan kanyacel gi Yeremia kodi Baruk wod pa Neria.
Jokidho i piny Misir, kwoŋbedo jok'owinjo dwondi Rwoth, aka jotundo i Tapanihes.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Yeremia i Tapanihes ni:
Kwany telin mapando moro i cingin, aka iyiki jo i fereji ma lowo manitie i waŋkac ma peco pa kere i Tapanihes ka Joyuda joneno.

Iwaci rijo ni, “Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Akidho oro ŋeca paran kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, aka go laketho kom pere ma dhum i wi telin m'ayiko me, go layaro wema pere kwoŋ jo.
Go labino to kengila Misir, aka jomegi jolatho gi two nundu, joman joladoŋ i twec aka joman jolatho g'abor.
Go lacwinyo mac i udi pa werin ma Misir, aka lawaŋo to tero jo paka jotwec. Go layweyo piny Misir paka jakwath rombo dimo onywogo i nanga pere, to weyo kenyo m'olimo teko.
Go lanyeko woko sirin manyakafir i Bethsemes i piny Misir to waŋo woko udi pa werin ma Misir gi mac.”
Me wac pa Rwoth m'obino ri Yeremia kwoŋ Joyuda je m'oyido jobedo i piny Misir, i Migdol, Tapanihes, Memfis kodi i lowo ma Pathiros.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Wiwegi witieko neno teko m'atieko kelo kwoŋ Yerusalem kodi tindin je ma Yuda. Ŋiy win jo, konon jodoŋ gundin m'ongoye ŋata bedo i jo,
kwoŋbedo kidakana pajo ma jotimo, to jokwinyo nge paran, munyo jomiyo cowirok to jotiyo ri werin man ma fodi jokuya, jo, kosa win kosa kwarere mewin.
Kucel aoro riwin g'amen ŋecin paran jotuci wac Were, k'awaco ni, “Akwayo win wikiri witim amien me m'adak!”
To jok'owinjo kosa ciko ithi gin, wirok kwoŋ kidakana pajo, weyo miyo cowirok ri werin man.
Ameno nge paran kodi keme paran oliel kwoŋ tindin ma Yuda kodi i royin ma Yerusalem, aka jolokere gundin ma kiber anena paka fodi jonitie kiri konon.

Onyo Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Raŋo witimo kiti raco madwoŋ ameno kwoŋ win, neko jacwo kodi dhako, nyithindho kodi nyathi maŋic wok i dier Yuda, to widoŋ m'ongoye ji ma joboth?
Raŋo wikwinyo nge paran gi tic ma cingi win, miyo cowirok ri werin man i piny Misir kama wibino bed'iye? Wilamedere kwedirok ŋey wilokere gi kwoŋ kodi gi cay i dier nonin je ma i piny?
Wiy win otieko wil gi banjin pa kwarere mewin, kerin ma Yuda, mon pajo, kodi banjin mewin kodi mon mewin, ma jotimo i piny Yuda kodi i royin ma Yerusalem?
Jok'obwonere kosa bedo gi lworo kiri gunyo ni, kendo jok'owotho i cik paran kodi or paran m'amiyo kwarere mewin kodi win.
Riameno, me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Amiyere kelo teko kwoŋ win, reyo woko Yuda gibe.
Alatero ji ma jodoŋ i Yuda ma jomiyere bino i piny Misir bed'iye, aka jolarere kisi dhano i piny Misir g'abor kodi kec, wok kwoŋ mathindho tundo kwoŋ madongo. Jolalokere gibwok, lworo, kwoŋ kodi cay.
Alamiyo gir'acula ri jono ma jobedo i piny Misir, paka atieko miyo gir'acula ri Yerusalem g'abor, kec kodi two nundu.
Ongoye ji ma jodoŋ i Yuda ma jobino bedo i piny Misir ma jolakwale kosa both kosa dok i piny Yuda. Makada nende jomito swa dok bedo koro, jokiladok, kwanyowoko ma joringo manok.
Kenyo cwo je m'oyido joŋeyo ni mon pajo oyido jomiyo cowirok ri werin man, kodi mon je m'oyido jocungo cegin, lwak madwoŋ, ji je m'oyido jobedo i Pathiros i piny Misir, jodwoko Yeremia ni,
“Wac no je m'iwaco riwan i nyingi Rwoth, wakilawinjo.

Walamedere timo kisi gima wakwoŋere timo, miyo cowirok ri nyamicala ma i polo kodi konjo rigo mic ma vini, paka wan kodi kwarere mawan, kerin mawan kodi jodhum oyido watimo i tindin ma Yuda kodi i royin ma Yerusalem. Cango oyido wanitie gi cemo kweth, aka wabedo i bero ma wakinen teko.
To wok cuka wawey miyo cowirok ri nyamicala ma i polo kodi konjo rigo mic ma vini, ongoye gima wanitie gine aka watieko tho g'abor kodi kec.”
Mon jomedo waco ni, “Adieri walamedo miyo cowirok ri nyamicala ma i polo kodi konjo vini rigo. Iparo nike oyido watimo mugat to waketho iye cal pere, to wakonjo rigo vini ma cwogi wan jokuya?”
Kenyo Yeremia owaco ri ji je, cwo kodi mon kodi ji je m'oyido jomiyo go radwok ni,
“Wiparo ni Rwoth kipoy buban ma wiwaŋo i tindin madongo i Yuda kodi i royin ma Yerusalem, win kodi kwarere mewin kodi kerin mewin kodi jodhum mewin kodi ji ma lowo no? Wiparo ni wiy go owil?
Rwoth k'onyalo ciro medo neno tim mewin marac, amien ma witimo, riameno lowo mewin olokere gunda, m'ongoye ji ma jobed'iye. Piny mewin olokere gima bwoko jo kodi kwoŋ tundo gunyo ni.

Gime me je obedo kwoŋbedo wiwaŋo mic to witimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth aka wikiwinjo dwondi Rwoth kosa woth i cik pere, kodi i or pere kodi i fonji pere, am'omiyo teko me opodho kwoŋ win, paka nitie konon me.”
Yeremia owaco ri ji je kodi mon je ni, “Winji win wac pa Rwoth, win ji ma Yuda je ma winitie i piny Misir.

Me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Win kodi mon mewin witieko nyutho i tim gima wiwaco i luwo ni, ‘Wayikere timo kwoŋirok ma watimo miyo cowirok ri nyamicala ma i polo kodi konjo rigo vini.’ I nger mogo je, kuri win kwoŋirok mewin aka konji win rigo vini i royo je!

Riameno winji win wac pa Rwoth, win Joyuda je ma wibedo i piny Misir: E, akwoŋere gi nyingan madwoŋ, Rwoth waco, nike nyingan kilatuco i dhok Joyuda ma jobedo i piny Misir, ka jowaco ni, ‘Paka Rwoth Were kwo.’
Akidho neno nike teko opodho kwoŋ jo ma kibero. Ji je ma Yuda ma jobedo i piny Misir jolarere g'abor kodi kec m'ongoye ŋata ladoŋ.
Jono ma joboth abor joladok wok i piny Misir kidho i piny Yuda, manok i welo, aka ji ma jodoŋ i Yuda ma jobino bedo i piny Misir jolaŋeyo nike wac pa ŋa maloyo, aparan kosa apajo!
Me labedo ranyuth riwin, Rwoth waco, nike akidho miyo win gir'acula i kabedo me, ŋey winyal ŋeyo nike wac paran riwin latundo i kare adieri.

Rwoth waco ama, akidho ketho Farawo Hofira, kere ma Misir, i cingi jokwor pere, jono ma jodwaro neko go, paka aketho kere Zedekia ma Yuda i cingi kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, jakwor pere m'odwaro neko go.”
Me apaka Rwoth waco, Were pa Isiraili waco rin, Awi Baruk:
Iwaco ni, “Kidamba ran! Rwoth otieko medo rem i wi litho paran, anyocere gi ywak paran, aka angoye gi ywomirok.”
Waci ri Baruk ni, “Me apaka Rwoth waco, akidho turo piny gim'atieko geto, t'afudho woko gim'atieko pidho; meno piny me gibe.
To in, idwaro gimadwoŋ ri in won? Ikir'idwar jo; kole akidho kelo teko kwoŋ kwo je, Rwoth waco; to alamiyin kwo perin paka cul ma lweny i kabedo je m'inokadh'iye.”
Me wac pa Rwoth m'obino ri Yeremia jatuci wac Were ma mako kwoŋ nonin.
Me wac ma mako kwoŋ Misir, m'oyido nitie i thengi malawa Yufrete i Karkemis ma kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon okengila i oro mar'aŋwen ma dhum pa kere Yehoyakim wod pa Yosia ma Yuda:
Yik win siraget kodi kwot,
aka yikere win lweny!
Tweyi win kayinin mewin,
idhi win kayinin mewin ma lweny!
Ter win kabedo mewin gi jungin mewin,
yedhi win lew tonge mewin,
aka ruk win law mewin ma lweny.
Raŋo aneno jobwok?
Jotieko gik acen,
olac woko jolweny pajo,
joringo piyo.
Jok'oŋiyo yucen,
lworo oumo jo.
Rwoth waco.
Joma dwir jokinyal ringo,
kiri jalweny kinyal kwalok,
yumalo i thengi malawa Yufrete,
jocer to jopodho.
Me ŋa, ma tiŋere malo paka Nayil,
paka malawin ma pi mere ule?
Misir tiŋere malo paka Nayil,
paka malawin ma pi mere ule.
Go owaco ni, weyi atiŋere malo, weyi aum piny,
weyi arey woko tindin madongo kodi ji ma jobed'iye.
Miy win kayinin or jowokadho,
aka cawilin jowodwire!
Weyi jolweny jowowoki,
Ethopiya kodi Libia ma jotiŋo kwot,
jo Ludim ma jocelo asere.
Ndelo no obedo ndelo pa Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny,
ndelo ma culo kwor,
ndelo ma miyo gir'acula ri jokwor pere.
Abor pere lacamo jo cuka yeŋ,
aka lamadho remo pajo cuka poŋ.
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny miyo cowirok,
i piny ma yumalo i thengi malawa Yufrete.
Kadhi win malo, aka wirey yath ma cango litho,
Awi ji ma Misir!
Witieko oro yen kweth nono,
ongoye gima nyalo cango win.
Nonin jotieko winjo kwoŋ wickwot perin,
aka piny opoŋ gi ywak perin,
jalweny lwowere i jalweny man,
joje jopodho kanyacel.
Tuci i Misir, aka langa i Migdol,
Memfis kodi Tapanihes.
Waci ni, “Cungi win, yikere win,
kole abor lareyo woko kisi gimoro thoko win.”
Raŋo Apis oringo?
Raŋo thwon mewin k'ocungo?
Obedo kwoŋbedo Rwoth oredho go piny.
Jolweny mewin jocer to jopodho,
kisi dhano owaco ri nyawote ni,
biye, weyi wagiki bongi ji mawan,
i piny ma wanywolere iye,
aka waboth abor ma reyo wan woko.
Miy Farawo, kere ma Misir nyinge:
Jakoko m'okeŋ hongo pere.
Paka akwo, kere waco,
go ma nyinge obedo Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, moro bino,
paka Tabor i dier gote,
paka ŋamia i thengi nam.
Yik win migugu mewin kadho i twec,
win ji ma Misir!
Kole Memfis lalokere thim,
gunda, m'ongoye ji ma jobed'iye.
Misir cal paka roya maŋon,
ma kilasese m'owok yumalo omonjo.
Jolweny pere m'opangisa,
jocale nyithindhi dhok ma cwe i cel,
jo bende jowire to joringo kanyacel,
jok'ocungo.
Kole ndelo pajo ma teko otieko podho kwoŋ jo,
hongo ma gir'acula pajo.
Misir ringo, aka lwiyo paka thwol,
kole jokwor pere joŋanjo gi meni,
jobino kwoŋe gi le,
paka jotoŋ yen.
Jolacwado lul pere,
makada nende oyukino swa,
kwoŋbedo jothoth loyo bonyo,
aka jokikwanere.
Ji ma Misir wiy jo lakwot,
ilaketho jo i cingi ji ma yumalo.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Neni, akelo gir'acula kwoŋ Amon ma Thebes kodi Farawo kodi Misir kodi werin pere kodi kerin pere kodi kwoŋ Farawo kodi jono ma joketho geno kwoŋ go.
Alaketho jo i cingi jono ma jodwaro neko jo, ri kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon kodi jotel pere. Rumacen ji jolabedo i Misir kendo paka cango con, Rwoth waco.
aka wikiri wibwok, Awi Isiraili;
Kole akidho botho win wok bor,
kanyacel gi nyithindho mewin wok i piny ma twec.
Yakobo ladwoko peco to bedo i piny ma disiem,
aka ongoye ŋata lamiyo go bwok.
Paka ri in, Yakobo ŋeca paran, ikir'ilwor,
Rwoth waco.
Kole anitie kodin.
Alareyo woko nonin je
kam'akedho win'iye,
t'akilareyo win woko.
Alamiyo win gir'acula ma ripo,
kole akilaweyo m'akimiyo win gir'acula.
Rwoth waco ama:
Neni, pi tula wok yumalo,
aka lalokere paka mikula m'opoŋ de oy,
jolaumo piny kodi kisi gima nitie iye,
tindi madwoŋ kodi jono ma jobed'iye.
Ji jolaywak,
aka ji ma piny jolagoyo ndur.
I mayindo ma tiendi kayinin pere,
i derino ma cawilin pere kodi yengirok ma tiendi jo,
jonywol jokinyal gik omo nyithindho pajo,
kwoŋbedo cingi gin nyapere.
Ndelo bino,
ma reyo woko Jofilistia je,
ilacego woko i Tire kodi Sidon,
kony je m'oyido odoŋ.
Kole Rwoth lareyo woko Jofilistia,
ji ma jodoŋ i Kirete.
Pata otieko mako ji ma Gaza ro ywak,
Asikelon oliŋ nisi.
Awi ji ma jodoŋ i milelo pajo,
wilaywak kiri keraŋo.
Awi, abor pa Rwoth,
ilakudere kiri keraŋo?
Gik i odin,
ywomere aka liŋ.
To oliŋ nedi,
ma Rwoth otieko wodho rigo or,
kwoŋ Asikelon kodi ji ma jobedo i thengi nam,
otiek miyo go tic koro.
Me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama:
Kidamba ri Nebo, kole odoŋ gunda!
Kiriathayim odoŋ i wickwot aka omaki,
kapondo mere otur woko.
Dwoŋ pa Mowab orumo woko,
jocano raco i Hesibon kwoŋe,
ma reyo woko go bedo nono.
Win bende, cwo ma joneko, ilamwolo win,
ka abor oriem win.
Ji ma Horonayim joywak ama,
Akaka gi rerok!
Orey woko Mowab,
nyithindho pere joywak.
Winji derino ma cwako um gin,
i yo ka joidho malo i Luhith,
jokadho ka joywak gi litho,
ka joloro piny i Horonayim.
Jowaco ni, kwakere win,
ringi win wibothi kwo mewin,
paka punda madhako madudi i thim.
Kole kwoŋbedo oyido iketho geno i tic perin kodi i lim perin,
in bende ilamakin,
were perin Kemos lakadho bedo i wiloka,
kanyacel gi jotel pere kodi jocway ri were i wi migam pere.
Jarey woko labino i kisi tindi madwoŋ,
aka ongoye tindi madwoŋ ma lakwale.
Milelo kiri gi kam'othangere je lakisika woko,
paka Rwoth otieko luwo.
Kethi gicen cumbi ri Mowab,
kole go lapodho adieri,
tindin pere ladoŋ nono,
m'ongoye ji ma jobedi i iye.
Kwoŋ ri ŋata timo tic pa Rwoth gi lithirok,
kwoŋ ri ŋat'owey ma k'ooro abor pere ma neko.
Mowab oyido nitie i kwo m'otoy wok i soye pere
go oyido opie paka vini m'opie,
paka vini ma k'oloki wok iy'atawo konjo i man,
cwe pere k'orumo,
aka kur pere k'okwok.
Riameno ndelo bino, Rwoth waco, m'abino dhiro ji ma jolayweyo go, aka jolalwindo atewe ma vini pere to joturo mathindho thindho.
Kenyo wickwot lamako Jomowab gi were pajo Kemos, paka cango wickwot omako Joisiraili gi Bethel were m'oyido jogeno.
Winyalo nedi waco ni, “Wabedo jomiseni,
aka jolweny matek?”
Jarey woko Mowab kodi tindin pere otieko ay malo,
aka yac pere mabeyo loyo jotieko kadho piny neki,
Kere waco, go ma nyinge obedo Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Teko pa Mowab ocore cegin,
aka rerok pere bino ma dwir.
Ywak win ri Mowab, win joger pere,
kodi jono je ma joŋeyo nyinge.
Waci win ni, “Neni nger maluth ma dhum pere otur'iye,
luth madwoŋ!”
Lori win piny wok i dwoŋ,
aka wibedi i piny i fukefuke,
win ma wibedo i Dibon.
Kole jarey woko Mowab otieko bino malo kwoŋ win,
go otieko reyo woko kapondo mewin.
Cungi win i thengi royo winen,
win ma wibedo i Arower.
Penji win jacwo ma ringo kodi dhako ma kwale,
ka wiwaco ni, “Aŋo m'otimere?”
Wickwot omako Mowab, kole otur woko,
goy win ndur aka ywak win!
Waci win i thengi malawa Arinon,
nike orey woko Mowab.
Kole otiek thumo banja ri piny m'obipere: Kwoŋ Holon, Jaza kodi Mefath.
Dibon, Nebo kodi Beth Diblathayim.
Kiriathayim, Beth Gamul kodi Beth Mewon.
Kerioth, Bozra kodi tindin je i piny Mowab, bor kodi cegin.
Otur woko tungi Mowab, aka dhum pere orey woko, Rwoth waco.
Rwoth waco ni, Miy win Mowab womer, kwoŋbedo go otiŋere malo kwoŋ Rwoth. Weyi Mowab woŋindere i ŋok pere. Go bende lalokere ginyero.
Isiraili oyido obedo ginyero rin, makada nende k'omaki go i dier jokwo. To kisi k'oyido iluwo kwoŋ go, iyengo wiyin.
Ngoye win i tindin aka wibedi i telin,
win ji ma wibedo i Mowab!
Bedi win paka akuro ma geto ode,
i thengi milelo maluth.
Watieko winjo kwoŋ delok pa Mowab,
go jakwoto swa.
Watieko winjo kwoŋ telok pere, delok kodi gero pere,
kodi kwoŋ kwoto ma cunye.
An won aŋeyo kwoŋ gero pere, Rwoth waco,
delok pere ma twodo,
gi tim pere ma twodo.
Riameno agoyo ndur ri Mowab,
aywak ri Mowab gibe,
aka arem ri ji ma Kiri Heres.
Aywak riwin loyo ji ma Yazer,
awi ji ma Sibima!
Jangin okalo nam,
aka otundo bor kiri Yazer.
To jarey woko otieko podho kwoŋin,
olemo perin ma cwir kodi kwoŋ nyingi vini perin.
Omayin woko forok kodi kisangala,
wok i piny Mowab ma wega olemo.
Atieko juko vini wok i kadhiŋo vini,
ongoye ŋata biyo vini gi kisangala,
aka koko ma kisangala ongoye.
Ji ma Hesibon kodi Eliale joywak, aka ywak pajo winjere tundo kiri Yahaz. Dwondi jo winjere i Zowar kiri i Horonayim kodi Egilath Selisiya.
Rwoth waco ni, “Alakwanyo woko ji ma jomiyo cowirok kodi mic ri werin pajo i kalamo.”
Riameno adundo paran ywak ri Mowab paka madundo kodi ri ji ma Kiri Heres. Kole lim m'oyido jolimo orere woko.
Joje jotieko lielo ye wi jo kodi ye tik jo. Joje jogwero cingi jo to jotweyo kutiya i pier jo.
I wi udi ma Mowab je kodi kam'othangere je ongoye giman kwanyo woko ywak, kwoŋbedo an atieko turo woko Mowab paka atawo m'ongoye ŋata mito, Rwoth waco.
Neni paka otur! Neni paka joyway! Neni paka Mowab owiro ŋeye i wickwot! Ameno apaka Mowab otieko lokere ginyero kodi gibwok ri joger pere je.
Kole Rwoth waco ama:
Neni, nono moro laay mayil paka ango,
to yaro bwombe kwoŋ Mowab.
Ilamako tindin,
kodi kapondo.
Cuny jolweny ma Mowab, labwok i ndelo no,
paka cuny dhako ma ŋedi ramo.
Ilareyo woko Mowab paka nono,
kwoŋbedo go ogwenyere kwoŋ Rwoth.
Teko, bur kodi bwo,
nitie ruwaŋ win, awi ji ma Mowab.
Rwoth waco.
Kisi ŋat'oringi kwoŋ teko,
lapodho i bur,
aka kisi ŋat'owok i bur,
lamoko i bwo.
Rwoth waco.
I tipo ma Hesibon,
ji ma joringo jocungo ma joloc,
kole mac owok i Hesibon,
cuk mac owok i ot pa Sihon,
aka oreyo woko nyim Mowab,
kasik pa ji ma jogwenyirok.
Kidamba rin, awi Mowab!
Ji pa were Kemos jotieko rere woko,
kole oter wot win i twec,
kanyacel gi nyiki win.
Kucel aladwoko lim ma Mowab,
i ndelo ma bino, Rwoth waco.
Me apaka athumo ri Mowab banja.
Joisiraili jongoye gi wot jo?
Isiraili ongoye gi musika?
Raŋo oyey ji ma jolamo were Molek mako adec pa Gad,
aka jobedo i tindin mere.
Riameno, hongo bino adieri,
Rwoth waco,
m'abino kudho gwara ma lweny,
kwoŋ Raba tindi madwoŋ pa Joamon,
lalokere gunda,
aka ilawaŋo calin mere gi mac,
kenyo Isiraili oriemo woko ji ma joriemo go,
Rwoth waco.
Ywak, awi Hesibon, kole Ay orere woko!
Ywak win, awi ji ma Raba!
Ruki win kutiya,
ywak win, aka wicwadere g'adasa!
Kole were mewin Molek lakadho i twec,
kanyacel gi jocway ri were i wi migam pere kodi jotic pere.
Raŋo winor i meni mewin?
Meni mewin lacere,
Awi ji ma Amon,
oyido wigeno lim mewin, ka wiwaco ni,
“Ŋa ma lamonjo wan?”
Akidho kelo teko kwoŋ win,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco,
wok bongi joger mewin je,
aka ilakedho win, kisi dhano kapere,
m'ongoye ŋata lacoko ji ma jokedhere.
To rumacen, aladwoko lim pa Joamon. Rwoth waco.
Rieko ongoye kendo i Teman?
Jomic rieko josika woko?
Rieko pajo orumo woko?
Ringi win, wire wigik, nywongi win piny,
win ji ma wibedo i Dedan!
Kole alakelo teko pa Esau kwoŋe,
i hongo m'abino miyo go gir'acula.
Ka jofoni nyingi vini jobino bongin,
jokiwey ye moro wi yath vini,
ka jokwo jobino kwo wor,
jokikwal ye nyaka gima jomito?
To atieko lunyo Esau kinyoro,
atieko yawo kapondo pere,
aka go kinyal pondo.
Ji pere je orey woko, wade pere,
kanyacel gi joger pere, ongoye ŋat'odoŋ.
Weyi nyithindho kic perin, alakuro jo makwo,
aka weyi mon tho perin jowogenan.
Kole Rwoth waco ama: K'inen jono ma jokiripi madho kikopo ma candirok fodi joripo madho, onyo in ama k'omiyin gir'acula? In bende iripo madho kikopo no.
Kole an won atieko kwoŋirok, Rwoth waco, nike Bozra lalokere gibwok aka gi minyom, gunda kodi gi kwoŋ, aka tindi pere je ladoŋ gundin kicutho.
Atieko winjo mikwenda wok bongi Rwoth,
aka oor jamikwenda i dier nonin.
Cokere win kanyacel aka wimonji go,
aka ay win ri lweny.
Alalokin masisiri i dier nonin,
aka ji jolacayin.
Teko m'itugila,
kodi delok ma cunyin otieko wondin,
win ma wibedo wilwindi matendere,
aka wibedo malo wi gote.
Makada nende wigeto od win malo paka ango,
aladwoko win piny wok kenyo.
Rwoth waco.
Edom lalokere gibwok, aka kisi ŋat'oluwi cegin gine labwok aka lalwiyo kwoŋbedo teko pere je.
Paka orey woko Sodom kodi Gomora, Rwoth waco, apaka bende ongoye ŋata labedo i Edom kendo ongoye dhano ma labed'iye.

Paka simbwor ma wok i lul m'oyukino i thengi Yordan kadho i kakwath, ameno apaka alariemo woko Joedom wok i kakwath pajo abwap. Kenyo alayero jatel rijo. Onyo ŋa ma cal Rwoth, aka ŋa manyalo comirok kodi go? Jakwath mene manyalo cungo ruwaŋe?
Riameno winji can ma Rwoth otieko timo kwoŋ Edom kodi atoŋa ma go ocwogo kwoŋ ji ma Teman. Adieri mwendi mathindho mere ilakadho gi jo, aka kisi dhano je ladhier kwoŋ rerok pajo.
Piny lakirin ro derino ma rerok pajo, aka derino ma ywak pajo lawinjere i Nam M'obokere.
Neni, dhano laloro piny paka ango, aka go lapie piny to yaro bwombe kwoŋ Bozra. I ndelo no cuny jolweny ma Edom lapodho paka cuny dhako ma ŋedi ramo.
Ji ma Hamath kodi ji ma Aripad jorembo,
kwoŋbedo jowinjo wac marac.
Joleny i lworo, jouco paka nam,
ma kinyal kwe.
Ji ma Damasiko jotieko lokere manyap, aka joringo,
aka jopapin,
jonitie i litho kodi i rembo,
paka dhako ma ŋedi ramo.
I nger aŋo m'ojwangi iye tindi madwoŋ m'oŋeyere,
tindi m'opoŋ'iye kisangala!
Riameno yac pere jolatho i royo ma tindi madwoŋ,
aka ilareyo woko jolweny pere i ndelo no,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Alacwinyo mac i kor cel ma Damasiko,
aka lawaŋo woko pecin pa kere Benhadad.
Me wac ma mako kwoŋ Kedar kodi kerin ma Hazor ma kere Nebukadineza okengila.
Rwoth waco ama:
Ay malo imonji Kedar,
reyi woko ji ma yuwok ceŋ!
Ter wemin pajo kodi mwendi pajo,
nangin pajo ma geŋirok kodi gigipiny pajo.
Tiŋi win ŋamin pajo widoŋ gine,
aka ywak lawinjere malo, “Teko othoko iye je.”
Ringi win, lera win bor, pondi win milelo,
awi ji ma tindi madwoŋ Hazor!
Rwoth waco.
Ato kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon,
otieko timo can kwoŋ win,
aka ocwogo atoŋa kwoŋ win.
Ay malo imonji piny moro i yoto,
piny ma bedo i siem.
Rwoth waco.
Kole tindi madwoŋ pajo ongoye gi waŋkace kosa nywenye
aka bedo kakende.
Ter win ŋamin pajo,
kanyacel gi dwol dhok pajo.
Alakedho i kisi thenge,
jono ma jolielo ye wiy jo macek,
aka alakelo teko kwoŋ jo,
wok i kisi thenge.
Rwoth waco.
Hazor lalokere kabedo p'ogwaŋe madudi,
aka lalokere gunda kicutho,
ongoye ŋata labedo kenyo,
aka dhano k'obed'iye kendo.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri jatuci wac Yeremia ma mako kwoŋ Elam, i cakirok ma dhum pa kere Zedekia ma Yuda.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Akidho turo woko gibayo asere pa Elam je ma miyo go meni.
Alamiyo koyo ma wok i thenge aŋwen ma piny wokudhi Elam, aka langoye piny ma ji ma Elam jolakidho bed'iye jowiloka.
Alabwoko ji ma Elam ruwaŋ jokwor pajo, kodi ruwaŋ jono ma jorango neko jo. Alakelo teko kwoŋ jo, nge paran mager, Rwoth waco. Aladhiro abor kwoŋ jo, cuka anotiek reyo jo woko.
Alaketho kom paran ma dhum i Elam, t'areyo woko kere pajo kodi jotel pajo, Rwoth waco.
To i ndelo ma rumacen, aladwoko lim pa Elam kendo, Rwoth waco.
Tuci i dier nonin aka iwaci,
tiŋi bendera aka ilanga,
ikir'imuŋ, to wac ni,
Otiek mako Babilon,
werin pere Bel wickwot omako,
aka Mariduk odoŋ dhier.
Calin pa Babilon jodhier,
aka wickwot omako jo.
“Kole nono owok yumalo kwoŋ Babilon, aka lareyo woko piny pere, m'ongoye ŋata labed'iye, ji kiri g'ogwaŋe je jolaringo.”
I ndelo no, aka i hongo no, Rwoth waco, ji ma Isiraili jolabino, jo kodi ji ma Yuda kanyacel, jolabino ka joywak ka jorango Rwoth Were pajo.
Jolapenjo royo ma kidho i Zayon, ka joŋiyo yukorago. Jolabino timo gi Rwoth cikirok ma cil gi cil ma jok'otur.
Ji paran oyido jobedo rombo ma jorwenyo; jokwath pajo oyido jorwenyo jo, jowiro jo woko wi gote. Jolera wok wi got kadho i tendere paka rombo, aka wicwil omako jo gi peco pajo.
Jono je ma jonwaŋo jo jotieko reyo woko jo, aka jokwor pajo jotieko waco ni, “Wabu banja, kwoŋbedo jotimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth, jakwath m'otire, Rwoth, geno pa kwarere pajo.”
Kole akidho ico t'akelo nonin madongo kwoŋ Babilon wok i piny ma yumalo, aka jolamonjo go to jomako. Asere pajo cal g'asere pa jalweny ma jandijo ma kidok gi cinge nono.
Ilakinyaga Babilon, aka jono je ma jolakinyaga jolatero kisi gimoro, Rwoth waco.
Rwoth waco ni, “Makada nende ifore, aka isangala,
awi ji ma jonyaga piny paran,
makada nende wipor malo paka roya dhiaŋ ma camo lum,
aka i hamo paka kayina matek,
wickwot lamako yokin,
yokin m'onywolin lasewere wic.
Babilon labedo nono macowe,
thim, lowo m'othwo, kodi opalipat.
Ongoye ŋata labed'iye kwoŋbedo keme pa Rwoth,
to larere kicutho.
Kisi dhano m'oluw cegin gi Babilon ladhier,
to uro kwoŋbedo adhola pere je.
Ter win kabedo mewin thoko Babilon,
win je ma wicelo asere,
celi win go, wikiri wiwey asere moro je,
kole Babilon otieko timo reco kwoŋ Rwoth.
Koki win kwoŋ Babilon i thenge je,
kole go otieko tiŋo cinge malo,
cel pere otieko podho,
aka orwadhi piny.
Kole me culo kwor pa Rwoth,
cul win kwor kwoŋ go,
tim win rigo paka go bende otimo.
Neki win jocwoyo i Babilon,
kodi ja ringa i hongo ma keco,
kole ro abor ma reyo woko,
joje jolagik bongi ji pajo,
aka joje jolaringo i piny pajo wegi.”
Rwoth waco, “Joisiraili jocale rombo ma simbwor oriemo to jokedhere. Marapena Asiria oreyo go, aka onyo i cowe Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon ŋinyo woko cokin pere.
Riameno Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pa Isiraili waco ama: Akidho miyo kere ma Babilon gir'acula kanyacel gi piny pere, paka amiyo kere ma Asiria gir'acula.
Aladwoko Isiraili i piny pajo. Jolacamo madongo wi got Kamel kodi iy'adec ma Basan, jolacamo kisi cemo ma jomito ma ipidho iy'adec ma Efrayim kodi Giliad.
I ndelo no, aka i hongo no, reco kilabedo i Isiraili, aka kidakana langoye i Yuda, kwoŋbedo alacwako ri jono m'abino weyo makwo, Rwoth waco.”
Kadhi malo i lowo pajo Merathayim,
aka imonji go,
monji ji ma jobedo i Pekod,
aka irey woko jo kicutho,
Rwoth waco.
Tim kisi gim'atieko waco rin.
Derino ma lweny winjere i lowo,
aka rerok madwoŋ nitie.
Babilon m'oyido obedo nyundu ri piny gibe,
otoŋ woko aka otur.
Neni, kite ma Babilon olokere
gibwok i dier nonin.
Iciko bwo perin won aka imoko iye, awi Babilon,
to ikiŋeyo,
oniaŋ kwoŋin aka omakin,
kwoŋbedo ipiemo gi Rwoth.
Rwoth otieko yawo kakan ma gilweny pere,
aka owodho gilweny ma keme pere.
Kole Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny nitie gi tic atima,
i piny pa Jobabilon.
Monji win go wok i kisi thenge,
yaw win dere pere,
dhuri win go paka cemo, aka wirey woko go kicutho,
wongoye gima wodoŋ kwoŋe.
Neki win jolweny pere je,
neki win joje,
kidamba rijo, ndelo pajo otieko tundo,
hongo ma gir'acula pajo.
Winji, jowiloka kodi ji ma jokwale wok i Babilon jobino tuco i Zayon culo kwor pa Rwoth Were mawan ri gima Jobabilon jotimo ri ot pere.
Riameno ilaneko yac pere i royin pere, aka ilareyo woko jolweny pere i ndelo no, Rwoth waco.
Neni ee, acomere kwoŋin, awi janoro me,
Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny waco.
Ndelo perin otieko tundo,
ndelo m'abino miyin'iye gir'acula.
Janoro lacer to podho,
t'ongoye ŋata latiŋo go malo.
Alacwinyo mac i tindin pere madongo,
ma lareyo woko kisi gimoro.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Idiyo ji ma Isiraili kodi ji ma Yuda. Jono je ma jomako jo joswana jo matek ma jokiwey jo kadho.
To jaboth pajo tek, nyingi go obedo Rwoth Jameni Je. Go won ama lakiosa rijo, ŋey wokel siem i piny, to kelo teko ri ji ma Babilon.
Rwoth waco ama:
Lweny kwoŋ Jobabilon,
kodi kwoŋ ji ma jobedo i Babilon.
Lweny kwoŋ jotel pere kodi jorieko pere.
Lweny kwoŋ jothieth,
ŋey jowolokere jomamiŋ.
Lweny kwoŋ jolweny pere,
ŋey worey woko jo.
Lweny kwoŋ kayinin pere kodi cawilin pere,
kodi kwoŋ jolweny ma jopangisa je,
ŋey jowolokere mon.
Lweny kwoŋ lim pere,
ŋey wonyaga woko.
Keli milengela kwoŋ piny pere,
ŋey pi pere wocwiy.
Kole Babilon obedo piny ma cal omor'iye,
aka jolokere joneko ro calin.
Labedo paka munyo Were oreyo woko Sodom kodi Gomora, joger pajo, Rwoth waco. Ongoye dhano ma lakwo kenyo, m'obed'iye kendo.
Neni, nono bino wok yumalo,
nono matek kodi kerin kweth,
aka oici jo wok i piny mabor swa.
Jomako asere kodi abor,
aka joger m'ongoye nyutho wor.
Derino pajo winjere paka mor pa nam,
aka jogweyo kayinin.
Joyikere lweny,
kwoŋ win, awi ji ma Babilon.
Kere ma Babilon owinjo mikwenda kwoŋ jo,
aka cinge olocere.
Amurie omako go,
kodi litho paka dhako ma ŋedi ramo.

Paka simbwor ma bino wok kam'oyukino i thengi Yordan kidho i lum, an Rwoth alabino miyo Jobabilon ringo abwap wok i tindi madwoŋ pajo. Kenyo alayero ŋata an won amito dhumo jo. Ŋa ma cal an? Ŋa manyalo penjan? Jadhum mene manyalo cungo ruwaŋan?
Riameno winji win can ma Rwoth otieko timo kwoŋ Babilon, kodi atoŋa ma go otieko timo kwoŋ lowo ma Babilon. Adieri ilatero nyithindho pajo aka kisi dhano labwok.
Piny lakirin to yengere ka Babilon opodho, aka ywak pere lawinjere i dier nonin.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
Akidho ico koyo ma reyo woko,
kwoŋ Babilon,
kodi ji ma jobed'iye.
Aladhiro jopath i Babilon,
aka jolayweyo go,
to joweyo go m'othangere.
Jolathoko go i kisi thenge,
i ndelo ma teko.
Ongoye yeyo ŋata celo abor celo,
kosa ruko gilweny pajo.
Ongoye weyo yac pere,
reyi woko win jolweny pere kicutho.
Jolalimo litho to jotho i piny Babilon,
kodi i royin ma tindin madongo.
Were, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
fodi k'ojwango Isiraili kodi Yuda,
makada nende lowo pajo opoŋ reco,
ruwaŋ Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili.
Ngoye win woko i Babilon,
kisi dhano wobothi kwo pere!
Wikiri wirere ro reco pere,
kwoŋbedo me hongo ma Rwoth cul'iye kwor kwoŋ Babilon,
aka miyo go gir'acula ma ripo gine.
m'amiyo piny gipi mer.
Nonin jomadho vini mere,
riameno jotimere paka joneko.
Babilon opodho abwap aka oŋinyere woko,
ywak win rigo,
keli win mo ri adhola pere,
poyi go nyalo cango.
to go k'onyalo cango.
Jwangi win go, aka weyi kisi dhano kwoŋ wan,
wodoki i piny pere won.
Kole Were ma i polo am'omiyo go gir'acula,
aka rerok pere owinjere bor.
Rwoth otieko miyo wan loyo,
biye win watuci i Zayon,
tic pa Rwoth Were mawan.
Pak win aserin,
yik win kwote mewin!
Rwoth otieko guro cuny kerin ma Medes,
kwoŋbedo atoŋa pere ri Babilon obedo ma reyo woko.
Ameno apaka go laculo kwor ma reyo woko Ot pa Were.
Tiŋi malo siro perin kwoŋ kor udi ma Babilon.
Ridhi jakur!
Dhiri jokur! Kethi cwo i lweny apondi.
Kole Rwoth otieko timo can je to timo
gima go oluwo ma mako kwoŋ ji ma bedo i Babilon.
gike perin otieko tundo,
thol ma kwo perin oŋadi woko.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny won gipi otieko kwoŋere:
Adieri alapoŋin gi jolweny paka tome bonyo,
aka jolagoyo koko ma kikengila kwoŋ win.
Rwoth am'ocweyo piny gi meni pere;
gi rieko pere ocweyo piny
aka gi niaŋ pere oyaro polo.
Ka go ogoyo dwonde, mor pa pi bedo i polo,
aka go miyo fumbi ay wok i tielo ma piny.
Go timo lithkoth ri koth,
aka wodho woko koyo wok i kakan mere.
Ka ji joneno gime, jolokere mamiŋ ma jongoye gi geno;
jothedhi nywenye je ikwoto wiy jo gi cal pajo;
kwoŋbedo cal pajo obedo gitwodo,
aka luya ongoye i jo.
Jongoye kony, tic ma twodo;
i hongo ma gir'acula pajo jolakisika.
Were pa Yakobo k'obedo paka jo;
go a ŋat'ocweyo kisi gimoro,
aka Isiraili obedo nono mar'alunja pere;
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny obedo nyinge.
Rwoth waco,
“Babilon, ibedo nyundu paran, gilweny paran.
Aorin ma ŋinyo woko nonin gi kerin,
ma ŋinyo punde kodi jogwey,
ma ŋinyo woko cawilin kodi jogwey,
ma ŋinyo woko cwo gi mon;
ma neko jom'oti kodi yac;
ma neko yac gi nyir,
ma neko jokwath gi mwendi pajo,
ma neko jofur kodi kitipa pajo;
ma neko jodhum kodi jotel.”
Alaculo Babilon kodi ji je ma bed'iye ma wineno ro gimarac ma jotieko timo i Zayon, Rwoth waco.
Kole amon swa kodin, awi got ma jarey,
Rwoth waco.
Alarieyo cingan kwoŋin,
t'afuta in piny wok malo
t'alokin buru.
Ongoye telin ma lawok i gundin perin
m'ilaoro ma geto. T'ilabedo paka opalipat cil gi cil,
Rwoth waco.
Tiŋi malo ranyuth i piny,
kudhi gwara i dier nonin;
yik nonin ma lweny gi Babilon!
Lwoŋ nonin jowolweny gine,
Ararat, Mini, kodi Asikenaz jowomonji.
Kethi rigo jatel ma telo lweny,
keli punde paka tome bonyo.
Yik nonin ma lweny kodi Babilon,
kerin ma Mediya, gi jodhum kodi jotel,
gi kisi piny i dhum pajo.
Piny kirin aka yengere,
kwoŋbedo Rwoth timo can pere
ma loko Babilon thim, m'ongoye ŋata bed'iye.
Jolweny ma Babilon jotieko weyo lweny,
jodoŋ i kambi pajo.
Meni pajo orumo,
jotieko lokere paka mon.
Ocwiny udi pajo,
nywenye pajo otur woko.
Jaŋwec acel riŋo ma romo gi man,
aka jamikwenda acel riŋo romo gi man,
ma waco ri kere ma Babilon
ni tindi pere madwoŋ omaki wok i thenge gi thenge.
Jokwor jotieko mako malawa,
aka jotieko waŋo cel gi mac.
Jolweny ma Babilon jokirin.
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama, Were pa Isiraili:
Nyar Babilon cal paka kisia
i hongo m'onyon iye;
kucel i hongo macek
hongo ma keco go bino tundo.
Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon otieko cuto woko Yerusalem,
otieko ŋinyo woko Yerusalem.
Go oweyo tindi madwoŋ m'ongoye gimoro paka jagi,
go omwonyo Yerusalem paka ogwaŋ madwoŋ ma nam.
Go otieko poŋo iye gi gigipiny ma Yerusalem mabeyo,
to bolo megi woko.
Weyi ji ma Zayon jowowaci ni,
“Weyi woculi kwor kwoŋ Babilon ro akaka m'otimi riwan.”
Weyi Yerusalem wowaci ni, “Woculi kwor kwoŋ Babilon ro candirok mawan.”
Riameno Rwoth waco ama ri ji ma Yerusalem:
Akidho kiosa banja mewin
t'aculo kwor riwin.
Alathwo woko nam pere
t'acwiyo woko waŋ pi pere.
Babilon lalokere kidhur gundin,
kero kibwe,
gima miyo jo bwok gi kirin,
m'ongoye ŋata bed'iye.
Paka nyithindhi simbwore jobino kiuja kanyacel.
Jobedo joworo? Alayiko rijo kalima t'amero jo to josangala.
Jolakidho nindo to jok'ocew, apaka Rwoth waco.
Alatero wothum jo, paka rombo, diegi gi wot rombo.
An Rwoth, atieko luwo.
Rwoth waco mako kwoŋ Babilon:
Tindi madwoŋ ma piny gipi jopako,
otiek mako! Nga Babilon onyo,
olokere gima kiber anena ri nonin!
Nam onyo mol i wi Babilon to umo,
gi derino mere ma mor.
Tindi madongo onyo jolokere gima,
miyo ji lworo, aka onyo jocale opalipat,
gi thim. Lowo m'ongoye ŋata bed'iye kosa
luw'iye.
Alamiyo Bel gir'acula, were pa Jobabilon,
t'amiyo go weyere kodi gigipiny pere,
m'okwal. Nonin jok'olam go kendo;
kor udi ma Babilon jotieko podho.
Ji ma Isiraili, ringi wingoye woko kenyo!
Ringi wiboth kwo mewin kwoŋ nge pa Rwoth!
Cuny win wokiri wopodhi kosa wibedi gi lworo
kwoŋbedo luwo makicar ma wiwinjo.
Kisi oro luwo makicar m'opokere nyay;
luwo makicar mar'akaka i piny,
kodi kere acel ma lwenyo gi man.
Aridho riwin, ndelo bino
m'alamiy'iye gir'acula ri cal ma Babilon;
piny pere gipi ilaketho i wickwot,
aka ji mere je ilaneko.
Kisi gimoro je ma piny kodi ma polo
jolakoko gi kisangala ka Babilon opodhi
i cingi ji ma jowok yumalo ma reyo woko,
Rwoth waco.
Babilon okelo tho ri ji i piny gipi,
aka onyo riameno Babilon lapodho
kwoŋbedo otieko miyo ji kweth ma
Isiraili jotho. An Rwoth, atieko luwo.
Rwoth waco ri ji pere i Babilon ni:
“Witieko kwale kwoŋ tho! Pama kadhi
win! Wikiri wikuri! Kada wibor gi peco,
par win kwoŋan, an Rwoth mewin, aka wipoy Yerusalem.
Wiwaco ni, ‘Lifol omako wan, to wickwot mako wan;
wawinjo ni wangoye kony kicutho
kwoŋbedo jopath jotieko tero Kabedo Maleŋ i Ot pa Were.’
Onyo riameno, adieri hongo bino, Rwoth waco,
m'alamiy'iye gir'acula ri calin pere,
aka ma jolimi litho joladwanyere gi litho to joywak i piny gipi.
Kada Babilon oidhi pondeponde to geto cel matek kenyo,
fodi alanyalo dhiro ji ma turo woko, Rwoth waco.”
Rwoth waco ni,
“Winji win derino ma ywak i Babilon,
ma ywak ro rerok i piny pa Jokaldin!
Kole Rwoth reyo woko Babilon,
aka miyo go liŋ nisi.
Jolweny joyombere i iye paka derino
pa pi ma mol, to jomonjo gi derino ma woy.
Jobino ma reyo woko Babilon;
omaki jolweny mere,
aka aserin pajo otur woko.
Kole Rwoth obedo Were ma miyo gimarac gir'acula,
aka alatic gi Babilon paka mitere.
Alaloko jodhum mere jomero,
cwo ma joriek, jotel gi jolweny.
Jolakidho nindo to jok'ocew.
Kere waco, go ma nyinge obedo Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
Kor ot ma Babilon mapando
ilariewo piny,
aka waŋkace mere ma joŋawere
ilawaŋo gi mac.
Ji jool rigo nono,
aka nonin jolacere nyaka ri mac.”
Jakur pa kere Zedekia oyido obedo Seraya, wod pa Neria, nyakwar Maseya. I oro mar'aŋwen munyo Zedekia obedo kere ma Yuda, Seraya oyido kidho gine Babilon, t'amiyo go fonji moro.
Yeremia ondiko i kitawo gima mako rerok je m'oyido labino kwoŋ Babilon, kanyacel gi gigipiny man me je ma mako kwoŋ Babilon.
Yeremia owaco ri Seraya ni, “K'itundo Babilon, neni ni isoma malo ri ji kisi gimoro je m'ondiki ka.
Kenyo t'ikwayo ama: Awi Rwoth, in won gipi itieko waco ni ilareyo woko kabedo me ŋey ji kosa ogwaŋe jokiri jowobed'iye, aka ibino jwango cil gi cil.
Seraya, k'itieko kisoma kitawo me ri ji, kenyo itwey i tele t'ibolo i dier Malawa Yufrete,
t'iwaco ni, ‘Me a gima latimere ri Babilon, lamunyere, aka k'oay malo kendo, kwoŋbedo rerok ma Rwoth kidho kelo kwoŋe.’”
Zedekia oyido jaoro piero ario g'acel munyo olokere kere ma Yuda, to dhumo Yerusalem ma oro apar g'acel. Yok mere oyido ilwoŋo ni Hamutal, nyar Yeremia m'obedo i tindi madwoŋ ma Libina.
Kere Zedekia otimo reco ruwaŋ Rwoth, i nger acel paka Yehoyakim oyido otimo.
Adieri, Rwoth omako nge swa gi ji ma Yerusalem kodi Yuda m'omiyo go oriemo jo woko ruwaŋe.
Zedekia ogwenyere kwoŋ Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon.
Riameno Nebukadineza obino gi jolweny pere je to jomonjo Yerusalem k'apar i dwe mar'apar i oro mar'abuŋwen ma dhum pa Zedekia. Jojengo kambi pajo woko ma tindi madwoŋ, to jogoyo cel thoko.
Ameno othoki tindi Yerusalem cuka tundo oro mar'apar g'acel ma dhum pa Zedekia.
Ka ndelo abuŋwen ma dwe mar'aŋwen i oro acel no won, munyo kec gway swa ji oyido jongoye gi gir'acama,
t'ituro woko kor udi ma tindi madwoŋ. Joluwo gi royo ma kidho i ndelo pa kere, joluwo gi waŋkac ma riwo kor udi ario, to jokwale gi i royo ma kidho Milelo ma Yordan.
To jolweny ma Babilon joriemo Kere Zedekia, jomako go i kam'obipere macegin gi Yeriko, to jolweny pere je jokedhere, to joweyo go.
Kenyo to jomako kere, to jokelo go bongi Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon i Ribila i piny pajo Hamath, to Kere Nebukadineza thumo ri Zedekia banja.
Kere Nebukadineza oneko wot Zedekia munyo Zedekia neno ama, to neko bende jotel ma Yuda i Ribila.
Ogolo woko waŋ Zedekia, to tweyo go gi lijegere, to kere ma Babilon tero go Babilon. Oketho Zedekia i katwec cuka tundo ndelo ma tho pere.
K'apar i dwe mar'abic i oro mar'apar g'abuŋwen ma dhum pa Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, Nebuzaradan, jamic rieko pa kere kodi jamituka pa jolweny pere, jodonjo i Yerusalem.
Nebuzaradan owaŋo Ot pa Rwoth, cel pa kere, kodi udi pa ji madongo je ma Yerusalem;
to jolweny pere joredho piny kor udi ma tindi madwoŋ.
Kenyo to Nebuzaradan kadho gi ji m'oyido jodoŋ i tindi madwoŋ i Babilon, jotic ma jondijo ma jodoŋ, kodi jono m'oyido jowiro bongi Jobabilon.
To Nebuzaradan oweyo i Yuda ji moro ma jocandi, jom'oyido jongoye gi lim moro, to ketho jo tic i ndelo vini kodi i ndelin.

Jokadho bende gi kitiyin, giketho buru m'ioro ma lonyo migam, gigipiny m'ioro ma dhiro talin madongo, bakulere m'ioro ma jolo remo ma cowirok, bakulere m'ioro ma waŋo buban kodi gigipiny ma ywel je m'ioro ma timo tic i Ot pa Rwoth.
Jokadho gi kisi gimoro je m'otimi gi zahabu gi feza: Bakulere mathindho, wer, kalayere, degi, kacungo pa talin, kijikin kodi bakulere m'ioro ma konjo woko mic ma vini.
Gigipiny ma ywel ma Kere Solomon oyido oyiko ri Ot pa Rwoth: Sirin ario, magalere, pipa acel kodi thwondhe apar g'ario ma jothielo; ywel ma gigipiny me oyido pek ma kipimere.
Paka ri sirin, ŋawirok pa siro acel oyido obedo mita 8 kodi mita 5.3 thoko. Nyweny oyido oŋamere aka nywol mere oyido obedo milimita 75.
I wiye oyido nitie ywel madwoŋ; ŋawirok pa acel oyido obedo mita 2.2 aka thoko iye je oyido obedo nywenye maŋon m'oriw jo kanyacel gi pomo, m'oyido otim joje gi ywel.
I wi kisi siro acel m'oyik maŋon, oyido nitie je pomo 100 aka 96 kwoŋ jo oyido nenere wok piny.
Medo kwoŋ meno, Nebuzaradan, jamituka, okadho kodi Seraya jacway ri Were madwoŋ, Zefania m'oyido luwo Seraya i dwoŋ, kodi jotel man madongo adek ma Ot pa Rwoth.

Wok i tindi madwoŋ Nebuzaradan okadho kodi jatel m'oyido obedo jamituka pa jolweny, jomic rieko pa kere abirio m'oyido fodi jonitie i tindi madwoŋ, ŋata luwo kor jamituka, m'oyido obedo jandiko, kodi cwo 60 man madongo.
Nebuzaradan otero jo ri kere ma Babilon, m'oyido nitie i tindi madwoŋ ma Ribila.
Kere ma Babilon orwadho jo piny, to neko jo i Ribila i piny ma Hamath. Ameno to Yuda kadho i wiloka woko ma piny pere.
Me a welo pa ji ma Nebukadineza otero paka jotwec i wiloka: I oro mar'abirio, Joyuda 3,023
i oro mar'apar g'aboro ma dhum pa Nebukadineza go otero i wiloka wok Yerusalem ji 832
i oro ma 23 ma dhum pa Nebukadineza, Nebuzaradan jamituka otero i wiloka ma Yuda ji 745. Ji je m'okadhi gi jo obedo 4,600.

I oro ma 37 ma bedo i wiloka pa Kere Yehoyakin ma Yuda, i dwe mar'apar g'ario ka ndelo piero ario g'abic Kere Evilmerodak ma Babilon, i oro ma go ocak'iye dhum, go onyutho wor ri kere Yehoyakin ma Yuda to wodho go woko ma katwec.
Evilmerodak oluwo gine gi wor, to miyo go kabedo ma malo loyo kerin man je m'oyido go nitie gine i Babilon.
Ameno to Yehoyakin ketho gicen nangin pere ma katwec, aka kisi ndelo ma kwo pere noknok go ocemo i meza pa kere.
Kere Evilmerodak ma Babilon omiyo go pesa ma kwo kisi ndelo, tekin go oyido fodi kwo, tundo i ndelo ma tho pere.
Yerusalem, tindi madwoŋ odoŋ kakende nedi,
tindi madwoŋ m'oyido opoŋ'iye ji kweth!
Go ma cango nonin woro,
onyo pama olokere citho.
Go m'oyido obedo nyakere,
onyo pama timo tic arom.
Go ywak gi geregere wor,
gi pigi waŋe i pinde,
ongoye ŋat'okwey cunye,
i dier jomitirok pere.
Merin pere je jotiyo gi go akor,
jotieko lokere jokwor pere.
Yuda otieko kadho i twec gi candirok,
i tic arom matek.
Go onyo bedo i dier nonin,
aka ongoye gi kaywomirok.
Joma joriemo go jotieko kikengila go,
i kidamba pere.
Royin ma kidho Zayon ywak,
kole ongoye ŋata bino i kalimin.
Waŋkace pere je odoŋ nono,
jocway ri Were i wi migam pere joywak,
Nyir pere jonitie i rem,
aka go odoŋ i geregere.
Jokwor pere jolokere jotel,
jokwor pere jonitie i kwo mayom,
kwoŋbedo Rwoth omiyo go candirok,
ro kibenga pere m'oasere.
Oter nyithindho pere,
jobedo jotwec ruwaŋ jokwor pajo.
Dwoŋ pa Zayon orumo woko,
jotel pere jolokere amudhe,
ma kinyal nwaŋo lum,
joŋweco m'ongoye meni,
ruwaŋ ŋata riemo jo.
Yerusalem poyo,
hongo ma litho pere kodi keco,
gigipiny pere je ma welo,
m'oyido obedo apere i hongo macon.
Munyo ji pere jopodho i cingi jakwor,
oyido ongoye ŋat'okony go,
jakwor oneno to nyero podho pere.
Yerusalem otimo reco ma kiwacere,
riameno olokere makoc.
Jono je m'oyido jomiyo go wor, jocayo go,
kwoŋbedo jotieko neno kinyoro pere,
go won ywak aka pano waŋe.
Koco pere oyido nitie i rinda pere,
go k'oparo kwoŋ gim'owok rumacen,
podho pere obedo gi dhier,
m'ongoye ŋat'okwey cunye.
Awi Rwoth, neni, litho paran,
kole jakwor otieko tiŋere malo.
Jakwor otieko yaro cinge,
kwoŋ gigipiny pere je ma welo,
go otieko kiri neno nonin,
ka jomonjo Ot pa Were pere,
jono m'oyido iwodho or,
nike jokiri jowobin i cokirok perin.
Ji pere je jodwanyere gi litho,
ka jorango cemo,
jotieko kitana gigipiny pajo ma welo ri cemo,
ma kuro kwo pajo.
Neni, Awi Rwoth, aka ŋiy,
nger m'icayan iye.
Me obedo riwin gim'ongoye, win je ma wiluwo?
Neni, aka ŋiy win,
k'inen nitie litho ma cal gi litho paran,
m'okel kwoŋan
litho ma Rwoth omiyan,
i ndelo ma nge pere maliel.
Go odhiro mac wok malo,
to donjo maluth i cokin paran,
go oyaro bwo ri tiendan,
to dwokan piny,
go omiyan doŋ nono,
m'alocere ndelo je.
Go otweyo kibenga paran kanyacel i bieto,
to tudo kanyacel gi cinge,
jopek i ŋutan,
aka olokan manyap;
Rwoth okethan,
i cingi jono m'akinyal ciro jo.
Rwoth okwero woko,
jomeni paran je ruwaŋan,
go odhiro jolweny,
ma turo woko yac paran;
Rwoth otieko dhiŋo ji ma Yuda,
paka idhiŋo vini.
Ro gigipiny me aywak,
aka pigi waŋan cwer,
kole ongoye ŋat'okwey cunyan,
ŋat'odwoki ran meni,
nyithindho paran jodoŋ nono,
jakwor otieko kikengila an.
Zayon oyaro cinge,
to ongoye ŋat'okwey cunye,
Rwoth oyeko wodho or kwoŋ Yakobo,
nike joger pere jolokere jokwor pere,
Yerusalem otieko lokere,
gimakoc i dier jo.
Rwoth otire,
kwoŋbedo agwenyere kwoŋ wac pere,
to mondo winji win, nonin je,
neni kwoŋbedo litho paran,
yac paran kodi nyir paran,
jokadho i twec.
Alwoŋo jomitirok paran,
to jowondan,
jocway ri Were i wi migam paran kodi jodongo paran,
jorere i tindi madwoŋ,
kareno jorango cemo,
ma kuro kwo pajo.
Neni, Awi Rwoth, nger manitie iye i litho,
iyan ramere,
cunyan raman,
kwoŋbedo gwenyirok paran ma kiwacere,
Abor neko i royin,
aka i ot cal tho.
Jowinjo nike oyido aywak,
m'ongoye ŋat'okwey cunyan,
jokwor paran je jowinjo kwoŋ litho paran,
aka josiemere nike itimo,
keli ndelo m'itieko yiko,
aka weyi bende jowocal an.
Weyi kidakana pajo onenere ruwaŋin,
aka tim rijo paka itieko timo ran,
kwoŋbedo kibenga paran oasere,
kodi ywak paran,
cunyan raman.
Rwoth, i nge pere,
oumo Zayon gi mudho.
Go obolo i piny wok i polo,
dwoŋ pa Isiraili,
go k'opoyo kabedo pa tiende,
i ndelo ma nge pere.
Rwoth oreyo woko kicutho,
kabedo ma Yuda je,
i keme pere go oturo piny,
kapondo pa ji ma Yuda,
go oredho piny i lowo i wickwot,
ker kodi jodhum mere.
Go oredho piny i nge malieth,
jomatek je i Isiraili,
go okwanyo woko cinge maracuc kwoŋ jo,
ruwaŋ jakwor,
go oliel i Yakobo,
paka mac ma reyo woko thoko.
Go ogondo gibayo asere pere paka jakwor,
cinge maracuc oyikere paka jakwor,
go oneko jono je m'oyido jobeyo,
i wema pa Zayon;
go okonjo woko keme pere paka mac.
Rwoth olokere paka jakwor,
go oreyo woko Isiraili.
Go oreyo woko cel pa kere je,
to sika woko kapondo mere;
aka omedo kwoŋ ji ma Yuda,
ywak kodi rem.
Go oturo piny Ot pa Rwoth pere paka ndelo,
go oreyo woko ot pere.
Rwoth okwanyo woko i Zayon,
kalima kodi sabato,
aka i keme pere go omiyo,
kere kodi jacway ri Were i wi migam winjo meni ma nge pere.
Rwoth okwero woko migam pere,
to jwango Ot pa Were.
Go omiyo i cingi jakwor,
kor ot ma cel pa kere,
ji jowoy i Ot pa Rwoth,
paka i ndelo ma kalima m'oyik.
Rwoth obedo g'atoŋa ma kisika woko,
kor ot ma Zayon,
go ociero bol,
aka k'ogeŋo cinge reyo woko.
Go omiyo kor ot kodi kapondo ywak,
josika woko kanyacel.
Waŋkace pere jomunyere piny,
go oturo woko to reyo woko nywenye mere.
Kerin pere kodi jodhum jonitie i dier nonin,
jongoye gi fonji.
Jotuci wac Were pere bende,
jokilim menyirok wok bongi Rwoth.
Jodongo ma Zayon,
jobedo piny i lowo liŋ.
Jowiro fukefuke i wic jo,
aka joruko kutiya.
Nyir ma Yerusalem,
jokulo wic gin i lowo.
Waŋan oloc gi ywak,
aka iyan raman.
Cunyan raman,
kwoŋbedo rerok pa ji paran,
kwoŋbedo nyithindho kodi nyithindho ma dhoth,
joloc kam'othangere i tindi.
Joywak ri megi jo ka jopenjo ni,
nikune cemo kodi vini?
Joloc paka ŋat'olimo litho madwoŋ,
kam'othangere ma tindi madwoŋ;
kwo pajo rumo woko,
i kor megi jo.
Anowaci aŋo rin, aka anopima in g'aŋo,
Awi Yerusalem?
Anomiyin i cal g'aŋo, ŋey anyal kweyo cunyin,
Awi Yerusalem?
Rerok perin dwoŋ paka nam,
ŋa m'ocangin ŋa?
Jotuci wac Were perin,
jotieko neno rin menyirok ma twodo ma bukony.
Jok'okedho reco perin,
ma dwoko lim perin;
to jotieko neno rin menyirok,
ma twodo aka ma rwenyo jo.
Jono je ma joluwo i royo,
jogoyo adhoŋ kwoŋin,
jolwiyo to joyengo wiy gin,
kwoŋ Yerusalem;
Me a tindi madwoŋ m'oyido ji jopako ni
ŋon swa, aka obedo kisangala pa piny?
Jokwor perin je,
joŋamo dhok jo kwoŋin,
jolwiyo to jokayo lak gin,
aka jowaco ni, adieri watieko reyo woko go!
A, me ndelo m'oyido wakuro,
aka onyo watieko neno.
Rwoth otieko timo atoŋa pere,
go otieko ketho i kare wac pere ma go owodho or.
Paka wok i hongo macon,
go oturo piny kicutho.
Go omiyo jakwor siemirok kwoŋ win,
aka otiŋo malo wic jokwor mewin.
Ywak win malo ri Rwoth,
Awi ji ma Yerusalem!
Weyi pigi waŋ win womol paka malawa,
odieceŋ kodi wor.
Wikiri wiywomere,
kosa wiliŋ ywak.
Ay win, wiywak wor,
i dier wor!
Oy win cuny win paka pi,
ruwaŋ Rwoth!
Tiŋi win cingi win ri Rwoth,
ri kwo pa nyithindho mewin,
ma jolocere ro kec,
i gike ma kisi royo.
Neni, Awi Rwoth, aka dew ye!
Ri ŋa m'itimo gime?
Mon jowocami nyithindho pajo wegi,
ma jo wegi jonywolo?
Woneki jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi jatuci wac Were,
i Ot pa Rwoth?
Jomathindho kodi jodongo joriere,
piny i royin.
Nyir kodi yac,
oneki jo g'abor;
i ndelo ma nge perin itieko neko jo,
ithumo jo m'ongoye wor.
Ilwoŋo jokwor paran thoko,
paŋini i ndelo ma kalima,
aka i ndelo ma nge pa Rwoth,
ongoye ŋat'okwale kosa m'obothi,
jono m'anywolo t'apidho,
jakwor paran oreyo woko jo.
An abedo ŋat'otieko neno litho,
g'adasa ma keme pa Were.
Go odhiran to kelan,
wotho i mudho m'ongoye lero.
Adieri kwoŋan won kende,
go owiro cinge, ndelo je.
Go oweyo delkwoŋan nyekirok,
to turo woko cokin paran.
Go otieko karan to thokan,
gi litho kodi candirok.
Go omiyan bedo i mudho,
paka ji ma jotho cango con.
Go otieko thokan, ŋey akir'akwale,
to ketho lijegere mapek kwoŋan.
Makada nende alwoŋo, t'aywak ri kony,
go otieko geŋo woko kwayo paran.
Go otieko cego woko royo paran gi telin m'opayere,
to gondo yo paran.
Go okiyan paka arara,
paka simbwor kam'opanere.
Go orwenyan i royo paran to yecan mathindho thindho,
aka otieko weyan nono.
Go ogondo gibayo asere pere,
to kethan paka ranyuth.
Go ocelo i rogan,
aserin m'owok i gitiŋo asere pere.
Atieko lokere ginyero pa ji paran je,
gi wer ma ŋalok pajo ndelo gipi.
Go otieko yeŋan gi gigipiny makec,
to miyan madho gima wac.
Go oturo lakan gi tele gu,
aka omiyan ŋindirok i buru.
Akwanyere woko i siem,
wiyan owil gi kisangala.
Ameno awaco ni, dwoŋ paran orumo,
kodi geno paran wok bongi Rwoth.
Poyo litho paran kodi kigiyagiya paran,
cal paka gima wac kodi kwir.
Apoyo kwoŋe noknok,
aka akule piny t'alocere.
To gime akano i cunyan,
riameno alakuro.
Mar pa Rwoth makiwire kirum,
aka wor pere kitundi i gike.
Jonyen kisi odikin,
adieri pere obedo gimadwoŋ.
Anitie gi Rwoth kende, atieko waco,
riameno alageno go.
Rwoth ber ri jono ma jokuro go,
ri adundo ma rango go.
Ber nike dhano wokur liŋ,
both pa Rwoth.
Ber nike dhano wociri bieto,
i hongo ma soye pere.
Weyi go wobedi kakende liŋ,
paka Rwoth otieko ketho rigo.
Weyi go wokethi dhoke i fukefuke,
poyi geno nyalo bedo.
Weyi go womiy lembe ri ŋata payo,
aka woyey woyet go.
Kole Rwoth,
kilajwango kicutho.
Makada nende go kelo rem, go labedo gi wor,
cungo kwoŋ mar pere makiwire m'oasere.
Kole k'obedo mito pere nike,
womiy litho, kosa womiy nyithindho pa nyatoro rem.
Ka jojiera je ma lowo,
joŋinyere i tiende,
ka owir tiro pa ji,
ruwaŋ Jamalo Swa,
ka obanere gi banja pa dhano,
kere Rwoth kinen?
Ŋa m'otieko luwo wac to timere,
ka k'obedo Rwoth ama otieko wodho or?
K'obedo wok i dhok Jamalo Swa,
ma bero kodi raco wok'iye?
Raŋo dhano makwo ŋunyaŋunya,
kwoŋ gir'acula mareco pere?
Weyi wakaŋasa to watemo yo mawan,
aka weyi wagiki bongi Rwoth.
Weyi watiŋ malo cuny wan kodi cingi wan,
ri Were manitie i polo.
Watieko timo reco to wagwenyere,
to ikicwako.
Itieko umere gi nge t'iriemo wan,
aka itieko neko kicutho.
Itieko umere gi pondeponde,
ŋey wongoye kwayo ma wotundi bongin.
Itieko loko wan nyal kodi yuk,
i dier nonin.
Jokwor mawan je,
jotieko yawo dhok jo kwoŋ wan.
Teko kodi kisika opodho kwoŋ wan,
rerok kodi ŋinyirok.
Waŋan mol gi malawa pigi waŋan,
kwoŋbedo rerok pa ji paran.
Pigi waŋan lacwer ma kicoki,
kendo ma kithwo,
cuka Rwoth owok i polo,
oŋiy piny to neno.
Waŋan miyan rem,
k'aneno gim'otimere je ri nyir ma tindi madwoŋ.
Jono m'oyido jobedo jokwor paran m'ongoye wac,
jodwaran paka winyo.
Jodilan i bur,
to jodwiran gi telin,
pi oumo wiyan,
aka awaco ni, onekan woko.
Alwoŋo nyingin, Awi Rwoth,
wok i lutho ma bur;
Iwinjo dwondan, ikir'icegi ran ithin,
ri ywak paran ri kony, ri gonyirok paran.
Icore cegin munyo alwoŋin,
aka iwaco ni, Ikir'ilwor.
Itieko mako banjin paran, Awi Rwoth,
itieko botho kwo paran.
Itieko neno komo m'otimi ran, Awi Rwoth,
thum banja i thenge paran.
Itieko neno misegey pajo je,
kodi can pajo kwoŋan.
Itieko winjo yet pajo, Awi Rwoth,
kodi can pajo je kwoŋan.
Dhok jo ma joluwere gine kwoŋan,
kodi kiŋunyaŋunya pajo kwoŋan ndelo gipi.
I kabedo pajo kodi i ay pajo, neni,
abedo wer pajo ma ŋalok.
Ilaculo kwor kwoŋ jo, Awi Rwoth,
cungo kwoŋ tic ma cingi jo.
Miy jo arama cuny,
aka lam perin wopodhi kwoŋ jo.
Riemi jo i nge aka irey woko jo,
wok i pendi polo pa Rwoth.
Neni paka zahabu olokere ma nimnim,
nger ma zahabu macil owire,
telin ma leŋo jokedhere,
i kisi gike ma royo.
Nyithindho ma welo ma Zayon,
oyido jorom gi peko ma zahabu macil,
onyo itero jo paka degi ma lowo,
tic ma cingi jacwec degi.
Kiri ondiek jomiyo nyithindhi jo dhoth,
aka jopidho nyithindhi jo,
to ji paran jolokere mager,
paka maya ma thim.
Lew nyathi ma dhoth moko,
i dande ro riyo,
nyithindho jokwayo cemo,
to ongoye ŋat'omiy jo gimoro.
Jono m'oyido jocamo gima mit,
jojwangere i royin,
jono ma jodongo i kwo mayom,
onyo jodimere i bur buru.
loyo reco pa Sodom,
m'orey woko i yoto,
m'ongoye cingi dhano m'ogeyo.
Jodhum mere oyido jocil loyo pe,
oyido jotar loyo cak;
kwoŋ jo oyido cwe swa,
mafoth loyo telin ma welo.
Onyo pama jocol swa,
ma jokiŋeyere i royo,
pien kwoŋ jo ojony to moko kwoŋ cokin pajo,
othwo paka yen m'othwo.
Ji m'oneki jo g'abor,
jober loyo joma kec oneko jo,
ma kwo pajo orere woko,
ro ngoye pa cemo m'omiy jo kwo.
otieko tedo nyithindho pajo wegi,
jolokere cemo pajo,
i rerok pa ji paran.
Rwoth ocowo keme pere,
aka okonjo nge pere malieth,
to cwinyo mac i Zayon,
m'oreyo woko misingi mere.
Kerin ma piny jok'oyeyo,
kanyacel gi ji ma piny,
nike jakwor oyido odonji,
i waŋkace ma Yerusalem.
Obedo ro reco pa jotuci wac Were pere,
kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam pere,
ma ooy remo pa joma timo gim'otire,
i dier go.
Jolera nya waŋtho i royin,
ma jokocere gi remo,
ma ongoye ŋat'onyalo,
mako law pajo.
Kadhi win, wikoci, ji jokoko rijo,
kadhi win, wikiri wigeyi wan.
Ameno jolera wok piny man kadho i man aka jolera,
aka owaci i kisi piny ni, jokilabedo ka.
Rwoth won ama okedho jo,
go kiladewo kwoŋ jo kendo,
k'onyuthi jocway ri Were i wi migam wor,
kanyacel gi jodongo.
Waŋ wan ool gi ŋiyo,
kareno warango kony m'ongoye,
oyido wakuro kony,
wok bongi nono ma kinyal botho.
Jorango tiendi wan,
ŋey wakinyalo wotho i royin,
gike mawan ocore cegin, ndelo mawan oyido kwanere,
kole gike mawan oyido otundo.
Joma joriemo wan oyido jodwir,
loyo ango ma ay malo i polo,
joriemo wan wi gote,
aka jokuro wan i thim.
Ŋat'owir pa Rwoth, luya ma kwo mawan,
oter woko i buce,
ŋat'oyido wawaco ni, i tipo pere,
walakwo i dier nonin.
Siemere, aka sangala, Awi ji ma Edom,
win ma wibedo i lowo ma Uz,
to teko mewin bende bino,
win bende wilamero to wilunyere kinyoro.
Zayon otieko limo gir'acula pere aka orumo,
Rwoth kilakano win i twec kendo,
to Rwoth lamiyo Edom gir'acula ri reco pere,
go lathango reco perin.
Awi Rwoth, poyi gim'otieko podho kwoŋ wan,
ŋiy, aka neni wickwot mawan.
Lim mawan nitie i cingi jopath,
aka jokicar jobedo i pecin mawan.
Watieko lokirok nyithindho kic, wangoye gi bacere wan,
megi wan jocale mon tho.
Waripo kutho miyo cul ri pi ma wamadho,
waripo nyewo yen ma tedo.
Iywayo wan gi bieto i ŋuti wan,
aka waloc, to kimiy wan ywomirok.
Watieko timo cikirok gi Misir kodi Asiria,
limo cemo ma romo.
Kwarere mawan jotimo reco, to jongoye,
aka onyo pama watiŋo reco pajo.
Ŋecin jodhumo,
aka ongoye ŋat'obothi wan wok i cingi jo.
Walimo cemo gi jwango kwo mawan ri teko,
kwoŋbedo jonek jonitie i thim.
Pien kwoŋ wan col paka kendo,
ro lietho ma ceŋ mager ma kelo kec.
Inindo gi mon gi mbaka i Zayon,
kiri nyir ma fodi jokuya cwo i tindin madongo i Yuda.
Imako jotel mawan t'ideyo jo,
jodongo mawan kimiy jo wor.
Iromo yac rego,
aka jotangatanga gi tiŋo yen mapek.
Jom'oti joweyo bedo i waŋkac,
aka yac joweyo wer.
Kisangala ma cuny wan orumo,
miel mawan onyo olokere ywak.
Sangaria opodho woko wok i wiy wan,
kidamba riwan, kole watieko timo reco.
Cuny wan ramere kwoŋbedo gime,
waŋ wan onyo nimnim kwoŋbedo gigipiny me.
Kwoŋbedo Got Zayon odoŋ nono,
ogwaŋe madudi jowaya i iye.
To in, Awi Rwoth, ibedo kere ma cil gi cil,
aka dhum perin ongoye gi gike i luse je.
Raŋo wiyin owil gi wan kicutho?
Raŋo itieko jwango wan hongo kweth me je?
Dwoki wan bongin, Awi Rwoth, ŋey wanyal dwoko,
loki hongo mawan manyen paka cango con.
Kono k'itieko jwango wan kicutho,
aka onyo imako gi wan nge ma kiware.
K'abic ma dwe, oyido obedo oro mar'abic ma bedo i twec pa Kere Yehoyakin.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri jacway ri Were i wi migam, Ezekiel wod pa Buzi, i lowo pa Jobabilon i thengi malawa Kebar; aka cingi Rwoth oyido nitie kwoŋ go.
Paka aŋiyo, neni koyo madwoŋ obino wok yumalo, pondeponde madwoŋ gi mac ma minyin kodi lero mere thoko, aka wok i dier mac oyido nitie gima cale gima pilin.
Wok i diere oyido nitie gima cale cwec makwo aŋwen. Cal pajo oyido obedo apa dhano.
Kisi acel oyido nitie gi nyime aŋwen kodi bwombe aŋwen.
Tiendi jo oyido otire, par tiendi jo oyido cal gi par tiendi nyathi dhiaŋ; aka oyido jopilin paka ywel m'oyuy.
I pendi bwombi jo aŋwen je, oyido nitie cingi dhano; aka cwec aŋwen je oyido jonitie gi waŋ jo aŋwen kodi bwombi jo aŋwen.
Bwombi jo ogeyere, aka kisi acel odhire tirtir makiwire, kareno kadho yu kama waŋe nitie iye.
Waŋ jo kodi bwombi jo oyido otiŋere malo, kisi cwec ogeyo bwombi nyawote gi bwombe ario, aka oumo delkwoŋe gi bwombe ario man.
Jodhire tirtir i thenge ma waŋ jo ŋiyo, kadho yu kama cuny kadh'iye ma jokiwire.
I dier cwec makwo aŋwen oyido nitie gima cale cuk mac m'okur, paka talin ma idho malo aka loro piny, mac oyido ler swa aka lithkoth owok'iye.
Cwec makwo oyido joidho malo aka joloro piny paka lithkoth.
Cal kodi tim ma lipangala me oyido cale telin ma pilin; cwec aŋwen je oyido jonitie gi lipangala macale, aka tim mere oyido cale lipangala m'olwow i wi man.
Munyo jodhire, jodhire i thenge aŋwen je ma jokiwire.
Ligongolo pajo oyido bor aka bwoko jo, kwoŋbedo oyido opoŋ waŋ jo thoko.
Ka cwec makwo jodhire, lipangala bende jodhire, aka ka cwec joay malo wok piny, lipangala bende joay malo.
Kama cuny okadh'iye ama bende cwec jokadho, aka lipangala oluwo jo; kwoŋbedo cuny pa cwec makwo oyido nitie i lipangala.
Ka jodhire, jodhire kiromo, ka jocungo, jocungo kiromo; aka ka joay malo, joay malo wok piny kiromo, aka lipangala bende joay kwoŋbedo cuny pa cwec makwo oyido nitie i lipangala.
I pendi pi m'omakere matek bwombi jo oyare m'otire, ka geyo bwombi nyawote, aka kisi acel oumo delkwoŋe gi bwombe ario.
Ka jodhire awinjo derino ma bwombi jo paka derino ma nam, paka dwondi Jameni Je, kodi derino ma kambi pa jolweny. Ka jocungo jodolo bwombi jo.
Kenyo dwondi owok malo ma pi m'omakere matek i wi jo, munyo jocungo to jodolo bwombi jo.
Aneno gima cale gima pilin, aka gima cale mac oumo thoko, aka wok i gima cale piere kadho malo kodi loro piny, aneno gima cale mac aka lero mere othoko.
Paka cal ma lifudo i pondeponde i ndelo ma koth, apaka cal ma lero thoko oyido nitie. Me oyido cal madwoŋ pa Rwoth.
Munyo aneno, apodho piny gi nyiman, aka awinjo dwondi dhano luwo.
Go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, ay malo icungi gi tiendin, aka alaluwo kodin.”
Paka go oluwo kodan, cuny obino to donjo i an, aka acungo gi tiendan, t'awinjo ŋat'oluwo kodan.
Go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, aorin bongi Joisiraili, bongi nono ma jogwenyirok, ma jotieko gwenyirok kwoŋan, jo kodi kwarere pajo jotieko gwenyirok kwoŋan kiri gi ndelo won me.
Jobedo nyithindho ma jowictek, aka cuny jo tek. Aorin bongi jo, aka iwaci rijo ni, ‘Rwoth Were waco ama.’
Ka jowinji kosa jokwer winjo, kole jobedo ji ma jogwenyirok, jolaŋeyo nike jatuci wac Were obedo i dier jo.”

“To in wod dhano, ikir'ibwoki ro jo, aka ikir'ibwoki ro wac pajo. Makada nende kudhin kodi okure othokin, t'ibedo i dier thwol gwokere, ikir'ibwoki ro wac pajo, kosa idhier ro neno pajo; kole jobedo ji ma jogwenyirok.
Ilaluwo wac paran rijo, obedi ni jowinji kosa jokwer winjo; kole jobedo ji ma jogwenyirok.”
“To in, wod dhano, ikir'igwenyere paka ji ma jogwenyirok no; yaw dhokin icami gim'amiyin.”
Aŋiyo, aka neni, cingi dhano otele bongan, aka oyido nitie iye kitawo m'omin m'ondik'iye.
Go oyaro ruwaŋan, oyido ondiki i thenge ario je, goyo ndur, ywak kodi kidamba.
Ameno ayawo dhokan, to go miyan acamo papila m'omin no.
Go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, cami papila m'omin m'amiyin, aka poŋ koko i iyin gine.” Kenyo acamo; aka obedo mamit i dhokan paka mo kic.
Go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, kadhi i ot pa Isiraili, aka iluwi wac paran rijo.
Kole akiorin bongi ji ma joluwo dhodhok ma kiniaŋere kosa ma ikiniaŋ wac pajo, to bongi ot pa Isiraili.
Akiorin bongi nonin kweth, ma joluwo dhodhok ma kiniaŋere kodi ma lew jo pek ma ikinyal niaŋ wac pajo. Adieri, ka bedi oyido aorin bongi jo, dinyo jowinjin.
To ot pa Isiraili jokilawinjin, kole jokwero winjan; kwoŋbedo jobedo jowictek aka jonitie gi cuny matek.
Neni, ee amiyo waŋin bedo matek paka waŋ jo, kodi bedo gi wictek paka jo.
Paka tele matek loyo, tele mabith, atieko timo nyimin, aka Ikir'ilwor jo kosa idhier ro neno pajo; kole jobedo ot ma jogwenyirok.”
Go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, Wac paran je m'aluwo rin jol i cunyin aka winji gi ithin.
Kadhi bongi jotwec, bongi ji perin iluwi gi jo. Waci rijo ni, ‘Rwoth Were waco ama.’ Makada nende jowinji kosa jokwer.”
Kenyo cuny otiŋan malo, aka awinjo derino ma mor yuŋeyan ka waco ama: Dwoŋ pa Rwoth wopak i kabedo me.
Awinjo derino ma bwombi cwec makwo ka jogeyere bwombi gin kwoŋ bwombi man, kodi derino ma lipangala i thengi jo, derino ma mor madwoŋ.
Cuny otiŋan malo, to kwanyan woko. Awinjo keco i cunyan, aka cingi Rwoth obedo matek kwoŋan.
Abino bongi jotwec i Telabib, m'oyido jobedo i thengi malawa Kebar, aka adoŋ kenyo i dhier i dier jo ma ndelo abirio.
I cowe ma ndelo abirio, wac pa Rwoth obino ran, ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, akethin bedo jakur i ot pa Isiraili, ilawinjo wac ma wok i dhokan, aka ilagwoko jo kwoŋan.
K'awaco ri jokidakana ni, “Ilatho adieri.” T'iweyo m'ikigwoko jo, kosa iluwo gi jo weyo tim ma kidakana pajo, jokidakana no jolatho ro reco pajo, to remo pajo ladoŋ i cingin.
To k'igwoko jokidakana, to jokwero wire kwoŋ kidakana pajo, kosa tim ma kidakana, jolatho, to ri in, labedo nike ibotho kwo perin.
Ka ŋata timo gim'otire owire to timo gima k'otire, aka anoriwere ruwaŋe, jolatho, kwoŋbedo ikigwoko jo, jolatho ro reco pajo, kilapoyo tim pajo m'otire je; to remo pajo ladoŋ i cingin.
To k'igwoko ŋata timo gim'otire weyo ma k'otimo reco, aka jowey ma jok'otimo reco, jolakwo adieri, aka ri in, labedo nike ibotho kwo perin.
Cingi Rwoth oyido nitie kwoŋan kenyo, aka go owaco ran ni, “Ay malo, ikadhi i milelo, aka alaluwo kodin kenyo.”
Ameno aay malo, aka akidho i milelo. Dwoŋ pa Rwoth ocungo kenyo, paka dwoŋ m'oyido atieko neno i thengi malawa Kebar; aka agore piny gi nyiman.
Cuny odonjo i an, omiyan cungo gi tiendan; aka go oluwo kodan to waco ran ni, “Kadhi icegere i ot perin.
Paka ri in, wod dhano, ilaketho kwoŋin adasin, t'itweyin gine, ŋey ikir'iwok woko i dier jo.
Alamiyo lewin womok i dandin, ŋey luwo wodhierin, aka ikir'ibwoki jo, kole jobedo ot ma gwenyirok.
To ka aluwo kodin, alayawo dhokin, aka ilawaco rijo ni, ‘Rwoth Were waco ama.’ Ŋata lawinjo, owinji, to ŋat'okwer winjo, wokwer; kole jobedo ot ma gwenyirok.”
Rwoth owaco ni, “Onyo in, wod dhano kwany matafal indik'iye ni tindi madwoŋ Yerusalem.
Ithoki ma mako, geti kor ot kwoŋe, ikuny bur maluth i thenge, ikethi jolweny thoko, t'iketho wot rombo ma thumo thoko.
Kenyo kwany wer ma nyweny t'iketho paka kor ot ma nyweny i dier in gi tindi madwoŋ, icomi waŋin kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ aka labedo ni in ithoko mako. Me labedo ranyuth ri ot pa Isiraili.”
“Kenyo riere piny yuracam perin, aka ikethi reco ma ot pa Isiraili kwoŋe. Ndelo je m'ilariere piny kenyo, ilatiŋo reco pajo.
Atieko ketho kwoŋin oro mareco pajo, luwo kwoŋ kwan ma ndelo, ndelo 390; aka ilatiŋo reco ma ot pa Isiraili.
K'itieko me, riere kendo yuracuc perin, aka ilatiŋo reco ma ot pa Yuda ma ndelo piero aŋwen. Aketho kisi ndelo acel, ri oro acel.”
“Ilacomo waŋin kwoŋ ranyuth ma thoko Yerusalem ma mako, kareno imino adol cingin t'ituco wac kwoŋe.
Neni, alatweyin g'adasa ŋey ikir'iwire i thenge man cuka itieko rierok ma ndelo perin je ma thoko mako.”
“Kwany ŋano, bale, bijanjalo, ŋor, kal, kodi cemo man, ikethi iy'atawo acel t'itimo cemo perin. I ndelo m'ilariere piny gi butin, ndelo 390 ilacamo.
Ilacamo kilo 0.2 ma cemo kisi ndelo i sawa m'oketh.
Ilamadho lita 0.6 ma pi kisi ndelo i sawa m'oketh.
Ilacamo mugat paka mugat ma bale, aka ilatedo i mac m'omok gi ceth dhano ka joje joneno ama.”
Rwoth owaco ni, “Ameno apaka Joisiraili jolacamo mugat pajo, makoc i dier nonin m'abino ter'iye jo.”
Kenyo awaco ni, “A Rwoth Were! Neni, wok i thino paran, an won fodi akikocere gi camo gim'otho kosa gima ogwaŋ madudi oneko, kosa cemo makoc tundo gunyo ni.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Neni, alamiyin woyo dhiaŋ kapa ceth dhano, aka ilatedo mugat perin gi mac mere.”
Rwoth owaco ran kendo ama: Wod dhano, neni, alamiyo mugat womojere i Yerusalem; ŋey jowocami mugat apima gi lworo, aka jolamadho pi apima i dhier.
Jolangoye gi mugat gi pi, aka kisi dhano laŋiyo nyawote i dhier, to jorere i reco pajo.
Rwoth owaco ni, “Awi wod dhano, kwany abor mabith, ior paka kamweso pa jaliedo aka iliel ye wiyin kodi ye tikin; kenyo ikwany rapim t'ipoko didek.
Ilakwanyo adec acel t'iwaŋo gi mac i dier tindi madwoŋ, tekin ndelo ma thoko ma mako rumo, adec acel ilanyaro g'abor thoko tindi madwoŋ, aka adec acel ilaywoyo i koyo, to nyaka acelo abor yuŋey jo.
Ikwany yer mogo wok kenyo t'itweyo i rinda ma kanzu perin.
Ikwany kwoŋ yer no kendo, t'ibolo i mac aka owaŋ kadho malo; wok kenyo mac lawok kwoŋ ot je ma Isiraili.”
Rwoth Were waco ama: Me Yerusalem, atieko ketho go i dier nonin, gi lowo je thoko go.
To go ogwenyere kwoŋ cik paran to jotimo kidakana loyo nonin, kodi kwoŋ fonji paran loyo lowo je m'othoko go. Jokwero cik paran, aka jok'owotho i fonji paran.
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo withoth loyo nonin ma jothoko win, aka wikiluwo fonji paran kosa kuro cik paran, to wiluwo cik pa nonin ma jothoko win.
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: An e, alakelo kwoŋ win thumo banja i dier win ka nonin joneno.
Alatimo riwin gima fodi akitimo, aka m'akibino timo kendo kwoŋbedo amien mewin je.
Riameno jonywol jolacamo nyithindho pajo i dier win, aka nyithindho jolacamo jonywol pajo; alathumo banja kwoŋ win, aka joma jodoŋ alakedho jo i kisi thenge je.
Riameno, paka akwo, Rwoth Were waco, kwoŋbedo wikoco Kabedo Maleŋ paran gi gigipiny m'adak kodi amien mewin je, alareyo win, akilaŋiyo win gi waŋan ma wor, aka ak'obedi riwin gi wor.
Adec acel kwoŋ win jolatho two nundu aka jolarere gi kec i dier win, adec acel jolapodho g'abor; aka alakedho adec acel i kisi thenge je t'acelo abor yuŋey jo.
Alaoro nge paran, aka alakweyo keme paran kwoŋ jo, alaculo kwor aka jolaŋeyo nike An Rwoth, atieko luwo i nyeko paran k'acowo keme paran kwoŋ jo.
Alaloko win gunda kodi giwickwot i dier nonin ma jothoko win, i waŋ jono je ma joluw.
Wilabedo giwickwot, gi yet, gir'anena, kodi gibwok ri nonin ma jothoko win; k'anokel thumo banja kwoŋ win i nge kodi keme kodi bwok ma gero. An Rwoth atieko luwo.
