K'anoceli kwoŋ jo aserin ma nek makec, ma lareyo woko jo, m'abino gonyo reyo woko win. Alamedo kec kwoŋ win t'akedho woko dere mewin.
Aladhiro kwoŋ win kec kodi ogwaŋe madudi, jolaweyo win ma bu nyithindho. Two nundu kodi oyo remo layweyo woko win, aka alakelo abor kwoŋ win; An Rwoth atieko luwo.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, kethi waŋin yu gote ma Isiraili aka ituci wac Were kwoŋ jo.
Iwaci ni, win gote ma Isiraili, winji win wac pa Rwoth Were. Rwoth Were waco ama ri gote, tendere, fereji kodi milelin. An e, acegin kelo abor kwoŋ win, aka alareyo woko udi ajwoka mewin.
Migame mewin ilareyo woko, migame ma waŋo buban mewin ilaŋinyo piny; aka alabolo piny jom'onek mewin ruwaŋ calin mewin.
Alarieyo delkwoŋ Joisiraili ruwaŋ calin pajo, aka alaywoyo cokin mewin thoko migame mewin.

I kabedo mewin je, tindin madongo mewin labedo gundin, aka ilareyo woko udi ajwoka mewin to josika. Migame mewin ilaŋinyo woko aka calin mewin jolangoye, ilatoŋo piny migame mewin ma waŋo buban, t'iyweyo woko tic mewin.
Jom'onek jolapodho i dier win; kenyo wilaŋeyo nike Abedo Rwoth.
Kucel alaweyo jomegi, ŋey jomegi kwoŋ win jolaboth abor i dier nonin to jokedhere i piny.

Jono ma joboth jolapoyan i dier nonin kam'ilater'iye jo i twec koro, kwoŋbedo aol gi cuny jo matek m'ocile kwoŋan, kodi waŋ jo ma luwo calin pajo. Jolajok wegi gi wegi ro reco ma jotimo, iy'amien pajo je.
Jolaŋeyo nike An Rwoth, akiluwo nono timo rijo teko me.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Goy adhoŋ gi cingin aka igoy mayindo, t'iwaco ni kidamba ri amien je ma ot pa Isiraili! Kole jolapodho g'abor, kec, kodi two nundu.
Jono ma jonitie bor jolatho gi two nundu, jono ma jonitie cegin jolatho g'abor, aka jono ma jodoŋ makwo t'iweyo jo jolatho kec. Ameno apaka alacowo keme paran kwoŋ jo.

Wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, ka delkwoŋ jom'otho pajo joriere i dier calin pajo, thoko migame pajo, i wi kisi tendere mabor, wi gote je, i tiendi kisi yath, i tiendi olwa ma jaboke, kodi kisi kama jocower'iye ri calin pajo.
Alarieyo cingan kwoŋ jo, t'amiyo lowo bedo gunda kodi abar loyo thim ma Ribila i kabedo pajo je; aka jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
In wod dhano, Rwoth Were waco ama ri lowo ma Isiraili:
Gike otieko bino,
gike i sondin aŋwen ma lowo.
Onyo gike nitie kwoŋ win,
aladhiro nge paran kwoŋ win,
alathumo riwin banja luwo kwoŋ yo mewin,
alaculo kwor kwoŋ win ro amien mewin je.
Waŋan k'oŋiy win gi wor,
aka ak'onyuthi win wor.
Alaculo kwor kwoŋ win ro yo mewin,
kareno amien mewin nitie i dier win.
Kenyo wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Rwoth Were waco,
teko i wi teko eno bino.
Gike obino, gike otundo,
oay kwoŋ win, neni, bino!
Kisika obino kwoŋ win,
Awi ji ma jobedo i Piny,
hongo otieko bino, ndelo nitie cegin,
ma nywowirok makiweno koko pa gote ma kisangala.
Akoru konjo keme paran kwoŋ win,
alacowo nge paran kwoŋ win,
alathumo riwin banja luwo kwoŋ yo mewin,
aka alaculo kwor kwoŋ win ro amien mewin.
Waŋan k'oŋiy win gi wor,
aka ak'onyuthi win wor.
Alaculo kwor kwoŋ win luwo kwoŋ yo mewin,
kareno amien mewin nitie i dier win.
Kenyo wilaŋeyo nike obedo An Rwoth m'ogoyo win.
Eno ndelo, eno bino,
kisika owok, akaka othiwo, gero oloth.
Akaka olokere luth ma kidakana,
ongoye kwoŋ jo ma ladoŋ,
ki lwak pajo, ki lim pajo,
langoye dwoŋ i dier jo.
Hongo obino, aka ndelo otundo,
janyew wokiri wosangala, aka jamitan wokiri woywaki,
kole keme nitie kwoŋ lwak pajo je.
Kole jamitan k'ogiki i gim'otieko kitana kafodi kwo,
kwoŋbedo menyirok obedo ri lwak je,
aka kilawire, ro reco pajo,
ongoye ŋata lanyalo cungo matek i kwo pere.
Jotieko kudho gwara,
joyiko kisi gimoro,
to ongoye ŋata kadho i lweny,
kwoŋbedo keme paran nitie kwoŋ lwak je.
Abor nitie woko, two nundu kodi kec nitie i ot.
Jono ma jonitie woko jotho g'abor,
jono ma jonitie i tindi madwoŋ, kec kodi two nundu reyo woko jo.
Ka jom'oboth joringi,
jolanwaŋere wi gote,
paka akurin ma milelo,
joje jolaywak kisi dhano ro reco pere.
Cingi jo lanyapere,
aka congi jo lagore.
Jolatweyo kutiya,
bwok laumo jo,
wickwot labedo i nyim jo,
aka pata lacowo wic jo.
Jolawito feza pajo i royo,
zahabu pajo lalokere gimakoc.
Feza pajo kodi zahabu k'onyal konyo jo,
i ndelo ma keme pa Rwoth.
Jok'oyeŋ kec pajo, aka iy jo k'opoŋ,
kwoŋbedo jolokere gi timo reco pajo.
Wok i ŋono ma thiwino pajo,
jotimo gi noro,
wok i cal mar'amien pajo,
jotimo gine gim'adak,
riameno alaloko rijo gimakoc.
Alaketho i cingi jopath, jowonyeki,
ri jokidakana ma piny jowonyaga,
aka jolakoco.
Alawiro woko waŋan kwoŋ jo,
ŋey jowokoci kabedo paran ma dicwe,
jokwo joladonjo to jokoco.
Tim lijegere,
kole lowo opoŋ banja ma oyo remo,
aka tindi madwoŋ opoŋ akaka.
Alakelo nonin pa jokidakana,
lunjo udi pajo,
alaketho i gike noro pa jomatek,
aka ilakoco Kabedo pajo maleŋ.
Kidamba otieko bino,
jolarango siem, to ngoye.
Teko i wi teko labino,
pokopoko i wi pokopoko,
jolarango menyirok wok bongi jatuci wac Were,
aka fonji langoye bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam,
kodi mic rieko wok bongi jodongo.
Kere laywak,
jadhum lapoŋ gi lworo,
cingi ji ma piny lakirin.
Alatic gi jo luwo kwoŋ yo pajo,
alathumo rijo banja luwo kwoŋ thumo banja pajo wegi.
Kenyo jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
K'abic ma dwe mar'aucel, i oro mar'aucel, oyido abedo i ot paran, aka jodongo ma Yuda oyido jobedo ruwaŋan, cingi Rwoth Were ogeyan.
Atiŋo waŋan malo, aka aneno gima cale dhano, ma wok i piere loro piny obedo mac, aka kadho malo, ocale lero ma gima pilin.

Go orieyo woko gima cale cingi jo, otiŋan gi ye wiyan aka cuny otiŋan i dier piny kodi polo i menyirok pa Were ri Yerusalem. Go okethan i dhiot ma waŋkac ma iye ma ŋiyo yumalo, kam'oyido nitie cal ma sigila nyeko pa Rwoth.
Kenyo go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, tiŋi waŋin malo yu royo ma yumalo.” Ameno atiŋo waŋan yumalo, aka neni, yumalo ma waŋkac ma migam, i dhiot, oyido nitie cal ma sigila nyeko pa Rwoth.
Go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, ineno wok kwoŋ gima jotimo, amien madwoŋ ma ot pa Isiraili ka, ma rieman woko i kabedo paran maleŋ. Wire kendo, aka ilaneno amien madwoŋ loyo.”
Go okelan i dhiot ma kapido, aŋiyo, aka neni, kombe i kor ot.
Kenyo go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano kuny kombe, akunyo, aka neni, dhiot mogo.
Go owaco ran ni, donji ineni amien ma kidakana ma jotimo kenyo.”
Ameno adonjo t'aneno, aka neni, kisi nger gima lak gi kore kodi ogwaŋ, kodi gimakoc, kodi cal je ma ot pa Isiraili oyido ogor i kor ot thoko iye je.
Ruwaŋ jo ocungo jodongo ma Isiraili piero ario, gi Jazania wod pa Safan i dier jo. Kisi dhano oyido otiŋo thago i cinge aka tome pondeponde ma buban oyido duny kadho malo.
Kenyo go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, itieko neno gima jodongo ma ot pa Isiraili jotimo i mudho, kisi dhano i kisika ma cal pere m'ogor. Kole jowaco ni Rwoth kinen wan, Rwoth otieko jwango piny.”
Go owaco ran kendo ni, “Wire aka ilaneno amien madwoŋ swa ma jotimo.”
Go okelan i dhiot ma waŋkac ma yumalo ma Ot pa Rwoth, aka neni, mon oyido jobedo kenyo joywak gi geregere ri Tamuz were moro.
Go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano itieko neno gime. Wire kendo aka ilaneno amien madwoŋ loyo me gin.”

Go okelan i diedipo ma iye ma Ot pa Rwoth, aka neni, i dhiot ma Ot pa Rwoth, i dier kisika ma cokirok kodi migam, oyido nitie cwo piero ario g'abic. Jowiro dieŋey gin ri Ot pa Rwoth, aka waŋ jo oŋiyo yuwok ceŋ, ka jolamo waŋceŋ.
Kenyo go owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, obedo gima sew ri ot pa Yuda nike jotieko timo amien ma jotimo ka? Jotieko poŋo i piny akaka, to jokwinyo nge paran, neni, jodienyo um gin.
Riameno alatimo i keme, akilaŋiyo jo gi waŋan ma wor, kosa ak'onyuthi jo wor; aka makada nende joywak i ithan gi dwondi jo malo, akilawinjo.”
Kenyo dwondi madwoŋ olwoŋo i ithan ka waco ni, “Gir'acula pa tindi madwoŋ ocore cegin, aka kisi dhano otiŋo i cinge gilweny pere ma reyo woko.”

Neni to cwo aucel jobino wok yu waŋkac ma malo ma ŋiyo yumalo dicel, kisi dhano gi gilweny pere ma ŋinyo i cinge. I dier jo oyido nitie jacwo m'oruko nanga mafoth, gi kalam kodi vino ma ndiko i piere. Jobino to jocungo i thengi migam ma ywel.
Dwoŋ pa Were pa Isiraili oyido oay malo wok i kerubim kam'oyido nitie i iye to pie i thengi ot. Rwoth olwoŋo jacwo m'oyido oruko nanga mafoth, m'oyido nitie gi kalam kodi vino ma ndiko i piere.
Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Luw i dier tindi madwoŋ, i dier Yerusalem, aka ikethi ranyuth i nyim jono ma jotuco aka joywak kwoŋ amien je m'otimi kenyo.”
Ri joman go owaco i ithan ni, “Luw win go i tindi madwoŋ, wineki, ongoye weyo kosa nyutho wor.
Neki win cwo m'oti, yac kodi nyir, nyithindho kodi mon, to wikiri wigeyi jono ma jonitie gi ranyuth; aka wicaki i kabedo paran maleŋ.” Ameno jocako gi jodongo m'oyido jonitie yuwaŋ ot.
Go owaco rijo ni, “Koc win ot paran, aka poŋ win gi delkwoŋ jom'otho. Kadhi win.” Jokadho to joneko i tindi madwoŋ.
Aka paka oyido joneko adoŋ kendan. Agore piny gi nyiman t'aywak ama: Awi Rwoth Were, ilareyo woko ji m'odoŋ i Isiraili je k'ikonjo keme perin kwoŋ Yerusalem?
Go odwokan ni, “Reco ma ot pa Isiraili kodi Yuda dwoŋ swa adieri, piny opoŋ oyo remo aka tindi madwoŋ opoŋ banirok. Kole jowaco ni, Rwoth ojwango piny, go kinen.
Paka ri an, akilaŋiyo jo gi waŋan ma wor, kosa nyutho wor to alaculo kwor i wi jo ro tim pajo.”
Aka neni, jacwo m'oyido oruko nanga mafoth, m'oyido nitie gi vino i piere odwoko wac ka waco ni, “Atieko timo paka iwodho ran or.”
Go owaco ri jacwo m'oyido oruko nanga mafoth ni, “Kadhi i lipangala ma pendi kerubim, aka ipoŋ masi cingin gi cuk mac t'iywoyo kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ.”
Go okadho m'aneno ama.
Onyo kerubim oyido ocungo yuracuc ma ot, aka munyo jacwo no odonjo, pondeponde oumo diedipo ma iye.
Kenyo dwoŋ pa Rwoth oay wok kwoŋ kerubim kadho i thengi ot, pondeponde opoŋo ot, aka diedipo opoŋ gi lero madwoŋ pa Rwoth.
Derino ma bwombi kerubim owinjere i diedipo ma woko, paka dwondi Were Majameni je ka luwo.
Munyo go omiyo jacwo m'oruko nanga mafoth or, kwanyo mac wok i pendi lipangala, wok i dier kerubim, jacwo no odonjo to cungo i thengi lipangala.
Kenyo kerubim acel otelo cinge wok i dier kerubim i mac m'oyido nitie i dier jo, ojowo mac to ketho i masi cingi jacwo m'oyido oruko nanga mafoth, aka ojolo to wok woko.
I pendi kerubim oneno gima cale cingi dhano i pendi bwombi jo.
Aŋiyo, aka neni, oyido nitie lipangala aŋwen i thengi kerubim, acel i thengi kisi kerubim; lipangala me oyido cale tele ma pilin.
Lipangala aŋwen je oyido jonitie gi cal acel, paŋini lipangala m'olwow i wi lipangala.
Ka jodhire, jodhire i thenge aŋwen mogo je ma jokiwire; thenge ma wic acel oŋiyo ama joje jodhir'iye ma jokiwire.
Delkwoŋ jo je, ligongolo pajo, cingi jo, bwombi jo, kodi lipangala, oyido opoŋ waŋ jo thoko, i lipangala aŋwen je.
Paka ri lipangala, olwoŋi jo munyo awinjo gi ithan.
Kerubim joay malo; me obedo cwec m'oyido atieko neno i thengi malawa Kebar.
Ka kerubim jodhire, lipangala bende jodhire i thengi jo, ka kerubim joyaro bwombi jo to joay wok i piny, lipangala jokidhire i thengi jo.
Ka kerubim jocungo liŋ, lipangala bende jocungo liŋ, ka kerubim joay jo bende joay; kole cuny pa cwec makwo oyido nitie i jo.
Kenyo dwoŋ pa Rwoth oay wok i thengi ot, to cungo i wi kerubim.
Kerubim joyaro bwombi jo to joay malo wok i piny ruwaŋan munyo jowok gi lipangala i thengi jo. Jocungo yuwaŋ waŋkac ma Ot pa Rwoth yuwok ceŋ, aka dwoŋ pa Were pa Isiraili oyido nitie i wi jo malo.
Me obedo cwec m'aneno i tiendi Were pa Isiraili i thengi malawa Kebar; aka aŋeyo nike oyido jobedo kerubim.
Kisi acel oyido nitie gi nyime aŋwen, kodi bwombe aŋwen, aka i pendi bwombi jo oyido nitie gima cale cingi dhano.
Nyim jo oyido obedo nyim jo acel m'oyido atieko neno i thengi malawa Kebar, cal pajo kodi jo wegi; joje jodhire tirtir.

Cuny otiŋan to kelan yuwok ceŋ ma waŋkac ma Ot pa Rwoth, ma ŋiyo yuwok ceŋ. Kenyo yuwaŋ waŋkac, oyido nitie cwo piero ario g'abic. I dier jo aneno Jazania wod pa Azur, kodi Pelatia wod pa Benaya, jotel pa ji.
Were owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, me ji ma jocano kidakana aka jomiyo rieko marac i tindi madwoŋ me.
Jowaco ni, hongo fodi k'otundo ma geto udi; tindi madwoŋ me obedo dak, aka wan wabedo riŋo.”
Riameno tuci wac kwoŋ jo, tuci wac, awi wod dhano.
Kenyo cuny pa Rwoth opie kwoŋan to waco ran ni, “Waci ni, Rwoth waco. Me a gima wiparo, Awi ot pa Isiraili. Aŋeyo gima bino i paro mewin.
Witieko neko ji kweth i tindi madwoŋ me, aka witieko poŋo royin mere gi delkwoŋ jom'otho.”
“Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Delkwoŋ jom'otho ma wineko i iye obedo riŋo, aka tindi madwoŋ me obedo dak. To win, alawodho woko win i iye.
Wilworo abor, to alakelo kwoŋ win, Rwoth Were waco.
Alawodho woko win i iye, aka alajwango win i cingi jopath, t'athumo riwin banja.
Wilapodho g'abor, alathumo riwin banja i kew pa Isiraili, aka wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Tindi madwoŋ me kilabedo dak mewin, aka wikilabedo riŋo i iye; alathumo riwin banja i kew pa Isiraili.
Kenyo wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, ma wikiluwo cik pere, aka wikikuro or pere, to wiluwo cik pa nonin ma jothoko win.”
Onyo wac m'atuco otundo i kare, Pelatia wod pa Benaya otho. Kenyo agore piny gi nyiman, t'aywak gi dwondan malo ka waco ni, “Awi Rwoth Were, inomiy Joisiraili ma jodoŋ jorere kicutho?”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano, wutmin in, wutmin in won, ot pa Isiraili gibe, joje, jobedo jono ma ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem jowaco ni, jokoc swa bor gi Rwoth, riwan omiy wan lowo me walunji.
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Makada nende atero jo bor swa i dier nonin, makada nende akedho jo i dier piny kweth, kucel abedo rijo Kabedo Maleŋ i piny ma jokadh'iye.”
“Riameno wac ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Alakiwada win wok i nonin, t'acoko win wok i piny kweth kama wikedher'iye, aka alamiyo win lowo pa Isiraili.
Jolabino kenyo, aka jolakwanyo woko gigipiny m'adak je kodi amien je.
Alamiyo jo cuny acel, t'aketho adundo manyen i jo, alakwanyo woko cuny matek pa tele wok i delkwoŋ jo, t'amiyo jo cuny mayom;
ŋey jowowothi i cik paran, to jokuro or paran, kodi timo. Jolabedo ji paran, aka alabedo Were pajo.
To ri jono ma cuny jo luwo gigipiny m'adak kodi amien pajo, alaculo kwor kwoŋ jo, Rwoth Were waco.”
Dwoŋ pa Rwoth oay malo wok i dier tindi madwoŋ, aka ocungo wi got yuwok ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ.
Cuny otiŋan to kelan i menyirok gi cuny pa Were bongi jotwec i Kaldeya meno i Babilon, aka rumacen menyirok no oweyan.
Awaco ri jotwec gigipiny je ma Rwoth onyuthan.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano, ibedo i dier ot ma jogwenyirok, ma jonitie gi waŋ jo to jokinen, jonitie gi ithi jo to jokiwinji; kwoŋbedo jobedo ot ma jogwenyirok.”

“Onyo wod dhano, tweyi migugu ikadhi i wiloka. Ilakadho i twec odieceŋ ka joneno gi waŋ jo, ilakadho paka jatwec wok i kabedo perin i kabedo man ka joneno. Poyi jolaniaŋ, makada nende jobedo ot ma jogwenyirok.
Ilawodho woko migugu perin odieceŋ ka joneno gi waŋ jo, paka jatwec, aka ilakadho othieno paka jatwec timo, ka joneno gi waŋ jo.
Kuny hoŋ i kor ot ka joneno, aka iwodhi migugu perin gi kenyo.
Lier migugu i gokin i mudho ka joneno gi waŋ jo, aka ium waŋin, ŋey ikir'inen piny. Kole atieko kethin ranyuth ri ot pa Isiraili.”
Atimo paka Rwoth omiyan or. Awodho migugu paran odieceŋ paka migugu pa jatwec, aka othieno akunyo hoŋ i kor ot gi cingan, awodho i mudho, t'atiŋo i gokan ka joneno gi waŋ jo.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran odikin ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano fodi ot pa Isiraili, ot ma jogwenyirok no, jok'openjin nike itimo aŋo?
Waci rijo ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Me bieto ma mako kwoŋ jadhum ma Yerusalem kodi ji ma jobed'iye je.
Waci rijo ni, ibedo ranyuth rijo. Paka itimo, ameno apaka ilatimo rijo. Jolakadho bedo jopath i twec.
Jadhum manitie i dier jo latiŋo migugu pere i goke i mudho, to wok. Go lakunyo hoŋ i kor ot to wodho gi kenyo, aka laumo waŋe ŋey wokiri wonen piny gi waŋe.
Alayaro bwo paran kwoŋe, aka go lamoko i iye. Alakelo go i Babilon, i lowo pa Jokaldin, kucel go kilaneno; go latho kenyo.
Jono je ma jothoko go ma jokonyo go kodi jolweny pere, alakedho woko jo i thenge aŋwen, t'acelo abor paran yuŋey jo.”
“Kenyo jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, ka akedho jo i dier nonin, t'akelo jo i dier piny.
To alaweyo manok kwoŋ jo both abor, kec kodi two nundu, ŋey jowotuci amien pajo i dier nonin ma jolakidh'iye; kenyo jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano, cami cemo perin gi papin, aka imadhi pi perin gi kirin m'ipoŋ gi lworo.

Waci ri ji ma lowo me ni, Rwoth Were waco ama ri ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem i lowo ma Isiraili. Jolacamo cemo pajo gi lworo, to jomadho pi pajo gi kirin, kwoŋbedo lowo pajo ladoŋ nono, ro maker pa ji ma jobed'iye je.
Tindin madongo ladoŋ gundin, aka lowo ladoŋ nono, kenyo wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano, meno ageca aŋo manitie i lowo ma Isiraili ma waco ni, ‘Hongo oyware, aka kisi menyirok kitundi i kare?’
Riameno wac rijo ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Alamiyo ageca me worweny, aka kilaoro kendo i Isiraili. To wac rijo ni, ndelo ocore cegin, aka kisi menyirok latundo i kare.”
“Kendo kilabedo menyirok ma bukony, kosa tuco wac twodo i ot pa Isiraili.
To an Rwoth alaluwo, aka wac m'abino luwo je latimere, kilagalo kendo. Kole i hongo mewin, awi ot ma jogwenyirok, alaluwo wac, aka alatimo, Rwoth Were waco.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano, neni, ot pa Isiraili jowaco ni, menyirok m'ineno latero ndelo kweth, aka wac m'ituco hongo mere fodi bor.
Riameno wac rijo ni Rwoth Were waco ama: Wac paran je kilagalo kendo, wac je m'aluwo latundo i kare, Rwoth Were waco.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano, tuci wac kwoŋ jotuci wac Were ma Isiraili ma jotuco wac Were wok i paro pajo ni, Winji win wac pa Rwoth.”
“Rwoth Were waco ama: Kidamba ri jotuci wac Were ma jomiŋ, ma joluwo paro pajo, aka ongoye gima jotieko neno.
Awi Isiraili, jotuci wac Were mewin jotieko bedo paka ogwaŋe i dier gundin.
Wikikadho malo i hoŋere, kosa yiko kor ot ri ot pa Isiraili, ŋey wonyali cungo i lweny i ndelo pa Rwoth.
Ongoye gima jotieko neno aka jotuco wac twodo, ka jowaco ni me a gima Rwoth waco, to Rwoth ama k'ooro jo. Kucel jokuro ni wac pajo wotundi i kare.
Ongoye gima witieko neno, aka witieko tuco wac twodo ka wiwaco ni me wac pa Rwoth, makada nende an fodi akiluwo.”
“Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo witieko tuco wac twodo, m'ongoye gima wineno, akiyere gi win, Rwoth Were waco.

Alatiŋo cingan kwoŋ jotuci wac Were ma jotuco wac twodo m'ongoye gima witieko neno. Jokilabedo i dier ji paran ka joromo; aka kilandiko nyingi jo i Isiraili, kosa jokiladok i lowo ma Isiraili. Kenyo wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.”
Waci ri jotuci wac Were no nike kor ot pajo latur woko. Koth lacwe swa gi pe kodi koyo ma laturo woko.
Ka kor ot otiek podho piny, kilapenjo win ni, nikune gimatar ma wifuy'iye?”
“Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: I keme paran aladhiro koyo matek, aka i nge paran labedo koth madwoŋ swa, aka i gero paran pe lareyo woko kicutho.
Alaŋinyo woko kor ot ma wifuyo matar no, to gore piny i lowo, ŋey misingi mere wothangere. Lapodho aka wilarere i iye; kenyo wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.”
“Alacowo nge paran kwoŋ kor ot kodi jono ma jofuyo matar. Alawaco rin ni, kor ot kodi joma jofuyo matar je jongoye;
jotuci wac Were no, ma jotuco wac ri Yerusalem nike joneno siem nitie, ma to siem ongoye, Rwoth Were waco.”
“Aka in, wod dhano, com waŋin kwoŋ mon pa ji perin, ma jotuco wac wok i paro pajo, aka ituci wac Were kwoŋ jo.
Ilawaco ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Kidamba ri mon ma jotudo yen i cingi ji aka jokwoyo kitambalin nger gi nger maboyo wiy jo ma dwaro kwo pa ji. Widwaro kwo pa ji ma wiwegi wikikur kwo mewin?
Witieko nyeko nyingan i dier ji paran ri masi bale kodi muma mugat. Wiwaco ri ji twodo ma jomito winjo to wikelo tho ri ji ma jokiripi tho, aka ji ma joripo tho wiweyo jokwo.”
“Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Akiyere gi yen mewin ma wioro ma dhumo kwo kodi tho. Alagonyo woko wok i cingi win, t'agonyo ji ma witweyo.
Alayeco woko kitambalin mewin bende, t'abotho ji paran wok i cingi win, aka wikilabedo gi meni ma tweyo jo kendo. Kenyo wilaŋeyo nike An abedo Rwoth.
Kwoŋbedo gi twodo mewin wicilo cuny joma timo gim'otire, aka wimiyo jokidakana meni medo timo kidakana aka jobotho kwo pajo.
Riameno wikilaneno twodo kendo aka wikilathiedho kendo. Alabotho ji paran wok i cingi win. Kenyo nyaka wilaŋeyo nike An abedo Rwoth.”
Jodongo mogo ma Isiraili jobino bongan aka jobedo ruwaŋan.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano, cwo me jotieko ketho cuny jo i cal pajo to jocomo waŋ gin kwoŋ gigipiny mareco ma miyo jo podho. Nger cwo no bende ber ni jowopenjan kwoŋ gimoro?”

“Riameno luw gi jo aka iwaci rijo ni Rwoth Were waco ama: Dhano je ma wok i Isiraili m'oketho cunye kwoŋ cal pere aka ocomo waŋe kwoŋ gigipiny mareco ma miyo go podho, wobin bongi jatuci wac Were, An Rwoth, alamiyo go radwok ma ripo gi lamo cal pere;
ŋey anyal mako t'awiro cuny Joisiraili je, ma jowire woko kwoŋan gi lamo cal pajo.”
“Riameno wac ri Joisiraili ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Ŋuti win aka wire win woko kwoŋ lamo cal mewin, wire win wiwey como waŋ win kwoŋ amien mewin je.”

“Ka dhano moro je wok i Isiraili, kosa japath ma bedo i Isiraili, m'okwedan, to ketho cunye kwoŋ cal to como waŋe kwoŋ gigipiny mareco ma miyo go podho, obin bongi jatuci wac Were, an Rwoth, an won alamiyo go radwok tirtir.
Alacomo waŋan kwoŋ ŋato, alaloko go ranyuth kodi gir'awaca aka alakwanyo woko go i dier ji paran. Kenyo wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.”
“K'owondi jatuci wac Were to luwo wac, an Rwoth aŋat'awondo go. Alarieyo cingan kwoŋe, t'areyo woko go i dier ji paran Isiraili.
Jolatiŋo reco pajo, jatuci wac Were, kodi ŋat'okidho bonge penjo jo, lalimo gir'acula acel;
ŋey Joisiraili jokiri jowokwedan, kosa jowokocere gi reco pajo. Jolabedo ji paran, aka alabedo Were pajo; Rwoth Were waco.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni,
“Wod dhano, ka piny otimo reco gi ngoye g'adieri adieri, alarieyo cingan kwoŋe, aka alareyo woko cemo ma kisi ndelo t'adhiro kec, alareyo woko ji kodi ogwaŋe.
Makada nende oyido Nowa kodi Daniel kodi Yobu, cwo adek me oyido jonitie i iye, dinyo jonyalo botho kwo pajo gi timo gim'otire, Rwoth Were waco.”
“Kabedi adhiri ogwaŋe madudi luwo i piny to joreyo woko ji, cuka piny doŋ nono, m'ongoye ŋata woth'iye;
makada nende cwo adek me oyido jonitie i piny, paka akwo Rwoth Were waco, dinyo jok'onyalo botho nyithindho pajo. Dinyo jo kende ama joboth to piny doŋ nono.”
“Kosa kabedi adhiri toŋ i piny t'awaco ni, weyi toŋ woluwi i piny aka worey woko ji kodi ogwaŋe.
Makada nende cwo adek me oyido jonitie i piny, paka akwo Rwoth Were waco, dinyo jok'onyalo botho nyithindho pajo, to jo kende ama joboth.”
“Kosa kabedi adhiri two nundu i piny, t'akonjo keme paran i iye gi oyo remo, ma reyo woko ji kodi ogwaŋe i piny,
makada nende Nowa kodi Daniel kodi Yobu oyido jonitie i iye, paka akwo Rwoth Were waco, dinyo jok'onyalo botho nyithindho pajo. Dinyo jonyalo botho kwo pajo wegi gi timo gim'otire.”
Kucel nitie ji ma jolaboth, nyithindho mayac kodi manyir, m'ilakelo jo bongin. K'ineno yo pajo kodi tim pajo, ilayomo cunyin kwoŋ teko m'atieko kelo kwoŋ Yerusalem, ri gim'atieko kelo kwoŋe je.
Ilayomo cunyin k'ineno yo pajo kodi tim pajo, aka ilaŋeyo nike nitie atoŋa m'omiyo atimo gim'atieko timo je, Rwoth Were waco.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Awi wod dhano, raŋo mbawo vini loyo mbawin man?
Kosa raŋo jangi yath vini loyo yen man ma lul?
Mbawo bende iranda wok i yath vini ma payo gimoro?
Kosa dhano nyalo yedho luth wok'iye ma liero gimoro je?
K'okethi i mac woliel,
ka thenge mere ario je owaŋ
to diere bende waŋ,
inyalo oro ri giman?
K'inen kinyal oro ma timo gimoro je ka nitie gikululu,
onyo mac otieko waŋo woko,
inyalo oro ma timo gimoro kendo?
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Paka mbawo yath vini i dier yen ma lul, m'atieko miyo mac owaŋo woko to liel, ameno apaka alatimo ri ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem.
Atieko como waŋan kwoŋ jo, aka makada nende jokwale kwoŋ mac, mac fodi lareyo woko jo. Kenyo wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, k'acomo waŋan kwoŋ jo.
Alamiyo piny doŋ nono, kwoŋbedo, jok'otimo gir'adieri, Rwoth Were waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, miy Yerusalem woŋey amien pere.
Wac ni, Rwoth Were waco ama ri Yerusalem. Cakirok perin kodi nywolirok perin owok i lowo pa Jokanan. Benin obedo Jamoor, aka min in obedo Jahiti.
I ndelo m'inywol'iye, k'oŋadi koko perin, k'olwoki koco perin gi pi, k'orey rin cumbi, aka k'oumin gi nanga.
Ongoye ŋat'omako wor kodin timo rin gigipiny me ma nyuthin wor aka obolin woko kam'othangere.
Aluwo, t'anenin igweco i remo perin. Oyido iduwere gi remo perin, aka awaco rin ni, ikilatho.
Amiyin idongo paka cemo i ndelo. Idongo t'ilokere mabor aka ilokere nyako m'othik, thundho perin othik aka ye wiyin odongo; kucel oyido initie kinyoro aka nono.
Aluwo kendo t'aneno nike oyido itieko thiko. Ayaro tiendi kanzu paran kwoŋin, t'aumo kinyoro perin. Atimo kodin cikirok ma nywomirok, Rwoth Were waco, aka ilokere aparan.
Kenyo akwanyo pi t'alwoko woko remo perin, aka awiro delkwoŋin gi mo.
Aruko rin nanga makicin kodi war ma pien dhiaŋ. Aumo wiyin gi nanga mafoth, t'aumin gi suka mafoth.
Aruko rin thiwino i ŋutin, kodi pogo i cingin.
Aruko rin peta i umin kodi milom i ithin, kodi sangaria maŋon i wiyin.
Oyido initie gi thiwino ma zahabu gi feza, aka cemo perin oyido obedo moko m'onuŋere kodi mo kic kodi mo oliv. Idongo maŋon swa, t'ibedo nyamicala.
Nyingin oŋeyere i piny kweth ro ŋono perin, kole oyido iŋon swa kwoŋbedo aŋat'amiyin ibedo maŋon, Rwoth Were waco.
To iasa ketho cunyin kwoŋ ŋono perin, aka itimo malaya kwoŋbedo ioro ŋeyirok perin ma timo malaya gi ŋata luwo je.
Ikwanyo nangin perin man t'ioro makicin kalamo perin, aka kenyo itimo malaya. Nger gime fodi oyido k'otimere aka k'otimere kendo.
Ikwanyo thiwino perin maŋon ma zahabu gi feza paran m'amiyin aka itimo gine calin ma cwo t'itimo gine malaya.
Ikwanyo nangin perin makicin m'amiyin t'iumo gine calin, aka imiyo jo mo kodi buban paran.
Cemo paran m'amiyin kodi moko m'onuŋere kodi mo kic m'oyido amiyin icami, imiyo paka cowirok maŋwe kur ri calin. Rwoth Were waco.
Ikwanyo nyithindho m'oyido inywolo ran aka imiyo jo paka cowirok ri calin paŋini malaya perin oyido kirom.
Ithumo nyithindho paran t'imiyo jo paka cowirok ri calin.
Gi amien perin kodi malaya perin, ikinyalo poyo kwo ma thino perin, munyo oyido initie kinyoro aka nono, munyo igweco i remo perin.
Rumacen ma kidakana perin je, kidamba, kidamba rin, Awi Yerusalem, Rwoth Were waco.
Igeto kituti perin, kodi kalamo kisi kam'othangere je.
Igeto kalamo i cakirok ma royo je aka itimo malaya gi ŋono perin, t'ithango kinyoro perin ri kisi ŋata luwo, aka malaya perin omedere.
Itimo malaya gi Jomisir, joger perin ma jokidakana, medo malaya perin, ma kwinyo nge paran.
Riameno arieyo cingan kwoŋin, amoja woko lim perin t'amiyin i mito pa Jofilistia, ma jodakin, ma jool gi tim perin ma kidakana.
Itimo malaya gi Joasiria, kwoŋbedo iyin lac, itimo malaya gi jo, to ikiyeŋ.
Imedere timo malaya kiri i Kaldeya, lowo pa jomitan, to kiri gi gime ikiyeŋ.
Cunyin col nedi, Rwoth Were penjo, m'itimo gime je, tim pa dhako malaya m'ongoye giwickwot.
Igeto kituti perin i cakirok ma kisi royo, kodi kalamo kam'othangere je. Kucel oyido ikitim malaya ma pesa paka malayin ma kisi ndelo.
Awi dhako ma jakidakana, ma weyo cwore to timo cot gi jokicar.
Cwo jomiyo malayin mic, to in, itieko miyo jomitirok perin je mic aka inyewo jo bino wok kisi kamoro nindo kodin.
Oyido ipokere kwoŋ mon man i timo malaya perin. Ongoye ŋat'oromin bedo malaya, aka imiyo cul kucel in k'oculin, oyido ipokere.
Riameno, winji gima Rwoth waco, awi Yerusalem, malaya.
Rwoth Were waco ama, kwoŋbedo inyutho kidakana perin aka ithango kinyoro perin gi jomitirok perin, aka kwoŋbedo cal perin je mar'amien, aka kwoŋbedo remo pa nyithindho perin m'imiyo rijo.
Riameno acegin coko jomitirok perin je, m'isiemere gi jo, jono je m'oyido jomitin kodi ma jodakin. Alacoko jo kwoŋin thoko iye je, aka alathango kinyoro perin rijo, ŋey jowoneni kinyoro perin je.
Alathumo rin banja paka ri mon ma jotimo cot aka jonek, aka alamiyin gir'acula ma tho i nge kodi nyeko.
Alajwangin i cingi jo, aka jolaturo woko kituti perin kodi kalamo perin. Jolalunyo woko nangin perin to jokwanyo gigipiny perin ma ŋono aka jolaweyin kinyoro aka nono.
Jolaico ji kwoŋin, aka joladwirin gi telin, to jothumin mathindho thindho g'abore pajo.
Jolawaŋo udi perin gi mac to jomiyin gir'acula ka mon kweth joneno gi waŋ jo. Alamiyin weyo timo malaya kodi weyo miyo jomitirok perin mic.
Kenyo nyaka keme paran kwoŋin larumo, aka alabedo gi siem. Akilamako nyeko kosa mako nge kendo.
Kwoŋbedo wiyin owil gi hongo perin ma soye, aka itieko miyan nge gi gime je, riameno, atieko miyin gir'acula Rwoth Were waco. Imedo timo cot loyo amien perin je.
Neni, Yerusalem, kisi ŋata oro ageca, laoro ageca me kwoŋin. Paka yokimere apaka nyare.
Ibedo nyar yokin adieri, m'ojwango cwore kodi nyithindho pere; aka ibedo nyamin nyimin in, ma jojwango cwogi jo kodi nyithindho pajo. Yokin oyido obedo Jahiti aka benin oyido obedo Jaamor.
Nyamin in madwoŋ obedo Samaria, m'obedo gi nyiki go yumalo perin, aka nyamin in mathin obedo Sodom, m'obedo gi nyiki go yupiny perin.
Ikiluwo nyaka yo pajo kodi timo tim mar'amien pajo, to i hongo macek oyido i jakidakana loyo jo i yo perin je.
Adieri paka akwo, Rwoth Were waco, nyamin in Sodom kodi nyir pere jok'otimo gima in kodi nyikin witieko timo.
Me obedo banja pa nyamin in Sodom. Go kodi nyir pere oyido jopoŋ gi noro, cemo i thotho, kodi kwo mayom, to k'okonyo jocandi kodi ji ma bu gimoro.
Jo oyido jonoro, aka jotimo amien ruwaŋan, riameno areyo woko jo munyo aneno.
Samaria k'otimo adec mareco perin, itieko timo amien maloyo ma jotimo, aka imiyo banja pa nyimin in neno mathin loyo amien m'itieko timo je.

Onyo ciri wickwot perin, kwoŋbedo itieko miyo banja pa nyimin in neno mathin, ro reco perin m'itimo mar'amien loyo jo. Onyo omiyo jo bedo ma bubanja kabutin. Ameno tiŋi wickwot kwoŋbedo imiyo nyimin in neno pa jober.
Aladwoko ri Sodom kodi Samaria kodi nyir pajo lim pajo, aka aladwoko lim perin bende, Yerusalem.
Gime lamiyin wickwot ro gim'itieko timo je, aka meno layomo cuny nyimin in.
Nyimin in, Sodom kodi nyir pere jolagik i cal pajo macon, Samaria kodi nyir pere bende, aka in kodi nyikin bende wilagik i cal macon.
Sodom oyido k'obedo gir'awaca i dhokin i hongo ma noro perin,
mafodi kidakana perin k'onyuthere kamaler? Onyo pama ibedo aŋala ri Joedom kodi joger pere je, kodi ri Jofilistia, jono je thoko ma jocayin.
Iripo candere ri timo cot perin kodi amien perin, Rwoth waco.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Alaterin paka ripo, kwoŋbedo icayo kwoŋirok perin t'ituro cikirok perin.
Kucel alapoyo cikirok paran kodin i hongo ma soye perin, aka alaketho cikirok kodin ma cil gi cil.
Kenyo ilapoyo tim perin, aka wiyin lakwot, k'akwanyo nyimin in, madwoŋ kodi mathin, t'amiyin jo paka nyithindho, to k'obedo ro cikirok paran kodin.
Alaketho cikirok paran kodin, aka ilaŋeyo nike An abedo Rwoth.
Kenyo nyaka ilapoyo to wiyin kwot, aka ikilayawo dhokin kendo, ro wickwot, k'atieko cwako rin tim perin marac je, Rwoth Were waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Awi wod dhano, goy sikoiyiko me, aka iwaci ri ot pa Isiraili ageca me.
Iwaci ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Ango madwoŋ swa, manitie gi bwombe m'oyare swa gi yer maboyo makicin gi rangi kweth obino i Lebanon to pie i wilwindi ma yath sida.
Ango no oturo withi yath sida to tiŋo tero i lowo ma mitan, i tindi madwoŋ pa jomitan to ketho kenyo.
Ango no kendo okwanyo nyingi yath wok i lowo no to pidho i lowo ma diwa, kama pi oyido kicwiy ma miyo yath no dongo.
Yath no oloth to lokere yath vini m'oyare to macek. Jange mere odongo to yare yubongi ango, to fuc mere odoŋ kama yath otwi i iye. Ameno olokere yath vini, ocwayo jange to thiwo.

Oyido nitie ango man madwoŋ swa, manitie gi bwombe m'oyare gi yer maboyo makicin gi rangi kweth. To neni, yath vini me orwako fuc mere kodi jange yubongi ango man me omiyo go pi gi ka tiende kam'oyido dong'iye.
Yath vini me oyido otiek pidho i ndelo maber kama pi kicwiy'iye, ŋey onyali jwayo jange to nyak aka wolokere yath vini maŋon.

Waci ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Yath no okwo to dongo? Be, ilafudho woko fuc mere, aka olemo mere latop woko to thwo, boke mere je laner woko. Aka kilabedo ni ji ma jotek aka jomeni ama jolafudho woko fuc mere.
Yath no odongi kam'opidh'iye kenyo? Be, ka koyo ma yuwok ceŋ owaŋ go, lathwo woko kicutho.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Mondo penji ot ma jogwenyirok ni, wikuya dwoŋ ma gigipiny me? Waci rijo nike kere ma Babilon obino i Yerusalem, to kadho gi kere mere kodi jodhum mere, aka odwoko gi jo i Babilon.
Go okwanyo acel kwoŋ jopeco pa kere to timo gi go cikirok, to miyo go kwoŋirok mwolok; aka otero jodhum paka jotwec,
ŋey ker womwole aka okir wogwenyere, aka gi kuro cikirok pere onyali cungo.

To kere no ogwenyere kwoŋ kere ma Babilon gi oro jomikwenda ri Misir, ŋey Misir wonyali miyo go kayinin kodi jolweny kweth. Kere no onyali? Ŋata timo nger gino nyalo both? Go nyalo turo cikirok to kwale?
Adieri paka akwo, Rwoth Were waco, adieri i Babilon, kama kere m'oketho go bedo kere bed'iye, ma go ocayo kwoŋirok pere, to turo cikirok pere, ama go latho i iye.
Farawo gi jolweny pere madwoŋ jokilakonyo go i lweny, ka Jobabilon jogeti cel to jokunyo buce ma neko ji kweth.
Kwoŋbedo go ocayo kwoŋirok to turo cikirok, kucel go oyido otieko keth'iye cinge, go kilakwale.
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Paka akwo, alamiyo go gir'acula ro kwoŋirok paran ma go ocayo, kodi cikirok paran ma go oturo.
Alayaro katimba paran kwoŋ go, aka alamako go i bwo paran. Alakelo go i Babilon t'adonjo i thumo banja gi go kenyo kwoŋbedo go k'otimo ran adieri.
Jolweny pere ma jobeyo jolatho g'abor, aka ma joboth jolakedhere i thenge je. Kenyo wilaŋeyo nike an, Rwoth, atieko luwo.
Rwoth Were waco ama:
An won alakwanyo lwindi yath sida mabor,
t'aturo withe.
Alapidho wi got mabor.
Alapidho wi got mabor pa Isiraili,
lajwayo jange to nyak olemo to lokere yath sida maŋon.
Kisi nger winyo lageto i tiende,
aka i tipo mere kisi nger cwec lageto.
Yen je ma lowo jolaŋeyo,
nike An abedo Rwoth.
Atoŋo piny yen maboyo,
aka amiyo mathindho dongo mabor.
Athwo woko yen manumu,
aka amiyo yen m'othwo lothi.
An Rwoth atieko luwo; aka alatimo gim'atieko waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Ageca aŋo me ma wiluda i lowo ma Isiraili. Jonywol jocamo nyingi vini mawac aka lak nyithindho ofole.
Paka abedo Were makwo, Rwoth Were waco, kendo wik'oluda ageca me i lowo ma Isiraili.
Kwo pa kisi dhano je obedo aparan, kwo pa janywol kiri gi kwo pa nyathi. Ŋata timo reco ama latho.
Ka dhano bedo i kwo m'otire, timo tiro kodi gim'otire,
kicam cemo m'ocowere gine wi gote, aka kitiŋi waŋe malo lamo cal ma ot pa Isiraili. Go kiweci gi cipa jacwo man kosa kinindi gi dhako ka ruko dwe.
Ka go kidiy kosa kikwal dhano, go dwoko gima jabanja pere singa rigo, go pidho joma kec neko jo aka ruko ji ma jongoye gi nanga.
Ka go kikopa pesa ri magowa, aka kwero timo raco to miyo rieko m'otire i dhaw mogo je.
Meno go winjo or paran aka kuro cik paran noknok. Go timo gim'otire, aka go lakwo; Rwoth Were waco.
To ka go nitie gi wode ma jamaker ma janek, ma timo nger gigipiny me,
ma bamere oyido kitim. Go camo cemo m'ocowere gine wi gote, weco gi mon pa ji.
Ka go diyo jocandi aka kwalo, aka kano gima jabanja pere osinga rigo. Go tiŋo waŋe malo lamo cal, go timo amien.
Go kopa pesa gi magowa, go okwo? Be go kilakwo kwoŋbedo go otieko timo amien me je. Go latho adieri, aka remo pere ladoŋ i wiye.
To ka jacwo me nitie gi wode ma neno reco je ma bamere otieko timo, to kiluw tim pere.
Go kicam cemo m'ocowere gine wi gote, kosa kitiŋi waŋe malo lamo cal. Go kiweci gi mon pa ji,
kosa kidiy dhano mogo je kosa kwal. Go dwoko gima jabanja pere osinga rigo aka pidho joma kec neko jo kodi ruko joma jongoye gi nanga.
Go kwero timo raco aka kikopa pesa gi magowa. Go kuro cik paran aka winjo or paran. Go kilatho kwoŋbedo reco pa bamere, to go lakwo adieri.
Bamere odiyo ji to kwalo, aka otimo gimarac ri kisi dhano, riameno go tho ro reco pere.
Aka wipenjo ni, “Raŋo nyathi kicandere ro reco pa bamere?” Obedo kwoŋbedo nyathi otimo tiro kodi gim'otire. Go okuro cik paran aka oluwo jo gi kinen, riameno go lakwo adieri.
Adundo ma timo reco ama latho. Nyathi kilatiŋo reco pa janywol, aka janywol kilatiŋo reco pa nyathi. Ŋata timo gim'otire labedo rigo won, aka ŋata timo kidakana labedo rigo won.
Ka jakidakana owire woko kwoŋ reco pere m'otieko timo, aka go okur cik paran je, aka otim tiro kodi gim'otire, go kilatho, go lakwo adieri.
Ongoye reco pere je m'otieko timo m'ilapoyo, aka go lakwo ro gim'otire ma go otimo.
Rwoth Were penjo ni, “Anitie gi kisangala moro je i tho pa jakidakana? Be Them anen go pusere to kwo.”

“To ka ŋata timo gim'otire oweyo timo gim'otire to timo reco kodi timo amien je ma jakidakana timo, go okwo? Ongoye tim pere m'otire ma go otieko timo je m'ilapoyo. I ngoye g'adieri pere ma go timo kodi reco pere ma go otimo, go latho.”
Kucel wiwaco ni, “Yo pa Rwoth k'otire. Onyo winji win, Awi ot pa Isiraili, yo paran k'otire? K'obedo ni yo mewin ama k'otire?
Ka ŋata timo gim'otire oweyo timo gim'otire to timo reco, go latho ri reco ma go otimo.
To ka jakidakana owire woko kwoŋ kidakana ma go otieko timo to timo tiro kodi gim'otire, go labotho kwo pere.
Go oneno to wire woko kwoŋ reco pere ma go oyido timo, go lakwo adieri aka kilatho.
Kucel ot pa Isiraili waco ni, ‘Yo pa Rwoth k'otire.’ Awi ot pa Isiraili, yo paran k'otire? K'obedo ni yo mewin ama k'otire?”
“Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Awi ot pa Isiraili alathumo riwin banja luwo kwoŋ yo pa kisi dhano. Pusere win aka wiwire woko kwoŋ reco mewin, ka k'obedo ameno lalokere riwin rerok.
Weyi win reco je ma witieko timo kwoŋan, aka wilimi cuny manyen kodi adundo manyen! Raŋo witho, awi ot pa Isiraili?
Kole angoye gi kisangala i tho pa dhano moro je, Rwoth Were waco. Wire win, aka ŋey wikwo.”
Rwoth owaco ran wero wer ma rem me ri jodhum ma Isiraili.
Waci ni, kite simbwor madhako aŋo ma min win oyido obedo i dier simbwore ma mon!
Go oriere i dier simbwore ma mon mathindho ka pidho nyithindhe.
Go opidho nyathi simbwor pere acel m'olokere simbwor m'oripo,
to fonjere dwar, aka ocamo ji.
Nonin jowinjo kwoŋe,
aka omaki go i od jo,
t'ikelo go gi siraget i lowo ma Misir.
Simbwor madhako oneno nike go otieko kuro aka orumo gi geno,
ameno okwanyo nyathi simbwor pere acel man,
to loko simbwor m'oripo.
Simbwor m'oripo no owotho i dier simbwore,
to bende fonjere dwar, aka ocamo ji.
Mon tho ma tindin madongo ma go oreyo woko to sika woko lowo pajo,
jopoŋ gi lworo ro derino ma kihola pere.
Nonin wok iy'adec je thoko,
jociko bwo pajo kwoŋe i od jo t'imako.
Joketho go iy'agono gi siraget,
to jokelo ri kere ma Babilon i twec,
ŋey kendo dwonde okir wowinjere wi gote ma Isiraili.
Yok win cal yath vini i remo mewin,
m'opidhere i thengi pi,
ma nyak swa aka ojwayo jange ro dito ma pi.
Jange mere oyido jotek,
ma jolokere ludhe ma dhum pa jodhum.
Yath vini odongo mabor swa malo,
aka oyido nenere ro boro mere kodi jange m'ojware.
To ofudhi woko i keme,
obol piny i lowo,
koyo ma yuwok ceŋ othwo woko,
otur woko jange,
jothwo woko t'iwaŋo.
Onyo opidhi i thim,
i lowo m'othwo m'ongoye pi.
Mac owok i kore,
otieko waŋo woko jange kodi olemo mere,
ŋey ongoye kore matek m'odoŋ,
ongoye luth ma dhum ri jodhum.
Me wer ma rem, m'iwero noknok.
Obedo k'apar ma dwe mar'abic i oro mar'abirio, jodongo mogo wok i Isiraili jobino penjo Rwoth, aka jobedo piny ruwaŋan.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Awi wod dhano luw gi jodongo ma Isiraili aka iwaci rijo ni, me a gima Rwoth waco. Wibino penjan? Paka akwo Rwoth Were waco, wikilapenjan.
Ilathumo rijo banja? Wod dhano, ilathumo rijo banja? Miy jo ŋeyo amien pa kwarere pajo.
Iwaci rijo ni, me a gima Rwoth Were waco. I ndelo m'ayer'iye Isiraili, akwoŋere ri nyikway Yakobo aka amiyo jo ŋeyan i lowo ma Misir. Akwoŋere rijo k'awaco ni, “Abedo Rwoth, Were mewin.”
I ndelo no akwoŋere rijo wodho jo wok i lowo ma Misir kadho i lowo m'oyido atieko yero rijo, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, maŋon loyo lowo je.
Awaco rijo ni kisi dhano wowey woko tim ma mienirok pere, aka jokiri jowokocere gi cal ma Misir, kwoŋbedo abedo Rwoth Were pajo.

To jogwenyere kwoŋan aka oyido jok'oyikere winjan. Kisi dhano k'oweyo tim ma mienirok pere, aka jok'oweyo cal ma Misir. Kenyo awaco ni, alakonjo keme paran kwoŋ jo t'acowo nge paran kwoŋ jo i lowo ma Misir.
To akitimo ameno ro dwoŋ ma nyingan, m'akimito koco ruwaŋ nonin ma jobedo i dier jo, ma ruwaŋ jo aŋeyere rijo i wodho jo wok i lowo ma Misir.
Ameno awodho jo wok i lowo ma Misir t'akelo jo i thim.
Amiyo jo or paran t'afonjo jo cik paran, ma ŋata luwo kwo.
Amiyo jo bende kuro sabato, paka ranyuth i dier an kodi jo; ŋey jowoŋey nike An Rwoth, aloko jo maleŋ.

To kiri i thim, ot pa Isiraili jogwenyere kwoŋan, jok'owotho i cik paran, aka jokwero or paran ma ŋat'oluwi lakwo. Jokoco sabato paran, kenyo aparo kwoŋ konjo keme paran kwoŋ jo i thim, ma reyo woko jo.
To akitimo, kwoŋbedo oyido lakelo wickwot ri nyingan ruwaŋ nonin, ma joneno munyo awodho jo wok i Misir.
Ameno akwoŋere rijo i thim nike oyido akilakelo jo i lowo m'oyido atieko miyo jo, lowo ma mol gi cak kodi mo kic, lowo maber loyo lowo je.
Atimo ameno kwoŋbedo oyido jokwero or paran, to joturo cik paran, jokoco sabato, aka joyero lamo cal pajo.
To aneno jo gi wor, aka akineko jo kosa reyo woko jo i thim.
Awaco ri nyithindho pajo i thim ni, wikiri wikuri cik ma jonywol mewin jotimo, kosa wiluw tim pajo, kosa wikocere gi cal pajo.
An Rwoth, abedo Were mewin. Luw win cik paran, aka wikuri or paran kodi timo je.
Kur win sabato paran maleŋ ŋey jowobedi ranyuth i dier an kodi win ŋeyo nike An Rwoth, abedo Were mewin.
To nyithindho pajo jogwenyere kwoŋan, jok'oluwo cik paran kosa kuro or paran, ma ŋata luwo kwo. Jokoco sabato paran. Kenyo aparo konjo keme paran kwoŋ jo kodi cowo nge paran kwoŋ jo i thim.
To alwogo cingan, aka akimito kelo wickwot ri nyingan ruwaŋ nonin ma joneno munyo awodho jo wok i Misir.
Ameno akwoŋere rijo i thim nike alakedho jo i dier nonin kodi i piny man.
Atimo ameno kwoŋbedo oyido jok'otimo or paran, to jokwero cik paran aka jokoco sabato paran to jolamo cal ma cango kwarere pajo jolamo.
Kenyo amiyo jo cik ma kiber kodi or ma kimiy kwo.
Amiyo jo kocirok gi mic pajo wegi ka jomiyo okayin pajo paka cowirok, ma miyo jo gir'acula ŋey jowoŋey ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Riameno wod dhano, luw gi ot pa Isiraili aka iwaci rijo ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwarere mewin kendo jocayan gi ngoye g'adieri.

Akelo jo i lowo m'akwoŋere miyo jo. Munyo joneno kisi tendere mabor kodi yen m'oyukino, jomiyo cowirok i joje. Jomiyan nge gi cowirok pajo ma jowaŋo kama joduny'iye ŋwece kur pajo to jokonjo mic ma vini.
Apenjo jo ni, Kabedo ma malo mene ma wikadh'iye? Ameno kabedo no ilwoŋo ni Bama kiri konon.
Riameno wac ri ot pa Isiraili ni Rwoth Were waco ama: Wilakocere gi kula pa kwarere mewin to wiluwo amien pajo?
Ka wimiyo mic mewin gi waŋo nyithindho mewin i mac, wikocere gi cal je kiri konon. Kosa wilabino penjan, Awi ot pa Isiraili? Paka akwo, Rwoth Were waco, wikilapenjan.
Paro ma winitie gine ka wiparo nike wilabedo paka nonin man kodi ji man ma jonitie i piny man to wilamo mbawin kodi telin, k'otimere.
Paka akwo adieri, Rwoth Were waco, ka k'obedo gi cingan matek kodi meni paran, kodi i keme paran, alabedo kere mewin.
Alawodho win wok i dier nonin t'acoko win wok i piny kama wikedher'iye, gi cingan matek kodi meni paran, kodi i keme paran.
Alakelo win i thim pa nonin, aka aladonjo i thumo banja riwin awaŋ g'awaŋ.
Paka cango adonjo i thumo banja ri kwarere mewin, apaka aladonjo i thumo banja riwin, Rwoth Were waco.
Alamiyo win luwo i litho cuka amiyo win miyirok kuro cikirok paran.
Alakwanyo woko jogwenyirok i dier win, kodi jono ma jotimo reco kwoŋan. Alawodho jo woko i lowo ma jobed'iye paka jopath, to jokiladonjo i lowo pa Isiraili. Kenyo wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Paka riwin, awi ot pa Isiraili, Rwoth Were waco. Kadhi witiy ri calin mewin kisi dhano kwoŋ win pama kodi rumacen k'inen wikilawinjan. To wikilakoco nyingan maleŋ kendo gi mic mewin kodi calin mewin.

Kole wi got paran maleŋ, got mabor pa Isiraili, Rwoth Were waco, kenyo ot pa Isiraili gibe, joje, jolatic ran i lowo no. Koro alayeyo jo, aka koro alamito mic mewin kodi mic mewin maber loyo, kodi gigipiny mewin maleŋ je.
Alayeyo win paka ŋwece kur ma sangala an, k'anowodhi win wok i dier nonin, aka alacoko win wok i piny kama wikedher'iye. Alanyutho leŋo paran i dier win ruwaŋ nonin.
Wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, k'akelo win i lowo ma Isiraili, lowo m'akwoŋere miyo kwarere mewin.
Gi koro wilapoyo yo mewin kodi tim mewin je ma wikocere gine, aka wiladakere kwoŋbedo gimarac ma witieko timo.
Wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, k'atiyo gi win ro nyingan, ki cungo kwoŋ yo mewin marac kosa tim mewin makoc, awi ot pa Isiraili, Rwoth Were waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, com waŋin yuthenge ma yupiny, aka iluwi kwoŋ yupiny t'ituco wac Were kwoŋ lul ma yupiny.

Waci ri lul ma yupiny ni, winji wac pa Rwoth. Rwoth Were waco ama: Acegin cwinyo mac, aka lawaŋo yath manumu kodi m'othwo je manitie i in. Mac m'odheth ma kinyal neko, aka wok yupiny tundo yumalo je lawaŋ gine.
Ji je jolaneno nike An Rwoth aŋat'acwinyo, aka kilaneko woko.
Kenyo awaco ni, “Awi Rwoth Were, kole jowaco kwoŋan ni, abedo jacwogi agecin.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Awi wod dhano, com waŋin yu Yerusalem aka ititi wac kwoŋ Kabedo Maleŋ; tuci wac Were kwoŋ lowo ma Isiraili.
Ilawaco ri lowo ma Isiraili ni me a gima Rwoth waco. Abino kwoŋ win, aka alafudho abor paran wok iy'atum mere. Alareyo woko joma timo gim'otire kanyacel gi jokidakana.
Kwoŋbedo alareyo woko joma timo gim'otire kanyacel gi jokidakana, riameno alafudho abor paran wok iy'atum kwoŋ ji je wok yupiny tundo yumalo.
Ji je jolaŋeyo nike an Rwoth, atieko fudho abor paran wok iy'atum aka akiladwoko i iye kendo.
Aka in wod dhano, uja, uja gi cunyin m'otur kodi rem mathoth swa ruwaŋ jo.

Aka ka jopenjin ni, “Raŋo iuja?” Dwoki jo ni, “Kwoŋbedo mikwenda ma bino. K'obin, cuny jo lapodho aka cingi jo lanyapere, kisi adundo lagore piny, aka congi jo laukere paka pi. Neni ee, bino aka latundo i kare. Rwoth Were waco.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, tuci wac Were aka wac ni me a gima Rwoth waco.
Abor otiek pako aka pilin.
Opak ma neki,
aka pilin paka lithkoth.
Ongoye siemirok,
wikwero pir je kodi gir'acula.
Omiy dhano wiro abor woleny,
woyik ma oro.
Opak abor, otieko pilin,
ma ketho i cingi janek.
Ywak, aka uja, wod dhano,
abor me oyiki ri ji paran,
kodi jodhum ma Isiraili je.
Abor kidho neko jo,
kanyacel gi ji paran.
Awi, pay emin.
Kole atemo,
ka jokwer winjo pir, k'otimere?
Rwoth Were waco.
Onyo, wod dhano, tuci wac Were,
goy adhoŋ,
weyi abor wopodhi dirio, didek,
obedo abor ma neki.
Abor ma neki madwoŋ,
othoko jo.
Cuny jo podho,
aka kweth jocer.
I waŋkac pajo je,
atieko ketho abor.
Awi, otim ma pilin paka lithkoth,
omin ma neki.
Bedi mabith, monji yuracuc,
ici yuracam, kama waŋin ocom'iye.
An bende alagoyo adhoŋ,
aka alacowo keme paran.
An Rwoth, atieko luwo.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
In wod dhano, ceri royo ario ri abor pa kere ma Babilon ma labino. Je jowocaki i piny acel. Kethi kipande ri jangi royo ma kidho i tindi madwoŋ.
Ceri royo ri abor ma bino i Raba pa Joamon kosa i Yuda kosa i Yerusalem m'otinda.
Kere ma Babilon ocungo i jangi royin ario, oro thieth, yengo aserin, penjo terafim, go kaŋasa cuny ogwaŋ.
I cinge maracuc, nitie abor pa Yerusalem, ketho wot rombo athuma, lwoŋo ma neki, koko dwondi ma ywak ma lweny, ketho wot rombo athuma kwoŋ waŋkace, ma geto cel kodi kunyo buce ma cego.
To rijo, lacale paka wac twodo, jotieko kwoŋirok, to miyo jo poyo banja pajo, ma kelo mako jo.
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo witieko poyo banja mewin, aka i nger no reco mewin othangere, ŋey i tim mewin je reco mewin nenere, kwoŋbedo witieko poyo, ilamako win acingi.
Aka in, m'idakana, jadhum makoc ma Isiraili,
ndelo perin otieko tundo,
ndelo perin ma gir'acula macowe bino.
Rwoth Were waco ama:
Luny woko junga perin, luny woko sangaria perin,
gime je langoye,
tiŋi malo gima nitie piny,
aka dwoki piny gima nitie malo.
Kisika, kisika adieri,
alaloko tindi madwoŋ gunda,
to k'otimere cuka ŋat'atieko yero miyo tindi madwoŋ gir'acula obin,
kenyo alamiyo go.
In wod dhano, tuci wac Were, aka waci ni, Rwoth Were waco ama ri Joamon, aka kwoŋ yet pajo waci ni,
Abor, abor ocel ma nek.
Otiek, aka pilin paka lithkoth.
Ineno rin menyirok ma twodo,
ithiedho rin gima k'adieri,
itweyin i ŋut,
joreco ma jodakana swa,
jono ma ndelo pajo otieko tundo,
hongo ma gir'acula macowe.
Dwoki abor i mugowa mere!
Alathumo rin banja,
i kabedo m'ocweyin'iye,
i lowo ma cakirok perin.
Alakonjo kwoŋin nge paran,
gi mac ma keme paran,
alakudho kwoŋin.
Alajwangin i cingi jomaker,
ji ma jonek swa.
Ilabedo mo ma cwinyo mac,
remo perin laoy i lowo,
kilapoyin kendo,
An Rwoth, atieko luwo.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
In wod dhano, Inothum banja ri tindi madwoŋ m'opoŋ neki no? Miy amien pere je woŋeyere.
Waci ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Awi tindi madwoŋ, ma neko ji pere won, hongo pere otieko tundo, timo calin pere, aka kocere gine.

Witieko bedo jobanja ro remo ma witieko oyo, aka wikocere gi calin ma witieko timo. Riameno ndelo mewin otieko tundo, hongo mewin orumo! Meno am'omiyo atieko miyo win bedo giwickwot ruwaŋ nonin, kodi aŋala ri piny je.
Nonin macegin kodi mabor joŋalo win kwoŋbedo wiŋeyere ri gwenyirok.
Jodhum ma Isiraili je jogeno meni pajo wegi aka joneko.
Win ji ma tindi madwoŋ wikiwor jonywol mewin. Widiyo jopath aka witero nyathi kic kodi citho marac i dier win.
Wikiwor Kabedo Maleŋ, aka wikikur sabato.
Nitie ji i dier win ma jowaco twodo kwoŋ joman ŋey woneki jo. Jomegi i dier win jocamo cemo m'ocowere gine ri calin, aka megi joyeŋo awanya pajo.
Jomegi kwoŋ win winindo gi ciba win, aka megi jonindo gi mon ma joruko dwe.
Jomegi jotimo cot gi cipa jager, man joweco gi ciwod jo, aka man jonindo gi nyar bajo.
Megi kwoŋ ji mewin inyewo jo neki. Megi joketho magowa kwoŋ pesa ma jokopa Joisiraili wadi jo aka joŋaŋ gi diyo jo. Wiwin owil kodan, Rwoth Were waco.
Neni ee, alamino adol kwoŋ kwo mewin kodi neki manitie i dier win.
Cuny win onyali ciro, aka cingi win odoŋ matek i ndelo m'alatiy'iye gi win? An Rwoth, atieko luwo, aka alatimo.
Alakedho win i dier nonin, t'abolo win i dier piny, aka alakwanyo woko kicutho koco mewin i dier win.
Ilacayo win ka nonin man joneno, kenyo nyaka wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Awi wod dhano, ot pa Isiraili olokere ran nyal. Jocale nyweny, waya, cuma, kikebe kodi nyal m'oyuy kwoŋ feza.
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo wijoje witieko lokere nyal, alacoko wijoje kanyacel i Yerusalem.
I nger acel m'icok'iye waya, cuma, nyweny kodi kikebe i dier mac m'ocwiny, ŋey jowonyele, ameno apaka alacoko win i nge paran, i keme paran, aka alaketho win piny t'anyelo win.
Alacoko win, aka alakudho kwoŋ win mac gi keme paran, aka wilanyele i iye.
Paka feza nyele i dier mac, apaka wilanyele bende, aka kenyo nyaka wilaŋeyo nike An Rwoth, atieko konjo keme paran kwoŋ win.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Awi wod dhano, wac ri Joisiraili ni lowo pajo koc, aka koth k'ocwe i iye i ndelo ma nge.
Riwirok pa jotuci wac Were mere cal simbwore ma johola kwoŋ ogwaŋ ma joneko. Joneko ji aka jonyaga pesa kodi lim ma jonyalo nwaŋo, aka gi neki pajo joweyo mon kweth ma bu cwo.

Jocway ri Were i wi migam mere joturo cik paran aka jokiwor gimaleŋ. Jokikethi pokirok i dier leŋo kodi gima kileŋ. Jokifonji pokirok i dier gim'olony kodi gimakoc, aka jokoco sabato paran, ŋey kiworan i dier jo.
Jodhum mere jocale paka arare ma joyeco ogwaŋ ma joneko. Joneko ŋey jowoŋaŋ.
Jotuci wac Were mere jofuyo gimatar rijo, aka joneno twodo, jothiedho rijo gima k'obedo adieri, aka jowaco ni, Rwoth waco ama; ma Rwoth fodi k'oluwo.
Ji ma lowo jotimo akor aka jokwalo, jotieko diyo jocandi kodi ji ma bu gimoro, aka jotieko tero jopath marac.
Arango i dier jo dhano manyalo geto kendo kor ot, ŋata nyalo cungo kama kor ot obar'iye to kwonga lowo ka nge paran cegin reyo woko, to akinyalo nwaŋo dhano.
Riameno atieko konjo nge paran kwoŋ jo, gi mac ma keme. Atieko reyo woko jo, ro tim pajo, atieko miyo jo gir'acula, Rwoth Were waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, oyido nitie mon ario ma jobedo nyimere, aka jonywole gi dhako acel.
Munyo oyido jobedo i Misir, jotimo cot aka jolokere malayin.
Madwoŋ mere oyido ilwoŋo ni Ohola (ma cungo ri Samaria) aka mathin mere oyido ilwoŋo ni Oholiba (ma cungo ri Yerusalem.) Anywomo joje, aka jonywolo ran nyithindho.
Ohola otimo malaya kareno go fodi obedo aparan; aka otimo nyacwo gi jomitirok pere Joasiria, jolweny.
Jobedo jolweny ma joruko nanga manyabululu, jogavana kodi jomituka, joje yac maŋon, ma jogwey kayinin.
Go otimo malaya gi jotel pa jolweny je ma Asiria, aka nyacwo pere omiyo go kocirok gi lamo calin ma Asiria.
Go omedere gi gima go oyido otieko cako paka malaya, kama go otim'iye cot. Wok i nyako pere, cwo jonindo gine aka jotero go paka malaya.
Riameno amiyo go i cingi jomitirok pere, i cingi Joasiria ma go omito swa.
Jolunyo go kinyoro, jomako wote kodi nyiki go, to joneko go g'abor. Omiy go gir'acula, aka mon kisi kamoro joluwo nyingi go.
Nyamin go Oholiba oneno gime, kucel go otimere marac loyo go i timo malaya kodi nyacwo.
Go otimo nyacwo ri jogavana kodi jomituka, jolweny ma joruko nanga ma lweny, jogwey kayina, yac maŋon no je.
Aneno nike go okocere, jario joluwo yo acel.
Go omedere gi malaya pere. Oholiba owanya calin pa jotel pa jolweny ma Babilon m'ogor i kor ot m'owir gi rangi m'obokere,
gi thondhe i pier jo kodi jungin maŋon i wi jo. Joje jocale jotel pa jolweny, calin pa Jobabilon ma piny pajo obedo Kaldeya.
Tekin go neno jo, owanya jo to oro jomikwenda bongi jo i Babilon.
Jobabilon jobino to jonindo gi go, aka jokoco go swa gi malaya pajo ma rumacen go ojok gi jo.
Go onyuthere kamaler to miyo kisi dhano je ŋeyo nike go obedo malaya. Ajok gi go paka oyido ajok gi nyamin go.
Kucel go omedere timo malaya loyo, timirok paka munyo go fodi obedo nyako, munyo go obedo malaya i Misir.
Go opoŋ g'awanya ri cwo ma jobedo nyamon, m'oyido jojayo paka punde kodi kayinin.
Ameno iwanya medirok gi kidakana perin manyako munyo oyido initie i Misir, kama cwo jotuko gi thundho perin t'itimo cot.
Riameno, awi Oholiba, Rwoth Were waco ama: Alamiyo jomitirok perin m'ijok gi jo mako nge kodin aka alakelo jo monjin thoko iye je.
Jobabilon, Jokaldin je, Pekod kodi Sowa kodi Kowa kodi ji je ma Asiria kanyacel gi yac maŋon, jogavana kodi jotel pa jolweny, joje jogwey kayinin.
Jolamonjin wok yumalo, gi jolweny kweth gi cawilin kodi gilweny. Jolaumere gi kwote kodi jungin, jolathokin, aka alamiyin i cingi jo to jothumo rin banja luwo kwoŋ cik pajo.
Alamako kodin nyeko, aka jolatic kodin i keme. Jolacoto umin kodi ithin, aka ji perin m'odoŋ jolaneko g'abor. Jolakadho gi wotin kodi nyithindho perin manyir, aka jolawaŋo jom'odoŋ gi mac.
Jolayeco nangin perin to jokwanyo thiwino perin.
Alacowo nyacwo perin kodi kidakana perin m'itieko timo wok cuka ibedi i Misir. Ikilaneno kendo calin kosa poyo Misir.
Kole Rwoth Were waco ama: Alamiyin i cingi ji m'idak aka ijok gi jo.
Jolatic kodin gi dakirok, jolatero lim je m'itieko tiyo rigo to joweyin kinyoro aka nono. Jolathango kinyoro perin kodi malaya perin kodi nyacwo perin.
Timo malaya gi nonin, kodi kocirok gi calin pajo, am'okelo rin gime.
Itieko luwo yo pa nyamin in, ameno alamiyin madho kikopo ma gir'acula acel.
Rwoth Were waco ama:
Ibino madho agwata pa nyamin in,
luth aka lac;
ilanyerin t'icayin,
otiŋo mathoth.
Ilapoŋin gi mero kodi kumo.
Kikopo ma lworo kodi kisika,
m'obedo kikopo pa nyamin in Samaria.
Ilamadho t'itieko gima nitie iye,
aka ilabaro thundho perin,
gi ŋinjeŋinje mere;
kole atieko luwo, Rwoth Were waco.
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Rupiri wiy win owil kodan aka wiwitan yuŋey win, onyo biel win gim'owok i kinyoro mewin gi malaya mewin.
Rwoth owaco ran ama: Wod dhano, ilathumo banja ri Ohola kodi Oholiba? Kenyo ituci rijo kamaler tim pajo mar'amien.
Kole jotieko timo cot, aka remo nitie i cingi jo; jotieko timo cot gi cal pajo; aka jotieko kiri miyo jo nyithindho pajo ma jonywolo ran paka cemo.
Medo kwoŋ meno jotieko koco kamaleŋ paran i ndelo acel no won to jokoco sabato paran.
Kole munyo jotieko yaŋo nyithindho pajo ri cal, i ndelo acel no won, jobino i kamaleŋ paran ma koco. Me a gima jotimo i ot paran.
Jolwoŋo kiri cwo jowobin wok bor, m'odhir rijo jamikwenda, to jobino. Ilwokere rijo, igoyo rangi i waŋin, t'iloko kwoŋin maŋon gi thiwino.
Ibedo i wi kom ma dwoŋo, gi meza m'oyare ruwaŋe m'iketho i wiye buban paran gi mo paran.
Dwondi lwak ma kidew oyido jothoko nyano, gi kitipa pa cwo m'okel wok i thim. Joketho amindin i cingi mon kodi Sangarin maŋon i wiy jo.
Kenyo t'awaco ni, Aha, go olocere gi timo ma cot, to pama go nyalo medirok gi timo malaya pere.
Kucel jotieko donjo kwoŋe, paka cwo jodonjo kwoŋ malaya. Ameno apaka jodonjo i iy Ohola kodi Oholiba, mon ma cot oloyo kor jo.
To jothum banja ma jotiro jolathumo banja loyo jo ro cot kodi oyo remo; rupiri jobedo mon ma jotimi cot aka remo nitie i cingi jo.
Kole Rwoth Were waco ama: “Keli cokirok jowopusa jo, jowoloki jo gi lworo kodi gikinyaga.
Cokirok no lagoyo jo gi telin to joyaŋo jo g'abor pajo; jobino neko nyithindho pajo, to jowaŋo woko udi pajo.
Ameno apaka abino cowo awanya ma timo cot i piny, ŋey mon je jowonyal gwokirok to jobedo ma jok'otimo cot kendo paka witieko timo.
Aka win nyimere ario, ji jolamiyo win gir'acula ro cot mewin, wilabielo gir'acula ro reco mewin ma cot; aka wibino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth Were.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran k'apar ma dwe mar'apar i oro mar'abuŋwen:
Wod dhano, ndiki piny nyingi ndelo me, rupiri me a ndelo ma kere ma Babilon cak'iye thoko ma mako Yerusalem.
Waci ageca me ri ji paran ma jogwenyirok aka iwaci rijo ni, Rwoth Were waco ama:
Jengi dak i mac,
aka ikonji pi i iye bende.
Coki muma riŋo, kisi mabeyo je,
ma eme kodi mar'aŋakin;
ipoŋ gi cokin mabeyo swa.
Or riŋo ma rombo mayom;
idhuri kasike i pende.
Weyi pi wowal;
itedi cokin gi riŋo i iye.
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Kidamba ri tindi madwoŋ pa jonek! Dak manitie gi nyal i iye, aka nyal mere kirum. Muma muma ma ringo i fudh'iye, m'ongoye ma weyi.
Kole remo ma tindi madwoŋ me ooyo nitie i iye; go oketho go i tele m'othangere; go k'okonjo piny ma umo gi lowo.
Ma guro keme paran, ma culo kwor, atieko ketho remo ma go ooyo i wi tele m'othangere ŋey okir wonyali umirok.
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Kidamba ri tindi madwoŋ pa jonek! Alaloko bende kidhur mere madwoŋ.
Amedi yen, amoki mac; atedi riŋo maber, aruwi mbinzar i iye, t'aweyo cokin waŋ.
Jengi go nono i wi cuk mac ŋey wonyali lokirok malieth, nyweny mere woleny i iye to nyal mere ngoye.
Atieko pilok manono; nyal mere m'opoto kilony, doŋ i mac kiri gi nyal mere.
Kucel munyo alonyin i koco perin ma kidakana, ikilokere m'olony i kidakana perin; aka ik'olony kendo cuka anoculi kwoŋin nge paran je.
An Rwoth atieko luwo; hongo bino, alatimo gimoro. Ak'owey, akilabedo gi wor aka ak'obedi gi kisa. Cungo kwoŋ yo mewin gi tim mewin alathumo riwin banja, Rwoth Were ama luwo.
Rwoth oluwo kodan ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, g'adol acel acegin mayin ŋat'imaro tektek. Kucel ikiripi ywak kosa biyo pigi waŋin.
Uja nyaliŋliŋ; Ikir'iywak jom'otho. Boy wiyin, aka iruki war perin i tiendin; ikiripi umo yer dhokin ma malo kosa icami cemo ma joywak jocamo.
Aluwo gi ji odikin to dhako paran tho othieno. Odikin m'oluwo atimo paka ooran.
Kenyo ji jopenjan ni, “Inyalo waco riwan dwoŋ gigipiny me m'itimo riwan?”
T'adwoko jo ni, “Rwoth oluwo kodan to waco ran
waco ri Joisiraili ni Rwoth Were waco ama: Acegin koco kamaleŋ paran, kwoto ma meni mewin, yodirok ma waŋ win, kodi awanya ma cuny win; aka nyithindho mewin ma wiweyo i Yerusalem ilaneko jo.
Onyo wilatimo paka atieko timo. Wikiri wium yer tik win ma malo kosa wicam cemo ma joywak jocamo.
Wiripo boyo wiy win to wiruko war mewin; wikiripi ywak kosa biyo pigi waŋ win, to wiripo bolo gicen reco mewin, to widwanyere gi litho ri wadi win.”
Ameno Ezekiel labedo ranyuth riwin; wilatimo kisi gimoro je paka atieko timo. Ka gime otimere, nyaka to wiŋeyo ni Abedo Rwoth Were.
Aka in, wod dhano, i ndelo m'anokwany kwoŋ jo cel pajo m'otinda, yom cuny gi dwoŋ pajo, yodirok ma waŋ jo kodi kwoto pajo, kodi nyithindho pajo,
i ndelo no ŋat'okwale bino dwoko bongi win to waco riwin kwoŋe.
I ndelo no dhok win bino ŋamere ri ŋat'okwale, wilaluwo m'ongoye ŋat'oliŋ. Wilabedo rijo ranyuth; aka jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Wod dhano, com waŋin kwoŋ Joamon aka ituci wac Were kwoŋ jo.
Waci rijo ama: Winji win wac pa Rwoth. Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo winyero ot paran munyo okoc, kodi kwoŋ piny Isiraili munyo ojwangi, kodi kwoŋ Joyuda munyo jokidho i piny man.
Kwoŋbedo wisangala, onyo aketho win i cingi nonin ma yuwok ceŋ wibedi apajo. Jolaketho kambin pajo i dier win to jobedo kenyo. Jolacamo olemo mewin to jomadho cak mewin.
Alaloko Raba kakwath ri ŋamin kodi Amon wobedi kaywomirok pa mwendi. Nyaka to wiŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Kole Rwoth Were waco ama: Rupiri wigoyo adhoŋ aka wigoyo mayindo to wifore gi ŋol pier je manitie i win kwoŋ piny ma Isiraili,
riameno atieko yaro cingan kwoŋ win, aka alakijala win paka gim'onyaga ri nonin. Alapoko win kwoŋ ji aka alamiyo wisika wok i piny; alareyo win woko. Nyaka to wiŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
riameno acegin yawo badi Mowab kwoŋ tindin madongo wok i kew mere, ŋono ma piny ma Bethyesimoth, Bal Meyon, kodi Kiriathayim.
Alamiyo joje kanyacel gi Amon ri ji ma yuwok ceŋ paka gipajo. Ameno Amon kendo k'oŋeyere i dier nonin.
Alathumo banja kwoŋ Mowab, aka jolaŋeyo nike An Abedo Rwoth.
riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Alarieyo cingan kwoŋ Edom, t'apoko go gi ji kodi ogwaŋe, t'ajwango go, wok i tindin madongo Teman tundo kiri Dedan ilaneko woko ji mere.
Alaketho culo kwor paran kwoŋ Edom gi cingi ji paran Isiraili; aka jolatic kwoŋ Edom cungo kwoŋ keme paran. Jolaŋeyo culo kwor paran, apaka Rwoth Were waco.
riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Alarieyo cingan kwoŋ Jofilistia, alaneko woko Jokereth, t'areyo woko jom'odoŋ ma thengi nam.
Alaculo kwor madwoŋ kwoŋ jo. Nyaka to joŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, t'ayimo kwor paran kwoŋ jo.
Wod dhano, rupiri ji ma Tire joluwo kwoŋ Yerusalem ni,
“Aha, waŋkac pa ji otur,
oyengere to yawere ran,
alalokere mabup,
paka onyo otieko nyekere.”
Riameno Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
Neni, adakin, awi Tire!
Alakelo kwoŋin nonin kweth ma monjin, aka jolabino paka asur ma nam.
Jolareyo woko kor udi ma Tire
to joturo piny acurcur mere.
Alagweno lowo mere wok kwoŋe,
t'aloko go tele m'othangere.
Lalokere kayaro bwo ma ciko i dier nam.
Atieko luwo, Rwoth Were waco.
Lalokere gikinyaga ri nonin.
Nyithindho mere manyir ma jobedo i piny ilaneko jo g'abor. Nyaka to joŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Kole Rwoth Were waco ama: Alakelo kwoŋ Tire wok yumalo kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon, kere pa kerin, kanyacel gi kayinin, cawilin, kodi ji kweth ma jokwaŋo go.
Nyir mewin ma piny,
go laneko g'abor.
Go lathokin ma makin,
to geto cel matek kwoŋin.
Jolaoro wot rombo pajo ma jokwinyo guro kor udi mewin,
to joturo piny acurcur mewin gi nywenye pajo.
Kayin pere jolamore
ma fukefuke pajo laumo win.
Kor udi mewin won layengere,
ro derino pa cwo pajo ma jogweyo lipangalin gi cawilin,
ka go odonji i waŋkace mewin,
paka jono ma jodonjo i tindi madwoŋ m'otur.
Gi par tiendi kayinin pere
go lanyono royin mewin je.
Go laneko ji mewin je g'abor,
aka sirin mewin matek lanyoy piny.
Jolakinyaga lim mewin,
to jojowo gigipiny mewin kicar.
Jolaturo piny kor udi mewin,
to joturo piny udi mewin ma kacuny win.
Telin mewin gi mbawin kodi fukefuke mewin
jolakonjo i pi.
aka dwondi tongolin mewin k'owinjere kendo.
Alaloko win tele ma lwanda,
wilabedo kam'iyar'iye bwo.
K'ogeti win kendo,
kole An Rwoth atieko luwo,
Rwoth Were waco.
Rwoth Were waco ama ri Tire: Thengi nam k'oyengere i derino ma podho perin, ka joma jolimo litho jodwanyere i litho, ka nekirok medere i dier win?
Kenyo jodhum je ma nam jolaweyo kombere pajo ma dhum; jolalunyo lwodo pajo gi nangin pajo makicin. Ilaruko jo gi kirin to jobedo i lowo. Jolakirin kisi hongo, to jobwok tektek kwoŋ win.
Jolagoyo ndur kwoŋ win, to jowaco riwin ni,
“Ileny nedi awi tindi madwoŋ wok i name,
awi tindi madwoŋ m'oŋeyere,
ma cango oyido nigi meni kwoŋ nam,
in kodi joma bedo i in,
ma jokelo lworo,
kwoŋ jopiny mere je!
Onyo kigodin ma pi kirin,
i ndelo perin ma podho;
kigodin ma jonitie i nam,
rupiri wiwok woko.”
Kole Rwoth Were waco ama: K'atieko lokin tindi madwoŋ m'othangere, paka tindin madongo ma kibed'iye, k'anokel pi madwoŋ ma lamwonyin,

aladhiro win yupiny gi jono ma jotieko loro piny i bur, bongi ji macene. Alamiyo wibedi i pendi piny, paka piny m'ojwangi wok cene, kanyacel gi jono ma jokidho i bur, ŋey wokiri wobedi i in, t'atero ŋono perin i piny pa jomakwo.
Alamiyin lworo ma kiwacere, aka doko ik'obedi, kad'orangin, k'onwaŋin kendo. Rwoth Were ama luwo.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, goy ndur kwoŋ Tire,
aka iwaci rigo, go ma bedo i waŋkac ma nam, jamitan pa ji i kigodin kweth, Rwoth Were waco ama:
Awi Tire, itieko waco ni,
“Aŋon ma kiwacere.”
Kewin perin jonitie i cuny name,
joma jogeto in joyikin maŋon.
Jooro mbawin yen mafoth wok i got Hamon;
to jokwanyo mbawin ma yath sida wok Lebanon
ma timo rin acurcur m'ilang'iye gigipiny.
Wok kwoŋ olwace ma Basan
jotimo alith kwon ma cewo ye perin;
jotimo pendi ye perin,
gi mbawo ma yath payin m'owok i kigodin ma pi ma Sipro,
t'iloko maŋon gi lak liec.
Nanga ma mako koyo i ye perin, okwoy
gi law mafoth maŋon m'owok Misir.
Oyido nenere gi bor,
manyabululu g'ariŋo wok i kigodin ma Elisa,
oyido obedo gima umin.
Jopiny ma Sidon kodi Arivad,
am'oyido jogweyin;
cwo perin ma jondijo ma jowok Tire m'oyido jonitie kodin,
am'oyido jogweyin.
Jodongo ma Gebal kodi jorieko mere oyido jonitie kodin,
am'oyido joyiko mele perin m'onyekere je.
Jogwey mele je m'oyido jonitie kodin,
oyido jonyewere,
bongi jomitan perin.
Jolweny ma jowok Pasia, Lud kodi Libia,
jotiyo i lweny perin.
Joliero kwot pajo gi jungin pajo
to jomiyin dwoŋ.
Jokur perin jowok,
Arivad kodi Silisia,
aka jolweny ma jowok Gamad,
jokuro acurcur perin.
Gi kwote pajo,
m'olier i kor udi perin thoko,
ŋono mewin otundo i kare.
Tarsis otimo kodin mitan wok kwoŋ ŋaŋo perin ma kiwacere; feza, nyweny, nyweny mayom, kodi nyweny ma timo waya ma mac ma jowilo gine lim mewin.
Yavan, Tubal kodi Mesek jotimo kodin mitan; jomiyo win ji pajo g'atewe ma nywenye pajo t'imiyo jo gigipiny perin ma mitan.
Itana lim perin ri kayinin ma tic, kayinin ma lweny kodi punde wok Bethtogarma.
Nyikway Dedan jotimo kodin mitan. Ji ma kigodin kweth jomiyin lak liec kodi mbawin ma welo t'imiyo jo gigipiny mewin.
Ji ma Edom jotimo kodin mitan kwoŋbedo wiŋaŋ, jokelo rin tele ma welo m'oruwo rangi, nanga ariŋo, nanga makicin, law mafoth, nyamicungwa kodi tele ma welo.
Yuda kodi piny Isiraili jotimo mitan kodin; jowilo lim mewin gi ŋano m'owok Minith, kal, mo kic, mo oliv kodi binzar.
Damasiko otimo mitan kodin ri lim perin kweth kwoŋbedo ŋaŋo perin ma kiwacere ma nger gi nger, vini ma Helbon, kodi yer rombo matar.
Vedan kodi Yavan wok Uzal jodonjo i mitan ri nywenye perin; jokelo nyweny, binzar, kodi niaŋ mamit owil gi lim perin.
Dedan otimo kodin mitan ma nangin ma kwot m'otimi ma gweco.
Piny pa Jowarabu kodi wot kerin ma Keba a jom'oyido imaro loyo i timo mitan i rombo gi diegi; jome je jotimo mitan kodin.
Jomitan ma Seba kodi Rama jotimo mitan kodin; jowilo nywenye perin mabeyo kodi binzar perin maber loyo ma nger je, kodi telin ma welo, kodi zahabu.
Haran, Kane, Eden, jomitan ma Seba, Asur, kodi Kilimad je jotimo kodin mitan.
Jome jotimo kodin mitan i nangin m'oyer ayera, i nangin manyabululu gi m'otimi makicin, kodi i kapet ma rangi m'oruwere, m'otwey gi dende t'iyiko maber; i gime jotimo kodin mitan.
Mele ma Tarsis jowotho riwin i mitan mewin.
Ameno apaka opoŋin t'ilokere mapek,
i pal cuny name.
Jocewin, jotieko kelin i pi madongo.
Koyo ma yuwok ceŋ otieko turin
i cuny name.
Ŋaŋo perin, nywenye perin, lim perin,
jobuk pi perin kodi jogeto perin,
jomwon kama modho, joma tiyo rin lim,
kodi jolweny perin je ma jonitie kodin,
kodi jono je ma jonitie kodin,
munyere win i cuny name,
i ndelo mewin ma rerok.
Derino pa jogwey ye ma jomunyere,
winjere gi coŋino.
Kisi ye mogo je onyo ojwangi,
aka kisi jagwey mogo je otieko kadho i coŋino.
Joywak gi geregere swa rin,
joywoyo buru i wi jo to joŋindere i buru.
Jocido woko wi jo rin,
to joruko kutiya.
Cuny jo ŋedhere ka jobiyo pigi waŋ jo.
I litho pajo, jowero wer ajore rin ama:
Tire, oyido iŋat'idwoŋ loyo,
tindin madongo man je.
To pama onyo iŋare m'iliŋ nisi
i pendi nam.
Munyo lim perin obino wok i name,
i yeŋo ji kweth;
gi ŋaŋo perin ma kiwacere kodi lim perin
iŋaŋo kerin ma piny.
Onyo pama nam joturin,
i pendi pi;
lim perin kodi ji perin je
jotieko munyere i pi kodin.
Joma jobedo i kigodin je
jodhier kwoŋin;
aka kerin pajo lworo omako jo swa,
nyim jo ojony.
Jomitan i dier ji jocayin;
itieko tundo i gike marac ma kiwacere,
aka doko ik'onen cil gi cil.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, wac ri jadhum ma Tire ni, Rwoth Were waco ama:
Kwoŋbedo cunyin opoŋ noro,
aka iwaco ni, “Abedo were,
abedo i kabedo pa werin,
i cuny name.”
Kucel ibedo nyaka dhano, makiweno were,
makada nende ipima paro perin,
gi paro pa were.
Adieri, iriek loyo Daniel,
ongoye nyaliŋliŋ m'opanere kwoŋin.
Gi rieko perin kodi niaŋ perin,
iwada lim ri in won,
aka icoko zahabu gi feza,
i kakan perin.
Gi rieko perin madwoŋ i mitan,
itieko medo lim perin,
aka cunyin opoŋ gi noro i lim perin.
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama:
Kwoŋbedo ipima rieko perin,
gi rieko pa were,
alakelo jopath kwoŋin,
nonin ma jomaker.
Jolacelo abor pajo kwoŋ rieko perin maŋon,
aka jolakoco ŋono perin.
Jolarwakin piny i bur,
aka ilatho, tho malith swa,
i cuny nam.
Adieri inowaci kendo ni, “Abedo were.”
Ruwaŋ jonek perin,
makada nende ibedo nyaka dhano, makiweno were,
i cingi jono ma jocwowin?
Ilatho paka joma bu Were,
gi cingi jopath,
kole atieko luwo, Rwoth Were waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, tiŋi ywak malo kwoŋ kere ma Tire, aka iwaci rigo ni, Rwoth Were waco ama:
In iŋat'oyido ibedo gir'anena,
m'ipoŋ gi rieko kodi ŋono ma kakare.
Oyido initie i Eden, ndelo pa Were,
kisi tele ma welo oyido obedo gium perin.
Tele m'obokere obokere, tele manyatongweno, tele manyaboke pendi,
tele manyarangi zahabu, tele manyarangi nam, kodi tele m'obokere.
Tele matek swa manyabululu, tele manyabululu,
kodi tele manyarangi ariŋo.
Okedi jo m'ocanere gi zahabu,
i ndelo m'ocweyin'iye.
Gi kerub m'owir gi mo paka jakur perin,
akethin wi got maleŋ pa Were,
aka iwotho i dier telin ma mac.
Oyido ingoye g'apuse i yo perin,
wok i ndelo m'ocweyin'iye,
cuka reco onwaŋere i in.
I thotho ma mitan perin,
ipoŋ g'akaka, aka itimo reco.
Riameno ariemin woko paka gimakoc wok i got pa Were,
aka kerubim m'oyido kurin oriemin woko,
wok i dier telin ma mac.
Cunyin opoŋ gi noro kwoŋbedo ŋono perin,
iduwo rieko perin ro ŋono perin.
Abolin piny,
athangin ruwaŋ kerin,
jowonenin.
Gi reco perin mathoth,
i mitan perin ma k'otire,
ikoco woko kalamo perin.
Ameno acwinyo mac i in won,
oreyin woko,
aka alokin buru i lowo,
ruwaŋ jono je ma jonenin.
Jono je m'oyido joŋeyin i dier nonin,
jouro kwoŋin,
itieko lokere gidhier,
aka ikilaneno kendo kicutho.
Wod dhano, com waŋin yu Sidon, aka ituci wac Were kwoŋe.
Waci ni, Rwoth Were waco ama:
Acomere kodin, awi Sidon,
aka alalimo dwoŋ i dier in,
ji jolaŋeyo ni An abedo Rwoth,
k'athumo banja i iye,
t'anyutho leŋo paran.
Aladhiro i iye two nundu,
kodi neki i royin mere,
jom'otho jolapodho i diere,
g'abor m'ilalweny gine i kisi thenge,
aka ji jolaŋeyo ni An abedo Rwoth.
Ot pa Isiraili kilanwaŋo kendo kudho ma cwowo jo malith i dier jono m'oyido jocayo jo, aka jolaŋeyo ni An abedo Rwoth Were.
Rwoth Were waco ama: K'atieko coko ot pa Isiraili wok i dier nonin kama jokedher'iye, t'anyutho leŋo paran i jo ruwaŋ nonin, kenyo jolabedo i lowo pajo wegi m'amiyo ŋeca paran Yakobo.
Jolabed'iye i siem, jolageto udi to jopidho ndelin vini. Jolabedo i siem i iye, k'athumo banja kwoŋ jono ma jocayo jo thoko jo. Kenyo jolaŋeyo ni An abedo Rwoth, Were pajo.
Wod dhano, com waŋin kwoŋ Farawo, kere ma Misir, aka ituci wac Were kwoŋ go kodi Misir gibe.
Luw, aka iwaci ni, Rwoth Were waco ama:
Acomere kodin,
awi Farawo kere ma Misir,
bulir madwoŋ ma nam,
ma bedo i dier jangi Nayil,
ka waco ni, “Nayil obedo aparan won,
an aŋat'atimo.”
Alaketho i dingin siraget,
aka alamiyo rec ma jangin moko kwoŋ magambala perin.
Alawodhin malo wok i jangin,
gi rec je ma jangin,
ka jomoko kwoŋ magambala perin.
Alajwangin i thim,
in kodi rec je ma jangin,
wilapodho kam'othangere,
aka kilaomo win kosa coko win.
Atieko miyin paka cemo,
ri ogwaŋe ma piny kodi winyin ma koyo.
jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth,
kwoŋbedo oyido ibedo luth midole,
ri ot pa Isiraili.
Munyo jomako win gi cingi jo, wituro woko,
aka wijako badi jo.
Munyo jogoŋere kwoŋ win, wituro woko,
to wilwogo bam jo.
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Alakelo abor kwoŋ win, aka alaneko woko ji kodi ogwaŋe.
Lowo ma Misir lalokere kam'ojwangere. Kenyo jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Kwoŋbedo iwaco ni, “Nayil obedo aparan, aka an aŋat'atimo.”
Riameno acomere kodin, kodi jangin, aka alaloko lowo ma Misir gunda, wok i Migdol tundo kiri i Siyene bor kiri i kew gi Ethopiya.
Ongoye dhano kosa ogwaŋ ma laluw'iye, labedo m'ojwangere ma oro piero aŋwen.
Alamiyo lowo ma Misir bedo m'othangere kwoŋ lowo je kodi tindin madongo pere doŋ gundin loyo tindin madongo je ma oro piero aŋwen.
Rwoth Were waco ama: I cowe ma oro piero aŋwen, alacoko Jomisir kama jokedher'iye i dier nonin koro.
Aladwoko lim pa Misir, t'adwoko jo i lowo ma Pathiros, kama jowok'iye, aka jolabedo ker mamwol.
Misir labedo ker mamwol loyo kerin je, ma jokilatiŋere malo kendo kwoŋ nonin man. Alamiyo jo bedo masisiri ma jokiladhumo i dier nonin.
Isiraili kilagoŋere kwoŋ Misir kendo ri kony. Adieri ka Joisiraili jopoy gim'otimere ri Jomisir, jolaŋeyo komo pajo i rango kony wok bongi win, aka ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Wac pa Rwoth obino k'acel ma dwe marapena i oro ma piero ario g'ario ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, kere ma Babilon omonjo Tire. Go miyo jolweny pere kinyaga i thotho ma wic jo olokere pata to badi jo lwogere, kucel kere kosa jolweny pere jok'olimo magowa ma olo pajo.
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Neni ee, acegin miyo Nebukadineza kere ma Babilon lowo ma Misir. Go lamonjo to nyaga woko lim ma Misir paka cul pa jolweny pere.
Amiyo go cul pere m'otiyo rigo. Atieko miyo go lowo ma Misir kwoŋbedo jotiyo ran, Rwoth Were waco.
I ndelo no, alamiyo Joisiraili bedo matek, aka alalokin jaluwo pajo. Kenyo Joisiraili jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, tuci wac Were aka iwaci ni Rwoth Were waco ama.
Koki ni kidamba, kole ndelo otundo!
Kole ndelo orikere,
ndelo pa Rwoth cegin,
labedo ndelo ma pondeponde,
hongo ma kisika ri nonin.
Lweny labedo i Misir,
aka litho madwoŋ labedo i Ethopiya.
K'ineko ji i Misir,
t'itiŋo woko lim pere,
t'ituro woko misingi mere.
Ji ma Ethopiya kodi Put,
Ji ma Lud kodi jopath je ma Libia,
kodi ji ma piny ma jotimo cikirok,
jolatho g'abor.
Rwoth Were waco ama:
Jono ma jothielo Misir jolatho,
kodi noro ma meni pere;
wok i Migdol tundo i Siyene,
ji jolatho i iye g'abor,
Rwoth Were waco.
Jolajwangere i dier piny ma jothangere,
tindin madongo pajo ladoŋ gundin,
i dier tindin madongo man ma jodoŋ gundin.
Kenyo jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth,
k'anocwiny mac i Misir,
to jokony pere je jotho.
I ndelo no, aladhiro jomikwenda i mele bwoko Joethopiya ma jokuya, aka litho lapodho kwoŋ jo i ndelo ma kisika pa Misir. Kole eno bino.
Rwoth Were waco ama:
Alareyo woko woy pa ji ma Misir,
gi cingi Kere Nebukadineza ma Babilon.
Go kodi ji pere,
nono ma jogway loyo,
ilakelo jo reyo woko lowo,
aka jolacelo abor pajo kwoŋ Misir,
to jopoŋo piny gi jom'otho.
Alathwo woko Nayil,
t'atana lowo i cingi jokidakana.
Alareyo woko lowo kodi gima nitie i iye je,
gi cingi jopath,
An Rwoth atieko luwo.
Rwoth Were waco ama:
Alareyo woko calin,
t'acowo woko calin ma bukony i Memfis.
Kendo kilabedo jadhum i lowo ma Misir,
i nger no alaketho lworo i lowo ma Misir.
Alareyo woko Pathiros,
aka alacwinyo mac i Zowan,
t'athumo banja ri tindi madwoŋ Thebes.
Alakonjo keme paran kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ Sin,
kapondo pa Misir,
aka alareyo woko woy pa ji ma Thebes.
Alacwinyo mac i Misir,
aka Sin labedo i kumo madwoŋ adieri.
Thebes latur woko,
aka jolaromo gi jokwor ma Memfis odieceŋ.
Yac ma Pibeseth jolatho g'abor,
aka tindin madongo jolakadho i twec.
Mudho labedo odieceŋ i Tehafinehes,
k'anotur kenyo dhum pa Misir,
aka meni ma noro pere larumo.
Pondeponde laumo tindi madwoŋ,
aka ilatero ji mere i twec.
Alathumo banja i Misir,
aka jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
K'ario ma dwe marapena, i oro mar'apar g'acel, wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, atieko turo woko badi kere ma Misir. Neni k'otwey ni wocangi kosa ni wolokere matek ma mako abor.
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama: Neni ee, amon gi kere ma Misir, aka alaturo woko bade je, bade matek kodi m'aturo, aka alamiyo abor wopodhi wok i cinge.
Alakedho woko Jomisir i dier nonin, aka alaywoyo jo i dier piny.
Alaloko matek badi kere ma Babilon, aka alaketho abor paran i cinge. To alaturo woko badi kere ma Misir aka go lakiuja ruwaŋ kere ma Babilon paka ŋat'omiy litho swa.
Alaloko badi kere ma Babilon matek, to alaturo woko badi kere ma Misir. Kenyo jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth. Alaketho abor paran i cingi kere ma Babilon, aka go lacelo kwoŋ lowo ma Misir.
Alakedho woko Jomisir i dier nonin, t'aywoyo jo i dier piny. Kenyo jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
K'acel ma dwe mar'adek i oro mar'apar g'acel ma twec mawan, wac pa Rwoth obino ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, wac ri Farawo kere ma Misir kodi ji pere je ama:
Ŋa m'ical gine i dwoŋ!
Par kwoŋ Asiria, m'oyido cal yath sida i Lebanon,
gi jange maŋon, kodi lul ma timo tipo,
mabor swa tundo i polo.
Pi omiyo yath no dongo,
aka pi ma malawa omiyo go cemo.
Riameno odongo mabor,
loyo yen je madudi.
Jange mere odongo m'oyare mabor.
Winyin ma pendi polo je,
jogeto od gin i jange.
Ogwaŋe madudi je jonywol i tiende,
aka nonin madongo je jobedo i tipo mere.
Yath oyido ŋon i dwoŋo mere,
i boro ma jange mere.
Fuc mere oroc piny,
i pi mathoth.
kosa kada yath m'odongo mabor kirom gine.
Yen maboyo ma boke mere pando oyido josisiri kwoŋ jange.
Ongoye yath i ndelo pa Were,
m'oyido cal gi ŋono mere.
Atimo maŋon gi jange kweth.
Yen je ma ndelo Eden, ndelo pa Were
jomako gine nyeko.
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo odongo to jange cwayo maboyo, oketho noro i boro pere.
Alamiyo jo i cingi jadhum pa nonin, aka adieri go latimo rigo gima ripo gi kidakana pere. Atieko bolo woko.
Jopath ma jowok i nonin ma joger swa jolatoŋo woko to joweyo. Jange lapodho wi gote gi milelin je, aka kasike mere lariere i kisi pi ma piny. Nonin je ma piny joeye woko i tipo mere aka jojwango.
Winyin jogeto i kore m'otur, aka ogwaŋe madudi jonindo i jange mere.
Gime je obedo ŋey wongoye yen ma jodongo i thengi pi ma wodoŋ mabor swa kosa withe wotundi i pondeponde. Kole joje joripo tho, kadho piny i lowo, kanyacel gi ji, gi jono ma jokadho piny i Bur.
Rwoth Were waco ama: I ndelo ma yath no okadho i piny pa jom'otho, aumo piny i lutho. Acego malawin mere, aka pi mere ocule. Akelo mudho i Lebanon, aka yen je ma lul jothwo kwoŋbedo yath no.
Amiyo nonin kirin ro derino ma podho pere munyo akelo i piny pa jom'otho kanyacel gi joma kadho piny i Bur. Yen je ma ndelo Eden, maber loyo i Lebanon, ma jolimo pi maber, joyomo cuny gin i piny.
Jo bende jokadho i piny pa jom'otho kanyacel gine, bongi jono m'oneki jo g'abor, kanyacel gi jokony pere, jono ma jobedo i tipo mere i dier nonin.

Yath mene kwoŋ yen ma ndelo Eden m'oyido cal kodin i dwoŋ kodi meni? Onyo pama ilapodho kanyacel gi yen ma ndelo Eden i lowo piny. Ilariere piny kanyacel gi ji ma jok'othumere, ji m'oneki g'abor. Meno Farawo kodi ji pere je, Rwoth Were waco.
K'acel ma dwe mar'apar g'ario i oro mar'apar g'ario, wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Wod dhano, maki kumo kwoŋ Farawo kere ma Misir, aka iwaci rigo ama:
Iparo ni ibedo simbwor i dier nonin,
t'icalo kodi bulir i name;
iyare i pi perin ma mol,
icando pi gi tiendin,
t'iduwo pi perin ma mol.
Rwoth Were waco ama:
I kacokirok pa ji kweth,
alabolo katimba paran kwoŋin;
aka ilaywayin i katimba paran.
Alafodin piny,
alabolin i kisawe m'oŋamere,
Alamiyo winyin je ma koyo jowopie kwoŋin,
aka alaweyo ogwaŋe mager ma piny gipi jowopidhere kodin.
Alaketho del perin wi gote,
t'apoŋo milelo gi mulambo perin.
Alapoŋo piny gi remo perin ma mol
tundo wi gote,
aka jwombe jolapoŋ kodin.
t'aloko micalin pajo m'ocido;
alaumo waŋceŋ gi pondeponde,
aka dwe k'oliel.
