Lero je ma polo,
alaloko mudho i wiyin,
t'aketho mudho i piny perin.
Alaŋedho cuny ji mathoth,
k'akelo win paka jotwec i dier nonin,
i piny ma fodi wikuya.
Alamiyo ji mathoth jowodhier kwoŋ win;
kerin pajo jolakirin kwoŋbedo win.
K'anowiti abor paran ruwaŋ jo,
jobino kirin kisi hongo
ro kwo pajo, kisi acel acele,
i ndelo m'ilapodh'iye piny.
Kole Rwoth Were waco ama:
Abor pa kere ma Babilon bino kwoŋin.
Alamiyo lwak perin wopodhi,
g'abor pa jolweny apondi,
joje ma jobedo joma kiwacere i dier nonin.
Jolaloko gundin delok pa Misir,
aka Lwak pere je bino rere woko.
Alareyo woko mwendi pajo
wok i thengi pi kweth;
aka ongoye par tiendi dhano ma doko bino cando jo,
ongoye par tiendi dhok m'ocandi jo.
Kenyo nyaka alaloko pi pajo m'olony,
t'amiyo jwombe pajo ma mol womol paka mo, Rwoth Were waco.
K'anojwangi piny ma Misir
t'iwaro woko kisi gimoro je ma umo piny,
k'anorwadhi piny jono je ma jobed'iye,
nyaka jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Me kumo; ibino wero.
Mon pa nonin jolawero.
Jolawero kwoŋ Misir kodi lwak mere,
Rwoth Were waco.
I oro mar'apar g'ario, i dwe mar'acel k'apar g'abic, wac pa Rwoth obino ran:
Wod dhano, goy ndur kwoŋ Lwak ma Misir,
aka idhiri jo piny,
Misir kodi nyithindho manyir pa nonin ma jomeni,
i pendi piny
gi jono ma jokidho piny i bur.
Ipenji jo ni “Iloyo ŋa i ŋono?
Kadhi piny! Woyikin gi joma bu Were!”
Jobino podho i dier jono m'ineko jo g'abor. Otiek miyo Misir ri abor; tiŋi woko go kodi lwak mere.
Jotel ma jomeni jolaluwo kwoŋ jo, gi jokony pajo, wok i dier piny pa jom'otho. Jotieko bino piny, joŋare matek, joma bu Were m'oneki jo g'abor.
Asiria nitie kenyo, lwak pere je, kaliele pere je jothoko go, oneki joje, jopodho g'abor.
Ojengi kaliele pajo iy'adec mabor swa ma bur. Kitipa pere othoko kaliele mere, oneki joje, jopodho g'abor, jo ma jokelo lworo i piny pa jom'otho.

Elam nitie kenyo, kodi Lwak pere je thoko kaliele mere; oneki joje, jopodho g'abor, jo ma jokidho piny ma jok'othumere i pendi piny, jo ma jokelo lworo i piny pa jomakwo. Jobielo wickwot pajo gi jono ma jokidho piny i bur.

Jotieko loko Elam kitanda i dier jom'onek gi kweth mere je, kaliele pajo thoko, joje joma bu Were, m'oneki jo g'abor; rupiri lworo ma jokelo oyido olak i piny pa jomakwo, aka jobielo wickwot pajo gi jono ma jokidho piny i bur; iketho jo i dier jom'onek.
Mesek kodi Tubal jonitie kenyo, gi kweth pajo je, gi kaliele pajo thoko jo, joje joma bu Were m'oneki jo g'abor; rupiri jokelo lworo i piny pa jomakwo.

Jokiŋare gi jolweny apondi ma joma bu Were ma jokidho i piny pa jom'otho gi gilweny pajo, abore pajo m'oyido okethi i ŋut jo, jo ma reco pajo nitie i cokin pajo; rupiri lworo ma jolweny apondi jokelo oyido nitie i piny pa jomakwo.
Ilaturin t'iŋare i dier joma bu Were, gi jono m'ineko jo g'abor.
Edom nitie kenyo, kerin mere kodi wot kerin mere je, joma ro meni pajo je iyiko jo gi jono m'oneki jo g'abor; joŋare kodi joma bu Were, gi jono ma jokidho piny i bur.

Jodhum je ma yumalo jonitie kenyo, kodi Josidon je, ma jotieko kadho piny i wickwot gi jom'onek, ro lworo je ma jokelo gi meni pajo. Joŋare gi kafiri pajo gi jono m'ineko jo g'abor, to jobielo wickwot pajo gi jono ma jokidho piny i bur.
Ka Farawo onen jo, cunye bino kwe kwoŋbedo Lwak pere je, Farawo gi jolweny pere je, m'oneki jo g'abor, Rwoth Were waco.
Rupiri go onyayo lworo i piny pa jomakwo; riameno ibino yiko go i dier joma bu Were, gi jono m'ineko jo g'abor, Farawo kodi kweth pere je, Rwoth Were waco.
Rwoth owaco ran ni:
Wod dhano, luw gi ji perin, iwaci rijo ni, k'anokel abor kwoŋ piny no, to jopiny jodimo ŋati mogo kwoŋ jo paka jakur,
to ka ŋato oneno ka abor bino kwoŋ ji to kudho gwara ka gwoko ji;
kenyo ka ŋati mogo m'owinji dwondi gwara okwer gwokirok, t'abor bino to kwanyo ŋato woko, remo pere labedo i wiy go won.
Go owinjo dwondi gwara, to k'onyalo gwokirok, d'obotho kwo pere.
To ka jakur oneno abor bino, aka k'onyalo kudho gwara, to ji jobedo ma jok'ogwokere, t'abor tundo, to kwanyo mogo kwoŋ jo; ŋato kadho ro reco pere, to remo pere alakibanja kwoŋ jakur no.
Riameno, wod dhano, atieko lokin paka jakur ma ot pa Isiraili; kisi k'iwinjo wac ma wok i dhokan, iripo gwoko jo ma wok bongan.
K'iwaco ri jakidakana, a jakidakana me, adieri ilatho, t'ibedo ma ikigwoko jakidakana no wok i yo pere no, jakidakana no latho i reco pere to remo pere abino kibanja i cingin.
To k'igwoko jakidakana ni wowire wok i yo pere, to kwero wire i yo no, to tho i reco pere, to kareno itieko botho kwo perin.
Rwoth owaco ran ama: To in wod dhano wac ri ot pa Isiraili, witieko waco ama: “Kibenga mawan kodi reco joturo wan woko, aka onyo wanyekere kwoŋbedo jo. Onyo wanokwo nedi?”
Waci rijo ni, Paka akwo, Rwoth Were waco, angoye gi siem i tho pa jakidakana, to ni jakidakana wowire i yo pere marac to kwo. Wire wok i yo perin marac; raŋo iripo tho, awi ot pa Isiraili?

To in wod dhano, wac ri ji perin, ŋati ma jatiro kwoŋ jom'otire kilabotho jo ka jobenga; aka ri jakidakana maloyo jokidakana, k'omiy jo cer ka jowire wok i kidakana pajo, aka ŋat'otire k'onyal kwo gi tiro pajo ka jotimo reco.
Kad'awaco ri jom'otire ni adieri jolakwo, kucel ka go ogen'agena tiro pere to timo reco, ongoye tim ma tiro pajo m'ilapoyo; to i reco pajo ma jotieko timo, jolatho.
Odoko, kad'awaco ri jakidakana ni, “Adieri ilatho.” Kucel ka go owire wok i reco pere to timo gima cik waco aka otire,
ka jakidakana odwoko gim'ociko, ka jodwoko gima jokwalo, to joluwo i cik ma kwo, ka kitim reco mogo je, go lakwo adieri, go k'otho.
Kilapoyo reco mogo je ma go otieko timo; rupiri go otieko timo gima cik mito, gim'otire, go lakwo adieri.
Kucel ji perin jowaco ama: Royo pa Rwoth k'otire, ma to kere royo pajo ama k'otire.
Ka ŋat'otire oweyo royo pere ma tiro, to timo reco, go latho ro reco no.
Aka ka jakidakana owire wok i kidakana pere, to timo gima cik waco, m'otire, go lakwo ro gino.
Kucel wiwaco ni, “Royo pa Were k'otire.” Awi ot pa Isiraili, alathumo banja ri kisi ŋat'acel acele cungo kwoŋ tim pere.

Onyo pama cingi Rwoth otieko bedo kwoŋan othieno mafodi jokwalok me jok'obino; aka oyido atieko yawo dhokan i hongo ma jalo obin'iye bongan odikin; kole dhokan oyido oyawere, aka akibedo obadha kendo.
To Rwoth doko waco ran ama:
Wod dhano, ji ma jobedo i kabedo m'onyekere i piny ma Isiraili jomena waco ni, Abraham am'obedo ŋat'acel kende, kucel onwaŋo lowo; to pama onyo wathothi; adieri lowo omiy wan ni wabed'iye.
Riameno wac rijo, Rwoth Were waco ama: Wicamo riŋo gi remo, to witiŋo waŋ win malo ri cal mewin, aka wineko ji; winoloki lowo mewin?
Wigeno abor, witimo gir'amien aka kisi ŋat'acel acele kwoŋ win koco cipa nyawote; onyo ameno, winoloki lowo mewin?

Onyo ilawaco rijo ama: Rwoth Were waco ama: Paka fodi akwo, jono ma jobedo i kabedo m'onyekere no, jolapodho g'abor; aka ŋata nitie iy'abar alamiyo ogwaŋe mager jowocuti; aka jono ma jonitie i kapondo matek kodi i ŋungu, jolatho two nundu.
Alaloko lowo marac m'ongoye kony; aka kwoto pere ma meni bino tundo i gike; gote ma Isiraili jolalokere m'osika ma nyatoro k'onyal luw'iye.
Nyaka jobino ŋeyo ni An Rwoth, k'atieko loko lowo m'osika m'ongoye kony ro amien pajo je ma jotieko timo.
To ri in, wod dhano, ji perin ma joluwo kwoŋin kanyacel i kor udi gi dhiot udi pajo, ka joluwo kisi ŋat'acel gi nyawote, omin g'omin ni, “Biye winji nger wac ma wok bongi Rwoth.”
Jobino bongin paka ji jobino, jobedo ro nyim win paka ji paran, aka jowinjo wac mewin, to jok'owor jo. Kole jonyutho mar mathoth gi dhok jo, to cuny gin nitie i magowa pajo.
Ri jo icale kodi ŋati ma wero wer ma mitirok gi dwondi mamit, aka gido thum maber, rupiri jowinjo gim'iwaco, to jokitim.
Ka gime obino aka latimere, nyaka jolaŋeyo ni jatuci wac Were owok bedo i dier jo.
Rwoth oluwo kodan.
Go owaco ni, “Wod dhano”, Kwedere kwoŋ jokwath ma Isiraili: Ituci rijo wac Were ni: Rwoth Were waco ama: A, win jokwath ma Isiraili, wiwegi wipidhere! Jokwath jokiripi pidho rombo?
Wicamo bor, wiruko nangin ma yer rombo, withumo mwendi; to wikipidhi rombo.
Wikimedo meni ri ma meni oloyo jo, wikibotho ma jotwo, wikitweyo wonga ri ma jotur, wikidwoko ma joweyo yo, wikidwaro ma jorwenyo, to gi mbaka kodi gwayo witieko dhumo jo.
Onyo rombo paran jokedhere, rupiri jakwath ongoye; to jokedhere, jolokere cemo ri ogwaŋe mager madudi.
Okedhi rombo paran, joyiya piny wi gote je kodi i wi kisi tendere mabor. Okedhi rombo kisi kamoro je ma piny, m'ongoye ŋat'orangi kosa odwar jo.
Riameno win jokwath, winji win wac pa Rwoth:

Paka akwo, Rwoth Were waco, rupiri rombo paran jolokere gir'acama, aka rombo paran jolokere cemo ri ogwaŋe mager madudi je, paka oyido jakwath ongoye; aka rupiri jokwath paran jodak rango rombo paran, to jopidhere ayino, to jokwero pidho rombo.
Riameno, win jokwath, winji win wac pa Rwoth:

Rwoth Were waco ama: Alokere jakwor pa jokwath; aka alakwanyo woko rombo paran i cingi jo, t'acero jo pidho rombo paran; jokwath jok'opidhere kendo. Alabotho rombo paran wok i dhok jo, ŋey jokiri jobedi cemo rijo.
Kole Rwoth Were waco ama: An won gipi aladwaro mwendi paran.
Paka jakwath dwaro mwendi pere ka jonitie i dier mwendi pajo m'okedhere, ameno apaka aladwaro rombo paran. Alabotho jo i kabedo je m'okedh'iye jo i ndelo ma pondeponde kodi ma mudho m'opoto.
Alafudho jo woko wok bongi ji t'acoko jo wok i piny, t'akelo jo i piny pajo won; aka alakwayo jo wi gote ma Isiraili, cegin gi thengi pi, kodi kama bedere ma piny.
Alapidho jo gi lum maber, aka kam'oŋawere ma gote ma Isiraili labedo lum pajo; jolanindo kenyo i lowo ma kakwath maber, aka jolapidhere gi lum m'oloth wi gote ma Isiraili.
An won alabedo jakwath pa rombo paran, aka alamiyo jo nindo piny, apaka Rwoth Were waco.
Aladwaro ma jorwenyo, t'adwoko ma jolera, aka alatweyo wonga ri ma jotur, t'adwoko meni ri ma meni oloyo jo, to alareyo woko ma jocwe kodi ma jotek. Alakwayo jo gi tiro.
Paka riwin awi mwendi paran, Rwoth Were waco ama: Alathumo banja i dier rombo gi rombo, i dier wot rombo kodi diegi.
Obedo gimathin riwin ma pidhirok gi lum maber, winyono piny gi tiendi win kiri lum mewin man ma wikicam. Ka wimadho pi m'olony, ripo widuw megi gi tiendi win?
Aka onyo mwendi paran joripo camo gima witieko nyono gi tiendi win, gi madho gima witieko duwo gi tiendi win?
Riameno, Rwoth Were waco ama rijo: An won gipi alathumo banja i dier rombo ma cwe kodi rombo mamok.
Rupiri widhiro githenge kodi badi win, to wiguro ma meni oloyo jo je gi tungi win cuka wikedho jo bor bor.
Alabotho mwendi paran, aka ak'oyey wocandi jo kendo; aka alathumo banja i dier rombo gi rombo.
Aka an, Rwoth, alabedo Were pajo. Ŋeca paran Daudi labedo wod kere i dier jo; An, Rwoth atieko luwo.
Alatimo gi jo cikirok ma siem t'awaro woko ogwaŋe mager wok i piny, ŋey jowonyal bedo i thim to jonindo i lule m'ongoye teko.
Alaloko jo kodi adec m'othoko tendere paran silwany; aka aladhiro rijo koth i hongo mere ma ripo; labedo rijo koth ma silwany.

Yen ma ndelin jolanyak olemo pajo, aka gigipiny labedo i piny. Jolabedo ma bu teko i lowo pajo; aka jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, k'aturo woko nyweny ma bieto pajo, t'abotho jo i cingi jono ma joloko jo ŋecin.
Jok'olokere gikinyaga ri nonin kendo, kosa ogwaŋe ma piny k'ocami jo; jolabedo ma bu teko, aka ŋati mogo k'oloki jo malwor.
Alamiyo jo kafur maber ŋey kec wokiri woneki jo i piny, aka jokiri jocandere kendo yet pa nonin.
Jolaŋeyo ni An, Rwoth Were pajo, anitie gi jo, aka ni jo, ot pa Isiraili, jobedo ji paran, apaka Rwoth Were waco.
Wibedo rombo paran, rombo ma lum paran, aka abedo Were mewin apaka Rwoth Were waco.
Go owaco ama: Wod dhano com waŋin kwoŋ piny ma Edom aka ituci wac Were paran kwoŋe.
Waci ri ji ni, Rwoth Were waco ama:
Amoni gi win, gote ma Edom!
Ayaro cingan kwoŋ win
ma loko win gim'ojwangi kodi gima bukony.
Alaloko tindin mewin madongo gundin
wilalokere gim'ojwangi,
aka wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Rupiri wibedo mere pa jakwor macene, to wimiyo ineko ji ma Isiraili i hongo ma teko, i hongo ma thumo banja pajo macowe.
Riameno, kafodi akwo, Rwoth Were waco, alayiko win ri neki, remo bino luwo win; paka wikikwero oyo remo, oyo remo bino luwo win.
Alaloko piny matendere ma Edom gima bukony kodi gim'ojwangi; aka ongoye ŋat'odonji kosa owok'iye.
Alapoŋo gote mere gi delkwoŋ jom'onek; i wi tendere mewin kodi i milelo mewin kodi kama pi mewin mol'iye, am'ila bolo iye jom'onek.
Alaloko win gim'ojwangi ma cil gi cil, aka ji k'obedi i tindin mewin madongo. Nyaka to wiŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Rupiri wiwaco ni, “Nonin ario me kodi piny ario me jobino bedo aparan, aka wilaloko jo mewin.” Makada oyido Rwoth nitie kenyo.
Riameno, paka akwo, Rwoth Were waco, alatic gi win cungo kwoŋ nge kodi nyeko ma winyutho kwoŋbedo dakirok mewin rijo; aka alaŋeyere i dier win, k'athumo riwin banja.
Wilaŋeyo ni An Rwoth, atieko winjo luwo mewin ma yet ma witieko tuco kwoŋ gote ma Isiraili, ka wiwaco ni, “Ojwangi jo, omiy wan jo ni wacam.”
Widele ran gi dhok win, to winyayo wac mewin kwoŋan; atieko winjo.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Paka piny gipi fore, alajwango win.
Paka wifore kwoŋ gir'alunja ma ot pa Isiraili, rupiri oyido ojwangere, ameno apaka alatic gi win; wilajwangere, Gote ma Edom, kodi lowo je ma Edom, joje. Nyaka jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Rwoth owaco ama: Wod dhano, luw kodi gote ma Isiraili aka waco rijo jowowinji wac pa Rwoth.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo jakwor onyerin to waco ni, “Onyo tindin madongo macon no jolokere mawan!”
Riameno luw aka iwaci ama: Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo jolokin gunda adieri, to joŋidhin wok i thenge je, ŋey ameno ilokere gipa nonin je m'odoŋ, t'ilokere ginyero kodi gir'awaca i dier ji.

Riameno, awi gote ma Isiraili, winji win wac pa Rwoth Were. Rwoth Were waco ama ri gote kodi tenderin, jwombe kodi milelin, gundin kodi tindin m'ojwangi, ma jolokere kama kinyaga caker'iye kodi ginyero ri nonin m'odoŋ je thoko.

Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Aluwo i nyeko paran malieth swa kwoŋ nonin man je m'odoŋ, kodi kwoŋ Edom, ma gi kisangala madwoŋ swa kodi mbusa, jokwanyo lowo paran paka gipajo, kwoŋbedo lum mere to jonyaga.
Riameno luw mako kwoŋ lowo ma Isiraili, aka iwaci ri gote kodi tenderin, ri jwombe kodi milelo ni: Rwoth Were waco, aluwo i keme ma nge paran, kwoŋbedo witieko candere yet pa nonin.
Riameno Rwoth Were waco, akwoŋere ni nonin je ma jothoko win bende jolalokere gi yet.
To win, awi gote ma Isiraili, wilaloth jangi win, to winyak olemo ri ji paran Isiraili; rupiri jocegin dwoko peco.
Neni win pama, anitie riwin; alawire riwin. Alaneno ni lowo mewin ofur kendo kodi ni ocwoy kodhi kenyo.
Alamedo welo mewin, ot je ma Isiraili, joje; ji jolabedo i tindin, t'igeto gundin.
Alamiyo ji kodi ogwaŋe jowonyay. Jolanyay to jonywol. Alamiyo wobedi i in paka i hongo perin macon, aka alatimo rin bero nger ma fodi akitimo. Kenyo nyaka wilaŋeyo ni Abedo Rwoth.
Alakelo win, ji paran Isiraili, wilabedo kendo i lowo. Bino bedo lowo mewin won, aka k'oyey nyithindho mewin kec woneki jo kendo.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Kwoŋbedo jowaco riwin nike wicamo ji, aka wineko nyithindho ma piny mewin.
Riameno wok pama kadho yuwaŋe wik'ocam ji kendo aka wik'onek nyithindho ma piny mewin, Rwoth Were waco.
Wik'owinji kendo yet pa nonin, wik'obiel kendo wickwot pa ji. Wik'omiy piny mewin kitangatanga kendo, Rwoth Were waco.
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran:
Wod dhano, munyo Joisiraili oyido jobedo i lowo pajo won, jokoco gi nger ma jobed'iye kodi tim pajo. Kula pajo ruwaŋan ocale koco pa dhako ma ruko dwe.
Ameno akonjo woko keme paran kwoŋ jo ro remo m'oyido jotieko oyo i lowo, kodi cal m'oyido jokoco gine.
Akedho jo i dier nonin, aka okedhi jo gi i piny; cungo kwoŋ kula gi tim pajo athumo rijo banja.
To munyo jotundo i dier i nonin, kisi kama jotund'iye, jokoco nyingan maleŋ, rupiri ji oyido jowaco ni, “Me ji pa Rwoth, aka kucel oyido joeye woko i lowo pere.”
To oyido alith gi nyingan maleŋ, ma Joisiraili oyido jokoco i dier nonin ma jokadh'iye.
Riameno wac ri Joisiraili ni Rwoth Were waco ama: K'obedo ro win, awi Joisiraili, m'omiyo acegin timo gimoro, to kwoŋbedo nyingan maleŋ, ma witieko koco i dier nonin ma wikadh'iye.
Alaloko nyingan madwoŋ maleŋ, m'otieko koco i dier nonin, ma bende witieko koco i dier jo; aka nonin jolaŋeyo nike Abedo Rwoth, Rwoth Were waco. Alaoro win ma nyutho nonin ni abedo ŋataleŋ.
Alakwanyo win wok i nonin, t'acoko win wok i piny je, t'adwoko win i piny mewin won.
Alakiro kwoŋ win pi m'olony, aka wilalony kwoŋ koco mewin je, kodi kwoŋ cal mewin je alalonyo win.
Alamiyo win adundo manyen, t'aketho cuny manyen i win. Alakwanyo woko wok i delkwoŋ win adundo ma tele t'amiyo win adundo ma riŋo.
Alaketho cuny paran i win, t'amiyo win luwo cik to wigwokere ma kuro or paran.
Kenyo wilabedo i piny m'amiyo kwarere mewin; aka wibino bedo ji paran, t'abedo Were mewin.
Alabotho wok kwoŋ koco mewin je, aka alamiyo cemo wonyak to bedo kweth; aka ak'okethi kec kwoŋ win.
Alamiyo olemo ma yath kodi ranyak ma ndelo wobedi kweth, ŋey wikiri wicandere kendo lifol ma kec i dier nonin.
Kenyo wibino poyo tim mewin marac, gi gigipiny ma witimo ma k'ober; to wijok wiwegi ro reco mewin kodi tim mewin mar'amien.
Ak'otim gime kwoŋbedo win, Rwoth Were waco; ŋey win gino. Wickwot womaki win gi lifol ro tim mewin, awi Joisiraili.
Rwoth Were waco ama: I ndelo m'abino loko win m'olony i reco mewin je, alamiyo wobedi i tindin madongo, t'igeto gundin kendo.
Lowo m'oyido ojwangi ilafuro, makiweno bedo ajwanga m'oyido ji je ma jokadho joneno.
Ji jolawaco ni, “Lowo me m'oyido ojwangi onyo olokere paka ndelo Eden; aka opalipat, kam'ojwangi kodi tindin madongo m'oyido gunda onyo pama ibed'iye aka ogoy'iye cel.”
Kenyo nonin ma jodoŋ je ma jothoko win jolaŋeyo nike an Rwoth, atieko geto kendo kam'oyido gundin, aka apidho kendo meno m'oyido ojwangi; an Rwoth atieko luwo aka alatimo gino.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Alayeyo bende Joisiraili jowokwayan ni atim rijo gime: Ni amedi welo pajo paka mwendi.
Paka rombo ma cowirok
Cingi Rwoth obino kwoŋan, to wodhan woko gi cuny pa Rwoth to jengan piny i dier milelo; kanyago oyido opoŋ gi cokin.
Omiyan woth thoko jo; oyido nitie cokin kweth ma joŋare i milelo, aka oyido jothwo swa.
Go openjan ni, “Wod dhano, cokin me jonyalo kwo?” Adwoko ni, “Awi Rwoth Were, iŋat'iŋeyo.”
Kenyo to go waco ran ni, “Tuci wac paran ri cokin me, aka iwaci rijo ni: Awi cokin m'othwo, winji win wac pa Rwoth.
Rwoth Were waco ama ri cokin me: Alakudho luya i win, aka wilakwo.
Alaketho fuc kwoŋ win, t'amiyo riŋo bino kwoŋ win, t'aumo win gi pien, t'aketho luya i win, aka wibino kwo; aka wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.”
Ameno atuco wac pa Were paka oyido otieko oran; aka paka atuco, to woy bino abwap, jotimo woy madwoŋ, to cokin riwere, coko i coko mere.
Aneno, aka fuc oyido nitie kwoŋ jo, aka riŋo oyido otieko bino kwoŋ jo, aka pien oyido otieko umo jo; to luya oyido ongoye i jo.
Kenyo to go waco ran ni, “Wod dhano tuci wac paran ri luya, aka iwaci rigo ni: Rwoth Were waco ama: Biye wok kwoŋ koyin aŋwen, awi luya, aka iywe kwoŋ jom'otho me, jowonyal kwo.”
Atuco wac pa Were paka oyido otieko oran, to luya bino kwoŋ jo, to jokwo, to jowotho gi tiendi gin, lwak ji.
Kenyo to Were waco ran ni, “Wod dhano, cokin me obedo Joisiraili gibe. Jowaco ni, ‘Cokin mawan jothwo woko, aka wangoye gi geno; warwenyo kicutho.’
Riameno tuci wac paran, aka wac rijo ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Akidho yawo kaliele mewin, t'awodho win woko wok i kaliele mewin, awi ji paran; aka aladwoko win i piny ma Isiraili.
Aka wilaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, k'ayawo kaliele mewin, t'awodho win woko wok i kaliele mewin, awi ji paran.
Alaketho cuny paran i win, aka wilakwo. Alaketho win i lowo mewin won; nyaka to wiŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, atieko luwo aka alatimo,” Rwoth waco.
Rwoth odoko oluwo kodan.
Owaco ni wod dhano, kwany luth indiki i wiye ni, “Ri Yuda, kodi Joisiraili ma jomakere gine.”
Aka iriw jo kanyacel i luth acel, ŋey jowonyal bedo acel i cingin.
Aka ka ji perin jopenjin ni, “Ik'onyuthi wan dwoŋ ma gime?”

Idwoki jo ni Rwoth Were waco ama: Acegin kwanyo luth pa Yozefu (manitie i cingi Efrayim) kodi jonono ma Isiraili ma jomakere gine; aka alaketho luth pa Yuda i wiye, t'aloko jo luth acel, ŋey jowonyal bedo acel i cingan.
Ka ludhe m'indik'iye jonitie i cingin ruwaŋ jo,
nyaka iwaci rijo ni Rwoth Were waco ama: Alakwanyo Joisiraili i dier nonin ma jokadh'iye, aka alacoko jo wok i kisi thenge, t'akelo jo i piny pajo won.
Alaloko jo nono acel i piny, wi gote ma Isiraili; aka kere acel ama ladhumo jo je. Odoko jok'obedi nonin ario kendo, aka doko jok'opokere kendo i kerin ario.

Jok'okocere kendo gi cal pajo gi gigipiny pajo ma mijokere, kosa gikibenga pajo mogo je. Alabotho jo kwoŋ royin je ma jotimo gine reco to josegeya an. Alalonyo jo. Jolabedo ji paran, aka alabedo Were pajo.
Jolabedo i piny m'amiyo ŋeca paran Yakobo, ma kwarere pajo bed'iye; jo gi nyithindho pajo gi nyikway jo jobino bedo kenyo cil gi cil aka ŋeca paran Daudi labedo wod kere pajo cil gi cil.
Alatimo cikirok ma siem gi jo; labedo cikirok ma cil gi cil gi jo; aka alamiyo jo silwany to jonyay, aka alaketho kamaleŋ paran i dier jo cil gi cil.
Nyaka nonin jobino ŋeyo ni An Rwoth aloko Isiraili maleŋ, ka kamaleŋ paran obedi i dier jo cil gi cil.
Rwoth oluwo kodan.
Owaco ni wod dhano, com waŋin kwoŋ Gog, ma piny ma Magog, wod kere madwoŋ pa Mesek kodi Tubal. Tuci kwoŋe wac paran
aka iwaci ni: Rwoth Were waco ama: Amon kodin, awi Gog, wod kere madwoŋ pa Mesek kodi Tubal.
Alatimin awira awira t'aketho siragetere i pom lakin, t'afudhin woko gi jolweny perin je, kayinin kodi joma gweyo, kareno joje joruko ruk ma lweny, kitipa madwoŋ, joje gi kwot aka jotiŋo abor.
Pasia, Ethopiya, kodi Libia jonitie gi jo, joje gi kwot kodi abor.
Goma gi jolweny mere je; Bethtogarma wok iy'adec mabor ma yumalo gi jolweny mere je, ji kweth jonitie gi win.
Yikere win, bedi win ma wiyikere, win kodi kitipin je ma jowura jothoko win, aka wicungi matek rijo.

Ka hongo okadho m'oromo ilalwoŋo win; i oro ma rumacen, wilakidho monjo piny kama ji oyido jodwok'iye wok i nonin kweth aka jotieko bedo ma jokilwor lweny wi gote ma Isiraili, m'oyido otiek jwango oro kweth; to pama onyo ji jobed'iye m'ongoye teko.
Wilamedere woth, wilabino pa koyo madwoŋ; wilabedo pa pondeponde ma umo piny, win kodi jolweny mewin je, kodi ji kweth ma jonitie gi win.
Rwoth Were waco ama: I ndelo no paro labino i cunyin, aka ilatimo can marac.
Ilawaco ni, “Alakidho lweny gi calin ma k'ogoy'iye cel; alapodho kwoŋ ji ma joliŋ ma jobedo kam'ongoye teko, joje ma jobedo kama k'ogoy'iye cel, aka jongoye gi nyweny kosa waŋkace.”
Wilamako to winyaga ji ma jobedo kam'oyido cango obedo gundin. Ji m'ocok jo wok i nonin, ma onyo jocako limo dhok gi lim, ma jobedo i dier piny.

Seba kodi Dedan kodi jomitan ma Tarsis kodi simbwore mere ma nyaka joay jolapenjo win ni, “Wibino kinyaga? Witieko coko kitipa mewin ma tiŋo gim'onyaga, ma tiŋo feza kodi buban, ma kwanyo woko dhok kodi lim, ma kinyaga lim kweth?”
Riameno, wod dhano, tuci wac paran, aka iwaci ri Gog ni: Rwoth Were waco ama: I ndelo no ka ji paran Isiraili jobedo kam'okwe, ilaay
t'ibino wok i kabedo perin iy'adec mabor ma yumalo, in kodi ji kweth ma jonitie kodin, joje kareno jogweyo kayinin kweth ma kiwacere, jolweny ma jomeni.
Ilabino lweny gi ji paran Isiraili, paka pondeponde ma umo piny. I hongo ma yuwaŋe, alakelin i cingan ŋey nonin jonyal ŋeyan, kareno joluwo kwoŋin, awi Gog, alanyutho leŋo ruwaŋ jo.
Rwoth Were waco ama: In a ŋat'atieko luwo kwoŋe i hongo m'okadho gi ŋecin paran jotuci wac Were ma Isiraili, ma i hongo no jotuco wac paran ma oro kweth ni oyido alakelin lweny gi jo?
I ndelo no, ka Gog ocako lweny gi piny ma Isiraili, Rwoth Were waco, keme paran lakigaga.
Rupiri i nyeko paran kodi i keme paran maliel atieko luwo: I ndelo no yengirok pa piny madwoŋ labedo i piny ma Isiraili.

Rec ma nam, kodi winyin ma koyo, kodi ogwaŋe madudi, kodi gigipiny ma mol gi kor jo i lowo, kodi ji je ma jonitie i piny, jobino kirin i nyiman, aka ilawito gote piny, aka acurcur jolapodho piny, aka kisi kor ot lapodho piny.
Alalwoŋo abor kwoŋ Gog i gote paran je, Rwoth Were waco. Abor labedo kwoŋ omin.
Alathumo rigo banja gi two nundu kodi nek; alamiyo koth wocwe gi pe, mac kodi tele laoy kwoŋe, jolweny pere kodi ji kweth ma jonitie gi go.
Ameno alanyutho dwoŋ paran gi leŋo paran, t'anyuthere i waŋ nonin kweth. Nyaka to joŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Rwoth owaco ni in wod dhano, tuci wac paran kwoŋ Gog, aka iwaci ama: Rwoth Were waco ama, alwenyo kodin, awi Gog, wod kere pa Mesek kodi Tubal!
Alawirin awirawira t'adhirin yumalo, t'akelin wok iy'adec mabor ma yumalo t'aterin kwoŋ gote ma Isiraili.
Alamuko kwot perin wok i cingin maracam, t'amiyo aserin perin oy wok i cingin maracuc.
Ibino podho wi gote ma Isiraili, in kodi jolweny perin kodi ji ma jonitie kodin. Alamiyin ri winyin madudi ma nger gi nger kodi ri ogwaŋe madudi jowocamin.
Ilapodho i kisawe; kole atieko luwo, Rwoth Were waco.
Aladhiro mac kwoŋ Magog kodi kwoŋ jono ma jobedo ma bu teko i thengi nam; aka jobino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth.
Alamiyo nyingan woŋeyere i dier ji paran Isiraili; aka ak'oyey nyingan wokoc kendo; aka nonin jobino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth, Ŋataleŋ pa Isiraili.
Otieko bino! Otieko timere, Rwoth Were waco. Me a ndelo m'oyido atieko luwo kwoŋe.
Kenyo jono ma jobedo i tindin madongo ma Isiraili jolawok woko to jotimo mac ma lweny to jowaŋo jo, kwote, mikoro kodi aserin, abiro kodi tonge; aka jolatimo mac wok i jo ma oro abirio.
Jok'ocoki yen i ndelin kosa toŋo yen i lule, rupiri jolabedo gi gilweny m'owey awaŋa. Jolajowo to jonyaga gigipiny pa jono ma jonyaga jo, Rwoth Were waco.

Rwoth owaco ama: I ndelo no alamiyo Gog kayik i Isiraili, i milelo pa Jowoth yuwok ceŋ ma nam; bino geŋo ger pa jowoth, rupiri kenyo Gog kodi kitipa pere je ilayik'iye jo; ibino lwoŋo ni Milelo pa Hamon Gog.
Joisiraili jolacowo dwe abirio ka joyiko jo, ma cwako reco ma piny.
Ji je ma piny jolayiko jo; aka lakelo rijo dwoŋ i ndelo m'abino nyuth'iye dwoŋ paran, apaka Rwoth Were waco.
Jolaketho cwo ma jolawoth i piny kisi hongo ma yiko del pa jom'otho ma jodoŋ i piny, ŋey jowocidi woko reco mere. Ma dwe abirio joladwaro jo.
Ka joma dwaro jowotho i piny, kisi nyatoro m'onen coko dhano ketho ranyuth cegin gine, cuka joma yiko jotiek yiko i Milelo pa Hamon Gog.
(Tindi madwoŋ Hamona bende nitie kenyo.) Ameno jolacido woko reco ma piny.
Wilacamo riŋo pa jomeni to wimadho remo pa wot kerin ma piny, apa rombo ma mon, apa diegi, apa thwondhe, joje ma jocwe ma Basan.
Wilacamo bor cuka wiyeŋ, to wimadho remo cuka wimer i kalima ma cowirok m'ayiko riwin.
Wilayeŋo i dhower paran gi kayinin kodi jogwey, gi jolweny apondi kodi jolweny ma nger gi nger, apaka Rwoth Were waco.
Alanyutho dwoŋ paran i dier nonin; aka nonin je jolaneno thumo banja paran m'atieko thumo, aka cingan m'atieko ketho kwoŋ jo.
Joisiraili jolaŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth Were pajo, wok i ndelo no kadho yuwaŋe.
Nonin jolaŋeyo ni Joisiraili jokidho i katwec ro reco pajo, rupiri oyido jobedo jobanirok kodan.
Atiyo gi jo paka koco kodi kibenga pajo obedo, t'apano waŋan rijo.
Riameno Rwoth Were waco ama: Pama onyo aladwoko silwany pa Yakobo, t'atimo ŋono ri Joisiraili gibe; aka alabedo gi nyeko ri nyingan maleŋ.
Jobino bielo wickwot pajo, kodi banirok pajo je ma jotieko timo kwoŋan, ka onyo jobedo ma bu teko i piny pajo m'ongoye dhano ma bwoko jo;
k'atieko dwoko jo wok bongi ji kareno atieko coko jo wok i piny pa jokwor pajo, aka luwo i jo, atieko nyutho leŋo paran i waŋ nonin kweth.
Nyaka jobino ŋeyo ni An Abedo Rwoth Were pajo rupiri adhiro jo i katwec i dier nonin, nyaka t'acoko jo i piny pajo won. Ongoye kwoŋ jo ŋat'alaweyo cen.
Ak'opan waŋan rijo kendo, k'akonjo woko cuny paran kwoŋ Joisiraili, Rwoth Were waco.
I oro ma piero ario g'abic ma twec mawan, i cakirok ma oro, i ndelo mar'apar ma dwe, i oro mar'apar g'aŋwen cuka maki tindi madwoŋ, i ndelo no won, cingi Rwoth oyido nitie kwoŋan, aka okelan kenyo.
Go okelan i menyirok pa Were, i piny ma Isiraili, to jengan piny wi got mabor swa, m'oyido nitie iye gim'otim ma cal tindi madwoŋ yuthenge ma yupiny.
Munyo okelan kenyo, jal mogo oyido nitie kenyo, ma cal pere oliel pa ywel. Onwaŋo otiŋo thol ma rapim kodi luth ma rapim i cinge. Aka onwaŋo ocungo yu waŋkac.
Jalo owaco ran ni wod dhano, winji maber aka kaŋasa odoco kisi gimoro je m'akidho nyuthin, rupiri me am'omiyo okelin ka. Waci ri Joisiraili gimoro je m'ineno.
To kidho yu waŋkac ma ŋiyo yuwok ceŋ, oidho madala mere to pima kadonjo ma waŋkac, kedi acel, lutho mere.
Kisika ma thenge, kedi acel mabor kodi kedi acel i laco; gi thwolo ma dier kisikin ma thenge, mita ario g'adec; aka yo nyim waŋkac yu diŋ ma waŋkac macowe iye kodi cel.
To pima diŋ ma waŋkac wok i ot, mita aŋwen.
To go pima waŋkac mere m'oumere, fut apar g'aŋwen kodi sirin mere fut aŋwen kodi waŋkac m'oumere wok yu ot.
Aka onwaŋo nitie kisikin adek i kisi thenge ma waŋkac ma yuwok ceŋ; adek me onwaŋo jorom aroma; aka maraba ma kisi thenge onwaŋo romaroma.
To go pima kendo laco ma yawirok ma waŋkac, mita abic; aka laco ma yu waŋkac, mita aucel g'adec.
Onwaŋo nitie rageŋ ma fodi ikitundo i kisikin ma yuthenge, adec mita kisi thenge; aka kisikin ma thenge me onwaŋ obedo mita ario i kisi thenge.
To doko pima waŋkac gi yucen ma kisikin ma thenge tundo i yucen ma man, i laco ma mita ario g'adec kodi mita apar; wok i kor ot kiri i kor ot.
Opima bende diŋ mere, mita apar; aka thoko diŋ ma yu waŋkac onwaŋo nitie kapido.
Yunyim waŋkac i kadonjo mere tundo i gike i diŋ ma iye ma waŋkac onwaŋo romo mita piero ario g'abic.
Kisikin kodi sirin oyido jonitie gi dirisin gi thigin yuthenge ma yu iye ma waŋkac je thoko, aka diŋ oyido nitie gi dirisin yu iye thoko; aka i wi sirin oyido nitie yen thith.
To go kelan yuwoko ma kapido; aka neni, oyido nitie kisikin kodi ŋetagola, thoko kapido iye je; kisikin piero adek yunyim ŋetagola.
Ŋetagola opimere gi waŋkac, boro mere orom aroma gi waŋkac; me oyido ŋetagola macowe.
To doko pima boro ma wok i nyim waŋkac macowe tundo woko ma nyim kapido ma iye, mita piero abic.
Kenyo to go pima waŋkac ma kapido ma yuwoko m'oŋiyo yumalo, boro mere gi laco mere.
Kisikin adek ma kisi thenge, adek kisi thenge, maraba kodi diŋ mere calacala kodi waŋkac marapena; boro mere mita piero abic, aka laco mere mita apar g'ario g'adec.
Dirisin, diŋ kodi yen ma thith mere oyido romaroma paka ma waŋkac ma ŋiyere gi ma yuwok ceŋ; tiendi jo abirio tund'iye; aka diŋ mere nitie i iye.
Yunyim waŋkac ma yumalo, paka ma yuwok ceŋ, oyido nitie waŋkac ma kapido ma iye, to pima wok waŋkac kiri i waŋkac, mita piero abic.

Kenyo go okelan yupiny, aka neni, waŋkac yupiny; to pima maraba kodi diŋ mere; je jo rom paka wadi. Aka onwaŋo nitie dirisin, aka i diŋ mere, paka dirisin ma man; boro mere mita piero ario g'abic, to laco mere mita apar g'ario g'adec.
Oyido nitie dirisin thoko i iye je aka i diŋ mere, paka dirisin ma man mere. Boro paka rom ma dhiot ma waŋkac oyido obedo fut piero aboro g'aŋwen aka laco fut piero aŋwen g'ario.
Oyido nitie madala ma tiendi jo abirio tundo i iye; aka diŋ mere oyido nitie i iye, aka nitie yen ma thith yunyime, acel kisi thenge.
Oyido nitie waŋkac yupiny ma kapido ma iye; to go pima wok i waŋkac tundo i waŋkac yuthenge ma yupiny, fut miya acel gi piero aucel g'aboro.
To go kelan i kapido ma iye gi waŋkac ma yupiny to pima waŋkac ma yupiny; je oyido romaroma paka wadi.
Kisikin mere, sirin mere kodi diŋ mere je oyido romaroma paka wadi, dirisin oyido nitie kiri i diŋ; boro mere mita piero ario g'abic, aka laco mere mita apar g'ario g'adec.
Diŋ bende oyido nitie iye thoko paka rom, boro ma fut piero aboro g'aŋwen kodi laco ma fut piero aŋwen g'ario.
Diŋ mere oŋiyere gi kapido ma woko, aka yen thith oyido nitie i sirin mere aka madala mere onwaŋo romo tiendi jo aboro i boro.
To doko go kelan i iy kapido ma yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ, to pima waŋkac; je oyido romaroma paka wadi.
Kisikin ma thenge, sirin mere, kodi diŋ mere oyido jorom aroma paka wadi, kisi yu diŋ je oyido dirisin; boro mere fut piero aboro g'aŋwen aka laco mere fut piero aŋwen g'ario.
Diŋ mere oyido ŋiyo kapido ma yuwoko, aka onwaŋo nitie yen thith i sirin mere, i kisi thenge; aka madala mere oyido tiendi jo aboro.
To go doko kelan i waŋkac ma yumalo to pima, oyido romaroma paka wadi.

Kisikin mere, sirin mere, kodi diŋ mere oyido jocalacala paka wadi; aka oyido jonitie gi dirisin thoko iye je paka rom. Boro mere je oyido obedo fut piero aboro g'aŋwen aka laco mere fut piero aŋwen g'ario.
Diŋ mere oŋiyere gi kapido ma woko, aka yen ma thith i wi sirin mere, i kisi thenge; aka madala mere oyido nitie kalo tiendi jo aboro.
Oyido nitie kisika gi thigo mere yu diŋ ma waŋkac, kama cowirok awaŋa oyido ripo wolwoki iye.
Aka i diŋ ma waŋkac oyido nitie mezin ario, i kisi thenge, kama mic awaŋa kodi mic mareco gi mic ma banja oyido ripo wothum'iye.
Yuwoko ma diŋ no, i kadonjo ma waŋkac ma yumalo oyido nitie mezin ario; aka yuthenge man ma diŋ ma waŋkac, mezin ario.
Mezin aŋwen oyido nitie yu iye, gi mezin aŋwen yuwoko ma yuthengi waŋkac, mezin aboro, ma yaŋ'iye cowirok.

Oyido bende nitie mezin aŋwen ma tele m'ogor ri mic awaŋa. Oyido jobedo inci piero ario i ŋawirok, aka giumo jo inci piero adek ma thenge je romaroma. Gigipiny je m'oor ma neko ogwaŋe ma cowirok okan i wi mezin me.
Oyido nitie siragetere, boro i laco inci adek thoko gike ma mezin. I wi mezin, riŋo je mar'amiya i cowirok oyido ripo wojengi iye.
Yuthenge ma woko ma waŋkac ma iye oyido nitie kisikin ri jower i kapido ma iye, acel yuthenge ma yumalo ma ŋiyo yupiny, man yuthenge ma waŋkac ma yuwok ceŋ ma ŋiyo yumalo.
Go owaco ran ni, “Kisika me ma ŋiyo yupiny obedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiyo i Ot pa Were,
aka kisika ma ŋiyo yumalo obedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jotiyo i wi migam; me jobedo nyikway Zadok, jo kende i dier nyikway Levi ma jonyalo bino cegin gi Rwoth tiyo rigo.”
Go opima kapido, oyido obedo fut miya acel gi piero aucel g'aboro thenge aŋwen je marom aroma. Aka migam oyido nitie yuwaŋ Ot pa Were.
To kelan i diŋ ma Ot pa Were to pima siro ma diŋ, obedo fut abuŋwen i lutho kodi fut piero ario g'aŋwen i laco, i kisi thenge; aka kor thengi waŋkac oyido obedo fut abic ma nywol i kisi thenge.
Boro ma diŋ oyido obedo fut piero adek g'aŋwen i laco kodi fut piero ario i lutho; tiendi jo apar tund'iye; sirin oyido nitie iye, i kisi thengi sirin yu kisi thenge acel.
Ma luwo jacwo no oteran i kisika ma diere, Kabedo Maleŋ. Go opima kalikondi i thenge je, mita adek i laco, m'obedo laco ma wema.
Laco ma kadonjo oyido obedo mita abic, gi kor ot ma nywol mere mita ario g'adec i kisi thenge. Go opima boro ma kalikondi mita piero ario, aka laco mere mita apar.
Go okidho i kisika ma iye loyo, to pima kalikondi ma donjo iye, mita acel, kodi mita adek i laco gi kor ot i kisi thenge ma nywol mita adek g'adec.
Go opima boro ma kisika, mita apar kodi laco mere bende mita apar, kalo kalikondi. Kenyo go owaco ran ni, Me Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo.
Jacwo no opima nywol ma kor ot ma Ot pa Were, mita adek, aka kwoŋ kor ot me oyido nitie kisikin thoko Ot pa Were ma mita ario i laco.
Kisikin me oyido jonitie i gorofa adek gi kisikin piero adek i kisi gorofa. Kor ot ma woko oyido thin loyo kisi dier ot ma piny, ŋey kisikin jowothenere kwoŋ kor ot, ma kor ot k'othielo jo.

Kaluwo ma kisikin ma thenge obedo ka yare wok gorofa kidho i gorofa, kwoŋbedo geto oyido okethi madala thoko Ot pa Were. R'atoŋa me gorofa omedere yarok wok i gorofa kidho i gorofa. Dhano oyido nyalo kadho malo wok i pende kidho i gorofa ma malo luwo gi ma diere.
Aneno kendo nike Ot pa Were nitie gi kituti m'oŋawere malo thoko iye je. Rapim ma misingi ma kisikin ma thenge oyido rom gi kedi gikululu ma mita adek.
Nywol ma kor ot ma woko ma kisikin ma thenge oyido obedo mita ario g'adec. Hongo m'owey i dier kisikin ma thenge i Ot pa Were,
kodi kisikin ma diedipo oyido obedo mita thoko i kisi thenge.
Thigin ma kisikin oyido ŋiyo diedipo, dhiot acel yumalo, kodi dhiot man yupiny, aka laco ma hongo m'oyido owey obedo mita ario g'adec thoko iye je.
Geto m'oyido oŋiyere gi diedipo ma Ot pa Were yupodho ceŋ oyido obedo mita piero aŋwen g'abic i boro kodi mita piero adek g'abic i laco. Nywol ma kor ot mere thoko oyido obedo mita ario g'adec.
Jacwo no opima woko ma Ot pa Were, mita piero abic i boro, aka diedipo kodi geto gi kor ot mere, mita piero abic i lutho.
Boro ma yuwaŋ Ot pa Were, diedipo i kisi thenge oyido obedo mita piero abic.
Go opima boro ma geto yupodho ceŋ, kiri gi kalikondi mere i thenge je, mita piero abic.
Kisika ma dhiot ma Ot pa Were, Kabedo Maleŋ, kodi Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo,
oyido oyiki maŋon gi mbawo wok i dier ot kiri i dirisa. Dirisin me oyido cegere.
Hongo ma wi dhiot, kiri i kisika ma iye, kodi woko mere i kor ot oyido ogor'iye calin.
Calin me oyido obedo ma kerubim kodi yen thith, yath thith i dier kerubim ario. Kisi kerubim oyido nitie gi waŋe ario.
Waŋ dhano oŋiyo yath thith i thenge acel, aka waŋ simbwor mathin oŋiyo yath thith i thenge man. Oyido ogor kwoŋ Ot pa Were thoko iye je,
wok i dier ot tundo kiri malo ma dhiot kerubim kodi yen thith kwoŋ kor ot.
Miangin ma Kabedo Maleŋ oyido jobedo marom thenge je.
Yuwaŋ Kabedo Maleŋ oyido nitie gima cale,
migam ma mbawo ma mita acel g'adec i ŋawirok kodi mita acel i laco. Sonda mere, pende kodi kore mere oyido obedo ma mbawo. Go owaco ran ni, “Me meza ma cungo ruwaŋ Rwoth.”
Kabedo Maleŋ, kodi Kabedo Maleŋ Loyo oyido jonitie gi thigin ario.
Thigin me oyido jomakere ario ario.
Oyido ogor calin ma kerubim kodi yen thith kwoŋ thigo ma Kabedo Maleŋ paka oyido ogor kwoŋ kor ot. Oyido nitie giumo ma mbawo yuwaŋ kisika ma dhiot woko.
I thenge kisika me oyido nitie dirisin, aka kor ot oyido otim makicin gi yen thith.
Kenyo jacwo no oteran i diedipo ma woko, aka otelan i geto ma yumalo ma Ot pa Were, ma kibor gi geto ma yuwok ceŋ i gike ma Ot pa Were.
Geto me oyido obedo mita piero abic i boro kodi mita piero ario g'abic i laco.
I thenge acel oŋiyo hongo ma mita apar i laco m'oyido nitie i bol acel gi Ot pa Were. I thenge man oŋiyo daraja ma diedipo ma woko. Oyido ogeti i gorofa adek, aka kisi acel oyido bor loyo ma pende.
I thenge ma yumalo ma geto nitie kalikondi ma mita abic i laco kodi mita piero abic i boro.
Kisikin ma malo ma geto oyido diny loyo ma diere kodi ma pende kwoŋbedo gorofa jotero kwoŋ jo hongo madwoŋ.
Kisikin oyido nitie i gorofa adek je, aka oyido jongoye gi sirin paka geto man i diedipo.
Oyido nitie kor ot m'otire gi kisikin, yu diedipo ma woko, m'oŋiyere gi kisikin, mita piero ario g'abic i boro.
Kisikin ma diedipo ma woko oyido obedo mita piero ario g'abic i boro, aka m'oŋiyere gi Ot pa Were oyido obedo mita piero abic i boro.
I tiendi kisikin me oyido nitie kalikondi m'idonjo gine wok yuwok ceŋ t'iwok i diedipo ma woko.
Oyido nitie kisikin i thenge ma yupiny, ma boro mere obedo boro ma kor ot ma woko, ma riwere gi diedipo aka oŋiyere gi kor ot ma woko.
Yuwaŋ kisikin oyido nitie kalikondi ma cale gi manitie i thenge ma yumalo. Boro kodi laco mere oyido jorom gi dhiote can kodi thigin ma cale.
Thigin ma kisikin yupiny oyido donjere gi dhiot ma yuwaŋ kalikondi m'oŋiyere gine, wok yuwok ceŋ, kama kor ot caker'iye gine.

Jacwo no owaco ran ni, kisikin ma yumalo kodi kisikin ma yupiny m'oŋiyere gi diedipo jobedo maleŋ. Kenyo ama jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jobino ruwaŋ Rwoth jolacamo mic maleŋ loyo. Kenyo jolaketho iye mic maleŋ loyo, mic ma cemo, mic ma cwako reco, kodi mic ma cul kwoŋbedo kabedo no leŋ.

Ka jocway ri Were i wi migam jodonjo i Kabedo Maleŋ, jokiripi wok i diedipo ma woko ma jok'olunyo woko law ma joruko kwoŋbedo jobedo maleŋ. Joripo ruko nangin man mafodi jok'ocore cegin gi kama ji jocokere iye.
Munyo jacwo no otieko kipima iy Ot pa Were, go otelan woko gi waŋkac ma ŋiyo yuwok ceŋ, aka opima woko ma Ot pa Were thoko.
Go opima yuwok ceŋ gi kedi, mita 250.
Go owire to pima thenge ma yumalo gi kedi, mita 250.
Go owire i thenge ma yupiny gi kedi, to pima mita 250.
Go owire i thenge ma yupodho ceŋ gi kedi, to pima mita 250 i thenge aŋwen je.
Kor ot oyido nitie thoko mita 250 i boro kodi mita 250 i laco, ma ketho pokirok i dier gimaleŋ kodi gima kileŋ.
Kenyo jacwo no okelan i waŋkac ma ŋiyo yuwok ceŋ.
Gikenyo dwoŋ pa Rwoth Were pa Isiraili oyido bino wok yuwok ceŋ, derino pere owinjere paka derino pi mathoth, aka piny olokere maler gi dwoŋ pere.
Menyirok m'aneno ocale gi menyirok m'oyido atieko neno munyo go obino reyo woko tindi madwoŋ, kodi menyirok man m'oyido atieko neno i thengi malawa Kebar, aka apodho piny gi nyiman.
Paka dwoŋ pa Rwoth odonjo i Ot pa Were gi waŋkac ma yuwok ceŋ,
cuny otiŋan malo to kelan i diedipo ma iye, aka neni, dwoŋ pa Rwoth opoŋo iy Ot pa Were.
Munyo jacwo no ocungo kabutan, awinjo dhano luwo kodan woko ma Ot pa Were.

Go owaco ran ni, wod dhano, me kabedo ma kom ma dhum paran kodi kabedo ma par tiendan nyono, kam'alabed'iye i dier Joisiraili cil gi cil. Ot pa Isiraili kendo kilakoco nyingan maleŋ, jo kosa kerin pajo, lamo werin man kosa gi yiko kerin pajo ka.

Kerin jogeto miangin ma thigo pajo kodi kalwok pajo to thenere gi ma ot paran, ma nyaka kor ot kende ama nitie i dier an gi jo, oyido jokoco nyingan maleŋ gi amien pajo ma jotimo, riameno areyo woko jo i nge paran.
Onyo weyi jowowey tim pajo ma lamo calin kodi kelo delkwoŋ kerin pajo cegin kodan; aka nyaka alabedo i dier jo cil gi cil.
Paka ri in, wod dhano, titi ri ot pa Isiraili Ot pa Were, aka weyi jowopima can mere to wiy jo kwot gi reco pajo.

Ka wiy jo okwot gi gima jotieko timo je, miy jo ŋeyo can ma Ot pa Were, kadonjo mere kodi ka wok, kodi cal mere je, or mere kodi cik mere je, aka ndiki piny ruwaŋ jo, ŋey jowokuri to joluwo can je kodi cik je.
Me cik ma Ot pa Were, adec je ma thoko, wi got obedo maleŋ loyo. Me cik ma Ot pa Were.
Wok i pende piny tundo i thenge piny obedo mita acel, gi laco ma adec mita, wok i thenge mathin tundo i madwoŋ obedo mita ario gi laco ma adec mita.
Malo ma migam obedo mita ario, aka wok malo kidho i tunge oyido nitie tunge aŋwen.
Malo ma migam labedo marom i kisi thenge, mita aucel i boro kodi mita aucel i laco.
Diere mere bende labedo marom i thenge je, mita ario i boro kodi mita ario i laco, gi thenge mere adec ma adec mita i laco, pende thoko adec mita. Madalin mere laŋiyo yuwok ceŋ.
Rwoth waco ni, ilamiyo jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi, ma jobedo nyikway Zadok, ma jocore cegin kodan tiyo ran, thwon ri mic ma cwako reco.
Ilakwanyo remo mere mogo, t'iketho i tunge aŋwen je ma migam, kodi i diere aŋwen, kodi i thenge thoko. Ameno apaka ilalonyo t'iloko maleŋ.
Ilakwanyo thwon ma mic ma cwako reco, aka ilawaŋo i kabedo m'oyer ma Ot pa Were, woko ma Kabedo Maleŋ.
I ndelo mar'ario ilamiyo mic ma wod diel m'ongoye gi ŋolo ri mic ma cwako reco, aka ilalonyo migam gi remo mere paka olony gi remo ma thwon.
K'itieko lonyo migam, ilamiyo mic ma thwon m'ongoye gi ŋolo kodi wod rombo wok i mwendi.
Ilaketho ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka jocway ri Were i wi migam jolaywoyo kwoŋ jo cumbi to jomiyo paka mic awaŋa ri Rwoth.
Ma ndelo abirio, kisi ndelo, ilamiyo diel ri mic ma cwako reco, thwon kodi wod rombo bende ma jongoye gi ŋolo.
Ma ndelo abirio jocway ri Were i wi migam jolamiyo cowirok ma cwako reco ri migam aka jolalonyo to joloko maleŋ.
Rumacen ma ndelo ario no, wok i ndelo mar'aboro medirok, jocway ri Were i wi migam jolamiyo i wi migam mic awaŋa mewin kodi mic mewin ma siem, aka alajolo, Rwoth Were waco.
Jacwo no okelan i waŋkac ma woko ma Ot pa Were, ma ŋiyo yuwok ceŋ, aka oyido ocegi.
Rwoth owaco ran ni, waŋkac me ladoŋ m'ocegere aka kiripi yawo. Ongoye ŋata ripo donjo gine, kwoŋbedo Rwoth, Were pa Isiraili otieko donjo gi kenyo, riameno ladoŋ m'ocegere.
Nyaka wod kere, kwoŋbedo go obedo wod kere, ama nyalo bedo to camo cemo ruwaŋ Rwoth. Go nyalo donjo gi kalikondi ma waŋkac to kendo wok gi kenyo.
Jacwo okelan gi royo ma waŋkac ma yumalo yuwaŋ Ot pa Were. Aŋiyo, aka neni, dwoŋ pa Rwoth opoŋo Ot pa Were; t'apodho piny gi nyiman.

Rwoth owaco ran ni, wod dhano, neni m'odoco, kaŋasa, aka cik ithin iwinji maber kisi gim'alawaco rin kwoŋ or je ma Ot pa Rwoth kodi cik mere je, aka ŋey maber jono ma joripo donjo i Ot pa Were kodi jono ma jokiripi donjo.
Waci ri ot pa jogwenyirok no, ot pa Isiraili ni, Rwoth Were waco ama: Awi ot pa Isiraili weyi win amien mewin je ameno.
Wiyeyo jopath, ma jok'othumere donjo i ot paran, wikoco ot paran ka wimiyan cemo, bor kodi remo. Witieko turo cikirok paran g'amien mewin.
Wikikuro cik ma mic paran maleŋ, to wiyero jopath tic riwin kuro cik paran i ot paran.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Ongoye japath ma k'othumere, kwoŋ jopath je ma jonitie i dier Joisiraili, ma ripo donjo i ot paran.
Jolevi ma jojwangan, to jolamo calin munyo Joisiraili jonyeko, jolalimo gir'acula pajo.
Jolabedo i ot paran ka jotiyo, jolakuro waŋkace ma Ot pa Were kodi tiyo i iy Ot pa Were. Jolathumo mic awaŋa kodi cowirok pa ji, aka jolatic ri ji.
Kwoŋbedo jotiyo rijo ruwaŋ calin pajo to jomiyo ot pa Isiraili podho i reco, riameno atieko kwoŋirok kwoŋ jo ni jolalimo gir'acula. Rwoth Were waco.
Jokilacore cegin kodan, tiyo ran paka jocway ri Were i wi migam, kosa bino cegin gi mic paran maleŋ, gigipiny maleŋ loyo, to jolatiŋo wickwot pajo kodi gir'acula mar'amien pajo ma jotimo.
Kucel alaketho jo kuro Ot pa Were, tic mere je kodi gim'imito iye je.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jobedo Jolevi ma nyikway Zadok, ma jokuro ot paran munyo Joisiraili jonyeko, jolacore cegin kodan tiyo ran. Jolamiyan mic mabor, kodi remo, Rwoth Were waco.
Joladonjo i ot paran, jolatic ran i meza paran, aka jolatelo lamo.
Ka jodonjo waŋkace ma diedipo ma iye, jolaruko nangin mafoth, aka jokiripi ruko nanga ma yer rombo ka jotiyo i waŋkace ma diedipo ma iye kodi i iye.
Joripo ruko junga mafoth i wi jo, kodi palere mafoth i pier jo. Jokiripi tweyirok gi gima miyo jo cwero kwok.
Ka jowok woko i diedipo ma woko bongi ji, joripo lunyo woko nangin ma tic, to joketho i kisika maleŋ aka jolaruko nangin man, ŋey nangin pajo wokiri womiy ji litho.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam jokiripi madho vini ka jodonjo i diedipo ma iye.
Jokiripi nywomo citho, kosa dhako m'opokere gi cwore, kwanyowoko nyako mambula wok i ot pa Isiraili, kosa citho m'oyido obedo cipa jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Ka kiŋunyaŋunya nitie, joripo bedo jothum banja, aka joripo thumo banja luwo kwoŋ thumo banja paran. Joripo kuro cik paran kodi or paran kwoŋ kalimin m'ayero, aka joripo kuro sabato paran maleŋ.
Rumacen ma bedo m'olony kendo, iripo kwano rigo ndelo abirio.
I ndelo ma go donjo iye i Kabedo Maleŋ, i diedipo ma iye, tiyo, go ripo miyo mic ma cwako reco, Rwoth Were waco.
Jolacamo mic ma cemo, mic ma cwako reco, mic ma cul, kodi kisi gim'omiy ri Rwoth i Isiraili.
Olemo mewin je marapena, mic ma nger je kwoŋ mic mewin je labedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam. Wilamiyo jo bende cemo mewin marapena, ŋey silwany wobedi i ot mewin.
Jocway ri Were i wi migam jokiripi camo gimoro je, winyo kosa ogwaŋ, ma won otho kosa m'ogwaŋ madudi oneko.
Ka wipoko lowo paka alunja, wilaketho gicen ri Rwoth adec ma lowo paka adec maleŋ, kilomita apar g'ario g'adec i boro kodi kilomita apar i laco. Adec no gibe labedo maleŋ.
Iy'adec me labedo adec ma ja thenge aŋwen marom ri Ot pa Were. Kisi thenge ripo bedo mita 250 aka ripo bedo diedipo thoko ma mita piero ario g'abic i laco.
Kwoŋ adec maleŋ me, iripo kipima adec ma romo kilomita gana apar g'ario g'adec i boro kodi kilomita gana abic i laco, kama ripo bedo Kabedo Maleŋ.
Meno labedo adec maleŋ ma lowo, ma ripo bedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam, ma jotiyo i Kabedo Maleŋ aka jotiyo ri Rwoth i Ot pa Were, aka labedo kabedo ri udi pajo kodi Kabedo Maleŋ ri Ot pa Were.
Adec man, kilomita gana apar g'ario g'adec i boro kodi gana apar i laco, labedo apa Jolevi ma jotiyo i Ot pa Were, paka kabedo ma geto tindi pajo ma bed'iye.
Kam'oluwere gi adec maleŋ wilaketho gicen paka adec maleŋ ma geto tindi madwoŋ, mita gana ario g'adec i laco, kodi mita gana apar g'ario g'adec i boro, ri ot pa Isiraili gibe.
Ilamiyo wod kere lowo i thenge ario je, ma adec maleŋ kodi adec ma geto tindi madwoŋ. Latundo wok yupodho ceŋ tundo yuwok ceŋ, boro mere lawok yupodho ceŋ tundo yuwok ceŋ, tirtir gi adec pa nonin.
Me labedo adec ma wod kere ma dhumo labedo gine i lowo ma Isiraili, ŋey kendo wokiri wodiy ji, to go laweyo adec ma lowo m'odoŋ bedo apa nonin ma Isiraili.
Rwoth Were waco ama. Oromo, awi jodhum ma Isiraili! Weyi win akaka kodi diyo ji. Tim win tiro kodi gim'otire. Weyi win riemo ji paran.
Efa kodi bathi joripo bedo marom, aka bathi ripo rom g'acel ma wi apar ma homa, aka efa acel wiy apar ma homa. Homa
Sekel ripo rom gi gera piero ario. Sekel piero ario kodi sekel piero ario g'abic kodi sekel apar g'abic ripo rom gi mina riwin.
Me mic ma wiripo miyo. Acel wiy aucel ma efa wok i kisi homa ma ŋano, acel wiy aucel ma efa wok i kisi homa ma bale.
Mo ripo bedo acel wiy apar ma bathi wok i kisi homa, paka homa rom gi bathi apar.
Rombo acel wok i mwendi 200 wok i lowo ma kwath ma Isiraili. Me mic ma cemo, mic awaŋa, kodi mic ma siem, ma cwako reco pajo. Rwoth Were waco.
Ji ma lowo je joripo joriwere gi wod kere i miyo mic.

To me labedo tic pa wod kere kwoŋ mic awaŋa, mic ma cemo, mic ma math, kodi kalimin ma Dwe manyen, Sabato, kodi kalimin man. Go ripo miyo mic ma cwako reco, mic ma cemo, kodi mic awaŋa kodi mic ma siem, ma cwako reco pa ji ma Isiraili.
Rwoth Were waco ama. K'acel ma dwe marapena, ilakwanyo rwath m'ongoye gi ŋolo, t'ilonyo Ot pa Were.
Jacway ri Were i wi migam lakwanyo remo mogo ma mic ma cwako reco, to ketho i nyim dhiot ma Ot pa Were, i sondin aŋwen ma migam, kodi i nyim waŋkace ma diedipo ma iye.
Ilatimo gimoro acel k'ario ma dwe ri kisi dhano m'otimo reco ma k'oŋeyo; ŋey iloki Ot pa Were maleŋ.
I ndelo no wod kere lamiyo rwath paka mic ma cwako reco pere kodi ri ji ma lowo je.
I ndelo abirio ma kalima go lamiyo mic awaŋa ri Rwoth. Rwath abirio, wot rombo abirio ma jongoye gi ŋolo kisi ndelo kodi wod diel kisi ndelo ri mic ma cwako reco.
Ri kisi rwath acel kodi wod rombo acel m'icowere gine, ripo wobedi mic ma lita apar g'ario g'adec ma duma kodi lita adek ma mo oliv.
K'apar g'abic ma dwe mar'abirio kodi ri ndelo abirio ma kalima, go lamiyo mic acel no ri mic ma cwako reco kodi mic awaŋa kodi mic ma cemo kodi ri mo.
Rwoth Were waco ama. Waŋkac ma diedipo ma iye ma ŋiyo yuwok ceŋ ripo doŋ m'ocegere i ndelo aucel ma tic, to i ndelo ma Sabato iripo yawo kodi i ndelo ma Dwe Manyen.

Wod kere ladonjo gi kalikondi ma waŋkac gi woko, aka go latero kabedo pere gi nyim waŋkac. Jocway ri Were i wi migam jolamiyo mic awaŋa pere kodi mic ma siem pere, aka go lakule piny to lamo yuwaŋ waŋkac. Go lawok, to waŋkac ripo doŋ m'oyawere tundo othieno.
Ji ma piny joripo kulok piny to jolamo ruwaŋ Rwoth i dhiot ma waŋkac i ndelo ma Sabato je kodi i ndelo ma Dwe Manyen.
Wod kere lamiyo Rwoth mic awaŋa i ndelo ma Sabato ma nyithindhi rombo aucel ma jongoye gi ŋolo kodi wod rombo m'ongoye gi ŋolo.
Mic ma cemo kodi wod rombo ripo bedo lita apar g'adec ma duma, aka mic ma cemo kodi nyithindhi rombo ripo bedo marom paka go won mito miyo, kanyacel gi lita adek ma mo oliv.
I ndelo ma Dwe Manyen go lamiyo rwath m'ongoye gi ŋolo, nyithindhi rombo aucel kodi wod rombo m'ongoye gi ŋolo.
Paka mic ma cemo go lamiyo efa
Ka wod kere donjo go ripo donjo gi kalikondi ma waŋkac, aka go lawok gi kenyo won.

Ka ji ma piny jobino ruwaŋ Rwoth i kalimin, ŋata donjo gi waŋkac ma yumalo ripo wok gi waŋkac ma yupiny, aka ŋata donjo gi waŋkac ma yupiny ripo wok gi waŋkac ma yumalo. Jokiripi wok gi kama jodonj'iye gine, to joripo woth tirtir.
Ka jodonjo, wod kere ladonjo gi jo, aka ka jowok, go lawok gi jo.
I kalimin kodi hongo m'oyik, mic ma cemo kodi rwath labedo efa acel, aka gi wod rombo efa acel, aka gi nyithindhi rombo marom paka dhano mito miyo, kanyacel gi lita adek ma mo ri kisi mic no.

Ka wod kere miyo mic ma go won mito, obedi mic awaŋa kosa mic ma siem ri Rwoth, iripo yawo waŋkac ma yuwok ceŋ rigo, aka go lamiyo mic pere awaŋa kodi mic ma siem paka go timo i ndelo ma sabato. Go bende lawok gi kenyo t'icego waŋkac.
Wod kere lamiyo nyathi rombo ma jaoro acel, m'ongoye gi ŋolo ri mic awaŋa ri Rwoth kisi ndelo, kisi odikin.
Go bende lamiyo mic ma cemo gine kisi odikin ma kikeŋ. Ripo bedo kilo acel ma moko kodi lita acel ma mo ma nywowo moko, paka mic ma cemo ri Rwoth. Me obedo or ma cil gi cil.
Iripo miyo Rwoth nyathi rombo kodi moko kodi mo kisi odikin cil gi cil.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Ka wod kere omiy acel kwoŋ wote mic wok kwoŋ lim pere, labedo apa wode, kwoŋbedo obedo lim pajo ma peco.
To ka go omiy acel kwoŋ ŋecin pere, labedo apa ŋeca no tundo i oro ma gonyirok, to go dwoko ri wod kere. Nyaka wot wod kere kende ama joripo doŋ gi mic wok iy'alunja pere.
Wod kere kiripi mayo ji lim pajo, riemo jo woko kama jobed'iye. Go ripo miyo wote mic wok i lim pere, ŋey wongoye kwoŋ ji paran ma woriem i lim pajo.
Kenyo jacwo no okelan i kadonjo, m'oyido nitie i thengi waŋkac, i bol ma yumalo ma kisikin maleŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam. Kenyo aneno kabedo i cowe pajo yupodho ceŋ.

Jacwo no owaco ran ni, “Me obedo kabedo ma jocway ri Were i wi migam jolated'iye mic ma cul kodi mic ma cwako reco kodi kama jolated'iye mugat ŋey jokiri jowowodhi woko i diedipo ma woko, ŋey leŋo mere wokiri womiy ji litho.”
Kenyo jacwo no owodhan i diedipo ma woko, to telan kalo sondin aŋwen ma diedipo.
I kisi sonda ma diedipo oyido nitie diedipo mathin, ma mita piero ario i boro kodi mita apar g'abic i laco.
Thoko i diedipo mathindho oyido nitie kor ot macek ma telin, aka kwoŋ kor ot thoko oyido nitie kendin.
Jacwo no owaco ran ni, “Me fumbirin kama jotic ma Ot pa Were jolated'iye riŋo ma ji jokelo ma cowirok.”
Kenyo go owodhan gi waŋkac ma yumalo to telan thoko woko kiri i waŋkac ma woko ma ŋiyo yuwok ceŋ. Pi oyido wok i thenge ma yupiny mere.
Munyo jacwo no okadho yuwok ceŋ gi thol ma kipima i cinge, go opima mita 500 aka otelan luwo i pi, aka oyido luth ma tundo iy'odondo tiendan.
Go opima kendo mita 500 aka otelan i pi, aka oyido luth m'otundo kiri i congan. Go opima kendo mita 500 aka otelan i pi, aka thutho mere oyido tundo i pieran.
Go opima kendo mita 500 aka manago obedo malawa m'oyido akinyali ŋado, kole pi oyido osira malo, oyido luth ma dhano nyalo buko, malawa m'oyido kiŋadere.
Jacwo no owaco ran ni, “Wod dhano, itieko neno gime?”
Kenyo go otelan gik gi thengi malawa.
Munyo adwoko, aneno yen madongo kweth i thengi malawa acel kodi man.
Jacwo no owaco ran ama: Pi me mol kadho yuwok ceŋ aka kadho piny kiri i Araba. Aka ka odonjo i nam ma pi mere kimol, pi mere lokere maber.
Kisi kama pi mol'iye, kisi cwec makwo ma buko labed'iye, aka labedo rec kweth, tekin pi me tundo koro. Pi lalokere maber, aka kisi kama pi me lamol'iye lamiyo kwo.
Ji jolacungo i thengi nam kitoga, ji ma jowok i Engedi tundo kiri i Eneglayim. Labedo kabedo ma yaro bwo, aka mere rec mere labedo kweth paka rec ma nam madwoŋ.
To sa mere kodi kidiwin mere jokilabedo maber, iripo weyo jo paka ka golo cumbi.

I kisi thenge ma malawa, ladongo kisi nger yath kodi cemo. Boke pajo kilathwo kosa olemo pajo kilarumo, to jolabedo kisi dwe kwoŋbedo pi mol rijo wok i Ot pa Were. Olemo pajo labedo cemo, aka boke pajo ma cango two.
Rwoth Were waco ama: Nitie kew m'iripo oro ma poko lowo ri lim alunja i dier nonin apar g'ario ma Isiraili. Yozefu latero adec ario.
Iripo poko marom. Akwoŋere miyo kwarere mewin lowo me, aka labedo lim mewin alunja.
Me labedo kew ma lowo. Yumalo, wok i Nam Madwoŋ gi royo ma Hethlon tundo kiri i Lebohamath medirok kiri i Zedad,
Berotha, Sirayim manitie i kew gi Damasiko kodi kew ma Hamath, tundo kiri i Hazerhatikon, manitie i kew ma Haura.
Ameno kew lawok i nam tundo kiri i Hazarenon, manitie yumalo ma kew ma Damasiko kodi kew ma Hamath yumalo. Me labedo thenge ma yumalo.
Kew ma yuwok ceŋ labedo wok i dier Haura kodi Damasiko, i thengi Yordan i dier Giliad kodi lowo ma Isiraili kadho i nam ma yuwok ceŋ kodi tundo kiri Tamar. Me labedo thenge ma yuwok ceŋ.
Kew ma yupiny lawok i Tamar tundo kiri i pi ma Meriba Kades, aka wok kenyo i thengi kew ma Misir tundo kiri i Nam Madwoŋ. Me labedo thenge ma yupiny.
Kew ma yupodho ceŋ pokere gi Nam Madwoŋ tundo kiri tirtir gi Lebohamath. Me labedo thenge ma yupodho ceŋ.
Ameno apaka ilapoko lowo me i dier win cungo kwoŋ nonin ma Isiraili.
Wilapoko paka lim mewin kodi ri jopath ma jobedo i dier win aka jotieko jonywolo nyithindho i dier win. Jolabedo riwin paka Joisiraili, aka wilapoko jo lim i dier nonin ma Isiraili.
I kisi nono ma jopath jonitie iye, wiripo poko jo lim, Rwoth Were waco.

Me nyingi nonin ma Isiraili. Cako i kew ma yumalo, i royo ma Hethlon, wok i Lebohamath, tundo kiri Harayenon manitie i kew ma Damasiko gi Hamath yumalo, yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ nam tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Dan.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Dan, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Aser.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Aser, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Nafital.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Nafital, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Manase.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Manase, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Efrayim.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Efrayim, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa Ruben.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Ruben, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Yuda.

Adec ma kewere g'apa Yuda, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo ma wiripo ketho gicen. Ripo bedo mita apar g'ario g'adec i laco aka boro mere ripo rom g'adec pa nonin, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, gi Ot pa Were i diere.
Adec ma wilaketho gicen ri Rwoth labedo kilomita apar g'ario g'adec i boro kodi kilomita apar i laco.
Me labedo adec maleŋ. Jocway ri Were i wi migam jolatero adec ma romo kilomita apar g'ario g'adec wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ kodi kilomita abic wok yumalo tundo yupiny gi Ot pa Rwoth i diere.
Adec me labedo apa jocway ri Were i wi migam ma jobedo nyikway Zadok, ma jotiyo ran g'adieri, ma jok'oriwere gi Joisiraili munyo jonyeko, paka Jolevi man jotimo.
Adec me labedo apajo paka adec manyakare wok kwoŋ adec maleŋ ma lowo, Kabedo Maleŋ loyo, ma kewere kodi adec pa Jolevi.
Ma kewere kodi adec pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, Jolevi bende jolabedo g'adec ma kilomita apar g'ario g'adec wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, kodi kilomita abic wok yumalo tundo yupiny.
Jokiripi kitana kosa wilo gi giman je aka jokiripi poko adec ma lowo m'oyer me, kwoŋbedo obedo maleŋ ri Rwoth.
Adec m'odoŋ, kilomita apar g'ario g'adec kodi kilomita ario g'adec, ilaoro ri tindi madwoŋ, ma bed'iye kodi kam'othangere. I diere mere ripo bedo tindi madwoŋ.
Me labedo rapim mere, yumalo mita 2,250 yupiny mita 2,250 yuwok ceŋ mita 2,250 kodi yupodho ceŋ mita 2,250.
Tindi madwoŋ labedo gi kam'othangere, yumalo mita 125 yupiny mita 125 yuwok ceŋ mita 125 kodi yupodho ceŋ mita 125.
Adec lowo ma kewere g'adec lowo maleŋ labedo kilomita abic yuwok ceŋ, kilomita abic yupodho ceŋ. Cemo m'ifuro iye labedo apa jotic ma tindi madwoŋ.
Jotic ma tindi madwoŋ wok i kisi nono jolafur'iye.
Adec je ma wiripo ketho gicen ripo bedo kilomita apar g'ario g'adec i kisi thenge, aka wilawodho mic ma leŋo wobedi apa tindi madwoŋ.
Adec m'odoŋ mar'adec maleŋ kodi lim ma tindi madwoŋ labedo apa wod kere. Ripo cako wok iy'adec ma kilomita 2,250 i kew ma yuwok ceŋ kodi i kew ma yupodho ceŋ kilomita 2,250 tirtir g'adec pa nonin.
Lim pa Jolevi ripo bedo i dier lim pa wod kere. Adec pa kere labedo i dier adec pa Yuda kodi adec pa Benyamin.
Paka ri nonin m'odoŋ, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Benyamin.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Benyamin, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo apa nono Simeo.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Simeo, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Isakar.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Isakar, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Zebulun.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Zebulun, wok yuwok ceŋ tundo yupodho ceŋ, labedo adec pa nono Gad.
Ma kewere g'adec pa Gad yupiny, kew lawok Tamar kiri i pi ma Meriba Kades, aka wok kenyo i thengi kew ma Misir tundo kiri i Nam Madwoŋ.
Me lowo ma wilapoko paka lim alunja i dier nonin ma Isiraili, aka me adec pajo, Rwoth Were waco.
labedo waŋkace adek: Waŋkac pa Ruben, waŋkac pa Yuda, kodi waŋkac pa Levi. Waŋkace ma tindi madwoŋ wolwoŋi gi nyingi nonin ma Isiraili,
yuwok ceŋ ma ripo bedo mita 2,250 labedo waŋkace adek: Waŋkac pa Yozefu, waŋkac pa Benyamin kodi waŋkac pa Dan.
Yupiny ma ripo bedo mita 2,250 labedo waŋkace adek: Waŋkac pa Simeo, waŋkac pa Isakar kodi waŋkac pa Zebulun.
Yupodho ceŋ ma ripo bedo mita 2,250 labedo waŋkace adek: Waŋkac pa Gad, waŋkac pa Aser kodi waŋkac pa Nafital.
Boro ma tindi madwoŋ thoko ripo bedo mita 9,000. Nyingi tindi madwoŋ wok i ndelo no medirok yuwaŋe labedo ni: Rwoth nitie Kenyo.
Rwoth omiyo Yehoyakim kere ma Yuda i cingi Nebukadineza, kanyacel gi gigipiny ma Ot pa Were. Nebukadineza otero jo i lowo ma Sinar, to ketho i kakan ma ot pa werin pere.
Kere Nebukadineza owodho or ri Asipenaz jatel ma muluwir pere kelo Joisiraili mogo ma jowok i peco pa kere kodi jodhum.
Yac ma jongoye gi ŋolo aka joŋon, ma jonitie gi rieko kweth, ŋeyo kodi niaŋ, jonyalo tiyo i muluwir pa kere; aka inyalo fonjo jo ndiko kodi dhodhok pa Jokaldin.
Kere oyero rijo pith ma kisi ndelo wok kwoŋ cemo ma kere won camo kodi vini ma go madho. Oyido iripo fonjo jo ma oro adek, aka rumacen wokel jo ruwaŋ kere.
Kwoŋ yac me obedo yac ma Yuda, Daniel, Hanania, Misael kodi Azaria jonono pa Yuda.
Jatel ma muluwir ocwoko rijo nyingi jo. Ri Daniel olwoŋo go Beltesazar, ri Hanania olwoŋo go Sadirak, ri Misael olwoŋo go Misaki, aka Azaria olwoŋo go Abedinego.
To Daniel obedo g'atoŋa i cunye ma kwero kocirok gi camo cemo kodi madho vini pa kere. Ameno okwayo jatel ma muluwir ŋey wokiri wokocere.
Were omiyo Daniel nwaŋo wor kodi wor ruwaŋ jatel ma muluwir.
Jatel ma muluwir owaco ri Daniel ni, “Alworo rwoth jadwoŋ paran kere, m'oyero cemo kodi math mewin. Ka go onen nike win wimok loyo yac man ma jobedo m'iworo mewin, ilaketho kwo paran i teko.”
Daniel okwayo jakur m'oyido jatel ma muluwir oketho kuro Daniel, Hanania, Misael, kodi Azaria ni,
“Mondo tem ŋecin perin ma ndelo apar. Weyi womiy wan fufa wacam kodi pi wamadhi.
Inyalo kipima cal mawan gi cal pa yac ma jocamo cemo pa kere, t'itiyo gi wan paka in won ineno.”
Go owinjo wac pajo me, aka otemo jo ma ndelo apar.
I gike ma ndelo apar, onwaŋere nike joneno maber aka oyido jocwe loyo yac man m'oyido jocamo cemo pa kere.
Ameno jakur omedere kwanyo woko adec ma cemo pajo kodi vini m'oyido joripo madho, aka omiyo jo fufa.
Were omiyo yac aŋwen me bedo gi ŋeyo, niaŋ ndiko je kodi rieko. Daniel oyido nitie gi niaŋ kwoŋ menyirok je kodi lek.
I gike ma oro adek ma kere oyido owaco nike wokel'iye jo, jatel ma muluwir okelo jo ruwaŋ kere Nebukadineza.
Kere oluwo gi jo, aka kwoŋ yac je ongoye ŋat'onwaŋ m'oyido pimere gi Daniel, Hanania, Misael, kodi Azaria. Riameno jotiyo ruwaŋ kere.
Kwoŋ kisi gimoro ma rieko kodi niaŋ ma kere openjo jo, onwaŋere nike jo oyido joloyo dipar jomiliel kodi jondijo ma joneno gima latimere i ker pa kere je.
Daniel odoŋ kenyo kiri i oro marapena ma dhum pa Kere Siras.
I oro mar'ario ma dhum pa Nebukadineza, Nebukadineza oleko lek m'ocando cuny go to waro kwoŋe nindo.
Kere owodho or wolwoŋi jomiliel, jondijo ma neno gima latimere, jothieth, kodi Jokaldin bino waco ri kere lek pere. Ameno jobino to jocungo ruwaŋ kere.
Kere owaco rijo ni, “Aleko lek ma cunyan oraman niaŋ kwoŋe.”
Jokaldin jowaco ri kere i Dhoaramayik ni, “Awi kere, yindira! Waci ri ŋecin perin lek, aka walanyutho dwoŋ mere.”
Kere odwoko Jokaldin ni, “Lek orwenyo ran. Ka wikiwaco ran lek no kodi dwoŋ mere, ilatoŋo win mathindho thindho, aka udi mewin lalokere gundin.
To ka wiwaco ran lek kodi dwoŋ mere, alamiyo win mic, kemba kodi wor madwoŋ. Riameno wac ran win lek kodi dwoŋ mere.”
Jodwoko madirio ni, “Weyi kutho kere wowaci ri ŋecin pere lek, aka nyaka walamiyo dwoŋ mere.”
Kere owaco ni, “Aŋeyo maber swa nike witemo nyeko sawa, kwoŋbedo wiŋeyo ni atieko ridho paro paran.
Ka wikiwaco ran lek no, nitie nyaka or acel riwin. Witieko yerok luwo wac twodo kodi banirok cuka hongo owire. Riameno wac ran win lek no, aka nyaka aŋey ni winyalo tito dwoŋ mere.”

Jokaldin jodwoko ruwaŋ kere ni, “Ongoye dhano i piny manyalo tuco gima kere mito! Adieri ongoye kere, makada nende dwoŋ kosa jameni m'otieko penjo jandijo ma timo gir'aura, kosa jondijo ma neno gima latimere, kosa jathieth nger gime.
Kwac pa kere tek swa m'ongoye ŋata nyalo tuco kwanyo woko werin, ma jokibedi i dier ji.”
Gime omiyo kere nge gi gero swa, aka omiyo or nike worey woko cwo mariek je i Babilon.
Munyo or owok nike woneki cwo mariek, orangi Daniel kodi wadi neko jo.
Daniel odwoko Ariok jatel pa jonek pa kere m'oyido kadho neko cwo mariek i Babilon gi gwokirok kodi rieko.
Daniel openjo Ariok ni, “Raŋo kere omiyo or ma piyo ameno?” Ariok otito ri Daniel ginago.
Onyo Daniel okidho bongi kere to kwayo nike womiy go hongo mogo, ŋey wonyali tito ri kere dwoŋ ma lek pere.
Daniel odok peco to waco ri wadi, Hanania, Misael, kodi Azaria;
aka owaco rijo rango wor pa Were ma i polo kwoŋ nyaliŋliŋ me, ŋey Daniel kodi wadi kanyacel gi cwo ma joriek i Babilon jokiri joworere.
Kenyo nyaliŋliŋ no onyuthere ri Daniel i menyirok wor, aka Daniel opako Were ma i polo.
Daniel odwoko ka waco ni:
“Pak wobedi ri nyingi Were mar'adieri cil gi cil,
kole rieko kodi meni obedo apere.
Go wiro hongo kodi ndir,
kwanyo woko kerin aka ketho man,
miyo rieko ri jomariek,
kodi ŋeyo ri joma niaŋ.
Go nyutho nyaliŋliŋ kodi gim'opanere,
go oŋeyo gima nitie i mudho,
aka lero nitie gi go.
Afoyin, aka apakin,
Awi Were pa kwarere paran,
kole itieko miyan rieko kodi meni,
inyuthan gima wakwayin,
itieko miyo wan ŋeyo gima kere mito.”
Daniel okidho bongi Ariok, ma kere oyido oyero neko woko cwo mariek je i Babilon, aka owaco rigo ni, “Ikir'ineki cwo mariek ma Babilon, teran bongi kere, aka alatuco dwoŋ ma lek pere.”
Ariok oredo piyo tero Daniel bongi kere aka owaco ri kere ni, “Atieko nwaŋo jacwo i dier jotwec ma jowok i Yuda manyalo tuco dwoŋ ma lek.”
Kere odwoko ka penjo Daniel, m'oyido ilwoŋo ni Beltesazar ni, “Inyalo waco ran lek m'aleko kodi dwoŋ mere?”
Daniel odwoko kere ka waco ni, “Ongoye jomariek, jondijo ma timo gir'aura, jondijo ma neno gima latimere kosa jothieth ma jonyalo waco ri kere gima kere penjo.
To nitie Were ma i polo ma nyutho nyaliŋliŋ, aka go otieko nyutho Kere Nebukadineza gima latimere i hongo ma bino. Me a lek kodi menyirok m'ineno munyo inindo i kanindo perin:
Paro obino rin, awi kere, munyo inindo i kanindo perin, ma gigipiny ma latimere i hongo ma bino, aka ŋata nyutho nyaliŋliŋ oyawo rin gima latimere.
To paka ri an, nyaliŋliŋ me k'onyuthere ran kwoŋbedo anitie gi rieko loyo joman, to r'atoŋa ma miyo kere ŋeyo dwoŋ ma lek pere aka ŋey iniaŋ paro ma cunyin.”
“Aŋiyo, awi kere, aka neni, cal madwoŋ swa ocungo ruwaŋin. Cal me obedo ma ragaŋ swa, aka ma pilin swa ma neno mere bwoko jo.
Wic mere obedo ma zahabu macil, kore kodi cinge obedo ma feza, aka diere kodi bambe obedo ma ywel.
Tiende obedo nyweny, olenge mere obedo nyweny m'oruwere gi lowo nyamasiga.
Paka iŋiyo, tele mogo, ma k'omukere gi cingi dhano, ogoyo olenge ma cal no ma nyweny kodi nyamasiga to turo mathindho thindho.

Kenyo nyweny, lowo nyamasiga, ywel, feza, kodi zahabu joŋinyere mathindho thindho to jolokere paka cuŋ i kisia ma hongo ma ceŋ. Koyo okudho jo woko ma k'oweyo bathi jo. To tele m'ogoyo cal no olokere got madwoŋ aka opoŋo piny gibe.”
“Meno a lek; onyo walatuco dwoŋ mere ruwaŋ kere.
In awi kere, ibedo kere pa kerin, ma Were ma i polo otieko miyo ker, meni, teko, kodi dwoŋ,
go otieko ketho i cingin ji kama jonitie iye je, ogwaŋe madudi kodi winyin ma koyo. Go okethin dhumo je; in iŋat'ibedo wic ma zahabu no.
Rumacen yuŋeyin laay ker man mathin loyo aperin, aka kucel ker mar'adek ma ywel, ama ladhumo piny gibe.
Labedo ker mar'aŋwen, matek paka nyweny, paka nyweny ŋinyo aka ŋidho kisi gimoro, laŋinyo to ŋidho woko ker me je.
Olenge kodi lwete m'ineno obedo lowo nyamasiga kodi nyweny no, labedo ker m'otiakere, to teko ma nyweny mogo labed'iye, pak'ineno nyweny oruwere gi lowo nyamasiga.
Pak'ineno olenge kodi lwete oyido obedo nyweny kodi lowo nyamasiga, ameno apaka ker labedo, matek to bende manyap.
Pak'ineno nyweny oruwere gi lowo nyamasiga, ameno apaka jolaruwere kanyacel i nywomirok, to jokilamakere kanyacel, paka nyweny kinyal makirok gi lowo nyamasiga.
I hongo pa kerin no Were ma i polo laketho ker ma kilareyo, kosa k'owey ri ji man. Ker me labedo cil gi cil, aka laŋinyo woko kerin je to kelo jo i gike;

pak'ineno tele ma k'omukere gi cingi dhano oŋinyo nyweny, ywel, lowo nyamasiga, feza, kodi zahabu. Were madwoŋ otieko miyo kere ŋeyo gima latimere i hongo ma bino. Lek no obedo ameno, aka dwoŋ mere otire.”
Kere Nebukadineza ogore piny gi nyime, to lamo Daniel, aka omiyo or nike womiy Daniel mic kodi cowirok.
Kere owaco ri Daniel ni, “Adieri Were perin obedo Were pa werin je aka nyutho nyaliŋliŋ, kole inyalo tuco nyaliŋliŋ me!”
Kere omedo Daniel dwoŋ, omiyo go mic madongo, aka oketho go bedo jadhum ma Babilon kodi bedo jadwoŋ pa cwo ma joriek je i Babilon.
Daniel oketho kwac pere ri kere, aka oyero Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego bedo i tel i Babilon. To Daniel odoŋ i waŋkac pa kere.
Kere Nebukadineza otimo cal ma zahabu ma mita piero adek i boro kodi mita adek i laco; go oketho kam'obipere ma Dura i Babilon.
Kere Nebukadineza ooro wocok, jodhum, jogavana, jomic rieko, jothum banja, jopido, jokan, kodi jotel je mar'adec je bino i kalima ma cal ma Kere Nebukadineza oyido otimo.
Ameno jodhum, jomic rieko, jothum banja, jopido, jokan, kodi jotel mar'adec je jocokere i kalima ma cal ma Kere Nebukadineza oyido otimo.
Kenyo mogo ogoyo koko malo ni, “Kere miyo or ri ji je, nonin je, kodi dhodhok je,
nike kisi ka wiwinjo dwondi tungi ogwaŋ, milowe, dingidi, dongo, tongol, bul kodi nger gi wer je, wiripo podho piny lamo cal ma zahabu ma Nebukadineza otimo.
Ŋata kilapodho piny lamo ilabolo go i mac m'okur gi sawa no won.”

Riameno, tekin ji je jowinjo dwondi tungi ogwaŋ, milowe, dingidi, dongo, tongol, bul, kodi nger gi wer je, ji je, nonin je, dhodhok je, jopodho piny lamo cal ma zahabu ma Kere Nebukadineza oyido otimo.
Obedo i sawa paka meno ma Jokaldin mogo jowok kisegeya Joyuda.
Jowaco ri Kere Nebukadineza ni, “Awi Kere, yindira cil gi cil!
In, Awi Kere, itieko miyo or nike kisi dhano m'owinji dwondi tungi ogwaŋ, milowe, dingidi, dongo, tongol, bul kodi nger gi wer je, ripo podho piny to lamo cal ma zahabu;
aka ŋata kilapodho piny lamo ilabolo go i mac m'okur.
To nitie Joyuda m'iketho jo i tel i Babilon: Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego. Jo jokiluwi or perin, Awi Kere. Jokilam werin perin kosa cal ma zahabu m'itimo.”
Kenyo Nebukadineza i nge omiyo or nike wokel Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego; ameno okeli cwo no ruwaŋ kere.
Nebukadineza openjo jo ni, “Obedo adieri, Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego, nike wikilam werin paran kosa cal ma zahabu m'atimo?

Onyo ka wiyikere ka wiwinjo dwondi tungi ogwaŋ, milowe, dingidi, dongo, tongol, bul, kodi nger gi wer je, podho piny lamo cal m'atimo; meno ber. To ka wikilamo ilabolo win i mac m'okur gi sawa no won; aka were mene no ma labotho win wok i cingan?”
Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego jodwoko kere ni, “Awi Nebukadineza, wakilabedo gi kiosa kwoŋ wac me.
K'inen Were ma walamo nyalo botho wan kwoŋ mac m'okur kodi wok i cingin, awi kere, weyi go wobothi wan.
To makada nende go k'obothi wan, Awi kere, ŋey adieri nike wakilalamo werin perin kosa cal ma zahabu m'itimo.”
Nebukadineza omako nge swa gi Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego to coko nyime. Go omiyo or nike woloki mac m'okur dibirio loyo paka kisi ndelo.
Nebukadineza omiyo or ri cwo matek loyo kwoŋ jolweny pere tweyo Sadirak, Misaki kodi Abedinego kodi bolo jo i mac m'okur.
Ameno otwey cwo me, munyo fodi joruko law pajo, aka obol jo i mac m'okur.
Onyo kwoŋbedo kere oyido omiyo or nike woloki mac m'okur dibirio loyo paka kisi ndelo, lietho ma mac oneko woko cwo ma jotiŋo Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego.
To cwo adek me, Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego jopodho m'otwey jo i mac m'okur.
Kere Nebukadineza obedo gi dhier swa aka opor malo piyo. Go openjo jomic rieko pere ni, “K'obedo cwo adek ma watweyo to wabolo i mac?”
Jodwoko ni, “Meno adieri Kere.”
Nebukadineza odwoko ni, “To kole aneno cwo aŋwen ma jogonyere, jowotho i dier mac, aka jok'owaŋ. Mar'aŋwen mere cal wod werin.”
Nebukadineza ocore cegin dho dhok mac m'okur to lwoŋo: Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego, ŋecin pa Were ma Jamalo Swa, wok win, aka biye win ka! Ameno jowok i mac.
Jodhum, jogavana, jomic rieko pa kere jocokere kanyacel aka joneno cwo me, ma mac k'onyalo waŋo jo, kosa yer pajo k'orewere, kosa law pajo k'owaŋ, aka kiri ŋwece mac oyido ongoye kwoŋ jo.

Nebukadineza owaco ni, “Were pa Sadirak, Misaki kodi Abedinego wopak, m'ooro malaika pere botho ŋecin pere ma jogeno i go. Jokwero luwo or pa kere to jojwango delkwoŋ jo makiweno lamo were man je kwanyo woko Were pajo won.”

“Riameno amiyo or: Ji mogo je, nono mogo je, kosa dhodhok m'oluwere kwoŋ Were pa Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego ilatoŋo mathindho thindho t'isika woko udi pajo; kole ongoye were manyalo botho i nger me.”
Kenyo kere omedo Sadirak, Misaki, kodi Abedinego dwoŋ iy'adec ma Babilon.
Kere Nebukadineza, owaco ri ji je, nonin je, kodi dhodhok ma i piny ni: Weyi siem wobedi riwin gibe!
Awinjo gi kisangala nyutho gir'aura, kodi ranyuth ma Were Ma Jamalo Swa otieko timo ran.
Ranyuth pere dongo nedi,
nga gir'aura pere dimeni!
Ker pere obedo ma cil gi cil,
aka adhum pere obedo ma wok i luse tundo i luse.
An Nebukadineza oyido abedo i ot paran, i kwo mayom;
Aleko lek m'obwokan swa; aka paro kodi menyirok m'obino ran i kanindo ocandan.
Ameno amiyo or ni wokel cwo mariek je i Babilon ruwaŋan ŋey jowonyal waco ran dwoŋ ma lek no.
Kenyo jondijo ma jotimo gir'aura, jondijo ma neno gima latimere, Jokaldin, kodi jothieth jobino, awaco rijo lek no, to jok'onyalo tito ran dwoŋ mere.
I cowe mere Daniel, ma nyinge obedo Beltesazar, paka nyingi were paran, go m'opoŋ gi cuny pa Were maleŋ obino ruwaŋan, t'awaco rigo lek no:
Beltesazar, jadwoŋ pa cwo mariek, aŋeyo paka cuny pa Were maleŋ nitie kwoŋin, aka ongoye nyaliŋliŋ matek rin, wac ran dwoŋ ma lek me.
Me menyirok m'aneno munyo anitie i kanindo paran, aneno yath i cuny piny, aka oyido bor swa.
Yath no odongo madwoŋ aka matek, ma withe mere ogeyo polo, aka oyido neno gi kisi gike ma piny.

Yath no orwako fuc mere piny, boke mere oyido oloth to nyak olemo mathoth, aka omiyo cemo ri cwec je. Ogwaŋe madudi oyido joywomere i tipo mere, winyin ma koyo oyido jogeto od jo i jange mere, aka kisi cwec onwaŋ'iye cemo.
Paka amedere ŋiyo, i menyirok paran i kanindo aneno jakur maleŋ oloro piny wok i polo.
Jakur maleŋ okoko ni, “Toŋ woko yath, jange, kodi withe mere, kedhi olemo mere, aka ŋey ogwaŋe jowongoye i tiende, aka winyin jowongoye i jange.
To weyi kasik mere kodi fuc mere i lowo, wothok gi nyweny kodi ywel, i lum mayom ma samba.”
“Weyi wodhieki gi thoyo ma polo, aka wolimi adec pere g'ogwaŋe madudi i lum ma piny.
Weyi cunye wolokere paka cuny ogwaŋ, ma oro abirio.
Me obedo or pa jakur maleŋ, ŋey jomakwo je jowoŋey nike Jamalo Swa dhumo ji je, aka nike go miyo dhum ri ŋata go oyero kiri jono ma josisiri.”
Me lek ma an, Nebukadineza aneno. Onyo Beltesazar, titi dwoŋ mere, paka cwo mariek je i ker paran jokinyal tito ran dwoŋ mere. To in inyalo, kwoŋbedo initie gi cuny pa Were Maleŋ kwoŋin.
Daniel m'oyido ilwoŋo ni Beltesazar, obedo gi dhier, aka paro pere ocando go swa ma sawa acel. Kere owaco rigo ni, “Beltesazar, ikir'iwey lek no kosa dwoŋ mere wocandi paro perin.”
Beltesazar odwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ paran, weyi lek me wobedi ri jono ma jodakin kodi jokwor perin!
Yath m'ineno, m'odongo madwoŋ aka matek, ŋey withe mere ogeyo polo aka oyido neno gi gike piny je,
ma boke mere oloth maŋon aka onyak olemo mathoth, m'oyido miyo cemo ri cwec je, aka ogwaŋe joywomere i tipo mere to winyin jogeto i jange.”
Meno in, Awi Kere! Itieko dongo madwoŋ aka matek. Dwoŋ perin omedere aka tundo i polo, aka dhum perin otundo i gike piny.

Paka kere oneno jakur maleŋ oloro piny wok i polo ka waco ama: Toŋ piny yath aka nyek woko, to weyi kasik mere kodi fuc mere i lowo, wotwey gi nyweny kodi ywel, i lum ma samba; aka weyi wodhiekere gi thoyo ma polo, adec pere labedo g'ogwaŋe madudi ma oro abirio.
Me dwoŋ mere, Awi kere, aka me or pa Jamalo Swa m'otieko bino kwoŋ rwoth paran kere.

Ilakwanyin woko i dier ji, aka ilakwo i dier ogwaŋe madudi. Ilamiyin camo lum paka megikwe, iladhiekere gi thoyo ma polo ma oro abirio cuka inoŋey nike Jamalo Swa dhumo ker pa ji aka nike go miyo dhum ri ŋata go yero.
Paka omiy or nike owey kasik yath kodi fuc mere, ker perin lakiyindira wok i hongo ma inoŋey nike Polo dhumo.
Riameno, Awi kere, me rieko m'amiyin, aka yere gine. Pusere reco perin, gi timo gim'otire, weyi komo perin aka inyuthi jocandi wor, ŋey bero perin woyindira.
Gime je otimere ri Kere Nebukadineza.
Rumacen ma gike ma dwe mar'apar g'ario go oyido wotho i wi kisul ot ma muluwir ma Babilon,
aka owaco ni, “Me ki Babilon madwoŋ, m'atieko geto paka ot ma ker gi meni paran kodi ri dwoŋ ma dhum paran!”
Kucel munyo wac no fodi k'opodho wok i dhok kere, dwondi mogo owok i polo ka waco ni, “Awi Kere Nebukadineza, oluwi kwoŋin ni, otiek mayin ker!
Ilakwanyin woko wok i dier ji aka ilabedo g'ogwaŋe madudi. Ilamiyin camo lum paka megikwe ma oro abirio cuka inoŋey nike Jamalo swa dhumo ker pa ji aka nike go miyo dhum ri ŋata go yero.”

Gi piyo no won wac no otundo i kare kwoŋ Nebukadineza. Okwany go woko i dier ji, ocamo lum paka megikwe, delkwoŋe odhiekere gi thoyo ma polo, cuka yer kwoŋe odongo paka yer ango aka lwete olokere lwet winyo.
Munyo oro abirio no orumo, An Nebukadineza, atiŋo waŋan i polo, aka paro paran odwoko bongan.
Apako Jamalo Swa,
apako t'amiyo go dwoŋ go makwo cil gi cil;
kole dhum pere obedo dhum ma cil gi cil,
aka ker pere yindira wok i luse tundo i luse.
Go neno ji ma i piny paka gim'ongoye,
go timo gim'omito gi Lwak ma i polo
kodi ji ma i piny.
Ongoye ŋata nyalo juko cinge,
kosa penjo go ni, “Itimo aŋo?”
I sawa no paro paran odwoko bongan; aka dhum kodi wor odwoko ran ri dwoŋ ma ker paran. Jomic rieko paran kodi jodhum paran jorangan, odwokan dhumo ker paran, aka dwoŋ paran omedere.
Onyo an, Nebukadineza, apako aka atiŋo malo Kere ma i polo,
Kole tim pere obedo adieri,
yo pere obedo tiro,
aka jono ma jowotho i noro,
go nyalo dwoko jo piny.
Kere Belsazar otimo kalima madwoŋ ri jodhum pere gana aka omadho vini ruwaŋ jo.

Belsazar omiyo or i wi math nike wokel atewe ma zahabu kodi ma feza ma bamere Kere Nebukadineza okwanyo wok i Ot pa Were i Yerusalem, ŋey go, jodhum pere, mon pere, nyithindho pere kodi mon pere ma thenge jowomedh'iye.
Ameno owodhi atewe ma zahabu kodi ma feza m'oyido okwany wok i Ot pa Were i Yerusalem, aka kere, jodhum pere, mon pere, nyithindho pere kodi mon pere ma thenge jowomedh'iye.
Jomadho vini ka jopako werin m'otimi gi zahabu, feza, ywel, nyweny, mbawo, kodi tele.
Piyo piyo lwet cingi dhano oneno to cako ndiko i kor ot ma peco pa kere cegin gi raŋaw. Kere oneno cingi jo no paka ondiko.
Kenyo waŋ kere olokere matar, aka paro pere ocando go. Coko bambe olwogere, aka conge ocako gudirok kanyacel.

Kere oywaki malo ni wokel jondijo ma jotimo gir'aura, Jokaldin, kodi jothieth. Kere owaco ri cwo mariek ma Babilon ni, “Ŋata nyalo kisoma kodi tito dwoŋ ma ndiko me ilaruko go gi law manyarangi ariŋo, thiwino ma zahabu i ŋute, aka labedo dhano mar'adek i dwoŋ i ker.”
Kenyo cwo mariek je jobino, to jok'onyalo kisoma ndiko kosa tito ri kere dwoŋ mere.
Kenyo Kere Belsazar obwok swa to cal ma waŋe lokere matar, aka jodhum pere jodhier.
Onyo munyo yok kere owinjo kere joluwo kwoŋ wac me gi jodhum pere, obino i ot ma kalima. Yok kere owaco ni, “Awi kere, yindira cil gi cil! Ikir'iwey paro perin wobwokin kosa cal perin wolokere.

Nitie i ker perin jal ma cuny pa Were maleŋ nitie kwoŋe. I hongo pa benin onwaŋ nike go nitie gi lero, niaŋ kodi rieko paka rieko pa werin. Aka benin Nebukadineza oketho go bedo jadwoŋ pa jondijo ma joneno gima latimere, jondijo ma timo gir'aura, Jokaldin kodi jothieth.
Daniel, ma kere oyido ocwoko rigo nyinge ni Beltesazar oyido nitie gi cuny ma gir'aura, ŋeyo, niaŋ, tito dwoŋ ma lek, sikoiyiko, kodi thango gim'opanere; aka go latito rin dwoŋ ma gime je.”
Kenyo okeli Daniel ruwaŋ kere, aka kere openjo go ni, “Iŋat'ibedo Daniel, acel kwoŋ jotwec ma baba kere okelo wok i Yuda?
Atieko winjo nike cuny pa Were nitie kwoŋin, aka nike initie gi lero, niaŋ, kodi rieko ma gir'aura.
Onyo otiek kelo ruwaŋan cwo mariek kodi jondijo ma joneno gima latimere, to jok'onyalo kisoma kodi tito ran dwoŋ ma ndiko me.
