To atieko winjo nike inyalo tito dwoŋ ma gimoro kodi thango gim'opanere. Onyo ka inonyal kisoma ndiko me, kodi tito dwoŋ mere, ilaruko rin nanga manyarangi ariŋo kodi thiwino ma zahabu i ŋutin, aka ilabedo jadhum mar'adek i ker.”
Daniel odwoko ka waco ruwaŋ kere ni, “Weyi mic perin wodoŋ rin, aka miy ŋatiman kemba perin; kucel alakisoma ri kere ndiko kodi tito dwoŋ mere.
Awi kere, Were ma Jamalo Swa omiyo benin, Nebukadineza, ker, dhum, dwoŋ kodi wor:

Kole kwoŋbedo dwoŋ ma Were omiyo go, ji je, nonin je, kodi dhodhok je jokirin gi lworo ruwaŋ go. Benin oneko jono ma go omito neko, oweyo jono ma go omito weyo jowokwo, omiyo wor ri jono ma go omito, aka odwoko piny jono ma go omito dwoko piny.
To munyo noro opoŋ i cunye, to paro pere lokere matek, okwany go woko wok i kom pere ma dhum, t'imayo go dwoŋ.

Okwany go woko wok i dier ji, t'iloko cunye paka cuny ogwaŋ. Go obedo g'ogwaŋe aka ocamo lum paka merikwa; delkwoŋe odhiek gi thoyo ma polo, cuka go ofonjere nike Were ma jamalo Swa dhumo kiri ker pa ji, aka miyo ŋata go oyero.
To in wode, Belsazar, ikimwole i cunyin, makada nende oyido iŋeyo gime je.

In itieko tiŋere malo kwoŋ Rwoth ma i polo. Okeli atewe ma Ot pa Were ruwaŋin, aka in, jodhum perin, mon perin, nyithindho perin, kodi mon perin ma thenge wimadh'iye vini. Witieko pako werin ma feza, zahabu, ywel, nyweny, mbawo kodi tele, ma jokinen kosa winji kosa ŋey. To Were ma luya perin nitie i cinge, aka yo perin je nitie i go, ikiworo.
Am'omiyo go odhiro par cingi dhano ndiko gime.”
“Me ndiko m'ondiki: MENE, MENE, TEKEL kodi UPARISIN.
Me dwoŋ mere: MENE nyutho ni Were otieko kwano ker perin, aka okelo i gike.
TEKEL nyutho ni otiek kipima in i latir aka onwaŋ nike nitie gim'ongoye.
PERES nyutho ni ker perin otiakere aka omiy Jomedes kodi Jopasia.”
Belsazar omiyo or aka oruki ri Daniel nanga manyarangi ariŋo kodi thiwino ma zahabu i ŋute to langa nike go obedo jadhum mar'adek i ker.
Wor no won oneki Belsazar, kere pa Jokaldin.
Dario Jamedes am'olunjo ker munyo oyido jaoro cegin piero aucel g'ario.
Osiemo Dario ketho i ker jodhum miya acel gi piero ario, jowobedi i ker gibe
kodi jodongo pajo adek, ma Daniel oyido obedo acel kwoŋ jo. Jodhum oyido joosa rijo ŋey kere wokiri wokeŋ gimoro.
Daniel onyutho kite m'opokere kwoŋ jodongo adek kodi jodhum ro cuny ma gir'aura m'oyido nitie kwoŋe, aka kere ocano yero go dhumo ker gibe.

Ameno jodongo kodi jodhum jorango nger ma nwaŋo kiŋunyaŋunya kwoŋ Daniel i gigipiny manyaker, to jok'onyalo nwaŋo kiŋunyaŋunya kosa komo i go; kole Daniel oyido timo adieri aka oyido ongoye gi komo kosa banirok.
Kenyo cwo no jowaco ni, “Wakilanwaŋo nger ma kiŋunyaŋunya kwoŋ Daniel i gigipiny manyaker, kwanyowoko i cik ma mako kwoŋ Were pere.”
Jodongo kodi jodhum jomiyere rieko to jokidho bongi kere, aka jowaco rigo ni, “Kere Dario yindira cil gi cil.

Jodongo je ma ker me, jogavana, jodhum, jomic rieko kodi jotel, jotieko miyirok rieko ketho cik manyaker, kodi gima ridho nike ŋat'okway were mogo je kosa dhano ma ndelo piero adek, kwanyowoko in, Awi kere, wobol go i od simbwore.
Onyo riameno, kere, kethi cik, i ndiko, aka iketh'iye cingin makiwire, cungo kwoŋ cik pa Jomedes kodi Jopasia.”
Riameno kere Dario oketho cinge i ndiko kodi cik.

Makada nende Daniel oyido oŋeyo nike kere oketho cinge i ndiko, go odonjo i ot pere kareno dirisa pere ma kisika ma malo oyido oyawere yuthenge ma Yerusalem; go oguro conge piny to kwayo ka miyo Were foyo didek paka go oyido timo noknok.
Cwo m'oyido joluwo tiendi go jobino to jonwaŋo Daniel munyo kwayo aka rango wor wok bongi Were pere.
Kenyo jocore cegin gi kere aka jowaco rigo ni, “Awi kere ikiketho cingin i cik, nike ŋat'okway were mogo je kosa dhano kwanyowoko in, ma ndelo piero adek, wobol go i od simbwor?”
Kere odwoko ni, “Apaka nitie ameno, cungo kwoŋ cik pa Jomedes kodi Pasia aka kiwire.”
Jodwoko ka jowaco ruwaŋ kere ni, “Daniel, acel kwoŋ jotwec ma wok Yuda kiworin awi kere, kosa cik m'itieko keth'iye cingin; to go kwayo didek i ndelo.”
Munyo kere owinjo wac me, k'osangala go swa, aka oketho i cunye botho Daniel, aka otemo gi kinen cuka waŋceŋ opodho botho go.
Kenyo cwo no jocokere bongi kere, aka jowaco rigo ni, “Ŋey, awi kere, ni cik pa Jomedes kodi Jopasia obedo ni, Ongoye ndiko kosa cik ma kere otieko ketho ma wire.”
Kere omiyo or t'ikelo Daniel, aka obol go i od simbwore. Onyo kere oluwo ka waco ri Daniel ni, “Were perin m'ikwayo noknok labothin.”
Kenyo okeli tele t'iumo gine dhok od simbwore, aka kere omwono gi peta pere kodi peta pa rwodhe pere; r'atoŋa ni wongoye gima wowire kwoŋ Daniel.
Kere ogik i muluwir pere, aka oriyo kec wor gibe m'ongoye wiro paro kaman, aka nindo k'omako waŋe.
Kere omondo cew gi ŋamba, aka oredo kadho i od simbwore.
Munyo kere otundo i od simbwore, oywaki gi geregere ri Daniel ni, “Daniel, ŋeca pa Were makwo, Were perin m'ikwayo noknok onyalo bothin kwoŋ simbwore?”
Daniel odwoko ni, “Awi kere, yindira cil gi cil.
Were paran ooro malaika pere m'ocego dhok simbwore, aka jok'omiyan litho, kwoŋbedo abu banja ruwaŋ go kodi ruwaŋin, awi kere, angoye gi komo.”
Kere osangala swa ri Daniel, aka omiyo or nike wofudhi Daniel wok i od simbwore. Ameno ofudhi Daniel aka ongoye adhola m'onwaŋ kwoŋe, kwoŋbedo Were obotho go.
Kere omiyo or aka okeli cwo m'oyido josegeya Daniel t'ibolo jo i od simbwore gi mon pajo kodi nyithindho pajo. Simbwore jopor kwoŋ jo to joŋinyo cokin pajo mafodi jok'otundo kada i pendi od simbwore.
Kere Dario ondiko ri ji je, nonin je, dhodhok je, ma jobedo i piny ni, “Siem gibe wobedi riwin.
Amiyo or ni, i kisi adec ma ker paran, ji joripo kirin kodi lworo Were pa Daniel.”
“Kole go obedo Were mar'adieri makwo,
go kiwire cil gi cil,
ker pere kilarere,
aka dhum pere ongoye gike.
Go gonyo aka botho,
go timo ranyuth kodi gir'aura i polo kodi i piny,
go m'otieko botho Daniel
wok i meni pa simbwore.”
Ameno Daniel me oyindira i hongo ma dhum pa Dario, kodi i hongo ma dhum pa Siras Japasia.
I oro marapena ma dhum pa Kere Belsazar ma Babilon, Daniel oneno menyirok to leko munyo go nindo i kanindo pere. Go ondiko lek kodi gima go oneno me:
Daniel oluwo ka waco ni: Aneno i menyirok paran wor, aka neni, koyo aŋwen ma i polo joyengo nam madwoŋ.
Ogwaŋe aŋwen ma jopokere jowok i nam.
Acel oyido cale gi simbwor, aka nitie gi bwombi ango. Kenyo munyo agawo, obudhi woko bwombe t'itiŋo malo wok piny, aka omiy cungo gi tiende paka dhano, t'imiyo cuny dhano.
Ogwaŋ man, mar'ario owok, ma cal gi amudhe, aka otiŋere i thenge acel, oyido nitie gi kediŋete adek i dhoke, i dier lake; t'iwaco rigo ni, “Ay malo icami riŋo kweth.”
Rumacen aneno kendo ogwaŋ mar'adek, ma cal gi kwac, oyido nitie gi bwombi winyo aŋwen, kodi wic mere aŋwen, aka omiy go dhum.

Munyo fodi aparo kwoŋ tunge, tungi man mathin owok, aka mafodi k'owoki tunge marapena adek ofudhere gi fuce mere. I tunge mathin me, oyido nitie waŋ jo ma cal waŋ dhano, gi dhok jo ma luwo gigipiny madongo.
Malawa ma mac otula to mol ruwaŋ go. Ganin gi ganin jotiyo rigo, aka ganin apar jocungo ruwaŋe, oyaw kapido, t'iyawo kitawin.
Aŋiyo munyo awinjo derino ma wac ma tungi oluwo, aka paka aŋiyo oneki ogwaŋ t'ibolo delkwoŋe i mac maliel.
Paka ri ogwaŋ m'odoŋ, omay jo woko dhum pajo, to imedo kwo pajo ma hongo gi hongo.
Ri go omiy dhum, dwoŋ, kodi ker, ŋey ji je, nonin je, kodi dhodhok je jowotiy rigo. Dhum pere obedo dhum ma cil gi cil, ma kilarumo, aka ker pere kilarere.
An Daniel, cunyan oraman, aka menyirok me ocando paro paran.
Acore cegin gi acel kwoŋ jom'oyido ocungo cegin, t'apenjo go adieri ma gime. Ameno go owaco ran, to miyan ŋeyo dwoŋ ma gigipiny me.
Ogwaŋe madongo aŋwen me jobedo kerin aŋwen ma jolaay i piny.
To jomaleŋ pa Were ma Jamalo Swa jolatero ker, to jodhumo cil gi cil, makicutho.

Kenyo amito ni aŋey adieri ma mako kwoŋ ogwaŋ mar'aŋwen, m'oyido opokere kwoŋ wadi, ma kelo lworo swa, m'oyido nitie gi lake ma nyweny, gi lwet cinge ma ywel, m'ocamo, oturo mathindho thindho, to nyono ŋinjeŋinje gi tiende;
kodi tunge aŋwen m'oyido nitie i wic mere, kodi m'owok mathin, rumacen ma tunge adek fudhirok, tunge m'oyido nitie gi waŋe, kodi dhoke m'oluwo gigipiny madongo, ma cal mere oyido loyo wadi.
Paka aŋiyo, tunge me olwenyo gi jomaleŋ to loyo jo,
cuka Ŋatacene obino, t'ithumo banja ri jomaleŋ pa Jamalo Swa, to hongo tundo ma jomaleŋ jodhumo.
Me gima go owaco: Ogwaŋ mar'aŋwen labedo ker mar'aŋwen i piny, ma lapokere kwoŋ ker je, aka lacamo piny gibe, lanyono piny, to turo mathindho thindho.
Tunge apar m'owok i ker me obedo kerin apar ma jolaay, aka man laay yuŋey jo, aka go lapokere kwoŋ kerin marapena, aka go ladhumo kerin adek ca.
Go laluwo wac madongo kwoŋ Jamalo Swa, to paro wiro hongo kodi cik; aka ilamiyo i cingi go cuka oro gi oro kodi adec oro.
To ilayawo kapido t'ithumo banja, aka ilamayo go dhum, ilawaŋo kodi reyo woko kicutho.
Kenyo ker, dhum kodi dwoŋ ma kerin i pendi polo gibe ilamiyo jomaleŋ pa Jamalo Swa ma ker pere obedo ker ma cil gi cil, aka ker je jolatic rigo kodi winjo go.
“Me gike ma menyirok no. Paka ri an Daniel, paro paran ocandan swa, aka cal paran olokere; to akano wac me i cunyan.”
I oro mar'adek ma dhum pa Kere Belsazar, an Daniel aneno menyirok man, rumacen munyo atieko neno marapena.
Aneno i menyirok; aka munyo aneno, oyido anitie i Susa tindi madwoŋ, manitie iy'adec ma Elam, aka aneno i menyirok oyido anitie i thengi malawa Ulay.
Atiŋo waŋan malo t'aneno wod rombo ocungo i thengi malawa, oyido nitie gi tunge ario. Tunge je oyido jobor, to acel oyido bor loyo man, aka mabor mere owok macowe.
Aneno wod rombo lokere mager yuwok ceŋ, yumalo, kodi yupiny, m'ongoye ogwaŋ m'onyalo cungo ruwaŋ go, kosa ongoye ŋat'onyalo botho wok i cingi go, to go otimo paka yenyo aka olokere madwoŋ.
Munyo fodi agawo, aneno wod diel owok yuwok ceŋ ruwaŋ piny gibe, to geyo piny; aka oyido nitie gi tunge ma neno i dier waŋe.
Wod diel obino bongi wod rombo m'oyido nitie gi tunge ario, m'aneno ocungo i coŋino ma malawa, aka oŋweco bonge i keme ma meni pere.

Aneno wod diel core bongi wod rombo gi nge kwoŋe, aka ogoyo wod rombo to turo woko tunge ario, ma wod rombo ongoye gi meni ma cungo ruwaŋe. Wod diel ofwodo piny wod rombo to nyono, aka oyido ongoye ŋat'obothi wod rombo wok i cinge.
Kenyo to wod diel lokere madwoŋ swa, to i meni pere tunge madwoŋ otur, aka i liende otwi tunge aŋwen, ma joŋiyo yu koyin aŋwen ma i polo.
Wok i tungi acel kwoŋ jo, owok tungi mathin, m'odongo madwoŋ swa yupiny kodi yuwok ceŋ, kodi yu lowo maŋon.
Tungi me odongo tundo kiri i Lwak ma i polo, aka obolo piny Lwak man kodi micalin, to nyono jo.
Go otiŋere malo kiri kwoŋ jadhum pa lwak, aka omayo go mic ma cil gi cil aka kabedo ma Kabedo Maleŋ pere omaki.
Kwoŋbedo kidakana, omiy go Lwak kanyacel gi mic ma cil gi cil, aka obolo piny adieri, to medo timo maber i gima go otimo.
Awinjo ŋataleŋ luwo, aka ŋataleŋ man owaco ri m'oyido luwo ni, “Gigipiny m'onenere i menyirok me omedere kiri keraŋo?”
Go odwokan ni, “Ma ndelo 2,300 wor kodi odikin, aka Kabedo Maleŋ me lagik i kare.”
Munyo an, Daniel atieko neno menyirok, atemo niaŋ kwoŋe; kenyo aneno cal pa dhano m'ocungo ruwaŋan.
Kenyo awinjo dwondi dhano lwoŋo i dier coŋino ma Ulai ni, “Gabriel, miy jal me woniaŋi kwoŋ menyirok.”
Munyo go obino cegin kam'oyido acung'iye, abwok aka apodho t'ariere piny gi nyiman. To go owaco ran ni, “Awi wod dhano, niaŋ ni menyirok me obedo ma hongo ma rumacen.”
Paka go oluwo kodan, nindo okwalan gi waŋan piny. To go ogeyan, to miyan ay malo cungo.
Go owaco ran ni, “Neni, alamiyin ŋeyo gima latimere i gike ma keme; kole i hongo m'oyikere gike latundo.”
“Wod rombo m'ineno nitie gi tunge ario, obedo kerin ario ma Medes kodi Pasia.
Wod diel ma yer mere ojaŋ m'ineno obedo kere ma Gris, aka tungi madwoŋ manitie i dier waŋe obedo kere marapena.
Paka ri Tungi m'otur, to tunge aŋwen wok i liende obedo kerin aŋwen ma lawok i piny no, to kilabedo gi meni pere.”
“I gike ma dhum pajo, ka reco pajo oromo, kere manitie gi cal mager, ma jatwodo laay.
Go ladongo matek i meni, to ki gi meni pere, go lareyo woko ma kiwacere, aka lakiyindira i gima go timo. Go lareyo woko jomeni kodi ji pa jomaleŋ.
Kwoŋbedo go jabanirok, twodo lapoŋ i cinge kodi i cunye to won tiŋere malo. Go lareyo woko ji kweth ma k'ogwoko jo, aka lapiemo kiri gi Kere maloyo. T'ilaturo go ki gi cingi dhano.
Menyirok ma wor kodi odikin m'owaci rin me obedo adieri, riameno iripo kano nyaliŋliŋ kwoŋbedo latero ndelo kweth mafodi k'otundo i kare.”
An Daniel anyocere, aka abedo matwo ma ndelo mogo; kenyo aay malo timo tic pa kere. To oyido adhier gi menyirok, aka akiniaŋ kwoŋe.
I oro marapena pa Dario wod Ahaswero, nyakwar Jomedes, m'oketh bedo kere dhumo Jokaldin,
i oro marapena ma dhum pere, an Daniel aniaŋ i ndiko, cungo kwoŋ wac pa Rwoth m'obino ri Yeremia jatuci wac Were, nike Yerusalem lakisika ma oro piero ario.
Kenyo awiro waŋan bongi Rwoth, rango radwok i kwayo kodi ywakirok gi riyo kec, ruko kutiya kodi bedo i buru.
Akwayo Rwoth Were paran t'apusere k'awaco ni, “Awi Rwoth Were madwoŋ, ikelo lworo, aka ikuro cikirok kodi mar makiwire ri jono ma jomarin kodi jono ma jokuro or perin.”
“Watieko timo reco, watimo gi komo, watimo gikidakana to wagwenyere, kiri gi wirok kwoŋ or perin kodi cik perin.
Wakiwinjo ŋecin perin, jotuci wac Were, ma joluwo i nyingin gi kerin mawan, jodhum mawan, kwarere mawan, kodi ji ma piny.
Awi Rwoth, itimo gim'otire, to wiwan okwot kamaler ndelo me, ji ma Yuda, ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem, kodi Joisiraili je, cegin kodi bor, i lowo je m'ikedh'iye jo, kwoŋbedo jotimo gibanirok rin.
Awi Rwoth, wiwan okwot kamaler, kerin mawan, jodhum mawan, kwarere mawan, kwoŋbedo watimo gimarac kwoŋin.
To in Rwoth, itimo wor aka icwako, makada nende watieko gwenyirok kwoŋin.
Wakiwinjo dwondi Rwoth Were mawan gi luwo cik pere, ma go omiyo wan luwo kwoŋ ŋecin pere jotuci wac Were.
Joisiraili je joturo cik perin aka jowire gi thenge, jokwero winjo dwondin. Riameno lam kodi kwoŋirok m'ondiki i cik pa Musa ŋeca pa Were opodho kwoŋ wan, kwoŋbedo watimo gimarac kwoŋe.
Itieko ridho wac perin, m'iluwo kwoŋ wan kodi jothum banja mawan ma jothumo riwan banja, gi kelo kwoŋ wan raco madwoŋ, m'oyido fodi k'otimere i pendi polo paka itimo kwoŋ Yerusalem.
Paka ondiki i cik pa Musa, raco me je opodho kwoŋ wan, kucel wakirango waŋ Rwoth Were mawan, wirok kwoŋ reco mawan kodi luwo adieri pere.
Riameno Rwoth oŋiyo raco me cuka okelo kwoŋ wan. Adieri Rwoth Were mawan otire i gima go otieko timo; to wakiwinjo dwondi go.”
“Aka onyo pama, Awi Rwoth, Were mawan m'iwodho ji perin wok i lowo ma Misir gi cingin matek, t'itimo nyingin, paka i ndelo me watieko timo reco kodi kidakana;

Awi Rwoth, cungo kwoŋ tim perin m'otire, akwayin, weyi nge perin kodi keme perin, wongoye woko kwoŋ tindi perin madwoŋ Yerusalem, got perin maleŋ. Kole reco mawan kodi reco pa kwarere mawan omiyo Yerusalem kodi ji perin jolokere wickwot i dier joger mawan.
Onyo riameno, Awi Were mawan, winji kwayo pa ŋeca perin, kodi ywak pere, aka ro in won, Rwoth, weyi lero perin womenyi Ot pa Were m'orey woko.
Awi Were paran, ciki ithin iwinji, yaw waŋin ineni, candirok mawan, kodi tindi perin madwoŋ, m'ilwoŋo gi nyingin. Kole wakikwayin kwoŋbedo watimo gim'otire, to kwoŋbedo wor perin dwoŋ.
Awi Rwoth, winji, Awi Rwoth cwaki, Awi Rwoth winji aka tim, ikir'igali! Ro in won, Awi Were paran, kwoŋbedo ilwoŋo tindi perin madwoŋ kodi wan gi nyingin!”
Munyo oyido aluwo, kareno akwayo gi pusirok reco paran kodi reco pa ji paran Isiraili, gi ywak ruwaŋ Rwoth Were paran ri got maleŋ pa Were;
munyo fodi aluwo i kwayo, jacwo Gabriel m'oyido atieko neno i menyirok, obino bongan, munyo ay mayil yil i sawa ma miyo cowirok m'othieno.
Go omiyan ŋeyo, oluwo kodan ka waco ni, “Awi Daniel abino miyin rieko kodi niaŋ.
I cakirok ma kwayo perin wac owok, aka abino nyuthin. Kole omarin swa; riameno niaŋ wac no kodi menyirok.”

“Oro piero ario dibirio, Were otieko luwo kwoŋ ji perin kodi tindi perin maleŋ, cowo raco kodi reco, kodi cwako reco, kelo tiro ma cil gi cil, kodi kelo i kare menyirok kodi jatuci wac Were, kodi wiro gi mo Kamaleŋ Loyo.

Riameno niaŋ nike wok i hongo m'owodhi or ma dwoko kodi geto kendo Yerusalem tundo i hongo pa ŋat'owir gi mo, Jadhum, latero dibirio ma oro abirio, ilageto kendo Yerusalem gi royin kodi kor ot matek aka lacungo dibirio ma oro piero aucel g'ario; to me labedo hongo ma teko.

Rumacen ma oro dipiero aucel g'ario no, ilakwanyo woko ŋat'owir gi mo aka go langoye gi gimoro, to ji pere jolabino reyo woko tindi madwoŋ kodi Ot pa Were. Gike mere labino paka mikula pi, kelo lweny, rerok ma kiwacere.

Go latimo cikirok matek gi ji kweth ma oro abirio, aka iy'adec ma oro me go lakelo gike ma cowirok kodi mic. I kabedo pajo ilaketho amien ma reyo woko, cuka tundo hongo ma Were lareyo woko ŋata reyo woko.”

I oro mar'adek ma dhum pa Siras kere ma Pasia, wac omenyere ri Daniel m'oyido ilwoŋo bende ni Beltesazar. Wac me oyido obedo adieri aka mako kwoŋ lweny madwoŋ. Daniel oniaŋ wac me kwoŋbedo, olimo niaŋ kwoŋe i menyirok.
I hongo no, an Daniel, oyido aywak ma sabiti adek.
Akicamo cemo maleny, dhokan k'obilo riŋo kosa vini; aka akiwire gi mo, ma sabiti adek.
Ka piero ario g'aŋwen ma dwe marapena, munyo oyido acungo i thengi malawa madwoŋ, Tigris,
atiŋo waŋan malo, t'aŋiyo, aka neni, jacwo m'oruko nanga mafoth, to tweyo piero gi del ma zahabu macil ma Ufaz.
Delkwoŋe oyido minyin paka tele ma welo, nyime oyido cal lithkoth, aka waŋe oyido cal mac maliel, cinge kodi tiende kicin gi ywel, aka derino ma wac pere oyido cal derino pa Lwak.
An, Daniel aneno menyirok kendan, to cwo m'oyido jonitie bongan jok'oneno menyirok. Kirin madwoŋ opodho kwoŋ jo, aka joŋweco pondo.
Adoŋ cen kendan, t'aneno menyirok madwoŋ me. Meni oloyan aka waŋan olokere matar, akinyalo doŋ gi meni.
Awinjo derino ma wac pere, aka paka awinjo, nindo otimo pa kwalan t'apodho gi nyiman piny.
Kenyo cingi dhano ogeyan, aka omiyo congan kodi par cingan kirin.
Go owaco ran ni, “Awi Daniel, omarin swa, niaŋ wac m'akidho waco rin. Cungi gi tiendin, kole onyo atieko orin.” Munyo go luwo wac me ran, oyido acungo, k'akirin.
Go owaco ran ni, “Ikir'ilwor Awi Daniel, kole wok i ndelo marapena m'iketho cunyin ma niaŋ, kodi mwolok ruwaŋ Were perin, owinji wac perin, aka atieko bino ro wac perin.
Kere ma Pasia opiemo kodan ma ndelo piero ario g'acel. To Mikaili, acel kwoŋ jotel pa jomalaika, obino konyan, aka adoŋ cen kenyo gi kerin ma Pasia.
Abino miyin niaŋ gima latimere ri ji perin i ndelo ma rumacen. Kucel menyirok latero ndelo kweth.”
Paka go oluwo kodan wac no, aketho waŋan piny i lowo, aka akinyalo luwo.
Aneno ŋata cale wot ji geyo dhokan, ayawo dhokan t'aluwo, aka awaco ri ŋat'oyido ocungo ruwaŋan ni, “Rwoth paran, menyirok me omiyan litho ma meni paran orumo.
Anonyal nedi, an ŋeca pa rwoth, luwo gi rwoth paran? Kole pama ongoye meni kiri gi luya je m'odoŋ kwoŋan.”
Kenyo ŋata cale wot ji ogeyan kendo, aka omiyan meni.

Go owaco ran ni, “Awi jacwo m'omar swa, Ikir'ilwor, siem wobedi kodin, bedi matek, bedi matek.” Munyo go otieko luwo kodan, omiyan bedo gi meni, aka awaco ni, “Weyi rwoth paran woluwi, kole itieko miyan meni.”
Go openjan ni, “Iŋeyo raŋo abino bongin? Onyo pama aripo gik lweny gi wod kere ma Pasia, aka k'atieko gi go, nyaka wod kere ma Gris labino.
To alanyuthin gim'ondiki i ndiko mar'adieri, aka ongoye ŋata nyutho teko kodan, kwanyowoko Mikaili wod kere perin.”
Aka onyo paka ri an, Daniel, i oro marapena ma dhum pa Dario Jamedes, acungo ma ridho kodi thielo go.
Aka onyo pama alawaco riwin adieri. Kerin adek man jolaay i Pasia. Kere mar'aŋwen labedo gi ŋaŋo loyo wadi, aka k'otieko lokere matek gi ŋaŋo pere, go lamiyo kisi dhano lweny gi ker ma Gris.
Kere ma jameni laay, aka ker pere labedo madwoŋ to timo paka go yenyo.

Aka ka go nyaka ay ker pere ilaturo woko, t'ipoko diŋwen yu koyo aŋwen ma polo, to ki ri nyikwaye, kosa cungo kwoŋ ker ma go odhumo; kole ilafudho woko ker pere to kadho ri joman ma jok'obedo nyikwaye.
Kere ma yupiny lalokere matek aka acel kwoŋ jomituka pere lalokere matek loyo go aka dhum pere labedo dhum madwoŋ.

Ka oro mogo okadho jolatimo can ma makirok kanyacel, aka nyar kere ma yupiny labino bongi kere ma yumalo ma timo siem; to go kodi nyithindho pere jok'ocir; t'ibino kijala jo, jokur pere, nyathi pere, kodi nyatoro m'othielo go.
I hongo no jange ma wok i fuc pere latwi i kabedo pere; go labino kwoŋ jolweny to donjo i cel pa Kere ma yumalo, aka go bino tic gi jo to kengila jo.
Aka werin pajo bende gi calin pajo m'oleny g'atewe pajo ma welo ma feza gi zahabu ma jonitie i katwec, go lakwanyo to tero Misir aka go lajuko ma oro mogo monjo kere ma yumalo.
Aka go bino kidho i ker pa kere ma yumalo, to bino dok i piny pere won.
Wote jolakitugila lweny to jocoko muma jolweny mathoth, jolakidho i thotho to joluwo, aka jobino kitugila lweny kendo tundo kiri i cel pere.
Nyaka to kere ma yupiny, ka cunye otieko ŋedhere, lawok to lwenyo gi kere ma yumalo; aka go latiŋo malo muma jolweny madwoŋ, t'iketho jolweny no i cinge.
Aka ka jolweny no otiek tiŋo okadhi gi jo, adundo pere latiŋere malo aka lamiyo cuny ji kweth podho, to go k'oloy.
Kole kere ma yumalo bino doko miyo dongo ri muma, madwoŋ loyo macon; aka ka gike otundo, go labino gi jolweny madwoŋ gi gigipiny kidhur.
I hongo no jokweth jolaay kwoŋ kere ma yupiny; aka wot jogwayo i dier ji perin won jolatiŋere malo ma ketho i kare awanya pajo; to jobino podho.
Kenyo kere ma yumalo labino to konjo woko rageŋ, to mako tindi madwoŋ m'otinda. Jolweny ma yupiny jok'ocir jo kodi ji mere m'oyer aka jok'obedi gi meni ma ciro.
To ŋati m'obin kwoŋe latimo paka go won mito, aka ongoye ŋata bino cungo ruwaŋe; aka lacungo i lowo maŋon, aka rerok mere makicutho labedo i cinge.
Go laketho paro pere ma bino gi meni ma ker pere je, go lakelo winjirok ma siem to timo jo. Go lamiyo go nyar mon ma reyo woko ker; to k'ocir kosa olim kwoŋe.
Aka rumacen go lawiro waŋe yuthengi nam, aka lakwanyo mathoth kwoŋ jo; to jamituka laketho i gike kwoto pere; adieri go ladwoko kwoto pere rigo.
Kenyo go lawiro waŋe yu cel ma piny pere won; to go lakitangatanga to podho, aka k'onwaŋ go.
Go laay i kabedo pere to dhiro jadhum madwoŋ ma ker, aka i hongo manok, ilaturo go, kada k'obedi i nge kosa i lweny.
I kabedo pere lawok dhano m'iŋisa m'oyido fodi k'oyim kwoŋe dwoŋ ma dhum ma ker; go labino nyaliŋliŋ to mako ker, kareno inyero go.
Ilareyo woko kicutho jolweny ruwaŋe aka ilaturo jo kodi wod kere ma cikirok bende.
Aka wok i hongo m'otimi gi go yerok ma makirok kanyacel, latimo tim ma twodo; aka lalokere matek gi nyaka ji manok.

Go labino nyaliŋliŋ i kabedo ma lowo ma diwa mar'adec aka latimo gima bacere pere kodi kwarere pere jok'otimo, kedho i dier jo gim'onyaga gi lim. Go latimo can kwoŋ cel, to can pere labedo nyaka ma hongo.
Go laguro meni pere kodi adundo pere kwoŋ kere ma yupiny gi jolweny madwoŋ; to kere ma yupiny lakitugila lweny gi jolweny mathoth swa kendo ma jomeni; to go k'ocir, rupiri ilacamo tiende gi piny.
Kiri jono ma jocamo cemo pere ma dicwe, jolaturo go, aka ilayweyo woko jolweny pere, aka mathoth kwoŋ jo, jolapodho piny ma jotho.
To paka ri kerin ario kwoŋ jo, adundin pajo lagondere kwoŋ gimarac; jolaluwo twodo i meza acel, to jok'oloy; rupiri gike fodi ripo timere i hongo m'oyik.
Aka go lagik i piny pere won gi lim madwoŋ, t'adundo pere lajengere kwoŋ cikirok maleŋ. Go latimo mito pere, to gik i piny pere won.
I hongo m'oyik, go lagik to bino yupiny; to k'obedi i hongo me paka cango obedo con.
Mele ma Kitim jolabino kwoŋe, to bedo gi lworo to tiŋo cinge malo, to gik ma nge omako to raŋo gir'atima kwoŋ cikirok ma leŋo. Go lagik to ketho kinen kwoŋ jono ma jojwango cikirok ma leŋo.
Jolweny ma wok bonge jolamenyere to jokoco Ot pa Were kodi cel, to jokwanyo woko cowirok awaŋa ma noknok. Jolajengo gimienirok ma kelo kidamba.
Go ladwoŋo gi nyero jono ma joturo cikirok; to ji ma joŋeyo Were pajo, jolacungo matek to jonwaŋo gir'atima.
Aka jono ma joriek ma jonitie i dier ji jolamiyo niaŋ ri ji mathoth, kada jolatho g'abor kodi mac m'odheth, gi twec kodi kinyaga, ma hongo mogo.
Ka jotangatanga, ibino konyo jo nyaka mathi. Aka ji mathoth jolariwere gi jo gi rendirok,
aka manok kwoŋ jono ma joriek jolakitangatanga, ma loko jo m'olonyo gi cido reco pajo cuka tundo hongo ma gike, kole obedo ri hongo m'oyik.
Go k'odew kwoŋ werin pa kwarere pere, kodi meno ma mon jomaro; go k'odew kwoŋ were mogo je, go labedo ŋatadwoŋ loyo je.
Kwanyowoko go laworo were ma cel makiweno me gin, were ma kwarere pere oyido jokuya, laworo gi zahabu gi feza, gi telin ma welo kodi mic ma welo.
Go latic kodi cel ma jotek loyo gi kony pa were ma woko; ŋati mogo m'oyerere gine, bino miyo go dwoŋ gi wor. Go bino loko jo jodhum pa jomathoth to poko lowo atana.

I hongo ma gike, kere ma yupiny bino monjo go; to kere ma yumalo bino yombere kwoŋe pa asur, gi cawilin kodi cwo ma jogweyo punde, gi mele kweth; aka go bino kidho i piny to mako to luw'iye paka mikula pi.
Go ladonjo i piny maŋon. Jomathoth jolakitangatanga, to jome jobino kwale i cinge: Edom kodi Mowab kodi ji marapena ma Amon.
Go bino rieyo cinge kwoŋ piny, aka piny ma Misir k'obothi.
Go lalokere jadhum ma od lim ma zahabu gi feza, kodi gigipiny je ma welo ma Misir; kodi Jolibia aka Joethopiya jolaluwo masembo pere.
To radwok ma yuwok ceŋ kodi ma yumalo ladwoko go, aka go lawok woko gi keme madwoŋ matieko gi reyo woko kicutho jomathoth.
Go bino jengo wemin pere ma cel pa kere i dier name kodi got maŋon ma leŋo; kucel go latundo gike pere, aka langoye ŋat'okony go.
Aka mathoth kwoŋ jono ma jonindo i fukefuke ma lowo jolacew, megi i kwo makirum, megi i wickwot ma cil gi cil megi i kwo ma bukony.
Jomariek jolaliel paka lero ma pondeponde; aka jono ma jotelo ji kweth timo gim'otire jolaminyin paka micalin cil gi cil.
Kenyo an Daniel, aŋiyo, t'aneno j'ario man, acel oyido ocungo i thengi malawa me, aka man i thenge ca.
Acel openjo jacwo m'oyido oruko nanga mafoth, aka oyido ocungo wi pi ma mol ni, “Obedi kiri keraŋo aka nyaka gike ma gir'aura me obin?”
Awinjo to oyido akiniaŋ; ameno apenjo ni, “Rwoth, aŋo ma lawok kwoŋ gime?”
Go odwokan ni, “Awi Daniel, kadhi, wac me okan nyaliŋliŋ aka omwon tundo i hongo ma gike.
Jomathoth jolacido woko reco pajo, jolaloko kwo pajo macil, ilalonyo jo, to jokidakana jolamedere timo kidakana. Ongoye jakidakana ma laniaŋ, to jono ma joriek jolaniaŋ.”
Josilwany a joma jotim adieri i ndelo 1,335 orum.”
“To in kadhi i yo perin tundo i hongo ma gike. Ilaywomere t'iay jolo kemba perin i hongo ma gike.”
Munyo Rwoth oluwo gi Hoseya marapena, Rwoth owaco ri Hoseya ni, “Kadhi, inywom dhako m'obedo malaya aka i nywol nyithindho ma jobedo malaya paka go, kole piny timo malaya madwoŋ swa gi jwango Rwoth.”
Hoseya okadho to nywomo Goma nyar Diblayim. Goma ogamo iye to nywolo ri Hoseya wode.
I ndelo no alaturo asere ma Isiraili i milelo ma Yezirel.”
Goma ogamo iye kendo to nywolo nyare. Rwoth owaco ri Hoseya ni, “Cwoki nyinge ni Loruhama;
To alamako wor gi ot pa Yuda, aka alabotho jo gi an Rwoth Were pajo; ak'obothi jo g'atum abor, kosa abor, kosa lweny, kosa gi kayinin, kosa gi cwo ma jogweyo kayinin.”
Munyo Goma otieko cero Loruhama dhoth, ogamo iye kendo to nywolo wode.
Rwoth owaco ri Hoseya ni, “Cwoki nyinge ni Loami;
Kucel welo pa Joisiraili lacale paka kwoyo ma nam, ma kipimere kosa kwanere; aka i kabedo m'owac'iye rijo ni, “Wikibedo ji paran.” Ilalwoŋo jo ni, “Nyithindho pa Were makwo.”
Ji ma Yuda kodi Joisiraili jolacokere kanyacel, to joyero rijo wegi jatel acel; to jotero lowo, kole ndelo pa Yezirel labedo madwoŋ.
Ywakere ri min in, ywakere,
kole go k'obedo dhako paran,
aka akibedo cwore,
ma okwany woko kidakana pere,
kodi cot pere i dier thundho pere,
Kole alalunyo go kinyoro
t'athango go paka i ndelo m'onywol'iye go.
Alaloko go paka thim,
t'adwoko go i lowo m'opalipat,
t'aneko go gi riyo.
Kwoŋ nyithindho pere bende, akilamako wor,
rupiri jobedo nyithindho ma kidakana.
Kole min jo timo kidakana;
go m'ogamo jo i iye otimo giwickwot.
Kole go owaco ni, “Aladwaro jomitirok paran;
jo ama jomiyan cemo gi pi,
yer rombo paran gi law mafoth, mo paran gi gir'amadha paran.”
Riameno alagoyo cel gi kudhin athoki gine go;
aka alageto kor ot kwoŋe,
ŋey wokiri wonwaŋi ger pere.
Go laŋwec riemo jomitirok pere,
to k'omaki jo;
ladwaro jo,
to k'onwaŋ jo.
Nyaka to go waco ni, “Alakadho t'agik bongi cworan marapena,
rupiri oyido bero nitie ran con mere loyo pama.”
Go k'oŋeyo
ni oyido obedo An ma miyo go
kodhi cemo, vini, kodi mo,
kodi ŋat'oywoyo kwoŋe feza kweth,
kodi zahabu ma jooro ri Bal.
Riameno aladwoko,
kodhi paran i hongo mere,
kodi vini paran i hongo mere;
alakwanyo woko yer rombo paran gi law paran mafoth,
m'oyido ilaumo gine kinyoro pere.
Pama onyo alathango wickwot pere,
ruwaŋ jomitirok pere,
aka ongoye ŋata labotho go i cingan.
Alaketho i gike yumirok pere je,
kalimin pere, dwe pere manyen, sabato pere je,
kodi kalimin pere m'oyik je.
Alakedho woko vini pere gi kiti makuyu m'icamo,
ma go oluwo kwoŋe ni,
“Me cul paran,
ma jomitirok paran jomiyan.”
Alaloko jo lul,
aka ogwaŋe mager madudi lacuto jo.
Alamiyo go gir'acula ro ndelin ma go otim'iye kalima ri Bal,
ma go owaŋ'iye buban rijo,
to ruko peta pere ma thiwino,
to kadho dwaro jomitirok pere,
to wiye wil kodan, Rwoth waco.
Riameno, aladwoŋo go,
t'akelo go i thim,
t'aluwo gine gi mwolo.
Gikenyo alamiyo ndelin vini pere,
t'aloko milelo ma Akor dhiot ma geno.
Kenyo go ladwokan paka i ndelo ma go oyido fodi soye,
paka i hongo ma go owok'iye woko i piny ma Misir.
I ndelo no, Rwoth waco, ilalwoŋan ni, “Cworan.” Ma kiweno kendo ni, “Bal paran.”
Kole alakwanyo woko nyingi Bal i dhoke, aka k'otuci nyingi jo kendo.
Alatimo riwin cikirok i ndelo no g'ogwaŋe mager, winyin ma koyo, kodi gigipiny ma lak piny; alaturo woko asere, abor kodi lweny i piny; t'amiyo win nindo ma bu teko.
Alalokin dhako paran cil gi cil; alalokin dhako paran i tiro kodi iy'adieri, i mar makiwire, kodi i wor.
Alalokin dhako paran i genirok; aka ilaŋeyo Rwoth.
I ndelo no aladwoko, Rwoth waco,
aladwoko polo,
aka joladwoko piny;
piny ladwoko kodhi, vini kodi mo,
aka joladwoko Yezirel.
Alamiyo go wocungi matek ri an won i piny.
Alamako wor gi Loruhama,
alawaco ri Loami ni, “Wibedo ji paran.”
Aka jolawaco ni, “Ibedo Were mawan.”
Rwoth owaco ran kendo ni, “Kadhi, imiti dhako ma weco gi ŋatiman aka jacot. I nger acel won bende paka Rwoth omito Joisiraili, kada jowire ri werin man aka jocamo mugat m'othol m'olam gine jwogi.”
Ameno anyewo go gi siringi apar g'abic ma feza kodi kilo 140 ma bale.
T'awaco rigo ni, “Iripo doŋ paka aparan ma ndelo kweth; Ikir'itim kidakana, ikir'inindi gi jacwo man, kosa gi an won.”
Kole nyithindho pa Isiraili jolabedo ma ndelo kweth ma bu kere kosa jadhum, m'ongoye cowirok kosa siro, ma bu cal kosa cal aora ma ŋeyo gima latimere yuwaŋe kosa nyaliŋliŋ m'opondo.
Rumacen Joisiraili jolawire to jodwaro Rwoth Were pajo, kodi Daudi kere pajo. Jolabino gi kirin bongi Rwoth kodi i bero pere i ndelo ma rumacen.
Winji win wac pa Rwoth, win Joisiraili;
kole Rwoth nitie gi misegey kwoŋ ji ma jobedo i piny.
Ongoye genirok kosa kuro cikirok,
aka ongoye ŋeyo Were i piny mewin.
Nitie kwoŋirok, twodo, kodi nek,
aka kwo gi cot cakere;
oyo remo medere ameda.
Riameno piny ywak,
aka ji ma jobed'iye mbaka loyo jo;
kanyacel g'ogwaŋe mager,
kodi winyin ma koyo,
kiri rec ma nam josika woko.
Kucel weyi wongoye kiosa,
aka weyi wongoye jamisegey,
kole akigeŋisa kwoŋ win, win jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Wilakitangatanga odieceŋ;
jatuci wac Were bende lakimudamuda gi win wor,
aka alareyo woko yok win Isiraili.
Ireyo woko ji paran ro ngoye gi ŋeyo,
kwoŋbedo wikwero ŋeyo,
akwero win bedo ran jacway ri Were i wi migam.
Aka paka wiyin owil gi cik pa Were perin,
wiyan bende lawil gi nyithindho perin.
Paka jomedere i welo,
apaka bende jotimo reco i thotho kwoŋan.
Alawiro dwoŋ pajo i wickwot.
Joŋaŋ ka ji paran jotimo reco;
jonitie g'awanya ri ji paran medo timo reco.
Paka labedo ri ji, apaka ri jacway ri Were i wi migam;
alamiyo jo gir'acula ro royo pajo,
t'aculo jo ro tim pajo.
Jolacemo, to jok'oyeŋ;
jolatimo kidakana, to jok'onyay;
kwoŋbedo jojwango Rwoth
to joyodere gi werin man.
Vini kodi vini manyen
kwanyo woko niaŋ.
Ji paran jorango rieko wok bongi yath masisiri,
aka luth waco rijo gima jomito ŋeyo.
Kole cuny ma kidakana otieko rwenyo jo,
aka jotieko timo gikidakana, gi jwango Were pajo.
Jomiyo cowirok i kisul ma gote,
to jomiyo mic i wi tendere,
i tiendi olwa, kodi i tiendi yen ma yare,
kwoŋbedo tipo pajo ber.
Riameno nyiki jo jotimo gikidakana,
aka mondiwot win jotimo cot.
Ak'omiy nyiki win gir'acula ka jotimo gikidakana,
kosa mondiwot win bende ka jotimo cot;
kole cwo bende jokocere gi jokidakana
aka jonindere gi malayin ma jolamo werin;
meno apaka ji ma bu niaŋ josika.
Kada witimo gikidakana, win Joisiraili,
wikiri wimiy Yuda wolokere jabanja.
Wikiri widonji i Gilgal,
kosa wiidhi i Bethaven,
aka wikiri wikwoŋere ka wiwaco ni, “Paka Rwoth kwo”.
Paka roya dhiaŋ ma wiye tek,
Isiraili wiye tek.
Rwoth nyalo pidho jo pama
paka rombo i lum malac?
Efrayim oriwere gi cal
weyi go kende.
Ka jocowo medho, to jocako nindirok,
jomaro kinyoro loyo dwoŋ pajo.
Ilatiŋo jo woko paŋini gi koyo t'ibolo jo woko,
to wiy jo kwot gi cowirok pajo manyakafir.
Winji win gime, Awi jocway ri Were i wi migam!
Ciki ithin, Awi ot ma Isiraili!
Winji, Awi ot pa kere!
Kole thumo banja me mako win;
kole wilokere bwo i Mizipa,
kodi bwo m'oyar kwoŋ Tabor,
kodi bur m'okuny maluth i Sitim;
to alamiyo joje gir'acula.
Aŋeyo Efrayim,
aka Isiraili k'opanere kwoŋan;
kole pama, Awi Efrayim, itieko timo kidakana;
Isiraili onyekere.
Tim pajo kiyey jo
gik bongi Were pajo.
Kole cuny ma kidakana nitie i jo,
aka jokuya Rwoth.
Kwoto pa Isiraili won ama luwo kwoŋe;
Efrayim tangatanga i banja pere;
Yuda bende tangatanga gi jo.
Gi mwendi kodi sidwol pajo, jolakadho,
dwaro Rwoth,
to jok'onwaŋ go;
go otieko weyo jo.
Jotieko tic gi Rwoth m'ongoye yeyo;
kole jotieko nywolo, nyithindho makicar.
Pama onyo dwe manyen lacuto jo kanyacel gi ndelin pajo.
Kudhi tungi dhiaŋ i Gibeya,
gi gwara i Rama.
Goy ndur i Bethaven;
Wire iŋiy yuŋeyin, Benyamin!
Efrayim lalokere kam'ojwangi,
i ndelo ma gir'acula.
I dier nonin ma Isiraili,
atuco kamaler gir'adieri.
Wot kerin ma Yuda jolokere,
paka jono ma jofudho burowa ma kew.
Alakonjo kwoŋ jo,
keme paran paka pi.
Idiyo Efrayim piny, iŋinyo go i thumo banja,
kwoŋbedo go oyido oyeyo timo gipilok.
Riameno acalo kilajaja ri Efrayim,
kodi paka topo ri ot ma Yuda.
Munyo Efrayim oneno two pere,
to Yuda neno adhola pere,
nyaka to Efrayim kadho i Asiria,
aka odhir go bongi kere madwoŋ,
bongi kere ma latekere loyo jakwor.
To go kinyal bothin,
kosa cango adhola perin.
Kole alabedo paka simbwor ri Efrayim,
kodi paka simbwor ma nyaka ay ri ot ma Yuda.
An won alayeco, t'angoye ran;
alatiŋo woko, aka ongoye ŋata labotho.
Alagik kendo i kabedo paran,
cuka joyey banja pajo to jodwaran.
I rembo pajo jolakwayo nema paran.
“Biye win, weyi wagiki win bongi Rwoth;
kole go am'oyeco wan, aka go lacango wan;
otieko rwadho wan piny, aka go latweyo riwan wonga.
Ka ndelo ario orumo, go ladwoko riwan meni;
i ndelo mar'adek, go lacerino wan,
ŋey wanyal kwo ruwaŋ go.
Weyi waŋey, wakethi kinen ma ŋeyo Rwoth;
menyirok pere obedo adieri paka ŋamba;
go labino riwan paka koth ma cwe nyiknyik,
paka koth cwir ma dhieko piny.”
Anotim kodin aŋo, Awi Efrayim?
Anotim kodin aŋo, Awi Yuda?
Mar mewin cal pondeponde m'odikin,
paka thoyo ma ware con.
Riameno atieko dhiro jotuci wac Were thumo rijo banja ma rerok.
Atieko neko jo gi wac ma dhokan,
aka thumo banja paran kadho pa lero.
ŋeyo Were makiweno mic awaŋa.
To paka Adam, joturo cikirok;
kenyo jotiyo kodan ma buyeyo.
Giliad obedo tindi madwoŋ mapa joreco,
joduwere gi remo.
Paka jokwo jotimo apondi ri nyatoro,
ameno bende apaka jocway ri Were i wi migam jomakere kanyacel;
joneko ji i royo ma kidho Sekem,
jotimo banja madwoŋ ma gir'aura.
I ot ma Isiraili atieko neno gima kiwacere,
kidakana pa Efrayim nikenyo, Isiraili onyekere.
Ri in bende, Awi Yuda, keco otundo,
m'aladwok'iye silwany pa ji paran.
Kisi k'anomiti cango Isiraili,
reco pa Efrayim wok kamaler,
kanyacel gi kidakana pa Samaria.
Kole jotimo gikomo,

To jokidew,
ni apoyo kidakana pajo je.
Pama onyo tim pajo othoko jo,
jonitie ruwaŋan.
Gi kidakana pajo, jomiyo kere kisangala,
kodi jodhum gi tedo wic pajo.
Joje jobedo jotimi cot;
jocale paka kabulirok malieth,
ma jatedi mugat mere kimitere rigo buko mac,
wok i hongo ma dwanyo, moko tundo ketho thow.
I ndelo pa kere mawan, wot kerin,

go oyaro cinge gi jonyero ma rendirok,
Kole paka kabulirok malieth, cuny jo waŋ g'acama tiendi;
wor gipi nge pajo cokere;
odikin gaŋere pa mac maliel.
Joje jolieth paka kabulirok,
aka jocuto jodhum pajo.
Kerin pajo je jotho;
ongoye kad'acel kwoŋ jo ma lwoŋan.
Efrayim ruwere gi ji;
Efrayim cal mugat ma k'oloki.
Jokicar jocuto meni pajo,
to go okuya rigin;
kwo pajo lokere macek,
to jokuya rigin.
Delok pa Isiraili osa go;

kosa jodwar go, ro gime je.
Efrayim onyo olokere paka akuru,
mamiŋ aka bu rieko;
jogoyo koko ri Misir, to jokadho Asiria.
Ka jokadho, alaciko bwo paran kwoŋ jo;
t'akelo jo piny paka winyin ma koyo;
alafonjo jo kite maber paka oluwi kwoŋ jo i kacokirok.
Kidamba rijo, kole jotieko rwenyo kwoŋan!
Rerok rijo, kole jotieko gwenyere kwoŋan!
D'anyalo botho jo,
to joluwo twodo kwoŋan.
Jokiywak ran wok, iy'adundin pajo,

iy jo mwomere ri cemo kodi vini;
jogwenyere kwoŋan.
Kad'afonjo t'amiyo cingi jo meni,
kucel jotimo apondi ma gimarac kwoŋan.
Jogik bongi Bal;
jotieko lokere paka asere m'ongoye kony;

Me labedo nyero pajo ma twodo i piny ma Misir.
Kudhi win gwara!
Kole ŋata cale ango nitie i ot ma Isiraili,

Joywak ran ni,
“Awi Were mawan, wa Joisiraili waŋeyin!”

jakwor lariemo go.
Jotieko ketho kerin pajo i kombere ma dhum, ma k'owoki bongan;

Atieko kwero nyathi dhiaŋ perin, Awi Samaria.
Nge paran liel kwoŋ jo.

Kole jotieko kadho i Asiria,

Aka jolaweyo ma hongo manok kwoŋ bieto pa kerin kodi wot kerin.

Cowirok ma jocowere gine;

Rwoth kisangala gi jo.

jolagik Misir.
Aka Isiraili wiye otieko wil gi Jacwec pere,

Ikir'ifore, Awi Isiraili!
Ikir'ifore paka nonin man;

Aka jok'odoŋ i lowo pa Rwoth;

gi riyo kec, gi biyo pigi waŋ win, gi ywak.
Tur win iy'adundo makiweno yeco nangin mewin.
Gik win bongi Rwoth, Were mewin,
kole go jakisa aka jawor,
galo gi mako nge, aka opoŋ gi mar makiwire,
aka jadwoki cunye cen ma timo teko.
Ŋa m'oŋeyo ka go k'owir paro pere,
to weyo silwany yuŋeye,
mic ma cemo manyinge kodi mic ma medho,
ri Rwoth, Were mewin?
Kudhi win gwara i Zayon,
loki win riyo kec maleŋ,
lwoŋ win cokirok maleŋ.
Coki ji kanyacel,
loki cokirok maleŋ,
coki jom'otegino;
coki nyithindho,
kiri nyithindho maŋic ma fodi jodhoth.
Weyi jamweha wowey kisika pere,
aka mweha wowey tielo pere.
I dier karukirok kodi migam,
weyi jocway ri Were i wi migam, jotic pa Rwoth, jowobiy pigi waŋ jo.
Weyi jowowaci ni, “Tim ŋono gi ji perin, awi Rwoth,
aka ikir'iloki alunja perin giwickwot,
gir'awaca i dier nonin.
Raŋo wowacere i dier ji ni,
Nikune Were pajo?”
Nyaka to nyeko mako Rwoth ri lowo pere,
to bedo gi wor kwoŋ ji pere.
Rwoth odwoko ji pere to waco ama:
Kole, ee acegin dhiro riwin,
ŋano kodi vini manyen kodi mo manyen,
aka wilayeŋ;
ak'oloki win kendo,
giwickwot i dier nonin.
Alakwanyo woko tome bonyo ma yumalo bor gi win,
t'agweyo jo woko i piny m'othwo, m'ojwangere,
yuwaŋe mere i nam ma yuwok ceŋ;
yucen mere i nam ma yupodho ceŋ;
topo mere marac kodi ŋwece mere laay malo.
Jotieko timo gigipiny madongo!
Ikir'ilwor, awi piny Yuda;
sangala aka fore,
kole Rwoth otieko timo gigipiny madongo!
Wikiri wilwor, win ogwaŋe madudi,
kole lum ma thim jobedo nyaboke pendi;
yen jonyak olemo mere,
yath makuyu gi yath vini jotieko miyo olemo pajo.
Awi ji ma Zayon, sangala win,
aka fore win i Rwoth Were mewin;
kole go otieko miyo koth marapena ma botho win,
go otieko konjo piny riwin koth,
koth marapena gi macowe, i dwe marapena.
Kapiedhirok lapoŋ gi ŋano,
nywerin lapoŋ to oy gi vini manyen kodi mo manyen.
Alaculo win cemo ma oro je,
ma tome bonyo otieko camo,
jolweny paran madwoŋ, m'adhiro kwoŋ win.
Wilacemo to wiyeŋ,
to wipako nyingi Rwoth Were mewin,
go m'otieko timo gir'aura gi win.
Aka wickwot k'omaki ji paran kendo cil gi cil.
Aka wilaŋeyo adieri ni, i dier Isiraili,
An, kendo an Rwoth, abedo Were mewin aka ongoye man.
Wickwot k'omaki ji paran kendo cil gi cil.
Rumacen,
alakonjo cuny paran kwoŋ dhano je;
wot win kodi nyiki win jolatuco wac Were,
cwo mewin ma jotegino jolaleko lek,
aka yac mewin jolaneno menyirok.
Kiri kwoŋ ŋecin mewin ma cwo kodi ma mon,
i hongo no, alakonjo cuny paran.
Alanyutho gir'aura i polo kodi i piny,
remo kodi mac kodi siro ma yiro.
Waŋceŋ lalokere mudho,
aka dwe lalokere remo,
mafodi ndelo pa Rwoth madwoŋ ma kiwacere k'obino.
Nyaka kisi ŋat'olwoŋ nyingi Rwoth bino both;
kole wi Got Zayon kodi i Yerusalem,
labedo gonyirok, paka Rwoth otieko waco,
aka kwoŋ joma joboth,
labedo jono ma Rwoth lwoŋo jo.
Kole i ndelin no kodi hongo no,
m'abino dwoko silwany pa Yuda gi Yerusalem;
Alacoko nonin je kanyacel,
t'akelo jo piny i milelo pa Yekosafat.
Alathumo banja rijo kenyo,
ro ji paran kodi alunja paran Isiraili,
kwoŋbedo jotieko kedho jo i dier nonin,
jopoko Isiraili lowo paran.
Jobolo kwir ri ji paran,
jotana yac paran ri malayin,
to jotana nyir ri vini, ŋey jowomedhi.
awi Tire kodi Sidon, g'adec je ma Filistia?
Wiculan ma gimoro?
Ka wiculan, aladwoko cul mewin,
kwoŋ wiwegi ma dwir kendo ma piyo.
aka witieko tero lim paran maber i ot pa were mewin.
Witieko kitana ji ma Yuda kodi ji ma Yerusalem
ri ji ma Gris,
ŋey witer jo bor g'adec pajo won.
Kole acegin kitugila jo,
wok i kabedo ma witieko kitan'iye jo,
aka kenyo alawiro tim mewin wogiki kwoŋ win.
Alakitana wot win kodi nyiki win,
luwo i cingi ji ma Yuda,
aka jolakitana jo ri Josabin, ri nono mabor koro,
kole Rwoth otieko luwo.
Tuci gime i dier nonin,
yik lweny,
tugila jolweny,
weyi jowocore cegin,
weyi cwo ma jolweny je,
jowokadhi malo.
Goy win kwe mewin ma fur wolokere abor,
aka musalauyo mewin jowolokere abore;
weyi ŋata nyap wowaci ni, “Abedo jalweny.”
Redi wibin,
awi nonin je thoko,
cokere win kenyo.
Keli piny jolweny perin, awi Rwoth.
Weyi wotugila jo,
weyi nonin je jowokadhi malo i milelo pa Yekosafat;
kenyo alabedo thumo banja,
ri nonin je thoko.
Lwogi ringa,
inyar jo paka ikeco.
Biye nyon jo paka idhiŋo vini,
ma poŋ de jooy i nywero,
kole kidakana pajo oasere.
Lwak ji kodi lwak ji,
i milelo ma thumo banja!
Kole ndelo pa Rwoth orikere,
i milelo ma thumo banja.
Waŋceŋ kodi dwe jolokere macol,
aka micalin joweyo liel.
Rwoth lakihola wok i Zayon,
to miyo dwonde winjirok wok i Yerusalem,
polo kodi piny jolayengere.
To Rwoth obedo kabwok ri ji pere,
kodi kapondo ri Joisiraili.
Wilaŋeyo nike An, Rwoth Were mewin,
abedo i Zayon, got ma leŋo paran.
Yerusalem labedo Kabedo Maleŋ,
aka jokicar jok'oluw'iye kendo.
I ndelo no,
gote jolathono vini mamit,
tendere jolamol gi cak,
aka jwombe je ma Yuda
jolamol gi pi;
pi ma mol lakitula wok i Ot pa Rwoth
to dhieko milelo ma Sitim.
Misir lalokere kam'ojwangi,
aka Edom thim m'ojwangi,
ro gwayo m'otimi ri ji ma Yuda,
ma i lowo pajo jooyo remo pa ji ma bubanja.
To Yuda labedo cil gi cil,
kodi Yerusalem i luse gi luse.
Alaculo kwor ri remo pa ji m'oneki,
aka ak'owey jobanja m'akimiyo jo gir'acula,
kole Rwoth bedo i Zayon.
“Rwoth jero wi got Zayon
aka dwonde mor i Yerusalem,
lum pa jokwath rombo thwo woko,
aka lum ma wi got Kamel oner.”
Ji ma Damasiko jomedere timo reco kendo,
aka ro gime abino miyo jo gir'acula adieri.
Jotero ji ma Giliad gi gwayo.
Ameno abino dhiro mac i ot pa Hazael,
aka abino reyo woko kapondo pa kere Benhadad.
Abino turo woko waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ Damasiko,
t'akwanyo woko ji ma jobedo i milelo Aven,
kodi jadhum ma Betheden.
Ibino tero ji ma Siria paka jotwec ma lweny i piny Kiri.
Rwoth waco.
Ji ma Gaza jomedere timo reco kendo,
aka ro gime akibino wiro gir'acula pajo,
rupiri jotiŋo piny gibe to jotero jo bedo jowiloka
to jomiyo Edom.
Ameno abino dhiro mac waŋo woko kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ Gaza,
aka bino waŋo woko kapondo pajo.
Abino kwanyo woko jodhum ma tindin madongo Asdod gi Asikelon.
Abino miyo tindi madwoŋ Ekiron gir'acula,
aka Jofilistia je ma jodoŋ jobino tho.
Rwoth waco.
Ji ma Tire jomedere timo reco kendo,
aka ro gime akibino wiro gir'acula pajo,
rupiri jomiyo piny gibe ri Edom,
to wiy gin wil gi cikirok ma wutmere.
Ameno abino dhiro mac i kor ot ma Tire,
aka bino reyo woko kapondo pajo.
Ji ma Edom jomedere timo reco kendo,
aka ro gime akibino wiro gir'acula pajo,
rupiri joredho piny wade pajo Joisiraili gi toŋ,
aka jok'onyutho jo wor.
Nge pajo kidhumere aka jokiwey otho.
Ameno abino dhiro mac kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ Teman,
aka bino reyo kapondo pa Bozra.
Joamon jomedere timo reco kendo,
aka ro gime akibino wiro gir'acula pajo,
rupiri munyo joyawo adec pajo,
joreyo woko mon ma yac i lowo ma Giliad.
Ameno abino dhiro mac i kor ot ma tindi madwoŋ Raba,
aka bino reyo kapondo pere.
Kenyo bino bedo koko i ndelo ma lweny,
lweny bino bedo malieth p'asur.
Kere pajo gi jodhum pere jobino bedo jowiloka.
Rwoth waco.
Ji ma Mowab jomedere timo reco kendo,
aka ro gime akibino wiro gir'acula pajo,
rupiri jowaŋo to joloko buru cokin ma delkwoŋ kere ma Edom.
Ameno abino dhiro mac kwoŋ Mowab,
aka bino reyo kapondo ma Kerioth,
Mowab bino tho i dier kihola, i dier koko gi derino ma gwara.
Abino neko woko jadhum ma Mowab gi jotel je.
Rwoth waco.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
Ji ma Yuda jomedere timo reco kendo,
aka ro gime, akibino wiro gir'acula pajo,
rupiri jokwero cik pa Rwoth,
aka jok'oluwo or pere.
To twodo pajo omiyo jo rwenyo,
ka jolamo werin makicar paka kwarere pajo.
Ameno abino dhiro mac kwoŋ Yuda,
aka bino reyo kapondo ma Yerusalem.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
Ji ma Isiraili jomedere timo reco kendo,
aka ro gime akibino wiro gir'acula pajo,
rupiri jotana jom'otire ri feza,
kodi jocandi ri war.
Jonyono wi jom'oloc gi joma bu gimoro i fukefuke ma lowo,
aka jowiro yo pa jocandi.
Nyathi gi bamere jonindo gi ŋeca madhako acel,
to jokelo wickwot ri nyingan maleŋ.
Jonindo cegin gi migam i nangin ma jocandi josinga rijo ma banja.
I Ot pa Were pajo,
ama jomadh'iye vini,
ma jonyewo gi pesa ma jonyaga kwoŋ ji.
m'oyido jobor pa yath m'ilwoŋo ni sida aka jotek p'olwa;
anyeko woko olemo gi fuc mere piny.
Awodho win wok i piny Misir aka atelo win ma oro piero aŋwen i thim,
t'amiyo win lowo pa Joamor.
aka megi bedo Jonazir.
K'obedo ameno, Joisiraili!
Rwoth waco.
To wimiyo Jonazir madho vini,
aka wiwaco jotuci wac Were cik ni jokiri jowotuci wac Were.
Neni, abino ŋinyo win piny,
paka magal m'otwey'iye ŋano midho piny.
Ŋwec bino dhiero kiri jomayil yil,
aka jomatek jokibino doŋ gi meni pajo,
kosa jomatek jokibino botho kwo pajo wegi.
Kiri cwo ma jor'aserin je jok'onyal cungo,
aka ŋata tiende yilyil kilabotho kwo pere,
kosa ŋata gweyo kayina kilabotho kwo pere.
I ndelo no jomaker kwoŋ jomatek jobino ŋwec kinyoro.
Rwoth waco.
Winji win gima Rwoth waco kwoŋ win Joisiraili, ji ma go owodho wok i piny Misir.
Kwoŋ piny je,
win kende am'atieko ŋeyo t'akwonga jo,
riameno abino miyo win gir'acula,
ro reco mewin je.
J'ario jonyalo woth kanyacel,
ma jok'ocikere ni joworomi?
Simbwor nyalo kihola i dudi,
ma k'oneno gimoro?
Nyathi simbwor nyalo kihola i ode,
ma k'omako gimoro?
Winyo nyalo moko,
ma k'ociki gi ligir?
Mitego por malo wok piny,
ma k'omako gimoro?
Gwara bende ikutho i tindi madwoŋ,
to ji joweyo ma jok'obwok?
Teko nyalo podho i tindi madwoŋ,
ma Rwoth k'odhiro.
Adieri Rwoth kitim gimoro,
ma k'onyutho nyaliŋliŋ pere,
ri ŋecin pere jotuci wac Were.
Ŋa ma lworo kimaki ka simbwor ohola?
Ka Rwoth oluwo,
ŋa manyalo kwero tuco mikwenda pere?
Langa ri ji ma jobedo i ciel ma Misir gi Asdod ni,
cokere win kanyacel wi gote m'othoko Samaria
aka winen nyawin gi diyirok manitie kenyo.
Rwoth waco.
Jokuya timo tiro,
aka jopoŋ gi neki kodi akaka i kapondo pajo.
Riameno me apaka Rwoth Were waco,
jakwor bino thoko piny pajo,
to reyo woko sigingi pajo,
to jonyaga woko udi pajo.
Me apaka Rwoth waco, paka jakwath rombo mayo simbwor tiendi rombo ario, kosa ithe, wok i dhoke, ameno apaka ji manok ma Samaria ibino bothio jo g'adec ma kitandin pajo ma kilaza.
Winji pama aka i gwok nyikway Yakobo,
Rwoth Were, pa Lwak Jolweny waco.
ro reco pere.
Abino reyo woko migam ma Bethel,
aka kisi sonda ma migam bino tur to podho piny.
Abino reyo woko udi ma ndir ma koth gi ma ceŋ.
Udi m'olok maŋon gi lak liec bino podho to sika;
aka ibino reyo woko udi madongo.
Rwoth waco.
Winji win gime,
mon ma Samaria.
Win ma wipoŋ pa dhok ma wi got Basan,
m'ipidho maber, ma jodiyo jocandi,
aka wiŋinyo joma cando gimoro.
Wiwaco ri cwogi win,
jowokeli riwin vini wimadhi.
Rwoth Were leŋ, aka waco ama:
Ndelo bino m'ibino ywayo win gi siragetere;
kisi nyatoro kwoŋ win bino cale rec i siraget.
Ibino ywayo win kiri cegin gi kombe ma kor ot,
t'ibolo win woko, ilabolo win woko i Harmon.
Me apaka Rwoth Were waco:
Ji ma Isiraili, kadhi win i Kabedo Maleŋ Bethel witim reco,
kadhi win Gilgal aka witim reco gi meni mewin je!
Medere win aka wikel ogwaŋe mewin,
paka cowirok kisi odikin,
kodi acel wiy apar mewin kisi ndelo adek.
Medere win wimiy mugat mewin paka foyo ri Were,
aka wikwot gi mic mewin ma wiwegi wimiyo,
langa win jo rupiri a gima wimaro, Joisiraili!
Akelo kec i tindin mewin madongo,
to kucel wikidwoko bongan.
Oyido amako koth kwoŋ win,
munyo oyido odoŋ dwe adek to keco tundo.
Oyido adhiro koth i tindi madwoŋ acel,
t'akwero dhiro i tindi madwoŋ man.
Koth oyido cwe i ndelo acel,
aka ma koth k'ocw'iye othwo woko.
Tindin madongo ario kosa adek,
jokidho i tindi madwoŋ acel madho pi,
aka jok'oyeŋ, kucel wikidwoko bongan.
Adhiro koyo malieth thwo cemo mewin.
Bonyo ocamo ndelin mewin gi ndelin vini mewin,
makuyu gi nanzi mewin,
to je wikidwoko bongan.
“Adhiro kwoŋ win two nundu,
paka ma cango adhiro ri Misir.
Aneko yac mewin gi toŋ,
atiŋo woko kayina mewin,
t'amiyo ŋwece ma kambi mewin donjo i ywor um win,
kucel wikidwoko bongan.
paka asika Sodom gi Gomora.
Wi ji ma wiboth wicale,
kasik mac m'oneki wok i mac,
kucel wikidwoko bongan,
Rwoth waco.
Riameno Joisiraili,
akidho miyo win gir'acula.
Aka rupiri abino timo gime riwin,
yikere win romo gi Were mewin, a Isiraili!”
Kole neni, ŋat'ocweyo gote,
to cweyo koyo,
aka kedho ri nyatoro gima nitie i paro pere,
ŋata loko odieceŋ wor,
aka wotho i boro ma piny
Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny, meno nyingi go!
Winji win wac m'aketho kwoŋ win iywak ajore, Joisiraili.
Opodho, ma doko k'oay,
Isiraili ma cale nyako mambula.
Onindo m'ojwangere piny
aka ongoye ŋat'okony go ay malo.
Me apaka Rwoth Were waco:
Tindi madwoŋ i Isiraili oro woko jolweny gana acel,
to miya acel kende ama jodwoko,
tindi madwoŋ man oro woko miya acel,
apar kende ama jodwoko.
Me apaka Rwoth waco ri Joisiraili:
Rangan win ŋey wibedi gi kwo.
Wikiri wirangan i Bethel,
aka wikiri widonji Gilgal,
kosa wikiri wiŋadi to wikidho Berseba lamo.
Rupiri ji ma Gilgal jobino bedo jowiloka,
aka Bethel kilabedo gimoro.
Rangi win Rwoth ŋey wibedi gi kwo.
Ka wikirango go,
go bino tur kwoŋ Joisiraili pa mac.
Mac bino kisika woko ji ma Bethel,
m'ongoye ŋata bino nyalo neko woko.
Win ma wiloko tiro yath makec,
to wiumo gim'otire.
Go loko mudho lero m'odieceŋ
aka loko odieceŋ wor.
Go lwoŋo pi ma nam
aka konjo woko i lowo.
Rwoth, meno nyingi go.
Go kelo rerok kwoŋ jomeni gi kapondo pajo.
Widak ŋata kwero gima k'otire,
aka luwo adieri i kapido.
Widiyo jocandi,
aka winyaga ŋano pajo.
Riameno wikibino nindo i udi mewin m'ogeti gi telin mafoth,
kosa madho vini wok i ndelo vini mewin ma wi pidho.
Aŋeyo reco mewin je gi dwoŋo mere.
Wicando ji maber,
aka wiyeyo cami nyew,
to wikwero jocandi limo tiro wok i kapido.
Riameno ŋata luwo adieri bino liŋ,
i hongo paka ama rupiri obedo hongo ma raco.
Rangi win bero, makiweno raco,
ŋey wibedi gi kwo.
Nyaka Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny,
bino bedo gi win paka wiwaco ni go nitie gi win.
Kwer win raco, aka wimar bero,
aka neni win ni tiro nitie i kapido.
Kono miti Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny,
bino mako wor gi ji ma piny me ma fodi jodoŋ makwo.
Riameno me apaka Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny waco:
Bino bedo ywak gi kumo i yo ma tindi madwoŋ.
Kiri jofur je ibino lwoŋo jo ywako jom'otho,
kanyacel gi ji m'iculo jo ma ywak.
Bino bedo ywak i ndelin ma vini,
rupiri abino miyo win gir'acula.
Rwoth waco.
Kidamba riwin ma wikuro ndelo pa Rwoth.
Raŋo ma wikuro ndelo pa Rwoth?
Riwin bino bedo ndelo ma mudho makiweno lero.
Bino cale ŋata ringo kwoŋ simbwor to romo g'arara!
Kosa ŋat'okidho i ot pere to theno cinge i kor ot to thwol toŋo go.
Ndelo pa Rwoth bino bedo mudho makiweno lero;
bino bedo ndelo ma colo m'ongoye lero.
akisangala gi cokirok mewin maleŋ.
Makada nende wimiyan mic mewin awaŋa kodi olemo,
akibino jolo;
mic mewin ma siem mar'ogwaŋe mewin macwe,
akibino jolo.
Kwany win kwoŋan wer mewin ma koko no;
akimiti winjo dwondi tongol mewin.
Kwanyowoko weyi win tiro womol paka pi,
aka gim'otire womol paka waŋ pi ma kicwiy.
akikwayo win cowirok,
kosa mic i oro piero aŋwen ma telo win i thim.
T'onyo pama, rupiri wilamo cal pa Sakuth kere mewin,
kodi Kayiwan, were mewin ma micala,
ma witimo no.
Riameno abino tero win bedo jowiloka i piny kalo Damasiko,
Rwoth ma nyinge obedo Were pa lwak jolweny waco.
Kidamba riwin ma wibedo i kwo mayom i Zayon,
kodi jono ma joparo ni jonitie kama ber i Samaria.
Win jotel madongo ma piny madwoŋ me Isiraili,
win ma ji jobino bongi win rango kony.
Kadhi winen tindi madwoŋ Kaline.
Kosa kadhi winen tindi madwoŋ Hamath,
to wiloro wineno Gath tindi madwoŋ ma Filistia.
Oyido jober loyo win!
Adec pajo oyido lac loyo mewin!
Wikwero yeyo ni ndelo ma teko bino,
to gima witimo coro ndelo no cegin.
Kidamba riwin ma winindo i kanindin m'otimi gi lak liec,
to wiriere i kitandin mewin, aka wicamo rombo gi dhok.
Wimito swa cwogo wer,
paka Daudi oyido cwogo to wigoyo i tongol.
Wimadho vini iy'atewe,
aka wioro mo maŋwe kur,
to wikiywaki ri kisika pa Isiraili.
Riameno wiŋati wilabedo marapena bedo jowiloka,
aka kalima mewin bino tundo i gike.
Rwoth Were pa lwak jolweny waco ama:
Adaki pakirok pa Joisiraili,
aka acayo kapondo pajo.
Abino miyo tindi madwoŋ pajo gi kisi gima nitie iye ri jokwor.
K'inen nitie cwo apar ma jodoŋ i peco, jobino tho.
Aka wat pa jacwo m'otho, ŋata waŋo delkwoŋ go, bino tero delkwoŋ go woko ma ot. Wat no bino lwoŋo ŋata nitie i ot ni, “Nitie ŋatiman manitie kodin kenyo?” Dwondi nyatoro bino waco ni, “Be!”
Aka wat no bino waco ni, “Liŋ! Wakiri watuci nyingi Rwoth.”
Ka Rwoth omiy cik,
udi madongo gi mathindho je bino ŋinyirok.
Kayina bende joŋweco i wi telin?
Nitie ŋata nyalo furo gi megikwe i nam?
To kucel wiwiro tiro butwa,
aka gim'otire yath makec.
Win ma wisiemere i tindi Lodebar,
aka wiwaco ni, “Wamako Kenayim gi meni mawan won.”
Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny won waco ama:
Ji ma Isiraili, akidho dhiro jolweny ma jobedo jowiloka mako piny mewin.
Jobino diyo win cako i ger ma Hamath,
tundo kiri i milelo Araba.
Rwoth Were onyuthan menyirok. Aneno go cweyo tome bonyo munyo nyaka otiek ŋado ri kere lum, aka lum oyido doko lothi.
I menyirok no aneno munyo bonyo jocamo woko kisi gima nyaboke pendi i lowo. Kenyo awaco ama:
Awi Rwoth Were, cwaki ji perin, akwayin.
Jokwo nedi?
Jomoki aka joloc!
Rwoth owiro paro pere to waco ama:
Gim'ineno k'otimere.
Me gima Rwoth Were onyuthan menyirok man. Aneno go lwoŋo gir'acula gi mac, aka osika woko lutho madwoŋ aka oyido camo woko lowo.
Kenyo awaco ama:
Weyi Rwoth, akwayin!
Ji perin jokwo nedi?
Jomoki aka joloc!
Rwoth owiro paro pere doko, aka owaco ama:
Me je k'otimere.
Rwoth onyuthan menyirok man. Aneno go ocungo i ŋeti kor ot m'ogeti gi kabiro, aka go oyido otiŋo kabiro i cinge.
Aka Rwoth openjan ni, “Amos, ineno aŋo?”
Adwoko ni, “Aneno kabiro.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ama:
Neni, aoro kabiro me,
ma nyutho ni ji paran Isiraili,
jocale kor ot m'oban.
Akibino wiro paro paran ma miyo jo gir'acula.
Abino reyo woko kabedo je,
ma nyikway Isaka jolam'iye.
Abino kisika woko Kabedo Maleŋ je i Isiraili.
Abino kelo ker pa Yerobowam i gike.
Kenyo Amaziya jacway ri Were i wi migam ma Bethel odhiro ri Yerobowam kere ma Isiraili wac ni, “Amos camo rin sereko i dier ji aka dhodhok pere bino reyo woko piny.”
Kole Amos waco ama:
“Yerobowam bino tho g'abor,
aka ibino kwanyo woko Joisiraili wok i piny pajo,
kidho bedo jowiloka.”
Kenyo Amaziya owaco ri Amos ni, “A jatuci wac Were, kadhi, iŋwec i Yuda, aka icami mugat kenyo, aka ituci wac Were koro.
To doko ikir'ituci wac Were i Bethel, rupiri obedo Kabedo Maleŋ pa kere, aka ot ma lamo ma ker.”
Kenyo Amos odwoko Amaziya ni, “Akibedo jatuci wac Were ma tuco wac Were ma cul. Abedo jakwath dhok, aka akuro yen makuyu.
To Rwoth okwanyan bedo jakwath dhok to oran bino tuco wac Were ri ji pere Isiraili.”
Riameno pama winji wac pa Rwoth.
“Iwaco ran ni akir'atuci wac Were kwoŋ Isiraili,
aka akir'atiti kwoŋ Joisiraili.”
“Riameno Rwoth waco rin ni,
‘Dhako perin bino lokirok malaya i tindi madwoŋ,
aka wotin gi nyikin jobino tho g'abor.
Lowo perin ibino poko t'imiyo ji man,
aka in won ibino tho i piny makoc,
adieri ibino kwanyo woko Joisiraili wok i piny pajo bedo jowiloka.’ ”
Rwoth Were onyuthan menyirok man. Aneno adita mar'olemo.
Rwoth openjan ni, “Amos, aŋo m'ineno?”
Adwoko ni, “Adita mar'olemo.”
Kenyo Rwoth owaco ran ama:
Gike otundo kwoŋ ji paran Isiraili.
Akibino doko wiro paro kwoŋ miyo jo gir'acula.
I ndelo no, wer ma peco pa kere,
bino lokirok ywak ajore.
Delkwoŋ ji m'otho bino more kisi kamoro;
aka ibino bolo jo woko liŋ,
Rwoth Were waco.
Winji win gime,
win ma winyono joma bu gimoro,
aka wireyo woko jocandi ma piny.
Wiwaco ama;
dwe manyen orum keraŋo,
ŋey watana ŋano?
Sabato orum keraŋo,
ŋey doko wacak kitana ŋano?
Nyaka ŋey waor latir ma k'otire,
aka wakithin gi telin ma kipima ma kwalo joma nyewo.
Wanyal kitana ŋano ma bukony i welo ma malo.
Wabino nwaŋo jacandi ma kinyal culo banja pere,
kosa culo welo pa ŋato to wanyewo go paka ŋeca.
Rwoth Were pa Isiraili otieko kwoŋere ama:
Wiyan k'owil gi tim pajo marac.
Piny bino kirin ro gime,
to kisi nyatoro je ma bedo i piny bino ywak.
Piny gibe layengere,
bino ay to doko podho paka malawa Nayil.
I ndelo no, Rwoth Were waco,
abino miyo ceŋ podho sawa aucel,
to yutho odieceŋ par.
Abino loko kalima mewin kaliel,
kodi wer mewin ywak ajore.
Abino kelo pata wiwin to wiruko kutiya.
Wibino cale jonywol,
ma joywako nyaka wod gin acel.
Ndelo no bino bedo magway kiri i gike.
Rwoth Were waco ama:
Neni, ndelo bino m'abino dhiro kec i piny;
ki kec ma mugat, kosa riyo ma pi,
to ma winjo wac pa Rwoth.
Ji jobino kilera wok i nam tundo i nam,
wok yumalo tundo yuwok ceŋ.
Jobino dwaro wac pa Rwoth kisi kamoro,
to jokibino nwaŋo.
I ndelo no yac gi nyir ma fodi jothindho,
jobino fodirok piny ro riyo.
Joma jokwoŋere gi Asima cal ma Samaria,
aka jowaco ni,
“Paka i kwo were ma Dan.”
Kosa ma jokwoŋere gi were ma Berseba,
jobino podho aka doko jok'oay.
Aneno Rwoth munyo ocungo dho migam,
aka owaco ama:
Goy win sirin ma Ot pa Were matek,
ŋey kindi ot woyengere,
aka wotur wopodhi wi ji.
Jom'odoŋ abino neko jo i lweny.
Ongoye ŋata bino ringo,
aka ongoye ŋata bino kwalok.
Makada nende jokuny piny,
to jodonjo i piny pa jom'otho,
abino mako jo.
Makada nende joidhi malo i polo,
abino dwoko jo piny.
Makada nende jopondi wi got Kamel,
abino dwaro jo t'amako jo.
Makada nende jopondi ruwaŋan i pendi nam,
abino wodho or to thwol kayo jo.
Ka jokwor pajo jokadhi gi jo paka jowiloka,
abino wodho or t'ineko jo.
Abino ketho waŋan kwoŋ jo
ri raco makiweno bero.
Rwoth, Were pa lwak jolweny,
ma mako piny to kirin,
to ji ma jobed'iye je joywak
aka piny gibe ay to doko podho,
pa malawa Nayil ma Misir.
Rwoth geto peco pere i polo
aka umo piny gi pondeponde.
Go lwoŋo pi ma nam
aka konjo woko i lowo.
Rwoth meno nyingi go.
Rwoth waco ama:
Ji ma Isiraili, wicale ran Joethopiya.
Awodho win wok i piny Misir,
paka awodho Jofilistia wok Kirete,
kodi Josiria wok Kiri.
Neni, waŋ Rwoth Were nitie kwoŋ ker mareco me Isiraili,
abino reyo woko wok i piny.
T'akibino reyo woko nyikway Yakobo je.
Abino miyo cik t'acunga Joisiraili,
paka ŋano manitie i kicungwo.
Abino kicunga jo kwoŋ piny je,
t'ayeko woko ji ma bukony.
Joreco ma jonitie i dier ji paran,
ibino neko jo i lweny.
Jono je ma jowaco ni,
“Were kilayeyo teko wopodhi kwoŋ wan.”
ker pa Daudi m'opodho.
Abino yiko kam'onyekere mere,
t'ageto malo gundin mere.
Abino doko geto paka oyido cango con nitie.
kodi piny je m'ilwoŋo gi nyingan,
Rwoth waco, go ma timo me.
Ndelo bino, Rwoth waco,
ma ŋano bino dongo piyo ma kalo ka keco,
aka vini bino dongo ma kalo ka timo vini.
Gote jobino thono vini mamit,
aka riete jobino mol gine.
Abino dwoko ji paran i piny pajo,
jobino geto tindin madongo pajo m'orere to jobedo kenyo,
jobino pidho ndelo vini, to jomadho vini,
jobino pidho ndelin, to jocamo gima jopidho.
Abino pidho ji paran i piny m'amiyo jo,
aka doko kilafudho jo,
wok i lowo m'atieko miyo jo.
Rwoth Were mewin waco.
Me wac pa Rwoth Were m'obino ri Obadia tuco ma mako kwoŋ piny Edom.
Rwoth ooro jamikwenda pere bongi piny je,
aka watieko winjo mikwenda pere.
Yikere win wakadhi i lweny gi Edom.
Neni, abino lokin masisiri i piny je,
aka kisi nyatoro bino cayin.
Pakirok ma cunyin otieko wondin,
in m'ibedo wi got malo,
iwaco i cunyin ni,
“Ŋa manyalo ywayan piny?”
Makada nende inoay paka ango,
makada nende odin obedi i pondeponde,
je fodi abino ywayin piny.
Ka jokwo jobino bongin,
ka jokinyaga jobino wor,
jokwanyo gima jomito kende.
Ka ji jofono nyingi vini,
joweyo ye manok.
To jokwor perin jotieko kisika in woko kicutho.
Nyikway Esau, lim mewin otiek kinyaga woko,
ji m'oyido joriwere kodin jotieko wondin,
joriemin woko i piny perin.
Ji m'oyido jonitie i siem kodin,
onyo pama jokengila in.
Merin perin m'oyido i cemo gi jo jociko in gi bwo
jowaco ni, “Nikune rieko m'oyido go nitie gine je?”
I ndelo no abino miyo gir'acula,
abino kisika woko cwo mariek,
t'awaro woko rieko pajo.
Cwo ma jolweny i tindi Teman je jobino bwok,
aka kisi jalweny i piny Edom ibino neko.
Rupiri ikwalo t'ineko,
wutmin in nyikway Yakobo,
ibino kisika in, aka ikilalimo wor cil gi cil.
Ipor gicen i ndelo no,
munyo jokwor pajo joturo waŋkac pajo.
In bende oyido icale jopath no,
ma jotiŋo lim pa Yerusalem
aka jopoko i dier jo.
Dinyo ikisiemere,
kwoŋ lifol pa wutmin in ma Yuda.
Dinyo ikisangala,
i ndelo ma rerok pajo.
Dinyo ikipakere,
i ndelo ma rembo pajo madwoŋ.
Dinyo ikidonjo i tindi pa ji paran,
siemirok kwoŋ candirok pajo,
kodi kinyaga gigipiny pajo,
i ndelo ma teko pajo.
mako jom'oyido jotemo ringo.
Dinyo ikimiyo jo i cingi jokwor pajo,
i ndelo ma rembo pajo madwoŋ.
Ndelo cegin ma An Rwoth,
abino thumo banja ri kisi piny.
Edom, gim'itieko timo
ibino timo rin bende,
aka tim perin bino gik i wiyin.
Ji paran jomadho kikopo makec ma gir'acula,
wi got paran maleŋ.
To piny je thoko bino madho,
kikopo makec loyo ma gir'acula,
jobino madho je to jorere.
To wi got Zayon jomegi jobino kwale,
aka bino bedo Kabedo Maleŋ.
Ji pa Yakobo jobino bedo gi lim pajo wegi
gi lowo pajo wegi.
Ji pa Yakobo gi Yozefu jobino cale mac,
aka jobino kisika woko ji pa Esau,
paka mac sika woko kanja.
An Rwoth atieko luwo.
Ji ma yupiny ma Yuda jobino bedo i Edom,
aka ji ma yupodho ceŋ jobino mako piny Filistia.
Joisiraili jobino bedo iy'adec ma Efrayim kodi Samaria,
aka ji pa Benyamin jobino tero Giliad.
Jolweny m'oyido joringo wok yumalo ma Isiraili,
jobino dwoko to jobedo Fonisia,
tundo kiri yumalo ma Zarefath.
Jom'oyido joringo wok i Yerusalem ma jonitie i Sardis,
jobino mako tindin manitie yupiny ma Yuda.
Cwo ma jotieko loyo i Yerusalem,
jobino monjo Edom to jodhumo.
Aka Rwoth won bino bedo kere.
“Ay ikidhi i tindi madwoŋ no Ninivi, iwaci rijo kwoŋ reco pajo rupiri aŋeyo kidakana pajo.”

Yona oringo to kidho i tindi Tarsis kamabor gi Rwoth. Go oloro to kidho i kabedo m'ilwoŋo ni Yopa dho thengi nam. Kenyo go onwaŋo mel m'oyido cegin kadho Tarsis. Yona oŋado tikiti to idho mel no wonyali cewirok gi jono Tarsis bor gi Rwoth.
Munyo jocewere i nam, Rwoth odhiro asur manitie gi derino swa m'oyengo mel to both turo.

Gime obwoko swa jom'oyido nitie i mel. Jocako lwoŋo kareno jorango kony; kisi nyatoro ocako kwayo were pere wonyali konyo go. Mito loko mel masew, jobolo gigipiny m'oyido nitie i mel i nam. I waŋceŋ ma gime oyido timer'iye, Yona oyido nindo i pendi mel kam'opondo.
Jatel ma mel onwaŋo go kenyo aka owaco rigo ni, “Ay malo ikway were perin poyo nyalo mako gi wan wor to botho kwo mawan.”
Munyo asur omedere, omiyo jo penjirok ni ŋa kwoŋ jo m'okelo teko me. Ameno jogoyo kwir to nwaŋere nike manago obedo Yona.
To jocewirok jopenjo Yona ni, “Waci riwan, ŋa ma wapusa ro gime? Itimo tic aŋo? Iwok kune? Iwok i piny mene? Aka ijanono mene?”
Yona odwoko jo ni, “Abedo Jayuda, aka alamo Rwoth, Were ma i polo. Go Were m'ocweyo lowo gi nam.”
Yona omedere waco rijo nike go oyido ŋweco pondo ri Rwoth. Munyo jowinjo gima Yona owaco, jobwok swa; aka jopenjo go ni, “Aŋo m'itimo me?”
Derino mar'asur omedere aka jopenjo go ni, “Watim rin aŋo ŋey asur me wokwe?”
Go odwoko jo ni, “Aŋeyo paka me obedo kibenga paran; aka ka witiŋan to wibolan i nam, asur bino kwe.”
Kad'ameno jotemo gi meni pajo je dwoko mel i thengi nam, to derino mar'asur k'oyeyo jo dhirok
Ameno joywak ri Rwoth ni, “Awi Rwoth, ikir'imiy wan gir'acula ma tho, ro tho pa Yona! In Rwoth iŋat'itimo gime je.”
Kenyo jobolo Yona i nam; aka asur okwe dicel.
Gime omiyo jome bedo gi dhier aka jobedo gi lworo swa ri Rwoth. Jocowere to jokwoŋere.
Kenyo Rwoth owodho or ri rec madwoŋ swa m'omwonyo Yona. Yona obedo i iy rec no ndelo adek; wor g'odieceŋ.
“Alwoŋin i teko paran Rwoth,
t'idwokan.
Aywak rin wok i milelo, i piny pa jom'otho,
t'iwinjo dwondan.
Ibolan i milelo,
i cuny nam,
kama pi othokan'iye,
aka asur perin ma nigi derino ouman.
Oyido aparo nike ibolan woko angoye ruwaŋin,
aka doko ak'oneni ot perin maleŋ.
Pi omwonyan to deyan,
nam omwonyan gikululu,
aka tworo ma pi otudere i ŋutan.
Aluthere piny i tiendi Got.
Akidho i piny kama waŋkac mere kiyawere.
To kucel in Rwoth Were paran,
iŋat'idwokan makwo wok i bur.
Munyo adundo paran opodho,
apoyo Rwoth,
aka kwayo paran otundo bongin i ot perin maleŋ.
Joma jolamo cal ma bukony,
jowiro ŋey jo rin.
T'abino wero ma pakin,
abino miyin cowirok.
Gim'aciko, abino culo.
Both wok bongi Rwoth.”
Kenyo Rwoth doko owodho or ri rec cik, aka rec oŋulo Yona i lowo m'othwo.
Rwoth doko ooro Yona ni
“Ay ikidhi i tindi madwoŋ no Ninivi, iwaci rijo mikwenda m'atieko miyin.”
Rume Yona k'ofoco Rwoth to kidho Ninivi. Tindi madwoŋ me oyido lac swa, aka otero Yona ndelo adek woth thoko iye je.
Yona ocako kidho i Ninivi, aka munyo otieko woth ndelo gipi okoko ni, “I ndelo piero aŋwen wok pama Ninivi bino rere woko.”
Ji ma Ninivi joyeyo wac pa Were. Ameno joyere kisi nyatoro, wok kwoŋ nyithindho tundo kwoŋ jodongo joyere riyo ma nyutho ni oyido joŋuto kidakana pajo.
Munyo wac me otundo bongi kere ma Ninivi, kere oay wok i kom pere ma dhum to lunyo woko kanzu pere, oruko nanga ma kutiya, aka obedo piny i buru
Kenyo kere kodi jodhum pere jowodho cik ni, “Ongoye nyatoro mogo je, ji je, dhok gi rombo jokiri jowocemi kosa jowomadhi pi.
Ji je kodi ogwaŋe joripo ruko kutiya aka jokway Were gi cuny jo je. Jowoŋuti reco pajo, aka jowey kidakana pajo.
Ŋa m'oŋeyo ŋa! Kono miti Were nyalo wiro paro pere to weyo mako nge, to weyo ma k'oneko wan.”
Munyo Were oneno gima jotimo, go oneno nger ma joŋuto kidakana pajo. Ameno Were owiro paro pere aka oweyo ma k'okelo kwoŋ jo gir'acula m'oyido go owaco.
Yona owinjo marac swa munyo Were k'okelo gir'acula kwoŋ Ninivi to mako nge.

Go owaco ri Rwoth ni, “A Rwoth, me a gim'awaco mafodi akiay peco nike ibino timo. Am'omiyo atemo kiri ŋwec kadho i tindi Tarsis. Oyido aŋeyo paka in Were m'omaro ji aka ipoŋ gi wor. In Were ma kimaki nge piyo rupiri ipoŋ gi mar m'oasere. Inyalo wiro paro perin, t'iweyo m'ikimiyo gir'acula.
Riameno Rwoth, akwayin ikwany woko kwo paran; ber atho loyo bedo makwo.”
Rwoth openjo Yona ni, “Dwoŋ aŋo m'initie gine mako nge?”
Yona oyido owok Ninivi to kidho bedo yuthenge ma yuwok ceŋ ma tindi madwoŋ. Go ogeto tipo to bedo piny kareno kuro neno gim'otimere ri Ninivi.
Rwoth Were omiyo yath mogo otwi to dongo ma timo ri Yona tipo ŋey Yona wowinji m'ogonyere. Yona owinjo maber swa gi yath no.
Munyo piny yawere i ndelo m'oluwo, Were odhiro kudin mogo m'ocamo tiendi yath no to thwo.
To munyo ceŋ owok, Were odhiro koyo malieth swa wok yuthenge ma wok ceŋ. Lietho ma ceŋ owaŋo tipin wi Yona aka oloco go. Yona openjo ni, “Raŋo akitho! Ber atho woko loyo bedo makwo.”
Were openjo Yona ni, “Dwoŋ aŋo m'initie gine mako nge?”
Yona odwoko ni, “Amako nge rupiri ber atho loyo bedo makwo.”
Rwoth owaco ri Yona ni, “Yath me odongo i wor acel to won rere; ongoye gim'itimo rigo, aka iŋat'ikimiyo odongo t'irem gine.
To raŋo akimaki wor gi tindi madwoŋ no Ninivi; kama nitie nyithindho ma kalo 120,000 m'ongoye gima joŋeyo, kiri g'ogwaŋe?”
Winji win gime, win ji je,
ciki ithi win, kisi gima nitie i piny,
aka weyi Rwoth Were womiy jakony ma luwo adieri kwoŋ win.
Winji! Rwoth luwo gi ot pere maleŋ ma lamo.
Kole neni, Rwoth bino wok i kabedo pere maleŋ
aka go bino loro piny to nyono wi gote ma piny.
Aka gote jobino leny i ŋange
p'odok manitie i mac;
jobino oy piny i milelo,
paka pi oy piny wok i wi tendere.
Gime je obedo ro reco pa Yakobo,
kodi ro reco ma ot pa Isiraili.
Reco pa Yakobo obedo aŋo?
K'obedo Samaria won?
Aka reco ma ot pa Yuda obedo aŋo?
K'obedo Yerusalem won?
Riameno abino loko Samaria kidhur rerok kam'othangere,
kabedo ma pidho ndelo vini,
aka abino konjo piny telin mere i milelo,
t'akedho kinde.
Cal pere je ibino ŋinyo woko mathindho thindho,
aka mic pere je ibino waŋo woko gi mac.
Cal pere je bino ŋinyirok
rupiri wok kwoŋ mic pa malayin ma ot ma lamo ama go ocoko jo.
Onyo jokwor pere bende jobino tero ri malayin ma ot ma lamo kaman.
Ro gime abino ywak, t'auja
aka ma nyutho rembo paran abino wotho gi par tiendan aka kinyoro.
Abino jero paka ogwaŋe madudi,
t'auja paka maya.
Adholin pa Samaria kicangi,
aka omako Yuda bende,
otundo i waŋkac pa ji paran bende,
i Yerusalem.
Ikir'iwaci kikengila mawan i Gath,
aka weyi jokiri jowoneni ka wiywak.
Ji ma Beth Lifra,
nyuthi win ngoye gi geno mewin gi ŋindirok i fukefuke.
Kadhi win wibedi jowiloka,
win ji ma Safir,
kinyoro aka giwickwot.
Win ji ma Zana wikiri wiwok i tindi madwoŋ mewin,
kole kiuja ma Bethezel miyo win ŋeyo nike kapondo ongoy'iye.
Kole ji ma Maroth,
jokuro swa bero,
rupiri kidamba otieko loro wok bongi Rwoth,
i waŋkac ma Yerusalem.
Tweyi win kayinin i cawilin,
win ji ma Lakis,
wiŋati wikelo tim mareco i Yerusalem,
aka reco ma Isiraili onwaŋere kwoŋ win.
Riameno wilamiyo mic ma kisewila Moreseth Gath,
aka kerin ma Isiraili doko jok'onwaŋ kony wok i tindi Akizib.
Abino miyo win i cingi jakwor kendo,
win ji ma Maresa,
aka dwoŋ pa Isiraili,
labino i Adulam.
Lokere win jopata aka wiliel ye wiwin,
ro nyithindho mewin ma wimaro,
lokere win jopata paka ango
rupiri nyithindho mewin jolakidho bedo jowiloka.
Kidamba ri jono ma jocano timo kidakana,
aka jocano timo reco gi kanindo pajo.
Ka piny ocot, jotimo,
rupiri nitie i meni ma cingi gin.
Jowanya ndelin, aka jomako,
kodi udi, aka jotero,
jodiyo jacwo gi ot pere,
aka jotero lim pere.
Riameno Rwoth waco ama:
Neni, acano kelo kidamba kwoŋ win,
aka wik'onyal kwalok kwoŋe,
aka wik'onyal woth gi delok kendo,
rupiri bino bedo hongo ma raco.
Ka ndelo otundi, ji jobino oro kigana ma mako kwoŋ win paka gir'anena ma kidamba,
aka jobino kiuja, to joywak gi gwayo,
ka jowaco ni, “Orey wan woko kicutho.
Rwoth omayo wan lowo mawan,
to poko ri joma jomako wan.”
Riameno ka hongo otundi ma dwoko lowo ri ji pa Rwoth,
ongoye kwoŋ win ŋata bino limo.
Ji jowaco ran ni, ikir'ititi riwan.
Ikir'ititi kwoŋ gino je
rupiri Rwoth kilakelo kwoŋ wan wickwot.
Gime ber ni wowaci, a ot pa Yakobo?
Cuny pa Rwoth kibedi moth?
Me a tim pere?
Waci pere kitim bero,
ri ŋata timo gim'otire?
To wimonjo ji paran paka jakwor,
wilunyo kanzu kwoŋ ji ma jowotho i yo pajo,
ma jongoye gi paro ma lweny.
Wiriemo mon pa ji paran,
wok i pecin pajo ma jomaro,
aka witieko kwalo silwany paran ri nyithindho pajo kicutho.
Ay win wikadhi,
kole kaywomirok ongoye ka,
kwoŋbedo reco mewin omiyo ka rerok gi rem.
Ka nyatoro ma waco koyo gi twodo,
owaco ni, “Abino tito riwin vini gi math makec,
dinyo go am'obedo jatiti ri ji me.”
T'abino coko win, a Isiraili,
abino coko ji pa Isiraili ma jodoŋ.
Abino ketho jo kanyacel,
paka rombo i sidwol,
paka mwendi ma jocamo lum,
paka lwak ji ma jowoy.
Were bino yawo rijo yo to telo jo wok i piny pa jopath.
Jobino turo woko waŋkac ma tindi madwoŋ to jogonyere,
aka Kere pajo, Rwoth won bino telo yuwiy jo.
Kole awaco:
Winji win, win jotel pa Isiraili!
Kodi jodhum ma ot pa Isiraili!
Wiripo ŋeyo tiro.
Win ma widak bero aka wimaro raco,
wiyeco woko pien ma delkwoŋ ji paran,
gi riŋo pajo wok kwoŋ cokin pajo.
Wicamo delkwoŋ ji paran,
to wiyeco woko pien ma delkwoŋ jo.
Wituro woko cokin pajo mathindho thindho,
to wiyaŋo jo pa riŋo m'ikidho bolo iy'ayiga.
To nyaka wiywak ri Rwoth,
to Rwoth kiladwoko win
go bino kano waŋe kwoŋ win i hongo no,
rupiri witimo reco.
Me a gima Rwoth waco ri jotuci wac Were,
ma jobano ji paran,
aka jociko siem,
ri jono ma joculo jo,
to lweny ri jono ma jokicul jo.
Riameno labedo wor riwin, m'ongoye lero,
aka mudho riwin ma wik'onyal waco gima bino timirok.
Joneno jobino limo wickwot,
ibino sewo wi jothieth,
jobino mwono dhok gin,
rupiri Rwoth kiladwoko jo.
To ri an, apoŋ gi meni,
gi Cuny pa Rwoth,
kodi tiro aka atek,
ma waco ri Yakobo komo pere,
kodi ri Isiraili reco pere.
Winji win gime win jotel ma ot pa Yakobo,
kodi jodhum ma ot pa Isiraili.
Win ma widak tiro
aka wiwiro gimo'tire gi gim'okom.
Wigeto Zayon gi remo,
aka Yerusalem gi komo.
Jotel mere jothumo banja ro nyewirok,
jocway ri Were i wi migam jotiyo ma cul,
jotuci wac Were ma pesa,
kucel jogoŋere kwoŋ Were to jowaco ni,
“Rwoth nitie gi wan,
teko k'opodhi kwoŋ wan.”
ibino furo Zayon paka ndelo,
Yerusalem bino cale kidhur gundin,
aka tendere ma Ot pa Were bino lokere lul.
Ndelo ma rumacen bino,
ma got ma Ot pa Rwoth,
bino bedo got mabor loyo,
aka ibino tiŋo malo kalo tendere je,
aka ji jobino mol i iye.
Aka nonin kweth jolabino to jowaco ni,
“Biye win, weyi wakadhi wi got pa Rwoth,
i Ot pa Were pa Yakobo
ŋey go wofonji wan yo pere,
aka wawothi i yo pere.”
Kole cik wok i Zayon,
aka wac pa Rwoth wok i Yerusalem.
kodi i dier piny ma jotek cegin gi bor.
Jobino thedho abor pajo loko kwe dhok,
gi toŋ pajo loko apalin ma kikolesa.
Piny acel k'otiŋ abor kwoŋ piny man kendo,
kosa jok'oyikere ri lweny kendo.
i tiendi yath vini gi makuyu pere,
aka ongoye ŋata bino miyo jo bedo gi lworo,
kole dhok Rwoth pa lwak jolweny otieko luwo.
Kisi ji jowotho,
i nyingi were pajo,
to wan, wabino wotho i nyingi Rwoth Were mawan,
cil gi cil.
I ndelo no, Rwoth waco,
abino coko kanyacel jor'aŋolo,
jono ma riemo jo woko,
kodi jono m'atieko miyo litho.
Alaloko jor'aŋolo ji m'odoŋ,
aka jom'oyido abolo woko, alaloko piny madwoŋ.
Rwoth bino dhumo jo wi got Zayon,
wok pama kadho yuwaŋe aka cil gi cil.
Paka ri in, Yerusalem,
kama Rwoth kur'iye ji pere paka jakwath rombo,
ibino bedo tindi madwoŋ ma ker m'oyido obedo aperin kendo.
Onyo raŋo wigoyo ndur?
Kere ongoye i dier win?
Jamic rieko mewin otho,
ma wicandere paka dhako ma ŋedi ramo?
Dwanyere win aka wiuja ji ma Yerusalem,
paka dhako ma colo nyathi.
Kole onyo pama wilawok i tindi madwoŋ,
to wibedo i piny m'othangere;
wibino kidho i Babilon.
Kenyo ibino botho win,
kenyo Rwoth bino botho win,
wok i cingi jokwor mewin.
Onyo pama piny kweth,
jocokere monjin,
jowaco ni, “Weyi warey Yerusalem,
aka wanen ni go orere.”
To jokuya paro pa Rwoth,
jokiniaŋ can pere
nike go otieko coko jo paka ŋano m'itero i kisia.
Rwoth waco ni, “Ji ma Yerusalem,
kadhi win wimiy jokwor mewin gir'acula!
Abino loko win matek pa thwon,
manitie gi tunge ma nyweny kodi tiende ma ywel.
Wibino ŋinyo piny kweth, aka lim ma jolimo g'akaka,
wibino miyan,
Rwoth ma piny gibe.”
coki win jolweny mewin!
Okar wan!
Jomonjo jatel ma Isiraili!
To in, a Bethelehem Efratha,
m'ithin loyo i dier nonin ma Yuda,
wok kwoŋin lawok ran,
ŋata bino bedo jadhum i Isiraili,
ma cakirok pere obedo cango con.
Riameno Rwoth bino jwango ji pere tundo i hongo,
madhako ma ripo nywol obedi gi wode.
Kenyo nyaka Joisiraili ma jonitie wiloka jodwoki,
to joriwere gi ji pajo wegi.
Ka go obin, go bino dhumo ji pere gi meni ma wok bongi Rwoth,
kodi dwoŋ ma nyingi Rwoth Were pere.
Aka ji pere jobino bedo ma jogonyere,
rupiri ji ma piny gibe jobino yeyo dwoŋ pere.
Ka Joasiria jobin to jomonjo piny mawan,
to joturo cel mawan,
wabino oro jotel mawan ma jotek loyo lweny gi jo.
Jobino dhumo piny Asiria g'abor,
lowo pa Nimrod.
Jobino botho wan kwoŋ Joasiria
ka jomonji piny mawan,
to joturo kew mawan.
Kenyo ji pa Yakobo m'odoŋ jolabedo,
i dier ji kweth,
paka thoyo m'owok bongi Rwoth,
paka nyidho kwoŋ lum,
ma kikur ji.
Aka ji pa Yakobo m'odoŋ jolabedo i dier nonin,
i dier ji kweth,
paka simbwor i dier ogwaŋe madudi,
paka nyathi simbwor i dier sidwol rombo,
ma k'oluwo i dier jo redho jo piny,
aka yeco jo mathindho thindho, to ngoye ŋat'obothi jo.
Isiraili bino mako jokwor pere,
to reyo woko joje.
I ndelo no, Rwoth waco,
abino kwanyo kayinin mewin t'anyeko cawilin mewin.
Abino reyo woko tindin madongo mewin i lowo mewin,
t'aturo woko kapondo mewin.
Abino reyo woko yen mewin ma wikingere gine,
t'aweyo win m'ongoye jotiti gima latimere yuwaŋe.
Abino reyo woko cal mewin
kodi sirin mewin ma tele,
wik'olam kendo,
gigipiny ma wiwegi wicweyo.
Abino fudho woko cal pa Asera were madhako mewin,
t'areyo tindin madongo mewin.
Aka i nge gi keme paran, abino culo kwor,
kwoŋ nonin je ma jok'owinjan.
Winji gima Rwoth waco,
Ay, iter banja perin,
weyi gote gi tendere je jowowinji dwondin.
Winji win gote, kiosa pa Rwoth,
kodi win kindi piny ma cil gi cil,
Rwoth osa ji pere,
aka go segeya Isiraili.
“Awi ji paran, atimo riwin aŋo?
I nger aŋo m'abedo riwin bieto?
Dwokan win!
abotho win bedo ŋecin koro,
t'aoro Musa, Aron kodi Miriam telo win.
kodi gima Balam wod pa Bewor odwoko go,
kodi gim'otimere wok Sitim tundo i Gilgal,
ŋey winyal ŋeyo tim pa Rwoth ma botho win.”
Anobin g'aŋo bongi Rwoth,
ŋey akule piny ruwaŋ Were ma nimalo?
Anobin ruwaŋ go gi cowirok awaŋa,
ma nyithindhi dhok ma jo oro acel?
Rwoth osangala gi ganin rombo ma mon,
kosa gi mo nanzi ma kicwiy?
Anomiy okayo paran ri reco paran,
kosa ranyak ma ici paran ri reco mar'adundo paran?
Rwoth otieko nyuthin gimaber, in nyatoro,
aŋo ma Rwoth mitin itim,
ka k'obedo timo tiro, nyutho kisa,
kodi woth gi mwolo iy'acel gi Were perin?
Dwondi Rwoth koko ri tindi madwoŋ,
obedo girieko swa lworo nyingin.
Winji win, win ji ma wicokere i tindi madwoŋ.
Wiyan nyalo wil gi lim ma kidakana manitie i ot pa jokidakana,
kodi rapim ma k'otire, gim'adak.
Anocwaki jono ma jooro rapim ma kidakana,
kodi mugowa m'opoŋ'iye rapim ma twodo?
Joŋaŋo mewin jopoŋ gi maker,
joluwo twodo,
aka lew gin opoŋ luwirok kicar.
Riameno atieko cako reyo win,
ro reco mewin.
Wibino cemo, to wik'oyeŋ,
aka kec bino bedo i iy win,
ongoye gima wibino kano,
aka ma winonyali kano abino reyo g'abor.
Wibino cwoyo, to wikibino keco,
wibino biyo mo wok kwoŋ nanzi, to wikibino wir gine,
wibino timo vini, to wikibino madho.
kodi tic je ma ot pa Ahab wod Omiri,
aka wiluwo rieko pajo.
Ameno abino reyo win, aka kisi nyatoro bino cayo win,
ji kisi kamoro jobino tero win gi cay.
Kidamba ran! Kole onyo acalo,
ŋata kec neko ma kinwaŋ olemo m'odoŋ wi yen,
kosa nyingi vini i tiendi yath vini acama.
Nyingi vini je gi nyandere je mamit otiek fono woko.
Joma jolworo Were jorere woko wok i piny,
aka ongoye ŋat'otire kwoŋ ji;
joje jokuro nekirok,
aka kisi nyatoro dwaro omin gi bwo.
Cingi gin yot timo gimarac, aka jotimo gi kinen.
Jodhum gi jothum banja, jokwayo nyew,
aka jaŋaŋo waco mito marac mar'adundo pere,
to joriwo kanyacel.
Maber kwoŋ jo cale okure,
m'otire loyo kwoŋ jo cale kudhin.
Ndelo otundo ma Were bino miyo jo gir'acula,
paka ogwoko jo luwo kwoŋ jokur pajo,
onyo pama jonitie i nyawin.
Ikir'igen jager,
kosa mere.
Gwokere i gim'iwaco,
kada ri dhako perin.
nyathi manyako kiyere gi min,
ciwod dhako dhaw gi adhamere;
jakwor pa nyatoro bedo jopeco pere won.
To ri an, abino ŋiyo bongi Rwoth,
abino kuro Were ma bino bothan;
Were paran bino winjan.
Ikir'isiemere kwoŋan, a jakwor paran;
K'apodho, abino ay.
K'abedo i mudho,
Rwoth bino bedo lero ran.
Abino ciro nge pa Rwoth,
rupiri atimo reco kwoŋ go,
cuka go ocwaki ran,
to thumo ran banja.
Go bino wodhan i lero,
Abino neno gonyirok pere.
Kenyo jakwor paran bino neno,
aka wickwot bino umo ŋat'openjan ni,
“Nikune Rwoth Were perin?”
Waŋan bino neno jakwor paran,
onyo ibino nyono go piny,
pa cwodho ma ngudo.
Ndelo bino ma geto kor ot mewin kendo!
I ndelo no kew mewin ibino yawo bor.
I ndelo no ji mewin jobino dwoko bongi win,
wok Asiria yuwok ceŋ,
