wok Misir yupiny, wok iy'adec ma malawa Yufrete,
wok i nam tundo i nam, kodi wok i got tundo i got.
To piny bino lokere abar,
ro kidakana pa ji ma jobed'iye.
Kway ji perin gi luth perin Rwoth,
ji perin m'itieko yero
ma jobedo i thim,
nitie lowo maber thoko jo.
Weyi doko jowopidhere i Basan kodi Giliad,
paka oyido cango con.
Paka i hongo ma wiwok i piny Misir,
abino nyutho jo gir'aura.
Nonin jobino neno gime aka wiy gin bino kwot,
makada nende jonitie gi meni;
jobino umo dhok gin to ithi gin tho.
Jobino naŋo fukefuke pa thwol,
pa gigipiny ma jomol piny.
Jolabino ka jokirin wok i kapondo pajo,
jobino gik bongi Rwoth, Were mawan gi lworo,
aka jobino bedo gi lworo kwoŋbedo in.
Ongoye were man ma cale in Rwoth, icwako reco pa ji perin ma joboth,
ikimaki nge kicutho,
t'iwinjo maber i nyutho wan mar perin makiwire.
Go bino bedo riwan gi wor kendo,
go bino nyono reco mawan gi tiende.
Go bino bolo reco mawan je
i lutho ma nam.
Ibino nyutho Yakobo adieri,
kodi mar makiwire ri Abraham,
paka inyutho kwarere mawan
wok cango con.
Rwoth obedo Were ma janyeko, aka go culo kwor,
Rwoth culo kwor aka mako keme.
Rwoth culo kwor kwoŋ jokwor pere,
aka mako keme kwoŋ jokwor pere.
Rwoth kimaki nge piyo aka go dwoŋ i meni,
i nger moro je Rwoth k'owey ma k'omiyo gir'acula ri jobanja.
Yo pere nitie iy'asur kodi i koyo,
aka pondeponde obedo fukefuke ma tiende.
Go bwoko nam to loko m'othwo,
aka go thwo woko malawin je;
Basan kodi Kamel joner,
aka kilikalika pa Lebanon ner.
Gote joyengere ruwaŋe,
aka tendere jokirin;
piny oay malo ruwaŋe,
piny gibe kodi jono je ma jobed'iye.
Ŋa manyalo cungo ruwaŋ nge pere?
Ŋa manyalo ciro lietho ma nge pere?
Keme pere konjere woko paka mac,
aka telin mukere piny ruwaŋe.
Rwoth ber,
go obedo kapondo i ndelo ma teko;
go oŋeyo jono ma jorango kapondo i go.
Gi mikula m'opoŋ de oy,
Go lakelo gike makicutho ma kabedo mere,
aka lariemo jokwor pere i colo.
Aŋo m'icano kwoŋ Rwoth?
Go lakelo i gike kicutho,
ongoye teko ma bino ay madirio.
Paka kudhin, jowiyere,
paka jomero, jomer;
ilareyo woko jo paka kanja m'othwo kicutho.
Wok bongin,
owok ŋata cano raco kwoŋ Rwoth,
ŋata miyo rieko ma kidakana.
Me apaka Rwoth waco:
Makada nende jocowere aka kendo jokweth,
ilareyo jo woko to jorumo.
Makada nende atieko miyo win litho,
akilamiyo win litho kendo.
Aka pama alaturo woko okol pa Asiria ma nyweny kwoŋin,
t'aturo woko gima tweyin.
Rwoth otieko wodho or kwoŋ Asiria:
Nyingin k'onyay kendo;
wok i ot pa werin perin alareyo woko,
cal kodi nyweny m'ogor.
Alayiko kaliel perin, kwoŋbedo isisiri.
Neni, wi gote bino tiendi ŋata
kelo mikwenda ma siem!
Tim kalima perin, awi Yuda,
kethi i kare kwoŋirok perin,
kole jakidakana k'omonjin kendo;
ilareyo go woko kicutho.
gwoki cel;
kur royo;
ridhi pierin;
coki meni perin je.
Kole Rwoth ladwoko dwoŋ pa Yakobo,
paka dwoŋ pa Isiraili,
kole joreyi jotieko reyo woko jo,
aka jotieko nyeko woko jangi jo.
Kwot pa jolweny pajo obokere;
cwo ma jomeni joruko nangin m'obokere;
Nyweny ma wi cawila cot mac,
i ndelo ma go yiker'iye monjo,
kayinin ma lweny joicere.
Cawilin jolatimere pa joneko i royin madongo,
jorure acen gi malo i kabedo m'othangere;
jomenyin pa lero,
joŋweco acen g'amalo pa lithkoth.
Go lwoŋo jodhum pere;
jotangatanga i woth pajo,
jokwakere i kor ot mere,
aka joyiko gi thoko mako.
Waŋkace ma thengi malawin otiek yawo,
peco pa kere leny woko.
Otiek ridho ni wothangi nyamicala,
ŋecin mere ma mon okwany jo woko,
joywak pa dwondi akurin
aka cuny jo gore.
Ninivi cale pi m'ocokere abuka,
wok i ndelo mere ji joringo.
Cungi! Cungi!
Joywak, to ngoye ŋata wire cen.
Nyaga feza,
nyaga zahabu!
Ongoye gike ma lim!
Dito ma kisi gimoro je ma welo.
Odoŋ nono, odoŋ nono, aka orere woko!
Cuny podho gi lworo
aka congi kirin, meni ongoye,
ji jokirin,
nyim jo ojowo bondo.
Nikune kabedo pa simbwore,
kodi lum pa nyithindhi simbwore,
kama simbwor kadh'iye,
simbwor madhako kodi nyithindhe, m'ongoye ŋata cando jo?
Simbwor otieko yeco ma romo ri nyithindhe,
aka odeyo gim'omako ri simbwor pere madhako;
aka otieko poŋo ode gi gim'omako,
kodi kabedo pere gi riŋo m'oyeco.
Kole adakin, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco,
aka alawaŋo woko cawilin perin i yiro,
abor laneko nyithindhi simbwore perin;
alareyo woko giperin m'imako wok i piny,
aka dwondi jomikwenda perin k'owinji kendo.
Kidamba rin, awi tindi madwoŋ ma oyo remo,
opoŋ twodo, kodi kinyaga,
gike ongoye ri gim'onyaga!
Derino ma luth kayina kodi derino ma tiendi cawila,
kayina ma goyo mayindo kodi cawila ma por!
Jacwo ma gweyo kayina,
tiŋo malo lew abor kodi toŋ ma pilin,
kidhur ji m'oneki,
peko ma delkwoŋ jom'otho,
delkwoŋ jom'otho m'ongoye gike,
ji jonyono delkwoŋ jom'otho.
Wok kwoŋ tim ma kidakana pa malaya mar'amen,
dhako maŋon anena, nyan ma jamiliel,
ma gi tim pere ma malaya pere tana nono pere,
aka gi miliel pere tana ji pere.
Neni, adakin,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco,
alalunyin kinyoro;
alathango ri nonin kinyoro perin,
kodi wickwot perin ri kerin.
Alabolo kwoŋin gikoco,
t'aterin gi cay,
alalokin paka galiwindi.
Nyaka jono je ma jonenin joladwire kwoŋin to jowaco ama:
Amien Ninivi, ŋa m'omak gine wor?
Anorangi rin jodiy cunyin wok kune?
Iber loyo Thebes,
manitie i kigoda ma Nayil,
gi pi m'othoko go,
cel pere obedo nam,
aka kore mere oyido obedo pi?
Ethopiya kodi Misir oyido jobedo meni,
aka Put oyido ongoye gi gike;
Libia oyido obedo jokony perin.
Kucel go bende okidho i piny man,
okidho i katwec;
kiri nyithindho pere mafodi jodhoth ocadhi jo mathindho thindho,
i wi royin je madongo.
Obol kwir ri mere m'iworo,
jodongo mere je otwey jo gi pingo.
In bende ilamero,
ilapondo,
ilarango kapondo,
kwoŋ jakwor perin.
Cel perin je jocale yen makuyu,
manitie gi nyandere marapena m'ocek,
k'oyengi, jooy
i dhok jacami.
Eno ji perin,
jobedo mon i dier win.
Waŋkace ma piny perin,
oŋamere ri jokwor perin,
mac otieko waŋo nywenye ma waŋkace perin.
Twom pi ma twec ri in won,
ridhi cel perin;
donji i lowo inyon,
maki gigoyo matafal,
igoy matafal!
Kenyo mac lareyin,
abor lathumin woko;
lareyin paka bonyo reyo woko.
Nyay win paka bonyo,
nyay win paka otwoŋo!
Imedo welo pa jopendo perin,
maloyo micalin ma i polo,
paka bonyo ma nyeko to ay woko.
Jokur perin jocale bonyo,
jodhum perin jocale tome bonyo,
ma jopie i kor udi
i ndelo ma piny ŋic
ka waŋceŋ otiek wok, to joay woko;
ongoye ŋata ŋeyo kama jokadh'iye.
Jokwath rombo perin jonur,
awi kere ma Asiria;
jodhum perin jonindo.
Ji perin jokedhere wi gote
aka ongoye ŋat'ocok jo.
Ongoye cango ri tur perin,
adhola perin obedo makicangi.
Jono je ma jowinjo wac akowa ma mako kwoŋin,
jogoyo adhoŋ ma kisangala.
Kole ŋa ma fodi gimarac perin ma noknok k'otundo kwoŋe?
Me menyirok ma Habakuk jatuci wac Were oneno.
Awi Rwoth, Anoywak kiri keraŋo ri kony,
t'ibedo m'ikiwinjo?
Aywak rin ni, “Akaka!”
T'ikibothi!
Raŋo imiyan aneno kidakana kodi teko?
Rerok kodi akaka nitie ruwaŋan;
kisi dhano ciro gorok kodi dhawirok.
Riameno cik lokere gim'ongoye kony,
aka tiro kibedi.
Jokidakana jothoko joma timo gim'otire,
riameno iwiro tiro.
wilauro to widhier,
kole gim'acegin timo i hongo mewin,
wikilayeyo kabedi nende oyido wac rin.
nono mager aka jodwir,
jo ma joŋanjo kisi kamoro i piny,
mako kabedo ma k'obedo apajo.
Jobedo joma kelo litho gi lworo;
tiro kodi dwoŋ pajo wok bongi jo wegi.
Kayinin pajo jodwire loyo kwace,
joyil loyo arare m'othieno;
cwo ma jogwey kayinin pajo jogolo piny,
aka jobino wok bor swa;
joay paka ango ma kwakere cuto gimoro.
Joje jobino ri gwayo,
gi waŋ jo ma ŋiyo yuwiy jo;
jocoko jotwec paka kwoyo.
Jocayo kerin,
aka jodhum jolokere ginyero pajo.
Jonyero kamoro je m'ogoy'iye cel,
jodhuro nono to jomako.
Kenyo joyweyo paka koyo;
joturo cik to jolokere jobanja;
meni pajo won obedo were pajo!
Ikibedo wok cene,
awi Rwoth Were paran, Ŋataleŋ paran?
Wakilatho.
Awi Rwoth, itieko ketho kwoŋ jo ranyuth ri thumo banja;
aka in, awi Tele, itieko ketho jo ri gir'acula.
Waŋin cil swa ma neno gimarac,
aka ikinyal neno teko,
raŋo to, iŋiyo jor'akor,
aka iliŋ ka jokidakana joreyo woko
joma timo gim'otire loyo jo?
Itimo dhano paka rec ma nam,
paka gigipiny ma jomol ma jongoye gi jadhum.
Joje go ywayo malo gi siraget;
go toga jo gi katimba,
go coko jo i bwo pere;
riameno go fore to sangala.
Riameno go miyo cowirok ri katimba pere,
to waŋo buban ri katimba pere;
rupiri gi gigipiny me jolimo cemo,
kodi camo cwe.
Riameno go omedi celo abor pere,
gi reyo woko nonin m'ongoye wor?
Alaidho wi kakur paran,
t'acungo wi cel paran;
alabedo waŋan neno gima Rwoth lawaco ran,
kodi aŋo ma go odwoki ri kigeŋisa paran.
Rwoth odwokan to waco ni:
Ndiki piny menyirok;
ithangi i telin,
ŋey ŋat'osoma woŋweci.
to lakwakere i cowe, aka k'obedi twodo.
K'ocal pa galo, kur;
adieri labino, aka k'ogal.
kitim gim'otire,
to joma timo gim'otire,
jolakwo gi yeyo pajo.
Vini miyo dhano timo akor,
bedo jagero ma kinyal bedo peco.
Go ŋamo dwonde malac paka piny pa jom'otho;
paka tho, ongoye gima yeŋ go,
go otieko coko nonin je rigo won,
aka otieko coko ji je rigo won.
Nonin me je jok'oluwere kwoŋe kicar,
gi wer ma yet kodi sikoiyiko, ka jowaco rigo ni,
“Kidamba rin in m'idhuro gima k'obedo giperin!”
Kiri keraŋo ma inoyim kwoŋin bieto ma banjin?
Jobanjin perin wegi jok'oay abwap,
jono ma joculin magowa,
jok'ocew to jomiyin kirin?
Nyaka t'ilokere gim'onyaga rijo.
Rupiri itieko kinyaga nonin kweth,
jono je ma jodoŋ jolakinyaga in,
ro remo pa ji m'ooy, kodi akaka m'itimo ri piny,
ri tindi madwoŋ kodi jono je ma jobed'iye.
Kidamba ri ŋato ma nwaŋo ŋaŋo iy'akaka ri ot pere,
ma geto peco pere kam'okwe,
ma botho kwo pere i teko!
Itieko thumo rieko ma wickwot ri ot perin,
gi reyo woko ji kweth;
aka in won itieko timo reco.
Kole tele laywak wok i kor ot,
aka akor ot ladwoko go wok i mbawo ma tic.
Kidamba rin m'igeto tindi madwoŋ gi remo,
aka itieko nwaŋo tindi i nger m'okom!
Kiwoki bongi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny,
nike nonin jotiyo nyaka ma pidhere gi mac,
aka nonin jolacere ri gim'ongoye?
kodi ŋeyo dwoŋ pa Rwoth,
paka pi umo nam.
Kidamba ri ŋata miyo joger pere medho,
ikonjo woko nge perin,
imiyo jo mero,
ŋey inyal gawo kinyoro pajo!
Iyeŋ gi cay loyo dwoŋ,
medhi, in bende, aka ibedi paka ŋata k'othumere.
Kikopo ma cingi Rwoth maracuc,
labino thokin,
aka wickwot laumo dwoŋ perin!
Kole akaka m'otimi ri Lebanon lamiyin dhier;
rerok p'ogwaŋe ladwoko jo,
ro remo pa ji m'ooy kodi akaka ri piny,
kodi ri tindi madwoŋ kodi jono je ma jobed'iye.
Cal nitie gi kony aŋo,
ka jatim otieko payo,
cal m'oleny ma fonjo twodo?
Kole ŋat'otimo ketho geno pere i gim'otimo,
kada ginago obedo cal ma kinyal luwo!
Kidamba ri ŋata waco ri mbawo ni, “Cew!”
Gi ri tele m'obadha ni, “Tiŋere malo!”
Go lafonjo!
Neni, oum gi zahabu gi feza m'oum,
aka ongoye luya mogo je i iye kada mathi.
To Rwoth nitie i ot pere maleŋ;
weyi piny gipi woliŋi ruwaŋ go!
Me kwayo pa Habakuk jatuci wac Were paka Sigionoth ondiko.
Awi Rwoth, atieko winjo radwok perin,
aka lworo omakan, awi Rwoth, kwoŋ tic perin,
dwoki i dier oro,
weyi imiy woŋeyere i dier oro,
i keme mondo poyi timo ŋono.
Were obino wok i Teman,
Ŋataleŋ wok i Got Paran.
Dwoŋ pere umo polo,
aka piny opoŋ pak pere.
Menyin pere ocale lero;
menyin ma lero ma wok i cinge,
kenyo a kama meni pere opond'iye.
Two nundu otelo ruwaŋe,
aka thoyamo oluwo cegin gi tiende.
Go cungo to yengo piny;
go oŋiyo to miyo nonin kirin.
Gote ma cil gi cil jokedhere,
tendere ma cil gi cil joriewere piny,
yo bedo ma cil gi cil.
Aneno wemin ma Ethopiya i kumo;
nangin ma umo wema ma piny ma Midian jokirin.
Keme perin oyido liel kwoŋ malawin, awi Rwoth,
kosa nge perin kwoŋ malawin,
kosa keme perin kwoŋ nam,
munyo igweyo kayinin perin,
i wi cawilin perin maloyo?
Iyikere oro gibayo asere perin,
iyikere celo aserin perin.
Ibaro piny gi malawin perin.
Gote jonenin, to jodwanyere;
mikula pi omol;
lutho owodho dwonde,
aka ŋawirok otiŋo malo cinge.
Waŋceŋ kodi dwe jocungo liŋ i kabedo pajo ma malo,
i lero mar'asere perin jokadho,
i lero ma lithkoth mar'abor perin.
I keme iŋanjo i piny,
i nge inyono nonin.
Iwok botho ji perin,
botho jom'owir perin.
Iŋidho jatel ma ot pa jokidakana,
ireyo woko joma luwo go kicutho.
Icwowo wic jolweny pere g'abore perin,
jobino paka asur kedhan,
forok pajo cale cuto joma candere i kabedo m'opondo.
Iŋanjo i nam gi kayinin perin,
i ulok pa pi madwoŋ.
Awinjo to iyan kirin,
dhokan okirin ro derino.
Topo donjo i cokin paran,
aka kam'akalo okirin i ŋangan.
Akuro nyaliŋliŋ cuka ndelo ma teko,
bino kwoŋ ji ma jomonjo wan.
Makada nende makuyu kithiw,
aka ongoye olemo wi yath vini;
makada nende olemo ma yath oliv kibedi,
aka ndelin kinyak cemo,
makada nende mwendi orey woko wok i sidwol,
aka dhok ongoye i cel.
Kucel alafore i Rwoth;
alakisangala i Were, jaboth paran.
go timo tiendan paka tiendi apol,
aka miyan awotho i kabedo paran m'oŋawere.
Alakisika woko kicutho kisi gimoro,
wok i piny, Rwoth waco.
Alakisika woko ji kodi ogwaŋe,
alakisika woko winyin ma polo,
kodi rec ma nam.
Gima miyo jokidakana cer,
aka alakisika woko ji,
wok i piny, Rwoth waco.
Alarieyo cingan kwoŋ Yuda,
kodi kwoŋ jono ma jobedo i Yerusalem,
aka alareyo woko wok i kabedo me kisi Bal m'odoŋ je,
jocway ri were i wi migam makicar,
kodi jocway ri Were i wigam ma jowire lamo cal.
Rwoth lareyo jono je ma jolamo Lwak ma i polo wi ot,
jono ma jokule piny to jokwoŋere i nyingi Rwoth,
kodi jono ma jokwoŋere i nyingi were pajo Molek.
Rwoth lareyo woko jono je ma jowiro ŋey gin rigo,
jono je ma jokirangi go kosa kwayo go wotel jo.
Bedi liŋ ruwaŋ Rwoth Were!
Kole ndelo pa Rwoth orikere,
Rwoth otieko yiko cowirok,
go otieko loko wendo pere maleŋ.
Aka i ndelo ma cowirok pa Rwoth,
alamiyo jodhum kodi wot kere gir'acula,
kodi jono je ma joruko nangin pa jopath.
I ndelo no bende alamiyo gir'acula,
ri jono ma jopor wi kituti,
aka jopoŋo ot pa jadwoŋ pajo,
g'akaka kodi banirok.
Kole bino bedo i ndelo no, Rwoth waco,
ywak ma litho lawinjere, wok i Waŋkac ma Rec i Yerusalem.
Ndur lawinjere iy'adec manyen ma tindi madwoŋ,
kodi derino ma ŋinyirok madwoŋ wok wi tendere.
Goy win ndur, awi ji ma jobedo iy'adec ma yupiny ma tindi madwoŋ,
kole ilareyo woko ji ma Kanan je,
kwoŋbedo ilareyo woko jomitan.
Aka labedo i hongo no m'abino rango Yerusalem gi tala,
alamiyo gir'acula ri ji ma wegi jogenere,
jono ma joparo i cuny gin ni,
Rwoth kilatimo bero kosa raco.
Ilakinyaga woko lim pajo,
aka udi pajo ladoŋ gunda.
Jolageto udi, to jok'onind'iye,
jolapidho ndelo vini,
to jok'omadhi vini mere.
Ndelo madwoŋ pa Rwoth orikere,
cegin aka bino mayot,
derino ma ndelo pa Rwoth kec,
kiri jolweny ma jomiseni loyo joywak m'ongoye geno.
Ndelo no labedo ndelo ma keme,
ndelo ma litho kodi nge,
ndelo ma kisika kodi rerok,
ndelo ma mudho kodi kumo,
ndelo ma colo kodi mudho mapek.
Ndelo ma gwara kodi ywak ma lweny,
kwoŋ tindin madongo m'otinda,
kodi kwoŋ acurcur m'oŋawere.
Alakelo litho ri ji,
aka jolawotho paka ji ma waŋ gin tho,
kwoŋbedo jotimo reco kwoŋ Rwoth,
remo pajo laoy paka fukefuke,
aka nyagir iy gin paka woyo.
Feza pajo kosa zahabu pajo,
kilabotho jo,
i ndelo ma keme pa Rwoth,
i mac ma nyeko pere,
piny gipi larere woko,
gi mac ma nge pere. Go laketho gike abwap
ri ji je ma jobedo i piny.
Cokere win kanyacel, cokere win.
Awi nono ma jongoye giwickwot,
mafodi gim'owacere k'otundo,
paka cuŋ ma thon,
mafodi nge m'ogaga pa Rwoth k'obino kwoŋ win,
mafodi ndelo ma keme pa Rwoth k'obino kwoŋ win.
Rangi win Rwoth, win jomamwol je ma i piny,
jono je ma joworo or pere.
Tim win gim'otire, mwole win ruwaŋ Rwoth;
poy kono winobothi i ndelo ma keme pa Rwoth.
Asikelon ladoŋ gunda,
ji jolariemo woko Asdod odieceŋ par,
aka ilafudho woko Ekiron.
Kidamba ri ji ma jobedo i thengi nam,
piny pa Jokereth!
Wac pa Rwoth luwo kwoŋ win,
Awi Kanan, lowo pa Jofilistia;
aka alareyo woko win cuka ongoye ŋat'odoŋ bedo i win.
Thengi nam labedo kakwath,
kanindo ri jokwath,
kodi sidwol mwendi.
Thengi nam labedo lim,
ri jono ma jodoŋ i ot pa Yuda,
labedo kakwath pajo,
i udi ma Asikelon,
jolanind'iye othieno.
Kole Rwoth Were pajo lawendo rijo,
to dwoko rijo silwany.
kodi aŋala pa Amon,
nger ma jotieko yeto ji paran,
to jodele kwoŋ adec pajo.
Were pa Isiraili,
Mowab lacale paka Sodom,
aka Amon paka Gomora,
lowo m'omore gi kayongo kodi buce cumbi,
ladoŋ gunda kicutho.
Ji paran ma jodoŋ jolakinyaga jo,
to jolunjo jo.
Me labedo cul pajo ro noro pajo,
kwoŋbedo joyeto to jotimo gigipiny madongo,
kwoŋ ji pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Rwoth lakelo lworo kwoŋ jo.
Go lasewo werin je ma piny
kisi nono lalamo go,
kisi acel i piny pere won.
ilaneko win g'abor paran.
to reyo woko Asiria,
aka go laloko Ninivi gunda,
adec m'othwo paka thim.
Mwendi jolanindo i dier go,
ogwaŋe je ma piny,
tula ma thim kodi kinapupu je jolanindo kenyo,
jolakihola i dirisa,
agak lanindo i dhiot,
kole ilanyeko woko mbawo mere ma yath sida.
Me tindi madwoŋ m'oyodere,
m'obedo i siem,
to waco i cunye ni,
obedo an, kole an kende,
kucel otieko lokere gunda,
kaywomirok p'ogwaŋe.
Kisi ŋata luwo kabonge,
lalwiyo to teŋo cinge.
Kidamba ri Yerusalem,
go makoc aka jagwenyirok,
tindi madwoŋ m'opoŋ'iye adica.
Go k'owinjo dwondi Rwoth,
go k'oyeyo wotir go,
go k'oketho geno pere i Rwoth,
go k'ocore cegin gi Were pere.
Jodhum ma jonitie i go,
jobedo simbwore ma johola,
jothum banja pere jobedo arara,
ma kan odikin tundo ngoye gima joweyo.
Jotuci wac Were pere jogayagaya,
cwo ma jotimo akor,
jocway ri Were i wi migam pere jokoco Kabedo Maleŋ,
jotieko komo cik.
Rwoth timo gim'otire,
go kitim gima butiro.
Kisi odikin go thumo banja pere,
i lero m'ongoye keŋ,
to ŋata butiro kuya wickwot.
Atieko reyo woko nonin,
kor udi kodi acurcur pajo odoŋ gunda,
atieko kisika woko thoyo pajo,
m'ongoye ŋata luw'iye,
tindin madongo pajo aloko gunda,
m'ongoye ji, m'ongoye gima bed'iye.
Awaco ni, “Adieri tindi madwoŋ me lalworan,
go layeyo atir go;
wiy go k'owil,
gi gir'acula m'akelo kwoŋe.”
Kucel jo oyido jomito swa,
loko tim pajo je marac.
Riameno kuran win, Rwoth waco,
ri ndelo m'abino ay paka jakony.
Kole ayere coko nonin,
ma coko kerin,
konjo kwoŋ jo keme paran,
lietho ma nge paran je,
kole i mac ma nyeko paran,
piny gibe larere.
Kenyo alalonyo luwo pa nonin,
ŋey jowolwoŋ nyingi Rwoth,
aka jowotiy rigo iy'acel.
Wok i malawin ma yombo Ethopiya, ji paran ma jokedhere,
jono ma jolaman, nyar ji paran ma jokedhere,
jolakelo ran mic.
I ndelo no, wik'obedi giwickwot,
ro tim je m'omiyo win gwenyirok kwoŋan,
kole alakwanyo woko i dier win,
jonoro je,
aka wik'odele kendo,
wi got paran maleŋ.
Kole alaweyo i dier win,
ji ma jomwol aka jobwonere.
Jolarango kapondo i nyingi Rwoth;
jokilatimo komo,
jokilaluwo misegey,
kosa jok'oluw twodo gi lew jo kodi dhok jo.
Kenyo jolapidhere to ywomere,
m'ongoye ŋata lacando jo.
Koki ri kisangala, Awi nyar Zayon,
koki malo, Awi Isiraili!
Fore aka siemere gi cunyin je,
Awi, Yerusalem.
Rwoth otieko kwanyo woko thumo banja kwoŋ win,
go otieko kwanyo woko jokwor mewin.
Kere pa Isiraili, Rwoth, nitie i dier win,
wik'olwor teko kendo.
I ndelo no ilaluwo kwoŋ Yerusalem,
Ikir'ilwor, Awi Zayon,
ikir'iwey cingin wolwogere.
Rwoth Were perin nitie i dier win,
jalweny ma miyo loyo,
go lafore kwoŋin gi kisangala,
go ladwoŋin gi mar pere;
go lasiemere kwoŋin gi wer ma malo.
Paka ji ma josangala i kalima,
Rwoth waco,
atieko kelo i gike atise ma kidamba;
t'akwanyo woko wickwot perin.
Kole i hongo no alamiyo gir'acula,
ri jono ma jodiyin,
alabotho jom'oŋol,
t'acoko jono ma jongoye gi peco,
alaloko wickwot pajo bedo pak,
aka jolaŋeyere i piny gibe.
I hongo no alakelo win peco,
i hongo m'abino cok'iye win;
kole alamiyo win nyingi win kodi pak,
i dier nonin je ma piny,
k'anodwoki riwin lim mewin macon,
kareno wineno gi waŋ win, Rwoth waco.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Ji me jowaco ni hongo ma geto kendo Ot pa Rwoth fodi k'otundo.
Wac pa Rwoth obino luwo kwoŋ Hagay jatuci wac Were ka waco ama:
Me obedo hongo riwin ma bedo i udi mewin m'ocule, kareno ot me ŋare i gunda?
Onyo riameno Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Kethi win cuny win kwoŋ yo mewin.
Wicwoyo mathoth, to wikeco manok, wicemo, to wikiyeŋ, wimedho, to wikimer, wirukere, to wikiwinji lietho, ŋata limo cul pere donjo i mugowa m'otuci.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco. Kethi win cuny win kwoŋ yo mewin.
Idhi win malo wi got aka wikel mbawo, wigeti ot, aka ŋey anyal kisangala, t'alimo dwoŋ, apaka Rwoth waco.
Wirango kweth, to neni, olokere mathin, aka munyo wikelo peco, akwadho woko. Raŋo? Rwoth pa lwak jolweny penjo. Kwoŋbedo Ot paran oŋare i gunda, kucel win kisi dhano riwin i ot pere.
Riameno polo malo otweyo koth, aka piny otweyo ranyak mere.
Atieko lwoŋo piny wothwo, kwoŋ gote, kwoŋ ŋano, kwoŋ vini manyen, kwoŋ mo, kwoŋ gima lowo nyak, kwoŋ ji, kwoŋ ogwaŋe, kodi kwoŋ tic ma cingi jo je.

Zerubabel wod Salitiel, Yesuwa wod Yehozadak, gi ji je m'oyido joboth, jowinjo dwondi Rwoth Were pajo, kodi wac pa Hagay jatuci wac Were, paka Rwoth Were pajo ooro go; aka ji jobedo gi lworo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Kenyo Hagay jamikwenda pa Rwoth oluwo mikwenda pa Rwoth ri ji, ka waco ama: Anitie gi win, Rwoth waco.

Aka Rwoth oguro cuny Zerubabel wod Salitiel gavana ma Yuda, kodi cuny Yesuwa wod Yehozadak, jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, kodi cuny ji m'oyido joboth, aka jobino timo tic i Ot pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, Were pajo,
ka piero ario g'aŋwen ma dwe mar'aucel i oro mar'ario ma dhum pa Kere Dario.
Ka piero ario g'acel ma dwe mar'abirio, wac pa Rwoth obino luwo kwoŋ Hagay, jatuci wac Were ka waco ama:
Mondo waci ri Zerubabel wod Salitiel gavana ma Yuda, Yesuwa wod Yehozadak jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, kodi ji ma joboth, aka ipenji jo ni:
Ŋa kwoŋ win ma fodi odoŋ ma cango oneno ot me i dwoŋ mere macon? Kical riwin i waŋ win paka gim'ongoye?

Kucel pama, bedi m'icwiny Zerubabel, me wac pa Rwoth, bedi m'icwiny Yesuwa wod Yehozadak, jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, bedi win ma wicwiny, ji je ma lowo, me wac pa Rwoth, tiyi win, kole anitie gi win. Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Cungo kwoŋ cikirok m'atimo gi win munyo wiwok i Misir, cunyan nitie i dier win, wikiri wibwok.
aka alayengo nonin je, ŋey lim pa nonin je labino, aka alapoŋo ot me gi dwoŋ, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Feza obedo aparan, zahabu obedo aparan, me wac pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Dwoŋ ma ot me labedo madwoŋ loyo ot macon, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco; aka siem labedo i kabedo me, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Ka piero ario g'aŋwen ma dwe mar'abuŋwen, i oro mar'ario ma dhum pa Dario, wac pa Rwoth obino luwo kwoŋ Hagay jatuci wac Were.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Mondo penji jocway ri Were i wi migam, k'iwaco ni,
Ka mogo otiŋo riŋo maleŋ to tiŋo i rinda ma law pere to rinda geyo mugat kosa cemo, kosa vini, kosa mo, kosa cemo mogo je, nyalo lokere maleŋ? Jocway ri Were i wi migam jodwoko aka jowaco ni be.
Hagay odwoko ka waco ama: Ameno apaka nitie gi ji me, kodi nono me manitie ruwaŋan, ama apaka Rwoth waco; apaka tic je ma cingi jo nitie, aka gima jomiyo kenyo koc.
To riameno, mondo, kethi win cuny win wok i ndelo me kadho yuwaŋe, wok i ndelo mafodi k'ojiengi tele wi tele i Ot pa Rwoth,
wok munyo nyatoro obino i kidhur ma piero ario, to nwaŋo nyaka apar; munyo nyatoro obino i bur vini twomo atewe piero abic ma vini, to nwaŋo nyaka piero ario.
Agoyo win kodi tic ma cingi win gi two ma nyeko cemo kodi pe; kucel wikidwoko bongan, Rwoth ama luwo.
Mondo kethi win adundo mewin i ndelo me kadho yuwaŋe, wok ka piero ario g'aŋwen ma dwe mar'abuŋwen, wok i ndelo m'ocak'iye misingi ma Ot pa Rwoth; kethi win iy'adundo mewin.
Nitie kodhi m'odoŋ i dero, vini, kosa yen makuyu, kosa pomo ma bende jonyak gimoro? Wok i ndelo me kadho yuwaŋe alamiyo win silwany.
Wac pa Rwoth obino kendo madirio ri Hagay ka piero ario g'aŋwen ma dwe.
Luw gi Zerubabel, gavana ma Yuda, iwaci ni: Acegin yengo polo kodi piny,
aka alamako kombere ma dhum ma kerin, alareyo woko meni pa kerin pa nonin, alamako cawilin kodi jogwey mere, aka kayinin kodi jogwey jolatho, kisi dhano g'abor pa nyawote.
I ndelo no, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, alaterin, Awi Zerubabel ŋeca paran, wod Salitiel, aka alalokin paka peta ma dhum; kole atieko yerin, apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Rwoth oyido omako nge swa gi kwarere mewin.
Riameno waci rijo ama: Me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco: Dwoki win bongan, aka aladwoko bongi win, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.

Wikiri wibedi paka kwarere mewin ma jotuci wac Were ma cango joywak rijo ka jowaco ama: Me apaka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, mondo wire win wok i yo mewin marac, kodi tim mewin marac, to jok'owinjo, aka jok'odewo, Rwoth waco.
Kwarere mewin jonitie yukune, aka jotuci wac Were, fodi jokwo cil gi cil?

To wac paran kodi cik paran, m'amiyo or kwoŋe ri ŋecin paran jotuci wac Were, jok'onyalo kwarere mewin? Ameno wegi joŋuto to jowaco ama: Paka Rwoth pa lwak jolweny oyido ocano timo riwan, luwo kwoŋ yo mawan kodi tim mawan, ameno apaka go otiyo gi wan.
Ka piero ario g'aŋwen ma dwe mar'apar g'acel, dwe ma Sebat, i oro mar'ario ma dhum pa Dario, wac pa Rwoth obino ri jatuci wac Were Zekaria, wod Berekia, nyakwar Ido. Zekaria owaco ama:
Aneno wor, to neni, jacwo oyido gweyo kayina m'obokere, aka go oyido ocungo i dier mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni rosi m'oyido nitie i pende, aka yuŋey go oyido nitie kayinin m'obokere makicin, kodi matar.
Aka apenjo ni, “Awi rwoth paran, me ginaŋo?” Malaika m'oyido luwo kodan owaco ran ni, “Alanyuthin gima gime obedo.”
Jacwo m'ocungo i dier mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni rosi odwoko aka owaco ni, “Me joma Rwoth ooro woth thoko piny.”
Aka jodwoko malaika pa Rwoth m'oyido ocungo i dier mawuwa m'ilwoŋo ni rosi ni, “Watieko woth thoko piny, aka neni, piny gibe oliŋ m'ongoye mifuto.”
Malaika pa Rwoth odwoko to waco ni, “Awi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, kiri keraŋo m'ikila mako wor gi Yerusalem kodi tindin madongo ma Yuda m'itieko mako gi jo nge oro piero ario me je.”
Rwoth odwoko malaika m'oyido luwo kodan gi wac maber, ma yomo cuny jo.
Ameno malaika m'oyido luwo kodan owaco ran ni, “Ywak kodan, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, amako nyeko ri Yerusalem kodi ri Zayon gi nyeko m'oasere swa.
Amako nge swa gi nonin ma jowinjo m'ogonyere; kole munyo oyido amako nge manok jomedo konyo timo raco.”
Riameno Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, atieko dwoko i Yerusalem gi wor m'oasere, ot paran ilaget'iye, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, aka ilacero bol ma kipima i Yerusalem.
Ywak kendo, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco; tindin paran lapoŋ gi gigipiny maber kendo, aka Rwoth lamako wor gi Zayon kendo, to yero Yerusalem kendo.
Atiŋo waŋan malo t'aŋiyo, aka neni, tunge aŋwen!
Apenjo malaika m'oyido luwo kodan ni, “Me ginaŋo?” Go odwokan ni, “Me tunge m'otieko kedho woko Yuda, Isiraili, kodi Yerusalem.”
Rwoth onyuthan jopac aŋwen.

Apenjo ni, “Me jobino timo aŋo?” Go odwoko ni, “Me tunge m'okedho woko Yuda, ŋey wongoye ŋata nyalo tiŋo wiye malo; to jome jobino bwoko jo, bolo woko tunge pa nonin ma jotiŋo malo tungi jo kwoŋ lowo ma Yuda ma kedho woko.”
Atiŋo waŋan malo t'aŋiyo, aka neni, jacwo m'otiŋo thol ma kipima i cinge.
Kenyo apenjo go ni, “Ikadho kune?” Go odwokan ni, “Akadho kipima Yerusalem ŋeyo dwoŋo mere kodi boro mere.”
Aka neni, malaika m'oyido luwo kodan obino malo, aka malaika man owok romo gi go,
aka owaco rigo ni, “Ŋweci, iluw gi jayac no, aka iwaci ni, ‘Yerusalem ladoŋ paka adec m'othangere, ro ji kodi ogwaŋe ma jonitie i iye.’
Kole An, Rwoth awaco ni alabedo rigo cel ma kor ot thoko, aka alabedo dwoŋ i go.”
Awi, awi, ringi woko i lowo ma yumalo, Rwoth waco, kole paka koyin aŋwen ma polo, atieko kedhin woko, Rwoth waco.
Awi, awi, Zayon kwale, in m'ibedo gi nyar Babilon.
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama; ri dwoŋ ma go ooran bongi nonin ma jonyaga win, kole ŋat'ogeyin, meno ogeyo tongi waŋan.
Kole ee acegin yengo cingan kwoŋ jo, aka ŋecin pajo jolakinyaga jo, aka wilaŋeyo nike Rwoth pa lwak jolweny ooran.
Koki ri kisangala aka fore, Awi nyar Zayon, kole neni, ee acegin bino aka alabedo i dier in, Rwoth waco.
Nonin kweth jolariwere gi Rwoth i ndelo no, aka jolabedo ji paran, aka alabedo i dier in, aka ilaŋeyo nike Rwoth pa lwak jolweny ooran bongin.
Rwoth lalunjo Yuda paka adec pere i lowo maleŋ, aka go layero Yerusalem kendo.
Kudere, win ji je, ruwaŋ Rwoth, kole go oay wok i kabedo pere maleŋ.
Rwoth owaco ri Sitan ni, “Abwokin, Awi Sitan! Rwoth m'oyero Yerusalem bwokin! Jacwo me k'obedo kasik mac m'ofudhi wok i mac?”
Yesuwa oyido oruko nangin m'ocido, aka ocungo ruwaŋ malaika.
Malaika owaco ri jom'oyido jocungo ruwaŋ go ni, “Luny woko nangin m'ocido kwoŋ go.” Aka go owaco ri Yesuwa ni, “Neni, atieko miyo cilo perin oware kwoŋin, aka alarukin gi law ma welo.”
Kenyo awaco ni, “Weyi wokethi junga m'olony i wiye.” Ameno okethi junga m'olony i wiye t'iruko go gi nangin, aka malaika pa Rwoth oyido ocungo cegin.
Malaika pa Rwoth opiro Yesuwa ka waco ni,
“Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: K'inowothi i yo paran, aka inokur fonji paran, kenyo iladhumo ot paran, aka alamiyin kapido paran bende, aka alamiyin thwolo ma donjo i dier jome ma jocungo ka.
Mondo winji, Awi Yesuwa, in kodi wadin ma jobedo ruwaŋin, jobedo cwo ma gir'aura; kole neni, acegin kelo ri ŋeca paran jange.
Kole neni, tele m'atieko jengo ruwaŋ Yesuwa, wi tele acel labedo waŋ jo abirio, aka neni, acegin goro ndiko mere i iye, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, aka alacwako reco ma lowo no nyaka i ndelo.
I ndelo no, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, kisi dhano lalwoŋo jager pere i tiendi yath vini kodi i tiendi makuyu.”
Malaika m'oyido luwo kodan odwoko, aka ocewan, paka dhano m'icewo wok i nindo.
Go openjan ni, “Aŋo m'ineno?” Adwoko ni, “Aneno raŋaw tala ma zahabu, g'acero i wiye, talin abirio i wiye, kodi uzi abirio wi kisi tala.
Aka nitie yen oliv ario cegin, acel yuracuc mar'acero, aka man yuracam mere.”
Apenjo malaika m'oyido luwo kodan ni, “Me ginaŋo, rwoth?”
Malaika m'oyido luwo kodan odwokan ni, “Ikuya gima gime nyutho?” Adwoko ni, “Be, rwoth.”
Go odwoko to waco ran ni, “Me wac pa Rwoth ri Zerubabel: K'obedo gi nyalo kosa meni, to gi cuny paran, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Ibedo aŋo, Awi got madwoŋ? Ruwaŋ Zerubabel ilabipere, aka go lakelo tele ma wilwindi i dier koko ma ‘Wor, wor rigo.’ ”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ama:
Cingi Zerubabel ocako ot me, aka cingi go bende lacowo. Kenyo ilaŋeyo nike Rwoth pa lwak jolweny ooran bongin.
Kole ŋa m'ocayo ndelo ma gigipiny mathindho? Kole jolafore, aka jolaneno kikebe i cingi Zerubabel.
Abirio me obedo waŋ Rwoth abirio ma kaŋasa piny gibe.
Apenjo kendo ni, “Jangi yen oliv ario ma jonitie i thengi paipo ma zahabu m'oyido mo wok'iye jobedo aŋo?”
Go odwokan ka penjo ni, “Ikuya gima gigipiny me nyutho?” Adwoko ni, “Be awi rwoth paran.”
Go odwoko ni, “Me jario m'owir jo gi mo, ma jocungo kabuti Rwoth ma piny gibe.”
Awire, t'atiŋo waŋan malo, aŋiyo, aka neni, Papila m'omin ma ay.
Malaika openjan ni, “Ineno aŋo?” Adwoko ni, “Aneno Papila m'omin ma ay, boro mere mita apar, aka laco mere mita abic.”
Go owaco ran ni, “Me lam macegin kadho ruwaŋ piny gibe, kole kisi dhano ma kwalo ilakwanyo woko luwo kwoŋe, aka kisi dhano ma kwoŋere nono ilakwanyo woko luwo kwoŋe.
Aladhiro wokadhi, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, aka ladonjo i ot pa jakwo, kodi i ot pa ŋata kwoŋere gi nyingan nono; aka labedo i ot pere to waŋo woko mbawin kiri gi telin.”
Malaika m'oyido luwo kodan owok, aka owaco ran ni, “Mondo tiŋi waŋin malo, ineni aŋo me ma wok kadho.”
Apenjo ni, “Me aŋo?”
Go odwoko ni, “Me adita ma wok, aka nyutho reco ma piny gibe.”
Neni, otiŋ malo giumo ma nyaraunda, aka oyido nitie dhako m'obedo i dier adita.
Malaika owaco ni, “Dhako me cungo ri kidakana.” Malaika odilo dhako no iy'adita, aka odiyo dhoke gi tele ma umo.
Atiŋo waŋan malo, aŋiyo, aka neni, mon ario jowok, koyo oyido nitie i bwombi jo. Bwombi jo oyido cal bwombi obusi, aka jotiŋo malo adita i dier piny kodi polo.
Apenjo malaika m'oyido luwo kodan ni, “Jotero yukune adita?”
Go odwokan ni, “Ma geto rigo ot i lowo ma Sinar, aka ilayiko, t'ijengo kenyo i kabedo mere.”
Awire t'atiŋo waŋan malo, aŋiyo, aka neni, cawilin aŋwen jowok i dier gote ario, aka gote me oyido obedo ma ywel.
Cawila marapena oyido nitie gi kayinin m'obokere, aka mar'ario oyido nitie gi kayinin macol.
Cawila mar'adek oyido nitie gi kayinin matar, aka cawila mar'aŋwen oyido nitie gi kayinin makicin manyakwoyokwoyo, ma jotek.
Apenjo malaika m'oyido luwo kodan ni, “Me ginaŋo rwoth?”
Cawila manitie gi kayinin macol kadho i piny ma yumalo, aka manitie gi kayinin matar oluwo jo; cawila manitie gi kayinin makicin manyakwoyokwoyo okadho i piny ma yupiny.”
Kayinin matek jowok, aka jodwaro kadho woth thoko piny. Malaika owaco ni, “Kadhi wiwoth thoko piny.” To jowotho thoko piny.
Kenyo go oywakere ran ka waco ni, “Neni, jono ma jokadho i piny ma yumalo jomiyo Cunyan kwe i piny ma yumalo.”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ran ka waco ni,
“Kwany mic wok kwoŋ jotwec, Heldai, Tobia, kodi Yedaya, ma jotieko tundo wok i Babilon, aka ikadhi i ndelo no won, i ot pa Yosia wod Zefania.
Kwany bongi jo feza gi zahabu, itimi sangaria aka ikethi i wi Yosuwa, wod Yehozadak jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Iwaci rigo ni, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ni, ‘Neni, jal ma nyinge obedo Jangi yath; kole go ladongo i kabedo pere to geto Ot pa Rwoth.’
Go ama lageto Ot pa Rwoth, go latiŋo dwoŋ, go labedo to dhumo i kom ma dhum pere, go labedo jacway ri Were i wi migam i kom ma dhum pere, aka rieko ma siem labedo i dier j'ario.
Sangarin labedo paka rapoy i Ot pa Rwoth ri Heldai, Tobia, Yedaya, kodi Yosia wod Zefania.”
“Ji ma jonitie bor jolabino geto Ot pa Rwoth, aka wilaŋeyo nike Rwoth pa lwak jolweny ooran bongi win. Gime latundo i kare, ka winowinji gi gwokirok, dwondi Rwoth Were mewin.”
I oro mar'aŋwen ma dhum pa Kere Dario, k'aŋwen ma dwe mar'abuŋwen, dwe ma Kislev, wac pa Rwoth obino ri Zekaria.
Munyo oyido Bethel ooro Sareza kodi Regem Melek kodi cwo pajo, kwayo ruwaŋ Rwoth,
kodi penjo jocway ri Were i wi migam m'oyido jonitie i Ot pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny kodi jotuci wac Were ni, “Anyalo ywak kodi lokirok maleŋ i dwe mar'abic paka oyido atimo ma oro kweth pama?”
Wac pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny obino ran ka waco ama:
Luw gi ji je ma piny kodi jocway ri Were i wi migam k'iwaco ni, “Ma oro piero ario, wiriyo kec to wiywak i dwe mar'abic kodi i dwe mar'abirio, i oro ario me, adieri obedo ran ma wiriy'iye kec?
Kosa ka wicemo to wimedho, k'obedo riwin wegi?
K'obedo gi wac pa Rwoth m'oluwo luwo i cingi jotuci wac Were ma cango, ma Yerusalem obed'iye m'okwe, kodi tindi madongo m'othoko go, yupiny ma Kanan kodi Sefela?”
Wac pa Rwoth obino ri Zekaria ka waco ama:
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Thum banja g'adieri, nyuthi wor kodi ŋono kisi dhano ri nyawote.
Citho, nyithindho kic, japath, kosa jacandi, ikir'idiy, kosa timo can marac ri nyawotin i cunyin.
To jokwero winjo, aka joyengo badi gin gi wictek, aka ithi gin obedo mapek ma jok'onyalo winjo.
Jotweyo cuny jo ma jok'owinjo cik kodi wac ma Rwoth pa lwak jolweny odhiro gi cuny pere luwo i cingi jotuci wac Were ma cango. Riameno keme madwoŋ obino wok bongi Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Aka paka go olwoŋo, to jok'onyalo winjo, ameno munyo jolwoŋo, go k'onyalo winjo, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Akedho jo g'asur i dier nonin je m'oyido fodi jokuya. Ameno lowo ma joweyo odoŋ m'ojwangere, m'ongoye ŋata oluw'iye kosa dwok'iye, lowo m'oyido ber to jwangere.
Wac pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny obino ran ka waco ama:
Rwoth pa Lak Jolweny waco ama: Amako nyeko ri Zayon gi nyeko madwoŋ, aka gi keme madwoŋ, amako nyeko rigo.
Me apaka Rwoth waco: Aladwoko i Zayon, aka alabedo i Yerusalem; Ilalwoŋo Yerusalem ni tindi madwoŋ ma genere, aka got pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, ilalwoŋo ni, got maleŋ.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Jodongo kodi mondongo m'oti jolabedo kam'othangere kendo i Yerusalem, kisi dhano gi luth pere i cinge ma ndelo ma tegino.
Aka yac kodi nyir jolapoŋ tuko kam'othangere ma tindi madwoŋ.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: K'obedo gimatek ruwaŋ ji me ma joboth i ndelo me je, bende obedi gimatek ruwaŋan, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny penjo?
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Neni, acegin botho ji paran wok i piny ma yuwok ceŋ kodi wok i piny ma yupodho ceŋ;
alakelo jo bedo i Yerusalem, jolabedo ji paran, aka alabedo Were pajo, iy'adieri kodi i tiro.

Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Weyi cingi win wobedi matek, win ma wiwinjo wac m'owok i dhok jotuci wac Were i ndelo me je, wok cuka i ndelo m'ocak'iye misingi ma Ot pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, ŋey wonyali geto kendo Ot pa Were.
Kole mafodi ndelo no je, cul pa dhano kosa ogwaŋ oyido ongoye, aka siem oyido ongoye ri ŋata kadho woko, kosa ri ŋata donjo. Kole awiro kisi dhano kwoŋ nyawote.
To pama akilatiyo gi joma joboth kwoŋ ji me paka i ndelo macon je, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Kole ilacwoyo kodhi ma siem; vini lanyak olemo mere, lowo lanywolo ranyak, polo lamiyo thoyo pajo, aka alamiyo joma joboth kwoŋ ji me lunjo gigipiny me je.
Aka paka oyido wibedo lam i dier nonin, Awi ot pa Yuda kodi ot pa Isiraili, ameno alabotho win aka wilabedo silwany. Wikiri wibwoki, to weyi cingi win wobedi matek.
Kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Paka acano timo riwin raco, munyo jokwinyo keme paran, aka akiwiro paro paran, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco;
ameno awiro can paran i ndelo me je timo bero ri Yerusalem kodi ot pa Yuda; wikiri wibwoki.
Me a gigipiny ma wiripo timo, luwo adieri kisi dhano ri nyawote, thum win banja mar'adieri aka siem wobedi i waŋkace mewin.
Wongoye ŋata wobedi gi can marac i cunye ri nyawote, ongoye maro kwoŋirok ma nono, kole adaki twodo, ngoye pa tiro kodi akaka, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Wac pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny obino ran ka waco ama:
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Riyo kec ma dwe mar'aŋwen, ma dwe mar'abic, ma dwe mar'abirio kodi ma dwe mar'apar, lalokere ri ot pa Yuda kisangala kodi kalima m'oyik, bero, adieri, siem, kodi mar.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Ji ma tindin madongo kweth jolabino kendo;
ji ma tindi madwoŋ acel jolakidho bongi man ka jowaco ni, “Weyi wakadhi piyo kwayo ruwaŋ Rwoth, kodi rango Rwoth pa lwak jolweny: An bende alakidho.”
Ji kweth kodi nonin matek jolabino rango Rwoth pa lwak jolweny i Yerusalem, kodi kwayo ruwaŋ Rwoth.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: I ndelo no je, cwo apar wok i dhodhok kweth ma nonin jolamako rinda pa Jayuda ka jowaco ni, “Weyi wakadhi kodin, kole watieko winjo nike Were nitie kodin.”
Me wac pa Rwoth ma mako kwoŋ lowo ma Hadrak,
kodi Damasiko kabedo ma ywomirok.
Kole waŋ ji kodi nonin je ma Isiraili,
nitie kwoŋ Rwoth.
Hamath bende, ma gerere gi Tire,
kodi Sidon makada nende riek swa.
Tire ogeto kapondo pere,
odhuro feza paka fukefuke,
kodi zahabu paka cwodho ma royin.
To neni, Rwoth lakwedo woko go,
to bolo woko lim pere i nam,
aka mac lareyo woko go.
Gaza bende laneno, aka ladwanyere i litho.
Ekiron bende, geno pere lalokere wickwot,
Kere larere woko gi Gaza;
aka Asikelon kiladoŋ.
Ji m'oruwere jolabedo i Asdod,
aka alakwanyo woko noro pa Filistia.
Alakwanyo woko remo mere wok i dhoke,
kodi amien mere wok i lake,
aka labedo paka gim'oboth ri Were mawan;
go labedo paka kwari nono i Yuda,
aka Ekiron labedo paka Joyebus.
Alathoko ot paran gi jokur,
ŋey wongoye ŋata nyalo donjo kosa wok,
ongoye jar'adica ma ladiyo jo kendo,
kole pama atieko neno gi waŋan.
Koki ri kisangala, Awi nyar Yerusalem!
Eno, kere perin labino bongin,
gi tiro kodi loyo,
gi mwolo ka gweyo punda madhako,
i wi nyathi punda madhako.
kodi kayinin ma lweny wok i Yerusalem,
kodi aserin ma lweny.
Aka go laluwo siem ri nonin,
dhum pere labedo wok i nam tundo i nam,
wok i jwom kiri i gike je ma piny.
alagonyo jotwec perin wok i bur m'ongoy'iye pi.
Gik win i kapondo, Awi jotwec ma jogeno,
konon awaco nike alaculo win dirio.
Kole atieko gondo Yuda paka atum bor paran,
atieko timo Efrayim paka aserin mere.
Alacewo wotin, Awi Zayon,
kwoŋ wotin, Awi Gris,
aka alacweyin paka abor pa jameni.
Rwoth laneno i wi jo,
aka asere pere ladwire paka lithkoth,
Rwoth Were lakudho gwara,
aka laŋanjo iy'asur ma yupiny.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny lakikwonga jo,
aka jolareyo to nyono piny telin ma asumulu,
jolamadho remo paka jomadho vini,
aka jolapoŋ paka acero,
paka sondin ma migam.
Rwoth Were pajo labotho jo i ndelo no,
paka mwendi pa ji pere,
kole jolabedo paka telin ma sangaria,
jolaminyin i lowo pere.
Bero mere ocale nedi!
Ŋono mere ocale nedi!
Ŋano kodi vini lamiyo yac kodi nyir dongo matek.
Kway win koth wok bongi Rwoth,
i hongo ma cwir,
Rwoth timo pondeponde ma kelo koth,
go miyo ji koth,
miyo kisi ndelo pa dhano twi cemo.
jothieth joneno twodo,
jolek jowaco lek ma twodo,
jomiyo diyo cuny manono.
Riameno ji jolera paka rombo,
jonitie i litho kwoŋbedo jakwath rombo ongoye.
Nge paran oliel kwoŋ jokwath,
aka amiyo wot diegi gir'acula,
kole Rwoth pa lwak jolweny owendo ri mwendi pere, ot pa Yuda,
aka lamiyo jo bedo paka kayina ma dwoŋ pere i lweny.
Kwoŋ jo owok tele ma sonda,
kwoŋ jo owok ludhe,
kwoŋ jo owok asere ma lweny,
kwoŋ jo owok jadhum.
Jolabedo paka cwo ma jomeni i lweny,
ma jonyono jokwor i royin,
jolalweny kwoŋbedo Rwoth nitie gi jo,
aka jolasewo wi jogwey kayinin.
Alaloko matek ot pa Yuda kodi ot pa Yozefu,
alabotho jo, t'adwoko jo,
anitie gi wor rijo, paŋini oyido akijwango jo,
An, Rwoth Were pajo, aladwoko jo.
Efrayim labedo matek paka cwo ma jomeni,
cuny jo lakisangala paka gi vini.
Nyithindho pajo jolaneno to josangala,
cuny jo lafore i Rwoth.
Alalwiyo rijo, t'acoko jo,
kole atieko botho jo,
aka jolabedo kweth paka con.
Makada nende anokedhi jo i dier nonin,
to jolapoyan i piny mabor,
jolakwo gi nyithindho pajo to jodwoko.
Aladwoko jo wok i lowo ma Misir,
alacoko jo wok Asiria;
alakelo jo i lowo ma Giliad kodi i Lebanon,
cuka ongoye kabedo rijo.
Jolaluwo i nam gi litho,
jolagoyo asur ma nam,
lutho ma Nayil lagik piny,
noro pa Asiria lapodho,
aka luth ma dhum pa Misir laeye woko.
Alamiyo jo bedo matek i Rwoth,
aka jolawoth i nyingi go.
Rwoth waco.
Yaw thigin perin, Awi Lebanon,
ŋey mac wowaŋ woko yen sida perin!
Goy ndur, Awi yen lwiyo, kole yen sida jotieko podho,
kole yen matek jotieko podho!
Goy ndur, Awi olwa ma Basan,
kole otoŋ piny lul m'oyukino!
Winji derino ma ywak pa jokwath rombo,
kole onyeki woko ŋono pajo!
Winji kihola pa simbwore,
kole onyeki woko yukino ma Yordan!
Rwoth Were paran waco ama: Bedi jakwath rombo pa mwendi ma joripo athumo.
Jono ma jonyewo jo jothumo to jokadho m'ongoye gir'acula, aka jono ma jotana jo jowaco ni, “Rwoth wopak, atieko ŋaŋo; aka jokwath pajo jongoye gi wor kwoŋ jo.”
“Kole akilamako wor gi ji ma piny me kendo, Rwoth waco. To neni, alaweyo kisi dhano i cingi jager pere, kodi i cingi kere pere, jolaŋinyo piny, aka ongoye ŋata bino botho wok i cingi jo.”
Akwayo mwendi ma ripo athumo, riameno jolimo litho. Akwanyo ludhe ario, acel alwoŋo ni Nema, aka man alwoŋo ni Riwirok; t'akwayo mwendi.
Asika woko jokwath rombo adek i dwe acel, akibedo moth gi jo, aka bende jodakan.
Ameno awaco ni, “Akilabedo jakwath rombo mewin, ma tho weyi wotho, m'orey woko weyi worere, aka weyi ma joboth jowocami delkwoŋ wadi jo.
Akwanyo luth paran ma Nema, aturo woko, ma turo woko cikirok m'atimo gi ji je.
I ndelo no, maluth otur'iye, mwendi m'oyido jolimo litho, m'oyido joŋiyan, joŋeyo nike oyido obedo wac pa Rwoth.
Awaco rijo ni, ka ber ruwaŋ win, miyan win cul paran, to ka be, weyi win.” Ameno jopima cul paran feza piero adek.
Rwoth owaco ran ni, “Bol i kakan ri jacwey degi, cul ma dicwe ma joculan. Ameno atero feza piero adek, t'abolo i Ot pa Rwoth.
Aturo luth mar'ario, ma Riwirok, ma turo wat i dier Yuda kodi Isiraili.”
Rwoth owaco ran kendo ni, “Kwany iloki aperin, gigipiny pa jakwath rombo mamiŋ.

Kole ee, acegin tiŋo malo jakwath rombo i piny, ma kidew kwoŋ m'ireyo woko, k'orangi ma jokedhere, k'ocangi ma jotur, kosa k'opidhi ma joboth. To go lacamo woko riŋo pa ma jocwe, aka layeco woko lwet jo.”
“Kidamba ri jakwath rombo ma bukony,
ma jwango mwendi!
Abor lacwowo cinge kodi waŋe maracuc!
Cinge lathwo kicutho,
waŋe maracuc latho kicutho!”
Me wac pa Rwoth kwoŋ Isiraili, Rwoth waco, go m'oyaro polo to cako piny aka otimo cuny dhano i go.
Neni, acegin loko Yerusalem kikopo ma kirin ri ji je thoko, ka jothoki mako Yuda gi Yerusalem.
I ndelo no alaloko Yerusalem tele mapek ri nonin je; ma jono ma jotiŋ jolalimo litho swa; aka nonin je jolariwere kanyacel monjo go.
I ndelo no, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, alagoyo kisi kayina gi kirin, aka jogwey mere gi neko. To kwoŋ ot pa Yuda alayawo waŋan, aka alagoyo kisi kayina gi waŋtho.
Jodhum ma Yuda jolawaco iy'adundo pajo ni, “Ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem jonitie gi meni i Rwoth pa lwak jolweny bedo Were pajo.”
I ndelo no alamiyo jodhum ma Yuda bedo paka dak mac i dier yen, paka tome mac i kanja, aka jolarere woko racuc kodi racam nonin je, kareno Yerusalem fodi ladoŋ i kabedo mere, i Yerusalem.
Rwoth latelo botho wemin ma Yuda, ŋey dwoŋ ma ot pa Daudi kodi dwoŋ pa ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem wokiri woloyi dwoŋ pa Yuda.
I ndelo no Rwoth lakikwonga ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem ŋey ŋata nyap kwoŋ jo i ndelo no wocale paka Daudi; aka ot pa Daudi labedo paka Were, paka malaika pa Rwoth ruwaŋ jo.
Aka i ndelo no alarango reyo woko nonin je ma jobin monjo Yerusalem.
I ndelo no ywak labedo madwoŋ i Yerusalem paka ywak ri Hadad Rimon i milelo ma Megido.
Piny laywak, kisi peco won laywak; peco pa Daudi won kende, gi mon pajo kakendi gin; peco pa Nathan won kende, gi mon pajo kakendi gin;
peco ma ot pa Levi won kende, gi mon pajo kakendi gin, peco pa Simey won kende, gi mon pajo kakendi gin,
pecin je ma jodoŋ, kisi peco won kende, kodi mon pajo kakendi gin.
I ndelo no labedo waŋ pi m'ilayawo ri ot pa Daudi kodi ji ma jobedo i Yerusalem lonyo jo kwoŋ reco kodi koco.
I ndelo no, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, alakwanyo woko nyingi calin wok i piny, aka kilapoyo jo kendo. Alamiyo jotuci wac were kodi cuny m'ocido ngoye woko i piny.
Aka ka nyatoro omenyere kendo paka jatuci wac were, bamere kodi min ma jonywolo go jolawaco rigo ni, “Ikilakwo, kole iluwo twodo i nyingi Rwoth.” Bamere kodi min ma jonywolo go jolacwowo go.
I ndelo no kisi jatuci wac Were labedo giwickwot ro menyirok pere ka tuco wac Were. Jolaruko law ma yer ŋey jowotwodi.
Go lawaco ni, “Akibedo jatuci wac Were, abedo jafur; kole dhano otana an wok i soye paran.”
Nyatoro lapenjo go ni, “Me adholin aŋo i dieŋeyin?” Go ladwoko ni, “Alimo adholin no i ot pa merin paran.”
kwoŋ jacwo ma cungo cegin kodan,
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Neki Jakwath rombo, ŋey rombo jowokedhere,
aka alawiro cingan kwoŋ mathindho mere.
I piny gibe, Rwoth waco,
ario ma wi adek ilaŋado to jorere,
aka acel wiy adek ilaweyo makwo.
Alaketho adec mar'adek i mac,
alathodho paka ithodho feza,
aka alatemo jo paka itemo zahabu.
Jolalwoŋo nyingan,
aka aladwoko jo.
Alawaco ni, Jobedo ji paran,
aka jolawaco ni, Rwoth obedo Were paran.
Neni, ndelo pa Rwoth bino, ma gim'onyaga wok bongin ilapoko i dier win.

Alacoko nonin je i Yerusalem ri lweny, ilamako tindi madwoŋ, ilakinyaga udi, cwo jolapodho kwoŋ mon to jonindo gi jo akar, aka adec ma tindi madwoŋ lakadho i piny man; aka ji ma jodoŋ k'oŋadi jo woko wok kwoŋ tindi madwoŋ.
Rwoth lakidho lweny gi nonin no, paka go lwenyo i ndelo ma lweny.

I ndelo no par tiende lacungo wi Got Oliv manitie ruwaŋ Yerusalem yuwok ceŋ, aka Got Oliv labare i diere to pokere dirio wok yuwok ceŋ kodi yupodho ceŋ to weyo milelo madwoŋ swa. Adec ma Got acel lapokere yumalo, aka adec man yupiny.

Wiladwire gi milelo ma gote; kole milelo ma gote latundo kiri Azel, aka wilaringo paka wiringo woko kwoŋ yengirok pa piny i hongo pa Uziya kere ma Yuda; aka Rwoth Were paran labino, kanyacel gi jomaleŋ je.
I ndelo no lero kosa ŋico k'obedi.
To labedo ndelo acel m'oŋeyere ri Rwoth, k'obedi odieceŋ kosa wor, kole i hongo m'othieno lero labedo.
Rwoth labedo kere ma piny gibe; i ndelo no Rwoth labedo acel aka nyingi go acel.

Piny gibe lawire, paka Araba wok i Geba tundo i Rimon yupiny ma Yerusalem. To Yerusalem ladoŋ ay malo i kabedo pere wok i Waŋkac pa Benyamin tundo i waŋkac marapena, kiri i Waŋkac ma Sonda, kodi wok iy'acurcur ma Hananel tundo i kadhiŋo vini pa kere.
Ji jolabed'iye, aka langoye rerok man kendo; aka Yerusalem labedo i siem.
Me labedo two nundu ma Rwoth lagoyo gine ji ma jolwenyo gi Yerusalem; delkwoŋ jo latop kareno jocungo gi tiendi jo, waŋ jo latop i kombe waŋ jo, aka lew jo latop i dhok jo.
I ndelo no, Rwoth labolo nywowirok madwoŋ i dier jo, aka kisi dhano laketho cinge kwoŋ nyawote, kisi dhano latiŋo cinge kwoŋ nyawote.
Yuda bende lalweny i Yerusalem; aka lim pa nonin je thoko ilacoko kanyacel, zahabu, feza, kodi nangin, i thotho swa.
Thoyamo ma cale gi me bende lamako kayinin, ŋamia, kodi punde, kodi ogwaŋe je ma jobedi i wemin.
Bino bedo ka pecin moro je ma i piny k'okidhi malo i Yerusalem lamo Kere, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, jok'olim koth moro je kwoŋ jo.
Aka ka peco ma Misir k'okadho malo to jonyuthere, kenyo labino two nundu ma Rwoth goyo gine nonin ma jokidhi malo timo kalima ma kayindi.
Me labedo gir'acula ri reco pa Misir kodi gir'acula ri reco pa nonin je ma jok'okidhi malo timo kalima ma kayindi.
I ndelo no ilandiko iy'olaŋere ma kayinin ni, “Leŋo ri Rwoth.” Degi ma Ot pa Rwoth lacale paka acerin ma ruwaŋ migam.
Degi je i Yerusalem kodi i Yuda labedo maleŋ ri Rwoth pa lwak jolweny, aka jono je ma jolabino miyo cowirok jolatero to joted'iye. I ndelo no, jamitan kilabedo i Ot pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.
Me wac ma Rwoth omiyo Malaki waco ri Joisiraili.
Rwoth waco ri ji pere ni, “Atieko maro win, to wipenjo ni, ‘Imaro wan nedi?’ Kucel amaro Yakobo gi nyikwaye
t'adak Esau gi nyikwaye; atieko reyo woko piny pere matendere aka ajwango lowo pere ri ogwaŋe madudi.”

Ka nyikway Esau Joedom jowaco ni, “Orey woko tindin mawan, to wabino geto kendo.” Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ni, “Jonyalo rigin geto kendo, t'abino yeco piny, cuka ji jolwoŋ jo ni piny m'odakana, ji ma Rwoth omako nge gi jo kicutho.”
Ji ma Isiraili jobino neno gime gi waŋ gin wegi, aka jobino waco ni, “Rwoth dwoŋ, kalo kiri kew ma Isiraili.”

Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Nyathi majayac miyo bamere dwoŋ, aka ŋeca miyo jadwoŋ pere dwoŋ. To k'inen abedo bawin, nikune dwoŋ paran? Aka k'abedo jadwoŋ mewin raŋo wikilworan? Win, jocway ri Were i wi migam, wibwono nyingan; aka kucel wipenjo ni, “Wabwono nyingin nedi?”
Gi kelo ran cemo ma bukony i wi migam paran. Nyaka to wipenjo ni, “Nger aŋo ma wakwero miyin'iye wor.” Gi paro ni migam pa Rwoth bende inyalo bwono.
Ka wikelo ran ogwaŋe ma waŋ gin otho kosa ma jotwo kosa m'oŋol, wiparo ni ongoye gimarac gi gino? Tem win miyo nger ogwaŋe no ri gavana mewin! Go nyalo kisangala gi win kosa nyutho win ŋono?
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ni, “Onyo win jocway ri Were i wi migam, tem win kwayo wor pa Were, ŋey go wonyuthi wan bero. Gi nger mic no wok i cingi win, go onyali nyutho win bero.”

Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ni, “Kabedi nitie acel kwoŋ win manyalo cego thigo ma ot ma lamo to geŋo win moko mac ma bukony i wi migam paran. Akisangala gi win, aka akibino jolo mic m'owok i cingi win.
Ji wok i thenge ma piny tundo i gike jomiyo nyingan dwoŋ. Kisi kamoro jowaŋo ran buban aka jomiyan cowirok t'ajolo. Joje jomiyo nyingan dwoŋ, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
To wibwono nyingan ka wiwaco ni meza pa Rwoth koc aka ka wimiyo mic ma cemo manyinge wibwono.
Wiwaco ni, ‘Nga waol gi gime.’ Widienyo ran um win. Paka mic mewin, wikelo ran gim'okwany gi maker, m'oŋol kosa ma two. Wiparo ni anojoli wok i cingi win! Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Akwoŋo jakwo ma nigi wod rombo kwoŋ mwendi pere, m'ociko miyan, aka miyo Rwoth ma bukony; kole abedo Kere madwoŋ aka nyingan ilworo i dier nonin. Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.”
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Aka onyo win, jocway ri Were i wi migam, me cik riwin.
Ka wik'owinji, ka wik'okethi i cuny win miyo nyingan dwoŋ, kenyo abino kwoŋo win kiri gi nyithindho mewin; adieri atieko kwoŋo jo, rupiri wikikethi i cuny win.
Neni, abino miyo nyithindho mewin gir'acula t'awiro woyo dhok ma wimiyan i waŋ win, aka abino riemo win woko ruwaŋan.
Ameno winoŋey ni adhiro cik me riwin, ŋey cikirok paran gi Levi wocungi, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Fonji mar'adieri oyido ni dhoke, aka ongoye komo m'onwaŋere i dhoke. Owotho kodan i siem kodi tiro, aka owiro ji madit wok i reco.
Rupiri dhok jacway ri Were i wi migam ripo gwoko rieko, aka ji joripo rango rieko wok bonge, rupiri go obedo jamikwenda pa Rwoth pa lwak jolweny.”
“To onyo wiweyo yo m'otire; aka witieko miyo ji kweth ceri gi fonji mewin. Wituro cikirok paran gi win, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco.
Ameno amiyo ji jobwono win, paka bende wikiluwo yo paran, aka witimo nyakucel i fonji mewin.”
Wangoye gi bawan acel, Were acel ama k'ocweyo wan? Raŋo onyo wabedo jobanirok ri wadi wan, aka raŋo wabwono cikirok ma Were otimo gi kwarere mawan?
Ji ma Yuda jongoye g'adieri, aka jotimo gikoc i Isiraili gi Yerusalem; rupiri Yuda otieko koco Ot pa Rwoth ma lamo ma go omaro. Cwo jonywomo nyir ma jolamo werin pa jopath.
Weyi Rwoth wokwany woko i dier Joisiraili ji ma jotimo gime, aka doko jokiri jowobedi i cowirok ma piny mawan kelo ri Rwoth.
Aka me doko giman ma witimo. Wiumo migam pa Rwoth gi pigi waŋ win, gi ywak kodi ndur rupiri go doko kiyey mic mewin kosa kijol gi kisangala wok i cingi win.
Wipenjo ni, “Raŋo go kijol?” Rupiri obedo jakony ma luwo adieri ma cikirok m'itimo gi dhako perin ma soye, m'oyido ingoye rigo g'adieri, makada nende go jakony perin aka dhako perin ma cikirok.
Were k'ocweyo win del acel kodi cuny acel gi go? Atoŋa pere oyido aŋo i gime? Oyido obedo ni wibedi gi nyithindho manyawere. Ameno neni win ni ongoye kwoŋ win ŋata turo cikirok pere gi cege.
Adaki turo nywomirok, Rwoth Were pa Isiraili waco. Adaki k'acel kwoŋ win timo gi gero ameno ri cege. Neni win nike wikituro cikirok mewin ŋey wibedi g'adieri ri mon mewin.
Wiolo Rwoth gi wac mewin. Kucel wipenjo ni, “Waolo go nedi?” Gi waco ni, “Kisi ŋata timo reco ber ruwaŋ Rwoth, aka omaro jo.” Kosa gi penjo ni, “Nikune Were ma jatiro?”
Go bino thumo banja paka ŋata thedho aka lonyo feza, aka bino lonyo wot Levi to lonyo jo paka zahabu gi feza, cuka jomiyo Rwoth mic ma ripo gi go.
Kenyo nyaka mic ma Yuda gi Yerusalem jomiyo Rwoth bino kisangala go paka oyido jotimo yucen.

Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Kenyo abino core cegin gi win thumo banja; aka abino bedo mayil kwoŋ jothieth, jocot, ji ma jokwoŋere nono, ji ma jodiyo jakipakasa cul pere, citho, nyithindho kic, kodi jopath, aka jokilworan.
Rupiri An abedo Rwoth akiwire, riameno win, wot Yakobo fodi wikirere kicutho.
Wok i ndir ma wiketho cik paran gi thenge aka wikikuro. Dwoki win bongan, aka abino dwoko bongi win, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco. To wipenjo ni, “Wanodwoki nedi?”
Nyatoro okwal Were? Kucel wikwalan. To wipenjo ni, “Wakwalin nedi?” Iy'acel ma wi apar gi mic mewin.
Akwoŋo win rupiri wikwalan, win piny gibe.
Keli win acel wiy apar gikululu i ot paran ma lamo, ŋey cemo wobedi i ot paran. Teman win, Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco, k'inen ak'oyaw dirisin ma polo riwin t'akonjo piny riwin silwany gibe.
Akibino weyo kudin wonyeki cemo mewin, aka ndelo vini mewin bino poŋ gi nyingi vini.
Kenyo ji ma piny je jobino lwoŋo win ni wijosilwany, rupiri piny mewin bino bedo maber kwo i iye.
Wiwaco wac mareco kwoŋan, Rwoth waco. Kucel wipenjo ni, “Aŋo ma wawaco kwoŋin?”
Witieko waco ni, “Ongoye kony tiyo ri Were? Bero aŋo timo gima go waco kosa temo nyutho Rwoth pa lwak jolweny ni warem ri gima watimo?
Paka waneno, jokwoto ama josangala. Joreco nyaka jokitim maber, to ka jotemo Were jokwale.”
Kenyo jom'oyido jolworo Rwoth joluwo wegi, aka Rwoth owinjo gima jowaco, aka kitawo pa ji ma jolworo Rwoth aka joworo go ondiki.
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny owaco ni, “Jobino bedo ji paran won, i ndelo m'anotimi gimoro, aka abino koyo jo paka ba nyathi nyutho wor ri wode ma tiyo rigo.
Kenyo wibino poko kwoŋ jom'otire gi jokidakana, ji ma jotiyo ri Were gi joma kitiy rigo.”
Rwoth pa lwak jolweny waco ama: Kole neni, ndelo bino, ma jonoro je gi joreco jobino liel pa kanja. I ndelo no jobino liel woko, aka ongoye gima bino doŋ kwoŋ jo.
To riwin ma wilworo nyingan, meni ma both paran bino wok kwoŋ win pa waŋceŋ to kelo both pa minyin ceŋ. Wibino bedo m'ogonyere aka gi kisangala paka nyathi dhiaŋ m'owodhi wok i kigo dhok.
I ndelo no k'anotim gimoro, wibino loyo jokidakana, aka jobino cale fukefuke ma par tiendi win.
Poyi win cik pa ŋeca paran Musa, cik gi Or m'amiyo go wi got Sinai ri ji paran Isiraili ni jowoluwi.
Neni, abino dhiro riwin Elia jatuci wac Were, mafodi ndelo pa Rwoth madwoŋ ma teko k'obino.
Aka go bino riwo nyithindho gi bacere pajo kanyacel doko; kole dinyo abino t'areyo piny mewin.
Me a bol ma nywolirok pa Yesu Kristo, nyakwar Daudi aka nyakwar Abraham:
Abraham onywolo Isaka, Isaka onywolo Yakobo, Yakobo onywolo Yuda gi wutmin go;
Yuda to nywolo Perez gi Zera i yok jo Tamar, Perez onywolo Heziron, Heziron onywolo Ram;
Ram onywolo Aminadab, Aminadab onywolo Nason, Nason onywolo Salimon;
Salimon gi cege Rahab to jonywolo Bowaz, Bowaz gi cege Ruth to jonywolo Obed, Obed onywolo Yese;
Yese onywolo Daudi Kere. Daudi onywolo Solomon ma min oyido obedo cipa Uriya;
Solomon onywolo Rehobowam, Rehobowam onywolo Abija, Abija onywolo Asa;
Asa onywolo Yehosafat, Yehosafat onywolo Yoram; Yoram onywolo Uziya;
Uziya onywolo Yotham, Yotham onywolo Ahaz, Ahaz onywolo Hezekia;
Hezekia onywolo Manase; Manase onywolo Amos, Amos onywolo Yosia;
Yosia to nywolo Yekonia gi wutmin go, gikenyo to itero jo paka ŋecin yu Babilon;
Munyo otiek tero jo yu Babilon, Yekonia onywolo Salutiel, Salutiel to nywolo Zerubabel;
Zerubabel to nywolo Abiud, Abiud to nywolo Eliakim, Eliakim to nywolo Azor;
Azor to nywolo Zadok; Zadok to nywolo Akim, Akim to nywolo Eliyudi,
Eliyudi to nywolo Eliazar; Eliazar to nywolo Mathan, Mathan to nywolo Yakobo;
Yakobo onywolo Yozefu, m'obedo cwor Maria, m'onywolo Yesu m'ilwoŋo ni Kristo.

Riameno, wok kwoŋ Abraham tundo kwoŋ Daudi, obedo luse ji apar g'aŋwen; odoko wok kwoŋ Daudi, tundo munyo oter jo yu Babilon, obedo luse ji apar g'aŋwen; kendo wok munyo oter jo yu Babilon tundo kwoŋ Kristo, bende obedo luse ji apar g'aŋwen.
Gikenyo Yozefu cwore, rupiri oyido obedo dhano m'otire aka k'omito miyo go wickwot, oyido paro weyo go nyaliŋliŋ.
Neni, munyo fodi go paro ameno, malaika pa Rwoth to bino rigo i lek, to waco rigo ni, “Yozefu wod pa Daudi, Ikir'ilwor rwako Maria bedo dhako perin, rupiri go yac gi meni pa Cuny Maleŋ.
Go bino nywolo nyathi majayac, aka ibino cwoko nyinge ni Yesu; rupiri go ama bino botho ji pere kwoŋ reco pajo.”
Gino je otimere, ŋey gima jatuci wac Were oluwo wotundi i kare ni,
“Nyako mambula bino gamo iye, to nywolo nyathi majayac, m'ibino cwoko nyinge ni Manwer.” Dwoŋ mere ni, “Were nigi wan.”
Yozefu munyo ocew, to timo paka malaika pa Were owaco rigo, to tero Maria bedo cege;
aka k'obedo gine tundo munyo ocowo nywolo nyathi no to cwoko nyinge ni Yesu.
Munyo otiek nywolo Yesu i tindi ma Bethelehem, i Yuda i ndir ma Herode oyido kere, jorieko moro ma jofonjere kwoŋ micalin jowok yuwok ceŋ to jobino Yerusalem;
aka jopenjo ni, “Nikune nyathi m'onywol bedo kere pa Joyuda? Waneno micala pere munyo owok yuwok ceŋ am'omiyo onyo wabino lamo go.”
Munyo Kere Herode owinjo gime, obwok, aka kiri gi ji man je i Yerusalem.
Go olwoŋo jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam je kodi jondiko kanyacel to penjo jo ni, “Ibino nywolo Kristo kune?”
Jodwoko ni, “I tindi ma Bethelehem, i Yuda.” Me a gima jatuci wac Were ondiko ni,
iŋat'ikithin loyo i dier jodhum ma Yuda;
kole kwoŋin ama jatel bino wok'iye,
ma bino bedo jakwath pa Joisiraili.”
Gikenyo Herode olwoŋo wendo ma jowok yuwok ceŋ no i romo manyaliŋliŋ, aka oŋeyo kwoŋ jo ndir won ma micala no omenyer'iye rijo.
Gikenyo ooro jo Bethelehem gi wac me: “Kidhi win wirangi kama di nyathi no maber aka ka winwaŋo go wimiyan ŋeyo, ŋey abende abin alam go.”
Gi wac me joeye kenyo, aka munyo oyido jowotho i royo, joneno micala ma ndir ca joneno yuwok ceŋ, m'otelo jo cuka otundo to cungo kama nyathi no oyido niye.
Josangala swa, kendo jowinjo maber m'oasere munyo joneno micala no!
Jodonjo i ot to joneno nyathi bongi Maria yokimere. Joguro congi gin piny jolamo go, to joyawo migowe pajo, to jocwayo mic: Zahabu, buban, kodi mo maŋwe kur.
Were onyutho jo i lek nike jokiri jogik kendo pa Herode, riameno jodok yupiny pajo gi royo man.

Munyo jotieko kadho, malaika pa Rwoth omenyere ri Yozefu i lek munyo waco ni, “Ay malo ikwany nyathi gi yokimere wiringi i piny Misir, aka wibedi koro cuka anowaci riwin ndir ma dwoko. Herode larango nyathi no munyo mito neko.”
Am'omiyo Yozefu oay malo okwanyo nyathi gi yokimere, to joay wor kidho yu Misir,
kama go obed'iye cuka Herode otho. Meno omiyo gima jatuci wac Were owaco con otundo i kare ni, “Alwoŋo wodan wok Misir.”

Munyo Herode oneno ni jorieko ma jowok yuwok ceŋ jothumo rigo rieko, keme omako go to wodho or nike woneki woko nyithindho mayac je ma joromo oro ario gik cen, i Bethelehem kodi loka m'othenere gine. Otimo gino je cungo kwoŋ gima go oyido otieko ŋeyo kwoŋ ndir ma go openj'iye jorieko ca kwoŋ menyirok pa micala.
Ameno gima Yeremia jatuci wac Were owaco otundo i kare ni,
derino ma ywak malith gi ndur.
Laker ywako nyithindho pere.
Kiyey wokwey cunye,
rupiri ongoye m'odoŋ.”
Munyo Herode otieko tho, malaika pa Rwoth omenyere ri Yozefu i lek yu Misir;
aka owaco ni, “Ay malo ikwany nyathi gi yokimere widoki i piny Isiraili rupiri jom'oyido jorango neko go jotieko tho.”
Am'omiyo Yozefu oay malo, okwanyo nyathi gi yokimere to jodok Isiraili.
Munyo Yozefu owinjo ni Akelayo am'olunjo kom pa bamere Herode paka kere ma Yuda, lworo omako go dok kendo kenyo. Were omedo menyo rigo i lek, am'omiyo go okidho iy'adec ma Galili,
to gero peco pere i tindi ma Nazareth. Go otimo ameno ma miyo gima jatuci wac Were owaco wotundi ni, “Ibino lwoŋo go ni Janazareth.”
I hongo no Yohana Jakibatisa obino to cako tito wac Were i thim ma Yuda munyo waco ni:
“Ŋuti win, rupiri Ker ma polo nicegin!”
Yohana oyido a ŋata Isaya jatuci wac Were cango oluwo kwoŋe con munyo waco ni:
“Nyatoro koko i thim,
yik win royo pa Rwoth,
tir win rigo royo pere.”
Ji jobino bonge wok Yerusalem, wok iy'adec ma Yuda, kodi wok iy'adec je m'othoko jwom Yordan.
Jotuco reco pajo aka obatisa jo i Yordan.
Tim win gima nyutho nike witieko ŋuto reco mewin kicutho.
Aka wikiri wipar ni winyalo nwaŋo kagoŋirok munyo wiwaco ni, ‘Abraham obedo kwari wan.’ Awaco riwin ni Were nyalo kwanyo kada telin me to loko nyikway Abraham!
Kada pama le otiek yiko ma toŋo yen gi tiendi gin! Yath je ma kinyak gimaber ibino toŋo woko t'ibolo i mac!
Abatisa win kodi pi ma nyutho nike witieko ŋuto; to ŋata bino luwan cen bino kibatisa win gi Cuny Maleŋ kodi mac. Go loyan gi dwoŋ tektek m'akiripi kada tiŋo war pere.
Go nitie g'odher pere ma yeko nyingi kal je; go bino coko kal pere ma lilo to konjo i dero pere, to waŋo woko cuŋ i mac makitho.”
I hongo no Yesu owok Galili to kidho Yordan to bino bongi Yohana ni obatisa go.
To Yohana otemo juko go ka waco rigo ni, “Iŋat'iripo kibatisa an, odoko ibino bongan ayino!”
To Yesu odwoko go ni, “Weyi watim ameno pama. Kole i tim me wabino tiro gimoro je ma Were yenyo.” To Yohana yeyo.
Tekin otiek kibatisa Yesu, owok i pi, gikenyo polo oyawere rigo aka oneno Cuny Maleŋ loro piny i cal p'akuru to pie kwoŋe.
Gikenyo dwondi nyatoro oluwo wok i polo ni, “Me a Wodan won m'amaro, aka asangala gine.”
Munyo go ocowo odieceŋ gi wor piero aŋwen munyo riyo, Yesu owinjo kec.
Jwogi obino bonge to waco ni, “K'inen ibedo Wod Were adieri, ere apawiri telin me wolokere cemo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ondiki ni, ‘Dhano kinyal kwo gi cemo kende, to gi wac je ma wok i dhok Were.’ ”
Gikenyo jwogi otero Yesu i tindi maleŋ to ketho go wilwindi ma Ot pa Were,
to waco rigo ni, “K'inen ibedo Wod Were ere papor ye piny.” Kole ondiki ni,
“Were bino oro rin jomalaika pere,
ma jobino bielin i cingi gin,
aka ikibino cadho tiendin kwoŋ tele.”
Gikenyo jwogi otero Yesu wi got mabor swa, to nyutho go ker ma piny je, gi dwoŋ manitie i iye je.
Jwogi owaco ni, “Abino miyin gi go je, ka iriewere ruwaŋan t'ilaman.”
Gikenyo Yesu odwoko ni, “Eye bongan Sitan! Ondiki ni, ‘Lami Rwoth Were perin aka itiy rigo won kende.’ ”
Gikenyo jwogi oweyo go; aka jomalaika jobino jomiyo go kony.
Go oeye Nazareth, to kidho Kapernaum, tindi ma dho jwom Galili, iy'adec mapa Zebulun kodi Nafital.
Gime otimere ma miyo gima Isaya jatuci wac Were owaco wotundi i kare ni,
thenge ma yu wakawaka, i thengi Yordan,
Galili, pa Jopath!
Ji m'oyido jonitie i mudho
joneno lero madwoŋ;
Aka ri jom'oyido jonitie i piny ma mudho ma tho,
lero otieko menyere.”
Munyo Yesu oyido wotho dho Wakawaka Galili, go oneno wutmere ario ma jokitoga, Simon (m'ilwoŋo ni Petero) gi Andereya omin go, munyo oyido jociko rec i wakawaka gi bwo rupiri oyido jobedo jokitoga.
Yesu owaco rijo ni, “Biye luwan win aloki win jokitoga ji.”
Piyo piyo jono joweyo bwo pajo, to joluwo go.
Yesu omedere woth aka oneno wutmere ario man, Yakobo kodi Yohana, yac pa Zebedayo. Onwaŋo jonitie i ye pajo gi ba gin Zebedayo joyiko bwo pajo, to lwoŋo jo.
Piyo piyo jono joweyo ye pajo gi ba gin, to joluwo Yesu.

Wac ma mako kwoŋe onyay i piny Siria gipi, m'omiyo ji jokelo rigo ji je m'onwaŋo jotwo kiti two m'opokere je, kodi ramirok ma nger je m'oyido cando jo: Ji ma jwogi nikwoŋ gin, joma tho fum, kodi jonyaŋinya; to Yesu botho jo je.
Lwak ji m'oasere joluwo go wok Galili kodi Dekapoli (tindi m'ocokere apar) wok Yerusalem, Yuda, kodi piny ma loka Yordan.
Yesu oneno kitipa ji, to idho wi got, aka munyo otieko bedo piny, jofonjirok pere jobino bonge;
aka ocako fonjo jo.
Josilwany a joma candere i cuny gin,
kole Ker ma polo obedo apajo.
kweyo cuny jo.
kole jobino lunjo piny.
ma timo gima Were yenyo,
kole ibino yeŋo jo.
Josilwany a joma nyutho jowoti gin wor,
kole Were bino nyutho jo bende wor.
jobino neno Were.
Josilwany a joma kweyo piny,
kole ibino lwoŋo jo ni nyithindho pa Were.
kole Ker ma polo obedo apajo!
Yodere win aka wisangala, rupiri kemba mewin obedo m'oasere i polo. Me apaka cango jotimo kiri ri jotuci wac Were macon.
Ongoye ŋata cwinyo tala to riewo i agono; kucel go ripo ŋawo tala no malo kama nyalo miyo lero ri ji je ma ot.
Riameno lero mewin bende ripo menyo iye je ŋey ji jowoneni gima beyo ma witimo to jopako Bawin man polo.
Wikiri wipar nike abino ka kwanyo woko Cik pa Musa kodi fonji pa jotuci wac Were, t'abino nyutho dwoŋ mere mar'adieri ayin.
Adieri awaco riwin, ka polo gi piny fodi nitie, ongoye kada gimathin kosa adec m'ondhilo kwoŋ Cik m'ibino kwanyo woko, to bino bedo ama tundo kama gimoro je otieko timer'iye.

Am'omiyo nyatoro je m'okwer winjo kada gimoro nyaka mathin kwoŋ Cik aka ofonji joman bende timo ameno, bino bedo ŋata loyo thino i Ker ma polo. Kucel nyatoro je m'owinji Cik aka ofonji joman bende timo ameno, bino bedo ŋatadwoŋ swa i Ker ma polo.
Am'omiyo, awaco riwin ni wikibino nyalo donjo i Ker ma polo kwanyo woko ka wibedo gi leŋo ma kalo apa jondiko kodi Jofarisayo i timo gima Were yenyo.

To pama onyo awaco riwin ama: Ŋat'omaki nge g'omin bino bedo jabanja kapido. Ŋat'otim roro kwoŋ omin ibino tero go ruwaŋ jothumi banja, aka ŋat'oyeti omin ni, mamiŋ ma bukony, ibino bolo go i mac makitho.
Am'omiyo k'onwaŋo itero mic perin ri Were i wi migam to gikenyo ipoyo nike omerin nitie gi dhaw kodin,
weyi mic perin i nyim migam kenyo, kutho ikidhi iyiki wac g'omin in aka nyaka idwoki imiy Were mic perin.

Ka dhano nigi wac moro kodin aka mito terin kapido, yik gine wac no ma fodi hongo nitie, kafodi wikitundo kapido. Ka winotundi kenyo, go bino bolin i cingi jathum banja, ma bino kethin i cingi jolweny ma katwec t'itweyin.
Ibino bedo kenyo, awaco rin, cuka inocul kiri pesa macowe m'othumi rin.
To pama awaco riwin ama: Ŋata ŋiyo dhako moro aka cunye wanya go, meno otieko timo gine cot gi i cunye.
Am'omiyo k'inen waŋin maracuc miyin timo gimarac, goli woko ibol woko! Kole ber ikeŋ adec moro ma delkwoŋin loyo nwaŋo delkwoŋin gipi t'ibolo i mac makitho.
K'inen cingin maracuc miyin timo gimarac, ŋondi ibol woko! Rupiri ber iremi cingin acel loyo delkwoŋin gipi kidho i mac makitho.
To pama awaco riwin ni: Nyatoro je m'oriem cege ri wac moro je ma k'obedo wac ma kidakana, meno go miyo cege donjo i cot. Aka ŋata nywomo dhako ma pameno, meno bende timo gine cot.
To pama awaco riwin ni: Ikir'ikwoŋere kada mathin k'itimo cikirok, ikir'ikwoŋere gi polo, rupiri meno kom pa Were,
kosa gi piny, rupiri meno ka ywomo tiende, kosa gi Yerusalem, rupiri meno obedo tindi pa Kere madwoŋ;
Odoko ikir'ikwoŋere gi wiyin, rupiri ikinyal loko kada yer acel matar wobedi macol kosa macol wobedi matar;
Waci nyaka ni, “Ey.” Kosa “Be.” Gima kalo kenyo man m'inowaci meno wok bongi Ŋatarac.
To onyo pama awaco riwin ni: Ikir'iculi kwor kwoŋ ŋata timo rin marac. Ka nyatoro ogoyo lembin maracuc g'adhoŋ, weyi wogoyi lembin maracam bende.
Aka ka nyatoro oterin i kapido ro yenyo sati perin, weyi go woter kiri kot perin bende.
Aka ka nyatoro oromin woth mayiro acel, woth gine mayiro ario.
Ka dhano okwayin gimoro, miy go, aka ka nyatoro mito gimoro m'ociko culo, miy go.
Witieko winjo cango con paka owaci ni mari mere perin, aka dakere kodi jakwor perin.
To onyo pama awaco riwin ni, mari win jokwor mewin, odoko kway win ri joma timo riwin marac,
aka nyaka wibino bedo nyithindho pa Bawin manitie i polo; kole go miyo ceŋ pere liel ri ji mareco kodi mabeyo marom, aka go miyo jomabeyo gi joreco je koth.
Raŋo ma di wigen ni womiy win kemba ka wimaro ji ma bende jomaro win won kende? Jocoki misolo bende jokitim ameno?
To ka wimothere wiwegi gi wegi, meno witimo ye aŋo m'opokere kodi gima ji man jotimo? Jopath bende jokitim ameno?
Bedi win maleŋ paka Bawin manitie i polo leŋ.

Am'omiyo ka wimiyo jacandi gimoro, wikiri wiasa nyutho kamaler, paka joma rendere jotimo i kalamo pa Joyuda kodi i royo m'okare i tindi. Jotimo ameno nike ji jowopaki jo. Adieri awaco riwin, otiek miyo jo kemba pajo m'opoŋ.
To k'icwayo ri jacandi gimoro, kony go makada mere perin ma kacunyin k'oŋeyo,
ŋey wobedi gima nyaliŋliŋ, aka Benin, ma neno gim'imito nyaliŋliŋ, ama bino miyin kemba.
To ka ikwayo, donji i ot perin icegi thigo, aka ikway Benin, ma kinenere kamaler. Aka Benin, ma neno gim'imito nyaliŋliŋ bino miyin kemba.
I kwayo perin, ikir'ior wac kweth m'ongoye kony paka jokafir jotimo; ato joparo ni Were bino winjo jo ro kwayo pajo maboyo.
Am'omiyo wikiri wicale gi jo; kole Bawin manitie i polo oŋeyo gima wicando kada mafodi wikikwayo go.
Me apaka wiripo kwayo,
Bawan ma i polo;
Nyingin wolwor.
Keri perin wobin;
Gim'iyenyo wotimere i piny paka timere i polo.
Miy waye konon cemo mawan ma noknok;
Cwaki riwan reco mawan;
Paka wacwako ri joma timo riwan marac.
Ikir'iter wan i karatem, to bothi wan ayino,
kwoŋ gimarac, [rupiri ker obedo aperin, kodi meni, kodi dwoŋ, cil gi cil]. Ameno.
To ka wikicwaki reco pa joman, ameno Bawin manitie i polo bende k'ocwaki riwin reco ma witieko timo.
Aka ka wiriyo kec, wikiri winenere pa wigut paka joma rendere. Ato jonyeko waŋ gin ŋey ji je jowoŋey nike joriyo kec. Adieri awaco riwin, ameno jotieko limo kemba pajo m'opoŋ.
To k'iriyo kec, lwoki waŋin kendo iyiki wiyin,
aka joman jokiri jowoneni nike iriyo kec; Benin kende ma kinenere kamaler ama bino ŋeyo. Aka Benin, ma neno gim'imito nyaliŋliŋ, ama bino miyin kemba.
to kucel, kani win ŋaŋo mewin i polo, kama masirigi kodi nyal jokibino nyek'iye, aka jokwo jokibino donj'iye kwalo.
Kole kama diŋaŋo perin ama cunyin bed'iye ndir je.
Waŋ meno tala ma del; ka waŋin olama, delkwoŋin gipi lero bino poŋ'iye;
to ka waŋin k'olama, delkwoŋin bino bedo i mudho. Am'omiyo ka lero ma kwoŋin olokere mudho, mudho bino asere marom nedi?
Ongoye ŋata nyalo tiyo ri rwodhe ario; go bino maro acel to dak man, kosa nyalo tiyo ri acel to cayo man. Ikinyal tiyo ri Were kodi ri lim bende.
Am'omiyo awaco riwin gime: Wikiri wirembi kwoŋ gir'acama kodi gir'amadha ma wiyenyo ma kwo, kosa ruk ri delkwoŋ win. Adieri kwo pa dhano kiloy cemo, odoko delkwoŋe kiloy ruk?
Neni win winyin ma jouco malo, jokipidhi kodhi, jokicoki cemo jokethi i dere, to kole Bawin manitie i polo kuro jo! To kere win wikiloy winyin no bor?
Ŋa kwoŋ win manyalo medo kiyindira i kwo pere ro rembo ri gigipiny no?
To raŋo ma wirembo ri ruk? Neni win thiw dudi paka jodongo; jokicwer kwok i tic odoko wegi jokitim ruk pajo.
To awaco riwin kada Solomon, ma cango oŋaŋ m'oasere, k'obedo gi ruk mabeyo paka nyaka acel kwoŋ thiw dudi me.
To k'inen meno apaka Were ruko lum, ma konon nitie to yawere mere thwo t'iwaŋo i kendo, go k'oruki win maloyo kenyo, a ji ma yeyo pajo nok me!
Am'omiyo wikiri wicaki rembo, ka wiwaco ni, “Wanocam aŋo?” Kosa ni, “Wanomadhi aŋo?” Kosa ni, “Wanoruki aŋo?”
Kole me a gigipiny ma jokafir joyenyo hongo je; aka Bawin manitie i polo oŋeyo nike wiyenyo gi go je.
To kutho rangi win Ker pa Were kodi tiro ma go yenyo, aka go bino miyo win gigipiny me je.
Am'omiyo wikiri wirembi ri gima dikin; kole kisi ndelo won yawere gi wac mere. Ki yenyere medo teko man wi teko ma piny m'oyawere kelo.
Wikiri withum banja ri jowoti win, aka bende Were k'othumi riwin banja.
Kwoŋbedo ibino thumo riwin banja i yo acel ma withumo gine banja ri jowoti win, aka ibino tiyo kwoŋ win gi cik ma witiyo gine kwoŋ jowoti win.
Am'omiyo, raŋo m'iŋiyo nyaka yath m'ondhilo man manitie i waŋ omerin, t'ikidew kwoŋ thwon kasik manitie i waŋin won?
Iere nedi waco ri omin ni, mondo, weyi akwany woko nyaka yath m'ondhilo no i waŋin, ma to in won bende initie gi kongolo kasik i waŋin?
In, jarendirok! Kutho kwany woko kongolo kasik i waŋin, aka nyaka ibino neno maber ŋey inokwany woko yath m'ondhilo i waŋ omerin.
Ikir'imiy gwokere gigipiny maleŋ, jobino wire rin to jokayin ayino; kendo ikir'ibol ge ma welo ri mbiji, jobino nyonanyona ayino.
Kway, aka inolimi; rangi, aka inonwaŋ; gudi thigo aka ibino yawo rin.
Kole dhano je ma kwayo, limo; aka ŋata rango, nwaŋo, aka ŋata gudo thigo, iyawo rigo.
Ŋa kwoŋ win bacere ji ka ma di miy wode tele, k'okwayo mugat?
Kosa di miy go thwol, k'okwayo rec?
Kole kada wireco ameno, wiŋeyo miyo nyithindho mewin gigipiny mabeyo. Aka Bawin manitie i polo oloy win didi i miyo joma kwayo go, gigipiny mabeyo!
Donji gi i waŋkac madiny, rupiri waŋkac malac nigi royo mayot luwo, to tero jo i rerok, aka jomathoth joluwo royo no.
Waŋkac madiny nigi royo matek luwo, to tero jo i kwo, aka ji manok ama jonwaŋo royo no.
Gwokere win kwoŋ jotuci wac Were ma twodo, ma jobino bongi win i cal pa rombo gi woko, to iy'adieri mere jobedo arara i cuny gin.
Riameno wibino ŋeyo jo kwoŋ gima nyak wok i tim pajo. Kudho oriaŋ bende cene nyak vini? Odoko kudho alwi bende cene nyak nyandere?
Kole yath maber nyak gimaber, aka yath marac bende nyak gimarac.
Yath maber kinyal nyak gimarac, aka yath marac kinyal nyak gimaber.
Yath je ma kinyak gimaber itoŋo woko t'ibolo i mac.
Am'omiyo wibino ŋeyo jotuci wac Were ma twodo cungo kwoŋ gima nyak ma nenere i tim pajo.
Ki dhano je ma lwoŋan ni, Rwoth, Rwoth, ma bino donjo i Ker ma polo, kende ŋata timo gima Baba man polo yenyo.
I ndelo no, jomathoth jobino waco ni, “Rwoth, Rwoth, kole watuco mikwenda pa Were i nyingin, wariemo woko jwogi i nyingin aka watimo gir'aura madongo m'omore i nyingin!”
Gikenyo abino waco rijo ni, “Akuya win, kendo eye win bongan win wijotimi reco me.”
Am'omiyo dhano je ma winjo wac paran me aka tiyo gine bino cale gi dhano mariek m'ogeto ot pere i wi tele.
Koth ocwe, mikula omol, aka asur okudho to ot no k'opodho, kwoŋbedo oger i wi tele.
To ŋata winjo wac paran me aka kitiy gine, cale dhano mamiŋ m'ogero ot pere i kwoyo.
Koth ocwe, mikula omol, asur okudho ot no matek, to podho. Podho no oasere marom kune!
Go onwaŋo kicale kodi jondiko, rupiri go ofonjo pa ŋat'oyido nigi meni.
Munyo Yesu oloro wi got, lwak ji joluwo go.
Gikenyo jadhowo moro obino bonge, oriewere piny ruwaŋe, to waco ni, “Jadwoŋ k'iyenyo inyalo bothan.”
Yesu ocwayo cinge to geyo go munyo waco ni, “Ayenyo, bothi!” Gikenyo dhowo pere ocango i hongo no won.

To Yesu waco rigo ni, “Neni! Ikir'iwaci ri nyatoro, to kidhi tirtir bongi jacway ri Were i wi migam, go wokaŋasa in, aka imiy mic ma cowirok ma nyutho dhano je nike ibothi, paka mitere i Or ma Musa ondiko.”
Munyo Yesu odonjo Kapernaum, jasirikale madwoŋ ma Jaroma oromo gine to kwayo kony ni,
“Jadwoŋ, jatic paran ni peco two nyaŋinya i kanindo, kinyal ay, aka nitie i litho madwoŋ swa.”
Yesu owaco ni, “Abino kidho botho go.”
Jalweny odwoko ni, “Be Jadwoŋ, kiripi ran in donjo i ot paran, waci nyaka wac acel to jatic paran both.
Kole abende anitie gi jodongo ma jotelan, aka nitie jolweny ma bende joluwan; k'awaco ri me ni kadhi, to kadho; ri man ni biye, to bino; aka ka aoro jago paran ni, tim gimanyo, to go timo.”
Yesu ouro munyo owinjo gime, omiyo owaco ri ji m'onwaŋo joluwo go ni, “Awaco riwin, fodi akineno kiti yeyo me i nyatoro je i Isiraili.
Poyi win gime! Jomathoth jobino wok yuwok ceŋ kodi yupodho ceŋ to jobedo dhower i Ker ma polo kodi Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo.
To jom'oyido joripo bedo i Ker ibino bolo jo woko i mudho kama jobino ywak'iye to jomwodo laki gin.”
Aka Yesu owaco ri jasirikale ni, “Dok peco, paka iyeyo, gim'iyenyo wotimere rin.” Aka jatic pa jasirikale obothi sawa no won.
Yesu okidho peco pa Petero, aka kenyo or Petero m'obedo min cege oyido ni kanindo kwoŋe oowere.
Gikenyo go ogeyo cingi dheno, to two weyo go; aka oay malo to cako rweyo go.
Munyo piny oyutho, ji jokelo bongi Yesu ji ma jwogi nikwoŋ gin. Yesu oriemo woko jwogi gi wac pere to botho jotwo je.
Go otimo ama ma miyo gima jatuci wac Were Isaya owaco otundi i kare ni, “Go won okwanyo woko nyapo mawan, to tiŋo two mawan.”
Munyo Yesu oneno lwak ji jothoko go, owodho or ni jowopor loka man ma wakawaka.
Jafonji ma Cik moro obino bonge to waco ni, “Jafonji ayikere kidho kodin kam'inocom'iye je.”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Kibwe jonitie gi kero pajo, aka winyin bende jonitie gi od gin, to Wod Dhano ongoye kodi kama go othen'iye wiye.”
Acel kwoŋ jafonjirok pere owaco ni, “Jadwoŋ, weyi kutho akidhi ayiki baba.”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Luwan. Weyi jom'otho wegi jowoyiki jom'otho pajo.”
Munyo Yesu odonjo i ye, jofonjirok pere jokadho gi go.
Piyo piyo no asur madwoŋ obino i wakawaka m'omiyo pi ma tula oyido umo woko ye aka Yesu oyido nindo.
Jofonjirok jokidho bonge to jocewo go ka jowaco ni, “Bothi wan, Rwoth! Wacegin tho!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Wibwok ameno raŋo! Apaka yeyo mewin nok ama!” Gikenyo go oay malo to oro asur kodi wakawaka m'oyido tula kwe; aka gimoro je okwe maber.
Dhano je odhier. Jowaco ni, “Me kiti dhano ma nedi? Kiri asur kodi kitula pa pi je winjo go!”
Munyo Yesu obino iy'adec ma Gadara, yu loka man ma wakawaka, j'ario m'oyido jonigi jwogi aka jowok i ŋungu m'iyik'iye ji, joromo gine. Jono oyido joger swa, am'omiyo ji bin jolworo luwo royo no.
Piyo piyo no jokoko malo ni, “Iyenyo timo aŋo gi wan, Wod Were? Ibino cando wan mafodi ndir m'otire k'otundo?
Cegin kenyo, oyido nitie sidwol mbiji ma cemo.”
Gikenyo to jwogi jokwayo Yesu ni, “K'imito riemo wan woko, ere dhiri wan i sidwol mbiji no.”
Yesu owaco rijo ni, “Kidhi win.” Gikenyo jowok to jodonjo i sidwol mbiji. Sidwol gibe oloro piny wok wi tendere to jomunyere i pi.
Ji m'onwaŋo jokwayo mbiji joringo to jokidho i tindi, to jowaco ri ji ma kenyo gimoro je m'otimere ri jom'onwaŋo jwogi nikwoŋ gin.
Gino omiyo dhano je ma tindi owok kidho romo gi Yesu; aka munyo joneno go, jokwayo go ni woeye iy'adec pajo.
Yesu odonjo i ye to cewere gik yu loka man ma wakawaka, to bino i tindi ma thugin won.
Kenyo, jomoro jokelo rigo dhano m'oyido two nyaŋinya ma jotiŋo wi kitanda. Munyo Yesu oneno kiti yeyo pa jono, owaco ri ŋata two nyaŋinya ni, “Ikir'irembi, wodan; reco perin ocwaki rin.”
Gikenyo jondiko wegi jowaco kendi gin ni, “Ŋati me kole luwo marac kwoŋ Were!”
Yesu oŋeyo gim'oyido joparo to waco ni, “Raŋo ma wiparo gigipiny mareco ameno?
Mene mayot, waco ni, ‘Reco perin ocwaki rin.’ Kosa waco ni, ‘Ay malo iwothi?’
Am'omiyo ere abino nyutho win ni Wod Dhano nigi meni i piny ka ma cwako reco.” Gikenyo go owaco ri dhano m'oyido two nyaŋinya ni, “Ay malo, itiŋ kitanda perin, idok peco.”
Jalo oay malo to dok peco.
Munyo lwak ji m'oyido nikenyo joneno gino, jouro swa, to jopako Were m'omiyo dhano kiti meni ma cal ameno.
Yesu oeye kenyo, aka munyo wotho, oneno jacoki misolo ma nyinge Matayo, obedo piny kama go oyido tiyo iye. Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Luwan.” Matayo oay malo to luwo go.
Munyo Jofarisayo moro joneno gime, jowaco ri jofonjirok pere ni, “Raŋo ma jafonji mewin cemo gi jocoki misolo kodi joreco?”
Yesu owinjo jo to waco ni, “Jom'olama ama jokiyeny jamilerwa, to joma two ayino ama joyenyo.
Kidhi win winiaŋ atoŋa m'omiyo ondiki ni, ‘Ayenyo wor ayino, makiweno cowirok ma le.’ Kole akibino lwoŋo ji m'otire, to joreco ayino.”
Gikenyo joma luwo Yohana Jakibatisa, jobino bongi Yesu gi penji ni, “Raŋo wan kodi Jofarisayo wariyo kec noknok, to jofonjirok perin jokiriy kada dicel?”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Cene wendo ma kalima ma nywomirok bende jobedo gi rem mafodi jamweha nitie gi jo? Ki nyalere! To ndir bino tundo m'ibino kwany'iye woko jamweha bongi jo nyaka to joriyo kec.”
