Aka aŋeyo nike or pere kelo kwo makirum. Am'omiyo gim'awaco je, awaco paka Baba ooran waco.”
Mafodi ndelo ma kalima ma Kadho, k'otundo, Yesu oniaŋ nike hongo pere otundo ma eye i piny wokidhi bongi Bamere. Paka ndir je go oyido omaro jopere i piny ka, omaro jo kiri i gike.
Yesu kodi jofonjirok pere oyido jonitie dhower othieno. Aka jwogi oyido otieko ketho paro ma camo ri Yesu sereko i cuny Yuda wod pa Simon Iskariot.
Yesu oŋeyo ni Bamere otieko ketho gimoro je i cinge; go oŋeyo nike owok bongi Were aka onyo go kidho gik bongi Were.
Riameno Yesu oay dhower, olunyo nanga pere ma woko, to tweyo taulo i piere.
Gikenyo okonjo pi moro i besen, to cako lwoko tiendi jofonjirok pere, to yweyo gi taulo ma piere.
Munyo otundo bongi Simon Petero, Simon openjo go ni, “Rwoth, onyo ikidho lwoko tiendan?”
To Yesu odwoko ni, “Pama fodi ikuya gim'atimo, to ibino ŋeyo rumacen.”
Ana Petero, “Ikibino lwoko tiendan kada mathin.” Yesu odwoko ni, “K'akilwoko tiendin meno kere ikinitie kanyacel kodan.”
Simon Petero odwoko ni, “Rwoth onyo ikir'ilwok nyaka tiendan kende, to lwoki ran kiri cingan gi wiyan bende!”
Yesu owaco ni, “Moro je m'otieko lwoki meno otieko lony kwoŋe gipi aka kiyeny lwoki kendo, mitere wolwoki tiende won kende. Wijoje wilony, kwanyo woko ŋat'acel.”
(Yesu onwaŋo otieko ŋeyo ŋata kidho camo rigo sereko, am'omiyo owaco ni, “Wijoje wilony, kwanyo woko ŋat'acel.”)
Wilwoŋan ni Jafonji kodi Rwoth, aka witire, kole abedo ameno.
Onyo paka an ma bedo Rwoth mewin odoko Jafonji mewin, awok lwoko tiendi win, wibende wiripo lwoko tiendi jowoti win.
Amiyo win ranen, ŋey wibende witim gim'awok timo riwin.
Adieri awaco riwin, ongoye ŋeca maloyo rwoth pere gi dwoŋ, kendo ongoye jamikwenda madwoŋ loyo ŋat'ooro go.
Paka pama onyo wiŋeyo gigipiny me, ka witimo ameno wibino limo silwany!”
Awaco riwin gime pama mafodi k'otimere, aka k'otimere wibino yeyo ni, ‘An ago’.
Adieri awaco riwin, moro je ma jolo nyatoro ma aoro, meno bende jolan aka ŋata jolan, meno bende jolo ŋat'ooran.”
Munyo Yesu otieko waco gime, ocako winjo rem i cunye to luwo kamaler ni, “Adieri awaco riwin, ŋat'acel kwoŋ win kidho camo ran sereko.”
Jofonjirok joŋiyere waŋ, munyo jodhier swa kwoŋ ŋata go oyido waco.
Acel kwoŋ jofonjirok ma Yesu omaro, onwaŋo bende obedo kabuti Yesu.
Simon Petero ogwelo ŋato aka owaco ni, “Penji go ŋata go luwo kwoŋe.”
Gikenyo jafonjirok no ocore cegin to thenere kwoŋ Yesu to penjo ni, “Manago ŋa, Rwoth?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ŋat'abino pilo mugat i acero t'amiyo go meno a ŋata go.” Gikenyo go okwanyo mugat, opilo, to miyo Yuda, wod pa Simon Iskariot.
Tekin Yuda jolo mugat no, Sitan odonjo kwoŋe. Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Kwaki timo gim'iyiko timo!”
Ongoye dhano kwoŋ jom'oyido jonitie dhower no m'oniaŋ gim'omiyo Yesu owaco rigo ameno.
Paka Yuda am'oyido jamigowa, jofonjirok megi joparo ni Yesu owaco rigo ni wokidhi wonyewi gima jomito ma kalima, kosa ni womiy jocandi gimoro.
Tekin Yuda jolo mugat no, owok woko mayot; aka piny oyido otieko yutho.
Munyo Yuda otieko kadho, Yesu owaco ni, “Pama Wod Dhano onyo otieko limo dwoŋ, aka Were bende onyo otieko limo dwoŋ i go.
K'inen Were onyo otieko limo dwoŋ i go, meno Were won gipi ama bino miyo Wode dwoŋ, aka bino timo ameno mayot.
Nyithindho paran, fodi abino bedo ye gi win hongo macek. Wibino rangan, aka bende awaco riwin gim'atieko waco ri Joyuda ni, ‘Wikinyal tundo kama akidh'iye.’
Amiyo win or manyen ni, mare win. Paka atieko maro win apaka bende wiripo mare.
Ka kisi dhano omaro nyawote, meno aka ji je jobino ŋeyo nike wijofonjirok paran.”
Simon Petero openjo ni, “Rwoth, ikidho kune?” Ana Yesu, “Wikinyal luwan kam'akidh'iye gi pama; to rumacen aka wibino luwan.”
Petero openjo ni, “Rwoth, raŋo ma akinyali luwin pama? An ayikere kiri tho rin!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Iyikere adieri tho ran? Adieri awaco rin, kafodi wod gweno k'okoko, ibino kwedirok kwoŋan didek.”
Yesu owaco rijo ni, “Wikiri wirembi kosa wiguti. Yey win Were, aka yeyan win bende.
Kisikin omore i ot pa Baba, aka akidho yiko riwin kabedo. D'akiwaco riwin ama bedi k'obedo adieri.
Aka k'atieko kidho yiko riwin kabedo, abino dwoko t'aomo win, ŋey wibedi kodan kam'anitie iye.
Wiŋeyo kam'akidh'iye kodi royo mere.”
Toma owaco rigo ni, “Rwoth, wakuya kam'ikidh'iye. Wanyalo ŋeyo nedi royo ma tundo korago?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “An aya royo, abedo adieri, kodi kwo; ongoye ŋata bino bongi Baba, ka k'oluwo bongan.”
Owaco rijo ni, “Ka wiŋeyan, meno bende wiŋeyo Baba; aka wok konon onyo wiŋeyo go, aka witieko neno go.”
Filipo owaco rigo ni, “Rwoth, nyuthi wan Were Bawan, meno won kende laromo wan.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Atieko bedo gi win hongo malac ama je, to fodi ikuya an, Filipo? Moro je m'otieko nenan meno otieko neno Baba. To raŋo ma wiwaco ni, ‘Nyuthi wan Were Bawan?’
Wikiyey, ni anitie i Baba aka Baba ni i An? Wac m'atieko waco riwin, kiwoki bongan an won. Baba ma bedo i an, ama timo tic pere.
Yey win nike anitie i Baba, aka Baba nitie i an. Kak'ameno yey win kada ro tic pere won.
Adieri awaco riwin, moro je ma yeyan bino timo tic ma an atimo, ey, bino timo kiri maloyo me, rupiri akidho bongi Baba.
Aka abino timo gimoro je ma winokway i nyingan; ameno aka ŋey dwoŋ pa Baba wonyuthere i Wode.
Ka wikwayo gimoro je i nyingan abino timo.”
“Ka wimaran, wibino mako or paran.
Aka abino kwayo Baba to miyo win Jakony man ma wobedi gi win ndir je,
meno Cuny mar'adieri ma piny kinyal jolo, rupiri kinyal neno go kosa ŋeyo go. To wiŋeyo go, rupiri go nitie gi win aka bino bedo i win.”
“Akibino weyo win paka nyithindho kic; abino dwoko bongi win.
I hongo macek piny kilanenan kendo, to wibino nenan; aka paka akwo, wibende wibino kwo.
Ka ndelo no otundo, wibino ŋeyo nike anitie i Baba, aka winitie i an, paka anitie i win.”
“Moro je ma jolo or paran aka mako, meno a ŋat'omaran. Baba bino maro ŋat'omaran; aka abende abino maro go to anyuthere rigo.”
Yuda (ki Yuda Iskariot) owaco ni, “Rwoth, onyali bedo nedi nike ibino nyuthere riwan to ki ri piny?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Nyatoro je m'omaran bino winjo mikwenda paran. Baba bino maro go aka wabino bino bonge to wabedo bonge.
Nyatoro je ma k'omaran kiwinji wac paran. Aka mikwenda ma witieko winjo k'aparan, to wok bongi Baba m'ooran.”
“Atieko waco riwin gime je ma fodi anitie gi win.
To Jamiy rieko, Cuny Maleŋ ma Baba bino dhiro i nyingan, bino fonjo win gimoro je aka bino poyo win gimoro je m'atieko waco riwin.”
“Siem am'onyo aweyo riwin; amiyo win siem paran; aka akimiy win paka piny miyo. Wikiri wirembi i cuny win; odoko wikiri wibedi gi lworo.
Kole wiwinjo munyo awaco riwin ni, ‘Abino weyo win, t'abino dwoko bongi win.’ Bedi wimaran, di wisangala ni akidho bongi Baba, rupiri go loyan gi dwoŋ.
Ato eno atieko waco riwin pama, mafodi k'otimere, aka k'otimere wibino yeyo.
Onyo akibino medo luwo kodi win mathoth, rupiri jadhum ma piny me bino. Go ongoye gi meni kwoŋan,
to piny je ripo ŋeyo nike amaro Baba; am'omiyo atimo gimoro je ma go ooran. Ere ay win, waeye woko ka.”
“Aŋat'abedo yath vini mar'adieri, aka Baba awon ndelo mere.
Go turo woko jangi yath moro je i an ma kinyak, aka sewila to yiko jangi yath je ma nyak ŋey womedi nyak madit.
Pama onyo witieko lony gi wac m'atieko luwo riwin.
Doŋ win i an, aka abende abino doŋ i win; rupiri jangi yath kinyal nyak ka k'omakere gi yath mere. Wibende wikinyal nyak ka wikidoŋ i an.”
“Aŋat'abedo yath vini mar'adieri, aka win wibedo jangi yath no. Ŋata doŋ i an, aka abende adoŋ i go, bino nyak madit; ato wikinyal timo gimoro je ma bu an.
Nyatoro je ma kidoŋ i an cale jangi yath m'ibolo woko to thwo woko; jangi yen ma cale ameno, icoko kanyacel to ibolo jo i mac, to jowaŋ woko.
Ka widoŋ i an, to wac paran doŋ i win, winyalo kwayo gimoro je ma wiyenyo to ibino miyo win.
Me apaka Baba bino limo dwoŋ: Ka wiwodho gima nyak madit ma nyutho ni wibedo jofonjirok paran.
Amaro win paka Baba omaran; bedi win i mar paran.
Ka wimako or paran, wibino doŋ i mar paran, paka abende amako or pa Baba aka anitie i mar pere.”
“Atieko waco riwin gime ŋey kisangala paran wobedi i win, aka kisangala mewin wobedi m'opoŋ.
Me a gim'aoro win timo: Mare win, paka amaro win.
Ongoye mar ma dhano nyalo bedo gine loyo meno ma go nyalo miyo kwo pere ri merin pere.
Wibedo merin paran, ka witimo gim'aoro win.
Akilwoŋ win ni jotic kendo rupiri jatic kiŋey gima rwoth pere timo. Kucel alwoŋo win ni merin, rupiri atieko waco riwin gimoro je ma awinjo bongi Baba.
Wiŋati wikiyeran, aŋat'ayero win aka adimo win ni wikidhi winyak olemo kweth. Meno aka nyaka Baba bino miyo win gimoro je ma winokway go i nyingan.
Am'omiyo, me a gim'aoro win timo: Mare win”.
“Ka piny dak win, poyi win nike otelo dakan.
Bedi wibedi ji pa piny, di piny omaro win paka ji pere. To ayero win wok i piny me, aka wikibedo apere; am'omiyo piny dak win.
Poyi win gim'atieko waco riwin, ‘Ŋeca ongoye maloyo rwoth pere gi dwoŋ.’ Ka jolwenyo kodan, jobino lwenyo gi win bende.
To jobino timo riwin gime je rupiri wibedo ji paran; aka jokuya ŋat'ooran.
Bedi akibino t'aluwo gi jo di jongoye gi raco; to pama onyo jongoye gi kagoŋirok kwoŋ reco pajo.
Moro je ma dakan meno dak Baba bende.
Bedi fodi akitimo i dier jo tic m'oyido fodi ongoye ŋat'otimo, di jongoye gi raco; to pama onyo jotieko neno gim'atimo aka jodak wan gi Baba.
Gime obedo ameno, aka ŋey gim'ondiki i Cik pajo wotundi i kare ni, ‘Jodakan nono.’ ”
“Ka Jamiy rieko, m'obedo Cuny mar'adieri m'anodhiri riwin, ma loro wok bongi Baba obin, go bino luwo kwoŋan.
Aka win bende, wibino pido ran, rupiri witieko bedo kodan wok i cakirok.”
“Awaco riwin gime aka wikiri wiyengere i yeyo mewin.
Jobino riemo win woko i kitipa pa jom'oyeyo pa Joyuda, aka ndir bino tundo ma moro je ma neko win bino paro nike ka timo ameno meno tiyo ri Were.
Jobino timo gigipiny me riwin rupiri jokuya Baba kosa an.
To awaco riwin gime, ni ka ndir mere otundi, wibino poyo nike atieko luwo riwin kwoŋe.”
“Akutho akiwaco riwin gime rupiri oyido fodi anitie gi win.
Pama onyo akidho bongi ŋat'ooran, to ongoye kwoŋ win kada ŋata penjan ni, ‘Ikidho yukune?’
Ato paka onyo atuco riwin gime, rembo onyo opoŋ i cuny win.
To adieri awaco riwin: Bedo gimaber riwin ka akadho, rupiri ka akikadho, Jamiy rieko kilabino bongi win. To k'atieko kadho, nyaka abino dhiro riwin go.
Aka ka go obino, go bino miyo piny ramirok kwoŋ reco, kodi tiro, kodi thumo banja;
kwoŋ reco, rupiri jok'oyeyan;
kwoŋ tiro, rupiri akidho bongi Baba aka odoko wik'onenan;
kwoŋ thumo banja, rupiri jadhum ma piny ka otiek thumo rigo banja.”
“Anitie kodi gigipiny man awaca riwin, to gunyo ni fodi wikinyal ciro.
To ka Cuny mar'adieri obin, go bino nyutho win adieri je. Ato go kilaluwo gi i wiye won, to bino waco riwin gima go owinjo, odoko go bino nyutho win kwoŋ gima labino rumacen.
Go bino miyan dwoŋ, rupiri go bino waco riwin gimoro je m'okwanyo bongan.
Gimoro je ma Baba nitie gine meno aparan; am'omiyo atieko waco riwin nike go bino waco riwin gimoro je ma go okwanyo bongan.”
“I hongo macek wikibino nenan; to i hongo macek wibino nenan kendo.”

Megi kwoŋ jofonjirok pere jopenjere wegi kendi gin ni, “Gime dwoŋ mere aŋo? Go waco riwan ni, ‘I hongo macek wikibino nenan, to i hongo macek wibino nenan kendo.’ Odoko ni, ‘Rupiri akidho bongi Baba.’ ”
Jomedere gi penjo ni, “Hongo macek me, dwoŋ mere aŋo? Fodi wakiniaŋ gima go luwo kwoŋe?”
Yesu oŋeyo nike jomito penjo go, riameno owaco rijo ni, “Onyo wiwegi wipenjere kwoŋ gim'awok waco ni, ‘I hongo macek wikibino nenan, to i hongo macek wibino nenan kendo?’
Adieri awaco riwin, wibino ywak to wirem, kareno piny sangala. Wibino winjo malith, to winjo malith mewin no bino lokere kisangala.
I hongo ma nywol, dhako winjo litho, rupiri hongo pere ma candirok otundo, to ka otieko nywolo nyathi pere go wiye wil gi litho ca, rupiri go onyo sangala nike nyathi otieko nywole i piny.
Meno apaka bende nitie gi win. Pama onyo wiwinjo litho, t'abino neno win kendo, aka cuny win bino poŋ gi kisangala, kiti kisangala ma moro kinyal mayo win.”
“Ka ndelo no otundo wikibino kwayan gimoro. Adieri awaco riwin, Baba bino miyo win gimoro je ma winokway i nyingan.
Gunyo ni fodi wikikwayo gimoro i nyingan, kway win aka wibino limo, ŋey kisangala mewin wobedi m'opoŋ.”
“Awaco riwin gigipiny me g'agecin, to ndir bino tundo ma akibino oro agecin kendo, t'abino luwo riwin nyatirtir kwoŋ Baba.
Ka ndir no otundo, wibino kwayo go i nyingan; aka akiwaci ni abino kwayo go gimoro riwin,
rupiri Baba won omaro win rupiri wimaran aka wiyeyo nike awok bongi Were.
Awok bongi Baba t'abino i piny, aka onyo aeye i piny agik kendo bongi Baba.”
Gikenyo jofonjirok pere jowaco rigo ni, “Nyaka onyo iluwo nyatirtir, makiweno i agecin.
Nyaka onyo waŋeyo ni iŋeyo gimoro je; ikiyeny moro wopenjin kendo. Me miyo wayeyo nike adieri iwok bongi Were.”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Onyo nyaka wiyeyo?
Ndiri bino tundo, aka otieko kiri tundo ma wijoje wibino kedher'iye to dhano je dok peco pere, aka wibino weyan kendan. To akinitie kendan, rupiri Baba nitie kodan.
Atieko waco riwin gime ŋey wibedi i siem i riwirok kodan. Piny bino miyo wicandere. To bedi win miseni! Atieko loyo candirok ma piny!”
Munyo Yesu otieko waco gime, oŋiyo polo to waco ni, “Baba, hongo otundo. Miy Wodin dwoŋ, aka ŋey Wodin womiyin dwoŋ.
Kole imiyo go meni kwoŋ ji je, ŋey go womiy joma imiyo go je kwo makirum.
Aka me a kwo makirum: Nike ji jowoŋeyin, Were acel mar'adieri, kendo jowoŋey Yesu Kristo m'ioro.
Atieko nyutho dwoŋ perin i piny; atieko timo tic m'imiyan timo.
Onyo pama, Baba, miyan dwoŋ ruwaŋin, dwoŋ m'oyido anitie gine kodin mafodi k'ocwey piny.”
“Atieko miyo nyingin ŋeyirok i waŋ ji m'imiyan wok i piny. Jo oyido jobedo ji perin, to imiyan jo aka jotieko mako wac perin.
Pama onyo joŋeyo ni gimoro je m'imiyan wok bongin,
rupiri amiyo jo mikwenda m'imiyan, aka jojolo; joŋeyo adieri ni awok bongin, aka joyeyo nike iŋat'ioran.”
“Akwayo rijo. Akikway ri piny, to ri ji m'imiyan, rupiri jobedo aperin.
Gimoro je m'anigine meno aperin, odoko gimoro je m'initie gine meno aparan, aka atieko limo dwoŋ kwoŋ jo.
Akibino doŋ i piny ka, to jo fodi jonitie i piny ka, to an onyo abino bongin. Baba Maleŋ, kuri jo maber gi meni ma nyingin m'imiyan, ŋey nyaka jowobedi acel paka wan kodin wabedo acel.
I hongo m'onwaŋo an gi jo, akuro jo maber gi meni ma nyingin m'imiyan. Agwoko jo, aka kwoŋ jo ongoye ŋat'orwenyo, kwanyo woko ŋati m'amien oyido ripo podho rigo ŋey gima ndiko waco wotimere.
Onyo pama abino bongin, aka awaco gigipiny me i piny, ŋey jowolimi kisangala paran to poŋ i cuny jo.
Amiyo jo mikwenda perin aka piny odak jo, rupiri jok'obedo ji pa piny paka an bende akibedo dhano pa piny.
Akikway ni ikwany jo woko i piny, to nike ikuri jo maber kwoŋ meni pa ŋatarac.
Paka akibedo dhano pa piny, jo bende jok'obedo ji pa piny.
Lony cuny jo iy'adieri, rupiri wac perin obedo adieri.
Onyo aoro jo i piny paka cango in bende ioran i piny.
Aka ri bero pajo onyo amiyere rin ŋey jo bende jowonyal miyirok iy'adieri.”
“Akikway ri jome kende, to ri joma bende joyeyan ro mikwenda pa jome.
Akwayo nike joje jowonyal bedo acel, Baba, paka initie i an aka anitie i in. Jo bende jowobedi i wan, ŋey piny woyeyi nike Iŋat'ioran.
Amiyo jo dwoŋ m'imiyan, ŋey jowobedi acel paka wan kodin wabedo acel;
abedi i jo aka ibedi i an, ŋey jowobedi acel kicutho, aka nyaka piny woŋey ni ioran aka ni imaro jo paka imaran.”
“Baba, itieko miyan jo, aka ayenyo jowobedi kodan kam'an'iye, jowonyal neno dwoŋ paran m'imiyan; kole imaran kiri mafodi k'ocwey piny.
Baba M'otire, piny kuya in, t'aŋeyin aka jome joŋeyo nike Iŋat'ioran.
Atieko miyo jo ŋeyin aka abino medo timo ameno, ŋey mar perin m'initie gine ran wobedi i jo, aka awon bende abedi i jo.”
Munyo Yesu ocowo kwayo me, oay kodi jofonjirok pere to jokalo jwom Kidiron. Kenyo oyido nitie ndelo moro, to Yesu kodi jofonjirok pere jodonj'iye.
Yuda, jacami sereko, oyido bende oŋeyo kenyo, rupiri ndir madit Yesu onwaŋo otieko bedo kenyo kodi jofonjirok pere.
Ameno Yuda okidho kenyo kodi kitipa pa jolweny kodi jokur moro ma Ot pa Were ma jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi Jofarisayo jooro. Jotiŋo mac odingili, talin, gi gilweny.
Yesu oyido oŋeyo gimoro je m'onwaŋo kidho timere kwoŋe. Riameno ocore bongi jo to penjo jo ni, “Wirango ŋa?”
Jodwoko ni, “Yesu Janazareth.” Go odwoko ni, “A an me.”
Yuda jacami sereko, onwaŋo ocungo gi jo.
Munyo Yesu owaco rijo ni, “A an me.” Jogik gi yuŋey gin to jooy piny ngulungulu.
Yesu odoko openjo jo ni, “Wirango ŋa won.” Jowaco ni, “Yesu Janazareth.”
Yesu owaco rijo ni, “Atieko waco riwin ni a an me. Ere ka wirangan, weyi win jome jowokadhi.”
Gime otimere ama, ŋey gima ndir no go owaco wotundi i kare ni, “Ongoye kad'acel m'orwenyo kwoŋ joje m'imiyan.”
Simon Petero oyido nitie g'abor; oyuyo to toŋo ŋeca pa jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, to codo woko ithe maracuc. Nyingi ŋeca no oyido Maliko.
Yesu owaco ri Petero ni, “Dwoki abor i ode! Onyo akir'amadhi agwata ma candirok ma Baba omiyan?”
Lwak jolweny kodi jotel pajo kodi Joyuda ma jokur jomako Yesu, jotweyo go,
to jotero go pa Anas m'oyido obedo ba cipa Kaifas, m'oyido jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam i oro no.
Kaifas me ama ndir ca omiyo Joyuda rieko nike oyido ber loyo ka ŋat'acel otho ri ji je.
Petero kodi jafonjirok man joluwo Yesu. Paka jafonjirok man no oyido oŋeyere maber gi jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam no, go bende odonjo gi Yesu i diedipo pa jadwoŋ no.
Petero odoŋ woko to cungo cegin gi dhiot. Jafonjirok man, m'oyido oŋeyere maber gi jadwoŋ no, ogik oluwo gi nyako m'oyido kuro dhiot, to rwako Petero.
Nyako m'oyido kuro dhiot owaco ri Petero ni, “In won me k'acel kwoŋ jofonjirok pa ŋato?” Petero odwoko ni, “Be, akibedo.”
Piny onwaŋo ŋic, riameno jotic kodi jokur jomoko mac aka onwaŋo jocungo jothoko mac no jooyo. Petero bende okidho to cungo gi jo ka oyo mac.
Jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam no openjo Yesu kwoŋ jofonjirok pere kodi fonji pere.
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ndiri je aluwo kamaler ri piny, aka afonjo i kitipa pa jom'oyeyo pa Joyuda kodi i Ot pa Were, kama Joyuda je jocokere iye, aka ongoye gima fodi awaco nyaliŋliŋ.
To raŋo ma wipenjan ameno? Penji win ji ma jotieko winjan. Kole joŋeyo gim'atieko waco rijo.”
Munyo Yesu owaco ama, acel kwoŋ jokur ogoyo lembe g'adhoŋ aka owaco ni, “Inyalo nedi luwo ameno gi jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “K'awaco gimoro marac, nyuthi ginago kamaler. To ka gim'awaco otire, raŋo igoyan?”
Gikenyo Anas odhiro go, ma fodi otwey cinge, pa Kaifas, jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Petero oyido fodi ocungo kenyo oyo mac. Gikenyo jowote jopenjo go ni, “Ibende ikibedo acel kwoŋ jofonjirok pa ŋato?” To Petero kwedere ni, “Be, akibedo acel kwoŋ jo.”
Acel kwoŋ ŋecin pa jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, wat pa ŋata Petero oyido ocodo woko ithe ca, oluwo malo ni, “Akinenin bonge i ndelo kaca?”
Petero odoko okwedere to waco ni, “Be.” Piyo piyo no to wod gweno koko.

Jokwanyo Yesu i ot pa Kaifas to jotero go i cel pa gavana. Piny onwaŋo obedo odikin worwor. Joyuda jok'odonjo i cel rupiri oyido joyenyo jowokure ma jok'obedo makoc i kite ma cik, ŋey jowocami kalima ma Kadho.
Am'omiyo Pilato owok woko romo gi jo to waco ni, “Banja aŋo ma wiosa jame?”
Jodwoko ni, “Di wakikelo go bongin bedi go k'otimo raco moro.”
Pilato owaco ni, “Wiwegi kwany win go aka winen banja pere i kite ma cik mewin.” Joyuda jodwoko ni, “K'oyey wan neko dhano.”
(Me onyutho adieri gima Yesu onwaŋo otieko waco munyo go nyutho kiti tho ma go latho.)
Pilato ogik i cel to lwoŋo Yesu to penjo go ni, “In i Kere pa Joyuda?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Penji me wok bongin iwon, kosa joman ama jowaco rin kwoŋan?”
Pilato odwoko ni, “Iparo nike a Jayuda? Kole ji perin wegi kodi jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ama jokelin bongan. Itimo aŋo?”
Yesu owaco ni, “Ker paran k'obedo ma piny ka; bedi ker paran bedi ma piny ka, di joma luwan jolwenyo ma geŋan ma d'akipodho i cingi Joyuda. To, ker paran ki ma piny ka!”
Gikenyo Pilato openjo go ni, “Kere in ibedo kere?” Yesu odwoko ni, “Eno iwaco ni abedo kere. Kole onywolan ri gime aka abino i piny ka luwo ri adieri. Nyatoro je ma tiyere g'adieri winjo dwondan.”
Pilato openjo ni, “Aka adieri meno aŋo?”
Gikenyo Pilato ogik woko bongi Joyuda to waco rijo ni, “Akinen banja moro kwoŋ go.
To paka winitie gi cik mewin, ndir je agonyo riwin jatwec moro i hongo ma kalima ma Kadho, wimito agony riwin Kere pa Joyuda?”
Jodwoko go gi koko ni, “Be, ki go! Wamito Baraba!” (Baraba oyido jakwo m'ojoko jo.)
Gikenyo Pilato otero Yesu to oro jo cwado go.
Jolweny jodolo thac kudho to joketho i wiye pa junga; joruko rigo kanzu ma rangi ariŋo.
Aka jobino bonge to jowaco ni, “Yindira Kere pa Joyuda!” To jogoyo lembe adhoŋ.
Pilato odoko ogik to waco ri lwak ji no ni, “Neni win ee awodho go bongi win, ma miyo win ŋeyo nike akinyalo nwaŋo gima miyan thumo rigo banja.”
Gikenyo owodho Yesu woko munyo oruko junga ma thac okudho kodi kanzu ma rangi ariŋo. Pilato owaco rijo ni, “Neni win! Me a jalago!”

Munyo jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi ji pajo joneno go, jokoko ni, “Guri go kwoŋ musalaba! Guri go kwoŋ musalaba!” Pilato owaco rijo ni, “Ere kwany win go wiwegi wiguri go kwoŋ musalaba. Akinen gima d'imiyan athum rigo banja.”
Joyuda jodwoko ni, “Wanitie gi cik ma waco ni, go ripo tho, rupiri go owaco ni go Wod Were.”
Munyo Pilato owinjo ameno, lworo omedo mako go.
Go ogik i cel to waco ri Yesu ni, “Iwok kune?” To Yesu k'odwoko go.
Pilato owaco rigo ni, “Ik'oluwi kodan? Ikuya ni anitie gi meni ma gonyin, kosa ma gurin kwoŋ musalaba?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Initie gi meni kwoŋan nyaka rupiri Were am'omiyin. Am'omiyo ŋat'okelan i cingin ama nigi raco madwoŋ mere.”
Munyo Pilato owinjo ameno omedo bedo g'awanya ma gonyo go. To Joyuda jokoko ni, “K'igonyo jal me meno ikimere kodi Kayisar! Nyatoro je ma waco nike go kere meno jakwor pa Kayisar!”
Munyo Pilato owinjo wac me, otero Yesu woko to bedo piny i kom ma thumo banja kam'ilwoŋo ni, “Kalikondi ma Tele.” (I dhohiburu bedo Gabatha).
Oyido cegin sawa aucel m'odieceŋ i ndelo ma yikirok ri kalima ma Kadho. Pilato owaco ri Joyuda ni, “Kere mewin ee!”
Jokoko ni, “Neki go! Guri go kwoŋ musalaba!” Pilato openjo jo ni, “Wimitan agur Kere mewin kwoŋ musalaba?” Jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam jodwoko ni, “Kere ma wanitie gine meno a Kayisar kende!”
Gikenyo Pilato oketho Yesu i cingi jo ni wogur kwoŋ musalaba.
Gikenyo Yesu obedo i cingi jokur.
Go owok woko munyo otiŋo musalaba pere, to tundo i kabedo m'ilwoŋo ni “Kahanga wic”. (I dhohiburu ilwoŋo ni “Golgotha.”)
Joguro go kenyo kwoŋ musalaba; joguro j'ario man bende kwoŋ musalaba, ŋat'acel yuracuc ŋatiman yuracam pere kareno Yesu obedo diere.
Pilato ondiko wac to oro joketho wi musalaba ni, “YESU JANAZARETH, KERE PA JOYUDA.”
Joyuda mathoth josoma gino, rupiri kam'ogur'iye Yesu kwoŋ musalaba oyido cegin gi tindi. Wac no oyido ondiki i Dhohiburu, Dholatin, kodi Dhogrik.
Jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam pa Joyuda jodaŋin ri Pilato ni, “Ikir'indiki ni, ‘Kere pa Joyuda.’ To ndiki ni, ‘Jal me owaco nike, An a Kere pa Joyuda.’ ”
Pilato odwoko ni, “Gim'atieko ndiko meno atieko ndiko.”
Munyo jolweny jotieko guro Yesu kwoŋ musalaba, jokwanyo nangin pere, to jopoko adec aŋwen, kisi jalweny otero adec acel. Jokwanyo kanzu bende m'okwoy ma nanga acel, m'ongoye kam'oriw gine.
To Jolweny jowaco ni, “Wakiri wayeci me; ere weyi wagoy kwir wanen ŋat'oteri.” Gime otimere ma miyo gim'ondiki wotundi i kare ni,
“Wegi jopokere nangin paran
Jogoyo kwir ri kanzu paran.”
Aka jolweny jotimo ameno won.
Joma oyido jocungo cegin gi musalaba pa Yesu obedo yokimere, nyamin yokimere, Maria cipa Kilopas, kodi Maria ma wok Magdala.
Munyo Yesu oneno yokimere kodi jafonjirok ma go omaro jocungo kenyo, owaco ri yokimere ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, wodin eno.”
To waco ri jafonjirok no ni, “Yokin eno.” Aka wok i hongo no jafonjirok no otero dheno peco pere.
Agwata oyido nikenyo m'opoŋ vini mawac; jorwako cangwe i vini no, joketho i jangi yath, to jocwayo rigo i dhoke.
Yesu obilo vini to waco ni “Orumo!” Gikenyo okulo wiye to weyo cunye cot.

Gikenyo Joyuda jokwayo Pilato nike wotur tiendi jom'onek t'ikwanyo jo kwoŋ musalaba, rupiri meno oyido ndelo ma yikirok ri Sabato, aka jok'omito ni delkwoŋ jono wobedi kwoŋ musalaba i ndelo ma Sabato, rupiri Sabato obedo ndelo madwoŋ.
Am'omiyo jolweny jokidho to joturo tiendi ŋati marapena kodi apa ŋatiman m'onwaŋo oneki jo kanyacel gi Yesu.
To munyo jotundo bongi Yesu to joneno nike go otieko tho, jok'oturo tiende.
Acel kwoŋ jolweny oroko ŋeti Yesu gi toŋ, to piyo piyo remo gi pi wok.
Ŋat'oneno gime munyo timere oluwo kwoŋe. Wac pere otire, kendo go oŋeyo ni luwo gir'adieri aka ŋey wibende wiyey.
Gime otim nike randik wotundi i kare ni, “Ongoye coko pere kad'acel ma bino tur.”
Aka randik man waco ni, “Ji jobino ŋiyo ŋata jocwowo.”

Rumacen, Yozefu, ma Arimatheya, okwayo Pilato ni go wokwany delkwoŋ Yesu. (Yozefu oyido jafonjirok pa Yesu manyaliŋliŋ, rupiri go oyido lworo Joyuda.) Pilato owaco rigo ni go nyalo kwanyo delkwoŋ Yesu; gikenyo Yozefu okidho to kwanyo delkwoŋ Yesu.
Nikodemo bende, ma ndir moro okidho neno Yesu wor, obino, kareno otiŋo gima ŋwe kur cegin kilo piero adek, m'oruw kodi pigi yen man.
Jario me jokwanyo delkwoŋ Yesu to jotweyo i sukin matar gi mo maŋwe kur me i kite ma yikirok pa Joyuda.
Kam'ogur'iye Yesu kwoŋ musalaba oyido nitie ndelo ma di kaliel m'oyido fodi k'oyik'iye nyatoro.
Paka ndelo oyido obedo ma telo Sabato pa Joyuda, aka kaliel onwaŋo nicegin, joyiko Yesu kenyo.
I Sabiti odikin worwor, mafodi piny riprip, Maria ma wok Magdala okidho kaliel to neno ni oŋil woko tele ma dhok kaliel.
Go oringo to kidho bongi Simon Petero kodi jafonjirok man ma Yesu omaro, to waco rijo ni, “Jokwanyo woko Rwoth i kaliel aka wakuya kam'oketh'iye go!”
Gikenyo Petero gi jafonjirok man no joay to jokidho i kaliel.
Jario no oyido joringo, to jafonjirok man no odwire oyombo Petero to telo tundo i kaliel.
Go oluŋere to neno sukin ama odoŋ, to k'odonjo i iye.
Simon Petero oluwo go cen to donjo i kaliel, to neno sukin no kenyo,
kodi nanga m'onwaŋo otwey gine wiy Yesu m'odole gicen kakende.
Gikenyo, jafonjirok, m'otelo tundo i kaliel bende odonjo to neno to yeyo.
(Jono fodi oyido jok'oniaŋ odoco kwoŋ randik ma waco ni go ripo cerino).
Gikenyo jofonjirok no jodok peco pajo.
Maria ocungo munyo ywak dho thengi kaliel;
gikenyo go oneno jomalaika ario kenyo, i nangin matar, ma jobedo piny kam'onwaŋo oketh'iye delkwoŋ Yesu, acel yuwiye, man yu tiende.
Jopenjo go ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, iywaki aŋo?” Go odwoko ni, “Jokwanyo Rwoth paran, aka akuya kama joketh'iye go!”
Munyo go otieko waco ameno, go owire to neno Yesu ocungo kenyo; to k'oŋeyo ni manago Yesu.
Yesu openjo go ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, raŋo iywaki. Raŋo ŋa?” Paka dheno oparo ni meno won ndelo, owaco rigo ni, “K'iŋati ikwanyo go, jadwoŋ, waci ran kam'iketh'iye go akidhi aom go.”
Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Maria!” Go owire yubonge to waco gi Dhohiburu ni, “Raboni!” (Dwoŋ mere ni Jafonji.)
Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Ikir'imakan rupiri fodi akigiki bongi Baba. To kidhi bongi wutmera iwaci rijo ni akidho malo bongi Baba ma Bawin, Were paran ma Were mewin.”
Gikenyo Maria Magadalina owaco ri jofonjirok pere ni, “Atieko neno Rwoth.” To liesa rijo gima Yesu owaco rigo je.
Munyo piny oumere i ndelo ma Sabiti no, jofonjirok oyido jocokere kanyacel kareno jocego thigin, rupiri oyido jolworo Joyuda. Gikenyo Yesu obino to cungo i dier jo to waco ni, “Siem wobedi kodi win.”
Munyo go otieko waco ameno, onyutho jo cinge gi ŋete. Jofonjirok kisangala opoŋ i cuny jo munyo joneno Rwoth.
Gikenyo Yesu odoko owaco rijo ni, “Siem wobedi kodi win. Paka Baba ooran abende aoro win.”
Go owaco gime to kudho jo gi luya to waco ni, “Limi win Cuny Maleŋ.
Reco pa ji ma winocwaki rijo, ibino cwako rijo; to reco pa ji ma wik'ocwaki rijo bende k'ocwaki rijo.”
Acel kwoŋ jofonjirok, Toma (m'ilwoŋo ni Rut) onwaŋo ongoye bongi jo munyo Yesu obino.
To jofonjirok wadi jowaci rigo ni, “Watieko neno Rwoth!” Toma owaco rijo ni, “K'akineno waŋpoyo ma musumal oweyo i cinge, t'arwako lwetan kama musumal odonj'iye i ŋete, ak'oyey.”
Munyo ndelo abirio okadho, jofonjirok oyido jonitie kanyacel kendo, aka Toma oyido nigi jo. Thigin je oyido ocegi, to Yesu obino to cungo i dier jo to waco rijo ni, “Siem wobedi gi win.”
Gikenyo go owaco ri Toma ni, “Rwaki lwetin ka, aka neni cingan; odoko keli cingin irwaki i ŋetan bende. Ikir'ibedi gi kiganagana, to bedi gi yeyo ayin!”
Toma odwoko ni, “Rwoth paran kendo Were paran!”
Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Onyo iyeyo rupiri itieko nenan? Josilwany a joma yeyo kada mafodi jok'onenan!”
Yesu otimo ranyuth man kweth ruwaŋ jofonjirok pere ma k'ondiki i kitawo me.
To me ondiki aka ŋey wiyey ni Yesu obedo Kristo, Wod Were, aka ni yeyo gime winyal limo kwo makirum i nyingi go!
Rumacen, Yesu onyuthere kendo ri jofonjirok pere dho wakawaka ma Tiberia. Me apaka go otimo.
Simon Petero, Toma (m'ilwoŋo ni Rut), Nathanel (ma wok Kana i Galili) wot Zebedayo kodi jofonjirok pa Yesu man jario je oyido jo ni kanyacel.
Simon Petero owaco rijo ni, “Akidho kitoga.” Jowaco ni, “Wabino kidho kodin.” Ameno jodonjo i ye, to wor no gipi jok'omako gimoro.
Munyo ceŋ gulo, Yesu ocungo dho thengi pi, to jofonjirok jok'oŋeyo ni manago Yesu.
Gikenyo go owaco rijo ni, “Yac me, witieko mako ye gimoro?” Jodwoko ni, “Ongoye gimoro.”
Go owaco rijo ni, “Bol win bwo mewin yuthengi ye maracuc aka wibino mako gimoro.” Gikenyo jobolo bwo pajo, to jok'onyalo wodho ro thotho pa rec.
Jafonjirok ma Yesu omaro owaco ni, “manago Rwoth!” Munyo Simon Petero owinjo ni manago Rwoth, otweyere gi nanga pere ma woko (rupiri oyido olunyo woko nangin pere), to por i pi.
Jofonjirok m'odoŋ jobino dho geŋin gi ye to joywayo bwo ma rec opoŋ'iye, rupiri onwaŋo jokini bor gi geŋin kam'othwo, to oyido romo cegin mita miya acel kende.
Munyo jotundo wi geŋin joneno cuk mac m'okur kenyo gi rec i wiye kodi mugat.
Gikenyo Yesu owaco ri jofonjirok pere ni, “Keli win rec moro ma witieko mako.”
Simon Petero odonjo i ye to kelo bwo wi geŋin, m'opoŋ'iye rec madongo miya adek gi piero abic g'adek; to kad'oyido rec dit ameno, je bwo k'oyec.
Yesu owaco rijo ni, “Biye cemi win.” Ongoye kada ŋat'acel kwoŋ jofonjirok m'obedo gi miseni ma penjo go ni, “In iŋa?” Ato oyido joŋeyo ni manago Rwoth.
Gikenyo Yesu okidho, okwanyo mugat no, to miyo jo, to timo ameno bende gi rec.
Me oyido hongo mar'adek ma Yesu onyuther'iye ri jofonjirok pere munyo otieko cerino kwoŋ jom'otho.
Munyo jotieko cemo, Yesu openjo Simon Petero ni, “Simon, wod Yona, imaran loyo jome?” Go odwoko ni, “Ey Rwoth, iŋeyo nike amarin.” Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Pidhi nyithindhi rombo paran.”
Ma dirio Yesu odoko openjo go ni, “Simon wod Yohana, imaran?” Go odwoko ni, “Ey Rwoth, iŋeyo paka amarin.” Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Kway rombo paran.”

Ma didek Yesu odoko omedo penjo go ni, “Simon wod Yohana, imaran?” Gikenyo Petero cunye oramo, rupiri Yesu openjo go ma didek ni, “Imaran?” Ameno odwoko go ni, “Rwoth, kole iŋeyo gimoro je, iŋeyo paka amarin.” Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Pidhi rombo paran.
Adieri awaco rin, munyo fodi ithin onwaŋo iwon irukere t'ikidho kam'iyenyo je; to ka iti ibino rieyo cingin ŋatiman ama worukin to terin kama d'ikimito kidh'iye.”
(Ameno Yesu owaco ama ma nyutho paka Petero d'otho ma miyo Were dwoŋ.) Gikenyo Yesu owaco rigo ni, “Luwan.”
Petero owire to neno jafonjirok man luwo jo ma Yesu omaro, ma ndir ca othenere bongi Yesu dhower to penjo ni, “Rwoth, ŋata kidho camo rin sereko?”
Munyo Petero oneno go, openjo Yesu ni, “Rwoth, to ŋatin?”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “K'amito ni ŋato wokwo cuka anodwoki, meno mako kwoŋin? Luwan ayino!”
Gikenyo wac onyay i dier jofonjirok pa Yesu nike jafonjirok no k'otho. To Yesu k'owaco nike go k'otho; go owaco nike, “K'amito ni go wokwo cuka anodwoki, meno mako kwoŋin?”
Go a jafonjirok ma luwo kwoŋ gigipiny me, aka ama ondiko gigipiny me; aka waŋeyo nike gima go ondiko obedo adieri.
Onyo, nitie gigipiny man kweth ma Yesu otimo. Bedi ndiki je acel acele, aparo nike piny gipi di k'onyalo tiŋo kitawin mere.
cuka ndelo m'oter'iye go i polo. Aka gi meni pa Cuny Maleŋ, omiyo jomoor pere ma go oyero or.
Go onyutho jo i yo madit paka go onyo kwo, munyo otieko candirok to tho; aka i hongo ma ndelo piero aŋwen gipi obedo munyo menyere rijo aka luwo rijo kwoŋ Ker pa Were;
aka go omiyo jo or munyo nitie dhower gi jo ni, “Wikiri wieye Yerusalem; to kuri win gikenyo mic ma Were Baba ociko ma witieko winjo.
Ato batisimo pa Yohana obedo gi pi, to wibino limo batisimo gi Cuny Maleŋ mafodi ndelo k'okadho mathoth.”
Aka jom'oyido jobino kenyo jopenjo go ni; “Rwoth, imito dwoko dhum i cingi Isiraili pama?”
Yesu owaco rijo ni, k'obedo tic mewin ŋeyo ndir kodi hongo ma Baba won oyiko gi meni pere;
to wibino nwaŋo meni ka Cuny Maleŋ otieko loro kwoŋ win; aka wibino bedo jokony ma ridho wac paran i Yerusalem kodi i Yuda gipi, i Samaria, kodi i witum je ma piny.
Munyo otieko waco ameno, joneno paka otiŋ go t'itero malo, cuka pondeponde oumo go ma jokinen.
Aka munyo fodi joyaro waŋ gin malo munyo joneno paka go kadho, piyo piyo j'ario ma joruko nangin matar jocungo kabuti jo.
Jopenjo ni, “Win ji ma Galili, raŋo ma wicungo wiŋiyo polo? Kole Yesu me, ma okwany bongi win t'itero i polo, bino dwoko i piny ka i kite no won, paka wiwok neno go munyo kadho i polo.”
Gikenyo jomoor jogik Yerusalem munyo jowok wi got Oliv, ma romo cegin adec mayiro wok i tindi.

Jodonjo Yerusalem aka joidho malo i ot m'onwaŋo jobed'iye; Petero, Yohana, Yakobo kodi Andereya, Filipo gi Toma, Batholomayo kodi Matayo, Yakobo wod pa Alfayo, Simon ma jalweny ri piny pere, kodi Yuda wod pa Yakobo.
Joje jocokere kanyacel i bwora to jokwayo adhik, kanyacel gi mon, kodi Maria min Yesu, kodi wutmin Yesu.
Munyo ndelo okadho manok, romo pa jom'oyeyo obedo (ma romo ji cegin miya acel), to Petero cungo to luwo.
Owaco ni, “Wutmera, ndiko oyido ripo wotundi i kare kwoŋ gima Cuny Maleŋ, munyo luwo gi dhok Daudi, owaco con kwoŋ Yuda m'otelo ji munyo jobino mako Yesu.
Yuda oyido jakweth mawan, rupiri oyido oyer go bende i tic mawan.”
Ji je ma jobedo Yerusalem jowinjo gino, aka i dhodhok pajo wegi jolwoŋo ndelo no ni Akeldama, dwoŋ mere ni, “Ndelo ma Remo.”)
“Weyi ot pere wodoŋ nono, aka moro wokiri wobed'iye.”
Kendo ni,
“Weyi ŋatiman woter kabedo pere.”
wok i ndir ma Yohana oyido miyo batisimo tundo ceŋ m'okwany'iye go bongi wan t'itero go malo, ama ripo bedo jakony m'oneno gi wan cerino pere.
Gikenyo to joketho j'ario ruwaŋ jo: Yozefu m'ilwoŋo ni Barsaba, m'ocwok nyinge ni Yusito, kodi Matias.
Aka jokwayo Were munyo jowaco ni, “Rwoth, iŋeyo cuny dhano je, nyuthi wan acel kwoŋ jario me, ŋat'iyero
ni woter tic paka acel kwoŋ jomoor, i kabedo ma Yuda oweyo to kidho kapere.”
To jobolo rijo kwir, to Matias loyo; t'iketho go i kitipa pa jomoor apar g'acel.
Gikenyo derino owok i polo m'ocalo koyo ma kudho, to poŋo ot gipi m'onwaŋo jontie iye.
Aka joneno gima cale lew mac m'otiakere; dhano je lew mac no ogeyo.
Cuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ jo to jocako luwo dhodhok m'opokere, paka Cuny Maleŋ omiyo jo luwo.
I Yerusalem onwaŋo nitie Joyuda ma jomaro Were ma jowok i thenge je ma piny.
Munyo jowinjo derino no, lwak ji jocokere kanyacel; joje jouro, rupiri kisi dhano owinjo joluwo dhodhok pere won.
I dhier kodi i uro jopenjo ni, “Ji ma joluwo ni je ki Jogalili?
To nedi ma kisi dhano je kwoŋ wan winjo joluwo dhodhok mawan won?
Jomegi kwoŋ wan jowok Pathia, Mediya kodi Elam; Mesopotamia, Yuda kodi Kapadosia; Ponto kodi Asia,
Firigiya gi Pamfilia, Misir kodi adec ma Libia cegin gi Sireno; jomegi kwoŋ wan jowok Roma;
Joyuda kodi joma bu Were ma jowire i dini pa Joyuda, jomegi kwoŋ wan jowok Kirete kodi piny pa Jowarabu ma wajoje wawinjo joluwo dhodhok mawan kwoŋ gigipiny madongo ma Were otimo.”
I dhier madwoŋ gi uro, jomena penjirok wegi kendi gin ni, “Gime dwoŋ mere aŋo?”
To joman jonyero jom'oyeyo, munyo jowaco ni, “Ji me jomer ayin!”
Petero ocungo gi jomoor apar g'acel to luwo ri lwak ji gi derino madwoŋ ama: Ji ma Yuda jowotan gi wijoje ma wibedo Yerusalem, cik win ithi win awaci riwin thenethene ma gime.
Jome jok'omer gi vini paka wiparo; pama nyaka sawa adek won m'odikin.
Kucel, me a gima jatuci wac Were Yowel cango oluwo kwoŋe.
Abino konjo Cuny paran kwoŋ ji je;
wot win gi nyigi win jobino tuco wac Were,
nyithindho mewin mayac ma soye jobino limo menyirok,
aka jom'oti i dier win jobino leko lek.
Ey, kwoŋ ŋecin paran, cwo gi mon, kodi ŋecin
abino konjo Cuny paran i ndelo no,
aka jobino tuco wac paran.
Abino timo gir'aura i hongo malo
kodi ranyuth m'omore i piny,
remo kodi mac kodi yiro m'otwere bino bedo;
Waŋceŋ bino lokere macol
aka dwe bino bokere pa remo,
mafodi ndelo pa Rwoth madwoŋ m'oasere k'otundo.
Aka bino bedo ni nyatoro je m'olwoŋ nyingi Rwoth bino both.

Win Joisiraili, ciki win ithi win wiwinji gime: Yesu Janazareth onwaŋo obedo dhano ma Were oyero ni wotim gir'aura, kodi gidhier kodi ranyuth m'omore i dier win; aka wiwegi wiŋeyo gime, rupiri otimere bongi win won ka.
Were, i mito pere gi rieko pere, onwaŋo otieko yiko con nike bino ketho Yesu me i cingi win; am'omiyo wineko go munyo wiketho ji mareco to joguro go kwoŋ musalaba.
To Were ocerino go kwoŋ jom'otho; okwanyo go woko i litho ma tho, rupiri onwaŋo kinyalere nike tho wotwey go.
Kole Daudi cango oluwo kwoŋe ama:
Aneno Rwoth i waŋan hongo je,
rupiri go nitie yuracuc paran ŋey akir'ayengere.
Am'omiyo cunyan osangala,
aka kisangala opoŋ i wac paran.
Aka delkwoŋan bende bino bedo gi geno madwoŋ.
Rupiri ikibino weyo cunyan i piny pa jom'otho.
Odoko ikibino weyo Maleŋ perin wotopi woko.
Itieko nyuthan royo ma kwo,
aka bedo perin kabutan bino poŋo kisangala i cunyan.
Wutmera, weyi awaci riwin kamaler kwoŋ kwari wan Daudi, m'otho t'iyiko, aka kaliel pere fodi nigi wan kiri konon me.
Go oyido obedo jatuci wac Were, aka oŋeyo cikirok ma Were otimo gine: Were okwoŋere nike bino ketho nyakwar Daudi acel wolunji kom ma dhum pere.
Daudi oneno gima Were oyido kidho timo, am'omiyo oluwo kwoŋ cerino pa Kristo munyo waco ni,
K'owey go i piny pa jom'otho,
aka delkwoŋe k'otopi.
Were ocerino Yesu me kwoŋ jom'otho; aka wajoje wabedo jokony i wac me.
Otiek tiŋo go malo yuracuc pa Were aka onyo walimo bonge Cuny Maleŋ paka Bamere ociko; aka gim'onyo pama wineno aka odoko wiwinjo me, obedo mic pere ma go okonjo kwoŋ wan.
Kole Daudi won k'okidho malo i polo, to owaco ni,
Rwoth owaco ri Rwoth paran ni,
Bedi yuracuc paran
cuka anoloki jokwor perin
paka kasik m'ijeng'iye tiendin.
Am'omiyo ji ma Isiraili, joripo ŋeyo adieri ni manago Yesu, ma wiguro kwoŋ musalaba, ama Were oloko Rwoth kodi Kristo!
Munyo jowinjo gime, cuny jo oramo jo swa, to jopenjo Petero kodi jomoor man ni, “Wutmin wan wanotim aŋo?”
Petero odwoko jo ni, “Ŋuti win reco mewin, obatisa win i nyingi Yesu Kristo, wocwaki reco mewin, aka wibino limo mic ma Cuny Maleŋ.
Kole cikirok me obedo riwin kodi nyithindho mewin kodi ji je ma jonitie bor, ji je ma Were lwoŋo bonge.”
Petero oluwo rijo aka oruma jo gi wac man madit munyo medo jo miseni ni, “Bothi win kwoŋ ndir ma pama m'opoŋ gi reco me!”
Ameno ji mathoth ma joyeyo mikwenda pere obatisa jo; ji ma romo gana adek jomedere i kweth pajo i ndelo no.
Aka jocwire kwoŋ fonji pa jomoor munyo jobedo i kweth acel, i cemo kodi i kwayo.
Lworo opoŋ i cuny kisi dhano, aka jomoor jotimo gir'aura kodi ranyuth madit.
Jom'oyeyo je jobedo kanyacel aka jotimo gimoro je kanyacel.
Aka jotana gigipiny kodi lim pajo, to jopoko gim'owok'iye i dier gin paka kisi dhano oyenyo.
Bin kisi ndelo jokidho romo kanyacel i Ot pa Were, odoko jocemo kanyacel i udi pajo gi kisangala kodi cuny jo maber,
munyo jopako Were aka ji je oyido jofoyo jo. Ameno Rwoth omedo welo pajo gi jom'oyido ibotho jo kisi ndelo.
Ndelo moro Petero kodi Yohana oyido jokidho i Ot pa Were sawa abuŋwen m'othieno, i hongo ma kwayo.
Kenyo, dho Waŋkac Maŋon, paka oyido ilwoŋo, oyido nitie dhano m'oŋol wok i nywolirok pere. Ndiri je bin itiŋo atiŋa ŋato aka ikelo go dho waŋkac me kwayo pesa bongi joma donjo i Ot pa Were.
Munyo go oneno Petero kodi Yohana jodonjo, okwayo jo ni jowomiy ye go gimoro.
Joŋiyo go nyatirtir to Petero waco ni, “Ŋiy wan!”
Gikenyo go oŋiyo jo, munyo geno limo gimoro bongi jo.
Aka Petero owaco rigo ni, “Angoye gi zahabu kosa feza, t'abino miyin gima an gine. I nyingi Yesu Kristo ma Nazareth, aorin ni woth!”
Gikenyo Petero omako cinge maracuc to konyo go to ay malo. Piyo piyo no olenge tiendi jalo kodi odondo je jobedo m'ocwiny;
go opor malo, ocungo gi tiende to cako kisedela gi woth. Gikenyo go odonjo i Ot pa Were gi jo, munyo wotho aka por malo gi pako Were.
Lwak ji je joneno go munyo wotho aka pako Were.
Aka munyo joŋeyo ni meno jakwac ma yado bedo dho Waŋkac Maŋon ma Ot pa Were, jouro swa aka jobedo gi dhier kwoŋ gim'otimere rigo.
Munyo fodi jalo ocwire kwoŋ Petero gi Yohana, ji je jodhier aka joringo bongi jo I Kalikondi pa Solomon, paka oyido ilwoŋo.

Munyo Petero oneno gime, owaco rijo ni, “Ji ma Isiraili raŋo ma wiuro gime, kosa raŋo ma wicomo waŋ win kwoŋ wan? Wiparo nike gi meni mawan won, kosa ni rupiri waŋeyo lamo Were maber am'omiyo ŋatin wotho?
Kole Were pa Abraham, Isaka, kodi Yakobo, Were pa kwarere mawan, am'omiyo Yesu Jatic pere dwoŋ. Wibolo go i cingi jodhum aka wikwedo go ruwaŋ Pilato, kada munyo Pilato onwaŋo otieko ridho gunyo go.
Kole go oyido leŋ aka ber, to wikwero go, kucel wikwayo Pilato ni wogonyi riwin janek ayino.
Wineko Won kwo, to Were cerino go kwoŋ jom'otho; aka wabedo jokony ma joneno gime.
Kole nyingi Yesu kodi yeyo kwoŋ nyinge am'omiyo jal ma wiŋeyo me kilam ama ruwaŋ wijoje.”
“Onyo pama, wutmera, aŋeyo nike gima win kodi jotel mewin witimo ri Yesu obedo gima witimo ma wikuya.
Me a gima Were cango owaco gi i dhok jotuci wac pere ni Kristo ripo candere; aka am'omiyo gino otimere adieri i royo me.
Am'omiyo, ŋuti win reco mewin wigik bongi Were, ŋey reco mewin worey woko, aka ŋey hongo ma kelo lothi manyen wok bongi Rwoth wobin riwin,
aka go wodhiri riwin Kristo, ma go otieko yero riwin, m'obedo Yesu.
Go ripo doŋ i polo cuka ndir otundi ma Were odwok'iye gigipiny je i kare, paka Were owaco gi i dhok jotuci wac pere ma cango con.
Kole Musa cango owaco ni, ‘Rwoth Were mewin bino dhiro riwin jatuci wac Were ma bino wok kwoŋ ji mewin won paka odhiran bongi win ama. Wiripo ciko ithi win wiwinji gimoro je ma go owaci riwin.
Nyatoro je ma k'owinji wac pere, ibino kwanyo go woko kwoŋ ji pa Were to ireyo go woko.’
To jotuci wac Were je wok kwoŋ Samwiri kodi jom'oluwo ŋeye joje ma jobedo gi mikwenda, bende joluwo kwoŋ ndelo agono.
Aka wibedo jolunji gima jotuci wac Were cango joluwo kwoŋe i cikirok ma Were otimo gi kwarere mewin, munyo owaco ri Abraham ni, Abino miyo ji je ma piny silwany wok kwoŋ kodhi perin.
Am'omiyo Were oyero aka okutho open dhiro jatic pere bongi win won, womiy win silwany munyo wiro wijoje ni wieye woko i yo mewin mareco.”
Munyo Petero gi Yohana oyido fodi joluwo ri ji, jocway ri Were i wi migam, jotel pa jokur ma Ot pa Were, kodi Josadukayo jobino to jobwoko jo.
Nge oyido omako jo ni rupiri jomoor ario no oyido jofonjo ji nike otiek cerino Yesu kwoŋ jom'otho, ma nyutho nike jom'otho jobino cerino.
Ameno jomako jo to jobolo jo i od twec cuka yawere mere, paka piny oyido otieko yutho.
To ji mathoth ma jowinjo mikwenda no joyeyo rigin, aka welo pa cwo omedere otundo cegin gana abic.
Yawere mere jodhum kodi jotel pa Joyuda, kodi Jondiko jocokere Yerusalem,
kodi Anas, jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, kodi Kaifas, kodi Yohana, kodi Alekizanda, kodi ji je m'oyido jokweth ma nono pa jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Jomiyo jomoor no cungo i dier jo aka jopenjo jo ni, “Witimo gime nedi?”
Gikenyo munyo Cuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ Petero, odwoko ni, “Jodhum kodi jotel pa ji,
k'inen konon wipenjo wan kwoŋ bero m'otimi ri ŋat'oŋol kodi paka obedo maber,
ber wijoje wiŋeyi, aka ji je ma Isiraili jowoŋey, nike ŋati me cungo ruwaŋ win m'olama adieri ro meni pa Yesu Kristo Janazareth ma wiguro kwoŋ musalaba aka Were ocerino go kwoŋ jom'otho.
Yesu won a ŋata ndiko luwo kwoŋe ama.”
“Kole tele won ma jogeto jocayo ni bukony,
am'olokere tele ma thielo kindi ot.”
“Aka both kinwaŋere bongi ŋatiman, rupiri ongoye nyingi nyatoro man je i piny gipi, ma Were omiyo ji, ma waripo nwaŋ'iye both.”
Jokweth ma pido jodhier munyo joneno miseni pa Petero gi Yohana, gi ŋeyo nike me ji moro ma jok'ofonjere kada. Gikenyo joniaŋ nike jome yado jobedo bongi Yesu.
To onwaŋo ongoye gimoro ma di jonyal waco, rupiri joneno jal m'obothi no ocungo kenyo gi Petero gi Yohana.
Am'omiyo jowaco ri Petero gin ni jowoeye i kapido, to jocako kikaŋasa wac wegi kendi gin.
Jopenjere ni, “Wanotim aŋo gi jome? Dhano je ma Yerusalem oŋeyo nike jome jotieko timo gir'aura madwoŋ me, aka wakinyali kwero.
To ma geŋo wac me medo nyay i dier ji, weyi wawaci rijo nike kiri jowomedi luwo kendo ri nyatoro je i nyingi ŋato.”
Gikenyo jolwoŋo jo dwoko aka jociko jo teltel ni kiri jowofonji i nyingi Yesu.
To Petero gi Yohana jodwoko ni, “Wiwegi thum win gim'otire atima ruwaŋ Were, winjo win, kosa winjo Were;
rupiri wakinyali weyo luwo kwoŋ gima wawegi watieko neno gi winjo.”
Jopido jomedo bwoko jo gi meni swa, to joweyo jo jokadho. Jok'oneno yo ma di jomiyo gine jario no gir'acula, rupiri ji je oyido jopako Were kwoŋ gim'otimere.
Aka ŋata gir'aura ma both otimere kwoŋe no oyido kalo oro piero aŋwen.
Tekin itieko weyo jo, Petero gi Yohana jogik i kweth pajo to jowaco ri jowot gin gima jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotel pa ji jowaco.
Munyo jowinjo gime, jo je joriwere kanyacel i kwayo Were ni, Rwoth ma Jacwec ma polo gi piny, kodi wakawaka kodi gima nitie iye je!
Cango iluwo i Cuny Maleŋ gi dhok kwari wan Daudi, jatic perin ni,
Raŋo ma Jopath jonigi keme?
Kerere ma piny joyikere,
aka jodhum joromo kanyacel,
kwinyo Rwoth kodi Kristo (m'owir gi mo) pere!
Jocokere ma timo gimoro je ma in, gi meni perin kodi mito perin, oyido itieko yiko ni d'otimere.
Aka pama, Rwoth, neni paka jobwoko wan, am'omiyo miy jotic perin meni ma tito mikwenda perin gi miseni.
Riey cingin ma botho ji, itimi ranyuth ma gir'aura kodi gidhier i nyingi jatic perin maleŋ, Yesu.
Munyo jotieko kwayo, kam'onwaŋo jontie iye oyengere. Cuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ jo to jocako luwo wac pa Were gi miseni.
Jomoor jothielo wac ma cerino pa Rwoth Yesu gi meni m'oasere, aka joje jonwaŋo nema madwoŋ.
Ongoye moro i kitipa pajo m'oyido cando gimoro, rupiri jom'onwaŋo jonitie gi lowo kosa udi jotana to jokelo pesa mere
to joketho i cingi jomoor. Meno ama bin ipoko dhano je man kitipa m'onwaŋo cando gimoro.
Gikenyo Yozefu, Jalevi m'onywol Sipuro, ma jomoor jolwoŋo ni Barinaba (dwoŋ mere ni, Ŋata miyo miseni.)
Otana lowo pere, to kelo pesa mere to miyo jomoor.
To onwaŋo nitie nyatoro m'ilwoŋo ni Anania, gi cege ma nyinge Safira, ma jotana lowo pajo moro.
To go okano pesa moro ma konyirok, aka cege oŋeyo gime, to m'odoŋ ama go otero ri jomoor.
Petero owaco rigo ni, “Anania, raŋo m'iyeyo Sitan odonjo i cunyin to miyin itwodo ri Cuny Maleŋ to ikano adec ma pesa m'ilimo i lowo perin?
Mafodi ikitana lowo no, onwaŋo k'obedo aperin? Aka munyo itieko kitana, pesa mere oyido k'obedo aperin? To raŋo ma iridho i cunyin nike itimi gima pameno? Ikiwondo ji to iwondo Were won!”
Tekin Anania winjo gime, ogore piny to tho, aka dhano je m'owinjo gime, lworo opoŋ kwoŋe.
Yac moro jodonjo, jotweyo go gi suka to jotero go to joyiko go.
Munyo hongo okadho ma romo sawa adek, cege bende odonjo ma k'oŋeyo gim'oyido nende otimere.
Petero openjo go ni, “Waci ran, me oyido a gima in gi cworin wilimo gipi i gimewin?” Go odwoko ni, “Ey, meno won a welo mere.”
Gikenyo Petero owaco rigo ni, “Raŋo ma in kodi cworin wiyiko paro ma temo Cuny Maleŋ? Neni! Joma jowok yiko cworin eno jokonjere dhiot, aka jobino tiŋin jowoterin woko bende!”
Gikenyo won to dheno podho piny dho ka tiendi Petero to tho. Yac ca jodwoko, aka munyo jonwaŋo go otho, jotiŋo go bende to jokidho yiko go kabuti cwore.
Kitipa pa jom'oyeyo gibe gi joman ma jowinjo gino lworo madwoŋ opoŋ kwoŋ jo.
Jomoor jotimo ranyuth ma gir'aura madit i dier ji. Jom'oyeyo bin joromo i kalikondi pa Solomon.
Ongoye ŋatimoro man ma k'obedo jakweth pajo m'otemo riwirok gi jo, kada ji oyido jomiyo jo dwoŋ.
Kad'ameno welo pa cwo kodi mon ma jomedo yeyo Rwoth oidho malo mayot.

Ranyuth m'omore kodi gir'aura otim i waŋ ji gi cingi Jomoor ma kiri jotwo bin itero jo i royo m'okare ma tindi to jobedo kenyo i kanindo kodi i par pajo munyo jogeno ni kada nyaka tipo pa Petero wogey jomegi kwoŋ jo ka go kadho kenyo.
Ji bende jowok i tindi m'othoko Yerusalem to jocokere kenyo munyo jokelo jotwo kodi joma cuny m'ocido cando jo, aka joboth joje.
Gikenyo jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi wadi je, ma kweth pa Josadukayo, jobedo gi nyeko madwoŋ ri jomoor.
Jomako jomoor to joketho jo i od twec man kenyo.
To i wor no, malaika pa Rwoth oyawo waŋkac ma od twec, to wodho woko jomoor, to waco rijo ni,
“Kidhi win wicungi i Ot pa Were, aka wiwaci ri ji je kwoŋ kwo manyen me.”

Munyo ŋamba oriedo, jomoor jodonjo i Ot pa Were to jocako fonji paka owaci rijo. Munyo jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi wadi jotundo, jolwoŋo jotel pa Joyuda kanyacel bedo i romo m'opoŋ i kapido. Gikenyo odhiro wac i od twec nike wokel jomoor bongi jo.
To munyo josirikale jotundo, jok'onwaŋo jomoor; gikenyo jogik to jodwoko wac ri jopido ni,
“Munyo watundo i od twec wanwaŋo ocegi aka jokur je oyido jocungo kenyo; to munyo wayawo wakinwaŋo moro kad'acel iye.”
Munyo jasirikale ma telo jokur ma Ot pa Were kodi jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam jowinjo gime, jodhier swa, kareno joparo kwoŋ gim'obedi ro wac no.
Gikenyo dhano moro odonjo to waco rijo ni, “Neni win ji ma wirwako i od twec icade jocungo i Ot pa Were jofonjo ji.”
Gikenyo jasirikale okadho gi ji pere to dwoko gi jomoor. Jok'oro meni, rupiri jolworo ni ji jonyalo goyo jo gi telin.
Jorwako jomoor i ot to jomiyo jo cungo ruwaŋ kitipa pa jopido, to jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam osa jo ka waco ni,
“Nyoro waciko win ni wiŋuti ro meno, wikiri widok wifonji i nyingi ŋato, to kole onyo wipoŋo Yerusalem gibe gi fonji mewin, aka wimito ridho ni tho pa jame obedo gimarac mawan.”
Petero gi jomoor man jodwoko ni, “Waripo winjo or pa Were makiweno apa ji.
Were pa bacere wan ama ocerino Yesu ma wiguro kwoŋ yath to wineko.
Were ocerino go aka oketho go yuracuc pere paka Jadhum kodi Jaboth, womiy Isiraili hongo ma ŋuto gi limo cwaki mareco pajo.
Kendo wan wabedo jokony i gigipiny me. Wa jokony kanyacel gi Cuny Maleŋ mic pa Were ri joma winjo or pere.”
Munyo jokweth ma pido jowinjo gime jolimo nge mathoth to joridho nike woneki jomoor.
To ŋat'acel kwoŋ jo m'ilwoŋo ni Gamaliel ma Jafarisayo, odoko jafonji ma Cik ma jomiyo dwoŋ swa, ocungo i pido, to oro jo wodho woko jomoor, ma hongo mathin,
to waco ri jopido ni, “Joisiraili, gwokere win kwoŋ gima wiyenyo timo ri jome.
I hongo m'okadho Thiodas okethere munyo ŋoyo ni go ŋatimoro madwoŋ; ji ma romo miya aŋwen joluwo go. To kole oneki go, to jom'oyido joluwo go jokedhere woko, to kitula pere rere woko.
Rumacen, Yuda ma Jagalili bende owok kamaler i hongo ma kwano ji; go oywayo ji megi bonge to kole oneki go bende, to jom'oyido joluwo go jokedhere woko.
Am'omiyo i wac pa jome, wikiri witim gimoro kwoŋ jo. Weyi win jo, rupiri ka atoŋa kodi tim pajo obedo yiko pa dhano, meno won bino rumo woko,
to ka wok bongi Were wikibino nyalo geŋo jome. Winyalo poyo ni wilwenyo gi Were won.”
Jopido jowinjo rieko ma Gamaliel omiyo jo.
Jolwoŋo jomoor no i ot, to jomiyo or ni wocwadi jo, aka jopiro jo ni kiri jowomedi luwo i nyingi Yesu, nyaka to jogonyo jo.
Jomoor joeye i kapido gi kisangala madwoŋ ni Were oparo kwoŋ jo ni joripo limo acanda ma kite no i nyingi Yesu.
Aka piny m'oyawere je jomedere gi fonjo ji Wac Manyen Maber ma Kwoŋ Yesu Kristo, i Ot pa Were kodi i pecin pa ji.
I hongo me munyo welo pa jofonjirok medere dito, Joyuda ma joluwo Dhogrik joero kiŋunyaŋunya kwoŋ Joebulaniya. Joyuda ma joluwo Dhogrik jowaco ni mon tho pajo kipar kwoŋ jo odoco i pok ma kisi ndelo.
Am'omiyo Jomoor apar g'ario jolwoŋo kweth pa jofonjirok gipi kanyacel to jowaco ni, “Kiripi ka waweyo tic ma fonjo Wac pa Were to wayindin gi tic ma poko cemo ayin.
Am'omiyo, wutmin wan, yeri win cwo abirio i dier win ma wiŋeyo ni jopoŋ gi Cuny Maleŋ kodi rieko, aka wabino ketho jo i tic me.
Aka wawegi wabino liŋ i tic ma kwayo kodi fonji.”

Lwak ji gibe josangala gi wac pa jomoor, to joyero Stefano, jal m'opoŋ gi yeyo kodi Cuny Maleŋ; kodi Filipo, kodi Purokoro, kodi Nikanor, kodi Timon, kodi Parmena kodi Nikolao, Japath m'odonjo i dini pa Joyuda wok Antiok.
Jokelo jono ruwaŋ jomoor, to jokwayo rijo, to joketho cingi gin kwoŋ jo.
Gikenyo Wac pa Were omedere nyay. Welo pa jofonjirok ma Yerusalem omedo idho malo ma piyo, aka jocway ri Were i wi migam mathoth jojolo to yeyo.
Stefano, dhano ma Were oŋaŋo gi nema aka oasere gi meni, otimo gigipiny madongo ma kelo dhier kanyacel gi gir'aura i dier ji.

To ji megi, m'oyido jobedo jokweth ma kalamo pa jom'ogony (paka onwaŋo ilwoŋo jo), kodi jokalamo ma Sireno kodi ma Alekizandiria, jopiemo gine. Jono gi Joyuda man ma jowok Silisia kodi Asia jocako piem gi Stefano.
To Cuny Maleŋ omiyo Stefano rieko ma munyo luwo jok'onyalo ciro go.
Am'omiyo jonyewo ji moro ma jowaco ni, “Wawinjo go luwo gima k'otire kwoŋ Musa kodi Were!”
Ameno jonyalo kisigila ji kodi jotel pa ji kodi Jondiko. Jobino bongi Stefano, jomako go, to jotero go i kapido.
Gikenyo jokelo ji moro ma jotwodo kwoŋ Stefano, ka jowaco ni, “Jame ndir je luwo aluwa marac kwoŋ Ot maleŋ mapa Were mawan kodi kwoŋ Cik pa Musa.
Aka wawinjo munyo go waco nike Yesu ma Nazareth me bino ŋinyo woko Ot pa Were to wiro woko kula je ma wanwaŋo bongi Musa!”
Ji je ma jobedo i kapido jocomo waŋ gin kwoŋ Stefano aka joneno ni waŋe ocale kodi waŋ malaika.
Jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam openjo Stefano ni, “Wac no obedo adieri?”
Aka Stefano odwoko ni, wutmera gi bacere nan! Winjan win! Were man gi dwoŋ omenyere ri kwari wan Abraham munyo go fodi nitie yu Mesopotamia, mafodi go k'okidho bedo Haran,
aka Were owaco rigo ni, “Weyi jothuwin kodi piny mewin ikidhi i piny ma anonyuthin.”
Gikenyo go oeye i piny ma Kaldeya to kidho bedo Haran. Aka rumacen munyo ba Abraham otho, Were okwanyo go woko kenyo to kelo go i piny me, ma pama wibed'iye.

I hongo no Were k'omiyo Abraham kad'adec moro paka apere won, kada nyaka lowo ma romo par tiendi dhano; to Were ociko ni bino miyo go piny no, aka rumacen d'obedo apere kodi apa nyikwaye, kada go onwaŋo fodi ongoye gi nyathi.
Me a gima Were owaco rigo: “Nyikwayin jobin bedo i piny ma wiloka, kama jobino bed'iye ŋecin aka ibino kuro jo marac hongo ma romo oro miya aŋwen.”
Were owaco ni, “Abino thumo banja loyo nono ma jobino tic rijo no, aka rumacen nyikwayin jobino wok i piny no to jodwoko laman ka.”
Gikenyo Were omiyo Abraham cikirok ma thumirok paka ranyuth mere. Am'omiyo Abraham othumo Isaka munyo ndelo aboro otundo, aka Isaka obedo ba Yakobo, aka Yakobo obedo ba nono apar g'ario.

to wodho go maber i teko pere je. Munyo Yozefu otundo ruwaŋ Farawo, kere pa Jomisir, Were omiyo go kite maber swa kodi rieko m'omiyo go oywayo cuny Farawo. Farawo oloko Yozefu jadhum (gavana) ma piny kodi ma ot pere.
Gikenyo kec opodho i Misir gipi kodi i Kanan, m'okelo candirok madwoŋ. Kwarere mawan jok'onyalo limo cemo moro je.
Am'omiyo munyo Yakobo owinjo ni gir'acama nitie Misir, odhiro kwarere mawan koro kutho kidho liewo marapena.
I wendo pajo mar'ario, Yozefu onyuthere ri wutmin aka Farawo oniaŋ ni jono jobedo wutmin Yozefu.
Am'omiyo Yozefu odhiro mikwenda ri Yakobo bamere, munyo waco rigo kodi peco gipi ni jowokidhi Misir. Welo pajo oyido romo ji piero abirio g'abic.
Gikenyo Yakobo okidho Misir, kama go kodi kwarere mawan jotho iye.
Delkwoŋ jo oter Sekem, kam'oyik'iye jo i kaliel ma Abraham cango onyewo kwoŋ nono pa Hamor gi pesa moro.
Rumacen kere man, ma k'oŋeyo wac pa Yozefu ocako dhum i Misir.
Go obuto ri ji mawan to lokere mager ri kwarere mawan, munyo romo jo jwango nyithindho pajo maŋic nike jowotho.
I ndir no ama onywol'iye Musa, nyathi maŋon swa ruwaŋ Were. Okur go peco pa bamere hongo ma dwe adek.
Aka munyo owodhi go peco pajo, nyar Farawo odimo go to pidho paka nyathi pere won.
Ofonji go rieko je mapa Jomisir to lokere ŋatatek swa i wac kodi i tim.
Oneno acel kwoŋ jo munyo Jamisir moro timo rigo marac; gikenyo oredo konyo Joisiraili no to culo kwor kwoŋ Jamisir gi neko woko go.
(Go oparo nike ji pere wegi jobino ŋeyo ni Were oyido oro go ma konyo jo, to kere jok'oniaŋ).
Yawere mere Musa onwaŋo Joisiraili ario jogore, to temo theko jo ka waco ni, “Jume, kole wibedo wutmere. Raŋo ma widhaw matek ama?”
To ŋat'oyido timo nyawote marac odhiro Musa gicen, to penjo ni, “Ŋat'okethin rwoth ma thumo riwan banja?
Imito nekan bende, paka nyoro ineko Jamisir?”
Munyo Musa owinjo gime oringo to eye Misir to cako bedo i piny Midian kam'olim'iye wote ario.
Musa ouro swa gima go oneno, to dhire cegin gi kasugu dudi no wonen maber. Gikenyo go owinjo dwondi Rwoth munyo waco ni,
“An Were pa kwarere nin, Were pa Abraham kodi Isaka kodi Yakobo.” Musa okirin gi lworo aka k'otimo miseni ma ŋiyo.
To Rwoth waco rigo ni, “Luny woko war ma tiendin, rupiri kam'icung'iye me Kabedo Maleŋ.
Adieri atieko neno candirok pa ji paran i piny Misir, kendo atieko winjo paka joywak malith, aka onyo aloro bino botho jo. Onyo biye, alaorin i Misir.”
Go am'otelo ji i royo wok Misir, munyo timo gigipiny ma miyo ji dhier kanyacel kodi gir'aura i Misir kodi i Wakawaka M'obokere, kodi i thim i hongo ma oro piero aŋwen.
Me a Musa m'owaco ri Joisiraili ni, “Were bino kelo riwin jatuci wac Were bende paka an, ma bino wok kwoŋ ji mewin won.”
Me a ŋata cango obedo i dier Joisiraili ma jocokere i thim kanyacel kodi kwarere wan kodi malaika m'oluwo gine wi got Sinai; aka go olimo mikwenda ma kwo mapa Were m'okelo riwan.
To kwarere wan jokwero winjo go; jodhiro go gicen aka joparo kiri kwoŋ gik yu Misir.
Am'omiyo jowaco ri Aron ni, “Tim riwan werin ma jobino telo wan. Wakuya gim'otimo Musa no m'omiyo owodho wan i piny Misir.”
Gikenyo jocweyo gimoro ma cale nyathi dhiaŋ to jocako lamo gino, to jotimo kalima ma miyo gino dwoŋ.
Gikenyo Were owiro ŋeye rijo to miyo jocako lamo micalin ma polo, paka ondiki i kitawo pa jotuci wac Were ni,
Ji ma Isiraili! Manago i ndir ca
wineko ran le paka cowirok i
hongo ma oro piero aŋwen i thim?
Kole wema pa were Molek ama witiŋo
kodi cal pa were micala Refam,
cal ma wicweyo ni wilam.
Am'omiyo abino riemo win woko kalo kiri Babilon.
Rumacen, kwarere mawan ma jojolo wema wok bongi bacere pajo jotiŋo munyo jowotho kodi Yosuwa to jotero i piny pa nonin ma Were oriemo woko rijo. Aka wema no obedo kenyo kiri i ndir pa Daudi
m'onwaŋo silwany pa Were, aka okwayo Were ni woyeyi go wogeri ot ri Were pa Yakobo.
To Solomon ama ogero ot no rigo.
To Were Madwoŋ Maloyo kibedi rigin i ot ma ji ama jogero; paka jatuci wac oketho i Ndiko ni,
aka piny meno kom paran ma ajeng'iye tiendan.
Kiti ot aŋo ma d'igero ran?
Kosa kaywomirok paran obedi aŋo?
Kosa cingan ama k'ocweyo gigipiny ni je?
Nitie jatuci wac Were kad'acel ma kwarere pajo k'olwenyo gine? Joneko kiri jomikwenda pa Were, ma cango con jotuco bino pa Ŋat'otire, ma witieko kiri camo rigo sereko to wineko go.
Win ma wijolo Cik pa Were ma jomalaika jokelo riwin, ama wikwero winjo Cik no!”
Munyo jokweth ma pido jowinjo wac no, keme omako jo to cako mwodo laki gin.
To Stefano, paka opoŋ gi Cuny Maleŋ, oŋiyo polo to neno dwoŋ pa Were kodi Yesu munyo ocungo yuracuc pa Were.
Aka owaco ni: “Neni! Eno aneno polo oyawere aka Wod Dhano ocungo yuracuc pa Were!”
Cungo kwoŋ wac me jom'ocokere kenyo jowoy aka joculo ithi gin; gikenyo joje jomwomere kwoŋe,
jowodho go woko ma tindi aka jogoyo go gi telin. Jom'obedo i wac no joketho ruk pajo dho tiendi jayac m'ilwoŋo ni Saulo.
Munyo jogoyo go, Stefano owaco ikwayo ni, “Rwoth Yesu, joli cunyan.”
Gikenyo oguro conge piny to koko malo ni, “Rwoth, ikir'ikethi kwoŋ jo gimarac me, aka gi wac me opodho to kwe.”
Aka Saulo oyeyere gi neki me.
Gi i ndelo no won, kitipa pa jom'oyeyo ma Yerusalem ocako nwaŋo acanda malith. Jom'oyeyo je, kwanyo woko jomoor, jotiakere iy'adec ma Yuda kodi Samaria parom.
Cwo moro ma jomiyere ri Were joyiko Stefano munyo joywako go gi geregere madwoŋ.
Jom'oyeyo ma okedhi jo jokidho iye je munyo jofonjo Wac pa Were.
Filipo okidho i tindi ma Samaria to fonjo ji kwoŋ Kristo.
Lwak ji jociko ithi jo gi cuny jo acel munyo jowinjo fonji pa Filipo gi gir'aura ma go otimo.
Cuny m'ocido jowok kwoŋ ji madit gi derino madwoŋ; ji mathoth ma jotwo nyaŋinya, kodi jom'oŋol bende jobedo maber.
Aka kisangala madwoŋ obedo Samaria gipi.
I tindi no oyido nitie nyatoro m'ilwoŋo ni Simon, ma yado miyo Josamaria dhier gi thieth pere. Go oyido waco nike go ŋatadwoŋ swa,
aka dhano je i tindi, i kitipa ji ma nger je ociko ithe maber winjo go. Jowaco ni, “Jame a meni pa Were m'ilwoŋo ni, ‘Ma Siragama’ ”
Go oyido otieko miyo ji dhier gi thieth pere hongo malac swa m'omiyo bin jociko ithi gin winjo go.
To munyo joyeyo fonji pa Filipo kwoŋ Wac Manyen Maber ma Ker pa Were kodi nyingi Yesu Kristo, aka obatisa jo, cwo gi mon.
Simon je bende oyeyo, aka munyo otiek kibatisa go, obedo cegin gi Filipo to dhier swa munyo oneno ranyuth madongo kodi gir'aura m'onwaŋo itimo.
Munyo jomoor ma Yerusalem jowinjo nike ji ma Samaria jotieko jolo wac pa Were, jodhiro Petero gi Yohana rijo.
Munyo jotundo, jokwayo ri jom'oyeyo nike jowolimi Cuny Maleŋ.
Ato Cuny Maleŋ onwaŋo fodi k'oloro ri kada ŋat'acel kwoŋ jo; onwaŋo nyaka otiek kibatisa jo i nyingi Rwoth Yesu.
Gikenyo Petero gi Yohana joketho cingi gin kwoŋ jo, to jolimo Cuny Maleŋ.
Munyo Simon oneno nike Cuny Maleŋ loro ri ji ka jomoor joketho cingi gin kwoŋ jo, ocwayo pesa ri Petero kodi Yohana
ka waco ni, “Miyan win bende meni me, aka wangi ka aketho cingan kwoŋ moro go bino limo Cuny Maleŋ.”
To Petero odwoko ni, “Kadhi itho koro gi pesa perin, rupiri oyido iparo ni inyalo nyewo mic pa Were gi pesa!
Ingoye gi kabedo i tic mawan me, rupiri cunyin k'otire ruwaŋ Were.
Am'omiyo ŋuti kwoŋ tim perin marac me, aka ikway Rwoth nike wocwakin kwoŋ paro marac me,
rupiri aneno ni duro opoŋ i cunyin, aka gimarac otweyin.”
Simon owaco ri Petero kodi Yohana ni, “Mondo kway win ran Rwoth, ŋey wongoye kada gimoro acel ma wiluwo kwoŋe me ma wotiman.”
Munyo jotieko niaŋo ji mikwenda pa Rwoth, Petero gi Yohana jogik Yerusalem. Jofonjo Wac Manyen Maber malomalo iy'adec m'omore i Samaria.
Malaika pa Rwoth oluwo gi Filipo ni, “Yikere ilakidho i royo ma yu Tiendan piny ma wok i Yerusalem aka laro yu Gaza.”

Me obedo royo ma thim. Gikenyo Filipo oyikere to kadho. I hongo no jatic ma Ethopiya onwaŋo dok yu peco. Ŋati me oyido obedo jasirikale madwoŋ ma kuro dero ŋaŋo pa nyamicala ma Ethopiya m'ilwoŋo ni Kandase. Go oyido owok Yerusalem lamo Were,
aka onwaŋo dok gi cawila pere munyo soma kitawo pa jatuci wac Isaya malomalo.
Cuny Maleŋ owaco ri Filipo ni, “Kidhi irom kodi cawila no.”
Filipo oringo bonge to winjo munyo go soma kitawo pa Isaya; gikenyo openjo go ni, “Iŋeyo dwoŋ gim'isoma no?”
Ana Jasirikale, “Anyalo nedi ŋeyo dwoŋ mere ma nyatoro k'otito ran?” Go olwoŋo Filipo ni woidhi cawila wobed'iye gine.
Adec ma randik m'oyido go soma a me:
“Paka rombo m'itero thumo,
kosa nyathi rombo m'ilielo
yer mere, go k'oŋamo dhoke ni luwo.
I acanda pere odiy go piny i banja.
Ŋa manyalo tito kwoŋ luse pere?
Kole orey woko kwo pere i piny ka ma piyo.”
Jasirikale owaco ri Filipo ni, “Waci ran, jatuci wac me luwo kwoŋ ŋa me? Kwoŋ go won, kosa ŋatiman?”
Gikenyo Filipo ocako tito rigo kwoŋ adec ma randik me; otito rigo Wac Manyen Maber mapa Yesu.
Munyo fodi jowotho i royo, jotundo kama dipi, to jasirikale waco ni, “Kole pi moro ee. Aŋo ma geŋan limo batisimo?”
[Filipo owaco rigo ni, “Inyalo kibatisa in k'iyeyo gi cunyin je.” Ana go ni, “Ayeyo ni Yesu Kristo obedo Wod Were”].
Jasirikale ooro jatic pere juko cawila; gikenyo jario no, Filipo kodi jasirikale jokidho i pi, to batisa go.
Munyo jowok i pi, Cuny Maleŋ pa Rwoth okwanyo Filipo. Josirikale odoko k'oneno go, to medere gi woth pere, munyo kisangala opoŋ i cunye.
Filipo opoyo munyo go nitie i Azoto; to wotho i tindi parom munyo fonjo Wac Manyen Maber, cuka otundo Kasareya.
Saulo oyido fodi medere i hongo no gi ywoyo wac ma bwoko gi neko jofonjirok pa Rwoth. Okidho bongi jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam,
to kwayo balwa ma dhiro go i kalamo pa Joyuda i Damasiko, ni k'onwaŋo joma luwo royo pa Rwoth kenyo, wonyali mako jo, cwo gi mon, to dwoko jo Yerusalem.
Munyo go fodi oyido ni royo kidho Damasiko, mafodi k'otundo i tindi, lero owok i polo to umo go ni fungu.
Go ogore piny to winjo dwondi jo ma waco rigo ni, “Saulo Saulo! Raŋo m'ilwenyo kodan?”
Go openjo ni, “In iŋa, Rwoth?” Dwondi jo no odwoko ni, “An Yesu m'ilwenyo gine.
To ay malo ikidhi i tindi, kam'ibino waco rin'iye gim'inotimi”
I hongo no ji m'onwaŋo jowotho gi Saulo oyido jocungo, m'ongoye wac ma jowaco; jowinjo dwondi jo no to jok'oneno nyatoro.
Saulo oay malo kam'onwaŋo opodh'iye to yawo waŋe, to k'onyalo neno gimoro. Gikenyo jomako cinge to jotero go Damasiko.
I hongo ma ndelo adek go k'onyalo neno gimoro, aka i hongo no go k'onyalo cemo kosa madho gimoro.
Onwaŋo nitie i Damasiko jafonjirok moro m'ilwoŋo ni Anania. Ŋato olimo lek ma Rwoth owac'iye rigo ni, “Anania!” Odwoko ni, “Anika, Rwoth.”
Rwoth owaco rigo ni “Yikere ikidhi i Royo m'ilwoŋo ni Nyatirtir, aka ipenji dhano ma wok Tariso m'ilwoŋo ni Saulo i ot pa Yuda. Go nitie i kwayo pama won me.
Aka, i lek, go oneno dhano m'ilwoŋo ni Anania munyo donjo to ketho cinge kwoŋe ŋey go wocaki neno kendo.”
Anania odwoko ni, “Rwoth, kole ji mathoth jotieko luwo ran kwoŋ gigipiny mareco ma ŋato otieko timo ri ji perin maleŋ ma Yerusalem.
Aka go obino Damasiko gi meni ma jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam jomiyo go ma mako nyatoro je ma yeyo i nyingin.”
Rwoth owaco rigo ni, “Kidhi, rupiri atieko yero go wotiy ran, ma miyo nyingan ŋeyirok bongi Jopath kodi kerin, kodi nyithindho pa Isiraili.
Aka abino nyutho go paka go ripo candirok ran.”
Gikenyo Anania okidho, odonjo i ot to ketho cinge kwoŋ Saulo ka waco ni, “Omera Saulo, Rwoth Yesu m'omenyere rin i royo munyo ibino ka, ooran nike inyal neno kendo ipoŋ gi Cuny Maleŋ.”
Piyo piyo gimoro ma cale magambala ohale wok i waŋe to podho, to go cako neno kendo. Gikenyo go oay malo t'imiyo go batisimo,
aka munyo otieko cemo, meni pere odwoko.
Saulo obedo ndelo manok gi jofonjirok i Damasiko.
Go okidho nyatirtir i kalamo pa Joyuda m'omore aka ocako fonjo kwoŋ Yesu ka waco ni, “Yesu obedo Wod Were.”

Ji je ma jowinjo go jodhier swa, aka wegi jopenjere ni, “Me k'aŋata oneko ji Yerusalem ma jotuco nyingi Yesu? Aka miti go onyo ameno k'obino ka kodi atoŋa ma mako ji ma jotuco nyingi Yesu gi tweyo jo tero jo bongi jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam?”
To fonji pa Saulo omedere bedo gi meni loyo, aka tito pere ni Yesu obedo Kristo obedo m'ocwiny swa ma Joyuda m'oyido jonitie Damasiko jok'onyalo dwoko go.
Munyo ndelo mathoth okadho, Joyuda jocokere to joyiko paro ma neko Saulo;
to owaci rigo gim'oyido joyiko timo. Jonago jokuro go i waŋkac ma tindi Wor g'odieceŋ ni jowoneki go.
To gi wor no, joma luwo Saulo jokwanyo go to jowodho go gi i hoŋ ma kor ot iy'adita m'olier gi thol.
Saulo okidho Yerusalem to temo makirok kodi jofonjirok to jok'onyalo yeyo nike go pama onyo bende olokere jafonjirok, to joje jolworo go ayino.

Gikenyo Barinaba obino okwanyo go to tero go bongi jomoor to tito rijo paka Saulo ndir ca oneno Rwoth i royo to Rwoth luwo gine. Go bende owaco rijo paka Saulo ofonjo gi miseni i nyingi Yesu i tindi ma Damasiko.
Gikenyo Saulo obedo gi jo to wotho Yerusalem parom, munyo fonjo gi miseni i nyingi Rwoth.
Go bende oluwo aka opiemo kodi Joyuda ma joluwo Dhogrik, to jotemo neko go.
Munyo jom'oyeyo joŋeyo gino, jotero Saulo yu Kasareya to jodhiro go Tariso.
Gikenyo kitipa pa jom'oyeyo i Yuda gipi kodi Galili kodi Samaria obedo gi hola ma siem. Jokonyere aka jodongo i welo ro kony pa Cuny Maleŋ, munyo jowotho i kwo ma lworo Were.
Paka Petero oyido wotho i kabedo m'omore, ndelo moro go okidho liewo ji ma jobedo Lida.
Kenyo go oromo gi dhano m'ilwoŋo ni Ayineya, m'onwaŋo two nyaŋinya aka k'onyalo ay i kanindo oro aboro.
Petero owaco rigo ni, “Ayineya, Yesu Kristo bothin. Ay malo iyiki kanindo perin.” Ayineya oay mayot.
Ji ma jobedo Lida kodi Saron joneno go, to jowire bongi Rwoth.
I Yopa onwaŋo nitie dhako m'oyeyo m'ilwoŋo ni Tabisa, (Nyinge i Dhogrik obedo Dokas, dwoŋ mere ni amudhe), m'oyido oro hongo pere je ma timo bero gi konyo jocandi.
I hongo no two omako go to tho. Olwok delkwoŋe to ipielo i ot ma malo.
Paka Yopa oyido kibor gi Lida, munyo jofonjirok ma Yopa jowinjo ni Petero nitie Lida, jooro j'ario bonge gi mikwenda me, “Mondo redi ibin.”
Gikenyo Petero oyikere to kidho bongi jo. Munyo go otundo, oter go i ot ma malo. Mon tho je jothoko go munyo joywak aka jonyutho go satere gi k'otere ma Dokas otimo munyo fodi kwo.
Petero oriemo joje woko, aka oguro conge to kwayo; aka owire kama di jatho to lwoŋo ni, “Tabisa, ay malo!”
Petero otundo bonge to konyo go gi ay malo. Gikenyo Petero olwoŋo jom'oyeyo kodi mon tho, to cwayo go makwo rijo.
Wac me onyay i Yopa gipi, aka ji mathoth joyeyo Rwoth.
Petero obedo Yopa ndelo m'oromo kodi jajwayi piendere m'ilwoŋo ni Simon.
Onwaŋo nitie dhano i Kasareya m'ilwoŋo ni Kornelio, jasirikale madwoŋ i lwak jolweny ma Roma m'ilwoŋo ni kitipa pa Joitalia.
Go oyido obedo jadin matek gi ot pere gibe aka jolworo Were. Go oyido miyo kony madit ri jocandi, aka onwaŋo kwayo Were noknok.
Dho kapa sawa abuŋwen odieceŋ moro, go oneno cal m'omenyere rigo, m'onen'iye malaika pa Were munyo donjo to lwoŋo go ni, “Kornelio!”
Go omoro waŋe kwoŋ malaika gi lworo aka owaco ni, “Aŋo jadwoŋ?” Ana malaika: “Were ojolo kwayo perin gi tic perin ma konyo ji, aka onyo opoyin.
Onyo or jomoro i Yopa jowolwoŋ Simon ma nyinge man Petero.
Go obedo wendo pa Simon ma jajwayi piendere ma bedo dho thengi wakawaka.”
Gikenyo malaika m'onwaŋo luwo gine okadho, aka Kornelio olwoŋo jotic ma ot pere jario kodi jasirikale, ma bende jadin matek m'onwaŋo obedo acel kwoŋ jokur pere.
Owaco rijo gim'otimere je to oro jo Yopa.
Yawere mere kapa sawa aucel m'odieceŋ, munyo jonitie i woth pajo aka onwaŋo joriko Yopa, Petero oidho wi ot kwayo.
Gikenyo go ocako winjo kec to mito gir'acama; aka munyo fodi itedo cemo, ocako nur to neno cal m'omenyere rigo.
Oneno polo oyawere aka gimoro oloro m'ocalo suka malac m'ocar piny gi sonda mere aŋwen pa kidho umo piny.
I suka no onwaŋo nitie le ma piny ma kite je, gigipiny ma mol gi kor gin piny kodi winyin ma malo.
Dwondi jo moro owaco rigo ni; “Ay malo, Petero, ineki icami!”
To Petero owaco ni, “K'ameno, Rwoth! Fodi yado akicamo gimoro je m'itero paka gima kicar, kosa ma k'olony.”
Dwondi jo no odoko oluwo gine ni, “Gima Were otieko lonyo, ikir'ilwoŋo ni gima kicar.”
Gime otimere didek to idwoko gino i polo.
Munyo Petero fodi uro dwoŋ cal ma go oneno no, ji ma Kornelio ooro rango kama ot pa Simon nitie iye jotundo kenyo to jocungo dho waŋkac.
Jolwoŋo gi dwondi jo ma malo to jopenjo ni, “Nitie wendo moro ka ma nyinge Simon Petero?”
Petero oyido fodi temo niaŋ i dwoŋ cal ma go oneno no to Cuny Maleŋ waco rigo ni, “Kole nitie ji adek ka ma jorangin.
Am'omiyo yikere ilor, aka ikir'imindaminda m'ikikadho gi jo, rupiri aŋat'aoro jo.”
Gikenyo Petero oloro to waco rijo ni, “An a ŋata wirango. Wibino raŋo?”

Jowaco ni, “Jasirikale madwoŋ m'ilwoŋo ni Kornelio ama ooro wan. Go obedo ŋataber ma lamo Were aka Joyuda joworo go swa. Acel kwoŋ jomalaika pa Were owaco rigo nike wolwoŋin i ot pere, wonyali winjo gim'inowaci.”
Petero orwako jono i ot to jonindo kenyo.
Yawere mere go oyikere to kadho gi jo; aka jowote moro ma jowok Yopa bende jokadho gine.
Yawere mere jotundo Kasareya kama Kornelio oyido kur'iye go, kanyacel gi wade pere gi merin pere ma go olwoŋo.
Munyo Petero nyaka donjo i ot, Kornelio oromo gine, to podho dho tiende gi bwonirok.
Petero owaco rigo woay malo. Owaco ni, “cuny, kole abende adhano adhana.”
Petero omedere gi luwo kodi Kornelio munyo donjo i ot, kam'onwaŋ'iye ji mathoth ma jocokere.
Owaco rijo ni, “Wiwegi wiŋeyo maber nike dini pa Jayuda kiyey go riwirok kodi Jopath. To Were otieko nyuthan ni akir'ater dhano moro je paka jakicar kosa ni k'olony.
Am'omiyo munyo ioro ji lwoŋan abino m'ongoye piem. Onyo wac ran gim'omiyo ilwoŋan.”
Kornelio owaco ni, “Ndelo aŋwen m'okadho onwaŋo akwayo i ot paran sawa abuŋwen m'odieceŋ. Piyo piyo dhano m'orukere i ruk ma minyin ocungo ruwaŋan.
Owaco ni, ‘Kornelio! Were owinjo kwayo perin, aka opoyo tic perin ma konyo ji.
Or dhano moro Yopa wolwoŋi jal m'ilwoŋo ni Simon Petero ma obedo wendo peco pa Simon jajwayi piendere, ma bedo dho thengi wakawaka!’
Am'omiyo aoro ji lwoŋin mayot, aka itimo maber bino. Pama onyo wajoje wan ka i nyim Were, wakuro winjo gimoro je ma Rwoth oorin waco.”
Nyatoro je ma lworo go aka timo gim'otire, go jolo m'ongoye tito nono pere.
Wiŋeyo fonji ma go odhiro ri ji ma Isiraili, ma tito Wac Manyen Maber ma kelo siem i Yesu Kristo, m'obedo Rwoth pa ji je.
Wiŋeyo gimadwoŋ m'otimere i Yuda parom, cako Galili, cako kwoŋ batisimo ma Yohana ofonjo:
Paka Were okonjo kwoŋ Yesu ma Nazareth Cuny Maleŋ kodi meni; paka go okidho kamoro je munyo timo bero gi botho joma two je m'onwaŋo jonitie i acanda pa jwogi, rupiri Were oyido nigi go.
Wabedo jokony ma joŋeyo gimoro je ma go otimo i piny Yuda kodi i Yerusalem. Joneko go munyo joguro go kwoŋ musalaba.
To Were ocerino go kwoŋ jom'otho i ndelo mar'adek, to miyo go menyere ri ji.
Ji je jok'oneno go, to wan ayino ma wabedo jokony ma Were otieko yero. Wacemo odoko waoro gir'amadha kanyacel gine munyo Were otieko cerino go kwoŋ jom'otho.
Aka go ooro wan fonjo ji Wac Manyen Maber, gi nyutho jo kamaler nike go a ŋata Were oketho thumo banja pa jomakwo gi jom'otho.
Jotuci wac Were je joluwo kwoŋe, munyo jowaco ni nyatoro je m'oyey go ibino cwako reco pere gi meni ma nyingi go.”
Munyo Petero fodi luwo, Cuny Maleŋ oloro kwoŋ joje m'onwaŋo jociko ithi jo jowinjo fonji.
Joyuda ma joyeyo ma jobino wok Yopa gi Petero jodhier ni Were okonjo mic pere ma Cuny Maleŋ kwoŋ Jopath bende.
Ato jowinjo munyo joluwo i dhodhok manyen manyakare ka jopako dwoŋ pa Were. Aka Petero owaco ni,
“Nitie ŋata nyalo geŋo jome kwoŋ batisimo ma pi ma to bende jotieko limo Cuny Maleŋ paka wan?”
Gikenyo go ooro jo ni wobatisa jo i nyingi Yesu Kristo. Rumacen jokwayo Petero gin ni jowobed'iye gi jo ndelo ma romo.
Jomoor kodi wadi jo ma Yuda parom jowinjo ni Jopath bende jojolo wac pa Were.
Munyo Petero okidho Yerusalem, ji m'onwaŋo joyenyo ni Jopath bende jowothumere jogesa ni,
“Raŋo wikidho bongi Jopath ma jok'othumere to wicemo kiri gi jo!”
Gikenyo Petero otito rijo thenethene ma gim'otimere woki i cakirok mere ama:
“An onwaŋo anitie ikwayo i tindi ma Yopa, to aneno gimoro munyo loro piny wok i polo m'ocalo suka mapando m'icaro piny kareno omaki thenge aŋwen je to tundo bongan.
Akaŋasa iye maber t'aneno le ma nyatiende aŋwen, kodi ogwaŋe, kodi gigipiny ma mol gi kor gin kodi winyin ma malo.
Aka awinjo dwondi jo moro m'owaco ran ni, ‘Petero, ay malo, neki jo icami!’
To awaco ni, ‘K'ameno Rwoth! Ongoye cemo makicar kosa ma k'olony m'otieko donjo i dhokan.’
Dwondi jo m'owok i polo no oluwo kendo ni, ‘Gima Were otieko lonyo, ikir'ilwoŋo ni gima kicar.’
Gime otimere didek, aka rumacen oyway t'idwoko i polo.
I hongo no won ama ji moro adek m'oor bongan wok Kasareya jotundo i ot m'onwaŋo abed'iye.
Cuny Maleŋ owaco ran ni akidhi gi jono m'ongoye yero. Joma joyeyo aucel me bende jowotho kodan kiri i Kasareya, to wajoje wadonjo i ot pa Kornelio.
Go owaco riwan paka oneno malaika moro ocungo i ot pere to waco rigo ni, ‘Or dhano Yopa wolwoŋi Simon ma nyinge Petero.
Go bino kelo riwin wac ma bino miyin kodi jopeco perin je limo both.’
Aka munyo acako luwo, Cuny Maleŋ oloro rijo paka cango oloro riwan i kacako.
Gikenyo apoyo gima Rwoth ndir ca owaco ni, ‘Yohana obatisa win gi pi to wibino limo batisimo ma Cuny Maleŋ.’
Onyo k'inen Were omiyo Jopath no bende mic acel ma go omiyo wan munyo wayeyo Rwoth Yesu Kristo, onyo an aŋa, ma d'atem juko Were!”
Munyo jowinjo gime, joliŋ piem, to jopako Were munyo jowaco ni, “Kere Were otieko miyo Jopath bende hongo ma ŋuto gi bedo gi kwo.”
Aka jom'oyeyo megi, ji ma jowok Sipuro kodi Sireno jokidho Antiok to jotito ri Jogris mikwenda no bende, munyo jofonjo jo Wac Manyen Maber kwoŋ Rwoth Yesu.
Cingi Rwoth onwaŋo nigi jo, aka ji mathoth joyeyo to jowire bongi Rwoth.
Wac me otundo i kitipa pa jom'oyeyo ma Yerusalem to jooro Barinaba yu Antiok.
Munyo go otundo to neno nema pa Were m'oyido nikenyo, osangala to kwayo joje ni jowobedi gi genirok kodi adieri ruwaŋ Rwoth gi ridho madwoŋ;
ato Barinaba onwaŋo obedo dhano maber, m'opoŋ gi Cuny Maleŋ kodi yeyo. Aka ji mathoth swa jomedere i kitipa ji pa Rwoth.
Gikenyo Barinaba okidho Tariso rango Saulo.
Munyo onwaŋo go, okelo go Antiok. I hongo ma romo oro gipi jario me joromo gi kitipa pa jom'oyeyo, to jofonjo ji madit swa. I Antiok me ama open lwoŋ'iye jofonjirok ni Jokristo.
I kare no ama jotuci wac Were megi jobin'iye Antiok wok Yerusalem.
Acel kwoŋ jo, ma nyinge Agabo, ocungo malo gi meni pa Cuny Maleŋ, to luwo kwoŋ kec madwoŋ ma bino bedo to swana piny gipi. (Kec no obino i adhum pa Kilaudio.)
Jofonjirok joridho ni kisi dhano kwoŋ jo ripo dhiro kony ri wadi jo ma Yuda paka go nyalo.
Jotimo ameno, to jodhiro pesa ri jotel ma kitipa pa jom'oyeyo munyo luwo gi i cingi Barinaba gi Saulo.
I hongo no Herode m'obedo kere ocako lweny gi jomegi ma kitipa pa jom'oyeyo.
Go owodho or t'ineko Yakobo, omin Yohana, g'abor.
Munyo oneno ni gino osangala Joyuda, go omedere oro ji mako Petero bende. (Gime otimere i ndir ma kalima ma Mugat ma Buthow.)
Munyo otiek mako rigo Petero, oketho go i od twec, to ketho go i cingi bwora aŋwen ma jolweny aŋwen aŋwen, kuro go. Herode oyido oyiko wodho go kenyo wowinji banja pere ka kalima ma Kadho orumo.
Ameno Petero obedo i od twec; to ji ma kitipa pa jom'oyeyo onwaŋo jokwayo Were rigo gi geregere madit.
Wor no won ma Herode onwaŋo kidho wodh'iye go ri ji, Petero onwaŋo nindo i dier jokur ario kareno otwey go g'atege ario, aka jokur megi oyido jonitie kiri dho waŋkac ma od twec.
Piyo piyo malaika pa Rwoth omenyere, to lero meny i od twec. Malaika no ogwelo buti Petero, oyengo go to cewo go aka owaco ni, “Kwakere! Ay malo!” Gikenyo won to atege ma cinge budhere woko.
To malaika waco rigo ni, “Rukere irwaki war perin.” Petero otimo ameno, to malaika waco ni, “Ere ruki kabuti perin iluwan.”
Petero oluwo go to jowok i od twec to go k'oŋeyo kada ni gima malaika no onwaŋo timo obedo adieri; oparo nike kono manago menyirok moro ama go onyo neno.
Jokalo jokur marapena gi mar'ario, to jotundo i waŋkac ma nyweny ma royo ma kidho yu tindi. Waŋkac no won oyawere kende rijo, to jowok woko i royo. Piyo piyo to malaika no weyo Petero kenyo kende.

Gikenyo Petero nyaka oniaŋ kwoŋ gim'owok timirok rigo, to waco ni, “Nyaka onyo aŋeyo ni gime obedo adieri! Rwoth ooro malaika pere wobothan kwoŋ meni pa Herode kodi kwoŋ gigipiny je ma Joyuda oyido jocano timo ran.”
Munyo otieko niaŋ ameno, okidho peco pa Maria min Yohana ma nyinge man Mariko. Ji mathoth onwaŋo jocokere kenyo jokwayo.
Petero ogudo thigo ma woko to jatic manyako m'ilwoŋo ni Roda bino.
To munyo go oniaŋ ni obedo dwondi Petero, ogik i ot gi ŋwec ma k'oyawo thigo ro kisangala madit, to waco rijo paka Petero ocungo woko i waŋkac.
Jowaco rigo ni, “Neko omakin!” Aka munyo go omedo waco nike obedo adieri, jodwoko ni, “Kono meno malaika pere ayin.”
I hongo no Petero omedo gudo thigo. Rumacen joyawo thigo aka munyo joneno go jodhier swa.
Go onyutho jo gi cinge ni jowoliŋ, aka otito rijo paka Rwoth owodho go i od twec. Owaco ni, “Waci win ri Yakobo kodi jom'oyeyo je.” Gikenyo oweyo jo to kadho kaman.
Yawere mere odikin, ruwirok madwoŋ obedo i dier jokur ma od twec ri gim'otimo Petero.
Munyo Herode owodho or ma rango go, to jok'onyalo nwaŋo go, oyenyo ni wopenji jokur to wodho or ni woneki jo. Rumacen Herode oay wok i Yuda to kidho wocowi hongo moro yu Kasareya.

Herode onwaŋo yado nigi dhaw moro kodi ji ma Tire kodi Sidon; ameno jokidho bonge i muma neno go. Jono kutho jotelo mako mere gi Bulasito, jal m'oyido kuro cel pa kere. Gikenyo nyaka jokidho bongi Herode to jokwayo go siem, rupiri piny pajo onwaŋo limo cemo ma wok i piny pa kere no.
I ndelo m'oyik, Herode orwako ruk pere ma dhum, to bedo wi kom pere ma dhum, to cako luwo gi jo.
Gikenyo ji jokoko ni, “Me ki dwondi dhano ama luwo, to were moro ayin!”
Piyo piyo malaika pa Rwoth ogoyo Herode matek, rupiri go k'omiyo Were dwoŋ. Aka kudin ocamo go to tho.
To wac pa Were omedo nyay gi dongo.
Munyo Barinaba gi Saulo jocowo timo tic pajo, jogik yu Yerusalem kodi Yohana gi Mariko.
