I kitipa pa jom'oyeyo ma Antiok, oyido nitie jotuci wac Were moro kodi jofonji: Barinaba, Simeo (m'ilwoŋo ni Ma col), Lukio (ma wok Sireno), Manaen (m'odongo pa gavana Herode), kodi Saulo.
Ndelo moro munyo jolamo Rwoth aka joriyo kec, Cuny Maleŋ owaco rijo ni, “Kethi ran win gicen Barinaba kodi Saulo, jowotimi tic ma alwoŋ'iye jo.”
Munyo jotieko riyo kec kodi kwayo, joketho cingi gin kwoŋ jo to jodhiro jo kadho tic.
Munyo Cuny Maleŋ otieko oro Barinaba gi Saulo, jokidho yu Selukia aka jocewere wok kenyo to jokidho i kigoda ma Sipuro.
Munyo jotundo Salemis, jofonjo wac pa Were I kalamo pa Joyuda. Yohana Mariko oyido konyo jo i tic.
Joje jocewere yu loka i kigoda ma Pafo, kama jorom'iye gi jathieth moro ma nyinge Bar Yesu, Jayuda m'obedo jatuci wac ma twodo.
Go oyido tiyo ri gavana ma kigoda no, Serigio Paulo, m'onwaŋo obedo ŋatariek swa. Gavana no olwoŋo Barinaba kodi Saulo bonge rupiri oyido mito winjo Wac pa Were.
To Elima jathieth (meno a dwoŋ nyinge) opiemo gi jo ka temo ywayo woko gavana i yeyo.
Gikenyo Cuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ Saulo, ma bende oŋeyere ni Paulo, to ŋiyo waŋ jathieth no tirtir
to waco ni, “In wod pa jwogi, m'ibedo jakwor gi gimoro je m'otire, aka imore kodi thenethene mareco ma twodo, kere ikilaweyo wiro adieri pa Rwoth i twodo?

Cingi Rwoth eno bino podho kwoŋin pama; waŋin bino tho, aka ik'onen lero pa waŋceŋ cowo hongo moro.” Piyo piyo no Elima owinjo munyo tor macol umo waŋe, to cako woth ariwa ariwa munyo temo nwaŋo dhano m'omak cinge to telo go i royo.
Gavana oyeyo munyo oneno gim'otimere no; aka odhier swa kwoŋ fonji pa Rwoth.
Gikenyo Paulo kodi wadi jocewere wok Pafo to jokidho yu Paga iy'adec ma Pamfilia kama Yohana Mariko owey'iye jo to gik yu Yerusalem.
Jomedere gi woth wok Paga to jokidho Antiok ma Pisidia; aka i ndelo ma Sabato jodonjo i kalamo pa Joyuda to jobedo piny.
Munyo kisoma m'owok i Cik pa Musa kodi i ndiko pa jotuci wac Were orumo, jotel ma kalamo pa Joyuda jodhiro rijo mikwenda ni, “Wutmin wan, luw win ye gi ji ka winitie gi wac ma medo gine jo meni.”
Paulo ocungo, to miyo jo ranyuth gi cinge to cako luwo ama: Joisiraili jowotan, kodi Jopath je ma jolamo Were, winji win!
Were pa ji ma Isiraili oyero kwarere mawan, to miyo nono pajo bedo madwoŋ i ndir ma jobed'iye i piny Misir. Were owodho jo wok Misir gi meni pere m'oasere,
aka i hongo ma oro piero aŋwen ofamba gi jo i dier thim.
Go oreyo woko nonin abirio i piny ma Kanan to loko ji pere wegi piny no cowo
hongo ma oro cegin miya aŋwen gi piero abic. Rumacen omiyo jo jothumi banjin, cuka tundo ndir pa Samwiri jatuci wac Were.
Aka munyo jokwayo kere, Were omiyo jo Saulo, wod pa Kisi, janono pa Benyamin, bedo kere pajo ma oro piero aŋwen.
Munyo Were otieko kwanyo go woko, oloko Daudi kere pajo. Me a gima Were oluwo kwoŋe: “Anwaŋo ni Daudi wod pa Yese, obedo kiti dhano ma amito, ŋata bino timo gimoro je ma ayenyo ni wotim.”
Yesu, acel kwoŋ nyikway Daudi, a ŋata Were oloko Jaboth pa ji ma Isiraili paka cango ociko.
Mafodi Yesu k'obino, Yohana ofonjo ji je ma Isiraili nike jowoŋuti reco pajo wobatisa jo.
Aka munyo Yohana oyido cegin cowo tic pere, openjo ji ni, “Wiparo ni an a ŋa? Akibedo ŋata wikuro. To neni win, go luwan cen, aka akiripi kada lunyo war ma tiende.”
Wutmera, nyikway Abraham, kodi Jopath je manitie ka ma jolamo Were: Fonji ma mako kwoŋ both me otiek dhiro riwan!

Kole ji ma Yerusalem kodi jotel pajo jok'oŋeyo nike go a Jaboth, aka jok'oniaŋ kada wac pa jotuci wac Were m'isoma i kisi Sabato. Kad'ameno wac pa jotuci wac Were otundo i kare munyo jothumo ri Yesu banja ma tho.
Aka kada jok'onwaŋo atoŋa ma thumo rigo banja ma tho, je fodi jokwayo Pilato nike woneki go.
Aka munyo jotieko timo gimoro je ma Ndiko Maleŋ luwo kwoŋe, jogamo go kwoŋ musalaba to joketho go i kaliel.
To Were ocerino go kwoŋ jom'otho,
aka i ndelo madit onyuthere ri joma yado jowotho gine woki i Galili tundo Yerusalem. Jono am'onyo pama jobedo jokony i wac pere i waŋ ji ma Isiraili.
Aka onyo bende wakelo riwin Wac Manyen Maber no.
Gima Were ociko kwarere mawan nike d'otimo, pama go otieko timo riwan ma wabedo nyikway jo, munyo ocerino Yesu paka ondiki i Zabuli mar'ario ni,
“In Wodan,
konon alokere Benin.”
“Abino miyin silwany maleŋ ma bu kiganagana
ma cango aciko Daudi.”
“Ik'oyey jatic perin wotopi.”
Kole Daudi oketho atoŋa pa Were i tim i ndir pere; rumacen go otho to iyiko cegin gi kwarere pere, aka otho to top woko.
To ŋata Were ocerino kwoŋ jom'otho k'onyalo top woko.
Riameno wutmere, wijoje wiripo ŋeyo adieri nike fonji kwoŋ cwako reco ma ifonjo win wok bongi Yesu;
Aka nyatoro je ma yeyo i go igonyo go woko kwoŋ gimarac ma Cik pa Musa onwaŋo kinyal gonyo win kwoŋe.
Am'omiyo gwokere win, ŋey gima jotuci wac Were jowaco wokiri wotimere riwin ni:
rupiri alatimo tic moro i ndir mewin won,
to wik'oyey tic no
kada moro otemi tito riwin!
Munyo Paulo kodi Barinaba oyido jokidho wok i kalamo pa Joyuda, okway jo ni jowogiki kendo i Sabato ma luwo aka jowomedi waco rijo kwoŋ gigipiny me.
Munyo ji jotieko eye i romo, Joyuda mathoth kodi Jopath ma jowire i dini pa Joyuda joluwo Paulo gi Barinaba. Jomoor joluwo gi jo aka jomedo jo miseni nike jowomedere i nema pa Were.
I Sabato ma luwo, cegin kisi dhano obino wok i tindi winjo wac pa Were.
Munyo Joyuda joneno lwak ji, nyeko omako jo; jopiemo gi gima Paulo oyido waco aka joyeto kiri go.

To Paulo kodi Barinaba jomedo luwo pajo gi miseni ni, “Oyido yenyere ni wac pa Were wopen tito riwin ayino. To paka wikijol, aka wikiter i kwo mewin paka joma ripo limo kwo makirum, walaweyo win to wakidho bongi Jopath.
Kole meno a or ma Rwoth omiyo wan munyo owaco ama.”
“ ‘Aketho win paka lero pa Jopath,
ni winyal kelo both ri piny gipi.’ ”
Munyo Jopath jowinjo gime josangala aka jopako fonji pa Rwoth. Aka jom'oyido oyer ri kwo makirum jolokere jom'oyeyo.
Wac pa Were onyay iye je iy'adec no.
To Joyuda josigila jotel pa ji i tindi kodi mon pa Jopath ma kitipa ma malo ma onwaŋo jolamo Were. Gikenyo jocako lweny gi Paulo kodi Barinaba to joriemo jo woko iy'adec no.
Jomoor joteŋo lowo ma par tiendi gin munyo jokwoŋo jo to jokadho yu Ikoniam.
Jofonjirok ma Antiok jopoŋ gi kisangala i cuny jo kanyacel gi Cuny Maleŋ.
Gima pameno bende otimere Ikoniam: Paulo kodi Barinaba jodonjo i kalamo pa Joyuda to joluwo wac m'omiyo Joyuda kodi Jogris mathoth joyeyo.
To Joyuda ma jok'onyalo yeyo josigila Jopath to joruwo paro pajo ni joeye kwoŋ jom'oyeyo no.
Jomoor jobedo kenyo hongo malac. Joluwo gi miseni kwoŋ Rwoth, m'oridho ni fonji pajo kwoŋ nema pere oyido obedo adieri munyo miyo jo meni ma timo ranyuth kodi gidhier.
To kitipa pa ji i tindi otiakere: Jomegi jodok yuthenge pa Joyuda, joman yuthenge pa jomoor.
Gikenyo Jopath kodi Joyuda, kanyacel gi jodhum pajo, joyiko lweny kodi jomoor gigoyo jo gi telin.
Munyo jomoor jolimo ŋeyo i wac no, joringo yu Listira kodi Dabe, tindin ma Likonia, kodi iy'adec m'othoko jo.
Kenyo ama jofonj'iye Wac Manyen Maber no.
Onwaŋo nitie nyatoro i Listira ma tiende je oŋol; go oyido oŋol wok i nywolirok pere aka k'onyalo woth.
Go onwaŋo obedo piny ciko ithe winjo wac pa Paulo. Gikenyo Paulo oneno go tirtir aka munyo oneno nike ŋato nigi yeyo aka nyalo limo both,
owaco rigo gi dwonde madwoŋ ni, “Ay malo icungi m'itire!” Ŋato oay malo abwap to cako thokirok gi woth.
Munyo lwak ji oneno gima Paulo otimo, jocako koko i dhodhok Likonia pajo ni, “Werin jolokere ji aka joloro bongi wan!”
Jomiyo Barinaba nyinge ni Zewo, aka Paulo ni Hames, rupiri go oyido a jaluwo madwoŋ.
Gikenyo jacowirok i migam pa were Zewo, ma migam pere oyido nitie dho tindi, okelo thwondhe moro kodi thiw ajwoka i waŋkac munyo go kanyacel kodi ji ma tindi no onwaŋo jomito timo cowirok ri jomoor.
Munyo Paulo gi Barinaba jowinjo gim'onwaŋo jokidho timo, joyeco nangin pajo to joringo i dier lwak ji munyo jokoko ni,

“Jume, raŋo ma witimo gime? Wabende wabedo ji paka win! Wanitie ka i atoŋa ma tito riwin Wac Manyen Maber, kwanyo win woko kwoŋ gigipiny me m'ongoye kony bongi Were Ma kwo, m'ocweyo polo gi piny, nam kodi gigipiny je manitie i iye.
I ndir m'okadho go oweyo nonin je luwo yo pajo wegi;

to kad'ameno go k'odoŋ nono m'ongoye gima nyutho ni go nitie, rupiri go onyuthere ndir je i gigipiny mabeyo ma go timo: Go miyo win koth wok i polo kodi cemo m'ipidho i hongo m'otire; go miyo win cemo aka poŋo kisangala i cuny win.”
To kada joluwo kweth wac me, je jomoor jok'onyalo i yoto juko jono cowirok rijo.
Joyuda moro jowok yu Antiok ma Pisidia kodi Yu Ikoniam; aka munyo jocowo ywayo ji yuthenge pajo, jogoyo Paulo gi telin, joywayo go, to jowodho go woko ma tindi munyo joparo nike go otieko tho.
To munyo jom'oyeyo jocokere jothoko go, oay malo to gik i tindi. Yawere mere go kodi Barinaba jokadho yu Dabe.
Paulo kodi Barinaba jofonjo Wac Manyen Maber i Dabe to jolimo jofonjirok mathoth. Gikenyo jogik Listira, kodi Ikoniam, kodi Antiok i Pisidia.
Jomedo jom'oyeyo meni to jomedo jo miseni nike jowocwire i yeyo. Jofonjo ni, “Waripo donjo i Ker pa Were munyo waluwo i teko madit.”
Munyo jotieko ketho jotel i kisi kitipa pa joma yeyo gi kwayo kodi riyo kec, joketho jo i cingi Rwoth m'oyido joketho geno pajo kwoŋe.
Munyo jocowo woth iy'adec ma Pisidia, jokidho yu Pamfilia.
Jofonjo i Paga to joloro Atalia.
Aka wok kenyo jocewere to jogik Antiok, kama ndir ca oketh'iye jo gicen ri Were i kur ma nema pere kwoŋ tic m'oyido jocowo me.
Munyo jotundo Antiok, jocoko ji ma kitipa pa jom'oyeyo kanyacel to jowaco rijo gimoro je ma Were otimo gi jo; kendo paka onyo oyawo royo ri Jopath ma yeyo.
Jotieko kenyo hongo malac gi jom'oyeyo.
Paulo kodi Barinaba jobedo gi piem mager tektek gi jo kwoŋ gime; gikenyo oridhi ni Paulo kodi Barinaba kodi joman ma Antiok jowokidhi Yerusalem jowoneni jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin kwoŋ wac me.
Paka kitipa pa jom'oyeyo ooro jo, joluwo yu Fonisia kodi Samaria to jowaco rijo paka Jopath bende jowire bongi Were; wac me okelo kisangala madwoŋ ri jom'oyeyo je.
Munyo jotundo Yerusalem, kitipa pa jom'oyeyo kodi jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin je jojolo jo maber, to jowaco rijo gimoro je ma Were otimo rijo.
To jom'oyeyo megi m'oyido jonitie i kweth pa Jofarisayo jocungo to jowaco ni, “Mitere wothum Jopath aka wowaci rijo mako Cik pa Musa.”
Gikenyo jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin, joromo kanyacel paro kwoŋ wac me.
Rumacen munyo piem okadho kamabor, Petero ocungo to waco ni, “Wutmera, wiŋeyo nike yucen koro Were oyeran i dier win fonjo Jopath Wac Manyen Maber, nike jowonyal winjo jowoyey.
Aka Were, m'oŋeyo cuny ji, onyutho paka ojolo Jopath munyo bende omiyo jo Cuny Maleŋ, paka otimo gi wan.
Go k'opoko wan gi jo; aka ocwako reco pajo cungo kwoŋ yeyo pajo.
Am'omiyo, raŋo ma wimito temo Were mawan munyo wiyimo ri jom'oyeyo okol i goki jo makada kwarere wan kosa wawegi wakinyali tiŋo?
Be! Kole wayeyo ni wabino limo both kwoŋ nema pa Rwoth Yesu, paka jo bende.”
Gikenyo jom'ocokere je joliŋ to jowinjo Barinaba kodi Paulo munyo jonuŋanuŋa ri ji gir'aura je kodi gigipiny ma kelo dhier ma Were otimo i dier Jopath.
Munyo jocowo luwo, Yakobo oluwo malo ni, “Winjan win, wutmera!
Simon owok tito riwan paka Were okutho onyutho paka dewo kwoŋ Jopath munyo kwanyo i dier jo ji ma jowobedi apere won.
Kole wac pa jotuci wac Were makere swa gi me. Paka ndiko waco ama.”
abino geto kendo ot pa Daudi m'opodho.
Abino geto kendo gundin mere,
alageto malo.”
“Aka ŋey ji man je joworangi Rwoth,
kodi Jopath je m'ilwoŋo jo gi nyingan.”
“Rwoth, m'omiyo gime oŋeyere wok con ama owaco ameno.”
“Am'omiyo aparo ni wakiripi cando Jopath ma jowire bongi Were;
kucel waripo ndiko balwa ma cero jo lamo cal makicar kosa timo kidakana kosa camo gim'odey kosa remo moro je kosa cemo moro je ma k'olony ayin.
Kole Cik pa Musa otiek kisoma hongo malac i kalamo pa Joyuda m'omore i Sabato je, aka wac pere ifonjo i tindi je.”

Gikenyo jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin pa jom'oyeyo, kanyacel gi kitipa pa jom'oyeyo gipi joridho yero ji moro i kitipa gi dhiro jo Antiok kodi Paulo gi Barinaba. Joyero Yuda m'ilwoŋo ni Barsaba kodi Sila, j'ario ma jom'oyeyo jomiyo dwoŋ swa.
Jodhiro jono gi balwa me: “Wan jom'oyeyo jowot win, ma joman jomoor aka joman jotel ma kitipin pa jom'oyeyo, wadhiro moth ri jom'oyeyo ma Jopath ma Antiok kodi Siria kodi Silisia.
Watieko winjo paka ji megi i kitipa mawan jobino koro to jokwinyo win gi luwo pajo ma to wakifonjo jo ni jowotimi ameno.
Am'omiyo watieko romo kanyacel aka wajoje wayere yero jomikwenda moro to wadhiro jo riwin. Jobino kanyacel gi merin mawan Barinaba gi Paulo,
cwo ma jojala kwo pajo i tic ri Rwoth Yesu Kristo.
Am'omiyo wadhiro riwin Yuda kodi Sila, ma wegi jobino waco riwin gigipiny ma wandiko riwin.
Ato oneno ri Cuny Maleŋ kodi wan ni ber wakiri watur win gi bieto kwanyo woko or me kende:
Wikiri wicam gim'ocow gine jwogi; wikiri wicam remo; wikiri wicam le m'odey; aka kure win kwoŋ kite ma kidakana. Wibino timo maber ka wikure kwoŋ gigipiny me. Kutho win.”
Jooro jomikwenda no to jokidho Antiok, kama jocok'iye kitipa pa jom'oyeyo je to jomiyo jo balwa no.
Munyo ji josoma balwa no, kisangala opoŋ i cuny jo ro mikwenda ma dwoko meni.
Yuda kodi Sila, m'onwaŋo bende jotuci wac Were, joluwo ma hongo malac kodi jom'oyeyo no munyo jomedo jo meni kendo jodwoko cuny jo.
Munyo jocowo hongo moro kenyo, jom'oyeyo josewila jo gi siem, to jogik bongi jomoor.
[To Sila oridho paro ma doŋ kenyo].
Paulo kodi Barinaba jocowo hongo moro i Antiok kanyacel gi joman mathoth munyo jofonjo wac pa Rwoth.
Rumacen Paulo owaco ri Barinaba ni, “Weyi wagiki waliewi wutmin wan i tindi je ma watieko fonj'iye Wac pa Were, aka wanen paka jonitie.”
Barinaba onwaŋo yenyo ni jowokadhi gi Yohana Mariko bende,
to Paulo oparo ni jokiripi kadho gine, rupiri ndir ca go k'obedo gi jo kiri i gik tic pajo, to owire to weyo jo i Pamfilia.
Jobedo gi piem matek wegi kendi gin, to jopokere. Gikenyo Barinaba okwanyo Mariko to jocewere jocomo yu Sipuro,
to Paulo oyero Sila to jokadho kareno jom'oyeyo joketho go i kur ma nema pa Were.
Go oluwo yu Siria kodi Silisia, munyo jomedo kitipa pa jom'oyeyo meni.
Paulo ocomo yu Dabe gi Listira. Jafonjirok moro ma nyinge Timothe oyido nikenyo; go oyido obedo wod pa dhakodwoŋ moro ma Jayuda m'oyeyo, to bamere oyido obedo Jagrik.
Jom'oyeyo je ma Listira kodi Ikoniam onwaŋo joluwo maber kwoŋ Timothe.
Paulo oyenyo kidho gi Timothe, ameno to kutho thumo go. Go otimo ameno rupiri Joyuda ma kenyo je oyido joŋeyo ni ba Timothe obedo Jagrik.
Munyo jowotho i tindi m'omore, jomiyo jom'oyeyo ma kamoro je cik ma jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin pa jom'oyeyo ma Yerusalem joridho, aka jowaco rijo mako cik me.
Ameno kitipa pa jom'oyeyo omedi meni i yeyo aka odongo i welo ji kisi piny m'oyawere je.
Jono jowotho iy'adec ma Firigiya kodi Galasia: Cuny Maleŋ k'oyeyo jo fonjo mikwenda iy'adec ma Asia.
Munyo jotundo yu loka m'othenere gi Misia, jotemo kidho iy'adec ma Bithinia, to Cuny Maleŋ pa Yesu k'oyeyo jo.
Riameno jowotho i Misia to joloro yu Tirowa.
Paulo olimo menyirok wor no ma go onen'iye dhano ma Makedonia munyo ocungo aka kwayo go ni, “Biye yu Makedonia korin ikony wan!”
Tekin Paulo limo menyirok no, wayikere kidho Makedonia, rupiri oyido waridho ni Were otieko lwoŋo wan fonjo Wac Manyen Maber ri ji kenyo.
Waweyo Tirowa gi ye to wacewere wakidho yu Samotura, aka yawere mere watundo Neyapoli.
Wok kenyo wadonjo Filipi, tindi ma iy'adec ma Makedonia; kenyo bende obedo kama Joroma jodhumo. Wacowo ndelo moro i tindi no.
I ndelo ma Sabato wawok i tindi to wakidho i thengi jwom, kama waparo nike kakwayo pa Joyuda niye. Wabedo piny to waluwo gi mon m'oyido jocokere kenyo.

Ŋat'acel kwoŋ jo m'owinjo wan oyido ilwoŋo ni Lidia, ma Thiatira, m'onwaŋo jamitan ma nangin ma rangi ariŋo. Go oyido obedo dhako ma lamo Were, aka Rwoth oyawo paro pere ma winjo wac ma Paulo oyido waco.
Go kodi ji ma ot pere obatisa jo. Gikenyo go olwoŋo wan ni, “Biye win wibedi i ot paran, ka winiaŋ adieri ni ayeyo Rwoth.” Aka go onyalo dwoŋo wan to wakidho.

Ndelo moro munyo oyido wakidho i kakwayo, waromo kodi ŋeca moro manyako m'onwaŋo nitie gi cuny m'ocido moro ma miyo go thiedho ri ji gima bino i kwo pajo ma yuwaŋe. Go oyido kelo pesa kweth ri jopere munyo tuco ri ji silwany pajo.
Go oluwo Paulo gi wan munyo koko ni, “Jome jotic pa Were Madwoŋ Maloyo! Jotito riwin royo ma both!”
Go otimo ameno ndelo mathoth, cuka Paulo nge omako swa to wire to waco ri jwok no ni, “I nyingi Yesu Kristo aorin, woki kwoŋ nyako me!” Jwok no owok kwoŋe i hongo no won.
Munyo wegi nyako no joneno ni yo pajo ma limo pesa onyo onyekere woko, jomako Paulo gi Sila to joywayo jo to jotero jo bongi jodhum i katale.
Jokelo jo bongi jolweny ma Joroma to jowaco ni, “Jome Joyuda, aka jokelo ruwirok i tindi mawan ka.
Jofonjo kite ma turo cik mawan; wan wa Joroma aka wakinyali mako kite no!”
Lwak ji bende odonjo i kwinyo no, aka jothumi banjin joyeco nangin pa Paulo kodi Sila, to jowodho or ni wocwadi jo.
Munyo otiek cwado jo ma loŋo, obol jo i twec, aka oor jakur cego od twec matek.
Munyo jotieko limo or me, jakur od twec obolo jo i kisika ma iye to tweyo tiendi jo i kindi kasike madongo.
Dho kapa sawa aucel ma wor, Paulo kodi Sila oyido jokwayo aka jowero wer ma pako Were, aka jotwec oyido jociko ithi gin jowinjo jo.
Piyo piyo yengirok pa piny otimere, m'oyengo od twec kiri i tiende. Gikenyo thigin je joyawere abwap, to atege pa jotwec je gonyere woko.
Jakur jotwec ocew, aka munyo oneno thigin ma od twec ni thwolo, oparo nike jom'otwey je onyo jokwale; gikenyo oyuyo abor pere aka oyido won kidho nekere.
To Paulo okoko gi derino ni, “Ikir'itim raco kwoŋin, wajoje fodi wanitie ka.”
Jakur okwayo mac, omwomere i ot, to gore piny gi kirin dho ka tiendi Paulo gi Sila.
Gikenyo otero jo woko to penjo jo ni, “Jodongo, aripo timo aŋo ŋey alimi both?”
Jowaco ni, “Yey Yesu Kristo, aka ibino limo both, in kodi ot perin gipi.”
Aka jofonjo go wac pa Rwoth kodi joman je ma ot pere.
I hongo ma wor no won, jakur od twec otero jo lwoko adholin pajo; aka go kodi joot pere je obatisa jo mayot.
Go otero Paulo kodi Sila i ot pere to miyo jo cemo moro acama. Go kodi joot pere je kisangala opoŋ i cuny jo ro yeyo Were.
Yawere mere odikin, jodhum ma Joroma jodhiro or ri jolweny ni, “Gony win jono jowokadhi.”
Gikenyo jakur od twec owaco ri Paulo ni, “Jothumi banjin jodhiro or ni wogonyi win. Onyo winyalo kadho, kadhi win gi siem.”

To Paulo owaco ri jolweny ni, “Kole k'onwaŋ raco moro kwoŋ wan, aka otiek cwado wan i dier ji ma to wabedo Joroma! Odoko jobolo wan i twec; aka onyo pama jomito gonyo wan nyaliŋliŋ? Be! Weyi wegi jowobin jowogony wan.”
Josirikale madongo jodhiro wac no ri jodhum ma Joroma; aka munyo jowinjo ni Paulo kodi Sila jobedo Joroma, lworo omako jo.
Riameno jokidho to jokwayo cwaki bongi jo; gikenyo jowodho jo woko to jokwayo jo ni jowoeye i tindi.
Paulo gi Sila joweyo od twec to jokidho peco pa Lidia. Kenyo jorom'iye kodi jom'oyeyo, joluwo wac ma medo jo meni, to jokadho.
Joluwo yu Amfipoli kodi Apolonia, to jobino Thesalonika, kam'onwaŋo kalamo pa Joyuda nitie iye.
Paka Paulo yado oyido omaro timo, okidho i kalamo pa Joyuda. Aka opiemo gi ji gi wac ma Ndiko Maleŋ cowo hongo ma Sabato adek gipi,
munyo tito aka nyutho i wac ni Kristo oyido ripo candere aka ŋey wocerino go kwoŋ jom'otho. Paulo owaco ni, “Yesu me obedo Kristo.”
Jomegi kwoŋ jo joniaŋ to joriwere gi Paulo kodi Sila; kitipa pa Jogris mathoth ma jolamo Were, kodi mon mathoth ma joŋeyere bende jotimo ameno.

To Joyuda nyeko omako jo to jocoko joreco moro i royo m'okare ma tindi to jotimo bwora moro. Gikenyo jokelo woy madwoŋ i tindi gipi, to jomonjo peco pa Yason, munyo jorango Paulo kodi Sila wowodhi jo ri ji.
To munyo jok'onwaŋo jo, joyware gi Yason kodi jom'oyeyo moro kiri bongi jodhum ma tindi kareno jokoko ni, “Jome jokelo ruwirok kisi kamoro! Aka onyo bende jobino i tindi mawan ka, aka
Yason ama kano jo i ot pere. Joje joturo cik pa Kayisar, ka jowaco ni odoko nitie kere man, ma nyinge Yesu.”
Gi wac me jokelo ri lwak ji kodi jodhum ma tindi woy madwoŋ.
Jodhum jomiyo Yason kodi joman tweyo pesa m'omit t'iweyo jo kadho.
Tekin piny lokere macol, jom'oyeyo jodhiro Paulo gi Sila yu Bereya. Munyo jotundo koro, jokidho i kalamo pa Joyuda.
Joyuda ma kenyo oyido joneno bor loyo ma Thesalonika. Jociko ithi gin winjo fonji gi maro madwoŋ, aka ndelo je bin jofonjere Ndiko Maleŋ jowoneni k'agima Paulo ofonjo jo oyido obedo adieri.
Mathoth kwoŋ jo joyeyo, aka mon kweth ma malo kodi cwo ma Jogris bende joyeyo.
To munyo Joyuda ma Thesalonika jowinjo ni Paulo fonjo wac pa Were i Bereya bende, jobino kenyo to jocako nywowo ji.
Piyo piyo jom'oyeyo jodhiro Paulo i thengi jwom to Sila kodi Timothe jodoŋ Bereya.
Joma jokwaŋo Paulo jotero go kiri yu Athen aka ŋey jogik Bereya gi wac pa Paulo ni Sila kodi Timothe jowokidhi bonge mayot.
Munyo Paulo oyido kuro Sila kodi Timothe i Athen, cunye oramo swa munyo oneno ni tindi opoŋ gi gigipiny ma ji jocweyo ma jolamo.
Riameno go opiemo i kalamo pa Joyuda kodi Joyuda gi Jopath ma jolamo Were, kodi ji ma jobino ndelo je i katale madwoŋ.

Joepicura kodi Jostoik moro ma jopiem i wac bende jopiemo gine. Megi jowaco ni, “Jal mamiŋ me onyo bende kwot ni waco aŋo?” Joman jowaco ni, “cale pa go luwo kwoŋ werin moro ma wok loka man.” Jowaco ama rupiri Paulo onwaŋo luwo kwoŋ Yesu kodi cerino pere.
Ameno jokwanyo Paulo to jotero go i ot romo m'ilwoŋo ni Arewopago, to jowaco ni, “Wamito ŋeyo fonji manyen me ma iluwo kwoŋe.
Gik piny me ma wawinjo iluwo kwoŋe wendo riwan swa, aka wamito ŋeyo dwoŋ mere.”
(Ato ji ma Athen kodi jowiloka ma kenyo oyido jomaro oro hongo pajo je i luwo gi winjo gigipiny manyen m'otimere.)
Paulo ocungo i waŋ jom'ocokere i Arewopago no to waco ni, “Ji ma Athen! Aneno ni i yo je wimaro dini tektek,
rupiri munyo awotho i tindi mewin aneno kama wilamer'iye t'aneno migam m'ondiki kwoŋe ni, ‘Ri Were ma k'oŋeyere.’ Onyo gima wilamo, kada wikuya no, ama ee atito riwin kwoŋe.
Were m'ocweyo piny kodi gima nitie iye gibe, obedo Rwoth ma polo kodi piny, aka kibedi i udi ma ji ama jogero.
Odoko go kiyeny kony moro bongi dhano paŋini go keŋ gimoro ma dhano ama nyalo miyo go, rupiri go won ama miyo ji je kwo, luya kodi gimoro je.
Wok kwoŋ dhano acel go ocweyo nonin je, to miyo jo bedo i piny gipi. Go won ama cango ocano ndir kodi kew ma kabedo ma ji di jobed'iye.
Otimo ameno ni jowonyal rango go, ni ipoyo di jonwaŋo go munyo jomudamuda jorango go. To iy'adieri won, Were ki nitie bor gi nyatoro je kwoŋ wan.”
Kole i go wakwo aka wawotho kendo walama.
Paka jondiko mewin moro joluwo ni,
“Adieri wabedo nyithindho pere.”
Onyo paka wabedo nyithindho pa Were, wakiri wapar ni Were cale kodi zahabu, kosa feza, kosa tele ma dhano ama won othedho gi rieko kodi ndijo pere.
I ndir mafodi ji oyido jokuy'iye Were, go k'okwano reco pajo, to pama go onyo oro ji je i piny je ŋuto reco pajo,
rupiri go otieko yiko ndelo ma go bino thum'iye banja ri piny gipi i tiro, aka ŋata go oyero ama bino thumo. Go otieko ridho wac no ri dhano je munyo cerino ŋato kwoŋ jom'otho.
Munyo jowinjo Paulo luwo kwoŋ cerino pa jom'otho, megi kwoŋ jo jonyero ayin, to joman jowaco ni, “Wamito iluwi kwoŋ gime kendo.”
Gikenyo Paulo oeye i kacokirok no.
Cwo moro joluwo go to jolokere jom'oyeyo; kwoŋ jo oyido obedo Dionisio, acel kwoŋ jokweth ma Arewopago, dhako m'ilwoŋo ni Damaris, kodi joman.
Rumacen, Paulo oeye Athen to kidho yu Korintho.

Kenyo go orom'iye kodi Jayuda m'ilwoŋo ni Akwila ma nywole Ponto m'onwaŋo nyaka jowok Italia kodi cege Pirisila, rupiri Kayisar m'ilwoŋo ni Kilaudio oyido owodho cik ni Joyuda je jowoeye Roma. Paulo okidho neno jo
aka obedo gi jo to tiyo gi jo, rupiri bin go oyido limo cemo pere i timo wema, paka jono oyido bende jotimo.
Go opiemo i kalamo pa Joyuda i ndelo ma Sabato je, munyo temo miyo Joyuda kodi Jogris je niaŋ i gima go waco.
Munyo Sila kodi Timothe jotundo kenyo wok Makedonia, Paulo ooro hongo pere je ma fonjo mikwenda, munyo tito ri Joyuda ni Yesu obedo Kristo.

Munyo jopiemo gine to joluwo wac mareco kwoŋ go, Paulo oteŋo woko fukefuke ma nangin pere ka waco rijo ni, “Ka wirwenyo, remo mewin wodoŋ i wiy wiwegi! K'obedo wac paran. Wok pama kadho yuwaŋe abino kidho bongi Jopath ayino.”
Gikenyo oweyo jo to kidho bedo i ot pa Japath m'ilwoŋo ni Tito Yusito, m'onwaŋo lamo Were; ot pere oyido cegin gi kalamo pa Joyuda no.
Krispo, jatel ma kalamo pa Joyuda, oyeyo Rwoth, go kodi ot pere gipi; aka joman mathoth i Korintho jowinjo fonji pere, joyeyo, t'ibatisa jo.
Wor acel Paulo olimo lek, ma Rwoth owac'iye rigo ni, “Ikir'ibedi gi lworo, to medere gi luwo aka ikir'iliŋ,
rupiri an kodin, aka ongoye ŋata bino nyalo timo rin raco, rupiri an gi ji mathoth i tindi me.”
Ameno Paulo obedo kenyo oro acel g'adec, munyo fonjo ji wac pa Were.
Munyo Galio oloki gavana pa Jogris mar'adec ma Akaya, Joyuda jocokere kanyacel, jomako Paulo, to jotero go i waŋ jothumi banjin i kapido.
Jowaco ni, “Jal me temo dwoŋo ji jowolami Were i yo ma turo cik!”
Paulo onwaŋo kidho luwo to Galio waco ri Joyuda ni, “Bedi me obedo wac ma k'otire kosa tim ma turo cik m'otimi, d'adiyo cunyan t'awinjo win Joyuda,
to paka me obedo piem kwoŋ wac kodi nyingi ji kodi cik mewin, wiwegi wiripo cowo teko no. Akibino ran bedo jathum banja i gigipiny ma pameno!”
Ameno go oriemo jo woko i kapido.
Gikenyo jono je jorodho Sositheno, jatel ma kalamo pa Joyuda, to jogoyo go i nyim jopido. To meno je Galio k'odewo kwoŋe kada mathin.
Jotundo Efeso to Paulo weyo Pirisila kodi Akwila kenyo. Go odonjo i kalamo pa Joyuda to piemo gi Joyuda kenyo.
Kenyo jokwayo go ni wobedi gi jo hongo malac, to go k'oyeyo.
Kucel, owaco rijo munyo kadho ni, “K'obedi can pa Were, abino dwoko bongi win.” Gikenyo ocewere to eye Efeso.
Munyo go otundo Kasareya, okidho to m'otho kitipa pa jom'oyeyo, aka ŋey okadho yu Antiok.
Munyo go ocowo hongo moro kenyo to kadho iy'adec ma Galasia kodi Firigiya munyo medo jom'oyeyo meni.
Jayuda moro ma nyinge Apolo, m'onywol Alekizandiria, obino Efeso. Go oyido jaluwo maber swa aka oyido oŋeyo Ndiko Maleŋ bende maber.
Go oyido otiek fonjo go Yo pa Rwoth, aka gi cunye je oluwo aka ofonjo fonji m'otire kwoŋ Yesu. To go oyido oŋeyo batisimo pa Yohana won kende.
Go ocako luwo gi miseni i kalamo pa Joyuda; to munyo Pirisila kodi Akwila jowinjo go, jotero go peco to jomedo tito rigo maber kwoŋ royo pa Were.

Munyo Apolo oridho paro ma kidho Akaya, jom'oyeyo ma Efeso jomedo go meni, to jondiko ri jom'oyeyo ma yukorago ni jowojoli go kenyo. Munyo go otundo koro, obedo gi kony madwoŋ swa ri jono ma gi nema pa Were oyido jolokere jom'oyeyo.
Ato gi piem pere matek oturo woko piem pa Joyuda i dier ji kamaler munyo nyutho jo i Ndiko Maleŋ ni Yesu obedo Kristo.
Munyo Apolo nitie Korintho, Paulo owotho iy'adec ma Yumalo to tundo Efeso. Kenyo go onwaŋ'iye jofonjirok moro
to penjo jo ni, “Wilimo Cuny Maleŋ munyo wiyeyo?” Jodwoko go ni, “Oyido fodi wakiwinjo kada ni Cuny Maleŋ bende nitie.”
Openjo jo bende ni, “K'inen ameno, wilimo batisimo mene?” Jodwoko ni, “Batisimo pa Yohana.”
Paulo owaco ni, “Batisimo ma Yohana omiyo ji obedo ma ŋuto reco; to owaco ri ji ni joripo yeyo ŋat'oyido luwo go cen, aka meno a Yesu.”
Munyo jowinjo ameno, obatisa jo i nyingi Rwoth Yesu.
Paulo oketho cinge kwoŋ jo, to Cuny Maleŋ loro rijo to joluwo dhodhok m'opokere to jotuco mikwenda ma wok bongi Were.
Oyido joje jobedo ji apar g'ario.
Paulo okidho i kalamo pa Joyuda, to cowo hongo ma dwe adek munyo luwo kodi ji gi miseni, aka piemo gi jo munyo temo niaŋo jo kwoŋ Ker pa Were.

To munyo jomegi kwoŋ jo jobedo gi wictek to jokwero yeyo, aka joluwo gigipiny mareco kwoŋ Royo pa Rwoth ruwaŋ kitipa pa ji, Paulo oweyo jo to kadho gi jofonjirok; aka ndelo je jobedo gi piem i ot romo ma Tirano.
Gime obedo ameno cowo hongo ma oro ario, m'omiyo ji je ma jobedo iy'adec ma Asia, Joyuda kodi Jogris, jowinjo Wac pa Rwoth.
Were onwaŋo timo gigipiny ma kelo dhier gi i cingi Paulo,
ma kiri kitambalin pere kodi nangin pere ma woko oyido itero ri jotwo, aka two pajo ware woko aka cuny m'ocido wok kwoŋ ji.
Joyuda moro ma jothoko piny aka joriemo cuny m'ocido bende jotemo oro nyingi Yesu kwoŋ joma jonigi cuny m'ocido. Jowaco ri cuny marac moro ni, “Aorin i nyingi Yesu ma Paulo fonjo.”
Wot jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ma Jayuda m'ilwoŋo ni Sikeva jabirio onwaŋo jotimo ameno.
To cuny m'ocido owaco rijo ni, “Aŋeyo Yesu aka aŋeyo gima tho kwoŋ Paulo; to win, wijokune?”
Ŋat'oyido nitie gi cuny m'ocido no orodho jo to loyo jo gi meni. Joje jowok i ot pere gi ŋwec kinyoro g'adholin kwoŋ jo.
Joyuda je kodi Jopath ma jobedo Efeso jowinjo gime; lworo opoŋ kwoŋ joje, aka omiy nyingi Yesu dwoŋ m'oasere.
Ji mathoth m'onwaŋo nyaka joyeyo bende jobino munyo jopusere reco aka jothango kamaler ajwoka m'oyido jotimo.
Mathoth kwoŋ jom'oyido jothiedho jokelo kitawin pajo kanyacel to jowaŋo ruwaŋ ji je. Jokwano welo kitawin to je bedo pesa ma romo nusu feza gana piero abic.
Aka Wac pa Rwoth omedo nyay gi dongo i meni tektek.
Munyo gigipiny me otieko timere, Paulo oyiko paro ma luwo yu Makedonia gi Akaya aka wokidhi Yerusalem. Go owaco ni, “K'atieko kidho koro, aripo neno Roma bende.”
Gikenyo go ooro Timothe kodi Erasto, jokony pere ario, yu Makedonia, to won cowo hongo moro iy'adec ma Asia.
Hongo no ama ruwirok madwoŋ obed'iye i Efeso ma mako kwoŋ Royo pa Rwoth.
Jathedhi ma thedho feza moro m'ilwoŋo ni Demetro, ma thedho cal ma udi mathindho gi feza ri were Aritemi, oyido konyo jomitan swa i nywolo rijo ŋaŋo madit gi tic pere no.
Gikenyo go olwoŋo joje kanyacel, kodi joman ma tic pajo cale g'apere, to waco rijo ni, “Jume, kole wiŋeyo ni ŋaŋo mawan wok i tic me.
To wiwegi witieko winjo gi neno gima jal m'ilwoŋo ni Paulo me timo. Go otieko wiro ji mathoth ka kodi i Efeso kodi cegin iy'adec ma Asia gipi ka waco ni werin m'othedhi gi cingi jo k'obedo were.

Aka ameno wac onyo rac rupiri tic mawan bino limo nyinge marac. Ki meno kende, to raco man bende nitie ni migam pa were madhako Aritemi bino ngoye kony, aka dwoŋ pere bino rere woko ma to were madhako me ilamo i Asia parom kodi i piny je!”
Munyo jono jowinjo wac me, jolokere mager to jocako koko ni, “Aritemi ma Efeso dwoŋ m'oasere!”
Woy no olak i tindi gipi. Jono jomwomere i ot m'inen'iye tuko to jomako Gayo kodi Aristariko, Jomakedonia ario m'onwaŋo jowotho gi Paulo.
Paulo won oyido mito kidho luwo gi lwak ji, to jom'oyeyo jok'oyeyo rigo.
Jodhum moro m'oyido merin pere, bende jodhiro rigo wac munyo jokwayo go ni wokiri wotem kidho i ot m'inen'iye tuko no.
I hongo no i romo obedo woy kendekende; ji megi oyido jokoko gimoro acel, joman bende jokoko giman, aka jomegi jok'oŋeyo kiri gim'okelo jo kanyacel.
Joman joparo ni Alekizanda ama oero wac no, rupiri Joyuda joketho go paka jatel. Gikenyo Alekizanda otimo ranyuth gi cinge to temo luwo ma yiko nyinge i dier ji.
To munyo joniaŋ nike go Jayuda, joje jocako koko kiromo gimoro acel cowo hongo ma sawa ario gipi ni, “Aritemi ma Efeso dwoŋ m'oasere!”

Rumacen jadwoŋ ma tindi onyalo miyo Lwak ji kudirok munyo owaco ni, “Ji ma Efeso! Kole dhano je oŋeyo ni tindi ma Efeso ama kuro migam pa were Aritemi m'oasere no, kodi tele maleŋ m'opodho wok i polo.
Ongoye ŋata nyalo kwero gime. Am'omiyo, wiripo kudere makiweno timo gigipiny pa joneko.
Wikelo ji me ka kad'onwaŋo jokikedhi ot pa were kosa jowaci gigipiny mareco kwoŋ were madhako.
Ka Demetro kodi jotic pere jonitie gi wac ma jokelo kwoŋ nyatoro, nitie ndelo m'ocan ma pido aka rwodhe bende jonitie; jonyalo kelo wac pajo to joosere wegi kenyo.
To ka nitie gimoro man ma wimito, ibino cowo wac no i romo pa ji paka cik waco.
Aka gir'amien nyalo miyo iketho kwoŋ wan wac ma gwenyirok gi woy konon me. Kole ongoye gima di miy win woy madwoŋ ama, aka di wakinyalo nyutho atoŋa mere.”
Munyo go otieko waco ameno, ocego woko romo.
Munyo woy no orumo, Paulo olwoŋo jom'oyeyo kanyacel, aka munyo otieko medo jo meni to sewila jo. Gikenyo go oweyo jo to kidho yu Makedonia.
Munyo go otieko woth iy'adec no gi medo jo meni gi wac kweth, okidho piny pa Jogris
kama go obed'iye hongo ma dwe adek. Go oyido yikere kidho Siria to limo ŋeyo nike Joyuda oyido jocamo rigo sereko; gikenyo go oridho paro ma gik gi yu Makedonia.
Sopata, wod pa Piro ma wok Bereya, okidho gine; Aristariko jokodi Sekundo ma Thesalonika, kodi Gayo ma Dabe, kodi Timothe, kodi Tikiko gi Trofimo ma jowok Asia bende jowotho gine.
Jono jotelo aka jokuro wan i Tirowa.
Wacewere wok Filipi rumacen munyo kalima ma Mugat ma Buthow orumo, aka i ndelo mar'abic aka wariwere gi jo i Tirowa, kama wabed'iye sabiti acel.
I ndelo marapena (i sabiti) odikin, munyo wabedo kanyacel cemo gi merin, Paulo oluwo gi ji luwo mabor kiri i dier wor, rupiri go oyido yenyo kadho yawere mere.
Talin oyido omore i ot ma malo kam'oyido warom'iye.

Jayac moro ma nyinge Yutiko onwaŋo obedo wi dirisa; to paka Paulo omedere luwo, Yutiko nindo onuro cuka nindo okadho gine to podho piny wok wi gorofa ma malo mar'adek. Jotiŋo go malo to jonwaŋo ni otieko tho.
To Paulo oloro piny to luŋere kwoŋe to ketho kore kwoŋe to waco ni, “Wikiri wilwor, go fodi kwo!”
Gikenyo go ogik i ot ma malo, oturo mugat, to camo. Munyo Paulo otieko luwo gi jo hongo malac cuka ceŋ ogulo, to okadho.
Jono jokadho gi jayac no makwo, to cuny jo dwoko maber.
Wamedere gi woth tundo i ye to wacewere wacomo yu Aso, kam'onwaŋo wakidho rwak'iye Paulo i ye. Go owaco riwan timo ameno, rupiri oyido kidho kenyo atiendi.
Munyo go oromo gi wan i Aso, warwako go i ye to wakidho yu Mitilene.
Wacewere wok kenyo to watundo yu Kiyo yawere mere. Rumacen ma ndelo acel, watundo Samo, aka yawere mere aka watundo Mileto.
Paulo oyido oyenyo cewirok kalo Efeso, ŋey nyaka wokiri wonyeki hongo iy'adec ma Asia. Go onwaŋo kwakere ka mito tundo Yerusalem i ndelo ma Pentekost ka nyalere.
Paulo odhiro wac Efeso wok Mileto munyo kwayo jotel ma kitipa pa jom'oyeyo bino romo gine.
Munyo jobino, go owaco rijo ni, “Wiwegi Wiŋeyo kite ma abed'iye gi win i hongo je, wok i ndelo marapena m'atund'iye iy'adec ma Asia.
Gi bwonirok kodi pigi waŋan, atimo tic paran paka jatic pa Rwoth, i ndir ma teko obed'iye ran ro sereko pa Joyuda.
Wiŋeyo nike akimuŋo win gimoro ma d'okonyo win munyo afonjo win i dier ji kamaler kodi i pecin mewin.
Afonjo Joyuda kodi Jopath parom nike jowoŋuti reco pajo jowogiki bongi Were, to joyeyo Rwoth Yesu Kristo.
Aka gunyo ni, gi wac pa Cuny Maleŋ akidho Yerusalem, ma akuya gima bino timan koro.
Kwanyo woko gim'aŋeyo a me: I tindi je Cuny Maleŋ otieko nyuthan kicutho nike twec kodi teko ama kuran.
To akiter kwo paran pa gimadwoŋ, kosa pa gima diwelo tekin acowo tic ma Rwoth Yesu ooran ma tito ri ji Wac Manyen Maber kwoŋ nema pa Were.”
“Atieko woth i dier win joje, munyo afonjo Ker pa Were, to pama aŋeyo ni kwoŋ win ongoye ŋat'odoko bino nenan kendo.
Am'omiyo konon atuco riwin kamaler ni ka moro kwoŋ win orweny meno kiwaci paran,
rupiri akimuŋo win atoŋa pa Were gipi.
Kure win wiwegi kodi sidwol rombo je, ma Cuny Maleŋ oketho i cingi win, ni wibedi jotel mere, ma konyo kitipa pa jom'oyeyo pa Were, ma go oloko apere gi remo pa Wode won.
Kole aŋeyo ni k'atieko eye, arara mager bino donjo bongi win, aka jok'owor sidwol rombo.
Aka ndir bino tundo ma jomoro i dier win won jobino ay gi twodo ma ywayo jom'oyeyo bongi jo.
Am'omiyo kure win, aka poyi win ni, odieceŋ gi wor akikeŋ fonjo dhano je kwoŋ win gi geregere cowo hongo ma romo oro adek.”
“To pama onyo aketho win i cingi Were kodi i wac ma nema pere manyalo dongo win to miyo win silwany ma go okano ri ji pere je.
Fodi akiwanya feza kosa zahabu pa nyatoro kosa ruk.
Wiwegi wiŋeyo ni atiyo gi cingan me aka alimo gimoro je ma an kodi jowotan onwaŋo wayenyo aora.
Atieko nyutho win i gigipiny je nike timo tic gi meni miyo wanyalo konyo joma nyap munyo wapoyo wac pa Rwoth Yesu m'owaco ni, ‘Silwany nitie madwoŋ ri ŋata poko gimoro loyo ŋata limo.’ ”
Munyo Paulo ocowo luwo, ogoyo conge piny to kwayo gi joje
Gikenyo joje joywak gi geregere munyo jopodho i kore aka jocwiyo lembe.
Jorem swa ro wac pere ni odoko jok'oneni go kendo. Rumacen to jokwaŋo go i ye.
Munyo watieko kisewila jo to wacewere waeye, wabino nyatirtir i loka Kos, to yawere mere watundo Rod, aka wok kenyo wadonjo Patara.
Munyo wanwaŋo kenyo ye m'oyido kidho Fonisia, waidho to wacewere.
Munyo watundo kama wanyalo nen'iye Sipuro, wacewere yuracam to wacomo yu Siria. Waloro Tire kama ye oyido kidho wodh'iye gigipiny m'otiŋo.
Wanwaŋo jom'oyeyo moro kenyo to wabedo gi jo sabiti acel. Gi meni pa Cuny Maleŋ jowaco ri Paulo nike wokiri wokidhi Yerusalem.
To munyo hongo mawan orumo, waweyo jo to wakadho i woth mawan. Joje gi mon pajo gi nyithindho, jokwaŋo wan kalo tindi. Wajoje wagoyo congi wan piny dho thengi pi to wakwayo.
Gikenyo kisi dhano osewila nyawote, to waidho ye kareno jo jodok.
Munyo watieko cewirok mawan wok Tire, watundo Pitolemay, kama wamoth'iye jom'oyeyo to wabed'iye gi jo ma ndelo acel.
Yawere mere waeye to wakidho Kasareya. Kenyo wakidho i ot pa Filipo jatiti Wac Manyen Maber, to wabedo bonge.
Go oyido nitie gi nyithindho manyir aŋwen ma fodi jok'onywomere m'oyido jotuco mikwenda ma wok bongi Were.
Munyo watieko bedo kenyo ndelo moro, jatuci wac ma nyinge Agabo otundo kenyo wok Yuda.
Go obino bongi wan to kwanyo del pa Paulo to won tweyo gine tiende gi cinge, to waco ni, “Me a gima Cuny Maleŋ waco, ‘Joyuda jobino tweyo won del me ama i Yerusalem to jobolo go i cingi Jopath.’ ”
Munyo wawinjo ameno wan kodi ji ma kenyo wakwayo Paulo ni wokiri wokidhi Yerusalem.
To go odwoko ni, “Witimo aŋo, wiywak aka wikelo ran rembo i cunyan? Kole ayikere ki nyaka ri twec kende to kiri ri tho je i Yerusalem i nyingi Rwoth Yesu.”
Wakinyalo turo go i gime am'omiyo cuny wan bende oeye to wawaco ni, “Weyi mito pa Rwoth wotimere.”
Munyo watieko bedo ye kenyo hongo moro, wayikere to waay to wakadho Yerusalem.
Jofonjirok megi ma Kasareya bende jowotho gi wan, to jotero wan i ot pa jal m'onwaŋo wakidho bedo pere m'ilwoŋo ni Minason ma wok Sipuro, m'oyido obedo acel kwon jofonjirok ma jopen yeyo.
Munyo watundo Yerusalem jom'oyeyo jojolo wan gi kisangala madit swa.
Yawere mere Paulo okidho gi wan neno Yakobo; aka jotel je ma kitipa pa jom'oyeyo oyido jonitie kenyo.
Paulo omotho jo to miyo jo wac je kwoŋ gimoro je ma Were oyido otieko timo i dier Jopath i tic pere.
Munyo jotieko winjo go, joje jopako Were. Gikenyo jowaco ri Paulo ni, “Omin wan neni, nitie Joyuda kweth ma jotieko lokere jom'oyeyo, to joje fodi jocwire tektek kwoŋ Cik pa Musa.
Otiek waco rijo nike ifonjo Joyuda je ma jo ni i dier Jopath weyo Cik pa Musa, aka ni iwaco rijo nike kiri jowothumi nyithindho pajo kosa luwo kula pa Joyuda.
Onyo aŋo ma ripo atima? Adieri jobino winjo nike itieko tundo ka.
Am'omiyo tim gima wawaco rin. Wan gi ji moro aŋwen ma jonitie i kwoŋirok manyadini.

Kidhi gi jome ibedi gi jo i tim ma lonyirok aka iwodhi rijo cul kwoŋ gima joori je, odoko jowoliel ye wiy gin. I yo me dhano je bino ŋeyo nike adieri ingoye i gimoro je ma joluwo kwoŋin, kucel in bende imako Cik pa Musa.

To ma mako kwoŋ Jopath ma jotieko yeyo, watieko dhiro rijo balwa, munyo wawaco rijo nike waridho paro ni kiri jowocami cemo m'ocow gine werin m'otimi gi cingi jo; kosa camo remo, kosa le moro je m'odey, aka jowokure kwoŋ kite ma kidakana.”
Gikenyo Paulo otero jono aka yawere mere otimo gi jo tim ma lonyirok. Gikenyo go odonjo i Ot pa Were nyutho jo ndelo ma lonyirok no kidho rum'iye aka ŋey kisi dhano kwoŋ jo wokel mic pere ma cowirok.
Munyo ndelo abirio oyido cegin rumo, Joyuda moro ma jowok iy'adec ma Asia joneno Paulo i Ot pa Were. Jono josigila lwak ji gibe to jomako Paulo.

Jokoko ni, “Ji ma Isiraili! Kony wan win! Me won a ŋata wotho kamoro je aka fonjo ji dakirok gi Joisiraili, kwero Cik pa Musa kodi Ot pa Were me. Aka onyo okelo kiri Jopath moro i Ot pa Were to koco kamaleŋ me!”
(Jowaco ama rupiri joneno Trofimo ma Efeso gi Paulo i tindi, aka joparo nike Paulo oyido otero go i Ot pa Were).
Ruwirok olak i tindi gipi, aka ji je joringo kanyacel jomako Paulo, to jowodho go woko wok i Ot pa Were. Piyo piyo t'icego woko dhoudi je.
Lwak ji onwaŋo temo neko Paulo to itero wac ri jamituka pa jolweny ma Roma nike ruwirok nitie i Yerusalem gipi.
Piyo piyo jatel otero jolweny moro madongo kodi jolweny man to jomwomere kwoŋ lwak ji. Tekin ji neno go gi jolweny to joweyo goyo Paulo.
Jatel okidho bongi Paulo, omako go, to wodho or nike wotwey Paulo gi lijegere ario. Gikenyo go openjo ni, “Me ŋa; kendo otimo aŋo?”
Jomogo i lwak ji jokoko gimoro acel, joman giman. Ruwirok obedo mathoth m'omiyo jatel k'onyalo nwaŋo adieri ma gim'otimere; gikenyo ooro ji tero Paulo i cel pa jolweny.
Jotundo gine i geŋin ma dhiot, to jolweny jotiŋo atiŋa go rupiri lwak ji oyido olokere mager swa.
Joje oyido joluwo go ka jokoko ni, “Neki wi go!”
Munyo jocegin tero Paulo i cel, go oluwo gi jatel ni, “Weyi awaci ye rin gimoro?” Jasirikale madwoŋ openjo ni, “Iŋeyo Dhogrik?
In won me iki Jamisir ma ndir ca oruwo wiy ji to telo jogwenyirok gana aŋwen i thim?”
Paulo odwoko ni, “A Jayuda to onywolan i Tariso ma Silisia, anywola ma tindi m'oŋeyere maber. Mondo yeyan aluwi gi ji.”
Jasirikale madwoŋ oyeyo go, to Paulo cungo i geŋin ma dhiot to miyo ji ranyuth gi cinge. Munyo jopie, Paulo oluwo gi jo gi Dhoyuda.
“Wutmera gi bacere nan, winji win gim'awaco riwin ma nyutho win paka angoye gi raco moro!”
Munyo jowinjo go luwo Dhoyuda, jomedo kudirok; Paulo omedere luwo ama:

“Abedo Jayuda, m'onywol i Tariso ma Silisia, to adongo Yerusalem won ka paka jafonjirok pa Gamaliel. Alimo fonji matek kwoŋ Cik pa kwarere mawan, aka oyido amiyere ri Were paka win bende ma win ka konon me.
Alwenyo gi ji ma joluwo Royo pa Yesu no tundo kiri i nek. Amako cwo gi mon aka abolo jo i od twec.

Jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi kitipa pa jotel pa ji gibe jonyalo ridho riwin ni aluwo gir'adieri. Alimo balwa wok bongi jo m'ondiki ri Joyuda jowoti wan ma Damasiko aka akidho koro mako ji kelo jo Yerusalem gi lijegere i cingi gin wocandi jo.”
“Aka munyo oyido atieko woth ariko Damasiko, dho kapa sawa aucel, lero madwoŋ owok malo abwap to thokan.
Gikenyo agore piny t'awinjo dwondi ŋata waco ran ni, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Raŋo ilwenyo kodan?’
Apenjo ni, ‘In iŋa, Rwoth?’ Owaco ran ni, ‘An Yesu ma Nazareth m'ilwenyo gine.’
Ji m'onwaŋo nikodan kenyo joneno lero no to jok'owinjo dwondi ŋat'onwaŋo luwo kodan no.
Apenjo go ni, ‘Atimi aŋo, Rwoth?’ Aka Rwoth owaco ran ni, ‘Ay malo idonji Damasiko, aka kenyo am'ibino waco rin gimoro je ma Were ocano rin timo.’
Munyo waŋan onwaŋo otho ro lero m'oasere no, jowotan jomako cingan to joteran Damasiko.”
“Kenyo onwaŋo nitie nyatoro m'ilwoŋo ni Anania, jadin m'owinjo Cik mawan aka Joyuda je ma Damasiko jomiyo go dwoŋ swa.
Go obino bongan to cungo kabutan to waco ni, ‘Omera Saulo, caki neno kendo!’ I hongo no won aneno kendo to aŋiyo go.
Gikenyo go owaco ran ni, ‘Were pa kwarere mawan oyerin ni iŋey gima go mito, ni inyal neno Ŋat'otire pere gi winjo go munyo iwinjo dwonde won;
ameno ibino bedo jakony pere ma waco ri ji gim'itieko neno gi winjo.
To onyo aŋo m'idoko ikuro? Ay malo obatisa in, aka reco perin wolwoki woko munyo ilwoŋo nyingi go.’ ”
“Agik Yerusalem, aka munyo akwayo i Ot pa Were, aneno cal m'omenyere ran
m'aneno iye Rwoth munyo waco ran ni, ‘Redi mayot ieye Yerusalem, rupiri ji ma ka jok'ojol gim'iwaco kwoŋan.’
Adwoko ni, ‘Rwoth, kole joŋeyo maber paka yado akidho i kalamo pa Joyuda m'omore, amako jom'oyeyin, agoyo jo aka atero jo i twec.
Aka munyo ineko jatiti Wac perin Stefano, oyido an kenyo, aka abende afoyo odoko aŋat'akuro kiri ruk pa joma joneko go.’
Rwoth owaco ran ni, ‘Kadhi, rupiri abino dhirin bor swa i dier Jopath.’ ”
Ji onwaŋo jowinjo luwo pa Paulo cuka tundo i wac me, to jocako koko gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Kwany wi woko jalo i piny ka! Go kiripi wokwo kendo!”
Oyido jokoko aka jokwadho nangin pajo i hongo aka jowito fukefuke malo.
Gikenyo jasirikale madwoŋ owodho or nike woter Paulo i cel, to oro jo cwado go ma mito ŋeyo gim'omiyo Joyuda jokoko rigo ameno.
To munyo jocowo kikoda go aka wocwadi, Paulo owaco ri jasirikale moro m'onwaŋo ocungo kenyo ni, “Kere cik yeyo win cwado ŋat'obedo anywola ma Roma kada fodi k'oosa go banja moro je?”
Munyo jasirikale no owinjo ameno, okidho bongi jadwoŋ pa jolweny to penjo ni, “Wikidho timo aŋo? Kole jame obedo anywola ma Roma!”
Gikenyo jatel pa jolweny okidho bongi Paulo to penjo go ni, “Waci ran, ibedo Jaroma?” Paulo odwoko ni, “Ey.”
Jatel pa jolweny no owaco ni, “An alokere Jaroma munyo atieko culo pesa malac swa.” Paulo odwoko ni, “To an onywolan paka Jaroma.”
Gikenyo piyo piyo, ji m'oyido jokidho kelo penji ri Paulo joeye gicen kwoŋe; aka jatel pa jolweny lworo omako munyo oneno ni Paulo obedo anywola ma Roma, aka ama go oyido otweyo gi lijegere.

Yawere mere jatel pa jolweny oyenyo ŋeyo adieri ma wac ma Joyuda jomito kelo kwoŋ Paulo; riameno ooro jo gonyo woko lijegere pa Paulo to oro jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jopido je parom romo. Gikenyo go owodho Paulo, to kelo go ruwaŋ jo.
Paulo oŋiyo jopido nyatirtir to waco ni, “Wutmera cunyan oŋeyo maber swa kwoŋ kwo paran gipi ni angoye gi raco ruwaŋ Were i hongo je kiri pama.”
Jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam ma nyinge Anania ooro jom'onwaŋo jocungo kabuti Paulo goyo lembe.
Paulo owaco rigo ni, “Were bino goyin adieri, in m'ical kor ot m'ofuy matar gi woko! Wibedo kenyo ma thumo ran banja cungo kwoŋ Cik, aka win won ama odoko wituro Cik ago munyo wioro jo goyan!”
Ji m'onwaŋo jo nicegin gi Paulo jowaco rigo ni, “Inyalo nedi luwo marac kwoŋ jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam?”
Paulo odwoko ni, “Wutmera oyido akiŋeyo nike go jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam rupiri ndiko waco ni, ‘Wikiri wiluw marac kwoŋ jadhum pa ji mewin!’ ”
Tekin go otieko waco ameno, Jofarisayo kodi Josadukayo jocako dhawirok, to ji tiakere i bwora.
(Ato Josadukayo jowaco ni ji jokibino cerino kendo kwoŋ jom'otho; aka nike ongoye jomalaika kosa gim'obedo cuny, to Jofarisayo joyeyo gigipiny adek no je).
Gikenyo woy omedo kidho malo; aka Jondiko megi m'oyido jo ni kweth pa Jofarisayo jocungo to jokwero matek ni, “Wakinyali nwaŋo raco moro kwoŋ jame! Miti kono malaika kosa cuny moro oluwo gine!”

Piem olokere mager swa m'omiyo jasirikale madwoŋ lworo omako nike jobino yeco woko Paulo acel acele. Riameno go ooro jolweny pere kidho i dier lwak ji piny jowokwany woko Paulo bongi jo gi mbaka jowoteri go i cel.
Wor m'oluwo to Rwoth cungo kabuti Paulo to waco ni, “Bedi miseni! Itieko bedo jakony paran Yerusalem ka, aka iripo timo ameno Roma bende.”
Odikin yawere mere, Joyuda joromo kanyacel to joyiko paro. Jokwoŋere nike jok'ocem kosa madho gimoro cuka jonek Paulo.
Onwaŋo jokalo ji piero aŋwen ma joyiko paro me kanyacel.
Gikenyo jokidho pa jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotel pa ji to jowaco ni, “Watieko timo kwoŋirok madwoŋ kanyacel ni wak'obil gir'acama moro je kafodi wakineko Paulo.
Onyo win kodi jopido dhiri win wac ri jasirikale madwoŋ ma Roma wokel riwin Paulo munyo wirendere nike wimito medo niaŋ kwoŋ tiendi wac pere. Gikenyo walaneko go mafodi k'otundo kiri ka.”
To okewo pa Paulo owinjo sereko me to donjo i cel to waco ri Paulo gino.
Gikenyo Paulo olwoŋo jasirikale madwoŋ acel to waco rigo ni, “Ter jayac me bongi jatel pa jolweny; nitie gima go mito waco ri jatel no.”
Jasirikale madwoŋ no okwanyo go otero go bongi jatel pa jolweny to waco ni, “Jatwec m'ilwoŋo ni Paulo olwoŋan aka okwayan ni akel jayac me bongin, nike nitie gima go lawaco rin.”
Jasirikale ma jatel omako cinge to won tero go gicen to penjo go ni, “Aŋo ma imito waco ran?”
Ana go, “Joyuda joriwo paro nike dikin jowokwayin iter Paulo ruwaŋ jopido, to jorendere ni jopido jomito medo niaŋ kwoŋ wac pere.

To ikir'iyey winjo wac pajo, rupiri nitie ji ma kalo piero aŋwen ma jolapondo jowokuri go i royo. Jono jotieko kwoŋere nike jok'ocem kosa madho gimoro cuka jonek go. Pama won me jotieko yikere ma timo ameno, aka jokuro ŋeyo paro perin won kende.”
Jasirikale ma jatel no owaco ni, “Ikir'iwaci ri nyatoro nike itieko kelo wac me bongan.” To oro jayac no kadho.

Gikenyo jasirikale ma jatel no olwoŋo jolweny pere ario madongo to waco rijo ni, “Kwany win jolweny miya ario jowoyikere ma kidho Kasareya, kanyacel gi jokayina piero abirio kodi jotonge miya ario, aka wiyikere ay keti sawa adek ma wor.
Neni kayina moro ri Paulo ma go owothi gine, aka witer go maber bongi gavana Felik.”
Gikenyo jasirikale ma jatel no ondiko balwa ama:
“An Kilaudio Lisia andiko ri jadwoŋ, gavana Felik, aka adhiro rin moth.
Joyuda jomako ŋati me aka oyido jokidho neko go. Alimo ŋeyo nike go obedo Jaroma, am'omiyo akidho kodi jolweny paran botho go.
Paka onwaŋo amito ŋeyo wac ma jokelo kwoŋe, atero go i kapido pajo.
Anwaŋo nike go k'otimo raco moro ma di miy neki go kosa tweyi go; wac m'okel kwoŋe onwaŋo mako kwoŋ cik pajo wegi.
Aka munyo onyuthan nike Joyuda jocamo rigo sereko, aridho paro ma dhiro go bongin. Awaco ri joma osa go jowokeli wac no gi bongin kenyo.”
Josirikale jotimo paka oor jo. Jokwanyo Paulo to jotero go wor no kiri yu Antipaturi.
Yawere mere jolweny ma jotiendi gin jodwoko i cel to joweyo jokayina jokadho gine.
Jotero go Kasareya to jocwayo balwa ri gavana to jomiyo go Paulo.
Gavana osoma balwa no to penjo Paulo adec ma go wok'iye. Munyo onwaŋo ni go wok Silisia, owaco ni,
“Abino winjo wac perin ka joma osa in jotundo.” Gikenyo ooro jo kuro Paulo i cel pa Herode.
Munyo ndelo abic okadho, jadwoŋ pa jocway ri Were i wi migam, Anania, okidho Kasareya gi jodongo moro kodi ŋat'oyido luwo rijo m'ilwoŋo ni Tertulo. Jokidho ruwaŋ gavana Felik to joosa Paulo.
Olwoŋi Tertulo to jocako kelo wac pajo ama: “Jadwoŋ! Tel perin ma rieko otieko kelo riwan siem cowo hongo malac, aka wirok mathoth m'otieko bedo onyo pama okelo bero ri piny mawan.
Wajolo gime iye je hongo je, aka wakethin walwa swa.
Akimiti galin tektek, to akwayin itimi ran ŋono iwinji wac mawan manok.
Ŋati me waneno paka jamijokere marac swa; go kelo ruwirok i dier Joyuda i piny gipi, aka go obedo jatel pa Jonazarin.
Go bende otemo koco Ot pa Were to wamako go. [Onwaŋo waparo thumo rigo banja i nger ma Cik mawan,
to jasirikale madwoŋ Lisia donj'iye to kwanyo go bongi wan gi mbaka.
Gikenyo Lisia ooro joma joosa go jowobin bongin]. Ka ikaŋasa wac pa jame maber, iwon ibino ŋeyo bonge gigipiny je ma waos'iye go.”
Joyuda bende jodonjo i wac no to jowaco nike gino je otire.
Gavana ooro Paulo luwo, to Paulo waco ni, “Aŋeyo nike itieko bedo jathum banja cowo hongo malac, am'omiyo asangala gi limo silwany ma kwedirok kwoŋ wac pa jome ruwaŋin.
Paka iwon inyalo neno, fodi k'okalo ndelo apar g'ario cuka akidhi Yerusalem kwayo.
Joyuda jok'onwaŋan apiemo gi nyatoro i Ot pa Were, kosa ni aruwo ji i kalamo pajo kamoro je i tindi.
Aka jokinyal kada nyutho ni wac ma joos'iye an me obedo adieri.
Me a gim'ayeyo ruwaŋin: An alamo Were pa kwarere mawan munyo aluwo Royo ma jowaco ni k'otire. Aka ayeyo gigipiny je m'ondiki i Cik pa Musa kodi i kitawin pa jotuci wac Were.
Abende anitie gi geno kwoŋ Were paka jome, nike ji je, mabeyo kodi mareco, jobino cerino kwoŋ jom'otho.
Am'omiyo atemo paka anyalo ndelo je bedo gi paro m'otire ruwaŋ Were kodi ji.”
Aka i kare m'oyido atim'iye ameno ama jome jonwaŋan'iye i Ot pa Were munyo atimo tim ma lonyirok. Lwak ji oyido ongoye bothan, aka ruwirok moro je oyido ongoye.
To Joyuda moro ma jowok iy'adec ma Asia onwaŋo jonitie kenyo; jo ama joripo bino bongin ka kelo wac pajo k'inen jonigi wac moro kwoŋan.
Kak'ameno weyi jome wegi jowowaci reco ma jonwaŋan gine i ndir ca munyo acungo i waŋ pido,
makiweno gimoro acel kende ama akoko gine munyo acungo i dier jo ni, ‘Wimon kodan nyaka ni rupiri ayeyo ni jom'otho jobino cerino aka am'omiyo wiosa an konon.’ ”
Gikenyo Felik, m'onwaŋo otiek tito rigo maber kwoŋ Royo no, ocego winjo banja. Owaco rijo ni, “Abino thumo banja mewin ka jasirikale madwoŋ Lisia otundo.”
Ooro jasirikale m'onwaŋo nigi Paulo kuro go, munyo miyo ye go siem moro aka yeyo merin pere kelo rigo gima go yenyo.
Munyo ndelo moro okadho Felik obino gi cege Durosila, m'obedo Nyajayuda. Felik ooro jomoro lwoŋo Paulo bonge to winjo gima go waco kwoŋ yeyo Kristo Yesu.
To munyo Paulo ocako gi luwo kwoŋ tiro, kurok, kodi bino pa ndelo ma thumo banja, lworo omako Felik to waco ni, “Ere onyo eye, abino lwoŋin kendo ka alimo hongo.”
I hongo no go onwaŋo geno ni kono di Paulo omiyo ye go pesa moro; riameno go oyido lwoŋo Paulo adhik luwo gine.
Munyo oro ario okadho, Ponsio Festo olunjo kapa Felik paka gavana. Felik onwaŋo mito mako mere kodi Joyuda, am'omiyo oweyo Paulo i jiera.
Munyo ndelo adek okadho wok cuka Festo tundi iy'adec no, go owok Kasareya to kidho Yerusalem.
Kenyo jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotel pa Joyuda jokelo rigo wac pajo kwoŋ Paulo. Jokwayo Festo
ni wotim rijo bero woyeyi wokel Paulo Yerusalem, rupiri oyido joyiko neko go i royo.
Festo odwoko ni, “Paulo nitie i twec Kasareya, aka awon abino gik koro mayot.
Weyi jotel mewin jowokidhi kodan Kasareya to joosa go gi koro, k'inen go otimo raco moro.”
Festo odoko ocowo ndelo aboro kosa apar gi jo, aka nyaka okidho Kasareya. Yawere mere go obedo piny i kapido, to oro jo kelo Paulo.
Munyo Paulo otundo, Joyuda m'oyido jowok Yerusalem jocungo jothoko go to jocako kiosa go wac madongo m'omore ma jok'onyalo wodho adieri mere.
To Paulo piemo gi jo ni, “Fodi akitimo raco moro kwoŋ Cik pa Joyuda, kosa Ot pa Were, kosa kwoŋ Kayisar Kere pa Joroma.”
Festo oyido mito limo foy bongi Joyuda, riameno openjo Paulo ni, “Iyenyo kidho Yerusalem wawinji banja perin me gi koro?”
Paulo owaco ni, “Kole am'onyo ee acungo i kapido pa Kayisar won, kama ripo ni wowinj'iye banja paran. Akitimo raco moro ri Joyuda paka iwon iŋeyo.

K'inen aturo Cik aka atimo gimoro ma miyan aripo gi tho, d'akikway ni abudhere. To k'adieri angoye gi raco i wac ma joosa an iye, ongoye ŋata nyalo kethan i cingi jo. Onyo akodo wac paran bongi Kayisar.”
Gikenyo munyo Festo otieko luwo kodi joma jomiyo go rieko, odwoko ni, “Ikodo banja perin bongi kere, am'omiyo ibino kidho bongi kere.”
Rumacen Kere Agripa kodi Banis jobino Kasareya jolo Festo.
Munyo jocowo kenyo ndelo moro, Festo otito ri kere wac pa Paulo ni, “Nitie dhano ka ma Felik oweyo i twec;
aka munyo akidho Yerusalem jotel pa jacway ri Were i wi migam kodi jotel pa Joyuda joosa go bongan aka jokwayan ni athum banja woloyi go.
To awaco rijo ni, ‘Joroma jokibol dhano woko kafodi go k'onenere awaŋ g'awaŋ gi joma osa go to won kutho osere gi jo.’
Munyo joje jobino ka, akigalo, to yawere mere abedo i kapido to aoro jo kelo go.
Joma osa go jocungo, to jok'okelo kwoŋe reco moro m'onwaŋo aparo ni di jokelo.
Gim'obedo oyido a nyaka piem kwoŋ Cik pajo manyadini kodi kwoŋ nyatoro m'otho m'ilwoŋo ni Yesu ma Paulo ŋoyo nike fodi kwo.
Akinyalo ridho royo ma nwaŋo adieri kwoŋ gigipiny me, am'omiyo apenjo Paulo ka d'oyeyo kidho Yerusalem wowinji wac pere me gi koro.
To Paulo wodho ywak pere nike wowey go i jiera aka Kayisar ama wowinji banja pere. Am'omiyo awodho or ni wokur go tundo ndir ma d'adhir'iye go bongi Kayisar.”
Agripa owaco ri Festo ni, “Awon amito winjo wac pa jal me.” Festo odwoko ni, “Inowinji go dikin.”
Yawere mere Agripa gi Banis jobino gi noro gi dwoŋ m'oasere, aka jodonjo i kapido kodi rwodhe ma lweny kodi jomadongo ma tindi. Festo owodho or t'ikelo Paulo i kapido.
Festo owaco ni, “Kere Agripa, kodi ji je ma win ka gi wan, wineno ŋata Joyuda je, ma ka kodi ma Yerusalem joosa go bongan? Jokoko malo nike wokiri womedere gi kwo!
To akinyalo nwaŋo reco moro ma go otimo ma ripo gi wac ma tho. To paka go won okodo wac pere bongi Kere madwoŋ, aridho nike abino dhiro go bonge.

To angoye kodi gima nyatirtir m'anondiki kwoŋe ri kere madwoŋ, Kayisar. Am'omiyo, akelo go ka ruwaŋ win, to tektek mere ruwaŋin, Kere Agripa! Aka k'itieko kikaŋasa wac pere, nyaka anobedi kodi gim'anondiki.
Ato kinen m'otire dhiro jatwec ma k'onyuthi maber wac m'iosa iye go.”
Agripa owaco ri Paulo ni, “Oyeyin luwo wac perin.” Paulo orieyo cinge aka owodho wac pere ama:
“Kere Agripa! Atero paka ajasilwany ni konon abino luwo wac ma kwanyan woko kwoŋ gigipiny je ma Joyuda joluwo kwoŋan.
Ato me obedo ro ndir, kwoŋbedo iŋeyo maber kula pa Joyuda kodi dhawirok pajo. Am'omiyo akwayin idiy cunyin iwinji wac paran.”
“Joyuda je joŋeyo kwo paran wok i thino. Joŋeyo wok con ni i kwo paran gipi abedo i piny paran won kodi i Yerusalem.
Ndiri je joŋeyo, ka joyeyo ridho riwin, ni yado onwaŋo abedo jakweth pa joma jomako swa dini mawan, Jofarisayo.
Aka onyo acungo ka munyo iosa an ni rupiri ageno i cikirok ma Were otimo gi kwarere mawan;
cikirok ma nonin mawan apar g'ario je jogeno limo, paka jolamo Were wor g'odieceŋ. Aka ro geno me, Jadwoŋ, am'omiyo Joyuda joosa an!
Raŋo tek riwin yeyo ni Were cerino jom'otho?”

Aka meno a gima yado atimo i Yerusalem. Jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam oyido jomiyan meni aka atweyo kiri ji pa Were mathoth i jiera; aka ki meno kende, ka ithumo rijo banja ma tho, abende agoyo kwir mere.
I ndir m'omore amiyo jo limo gir'acula i kalamo pa Joyuda je, aka atemo miyo jo kwedirok kwoŋ yeyo pajo. Keme omakan swa gi jo m'omiyo akidho kiri i tindi ma wiloka lwenyo gi jo.”
“Gime am'oyido teran i Damasiko cungo kwoŋ meni kodi or pa jotel pa jocway ri Were i wi migam.
Munyo oyido fodi anitie i royo odieceŋ, jadwoŋ, aneno lero maloyo apa waŋceŋ m'owok malo to thoko wan kodi ji m'onwaŋo awotho gi jo.
Wajoje wagore piny, aka awinjo dwondi jo m'owaco ran i Dhoyuda ni, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Raŋo ilwenyo kodan? In won itimo gima kelo rin ayino litho, pa merikwa ma temo gweyo kwer ma nyweny gi tiende.’
Apenjo ni, ‘In iŋa, Rwoth?’ Aka Rwoth odwoko ni, ‘An Yesu m'ilwenyo gine.
Onyo ay icungi gi tiendin. Amenyere rin ma lokin jatic paran iwaci ri joman gim'omiyo konon inenan kodi giman je ma anonyuthin yuwaŋe.
Abino bongin i cingi ji ma Isiraili kodi Jopath, m'adhirin bongi jo
ni iyaw waŋ jo jowonyal wirok wok i mudho donjo i lero kodi wok i meni pa Sitan bino bongi Were, ŋey jowonyal limo cwaki kwoŋ reco pajo to jolimo kabedo i dier joma Were oyero munyo joyeyan.’ ”
“Am'omiyo, Kere Agripa, akicayo menyirok m'owok i polo m'aneno.
Atero wac me marapena i Damasiko, nyaka t'atero Yerusalem, kodi rumacen i Yuda gipi, kodi i piny pa Jopath, ni joripo ŋuto reco pajo jowowire bongi Were, gi timo gigipiny ma nyutho nike jotieko ŋuto.
Wac no am'omiyo Joyuda jomakan munyo anitie i Ot pa Were to jotemo nekan.
To kiri konon Were okonyan, am'omiyo acungo ka munyo aridho wac me ri ji je, ri jomathindho kodi jomadongo parom. Gim'awaco obedo gimoro acel ma jotuci wac Were kodi Musa jowaco ni bino timere,
nike Kristo ripo candere, aka ka otieko bedo marapena i cerino kwoŋ jom'otho, wokel lero ma both ri Joyuda kodi Jopath.”
Munyo Paulo fodi osa ri kwo pere ameno, Festo okoko rigo ni, “Paulo, ijaneko! Fonjirok perin madit no olokin janeko!”
Paulo odwoko ni, “Akijaneko Jadwoŋ! Wac m'aluwo obedo adieri odoko aluwo wac me m'anitie milengela.
Kole Kere Agripa oŋeyo gigipiny me, aka anyalo luwo kodi go gi miseni je. Aridho ni go otieko kikaŋasa gigipiny me je, rupiri gime k'otimere nyaliŋliŋ yu tielo.
Kere Agripa, iyeyo wac pa jotuci wac Were? Aŋeyo ni iyeyo.”
Gikenyo Agripa owaco ri Paulo ni, “I hongo macek won me iparo ni inyalo lokan Jakristo?”
Paulo odwoko ni, “Kada me hongo macek kosa mabor, kwayo paran bongi Were obedo ni in kodi wijoje ma wiwinjan konon ka winyal bedo paka an, to kareno ma k'otwey win gi lijegere ayino.”
Gikenyo kere, gavana, Banis kodi joman je m'oyido jobedo kenyo gi jo joay malo;
aka munyo jotieko eye kenyo, wegi jowaco kendi gin ni, “Ŋatin k'otimo gimoro ma di miy woneki kosa tweyo go.”
Aka Agripa owaco ri Festo ni, “Ŋati me d'onyo ogony bedi k'okodo wac pere bongi Kayisar.”
Munyo oridhi nike wacewere i nam wakidhi yu Italia, joketho Paulo kodi jom'otwey moro i cingi Yulio, jasirikale i lwak jolweny ma Roma m'ilwoŋo ni, “Lwak jolweny pa Kayisar Agusto.”
Wadonjo i mel ma wok Adramisio, m'onwaŋo cegin ay wokidhi loka ma yu adec ma Asia, gikenyo to waay. Aristariko, Jamakedonia ma Thesalonika, onwaŋo nigi wan.
Yawere mere watundo Sidon. Yulio otimo wor gi Paulo to yeyo go kidho neno merin pere, jowomiy go gim'oyenyo.
Wok kenyo wamedere gi cewirok, to paka koyo onwaŋo kudho wok yuwiy wan, wacewere yuthenge ma kigoda ma Sipuro kama koyo oyido ongoy'iye.
Munyo watieko cewirok i nam kalo Silisia gi Pamfilia, wabino Mira, iy'adec ma Lisia.
Kenyo jasirikale onwaŋo ye m'owok Alekizandiria m'oyido cegin ay wokidhi yu Italia, to rwako wan i iye.

Wacewere mothmoth ndelo m'oromo ye, aka rumacen i teko madwoŋ watundo dho tindi ma Kinido. To paka koyo k'oyeyo wan medirok yuthenge no, wacewere yuthenge ma koyo ongoy'iye yu Salimone dho geŋin ma kigoda ma Kirete.
Warikere i thengi nam, aka i teko madwoŋ watundo kam'ilwoŋo ni, Thengi nam Maber, ma kibor kodi tindi ma Laseya.
Paka hongo onwaŋo okadho malac, aka ndelo ma madwoŋ ma cwako reco oyido otieko kadho, odoko medirok gi cewirok oyido nyalo kelo teko, Paulo omiyo jo rieko ni,
“Jowotan, aneno ni cewirok mawan kidho kelo teko yumalo aka gigipiny madit bino nyekere i mel, aka ki meno kende, to kiri wan won bende wanyalo podho i teko.”
To jasirikale omedo tic gi wac pa jadwoŋ ma mel kodi won ye loyo gi rieko ma Paulo oyido okelo.

Paka kacungo pa mel i thengi nam no onwaŋo kiber bed'iye i ndir ma pe ŋic'iye piny, ji maloyo thotho jofoyo dhirok i nam gi temo tundo yu Fonisia ka nyalere. Kanyago obedo kacungo pa mel i Kirete ma ŋiyo yumalo i thenge ma yuracuc kodi yupiny yuthenge ma yuracuc bende, aka k'oyido nyalere, di wabedo kenyo i hongo ma ŋico no.
Koyo ma wok yu Tiendan piny ocako kudho, aka ji joparo ni di jonyalo tiyo gi can pajo; ameno joywayo gima juko ye to jocewere gi dho geŋin ma thengi Kirete.
To piyo piyo asur madwoŋ, m'ilwoŋo ni Koyo ma wok yuracuc ma Wic piny, okudho munyo loro wok i kigoda.
Koyo no ogoyo mel, aka paka oyido kinyalere coro mel yu kama koyo wok'iye, cuny wan oeye to waweyo koyo kadho gi wan.
Walimo kagoŋirok moro munyo wacomo yu geŋin ma kigoda mathin m'ilwoŋo ni Kauda. Kenyo watemo gi mbaka to wanyalo gwoko ye m'onwaŋo waywayo yucen.

Munyo jotieko ywayo ye gi tiŋo malo, jotemo kikoda mel matek gi thondhe kwoŋ geŋin. To paka oyido jolworo nike jonyalo gurok i kwoyo dho thengi pi ma Libia, jolwogo nanga ma cewirok to joweyo koyo won kadho gi mel.
Munyo koyo madwoŋ onwaŋo wito wan gi meni, yawere mere jocako bolo woko gigipiny ma ye onwaŋo otiŋo,
aka yawere mere jobolo woko gigipiny m'icewo gine mel gi cingi jo.
Ndelo okadho madit ma wakineno waŋceŋ kosa micalin, aka koyo omedere gi kudho gi meni. Rumacen cuny wan oeye kiri kwoŋ kwo mawan.

Munyo ji onwaŋo jotieko riyo kec ndelo madit, Paulo ocungo i dier jo to waco ni, “Jowotan, di ceŋino wiwinjo wac paran to wiweyo cewirok wok Kirete; aka di wanyalo geŋo nyekirok kodi rwenyo pa gigipiny me je.
To onyo akwayo win, bedi win miseni! Ongoye ŋatimoro kwoŋ win ma bino rwenyo kwo pere; to mel kende ama bino rwenyo,
rupiri nende wor malaika pa Were ma an alamo aka abedo apere obino bongan,
to waco ni, ‘Paulo, ikir'ibedi gi lworo! Iripo cungo ruwaŋ Kayisar; aka Were, i bero pere, otieko miyin kwo pa ji je m'icewere gi jo me!’
Am'omiyo, jowotan, bedi win miseni, rupiri an gi geno i Were ni gime bino bedo paka awaco riwin won.
To waripo combo kwoŋ kigoda moro.”
I wor mar'apar g'aŋwen, munyo koyo oyido fodi wito wan i nam ma Mediterania, dho dier wor, jocewi ye joŋico nike oyido wariko kam'othwo.

Riameno jobolo piny tal m'otwey kwoŋe tele mapek to jonwaŋo ni lutho ma pendi pi oyido obedo fut miya acel gi piero ario. I kare moro kenyo jodoko jobolo tal to jonwaŋo ni pendi pi obedo fut piero abuŋwen.
Munyo lworo omako jo ni mel mawan nyalo guro telin, jocaro piny gigipiny aŋwen ma juko ye gi yucen wocungi to jokwayo ni piny woyawere.
Gikenyo jocewi mel jotemo kwalok wok i mel; jobolo ye mathin i pi to jorendere nike oyido jokidho wodho woko gigipiny ma juko ye ma yunyime.
To Paulo owaco ri jasirikale madwoŋ gi josirikale man ni, “Ka jocewi mel jok'odoŋ i mel ka wakinyali both.”
Gikenyo jolweny jothumo woko thondhe m'onwaŋo mako ye mathin no to joweyo kadho.
Munyo piny kidho yawirok, Paulo okwayo joje ni jowocem'iye. “Witieko riyo kec ndelo apar g'aŋwen pama, aka hongo no je wikicamo gimoro.
Am'omiyo akwayo win, cami wiye gimoro aka winwaŋ meni rupiri ongoye kada yer acel wiy win ma bino rwenyo.”
Munyo otieko waco ameno, Paulo okwanyo mugat, oketho Were walwa ruwaŋ joje, to turo, to cako camo.
Miseni omako jo, to dhano je camo ye cemo moro.
Wajoje oyido waromo ji miya ario gi piero abirio g'aucel i mel no.
Munyo dhano je otieko cemo, joloko mel masew munyo jobolo woko ŋano i wakawaka.
Munyo piny oyawere, jocewi mel oyido jok'oniaŋ ni kam'othwo nicegin, to joneno coŋino kodi kam'onaŋere ma di kwoyo i thengi nam to joridho paro ni ka nyalere di jotero mel kenyo.

Gikenyo jobolo gicen gigipiny ma juko mel to joweyo i pi, to bende jogonyo woko thondhe m'onwaŋo omako yath m'itiro gine royo i mel. Gikenyo jotiŋo malo nanga ma cewo ye to joyaro to koyo cako tero mel i coŋino.
To nyim mel oguro kwoyo ma piny to donj'iye, to moko ma ki dhire kareno pi ma tula gi derino ŋinyo woko mbawin m'ogeti gine mel gi yucen.
Josirikale joparo neko woko jotwec je ŋey wongoye kwoŋ jo ŋata wokwale.
To jasirikale madwoŋ onwaŋo mito botho Paulo, am'omiyo ociero jo timo ameno. Kucel, ooro ji je ma jonyalo buko pi jowopen por iye jowobuki to jokadho.
Gikenyo nyaka jom'odoŋ jowoluwi jo cen munyo jobedo wi mbawin moro kosa adec ma mel m'otur otur. Aka meno apaka wajoje wapor loka maber.
Munyo watundo loka maber, aka walimo ŋeyo nike kigoda piny no ilwoŋo ni Molita.
Ji ma kenyo josangala swa gi wan. Koth oyido ocako cwe aka piny oyido ŋic swa, am'omiyo jomoko riwan mac to jolwoŋo wan oyo.
Paulo onwaŋo otieko dimo agwere moro to ketho i mac, to thwol uu moro wok ro lietho pa mac, to minere i cinge to moko gine.
Munyo ji ma kenyo joneno thwol no oliero i cingi Paulo, wegi jowaco kendi gin ni, “Ŋati me ripo bedo ni go janek, rupiri kad'oyido obothi nam, je fodi tipo kiyey ni go wobothi.”
To Paulo owito woko thwol no i mac ma k'otimo kwoŋe raco moro.
Onwaŋo jokuro neno go ka kwoŋe yenyo gi kwir kosa gore piny abwap gi tho. To munyo jotieko kuro cowo hongo malac ma jok'oneno gimoro je ka timere kwoŋe, jowiro paro pajo to jowaco ni, “Go were moro!”
Cegin kenyo oyido nitie ndelo moro m'obedo apa Pubilio, rwoth ma kigoda no. Go ojolo wan maber to wabedo wendo pere cowo hongo ma ndelo adek.
Ba Pubilio oyido ni kanindo kwoŋe oowere odoko iye riemo. Paulo odonjo i ot pere, okwayo Were, to ketho cinge kwoŋe to botho go.
Munyo gime otimere, jotwo man je i kigoda no jobino to jolimo both.
Jomiyo wan mic madit, aka munyo wacewere joketho riwan i ye no gimoro je m'onwaŋo wayenyo i cewirok mawan.
Munyo dwe adek okadho, wacewere i mel wok Alekizandiria i mel m'ilwoŋo ni, Wutmere Ma rut i kigoda no i ndir ma pe oyido oŋic'iye piny.
Watundo i tindi ma Sirakuse to wabedo kenyo ndelo adek.
Wok kenyo wathokere gi cewirok to watundo i tindi ma Rejum. Yawere mere koyo ocako kudho wok yupiny, to kad'ameno watundo i tindi ma Puteyoli i hongo ma ndelo ario.
Wanwaŋo jom'oyeyo jowoti wan moro kenyo ma jokwayo nike wabedi gi jo ma sabiti acel. Wok kenyo aka watundo Roma.
Jom'oyeyo jowot wan ma Roma jowinjo kwoŋ wan to jobino romo gi wan i karomo m'ilwoŋo ni Apiya kodi man ni Udi ma cemo Adek. Munyo Paulo oneno jo, ofoyo Were to limo miseni.
Munyo watundo Roma, oyey Paulo bedo kakende gi jasirikale ma kuro go.

Munyo ndelo adek okadho, Paulo olwoŋo jotel pa Joyuda ma kenyo i romo. Munyo jocokere owaco rijo ni, “Wutmera! Kad'oyido akitimo raco moro ri ji mawan kosa kwoŋ kula ma wanwaŋo kwoŋ kwarere mawan, olokan jatwec i Yerusalem to ikethan i cingi Joroma.
Munyo jokaŋasa wac paran oyido jomito gonyan, rupiri jonwaŋo ni akitimo raco moro ma d'omiyan atho.
To munyo Joyuda jopiemo gi paro me, aneno ni aripo kodo wac paran bongi Kayisar kad'onwaŋo an won angoye ran gi wac m'aosa ji paran.
Riameno akwayo neno win gi luwo gi win, rupiri anitie gi lijegere me kwoŋan ro wac ma Joisiraili jogeno kwoŋe.”
Jowaco rigo ni, “fodi wakilimo balwa moro je wok bongi Joyuda ma mako kwoŋin, aka ongoye kad'omin wan moro je m'owok koro gi wac moro, kosa m'oluwo gimoro marac kwoŋin.
To wamito winjo gim'iwaco rupiri kamoro je ji joluwo marac kwoŋ kweth me m'initie iye.”

Gikenyo joyiko ndelo gi Paulo, to ji kweth kwoŋ jo jobino i ndelo no kama Paulo oyido bed'iye. Wok odikin tundo othieno, Paulo otito rijo mikwenda kwoŋ Ker pa Were. Otemo paka onyalo miyo jo ŋeyo maber kwoŋ Yesu munyo kwanyo wac i Cik pa Musa kodi i ndiko pa jotuci wac Were.
Jomegi kwoŋ jo joyeyo i cuny gin kwoŋ wac pere, to joman jok'oyeyo.
Gikenyo joeye gi piem i dier jo wegi kendi gin munyo Paulo otieko waco gimoro acel me: Cuny Maleŋ cango otire munyo luwo gi i dhok Isaya jatuci wac Were ri kwarere mewin ni,
Kole Were owaco ni,
“Kidhi iwaci ri jome ni,
Wibino winjo adieri, to wik'oniaŋ dwoŋ gima wiwinjo;
Wibino ŋiyo adieri, to waŋ win k'oneni gimoro.
Kwoŋbedo paro pa jome olokere mafol.
Jotieko culo ithi gin,
to jomiyo waŋ gin.
Bedi k'ameno, waŋ gin d'oneno gimoro,
odoko ithi gin d'owinjo wac,
aka cuny jo d'oniaŋ gimoro.
Ameno di jonyalo wirok bongan to jolimo both.”
Aka Paulo omedo ni, “Wiripo ŋeyo nike mikwenda pa Were kwoŋ both odhir ri Jopath; aka jobino winjo!”
[Munyo Paulo owaco ameno, Joyuda joeye, munyo wegi jopiemo kendi gin matek].
Paulo obedo kenyo oro ario munyo won cowo teko pere, aka ojolo ji je ma jobino liewo go,
to tito kwoŋ Ker pa Were to fonjo kwoŋ Rwoth Yesu Kristo munyo luwo gi miseni je kodi siem.
Balwa m'owok bongi Paulo, jatic pa Yesu Kristo kendo jamoor ma Were oyero to lwoŋo fonjo Wac Manyen Maber pere,
ma Were cango ociko munyo oro jotuci wac pere, t'iketho i Ndiko Maleŋ.
Me obedo Wac Manyen Maber ma mako kwoŋ Wode, Rwodhiwan Yesu Kristo, m'onywol paka nyakwar Daudi;
t'inyutho ji ni go obedo Wod Were gi meni madwoŋ mapa Cuny ma kelo leŋo, munyo ocerino go kwoŋ jom'otho.
I go Were omiyan nema ma bedo jamoor ri Kristo, ŋey atel ji ma nonin je jowoyey odoko jowowinji or.
Me bende mako win ma winitie Roma, ma Were olwoŋo bedo ji pa Yesu Kristo.
Am'omiyo andiko ri wijoje ma winitie Roma ma Were omaro to lwoŋo bedo ji pere won.
Weyi Were Bawan kodi Rwoth Yesu Kristo womiy win nema gi siem.
Marapena afoyo Were paran, i Yesu Kristo, ri wijoje; rupiri piny gipi winjo kwoŋ yeyo mewin.
Were nyalo ridho ni gim'awaco obedo adieri; Were no ama atiyo rigo gi cunyan je munyo afonjo Wac Manyen Maber kwoŋ Wode. Were oŋeyo nike ndir je apoyo win, i hongo je ka akwayo.
Akwayo nike Were i mito pere, i hongo moro womiyan ye thwolo ma limo win.
Kole ayenyo swa neno win ŋey anyal poko gi win silwany ma cuny, ma medo win meni.
Dwoŋ mere ni win, kodan, wabino nwaŋo kony kiromo, win i yeyo paran aka an i yeyo mewin.
Kole or omakan matek kwoŋ ji je, kwoŋ jokite mabeyo kodi joreco, kwoŋ jom'ofonjere kodi joma kuya gimoro.
Am'omiyo ayenyo swa fonjo win bende ma winitie Roma Wac Manyen Maber.
Kole Wac Manyen Maber nyutho paka Were ketho ji i tiro gine luwo kwoŋ yeyo, wok i cakirok tundo i gike. Ato randik waco ni, “Ŋat'okethi i tiro gi Were bino kwo gi yeyo.”
Were otieko nyutho ni keme pere bino wok i polo to lwenyo gi reco je kodi tim pa ji mareco ma royo pajo mareco geŋo adieri ŋeyirok.
Were miyo jo gir'acula rupiri gima ji jonyalo ŋeyo kwoŋ Were nitie kamaler rijo.
Wok cuka Were cwey piny, kada go won kinenere i meni pere ma cil gi cil kodi i kite ma nyawerewere, gima nyutho ni go nitie nenere i gigipiny ma go ocweyo. Am'omiyo dhano ongoye kodi gigoŋirok!
Ji joŋeyo Were, to jokimiy go dwoŋ pere, kendo kada temo foyo go ni walwa. Kucel, paro pajo olokere masisiri aka paro pajo ma kitiy m'odoŋ mudho otieko poŋ'iye.
Jowaco ni joriek, to kere jomiŋ ayin;
kama di jolami Were makitho, jolamo rigin gim'othedhi i cal pa dhano ma tho, kosa apa winyin, kosa ap'ogwaŋe kosa apa thwole ayino.
Paka ji jomiŋ ameno, Were ojala jo jowotimi gigipiny mareco ma cuny jo yenyo, aka jotimo gigipiny ma kelo wickwot i del pajo, ŋatiman gi nyawote.
Jowilo adieri kwoŋ Were gi twodo; jolamo aka jotiyo ri gima Were ocweyo kapa lamo Jacwec won, m'iripo pako cil gi cil. Ameno.

Paka ji jotimo gime, Were ojala jo to weyo jo ri awanya ma kelo wickwot. Kiri mon bende jowiro or ma delkwoŋ gin munyo joweyo riwirok i del i yo m'otire to joriwere wegi kendi gin, m'obedo yo ma k'otire.
Ameno, cwo bende joweyo riwirok gi mon paka ndir je, to joowere g'awanya kwoŋ cwo wadi gin. Cwo jotimo wickwot gi cwo wadi gin, am'omiyo Were miyo jo gir'acula ro ndir, ro tim pajo mareco no.
Paka ji jokwero ketho i paro pajo rieko mar'adieri ma mako kwoŋ Were, go onyo ojala jo ri paro m'otop, ma miyo jo timo gim'oyido jokiripi timo.
Jopoŋ gi kidakana ma nger je: Raco, woro, kodi camo tiendi ji gi piny. Jopoŋ gi nyeko, neki, gorok, twodo, gi paro marac. Jonyeko nyingi wadi gin,
aka joluwo kicar kwoŋ ji; jodak Were, joyetere, jobedo jopakirok, jokwoto; joparo yo m'omore ma timo reco; aka jokiwinji jonywol pajo;
jodakana, jokikur cikirok pajo, jokinyuthi wor odoko jokidew kwoŋ nyatoro.
Joŋeyo kiri ni cik pa Were waco ni ji ma kwo pajo cale ameno joripo gi tho, to je fodi nyaka jomedere ameda gi timo gigipiny no won; aka maloyo raco: Jofoyo joman ma bende jotimo ameno.
Waŋeyo ni Were otire ka thumo banja ri joma timo gigipiny ma pameno.
Nyawotan, iparo nike k'itimo gigipiny no won ma ithum'iye banja ri jowotin, inobothi kwoŋ thumo banja pa Were?
Kosa miti icayo bero pere m'oasere, ka diyo cunye gi ji aka kudere. Adieri iŋeyo ni Were ber rupiri go temo tero win i ŋuto!
To initie gi wictek aka cunyin dicay. Am'omiyo iwon imiyo gir'acula perin labedo madwoŋ swa i ndelo ma keme pa Were bino nyuther'iye ma thumo banja mar'adieri.
Kole Were bino miyo dhano je kemba cungo kwoŋ gima go otimo.
Ji megi hongo je jotimo gima beyo, aka jorango dwoŋ pa Were gi wor kodi kwo makirum; aka Were bino miyo jo kwo makirum.
Ji man joparo kwoŋ bero pajo wegi to jokwero gim'otire, aka jotimo gima k'otire. Jono Were bino konjo kwoŋ jo keme pere gi jok swa.
Candirok gi litho bino bedo ri ji je ma jotimo reco, kutho marapena ri Joyuda, aka nyaka ri Jopath bende.
To Were bino miyo dwoŋ kodi wor gi siem ri nyatoro je ma timo gima beyo, marapena ri Joyuda ŋey wotim ri Jopath bende.
Kole Were tero ji je marom.
Jopath, ma jongoye kodi Cik pa Musa, jotimo reco aka jobino rwenyo bende m'ongoye Cik. Joyuda ma jonigi Cik, jotimo gimarac aka ilathumo rijo banja cungo kwoŋ Cik no.
Ato k'obedo nyaka i winjo Cik gi ithi jo ama miyo iketho ji i tiro gi Were, t'itimo gima Cik mito ayino.
Jopath jongoye gi Cik; to ka hongo je gi yero pajo jotimo gima Cik mito, meno nyutho ni Cik tiyo i cuny jo, kad'oyido jongoye gi Cik.
Kite pajo nyutho ni gima Cik mito ondiki i cuny jo. Paro pajo man cuny jo bende nyutho ni gime otire, rupiri paro pajo diceŋ miyo jo ŋeyo ni jonyeko wac kosa be.
Onyo, cungo kwoŋ Wac Manyen Maber m'afonjo, me apaka bino bedo i ndelo no munyo Were, i Yesu Kristo, bino thumo banja ri paro manyaliŋliŋ je ma cuny ji.
Aka in to? Ilwoŋere ni Jayuda; ithenere kwoŋ Cik aka iyumere gi Were;
K'iŋeyo gima Were mito ni itimi, aka itieko fonjere kwoŋ Cik yero gim'otire;
aka k'iridho adieri ni iripo nyutho joma waŋ gin otho royo paka lero pa joma nitie i mudho,
ibedo jatiri jomamiŋ g'adieri, odoko ibedo jafonji pa joma fodi jok'otegino. Iridho ni in gi rieko m'oromo, kodi adieri ma wok i Cik.
Onyo in m'ifonjo joman no, raŋo iwon ikifonjere? K'ifonjo nike, “Ikir'ikwal.” Iwon doko ikwalo nedi?
In m'iwaco ni, “Ikir'itim cot.” Iwon doko itimo cot nedi? In m'idak lamo cal makicar, doko inyaga gigipiny wok i migam m'ilam'iye werin moro nedi?
In m'iyumere ni in gi cik pa Were, raŋo m'idoko ikelo wickwot ri Were kareno ituro cik pere?
Kole ondiki ni, “Ro kiti win Joyuda, am'omiyo Jopath joluwo marac kwoŋ nyingi Were.”
Kole ka wiwinjo Cik, meno aka nyaka thumirok mewin dikony; to ka wituro Cik, meno kole thumirok mewin onyo cale pa k'obedo thumirok.
Am'omiyo ka Japath ma k'othumere timo gima Cik mito, meno onyo Were kiter go paka ŋat'othumere?
Aka Jopath jobino thumo banja woloyi win Joyuda, rupiri kada winitie gi Cik aka withumere je fodi wituro, kucel jo ama jowinjo Cik kada jok'othumere.
Kere ŋa m'onyo obedo Jayuda mar'adieri, m'othumere? Ŋat'obedo Jayuda nyaka gi thumirok ma woko meno ki Jayuda mar'adieri, odoko thumirok mar'adieri k'obedo m'itimo nyaka gi woko kende.
Kucel Jayuda mar'adieri meno m'obedo Jayuda i cunye, m'othumere i cunye, aka meno tic pa Cuny Maleŋ pa Were, makiweno apa Cik m'ondiki. Ŋato limo pak bongi Were, makiweno bongi dhano.
Onyo Joyuda joloyo joman i yo mene? Kosa kony aŋo manitie i thumirok?
Nitie bero m'oromo ma bedo Jayuda. Kutho marapena, Were ogeno Joyuda to miyo jo mikwenda pere.
Aŋo to, ka jomegi kwoŋ jo jobedo joma kigenere? Onyo ro gino, nyutho ni Were kigenere?
K'ameno be! Weyi Were wobedi jar'adieri kada dhano je obedi jatwodo. Paka ondiki ni,
“Aka ŋey wonyuthere paka gim'iluwo otire,
aka iloy banja ka i pido kodin.”
Onyo wanowaci nedi ka tim mawan ma k'otire konyo ma nyutho kamaler ni apa Were am'otire? Wawaci ni Were timo marac ka miyo wan gir'acula? (Meno onyo aluwo paka dhano.)
K'ameno be! Ka Were k'otire nyalo nedi thumo banja ri piny?
To ka komo paran konyo ma nyutho tiro pa Were to kelo rigo dwoŋ, raŋo ma fodi ithumo ran banja paŋini ajareco?
To raŋo ma kiwaci ni, “Weyi watim reco ŋey bero wowok'iye?” Adieri jomegi jotieko kiri yetan munyo jocwoko dhokan ni awaco ameno won! Ibino thumo banja loyo jo paka ripo.
Onyo wa Joyuda wanitie maber i yo mene loyo Joman? Ongoye be! Atieko nyutho ni Joyuda kodi Jopath parom joje jonitie i meni pa gimarac,
paka ondiki ni,
“Ongoye dhano kad'acel m'otire,
ongoye ma kad'acel,
ongoye moro ma niaŋ,
kosa ma rango Were.
Ji je joeye woko bongi Were,
joje jotieko podho;
Ongoye ŋata timo gimaber,
ongoye kad'acel.
Jooro lew jo ma twodo,
aka wac ma cal kwir ama wok i dhok jo;
Joweyo gunda kodi rem kama jokidh'iye je.
Fodi jok'oŋeyo yo ma siem,
Onyo pama watieko ŋeyo ni gimoro je ma Cik waco, mako kwoŋ joma fodi joluwo Cik, ŋey wogeŋ woko rendirok pa dhano, aka Were wonyali thumo banja ri piny gipi.
Kole ongoye dhano m'ibino kwano rigo tiro ruwaŋ Were ro nyaka timo gima Cik yenyo, rupiri Cik miyo dhano nyaka ŋeyo nike gimanyo obedo reco won kende.
To pama royo ma Were ketho gine ji i tiro gi go otieko nyuthere, aka kimaki kwoŋ cik. Cik kodi ndiko pa jotuci wac Were je joridho gima mako kwoŋ royo no.
Were ketho ji i tiro kwoŋ yeyo pajo i Yesu Kristo ayino. Were timo gime ri ji je ma joyeyo Kristo, rupiri pokirok ongoye.
Paka ji je jotieko timo reco aka jonitie bor gi dwoŋ pa Were,
pama onyo ikwanyo woko banja kwoŋ ji je ro mic ma nema pa Were kareno igonyo jo woko kwoŋ reco i Kristo Yesu

ma Were oketho paka cowirok, ŋey gi tho pere go wolokere royo ma cwako reco pa ji cungo kwoŋ yeyo pa dhano. Were otimo ameno ma nyutho tiro pere, rupiri i ndir m'okadho, go odiyo cunye to weyo ma k'okwano reco pa ji;
to i ndir ma pama go kaŋasa reco pa ji, ma nyutho paka go won otire, aka go ama kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ ŋata nitie gi yeyo i Yesu.
Onyo aŋo ma wanyalo yumirok gine? Kole ongoye! I royo mene? I royo ma kuro Cik? Be, i royo ma bedo gi yeyo ayino.
At'onyo wacowo wac ni Were kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ dhano cungo kwoŋ yeyo, makiweno kwoŋ timo gima Cik mito.
Kosa Were obedo Were pa Joyuda kende? Go k'obedo Were pa Jopath bende? Kole go obedo Were pa Jopath bende.
Were nitie acel, aka go bino kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ Joyuda cungo kwoŋ yeyo pajo, aka bende bino kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ Jopath ro yeyo bende acel no won.
Onyo nyutho ni wabol woko Cik ro yeyo me? K'ameno be; kucel, waridhi Cik bende.
Onyo wanowaci aŋo kwoŋ Abraham, kwari wan i del?
Bedi kwany woko banja kwoŋe cungo kwoŋ gigipiny ma go otimo, di go onyalo bedo kodi yumirok, to go kinyal yumere ruwaŋ Were.
To kere randik waco aŋo? Ni, “Abraham oyeyo Were, aka ro yeyo pere Were okwano go paka ŋat'otire.”
Dhano ka tiyo iculo go kemba ma kiter paka mic, to paka gima go otiyo rigo ayin.
To ka dhano kikethi geno kwoŋ tic pere, to ketho i yeyo Were ma kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ ji ayino, kiti yeyo no miyo ikwano rigo tiro.
Me a dwoŋ gima Daudi owaco munyo luwo kwoŋ kisangala pa ŋata Were jolo paka ŋat'otire ma k'okwano tic ma go otieko timo:
joma go oumo reco pajo!
Jasilwany a ŋata Rwoth kilakwano kwoŋe reco pere!”

Silwany ma Daudi oluwo kwoŋe me bedo apa jom'othumere kende? Be. Bedo apa joma jok'othumere bende, rupiri watieko nyutho wac wok i randik ni, “Abraham oyeyo Were, aka ro yeyo pere Were okwano go paka ŋat'otire.”
Gime otimere keraŋo? Otimere mafodi, kosa munyo Abraham otieko thumere? Mafodi, makiweno rumacen ma thumirok pere.
